text: I-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ithandazela ukuthi ubohle umkhuhlane weCorona, isimo sibuyele kwesejwayelekile, ukuze iqhubeke nohlelo lwayo lokuba nezingqunguthela zayo zezifunda eziphazamisekile.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ricardo Mthembu, uthi ukuhlehla kwezinhlelo zokuba nezingqungquthela kushaya namalungiselelo okhetho lohulumeni basekhaya oluzoba ngonyaka ozayo.UMthembu uxoxe kabanzi ngezinhlelo zeqembu eziphazamisekile, wathi bahlalele ethembeni lokuthi kuzolunga.Ugcizelele ngokuthi bayawuhlonipha kakhulu umyalelo kahulumeni, wanxusa nabanye abantu ukuba bawuthobele.Amaqembu amaningi KwaZulu-Natal asevele aqalile ukuxoxa ngamalungiselelo okubanga omasipala ngonyaka ozayo, uMthembu uthi bagqemeke engeqiwa ntwala njengoba bengazi nokuthi iCorona izodamuka nini.Kubheduke iCorona ngesikhathi i-ANC isiqala ukubiza imihlangano yamagatsha yokulungiselela izingqungquthela. Kwezinye izifunda kubambe ubuholi besikhashana obulungiselela izingqungquthela njengoba ubuholi buhlakaziwe.UMthembu uthi izingqungquthela kufanele zibe kulo nyaka noma ngabe liduma lishaya umbani okhasa phansi.“Sishayekile kakhulu ngendaba yeCorona kodwa bekufanele sithobele umthetho wezwe. Ukuba khona kwezingqungquthela kuzosiza ukuthi kufike ukhetho sesimi ngomumo yingakho ngithi izingqungquthela zizoba khona noma kanjani kulo nyaka,’’ kusho uMthembuUthe banethemba lokuthi uma kwedlula isikhathi somkhuhlane bazobuyela bayoxoxa ukuthi baqhubeka kanjani nohlelo lwabo lokukhetha.Phakathi kwezifunda obekufanele zikhethe kukhona iLower South Coast, iGeneral Gizenga Mpanza, yiTheku neMoses Mabhida.Esinye isifunda esisanda kuhlakazwa yiJosiah Gumede ngaphansi kwayo okukhona uMasipala i-Alfred Duma waseMnambithi ohlaselwe yizinkinga.Isinqumo sokuhlakaza ubuholi balesi sifunda, sithathwe emuva kokumiswa kweMeya yase-Alfred Duma, uMnuz Vincent Madlala.Ezifundeni ezehlukene kuvele kuqalile ukuphakanyiswa kwamagama abangase bathathe izikhundla ikakhulukazi esikasihlalo esivame ukubangwa kakhulu ngokufanayo nesikanobhala.Isolezwe ngeSonto likhulume cishe nabo bonke abacuthele esikasihlalo kulezi zifunda okumele zikhethe, bazwakalisa ukuthi nakanjani bazosingenela esikasihlalo.Inhloso enkulu yeSolezwe ngeSonto ngokubanika ithuba, bekungukuthi baqinisekise ukuthi ngempela baphakanyisiwe futhi nabo bavumelene nesiphakamiso samalungu kaKhongolose nokuyinto abayiqinisekisa.Isolezwe ngeSonto lizophinde likuveze ukuthi lakhuluma noMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane, obephethe uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu Natal, njengoba engomunye ophakanyiswe ngamalungu kaKhongolose eMsunduzi kodwa yena wagcina ngokuxolisa wathi ngeke akwazi ukuba nengxoxo naleli phephandaba.
title: I-ANC eKZN ithandazela ukunqotshwa kweCorona

text: UTHI ngeke aphawule ngezindaba ezivele emaphephandabeni ayizolo zokuthi uxoshiwe eMabala Noise umrepha osematheni kulezi zinsuku. URikhado “Riky Rick” Makhado, Isolezwe NgeSonto elibike udaba lokuthi uxoshwe kulesi sitebele ngemuva kwenkulumo ayenza emcimbini wamaMetro Awards.Ekhuluma neSolezwe izolo, uthe akazimisele ukukhuluma lutho ngalolu daba.“Ngizokhuluma maduze kodwa manje angikakulungeli ukuphendula imibuzo yabezindaba,” kusho uRiky Rick.Umthombo ongashayi eceleni, uthe lo mrepha uphucwe nezimoto ezine abezinikwe yile nkampani.IMabala Noise iziphikile izindaba zokuxoshwa kwalo mrepha njengoba bethe bona banenkontileka naye.
title: Akathi vu uRiky Rick 'ngokuxoshwa'

text: IHLULEKILE imizamo yeDA yokukhipha ngevoti lokungayithembi iMeya yoMkhandlu weTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede, izolo.Le mizamo yenzeke phambi kukaNgqongqoshe wokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu kuzwelonke uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma obehambele umhlangano.I-DA izame ukufaka isiphakamiso sokungamethembi uNkk Gumede kodwa yahluleka emva kokuchithwa uSomlomo uMnuz William Mapena.UMapena uthe iDA ayizange ilandele imigudu efanele wabe eseyichitha ngaphambi kokuba udaba lwayo ludingidwe.Kube nokuqagulisana ngamazwi phakathi kukaMapena nomholi wekhokhasi yeDA eThekwini uNksz Nicole Graham obefuna ukwazi ukuthi kungani isiphakamiso sabo singekho ohlwini lwezinto okuzokhulunywa ngazo emhlanganweni nokuthi kungani engavumi benze lesi siphakamiso besemabhentshini.Amanye amaqembu aphikisayo azamile ukweseka iDA kodwa ehluleka.UNksz Graham uthe ngokomthetho olawula umkhandlu ikhansela linesikhathi sekhefu elilodwa, wabe esefuna ukwazi ukuthi ngubani ogunyaze ikhefu lesibili likaNkk Gumede.Uthe uNkk Gumede akekho ekhefini elisemthethweni kodwa uyaqhubeka nokuhola uR115 000 ngenyanga.UMapena ube esethi aludingidwe ngevoti udaba lwekhefu lwemeya, amakhansela e-ANC avota ngokuseka ikhefu, ngesikhathi amaqembu aphikisayo wona ephikisana nalokhu.UNkk Gumede nelinye ikhansela lomkhandlu uMnuz Mondi Mthembu basekhefini kusukela ngoJuni ngemuva kokuboshwa mayelana necala lenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa elithinta ithenda yezigidi kadoti.Ethula inkulumo yakhe uDkt Dlamini Zuma uthe ukuhlangana kwakhe namakhansela kuyinto okumele ihlale yenzeka njengoba begunyazwa umthethosisekelo.Uthe elungiselela lo mhlangano ngesonto eledlule uhlangane nebamba leMeya uNkk Fazwia Peer neMenenja yoMkhandlu uMnuz Sipho Nzuza.“Nakuba singakhuluma ngempumelelo yaleli dolobha elisezingeni eliphezulu kodwa kuyinto eyaziwayo ukuthi omasipala abaningi lapha KwaZulu-Natal nasezweni lonke babhekene nezingqinamba,” kusho uDkt Dlamini Zuma.Uthe kuwumsebenzi wakhe ukuthi avakashele bonke omasipala abakhungethwe izinkinga ukuze bathole ukuthi yini ezidalayo."Uhambo lwethu lwanamhlanje lumayelana nokuthi siqonde kabanzi ngezinkinga ezikhona nempumelelo ekhona, senze nocwaningo mayelana nesimo sonke somkhandlu,” kusho uDkt Dlamini Zuma.Uthe oHulumeni baseKhaya bawuhlaka lukahulumeni olubalulekile ngoba basondelene kakhulu nabantu.“Okusho ukuthi omasipala kumele basekwe uhulumeni kazwelonke nowesifundazwe ukuze bakwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wabo ngendlela efanele,” kusho uDkt Dlamini Zuma.Uthe kumele baqinise impi ekuqedeni ukuvuza kwamanzi nokuxhunywa kukagesi womkokotelo.Uthe umkhandlu awukwazi ukuthi uqhubeke usule izikweletu zabantu abangazikhokheli izidingo ezifinyelela kuR4.3 billion.UDkt Dlamini Zuma uthe kumphatha kabi ukuthi uma ehamba emalokishini athole ukuthi udotiawuqoqiwe.
title: Ihlulekile imizamo yokukhipha imeya

text: Kumele uwunakekele zisuka nje ngoba uzowudinga iminyaka eminingi yokuphila kwakho. Lawa ngamazwi entokazi esizakhele udumo nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana, enomzimva oqatha.UPearl Garavalgia owenza izifundo zeMathematics Science enyuvesi yaseGoli, uthi akazilokothi izicoficofi ngisho ngabe usemcimbini noma uzikhiphele endaweni edayisa ukudla osekuphekiwe.Uthi ukuzijwayeza ukwenza igilosa uziphekele wena ekhaya ozokudla, uhlele usuku nosuku ukuthi uzodlani, kubaluleke kakhulu uma ufuna ukunakekela umzimba wakho.“Abantu abaningi bakhumbula ukudla uma sebelambile, bagcine becosha noma yini sebephuthunyiswa yindlala. Ukuhlela ukuthi uzodlani usuku lonke, kwenza ukuthi ungadli noma yini. Noma ngabe usemsebenzini, esikoleni noma uzihlalele ekhaya,” usho kanje.Uma umbuka ungaze uzitshele ukuthi uyilaba abakhangisa bancintisane ngamamasela kodwa uthi akunjalo. Uthi kodwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana usekwenze kwaba wumsebenzi wakhe ukufundisa abesifazane ukuthi bangayilungisa kanjani imizimba yabo, ibe yile nto abazothi uma beyibuka esibukweni, ibachaze.“Kuncane kakhulu okusuke kufanele umuntu akwenze uma efuna ukunciphisa isisindo somzimba noma ukugcina usayizi”. Kulabo abavele sebezivocavoca, uthi kumele bakwenze kube mnandi ukuzivocavoca.  “Uma uzivocavoca kumele wenze nezinye izinto ukuze kulekelelane. Yenza izinto ezizoxukuza umqondo, umzimba negazi ngesikhathi. Ukukhuluphala akuyona into efika ngesikhathi bese isheshe idlula kalula. Ungavumeli ukuzenyeza, zama ukuwuziba lo muzwa othi ngeke wabukeka ngendlela oyifisayo. Ukuzifakela ingcindezi ngeke kukusize kodwa uma udla ngendlela efanele uzivocavoca uzobe uzisiza kakhulu,” kululeka uPearl. UPearl uqale ukuzivocavoca eneminyaka ewu-15. Uthi uzama ngayo yonke indlela ukuthi anyakazise umzimba okungenani kahlanu ngesonto.Ukuzivocavoca ekhaya esebenzisa ezinye zezinto ezikhona njengezitebhisi nokunye nakho uthi kumsebenzele kakhulu futhi uyabeluleka abesifazane ukuthi bangakubukeli phansi uma befuna imizimba eqatha. * Ukuze umzimba wakho ujwayele futhi uqoqeke, zama ukwenza ama-sit up awu-80 okungenani njalo ngosuku. Ungaqala uwenze ngokuwahlukanisa.* Qinisekisa ukuthi konke ukudla ozilungiselela khona * -80% unemisoco nezakhamzimba ezifanele okubalwa nemifino nezithelo okuyizinto ezibalulekile emzimbeni. * Lala ngesikhathi esifanele uthole ubuthongo obanele ngoba ukungalali nakho kunomthelela ngesisindo somzimba nendlela umuntu adla ngayo.Ngokwakhe, kumele ulale okungenani amahora awu-6 kuya ku-8.* Uma uzikhiphile ungabizi ukudla okubhalwe phansi nokukhangiswa ngakho, cela lokhu okunemifino okwaziyo ukuthi kufanele ukudle.* Phuza amanzi, uzivocavoce, ubhukude, uqukule izinto ezizokulekelela ukulwa namafutha ezingalweni, esiswini nakwezinye izindawo ezicashile.
title: 'Yekani ukufobela' - kuyalwa isimame

text: BAKHATHAZEKILE abazali babafundi besikole saKwaDabeka esineminyaka eyisithupha sivuliwe, esesigqekezwe kaningi.IMzwamandla Khanyile Primary eyakhiwa ngoR64 million, yavulwa ngo-2014 kodwa isikole asisenazitofu, amabhodwe, i-microwave, amafirji, i-ceiling board ekhishini, i-gyser, izihlalo ehholo lesikole nengxenye yocingo olubiyele isikole. Izicabha namafasitela kufile.NgoMsombuluko, othisha nabafundi bafike kugqekeziwe kwathathwa i-microwave namakhebuli.Uthishomkhulu uMnuz Roy Ntanzi, amalungu omphakathi, nesigungu esilawula isikole bebesakhungathekile kufika Isolezwe esikoleni.Usihlalo wesigungu sesikole uNksz Slindile Matubatuba, uthe isikole sesilahlekelwe yimpahla ebalulekile eyebiwa uma kugqekeziwe.“Singesinye sezikole ezisezingeni eliphezulu kodwa namhlanje awusadingi ukungena esangweni ungena noma kuphi ngoba ucingo lwebiwa,” kuchaza uNksz Matubatuba.Uthe isikole asinaye unogada bacela amavolontiya abawakhokhela oR500 ngenyanga ngemali ekhokhwa amabandla aqasha amakilasi uma kuyiSonto.“Kusukela ngo-Ephreli abekho abasonta esikoleni, asinayo imali yokukhokhela amavolontiya. Unogada okhona walethwa uMnyango wezokuPhepha naye uthi akakaholi. Umnyango siyawubikela uthi imali yokuqasha onogada ayikho asisazi ukuthi kumele senzenjani,” kusho uNksz Matubatuba.UMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, ukugxekile ukugqekezwa kwesikole.“Ngiyezwa ukuthi isigungu sesikole sikhala ngonogada kodwa onogada akubona kuphela abangenza ukuthi isikole singagqekezwa. Umphakathi uneqhaza elikhulu okumele ulibambe njengokuthi ungayithengi impahla eyebiwe esikoleni uma idayiswa. Kunezikole ezinonogada kodwa bahlaselwa yizigebengu.”UCol Thembeka Mbele okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe kuvulwe icala lokugqekeza eliphenywa namaphoyisa aKwaDabeka bekungakaboshwa muntu.
title: Bakhathazekile ngokugqekezwa kwesikole

text: KUNINGI osekushiwo ngobubi bokukipita. Ungoti uthi iningi labakipitayo ligcina lingashadile, lixabana kubangwa nokuthi abathandanayo badidekile.Owesifazane ugcina engazazi noma uyinkosikazi endodeni akipite nayo, nowesilisa engazazi ukuthi ungumyeni noma isoka kwakipite naye.Kukubi kunjalo, ungoti wezamasiko uthi kukhona okuhlale kweqiwa uma kukhulunywa ngomkhuba abathi mubi wokukipita.Uthi izithandani ezikipita zizale izingane zize zikhule kulowo mnyama, zibanga ezinkulu izinkinga.“Nihleli ndawonye nakha umndeni nomuzi kodwa anihlangene ngokwezibongo. Nihleli nikhulisa izingane ekubeni nibiza izibongo ezihlukene.“Namadlozi enu awaqondi ukuthi niyisima kanjani,” kusho uDkt Nomagugu Ngobese ungoti kwezamasiko.Uthi iningi lezingane ezikhula emkipitweni zigcina zingenzelwanga izimfanelo zesiko ezifana nembeleko nokunye.“Yonke leyo nto igcina iphithanisa izinto. Kuba nzima kakhulu ke uma kwenzeka kuba khona odlulayo emhlabeni kulabo bazali abakipite iminyaka baze bazala inqwaba yezingane,” kusho ungoti.Uthi ilula le nto, abathandanayo uma sebebonile ukuthi bayathandana futhi bathanda ukuchitha isikhathi ndawonye, mabashade.“Inkinga wukuthi abantu kulezi zinsuku basuke bafune ukwenza zonke izinto ezingenamsebenzi ezigcina zingenamthelela esikweni nasendleleni okumele kwenziwe ngayo ngokwesintu”.Ukholwa wukuthi uma abathandanayo bangaqondana ngqo nelobolo nokushada ngokwesintu, bayeke ubukhazikhazi bemishado emhlophe nezingxenye okuthiwa ezokulobola ezingenamsebenzi esikweni, singancipha isibalo sezingane ezigcina zingazazi ukuthi ziyiliphi, ezingazi nokuthi uma zikhomba emakubo zizothi izibongo zakhona kukwabani.UDkt Ngobese ukhuze nomkhuba walabo okuthi ngoba sebeziqalile izinhlelo zokulobolana, bavele bakhethe ukukipita.Nalabo abashade umshado omhlophe kodwa bengachanguzanga ngokwesintu, uthi noma bangagqoka amaringi abiza kangakanani, kodwa nabo bafana nse nabantu abakipitile.“Uma ungakaze ukhishwe ngenyongo kubikelwe idlozi ukuthi usuyogana, kusho ukuthi awushadile. Abantu abayeke ukuholwa yinkanuko. Yinkanuko phela eyenza abantu abaningi baze bahlale ndawonye bengashadile.“Abesifazane nabo abake basukume bawuqede lo mkhuba. Uma kungaqina ngakubona, izinto zingaba ngcono."Uthi abathandanayo abayeke ukuzicabangela bona, abacabangele izingane.Ephetha uthe abazali abangakwazanga ukwenza lolu hlobo lomshado wesintu, abasilungise lesi simo kungakonakali.
title: Awuhlukile nokukipita umshado omhlophe

text: ISIKHULU sophiko lwezokuvakasha KwaZulu-Natal, iTourism KwaZulu-Natal, esisanda kuqokwa sizimisele ukuthuthukisa izindawo zokuvakasha ezisezindaweni ezisemakhayaUMnuz Nhlanhla Khumalo, onamasonto amabili eqokelwe ukuba yiGeneral Manager, uthe izindawo ezigudle ulwandle zidume ngokuheha izivakashi kodwa uyazi ukuthi izindawo ezinothe ngomlando namasiko amaZulu ziyaziheha izivakashi ezifisa ukubona futhi zifunde ngamasiko.“Njengamanje izindawo ezithuthukisiwe eziningi ziseduze namadolobha, ezisemakhaya zisasilele emuva ngenani lezivakashi ezihambelayo. Lokhu kwenziwa ukuthi azikathuthukiswa ngezinga elilingana nelasemadolobheni,” kusho uKhumalo.Uthe emasonto amabili eqalile esikhundleni ubesabheka izinhlelo nemigomo elawula lolu phiko.“Ngaphambi kokuthi uqale izinhlelo ezintsha kumele ubheke imithetho nemigomo elawula isikhungo ukuze ubone ukuthi amasu owacabangayo ngeke yini ashayisane nemithetho elawula lesi sikhungo. Engikutholile ukuthi imigomo nezinhlelo ezikhona ziyavuma. Okwamanje angizukuqhamuka nezinhlelo eziningi ezintsha, ngizothuthukisa izinhlelo ebezivele zikhona, ngiqedele ebese ziqaliwe,” kusho uKhumalo.UKhumalo uneminyaka eyevile eshumini esebenza eMnyangweni wezeMvelo kuzwelonke. Uthe ngokubona kwakhe umsebenzi wezokuvakasha usondelene nemvelo.UKhumalo uneMasters kwiTourism Development, uke waba ngumqondisi wohlelo oluqinisekisa ukuthi izinhlelo zezokuvakasha ziyenziwa ezifundazweni ezigudle ulwandle, kulezi zinhlelo bekukhona izinhlelo zezokuvakasha ezihlanganisa nemvelo. Kulolu hlelo usebenze iminyaka eyisishagalombili.Uqhube wathi kunamathuba amaningi okukhula emkhakheni wezokuvakasha, wezemvelo kanjalo nasemkhakheni wamasiko nomlando.
title: Ubhukulele ukuthuthukisa ezasemakhaya

text: IMANQIKANQIKA ukuvota intsha ezobe ivota okokuqala okhethweni lukazwelonke kulo nyaka ngenxa yokunganeliseki ngokufakwa kakhulu kwasebekhulile ezinhlakeni zobuholi.Intsha okukhulunywe nayo ithe ifuna ukubona ushintsho ebuholini bezepolitiki, kufakwe abaholi abazoqonda izidingo zayo. Njengoba ngempelasonto ezayo kulindeleke kubhaliselwe ukuvota okokugcina ngaphambi kokhetho oluzoba ngoMeyi, enye intsha ayikaqinisekisi ukuthi izobhalisa.UMsawenkosi Dlamini (23), ofunda e-University of KwaZulu-Natal, uthe yayisimvumela iminyaka yokuthi avote okhethweni loHulumeni baseKhaya ngo-2016 kodwa wangavota.“Ngathola sekuzovotwa ukuthi kwakufanele ngibhalisele ukuvota eThekwini lapho sengihlala khona uma ngifunda. Nokho angizisolanga ngokungavoti ngoba akukho obekungigqugquzela. Namanje akukho okungenza ngilangazelele ukuvota ngoba akekho nosigqugquzelayo emanyuvesi,” echaza.Uthe uzoya kobhalisela ukuvota ngesonto elizayo kodwa usazibuza ukuthi yiliphi iqembu elifanelwe yivoti lakhe. Ukhala ngokuthi amaqembu akhona awagculisi futhi alikho iqiniso.“Ngibona sengathi uma ngivota ngizobe ngifaka imali ephaketheni lomuntu. Sishoda ngabaholi abakhathalele abantu ngokweqiniso. Abanye bayathembisa kodwa bangazifezi izidingo zomphakathi. Neqembu elibonakala linentsha eningi lihlushwa wukuthi abaholi balo abavuthiwe ngokomqondo,” kusho uDlamini.Ukhale nangokuthi akayiboni intsha ebuholini bamaqembu ngisho ePhalamende kugcwele kakhulu abadala okwenza intsha ibone singekho isidingo sokubavotela.UZanele Khambule (19) waKwaMashu uthe wakubhalisela ngonyaka odlule ukuvota futhi uzimisele ukuvota.“Ngibona kungifanele ukuvota ngoba ivoti lami lizoletha ushintsho. Ikusasa lezwe lincike evotini lami,” kusho uZanele.Yize ethe ngeke adalule ukuthi uzovotela liphi iqembu, uthe alikhethile ulibona likhathalele imfundo yabamnyama.UZama Khumalo (19), oyokwenza unyaka wokuqala eDurban University of Technology, uthe akanawo umfutho wokuvota futhi akakabhalisi. Uthe ubengazi nokuthi kuyabhaliswa ngesonto elizayo.Uveze ukuthi abazali bakhe abamkhuthaza ukuthi avote ngoba bamtshela ngesimo abaphuma kuso ngezikhathi zobandlululo.“Kunzima kithina esingazazi lezo zikhathi ngoba esikubona manje yinkohlakalo kuphela. Baningi abantu esibabona besahlupheka nezingane zifunda kanzima kodwa sitshelwa ukuthi sikhululekile. Ngicabanga ukuthi amaqembu ezepolitiki kusamele aqinise ekushintsheni imiqondo yethu ukuthi yiluphi ushintsho esizolubona uma sivota. Kungasiza nokubona intsha inikwa amathuba ebuholini.”Umbiko wocwaningo lwe-Institute for Security Studies, waveza ukuthi intsha isemanqika ukuvota. Ngo-2014 yayingu-33% intsha eneminyaka ewu-18 no-19 eyavota okhethweni luka­zwelonke. Egqugquzela iqembu lakhe ukuthi livote eThekwini, uMntwana wakwaPhindangene, uMangosuthu Buthelezi, ukuphawulile lokhu kungabi nkamunkamu kwentsha ekuvoteni. I-IEC imemezele ukuthi ngoMgqibelo nangeSonto elizayo kuzobhaliselwa ukuvota kuzo zonke izikhungo.
title: Intsha izwa imanqikanqika ukuvota

text: IPHINI likaNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uNkk Hendrietta Bogopane-Zulu, lidonse ngendlebe abazali ukuthi bathumele izingane zabo kuphela ezinkulisa ezibhaliswe ngokusemthethweni.UNkk Bogopane-Zulu ubethula umkhankaso ozoqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izingane ezincane ziya ezinkulisa ngaphambi kokuya esikoleni obizwa ngeVangasali.UVangasali yigama leXiTsonga elisho ukuthi bangasali.“Siyazi ukuthi kunezinkulisa ezingabhalisiwe ngokusemthethweni eMnyangweni wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ziyingozi ngoba kunemigomo engalandelwa. Siyacela abazali nabanikazi bezinkulisa baqinisekise ukuthi izingane zifunda ezinkulisa ezibhaliswe nathi ngokusemthethweni futhi ezinesitifiketi esishoyo ukuthi zibhaliswe njengenhlangano engayenzi inzuzo,” kusho uNkk Bogopane-Zulu.Uthe abanikazi bezinkulisa kufanele bazozibhalisa izinkulisa zabo ngoba uma uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi uma betholwa ukuthi kababhalisile ngokusemthethweni, kuzoshuba.“Izinkulisa kufanele zibe nabasebenzi abavumelekile ukusebenza nezingane. Lokhu ngeke ukwazi uma ungumzali uma inkulisa ohambisa kuyo ingane yakho ingabhalisiwe ngokusemthethweni. Izinkulisa zibalulekile, yingakho sithula lo mkhankaso ohlose ukuthi zonke zibhaliswe ngokusemthethweni,” kusho uNkk Bogopane-Zulu.UMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi usebenzisana neNelson Mandela Foundation, Unicef nezinye izinhlangano kulo mkhankaso weVangasali.UNksz Limpho Monyamane obhekele ukusebenza kweNelson Mandela Foundation, uthe bazoqinisekisa ukuthi izinga lokufunda nokuthuthukiswa kwezingane ezinkulisa liyathuthuka.Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi zibhaliswe ngokusemthethweni ukuze zilandele umthetho wokuvikelwa kwezingane.Kuleli sonto iNingizimu Afrika igubha iSonto likaZwelonke lokuVikelwa kweNgane, ngendikimba ethi 'Sonke Masivikele Izingane'.UMnuz Andre Viviers we-Unicef, uthe zibalulekile izinkulisa ekuvikeleni izingane ngoba kulapho zihlala khona uma abazali beyosebenza noma besesikoleni.
title: Uyaqina umthetho olawula izinkulisa

text: NGIZIZWA nginamandla amasha okulwela abantu bakithi abampofu eCape Town, ngiqinisekise ukuthi bathola impilo engcono, usho kanje uNkk Patricia De Lille emuva kokunqoba icala lokuphucwa ubulungu yiDA.NgoLwesithathu uJaji Andre Le Grange uthe ukuphucwa kukaNkk De Lille ubulungu bakhe kwiDA ngenxa yesitatimende asenza engxoxweni nomsakazi ngo-Ephreli akukho semthethweni ngoba ayilandelanga imithetho yayo yokuphucwa komuntu ubulungu.Lesi sinqumo sisho ukuthi uNkk De Lille useyilungu leDA ngokugcwele.Ekhuluma emuva kokuphuma kwesinqumo uthe uhlale esho ukuthi umuntu umsulwa kuze kube inkantolo imlahla ngencala.“Yinkantolo kuphela enelungelo lokulahla umuntu ngecala hhayi abantu abangawuqondi umthetho. Ngizoqhubeka nokuletha impilo engcono kubantu baseCape Town njengoba ngangibathembisile ngo-2016. Lesi sinqumo sizokwenza kube lula ukufeza izithembiso engazenzayo. Ngizoqhubeka nomsebenzi engangiqokelwe wona wokusebenza umphakathi,” kusho uNkk De Lille. UNksz Natasha Mazzone oyiPhini leFederal Chair kwiDA, uthe kuyaqala ngqa ukuthi kwenzeke into enjena kwiDA kodwa bazosicubungula isinqumo senkantolo ngoba akekho umuntu obaluleke ukudlula abantu baseCape Town.“Kwamanye amaqembu ngabe usubone izigameko zodlame kodwa ngiyajabula ukuthi akwenzekanga lokhu kwiDA. Asijabuli neze ukuthi izindaba zethu zinekelwe izwe ngalolu hlobo. Ngicabanga ukuthi kuyoba ngcono uma uNkk De Lille ehoxa ngoba isigungu seDA kuMasipala waseCape Town asisamdingi,” kusho uNksz Mazonne.Umhlaziyi wepolitiki uMnuz Thabani Khumalo uthe isinqumo senkantolo sikhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi iDA ehlale icula iculo lokuthi iyiqembu elilandela umthetho futhi elibafanele bonke abantu, ayikwenzi ekushoyo.“Isinqumo sikhomba ukuthi iDA ayikwazi ukulandela imithetho yayo futhi ayingcono njengoba ihlale iziveza njengenhlangano engcono kunezinye. Isinqumo sizoqinisa nombono wokuthi iDA ayinandaba namalungu ayo amnyama kodwa ikhathalele amhlophe kuphela ngoba amnyama ayashushiswa uma esho okuthile kodwa amhlophe awanakwa,” kusho uKhumalo.Uthe iDA izobhekana nobunzima ngoba akayiboni inqoba ukhetho ngamalengiso ngonyaka ozayo uma isahluleka wukukhombisa ukuthi iyiqembu lazo zonke izinhlanga.“Isinqumo sikhombisa ukuthi iDA ayikakulungeli ukuphatha izwe ngoba ayikwazi ukuphatha amalungu ayo ngendlela efanayo,” kusho uMazonne.
title: 'Ngizizwa nginamandla amasha' - De Lille

text: KULEZI zinsuku kuke kwathi ukufudumala, okungenzeka nokuthi abantu abaningi bese bewapakishe le kude amajakhethi nezingubo zokulala ezifudumalayo.Kodwa ongoti besimo sezulu bathi ungaqali uzibeke kude lezo ngubo ezifudumalayo ngoba umsinga obandayo uyabuya KwaZulu-Natal kulolu Lwesihlanu esiya kulona. Bathi lokhu kuzozwakala kakhulu ogwini oluseningizimu. NgokwabeSouth African Weather Services, lo msinga obandayo ozoqhaqhqzelisa amazinyo uzovunguza naseNtshonalanga neMpumalanga yeKapa kusukela ngoLwesithathu. Bathi uzobe ungahambi nje wodwa, uzobe uhambisana nomoya ovunguzayo, imvula ebandayo ezobe iyidliva ngempela."Umoya onamandla ulindeleke kakhulu eWestern Cape uzungeze njalo ezindaweni ezisogwini uze uyoshaya e-Eastern Cape ngoLwesine. Umoya onamandla kulindeleke ukuthi uphazamise nokuhamba kwezimoto emgwaqeni,"kusho isitatimende sabezimo eziphuthumayo.Bathi lokhu kokhu kuphazamiseka kwezimoto emgwaqeni kuzoba mandla nakakhulu ezindaweni ezigudle ugu KwaZulu-Natal ngoLwesihlanu. Imvula yona kulindeleke ukuthi iqale ngoLwesibili ezindaweni eziningi okuhlanganisa naseWestern Cape okuzobe kuyiyo ezokwandulela amakhaza azoshubisa umnkantsha.Kulindeleke ukuthi amakhaza aze abe ngconywana ngoSonto kodwa koFree State lizobe lisakubuza ukuthi ungubo ngaki naseNorth West kuya koNothern Cape kuze kube wuMsombuluko.
title: Isexwayiso ngamakhaza azoshubisa umnkantsha KwaZulu-Natal

text: IZINYUNYANA zithi liphume nobomvu ngesikhathi uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo, ememezela ukuthi ngeke esabuya esikhundleni.UNobhala osabambile weDemocratic Nursing Organisation of South Africa (Denosa) KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Sindi Ngcobo, uthe bayajabula ukuthi uDhlomo akasabuyi ngoba ubesefike ekugcineni.“Kade sasinitshela ukuthi asisamdingi uDhlomo ngoba usefike ekugcineni. Siyathemba ozongena uzokwenza kangcono kunoDhlomo, aqinise ezokuphepha ngoba abahlengikazi bayahlaselwa ezibhedlela nasemitholampilo abanye bayabulawa beya emsebenzini. Siyathemba nohlelo lweNational Health Insurance (NHI) luzoqala ngokuthi ozongena aqashe abahlengikazi abaningi,”Uthe abahlengikazi bayashoda ezibhedlela nasemitholampilo futhi uDhlomo ubengabancomi ngomsebenzi wabo omuhle abawenza bebhekene nezimo ezinzima.“Ukushenxa kwakhe siyakwamukela, siyathemba kuzofakwa ongqongqoshe abawaziyo umsebenzi. Asisamdingi uDhlomo noDkt Aaron Motsoaledi sibona esewufezile umsebenzi wakhe.”UMnuz Halalisani Gumede, uNobhala wePublic Allied Workers’ Union of South Africa (Pawusa), KwaZulu-Natal, uthe uDhlomo uhlulekile wukulwa nenkohlakalo ayifice eMnyangweni wezeMpilo ikakhulukazi ophikweni lwamakhaza kahulumeni.“Sijabule kakhulu ukuthi useyahamba uDhlomo ngoba akezanga namasu amasha okulwa nenkohlakalo ebivele ikhona emakhazeni kahulumeni. Kunalokho isimo sibe sibi kakhulu. Ziningi izinto obekufanele azilungise esibala kuzo ukwenyusa isibalo sabasebenzi, ukuthenga impahla efanele yokusebenza nokuhlanza ngoba kumanje sisebenzisa amakhemikhali ashibhile. Izinsiza kusebenza ziyaphela ngoba uhlelo lokuthenga impahla alucacile.”Uthe ozongena kufanele alwe nenkohlakalo ngoba uma engayilwi naye uzothwala kanzima.UNobhala weNational Health, Education & Allied Workers’ Union (Nehawu), uMnuz Phakama Ndunakazi, uthe: “Siyajabula ngokuhamba kukaNgqongqoshe ongenamsebenzi walutho. Kudala sasinitshela ukuthi asisamfuni. Ukube kuya ngathi ngabe uhamba nezikhulu zomnyango ngoba nazo azinamgogodla, azikwazi ukuletha uguquko lwangempela kwezempilo,” kusho uNdunakazi.Uthe abaphikisana nokuthi uDhlomo ubengawenzi umsebenzi kufanele bafunde umbiko woMvikeli woMphakathi ngodaba lwamakhaza, bafunde umbiko ngenkinga yokwelashwa kwesifo somdlavuza bahambele nezibhedlela nemitholampilo babone usizi olubhekene nomphakathi nabasebenzi bezempilo.Ubalule ukuthi abasebenzi bayashoda futhi basetshenziswa amahora amaningi ngokweqile.UNdunakazi ugqugquzele ozongena esikhundleni ukuba akhulume nezinyunyana bese eza noguquko lwangempela.Isolezwe lihabule ngemithombo yalo ukuthi mathathu amagama aphakanyiswayo ukuthi angene esikhundleni sikaDhlomo okubalwa elomkhulumeli we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uMnuz Jomo Sibiya noMnuz Sboniso Duma abangamalungu eShiyamathetho KwaZulu-Natal.Omunye igama lakhe elike laphakanyiswa nguDkt Ntuthuko Mahlaba kodwa kuthiwa alicaci ikusasa lakhe ngoba usahamba inkantolo ngezinsolo zokubulala.Ethintwa uDhlomo utshele intatheli ukuthi akazazi lezo zinyunyana ezijabulayo ngokuhamba kwakhe. Etshelwa amagama azo, uthe ngeke akhulume nentatheli ngaleyo nto.
title: Yendele esokeni kushiya uDhlomo

text: AKHALA ayazithulisa amalungu ebandla lamaNazaretha aseBuhleni, emva kokuphuma kwencwadi ewayalela ukuthi akhokhe umnikelo wokunyuka intaba eyingcwele iKhenani, yize engeke ayinyuke kulo nyaka ngenxa yemigomo yeCovid-19 engavumeli ukuhlangana kwabantu abaningi ndawonye.Amalungu ebandla  angathandanga ukudalulwa, athe lesi senzo singukuwabamba inkunzi emini, ekubeni kwawona ebhekene nenkinga yokulahlekelwa yimisebenzi nokushonelwa yizihlobo zawo ngenxa yeCovid-19.Kule ncwadi okusolakala ukuthi iphume ngemvume yomholi wakhona uNyazilwezulu (Isolezwe ngeSonto  elinekhophi yayo), amalungu ahlukaniswe ngokwezigaba zawo nemali okumele ayikhokhe.Kuthiwa awaxhumane nabashumayeli bawo emathempelini, okuyibona abazoyiqoqa le mali okuthiwa ingumnikelo.Kuyona kuvela ukuthi Inhlalisuthi ngayinye kumele ikhokhe uR50 ukuze kubhaliswe igama layo, uR15 wokubingelela intaba neshumi lenhlambuluko. Ingudlungudlu (omama benkonzo) kuthiwa abakhokhe oR20 umuntu ngamunye ukuze kubhaliswe amagama abo, kube uR15 wokubingelela intaba netshe, neshumi lenhlambuluko.Amakhosazana kuthiwa mawakhokhe ishumi ukuze kubhaliswe amagama awo, kube uR15 wokubingelela intaba neshumi lenhlambuluko.Ngasekugcineni kwale ncwadi amakholwa aphinde ayalelwe ukuthi akhokhele nezindlu zangasese ezisetshenziswa ngamakholwa uma esentabeni. Ezindlini zangasese, Inhlalisuthi ngayinye kuthiwa ayikhokhe uR50, Ingudlungudlu kube uR30 umuntu ngamunye bese kuthi Amakhosazana akhokhe ishumi umuntu ngamunye.Elinye lamalungu aseBuhleni elingathandanga ukudalulwa, likhuze ibhadi ngalesi senzo lathi ibandla lalo liqola amakholwa.“Kumanje sibhekene nenkinga yokushona kwabesifazane emathempelini abahaqwe yiCovid-19 ngesikhathi besenkonzweni yomama ebizwa ngo-14, ebingoDisemba. Akekho okhuluma lokho kodwa kufunwa imali kubantu. Njengelungu lebandla ngiyazi ukuthi kayikho into esatshalaliswayo ebandleni kungavumile umholi. Iyasikhathaza lento ngoba kumele engabe wuyena umholi wethu osiza abantu ezinkingeni ababhekene nazo ngenxa yeCovid-19 kodwa kunalokho ubona kumele sinike yena imali,” kusho leli kholwa.Elinye ikholwa nalo elingathandanga ukudalulwa, lithe iyabadida le nto eyenzekayo ngoba akuyiwa nasentabeni kulo nyaka. “ Noma kuyiwa khona kuvamise ukuthi kukhokhwe oR5 kuphela umuntu ngamunye, kunikelelwa intaba. Kulokhu sinikelela yiphi intaba njengoba singayi nje kuyona? Kwabona abashumayeli bazoyiqoqa kanjani imali kubantu njengoba kuthiwa asihlale emakhaya ngenxa yeCovid edla lubi? Ngisho nabakhokheli abanelungelo lokuqoqa iminikelo bangomama abadala, okuyibona abashona kakhulu kulezi zinsuku ebandleni ngenxa yalolu bhubhane. Emva kwenkonzo yomama ebingoDisemba sekushone inqwaba yomama abebehambele le nkonzo. Cisho emathempelini sekungcwatshwe abesifazane abangaphezu kwabahlanu ithempeli ngalinye, bebulawa yiCovid,” kusho lo mzalwane.Omunye umthombo uthe amaNazaretha aseBuhleni ashona kangaka nje kunenkolelo engekho ekhona, yokuthi abantu ababeye eNtabazwe ngo-2019 ngeke ibangene iCovid-19.“Bazikhohlise ngento engekho, yingakho singcwaba wonke amasonto manje. Abanye bebeshintshana ngezimbomu emathempelini, besho nokuthi akukho Covid yabangena bona ngoba banesimfonyo sabo esiwuNyazi. Le nto iwadukisile amaNazaretha njengoba eseshona kangaka manje. Sesixakwa nayile yokuthi kumele sinikelele intaba sibe singayi nakuyona,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela abaseBuhleni, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe naye useyibonile incwadi eyalela amakholwa ukuthi akhokhe iminikelo.“Wubugebengu lobu obenzekayo engingenasiqiniseko sokuthi buvelaphi. Njengoba izwe likuthaqa baningi osomathuba abasebenzisa igama lebandla ngendlela engekho emthethweni. Uma kungukuthi kuyiqiniso ukuthi ibhalwe ngabaholi bebandla, ngicela sicabangeleni abantu. Laba abenza kanje, bafuna ukufaka inkosi enkingeni ngoba kayikaze isho njalo,”  kusho uMncwabe.Kwenzeka lokhu nje icala lombango wobuholi bebandla lamaNazaretha libuyela eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ngoFebhuwari 2. Kulokhu kuzobe sekuphela ngombango osenkantolo phakathi kweThembezinhle nabaseBuhleni.
title: Kukhalwa ngomnikelo wentaba kwaShembe

text: ABASEBENZI abayitoho ngaphansi kohlelo lwezokuphepha eMkhandlwini weTheku izolo bagasele eCity Hall bekhala ngokuthi abaholile.Iqulu labasebenzi ebelithukuthele lithi sekuze kwaphela inyanga kodwa aliholeliwe.Okhulumela laba basebenzi kodwa ocele ukuthi angadalulwa ngoba esaba ukuthi angase aphelelwe umsebenzi, uthe ngokujwayelekile bahola ngomhla ka 25 ngenyanga kodwa manje isize yaphela inyanga kodwa lutho umholo.“Enye into esiphatha kabi ukuthi umholo wethu uyehliswa ube uvele ungekho, besihola R3 500 ngenyanga manje kuthiwa sesizohola uR3 100,” kusho lo msebenzi.Uthe isizathu esenza ukuthi kwehliswe imali yabo inkohlakalo ekhona kumasipala.“Kunabantu okuthiwa babheke ukusebenza kwethu, labo bantu asibazi nokuthi babukeka kanjani ebusweni kodwa baholelwa zonke izinyanga, enye into kuthiwa bahola ukwedlula thina,” kusho lo msebenzi.Omunye umsebenzi nayeocele ukuthi angadalulwa, uthe esinye isizathu esidala ukuthi uhlelo lwabo lube nezinkinga ukuthi kunezipoki eziningi eziholelwayo.“Mina ngihola ithimba esisebenza nalo ewadini yami ngazi ukuthi siwu-18 sesiphelele kodwa ngathola kwamasipala ukuthi kuthiwa siwu-54 ewadini yethu. Bonke laba abanye abantu mina angibazi kodwa kuthiwa bakhona nemali yabo iyaphuma zonke izinyanga,” kusho lo msebenzi.Uthe umasipala ububathembisa ukuthi uzobakhokhela imali yezinyanga ezintathu obubakweleta yona ngo-Agasti kodwa kuze kube imanje abakayitholi.“Umsebenzi wethu ubalulekile njengoba sibheke ukuphepha emawadini sisebenzisana namaphoyisa kodwa umkhandlu awusihloniphi,” kusho lo msebenzi.UMnuz Mlungisi Ntombela oyisikhulu ehhovisi lemeya, uNkk Zandile Gumende, okunguye ophumile wakhuluma nalaba basebenzi, uthembise ukuthi izikhalo zabo uzozidlulisela ezikhulwini.
title: Bagasele koweTheku abetoho bekhala

text: Mbali KhanyileUMNDENI waseMyunwini, KwaDukuza, ukhala ngobudedengu besibhedlela esiwuzilise kungakashayi isikhathi ngenxa yokufana kwemininingwane yelungu lawo momunye obeshonile.Lo mndeni othi ufuna ukucaciselwa ukuthi kungani isibhedlela, iGeneral Justice Gizenga Mpanza Regional, sibe nobudedengu? Uthi ufuna abasebenzi balesi sibhedlela balungise inkinga abayiqalile njengoba usunesitifiketi sokufa somuntu ongamazi.Inkinga yalo mndeni iqale ngoDisemba 22 ngesikhathi kungena uMnuz Ernest Vukani Khuzwayo (49) kulesi sibhedlela exinwe wukugula. Umfowabo omdala uMnuz Bongani Khuzwayo, uthe ngemva kokuthi umfowabo angene esibhedlela, batshelwa ukuthi abavunyelwe ukumvakashela ngoba kutholakale ukuthi uneCovid-19. Umndeni wakaKhuzwayo uthe ubusuhlezi uxhumana nonompilo bakulesi sibhedlela, uzama ukuthola ukuthi kuhamba kanjani ngelungu lawo.“Thina besilokhu sizitshela ukuthi sixhumana nonompilo abebelapha umfowethu obekuthiwa uneCovid-19  ngenkathi sishayela ucingo egunjini esatshelwa ukuthi ugcinwe kulo. Kuthe uma sesitshelwa ngokushona kwakhe ngoDisemba 29, saqala amalungiselelo okumngcwaba. Ngesikhathi simatasa nawo, sibe sesibona unyaka azalwa ngawo ungafani nhlobo nobubhalwe emaphepheni abequkethe imininingwane yakhe emakhazeni obekugcinwe kuwo isidumbu somlisa ebesingamazi nebesizitshela ukuthi ngumfowethu. Igama nesibongo somuntu ebesitshelwe ukuthi nguye bekufana kodwa iminyaka yehluke kakhulu. Sibe sesisukuma, sizama ukuxhumana nesibhedlela sibuzisisa ngeminyaka esingayazi ebibhalwe ngabantu bamakhaza. Isibhedlela sibe sesicela ukuthi sisinike usuku ukuze sibhekisise ukuthi alikho yini iphutha elenzekile, ngaleso sikhathi kwenzeka konke lokhu, thina sikhanyise amakhandlela ngoba sazi ukuthi sizilele umfowethu,” kuzikhalela uKhuzwayo.Eqhuba uthe ngesikhathi ziya ngokuqina izinsolo zokuthi banikwe isidumbu okungesiso, banquma ukulandelela esibhedlela ngenhloso yokuthi bacaciseleke. Uthe ngoDisemba 31 bathola ucingo olwalubazisa ukuthi umfowabo usaphila.“Sibe sesiphuthuma sonke ukuyobheka umfowethu samfica ngempela ephila egunjini ayegcinwe kulo. Saze sasuka esibhedlela ngabo-5 ntambama sesibuyela ekhaya sijabulela ukuthi sifike ephila uVukani (umufi). Kuthe nje sisahlezi, sihlangene sonke ekhaya, kwangena ucingo kumfowethu omdala olwalubika ukuthi useshonile umfowethu esimshiye ephila saka. Kwasiphoqa ukuthi siphinde sikhanyise amakhandlela ayesecishiwe,” kusho uKhuzwayo ngokukhulu ukudangala.Uthe kuyimanje babamba bayayeka, abazi ukuthi kumele baziqhube kanjani izinhlelo zomngcwabo njengoba bebematasa bezama ukulungisa iphutha elenzekile ngenxa yesidumbu okungesiso esikamfowabo abacishe basingcwatshelwa yinkampani yabangcwabi abebeyikhokhela.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ntokozo Maphisa, uthe umnyango ukhathazekile ngezinsolo ezibekiwe futhi uwucelile nombiko ogcwele kubaphathi besibhedlela mayelana nalolu daba.  “Siwumnyango sidlulisa ukudabuka kwethu emndenini othintekayo. Ukudlula kwanoma yimuphi umuntu emhlabeni, nganoma iyiphi indlela, kuyinto ebuhlungu. Siyazi ukuthi abaphathi sebeke bahlangana nomndeni lwadingidwa udaba. Yingakho siwunxusa umndeni ukuba uxhumane nabasesibhedlela uma kukhona olunye usizo oludingayo,” kusho uMaphisa.
title: Bakhala ngobudedengu besibhedlela bezilela umuntu abangamazi

text: IKHULUNYELWA phansi indaba yokukhulelwa kukaDJ wodumo waseThekwini, ingane yakhe yesithathu.Kuthiwa uSithelo “Sithelo The DJ” Shozi (27) ongabonakali emicimbini futhi kade agcina ukunandisa, usezithwele ingane yesibili yendodana yesiqumama saseThekwini, u-Andile Mpisane (20).Umthombo weSolezwe ngeSonto osondelene noDJ ukuqinisekisile ukuthi usezithwele.“Simangele sonke ukuthi kungathi esemncane kanje uFlo (igama lengane yokuqala) usengaphinda enye eduze kanje. Usengateta noma yinini ngoba usenesikhathi ekhulelwe,” kusho umthombo.Uthe uSithelo akasahlanganyeli kakhulu nabantu ezindaweni okugcwala kuzona ngoba uzimisele ukusifihla isisu njengoba enza ngesikhathi ekhulelwe ingane yabo yokuqala no-Andile.Leli phephandaba like labika ngokukhulelwa kwakhe phambilini, lapho waphika walala ngomhlane ukuthi uzithwele. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kwagcina kuqinisekiswa ukuthi ngempela wayezithwele ingane kaMpisane, eyazalwa ngonyaka odlule.Ethintwa uSithelo uthe usahlabe ikhefu elincane emculweni kodwa uyobazisa abalandeli bakhe uma sekukhona aphezu kwakho. Kuthe uma intatheli imhalalisela ngokukhulelwa kwakhe wavele wabhoka ngolaka, ebuza ukuthi imthintela ukuzwa ngomsebenzi wakhe noma ifuna izindaba zakhe zangasese.Ukhunjuziwe ukuthi nasekuqaleni waholela ngisho abalandeli bakhe oPhathe, ephika ephindelela ukuthi uzoba nengane no-Andile.“Ukuthi ngiqamba amanga noma ngiqinisile akundaba yamuntu. Akekho umuntu okumele ngizichaze kuyena. Impilo yami yangasese kayihlangene namuntu, futhi ngibhizi ngiyathenga sisi,” esho evala ucingo kabi.Ozibize ngoMandla Mtshali, othe uyimenenja ka-Andile Mpisane, uthe kungamampunge ukuthi u-Andile usekhulelise uSithelo ingane yesibili.
title: Iyaqina eyokukhulelwa kukaDJ ingane yesibili

text: IZIGI zamaqembu amise kabi iBidvest Wits esicongweni zibukeka ziyithola indawo kumqeqeshi wamaClever Boys, uGavin Hunt, othe angacazelana amaphuzu nePolokwane City wakhwela wadilika kubadlali bakhe okuyinto angajwayele ukuyenza esidlangalaleni.Ukubanjwa kweWits kushubise umbango wesicoco kwazise usungena kuvuthondaba. I-Orlando Pirates isele ngamaphuzu amathathu kwiWits esidlale imidlalo engu-18 yeligi yaqoqa amaphuzu angu-34. Ngaleso sikhathi iBucs isidlale engu-17 yathatha amaphuzu angu-31.Akuyona iBucs kuphela ekhathaza uHunt kepha indlela iMamelodi Sundowns ewaqoqa ngayo amaphuzu kule midlalo esele ngayo kufanele imethuse.Emidlalweni yeligi engu-14, ezikaPitso Mosimane seziphumelele ukuqoqa amaphuzu angu-28. Lokhu kuyenza isale kwiWits ngamaphuzu ayisithupha kodwa isadlale imidlalo engu-14 uma uqhathanisa neyezikaHunt engu-18.Lo mqeqeshi, onomlando wokudla isicoco seligi iminyaka emithathu ilandelana, ukhombise izimpawu zokunengwa abadlali bakhe bebhekene nePolokwane wahluleka ukuzibamba wabahlambalaza esidlangalaleni. Kwakhala ngakho kakhulu uHunt ukuthi ufike ahlale phansi nabadlali bahlele kodwa uma sekufikwe emdlalweni bazenzele okuthandwa yibona.“Isiqala ukungikhathaza manje le nto. Kufanele kungijabulise ukuthi silwile saze sathola iphuzu kodwa ngiphoxekile ngendlela abadlali bami engibathembayo abenze ngayo. Kuyangiphoxa ukuthi womathathu amagoli ePolokwane avele kuma-free kick.“Yithina esinqoba kanjalo hhayi ukuthi kushaywe thina ngezinduku zethu. Siyikhuluma cishe nsuku zonke indaba yama-free kick kodwa nakhu kwenzekile. Kwesinye isikhathi abadlali uyabakhululekela bese bebona ukuthi kuyadlalwa. Akukho mathuba akhiwe yiPolokwane kodwa singenelwe amagoli amathathu. Uyichaza uyithini leyo nto? Kunabadlali okufanele bazinuke amakhwapha ngokwenzekile,” kusho uHunt.Ngenxa yazo belu izimpawu zokuzwa izigi, uHunt akagcinanga ngokulwa nabadlali bakhe kepha ushiye angalazi nakunondweba obephethe umdlalo emsola ngokwenzelela.“Ngaphandle kokuthi sizihlulekele ukuvimba ama-free kick ePolokwane kodwa nendlela ebesidlaliswa ngayo angiyithandanga. I-free kick okungene ngayo igoli labo lokuqala bekungafanele ibekwe ngoba akukho muntu odlaliswe kabi. Siphikelwe namagoli amabili kungafanele,” usho kanje.UHunt ukhala nje kufanele ngoba uyeke ithuba elihle lokuvula igebe esicongweni ngesikhathi iPirates neSundowns besematasa nemidlalo yeCAF Champions League.Uthembise ukuthi usazoqhubeka nokwethusa abaningi umqeqeshi wePolokwane uJozef Vukusic osephendule leli qembu laba ngelinye lasembangweni wesicoco ekubeni laziwa ngokuthi njalo lihlale ligade izembe.Komunye umdlalo wePremiership, iSuperSport United inqobe ngo 2-1 kwiBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni ozokhunjulwa njalo ngenguzunga yeshodi eshaywe uTebogo Mokoena okuyiyona ewinise iSuperSport.Namuhla iPirates izobhekana neBaroka FC koweligi e-Orlando Stadium, bese kuthi iMamelodi Sundowns itholane neHighlands Park eMakhulong Stadium, ngo-7.30 ebusuku.
title: UHunt utatazeliswa yizigi zeBucs neSundowns

text: AMAZWI ashiwo owayengumengameli weSafa uMolefi Oliphant ayegcizelela ekutheni abadlali ababeyibambe kwiMetropolitan Cosafa Under 20 Championship eyayiseThulamahashe Stadium, eMpumalanga ngo-2007 bayikusasa laseNingizimu Afrika aphinde afakazeleka ngesikhathi uRamahlwe “Rama” Mphahlele ekhala emuka nomklomelo iPlayers Player Of The Season.UMphahlele (27) ojoyine iKaizer Chiefs ekuqaleni kwesizini evela kwiMamelodi Sundowns abengukaputeni kuyo, uqokwe emcimbini waMakhosi obuseTheatre of the Track eKyalami, eGoli ngoLwesine.“Ukuthweswa umqhele ungahlabananga ngasicoco kuyisimo esiqubula umuzwa wenjabulo nowokudangala,” kusho uMphahlele owayeseqenjini laMajita eladlala kwiFifa Under 20 World Cup e-Egypt ngo-2009 liholwa nguSerame Letsoaka.“Vele ngeke ukwazi ukufela ngamathe ukusebenza ngokuzikhandla komdlali ngamunye. Sizibambe zaqina siyiqembu, kodwa ukusebenza ngokuzinikela komdlali ngamunye kuyinto eyenzekayo. Ngiyaziqhenya ngokuthweswa umqhele. Lokhu kuhlabana ngikholwa ukuthi kuzogqugquzela ozakwethu ukuthi balicokamise izinga ngesizini ezayo.”Lo mdlali oshoshela njengoSizwe Motaung, uqokwa nje ubeqinisekisa njalo uma eboshelwe nguSteve Komphela ukuthi uyaliphakamisa izinga nokufakazelwe wukuqokwa kathathu njengomdlali ovelele.Akugcinanga ngalokho, uphinde washaya amagoli amabili nokulandelwe wukuthi abizelwe kwiBafana Bafana enenselelo yokuthi izibekisele indawo kwi-Africa Cup of Nations eseCameroon ngo-2019.“Ngesikhathi ngifika kwiChiefs, ngangazi ukuthi okufanele ngikwenze ukunqoba,” kusho uMphahlele kwi-website yeKaizer Chiefs website.“Ngangazi ukuthi ngijoyina iqembu elikhulu elinomlando nelihlonishwayo. Ukwethweswa lo mqhele kungiphosela inselelo yokuthi kuzofanele ngibhukule ngokwedlulele ukuze ngifezekise iphupho leqembu lokunqoba izicoco ngesizini ezayo.”Ngokuhlabana ngalo mklomelo kwenze uMphahlele wabuyela ekhaya esephethe isikhiye seToyota RAV4 azohamba ngayo unyaka wonke.Uphinde waklonyeliswa ngowe-2016/17 KC Online Player and Fair Play awards ehambisana no-R25 000 no-R20 000.“Ukube bebengekho ozakwethu, lo mklomelo bengingeke ngiwuthole. Ngibonga kakhulu ngokungeseka kwisizini yami yokuqala, ngibafisela ukuphumula okuhle nokuqala isizini ezothela izithelelo ezinhle.”Omunye umdlali owayeseqenjini laMajita oseke wahlabana kwiChiefs nguMandla Masango esomshayimagoli ovelele neseMost Improved Player Of The Season. UGeorge Maluleka uqokwe njengeMTN 8 Player of the Tournament ngemuva kokusiza iChiefs inqoba iMTN 8 ngesizini ka-2014/15.
title: UMphahlele ufakazele amagama ka-Oliphant

text: BONKE abasondelene neMaritzburg United bakuqonda kahle ukuthi iwini kwiBidvest Wits koweTelkom Knockout kusasa ngo-8.15 ebusuku eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu, izoba wumjovo ekutheni kujike izinto endleleni iqembu eliqale ngayo isizini ka-2018/2019.Lawa amazwi ashiwo uBokang Thlone (osayine kwiMaritzburg esuka kwiWits) awasho ngoLwesithathu beqeda ukwenza amalungiselelo okugcina okubhekana nezikaGavin Hunt kwi-quarter final yalo mqhudelwano, ozosongwa ngoDisemba eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium, ePort Elizabeth.ITeam of Choice ingelinye lamaqembu abengundabuzekwayo ngesizini edlule lapho abafana bakaFadlu Davids bebecoboshisa kwasani. Yilapho kuvele namathalente kuLebohang Maboe osephenduke isethenjwa kwiMamelodi Sundowns noSiphesihle Ndlovu osebizwa njalo kwiBafana Bafana.Ngakho ukushaya elinenkosi phakathi leli qembu laseMphithi liqede endaweni yesihlanu kwi-log. Ngesizini edlule nakwiNedbank Cup lilihambe lonke ibanga labhajwa kowamanqamu lakhala ngaphansi kwiFree State Stars.Ayizange iyiqale kahle isizini kulokhu njengoba iTeam of Choice isaphumelele ukunqoba umdlalo owodwa kweyisishiyagalombili esiyidlalile. Akumphethe kahle uThlone ukuthi iqembu lakhe lisashaye amagoli amabili kuphela kodwa langenelwa amahlanu.Lisendaweni yesithathu uma usuka emsileni ngamaphuzu ayisikhombisa, okusho ukuthi lisele ngawu-13 kwiWits (abadlala nayo) okuyiyona eqhwakele.“IWits iqale kahle impela kwiligi kodwa njengoba sibhekene nayo kwiTelkom Knockout umdlalo uzobe uhluke kakhulu ngoba sonke sifuna into efanayo. Akufani nakwiligi. Siyazilungisa kahle ngendlela ukuze umdlalo uzofika silindile. Kusemqoka ukunqoba lapha ngoba lokhu kuzoba umjovo kithina. IWits iqhwakele ngakho ukuyehlula kuzosenza siziqhenye okuzobe kusinika amandla okuthi siguqule izinto endleleni esiqale ngayo kule sizini,” kusho lo mdlali oseke wagijima nakwiFree State.Ukholwa ukuthi uma bezokwenza konke okufanele ngendlela bese besizana njengozakwabo uma kudingeka, noma kanjani bazoyiguqisa iWits.
title: Ubona iWits izoba umjovo wokuvuka

text: KUQOPHEKE umlando kumfelandawonye wezinyunyana zabasebenzi iCosatu kuqokwa umengameli wesifazane ukuwuhola.UNksz Zingiswa Losi uphakanyiswe yedwa kwesikamengameli weCosatu engqungqutheleni eqhubekayo yalo mfelandawonye.Umengameli weCosatu uMnuz Sdumo Dlamini uyashiya kulesi sikhundla kanti uNksz Losi ubeyiphini lesibili likamengameli weCosatu.Izolo kuvele ukuthi uphakanyiswe yedwa kulesi sikhundla kanti imiphumela yabadle umhlanganiso kule ngqungquthela ekhetha ubuholi izomenyezelwa kusasa uma isisongwa le ngqungquthela eseMidrand, eGoli.Selokhu wasungulwa lo mfelandawonye eminyakeniengu-35 edlule omengameli bawo bekuba abesilisa.UNksz Losi, owayephakanyiselwe kwesePhini likaNobhala we-ANC engqungqutheleni ye-ANC eNasrec ngoDisemba, esohlwini lukaMengameli, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa wakhala ngaphansi kulesi sikhundla ehlulwa wuNksz Jessie Duarte.Ngokomlando wakhe ube sezinhlakeni zezinhlangano zabafundi iCosas e-Eastern Cape wajoyina nophiko lwentshalwe-ANC kanti waqala ukusebenza embuthweni wezokuvikela.Ube esesebenza enkampanini eyakha izimoto, iFord ePort Elizabeth, wamela abasebenzisa ngaphansi kwenyunyana yokusansimbi iNational Union of Metalworkers (Numsa).URamaphosa uhalalisele uNksz Losi kulesi sikhundla esisha.Ekhuluma kule ngqungquthela izolo, uNobhala weSACP uDkt Blade Nzimande, uthe bazoqhubeka bakhulume nge-ANC ngoba yikhaya labo.Uthe abathukanga bezwa ngetulo lokuthi kukhona abafuna ukugudluza uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa emandleni okuhola i-ANC.“Kade sayisho lento, asithukanga sizwa ngokuthi kunetulo eliphekwayo lokuthi kugudluzwe abaholi be-ANC. Sizoqhubeka sikhulume ngezinto ezenzeka kuKhongolose ngoba yikhaya lethu, asinalo elinye.”Ubekhuluma ngemibiko yetulo elihlanganisa abaholi be-ANC okubalwa noNobhala uMnuz Ace Magashule nowayengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma okuthiwa babehlangene eThekwinibakha itulo lokuketula uRamaphosa.Uthe labo abenza lokhu kumele bavezwe.UNzimande uthe bazokhankasela i-ANC njengoba kuyiwa okhethweni.“Asincenge zikhundla kuhulumeni. Abanye bethu baze baxoshwa ezikhundleni kodwa sisaqhubeka nokulwela abasebenzi,” kusho uNzimande.Uthe ngeke bathule uma kushintshwa ikhabhinethingo-12 ebusuku noma bevalelwa ngaphandle kweminye imihlangano.Ugxeke labo athi badukisa izitshudeni bezitshela ukuthi ayikho into yokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana.“Abantu abasho kanje kumele bavalwe ngoba bafuna ukudala ukudideka. Ngeke sivumele abantu badukise intsha,” kusho uNzimande.UZuma, ekhuluma nezitshudeni eWalter Sisulu University wathi umbuso wakuleli awulawulwa yidlanzana.
title: Umlando iCosatu iqoka owesifazane njengomholi

text: UMISIWE umdlalo obekumele uqale ngesonto elizayo nobophele izinkakha zabalingisi kuleli othi ISONO. Lo mdlalo ubuzoqala ngoJulayi 27 ngo-9.30 ebusuku kwiBET DStv (129) kepha umisiwe ngenxa yokusabalala kweCovid-19.Inkampani ewuqophayo iClive Morris Production, ithe ikhethe ukukumisa ukuqala komdlalo kuze kudambe igciwane, iCorona.“Sikhethe ukuthi sikumise ukuqoshwa kwawo kuze kube lesi sikhathi siyadlula. Nokuqala kwawo kanjalo ngeke kusaba ngosuku obelumenyezelwe. Nakho kuzoma. Uma sekungcono siqhubeke nokuqopha, sizomemezela usuku olusha,” ngokwesitatimende.UMonde Twala wakaViacomCBS Networks Africa, uthe iCovid-19 ize nezingqinamba ezihlukene endimeni yezobumnandi kuleli, abebengazilindele.“Yize sekuphazamisekile ukuqala kwalo mdlalo kodwa sizoqhubeka nokuletha ezinye izinhlelo ezizojatshulelwa ababukeli esiteshini seBET.Ukwanda kwabantu abatheleleka ngaleli gciwane yikhona okusenze samisa konke sicabangela ukuphepha nezimpilo zabo bonke abasebenza kulo mdlalo,” kuchaza uTwala.Kulindeleke ukuthi kubonakale abalingisi okubalwa kubo uNthati Moshesh, Bohang Moeko, Senzo Radebe, Didintle Khunou,  Anga Makubalo, Rami Chuene nabanye.UTwala uthe bajabule ngokwethula umdlalo wokuqala oyi-telenovela, ozobonakala esiteshini sabo sase-Afrika. Wathembisa ababukeli ukuthi bangasikhaleli isikhathi esincane okuzomiswa ngaso umdlalo njengoba uma usukhona bayokhohlwa nokuthi uke wabhekana nezingqinamba ezifana nalezi.
title: Kuhlehliswe umdlalo ngenxa yeCovid-19

text: ASEPHUMELE obala amalungu amagatsha angu-110 e-ANC eThekwini aseka isinqumo sesigungu esiphezulu sale nhlangano KwaZulu-Natal sokumkhomba indlela obeyimeya uNkk Zandile Gumede nethimba lakhe.Izolo emhlanganweni wamagatsha e-ANC eThekwini obuse-Olive Convention Centre (OCC), kucacile ukuthi ayahambisana nalesi sinqumo.Kulo mhlangano bekukhona abalandeli be-ANC, ubuholi emagatsheni, amakhansela, abefundisi nabanye abeseka ukuba uNkk Gumede akhonjwe indlela.Isitatimende esifundwe uMnuz Siya Thango sithe: “Sihlangene lapha ukuzoveza ukweseka kwethu isinqumo sobuholi be-ANC eKZN. Kuyinto esobala ukuthi kube nezinkinga eThekwini ekuletheni intuthuko emphakathini njengoba nemibiko ibikuveza lokho. Ubuholi buphendule ngokuba kuxoshwe obeyimeya nethimba lakhe.”UMnuz Bheki Ntuli noMnuz Thabani Nyawose, abasebuholini besikhashana besifunda bathe ngeke bakubekezelele ukuba kube khona abantu abathuka inhlangano ngezenzo zabo.Baqhakambise ukuthi abakhala ngesinqumo esathathwa ubuholi kumele basebenzise izindlela zenhlangano ezaziwayo zokukhala bangalwi bacule amaculo anodlame ngoba lokhu ngeke kusize muntu.Umhlangano wayizolo bathe awuhlangene nengqungquthela yobuholi baseThekwini be-ANC ezoba khona futhi abagqugquzeli ukuhlukana phakathi kodwa bafuna ubumbano enhlanganweni.Kulo mhlangano bekukhona nobeyibamba lemeya uNkk Fawzia Peer.UMnuz Zenzele Thabethe oyilungu le-ANC eThekwini uxolisile wathi umhlangano bekuhlelwe ukuba ube seDUT kodwa ngenxa yokubona ukuthi ihholo lizoba lincane wayiswa e-OCC.KuFacebook, okusolwa ukuthi okaNkk Gumede, emva kwalo mhlangano bekubhalwe ukuthi: Bahlangene phezulu kanti phansi bangamahele.
title: Beseka isinqumo ngobeyimeya

text: UMASIPALA waseMsunduzi ulekelele abantu abebesele dengwane kulandela ukushelwa ifulethi ababehlala kulo eBombay eNorthdale, eMgungundlovu.Ayaziwa imbangela yomlilo oqubuke ngoMgqibelo kodwa kusolwa izintambo zikagesi okuthiwa azixhunyiwe ngendlela efanele kulesi sikhawo.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe bangu-37 abantu abasale bengenawo amakhaya ngenxa yomlilo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala usiqinisekisile isigameko sokusha kwefulethi wathi kusaphenywa.“NgoMgqibelo, ngabo-4 ekuseni ekhoneni lomgwaqo uLehore noBombay eNorthdale kuthiwa kuqubuke umlilo. Udaba lubikiwe esiteshini samaphoyisa eMountain Rise nabezicisha mlilo babiziwe. Akekho olimele, alikho necala elivuliwe,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.NgeSonto iMeya, uMnuz Mzimkhulu Thebolla, nethimba lakhe lihambele le ndawo.IMeya ikhale ngokuthi kukhona abantu abebesahlezi kule ndawo yize ishile ngoba bengenayo indawo yokuhlala.“Abantu abebekulesi sakhiwo sibahlelele enye okwesikhashana izinsuku ezintathu ukuba bathole indawo yokuhlala. Emuva kwalapho umnikazi wefulethi kuzomele abatholele indawo yokuhlala, uma ehluleka kuyomele singenelele siwumasipala. Kumele bathole indawo abazohlala kuyo unomphela laba bantu,” kusho uThebolla.IMeya ikhala nangesimo abantu abahlala kuso kule ndawo athe asisihle neze.“Le ndawo sizoyivala okwamanje ngoba ayifanele ukuhlala abantu. Akwamukelekile ukuba abantu bengahlala lapha njengoba kusenjena,” kusho uThebolla.Ngaphezu kwalokhu iMeya ikhale ngokuthi kukhona asebeqhuba ipolitiki ngalesi sigameko, benza sengathi abantu abanikezwanga usizo ekubeni kungenjalo.“Kukhona umuntu othize osefafaza okungelona iqiniso ukuthi abantu abasizwanga ngoba beyiqembu elithize, akumele senze ukuxakeka kwabantu kube izimpi zepolitiki. Uma sifuna ukukhankasa kumele sikhankase ngesikhathi esifanele,” kusho uThebolla.IMEYA yaseMsunduzi, uMnuz Mzimkhulu Thebolla ngesikhathi iyohlola ebashelwe yifulethi basala dengwane Isithombe: SithunyelweOmunye obehlala kuleli fulethi, ocele ukuba igama lakhe ligodlwe, uthe bebefisa ukuqhubeka bahlale kulendawo ngoba abazi bazoshonaphi.“Ngalapho sihlala ngakhona akuzange kushe kakhulu. Kungene amanzi kakhulu. UMasipala njengoba uzosinikeza indawo izinsuku ezintathu kuphela sizobe sesishonaphi? Mina bengifisa ukuqhubeka ngihlale endlini yami ngoba nomasitende ngeke asilekelele ekubeni nerenti bese siyikhokhile,” kuzikhalela omunye ohlala kule ndawo.UMasipala uthe ngeke uvumele muntu ukuba ahlale kulesi sikhawo.
title: Batakulwe wumasipala abashelwe

text: UKUSHIYA kukaMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic isigubhukane kwi-Orlando Pirates akungabazeki ukuthi kushiye abalandeli baleli qembu bemangele ekupheleni kwesonto elidlule.USredojevic, obesehlale amasizini amabili kwiPirates, ulaxaze iqembu ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku ebalula izizathu ezithinta umndeni. Ngokusho kwakhe ulibangise eSerbia lapho edabuka khona ngoba unina uyagula. Nokho emva kwamahora ambalwa uMicho esulile kwiBucs kuvele izindaba zokuthi usezothatha izintambo kwiZamalek yase-Egypt.Ayiqali ukuvela indaba yeZamalek noMicho kodwa ngesikhathi ebuzwa ngalokhu emasontweni edlule washaya phansi ngonyawo wathi ngeke ayishiye iPirates ngoba iyiqembu azifelayo ngalo. Okushiya imibuzo ukuthi ngabe yini eyenze ukuthi uMicho athathe isinqumo sokushiya iqembu ngoba namanje usayiphika eyeZamalek yize leli qembu limemezele ukuthi selizocijwa uyena.Izinsolo zokuthi uMicho uvulelwe icala elithinta ucansi nazo zenza kubukeke sengathi lukhulu olufihlwayo ngokuhamba kwalo mqeqeshi. NgeSonto bese kusabalele imibiko yokuthi use-Egypt hhayi eSerbia njengoba ethe yena uya khona. Akukho ukungabaza ukuthi iPirates izophazamiseka emgqigqweni wayo ngoba uMicho bese elibumbe kahle iqembu. Yize iPirates ibingakawini lutho ngaphansi kwakhe kodwa kumasizini amabili edlule ibishisa umbango obonakalayo kwiMamelodi Sundonws edle isicoco seligi amasizini amabili elandelana.Mhlawumbe abalandeli bePirates bangathemba ukuthi uRulani Mokwena okunguyena osephethe izintambo bese efunde lukhulu kuMicho ngesikhathi esebenza njengephini lakhe. Nokho akukho ukungabaza ukuthi uzoqala abe nengcindezi uMokwena ngoba iBucs iyiqembu elikhulu futhi uyaqala ukuba yinhloko yabaqeqeshi.Njengamanje uhlalelwe wumsebenzi wokubuyisa ukuzethemba kubadlali njengoba iqembu selishaywe kathathu kulandelana emiqhudelwaneni ehlukene. Likhona ithemba lokuthi abadlali bazoqhubeka nabakufundiswe uMicho ngoba ababhekene nenkinga yokufunda isitayela somqeqeshi omusha njengoba kuqhubeka uMokwena.
title: Kuzoyiphazamisa iBucs ukushiywa wumqeqeshi wayo

text: UMKHANDLU oqinisekisa izingabunjalo lemiphumela ka-matric, Umalusi, usuxwayise abafundi nothisha ngokuthi bangalinge bathinteke ezenzweni zokukopela ngoba bazobanjwa.Lo mkhandlu ubuye wazwakalisa ukukhathazeka ngokushoda kwabamakela * -matric kwezinye izifundo.UDkt Mafu Rakometsi, isikhulu esiphezulu salo mkhandlu, ukhiphe lesi sexwayiso ngokukopela.Uphinde waxwayisa nothisha wathi abangabi yingxenye yokukopela kwabafundi ngokuthi babasize uma sekubhalwa.“Sifuna ukukhipha lesi sexwayiso ngoba ukukopela kuthunaza isithunzi sika-matric. Kumele kuqeqeshwe abagadayo uma kubhalwa ukuze kungabi nezehlakalo zokukopela. Sizozibheka ngelokhozi izikhungo okuke kwaba nokukopela kuzo phambilini. Sizotshala abantu abazozinza kuzona.”URakometsi, obekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba izolo ngamalungiselelo ezivivinyo zika-matric, uthe ezinye izikhungo abazozibheka okwalahleka kuzo amaphepha abafundi.Uqhube wathi nakuzona lezi zikhungo bazotshala abantu abazozinza kuzona ukuze kungabi khona izinkinga zokulahleka kwamaphepha.Mayelana nokushoda kwabamaki uthe bakhathazekile ngokushoda kwabo ezifundweni i-Agricultural Science nesiBhunu eNorthern Cape.EWestern Cape kushoda abephepha lesibili leHistory, e-Eastern Cape kushoda abesiNgisi, Physical Science, Life Science nabesiBhunu.Ubuye wakhala ngokungaqashwa kwabasebenza ophikweni lwezivivinyo eMinyangweni yezeMfundo eLimpopo, Northern Cape, Mpumalanga, Free State, KwaZulu-Natal, North West nase-Eastern Cape.“Izifundazwe ezithintekayo zinezinhlelo zokubhekana nalesi simo ngokuthi ziqashe abazosebenza isikhathi esengeziwe. Lokhu kwenziwa ukuze kungashodi abasebenzi.”Esifundazweni bangaphezu kuka-8 000 abazomakela * -matric.URakometsi ugunyaze ukubhalwa kwezivivinyo ezizobhalwa abafundi abangu-790 405.Umqondisi-jikelele eMnyangweni weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uMnuz Mathanzima Mweli, utshele amalungu ePhalamende izolo ukuthi kunezinhlelo abazenzile uma kwenzeka kuba nemibhikisho uma sekubhalwa.Uthe basebenzisana nezinhlaka zokuphepha ukuze kungaphazamiseki ukubhala.“Yonke iminyango inabasebenzi abanele ukuze izivivinyo zihambe ngendlela. Odabeni oluthinta abamakayo sisebenzisane nezinyunyana zothisha ukuqoka abantu abazokwenza lo msebenzi.”Uthe kuzoba nabazobe beqaphe abamakayo, kukhona ama-senior markers, deputy chief markers, chief markers nama-internal moderators.“Sibaqeqeshile abazomaka ngakho sineme ngomsebenzi abazowenza. Sivakashele nezindawo lapho kuzogcinwa khona amaphepha ka-matric.”Kwenzeka lokhu nje namhlanje uNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga ukulesi sifundazwe lapho abafundi baka-matric bezosayina khona isibophezelo sokuthi ngeke bakopele.
title: Kuxwayiswe abafunda u-matric ngokukopela

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAYIZE sekungadingeka imigilingwane yezilomo zabadlali abagijima e-Europe, uLionel Messi weFC Barcelona noCristiano Ronaldo weReal Madrid, abaqhulula amagoli sengathi benza ngomlingo, ukufinyelela amagolini angu-20, kufanele ukujabulisa ukuthi kule sizini kubonakala iPremier Soccer League ingeke itheleke ngehlazo eliyehlele ngesizini edlule uma sekuklonyeliswa umdlali oshaye amagoli amaningi emidlalweni ye-Absa Premiership.Laba bagadli bajahana ngamagoli angu-32 (Messi) no-31 (Ronaldo), okuyisibalo esibekelwe umklomelo ka-R50 000 (amagoli angu-20-30) kumdlali wePSL ongafika kulesi sibalo. Nokho okuyinto engakaze eyenzeke selokhu wabekwa lo mhlomulo.Okubuyisa ithemba ngokuthi isibalo somgadli ovelele kulokhu sizoba ngcono wukuthi umgadli weMamelodi Sundowns uCuthbert Malajila noMoeketsi Sekola weFree State Stars sebezihola ngamagoli angu-10. Amaqembu abo asalelwe yimidlalo eyisishiyagalombili neyisikhombisa ngokwehlukana, okubanikeza ithuba elanele lokwandisa emigodleni yabo.Ngesizini edlule umdlali weKaizer Chiefs uBernard Parker wachonywa uphaphe wahamba nesheke lika-R10 000 ebongwa ngokuvalela amagoli angu-10. Kule sizini izinto azimhabeli kahle njengoba esavalele amagoli amathathu. Ukubheda kohlelo kubagadli beChiefs kufanele ukuthi sekumincise nabalandeli baMakhosi ukuthi bangatholi iqembu labo lidedela isicoco seligi njengoba kunzima ukuqoqa amaphuzu agcwele kusukela kuqale unyaka.Abanye abadlali abanethuba lokugcina beqede beqhwakele ohlwini lwabanamagoli amaningi, umdlali weBloemfontein Celtic, uLerato Lamola noPuleng Tloloane wePolokwane City abanamagoli ayisishiyagalolunye ngamunye. Abagadli be-Orlando Pirates, uLehlohonolo Majoro noKermit Erasmus banamagoli ayisishiyagalombili.Kugcine ngoSiyabonga Nomvete ngesizini ka-2012/2013 ukuthi kube nomdlali ofinyelela emagolini angu-20. Ngemuva kwalokho uKatlego Mashego uqede isizini ka-2013/2014 enamagoli angu-13 obekuyisona esiphansi ebesike sabekwa ngaphambi kwesikaParker.Abadlali abahamba phambili ngamagoliCuthbert Malajila 10Moeketsi Sekola 10Lerato Lamola 9Puleng Tlolane 9Lehlohonolo Majoro 8Kermit Erasmus 8Ndumiso Mabena 7Geoffrey Massa 7Khama Billiat 7Lerato Chabangu 6Imiklomelo yabashayi magoli:1 – 15: R25 00016-20: R50 00021 – 25: R75 000Ngaphezu kuka- 26: R100 000
title: Ithemba ngesibalo samagoli omgadli ophambili kuPSL

text: UBOPHA uMbuso uMnuz Andile Mthimkhulu (40), osanda kudedelwa ejele emuva kokudonsa iminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye ngecala lokudlwengula, osekuvele ukuthi akalenzanga.UMthimkhulu waseB North oLundi, uphume ejele eliseNcome, ngeledlule emuva kokufaka isicelo sokubuyekezwa kwecalalakhe, kwavela ukuthi umsulwa.Ubelekelelwa yinhlangano emele amalungelo eziboshwa, iJustice for Prisoners and Detainees Trust ebimsiza ngaphandle kokumkhokhisa imali.Wayesolwa ngokudlwengula umuntu owuzalo lwakhe kodwa wanganda kakhulu lapho. Ubedonsa isigwebo sikadilikajele kodwa manje usekhululekile.UMthimkhulu wagwetshwa ngo-2011 eNkantolo yeMantshi KwaNongoma, base bemshova ejele eNcome.“Ngesikhathi ngiboshwa kwaba buhlungu kakhulu futhi ngangicasukile ngoba ngangazi ukuthi angiyenzanga le nto. Izinhlelo zasejele zangisiza kakhulu ukuthi ngehlise umoya ngemukele isimo ngiqhubeke ngifake isicelo ngilinde,’’ kuchaza uMthimkhulu.Uthe  wathola ummeli wokuqala owayemfakela isicelo sokubuyekeza icala kodwa wagcina esebaleka engawenzanga umsebenzi nokuyinto eyamzwiswa ubuhlungu kodwa wangaphela amandla.Ngesikhathi elahlwa yicala wayesebenza esikhumulweni sezindiza esidala saseThekwini, singakashintshi sayokwakhiwa kwenye indawo njengoba sekuyiKing Shaka International manje.UMthimkhulu uthe akazimisele ngokubuyisela okubi ngokubi kulabo abambophela amanqina enyathi, waze waboshelwa into angayazi kodwaufuna ukuqhubeka nempilo yakhe.Uthe yena nohulumeni bayoze bayochithana, ufuna akhokhe isizumbulu semali ngoba uyiphazamise kakhulu impilo yakhe.Unxuse ukuthi umndeni namalungu omphakathi amemukele ngezandla ezimhlophe angamcwasi ngoba umsulwa futhi uzimisele ngokuziphatha kahle.UMnuz Thabani Mpungose weJustice for Detainees and Prisoners Trust , uthe bayajabula ukuthi uMthimkhulu usephumile kodwa wathi kuningi okusafanele kulungiswe kwezobulungiswa kuleli.“Maningi amacala esike sawenza sitakula abantu emajele sebedonse iminyaka.“Sicela uhulumeni ayibhekisise le nto ngoba umuntu ongenanyo imali uvele aboshwe.“Sikhathazekile kakhulu ngalokho ngoba umthetho ubenzela phansi abantu ,’’ kuchaza uMpungose.UNksz Jackie Bishop wenkampani yabameli iJV Pretorius and Associates uthe sebeqalile umsebenzi wokufaka amaphepha enkantolo ukuze uMthimkhulu athole amademeshe akhe. Udaba lukaMthimkhulu luvela nje lulamana eduze nolomunye umlisa obesanda kuphuma ejele, emuva kokudonsa iminyaka engu-16 engenzanga lutho.Okhulumela uphiko lwezokushushisaKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Ramkisson -Kara, ugcine ngokubhalela intatheli ethi uyitholile imibuzo uyayisebenza akabange esaphendula kwaze kwayoshicilelwa.
title: Ubopha uMbuso owaboshelwa ubala

text: UGABE ngomlando awuqophe ngo-2012 kwiTelkom Knockout umqeqeshi weLamontville Golden Arrows, uClinton Lrasen, omelwe wukudlula kwiBaroka FC azobhekana nayo ngoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama, e-Old Peter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane.ULarsen, ovale imidlalo yeligi ngewini ebidingeka kwiBlack Leopards, unethemba lokuthi abadlali bakhe bazolisebenzisa leli thuba lokuphumula kancane ezinkingeni zeligi babheke ithuba lokungena emlandweni njengaye. Lo mqeqeshi unesicoco esisodwa egameni lakhe kusukela eqale ukuqeqesha ebholeni elikhokhelayo.Udle iTelkom Knockout ngo-2012 esasebenza kwiBloemfontein Celtic lapho eshaye khona iMamelodi Sundowns ngo 1-0 wegoli namanje okusakhulunywa ngalo emdlalweni owawuseMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini.“Emaqenjini afana ne-Arrows isicoco seligi kuba yiphupho kodwa le eminye imiqhudelwano iyasikhuthaza ngoba kulapho sazi khona ukuthi sinethuba. Imbalwa imidlalo kwiTelkom akufani nakwiNedbank Cup lapho kusukwa khona kude. Uma siba nenhlanhla yokunqoba imidlalo yethu siqhubeke nokutomula amaqembu esingawashaya singazithola sesihambe ibanga elide kulo mqhudelwano,” kusho uLarsen.Kusukela i-Arrows iqophe umlando ngokunqoba isicoco seMTN 8 ngamagoli ayisithupha kwi-Ajax Cape Town ngo-2009, leli qembu likaMato Madlala alikaze liphinde lisondele esicocweni ngaphandle kokukhishwa kowandulela owamanqamu kwiNedbank nyakenye. “Asikho isidingo sokuzithambisa emidlalweni yemikhumulajezi. Yimina okwazi kahle lokhu ngoba ngisidlile lesi sicoco ngo-2012. Kungakuhle kabi uma ungase iziphinde umlando. Ngiyazi kufunekani ukuze udle lesi sicoco ngakho-ke ngizokwenza konke okusemandleni ukukufaka ezingqondweni zabadlali bami lokhu. Sinesikhathi esanele ukuhlelela lo mdlalo weBaroka ngakho-ke ngeke sibe khona isikhala sokucasha ngesithupha uma sihlulekile,” kusho lo mqeqeshi.Kusukela i-Arrows idle iMTN 8 ngo-2009 indlala yezinkomishi emaqenjini aseKZN ilokhu iqhubeke njalo njengoba iMaritzburg United ishaywe yiFree State Stars kwiNedbank ngesizini edlule ekubeni AmaZulu akhale ngaphansi kwiBidvest Wits emqhudelwaneni ofanayo (Nedbank) ngo-2010.
title: ULarsen ugabe ngomlando wakhe kwiTelkom

text:
ISIHLOKO: CrawlABALINGISI: KayaScodelario, Barry Pepper,Ross Anderson nabanyeUMQONDISI:Alexandre AjaABADIDIYELI: Craig J.Flores, Sam Raimino-Alexandre AjaABABHALI: MichaelRasmussen noShawnRasmussenUHLOBO: AdventureISIKHATHI: 1 Hour 27 minAMAPHUZU: 4/5UMHLAZIYI:S’mangele ZumaNGIHLALE ngizwa kuthiwa ngeke uyihlukanise ingane yentombazane noyise, indlela esuke imthanda ngayo.Ngizibonele lokhu kule filimu intombazane idela impilo yayo ukuhlenga uyise ovaleleke endlini egcwele izingwenya.Le filimu ingishiye ngizibuza ukuthi ngabe ukhona yini umuntu ongaqophisana nezingwenya ukuze ahlenge umzali wakhe?Le filimu iyasabisa kusukela ekuqaleni kuze kube sekugcineni. Ikhuluma ngowesifazane uHaley (Kaya Scodelario) ophuma umkhankaso wokuthungatha uyise uDave (Barry Pepper) ongatholakali njengoba idolobha labo lihlaselwe isivunguvungu esibi.Le ntokazi ishaya indiva umyalelo wabezimo eziphuthumayo abathi kuyingozi ukuthi iye ngasemzini kayise ngenxa yesiphepho.%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/CrawlMovie?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#CrawlMovieis now playing. 
pic.twitter.com/qae49Y0NsE— Crawl Movie (@TheCrawlMovie)Ifika kule ndlu imcinge uyise ize imthole ekhosombeni elingaphansi kwendlu elimele.Izithola isivaleleke noyise kule ndawo egcwele amanzi nezingwenya ezifuna ukubaqeda.Basizwa ukuvinjwa ngamapayipi enza kube nzima ukuthi izingwenya zifinyelele kubo.Ubamba umoya kule filimu ize iyophela ngoba uHaley noDave baphunyuka emilonyeni yalezi zingwenya izikhawu eziningi.Uma uyigwala njengami ugcina usuthuka ubala ngendlela izingwenya ezibangqaphaza ngayo abantu kule filimu.Ngimshayela ihlombe umqondisi wale filimu ngokukwazi ukwenza ifilimu egxile kubantu ababili kusukela iqala ize iyophela.Kuyasho kodwa ukuthi yifilimu ngoba kukhona lapho obona khona ukuthi bekungamele basinde kodwa baphunyuke.Iphela sebehleli ophahleni kuqhamuka indiza ezobasiza.Ifilimu iphela ngengoma ekwehlisa amaphaphu ethi "See you later alligator" ekwenza ugcine usuhleka ukhumbule ukuthi ububukela ifilimu yezingxavula zezingwenya.
title: Iyasabisa iCRAWL kodwa wena wawungenzanjani

text: UKULANDELWA ngamashwa kwesihlabani somculo kamaskandi, uMjikijelwa ‘Ichalaha LikaShafuza’ Ngubane kuphazamise ukukhishwa kweCD yakhe entsha.UMjikijelwa uthe ukushonelwa yingane eneminyaka emine nokushayiswa kwenye imoto kumphazamisile emoyeni. Echaza uthe, kuqale ngokuthi indodakazi yakhe uThembah (12) ashayiswe yimoto ephuma esikoleni saseDalton, iCool Air Secondary.“Lo mntwana wayeqa umgwaqo kanti kuzoqhamuka imoto imshayise, walimala esandleni nasemlenzeni.“Ngokusho kwabantu abangithinta wayelimele kakhulu futhi equlekile. Nami ngangizitshela ukuthi ngizofika engasekho emhlabeni ngendlela ababesho ngayo kanti uzobuye asinde,” kusho uMjikijelwa.Echaza ngengane yakhe eshonile, uMjikijelwa uthe wathola ucingo luvela kunina, emtshela ukuthi seyishonile kade igula.“Okubuhlungu abangitshelanga isagula kodwa bangitshela ngoba seyishonile. Ngaphuthuma lapho bebehlala khona ehostela laseBuyafuthi eGoli ngathola ukuthi sebehlala elokishini.“Ngathi ngibashayela ucingo baziziba izingcingo zami. Ngathumelela unina wengane umyalezo wokuthi kungani bengasatholakali, wathi angidingakali emngcwabeni.“Njengamanje angazi kwenzekani noma le ngane ishone ngempela noma badlala ngami,” kusho uMjikijelwa.Uthe uyile kokuzwa kwababonayo bamtshela ukuthi kube yini imbangela.Uthe iCD yakhe bekufanele iphume ngePhasika kodwa seyizoze iphume ngo-Ephreli 21 ngenxa yokuthi uphuzile ukuya estudiyo.“Ngiqale namhlanje (esho ngoLwesithathu) estudiyo ngenxa yokuthi ngisaphatheke kabi. Bengingafuni ukukhiphela abantu umsebenzi ongekho ezingeni ngenxa yokuthi angiphathekile kahle,” kusho uMjikjelwa ongomunye wabaculi bakamaskandi asebemnkantshubomvu futhi abayizintandokazi.Unamaqembu amathathu okunguMjikijelwa, Amangcukumane, Omenzelwa, neChalaha LikaShafuza futhi udume kakhulu ngenoni elithi Bafikelwe, 20 Years Ago nethi Lalilihle Ihhashi Lakho.Usebuya nase-Amsterdam eNetherlands neqembu lakhe Ondabuzekwayo.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukanina wengane ayiphumelelanga.
title: Uhlehlise ukukhishwa kwe-albhamu entsha ngenxa yokulandelwa ngamashwa

text: AMAPHOYISA ase-Estcourt acela noma ngubani ongawasiza ngolwazi olungaholela ekutheni athole ufakazi akholwa wukuthi angawasiza ecaleni lokubamba inkunzi kuhlonyiwe elenzeka kule ndawo.Kusolwa ukuthi ngomhla ka-5 kwephezulu umsebenzi wasesitolo owayevala ntambamba wakhonjwa yisigebengu ngesibhamu samphoqa ukuba avule.Kulesi sigameko kwathathwa imali nezinye izinto ezazisesitolo. Umsolwa kuthiwa wabaleka ngezinyawo esuka esitolo, amaphoyisa akholwa ukuthi owesilisa osesithombeni angawasiza ngolwazi olungaholela ekutheni aphenye ngempumelelo icala lokubamba inkunzi kuhlonyiwe.Ongaba nolwazi uyacelwa ukuthi athinte uSgt Sankar ku-036 637 9517 noma ashayele inombolo yeCrime Stop ethi 08600 101111.
title: Kuthungathwa ufakazi ecaleni lokubanjwa kwenkunzi

text: UMQEQESHI we-Orlando Pirates, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, usebheke ukuqhubeka nokujabulisa abalandeli bezakhe ngokuwuqala ngenothi eliphezulu umqhudelwano iCaf Champions League.USredojevic ngemuva kokufaka ezakhe kowamanqamu eTelkom Knockout (TKO) ngokuqumba phansi izitha iKaizer Chiefs ngo 2-1 eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngoMgqibelo, utshele abezindaba ukuthi umdlalo wamanqamu akusiyona into esemqondweni wakhe okwamanje.Owamanqamu eTelkom uzogijinywa eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ngoDisemba 8.Ngaphambi kwawo iPirates izodlala neLight Stars yaseSeychelles kowokuhlunga weChampions League ngoLwesithathu e-Orlando Stadium ngo-7.30 ebusuku.NgoMgqibelo amaBhakabhaka adlala neMaritzburg United koweligi ekhaya, bese kuba iLight Stars ekuhambeni ngoDisemba 4.“Umdlalo wamanqamu ungowesine ngokubaluleka kwezinto esicabanga ngazo okwamanje. Okuhamba phambili wumdlalo wethu neLight Stars wangoLwesithathu, iMaritzburg ngoMgqibelo, iLight Stars ekuhambeni bese kuba umdlalo wamanqamu. Kodwa sizoqala sibone kusasa (ngeSonto) ukuthi sizodlala nobani, uma sesazi sizobe sesiqala sihlelela umdlalo ngale kokubukwa amehlo abantu,” kusho uSredojevic.Amagoli iPirates edlule ngawo kwiChiefs ashaywe uThembinkosi Lorch noJustin Shonga ngokuhlukana kweziwombe. EleChiefs libekwe uLeonardo Castro obekungelokulinganisa.Bekuwumdlalo wesibili emasontweni ambalwa iPirates iguqisa iChiefs. Kulo nyaka la maqembu aseSoweto abesehlangana okwesithathu, yonke imidlalo yanqotshwa ezikaMicho.“Besibahlelele kahle ukungena ngemuva kwabadlali babo basezinhlangothini emuva njengoba kubonakele * (Vincent) Pule egudla ngemuva kuka(Godfrey) Walusimbi ngegoli elishaywe uLorch,” kusho lo mqeqeshi odabuka eSerbia.Ubonge ithimba lakhe ngokungaphumuli belungiselela umdlalo wabakhaya.“Ngibonga kakhulu nakubalandeli bethu abebelokhu bewa bevuka nathi. Ngiyabamema ukuthi beze ngobuningi bazoseseka siqale umkhakhaso wethu weCaf Champions League. Useza umdlalo wamanqamu. Kuningi okumele siziqhenye ngakho, sinqobe imidlalo emithathu yabakhaya kulandelana engicabanga ukuthi yinto ekade yagcina ukwenzeka. Siyakujabulela esikwenzile. Kufana nomjovo osikhuthazayo ekutheni senze okuhle nokungcono njengoba sinikezwe amandla okwenza abalandeli bethu bajabule futhi baziqhenye ngathi,” kusho uSredojevic.
title: IBucs nezinhlelo zokuqala kahle eyeCaf

text: UNOZINTI weBidvest Wits, uDarren Keet, uyakuphika ukuthi kunokungaboni ngaso linye phakathi kwabadlali abathile nomqeqeshi uGavin Hunt okuyimbangela yokuthi ompetha be-Absa Premiership bahlale ezembeni kusukela isizini iqala kuze kube imanje.Izinto zimapeketwane kwiClever Boys. Leli qembu siye koshicilela lihlezi endaweni yesibili ukusuka ekugcineni kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership.IWits isiphenduke umtapo wamaphuzu okufakazelwa wukushaywa kwayo imidlalo eyisithupha ngemuva kwengu-10 yeligi.Isiqunjwe phansi yiCape Town City, Lamontville Golden Arrows, AmaZulu, Bloemfontein Celtic, Chippa United neMamelodi Sundowns. Phezu kwalokho iyona futhi esidedele amagoli amaningi emidlalweni yeligi. Isidedele angu-15. IWits ibalwa namaqembu aseshaye amagoli amancane isabhakuzise inethini ngayisithupha.Iyona evikela isicoco seligi okubukeka kuzoba ngumqansa ukuthi isibuyise kule sizini ka-2017/2018. Kuyimanje ilinyalelwe ngabadlali abamqoka okubalwa kubona ukaputeni uThulani “Tyson” Hlatshwayo.UGabadinho Mhango usadonsa isigwebo sokukhwifa ngamathe umdlali woSuthu uMichael Morton noNazeer Allie. KoweSundowns abashaywe kuwona ngo 2-0 ngoLwesibili, * -Elias Pelembe uphuke fahla ingalo. Basanda kubuya ekulimaleni uBuhle Mkhwanazi noXola Mlambo.“Ngeke ngikuvume ukuthi kukhona ukungezwani eqenjini phakathi kwabadlali nomqeqeshi. Engingakusho ukuthi kulula ukuqhamuka nala mahlebezi uma izinto zivele zingahambi kahle. Sibumbene sonke eqenjini futhi sinabadlali abaningi abanesipiliyoni sokubhekana nezimo ezinzima. Kujwayelekile ukuthi ngemuva kwesizini enhle kungahambi kahle. Ziningi izimbangela zalokhu, njengokuthi amaqembu aqinisa kakhulu uma ezodlala nompetha nokuthi-ke silinyalelwe abadlali abaningi abamqoka,” usho kanje uKeet.Ngendlela adlale kahle ngayo bekufanele kube uyena oqokwa abe ngumdlali ovelele osukwini kodwa kwagcina kuqokwe uKhama Billiat osuke ebhentshini washayela iSundowns amagoli amabili.Ephawula ngalokhu uKeet uthe: “Ngenxa yesimo esikusona, anginandaba nokuthi angikhethwanga. Ebengikuzele lapha ngamaphuzu agcwele kodwa-ke ngebhadi asiphunyuka.”
title: UKeet uvikela iWits ngokubheda kohlelo

text: USihlalo weKwaZulu-Natal Scholar Transport Association, uMnuz Mandla Mvubu, uthe abeSibaya kufanele benze ucwaningo olunzulu ngoba lokhu abakukhombisa kwithelevishini akwenzeki komalume bangempela.“Omalume bashise itekisi lakwaNdlovu kwiSibaya ekubeni yinto esingayenzi leyo siwomalume. Akusiphethe neze kahle lokhu okwenziwa ababhali beSibaya ngoba benza omalume kube sengathi ngabantu abanodlame ekubeni banokuthula. Omalume bazama ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuthi kube nokuthula ukuze bathuthe kahle izingane zesikole. Lokhu okwenzeka kwiSibaya asazi okomalume bayiphi indawo,” kusho uMvubu.Usole ababhali beSibaya ngokubukela phansi omalume esho nokuthi ngesikhathi bebhikisha banikwa amasemishi sengathi omalume abantu abalambayo.“Omalume abanazo izimoto ezigugile njengezikhonjiswa kwiSibaya. Bathenga ama-quantum amasha, amabhasi ahlala abantu abawu-22 nezimoto eziphilayo. Ngisho esezineminyaka azizona izikorokoro kodwa zikufanele ukuhamba emgwaqweni. Siyacela ababhali besiSibaya bawuyeke umkhuba wabo.”Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kwaboMzansi Magic lapho kudlala khona Isibaya ayiphumelelanga nenkampani ekhiqiza Isibaya iBomb Shelter kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela ingayiphendulanga imibuzo yeSolezwe.
title: Omalume bacikwe okwenzeka kwiSibaya

text: ULINDE iqembu elizokhuluma naye uTendai Ndoro osematheni kulezi zinsuku, kwazise uyena okusuke ngaye ingxabano phakathi kwe-Ajax Cape Town nePSL asebefakene ezinkantolo. Ngenxa yalo mdlali kunokungabaza nangokuthi isizini izoqala yini ngempelasonto ka-Agasit 4 njengoba iPSL isho.UPotshoza uthole ukuthi uGary Cassisa ophethe izindaba zalo mdlali waseZimbabwe ulinde ukuba likhulume iqembu elimfunayo hhayi le nto ekhulunyelwa ngaphansi kwetafula yokuthi uya kwiChiefs noma kwiSuperSport.Iqhawe lakho lihoshe ukuthi iChiefs ibilinde ukuqasha umqeqeshi kuqala bese kuba yima imnika ithuba lokuthi asho ukuthi uyamdinga noma cha. IChiefs igcine imqashile uGiovanni Solinas wase-Italy kodwa uCassisa uthe akukho osekushiwo yiChiefs. NakwiSuperSport kulindwe okufanayo ngomqeqeshi omusha.“Nathi sizwa ezindabeni ukuthi uya kwiChiefs kodwa asikwazi lokho thina esimelwe ukumtholela iqembu elisha. Uma into enjalo ikhona yimina engizokwazi kuqala kodwa okwamanje akukakabikho lutho. Akhona amaqembu amathathu esikhuluma nawo kodwa alikho kuwona engingathi lihamba phambili ngoba alikho eselibeke okuthile phezu kwetafula,” usho kanje uCassisa.Ngenhlanhla akujahekile ukuthi asayine lo mdlali ngoba alikho iqembu akulona ngakho-ke ukuvalwa kwewindi akumthinti uma kukhona abafuna ukumsayinisa ekugcineni. Lo mgadli waseZimbabwe usematheni kulezi zinsuku kulandela ukudlalela kwakhe amaqembu amathathu ngesizini eyodwa okuyicala elibomvu ngokwemithetho yeFifa.Uqale kwiPirates ngaphambi kokuthi aye kwi-Al-Faisaly. Akahlalanga lapho ngenxa yezinkinga (aseke wazichazela uPotshoza njengokungaholi abuye atshelwe ukuthi akenze akubonayo ngoba imali ayikho) wajoyina i-Ajax.Ngokusho kwabaphathi bezindaba zakhe akananxa ne-Ajax yize eshiye khona isigubhukane. Kuthiwa bavumelene naleli qembu ukuthi isimo asisihle ngenxa yaleli cala, yingakho bebone kungcono ukuthi bahlukanise.“Noma iliphi iqembu elizomthola ngeke lihlupheke ngoba ufithi ngokwanele. Uziqeqesha yedwa nsuku zonke futhi sonke-ke siyazi ukuthi uNdoro uyalazi ipali lapho ligxunyekwe ngakhona,” kusho umphathi wakhe.
title: Uvule izandla umgadli okusuke ngaye ingxabano kwi-PSL

text: UNathi, ozakhele udumo ngeculo elithi Nomvula, uvele enkantolo yeMantshi yase-Alexandra eGoli ngemuva ukuboshwa ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.Ngokwephephandaba lansuku zonke lesiNgisi, iSowetan, uNathi uboshwe ngezinsolo zokugqekeza amahhovisi alowo owayeyimenenja yakhe uChina Mpololo.UNathi ugcinwe esiteshini samaphoyisa eBramley ngaphambi kokuvela enkantolo.Okhulumela lesi siteshi uCaptain Molefe Mogodi, uziqinisekisile izindaba zokuboshwa kukaMankayi nokuthi uvele enkantolo ngecala lokweba impahla yebhizinisi nabangani bakhe ababili. Kubikwa ukuthi laba bobathathu baya emahhovisi kaMpololo bathatha ama-laptop, izingcingo, ama-printer namaselula.Amaphoyisa ayithola le mpahla yabuyiselwa kumnikazi, abe eseqala uphenyo. Ngokwembiko amaphoyisa sekunesikhathi esezithendeni zikaNathi kulandela lesi sigameko.Kubikwa ukuthi izinkinga phakathi kukaNathi noMpololo ziqale ngesikhathi ekhetha ukuqeda ngobudlelwano bakhe nalo mculi. UMpololo uqale ukuba yimenenja kaNathi kulandela ukushiya kwakhe iMuthaland Entertainment, nayo ahlukana nayo esexabene nabaphathi bayo.Lo mculi uke wafika emahhovisini eSolezwe ehamba naye uMpololo, owacela ukuthi angaphonswa imibuzo ngobudlelwano bakhe nesitebele ayeqopha kuso ngoba usengaphansi kwabaphathi abasha.UNathi ngaphambi kokuthi adume ngamanoni ezothando uke waboshwa phambilini ngecala lokweba, wadedelwa isigwebo sakhe engakasiqedi ngenxa yokuziphatha kahle ejele.
title: UNathi Mankayi uboshelwe ukweba

text: INDODAKAZI kamengameli wokuqala wentando yabantu ibihlale ilwela ukuthi abampofu bathole umhlaba.UNkk Zindziswa Mandela-Hlongwane obeyinxusa eDenmark ushone ekuseni izolo.
