Ngesikhathi sokushicilela bekungakadalulwa ukuthi ubephethwe yini.Uchazwe njengomuntu obelwela ukuthi ababencishwe amathuba bathole umhlaba into abazali bakhe uMnuz Nelson Mandela noNkk Winnie Madikizela-Mandela abebeyilwela.Okhulumela iMandela Museum, uMnuz Fumanekile Wisani, uthe uNkk Mandela-Hlongwane ushone ngenyanga okugujwa ngayo impilo kayise.Uthe njengoba begcina amagugu aphathelene noMandela bayakuncoma ukuzinikela kukaNkk Mandela-Hlongwane elwela ukuthi ababencishwe amathuba bathole inkululeko nokuzinikela ekusebenzeleleni uhulumeni.Akuwona umndeni wakhe kuphela olahlekelwe ngokudlula kwakhe kodwa kulahlekelwe iNingizimu Afrika yonke. Indima ayiqathile kwipolitiki iyohlale ikhunjulwa ngabantu abalwela ukuthi baphume ebuphofini,” kusho uWisani.Ukudlula kwakhe emhlabeni kuthinte osopolitiki abaningi abadlulise amazwi enduduzo. UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa udalule ukuthi uNkk Mandela-Hlongwane ushone kulindeleke ukuthi athathe omunye umsebenzi waseLiberia odinga ubuchule.“Ngizwelana nomndeni wakwaMandela ngalesi sikhathi sokuzilela iqhawe lo mzabalazo. Okusikhalisa kakhulu wukuthi ukudlula kwakhe emhlabeni kwenzeke ngenyanga okugujujwa ngayo usuku lokuzalwa kukayise,” kusho uRamaphosa.UNgqongqoshe wezubuDlelwano namazwe angaphandle, uDkt Naledi Pandor, uthe: “UNkk Mandela-Hlongwane ubesebenzela umphakathi waseNingizimu Afrika wonke.INelson Mandela Foundation esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba ithe impilo kaNkk Mandela-Hlongwane ibihlukile ineziwombe ezikhombisa ubuqhawe.Lokhu ikweseke ngokukhumbula iminyaka yokuvalelwa lapho uNkk Mandela-Hlongwane ayehlala nonina uNkk Winnie Madikizela-Mandela edolobheni elincane iBrandfort, eFree State.UNkk Mandela-Hlongwane nguye owafundela umphakathi owawusenkundleni yezemidlalo incwadi kayise enqaba ukukhululwa ejele ngo-1985.Ukuzimisela kwakhe ekusebenzeleni umphakathi kugcine kuholele ekutheni ayoba yinxusa eDenmark.Umengameli we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, obesondelene namadodakazi kaMandela, uthe umsebenzi wokuba yinxusa eDenmark uwenze ngempulelelo ehlala ekhuluma okuyiqiniso.“I-EFF ithole ukugqugquzeleka kuye ngokweseka unina, umama uWinnie. Kuyiqiniso ukuthi ezinye izingane ziyabajikela abazali ngesikhathi sokulwela umzabalazo.”Umsunguli we-IFP, Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, uthe: “Ukudlula emhlabeni kukaNkk Mandela-Hlongwane kungishaqisile. Angikakholwa ukuthi umuntu obengumqemane futhi enomfutho njengaye akasekho emhlabeni. UNkk Mandela-Hlongwane ukhule kanzima ehlukene noyise kodwa akazange abe ngumuntu onenzondo kodwa ubenothando.”Umholi we-United Democratic Movement, uMnuz Bantu Holomisa,uthe ukushona kukaNkk Mandela-Hlongwane kumethusile ngoba ubesalindele ukuthi ambone engomunye abasebenzela ukwakha izwe.Imininingwane yokuthi uzongcwatshwa nini nokuthi uzongcwatshelwa kuphi beyingakaziwa.Okhulumela umndeni wakhe waseQunu, uMnuz Maplisa Mandela, uthe uNkk Mandela-Hlongwane ungumuntu obenomfutho. Bebengakezwa lutho mayelana nokuthi uzongcwatshwa eQunu noma cha.
title: ‘UZindzi ubehlale elwela abampofu’

text: KUSOLWA isoka likathisha wasoSuthu Primary, oLundi ngokubulawa ngesihluku kwakhe emuva kokuba etholwe emqashweni ngoLwesihlanu ntambama, enqunywe uqhoqhoqho, kade egcinwe ebuya emsebenzini ngoLwesithathu.Umndeni kaNksz Mbali Shwala (38) wasoLundi obeseneminyaka engu-13 enguthisha, akukavumi wamukele ukudlula kwakhe emhlabeni ngenxa yesihluku abulawe ngaso. Ubenamanxeba okugwazwa futhi evalelwe endlini yakhe, kukhala umsakazo.UNksz Shwala kuthiwa ubuye esikoleni ngoLwesithathu ehamba nabanye othisha, waya emqashweni wakhe ongasePrince Mangosuthu Airport, odume ngokuthi kukwaMhlongo.“Ungene endlini yakhe e-room 26 nowesilisa abethandana naye. Emuva kwalokho owesilisa waphuma wahamba ngemoto kaMbali kodwa asisolanga lutho. UMbali akazange abonakale. NgoLwesine uthishomkhulu wesikole sakhe wahlaba umkhosi exakwa ukuthi kungani engalubambi ucingo futhi yini engezile esikoleni ngoba akuyena umuntu ohlupha ngokulova.“Ufikile lapha nabomndeni bazongqongqoza kodwa akuvulanga muntu. Bathinte umnikazi wemiqasho, kwafonelwa namaphoyisa. Kuthe ngoLwesihlanu amaphoyisa afika azama ukugqekeza umnyango okuyilapho ezithele kuMbali eseshonile esembhedeni, enamanxeba okugwazwa, enqunywe noqhoqhoqho njengembuzi okuyinto evele yathusa,” kusho umthombo ocele ukungadalulwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptian Nqobile Gwala, uthe isidumbu sikaNksz Shwala sitholwe sinqunywe uqhoqhoqho endlini abehlala kuyo eseMbhoshongweni oLundi. Imoto yakhe ibithathiwe neselula yakhe.Uthe amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubamba inkunzi nelokubulala kodwa akukaboshwa muntu.Umfowabo kaNksz Shwala, uMnuz Mandla Shwala uthe udadewabo ubenamanxeba okugwazwa enqunywe uqhoqhoqho.“Kubuhlungu esikubonile ngendlela engachazeki. Lo muntu ombulele uthathe ngisho amakhadi akhe nemoto yakhe, wahamba nakho. Nokho igcine itholakala eMelmoth ngosizo lwe-tracker namaphoyisa. Ukhiye wayo utholwe kumnikazi wejoyinti phansi lapho kusolwa ukuthi umsolwa ubephuza khona.“Ubone imoto ipake buqamama, waciphiza okhiye bakhombisa ukuthi abayo. Ube esebiza amaphoyisa ayithatha imoto okwenze kwaba lula ukuthi siyithole ngoba vele udaba beselusemaphoyiseni. Umsolwa kuthiwa ufike eMelmoth ephuzile waya kumama wengane yakhe. Naye uthukile embona ngoba sengathi ungumuntu obengasajwayele ukumvakashela. Akakaboshwa ngoba akwaziwa ukuthi ushonephi njengoba sithole ukuthi uye kuleli joyinti wafike waphuza khona maqede wahamba wakhohlwa izikhiye,” kusho uShwala.Uthe kubuhlungu okubavelele ngoba isidumbu sikadadewabo besilokhu sisendlini kusuka ngoLwesithathu ngehora lesithathu, uma kubukwa i-tracker yemoto ekhombisa ukuthi imoto ihambe nini isuka emqashweni isiya eMelmoth.Bheka umbono wephephandaba ekhasini 20
title: Kusolwa isoka uthisha enqunywa uqhoqhoqho

text: XOLILE MPISANEUZODLALA umdlalo wakhe wokuqala weRainbow Cup SA uMakazole Mapimpi njengoba efakiwe eqenjini lamaCell C Sharks elizogijimisana namaLions e-Emirates Airlines Park kusasa ngo-4 ntambama.UMapimpi uzowuqala umdlalo ophikweni lwesinxele, ethatha indawo kaYaw Penxe, osezovala isikhala sikaS’bu Nkosi kwesokudla.Lo mdlali owazakhela ugazi kubalandeli bamaBhokobhoko emidlalweni yeNdebe yoMhlaba ngo-2019, uke wawashiya amaSharks wayodlalela iqembu laseJapan, iDocomo Red Hurricanes kodwa usebuyile.Umqeqeshi wamaSharks, uSean Everitt ulishintshe kakhulu iqembu elagcina lihlulwe ngamaStormers ngo 25-22 emasontweni amabili adlule.Abanye abangeke bawuqale umdlalo ngu-Ox Nche, Fez Mbatha, Thomas Du Toit, Reniel Hugo, Thembelani Bholi, Curwin Bosch, Lukhanyo Am no-Aphelele Fassi.Izikhala zabo zizovalwa nguNtuthuko Mchunu, Kerron van Vuuren, Wiehahn Herbst, Hyron Andrews, James Venter, Phepsi Buthelezi, Manie Libbok, Werner Kok no-Anthony Volmink.Umqeqeshi wamaLions, u-Ivan van Rooyen uzoqhubeka neqembu elagcina lihlule amaBulls. Ushintsho alwenzile lusebhentshini. UDan Kriel uzongenela uManuel Rass. AmaSharks kumele anqobe lapha ukuzibeka ethubeni lokugcina eqede phezulu. Sharks – 15 Anthony Volmink, 14 Yaw Penxe, 13 Werner Kok, 12 Marius Louw, 11 Makazole Mapimpi, 10 Manie Libbok, 9 Jaden Hendrikse, 8 Phepsi Buthelezi, 7 Henco Venter (c), 6 James Venter, 5 Hyron Andrews, 4 JJ van der Mescht, 3 Wiehahn Herbst, 2 Kerron van Vuuren, 1 Ntuthuko Mchunu.Ebhentshini: 16 Fez Mbatha, 17 Ox Nche, 18 Thomas du Toit, 19 Ruben van Heerden, 20 Thembelani Bholi, 21 Grant Williams, 22 Boeta Chamberlain, 23 Jeremy Ward.Lions – 15 EW Viljoen, 14 Rabz Maxwane, 13 Wandisile Simelane, 12 Burger Odendaal (c), 11 Courtnall Skosan, 10 Jordan Hendrikse, 9 Andre Warner, 8 Len Massyn, 7 Vincent Tshituka, 6 MJ Pelser, 5 Reinhard Nothnagel, 4 Ruben Schoeman, 3 Carlu Sadie, 2 Jaco Visagie, 1 Sti Sithole.Ebhentshini: 16 PJ Botha, 17 Ruan Dreyer, 18 Asenathi Ntlabakanye, 19 Willem Alberts, 20 Emmanuel Tshituka, 21 Morne van den Berg, 22 Fred Zeilinga, 23 Manuel Rass.
title: AmaSharks azoya kumaLions ehlome ngoMapimpi

text: UKHALA uyazithulisa owesilisa waseYeoville eGoli osola izihlobo zakhe ngokuntshontsha amathikithi akhe eLotto awina ngawo uR79 million.UMnuz Bhekilanga Khaula (55) uthi ngemva kokubona ukuthi uwinile izihlobo zakhe ahlala nazo zantshontsha amathikithi akhe zayolanda imali emahhovisi eLotto ngaphandle kwemvume yakhe. UKhaula uthe ngo-Okthoba 2010 wawina uR478 489 kwiSportstake draw. Waphinde wadlala ilotto wawina uR75 million noR4 million weLotto Plus kanye noR409 452 weSportstake draw."Angizange ngiyithinte yonke lemali, yawela ezandleni okungezona," kusho uKhaula.UKhaula uphinde wakhala ngenkampani ekhokhela abawinile imali yabo, iGidani, ngokukhokha imali yakhe ngokungekho emthethweni. "Uyikhokha kanjani imali inombolo kamazisi ibe ingafani nale esethikithini eliwinile? Ngadlala ngoSepthemba 30 nango-Okthoba 4 (2010). Ngaya kobheka imiphumela ngathola ukuthi ngiwinile. Ngaphuthuma ekhaya ukuyolanda amathikithi ami kepha ngangawathola," kusho yena.UKhaula uthe isihlobo sakhe esisodwa sasimbonile ewabeka amathikithi akhe. UKhaula uthe ngo-Okthoba 30 wadlala inqwaba yamathikithi eLotto naweSportstake ngoR2 600."Ngawina kepha wonke amathikithi ami antshontshwa ngesinye isihlobo sami," kusho yena.UKhaula uthe ngemuva kwezinsuku amathikithi akhe elahlekile, izihlobo zakhe zaya kokwenza igilosa engasukumi phansi. Uthe wafaka isikhalazo kwiGidani zamiswa izimali ukuze kwenziwe uphenyo. UMnuz Andre du Plessis owayeyisikhulu seGidani uthe asikho isikhalazo esake safakwa kuyena ngalolu daba. UKhaula uthe wavula icala esiteshini samaphoyisa eYeoville. Okhulumela amaphoyisa uKapteni Sifiso Mabizela uthe icala lavalwa ngenxa yokungabikho kobufakazi.  "Uchwepheshe wakwaLotto waveza ukuthi amathikithi awina awathengwanga eGoli kepha athengwa eThekwini naseLimpopo," kusho uMabizela. UKhaula wadlulisela udaba ehhovisi lomvikeli womphakathi ngo-2013. Okhulumela ihhovisi lomvikeli uMnuz Oupa Sekgalwe uthe: "Isikhalazo safakwa ngo-April 23 ngo-2019. Udaba ladluliselwa emaphoyiseni, ngakho alukho uphenyo olwenziwa umvikeli womphakathi," kusho uSekgalwe.
title: Usola izihlobo ngokweba ithikithi lakhe leLotto kaR79 million

text: INTSHA yaseThekwini namaphethelo izoncela ulwazi kosaziwayo emcimbini ozoyisiza ikhule emikhakheni efuna ukungena kuyo owaziwa ngeYouth Arts Boot Camp.Umcimbi okungowesibili kulo nyaka uzodonsa izinsuku ezintathu kusukela ngoLwesine kuze kube uMgqibelo, eMoses Mabhida.Omunye wabahleli bawo, uDJ Happy Gal Ndlovu, uthe bamema yonke intsha efuna ukungena emkhakheni wobumnandi ifike ngobuningi bayo.“Umcimbi wangonyaka odlule waba yimpumelelo njengoba kukhona intsha eyasizakala. Omunye umfana wabonwa uZakes Bantwini wathi uzomsiza ekuqopheni i-albhamu yakhe,” kusho uHappy Gal.Uthe intsha ezoza izosizwa ngezinto ezehlukene ezithinta ukuba oDJ, ukuqoshwa kwama-demo, nokuthi yini engayisiza ekubeni abaculi abasezingeni.“Ngisho intsha efuna ukungena ekusakazeni izoncela ulwazi njengoba uDJ LeSoul noMario beGagasi FM noZanda Mthembu woKhozi FM bezobe bekhona. Bazotshela intsha ukuthi yini edingeka engomeni ukuze ikulungele ukudlalwa emsakazweni,” kuchaza yena.Uthe nabafuna ukuba osomahlaya bazosizakala ngoba uSimphiwe Shembe uzobachushisa ngezinto ezithinta lo mkhakha.“UNomalanga Shozi, Sandile “GQ” Ntshingila bazobe bengabaqondisi bomcimbi. Kuzobe kukhona noZakes Bantwini noThokozani MaMkhize Ndlovu,” kuchaza yena.
title: Kuhlelwe umcimbi ozohlomisa intsha ngolwazi eludingayo

text: UYINQABILE ibheyili umshayeli wetekisi osolwa ngokugwaza abulale umfundi wakwaGrade 11 okuthiwa wanqaba ukulala naye ngemva kokumthengela utshwala.UMnuz Sanele Dube (29), uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMbumbulu izolo.Usolwa ngokugwaza abulale uSibahle Biyela (17) obengumfundi waseSphephele High eFolweni, wathatha isidumbu sakhe wasisonga ngengubo yokulala wasishutheka ngaphansi kombhede.Umndeni kamufi ubungenankinga nokuthi inkantolo imkhulule ngebheyili uDube kodwa wayenqaba.Icala libe selihlehliselwa uNovemba 23 kuyo le nkantolo ukuze uMbuso uqhubeke nophenyo lwawo.Ngaphandle enkantolo bekubhikisha amalungu omphakathi waseFolweni, awebandla i-United Congregational Church of Southern Africa, awe-ANC nawe-EFF.Bebefuna umsolwa anganikwa ibheyili, icala liqulwe lize limgojele engaphakathi bese enikwa isigwebo esiqinile.UNksz Thobeka Mabhida, oyilungu lomndeni kaSibahle, uthe uDube unqabe ibheyili ngoba ubonile ukuthi ufunwa wumphakathi.“Ubezibona engaphephile uma ephuma ngaphandle ngoba abantu bebemfuna eFolweni ngento ayenza,” kusho uNksz Mabhida.IPhini likaNobhala we-EFF eThekwini, uNkk Banele Thusi, lithe umndeni ubufuna umsolwa aphume kodwa bona beyi-EFF bamfuna abhadle ejele ngesihluku asenza.Kusolakala ukuthi ngo-Okthoba 3 ebusuku, uDube wabizela endlini yakhe uSibahle nomngani wakhe wabathengela utshwala. Kuthiwa kwaphuzwa, ngokuhamba kwesikhathi uDube obengumshayeli wamatekisi eFolweni wazunywa ubuthongo.Kuthiwa umsindo waqala ngenkathi umsolwa esephaphama ebona uSibahle nomngani wakhe sebehamba.“Kungalesi sikhathi lapho okuthiwa wagwaza khona ekhanda umngani kaSibahle waquleka. Wahubha umufi wabuya naye esemgwaza okuthiwa wathi engena naye endlini wabe esemdlwengula eseshonile,” kusho uNksz Mabhida.
title: Wenqabe ibheyili ‘owabulala’ umfundi

text: BEKUNYAMFUKA kunzima ngisho ukubeka unyawo emcimbini obekuqala ukuthi wenziwe elokishini eMlaza, obewuhlelwe uDJ Boonu, ngokubambisana nabakwaMTN, uMlazi Picnic, obusezinkundleni zemidlalo iKing Zwelithini, ngoMgqibelo.Kulo mcimbi okugcwale kuwo ngehora lesibili ntambama, lithe liyozilahla kunina onogada babe sebethwele kanzima ngoba abantu bese bedudula isiteji befuna ukuza ngaphambili.Kulo mcimbi obekuboshelwe abaculi abahlukene bakuleli kuze kwacishe kwasa ekuseni besina bededelana esiteji.Yize abaculi abanohlonze besheshe bacula kulo mcimbi njengoba bebemenywe nakwezinye izindawo kodwa abanye bebelokhu bethelekile bashiya izihlwele zimanzi te wumjuluko ngenxa yokuzijuxuza.Abaculi okukhona kubo uDJ Tira, Professor, Big NUZ, DJ Sox, DJ Masiya, Zakwe, Oros, DJ Mngadi, Mampintsha, Danger, MC Slot, Merlon, L’vovo, Khuzani, Distruction Boyz noBabes Wodumo, Naakmusiq, Okmalumkoolkat bashiye izihlwele zifuna impinda njengoba benze into yamehlo esiteji.NTANDO DUMAUhlelo beluphethwe wuNtando Duma noFelix Hlophe abebelokhu beshintshana esiteji. Kucace bha ukuthi abantu baseMlaza bawujabulele ngoba bebelokhu betheleke njalo kanti bese kunzima nokulawula isiminyaminya emgwaqweni.UBoonu obehla enyuka ngenxa yokuba matasa ubonge bonke abaphumelele kulo mcimbi waveza ukuthi abasabheki emuva usuzoqhubeka.
title: Bagcwalise inkundla kuMlazi Picnic

text: Ngicela ongangisiza enkingeni yami yokuthi ngilala nesilwane zonke izinsuku. Indlela okwenzeka ngayo sengize ngesabe nokuyolala ngoba lesi silwane siyangidovadova senze nami ucansi ngenkani”.Uma abantu bezwa umuntu ekhala echaza inkinga yakhe yokuthi ugqilazwa yisilwane esilala naye ebusuku bavele bahleke bathi uyabheda. Iqiniso lithi umuntu olala nesilwane udinga ukudatshukelwa ngoba usuke engasibizanga ukuthi sizolala naye kodwa siyazifikela singene embhedeni silale naye ngenkani.Kuwukungabinalo uzwelo ukwenza ihlaya ngomuntu onenkinga yokubhuquziswa yisilwane kuthiwe, unamanga wenziwa ukucabanga kakhulu.Abantu abangazi bavamise ukubuza ukuthi kungabe isilwane siyameshela yini umuntu esifuna ukulala naye? Impendulo ithi cha, isilwane asizikhathazi ngokushela umuntu kodwa sivele siqabule sifake ulimi emlonyeni kube ongaphansi nongaphezulu sekuyiwa ocansini.Uma kungathiwa akuchazwe ngolimu oluqondile singathi abantu abanenkinga yokulala nesilwane sisuke sibadlwengula ngoba kusuke kungavunyelwene. Kubo bonke abantu asebake balala nesilwane basho into eyodwa ukuthi sifika kube sengathi uphupha kunomuntu eniwotawotana naye.Kulokho kuwotawotana kuthi uma sekungenwa enkonzweni yocansi kucace ukuthi akusiyena umuntu lona okulelwe naye ngoba isilwane sijika senze imigilingwane ekhombisayo ukuthi singumuntu ongemuntu.Kungabe lumnandi noma lubi ucansi olwenziwa yisilwane uma silele nabantu ebusuku? Impendulo ithi luyinto engachazeki ucansi olwenziwa yisilwane ngoba luletha ukujabula nokuphoxeka kumuntu. Uma lwenzeka uyajabula kube ongathi usocansini oluvutha amalangabi, uma usuqeda usubona ukuthi uwotawotwa yisilwane ufikelwa ukuphoxeka uzibone usetshenzisiwe.Kungabe kuyenzeka yini ukuthi umuntu alale nezilwane ezimbili ngesikhathi esisodwa? Impendulo ithi cha, akwenzeki ngoba izilwane ziyahloniphana Uma isilwane sikubona ukuthi ulala nesinye asibe sisazihlupha ngokulala nawe ngoba sisuke sikubona ukuthi ujola nesinye.Ngamanye amazwi kusho ukuthi alikho ishende lesilwane, uma unesilwane olala naso kufanele wazi siyolala nawe uyoze uyophunyuzwe wukufa.Kuzo zonke izinto ezibuhlungu emhlabeni ayikho ebuhlungu eyedlula ukuthi uthandane nomuntu olala nesilwane ulele naye embhedeni.Uthole ukuthi nisanda kulala niyazixoxela nilungiselela ukuya ocansini, uthi uyezwa isithandwa sakho sesiyahona sesibanga imisinjwana ekhombisa ukuthi sisocansini. Uma usibuza ukuthi kwenzenjani sikutshele ukuthi besicabanga ukuthi siya ocansini kanti siyaphupha.MaSolezwe impilo inzima lapha emnyango. Kunamadoda angakutshela ukuthi kubuhlungu kanjani ukuthi ulele nomuntu wesifazane umuzwe ekhala ekhaliswa yisilwane simfaka ulimu emlonyeni.Ngokunjalo kunabantu besifazane abangakuchazela usale unkemile uma bekwazisa ngobuhlungu bokuthi ulele nendoda embhedeni kodwa igqume iqqunyiswa yisilwane sikuncela amadlebe.Ngiyazi abantu bazothi uVolos unamanga uma ethi kuyenzeka umuntu alale enganayo iLove-bite kodwa avuke ekuseni esenayo yenziwe yisilwane. Kafushane ngithi, akufanele umuntu aphike athi ukulala nesilwane kuyinto engekho ngoba ngelinye ilanga uyowuzwa uKiss wesilwane simvuse ebuthongweni ngesinqandi esiqeda ubuthongo.
title: Ayikho into ebuhlungu njengokulala nesilwane

text: UMHOLI wenhlangano yabafundi ye-EFF, i-EFF Student Command KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Gazuzu Nduli, uthi kabangabazi ukuthi bazokwenza kahle okhethweni lwangonyaka ozayo ngemuva kwemiphumela yakamuva okhethweni lwabafundi ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.I-EFF Student Command isanda kunqoba ukhetho eDUT yathatha zonke izihlalo eziyisishiyagalombili ebezibangwa.Ukunqoba kweStudent Command eDUT, kulandele ukunqoba kwale nhlangano esikhungweni iTUT eMalahleni, eMpumalanga, nakwamanye amanyuvesi ezweni lonke.Engxoxweni neSolezwe izolo, uNduli uthe imiphumela abayithole eDUT naseTUT ikhombisa ukuthi bazoba yingozi okhethweni lwangonyaka ozayo.“Ne-ANC ukuze ikwazi ukungena kubantu emphakathini yaqala yangenisa kubafundi ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, njengoba nathi senza, iDUT eThekwini inabafundi abangaphezu kuka-30 000, njengoba laba bafundi besithembe ngevoti labo lapha esikhungweni bangaphinda futhi bavotela iqembu lethu noma sesisokhethweni ngonyaka ozayo,” kusho uNduli.Uthe basazoziphatha zonke izikhungo zaseKZN njengoba naseMangosuthu bebona sengathi bazonqoba.“Abafundi bakhathele inhlangano yabafundi iSasco ehambisana ne-ANC, manje sebencamela ukunika thina ivoti labo ngoba sebebonile ukuthi yithina esilwela izimfuno zabo ngaphandle kokwesaba. Uma ubheka abafundi ababoshwa kakhulu ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakame abeStudent Command, ngikhuluma nawe nje namhlanje kade ngisecaleni njengoba ngiboshelwe icala lokuhola isiteleka eDUT ngesigamu sonyaka esedlule. Omunye uzakwethu uBonginkosi Khanyile naye udonse izinyanga ejele waze watholwa enecala lokulwela abafundi. Uma sekuvotwa abafundi bayazikhumbula zonke lezo zinto yingakho bevotela thina,” kusho uNduli.Umkhulumeli we-EFF kuzwelonke, uDkt Mbuyiseni Ndlozi,, uthe ukunqoba kwabo ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme kukhombisa ukuthi i-EFF isazophatha eNingizimu Afrika.“Laba bafundi abasezikhungweni zemfundo ephakame yibona abazophinde basivotele noma sekunokhetho ezweni,” kusho uNdlozi.
title: Abe-EFF nethemba lokuwina ukhetho

text: SIMPHIWE NGUBANEKULINDELEKE sikhule isibalo sababoshwayo ecaleni lenkohlakalo, ukukhwabanisa, nokushintshana ngemali ngokungemthetho elithinta ithenda kaR47 million yezindawo okwakuhlaliswe khona amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal ngesikhathi seNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2010.Uphiko lwabaphenyi i-Investigative Directorate (ID) leNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA) lithi lizobopha abanye abahlanu phezu kwabantu abane eselibabophile ngaleli cala.Kwababoshiwe kukhona owayengukhomishana wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Mmamonnye Ngobeni, ababengamaphoyisa uColonel Navin Madhoe noCaptain Aswin Narainpersad nosomabhizinisi uMnuz Thoshan Panday.Kusolwa amaphoyisa ngokuhlangana noPanday ukuze athole ithenda. UNkk Ngobeni unukwa ngenkohlakalo ngoxhaso alunikwa uPanday ngomcimbi wosuku lokuzalwa komyeni wakhe. Kuthiwa akakudalulanga lokhu okuyinto elindelekile emaphoyiseni futhi usolwa ngokuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho.Icala lalaba basolwa abane beliseNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini ngoMsombuluko lahlehliselwa uMeyi 27 okuwusuku abayovela ngalo nabasolwa abahlanu okulindeleke baboshwe.Laba basolwa abane bebengekho siqusabo enkantolo kodwa bebemelwe ngabameli babo.Okhulumela i-ID, uNksz Sindiswe Twala, uthe abasolwa abahlanu bazoboshwa noma kunini, bese bevela okokuqala enkantolo yesiFunda eThekwini ngoMeyi 7.UNksz Twala uthe bobayisishiyagalolunye abasolwa bazobe sebevela  ndawonye enkantolo enkulu ngoMeyi 27. Uthe abazoboshwa babesebenzisana noPanday.“Icala lithinta izinsolo zenkohlakalo ethinta ukuqashwa kwendawo okwakuhlaliswe kuyo amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal ngesikhathi seNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2010,” kusho uNksz Twala.UPanday usolwa nangokuhlangana noMadhoe, bazama ukufumbathisa uR2 million owayeyinhloko yoKlebe KwaZulu-Natal, uGeneral Johan Booysen, ukuze anyathele ngezinyawo uphenyo ngabo.UPanday ungaphandle ngebheyili kaR100 000, uNkk Ngobeni wakhululwa ngekaR20 000, uMadhoe noNarainpersad banikwa ekaR10 000 umuntu emunye. Bonke bazinikela emaphoyiseni ngo-Okthoba nyakenye. I-ID ithi seyanikwa nesitifiketi sokuba yengeze icala lokushintshana ngemali ngokungemthetho yinhloko yeNPA, u-Advocate Shamila Batohi, njengoba ikholelwa ukuthi kwahlalwa phansi kwahlelwa ukuqhutshwa kwalo mshikashika.Kulindeleke kubizwe ofakazi ababalelwa ku-184 kuleli cala.
title: Kuzoboshwa abanye ngecala lethenda yezigidi

text: UMNDENI wobengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma nalabo abamesekayo, bathi isibami emphinjeni indaba yabantu abakhuluma ukuthanda kwabo ngokugula kwakhe, bemsola nangokuzenzisa.Indaba isuswe wukuthi uZuma bekufanele avele phambi kwekhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana kodwa kwathiwa akaphilile kahle, angase angaveli.Usihlalo weKhomishini, iJaji uRaymond Zondo, uzamukele izethulo zabameli bakaZuma abebebika ukuthi uzoke ayoxilongwa kabanzi ngenyanga ezayo.Indodana kaZuma, u-Edward ithe kuyabacasula ukuthi kunabantu abathi uyise uyazigulisa ngoba egwema ukuvela kwikhomishini.“Indaba yokugula ixoxwa nekhomishini ngendlela yakhona, manje asazi ukuthi abantu bakuthathaphi lokhu abakushoyo? Asinaso isikhathi sokulokhu siphendula umbhedo wabantu,’’ kusho u-Edward.NgoJulayi wonyaka odlule uZuma uke wavela kwikhomishini kodwa wabuye wadikila, ekhala ngokuthi akeneme ngendlela ayejijimezwa ngayo ngemibuzo. Emuva kwalokho waphutha izikhawu ezimbili kufanela avele, kwabekwa izizathu ezahlukene.Ummeli kaZuma, u-Advocate Thabani Masuku, uthe asikho isidingo sokuthi ikhasimende lakhe lithunyelelwe incwadi elibizela kwikhomishini ngoba bazimisele ngokuxoxisana noZondo esithe ukuze bamlandise ngesimo sempilo kaZuma.Okhulumela uMkhonto WeSizwe Veterans Association, uMnuz Carl Niehaus, ehambisana noMnuz Nkosentsha Shezi weRadical Economic Transformation Champions, bathe ayingakhulunywa budedengu indaba yokugula kukaZuma.“Siyazi thina ukuthi kunomkhankaso wokuthi uZuma aphonswe ejele ekubeni lo muntu uchithe impilo yakhe yonke esebenzela isizwe.“Ikhomishini ibunjelwe ukuthi inekele umhlaba ukuthi uZuma aziwe njengomuntu ongcolile, hhayi ngoba befuna ukuthola iqiniso,’’ kusho uShezi.
title: Bacikwa abathi uZuma uyazigulisa

text:
ZAKHELE XABAUZITHWESE ijoka lokuwubhala kabusha umlando nge-Afrika umshayisibhakela othwelwe ngeqoma ukunqoba umqhudelwano weNashua Cruiserweight Super Eight, Last Man Standing osukuvuthondaba.UZack Mwekassa 
(osesithombeni) odabuka eDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC) utshele 
Isolezwe ukuthi abantu abambona njengozodla umhlanganiso kulo mqhudelwano ohlelwe yiGolden Gloves Promotions abadukile ngoba uzowusebenzisa ukuziphendlela indlela ebheke ekubekeni izwekazi i-Afrika ebalazweni lomhlaba.Lo mshayisibhakela oqeqeshwa nguCollin Nathan nosezinze kuleli, uzotholana phezulu noDanie Venter kowandulela owamanqamu e-Emperors Palace ngoSepthemba 22. Emzuliswaneni wokuqala wehlule uDaniel Bruwer ngoJuni 16. Isikhulu seGGP uRodney Berman siveze ukuthi ngaphandle kokuthi umshayisibhakela ozonqoba uzohlabana ngo-R250 000 kodwa uzophinde amele i-Afrika kuWBC Cruiserweight World Cup ezoba ngonyaka ozayo. Lo mqhudelwano uzovulela ozodla umhlanganiso ithuba lokulwela izicoco zeWBC ne-IBO.“E-Afrika sinakho konke okudingekayo ukuphumelela esibhakeleni somhlaba kodwa siyehluleka ngenxa yokuzithwala. Abashayisibhakela base-Afrika bayazikhukhumeza uma benqobe isicoco emazweni abo noma esase-Afrika,” kusho uMwekassa.UMwekassa useke wayizwa impumelelo esibhakeleni kwazise ngo-2007 wanqoba isicoco seWBF Inter-continental Cruiserweight kodwa samphunyuka engasivikelanga. Wazama ukubuya ngeseWBF Cruiserweight ngo-2008 kodwa wehlulwa ngu-Jozsef “Hangman” Nagy waseHungary.“Emuva kokunqoba iWBF ngazithwala, ngazibona sengimkhulu kunawo wonke umuntu. Ngayeka ukujima ngaxabana nomqeqeshi wami. Sagcina sihambile isicoco sami ngalokho futhi ngiyazisola,” kusho uMwekassa obelokhu ebonga uMdali ngokuthola ithuba lesibili lokubuyela esicongweni.Nokho lo mshayisibhakela osekuvele ukuthi amaphanta aphendukezela amaphakethe ebhejela yena uyazi ukuthi indlela yakhe iqala kuVenter owaziwa ngodalimede bezibhakela ezixegisa idolo.“Ngebhadi ngimlindile, ngeke alibone elidlalayo. Ngimlinde ngayo yonke indlela. Emuva kwempi uzohlala phansi ecabange ngekusasa lakhe kwezamankomane ngoba uzobe eshayekile,” kusho yena.Kwenye impi uThabiso “The Rock” Mchunu uzobhekana noFlo “The Demolition Man” Simba. Ngalo lolu suku uHekkie “Hexecutioner” Budler uzovikela isicoco sakhe se-IBO minimumweight kuFlorante “Genius” Condes wasePhillines. USipho “Tsunami” Taliwe uzovikela ibhande leWBC International kuMzonke “The Rose Of Khayelitsha” Fana.
title: UMwekassa ufuna isicoco

text: OWAYENGUMENGAMELI wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma usazolinda uphenyo lweKhomishana kaJaji Raymond Zondo ngezinsongo zokubulawa abhekene nazo ngaphambi kokuba afake isicelo sokuba kwengezwe ezokuPhepha kuye.Lokhu kuvezwe umkhulumeli wakhe, uMnuz Vukile Mathabela emuva kokuba kube nezinhlangano eziphazamise ukuba kuqiniswe ezokuphepha kuZuma, ummeli wakhe u-Advocate Muzi Sikhakhane nomndeni wakhe uZuma.“UJaji uZondo ukucacisile kwikhomishini yakhe ukuthi lolu daba lwezinsongo zokubulawa ezibhekiswe kuZuma zizophenywa abaphenyi bekhomishini ukuze bathole ukuthi ziqhamukaphi.“Kuyothi uma sebesithulele umbiko bese uMengameli Zuma ethatha isinyathelo. Okwamanje lukhona uhlelo lwamaphoyisa ngokuphepha kukaZuma njengoba amaphoyisa ehlale emqaphile,” kuchaza uMathabela obexoxa neSolezwe. NgeSonto eledlule, inhlangano elwisana nezimpi zamatekisi KwaZulu-Natal okuwuBumbano lokuThula Forum, iphakamise ukuthi kuqiniswe ezokuphepha kuZuma. Ikusho lokhu esitatimendeni sayo emuva kokuba uZuma edalule kwiKhomishini kaZondo ukuthi kukhona abasongela ngokumbulala nomndeni wakhe.Usihlalo woBumbano lokuThula, uMnuz Andile Hlatshwayo, uthe babona kuyisikhathi sokuba uZuma avikelwe ngoba sekuyacaca ukuthi impilo yakhe isengozini.“Ngemuva kwezinkulumo ezethulwe uZuma kuKhomishini yokuLawulwa kombuso yiDlanzana ngoLwesibili, kusicacele thina njengoBumbano ukuthi uyakudinga ukuthola ezokuphepha ezengeziwe kulezi anazo. Yingakho sicela kuMengameli wezwe uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa ukuba alubukisise lolu daba ngoba angeke sibe nokuthula uma kubakhona okwehlela uZuma,” kusho uHlatshwayo.Kule khomishini uZuma uveze ukuthi kuye kwafona umuntu ongaziwa kumsizi wakhe obhekene nezindaba zakhe ku-ANC esabisa ngokuthi bazobulala uZuma nomndeni wakhe kanye nommeli wakhe okungu-Advocate Muzi Sikhakhane.Lezi zinsolo uZuma abeziveza bezilandela nezinye azidalule ngoMsombuluko zokuthi kwakunetulo elaphekwa izinhlaka ezithile lokuba asocongwe emcimbini kaKhuzani owawungoMashi eMoses Mabhida Stadium.Inhlangano eyeseka uZuma, okuyi-Radical Economic Transformation (RET) nayo inanele ikhwelo loBumbano yathi ifuna uZuma avikelwe kuphinde kuqiniswe ezokuphepha kwakhe ngoba ayisathembi lutho.UMnuz Nkosentsha Shezi we-RET, uthe bashaqekile ngezinsongo ezidalulwe uZuma kwiKhomishini kaZondo.“Okwamanje asikalibhaleli ihhovisi likaMengameli nelikaNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa ukuze bahlinzeke uZuma ngezokuphepha ezengeziwe kodwa sifuna avikelwe manje nomndeni wakhe ngoba basengozini. Empeleni sekuyacaca ukuthi kade uZuma abasengozini kodwa inkinga ukuthi abafisa ukumsoconga bayehluleka ukuthola ithuba elikahle,” kusho uShezi. Uthe uZuma ungubaba we-Radical Economic Transformation abafisa avikelwe ngakho konke ukuze aphephe.Le nhlangano yiyo eqashe amabhasi abethwele abantu abebesuka KwaZulu-Natal beyokweseka uMnuz Jacob Zuma ngesikhathi evela okokuqala ngoMsombuluko kwiKhomishini kaZondo. Okhulumela uMengameli, uNkk Khusela Diko, ucele ukuba athunyelelwe umyalezo ngalolu daba kodwa ugcine engaphendulanga kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.
title: UZondo uzocubungula ekaZuma

text: UYASHUBA umbango womhlaba okunepulazi lamoba kuwo kulandela ukushiswa kwemenenja yaleli pulazi eliseMthwalume, ngase-Ifafa Beach eSouth Coast. Imenenja, ecele ukungadalulwa ngoba isabela impilo yayo, inqabile ukukhuluma ngokuyihlele ngoLwesihlanu ekuseni kuleli pulazi ihlaselwa amalungu omphakathi angaziwa. Leli pulazi lama-hactre awu-7500 futhi elibiza ngaphezulu kukaR300 million lingaphansi kweMathulini Communal Property Association neNdelo Community Trust. Inkosi Bhekizizwe Luthuli, ekhulumela iMathulini Community Property Association, ithe abantu abangaziwa bashise ingxenye yepulazi base bephosa imenenja yalo emlilweni. ULuthuli, oyilungu lePhalamende, uthe lawa malungu omphakathi asezame kaningi ukuthola lo mhlaba athi ungowawo kodwa angaphumelela. “Imenenja yalaliswa esibhedlela ngemuva kokusha. Amapulazi ayingxenye omhlaba owabuyiselwa kubantu ngokusemthethweni. Lokhu kuhlaselwa kwakamuva kuyimizamo engekho emthethweni yokuthatha abahluleka ukukuthola ngendlela esemthethweni.” ULuthuli uthe lawa mapulazi aqashe abasebenzi abawu-1200. Uthe sebebhalele ungqongqoshe omusha wezoLimo, uNksz Thoko Didiza ukucela ukuthi angenelele ngokushesha kulolu daba. Okhulumela lo ungqongqoshe uPhuti Mabelebele uthe uzokwazi ukuphawula ngalolu daba namhlanje. ULuthuli uthe ithimba lamaphoyisa elijutshwe kule ndawo alenzi lutho ukunqanda udlame. USihlalo weNdelu Community Trust uthe bayazi ngamalungu omphakathi afuna ukubuyiselwa umhlaba kodwa awanabo ubufakazi obukhomba ukuthi wawungowawo. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uthe kuvulwe icala lokuhlaselwa komuntu ngenhloso yokumlimaza.
title: Iphonswe emlilweni imenenja yepulazi kubangwa umhlaba

text: Nokubongwa PhenyaneINTOKAZI yaKwaMakhutha kodwa ezalelwe kwa-B KwaMashu eThekwini, uJerodine Madlala (28), osehlelweni ama-Idols SA, isiveze ukuthi ilindele ukuzuza imiklomelo emibili kulo nyaka.UJerodine utshele Isolezwe ukuthi uzithwele yize isisu sakhe singakabonakali.Uthe njengoba ekulolu hlelo ulindele ingane nokuhlabana ngesicoco salo nyaka.Le ntokazi ikulabo abamele isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal kulolu hlelo.NgeSonto amajaji kulindeleke ukuthi amemezele abangu-10 kubona okuzophuma ozothatha isicoco sesizini ka-16, eqale ngo-Agasti kuMzansi Magic.“Nami kungithusile ukuthola ukuthi ngizithwele kodwa-ke ekhaya ikakhulukazi umama ungikhuthaze ukuthi akukho okwenzeka ngephutha konke kuwuhlelo lukaNkulunkulu, okuyikho okungenze ngathola umfutho ohlelweni. Akuwona umndeni wami kuphela kodwa nabo bonke esesisebenza nabo kulolu hlelo bangixhase ngendlela eyisimanga njengoba ukukhulelwa kungeyona into elula kodwa njalo ngivuka nginomdlandla wokwenza konke okumele ngikwenze ngalolo suku,” kusho uJerodine.Uveze ukuthi yingane yakhe yesibili lena, eyokuqala wayithola esasebenza emidlalweni yeshashalazi ehlukene.“Akukhona okokuqala ngizama inhlanhla kuma-Idols, ngake ngafika kodwa kwangangihambela kahle zisuka nje. Kulo nyaka bengiseMiami, e-USA ngesikhathi ngithola izindaba zokuthi kunenhlolokhono kulolu hlelo ngangenela, ngempela bangibiza. Ngijabule kakhulu ngebanga esengilihambile ngiyathemba ukuthi abantu baKwaZulu-Natal bazongixhasa, bangivotele ngifike lapho ngifisa ukufika khona,” kuchaza uJerodine.Kulolu hlelo uthe akufundile kuze kube manje ngukubekezela, ukulalela athemba ukuthi yikhona okumbeke lapho ekhona manje.“Ukukhulelwa ngeke kuze kungivimbe ekutheni ngizethembe ngiphinde ngizimisele, njalo ekuseni ngivuka ngzilolonge ngenxa yokuthi ngifuna ukuhlala nginomdlandla. Ngiyacela abantu baseKZN bangivotele,” kuchaza le ntokazi.Kuvela izindaba zokukhulelwa kukaJerodine nje, intokazi yaseThekwini uNdoni nayo ibelethe ngenyanga edlule.UNdoni ezokwenza inhlolokhono kwakucaca ukuthi uzithwele.
title: Ulindele ingane nokuhlabana okuma-Idols

text: BUYAPHELA ubumpohlo njengoba zizowushaya kumasikanda odume ngokubhikla ingoma kuzamazame isiteji. USgwebo Sentambo (35) uzogcagcelwa ngo-Ephreli 1 yisinqandamathe sakhe seminyaka engu-8 uNksz Bongiwe Sibisi (25) odabuka eNondweni, eNquthu.Lo mculi odume ngengoma ethi NjengoGcabashe, uthe konke kuhamba kahle ngamalungiselelo odwendwe lwakhe oluzoba kubo kwesakwaBiyela, eMpangeni. Uthe empeleni zintathu izingoduso zakhe kodwa uqala ngoMaSibisi okwamanje kodwa ufisa ukubathatha bonke.“UMaSibisi umuntu wami wakudala sinezingane ezimbili naye. Ngiyajabula uma sigcina sesishada. Bakhona nalaba abanye uyazi ngabo, sekuzophoqa ukuthi ngibathathe nabo ngoba ngeke ngibayise ndawo abami nabo," kusho uSgwebo. Uthe akanawo amahloni ngesithembu sakhe, waze wabala amagama ezingoduso okungoNksz Snethemba Zulu noNksz Noxolo Selepe, nathe uyabathanda ngokulinganayo bonke.Uthe lo mshado wakhe uzobe uzimaziswe amagoso engoma angabangani bakhe abakhulu oMasiniya noCelembanembazo Ngubane athe bazimisele ngokumxhasa. Leli ciko lake lakhipha ingoma ethi Ihawu eyayikhuluma ngodaba lukaNgizwe Mchumu woKhozi FM owayemangalela umsebenzi wasesikhumulweni sezindiza ngendaba yehawu.Ucele nezinsizwa ukuba ziphelele ziziphathe zonke izinduku zazo zizobukela ngoba ungumuntu othanda into yesintu enhle.Ethintwa umakoti uNksz Sibisi ngalolu daba uthe, ujabule uyafa usejahe kabi ukugcagcela kubo kwale nsizwa asebedonse nayo isikhathi eside.“Ngiyakhumbula sihlangana eGoli engitshela ukuthi uyangithanda, ngiyajabula ukuthi useyazifeza isethembiso sakhe. Ekhaya bajabule kakhulu ukuthi sengiyogana,ngizoqala ukucimela maduze nje. Nginethemba lokuthi konke kuzoba yimpumelelo othandweni lwethu," kusho uNksz Sibisi ngesizotha.
title: Ziyawushaya kumaskanda wodumo

text: KUPHENYWA amacala amabili okubulala emuva kokubulawa kowesifazane nowesilisa ngoMgqibelo eMhlanga, okusolwa ukuthi bebeyizithandani.Lesi sigameko senzeke ngezithuba zabo 1 emini ngaseSomerset Park, eMhlanga. Kuthiwa abasolwa bavulele ngenhlamvu emotweni obekukhona kuyo owesifazane oshonele endaweni yesigameko kwathi owesilisa washonela esibhedlela.UMnuz Shawn Herbst, okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo kwaNetcare 911, uthe owesifazane obesesihlalweni esingaphambili utholwe eseshonile.“Owesilisa ubenenxeba lokudutshulwa ekhanda, esesimeni esingagculisi, waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.” kusho yena.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe kubonakale izimoto ezimbili zigijima ngokweqile ngaseMhlanga. Uthe obesemotweni yabasolwa uvulele ngenhlamvu kwenye imoto abebelandelana nayo.UNaicker uthe owesifazane oneminyaka elinganiselwa ku-30, ushonele endaweni yesigameko kwathi owesilisa washona efika esibhedlela.“Kuvulwe amacala amabili okubulala aphenywa esiteshini samaphoyisa eDurban North,” kusho uNaicker.Kwesinye isigameko esicishe sifane, kudutshulwe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-30 eWestville ngoLwesihlanu ntambama.UMnuz Russel Meiring okhulumela abakwa-ER24, uthe bafice imoto encane iphakathi komgwaqo, imbobombobo yizinhlamvu. Uthe owesilisa obesemotweni ubenamanxeba amaningi okudutshulwa, waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.
title: Kuphenywa ngabathelwe ngezinhlamvu babulawa

text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns uPitso Mosimane ubongele umdlali wakhe wasesiswini u-Andile Jali ngokushaya into ecokeme ngenkathi iqembu lakhe libhuquzisa i-Otoho d’ Oyo ngo 4-0 emdlalweni weCAF Champions League eLucas Masterpieces Moripe Stadium ngomgqibelo ebusuku.  Ukuthola ikhadi elibomvu kukaHlompo Kekana emdlalweni womlenze wokuqala lapho iDowns ihlulwa ekuhambeni ngo 1-0 kuvulele uJali ithuba lokuthi azibonakalise kuPitso kanye nakubalandeli beqembu. UMosimane ubophele uJali kanye noRivaldo Coetzee enkabeni yesisu, kwazise uCoetzee udlala ngokuzimisela selokhu waguqulwa njengomdlali wasemuva wenziwa injini yasesiswini. UMosimane ukhuthaze uJali ukuba asebenze ngokuzikhandla ukuze ezothola umgqigqo aphinde aqaphele umbango wejezi eqenjini. “UJali ukwazile ukugcina ibhola. Ubephasa kahle kanti ube nomdlalo omuhle. Ukukhombisile ukuthi usezingeni elifanele. Kumele imkhuthaze indlela adlale ngayo. Akumele ajahe ngoba umbango wejezi ushube kakhulu, abadlali engibadlalisa esiswini basadlala kahle. Sibeke uMabunda ebhentshini, akusikho ukuthi akadlali kahle. Bengifuna ukunikeza uJali ithuba lokuzibonakalisa aphinde athole nomgqigqo," kusho uMosimane. Umbango wejezi ushubile kwiDowns njengoba iningi labadlali basesiswini okubalwa kubo uSammy Seabi, Oupa Manyisa, Lucky Mohomi kanye noTiyani Mabunda bebanga indawo yokudlala eqenjini. Ukugqunywa kwabadlali sekudalele uPitso amazinyo abushelelezi kubalandeli bebhola abaningi, njengoba uManyisa kanye noMohomi bevamise ukuhlala nezihlwele emdlalweni yeDowns kanti uMabunda ushikisha ibhetshi selokhu kuqale isizini. USeabi odlale umdlalo weDowns ibambana neChippa United, uthengwe kwiPolokwane City ekuqaleni kwesizini njengoba uPitso egcizelele ukuthi uzomsebenzisa emdlalweni yeCAF Champions League ngenxa yobude bakhe. IDowns engakahlulwa selokhe kuqale isizini, izobhekana neBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni we-ABSA Premiership eDr Molemela Stadium ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.
title: UPitso uhlabeke umxhwele ngoJali

text: Uthando aluve luyinkinga ngoba luyaluthana futhi lukwenza ungaboni noma sekudlalwa ngawe.Kunabantu abacabanga ukuthi basothandweni kanti bayasetshenziswa nje kuphela. Kunabantu abashelwayo baze baqome bezitshela ukuthi bayathandwa kanti cha umjita uzifunela ukukulala nje maqede kuphele kanjalo ngawe, akhohlwe nawukuthi konje kukhona umuntu okuthiwa uwena, ngisho uthi umshayela ucingo akuzibe sengathi akakwazi.Yebo, kubuhlungu ukusetshenziswa ocansini maqede ushiwe kanjalo ngoba kukwenza uzibone ungelutho futhi kuqeda nokuzithemba.Namhlanje ngifuna ukuxwayisa abantu besifazane ngalolu hlobo lwamadoda azifunela ucansi nje kuphela nokuthi uyibona kanjani indoda enenhloso yokudovadova umzimba wakho maqede ikushiye kanjalo.Kuyiqiniso ukuthi akulula neze ukubona uhlobo lwale ndoda yingakho kumele ube ngowesifazane ohlakaniphile ukuze ukwazi ukuhlukanisa umuntu okuthandayo nomuntu ozokulala nje kuphela.Namhlanje ngizonika abesifazane amasu okuthi yiziphi izimpawu okumele baziqaphele endodeni ezodlala ngemizwa yabo.1. Indoda efuna ukukulala ikushiye uyizwa iqala nje ukuvula umlomo ukuthi ayinanhloso yothando. Ibelesela indaba yokuvakashelwa hhayi ukuthi ikukhiphe.2. Uma uyinike inombolo yakho ayifoni kodwa ithumela imiyalezo kuWhatsApp.3. Uma kwenzekile yafona ifona ebusuku kuphela nakhona ikubuza imibuzo engasile njengokuthi ugqokeni, ulele nobani?4. Ayinqeni ukukucela izithombe zakho unqunu ngisho ningakavumelani ngokuthandana.5. Uma sekwenzekile wayiqoma ngoba uzitshela ukuthi iyakuthanda, ayikho enye into esile eyixoxa nawe ngaphandle kokuthi uyivakashele.6. Uma usuyivakashelile ayibi naso isikhathi sakho, ihlezi ithi imatasa ngisho uyifonela ithi izobuyela kuwe.7. Uma kade uyivakashele anixoxi ngezinto eziya phambili kodwa nje kuba yindaba yomkhuba phambili.8. Ayikubuzi nokuthi uhambe kanjani kodwa ize iphinde ikhulume nawe ngoba isifuna uyivakashele futhi.9. Uma kumakhaza noma lina ubona ngayo ikubingelela, isho nokuthi ayisakwazi ucashephi?10. Emuva kokuthi isikulalile ayinqeni ukuthi icela uhambe ngoba unina wengane yayo usethe uyeza.Uma ungumuntu wesifazane qaphela indoda ezokuqambela amanga eqonde ukuzophula umoya wakho.
title: Mbone umlisa oze ngothando nokuhalelayo

text: SIZOPHUMA ngoLwesihlanu isinqumo sokuthi umfundisi webandla i-Enlightened Christian Gathering (ECG), uShepherd Bushiri nonkosikazi wakhe uMary, bayanikezwa noma cha ibheyili.Izolo laba abasolwa ngokukhwabanisa imali engaphezu kukaR106 million bavele nabanye abasolwa nabo, uMnuz Willah Mudolo, Nkk Zethu Mudolo noNksz Landiwe Sindani.Laba bavele enkantolo yeMantshi ePitoli izolo befaka isicelo sebheyili.Icala libe selihlehliselwa uLwesihlanu ukuze kuphume isinqumo ngesicelo sabo sebheyili.Laba baboshwa ngeledlule.Abazalwane abaseka laba bebengaphandle kwenkantolo becula, bephethe nezingqwembe ezibhalwe ukuthi bayabaseka noma beboshiwe.Kwelinye icala elihlukile usomabhizinisi owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu enkampanini iBosasa, uMnuz Angelo Agrizzi, naye ufakelwe ngabameli bakhe, abaholwa nguMnuz Daniel Witz, isicelo sokudlulisa isinqumo sokumnwebela ibheyili enkantolo yaseGoli izolo.Icala lihlehliselwe uLwesihlanu, nokulindeleke ukuba inkantolo ikhiphe isinqumo ngesicelo sakhe.U-Agrizzi naye ungene esitokisini ngeledlule ngemva kokunqatshelwa ibheyili ngamacala enkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.Kuyimanje ulaliswe esibhedlela esizimele ngenxa yokugula emva kokungena ejele.Ithimba labameli bakhe likhala ngokuthi ukumgcina esitokisini kungenza isimo sakhe sempilo sibe sibi kakhulu njengoba evele enezifo ezingamahlalakhona.
title: Isinqumo ngebheyili kaBushiri ngoLwesihlanu

text: IZINKAKHA zikanobhutshuzwayo zincoma isenzo seMamelodi Sundowns sokusayinisa injini u-Andile “Gattuso” Jali, okuthe ngoLwesihlanu ntambama yamemezela ukuthi lomdlali obekuthiwa ucuthelwe yiKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates usengene emabhukwini aseChloorkop.U-Ian Palmer noJohnny “Black Sunday” Masegela, bobabili abadlala kwiPirates nasebegxile ekuqeqesheni bayavumela ngokuthi kube yisinqumo esephusile esithathwe yiSundowns ukusayinisa uJali.Bexoxa neSolezwe ngeSontobathi lomdlali nakuba ezowenza umehluko kodwa uhlalelwe umsebenzi omkhulu wokusebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuze akwazi ukungena khaxa eqenjini labadlali abasuke bezoqala umdlalo.Enaba uPalmer uthe: “Angingabazi ukuthi uPitso (Mosimane umqeqeshi weSundowns) umsayinise ngoba esecabange kahle ukuthi uzomsebenzisa kanjani. Bamsayinise kahle ngoba usengumdlali onolwazi futhi osenamava kunokuba ayesadlala kwiPirates.Nomakunjalo kodwa isitatimende asenzile ngokumsayinisa kwakhe lapho ethi khona akusho ukuthi uzovele azingenele eqenjini elidlalayo kukhomba khona ukuthi lomdlali uhlalelwe umsebenzi onzima kakhulu."Endaweni adlala kuyona kukhona uHlompho (Kekana), Tiyani Mabunda, Oupa Manyisa noLucky Mohomi okufanele abange nabo indawo, okufakazela khona ukuthi ngeke kube lula ukuthola ijezi uma ezozithela ngabandayo,”UJali (28), usayineiminyaka emihlanukwiSundowns bekubhekekeaye kwiChiefs nokutheekugcineni wabona kungcono ukuyodlalela iSundowns esithanda ukuyenza ikhaya layo imidlalo yeCAF Champions League nokungenzeka ukuthi yikhona okube nefuziyela esinqumeni sakhe sokudlalela iqembu lenjinga uPatrice Motsepe.Enanela uMasegela uthe: “Kuyakhombisa ukuthi abaqeqeshi beSundown abasayinisi umdlali ngoba nakhu sekwiyisikhathi sokusayinwa kwabo, kodwa kuhlalwa phansi kuchithwe ubuchopho.“ISundowns isiyiqembu eselinesikompilo yalo ngokusayinwa kwabadlali.“Angingabazi ukuthi noJali akuvelanga kwavuka ekuseni kwathathwa isinqumo sokuthi uzosayiniswa.“Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi bahlale phansi balucubungula udaba lwakhe ngaphambi kokuthi kufinyelelwe esinqumeni sokumsayinisa.“Engikwaziyo ngoPitso wukuthi ngisho sisakhula naye edlalela iRockville Hungry Lions mina ngidlala kwiRockville Santos, saphinde safunda naye eSekano-Ntoane High School, eSenaoane, wayevele engumuntu owukhonzile umdlalo webhola ngenhliziyo yakhe yonke. Yonke into ethinta lomdlalo wayefuna yenzisiswe.”UMasegela ugcizelele wathi: “UJali okufanele akulindele ukuthi ngeke kubelula ukuthatha ijezi kwiSundowns efika ngoba isiyiqembu elinendlela yalo yokudlala okungelula ukuthi umdlali ofikayo avele ayibambe kalula, ngaphandle kokuthi asebenze ngokuzikhandla. Bheka ukuthi uManyisa ufike ephuma kwiPirates kwaziwa ukuthi uyinkunzi kodwa kuze kube yimanje akakasibambi kahle.”Sisekuzona ezaseChloorkop umengameli waleli qembu usekuphindile lokho lokutetemukisa ithimba labaqeqeshi ukuya eRussia ukuyobuka iNdebe yoMhlaba.“Ivangeli elihlale lishunyayelwa umengameli weqembu elokunqoba yonke i-Afrika.“Njalo uhlale efuna abaqeqeshi bakhe bahlome ngezindlela ezintsha zokudlala ezingasiza iqembu lakhe ekutheni libengcono. Ngaleyondlela yingakhoehambisa abaqeqeshi beqembu ukuyobuka iNdebe yoMhlaba ukuze babone kahle ukuthi abanye abaqeqeshi badlalisa kanjani,” kusho uThulani Thuswa obhekene nezokuxhumana eChloorkop.
title: Izinkakha zincoma ukusayiniswa kukaJali kwiDowns

text: U-TBO Touch ufuna ukuthatha isikhala sesiteshi sezindaba esizovuleka ngokuvuselelwa kwentontileka ye-ANN7 ephethwe abakwaGupta yiMultichoice ngo-Agasti.UTouch owaduma ngokuba ngumsakazi kwiMetro FM nongumsunguli weTouch HD udalule lezi zindaba ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Ubhale kuTwitter ukuthi: “Sishintsha ukwenza manje. Sengithumele isicelo nemizamo yokuthola igunya lokusakaza izindaba nsukuzonke kwaDStv, Multichoice. Lesi siteshi sezindaba sizokhiqizwa yiMillenial Black Perspective. Asizibuki izindaba ngoba azisifundisi kodwa ziyasilulaza. Ngilinde isikhulu esiphezulu singifonele sinazo zombili izinamba zami.”Yize ebhale kanje uTouch kodwa imithombo yeSolezwe ngeSonto iveze ukuthi ayikho le nto ayishoyo.“UTouch udlala ngabantu ngale nkulumo yakhe ngoba kwaMultichoice abakamemezeli emphakathini ngabakufunayo kumuntu omnyama ozongena kulesi sikhathi,” kusho umthombo.IGeneral Manager for Corporate Affairs kwaMultichoice uMnuz Jackie Rakitla, ithe okwamanje abakasikhiphi isimemezelo sokulethwa kwezicelo.Ethintwa uTbo Touch uthe uzimisele ukujika ukwenza kwezezindaba uma enikwa ithuba.“Ngizimisele ukwenza okuningi okuhle nokungajika indlela abantu ababuka ngayo izindaba, uma nginganikwa ithuba. Okwamanje ngisalindile ukuzwa ukuthi bathini ngesicelo sami,” kusho uTouch.UTouch uqhube wathi ulinde impendulo kwiziphathimandla zakhona kwiDStv ephethwe yiMultichoice njengoba ziveze ukuthi zidinga isiteshi esengamelwe ngumuntu omnyama.Lezi zindaba zidale inhlokomo kubantu abaningi bebodwa abebemjabulela behalalisa kodwa abanye bengakholwa bethi ufuna ukubukwa.Isikhala esifiswa nguTbo Touch sivuleke ngenxa yokugqabuka yokumekezela kwabakwaMultichoice ukuthi ngeke basivuselele isivumelwano sokuqhubeka nokusakaza i-ANN7 kuDStv kusukela ngo-Agasti.I-ANN7 isiphethwe nguMzwanele Manyi emuva kokudayiswa umndeni wakwaGupta.UTbo Touch useke wasebenzela umskazo ohamba phambili eNew York iHot 97. Ngaphandle kokugxila kwezomsakazo unebhizinisi eligxile emawayinini. Nyakenye uke waphusha umkhankaso omhlulile wokwehlisa idata, nokuyinto anenkolelo yokuthi ingandisa isibalo sabalaleli bemisakazo etholakala online.
title: UTouch ucuthele isikhala se-ANN7

text: USTEVE “Mphathi” Komphela, oqeqesha iLamontville Golden Arrows, uthi abadlali bakuleli abaqoqi amava ngokwanele ngokufika behlale isikhashana emaqenjini aphesheya bese bebuyela ekhaya.UKomphela uthe isenzo salaba badlali asiwasizi neze amaqembu esizwe, kunalokho siyawalimaza ngokuthi abe nabadlali abangenawo amava okudlala emaligini asezingeni eliphezulu emhlabeni.UKomphela ukhulume kanje ngemuva kokugila izimanga kweqembu lesizwe lika-Under 20, Amajita, azibekisele indawo ngempumelelo kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ezokuba sePoland nonyaka.Iqembu, eliphekwa nguThabo Senong, lithole indondo yethusi kwi-Under 20 Africa Cup of Nations, ebidlalelwa eNiger yagoqwa ngempelasonto.Amajita ashaye iNigeria ngo 5-3 sekukhahlewa amaphenathi ngemuva kokuthi umdlalo uphele ngo 0-0.UKomphela umbongelile uSenong ngakwenzele ibhola laseNingizimu Afrika kodwa wadlulisa umyalezo kubadlali abangamavaka ababalekela inselelo yaphesheya kwezilwandle.“Asimbongele uThabo Senong neqembu lakhe. Ngiyawuthanda umkhuba wamaqembu esizwe amancane osekujwayeleka ukuthi aweqiwa Ndebe yoMhlaba.“Kuhle ukuthi abadlali bethu bahambele amazwe aphesheya beyodlala kuwona kodwa isifiso sami wukuthi sibe nenqwaba yabadlali abadlalela amaqembu amakhulu nahlonishwayo phesheya kwezilwandle. Lokho kuyowasiza kakhulu amaqembu esizwe ngamava okudlala esigabeni esiphezulu,” kusho uKomphela owanqoba isicoco seCosafa Under 20 neqembu lesizwe eminyakeni edlule.Phakathi kwabadlali balapha abahluleke bancama phesheya kwezilwandle singabala * -Andile “Gattuso” Jali ongumdlali weMamelodi Sundowns ezingamhambelanga kahle izinto eBelgium noLebogang Manyama ogijimela iKaizer Chiefs ohluleke waphetha eTurkey.
title: Akusizi ukuthi xinti phesheya: Komphela

text: INKOSIKAZI yesishoshovu se-ANC esadutshulwa sabulawa ngo-2017, uMnuz Sindiso Magaga, ithi ijabule ngokuboshwa kwabasolwa ngokubulala umyeni wakhe.NgoMgqibelo ebusuku kuboshwe iMeya yaseHarry Gwala nezikhulu ezimbili zomkhandlu, amaphoisa amabili ayengamaphoyisa ophiko lweTechnical Response Team (TRT) nomunye usomabhizisini. Bonke basolwa ngokuthinteka ekubulaweni kukaMagaqa.UNkk Gugu Magaqa ukhulume nephephandaba elinguzakwabo weSolezwe, iSunday Tribune, ngeSonto lapho aveze khona ukuthi kumvusele amanxeba ukuzwa ngokuboshwa kwalaba.“Noma lokhu kungivusele amanxeba, sijabule ukuthi kunenqubekela phambili kuleli cala. Siwumndeni sijabule ukuthi kukhona okwenziwayo. Kuyohlale kunzima njalo ukudlula kwakhe emhlabeni. Ubenakekela imindeni eminingi eMzimkhulu,” kusho uNkk Magaqa.UMagaqa, owayeyikhansela kumasipala waseMzimkhulu walalelwa unyendle wadutshulwa kule ndawo ngoJulayi 2017 kodwa waze washona ngoSepthemba.Kusolwa ukuthi wayephenya ngendaba yenkohlakalo ethinta ukulungiswa kwehholo iMemorial kulo masipala. Njengoba udaba lokubulawa kosopolitiki luphenywa ngokuhlanganyela yiminyango ehlukene okubalwa owamaphoyisa, owezobulungiswa neminye, okhulumela amaphoyisa uBrigadier Vishnu Naidoo uthe ngeke aphawule ngalolu daba ngoba bavikela uphenyo.Okhulumela uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uNksz Reneilwe Serero, ukuqinisekisile ukuboshwa kwesikhulu sikamasipala waseHarry Gwala kodwa wathi ngeke ande kakhulu.“Okwamanje angikwazi ukudalula igama laso size sivele enkantolo emahoreni angu-48 azayo,” kusho uNksz Serero.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi imeya ithathiwe yayophonswa imibuzo ngokufa kukaMagaqa.Abasolwa kulindeleke ukuthi bavele enkantolo yemantshi eMzimkhulu  ngoLwesibili.
title: Inkosikazi kaMagaqa ijabule ngokuboshwa kwabasolwa ngokumbulala

text: ISILO samabandla uGoodwill Zwelithini sinxuse omasipala ukuthi baqhamuke namasu okumelana nenkinga yokunqamuka kukagesi eNingizimu Afrika.Sikhuluma emcimbini esigodlweni sasoSuthu kwaNongoma lapho kade sihlangene khona neziphathimandla zikaMasipala weTheku naseKing Cetshwayo izolo, Isilo sithe kumele omasipala abakhulu bazame noma yisiphehli esisodwa KwaZulu-Natal esizosiza ukuthi kukhanye uma kuphela ugesi.Izikhulu zomkhandlu weTheku nezaseKing Cetshwayo beziyokotha Isilo ngokuzithula kusona.“Ngiyacela ukuthi inkinga kagesi niyibeke phambili, kungabi wukuthi nijabulela ukuthi niyasebenza nidla inyuku.”Sithe sike saya e-Wales lapho kusetshenziswa khona kakhulu ugesi osuselwa elangeni.“EWales kuyabanda, ilanga liyivela kancane kodwa banogesi osuselwa elangeni. Ungasebenza kahle kakhulu lapha eNingizimu Afrika ngoba kuyashisa.”Isilo sidonse osopolitiki ngendlebe sathi abayeke ipolitiki yobuqembuqembu ngoba ayibayisi ndawo abantu.“Ipolitiki eniyidlalayo ayibondli abantu kodwa yondla nina enisezikhundleni. Ngiyanixwayisa ukuthi akumele kuze kufike esigabeni lapho abantu begcina sebenizonda ngoba bethi anibenzeli lutho.”Sikhuze umkhuba wabantu wokucekela phansi impahla uma kukhona izinto abanganeme ngazo.Kusiphatha kabi ukubona abantu beshisa amafemu bentshontsha nezintambo kolayini bezitimela.Sithe zonke lezi zinto zibalekisa abatshalizimali ngoba ziveza isithombe esimbi ngezwe.Sinxuse omasipala ukuthi bafunde abantu ngokwamakhono ukuze kuliwe nendlala nokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi.IMeya yoMkhandlu weTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, ebihola ithimba laseThekwini ithe:“Ukusebenzisana kwethu neNdlunkulu kusuka kude kufakazelwa yidlinza leNdlovukazi eThekwini.”Ithe bekubalulekile ukuthi bazozithula eSilweni ngoba basebenza emhlabeni waso.IMeya yaseKing Cetshwayo, uNksz Nonhle Mkhulisi, ithe isifunda sabo sizibophezele ekufukuleni umnotho kwezokuvakasha besebenzisa umlando weSilo uCetshwayo.
title: Yizani namaqhinga azoqeda ukunqamuka kukagesi: iSilo

text: UMSHADO wabaculi bowokholo, uTakie Ndou nomkakhe uTakalani Chairo Ndou ulengela eweni. Lezi zindaba zidalulwe okokuqala uMfu Solomon Izang Ashoms ekhasini lakhe likaFacebook. "UTakie noTakalani Ndou ngabaculi abangungqaphambili kuleli. Okubuhlungu umshado wabo weminyaka emine usengcupheni. Kazi yiziphi izingqinamba ezibhekene nabaculi bowokholo emshadweni? Ngabe izilingo nemizabalazo yabo ihlukile kweyethu," kubuza uSolomon osehamba ethuka izinya kulezi zinsuku ngenxa yokwembula abefundisi izinqa. Lezi zithandani zizakhele udumo ngokuhlabelela ndawonye ingoma esihloko sithi Jesus We Love You. Ngokuthola kweSolezwe NgoMgqibelo, lezi zithandani sezineminyaka zihlala ngokwehlukana. Ethintwa uTakie uvumile ukuthi kuke kwaba nedimoni elihlasele umshado wabo kangangoba bake bahlala ngokwehlukana."Njengamanje sekuyindaba endala ngoba sesibuyelene. Abantu bakhuluma ngento endala kabi. Ngebhadi asikwazi ukubalawula ukuthi bathini ngathi.  Sesihlala ndawonye," kusho uTakie obuye wazakhela udumo ngesikhathi ecula neSpirit of Praise 7 engomeni ethi Una Ndavha Nane.Indaba yonakale uma esecelwa ukuba axhumanise intatheli nomkakhe njengoba abezishaya isifuba ngokuthi usebuyelene naye. Uvele wankwankwaza, wangena ezintangeni futhi wadla amazambane ashisayo kwacaca ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi. Yize kungacacile ngembangela yokuvaveka komshado wabo kodwa eminyakeni eyedlule kuke kwanamahlebezi okuthi uTakie uyaphinga. Imizamo yokuthola uTakalani ukuze aphawule igcine ingaphumelelanga. *UTakie Ndou uzobe eyisimenywa kwiVIP Invite kuMzansi Magic kusasa ngo-7 ebusuku.
title: Ulengela eweni umshado wabokholo

text: UMMELI kaNgizwe Mchunu okhonjwe indlela kuKhozi FM ngeledlule uthi namuhla bafake amaphepha eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini okuphikisa isinqumo seSABC.“Siyalusebenza udaba lukaNgizwe. Silungisa amaphepha asenkantolo, azolunga kusasa (namhlanje),” kusho ummeli uMnuz Vusi Tembe.“Siphikisa indlela okwenzeke ngayo nezizathu abazibekile ngokumxosha. Inkantolo yiyo ezonquma,” kusho uTembe.Uthe kuyabajabulisa ukubona indlela abantu abakhombisa ukweseka ngayo uNgizwe. Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abanye bathi kumele umsakazo umbuyise.Umholi weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uZwakele Mncwango, uthe bafuna ukwazi izizathu zokuxoshwa kukaNgizwe.Okhulumela iSABC, uNeo Momodu, uthe ngeke bazidalule izindaba zabo emphakathini. Uthe bahlonipha izinkontileka eziyimfihlo abazisayina nabasebenzi babo nezinkampani abasebenzisana nazo.“Angisho ukuthi angaxoshwa uma esephutheni. Ukhozi luyisiteshi somphakathi. Kuwumsangano ukuthi ngeke badalule ukuthi uxoshweleni. Umphakathi yiwo abanikazi besiteshi,” kushouMncwango.Uthe angakuqonda uma kuthiwa iSABC inqaba ukuphawula ngoba usaphenywa, yesaba ukuthi kuzophazamiseka uphenyo.“Ngikhuluma njengomlaleli lapha, ayihlangene neqembu. Kumele sazi singumphakathi ukuthi kwenzenjani bese siyahlulela thina. Kusishiya nemibuzo ukuthula kwabo. Isolezwe uma lingakuxosha aliphoqelekile ukuthi lisichazele ngoba yinkampani ezimele kodwa Ukhozi yisiteshi somphakathi. NoZuma (Jacob) ngesikhathi exosha ongqongqoshe safuna incazelo ngoba uhulumeni.”Uthe usazoya kofuna incazelo kubaphathi bomsakazo uma esethola ithuba.“Angivikeli uNgizwe lapha kodwa noma ngabe ubani izizathu besizozidinga. Abantu abalalela Ukhozi abafani futhi abacabangi ngendlela efanayo. Bangaze bamashe ngoba abanayo incazelo. Ukuchaza kweSABC kuyobe kungesikho ukumhlambalazayo. Yini efihlwayo?” kusho uZwakele.
title: Luya enkantolo enkulu olokuxoshwa kukaNgizwe

text: UNDUNANKULU wase-Western Cape, uNkk Helen Zille, uthi isimo sesomiso kulesi sifundazwe sesiphenduke inhlekelele. UZille umemezele lokhu namhlanje njengendlela yokuthi kuphuthunyiswe izindlela zokugwema ukuphela nya kwamanzi. Lesi simemezelo sizodluliselwa kwikhabhinethe yesifundazwe kuleli sonto lapho sizodingidwa khona. Ngo-2016 iKaroo neWest Coast yizindawo ezamenyezelwa njengeziyinhlekelele kulesi sifundazwe ngenxa yesomiso. Emnyakeni edlule kuleli izifundazwe ezihlukahlukene kuleli zibhekane nesimo esinzima sokushoda kwamanzi ngenxa yesomiso. Phakathi kwezifundazwe ezihlaselwe yisomiso kubalwa iFree State, iKwaZulu-Natal, North West, Limpopo, Northern Cape, Eastern Cape neWestern Cape.
title: Isimenyezelwe njengendawo yenhlekelele iWestern Cape

text: LUNGASE lubuyele enkantolo udaba lwababhekelele ukutakulwa kweSouth African Airways (SAA) nezinyunyana.Izolo iNational Union of Metalworkers of South Africa (Numsa) neSouth African Cabin Crew Association (Sacca) ziveze ukuthi zibhalele ababhekelele ukutakulwa kweSAA becela ukuthi bazise amalungu abo ngokwenzekayo ngaphambi kokushicilela umbiko wabo olindelwe ngoMashi 6.UNkk Phakamile Hlubi-Majola okhulumela iNumsa, uthe bavumelene neSacca ukuthi ababhekelele ukutakulwa kweSAA kufanele bazise abasebenzi konke okwenzekayo.“Amalungu ethu yiwona athintekayo kokwenzeka kwaSAA. Ababhekelele ukutakula inkampani abawatsheli lutho. Sifuna abasebenzi batshelwe okwenzekayo nezinhlelo zokuhlenga inkampani ukuze bakwazi ukuza neziphakamiso zabo,” kusho uNkk Hlubi-Majola.Uthe kumanje abasebenzi abazothinteka njengoba kuvalwe imizila yamabhanoyi ewu-11 banikwe izincwadi.“Amalungu ethu anikwe izincwadi eziwaphoqayo ukuthi avume ukusebenza amahora ancishisiwe. Azobe esebenza izinsuku ezintathu kuya kwezine ngesonto. Siwacelile ukuthi angazisayini lezi zincwadi ngoba kazihambisani nemithetho yezabasebenzi. Silungiselela ukuya enkantolo ukuze kuphoqwe laba ababhekelele ukutakula iSAA ukuthi balandele umthetho.”Uthe uma ababhekelele ukutakula iSAA bengaphenduli bazophoqeleka ukuthi baye enkantolo ukuze ikumise ukushicilelwa kombiko kwazise beyizinyunyana abazi ukuthi ubabekaphi abasebenzi.
title: Lungase lubuyele enkantolo olwabasebenzi baseSAA

text: sase-University of Cape Town (UCT) esabulawa uyaziqhelelanisa nemikhankaso efuna imali egameni lendodakazi yawo.Umndeni ka-Uyinene Mrwetyana esitatimendeni osithumelele abezindaba uveze ukuthi bacela umphakathi ukuthi ungaqali imikhankaso yokuqoqa imali noma ufake imali ezinhlelweni ezingagunyaziwe kusetshenziswa ngendlela okungeyiyo igama lendodakazi yawo nokuphatheka kabi komndeni.Esitatimendeni kuvela ukuthi kukhona izinhlelo ezaziwayo okusetshenziswa igama lika-Uyinene ukuze kuqoqwe imali, kusungulwe izinhlangano ezilwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane, ukubhalwa kwencwadi namanye amakhasi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Lo mndeni uveza ukuthi ukuqoqwa kwale mali kuzokwenza ukuthi abantu bacabange ukuthi iqoqwa ukuze ilekelele umndeni.“Umndeni ufisa ukucacisa ukuthi yize eminye imikhankaso inezinhloso ezinhle kodwa awuhambisani noma awuhlangani nokuqoqwa kwemali kusetshenziswa igama lika-Uyinene.”Umndeni ucele ukuzila ngokuthula ikakhulukazi njengoba umshophi owehlela * -Uyinene usemusha futhi kwakukhulunywa ngawo kwabezindaba, ezinkundleni zokuxhumana nasemphakathini.“Ukusebenzisa igama lika-Uyinene nokungahloniphi ukuzila komndeni kukhombisa ukungabi nozwelo nokungabi neqiniso noma ngabe inhloso yinhle,” kuqhuba isitatimende somndeni.Lesi sitatimende siveza ukuthi njengoba kawakumenyezelwe emngcwabeni, umndeni usezinhlelweni zokuqala inhlangano egameni lika-Uyinene.Umndeni uveze ukuthi uyazi futhi uyabonga ngezinhlelo ze-UCT, Kingswood College neRhodes University.
title: Bachitha imikhankaso efuna imali ngo-Uyinene

text: Sabelo NseleUMNDENI kamakadebona we-ANC uMnuz Petros Dlomo, uthi ukuzabalaza kwale ngwevu akuzange kuwuvulele amathuba okuphila impilo engcono.Lo mndeni ukhala ngokuthi impilo iselukhuni kuwona nakuba uDlomo anikela ngempilo yakhe elwa nohulumeni wobandlululo. Lokhu kushiwo ngesikhathi kunomngcwabo kaDlomo izolo eMpumalanga, eHammarsdale.UDlomo obengusihlalo we-ANC Veterans League KwaZulu-Natal, washona ngesonto eledlule ngemva kokugula. Ubeyikhansela kuMasipala waseThekwini.Indodana kaDlomo, uMnuz Sizwe Dlomo, ithe abazange bahlomule ngokuzabalaza kukayise. USizwe ukhale ngokushaywa indiva kwamalungu alo mndeni uma kukhishwa izindlu zomxhaso."Kuhlale kubhaliswa izindlu kodwa akekho noyedwa oseke wawuthola umxhaso. Sibane ezinganeni zikababa futhi sihlala emqashweni. Akekho noyedwa oseke wayithola indlu phezu kokuzabalaza kukababa," kukhala uSizwe.Uthe kuzoba nzima njengoba engasekho uyise, ngoba akekho osebenza kahle emdenini."Siyapatanisa ukuthola leyo misebenzi. Imisebenzi iyavela. Sigijimile kuleli zwe, sijulukile, siklwebhekile kodwa uma izinto ziqhamuka, zihamba ngale. Uzwa sekuthiwa obani sebeqashiwe. Uma uthi uyabuza, akekho okunika impendulo eqondile. Kunzima."UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uSihle Zikalala, nakuba bengenzanga okwanele ukuhlonipha igalelo likaDlomo, uthe kukhona abakwazile ukukwenza.Uthe bakwazile ukufaka igama likaDlomo ohlwini lwamakhansela e-ANC yize igama lakhe lalingaphakanyiswanga amagatsha e-ANC.
title: Umndeni kamakadebona ukhala ngokunganakwa yi-ANC

text: INGWEVU edlale kwiKaizer Chiefs nakwiBafana Bafana, uDoctor “16v” Khumalo, incoma umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane ngempumelelo kaPercy Tau eBelgium.UTau ugile izimanga kwisizini yakhe yokuqala eqenjini alidlalelayo laseBelgium, iRoyal Saint-Gilloise.Lesi sikhwishikhwishi esidlalele iSundowns eminyakeni edlule, sinqobe umklomelo womdlali ovelele iProximus League Player of the Season, eBelgium.Ugila lezi zimanga nje uTau, isizini yakhe yokuqala edlala phesheya kwezilwandle. Ushaye amagoli awu-13, wakha awu-13 emidlalweni ewu-33.Ngokusho kukaKhumalo, kufanele isizwe sibonge uMosimane ngezimanga ezenziwa uTau.“Wenze kahle kakhulu uTau ngoba phela bekuyisizini yakhe yokuqala edlala phesheya kwezilwandle. Iningi labadlali abalingana naye, aliqali ngendlela aqale ngayo, ngakho lokho kufanele sikushayele ihlombe. Kufanele simncome uPitso neSundowns ngoba ukudlala kukaTau kwiCAF Champions League kumsizile kakhulu, kwamenza umdlali ongcono. Empeleni ngokwami uTau usengomunye wabagadli abahamba phambili emhlabeni,” kusho uKhumalo.Le ngwevu ibihambele iNedbank Ke Yona Team Search, eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu ngeledlule.“Ngifuna ukumncoma naye uTau ngokuzithoba nokubekezela ngoba lezi yizikhali ezibalulekile ebholeni. Ngijabule kakhulu ngokunqoba kwakhe umklomelo womdlali ovelele eBelgium. Kodwa ngisaphinda ngithi ukube akadlalanga kwiChampions League neSundowns ngabe akanaso lesi sibindi esingaka esisibona kuyena e-Europe. Useyabonakala noma edlala kwiBafana ukuthi ukhulile kakhulu ngokomqondo,” kuqhuba uKhumalo.Nakuba encoma uKhumalo kukuhle kodwa uthe ngokwakhe sekuyisikhathi sokuthi uTau adlale kumaligi ahlonishwayo emhlabeni.“Ngifisa ukuthi aqhubeke nokuzihlonipha, nokuthanda umsebenzi wakhe. Ngokwami sengifuna ukuthi adlale kwi-English Premier League (EPL) noma kwiLa Liga ngoba phela udlale kahle kakhulu akufanele simdlele umona. Usenza ukuthi sonke siziqhenye ngokuba ngabakuleli,” kubeka uKhumalo.
title: U-16V uncoma uPitso ngempumelelo kaTau

text: USHAQEKILE umndeni womfundi (16) wasesikoleni samabangaaphakeme iVuyiswa Mtolo High, KwaMashu okuthiwa ugwazwe wabulawa ngomunye umfundi ekilasini emuva kokugconana.Kuthiwa uSithembiso Mungwe ugwazwe ngomunye umfundi ekilasini ngoLwesihlanu emuva kokuthi begconene bangazwana. USthembiso ugwazwe inxeba elilodwa esifubeni maqondana nenhliziyo.Uyise, uMnuz Musa Mlaba, uthe sibashiye benezinhliziyo ezibuhlungu isigameko sokubulawa kwendodana yakhe. Uthe ngokuthola kwabo indodana yakhe beyikade igconana nomunye umfundi kwase kuba nokungezwani phakathi kwabo.Lo mfundi okuthiwa uhlala ehostela KwaMashu ube eseyolanda abangani bakhe abahlala khona bezomhlasela. Lo mfundi kuthiwa ubuye esephethe ummese wase egwaza uSthembiso esifubeni eduze kwenhliziyo. Uphuthunyiswe emtholampilo, iKwaMashu Community Health Centre (eyaziwa ngePoly Clinic) kodwa waphetha ngokushona.Umkhulu wakhe, uMnuz Zakhele Mlaba, uthe ugqemeke engeqiwa ntwala ngokushona komzukulu wakhe. Usole inkinga okuthiwa iphakathi kwabafundi abahlala ehostela nabahlala elokishini.“Kunenkinga ekhona phakathi kwabafundi abahlala ehostela nalabo abangahlali khona. Laba abahlala ehostela banakho ukuthi babasukela laba abahlala ngaphandle. Bavame nokuthi babahlanganyele. Siyafisa ukuthi iphume lento yaziwe ngoba namuhla umzukulu wami kodwa kusasa kungaba omunye umfundi,” kusho uMlaba.Uthe batholile ukuthi lo mfundi uboshiwe. UMlaba uthe ubesesikoleni eze ngolunye udaba wase ezithela phezu kwalesi sigameko.Okhulumela amaphoyisa, uCol Thembeka Mbhele ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kukhona umfundi oboshiwe ngalesi sigameko. Uthe kulindeleke ukuthi lo mfundi avele enkantolo namuhla.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo kulesi sifundazwe uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, uthe baphatheke kabi ngokushona kwalo mfundi. Uthe ukushona kwakhe ngale ndlela kukhombisa ukudlanga kodlame emphakathini.“Kudingeka ukuthi sisebenzisane sonke ukulwa nodlame. Ukushonakwalo mfundi ngalolu hlobo kukhombisa khona ukudlanga kodlame emiphakathini esivela kuyona. UMnyango wezeMfundo ngeke wenze ngamlingo ukuthi kuxazululwe inkinga yodlame kodwa udinga ukuthi umphakathi usebenzisane nawo,” kusho uMlotshwa.Uqhube wathi abazali kufanele basebenzisane nabo ngokuthi babheke izikhwama zezingane zabo ukuthi azinazo yini izikhali uma ziya esikoleni.
title: Kuphume isidumbu kucobana abafundi

text: AMQINISA idolo amazwi abalandeli umdlali wasesiswini weKaizer Chiefs, uSiphelele “Stash” Ntshangase, ongakayikhombisi imilingo aziwa ngayo kusukela efike eNaturena ngoJanuwari.UNtshangase usayine kwiChiefs emuva kweminyaka engakufihli ukuthi ufuna ukudlalela leli qembu.Ukufika kwakhe kujabulise abalandeli abaningi abebegxeka abaphathi ngokugodola nemali, bengasayinisi abadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu.Emdlalweni wokuqala kaNtshangase wemukelwe njengenkosi ngabalandeli beChiefs eFNB Stadium. Nokho emuva kwalokho kuncane okungashiwo ngaye kwazise ungena uyaphuma esikimini somqeqeshi, uSteve “Mphathi” Komphela. Eminye imidlalo yeChiefs uyibuka nezihlwele. UNtshangase ubengekho ngisho ebhentshini ngesikhathi Amakhosi exetshulwa kabuhlungu ngo 3-0 yiChippa United emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eFNB Stadium emasontweni amabili adlule.UNtshangase uthe akutshelwa ngabalandeli kumenza aqine.“Abalandeli bangitshela ukuthi ngizolithola ithuba. Nokho ukuthi bengivele ngifuna ukuba lapha, akufanele kungenze ngithathe izinto kancane. Okubalulekile wukuthi ngisebenze kanzima noma yinini uma nginikwe ithuba. Angijabule ngengisakwenzile kusukela ngifikile ngoba angidlali,” kusho uNtshangase.Amakhosi asenalo ithuba lokubuyisa ukumamatheka kubalandeli bawo ngaphambi kokusongwa kwesizini ka-2017/2018. Azokwamukela iFree State Stars emdlalweni owandulela owamanqamu weNedbank Cup, eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo ngo-8.15 ebusuku. Emdlalweni wokugcina la maqembu ehlangana kowomkhumulajezi, iChiefs ikhale ngaphansi kwiStars koweTelkom Knockout ngo-2016.UNtshangase uthe nakuba ubebukela engaphandle iqembu lidonsa kanzima kodwa iqembu alincikile kuyena. Ubona kufanele balwele ukuwina koweStars eMabhida. “Kuze kuba umqeqeshi unginika ithuba lokudlala ngingakhuluma ngokudonsa kanzima kweqembu ngibukela ngingaphandle."Njengoba isikhathi esiningi ngihlala ebhentshini, bengibona ukuthi iqembu lidonsa kanzima kodwa khumbula ukuthi iqembu alikho mayelana nami."Sikhulumile nomqeqeshi ngezinto okufanele ngizilungise endleleni engidlala ngayo futhi ngiyazama ukuzilungisa."Umdlali ophelele yilowo okwazi ukuhlasela nokumaka. Ngicabanga ukuthi emdlalweni wami kushoda ukuthi ngikwazi ukumaka."Okubalulekile wukuwina koweStars, iqembu limayelana nebheji hhayi ngoNtshangase. Ngingajabula ukuwina indebe ngoba kumasizini amathathu iqembu alikaze liwine lutho."Uma ngilithola ithuba ngizolisebenzisa.”Ngempelasonto edlule, ebuzwa ngoNtshangase, uKomphela uthe kunzima ukuzinza kwiChiefs, akangayiphatha eyezindawo okufanele azilungise endleleni adlala ngayo.
title: Ukhuthazwa amazwi abalandeli

text: IHHOVISI likaNgqongqoshe wezeMisebenzi kaHulumeni uNkk Lynne Brown lithi licubungula amaphepha afakwe uMnuz Brian Molefe eNkantolo yabaSebenzi mayelana nokukhishwa kwakhe esikhundleni sokuba isikhulu esiphezulu kwa-Eskom."Siwatholile amaphepha avela kuMolefe sisawacubungula," kusho okhulumela uNkk Brown, uMnuz Colin Cruywagen.UMolefe uye enkantolo ngemuva kokuthi uNkk Brown ngeledlule eyalele ibhodi lakwa-Eskom ukuthi liguqule isinqumo salo sokubuyisa uMolefe.  Okhulumela ibhodi lakwa-Eskom uMnuz Khulekani Qoma uthe uMolefe ufake amaphepha akhe kungqongqoshe nebhodi. Uthe amaphepha afike ngoLwesihlanu."Amaphepha ethu okuphendula asikawafaki yingakho ngingazi ukuthi ibhodi lizophendula lithini," usho kanje.Khonamanjalo, iDA ithi izophikisana nemizamo kaMolefe yokubuyela kwa-Eskom.USihlalo wesigungu esiphezulu kwiDA uMnuz James Selfe uthe bazongenelela kulolu daba enkantolo yabaSebenzi.
title: Lizoxazululwa yinkantolo elokuxoshwa kukaMolefe

text: Lo msakazi owethula ngokuhlanganyela uhlelo lwantambama noMasechaba Ndlovu oluthi The Drive, ukhipha le mifundaze ngokubambisana nesikhungo semfundo ephakeme iBoston Media House. Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uMo Flava uthe umkhankaso wakhe wokunikezela ngemifundaze uzoqala ophikweni lalesi sikhungo oluseThekwini ngoMgqibelo.Echaza ngokusungula lo mfundaze, lo msakazi uthe ukhuthazwe ukukhula kanzima.“Nami ngafunda khona eBoston, kungekho lula ngenxa yokuthi imali beyingekho. Okwacishe ngangiphoqa ukuthi ngishiye phansi. Nangesikhathi sengisebenza bengihlangabezana nentsha engibuza ngokuthi ingenza njani ukuze yenze lo msebenzi engiwenzayo. Bengithi uma ngiyitshela ukuthi kufanele iyofunda, ikhale ngokweswela imali. Yingakho-ke ngathi angisungule lo mfundaze ukuze ngiyisize ifeze amaphupho ayo.”Uthe abantu abahlinzeka ngalo mfundaze yilabo abathole imiphumela emihle nyakenye noma ngo 2017 futhi abaphuma emindenini engamile kahle ngasemnothweni.“Umuntu ofuna lo mfundaze ungithumelela imiphumela yakhe ka-matric kuWhatsApp (0812687518). Ngibe sengimfonela ngimbuza ukuthi uphuma emndenini onjani futhi sengimazisa nokuthi sizohlangana kuphi naye.”UMo Flava uthe uzoqala eDurban Campus ngoJanuwari 19, adlulele eSandton Campus ngoJanuwari 26 bese egcina ePretoria Campus ngoFebhuwari 2.Ucele abafundi ukuba baqale bazi ukuthi bafuna ukwenza muphi umsebenzi uma sebephothule izifundo zabo.“Akuve kungiphatha kabuhlungu ukuzwa umfundi esethi uyahluleka ukwenza izifundo azikhethile, manje usefuna ukuzishintsha. Abanye bafunde baqede kodwa bahlulwe yimisebenzi abayikhethile. Umuntu ngaphambi kokufaka isicelo somfundaze akenze isiqiniseko sokuthi useyazi ukuthi ufuna ukufundela muphi umsebenzi,” kusho uMo Flava.Uthe kudingeka abafundi abazimisele ngokwenza izifundo eziphathele nomsakazo, ukukhiqizwa komculo, ukudijeya, Animation neGraphic Design.Sekungunyaka wesishiyagalolunye uMo Flava efundisa intsha mahhala.
title: Umsakazi nethuba lemifundaze

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANELIHLEHLELE isonto elizayo icala elibhekene nengoduso esolwa ngokubulala umyeni wayo, owatholwa elahlwe eweni ngasoZwathini.UNksz Nompumelelo “Mpume” Goncalves (27), ngoMsombuluko uvele enkantolo yasePinetown, icala lahlehliselwa uDisemba 28. Usagcinwe esitokisini. Ingoduso ibhekene necala lokubulala umyeni abebethembisene naye umshado uMnuz Nkosi Timmy Langa (33).Icala lihlehlisiwe ukuze umsolwa acele ibheyili ngokusemthethweni. Umsolwa uboshwe ngoLwesihlanu ebhace eManguzi eboshwa wuphiko lwamaphoyisa lwe-K9 lusebenzisana nabaphenyi basePinetown.ULanga, owatholwa efile oZwathini, wayekade eduke emzini wakhe ngoSepthemba.Ngeledlule Isolezwe libhale ngokugwetshwa kwenkabi, ezivumele ngokwayo ukuthi yabulala umufi. Igwetshwe iminyaka engu-20 ibhadla ejele.UJames Mashudu “Ramaphosa” Mthimkhulu (35), evuma ukubulala uMnuz Langa, eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu, wathi owazibiza ngonkosikazi kamufi ovezwe njengoMpume, wamthembisa uR15 000 ngokubulala umyeni wakhe kodwa wagcina ekhokhelwe uR800.
title: Uzobuyela enkantolo ngesonto elizayo osolwa ngokubulala umyeni

text: UKHONJWA kwiBaroka FC umgadli woThongathi FC, othuse abaningi evalela amagoli inqwaba ngasekuqaleni kwesizini ka-2018/2019 kwiNational First Division (NFD).USiyabonga Vilane osehlohle amagoli ayisithupha kwiCane Cutters kule sizini, kuthiwa sekuvimbe izinto ezimbalwa ukuthi ajoyine ompetha beTelkom Knockout, iBaroka FC.Nakuba leli phephandaba lingakuqinisekisa ukuthi izolo uVilane uziqeqeshile noThongathi kodwa kuvela ukuthi sekusele izinto ezimbalwa kuqedelwe izingxoxo zokuba alifulathele elikaMthaniya abhekise amabombo emhlabeni obomvu, eLimpopo.Leli phephandaba lixhumane nomqeqeshi woThongathi uJohnny Ferreira, limbuza ngemibiko yokushiya kukaVilane kwezakhe.“Yebo ngiyizwile into efana naleyo ngaphakathi eqenjini ukuthi uVilane uyasishiya. Ngokuzwa kwami akukapheleli konke kahle kodwa ngingathi sekungu-90% osekuqondile, sekusele izinto ezimbalwa. Noma kubuhlungu ukuthi angase asishiye kodwa ngijabule ngendlela abezimisele ngayo, nangendlela abezinikela ngakhona eqenjini. Ngenhliziyo yami emhlophe ngifisa ukusho ukuthi ngimfisela inhlanhla uVilane sengathi konke kungamhambela kahle,” usho kanje uFerreira izolo.UVilane uke wadlala kuMaZulu FC eminyakeni edlule. Amanye amaqembu awadlalelile eminyakeni edlule, iMilford FC egijima kwi-ABC Motsepe League neRatchaburi Mitr Phol yaseThailand.Omunye umdlali woThongathi ongase ahambe ngaleli windi, uCelimpilo “Zizou” Ngemba odlala esiswini okhonjwa kwiChippa United.Umdlalo olandelayo woThongathi izowudlala noBuntu Cape Town, e-Athlone Stadium ngoLwesihlanu.UFerreira utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ukhathazekile ngokulinyalelwa abadlali abawumgogodla ngaphambi kwalo mdlalo.“Silinyalelwe uTsepo Liphoko noPule Mmodi abadlala ophikweni bobabili. Ngibona emancane amathuba okuthi bazobe sebeluleme bobabili ngoLwesihlanu, kungakho kukhona esikuzamayo uma sijima," kuphetha uFerreira.
title: Ukhonjwa kwiBaroka owoThongathi FC

text: MLUNGISI GUMEDEKUMISWE izikhulu ezimbili zenyunyana yamaphoyisa nojele iPolice and Prisons Civil Rights Union (Popcru) ejele laseWestville mayelana necala lokusabisa abasebenzi nokubavimba ukuba bangene emsebenzi ngoMgqibelo.Lezi zikhulu ezingojele kuthiwa bezingafuni ukuthi abasebenzi baseMedium A bangene emsebenzini ngoba zifuna kuxoshwe umphathi wakhona uMnuz Bheki Mlambo ezimsola ngokuba ngundlovukayiphikiswa.UMlambo kuthiwa abasebenzi uvele abafake amacala yize benze amaphutha amancane.NgoMgqibelo kuthiwa kuphinde kwasuka isixakaxaka, abasebenzi abazwelana nabaholi ababili abamisiwe befuna kudedelwe umbiko ngophenyo obelwenziwa yithimba elizimele ebeliholwa ngukhomishana wamajele e-Eastern Cape mayelana nezinsolo ezibhekiswe kuMlambo.Ingxenye yabasebenzi eMedium A kuthiwa ifuna uMlambo asuswe ehhovisi ngoba imsola ngokuthi uyahluleka ukuphatha.Esithangamini nabezindaba izolo, uKhomishana wamajele KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Mnikelwa Nxele uthe bathathe isinqumo sokuthi babamise emsebenzini laba baholi benyunyana ngenxa yokungaziphathi kahle.“Laba holi benyunyana basolwa ngokusabisa ozakwabo nokubavimba ukuba bangene emsebenzini,” kusho uNxele.UNxele uxwayise abasebenzi abadala uthuthuva eMedium A ngokuthi bazoyikhotha imbenge yomile baphinde baphelelwe wumsebenzi.“Ilula nje le nto abasebenzi kumele balandele imigomo yokuziphatha kwabo noma babeke imisebenzi yabo engcupheni. Kumnandi ukucula niyiqulu kodwa uma usuxoshiwe ungasakwazi ukuziphilisa nomndeni wakho, kusa ngokunye,” usho kanje.UNxele uthe ngeke bavume ukuthi isigejana sabasebenzi sidicilele phansi isithunzi sejele.“Isikhungo esikhuluma ngaso sibaluleke kakhulu ngoba sigcina iziboshwa zesilisa ezitokile, ukuphazamiseka kokusebenza ejele akushayi umnyango kuphela kodwa kuphazamisa nokusebenza kwezinkantolo ngoba iziboshwa azikwazi ukuya khona,” usho kanje.UNxele uthe ngeke bezwe ngePopcru ukuthi ngubani okumele aphathe eMedium A.“Lo msindo okhona udalwa abantu abangafuni ukulawulwa. Sibikelwe ukuthi abasebenzi abaningi kulesi sikhungo abaziphethe kahle, bafika sekudlule isikhathi emsebenzini, abanye bayanyamalala ngesikhathi somsebenzi. Akekho umphathi ongamela leyo nto,” usho kanje.UNobhala wePoprcu KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Kwenza Nxele uthe ngokwazi kwabo abaholi ababili benyunyana yabo kabamisiwe kodwa batshalwe kwezinye izindawo.“Mina ngazi ukuthi laba baholi bethu banikwa izincwadi obekumele basho kuzona izizathu ebezingenza ukuthi bangamiswa emsebenzini njengoba kukhona izinto abasolwa ngazo,” usho kanje.Uthe iziphathimandla kumele ziyeke ukusabisa amalungu abo ngokuxoshwa uma ekhala.
title: Kumiswe izikhulu zejele

text: UMSUNGULI womqhudelwano womculo wokholo iCrown Gospel Music Awards, uZanele LaMbokazi Nkambule, uthi ushaqekile ngokudlula emhlabeni kwenkakha yokholo, uMalibongwe Gcwabe.Lesi sihlabani sishonele esibhedlela sase-Eastern Cape, iCecelia Makiwane, ngoLwesithathu ekuseni emuva kokungeniswa khona ekhala ngezinhlungu esifubeni.  ULaMbokazi Nkambule uchaze ukuhamba emhlabeni kukaGcwabe njengesigameko esizume wonke umuntu. "Sithanda ukudlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini, amalungu omndeni, ebandleni lakhe iRemnant Ministries nakubalandeli bakhe ngokulahlekelwa yilesi sikhondlakhondla somculi ebeselapha izinhliziyo zabaningi ngomculo waso." Eqhuba uLaMbokazi Nkambule uthe uGcwabe ubambe elikhulu iqhaza ekufukuleni abaculi abasebasha ngenkampani yakhe yokuqopha futhi abanye sebengosomabhizinisi abaphumelele kule ndima. Uthe uGcwabe uqokwe amahlandla amaningi kumaCrown Gospel Music Awards njengengxenye yokumbungaza ngemisebenzi yakhe endimeni yomculo. Le ngwazi yaqala ukuveza ikhono layo lokucula eqenjini lase-Eastern Cape iYouth With Mission ngaphambi kokuzimela. UGcwabe wabe esejoyina inkampani kaSipho Makhabane, Amanxusa Records futhi wagcina esesebenza nezinye izihlabani okubalwa kuzo uRebecca Malope noLundi Tyamara. Ushone esanda kuqopha umucwi ngokuhlanganyela nozakwabo futhi ongumkhaya wakhe uKhanyisa Sabuka eqwashisa ngesifo seCorona. Esephetha uLambokazi Nkambule unxuse abaculi ukuba bahlangane bese begubha umsebenzi omuhle kaGcwabe futhi kukhunjulwe konke okuhle. Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela kungakaziwa ngezinhlelo zokufihlwa kukaGcwabe.
title: Umsunguli wamaCrown kumshaqisile ukushona kowokholo

text: UMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs uGavin Hunt, akaboni kuzoyiphazamisa i-Orlando Pirates ukungabibikho komqeqeshi wayo uJosef Zinnbauer ebhentshini uma la maqembu esetholana  emlenzeni wesibili kowandulela amanqamu kwiMTN 8 ngeSonto.Umdlalo useFNB Stadium ngo-3 ntambama. Ziya kulo mdlalo eZimnyama zihamba phambili ngo 3-0 enkundleni efanayo emlenzeni wokuqala. Umehluko ukuthi ngeledlule, uZinnbauer wayekhona ebhentshini kodwa ukulimala   kwendodana yakhe engozini yemoto, kuphoqe ukuthi abambe indiza ngemuva komdlalo abuyele eGermany.UFadlu Davids oyiphini likaZinnbauer ubambe amatomu kwiBucs asenqobe nayo umdlalo wokuqala ebambile eshaya iBloemfontein Celtic ngo 1-0 ngoLwesithathu.“Angiqale ngokuzwelana noZinnbauer nomndeni wakhe. Kodwa cha, kangiboni ukuthi kuzoyiphazamisa iPirates ukungabi bikho kwalo mqeqeshi. Banabadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu ababathenge eqenjini thizeni ngesizini edlule (esho iBidvest Wits), ngakho angibaboni bezophazamiseka,” kusho uHunt.Amakhosi kumele ashaye amagoli amane, iPirates ingashayi nelilodwa, ukuze adlulele kowamanqamu. Nokho lokhu kubukeka kuwumqansa. IChiefs ikhombisa ubuthuntu phambi kwamapali. Selokhu kuqale isizini isathole amagoli amathathu kuphela.
