Ishaye amabili idlala neMaritzburg United kwiMTN 8 (womabili ashaywe isitobha uYagan Sasman). Elinye igoli kube wumkhonto ogwaze ekhaya bedlala neChippa United (lashaywa uGregory Damons) benqoba ngo 1-0.Ngaphandle kwalokho, ilotsholwe ngo 3-0 amahlandla amabili, ishaywa yizimbangi  ezinkulu iMamelodi Sundowns (kwiDStv Premiership) ne-Orlando Pirates (kwiMTN 8). Nebhola elidlalwa ngezikaHunt kaligculisi neze, nokufakazelwa ukubanjwa omakoti iTS Galaxy emdlalweni weligi ngoLwesithathu ophele ngo 0-0.“Kumele sisebenze ngabadlali esinabo. Ukukhala ngesigwebo seFIFA akusizi ngalutho. Kumele sisebenze ngesinakho. Njengamanje kumele sithole imiphumela, akukho ukujikela eceleni noma ukubeka izaba,” kulandisa uHunt exoxa nezintatheli izolo.Ngokusho kukaHunt izethenjwa zaleli qembu uReeve Frosler, Eric Mathoho, Kgotso Moleko, Willard Katsande noLeonardo Castro abajimile ngokwenele ukuthi usengabadlalisa umdlalo wonke. Uthe usazolokhu ebajwayeza, ebashintsha ngenhloso yokuthi bebuyele kahle kwabaziwa ngakho.
title: Umqansa ohlalele uHunt kwabazowudlala neBucs

text: OKLEBE bathi bayazi ngezinsolo zokuphulwa kwemibandela yebheyili yiMeya yoMkhandlu weTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede emisiwe emsebenzini emva kokuboshwa mayelana namacala enkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa athinta ithenda yezigidi yokuqoqwa kukadoti eThekwini.Okhulumela oKlebe, uBrigadier Hangwani Mulaudzi izolo uthe zikhona izikhalo abazitholile mayelana nokuthi uNkk Gumede uphule eminye yemibandela yakhe yebheyili.“Siyazi ngezikhalo zokuthi iMeya yaseThekwini iphule eminye imibandela yebheyili, ithimba labaphenyi noPhiko lwezokuShushisa kumele baxhumane babikele iMantshi ngalezi zinsolo bese kuba iyona enqumayo ukuthi kuzokwenzekani,” kusho uMaluadzi.Omunye wemibandela yebheyili kaNkk Gumede owawubukeka umnqinda amandla, ilowo owawuthi kumele ame ukuqhuba izinhlelo zikamasipala.UNkk Gumede unikwe ikhefu lezinsuku ezingu-30 yi-ANC ngemuva kokuboshwa mayelana nethenda yokuqoqwa kukadoti.Izolo uNkk Gumede bekulindeleke ukuthi abuyele emsebenzini njengoba ikhefu anikwe lona lenyanga seliphelile.I-ANC izolo bekulindeleke ukuthi yenze isimemezelo mayelana nekusasa lakhe kodwa lize lashona ilanga singekho isimemezelo esenziwayo.Ethintwe uMkhulumeli we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu ophinde abe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo esifundazweni, akazange atholakale, ucingo lwakhe lubanjwe ngumkhulumeli wakhe uNkk Thando Nkosi othe bazokwaziswa abezindaba uma sekukhona isinqumo esithathiwe.I-ANC kulindeleke ukuthi imemezele ngekusasa likaNkk Gumede namhlanje.Izolo i-ANC ibibambe umhlangano lapho kade ibhunga khona ngalolu daba. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, abalandeli bakaNkk Gumede bahlela ukuthi namhlanje babambe umlindelo bese kuthi kusasa ngoLwesine bayamthatha bamyisa eCity Hall.Okhulumela uMkhandlu weTheku, uMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, uthe ngeke bakwazi ukuphawula mayelana nodaba lweMeya wacela ukuthi kuthintwe i-ANC esifundazweni.“Siyabanxusa abezindaba ukuthi banikeze ubuholi be-ANC esifundazweni isikhathi sokuthi busebenze lolu daba kodwa mina engingakusho ngasohlangothini lukamasipala, umsebenzi uyaqhubeka siholwa yimenenja yomkhandlu uMnuz Sipho Nzuza nePhini leMeya uNkk Fawzia Peer okuyilo eliyiNhloko yezepolitiki okwamanje,” kusho uMayisela.Uthe bona babheke kakhulu ekutheni umsebenzi wokuhanjiswa kwezidingo kubantu uyaqhubeka, abanendaba kakhulu nokuthi kuqhubekani kwezepolitiki.“Umsebenzi wethu siyawazi futhi akukho okuzosivimba ukuthi siqhubeke nawo,” kusho uMayisela.
title: OKlebe bayazi ngezikhalo ngeMeya yeTheku

text: UZOFIHLWA ngoMgqibelo eNanda Glebe uNatasha Conabeer (23) okusaphenywa ngokushona kwakhe.Inkonzo yomngcwabo wakhe izoba sesontweni i-UCCSA Inanda Mission ngo-8 ekuseni.UConabeer wagcina ukubonwa emgwaqweni uFlorida eThekwini ngo-Agasti 19, wagcina ukuxhumana nabantu ngocingo ngo-Agasti 22. Ngemuva kwamasonto amathathu elahlekile, watholwa elele phambi komnyango wakubo esesimweni esicubayi nokwasolakala ngokuthi ushiywe khona ngabebemthathile. Waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela lapho ashonele khona ngoMsombuluko.Namhlanje umndeni kaConabeer unxuse abantu ukuba bagqoke umbala omnyama bamashe nawo besuka esiteshini samaphoyisa saseNanda beya e-UCCSA Inanda Mission nokuyilapho ebekuzobanjwa khona inkonzo yakhe yesikhumbuzo ngo-10 ekuseni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa uLieutenant-Colonel Thulani Zwane uthe, amaphoyisa aseDurban North asaphenya ngokufa kwakhe kanti kuzokwenziwa uhlolo lwesidumbu oluzoveza ukuthi ubulawe yini.Ngasekuqaleni kwesonto, uninalume wakhe uNosipho Goba uveze ukuthi kunokwenzeka ukuthi uConabeer uphuziswe ushevu ngesikhathi enyamalele. UGoba uthe umshana wakhe ubenezibazi ezibonakalayo emadolweni nasengalweni kuphela."Ube nenkinga yama-organs nokwenze udokotela wakhe asole ukuthi udliswe ushevu. Ukuhlolwa kwegazi lakhe kuveze ukuthi ubene paracetamol eningi emzimbeni wakhe nebrake fluid," kusho uGoba.Uthe, uConabeer ubeshiywe ngaphandle komnyango ekhaya lakhe nomndeni wakhe eliseNanda phakathi kwamabili ngeSonto.
title: Kuzoba nemashi ngaphambi komngcwabo kaNatasha Conabeer

text: MINENHLE MKHIZEAMAPROTEAS aqede ishobolo leminyaka engu-14 ehlulwa wukuwina umdlalo weTest eSri Lanka ngesikhathi enenebula leli lizwe ngama-run angu-153 kweyokuqala ebiseGalle International Cricket Stadium izolo ekuseni.AmaProteas ashaye ama-run angu-455 ku-innings yawo yokuqala ase ekhetha ukufaka iSri Lanka ebaleni sekuphume ama-batsman ayisishiyagalolunye. UDean Elgar, Faf du Plesis, JP Duminy noQuinton de Kock yibona abaphendlele elakuleli indlela ebheke empumelelweni.U-Elgar ushaye ama-runs angu-103, uDu Plessis wabeka angu-80, uDe Kock waqobela angu-51 kwathi uDuminy wavalela ebhodini angu-100 engazange akhishwe. ISri Lanka ikhishwe yonke seyenze ama-run angu-292 ku-innings yawo yokuqala.Elakuleli liphinde labuyela ensimini ku-innings yesibili. Lishaye ama-run angu-206 lase likhetha ukuthi lidedele iSri Lanka ijahe ama-run angu-370 ukuze ikwazi ukunqoba. ISri Lanka ivale usuku lwesine idinga ama-runs angu-260 osukwini lokugcina.Ithemba belikhona ukuthi isengakwazi ukuqopha umlando ngokufica ama-runs angu-370 kwazise bekusekhona inkakha uKumar Sangakarra kanti bekusazongena uMahela Jayawardene odlala imidlalo ewuchungechunge yokugcina yamaTest.Nokho uDale Steyn noMorne Morkel yibona abaqinisekisile ukuthi amaProteas ayaliqeda ishobolo leminyaka engu-14 ehlulwa wukuwina imidlalo yamaTest eSri Lanka. USteyn noMorkel bathathe amawikhethi amane ngokwehlukana kwathi uDuminy wathola amabili, iSri Lanka yaphuma yonke isenze ama-run angu-216. AmaProteas ayegcine ukunqoba umdlalo eSri Lanka ngo-Agasti 2, 2000 eKandy ngama-run ayisithupha.AmaProteas abesezame amahlandla ayisishiyagalombili ukunqoba eSri Lanka kodwa ehluleka. UHansie Cronje noGraeme Smith bobabili abebengokaputeni bamaProteas ngesikhathi evakashela eSri Lanka bebebuya belambatha kuleliya lizwe.U-Amla ulandele ezinyathelweni zikaShaun Pollock noKepler Wessels okuyibona kuphela okaputeni bamaProteas asebeke bawina umdlalo eSri Lanka. Lona bekungumdlalo wakhe wokuqala selokhu ethathe ezintambo kuSmith othathe umhlalaphansi ekuqaleni konyaka. USteyn uthathe amawikhethi ayisishiyagalolunye kuma-innings amabili.Umdlalo wokugcina uqala ngoLwesine eSinhalese Sports Clube Ground, eColombo, eSri Lanka. Kulo mdlalo elakuleli lizobe libheke ukuthi linqobe noma lidlale ngokulingana ukuze lizowina okokuqala eSri Lanka ngemuva kweminyaka engu-21 lagcina ukuwina imidlalo yama-Test.
title: Ezika-Amla zigila izimanga eSri Lanka

text:
IQEMBU elidlala kwi-Absa Premiership, iPolokwane City, izolo ebusuku liqinisekise izindaba ezibuhlungu ngokufa komdlali waleli qembu uMogau Tshehla engozini yemoto. IPolokwane City idalule izindaba ezibuhlungu ngokudlula kwalo mdlali oneminyaka engu-26 ekhasini layo lezokuxhumana kutwitter izolo. "Kuyasidabukisa kakhulu ukunazisa ngokudlula emhlabeni komdlali wethu wasemuva uMogau Tshehla engozini yemoto. Imicabango yethu inomndeni wakhe, ozakwabo abedlala nabo kanye nabangani bakhe," kusho isitatimende esikhishwe yiRise and Shine. It is with our deepest sorrows that we inform you of the death of our Defender Mogau Tshehla on a car accident. Our thoughts are with the family;teammates and friendsPsalm 37:39 But the salvation of the righteous is of the LORD: he is their strength in the time of trouble 
pic.twitter.com/Mtp89Rch5z— #RiseAndShine (@polokwane_city) 
February 12, 2018Imininingwano ngengozi yemoto adlule kuyo ibingakadalulwa.Lo mdlali ugcine ukubonakala edlala ngesikhathi ezakhe ziguqiswa yi-Ubuntu FC emdlalweni weNedbank Cup ngempelasonto.    Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ingene ilekanyana imiyalezo yendunduzo ebivela kubadlali nasemanqenjini ePSL. To Tshehla family and Polokwane CityKaizer Chiefs have received with sadness the news of the passing of Polokwane City defender Mogau Tshehla.We offer our sincere condolences and deepest sympathy to your loss.May Mogau’s soul rest in the eternal peace! 
pic.twitter.com/sh3QntIXs8— Kaizer Chiefs (@KaizerChiefs)

title: Sekuphinde kwadlula omunye umdlali wePSL engozini yemoto

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUU KWANDA kwezingozi zomgwaqo sekuholele ekutheni abagqugquzeli beMsinga DriftKhana bathathe isinqumo sokufundisa izethameli zomdlalo wabo izindlela zokuzivikela.IMsinga DriftKhana, 
Isolezwe elingabanye babaxhasi bayo, izoba seMphelankani, eMsinga, kusasa kusukela ngo-10 ekuseni.UBruce Jalubani, okhulumela lo mdlalo, uthe yize kwaziwa ukuthi kulo mcimbi wabo inhloso enkulu wukujabulisa umphakathi waseMsinga nezihambeli kodwa kubalulekile ukuthi abanye bahambe kukhona abakufundile.“Kunomuntu ohlale ekhala ngokuthi imoto yakhe iyawudla uphethroli noma amabhuleki ayashesha ukuphela kanti empeleni yindlela yena ashayela ngayo,” kusho uBruce.Uthe ngaphandle kwalokhu bazoqeqesha nabantu ngezindlela zokuzivikela ezimweni ezithile.“Siyazi ukuthi ngalesi sikhathi sonyaka imvula ijwayele lokhu okwenza ukuthi imigwaqo ishelele. Amabhuleki lapho ngeke uwabambe ngendlela ojwayele ukuwabamba ngawo uma umgwaqo umanzi. Lezi yizinto ongafundiswa zona uma uthola ilayisensi yokushayela,” kusho uBruce.Uthe kungalesi sizathu bememe ongoti bakwaJaguar, eMhlanga ukuba kube yibo abazoqeqesha abantu ngezindlela zokuzivikela ezimweni ezinzima.U-Andrew Matthewson ongomunye wabaphathi bakwaJaguar, eMhlanga, uthe bajabule kakhulu ngokuba yingxenye yeMsinga DriftKhana.Uthe bazofundisa abantu ngezinto eziningi ezahlukene njenge-advanced driving ne-defensive driving futhi abafuna ukwazi kabanzi bangavakashela i-website ethi 
www.jaguarexperience.co.za ukuze bazi kabanzi ngezinto abazifundisayo.KwiDriftKhana kuzobe kudlalwa izimoto zishaya izidudla nokunye kanti kuzoncintisana abashayeli abadumile kuleli okubalwa kubo uMagesh, Rasta, Bull, Marsel, Ground nabanye. Abashayeli bazobe bebanga imali engu-R80 000 isiyonke.Kulindeleke ukuthi kube khona osaziwayo okubalwa kubo u-Andile Mxakaza (Fezile) noBheki Mkhwane (Samson Ndlovu) abalingisa kwi
Sibaya.Akuzogcina ngokudlala izimoto kuphela njengoba ebusuku kuzoba nomcimbi wobumnandi lapho kuzonandisa khona abaculi noDJ okubalwa kubo uDuncan we
Tsiki Tsiki, DJ Kotin, Merlon noMondli Ngcobo abanengoma eshisa izikhotha ethi 
Koze Kuse, DJ Happy Gal, Junior De Rocka nabanye.Amathikithi atholakala esangweni ngemali ephakathi kuka-R50 noR400.UBruce uthe nezindawo zokulala zizobe zikhona ngemali ephansi.“Kuzoba namatende okukhempa okuzoba nemibhede, izingubo, amanzi ashisayo nogesi. Kuzogadwa ubusuku nemini. Abantu ababekise izikhala ku-033 493 0918,” kusho uBruce
title: IMsinga Driftkhana nokuhlukile

text: UMCULI kamaskandi uMbuzeni Mkhize, kuthiwa uziqhathe nengoduso yakhe ebonakala ezithombeni egone Uglama kaMaskandi.Isolezwe ngeSonto lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi ingoduso kaMbuzeni isifuna nokumshiya ngoba icasulwa wukuthi ubonakala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana egonene nalo mculi onguzakwabo.Ethintwa uMbuzeni uthe abantu bayathanda ukukhuluma njengoba kuyibona abakhuluma leyo nto ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.“Mina kanginankinga nengoduso yami futhi konke kusahamba kahle phakathi kwami nayo. Akwenzeki lutho futhi phakathi kwami noGlama kaMaskandi. Sasijabule emva kokuqopha ingoma yakhe entsha angipike kuyona ethi: Bayesaba saze sahagana,” kusho uMbuzeni.Unqabile ukuthi kukhulunywe nengoduso yakhe, wangafuna nokukhipha izinamba zayo. Uthe akafuni ifakwe ezindabeni zakhe zomculo.Kuthintwa uGlama kaMaskandi, uthe akukho lutho olwenzekayo phakathi kwakhe noMbuzeni kodwa isithombe basishutha bese-studio beqeda ukuqopha.“Sasijabulela ukuqeda ingoma engimpike kuyona futhi akakaze asho lutho kimina ngaphandle kokukhuluma ngomculo. Uma kungukuthi kukhona inkulumo ekhona seningabuza yena uMbuzeni ngoma mina ngazi ukuthi sihlanganiswe wumculo kuphela,” kusho uGlama kaMaskandi.Leli phephandaba lifune ukucaciseleka ngohambo lukaMbuzeni lokuya eMelika. Uke waba sematheni kule minyaka edlule ngokuthi uzoya koqopha ingoma noRihanna.Uthe akakayi namanje ngenxa yokuphazanyiswa yiCovid-19.“Inkampani yami ibisazama ukuthi iphinde ihlele uhambo lokuya eMelika ukuze ngiqopha leli culo noRihanna. Okwamanje bekusahlelwa ukuthi ngiye khona ngo-Agasti kulo nyaka kodwa ayikakabi khona into ebambekayo ngokuthi ngizogcina ngiyile,” kusho uMbuzeni.Uveze ukuthi uRihanna wayefune ukucula naye ngenxa yokuthi wayetolike ingoma yalo mculi ethi: Shine Bright Like a Diamond,  wayenza umaskandi.
title: UMbuzeni 'uziqhathe' nengoduso ngesithombe egone uGlama kaMaskandi

text: USUNGENE kwelinye igiya umbango werenti ophakathi kwesiteshi somsakazo womphakathi iVibe FM nesikhungo sobuciko iKCap njengoba kungase kudliwe impahla yesiteshi.Kuthiwa iVibe FM isinqunyelwe ugwayi katiki ukuthi ibuye nobufakazi bezitatimende zasebhange kusasa ukuze kungadliwa impahla yesiteshi.Lokhu kulandela ukufekela kwezingxoxo ebeziphakathi kwesiteshi neKCap ngoLwesine.Emhlanganweni wangoLwesine kuthiwa iVibe FM iveze izitatimende ethe ezemali yerenti ebikhokhelwa iKCap kodwa engaveli kwi-akhawunti yalesi sikhungo.Umthombo wephephandaba ongashayi eceleni uveze ukuthi lo mhlangano uvele wafana nento engekho phakathi kwesiteshi neKCap.“Akubanga khona sivumelwano phakathi kwabesikhungo nomsakazo ngaphandle kokuthi kumele abomsakazo balethe ubufakazi basebhange obucacile. Ezitatimendeni abazivezile emhlanganweni abathe ezemali yerenti ebikhokhelwa iKCap akukho okukhombisa ukuthi ibingena kwi-akhawunti yasebhange yesikhungo.“Kugcine kucelwa umphathi wesiteshi uLucky Dlamini ukuthi aye ebhange ayocela lezi zitatimende ezicacisayo ngemali bese eyaziletha. Uma ehluleka ukwenza kanjalo kuzothathwa igxathu elilandelayo lokuthi isiteshi sifakwe enkantolo ukuze kutholakale incwadi yokudla impahla yesiteshi eyinani lemali esiyikweletayo eKCap,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela iKCap, uToki Mohoto uthe akukho abazokwenza ngaphandle kokudla impahla uma kungukuthi aziveli izitatimende ezicacile zasebhange.“Sekulindwe uMsombuluko (kusasa) ukuthi uDlamini alethe lezi zitatimende. Kungenjalo kuyiwa enkantolo ukuze kudliwe impahla yesiteshi. Akusekho ukwenza ngokunye manje side isikhathi kukhulunywa noDlamini. Izitatimende azivezile bezikhomba ukuthi kunemali ebikhokhwa kodwa ibingangeni kwi-akhawunti yaseKCap,” kusho uToki.Ummeli weVibe FM, uMnuz Siza Khumalo uthe umhlangano ube khona kodwa yena ubengeyona ingxenye yawo.Kuvele ukuthi imali yerenti ekweletwa yiVibe FM isingaphezulu kukaR100 000.
title: I-KCap ingase idle impahla yeVibe FM

text: ABANTU abaphila negciwane lengculazi abekho engcupheni yokubulawa wumkhuhlane obhubhissayo icoronavirus, inqobo nje uma beyidla kahle imishanguzo yabo yokuthiba leli gciwane.Lokhu kuvezwe wungoti ekwelashweni kwaleli gciwane, uDkt Kairoonisha Mohamed ongaphansi kwezikhungo zezempilo zakwaNetcare.Ubephawula ngemuva kwezinkulumo zokuthi abantu abanegciwane lengculazi basengcupheni ukwedlula abanye ekuhlaselweni mawala yiCovid-19.  Uthe abantu abanegciwane lengculazi abasebenzisa imishanguzo yokuyithiba futhi abangenayo inkinga yamazinga aphezulu aleli gciwane egazini (viral load), abekho engcupheni yokuguliswa kakhulu yiCovid-19 uma ibangenile njengoba bekushiwo.UDkt Mahomed, oseqeqeshe onesi nodokotela welapha inqwaba yabaphila naleli gciwane iminyaka engaphezu kweyishumi, uthe abanaleli gciwane kumele baqinisekise ukuthi bayisebenzisa ngendlela imishanguzo ngalesi sikhathi seCovid-19.Uthe kukhona abantu abanaleli gciwane asebeke bangayisebenzisa imishanguzo yabo yaleli gciwane, okwenze ukuthi bangenwe nayisifo sofuba kwaholela nasekutheni balaliswe ezibhedlela.Uthe lokhu kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi izifo ezingosomathuba njengeTB neCovid-19 zingaba yingozi kakhulu uma umuntu eyeka ukusebenzisa imishanguzo yokuthiba igciwane lengculazi.Isishoshovu esilwela amalungelo abanegciwane lengculazi kuleli ngaphansi kweTreatment Action Campaign, u- Anele Yawa, naye usenxuse abantu bakuleli abaphila negciwane lengculazi ukuthi baqikelele ukuthi bayayisebenzisa imishanguzo ngalesi sikhathi.“Asikakwazi ukweyemanisa iCovid-19, HIV neTB, kodwa esikwaziyo wukuthi uma amasosha akho omzimba entekenteke, kuba nzima ukusinda kwicoronavirus". “Siyazi ukuthi eNingizimu Afrika bangaphezu kuka 7 million abantu abaphila negciwane lengculazi. Singasho nokuthi bako5 million abasebenzisa imishanguzo yokuthiba leli gciwane, kuthi u2 million wona kube abangakawasebenzisi ngezizathu ezahlukene".Omunye wesilisa osephile naleli gciwane lengculazi, uthe le mibiko eyemanisa igciwane lengculazi neCovid-19 ibanga okukhulu ukwesaba yize ewumuntu osebenzisa imishanguzo yokuthiba leli gciwane ngendlela yakhona.“Akekho umuntu ofuna ukufa, ikakhulukazi uma uzama konke okusemandleni ukusebenzisa imishanguzo nokuzinakekela ukuze uphile kahle,"usho kanje.Omunye futhi ophila naleli gciwane uthe: "Inkinga ngabantu abangayisebenzisi imishanguzo wukuthi yibona futhi abangazihluphi nangokufunda nokubuka izindaba. Yibona kanye futhi abagcina bejahwa abasebenzi bezempilo,ukuze basebenzise imishanguzo yabo ngendlela efanele, baze bazofunwa nasemakhaya abo,"usho kanje.
title: Abanengiwane lengculazi abekho engcupheni yokubulawa yiCorona

text: SISHUBILE isimo phakathi kwabaculi bakamaskandi, uMzovukile ‘Jaiva Zimnike’ Khanyeza waseMsamu eNquthu nozakwabo uKhawulani ‘Njoko’ Mkhwane waseMshisandlu eNkandla ngenxa yombango wentombazane engumlandeli kaNjoko, uNobuhle Hlongwane waseMangwaneni eBergville.Ukungahoshelani kukaJaiva noNjoko kucace bha ngesikhathi uJaiva exhawula bonke abantu emcimbini wokwethulwa kwaMantshontsho kaMaskandi, eBusy Corner, eTembisa ngoMsombuluko kodwa waziba uNjoko.UNjoko uvumile ukuthi uJaiva akamxhawulanga kuMantshontsho kodwa uxhawule uzakwabo uDumakahle kuphela ekubeni bebehlezi ndawonye.“Bengivele ngikulindele ukuthi ngeke angixhawule mina ngemuva kwemiyalezo ebese ngike ngayibona lapho engibiza khona ngenja kodwa bengithi mhlawumbe phakathi kwabantu ngeke akuveze lokho, uzozenzisa.” Ebuzwa uNjoko ukuthi babangani noJaiva uthe babanga uNobuhle. “UNobuhle intombi yami kodwa siqale ukuxabana kade ngikwiNdlabeyiphika Festival (eyayenziwe yiGcokama Elisha e-Ellis Park Arena eGoli) ngoba ngimsole kaningi ukuthi uthandana noJaiva kodwa uthi ubhuti wakhe. Ngixakwe nayindlela abavela ngayo ezithombeni, bebambene futhi bepholishana. Mina ngazi ukuthi umuntu ngeke apholishe usisi wakhe. Lo mfo ungenza isilima, bayathandana.”JAIVA ZimnikeUNobuhle uvumile ukuthi ungumlandeli nentombi kaNjoko kodwa waphika ukuthi uyathandana noJaiva. “UJaiva ungubhuti kimi. Inkinga yaqala esithombeni esasishutha noJaiva kuNdlabeyiphika. UNjoko wabuza ngaso, ngasho ngathi besishutha nje khona ngoba kuwubhuti wami. Wathi simenza isilima, siyathandana. Kusukela kudala nje uJaiva wubhuti wami, naye wazi ukuthi ngiwusisi wakhe ngoba singabakwaNgwane sonke kodwa kuNjoko lokho akukholakali.”Ethintwa uJaiva uvele wabhoka ngolaka wathi ucela ukungafakwa odabeni oluthinta uNjoko ngoba uzama udumo ngaye. Uthe ngeke aphinde ashuthe nezihlobo zakhe ngoba sekuyamkhulumisa.
title: Sishubile isimo komaskanda ngenxa yombango wentombi

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEINKAKHA yeBanyana Banyana, uPortia Modise, ithi kufana nokuphenduleka kwemithandazo yeminyaka ukuthola uxhaso kwebhola labesifazane. Izolo inhlangano eyengamele ibhola kuleli, iSouth African Football Association (Safa), yethule iHollywoodbets njengabaxhasi beligi kazwelonke yabesifazane esizokwaziwa ngeHollywoodbets Super League.Empeleni lezi zindaba zizwakale ngempelasonto edlule kodwa iSafa yanquma ukuzethulela abezindaba izolo. Umengameli wale nhlangano, uDanny Jordaan, umemezele ukuthi iHollywoodbets ixhase le ligi ngo-R17 million esivumelwaneni sesizini eyodwa.Iqembu elizoba ngompetha lizoklonyeliswa u-R2 million, isibili sithole isigidi samarandi.Kuvele nokuthi wonke amaqembu ayingxenye yale ligi azothola u-R150 000.Ezinye izindaba ezijabulisile ngezithi umdlali ozoqokwa njengovelele ekupheleleni kwesizini uzokhala emuke no-R50 000.UModise, owaqokwa ngo-2006 njengomdlali ovelele kwiWomen's African Football Championship, uthe wethemba ukuthi ukungena kweHollywoodbets kuzoheha nabanye abaxhasi. Le nsephe, eyayingalibheki ipali, kade yayikusho ukuthi ibhola labesifazane kuleli lizokhula kuphela uma izinkampani zifaka imali."Sekuphele isikhathi eside sizama ukuthi elakuleli libe neligi kazwelonke yabesifazane, yezinga eliphezulu. Ukuqala kokungena kwabaxhasi kusho ukuthuthuka kwebhola labesifazane. Ngesikhathi iqalwa le ligi ngesizini edlule, bekunzima kakhulu kubanikazi bamaqembu ngenxa yokuswela imali yokuhambela imidlalo. Bazoke baphumule abanikazi bamaqembu."Okwenza ngicele nezinye izinkampani ukuthi zixhase ukuthi ekugcineni lezi zingane kumele zondle imindeni yazo ngokudlala ibhola. Kakungafani nezikhathi zethu lapho esasiphuma kwesinye isikhathi singaphethe lutho," kubeka uModise owaba ngowokuqala kuleli zwekazi ukushaya amagoli awu-100 eqenjini lesizwe.Uveze nokuthi unethemba lokuthi iHollywoodbets akhona amalungelo ezowathenga okusakazwa kwale ligi eziteshini ezinkulu zikamabonakude kuleli."Ngithanda ukubonga iSABC ngokusakaza ibhola labesifazane ngezimpelasonto. Nokho kakwanele, ngesikhathi iba miningi imidlalo esakazwayo, bazosondela nabanye abaxhasi. Lokhu kuzophinde kudayise abadlali bethu emaqenjini ase-Europe. Ngicela nokuthi iHollywoodbets neSafa babambisane ekumaketheni le ligi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana,“ kusho uModise.U-Jordaan uthe lolu xhaso luzolekelela abanikazi bamaqembu ekuthuthukiseni ibhola labesifazane kuleli.“Sijabule kakhulu ngalolu xhaso, luzoshintsha okuningi. Lokhu kusho ukuthi iSafa iyaqhubeka nokubeka ibhola labesifazane ezingeni lomhlaba. Ngikhuluma nje sinabadlali abawu-32 abenza kahle kumaligi ase-Europe," kusho uJordaan.Umqeqeshi weBanyana, uDesiree Ellis, uthe lolu xhaso luzokwenza ube lula umsebenzi wokuqoka abadlali bamaqembu esizwe.
title: Injabulo iligi yabesifazane ithola abaxhasi

text: NKOSIKHONA CELEBAKHATHAZEKILE abazali bezingane ezifunda esikoleni esiseMgungundlovu, okuthiwa sinothisha ababili  kuphela INsika Secondary eseSweetwaters, kuthiwa abazali bezingane bathi abasazi ukuthi kumele benzenjani ngoba sebezama kaningi ukuxhumana noMnyango wezeMfundo kodwa kunhlanga zimuka nomoya. Bathi lesi sikole yisona esiseduze ngoba ezinye zikude futhi sinabafundi abenza u-matric.UMnuz Sibusiso Ntuli, ongusihlalo wesigungu esilawula isikole, uthi selokhu azalwa akakaze asibone isikole esinothisha ababili. Uthe labo thisha bafundisa iLife Orientation neMaths Literacy kuphela. Ezinye izifundo kazifundwa kulesi sikole.Kuthiwa abanye othisha bashiya baya kwezinye izikole ngemva kokukhononda kwabo ngokuthi kazikho izinsiza zokusebenza, kuvela ukuthi bashiya ngonyaka odlule. "Sibhalele umhloli omkhulu incwadi sikhala ngalesi simo. Samcela ukuthi kube khona akwenzayo ngokuphazima kweso kodwa lutho kuze kube yimanje, akukho abakwenzile. Asisazi ukuthi sizoshonaphi uma kunje," kuchaza uNtuli.Uthishanhloko wesikole, uNksz Ntombifuthi Khuzwayo, uthe akasazi ukuthi kumele enze njani kwayena ngesimo sesikole. Uthi kade ayewubikela uMnyango wezeMfundo kulesi sifundazwe kodwa kuze kube manje akukho okwenzekayo. Uthe abafundi basuka emakhaya nsuku zonke bezofunda lezi zifundo nje kuphela maqede bagoduke. Naye ucule iculo elifanayo, lokuthi usezame konke okusemandleni ukulungisa isimo kodwa kufana nokuthi uthela amanzi emhlane wedada nje."Kuyiqiniso ziyabheda izinto lapha esikoleni. Angisazi ukuthi ngithatheni ngihlanganise nani. Impela konakele," usho kanje uNksz Khuzwayo. Uthe ngonyaka odlule bakhona abafundi ababhala u-matric, kodwa kwaphansa ingcosana. UMhloli wesiFunda saseMgungundlovu uNksz Nomusa Shabalala, uthe ucela ukungaphawuli ngalolu daba. Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa, uthe akakaze acabange ukuthi kungaba nesikole esingaba nothisha ababili nje kuphela. Uthembisa ukuthi bazozama ukusondela eduze, bathole ukuthi kwenzekani kulesi sikole.NgoLwesibili kuthiwa abafundi bavuke umbhejazane bavalela ilungu lezemfundo ebelijutshwe wumnyango ukuthi lizokwazisa ngezinhlelo zekusasa lesikole. Umthombo weSolezwe NgoMgqibelo  uthi leli lungu lesifazane livalelwe egunjini labafundi kwaze kwaphela cishe amahora amabili abafundi befuna izimpendulo ezisheshayo. Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela ungakatholakali umbiko wakamuva ngokwenzeka kulesi sikole.
title: Isimanga sesikole esinothisha ababili

text: WETHWESE iziqu kwezobuchwepheshe usomahlaya obengomunye wabafundi abangu-7832 ebebethweswa iziqu zabo zemfundo emikhakheni eyahlukeni eDurban University of Technology (DUT) . Lo mcimbi obubanjwe ngobuchwepheshe besimanje (DUT) izinkundla zokuxhumana kanjalo nasemsakazweni ubungohluke kakhulu kubafundi ebebethweswa iziqu, okubalwa noThabiso "Moemish" Msomi waseHammersdale ongusomahlaya. UMoemish othweswe iziqu zeBTech kwi-Information Technology (IT) wangena kule nyuvesi ezitshela ukuthi uzothatha umkhakha wezempilo kodwa wagcina kwezobuchwepheshe. "Ngangifuna ukwenza nanoma ngabe yini ephathelene nomkhakha wezempilo njenge Biomedical Technology nokunye. Kodwa umndeni nabangani bami bangibonisa ukuthi ngenze i-IT. Ngagcina ngenza yona noma ngaqale ngangaqonda kahle,"kusho uMoemish.  Ezinye zezizathu ezamenza washeshe wabona ukuthi lo mkhakha ubalulekile, ukuthola ulwazi lokuthi ngeminye yemikhakha emine esenamathuba emsebenzi amaningi. Eqhuba uthe usenalo uthando lomkhakha wezempilo kodwa ufisa ukuthola indlela yokuyihlanganisa yomibili le mikhakha. Yize esethole lezi ziqu futhi engasakwazanga ukuhambela umcimbi ojwayelekile ngenxa yeCovid, kodwa usazimisele ngokuqhubeka nokufunda enze iMasters kulo mkhakha wezobuchwepheshe. Noma bekungelula ukuphasa kodwa uMoemish uthe ubesebenza ngokukhulu ukuzikhandla kwazise ubenganayo nemali eyanele ukubhekana nezindleko zesikole. "Bekunzima kungikhathaza emoyeni kungikhandla nasezifundweni kwaze kwamele kube khona engikwenzayo. Ngaqala ngakhanda amalaptop nomunye umngani wami sisazama imali,"kusho uMoemish. Amahlaya nawo obengawayekile ngoba umuntu wamancoko futhi ukukhonzile nokuhlala ehlekisa abantu. Ubeba yingxenye yeminye yemicimbi efaka nezinkondlo njalo ngoLwesihlanu nobekuyiyona ndawo ebethola khona ithuba lokuqhulula amahlaya akhe. Ngamahlaya useke wajikeleza izifundazwe zakuleli eziningi wayonandisa naseSwazini. Uke wahlomula nangendondo yeWooden Mic kuma-Idols, wavela nakwezinye izinhlelo zethelevishini.
title: Wethweswe iziqu zobuchwepheshe usomahlaya waseDUT

text: PHEZU kokukhala ngezinkinga zemali inhlangano yakuleli yezokusaza iSABC isithathe igxathu lokusakaza imidlalo yebhola lezinyawo ye-English Premiership.Le nhlangano ike yaba sematheni ithatha isinqumo sokungayisakazi imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership eziteshini zayo zemisakazo ngesikhathi kuqala isizini. Kuvele ukuthi inkinga kube wukungaboni ngaso linye ngasemalini nePremier Soccer League.Kuthe kusenjalo kwaqhamuka nenhlangano ephethe ibhola kuleli iSafa, ikhala ngokuthi iSABC iyikweleta izigidi nokuzodala ukuthi igcine ingakwazi ukusakaza imidlalo yamaqembu esizwe iBafana Bafana neBanyana Banyana.Kodwa izolo iSABC ishiye uPotshoza emangele isikhipha isitatimende iveza ukuthi izokwethula bukhoma imidlalo yase-England. Izovezwa kwiSABC 3 ngo-4 ntambama kusukela ngawo uMgqibelo ngomdlalo ophakathi kwe-Arsenal neWest Ham United. Kuzoba nezinhlelo zokubuyekeza imidlalo kanjalo nezizobe zinekela ababukeli ngokusazokwenza.
title: ISABC nemidalo ye-English Premiership

text: UKHALELWE ngamasongo kaSigonyela owesilisa oneminyaka engu-23 osolwa ngokuthinteka ekubalaweni kowesifazane ona-22 isidumbu sakhe esinqunu esitholwe ngeSonto ekuseni oThongathi.Isidumbu sikaNksz Komell Pillay sitholwe esakhiweni esidala sinqunu. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natali uCaptain Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuboshwa komsolwa."Umsolwa wesilisa uboshwe izolo oThongathi ngecala lokubulala. Uzovela eNkantolo yeMantshi eVerulam maduze," kusho uGwala.Umndeni uveze ukuthi uKomell, obaziwa ngelikaDelicia, akabuyanga ekhaya ngemva kokuya endaweni yokuzijabulisa nomunye wesifazane ongumngani wakhe ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Udadewabo uDesray uthe bazama ukumthinta ngocingo ngeSonto, kodwa ucingo akekho owaphundula ucingo lwakhe.Umndeni wabe usuthola ucingo oluvela emaphoyiseni ebazisa ukuthi isidumbu sikaPillay sitholakale esakhiweni esidala eBrake Village.Okhulumela umndeni uthe izinsolo zokuthi uPillay udlwenguliwe wase eyaklinywa azikaqinisekiswa ngoba uhlolo lwesidumbu alukaphothulwa.
title: Kuboshwe owesilisa ona-23 ngesidumbu esitholwe oThongathi

text:
BAFUNA ukuqashelwa onogada abahlomile abazali bezingane ezifunda eWiggins Secondary eMayville njengoba sekunezikhawu ezimbili siphihlizwa amawindi sicekelwa phansi nangomlilo.NgoLwesibili,  kube nomhlangano ophuthumayo wesigungu sabazali ebesibhunga ngesehlakalo sokushiswa kwamagumbi okufundela amathathu, imoto ibipake emagcekeni esikole, amadeski nezihlalo okwenzeke ngoMsombuluko ezintatha.Kushiswe nezinye izincwadi ebezisemahhovisi ahlala othisha, kwaphihlizwa namawindi ehhovisi lekhansela eliseduzane nalesi sikole. Akugcinanga ngalokhu kodwa kuphinde kwaphihlizwa namawindi esikole samabanga aphansi esakhele iWiggins. Kusolwa abantu abafuna ukwakha emhlabeni wesikole ngokuhlaselwa izikhawu kwalesi sikole.USihlalo wesigungu esilawula lesi sikole, uNkk Siziwe Chili, uthe babize lo mhlangano ukuze baqhamuke nomkhombandlela kulolu daba.Uthe bakhathazekile ngezokuphepha kwabafundi nothisha yingakho bebize isigubhukane lo mhlangano.Kushiswe ngisho ama-deskhi abafundi eWiggins Secondary School eCato Manor. Isithombe: SITHUNYELWE“Sesifuna kube nonogada abahlomile abazogada isikole. Kudala sibhalela umnyango izincwadi, lesi simo singakashubi kanje siwucela ukuthi sifuna ungenelele,” kusho uNkk Chili.Uthe namanje basafuna umnyango ungenelele ngoba babhekene nengwadla.“Siyisikole esingakhokhisi imali yokufunda ngakho umnyango kumele usisize ngonogada abahlomile, nathi sibalwa nezinye izikole ezidinga ngokushesha ukuthi zigadwe ngoba siyahlaselwa,” kusho uNkk Chili.FUNDA:
 
Babhale begadiwe abesikole esishisiweUthe zimbalwa izikole eMayville ngakho kudingeka sivikelwe.“Kumele sivikelwe ngoba senza kahle kakhulu. Uma kushiswa lesi sikole asikho esinye esikhona izikole ziyashoda kule ndawo yingakho kumele sivikelwe ngakho konke,” kusho uNkk Chili.Uthe abafundi abangakaqedi ukubhala abakwaGrade 10 no-11.“Bampintshana kwamanye amakilasi ukuze babhale ngenxa yalesi simo. Sizoqhubeka sisebenzisane namaphoyisa kulesi simo ngoba sisenkingeni.”Amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokucekela phansi impahla.
title: Abazali bafuna onogada esikoleni

text: UKUDLALA ngaphandle kwabalandeli kuzokwenza umsebenzi ube lukhuni ngokuphindiwe kwiKaizer Chiefs uma isidlala neChippa United eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngempelasonto.Lo mdlalo we-Absa Premiership ongoMgqibelo ngo-6 ntambama uzobe ungowokugcina wesigwebo semidlalo emibili esanikwa iChiefs ngemuva kokuthi abalandeli bayo bengene enkundleni balimaza impahla ngesizini edlule.Emdlalweni wokuqala wesigwebo, iChiefs yashaya into ephansi ihlulwa yiPolokwane City, eyayivutha bhe, ngo 1-0.Umqeqeshi weChiefs, uGiovanni Solians, uthe “uyabonga” ukuthi umdlalo neChippa sekungowokugcina ngaphandle kwabalandeli.Ubekhuluma nabezindaba ngemuva kokukhipha iSuperSport United kwiTelkom Knockout eMoses Mabhida Stadium ebigcwele abalandeli baMakhosi.Bekuvungama inkundla uma iChiefs iphethe ibhola abalandeli bekhuthaza iqembu labo. Kanjalo naye uSolinas bebengamnikile ithuba befuna enze ushintsho.“Ukudlala kunabalandeli kuwenzile umehluko. Abalandeli yibona abaphushe iKaizer Chiefs ukuthi inqobe kwiSuperSport. Kunzima ukudlala ngaphandle kwabalandeli ngoba lokho kusiza izimbangi. NgoMgqibelo sizodlala singenabalandeli neChippa futhi kuzoba nzima, ngoba iyiqembu elidlala ibhola elihle ngoba ngiyibukile idlala neSundowns nePirates ibingafanelwe ukwehlulwa.“Kuzoba lukhuni ngoba kuzobe kungekho balandeli. Kodwa ke siyiKaizer Chiefs kumele sidlalele ukunqoba ngoba ngaphezu kwakho konke siyawadinga amaphuzu kodwa ngenhlanhla lona umdlalo wokugcina ngaphandle kwabalandeli,” kusho uSolinas.IChiefs yalengiselwa umdlalo owodwa izinyanga eziwu-24 ingatholakali inecala elifanayo.Ngaphambi kokuthi iChiefs iyofuna amaphuzu kwiChippa kumele iqale iwalwele kwiBlack Leopards namuhla eFNB Stadium no-7.30 ebusuku.URamahlwe Mphahlele oshaye igoli lokunqoba kwi-United, ucashunwe kwi-website yaMakhosi ethi kuzomele bangayithathi kancane iLidoda Duvha.“Bayiqembu elikuthandayo ukudlala ibhola, abahlali emuva. Kuzomele silwe njengoba senzile sibhekene neSuperSport,” kusho uMphahlele.IChiefs ihleli endaweni yesikhombisa kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-14 emidlalweni ewu-11. ILeopards yona isanamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye okuyibeka endaweni ka-12.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:Namuhla ngo-7.30 ebusuku: Mamelodi Sundowns v Free State Stars (Loftus Stadium); Kaizer Chiefs v Black Leopards (FNB Stadium)NgoLwesihlanu: Marizburg United v Highlands Park (Harry Gwala Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: Mamelodi Sundownsv Orlando Pirates (Loftus Stadium, 330pm); Lamontville Golden Arrows v Baroka FC (Princess Magogo Stadium, 3.30pm); Kaizer Chiefs v Chippa United (Moses Mabhida Stadium, 6pm); Bidvest Wits v Bloemfontein Celtic (Bidvest Stadium, 8.15pm); Free State Stars v SuperSport United (Goble Park Stadium, 8.15pm);NgeSonto ngo-3.30 ntambama: Cape Town City v Black Leopards (Cape Town Stadium); AmaZulu FC v Polokwane City (King Zwelithini Stadium)
title: 'Kunzima ukudlala kungenabalandeli kusiza izimbangi'

text: IZOTHWALA kanzima i-Orlando Pirates ebuya ngenqwaba yemidlalo enzima ye-Absa Premiership ngenyanga ezayo.NgoFebhuwari 3, eZimnyama zizodudulana neBidvest Wits e-Ellis Park ngo-8 ebusuku bese kuthi ngoFebhuwari 8 zishukane nePlatinum Stars eRoyal Bafokeng Stadium, eNorth West.Ngemuva kwalo mdlalo iBucs izobhuquzisana neMamelodi Sundowns eLoftus Versfeld Stadium, ePitoli. Kuzothi kusenjalo ngoFebhuwari 15 itholane neWits e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto, eGoli. NgoFebhuwari 18, izobhekana nomqeqeshi wayo omdala * -Eric Tinkler osecija iCape Town City eCape Town Stadium. UTinkler ubeshayela umkhumbi weZimnyama ngesizini edlule.Usezakhele igama ngokuthela othulini abaqeqeshi abahlonishwayo eNingizimu Afrika. Uqumbe phansi uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane weSundowns, Steve “Mphathi” Komphela weKaizer Chiefs, Stuart Baxter weSuperSport United noGavin Hunt weWits.Ngemuva komdlalo weCity amaBhakabhaka azodlala nePolokwane City e-Orlando ngoFebhuwari 25. Lo mdlalo uzolandelwa ngabazowudlala neChiefs ngoMashi 4 eFNB Stadium.Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi eZimnyama zizodlala imidlalo eyisithupha ngoFebhuwari ezinsukwini ezingu-20. Leli qembu alizange lenze kahle emzuliswaneni wokuqala. Livale lihlezi endaweni ka-10 ku-log ngamaphuzu angu-18 emidlalweni engu-13.Lihlukaniswe amaphuzu ayisikhombisa neSuperSport eqhwakele ngamaphuzu angu-25. IPirates kulindeleke ukuthi imemezele uGiovani Solanis njengomqeqeshi wayo omusha. Lo mqeqeshi usanda kusula isigubhukane kuFree State Stars abeyilolonga.U-Augusto “Njenje” Palacios usabambe izintambo. IPirates ishiywe nguMuhsin Ertugral phakathi nesizini. Lo mqeqeshi odabuka eTurkey walotsholwa yiSuperSport United ngo 6-1 ngemuva kwalokho wakhonjwa indlela.Isiyonke imidlalo yokuqala ye-Absa Premiership imi kanje:NgoFebhuwari 3:Bidvest Wits v Orlando Pirates (Ellis Park, 8pm)NgoFebhuwari 7:Kaizer Chiefs v Free State Stars (FNB Stadium, 7.30pm); Bidvest Wits v Ajax Cape Town (Bidvest Stadium, 7.30pm); Cape Town City v Highlands Park (Cape Town Stadium, 7.30pm); Chippa United v Baroka (Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium, 7.30pm)NgoFebhuwari 8:SuperSport United v Golden Arrows (Lucas Moripe Stadium, 7.30pm); Ajax Cape Town v Cape Town City (Cape Town Stadium, 7.30pm); Polokwane City v Maritzburg United (Old Peter Mokaba Stadium, 7.30pm)
title: Umqansa ohlalele i-Orlando Pirates

text: IZIPHATHIMANDLA zeziteshi zeDStv ezehlukene zimemezele izinhlelo ezintsha esezizokhonjiswa kuzo okuzobakhona eziningi kuzo ezivela phesheya kwezilwandle.Phakathi kwazo iThe Bachelor South Africa, Cheaters ezokwaziwa ngokuthi Uyajola Na?Akuqali ngalezi zinhlelo ukuthi zithathelwe kwezaphesheya.Zikhona nezinye okubalwa kuzo iMasterChef SA, eyakhonjiswa isizini eyodwa yaphela, iMy Kitchen Rules SA, The Voice SA, Dancing With the Stars, So You Thing you Can Dance, Survivor SA nezinye.Kumanje kuMzansi Magic kukhonjiswa olwemfashini iProject Runway eyaqalwa eMelika.Akuzona zonke izinhlelo ezibaliwe ezaba yimpumelelo okufakazelwa wukuthi ezinye zazo zakhonjiswa amasizini amancane zayekwa.Obekwenza ukuthi zingabi yimpumelelo wukuthi bekuhamba kuhambe kuvele ukuthi azibi nabalandeli abaningi njengezinye. Lokhu bekwenza ukuthi zingangenisi inzuzo ezinkampanini ezizenzayo.Lulodwa kuphela uhlelo olwathathelwa kwezaphesheya lwakhombisa impumelelo - ama-Idols SA okumanje kukhonjiswa isizini yawo ka-14.Ngisho umsunguli wawo ama-Idols SA, uGavin Wratten, onguphrojusa walo wakubeka kwacaca ngelinye ilanga enkulunweni neSolezwe wathi emhlabeni wonke lolu hlelo lwakuleli ilona oluhamba phambili ngababukeli kunezinye ezikhonjiswa kwamanye amazwe.Kumele sibashayele ihlombe ophrojusa baseNingizimu Afrika bezinkampani ezehlukene abathathe izinto zakwamanye amazwe baziletha lapha ukuze nathi sibe nezinhlelo ezifuze ezaphesheya kodwa ezinziwa kwelengabadi, into engelula edinga isibindi ngoba besuke bengazi ukuthi zizokwamukelwa kanjani.Ngijabulise okwengane encane ngibona ukuthi sekuzokhonjiswa iCheaters Uyajola Na neBachelor SA.Lezi zinhlelo zimnandi kakhulu futhi zibukwa kakhulu emazweni aphesheya ngisho sezikhonjiswa eNingizimu Afrika abantu bazithakasela ngendlela efanayo.Ngiyathemba ukuthi nalapha kuzoba njalo.Ngiwumlandeli omkhulu walezi zinhlelo zontathu ezisuka e-USA.Uma uzibuka uye ufise ukuzibona ukuthi ezweni okulo zingenzenjani.Kungenze ngabashayela ihlombe ophrojusa bazo ngokuthatha into engelula njengokuhlanganisa izinhlelo ezinjengalezi zenzeke eNingizimu Afrika.Kodwa injabulo yami iphinde yashabalala kolulodwa engibone ngathi luzoba nomthelela omubi. Lolo kube yiCheaters Uyajola Na?.Ukuzwa imibono eyehlukene yabantu ngalo kuyathusa ikakhulukazi njengoba sinenkinga yokubulawa kwabesifazane ngabayeni babo noma abathandana nabo ezweni lethu.Kungenzeka ukuthi abasunguli balo abazange bacabange ngomthelela olungahle lube nawe esizweni uma selukhonjiswa.Kodwa umbono wami ngalezi zinhlelo zonke wukuthi kuyajabulisa ukuthe sezize zafika eNingizimu Afrika. Lokhu nje kukodwa kukhombisa ukuthi ithelevishini iyakhula kwelakithi.
title: Ziyanda izinhlelo zaphesheya eziza kuleli

text: UMASIPALA weTheku kuvele ukuthi ukhokhe izizumbulu zemali ukhokhela umsebenzi owawungakaqalwa, wephula imigomo elandelwayo yokukhokha.Lokhu kuvele embikweni wuphiko lwangaphakathi oluphenya izenzo zenkohlakalo iCity Integrity and Investigation Unit(CCIU).Lo mbiko leli phephandaba eliwubonile udalula ukuthi umasipala wakhokha imali enguR36 126 257.24, ezinkampanini ezine, phezu kokuba zangakawuqali wokwakha izindlu zangasese ezikoleni nasemakhaya.Umbiko uveza ukuthi inkampani iTemblos SA Pty (Ltd) uR28. 363884.22 okuyiyona eyagoduka nemibengo enonile, ezinye ezintathu okuyiSoundrite Construction and Plant Hire (PTY) Ltd, iMagubane Plant and Constructors CC ne-Uhlanga Trading Enterprise CC zathola imibengo ka-R2.587458.00Ngesikhathi becelwa ukuthi baphawule ngokwehlukana, banqume ukuhlangana bese beza emahhovisi eSolezwe ukuze baziphawulele.Bathe baqala nokuyizwa indaba yokuthi bathinteka ezinsolweni zenkohlakalo."Siyawuzwa umbiko okukhulunywa ngawo kodwa besingazi ngawo.“Zonke lezi zinsolo zingamampunge, kumanje umsebenzi uyaqhubeka simema noma ngubani ofisa ukufika lapho sisebenza khona, azozibonela. Thina saqokwa ngendlela esemthethweni ukuthi senze umsebenzi, asikaze senze mkhonyovu,’’ kusho omunye wabo.Ngokombiko kuvela ukuthi kwakufanele kwakhiwe izindluzangasese ezingu-2,200, kuvela nokuthi kwaba nokukhuphula amanani njengoba umasipala wagcina ukhokha uR18 300 ngendlu yangasese eyodwa esikhundleni sikaR9 300.Abasebenzi bamakamasipala abathintekayo kulokhu ngoMnuz Sibusiso Vilane oyiPhini lenhloko emnyangweni wezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle noMnuz Vusimuzi Mkhwanazi oyimenenja ephezulu ezinhlelweni eziyipesheli emnyangweni kwezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle.Kuvela ukuthi lo mbiko uthunyelelwe uMnuz Sipho Nzuza oyiMenenja yoMkhandlu, uMnuz Ednick Mswele oyinhloko yomnyango wezamanzi, uMnuz Sandile Mnguni oyinhloko yokusetshenziswa kwezimali, ikhansela uMnuz Thabani Luthuli ongusihlalo wekomiti elibhekele izimali zomphakathi, uNksz Londiwe Mthembu owusihlalo wekomiti lezokucutshungulwa kwamabhuku noNksz Kim Makhathini okwandabazabantu.Umbiko weluleka umasipala ukuthi umise emsebenzini ngokushesha izikhulu ezithintekayo kulo mkhonyovu,ubike nodaba emaphoyiseni ukuze kuphenywe ukukhwabaniswa kwemali.Lo mbiko uphinde uphakamise ukuthi lezi zinkampani ezithintekayo zifakwe ohlwini lwezinkampani ezidingisiwe ekusebenzeni nohulumeni ngenxa yomsanka wenkohlakalo.Umthombo othembekile uthe iMenenja kaMasipala uMnuz Sipho Nzuzayabizela emhlanganweni izikhulu zikamasipala ezithintekayo ngenhloso yokuzazisa ngohlelo lokuzimisa emsebenzini kodwa kwafika isigijimi esivela komunyewabaholi bezepolitiki, evimba ukuthi kumiswe laba abasolwayo.Kuthiwa lezi zikhulu ziyaqhubeka nomsebenzi wazo sengathi akwenzeke lutho njengoba zigcine zingamiswanga.Okhulumela umasipala uNksz Tozi Mthethwa uthe imenenja kamasipala uNzuza isawucubungula umbiko uzothatha izinyathelo, eziphakanyiswe abaphenyi embikweni.
title: Kusolwa ukuthi umasipala ukhokhe izigidi ngomsebenzi ongekho

text: OWAYENGUKHOMISHANA wakwaSars, uMnuz Tom Moyane, uzothola ithuba lokuphonsa ngemibuzo uNgqongqoshe wezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, kwiKhomishini ephenya ngokuLawulwa koMbuso yiDlanzana, ngodaba lokwethweswa amacala ngo-2016 ngokusungula uphiko labaphenyi olungekho emthethweni kwaSARS.Sibe yimpumelelo isicelo sikaMoyane sokuphonsa imibuzo uGordhan, njengoba kumemezele izolo uSihlalo wale Khomishini, iJaji uRaymond Zondo.Ummeli kaMoyane, uMnuz Eric Mabuza, uthe umuntu ammele uyajabula ukuthi uzoke athole ubulungiswa.“Ingalo yomthetho ihambe ihambe ithole noma ubani. Sikubheke ngabomvu ukuba uGordhan akwazi ukubhekana nemibuzo. Sizoyalela ummeli omkhulu ukuba aqale alungiselele ukumphonsa ngemibuzo. Ngiyathemba ikhomishini izosheshe ilungise usuku lapho sizokwazi khona ukumphonsa imibuzo. Sekuphele unyaka manje uGordhan afakaza. Ukuhlehliswa kokuba uthole ubulungiswa kufana nokuthi uyancishwa ithuba lokuba uthole ubulungiswa,” kusho uMabuza kwisitatimende.Uqhube wathi: “Ngokwethu ukuvula icala kukaMoyane, kwakungenziwa yinoma imuphi umuntu ongukhomishana yakwaSars, uma ebhekene nezinsolo zokusungula uphiko lwabaphenyi abangekho emthethweni.”UGordhan wethula ubufakazi kwikhomishini ngonyaka odlule nokuyilapho asola khona uMoyane ngokuthi isenzo sakhe sokuba amvulele icala lobugebengu ngokusungula uphiko lwabaphenyi abangekho emthethweni kwaSars, kwakumayelana nokuba avumele ukuba kube khona abathize abavumela ukulawulwa kombuso yindlazana.Ikhomishini iyaqhubeka nokulalela ubufakazi.
title: UMoyane ujabulele ithuba lokupheka uGordhan

text: OWAYENGUSIHLALO we-ANC eWestern Cape, uMnuz Marius Fransman, ungeniswe esibhedlela emva kokutholakala ukuthi unegciwane iCorona.UFransman uhlole ngeledlule ngemuva kokungazizwa kahle emuva kokuvakasha kwakhe phesheya.Umholi we-ANC uveze udaba lwakhe ekhasini lakhe le-Facebook ngoLwesibili ebusuku.“Emuva kokubuya phesheya emasontweni amabili edlule, bengingazizwa kahle ngabe sengithatha isinqumo sokuthi ngiyohlola kwatholakala ukuthi nginegciwane i-Corona. Kumanje ngisesibhedlela, nginxusa bonke abantu engike ngahlangana nabo ngenyanga edlule ukuba bazihlole,” kusho uFransman.Unxuse wonke umuntu ukuthi azihlole ukuze kuliwe negciwane.UNdunankulu waseWestern Cape, uMnuz Alan Winde, ngoLwesibili ubike ukuthi sebewu-348 abantu okutholakale ukuthi banegciwane esifundazweni sakhe.UWinde uthe abawu-13 bayahlolwa esibhedlela, abathathu basesimeni esibucayi.Uthe isifundazwe sakhe sineme ngendlela esilapha ngayo abantu abaneCovid-19.UWinde uthe kwabangenwe yigciwane, abawu-50 kubona sebeluleme emuva kokuthola usizo.UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa umemezele ukuthi bayalivala izwe okwesikhashana izinsuku eziwu-21 ukuze baqinise umkhankaso wokunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane.Esithangamini nabezindaba eThekwini ngoLwesibili uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uthe ukhona umehluko okhona ekulweni nokubhebhetheka kwegciwane kusukela kuthathwe isinqumo sokuvala izwe.UMkhize uthe ososayensi bebeqagela ukuthi kuzothi kufika lesi sikhathi samanje bebe sebengaphezu kuka-4000 abantu abangenwe yigciwane.“Kodwa namanje isibalo sisephansi asikeqi ngisho ku-2000, okusho ukuthi ukuvalwa kwezwe kunomthelelo omuhle.”
title: UFransman esibhedlela etholwe negciwane

text: UNIKELELWE ngendlu umfundi wasoLundi onomdlavuza wezinso obesekuphele iminyaka emithathu ehleli esibhedlela ngoba umuzi wakubo wodaka awuvumelani nesimo sakhe sempilo.UNokwethemba Dlamini (16), wasoThini, eNkonjeni ofakelwe izinso ngemuva kokuthi ezakhe zihlaselwe umdlavuza, ubesehlale iminyaka emithathu esibhedlela Inkosi Albert Luthuli, odokotela bethi akuphephile ukuthi ayohlala endlini yodaka eyodwa abehlala kuyo namalungu omndeni wakhe angu-20.UNokwethemba isimo somuzi wakubo siholele ekutheni abuye esegula kakhulu kungakapheli nesonto enikezwe ithuba lokuthi abavakashele ekhaya, ngemuva kwalokhu odokotela bathatha isinqumo sokuthi ahlale esibhedlela aze alulame ngokuphelele.UNksz Kholiswa Nonkwelo weSisekelo Foundation okuyinhlangano esiza izingane ezinezifo ezibucayi, eziphoqeleka ukuthi zihlale ezibhedlela ngenxa yesimo senhlalo emakhaya, ngokuhlanganyela noMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu KwaZulu-Natal, uMasipala wasoLundi nosomabhizinisi bendawo bakhele le ntombazane indlu enamakamelo amane anikezwe wona ngokusemthethweni ngempelasonto.Kule ndlu uNokwethemba uzohlala nezingane zakubo nonina kuphela.UMnuz Mbulelo Baloyi womnyango uthe ungqongqoshe uMnuz Ravi Pillay uthinteke kakhulu ngesimo sale ntombazane eyahlaselwa umdlavuza ineminyaka eyisishayagalolunye.UNQQONGQOSHE wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ravi Pillay, uNokwethemba Dlamini noNksz Kholiswa Nonkwelo ngesikhathi kuvulwa ngokusemthethweni indlu ayakhelwe umnyangoUmnyango wakhe indlu, inkampani yendawo iMathamsanqamahle Trading and Projects yafaka ugesi, umasipala wathenga imibhede negilosa.UNokwethemba uthe ujabule kakhulu ukuthi usezohlala nomndeni wakhe ebese kunesikhathi eside ehlukene nawo.Uthe akufisayo manje ukuthi abuyele esikoleni , wagcina esikoleni kwaGrade7 eSivannda Higher Primary eminyakeni emithathu eyedlule.
title: Umfundi onomdlavuza wezinso unikelelwe ngendlu enogesi

text: SIVULWE kabusha isitolo sakwaCambridge Food esiku-117 Warwick Avenue okudume ngokuthi isemakethe eThekwini.Lesi sitolo savulwa ngoJulayi 23.Ngo-1996 uCambridge Food wavulwa okokuqala emakethe unemishini emihlanu, abasebenzi abawu-30 nezinsiza kusebenza ezazithathwe kwezinye izitolo.Manje usuyikhaya lemititilizo elisiza abathengi ukuthi bonge, mukhulu unobuchwephshe besimanje, unemishini ewu-48, abasebenzi abawu-169 abasiza abathengi bemamatheka.Kudayiswa igilosa ehlukene, kunebhusha likanokusho, indawo edayisa ukudla okuphekiwe okwehla esiphundu, i-baker edayisa isinkwa esimnandi futhi amanani okudla awambi eqolo.
title: Sivulwe kabusha isitolo uCambridge emakethe

text:
ABATHANDI be-cricket bazobhema bakholwe njengoba inhlangano yezokusakaza kuleli iSABC izoyisakaza imidlalo yeNdebe yoMhlaba.Le nhlangano imemezele ngoMsombuluko ukuthi sebevumelene neSuperSport okuyiyona enegunya lokwethula lemidlalo, ngokuthi ikwazi ukuletha le midlalo kwiningi labantu baseNingizimu Afrika.Yize lungakaphumi uhla lwemidlalo ezosakwazwa kwa-SABC kodwa kunethemba lokuthi abathandi balo mdlalo bazokwazi ukuyibona bukhoma yonke eyamaProteas.Kuthiwe isivumelwano sithi eminye imidlalo izovezwa bukhoma, ezovezwa isiqoshiwe kanjalo namazwibela yaleyo ezobe isidlalile.JOINT MEDIA STATEMENT | 
pic.twitter.com/ZZDlonwzv5— SABCPortal (@SABCPortal) 
May 27, 2019
title: I-Sabc nesivumelwano semidlalo yeNdebe yoMhlaba ye-cricket

text: SINGASE sivalwe thaqa isibhedlela esizimele esiKwaZulu-Natal, iSt Augustine, ngemuva kokuba kutholakale ukuthi abahlengikazi abawu-11 sebengenwe yiCoronavirus.Izolo abasebenzi bakulesi sibhedlela bebechwaza beshayela nabezindaba izingcingo bebika lolu daba, bethi besaba nokuthi lesi sibhedlela sizongakubiki lokhu naseMnyangweni wezeMpilo wesifundazwe.“ Yinqwaba yamanesi okubuye imiphumela kwavela ukuthi baneCovid 19...manje kuvalwe isibhedlela kuthiwa akungaphumi muntu. Kuyachwaza njengamanje lapha esibhedlela abanye bayakhala ngoba abazi noma nabo sebenaso yini lesi sifo. Mina ngisaba ngisho ukubuyela ekhaya ezinganeni zami ngoba ngingase ngizithelele ngoba angizazi noma nginayo yini,” kusho omunye umsebenzi obekhuluma nephephandaba izolo.Ekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba izolo uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane- Zulu, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kunabahlengikazi asebehaqwe yigciwane kulesi sibhedlela.Uthe bahlela nokuthi lesi sibhedlela basivale thaqa ukuze kunqandwe ukubhebhetheka kwaso, nabanye bathole ukuhlolwa.Uveze nokuthi namahlanje abasebenzi bezempilo bazogasela eMlaza ukuze kuhlolwe inqwaba yabantu ukuthi abangeniwe yini yilo mkhuhlane.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuzwelonke uDkt Zwelini Mkhize izolo uthe bawu-1 505 abantu osekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi baneCorona kuleli.Abawu-43 kubona baqinisekiswe izolo okubalwa nababili baKwaZulu-Natal abadlule emhlabeni ngenxa yalesi sifo.Kubona kubalwa izaguga ezimbili esinye sino-80 kuthi esinye sibe no-81. Omunye ushone ngo-Ephreli 2, omunye washona ngo-Ephreli 1. Kumanje bayisikhombisa osekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi sebeshonile ezweni lonke.
title: Singase sivalwe thaqa isibhedlela esizimele saseThekwini ngeCorona

text: ANGAWAGAXA noma yinini amakhokho emgibeni uTsepo Masilela, ozakhele igama emuva ohlangothini lwesokunxele kwiKazer Chiefs.Lezi zindaba zitshelwe Isolezwe yimenenja kaMasilela, uMike Makaab okuqinisekisile ukuthi sebeke bayibhunga izikhathi ezimbalwa eyokuthatha umhlalaphansi kwalesi sitobha esineminyaka ewu-34.UMakaab uveze ukuthi ngaphambi kokuthatha lesi sinqumo bazoqale babheke ukuthi kukhona yini okuhlanganayo.Uqhubeke wathi okwamanje kalikho iqembu eseliphumele obala ngokufuna lesi sitobha noma elibeka into ephathekayo etafuleni.“Impela eyokubeka amakhokho emgibeni yinto acabanga ukuyenza uMasilela. Nakuba kunjalo sizoqale silinde sibheke ukuthi kawukho yini umsebenzi oqhamukayo.Ngabe ngiqamba amanga, okwamanje kusazithulelele. UMasilela wumdlali wezinga eliphezulu futhi kukhona asengakwenza ebholeni lakuleli.Sizothula, silinde okuzoqhamuka. Nginethemba lokuthi maduze kukhona okuzohlangana,” kubeka uMakaab.Le menenja iveze nokuthi uMasilela owake wadlala kwiGatafe egijima kwiLa Liga, eSpain, akanayo nencane inkinga ngenkece njengoba ibhizinisi lakhe lenza kahle ngendlela eyisimanga.Ithe lo mdlali ongakaze athole qembu selokhu achithwa yiChiefs ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2017/18, usegxile kakhulu ebhizinisini lezindlu.“Lenza kahle kakhulu ibhizinisi lakhe. Akanalo noluncane uvalo ngemali. Okuhle ngaye wukuthi uyakwazi ukuzihlela izinto zakhe futhi ukhulile emqondweni. Ngesikhathi izinto zisamhambela kahle ebholeni ukwazile ukulondoloza imali,” kuqhuba le menenja.UMasilela uneziqu zeBusiness Management. Kuvela nokuthi ebhizinisini lezindlu ubambisene nonkosikazi wakhe.Ngemuva kokuba lo mdlali, ongumfowabo ka-Innocent Maela we-Orlando Pirates, echithwe yiChiefs kuvele ukuthi ufunwa yiChippa United neMaritzburg United kodwa wagcina engawajoyinanga la maqembu.Ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka bekubhekwe nokuthi ajoyine iPalmeros FC yaseNorth West kodwa kwagcina kungacaci.Kuleli qembu kukhona uMthokozisi Yende, owake wadlala kuyona iChiefs noMfundo Shumana owake wayibamba kwi-Ajax Cape Town eminyakeni edlule. Ethimbeni labaqeqeshi kukhona noBennet Mnguni owayedlala kwiMamelodi Sundowns noRobert Modiadie owayengunozinti kwi-Orlando Pirates nakwiBlack Leopards.Lo mdlali waseWitbank, eMpumalanga, ungomunye wababe nenhlanhla yokudlala kwiFifa Confederations Cup nakwiNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2010. KwiBafana Bafana udlale imidlalo ewu-51. Uwine neMaccabi isicoco seligi ngesizini ka-2008/09 nakweka-2010/11. Ngaphansi kwaleli qembu udlale nakwi-Uefa Champions League.
title: Angase awagaxe emgibeni ozakhele igama kwiChiefs

text: SIBI isimo kowesifazane onguthisha olaliswe esibhedlela ngenxa yengcindezi ngemuva kokushiywa yindoda yakhe engumzalwane, enyamalale noMam’ mfundisi obizwa ngoMphrofethikazi okuthiwa ubevamise ukuthumela lo mzalwane izithombe zakhe enqunu.Sekuphele amasonto amathathu owesilisa okuthiwa ngowaseLamontville ongumzalwane ocula umculo wokholo enyamalele nenkosikazi yomfundisi webandla iThe Potters Church, eThekwini.Kuthiwa banyamalale bethi bavakashela phesheya eLondon nengxenye yebandla nomfundisi ongumyeni kamphrofethikazi, kanti uqamba amanga, bazihambela nalo mzalwane bobabili.Njengamanje lo wesifazane (49) onezingane ezimbili esingeke salidalula igama lakhe ngenhloso yokuvikela izingane, ulaliswe esibhedlela eNtabeni ngenxa yokugula emoyeni.Uthe umyeni wakhe kufana nokuthi umgqeme ingozi engeqiwa ntwala njengoba emshiye ekhubazekile ngokomqondo ngesenzo asenzile.“Ngibuye ngilahlekelwe umqondo ngento angenze yona. Emva kweminyaka engu-28 sashada engakaze angigile ngalolu hlobo,” kusho lona wesifazane.Nezingane zakhe uthi zihlukumezekile ngenzo sikayise. Uthe nezinsuku akasazikhumbuli kahle ngenxa yokuhlukumezeka ahlangabezane nakho.Uthe lo mphrofethikazi okuthiwa udume ngokukhuleka, ukwelapha, ukweluleka abantu abazoshada nabasenkingeni yokuhaqwa yizidakamizwa, wamazi ngaye umyeni wakhe ngoba ethi uyaye abameme ukuthi bazocula esontweni lakhe.“Ngelinye ilanga wafika ezocela ukuba ngimgadele izingane zakhe ngoba besesiqala ukujwayelana,” echaza. Uthe indaba yonakala emva kokuba esethola izithombe zakhe kwiselula yomyeni wakhe. Ekuqaleni uthi wayethumela izithombe evule imilenze kuvele nedilozi aligqokile. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi uthi umphrofethikazi ugcine esethumela izithombe zakhe enqunu.“Ngamxwayisa umyeni wami ngalokhu ngathi ngicela azisuse lezo zithombe ocingweni lwakhe kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.”Ngosuku okuthiwa bahamba ngalo ukuya “phesheya”, umyeni wakhe wayeqale ngokuthi uzogibela indiza eKing Shaka International Airport eThekwini, okwathi uma ethi uzomhambisa, washintsha wathi usezogibela ibhasi indiza ayibambe eGoli.Umfundisi okuthiwa inkosikazi yakhe yahamba nalo mzalwane, uthe naye usakhathala wuyena, yingakho eseze waphonsa ithawula.Ethintwa umphrofethikazi, uzishilo igama lakhe eqala ukubamba ucingo. Ubuze ukuthi ukhuluma nobani wakuphi.Eseyitholile impendulo, uvele wathi ngeke akwazi ukuphawula ngalokho, wavala ucingo. Umzalwane yena ucingo lwakhe belwamukela imilayezo kuphela. Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engayibuyisanga impendulo.
title: Uvele wagula edlelwa indoda yincekukazi

text: KUMTHATHE iminyaka emithathu ukugcwalisa isaka elilodwa likadoti uthisha wesikole esigcine sidla umhlanganiso emncintiswaneni wokuqoqa imfucuza ohlelwa iCoca Cola Beverages South Africa(CCBSA).UNksz Mathombi Khwela ofundisa uGrade 3 Eqinisweni Primary, eMatikwe, eNanda, uthe wacishe wawushiya phansi umncintiswano ayekade ezingenele yena kuwo ngoba ezwe ukuthi kutholaka imihlomulo esiza ekuthuthukiseni isikole.Uthe wawuthanda umncintiswano emuva kokuba ezwe omunye wothisha owumngani wakhe encoma esho nezinto asebezenzile ngokusizwa ngabakwaCCBSA.“Umngani wami wayehalalisa uma exoxa nangezindawo abazihambayo behlelelwe yiwo iCCBSA. Ngangizwa sengathi kulula kanti angibuzanga elangeni. Kwalethwa amasaka amane, kwathiwa asiwagcwalise. Ngithe uma ngilivula elokuqala ngabona ngamanye amehlo ukuthi kanti likhulu kangaka.“Ngangikhuluma nabafundi kodwa kube yidlanzana elifika nezigubhu zeplastiki, inqwaba ingayingeni indaba yami. Imoto ezothatha udoti yayifika elethu isaka lingewona nohhafu. Umqoqi wayejabha esefikile uma ebona ukuthi kanti uzothatha into encane kangaka. Kwaze kwafinyelela lapho engitshela khona ukuthi kumosheka uphethroli uma efika udoti ungenele. Nakhona kwaCCBSA bangitshela ukuthi bazophoqeleka ukuthi bangikhiphe. Inhliziyo yami yayibuhlungu ngoba uma ngibiziwe ngizobuka ezinye izikole sezithola imiklomelo yazo, othisha engangikhuluma nabo babethi kulula. Bangicobelela ngamasu kodwa akangisizanga.”Uthe kwaqala ukuthi kube nomehluko ngo-2016 esethola ukuthi kanti angafaka namaphepha. Ngelinye ilanga wahamba nothishomkhulu wesikole beye emcimbini wabawinile sebeyothola izindondo.“ Uthishomkhulu wabona umsebenzi wezinye izikole wabuya efunzelekile. Wafunga wathi ngeke sehlulwe ngezinye izikole ngokucosha udoti, kuzomele sibambisane. Sasebenzisa imoto yakhe sihambe ngayo siyocosha udoti emizini ebenemicimbi ngezimpelasonto, othisha nabo benza okufanayo. Kwaba nomunye uthisha ongilekelelelayo.”Ukwanda kwezigubhu, amathini namaphepha esikoleni kwamphosela enye inselelo yokuthi kumele akubheke ungasaphazeki egcekeni lesikole. Abafundi uthi bese benokusika izigubhu baphakele kuzo uma bengawaphethe amapleti.“Izigubhu ezisikiwe bekwenzeka uzibone seziphephuka egcekeni, lapho sengizobizwa wozakwethu bathi udoti wakho ususaphazekile. Emzini wami nakhona udoti ugcwele ngoba omakhelwane bawuletha khona. Ngelinye ilanga nginomcimbi ngaze ngawufaka ebhuthini ngibalekela ukuthi ubonwe yizivakashi. Izingane zami kwesinye isikhathi zivele zikhale ngenxa yokwanda kwawo ekhaya. Lokho akungikhathazi ngoba ngifuna ukukhombisa esikoleni ukuthi udoti uyimali.”Uthe umncintiswano ukwenza ukuthi uhlale ucabanga amasu amasha okuqoqa nokukhuthaza abafundi.“ Ezinkundleni zezokuxhumana kuhlale kushiwo ukuthi yisiphi isikole esihamba phambili. Uma usephansi uqhamuka namasu amasha ngoba ufuna ukwehlula lowo obona sengathi uhamba yedwa phambili.”Ngo-2017 baqoqe amathani awu-12 bathola uR12 000 athe kuzofakwa ngawo ophephela emakilasini. Nyakenye bathole uR54 000 athe bahlele ukuthi kwakhiwe ngawo umpheme.
title: Uqongelela udoti ukusiza isikole sakhe

text: KULIMALE abafundi abangu-18 ngesikhathi itekisi abebeya ngayo esikoleni itholana phezulu nenye imoto eWaterloo, eVerulam.Laba bafundi basesikoleni samabanga aphansi iMdloti Primary eConiston, eVerulam kuthiwa bebehamba ngeNyathi ngesikhathi beshayisana neVW Polo emgwaqweni uM25 ngaphandle kwaseWaterloo izolo ekuseni.Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo iReaction Unit South Africa, uMnuz Prem Balram, uthe abezimo eziphuthumayo bathintwe abashayeli abebedlula eduze kwalapho kwenzeke khona ingozi becelela abalimele usizo.“Ngesikhathi abezimo eziphuthumayo befika basize izingane ezineminyaka ephakathi kweyisithupha kuya kwengu-10 ebezinemihuzukwana ngaphambi kokuthi bazidlulisele esibhedlela Osindisweni,” kusho uBalram.Uthe kusolakala ukuthi Inyathi ebihambisa izingane izithathe eWaterloo iya esikoleni ngesikhathi ishayisana neVW Polo ebiphuma eWaterloo.Kuthiwa abashayeli balezi zimoto zombili abazange balimale.
title: Kulimale 18 wabafundi engozini

text: USALE ukhungathekile umphakathi nomakhelwane baseMsamu, eMuden, ngaphandle kwaseGreytown, emuva kokuba kubulawe owesifazane oneminyaka engu-51 phambi kwezingane zakhe.UNkk Luzile “MaZakwe” Dladla, udutshulwe esemzini wakhe ngoLwesine ebusuku.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, uthole ucingo kwathiwa akaphumele ngaphandle kwendlu okuyilapho edutshulwe khona.Lo wesifazane kuthiwa ubehlezi nezingane zakhe ezintathu adutshulwe phambi kwazo.Izingane kuthiwa zitholwe phansi kombhede sezicashile.Isidumbu sakhe naso besiseduze kwawo umbhede ebekucashe kuwo izingane.Ikhansela lakule ndawo elingumakhelwane kamufi uMnuz Zibeke Zakwe, lithe basale bekhungathekile ngokudutshulwa kukaNkk Dladla.“Kubi ukudutshulwa komuntu wesifazane, kusishaqile futhi sikhungathekile singomakhelwane bakhe. Umphakathi ushaqekile ngalokhu okwenzekile ngoba yinto engaziwa kule ndawo. Nalowo mbulali uhamba eqhosha nje ngokubulala umuntu wesifazane. Ngezwa kuqhuma isibhamu ngisekhaya ngoba ngangingakalali ngabe sengigijima ngiya khona ngafica izingane zicashe phansi kombhede naye elele ngakhona embhedeni ngoba wadutshulwa ngaphandle wabe esezama ukubalekela endlini,” kuchaza uZakwe.Elandisa leli phephandaba uthe noma bengayazi imbangela yokubulawa kwakhe kodwa bathole ukuthi wakhishwa ucingo endlini.“Esikuzwayo wukuthi wakhishwa ngefoni endlini, kuthe eyobamba ucingo wabe esedutshulwa. Esedubulekile wabaleka esebuyela endlini ezama ukuyocasha phansi kombhede. Esikufunayo ukuba amaphoyisa aphenyisise abophe abasolwa,” kusho uZakwe.Uthe ziyanda izigameko zokuhlaselwa kwabesifazane ngokudutshulwa eMuden njengoba kwesinye isigodi eNkomba kusanda kudutshulwa abesifazane ababili.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa aseMuden avule icala lokubulala.“Kusaphenywa akekho osaboshiwe,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Udutshulwe phambi kwezingane

text: INKANTOLO yeMantshi eNtuzuma ixegise imibandela yebheyili ebibekelwe owesifazane osolwa ngokulahla usana lwakhe esitamkokweni eNewlands East.Lo wesifazane oneminyaka engu-32 uvele kule nkantolo ngoMsombuluko ekuseni. Ummeli wakhe, uMnuz Jacques Botha ufake isicelo sokuthi lo wesifazane avunyelwe ukuthi abone ezinye izingane zakhe njengoba sekusondele amaholidi ePhasika. NgoFebhruwari iMantshi uRavi Pillay inikeze lo wesifazane ibheyili ka-R5000 ngombandela wokuthi ngeke axhumane nezingane zakhe futhi uzothutha ayohlala kwenye indawo, asuke eNewlands East.NgoMsombuluko uPillay uphasise isicelo sikaBotha sokuthi lo wesifazane akwazi ukubona izingane zakhe ezimbili, okuyisicelo abashushisi abangasiphikisanga.Inkantolo iphinde yaziswa ukuthi imiphumela yolibofuzo ayikathunyelwa abaphenyi becala.Ngesikhathi evela ngoFebhruwari lo wesifazane, uBotha waveza ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi uphethwe ukhwantalala oluhlasela abantu abasanda kuzala.Lo wesifazane kulindeleke ukuthi abuyele enkantolo ngoJulayi.
title: Kuthanjiswe imibandela yebheyili yowesifazane ‘owalahla’ usana esitamkokweni

text: I-ANC iyakuchitha ukuthi ibengomvakwezinye ngokugxeka ngemuva kwe-EFF inkulumo eyenziwa owayengumengameli wokugcina kahulumeni wengcindezelo uMnuz FW de Klerk lapho ephike khona ukuthi ubandlululo lwabe luwubugebengu obubhekiswe ebantwini.I-EFF isuse umsindo ngosuku lwenkulumo ebhekiswe esizweni ebiyenziwa wuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngoLwesine olwedlule lapho iphakamise ukuthi uDe Klerk aphume ePhalamende ngoba akazisoli ngobandlululo, yaphinde yamsola ngokuthi izandla zakhe zigcwele igazi.UDe Klerk ugxekiwe ngale nkulumo yakhe.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Ricardo Mthembu uthe akusilo iqiniso ukuthi balinde i-EFF ukuba iphawule kuqala ngaphambi kokuthi bakhulume.“I-EFF iyinhlangano nayo, iphawulile ngesikhathi sayo nathi siphawulile ngesikhathi sethu,” uMthembu.Izolo i-ANC ithumele isitatimende lapho ikhwele yadikila kuDe Klerk ngesitatimende sakhe.Okhulumela i-ANC kuzwelonke uMnuz Pule Mabe uthe i-ANC iyasigxeke isitatimende esenziwe iDe Klerk Foundation lapho iphika khona ukuthi ubandlululo lwaluwubugebengu obubhekiswe ebantwini.“Le nkulumo ibuyisela emuva umkhankaso wethu wokudala ukubuyisana,” kusho uMabe.Unxuse uDe Klerk neFoundation yakhe ukuba bangabukile phansi imizamo yokudala ukubuyisana.Okhulumela i-IFP kuzwelonke uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa uthe bayakholwa wukuthi ubandlululo lwabe luwubugebengu obubhekiswe ebantwini.I-Foundation kaDe Klerk yaqhuba yathi iKhomishana yamaQiniso nokuBuyisana ayizange ithole ubufakazi obuthi uDe Klerk wayenesandla odlameni. I-EFF, ANC neFoundation kaTutu nomkhandlu wamabandla sebephumele obala bayigxeka le nkulumo.NgoMsombuluko i-Foundation kaDe Klerk isihoxisile lesi sitatimende kulandela ukugxekwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kangangokuba i-EFF ize yaqale umkhankaso wokuthi uDe Klerk aphucwe indondo yeNobel Peace ayithola kulandela ukuphela kombuso wobandlululo kuleli. "Ngiyavumelana neDesmond and Leah Tutu Foundation ekutheni lesi akusona isikhathi sokulwa ngobubi bezikhathi zobandlululo. Besingekho isidingo salokhu. Siyasihoxisa isitatimende esisenze ngoFebruwari 14, siyaxolisa kakhulu ngaso," kusho uDe Klerk esitatimendeni.
title: Uyaqhubeka umsindo ngodaba lukaDe Klerk

text: IZIHLABANI zomculo kamaskandi, Abafana BakaMgqumeni, zithole ingqayizivele yethuba lokuyomela iNingizimu Afrika neKwaZulu-Natal kwindumezulu yomcimbi wamasiko amazwe ngamazwe i2018 Festival Kreole-Laserenade International de Victoria eSeychelles eqala ngo-Okthoba 23.Umcimbi ozothatha izinsuku eziyisithuba uzokuba seziqhingini ezintathu okuyiMahe, Preslin neLa Dique.Umholi waBafana BakaMgqumeni, uNelisani “Undlemnyama” Mseleku uthe bazofulathela iNingizimu Afrika ngo-Okthoba 25 sebelibangise eSeychelles.“Sizonandisa emicimbini emibili ngo-Okthoba 26 nangomhla ka-27 bese sibuya ngomhla ka-28,” kusho uNdlemnyama.Umcimbi ozophela ngo-Okthoba 29, wasungulwa ngo-1982 kodwa wagcinwa usubizwa ngeFestival Kreole ngo-1985.Umgubho unezithameli nezihlabani zamazwe ngamazwe okukhona nezisuke ziliqhamukisa eFrance, Brazil nase-USA.Abafana BakaMgqumeni yiqembu elasungulwa yizinsizwa ezazisebenza nengwazi kamaskandi engasekho uMgqumeni “Ibhova LikaDikadika” Khumalo, owasishiya emhlabeni ngoDisemba 19, 2009.Iqembu selizuze okuningi emculweni kusuka ngonyaka owedlule.Liqale ngokuzuza iGold Disc ngokudayisa amakhophi angaphezu kuka-16 000 nendondo yeBest Maskandi Gospel kumaSABC Crown Gospel Awards nyakenye, kwathi kulo nyaka lahlabana ngeyeBest Maskandi Album kumaSama neyeBest Maskandi neyeBest Male Group kumaSatma Awards kulo nyaka.Abafana BakaMgqumeni bazobe bengaqali ukumela elakuleli njengoba phakathi nonyaka bekade benandisa emicimbini yeSoccer World Cup ebiseRussia.
title: Bazomela izwe AbakaMgqumeni

text: SEKUZOMELE bagawule babheke ababhala noma yini ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba sekukhishwe umyalelo wokuthi kubhekwe yonke into ebhalwa abasuke befuna umsebenzi kuhulumeni. Noma ukhishwe nonyaka lo myalelo, phambilini bakhona asebe baxoshwa ngezinto abazibhale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Owayekhulumela amaphoyisa, uMnuz McIntosh Polela ngomunye wabantu abadumile owakhonjwa indlela emuva kwezinto azibhala ku-Twitter.UPolela wabhala izinto ezehlukene ezithinta ukugwetshwa komculiuMolemo “Jub Jub”Maarohanye, osaphuma ejele noThemba Tshabalala okwashona abafundi ngesikhathi beqophisana ngezimoto eSoweto ngo-2010.Ezinye zezinto azisho ngukuthi uyethemba ukuthi abeseka uJub Jub bamnike uvaseline ukuze aye nawo ejele.Yize axolisa kodwa wakhonjwa indlela.Akuyena kuphela uPolela owangena enkingeni ngento ayibhala enkundleni yokuxhumana kodwa noNksz Penny Sparrow, owafanisa abantu abamnyama nezinkawu, wahlawuliswa uR5 000 noma abhadle ejele izinyanga ezingu-12.Umbutho wezokuvikela waxosha ilungu lawo nyakenye ngokubhala kwiFacebook ukuthi sekuyisikhathi sokuthi kubulawe abantu abamhlophe ukuziphindiselela ngobandlululo.UMnuz Mageti Vincent Mohlala, wayesebenzela esikhungweni samasosha eWonderboom, ePitoli.Wayesesebenze iminyaka engu-13 emasosheni ngesikhathi exoshwa.Esibhedlela iPrince Mshiyeni eMlaza, kwakhonjwa indlela owayesafundela umsebenzi owabhala kwiFacebook esabisa ngokudlwengula ingane yakamakhelwane eneminyaka engu-10 ukuze ayiqede ukuphapha.Nyakenye eMediclinic eGoli kuxoshwe umhlengikazi owabhala egxeka uNksz Cherly Zondi, othi wadlwengulwa nguMfundisi Timothy Omotoso, ethi uzenza umuntu ogiliwe ekubeni wayedayisa ngomzimbaukuze athole imali, manje usefuna ukudatshukelwa kuthiwa udlwenguliwe.
title: Kubaholele ogibeni abakubhale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana

text: I-ANC eGauteng ithi izolusukumela ngokushesha uduba lukaNgqongqoshe wezeMidlallo, uNkk Faith Mazibuko, okhwele wadilika kubasebenzi bezinye izinhlanga ebacwasa enkulumweni eqoshiwe.Le nhlangano ithe izomthathela izinyathelo uMazibuko ozwakale ebhoka ngolaka kubasebenzi bomnyango, ebatshela ukuthi kumele baphuthumise izidingo zabantu emphakathini njengoba kusondele ukhetho.“Ngiyazifuna lezi zinkundla zemidlalo. Ngisho ngabe kuthiwa nizakha ngezandla zenu...uma udinga ukuthi undiza wenze umlingo, nakho lokho kuyokusiza ukuthi ukwenze...ngifuna lezi zinkundla zikhankasele u-ANC” usho kanje.Lo ngqongqoshe ube esesabisa abasebenzi ngokubatshela kwezikabhoqo ukuthi bazolahlekelwa umsebenzi uma bengalandeli umyalelo wakhe.“Imuphi omunye umnyango onesikhulu sezimali (CFO) esiyiNdiya? Umuphi umnyago oneNhloko ewumlungu? Ngakho kumele ningibonge ngokunipha umsebenzi.“Yingakho eminye iminyango ingafuni nokubabona abesifazane abamhlophe noma abangamaNdiya...akukhona ukucwasa, nithanda ukugcina isiNgisi,” kuqhuba yena.UNobhala-Jikelele we-ANC eGauteng uMnuz Jacob Khawe uthe iqembu liphoxekile ngenkulumo kaMazibuko.Khonamanjalo, iPhini likaSihlalo we-ANC eGauteng, uMnuz Panyaza Lesufi, lithe uNdunankulu wakulesi sifundazwe, uMnuz David Makhura, uzohlangana noMazibuko namhlanje.
title: Uzifake obishini uNgqongqoshe ekhaca abasebenzi bezinye izinhlanga

text: UMPHAKO awunikwa yimenenja yakhe (Mike Makaab wePro Sport International) yokuba qotho emsebenzini wokudlala ibhola yiwo inkakha kanobhutshuzwayo uSiyabonga “Bhele” Nomvethe awubeka eqhulwini lwezinto ezimenza abalwe nezingwazi ezidlale isikhathi eside ngempumelelo ebholeni elikhokhelayo.UNomvethe obekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu lapho ememezele khona ukuthi uzowagaxa emgibeni amakhokho ekupheleni kwesizini ye-Absa Premiership“Yisizini yami yokugcina le. Ngisuka kude kakhulu. Okokuqala ngithanda ukubonga umndeni wami, AmaZulu, iProSport International nabadlali baMaZulu. Yisizini yami yokugcina manje. Ngilujabulele kakhulu uhambo lwami. Angikaze ngicabange ukuthi ngizodlala iminyaka engu-24 yonke empileni yami yokudlala ibhola,” kusho le ngwazi, abalwa nezilomo ezinjengoGianluigi Buffon, John “Shoes” Moshoeu, Roger Milla nabanye abadlale abafinyelele eminyakeni engu-40 besadlala.“Imenenja yami (uMike Makaab) yangifundisa okuningi njengokonga imali nokuthatha ibhola njengebhizinisi. Selokhu kwathi nhlo, ibhola ngilithatha njengebhizinisi. Abadlali abasebancane kufanele bazi ukuthi ukhiye ebholeni wuthando.”“Ngeke ngilukhohlwe usuku lwanamuhla (lwayizolo). Ngiphatheke kahle eqenjini. Ngisazoqhubeka nokuba yingxenye yeqembu (AmaZulu) ngisho sengiyekile ukudlala. Ngifisa ukuba yisibonelo kubadlali abasebancane,” kusho uNomvethe.Le nsephe iyahluleka ukuqoka njengento enkulu ukuzedlula zonke izinto ehlabane ngazo.“Ngidlale kwiWorld Cup, ama-Olympics. Ngashaya negoli kwiWorld Cup. Ngike ngaba ngumshayimagoli ovelele, ngaba ngumdlali wonyaka. Ngiyahluleka ngempela ukuqoka okukodwa okuhamba phambili. Kuningi kakhulu,” kusho uNomvethe, onemidlalo engaphezu kuka-80 kwiBafana Bafana.UNomvethe ubalwa kubagadli abahlanu kuphela abanamagoli angaphezu kuka1-100 kwiPremier Soccer League.Esithangamini sayizolo uNomvethe ubesekwe yizikhulu zaMaZulu okubalwa kuzo imenenja jikelele uLunga Sokhela nemenenja yeqembu uQedi Dlamini nabaqeqeshi okubalwa kubo uCavin Johnson kanjalo nemenenja yakhe uMakaab weProSport International eyilokhu yangamela izidaba zalo mdlali.USokhela uthe basazoxoxa nomasipala ngezinhlelo zokuhlonipha uNomvethe.“Emehlweni ami uBhele yiyona nkakha yokugcina esinayo. Miningi imicimbi esisazoyihlela ukuhlonipha uBhele. Sisazohlaba nomkhosi kuhulumeni. UMasipala weTheku sizowucela ukuthi uphonse esivivaneni. Ngikholwa wukuthi bazolijabulela ithuba lokubandakanywa ekuhlonipheni leli qhawe. Idolobha ulisebenzele nalo sekuyisikhathi sokuthi limbonge,” kusho uSokhela.Enanela uJohnson uthe: “Angu-16 amaqembu kwi-Absa Premiership kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi namuhla ngingumqeqeshi oweneme ukubedlula bonke abaqeqeshi ngokuba sezicathulweni zokwamukela isinqumo sikaBhele Nomvethe sokuwagaxa emgibeni. Ngikhuthaza abadlali bami ukuthi batshontshe kuBhele. Kumele batshontshe kuBhele.”Uzobe ebhekiwe emdlalweni woSuthu neSundowns eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza kusasa ngo-3 ntambama.
title: UBhele uqophe umlando ongagqwali

text: “ABANTU abayiyeke le nto yezibizo noma imembeso, namafenisha abizayo angenamsebenzi walutho. Lokhu kuzosiza ekutheni abesilisa bakwazi ukukhokha ilobolo."Usho kanje ungoti wezamasiko uDkt Nomagugu Ngobese, othi into eyenza kugcine kukipitiwe kungashadwa, yilezi zibizo ezibiza ngaphezu kwelobolo uqobo.Uthi sekuze kwaba sengathi uma ungaletheliwe izibizo awulotsholiwe.Uchaza lesi sigaba esesenziwa njengento engabalwa nhlobo ekutheni umuntu uselotsholiwe.“Kuqala izibizo lezi kwakuba yizipho nje indoda ebonga ngazo abazali, ikakhulu unina wentombi ngokuyikhulisela unkosikazi.“Kwakungeyona futhi impoqo. Into eyayibalulekile wukuthi kuphelele izinkomo okulotsholwa ngazo umlobokazi,” kusho lo ngoti.Uthi kumele imindeni iyithathe ngenye indlela indaba yelobolo njengoba isimo somnotho sibheda kangaka.Uphakamisa ukuthi kuhlangane imindeni, izwe kowesilisa ukuthi yena angakwazi ukukhokha into engakanani, angavele agejulwe nje kube sengathi kuyaliwa.UNGOTI wezamasiko uDkt Nomagugu Ngobese, othi into eyenza kugcine kukipitiwe kungashadwa, yilezi zibizo ezibiza ngaphezu kwelobolo uqobo. Isithombe: KHAYA NGWENYA“Nakuqala kwakwenziwa njalo. Kwakuboniswana, yingakho kwakuba namadoda abizwa ngabakhongi okuyiwona ayexoxisana ngesisoka nomndeni wentombi ukuze kuvunyelwane ngayo yonke into, nendoda ingasali ibhobokile ephaketheni."Uthi izinkomo zamalobolo nezibalwa ngamagama manje, yinto eyafika nomuntu othile owayezibhalele incwadi. Kwathi ngoba abantu bayathatheka base bekwenza isitayela lokhu.Eqhuba uDkt Ngobese uthe nabesilisa nabo banemithetho eminingi abayephulayo kwezothando nokwenza nabantu besifazane balahle ithemba kubo.“Endulo izinsizwa zazivele ziqonywa kodwa kwakungasho ukuthi umuntu uzolobola wonke umuntu omqomile.“Bekungezona zonke izithandani ebeziqomana zigcine zilobolana. Kodwa umehluko ukuthi insizwa ibingayoni intombi uma ingazoyilobola.“Bekuhlukwana kungazange kuyiwe ocansini ukuze nozoyilobola ayifice isaphelele. Kodwa esikhathini samanje abesilisa bayabona abesifazane ngenhloso yokudlala ngabo. Kanti ngokwesiko umuntu izibusiso uzithola nangokwenza kahle alandele umthetho kuze kube uyachanguzelwa,” kusho uDkt Ngobese.
title: Ayiyekwe indaba yezibizo nemembeso - Nomagugu

text: IBOSHWE enkantolo ngesikhathi ivele ngelinye icala layo lokubulala, indoda esolwa ngokusoconga induna eCopesville, eMgungundlovu.Umsolwa oneminyaka engu-24 uboshwe ngoLwesibili enkantolo yeMantshi eMgungundlovu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe abaseshi baseNsuze balunywe indlebe ngomsolwa obefunwa okuthiwe uvela enkantolo ngelinye icala lokubulala.“Amaphoyisa ambophe ephakathi enkantolo umsolwa, wayiswa esiteshini eNsuze wabekwa icala lokubulala. Uvelile enkantolo yeMantshi yaseNsuze izolo (esho ngoLwesithathu), icala lakhe lahlehliselwa uJulayi 18, 2020,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Uthe umsolwa uzogqunywa esitokisini kuze kushaye usuku lwakhe lokuvela enkantolo.Kusolwa ukuthi ngoJuni 10, 2020 ngo-8 ekuseni, induna uMnuz Mandlenkosi Ntuli (62) wathelekelwa amadoda amabili ayehlome ngezibhamu kwakhe KwaNewspaper.UColonel Mbele uthe kusolwa ukuthi umufi wadutshulwa kaningi, wadalulwa njengophangalale endaweni yesehlo. Kwavulwa icala lokubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa eNsuze.Ilungu lomndeni kaNtuli, elicele ukungadalulwa ngenxa yokwesaba, lithe bajabule ngokuboshwa komsolwa.Lithe ekugcineni bazothola izimpendulo zokuthi wabulawelani uNtuli.“Esifuna kwenzeke manje ukuba kuqulwe icala libalahle banikwe isigwebo esiqinile, esibafanele. Asazi babemdubulelani ngoba akuthathangwa lutho endlini,” kusho ilungu lomndeniLithe kwakugcwele amagobolondo ezinhlamvu zesibhamu asesebenzile endlini kamufi.“Uyabona ukube kwakukhona omunye umuntu kulo muzi, wayeyobulawa naye ngendlela okwakuyiyona,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.UColonel Mbele uthe umsolwa uboshwe enkantolo eyovela ngecala lokubulala elavulwa esiteshini iMountain Rise.Kusolwa ukuthi ngoJuni 16, 2020 ngo-2.42 ntambama, kwadutshulwa kwafa uMnuz Bongani Majola (56), Ezinketheni eCopesville.UColonel Mbele uthe uMajola wadutshulwa ekhanda nasesifubeni.“Umsolwa waboshwa nenye indoda eneminyaka engu-28 esezitokisini. Luyaqhubeka uphenyo lwamaphoyisa ngenhloso yokuthola ukuthi abasolwa ababoshiwe abathinteki yini kwamanye amacala okubulala esifundazweni,” kusho uColonel Mbele.
title: Uboshwe evele ngelinye icala lokubulala

text: UMQEQESHI weBlack Leopards, uDylan Kerr, ufisele inhlanhla sakuwabhuqa amaqembu asembangweni wesicoco njengoba iqembu lakhe lizokuba nesandla esikhulu ekutheni iya kuphi indebe ye-Absa Premiership ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2018/2019.ILidoda Duvha isendaweni ka-12 kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-25 kodwa isalelwe imidlalo eyisishiyagalombili kule sizini ekubeni abanye besalelwe eyisithupha. UKerr obemenywe ohlelweni lwebhola kwithelevishini ngoMsombuluko, uthe weneme kakhulu ngokuthi uyazi ukuthi ngeke iqembu lakhe lidliwe yizembe yingakho le midlalo esele ezimisele ukuphazamisa abathile.“Sinemidlalo eminingana kunabanye kanti nebengiqashelwe khona sesiphumelele ukukwenza. Ngeke lisagenca kithina izembe ekupheleni kwesizini. Lokhu kuzosinika ithuba elikahle lokudlala ngokukhululeka. Ngibophele abadlali abanzima ngendlela emangalisyao kodwa bona abakuboni lokhu. Iyona impi engibhekene nayo leyo ukubakhumbuza ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuthi bangafinyelela kuliphi izinga,” kusho uKerr.Phakathi kwemidlalo esalele uKerr singabala ohlehlisiwe obekumele ube ngoMashi 29 ne-Orlando Pirates. Kungena elePirates nje, cishe yonke imidlalo esalele iLeopards isemqoka kakhulu kodwa hhayi kangako kuyona (iLidoda Duvha) kodwa emaqenjini asembangweni wesicoco.Kusukela iLeopards ijikele iChippa United njengotshwala esisiwini (kowokugcina ngaphambi kwekhefu leFifa), isisalelwe imidlalo yeligi eyisishiyagalombili futhi yonke ithinta ababanga isicoco.ILeopards isizoqala nePolokwane City ekuhambeni. Ngemuva kwalowo mdlalo izobe isibhekana neKaizer Chiefs bese kulandela oweMamelodi Sundowns.Yomibili le midlalo (oweChiefs noweSundowns) isekhaya. Ngemuva kwayo, uKerr uzobe esedlala neBidvest Wits ekuhambeni aphinde adlale naMaZulu neMaritzburg United ekuhambeni nasekhaya ngokwahlukana. Uzobe esevala isizini ngomdlalo wasekhaya neCape Town City.Phakathi kwale midlalo kukhona nowePirates ohlehliswe ngoba kunikwa iSundowns ithuba lokulungiselela kahle owe-semi final yeCAF Champions League ne-Al Ahly yase-Egypt.“Kuhle ukuthi iligi yethu kuze kube imanje akucaci ukuthi iya ngakuphi. Lokhu kuyizinkomba zokuqina kwayo. Engingakusho ukuthi wonke amaqembu esisazodlala nawo azi ukuthi asazodlula empini. Ngibafisela inhlanhla bonke ababanga isicoco kodwa futhi kuhle bafiselwa yimina inhlanhla, mina lo osazodlala nabo,” usho kanje uKerr sakubhuqa noma sakuxwayisa.
title: OweLeopards usongela abanga isicoco sePSL

text: USEMANZINI umphakathi waseMpukunyoni, eMtubatuba, kulandela ukukhothama kwenkosi uMzokhulayo Mkhwanazi (52), ngemuva kokudunguzela isikhathi eside.Inkosi uMkhwanazi ubeselaliswe amasonto amahlanu esibhedlela esiseSandton, eGoli, yagcina ngokukhothama kuso ngoLwesibili ekuseni.UNdunankulu wesizwe uMnuz Ntuthuko Mkhwanazi, uthe bayalila ngesehlo esibavelele beyisizwe sokukhothama kwenkosi yabo.“Sibuhlungu ngokuhanjelwa inkosi yethu, sicela ukuthi ngalesi sikhathi sokuzila ukuba sibambisane nesizwe konke kuhambe ngohlelo. Inkosi uMkhwanazi ibisidunguzele isikhathi eside, ingena iphuma ezibhedlela. Kulokhu kumenele emuva kokulaliswa amasonto amahlanu esibhedlela. Ushiye uNdlunkulu uMaMchunu nabantwana abangu-19.
