Omunye undlunkulu wakhe uMaNgema naye usadlula emhlabeni,” kusho uNdunankulu wesizwe.Uthe balungise ukuba itshalwe ngoJuni 14, ngoLwesihlanu, inkonzo izoba ekhaya KwaNomathiya ekuseni.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini, esizweni nakubantu baseKZN.“Inkosi uMkhwanazi ibe neqhaza elikhulu ngokuba umholi wendabuko KwaZulu-Natal. Silahlekelwe kakhulu ngokukhothama kwakhe. Ubenolwazi olunzulu abelunikeza amakhosi asemancane,” kusho uHlomuka.Uthe inkosi ibithuthukisa umphakathi futhi isebenzisana nezinhlaka ezahlukene neminyango kahulumeni ehlukene ukuqinisekisa ukuthi intuthuko iyafinyelela emphakathini obuholwa yiyo.Inkosi igcotshwe ngokusemthethweni ngo-Okthoba 2011. Uyisemkhulu nguMtubatuba, okuqanjwe ngaye idolobha laseMtubatuba.Phambilini kuke kwaba nezinxushunxushu ngodaba oluthinta inkosi okumele iphathe, umndeni wabe usuhlangana waqoka inkosi ekhotheme ukuba ihole ngenxa yokubona ubuqotho bayo.UHlomuka uthe bajube ithimba labasebenzi bomnyango wakhe ukuba lilekelele umndeni ngalesi sikhathi esinzima.
title: Isililo kukhothama inkosi yesizwe eMtubatuba

text: UNOBHALA Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Ace Magashule, uzichithile izinsolo zokuthi uthenga amavoti emuva kokuthi eshiye imali komunye umndeni omkhombise ukuthi awunakho ukudla.UMagashule utshele izintatheli ukuthi akusibo ubuntu ukushiya abantu belambile ekubeni unawo amandla okusiza.“Akukhona ukuthi ngithenga amavoti kodwa ngenza ubuntu, angikwazi ukushiya abantu belambile ekubeni nginawo amandla okubasiza. Uma unoR20 noma uR50 akufanele ushiye abantu belambile,” kusho uMagashule.Ngempelasonto uMagashule ubekhankasa ePhillippi, eWestern Cape.UMnuz Mike Moriarty, weDA, uthe bazobika uMagashule kwi-IEC ngoba uphule umthetho wokhetho ngesikhathi enika owesifazane uR400 ezama ukugaya ivoti le-ANC.“UMagashule uphule umthetho wokhetho ngokupha abantu imali ukuze bavotele i-ANC. Kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi bawafuna ngenkani amavoti abantu, baze bawathenge ngemali. Baphinde bahlohle abantu ukuthi babhikishe kubo bonke omasipala bethu njengoba bengasabi ukuthenga amavoti,” kusho uMoriarty.Uthe ngeke bathule babuke i-ANC isebenzisa amaqhinga ukuwina ukhetho ngoba ifuna ukhetho lube ngolukhululekile olungenakho ukwenzelela.Usole i-ANC ngokudala izinkinga ezibhekene nabantu baseNingizimu Afrika ikakhulukazi inkinga yokungasebenzi kwabantu.I-IEC ithe azophenywa wonke amacala abikwa kuyona.
title: Uchitha eyokuthenga amavoti

text: BEKUKHANDENE osaziwayo emshadweni womlingisi weSibaya, uNhlanhla Mdlalose, noPercy Mdladla eDongala Hotel, eMnambithi, ngoMgqibelo.UNhlanhla ulingisa indawo kaBongani emdlalweni okhonjiswa ngo-8.30 ebusuku phakathi nesonto.Izithandani kazilufihli uthando lwazo kangangokuthi uNhlanhla akanqeni ukufaka isithandwa sakhe ekhasini lakhe lika-Instagram.Phakathi kosaziwayo abebekhona kubalwa ozakwabo beSibaya uNomzamo “Thandeka” Mbatha, Ayanda “Phumelele” Borotho, Lerato “Samkelo” Mvelase, Muzi “Duma” Mthabela, Asavela “Ntwenhle” Mngqithi, Mdu “Ntandane” Gumede nabanye. Bekukhona nonontandakubukwa weTheku uThah Simelane, Ayanda Ncwane, umculi uMpumi, umhleli woMsinga DriftKhana uSmanga Mabaso, Jabulani “Cashflow” Ngcobo, Siyabonga Nkosi, Reggie Nkabinde, Linda “Mr Magic” Sibiya nabanye.U-AYANDA Borotho olingisa emdlalweni Isibaya nengoduso kaMnuz Jacob Zuma, uNonkayiso Chonco nabo abebesemshadweniBekuthiwe umshado uzoqala ngo-10 ekuseni kodwa uze waqala ntambama.Izimenywa bese zifikile zilokhu ziqhabula ama-cocktails.Esangweni bekumi onogada abebebheka igama ngaphambi kokuthi umuntu angene. Bathe amagama abantu abaningi abengekho kodwa umyeni ubede eshaya ucingo ethi abangeniswe.Kuthe ngabo-3 ntambama kwaqhamuka ujenga lwezimoto zikanokusho okubalwa kuzo amaBMW i8, Bentley, obekuyiyo ebithwele umyeni, Range Rover, BMW M4, Maserati nezinye.Umkhwenyana ungene lapho bekushadelwa khona otshanini phandle, ngo-3.22. Kube sekulindwa umakoti oze wangena ngo-4.06 ntambama kwasuka ubulilili omama bekikiza. Ungene eshaya umcathu kaBhovungana ephelezelwa yinkondlo ebihaywa yimbongi uSbo Da Poet, owumlingisi weSibaya. Umfundisi ushaye ngezinqamulelayo ngaphambi kokuthi izithandani zingene emotweni zihambe izimenywa kwathiwa azisale zibambe okuya ngezansi kwempumulo.USimphiwe Majola ubelokhu ephithizela kwazise nguye obengumhleli. Kube sekungenwa etendeni kwaqhubeka umgcagco.
title: Osaziwayo emshadweni woweSibaya

text: IMINDENI ephethwe yintsha yiyona ezobhekelelwa kakhulu uma kuvuleka amathuba omsebenzi ngaphansi kukaMasipala wasoLundi.Lokhu kushiwo yiMeya yalo mkhandlu ngesikhathi yethula isabelomali salo nyaka ngoLwesine ezinkundleni zemidlalo eNhlazatshe.IMeya yasoLundi, uMnuz Wilson Ntshangase, iveze ukuthi emalini abanayo engu-R4.4 million bazobhekelela kakhulu ukudala amathuba omsebenzi entsheni kumasipala abawakhele.“Yize singenawo amafemu endaweni esiyakhele kodwa amathuba omsebenzi avelayo yiwona esihlele ukuthi sifake intsha ikakhulu le ebheke imindeni engenabo abazali. Lokho nje esiyobe sikwenza siyazi ukuthi sobe senza umehluko omkhulu kuleyo mindeni. Kuyasithokozisa ukuba nemali efana nalena esithemba ukuthi izokwenza omkhulu umehluko emindenini eminingi,“ kuchaza uNtshangase.Uveze ukuthi ngeke bagcine ngalokho njengoba behlele ukwakha izakhiwo ezehlukene.“Sizokwakha amahholo angu-12 kulo nyaka omusha wezimali nezinkundla zezemidlalo nokuyinto ezohlomulisa kakhulu umphakathi. Imali encane esiyitholayo okusijabulisayo ukuthi ayiphumi iyosiza eminye imiphakathi ngaphandle kodwa izosiza abantu basoLundi,” kuchaza yena.Kulo mcimbi uNtshangase uphinde wethula yonke imisebenzi abayenzile eminyakeni emihlanu bangena nathe bayaziqhenya kakhulu ngayo.Uthe akujabulela kakhulu ukuthi bazophinde babheke ukufakelwa kukagesi ezindaweni ezihlukene zasemakhaya abangakafiki kuzo kodwa wakugcizelela ukuthi intsha iyona abayibheke kakhulu kulo nyaka.“Okusikhathaza kakhulu ukuthi izibalo zabantu abatheleleka ngegciwane, iCovid19, ziyanda ngakho indawo yasoLundi ingenye abantu abaningi abaziphilisa ngokudayisa ezihambelini eziqhamuka emazweni angaphandle kodwa lokhu okwenzekayo kwenza isimo sibe nzima ngakho kumele singenelele,“ kuphetha yena.Uthe imali ezosebenza ukufeza yonke imisebenzi yomkhandlu onyakeni ka-2021/2022 ingu-R442 736 806.Uphiko lwezokuphepha ohlanganisa ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa kamasipala nezinhlekelele ubekelwe isabelo mali sikaR13 million.Isabelo sokulungiswa kwemigwaqo eyoniwa yizimvula singuR5 million.Ukufakelwa kukagesi nokulungiswa kwemigwaqo yetiyela kubekwe uR117 millionUkufakwa kukagesi ezindaweni zamakhosi kona kubekelwe uR5 million.Uphiko olubhekelele imisebenzi yomphakathi wona unesabelo sika R19million.
title: Uzobhekelela intsha kakhulu uMasipala wasoLundi

text: Kaizer Chiefs (0) 2IKAIZER Chiefs yenzele i-Orlando Pirates umsebenzi ihlula iBidvest Wits emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eBidvest Stadium izolo ebusuku.Amagoli eChiefs ashaywe nguLeonardo Castro noHendrick Ekstein esiwombeni sesibili.IWits, ehlezi esicongweni se-log, ingene enkundleni inengcindezi yokubuyisela igebe libe ngamaphuzu amahlanu emuva kokuthi iPirates ilinciphisele kwamabili ihlula iChippa United ngoLwesibili.IChiefs kade kulindeleke ukuthi icoshe amaphuzu azokwenza inyuke kwi-log yePremiership. Ngokuwina izolo iChiefs inyukele endaweni yesihlanu.Umqeqeshi weChiefs, u-Ernst Middendorp, wenze izinguquko ezimbili esikimini esiqale umdlalo ngesikhathi Amakhosi ehlulwa yiMamelodi Sundowns ngempelasonto edlule. Ubuyisele uKgotso Moleko emuva kwesokudla,waqalisa uTeenage Hadebe maphakathi emuva. Ngaphezu kwalokho uMiddendorp ubuyisele unozinti uVirgil Vries obenuka iqaqa kubalandeli beChiefs ngenxa yephutha alenze bebhekene neSundowns eliholele ekutheni ihlulwe umdlalo usuyophela. Nokho lo nozinti udlale kahle izolo.IWits icishe yathola igoli ngokushesha ngesikhathi uSifiso Hlanti edonsa ishodi ekude kodwa laphuma phezu kwepali ngomzuzu wesine. IChiefs izamile ukuhlanganisa amaphasi kodwa iWits ikuhlakaza kalula lokho. IZitshudeni kade zingayivumeli iChiefs iliqale emuva nokuyindlela yokudlala ethandwa nguMiddendorp. IChiefs iphoqile ukudlala ngendlela eyifunayo kodwa yahluleka ukwakha amathuba acacile okushaya amagoli. Sekusele umzuzu kuyiwe ekhefini, uVries ubambe ishodi likaTerrence Dzvukamanja alidonse engaphandle kwebhokisi.  Ziye ekhefini unozinti weWits, uDarren Keet, engavimbanga nelilodwa ibhola ebeliqhamuka kubadlali beChiefs.Esiwombeni sesibili, iWits ibuye isishintshe kakhulu isingena ngawo wonke amazibuko kodwa ihluleka ukusebenzisa amathuba. Umqeqeshi uGavin Hunt ubuye ekhefini noLehlohonolo Majoro amfake endaweni kaMxolisi Macuphu.Nokho kube yiChiefs ethole igoli kuqala ngesikhathi uCastro evalela phakathi ibhola ebelikade ligotshwe nguSiphosethu Ntiyantiya kwesokunxele ngomzuzu ka-58. Emuva kwemizuzu emibili Amakhosi acishe athola elinye igoli ngesikhathi uHendrick Ekstein egobela ibhola ebhokisini kodwa lamehlula uLebo Manyama. Ngomzuzu ka-78 u-Ekstein uvalele phakathi ibhola elakhiwe yiChiefs isuka nalo emuva. Sekusele amanenjana umdlalo uphele uRobyn Johannes weWits uthole ikhadi elibomvu emuva kokuphendulana nonompempe uVictor Gomes ekade embhalela ukudlala kabi.Komunye umdlalo wePremiership izolo iMaritzburg United ishaywe yiFree State Stars ngo 2-1 eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu.
title: IChiefs isize iPirates ishaya iWits

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEI SIBABULI somdlali weBanyana Banyana uPortia “Bashin” Modise ufuna ukuvala umlomo labo abagxeka ukubuyela kwakhe eqenjini lesizwe ngenxa yeminyaka yakhe.UModise (30) ogila izimanga eqenjini lakhe iPalace Super Falcons koweSasol League National Championship eKing Zwelithini Stadium eMlazi uthe ukudlala ibhola elisezingeni yikona athulisa ngako abamgxekayo.Lo mdlali amava akhe ayaziwa ebholeni labesifazane njengoba ehamba phambili ngokushaya amagoli kwiBanyana naseqenjini lakhe. Cishe wonke amagoli abawine ngawo beshaya iCity Lads ngo 5-0 abekhandwe nguye uModise.“Ngifuna ukukhombisa labo ababengigxeka bethi sengimdala kakhulu kwelesizwe ukuthi akunjalo. Bakhulume kakhulu abantu ngami nebhola engilidlalayo. Omunye wangitshela emehlweni wathi kumele ngibeke amakhokho ami manje ngoba ayisekho indaba la kimi,” kusho uModise ezihlekela.Lo mdlali ongalibheki ipali ukucacisile ukuthi kuningi okusamele akwenze ebholeni ngaphambi kokuthatha umhlalaphansi ukuze abe yisibonelo kwabanye abesifazane ebholeni.“Ngisasalelwe iminyaka emine noma emihlanu ngidlala. Kubalulekile kimi ukuba ngikhombise izwe ukuthi abantu besifazane uma beneminyaka yami kusuke kungaphelile ngabo ebholeni. Kunalokho badlala kakhulu kunakuqala,” kusho yena. Selokhu ebuyele eqenjini lesizwe uModise iBanyana ayikaze ihlulwe nendlala yamagoli umqeqeshi wabo uJoseph “Skheshekheshe” Mkhonza abekhala ngayo ibukeka isiyindaba endala.IFalcons isenze kahle kakhulu kulo mqhudelwano weSasol kanti uModise wethemba ukuthi yibo abazodla umhlanganiso bakhale bemuke nesamba sika-R50 000 abasibekelwe etafuleni okokuqala kulo mqhudelwano obekungatholwa mali kuwo ngaphambilini.“Sizothatha indebe yethu sibuyele nayo eGoli. Sidlala kahle neqembu lami futhi sihlangene, ngichazekile impela ngendlela abadlali beqembu lethu abazimisele ngayo,” kusho uModise emuva komdlalo.Abantu baseMlazi bakhombise ukukuthokozela kakhulu ukubona uModise elihlikihla nabasambiza ngokaputeni weBanyana ngisho noma kungaseyena.Amaqembu amabili azoqeda phezulu eqoqweni ngalinye azodlulela phambili esigabesi esilandelayo (Semi-finals).Kusasa amaqembu amane azoba esebhekana wodwa, amabili azodlula azoya kowamanqamu ngeSonto. Lo mdlalo uzosakazwa bukhoma kuSABC 1 ngo-3 ntambama.Imiphumela yayizolo:Palace Falcons 2-1 Cape Town RosesKanatla Ladies 2-1 City LadsMsiphuya ladies 13–0 RC MillsDurban Ladies 6–0 Bloemfontein Celtics
title: Sizokwemuka nayo eyeSasol: Modise

text: SIKHULULWE ngesexwayiso yinkantolo ngoLwesibili isitshudeni sase-UKZN ebesiboshelwe icala lokususa udlame emphakathini nokulwa nephoyisa.UNhlakanipho Mali owenza unyaka wesine weziqu zobuthisha kule nyuvesi esikhungweni i-Edgewood, udedelwe yiNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown ngoLwesibili.Inkantolo ibe isilihlehlisela uMashi 27 nonyaka icala ukuze kuqhutshekwe nophenyo.Amakhulu ezitshudeni abagcwele esangweni elingenela enkantolo efuna kukhululwe uMali besola amaphoyisa nenkampani yonogada i-Mi7 ngokumbophela ubala.Abekhuza iziqubulo ecula amaculo omzabalazo ebuza ukuthi wenzeni uMali, ethi uma kuyicala aboshelwe khona kumele baboshwe bonke beyizitshudeni.Amaphoyisa abemi eceleni kwalezi zitshudeni ebezingagayelwe mphako eqaphe isimo.IPhini likaNobhala we-ANC Youth League egatsheni lase-Edgewood uNksz Sindisiwe Hadebe lithe bakhishelwe amaphoyisa ahlome ngezibhamu ekubeni bona bengahlomile. Abadubula ngesisi esikhalisa unyembezi.Isitshudeni, uMalusi Zuma, senhlangano yezitshudeni iSasco, sithe bebezimele ngaphandle kwesango lesikhungo sabo ngoMsombuluko emini kwafika amaphoyisa abadubula. Uthe isitshudeni esiboshiwe besizama ukuphulukundlela emaphoyiseni abesibambe ngesidlozane.“E-UKZN sibhekene nenkinga yezitshudeni ezikweleta imali yokufunda ezingakwazi ukubhalisa. Abaphathi abasiphenduli kwesikhala ngakho uma sithi ababhaliswe abakweletayo kunalokho basibizela amaphoyisa azosihlukumeza. UNgqongqoshe (uGeneral Bheki Cele) akakhuze amaphoyisa akhe angasihlukumezi,” kusho uZuma.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe abe-UKZN bathe kuqhubeke ngendlela eyejwayelekile ukufunda nokufundisa ngoLwesibili ngaphandle kwesigameko sokudunga amakilasi okungatheni okwenziwe yizitshudeni esikhungweni sabo esiseMgungundlovu.“Ziyaqhubeka izingxoxo eziphakathi kwabaphathi benyuvesi nomkhandlu omele izitshudeni. Ukubhalisa kuqhubekile kuzona zonke izikhungo ngoLwesibili,” kusho i-UKZN.
title: Isitshudeni sase-UKZN sinikwe isexwayiso

text: KUBIKWA ukuthi usemisiwe emsebenzini uthishanhloko waseLututu Junior Secondary School, e-Ugie, esifundeni saseJoe Qgabi e-Eastern Cape, ophoqe umfundi oneminyaka ewu-11 ukuthi angene emgodini wethoyilethe amlandele iselula abeyiwisile. Ngaphandle kokumiswa emsebenzini kubikwa ukuthi lo thishanhloko (49) uboshiwe izolo ngecala lokuzama ukubulala kanti kulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo yemantshi eNqanqarha ngoLwesibili (namhlanje). Esitatimendeni okhulumela amaphoyisa kuleli sifundazwe uCaptain Khaya Tonjeni uthe: “ Kubikwa ukuthi umsolwa wenze ingane eneminyaka engu-11 ikhumule futhi ingene ethoyilethi ebeligcwele indle yabantu. Ingane kuthiwa iboshwe ngentambo ngenhla kokhalo yehliselwa emgodini wethoyilethe ngabanye abafundi izama ukulanda iselula eyawela phakathi,”Kuleli sonto kusabalale ivideo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana owesilisa oyilungu lomphakathi elilwela amalungelo abafundi echaza ngalesi sigameko esinyanyise abaningi okuthiwa senzeke ngasekuqaleni kukaMashi . Uveze ukuthi lo thishanhloko ucele umfundi ukuthi amlandele iselula ethoyilethe ebeligcwele indle wamthembisa uR200, nawo agcine ewuzwe ngendaba. Uthe waze waphoqwa abazali ababesho ukumqeda ngenduku ukuthi akhokhele lo mfundi kodwa nakhona wakhipha ipheshana likaR50. Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo e-Eastern Cape uMnuz Vuyiseka Mboxela uthe le selula yawela emgodini wethoyilethe ngesikhathi uthishanhloko eqeda ukuzikhulula. UMboxela uthe uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo uMnuz Fundile Gade usithathele phezulu lesi sigameko futhi zikhona izinyathelo azothathelwa zona lo thishanhloko. Uthe kunezinye izinhlangano ezizofuna ukuba yingxenye yokuqondiswa kobugwegwe balo thisha njengeSouth African Council of Educators. UGade kulindeleke ukuthi avakashele lesi sikole ngoLwesine.
title: Uboshiwe uthishanhloko ophoqe umfundi (11) ukuthi amlandele iselula emgodini wethoyilethe

text: Nontuthuko Ngubane USOLA umbango embonini yamatekisi umndeni kasomatekisi odutshulwe wafa engena emzini wakhe eTrustfeed, ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku.UMnuz Thulani “Skhindi” Gabela (43), obenguNobhala KwaSwayimane/Wartburg Taxi Association, kuthiwa udutshulwe ehamba nomngani wakhe okuthiwa uyinyanga, besendleleni ebheke emzini wakhe oseTrustfeed.Kusolwa ukuthi umngani ubeyokwelapha emnzini kasomatekisi ngesikhathi behlaselwa, kodwa umndeni ukuchithile lokho.Umufi kuthiwa uthelwe ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu, kwatholakala inqwaba yamagobolondo.Bashonele endaweni yesigameko nomngani umthombo weSolezwe oqinisekisile ukuthi uyinyanga.UNksz Nomvula Shezi oyingoduso kaGabela ethintwa yiSolezwe, uthe nakuba besadidekile ngokubulawa kukamufi kodwa beluvele lukhona udungunyane embonini yamatekisi abeke ambikele ngalo.“Kungenzeka kube ukungaboni ngaso linye yikhona okuholele ekudutshulweni kwakhe. Ubeqeda kungishiya ekhaya siphuma kothengela ingane ikhekhe njengoba ibizalwa ngoLwesihlanu, engumuntu obuyayo kanti usezokwehlelwa yilesi sehlo,” kusho uNksz Shezi.Kunamahlebezi athi uGabela ubengomunye wabasekhaleni emizameni yokuqeda izimoto ezithutha abantu ukubayisa emsebenzini kodwa zingekho ngaphansi kukasoseshini.Umthombo ohlebele leli phephandaba, uthe sekunesikhathi eside abemboni yamatekisi bezama ukunqanda lezi zimoto.Omunye womndeni ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe umfowabo ubevele esedwetshelwe umugqa obovu ngokuthi kuzoshaya * -Agasti 1, sebembulele.“Bambulale ngoLwesihlanu kuyoshaya * -8 ebesuku. Ubehamba ngeQuantum lakhe elisha. Belinamasonto amabili lithengiwe. Ubephuma eWartburg ukuyolanda umngani wakhe wakwaDladla, waseMuden. Asinaso isiqinisekiso sokuthi ubeyinyanga yini, sizwe kuthiwa uyinyanga. Kudala umfowethu esatshiswa embonini. Eminyakeni eyisishiyagalombili edlule amatekisi akhe ake ahlaselwa. Bekunombango embonini, kunamatekisi angena ngokungemthetho, yena elwa nalokho.“Kusuka kuqala isonto ubethola izinsongo. NgoLwesibili nangoLwesithathu kukhona owamshayela ucingo.“Kwatshelwa nengane yakhe ukuthi ayiwashayele iwagcine la matekisi ngoba kuzophela. Bekunezinkulumo ezithi koshaya umhla ka-1 Agasti engasekho. Kanti kuzokwenzeka ngempela,” kusho owomndeni ongeke adalulwe.Umufi kuvele ukuthi ubenamatekisi amathathu.“Ubefundile eneziqu zeManagement. Ubengumuntu ohlakaniphile kakhulu. Wangena ematekisini cishe eminyakeni engu-19 edlule,” kusho owomndeni.Umufi unezingane ezinhlanu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa aseNew Hanover aphenya amacala amabili okubulala.“Izidumbu ezimbili zamadoda aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-40 no-44 zitholwe zisetekisini zinamanxeba okudutshulwa esigcemeni saseMamnani eTrustfeed,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Khonamanjalo, kuphinde kwadutshulwa itekisi inabagibeli kuM25 eMzinyathi, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo.UCaptain Gwala uthe kulesi sehlo kushone umshayeli wetekisi nomgibeli kwathi abanye abagibeli abathathu baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela benamanxeba okudutshulwa.Imenenja ehhovisi leSantaco esifundazweni, UMnuz Sfiso Shangase, ithe bezwa ubuhlungu ngesigameko sokubulawa kosomatekisi.“Abantu abangenazo izimvume zokusebenza asikho isidingo sokuba bahlaselwe ngabantu abasebenza embonini. Sizolandelela kulolu daba lokubulawa kosomatekisi ukuze sizolekelelana namaphoyisa ngokuboshwa kwabasolwa. Abanye abanolwazi abeze nalo ukuze kuzotholwa ababulali. Siyalukhuza nje udlame kule mboni, alwamukelekile,” kusho uShangase.
title: Ubesongelwa usomatekisi obulewe

text: OWAYEYIMENYA yaseThekwini, uNkk Zandile Gumede ufuna amacala abekwe wona enkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa asukela ngo-2017, asulwe ohlwini lwamacala asenkantolo.Usho lokhu ekhuluma nabalandeli bakhe ngaphandle kweNkantolo yamaCala ezeziMali eThekwini emva kokuthi icala lakhe lihlehliselwe uSepthemba 10.UNkk Gumede usolwa ngomacala okukhwabanisa nenkohlakalo amayelana nethenda lika R430 million lokuthuthwa kukadoti eThekwini.Ubevele nabanye asolwa nabo abangu-17. UNkk Gumede uphinde wasola inkantolo ngokungavumeli abezindaba ukuthi bangene ngaphakathi enkantolo ukuzocoshela leli cala, wabuza ukuthi yini esishintshile njengoba phambilini bebevunyelwa.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi uNkk Gumede uvela kule nkantolo nje, wayegcine ukuvela kuyona ngoMeyi 21.Mayelana nokuhlehliselwa uSepthemba kwecala likaNkk Gumede, inkantolo ithe isadinga ukwenza olunye uphenyo olunzulu ngokusoleka kwakhe kulawa macala.Esinye isizathu esibekwe yinkantolo, kube wukuthi abaphenyi abaningi baleli cala bahlala ngaphandle kwesifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal, ngakho ngenxa yeCovid-19 abakwazanga ukunikezela le  nkantolo ngeminye imininingwane, nokuthi babe yingxenye yaleli cala.Okhulumela abalandeli bakaNkk Gumede, uMnuz Mzomuhle Dube, uthe bazomeseka kuze kube sekugcineni uNkk Gumede ngoba kuze kube yimanje inkantolo ayikaphumeli obala isho ukuthi imaphi amacala embeka wona, ngaziphi izizathu.“Sekuphele unyaka engekho amacala okuthiwa abekwe uMama uGumede. Lokhu kusho ukuthi asikho isidingo sokuthi inkantolo iqhubeke naleli cala,” kusho uDube.Ubonge abalandeli bakaNkk Gumede ngokuzomeseka ekubeni kuyisikhathi esinzima seCovid-19.“Njengosopolitiki leli cala liyambambezela ngoba unemisebenzi eminingi okumele ngabe uyayenza,” kubalisa uDube.Njengoba uNkk Gumede wayekade engusihlalo we-ANC esifundeni iTheku ngaphambi kokuthi amiswe ekubeni yimeya nosihlalo wale nhlangano kulesi sifunda, uDube uthe lawa magatsha asameseka ngokugcwele uNkk Gumede ngoba ngokwawo, “umsulwa”.UNkk Gumede ungaphandle ngebheyili kaR50 000, kanti asolwa nabo bona banikezwa ibheyili kaR5 000 umuntu emunye.Ngonyaka odlule ngo-Okthoba, oKlebe ne-Asset Forfeiture Unit bagasela emzini kaNkk Gumede kwathathwa impahla emzini wakhe oseNanda .Ngaleso sikhathi uNkk Bathabile Dlamini ongumengameli we-ANC Women’s League, wathi bayameseka uNkk Gumede.Wakhala ngokuthi uNkk Gumede uyahlukunyezwa ngoba nakhu engumuntu wesifazane.
title: OwayeyiMeya yeTheku ufuna amacala asolwa ngawo asulwe yinkantolo

text: SELUNGENELELWE uNgqongqoshe wezeMidlalo nokuNgcebeleka kuzwelonke uTokozile Xasa udaba olusematheni lokuduba uhlelo lwethelevishini bukhoma kowayengumdlali wamaBhokobhoko, u-Ashwin Willemse ngoba ecikwa ukubhuqwa uNaas Botha noNick Mallet.UXasa ukhiphe isitatimende izolo emini emuva kwalesi senzo esenzeke ngoMgqibelo ebusuku uWillemse, Botha noMallet bebesohlelweni olushayelwa uMotshidisi Mohono, kuhlaziywa imidlalo yeVodacom Super Rugby.UWillemse utshele uBotha noMallet (abebedlala ngezikhathi zobandlululo) ukuthi ngeke akumele ukusebenza nabantu abambukela phansi ngokwebala lakhe. Uthe ngeke akwazi ukuqhubeka nokusebenza nabantu belokhu bembhuqa ekubeni babedlala ngezikhathi zobandlululo.“Kusukela ngaqala ukuzikhulisa ekuziqeqesheni njalo ningibuka njengomdlali owafakwa ngenxa yebala lakhe,” kusho uWillemse ngaphambi kokubalula injabulo yakhe ngokuthi konke lokhu okwenzekayo umhlaba uyabuka kwazise bekubukhoma.Ungqongqoshe uthe: “Le ndlela yokuziphatha kwabathile bebala elimhlophe ngokuzitshela ukuthi ubumhlophe babo busho ukuthi bangcono, kufanele iphele. Ukube akubona ubulwane obabuhambisana nenzondo enkulu yabamnyama ngabe asibanga khona isidingo sokuthi kuze kulwelwe ukuthi isibalo sabamnyama silingane nesabamhlophe,” kusho uXasa.Ukhumbuza izwe lonke ukuthi uWillemse udelelwa nje, akayena umdlali wamaBhokobhoko ojwayelekile kodwa ngo-2003 waqokwa waba iSA Rugby Player of the Year, Young Player of the Year nePlayer’s Player of the Year. Abadlali abafana noWillemse, Bryan Habana noSiyamthanda Kolisi bayisibonelo sokuthi abebala elimnyama abafakwa embhoxweni ngoba kwandiswa isibalo kodwa ithalente libuzwa kubona.UXasa utshele iSuperSport ukuthi iphuthume nophenyo kodwa akulindele ukuthi bakhishwe emoyeni uBotha noMallet.“Uma inkakha yethu ibizwa ngokuthi ingumdlali wokwandisa isibalo sabamnyama lokhu kwenziwa abantu esebenza nabo kwithelevishini, kufanele senze njani? Ukuqhubeka nokubonakala kobuso bukaBotha nobukaMallet kwithelevishini kuzobe kuchaza ukuthi iSuperSport iyavumelana nalobu buzimuzimu ababukhomise kuWillemse,” kusho uXasa.Isikhulu esiphezulu kwiSuperSport, uClinton Van der Berg, sithe: “Sizoqinisekisa ukuthi senza uphenyo olunqala ngalokhu okwenzekile. Siphoxeke kakhulu futhi sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuthi sithatha izinyathelo ezifanele uma sesiqedile ngophenyo lwethu."Ngesikhathi kuqeda ukwenzeka lokhu, uThando Manana owaziwayo ngokulwela amalungelo abamnyama ezintweni ezithinta umbhoxo ubhale kwiTwitter ehlanganisa naye uWillemse emtshela ukuthi: “Kade ngangikutshela ngalaba ababili (uBotha noMallet) ubavikela. Ngiyajabula ukuthi usuze wazibonela. kufakwe negama likaRobert Marawa kule-Twitter.
title: Ungqongqoshe ufuna baxoshwe kwiTV

text: ZIJIKILE izinto enkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini ngesikhathi uMnuz Thalente Mbongwa, obhekene namacala okudlwengula owesifazane (51) nomzukulu wakhe (7), eveza ukuthi usehlela ukuwaphika amacala phezu kokuba wayethe uyawavuma ekuqaleni.Ummeli kaMbongwa, uMnuz P Daniso, utshele inkantolo ukuthi emacaleni amathathu abhekene nawo okukhona elokugqekeza ngenhloso yokudlwengula namabili okudlwengula uhlela ukuwaphika.“Ummangalelwa wangqongqoza emzini okukhulunywa ngawo wavulelwa ngakho icala lokugqekeza uzoliphika. Icala lokudlwengula owesifazane (51) uhlela ukuliphika, sinokukhathazeka nangecala lesithathu,” kusho uDaniso.Umshushisi uNkk Shayna Naidoo uthe ucela icala lihlehliselwe uSepthemba 7 ukuze akwazi ukuthola imiphumela yolibofuzo emacaleni okudlwengula.UDaniso uthe uma lihlehla icala kufanele lihlehlele ukuthi umshushisi athole imiphumela yolibofuzo, ukukhuluma nabamangalelwa athole izitatimende nosizo lukadokotela wezengqondo uma edingeka.Umshushisi uthe ngeke akwazi ukuthembisa konke lokhu ngoba idokodo kufanele libuyele emaphoyiseni kutholakale imiphumela yolibofuzo.UMbongwa ucishe washiywa wummeli wakhe njengoba uDaniso ekhale ngokuthi akafuni ukumvulela isifuba.UMbongwa ubegqoke ijakhethi emhlophe nebhulukwe elimnyama ufike enkantolo engaxhugi ephethe nephepha ummeli wakhe athe yincwadi yokucela uxolo emphakathini nasemndenini awuhlukumezile.UDaniso uqale watshela inkantolo ukuthi ngeke akwazi ukummela ngoba akafuni ukumvulela isifuba ngamacala abekwe wona.“Nginezingqinamba nommangalelwa (Mbongwa) ngoba akafuni ukungivulela isifuba. Ufike angitshele ukuthi wangqongqoza kulo muzi wabamangali wavulelwa emuva kwalokho akazi ukuthi kwenzekani. Angikwazi ukumela umuntu engizothi uma sengisho izinto ezisesitatimendeni sakhe ajike athi akazazi. Yileso sizathu esenza ngifune ukuhoxa ukummela,” kusho uDaniso.Umshushisi uNkk Naidoo ucele imantshi ukuthi ilimise kancane icala ukuze uMbongwa akwazi ukuxoxa nommeli wakhe, aqonde nangokusebenza kwenkantolo.IMantshi uNkk M de Jager itshele uMbongwa ukuthi kubalulekile ukuthi achazele ummeli wakhe konke okwenzekile ngoba noma angangachaza kummeli kodwa inkantolo iyafuna ukwazi ukuthi kwenzekani, akakwazi ukuvika ngokuthi akasakhumbuli.Emuva kwalezi zingqinamba uMbongwa uvumile ukuqhubeka nommeli wakhe wathi uhlela ukuwaphika amacala.Imantshi ibe isilihlehlisela uSepthemba 7 icala.Amalungu e-ANC Women’s League abefike ngobuningi bawo ehambisana nomndeni wabagilwa namalungu omphakathi.Usoseshini waseChesterville uhambise umphakathi ngamatekisi kanti nabesilisa abayingxenye yomkhankaso kaJuluka Tsotsi abekhona.
title: Useyawaphika amacala osolwa ngokudlwengula

text:
SIYABONGA DHLADHLAE SIKHATHINI esedlule bekujwalekile ukuthi kube ngabamhlophe abazimbandakanya nemidlalo yezithuthuthu kodwa muva nje sekujwayelekile ukubona abamnyama, beshwibeka nabo ngezimbembeshwane zabo, emigwaqeni engothelawayeka kuleli. Emasontweni azolandela lengosi izofakana imilomo nezinsizwa kanye nezintokazi eziyizingwazi kulo mkhakha, ukuze ukwazi ukuqonda kangcono ngezithuthuthu esezinedumela nakwabamnyama.Namuhla sikwethulela ingxoxo esiyibambe no
Julile Radebe (35), ongomunye wabesifazaneabayidlanzana, abahamba ngezithuthuthu abazifelayo ngokuzitshuzela ngesivinini esiphezuluSiyabonga Dhladhla:
Lwaqala kanjani uthando lwesithuthuthu?Julile Radebe: Lwaqala eminyakeni emine eyedlule, ngangingakaze ngisicabange, kodwa umngani wami engangihlala naye ngalesosikhathi, watshala imbewu yalomdlalo kumina, angibange ngisabheka emuva kusuka lapho.Siyabonga Dhladhla:
Uqale nini ukusigibela?Julile Radebe: Ngaqala ngo-2008 ngesithuthuthu esincane esinenjini engu-125cc futhi angiboni ukuthi ngizoke ngiyeke ngoba kuyangikhulula ukuba sesithuthuthwini.Siyabonga Dhladhla:
Zingaki onazo izithuthuthu?Julile Radebe: Zimbili nje kuphela, yi-Yamaha 650cc V Twin Drag Star Cruiser ne Honda 125cc Dirt bike, zombili zinginika injabulo engafani.Siyabonga Dhladhla: I
ngabe yisiphi ofisa ukusithenga ngokulandelayo?’Julile Radebe: Ngiyazifela nge -ucati 999R Supersport, ngoba isifiso sami wukungena kwi Kyayalami track eGoli ngelinye ilanga.Siyabonga Dhladhla:
Ugijima kangakanani ngaso?Julile Radebe: Akuve ngicophelela emgwaqeni kodwa ke umuntu ubuye alingeke ngesinye isikhathi, ngike ngayizwa amandla ku200 km/h iCruiser yami.Siyabonga Dhladhla:
Uyayenza imigilingwane yamadela kufa ngesithuthuthu sakho?Julile Radebe: Cha angikaze ngizame, ngoba siyasinda kakhulu lesi engihamba ngasoSiyabonga Dhladhla:
Lunjani uvalo awukusabi ukulimala?Julile Radebe: Lutho, uvalo lwenza ukuthi ungakwazi ukujabula nokukhululeka ngokuphelele emgwaqeni ngenhanhla angikaze ngilimale.Siyabonga Dhladhla:
Ingabe uyingxenye yeClub?Julile Radebe: Yebo ngiyingxenye yeSwazi Boyz, okuyikilabhu ezinze eSwazini.Siyabonga Dhladhla:
Kungani wayijoyina iclub, futhi yini umsebenzi wayo?Julile Radebe: Kuba mnandi ukuhamba niyiqembu, nokulimala kuyancipha. I-club iyasiza ukuthi wazane nabantu abahlukene kodwa abanothando lwento eyodwa futhi yilapho uthola khona nolwazi olumqoka ngezithuthuthu.Siyabonga Dhladhla:
Ungabagqugquzela uthini abesifazane abafisa ukuhamba ngezithuthuthu njengawe?Julile Radebe: Uvalo alusizi, isithuthuthu siyakuhlonipha uma nawe usihlonipha, ngiyabanxenxa abesimame ukuba nabo bahlanganyele nathi ngoba kusagcwele abasilisa kulomdlalo okwamanje.Siyabonga Dhladhla:
Uzalelwe kuphi nendawo ntokazi?Julile Radebe: Ngidabuka eNewcastle kodwa ngihlala kwaNongoma lapho ngisebenza khona njenge-Project Manager kumasipala wakwaNongomaSiyabonga Dhladhla:
Ufunde wagogoda kumuphi umkhakha?Julile Radebe: Ngine-National Diploma kwi-Civil Engineering, njengamanje ngiqhuba izifundo zami kwi-Structural Engineering.
title: owesifazane oyingwazi yesithuthuthu

text: ISILOMO soZalo, uCebo “Mr Vibe” Mthembu, singomunye wabasakazi abaqhathwe kwiMbokodo 96.8 FM Glorious Awards aseLa Vita Hotel, eThekwini ngoDisemba 14 kusukela ngo-5 ntambama.UMr Vibe, odlala indawo kaCaptain Nyawo, uqokwe emunxeni weBest Male Presenter ngenxa yohlelo alusakaza ngempelasonto kulo msakazo oluthi, Asidlali Saturday phakathi kuka-3 no-6 ntambama.Lesi silomo, esibuye sibe yilungu leClermont Community Choir, sincintisana nozakwabo kwiMbokodo, uSipho Matyeba, Sambulo Nkwanyana, Siya Mafuleka, Dr TP Hlengwa, Sizwe Manqele, Bhelebane Ntuli, Senzo Myeni noPs Mbanjwa.Njengoba ukuvota kugcina ngeSonto, uMr Vibe unxuse abalandeli bakhe ukuthi bamvotele ngobuningi babo.Omunye umsakazi ozethembayo nguMabuyi Nzama oqokwe eminxeni emibili, okungoweBest Weekend Show ngohlelo lwakhe olungeSonto phakathi kuka-3 no-6 ekuseni oluthi Inkazimulo KaJehova Ifikile.Uhlelo lukaMabuyi lutholene phezulu noluthi Ihubo LaseSiyoni, Umthombo Wolwazi, Sidedela Indumiso, Isisekelo Somshado, Isigqi Sakithi, Ezamakhwaya noluthi Ebukhoneni BeNkosi.UMabuyi ubuye wakhethwa kwiBest Female Presenter ngohlelo lwaphakathi nezinsuku oluthi Ithemba LamathembaUJehova, lapho ebhekane khona noXoli Mjwara, Nom G noXolly Makhanya.Kweminye iminxa kuqhathwe kanje:BEST SPORTS PRESENTER: Nkosi Cele noZakhele Dlamini;BEST NEWCOMER PRESENTER: Minenhle Hlengwa noNdlelanhle Khanyile;BEST FEMALE JOURNALIST: Thando Sishi, Nothando Mthethwa, Nozipho Maphumulo, Sebe Ndlovu noThando Mkhwanazi;BEST MALE JOURNALIST: Philani Mgoza noMbongeni Sibiya.*Ukuvotela intandokazi yakho, uthumela iSMS enegama noma uhlelo nomunxa aqokwe kuwo ku-35026.
title: OwoZalo uqhathwe nabasakazi kwiMbokodo Awards

text: INHLANGANO elwela amalungelo abantu i-AfriForum isibhalele uNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu, uDkt Nkosazana Dlanini Zuma noNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo, uDkt Zweli Mkhize icela ukuthi kushaye uJuni 1 sekuhoxisiwe emithethweni yesigaba sesithathu kathaqa ukungadayiswa kukagwayi. Umkhandlu obekelwe ukubhekana neCovid-19 kuleli ubhekane nolaka lwabaningi ababhema ugwayi kulandela isimemezelo sikamengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sokuthi ngeke udayiswe ugwayi nasesigabeni sesithathu ngenxa yengozi yokuthi ungase wandise isibalo sabathelelekile. Inhloko yemigomo nokuthatha izinyathelo kwi-AfriForum, uMnuz Ernst Roets ithe asikho isizathu esibambekayo ngokungadayiswa kwemikhiqizo yetobacco kuleli. Uthe ukungaphumeli obala kukahulumeni ngokuvalwa kokudayiswa kukagwayi akuhlukile nokuhlukunyezwa kwamalungelo abantu bakuleli. Uqhube wathi ukhathazekile ngezinsolo zokuthi uDkt Dlamini-Zuma ungumngani noMnuz Adriano Mazzotti osolwa ngokudayisa ugwayi ngokungekho emthethweni. "I-AfriForum ayilweli ukubhema, ilwela inkululeko. Inkululeko yokuthi abantu bangabekelwa imithetho engawenzi umqondo," kusho yena. Encwadini i-AfriForum icele kuhoxiswe ukuvalwa kokudayiswa kukagwayi yathi uma kungenzeki lokho ingase ithathele uhulumeni izinyathelo zomthetho. NgeSonto umengameli Cyril Ramaphosa uthe abantu bakuleli bazokwazi ukuthenga utshwala kodwa baphuzele emakhaya kusukela ngoJuni 1. Abaningi bebezitshela ukuthi uzovunyelwa nogwayi ukuthi udayiswe kwazise ucwaningo luveza ukuthi iningi labantu lisawubhema ugwayi nakuba ungadayiswa ngokusemthethweni. Ngemuva kokwanda kwezinsolo zobuhlobo phakathi kukaDkt Dlamini-Zuma noMazzoti kulandela lesi sinqumo, ekhuluma nekomidi lasePhalamende uNgqongqoshe ngoLwesibili ukuchithile ukuthi bangabangani boMazzoti. "Kumele ngikusho kube kanye lokhu, angiyena umngani kaMazzotti. Okwesiili, uma umuntu enza okuphambene nomthetho eNingizimu Afrika, kumele aboshwe,"ugcizelele kanje.
title: I-AfriForum inqumele uhulumeni ugwayi katiki kolukagwayi

text: UMTHWALO usobhokweni eqenjini lamantombazane lesizwe labaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-17 njengoba ngempelasonto bezobhekisa amabombo e-Uruguay kwiNdebe yoMhlaba.Njengamanje Abantwana basekhempini ezophela ngoLwesihlanu lapho umqeqeshi, uSimphiwe Dludlu, ezobe esememezela abadlali abawu-21 azohamba nabo ngoMgqibelo.Umqhudelwano uzoqala ngoNovemba 13 kuya kuDisemba 1.“Yize singakawazi amaqembu kodwa sihlela ukuthi sibe nemidlalo emibili yobungani e-Uruguay esizozijwayeza ngawo isimo sezulu ngaphambi komdlalo wethu wokuqala neMexico,” kusho uDludlu.Amanye amazwe aseqoqweni laBantwana yiBrazil neJapan.Kulandwe uThabo Senong ukuthi azolekelela uDludlu nephini lakhe uMaud Khumalo emqhudelwaneni.USenong ubekwiNdebe yoMhlaba neqembu labafana lika-Under 20 eSouth Korea nyakenye.“Sinobudlelwano obuhle (benoKhumalo) futhi siyakholwa wukuthi ngokubambisana kukhona esingakuzuza. Umqeqeshi uThabo yena ungomunye wengibukela kubona nengikholwa wukuthi sinethimba elihle labaqeqeshi,” kusho uDludlu.Kungokwesibili emlandweni wakuleli ukuthi amantombazane ka-Under 17 aye kwiNdebe yoMhlaba. Aya okokuqala ngo-2010 eTrinidad & Tobago ngaphansi kobuholi bukaSolly Luvhango. Nokho iqembu alinqobanga nowodwa umdlalo liphuma esigabeni samaqoqo.UDludlu uthe yize engabhekile izinto ezinkulu kodwa bazimisele ngokuthola amaphuzu emidlalweni yabo.“Ngifuna abadlali bakuthokozele ukudlala. Kumele bakhombise ithalente labo kodwa futhi sibhekile ukuthi bazikhandle ngokuphindiwe ukutshengisa ukuthi bakulungele ukudlala ezingeni lomhlaba. Kusemqoka ukuzikhombisa ukuthi besikufanele ukungena (kwiNdebe yoMhlaba), senze konke okusemandleni ukuze sithole amaphuzu. Yiwona azokucacisa ukuthi asibeka kuphi,” kusho uDludlu ekhuluma nabe-safa.net.
title: Libhekisa amabombo e-Uruguay elesizwe

text: I-EFF isabisa ngokuthi izoyinyomfa uma uMengameli Jacob Zuma esethula inkulumo yakhe yesimo sezwe ePhalamende ngoLwesine.Ilungu lePhalamende kuzwelonke le-EFF elicele ukuba lingadalulwa ngoba lingavumelekile ukuthi likhulume nabezindaba lithe bazobe bekhona ngezinkani ePhalamende ngalolu suku.Lithe kodwa ngeke baze bavumele uZuma ukuba akhulume nesizwe.“Ngeke sivumele umuntu ontshontshayo ukuthi akhulume nesizwe,” kusho leli lungu.I-EFF isimphazamise kaningi uZuma ePhalamende kwezinye iziqubu kwagcina kuqhuma iqupha ezindlini zombuso phakathi kwezikaMnuz Julius Malema nonogada.Njengoba i-EFF isabisa ngokuyinyomfa iPhalamende ngeledlule liveze ukuthi zizobe ziqine ngokweqile ezokuphepha ezindlini zombuso ngalolu suku.Ezokuphepha ezizobe zikhona zifaka nezobuNhloli. Kuthiwa kuzobe kuqashwe ngaphakathi nangaphandle.Khona manjalo, amaqembu aphikisayo asezwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuqiniswa ngokweqile kwezokuphepha ePhalamende ngalolu suku.Ngeledlule i-DA ithe ayizange ihambisane nesinqumo sokuthi kuqiniswe ngokweqile ezokuphepha ngoLwesine.Umholi weDA, uMnuz John Steenhuisen, ucashunwe ethi kabaqondi ukuthi kungani kudingeka ukuthi kuze kube khona ezobuNhloli ePhalamende ngoLwesine.“Kungani kumele kube khona nalolu phiko kube kwenziwa umsebenzi ohlale wenziwa ePhalamende,” kusho uSteenhuisen.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, nabezindaba nabo sebazwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuqiniswa kwezokuphepha kakhulu ePhalamende ngoLwesine.Banovalo lokuthi lokhu kungagcina sekubaphazamisa ekwenzeni umsebenzi wabo ngokukhululeka.Kodwa ngeledlule uNobhala wePhalamende, uMnuz Gengezi Mgidlana, ucashunwe eqinisa idolo abezindaba ethi ngeke kuphazamise ukusebenza kwabo.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Xolani Dube, uthe akabuboni ubuhlakani bokuqiniswa ngokweqile kwezokuphepha ePhalamende.Uthe lokhu kuyizinkomba zokuthi uZuma usenyambanambana kubalingani bakhe.“Kungani kulandwa amaphoyisa ngoba uZuma uzobe engekho kwi-rally kodwa uzobe esePhalamende nabalingani bakhe. Noma kungakhona abantu abangamfuni uMengameli angiboni ukuthi bangaze bamenzakalise, ngicabanga ukuthi inhloso yokuqinisa ezokuphepha wukugwema ukuthi kungabikhona mbhikisho,” kusho uDube.
title: ‘Sizomphazamisa uZuma ePhalamende’

text: AMALUNGU amahlanu omndeni wakwaTenza-Mkhize atholakala eshonile eMontclair, eThekwini, ngesonto eledlule azofihlwa ngoMgqibelo.IMantshi uNkk Bongekile Tenza-Mkhize uzofihlwa nezingane zakhe azithola emshadweni wokuqala uFezeka (16), Thabiso (11) noKhwezi Ngcobo (7).Izingane bezifunda uGrade 11, Grade 6 noGrade 3 ngokulamana kwazo.Umyeni wakhe, obengutolika enkantolo yaseThekwini, uMnuz Sandile Mkhize (41), kuthiwa uzofihlwa kubo eStanger ngawo uMgqibelo.Umngcwabo kanina nezingane uzoba sehholo lomphakathi eNhlangwini, eHighflats ngaseXobho. Inkonzo izoqala ngo-8 ekuseni.Isitatimende esithunyelwe wumndeni wakwaTenza izolo sithe uNkk Tenza-Mkhize ubelungile, ehlakaniphile futhi ezithanda izingane zakhe nomndeni wakhe.Ubeziqhenya ngomsebenzi wakhe wokuba yimantshi ebisebenza enkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini.Isitatimende sithe umndeni uzoyekela amaphoyisa enze uphenyo ngokwaholela ekubulaweni kwakhe nezingane zakhe.Inkonzo yesikhumbuzo izoba senkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini kusasa ngo-1 ntambama. Eyezingane izoba sesikoleni eYellowwood Park khona kusasa ngo-8 ekuseni.Batholwa ngoLwesithathu emzini wakwaMkhize sebethuli. Kusolwa ukuthi uMkhize wabadubula, wabe esezidubula naye. Kuvulwe amacala amane okubulala nelilodwa ngokufa komuntu.Akwaziwa ukuthi kwaba yini umsuka wengxabano eyaholela ekufeni kwabo.Ithimba leSolezwe laya endaweni yobugebengu emuva kwesehlo ngeledlule. Omakhelwane bathi babengazange bezwe lutho.Kuthiwa isihlobo sashayela ucingo amaphoyisa ngoba abashadile bengafikanga emsebenzini nezingane zingayanga esikoleni ngoLwesithathu.Kusolwa ukuthi kwenzeka ngoLwesibili ebusuku.
title: Uzofihlwa ngoMgqibelo umndeni wemantshi

text:
UMDLALO wethelevishini owuchungechunge, Uzalo, luqophe umlando ngokuthi isiqephu sawo sibukwe ngabantu ababalelwa ku11 407 540 ngo-Ephreli 15 kulo nyaka. Lezi zibalo ziqinikiswe 
ngabe-marklives.com muva nje. Kulezi zibalo kufakwe nezinhlelo ezikhonjiswa kuSABC 1, 2, 3, 
e.tv neDStv. Kuthiwa kungokokuqala ngqa emlandweni wethelevishini eNingizimu Afrika ukuba kube khona uhlelo olubukwa yizinkumbi ezingaka zabantu ngesikhathi esisodwa. Umdlalo owuchungechunge wokuqala ukukhonjiswa kuleli, iGenerations The Legacy, ulale isibilli ngo-9,544,765 kwathi omunye umdlalo nawo okhonjiswa kuSABC 1 ngo6.30, iSkeem Saam, uthole   u-8,844,068. Kuvela lezi zindaba ezimnandi nje, Uzalo luzoke luthi ukunyamalala kwiTV amasonto amahlanu kusukela ngoMsombuluko wangomhla ka11 Meyi kuze kushaye uJuni 12, 2020. "Enye intandokazi yomdlalo osigcawugcawu osihloko sithi Makoti, uzongena esikhaleni soZalo ngo8.30 ebusuku," kusho isitatimende sakwaSABC 1 esithunyelelwe imithombo yezindaba. Ukuqoshwa kweziqephu zoZalo kuphazanyiswe ukuvalwa kwezwe thaqa njengoba izwe esigabeni sesihlanu, okudalwe ukusabala kwegciwane leCorona. Okhulumela, Uzalo, uNomfundo Zondi, uqinisekisile ukuthi lo mdlalo sewuqalile ukuqopha kuleli sonto emuva kokuxilonga bonke ababambe iqhaza ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukuphepha kupho. Ifilimu esihloko sithi Contagion yabukwa ngabantu abawu-4,465,588 kuSABC 3. KuMzansi Magic kuphenduke amatafula njengoba umdlalo omusha osamisiwe osihloko sithi Gomora, udlule ngehubo komunye umdlalo iThe Queen njengoba sewunababukeli abawu- 2,510,542.*Uhlu lwezinhlelo ezinhlanu ezikhonjiswa kuTV kwisiteshi ngesiteshi lumi kanje: Uzalo 11,407,540Generations: The Legacy 9,544,765Skeem Saam 8,844,068Xhosa News 6,215,597Zulu News 6,014,041  Muvhango 5,215,075SABC News:Covid – 19 Updates 5,012,727President on Covid-19 Additional Relief 4,686,974Ses/Tsw/Sep News 3,654,414Covid-19:Update From the President 3,414,750  Contagion 4,465,588News 1,034,275Animal Babies 1,012,362Tropika Island of Treasure -R 865,276Isidingo -R 801,795  Scandal 6,255,257Rhythm City 4,863,649Imbewu:The Seed 4,712,087Shanghai Noon 4,331,790Shanghai Knights 4,082,901  Gomora 2,510,542The Queen 2,360,221Our Perfect Wedding 1,909,050Date My Family 1,792,375Nightline 1,503,995
title: UZalo lusaqhubeka nokuziwolela ababukeli kuleli

text: SEKUQUBULE imibuzo ukusetshenziswa kwemali ewuR22 million yokuthengela abahlala emigwaqweni izingubo zokulala ngesikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe thaqa.Kuthiwa kunabathile abaphula imigomo elawula ukukhishwa kwamathenda ngenhloso yokukhwabanisela uhulumeni.UNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza, uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uthe ngeke ayibekezelele inkohlakalo wathi akuqalwe uphenyo.Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Mhlaba Memela, uqinisekisile ukuthi kayilandelwanga imigomo elawula ukukhishwa kwamathenda.UMemela uthe emuva kokuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ememezele inhlekelele ngokubheduka kobhubhane iCoronvirus, kwathathwa njengento ephuthumayoukuthe­ngwa kwezingubo zokulala kulandelwa imithetho yoMnyango weziMali kuzwelonke. Umnyango uthenge izingubo eziwu-48 000 emuva kwesimemezelo.UMemela uthe izingubo ezisezingeni zibiza uR350 kuya kuR559 iyinye.Ziwu-36 000 izingubo ezithunyelelwe umnyango ukuba uzisabalalise ezikhungweni ezigcine abahlala emigwaqweni esifundazweni.UMemela uthe umnyango ulinde izingubo eziwu-12 000 ozozigcina uzisebenzise uma kunenhlekelele ngomuso.“Sijwayele ukuthengaizingubo zokulala nezinye izinto ezimqoka ezithunyelwa ezifundeni uma kunomlilo, izikhukhula nezinye izinhlekelele ezehlela imiphakathi. Umehluko manje wukuthi esikhundleni sokusebenzisa inkampanieyodwa enkulu, sisebenzise izinkampani eziyisithupha ezisathuthuka emiphakathini ukuba zisihlinzeke ngezingubo,” kusho uMemela.Uthe kuyaphoxa ukuthi kunabantu abafuna ukwakha sithombe sokuthi kunenhlese yokukhwabanisa emnyangweni.“Ngokwazi kwethu akubanga nankohlakalo,” kusho uMemela.UMemela uthe kungenzeka abantu abebegaqele ithenda abadwebe isithombe senkohlakalo emuva kokunikwa kwamabhizinisi amancane ithenda.UMnuz Raymod Perrier, umxhumanisi enhlanganweni iNational Homeless Network, uthe kuzomethusa uma kutholakala ukuthi kunezikhulu ezisebenzisa igama labahlala emigwaqweni ukudla imali.
title: Imibuzo ngoR22 million wezingubo zokulala

text: UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala uthi kuzoqiniswa kakhulu ukuhlolelwa iCovid-19 kulezo zikole ezisezindaweni eziyizizinda zecoronavirus ukunqanda leli gciwane ezikoleni."Isigungu esiphezulu soMnyango wezeMpilo sinxuse ukuthi kuqiniswe ukuhlolelwa kwabantu icoronavirus ukuze kunqandwe leli gciwane ezikoleni,"kusho uZikalala.UZikalala ubekhuluma emhlanganweni wezigungu esiphezulu iKZN EXCO namhlanje (ngoLwesithathu).Uthe bayazi ukuthi kunezikole okumanje zivaliwe ngenxa yokuthi kutholakale iCovid-19 kuzona."Sikhathazekile ngokwenyuka kwesibalo sabantu abahaqwe yileli gciwane selokhu izwe lingene esigabeni sesithathu sokuvalwa kwezwe, kodwa isigungu esiphezulu siyathobeka nangesibalo sabantu abalulamayo kuleli gciwane. Sifuna ukukugcizelela ukuthi sizinikele ekutheni kungabi khona thisha namfundi ozosuleleka ngaleli gciwane,"kusho uZikalala.UNdunankulu uthe izinhlelo zime ngomumo uma kwenzeka kuba nenkinga yokuthi kube khona abafundi noma othisha abatheleleka ngaleli gciwane."I-Provincial Executive Council iyaqhubeka nokunxusa abantu ukuthi bagqoke izifonyo uma besemphakathini, baqhelelane futhi baqhubeke nomkhuba wokuhlamba izandla ngendlela efanele," usho kanje.NgoLwesithathu bese kunezinye izikole ezimbili zaKwaZulu-Natal okubikwe kuzo ukuthi ukufunda nokufundisa akuzoqhubeka kulandela ukuthi kube nothisha okutholakale ukuthi baneCovid-19.Isikole iSavannah Park Secondary eChatsworth sikhiphe izincwadi sicela abazali ukuthi bangazilethi izingane zabo ezikoleni kuze kube baziswa yisikole ukuthi sebengaziletha.Esinye isikole iDeccan Road Primary eMgungundlovu naso kuye kwadingeka ukuthi sivalwe kulandela ukuthi kube khona uthisha okuvele ukuthi uhloliwe kwatholakala leli gciwane.Abanye abazali belulekwe ukuthi bayohlola izingane zabo ezikhungweni ezizimele kodwa kuyomele isikole saziswe ngemiphumela.NgoLwesibili iClairwood Secondary ne-Apollo Secondary nabo bakhiphe izincwadi bazinika abazali mayelana nokuvalwa okwesikhashana kwalezi zikole kulandela ukuthi othisha bakulezi zikole betholwe beneCovid-19.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa, uthe basebenzisana noMnyango wezeMpilo ukubhekana nezehlakalo ezifuze lezi. "Ukuphepha ezikoleni yinto eseqhulwini kithina. Kunemibandela enqala elandelwayo uma kukhona onaleli gciwane esikoleni. Kuze kube manje besisanelisekile ngendlela okwenzeka ngayo ezikoleni,"kusho uMthethwa.
title: UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal nezinhlelo eziqinile ukuvikela othisha nabafundii kwiCovid-19

text: UTHUSO Mbedu uthi ufunde lukhulu emdlalweni iGenerations: The Legacy izolo okuvele izindaba zokuthi uchithiwe kuwo.UThuso ekuqaleni konyaka kuvele izindaba zokuthi uzobonakala emdlalweni abelingisa kuwo indawo ka-Okuhle Cele.Ekhuluma ngokushiya kwakhe uthe ukujabulele ukuba semdlalweni wonke umuntu abemamukela kuwo ngezandla ezifudumele.“Ngisijabulele isikhathi engibe naso kulo mdlalo futhi kuningi engikufundile. Akusho ukuthi kuphelile ngami ngoba kungenamdlalo engibonakala kuwo. Ngimatasa ngiqopha umdlalo iMTV Shuga ezoze iqale ukubonakala ngonyaka ozayo,” kusho uThuso.Amaphephandaba angeSonto abike ukuthi indawo akade eyilingisa iphelelwe yisikhathi ngenxa yokuthi ababhali bahluleke bancama ukuyiqhubezela phambili.UThuso ugcine ukuqopha kulo mdlalo ngoJulayi. Naye ukuqinisekisile lokho.Kuthiwa ababhali babecabanga ukuthi njengoba engumuntu onekhono futhi oselingise emidlalweni eminingi indawo yakhe izosheshe ikhule kodwa lokho kwangenzeka.Kwi-Generations: The Legacy akabonakalanga ngisho izinyanga eziyisithupha kodwa uphinde waqokwa emcimbini wezindondo ama-Emmy Awards.Ubeseqokwa okwesibili. Kulokhu uqokwe emkhakheni weBest Performance.Uthe kumthokozisile ukuqokwa kwakhe kangangokuthi uzobe ekhona emcimbini nakulo nyaka.
title: ‘Kuningi engikufunde kwiGenerations’

text: ABANTU baseNtinyane, eMbumbulu, bathukuthele bavala umgwaqo omkhulu uR603 ngezingodo nangamathayi avuthayo bekhononda ngokuhamba kukagesi abathi sekuphele izinsuku ezinhlanu ungekho.Bavuke kuseluvivi izolo bavala umgwaqo onqamula eMbumbulu ngoba bethi sebebolelwa wukudla emafrijini nezingane zabo kazisakwazi ukutadisha ukulungiselela izivivinyo zika-matric ngenxa yokuthi ugesi awukho.UNksz Khombile Ndlovu uthe banqume ukuvala umgwaqo ngoba sebezame konke okusemandleni ukukhuluma ne-Eskom kodwa kungabi bikho mnyakazo.“Siyababiza bafike bavele bajike bengazange benze lutho. Okubuhlungu wukuthi asisakwazi nokuxhumana nezihlobo ngoba amaselula acishile. Sibolelwa wukudla kanti izingane zethu azikwazi ngisho ukuzilungiselela ukuhlolwa kwazo ngoba kumnyama kuyo yonke indawo yaseNtinyane,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu.Kuthiwa ugesi unqamuke emuva kokuthi kunabathile abantshontshe amakhebuli.USihlalo wekomiti lokuHlaliswa kwaBantu neNgqalasizinda kuMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Thanduxolo Sabelo, obekhuluma namalungu omphakathi ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ekhuculula umgwaqo, uthe amalungu omphakathi kumele aqikelele ukuthi ingqalasizinda kahulumeni ayebiwa ngoba lokhu kujike kuhlukumeze umphakathi.AMAPHOYISA kamasipala weTheku ekhuculula umgwaqo ngemva kokuthi iqulu lamalungu omphakathi lithukuthele lavala umgwaqo uR603 eMbumbulu izolo. Isithombe: Leon Lestrade/African News Agency (ANA)“Ukunqamuka kukagesi kubangelwe ngabantu abantshontshe ikhebuli abasuke behlose ukuyidayisa. Lokhu kuyawulimalaza umphakathi kodwa kumele umphakathi kube yiwona obamba iqhaza ekuvikeleni ingqalasizinda. Ngeke kusuke amaphoyisa azogada ugesi kodwa umphakathini kumele kube yiwo obika izenzo zobugebengu emaphoyiseni,” kusho uSabelo.Uthembise umphakathi ukuthi uzolusukumela udaba lokunqamuka kukagesi. Uthe usexhumene noMasipala weTheku ukuze kufakwe enye ikhebuli.Amanye amalungu omphakathi abegxeka ikhansela, uMnuz Thembelihle Makhanya, ngokungasukumeli phezulu uma umphakathi unezikhalo. Amanye abethi ayaqala nokumbona ethi akayibizi imihlangano yomphakakathi. UMakhanya uthe ukwebiwa kwamakhebuli kuyishwa ngoba alukho uhlahlomali olubekwa eceleni olulinde ukuthi uma kwebiwa ingqalasizinda.
title: Bavale umgwaqo bekhononda ngogesi

text: KUZOTHELEKA izivakashi eziwu-1 million KwaZulu-Natal njengoba kuzoqala amaholidi kaDisemba.Lezi zindaba zivezwe wuNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha nezeMvelo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, izolo ngesikhathi ethula uhlelo lwamaholidi lwesifundazwe.UZikalala uthe zingaphezu kuka-600 000 izivakashi ezivela kwezinye izifundazwe ezazigcwele KwaZulu-Natal ngonyaka odlule, kulo nyaka bahlela ukuheha eziwu-850 000 ezivela kwezinye izifundazwe neziwu-150 000 ezivela kwamanye amazwe.“Lokhu kusho ukuthi kuzongena uR1.8 billion emnothweni waKwaZulu-Natal futhi lokhu kuzosisiza ukuthi sifinyelele ezinhlelweni zethu zokudala amathuba omsebenzi awu-183 000,” kusho uZikalala.Ucele abantu ukuthi babhukhe ezindaweni ezibhaliswe ngokusemthethweni ngokungena kwi-website yeTourismKwaZulu-Natal.Uthe abantu bazobe bephephile emabhishi ngoba abasebenzi beKZN Sharks Board bayasebenza futhi bawahlola nsuku zonke amanethi avimbela oshaka ukuba beze osebeni lolwandle.IMeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede ithe bawu-1.3 million abantu abavakashela iTheku minyaka yonke ngamaholidi kaDisemba futhi bakulungele ukwamukela izivakashi ngezandla ezifudumele.Uthe njengoba imicimbi izobe ithe chithi saka amaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku nawakwaSAPS azobe echithiwe kuwo wonke amakhona aleli dolobha eqaphe isimo.“Sithembisa abantu abavakashela eThekwini isikhathi esimnandi esingenazo izigameko ezimbi ngoba ezokuphepha zizobe ziqinile. Sizoqala ukuba matasa ngomdlalo wokukhumbula uMandela weBafana Bafana, size ngomdlalo wabakhaya baseSoweto, i-Orlando Pirates neKaizer Chiefs, amaCrown Gospel Awards, iFillUpMoses Mabhida, Durban Jazz, Durban Braai Day, Maskandi Festival neJanuary 8 Statement. Siyilungele yonke le micimbi sithi abantu abeze eThekwini,” kusho uNkk Gumede.Uthe kuzobashubela nabenza amaphathi ebhishi nabaphuza esidlangaleni ngoba amaphoyisa akhona ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imithetho kamasipala iyasebenza.UMnuz Wonder Mbutho oyiSenior Lifeguard ebhishi iBay of Plenty ukhale ngabantu abangalaleli uma besebhishi wathi yibona ababanika inkinga ngoba babhukuda ezindaweni ezingafanele.“Sicela abantu basilalele uma bebhukuda ebhishi ngoba yithina esibonayo ukuthi ulwandle lunjani. Sicela babhukude lapho sibayalele khona ukuze bagweme ukuminza. Sesibalindile futhi siyajabula ngezinsiza esinazo ngoba sinezithuthuthu zasemanzini nemikhumbi yokusiza abazoba nezinkinga,” kusho uMbutho.
title: Kubhekwe uR1.8 billion ngezivakashi eKZN

text: UKUFIKA kosuku lokhetho lweSafa kuzwelonke, akusho ukuthi insila yobuxoki isikhucululwe yaphela ebholeni laseNingizimu Afrika.UMazwi Mkhize osekomidini likazwelonke elengamele imqhudelwano yeSafa ukusho ngaphandle kokunanaza ukuthi ubuxoki yibona obuyisithiyo enqubekeleni phambili yebhola ikakhulukazi KwaZulu-Natal.UMkhize ohola uhlangothi lwaseCurries Fountain olubanga nolwaseHoy Park ekuphatheni iSafa eThekwini, ujutshwe ukuba ayomela iSafa kwi-ABC Motsepe National Play Offs aseLimpopo kusukela ngoJuni 4 iyophela ngoJuni 9. Amaqembu ayofinyelela kowamanqamu kulo mqhudelwano ayonyukela kwiNational First Division.Okushiya imibuzo ngokujutshwa kukaMkhize wukuthi namanje iSafa, eholwa nguDanny Jordaan ozonikwa ihlandla lesibili engaphikiswa muntu okhethweni lwale nhlangano eNasrec namuhla, ayikaluxazululi udaba lweSafa eThekwini eholwa zinhlaka ezimbili ezahlukene futhi ezingabhekani.Ephawula uMkhize ngokuqokwa kwakhe ekuyomeleni le nhlanga emidlalweni esePolokwane uthe:“Ukuqokwa kwami yinto ongeke ufunde okuningi kuyo ngoba phela wumqhudelwano odlulayo. Akusho ukuthi sengiyinhloko yophiko oluthile. Sizobe sibambisene noBrains Zulu waseMpumalanga ePolokwane. Okwethu kuzobe kuwukwengamela imidlalo. Konke kuzobe kubikwa kithi,” kusho uMkhize.Akaliyekanga kodwa ithuba lokuklolodela izimbangi zakhe kolwaseThekwini.“Siqokwe emhlanganweni obungoLwesithathu olwedlule. Ngosuku lomdlalo weMamelodi Sundowns neBarcelona. Ukuqokwa kwami ukuyokwenza loya msebenzi kufanele kodwa kubenze bazinuke amakhwapha abangathintekanga.Bekufanele ubuholi beSafa bungethembe ngoba vele ngisemakomidini amabili; elezemiqhudelwano kanjalo nelebhola lezikole,” kusho uMkhize.Ukuqokwa kukaMkhize noZulu kusho ukuthi ubuholi obusha beSafa abuzukuba nayo ingcindezi yokutatazelela ukuqoka ikomidi lezemiqhudelwano kuzwelonke.UMkhize uthe indaba yaseThekwini ayisho ukuthi sebeyizitha noMchunu kodwa iwubufakazi bokuthi ibhola laseNingizimu Afrika liphethwe amaxoki.“Uma sekudluleukhetho ngizokhuluma ngiqephuze. Kufanele avezwe amaqiniso ngoba ibhola liphethwe amaxoki. Mina kuyimi nje ophethe (kuzwelonke)ibingeke ize ifike kulelizinga le nto kodwa-keangifuni ukukhuluma manje ngingaze ngonele laba bafana esisebenza nabo obabona kahle ukuthi banekusasa ekuphathweni kwebhola,” kusho uMkhize.Udaba lweSafa eThekwini lubuyela enkantolo ngenyanga ezayo.Ukhala ngobuxoki nje uMkhize kuvela ukuthiukhetho lweSafa luhlalanamuhla phezu kokuba lungabanga khona eKZN. Lesi sifundazwe esikhulu sizomelwa yiziphakanyiswa - uThemba Phiri, uMelusi Kubheka, uKwenzakwakhe Ngwenya noThabile Msomi.Ukungakhulumi ngazwi linye kwabaseKZN abayothamela ukhetho namuhla kubeka iSafa KZN engozini efana ncamashineyenzeka kwi-African National Congress yaseKZN eyasala incela izithupha njengoba ingenaye umuntu oyimele kwitop 6 kaKhongolose.Khonamanjalo izolo iSafa itshele amalungu asekomidini lesigungu sikazwelonke ukuthi ukhetho luzoqhubeka ngaphandle kwezihibe ngemuva kokubhutsha kwemizamo kaMwelo noNkonyana nethimba lakhe ekutheni inkantolo ikhiphe isinqumo sokuthi lungaqhubekile.
title: Ubuxoki obubulala ibhola ezifundeni zeSafa - Mkhize

text: IPHINI likaNgqongqoshe wezoHwebo neZimboni nokuThuthukiswa koMnotho uNkk Nomalungelo Gina, lithe kumele abantu bakuleli bazi ukuthi bazowenzani umhlaba uma usubuyela kubona.Ukhulume kanjena emcimbini wokuvala inyanga yabesifazane i-Womens Day Commemoration, obuhlelwe ibandla laseLuthela (eKwethabeni) behlangene nenkampani i-JRD Consulting CC, kaNkk Jabu Dlamini eMpangeni Town Hall, ngoMgqibelo.UNkk Gina ukhulume kanjena kade eyala abesifazane ukuba baqale izimboni zabo.“Impela kumele siwulwele umhlaba ukuba ubuyele kubantu kodwa umbuzo uthi sizowenzani uma usubuyele kithina? Sinalo yini iqhinga lokuwusebenzisa? Kumanje lo mhlaba omncane esinawo siyawusebenzisa yini? Impendulo ithi cha. Kumele abantu bakuleli bazilungiselele ukuthi bazowenzani umhlaba uma usubuyela kubo,” kusho uNkk Gina.Uthe kusemqoka ukuba baqale manje bawusebenzise umhlaba, kwenziwe amabhizinisi.Unxenxe abesifazane abebehambele lo mcimbi ukuba basebenzise namathuba abanawo, bazakhele amabhizinisi.“Kumele sicabange izindlela zokwenza amabhizinisi ukuze sizoqeda indlala emphakathini wethu, sikwazi ukwakha amathuba omsebenzi. Singabesifazane singahlangana siqale okuzosifakela inzuzo. Ukuqala amabhizinisi ikhona okuzothuthukisa umnotho wakuleli,” kusho uNkk Gina.Wenze isibonelo ukuthi kuke kufike inkampani yaphesheya izofuna abenza ubuhlalu ukuze babudayise phesheya.Uthe kokunye bake bangabatholi abantu abenza ubuhlalu ngoba bazithungela bodwa, bangabi amaqembu, abanye izinkampani zabo azibhalisiwe.UNkk Gina uthe uyakuqonda ukuthi imiqulu eminingi okumele igcwaliswe abantu iyabaxaka.Uthe kokunye uma beya emahhovisi abalutholi usizo lokuthi bagcwalise kanjani imiqulu okwenza badikibale.“Kokunye uke ufike ehhovisi elithize bavele bakunike umqulu omkhulu ongazi nokuthi ungawuqala kephi ukuwugcwalisa uma ufuna umsebenzi. Ngiyazi lokho kuyabenza abantu badikibale kodwa kumele bacele usizo. Kokunye abantu abasebenza emahhovisi bahluleka nokuchazela abantu ngokuthi bangaluthola kanjani usizo, konke lokhu kumele ungakuvumeli kukuthene amandla uma uqala ibhizinisi. Lokhu ungqongqoza eminyangweni ehlukene, kuyoze kuvuleke. Ibhizinisi lifuna isibindi nokusebenza kanzima,” kuphetha uNkk Gina.Lo mcimbi ubuhanjelwe izikhulu okubalwa uNkk Thembeka Mchunu, uNkk Nomusa Dhlomo webandla iCovenant Fellowship Church International (CFCI) nezinye izikhulu.Imali eqoqwe kulo mcimbi izosiza ukwakha isikhungo somphakathi nendlu yokukhonza eNgwelezane.
title: ‘Nizowenzani umhlaba?’

text: USHAYWE indiva emngcwabeni womyeni wakhe, uLerato Sengadi, yize ngoLwesihlanu, iNkantolo eNkulu yaseGoli ithe uyinkosikazi egane ngokwesintu nomrepha ongasekho, uJabulani “HHP” Tsambo.Emngcwabeni kaHHP ngoMgqibelo uLerato akafakangwa emlandweni walo mculi wahlaliswa nasephaseji kuqhubeka inkonzo.Lokhu kugqamise uqhekeko phakathi kwakhe nabakwaTsambo njengoba beze bayisana enkantolo.Ekhuluma udadewabo kaHHP, uNksz Ayanda Tsambo, uqhakambise unina wengane yomfowabo ngokubaseka, akazange ambale nakancane uLerato.Nangesikhathi uninalume womrepha, uMnuz Fezile Govern, efunda umlando akazange ambale uLerato.Uthe uHHP ushiye abazali, odadewabo ababili, indodana uLeano nomshana.Isenzo somndeni kaHHP sidonse ukukhuluma kwezokuxhumana, abanye bezwelana noLerato.Ngesikhathi sekuvalwa inkonzo yomngcwabo, uGovern uthe abantu abazoya emathuneni umndeni nabanezigqebhezana zokungena.Abaningi babambe umoya bezibuza ukuthi uLerato uzovunyelwa yini emathuneni noma uzosala ehholo.Yize abaningi bejabulile ngokumbona emathuneni uLerato kodwa badumele ngokuthi ubambe ulayini wayophonsa inhlabathi nowonke wonke.Kuqale kwayothela abazali bakaHHP, balandelwa odadewabo ababili nendodana yakhe ebiphelezelwa unina ngaphambi kokuthi kuvulelwe izihlobo nabangani.Umrepha uShuga Smakx ubeseka uLerato emngcwabeni, ubeyingxenye yabamphelezelile eseyovalelisa.Abanye bosaziwayo ababonakale beyovalelisa uHHP kubalwa uCassper Nyovest, Stoan Seate, Thapelo Mokoena, Slikour nabanye.
title: Uphendulwe isichuse emngcwabeni umkaHHP

text: ICELL C Sharks izimisele ukusebenzisa izimbangi zayo ezinkulu iVodacom Bulls ukubuyisa izinduku nokudumala okube khona ngeledlule ngesikhathi ikhala ngaphansi kwiDHL Stormers.Iphini lomqeqeshi weSharks, uBraam van Staaten, litshele abezindaba ngezifiso zeSharks zokuya eLoftus kusasa ntambama ifike iqoqe amaphuzu agcwele. “Engingakungabazi ukuthi umbhoxo esizowudlala ePitoli uzokhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi akwehlanga kahle okwenzeke ngeledlule sishaywa ezinye izimbangi zethu. Okusemqoka ukuthi siqinisekise ukuthi siyawasebenzisa amathuba esizowathola."Kunomuzwa wokuthi iSharks izimisele ngokudlala umbhoxo okuhamba kuwona ibhola kodwa lokhu kubukeke sengathi yikhona okuyidonsele amanzi ngomsele ishayelwa ekhaya yiStormers. Kuyacacake nokho ukuthi ngeke iyishintshe indlela iSharks edlala ngayo uma uyilalelisisa kahle inkulumo kaBraam.Yebo iSharks ikhale ngaphansi kwiStormers kodwa okucacile ukuthi izobulala abantu uma konke sekuhlangene ngoba abadlali abafana noLukhanyo Am, Sbu Nkosi, Aphelele Fassie noMakazole Mapimpi bakhombisile ukuthi ngeke ibambeke iSharks uma sebengene bathi khaxa kulesi sitayela sokudlala abafuna ukusithatha.Kulo mdlalo weBulls iSharks ithembise ukuthi izocacisa okuningi ngoba iyazi ukuthi uma ingakwenzi lokho kuzofana nokuthi ayenzanga lutho iqala kahle lo mqhudelwano ngamawini amabili ekhaya nasekuhambeni. “ISuper Rugby ayinqotshwa ngoMashi. Nango-Ephreli isuke ingakanqotshwa ngakho siwulungele umdlalo waseLoftus. Ukushaywa kwethu yiStormers kungokwejwayelekile futhi okungenzeka kunoma yiliphi iqembu. Akuyona into okumele siyifake ekhanda kepha ukunqoba eLoftus yikho okufanele siphuphe ngakho,” usho kanje uBraam.Khonamanjalo, uyaqhubeka umshikashika weHSBC World Rugby Sevens Series eVancouver, eCanada, kule mpelasonto yize izinto zingahambi kahle kwiBlitzbokke. Kulokhu iqhathwe neChile (namuhla), Wales ne-United States of America (USA) kusasa.Namuhla:Hurricanes v Highlanders (Westpac Stadium, 8.35am); Rebels v Brumbies (AAMI Stadium, 10.45am).Kusasa:Crusaders v Chiefs (Ami Stadium, 6.15am); Blues v Sunwolves (North Habour Stadium, 8.35am); Waratahs v Reds (Sydney Cricket Ground, 10.45am); Lions v Jaguares (Emirates Airlines Park, 3.05pm); Bulls v Sharks (Loftus Vesveld, 5.15pm).
title: ISharks ifuna ukulungisa amaphutha

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Bheki Cele, uthi basezithendeni zazo zonke izigebengu ezibamba izimoto zemali ngoba bayazazi.Esithangamini nabezindaba eTembisa, eGoli, izolo, uCele uveze ukuthi zehle ngo-63%, izigameko zokubanjwa kwezimoto zemali kusukela ngenyanga kaJuni beqale umkhankaso wabo wokuqeda lobu bugebengu.“Zingu-42, izigebengu ezaziwayo ezibamba izimoto zemali kubalwa kuzo nongqondongqondo, uMnuz Mzumvukile “Bibi” Cenenda, esesizibophile kusukela ngoJuni,” kusho uCele.UBibi ubesefunwe iminyaka emibili ngamaphoyisa engamtholi njengoba eze ambamba ngasekupheleni kwenyanga edlule.Uthe zonke izigebengu ezibamba izimoto zemali bayazazi, wengeza ngokuthi bazozibamba khona maduze.“Lezi zigebengu zicabanga ukuthi asizazi kanti siyazazi. Siyazi futhi ukuthi inkunzi ibanjwa abantu ababodwa ezifundazweni ezihlukene,” kusho uCele.Uthe izigebengu zivikelwa umphakathi ongazibiki emaphoyiseni.“Manje sesizoshaqa wonke umuntu endlini esizomfica nesigebengu esisifunayo, njengoba sibophe nowesifazane eTshwane oneminyaka engu-67, obefukamele isigebengu esisifunayo. "Ukungambiki umuntu ogangayo kusho ukuthi uyahambisana nobugebengu abenzayo. Abanye abantu esizobabopha kakhulu izintombi zezigebengu,” kusho uCele.Uthe bayazi ukuthi izigebengu sezihlela ukuqinisa umkhankaso wazo eKZN, eLimpopo naseFree State.“Bhekani uBibi walapha eTembisa, simbambe esebhace eFree State. Kuyacaca ukuthi lo mkhuba wakhe ubesefuna ukuwuqhuba khona,” kusho uCele.Uthe bajabule ngempumelelo asebeyenzile ekulweni nokubanjwa kwezimoto zemali, wengeza ngokuthi eGauteng lobu bugebengu behle busuka ku-20%, baya ku-7%. “Kodwa impi asikayinqobi, usemkhulu umsebenzi okusamele siwenze,” kusho uCele.Uthe iGauteng isiphenduke inkundla yezigebengu ezibamba inkunzi izimoto zemali. “Lapha eGauteng silethe izimoto ezingu-50, ezisezingeni eliphezulu ukukhombisa ukuthi sizibophezele ekulweni nalobu bugebengu,” kusho uCele. Uthe ikhona impumelelo asebeyenzile nasekulweni nokudayiswa kwezidakamizwa njengoba behlakaze izidleke ezimbili obekukhiqizwa khona izidakamizwa. “Kulezi zidleke sithole nomshini okwazi ukwenza amaphilisi angu- 16, ngemizuzwana emibili,” kusho uCele.
title: Sebebophe-42 kwelezimoto zemali

text: OWAYENGUMVIKELI woMphakathi kuleli uSolwazi Thuli Madonsela usejoyine isibalo esikhulayo sezifundiswa nosopolitiki abachitha ukuhlaselwa kwabantu bokufika kuleli. UMadonsela ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nesiteshi sezindaba i-eNCA ngoLwesibili. UMadonsela uthe, kuningi okufanele kwenziwe ukulwa nesihlava sodlame olubhekiswe kubantu bokufika."Lokhu kuyimiphumela yokulwela ingqalasizinda eshodayo futhi kuyimiphumela yokuthi abantu babone ukuntenga kwengalo yomthetho. Ukuthi abantu bazithathele umthetho ezandleni kwenza isimo sibe sibi kakhulu," kusho uMadonsela.UMadonsela uphinde waveza ukuthi, ukubiza bonke abantu bokufika ngezigilamkhuba akulungile kanti futhi kulwa nomgomo wezwe wobuntu."Kuzoba khona isimo sokuziphindiselela ngoba akekho umuntu ozovumela kwenziwe okungalungile kuyena. Njengabantu baseNingizimu Afrika kufanele silwe nobugebengu obuqale lokhu. Lokhu futhi kuphinde kukhombe inkinga enkulu esibhekene nayo, siyivulile imincele kanti siyizwe elingenalo uhlelo lokuhlanganyela," kusho yena.Inkulumo kaMadonsela ihambe phezu kwamazwi omholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema naye ukugxekile ukuhlaselwa kwabantu bokufika ngesikhathi ekhuluma nesithangami sabezindaba ngoMsombuluko."Uma seniqedile ngabantu baseNigeria, Mozambique naseZimbabwe nizojikela amaShangane aseGiyani ngakho kufanele ngininqande manje. Kwenzeni konke lokhu enikwenzayo kodwa uma seniqedile nizojikelana nodwa ngoba bazobe bengasekho abantu bokufika enizobalwisa, kepha indlala izosala ikhona," kusho uMalema
title: UThuli Madonsela uhlaba ukuhlaselwa kwabokufika

text: BONISWA MOHALEABAHLELI bombukiso wamabhanoyi oba minyaka yonke bathi konke kumi ngomumo ngalo mcimbi okhombisa ikhono labashayeli bezindiza bakuleli.Lo mbukiso, i-Durban Airshow, uzoba se-Virginia Airport, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe nguMnuz Ray de Vries, obhekele ezokuxhumana kulo mbukiso, kulo nyaka kuzobe kukhona nebhanoyi le nkampani okuthiwa ishibhile i-1 time elizobe lintweza kulo mbukiso.Ngokusho kwalesi sitatimende sika-De Vries abantu baseThekwini bayalithanda leli bhanoyi eliyi-MD-87 ngoba liletha okuhlukile kulo mbukiso.Leli bhanoyi likhulu ukwedlula lawo amancane asuke entweza enza imidwebo ehlukahlukene.U-De Vries uye wathembisa abantu abazohambela lo mbukuso ukuthi bazohamba bengawuvali umlomo ngoba kukhona amadela kufa aphuma ezinkampanini ezehlukene.Uye wababula i-Egstra Flying Lions, ithimba lwakwaMazda Zoom Zoom, Red Bull Extra 330 nabanye.Uthe kuzobe kukhona amabhanoyi abizwa ngama-P 51 Mustangs, Hawker Fury ne-De Havilland Vampire.Amathikithi okubuka amabhanoyi e-Virginia abiza u-R100 awabantu abadala, kube u-R50 awezingane ezineminyaka eyisithupha kuya kwengu-13.Abantu abadala abahola impesheni bangena ngo-R50 nabakhubazekile bakhokha wona u-R50.Amathikithi atholakala e-Computicket.
title: Sekulunge konke ngombukiso wamabhanoyi: abahleli

text: MINENHLE MKHIZES EKUHLALE obala okwezinqe zeselesele ukuthi amanye amazwe awayingeni eyabadlali abanamagama kodwa abangawenzi umsebenzi ku-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ka-2013 eqhubeka kuleli.Isibindi esikhonjiswa ngabanye abaqeqeshi bamazwe okubalwa kuwona i-Ivory Coast, Nigeria, DRC Congo neZambia ku-Afcon sisidweba sicace isithombe sokuthi noma kungathiwa ungukaputeni kodwa uma ungawenzi umsebenzi ibhentshi lisuke likufanele ngoba iqembu yilona elimqoka.Selokhu kuqale lo mqhudelwano ukaputeni weNigeria, uJoseph Jobo, akakaze adlale ngisho umdlalo owodwa. Ubengekho ngesikhathi iNigeria idlala ngokulingana emdlalweni wokuqala neBurkina Faso, owesibili neZambia nowesithathu ne-Ethiopia. Kule midlalo ibhande belibanjwe nguVicent Enyemba.Kuphinde kwahlaluka ukuthi awukho umthetho othi ukaputeni kumele adlaliswe ngisho eboza ngesikhathi ama-Elephants eqala ngoDidier Drogba ebhentshini emdlalweni wesibili ne-Algeria. Nasemdlalweni wokuqala neTogo, uDrogba akazange awuqede ngoba engekho efomini okwenze wabekwa ebhentshini ngowesibili.IZambia ethuse abaningi ikhishwa ekuseni kulo mqhudelwano yenze okufanayo ishikishisa uChristopher Katongo ibhentshi emdlaweni weNigeria noweZambia ekubeni engukaputeni.Umqeqeshi weDemocratic Republic of Congo umshove ebhentshini uTresor Mputu obamba ibhade kuleli qembu.Umbuzo uthi yini ehlula umqeqeshi weBafana Bafana uGordon Igesund ukusika iphethini kula mazwe angasabi ukushova abadlali bayo abangokaputeni ebhentshini uma bengawenzi umsebenzi?Njengamanje abaningi bakhala Bongani Khumalo ongukaputeni weBafana ukuthi uyikhonco elibuthaka emuva kuleli qembu kodwa udlaliswa noma kunjalo.Abaningi bamfanisa no-Aaron “Mbazo” Mokoena obemanyanambana kubalandeli beBafana ngenxa yamaphutha akhe abedlisela iqembu.Kuyacaca ukuthi ukube uSiphiwe “Shabba” Tshabalala nguyena ukaputeni ngabe uyadlala yize ehlelwe yifomu.Inkakha yeBafana, uMark “The Nation-Builder” Williams ephawula ngodaba lukaKhumalo ikhale ngokungabi nabadlali abaningi abadlala emuva esikwatini sabadlali abangu-23 abaqokwe ngu-Igesund ukuthi bamele elakuleli ku-Afcon.“UBongani ngeke siphike ukuthi umsebenzi wakhe akawenzi ngendlela efanele kodwa uma ekhishwa sizofaka bani? UThabo Nthethe eqenjini lakhe (iBloemfontein Celtic) udlaliswa ngakwesokudla ngakho akuyona into elula ukuthi uvele umthathe umfake maphakathi ngoba ibhola lomhlaba lihlukile. Inkinga ebhekene no- Igesund wukuthi akanabo abadlali abaningi abadlala indawo kaKhumalo,” kusho le nkakha.UKhumalo uqokwe njengokaputeni ngemuva kokuthi uSteven Peinaar ememezele ukuthi usethi khumu ekudlaleleni iqembu lesizwe.“Isimo sethu esifani ne-Ivory Coast enabadlali abaningi abaseqophelweni eliphezulu. Kumele simeseke uKhumalo yize engawenzi ngendlela umsebenzi wakhe,” kusho uWilliams.Omunye umbuzo osalayo ngowokuthi kungani u-Igesund eshiye ngaphandle uBevan Fransman noSiyanda Xulu uma kukhalwa ngokuthi asinabao abadlali abangavala isikhala sikaKhumalo? UFransman usedlale phesheya, ku-Afcon ngo-2008 nakuKaizer Chiefs. Abanye abadlali abangadlala ngaphakathi uSiboniso Gaxa no-Anele Ngcongca.
title: Badlala ibhentshi okaputeni ku-Afcon

text: Mhleli: kwelakho ngithi ake ngilobe ngale mbedumehlwane ehlasele umhlaba wonke.Ngiyezwa amakholwa esethi yizinsuku zokugcina.Kuyacaca azisekho ezinye izinsuku, sesifike ekugcineni uJesu useyabuya.Ngabe ngiyezwa ukube amakholwa aguqa ngedolo akhuleke ngamandla anxuse uMdali ukuthi asisize sinqobe leli gciwane.Ngisadidekile namanje ukuthi iqhamuke kanjani iCorona, silokhu sizwa ukuthi iqale eChina.Kusobala uma selingene kahle lizoqala ngathi esisemakhaya ngoba impilo yakhona inzima asisebenzi, nensipho kunzima ukuyithola namanzi.Uma uhulumeni esekhombisa ukusukuma, ngiphoxeke kabi ngilalele Ukhozi FM, lapho uNdunankulu Sihle Zikalala nabahlaziyi bebezwakala bekhala ngomnotho nangezivakashi ukuthi ngeke beyivale imingcele ngoba kuzosho ukuthi izivakashi azisezungena kuleli kuyacaca yimali ebalulekile kunempilo yabantu.Ngaleso sikhathi wayeseyedwa umuntu oneCorona, ukube kwasheshe kwavalwa yonke imingcele mhlawumbe ngabe alisabalele kanjena.Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi onke amaqembu ezepolitiki namabandla ahlangane manje kuliwe neCorona.Nabefundisi abahlale bevela kwithelevishini benza imilingo sekuyisikhathi sayo-ke manje.Asibabone bethandazela abantu liphume libaleke igciwane noma basuke besikhohlisa?Kuyathusa ukuzwa usuku nosuku kunyuka isibalo sabahaqekile yiCorona. Uma uzizwa ukuthi uyakhwehlela kuhle uzihlalele kini, uyeke ukulokhu uzogibela nomphakathi etekisini noma ukhwehlela sivikele thina nabanye bakithi. Uyazi abantu ababambi ngisho umlomo uma bekhwehlela.Ngiyacela bantu bakithi silalele emisakazweni, sifunde nasemaphephandabeni nakwithelevishini ukuthi senzenjani ukuze lingasabalali leli gciwane.Uma singalaleli esikutshelwayo ukuze sizivikele sizoba senkingeni.Ngiyafisa kube nomgomo wokugwema ukutheleleka mhlawumbe kungaba ngcono uma singagoma.Ngabe esinjani esingagomeleki bakithi?Kazi ngempela adlani amaShayina le enzima kangaka.Emabhasini njengamaRea Vaya eGoli kugcwala kuze kungabi nandawo yokubeka unyawo nasezitimela, abanye baze belenge ngaphandle, kusobala uma oyedwa engahaqeka eSoweto kuyobe sekumoshakele.Sibonga imizamo kamengameli.Ake akhohlwe wumnotho sobuye siwubone silwe nokunqanda ukubhebhetheka kweCorona.Okubalulekile wukuphila kwabantu.Zikhona izigwili nabahola imali eningi kuhulumeni, kanjalo namabandla kufanele angenele anikele sekuyisikhathi sokulekelela imiphakathi.Thanda ChoncoKwesakwaMthethwa
title: Amabandla awalekelele kwiCoronavirus

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa uthe ukubuyiswa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo yinto ebucayi ezokwenzeka ngaphandle kokusabisa abatshalizimali nokuwisa umnotho wezwe.Izolo uRamaphosa ephendula umholi weDA , uMnuz Mmusi Maimane obekhala ngokuthi lolu daba luzosusa uthuthuva luxoshe nabatshalizimali.“Abantu abafuni wonke umhlaba okhona kodwa bacela ukunikwa ingxenye ethile njengoba babethenjisiwe ngo-1955 ukuthi umhlaba kuzoba ngowabo bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika. Ngeke kuthikamezeke umnotho uma kubuyiselwa umhlaba kubantu, wudaba olubucayi kabi lolu ngeke sixhamazele uma silusebenza,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uphinde waphonsela amalungu ePhalamende inselelo ngesikhathi ecela ukuthi lawo angafuni ukuthi umhlaba ubuyele kubantu abasukume, nalabo abangafuni ukuthi abantu bakhelwe izindlu mabasukume.Akuzange kusukume muntu.Utshele uMaimane ukuthi bazomeseka odabeni lokulwa nokucwaswa, wukungalingani nokubuyiswa komhlaba beyi-ANC.Bezikhona neziqubu zokuphazanyiswa kwePhalamende ngesikhathi uRamaphosa nePhini lomholi we-EFF uMnuz Floyd Shivambu bephikisana ngokuthi yi-ANC eyafika nombono wokuthi umhlaba mawubuyiselwe kubantu kodwa i-EFF isiyenza sengathi iyona eyeza nawo.URamaphosa uphinde wacela uSotswebhu weDA , uMnuz John Steenhuisen ukuthi akathule ngesikhathi efuna ukuphendula umbuzo kaMaimane ngodaba lweNational Minimum Wage.“Awuthule , ngiyakucela bandla uthule ulalele ngoba ngifuna ukuphendula umbuzo kaMaimane,” kusho uRamaphosa.USteenhuisen ukhale ngokuthi uRamaphosa akakhulumi ulimi lwasePhalamende uma ethi akathule.USihlalo uMnuz Cedric Frolick ucele ukuthi uRamaphosa ahoxise inkulumo yokuthi uSteenhuisen athule, nempela wahoxisa.Uthe uR3 500 awulona iholo elifanele abasebenzi kodwa kufanele kuqalwe kancane ngoba nakwamanye amazwe abale kuwo iBrazil liyasebenza.Uphinde waveza ukuthi akanankinga nokuthi kuvulwe iBhange loMbuso, elaselokishini elizoboleka imali abantu besifazane kuyekwe ukusetshenziswa amabhange amakhulu kuphela.
title: 'Ngeke sixhamazele ngolomhlaba'

text: ISABC ikhombe indlela abasebenzi abawu-13, okubalwa kubo nobeyisikhulu sezokuxhumana KwaZulu-Natal, ebisola ukuthi baqashwa ngendlela engafanele.Phambilini kwabikwa ukuthi laba basebenzi bathathwa “njengabantu bakaHlaudi Motsoeneng” owayeyisikhulu seSABC ngoba baqashwa kusaphethe yena.Kuthiwa abanye banyuselwa ezikhundleni ngendlela engafanele.Phakathi kwabo kukhona uLesego Kgwebane obengamele ezokuxhumana ehhovisi leSABC KwaZulu-Natal.Okhulumela iSABC, uMmoni Seapolelo, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi banikezwe izincwadi eziveza isinqumo senhlangano mayelana nezimo ezaholela ekutheni baqashwe ngendlela engafanele.“ISABC yaqala uphenyo olwaphela ngoJuni 2020 oluthinta abasebenzi abaqashwa, abakhushulelwa ezikhundleni noma abanyuselwa imiholo ngendlela engekho emthethweni. I-SABC ikholwa wukuthi bahlomula ngohlelo olwancisha abanye abasebenzi ithuba elifanayo lokuthi babange ukuqashwa noma ukunyuselwa ezikhundleni,” kusho uMmoni.Uthe ubuholi beSABC bunomsebenzi wokwenza izinto ngendlela efanele nokuthi bungagqugquzeli ukwenziwa kwezinto ezingavumelekile.
title: Bakhonjwe indlela abaqashwa kungafanele kwaSABC

text: UMNDENI kaSiyabonga Ndlovu (9), ominzile usufisa ukuthola ithambo lakhe ukuze uzokwazi ukumngcwaba.USiyabonga, waKwaDukuza, uminze ngoMgqibelo emfuleni uMvoti ekade ebhukuda nabangani bakhe, kuthiwa bebedlala umdlalo okuthiwa isitimela.Kusukela ngoMgqibelo kufunwa isidumbu sakhe, nayizolo ekuseni abatshuzi babheke baze bayeka bengakasitholi.Uninakhulu kaSiyabonga, uNkk Thandi Ndlovu, izolo ekhuluma neSolezwe uthe sebekhalela ukuba kutholwe isidumbu sakhe bakwazi ukungcwaba.“Ingane ilokhu ingene emanzini ngoMgqibelo, siyazi ukuthi ayisaphili manje, okubuhlungu wukuthi nesidumbu asikho. Kunzima ukwamukela okwenzekile. Abatshuzi sebehambile namhlanje (izolo), simile nje emfuleni asazi singenzani ukuze atholakale,” kusho uNkk Ndlovu.Uthe unina womfana uNksz Nomkhosi Ndlovu, ugcine indodana yakhe idlala ngaphandle.“USiyabonga uhambe nabangani bakhe baya emfuleni unina engazi. Kuthiwa bafike babhukuda nabanye kwabe sekudlalwa umdlalo okuthiwa isitimela. Kulowo mdlalo kuthiwa nibeka izandla phezu kophambi kwakho bese nibhukuda nihamba kanjalo sengathi isitimela. USiyabonga kuthiwa ucwilile emanzini okokuqala, bamkhipha, wacwila okwesibili, bamkhipha futhi. Okwesithathu kuthiwa ungene emanzini wangabe esaphuma,” kusho uNkk Ndlovu.Uthe abanye abantwana abebebhukuda naye bagijime bayobikela unina.“Kuyibanga elide ukusuka emfuleni uya lapho unina ehlala khona. Uthe esefika emfuleni ubengasabonakali. Nabatshuzi bathwele kanzima ngenxa yokugcwala komfula futhi naphansi kunesidaka, akubonakali,” kusho uNkk Ndlovu.USiyabonga ubephasele uGrade 6 eStanger Primary.Uthe amalungu omphakathi nawo ayafisa ukusiza kodwa awazi kumele kwenzeke njani.“Sifuna kutholakale ingane kuphela nje,” kuphetha uNkk Ndlovu.Abezimo eziphuthumayo i-IPSS Medical Rescue, amaphoyisa ophiko lwezinja nophiko lwabatshuzi, babiziwe endaweni yesigameko.Esitatimendeni esikwi-Facebookabe-IPSS bathe ngenxa yesimo sezulu esingesihle nokungaboni kahle emanzini kuphoqeukuba bakuhoxise ukuthungatha isidumbu kodwa basazoqhubeka babheke uma isimo siba ngcono.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe icala lokulahleka komuntu esiteshini saKwaDukuza, kulandela ukuminza komfana oneminyaka engu-9.Uthe uma sekutholakala isidumbu kuzobe sekuvulwa idokodo ngokushona komuntu.
title: Sebekhalela isidumbu sominze edlala isitimela

text: UNOBHALA jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Ace Magashule, uthe abantu bazovotela i-ANC uma kuwukuthi ayibalahli, babumbene bewubuholi futhi uKhongolose kawunamuntu okhethekile.Usho kanje i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal igubha iminyaka engu-108 yasungulwa, enkundleni Ugu Sports and Leisure Centre eGamalakhe, ePort Shepstone, izolo.UMagashule ugudle uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeziMali, uMnuz Tito Mboweni, ethi emlandweni we-ANC akekho umholi owake waphuma eceleni ngokudelela izinqumo zesigungu esilawula inhlangano nezengqungquthela.Kamuva uMboweni ugxeke kwiTwiter isiphakamiso sokufakwa kweBhange loMbuso ngaphansi kukahulumeni, okuyisinqumo esathathwa engqungqutheleni ye-ANC eNasrec, eGoli, ngo-2017.“I-ANC ayinaye umuntu othile okhethekile kepha ibusa ngokuhlanganyela. Uma i-ANC ithatha isinqumo, akukho mholi ozophuma eceleni akhulume uhlangothi lwakhe, athi ubuholi nengqungquthela akuphusile. Izinqumo zengqungquthela ziyasibophezela sonke.”Unxenxe intsha ukuba isebenze kanzima ivuselele i-ANC Youth League, kuvunyelwe abantu bajoyine inhlangano.Uthe akuqashelwe abantu abafaka isikibha sikaKhongolose esinobuso bukamengameli kodwa abakhuluma ulimi oluhlukile kolwenhlangano.USihlalo we-ANC esifundazweni, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala uthe umzabalazo wabo owokubuyisa amalungelo omuntu omnyama nomnotho uze ebantwini.Uthe lona wunyaka wokwakhiwa kabusha kwe-ANC, iqine ibe nobunye, ilwe nobandlululo.“Kumele siqhubekele phambili nomzabalazo wokubuyiselwa komnotho ebantwini. Kumele sakhe ubumbano kumadlelandawonye. Njengoba sasishilo ezethembisweni zokhetho, sizoqhubeka nokusebenzela abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokuthembeka nangokuzimisela. Ezinyangeni eziyisikhombosa ezedlule sisebenze kanzima ukwakha uhulumeni ohlinzeka abantu ngentuthuko. Siyaqhubeka nokwakha amathuba emisebenzi, silwe nobuphofu. Sithuthukisa ezemfundo njengoba zitholakala mahhala uze uthole iziqu,“ kusho uZikalala.Uthe enye yezinselelo ababhekene nayo eyokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu njengoba kufe izinkomo ezingaphezu kuka-17 000 eKZN ngenxa yesomiso“Ngonyaka owedlule kube nezikhukhula ezidlule nemiphefumulo yabantu. Sigqugquzele uhulumeni uma eqwashisa abantu ukuthi bayeke ukwakha ezindaweni eziyingozi. Sinohlelo lokuhanjiswa kwamanzi emiphakathini. Nakwezingenabo ompompi sowaletha ngamaloli,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe kumele balwe nobugebengu emalokishini.
