Ubalule ukuthi ubugebengu buphezulu, abantu bayakhuthuzwa, abesifazane bayadlwengulwe babulawe.“Izinkampani zikahulumeni aziphathwe ngendlela. Uhulumeni akaqinisekise ukuthi uyayigcina i-Eskom, SAA nezinye Izinkampani,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe ababona abangani nomengameli wase-USA, uMnuz Donald Trump, ambize ngongxiwa ophehla impi. Impunyela, uMnuz Patrice Motsepe, isanda kutshela uTrump ukuthi i-Afrika iyamthanda.
title: UMagashule ukhuza abaholi abaphikisa izinqumo ze-ANC

text: AMAQEMBU aphikisayo athi adumele ukuthi uhulumeni uphinde wabeka eceleni izigidi zamaRandi, ukuze kutakulwe izinkampani zikahulumeni ezikhungethwe izinkinga, okuyiSAA ne-Eskom.Ephendula inkulumo yesabelo sezimali eyethulwe wuNgqongqoshe weZimali wuMnuz Tito Mboweni izolo ePhalamende, amaqembu aphikisayo athe kufana nokuthi lezi zimali ziphonswa emfuleni.Okhulumela i-IFP, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uthe uhulumeni kufanele engabe ugxila ekulungiseni izinkinga zokuphathwa kwalezi zinkampani kunokufaka enye imali.“Esikhundleni sokulungisa izinkinga ezikhungethe lezi zinkampani, uhulumeni ulokhu eqhubeka nokuphonsa izimali. Kufana nokuthi le mali iyalahlwa ngoba zizolokhu ziqhubekile izinkinga.”Okhulumela iDA kwezezimali, uMnuz Geordin Hill-Lewis, uthe okubuhlungu ngale mali okuzotakulwa ngayo izinkampani wukuthi ithathwe emalini okufanele ngabe kukhushulwe ngayo izibonelelo zikahulumeni.“Okokuqala ukuba sibone izibonelelo zikahulumeni zikhushulwa ngemali encane kanje. Kungokokuqala emlandweni ukuba sibone kunciphiswa imali yezibonelelo njengoba kulo nyaka izoncipha ngoR5.8 billion. Kahle kahle lesi sabelo sezimali ngesosizi. Labo abahola izibonelelo zikahulumeni bazosala bezibuza ukuthi boneni kangaka kuhulumeni emuva kokuzwa ngalesi sabelo sezimali.”UHill-Lewis uthe abazi kungani eMboweni ekhethe ukungakhulumi ngalezi zimali ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yakhe, yize zikhona kwisabelo sezimali.Lawa maqembu athe inkulumo kaMboweni kayilibuyisanga ithemba.Ilungu le-EFF, uDkt Mbuyiseni Ndlozi, lithe lesi sabelo sezimali ngeke sikwazi ukushintsha isimo somnotho sakuleli.UMnuz Nqabayomzi Kwankwa we-UDM, uthe inkulumo kaMboweni kayishongo lutho oluphathekayo mayelana nokuvuselelwa komnotho namathuba omsebenzi.Umholi weFF Plus, uDkt "Pieter" Groenewald, uthe bakhathazekile ngesikweletu sikahulumeni esiphezulu kakhulu.“Kahle kahle uhulumeni ukuba uyinkampani ngabe kade ahlakazwa.”Umgcinimafa jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Paul Mashatile, uthe bajabule ukuthi uhulumeni ubeke eceleni uR10 billion ukuba kubhekwane nokuthengwa komgomo wegciwane iCorona.UMashatile uthe bazoyigada ngeso lokhozi le mali, ukuze benze isiqiniseko sokuthi kayibhubhudlwa.Isazi sezomnotho, uNksz Tendai Mantshimuli, sithe ukuthengwa komgomo kuzosiza ekutheni kuvulwe nezinye izingxenye zomnotho ezisebenza ngaphansi kwemibandela eqinile yomvalelandlini.“Umgomo uzosiza ekutheni kuvulwe ezinye izingxenye zomnotho.”Ephendula abezindaba, uMboweni uthe ayikho imali ayifake kwiSAA kulesi sabelo.Uthe izimpesheni akazange azinciphise kodwa zinyukile.
title: Bakhale ngezigidi zokutakula izinkampani zikahulumeni

text: BAKHALA ngomfundisi oyisihlabani somculo wokholo, abamsola ngokubaleka nezimali zabo ngemuva kokuvalwa kwehhovisi likamasingcwabisane wakhe.Amalungu kamasingcwabisane okuthiwa okaMfundisi Andile KaMajola, iZesuliwe Dignified Funerals, eMgungundlovu, athi ajoyine lo masingcwabisane ezinyangeni ezine ezedlule, ehehwa ukuthi ungowendoda eyaziwayo, elaziyo izwi le Nkosi.Lo masingcwabisane kuthiwa unamalungu alinganiselwa ku-150 abekhokha imali esukela kuR45 kuya kuR470 umuntu emunye.Kuthiwa lo masingcwabisane ububiza kahle, uthembise uhide lwezinto okubalwa ngisho nomphathi wohlelo nabazocula emngcwabeni.Bathi baphoxekile sebethi bayokhokha izimali zabo abazisebenza kanzima ekuqaleni kwesonto, bafica kulenga ingidi.Kuthiwa ihhovisi livalwa nje, lo masingcwabisane ubungakangcwabeli muntu njengoba bebesanda kuhlanganisa izinyanga ezintathu abekade bebekelwe zona.Elinye ilungu, uMnuz Phumlani Zuma (31) laseSweetwaters, eMgungundlovu, lithe lithole ukuthi amahhovisi avalwe umasitende ngoba sekuphele izinyanga ezintathu uKaMajola engayikhokhi irenti.“Sidumele ngoba besimthembile * -Andile KaMajola. Besithi ngoba umuntu odumile futhi ongumfundisi ngeke asenzele phansi. Ngijoyine ngoJuni, bengikhokha uR120. Ngimfonele ngoLwesine ngoba ngifica kuvaliwe ehhovisi lakhe. Uthe usanezinkinga asazilungisa uzovula maduze,” kusho uZuma.Uthe kuyomsiza * -Andile ukuthi ababuyisele izimali zabo uma esehlulwa yibhizinisi.Uveze ukuthi yena usebenzela inkampani yabameli ngakho * -Andile ngeke aphunyuke.Owesifazane ocele ukungadalulwa naye oyilungu, uthe * -Andile umtshele ukuthi ihhovisi livaliwe ngoba intombazane esebenza khona iyagula.“Sengiqala ukuba novalo ngemali yami. Nginezinyanga ezine ngijoyinile, bengikhokha uR340. Ngashiya umasingcwabisane wami weminyaka ngajoyina lo ngoba ngibona ukuthi ngowomuntu othembekile, ongumfundisi. Wathi unamanye amagatsha eThekwini nasePinetown,” kusho lo wesifazane.Uqhube wathi ubechazwa ukuthi * -Andile ubetholakala kalula ocingweni, babuye bamfice nasehhovisi.Omunye wabasebenzi ocele ukungadalulwa uthe * -Andile wagcina ebaholele imali yenyanga eyodwa njengoba beqale ukusebenza ngoJulayi.“Ngize ngayeka emsebenzini ngoba sengikhathele ukuxhashazwa uyena. Ngezinye izinyanga ubelokhu enginika uR500 ethi imali yokugibela. Ubethi ibhizinisi lihamba kancane. Ubehlale ecasha uma efikile, ebalekela abantu abakweletayo. Kukhona amadoda afika athi afuna imali yawo, avula ngayo umasingcwabisane,” kusho lo wesifazane.U-Andile uthe akusiwo owakhe lo masingcwabisane naye uqashiwe kuwona.“Ngiyinxusa nje kuphela. Ngibuye ngilekelele ebhizinisini ngokucelwa abaphathi. Abantu bathi owami ngoba ngiwubuso bawo. Angikwazi okokuvalwa kwamahhovisi, ngazi ukuthi ayasebenza,” kusho * -Andile.Yize * -Andile ethi uyinxusa, omunye wabasebenzi uthe ngesikhathi livulwa ihhovisi, * -Andile wazethula njengomnikazi wenkampani.
title: UKaMajola usolwa ngokubaleka nemali

text: UCHAZWE njengomuntu obenamancoko nobekukhonzile ukufundisa ungoti (65) wesiZulu oshone ngeledlule.UDkt Khenani Makhoba waseMlaza obefundisa isiZulu e-University of Zululand (oNgoye) uchazwe njengomuntu obekukhonzile ukuhlekisa noma wubani abehlangana naye. Ubekhonze nokufundisa, ubeze afundise nabafundisi enkonzweni.Lokhu kuvele enkonzweni yakhe yesikhumbuzo ebisesontweni i-United Congregational Church of Southern Africa (UCCSA), eMbumbulu, izolo.UDkt Makhoba obenengosi abeyibhala kwiSolezwe ethi Inkundla Yokucobelelana Nobugugu ushone ngokuzuma ngesonto eledlule emuva kokuthweswa iziqu zobuDokotela olimini lwesiZulu.UMengameli Sibusiso Shezi webandla iJerusalem Christian Church (JCC) uthe uMakhoba ubekukhonze kakhulu ukufundisa kangangokuthi waze wagcotshwa ukuthi afundise abefundisi bebandla ayekhonza kulo ngaphambi kokuthi abe yilungu le-UCCSA.“Ubengumuntu obenobuholi futhi ekwazi ukukhuthaza abantu. Ubekwazi ukukhuthaza abefundisi abasanda kuqala ezikhundleni. Size samgcoba ukuthi abafundise,” kusho uShezi.Izihlobo zakhe nalabo abesebenzisana naye bathe balahlekelwe kakhulu ngokudlula kwakhe emhlabeni.UMnuz Mziwenkani Mshengu, we-Oxford University Press (OUP) uthe uMakhoba ngomunye wababhali abaphakamise igama le-OUP. Enye yezincwadi azibhalile zikhishwe yi-OUP. Incwadi Uju Lwezizukulwane ifundwa ezikoleni ka-matric futhi ayinayo incwadi eyibangisayo.Uthe balahlekelwe kakhulu ngoba uMakhoba ushone kunomunye futhi umbhali oshone ngesikhathi esifanayo, okulindeleke ukuthi naye afihlwe ngoMgqibelo.Umndeni kaMakhoba uthole ngoLwesithathu oludlule ngokushona kwakhe emqashweni oseduze kwenyuvesi.Uzofihlwa ngoMgqibelo. Inkonzo yakhe yomngcwabo izoba e-UCCSA Esangweni leZulu, Kwa-AA eMlaza ngehora lesishiyagalolunye ekuseni.
title: UMakhoba uchazwe ngokuba namancoko

text:
UNGQONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, usegcine ephawulile odabeni lokungatholwa kombulali walowo owayengumdlali weBafana Bafana ne-Orlando Pirates, uSenzo Meyiwa. Lolu daba lusematheni kulezi zinsuku ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba kukhona osanda kuphakamisa imibuzo ngalabo abebekhona ngesikhathi kubulawa lo mdlali. Ngempelasonto, ikhasi leTwitter elisebenzisa igama lowayengummeli womsubathi u-Oscar Pistorius, u-Adv Barry Roux (@AdvBarryRoux), lishicilele imininingwane ‘ngokwenzeka’ ngosuku okwabulawa ngalo uSenzo Meyiwa.FUNDA: Uyise kaSenzo Meyiwa ujabule ngokuvele ezinkundleni zokuxhumanaKuleli khasi kwadalulwa ukuthi umbulali kaSenzo ungomunye wabantu ababekhona kubo kanina wengane yakhe, uKelly Khumalo, eVosloorus, eGoli ngo-Okthoba 26, 2014.Njengoba uMbalula engomunye wabaholi abakuhulumeni abasebenzisa izinkundla zokuxhumana cishe zinsuku zonke, bekulindeleke ukuthi aphawule ngokushesha kulolu daba. NgoLwesithathu ekuseni ugcine ebhale ukuthi abanolwazi ngokubulawa kukaMeyiwa kumele baxhumane namaphoyisa noma uMnyango wamaPhoyisa. "Sisebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuthola ababulala uSenzo, uma ekhona onolwazi sicela axhumane namaphoyisa, noMnyango wamaPhoyisa nangoma iyiphi indlela," kubhala uMbalula kutwitter. We are working very hard to find Senzos Killers if anyone has into please approach saps and ministry by all means necessary. 
#SenzoMeyiwa— Min of Police: Mr Fearfokkol (@MbalulaFikile) 
February 7, 2018Lo mbhalo kaMbalula awehlanga kahle kubalandeli bekhasi lakhe njengoba abaningi bemsole ngokuphendula abantu bakuleli opopayi. Usenza upopayi bakhe nx😡.— A¥ANDA (@MA94AYA) 
February 7, 2018Call everyone who was in the house stop looking away from those who were on the house, uyadlala wena— The Benzo🇿🇦 (@ThokozaniToni) 
February 7, 2018Ephulwa ngokuvela ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngokudlula kwendodana yakhe uMnuz Sam Meyiwa uthe ujabule kakhulu futhi uyethemba lokhu kuzohelela ekutheni aboshwe maduze umsolwa.
title: 'Sisebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuthola ababulala uSenzo' - Mbalula

text: INYUNYANA yothisha iNatu isabisa ngokungena emgwaqweni uma kuwukuthi uMnyango wezeMfundo eyisiSekelo KwaZulu-Natal awuwanyusi amaholo othisha bakwaGrade R.Encwadini iNatu eyayikade iyibhalele umnyango ngesonto eledlule, yayikade iwubekele umnqamulajuqu wamahora awu-48 ukuba unyuse amaholo kungenjalo izoteleka.UNobhala-jikelele weNatu, uNksz Cynthia Barnes, uthe umnyango ufuna ukuluswa njengengane encane kwabavumelana ngakho mayelana nodaba lokunyuswa kwamaholo othisha.Njengamanje othisha bakaGrade R bahola uR7 500 kodwa iNatu ithi kukhona abahola imali engaphansi kwalokho.“Umnyango usifaka umunwe esweni ufuna ukusibona ukuthi sizokwenzani ngoba ungafuni ukunyusa amaholo othisha bakwaGrade R. Labo thisha yibona okumele ngabe bahola kakhulu ngoba bavula ingqondo yengane, bayifundise ukubhala nezinto eziningi,” kusho uNksz Barnes.Uthe iKwaZulu-Natal isilele emuva ekunyusweni kwamaholo othisha.“Lolu daba saqala ukulukhuluma kusekhona ungqongqoshe odlule (uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane) naye owathembisa washiya kanjalo. Ungqongqoshe omusha simchazelile konke samtshela nokuthi somnika isikhathi sokuqedela okwase kuvunyelwene ngako kodwa sibona kwayena ezithela ngabandayo,” kusho uNksz Barnes.Uthe njengamanje wonke amehlo abheke ezivivinyweni zika-matric ezibhalwayo.“Ukube kwakungewona umsebenzi wothisha bakwaGrade R mhlawumbe ngabe asinawo kwalowo matric. Umnyango awufuni ukufeza izethembiso ozenzayo kepha ufuna ukuluswa ngaso sonke isikhathi,” kusho uNksz Barnes.UBarnes akalubekanga usuku abazongena ngalo emgwaqweni kodwa uthe basazobonisana ukuthi bateleka nina.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe ziyaqhubeka izingxoxo phakathi kukaNgqongqoshe, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, nobuholi beNatu.Uthe akulona iqiniso ukuthi umnyango awuxoxi neNatu ngalolu daba.“Ungqongqoshe siqu sakhe usehlangane kaningi nobuholi beNatu ukuthola isisombululo. Sizoqhubeka nokuxoxa neNatu,” kusho uMahlambi.
title: ‘Sizoteleka uma engakhushulwa amaholo’

text: UNCOMA isibindi sikaBenni McCarthy sokungasabi ukuziphonsela inselelo, uMabhudi Khenyeza osedlale iminyaka ewu-18 ebholeni elikhokhelayo kuleli.UKhenyeza uthe kwesinye isikhathi izinkakha zaseNingizimu Afrika zivukwa yitwetwe zisabe ukuzifaka ingcindezi, nokuyinto athe kufanele iphele ukuze ibhola lizoqhubeka liye phambili.UMcCarthy usanda kushiya njengomdlali ngo-2013. Iqembu agcine ukulidlalela yi-Orlando Pirates. UMcCarthy ube esezihlupha ngezifundo zokuqeqesha, njengoba manje kungunyaka wesithathu engumqeqeshi.Kule minyaka emithathu eqeqesha, uMcCarthy sekukhona akukhombayo njengoba enqobe isicoco seMTN 8 neCape Town City ngenyanga edlule. UKhenyeza, osanda kutshela leli phephandaba ngothando lwakhe lokuqeqesha, uthe okwenziwa uMcCarthy kuhle kakhulu futhi uyisibonelo esihle kubaqeqeshi abancane.“Kuyinto enhle ukuthi uMcCarthy akwazi ukunqoba isicoco esisodwa njengomdlali, wasinqoba futhi esengumqeqeshi. Kuyinto ezishayayo kakhulu izinkakha ukuba nesibindi nomgogodla wokumela into oyiqalile. UMcCarthy uyafakazisa ukuthi uma into ukholelwa ekutheni ungayenza, iyenzeka ngempela,” kusho uKhenyeza.Phakathi kwamaqembu uKhenyeza asedlale kuwona iLamontville Golden Arrows, Kaizer Chiefs, Mamelodi Sundowns, Ajax Cape Town neMpumalanga Black Aces. UKhenyeza akakufihli ukuthi uma egaxa amakhokho emgibeni ufuna ukuqeqesha. Utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi angaqeqesha noma ngubani, noma kusiphi isigaba. Unezezele ngokuthi uyazihlupha ngokufunda izindlela zesimanjemanje zokudlala unobhutshuzwayo, nathe uzithatha e-Europe.UKhenyeza ungomunye wabadlali abambalwa kuleli oshaye amagoli awu-100. Njengomakadebona, uthe ukuphucwa koSuthu amaphuzu ayisithupha iFifa, ngeke nakancane kuwuphazamise umgqigqo weqembu.“Akuyona into esiphazamisile indaba yokuphucwa amaphuzu. Ngibona ukuthi kunalokho isakhe isibindi, nokuthi sinezezele kakhulu ekudlaleni kunakuqala. Siyazi futhi ukuthi indaba yamaphuzu incikene kakhulu nehhovisi laMaZulu, thina okwethu ukudlala enkundleni,” usho kanje uKhenyeza.
title: Akawuvali umlomoowoSuthu ngoMcCarthy

text: ITHI yayingeke imbulale uSenzo Meyiwa indodana kaChicco Twala, uLongwe, okusabalele umbhalo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana obukhomba yona ngenjumbane ngokufa kwalo nozinti weBafana Bafana ne-Orlando.ULongwe uveze lokhu izolo ngesikhathi ekhuluma emsakazweni iMetro FM ohlelweni lwantambama lukaMo Flava noMasechaba. Ubizelwe emsakazweni ngemuva kwezinsolo ezisabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ezikhomba yena ngokudubula nokubulala uMeyiwa.Ngesikhathi echaza ngokwenzeka kubulawa uMeyiwa eVosloorus, eGoli, ngo-Okthoba 26, 2014, uLongwe uthe wayengeke abulale uSenzo ngoba ungumlandeli we-Orlando Pirates.Uthe ngalolu suku bahlaselwa amadoda amabili ayebafuna imali namaselula.“Ngaba yigwala kunabo bonke ngoba ngabaleka kuqala. Ngaba owokuqala ukuzama ukuvikela ababesendlini, ngabona ukuthi oyedwa wabo uphethe isibhamu, ngabaleka. Ngizovuma nje ukuthi ngaba yigwala ngalolo suku ngoba ngaphuma kuqala endlini,” usho kanje.ULongwe uphekwe ngemibuzo kulesi siteshi nje ngoLwesithathu uChicco naye ubevutha ephika izinsolo zokuthi uSenzo wadutshulwa ngesibhamu sakhe. Ekhuluma kulesi siteshi uChicco uthe ukube uSenzo wabulawa yindodana yakhe wayezoqinisekisa ukuthi iyaboshwa.Uqhube waveza nokuthi uma kungathiwa uLongwe owadubula wabulala uSenzo, mhlawumbe wakwenza ngesibhamu somunye umuntu, hhayi esakhe ngoba wayengekho yena futhi nesibhamu sakhe sasingekho endaweni yesigameko.
title: Indodana kaChicco igonyuluka ngokubulawa kukaSenzo

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa uchaze obengumengameli waseTanzania uMnuz John Magufuli, njengendoda elisebenzele kakhulu izwe layo.URamaphosa ubekhuluma enkonzweni yomngcwabo kaMagufuli eJamhuri Stadium eDodoma eTanzania izolo.UMagufuli ushone ngeledlule, kuthiwa uhlaselwe isifo senhliziyo.Kumanje uNkk Samia Suluhu Hassan, osenguMengameli ubeyiPhini likaMagufuli.URamaphosa uthe elakuleli liyaziqhenya ngamagalelo kaMagufuli (61).“Silahlekelwe umengameli obeziqhenya ngokuba owase-Afrika. Ngiyakhumbula sixoxa naye esemcimbini wokugcotshwa kwami, saxoxa ngombono anawo ngeTanzania, efuna inqubekela phambili ngayo. Ngazizwa ngithobekile ngoba waya kwamanye amazwe. Wayejwayele ukuzihlalela kuleli zwe (eTanzania). Ngangizitshela ukuthi ingoba usaba ukundiza ngebhanoyi, kodwa wangitshela ukuthi yena uthanda ukuzihlalela ezweni lakhe asebenzele izwe nabantu kunokuthi  elokhu ehamba. Ngabona nami ukuthi impela wayekhetha ukuzihlalela ezweni lakubo ukuze asebenzele abantu njengoba kukuningi akwenzele izwe,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe: “ITanzania yasilekelela kakhulu sibhekene nohulumeni wobandlululo. Njengoba saba isizwe sokugcina ukuthola inkululeko, isizwe saseTanzania sasiza kakhulu iNingizimu Afrika, lasihlanganisa namanye amazwe.”Ephetha umbonge ngezinto ezintathu.“Waba ngomunye umuntu owalwa nenkohlakalo, waba ngomunye wabaholi base-Afrika owayekholwa ukuthi abaholi kumele besebenzele abantu, bangazenzeli bona. Ngifisa nokumbonga ngokugxila ekukhulisweni komnotho kuleli zwe nase-Afrika yonkana.”
title: Uncome obengumengameli waseTanzania ngobuqotho

text: BANGU-3.8 million abantu bakuleli abahlala babukela izindaba zolimi lwesiXhosa ezazifundwa okokugcina uNoxolo Grootboom, emasontweni adlule.Lokhu kuvele ezibalweni zikaMashi ezikhishwa iThe Broadcasting Research Council of South Africa.Ukufunda izindaba kukaNoxolo kwaba undabamlonyeni kwabaningi njengoba iSABC1 yagqugquzela abantu ukuthi babukele le ntatheli okokugcina njengoba isithathe umhlalaphansi. UNoxolo wayeseneminyaka engu-37 esethimbeni lezindaba kwaSABC.KwiDStv uhlelo olukhombisa abesifazane abagane indoda eyodwa abangafunani kuMoja Love i-1st wife vs 2nd wife olwethulwa uPastor I Makamu, lusezinhlelweni ezenze kahle kulesi siteshi.Lolu hlelo luqale ngengiya eliphezulu ngenyanga edlule njengoba lunababukeli abangu-807 595. Kusona lesi siteshi ezinye izinhlelo zakhona ezihamba phambili kubalwa oluthi Rea Tsotella, Lekunutu, Uyaphuza nezinye.KuMzansi Magic akukho okuhlukile khona njengoba umdlalo iGomora ulokhu uyibambile indawo yokuqala ngababukeli abangu-1 225 254.IThe Queen iyalandela ngababukeli abangu-1 145 816.Umdlalo Ehostela nohlelo oluthi Mnakwethu: Happy Ever After zenze kangcono njengoba zibalwa neziyishumi ezihambe phambili kulesi siteshi.Uhlelo oluthi Mzali Wami nohlelo oluthi Abandoned  obelwethulwa uPhumeza Mdabe nolukhombisa ngomndeni wakaRanaka, iThe Ranakas zikwezingenzanga kahle uma kuza kubabukeli. Kwi-e.tv umdlalo iDurban Gen kubukeka uza kahle njengoba manje uhleli endaweni yesihlanu ngababukeli abangu-2 441 636.KuSABC2 umdlalo iMuvhango usukile endaweni yokuqala esithathwe izindaba zesiBhunu, wahlala endaweni yesibili ngababukeli abangu-4 275 012.Kule nyanga ziningi izinhlelo eziqalile eziteshini ezehlukene kuleli okulindekele ukuthi kubonakale ukuthi zenza kanjani kubabukeli uma kuphela le nyanga.
title: Zihamba zodwa izinhlelo zeMoja Love kuDStv

text:
MLUNGISI GUMEDEU ZIBONA ebhekene nenselelo enzima uNobhala omusha we-Cosatu KwaZulu-Natal ongene endaweni kaMnuz Zet Luzipho.Engxoxweni ekhethekile ne
Solezwe izolo, uMnuz Edwin Mkhize (41) osanda kukhethwa njengoNobhala omusha we-Cosatu esifundazweni, uthe uyazi ukuthi kulindelwe lukhulu kuyena njengoba engena esikhundleni somholi obesezakhele igama futhi esebenza ngokukhulu ukuzikhandla.UMkhize owazalelwa eMzumbe kodwa manje osehlala KwaNdengezi, uthe unethemba lokuthi amava anawo acele eminyakeni engamashumi amabili azomsiza kakhulu ekwenzeni umsebenzi wakhe ngempumelelo.Lo mholi oneDiploma kwi-Labour Economics, ne-Political Studies ne-degree kwi-Bachelor of Social Science usebenze njenge-shop stewart iminyaka engaphezu kuka-15, waphinde waba yiPhini likaSihlalo we-Samwu esifundazweni amahlandla amabili, ngaphandle kwalezi zikhundla uke waba futhi nguNobhala we-Cosatu ePinetown iminyaka emihlanu.Uyivumile inselelo abhekene nayo.“Izinyunyana ezingaphansi kwe-Cosatu yizona ezingiphakamisile, kusho ukuthi kukhona ezikubonile kimina zabe seziyangithemba zingifaka kulesi sikhundla,” usho kanje.Uthe wonke umholi unendlela ahola ngayo abantu, wengeza ngokuthi okunye okubuye kusize ukuthi kusetshenzwa ngokubambisana.“UMnuz Luzipho naye ubengasebenzi yedwa kodwa bekukhona ithimba akade ebambisene nalo kodwa njengoNobhala bekuba nguyena owenza izitatimende waze wagcina esengubuso be-Cosatu KwaZulu-Natal,” usho kanje.UMkhize uthe akafuni ukuthi abantu babuke yena bese bemqhathanisa nomunye umuntu.“Ngizimisele ngokusebenza kanzima futhi ngibambisane nobuholi ukuze sikwazi ukuqhuba izinhlelo zomfelandawonye wezinyunyana,” usho kanje.I-Cosatu KwaZulu-Natal ibe nengqungquthela eyisipesheli ukuze ikhethe uNobhala omusha ngemuva kokuhamba kukaLuzipho manje esezoba nguSihlalo wekomiti lezokuMbiwa phansi nezaMandla kuzwelonke.UMkhize uthe bayambongela uLuzipho ngokuqokelwa kulesi sikhundla esisha, wengeza ngokuthi lokho kukhombisa ukuthi uyakhula emsebenzini wakhe.“Sifuna futhi ukumbonga uhulumeni oholwa yi-ANC oqaphele ithalente kuLuzipho wabe usumnika umsebenzi esingangabazi ukuthi uzowenza ngenkulu impumelelo,” usho kanje.Uthe bazibophezele ekutheni balwele izimfuno zabasebenzi baphinde benze isiqiniseko sokuthi baqinisa zonke izinhlaka zezinyunyana ezingaphansi komfelandawonye wabo.
title: UMkhize uyayivuma inselelo kuCosatu

text: IMIZAMO yokuthi kube khona uBabes Wodumo emcimbini wokuqala, iGqom in Concert ozoba senxanxatheleni yezitolo iPavillion, eThekwini, ngo-Ephreli 21, seyifana nokuthela amanzi emhlane wedada.Ngemuva kokukhishwa kwesikhangiso somcimbi, abantu abaningi bakhala ekhasini likaDJ Tira ongumhleli womcimbi befuna afake uBabes Wodumo njengoba engomunye wabagqamisa kakhulu lolu hlobo lomculo. UTira usamile ekutheni lo mculi ubiza imali abangeke bakwazi ukuyikhokha njengabahleli.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uTira izolo uthe, kuze kube yimanje beyingakalungi indaba yokuthi uBabes abe semcimbini.“Uma kuphela leli sonto ingalungile kusho ukuthi ngeke isalunga. Okwamanje inkulumo ayihlangani,” kusho uTira.Okhulumela uBabes, uHlengiwe Mbambo, uthe bebethanda ukuthi uBabes aye emcimbini.“UBabes nethimba lakhe ngebhadi bazobe bematasa ngaleyo mpelasonto. Saqinisekisa kwabanye abahleli bemicimbi ngesikhathi besiqasha ukuthi sizoba khona emcimbini yabo, abukho ubutha,” kusho uHlengiwe.Uthe ithimba laseWest Ink lifisela uTira impumelelo futhi liyathemba ukuthi bazoba khona emcimbini wangonyaka ozayo. UTira akazange ayiphathe eyokuthi akazange amthole ngoba uqashwe kwenye indawo uBabes. UHlengiwe uthe ugxile kwezokuxhumana kuphela kwiWest Ink. Ebuzwa ukuthi uBabes ubiza malini uma umqasha, uthe kuncika ohlotsheni lomcimbi omqashela lona. “Ayifani ngokwamazinga, kukhona emikhulu nemincane, nenani lakhe lihambisana nalokho,” kuchaza uHlengiwe.Kulo mcimbi kuzobe kunandisa iDistruction Boyz, Busiswa, Kwesta, Tipcee, DJ Sox, Okmalumkoolkat, Dladla Mshunqisi, Black Motion nabanye.Amathikithi omcimbi atholakala eComputicket ngoR200 kanti iVIP nguR450.“Siyakholwa wukuthi ithimba esinalo lizowenza umsebenzi futhi yingakho siqhubekile sawethula umcimbi (ngaphandle kukaBabes). Umcimbi futhi uzoshisa,” kusho uTira.Khonamanjalo, ngoLwesithathu nangoLwesine ngesonto elizayo kuzoba nengqungquthela yokucobelelana ngolwazi kwezomculo, iGqom Music Conference. Ingqungquthela ihlelwe yiDurban’s Finest, uTira noDJ Sox.Ingqungquthela izobe iseMoses Mabhida Stadium ngo-8 ekuseni kuze kube wu-4 ntambama. Kungenwa mahhala.Esitatimendeni kuvele ukuthi kuzobe kukhulunywa ngokudidiyela, ukusabalalisa umculo, ukunandisa nokunye.Izikhulumi zihlanganisa iDurban’s Finest, Rude Boyz, Distruction Boyz, DJ Lag, Zakes Bantwini nabanye.
title: Akucaci ngoBabes kokaTira

text: Mhlengi ShangaseUMshengu uthe isivumelwano esikhona nezinyunyana zothisha, sithi othisha abafaka izicelo zokuthi basebenzele emakhaya ngenxa yokuthi basengozini yokuhaqwa yiCorona, siphela esigabeni sesibili somvalelandlini.UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa umemezele ukuthi izwe lizokwehlela esigabeni sokuqala, lisuka kwesesibili ngeSonto ngo-12 ebusuku.“Njengoba singena esigabeni sokuqala silindele bonke othisha ukuthi babuyele ezikoleni. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ngeke kusaba nokushoda kothisha ngoba bonke bazobuya,” kusho uMshengu ekhuluma namalungu esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe izolo ngesabelo sezimali esibuyekeziwe.Lo mnyango wabelwa uR57.2 billion.Uveze ukuthi bathola izicelo ezingu-5 970 zababefuna ukusebenzela emakhaya kanti kwaqokwa othisha abazobamba abangu-2 015 ukuvala izikhala zothisha okwaphasa izicelo zabo.UMshengu uthe kwaqokwa abazohlanza ezikole ezingu-3 877, ezazingenabo abahlanzayo abaqashwe ngumnyango kanjalo nabangu-6 000 abazohlola izinga lokushisa labafundi.“Izinkontileka zabahlanzayo nababheka ukushisa emzimbeni wabafundi beziphela ngo-Agasti kodwa sizilulile kuze kube wuDisemba walo nyaka. Siyabakhokhela futhi sisebenzisa iPersal, ukuze bazazi ukuthi bahola nini bese behlela izinto zabo, hhayi indaba yokuthi ngesinye isikhathi bayahola baphinde bangaholi. Kudingeke ukuthi sithathe imali iye ezinhlelweni zeCorona ngoba akekho obazi ukuthi kuzoba nenhlekelele enje.”USihlalo wekomiti lezemfundo esiShayamthetho uMnuz Jomo Sibiya, ukhale ngezikole ezicekelwe phansi ngumphakathi wathi kumele kuliwe nalokhu.Uthe kugcina sekusebenza imali enkulu kulungiswa lezi zikole ekubeni ngezomphakathi.I-IFP ikhale ngemali enkulu esetshenziswe ukuthenga ezinye zezinsiza zokuvikela icorona. I-DA neNFP bakhale ngezikole zodaka oThukela nasesifundeni iHarry Gwala.Ziyisishiyagalolunye ngu-9 izikole okuthiwa ngezodaka kulesi sifundazwe. UMshengu uthe odabeni lwezikole zodaka ezintathu ziyakhiwa, ezimbili kukhishwe ithenda, kuthi ezine kunohlelo lwazo lokuthi bazidwebe.
title: Bazobuyela ezikoleni othisha

text: IMAMELODI Sundowns iqhubekile nokungahlulwa kwiDStv Premiership ngesikhathi ishayana izibukane naMaZulu FC emdlalweni ophele ngo 0-0 eJonsson Kings Park Stadium, eThekwini ngoLwesithathu.AmaBrazilians aseqhube imidlalo ewu-21 engayazi induku kwiligi. Asehleli esicongweni ngamaphuzu awu-47. AmaZulu anamaphuzu awu-41 endaweni yesibili. Usuthu bekunethemba lokuthi yilona oluzokhipha iSundowns emzileni, njengoba lushaya ngefomu enhle kulezi zinsuku.AmaZulu angene enkundleni eshayela phezulu kwazise abekade esewine imidlalo eyisithupha ilandelana. ISundowns, ephinde yaphuma enkundleni ngaphandle kwegoli emdlalweni wesibili kulandelana, kade ibheke ukubuyisa isithunzi kulandela ukwehlulwa yiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) kowandulela owamanqamu. Nokho oSuthwini izifice zigawulwe zabekwa.Kulo mdlalo kucace zibekwa ukuthi alikho iqembu elizocanasa enkundleni. AmaZulu azamile ukuligcina ibhola umdlalo usaqala kodwa abadlali beSundowns bebengafuni lutho. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ikhombise ukuzinza iSundowns kodwa ihluleka wukwakha amathuba acacile okushaya amagoli. Isiwombe sokuqala siphele umqeqeshi woSuthu, uBenni McCarthy, esethole ikhadi eliphuzi kulandela ukuphendulana nonompempe uJelly Chavani.Esiwombeni sesibili, umdlalo ukhombise ukuvuleka, kwavela amathuba. Ngomzuzu ka-53 ishodi lika-Augustine Mulenga lishaye ipali labuyela enkundleni emuva kokuphendula abadlali basemuva bamaBrazilians. Kusuka kuleli bhola, iSundowns iqonde phambili yangena ebhokisini koSuthu kodwa unozinti uVeli Mothwa walivimba ibhola likaThemba Zwane. Ngomzuzu ka-76 uPeter Shalulile uhlulwe wukushaya igoli engasekho uMothwa epalini emuva kwe-free kick eshaywe ngokushesha nguThapelo Morena kwesokudla.
title: ISundowns isaqhubeka nokuqoqa amaphuzu kweyeligi

text:
U
SHADELWE yisipawupete sakhe, uCarina Mckechnie, umdlali weLamontville Golden Arrows, uKagisho “KG” Dikgacio NgoMgqibelo.Ubukhazikhazi bomshado bebusendaweni yomtakabani eNanda Polo Club, eSandton, eGoli. Abebeshada bakhethe indlela yokugqoka engeyona ubukhazikhazi kodwa esezingeni eliphezulu. UDikgacio ubeqgoke ibhatshi elihle elimnyama eliphethwe ngokunavy esiphikeni, neyembe elihlomphe nentolibhatshi emnyama, wabopha namadevu ekati nebhulukwe eli-navy.UCarina ubegqoke ingubo yomshado emhlophe engenamikhono engu-lace ngaphezulu, kanti ubeziphaqule ngendlela ebukekayo obekwenza bugqame kakhulu ubuhle bakhe.UDikgacio ubemiswe ngabangani bakhe okukhona kubo umdlali weGolden Arrows, uMusa Bilankulu abebegqoke amabhulukwe ampunga namabhatshi amaroon aphethwa ngokumpunga esiphikeni enziwe uNpcmenswear.Umshado ubuhanjelwe wosaziwayo kwezemidlalo nezikaqedisizungu. Bekukhona uSihlalo weGolden Arrows ophinde abe yiCEO yePremier Soccer League, uMato Madlala, umculi weHip hop ongumngani noDikgacio, uCasper Nyovest, uSphiwe Tshabalala, odlalela iKaizer Chiefs, no-Eric Macheru, odlala ku
  Skeem Sami.NgoJuni uDigkacoi uchanguzelwe ngokwesintu yisimomondiya saseSwazini. UDigkacio noCarina banendodakazi eneminyaka emithathu uNevs.
title: Ubukhazikhazi kushadelwa u-KG

text: UDUTSHULWEamaphoyisa wafa owesilisa owahubhe ngenduku, abaleka ashiya iveni nokhiye phakathi namaselula agcwala izinkalo.Lesi sehlakalo esishiye umndeni ushaqekile, senzeke eFolweni, eningizimu yeTheku, ngoMgqibelo odlule.Odutshulwe amahlandla amathathu esiswini nasengalweni, uMnuz Mthokozisi “Pa” Makhanya (32).Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe udaba lusingethwe wuphiko oluphenya amanye amaphoyisa, i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate (IPID).Okhulumela i-IPID uMnuz Moses Dlamini, uthe uphiko lwabo lusazoluphenya udaba.Ngokusho kwelungu lomndeni ebelikhona ngenkathi lesi sigameko senzeka, udaba luqale ngentombi kamufi.“UNto ubethunywe uPa ukuthi ayothenga igrosa eSiphingo. Ubuye engayiphethe nemali ingasekho kodwa edakiwe,” kusho isihlobo.Ngenkathi umufi ebuza ukuthi kwenzekeni kuthiwa intombi yakhe anezingane ezintathu nayo, imphendule kabi, umufi wayishaya.Eseyishayile, ilungu lomndeni lithe icasukile intombi umufi abehlala nayo kubo, yathi ayimethembi iyamsolaukuthi ubuye adlwengule izingane zayo.“Yilapho uPa ethukuthele khona kakhulu wathatha induku wamshaya,” kusho isihlobo. Ngokwalesi sihlobo, intombi kamufi iphumile yangasho ukuthi iyaphi, yabuya isihamba namaphoyisa.Sithe kuqale kwafika amaphoyisa amathathu, amabili awesifazane nelesilisa aqhamuka eFolweni.Kubikwa ukuthi afikeapaka iveni egcekeni, angena endlini.Ngenkathi ebuza umufi ukuthi uyishayeleni intombi yakhe, kuthiwa umufi naye obephuzile, uthathe induku wahlasela ngayo amaphoyisa aphuma ebangisana umnyango.“Ashiye iveni yawo nokhiye phakathi abaleka ngenkathi uPa ewahubha ngenduku.“Uthathe ukhiye evenini namaselula amaphoyisawangena nakho endlini,” kuchaza isihlobo.Uthe akuphelanga sikhathi esingakanani, kwabonakala sekutheleka inqwaba yamaphoyisa avela eSiphingo.“Aqale angqongqoza ewindini lekamelo abezivalele kulo wangavela. Aqhumise izibhamu emoyeni abe esengena ngaphakathi endlini,” kusho isihlobo.Sithe aqonde ekamelweni abelele kulo umufi angqongqoza. Ebona engavuli, sithe asigaklazile isicabha angena ngenkani.“Sizwe isibhamu sikhala amahlandla amathathu emva kwalokho aphuma amaphoyisa eqhumisa izibhamu emoyeni,” kuchaza isihlobo.Ngemuva kwalokho sithe amaphoyisa ahambile engazange asho lutho.Umndeni ufice isidumbu sikamufi sidindilizile ekamelweni abelele kulo.Ubenamanxebaokudutshulwa esiswini, engalweni nasesandleni.Intombi kamufi kuthiwa yagcina ukubonakala ngosuku okwehla ngalo umshophi wokubulawa kwesoka.Umndeni kamufi kuthiwa ufonele izihlobo zayo kodwa nazo zayilandula zathi yiwo okumele uchaze ukuthi ikuphi.“Sizwa kuthiwa isezihlotsheni zayo eDududu,” kusasho ilungu lomndeni kamufi.
title: Amaphoyisa adubule owahubhe ngenduku

text: IBAFANA Bafana ihlela ukudlala nezikhondlakhondla zamazwe ngaphambi kwe-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ezoqala ngoJuni 21 kuya kuJulayi 19 e-Egypt.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi ngemuva kokuba iBafana ikwazile ukuhlungela ukuya kwi-Afcon, uStuart Baxter ongumqeqeshi unikeze izikhulu zeSouth African Football Association (Safa) uhlu lwamazwe afuna ukungcweka nawo ngaphambi kokuya e-Egypt. Ngokusho komthombo ongaphakathi kwiSafa, kwafunwa uBaxter phesheya kwezilwandle phezulu kukhona iBrazil esendaweni yesithathu ezilinganisweni zeFifa, iSpain ekweyesishiyagalombili bese kuba yiBelgium ekleliswe endaweni yokuqala.Umthombo uqhube wathi e-Afrika kukhona iSenegal esendaweni yokuqala kuleli zwekazi bese iba kweyesi-24 emhlabeni.Elesibili yiTunisia ekleliswe endaweni yesibili bese iba kweyesi-28 emhlabeni jikelele. Kuthiwa kukhona neMorocco esendaweni yesithathu iphinde ibe kweyesi-44 kwezomhlaba. Umthombo uveze ukuthi amanye ala mazwe sekuxhunyaniwe nawo kanti amanye kusazothunyelwa izicelo kuwo.“UBaxter ulibeke ngembaba elokuthi ufuna ukungcweka namazwe aphezulu ngaphambi kokuqala kwe-Afcon. Nakuba kungakacaci njengoba kusalindelwe izimpendulo futhi kusazoxhunyanwa namanye kodwa imidlalo yokungcweka kubukeka izoba mibili noma mithathu. UBaxter uveze ukuthi ukudlala nala mazwe kuzomsiza kakhulu njengoba ezimisele ukubalwa namazwe azobanga inkomishi ye-Afcon,” kubeka umthombo.Uveze ukuthi izinkundla okuzodlalelwa kuzona bezingakaqokwa, okwamanje ukuthi eminye imidlalo izodlalelwa ekuhambeni, kuthi eminye ibe kuleli.Kuthintwa uDominic Chimhavi okhulumela iSafa uziqinisekisile izindaba zokuthi usewavezile amazwe uBaxter afuna ukudlala nawo ngaphambi kwe-Afcon. Mayelana namagama uthe ngeke akwazi ukuphuma nempendulo ecacile.“Okhuluma ngakho ngikwazi kahle. Engingeke ngikuqinisekise amazwe. Iningi lamazwe esisaxoxa nawo asikakafiki ndawo nawo mayelana nezimpendulo. Mhlawumbe maphakathi nenyanga kukhona okuphathekayo esizobe sesinakho,” kubeka uChimhavi.IBafana ithole ithikithi eliya e-Egypt ishaya kamnandi ngo 2-1 iLibya. Womabili amagoli avalelwe enethini uPercy Tau.Uma sigcina ngokuphumelela isifiso sikaBaxter, akubuzwa ukuthi izakhamuzi zaKwaZulu-Natal zingakujabulela ukusingatha omunye wemidlalo wezikhondlakhondla zamazwe. Umcimbi wokuqhathwa kwamazwe azoshukana kowe-Afcon kulindeleke ukuthi ube ngo-Ephreli 12, eCairo okuyinhlokodolobha yase-Egypt.
title: UBaxter ufuna ukungcweka nezinkunzi

text: UBOPHA uMbuso futhi ufuna umhlawule amademeshe kaR2 million owesifazane oboshelwe ukuhlupha isikhulu se-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, okuthiwa wayethandana naso. UNksz Snokwanda Ndlovu (22) ubhekene necala lokwephula imibandela yencwadi yenkantolo eyayimyalele ukuba angaxhumani noMnuz Jomo Sibiya, oyilungu lesiShayamthetho KwaZulu-Natal.USibiya obuye abe wuSihlalo wekomiti lezeMfundo, wamangalela uNksz Ndlovu ethi uyamhlupha uphazamisa inhlalakahle yakhe ngokuhamba ebhala, emphoxa kuFacebook. USibiya usesigungwini esiphezulu sesifundazwe kwi-ANC KwaZulu-Natal waqala waxwayisa le ntokazi ngencwadi evimba ukuba ixhumane naye ngoba ethi iyamhlambalaza.Isolezwe ngeSonto labika ngokuboshwa kukaNksz Ndlovu nokuvela kwakhe nasenkantolo.Ummeli kaNksz Ndlovu, uMnuz Collins Madike uxoxe naleli phephandaba wathi ikhasimende lakhe lihlukumezeke kakhulu ezandleni zoMbuso yingakho befaka icala. Ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kabenelisekile ngendlela olusingathwe ngayo udaba lwekhasimende lakhe, yingakho licele ukuba kumangalelwe uMbuso.Uthe akaboni kuwumqondo omuhle ukuthi ikhasimende lakhe likhulume ngalolu daba kwabezindaba."Waboshwa nengane encane babhadla esitokisini saseNquthu, emakhazeni kusebusika izinsuku eziyisishiyagalombili, endaweni exhaxhaza amanzi. Uma bephuma lapho ingane yangeniswa esibhedlela igula kabi. Konke lokhu sifuna kuphenywe, kuhlale obala. Sifake amaphepha enkantolo sifuna isinxephezelo sikaR2 million,’’ kuchaza uMadike.Uthe akanqabi ukuthi uma ikhasimende lakhe lingumsolwa liphenywe noma lishushiswe kodwa kufanele kwenziwe ngendlela enobulungiswa hhayi ukuhlukunyezwa kwamalungelo alo.Indaba isukela ekutheni uSibiya we-ANC wayebhale kwiFacebook ephawula ngohlelo lwethelevishini Utatakho, kwavela uNksz Ndlovu washiya angalazi emsola ngokuphika ingane. Lo wesifazane wacela nokuthi kuyokwenziwa ulibofuzo ukuze kucace ukuthi ingane ngekabani.Ebuzwa uSibiya ngomsindo phakathi kwakhe noNksz Ndlovu uthumele ummeli wakhe ukuba amkhulumele. Ummeli uMnuz Mondli Thusini, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi likhona icala enkantolo kodwa wathi ngeke baphawule.
title: Obopha uMbuso ufuna R2 million wamademeshe

text: NJENGOBA isimo somnotho sintengantenga, kungakuhle abantu bangenzi izikweletu ezintsha futhi benze isiqiniseko sokuthi bayazikhokhela lezo abanazo. Usho kanje uNksz Eunice Sibiya obhekelele izindaba zabathengi kwaFNB.UNksz Sibiya uthe abantu abaningi bazozithola sebenza izikweletu ukuze babhekane nezidingo zabo zanyanga zonke.“Uma uthola ukuthi sekufanele wenze isikweletu ukuze uqhubeke nempilo kusho ukuthi usenkingeni. Kufanele ungakuvumeli lokhu ngokuthi ushintshe indlela owenza ngayo. Kufanele ube nohlu lwezidingo zakho zanyanga zonke ubeke eqhulwini ukukhokhela izikweletu,” kusho uNksz Sibiya.Ube esenikeza amasu ambalwa athe azosiza abavele ngekhanda ezikweletini.Yiba nohlu lwezidingo zakho nezikweletu onazo bese ubeka eceleni imali yokukhokhela izikweletu nyanga zonke.Uma ikhona indlela yokuthi uyikhokhe yonke imali oyikweletayo yenza njalo ngoba lokho kuzokusiza.Zibekele isikhathi sokukhokhela izikweletu zakho, ukuze wazi ukuthi kuzothi kufika isikhathi esithile ube usuziqedile zonke.“Uma ubhalile ukuthi ngenyanga ethile uzobe usukhokhe waqeda isikweletu sokuqala lokhu kuzokugqugquzela ukuthi ungaphuthi ukusikhokhela,” kusho uNksz Sibiya.Bheka ukuthi isikweletu sakho siyehla noma siyenyuka njalo emuva kwezinyanga ezintathu.“Ukubheka ukuthi ukweleta malini njalo emuva kwezinyanga ezintathu kuzokucacisela ukuthi uhlelo lwakho lokukhokhela izikweletu luyasebenza noma alusebenzi. Uma isikweletu sincipha lokhu kusho ukuthi wenza kahle kodwa uma singanciphi kusho ukuthi kufanele uhlele kabusha.”Uphethe ngokudonsa abantu ngendlebe ukuthi bazithibe ekukhokheni isikweletu ngesinye futhi bangathengi lutho uma bengakaziqedi izikweletu.
title: Gwema ukwenza izikweletu ezintsha ngalesi sikhathi

text: N GOKwemiphumela yocwaningo olukhishwe izolo, iningi lamadoda eNingizimu Afrika lisengcupheni yokukhophozelelwa yinduku ngenxa yokuzinikela ezimbizeni zikaFaro.Ucwaningo luthole ukuthi u-44% wamadoda usengcupheni yokukhophezelelwa yiphobana, kusho abakwaPharma Dynamics, inkampani eyenza amafuzamuthi neyenza imithi ebhekene nezifo zamadoda.Inhlolovo eyenziwe emtholampilo ithi ukuphuza okujwayelekile kathathu noma kweve kungayenza induku ikhophoze.“Umcabango othusayo ngenxa yokuthi angaphezu kuka-31% amadoda aseNingizimu Afrika aphuza amagilasi angaphezu kwesihlanu otshwala ngesonto bese kuthi u-13% okungenani uphuza amagilasi amathathu njalo ngesonto.’’Kulolu cwaningo olwenziwa ngoJuni nangoJulayi nonyaka angaphezu kuka-500 amadoda aneminyaka engu-18 kuya kwengu-55 abephonswe imibuzo.Ngokombiko we-World Health Organisation othinta ezempilo notshwala, iNingizimu Afrika ihamba phambili ngasekuphuzweni kotshwala.UMnuz Tumi Motsei okhulumela iPharma Dynamics, uthe lokhu akuchazi ukuthi amadoda sekumele abuyeke utshwala kodwa kumele akhumbule ukuthi inkonzo yasekamelweni notshwala yizinto ezimbili okunzima ukuzilinganisela.“Amadoda asephuzile engalangazelela ukuya ocansini kakhulu kodwa utshwala buyayikhinyabeza indlela abenza ngayo embhedeni.“Isibindi singakwazi ukumelana notshwala obuphuzwe emuva kwehora nakhona okuyigilasi. Lokho kuchaza ukuthi uma uphuza njalo utshwala bungagcina sebuthuntubeza izitho zomzimba,’’ kusho uMotsei.Amadoda agxile kakhulu otshwaleni anamathuba angu-60%-70% okuhlaselwa yizinkinga zocansi.Ngokocwaningo emadodeni angu-10 aseNingizimu Afrika, amane anale nkinga yokuthuntubezeka.Amadoda anale nkinga anamathuba amaningi okuthi abenesifo senhliziyo, u-10% ube nesifo sohlangothi bese kuthi u-20 % ulaliswe esibhedlela ngenxa yesifo senhliziyo.“Empeleni lezi zimpawu ziyakuxwayisa ukuthi ungase uzithole usunesifo senhliziyo.“Lesi sifo sidalwa yinkinga yemithambo esuke iqale eminyakeni edlule bese kungena noshukela,’’ kusho uMotsei. – Sapa
title: Utshwala buwisa induku - cwaningo

text: ULindi ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokusula icala lokushaya alivulela uNgizwe.Izolo uNgizwe, owayengumsakazi woKhozi FM, ubevele ngaphambi kweNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam icala lahoxiswe ngokusemthethweni.Ubesolwa ngokushaya umkakhe besemzini wakhe osePhoenix ngoMeyi 3.Kuthiwa kwaba nengxabano ethinta utshwala uNgizwe wabe eseshaya uLindi ngesigubhu.Kuvela ukuthi wamshaya nasemhlane waba nemihuzuko emthuka.Kusolwa ukuthi wamshaya waze wathatha isitini walimaza imoto phambili ngasemalambini. Umonakalo owadaleka ulinganiselwa kuR50 000.UNgizwe ungene ekhululekile ebhokisini ebingelela intatheli ebhale lolu daba. Enkantolo kuthiwe sebelukhulumile udaba. Ngokudlule uLindi wayengekho enkantolo icala lahlehliselwa izolo ukuzwa ukuthi bayaluxoxa yini udaba ngokusho kommeli kaNgizwe obengekho izolo. Kulokhu ubekhona futhi wasayina ukuthi icala uyalihoxisa.IMantshi ibuze uNgizwe ukuthi uxolisile yini kuLindi, wavuma. NoLindi ukuqinisekisile loku uma ebuzwa.“Amadoda kumele afunde isifundo sokuthi noma ngabe usuku kade lungahambi kahle kangakanani awakwazi ukuvele afike azenzele umathanda ngoba ekhipha ukucasuka kwawo,” kusho uLindi.Uthe akazisoli ngokuvulela uNgizwe icala. Akazange awulalele umndeni nabangani ukuze amjezise.“Ngiyajabula manje ukuthi useyazi ukuthi kumele aziphathe kanjani,” kusho uLindi. Yonke into ihamba kahle ekuthandaneni kwabo.UNgizwe unqabile ukuphawula wathi akashiywe phansi.Uphume emagcekeni enkantolo wathatha ngesivu ngoba egwema ukuthathwa izithombe.
title: Lihoxisiwe icala ebelibekwe uNgizwe

text: OBENGUNGQONGQOSHE wezokuMbiwayo kuleli uMnuz Mosebenzi Zwane ukhala ngabadayisi ngaphakathi kwi-ANC abenza ukuthi obengumengameli kuleli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma agqigqe ezinkantolo.Ekhuluma nabalandeli bakaZuma ngaphandle kwaseNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ngoLwesihlanu, ngemuva kokuguqa kwecala, uZwane uthe uZuma usenkantolo ngenxa yabathile embuthweni. “Kunabathengisi enhlanganweni, yingakho esikhundleni sokuthi uZuma kumele ngabe uyajatshulelwa, uyahlonishwa ngemisebenzi ayenzele isizwe kodwa uyashushiswa,” kusho uZwane.UZwane noMnuz Des van Rooyen ngabanye abebengongqongqoshe ngesikhathi sikaZuma, abasameseka namanje njengoba esahamba icala lenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa elithinta ukuthengwa kwezikhali.UZwane noVan Rooyen bebeseMgungundlovu isonto lonke ngeledlule njengoba bekulalelwe isicelo sikaZuma sokuthi achithwe unomphela amacala ngoba asedonse isikhathi eside. Inkantolo isigodlile isinqumo sayo. Kulindeleke ukuthi isikhiphe ezinyangeni ezimbili noma ezintathu kusukela manje, ngaphambi kokuthi kuqalwe ukuqulwa kwaleli cala ngo-Okthoba.“Ngizoqhubeka nokumeseka uZuma kuze kufike ekugcineni ngoba ngiyakholelwa ebuholini bakhe, anginandaba nokuthi abanye abantu bathini,” kusho uZwane.Nomkhulumeli wezingwevu zoMkhonto weSizwe, uMnuz Carl Niehaus uthe bengamalungu eMK bazoma noZuma kuze kufike ekugcineni.“UZuma wayengomunye woKhomanda boMkhonto weSizwe owayehlonishwa futhi esatshwa ngisho ngamaBhunu. Ngeke size siyeke ukumhlonipha. Kuwumgomo wasemasosheni ukungalahlani,” kusho uNiehaus.Ekhuluma nabalandeli bakhe, uZuma uthe wahlukumezeka kakhulu ngesikhathi sengcindezelo, wengeza ngokuthi akakaze acabange ukuthi nangesikhathi sentando yabantu uzohlukumezeka.“Kodwa-ke bahlukumeza umuntu okwaziyo ukuhlukunyezwa. Ngalwa ngesikhathi ngihlukunyezwa ngesikhathi sobandlululo ngaze ngagwetshwa iminyaka, ngabhadla ejele. Namanje ngizolwa ngoba angikaze ngisabe muntu,” kusho uZuma.Ukhale ngokuthi ukweleta ngisho abameli bakhe ngoba akanayo imali yokubakhokhela kusukela uhulumeni kaMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa wathatha isinqumo sokuthi azikhokhele izindleko zecala.
title: Ukhala ngabadayisa uZuma ngaphakathi kwi-ANC

text: I-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ithi zibalelwa ku-50 izikhalo zamagatsha ezibikiwe njengoba kubhekwe engqungqutheleni.UNobhala wale nhlangano, uMnuz Super Zuma, ukuchithile ukuthi ithimba eliholwa nguNgqongqoshe wezeSayensi nobuChwepheshe uNkk Naledi Pandor libhekene nezikhalo ezibalelwa ku-80.UZuma, ekhuluma namalungu e-ANC ngoLwesine ntambama ngemuva kokugodlwa kwesinqumo secala enkantolo yaseMgungundlovu, uthe uyazi ukuthi basazophuma bengena ezinkantolo.“Zingu-50 izikhalo eziphume emagatsheni hhayi lo 80 okukhulunywa ngawo. Akunazinkinga ezinkulu eKZN,” kusho uZuma.Ebuzwa yiSolezwe ukuthi baziphothula nini izikhalo uthe bazobabiza abezindaba babazise.I-ANC kuzwelonke yajuba amathimba ezifundazweni azobhekana nezikhalo zamagatsha. Kwezinye kuthiwa amanye amagatsha azoqala phansi abe nemihlangano yokukhetha aphinde aphakamise abaholi afuna bakhethelwe ezikhundleni eziphezulu engqungqutheleni eqala ngoDisemba 16 iphothulwe ngoDisemba 20.UZuma uthe bayilinde ngabomvu  ingqungquthela yesifundazwe eqala namhlanje iphothulwe kusasa. Noma engalibekanga ngembaba kodwa uthe amagatsha asekhulumile wathi anqume njengaseNorth West naseFree State. “Amagatsha asekhulumile. Asho njengoba kusho iNorth West, Free State ngiyazi neMpumalanga izosho ngendlela esizosho ngayo,” kusho uZuma.UZuma usho lokhu nje iNorth West neFree State baphakamise uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma njengozothatha izintambo kuMengameli Jacob Zuma, iMpumalanga ithi ihamba noBumbano. I-KZN yaziwa ngokweseka uDkt Dlamini Zuma njengomengameli olandelayo.Izifundazwe i-Eastern Cape, Northern Cape, Gauteng neWestern Cape ziphakamise iphini likamengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa njengomengameli olandelayo.Uphiko lwentsha lwe-ANC nolwabesifazane baphakamise uDkt Dlamini Zuma kwesikamengameli. UZuma unxuse amalungu aya engqungqutheleni ukuthi aziphathe kahle enze lokhu akuthunywe amagatsha.“Njengoba niya engqungqutheleni kumele niziphathe kahle nenze lokho enikuthunywe amagatsha. Ningenzi eningakuthunywanga,” kusho uZuma.
title: UNobhala we-ANC eKZN uchitha eyamagatsha angu 80 anezikhalo

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAK UZOMELE azibambe ziqine uNkosingiphile “King” Gumede ongunozinti weLamontville Golden Arrows uma efuna ukungapheshukelwa yijezi ngemuva kokuthi umqeqeshi waleli qembu, uShaun Bartlett, ethe uthungatha unozinti osezingeni eliphezulu.I-Arrows ezobe igijima kuNational First Division (NFD) ngesizini ezayo, ibe nenhlolokhono yezinsuku ezintathu eHoward College, e-University of KwaZulu-Natal (UKZN), yagcina iphume nabadlali abangu-11 abazoqala neqembu uma selizilungiselela ukuqala kwesizini entsha ngenyanga ezayo.“Besidinga ukuvala izikhala ezivulekile ngabadlali abangu-12 ezindaweni ezehlukene. Ngigculisekile ngengikubonile ngoba sigcine siqoke abadlali abangu-11 abazosijoyina uma sesiqala amalungiselelo esizini entsha. Kodwa angiqedile ukubheka abadlali njengoba ngisafuna odlala emuva kwesokunxele nonozinti osezingeni. Ngingakujabulela nokuthola omunye umgadli,” kusho uBartlett.Uthe ngeke babadalule abadlali ngoba abakazisayini izinkontileka. Uzophinde asebenzise imidlalo yama-Play Offs ye-ABC Motsepe ezoba seThekwini ngoJulayi ukubheka abanye abadlali abanethalente angabasebenzisa ku-Arrows.UGumede usayine eqenjini elikhulu le-Arrows ngo-2011 esuka ku-Under 19. Uzithole ekhuhla ibhentshi ku-Arrows ngesizini edlule ebangiswa uSiyabonga Mngoma ogcine eshiyile eqenjini. Kuthe kungafika inkakha, u-Arthur Bartman, walishweba futhi ijezi lo nozinti. UBartlett ufuna unozinti nje, kuvela ukuthi uPhilani Zikalala obekuMaZulu FC ngesizini edlule usevele usayine inkontileka yesibambiso kuBafana Bes’thende.I-Arrows kungenzeka ishiywe nguBongi Ntuli noSiyanda Zwane abafunwa yiMamelodi Sundowns ne-Orlando Pirates.UNhlanhla Zothwane, Vuyisile Ntomb’ayithethi, Norman Smith sebeshiyile kanti uThanduyise Khuboni uphelelwa yinkontileka. UJoseph Musonda osalelwe unyaka owodwa kwinkontileka yakhe wathi usazocabanga ukuthi uzokwehla neqembu yini kanti uChris Katongo wayesayine izinyanga eziyisithupha kuphela ngethemba lokuthi ubezotakula umkhumbi owawuzika.
title: Ifuna omunye unozinti i-Arrows

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESEKULINDELEKE ukuba nangale mpelasonto uqhubeke nokushuba umbango wokuzibekisela indawo emidlalweni eyandulela owamanqamu, emaqenjini agijima kwiDStv Diski Challenge.Njengamanje wobabili amaqoqo akulesi sigaba, okungelokuqala elihlanganise amaqembu akhele izindawo ezigudle ulwandle nelesibili elibophele asezindaweni ezimaphakathi nezwe, kubukeka kungakacaci kahle ukuthi ngabe yimaphi azogcina edlulele phambili.Eqoqweni lokuqala kushube kakhulu njengoba amaqembu amathathu aphezulu elingana ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili, emidlalweni emine. IStellenbosch FC yisona esiqhwakele, kulandele iMariztburg United endaweni yesibili,  AmaZulu FC kweyesithathu. Womathathu la maqembu ahlukaniswe yisimo samagoli nje kuphela.Eqoqweni lesibili umbango ubukeka uya ngokushuba njengoba kuthe maphakathi nesonto iKaizer Chiefs yadiliza i-Orlando Pirates esicongweni se-log.Kodwa-ke la maqembu aseSoweto ayalingana ngamaphuzu njengoba eseqoqe ayisishiyagalolunye emidlalweni emine. IMamelodi Sundowns yona ihlezi endaweni yesithathu ngayisikhombisa.Ngale mpelasonto umdlalo weDiski Challenge, ozobe ubhekwe kakhulu woqhathe iChiefs neSundowns ngeSonto ngo-12 emini, eJohannesburg Stadium, eGoli.Abafana beChiefs, abaqeqeshwa ngu-Arthur “10111” Zwane, bazokuya emdlalweni behambela phezulu njengoba besanda kubhuquzisa ngo 2-0 iBaroka. Abafana bamaBrazilians, abacijwa nguSurprise Moriri, babambane ngo 0-0 neBlack Leopards maphakathi sento. Lo mdlalo uzobe ungowamagqubu njengoba ngesikhathi egcina ukuhlangana la maqembu, iChiefs yaxebula ngo 4-2 iDowns. Imidlalo yeDStv Diski Premiership ngempelasonto:Kusasa - Ngo-10am: Bloemfontein Celtic v Tshakuma Tsha Madzivhandila (Siwelele Park); Orlando Pirates v Swallows FC (Rand Stadium).NgeSonto - Ngo-9:30am: Supersport United v Maritzburg United (JHB Stadium).Ngo-10am: Baroka FC v Black Leopards (Old Peter Mokaba Stadium); TS Galaxy v AmaZulu FC (Tsakane Stadium); Lamontville Golden Arrows v Stellenbosch FC (Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium); Cape Town City v Chippa United (Malta Park); Mamelodi Sundowns v Kaizer Chiefs (JHB Stadium).
title: Uyaqina umbango wamaphuzu kwiDiski Challenge

text: Kuningi esikwenzayo singabelaphi bendabuko okutshengisa indlala nokungabi ngabantu abahlonipha abaphathiswe khona ngabanikazi bomsebenzi.Okokuqala yinkolelelo yokuthi uma uthwasa, uthwasa ngoba kufanele uphume ezinhluphekweni kokunye ucebe.Kungakho kuyaye kuthi umuntu lapho esethwasile waphothula kube ima eqala phansi ephuma ethi uyofuna into yokukhuphula umsebenzi ukuze abantu bangene. Ukuthi bona baphi bona abantu, baluhlobo luni baguliswa yini akasabuzwanga, bese kwenzeka izinto ezithunaza umsebenzi wesintu bese ubukeleka phansi.Iningi kungakho ligcina seliyothwala ngoba lifuna umsebenzi ukhuphuke. Okuyikhona okusihlula kakhulu wukuqonda ukuthi yini lena, nokuthi umsebenzi wehluke kanjani kweminye imisebenzi. Lokhu kube sekubangela izinto eziningi umelaphi agcina esezenza zingahambisani nobunyoninco bezokwelapha nemithetho yakhona.Ngizokha phezulu ngibale izinto ezijwayelekile ezenzeka phakathi kwabantu abathwasile nabanikezwe ukuthi basebenze abantu.Okokuqala ngikholelwa ekutheni uma ungumelaphi konke uyaphathiswa nawe bese uphathisa. Ngeke uphathise ungaphathiswanga.Ngizothatha into yokuqala ukuthwasisa. Namhlanje usethi umuntu ephothule ngakho kodwa usuyezwa usenamathwasa inqwaba kodwa uma uzibuza ukuthi uphathiswe nini, uthole ukuthi lutho, yini na, ngoba sazi ukuthi wathwasa waphothula okulandelayo sekufanele uthwasise. Kulokho kuthwasisa kunamaphutha akhona esiwenzayo.Abantu kabazingeneli ngoba bethunywe yidlozi labo bayaphoqwa ngogobela. Efika umuntu ezohlola egula kumbe enezinkinga, sekuzothiwa ngena ephehlweni uthwase. Kukhona ngisho ogobela abahamba bekubuza emgwaqweni ukuthi awuwemukeli ngani umsebenzi wabadala na? Uma uphendula uthi abakasho, uzothi umuntu woza kimina ngizokusiza, abasasho namhlanje sekufanele kube uwena ozithathela izinqumo. Uyongena-ke umuntu athwase ngoba ehluphekile, kulapho kuqala khona inkathazo.Engakangeni omunye uzohlola bese evuma ukuthi uyeza uzongena ephehlweni, yilapho iyoqala khona indaba, ngeke umuntu wabantu busehla ubuthongo yizingcingo zingena ubusuku nemini sekuyabuzwa manje ungena nini kanti? Lapho usejahile ugobela ngoba usebone waqeda ukuthi nansiya imali lapho ikhona.Kulungile-ke uzothwasa umuntu khona kodwa ugobela akazomenzela iqiniso: ngokwempande okufanele ayidle, ngokobunyanga anikwa bona othwasayo, nokuthi yena gobela lowo uphathisiwe yini leyo mpande. Ogobela abanaki idlozi lomuntu lifuna luhlobo luni lwempande? Kungakho-ke ethi angaqeda ukubekelwa izinkamba umuntu ngakusasa sezibole zonke.Uma ungene ephehlweni idlozi lizikhulumela into yokuqala ezokwenziwa ukuze lithuliswe ngoba lizoveza izinto eziningi ezingafanale ngesigodlo sikagobela nangaye uqobo. Noma sekuqhamuka amaphupho nezibonakaliso ugobela uyena ozokuphikisa kuqala lokho athi akukho ngoba akajahe kuthwasisa kodwa ujahe ukuthola imali nokuthi unesibalo esingakanani samathwasa.Yikhona-ke lokhu okwenza sithole abantu abaningi kangaka bethwasile kodwa ukugula obeku-baphethe kuqhubeka, izinhlupheko ziqhubeka. Lizokukhipha-ke idlozi kulesi sigodlo ngoba libona kudlalwa ngalo, kumbe uzibalekele wena, azokwenza ugobela uzokulandelisa ngemithi esekuthakatha, umphuphe ebusuku enza izinto futhi usutshengiswa ukuthi wenzani. Okutshengisa indlala nokulamba.Sisadlule kulokho, baningi abantu abathi uma kade beyohlola, umuntu usezolandelwa ngezingcingo ngugobela ethi ubuya nini ukuzokwenza okwathiwa asikwenze.Baningi abantu abakhala ngalokhu uma uke waya kohlola ngeke usalala ubuthongo yizingcingo zomelaphi ekubelesela ngokubuya kwakho. Khona lapho, kukhona nokwesatshiswa uma ungakwenzi ohlolelwe khona uzoyikhotha imbenge yomile, uzokufa nokufa. Kothi-ke noma usuyile wakwelapha, uma usufuna ukubuyela emuva uyobheka kwahamba kanjani, noma awuboni kahle ngeke usamthola ocingweni, ngoba inhloso isifezekile.Baningi-ke ababhulela abantu ezitimeleni nasematekisini, kumbe uzihambela edolobheni uzwa ngomuntu esethi; “awuwemukeli ngani umsebenzi wabadala” uma uthi cha ngiyathwasa kasibanibani, athi hhayi woza kimina, ngizokwenzela mina udlala ngawe lowo melaphi.Athi umuntu angathwasa kwenye indawo ngoba ujahile lokhu angakwazi naye akujahile, usuyombona esoyohlola kwenye indawo, noma kanjani lapho kuzokuthiwa awenzelwanga kahle, woza kimina. Kungakho-ke namhlanje sinezinyanga ezihambe zifakela abantu basemakubo abadala, ezinye zibethele, uma uhlola isho ukuthi sewabafaka, kumbe wabethela, izwi liqhamuke liqhasha: “akwenzekanga”.Lezi zinto zenza umsebenzi wethongo nedlozi ubukeleke phansi, wenziwa ngabantu bedokwe lendlala ngoba bejahe ukuthiba isisu. Kube-ke kukhona ukuzondana kwabelaphi bendabuko bebodwa, esiyoxoxa ngakho ngelinye ilanga.BhedlindabaIsigodlo SaseMlambomunye087 11 00 555
title: Abedokwe lendlala benza umsebenzi wethongo udicileke phansi

text: ISILOMO seBafana Bafana, esasidlalela i-Orlando Pirates, u-Andile Jali, singomunye wabantu kwabangu-15 ababoshelwe ukushayela bephuzile.Lokhu kuvezwe ngamaphoyisa kaMasipala waseTshwane Metro Police Department (TMPD) ngemuva komkhankaso wokulwa nabashayela bephuzile.“Amaphoyisa aseTshwane, esebenzisana nezinye izinhlaka, enze umkhankaso ngoMgqibelo ebusuku lapho ebophe khona abebeshayela bephuzile eHatfield,” kusho uSenior Superintendent Isaac Mahamba, okhulumela amaphoyisa kamasipala.Uthe bangu-15 abantu ababoshiwe phakathi kuka-10 no-12 ebusuku.“Omunye wabantu ababoshiwe umdlali weBafana ona-28. Lo mdlali wayedlalela i-Orlando Pirates.”UMahamba uthe ukushayela uphuzile ngenye yezinto ezidala izingozi kulo mkhandlu.“Noma ngubani otholakala ephuzile uzoboshwa. Sizoqhubeka nemikhankaso efuze le ngoba ngeke sibabekezelele abantu ababeka abanye engcupheni.”Ugqugquzele abashayeli ukuthi benze ezinye izinhlelo ukuze bafike emakhaya kunokushayela bephuzile.“Akekho umuntu ongaphezu komthetho. Siwashayela ihlombe amaphoyisa ngomsebenzi wawo,” kusho uMahamba.
title: Isilomo seBafana kwababoshelwe ukushayela bephuzile

text: SEKUYOLAMULA inkantolo phakathi kweCell C Sharks nomqeqeshi wayo ongenalo ugazi, uRobert du Preez, osekuvela ukuthi kubangwa imali. U-Du Preez naleli qembu kubukeka sengathi izingxoxo zabo zokuhlukana sezifinyelele kwangqingetshe emva kokuvela ukuthi lo mqeqeshi uba nenkani yeselesele uma sekufanele avume isamba semali njengoba enenkontileka nje.Leli phephandaba lihoshe ngemithombo yalo engashayi eceleni ukuthi uDu Preez ngeke esabuya ukuzoqeqesha iSharks kwiVodacom Super Rugby ngesizini ezayo njengoba bekulindelekile.Empeleni uDu Preez unenkontileka neSharks ebizophela ngoDisemba ngonyaka ozayo. Lokhu kusho ukuthi usasalelwe yizinyanga eziwu-18 kwinkontileka yakhe naleli qembu.“Izikhulu zeSharks azeneme ngomsebenzi kaDu Preez. Zikholelwa ekutheni uyedelela futhi unokukhetha iphela emasini. Lokhu kuholele ekutheni izinhlangothi zombili zivumelane ngokuthi kwehlukanwe, bunqamuke ubudlelwano bokusebenzisana. Izikhulu zeSharks zikubeke kwacaca kuDu Preez ukuthi ngeke ayithole yonke imali ehambisana nezinyanga ebezisele kwinkontileka yakhe ngoba naye ube namaphutha, kanti futhi uhola itshe lemali.“ISharks ibizimisele ngokukhokha ingxenye ethile yemali ukuze kwehlukanwe kahle kuhlekwa. Nokho uDu Preez uvuke umbhejazane, wathi uyifuna yonke imali yakhe kungenjalo uya enkantolo. Kubukeka sengathi sekuyolamula yona ngoba inkani kaDu Preez nokuzikhukhumeza sekuphenduke isitha sakhe,” kusho umthombo ozazi zonke ezeSharks.Ngendlela isimo esesiyisona phakathi kweSharks noDu Preez, kubukeka sengathi uma leli qembu lingaliwina icala, ngeke athole ngisho isenti leli uDu Preez.“Bekufanele ayamukele imali abenikezwa yona yiSharks etafuleni, ukuze kube khona ukuthula futhi naye kube khona akutholayo. Kodwa njengamanje usengcupheni yokungatholi lutho ngenxa yenkani. Asethembe nje ukuthi uzobuye acabange kahle, kuxoxiswane kuyekwe eyezinkantolo,” kuqhuba umthombo.Leli phephandaba liphinde laqaphela ukuthi amadodana kaDu Preez amathathu adlalela oShaka uRobert, Daniel noJean-Luc, abengabonwa nangokhalo ngesikhathi iqembu liziqeqesha ngoLwesibili.“Bacele ukushiya kwiSharks abafana bakaDu Preez. Azicaci kahle izizathu ukuthi yiziphi kodwa izikhulu zeSharks zisalubhekisisa udaba lwabo,” kusho umthombo.
title: Uya enkantolo umqeqeshi weSharks ngemali

text: BUPHUME phambili ubuholi be-ANC eHarry Gwala ecaleni ebelifakwe abanganeme abebefuna iqalwe phansi ingqungquthela yalesi sifunda eyakhetha abaholi abakhona abaholwa nguSihlalo uMnuz Zamo Nxumalo.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNobhala jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Ace Magashule, izolo ngemuva komhlangano wekomiti elibheka ukusebenza kwansuku zonke ebelihlangene ngoMsombuluko eMpumalanga.UMagashule uthe leli komiti lithole umbiko ngokuthi lesi sifunda siwinile enkantolo.“Inkantolo ibachithile abebefuna ukuthi imiphumela yengqungquthela eyakhetha ubuholi eHarry Gwala ngo-Agasti nonyaka ithathwe njengento engekho. Siwutholile umbiko ngalokhu nokuthi laba abayisa lobu buholi enkantolo bayalelwe ukuthi bakhokhe nezindleko zecala,” kusho uMagashule.Uthe ukuchithwa kwabangeneme kusho ukuthi ubuholi obukhona bunegunya lokuba sehhovisi lesifunda.“Siyakwamukela ukusungulwa kwethimba eliholwa yisigungu esiphezulu esizosebenza nobuholi besifundazwe KwaZulu-Natal kanjalo nobuholi baseHarry Gwala. Leli thimba lizobe lihlanganisa imisebenzi ethinta ukhetho,” kusho uMagashule.Kwenzeka lokhu nje lisusiwe ohlwini lwamacala aphuthumayo icala ebelifakwe ngowayengundunankulu waseNorth West, uMnuz Supra Mahumapelo, obeyise i-ANC enkantolo ukuze amise ubuholi besikhashana balesi sifunda ukuthi buhambise amagama abantu abaphakanyiselwe ePhalamende.IJaji Colin Lamont lithe lolu daba aluphuthumi.Ummeli kaMahumapelo, * -Advocate Dali Mpofu, wayefuna uLamont avimbe lobu buholi ukuthi bungahambisi amagama abantu abazoya ePhalamende ngoba ethi abaqokiwe ngabantu kodwa bafunzwa bona yisigungu esiphezulu se-ANC.Lolu daba luzolalelwa ngoJanuwari ngonyaka ozayo.UMagashule uthe ithimba lesigungu esiphezulu lisebenzisana nobuholi be-ANC Youth League ukulungiselela ingqungquthela engenyanga ezayo.
title: Balahlwe yicala abebefuna iqalwe phansi ingqungquthela ye-ANC

text: KUGQUGQUZELWE abantu abasha ukuthi bazihlanganise nezolimo ukuze bakwazi ukuziqalela amabhizinisi kulo mkhakha, azosiza ukufukula umnotho ikakhulu ezindaweni zasemakhaya.Lokhu kuvele emhlanganweni woMnyango wezoLimo obekuhloswe ngawo ukucobelelana ngolwazi nabantu abasha emkhakheni wezolimo owaziwa ngeYouth and Agriculture Indaba obuseDundee, kuMasipala waseNdumeni izolo.UNgqongqoshe wezoLimo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Bongiwe Sithole-Moloi, ekhuluma nabezindaba kulo mcimbi, uthe inhloso yawo akukhona kuphela ukugcizelela ukuthi kuphathwe igeja kulinywe kodwa nasekucobelelaneni nangamaqhinga angasetshenziswa ikakhulu kwezobuchwepheshe ukuthuthukisa amabhizinisi kwezolimo.“Umyalezo wethu kubantu abasha uthi ezolimo ziyimpilo. Abantu abasha bayikusasa laleli lizwe ngakho sithi akekho umuntu omusha okumele angalibambi iqhaza kwezolimo,” kusho uNkk Sithole-Moloi.Uthe ngaphansi kwezolimo, kuningi okwenziwayo okukhona phakathi kwakho ukwenza ucwaningo ngezilwane, yizitshalo nokuqhamuka nezindlela ezintsha zokukhulisa ibhizinisi emkhakheni wezolimo.Ibingaphezu kuka-1 500 intsha ebihambele le ngqungquthela iqhamuka kubona bonke omasipala esifundazweni.Bekukhona nobuholi obehlukene bomasipala nabaholi bendabuko.Ekhuluma nentsha, uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe kubalulekile ukuthi intsha izibandakanye kwezolimo ukuze kukhule umnotho.“Inkunzi isematholeni. Siyaqonda ukuthi izimboni eziningi ziyavala ngenxa yokwehla komnotho kodwa ezolimo ziyohlala zikhona ngoba ukudla kuyohlezi kudingeka,” kusho uZikalala.UMnuz Sanele Mbhele (35) onepulazi elikhiqiza izinkomo nobhontshisi elibizwa ngeDedani Farming, eDundee, uthe le nkundla yokucobelelana ngolwazi izoba wusizo olukhulu ekugqugquzeleni intsha esafuna ukungena kulo mkhakha.“Siyakujabulela kakhulu okuqalwa uhulumeni wesifundazwe ukugqugquzela abantu abasha ukuthi bangene kwezolimo.“Sikulindele ukuthi kule ngqungquthela sibonisane ukuthi yiziphi izingqinamba esibhekana nazo singabantu abasha kwezolimo,” kusho uMbhele.Uthe bafisa ukuzwa nezinhlelo uhulumeni anazo ukulekelela abantu abasha ngasohlangothini oluthinta ezezimali nomhlaba wokulima.
title: Kukhuthazwa intshaemkhakheni wezolimo

text: Nokubongwa PhenyaneUMLINGISI womdlalo i-Erased esiteshini iMoja Love, uZethu Dlomo-Mphahlele, uthi uyafisa abantu bakuleli bangabehluleli abantu abaziphilisa ngemisebenzi engajwayelekile emphakathini njengoba besuke bengasazi isizathu salokho.Umlingiswa wakhe ngowesifazane odayisa umzimba.Kulo mdlalo okhonjiswa ngeSonto ngo-10 ebusuku, uZethu ulingisa indawo ka-Ayanda oshadile kodwa odayisa umzimba ngenxa yokuthi waphelelwa wumsebenzi ebhange ayesebenza kulona.“Ngesikhathi ngithola le ndawo nokumele ngikwenze kuwona, ngashaywa wuvalo kancane kodwa ngaphinde ngajabula ukulingisa indawo ehlukile kwesengake ngazilingisa phambilini. Ngizwa sengathi ibaluleke kakhulu njengoba umdlalo ofana nalona ungakaze ukhonjiswe kuleli. Lokhu esikhuluma ngakho kulo mdlalo yinto eyenzekayo kodwa akujwayelekile ukuthi kuxoxwe ngayo,” kuchaza uZethu.Uthi ngaphambi kokuthi lo mdlalo uqale uBongi Ndaba owubhalile waqala wacwaninga kubantu abenza lo msebenzi ukuze umdlalo ungashayi eceleni.“Kwakumele sicophelele indlela esiwenza ngayo. Kwatholakala ukuthi kunomama bemizi abenza lo msebenzi base beveza izizathu ezibaholele kuwona. Engikufundile wukuthi singabagxeki abantu abasebenza ngezindlela ezihlukene ukuze baziphilise ngenxa yokuthi usuke engekho owaziyo ukuthi bakwenza lokhu ngoba kubangwa yini,” kuchaza uZethu.Le ntokazi ezalelwe eMgungundlovu kodwa yakhulela eDobsonville, ithe ukulingisa yakuqala yenza amabanga aphansi esikoleni kodwa yaqhubeka nakho njengoba yakufundela yagogoda eNyuvesi iWits.Maduze le ntokazi ithe izobonakala emdlalweni i-Amazing Grace, ezokhonjiswa njalo ngeSonto kuSABC1.
title: Uvuleke amehlo ngomlingiswa ongumqwayizi

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWEU MENGAMELI Jacob Zuma ushiye amalungu amele i-EFF ePhalamende edidekile izolo ewatshela ukuthi asemhambele phambili ngombuzo wokuthi uyikhokha nini imali yomuzi wakhe oseNkandla, futhi asegabavule adlula ngisho nezinhlaka zePhalamende ezidingida ngalolu daba.UZuma ubephendula umbuzo welungu le-EFF uNksz Natasha Louw ombuze ukuthi uyikhokha nini imali yokulungiswa komuzi wakhe.“Angikaze ngicabange ngisho usuku lokuthi ngiyoyibuyisa nini imali yaseNkandla. Empeleni akukho mali engizoyikhokha ngingakaze ngitshelwe ukuthi labo abanegunya ngokoMvikeli woMphakathi bachaze ukuthi yimalini ekufanele ngiyibuyise.“Kwayena uMvikeli woMphakathi akukho lapho ethi khona kumele ngikhokhe le mali yaseNkandla. Ungasho kanjani ukuthi angikhokhe imali ekubeni kwawena awazi nokuthi yimalini,” kuphendula uZuma.“Akukho lapho uMvikeli woMphakathi ethe angikhokhe khona imali. UMvikeli woMphakathi wathi uma ecabanga ukuthi kukhona lapho mina nomndeni wami sihlomule khona ucabanga ukuthi le mali ingabuyiselwa emuva. Kodwa konke lokho kumele kuqhamuke kuNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa,” kusho uZuma maqede wananelwa ihlombe.UNksz Louw obebonakala edidekile emuva kokuphendulwa nguMengameli ubuye wasukuma efuna ihlandla lesibili lokubuza umbuzo kodwa wahlaliswa phansi nguSomlomo uNkk Baleka Mbete. Umholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema obebukeka enengekile usukumile ezama ukusiza uzakwabo ngomunye umbuzo ethi uzama ukubalekela ukukhokha njengoba egwema ukuvela enkantolo ngamacala akhe avuswa yiNPA enzeka ngesikhathi eseyiPhini likaMengameli wezwe kuleli.“Okokuqala awekho amacala enginawo kodwa ahoxiswa wonke engangibekwe wona,” kuqhuba uZuma.Uthe okokuqala izincomo zikaMvikeli woMphakathi akukho lapho ezazimgweba khona noma zimshushisa njengoba abantu sebesho. Eqhuba uthe ngisho iSIU noNgqongqoshe uMnuz Thulas Nxesi wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi abakaze bathi kumele akhokhe imali noma kukhona indibilishi ahlomula ngayo kanti noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa okunguye okumele akhiphe umyalelo wokuthi kumele abuyise malini, akakasho lutho.Utshele uMalema ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi bakhona abameli eqenjini lakhe ngakho kuyomele bamsize ngezinye izinto zomthetho ukuze aqonde amanye amagama asetshenziswayo kwezomthetho.UZuma ubephendula imibuzo abuye aphele uhleko kanti uke waphendula umholi we-UDM uBantu Holomisa ihlaya ngesikhathi bebhekene ngemibuzo.UHolomisa oqale wabuza ukuthi ngabe uZuma uyazi yini ukuthi ubhekene nophenyo ngamacala akhe ahoxiswa yiNPA.UZuma uvele wamtshela ukuthi ayikho leyo nto futhi alikho icala alaziyo elibhekene naye kanti kwale noma sebebhekene noHolomisa kodwa kwacaca ukuthi kuphela amaqhinga kulo mholi we-UDM ogcine esehlala phansi.UZuma kukhona lapho ekhulume khona engasafuni nokukhuzwa kwala ngisho uSomlomo uNkk Baleka Mbete, emcela ukuthi ahlale phansi kodwa kwacaca ukuthi ucasukile ngezinto ebezilokhu zishiwo umholi weDA, uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, ngokuthi uyakubalekela ukuza ePhalamende azophendula imibuzo.Ubhekane ngqo noMaimane emchazela ukuthi akakaze yena abalekele imibuzo yePhalamende kodwa inkinga yibo abahambe bemkhuluma kabi bethi ucashile akafuni ukuzobhekana nemibuzo yePhalamende.Bekucaca ukuthi uMaimane uswele umgodi wokucasha ngoba uZuma ubembheke ngqo emkhomba esho ukuthi yini ebingamenza agweme ukuzobaphendula washo nokuthi okubi kakhulu ukuthi ubethi uma ekhuluma aphazanyiswe ngakho wathi yena angeke akwazi ukukhuluma abantu bebe bekhuluma bemphazamisa.Ngemuva kwempendulo yaseNkandla kubonakale sengathi kwehla umthwalo ePhalamende kangangokuthi imibuzo eminingi elandelile nebiphendulwa uZuma ibisipholile futhi izinto sezenzeka ngokujwayelekile, kulalelwana.
title: UZuma udide i-EFF ephendula ngeNkandla

text: ALIZIBONI lixolisa iqembu lezombusazwe iBlack First Land First (BLF) kulandela ukutholwa linecala lenkulumo enenzondo ngesiqubulo sayo esithi ‘Land or Death’.IBLF yamangalelwa nguNksz Lucy Strydom nyakanye owafaka isikhalo ngalesi siqubulo kwiSouth African Human Rights Commision (SAHRC) ethi siyinkulumo enenzondo ebhekiswe kwabamhlophe kuleli. NgoLwesibili Inkantolo Yezokulingana, eseGoli, ithole i-BLF inecala ngalesi siqubulo.IBLF inikwe inyanga ukuthi isuse isiqubulo kuyo yonke imifaniswano yayo, izinkundla zokuxhumana nakwi-website yayo. Iyalelelwe ukuthi ikhiphe nesixoliso esibhekiswe kuwo wonke umuntu eNingizimu Afrika.Okhulumela iBLF uNksz Lindsay Maasdorp uthe ngeke baxolise kunalokho bazofaka isikhalo ngesigwebo. Uthe noma betholwe benecala kufana nokuthi banqobile ngoba ngeke bakhishwe kukhetho.“Lesi sinqumo senkantolo asiphusile futhi sikhombisa ukuzibuyisela emumva kwenkantolo yemantshi. Inkantolo Yomthetho Sisekelo yasikhipha isinqumo esimayelana nokuthi yini inkulumo enenzondo” kukhuluma uNksz Maasdorp esithangamini sabezindaba ebesibizwe yiBLF eGoli.  Okhulumela iSAHRC uMnuz Buang Jones uthe bayasijabulela lesi sigwebo ngoba siqinisa ukuzinikela kwenkantolo neNingizimu Afrika kwimigomo yamalungelo abantu.
title: I-BLF ishaya phansi ngonyawo ngesiqubulo sayo

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa uthe imifuziselo etusa ubandlululo kufanele isuswe ngoba iNingizimu Afrika idinga imifuziselo ezobumba isizwe.“Uma siqamba kabusha amadolobha nemigwaqo kukhona abathi sicima umlando kodwa kufanele sikwenze lokhu ngoba sifuna isizwe esibumbene. Kufanele sizwelane nababephila esikhathini esinzima esidlule kuso,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe kumphatha kabi ukubona abantu besifazane nezingane behlukunyezwa ngamadoda wathi akusilo isiko ukuhlukumeza abesifazane nezingane.Uthei kusukela kudala abesifazane babehlonishwa, bengabaholi ngakho uhulumeni uzokwenza konke okusemandleni ukubavikela.Indikimba yalo nyaka yoSuku lwamaGugu ibithi sibungaza abaphilayo abangamagugu eNingizimu Afrika.URamaphosa uthe izwe lilahlekelwe ngabantu abayigugu abale kubo ubaba uJoseph Shabalala, umbhali * -Ahmed Dangor nabanye.Uthe baqoke amagugu aphilayo angoNkk Esther Mahlangu odume ngobuciko bamaNdebele, umculi uMadosini Latozi Mpahleni noKatrina Essau ozama ukuvikela ulwimi lwesiNluu ukuthi lungashabalali.URamaphosa uthe bangamagugu aphilayo eNingizimu Afrika, bazi umlando wabaseNingizimu Afrika emculweni, kwezobuciko nangolwimi.“INingizimu Afrika inezilwimi eziwu-11, okufanele abanikazi bazo bazikhulume ngokukhululeka. Sizoqhubeka nokuvikela ezisengcupheni yokushabalala okuyiNluu, Nama, IsiHlubi neXilobedu,” kusho uRamaphosa.UNgqongqoshe wezeMidlalo, ezobuCiko namaSiko, uMnuz Nathi Mthethwa, ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi bathole amaqhawe abo aphilayo anolwazi olunzulu ngomlando bawabonge esaphila.Uthe iCovid-19 ikhumbuze abantu ukuthi basebenzise amakhambi ukulwa nezifo.Uthe imifuziselo ezosuswa izobekwa endaweni eyipaki lapho abantu bengakwazi ukuyoyibuka khona.URamaphosa uthe luyaqhubeka ucwaningo ngokubaluleka kwamakhambi esintu ekwelapheni.Ubuye wakhala ngesikhangiso sezinwele sakwaClicks athe sikhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi kuningi okusafanele kwenziwe ukuze abantu baziqhenye.Uthe ubandlululo lwenze abantu bazenyeza ngobubona.
title: 'Ayisuke imifuziselo yobandlululo'

text: AWUKWAZI ukukhuluma ngomculo wokholo uze uqede ungalibalanga igama likaDumi Mkokstad. Lolu hlobo lomculo lungolunye oluhamba phambili kulezi zinsuku.UDumi uneminyaka engu-27, ukhulele eMgungundlovu. NgeSonto le nsizwa ihlonishwe ngendondo yombhali wezingoma zokholo emcimbini wamaCrown Gospel Music Awards, eNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre.Ukuwina kukaDumi le ndondo kungenze ngaba nesifiso sokuhlala naye ngizwe ukuthi yini emenze wathatha lo mkhakha njengoba iningi labaculi abangangaye ligxumela umculo ofana ne hip hop, kwaito, gqom’, house neminye.Ngimzame kaningi ocingweni lwakhe ngingamtholi, ngibe sengizitshela ukuthi ngizolinda yena kwazise vele baningi ozakwethu abakade befuna ukukhuluma naye. Ngithe ngizihlalele nabangani bami ngezwa ngocingo lukhala, ngabona inamba yakhe uDumi esebuyela kumina.Uqale wabingelela wabe esexolisa ngokungatholakali ocingweni ngenxa yokuba matasa. Uthe noma yikanjani ubezobuyela kimina ngoba unayo inamba yami, okuyinto agcine eyenzile.Usecele ukuthi singaxoxi ocingweni, uzozifikela mathupha emahhovisi e-Independent Media.Ngempela ngizwe ngocingo selukhala esengitshela ukuthi usefikile.Ufike egqoke kahle kucaca ukuthi uze kwinkulumo ngxoxo.Ubegqoke ibhantshi elimhlophe namateki amhlophe, wafaka ibhulukwe elimnyama nesikibha esimnyama.Kuqale kwangathi umuntu onamahloni kodwa akuphelanga sikhathi esingakanani ubesehleka futhi esekhululekile. Uthe ungene emculweni eneminyaka engu-8.“Abantu bebazi ukuthi ngiyacula kuphela kanti nginelinye ikhono lokubhala. Ngesikhathi ngingena emculweni ngase ngiqalile ukubhala izingoma. Inkinga eyenza kwangagqama lokho wukuthi inkampani engangisayine ngaphansi kwayo yangiyalela ukuthi ngibhekane nomculo ngiyeke ukubhala izingoma,” kusho uDumi.Uthe wazilandela lezo zeluleko wagxila emculweni.“Ngesikhathi ngishintsha inkampani engangiqopha kuyo, ngaqala phansi ngabhala. Ingoma yami ethi Mbize nekaHlengiwe Mhlaba ethi After Today nezinye zabhalwa yimina,” kuchaza yena.Uthe ukubhala izingoma iyona ndlela akwazi ukushumayela ngayo njengoba esindisiwe.“Anginawo amandla okuma phakathi kwabantu abaningi ngishumayele ebandleni. Kodwa ukucula nokubhala izingoma ezinye engizithatha emavesini eBhayibheli iyona ndlela engikwazi ngayo ukudlulisela umyalezo wami kubantu,” kuchaza uDumi.Uthe enye into aziqhenya ngayo manje ukusiza abaculi abasafufusa njengoba sekukhona abasizile bakwazi ukuqopha.“Ngizoqhubeka ngisize abaculi abafuna ukungena endimeni yomculo wokholo. Yize nami ngingakafiki la engifuna ukufinyelela khona kodwa sengizamile. Okwamanje ngizoqhubeka ngiphushe i-albhamu yami engiyikhiphe phakathi nonyaka,” kuchaza uDumi.Uthe kuningi akufunde endimeni yomculo, okuhle nokubi okumenze wakhula.“Okwamanje sengifuna ukungena emkhakheni wokulingisa. Sengilitholile ithuba lokwethula izinhlelo khona kwithelevishini njengoba kukhona uhlelo engilwenza ngePhasika kwiDumisa TV, oluthi Icilongo,” kuchaza yena.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe izindaba ezake zavela ukuthi uyashadelwa futhi uphila impilo yobutabane, uDumi uvele wavala ubuso wabheka phansi.“Ayikho into eyangiphatha kabi njengokuthi ngiphila impilo yobutabane. Angibazondi abayiphilayo kodwa angithandi kuthiwe ngiyinto engingeyona” kusho uDumi.Uthe ubenaye owesifazane akade ethandana naye kodwa bahlukana.Uthe bane kubo, yena ungumagcino.Uyise nonina uthe bashadile bahlala eMount Ayliff.“Ngiyazifela ngomculo wokholo kodwa uma ngizihlalele ekhaya ngike ngilalele noNasty C,” kuchaza uDumi.UDumi uthe ungumlandeli wokuqina weKaizer Chiefs.
title: Usephokophele ekulingiseni uDumi Mkokstad

text: INKONZO yesikhumbuzo seNdlovukazi uMantfombi Dlamini Zulu njengoba uqhubeka kuningi okwenzeka KwaNongoma.Phakathi kwakho sekubonakele nomdwebi wodumo uRasta ozohlonipha iNdlovukazi ngomdwebo olukhu ubatshazwe njalo ngezinga lawo. Lokhu akaqali ukukwenza njengoba enza okufanayo nangesikhathi kukhotheme iSilo samaBandla uGoodwill kaBhekuzulu.Abantu abaningi kulokhu babukeka bevumelana ngazwilinye kulokhu bethi uRasta wenza umsebenzi omuhle ngale mdwebo yakhe. Kukhona nabaphawule bathi ikhono likhona kuye inkinga nje likhetha izinsuku ngelinye ilanga livele limphike.Izithombe zakhe seziqalile ukusabalala nakwezinye izinkundla zokuxhumana okubalwa namakhasi ahlukene kaFacebook. Amakhasi kahulumeni akhona abonakale eqhakambisa umsebenzi kaRasta nokulindeleke ukuthi zilokhu zisabalale njalo lezi zithombe. Phakathi kwezicukuthwane ebezihambele nkonzo yokugcina yeBambabukhosi kubalwa abebemele iNdlunkulu yamaSwati, owayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnu Bheki Cele, uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala nabanye oNgqongqoshe bakulesi sifundazwe.
title: Kubatshazwa umdwebo kaRasta weNdlovukazi

text: UKUKHULA kweqembu lakhe kusukela efikile, kumvala izindlebe uClinton Larsen ongumqeqeshi weLamontville Golden Arrows aze agcine ebukeka sengathi akakunakile ukuthi iqembu lilahla amaphuzu esikhundleni sokuwaqoqa ngenxa yokudlala ngokulingana.Abafana Bes’thende bazihola phambili kwi-Absa Premiership ngokudlala ngokulingana njengoba bese kungokuka-11 emidlalweni engu-19 ngeSonto bebambana ngo 2-2 neBaroka FC ePrincess Magogo. I-Arrows ihleli kunombolo-10 kwi-log kodwa lokhu akumkhathazi kangako uLarsen ohlanyiswa wukukhula akubona kubadlali bakhe.Lo mqeqeshi wakhona eThekwini uzishaya isifuba ngokuthi i-Arrows ayikaze ibalwe namaqembu asengozini yezembe kusukela yena nethimba lakhe labaqeqeshi bethathe izintambo ngo-2014.Abalandeli bebhola eNingizimu Afrika bakubona njengokulahla amaphuzu ukudlala ngokulingana kodwa uLarsen ugxile kokuhlukile kodwa akuchaza njengekusasa le-Arrows.“Ngeke ngicashe ngesithupha kumbe ngisenge ezimithiyo ngithi kuyangijabulisa ukudlala ngokulingana okulokhu kusilandele kodwa akuyona yodwa into okumele ibhekwe. Kusukela ngifikile kwi-Arrows asikaze sibalwe namaqembu asezembeni. Ngiyavuma sesidlale kaningi kakhulu ngokulingana kule sizini kodwa isikhathi esiningi akukhona ukuthi yingoba thina singenawo amava kepha ukuqina kwamaqembu esibhekana nawo kwi-Premiership,” usho kanje uLarsen ngeSonto.Uthi okumkitazayo wukukhula kwabadlali nokuqhubeka kokulokhu beba ngcono njengoba isikhathi silokhu sihamba.“Sinomkhuba wokwakha amagama amasha ebholeni laseNingizimu Afrika njengoba besilokhu senza minyaka yonke. Nakulokhu sinabadlali abafana noNdwandwe (Velemseni), Buthelezi (Mzwandile) nabanye abaningi abakhulayo ngesivinini. Sineme kakhulu ngendlela esenza ngayo. Okusijabulisa kakhulu wukuthi sithi sibakhuphula laba bafana kodwa iqembu alehli. Alikho iqembu elingathi lisinenebulile kule sizini noma amabili adlule. Vele asikaze sithi sizodla isicoco kodwa sakucacisa isizini iqala ukuthi sizolwa futhi siyakwenza lokho. Aseneme ngemiphumela. Sesidlale kakhulu ngokulingana kodwa kulokho kudlala ngokulingana, ukube sishayiwe kuleyo midlalo ngabe yithina esibambe ibhuleki.”NgokukaLarsen, ukushintsha lokhu kudlala ngokulingana ngokushaya AmaZulu ngempelasonto, kungaba yiphilisi elimnandi. Uyaqonda nokho ukuthi ngeke kube lula ngoba Usuthu lusenesibhobo ngenxa yomphumela womdlalo wangomzuliswano wokuqala. I-Arrows yawuwina ngo 4-1 lowo mdlalo.
title: ULarsen ugxile kokuhlukile

text: UMENGAMELI wakuleli, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, uthe usalukhumbula kahle usuku okwadedelwa ngalo owayengumengameli wakuleli, uMnuz Nelson Mandela ayembambele umbhobho ekhuluma nabantu okokuqala.“Abantu baphuma ngobuningi bezobona le ndoda emangalisayo, eyayifihlwe ejele ngenxa yobandlululo. Ukuphuma kwakhe ejele kwenza sabona ukuthi kwasekuphelile ngobandlululo kuleli. Kwakungathi wumlingo. Ngalelo langa inkululeko yethu yayisifikile,” kusho uRamaphosa.Ubekhuluma emcimbini obuseKapa wokukhumbula usuku okwakhishwa ngalo ejele uMandela eminyakeni engu 30 eyedlule. Ekhuluma bukhoma kwi-eNCA, uthe kumele singakukhohlwa okwenziwa wuMandela kuleli, nokulwa kwakhe nobandlululo.URamaphosa uchaze usuku lwangoFebhuwari 11, 1990, uthe kwakunenhlokomo emangalisayo, kwaba sengathi umhlaba wonke awusanyakazi.Umengameli ugcizelele ukuthi ngabantu bakuleli abaqinisekisa ukuthi uMandela uyakhululwa ejele.Uthe owayengunkosikazi kaMandela, uNksz Winnie Madikizela-Mandela, wenza umsebenzi omkhulu ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi igama likaMandela alikhohlakali abantu ezweni ngesikhathi esejele.“Sihlale sikhumbula ukuthi siyisizwe esinombono. Asakhe isizwe esinobumbano. Asihlanganise ulwazi lwethu, ikhono lethu ukuze siqede ububha nokungasebenzi kwabantu kuleli. Asiqinise ezemfundo yethu, silwe nobugebengu. Silwele ukuba yisizwe esingcono, esivikela abantu besifazane nezingane,” kusho uRamaphosa.
title: Singalibali uMandela: Ramaphosa

text:
NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEU MPHAKATHI waKwaMakhutha usabisa ngokwenza le ndawo ingalawuleki uma udaba lokuhlalana kwentsha ngokuntshontshana ibulalane lungasukunyelwa phezulu. Nakuba sekuphume izidumbu kodwa akekho oseboshiwe.Izolo umphakathi uvale imigwaqo yaleli lokishi ukhala ngokusebenza kwamaphoyisa endawo njengoba kunenqwaba yentsha okuthiwa iyabulawa kodwa kungaboshwa muntu.Le ndawo kuthiwa isiphenduke “ujombigazi” ngenxa yezigameko zokuhlaselana kwentsha eqale ezikoleni njengoba isiphumele nangaphandle.Impi kuthiwa iphakathi kwabafana abahlala esigcemeni sako-1 nabahlala esigcemeni sako-7 , 8 no-6.Kuthiwa bahlezi begwazana lapho behlangana khona, abanye bayalandelwa noma sebesemtholampilo beyoqedelwa.Ngeledlule bekungcwatshwa umshayeli wamatekisi oshiswe nendlu enentombi yakhe.
