Kuthiwa iqulu labafana belifuna omunye wakwesinye isigceme lafika kukhona yena.Kuthiwa noma ebikelwa amaphoyisa awafiki endaweni yesigameko kanti uma kwenzekile kwaba khona oboshwayo ubonakala esebuyele emphakathini ngakusasa.Izolo umphakathi ububhikisha emgwaqweni ushisa amathayi, ubeke nezinguzunga zamatshe nezihlahla ufuna ubuholi obuphezulu. Bebesho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi ukufa komuntu sekufana nokunqunywa kwezinkukhu KwaMakhutha.Okhulumela umphakathi uMnuz Bhekisisa Buthelezi uthe sebekhathele ukungcwaba njalo ngezimpelasonto ekubeni amaphoyisa esonge izandla.“Okumele kucace wukuthi amaphoyisa awenzi lutho ukulungisa isimo njengoba kunabafana abancane ababulalanayo endaweni kodwa lutho ukuboshwa abasolwa. Izigameko seziningi zibikwa kodwa ayikho inqubekela phambili. Kumanje ziyabulalana ziyaphela izingane zethu. Sigcwele umgwaqo nje ngoba sikhathazekile ngalesi simo,” kusho uButhelezi.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi, uMnuz Skhumbuzo Bhengu, lithe bazokwenza leli lokishi lingalawuleki uma sebezithathela isinqumo ngalezi zigameko.“Salwa kakhulu ngezikhathi zobandlululo kule ndawo, asisafuni ukuphindela kuleso simo. Amaphoyisa kumele alusukumele phezulu lolu daba ngale kwalokho sizokwenza indawo yaKwaMakhutha ingalawuleki,” kusho uBhengu.Encwadini yezikhalo 
Isolezwe elinayo, bathe bafuna impendulo ezinsukwini eziyisikhombisa.Kuyona incwadi bakhale ngokuhlukaniswa kwaleli lokishi phakathi njengoba abaklama imingcele bafaka ingxenye yakule ndawo ngaphansi kwase-Adams, enye yangena ngaphansi kwaseNsimbini. Bathi lokhu kuklanywa komngcele kwenza intuthuko ihambe kancane KwaMkhutha ngoba bake bahlale isikhathi eside bengenawo amanzi.UMnuz Sam Khuzwayo oyinhloko yoMnyango wezokuPhepha KwaZulu-Natal obemele uNgqongqoshe uMnuz Willies Mchunu uzamile ukuwubhula umlilo, wathi udaba luzosukunyelwa.“UNgqongqoshe ngabe ukhona kule ndawo ukuzozwa izikhalo zenu kodwa ubanjwe wumsebenzi. Ukuza kwami lapha ngizoniqinisekisa ukuthi esinye sezicelo zenu, sokuba nomhlangano nongqongqoshe ukuze kulungiswe izinkinga enibhekene nazo sizwakele. Kusasa (namhlanje) sizokhipha usuku lwalowo mhlangano,” kusho uKhuzwayo.UMnuz Bheki Mngwengwe obemele iMeya yeTheku uMnuz James Nxumalo uthe nodaba lokuklanywa kwemingcele uzoludlulisa ukuze lulungiswe.UMnuz Bongani Yadi uthe cishe iphelile iminyaka engu-10 bengabhikishi kule ndawo kodwa isimo ababhekene naso bese siphoqa ukuba babhikishe.Izikole bezivaliwe ngoba bezithunyelwe imiyalezo yokuthi umphakathi uzobhikisha.Izikole ezithintekile kube yiKwazMakhutha Comprehensive, Masakhaneni High, Jaja Primary, Mkhumbi High, Magama Primary nezinye.Bekuculwa izingoma zomzabalazo abanye bephethe izingqwembe bekhala ngokubulawa kwabantu kule ndawo.Okuhlalukile wukuthi bekukhona ngisho nezingane zesikole kulo mbhikisho, nomfaniswano wesikole.
title: Bagcwale umgwaqo bekhala ngokonakele

text: KUKHALWA nkalo zonke ngokudlula emhlabeni kukaNgqongqoshe eHhovisi likaMengameli, uMnuz Jackson Mphikwa Mthembu (62), obehaqwe yiCovid-19.UMthembu uzalwe ngo-Juni 5, 1958 eWitbank (Emalahleni), eMpumalanga. Ukhuliswe ugogo wakhe nomalume, kwathi eneminyaka eyisikhombisa, wayosebenza emasimini ommbila. Wazimbandakanya nomzabalazo wabafundi ngeminyaka yama-70.Umlando uveza ukuthi ngezibhelu zabafundi ngo-1976, uMthembu wayengumholi wabafundi Elukhanyisweni Secondary, eWitbank. Ufunde waze wafika ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme waya enyuvesi iFort Hare lapho axoshwa khona ngo-1980.Waya kosebenza efemini yokusansimbi ngeminyaka yama-80 lapho akhuphuka waze wagcina esengomunye wababumbi nabaholi benyunyana iMetal and Allied Workers Union, egcine isiyiNational Union of Metal Workers (NUMSA) . Ngesikhathi sodlame lwama-80, wayengena ephuma ejele eboshwa uhulumeni wengcindezelo, ngokuvukela umbuso wangaleso sikhathi.Wagcina ephume phambili emacaleni ayethweswe wona. Uke wasebenza kwezokuxhumana emkhandlwini  owengamele amabandla iSA Council of Churches. Ngaphambi kwalokho, ngo-1988 kuya ku-1990, wayeyiphini likanobhala we-United Democratic Front (UDF) eGauteng.Ngemva kokuvulwa umlomo kwe-ANC ngo-1990, usebenze ngokuzikhandla evusa amagatsha e-ANC eWitbank. Wayengomunye babasebenzi be-ANC ababelekelela ithimba elalibambe izingxoxo kwiCodesa.UMthembu ube umkhulumeli we-ANC eMpumalanga phakathi kuka-1990 no-1994. Ngonyaka olandelayo kwaze kwaba u-1997, waba umkhulumeli kaKhongolose kuzwelonke.Ngesikhathi esifanayo wayenguNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha nemigwaqo eMpumalanga. Emva kwalokho wasebenza emakomitini eminyango kahulumeni ehlukene eSishayamthetho eMpumalanga, wagcina ebuyele kwesobungqongqoshe phakathi kukaMeyi 2008 noMeyi 2009.Kusukela ngo-2007 uMthembu ubelokhu eyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu ku-ANC. Lokhu kwambuyisela esikhundleni sokuba umkhulumeli we-ANC kuzwelonke kusuka ngo-2009 kwaze kwaba u-2014. Ngo-2016 ube esethunyelwa yinhlangano ebusayo ePhalamende lapho efike waba uSotswebhu kwaze kwaba u-2019.Ushone esenguNgqongqoshe eHhovisi likaMengameli esikhundleni aqokelwa kusona uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, emva kokhetho lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 2019.Ushiye emhlabeni abantwana abahlanu nonkosikazi wakhe uNkk Thembi Mthembu. Enye yezingane zakhe, uNokhwezi Mthembu (25) yazibulala endaweni okuhlala khona ungqongqoshe ePelican Park eCape Town ngoMashi 20, 2019.
title: Ubengalona ivukane emzabalazweni uMthembu

text: KUBE nenhlokomo emcimbini wokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho KwaZulu-Natal ngesikhathi kutheleka obengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma izolo.UZuma ufike ephelezelwa ngabaqaphi bakhe wamukelwa yiPhini likaSomlomo esiShayamthetho, uMnuz Meshack Radebe.UZuma, osanda kwesula esikhundleni sakhe njengomengameli wezwe, ubemenyiwe emcimbini.Kungakapholi maseko uZuma efikile, kube sekufika Isilo samabandla, uGoodwill Zwelithini. Sifike sabingelela sase sigebela esiteji kwaculwa ihubo lesizwe. Endaweni kaNdunankulu bekukhona uMnuz Sihle Zikalala ngoba uMnuz Willies Mchunu ubengekho.Umcimbi wayizolo ubuhanjelwe yizingqungqulu zosopolitiki okubalwa kuzo uDkt Sbu Ndebele, Dkt Ben Ngubane nalowo owake waba yiMeya yaseThekwini, uMnuz Obed Mlaba.Umcimbi uqale kahle ngesikhathi ebesihleliwe, u-10 ekuseni.Izicukuthwane ziqale ukutheleka ekuseni zihamba kukhaphethi obomvu.Ezokuphepha beziqinisiwe amaphoyisa esesha kwasani olungena ngaphakathi.Bekukhona nezintombi ebezilokhu zicula amaculo esintu. Namabutho abehuba eshaya nezaga abekhona ezokwamukela imbube.Bekukhona nekhwaya yamaphoyisa eshaye umculo ophakeme.
title: UZuma emcimbini wokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho eKZN

text: UMSAKAZI obesanda kuqashwa wuKhozi FM, uNonhlanhla ‘Mdonso’ Ngcobo, ushiye isigubhukane kulesi siteshi esilalelwa ngabantu abangaphezu kuka-7 million. Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo ongashayi eceleni ukuthi uMdonso uthathe isinqumo sokushiya ngenxa yengcindezi abeyithola.UMdonso ubejoyine uKhozi ngo-Ephreli 1 kulo nyaka, esakaza ngokuhlanganyela noZimiphi ‘Zimdollar’ Biyela, uhlelo lomculo kamaskandi, isigiya ngengoma, ngemiGqibelo. Bebezibiza ngeZimdonso uma sebenza into yabo emoyeni. Ethintwa uMdonso, ukhihle esikaNandi. “Ngisulile ngoba bese ngikhathele ukubekezela. Ngiyazi bajabule-ke ebebefuna ngishiye kulolu hlelo. Abantu bebengalwazi usizi ebengiluthwele ngenxa yokusakaza kulolu hlelo. Bengingakutholi ukuphumula ubusuku nemini ngenxa yezingcingo ebengizithola ngezinombolo ezifihliwe, ngiphoqwa, kuthiwa angisule,” kusho uMdonso. Uthe ubebabikela abaphathi besiteshi ngakho konke obekwenzeka kuye.“Bengingasakaza kanjani kade ngisatshisiwe ngayizolo? Akekho ongazi ukuthi angifuniseli ngokusakaza kodwa oKhozini bekunzima. Ngiqale ukusatshiswa ngifika, kuthiwa ngiqashwe kanjani kulolu hlelo.”Umphathisiteshi osabambile oKhozini uNksz Sbongi Ngcobo uthe akakwazi ukuphawula ngoba ubengazi ukuthi uMdonso useshiyile emsakazweni. Kodwa uMdonso ukugcizelele ukuthi incwadi yokwesula uyithumele izolo ekuseni.Eqhuba uMdonso uthe: “Ngincamela ukuhlupheka kunokuphila le mpilo ebengiyiphila selokhu ngajoyina uKhozi. Ngiyalubonga uKhozi. Ngihlukumezekile ngempela oKhozini, ngingalanyulelwa muntu,” kuchaza uMdonso owaze wamenywa phesheya kwezilwandle ePortugal ngenxa yekhono lokusakaza uhlelo lukamaskandi kuZululand 97.0 FM futhi waklonyeliswa ngendondo yeBest Community Presenter kumaSatma Awards.
title: Ukhale ngokusatshiswa osule oKhozini

text: ISIZULU sithi ziyofa izinsizwa kusale izibongo, lesi saga sifezekile nakwinkakha yomlingisi esanda kusishiya, uMary "Mampinga" Twala. Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bajabule kabi ukuzwa izindaba ezimnandi zokuthi uMampinga uyingxenye yabalingisi bakuleli ababamba iqhaza efilimini kaBeyonce ethi Black Is King. Lezi zindaba zivezwe yindodana kaMampinga, uSomizi Mhlongo-Mohale, ekhasini lakhe likaTwitter ngesikhathi efaka i-video enamanqampunqampu ale filimu. UMampinga ubonakala egqoke imvunulo yesintu futhi ephakamisela phezulu isandla. UMary (80) washonelwa esibhedlela eNatcare Park Lane eGoli ngoJulayi 4 kulo nyaka. KwiBlack Is King kuboshelwe uBeyonce, Jay-Z, Lupita Nyong'o, Kelly Rowland, Pharrel Williams, Naomi Campbell, Yemi Alade, Warren Masemola, Moonchild Sanelly, Nyaniso Dzedze, Nandi Madida.IBlack Is King isuselwe e-albhamini esihloko sithi The Lion King:The Gift, nayo esuselwe efilimini yezilwane iLion King. IBlack Is King idedelwe namuhla ngoLwesihlanu emhlabeni jikelele futhi izobuye isakazwe kuleli kuM-Net.
title: UMary Twala uzobonakala namhlanje kwifilimu kaBeyonce

text: UMlindo uthole izitifiketi okukhona kuzo ese-albhamu ethi Emakhaya edayise yaze yathola i-Platinum. Uthole amaPlatinum amabili ngengoma ethi, Amablesser.Ingoma yakhe ethi Macala apike kuyo uKwesta, Thabsie noSfeesoh idayise yafika kuPlatinum.Izingoma zikaMlindo Egoli, Usbahle nethi Emakhaya zidayise zathola igolide.“Uyazi angikholwa, ngisathukile namanje. Lona kube wunyaka omuhle ngempela kimina njengoba ngisanda kuqokwa emikhakheni ehlukene kumaSAMA kodwa manje sekuvela lokhu. Ngiyabonga angiqedi,” kusho uMlindo.Uthe konke lokhu kwenziwe wuthando alukhonjiswe ngabalandeli abathande umculo wakhe.“UNkulunkulu ube muhle njalo kimi. Ngiyabonga kuwona wonke umuntu ongixhasile endimeni yomculo. Ngibonile ukuthi niyangithanda. Ngiyabonga enkampanini engiqopha kuyo, iSony Music, abaculi engisebenze nabo, uBlaqboy, Sjava ngengoma esiyenze sonke ethi Egoli. Ngeke ngimshiye ngaphandle uDJ Maphorisa ngakho konke angenzele kona kule ndima,” kusho uMlindo.UDJ Maphorisa uthe wabona behlangana okokuqala noMlindo ukuthi uzoba ngumculi omkhulu futhi uyaziqhenya ngaye.
title: Uthukile ethola izitifiketi ngomculo wakhe uMlindo

text: Mhleli: Kwelakho elingashayi eceleni ngicela ukubeka owami umbono ngesiqeshana sendaba ekhulunywe uDlubheke eyibhekise kuTshatha ekhasini lesibili ephephen Isolezwe ngoMgqibelo.UDlubheke ukhuluma lezi zinkulumo nje phambili kunengoma yakhe ayikhipha etshela uTshatha kwezikabhoqo. Mfo kaKhuzwayo asikhulisane.Lokhu okwenzayo kubi kanti nasemculweni wakho uhlale unabantu obathukayo.Ngize ngizibuze ukuthi izwe lonke lizonda wena ngoba wenzeni wena wedwa?Bonke abantu bayakusukela? Angixabene nawe Mnguni kodwa ngizama ukukuvula amehlo ngale nto ngoba vele siyakuqonda sonke ukuth iso lixhoshwa libhekile.Kanti alukho olusina luzibuke. Yehlisa umoya nje mfowethu ucule. Uma singakashayi isikhathi sakho sokuduma soze siiyfike, hhayi ngenkani. Ungathuki bonke abantu emculweni. Kuyadida ukuthi uTshatha uthwale liphi icala kuwe ngoba akasakazi umaskandi. Asiyibhasobhe into ebulala ikusasa.Siphamandla MagwazaESHOWE
title: [IMIBONO]UTshatha woneni kuwe Dlubheke?

text: UMQEQESHI we-Orlando Pirates, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, ukufanisa nesitshulu esizoshiya abalandeli bencinda iminwe abakupheka ekhosombeni njengoba belungiselela isizini ka-2017/2018.I-Pirates ayizange iyidlale imiqhudelwano yokuzicijela ukuqala kwesizini njengezimbangi zayo iKaizer Chiefs neMamelodi Sundowns. IChiefs isivele ibakhombisile abalandeli bayo okufanele bakulindele kule sizini ngokudlala kwiBokone Bophirima Maize Cup, eNorth West, nakwiShell Helix Ultra Cup ngempelasonto edlule.Ngempelasonto Amakhosi azoyibamba kwiMpumalanga Cultural Experience Cup lapho izobhekana neCape Town City FC. ISundowns, ematasa kwiCAF Champions League, idlale kwiShell lapho inike ithuba abadlali abasha.EZimnyama ziqoke ukuyodlala namaqembu angaphandle kwaseMzansi okukhona kuwona iTP Mazembe yaseDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC). Zizovula isizini ka-2018/2019 neHighlands Park emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership e-Orlando Stadium ngo-Agasti 4.“Sizithatha sengathi sisekhishini siyapheka. Abazodla ngabalandeli, kufanele balinde ukubizelwa etafuleni. Ukudla kuzolethwa etafuleni ngo-8.15 ngo-Agasti 4. Abalinde kuze kube yileso sikhathi. Ukudla kumnandi kakhulu uma unesikhathi ukulobizela. Uma sewuke wakuzwa akube kusaba mnandi kangako. Senza konke okusemandleni ukulungisa ukudla okuzoyizayo ngokwamaphuzu nemiphumela emidlalweni esizoyidlala,” kusho uSredojevic.“Ngeke senze izethembiso ezinkulu kodwa sigxilisa imiqondo yethu kokufanele sikwenze ngoba akekho owake waphumelela ngazo. Siqoka ukuthi ibhola kube yilona elizokhuluma. Abalandeli bethu bahlale befuna ukudla okwehlukile etafuleni. Uma ubalethela okukodwa njalo abajabuli. Sifuna bahlale bejabule.”UMicho nephini lakhe uRulani Mokwena bayaqala ukwenza amalungiselelo okuqala kwesizini kwiPirates ndawonye. Bahlalelwe wumsebenzi wokuhlanganisa abadlali abebekade bevele bekhona nabasha.“Ngibonga abaphathi ngokuthi emuva kokuhambisa umbiko wethu benze okuncomekayo ukuqinisa iqembu nethimba labaqeqeshi,” kusho uSredojevic.“Kwamanje sikulungele ukuqala isizini. Kodwa ke ngokwebhola kunamabhawodi okufanele siwaqinise ukuze siyilungele ngokuphelele isizini ezoqala. Uma ubheka sizoba nemidlalo eyisishiyagalombili kusuka ngo-Agasti 4 kuya kuSepthemba. Kodwa siyakwazi okulindelwe kithina. Siqinile ngokomqomdo. Sililambele ibhola, akube yilona elikhulumayo.”Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:NgoMgqibelo (Agasti 4): Mamelodi Sundowns v Kaizer Chiefs (Loftus Versfeld Stadium, 3pm); Black Leopards v Polokwane City (Peter Mokaba Stadium, 6pm); Cape Town City FC v SuperSport United (Cape Town Stadium, 6pm); Bidvest Wits v Free State Stars (Bidvest Stadium, 6pm); Orlando Pirates v Highlands Park (Orlando Stadium, 8.15pm); AmaZulu FC v Baroka FC (King Zwelithini Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto (Agasti 4): Maritzburg United v Golden Arrows (Harry Gwala Stadium, 3pm); Bloemfontein Celtic v Chippa United (Dr Molemela Stadium, 3pm)
title: OweBucs uthembisa eyamehlo kubalandeli

text: IMARITZBURG United izodlala neMamelodi Sundowns namuhla, yazi kahle ukuthi kubhekwe ukuba ibe yimvu yomhlatshelo ngenxa yokuthi amaBrazilians afuna amaphuzu aphelele ukuze avale igebe kwiKaizer Chiefs ewashiya ngamaphuzu ayisithupha.Ukwehlulwa kweChiefs ngo 3-1 ishaywa yiBloemfontein Celtic ngoLwesithathu, kusho ukuvulela ithuba iSundowns ukuba ibuye ngemuva inqobe isicoco seligi okweshumi.Selukhona nokho ungabazane kumqeqeshi waBafana Ba Style uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane onenebulwe yiCape Town City ngo 3-2 emdlalweni wezakhe wakamuva phakathi nesonto.“Kuzoba nzima, kodwa sizoqhubeka silwe,” kusho uMosimane ngemuva kokuguqiswa yiCity.IMaritzburg iya kulo mdlalo neSundowns nayo iphuma esibhaxwini sika 3-2 ishaywa iqembu elivika izembe iBlack Leopards emdlalweni wayo wakamuva.UVincent Kobola oyiphini lika-Eric Tinkler, uthe bawulungele lo mdlalo, bafuna ukulungisa amaphutha abawenze bedlala neLeopards.Umdlalo phakathi kweTeam Of Choice neSundowns uzoba seLucas Moripe Stadium ngo-6 ntambama.“Asidlalanga neze kahle sibhekene neLeopards, mhlawumbe kudalwe ukuhlala izinyanga eziningi singadlali kodwa lokho angikusho ngoba ngizama ukubeka izaba. Asiyibongele iLeopards yadlala kahle, ayeyifanele amaphuzu amathathu. Siya kulo mdlalo sinomoya omuhle futhi sigqugquzelekile ngoba sifuna ukulungisa amaphutha ethu. Siyazi ukuthi iSundowns izoza kithina ithelwe ngezibonkolo iwafuna ephelele amaphuzu kwazise ifuna ukuvala igebe esicongweni. Kodwa nathi sifuna ukunqoba ngoba sizibekele ukuthi sifuna ukuqeda sibalwa namaqembu amahlanu phezulu,” kusho uKobola.ITeam Of Choice imincile njengoba omunye wabadlali ababalulekile ethinteke edolweni. Kungenzeka uMxolisi Kunene weMaritzburg angabonakali emdlalweni weSundowns njengoba ethinteke idolo bedlala neLeopards.“Yebo sibheke ukuthi ukuhlolwa kwakhe kuveze ukujula kokulimala kwakhe. Ngeke ngisho ukuthi uzodlala noma ngeke adlale uKunene, sizolinda imiphumela ukuthi ithini,” kusho uKobola.ISundowns kumele iqinisekise ukuthi ithola amaphuzu aphelele kwiMaritzburg, bese iphinde imincele ukuthi iStellenbosch FC siyibambele Amakhosi ngempelasonto. Sekuyothi ngo-Agasti 27 bese zitholana phezulu phakathi kwamaBrazilians naMakhosi emdlalweni ongacacisa ngesicoco seligi.Imidlalo yePremier Soccer League yangempelasontoAbsa Premiership:Kusasa - Ngo-3.30pm: Polokwane City v Highlands Park (Loftus Versfeld Stadium.Ngo-6pm: Baroka FC v Chippa United (Bidvest Stadium).NgeSonto - Ngo.3pm: Cape Town City v Orlando Pirates (Loftus Versfeld).Ngo-6pm: Kaizer Chiefs v Stellenbosch (Orlando Stadium).GladAfrica Championship:Kusasa - Ngo-1pm: Jomo Cosmos v Free State Stars (Wits Rugby Stadium).Ngo-3pm: Ajax Cape Town v Pretoria University (Rand Stadium); Real Kings v Mbombela United (Tsakane Stadium); Cape Umoya v JDR Stars (Tuks Stadium).NgeSonto - Ngo-1pm: Uthongathi v Royal Eagles (Randburg Stadium).Ngo-3pm: Swallows FC v Steenburg (Makhulong Stadium); Tshakhuma v TS Sporting (Sturrock Park); Richards Bay v TS Galaxy (Tuks Stadium).
title: Ithuba lokuvala igebe lamaphuzu kwiDowns

text: NINGASILAHLI! Lesi yisicelo sikanozinti weBanyana Banyana, uKaylin Swart, ngaphambi kokuqala kweNdebe yoMhlaba yabesifazane ezodlalwa eFrance kusukela ngoJuni 7-Julayi 7.INingizimu Afrika isiqhube imidlalo eyisishiyagalombili inganqobi kulo nyaka, okusho ukuthi uma ihluleka wukunqoba umdlalo wayo wokugcina wobungani ngeSonto, izovula kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ilengelwa yileli lifu.IBanyana izongcweka neNorway ngeSonto bese ivula iNdebe yoMhlaba neSpain ngoJuni 8. Amanye amazwe aseqoqweni nayo yiGermany neChina.“Ningasilahli. Silapha ngoba sikusebenzele. Asizelanga ukwandisa isibalo. Siyacela niqhubeke nokuseseka. Ukwesekwa esakuthola eThekwini (bedlala neJamaica) siyakujabulela. Siyathembisa sizolokhu sinijabulisa,” kusho uSwart.USwart akaqali ukuya kwiNdebe yoMhlaba. Yena noJermaine Seoposenwe babesikwatini se-Under 17 esadlala eTrinidad & Tobago ngo-2010.Uthe kusemqoka ukuthi benze kahle emdlalweni wabo neNorway ukuze kufike umdlalo wokuvula beqalabile.“Kuzoba wumdlalo onzima kodwa sifuna umphumela omuhle ngaphambi kweNdebe yoMhlaba. Uma siwuthola uzosisiza ekutheni siye emidlalweni yethu yamaqoqo sinethemba. Umdlalo wokuqala uhlezi ufana nesivivinyo. Kuzomele siye kuwona sivutha njengoba senze emdlalweni wokuqala we-Afcon sibhekene neNigeria. Yebo iSpain yiqembu eliphezulu kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi uma sidlala ngokuhlangana singamelana nayo. Umphumela womdlalo wokuqala emqhudelwaneni yiwona ocacisayo ukuthi nizohamba kangakanani,” kusho uSwart.Khonamanjalo, iqembu le-Under 20, Amajita, lizobhekana nePortugal emdlalweni weNdebe yoMhlaba namuhla. EzikaThabo Senong zishaywe ngo 5-2 yi-Argentina emdlalweni wokuqala, kwathi kowesibili zaguqiswa yiSouth Korea ngo 1-0.
title: 'Sicela niqhubeke niseseke' - unozinti weBanyana

text: AMACIKO nabezemidlalo baKwaZulu-Natal bazohleka bodwa ngesonto elizayo njengoba bezobe bekhokhelwa wuMnyango wezobuCiko, amaSiko nezeMidlalo imali yokunxeshezelwa ngezingqinambi ezidalwe yigciwane leCovid-19. Ngokwesitatimende esithunyelelwe abezindaba yilo mnyango, ukukhokhwa kweCovid-19 Relief Fund kuzoqala ngesonto elizayo. Isitatimende sithe sekuphothulwe konke ngokuhlungwa kwezicelo zamaciko nababambe iqhaza kwezemidlalo. "NgoMeyi 2020, uNgqongqoshe wezobuCiko, amaSiko, ezeMidlalo nezokuNgcebeleka, uHlengiwe Mavimbela, wamemezela ukuvula kokufakwa kwezicelo zesamba sikaR7 million sokunxephezela abezokungcebeleka nabezemidlalo. ’’Kwamukelwe izicelo ezingu862 kubantu abangabodwana, amaqembu nakwimifelandawonye, kwaphumelela izicelo ezingu470. Sezizonke izicelo zabahlomula zingu1 083 (ukhumbule ukuthi ezinye izinhlangano zifake izicelo emagameni aabangaphansi kwabo)’’. ’’Imali ezobe ikhokhwa ngokwabahluleli iphakathi kukaR4000 noR20 000." Ephawula uMavimbela uthe konke sekuya emaphethelweni futhi umnyango wakhe uyaqala ukukhokhela abafanele ukuhlomula ngesonto elizayo. "Umnyango usaxhumana nalabo okudingeka bathumele imininingwane yabo ukuze kuphothulwe izinhlelo zokubakhokhela," kusho uMavimbela. Uthe uhlelo lokuhlunga luthathe isikhathi eside kunaleso ebesilindelekile ngoba bebefuna ukuqinisekisa izinxephezelo zitholwa ngabantu abafanele. "Ngenyanga eyedlule silule isikhathi sokugcina sokwamukelwa kwezicelo ukunikeza abantu abaningi ithuba lokufaka izicelo. Ukuhlungwa kwezicelo bekufanele kucwaningisiswe yithimba labacwaningi mabhuku elizimele ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo alunagcobho futhi kulandelwe yonke imigomo." Uthe abezicelo ezichithiwe ngenxa yezizathu ezihlukahlukene bazolithola ithuba lokuzama okwesibili.
title: Bazohleka bodwa abezemidlalo nokungcebeleka KwaZulu-Natal

text: SEKUQUBUKE izindaba ezithi ibandla lamaNazaretha aseBuhleni selishintshe igama, selibizwa ngeChristian Church of eBuhleni Home.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngeSonto ngemithombo yalo engashayi eceleni ekuleli bandla, ikhulunyelwa phansi eyokuqanjwa kabusha kwebandla.Kuthiwa sekukhona nezitikha ezinaleli gama kodwa uNyazilwezulu alukamemezeli ngokusemthethweni igama elisha lebandla.Nezitikha ezinegama elisha kuthiwa kazikasatshalaliswa kubantu. Kodwa kukhona imoto yoNyazilwezulu esike yabonakala inazo.“Inkinga wukuthi abantu basaba nokuyishutha imoto yoNyazilwezulu enaleli gama ngoba kusondela abayizethenjwa zalo kuphela kuyona. Nothuke wadlula kuyona, akakwazi ukuyithwebula izithombe njengoba kugadwe abantu abakhipha izindaba zebandla.“Sithole ukuthi njengoba eseqambe ibandla kabusha uzama ukuzilungisela ukuthi uma kwenzeka ephoqwa ukusuka esihlalweni sebandla lamaNazaretha, aqhubeke nokuba wumholi webandla,” kusho umthombo.Omunye umthombo uveze ukuthi njengoba kunaleli bandla elisha eseliqanjwe, uNyazilwezulu lusikaza nokufaka indodana yalo, uMzwandile ukuthi abe ngumholi walo.“Inkinga, kukhona abangayizwa kahle indaba kaMzwandile. Bashaya amakhala nangokuthi kube negama elisha, bathi uNyazi luzokhonza kulona nomndeni walo kuphela ngoba kabazimisele ngokuyeka ukuba ngamaNazaretha. Siyabona ukuthi kakuselona ibandla lamaNazaretha leli njengoba uNyazi luhlongoza nokuqoka indodana yalo ukuthi ibe ngumholi ebandleni elisha, kanti ngokwenqubo yakwaShembe akaqokwa umholi ebe esaphila ohola ibandla,” kuqhuba umthombo.Okhulumela abaseBuhleni, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe uthe useke wezwa kukhulunywa ngegama elisha kodwa akanasiqiniseko ngalo.“Noma ngabe likhona igama elisha, kangiyiboni inkinga ngoba kuyenzeka ukuthi umuntu athole isibongo sakhe esemdala, ebe ekhule kwesinye. Nakulolu daba ngabe kwenzeke okufanayo. Engifuna ukukuqinisekisa wukuthi njengoba singamaNazaretha sabizelwa ebuNazaretheni, hhayi kwelinye ibandla.“Ngisho inkosi iNyangayezulu nenkosi uThingo bangidonsa ngendlebe, bengitshela ukuthi angomela iqiniso. Bathi abantu bayongizonda ngokumela iqiniso kodwa ngingathuki ngoba oShembe bayobe benami. Bathi noma bengithuka bayobe bengathuki mina, bayobe bethuka uShembe uqobo,” kusho uMncwabe.Okhulumela abaseThembezinhle, uMnuz Nkululeko Mthethwa uthe bebengakezwa ngokuqanjwa kabusha kwebandla laseBuhleni.“Noma singazi ukuthi lokho kuzobasiza ngani kodwa okwamanje thina sisanake indaba yomhlangano wokuya entabeni njengoba sinyukile. UJanuwari yinyanga ebalulekile kithina maNazaretha, okunye sizokubona uma sesibuyile,” kusho uMthethwa.
title: Imvunge ngegama elisha lebandla loNyazilwezulu

text: KULINDWE isinqumo sobuholi obuphezulu be-ANC kuzwelonke esizohlukanisa inhloko nesixhanti mayelana nekusasa likaNkk Zandile Gumede.Ubuholi bukazwelonke buhlanganisa uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, iPhini lakhe, uMnuz David Mabuza, uNobhala jikelele, uMnuz Ace Magashule, iPhini lakhe, uNksz Jessie Duarte, uSihlalo, uMnuz Gwede Mantashe, noMnuz Paul Mashatile uMgcinimafa, buhlangane izolo babhunga ngekusasa likaNkk Gumede oxoshwe yisigungu esiphezulu se-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.Isizathu sokuxoshwa kwakhe esabekwa yisigungu kwaba wukuthi njengoba kade eyimeya yedolobha liTheku, inhlangano ayanelisekile ngokuphatha kwakhe emkhandlwini wedolobha nangokuhanjiswa kwezidingo emphakathini.Akuyena yedwa uNkk Gumede owaxoshwa ekubeni yimeya kamasipala abewuhola. NoMnuz Themba Njilo obeyimeya yomasipala uMsunduzi wakhonjwa indlela ngakho ukuthi isigungu asigculisekile ngokuphatha kwakhe.Ngokwemibiko yaphambilini, i-ANC yakuqinisekisa ukuthi uNkk Gumede wesula emkhandlwini, okuthe kungakapheli izinsuku ezingakanani esulile, kwabikwa ukuthi useshaye ingwijikhwebu wakuhoxisa ukusula kwakhe.Okhulumela abeseka uNkk Gumede, uMnuz Mzomuhle Dube, uthe uNkk Gumede wayevele exiniwe kwasekuqaleni ngesikhathi kuthiwa akesule.“Wayevele eshilo kwasekuqaleni ukuthi akeneme ngokushiwo kuyena. Yena wayibhala incwadi kodwa umkhandlu wonke okumele uthathe isinqumo sokuthi uyavumelana ngokuthi ashiye,” kusho uDube.Uthe uma umkhandlu ungakasithathi isinqumo ngokuvumelana, uNkk Gumede uyohlale eyimeya.UDube uthe uNkk Gumede ufuna kwenziwe ubulungiswa ngodaba lwakhe.Uthe bona ngeke bakuvumele ukuthi kwakhiwe isithombe okungesona ngoNkk Gumede.
title: Ubuholi be-ANC buzonquma ngoGumede

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEI-LAMONTVILLE Golden Arrows iwuqale kabi umzuliswano wesibili weDStv Premiership ishaywa iBlack Leopards ngo-2-1 emdlalweni obusekhaya, eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont, izolo ebusuku.Kulo mdlalo amagoli eLidoda Duvha abhajiswe ezintanjeni u-Anas Mohammed ngomzuzu ka-31 nasesikhathini sikanompempe esiwombeni sesibili.Elokubika le-Arrows lishaywe ngesithende uMichael Gumede.Bekuwumdlalo wesibili i-Arrows ithola umpetshisi kwiligi. Ibifike emdlalweni indizela phezulu ngemuva kokuthi ngoMsombuluko iqophe umlando ngokuba ngeyokuqala KwaZulu-Natal ukunqoba i-Q Innovation. Idle i-Q2 yeDStv Premiership. Emidlalweni eyisikhombisa iqoqe amaphuzu awu-16.Bese kuphele imidlalo emine yeligi Abafana Bes'thende beshaya kwasani oluphambi kwabo.Baye kowayizolo bephuma ekubhaxabuleni iStellenbosch ngo-3-1.Izolo esiwombeni sokuqala, konakale izinhlelo zomqeqeshi uMandla Ncikazi, zibulawa ukuphuma ngohlaka kwesiqongqwane, uNkosinathi Sibisi ongqubuzane kabi emoyeni nonozinti wakhe uSifiso Mlungwane.Kungene uGladwin Shitolo ofike wangenza lutho.Izinto zibhimbe kakhulu esiwombeni sesibili kuphuma ngekhadi elibomvu uPule Mmodi odlalise kabi uKenneth Mthatheni seliyozilahla kunina.Kulo mdlalo, iLeopards ihlasele zisuka, i-Arrows ibilibele ukulahla amabhola kalula.Esiwombeni sokuqala lilodwa ibhola eliyingozi elicishe lashaywa uVelemseni Ndwandwe ngoka-27. Kusize unozinti weLeopards, uKing Ndlovu.Ngoka-31, kuthele izithelo ukwenza kahle kweLidoda Duvha, u-Anas eliqedela ngekhanda kade kukhahlele uLifa Hlongwane.UMumuni Abubakar noSibongiseni Mthethwa bebeyibulala yonke iminyakazo ye-Arrows esiswini.Ukufika kukaKostadin Papic ukuzolekelelana noLehlohonolo Seema, kubukeka kuzoba nezithelo ezinhle kwiLeopards ababalekela izembe.Esiwombeni sesibili, uNcikazi ufake uLindokohle Mtshali ofike wazama ukubamba isisu.I-Arrows iqalile yahlasela kubhoke uKnox Mutizwa, Michael Gumede, noMmodi.Ngemuva kokuphuma kukaMmodi, lehlile izinga layo, kwaqala phansi ukuhlasela kweLidoda Duvha.ILeopards obese kuphele imidlalo emihlanu iwukudla kwenduku, inyukele endaweni ka-15, ngamaphuzu awu-12.Ibhuleki selivalwe iMaritzburg United edonsa kanzima ngaphansi kuka-Ernst Middendorp.Kule mpelasonto kunemidlalo yeNedbank Cup, i-Arrows engasekho kuyona njengoba yakhishwa AmaZulu FC.ILeopards izobhekana naMaZulu kwiLast 16 yeNedbank Cup ngoMgqibelo.
title: I-Arrows ibuyele kwamhlaba ihlulwa elisemsileni

text: UMQEQESHI weSuperSport United, e-Eric Tinkler, uyakuchitha ukuthi kade sekukhona ukungahoshelani phakathi kwakhe nomgadli uJeremy Brockie waseNew Zealand osayine kwiMamelodi Sundowns ngoMsombuluko.UBrockie ugcine esayine kumaBrazilians emuva kwesikhathi kunezinkulumo zokuthi uzowashiya Amatsatsantsa a Pitori. Ekuqaleni kwesizini kuvele ukuthi uselungise nendawo yokuhlala bude buduze naseChloorkop lapho kuziqeqesha khona iSundowns kodwa iSuperSport yagcina yenqabile ukumdedela. Emuva kokuthi iSuperSport ihlulwe yiWits ngesonto eledlule, uTinkler usho esidlangalaleni ukuthi uBrockie akasekho eqenjini ngenxa yendlela adlale ngayo.UTinkler ubekhuluma ngesikhathi kuqhathwa amaqembu azogadulisana kwiNedbank Cup Last 32 eSandton, eGoli, ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.“Asikaze sixabane noBrockie, akukazw kwenzeke. Njengomdlali ubefuna ukudlala imizuzu engu-90 kodwa njengomqeqeshi yimina othatha izinqumo. Noma umdlali ekuthanda lokho noma engakuthandi. Eqhubeka noma engaqhubeki. Kungenzeka ukuthi yena ubebona kufanele awudlale wonke umdlalo kodwa ngaleso sikhathi mina ngibone kufanele ngenze ushintsho. Kodwa ubekuqonda lokho, asikaze sisusane,” kusho uTinkler.“Ungumdlali olisebenzele kakhulu iqembu. Ekuqaleni kwesizini ngikhulumile naye ngendaba yokuhamba ngoDisemba uma sifeza konke esizibekele khona. Njengeqembu simfisela konke okuhle. Kungenzeka ukuthi leli yithuba lokugcina lokuzenzela imali ngoba akaseyona ingane. Mayelana nesinqumo sokumgcina kule sizini ngoba usisize sawina iMTN 8, safinyelela kowamanqamu weCAF Confederation Cup, ngicabanga ukuthi kube ngesihle.”UTinkler uthe akulula ukuthola umgadli ozovala isikhala sikaBrockie. “Sekunesikhathi sibheka, sekuphele izinyanga eziyisithupha ngoba lokhu akuyona into ebingalindelekile. Kodwa ukuthola umgadli akuwona umsebenzi olula, ikakhulukazi ozoshaya amagoli. Baningi abagadli kodwa uma ubheka amagoli abawashayile uzobona ukuthi ababaningi. Ngakho asifuni ukujaha, sifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi umuntu esimlethayo uyena yena. Yebo sidonsa kanzima phambili ngenxa yokulinyalelwa abadlali, uGrobler (Bradley) usalimele, kodwa kufanele siqaphele ukuthi le nto siyenza kanjani. Noma ubani esimlethayo uzowenza umsebenzi."ISuperSport, engompetha beNedbank Cup, itomule iBloemfontein Celtic kowe-Last 32. Iqophe umlando ngokuba yiqembu lokuqala elivikele iNedbank emuva kweminyaka engu-10 le mkampani yaqala ukuxhasa kwiPremier Soccer League.“ICeltic sidlalile nayo kwiTelkom, sadedela ithuba sesihamba phambili ngo 2-0 sagcina sihlulwe kumaphenathi. Kodwa-ke yithina ompetha, sesiyiwine kabili kulandelana iNedbank. Njengeqembu sifisa ukuyiwina okwesithathu. Ngicabanga ukuthi yikhona okuzosigqugquzela,” kusho uTinkler.ISuperSport izovakashela iMaritzburg United emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu, namuhla ngo 7.30 ebusuku.
title: Uchitha eyokungahoshelani kwakhe nomgadli uTinkler

text: ITHIMBA leSolezwe libambisene nabakwaNestle' lifisa ukujabulisa bonke omama ngosuku lwabo kulo nyaka.Landela imiyalelo esikhangisweni ungalibali ukuphinde ulandele Isolezwe emakhisini alo ezinkundleni zezokuxhumana ukuthola imininingwane ezokusiza ekuphepheni nasekulweni nobhubhane lwecoronavirus.Sikhona kwiFacebook [@Isolezwe, @Isolezwe_ngoMgqibelo & @Isolezwe_ngeSonto], kwiTwitter [@IsolezweNews] nakwi-Instagram.Ningakhohlwa nokusiTHEGA nxashana nephanyeka nezithombe zenu ukuthi nilugubha kanjani #UsukuLomamaNeSolezwe esikhathni esinzima #Somvalelandlini.Kulele kini njengembokodo bomama ukuphepha kwemindeni yenu ngalesi sikhathi njengenjwayelo.Sinifisela usuku lomama olunentokozo nokuphepha.
title: Sifisela bonke omama usuku olubusisekile

text: UTHENJISWE ukufakelwa izigxobo ezizowuvikela kumphezulu umndeni oshonelwe ngempelasonto eMkhanyakude ngesikhathi kuduma izulu kuba nesiphepho.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi uNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoBuholi boMdabu, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, evakashele lo mndeni ngoMsombuluko. Kulo mndeni kushone uMxolisi Mthembu (14), waseBiva eJozini, oshaywe umphezulu ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule. UMxolisi, obefunda uGrade 6 eBiva Combined, kuthiwa wayehleli nonina ngesikhathi kuhlasela umphezulu.UHlomuka, obehamba noMnuz Themba Njilo onenhlangano esiza abahlwempu, uthembise ukuthi bazolekelela ngayo yonke indlela emindenini eshonelwe. Utshele umndeni kaMxolisi ukuthi uzofakelwa izigxobo ezizowuvikela kumphezulu ukugwema ezinye izehlakalo ezifana nokwenzeke ngempelasonto. Kulo mndeni kulimale nomfowabo kaMxolisi, okuthiwa useyalulama.Uninakhulu kamufi, uNkk Ruth Myeni, uthe kubanike ithemba ukufika kukangqongqoshe.“Sihlele ukumfihla ngeSonto umfana, ungqongqoshe uthembise ukuthi bazolekelela. Asibuzanga imininingwane yokulekelela kodwa sijatshuliswe yikona lokho,” kusho yena.Uthe umfana osindile welama umufi.“Usathukile ngoba nasebusuku akalali kahle. Emzimbeni ubukeka engenalutho ngoba uyile ngisho esikoleni,” kusho yena.Umonakalo udaleke kusukela ngoLwesihlanu ezifundeni uMkhanya-kude, uMzinyathi naseKing Cetshwayo. Kukhona ababili abashaywe wumphezulu ngoLwesihlanu edolobheni eMkhuze kwashona uMnuz Nhlakanipho Ndlovu (33) noMnuz Bheki Zulu waseBhanganono kuMasipala waKwaNongoma. Kuphinde kwashona umfundi waseMavela High eJozini, uPaki Dlamini (19) obefunda uGrade 12 okuthiwa washaywa wumphezulu ngoMgqibelo engena esangweni lakubo ephuma esitolo. Ayehamba nabo abathintekanga kulesi sigameko.Uninalume kamufi, uMnuz Dumisani Dlamini, uthe abakahleli lutho ngamalungiselelo omngcwabo ngoba basalinde isitifiketi sokufa. Uthe uma kuhambe kahle kungenzeka bangcwabe ngempelasonto.Umnyango uxwayise abantu wathi abahlale beqaphile njengoba selizojwayela ukuduma ngoba kusehlobo. Ungqongqoshe uthe amathimba abo ezinhlekelele azohlala eqaphile alekelele uma kunezimo eziphuthumayo wanxusa nabantu ukuthi babheke izexwayiso ngesimo sezulu.
title: Usizo kwabamoshwe wumphezulu

text: ISOUTH African Airways (SAA) isimemezele ukumiswa kokusebenza kwezindiza ngoLwesine kuya kuLwesihlanu njengoba izinyunyana zisabise ngokutelekela amaholo abasebenzi. ISAA ikhiphe lesi simemezelo ngoLwesine, lapho ecacise khona ukuthi izindiza ezihambela ekhaya, izifundazwe nasemazweni aphesheya  zizobe zingasebenzi. Izinyunyana iSouth African Cabin Crew Association (SACCA) neNational Union of Metal Workers of South Africa (Numsa) ziveze ngoLwesithathu ukuthi zizoteleka kanye nabasebenzi ngoLwesihlanu ekuseni. Lesi siteleka silandela ngemuva kokuthi iSAA imemezele ukuthi izodiliza abasebenzi abangu-944 ukuze yonge imali. Umengameli weSacca uZazi Sibanyoni uthe abasebenzi bafuna iholo linyuke ngo-8%, kuphinde kuqinisekiswe imisebenzi yabo ngokweminyaka emithathu. USibanyoni uthe abasebenzi bakholelwa ekutheni iSAA ingabasiza ngezimfuno zabo. ISAA ithe iNational Transport Movement ibingakavezi ukuthi amalungu ayo azohlanganyela yini kwisiteleka.  Okhulumela iSAA uTlali Tlali uthe kuzophazamiseka izindiza zeSAA kuphela. "Sibeka amakhasimende ethu phambili futhi siyaxolisa ngokuphazamiseka kwamakhasimende okuzodalwa ukumiswa kwezindiza. Kodwa iSAA izokwazi ukusiza amakhasimende asebenzise ezinye izindiza. Uma amakhasimende engawenzanga amanye amalungiselelo, siyawacela ukuba angayi ezikhumulweni zezindiza njengoba kusekhona ukuphazamiseka. ISAA ngeke ikwazi ukubasiza. Ulwazi ngezindiza zeSAA luzofakwa kwi-website yethu ngokuhamba kwesikhathi,” kusho uTlali.UTlali uthe ngesikhathi kusaqhubeka izingxoxo nezinyunyana, iSAA yathembisa abasebenzi ukunyusa iholo ngo-5,9%, ngombandela wokutholakala kwemali kubabolekisi.“Izingxoxo zokuxazulula udaba lweholo zisaqhubeka. ISAA izosebenza nezinyunyana ukuthola isisombululo esizozwakala kahle kubasebenzi, kubuye ukusebenza kwezindiza kwiSAA.” kusho uTlali.  Uthe iSAA izolokhu isibhekile isimo futhi amakhasimende azokwaziswa ngoshintsho olukhona njalo ngosuku.
title: Kume ukusebenza kwezindiza kwiSAA

text: UMHOLI we-IFP Youth Brigade osanda kuqokelwa ukuhola ikomiti elibheka ukusebenza kwemali ePhalamende ushaqekile ngowesilisa omhlambalaza enkundleni yokuxhumana ethi wayethandana naye emhlukumeza.UMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa osehola iStanding Committee on Public Accounts (Scopa), uzwakalise lokhu ngemuva kokuba lo mlisa ozibiza ngoThato ebematasa kusuka ngesonto eledlule kuTwitter ethi uHlengwa akabatshele abantu ukuthi wayemhlukumeza iminyaka emithathu bethandana.Uthe uyamazi owesilisa kodwa akacacisanga ngobudlelwane babo.“Ngiyazi ngalezi zinsolo azenzayo kodwa ngicela kucace ukuthi azilona iqiniso. Empeleni sekuphele iminyaka emibili engihlukumeza. Sengithathe isinqumo sokuba udaba ngiludlulisele kubameli ukuze ngikwazi ukulufaka enkantolo okuyilapho ngizoziphendulela khona,” kusho uHlengwa.UThato sekuphele iminyaka emithathu ebhala kuTwitter ngezinsolo zokuhlukunyezwa wuHlengwa kodwa akekho omphendulayo.Kuleli sonto eliphelile unqume ukubhala kuyo le nkundla exhumana nabaholi okungoMnuz Fikile Mbalula, Mnuz Julius Malema nabanye abadumile ethi uHlengwa akabatshele iqiniso ukuthi kade ayemhlukumeza.“Mkhuleko Hlengwa tshela abantu ukuthi kade wawungihlukumeza iminyaka emithathu sithandana. Abanye abaholi be-IFP kade ngangibabikela kodwa bayangiziba abanye sebengivale nakuTwitter. Okuxakayo i-IFP yayimandla ilwa noMduduzi Manana ithi akasule ePhalamende ngoba wayesolwa ngokuhlukumeza kodwa kuwe ayisho lutho. Uhluleka ukutshela abantu nokuthi uyisitabane futhi usuthandana nomlingisi weGenerations wesilisa obuye ethule uhlelo lwezindaba (eligodliwe igama lakhe) ebeningisabisa naye,” kusho uThato. Uma ebhala uyakuqinisekisa ukuthi i-akhawunti abhala ngayo kuTwitter akuyona eyangempela kodwa ofuna ukuxhumana naye akambhalele ngasese amnikeze imininingwane yangempela.Lo mlingisi Isolezwe lizamile ukumthinta kodwa akatholakalanga kanti nomphathi wakhe uthe usehlulekile ngoba ubembikele wathi akathinte Isolezwe.Ngaphandle kwalokho, uThato ugcine esefaka kuTwitter inkulumo yabo noHlengwa eqoshiwe kwiselula lapho uHlengwa ezwakala exolisa khona kodwa izwi likaThato alizwakali.Ubuye wafaka nenkulumo yabo nenkosi uMzamo Buthelezi oyiphini likamengameli we-IFP ozwakala encengela uHlengwa ethi kulo mlisa akehlise umoya.Inkosi uMzamo ithe empeleni ibingamncengeli uHlengwa kodwa nguThato owayeyishayela ucingo engayitholi.“Okokuqala angihlangani nempilo kaHlengwa yangasese ngakho uma usuthi bengincenga uThato kusho ukuthi awuwufundanga kahle umyalezo ebengimbhalele wona. UThato wangifonela, ngabuyela kuye nokuyinto engasho ukuthi ngangimncenga. Okunye nina bezindaba kungani ningazibuzi ukuthi yini le nto iqhamuke manje ngoba uHlengwa eseqokelwe ukuhola iScopa ePhalamende? Lo muntu ubethuleleni yonke le minyaka futhi yini icala engalivuli emaphoyiseni?,” kubuza uButhelezi oqede wathi akanayo ngisho inombolo kaThato akayigcinanga ocingweni.Omunye umholi we-IFP ocele ukungadalulwa uthe lolu daba lubucayi futhi bonke abaholi bayalwazi ngoba lo mlisa ozibiza ngoThato usefonele wonke umuntu eqenjini.UHlengwa uhalaliselwe nxa zonke njengoba ebe ngowokuqala omncane ukuhola leli komiti elifana nenkantolo eminyangweni kahulumeni nakongqongqoshe ngokuthi basuke beyisebenzise kanjani imali.
title: Owe-IFP ubhoboka ngezinsolo zokuhlukumeza owesilisa 'bethandana'

text: SEKUQUBUKE indida ngokuhlaselwa kuphindelelwa komuzi onamabhizinisi amatekisi, kushiswe umuzi izimoto kwadutshulwa namalungu omndeni, ngoLwesine ngesonto elidlule.Lo mndeni wakwaNgcobo waseKhobongwaneni, eTaylors Halt, ngaphandle kwaseMgungundlovu, ushiselwe umuzi nemoto gezintatha zangoLwesibili ngeledlule ngaphambi kokuthi uphinde uhlaselwe ngoLwesine kwashiswa izimoto, kwadutshulwa owesilisa nowesifazane okuthiwa bangamalungu omndeni.Owesifazane kuvele ukuthi udubuleke ekhanda washonela endaweni yesigameko, owesilisa waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela elimele.Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo baka-ER25 uMnuz Russel Meiring, uthe akukho abebengakwenza ukusiza lo wesifazane.Isolezwe izolo lishayele ilungu lo mndeni ucingo elicele ukungadalulwa, livumile ukuthi baphinde bahlaselwa izolo, emuva kokuba behlaselwe nangoLwesibili.“Okwamanje sisakhuluma nabaphenyi, impela sesiphinde sahlaselwa. Kushisiwe khona nobulewe,” kusho leli lungu lomndeni ebelizwakala lithukile.Lezi sigameko kuthiwa siwuthusile umphakathi wakule ndawo njengoba kungaziwa ukuthi kungani lo mndeni uhlaselwa. Ilungu lomphakathi elithinte Isolezwe ngalolu daba lacela ukungadalulwa ngenxa yokuba bucayi besimo lithe bathukile endaweni.“Asazi noma imizi yethu nayo izohlaselwa ishiswe yini. Okwenza sisabe wukuthi asisazi isizathu sokushiswa kwawo, asazi noma kunempi ephakwayo yini. Izimpi zike ziqale kanjena, kugcine kuhlaselwa wonke umuntu,” kusho ilungu lomphakathi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uziqinisekisile izigameko zombili wathi izolo amalungu omndeni amahlanu abehamba ngemoto adutshulwe esezofika ekhaya.“Kushone owesifazane ona-27 , owesilisa ona 23 udubulekile. Kushiswe izimoto ezine, amatekisi amabili nezincane ezimbili. Kuvulwe icala lokubulala, elokuzama ukubulala, nelokucekela phansi impahla,” kusho uCapt Gwala.Kwenzela lesi sigameko nje esikhathini esidlule Isolezwe like labika ngokubulawa kwelungu lalo mndeni eladutshulwa eMbali, uMnuz Abel Ngcobo ngo-2017. Kwakusolwa udlame lwamatekisi ngokubulawa kwakhe kwazise wayengumnikazi wamatekisi, nesikhulu se-Elandskop Taxi Association.Ngo-Okthoba ngonyaka odlule kubulawe uMnuz Mawele Ngcobo nendodana yakhe Mnuz Vezokuhle Ngcobo. UMawele Ngcobo ubephinde abe yinduna yakule ndawo.Ngaphambi kwalokhu Isolezwe labika kabanzi ngokudutshulwa komfana wakulo muzi uMlindeli Ngcobo (17), owadutshulwa yiphoyisa lesifazane elalizithwele uConstable Hlengiwe Mkhize (31) ngo-2013.UConstable Mkhize wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-15, kwalengiswa emihlanu ngecala lokubulala.
title: Uvalo umndeni uhlaselwa kushiswa umuzi nezimoto

text: ABAMELI boMvikeli woMphakathi u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane batshele iNkantolo eNkulu eNorth Gauteng ukuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa uvumela ukulawulwa uNgqongqoshe wezamaBhinizisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan.U-Advocate Dali Mpofu, obemele uMvikeli woMphakathi, uthe u-Advocate Mkhwebane waphakamisa ukuthi uRamaphosa athathele uGordhan izinyathelo ngokuvumela owayeyiphini likaKhomishana weSARS, uMnuz Ivan Pillay, ukuthi athathe umhlalaphansi kungakashayi isikhathi kodwa kwangenzeka.NgoMeyi nonyaka u-Adv Mkhwebane wakhipha umbiko wokuthi kwakungamele uGordhan agunyaze umhlalaphansi kaPillay ngo-2010.Ngalesi sikhathi uGordhan wayenguNgqongqoshe wezeZimali.Ummeli kaRamaphosa, u-Advocate Hamilton Maenetje SC, uthe uMengameli ulandele imithetho ngezincomo zika-Adv Mkhwebane.Uthe ukulinda uGordhan ukuba adlulise lolu daba enkantolo yena engakamthatheli izinyathelo, yikhona okusemthethweni.Ummeli kaGordhan, u-Advocate Michelle Le Roux, naye usho okufanayo ukuthi kuncane kabi umengameli abengakwenza ukuthathela uGordhan izinyathelo njengoba ungqongqoshe ubesaludlulisele enkantolo lolu daba.UMpofu uthe kumele isizwe silinde ngenxa kaGordhan.“Isizwe sonke kumele ngempela silinde iminyaka emine noma emihlanu, kuze kube uGordhan noRamaphosa baphume ezikhundleni zabo engakaze athathelwe izinyathelo ezifanele uGordhan. UGordhan uyena olawula ihhovisi likaMengameli, uyena omtshelayo ukuthi yenza lokhu,” kusho uMpofu.
title: ‘URamaphosa ulawulwa uGordhan’

text: 'YENZE kahle impela iPremier Soccer League (PSL) yaletha umdlalo wamanqamu eThekwini”. Lokhu kushiwo umqeqeshi weCape Town City, uBenni McCarthy, ngemuva kokunqoba kwezakhe isicoco seMTN8 zishaya iSuperSport United ngo 4-1 sekukhahlelwa amaphenathi. Lo mdlalo obuseMoses Mabhida Stadium uphele ngo 0-0 kwangaba khona oshaya igoli nasesikhathini esengeziwe.UMcCarthy ungene emabhukwini omlando enqoba isicoco sokuqala njengomqeqeshi, waphinde wanqobisa iCity isicoco sayo sesibili selokhu yasungulwa eminyakeni emithathu.Lo mqeqeshi oke wadlalela iBafana Bafana amahlandla angu-31, uthi iPSL akufanele nakancane isolwe ngokuyisa umdlalo wamanqamu weMTN 8 eThekwini, nakuba kusuke omkhulu umsindo ngesikhathi kukhishwa isimemezelo emasontweni ambalwa edlule.Bese kukhona nezinkulumo zokubhuqa ezithi, iPSL ayivele yenze iMoses Mabhida Stadium inkundla yokudlalela imidlalo yamanqamu kuleli, ngoba ezinye izinkundla zikhala ngaphansi. Bekukhona namanye amaziko ezindaba abekhala esifanayo, ebuza ukuthi kungani iTheku lihleze ligixabezwa ngemidlalo yamanqamu, ekubeni zikhona ezinye izinkundla ezingenza umsebenzi oncomekayo.“Ngifisa ukuncoma iTheku, ngokuphuma ngobuningi balo. Ngijabule kakhulu ngokuthi iPSL nabaxhasi (okunguMTN) banikeze iTheku lo mdlalo wamanqamu. Uma nje ngingakhuluma iqiniso, angikhumbuli mina ngisengumdlali noma sengiwumqeqeshi ngidlala umdlalo eThekwini, inkundla ingagcwali. Ngisho nabezindaba baphuma ngobuningi babo. Ngiyasola kukhona impela okuthize la eThekwini okwenza abantu belithande ibhola. Hlawumbe kungenzeka ukube woshisa nyama kodwa ngijabule ngeTheku futhi angikhali ngalutho,” usho kanje uMcCarthy obumbona ngisho ebusweni ukuthi ulizwa ngaphakathi iTheku labantu.Ziye kulo mdlalo, abaqeqeshi bobabili uKaitano Tembo opheka Amatsatsantsa A Pitori, noMcCarthy befuna ukubeka umdlalo wokunqoba lesi sicoco bengabadlali, bephinde basinqobe sebengabaqeqeshi. UTembo unqobe lesi sicoco ngo-2004 sisabizwa nge-SAA Supa 8, kanti uMcCarthy usidle ngo-2011 esagijima kwi-Orlando Pirates. UMcCarthy uthe uyazwelana kakhulu noTembo.“Okumenzile nami kwangenza ngesizini edlule sehlulwa kowamanqamu. Uzodlula esimeni esangenza ngesizini edlule, ukuphoxeka usuzitshela ukuthi uzobeka umlando. Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi uzobuya ngamandla ngoba unabadlali abafuna ukumdlalela. Angikusho lokhu ngoba nakhu senginqobe isicoco sami sokuqala. Kuzofanele azibukisise, alungise amaphutha, nakanjani kuzogcina kumlungele njengoba kwenzekile kumina,” kusho uMcCarthy.
title: Uncome iPSL ngeMTN8 eMabhida

text: SEKUPHELE isonto isimo sishubile eBulwer emuva kokuba abanye abantu bakhona bevale umgwaqo uR612 ohlanganisa iBulwer noMgungundlovu bebhikisha kwama yonke into.Kuthiwa kuphazamiseke nomphakathi waseXobho, Donnybrook nase-Underberg ngenxa yemibhikisho.Umphakathi ukhononda ngokushoda kwamanzi nokungalungiswa komgwaqo okuthiwa unesikhathi eside uyibhuqu usola neMeya kaMasipala iDr Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma ngokungazinaki izimfuno zawo.Ikhansela eBulwer, uMnuz Victor Phoswa, lithe isimo sisashubile ngoba kuphazamiseke yonke into. Ngesikhathi sokuloba uPhoswa ubesemhlanganweni namanye amakhansela nezimeya ukuzama ukuthola isisombulolo.“Okubi wukuthi imibhikisho isihambisana nodlame ngoba sekushaywa nezimoto zabantu. Isimo sibi kakhulu ngoba sesiside isikhathi kunemibhikisho. Sithole ukuthi uNgqongqoshe uHlomuka (Sipho) uthe okwamanje akazongenelela ngoba udaba kusamele luxazululwe yizinhlaka zomphakathi.”UPhoswa uthe iMeya, uNkk Ngeneleni Mcwabe, izamile ukuzobhula umlilo emphakathini kodwa isimo saba ngaphezu kwamandla. Uthe kudingeke ukuthi kuhlangane zonke izinhlaka nobuholi bomphakathi ukuze kubonakale ukuthi yini abazoyidlulisela emphakathini othukuthele. Ukuqinisekisile ukuthi umphakathi ukhala kakhulu ngokungalungiswa komgwaqo nokushoda kwamanzi.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana noBuholi boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Lennox Mabaso, uthe ikhona imizamo yokuxazulula izinkinga. UHlomuka uthumele ithimba ukuze kube nezingxoxo nomphakathi nobuholi bawo.“Inkinga yamanzi ikhungethe isifundazwe sonke futhi iseqhulwini kungqongqoshe. Abantu kumele bazi ukuthi inkinga yamanzi ngeke ilunge ngosuku olulodwa. Esikwenzayo wukuthola izixazululo zesikhashana. Okwamanje kwakhiwa amadamu amaningi azoxazulula inkinga yamanzi unomphelo,” kusho yena.Ulinganise ngedamu iMkhomazi Water Scheme athe ukwakhiwa kwalo kuzoxazulula inkinga yamanzi esifundeni iHarry Gwala.
title: Imibhikisho yenze isimo sashuba eBulwer

text: UMPHAKATHI waseGreater Edendale, eMgungundlovu, ukhale ngokwanda kwamathaveni iningi lawo angekho emthethweni, wathi anomthelela ekudlangeni kobugebengu endaweni yawo.Umphakathi wakule ndawo enkulu efaka iDambuza, Mbali, Caluza naKwaMpumuza ethule izikhalo zawo kwiziphathimandla zamaphoyisa embizweni ebisehholo lo mphakathi KwaCaluza izolo. Inkosi yesizwe sakwaZondi KwaMpumuza, uNsikayezwe Zondi, ikhale kakhulu ngezindawo zokucima ukoma ezivula kuze kube ngo-4 entathakusa.UZondi uthe buningi ubugebengu obenzeka emathaveni benziwa abantu abasuke sebeqiwe yizimbiza zikaFaro.“Siyacela abomthetho bayisukumele le nto yezindawo zokucima ukoma ezingavali. Lezi zindawo izona ezisandisela ubugebengu ezindaweni zethu,” kusho uZondi.UMnuz Bheki Ngubane waKwaCaluza usole amaphoyisa asesiteshini sabo iPlessislear, wathi awawenzi umsebenzi.Omunye wesifazane osekhulile ukhale ngokuthi amaphoyisa ahlale ebatshela ukuthi izimoto azikho kodwa ajola ngazo ngaphansi kwezihlahla.UNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, unxuse umphakathi ukuba ungazifukameli izigebengu, wathi lokho kubhebhethekisa ubugebengu.“Abantu bayahlala nesigebengu besazi kodwa bangawatsheli amaphoyisa ngoba besisaba,” kusho uKaunda.Uncome uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Bheki Cele, naye obekhona embizweni wathi kusukela kwasungulwa ithimba elibhekelele ukubulawa kosopolitiki ukhona umehluko.Ephendula izikhalo zomphakathi, uCele ukhwele wadilika emaphakathini, wathi nawo unesandla ebugebengwini ngoba uthenga izimpahla zokwebiwa.“Nina niyimakethe yezigebengu ngoba inina enithenga izimpahla ezintshontshiwe, kuzomele siqale umkhankaso singene emzini yenu sifune iziliphu zazo zonke lezi zimpahhla eninazo,” kusho uCele. Uthe umphakathi futhi iwona oyizimpimpi zezigebengu. “Siyazi ukuthi lapha kunina kukhona abazohamba beyotshela izigebengu ukuthi besithini, hambani nizitshele ukuthi asizesabi sizobhekana nazo,” kusho uCele.Uphinde wagxeka nebhodi leli elikhipha izimvume zokudayisa utshwala emathaveni, wathi nalo linesandla ekunyukeni kwezinga lobugebengu.Uthe amabhuku abo abatshela ukuthi ubugebengu obuningi benzeka emathaveni nasezindaweni eziseduze kwawo.“Abantu balapha abanalo uzwelo, bayabulala kakhulu futhi bayadlwengula,” kusho uCele.Uphinde wathembisa ukuthi bazosiqeda nya isihlava sokubulawa kosopolitiki KwaZulu-Natal.
title: Umphakathi ukhale ngokwanda kwamathaveni

text: BANGU-240 abantu asebebulewe yisifo esitholakala ekudleni, ilisteriosis kusukela ngo-Januwari 1 kuze kube nguMeyi 10.Esitatimendeni isikhungo esibhekelele ukuqubuka kwezifo, iNational Institute for Communicable Disease (NICD) iveze ukuthi zingu-1 033 izigameko ze-listeriosis esezibikiwe kodwa siyehla isibalo sabaphathwa yilesi sifo selokhu kwahoxiswa inyama egayiwe yakwa-TigerBrands ezitolo.Abe-NICD bathe kusukela ngoMashi 4, zingu-64 izigameko ze-listeriosis ezintsha esezibikiwe.EGauteng bangu-379 abantu abaguliswe yi-listeriosis kwashona abangu-106.Kulandela iWestern Cape nabangu-114 abaguliswa yilesi sifo sabulala abangu-30, KwaZulu-Natal sigulise abangu-63, sabulala abangu-21.INorthern Cape egulelwe ngabayisithupha yashonelwa ngabathathu.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo, uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi waveza ukuthi i-listeriorisis igulisa kakhulu abantu abasemadolobheni ngoba yibona abathenga kakhulu inyama egayiwe uma kuqhathaniswa nabahlala ezindaweni zasemakhaya.Abe-NICD bathe isimo basiqaphe ngeso lokhozi futhi uMnyango wezeMilo, owezoHwebo neziMboni, owezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, owezoLimo iyasebenzisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isimo sibuyela kwesijwayelekile.Ummeli olwela amalungelo abantu abahlukunyezwa yizinkampani ezinkulu, uMnuz Richard Spoor uthe, liyaqhubeka icala lokuthi inkampani ekhiqiza inyama egayiwe yakwa-Enterprise, iTiger Brands ihlawule abalahlekelwe yizihlobo nabaguliswe yimikhiqizo yayo.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kwabakwaTiger Brands ayiphumelelanga izolo njengoba bengayiphendulanga imibuzo abathunyelelwe yona.Abakwa-Tiger Brands babegcine bethe bayazi ngecala likaSpoor kodwa okwamanje abakwazi ukusho ukuthi abafuna isinxephezelo bazothola malini kodwa uma abantu beguliswe wukudla kwakwa-Enterprise bazonxeshezelwa.
title: Ibhubhise u-240 wabantu i-listeriosis

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezokuXhumana uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane nowezeMidlalo uNkk Tokozile Xasa bafinyelele esivumelwaneni nePSL sokuthi ivumele iSABC ukuba isakaze yonke imidlalo yebhola kuzo zonke iziteshi zomsakazo izolo, kusukela namhlanje.Lesi sivumelwano senziwe izolo ebusuku emuva kokuthi abalandeli bebhola besihlabile isinqumo seSABC sokungayisakazi imidlalo yebhola eziteshini zomsakazo.“Siyaxolisa kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokubanyusela umoya ngesinqumo esimenyezelwe yiSABC. Siyathembisa ukuthi kusukela kusasa (namhlanje) yonke imidlalo yebhola izosakazwa njengokujwayelekile eziteshini zomsakazo zeSABC,” kusho uMokonyane.Ngesikhathi kusayinwa isivumelwano bekukhona noSihlalo wePSL uDkt Irvin Khoza, uSihlalo weBhodi lakwaSABC uDkt Bongumusa Makhathini nabanye.Khonamanjalo, izolo iSouth African Football Association (Safa) idalule ukuthi ayisezukuyisakaza kuthevishini imidlalo yeBafana Bafana neBanyana Banyana.Ngokusho kwesikhulu esiphezulu kwiSafa, uDennis Mumble, iSABC ikweleta le nhlangano eyengamele unobhutshuzwayo kuleli imali engaphezulu kukaR50 million esivumelwaneni abebenaso esiphele ngo-Ephreli nonyaka.Phambilini iSABC ibinqume ukuthi ngeke isakaze imidlalo yebhola ngenxa yokungavumelani ngenkontileka entsha nePSL.Isivumelwano sokusakaza imidlalo yebhola sizosiza ngoba besekuzophazamiseka ezokukhangisa njengoba ezemidlalo zithola isikhathi esiningi ngezimpelasonto.UNkk Mokonyane uthe bekungeke kulunge ukuthi iSABC ingayisakazi imidlalo ngoba kwenziwa izinhlelo ngaphambi kokuthi kuqale isizini. Izinhlelo ezenziwayo ngezezikhangiso, ezokuhlala emahhotela ahlukene kwabasakaza ibhola nokunye.
title: Seyizosakazwa imidlalo yebhola kwaSABC

text: UMENGAMELI waseNingizimu Afrika uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa usebenzise inkonzo yokuvalelisa obenguMengameli waseZimbabwe uMnuz Robert Mugabe (95) ukuxolisa kubantu base-Afrika ngesenzo sokuhlaselwa kwabokufika eNingizimu Afrika.UMugabe ushonele eSingapore lapho abelashwa khona emuva kokuxinwa wukugula isikhathi eside.Ube ngumengameli iminyaka engu-37 selokhu izwe lathola inkululeko. Inkonzo yokumvalelisa ibisenkundleni iRufaro enhlokodolobha yezwe, iHarare.URamaphosa uke wathwala kanzima ngaphambi kokuqala inkulumo yakhe abantu bevuka indlobane bengafuni akhulume kwaze kwaphoqeka ukuthi kungenelele abaseZimbabwe, bakhuze abantu.Emuva kokuba bekhuziwe bathe ukuthula kancane. Akachithanga sikhathi washweleza ethi akahambisani nokuxoshwa kwabokufika.Kubukeke sengathi kuyamsiza lokho ngoba baqale bamshayela ihlombe kubonakala ukuthi bayajabula ngokuxolisa kwakhe. Ukuhlaselwa kwabokufika okubhokile eGoli sekudale iNingizimu Afrika yaba yiqaqa kwamanye amazwe . URamaphosa ubehambisana nabanye omengameli nababengomengameli bakwamanye amazwe abethule imiyalezo yabo yenduduzo ngokwedlula kukaMugabe.Isidumbu sikaMugabe besibekwe ngebhokisi phambi kwezihlwele ngesikhathi kuqhubeka inkonzo. Abaningi babaze ubuqhawe bukaMugabe ngokukhulula iZimbabwe emaketangeni obugqila.Usuku lokungcwatsha kukaMugabe belungakaziwa njengoba kuvele ukuthi uzongcwatshwa ezinsukwini ezingu-30 ngenxa yokuthi kusalungiswa indawo azongcwatshelwa kuyo.
title: Uthwale kanzima uRamaphosa enkonzweni kaMugabe

text: UHlengiwe uthe usezohlale ecula kule ndawo yaseMlaza.“Ngiyaya eYadini. UJesu usibizele ukuthi sibe ngabadobi babantu. Asiyi ezilwaneni kodwa siya kubantu abaphilayo abamdingayo uNkulunkulu,” kusho uHlengiwe.Uthe usuke engayele ukuyophuza utshwala ngoba ukube uyafuna ngabe kade abuphuza.Uveze nokuthi kukhona ingoma ayenze noDJ Tira kodwa yena ushaya umculo wakhe wokholo. Uthe baningi nabanye oDJ abafuna ukusebenza naye.Uqhube wathi kulo nyaka uzokhipha i-albhamu entsha.“Ngizokhipha i-albhamu engajwayelekile. Kukhona okuzobethusa abantu okungasho ukuthi ngiyasuka endaweni yokukholwa. Abantu abalalele izinhlamvu zomculo,” kusho yena.Uthe uhlela nokwenza amakhonsathi amabili eThekwini naseGoli.Ngaphambi kwalokho kodwa uveze ukuthi uzocula ihora lonke kwiPlatinum Hour emcimbini iKufeziwe Gospel Celebration. Lo mcimbi uzoba seMhlathuze Sports Complex, eRichards Bay ngo-Ephreli 21.“Yisikhathi sokuthi abantu babuyele kuNkulunkulu. Sibonga nokuthi uJesu wafela izono zethu.”Okhulumela abahleli balo mcimbi, uSithembiso Zungu, uthe kulo nyaka bazobe begubha iminyaka emihlanu umcimbi wasungulwa.“Izinga lizobe liphezulu futhi kuningi esikuhlelile okuzojabulisa abantu,” kusho uSithembiso. Uthe ngaphandle kukaHlengiwe abazobe benandisa ngoMalusi Mbokazi, Ntokozo Mbambo nabanye, kanti uhlelo luzobe luphethwe nguThulani Ga Ndlela, Phindi P nabanye.Uthe bazobe begxumeke itende elimumatha abantu abangu-10 000 kodwa uma kunesidingo bazofaka elithatha 15 000.Amathikithi omcimbi atholakala eComputicket ngoR150 kuthi iVIP ibe nguR500.
title: Ukucula eYadini akumqhelisile nenkolo

text: UMENGAMELI we-United Cities and Local Government (UCLG), uMnuz Parks Tau, uthi usekulungele ukudlulisela induku yethusi kumengameli omusha ozongena emva kwakhe njengoba isikhathi sakhe sesiphela.I-UCLG wuhlaka lwabaholi bamazwe omhlaba olubhekelele kakhulu izidingo zabantu abahlala emadolobheni emhlabeni.Esithangamini nabezindaba e-ICC, eThekwini, izolo, uTau owaduma kakhulu ngesikhathi eseyimeya yaseJohannesburg, uthe umthethosisekelo we-UCLG awuvumi ukuthi umengameli abambe amahlandla amabili.“Ngiyalibonga ithuba engilitholile lokuba ngumengameli we-UCLG ngivela eNingizimu Afrika, lokho obekwenza ngimele izwekazi lase-Afrika lonkana,” kusho uTau.Uthe likhulu iqhaza elibanjwe yi-Afrika kwi-UCLG, ikomkhulu layo eliseSpain.“Ukuba yingxenye ye-UCLG kuyasisiza njengezwe noma izwekazi ukuthi sikwazi ukuncela ulwazi kwamanye amazwe esibambisene nawo,” kusho uTau.I-UCLG izokhetha ubuholi bayo obusha engqungqutheleni eqale izolo eThekwini okulindeleke ukuthi iphele ngoLwesihlanu.UTau uthe into ayiqaphelile ukuthi izinkinga eziningi ezikhungethe omasipala bakuleli okubalwa kuzo inkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa imali ziyafana nalezo ezixake amanye amazwe.“Nakuba zikhona izingqinamba ekuphathweni komasipala kodwa inkulu impumelelo esizuziwe ekuhanjisweni kwezidingo kubantu ikakhulukazi lapha eNingizimu Afrika eminyakeni engu-25, edlule,” kusho uTau.IMeya yoMkhandlu weTheku uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda ithe bazizwa bejabule kakhulu ngokuthi bathole ithuba lokusingatha umcimbi walolu hlobo womhlaba.“Sikholelwa ukuthi uma sithola amathuba afana nalawa, kuningi ukuhlomula esikutholayo ikakhulukazi ekucobelelaneni ngolwazi namazwe asethuthukile, sithole ukuthi adlule kanjani ezinkingeni abebhekene nazo.Izinto ezifana nalezi zisinikeza ithuba nathi njengomasipala noma njengezwe sikwazi ukuthola ithuba lokudlulisa uvo lwethu ikakhulukazi njengoba sifuna ukubona umhlaba uguquka uphethwa ngobulungiswa futhi kungabikhona izigameko ezikhombisa ukuthi abantu abalingani,” kusho uKaunda.Uthe ukusingatha imicimbi yalolu hlobo kuphinde kubeke iTheku ebalazweni liphinde libukeke njengedolobha elihamba phambili emhlabeni.“Kanti nakwezomnotho sizohlomula njengoba amahhotela ethu egcwele izivakashi,” kusho uKaunda.
title: UTau uyazigqaja ngokumela i-Afrika  ohlakeni lwamazwe

text: KUHAMBE ngokwezisifo zomqeqeshi weTS Galaxy, uDaniel “Dan Dance” Malesela ehlangana neKaizer Chiefs kowamanqamu weNedbank Cup ngoba ubona ukuthi (iChiefs) iyona ezobanika ithuba elingcono lokuzikhangisa kubathandi bebhola kuleli nangaphandle.UMalesela ubebuzwe ungakadlali oweChippa United neChiefs ukuthi yiliphi iqembu angakujabulela ukubhekana nalo kowamanqamu phakathi kwabaqashi bakhe abadala neChiefs. Nakuba ebengazimisele ngokuphumela obala kodwa ugcine ebhobokile ngokuthi ukubhekana neChippa kungamhlaba umxhwele kodwa iChiefs iyona engcono uma bezimisele ngokubeka iGalaxy ebalazweni.“Ngeke ngizikhethele ukuthi ubani engithanda ukubhekana naye kodwa iqiniso ukuthi iChippa kuzongihlaba umxhwele ukubhekana nayo kwazise sengike ngasebenza kuyona kodwa iChiefs iyona engcono. Ngithi iChiefs ingcono ngoba yona izoheha abantu abaningi okuzobe kuchaza ukuthi sinethuba lokuqhubeka siziveze phambi kwabantu abaningi. Esikwenze kwi-Arrows namuhla kuyisikhangiso esihle ngebhola lethu. Kuyisikhangiso esihle ngalaba badlali (okungekho noyedwa kubona owangaphandle), kuhle lokhu nangegama lami njengomqeqeshi,” uqhube kanje uMalesela.Kumphathe kabi ukujaha kwezakhe ibhola esiwombeni sokuqala ngoba uyena ojwayele ukwenza lokho kwamanye amaqembu kodwa uneme ngendlela okulunge ngayo esiwombeni sesibili.“Esiwombeni sesibili nangesikhathi esengeziwe bese sibabambe lapho bebancane ngakhona. Bese bekhathele. Bebengeke nokho bangakhathali ngoba sibalandelise ibhola isikhathi eside impela. Yebo sibe nenhlanhla yokuthola igoli ngasekugcineni okube ilapho ngaze khona ukuthi sizonqoba ngoba bese sibakhathaze kakhulu.”Ngokusho kukaDan Dance, bazoyibhekisisa kahle indlela abasebenzisa ngayo abadlali ngoba sebebheke umdlalo wamanqamu ngoMeyi 18 kwazise ngeke besaba yingxenye yemidlalo yokuhlunga.“Kusukela manje bazoshintshana kakhulu abadlali yize kungeyona indlela engithanda ngayo ukwenza izinto. Kusemqoka ukuthi sijabule kodwa sikhumbule ukuthi sinomdlalo eKapa ngoLwesithathu. Ngeke siwujimele lowo mdlalo kodwa iwona osezingqondweni zethu, hhayi owamanqamu.”
title: Bazonika iGalaxy ithuba lokuziveza

text: MCEBO MPUNGOSEU PHROJUSA womculo we-house ohamba phambili kuleli uBlack Coffee wenze okungajwayelekile nge mpelasonto edlule ehlanyisa inkakha kaphrojusa ongusomabhizinisi e-United States, uP. Diddy.UBlack Coffee ubese-USA eyonandisa eMiami, eFlorida kwindumezulu yomcimbi i-Ultra Music Festival nabanye oDJ abahlonishwa umhlaba wonke okubalwa kubo u-Avicci noDavid Guetta.Emva kokunandisa kulo mcimbi, onekhasi elilandelwa ngabantu abangaphezulu kuka-3 million kuFacebook, uBlack Coffee uhambele i-after party ebisemzini kaP. Diddy waqhubeka wanandisa ngoMgqibelo ebusuku. NgeSonto uP. Diddy ufake i-video emfishane ku-Instagram nakuFacebook ememeza igama likaBlack Coffee edlala endlini yakhe. Le video ihambisane nombhalo obuthi, “umculo ohamba phambili kwi-Ultra usufikile!! Iciko elidume umhlaba wonke [email protected] uzosiletha isigqi sase-Afrika bukhoma eBlueDot #LetsDance.”Ngaphandle kwale video, uBlack Coffee ufake isithombe esithakaselwe ngabantu abaningi ehlezi naye uP. Diddy, ogama lakhe nguSean John Combs. Kuso bekukhona nomdlali we-basketball uKyrie Irving nomrepha uWiz Khalifa.Kulesi sithombe uBlack Coffee ubhale ukuthi, “u-9 ekuseni ephathini kaDiddy. Akulalangwa eMiami. Le nsizwa iyangigqugquzela.”NgeSonto ebusuku uBlack Coffee unconywe ngapha nangapha ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ngokunjalo noP. Diddy ngokuqhakambisa elinye lamathalente ahamba phambili e-Afrika. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi nanyakenye wake wadlala futhi emcimbini okwakuno P. Diddy kuwo .
title: U-Black Coffee unandise kwachazeka uP. Diddy

text: I-IFP inxusa amaphoyisa ukuba asebenze ubusuku nemini ukuze abambe abantu abebezama ukusoconga ikhansela layo kuMasipala waKwaDukuza, uMnuz Aubrey Baardman odume ngoMtolo.UMtolo usinde ngokulambisa ngesikhathi edutshulwa kade ehamba ngemoto namalungu omndeni wakhe izolo ekuseni.Amalungu omndeni kaMtolo, abehamba naye, alimele kulesi sigameko.USihlalo we-IFP kuzwelonke, uMnuz Blessed Gwala, uthe badumele futhi bashaqekile ngalesi sigameko lapho ikhansela labo lihlaselilwe kodwa lakwazi ukuphulukundlela labaleka kadeselidubuleke emqaleni.“Unkosikazi wakhansela nezingane ezimbili balimele kulesi sehlakalo,” kusho uGwala.Uthe uMtolo ubatshele ukuthi bahlaselwe nomdeni wakhe ngesikhathi bengenela emgwaqweni oku-ward 5, eLindelani.“Sifuna amaphoyisa noKlebe ukuba baphenye baze bafike ezimpandeni kulolu daba, ukuze kwenzeke isiqiniseko sokuthi buyenzeka ubulungiswa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane uthe ikhansela belihamba nomdeni walo ngemoto ngesikhathi lihlaselwa.UZwane uthe ama amaphoyisa aKwaDukuza aphenya icala lokuzama ukubulala.
title: Bafuna kubanjwe abahlasele ikhansela le-IFP

text: ZAKHELE XABAUMDLALI wasesiswini weCape Town City, uSurprise Ralani, uvule isifuba “ngokufikiswa” kuleli qembu laseKapa abuyele kulona emuva kweminyaka edlala phesheya kwezilwandle.URalani (32), uyaqala ukudlala kwiPremiership, ujoyine iThe Citizens ngo-2017 esuka kwiHelsingborg IF yaseSweden.Usanda kuvuselela inkontileka yakhe neCity ngonyaka. Phezu kokuba uRalani efike wazibekisela indawo ngokushesha esikimini ngaphansi komqeqeshi uBenni McCarthy kodwa akukhona konke obekumnandi kuyena.“Bengiqala ukudlala eNingizimu Afrika. Ngakho akekho umdlali ebengimazi. Bengibazela kude bonke engibafice kwiCity. Uyabazi ke abadlali baseNingizimu Afrika bahlala benokuthi uzothatha indawo yabo esikimini, baqale bakunyakazise, uhlukumezeke.“Udlala nabo bengakuphaseli ibhola noma bakuphasele ngemuva. Yikhona konke lokho okwakufanele ngibhekane nakho, ngiqine. Ngenhlanhla ngafikela kumqeqeshi uBenni McCarthy obekholelwa kimina. Lokho kungisize kakhulu ukuthi ngiqine,” kusho uRalani.URalani nozakwabo kwiCity bahlalelwe wumsebenzi wokugwema umlando ongemuhle selokhu leli qembu lasungulwa.ICity isengcupheni yokuqeda isizini ngaphandle kwe-Top 8 okungasho ukuthi ngeke iyidlale iMTN8 okokuqala selokhu yasungulwa ngo-2016. ICity iwine iMTN 8 ngo-2018. Ngo-2017 ihlulwe kowamanqamu yiSuperSport United.I-The Citizens, esendaweni ka-10 kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership, izobuyela enkundleni ngo-Agasti 14 neChippa United e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto.“Kungaba yinto embi kakhulu uma singaqeda ngaphandle kwe-Top 8. Kungaba kubi kithina badlali, abalandeli nakusihlalo (John Comitis) ngoba kungabe kuyinto ayiqalayo.“Lokho kuphoqa ukuthi sisebenze kanzima kule midlalo eyisikhombisa esele ukuze lokho kungenzeki. Kubalulekile ukuthi siwine umdlalo wokuqala ngoba yiwona ozosicacisela ukuthi sibhekephi siyiqembu,” kusho uRalani.“Ngaphezu kwalokho sidinga ukuwina ngoba lincane igebe lamaphuzu phakathi kwethu namaqembu angezansi. Uhlulwa imidlalo emibili uzithole ususenkingeni.“Njengoba kuzobuywa, iphuzu olicoshayo libalulekile futhi lisho okuthile.”
title: ‘Bamfikisa’ uSurprise Ralani eqala ukufika kwiCape Town City

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANEA BAHOLI be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal abanye abayishiya baya kuCope, ngemuva kwengqungquthela yasePolokwane yango-2007, yibo abebencenga owayenguMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Thabo Mbeki ukuba abhale izincwadi asanda kuzikhipha ngoba befuna acacise konke ayethukwa ngakho.Sekube nemibono ehlukene ngokukhipha lezi zincwadi kukaMbeki lapho ebeka khona uhlangothi lwakhe ngezinqumo ayezithatha esahola izwe.Ezinye zalezi zinqumo kubalwa ukuxoshwa kukaMengameli Jacob Zuma ngesikhathi esayiphini likaMbeki ngo-2006.Abaholi okuthiwa babencenga uMbeki kubalwa uMnuz Mtholephi Mthimkhulu, ongasekho, noMnuz Siyanda Mhlongo owajoyina iCope kodwa wabuye wayishiya.UMhlongo, owayeyinhloko yemigomo ku-ANC ebuholini bukaMbeki, uthe ziningi izinto ezimbi ebezilokhu zikhulunywa ngoMbeki kodwa engaziphenduli.“Sake sahlangana nomkhulumeni wakhe uMnuz Mukoni Ratshitanga sinoMtholephi, samtshela ukuthi kumele atshele uMbeki ukuba aqale abhale izincwadi ngoba kunezinto ezazishiwo ngoZwelinzima Vavi, bethi kunongqongqoshe besifazane ababethola izikhundla ngoba belalile. Okunye esasifuna akucacise yindaba yokuxoshwa kukaZuma, eyokuthi ungundlovukayiphikiswa neyodaba lwegciwane lengculazi. Sike saba nomunye umhlangano noSydney Mufamadi eBallito naye ngamtshela ukuthi akayalele uMbeki abhale uhlangothi lwakhe ngoba luyadingeka,” kusho uMhlongo.Uthe nokho uMbeki ubengathandi ukwenza lokhu kodwa bona bebekubona kubalulekile njengoba egcine esebhala manje.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uMnuz Thabani Khumalo uthe nakuba uMbeki ezibhala lezi zincwadi, kodwa akukho okusha ezikuvezayo ngaye kunalokho zisakhombisa indlela ayesolwa ngayo ngokuba wundlovukayiphikiswa.“Akukho ongathi kusha kulezi zincwadi azibhalayo. Uma ubheka usaqhuba leya ndlela ayenza ngayo yokuvele akhulume into engeke iphikiswe muntu. Lokhu wayekwenza nangesikhathi esabhala ku-ANC Today lapho ayethi uma esebhalile kucace ukuthi ayikho indlela yokuphikisa umbono asewuvezile,” kusho uKhumalo.Uthe akubonayo wukuthi uMbeki uzama ukuxhaphaza isimo esikhona ku-ANC sokuthi kunezininga njengoba sekukhona nabafuna abuye azoba ngumeluleki.Nokho uMnuz Xolani Dube, weXubera Institute, uyakuphika lokhu ngoba uthi lezi zincwadi zikaMbeki zivezela umuntu ongazi ukuthi kwakwenzakalani ngesikhathi sakhe ukuze aqonde lonke iqiniso.“Kubalulekile ukuba uMbeki achaze ngezinqumo zakhe ayezithatha ngoba kuningi obekukhulunywa kodwa yena engakaze asho lutho. Okunye wukuthi akukho okwenza abe ngundlovukayiphikiswa kulezi zincwadi ngoba uma ezibhala zivula ithuba lenkulumo-ngxoxo, lapho abantu bekuchitha akushoyo abanye bevumelana nakho,” kusho uDube.
title: ‘Samtshela  uMbeki  ngezincwadi’

text: IGCINE iyehlisile intengo ye-data iMTN kwazise amehlo abantu ebethe njo kule nkampani ebibonakala izindela ngodaba lokwehliswa kwe-data.NgoLwesihlanu, iMTN imemezele ukuthi u-1GB we-data uzobiza uR99.Kusukela ngo-Ephreli 15 abantu abasebenzisa iMTN bazokwehlelwa yizindleko zokuxhumana ngo-50%, ngokusho kwesikhulu sale nkampani uMnuz Godfrey Motsa.UMotsa uthe bazimisele ukwehlisa izindleko zokuxhumana nokuthuthukisa iNingizimu Afrika, yingakho bebexoxa nabaKhomishini yezokuNcintisana ukuze kwehle izindleko.Uveze ukuthi kusukela ngoFebhuwari 2017 kuya kuFebhuwari nonyaka izindleko zabo ze-data zehle ngo-76%.“Sitshale uR50 billion ezinhlelweni zokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda ngoba sifuna kwande ubuchwepheshe be-4G ne-5G. Ukuthola imikhiqizo yamahhala kufanele ushayele u-*136*5# noma u-*135#. Imikhiqizo yamahhala inezifundo zasesikoleni, ezasenyuvesi, ezasekolishi kanjalo nama-website okufuna umsebenzi,” kusho uMotsa.Uthe iMTN iyabavumela abantu ukuthi bangene kuma-website mahhala nokuthi bangene ezinkundleni zokuxhumana uma benganayo i-airtime.UMotsa uthe bazivolontiyele bona ukwehlisa imikhiqizo emuva kwezingxoxo neKhomishini yezokuNcintisana, ICASA kanjalo noMnyango wezokuXhumana.Njalo ngosuku amakhasimende akwaMTN azothola u-20MB we-data ukuthumela ama-video, izithombe nokungena kwi-internet.Azokwazi nokubheka ukuthi i-data yawo ihamba kanjani. I-data yamahhala iqale khona ngempelasonto ngoba uMotsa uthe bafuna amakhasimende abo akwazi ukuxhumana nezihlobo nokufunda izindaba nokunye okwenzekayo.Emasontweni adlule iVodacom imemezele ukuthi izokwehlisa i-data yayo ngo-34% okusho ukuthi i-1GB izosuka kuR149 ubize uR99 kusukela ngo-Ephreli 1.UKhomishana weKhomishini yezokuNcintisana, uMnuz Tembinkosi Bonakele, uthe bayaxoxa nazo zonke izinkampani zokuxhumana ukuthi zehlise intengo yemikhiqizo yazo.
title: I-MTN yehlisa intengo emba eqolo ye-data

text: INKANTOLO izesulile izinyembezi zomndeni wephoyisa eladutshulwa izigebengu lisesitolo KwaMaphumulo, sekusele izinyanga ezine lithathe umhlalaphansi.Ababulala uCaptain Dumisani Mhlanzi (53), bagwetshwe iminyaka engaphezu kuka-70 yiNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu izolo.UMhlanzi wabulawa ngoFebhuwari 2018, wayeyofaka imali esitolo, ngesikhathi kufika izigebengu zizobamba inkunzi. Zathatha imali zamdubula washonela esibhedlela.Ibamba lejaji likhipha isigwebo soBheko Sibiya (40), Mdeliseni Mathonsi (30) noSiphamandla Mathonsi (32) lithe sasingekho isidingo sokuba badubule iphoyisa selilele phansi ngoba lalingeyona ingozi kubona.Balahlwa ngamacala amane, kwathi umsolwa wesithathu uSiphamandla Mathonsi walahlwa ngamabili, elesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nelezinhlamvu.Ibamba leJaji * -Elsje Bezuidenhout ehlisa isigwebo klithe ukuthi bebeqala ukwenza icala akusho lutho kumele bejeze.“Ngokobufakazi obuthulwe enkantolo nenza isihluku nibulala iphoyisa futhi lingeyona ingozi kinina. Umndeni wephoyisa ufakazile wathi ulimele kakhulu ngenakwenza. Unina kamufi nodadewabo ohamba ngesihlalo esinamasondo bahlezi belapha enkantolo bezolalela icala ngoba bebethembele kumufi enambulala. Izingane zakhe eziyisikhombisa zasala ziyizintandane njengoba unkosikazi kamufi ashona kudala, manje sekushone noyise. kufanele nijeze,” kusho ijaji.Ehlisa isigwebo, ngecala lokuqala lokubamba inkunzi ubagwebe iminyaka engu-15, kwelokubamba inkunzi ngesihluku wabagweba iminyaka engu-15, elokubulala ubagwebe udilikajele, nelinye lokubamba inkunzi kuhlonyiwe wabagweba eminye iminyaka engu-15. Kusho ukuthi isigwebo sabo iminyaka engu-70. Izigwebo zizohambisana.Umsolwa wesithathu uphinde wanezelwa iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili ngecala lesibhamu nelezinhlamvu, yena isigwebo sakhe siyiminyaka engu-78.Abameli bababulali bazamile ukubacelela ukuba kudluliswe icala nezigwebo kodwa inkantolo yanqaba yathi ubufakazi enkantolo banele ukuba ifike kulesi sinqumo esikhiphile.Ngaphandle kwenkantolo kube nenhlokomo nenjabulo kumalungu omndeni, okubalwa unina kamufi nodadewabo.Umfowabo uMnuz Sipho Mhlanzi, ekhulumela umndeni uthe yize engeke esabuya umfowabo kodwa isigwebo sibasule izinyembezi.“Umama uma ebona umuntu ofake umfaniswano wephoyisa ubevele akhale ngenxa yokuhlukumezeka kwakhe ngalolu daba lokubulawa kukamfowethu. Izingane zakhe zithwele kanzima, azikwazi ukwamukela okwenzeka. Sijabule namhlanje ukuthi inkantolo izesulile izinyembezi zethu ngokukhipha isigwebo esikhulu kangaka. Siyabonga kubaphenyi, oKlebe noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele owazifikela ekhaya wasingcwabisa, wathi abasolwa bazoboshwa njengoba begwetshiwe namhlanje,” kusho uMhlanzi.
title: Odilikajele kwababulala iphoyisa

text: UBUHOLI be-ANC eWestern Cape sebuzwakalise ukushaqeka ngokubulawa kwekhansela layo eKnysna, kulesi sifundazwe.NgoMsombuluko ebusuku kudutshulwe kwabulwa uMnuz Victor Molosi oyikhansela lika-ward 8, ephuma endlini yakhe eseConcordia, eKnysna. Amaphoyisa akulesi sifundazwe aseqinisekisile ukuthi uMolosi udutshulwe ekhanda.UMolosi, obeteketiswa ngegama elithi ‘Freeze’, ubephinde abe uSotswebhu omkhulu we-ANC kumasipala waseKnysna, kanti ubeyisekela likaNobhala waseSouthern Cape. Unobhala we-ANC eWestern Cape, uMnuz Fairz Jacobs uthe wonke umuntu kumele ethuke ngokubulawa kukaMolosi.“Kumele sithuke ngokubulawa kukaMolosi  ngendlela eyisihluku kanje. Sizokwehlisa ifulegi lethu njengendlela yokumhlonipha. Ukudlula kwakhe kusiphethe kabi kakhulu. Inhliziyo yami iyasinda. Sifisa ukuthi aphumule ngokuthula, uMdali amamukele ezulwini. Hamba kahle Cde Victor, hamba kahle,” kusho yena. UMHOLI we-ANC obulewe eKnysna uMnuz Victor Molosi. Isithombe: SIGCINIWEUmgcinimafa we-ANC eWestern Cape, uNksz uMaurencia Gillion uthe bafisa abezomthetho benze uphenyo oluphuthumayo ukuze kuboshwe amagwala abulale uMolosi. “UComrade Victor Molosi, obaziwa ngoComrade Freeze, ubulawe amagwala ngesihluku izolo ebusuku.Sicela abomthetho benze uphenyo oluphuthumayo baboshwe, babhekane nengalo yomthetho. Hamba kahle mfowethu,” kubhala uGillion ekhasini lakhe likaFacebook. Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseWestern Cape, uCaptain Malcom Pojie, uthe uMolosi utholwe enenxeba lokudutshulwa ekhanda, waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela lapho efike washonela khona. Uthe amaphoyisa aseqale uphenyo oluphuthumayo kodwa akukaboshwa muntu.
title: Babhodla umlilo ngomholi we-ANC obulewe

text:
MLUNGISI GUMEDEK unukwa isiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal ngenkohlakalo emva kokuthi sikhokhele inkampani yezokuxhumana, iJuba Fly Media, u-R3.2 million ngethenda ephume ngo-2014 yokushicilela incwadi emayelana nomlando wesiShayamthetho kodwa engakaze iphume.Isolezwe linabo ubufakazi obuqinisekisa ukuthi isiShayamthetho sakhipha izigidi ngezikhawu eziyisithupha sikhokhela le nkampani.IJuba Fly Media yanikwa umsebenzi wokubhala incwadi ngesiShayamthetho emva kweminyaka ewu-20 izwe libuswa ngentando yabantu. Ngo-2014 iNingizimu Afrika ibigubha iminyaka ewu-20 ibuswa ngentando yabantu.Amalungu esiShayamthetho akhulume ne
Solezwe azwakalise ukuphoxeka nokudumala ngokuthi kwasetshenziswa imali engaka ngencwadi engakaphumi. Umholi we-IFP esiShayamthetho, uMnuz Blessed Gwala, uzwakalise ukuthuka uma ezwa ukuthi isiShayamthetho sikhiphe ngaphezu kuka-R3 million sikhokhela iJuba Fly Media.“Sathintwa kwacelwa ukuthi sibuze imibuzo kodwa asizange sitshelwe ukuthi le nto eyenziwayo izodinga kusetshenziswe imali engaka. lokhu kuqinisekisa khona ukuthi zonke izinto esiShayamthetho zifakwa ngaphansi kokhukho,” kusho uGwala.UGwala uthe kuyacaca ukuthi bekuvele kuyindlela yokudla imali yabakhokhi bentela kuzitshwa ngokuthi kubhalwa incwadi.“Bheka manje singamalungu esiShayamthetho sesibuzwa ngemali okuthiwa isetshenzisiwe singazi lutho ngayo,” usho kanje.Umholi weDA esiShayamthetho, uMnuz Sizwe Mchunu, uthe wake wamuzwa lowo owayenguNdunankulu esifundazweni, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, ethi kungakuhle kwenziwe incwadi yalolu hlobo kodwa akazi ukuthi kwagcinaphi.“Angikaze ngithintwe kuthiwe kukhona imibuzo engizobuzwa yona. ngingakujabulela ukwazi ukuthi wobani abake babuzwa nokuthi kwasetshenziswa luphi uhlelo ukukhetha ukuthi ngobani abantu abafanele ukubuzwa mayelana nencwadi,” usho kanje.UMchunu naye uthukile uma ezwa ukuthi sekukhishwe imali engaka ngencwadi engakaphumi.UMnuz Linda Madlala, weJuba Fly Media, uthe udaba nophenyo olwenziwa yi
Solezwe aluqondene nenkampani yabo.“Isivumelwano somsebenzi nesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal sithi ngingadaluli izinto zesiShayamthetho. Ngethemba uyayazi imigomo yokuphepha nobulungiswa elawula imisebenzi nenkambiso yokuziphatha esemthethweni ngemisebenzi efana nalena,” kusho uMadlala.UMnuz Zwelihle Memela, imenenja ehhovisi likaNobhala wesiShayamthetho, uthe isiShayamthetho sinenkontileka emile nayo esukela ekukhangisweni komsebenzi ngendlela eqondile. UMemela uthe ngokwesivumelwano inkampani kulindeleke ukuthi ishicilele incwadi mayelana nomlando wesiShayamthetho kusukela ngo-1994.“Lokhu kufaka nokukhuluma ngamaqembu ayekhona ngaleso sikhathi, isimo sepolitiki nokuthi lazuzwa kanjani uxolo,” usho kanje.UMemela uthe isiShayamthetho sikhokhela izinkampani ngangokuthi sithini isivumelwano okuvunyelwene ngaso.wengeza ngokuthi iJuba Fly Media ayehlukile kwezinye izinkampani.Uthe ukunikezwa kwethenda kwakukade kuvuleleke kunoma ngubani futhi kwalandelwa yonke imigomo kahulumeni ebekiwe.Uthe ngenxa yokuthi bebehlose ukuthi incwadi yenziwe iqedwe esikhathini esifushane, kungelula futhi ukuthola yonke imininingwane abayidingayo, babe sebephoqeleka ukuthi kube khona abantu ababahlohla imibuzo.UMemela uthe bazibekele iminyaka emithathu ukuthi babe sebeyiqedile incwadi.Uthe incwadi isiphelile sekusele ukuthi ifundisiswe ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi ayiphumi namaphutha.
title: Bashaya amakhala ngeka-R3.2m

text: UMNYANGO wezabaSebenzi izolo umemezele ukuthi uzoqhubeka nokusiza abasebenzi abakhahlanyezwe wukuvalwa kwezwe ngenxa yeCoronavirus.UMnyango oholwa nguNgqongqoshe uMnuz Thulas Nxesi, uthe lolu hlelo luzoqhubeka kuze kube ngu-Agasti 15 nonyaka.Ngokwesitatimende esithunyelwe kwabezindaba, lezi zinhlelo zomnyango zizosiza ukuthi abasebenzi nemindeni yabo kabahlaselwa yindlala ngalesi sikhathi esinzima, bakwazi ukuphefumula.IPhili likaNgqongqoshe, uNksz Boitumelo Moloi, lithe: “Kulandela izingxoxo ngodaba oluthinta i-UIF, nesimemezelo sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, sokuqhuba isikhathi senhlekelele kuze kube u-Agasti 15, sibe sesithatha isinqumo sokuba siqhube nathi uxhaso kubasebenzi kuze kube u-Agasti 15.”Uthe indlela yokufaka isicelo isafana nangaphambilini.“Izicelo zango-Ephreli, Meyi noJuni sicabangela ukuzivala ekupheleni kukaJulayi. Zonke izicelo eziphasile ezithole imihlomulo yezinyanga ezimbili, sizoqhubeka nokuzikhokhela,” kusho isitatimende somnyango.Kulesi sikhwama sezinhlekelele se-UIF sebekhokhe uR34 billion kubasebenzi abangu-7.4 million.IPhini likaNgqongqoshe okuyilona elithule inkulumo izolo, lithe abantu abazokhokhelwa kulesi sikhwama kubalwa laba abalandelayo:Umsebenzi ozotheleleka yigciwane esemsebenzini, umsebenzi ongakwazi ukusebenza ngoba esagonqile, osesibhedlela ngenxa yokutheleleka. Izindleko zokulashwa, umsebenzi ozoshona kuzokhokhelwa abomndeni nezindleko zomngcwabo, abancishiselwe amaholo nabanye.Umnyango uyasebenzisana neCouncil for Conciliation, Mediation and Arbitration, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abaqashi balandela imithetho evikela abasebenzi.Umnyango uthe bazoqinisekisa nokuthi ukufakwa kwezicelonge-internet sekuba ngcono kunakuqala.Okwamanje abomnyango bathe basathole izicelo zezindleko zokugula ezingu-46 000. Abasebenzi bezempilo bakhokhelwe uR921 million, kusukela ngo-Ephreli 1 kuya kuJulayi 13.Lo mnyango uthe uyaqhubeka nezinye izinhlelo zawo ezijwayelekile zokulekelela abasebenzi okubalwa labo abadiliziwe, asebephila ngokukhu-bazeka.
title: Umnyango nezindaba ezimnandi kubasebenzi
