text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, akeneme ngokuphelele ngokubuya nephuzu kwiWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco emdlalweni weCAF Champions League ekuhambeni.ISundowns ibambane neWydad ngo 0-0 ekuhambeni emdlalweni wesibili wamaqoqo kaGroup C. Bekungokokuqala iSundowns iphumelela ukubamba iWydad ekuhambeni kwazise ihlale iwukudla kwenduku.Ifulathele leli izimisele ukuqeda ishobolo lokuhlulwa yiWydad phambi kwezinkumbi zabalandeli bayo.“Umdlalo uhambe ngendlela ebesikade siyilindele. Umdlalo phakathi kweWydad neSundowns uhlale unjena. Bengingancamela ukuthi sidlale ngokulingana kube * 1-1 noma 2-2 kuno 0-0 ngoba umdlalo onjena kumele ube namagoli ikakhulukazi esigabeni samaqoqo, ingakasebenzi indaba yamagoli asekuhambeni,” kusho uMosimane.Ngokubuya nephuzu iSundowns isihlezi esicongweni sikaGroup C ngamaphuzu amane emuva kwemidlalo emibili. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi ayikho evume ukugoba uphondo phakathi kwe-USM Alger yase-Algeria nePetro De Luanda yase-Angola abadlale ngokulingana ngo 1-1. ISundowns iyona kuphela esawinile kuleli qoqo nokuyibeka ethubeni lokudlulela kuma-quarterfinal.“Umdlalo siwuqale kangcono. Bekuwumdlalo weziwombe ezimbili ezehlukene. Esokuqala sisithathile. Emizuzwini engu-15 noma engu-20 yokugcina basifake ingcindezi kodwa besimaka ngendlela ehlelekile. Asiwenzanga amaphutha njengokujwayelekile."Ngijabule ukuthi sikwazile ukumelana nonombolo 9, ungumdlali omuhle onamandla. Asimnikanga ithuba lokuthi abhekane nepali, ubehlale edlala njalo elifulathele.Besazi ukuthi umdlali wakwesokudla uhlala efuna ukuyogoba amabhola. Samncisha isikhala sokwenza lokho. Uma ubavala ekutheni bangawagobi amabhola, unombolo 9 akakwazi ukudlala. Konke kuhambe ngendlela ebesihlele ngayo."Besiba nenkinga nje kuma-free kick nakumakhona. Ukube silisebenzisile ithuba esilithole esiwombeni sokuqala, umdlali ebhekene nonozinti, ngabe sikhuluma okuhlukile. Kodwa iWydad yiqembu elikhulu, sisayihlonipha,” kusho uMosimane.NgoLwesithathu iSundowns izobhekana neStellenbosch emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eLoftus Versfeld Stadium.
title: Akenelisekile ngokwabelana ngephuzu neWydad uMosimane

text: Sabelo NseleImithombo ekwi-ANC esifundeni Inkosi Bhambatha, ithi ubuholi besifunda sebuthathe isinqumo sokuthi ishenxe esikhundleni imeya esihlale iminyaka engaphezu kweyisihlanu.Ngokwemithombo, ikusasa lemeya selilele ezandleni zobuholi besifundazwe obuzophikisa noma buvumele isinqumo esithathwe ubuholi besifunda.“Ubuholi besifunda buhlanganile nemeya ngoLwesihlanu (olwedlule) yabatshela emehlweni ukuthi ngeke yehle esikhundleni. NgoMsombuluko kube nomhlangano wesifunda lapho kuthathwe khona isinqumo,” kusho umthombo.Omunye umthombo uthe ubuholi besifunda bukhale ngokuthi ubudlelwane abusebuhle kahle phakathi kwabo noNgubane.“Okunye abakhala ngakho yindaba yezindleko ezikhokhelwa ukuqapha izikhulu zikamasipala, eziphezulu. Ngisho nofike izolo unikezwa abaqaphi kumasipala.”Umasipala uke waba sematheni ngesikhathi kuvela izindaba zokuthi ngo-2018 wasebenzisa uR11 million kubaqaphi.Unobhala wesifunda uMnuz Bheki Lembede akafunanga ukuphumela obala ebuzwa ngalolu daba.“Engingakusho ukuthi sibe nomhlangano sibheka ukuthi izinto zihamba kanjani komasipala esibaphethe nakulabo esingabaphethe.“Sibe sesiphuma nezinqumo ngokuthi sizoya kanjani phambili. Lezo zinqumo sisazozixoxa nobuholi besifundazwe,” kusho uLembede.UNgubane uthe ubengakaziswa ngalesi sinqumo.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Nhlakanipho Ntombela, uthe bebengakaziswa lutho.Uthe uma kunesinqumo esinjalo kufanele silethwe ebuholini besifundazwe sizodingidwa khona.Umthombo osondelene nodaba, uthe akusikho okokuqala ubuholi buthatha isinqumo esinje.“Bake basithatha isinqumo sokuthi imeya naso sonke isigungu esiphezulu emkhandlwini, kuhlakazwe. Kodwa babuye bashaya ungqimphothwe ngoba bagcina bengasiyisanga leso sinqumo ebuholini besifundazwe.“Kona isimo asisihle kulo masipala. Amakhansela e-ANC ahlukene kakhulu,” kuphetha umthombo.
title: Kukhona okusina kujeqeze iMeya yaseMvoti

text: KUBALULEKILE ukuhlolwa izifo ezivamile kubantu besifazane okubalwa kuzo umdlavuza wamabele nezinye zingakaqali.UDkt Sanele Madela, ophethe umtholampilo iPomeroy Community Health Centre owafundela ubudokotela eCuba, uthe kubalulekile ukuthi abantu besifazane bakukhuthalele ukuvakashela odokotela babo noma bengaguli ukuze bagweme ukuqala kwezifo ezivamile kubona.UMadela, uhlelo lwabo lokufunda lwaseCuba oluncike kakhulu ekugwemeni izifo kunokuzelapha ngoba sezihambe kakhulu, uthe abanye abantu bavame ukuya kudokotela noma ezikhungweni zezempilo ngoba sebegula kakhulu kokunye ingasekho into engenziwa ukubuyisela isimo sempilo yabo kwesijwayelekile.UMadela uthe uyakukhuthaza ukuthi abantu besifazane bazazi izifo okufanele bahlolwe zona nokuthi kufanele bahlolwe njalo emva kwesikhathi esingakanani.Uthe kubalulekile nokuthi bazijwayeze ukuyozwa kodokotela ukuthi ngabe yini okufanele bayiqaphele ukuze babe sesimeni esifanele ngokwempilo.Nazi ezinye zezinto athe kubalulekile ukuthi abesifazane bazibheke:Ukuhlolwa umdlavuza webeleNgokusho kophiko olugcina imininingwane ngezinhlobo ezehlukene zomdlavuza kuleli, iNational Cancer Registry (NCR) yango-2014, lo mdlavuza ubungeminye yemidlavuza emihlanu ehamba phambili ekukhahlamezeni abantu besifazane.ICancer Association of South Africa (CANSA) ithe balinganiselwa ku-19.4 million abesifazane abaneminyaka engaphezu kwengu-15 abazithola besengcupheni yokuthola umdlavuza webele.UMadela uthe kubalulekile ukuthi abantu besifazane bakusukumele ukuhlolwa lo mdlavuza ikakhulu uma kuke kwaba khona abantu abake baba nawo emndenini noma kukhona owesilisa obe nomdlavuza owande kwabesilisa umdlavuza wamankwahla.Kubalulekile nokuhlolwa ubheke ukuthi azikho yini izimila ezisemabeleni ngokuthi uwapotoze amabele nokuthi alukho yini uketshezi olusolisayo oluphuma kuwona. Ngaphandle kwalezi zindlela abasebenzi bezempilo banezinye izindlela abazisebenzisayo okubalwa kuzo i-mammogram ne-ultrasound.Umdlavuza womlomo wesibeletho:Abanye abantu besifazane bagcina ngokwenza i-pap smear ngesikhathi bekhulelwekuphela - abakukhuthalele ukwenza lolu hlobo lokuhlolwa olungenza umehluko ekutheni kusheshe kuvele uma kukhona okungahambi kahle emlonyeni wesibeletho.UMadela uthe abantu besifazane abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-21 bayagqugquzelwa ukuthi bayenze i-pap smear.Ngokwemininingwane yeMayo Clinic kufanele abesifazane abaneminyaka esuka kwengu-21 kuze kufinyelele kwengu-65 bayenze njalo emva kweminyaka emithathu i-pap smear kodwa bangavumelana nodokotela ukuthi yisiphi isikhathi okufanele basilinde ukuze baphinde bahlolwe.Ngaphandle kwemidlavuza eyahlukene uMadela uthe kuyasiza nokuhlolwa ezinye izifo ezivamile kubantu ngenxa yendlela abaphila ngayo engabeka impilo yabo engcupheni. Ubale isifo sikashukela, umfutho ophezulu wegazi nezinye.Kulolu hlobo lokuhlolwa uthe udokotela uphinde abheke nesisindo somzimba womuntu ukuze abone ukuthi akekho yini engcupheni yokungenwa yilezi zifo ngenxa yokukhuluphala ngokweqile.Izibalo zombiko weStatistics South Africa (Stats SA) zango-2016 ziveze ukuthi baningi kakhulu abantu besifazane abakhuluphele ngokweqile kuleli.Ngokwalezi zibalo balinganiselwa ku-70% abantu besifazane abakhuluphele ngokweqile uma kuqhathaniswa nabesilisa (31%) eNingizimu Afrika. Lokhu kubabeka engcupheni yokungenwa yizifo ezahlukene.UMadela uthe kubalulekile ukubheka iBody Mass Index (BMI) okuyindlela engakwenza ubone uma kufanele wenze okuthile ukwehlisa isisindo somzimba.Uma kubhekwa iBMI kusuke kubhekwa isimo somzimba womuntu ngokubala ukuthi isisindo sakhe siyahambelana yini nobude bakhe.“Uma iphakathi kuka-20 no-25 usuke unesisindo esifanele kodwa uma ingaphezu kuka-25 usuke usukhuluphele ngokweqile,” kusho uMadela.Uthe isisindo somzimba sibalulekile ngoba singaba nomthelela nakwezinye izinto ezingathikameza umuntu njengoba kwabanye abantu singagcina siholele ekutheni bagcine benokhwantalala ngenxa yokukhuluphala kakhulu.Uthe abantu abafani kukhona labo okuthi uma bekhuluphele kakhulu bazithole sebezinyeza ngakho baze bagcine sebenokhwantalala kanti kukhona abangenandaba nakho. Kubona bonke uthe kubalulekile kodwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isisindo somzimba asikubeki engozini yokuthi ungenwe yizifo ezingathikameza impilo yakho.Uthe okunye okufanele abantu besifazane bakuqaphele ukunakekela ngendlela isitho sabo sangasese waze waveza ukuthi ngenxa yengcindezi abazithola bekuyona abanye bagcina besebenzisa izinto ezingalungile esithweni sabo sangasese ngenhloso yokusigcina sihlanzekile.Uthe abanye basebenzisa lezi zinto ngoba benezingcindezi ehambisana nezocansi, kwabanye kusuke kungenxa yokugwema ukukhulelwa nokunye.Wexwayise ngokuthi lezi zindlela zokuzama ukuhlanza isitho sangasese yizona ezigcina zibeke abesifazane abaningi engozini yokungenwa wumdlavuza wesibeletho nezifo ezithelelana ngokocansi.Uthe isitho sangasese somuntu wesifazane asidinge kuhlanzwa ngensipho eyisipesheli nezinye izinto esezivame ukusetshenziswa kusona ngoba siyazihlanza sona ngokwemvelo.
title: Imbokodo ikhuthazwa ukuba ihlolwe izifo

text: Sabelo NseleI-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, isikhombe indlela imeya nosomlomo kumasipala okhungethwe izinkinga, Umdoni.Izolo, uNobhala we-ANC esifundazweni uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, umemezele ukwehliswa esikhundleni kwemeya, uMnuz Thabani Dube nosomlomo uNksz Nombuso Mpanza.Lesi sinqumo sithathwe emva komhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, ophele ngoMsombuluko.UNtuli uthe bese kufike isikhathi sokuthi ibhantshi ligcwale umoya kulaba bobabili ngenxa yezinkinga ebezilokhu ziqhubeka kulo masipala ngaphansi kobuholi babo.UNtuli uthe kusukela ngo-2018 bezingapheli izinyanga ezintathu kungekho umbiko ozotholwa yisigungu esiphezulu sesifundazwe mayelana nezinkinga zakulo masipala.“Izinkinga eziningi zidalwa ukwehluleka kwabaholi nokungabambisani kwamakhansela ethu. Emva kokubona ukuthi kazixazululeki lezi zinkinga, sibone kungcono sigudluze esikhundleni imeya nosomlomo.”UNtuli uthe isipikili sokugcina kube wukuhluleka kobuholi bomkhandlu ukuthathela izinyathelo izikhulu zikamasipala ezathatha isinqumo sokuziholela imali yokusebenza umsebenzi obucayi ngesikhathi sikathaqa.“Abasebenzi bazithathela leso sinqumo ngaphandle kokwazisa umkhandlu. Sabe sesiyalela ubuholi ukuthi buqondise ubugwegwe labo basebenzi kepha bahluleka ukwenza lokho. Abanye balabo basebenzi bayibuyisela emuva le mali ngoba babazi ukuthi ayikho emthethweni le nto abayenzayo kepha ubuholi bahluleka ukuthatha izinyathelo.”Khonamanjalo, leli qembu selibuye lashaya ungqimphothwe mayelana nodaba lokuketulwa kweMeya yaseMtubatuba, uMnuz Velangenkosi Gumede, oyikhansela le-IFP.Ngesikhathi uGumede ephucwa iketango lobumeya linikwa ikhansela le-ANC, uMnuz Thobelani Verus Ncamphalala, i-ANC esifundazweni yayikade ithe izoqondisa ubugwegwe amakhansela ayo ngalesi senzo kunokwesabela ukuthi singahle sibe nomthelela ongemuhle emizameni yokubuyisana phakathi kwe-ANC ne-IFP.Izolo, uNtuli uthe banelisekile ngencazelo abayithola ngokwaholela ekutheni kugudluzwe uGumede ngevoti lokungabethembi ubuholi bakhe ekuqaleni kwenyanga.UNtuli uthe amakhansela abo abesekhathele ukuhluleka kobuholi be-IFP ukuhambisa izidingo kubantu.“Izinto bezimapeketwane lapha, i-IFP ibisishintshe izimeya kwaze kwakathathu. Amakhansela e-IFP avota kanye nawethu ukuthi kukhishwe imeya yawo.”
title: I-ANC ixoshe imeya nosomlomo

text:
BAZOLIBIZA ngeMazisi Kunene Week leli sonto abePoetry Africa eqale izolo e-Elizabeth Sneddon Theatre eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal.Belisematheni igama lalesi sishoshovu esalwela inkululeko yabamnyama ngezikhathi zobandlululo kuleli ngenkathi kwethulwa iPoetry Africa ka-20 izolo eRivertown Beerhall eThekwini.Lo nyaka kuzobe kungoweshumi adlula emhlabeni uSolwazi Mazisi Kunene kanti abahleli bePoetry Africa bathe babone kuyisikhathi esihle sokusebenzisana neMazisi Kunene Foundation ukukhumbula imisebenzi yakhe emihle. Umqondisi weCentre for Creative Arts, uDavid Maahlamela ubonge amagalelo kaKunene nabenhlangano yakhe ngokuvuma ukusebenzisana nabo.“Sizobiza leli sonto ngeMazisi Kunene Week. Siyazigqaja futhi sijabule kakhulu njengeCentre for Creative Arts ukuthi simataniswe negama elikhulu njengelakhe singabahleli bePoetry Afrika. Umsebenzi wakhe ufeze amaphupho abantu abaningi. Uyingxenye yabantu ababeke iNingizimu Afrika lapho ikhona namhlanje.UKunene yimbongi eyaduma kakhulu ngenkondlo ethi 
Emperor Shaka the Great. Wahlala esekudingisweni iminyaka ehlala emazweni ase-Europe nase-USA lapho aqhubeka khona nokulwa nobandlululo esebenzisa izinkondlo. UKunene wagcina efundisa kwenye yamanyuvesi ahlonishwa umhlaba wonke, i-University of California (UCLA).UMaahlamela uqhube wadalula kwabezindaba izolo ukuthi iCentre for Creative Arts ithola imali ebalelwa ku-R4 million minyaka yonke kuMasipala weTheku. Oyimenenja yegatsha lezobuCiko namaSiko kumasipala, uMnuz Thembinkosi Ngcobo, uthe bajabule kakhulu ukuthi nabo njengomkhandlu lisekhona iqhaza abalibambayo ukuthuthukisa ezobuciko kuleli dolobha.“Sifuna ukuqhubeka sidlale indima empilweni yamaciko afuna ukukhuluma ngezinto ezenzeka emphakathini. Ukuthi imicimbi enjenga ixhaswa umasipala akusho ukuthi amaciko akusamele asigxeke njengohulumeni, abawenze ngokukhululeka umsebenzi wabo,” usho kanje.Ngaphandle kukaKunene, iPoetry Africa igubha iminyaka engu-20 yasungulwa neminyaka engu-200 yokubusa kukaZulu. KwiPoetry Africa yalo nyaka kuzohlonishwa izimbongi ezimbili, uDkt Don Mattera neNyosi yeSilo uBM Mdletshe ngezindondo ngaphansi kweMazisi Kunene Poetry Awards.Amathikithi omcimbi atholakala ngo-R60 eComputicket. Uzoqhubeka kuze kube u-Okthoba 14 Elizabeth Sneddon Theatre bese uvalwa eBat Centre ngo-Okthoba 15. Awabafundi nabahola impeshini atholakala ngo-R40. Kwizimbongi ezingu-25 ezikhona nonyaka kubalwa uJessica Mbangeni, Mxolisi Mtshali, Bassey Ikpi, Bulelwa Basse, Harry Owen, JahRose Nthabiseng Jafta, Kobus Moolman, Koleka Putuma, Leymen Pérez (Cuba), noMalachi Smith (Jamaica).
title: Kuhlonishwa imbongi eyazakhela igama

text: UMSAKAZI weGagasi FM, uFelix Hlophe, usekhwele wadilika kuKini Shandu owayengumsakazi kulesi siteshi, wakhala ngokuthi umhlambalaza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Kulezi zinsuku kunengxabano eshubile phakathi kukaFelix noKini, okuthiwa isuswe wukuthi uFelix uncome ukwenyuka kwezibalo zohlelo ayelwethula iMidday Shandis kwiGagasi FM, olwalubizwa ngeBig Bang lusashayelwa wuKini Shandu.UFelix uthe iwubuthakathi into eyenziwa wuKini yokumhlambalaza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.“Akukhona ukudlala lento eyenziwa wuKini. Ngeke usho into engihlambalaza njengale ayishoyo uma kungukuthi uyazidlalela. Sengithathe isinqumo sokuthi ngingamphenduli ngoba ngiyabona ufuna ukungcolisa igama lami.“Ufuna ngilwe naye bese kudicileleka isithunzi sami nesomsakazo phansi. Njengoba ngisebenza kwiGagasi FM kumele ngicabangele nesiteshi ukuthi engikushoyo kuzophoxa naso.“Okwesibili nginomndeni nabantu abangilalelayo emsakazweni okuzobaphatha kabi ukuthi ngilokhu ngiphendulana naye. Yena akasebenzi futhi akukho okuzomlahlekela ngokudelela mina kodwa mina ngingalahlekelwa nawumsebenzi uma ngingaziphatha njengaye.“Le nto ayenzayo akaboni ukuthi naye izomvalela amathuba okuthi aqashwe kwenye indawo ngoba usekhombisile ukuthi akakwazi ukuziphatha kahle,” kusho uFelix.Uthe uyabona ukuthi uKini akasitholanga isikhathi sokudlala esemncane yingakho edlalela kuyena.“Inkinga yakhe akawatholanga amathoyizi esemncane, yingakho edlala noma ingani. Mina uma ngifuna ukudlala ngingena egaraji ngiphume nethoyizi lokudlala.“Angiboni ukuthi kulula kuyena ukuthi enze njalo ngoba akasebenzi ndawo. Ngeke uthi usemncane ngangaye ungakabi ngisho neminyaka engu-40, kube sekuthiwa wake waba wumsakazi, wake wethula uhlelo lwethelevishini, wake waba usomahlaya. Kumele uzibuze ukuthi yini le ekuxosha kuyona yonke le ndawo,” usho kanje.Kuthintwa uKini, uthe ngokwakhe bebezidlalela noFelix ngoba wazi ukuthi bangabangani.“Ngibona ukuthi ucasulwe ukuthi kunabantu abasuke basizakala ngamahlaya ebengiwenza ngaye ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Ngokwazi kwami asinankinga nencane naye futhi ukugconana kusukele ekudlalisaneni kwethu. Kunabantu engibona ukuthi bebevele bemcuphile, abasizakele uma kukhona into embi eshiwo ngaye,” kuchaza uKini.UFelix uncome uhlelo athe walufica lunabalaleli abangu-400 000 lwanyuka lwaba nabangaphezu kuka-900 000 selushayelwa nguyena.UKini ubhale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi uFelix akangakhulumi ngezinamba ngoba mdala kunonkosikazi wakhe. Uveze nokuthi uFelix waqeda umatric ngo-1993 kodwa unkosikazi wakhe wazalwa ngo-2001.Ugcine esethi kumele aveze nesitatimende sasebhange uma kungukuthi izibalo zenza abe nemali, wahlekisa nangobuntu bukaFelix.Kwezinye zezinto abezibhala uKini, uthe uma enenkinga uFelix kumele eze kuye amphuzise ugologo wakhe omusha iKwaZulu Gin ukuze izinto zakhe zicace. UFelix uthe akanasikathi seKwaZulu Gin okungaveli nokuthi idayisaphi.UKINI Shandu uthi ubezidlalela noFelix Hlophe ngokumgcona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana Isithombe: INSTAGRAMUFELIX Hlophe uthi iwubuthakathi into eyenziwe wuKini Shandu yokumhlambalaza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana Isithombe: INSTAGRAM
title: UFelix usola uKini ngokudicilela phansi isithunzi sakhe

text: SIZWAKELE isikhalo somphakathi obufuna kufakwe uMnuz Bheki Cele abe wuNgqongqoshe wezamaPhoyisa njengoba uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ememezele ukuthi uzongena kulesi sikhundla ngesikhathi ememezela izinguquko kwiKhabhinethi yakhe izolo ebusuku.UDkt Zweli Mkhize, obengumgcinimafa we-ANC, ngomunye wabantu abamenyezelwe ukuthi uma esefungisiwe namhlanje njengamalungu ePhalamende uzothatha isikhundla sokuba nguNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu.UMnuz Nhlanhla Nene, owaxoshwa ngowayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma ubuyele kwesikaNgqongqoshe weziMali kwathi iphini lakhe nguMnuz Mondli Gungubele.Kuphelile nokuqagela ngesikhundla sephini likamengameli wezwe njengoba ememezele kuthi iphini lakhe kwi-ANC, uMnuz David Mabuza, uzoba yiphini likamengameli wezwe uma esefungisiwe namhlanje ePhalamende.Umemezele uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, owayegaqele esokuba umengameli we-ANC kwesikangqongqoshe ehhovisi likamengameli ebhekele ukuhlela. UNksz Bathabile Dlamini ususiwe emnyangweni wezeNhlalakahle wayiswa emnyangweni wabesifa-zane nabaphila nokukhubazeka ehhovisi likamengameli.UMnuz Malusi Gigaba umyise emnyangweni wezaseKhaya, ake wawuphatha.UMnuz Jeff Radebe yena umyise emnyangweni wezamandla emsusa ehhovisi likamengameli kwathi uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, naye owaxoshwa nguZuma, waya emnyangweni wezamabhizinisi kahulumeni.UNksz Ayanda Dlodlo usenguNgqongqoshe wezisebenzi zikahulumeni nokuphatha kwathi uNksz Lindiwe Sisulu, obengungqongqoshe wezokuhlaliswa kwabantu, wayiswa emnyangweni wezobudlelwano namazwe omhlaba.UMnuz Thulas Nxesi, ungungqongqoshe wezemisebenzi yomphakathi kwathi uMnuz Gugile Nkwiti waba ngungqongqoshe wezamanzi.UDkt Blade Nzimande, unobhala jikelele we-SACP, ungene emnyangweni wezokuThutha kwathi uNksz Thokozile Xasa wajutshelwa emnyangweni wezemidlalo.UNkk Nomvula Mokonyane, obengungqongqoshe wezamanzi ujutshelwe emnyangweni wezokuxhumana kwathi uNksz Susan Shabangu wajutshelwa emnyangweni wezenhlalakahle.USihlalo we-ANC, uMnuz Gwede Mantashe, ujutshelwe emnyangweni wezokumbiwa phansi.UNkk Naledi Pandor umjube emnyangweni wemfundo ephakeme, kwathi emnyangweni wezokuhlaliswa kwabantu wafaka uNkk Nomaindia Mfeketo. UNkk Maite Nkoana Mashabane umjubele kwezokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya kwathi kwezokuphepha kombuso wafaka uNksz Letsasti Duba. Kwezesayensi nobuchwepheshe wafaka uNkk Nkhensani Kubayi Ngubane kwathi kwezokuvakasha wafaka uMnuz Derek Hanekom.ONgqongqoshe abaxoshiwe ngoMnuz Fikile Mbalula kwezamaphoyisa, David Mahlobo obekwezamandla, uMnuz Des Van Rooyen, obephethe umnyango wezokubusa ngokubambisana, uMnuz Mosebenzi Zwane obekwezezimayini noNksz Lynne Brown noNksz Faith Muthambi. Uphinde wenza izinguquko kumaphini ongqongqoshe.Omunye wongqongqoshe oxoshiwe nguMnuz Bongani Bongo obengungqongqoshe wezokuphepha kwezwe. Omunye wabantu abazofungiswa namhlanje njengelungu lePhalamende nguNkk Peggy Nkonyeni,owayengungqongqoshe wezemfundo KwaZulu-Natal owaxoshwa.
title: UCele ubuyele kwesamaphoyisa

text: UMUHAMMAD ALi wake wathi ‘uma untweza emkhathini ngebhanoyi, ngisho ungalimisa noma yikuphi nezwe ubuze ukuthi ngubani uMahamed Ali abantu oyobuza kubo bayokutshela ngami.’Cishe yisimo esithi asifane nakuBryan Habana, inkakha yamaBhokobhoko ememezele izolo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi isiwagaxa emgibeni amakhokho ayo.Noma engefaniswe nengqwele yesibhakela engu-Ali (ongasekho) kodwa zincane kakhulu, uma zikhona, izindawo eNingizimu Afrika othi uma ukhuluma khona ngombhoxo kuvele ukuthi uHabana akaziwa. Nayizolo ngesikhathi le nsephe iveza ukuthi isithi khumu, bancane abantu ababe nokudideka ukuthi kukhulunywa ngobani kwazise nguHabana owaqhulula ama-try anqobisa amaBhokobhoko iWebb Ellis (isicoco somhlaba) eFrance ngo-2007.UHabana (34) uwagaxa amakhokho akhe ephethe amarekhodi ambalwa amqoka embhoxweni waseNingizimu Afrika;Yiyo insephe yaseGoli ephethe irekhodi lama-try amaningi kumaBhokobhoko emidlalweni yamazwe ngawu-67 ewashaye phakathi kuka-2004 no-2016.Nguye onama-try amaningi, ngawu-38, awashaye ngaphandle kwezwe lakhe ukwedlula bonke abanye abadlali emlandweni wombhoxo emhlabeni.Le nsizwa isendaweni yesibili kubadlali asebedlalele amaBhokobhoko kakhulu. Inemidlalo engu-124 nokuyibeka ngemuva kukaVictor Matfield, obeyihola inqoba iSuper Rugby kwiBulls.Uqale wabhala kwi-Instagram uHabana ngaphambi kokuyisa kwi-Twitter isimemezelo sakhe sokuwagaxa emgibeni nokuyilapho eqinisekise khona ukuthi uphoqwa wukulimala kulesi sinqumo.“Sekuyisikhathi sami sokubonga. Umzuzu ongabalekeleki usufike qathatha futhi ngiwamukele, sengozishayela isiphuzo,” uHabana endlalela isimemezelo sakhe.“Sekuphele isikhathi esingaphezu konyaka ngihlalele ethembeni, ngiphusha, ngizinikela ekubuyeleni enkundleni okokugcina, ukuthola lowo muzwa wokuhlabana.“Ukuzwa inhlokomo yabalandeli noma ukuhlwitha iphilisi (ibhola lombhoxo) emoyeni. Ukungena ngendluzula endodeni noma ukushaya leyo try yokugcina yokunqoba umdlalo. Kodwa ngeshwa ngeke kusenzeka.“Nami, njengeningi, bengingajabula ukuthi impilo yami yokudlala iphele ngenye indlela kodwa kwesinye isikhathi izinto azihambi ngendlela esithanda ngayo. Ngakho ekupheleni kwesizini, yisikhathi sokuthi ngivalelise ngibonge emdlalweni engiwuthanda kakhulu.”UHabana ugcine ukudlala kwiToulon yaseFrance nayijoyine ngo-2014 esuka kwiStormers. IToulon uyisize yanqoba i-European Cup kabili, ngo-2014 nango-2015. Ngawo * -2014 uphinde wayisiza yanqoba iFrench Top 14.Sekuphele izinyanga ezingu-12 enesa idolo okuyilo elimyekisa ukudlala.ISuper Rugby uyinqobe kabili neBlue Bulls.Okunye ngoHabana:Ngo-2005, 2007 nango-2012 uqokwe njengeSARU Player of The Year.Ngo-2007 nango-2012 uhlabane ngeSuperSport Try of the Year.Ngo-2007 i-International Rugby Board imklomelise nge-IRB Player of The Year kwathi i-International Rugby Player’s Association yamnika umklomelo we-Try of the Year ngo-2012.
title: Usewagaxa emgibeni uHabana

text: KHETHA SANGWENIUMPHATHI weMichael Owen Productions, u-Owen Ndlovu uthi buzochitheka bugayiwe kuKhozi FM njengoba luveze ukuthi kuzovotelwa ingoma ezohlukanisa unyaka njengoba lumemezele izingoma ezingu-10 ezizovotelwa.UKhozi FM lumemezele ingoma kaKelly Khumalo ethi: Empini  (A), Your Love ka-Azania (B) , Festive kaDJ Hlo (C), Imali Eningi kaBig Zulu (D), John Vuli Gate yeMapara A Jazz (E), Amageja yeNdlabeyiphika (F), Uthando  yeSoulmatrix (G), Ijele likaKhuzani (H), Xola Moya Wami kaNomcebo Zikode (I) naManikiniki eMFR Souls (J).U-Owen uthe kumanje abameli bakhe sebeyithumelile incwadi kwaSABC emisa ukuthi lezi zingoma zivotelwe ngoba ukuzivotela kungumqondo wakhe.“Anginankinga ngeTop 10 yoKhozi FM, kodwa enginenkinga nakho ukuthi bathi kuzovotwa ukuze kubekhona ewinayo. Uma sekuvotwa lokho kuzobe kusho ukuthi sebethatha umsebenzi wami ngaphandle kwesivumelwano. Nanyakenye saqala sabaxwayisa ngalesi senzo sabo bangafuna ukulalela. Njengoba sebethe kuzovotwa, kuyacaca ukuthi kumele sihlangane enkantolo ngoba asivumelene ngalokho abakwenzayo. Bangaqhubeka ngokuthanda kwabo kodwa engimi kukona ukuthi ngeke imenyezelwe ingoma ezohlukanisa unyaka uma kungukuthi izovotelwa. Nabazovota kuzomele bazi ukuthi bazilahlela imali yabo ngoba ngeke imenyezelwe ingoma yonyaka njengonyaka odlule,” kusho u-Owen.Uthe uma kusondela izinsuku zokuthi kumenyezelwe ingoma ezohlukanisa unyaka bengakuhoxisile ukuthi iyavotelwa bazovinjwa yinkantolo abakwaSABC.Umkhulumeli weSABC obambile, uMmoni Seapolelo, uthe iSABC ibonile ukuthi umkhankaso weNgoma Ehlukanisa Unyaka uyathandwa ngabantu. “Lo mkhankaso unxusa abalaleli ukuthi bavotele ingoma abayithandayo kwezingu-10 ezimenyezelwe. I-SABC izoqhubeka nalo mkhankaso noma ngabe u-Owen Ndlovu weMichael Owen Productions (MOP) usabisa ngokuwumisa. I-SABC ingakuqinisekisa ukuthi isikhalo ebesibhekiswe kuyona ebesifakwe yiMichael Owen Productions ngoDisemba nyakenye sachithwa uyena uMnuz Owen Ndlovu ngoJanuwari nonyaka. Ngaleyo ndlela alukho udaba olungaxazululekile phakathi kweSABC neMichael Owen Productions. Inkontileka yeSummer Song eyayiphakathi kweMOP neSABC isiphelelwe yisikhathi futhi ayivuselelwanga. Amalungelo eMOP eyayinawo ngeSummer Song sekungaweSABC njengoba yawathenga. Nemali enguR500 000 ekweletwa yiMOP okwakumele ikhokhelwe iciko elidumile ngenxa yalo mkhankaso, iSABC yayalelwa yisikhonzi senkantolo ephakeme ukuthi ingayikhokhi," kusho uMmoni. Uthe abalaleli bangaqhubeka nokuvota ngokuthumela umqhafazo othi: “ Ingoma” nohlamvu lwengoma abayivotelayo ku-33665. Umyalezo ubiza u-R1.50 kanti imiyalezo yamahhala ayisebenzi. Ukuvota kuvalwa ngo: 1 emini ngoDisemba 31.
title: UKhozi lungase luhlangabezane nembibizane ngeyonyaka

text: OBEYIMEYA yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede uthe maduzane uzomemezela umgudu azowuthatha kulandela ukuxoshwa kwakhe kulesi sikhundla.UNkk Gumede, othumele isitatimende kwabezindaba izolo, uthe ufuna ukugeza igama lakhe njengoba engeke avume ukuthi athuliswe.“Ngicabanga ukuthi kubalulekile ukuthi ngigeze igama lami ikakhulu njengoba ngibe owesifazane wokuqala ukuba imeya yedolobha elihle futhi ngiwusihlalo wokuqala wesifunda esikhulu se-ANC kuleli. Ngeke ngivume ukuthi ngenziwe imvu yomhlatshelo. Nginxusa umphakathi nabezindaba ukuthi balinde ngize ngenze isimemezelo,” kusho uNkk Gumede.Usho lokhu nje sekuqalile kunamagama abantu abavelayo okuthi kungenzeka bajutshelwe kwesobumeya.USihlalo weSACP KwaZulu-Natal, oke waba yiMeya kaMasipala weTheku, uMnuz James Nxumalo, uthi akunikwe i-ANC ithuba isingathe umsebenzi wokuvala isikhala semeya yeTheku esivuleke emuva kokuxoshwa kukaNkk Zandile Gumede. Izembe likhale kuNkk Gumede naso sonke isigungu esilwula ukusebenza kukamasipala.UNxumalo ubephawula ebuzwa ngomkhankaso wabantu abathi akabuyiselwe aphathe lo mkhandlu. Uthe nakuba ezwa kukhulunywa ngaleyo nto kodwa akaze ayinake ngoba ihamba ikhulunywa abantu nje.Selokhu kuxoshwe uNkk Gumede abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bathi bayakholelwa kuNxumalo ngoba wawuphatha kahle uMasipala weTheku ngesikhathi sakhe.Lo mholi uthi imigomo yokuziphatha kwamalungu ayivumi ukuthi bahambe bekhuluma ngezindaba zokujutshwa kwabantu ezikhundleni.Ushintsho olwenziwe yi-ANC komasipala ludale ukuthi kuvele amagama amaningi ayamaniswa nezikhundla.Kuxoshwe uNkk Gumede kwaphidna kwaxoshwa uMnuz Themba Njilo obephethe uMasipala uMsunduzi ongaphansi komlawuli.Amalungu e-ANC amatasa, akhuluma ngamagama abantu angafisa ukuthi bathathe izikhundla.UNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, ngoLwesibili uthe bazozivala izikhala ngokushesha, ngeke ziphele izinsuku eziyisikhombisa bengazivalile.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, uthe unalo uhlelo lokusiza omasipala ukuba bamukele labo abazovala izikhala.Uthe bazomemezela maduze ukuthi bazohlangana nini nomasipala abathintekayo ukuze kuxoxwe ngomsebenzi.
title: Obeyimeya ufuna ukugeza igama lakhe

text: USHAYE ingwiji, wahoxisa ukufaka isicelo sebheyili osolwa ecaleni lokubulala intombi yakhe, obevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza izolo.UMnuz Siphamandla Sangweni (28), ubhekene necala lokubulala owayeyintombi yakhe uNksz Ayanda Ngcobo (24) ngenyanga edlule, isidumbu sakhe esatholakala endlini kaSangweni KwaJ Mlaza sinenxeba lokugwazwa esifubeni.U-Ayanda wayeyisitshudeni esenza unyaka wesibili emkhakheni wobuntatheli, eRosebank College, kanti indodana yabo yatholwa ingenamyocu eduze kwesidumbu sikanina.USangweni uboshwe ebhace eMzinto emuva kwezinsukwana kutholwe isidumbu sentombi yakhe.Uqale waveza ukuthi uzoliphika icala kodwa washaya ingwiji wathi uzolivuma.Enkantolo izolo, ummeli kamsolwa uMnuz Celani Dludla, uthe ummangalelwa akazulivuma icala futhi uzosebenzisa ilungelo lakhe lokuthula angaphenduli uma kunemibuzo abuzwa yona mayelana nokufakwa kwesicelo sebheyili.UDludla uthe lo ammele bekunguyena owondlayo ekhaya futhi akakaze etholakale enecala phambilini.Ummangalelwa uvumile ukuthi lesi sehlakalo senzeka kubo.“Ngaya ekhaya ukuyobona ubaba ukuze anginikeze izeluleko. Ngosuku olulandelayo kwafika amaphoyisa. Mhlambe ngubaba owabikela amaphoyisa ngami,” kusho uSangweni.Ngesikhathi ehlonywa ngemibuzo nguMshushisi kuleli cala, uNksz Nomkhosi Ngubeni, embuza ukuthi wayekuphi kwenzeka lesi sehlakalo, uthe:“Ngifuna ukwazi isehlakalo okhuluma ngaso sihlobene kanjani nokufakwa kwesicelo sebheyili nanokuthi yisiphi isehlakalo okhuluma ngaso.”Imantshi kuleli cala, u-Asheena Bacharam, iveze ukuthi izokuvumela ukubuzwa kukammangalelwaukuze athole ithuba lokubekela inkantolo ukuthi kungani kumele athole ibheyili.USangweni uvumile ukuthi umufi ungunina wengane yakhe, waphinde wathi uzimisele ukuvuma icala, wakuhoxisa ukufaka isicelo sebheyili.Icala lihlehlele uNovemba 26, kubuyekezwe imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwesidumbu nesinqumo senkantolo yesifunda ngokushintsha umqondo kukaSangweni ekutheni avume icala.
title: Uhoxise isicelo sebheyili 'owabulala' intombi yakhe

text: KONKE sekumi ngomumo kumaSpringboks Sevens neSpringboks Women’s Sevens okungamathemba eNingizimu Afrika aseSan Francisco, e-United States of America, lapho kuqala khona ushikishi lweRugby World Cup Sevens kusukela kusasa ekuseni kuya ngeSonto.Womabili la maqembu atheleke eMelika ngesonto eledlule lapho ebesayozizwisa khona yonke into ethinta leli dolobha ukuze kuthi kuqala imidlalo bonke abadlali sebejwayele konke abazobhekana nakho. Kuwathathe amahora angu-25 womabili la maqembu ukuba afike eMelika njengoba edlule naseFrankfurt, eGermany.“Bekusemqoka kakhulu ukuthi sisheshe sifike ukuze sijwayele ngokushesha kwazise isikhathi sokunethezeka sesiphelile manje. Kuqala umsebenzi onzima manje futhi sifika lapho wonke amaqembu efisa ukushaya thina kwazise singompetha beWorld’s Series,” usho kanje uRosco Specman.Ngokusho kwalo mdlali bonke bakulungele ukuqala kwemidlalo futhi bazimisele ukuqeda ishobolo lokungayiwini le nkomishi esibahlule amahlandla amathathu.Bonke abadlali abangu-12 abaqokwe uNeil Powell bebekhona cishe kuyona yonke imilenze yeHSBC ngakho-ke bayimiqemane futhi bajwayelene. Nakuba kunjalo kodwa ukaputeni uPhilip Snyman kuphela oseke wadlala kwiNdebe yoMhlaba. Lokhu usekwenze kabili eDubai ngo-2012 naseRussia, eMoscow ngo-2013.Ezinye ezimnandi lapho ezokululama kwezinkakha zaleli qembu ezingoSpecman noSelvyn Davids, bobabili abangadlalanga eLondon naseParis ngenxa yokuthinteka.Abekho oKyle Brown, Cecil Afrika, Chris Dry, Seabelo Senatla (bonke abebekhona eMoscow ngo-2013), Tim Agaba noStedman Gans ngenxa yokulimala. UKwagga Smith noSikhumbuzo Notshe bona ababizwanga ngoba bevalelwe zinkontileka kwiVodacom Super Rugby.EzikaPowell zona ziqala kusasa nozonqoba phakathi kwe-Ireland neChile kanti abesifazane bona baqala ekuseni khona namuhla neRussia okungelinye la mazwe abhekwe ukuba ahambe ibanga elide ngasohlangothini lwabesifazane.
title: Intaka ibekelwe amazolo kweyoMhlaba kuma-Sevens

text: UMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli owengamelwe wuDkt Zwelini Mkhize uzophenya kabanzi ngokushona kukasomabhizinisi obesanda kumbhalela incwadi ekhononda ngenhlalo engeyinhle esikhungweni abagonqiswe kuso ngenxa yokuhaqwa yiCovid-19.UShonisani Lethole, 33, ushone ngemuva kwezinsuku ezinhlanu ethumele isikhalazo sokuncishwa ukudla esibhedlela esiseTembisa eGauteng.Ubhalele uMnyango kaMkhize esebenzisa uTwitter, kodwa ngebhadi uze wadlula emhlabeni angayitholanga impendulo.Kuleli khasi watshela uMkhize ukuthi sekuphele amahora awu-48 engakaze akuthi mbibi ukudla.“Mkhize .....akusabekezeleleki. Laba bantu abanandaba nathi. Sekuphele amahora awu-48 ngingakaze ngidle,"kusho lo somabhizinisi ebhala kuTwitter kaMkhize.ULethole ushonele kusona lesi sibhedlela abekhalaza ngaso. Wayebhalele uMkhize ngoJune 25.Wayamukelwe kulesi sibhedlela ngoJune 22 kulandela ukuthi ebe nezinkinga ezihambisana nokuphefumula kanzima.Ihhovisi likaMkhize litshele iphephandaba eliwuzakwabo weSolezwe ukuthi lesi sikhalazo salo somabhizinisi siyaphenywa.“Empeleni beluvele lukhona uphenyo olunzulu olwenziwayo ngalolu daba. Silindele,” kusho okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo uDkt Lwazi Manzi. Ngokukayise kaShonisani Lethole, u-Albert, abasebenzi bezempilo bafikile ngoLwesine bezoxolisa emndenini.“Kuyajabulisa ukuthi bafikile bazoxolisa kithinina. Akukho okutheni okudingidiwe ngaphandle kokuxolisa kwabo.Bathembisa ukubuye beze kithina ngemuva komngcwabo,"usho kanje.Umzala kamufi ozibize ngoBusi, uthe umndeni ufuna izimpendulo ngalokhu, ufuna nokuthi kube khona ojezayo ngokufa kwalo somabhizinisi.
title: UMnyango wezeMpilo uphenya ngesiguli esife sincishwa ukudla siphethwe yiCovid-19

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUUBUHIXIHIXI bomsindo kucishe kona umcimbi wokwamukela abafundi abasha eMangosuthu University of Technology ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku obekuthi abafundi besegiyeni lokudansa uvele unqamuke.Lokhu kugqame kakhulu ngesikhathi sekudlala uDJ Masiya obebadida ngezingoma ze-electro.Ngesikhathi eqala umsindo ube mkhulu kakhulu kwabonakala abafundi bedansa beze baphakamise izandla, kuthe esefaka ingoma yesibili kwathi nyampu.Onjiniyela bomsindo bazamile ukulungisa umcimbi waqhubeka.UMasiya umemeze ngombhobho wathi akaphumi esiteji uyaqhubeka.Umcimbi uqhubeke kahle abafundi bajabulela umculo.Abanye oDJ abebedlala ngoDJ Nzwiri, DJ Mngani nabanye.USlot obedansa aze ashone phansi ubengumphathi wohlelo eshintshana noDJ Oros.Abaphathi bohlelo bebelokhu bememeze njalo bethi uProfessor, Uhuru noNaak Musiq odlala indawo kaMJ ku
Generations basendleleni.Lokhu kuhlalise abafundi abebedansa baze bashaye nomdanso wokudlalisa izinqe okuthiwa uku-twerka. Abanye abafundi uNtando noNellz bagibele esiteje ba-twerka.UProfessor uze wangena esiteji sekuyoshaya u-1 entathakusa kwasondela abafundi abaningi phambi kwesiteji.Ushaye izingoma zakhe adume ngazo ezithi 
Finger Prints, 
Imoto Entshontsh’imali, 
Baphi, 
One Night Stand nezinye.Ubephelezelwa ngabafowabo uBheki noCharacter oshaye izingoma zakhe 
Inxeba nethi 
Ngu-X.Ngemuva kukaProfessor kungene uNaak Musiq osanda kukhipha i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala ethi 
Love And Music.UNaak ushaye izingoma zakhe okubalwa kuzona ethi 
Qina ayenza noDJ Sbu, 
Yini ayenza noHeavy K nezinye.Ithimba le
Solezwe lihambe kuthiwa i-Uhuru isendleleni kanti noProfessor ubeyilindile ukuze ashaye ingoma yabo ethi 
Y-tjukutja.
title: Kucishe konakala kowokwamukela abafundi abasha eMUT

text: I-ANC KwaZulu-Natal imincile ngemiphumela yokhetho lokuchibiyela obeluyizolo.Okumincise kakhulu leli qembu umphumela waku-ward 14 kuMasipala wasoPhongolo.Uma leli qembu lingase liphunyukwe yile ward, lingaba sengcupheni yokulahlekelwa yilo masipala.I-ANC  inezihlalo ezingu-15 kwezingu-29 kulo masipala kanti amaqembu aphikisayo anezihlalo ezingu-14 ehlangene.I-ANC kulesifundazwe ihlalele ovalweni lokuthi uma leli ward lingawinwa elinye lamaqembu aphikisayo, angahlangana  aketule ubuholi bukamasipala njengoba ezobe esenezihlalo ezingu-15, i-ANC isele nezingu-14.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Nhlakanipho Ntombela, uvumile ukuthi babambe umoya ngemiphumela yakule ward.“Simincile ngoba ukulahlekelwa iyona  kungasho ukulahlekelwa umasipala. Sisebenze kanzima kakhulu kuyona . Siyethemba sizonqoba.”Isikhala kule ward sivuleke emva kokushona kwekhansela le-ANC, uNkk Nomusa Nxumalo, owashona engozini yemoto.Likwayisikhombisa  KwaZulu-Natal abenokhetho lokuchibiyela izolo.Ukhetho lokuchibiyela belukhona naku-ward 110 eThekwini, ward 11 eNquthu, ward 2 eNdumeni  naku-ward 15, 22 no-30 eMhlathuze.UNtombela uthe i-ward abayibheke kakhulu u-ward 110 eThekwini.Leli ward liphethwe yiDA eyalihlwitha kuyo i-ANC ngokhetho olwedlule.UNtombela uthe bafuna ukuyibuyisa.Kepha iDA nayo ithe iyazethemba ukuthi izokwazi ukunqoba kule ward.Usihlalo weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Dean Macpherson, uthe umkhankaso wabo uhambe kahle kakhulu, wathi abakungabazi ukuthi bazolunqoba lolu khetho.Izakhamizi zakulewardi, ziphume ngobuningi bazo izolo ukuyovota.UNkk Winnie Zulu (81), uthe ubengeke aphuthelwe ithuba lokuzwakalisa uvo lwakhe ngevoti.“Ngizizwa ngijabule kakhulu ngokuthola ithuba lokuvota. Ngevoti lami ngifisa sithole umjovo, sivimbe  iCorona.UNkk Philisiwe Mdlalose (58), uthe ufisa ukuthi ikhansela elizongena libalungisele izindlu liphinde lilwele nokuthi kwakhiwe isikole samabanga aphezulu endaweni.“Izingane zifunda kude kakhulu.”UNkk Simangele Mayisa (66) uthe  ufisa kudaleke amathuba emisebenzi.“Izingane zethu azisebenzi.”Elinye lama-ward abhekwe kakhulu, u-ward 11 eNquthu.Leli ward beliphethwe yikhansela le-IFP, uMnuz Siyabonga Mabilabila Kunene, owaxoshwa njengemeya  nekhansela leqembu ngonyaka odlule.Manje uKunene usehlubukele kwi-ABC, kanti kulindeleke ukuthi ayithwalise kanzima i-IFP.I-IFP ne-ABC, bathe bayazithemba ukuthi bazowudla umhlanganiso kule ward.Kuzwelonke ukhetho lokuchibiyela belukuma-ward  angu-40, awu-16 eGauteng, awu-7 e-Eastern Cape, awu-2 eFree State, awu-4 eLimpopo nawu-4 eMpumalanga.Imiphumela kulindeleke ukuthi imenyezelwe namhlanje.
title: I-ANC imincile ngemiphumela yokhetho lokuchibiyela

text: SEKUQUBUKE indida ngekusasa likaFloyd Mbele oyisikhulu se-Orlando Pirates esiphenduke ihlaya ngokubhacaza.Okushiya imibuzo ngekusasa likaMbele kwiPirates wukuthi iBucs isijoyinwe nguDereck Blanckensee phambilini obeyimenenja kuPremier Soccer League.Izolo ntambama uBlanckensee uqinisekise ngesikhathi ekhuluma neSolezwe ukuthi usesebenzela iBucs. “Yebo yiqiniso ukuthi sengisebenzela iPirates. Ngiqale kwiPirates ngoJuni 1. Umsebenzi uthinta izinto ezithinta abadlali nehhovisi leqembu. Mayelana nokuthi ngingene esikhundleni sikabani anginalo ulwazi. Mina ngiqashelwe ukuzokwenza lo msebenzi engikhuluma ngawo."Umsebenzi lo uBlanckensee akhuluma ngawo ohlanganisa ukuphathwa kwabadllai nokwenza ehhovisi, bewenziwa wuMbele. UMbele nguyena obephawula kwabezindaba uma kuthintwa ezokudedelwa nokusayiniswa kwabadlali.“Ngijabule ngokusebenzela iqembu elikhulu njengePirates. Ngiyethemba ngesipiliyoni sami seminyaka engu-40 ngisebholeni ngizokwazi ukusiza iqembu ekutheni liye phambili. Ngifuna ukubonga usihlalo u-Irvin Khoza ngethuba anginike lona,” kusho uBlanckensee.UMbele ungomunye wabahlezi bekhonjwa ngenjumbane ngabalandeli uma izinto zingahambi kahle kwiBucs njengoba kwenzekile kule sizini edlule.IBucs eqede ngaphandle kweTop 8 kwi-Absa Premiership ngempelasonto ithelwe ngehlazo iSuperSport United iyihlula ngo 4-1 kowamanqamu eNedbank Cup.Lo mdlalo ubuyithuba lokugcina kweZimnyama ukunikeza abalandeli into abazoyijabulela njengoba iqembu lihlanganisa iminyaka engu-80 lasungulwa.Omunye wabalandeli bokuqina beBucs, uMusa Sokhulu usanda kutshela leli phephandaba ukuthi ngeke kulunge lutho kuPirates kusekhona uMbele noStanley “Screamer” Tshabalala akholwa wukuthi baphazamisa ukusebenza kwabaqeqeshi.“Ngeke kulunge lutho lapha uma kusekhona la madoda amabili uFloyd Mbele noScreamer. Ngisho bengalanda uJose Mourinho ngeke aphumelele ngoba la madoda yiwona aqeqesha abaqeqeshi. Phela asizona izingane. Siyabona okwenzeka eqenjini. Asikwazi ukushaywa ngezibalo zamagoli amangaka ngesizini eyodwa,” kusho uSokhulu.Izolo imizamo yokuthola uMbele ukuthi aziphawulele ngalolu daba igcine iphunzile kwazise ucingo lwakhe luqale lakhala langabanjwa. Ekuhambeni kwesikhathi bese luvaliwe.Kuthintwa uThandi Merafe wezokuxhumana kuPirates ucingo belukhala bese liyavalwa. Leli phephandaba libe selizama ukuthinta ihhovisi lePirates ngenhloso yokuthi lifakwe ocingweni lukaMbele kodwa owesifazane obambe ucingo uveze ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi usehambile ngoba belungabanjwa.Lona wesimame uthe uMbele ubekhona ehhovisi njengenjwayelo. IPirates isiqede amasizini amathathu elandelana ingawini lutho. Igcine ukuphakamisa isicoco ngo-2014 ithatha isicoco neseNedbank Cup.Thumela umbono ngalolu daba kuFacebook (Isolezwe), kuTwitter (@isolezwenews)
title: Indida ngekusasa lesikhulu sePirates

text: USWELE umgodi wokucasha uSiphiwe "Shabba" Tshabalala ngesikhathi kuba nguyena kuphela ogeja iphenathi kubadlali abayishumi abawathathile okuholele ekutheni iqembu lakhe i-Erzurumspor likhishwe ama-amesha emzuliswaneni wesithathu weTurkish Cup.Izinkinga zimlandele uShabba eTurkey kwazise namanje usazama ukuzifaka enhliziyweni yomqeqeshi. Ngempelasonto uShabba ufakwe sekusele imizuzu embalwa ukuthi umdlalo uphele koweligi kodwa kwakhethwa yena futhi ukuthi aphume ngesikhathi sekunozakwabo okhishwe ngekhadi elibomvu.Kuze kube yimanje iqembu likaShabba lisaphumelele ukuqoqa amaphuzu ayisikhombisa kuphela emidlalweni yeligi eyishumi. Lokhu kubeka i-Erzurumspor emsileni kwi-log yesigaba esikhulu sakuleliya lizwe. Kulo mdlalo ezikaShabba zishaywe ngo 5-4 sekukhahlelwa amaphenathi umdlalo kade uphele kungu 1-1.Leli qembu elishaye i-Erzurumspor lihleli endaweni yesikhombisa esigabeni esiphakela isigaba esikhulu.Yize ekhishwe esanda kufakwa ngempelasonto uShabba, uqale umdlalo wakhe wesithathu wesithathu kusukela eshiye kwiKaizer Chiefs ezinyangeni ezedlule.Ngemuva kokuthi umdlalo uphele kungu 0-0 esiwombeni sokuqala, i-Erzurumspor ilibeke enethini ngomzuzu ka-60 kodwa lokhu akuzange kuyiwelisele ngaphesheya njengoba izivakashi zilinganise ngomzuzu ka-90. Kuthe uma zidlulela kwi-extra time ama-amesha alibeka enethini ngomzuzu ka-118 obekubukeka sengathi kuzoba ilona igoli lokuwina.Esikhathini somusa kanondweba iqembu lasekhaya lilidumise enethini okuholele ekutheni ziwelele ekukhahlelweni kwamaphenathi. UTshabalala unikwe ukuba athathe iphenathi yesibili.Kubona bonke abadlali abawu-10 abathathe amaphenathi zinhlangothi zombili, uTshabalala kwaba uyena yedwa oyishwebayo. Umdlalo uphele kungu 5-4 ngoba ama-amesha awadumise enethini wonke awawo yaphuma kanjalo kwiTurkish Cup i-Erzurumspor.
title: UShabba udlise iqembu egeja iphenathi

text: LUTHELA izithelo ezinhle uhlelo lokuthi kube namaphoyisa ehostela laseGlebelands, eMlaza njengoba ngeSonto kuboshwe indoda ethinteka emacaleni amabili okubulawa kwabantu kuleli hostela.Le ndoda engeke idalulwe igama ngenxa yokuthi ivela namhlanje eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza, ibanjwe emuva kophenyo olunzulu lwamaphoyisa.NgoDisemba 1 uNgqongqoshe wamaphoyisa kuzwelonke uMnuz Fikile Mbalula uvule ngokusemthethweni isiteshi samaphoyisa esingumahamba nendlwana ehostela laseGlebelands waqinisekisa ukuthi bazozibopha zonke izigebengu ezibulala abantu kuleli hostela.ULt-Col Thulani Zwane wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uthe izinhlaka zamaphoyisa ezihlukene zilandele umsolwa zamthola nesibhamu esincane esingekho emthethweni nezinhlamvu ezingu-15.“Umsolwa uthinteka emacaleni amabili okubulala ehostela laseGlebelands namanye okubulala abhaliswe esiteshini samaphoyisa iBhekithemba. Ubekwe icala lokuphatha isibhamu esingekho emthethweni nezinhlamvu ezingekho emthethweni. Uzovela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza kusasa (namhlanje),” kusho uZwane.Uveze ukuthi elinye icala umsolwa athinteka kulo elokubulawa kukaNksz Tholakele Ngcangatha (30) owabulawa ngo-Agasti 3 walo nyaka.UKhomishana wamaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal osabambile, uMajor General Bheki Langa uwashayele ihlombe amaphoyisa abophe umsolwa, wathi asebenza kanzima ukuqeda ukubulawa kwabantu eGlebelands.“Sincoma umsebenzi omuhle owenziwe ngamaphoyisa wokulandela umkhondo wabasolwa ngokubulala futhi abahlalise lubhojozi abantu baseGlebelands. Amaphoyisa ethu ajutshwe kuleli hostela ayaqhubeka nokuphenya izigameko zokubulala nokuqinisekisa ukuthi kunokuthula nozinzo,” kusho uLanga.
title: Kuboshwe omunye osolwa ngokubulala eGlebe

text: STREAMING is an everyday part of life now, and it feels like there are ever more services vying for our attention. So how do you pick? With its focus on content South Africans will love, and combo of local gems and international hits, it might just be time to give Showmax a try. Here’s why.Showmax is the only place to experience all the drama on The Real Housewives of Durban, with new episodes coming every Friday. Keep up with the hottest telenovelas on TV with brand-new episodes of The River, The Queen, Gomora and more. Plus, check out the latest episodes of great shows like The Ranakas, eHostela or Mzali Wam, or binge favourites from the beginning like MnaKwethu and Unmarried.Feel like a movie? Try One Night Kwa Mxolisi, highly acclaimed Knuckle City or super fun and sexy Love Lives Here featuring that scene with Thando Thabete.Showmax is the only place to stream HBO and other series you won’t find anywhere elseShowmax has a catalogue of titles subscribers can’t find on any other channel or streaming service in South Africa, including HBO shows like Succession, Euphoria and Ridley Scott’s Raised by Wolves, and new documentaries like Allen v. Farrow and Crazy, Not Insane.Showmax’s original movies and series showcase homegrown talent in front of the camera, and behind them as well. Watch psychological thriller DAM, the hysterically funny mockumentary Tali’s Baby Diaries, and Nigerian original reality series I AM LAYCON, or Kenyan police procedural Crime and Justice.Short films, documentary films, full-length feature films – Showmax has them all. Like 21 Bridges starring the late Chadwick Boseman, star-studded whodunnit Knives Out and the latest Guy Ritchie movie, The Gentlemen.Showmax Pro delivers live sporting events, including selected weekly games from the English Premier League, La Liga and Serie A. There’s also boxing, basketball, athletics and sports highlights.Plus, sports fans will love to hear the inside scoop on big stars - try HBO’s documentary Tiger, take a deep look at South African MotoGP talent Brad Binder in Reflections 2.0, or hear the story of Liverpool manager Jürgen Klopp.Stream Showmax on multiple devicesWith Showmax, you can download the shows you want to watch and take them with you on smartphones and tablets. Showmax is also available on laptops, smart TVs, gaming consoles and more. Read more here.There’s a mobile-only version that’s 50% cheaper than the full versionChoose between two plans: Showmax or Showmax Pro. If you prefer to watch videos on your phone with mobile data or when you’re connected to wi-fi, both of these plans have mobile-only versions that are half the price of the full plans. The only difference is that you watch on your mobile device (phone or tablet) only, instead of watching on a variety of devices like a laptop, smart TV or gaming console.It’s easy to subscribeWorried that signing up is complicated? No worries – it takes less than five minutes to become a subscriber – go to showmax.com and follow the simple instructions. There are many ways to pay: with your credit card, by buying a voucher, or by adding to your DStv or cellphone bill. Find out more.There are no long-term contracts.Cancel anytime you like!Try Showmax free for 14 days at www.showmax.com, starting from R49 per month.
title: Why it’s time to give Showmax a try

text: USATHUTHUMELA umndeni womfundisi webandla iCovenant Fellowship Church International (CFCI) oLundi ngemuva kokuhlaselwa yizigebengu, ezithumbe umndeni wakhe zashaqa izimpahla zasendlini zamshiya emanxebanxeba ekhanda.Lo mfundisi kuthiwa usethuka izanya ngemuva kwalesi sehlakalo esenzeke ngoMgqibelo ebusuku oLundi.Ngokusho kwelinye ilungu elisonta kuleli bandla elicele ukungavezwa, lithe kugasele amadoda angaziwa afike ashaqa izimpahla zokugqoka, ama-laptop amane, amaselula nezinye izinto.Leli lungu lithe babe sebethumba nomndeni wakhe lapho befike bayiswa ehlathini bafunwa amakhadi asebhange.“Izigebengu zihambile zayokhipha imali esingakayazi ukuthi imalini. Cabanga bekunezingane ezivakashile nezabo njengoba nonkosikazi wakhe bemlimazile ekhanda. Izingane nazo ziphukile ezinye zinyelile,” kusho leli lungu.Ilungu lithe namanje lo mndeni uyathuthumela ngoba usaba ukuthi lezi zigebengu zingabuya.“Kumanje bebesasesibhedlela ngemuva kwalesi sehlakalo esishaqisayo. Wonke umuntu uthukile ngokwenzeke emndenini womfundisi,” kusho leli lungu.Lithe kodwa basola ukuthi ukulinyazwa komfundisi wabo kukhona umuntu okunguye owenza lokhu.“Kukhona izehlakalo zokubanjwa kwabantu inkunzi namagaraji, umuntu wakhona uyaziwa kodwa akaboshwa. Nakulokhu sisola yena ngoba umatasa nokuhlasela abefundisi asebehleli lubhojozi,” kuqhuba leli lungu. UMphostoli Collins Dhlomo, umholi we-CFCI, usigxeke kakhulu lesi senzo, wathi sibe nesihluku esibi njengoba lo mfundisi eshaywe phambi kukankosikazi wakhe ngezinsimbi kwakhunyuliswa nezingane zabo izingubo bekhonjwe ngezibhamu.Uthe sibathusile lesi sehlo wathi akuqali ukuthi lo mfundisi ahlaselwe njengoba nango-2015 ake ahlaselwa.“Siyafuna ukuthi babanjwe abenze lokhu ngoba kuyacaca umuntu oseduzane endaweni obaziyo. Umphakathi awuphume ngobuningi ubike uma kukhona ulwazi onalo ukuze baboshwe abenze lokhu,” kusho uDhlomo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa Captain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuphenywa icala lokubamba inkunzinelokuthumba.Uthe kuthathwe izimpahla zasendlini okubalwa namathelevishini nezinye izinto bathunjwa bayiswa ehlathini bayokhishiswa imali.Uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luyaqhubeka.
title: Umfundisi weCFCI uthunjwe nomndeni wabanjwa inkunzi

text: ISIBOSHWA esiphase kahle kunazo zonke emajele aseNingizimu Afrika sifuna ukumakelwa kabusha.UNhlakanipho Mpofana (21), odonsa iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili ngokuzama ukubulala, uthe ucabanga ukuthi kube namaphutha enzekile ngesikhathi emakelwa iMaths neGeography ngoba yizifundo abeziphasa kahle kakhulu phakathi nonyaka.UNhlakanipho, othole o-distinctions kwiLife Orientation, History, Tourism, nesiZulu, uhalaliselwe wuNgqongqoshe wezamaJele, u-Advocate Michael Masutha, emcimbini wokuhalalisela abafundi basemajele abenze kahle ku-matric obusejele eWestville izolo.U-Alexandra Jaime oboshwe ejele iBaviaanspoort, eGauteng, ube ngowesibili kwathi owesithathu kwaba uDziva Patson oboshwe noMpofana eWestville.UNhlakanipho uthe ubona sengathi kwaba nephutha ngesikhathi kumakwa iMaths neGeography eliholele ekutheni angabatholi o-distinction kuzo.UNhlakanipho wafika ejele ngo-2015 waqale wajoyina iqembu labazibiza ngama-26 ngemuva kwezinyanga ezintathu washiya phansi wakhetha ukufunda.“Umqondo wami wawusadungekile ngesikhathi ngifika kodwa ngabuye ngabona ukuthi akuyona into engiyifunayo ukujoyina amaqembu, ngashintsha ngakhetha ukufunda. Ngiboshwe nomfowethu, uSamkelo, naye odonsa isigwebo esifanayo. Ekhaya babengasikholwa uma sithi siyafunda, bakholwe ngoba sebezwa kuthiwa umfowethu nguye obashaye bonke emakhanda, nyakenye. Sesibuyelwe yisithunzi, udadewethu usenethemba lokuthi sizophuma lapha sesihlumelelisiwe. Sesilwenzile nohlelo lokuxolisa kulowo esamshaya samlimaza,” kusho uNhlakanipho.Uthe ufuna ukufundela ukuba wuthisha. Umfowabo wathi ufuna ukufundela i-meteorology.“Ngiyakholwa wukuthi ukube angiboshwanga ngabe ngaqhubeka nophuzo okuyinto esasiyenza ngokududana nabangani bami,” kusho uNhlakanipho.UMasutha uthe bayakholwa wukuthi imfundo yiyona engakhulula abantu, yingakho bezibophezele ezinhlelweni zokuthuthukisa intsha eboshiwe.“Ukuphasa kahle akusho ukuthi sewuzothola ushwele kodwa kusho ukuthi uma isiboshwa silandele yonke imigomo efanele futhi sifanele ukudedelwa sidonse isigwebo saso ngaphandle kuzokwenzeka,” kusho uMasutha.
title: Isiboshwa esiphase kahle sifuna ukumakelwa kabusha

text: USEPHAZAMISEKA nasemqondweni owesifazane othi waqolwa imali elinganiselwa kuR1 million yizinsizwa ezimbili zasesontweni likaPastor Sithembiso Zondo, wodumo lwezinkulumo ezakhayo emsakazweni Ukhozi FM.UNksz Wendy Mhlongo waseMasundwini, eShowe usonta ebandleni likaZondo, iZero to Hero eliseThekwini. Lo wesifazane, uthi waphunyelwa yimali yeRoad Accident Fund (RAF) emuva kokulimala engozini yomgwaqo, enesifiso sokuyisebenzisa ngendlela ezomlethela inzuzo, angayibhubhudli.Uthi konakala ukuba axoxele izinsizwa ezimbili esontweni ukuthi kunemali ayitholile. Zaqala zasondela kuyena zimtatamisa ngemoto uma ehambaizindlela zakhe kodokotela, esephenduke indlovukazi, zihlala zimsingethe kanti zigaqele imali.Uthi babehlangana ezindaweni zokudla eziphambili kupholwe khona kube kufakwa izimali ngeselula.“Baqala bangitshela ukuthi banamabhizinisi, kufanele ngifake imali kubona ukuze sisebenzisane. Nami ngabethemba ngoba sisonta nabo. Babeyithatha ngamancozu bebuye bayiboleke, enye bethi bazoyibuyisa nami ngibanike. Baze bathi banemisebenzi ngisho eTransnet. Ngathemba ukuthi kuzolunga,” kuchaza uNksz Mhlongo.Uthi emuva kwalokho baqala bambalekela bengasazibambi izingcingo zakhe, waze wabikela isoka lakhe athembisene nalo umshado, langenela nalo lazama lehluleka ukubathola. Uma bebatholile ocingweni babike imbiba nebuzi. Isitatimende sasebhange salo wesifazane siveza izimali ezingoR60 000 kokunye kube oR20 000 zingena kwi-akhawuntu yenye yalezi zinsizwa.Leli phephandaba likwazile ukubazingela lathola omunye walaba balisa, uMnuz Sipho Shezi ovumile ukuthi baba nesivumelwano nowesifazane, kwabheda izinto.“Sasizosebenzisana naye kweminye imisebenzi yethu kodwa izinto zangahamba kahle.Siyazama imizamo yokumkhokhela uma kukhona imali encane esiyitholayo asibalekile. Mina ngiseMpumalanga kade ngagcina esontweni ngenxa yomsebenzi,” kuchaza uShezi.UZondo ukhuze wababaza kodwa wavuma ukuthi uyamazi uShezi nenye insizwa abesebenzisana nayo kodwa akahlangene nabo, bahlukana kudala ngesikhathi kuqembuka ebandleni lakhe.“Hhayi bo (egagula umsolwa ongatholakalanga ukuze aphawule), ngiyamazi kakhulu kade ngabagcina!Ngike ngizwe nje ukuthi sebesonta kwenye indawo. Ngifuna ukuxhumana nalo mndeni oqoliwe ngizwe kahle indaba ngoba sekuthinteka igama lami,’’ kusho uZondo.
title: Usola izinsizwa zebandla likaZondo oqolwe uR1m

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMQEQESHI weSuperSport United uKaitano Tembo, uphume iqhubu noBradley Grobler noSipho Mbule ngesikhathi ezakhe zishaya ngo-2-1 iKaizer Chiefs, emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ngoLwesibili eLucas  Masterpieces Moripe Stadium.Kufanele ukuthi lapho ekhona u-Itumeleng Khune, uma ecabanga ngalezi zikhwishikhwishi, ushaywa uvalo njengoba bezibambisene ekumphenduleni isaka.Igoli lokuqala elingene ngenxa yephutha likaKhune, livalelwe phakathi nguBradley ngosizo lukaMbule.Kwelesibili kube uGrobler, odlulise ibhola kuMbule wavalela phakathi umgundatshani wegoli. Lokhu kwenze uGrobler walala isibili ngamagoli amahlanu.Phezulu kuqhwakele uThemba Zwane ngayisikhombisa.UTembo uthe imjabulisile indlela uMbule noGlobler abadlale ngayo.Uveze ukuthi okumchaza kakhulu ngegoli likaMbule, ukuthi bese kuphele isikhathi eside exabana naye ngenxa yokungashayi magoli.Uthe unethemba lokuthi uzofunda emaphutheni akhe, ukuze akwazi ukugcina umgqigqo omuhle.“UMbule uwumdlali wezinga eliphezulu. Nokho kunezinto ezithile okumele azilungise. Okokuqala kuzomele abe ngumqemane. Ukungaqini komzimba wakhe kuyamshaya. Nangesizini edlule uqale kahle kodwa maphakathi nayo wacwila, eshaywa yikho. Okunye, kuzomele afunde ukumelana nengcindezi. Esigabeni esidlala kuso uma uhlulwa yilezi zinto kawuyi ndawo,”  kubeka uTembo.Mayelana  noGrobler, uthe kuyamjabulisa ukuthi ubuya nomgqigqo wangesizini edlule wokushaya amagoli.“Ngimbona njalo ejimini. Phambi kwamapali uwumbese obukhali, ungafunga ukuthi uwumgadli osafuna ukuzenzela igama kwiDStv Premiership. Okwakhe kuhlukile, uyazi ukuthi kumele aqhubeke nokulwela iqembu noma kuvela ukuthi ufunwa amaqembu amakhulu. Iyangijabulisa indlela enza ngayo”.UGrobler omunye wabadlali abalime indima enkulu ekutheni Amatsatsantsa alale endaweni yesihlanu ngesizini edlule. Ushaye amagoli awu-14.UTembo uthe selokhu athatha izintambo zokuqeqesha kuMatsatsantsa, bahlale befuna okwengeziwe kubadlali. Izinhloso zabo kazijiki, bahlale befuna ukubalwa kumaqembu aphezulu.“Sizolwa kuze kunqamuke imilenze, nakulokhu sizoqhubeka nokulwela ukunqoba isicoco seligi. Selokhu ngathatha ngokuphelele kwesokuqeqesha sihlale sisemaqenjini asembangweni. Okusishayayo yisipiliyoni. Siphazamiswa yimidlalo embalwa,” kuchaza uTembo.Nakuba iSuperSport inqobile kodwa lo mqeqeshi uzwakalise ukungenami ngezinye zezinto ezenziwe abadlali bakhe. Ukhale kakhulu ngesiwombe sokuqala.“IChiefs bekumele iqede ngathi ngesiwombe sokuqala. Besilahla kalula ibhola futhi sitatazela. Okunye, bekungamele siyivumele ithole leya phenathi. Ngicabanga ukuthi lokhu kudalwe ukuthi bese kuphele amasonto amathathu singadlali.”NgoMgqibelo, ezikaTembo zizovakashela iBaroka FC ePeter Mokaba Stadium emdlalweni ozoqala ngo-3.30 ntambama.
title: UTembo uncoma ukuzinikela kwabadlali

text: USIYABONGA “Bhele” Nomvethe akakungabazi ukuthi AmaZulu FC azophuma kule ndawo embi akuyona kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership.Sekungumlando ukuthi Usuthu luphucwe amaphuzu ayisithupha yinhlangano eyengamele unobhutshuzwayo emhlabeni iFifa ngoSepthemba nonyaka. Lokhu kuthathe Inyokana Eluhlazana kwayiphonsa kwalasha njengoba iyibambe emsileni ngamaphuzu amane, emidlalweni eyishumi.Namuhla Usuthu luzotholana neHighlands Park emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eMakhulong Stadium ngo-7.30 ebusuku.“Nginethemba elikhulu lokuthi sizosuka lapho sikhona kungekudala. Ayikho into ezokonakala nakancane. Ngiyakholelwa ekutheni siyiqembu sisebenza kahle nangokuzimisela okukhulu. Sisazokhombisa kule midlalo ezolandela ukuthi siyawadinga kangakanani amaphuzu agcwele,” kusho uNomvethe.Selokhu kuqale isizini AmaZulu awakaze anqobe ekuhambeni. Nokho uNomvethe uthe konke lokho kuzoshintsha kungekudala.“Angiyiboni inkinga njengoba sizophuma siyodlala ngaphandle. Kuzofanele kube khona esibuya nakho. Inhloso wukuthola amaphuzu amathathu,” kuqhuba uNomvethe osanda kumemezela ukuthi yisizini yakhe yokugcina ebholeni elikhokhelayo.Okunye okubukeka kuwathikameza kakhulu AmaZulu wukuthi ekhaya awayinqobi imidlalo nokuyilapho esuke esihlula khona isitha asuke ebhekene naso ngokwezibalo kodwa kunqabe amagoli. Okunye okulimaza leli qembu wukushweba kwabadlali nxa bebhekene nepali ikakhulukazi abagadli.UNomvethe uthe akufanele amagoli abhekwe kubagadli kuphela kepha wonke umdlali woSuthu kufanele azithwese umthwalo wokushaya igoli uma kuvela ithuba.“Kufanele sisebenze kanzima singabadlali ukulungisa inkinga yamagoli. Noma yimuphi umdlali othola ithuba kufanele alisebenzise. Emdlalweni wethu nePolokwane City sasingaphezulu kwayo ngokomdlalo kodwa kwala inhlanhla yamagoli,” kubeka uNomvethe.AmaZulu anike * -Ayabulela Konqobe, obedlalela iChippa United, ithuba lokuba aziqeqeshe nawo ngenhloso yokumnika inkontileka uma echaze umqeqeshi uCavin Johnson. UKonqobe kungenzeka abe yimpendulo odongeni loSuthu olungenelwa amagoli alula amaningi awo adalwa amaphutha abadlali.
title: UBhele akalilahlile ithemba ngoSuthu

text: IPHOXILE iMamelodi Sundowns iqeda usuku kuyiyona ebambe ibhuleki kwi-log ka-Group C weCAF Champions League kulandela ukunikela kwayo ngamaphuzu kwi-AS Togo-Port ebiqala ngqa ukuwina (kulo mqhudelwano), izolo ntambama eStade General Eyadema, eLome, eTogo.Bekungalindelekile nokho ukuthi iSundowns kungaba iyona engadlala kahle kulo mdlalo ngoba yona kade ihleli ibuka iNdebe yoMhlaba ekubeni iTogo-Port ibiqhubeka neyeligi.Kulo mdlalo kuqale u-Andile Jali obebonakala okokuqala kwiSundowns kusukela esayine kuyona esuka kwiKV Oostende yaseBelgium.Kusheshe kwacaca nokho ukuthi ijubane likaPercy Tau, obekulindeleke ukuthi alibhekise e-England izolo, noKhama Billiat osayine kuKaizer Chiefs, liyadingeka ngoba iSundowns iqale ngoSibusiso Vilakazi ongekho kangako “emahhashini”.Bekuze kube uThapelo Morena obedala inkinga odongeni lweTogo-Port.Esiwombeni sokuqala bekubukeka sengathi iSundowns iwuphethe umdlalo kodwa bekuyiqembu lasekhaya ebeliyingozi uma liya ngasemapalini kaDenis Onyango. Ngomzuzu ka-40, uRicardo Nascimento ubethi uzama ukwenza i-offside kodwa ibhola lashaya kuyena lawela ku-Abel Kissibo Hunlede olidumise enethini.Lokhu bekukhomba inkinga kwiSundowns ngoba iye kulo mdlalo isaphumelele ukuqoqa amaphuzu amabili kuphela emidlalweni yayo yokuqala yamaqoqo. Ompetha base-Afrika bango-2016 bebengadlalisi okweqembu elibuya okwesithathu kulandelana kweyamaqoqo yeChampions League.Zize zaya ekhefini iSundowns ingakhombisi ukuthi iyabona ukuthi isenkingeni uma umdlalo uqhubeka ngendlela obuqhubeka ngayo.Ithuba eliwele kuThokozani Sekotlong ongene ngesikhathi sekhefu endaweni kaHlompho Kekana, bekufanele alisebenzise kwazise iqembu lakhe belilandela ngemuva. Zithe ziya emizuzwini ka-70, iSundowns ibisiqala ukukhombisa izimpawu zokukhathala kodwa ithuba elitholwe uVilakazi ngomzuzu ka-73 bekufanele lingene.Kufikwa kule mizuzu kusewu 1-0 nje yingoba, uJean-Robert Klomegan obevimbele iqembu lasekhaya, ubevukile emaqandeni. Lo nozinti uqale umdlalo usuka phansi evimba amabhola obekubukeka kulula ukuwavalela enethini kunokuwashweba. Phakathi kwabadlali abagejile kukhona uJali, Oupa Manyisa, Themba Zwane noVilakazi amahlandla amaningi.*Umbiko ulotshwe sekusele ihora uqale omunye umdlalo ka-Group C phakathi kweHoroya neWydad Casablanca izolo eConakry.
title: Iphoxile iDowns igotshwa yi-AS Togo

text: UMENGAMELI wezwe uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa ufuna ziphenywe ngokushesha izinsolo ezibhekene noNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo, uDkt Zweli Mkhize.UMkhize ulandelwa yifu elimnyama kulezi zinsuku kulandela ukuvela kwezindaba zokuthi umnyango awuholayo wanikeza ngethenda kaR150 million kwinkampani iDigital Vibes, okuthiwa iphethwe ngabantu abasondelene nomndeni wakwaMkhize.Le nkampani iphethwe nguNkk Tahera Mather okuthiwa ungumngani womndeni kaMkhize noNkk Naardhira Mitha oke waba ngumsizi kaMkhize. Yize uMkhize ethe akazange ahlomula ngisho indibilishi kule thenda waphinde wakuphika ukuthi oNkk Mather noMitha bangabangani bakhe, uRamaphosa uthe lezi zinsolo zidinga ukuphenywa ngokushesha.URamaphosa ubhoboke okokuqala ngalezi zinsolo izolo ngesikhathi ethula isabelomali sehhovisi likamengameli.Ekhuluma izolo ePhalamende, uRamaphosa uthe lezi zinsolo ziyakhathaza futhi zibucayi.“Kubalulekile ukuthi i-SIU (Special Investigating Unit) nezinye izinhlaka ezilwa nenkohlakalo ziphenyisise lezi zinsolo. Uphenyo kufanele lusheshe luqedwe ngokuphazima kweso bese kulandelwa zonke iziphakamiso ezizokwenziwa wumbiko.”URamaphosa uqinisekise isizwe ukuthi uyalusukumela lolu daba.“Ngikhulumile nongqongqoshe, ubambisene nabaphenyi. Engifuna ukukusho ukuthi lolu daba ngiphezu kwalo. Ngithanda ukunxusa abantu ukuthi banikeze i-SIU ithuba lokuthi iphenye ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka. Uma umbiko usukhishiwe, sizothatha izinyathelo ezifanele.”URamaphosa uthe izinhlaka zikahulumeni zizoqhubeka nokulwa nenkohlakalo ngaphandle kokwesaba nokwenzelela.URamaphosa uthe likhulu ibanga eselihanjwe uhulumeni ukulwa nenkohlakalo. “Asizange sinanaze ukuphenya ngesikhathi kwenziwa izinsolo zokuthi kukhona abehlisa ngemilenze imali yokuthenga izinsiza zokulwa nobhubhane iCorona.“Abantu bayazibonela ukuthi siyalwa nenkohlakalo ngale ndlela yokuthi kunezikhawu eziningi lapho sibone kubhekwana nalabo abebebhekene nezinsolo zenkohlakalo, abanye baze bahlanziswa imali abayibhubhudlile.”Uncome iqhaza elibanjwe i-SIU, oKlebe noMcwaningi maBhuku ekuvundululeni le nkohlakalo ethinta ukuthengwa kwezinsiza zokulwa nobhubhane.URamaphosa uphinde wamemezela ukuthi uhulumeni uzokhuculula ezinkampanini zikahulumeni.URamaphosa uthe iningi lalezi zinkampani zikahulumeni azenzi kahle ngenxa yokuthi ziholwa ngabantu abangakulungele ukwenza umsebenzi.Uthe uma kuqashwa izikhulu nabazohlala kumabhodi alezi zinkampani, akuzukuthathwa uvucu.URamaphosa uthe ufuna zonke izinkampani zikahulumeni zikwazi ukuzimela, zingathembeli ekutakulweni wuhulumeni.
title: URamaphosa ubhoboke ngezinsolo ezihaqe uMkhize

text: ININGIZIMU Afrika isikulungele ukusungula ibhange likahulumeni. Usho kanje uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali, uMnuz Tito Mboweni, ethula isabelomali sikaR1.954 trillion izolo.UMboweni uthe ngoJulayi wonyaka odlule ubenike iphini lakhe umsebenzi wokuthi licwaninge ngokusugulwa kwebhange likahulumeni, uyajabula ukuthi kuyimanje izinhlelo zokulisungula zihamba kahle.Uthe ibhange likahulumeni lizolandela imithetho yamabhange, lilawulwe yiPrudential Authority ebhekele ukusebenza kwamabhange nezinye izikhungo ezisebenza ngemali.Uveze ukuthi uhulumeni uzoba nesikhwama esibizwa ngeSouth African Sovereign Wealth Fund sizoba noR30 billion.Uthe ukusungulwa kwalesi sikhwama kuzokonga imali ezosiza izizukulwane ezizayo.Imali yalesi sikhwama izophuma kuphethroli, igesi nasemalini eyenziwa uma kudayiswa okumbiwayo.“Lesi sikhwama sizoqinisekisa ukuthi siyakwazi ukutshala imali entuthukweni ezosiza izizukulwane ezizayo,” kusho uMboweni.Uveze nokuthi iSABC izothola uR1.1 billion ngenyanga ezayo kuR3.2 billion eyayabelwe wona ngonyaka odlule, ukuze itakulwe.Uthe le mali izosiza iSABC ukuthi ikhokhele izikweletu zayo kodwa kufanele iyiphathe kahle, iqinisekise ukuthi ilandela imithetho yokusebenza, ibheke namathuba ezinkampanini ezizimele.I-Denel uyabele uR576 million, ukuze ikwazi ukuqhubeka nokusebenza emuva kokuvela kokuthi inezinkinga zemali.I-Transnet kuvele ukuthi inyuse inzuzo yayo ngoR6 billion ekubeni iboleka ngokwemali esuke inayo. UMboweni uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokungabi bikho kukagesi ezweni, wathi uzokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ugesi uba khona ukuze kukhule umnotho.Uthe bafake uR230 billion eminyakeni ewu-10 ezayo ukulungisa izinkinga zikagesi.Uthe kuzoba nezinhlobo ezihlukene zikagesi, okubalwa ongangcolisi imvelo nomoya. I-SAA izonikwa uR16.4 billion ukuze ikhokhele izikweletu.
title: Izwe selikulungele ukuba nebhange likahulumeni: Mboweni

text: UMENGAMELI Jacob Zuma uzoqoka ibhodi elisha le-SABC uma ikomiti lePhalamende eliphenya ngodaba lwale nhlangano seliwuqedile umsebenzi walo ngonyaka ozayo. Lokhu kuvezwe yihhovisi likamengameli izolo.“UMengameli uzolinda iPhalamende liqede ngophenyo lwalo. Izinqumo ezizothathwa zizolawulwa yizincomo ezizokwenziwa ngamalungu ePhalamende,’’ kusho uMnuz Bongani Ngqulunga okhulumela uMengameli esitatimendeni asikhiphile. USihlalo waleli bhodi obese sele yedwa uSolwazi Mbulaheni Maguvhe ugcine esulile esikhundleni sakhe kuleli sonto ngemuva kokugxekwa okukhulu njengoba akhombisa ukuthi kuningi angakwazi ngale nhlangano yokusakaza. Lokhu kugqame ngesikhathi ehlohlwa imibuzo ngamalungu ePhalamende, izimpendulo zakhe eziningi ubevele athi akakhumbuli kumbe akazi ngalokhu okubuzwayo.UZuma wazemukela izindaba zokusula kwakhe njengoSihlalo webhodi. "UMengameli ubonge kakhulu uSolwazi Maguvhe ngomsebenzi awenzele le nhlangano wamfisela inhlanhla nangekusasa lakhe.’’UMaguvhe obuye abe ngumsebenzi wase-Unisa, ubeshaya phansi ngonyawo enqaba ukwesula ngemuva kokuthi sekwesule wonke amalungu ebhodi.UMaguvhe ehambisa nethimba lakhe labameli bake baphuma bashiya kanjalo ikomiti lesikhashana namalungu ePhalamende abephenya ngodaba lwale nhlangano. Babekhala ngokuthi lesi sithangami kasinabo neze ubulungiswa. UMaguvhe ongaboni emehlweni wacela ukuthi yonke imibiko, owoMvikeli woMphakathi, okamcwaningi mabhukunowe-ICASA kufanele ibhalwe ngohlelo lwe-braille ngoba uma kungenziwanga lokho kuyofana nokuthi badlala ngaye. Kwabe sekuchithwa lokho yikomiti libeka isizathu sokuthi ubenaso sonke isikhathi sokuzilungiselela ukuza kulesi sigcawu sophenyo.Kwaze kwaphoqeleka ukuthi athunyelelwe amasamanisi ukuze ezovela kulesi sigcawu. Ikomiti elahlala izinsuku eziyisikhombisa lezwa ubufakazi obushaqisayo ngokukhohlakala okukhinyabeza le nhlangano. Amalungu ePhalamende afunga agomela athi asazovumbulula okuningi ngonyaka ozayo uma sekuqhutshwa lolu daba. Amalungu ePhalamende aphinde akhala ngokuziphatha okungagculisi kwezikhulu zale nhlangano nomthelela kaMnuz Hlaudi Motsoeneng ongundabamlonyeni. UMaguvhe watshela ikomidi ukuthi uMotsoeneng wenza "umsebenzi oncomekayo’’ wasivikela nesinqumo sakhe sokumvotela ukuthi eqashwe ngokuphelele kwesokuba yisikhulu senhlangano. Lolu phenyo oluqhutshwa ngamalungu ePhalamende luguqisiwe, seluyoze luqhubeke uma kuqala inyanga ezayo.
title: UZuma uzoqoka elakwa-SABC

text: NgoLwesibili abantu basale bedidekile ngesikhathi uBabes noMampintsha befake izithombe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana lapho uBabes ebize khona uMampintsha ngobaba wengane.UMampintsha naye ube esephendula ngokufaka upopayi wesifazane okhulelwe, nowengane encane.Kube nesasasa abantu bezibuza beziphendula ukuthi laba ngabe balindele ingane yokuqala yini.Imithombo yeSolezwe engashayi eceleni iveze ukuthi ngempela uBabes uzithwele.“Mina ngiyaxakeka ukuthi bayikhuluma kanjani le nto ngoba bathe bazothula. Ngimangele sengibona sebekhuluma lolu daba ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Angikazi ukuthi unezinyanga ezingaki kodwa yena ukhulelwe impela,” kuchaza umthombo.Omunye umthombo uveze ukuthi uBabes indaba yokuthi ukhulelwe ubeyikhuluma kodwa becabanga ukuthi uyadlala.“Hawu uyazi leyo nto uBabes ubeyisho kodwa nje singayinaki. Besihlala sicabanga ukuthi uyazikhulumela nje akuyona into yangempela. Anginaso isiqiniseko sokuthi yinto ekhona ngempela yini awuzame ukukhuluma naye,” kusho umthombo.Isolezwe lizame kaningi ukuxhumana noBabes noMampintsha ngalolu daba kodwa izingcingo zabo bezikhala zingabanjwa.Laba kuveza lezi zindaba nje uBabes usanda kusula icala alivulela uMampintsha lokushaya.Icala belisenkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown.
title: Ziyaqina ezithi uBabes Wodumo ukhulelwe

text: KUME ukudayiswa kwamathikithi okugibela amabhasi eDurban Transport izolo, ngesikhathi abasebenzi abangamalungu eSouth African Municipal Workers Union (Samwu) belaxaza umsebenzi, bekhala ngokusebenza ngaphansi kwezimo ezinzima.Izolo Isolezwe lifice amalungu eSamwu adayisa amathikithi,ethi awasakwazi ukuyodayisa emalokishini selokhu kuvalwe ukudayiswa kwamathikithi ngezimpelasonto ngoba, amalungu omphakathi afuna ukuwahlasela.UMnuz Dumisani Luthuli, onguSihlalo weSamwu eThekwini, uthe amathikithi okugibela amabhasi kamasipala ebedayiswa kakhulu ngempelasonto. “Ukumiswa kohlelo lokudayiswa kwamathikithi ngempelasonto, kubeka engcupheni impilo yabasebenzi futhi kuphazamisa nabagibeli. Uma abasebenzi beyodayisa amathikithi phakathi nezinsuku, umphakathi ufuna ukubashaya ngoba usuke uzitshela ukuthi bebelovile emsebenzini, uma bengawadayisi ngempelasonto kwazise umphakathi awutshelwanga ngalezi zinguquko,” kusho uLuthuli.Izindawo ezingasawadayisi amathikithi ngezimpelasonto yiseMega City, KwaMashu Station, Nozaza, Bridge City, Malvern, Bluff, Wema, Chesterville, Lamontville nasemakethe eThekwini.“Abasebenzi bahamba bodwa, akekho obagadayo. Uma kucima i-generator kufanele behle emotweni bayoyikhanyisa. Lokhu kubeka impilo yabo engcupheni ngoba bangabanjwa inkunzi noma balinyazwe yizigebengu. Uma abasebenzi betshela umqashi lezi zingqinamba ababhekene nazo, uvele athi uzobaxosha aqashe abantu abaswele umsebenzi,” kusho uLuthuli.Uveze ukuthi amabhasi kawanayo imishini yokupholisa umoya, bayafa wukushisa.Uthe ngisho kunyuka imali yokugibela abasebenzi abadayisa amathikithi abatshelwa ngalokho, bazithola sebexabana nabantu uma sebebashayela amathikithi asho enye imali.UMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela okhulumela uMasipala weTheku uthe: “Abaphathi baxoxa nezinyunyana ngalolu daba. Isixazululo sizotholakala maduze. Siyaxolisa ngokuphazamiseka okudalwe yilesi simo,” kusho uMayisela.Uthe okwamanje abantu bazokwazi ukuthenga amathikithi koSizakala Centre eMhlanga, KwaMashu, Pinetown, kuFlorence Mkhize eThekwini naseMega City eMlaza ngo-7.30 ekuseni kuze kube wu-15.30 ntambama. ESizakala Centre eMlaza kuyavulwa nangoMgqibelo ngo-7.30 kuvalwe ngo-11.30 ekuseni.
title: Batelekile abadayisa amathikithi amabhasi kaMasipala

text: UNOBHALA weNationa Education, Health and Allied Workers Union (Nehawu), uMnuz Zola Saphetha, uthe basamukela ngezandla ezimhlophe isinqumo sokusula emsebenzini koMqondisi woMnyango wezaseKhaya, uMnuz Mkhuseli Apleni.U-Apleni usule emsebenzini ngoMsombuluko, izindaba zaqinisekisa nguNgqongqoshe woMnyango uMnuz Malusi Gigaba.USaphetha uthe u-Apleni ubephethe ngesandla sensimbi futhi ukusula kwakhe kuzosusa umthwalo emahlombe abasebenzi. “Kudala sikhala ngaye sisho ukuthi nokuthi ulahlekisela abakhokhi bentela ngezigidi ngenxa yezinhlelo zakhe zokuthi abasebenzi basebenze ngoMgqibelo. Ubengafuni ukubakhokhela kodwa ubeluyisa enkantolo udaba lokuthi kufanele baholelwe. Ubengafuni nokuqasha abanye abasebenzi yize zikhona izikhala zomsebenzi,” kusho uSaphetha. Uthe bayathemba ukuthi ukuhamba kwakhe kuzojika izinto eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya  ngoba kuzoqashwa abantu futhi nabasebenzi bazoba nomdlandla wokusebenza ngaphandle kokucindezelwa ngumphathi. IPhini likaNobhala wePublic Servants Association, uMnuz Tahir Maepa nalo lithe bayakwamukela ukuhamba kuka-Apleni abamchaze njengomuntu obehluleka wukuphatha kahle abasebenzi. Bathe bazomkhumbula ngesinqumo sakhe esimbi sokusebenzisa abasebenzi ngoMgqibelo bese bengaholelwa.UGigaba uthe bazomemezela uMqondisi ozobamba ngesonto elizayo bese beqoka uMqondisi omusha kungakapheli izinyanga ezintathu. Ubonge u-Apleni ngokuzinikela emsebenzini wakhe esho nokuthi bamfisela okuhle kodwa njengoba eseyosebenza eDiscovery Banking.
title: Usolwa ngokuphatha ngesihluku obengumqondisi emnyangweni

text: ITHWELE kanzima intombazane (12) yaseThengani, eManguzi, ezalwe ingakwazi ukuzibamba uma idinga ukuzikhulula.Le ntombazane efunda uGrade 7 kwesinye sezikole zabafundi abangakhubazekile eManguzi kuthiwa selokhu yazalwa ayiziyeli endlini encane uma idinga ukuzikhulula nokwenza impilo yayo ibe nzima.Unina wayo omncane, uthe ingane kadadewabo izalwe inesifo esaziwa nge-urinary ne-fecal incontinence nokwenza ingakwazi ukubamba umchamo nendle. Kusukela isencane kuze kube yimanje igqoka inabukeni ngoba ayizwa uma isizikhulula.Uthe okubakhathazayo wukuthi isihlekwa ngezinye izingane ngenxa yale nkinga enayo.Uthe le nto isiyimbangela yokuthi ingakhululeki noma kufanele iye esikoleni ngoba ezinye izingane ziye ziyibuke kabi ngenxa yephunga uma isizikhululile ingezwanga noma ingakalishintshi inabukeni.Uthe bebelokhu bezitshela ukuthi isimo sayo sizobuye silungiseke kodwa kuze kube yimanje asilungi.“Okusikhathazayo wukuthi le nto isiyamhlukumeza naye ngoba useyazenyeza. Kuthi noma exoxa akhulume ngokuthi izingane zibuye zimhleke ngoba zithi uyanuka. Ngonyaka ozayo kufanele ayofunda uGrade 8 kwesinye isikole esingazi ukuthi kusona uzophatheka kanjani,” kuchaza unina omncane.Uthe bake bamfaka esikoleni sezingane ezikhubazekile wafunda khona kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi waba nenkinga ngoba izingane bezimhleka zibuye zimlandele uma eseyoshintsha inabukeni ngoba zifuna ukumhleka.Uthe le ngane igqigqe ezibhedlela kusukela isencane kodwa akukho mehluko okhona kuyona.Uthe bayaye bathole amanabukeni emtholampilo kodwa nawo awaneli ngoba bathola angu-28 ngenyanga nokwenza agcine ewasebenzisa kakhulu uma esesikoleni.Ngokusho kwakhe bathole ukuthi ukuze kulungiswe isimo sayo kungadingeka ukuthi ihlinzwe kodwa lokhu kungenziwa ezibhedlela ezizimele.Uthe bayafisa ukuthola noma yiluphi usizo mayelana nale nkinga.UDkt Bongani Nxumalo, ongudokotela owelapha izifo zonke, uthe kuvamile ukuthi abantu baphathwe yisifo esiphethe le ngane.Uthe lesi simo siyakwazi ukulungiseka ngemishanguzo kokunye ngokuhlinzwa.UDkt Nxumalo uthe lokhu kuyenzeka nakubantu abasuke behlaselwe yisifo sohlangothi bangabe besakwazi ukuba nomuzwa obatshelayo uma sebedinga ukuzikhulula.
title: Inkinga esimenza inhlekisa esikoleni

text: UCWANINGO lwaminyaka yonke olubheka intengo yamaphathi ezimoto, i-AA Kinsey Report, luveza ukuthi intengo iyakhuphuka.Lolu cwaningo oluneminyaka engu-30 lukhona, lwenziwa wuqweqwe lwentatheli yezimoto uMalcom Kinsey.UKinsey uthe ucwaningo lwakhe ulwenze eThekwini futhi ubeziyela mathupha emagaraji nohla lwamaphathi afuna kugcwaliswe intengo yawo."Okubonakalayo ukuthi amaphathi omzimba anyukile. Amalambu, amafenda angemuva namarimu yikho okubonakala ngathi kunyuke kakhulu. Kunomthelela omubi kuwo wonke umuntu ngoba kunyusa imali ekhokhwa kumshwalense uma evelelwa yingozi."Ucwaningo luhlukaniswe ngamaqoqo. Iqoqo lamaphathi okusevisa luhlanganisa intengo ye-air filter, oil filer, brake pads, plug nokunye.Elinye ngelamaphathi okulungisa imoto okukhona kulo i fan belt, shock absorber, cam belts, namabrake disc.Elokugcina ngelama crash parts elihlanganisa amaphathi uma imoto iba sengozini njengobhonethi, amarimu, izicabha, windscreen, bhampa nokunye.Umbiko ogcwele utholakala title: Iyakhuphuka intengo yamaphathi ezimoto

text: ZESULIWE izinyembezi zikanina wosana olwebiwa lunesonto luzelwe ngenkathi inkantolo igweba owesifazane owaluntshontsha iminyaka engu-12 ebhadla ejele.Inkantolo yesiFunda eMpangeni igwebe owesifazane (34) olivumile icala lokuthumba okwenzeka ePhaweni, eJozini ngo-2011. Uhhafu wesigwebo sakhe ulengisewe iminyaka emihlanu. Encwadini abecela inkantolo imthambisele isigwebo, owesifazane uthi wangena kubo kwengane ebona izimpahla zayo zinekwe kulayini.Wafike wazenza umsebenzi kahulumeni ozosiza unina wengane owayeneminyaka engu-16 ukuze athole umazisi nengane yenzelwe isitifiketi sokuzalwa bakwazi ukuthola imali yesibonelelo sikahulumeni.Abazali bakanina wengane kuthiwa babeseGoli ngaleso sikhathi, umakhelwane ebabhekele okwenzeka kulo muzi.Owesifazane kuthiwa wakwazi ukukhohlisa umakhelwane wagcina ehambe nonina wengane nengane baya edolobheni eJozini.Sebesedolobheni kuthiwa wacela unina wengane  wathi akayothenga into abazoyidla esitolo yena uzosala ambambele umntwana. Emva kwalokho kuthiwa washaya wachitha nomntwana wabheka eGoli,Okhulumela iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA) KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Kara, uthe indaba yonakale ngesikhathi owathumba ingane esehlukana nesoka lakhe, kwenziwa ulibofuzo phakathi kwengane nowesilisa okwavela ukuthi akuyona eyakhe.“Owesifazane waveza ukuthi ingane wayeba ngoba wayebathanda abantwana kodwa engenabo abakhe. Wathi wayefuna ukumenza owakhe unomphela umntwana amntshontsha,” kusho uNkk Kara.Uthe enkantolo kwavela ukuthi unina wengane wayekhala ubusuku nemini efuna usana lwakhe engalutholi, efuna yonke indawo kangangoba kwakuthi uma kunengane etholakalayo, anikele khona eyobheka ukuthi akuyona yini eyakhe. Uthe nomndeni kanina wengane  wachitha itshe lemali uyofuna usizo kubantu ababonayo ungalutholi.Kuthiwa unina wengane akafuni lutho oluzomhlanganisa noweba usana lwakhe.
title: Ugwetshiwe oweba usana eJozini

text: IBUKEKA isaqhubeka impi yezikhundla enhlanganweni ebusayo i-ANC, njengoba sekuvele izindaba zokuthi uNgqongqoshe wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu, ezaManzi nokuThuthwa kwendle, uNksz Lindiwe Sisulu, ubhekene nezinsolo zokuzama ukuketula uMnuz David “DD’’ Mabuza oyiphini likamengameli. Lezi zinsolo ezibucayi zivele encwadini ebhalwe wumuntu ongadalulwanga efaka isikhalo kuMvikeli woMphakathi, u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane.Incwadi kuthiwa isola uNksz Sisulu ngokuqasha abantu abathile emnyangweni wakhe ukuze aqinise ukwesekwa kwakhe emkhankasweni wokufuna amandla.Kusolwa ukuthi njengoba ebuyise uNksz Bathabile Dlamini ukuba azoba ngusihlalo webhodi yophiko lomnyango wenzela khona ukwesekwa yi-ANCWL uma eseqhuba umkhankaso wakhe wokufuna ukuba yiphini likamengameli.Incwadi iveza ukuthi uNksz Sisulu ucuphe ukuthi uMabuza aketulwe engqungqutheleni ebizwa ngeNational General Council ezoba ngonyaka ozayo.Kusolwa ukuthi uNksz Sisulu uhlela ukuthi amvukele esisiwini njengotshwala uMabuza kuleyo ngqungquthela bese emketula esevele esenakho ukwesekwa ngabaningi ngaphakathi enhlanganweni.Le ncwadi kuthiwa iphinde idalule ukuthi uNksz Sisulu uzosebenzisa izinsolo zenkohlakalo ezilandela uMabuza kusukela esewundunankulu waseMpumalanga.UNksz Sisulu uke waba sembangweni wesikhundla sikamengameli owagcina unqotshwe wuMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa emuva kokuba uNksz Sisulu ehoxe ingakaqali ingqungquthela.
title: ULindiwe Sisulu ezinsolweni zetulo

text:
