UMNDENI kadokotela obulewe eDUT usuveze ukuthi kwenzeka lokhu nje wayenenhlolokhono yomsebenzi wokuba ngesinye sezikhulu kulesi sikhungo.UDkt Euvette Taylor (30), watholwa ngeSonto lomhla ka-8 Febhuwari ezindlini ezihlala abafundi eWinterton, enemivimbo eseshonile.Umndeni kamufi uveze ukuthi bayamazi osolwa ngokuhlasela umufi njengoba babengabangani futhi wayemvakashele ngelanga lesigameko.Okhulumela umndeni, uMnuz Sabelo Nyawo, uthe badidekile ngokuthi kungani umufi ebulawe ngesihluku esingaka.“Esikufunayo njengomndeni ukuthola iqiniso ngokuthi kungani umbulali embulale ngesihluku esingaka. Kwenzeka lesi sigameko nje, ngoMsombuluko wayenenhlolokhono yomsebenzi eDUT lapho wayezoba ngesinye sezikhulu futhi kuzoba umsebenzi aqashwe kuwo ngokugcwele. Asingabazi ukuthi wayezophumelela ngoba ubengumuntu okhaliphile. Silahlekelwe kakhulu ngokubulawa kwakhe ngoba ubewukhathalele umndeni nabasondelene naye,” kusho uNyawo.Elandisa Isolezwe uthe njengomndeni bathole ukuthi umsolwa washaqa impahla endlini kamufi.“Esikutholile wukuthi wafika nalo mngani wakhe osolwa ngokumbulala bahlala endlini yakhe. Kwafika namantombazane amabili angabangani bakamufi ahlala khona eDUT. Bahlala kwaze kwashaya u-11 ebusuku. Amantombazane abe esehamba eya ezindlini zawo eshiya umufi nomngani endlini. Asazi ukuthi kwenzekani sebesele. Endlini kamufi kwakuthathwe impahla yakhe okubalwa amaTV amabili, ama-laptop nokunye okuningi,” kusho uNyawo.Uthe bathole ukuthi umsolwa ubonakala kwikhamera (CCTV) yakulesi sikhungo eyofaka izimpahla emotweni kamufi. Ubonakala ehla enyuka kukhona akuthuthayo.Ekugcineni ubonakala eshaya echitha nemoto kamufi.FUNDA: 
Ingebhe kubulawa omunye enyuvesiImoto yatholwa amaphoyisa eMlaza. Umndeni uthe yayinezimbobo zokudutshulwa ilahliwe.Ngokusho kukaNyawo umufi uze atholakale nje ngoba abe-tracker bashayela omunye wesifazane owayenomufi ucingo ebusuku bebuza ukuthi ukuphi umufi nemoto yakhe.“Kwakumele baye bonke esontweni ngeSonto. Bathuka sebeshayelwa abe-tracker ucingo. Kwathi uma beyobheka bafica endlini kukhiyiwe imoto ingekho. Babiza onogada bazama ukuvula kodwa bathola ukuthi i-gas igcwele endlini. Sisola ukuthi wayezama ukuqhumisa indlu njengoba i-gas yavulwa yabekwa eduze kwesitofu sivuliwe. I-microwave yayivuliwe kwafakwa nezipuni zensimbi ukuze iqhume,” kusho uNyawo.Uthe kwaba yinhlanhla nje ukuthi indlu ingashi nesidumbu sikamufi.Umufi uzofihlwa e-Underberg, inkonzo yomngcwabo izoba ngoMgqibelo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt. Colonel Thembeka Mbele uthe kusaphenywa, umsolwa akakaboshwa.
title: Umndeni uyamazi owabulala owaseDUT

text: UBushiri nowakwakhe bazobuyiswa kuleliINKANTOLO yemantshi eMalawi inqume ukumdedela uMfundisi Shepered Bushiri nenkosikazi yakhe uMary ababoshwe kulandela ukuzinikela emaphoyiseni ngoLwesithathu. NgoLwesine iMantshi uViva Nyimba ithe ukuboshwa kwalaba bashadikazi bekungekho emthethweni wayalela abomthetho ukuthi badedelwe ngaphandle kwebheyili. UBushiri ubexwayisiwe ukuthi kwashaya usuku lwayizolo engabuyilie eNingizimu Afrika kunempahla yakhe ezodliwa njengomuzi wakhe kaR5.5 million oseCenturion. “Ilungelo lempilo libaluleke ukudluka noma yini ephathekayo kulo mhlaba,” kusho uBushiri esitatimendeni asifake ekhasini lakhe kuFacebook kulandela isinqumo senkantolo izolo. Ungqongqoshe wezoBulungiswa kuleli uMnuz Ronald Lamola,  uthe uhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika uzokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uMfundisi Shepherd Bushiri nenkosikazi yakhe bayabuyiswa kuleli ukuzobhekana namacala.ULamola uveze lokhu izolo ngesikhathi ephendula  ngezinqumo ezithathwe yiKhabhinethi emhlanganweni wangoLwesithathu.“Ngokomgomo weSouth African Development Community (SADC), ukuthunyelwa kwamaphepha agunyaza ukuthi kubuyiswe owokufika oboshwe ezweni lakubo ngamacala awenze kwelinye izwe, kuthatha izinsuku eziwu-30 ukusuka osukwini aboshwe ngalo kulandelwa yonke imigudu ebekiwe. Kodwa ezobulungiswa kuleli zifake isicelo kwezobulungiswa zaseMalawi, kwavunyelwana ukuthi amaphepha athunyelwe emasontweni amabili ngenxa yokuphuthuma kodaba,” kusho uLamola.Uthe uhulumeni awufuni ukuqagela ngendlela eyasetshenziswa abakwaBushiri ukweqa kodwa uthembele ophenyweni olwenziwayo okuyilo elizoveza konke ngokweqa kwabo.“Ukusebenza ngobuqotho kwezobulungiswa kuleli akungabazeki. Zisebenza ngokuzimela, ngokukhululeka nangaphandle kokwenzelela, ngakho abukho ubufakazi bokuthi leli lizwe liyenzelela kwezobulungiswa. Ezobulungiswa zizokwenza umsebenzi wazo nabakwaBushiri,”  kusho uLamola.UBushiri, ongumfundisi webandla i-Enlightened Christian Gathering, wephula imigomo yebheyili emuva kokweqa kade engaphandle ngebheyili.
title: Udedeliwe uBushiri kuthiwa uboshwe ngokungemthetho

text: UMBHALI wezincwadi zemidlalo yasemoyeni, usethathe isinyathelo sokufaka kubameli abaphathi boKhozi FM ngenxa yokuthi abafuni ukumkhokhela imali abamkweleta yona enguR57 000.UDumisani Hlatshwayo (37) waseLimpopo, uthe wabhalela lo msakazo umdlalo ozigcawugcawu osihloko sithi Singcwaba Nini. “Ngagunyazwa ukuba ngibhale iziqephu zalo mdlalo ezingu-32, engangizothola ngazo uR1 800 ngesiqephu ngasinye.” Uthe umdlalo wakhe wasakazwa kusuka ngoJulayi 26 kwaze kwaba wuSepthemba 13 ngo-2016.“Kwathiwa ngeke ngisayisayina i-contract ngoba sewuze wadlalwa lo mdlalo, ngabe benza okuphambene nomthetho kaSABC. Umphathi woKhozi wathi okungcono angibathumelele i-invoice. Ngakwenza lokho kodwa kwangabikhona inqubekela phambili. Bengilokhu ngixhumana naye uMpanza elokhu ethi angilinde. Ngibe sengimthumelela umqhafazo wafona sekuzophela uNovemba wathi sekugunyaziwe ukuthi ngikhokhelwe ekupheleni konyaka owedlule kodwa kuze kube yimanje angikatholi lutho. Noma ngimthumelela imiqhafazo, uMpanza akasangiphenduli. Angisazi ngempela ukuthi kufanele ngenzenjani.”Ethintwa uMpanza ucingo lwakhe belungaphendulwa kwahluleka ngisho esethunyelelwa umqhafazo.Okhulumela iSABC uKaizer Kganyago, uthe bayazi ukuthi bakweleta uHlatshwayo le mali ngenxa yokuthi kunemigomo engalandelwanga ngaphambi kokuba aqale umsebenzi. “Naye umbhali akumele akhale ngoba uyalazi iqiniso futhi ubelokhu aziswa ukuthi kuqhubekani hhayi ukuthi useyazitshwa. Uzokhokhelwa imali yakhe ngoba sisemzuliswaneni wokugcina wokukhokha,” kusho uKganyago.UHlatshwayo usanda kuhlabana kwi-2017 Sanlam Prize For Youth Literature kumunxa we-African Languages ngencwadi ayihlelelwa nguSolwazi uDBZ Ntuli esihloko sithi Imibala Yothando kanti eyokuqala esihloko sithi Inhlonipho ifundwa kuGrade 9.
title: Umangalela Ukhozi FM owalubhalela umdlalo

text: U-ED Harris uzimisele ukugqamisa iKapa ngomculo. Lo mdidiyeli usayiniswe yiKalawa Jazmee.UMasixole “Ed Harris” Matshaya (26) usanda kukhipha i-albhamu yakhe ethi-7784 Is Not a Jungle.Le albhamu igabe ngezingoma okubalwa kuzo Idimoni ayishaye no-Abongile “Sdudla Somdantso” Nhloko noPhelokazi “Pearl” Dyantyi.Le ngoma yasusa umsindo njengoba uNUZ Queen enza efanayo bamsola ngokuyintshontsha. UBusiswa waze wayenza kabusha ekhwela edilika kuNUZ Queen.USdudla Somdantso uthe akafuni ukukhuluma ngoNUZ Queen ngoba udaba lwengoma lusingethwe ngabaphathi babo.“Usibulele ngokuyintshontsha kodwa ngomusa kaNkulunkulu uBusiswa waseseka. Ngeke ngisho ukuthi uyamdelela kodwa ubeka amaqiniso,” kusho uSdudla Somdantso.U-Ed Harris uthe kule albhamu yakhe enezingoma ezingu-13 uphinde wasebenza noMaphorisa, Busiswa, Mwezi nabanye.Uthe uqale enguDJ ngo-2007 kwathi ngo-2009 wangena ekudidiyeleni umculo othi yena.Uthe ngo-2015 wakhipha i-EP engenzanga kahle emakethe kodwa wangaliphonsa ithawula njengoba esebuye ngale albhamu. Uthe umculo awenzayo bawubiza nges’gubhu okuyigqom’ elidle ngamapiyano nebhesi.“Ngesikhathi kufika uSdudla noPearl ngathi asisebenze sikhulisane sonke. IKapa yindawo esabukeleka phansi ngokomculo ngoba asinabo oMampintsha bethu kodwa eThekwini baningi. Ngifuna ukuba wuDJ Tira waseKapa ngikhulise amanye amajita asemancane ngoba baningi abanethalente. Ngizobanikeza ithuba lokuzibonakalisa.”Uthe kubuhlungu ukwenza umculo abantu bangawujabuleli ngakho uthatha isikhathi sakhe uma edidiyela ukuqinisekisa ukuthi useqophelweni eliphezulu.
title: U-Ed Harris uzimisele ukuba wuDJ Tira waseKapa

text: NGOKOMBIKO weStats SA zingaphezu kuka-120 000 izingane zamantombazane ezisafunda isikole ezibelethe nyakenye.Ngokwalo mbiko, iLive Birth 2017, okhishwe ngeledlule awu-3 261 amantombazane aphakathi kweminyaka engu-10 kuya ku-14 abelethe nyakenye.Awu-119 645 aphakathi kuka-15 no-19.Umbiko wenziwe ngokuthi kuqoqwe umbiko ngabesifazane ababelethile eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya nyakenye.Kuwona kuhlukaniswe ngokweminyaka yabesifazane ababelethile.Minyaka yonke ihlale ikhathaza uMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo eyokukhulelwa kwabafundi ezikoleni.Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, uthe ziyashaqisa lezi zibalo ngoba emantombazaneni abelethile abalelwa ku-3 000 afunda uGrade 6, 7 no 8.Uthe lawo angaphezulu kuka-119 000 afunda uGrade 10 kuya ku-matric.“Sishaqekile ngezibalo ngoba yizingane ezisuke zisafunda isikole. Sihlale sibanxusa abafundi ukuthi bagxile ezincwadini zabo ngaso sonke isikhathi,” kusho uMhlanga.Uthe nabazali kumele babambe iqhaza ngoba akuyona inkinga yomnyango wodwa.“Uma ubheka kubafundi abaneminyaka ewu-10 abakhulelwayo kumele kuvulwe amacala baseyingane. Kulaba abaneminyaka ewu-16 basuke sebenalo ulwazi ngengozi yokukhulelwa ngakho kumele basebenzise izivikelo,” kusho uMhlanga.Uthe kwesinye isikole eLimpopo omunye wabafundi obekhulelwe ukuvezile ukuthi ubenalo ulwazi ngokuthi angazivikela kanjani ukuze angakhulelwa.“Sinesifundo iLife Orientation abafundi okungamele bacabange ukuthi asithi shu ngoba sibalulekile. Siyabafundisa ngokukhulelwa nangezindlela abangazivikela ngazo,” kusho uMhlanga.Akusona isifundo samantombazane kuphela kodwa nabafana kumele basiqonde.Ngokombiko bawu-989 318 abesifazane ababeletha nyakenye. Uthe isibalo sababelethayo sinyukile kunesango-2016 esasiwu-969 415.Kuzalwe kakhulu abafana abawu-460 774 amantombazane aba wu-452 725.Isifundazwe iGauteng yisona esinesibalo esiphezulu sezingane ezizelwe ngezingu-239 457 kulandele iKwaZulu-Natal ngezingu-197 913.Isifundazwe esibe nesibalo esincane yiNorthern Cape ngeziwu-24 395.Umthetho iDeaths Registration Amendment Act ubalula ukuthi kumele izingane zibhaliswe ezinsukwini eziwu-30 zibelethiwe.
title: ‘Ziyashaqisa’ izibalo zokuteta kwabafundi

text:
U-Ayanda ukhalaze ngale nqubo ekhasini lakhe ku-Instagram izolo. UNcwane uthe kuyakhathaza ukuthi noma sekwaba khona inkululeko yabantu, abafelokazi basacindezelwa yimithetho yamasiko ababekelwa yona kudala."Emuva kweminyaka engu-25 kwaba khona inkululeko kuleli, abafelokazi basacindezelwa baphinde baphathwe kabi yimithetho yesintu namasiko angabekezeleleki. Ngokomthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika, sonke siyalingana kodwa kuze kube yimanje abafelokazi kusalindekeke ukuthi bagqoke inzilo izinyanga ezingu-12 kodwa amadoda wona ayaqhubeka nezimpilo zawo ngemuva komngcwabo wamakhosikazi awo," kusho uNcwane.UNcwane uqhube wathi ukugqoka inzilo kufanele kube ukuthanda komfelokazi hhayi impoqo ebekwa yisiko.View this post on InstagramSunday FACT: After 25 years of “freedom” , Widowed women are still oppressed and unfairly treated by customary laws & some unbearable culture!!!! According to the Bill of rights of the Constitution of SA 1996 ( Act 108 Of 1996) We should be treated EQUALLY!!! But till this day many widowed women are still forced to wear INZILO ( a black mourning attire ) for 12 good months, BUT widowed men can completely carry on with their lives after the burial of her wife. INZILO is NOT a South African culture nor tradition and this should be a choice of a widow not an obligation!!! #WidowsRightsMatter #WidowsRightsAreHumanRightsTooA post shared by 
Ayanda Ncwane(@ayandancwane) on Aug 18, 2019 at 1:11am PDTAbalandeli bakhe bebehlukene phakathi ngombono wakhe, abanye behambisana naye kanti abanye bebemchitha. Abanye babe nethuba lokuxoxa ngezinkinga asebeke babhekana nazo ngokucindezeleka kwabafelokazi.uthe: "Le nqubo ayidalelwe ukucindezela abantu besifazane, kepha akufanele iphoqwe. Amadoda nabesifazane banezindima ezihlukene abazidlalayo futhi lokho akusenzi ukuthi singalingani. Kungakuhle sihloniphe ukwehluka kwethu nezindima esizidlalayo."uthe: "Uqinisile Ayanda, mina ngaxoshwa umamezala wami namadodakazi akhe ngosuku engangcwaba ngalo umyeni wami. Ngikhuluma ngomama okhulekayo, konke lokhu kwenzeke ngenyanga edlule. Thina bantu besifazane siyahlukumezana."
title: 'Asingaphoqwa ukugqoka inzilo'- Ayanda Ncwane

text: UTHULWE umthwalo enikelelwa ngendlu ugogo (112) waKwaNongoma obehlala nabazukulu bakhe abahlanu endlini yodaka.UNkk Belusile Zungu waseNkalaneni, KwaNongoma, unikelelwe ngendlu emuva kokuhlala iminyaka endlini eyakhiwe ngodaka.Indlu enamakamelo amabili yakhiwe nguMnyango wokuHlaliswa kwaBantu ngoMgqibelo emuva kokuthi ezwelwe yilungu lomphakathi elizibophezele ekusizeni amalungu omphakathi kuleya ndawo.UMnuz Sabelo Ngema, osize uNkk Zungu ukuze athole umuzi, uthe bese kuneminyaka embona ehleli kule ndlu. Uthe kube nzima kakhulu kuyena ngesikhathi ebona uthayela wendlu wonakele kungena imvula ngo-2016.“Ngiqale lapho ngazama ukuthola abangasiza ukuze ugogo nabazukulu bakhelwe indlu. Bekubuhlungu ukubona indlela abahleli ngayo nendlela abasala ngayo ngaphandle njalo uma kukhona izinhlelo zentuthuko ezenziwayo. Ngibe sengicela aboMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu ukuthi bangenele, basize, bavuma njengoba sekwenzekile nje bawuthola umuzi,” kusho uNgema.UNkk Zungu uthe uyabonga ngokuthola usizo emuva kokuhlala isikhathi eside endlini ebingekho esimeni esifanele ebe ehlala nezingane.“Ngibonga uSabelo ngokungisiza ngoba bengihlala endlini ewayo. Ngilala endlini manje,” kusho uNkk Zungu.Ngaphandle kwendlu uNkk Zungu uphinde wanikelelwa bakwaBoxer ngokudla, izimpahla zokugqoka nezokulala nokunye akunikwe abenhlangano elwela amalungelo abesifazane eVryheid iWoman of Significance.UNgema unxuse amalungu omphakathi ukuthi azisukumele asize abantu abaswele angalindi amakhansela njengoba esiza nabantu abasuke bedinga ukuthola omazisi nezinye izidingo.“Ngifisa sengathi bangabonela kimina ngoba nami angisebenzi kodwa ngiye ngicele abantu abanganikela bese ngisiza abadinga usizo. Okunye okusuke kudingwa abantu kungenziwa wumphakathi ubambisene,” kusho uNgema.
title: Ukhishwe endlini yodaka ugogo (112)

text: KUSOLWA ukuthi uzimbele igodi ngokugoloza ukukhokha imali yaserenki edume ngokuthi ‘’yibhakede’’ usomatekisi obeyisikhulu seSantaco, odutshulwe wafa ngabantu abangaziwa.UMnuz Mandla Mzelemu (60) uvukelwe ngamadoda angaziwa, engaphandle komuzi wakhe ePort Edward, ngoLwesine ntambama amthela ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu waphelela khona lapho.Ubeyilungu lesigungu sesifundazwe kwiSantaco, okuyinhlangano yamatekisi.Umthombo othembekile osondelene nophenyo uthe uMzelemu ubeyindoda emele iqiniso futhi uke washo ukuthi akahambisani nemali ekhokhwa erenki.“Uke wazama nokuthola inombolo kaNgqongqoshe (uBheki) uNtuli ukuze abike ngezinto ezingahambi kahle erenki. Abanye abebehambisana naye bephikisa indaba yebhakede, babulawa nabo.“Ubengasabi phela lo baba. Ubesho uma into engahambisani nayo. Ngisola ukuthi bamshayele lokho,’’ kusho umthombo osondelene nophenyo.Kuthiwa kunabaziwayo ukuthi bangamabhoklolo erenki, abafuna imali ngodli okungaziwa ukuthi yenzani njengoba ihlala iqoqwa.“Sekuphume izidumbu eziningi emarenki ahlukene kubangwa ‘’ibhakede’’ eliqoqwa njalo.Imenenja yehhovis leSantaco KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sifiso Shangase ikuqinisekisile ukubulawa kukaMzelemu. Uthe bazoshiya ezandleni zamaphoyisa ukuthi enze uphenyo.“Sicela ukuthi umndeni uthobeke amanxeba ngokulahlekelwa wubaba uMzelemu. Silimele sonke ngoba ubesebenza kakhulu embonini.“Kasazi ukuthi kuhlobene nani ukubulawa kwakhe. Sizwile ukuthi kube ngabantu nje abavuke bamthela ngenhlamvu ngasekhaya lakhe.“Siyamethemba uNkulunkulu, ukuthi siyogcina sitholakele isisombululo sodlame lwamatekisi,’’ kusho uShangase.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uKapteni Nqobile Gwala uthe amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala emuva kokuthi umufi ehlaselwe ehleli emotweni.
title: Uzithintele ngeyebhakede usomatekisi obulewe

text: ISILOMO somdlali we-Orlando Pirates esinamaphupho amakhulu ngesizini ezayo, uThembinkosi Lorch, sesiyalulama ehlombe esalimala kulo ngesikhathi eZimnyama zibhekene naMaZulu FC emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza.Lokhu kwenze uLorch (24) wangayiqeda isizini neqembu lakhe. Kodwa kulokhu uthe ufuna ukubuya ngamandla ngesizini ezayo.“Ngemuva kokulimala ehlombe ngiye kohlinzwa. Sengiluleme manje. Into esisele wukuthi ngiqale ngilijwayeze ukunyakaza ihlombe lami. Kukhona ithambo elephuka phakathi ehlombe. Bekungokwesibili ngithinteka ehlombe. Ngesikhathi ngithinteka okokuqala ngabhinyilika ihlombe lagudluka lapho kumele libe khona,” kusho uLorch.Ngesizini ezayo kubhekwe ukuthi uLorch asize iBucs iqede indlala yeminyaka emine iphikwa yizicoco. IPirates izolwela isicoco seMTN 8, Telkom Knockout, Nedbank Cup, Absa Premiership neseCAF Champions League.“Iqembu libe nesizini enhle uma kuqhathaniswa nesizini engaphambi kwedlule. Ngeke sibe nazo izizathu zokubeka izaba ngesizini ezayo ngoba kumele silwele zonke izicoco esizobe sizibanga. Nami ngibheke ukunqoba isicoco sami sokuqala. Selokhu ngiqalile ukudlala esigabeni esikhokhelayo angikaze nginqobe nesisodwa isicoco. Isicoco engike ngasinqoba ngisithole eqenjini lesizwe siphakamisa iCosafa Cup. Ngeneme ngokuthi iphupho lami lokudlala kwiCAF Champions League lizofezeka. Ngesizini ezayo ngibheke ukunqoba izicoco, ukudlala kwiChampions League nokusiza iBafana ekutheni izibekisele indawo kwi-Africa Cup of Nations,” kusho uLorch.Sekuphele iminyaka emine iPiratesyagcina ukuphakamisa isicoco. Yagcina ukunqoba isicoco ngo-2014 ikhala yemuka nesicoco seNedbank Cup eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini.Ngesizini edlule iBucs iqede endaweni yesibili kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership ngemuva kwalokho yazibekisela indawo kwiChampions League.ULorch, oyibamba ngasezinhlangothini noma ngemuva kwabagadli, kuphoqeleke ukuthi ahoxe eqenjini lesizwe elidlala kwiCosafa Cup eLimpopo.“Ngizimisele ngokusebenzisa lesi sikhathi ukuthi ngiphumule ngokwanele. Uma udlala kwiChampions League awusitholi isikhathi sokuphumula. Ngakho kumqoka ukuthi umuntu asisebenzise kahle lesi sikhathi,” kusho uLorch.
title: ULorch ufuna ukubuya ngamandla ngesizini ezayo

text: INHLANGANO ebhekelele ezemijaho yamahhashi, iHorse Racing Authority (HRA) ishaya indesheni kuhulumeni ukuthi ivunyelwe isingathe imijaho yamahhashi khona kusaqhubeka uthaqa wezwe ngenxa yecoronavirus.Kusuka ngoMashi, ezemidlalo emhlabeni zimisiwe emhlabeni wonke okubalwa nayo imijaho yamahhashi njengoba nendumezulu yeVodacom Durban July, eba minyaka yonke ngempelasonto yokuqala kaJulayi ihlehlisiwe kulo nyaka.Nakuba ethe bebengakayicabangi eyokuthi baze bafikisane nohulumeni enkantolo abeHRA, kodwa isikhulu esiphezulu kule nhlangano, uVee Moodley, sicashunwe kwi-ENCA engxoxweni ebisakazwa bukhoma sithi bazoshaya indesheni kuhulumeni.UMoodley uthi okwenza basukume phansi yingoba ukungabi khona kwemijaho kuzoholela ekutheni baphoqeleke ukuthi babulale imihlambi yamahhashi ngomjovo.Empeleni isibalo samahhashi kuthiwe angaba ngaphezu kuka-400 ngenyanga eyodwa abulawayo.UMoodley uthe lokhu kuzoholela ekulahlekeni kwemisebenzi engu-60 000 nokuzosho ukwanda kwemizi okulala ikati eziko kuyo."Sivele silimele kakhhulu, asekhona amahhashi okuphoqeleke ukuthi abulawe. Uma singaqhubeka singabinayo imijaho kuzokonakala nakakhulu. Sizolahlekelwa yimisebenzi engaphezu kuka-60 000," kusho uMoodley.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe bakulungele yini ukuya enkantolo uma bengavunyelwa ukubuyisa imijaho, uthe:"Besingakafiki lapho ngoba sikholwa wukuthi sizozwakala isikhalo sethu. Imboni yethu iklama indima emqoka kabi emnothweni wezwe. Angenze isibonelo nje, uma usiqhathanisa nemboni ethi ayicishe ifane, eyamaCasino, emahhashini kungasebenzeka ngokuqhelelana.""Sike sawahlola amahhasi, kuze kube yimanje besingakatholi lutho olukhomba igciwane. Nemithetho yokuqhelelana ingalandeleka kalula uma uqhathanisa namacasino."Imboni yemijaho yamahhashi incike emaphanteni okuyiwo abhejayo. Lokho kusho ukuthi uma ivulwa imijaho zizothinteka nezinkampani ezinjengoHollywood Bets nezinye.Akucaci-ke nokho ukuthi uMoodley ubebala nazo uma ekhuluma ngemisebenzi engaphezu kuka-60 000 ezolahleka.Kuyiqiniso ukuthi uma ingabuyiswa imijaho, maningi amahhashi okuzophoqa ukuthi abulawe kwazise kubiza izinkulungwane ukondla ihhashi lonjaho ngenyanga.@malbingo
title: Bafuna kuvunyelwe imijaho yamahhashi

text: NJENGOBA u-Ephreli kuyinyanga yokugubha inkululeko kuleli, kulo nyaka le nkululeko igujwa esimeni izwe libhekene neCovid-19.Nakuba lena kungeyona inselelo ebhene neNingizimu Afrika kuphela, umbuzo osalayo uthi esimeni esifana nalesi, lokhu kusho ukuthini kubantu bakuleli?UMnuz Mpumelelo Zikalala ongungoti kwezokuthuthukiswa koMthethosisekelo wezwe, uthe lesi simo sikhombise ngokusobala ukuthi ukuxhumana kukahulumeni nabantu abamvotelayo, yinto ekude kakhulu kangakanani.“Lokhu ukubona ngezinqumo ezithathwayo. Akukho lapho okulalelwa khona abantu ukuthi bona bathini ngokwenzekayo ngaphambi kokuthathwa kwezinqumo,” kusho uZikalala.Ngokwakhe, ukuthathwa kwezinqumo, kumele kuhambisane nokuxhumana nabantu, ngendlela efanayo nokuzibandakanya nabo uma kuzoyiwa okhethweni. Uthe kunoma iyiphi intando yabantu, uhulumeni uxhumana nabo kuqala bese izinqumo zithathwa sekuke kwanokubonisana.Wenze isibonelo ngokusabalaliswa kwezijumbana zokudla emphakathini, wathi akekho obukeka ezihlupha ngolwazi ngabantu okumele bahlinzekwe ngalokhu, nokuthi bangaki i-ward ngayinye.“Lesi sikhathi sisifundise ukuthi nabezomthetho abakuqondi ukuthi kumele basebenze kanjani ngokulandela iBatho Pele ebeka amalungelo abantu phambili,” kusho yena.Uthe indlela abomthetho abaziphatha ngayo bechitha utshwala nenyama emagcekeni emizi yabantu abasolwa ngokuphula imithetho kathaqa kulesi sikhathi, kayikhombisi inhlonipho.“Kumele bakuthathe abakutholayo bayokulahla lapho beyalelwe khona. Ukuthi bakuchithe emagcekeni abantu akukhombisi ukubahlonipha,” usho njalo.Uthe kumele njalo ekuseni uma kunamasha abezomthetho bakhunjuzwe izindlela okumele baphathe ngayo izakhamuzi zakuleli.“Mhlawumbe okunye okumele kubhekisiswe, ukuba khona kwesidingo sala malungelo esikhathini esiphila kuso, ukuthi akumele yini abuyekezwe,” kuchaza yena.Uthe kunemithetho eshaywa abaholi kodwa kuphinde kube yibona abayiphulayo.Isishoshovu samalungelo abantu, uNkk Mary De Haas, uthe ngaphandle kokuthi umgubho wenkululeko uqondane nesikhathi seCovid-19, abantu ababencishwe amathuba phambilini basahlupheka.“Umzabalazo wokulethwa kwezidingo ebantwini kumele uqhubeke ngoba abantu baswele amanzi ahlanzekile nemfundo engcono basakweswele kuze kube yimanje," kusho uNkk De Haas.
title: Izinselelo ngomgubho ohambisana neCovid-19

text: UMGADLI weMaritzburg United, uBongokuhle “Saniza” Hlongwane, uthi bazolwa kuze kube wumdlalo wokugcina ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi baqhela unomphela esishozini sezembe.I-The Team of Choice ibalwa namaqembu alwa nokubalekela izembe njengoba kumanje ihlezi endaweni ka-14 kwi-log yeDStv Premiership, ngamaphuzu angu-17 emidlalweni engu-19 esiyidlalile kule sizini.Nokho, okwenza uHlongwane abenethemba lokuthi ezakhe zizolivika izembe, ukuthi emidlalweni emine yokugcina yeligi zibuye namaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili amqoka. Zinqobe emibili, zadlala ngokulingana eminye emibili. Kanti emdlalweni wokugcina weligi ngeledlule zibhaxabule iTS Galaxy ngo 2-0 wamagoli kaHlongwane noThabiso Kutumela.I-The Team of Choice izobuyela ensimini ngokududulana neChippa United koweDStv Premiership, eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu, ngo-Ephreli 3.“Ukuzethemba kubuyile kakhulu kithina badlali njengamanje, simagange ngokulwela ukuthola amanye amaphuzu emidlalweni elandelayo. Empeleni nje ngisho nale midlalo emibili esidlale ngokulingana kuyona, oweCeltic neChiefs, bekufanele siyiwine kodwa-ke sagcina sidlale ngokulingana.“Eqinisweni sidlala kahle kakhulu ngakho le ndawo esikuyo kwi-log ayisifanele. Ngingasho ngaphandle kokungabaza ukuthi izembe sizolivika noma kanjani. Umdlalo nomdlalo esizowudlala kusukela manje sizolwela ukubuya namaphuzu kuwona,” kusho uHlongwane odabuka KwaNxamalala, eSweetwaters, eMgungundlovu.UHlongwane (20) ongomunye wabagadli abasebancane abathembisayo, ukhushulelwe esikimini esikhulu seMaritzburg United ngesizini ka-2018/2019 esuka eqenjini le-United elidlala kwiDStv Diski Challenge. Kanti kule sizini usashaye igoli elilodwa waba ngumvusi wenyamazane kwelinye emidlalweni engu-13 asayidlalile kuyo yonke imiqhudelwano.“Empeleni ngiqale ukudlala ibhola kwiMncwabe FC yaseNorthdale ngineminyaka engu-11, ngathi lapho sengithe thuthu ngajoyina iNxamalala Fast XI edlala kwiSAB. Kwathi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ngajoyina iPhenduka eyayidlala kwi-ABC Motsepe League nokwathi ekudliweni kwayo yizembe kwiMotsepe, ngabe sengibuyela kwiNxamalala.“Ngajoyina iMaritzburg emva kokuba umqeqeshi uPeter Petersen engimeme ukuthi ngizozama inhlanhla kuleli qembu. Ngidlale eqenjini leMDC (esiyiDStv Diski Challenge) eliqeqeshwa nguye Petersen ngaphambi kokuba ngikhushulelwe esikimini esikhulu,” kuqhuba uHlongwane.UHlongwane ufisa ukuzibona ebalwa nabagadli abaphambili eNingizimu Afrika ngelinye ilanga, uthi ufunda lukhulu kubagadli adlala nabo asebenamava, oThabiso Kutumela, Judas Moseamadi noJose Ali Meza. Uthi futhi kuyisifiso sakhe esikhulu ukudlala eqenjini lesizwe, iBafana Bafana.Uke wabizwa eqenjini lesizwe leBafana Bafana, eladlala neLesotho kowe-Africa Nations Championship (Chan) ngo-2019. Wabizwa futhi naseqenjini lesikhashana le-Under 20, Amajita, nokho wagcina engabanga yingxenye yeqembu elidlale kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ka-Under 20 edlalelwe ePoland, ngo-2019.
title: OweMaritzburg ukholwa wukuthi bazolivika izembe

text: UNOBHALA Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule, uthe nakuba kwake kwaba khona umdonsiwano phakathi kwakhe noMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa emuva kwenkomfa ngo-Disemba 2017, kodwa manje sebesebenzisana kahle kakhulu.UMagashule usho lokhu ngenkathi ekhuluma kwiNewzRoomAfrika ngeSonto ekuseni.Ubekhuluma ngomumo wale nhlangano selokhu kwaqala iCovid-19.“Ukube uRamaphosa akazange avale izwe kusenesikhathi, ngabe sibhekene nenhlekelele yeCovid-19,” kusho uMagashule.Uthe ukubheduka kwaleli gciwane, kwenze le nhlangano yangabe isakwazi ukuxhumana nabantu, kwazise iyinhlangano ekholelwa ekuzifikeleni mathupha kubona abantu.NgokukaMagashule, lokhu sekuholele ekutheni le nhlangano ihlehlise nezinkomfa ebezihlelwe ukuthi zizokuba kulo nyaka.“Silawulwa ososayensi (abacubungula ngeCovid-19), ngeke simemezele ukuthi sizokuba nenkomfa ngesonto elizayo, kuyajika futhi sesithi isiphinde yahlehliswa,” kuchaza uMagashule.Okwamanje uthe izinkomfa kuleli qembu zihlehliselwe isikhathi esingaziwa.  Nakuba kunjalo, uthe selokhu kwala iCovid-19, bakwazile ukugxila kokunye, njengokugxila ekukhuliseni umnotho wezwe.Phezu kokuthi icoronavirus ifike kwavalwa amehlo, uthe kukhona ebafundise kona kwezobuchwepheshe.Uthe iningi labo belingakwazi ukusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje bezokuxhumana iZoom, kodwa manje sebeyakwazi.Mayelana nokubuyiselwa kwi-ANC kwabekade besolwa ngokudla imali yase VBS Mutual Bank eLimpopo, uMagashule uthe yisiGungu esiPhezulu sale nhlangano samalungu angu-100 esithathe leso sinqumo, okungamele sibukelwe phansi.
title: UMagashule uyavuma ukuthi wake wabakhona umdonsiswano phakathi kwakhe noRamaphosa

text: KUNYAMALALA komlingisi oyintandokazi uThemba Ndaba, odlala indawo kaBrutus kwiThe Queen kuMzansi Magic, kwenze abantu banganami.UBrutus unyamalale ngesikhathi kuqhuma ibhomu esikebheni kushada uShaka (Sthembiso “SK” Khoza) noMmabatho (Motsoaledi Setumo). Ngokwalo mdlalo abaqinisekisiwe ukuthi bashonile kulesi sigameko wuGift (Thabang Molaba) noRoy (Kabelo Moalusi).Ukungajabuli kwabantu kugqame kakhulu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba kukhona abathi abanikazi balo mdlalo ngabe benza iphutha elikhulu uma bengaqeda indawo yalo mlingisi njengoba bebaningi abachazwa yindawo yakhe.KuTwitter kukhona abathi uma kungukuthi ushonile ngempela uBrutus, kuzomele kube neholidi eNingizimu Afrika kuzilelwe yena.Leli sonto liphele kungacaci ukuthi ushonile ngempela yini uBrutus kodwa kunezinhlelo zomngcwabo wakhe njengoba kunenkolelo yokuthi ushonile emuva kokutholakala kwesigqoko sakhe endaweni yesigameko.Okhulumela uMzansi Magic, uNondumiso Mabece, uthe nabo bayazithola izikhalo kubantu ngokunyamalala kukaBrutus kulo mdlalo.“Kukhona abathi abasafuni ngisho ukuwubuka umdlalo ngoba bacasulwa ukuthi uBrutus akasekho.Sicela abantu baqhubeke nokubuka umdlalo ngoba kuningi okusazobajabulisa ngawo. Ngeke ngikudalule okuzogcina kwenzekile ngalo mlingisi kodwa abantu abawubuke. Besingazami ukuzwa amanzi ngobhoko ngokuthi anyamalale kodwa indlela obhalwe ngayo kwisizini entsha ukuthi abanye babalingisi bazobuya abanye ngeke besabuya. Yingakho kuqhume ibhomu kushadwa esikebheni, kwaba khona abashonayo,” kusho uNondumiso.Uthe uma abantu bewuduba bazophuthelwa okumnandi okusazokwenzeka kuwona ngoba basazomangazeka ngabazokubona kwenzeka.
title: Bacikekile kunyamalala umdlali oyintandokazi kwiThe Queen

text: UMA kuya ngenkulumo yomqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs u-Ernst Middendorp, unozinti u-Itumeleng Khune kufanele akhohlwe wumqhudelwano i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ka-2019 ezoba se-Egypt ngoJuni.UKhune ulimale ehlombe nyakenye nokuholele ekutheni ahlale isikhathi eside engadlali. Ezintini kwiChiefs lokhu kunike ithuba abanye onizinti okukhona kubona uVirgil Vries, Bruce Bvuma noDaniel Akpeyi waseNigeria.KwiBafana kuhlomule uDarren Keet weBidvest Wits oshaye into ecokeme emdlalweni wokugcina wokuhlungela i-Afcon neLibya ngenyanga edlule.Ebuzwa ngoKhune emuva kokuthi iChiefs idlale ngokulingana ngo 1-1 neLamontville Golden Arrows koweligi, uMiddendorp uthe: “Ufuna ngiphendule ukuthini? Usekulungele ukudlala? Asikhulume iqiniso, sekuyophela * -Ephreli. Kuze kube manje akakalithinti ibhola. Angazi kungani kufanele ngihlale ngiphendula lo mbuzo njalo emuva kwamasonto amathathu? Awekho amathuba alokho. Nginesiqiniseko salokho. Uma ngempela kukhona ophupha ngoKhune kwi-Afcon ekubeni engaziqeqeshi shuthi akazimisele ngalutho. UKhune kufanele azilungiselele ukuqala kahle isizini ezayo.”Uqhube wathi: “SinoBruce noDaniel okungonozinti abashisa umbango ngezinga eliphezulu. Lona wumbono wami. Uma umqeqeshi weqembu lesizwe (Stuart Baxter) eqoka uKhune ekhempini ye-Afcon yisinqumo sakhe. Odokotela bethu banombono ohlukile.”Ngesikhathi iBafana igcina ukudlala kwi-Afcon iqeqeshwa ngu-Ephraim Mashaba ibhekane nesimo esifanayo. UKhune ubekade elimele isikhathi eside kodwa walulama sekusondele umqhudelwano. UMashaba uqoke ukumshiya, wathatha uJackson Mabokgwane, Wayne Sandilands noBrilliant Khuzwayo. Ugcine ebashintshanisa bonke emidlalweni emithathu yamaqoqo, iBafana yaphuma ekuseni kwi-Afcon.Emdlalweni weChiefs ne-Arrows, uMiddendorp unikeze ithuba uJoseph Molangoana ophuke umlenze ekuqaleni kwesizini. Uveze nokuthi kuzobuya uLebo Manyama ngaphambi kokuphela kwesizini.“ULebo Manyama ubengumdlali obalulekile kithina ngoDisemba nangoJanuwari ngaphambi kokukhahlelwa kabi sibhekene naMaZulu. Ungomunye wabadlali ababukhali ekwazini ukuthi kufanele abe kuphi, izinqumo zakhe, ukuphasa ibhola nokushaya amagoli. Kubuhlungu ukuthi kufanele silinde. Ubekade esezofika lapho kukhona uJoseph futhi mhlampe ephambili kodwa walimala umsipha. Sizobona kusasa (izolo) ukuthi kuzokwenzekani. Kodwa ngesonto elizayo ngeke abuye. Mhlawumbe uma sesodlala neFree State Stars uzobuya athole imizuzu embalwa,” kusho uMiddendorp.NgoMgqibelo ngo-8.15 ebusuku iChiefs izobhekana neBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ePeter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane.
title: UMiddendorp akamboni edlala kwi-Afcon uKhune

text: INKANTOLO eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu yamukele isitatimende sikafakazi osewashona ecaleni lokubulawa kwabantu ehostela iGlebelands.Izolo umshushusi * -Advocate Dorian Paver ufake isicelo sokuba kwamukelwe ubufakazi bukamufi, uMnuz Phumelele Patrick 'Godola' Ndlovu.UNdlovu ungomunye wabantu abazibonela kubulawa abantu ababili ngoMashi 2016 ehostela. Ngo-Meyi 2016 wenza isitatimende esifungelwe emaphoyiseni ngakubona kwenzeka.Lo fakazi wabe esedutshulwa, washona kungakaqalwa ukuqulwa kwecala. Bathathu ofakazi abebezoba yingxenye yaleli cala asebabulawa, uNdlovu, uMnuz Sipho Ndovela noNksz Princess Sibiya. Abasolwa kuleli cala nguSergeant Bhekukwazi Louis Mdweshu, oMnuz Khayelihle Mbuthuma, Vukani Manenze Mcobothi, Wonderboy Eugene Hlophe, Ncomekile Matlale Ntshangase, Mbuyiselwa Mkhize, Mondli Thalente Mthethwa noBongani Mbhele.U-Advocate Paver ubize iphoyisa elabhalisa uNdlovu isitatimende, uWarrant Officer Malusi Sipho Mhlabeni. UMhlabeni uthe babehambisana nephoyisa eselashona uDetective Constable Thandoluhle “Ndo” Mhlongo, baya eMdatsane beyohlangana noNdlovu. Uthe uNdlovu wayebhace kuleya ndawo ngoba esola ukuthi kunabantu abafuna ukumbulala.Uthe uNdlovu wabhalisa isitatimende esifungelwe.“Ngamazisa ukuthi siphenya ngodaba lwaseGlebelands futhi sithole ulwazi ukuthi wayekhona kudutshulwa abantu ababili. Nempela wavuma wabe esesitshela konke okwenzeka. Ngamchazela ukuthi ngizodinga isitatimende esifungelwe ngokwenzeka, wavuma. Ngabe sengibhala phansi imininingwane ayekusho. Wasayina isitatimende,” kusho uMhlabeni.Umshushisi ucele ukuba afunde isitatimende sikamufi.Kwisitatimende kuvele ukuthi umufi wayehlezi nabababili ababulawa. Uthe wabona kuqhamuka amadoda amane ehlome ngezibhamu, kubona kukhona athe uThalente (Mthethwa) noMahliphiza (Mkhize). Laba abanye ababili wayengabazi. Kuvele ukuthi abasolwa bavele babadubula, kungaxatshwene.Uthe yena wabaleka wacasha endlini. Waphuma sebedubulekile ababili. U-Advocate Paver uthe yize umufi engeke esakwazi ukufakaza ngoba wabulawa (ukubulawa kwakhe akuyona ingxenye yamacala abekwe abasolwa kuleli cala), kuzobaluleka ukuba ubufakazi bakhe bamukelwe njengoba kukhona nabanye ofakazi phambilini abakhuluma ngaye umufi ukuthi wayekhona kwindawo yesigameko ngelanga lesehlo.Ummeli wabasolwa uMnuz Xolani Sindane, usichithile lesi sicelo wathi kungamukelwa kanjani ubufakazi bomuntu osewashona ongeke akwazi nokuziphendulela. Uthe lokhu kuzokwenzelela kubasolwa ababili abavela kwisitatimende sakhe.U-Advocate Paver uthe impela kuwubulungiswa ukuba ubufakazi bamukelwe njengengxenye yobufakazi becala.Ijaji uNkosinathi Chili libe selinquma ukuthi ubufakazi bukamufi buzokwamukelwa kuleli cala.Icala lizoqhubeka ngesonto elizayo.Abasolwa babhekene namacala angu-22, okubalwa ayisishiyagalolunye okubulala nawokuzama ukubulala. La macala enzeka phakathi kuka-2014 no-2016.
title: Inkantolo yamukele ubufakazi bosewashona

text: BEKUYIMPELASONTO ethule kubadlali abaningi baseNingizimu Afrika abadlalela amaqembu aphesheya kwezilwandle.Nokho uKamohelo Mokotjo uphinde wagqama esiza iqembu lakhe iBrentford linqoba umdlalo onzima kwiQueens Park Rangers kwiChampionship yase-England.UMokotjo ubuyele enkundleni ngemuva kokweqiwa yimidlalo ethile ngenxa yokuthinteka wafike wakhela iqembu lakhe igoli elilodwa benqoba ngo 3-0 kwiQPR. Uwudlale wonke lo mdlalo uMokotjo ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Kusaqhubeka ukuthi ayibuke nezihlwele imidlalo ye-Amiens uBongani “Ben 10” Zungu osezolulama emva kokuphela kwesikhathi eside engalithinti ibhola ngenxa yokulimala. Leli qembu likaZungu lisahleli kabi ngasemsileni we-log yeligi enkulu yaseFrance yize lidlale neRemis ngokulingana kuba * 2-2.NoLebogang Phiri weGuingamp uhlulekile ukusiza iqembu lakhe libambana ngo 0-0 neNantes khona eFrance. Nakuba kunjalo kodwa ezikaPhiri zihleli ngesinqe esisodwa kule ligi enkulu yaseFrance ngoba zisemsileni ekubeni sekusele imidlalo engu-11 ukuba isizini isongwe.Sekudlule imidlalo eyisishiyagalombili engaliqabulisile ibhola inethi uLebo Mothiba. Lokhu akumphethe kahle lo mdlali weStarsbourg ofike kuleli qembu ethwelwe ngeqoma futhi wafika wawaqhulula amagoli. Kulokhu ezikaMothiba zigcine zikhala ngaphansi ngo 1-0 ziwunikwa iNice ngeSonto. Ngesikhathi sekubonakala ukuthi ngeke esaba wusizo yize ewuqalile umdlalo, uMothiba ukhishiwe sekusele imizuzu engu-14 ukuthi umdlalo uphele.Umdlali wakuleli okumhambele kahle njengoMokotjo, nguPercy Tau ophinde wawudlala wonke owe-Union Saint-Gilloise edlala esigabeni esiphakela esikhulu eBelgium. Lo mdlali ofike kule ligi kwezwakala ubedlala benqoba ngo 1-0 kwi-AFC Tubize okubasondeza nemidlalo ye-Europa League.NoThulani Serero ubedlala iVitesse inenebula iNAC Breda ngo 4-2 emdlalweni wesigaba esikhulu saseNetherlands i-Eredivisie ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.
title: Kuphinde kwagqama uTau noMokotjo phesheya

text: UFUNA ukubhodlela kwiHighlands Park umqeqeshi weChippa United, uClinton Larsen, ngemuva kokuthi ezakhe zidedele amaphuzu amathathu zihlulwa iBlack Leopards ngo 3-2 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngempelasonto.I-United iyeke amaphuzu abengayenza ithi ukuphefumula njengoba ibalwa namaqembu angase adliwe yizembe uma ingashintshi emidlalweni eyisikhombisa esele kwiligi.EzikaLarsen zihambe phambili ngo 2-0 emdlalweni obuseThohoyandou Stadium ngamagoli kaThabo Rakhale noLerato Manzini esiwombeni sokuqala. Nokho amagoli amathathu omgadli weLeopards, uMwape Musonda awone wonke umcimbi weChili Boys.ULarsen ephawula ngemuva komdlalo uthe uphoxekile ngokwehlulwa kodwa ubona ubungcono eqenjini lakhe.“Yebo uyadumaza umphumela kodwa singcono kakhulu kunalokho ebesiyikhona ezinyangeni ezimbili ezedlule. Yebo besingenza kangcono ekuvimbeni amagoli kodwa ngiyabonga ngoba asizange sibhekise amakhanda phansi. Sizolokhu siqhubeka nokulwa,” kusho uLarsen ongumqeqeshi wesine ukupheka i-United kule sizini.Isiqeqeshwe uDan Malesela, Eric Tinkler noJoel Masutha futhi akufanele kumangaze uma usihlalo uSiviwe Mpengesi engamkhomba afika ngayo uLarsen.Emdlalweni olandelayo bazovakashelwa iHighlands Park ngeSonto eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ngo-3.30 ntambama.“Sizobe sidlalela ekhaya. Kumele siqinisekise ukuthi siyawenza umsebenzi. IHighlands ayenzi kahle ekuhambeni. Banamaphuzu awu-29, nginesiqiniseko abekho lapho abebefisa ukuba khona kulesi sikhathi. Bazolwela ukuthi bangene kwiTop 8. Ngokwami sidlala neqembu esilinganayo nalo. Ngike ngasho ukuthi ngaphandle kwamaqembu ayisithupha amakhulu, engibala kuwona neCape Town City, lawa amanye ayishumi singontanga nawo,” kusho uLarsen.IHighlands, ehleli endaweni yesishiyagalolunye kwi-log, izofika emdlalweni ihambela phezulu ngemuva kokushaya iBaroka FC ngo 2-1 ngempelasonto.IChippa yehlele endaweni yesibili ukusuka emsileni ngamaphuzu awu-20. Yehlukaniswe amaphuzu amathathu neMaritzburg United evale ekugcineni ngamaphuzu awu-17 (ngaphambi komdlalo wayizolo). I-Team of Choice ibidlala izolo neMamelodi Sundowns eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:Namuhla: Baroka FC v Lamontville Golden Arrows (Peter Mokaba Stadium, 7.30pm)NgoLwesihlanu: SuperSport United v Kaizer Chiefs (Mbombela Stadium, 8pm); Bloemfontein Celtic v Bidvest Wits (Dr Molemela Stadium, 8pm); Cape Town City FC v Polokwane City (Cape Town Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: Free State Stars v AmaZulu FC (Goble Park, 3.30pm)NgeSonto: Chippa United v Highlands Park (Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium, 3.30pm)
title: 'Uma sesidlala neHighlands sizobe sidlala nontanga'

text: SEKUPHELE iminyaka engu-13 kulokhu kuvela ukuthi unezipoki ezimbili egameni lakhe owesifazane waseQuarry Heights, eThekwini, uNksz Nobuhle Ndimande (30).  Uthe lokhu kuvela njalo uma eyoshayela indodana yakhe enokukhubazeka isitifiketi sokuzalwa eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya.UNksz Ndimande uthe akasazi ukuthi kumele enzenjani njengoba umnyango umchitha futhi umsabisa ngokumbopha, ubuza ukuthi kungani engazazi lezi zingane ezingaphansi kwenombolo kamazisi wakhe kulo mnyango.“Uma ngithi ngishayela ezami izingane kuthiwa ngeke ngikwazi ngoba lezi zingane ezingaphansi kwegama lami, zicishe zilingane nalezi engisuke ngithi ngiyazifaka,” kusho uNksz Ndimande.Uthe njengamanje indodana yakhe eneminyaka ewu-13 ayikwazi ngisho ukuyobhalisela isikole samabanga aphansi ngenxa yale nkinga. Kunzima nokuyibhalisela isibonelelo sikahulumeni.UNksz Ndimande uthe uqale ukugqigqa emahhovisi oMnyango wezaseKhaya aseMngeni, eThekwini, kusukela ngo-2006.Uthi lezi zipoki ziqale ukuvela ekade eyoshaya umazisingo-2005.“Le nkinga iyangicindezela kakhulu ngoba manje umntwana wami useneminyaka engu-13 engenaso isitifiketi sokuzalwa. Ngahamba ngayobhalisela umazisi kodwa wagcina ungafikanga, okwadlula iminyaka ngagcina sengiphoqeleka ukuthi ngibhalisele omunye. Lo wesibili wafika usuthi nginezingane ezimbili kodwa angizazi lezo zingane,” kuchaza uNksz Ndimande.Ubika ukuthi indodana yakhe eyazalwa ngonyaka ka-2006 wagcina engakwazanga ukuyibhalisela isitifiketi sokuzalwa ngenxa yokuthi iminyaka yayo ayihambisani nale ekuthiwa ngeyakhe, yona okubikwa ukuthi yazalwa ngo-2005.“Mina nginezingane ezintathu ezazalwa ngo-2006, 2010 no-2018. Lezi ezimbili angizazi nhlobo” kusho uNksz Ndimande.Uthi wabuyela eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya lapho bafika bathi kuzodinga akhokhe ukuze zikhishwe lezingane egameni lakhe. Uthe wakhokha kodwa kuze kube yimanje akukaze kulungiswe.“Sengilwe kakhulu. Ngagcina sengixabana nabo esikhungweni eMngeni ngoba ngingaqondi ukuthi kungani ingalungiswa le ndaba. Njalo bangitshela ukuthi udaba lusadingidwa ePitoli. Ekugcineni bangitshela ukuthi bazongibopha ngoba kusho ukuthi lezi zingane engingazazi yizipoki zami.”Okhulumela uMnyango wezaseKhaya eKZN, uMnuz Cyril Mncwabe, uthe lolu daba lusazophenywa.“Umnyango usazoluphenya udaba. Kuzodinga sisebenzisane nenhlangano iSouth African Social Security Agency (SASSA) ukuze sibheke nokuthi awukho yini umkhonyovu oke wenzeka ngalezi zingane ezimbili,” kuchaza uMncwabe.UNksz Ndimande uthe okubaluleke kakhulu kuyena ukuthi akwazi ukufaka umntwana wakhe esikoleni aphinde akwazi nokumholela nemali yesibonelelo sikahulumeni.
title: Akasazi enzenjani okuthiwa uholela izipoki

text: IMIKLOMELO yabasebenza emkhakheni wezethelevishini namafilimu  amaSouth African Film and Television Awards, kuhlelwa ukuthi ibe ngoMeyi 21 noMeyi 22 eGoli.Lokhu kuvele kusomqulu okhishwe yiNational Film and Video Foundation (Nfvf),  ebhekele le miklomelo njengoba ifuna inkampani ezohlela amaSaftas akulo nyaka."Ngokudlule amaSaftas abe ngosuku olulodwa eSun City Superbowl futhi ahlanganise uhlelo lwasekuseni oluqoshiwe noludlala bukhoma lwakukhaphethi obomvu nemiklomelo emikhulu ntambama. Kulokhu kodwa amaSaftas 15 azoba sendaweni efanele eGoli imicimbi ibe mibili, ngezinsuku ezilandelanayo bese ikhonjiswa ngoLwesihlanu ngoMeyi 21 2020 - Craft Awards nangoMeyi 22 2021 - imiklomelo emikhulu," kusho usomqulu.Uqhuba uthi inkampani efunekayo kumele yenze umcimbi ohlanganisa ukuqoshwa kwezinkulumo zabanqobile, ukuqoshwa kwabazonandisa ezindaweni ezahlukene nokunye. Okuzodlala bukhoma ngokuzoshiwo umethuli wohlelo nokumenyezelwa kwabanqobile.Umcimbi wokuklomelisa abanqobe kumaCraft Awards okuyilapho kuhlomula khona abasebenza ukuhlanganisa imidlalo yethelevishini namafilimu, wona uzosakazwa online. Kuthiwa ngenxa yesibalo esiphezulu semiklomelo izohlukaniswa kabili ekuseni nantambama.Indikimba yomcimbi wakulo nyaka ithi Still Shining.Ukwamukelwa kwezicelo zezinkampani ezifuna ukusingatha le miklomelo kuzovalwa ngo-11 ekuseni ngoMashi 12.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, umethuli wezinhlelo ophinde abe ngumsakazi uHulisani Ravele uphumele obala wathi ufuna ukwethula amaSaftas akulo nyaka."Noma ngabe ubani othola le thenda ngicela ningithole uma senifuna umethuli! Ngineminyaka engu-24 ngikulo msebenzi futhi angikaze ngiphathe uhlelo kumaSaftas, cabanga!" kusho uHulisani owaqala ukugqama ethula iYo-TV eminyakeni edlule.
title: Aseqalile amalungiselelo amaSaftas

text: Nokubongwa PhenyaneINTOKAZI ethathe isicoco sikaMiss SA emcimbini obuseTable Bay Hotel eKapa ngoMgqibelo ebusuku uShudufhadzo Musida (24) ithi izosebenza ngamandla ukusiza intsha nabesifazane abahlaselwe yizifo zengqondo ikakhulukazi emakhaya.UShudufhadzo, waseHa-Masia, eLimpopo, ungowokuqala ukuthatha lesi sicoco kulesi sifundazwe.Ekhuluma nabezindaba ngempumelelo yakhe uthe abantu abayesekile iqala ukungenela umncintiswano yibo abayibeke la ikhona manje.“Ngiyaziqhenya futhi ngiyajabula ngokumela iNingizimu Afrika. Ngiyathemba ukuthi angiyena owokuqala nowokugcina esizweni samaVenda ukuthatha isicoco. Engizokumela kakhulu ukugqugquzela imfundo nezomnotho emantombazaneni asemancane nabesifazane. Kodwa okukhulu kakhulu ukubasiza ezifweni ezithinta ingqondo,” kusho uShudufhadzo.Uthe ngokuthola ithuba elifana naleli uzoqhubeka nokwenza okuhle okwaqalwa abawine eminyakeni edlule.“Emakhaya abesifazane bathwala kanzima becabanga izinto ezibuhlungu abadlule kuzo, bangakwazi ukuthola usizo lokwelulekwa ngokwengqondo. Ngizimisele ukubasiza kulokho. Ngiyakholelwa ekutheni kumele umqondo wethu usebenze kahle ukuze sishintshe izinto eziningi ezingalungile kuleli. Ngizohlangana nezinhlangano ezehlukene nginxuse ukuthi sifundise ngokubalulela kokuba nomqondo ophilile kusuka ebuncaneni babo.“Okunye engizoqinisekisa wukuthi kuyenzeka khona emakhaya wukuthi intsha iyakuthola ukudla nazo zonke izidingo ukuze yenze kahle ezikoleni ekuzo.“Ukuqala lolu hambo kimi kuze kube yimanje kube yinto engingeke ngiyifanise nalutho. Ngaphambi kokuthi ngingenele uMiss SA, ngangiphupha ngokusiza abesifazane nezingane, ngakho-ke ithuba lami leli. Impilo yami ishintshe kakhulu futhi ayishintshele mina kuphela kodwa nempilo yesizukulwane esiza ngemuva kwami.”Ngokuphumelela kwakhe uhlabene ngemiklomelo kaR3 million.Indawo yesibili ithathwe nguThato Mosehle (25) waseKlerksdorp, eNorth West, eyesithathu yathathwa uNatasha Joubert (23), wasePitoli.Uhlelo beluphethwe usaziwayo uNomzamo Mbatha.Kunandise uSho Madjozi, Mi Casa, Ami Faku, Sun-El Musician noJimmy Nevis.Amajaji omcimbi bekuwuZozibini Tunzi, Anele Mdoda, Peggy-Sue Khumalo, Leandie du Randt noKim Engelbrecht.
title: Ngizosiza abenezifo zengqondo: Shudufhadzo

text: KUPHELILE ukuqagela, ukaputeni wamaBhokobhoko uSiya Kolisi usezojoyina iCell C Sharks njengomdlali wayo. UKolisi (29), uzodlalela oShaka ngenxa yesivumelwano senkampani ethenge amasheya kuleli qembu elizinze eThekwini, iMVM Holdings yase-USA. Kuvele nokuthi iqembu abelidlalela uKolisi, iWestern Province belifuna imali engu-R1 million, ukuze limdedele kwinkontileka yakhe ebizophela ngo-Okthoba nonyaka.Kulindeleke ukuthi uKolisi ethulwe yiSharks maduzane. Akucaci-ke nokho ukuthi ngabe uzolithatha yini ibhande lobukaputeni kuLukhanyo Am, noma izinto zizoqhubeka njengokwejwayalekile.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe yiWestern Province izolo,  ithe  bazamile ukumncenga uKolisi ukuthi ahlale kodwa wanqaba."UKolisi ubevele ephelelwa yinkontileka neqembu ngo-Okthoba. Iqembu lizame konke okusemandleni ukumgcina kodwa umdlali wathi usefisa ukushiya," kusho isitatimende.Ushiya kwiProvince nje bese ehlale iminyaka engu-11, kwazise wajoyina leli qembu ephuma esikoleni.Bese edlale amahlandla angu-118 kwiProvince.Uthathe izintambo zobukaputeni kwiProvince ngo-2017, kwathi ngo-2018 wamenyezelwa njengokaputeni weqembu lesizwe amaBhokobhoko.Sekuwumlando ukuthi ngo-2019, uKolisi neqembu lesizwe banqobe isicoco seNdebe yoMhlaba ngaphansi kobuholi bukaRassie Erasmus obengumqeqeshi ngaleso sikhathi. Izinkinga zemali bese zibhokile kwiSharks, kodwa lokho sekubukeka njengomlando njengoba leli qembu seliphethwe iMVM Holdings yaphesheya kwezilwandle.Ngesizini edlule, iSharks ingelinye lamaqembu angakhala kakhulu ngokuphazanyiswa wukubheduka kweCoronavirus. Kwamiswa imidlalo yeVodacom Super Rugby ihamba phambili. Ayikwazanga nokunqoba iCarling Currie Cup, yehlulwa kowamanqamu yiVodacom Bulls.
title: UKolisi usebheke kwiCell C Sharks

text: MHLELI: Ngivumele ngincele kule nsengwakazi eyiphephandaba lesizwe elisithatha lisibeke nala abanye bengafiki khona.Kulobu bugebengu nokubulawa kwabantu esikubona nsuku zonke kwithelevishini nasemaphephandabeni kubulawa odadewethu, abafowethu nezihlobo ngabantu abaziwayo nabatholwa benamacala. Ngabe uhulumeni wethu ufuna kuze kwenzekeni kanti?Mina nginaso isisombululo kule nto, yisigwebo sentambo esiyisisombululo. Ngiyazi abaningi bazophikasana nami kulokhu bethi kwafa abantu abaningi ngendlela engafanele ngesikhatthi sobandlululo kodwa-ke njengoba besho kwakuyisikhathi sobandlululo, manje sekubusa uhulumeni wentando yabantu. Ake sibukele komakhelwane bethu abafana neBotswana. Sikhona isigwebo sentambo futhi uma uqhathanisa izinga lobugebengu nelethu la eMzansi izibalo zikhomba ukuthi eBotswana liphansi kakhulu.Ukubopha umuntu otholwe kunesiqiniseko sokuthi udlwengulile waphinde wabulala izingane ezintathu emndenini akusizi ngalutho ngoba nasejele lapho wondliwa yimali yentela ekhokhwa uye lo muntu abulale izingane zakhe. Sekwanele manje ma-Afrika ngicela uhulumeni ayibukisise kahle le ndaba futhi nginesiqiniseko sokuthi ingabehlisa ubugebengu nokubulawa kwabantu.ThokozaniELovu
title: [IMBONO] Isigwebo sentambo singaba yisisombululo kule ngwadla

text: SEKUQUBUKE inkombankombane ngokusha komuzi wobeyiMeya yaseMvoti, uMnuz Philani Mavundla nomunye onukwayo ngokusha komuzi, osesikhundleni komunye womasipala, amgagulile kodwa ongatholanga ukuphawula.NgoLwesihlanu ebusuku kuqubuke ingomane yomlilo ongathi ubaswe yizimuzimu, emzini kaMavundla kusha umuzi kungaziwa ukuthi wokhelwe wubani.Kusha isithabathaba somuzi nje uMavundla usanda kumemezela ukuthi uyasishintsha isigqoko kwezepolitiki uyayishiya i-ANC, ujoyina iNFP.Uthe kungenzeka ukuthi ukusha komuzi wakhe kusukela lapho ngoba uthole izinsongo zivela komgagulile, obonakala engahambisani nesinqumo sikaMavundla.‘’Kusobala vele ukuthi ukujoyina kwami iNFP akwehlanga kahle kwabanye. Kodwa ngiyazibuza ukuthi yini ngithole izinsongo bese kusha umuzi wami.Ngithukwe yimeya * ... ingibiza ngawo wonke amagama, yaze yathi ayihlome ihlasele,’’ kuchaza uMavundla.UMavundla ukhale nangokuthi ngesikhathi kufika izicishamlilo, sifike safa esisodwa ngaphandle komuzi wakhe, sangamsiza ngalutho.Labo abebethunyiwe bebenganawo namathuluzi afanele okusebenza, beswele ngisho ithoshi lokukhanyisa besebenzisa amaselula nelati elilodwa.Imeya esolwa uMavundla ayitholakalanga ocingweni lwayo emuva kokuba izanywe izikhathi eziningi, yashiyelwa nomyalezo engawuphendulanga.Kunombhalo Isolezwe ngeSonto elinawo lapho kusolwa ukuthi ubhalwe ngonukwayo, kulapho okunamazwi khona athi ayihlome, okusolwa ukuthi abheke kuMavundla.Umbhalo okusolwa ukuthi ngowokunkwayo uthi i-ANC isetshenziselwe ukushintsha ukwesekwa kwayo kuye kwiNFP ngabantu abangosomathuba.Sonke siyazi ukuthi uma bengekho abaholi bangempela kugqama abaholi mbumbulu. Abantu abathanda i-ANC, kufanele basukume bayivikele kukho konke okuzovela kusukela manje,’’ kusho okusolwa ukuthi ushise umuzi, kwiFacebook. UMavundla uthe akajiki kulesi sinqumo sakhe sokujoyina iNFP futhi umuzi wakhe uzolungiswa ngokukhulu ukushesha ngoba kushe amagumbi amabili nje kuphela, akulimalanga muntu.
title: Imeya ezinsolweni zokushisa umuzi

text: Nokubongwa PhenyaneZIWOLE izindondo izintandokazi zemidlalo kuthelevishini, iGomora neThe River ezikhonjiswa kuMzansi Magic (DStv 161) ne-1Magic (103) kwiRoyalty Soapie Awards.Umcimbi wezindondo ubukhonjiswa kuSABC1 ngo-8 kuya ku-10 ebusuku ngoMgqibelo, lapho bekuhlonishwa abalingisi bemidlalo ehlukene yakuleli.Kuhlonishwe neqhaza lalabo abasebenza emikhakheni ehlukene yokukhiqizwa kwemidlalo.Imidlalo eqoqe izindondo ezimbalwa iThe Queen ethole izindondo ezintathu, iGomora yadla ezine kwathi iThe River yakhala yemuka nezinhlanu.Umlingisi oyisithandwa sabaningi kulezi zinsuku uSannah Mchunu uhlabane ngendondo ye-Outstanding Supporting Actress.Lo mlingisi akandanga ngamaningi ebonga indondo, ubonge izingane zakhe eziyisikhombisa wathi zimgqugquzele, zaphinde zameseka engena kulo mkhakha.“Ngiyabonga kakhulu kubahleli balo mcimbi ngoba le ndondo isho lukhulu kumina. Angazi ngithini, ngiyabonga kakhulu nakubalandeli bami,” kuchaza uSannah.Omunye umlingisi ohlabane nguSicelo Buthelezi olingisa indawo kaTeddy emdlalweni iGomora, ohlabane nge-Outstanding Newcomer.Ubonge ozakwabo asebenza kulo mdlalo.“Ngiyabonga kakhulu kuNtobeko Sishi noSiphesihle Ndaba esibambisene nabo kahle kulo mdlalo. Ngiyabonga nakuzona zonke izinkakha zabalingisi kulo mdlalo esisebenze nazo kahle nezangifundisa lapho kumele ngenze khona kahle,” kusho uSicelo.Omunye othole izindondo ezibalulekile nguSindi Dlathu, olingisa indawo kaLindiwe kwiThe River.Uthole indondo ye-Outstanding Couple nozakwabo uHlomla Dandala abangabashadikazi kulo mdlalo. Wathola eye-Outstanding Female Villain.Uzalo luhlabane ngendondo eyodwa ye-Outstanding Lead Actress, ethathwe nguDawn Thandeka King, ngendawo kaMaNgcobo.Abanye abahlonishiwe yilaba:Outstanding Editing TeamIsibayaOutstanding LightingThe QueenOutstanding Art DirectionGetroud met RugbyOutstanding Directing TeamGomoraOutstanding Make-Up & HairThe RiverOutstanding WardrobeThe QueenOutstanding Writing TeamSkeem SaamMost Popular Soapie of the Year (Public Vote Category)GomoraOutstanding Supporting ActorSthembiso Khoza onguShaka Khoza kwiThe QueenOutstanding Lead ActorPresley Chweneyagae onguCobra kwiThe RiverOutstanding Male VillainDirk Stoltz onguDeWet Basson kwi-7de LaanOutstanding SoapieBinnelandersSocial CohesionGetroud met RugbyBackground ActorSphiwe MsebeLifetime Achievement AwardAngus Gibson
title: Iwole izindondo ezinhlanu iThe River

text: SHARIKA REGCHANDUMASIPALA waseMsunduzi odume kabi ngokungaphathwa kahle kwezimali uphendule amatafula wathola umbiko omuhle wokusetshenziswa kwenkece kusabelo-mali sika-2014/2015.Ngemuva kweminyaka emihlanu obukade ungenayo imali ngayo ngenxa yokungasetshenziswa budedengu kwayo, kulo nyaka kutholakale ukuthi wonke amabhuku awo ami ngendlela.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi kwethulwa imibiko yomasipala emcimbini obuseSibaya Casino izolo ekuseni.IMeya yaseMsunduzi, uMnuz Chris Ndlela, ibijabule, yabonga imenenja yomkhandlu, uMnuz Mxolisi Nkosi, nethimba lakhe.“UNkosi utakule umkhumbi wethu uzika njengoba afica umasipala wethu usesimweni esibucayi wawuthatha wawubeka kuleli zinga okulo njengamanje,” usho kanje.UNkosi ubonge ithimba lakhe ngokubambisana naye ekufezeni iphupho lakhe lokuthi umkhandlu waseMsunduzi uthole umbiko omuhle.“Kubonakala sisebenza kahle cishe kuyo yonke iminyango emkhandlwini. kuyiqiniso ukuthi sisuka kude lapho izinto kade zingahambi kahle khona kodwa sisengenza kangcono kakhulu kunalokhu esikuzuzile,” usho kanje.Ngo-2010 umasipala waseMsunduzi wafakwa ngaphansi komlawuli ozimele womnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu oholwa nguNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube emuva kwezinsolo zokungazisebenzisi ngendlela efanele izimali.IMeya yangaleso sikhathi nemenenja kamasipala baphucwa amandla abo, kwalethwa ithimba elisha labaphathi ngenhloso yokutakula umkhandlu njengoba wawubonakala ucwila nomkhumbi.UMnuz Johann Mettler waqokwa waba wumlawuli kwathi ngesikhathi inkontileka yakhe iphela ngoDisemba ngo-2010, waphindela esikhundleni sakhe sokuba yisikhulu esiphezulu kwa-SA Local Government Association (Salga).Esikhundleni sikaMettler kwabe sekungena imenenja yomkhandlu weTheku, uMnuz Sibusiso Sithole, owabamba izintambo umasipala waze waphuma ngaphansi komlawuli ngo-2011, kwase kungena uNkosi ezintanjeni osetholele umkhandlu umbiko omuhle okokuqala eminyakeni emihlanu kwembulwa kwembeswa eMsunduzi.
title: UMsunduzi unconyiwe ngemali kulokhu

text: UMLINGISI oqale ukuzakhela igama emdlalweni Uzalo uKay Sibiya, uthi bekuyiphupho lakhe ukuthi ngelinye ilanga abe yingxenye yomdlalo iGenerations: The Legacy.Uveze ukuthi ngenkathi esemncane esaphupha ngokulingisa, wayecabanga ukuthi ikhono lakhe uzoqala ukuligqamisa kulo mdlalo.UKay ungomunye wabalingisi abasha kulo mdlalo okusanda kuqala isizini entsha. Ulingisa indawo kaSiyanda, ongumfowabo kaJack Mabaso. Ekhuluma ngomdlalo uKay, uthe ukujabulele ukuba ingxenye yomndeni eyenza lo mdlalo.“Uyazi nginemizwa engafani ngokuba yingxenye yalo mdlalo njengoba ngithukile kodwa ngijabule futhi ukuthi ekugcineni iphupho lami leminyaka selize lafezeka. Umlingisi ongangami angakutshela ukuthi sonke sisakhula futhi sisaphupha ngokuba kuthelevishini, umdlalo esasifuna ukuba kuwona yiyona iGenerations, ngakho kuyajabulisa ukuthi ekugcineni sekwenzekile,“ kuchaza uKay.Ekhuluma ngoSiyanda uthe ungowesilisa ozithembayo, owaziyo ukuthi ufunani empilweni futhi olimelayo iqiniso.“Ukhule kahle ekhaya elifudumele uSiyanda, ekhuliswa abazali bakhe bobabili. Kodwa angakwazi ukuthi umama wakhe esemncane eneminyaka engu-17, wathola ingane yomfana manje esikhulile futhi eyesatshwayo nehlonishwayo njengoba iyisigebengu, enguJack Mabaso. Kuzocaca emdlalweni ukuthi uSiyanda kumphatha kanjani lokhu azokuthola njengoba esekhulile nje,“ kusho uKay.URussel Savadier ongomunye wabaqasha abalingisi kulo mdlalo, uveze ukuthi akekho umlingisi wakuleli owamfikela emqondweni ngesikhathi besungula indawo kaSiyanda.“Sasifuna umuntu ozongena athi khaxa kule ndawo, oyinsizwa ebukekayo futhi ezoba nesithunzi, uKay uyena owafika emqondweni wami, nangempela samthola. Yena noVusi Kunene (Jack Mabaso), ungafunga ukuthi bazalwa ndawonye ngempela,“ kuchaza uRussel.Uthe uJack uzothola ngomndeni wakhe nangomama wakhe emuva kokuthi eye esangomeni, okuzothi esamfuna uTshidi (Latoya Makhene), amthole kuqala, ukuze afeze izinhloso zakhe.
title: Kufezeke iphupho leminyaka kuKay nge

text: MHLELI: Ngicela ukuthi qaphu ngengikuzwe emsakazweni ngaphinde ngafunda ngakho kwelakho langoNovemba 12 ngaphansi kwesihloko esithi “ngeke zifunwe izitifiketi ezinganeni zangaphandle kuleli.”Le nkulumo ingethusile ngoba sinenkinga yokulawula abantu bangaphandle abangena kuleli ngokungemthetho nabangene ngokusemthethweni okungaze kusidalele izinkinga ezinhlobonhlobo.Okunye okungixakayo wukuthi kuzoqinisekiswa kanjani ukuthi ingane ahamba nayo umuntu bahlobene ngani nayo nokuthi uma kwenzeka bedukelana kuyokwenziwa njani ukuthola izihlobo zayo.Okunye wukuthi uma kwenzeka kutholakala into eyicala enganeni kuyothiwa ibihamba nobani uma ingenawo yona amaphepha ayihlobanisa nomuntu omdala othile. Iyaxaka le nto yokuthi uma sifuna ukwakha amathuba emisebenzi singabe sisazibheka izinto ezingasidalela inkinga ngomuso.Le nto ifana nse nale nto yokuthi abatshali zimali bathi abanikwe ilungelo lokuqasha baxoshe ngendlela abayithandayo ukuze benze inzuzo. Umbuzo engizibuza wona uthi ikuphi inkinga uma abahamba nezingane bephethe amaphepha ezingane uma behamba nazo. Uma abavakashi beze ngokuvakasha okuqondile abangabi nenkinga yokuphatha amaphepha ahambisana nokungena kuleli.Kule mihla kunenkinga yokushushumbiswa kwabantu okukhungethe umhlaba jikelele. Lokuxegisa kwethu izinto kulelizwe kuzokwenza sibe yisizinda sezigebengu ezinhlobonhlobo. Kuzomele inhlangano ebusayo ibheke ukuthi ongqongqoshe abazenzeli abakuthandayo kodwa bahamba emigomweni yeqembu ngoba abantu basuke bevotele imigomo yeqembu hhayi ekangqongqoshe.Ongqongqoshe abalawulwe yimigomo yeqembu ukuze imigomo yeminyango kahulumeni ingashintshi. Abayibhekisise kahle imithetho ngaphambi kokusayina.B khathieThekwini
title: Luyethusa olokwamukelwa kwezingane zabokufika

text: UNICHOLAS Ninow (22) ulivumile icala lokudlwengula intombazanyana eneminyaka engu-7 ethoyilethi lasendaweni yokudlela iDros eSilverton ePitoli nonyaka ngesikhathi evele eNkantolo yaseNorth Gauteng ngoMsombuluko.UNinow uvume icala lokudlwengula, elokutholakala nezidakamizwa kanye nelokwephula ingalo yomthetho kanti uliphikile icala lokushaya unina kamgilwa nabanye abasebenzi baseDros ngesikhathi esebanjiwe.Kukholakala ukuthi uNinow walandela le ntombazanyana ngesikhathi isuka endaweni yokudlala yakhona eDros iya ethoyilethi wabe eseyidlwengula. Kusolakala ukuthi unina wentombazanyana nguyena owambamba oqotsheni egila lo mkhuba ngesikhathi eyobheka indodakazi yakhe.Kwasabalala amavideo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ayekhombisa uNinow enqunu egcwele igazi kuzwakala nowesifazane owayekhala. Lesi sigameko sashiya abantu bedabuka enkundleni uTwitter, abanye besola iDros ngokungaphephi kanti abanye babesola unina wale ntombazanyana ngokuba budedengu.UNinow ungene enkantolo wahlala phansi wazifihla amehlo ngesikhathi izintatheli zizama ukumthatha isithombe. Ngesikhathi ummeli wakhe efunda ukuvuma kwakhe icala uNinow uvele wakhihla esikaNandi kanti nasemuva kwakhe bekuhleli owesifazane osekhulile okusolwa ukuythi ngowomndeni naye obelokhu esula izinyembezi.Ngasekuqaleni konyaka, umsolwa wahlolwa ingqondo izinsuku ezingu-30 esibhedlela sengqondo iWeskoppies lapho ayehlolwa khona ngodokotela abane. Lokhu kwalandela ukuthi ummeli wakhe uMnuz Riaan du Plessis eveze ukuthi uNinow wabe enomlando wesifo sengqondo kanti futhi ubenenkinga yezidakamizwa kusukela eneminyaka engu-14. Ukuhlolwa kwakhe kwaveza ukuthi ukulungele ukuqulwa kwecala.Amalungu e-African National Congress Women's League kanjalo noNgqongqoshe wezokuBambisana nezeNdabuko uNkk Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma bebehambele inkantolo ngoMsombuluko.
title: Ulivumile icala owadlwengula intombazanyana (7) esitolo sokudla

text: UMENGAMELI we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, uphakamise ukuthi ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya lwangonyaka ozayo luhlehliswe emuva kokobheduka kweCorona.Ethula inkuluma emgubheni we-EFF weminyaka eyisikhombisa yasungulwa izolo, uMalema uthe ukhetho lwangonyaka ozayo ngeke kube ngolukhululekile, waphakamisa ukuthi luhlehliselwe u-2024.“Amaqembu amancane ngeke akwazi ukukhankasa ngokukhululeka ngenxa yezimo ezikhona, yingakho sithi ukhetho aluhlehle,” kusho uMalema.Nakuba uMalema ephakamisa ukuthi luhlehle kodwa i-IEC isanda kuthi iyaqhubeka namalungiselelo okuphatha ukhetho.UMalema ubuye waphakamisa ukuthi izwe libuyele esigabeni sesihlanu sikathaqa ukuze kuliwe neCorona.“Uma izwe lingabuyeli esigabeni sesihlanu, uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa kuzomele abekwe icala lokubulala abantu kanti asikhohliwe futhi yindaba yaseMarikana,” kusho uMalema.UMalema usole uRamaphosa ngokuthatha izinqumo ezibeka impilo yabantu engcupheni ngoba efuna ukujabulisa labo asephakatheni labo okungongxiwankulu abamhlophe.Uthe uRamaphosa udayise izwe ngengilazi yewayini kanti lowo uMnuz Jacob Zuma wadayisa izwe ngepuleti lesitshulu.Uthe uhulumeni ushaye isikhala ngokuthi athi akuvulwe izikole ngesikhathi sisephezulu isibalo sabantu ababulawa nabangenwe iCorona.“Imbangela yokujaha ukuthi kuvulwe izikole bekuwukuthi kudliwe imali yamathenda yokuhlanza izikole njengoba kubhubhudlwa imali yokuhlinzeka ngezifonyo.”Uthe inkohlakalo ikhule kakhulu ngaphansi kobuholi bukaRamaphosa ikakhulukazi emuva kokubheduka kweCorona.UMalema unxuse ukuthi kube nobumbano eqenjini lakhe ukuze liqhubeke nokukhula libe yisikhondlakhondla kwezombusazwe.Uthe kwi-EFF akekho umholi ongcono kunomunye.UMalema uthe ngesikhathi iqembu lakhe lisungulwa eminyakeni embalwa edlule baningi abebecabanga ukuthi ngeke lilibone ilanga njengamanye amaqembu.“Saqeda unyaka bathuka, bathi ngeke siye engqungqutheleni, sabukhetha ubuholi, nasengqungqutheleni yakamuva yaseNasrec baningi ababethi ngeke sibuye khona kodwa namanje sisahlangane yize ziningi izihibe esidlule kuzo kodwa sinqobile,” kusho uMalema.Uthe amalungu abo manje kumele aqale asebenzele ukuthi iqembu selizoba neminyaka ewu-10.“Iphelile manje indaba yokuthi i-EFF yiqembu elincane. Manje sesiyiqembu elikhulu, elifike kwezwakalala kwezombusazwe.”Kule minyaka eyisikhombisa bekhona yinkulu impumelelo asebeyizuzile ehlanganisa nokuba wongqoshishilizi ekulweleni amalungelo abantu nokulwela indaba yokubuyiswa komhlaba kubantu. Yizitshudeni ze-EFF ezazihola umkhankaso wokulwela imfundo yamahhala ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.
title: UMalema ufuna luhlehliswe ukhetho

text: S’MANGELE ZUMAUNESILONDA esingapholi uNksz Thuli Mthembu (42) ongunina womsakazi wesiteshi somphakathi iRise FM, uNksz Nontsikelelo Thango (23), okusolwa ukuthi wadutshulwa wabulawa ‘yisoka’ lakhe elalithi lizama ukudubula isigebengu esasizama ukuduna imoto yalo emgwaqweni u-N2 ngaseSlovo, KwaMbonambi, ngenyanga edlule.UNksz Mthembu uthe ngeke axole engakalitholi ithuba lokukhuluma nomsolwa uMnuz Bongani Mthiyane (35), amchazele kahle ukuthi yadubuleka kanjani indodakazi yakhe.UMthiyane, ongaphandle ngebheyili, kulindeleke ukuthi abuyele eNkantolo yakwaMbonambi ngoMeyi 3.“Umsolwa angimjwayele, umuntu engimazi kahle ngumfowabo owayenguthisha kaNontsikelelo. Umfowabo ube lusizo kakhulu emndenini kusukela uNontsikelelo esafunda isikole, emsiza ngoba ebona usizi lwethu. UNontsikelelo ufa nje uBongani usanda kuzomcela ekhaya ukuthi ayomdayisela esitolo sakhe eMzingazi njengoba ayengakawutholi umsebenzi ongcono. Angikwazi ukuthi bebethandana, uNontsikelelo ubenomyeni wakhe abanengane naye eneminyaka emibili,” kusho uNksz Mthembu.Uthe okumxakayo wukuthi uMthiyane ujwayele ukungena ngemoto aze ame egcekeni uma ephelezele uNksz Thango kepha ngosuku lwesigameko wama emgwaqweni.“Angazi noma kwase kufike usuku lwendodakazi yami lokufa yini. Ngizwa kuthiwa kwangqongqoza umuntu ewindini likaBongani ngesikhathi behla emotweni. Lo muntu wacela ukulayithiswa ugwayi kepha uBongani wathi akabhemi. Ngesikhathi befulathele lo muntu wabuyela wayoma ngasemotweni wabuye wabalandela. Kuthiwa uBongani wakhipha isibhamu wabuyisela uNontsikelelo ngemuva, engathi ingane yami yadubuleka ngesikhathi izama ukuvimba uBongani ukuthi angamdubuli lo muntu. Kuningi okungangicaceli, yingakho ngifisa ukuthi ake azongichazela kahle,” kulandisa uNksz Mthembu.Uqhube wathi uma kwenzeka iphutha ngempela uMthiyane kuzomele akhokhe isinxephezelo emndenini ngephutha lakhe.Umphathisiteshi weRise FM, uMnuz Bonginkosi Bhengu, uthe banethemba lokuthi umthetho uzothatha indawo kuleli cala njengoba kunzima ukukholwa ukuthi wadubuleka ngephutha.“Silahlekelwe kakhulu thina njengoba uNontsikelelo ubengumfundi aphinde abe ngumhleli wezindaba esiteshini,” kusho uBhengu.
title: Umama ufuna iqiniso kumsolwa

text: KUBE nesikhalo ngokuboshwa kowesifazane obebhikisha engagqokile ngoba ekhala ngokuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi.UNksz Gugu Ncube ube ngundabuzekwayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana okubalwa kuzo uTwitter izolo ngesikhathi kusabalala i-video yakhe egqoke iphenti nesikibha ebhikisha ngaphandle kweziNdlu zoMbuso i-Union Buildings ngoba ekhala ngokuhlukunyezwa kwakhe athe kwenzeka esasebenza esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme i-University of South Africa (Unisa).Kule video uzwakala ebalisa ngokuhlukunyezwa ngomunye wabaphathi athi wayefuna alale naye. Uphinde aveze ukuthi wabika kubaphathi base-Unisa kodwa kwangenziwa lutho. Uthe kunokuthi athole usizo lesi sikhungo sathi usulile emsebenzini.Kule video uze aveze negama lomphathi amsola ngokumhlukumeza nathe wayefuna alale naye.Kwenye i-video ubonakala ethathwa ngamaphoyisa esifazane angaphezu kwamahlanu amphoqa ukuthi angene evenini yamaphoyisa ngenkaniElinye lamalungu omphakathi abonakala kuyona lizwakala liwabuza ukuthi uboshelwani, bese kuphendula elinye lamaphoyisa lithi uboshelwa ukungaziphathi kahle emphakathini.Esitatimendeni, i-Unisa ithe ikhathazekile ngesenzo salona wesifazane abathe ubesebenza kwesinye isikhungo ebesixhaswe yinyuvesi i-Unisa Centre for Early Childhood Education (UCECE).Bathe okubakhathaza kakhulu ukuthi akukhona okokuqala lona wesifazane ezama ukwehlisa isithunzi senyuvesi emuva kokuphela komsebenzi wakhe.Bathe ngenxa yokuthi lesi sikhungo sizimele, lona wesifazane akakaze aqashwe yinyuvesi.Baveze nokuthi usifakile isikhalo sokuhlukunyezwa kwase kulandelwa imigudu efanele ukubhekana naso okubalwa kuzo ukumiswa kwabasebenzi abathile okubalwa kubo nalabo ababengamalungu ebhodi i-UCECEBathe emuva kophenyo olunzulu kwavela ukuthi akukho okubambekayo ezinsolweni ezazibekwe kuloyo msebenzi owayesolwa.“Noma silihlonipha ilungelo lokuthi alwele akholelwa kukhona kodwa mayelana nokungaphatheki kahle ngendlela kodwa siyamnxusa ukuthi ayeke akwenzayo nokuthi angalifaki igama lenyuvesi endabeni ephakathi kwakhe ne-UCECE. Inyuvesi ayikweseki ukuhlukunyezwa nanoma yikuphi futhi izithathela phezulu izindaba ezithinta ukuhlukunyezwa,” kusho uthishanhloko walesi sikhungo, uSolwazi MandlaMakhanya.Abantu banikele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana begxeka ukuboshwa kwakhe abanye beveza ukuthi kufana nokuthi usehlukumezeka okwesibili.
title: Uboshiwe obhikishe efake iphenti

text: UFAROUK Khan, uchome uphaphe lwegwalagwala, umqeqeshi weCapeTown City, uBenni McCarthy, ngokuba nesibindi sokunikeza uTokelo Rantie, elinye ithuba lokuzibonakalisa kulo mdlalo ngemuva kokunyamalala kwakhe isikhathi esingangesizini engawuthinti unobhutshuzwayo ngenxa yokungamhambeli kahle kwezinto eTurkey.UKhan nguyena owathuthukisa lomdlali ekudlaleni unobhutshuzwayo enkulisa yakhe iStars of Afican Football Academy.URantie (27), ovuswa kwabafileyo ubedlala kwiGençlerbirlii Spor ngemuva kokushiya kwiBournemouth yase-England kusukela ngo 2013kuya ngo2016, ashiye ngawo ngoba eseya eTurkey.“Kufanele ambonge uBenni (McCarthy) ngokuba nesibindi sokumnikeza elinye ithuba.“Akekho umqeqeshi ebholeni elikhokhelwayo ongavele abe nesibindi sokusayinisa umdlali obesehlale isizini yonke engadlali.“Engibona ukuthi kuqinise uBenni ukuthi athathe lesinqumo kungenxa yokuthi ngesikhathi bekwiPirates ubambe iqhaza lokuba ubhuti omdala kaRantie, emeluleka futhi emcobelela ngamava okudlala njengomgadli,”kusho uKhan.Ebuza ukuthi ngabe yini lena eholele ekutheni uRantie angadlali isizini yonke uthe kube ngenxa yezizathu ezibhekene naye, engingathandi ukwenaba ngazo kwabezindaba.“Anginayo imininingwane ngokwaqhubeka eTurkey ngoba wayemukelwe ngesasasa ngesikhathi efika khona. Engimncoma ngakho uRantie ukuba bukhali ekutheni abone ukuthi ngubani kubaqeqeshi abebemfuna ongabuyisela izinga lakhe endaweni yalo. UBenni ungumqeqeshi osemncane futhi okwaziyo ukusebenzisana nabadlali. Ngakho angingabazi ukuthi ukusebenzisana kwabo kahle usengazithola ebuyela e-Europe ngemuva kwesizini,”kusho uKhan.Ukunyamalala kukaRantie ngesizini edlule kumlahlekisele ngendawo yakhe kwiBafana Bafana ngemuva kokushaya into ecokeme ngesikhathi idlala neNigeria edume ngamaSuper Eagles kuhlungelwa imidlalo ye-Afcon ezodlalelwa eCameroon ngonyaka ozayo.URantie ufike kahle kwiCity ngesikhathi lapho idlala ibhola elinenkosi phakathi nokuthi leli qembu lizodlala emdlalweni wamanqamu eMTN 8 Wafa Wafa ngokuphela kukaSepthemba.Lo mgadli usayine iminyaka emithathu kuleli qembu laseKapa elibophele izikhweqe zabadlali.
title: UFarouk ubabaza isibindi socija iCape Town City

text: UMA ziqhubeka nokwehla izibalo zabahaqwa yiCovid-19, ingaxegiswa imithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uthe umnyango wakhe usiqaphile isimo futhi uyabona ukuthi kusukela ngesonto eledlule ziyehla izibalo zabatheleleka ngeCovid-19 kuleli. Uthe lezi zibalo zehle ngo-19% ngoLwesihlanu,  zisuka ku-36% okuyinto ethembisayo." Ukwehla kwezibalo zabahaqwa yileli gciwane kuhambisana nokwehla kwabalaliswa ezibhedlela, beguliswa yilo. Sinethemba lokuthi kuzokwehla ingcindezi ebhekene nezikhungo zezempilo ezizimele nezikahulumeni efakwa yileli gciwane. Sihlale sibhekile ukuthi izibalo zimi kanjani ngoba izibalo yizo eziholela ekutheni kuthathwe isinqumo sokuxegiswa kwemithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe. Kuyasijabulisa ukuthi abantu bakuleli bayayilandela imigomo ebekiwe,"  kusho uDk Mkhize.Uthe nakuba kukhona ukwehla okubonakalalo kodwa izinga lokuthelelana kwabantu lisephezulu kusadingeka lehle, lize libe sezingeni elamukelekile" Kubalulekile ukuthi singakhathali ukulandela imigomo elawula ukusabalala kwegciwane okungukufaka izifonyo, ukuqhelelana, nokugeza izandla ngamanzi anensipho noma ngesibulali magciwane,"  kusho yena.Uqhube wathi umnyango wezempilo usuluphothulile uhlelo lwesection 21  olugunyaza umnyango ukuthi usabalalise umgomo weCovid-19, okhiqizwa yiSerum Institute of India." Isikhungo esigunyaza ukusetshenziswa kwemithi kuleli, iSouth African Health Products Authority (SAHPRA), sesikugunyazile lokhu. Ezinsukwini ezizayo umphakathi sizowazisa ngebanga eselihanjiwe ukuze kutholakale  umgomo wokuqala. Okulindelekile ukuthi ufike kuleli ngaphambi kokuthi kuphele ikota yokuqala. Esingawutshela umphakathi ukuthi konke kusahamba ngohlelo,"  kusho uNgqongqoshe.Uthe basebenzisana nezinhlaka ezifanele ukuze baqiniseke ukuthi uhlelo lokusatshalaliswa kwalo mgomo luhamba ngendlela.  Uthe bewumnyango bathintwe ngabadayisi abazimele abadayisa imigomo" Siwumnyango sithathe isinqumo sokuthi ibhekwe leyo migomo ukuthi ngeyangempela yini, ngokuthi kukhulunywe nabakhiqizi bayo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi iphephile. Siwumnyango sixhumana ngqo nabakhiqizi ngenhloso yokuthi sazi ukuthi imigomo esiyithengayo iphephile,"  kusho uDkt Mkhize
title: Ingaxegiswa imithetho uma zehla izibalo zeCovid-19

text: UMHOLI we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, usephakamise ukuthi kwenziwe uphenyo ngezibalo zeCovid-19 kuleli, ngoba lezi ezinikezwa abantu njengamanje azilona iqiniso, kuphela kusetshenziswa bededengu izimali zabakhokhi bentela ngamathenda kube kuthiwa kuthengwa izinsiza zokulwa nokusabalala kweCovid-19.UMalema usho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma  i-EFF igubha iminyaka eyisikhombisa yasungulwa.Uthe ukwenyuka kwezibalo zeCovid-19 kuleli, kudalwa ngumengameli odonsela isigingci sabelungu.Usole abathi abawuboni umsebenzi osewenziwe yi-EFF selokhu yasungulwa njengabaqambi manga.Phakathi kwezinto athe iqembu lakhe lazenza ukuze kuhlomule abantu abasemazingeni aphansi kuleli.Ukuphakamisa ukuthi kuthathwe umhlaba unikezwe abanikazi bawo ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo.Ukuvikela ihhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi elihlale lihlaselwa “ngokungenabulungiswa”.Ukusiza izitshudeni ziyobhalisa emanyuvesi esikhathini lapho kwakuthiwa azibhalise kuphela ngokusebenzisa i-internet, ukulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nokunye okuningi.UMalema usole owayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jocob Zuma ngokudayisa izwe ngepleti lokudla.Umengameli Cyril Ramaphosa yena umsole ngokudayisa izwe ngengilazi yewayini.“Kwaphuma izithukuthuku sisungula leli qembu. Leli yiqembu lonogada, nelabasebenzi abasemazingeni aphansi,” kusho uMalema.Uthe namhlanje leli qembu selidumaze abaningi ababecabanga ukuthi ngeke lihlanganise le minyaka eseliyiqedile likhona.“Asikaze sibenzele phansi abantu abaningi bakuleli. Nangokuzayo sisazosebenzela izingane zakuleli lizwekazi ezidonsa kanzima,” kusho yena.Usole ukufika kwabamhlophe kuleli ngo-1652, ukuthi yikhona okwahlakaza impilo yabantu abamnyama, ngokubathatha njengabantu abangaphelele.“Bafike bakha umqondo wokuthi ngabelungu kuphela abakwazi ukuphatha izwe,” usho njalo.Usole iqembu elibusayo ngokusetshenziswa ongxiwankulu, wathi selaze lakha amaqembu ngaphakathi kulona ukuze azitike ngemali yabakhokhi bentela.NgokukaMalema, ukuphatha kukahulumeni wentando yabantu, kuholele ekubeni nokungalingani ngokwezinga lokuphila kwezinhlanga kuleli.Usole uhulumeni ngokuhluleka ukulawula izibhedlela ngendlela efanele njengoba ezempilo zibonakala zifadabala.Okucacayo ngokusho kwakhe, ukuthi ingqalasizinda isaqhueka nokusiza abamhlophe kodwa abamnyama basadonsa kanzima.“Ngokuzayo sifisa kube nemali efanayo e-Afrika yonke, kungabuswa izwe ngokulandela umqondo waseNtshonalanga,” kubalisa yena.Usole i-African Union ngokuba yisichuse esingenamsebenzi walutho.
title: UMalema ufuna kwenziwe uphenyo ngezibalo zeCovid-19

text: KUDUTSHULWE iphoyisa lafa, elinye lalimala kanzima elalelwe unyendle yiqulu labantu abebehlomile eNsuze, ngeSonto.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa amabili asebenza ophikweni lwezoNhloli KwaZulu-Natal abefuna indoda esembonini yama-metered taxi ethinteka oxhaxheni lwamacala okubulala osomatekisi kule ndawo njengoba kunombango wokuthutha abagibeli phakathi kwabantu bama-metered taxi nosomatekisi.Umthombo weSolezwe ocele ukungadalulwa kodwa olwazi ukusuka nokuhlala udaba lombango wokuthuthwa kwabantu, uthe amaphoyisa abeyofuna igenge yama-metered taxi ethinteka emacaleni okubulawa kwabantu endaweni kubalwa nosomatekisi.“Kunomuntu osembonini yama-metered taxi nomfowabo abayinkinga asebebaqedile abantu basematekisini njengoba kuliwa kubangwa umsebenzi, babulala abantu ngisho emini baphinde bashise nezindlu zabo,” kusho umthombo.Uthe abasolwa bathinteka nasecaleni lokubulawa kukasihlalo kasoseshini wamatekisi eNsuze ohambela oThongathi naseMgungundlovu.“Sebephelile abantu kusukela kuqale le mpi kanti abasolwa bayaziwa,” kusho umthombo.Uthe kodwa abasolwa sebezilungisile njengoba sebebulele nephoyisa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke uColonel Brenda Muridili uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala nokuzama ukubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa saseNsuze.“Kusolwa ukuthi ngoNovemba 3, ngabo 5 ntambama, amaphoyisa amabili ophiko lwezobuNhloli KwaZulu-Natal abelandela umkhondo othile wendoda efunwa uthuli mayelana namacala okubulala eNomyeni, eNsuze ngesikhathi edutshulwa yiqulu labantu ebelihlomile liwalalele unyendle, kwadubuleka uWarrant Officer oneminyaka engu-49, elinye iphoyisa elinguCaptain lalimala laphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.”
title: Kufe iphoyisa lilandela owamatekisi

text: UHAMBELA phezulu umrepha odabuka eBergville kodwa osezinze eLindelani, eThekwini uBandile ‘Dr Bone’ Maphalala osanda kusayina isivumelwano sokusabalaliswa komculo wakhe emhlabeni wonke jikelele, yinkampani yase-USA, iWarner Music. UDr Bone uthe ujabule kakhulu ngoba wayengaziphuphi esebenza nenkampani ekuleli zinga.“Ngezinye zezinto umuntu, ikakhulukazi odabuka emakhaya noma ohlala ezindaweni ezinjengoLindelani, ongazitsheli ukuthi zingenzeka nakuwe. Uma uzwa ngama-record label anjengo Warner, ngeke wazitshela ukuthi ungagcina usebenzisana nabo noma umculo wakho ugcina usabalaliswa umhlaba wonke. Lesi sivumelwano enginaso manje neWarner siyithokozisa kakhulu inhliziyo yami ngoba singinika ithuba lokwenza engikuthandayo ngomculo wami. Umhlaba wonke uyogcina ulazi igama likaDr Bone.”Ubonge uNkulunkulu namadlozi ngesipho amnikeza sona.UDr Bone ngomunye wamaciko azobe eshiyelana inkundla kwi-Osindisweni Fun Run & Youth Celebration ezinkundleni zemidlalo zasoSindisweni eNdwedwe ngoJuni 23 phakathi kuka-8 ekuseni no-4 ntambama. Phakathi kwamaciko azobe enandisa kulo mcimbi kubalwa noShantel, Bella Meihn, DJ Lenny, AmaJuniya nePushers. Uhlelo luzobe luphethwe ngumsakazi weZwi Lomzansi 98.0 FM, u-Andile ‘MC Pholobas’ Ngcobo.Echaza uDr Bone uthe lizoguqula amafu livele lidume emini izulu ngenxa yamanoni akhe afana nelithi Kudum’Izulu, Fak’Umoya alenza nesilomo somculi kamaskandi esingasekho uMtshengiseni ‘Indidane’ Gcwensa elithi Noma Bengakhuluma.“Ngizokhipha amangwevu wodwa. Ngizobuye ngibazwise okokuqala ngqa ezinye izingoma abangazilindela kwicwecwe lami engisalipheka estudiyo njengamanje.”UDr Bone useke wasebenza nabaculi abahlonishwa kakhulu kuleli nasemazweni angaphandle njengoZakwe, Mzulu, Lungelo, Mbijana, Stonebwoy (Ghana), Endia (Nigeria), Chopstix (Nigeria), Eva Alordiah (Nigeria) nabanye. Waqala ukungena kwezobuciko ngesikhathi ejoyina iqembu lomdanso wesipantsula, Amarafifi ngeminyaka yo-2000. Lathi uma lihlakazeka leli qembu, uDr Bone waqala ukubhala izingoma ze-hip hop, ebukela kakhulu kumrepha wase-USA, u50 Cent.Ngo-2013 uDr Bone waqopha umucu wakhe wokuqala osihloko sithi Fak’Umoya, okuyingoma eyamfaka kakhulu ebantwini kangangoba yaze yagcina seyiyibika lohlelo lukaNjinji Magwaza oKhoziningoMgqibelo.Ngalowo nyaka, uDr Bone wakhala wemuka nomklomelo weBest Vernacular Hip Hop kumaSatma Awards. Ngo-2014 lo mrepha wamenywa emcimbini waseGhana i-Osibisa neBecca. Ngonyaka olandelayo wanandisa kwiCMJ Music Marathon eNew York e-USA futhi wadlulela MIDEM Artists Accelerator eFrance. Wadlulela kwiBayimba International Festival of the Artists e-Uganda naseNamibia ngoDisemba 25, 2015. Ukuze abe nobudlelwane neWarner Music, uDr Bone ubonga uSphe Mbhele ngokumhlanganisa noSeymor Stein kwiKZN Music Imbizo.
title: Uchichima injabulo esayiniswa inkampani yase-USA

text: UZOVELA phambi kwekomidi lePremier Soccer League (PSL) eliqondisa ubugwegwe umqeqeshi weFree State Stars, uLuc Eymael, emasontweni adlule odikile abezindaba ngemuva kokuthi behlulwe AmaZulu FC emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership.IStars yashaywa ngo 2-1 kulo mdlalo eKing Zwelithini Stadium yize yakha inqwaba yamathuba okushaya amagoli kodwa yangawasebenzisa.Ngemuva komdlalo u-Eymael wakhuluma nabethelevishini kodwa wangabe esakhuluma nabamaphephandaba nabemisakazo abebelindile.“Umqeqeshi weFree State Stars ubekwe icala ngokuphula umthetho weNSL wabezindaba kulandela ukuthi engayanga kokhuluma nabezindaba ngemuva komdlalo wabo naMaZulu FC ngo-Agasti 19.
