Uzovela ekomidini ngoSepthemba 4,” kusho isitatimende.Kwagcina kukhulume iphini lakhe nezintatheli, uDavid Vilakazi, nalo lazihlangula lithi alimazi ukuthi ukephi lizwe kuthiwa umqeqeshi “usehambile”.Ngemuva kwalokhu * -Eymael ucashunwe kweminye imithombo yabezindaba ethi akayanga ezintathelini ngoba wayebanjwe wumkhuhlane. Wathi yena akazange abone muntu owayemlindile futhi akekho owamtshela ukuthi kunesithangani nabezindaba.Lo mqeqeshi akusiyena kuphela ozobhekana nolaka lwePSL. Unozinti weBaroka u-Ayanda Dlamini nalo iqembu bazoquliswa ngemuva kokuthi lo mdlali afuqa ngebhola umfana olanda ibhola emidlalweni ngesikhathi bebhekene nabakhaya iPolokwane City. Umfana wasizwa wukuthi avike ukuze angalimali. Icala labo lizolalelwa ngoSepthemba 6.U-Eric Tinkler naye uzovela ekomidini ngenkulumo okuthiwa wayenza esekwiSuperSport United ngoFebhuwari.IChippa United nayo ingene enkingeni ngemuva kokuthi abalandeli bayo bangena enkundleni igcina ibambana ngo 2-2 neBlack Leopards emdlalweni weligi. Abalandeli beChippa abalimazanga impahla futhi abashayanga muntu, babebhiyozela ukubuya kwezabo zikade zilandela ngemuva.Nokho kuyinto eyaziwayo ukuthi kuyicala ukuthi abalandeli bangene enkundleni noma ngabe bajabule okanye badiniwe. Bonke laba bazoya ekomidini ngoSepthemba 6.
title: Uzoqondiswa ubugwegwe oweFree State Stars

text: MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENIK UKHONA okusina kujeqeza umqeqeshi waMaZulu, uSteve Barker, okuvela ukuthi angase angabuyi uma leli qembu selibuya emaholidini kaKhisimusi kulandela imiphumela engagculisi emidlalweni yeNational First Division (NFD) abaphathi abanesifiso sokuyinqoba ngo-2016.AmaZulu izinto aziwahambeli kahle kuNFD kwazise asele ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye kuBaroka FC ehlezi esicongweni ngamaphuzu angu-28 ngemuva kwemidlalo engu-13. Leli qembu lihlezi endaweni yesikhombisa ku-log yeNFD. Selinqobe imidlalo emihlanu ladlala ngokulingana kwemine laphinde lahlulwa kwemine. Izikhulu zoSuthu zifake izindodla zemali eqenjini ngenhloso yokuthi iqembu libuyele ngokushesha ku-Absa Premiership njengoba kwenze omakhelwane balo iLamontville Golden Arrows. AmaZulu agcine inqwaba yabadlali bawo abanesipiliyoni futhi abahola kakhulu ngenhloso yokushubisa umbango wokudla ubhedu kuNFD. Phakathi kwabadlali boSuthu abebegaqelwe ngamaqembu amakhulu. UBarker uphinde walandelwa abadlali abancane abanonhlonze. Ulethelwe u-Ayabulela Konqobe obolekwe ku-Ajax Cape Town, uThabo Moloi weSuperSport United noMbongeni “Shoes” Gumede we-Orlando Pirates kodwa imiphumela iyagqoza. Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, uBarker angase azisulele yena ngoba kuyavela ukuthi ukhombisa izimpawu zokuphelelwa amaqhinga, kukhona nokuthi angase adedelwe ngokushesha ukuze iqembu lizosheshe liqashe omunye umqeqeshi ngaphambi komdlalo weBaroka (esesicongweni) ekuhambeni ngoJanuwari 9. “Akekho ongaboni ukuthi amaqhinga aphelile kuyena. Iqembu lihlulwa imidlalo okumele liyinqobe bese kuthi le okulindeleke ukuthi ibe nzima linqobe. Nabo abadlali uma ukhuluma nabo engxenye bayasho ukuthi awekho amaqhinga aqhamuka nawo umqeqeshi,” usho kanje umthombo oveze nokuthi uRoger Sikhakhane onezinkinga neChippa United usemningi emidlalweni yoSuthu. Nakuba ezanywe kusukela ekuseni uBarker ubengalubambi ucingo.UBrilliant Mkhathini wezokuxhumana kuleli qembu uthe. “Ngiqala ukukuzwa ngawe lokho. Eqinisweni iyangethusa le nto ongitshela yona ngoba angiyazi, engikwaziyo ukuthi uBarker umqeqeshi woSuthu,” usho kanje uMkhathini.
title: Angase angabuyi noma azisulele yena uBarker

text: IKHOMISHINI ebhekele ezobulili, iCommission for Gender Equality (CGE) seyiqale uphenyo ngesenzo sowesifazane obhikishe engagqokile, ekhala ngokuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi.Le khomishini iveze ukuthi ithole isikhalo esisemthethweni esivela kuNksz Gugu Ncube, ngezinsolo zokuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi yilungu lebhodi le-University of South Africa Centre for Early Childhood Education (Ucece).Iveze ukuthi ijutshwe ngokusemthethweni ukuthi iphenye nanganoma yiluphi udaba oluthinta ukuhlukunyezwa ngokobulili kwabantu emuva kokuthi sebethole isikhalo.Ikhomishini ithi izokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuxazulula noma iyiphi inkinga ethinta lokhu futhi izongenela ekulungiseni amaphutha enziwa ababengenele ukuxazulula izinkinga ezithinta ukuhlukunyezwa ngokobulili.“Uma uphenyo lwekhomishini seluphothuliwe kuzokhishwa umbiko ozobe uneziphakamiso, ukuze ubonwe wumphakathi,” kusho isitatimende sesigungu sekhomishini.Ikhomishini iveze lokhu ngemuva kokubhikisha kukaNksz Ncube ngaphandle kwezindlu zoMbuso, ngesonto eledlule.UNksz Ncube ube ngundabuzekwayo ngesikhathi i-video enaye isabalala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana lapho ebebonakala ebhikisha egqoke iphenti nesikibha, ngaphandle kwase-Union Buildings lapho ayekhala ngokuthi wahlukunyezwa ngesinye sezikhulu, ngesikhathi esasebenza esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme, i-University of South Africa (Unisa). Kule video wayezwakala ebalisa ngokuhlukunyezwa ngomunye wabaphathi, athi wayefuna ukulala naye. Kuyona uzwakala ethi wabika kubaphathi besikhungo kodwa bayishaya indiva indaba yakhe.Kuphinde kwavela enye i-video lapho ayethathwa kuyo ngamaphoyisa esifazane angaphezu kwamahlanu, ayemphoqa ukuthi angene evenini yamaphoyisa ngenkani.Esitatimendeni i-Unisa izwakalise ukukhathazeka ngezinsolo ezazibekwa nguNksz Ncube, yaveza nokuthi wayengasebenzi ngaphansi kwayo kodwa wayesebenzela i-Ucece.Ithe okubakhathaza kakhulu ukuthi akukhona okokuqala ezama ukwehlisa isithunzi senyuvesi emuva kokuphela komsebenzi wakhe.Uthishanhloko wase-Unisa, uSolwazi Mandla Makhanya umnxuse ukuthi ayeke akwenzayo nokuthi angalifaki igama lenyuvesi endabeni ephakathi kwakhe ne-Ucece.Ngesonto eledlule uNksz Ncube uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi ePitoli, ngecala lokungaziphathi kahle emphakathini. Kulindeleke ukuthi abuyele enkantolo ngo-Ephreli 10.Ikhomishini ebhekele ezobulili seyinxuse noma wubani ofisa ukufaka isikhalo esithinta ukuhlukunyezwa ngokobulili ukuthi abike ngokuthi abathinte enombolweni yamahhala ethi 0800 007 709.
title: Luqalile uphenyo ngobhikishe ngephenti ezindlini zoMbuso

text: BASABISA ngokuduba izinhlelo zeSupersport uma kuwukuthi izikhulu zalesi siteshi ziyahluleka ukubuyisa obeyintandokazi yomethuli wezinhlelo zemidlalo, uRobert ‘Madluphuthu’ Marawa.UMarawa uxoshwe yilesi siteshi ngomqhafazo kuleli sonto, kanti ubalise kuTwitter ngalokhu, esho ukuthi usexoshwe ngomqhafazo engasavalelisanga nakubabukeli bohlelo lwakhe iThursday Night Live with Robert Marawa.“Ngithole umbhalo ngezithuba zabo-6.50 namhlanje ebusuku, ungazisa ukuthi ngingabe ngisazihlupha ngokuza estudiyo ukusakaza iThursday Night Live with Marawa Show kwiSuperSport .“Ngithanda ukubonga bonke abangisekile ohambweni lwami njengomsakazi weSuperSport, nalabo engisebenze nabo kwiSuperSport,” kubhala uMarawa.ISuperSport iphendule ngesitatimende esifake kwiTwitter esithi: “ISuperSport isinohlu lwabethuli abasha abazodalulwa ngesizini ezayo yebhola."Lokhu kwenze ukuthi sisinqamule isivumelwano ebesinaso noMarawa."URobert utsheliwe ngesinqumo sethu ekuqaleni kwaleli sonto."Siyabonga amagalelo akhe kule minyaka eyedlule futhi simfisela impumelelo emizamweni yakheyakusasa."Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engatholakali uMarawa futhi nemiyalezo abethunyelelwa yona engayiphendul.Ugcine ebhale kuTwitter ukuthi usazogeqa amagula ngokuxoshwa kwakhe yiSuperSport.Ngemuva kwalesi sitatimende, kube sekuphawula ababukeli, bekhwela bezehlela ezikhulwini zeSuperSport. Bebezigxeka ngokuthatha isinqumo esingaphusile ngokuxosha uMarawa yedwa.“Siyawuzwa lo mbhedo wenu, pho ngaphandle kukaMarawa ngobani abanye abakhululiwe. Akukwazi ukuba nguye kuphela.”Abanye bakhale ngendlela axoshwe ngayo uMarawa ngomqhafazo.“Anikwazi ukuxoshwa umuntu ngomqhafazo."Okwesibili futhi anikwazi ukwenza izinguquko namhlanje ekubeni ningaxhumanilenaye.“Mhlazane sathola enye imbangi, niyoba ngumlando.”Nosaziwayo abasalanga ngaphandle njengomculi uDr Malinga oluleke uMarawa ukuba avule isiteshi sakhe ngoba uzihambela yedwa ekusakazeni.“UMarawa yindoda enesibindi,” kubhala umholi we-EFF, uJulius Malema.UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo eGauteng uMnuz Panyaza Lesufi uthe ayidutshwe iMultichoice kuze kube ibuyekeza isinqumo sokuxoshwa kukaMarawa.
title: Ababukeli besabisa ngokuduba iSuperSport kuxoshwa uMarawa

text: ABANTU baseNgonyameni izolo bavale umgwaqo odlula khona ngoba bethi sebekhathele wukulethelwa amanzi ngezimoto sebefuna aphuma kompompi.Isikhalo sabo esikhulu wukuthi imoto kamasipala eletha amanzi iwaletha njalo ngoLwesithathu emini abasebenzayo abawatholi ngoba basuke bengekho futhi alukho uhlelo oluqondene nokuphakela ababuya ntambama emakhaya ngamanzi.Amanzi kawaphumi kompompi ngoba amapayipi abo ayavalwa kodwa kabazi ukuthi avalwa ngubani.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi ebelimdibi munye nabebevale umgwaqo elingathandanga ukudalulwa ngoba lithi abaphawula kwabezindaba baba sengcupheni yokuboshwa ngamaphoyisa besolwa ngokuba ngobhongoza lithe: “Sikhathele ukuphila impilo ehlukile kunabanye abantu bakule ward. EMadundube lapho kuhlala khona ikhansela amanzi ayaphuma. Phambilini ikhansela lasilethela amathangi lithi amanzi azofakwa kuwo kodwa bekuba khona abantu abafaka ukungcola. Salitshela ikhansela ukuthi asisawafuni. Amanzi alethwa yimoto awasanelisi sifuna aphuma kompompi ngoba siyazi ukuthi akhona,” kusho yena.Uthe uma beke bafonela kwamasipala becela amanzi ayaphuma kompompi abuye anqamuke.“Uma kuzoba nomhlangano womphakathi amanzi ayaphuma ngoba basuke befuna siphumelele. Ngesikhathi kuzovotwa amanzi abephuma manje asevalwe yini? Sikhathele ukwenziwa izilima,” kusho esinye isakhamuzi.Abantu baqale nyakenye ukubhikisha ngenxa yamanzi angaphumi kompompi. Ikhansela le ndawo labe selifaka amathangi kodwa ashiswa. Kwaqalwa uhlelo lokulungiswa kwamapayipi ngoba kuthiwa anomthelela.Lithintwa mayelana nemashi ikhansela uMnuz Mbuyiseni Mkhize lithe lizwile ukuthi kuvalwe umgwaqo ewadini yalo kodwa alikwazanga ukuya emphakathini obuvale umgwaqo ngoba belinomhlangano.“Akekho umuntu ophuma kulowo mphakathi ofike wazokhononda kimina, ngakho angazi kahle ukuthi yini ebeyenza bavale umgwaqo. Uhlelo lwamanzi luyaqhubeka njengoba kwakuhleliwe, amapayipi asalungiswa. Akekho umuntu ovala manzi ngamabomu kodwa angifuni ukwanda kakhulu ngalolu daba ngingakakhulumi nawo umphakathi,” kusho uMkhize.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt-Col Thulani Zwane, uthe akekho olimele noma oboshiwe ngesikhathi kubhikishwa. Amaphoyisa asiqaphile isimo.
title: Babhikishe bavala umgwaqo bethi bafuna amanzi

text: BAKHALA ezimathonsi abantu abebegcina imali yabo enkampanini iCrypto Insight, ngenhloso yokuthola inzuzo emva kwezinsuku ezingu-30, emva kokunyamalala komnikazi wayo nezigidi.Isolezwe ngeSonto lithintwe abanye abebekhihla isililo befuna usizo. Bethi akusehli ngisho ukudla uma becabanga ngemali abayifake kule nkampani, ngendlela enkulu ngayo.Baveze nokuthi kukhona asebevukwe wushukela bangeniswa ezibhedlela ngoba bebeboleke imali komashonisa, abanye bafaka imali yempesheni abayithole emsebenzini ngoba bezama ukuyikhulisa ngokushesha.Kuthiwa umnikazi wenkampani uMnuz Sebastian Nhlakanipho Gwetyana (28), ugcine ukubonakala kuFacebook enza isiphihli somcimbi emahhovisi akhe abeseMusgrave, eThekwini, ngoLwesine olwedlule. Iningi lagcina ukumbona ngalolo suku njengoba engasatholakali nasocingweni lwakhe oseluhlala luvaliwe.Kuthiwa balinganiselwa ku-5000 abantu abebefake imali kule nkampani futhi bayizinhlanga ezehlukene.Baveze nokuthi abebefake imali bavela kuzona zonke izifundazwe zaseNingizimu Afrika nasemazweni angaphandle. Kuthiwa kukhona abaseSwatini, Nigeria, Ghana, Botswana nabakwamanye amazwe.Kuthiwa uGwetyana ubefundisa abantu ukufaka imali ngezindlela ezahlukene kwi-akhawunti yakhe futhi kukhona abebesebenzisa namaBitcoin.Omunye wabebefake imali ongowesifazane ohlala eNdwendwe, uthe kabasazi ukuthi kumele benzenjani manje ngoba nabebesebenzela uGwetyana, bathi kabamazi ukuphi.“Ubenamahhovisi eMusgrave nasePitoli. Uma sithinta abebemsebenzela bathi ubatshele ukuthi uyawavala amahhovisi aseMusgrave kodwa usezotholakala enkabeni yedolobha, iTheku.“Bathe akachazanga ukuthi uyaphi nedolobha kodwa usazobayalela lapho ezotholakala khona, kwaba ngukugcina kwabo ukuxhumana naye. Sicela nisisize bakwethu ngoba lo muntu ubaleke nezigidi zethu,” kusho lo wesifazane.Omunye wesifazane oseGoli obefake imali kule nkampani, uthe namahhovisi asePitoli avaliwe futhi akekho owazi ukuthi ukuphi uGwetyana.“Okubuhlungu kukhona abantu esibonayo ukuthi bazoshona ngendlela asebegula ngayo emva kokunyamalala kukaGwetyana. Besimethemba ngoba inkampani yakhe sithole ukuthi ibhalisiwe ngokusemthethweni futhi kunabantu abathembekile okuyizikhulu zepolitiki nazo ebezigcine imali yazo enkampanini yakhe.“Esike sakuthola wukuthi ama-akhawunti akhe ake amiswa kabili, kuthiwa akakwazi ukuwasebenzisa ebhange ngenxa yokuthi bekungena imali eningi kakhulu kuwona, kungaziwa ukuthi iqhamukaphi. Ubekwazi ukuwavula ukuthi aqhubeke asebenze ngoba emabhange ubethi yimali efakwa ngabantu abafundisa ukuhweba,” kusho lesi sisulu.Imizamo yokuthola uGwetyana ayiphumelelanga ngoba ucingo lwakhe alungeni kanti nemiyalezo athunyelelwe yona akayiphenduli.Omunye obemsebenzela eThekwini, uNksz Diana Elephant, uthe akasakwazi ukumthola uGwetyana njengoba ucingo lwakhe seluhlala luvaliwe.“Ngijoyine inkampani kaGwetyana ngoJanuwari kulo nyaka. Nami ngingomunye wabalahlekelwe yimali. Ngifake kuyona ngenhloso yokugcina imali.“Ngenxa yokuthi ngifike engenabo abasebenzi ngithathe isinqumo sokumlekelela, ngokuthi ngibambe izingcingo uma kushaya abantu abafake imali yabo enkampanini yakhe.“Ngenxa yalokho uthe ngoba ngiyamsiza usecela ukuthi ngisebenze naye, ngibambe izingcingo bese ngidlulisela imiyalezo kuyena bese kuba nemali encane angiholela yona.“Nami ngingomunye wabalahlekelwe yimali njengoba iningi ebengiyigcine enkampanini yakhe. Inkinga wukuthi manje abantu abakuqondi lokho ngoba bazitshela ukuthi sihlangene noGwetyana sabaleka nemali yabo.“Abanye baze bangisabise ngokungibulala kanti angazi lutho ngokunyamalala kwakhe. Ngisho nocingo abebengishayela kulona ngolwami njengoba bengisebenzela ekhaya.“Ngicela ukuthi abantu abalahlekelwe yimali ngokuyigcina eCyrpto Insight bavule amacala. Ngizobambisana namaphoyisa uma enza uphenyo futhi angibalekile njengoba nawe ukwazile ukungithola ocingweni. Ngeke ngicashe futhi ngikhona lapha eThekwini,” kusho uNksz Elephant.Uthe ushaqekile ngesenzo sikaGwetyana ngendlela abethembisa ngayo uma echaza ngebhizinisi lakhe. Uveze ukuthi ubungeke usole lutho ngendlela abehleleke ngayo. Ngisho namahhovisi akhe uthe abekhombisa ukuthi ngawomuntu oyaziyo into ayenzayo nosebhizinisini elisezingeni eliphezulu.Nabantu abebefake imali kuyena uthe ubexhumana nabo zonke izinsuku esebenzisa ikhasi lakhe leFacebook ebazisa ngokuqhubekayo, aze afake nama-video akhe ebacacisela ngemali yabo. Muva nje kucwebile kuFacebook njengoba engasabonakali nhlobo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eGoli, uBrigadier Mathapelo Peters, uthe likhona icala lenkohlakalo elivuliwe esiteshini samaphoyisa eBoksburg ngesonto eledlule.Uthe okwamanje kusenziwa uphenyo kodwa akukaboshwa muntu.
title: Bakhala ngoGwetyana 'obaleke' nezigidi zemali

text: UTiisetso kulo mdlalo okhonjiswa kwi-e.tv (DSTV channel 194), uzolingisa indawo kaSiya.IRhythm City idlala ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu ngo-7 ebusuku.Ekhuluma ngokuba kulo mdlalo uTiisetso, uthe uyajabula ngokuthi ekugcineni kuvele lezi zindaba futhi kukukhulu okuzayo.“Engingakusho nje ukuthi abantu abalinde, ukuthi sizoba yini isiphetho ngalo mlingisi emdlalweni,” kusho uTiisetso.Uveze ukuthi ubesekulinde ngabomvu ukuthi abantu bakuleli bahlangane noSiya, oyinsizwa ebukekayo futhi ezithandayo.UMatodzi Mashau wakwa-e.tv uthe uSiya ufika la uMampho efuna umuntu azohlala naye endlini izinyanga ezine ngoba uRene ehambile eyocula eBroadway.“Ngenxa yokuzithanda ayikhona uSiya, uMampho ukhetha yena ngenxa yokuthi usola ukuthi uyisitabane. USiya naye ukhombisa ukuthi ungumuntu olungile futhi odingwa uMampho endlini yakhe. Bayezwana ngokushesha futhi kuba mnandi endlini abahlala kuyona bobabili,” kusho uMatodzi.Uthe ngendlela amuhle ngayo, ngesinye isikhathi uMampho ufisa sengathi uSiya ngabe akasona isitabane.“Kodwa uMampho uyaqala ukubona ukuthi kukhona okukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi abekucabanga akunjalo. Uya kubantu abasondelene naye, ukuze ayobabuza ukuthi uSiya uthanda abantu bobulili obunjani,” kuchaza uMatodzi.Ababukeli bomdlalo okumele bakulindele ukuthi ingabe bazogcina beyizithandani yini noma cha.
title: Umlingisi oza ngamawala uthembisa into yamehlo kwiRhythm City

text: BAVUMELENE ngokuntuleka kwabagadli abakhaliphile i-Afrika yonke abaqeqeshi, uStuart Baxter weBafana Bafana no-Adel Amrouche weLibya, abadlale ngokulingana emdlalweni wokuhlungela i-2019 Africa Cup of Nations ocike izinkumbi zabalandeli ebezidele imvula namakhaza zanikela eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, izolo ntambama.Kuqale u-Amrouche waseBelgium, exolisela uBaxter ngokuthi iBafana ingalitholi igoli evika ngokuthi: “Phambilini besazi ukuthi kukhona uWeah (George), uMiller (Roger) nabanye. Manje siyaqalaza. UGrobler (Bradley) wumgadli omuhle, ngimbonile kwiligi.”UBaxter naye ukhale esifanayo ebuzwa ngokuyeka ithuba lokuqhwakela kuGroup E wathi: “Uma ngingabeka abaqeqeshi abangu-10 la, banganginika isikimu esihlukile bonke. Kuzofanele sibuyele ebhodini silungiselele iqembu elihlukile kwiSeychelles, sizame ukucindezela, sithole umphumela.”IBafana iye kulo mdlalo yethembise ukuthi iyogeza igama kwazise sekunesikhathi yenzela isizwe phansi. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi igcina ukudlala eMoses Mabhida yanenebulwa yiCape Verde nokwaholela ekuhlulekeni ukuya eRussia kwi-2018 Fifa World Cup.Nokho izolo iBafana isheshe yakhombisa izimpawu zokuqhubeka lapho yagcina khona esikhundleni sokwenza ebikuthembisile.Itumeleng Khune lowo owalile ezintini kungenjalo bekuzophela imizuzu engu-30 isinamagoli amane iLibya.Bekusaphele eyisithupha uKhune evimba ibhola elibi elikhahlelwe nguRabia Ramadan Alshadi.Ngomzuzu ka-15 nguye othiye iLibya yashaya ipali.Ngoka-25 uvimbe ibhola lika-Ali Ali Mohamed, obezitamuzela nje ibhola kubadlali abafishanyana baseMzansi.Ngomzuzu ka-26 uvimbe ibhola likaHamdou Elhouni.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje iBafana ngenxa yokuthi iqembu likaBaxter limangaze abaningi liqala indlela ebheke kwi-2019 Afcon ngokunenebula ngo 2-0 iNigeria ekuhambeni nyakenye.Yize kunabadlali obasindile umdlalo njengoSibusiso Vilakazi, obexukuza isisu noDean Furman noKamohelo Mokotjo kodwa konke ukukhuluma kuzobuya ngoBaxter.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi uvele unyamanambana kusukela ehluleke ukuya eRussia kanti usenze sanzima naye isimo eqasha indodana yakhe, uLee, ukuba azoqeqesha onozinti.Umdlalo weBafana olandelayo useVictoria lapho izohlasela khona amathofi kaGroup E, iSeychelles. Komunye umdlalo kaGroup E obuyizolo iNigeria ibhaxabule iSeychelles ngo 3-0.
title: Kukhalwe ngabagadli koweBafana neLibya

text: UKUKHULISA ingane kuhambisana nezinselelo eziningi. Uma ingane ingena esigabeni esiphakathi kweminyaka engu-13 kuya ku-19, kusuke sekuqala inkathazo.UNkk Nokuthula Ngubane-Xulu onguMsunguli we-Ordained Parents Movement, uthe sekunzima kakhulu esikhathi samanje ukukhulisa izingane ezikulesi sigaba ngenxa yezinguquko ezifika nempilo yesimanje.UNkk Ngubane-Xulu okhulise izingane ezingu-11, uthe ukufika kwezobuchwepheshe nakho kunezinselelo. “Izingane zamanje sezinalo lonke ulwazi eziluthola ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Sekumele ube umzali onesibindi, ukhulume nezingane ngoba uma ungakhulumi zizothatha izimfundiso kwezinye izindawo.”Uthe naye kube yinkinga ukukhulisa izingane zakhe kulesi sigaba ngoba wakhula ngezikhathi zakudala.“Ekhaya ngakhulwa sishaywa futhi singaqophisani nomzali. Kwadingeka ngishintshe ukwenza ngoba bengibona ukuthi ukushaya akusizi ngoba bezivele zingezwa kakhulu uma ngizishaya,” kusho yena.Uthe ezinye izinselelo zesimanje ukuthi abazali kunamaphutha abawenza empilweni besakhula, okuba nzima ukuqondisa izingane uma sezenza wona. Uveze nokuthi abanye benza iphutha lokufuna ukukhethela ingane impilo nabo abangakwazanga ukuyiphila. Ugcizelela ukuthi abazali kumele basondele kakhulu ezinganeni ezikulesi sigaba, bazilalele bezwe nemibono yazo. Uthe kuhle ukuthi uma umzali ebuzwa yingane ngokuthize, afune nolwazi kwabanye kodwa angayizibi. Enye inselelo ayibonayo eyokuthi izingane zamanje zidliswa noma yini ngoba abazali bezama ukuzijabulisa kanti sebezifaka enkingeni yokukhuluphala. Uthe izingane ezikulesi sigaba yizona anenkinga yokukhuluphala, okufanele abazali batshale umkhuba wokudla ngendlela nokuzivocavoca.Ezinganeni anazo unendodana uSakhe ona-18, nendodakazi eneminyaka engu-11, athi useqalile ukukhuluma nayo ngoba iyasondela kulesi sigaba.UNksz Nqobile Kweyama oyi-Educational Psychologist, uthe sekunzima esikhathini samanje ukukhulisa izingane ngenxa yokwanda kwezidakamizwa nezinkundla zokuxhumana. Uthe ezinye izingane zizama ukuzihlola ukuthi zifunani nokuthi yini inhloso yazo emhlabeni.“Abazali bazithola bengazi ukuthi yikuphi okumele bakwenze ukukhulisa izingane. Abazali abayazi impilo yesimanje ngoba bakhula kwesinye isikhathi esihlukile. Baningi nabazali abakhulisa izingane ngabodwana, okuba nzima kakhulu uma zifika kulesi sigaba,” kusho yena.
title: Izinselelo zokukhulisa izingane

text: INHLANGANO eyengamele izikole zokushayela KwaZulu-Natal ithi maduze izoqala uhlelo lokukhuculula zonke izikole ezingenazo izitifiketi zokusebenza, eziphuma eMnyangweni wezokuThutha esifundazweni.Kuzokhishwa abafundisa ukushayela bengaqeqeshiwe wumnyango, banikwa isitifiketi.Lokhu kushiwo wubuholi boBumbano Driving Schools Operators Association, izolo emuva komhlangano noNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezokuThutha eKZN, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli.Bebehlangene noNtuli ngenhloso yokuqinisa ubudlelwano nomnyango futhi alalele izikhalo zabo.Umkhulumeli woBumbano, uMnuz Mzwandile (MG) Zondi uxwayise abanikazi bezikole ezingabhalisiwe ukuthi baxhumane namahhovisi ezifunda zabo ukuze bezosizwa ngokuqeqeshwa wumnyango.“Sizobe sikhuculula izikole nabantu abangayanga koqeqeshwa. Asifuni kube khona abazogcina sebenza okuphambene, babone sengathi kuliwa nabo ngenxa yokuthi abanazo izimvume zokusebenza. Akukho muntu ozovula isikole esisha kuze kube imboni yethu siyayiqoqa,” kusho uZondi.Uphawule ngesikhungo esihlolela ukushayela ePinetown wathi: “Sisolwa ngokuvala isikhungo ngoba kuthiwa siphikisa ukumiswa emsebenzini kwabasebenzi ebesisebenzisana nabo, ukugwazisa uR2 500 abazohlolelwa ukushayela.Asiyazi thina leyo nto, sivale isikhungo ngoba asitshelwanga ukuthi kwenzakani, sibone abasebenzi besebenza sakuhudula izinyawo betelekile kungasebenzeki. Sikhathele wukubizwa ngamagama kuthiwa sikhohlaleke, ekubeni kungabaphathi bezikhungo ezihlolela ukushayela nobhululu babo abagcwele inkohlakalo,”kusho uZondi.USihlalo wale nhlangano, uNksz Mpume Mncwabe uthe kunophawu lomnyango olunanyathiselwa emotweni okufundwa ngayo ukushayela, oluveza ukuthi isikole sisemthethweni uma kuyiwa esikhungweni okuhlolelwa kuso ukushayela. Unxuse abezikole ukuthi basebenzisane nomnyango ukulawula imboni. UMnuz Geoff Nkosi, ongumengameli wale nhlangano uthe bahlangane noNtuli ukuzethula kuyena bese bembekela izinto abafisa zenzeke ukuze kungabi bikho ukuphambana ngemibono. Uthe bakwazile ukubumba ithimba elimele imboni, imigomo nendlela yokuziphatha, baqeqesha abafundisa ukushayela.UNkosi uthe iKZN inezikole ezingu-965, abafundisa ukushayela bangu-575. Uthe bafisa nokuhlangana noMnuz Fikile Mbalula onguNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezokuThutha kuzwelonke ngoba luyacothoza uhlelo lokubhaliswa kwezikole ezifundisa ukushayela kuzwelonke.Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela udaba ingaphumelelaga imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula komnyango ngalolu daba.
title: Bazoqeda ngezikhungo zokushayela ezingenamvume

text: ZIDLULE nabantu abangu-1612 izingozi ezenzeke emgwaqeni yakuleli ngesikhathi samaholidi kaDisemba nyakenye.Lokhu kudalulwe uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha uMnuz Blade Nzimande ngesikhathi ethula umbiko ngezokuphepha emgwaqeni ngoLwesithathu.Ngokwalo mbiko obheka izingozi ezenzeke kusukela ngoDisemba 1 kuya kuJanuwari 8, iKwaZulu-Natal ihambe phambili ngesibalo sabantu abafe ezingozini njengoba kudlule abawu-328 kulesi sifundazwe.Ngemuva kwayo kulandele i-Eastern Cape (238) Gauteng (219), Limpopo (178), Mpumalanga (162), Free State (159), Western Cape (149), North West (125) ne-Northern Cape (54).Zimbili kuphela izifundazwe okwehle izinga lokufa ngezingozi kuzo. EGauteng izinga lehle ngo-19%, eNothern Cape lehla ngo-2%.ENorthern Cape izinga linyuke ngo-80% noma isibalo sabafe emigwaqeni sisaphansi kulesi sifundazwe.Kulezi zingozi u-36% wabantu abafa ababengabagibeli, abahamba ngezinyawo (35%) abashayeli (27%) kanye no-2% wababehamba ngamabhayisikili.Lo mbiko ngezinhlekelele ezidlule nabaningi emgwaqeni uphuma nje bekubikwe ukuthi sinyusiwe isibalo samaphoyisa agcwele emgwaqeni kanti nongqongqoshe uphinde waveza ukuthi kuba nama-roablock awu-775.Kulokhu kuboshwe izimoto eziwu-4016, abantu abawu-8057 kwashicilelwa amathikithi awu-765 009 emiqwaqeni yakuleli ngesikhathi samaholidi.UNzimande usole uphuzo oludakayo, ukushayela budedengu, ukukhathala kanye nezimoto ezingekho emthethweni njengomnyombo wezingozi ezenzeka nsuku zonke emgwaqeni yakuleli. Uthe uma lungabonakali uguquko kubashayeli bakuleli iNingizimu Afrika isazoqhubeka ibe nemigwaqo eyingozi.
title: Sinyukile isibalo sabadlule ezingozini zomgwaqo

text: IPHINI lo mqeqeshi kwiMaritzburg United uDelron Buckley, lincoma umqeqeshi waleli qembu u-Ernst “Mazinyo” Middendorp ngokungancethezi kubadlali. UBuckley utshele izintatheli ukuthi ukufika kukaMiddendorp kuzolisiza kakhulu iqembu ngoba utshela abadlali kwezikabhoqo uma kukhona angakuboni kahle.ITeam Of Choice izobhekana neqembu elizihola phambili kwi-log yeDStv Premiership, iMamelodi Sundowns, kusasa ngo-8.15 ebusuku, eHarry Gwala Stadium. Ziya kulo mdlalo ziyabheda izinto kwiMaritzburg esanda kuxosha umqeqeshi u-Eric Tinkler obephikwa yimiphumela. Ngemuva kwemidlalo emihlanu kwiDStv Premiership, iMaritzburg ayinalo nelilodwa iphuzu, igingqa inguzunga yeqanda emsileni we-log.Lokhu kuphoqe izikhulu zeqembu ukuthi zikhombe indlela uTinkler, zaqasha umakadebona womqeqeshi ebholeni lakuleli uMiddendorp.“Engikuthanda ngoMiddendorp ukuthi akancethezi, akalokhu ezenza into angeyona umuntu umtshela kwezikabhoqo into angayithandi. “KuMiddendrop usheshe ubone ukuthi impilo yakho izoba mfishane eqenjini uma ungakwenzi akufunayo. “Selokhu efikile kuyacaca lapha kwiMaritzburg, kunabadlali asebatshelile ukuthi ufuna bekhuphule amasokisi kungenjalo ngeke abadlalise. “Kadeni lesi simo iqembu elizithola likusona, lidinga umuntu onjengoMiddendorp ukuze izinto zizolunga,” kusho uBuckley.Leli phephandaba libuze uBuckley ukuthi kungani izinto kade zingahambi kahle kusekhona uTinkler, abesebenzisana naye.“Besidlala yonke inhlobo yebhola ngaphansi kukaTinkler. Besiqala kahle emuva, siwuhlelela kahle futhi umdlalo. “Kodwa inkinga nje ebesibhekene nayo kakhulu ukuthi besingawashayi amagoli nhlobo. “Besiphenduka omampumpane ngemuva komdlalo sizibuze ukuthi yikuphi ngempela esingakwenzanga, kucace ukuthi amagoli yiwona esingawashayi,” kulandisa uBuckley.Ngokusho kukaBuckley, phakathi kwezinto ezigqamile esezenziwe uMiddendorp ejimini, ukudlalisa abadlali ngaphansi kwengcindezi.“Lonke isonto uMiddendorp ubeyivalile inkundla ejwayeza abadlali ukudlala ngaphansi kwengcindezi. “Ubebatshela ukuba baqinise unyawo uma bemakana, bengancengani. Naphambi kwamapali, ubebacija ngezinto okumele bazenze ukuze kuzobhakuza inethi. “Ngibona ukuthi umdlalo wethu neSundowns yiwona esizoshintsha ngawo izinto, kufanele kube khona esikutholayo ukubuyisa ukuzethemba kubadlali bethu,” kusho uBuckley.Imidlalo yeDStv Premiership:NgoMgqibelo - Ngo-3.30pn: Cape Town City v Orlando Pirates (Cape Town Stadium); Golden Arrows v Swallows (Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium).Ngo-6pm: Tshakhuma FC v AmaZulu FC (Thohoyandou Stadium).Ngo-8.15pm: Maritzburg United v Mamelodi Sundowns (Harry Gwala Stadium).NgeSonto - Ngo-3.30pm: TS Galaxy v Stellenbosch (Mbombela Stadium); Baroka v Chippa United (Peter Mokaba Stadium).
title: Uncoma ukungancethezi kukaMiddendorp kubadlali

text: SEKUVELE isiphakamiso sokuba kushintshwe umphenyi wecala lokubulawa kwelungu lesigungu esiphezulu se-ANCYL KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Sindisiwe Beauty Ndlovu (34) okusolwa ukuthi udutshulwe yisoka. Umzala kamufi, uNksz Slo Khuzwayo, wenze lesi siphakamiso enkonzweni yomngcwabo enkundleni yezemidlalo eThokozani ngoMgqibelo.UNksz Khuzwayo uyiphoyisa naye njengoba nomufi kusolwa ukuthi ubulawe yisoka eliyiphoyisa okuthiwa limhlabe ngenhlamvu esifubeni washona. UNksz Khuzwayo uthe balibheke ngabomvu icala futhi abeneme ngomphenyi wecala.“Siyezwa ngomuntu ophenya icala sengathi akalungile kahle, yingakho sicela iziphathimandla ukuba ashintshwe uma kungenzeka. Umsolwa (emgagula ngegama) akafanele ukuba semphakathini emuva kwesenzo sakhe,’’ kusho uNksz Khuzwayo ebamba izinyembezi.Uthe akasiboni isizathu sokuthi iphoyisa livele liqhulule umuntu ngenhlamvu ngoba bayadonswa ngendlebe ngendaba yesibhamu nokuziphatha uma beqeqeshwa ekolishi lamaphoyisa.Ukhale nangokuthi amaphoyisa ambalwa abulala abantu athunaza isithunzi sombutho wonke njengoba sebedume kabi nje.Uthe into abeyenziwe wusibali wabo ngeke bayikhohlwe ebulala umzala wabo ngesihluku ekubeni kade ezilungele, engakaze aphoxe muntu.Ugcizelela ukuthi isibhamu asiyona inkinga kodwa kuba wumuntu osiphethe oba yinkinga uma engasiphathanga ngendlela efanele. Umzala kamufi uqede ukukhuluma wehla esiteji wajikela emuva kwetende wakhala kakhulu waze wabhuquza phansi kwasuka ithimba layomsingatha, limphathele amanzi kodwa elokhu eshilo ngesililo.Umnewabo kamufi uMbishobhi Bhekizitha Ndlovu, uthe ufisa ukuthi kuvele kuzwakale ukuthi umsolwa uzibulele ejele ngoba ubashiye nesilonda esingeke siphinde selapheke. Umsolwa kulindeleke ukuthi abuyele enkantolo kuleli sonto azofaka isicelo sebheyili.
title: Bafuna kushintshwe umphenyi wecala lowe-ANCYL

text: MHLELI: Kuyadida esikubona kwenzeka embuthweni wamaphoyisa. Kafushane nje ngineminyaka engu-12 ngangena embuthweni wamaphoyisa. Sekuphele iminyaka engu-10 ngingayibali le ngisaqeqeshwa nginganyuselwa esigabeni esilandelayo, sokuba wusayitsheni. Silokhu singo-constable nje.Okubuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi kunozakwethu abaqashwe ngemumva kwethu abasophikweni iTRT, NIU neVIP banyusiwe beneminyaka emibili beqashiwe. Thina esisebenza eziteshini ayikhulunywa eyethu, ayinalo nethemba. Kubuhlungu kithina esisebenza eziteshini ngoba uma kukhona okuphuthumayo yithina esingena lapho, uma kunengozi kungena thina, uma kukhona ominzile noma kushe umuzi kubizwa thina kuqala. Izimpiko lezi ezinyusiwe ziqhamuka kamumva nakhona zifike zibuke zishiye.Ngamafushane nje embuthweni weSAPS umgomgodla wawo amaphoyisa asebenza eziteshini, wona impela lawa anganakiwe. Ziningi izinkulumo ezike zikhulunywe amalungu omphakathi ukuthi amaphoyisa ayehluleka ukwenza umsebenzi wawo, ayizigebengu nawo, ayavilapha kodwa akekho oke azihluphe ngokubuza ngengcindezi esiyitholayo kulo msebenzi. Kungcono ke uma isabangwa uhlobo lomsebenzi esiwenzayo kodwa ibuhlungu kakhulu uma isizobangwa izikhulu zethu ezisiqashile zikhethe iphela emasini sibhekile.UMnuz Bheki Cele sazi kahle ukuthi uphiko iTRT lwasungulwa wuyena. Ingakho nje esethe uma ebuya esikhundleni wabuya ngokunyusa ozakwethu abakulolu phiko.UCele usanda kuthi umuntu akangeni emaphoyiseni ngoba efuna ukuxosha indlala ekhaya. Wayeqinisile, kumele sisebenze ngokuzinikela kodwa iqiniso lithi sonke siyayifuna impilo engcono futhi sizoyithola ngokuhola imali engconywana.Izingane zethu asikwazi ukuzinika impilo engcono ngoba oyise nonina abanyuki emsebenzini. Kucace bha ukuthi uCele wayebhekise kithi esibadala emaphoyiseni, uma ethi asingaxoshi indlala.Iphoyisa leSAPS
title: [IMIBONO] Imile nse impilo emaphoyiseni aseziteshini

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho ngithi mangibeke ilaka lami emva kokugqemeka engeqiwa ntwala emculweni wakithi wesintu kamaskandi ngokuwa kweminye yemithi ebisimkhulu nensika emculweni wakithi, uMjik’jelwa Ichalaha Ngubane (osesithombeni).Mangiqale ngikhalisane nomndeni, izihlobo nabangani. Ngilapha-ke. Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sibumbane singabalandeli bakamaskandi manje sikhohlwe ngoqhawe lami kodwa sibambane silwe nesihlava esiya sikhula sokubukelwa phansi nokucwaswa komculo wakithi yizinhlelo zokusakaza zethelevishini.Kwaqale kwahamba iNdidane eyadida abaningi sangavezelwa umngcwabo wayo kwithelevishini ekubeni yayingumuntu odumile kumaskandi kodwa uma kudlule umculi wakweminye iminxa siyaboniswa umngcwabo bukhoma.Kubuye kwenziwe ngisho izikhangiso ezihlanganisa nokuvezwa konyaka azalwe ngawo nadlule ngawo lowo mculi kodwa kulona kamaskandi selokhu kwathi nhlo asikaze savezelwa bukhoma umngcwabo.Kowokholo, kwaito, jazz neminye siyavezelwa ngisho nomlando womculi odlulile kodwa kithina do.Kusukela kuSABC1, 404 naku-eNCA lutho nje ukuyiphatha nokuyiphatha eyabaculi bakamaskandi. Umbuzo wami uthi iyiphi le ndlela abayisebenzisayo, uma ikhona esetshenziswayo, lena enobandlululo olungaka?Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi zonke izinduna zabalandeli bakamaskandi zisitholele incazelo. Seku­yaqapheleka nje ukucwaseka komaskanda.Nasonyakeni ofile ezingomeni zonyaka zashaywa ngesithende ezakamaskandi, sathula sabuka kodwa-ke kulokhu hhayi ngeke sithi sekwanele manje.Fanele Kekeletso Nkosi
title: IMIBONO: Wenzani umculo kamaskandi kwiSABC ne-eNCA?

text: KUBUYE inhlansi yethemba izolo kwabasiza ezikoleni abangakaholi kusukela ngoDisemba emuva kokuthi uMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo ukhiphe izinamba okufanele bazifonele uma bengaholile.Izolo, uMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo uthe uyazi ukuthi kukhona abasiza ezikoleni, nabasiza othisha abangakaholi ngakho usuthathe izinyathelo zokulekelela izifundazwe ukuba zilungise lolu daba.“Sibe nomhlangano ophuthumayo nabaphethe izimali zoMnyango wezeMfundo kuzo zonke izifundazwe ngoLwesibili. Inhloso yethu wukuqinisekisa ukuthi bonke abasiza ezikoleni nabasiza othisha bayahola. Sicela abangakaholi kuze kube manje ukuthi bathinte abantu esibabhale kulo luhlu,” kusho aboMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo.Bacele abangakaholi ukuthi baqinisekise ukuthi bathumela imininingwane yabo efanele ukuze bathole imali yabo.Ngokudlule Isolezwe lalibhale ukuthi abasiza ezikoleni nabasiza othisha bazohola ungakapheli uJanuwari kodwa uze waphela abaningi bengaholile.Kulindeleke ukuthi bahole umholo wezinyanga ezimbili uma sebethola imali yabo.Naba abathintwayo ezifundazweni :KwaZulu-Natal  uMnuz Bafana Zwane 082 802 1275Eastern Cape uNksz Lukhanyo Sidiya 073 923 6960Free State uMnuz Fikile Hugo 064 654 9608Gauteng uNksz Lydia Phehla 083 460 1310Limpopo uMnuz Matthew Mhlongo 082 803 2163Mpumalanga uNksz Leoma Delport 071 124 9345Northern Cape uMnuz Mzwandile Mothelesi 071 524 3562North West uMnuz Simon Montjane 082 309 6904Western Cape uNksz Erna Veldman 082 884 3990
title: Izinombolo ezingasiza abangaholile ezikoleni

text: BAZOWUKHOMBA onotshwala labo abathintekayo ekwenyusweni kwamaholo omakadebona boMkhonto Wesizwe abasebenzela uMasipala weTheku.UNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, ubebize isithangami sabezindaba izolo ekuseni, udalule ukuthi uphenyo olwenziwa yihhovisi likaNdunankulu lizoveza obala ukuthi kulandelwe miphi imigudu ngesikhathi kwenyuswa imali yomakadebona.Abasebenzi bakamasipala emkhakheni wezamanzi bavuke umbhejazane bavala imigwaqo becikwa ukwenyuswa kwemali yomakadebona. Kuthiwa basuswe kuGrade 4 baya kuGrade 10 nokuchaza ukuthi bazosuka koR7 000 baye koR20 000 ngenyanga.UNtuli uthi bahlanganile nezikhulu zikamasipala bangathola izimpendulo ezigculisayo ngalolu daba. Uthe kuvele ukuthi kwakhangiswa izikhala kwaqashwa aboMkhonto Wesizwe kuphela kuzo nokuyinto eshiya imibuzo."Sekufanele sidedele uphenyo luqhubeke ukuze sithole kahle iqiniso. Uma kukhona owenze okuphambene nomthetho, kuyofanele ajeziswe noma ngabe ubani. Ngeke sikwazi ukuhlala sisonge izandla kube konakala. Ngeke sikwazi ukulahlekelwa umasipala obaluleke kangaka," kusho uNtuli.UNtuli ukhuluma kanjena nje izinto zimapeketwane eThekwini njengoba uqhubeka umbhikisho wabasebenzi abafuna ukwenyuselwa amaholo.Omunye womakadebona osebenzela umasipala weTheku okhulume wacela ukufihlwa, uthe bona baqala bafunda ngaphambi kokwenyuselwa imali."Sinezitifiketi ezifakazela ukuthi sifundile njengoba sisebenza nje. Sebekhuluma sengathi simane saphiwa nje le mali."Kufanele izwe lazi ukuthi sathathwa ngaphansi kohlelo lukaProject 60, kubuhlungu uma sekuthiwa asifundile thina,’’ kuchaza lo msebenzi.UNobhala wenyunyana iSouth African Municipal Workers Union (Samwu) KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Jaycee Ncanana, uthe bafuna ukuthi kwenyuselwe nabanye abasebenzi imali kungenjalo isiteleka siyaqhubeka.
title: 'Onyuse amaholo uma bekungafanele uzojeza'

text: USHAYA phansi ngonyawo u-Ernst Middendorp oqeqesha iKaizer Chiefs uthi abanayo inkinga emapalini. U-Akpeyi ufakwe ngemizuzu yokugcina eqenjini ebelizoqala umdlalo ngemuva kokuthi unozinti obeboshelwe, uBruce Bvuma ekhale ngezinhlungu enyongeni besavivela ukuqala umdlalo.Laba yibona onozinti abakhona eqenjini elikhulu njengoba u-Itumeleng Khune esalulama ekulimaleni okwenzeke ngesizini edlule.U-Akpeyi usayiniswe ngoJanuwari ngemuva kokushaya udaka kukaVirgil Vries owayesayiniselwe ukuvala isikhala sikaKhune esalulama. Nokho naye lo nozinti waseNigeria useqeda isizini engasalitholi ijezi kuMakhosi ngemuva kokufambula kweminye imidlalo.Ngesikhathi uMiddendorp ebuzwa ngokuthi ngabe izoba khona yini inkinga emapalini njengoba uBvuma esethintekile, uthe ezakhe ziqine kakhulu kule ndawo.“Uma kukhona into eyodwa engingayithembisa ngo-100%, ngokuzethemba wukuthi asinayo inkinga konozinti. Ngisho nencane. Ngicabanga ukuthi uDaniel wenze kahle. Ubuya kwi-Afcon lapho eqede khona endaweni yesithathu neNigeria. Kuke kwaba khona ukungabaza okuncane ngesiwombe sokuqala lapho esheshe waphuma khona. Kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi umdlalo wonke ubewulawula. Kulungile uma kudlala uDaniel noma kudlala uBruce, okanye uKhune. Empeleni simdlalisile (uKhune) imizuzu ewu-45 ngesonto eledlule samnikeza neminye ewu-60. Sesizolandelisa ngewu-90 ngemuva kwalokho uzobe esezokwazi ukuthi angaqokwa (esikwatini),” kuchaza uMiddendorp.IChiefs isiyinqobe yomibili imdlalo ye-Absa Premiership. Izoze idlale olandelayo ngo-Agasti 24 neSuperSport United eFNB Stadium ngo-6 ntambama.UMiddendorp uthe uzosebenzisa lesi sikhathi ukucija iqembu lakhe ekuhlaseleni. Yize benqobile uveze ukuthi akakagculiseki ngesibalo samagoli. Emdlalweni wokuqala bashaya iHighlands Park ngo 3-2.“Nasemdlalweni weHighlands Park ngicabanga ukuthi besingashaya amanye amagoli kodwa kumele sikuqonde ukuthi kuba lukhuni uma unabadlali abasha ezindaweni eziwukhiye. Ngicabanga ukuthi ngijabule ngokuthi siyawakha la mathuba okuseyindlela yokuthuthukisa nokuhlanganisa iqembu. Okwamanje ngiyakwamukela lokhu ngoba sikwazile ukuthola amaphuzu amathathu,” kusho uMiddendorp.
title: UMiddendorp uzishaya isifuba ngonozinti bezakhe

text: KUGQAME isihlava sokugeja eqenjini lesizwe iBafana Bafana, liyeka ithuba lokuhlala ngokukhululeka esicongweni sikaGroup E emidlalweni yokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon).Umdlalo obuseLinite Stadium uphele ngo 0-0. IBafana ibifike lapha ihambela phezulu ngemuva kokubhaxabula iSeychelles ngo 6-0 eFNB Stadium ngempelasonto edlule. Nakuwona lo mdlalo akhona amathuba alula agejwa abadlali kodwa kwagcina kuzibeka ngokuthi akhona asetshenzisiwe.Kodwa izolo uma ungumlandeli weBafana ubuka umdlalo kufanele wukuthi ugcine ngokuminca, ukuze izitha kungagcini kuyizona ezithola igoli njengoba beziya ngokuzethemba.Elakuleli lihlulekile wukusebenzisa amathuba amanye awo ehlele uLebo Mothiba, Dino Ndlovu, Percy Tau no-Aubrey Modiba. Kwesokuqala isiwombe iqembu likaStuart Baxter lithole inqwaba yamakhona kodwa lahluleka wukuwasebenzisa, okuyinto ephambene nasemdlalweni wokuqala lapho liphume namagoli amabili ngezimo ezifanayo.Nokho kubonakele umdlalo uqala ukuthi iSeychelles iza nokuhlukile njengoba zithe zibekwa amagqozo yakhombisa okukhulu ukuzimisela, iya phambili okuyinto ebingayenzi ngesikhathi kudlalwa kuleli.Leli qembu belikwazi ukuvala iminyakazo yeBafana okubonakale ikuthola kunzima ukuthi imelane nokugxuma kwebhola kule nkundla enotshani obungesibona obemvelo. Lokhu bekwenza ibhola lingahlali phansi ngendlela abebefisa ngayo abadlali uma beshaya amaphasi.Elakuleli licishe lathelwa ngehlazo, ngaphambi kokuthi kuyiwe ekhefini iSeychelles ithola ithuba umdlalo usuzoya ekhefini kodwa wasiza * -Itumeleng Khune.Nasesiwombeni sesibili, uKhune, ongazange avimbe nelilodwa ibhola emdlalweni wokuqala, ubesematasa, iSeychelles ilokhu ingqongozile emapalini eBafana. Ekugcineni leli lizwe libe selithola iphuzu lalo lokuqala eqoqweni.IBafana isinamaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili esikhundleni, sayishumi ukube iqhubekile nokunqoba. Emdlalweni olandelayo iBafana izokwamukela iNigeria ekhaya ngoNovemba 16. Umdlalo wokugcina wokuhlunga ungoMashi wonyaka ozayo labo izovakashela iLibya.Amaqembu amabili azoqeda ephezulu azoya kwi-Afcon eseCameroon ngoJulayi wangonyaka ozayo. Le midlalo emibili esalele iBafana kumele nakanjani iyiwine ukuze ingatholi iphoxeka ekugcineni.
title: Indumalo iBafana ilahla amathuba

text: KUBOSHWE abane ababeyizikhulu eMnyangweni wezeMfundo e-Eastern Cape, nomqondisi wenkampani ngamacala okukhwabanisa athinta uR59 million wokuthengwa kwezincwadi zesikole. Kwababoshiwe owayeyisikhulu uNksz Noxolo Gwarube (50), oMnuz Mthunywa Ngonzo (58) owayeyinhloko yomnyango, Monwabisi Tywakadi (60) Tyrone Fourie (48) noHermanus Smith (47) umqondisi weSiegesmund Trust.Bavele enkantolo izolo  baphuma ngebheyili kaR5 000 kanti kumele babuyele enkantolo ngoJulayi. Umnyango wawubeke uR209 million wokuthenga izincwadi zokufunda.Okhulumela oKlebe e-Eastern Cape uCaptain Yolisa Mgolodela, uthe uGwarube wathola intshontsho lama-laptop amabili  nomakhalekhukhwini kwiSiegesmund Trust. Le nkampani yathola ithenda kaR59 million. “UMnyango wezeMfundo waqolwa u-R59 million. Abasolwa abahlanu bazobuyela enkantolo ngoJulayi 8.”
title: Ibheyili kwabakhwabanisela owezemfundo

text: USEYISOSHA owayengumgadli we-Orlando Pirates neJomo Cosmos, uDavies Mwape, owafika eNingizimu Afrika ethwelwe ngeqoma ukuthi uzofike agile izimanga kodwa wagcina engenzanga lutho olutheni.UMwape (29) wadlala kweZimnyama ngaphansi kobuholi bukaKostadin Papic. Kuleli qembu wafike wahluleka wukwenza ayelindelwe ukuthi akwenze okuwukushaya amagoli.UMwape useyisosha eLusaka njengoba engasalidlali ibhola.UMwape ugcine ukubonakala kuZanaco ngo-2013.IZanaco igijima kwiligi enkulu yaseZambia.Leli qembu lidlalelwa ngu-Isaac Chansa owaduma kuPirates.“UMwape useyisosha manje. Akasalidlali ibhola. Omunye umdlali oseyisosha nguMbewe (Festus) owayedlala kuGolden Arrows. Naye usenesikhathi eyekile ukudlala ibhola,” kusho omunye wabadlali neNkana FC ebikhempe ehhotela elilodwa nentatheli yaleli phephandaba, eSouthern Sun Ridge.UMwape akagcinanga ngokudlala kuPirates kuphela kodwa wayibamba nakuJomo Cosmos.Nakhona izinto zafike zangahamba kahle wagcina ebuyele ngakubo eZambia. Eqenjini lesizwe laseZambia udlale imidlalo eyisithupha.UMwape uke wadlala naseTanzania, edlala kwizinkunzi zakhona iYoung Africans. KuPirates udlale nezibabuli ezingoBenedict “Tso” Vilakazi, Gift “Vum Vum” Leremi, Lebohang “Cheese-Boy” Mokoena, Lucky “Phinda Mzala” Lekgwathi osanda kuthatha umhlalaphansi ebholeni. Ukuba yisosha yinto enkulu eZambia kwazise noChris Katongo ozakhele udumo kuJomo Cosmos, Chipolopolo nasemaqenjini aphesheya kwezilwandle waqala kuwona lo mkhakha.UKatongo osize iZambia yadla umhlanganiso ku-Africa Cup of Nations ngo-2012 eGabon nase-Equatorial Guinea, uphethe izimendlela zokuba yisosha eliseqophelweni eliphezulu.
title: Useyisosha owake wadlalela eZimnyama

text: KUNGATHATHA cishe izinyanga ezingu-18 ukuthi kusungulwe umgomo wegciwane, iCoronavirus (Covid19) eselibulale abantu abangu-3 100 emhlabeni kusukela libhedukile, ezinyangeni ezimbili.ICovid19 ibheduke eWuhan, eChina isisabalale emazweni amaningi emhlabeni. Bangu-90 000 abantu okubikwa ukuthi bangenwe yileli gciwane emhlabeni.E-United States sekufe abayisithupha osekuholele ekutheni umengameli Donald Trump wakhona, enze isiphakamiso sokuthi izinkampani ezikhiqiza imithi zakhe umgomo ukuze kuvikelwe abantu obhubhaneni.Kodwa ongoti bezempilo bathi ukusungulwa komgomo kuze kufinyelele esigabeni sokuthi usetshenziswe, kungathatha izinyanga ezingu-18. Njengamanje kudingeka into ephuthumayo.UDkt Antony Fauci, inhloko yesikhungo esicwaninga ngezifo ezithathelanayo kuleli, iNational Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, uthe kudingeka isikhathi eside ukusungula umgomo, ngokubona kwakhe into engaba ngcono ukuthi kuhlolwe umshanguzo wokwelapha igciwane.UMnuz Leonard Schleifer, isikhulu esiphezulu enkampanini ekhiqiza imithi, iRegeneron Pharmaceuticals, uthe uma kuxhanyazelwa kwenziwa umgomo kuba nengozi yokuthi uma lowo mgomo ususetsheziswa kubantu wenze igciwane libe yingozi kakhulu.IWorld Health Organization (WHO) ithe amazwe osekubikwe ukuthi anabantu abanaleli gciwane asengu-73. E-Afrika mane amazwe okubikwe ukuthi anabantu abanegciwane. I-Senegal iyizwe lesine e-Afrika okubikwe ukuthi inomuntu onegciwane. Isikhungo esicwaninga ngezifo ezithathelanayo, iNational Instituite of Communicable Diseases (NICD), izolo sithe lesi siguli sibonwe ngoMsombuluko, sithe besiseFrance.Amanye amazwe osekuqinisekiswe ukuthi anabantu abanesifo yi-Algeria, Nigeria, Egypt, Tunisia neMorocco.I-NCD ithe akekho umuntu oseke watholwa enaleli gciwane eNingizimu Afrika, izolo bese bengu-164 abahlolelwe igciwane.
title: Kusekude ukuthola umgomo weCoronavirus

text: I-IFP noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli bathi bashaqekile ngokusatshiswa ngokubulawa komndeni wowesilisa ogonyuluke kubo ngokusocongwa kwekhansela leNkatha laseZululand. Lo mlisa usevule necala emaphoyiseni aseMgungundlovu ePressburry, ladluliselwa eVryheid kanti uthi usongelwa umholi oqavile kwi-IFP ngoba efuna asuse igama lakhe esitatimendeni esifungelwe esimnukayo.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi lo mlisa ocele ligodlwe igama lakhe, ekhale ngokuthi kunamaphoyisa awabize ngamagama asebeke engcupheni umndeni wakhe ehlangene nalo mholi we-IFP naye eligodliwe igama lakhe.Uthi kumanje kunezingcingo ezisabisa umndeni wakhe.USihlalo we-IFP kuzwelonke, uMnuz Blessed Gwala, uthe uyashaqeka uma esethola ukuthi lo mlisa owathi wayekhona kubulawa ikhansela uSbuyiselo Dlamini, usesatshiswa ngaphakathi eqenjini.“Lowo muntu ngiyamazi. Wasifonela samhlelela ukuba afike eThekwini wabe esesichazela ngakwaziyo. Ngavele ngabona ukuthi lesi sinindolo asichazayo singaphezu kwami, ngamthatha ngamdlulisela kwiziphathimandla zamaphoyisa. Ngakho unamanga uma esethi ngamhambisa kuBheki Cele, asikaze nje sihlangane noCele. Ngaphandle kwalokho okunye okwenzekayo lapho angikwazi ngakho ngiyethuka uma sekuvele ukuthi kunomunye umholi wethu osabisa lo mlisa ukuze aguquke kwayekushilo phambilini. Mina ngamyisa emaphoyiseni ngoba ngangibuye ngididwe ukuthi lo muntu unamalimi,” kusho uGwala.Okhulumela uCele, uNksz Reneilwe Serero ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bahlangana nalo mlisa kodwa bayethuka uma sebezwa ukuthi uyasatshiswa ngoba ubengakwazi lokho.Lo mlisa usejele laseMgungundlovu, iNew Prison ngecala lokubulawa kowayeyimenenja kaMasipala waseRichmond, uMnuz Sibusiso Sithole.“Kuthe ngesikhathi ngiyiswe enkantolo yaseVryheid, eLouwsburg ngecala elingahlangene nalolu daba naleli engiliboshelwe, sahlangana endleleni nalo mholi weNkatha. Amaphoyisa ayengihambisile ayelokhu ekhuluma naye ocingweni. Wayeshayelelwa iBMW X5 emhlophe. Sayilandela sangena emgwaqweni owubhuqu nalapho esafike sama khona. Kwaphuma ubhuti owayehamba nabesilisa ababili abamsiza ukuba ehle emotweni. Ngakhumbula ukuthi ngiyamazi nguye lona owasikhokhela imali engu-R450 000 oLundi mhla siqeda ukubulala uDlamini wakhuluma nami wathi ukhathazekile ngokuthi ngigonyuluke ngegama lakhe kwi-IFP ngakho ucela ngiguqule lokho ngithi ngangithengwe yiyo (IFP) ukuba ngimqambele amanga,” kusho lo mlisa.Uthe okumphethe kabi ukuthi lawa maphoyisa ayakwazi ukumcela ejele uma ezoya enkantolo ahambe naye ngakho useyasaba ukuthi azomenzakalisa.Uveze nokuthi nezinkabi ayenazo ziyazi kubo futhi azikaboshwa.Uqhube wathi kumanje amaphoyisa nalo mholi we-IFP, bafuna aqinisekise ngokuboshwa kwabasolwa basoLundi ukuthi uyabazi ekubeni engakaze ahlangane nabo.Uveze ukuthi mhla beyobulala uDlamini wayehamba nezinkabi zase-Eastern Cape ngeGolf kanti kukhona owayebasiza ebatshela ukuthi umufi usekuphi.“Satshelwa ukuthi umqaphi wakhe akekho kushoniwe kubo ngakho uhamba yedwa. Okokugcina satshelwa ukuthi asigade emarobhothini asuka edolobheni oLundi ngoba uzoqhamuka ngakhona uphuma eShisanyama nokuyindlela esamthola ngayo samdubula,” kusho lo mlisa.Uthi kumanje ayenabo abakaboshwa ngakho nabo sebeqalile basabisa ngokuthi bazoqotha umndeni wakhe oseMdantsane ngoba bayazi ukuthi uhlalaphi.UMnuz Skhanyisele Dlamini ongumfowabo kamufi uvele waphelelwa amazwi ezwa le ndaba.Uthe kusho ukuthi lawa maphoyisa abalokhu bewathemba abewabiza ngamagama, yiwo kanti ayingozi, wathi abasazi bewumndeni bazothemba bani manje ngoba ne-IFP abasayithembi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal UColonel Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kukhona icala lokusabisa eliphenywayo.
title: Inkabi iyacula ngelokusoconga ikhansela

text: LIZOBE libanjwe yimenenja ibhentshi kuPolokwane City uma isidudulana neMamelodi Sundowns emdlalweni wanamuhla we-Absa Premiership.Umdlalo weligi oseLoftus Stadium, ePitoli, ngo-7.30 ebusuku. IPolokwane ishiywe obengumqeqeshi uLuc Eymael ngempelasonto osejoyine iBloemfontein Celtic.UBernard Molekwa utshele leli phephanda izolo ukuthi nguyena ebambisene noPhuthi Mohafe obeyiphini lika-Eymael abapheka iqembu njengoba lilungiselela ukubhekana ne’Downs.“Amalungiselelo ahambe kahle kakhulu. Abadlali bakulungele ukubhekana neSundowns. Silindele umdlalo onzima njengoba sebeke balahla amaphuzu , okusho ukuthi bazosithelekela kanzima. Nathi sesinesikhathi singawini, sibalindele ngoba siyazi ukuthi kungenzeka noma yini ebholeni,” kusho uMolekwa.Emdlalweni womzuliswano wokuqala iSundowns yanqoba ngo 2-0 ekuhambeni.Kulokhu iRise and Shine, u-Eymael ayishiye isendaweni yesikhombisa ku-log, izoya emdlalweni ngaphandle kwabadlali bayo abamqoka.Ngokusho kukaMolekwa umgadli uRodney Ramagalela ohamba phambili eqenjini ngokushaya amagoli ayisishiyagalombili kuligi, usalulama ekulimaleni akuthola bedlala neBaroka FC emasontweni edlule. UThobani Mncwango yena usaqhubeka nokubhuquza ngaphandle njengoba abekwa icala esolwa ngokukhuluma kabi ngeqembu emithonjeni yabezindaba.Ukumiswa kukaMncwango kusolwa ukuthi ngezinye zezithathu ezenze * -Eymael agcine eshiyile kanti kuvela nokuthi usihlalo weqembu wangena nezicabha ezindlini zokushintshela washiya angalazi ngemuva kokuthi bebambane ngo 0-0 nabakhaya iBaroka.UMolekwa uthe: “Besingalindele ukuthi umqeqeshi uzoshiya, kusithusile.”Uthe imininingwane ingatholakala kusihlalo uJohnny Mogaladi. Nokho uMogaladi inombolo Isolezwe elinayo ibikhala kodwa ingabanjwa.“Thina sitshelwe ukuthi yithina esizobamba okwamanje. Usihlalo uyena ozoba neminingwane ngokuthi kwenzakaleni ngomqeqeshi, ngeke ngiphawule kulokho,” kusho uMolekwa.Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba uMncwango akanayo nencwadi emumisayo eqenjini, watshelwa ngomlomo. Usalindele ukuthi kulalelwe icala lakhe. Inkontileka yalo mgadli nePolokwane izoze iphele ngesizini ezayo.
title: Izinto zimapeketwane kuPolokwane City

text: OWAYEYILUNGU lebhodi ye-Eskom ukuphikile ukuthi wanikeza abakwaGupta ulwazi oluyimfihlo ngamanye amalungu ebhodi ngo-2014.UMnuz Mark Pamensky, owayeyilungu lebhodi ye-Eskom ubethula ubufakazi ngesikhathi ebuzwa ukuthi wenzani ekusizeni inkampani iThe New Age (TNA) ukuba ithole uxhaso.UPamensky ongomunye wabantu abasolisayo, abamataniswa nomndeni wakwaGupta.Wayekade eyilungu lebhodi e-Oakbay, inkampani yakwaGupta. Ngaso leso sikhathi wabe esethola isikhundla sokuba kwibhodi ye-Eskom ngo-2014.UPamensky usolwa ngokuthi uye owayenikeza aabakwaGupta lonke ulwazi.Wavulelwa icala lokukhwabanisa yi-Organisation Undoing Tax Abuse (Outa), ngo-Agasti 2017.I-Outa yaveza ukuthi wayethumela ulwazi lwase-Eskom oluyimfihlo kwabakwaGupta ukubasiza ukuba bathenge imayini yamalahle eGlencore.Wayesolwa ukuthi wayethumela lolu lwazi eseyilungu lebhodi lase-Oakbay nakhona kwa-Eskom.Izolo uPamensky utshele ikhomishini ephenya ngokulawula koMbuso yindlazana ukuthi wahlangana noMnuz Atul Gupta kodwa waphika ukuthi wamnikeza ulwazi oluyimfihlo ngokuthi uzoqokwa abe yilungu lebhodi kwa-Eskom. Uthe yena waziphuzela itiye nabakwaGupta.
title: Uphika eyokunikeza abakwaGupta ulwazi oluyimfihlo

text: BADUBELE emigwaqweni esenkabeni yedolobha eThekwini, bawusaphaza wagcwala yonke indawo udoti, abasebenzi abaqoqa udoti nabangeneme ngezinqumo zomqashi.Abasebenzi bathulule imigqomo egcwele udoti, badabula opulastiki okulayishwe kubo udoti izolo.Ubuyizindimbane udoti emgwaqweni u-Anton Lembede ngasesangweni laseDurban University of Technology, eCity Campus. Kuphazamiseke ukuhamba kwezimoto.Isenzo sabasebenzi abasophikweni iDurban Solid Waste, silandela isiteleka esingekho emthethweni abasibambe edepho eseSpringfield ngoLwesibili ekuseni.Ngalolu suku bavale umgwaqo owuthelawayeka uN2 noM4 eningizimu yedolobha ngamaloli, kwasiza amaphoyisa abalusa ababuyisela edepho. Iningi labasebenzi liqhinqe ngaphandle kwedepho lithi ngeke libuyele emsebenzini kuze kube umqashi uguqula izinqumo azithathile.Kuthiwa abasebenzi behliselwe amahora okusebenza esuka kwayisishiyagalombili aba mahlanu. Lokhu kuvuse ulaka kubasebenzi asebekhala ngokuthi kwehla amaholo ngenxa yesikhathi esincane abasisebenzayo.Okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela ugxekile isenzo sokuchithwa kukadoti ngabasebenzi abayitoho ngaphansi kwe-Expanded Public Works Programme (EPWP).UMayisela uthe labasebenzi bayayazi imigudu okumele bayilandele uma kukhona abengenelisekile ngakho.“Siyakugxeka ukungcoliswa kwemigwaqo yedolobha ngodoti futhi siyaxolisa kwizakhamuzi ngokwenzekile. Ubuholi bakha izinhlaka zokuba kuxoxiswane ngokungeneliseki kwabasebenzi, ” kusho uMayisela.Uthe kulindeleke ukuthi abasebenzi bavele phambi kwekomiti eliqondisa ubgwegwe ngesenzo sabo.
title: Basaphaze udoti wagcwala imigwaqo eThekwini

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEKUVUKE umunyu kwinhloko yabaqeqeshi beMamelodi Sundowns, uManqoba "TV" Mngqithi, ngesikhathi ibongela uzakwabo, uSteve "Mphathi" Komphela ngokunqoba inkomishi yokuqala.Usuku lwangoLwesithathu balusonge behleka bodwa abalandeli bamaBrazilians emva kokuthi iqembu labo linqobe isicoco seDStv Premiership, ekubeni lisasalelwe yimidlalo emithathu kuphele isizini.Lithele othulini omkhaya balo, iSuperSport United ngo-3-1, kobuseLoftus Versfeld Stadium.ISundowns inqobe isicoco seligi ngamaphuzu awu-60.Iqophe umlando ngokuba yiqembu lokuqala ukusivikela amahlandla amane elandelana. Iphinde yaba ngeyokuqala ukusinqoba ngaphansi kwabaxhasi abasha, iDStv Premiership.Kubaqeqeshi uMngqithi anqobe nabo isicoco, kukhona uRhulani Mokwena noKomphela, abaningi bese belibeke ngembaba elokuthi unebhadi lendalo.UKomphela ubengakaze anqobe isicoco engumqeqeshi, wahluleka noma esekwiKaizer Chiefs ahlala kuyona amasizini amathathu."Angazi ukuthi ngingakuchaza kanjani ukujabula enginakho ngoSteve. Ukuhlakanipha kwakhe kungenye yezinto eyenza sithathe isinqumo sokumletha eChloorkop. Wenze umsebenzi obabazekayo kwiChiefs, kube yibhadi nje ukuthi akanqobanga neyodwa inkomishi."Okubuhlungu wukuthi kunabantu abese becabanga ukuthi unebhadi. Bese kukhona nabathi leli bhadi uzoliletha iSundowns. Njengoba uSteve esenqobe iligi, ngicabanga ukuthi lezi zinkulumo zizophela."Indaba kaSteve ingikhumbuza uPitso (Mosimane) kumasizini adlule. Wathi kumele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi iligi siyinqobela uTeko (Modise). Yingoba kukhona abase bethi unebhadi. Abantu bayathanda ukwehlulela, bathi kawufanelwe lutho. Okubuhlungu wukuthi lokho kwenziwa yindlu emnyama. Sicindezelana sodwa, esikhundleni sokwesekana. Kukhulu uSteve asekwenzile ebholeni lakuleli. Liyababazeka izinga labadlali abakhiqizile esaqeqesha kwiFree State Stars nabanike ithuba kwiChiefs.Noma enganqobanga lutho kwiChiefs, kodwa kumele sibheke ukuthi izinga lokudlala ngaphansi kwakhe lalinjani nokuthi njengoba engasekho selinjani. Mhlawumbe ukube wanikwa ithuba, wathola uhlobo lwabadlali abafike esehambile ngabe kukhona akunqoba. Mhlawumbe bekuyinhloso kaNkulunkulu ukuthi anqobe okuthile esenathi," kusho uMngqithi.Lo mqeqeshi odabuka eMzimkhulu, ubonge wangapheza kubo bonke abasebenzi beSundowns."Ngibonga ngiyanconcoza kwibhodi, kumengameli nakubo bonke ubuholi beqembu, abadlali, ithimba labaqeqeshi, elabacwaningi nabo bonke ababambe iqhaza."Nakuba sihlulwe yiChampions League kodwa kubuyise amathemba ukunqoba isicoco seligi. Besingasinqoba kunoma yimuphi umdlalo kodwa ukusinqoba sidlalela ekhaya, sibhekene nomkhaya bethu, kusijabulise kakhulu."AmaBrazillians azobhekana neSwallows, eDobsonville Stadium koweligi ngoMgqibelo.Imidlalo yeDStv Premiership ngempelasonto:Kusasa: Swallows v Mamelodi Sundowns (5pm, Dobsonville Stadium).NgeSonto: TS Galaxy v Orlando Pirates (3pm, Mbombela Stadium).
title: Umunyu kuMngqithi ebongela uKomphela ngesicoco

text: UBizizi noKaygee bathe basithandile isigqi sikaDJ Hlo ophethwe yiMaz Entertainment kaDr Musa Zulu, yingakho besebenze naye kuleli culo.UKaygee, uthe iculo lizophuma maduze nabo bagculisekile ngendlela eliyilo.Uthe iculo lizophuma ngo-Okthoba 1, kodwa sebeqedile ukuliqopha.UDJ Hlo, uthe okwenze wapika laba baculi yingoba ebone kuyibona abangenza ubulungiswa ekukhipheni iculo lamaPiano ngendlela abefuna ngayo.“Iculo lami lithi iFestive. Ngalo nginethemba lokuthi lizoba ngezinye izingoma ezizohamba phambili njengoba sekuzoqala amaholidi kaDisemba.Isigqi sikaBizizi noKaygee ngiyasithanda vele futhi bengifisa ukuthi ngisebenze nabo.Konke sekumi ngomumo ngalo njengoba nosuku elizophuma ngalo selwaziwa. Kumanje sihlela ukushutha i-video yalo ezophuma kanye nalo ngo-Okthoba 1,” kusho uDJ Hlo.Yize uDJ Hlo esemusha emculweni kodwa ufike kwazwakala ngomculo wakhe. Usanda kukhipha iculo lakhe elisematheni kulezi zinsuku elithi: Ebusuku, apike kulona uRethabile.Amagalelo akhe emculweni asheshe azwakala njengoba ephinde abe yinxusa leRoots ku-SABC1.
title: AbeKokota bakhiphe iculo noDJ osemusha emculweni

text: KULIMALE abantu abayisihlanu kubalwa nezingane kushayisana itekisi nemoto encane eMgungundlovu izolo.Zine izingane ezilimele engozini eyenzeke ekuseni emgwaqweni uSlangspruit, eMbali.Okhulumela abosizo oluphuthumayo i-ER24 uMnuz Russel Meiring, uthe bafike endaweni yesigameko ngemuva kwehora lesithupha ekuseni.“Abosizo oluphuthumayo bafice itekisi nemoto encane kumi phakathi nomgwaqo. Baxilonge abalimele kwatholakala ukuthi izingane ezine ezineminyaka ephakathi kweyisithupha kuya kweyisishiyagalolunye zilimele,” kusho uMeiring.UMeiring uthe abalimele baxilongwe endaweni yesigameko maqede baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela i-Edendale.Uthe amaphoyisa abekhona endaweni yesehlo ukuze aphenye ngembangela yengozi.
title: Ingozi ishiye abahlanu belimele

text: ISIKHALI esingasiza AmaZulu FC, aqhubeke nokunqoba imidlalo ukuzinikela, ngokusho kukaCavin Johnson opheka Usuthu.Inyokana Eluhlazana idlale ibhola elinenkosi phakathi ishaya iCape Town City FC ngo 2-0, emdlalweni weLast 16 kwiTelkom Knockout (TKO) eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza ngoLwesibili ebusuku.Amagoli oSuthu avalelwe phakathi u-Emiliano Tade noBongi Ntuli esiwombeni sesibili.Ukunqoba kwezikaJohnson, bekusho ukuthi AmaZulu asaligcinile irekhodi elihle lokungashaywa ekhaya (eKing Zwelithini Stadium) selokhu kuqale isizini."Kungijabulisile ukuzinikela kwabadlali, ikakhulukazi esiwombeni sesibili. Uma siziqeqesha noma silungiselela umdlalo sinendlela esiyaye senze ngayo, engicabanga ukuthi igoli lokuqala (likaTade), likufakaziselile esikwenzayo.Okubalulekile njangamanje ukuthi sibambisane, silekelelane ngoba sinomdlalo onzima ngoMgqibelo esizowudlala neCape Town City, eKapa we-Absa Premiership. Kuzofanele kube khona esikutholayo kulowo mdlalo ngoba isimo esikusona kwi-log asisihle neze," usho kanje ngemuva komdlalo uJohnson.AmaZulu anamaphuzu amathathu, emidlalweni eyisishiyagalombili. Azobhekana ne-Orlando Pirates ekhaya emdlalweni we-quarterfinal yeTelkom Knockout.Elinye iqembu laKwaZulu-Natal elisekhona kwiTelkom yiMaritzburg United ezobhekana neBidvest Wits ekhaya
title: OwoSuthu ubabaza ukuzinikela kwabadlali

text: SISHUBILE isimo emndenini okugasele kuwo amaphoyisa nabezenhlalakahle kusolwa abazali ngokwenqabela izingane ukuya esikoleni ngenxa yenkolo yamaJuda.Zintathu izingane zakwaSokhulu okuthiwa ziyekiswe isikole ngoba umndeni sewuthole ukuthi ungamaJuda.Ngokusho kukaNkk Nokuthula Sokhulu ongunina walezi zingane, abezenhlalakahle namaphoyisa bagasele kwakhe emuva kokuncinzwa wumphakathi obasola ngokuncisha izingane ilungelo lokufunda.Izolo bekulindeleke ukuthi kuphume isinqumo ngokubonisana kwalo mndeni nabezenhlalakahle ngekusasa lezingane.NgokukaNkk Sokhulu, akukho okungalungile abakwenzile bengabazali. Uthi benze ucwaningo olukhomba ukuthi bangamaJuda ngakho-ke kuzomele izingane zabo bazifundisele bona ngoba izikole ezikhona kuleli zamaJuda zibiza imali enkulu.“Ngenze ucwaningo olunzulu ngokufunda izincwadi zomlando nezenkolo, ngathola ukuthi thina asibona abantu abamnyama njengoba kushiwo kodwa singamaJuda,” kusho uNkk Sokhulu.Uthe ucwaningo lwakhe luveze nokuthi izingane zakhe kumele zifunde ezikoleni iTorah, umthetho wabenkolo yamaJuda.Ucwaningo lwakhe lugcine lumxhumanisa nomfundisi wamaJuda ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uRabbie Ydin, waseHighlands North, eGoli, wameluleka ngokuningi ngenkolo yamaJuda.Ukuxhumana kwabo kugcine sekwenza uYdin atheleke emzini wabo KwaMashu, ezofaka ivangeli lamaJuda emndenini.Njengoba izingane zabo zingasayi nje esikoleni, zifundiswa isiHebheru nsuku zonke ekhaya nguYdin.Leli phephandaba lifike kulo muzi uYdin ematasa ethandaza ngolimi olungazwakali nalo mndeni.UNkk Sokhulu uthe abazimisele ngokuyeka ukuthola “iqiniso” ngenkolo nangokuba amaJuda ngoba iBhayibheli lahlanekezelwa.UMnuz Sandile Sokhulu uyise wezingane, uthe phezu kokuthi kade bekholwa enkolweni yamaKrestu, bazoqhubeka nokufuna "iqiniso" lenkolo yamaJuda ekhuluma ngabo ngqo bengabantu abamnyama.UYdin uthe ubizwe yilo mndeni ngenhloso yokuthi azowucacisela kabanzi ngenkolo yamaJuda.Uthe akuwona kuphela umndeni wakwaSokhulu aseke wawuhambela ezofundisa iTorah.“Sengike ngaya eRichards Bay, Cape Town, Swaziland, Zimbabwe ngiyofundisa iTorah," kusho uYdin. Usebuya nakwa-Israel esizindeni samaJuda ngenhloso yokucobelela ulwazi ngale nkolo.Mayelana nokuthi kuzokwenzekani ngezingane aseqale ukuzifundisa iTorah, uthe konke sekukubazali bazo. Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThuthukisa koMphakathi esifundazwe uNkk Ncumisa Ndelu, uthe lolu daba lusesezandleni zemantshi ezokhipha isinqumo.
title: Izingane seziyeke isikole ngenxa yenkolo yamaJuda

text: BADEDELWE ngebheyli umama nendodakazi abasolwa ngecala lokubulala ilungu lomndeni wabo balingcwaba ethuneni elingashoni egcekeni ngoba lisolwa ngokweba ilahle lemoto.UNkk Wakhele Ngcobo uMaShozi (71) noNkk Hlengiwe Kweyama uMaNgcobo (43) baseMansenseni, eDassenhoek, eMariannhill, baboshelwe icala lokubulala uMnuz Khehla Ngcobo (25) ngoJulayi wangonyaka odlule.Okhulumela iNational Prosecuting Authority KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Natasha Kara, uthe iNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown izolo idedele laba ngoR1 000 umuntu emunye.UNkk Kara uthe inkantolo ilihlehlisele uJulayi 8 nonyaka icala ukuze kuqhutshekwe nophenyo.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo ukuthi uNgcobo, owayeyiphara washaywa kubo waze wafa ngenxa yokuthi edayise ilahle lemoto kadadewabo kaNkk Kweyama.Kuthiwa wayeboshwe izandla nezinyawo esihlalweni, wathelwa ngamanzi abilayo ekhanda ayehla ngomzimba wataxwa waze washona.Eseshonile kuthiwa wasongwa ngengubo yokulala wafihlwa.“Kwabe sekufunwa amadoda amabili endawo acelwa ukuba ambe umgodi okwadidiswa ngawo kwathiwa owethoyilethi. Emuva kosuku lomgodi umbiwe, la madoda abuya kulo muzi ezocela elinye itoho lokwakha ithoyilethi kwathiwa umgodi usugqitshiwe ngeke lisakhiwa ithoyilethe kanti kwasekugqitshwe uNgcobo,” kusho umthombo.Umthombo uqhube wathi ngoMgqibelo kufike amaphoyisa azenza abantu abalunywe indlebe ngokuthi kulo muzi kudayiswa isiqatha ayaluza igceke efuna ukubona ukuthi likhona yini kodwa angasola lutho.“Kungalesi sikhathi lapho amaphoyisa evele aqonda uNkk Kweyama amtshela ukuthi ayazi babulala umfowabo ngakho akasho ukuthi isidumbu sakhe basingcwabaphi. Ushaywe uvalo washo. Kwase kumbiwa isidumbu, yena nonina baboshwa,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe isidumbu sikamufi besingcwatshwe ethuneni elingashoni. Kuvulwe icala lokubulala, kwaboshwa abomndeni.
title: Badedelwe ngebheyili abasolwa ngokufa kwephara

text: I-ORLANDO Pirates iyaqhubeka nokuba matasa emakethe njengoba isimemezele ukuthi isisayinise umdlali waseZambia u-Augustine Mulenga.Lo mdlali oyibamba phambili nasezinhlangothini unikezwe inkontileka yeminyaka emithathu.UMulenga ulindelwe kuleli ngesonto elizayo njengoba ebedlala kwiCHAN neqembu lesizwe laseZambia elikhishwe kuma-quarterfinal alo mqhudelwano obanjelwe eMorocco. IPirates isanda kumemezela uXola Mlambo njengomdlali wayo obegijima kwiBidvest Wits kanti iqale iwindi ngokulanda uDiamond Thopola noPhetso Maphanga abebekwiChippa United. Isihlukane noThabo Rakhale oye kwiChilli Boys no-Ayanda Gcaba obolekiswe kwiPlatinum StarsIPirates ihlela ukwethula abanye abadlali abasha ngaphambi kokuthi kuvalwe iwindi lokuhwebelana ngabadlali kusasa ngo-12 ebusuku.UXOLA Mlambo owethulwe njengomdlali we-Orlando Pirates izolo eminiIzolo iPirates imemezele ukuthi isisayinise uXola “Ten Ten” Mlambo oyibamba enkabeni yenkundla nosuka kwiBidvest Wits.UFloyd Mbele, isikhulu sePirates, uthe akaqedile ukusayinisa. “Sijabule ukuthola umdlali ofana noXola. Ukumsayinisa kwethu kuchaza kona ukuthi siyazifela ngaye. Asizange sishintshane ngamdlali neWits. Asiqedile ukusayinisa abadlali abasha. Ngaphambi kokuthi kuvalwe iwindi bakhona abadlali abasha esizobethula.”Imibiko ibithi iPirates izothola uMlambo bese yona idedela * -Abbubaker Mobara ongazange abonakale emdlalweni wangempelasonto edlule.UMbele udalule ukuthi basambhekile umgadli ngemuva kokuhluleka bethi bazama uBrockie.“Ebholeni kumele wazi ukuthi uzohluleka noma uzowina uma kukhona oxoxa nabo. Kungani kumele sidikibale ngokushweba ithuba lokusayinisa uBrockie? Sisaqhubeka nomkhankaso wethu wukuthungatha umgadli. Kunesikhathi esizibekele sona ukuthi kumele kushaye sona sesimtholile. Noma yimuphi umgadli ongalibheki ipali esingamthola sizomsayinisa,” kusho uMbele.Njengamanje iPirates ibophele uThamsanqa Gabuza, Lyle Foster, Ayanda Nkosi noThabiso Kutumela phambili. UGabuza nguyena oseshaye amagoli amaningi kubagadli beZimnyama. Useshaye amagoli amathathu.IPirates isishaye amagoli awu-18 emidlalweni ewu-18 okuchaza ukuthi ishaya igoli umdlalo nomdlalo ewudlalayo.Omunye umgadli obefunwa yiPirates kodwa yagcina ingamtholanga nguThobani Mncwango ogcine esayine kwiWits. Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi iPirates sekumele izame kubagadli abafana noMohamed Anas weFree State Stars noPrince Nxumalo we-Ajax Cape Town.Kusasa ngo-7.30 ebusuku iPirates izoshukana ne-Ajax eCape Town Stadium, eKapa, emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership. Uma ithola amaphuzu agcwele izosala ngamaphuzu amabili kwiSundowns ezihola phambili.
title: IPirates isayinise umgadli waseZambia

text:
SEKUVELE ukuthi usehlelelwe ukuba aqashwe ubusuku nemini uBabes Wodumo okuvela ukuthi uhlalele ovalweni selokhu egonyuluke 'ngokuhlukunyezwa' ngobeyisithandwa sakhe uMampintsha.Lezi zindaba zokugadwa kukaBabes zivezwe ngumsakazi weMetro FM uMasechaba Ndlovu kuTwitter ngoMgqibelo, eveza ukuthi lungenelelwe uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele.Lokhu kwenzeke ngemuva kokuthi uBabes ekhulume kabanzi ngokumhlukanise noMampintsha ohlelweni lukaMo Flava noMasechaba, iThe Drive, kwiMetro FM ngoLwesihlanu ntambama.UBabes uveze ohlelweni ukuthi sebehlukene noMampintsha.Ohlelweni uMasechaba uveze ukuthi uMampintsha ubemshaya uBabes futhi wake wamephula umlenze. UBabes uthe uMampintsha ubenezinombolo eziyimfihlo zokungena ezinkundleni zokuxhumana i-Instagram, Twitter noFacebook kaBabes abhale ezenza yena.Nakuba bebengakaze bakuqinisekise emphakathini ukuthandana kwabo kodwa uBabes Wodumo uveze ukuthi besebethembisene umshado.Esitatimendeni esikhishwe nguMampintsha uthe njengosaziwayo kufanele engabe usophondweni lwemikhankaso yokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane.“Angimsulwa kodwa futhi angisho ukuthi nginecala kwizinsolo ezenziwe engxongxeni ezwakele. Kungenzeka ukuthi ngike ngathatha ngamawala kwezinye izinto ezenzeke sisathandana kodwa engingeke ngazikhuluma esidlangaleni.”Uxolisile esizweni kodwa hhayi kuBabes.Part 3: UMampintsha uchithe eyezibhakela nokuphulwa kwemilenze. 
    #babeswodumo
#mampintsha

Video: 
      @FaneleBengu
pic.twitter.com/o0CZJgnm7h— Isolezwe Newspaper (@IsolezweNews) 
      May 20, 2018
Kwi-video ayenze neSolezwe ngeSonto ushaye ungqimphothwe, wathi kunesandla sesithathu kulolu daba ngoba kukhona abafuna ukubahlukanisa noBabes ukuze bamsebenzise kahle engasekho (uMampintsha).Engxoxweni Isolezwe ngeSonto elibe nayo nelinye ilungu eliqavile lo mndeni kaBabes Wodumo nokho elingathandanga ukuba igama lalo lidalulwe, lithe ukwethembisana umshado kukaBabes noMampintsha ngasese, kungezinye zezinto ezingahlalanga kahle kwabakwaSimelane.“Siyazi bebethandana kodwa kwasiphula umoya ukuthi bathembisane umshado ngasese bangenzi izinto ngendlela ejwayelekile yokuthi kucelwe isihlobo esihle,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Lithe laba bahlukane ngemuva kokuklwebhana ezinyangeni ezintathu ezedlule. UBabes wala uMampintsha wathatha izimpahla nemoto wahamba.Yize kunjalo kodwa leli lungu lo mndeni aliphumelanga obala ngezinsolo zokuthi uBabes ubesengukudla kwenduku.Liphinde langena ezintangeni uma libuzwa ngezinsolo zokujola eceleni kukaBabes. Lithe uBabes ungumuntu oshelwayo nomiswe kabi yizimpunyela ezimbili zaseThekwini. Zimthembisa ukumshada kanti uMampintsha uyakwazi lokhu futhi kuyamcika. Yikho okwenza abe nesikhwele esibi aphinde afune ukumlawula kukho konke akwenzayo.“Uyazi nawe ukuthi indoda yinhle ngezinkomo zayo, uma ingoqa kuba nenkinga. Uma yena engazimisele ngoBabes akangamhlukumezi, akamyeke aqhubeke nempilo yakhe ngoba bakhona abamthandayo nabamcabangela kangcono,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Okunye okuvelayo wukuthi ngobusuku abahlukane ngabo abakwaSimelane bahambela emzini kaMampintsha eWestville baya kolwisa khona uMampintsha bedinwa wukuhlukumeza kwakhe nokukipitisa uBabes.“Beziba khona izingxabano njengokwejwayelekile kodwa le yokugcina ibe namandla, ngoba kuze kwaphoqa ukuthi uBabes aqoqe okungokwakhe emzini kaMampintsha wabuyela kubo kuRussell Street eThekwini,” kusho umthombo.Ngokweminye imithombo selokhu behlukene, kuvela ukuthi uMampintsha akaphathekile neze kahle ngoba ukungabi noBabes kuyamgulisa emoyeni.Izinsolo zokuhlukunyezwa ziqinisekiswa udadewabo kaBabes, uNondu Simelane (bheka inkulumo ethwetshulwe ngenhla kwesokudla).Kuthiwa ingxabano yabo ikapakele nasebhizinisini njengoba uBabes Wodumo eseshiye iWest Ink wavula inkampani yakhe iWena Wodumo Entertainment.Ethintwa uyise kaBabes Wodumo, uMbhishobhi Mbongeni Simelane, ngokubuyela kwendodakazi yakhe ekhaya uthe: “Angikhulumi nabezindaba.”Umthombo uthi inkontileka kaBabes neWest Ink iphele ngoJanuwari 11 kodwa uMampintsha wangayivuselela.Kumanje uBabes Wodumo usebhukhwa enkampanini yakhe. Yize kunjalo kodwa ikhona ingoma entsha ezophuma maduze ayeyiqophe esengaphansi kwe-West Ink.Part 2: ‘UBabes uyongivikela nini emhlabeni?’ 
    #BabesWodumo
#Mampintsha
#Masechaba

Video: 
      @FaneleBengu
pic.twitter.com/bj0he4QanH— Isolezwe Newspaper (@IsolezweNews) 
      May 20, 2018
Kuthiwa ukwehla kwakhe emzimbeni akusikho ukuthi uyajima, kepha yisikhwele ebesimbulala esize saholela ekutheni abe nokhwantalala.* Khonamanjalo uDJ Tira ufake isithombe eme noMampintsha noBabes ethi: “Ngiyanithanda, sekuyisikhathi sokuthandaza.”Kuvela lezi zindaba zokuhlukunyezwa kukaBabes kunenqwaba yabesifazane kuleli ababulewe okusolwa abantu abathandana nabo. Isolezwe selisungule umkhankaso obizwa nge-#Sekwanele ngenhloso yokukhuza lesi sihlava sokuhlukunyezwa nokubulawa kwabesifazane abantu abathandana nabo (bheka ikhasi 7 no-10).Kusenjalo umculi uBusisiwe "Cici" Twala, nyakenye uvulele icala obeyisoka lakhe nomphathi u-Arthur Mafokate ngokumshaya aze amhudule ngemoto.Ubudlelwane babo buthi abufane nobukaBabes noMampintsha.Icala liseNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMidrand eGoli.Ngesonto eledlule bekumele liqulwe kodwa lahlehliselwa uJulayi 11 lapho lizobe seliqala ukuqulwa khona.UCici walimala kanzima kulesi sehlakalo wahuduleka naphansi elenga emotweni kaMafokate. UMafokate akakafuni ukuphawula ngalezi zinsolo.UCici wasala elele kanjalo elimele, washosha waya komunye umuzi oseduze wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela. Uthi wafike wathola ukuthi uselimele kakhulu. UMafokate uyaliphika icala.
title: Usezogadwa uBabes ‘ohlukunyezwayo’

text:
KUQHUME umthandazo esiShayamthetho KwaZulu-Natal kucishe kushayeka phansi uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Willies Mchunu ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yakhe yokuvula.UMchunu ubesanda kuveza ukuthi usecela obambe njengoNdunankulu kulesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala amqhubekele nenkulumo yakhe.Ngesikhathi ewa uMchunu ulekelelwe owesilisa obeseduzane naye ngaphambi kokuthi kungenelele uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo obemnika usizo oluphuthumayo.  Sekunesikhathi uMchunu ehlushwa yisimo sempilo esingesihle.Nyakenye uMchunu ushadelwe ngemuva kokushonelwa inkosikazi ngonyaka ka-2016,  uDudu Mchunu. Ukushona kwenkosikazi yakhe kulandelwe wukushona kwabazali bakhe. Ngemuva kokushona kwamalungu omndeni wakhe, uMchunu uxinwe wukugula waphuma engena ezibhedlela.There’s been an unexpected and sudden turn of event as Premier Willies Mchunu suddenly becomes weak while delivering his 
#KZNSOPA2019 and emergency personnel are rushed in. 
pic.twitter.com/GTkMc9uHfD— Steve Bhengu (@SteveBhengu) 
February 27, 2019KZN Premier Willies Mchunu just collapsed while delivering the SOPA 😳 
pic.twitter.com/V6HzmzAkWT— Claude Makayekwe (@kafur_) 
February 27, 2019
title: BUKA: Kungenelele uDhlomo uNdunankulu ewa ethula inkulumo

text: I-ANC Women’s League, ebisho okunye mayelana nokuxoshwa kweMeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, iphume isicula elinye iculo emuva kokuhlangana nabaholi abaphezulu be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.Manje isithi iyasihlonipha isinqumo esithathwe wubuholi be-ANC eKZN kukhishwa uNkk Gumede esikhundleni. Ekusukeni ibikhononda ngokuthi ukhishwe kalula ngoba engumuntu wesifazane.NgoLwesibili uMengameli we-ANC Women’s League, uNksz Bathabile Dlamini, ekhuluma eGauteng ebusuku emcimbini obuhanjelwe nawuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa usabise ngokuthi abesifazane abaxoshwa kwi-ANC bazovula iqembu labo ngoba kunomkhuba omubi wokubakhipha ezikhundleni.Uthe abaneme ngomkhuba wokukhishwa kwabesifazane abaphethe izikhundla eziphezulu.Izolo uNksz Dlamini utshele abezindaba ukuthi uzokhuluma nabo uma esephuma emhlanganweni nobuholi obuphezulu be-ANC eKZN kodwa emuva komhlangano uthe akukhulunywe nonobhala we-ANCWL, uNkk Meokgo Matuba.Uthe bayasihlonipha isinqumo se-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ngoba empeleni ayilweli umuntu oyedwa kodwa ilwela ukuhlonishwa kwabaholi besifazane.“Asilweli umuntu oyedwa, sikhulumile nobuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal sabona nombiko oholele ekushintshweni kobuholi komasipala. Ngemuva kokuxoxa nobuholi siyasihlonipha isinqumo esithathiwe. Sizoqhubeka nokulwela abaholi besifazane ngoba asifuni babukelwe phansi.”Uthe kwezinye izifundazwe zikhona izingqinamba zokungahlonishwa kwabantu besifazane kodwa baqale KwaZulu-Natal ukuze balulungise udaba lwabesifazane.UNksz Dlamini uthe uhambisana nalokho okushiwo wuNkk Matuba.Kwale ngisho izintatheli sezimncenga wathi akayingeni indaba yokuphawula, izintatheli zamgcina kudala esafutheka njengeselesele kodwa manje akasenaso leso sikhathi.Emhlanganweni bekukhona ubuholi obuphezulu be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal okubalwa kubo uSihlalo, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, iPhini lakhe, uMnuz Michael Mabuyakhulu, uMgcinimafa, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka noMnuz Themba Mthembu, uNobhala we-SACP KwaZulu-Natal.Bekukhona nabaholi be-ANC eMusa Dladla oMnuz Mdu Mhlongo, Tholi Gwala, Nkk Thembeka Mchunu nabakwezinye izifunda akade bevalelwe emhlanganweni okungashiwongo ukuthi bekungowani.I-ANCWL eThekwini ithe kayeneme ngokuxoshwa kukaNkk Gumede yathi kunabantu abadicilela phansi isithunzi sakhe.UNkk Maboni Chamane okhulumela i-ANC Women’s League eThekwini, uthe udaba lokuxoshwa kukaNkk Gumede baluthatha njengokukhishwa kwabesifazane ezikhundleni zokuhola ngoba alikho icala elimlahlile.
title: I-ANCWL nengwiji kolukaGumede

text: KUKHALWA ngobudlova kumbhishobhi webandla lamaZayoni okuthiwa uvale isikole Umzokhulayo Primary KwaNyuswa, eNdwedwe, okuthiwa uphoqe abafundi ukuthi babuyele emakhaya, babuye uma sekuxoshwe uthishomkhulu.U-Bishop Bheki Ngcobo obuye abe wumengameli  we- African Freedom Revolution (AFR), kuthiwa ngesonto eledlule ungene wakhipha ngoshova abafundi emakilasini, wavala isikole.Kuthiwa ubehambisana nedlanzana ebelidlubhe izikibha zeqembu lakhe. Baqoqe izingane baziyalela ukuthi ziphume esikoleni, zingalubhadi esikoleni zizozwa ngabo uma sekumele zibuye. Kuvele ukuthi abamfuni uthishomkhulu ngoba kungesiye owendawo futhi ekhokhisa abazali o-R100.Nayizolo kuthiwa itshe belisome inhlama, abafundi nothisha abazange balubhade esikoleni.Uthisha olandise Isolezwe owayekhona ngosuku lwesigameko kodwa ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe  uNgcobo nayehamba nabo kabazange bazihluphe ngokucela imvume kothisha kodwa bathi isikole bayasivala.“Isikhathi sokuphuma sasingakashayi nomuntu owelisa izingane umgwaqo wayengakafiki. Izingane zaphoqwa ukuthi ziphume ngababegqoke izikibha ze-AFR, iningi labo okungebona abendawo. Bathi abamfuni uthishomkhulu nabanye othisha futhi bafuna kusebenze abantu bendawo kuphela,” kusho umthombo.Kuthintwa uNgcobo, uvumile ukuthi baziyalele izingane ukuthi zingalubhadi esikoleni kuze kube umnyango uxosha uthishomkhulu.“Lokhu sikwenze emva kokuzwa izikhalo zabazali ngodaba lokukhokhiswa kwabo o-R100 okwenziwa uthishomkhulu. Lokhu uthi ukwenza ngoba edinga ukukhokhela uthisha ongaqashwanga wumnyango,” kusho uNgcobo.Uthe akukhona okokuqala bekhala ngalesi senzo njengoba nangonyaka owedlule babhikisha bemfuna exoshiwe kodwa umnyango wabaziba.Umzali osesigungwini esilawula isikole ongathandanga ukudalulwa ngoba ethi usaba ukwenzakaliswa wuNgcobo, uthe ukukhokhwa kwale mali ekhokhwa ngonyaka, kwavunyelwana ngakho emhlanganweni wabazali bayemukela ngoba bebona iqhaza likathisha osefundise kulesi sikole evolontiya kusuka ngo-2014 engaqashiwe.“UNgcobo uyisidlova. Iningi labazali liyahambisana nokukhokhwa kwale mali futhi akubanga yisinqumo sikathishomkhulu kodwa ngesethu singabazali. “Iyahlukaniswa le mali, uthisha ayihole nyangazonke ukumsiza athole insipho. Okubuhlungu wukuthi isikole asivalayo kasikho ngakubo, yena ongowakwenye indawo kodwa uyagxambukela futhi akanazo izingane ezifunda kuso. Kulahlekelwa izingane zethu,” usho kanje.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa, usigxekile isenzo sokuvalwa kwesikole.“Sithanda ukuqwashisa abaholi bamaqembu epolitiki amancane ukuthi badlalele kude nezikole ngoba ziyindawo okubunjwa khona ikusasa lezingane, akusona ezokuzama ukukotela udumo. Umnyango uzoqinisekisa ukuthi ukufunda nokufundisa akuphazamiseki,” kusho uMthethwa.
title: Bakhala ngombhishobhi ovale isikole

text: KUZWELE nakubadlali baphesheya kwezilwandle ukushona kuka-Anele Ngcongca odlale iminyaka eBelgium.UNgcongca (33) ushone engozini yemoto izolo ekuseni. Ubekade esemabhukwini eMamelodi Sundowns kodwa ebolekiswe kuMaZulu. Ukushona kwakhe akugcinanga ngokushaqisa abantu baseNingizimu Afrika kuphela kodwa kunyakazise nababengozakwabo eBelgium esadlala kwiKRC Genk awine nayo izicoco.UNgcongca wajoyina iGenk ngo-2007 esuka kwiFC Fortune yaseKapa, kade ekade esuke kuleli eyozama inhlanhla kwi-Arsenal eyayiqeqeshwa u-Arsene Wenger.Ngo-2015 uqokwe kubadlali abahamba phambili kwiGenk eminyakeni ewu-100, iTeam of The Century.
