Lapha uqokwe nabadlali okukhona kubo uThibaut Courtois osevimbela iReal Madrid yaseSpain noKevin De Bruyne oseyisihlabani seManchester City, bobabili ababhonge emswaneni ngokushona kukaNgcongca.UCourtois ubhale ekhasini lakhe kwi-twitter wathi: “Ngidumele ukuzwa ukuthi owayengumdlali weGenk u-Anele akasekho. Ubengomunye wabadlali abanomdlandla kunabo bonke esengake ngahlangana nabo. “Ngiyohlala ngikukhumbula ukumoyizela kwakho futhi ngizophila nokuhlala ubheka izinto ngeso elihle kwakho. Sizokukhumbula kakhulu mngani wami. Ngicabanga ngomndeni wakho.” UDe Bruyne uthe: “ RIP mngani wami.”KwiGenk uNgcongca uwine isicoco seligi nezinye izindebe ezehlukene. Ubengomunye wabadlali abahlonishwayo futhi ethandwa ngabalandeli bayo.Emyalezweni wayo iGenk ithe: “Sizwa izindaba ezibuhlungu zokushona kuka-Anele Ngcongca. Ushone engozini yemoto. Udlale imidlalo engekho ngaphansi kuka-279 kwiGenk. Sicabanga ngomndeni nabangani bowayengumdlali wethu waseNingizimu Afrika.”UNgcongca udlale imidlalo engaphezu kuka-50 kwiBafana Bafana. U-Aaron “Mbazo” Mokoena, owayengukaputeni weBafana emqhudelwaneni weNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2010 uNgcongca adlale kuyo, uthe akakakholwa ukuthi akasekho. UMbazo naye udlalile kwiGenk phakathi kuka-2003 no-2005 ngaphambi kokuthi ijoyinwe nguNgcongca.“Namanje angikakholwa wukuthi u-Anele akasekho. Lapha sikhuluma ngomuntu ebengisondelene naye. Ngokwami ubengowesibili kubadlali basemuva kwesokudla abaphambili eMzansi. SasinoSizwe Motaung kuqala, uyena olandela emuva kwakhe ngokuba nekhono.”“Ubethula kakhulu. Ngesikhathi ngingukaputeni eqenjini lesizwe, akakaze ayenze ibe nzima impilo yami. Uma sisensimini bengihlala ngazi ukuthi ukhona uzongilekelela, nami ngokunjalo. Ngokwami ubesengawadlala amasizini amathathu. Sengathi umphefumulo wakhe ungaphumula ngokuthula.”Kubadlali baseMzansi abafe ezingozini zomgwaqo kukhona uLesley Manyathela, Richard Henyekane, Cecil Lolo, Clifford Moleko, Gift Leremi, Sinethemba Jantjie, Mondli Cele noMlondi Dlamini. Emasontweni adlule kushone umdlali osemncane weKaizer Chiefs, uJames McFarlane.Inhlangano eyengamele ibhola, iSouth African Football Association (SAFA), esitatimendeni sikamengameli, uDanny Jordan, ikhale ngokushona kwabadlali ezingozini zomgwaqo. Igcizelele ukubaluleka kokugcina imithetho yomgwaqo.IPremier Soccer League (PSL), nayo ikhiphe isitatimende ngokushona kukaNgcongca.“IPremier Soccer League ishaqekile ngokushona ngokuzuma komdlali weBafana Bafana u-Anele Ngcongca. Uzokhunjulwa ngeqhaza alibambile kwiMamelodi Sundowns nokuzithoba kwakhe ngaphandle kwenkundla. Iligi idlulisa amazwi endunduzo emndenini wakwaNgcongca nakozakwabo.”Kubadlali baseNingizimu Afrika abebelila ngokushona kukaNgcongca kukhona uMoeneed Josephs, osanda kuwagaxa emgibeni, obhale ukuthi: “Kusenzima ukukholwa. RIP Anele.”U-ANELE Ngcongca (Kwesokudla) nayedlala nabo kwiGenk eBelgium u-Eric Matoukou waseCameroon noSamuel Yeboah waseGhana
title: Kukhalwe naphesheya kushona uNgcongca

text: UMDLALI weMamelodi Sundowns uPhakamani Mahlambi angase abolekwe AmaZulu FC.Yize imibiko ingaqinisekisiwe, kodwa ebuzwa ngalokhu, umqeqeshi woSuthu, u-Ayanda “Cobra” Dlamini,  akazange avume futhi akazange aphike.“Angithandi ukuxoxa ngomdlali ongekho kuMaZulu njengamanje, kuba lula ukuxoxa ngomdlali okhona. Ngakho akulula neze ukuphendula lolo daba,” kusho uDlamni izolo.UMahlambi ulizwa ngendaba ijezi kuBafana Ba Style selokhu kuqale isizini.Uvele izikhawu ezimbalwa ngesizini edlule kusekhona uPitso Mosimane kwiSundowns kodwa selokhu kubambe izintambo abaqeqeshi abathathu uManqoba “TV” Mngqithi, Rulani Mokwena noSteve “Mphathi” Komphela akaliboni elidlalayo.Inhlanzi ibonakala ishelwa ngamanzi kuMahlambi. Nezinkinga zangaphandle kwenkundla okubalwa kuzo uphuzo oludakayo, ngezinye zezinto okungenzeka ukuba zimenzela phansi uMahlambi ogqame kakhulu kwiBidvest Wits eminyakeni edlule.AmaZulu anqobe umdlalo wawo wokuqala kwiDStv Premiership ngoLwesithathu ehlula iBlack Leopards ngo 2-0. Iqhawe loSuthu kube uLuvuyo Memela oshaye amagoli amabili.“UMemela ukhombisile ukuthi kungani ethathwa njengomdlali osezingeni eliphezulu, nokuthi ulethelweni kuMaZulu. Angingabazi ukuthi usazowashaya amagoli, inkani nje masiqhubeka nokwakha amathuba. “Sidlale kahle kakhulu emidlalweni yethu emibili ngaphambi kweLeopards, sidlala ngokulingana nePirates ngaphambi kokushaywa iTS Galaxy nayo esasiyehlula ngomdlalo, kwaphika inhlanhla. Ukuzethemba kuzobuya manje kubadlali, sibheke ukuqhubeka nomgqigqo omuhle,” kulandisa uDlamini.Ngesikhathi uSandile Zungu ethenga Usuthu kuPatrick Sokhela, wathi ufuna iqembu liqede lisendaweni yesine kwi-log yeDStv Premiership uma kuphela isizini. Iningi lakubuka lokhu njengokuphupha emini, kwazise maningi amasizini livika izembe. Nokho abadlali abasayinile bazikhombise ngokusobala izinhloso zikaZungu, othe usekhathele ukuthi Inyokana Eluhlazana inikele ngamaphuzu kwamanye amaqembu.
title: UMahlambi angase abolekwe AmaZulu

text: ISIPHINDE yakhela ngamaqubu enye emaqenjini aseLondon adlala kwi-English Premier League, i-Arsenal isayinisa uWillian ovalelise kwiChelsea ngesonto eledlule.Ngokwesithathu eminyakeni emihlanu i-Arsenal ivuka ngesilomo somdlali weChelsea kwazise ngo-2015 isayinise ingwazi kanozinti waseCzech Republic, uPetr Cech olandelwe nguDavid Luiz.Isikhwishikhwishi saseBrazil, uWillian, sisayine iminyaka emithathu kusuka ngokuqala kwesizini ka-2020/2021.Izindaba zokusayina kwi-Arsenal kwalo mdlali oneminyaka engu-32, zidalulwe yiyo i-Arsenal kwiwebsite yayo (www.arsenal.com) ngoLwesihlanu.UWillian, odlalele iBrazil kumaFifa World Cup amabili (2014 ekhaya nango-2018 eRussia) ugabe ngamava emidlalo engu-600 kumasizini angu-13 ebholeni elikhokhelayo.Ufike kwiChelsea ngo-2013 esuka kwi-Anzhi Makhachkala yaseRussia, abefike kuyo esuka kwiShaktar Donetsk afike kuyo ngo-2007.KukwiDonetsk lapho eqale khona ukuwola izicoco enqoba i-Ukranian Premier League kane kanjalo ne-Uefa Cup ngo-2009.Uqale ukudlala ibhola elikhokhelayo kwiCorinthians yaseBrazil.KwiChelsea unqobe iPremier League, yiFA Cup ne-Europa League ababhubhise kuyo i-Arsenal ngo 4-0 nyakenye.Kungathi i-Arsenal ichomela iChelsea ngokuphanyeka imininingwane ethi uWillian kwiBlues ushiye edlale imidlalo engu-339, washaya amagoli angu-63 wakha amanye angu-56.Ephefumula ngomdlali wakhe wokuqala ukumsayinisa umqeqeshi we-Arsenal, uMikel Arteta, uzwakalise intobeko yodwa.“Ngicabanga ukuthi ungumdlali ongenza omkhulu umehluko kithi,” kusho u-Arteta ngalo mdlali obebuka nezihlwele i-Arsenal iguqisa iChelsea ngo 2-1 kowamanqamu eFA Cup kamuva.“Besilokhu simbukela eduze kulezi zinyanga ezimbalwa ezedlule. Besihlose ukuqinisa ngomdlali wasesiswini ohlaselayo kanjalo nasezimpondweni. Usinika okuningi okuhlukile njengomdlali. Ukwazi ukudlala izindawo ezintathu noma ezine ezehlukene. Akukho angakakuboni ebholeni kodwa ukuba netshisekelo yokuphinda aze la kuyajabulisa.“Ngisachazwe yizo zonke izingxoxo esengibenazo naye.”KwiBrazilian uWillian usedlale ka-70 washaya amagoli ayisishiyagalolunye kusukela ngo-2011. Ngaphezu kwamaWorld udlale nakwi-2015 Copa America, Copa America Centenario kanjalo no-2019 Copa America okuyisicoco asize iSelecao yasinqoba.Usevele ugixatshezwe ngejezi unombolo-12.
title: Yakhele ngamaqubu enye kwi-Arsenal isayinisa uWillian

text: I-ANC ithi izohlangana neSilo samaBandla mayelana nodaba lo mhlaba ngoba le nhlangano ayikasithathi isinqumo mayelana nokweseka umbiko wowayengumengameli uMnuz Kgalema Motlanthe ngalolu daba.Umbiko kaMotlanthe wethimba elajutshwa mayelana nendaba yokubuyiswa komhlaba lanquma ukuthi kuqedwe nge-Ingonyama Trust, okuthukuthelise iMbube.Ohola imikhankaso yokhetho kwi-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthe uMotlanthe waveza umbono wakhe ikakhulu ngodaba lweNgonyama.“Asikho isinqumo mayelana nokuthi seseka umbiko kaMotlanthe. Ayikho indaba yokuthi siphikisana neSilo noma sifuna ukudla umhlaba. Isilo sikhuluma asizange sigqugquzele udlame, sithe sizokhuluma nanezinkantolo ngodaba lweNgonyama Trust. Sizoxoxisana neSilo ngalolu daba. Asinawo umbono wokuthi siphuce amaZulu umhlaba,” kusho uMbalula.Uthe kodwa umgomo wokuthi kubuyiswe umhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo usamile.UMbalula usho lokhu nje, uMengameli wale nhlangano uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa ukulesi sifundazwe ngale mpelasonto njengoba kunomkhankaso, iThuma Mina.Embizweni yeSilo ngoLwesithathu iMbube ixwayise ngokuthi kuzoshuba uma kukhona abacabanga ukusiphuca umhlaba waso.URamaphosa uqale ngokuvakashela ibandla iPentecostal eMpangeni namhlanje ekuseni, kuzothi ntambama adlulele eChatsworth lapho ezohlangana khona nomphakathi wakule ndawo.URamaphosa usemkhankasweni wokuvakashela izifunda ezintathu zale nhlangano kule mpelasonto okuyiMusa Dladla, eThekwini bese egcina KwaDukuza lapho ezokhipha namatayitela.Umxhumanisi wethimba lesikhashana le-ANC esifundazweni, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe okuseqhulwini udaba lobumbano nokusebenzisana.“NgoMgqibelo uzoba sesifundeni KwaDukuza lapho kuzoqala khona uhambo lwamakhilomitha amahlanu kusukwa eSatu Park kuyiwa kuwadi 16 kugqugquzelwe abantu ukuthi bazivocavoce,” kusho uZikalala.URamaphosa uzobuye avakashele imindeni yamakholwa ashona kuqhunyiswa ngebhomu ekhonza eVerulam.
title: I-ANC ayikasithathi isinqumo ngokaMotlanthe

text: OWESIFAZANE (35) waseNhlazatshe, eMgungundlovu, usola inyanga yodumo lokuthwalisa ngokumdlwengula iphindelela ithi iyamthwalisa.Uphinde asole le nyanga yaseJozini nangokumqola imoto iMercedes C180 Kompressor, yayibhala amagama ayo.Owesifazane uthe waya enyangeni nabangani bakhe besifazane ababilili ngemuva kokuzwa le nyanga izishaya isifuba emsakazweni Ukhozi FM, ithi igwilikisa abantu abanamabhizinisi.“Ngizondla ngokudayisa izingubo zokugqoka. Saya emzini wenyanga ngoNovemba 4, safika ingekho sase siyilinda. Yathi ukuze isisize kufanele sikhokhe uR15 800 umuntu ngamunye.“Ngenxa yokuthi sasingenayo leyo mali, yathi masibambise ngemoto yami engangizoyilanda uma sesithole imali eyayiyifuna. Yathatha i-log book yami ithi izoyibika ngayo imoto emsamo.”Uthe inyanga yambizela eceleni lapho ihlolela khona, yambuza imibuzo ngaye.“Yangibuza umyeni, ngathi uma ngiyitshela ukuthi sewashona, yangisabisa ngokuthi ngizofa maduze ngoba umyeni wami ufuna ukungilanda. Yathi izongisiza ngomuthi okumele iwugcobe ebuntwini bayo bese iphinda igcoba isitho sami sangasese sihlangane ukuze kuzosuka ithunzi lomyeni wami."Umgilwa uthe wadideka ikhanda wagcina esevuma engaqondile.“Ngaya endlini alala kuyo lo baba, wafike wangidlwengula engagqoke ngisho ikhondomu."Akuphelanga nemizuzu ewu-7, wachama maqede wageza umphambili wakhe ngamanzi, wabe esewusula ngethawula, maqede wangiphonsela lona ukuba nami ngizisule.”Uthe le nyanga iphinde yamdlwengula kwaze kwaba kabili izinsuku zilandelana futhi seyimgoyise ekamelweni layo.Abangani bakhe babuyela emuva ngetekisi.“Ngezintathakusa zangoLwesibili, le nyanga yathi angivuke ngoba kukhona abazongihambisa ekhaya ngoba sengilaphekile futhi yanginikeza isigubhu eyathi ngizosifaka uju nomuthi eyathi ngizowugcoba kuR1000 engangizowufaka kwi-account yami yasebhange ukuze ngithole itshe lemali.”Uthe wafika kwakhe wakwenza konke, kodwa uma kuphela izinsuku eziyisikhombisa kungenzeki lutho, waqala ukufonela inyanga.Umgilwa uthi uqhubekile nokuzama ukuxhumana nenyanga kodwa yangabe isayingena indaba yakhe, yamsabisa.“Ngigcine ngithola ongiyale ngokuthi mangiyoyivulela icala ngoba ibingasafuni nokubuyisa imoto yami.“Ngizwe kuthiwa imoto isiyibiza ngomsizi wayo futhi seyikhangisa ngayo,” kuzikhalela umgilwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant Colonel Thulani Zwane ukuqinisekisile ukuthi likhona icala lokudlwengula elivulelwe inyanga esiteshini samaphoyisa eNgwavuma.“Okwamanje akukaboshwa muntu.”
title: 'Udlelwe imoto yinyanga yamdlwengula' eyothwala

text: ISEKWE ngemizuzu yokugcina iBanyana Banyana eqophe umlando ingena kwiNdebe yoMhlaba okokuqala.Izolo iSouth African Football Association (Safa) imemezele uxhaso lweminyaka emithathu lwamasudi kanokusho azogqokwa yiBafana Bafana neBanyana.Uxhaso, oluvela enkampanini yaseTurkey, i-D’S Damat, kuthiwa belungahlelelwe iBanyana ekuqaleni kwezingxoxo. Nokho ukushaya kwayo into ecokeme emqhudelwaneni i-Africa Women’s Cup of Nations, kuyakhele ugazi kubaxhasi, baqoka ukuyifaka.Abaxhasi kade beswenkisa iKaizer Chiefs eminyakeni edlule isaqeqeshwa nguMuhsin Ertugral waseTurkey. Uxhaso lufike kuvele kunesikhalo ngokuthi iBanyana ayixhasekile ngendlela uma kuqhathaniswa neBafana. Amabhonasi atholwayo ashiyana kude kakhulu.Isikhulu se-D’S Damat, uFerhat Saridogan, sithe udumo lwakamuva lweBanyana yilona olwenze bayicabangele.“Kade saqala ukukhuluma neSafa mayelana nokugqokisa iqembu lesizwe. Sigcine sivumelene ngokuthi bagqoke izimpahla ezisezingeni eliphezulu. Sifuna baswenke baconse. Ngithe ngisesikhumulweni sezindiza kungekudalaa, ngabona ukuthakaselwa kweBanyana, nganquma ukuthi nayo siyifake kulolu xhaso.“Leli yithuba lethu lesibili eNingizimu Afrika. Eminyakeni edlule kade sixhase iChiefs, besisebancane. Isizathu sokuxhasa iChiefs sasicacile. Yingoba yayiqeqeshwa ngumqeqeshi waseTurkey. Manje sinqume ukugqokisa isizwe sonke ngokuqoka ukuxhasa amaqembu esizwe,” kusho uSaridogan.Umengameli weSafa, uDanny Jordan, ulwamukele ngezandla ezifudumele uxhaso wathi ubudlelwano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika neTurkey budala.“Ngesikhathi sifuna ukusingatha iNdebe yoMhlaba yaseseka iTurkey. Ngesikhathi silungiselela ukudlala iNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2002 sadlala neTurkey. Ngaphezu kwalokho baningi abadlali bethu abadlale khona. UShoes Moshoeu wayeyinsika yeFernebache okuyiqembu elikhulu. Kufanele ube sezingeni eliphezulu ukuze udlalele leli qembu. Lolu xhaso lufika ngesikhathi lapho amaqembu ethu esizwe enza kahle. Siyalujabulela kakhulu,” kusho uJordan.
title: Ibingabaliwe iBanyana oxhasweni lweSafa

text: USETHUBENI lokuhlabana ngendondo kumaSouth African Film and Television Awards (SAFTA) umethuli wezinhlelo uKatlego Maboe owazakhela udumo ethula izinhlelo kuSABC nezikhangiso zakwa-OUTSurance.UKatlego ungene emunxeni weBest Presenter ngomsebenzi awushaya kwiTropika Island of Treasure Curacao. Uqhathwe nomsakazi weMetro FM uDineo Ranaka, intatheli uDevi Sankaree Govender, Entle Bizane othula iHectic on 3, Palesa Tembe, Katchie Nzama noWaldimar Pelser.Lo methuli wezinhlelo ube sematheni ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngemuva kwesimemezelo samaSAFTA kwazise uke walandelwa yizigemegeme nyakenye kulandela ukusabalala kwe-video yakhe evuma eyokuphinga emshadweni.UKatlego wazidonsela amanzi ngomsele ngale video njengoba yaholela ekutheni akhonjwe afika ngayo kwa-OUTSuruance kwaqashwa abasha ukuqhubeka nomsebenzi wakhe.Lokhu kwathusa abaningi kwazise zazisathakaselwa abaningi izikhangiso zakhe ayebonakala kuzo ekhuluma nabanikazi bezimoto ethi ‘chenca daideng’.Kwabahambe phambili eminxeni ehlukeni kubalwa iTshedza Pictures ekhiqiza i-The River neThe Legacy esethubeni lokunqoba izindondo eziwu-24.
title: Uqokwe kuma SAFTA owaxoshwa kwi OutSurance

text: Akuqali ukuthi uKO ahlangane noNandi benze ingoma njengoba benza ngo-2015, bekhipha ethi Skhanda Love.Ingoma abazoyikhipha ithi Say U Will.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uKO uthe ngemuva kokukhipha ingoma iSkhanda Love, uNandi wabuya kuye wazomtshela ukuthi abenze enye.“Abantu bakuleli bayijabulela kakhulu ingoma yethu yokuqala nathi sabona ukuthi sisebenzile kuyona. Ngemuva kokuthi uNandi angitshele ukuthi asenze enye ingoma ngavuma kodwa kwangaba bikho okwenzakalayo okuthe ngonyaka odlule saqala sasebenza kule ngoma ezophuma manje okuyinto esiyijabulela kakhulu ukuthi ekugcineni sekwenzekile,” kuchaza uKO.Uthe le ngoma ikhuluma ngothando futhi icishe iyele kuSkhanda Love.“Ayifani nse kodwa ikhuluma ngothando nayo. Okujabulisa kakhulu ukuthi sesenze ngisho i-video yayo ezophuma ekuqaleni kukaSepthemba. Sisebenze kanzima ukuyihlanganisa ngenxa yokuthi njalo sicabangela abalandeli bethu,” kuchaza uKO.Ngaphandle kwale ngoma uKO uthe lo nyaka ube muhle kakhulu kuyena njengoba ingoma yakhe ethi Supa Dupa yenze kahle futhi abantu bayamukela ngezandla ezimhlophe.“UNkulunkulu uzibonisile kimi njengoba ngiphinde ngahlangana nezinkampani ezinkulu, ngasebenzisana nazo. Izimpahla zami zingenile ezitolo ezinkulu kuleli okuyinto ejabulisayo.”Uphinde waveza ukuthi ngenyanga ezayo uzokhipha i-albhamu yakhe, wathi usekulinde ngabomvu ukuthi abantu bakuleli bayizwe.
title: UNandi noKO bahlanganise olunye ulozolo

text: ABOSHWE esemsebenzini amaphoyisa amabili esiteshini eSiphingo, ngamacala enkohlakalo nokweba.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe aboshwe ngemuva kokuba kufike ummangali esiteshini ezovulela amaphoyisa amacala eSiphingo, ngoMgqibelo.UNaicker uthe ummangali owunogada ubike ukuthi ubeqaphe indawo yamabhizinisi eSiphingo, ngesikhathi amaphoyisa amabili elesifazane nelesilisa, efika emhloma imibuzo ngezinsolo zokuthi udayisa ugwayi.“Unogada uvumile wase ewayisa lapho ewubeke khona ugwayi. Abe esemyalela ukuthi apakishe amakhathoni kagwayi awu-48 evenini lamaphoyisa, zamkhalela. Aphoqe unogada ukuthi akhokhe uR1 500 ase emdedela ngaphandle kokumbeka icala,” kuchaza uNaicker.Kube sekuthintwa ithimba lamaphoyisa elilwa nenkohlakalo esifundazweni. Kuthe uma kufika abaseshi balo esiteshini, ummangali wabakhombisa lawa maphoyisa abesemsebenzini, zawakhalela.Kulindeleke ukuthi lawa maphoyisa avele eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini, namuhla ngamacala enkohlakalo nokweba.
title: Kuboshwe amaphoyisa esemsebenzini

text: Ukusho lokhu kwi-video ayifake kwiTwitter echaza ngesehlakalo sokuphinde ahlaselwe yisifo senhliziyo esimenze wangeniswa egunjini labagula kakhulu ngesonto eledlule.URobert useke wahlaselwa yisifo senhliziyo izikhathi ezimbili eminyakeni edlule.Kwi-video uveza ukuthi ngemuva kokungazizwa kahle enezinhlungu esifubeni wathatha imoto waya esibhedlela eyobheka ukuthi yini imbangela yokungazizwa kahle.“Ngemuva kokufika esibhedlela ngizithole sengisegunjini labagula kakhulu engihlale kulo cishe isonto lonke. Sengiphumile nokho egunjini labagula kakhulu, sengikwelabalulamayo. Ngiyabonga kakhulu kubahlengikazi nodokotela ngomsebenzi abawenzile esibhedlela engikuso esinodokotela abasezingeni eliphezulu. Nakubona bonke akade besiza ngiyabonga kakhulu,” kusho uMarawa.Uthe yize eseluleme kodwa udlulisa umyalezo kubantu ngoba ufuna bayigade impilo yabo.“Impilo ibalulekile kakhulu. Okwamanje odokotela basazama ukubheka ukuthi alikho yini ihlule elidale lokhu yingakho ngisagcinwe khona namanje. Nokuhamba-ke kube nomthelela ngoba ngisanda kubuya e-Egypt,” kusho uMarawa.Uthe okuningi uzokuxoxa uma kuhamba isikhathi kodwa ubonga yonke imithandazo yabantu.Ngesonto eledlule kuSAfm, uWalter Mokoena, uthe insizwa ezakhele igama ekuhlaziyeni ezemidlalo, uDavid Kekana, isesibhedlela igula kakhulu.Ukusho lokhu ohlelweni lukaThabiso Mosia wabe esecela ukuthi abantu bamthandazele.
title: ‘Abantu abazihlole uma bengazizwa’

text: EZINYANGENI eziyisithupha ezedlule uSiya Kolisi ubehola amaBhokobhoko kwiNdebe yoMhlaba ayinqoba engukapteni, kodwa manje usebhekene nolunye uhlobo lwempi njengoba esefake isandla lapha ezweni lakhe, ukusiza labo abahlukunyezwe ushintshompilo olufike nokubhebhetheka kweCovid-19.Ukuhola kwakhe amaBhokobhoko anqoba indebe yombhoxo eJapan, ngoNovemba, kumakhele udumo umhlaba wonke, okufakazelwe nawukuthi aqokwe njengomdlali ovelele eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2019.Njengoba izwe libhekene neCoronavirus uKolisi nenkosikazi yakhe uRachel baqale inhlangano iKolisi Foundation enikele ngokudla emndenini edinga usizoi. Inhlangano yabo iqale ngokunikela ngezibulalimagciwane nezifonyo kodwa manje seyengeze ngokodla. "Sizama ukusiza lapho esingakwazi ukufaka isandla, ikakhulukazi emalokishini lapho okunzima khona ngempela ngoba abantu abanawo ngisho umhlaba wokulima. Ezindaweni zasemakhaya abanye abantu banawo umhlaba kodwa amanzi abanawo," kusho uKolisa. NgoLwesine ePitoli kubonakale izinkulungwane zabantu bebambe ulayini belinde ukuthola izijumbana zokudla okuthunyelwe emphakathini kulesi sikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe. Lokhu kwakhe isithombe esicacile sokuthi ijule kangakanani inkinga yibubha kuleli ebuye yengezwa ukuvalwa kwezwe. UKolisi, osaqhubeka nokwenza umsebenzi wenhlangano yakhe ngaphansi kokuvalwa kwezwe, uthe muva nje kumthusile akubone eLimpopo. "Bengithi ngiyakwazi ukuhlupheka ngaphambi kokuvakashela iLimpopo. Ngibone abantu abangenawo amanzi, bephuza amanzi emifuleni okuphuza kuyo izilwane. Ubona nengane igeza khona lapho, kwaba buhlungu ukubona leya nto," kusho uKolisi.Lo mdlali weStormers kule mpelasonto uzobuyela elokishini lakhe iZwide, eBhayi, ukuyolula isandla kwabaswele."Elokishini lami sisiza abantu abangaphezulu kuka-500, kuzo zonke izindawo zangasekhaya engangihamba ngicela isinkwa ngisakhula. Manje ngibuyela kuzo kulezi zinyanga ezizayo ukuphosa esivivaneni."
title: UKolisi ukhathazekile ngabahluphekayo ngesikhathi seCovid-19

text: SEKUNTWELA ezansi ngephupho leminyaka likaSolwazi Joseph Shabalala lokusungula isikole esizofundisa ngomculo womdabu iLadysmith Black Mambazo Music Academy, eMnambithi lapho edabuka khona.Lezi zindaba zivele esithangamini sabezindaba ebesisemzini kaMshengu eMnambithi izolo. Amalungu eMambazo abezocela izinhlanhla kuMshengu njengoba eqokwe eminxeni emibili kuma-60th Grammy Awards ezoba seMadison Square Gardens, eNew York, e-USA, ngoJanuwari 28.Isikhulu sikaMasipala i-Alfred Duma, eMnambithi, uMnuz Brian Xaba sithe sesikhona nesiza sesikole.“Ikhona nemali esesiyifakile singumasipala. NoMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nezokuVakasha nowezobuCiko namaSiko uyifakile.Sesihlanganise uR15 million. Sisaqhubeka nokucela enye,” kusho uXaba.Ucele osomabhizinisi ukuba bafake isandla. Unxenxe amalungu eBlack Mambazo ukuba acele uxhaso emazweni azohanjelwa yiqembu.Ilungu elidala kuMambazo * -Albert Mazibuko, lithe lijabule ngokufezeka kwaleli phupho.Lithe beliphatheka kabi uma lisemazweni libona kuza nezingane ezincane ezinkundleni zokucobelela ngolwazi ngesicathamiya.“Ziyangijabulisa izindaba engizizwa namuhla ngoba kuningi ebesinesifiso sokwabelana ngakho nabantu bakuleli.Sengikulangazelele ukuba yingxenye yalesi sikole,” kusho uMazibuko. Uthe abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abakhululeke ngoba bazowudla umhlanganiso emkhakheni weBest World Album ngeShaka Revisited: 30th Anniversary neBest Children’s Album ngeSongs For Peace & Love For Kids& Parents Around The World.“Kulokhu nginethemba elikhulu. Ngiyazi ukuthi lama-award amabili awethu. Anosihlangabeza esikhumulweni sezindiza khona niyongibona ngiwaphethe,” kusho uMazibuko.IMeya yase-Alfred Duma uMnuz Vincent Madlala ithe aMambazo awabuye nazo lezi zindondo. Uthe bayawubonga umsebenzi weMambazo. UMshengu uvukwe wusinga wacula naMambazo, yize ebehleli esihlalweni ngenxa yokungaphatheki kahle.Ucule naMambazo ingoma ethi Ngizobambelela Esiphambanweni neHomeless. UMshengu uyabonakala ukuthi useyaziqinisa.Uqinise aMambazo idolo, wathi angabi nalo uvalo.“Ngiyazi ukuthi kuba njani uma niya emiklomelweni. Kukhulu okuhle okuzayo,” kusho uMshengu.Imenenja yaMambazo uXolani Majozi ithe ziningi izinhlelo abanazo njengoba kulo nyaka iqembu ligubha iminyaka engu-58 lasungulwa.“Imicimbi emikhulu izoba ngo-2020 selineminyaka engu-60,” kuphetha uMajozi.USbongiseni uthe bebezothatha izibusiso kuyise bese belifulathela leli kusasa.
title: SiseMome isikole saMambazo

text: INKANTOLO yoMthethosisekelo kulindeleke ukuba ikhiphe usuku ezothula ngalo isinqumo ngombango wobuholi ebandleni lamaNazaretha njengoba izolo icala lingazange libe khona.Leli cala liphakathi kwabaseThembezinhle nabaseBuhleni. EBuhleni baholwa yiNkosi Mduduzi “Nyazilwezulu” Shembe, eThembezinhle baholwa iNkosi Phinda Shembe, emuva kokuba kukhothame iNkosi Vela “Misebeyelanga” Shembe.Isolezwe likhuluma nommeli waseThembezinhle uMnuz Trevor Nkosi, uthe bebenolwazi lokuthi icala lizoba khona izolo njengoba kwakubhalwe kanjalo kwi-website yoMthethosisekelo kodwa kwangenzeka lokho  ngenxa yokuba matasa kwamajaji namanye amacala.“Icala belingekho ohlwini lwamacala namhlanje, kwakufakwe ukuthi lizoba khona  namhlanje kwi-website yenkantolo kodwa kwabuye kwasuswa lokho. Silindele unobhala wasenkantolo ukuba asazise ukuthi amajaji alungele nini ukuba athule isinqumo. Amajaji besazi ukuthi bese ekulungele ukuletha isinqumo. Sesizozwa ngawo, ngoba ngisho nomabhalane wenkantolo uthe uzolindela wona amajaji ukuba akhiphe usuku,” kusho uNkosi.Besibhekwe ngabomvu lesi sinqumo njengoba kuzoba isona sokugcina kuleli cala eselidonse kusukela ngo-2011.Umbango wasuka emuva kokukhothama kweNkosi uVimbeni Shembe uThingolwenkosazana.Okwasusa umsindo kwaba ukuthi iNkosi Mqoqi Ngcobo yamemezela uNyazilwezulu njengomholi ekubeni kuthiwa yayingagunyaziwe.Ummeli uMnuz Zwelabantu Buthelezi waba nobufakazi obuqinile bokuthi umholi ofanele yiMisebeyelanga ngoba wasebenzisa incwadi eyasayinwa wuThingolwenkosazana.Icala lasuka Nkantolo eNkulu eThekwini, laya kweNkulu yaseMgungundlovu, ladlulswa layiswa eNkantolo yokuDluliswa kwamaCala eBloemfontein.UNkosi uthe yize engenalwazi lokuthi isinqumo sizokhishwa nini kodwa kungaba noma yinini. Uma nje amajaji esekulungele ukusikhipha.
title: Amajaji azomemezela usuku lwesinqumo kwelakaShembe

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEIPHINI lomqeqeshi kwiBanyana Banyana uThinasonke Mbuli, likhathazwa wukuthi iqembu lesizwe laseSwatini liyincwadi evaliwe, kweqembu lesizwe laseSwatinikanti bazobhekana namuhla koweCosafa Women Championship ngo-3.30 ntambama, eWolfson Stadium ePort Elizabeth.Umsizi kaDesiree Ellis, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi  bahlalelwe yijoka lokuthola indlela yokudlala yezitha zabo.Uthe akwaziyo ngeqembu wukuthi sekunesikhathi eside liyingxenye yeCosafa, kanti okuyingozi wukuthi libukeka likhula kulo mdlalo.UMbuli obuye aqeqeshe iqembu lase-University of Western Cape,  uthe ubufakazi balokhu wukubuya kwe-Eswatini kade idliwa, yagcina inqobe ngo-4-2 emdlalweni wokuqala.IBanyana inqobe umdlalo wokuvula kuGroup A ngo 2-0 ihlula i-Angola.“Ukuhlasela kweCovid-19 kwenze amaqembu alingana. Wonke amazwe anabadlali abantekenteke ngokomzimba nasengqondweni. Asazi kumele silindeleni kubona. Nakuba sikhonyile kowe-Angola kodwa bekubonakala ukuthi abadlali bethu badonsa kanzima. Ngaphambi komdlalo we-Angola, bese behlale izinyanga eziyisikhombisa bengadlali. Lokhu kwenza isimo sibenzima uma uzodlala neqembu elishaye amagoli amane,” kusho uMbuli.Uthe balindele ukunyuka kwezinga  kowe-Eswatini.“Kakukho okunye esiphupha ngakho ngaphandle kokuvikela isicoco seCosafa. Ngokuqhubeka kwemidlalo silindele izinga eliphezulu kubadlali bethu,” kuqhuba uMbuli.IBanyana izovala owamaqoqo noComoros ngoMsombuluko.Khonamanjalo, uSimphiwe Dludlu oqeqesha iqembu lakuleli lika-Under 17 elishaywe iZambia ngo-2-1 kowokuqala we-Under 17 Cosafa Cup,  uthe yize behluliwe kukhona okuhle akubonile kwezakhe.“Bahlale isikhathi eside bengadlali, akumele sibaphushe noma  sibathambele kakhulu. Kuningi okuhle engikubonile nesingakhela phezu kwakho. Amakhona nama-free kick ethu abemahle. Besibukeka kahle uma sihlasela.  Singenile emqhudelwaneni, uvalo alusekho,” kusho uDludlu.Uthe kungaba wenza iphutha uma engathi bazonqoba.“Okwami ukubabona  bekhumbuzana indlela yokudlala ndawonye. Kungabe ngidlala ngabadlali bami uma ngibaphushela ekuwineni iCosafa. Ngesingami lo mqhudelwano ngowokuqala amalungiselelo okuya kwiNdebe yoMhlaba.”
title: UMbuli uthi ukhathazekile Eswatini yincwadi evaliwe

text: USALE encela isithupha umsakazi weMbokodo FM ongumfundisi, obeyinxusa lenkampani iBlue Alpha Alliance Group okuthiwa ishaye yachitha nemali yabantu.UMfundisi uNdlelenhle Khanyile, owethula uhlelo oluthi UJesu Umlamuleli, emsakazweni iMbokodo FM uyazisola ngokusebenzisana nale nkampani.Uveze ukuthi leli bhanoyi liphahlazeke nanemali yakhe njengoba ubethenge amasheya kaR38 000 kuyo.“Bese kuphele izinyanga ezintathu ngisebenzisana neBlue Alpha, ngibamaketha emsakazweni iMbokodo neVibe FM. Bangithola ngesikhathi nami ngiyofaka imali yami enguR38 000. Bezwa ukuthi ngisebenza emsakazweni, bacela ukuthi ngisebenze nabo. Bese ngike ngayithola imali enguR16 200,” kusho uKhanyile.Uthe ubone ngeledlule ukuthi inkampani isibalekile emuva kokuthi izikhulu zayo zingafiki emhlanganweni owawusedolobheni eThekwini.Uqhube wathi ujube ummeli wakhe ukuthi amsize avulele inkampani icala lokukhwabanisa nokudicilela phansi isithunzi sakhe njengoba engumsakazi ongumfundisi.“Abantu bangishayla ucingo bengibuza ngeBlue Alpha. Ngiyabachazela ukuthi nami kangisabatholi ezingcingweni ngakho abantu abanezinkontileka abavule amacala,” kusho uKhanyile.UNksz Lindeni Mahlaba (27) waseHammarsdale uthi ulahlekelwe nguR18 000 kule nkampani, awutshale ngo-Agasti nonyaka. Bekulindeleke ukuthi aqale ukuthola uR6 300 ngoNovemba 20 obezoyithola izinyanga eziwu-12.“Ngifake imali yami kwiBlue Alpha Alliance emuva kokuzwa uMfundisi Ndlelenhle Khanyile ekhuluma ngayo emsakazweni iMbokodo FM. Wathi le nkampani ifaka izimoto zayo kwi-Uber neTaxify, idinga abantu abazothenga amasheya. Wathi uma echaza imali etholwayo emuva kokuthenga amasheya ngaheheka,” kusho uNksz Mahlaba.Omunye umgilwa (42) waseNanda ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe ubefake uR38 000 ngoSepthemba 30, eyayibolekwe ngudadewabo omncane ebhange.“Kuduma ikhanda. Ekhaya kakunakudla. Bengilindele ukuhola ekupheleni kwale nyanga. Sithole imiyalezo ethi akekho umuntu ozokhokhelwa. Kuyacaca ukuthi babalekile nemali yethu,” kusho lo owesifazane.Uqhube wathi akazi ukuthi uzosikhokha ngani isikweletu ngoba waphelelwa wumsebenzi ngo-2017.Imizamo yokuzwa uhlangothi lweBlue Alpha Alliance kayiphumelelanga, ucingo lwabo kalubanjwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCapt Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aseMpumalanga aphenya ngecala lenkohlakalo emuva kokuthi owesifazane eqolwe imali yakhe.
title: Kucwile imali yomfundisi ongumsakazi ‘ebhanoyini’

text: IKHABHINETHI lakuleli lizosiphonsela inselelo isinqumo esikhishwe yiNorth Gauteng High Court, sokuthi imithetho eyashaywa ngaphansi kwesigaba sesine nesesithathu njengesiphambana namalungelo abantu akumthethosisekelo wezwe.Lokhu kushiwo uNgqongqoshe ehhovisi likaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, uMnuz Jackson Mthembu.Uthe inhloso yokushaywa kwale mithetho, kwakuwukusindisa impilo yabantu.NgokukaMthembu, inselelo bazophinde bayiphonsele kuyona inkantolo eyakhipha lesi sinqumo.“Ngaphambi kokuthi udaba siludlulisele eSupreme Court of Appeal, sizoqala kuyona iNorth Gauteng High Court okuyiyo eyakhipha lesi sinqumo,” usho kanje.Uthe ngeke baphuthume ngokuya eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo wezwe.Ngokusho kwakhe, ukushaywa kwemithetho ngaphansi kwezigaba ezagxekwa yile nkantolo, kwakuwukunciphisa ukusabalala kweCovid-19, njengoba namazwe omhlaba alishayela ihlombe elakuleli ngokwazi ukunqanda ukusabalala kweCovid-19.Uthe iKhabhinethi liphinde lavumelana ngokuthi njengezwe isikhathi semithetho esihambisana nokushaywa komthetho iDisaster Management Act yeCovid-19.Ngokwakhe, le mithetho ukusebenza kwayo kulindeleke ukuthi kuphele ngoJuni 15, kodwa iKhabhinethi yasandisa kuze kube uJulayi.Uthe iKhabhinethi lizokuqikelela ukuthi ihlale isengeza lesi sikhathi ngenyanga eyodwa noma ezimbili ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.“IKhabhinethi liphinde lazwalise ukukhathazeka ngokukhula kwesibalo sokusuleleka kwabantu ngeCovid-19 eWestern Cape. Yingakho uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ezohambela khona eyohlola isimo,” usho njalo.Kulolu hambo uRamaphosa uphelezelwa uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuzwelonke uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa Nqakula ophethe ezokuVikela kuleli, uNkk Angie Motshekga ophethe ezeMfundo eyisiSekelo, uMnuz Bheki Cele ophethe amaPhoyisa kuzwelonke, nabanye ongqongqoshe.Uthe iKhabhinethi liphakamise nokuthi kuvikelwe izingane njengoba kuyisonto lokugubha ukunakekelwa kwazo umhlaba wonke.Udaba lokushoda kwamanzi, uthe nalo alusalanga ngaphandle ngenkathi iKhabhinethi libhunga.“Ukwehla kwamazinga amanzi ikakhulukazi emadamini aseWestern Cape, kube ezinye zezinto ezixoxwe yiKhabhinethi njengezikhathazayo,” usho njalo.
title: Ikhabhinethi liphonsela inselelo isinqumo senkantolo ngemithetho kathaqa

text: I-IFP ichitha ukungezwani kwezimeya zayo zesifunda uMzinyathi kanti isola izitha ngalezi zinkulumo ethi zihlose ukuthi iphazamiseke okhethweni.Okhulumela i-IFP kuzwelonke, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uthe kungamanga ukuthi izimeya zabo zixabene zodwa eMzinyathi.Ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokusabalala kwemibiko yokuthi kuxabene ubendle eMzinyathi ngenxa yeMeya yakhona uMfundisi Petros Ngubane engasabhekani nezimeya zomasipala abangaphansi koMzinyathi ewuphethe.Lapha bekubalwa iMeya yaseMsinga, uNkk Zane Mthethwa Ngcobo, iPhini leMeya yaseMzinyathi, uNkk Ntombi Mdlalose, uSomlomo waseMzinyathi, uMnuz Falenkosi Sikhakhane neMeya yaseNquthu uMnuz Mabilabila Kunene.Lesi simo kuthiwa sesiphazamise nezinhlelo zentuthuko yamanzi okuthiwa uNgubane akasazilethi eNquthu ngenxa yokungezwani.“Lezi zimeya okuthiwa azizwani zilapha emhlanganweni weqembu. Ngakho lokhu kokuthi azibhekani kungamanga futhi kuyitulo labathile lokuphazamisa i-IFP ezinhlelweni zayo zokhetho luka-2019,” kusho uHlengwa.Ukungezwani kuthiwa kwenzeke ngemuva kokuba uNgubane ehambe wayobhula esangomeni esibhula ngesibuko samtshela ngabantu abamzondayo.IMeya uNgubane iziphendulele kulezi zinsolo njengoba kuthiwa iMeya yaseMsinga ibhalele nobuholi be-IFP ikhala ngaye baze babizwa emhlanganweni obungeSonto eledlule.“Angikwazi okushoyo. Ngicela ubuze kuye futhi angiwazi lowo mhlangano. Ngisemhlanganweni lapha eThekwini. Mina ngiyimeya yaseMzinyathi ngakho akukho engingakubanga nemeya yaseMsinga. Singamakhansela nayo eMzinyathi futhi sisebenza kahle,” kusho uNgubane.Elinye ikhansela le-IFP, elicele kugodlwe igama lalo, lithe isimo asisihle neze eMzinyathi akusebenzeki.“Esikubonayo wukuthi lesi sihlava ebesiseNdumeni sesikhuphukele lapha eMzinyathi. Lokhu kunengozi yokuthi i-ANC izophinde ihlekise ngathi. Sesimkhuzile uNgubane kodwa akezwa ngoba nemenenja kamasipala, uSipho Ndabandaba, usebuya ukuyobikela noMntwana ngalesi simo njengoba naye emnyakazisa. Sekubuya le nto yango-2011 lapho uNgubane abhala incwadi efungelwe wathi uThulasizwe Buthelezi ubehlangene noDkt Makhosi Khoza owayekwi-ANC noDkt Meshack Radebe eMonte Vista Casino, eNewcastle, behlela ukuketula uMntwana. Le nto yalihlakaza iqembu salimala. Namanje uyakuphinda lokho futhi inkinga uyaphika ungaze umkholwe. Uphika aze acashe ngokuthi konke akwenzayo usuke ethunywe uMntwana,” kusho ikhansela ebeliphatheke kabi.UNgubane uziqhelelanisile nale nkulumo.
title: Bachitha eyokuxabana kwezimeya ze-IFP

text: ISHAYA phansi ngonyawo i-Ajax Cape Town ngodaba lukaTendai Ndoro osolwa ngokwephula imithetho yeFifa.Ngeledlule iPremier Soccer League (PSL) ikhiphe isitatimende ebesiveza ukuthi iyaphikisana nesinqumo seDispute Resolution Chamber (DRC) sokuthi uNdoro aqhubeke nokudlala njengoba esolwa ngokudlalela amaqembu amathathu ehlukene ngesizini eyodwa okuphambene nemithetho yeFifa.I-Independent Online enguzakwabo weSolezwe iveze ukuthi iSafa isiyitholile incwadi evela kwiPSL efuna lolu daba ludlulele kumehluleli ozimele. Ophethe ezomthetho kwiSafa uTebogo Motlanthe uthe sekushoda babhalele i-Urban Warriors bayazise ngalokhu.NgoMgqibelo ngo-8.15 ebusuku, i-Ajax izodudulana ne-Orlando Pirates emdlalweni we-Last 32 yeNedbank Cup e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto, eGoli. Ngesonto eledlule ngesikhathi la maqembu edlala koweligi iPirates ifake isikhalo ngokudlaliswa kukaNdoro izeseka ngokuthi akanalo ilungelo lokuba yingxenye yomdlalo.Umqeqeshi we-Ajax uMuhsin Ertugral ubophele uNdoro ngoba ethi uvunwa yisinqumo seDRC. Ngempelasonto uNdoro uphinde wabonakala ngesikhathi i-Ajax idlala nePolokwane City nayo efake isimangalo ngaphambi komdlalo.Ethintwa yileli phephandaba ngodaba lukaNdoro, uMich d’Avry oyinhloko yabaqeqeshi kwi-Ajax, ugcizelele ukuthi basazombophela lo mdlali uma besibona isidingo.“Angizimisele ngokuphawula ngodaba lukaNdoro kwabezindaba ngoba lusezandleni zabameli futhi kuningi okushiwo ngalo. Engingakutshela kona wukuthi njengoba edlalile emidlalweni eyedlule, nasemidlalweni ezayo sisazoqhubeka nokubomphela uma umqeqeshi embona efanelwe wukudlala. Uma kunokunye esibona kunesidingo sokuthi sazise umphakathi ngakho sizokhipha isitatimende,” kusho * -D’Avry.Uma igcine ichithwa yicala i-Ajax evika izembe ingazithola isiphucwa amaphuzu eyawathola kudlala uNdoro kwiligi. Amaqembu adlale kuwona kule sizini ka-2017/18 yi-Orlando Pirates, Al Fasaily yase-Saudi Arabia ne-Ajax asedlala kuyona njengamanje.Iningi labathandi bakanobhtshuzwayo ebelizitshela ukuthi i-Ajax izophumuza abadlali bayo abamqoka kwiNedbank ukuze bangaphazamiseki emkhankasweni wabo wokuvika izembe, baqambe beshilo ngoba leli qembu ngeke lisithambise isikimu.“I-Nedbank Cup siyayihlonipha kakhulu. Ngeke silenze iphutha lokuyithatha kancane ngoba sithi sifuna ukugxila emidlalweni yeligi. Kulesi simo esikusona sidinga ukunqoba yonke imidlalo ephambi kwethu ukuze sikhulise ukuzethemba. Ngeke silithambise iqembu lethu ngoba nakhu sithi noma singaphuma ukuze sizogxila emidlalweni yeligi. Ukushaya iqembu elisezingeni lePirates kuzokukhulisa kakhulu ukuzethemba kwethu njengeqembu,” kusho * -D’Avry.I-Ajax isanda kuthela iPirates ngehlazo lika 3-0 koweligi.“Uma singashaya iPirates maningi amathuba okuthi singafinyelela kowandulela amanqamu walo mqhudelwano uma ubheka amaqembu indlela aqhathwe ngayo,” kusho * -D’Avry.Imidlalo yeNedbank Cup Last 32:Namuhla: AmaZulu FC v Mthatha Bucks (King Zwelithini Stadium, 7.30pm); Ubuntu Cape Town v Polokwane City (Athlone Stadium, 7.30pm); Bidvest Wits v Cape Town City FC (Bidvest Stadium, 7.30pm)NgoLwesihlanu: Cape Town All Stars v Mamelodi Sundowns (Athlone Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: Swallows FC v Maritzburg United (Dobsonville Stadium, 3.30pm); Steenberg United v Orbit College (Parow Park, 3.30pm); Phiva Young Stars v Chippa United (Kabokweni Stadium, 3.30pm); Orlando Pirates v Ajax Cape Town (Orlando Stadium, 8.15pm): Super Eagles - Free State Stars (Goble Park, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Mariveni United v EC Bees (Old Peter Mokaba Stadium, 3.30pm); Kaizer Chiefs v Golden Arrows (FNB Stadium, 3.30pm); Happy Wanderers v Royal Eagles (Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium, 3.30pm; Celtic v SuperSport United (Dr Molemela Stadium, 3.30pm)
title: I-Ajax isazomdlalisa uTendai Ndoro

text: AMADODA abulala izintombi noma amakhosikazi awo asuke enesifo sokuzikhukhumeza, iNarcissistic Personality Disorder.Lokhu kuvezwe udokotela wezengqondo, uDkt Manqoba Myeni ngesikhathi ebuzwa yileli phephandaba ngomsusa wamadoda abulala abathandana noma abake bathandana nawo.Uthe mancane amathuba okuthi umuntu osuke enalesi sifo elapheke ngoba usuke engaziboni edinga usizo.Uveze ukuthi uThabani Mzolo osolwa ngokubulala umfundi waseMangosuthu University of Technology, uZolile Khumalo (21) unezimpawu zokuba nalesi sifo.Umbhalo wakuFacebook okusolwa ukuthi wawubhala ngemuva kwesigameko, lapho ethi uZolile ushone engasakwazanga ukumtshela ukuthi uyamxolela uthe, uveza ngokusobala ukuthi akaziboni enephutha ngesenzo sakhe.Ezinye zezimpawu athe abantu besifazane kumele babaleke ngazo zombili uma bezibona kwabathandana nabo yilezi:* Umuntu othanda ukukulawula, akutshele nokuthi ugqoke kanjani.* Umuntu okukhethela abangani, akushayele umthetho yize ningakashadi.* Ukuquliswa amacala uma uke wangaluphendula ucingo.* Ukuhlale usolwa ngokuthandana nabanye abantu ngale kobufakazi.* Umuntu ongaliboni iphutha lakhe, asole wena ngokuba yimbangela yalo.* Ukubizwa ngamagama alulazayo, isilima noma into engelutho.Ucebise abesifazane ukuthi bangahlali babekezele othandweni olunenkinga ngoba kusuke kukukhulu okunyelelayo.Uthe abantu abanalesi sifo uma sebelungile balunga kakhulu, kanjalo nokudinwa kwabo kuyedlulela, umuntu uphenduke ibhubesi.Ukugwetshwa kukaSandile Mantsoe iminyaka engu-32 ngokubulala intombi yakhe uNksz Karabo Mokoena kujabulise abaningi, ngethemba lokuthi sizothumela umyalezo kulabo abahlukumeza abesifazane.
title: FUNDA: Izimpawu ezikhomba ukuthi kumele umbalekele owesilisa othandana naye

text: KUSOLWA osonkontileka abangeneme ngokungawatholi amathenda, ngezigameko zokucekelwa phansi kwempahla kaMasipala weTheku.Kamuva nje kuvalwe i-valve yedamu lamanzi eCato Manor, eliphakela idolobha iTheku nemiphakathi elizungezile esehlweni sangoMsombuluko ekuseni.IMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, isigxeke yangahloniza lesi senzo, esichaze ngobugebengu.UKaunda uthe izigilamkhuba zivale i-valve, yasikwa kwenzelwa ukuthi kungabi khona ozokwazi ukuyilawula ukuze amanzi aphume.Uqhube wathi ngosuku lwesehlo bahlangane nabasebenzi bomkhandlu, kwavunyelwana ngokuthi kuzovulwa amacala emaphoyiseni.Njengamanje umkhandlu ukhuluma nabaholi bamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, ukuze kungenele ubunhloli bakhona ukuze kuzoboshwa abathintekayo, babhekane nengalo yomthetho.“Uma ngabe unezimoto zamanzi, okuthi uma kuvalwe amanzi usizakale ngoba ufuna imali kaDisemba, musa ukuyonqamula ingqalasizinda kamasipala ngoba ufuna siqashe izimoto zakho zamanzi,” kusho uKaunda.Umkhandlu usezinhlelweni zokwengeza isibalo samaloli awo athuthela umphakathi amanzi, bese uqasha abantu abazosebenzela umasipala.Lokhu umasipala ukwenza ukuze ugweme ukuthembela kosonkontileka abazimele, uKaunda athe yizo lezi kwesinye isikhathi ezivala ama-valve khona kuzoqashwa zona.Uthe babe nenkinga enkulu edolobheni, amanzi engekho ngoba leli damu liphakela izindawo eziningi.Ucele abangawatholanga amathenda eThekwini ukuthi bangalokothi baye kwingqalasizinda yomkhandlu beyoyicekela phansi.Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi abantu balinde, kulandelwe imigudu yezomthetho yokukhishwa kwamathenda.“Uma sikuyeka singenzi lutho ngalokhu, zizoqhubeka njalo lezi zenzo. Esikujabulelayo wukuthi singenele ngokushesha, sawabuyisa amanzi ngokuphazima kweso,” kusho uKaunda.Kuphoqeleke ukuthi umkhandlu uxolise emphakathini futhi uwubikele ngokushesha ukuthi yingani amanzi ungenawo.Phambilini kunosonkontileka abathuthela umasipala amanzi abasabisa ngokukhinyabeza indlela okuhanjiselwa ngayo umphakathi amanzi uma umkhandlu uqhubeka nokubancisha amathenda.
title: Icikekile imeya ngabafuna amathenda ngobudlova

text: USOSIZINI umndeni wentombazane ekhubazekile okuthiwa ishone ngesikhathi kusha imijondolo yaseThandanani eGreenwood Park.Kuthiwa uZama Ngidi (13), obengakwazi ukukhuluma nokuhamba kahle, ubehleli endlini yedwa ngoMgqibelo emuva kwehora lesithupha ntambama ngesikhathi kuqala umlilo ogcine ushisa imijondolo engu-46.Unina omncane ongahlali naye, uNksz Rejoice Cele (35), ukhihle isililo ngesikhathi ezama ukuchaza ngakubona ngesikhathi kukhishwa isidumbu sendodakazi yakhe athe sabe sesingamathambo.Uthe uZama, obefunda esikoleni sabakhubazekile iGolden Hours Special Needs School, ubehlala noyise nomfowabo omdala uNjabulo (17) kodwa uyise ubebashiye bodwa ngempelasonto wathi uya emakhaya.“Kujwayelekile ukuthi uyise abashiye bodwa aye emakhaya. Nangesikhathi kusha ubengekho esemakhaya. Ngibe sengimshayela ucingo ngimtshela ukuthi ingane ishe yashona. Ngokujwayelekile ubengitshela uma ehamba ngiyithathe ingane ngihlale nayo angazi ukuthi kwenziwe yini ukuthi angasho,” kusho uNksz Cele.Umfowabo kaZama, uNjabulo, uthe ubehleli naye usuku lonke ngosuku okwenzeke ngalo lesi sigameko.“Ubaba ubeshiye imali ngahamba ngayomthengela into azoyidla ngabuya. Ngiphinde ngaphuma futhi emini ngayothenga ngabuya ngabona sengathi uyazela ngathi akalale. Bengisaphume isikhashana nje ngesikhathi ngizwa abantu bethi kuyasha ekhaya,” kuchaza uNjabulo.Akucaci ukuthi umlilo uqalwe yini.UNksz Cele uthe ngesikhathi abantu bezama ukucima umlilo usumkhulu kakhulu kungasangeneki ngaphakathi.Lo mlilo uthungeleke waze washisa neminye imijondolo yomakhelwane.Ikhansela lakule ndawo, uNkk Phindile Ndlela, lithe likholwa wukuthi wumoya owenze ukuthi umlilo usheshe ubhebhetheke. Udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini kaZama.“Siyazwelana kakhulu nomndeni ngokulahlekelwa kwawo. Sinabo futhi sisazoba nabo kusona sonke lesi sikhathi esinzima,” kusho uNkk Ndlela.Ubonge omakhelwane abakhele le mijondolo ngokulethela labo abashelwe ukudla nezinye izidingo.Ngesikhathi leli phephandaba lihambele kule ndawo abantu bebematasa belungisa kabusha izindlu zabo ezingqongqe ngesikhathi kusha.Omunye wabashelwe, uMnuz Ndishiza Nkomo (24), uthe uphume nezimpahla abezigqokile emuva kokushelwa wumjondolo. Uthe izimpahla abezigqokile uziphiwe abantu abebezobanikelela ngezimpahla.Uthe yena nabafowabo bebezihlalele bephuza ngesikhathi betshelwa ukuthi kuyasha.“Sifike umlilo ungasalawuleki kodwa sasebenza kanzima ukuze siwucishe. Kudamuke utshwala ngesikhathi siwucisha. Kushe yonke into, ukudla, izingubo nempahla yasendlini,” kusho uNkomo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Col Thulani Zwane, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa avule idokodo mayelana nalesi sigameko.
title: Kushone okhubazekile kungqongqa imijondolo

text: KUTHIWA bayanda abesifazane bakuleli abavuma ukuya ocansini ngosuku lokuqala behlangene nabesilisa abasanda kuthandana nabo. Lokhu kuvezwe wumbiko wocwaningo olwenziwe yi-website yabajolayo, iVictoria Milan. Ucwaningo lwenziwe kwabesifazane bakuleli abangu- 5 650 abangu-71% wabo bavuma ukuthi abalilindi ibhadi kodwa balala zisuka nje. Yize bengazibekanga izizathu kodwa bathe akuselona ihlazo ukuvuka emashidini ngosuku lokuqala nendoda.Abangu-56% bathe bathatha isinqumo sebevele bezikhiphile nendoda ukuthi bazovuma ukulala. Izindawo okujwayeleke ukuthi balale kuzo yisehhotela nasendlini yendoda.UMnuz Sigurd Vedal ongumsunguli weVictoria Milan uthe ucwaningo luveza ukuthi abesifazane abahlonizi ngabakufunayo.“Laba ngabantu abathanda ukungazibeki phansi kodwa abangenza noma yini ukuzijabulisa. Abachithi sikhathi uma befuna ukuya ocansini nophathina babo,” kusho uVedal.UNksz Zola Dudeni ongumeluleki wezothando uthe noma engenazo izibalo kodwa kujwayelekile ukuthi abathandanayo balale ngosukulokuqala.Uthe lokhu kwenziwa ukushintsha kwezikhathi ngoba kudala abesifazane bebesaba ukunikela ngomzimba kalula endodeni.“Bekuthusa uma owesifazane elala nendoda zisuka nje kodwa manje akusexwayeki kwabanye. Kudala owesifazane ubefuna isiqiniseko sokuthi indoda ithanda yena hhayi umzimba wakhe,” kusho uNksz Dudeni.Phakathi kwezizathu athe zenza abesifazane basheshe balale ukuthi basuke bebamba indoda ngocansi.“Abesifazane balulangazelele uthando kangangoba bangenza noma yini ukubamba indoda. Bancamela ukulala zisuka ngoba besaba ukuthi indoda izobaleka uma beyincisha ucansi. Abanye abesifazane basebenzisa imithi ethize ukudoba indoda ocansini ngoba bengafuni ukubalekelwa,” kusho uNksz Dudeni.Uthe abanye abesifazane bayithatha njengesilima indoda engalufuni ucansi ngosuku lokuqala. Yize lo mkhuba sewandile, uNksz Gudeni uthe abantu kumele bazi ngobungozi bawo.“Kumele wazi ukuthi kungenzeka indoda ikushiye nesisu isiphike ngoba usuke ungakabi nesiqiniseko sokuthiiyakuthanda. Ungazibeka nasethubeni lokuthola izifo ngoba awukakamazi kahle umuntu olala naye.”
title: Bayanda abesifazane abalala nendoda zisuka

text: NGEMUVA kwamasonto amabili egonqile elwa negciwane elihlasele umhlaba wonke, icoronavirus, umhlengikazi waseThekwini uthi ubonga uNkulunkulu ukuthi ukwazile ukuyinqoba lempi.UPortia Maloyi, uwumhlengikazi kwesinye sezibhedlela eThekwini, uthi yize ejabule kodwa usenovalo lokuthi leli gciwane lingaphinde futhi limhlasele njengoba esebuyele emsebenzini wakhe okuwukunakekela iziguli."Emuva kwamasonto amabili ngivalelwe ngedwa, ngilwa neCovid-19, sengiluleme ngokuphelele futhi ngibuyele emsebenzini ngoMsombuluko. ngijabule kakhulu ngokubuyela ukuzokwelapha abantu bami nokusiza ekulweni neCovid-19, kodwa nginovalo lokuthi ngizophinde ngihlaselwe yigciwane futhi," kusho uPortia othe usebeke ithemba lakhe kuNkulunkulu lokuthi uzomvikela.UPortia, 42, uthe ukuba naleli gciwane bekuyinto enzima kakhulu futhi esabisayo ngoba ubengazi ngekusasa lakhe. Uthe yize abenethemba lokusinda kodwa ubekhathazeke ngokuthi wubani oyonakekela amadodakazi akhe amahlanu, okukhona kuwo nothunjana oneminyaka emine uma engasindi. Ubonge kosayensi abangalali ubusuku nemini belwa nokuthola ikhambi futhi unethemba lokuthi bazogcina bephumelele. "Ngithanda ukutshela abantu ukuthi ikhona impilo emuva kweCoronavirus futhi ngikhuthaza labo abahaqekile futhi ngiyabakhumbuza ukuthi benethuba elihle lokuphunyuka uma bezinakekela bona futhi besebenzisa imishanguso efanele." UPortia uthe ulwe negciwane ngokusebenzisa imishanguzo ekhuphula amasosha omzimba enjengoVitamin C, kuhlangene nemithi yokwelapha umkhuhlane nengxube ehlanganisa ijinja, garlic nolamula abezenzela khona ekhaya.Ululeke abantu ukuba badle kakhulu izithelo. Amava awathole ngalesi sifo, uthe ufunde ukuthi impilo imfishane futhi ayiqaguleki, kumele umuntu ayiphile ngokugcwele ngoba akazi ukuthi ikusasa limphatheleni, kungenzeka umuntu angaluboni usuku lwakusasa.  Uthe ukwesekwa akuthole kubangani nasemalungeni omndeni kudlale indima ebalulekile ekumnikezeni ithemba, isibindi nogqozi lokuphokophelela phambili nokulwa nesifo. "Emuva kokutshelwa okokuqala ngokuthi senginale sisifo, ngithole imiyalezo eminingi kubantu bakuleli, abanye bengithandazela. Ngifisa ukubabonga bonke."Inkosazane kaPortia, uPfunzie Maloyi (25), ithe bekunzima ukwamukela ukuthi unina usehaqwe yiCovid-19 ngenxa yendlela ethulwe ngayo yokuthi ungafa ngento oyiphefumulayo. UPfunzie uthe ukwelulama kukanina kubanikeze ithemba lokuthi nabanye abantu bazosinda egciwaneni uma behlezi ethembeni. "Ngijabule kakhulu ukuthi usindile futhi yonke into seyibuyele esimweni esijwayelekile, ngiyabona ukuthi naye ujabule. Wonke umuntu emndenini obephatheke kabi esaba ukuthi isimo sakhe sizoba sibi, siphumulile ekukhathazekeni uma esinda. Uwumuntu wesifazane ongekho ntekenteke, uyangikhuthaza," kusho uPfunzie.
title: Ugeqa amagula umhlangekazi waseThekwini osinde kwiCorona

text: UMMELI kaNgizwe Mchunu uthe bazoya enkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ngonyaka ozayo ukuyophikisana nesinqumo sokuxoshwa kwakhe wuKhozi FM.UNgizwe ukhonjwe indlela kulo msakazo ngesonto eledlule ngezizathu ezingadalulwanga.“Yonke into sesiyiphothulile ngasohlangothini lwethu. Nosuku basinikezile, kuzoba wuFebhuwari 22,” kusho ummeli uVusi Tembe.Uthe akusisona isicelo esiphuthumayo nokuyingakho bethole usuku olungonyaka ozayo.“Ngicabanga ukuthi ngesonto elizayo isikhonzi senkantolo siyobe sesinikeza uhlangothi oluthintekayo amaphepha (iSABC).”Uthe njengoba udaba lungakangeni enkantolo, uNgizwe ngeke aze azwakale emoyeni.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, abalandeli bakamaskandi bathi bazongena nezicabha ezindlini zokusakaza uma uKhozi FM lungaphumeli obala ngembangela yokuxoshwa kukaNgizwe.Omunye wabaholi boNqambothi Lomculo Kamaskandi, u-Otto Mchunu uthe sebenqumele inhlangano yezokusakaza kuleli iSABC nezikhulu zoKhozi FM ugwayi katiki.“Sithe uma bengasicaciseli ngembangela yokuxhoshwa kukaNgizwe engakashayi u-Okthoba 28, 2018, sizohlela imashi ezoqonda ngqo emahhovisi akwaSABC aku-KE Masinga Road ngoNovemba 3. Sikhathele ngokungahlonishwa ngabaphathi boKhozi.” Uthe sebethule kwaze kwafika lapho kubama khona emphinjeni ukubekezelela ukuxhashazwa kwabo. Isolezwe linayo ikhophi yencwadi ethunyelelwe izikhulu zoKhozi nezakwaSABC eGoli futhi ifundeka kanje:“Kubuhlungu okwenziwa ngabaphathi boKhozi FM bokuthatha izinqumo ngaphandle kokucabanga bajule. Uma nikwenza lokho, kungani izikhulu zoKhozi zehluleka ukusinikeza isizathu esicacile ngokuxoshwa kukaNgizwe Mchunu? Kudala benisinikeza incazelo ecacile ngokususwa komsebenzi uma ephule imigomo yenkampani, kodwa manje asisaziswa. Uma ningasinikezi isizathu sokuthi uxoshelweni uNgizwe Mchunu. Uma nithatha izinqumo zokungasihloniphi njengabalaleli, kanti nisakazela bani? UKhozi FM olwethu balaleli kodwa asazi kungani ningasazisi ngaphambi kokuthatha izinqumo.” UMchunu ubuye wadalula ukuthi abaneme bona ngokungahoshelani kwezikhulu zoKhozi ngoba kuphazamisa izinhlelo. “Sikhathele yibo,” kuphetha incwadi yabalandeli bakamaskandi.
title: Bahlela imashi abakamaskandi ngoNgizwe

text: KUDUMA amakhanda emindenini emithathu yase-Estcourt kulandela ukubulawa kwamadoda amabili abeyofuna izinkomo obekusolwa ukuthi zebiwe. Indoda yesithathu kuthiwa isadukile. UMnuz Mzothini Mazibuko (21), uMnuz Shabalala elingatholakalanga igama lakhe noMnuz Phelelani Zulu kuthiwa bahamba emakhaya ngoLwesine ngeledlule benyukela ezintabeni zoKhahlamba belandela umkhondo wezinkomo zasemakubo ezebiwe.NgoLwesihlanu, kwatholakala isidumbu sikaMazibuko nesikaShabalala zinamanxeba okudutshulwa, uZulu akakatholakali kuze kube manje.UMnuz Sangiphile Mazibuko uyise kaMzothini, uthe bese kuphele isonto kwebiwe izinkomo zakhe ezingu-11 namahhashi amathathu kanti ngaphambi kwalokho bezilokhu zebiwa izikhawu."Kuvele umkhondo wokuthi izinkomo zebiwe abeSuthu bacasha nazo ezintabeni zoKhahlamba. Abafana ngokudinwa, balandele lo mkhondo benyukela khona ezintabeni. Asazi ukuthi kwenzekeni lapho ezintabeni. Sizwa kuthiwa kuqhamuke indiza yamasosha aseLesotho, yadubula bashona kwafa nezinkomo namahhashi," kusho yena.Uthe izinkomo eziyisikhombisa kwebezilahlekile zitholakele khona lapho entabeni.UMnuz Darkie Zulu uyise kaPhelelani, uthi namanje basazulazula ezintabeni, abayitholi indodana yakhe.Uthe ubelahlekelwe yizinkomo eziyisithupha ezingakatholakali kulezi ezifile, akazi noma zikhona yini noma sezonakele?"Amaphoyisa ezinja ehlulekile, athi akatholakali kungenzeka ukuthi uthunjiwe. Ngikholwa ukuthi ukhona lapha entabeni ngokusizwa umphakathi sisabheka," kusho yena.UMnuz Nowa Dlangalala, undunankulu wesizwe sakwaMazibuko, uthe sekwebiwe izinkomo ezilinganiselwa phakathi kuka-200 no400 izinkomo  zamalungu omphakathi ezebiwe kusukela ngoNovemba okusolwa ukuthi ziseLesotho."Lukhona uhlelo lwamaphoyisa oluye lwenziwe uma kwebiwa izinkomo zangapha zikhonjwa eLesotho kodwa manje luhamba kancane ngenxa yeCovid-19. Miningi imigomo okumele ilandelwe okuholele ekutheni laba bafana baze bathathe isinqumo zokuya kozibhekela. Lapho befele khona akukhona eLesotho kuseKZN esiqiwini, Injisuthi. Asazi ukuthi kungani amasosha ebadubulile njengoba sizwa kuthiwa indiza bekungeyamasosha akhona? Esikubonayo ukuthi abeSuthu abasebenza ngapha bazoba sengozini ngoba umphakathi udinwe kakhulu ngenxa yokubulawa kwalaba bafana," kusho yena.UCol Thembeka Mbele uthe kuvulwe idokodo lophenyo eliphenywa amaphoyisa asesiteshini eLoskop.
title: Kusolwa amasosha ngabadutshulwe bentshontshelwe izinkomo

text: IBANKING Association South Africa (BASA) ithi ukuchitshiyelwa komthetho obhekelele izikweletu ubukela phansi ukusebenza kwamabhange.Isikhulu esiphezulu seBASA uMnuz Cas Coovadia sithe ngaphansi komthethoomusha amabhange azoba nenkinga ngoba kufanele ehlise izinga lokubolekisa ngemali kubantu abahola ngaphansi kukaR7 500.Uthe bawu-9.5 million abantu abazohlomula ngenxa yeNational Credit Amendment Act yize kukhona amabhange asakhathazekile.“Uma amabhange ehlisa isibalo sabantu abahola kancane ababoleka imali kungase kunyuke izindleko zokubolekisa ngemali. Sizokhuluma nohulumeni ngoba kuningi okungasicaceli kahle njengamanje,”USolwazi Bonke Dumisa oyisazi somnotho uthe iNational Credit Amendment Act isho ukuthi : abahola uR7 500 nangaphansi ngenyanga, futhi bekweleta imali enguR50 000 nangaphansi kwezikweleti ezingavikelekile, kuthi iNational Credit Regulator neNational Consumer Tribunal, bangenza ngaphansi kwezimo ezithile ukuthi okweletayo:(1) Avunyelwe ukuthi izikweleti zakhe akwazi ukuthi angazikhokha ngendlela emvumela ukuthi angakhokha imali ethe ukuba ncane ngenyanga, mhlawumbe ngokuthi kunwetshwe isikhathi sokukhokha leso sikweletu, mhlawumbe ngokuthi kwehliswe inzalo emalini ebolekiwe.(2) I-National Consumer Tribunal izovunyelwa ukuthi ingake imise okwesikhashana ukukhokhwa kwesikweletu ngesikhathi ongene obishini lwezikweleti esazama ukubamba umoya, esazama ukwenza izinto zibe ngconywana.(3) Ngaphansi kwezimo ezehlula ukwenza,iNational Consumer Tribunal ingacisha ingxenye yesikweletu noma yezikweleti noma isicishe sonke, isikhathi esingunyaka esingaphinde sengezelwe ngomunye unyaka.“Lo mgomo wesithathu yiwona osususe uhlevane,lapho abanye ababolekisi bezimali sebesonga ngokuthi sebezoba manqikanqika ukubolekisa ngemali kwabahola kancane.“Nibashaye indiva abasabisa ngokungaqhubeki nokubolekisa ngemali kwabahola kancane, amahobosha nje lawo,” kusho uDumisa.Alukho olutheni olushintshile, wukuthi-nje labo abahola kancane “nabangafundile” sebezothola amalungelo acishe afane nawakade atholwa ngabadla izambane likapondo ngaphansi komthetho omdala we-Insolvency Act.Isikhulu esiphezulu sakwaCapitec uMnuz Gerrie Fourie sithe lo mthetho usudingidwe iminyaka engaphezu kwemibili.“Ngesikhathi udingidwa lo mthetho besenza isiqiniseko sokuthi amabhuku ethu siwaphethe ngendlela ehlelekile uma kuthintwa abantu abahola ngaphansi kukaR7 500 ngenyanga. Siwenze wonke amalungiselelo.”
title: Imvunge ngomthetho wezikweletu

text: KUSHONE udokotela izolo kwasinda omunye ngesikhathi kusha ifulethi abekulo ebhilidini eligudle ulwandle eThekwini.Udokotela, elisagodliwe igama lakhe, kuthiwa ubesebenza esibhedlela i-Addington eduze kwebhilidi elishile.Amaphoyisa nezicishamlilo zinikele izolo ekuseni ebhilidini iWindemere obekusha kulo ifulethi elilodwa.Umufi ubenomunye uzakwabo ngesikhathi kuqubuka umlilo. Kuthiwa isidumbu sakhe sitholakale egumbini lokugezela, uzakwabo waphuma engashanga. Ekhuluma nabezindaba zethelevishini i-eNCA, oyisihlobo sikadokotela uthe kabazi ukuthi umlilo udalwe yini ngoba ayikho nenkinga kagesi.Uthe udokotela ubesesitezi sesithupha. Ezinye izitezi azithintekanga. Kusolwa ukuthi intuthu ebivimbanisile ngesikhathi kusha, iyona edale ukuthi umufi angabe esakwazi ukuphuma.Kuthiwa umlilo uqubuke ngezithuba zabo-7 ekuseni.Ifika endaweni yesigameko intatheli yeSolezwe ibhilidi bese licishiwe kodwa kusekhona amaphoyisa. Abantu bebemi izixongololo ngaphandle abanye abahlala ebhilidini bengafuni nokukhuluma ngodaba.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kushone owesilisa oneminyaka ewu-50. “Umufi ushonele endaweni yesehlo kwathi omunye walimala engalweni. Akwaziwa ukuthi umlilo udalwe yini kodwa amaphoyisa asaphenya. Kuvulwe idokodo lokufa komuntu eliphenywa esiteshini samaphoyisa iDurban Central.”Kushaye isikhathi sokuloba uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal ungakaphawuli nemininingwane kadokotela ungakayiqinisekisi.
title: Udokotela ufe kusha ifulethi abehlala kulo ebhilidini eligudle ulwandle

text: I-ORLANDO Pirates ayithi vu ngekusasa lika-Ayanda Gcaba ofuna ukushiya kuleli qembu. UGcaba ulizwa ngendaba ijezi kwiPirates.Selokhu kufike umqeqeshi omusha uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic lo mdlali waKwaZulu-Natal (KZN) usephenduke ifenisha. Lo mqeqeshi odabuka eSerbia usebenzisa uJustice Chabalala, Ntsikelelo Nyauza noGladwin Shitolo phakathi nenkundla emuva.UMike Makaab weProSport International okuyinkampani ephethe izindaba zikaGcaba utshele Isolezwe ukuthi iPirates isathuli.“UGcaba akalitholi ijezi. Ngakho safaka isicelo sokuthi abolekiswe. Ngemuva kwalokho siphinde safaka isicelo sokuthi akhululwe kwinkontileka anayo nePirates. Kuze kube yimanje iqembu alikaze lisho lutho. Sihlalele ethembeni lokuthi lizosiphendula maduze ukuze silungise ikusasa lakhe,” kusho uMakaab.Inkontileka kaGcaba nePirates iyaphela ngoJuni. UGcaba ufike kwiPirates ngo-2012 esuka kwiFree State Stars.Kuleli qembu usanqobe isicoco esisodwa kuphela.Usize eZimnyama zakhala zemuka nesicoco seNedbank Cup ngo-2014 ngesikhathi zibhekene neBidvest Wits eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini.“Sizolinda yona iPirates, ngeke siyijahe. Nathi nomdlali kumele siqonde ukuthi kunenkontileka esayisayina ngakho kumele siyihloniphe futhi silandele yonke imigudu ekule nkontileka,” kusho uMakaab.UGcaba akahlali ngisho ebhentshini kwiPirates. UHappy Jele nguyena osehlala ebhentshini. Imenenja yakhe uJazzman Mahlakgane usanda kuqinisekisa ukuthi akayi ndawo. I-Pirates inombandela okumele iwusebenzise ohambisana nenkontileka yonyaka owodwa.Inkontileka kaJele neBucs iphela ngoJuni yize enombandela. I-Pirates ivukile kulo nyaka. Isinqobe imidlalo emibili ilandelana okuyibeke emaqenjini asembangweni wesicoco seligi.
title: Kulindwe isinqumo sePirates ngoGcaba

text: KUHLEHLILE ukulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili sabasolwa ngokubulala umfundi wasoThongathi owaduka ngemuva kokushaywa endaweni edayisa utshwala kule ndawo.Inkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam, izolo bekulindeleke ukuthi ilalele isicelo sebheyili sabasolwa ngokubulala u-Andile ‘Bobo’ Mbuthu (16) obefunda uGrade12 eNkosibomvu High eHambanathi, owaduka ngemuva kokushaywa.Abasolwa kulolu daba, ngoMnuz Mlungisi Thabethe (28), Andile Nhleko (27) Mncedisi Mzobe (27), Siyanda Msweli (26), Lindani Ndlovu (22), Malusi Mthembu (27). Umsolwa wesikhombisa ungumfundi wakuso lesi sikole nowaboshwa kamuva kunabanye.Ummeli wabasolwa abadala abayisithupha, uthe ufuna ukubona izitatimende zabo abazibhalisa emaphoyiseni kuqala.Usho kanje ngoba abasolwa kuthiwa bathi basayiniswa amaphepha ayengabhalwanga lutho okusho ukuthi okubhalwe kuwo abakwazi.UMnuz Chris Gaunden uthe usafuna ukubona izitatimende ezenziwa ngabasolwa futhi ufuna babe senkantolo uma kuzolalelwa isicelo sabo sebheyili. Izolo bebengekho enkantolo bekusetshenziswe ubuchwepheshe ukuthi babone okwenzeka enkantolo. UMshushisi, uMnuz Krisen Shah, uthe ukungezi kwabasolwa ezinkantolo kuhambisana nomthetho obekiwe wokulawulwa kwe-Corona kuleli.“Uma isiboshwa sike saphuma ejele kudingeka ukuthi sigcinwe ngasodwa izinsuku ezingu-14. Emajele ayikho indawo yokwenza lokhu yingakho kuhlelwe ukuthi amacala alalelwe ngekhamera.IMantshi uMnuz Rajesh Parshotan, ithe umsolwa omncane wavela enkantolo ngemuva kosuku abanye bevelile. Izolo ithe uzovela ngemuva kwabanye, ukufakwa kokulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili wakuhlehlisela uMeyi 26.UMnuz Fata Shandu, usihlalo weCommunity Policing Forum, eHambanathi, uthe umphakathi awuzimisele ukwamukela abasolwa emphakathini.“Isenzo sabo siwubulwane bokuthi uma umuntu bemsola ngobugebengu bambulale kunokuba bamnikele emaphoyiseni,” kusho yenaUmalume ka-Andile uMnuz Ntobeko Ngidi, uthe kabanayo inkinga ngokuhlehla kwecala ngoba bafuna ubulungiswa.“Sifuna ubulungiswa, asijahile ukuthi kwenziwe yonke into ngokuphuthuma, sifisa ukuthi bonke abathintekayo ekubulaweni kuka-Andile babhekane nomthetho ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi baningi abantu ababa nesandla ekubulaweni kwakhe,” kusho yena.Umphakathi wase Hambanathi obusenkantolo uzokweseka umndeni uzame ukumasha, amaphoyisa awuhlakaza,ewusabisa ngokuthi uzoboshwa.
title: Uphoxekile umphakathi kuhlehla elokubulawa kukaBobo

text: Nokubongwa PhenyaneBAZOBONA olunye uhlangothi lukaKhanyi Mbau, abantu uma sekuqala uhlelo olukhombisa ngempilo yakhe, iMbau Reloaded: Always Rise oluzokhonjiswa kwiBET Africa (DStv 129).Lolu helo luzoqala ukubonakala kulesi siteshi ngo-Okthoba 10, ngo-7.30 ebusuku.UKhanyi kubantu ozichaza njengomuntu owakhiwe ngobuciko, uzochaza konke ngembangela yokushintsha umzimba wakhe.Ngokwesibili uKhanyi esebenzisana nalesi siteshi.Iningi labantu uKhanyi limazela ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, emsakazweni nakwezinye izinhlelo zethelevishini kodwa abazobuka lolu hlelo bazobona ubudlelwane bakhe nendodakazi yakhe uCannes, angakhulumi ngayo kakhulu.Echaza ngalolu hlelo uKhanyi uthe kulona kuzogqama yena, indodakazi yakhe nodadewabo uThandeka nomngani wakhe, indodana kadadewabo uMcunu nomngani wakhe * -Alina.“Okungijabulisa kakhulu wukuthi ngibe nobudlelwane nesiteshi sakwaBET Africa futhi. Lolu hlelo luzonikeza ababukeli balo okwenzeka empilweni yami ngempela nokunye okuningi engikwenzayo. Ngiyaziqhenya kakhulu ngokuthi kulolu hlelo ngisebenze nabesifazane abaningi abebeqopha benza neminye imisebenzi kulona. Ngiyabamema abantu ukuthi bahambe nami kulolu hambo bangezwa ngabantu izinkulumo ezingekho,” kuchaza yena.UMonde Twala wakwaViacomCBS Networks Africa, uthe kubajabulisile ukusebenza noKhanyi kulolu hlelo.“Ngomunye umlando lo wokuxoxa ngempumelelo yomuntu omnyama. Sike sasebenza noKhanyi ohlelweni iThe Big Secret isizini yokuqala eyaba yimpumelelo. Siyathokoza ukuphinde sinethulele uhlelo oluzojabulisa abantu base-Afrika. Sifuna ukukhulisa lesi siteshi ngokugxila ezinhlelweni ezizokhuthaza intsha ehlukene,” kuchaza uMonde.Uhlelo uthe luzokhonjiswa iziqephu ezingu-13.Kuqala lolu hlelo nje abakwaBET bebesanda kukhombisa okulaBoity Thulo, nalo obeluveza impilo yakhe.
title: Uhlelo ngempilo kaKhanyi Mbau kwiBET Africa

text: KUPHINDE kwaba nesixakaxaka izolo ePhalamende i-EFF yagcina ngokuthi iphume emuva kokuba uMengameli waleli qembu uMnuz Julius Malema eyalelwe ukuba ahoxise akushilo, ukuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wayehlukumeza owayengunkosikazi wakhe ongasekho, uNomazizi Mtshotshisa.UMalema, obengafuni ukuhoxisa lokhu, uyalelwe wuSihlalo weNdlu yoMkhandlu weziFundazwe, uMnuz Amos Masondo, ukuthi aphume. Uphume namalungu aleli qembu ngesikhathi kuqhubeka inkulumompikiswano ngenkulumo eyethulwe nguRamaphosa ngeledlule.Umsindo ususwe yilungu le-ANC, uMnuz Boy Mamabolo, osukume wacela ukuba uMalema aphendule ngombono wakhe mayelana nodaba lokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane kuleli, wabe esembuza uMalema ukuthi ngabe yena akamhlukumezi yini unkosikazi wakhe?UMalema uphendule wathi yena akazange nje ahlukumeze kodwa wake wezwa ngabahlukumezayo.“Awuthi ngikuphendule. Odabeni lokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane. Mina ngasho kwenye inkulumo, ngathi ongakaze ahlukumeze unkosikazi eminyakeni engu-25 edlule akaphakamise isandla.Mina angikaze ngishaye umuntu wesifazane. Ngabuza lowo mbuzo ngoba ngathola ukuthi umengameli wayemshaya unkosikazi wakhe uNomazizi, sengathi angaphumula ngokuthula,” kusho uMalema.UMHOLI we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema ogcine ephumile ePhalamende kulandela ukunqaba ukuhoxisa inkulumo yakhe abize kuyo amalungu ephalamende ngezilima. Isithombe: SABC NEWS/ YouTube screenshotURamaphosa, ozophendula kusasa, ubelokhu ezithulele.Abanye abaholi bathe inkulumo kaRamaphosa ayifikanga nalutho olusha, baphinde bagxeka okwenzeke ngeledlule i-EFF iduba ishiya inkulumo ebhekiswe esizweni ngoba ifuna kuxoshwe uNgqongqoshe wezaMabhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, nokugxeka owayeyiPhini likaMengameli uMnuz FW De Klerk ngenkulumo ayenza ethinta ubandlululo.Bebekhala ngokuthi kudingeka kwenzeke okuthile ukubhekisisa imigomo yePhalamende.Umholi weDA obambile, uMnuz John Steenhuisen, uthe uRamaphosa ubaphoxile abantu bakuleli.Uthe ngesikhathi kusuka uMnuz Jacob Zuma esihlalweni, babezitshela ukuthi kuza umuntu ongcono, baba nethemba.“Abantu beqembu lakho bebekudinga okhethweni lwango-2019, ukuze uvikele inhlekelele eyayingahle yenzeke. Kodwa-ke ube ususiphoxa,” kusho uSteenhuisen.Ubesho lokhu ekhuluma ngomnotho wakuleli, athi awenzi kahle. Uthe uhlulekile wukuletha abatshalizimali ukuze kuzoba namathuba emisebenzi kuleli.Uthe liphezulu kakhulu izinga labangasebenzi njengoba lingu-29.1%.
title: URamaphosa usolwe ngokuhlukumeza owayeyinkosikazi yakhe

text: UTHISHANHLOKO wasesikoleni saKwaMashu, iSibonise Senior Primary, uMnuz Lindokuhle Madonsela, udutshulwe ngentululwane yezinhlamvu washonela endaweni yesigameko ephuma esikoleni izolo ntambama. Ngokwemibiko,  uMadonsela ubulawe ngumuntu obesomotweni emhlophe yohlobo lwe-Etios ebimlinde ebangeni eliyikhilomitha uma usuka esikoleni. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe umufi uvinjwe yimoto engaziwa ngezithuba zabo2.30 ntambama izolo. "Kube sekuphuma umlisa ongaziwa esihlalweni somgibeli maqede wamdubula amahlandla ambalwa. Ushonele endaweni yesigameko. Abasolwa basagcwele izinkalo futhi nembangela beyingakaziwa." UColonel Mbele uthe amaphoyisa aKwaMashu aphansi phezulu aphenya ngalesi sehlakalo. UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, uthe bashaqekile ngesihluku okubulawe ngaso uthishanhloko."Sinxusa nanoma wubani ongaba nolwazi ukuba axhumane nesiteshi samaphoyisa esiseduzane. Kusiphatha kabi kakhulu ukuhlangabezana nesigameko esinje ngesikhathi lapho sisahlukunyezwa yisifoCovid-19 futhi sisanda kuvula izikole zethu. Sisebenza ngokubambisana namaphoyisa ukubopha ababulali," kusho uMshengu kwiTimesLiveUnxuse ukuba kwehliswe imimoya futhi kudedelwe amaphoyisa enze umsebenzi wawo. "NgoMsombuluko sizothumela nabeluleki bengqondo esikoleni. Njengomnyango sifisa ukudlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini osemanzini." Nokhulumela iDA emkhakheni wezemfundo, uMnuz Imran Keeka, unxuse umphakathi waKwaMashu ukuthi welekelele ekubanjweni kwabenza lo mhlola. Kuthiwa uthishanhloko ubulawa nje ubesanda kubuyela emsebenzini emuva kokuba segunjini labagula kakhulu esibhedlela ngenxa yokuhlaselwa okufana nalokhu.
title: Kubulawe ngentululwane yezinhlamvu uthishanhloko wasesikoleni saKwaMashu

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEISETHENJWA saMaZulu FC, uBongi Ntuli, besihlangene nobuholi obusha baleli qembu kubhungwa ngesikufunayo.UMandla Mthembu ophethe izindaba zalo mgadli, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi kulo mhlangano, babutshelile ubuholi obusha ngemali abafisa uNtuli ayihole kuleli qembu elithengwe nguSandile Zungu kuPatrick Sokhela obese eliphathe iminyaka.Wale waphetha ukudalula isamba nokuthi ubehola malini ngaphansi kobuholi obudalaUMthembu uthe kulo mhlangano bakuvezile ukuthi uNtuli ungumdlali wezinga eliphezulu okufakazelwa ukuba yinyama kwamanye amaqembu.Njengoba iminyaka yobudala ihamba kuNtuli oke wadlala kwiMamelodi Sundowns, uthe bazivezile nezinto afisa ukuzizuza ngokuba umdlali waMaZulu okumele zilingane nezinga lakhe.Selokhu iqalile isizini ka-2020/2021, uNtuli akakadlali nowodwa.Ngesizini edlule ubevutha engabaselwe njengoba eshayele leli qembu amagoli awu-13.“Ngeke ngande noma ngidalule konke ebesikufuna kodwa kubalulekile ukuthi uNtuli athole okufanele izinga lakhe. Uwumdlali wezinga eliphezulu. “Ukufika kobuholi obusha kuze nezinguquko eziningi obekumele kuhlalwe phansi kuboniswane ngazo. NoSuthu lukuvezile elikufunayo,” kubeka uMthembu.Ebuzwa ukuthi akhona yini amathuba okuthi ziqalwe phansi izingxoxo zokufunwa amanye amaqembu uthe basazoba nomunye umhlangano nezikhulu.“Okwamanje ngeke ngibe nayo impendulo ecacile ukuthi zizoqalwa phansi noma cha  izingxoxo zamaqembu amfunayo. Konke kuzoncika emhlanganweni olandelayo”.Kusukela kwi-bio-bubble, ngesizini edlule kuqine amahlebezi abethi lo mdlali angase awashiye AmaZulu.Bekuvela kakhulu i-Orlando Pirates neSundowns.UMthembu uthe akwaziyo ukuthi kuneqembu ebelibeka okungcono etafuleni.UBrilliant Mkhathini okhulumela uSuthu, uthe abaphathi bakhuluma nawo wonke umdlali nalabo abaphelelwa yizinkontileka.“Angazi ukuthi kungani kuqhakambiswa uNtuli iqembu likhuluma nawo wonke umuntu. Nalokhu kokuthi ufuna ukuhamba kasikwazi. Uzinikele eqenjini njengoba esalelwe yiminyaka emibili enkontilekeleni yakhe,” kusho uMkhathini. Mayelana nokungadlali kwakhe,  uthe ulimele onyaweni, usazohlala inyanga engadlali. Omunye athe ulimele uSiphesihle Maduna. Uthe balimale ngaphambi kokuqala kweligi.
title: UNtuli uhlangane nobuholi baMaZulu

text: UMQONDISI jikelele emnyangweni wemfundo ePhakeme, uMnuz Gwebs Qonde, uthi phansi amaphaphu kubafundi basemakolishi ama-Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) abafake izicelo zokufunda ngoba bezokwamukelwa bonke nonyaka.UQonde uthe babalelwa ku-207 000 abafundi abazobathatha nonyaka ngakho kayikho letho yokuthi bazokwamukela isibalo esincane.Uthe labo abangazifakanga izicelo bazokwamukelwa uma sekuthathwe bonke ababhalisile. “Kunehhovisi okufakwa kulo izicelo zokufunda emakolishi nasemanyuvesi. Sizoqale sithathe labo ababefake izicelo bese uma kusala izikhala amakolishi athathe labo abame kolayini. Umkhuba wokuma kolayini ungafakanga isicelo kumele uphele ngoba abafundi bayahanjelwa ezikoleni bagqugquzelwe ukuthi bafake izicelo. Kuba nezinhlelo ngisho emsakazweni nasezikhungweni zomphakathi zokwazisa abafundi ngokubhalisa.”Abafundi bake bakhala ngokubanjwa kwemiphumela abanye bethi ozakwabo bayitholile kodwa bona cha.UQonde uthe imiphumela ibanjwa ngoba kunogcobho othile. Kwenziwa uphenyo uma kusolakala ukuthi abafundi bakopelile. “Kuba nanezinsolo zokuputshuka kwephepha bese siyibamba imiphumela ukuze kwenziwe uphenyo. Labo ababanjelwe kumele bahambise izikhalo zabo ukuze ilungiswe indaba yabo.”Ikomiti lemfundo epha­keme lithe kumele zixoxe izinhlaka ezehlukene nomnyango.USihlalo wekomiti, uNksz Connie September, uthe akumele kuvalwe izikhungo ngenxa yokungaboni ngaso linye. “Kumele ixazululwe ngokushesha inkinga ekhona kungaze kuvalwe izikhungo kuhlupheke abafundi. Ukuxoxa yikhona okuzophuma nesisombululo kunoma yiziphi izinkinga ezibhekene nezemfundo.”Okhulumela i-DA kwezemfundo ephakeme, uDkt Belinda Bozzoli, uthe sekunesikhathi ungqongqoshe wemfundo epha­keme ezazi izinkinga ezibhekene namakolishi kodwa engenzi lutho ngazo. Kabahambisani nokuvalwa kwezikhungo ngoba kumele kuxoxwe ukuze kufinyelelwe esivumelwaneni.
title: Bazothathwa bonke abasema-TVET

text: SEKUTSHALWE uR175.8 million wokulungisa izikole ezakhahlanyezwa yisiphepho nezimvula KwaZulu-Natal.Le mali izosiza nasezikoleni zaseWestern Cape kanti kule mali uR150 million uzosiza ezikoleni ezingaphezulu kuka-87 zakulesi sifundazwe bese uR25.8 million usize ezikoleni ezingu-22 zaseWestern Cape.Lokhu kulandela ukuphasiswa komthetho iDivision of Revenue Amendment Bill, ezokwenza ukuthi iminyango kahulumei isheshise ekulungiseni ingqalasizinda esuke icekelwe phansi yizikhukhula, imililo kanjalo nezimvula.USotswebhu we-ANC ePhalamende uMnuz Jackson Mthembu, uthe lo mthetho uzosiza nokuthi uthuthukise izimo zasezibhedlela zomphakathi.Uthe indaba yokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda izosiza kakhulu izingane ezihluphekayo.“Uhulumeni we-ANC uzimisele ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zabantu. Siyayamukela imali engu-R199 million ehlinzekwe iKZN ukuze ilungise izibhedlela ezingu-14 ezakhahlanyezwa yizimvula,” kusho uMthembu.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi uMnyango wezeMfundo ubhekana nezinkinga zokungabi namali uma kumele kulungiswe ingqalasizinda ngemuva kwezimvula.Lokhu kwenziwa ngukuthi ingxenye eningi yesabelo sezimali iya emaholweni abasebenzi bese esele kuba eyezinsiza naleyo eyiswa ezikoleni.UMthembu uthe kulo mthetho kuzoba nemali ehlinzekwe umnyango wezokuhlaliswa komphakathi ukuze kulungiswe izindlu ezakhahlanyezwa yisichotho.Kubekwe eceleni uR100 million ozosiza imizi engu-3280 yakulesi sifundazwe ezakhahlanyezwa yizimvula, ezintathu zaseKnysna, eWestern Cape ezasha ngesikhathi umlilo usha ubuhanguhangu.Uthe isabelo sikangqongqoshe wezimali uMnuz Tito Mboweni sizobhekana nezidingo zomphakathi.UMthembu uthe bayakwamukela nokuphasiswa komthethosivivinywa ozosheshisa ukubhaliswa kwamatayitela.“Selokhu kwatholakala intando yeningi siyakhula isibalo nesidingo sokuthi amatayitela abhaliswe kusetshenzise amakhompyutha. Umthethosivivinywa i-Electronic Deeds Registration System Bill uzokwenza lokhu kube lula.”Uthe sekuzoshesha ngeke abantu besalinda isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuba amatayitela abhaliswe.“Abantu sebezokwazi ukuba abanikazi bomhlaba bangalindi isikhathi eside. Sikushayela ihlombe lokhu ngoba bebelinda isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuba abanikazi bomhlaba.”
title: Kutshalwe uR175.8m wokulungisa izikole eKZN

text: UMBHISHOBHI Israel Makamu udedelwe ngebheyili ka-R2 000 namhlanje kulandela ukuvela kafishane ngecala lokunukubeza ngokocansi eNkantolo yeMantshi ePalm Ridge, eGoli, ngoLwesithathu. Ngokwesitatimende soKlebe uMakamu, ongumsunguli we-Endless Hope Bible Church e-Alberton, uboshwe namhlanje ekuseni kulandela icala elivulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa eBrackendowns ngowayesebenza esontweni lakhe ekhala ngokunukubezwa ngokocansi. Icala livulwe ngoMeyi 19 nonyaka.Leli cala limayelana nesigameko okusolakala ukuthi senzeka ehhovisi lakhe e-Alrode ngoSepthemba ngonyaka odlule. Icala lihlehliselwe uJulayi 13 ukuze kuqhubeke uphenyo.UMakamu usanda kuhoxa ekwethuleni uhlelo oludlala kuMoja Love iRea Tsotella kulandela ukusabalala kwengxoxo yakhe ekhuluma nowesifazane emcela inkonzo yasekameleni.Kuyona kuzwakala uMakamu eqala ebuza owesifazane ukuthi unobani, ngoba kukhona into afuna ukumcela yona.“Uzonginika angithi? Ngiyakucela phela, angithi uwedwa lapho. Ngiyakunxusa, oh uyangichomela?”.Lona wesifazane uzwakala enqaba ethi ngeke akwenze okucelwa inceku yenkosi.Ngemuva kokusabalala kwale ngxoxo, uMakamu uvele ohlelweni lwabefundisi kuMoja Love lapho aveze khona ukuthi empeleni wayecela izikhiye kulo wesifazane, wayengafuni ucansi. Incazelo yakhe ephelele kulolu hlelo: I had to watch the interview again. Haai Noo mann. makamu is insulting our sense of intelligence. #makamu pic.twitter.com/13LqRoNhZc
title: UMakamu udedelwe ngebheyili ka-R2 000 ecaleni lokunukubeza ngokocansi

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEMamelodi Sundowns (3) 3SuperSport United (0) 1IZISULE izinyembezi ngokushesha iMamelodi Sundowns, inqoba isicoco seDStv Premiership ekubeni isasalelwe yimidlalo emithathu isonge isizini.Ibhaxabule omkhaya bayo, iSuperSport United ngo-3-1 ngoLwesithathu ebusuku eLoftus Versfeld Stadium, yathatha isicoco sika-11 seligi.Labo mpetha beligi bebefike emdlalweni bebuya ekuwashisweni ijezi kwiCaf Champions League ngempelasonto. Iligi yisona kuphela isicoco abebesenethuba lokusinqoba kule sizini. Ukunqoba kubeke iSundowns phezulu ngamaphuzu awu-60, okusho ukuthi emidlalweni esele kalikho iqembu elisengayifica.Iqophe umlando ngokuba yiqembu lokuqala ukuvikela isicoco seligi amahlandla amane kulandelana.Ukubuyela emdlalweni Amatsatsantsa a Pitori abulawe ngumdlali wawo wakudala, u-Aubrey Modiba obenza izimanga kuzona zombili izinhlangothi phambili.Ngomzuzu ka-32,  eqhamuka kwesokunxele, ugobe ibhola elihlale izinyaweni zikaLebohang Maboe olibeke phakathi.Ngoka-40, uthushuke kwesokudla waligoba, lasho phakathi. Kwelesithathu akaligobanga, kodwa ungene namadoda ebhokisini, walibeka kuThemba "Mshishi" Zwane olinamathisele ngoka-43.Elokubika leSuperSport, linamathiselwe nguTobogo Mokoena ngoka-87, engaphandle kwebhokisi.Kusona isiwombe sokuqala i-United ibulawe wukuphuma ngekhadi elibomvu kukaGuily Manziba okhahlele uSiphelele Mkhulisi ebuntwini bakhe. Esikhundleni sikaMkhulisi kungene uMaboe.NgoMgqibelo, amaBrazillians azobhekana neSwallows, eDobsonville Stadium. Leli qembu eliphekwa nguManqoba Mngqithi, Rhulani Mokwena noSteve Komphela lizodlala neBloemfontein Celtic ngesonto elizayo, bese livala isizini neCape Town City eLoftus Versfeld ngoJuni 5 lapho lizobe selinikezwe indebe yalo yeDStv PremiershipISuperSport izoqhubeka nokuhlala endaweni yesithupha ngamaphuzu awu-41, emidlalweni ewu-28. Izoze idlale ngoLwesithathu neMaritzburg United. Komunye umdlalo wangoLwesithathu, iKaizer Chiefs iqunjwe phansi yiBlack Leopards ngo 2-1 eThohoyandou Stadium.
title: ISundowns nomlando inqoba isicoco seDStv Premiership

text: UBHEKENE nengcindezi umfundi kaGrade 11 waseBilanyoni, eDumbe owabona kubulawa intombi yomzala wakhe okuthiwa ukhala ngokuthi ubuthongo abusafiki ngenxa yesithombe sokugwazwa kwayo.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi umndeni namaphoyisa bedidekile ngokuthi kwenzekani ngesidumbu sikaNksz Makhosi Ndlangamandla (25) ngoba umphakathi uyamba lapho kuthiwa wagqitshwa khona kodwa akuveli lutho kuqhuma amanzi kuphela.UMnuz Sfiso Ndlangamandla, ongumfowabo kaNksz Ndlangamandla, uthe umfana eligodliwe igama lakhe, uyabalisa uthi le nto ayimniki ukuphumula ukhumbula konke okwenzeka.Uthe ingane kadadewabo eneminyaka engu-8 sebeyithathile bayoyifihla ngoba basaba ukuthi ingagcina isithola ukuthi unina wabulawa kanti basayifihlele.Uveze nokuthi besaba nokuthi uyise uma kwenzeka ephuma angayithatha.“Namanje asazi ukuthi yini lena amaphoyisa ewahlulayo ukuba athole iqiniso ngoba umfana uyazikhulumela. Ungichazelile nami ukuthi ubuthongo abusafiki. Lo mfana usekhuluma ngisho kubangani bakhe ngakho konke okwenzeka mhla kubulawa uMakhosi. Siphatheke kabi singumndeni ngoba kade sifika nomphakathi sizomba kodwa akuveli lutho, kunalokho kuqhuma amanzi,” kusho uNdlangamandla.Uveze nokuthi amaphoyisa asebatshela ukuthi izinja zomkhondo ngeke bazithole ngoba lo muntu kade anyamalala.Uthe okubi wukuthi uyise womfana uthi akuhlukanwe nengane yakhe ngoba kuzolimala ikusasa layo.Amaphoyisa nawo athi abhekene nobunzima ngaleli cala.“Ngesikhathi umsolwa evuma ukuthi wayibulala intombazane saba nethemba lokuthi konke kuzoshesha. Kodwa osekuyinkinga wukuthi kuthe uma eseya enkantolo washaya ungqimphothwe esethi noma angabhekwa kodwa ngeke atholakale ngoba wamshisa. Uphinde athi icala lokudlwengula umzala wakhe oneminyaka engu-15 akalazi kodwa into angayikhuluma eyokubulala intombi yakhe.
