Sesivele sathatha isinqumo sokumvulela icala lokubulala,” kusho iphoyisa elicele kugodlwe igama lalo.IMeya uMnuz Majuba Mavuso ebihambisana nomndeni beyobheka kule ndawo, ithe kuyabethusa ukuzwa ukuthi akucaci ngecala nokuthi amaphoyisa bezwa kuthiwa athi izinja ngeke zilethwe ngoba kade anyamalala uNksz Ndlangamandla.Uthe kuyiphutha lokho ngoba amaphoyisa ayakwazi ukuthola amathambo abantu abashona eminyakeni engaphezulu kuka-20 kodwa ayakhononda kumuntu onyamalale eminyakeni emithathu.Uthe kungcono udaba ludluliselwe emaphoyiseni asezingeni lesifundazwe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe lolu daba lubucayi futhi amaphoyisa asaphenya ngakho abakwazi ukuphawula okwamanje.
title: Akalali owabona kubulawa intombi yomzala wakhe

text: AKEKHO umdlali ofika ezingeni likaThembinkosi Lorch okwamanje kwi-Absa Premiership.Uma kuya ngala mazwi omqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, akufanele kumangaze uma uLorch engaba ngomunye wabadlali abagoduka nemiklomelo eminingi ngeSonto uma sekukhethwa abadlali abashaye into ecokeme kule sizini yePremier Soccer League (PSL).Umcimbi wokuklomelisa abadlali uzobanjelwa eNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre ngo-7 ebusuku. ULorch oyibamba esiswini kwiPirates uqokwe eminxeni emithathu lapho ebanga noThemba Zwane noHlompho Kekana beMamelodi Sundowns.Babanga iMidfielder of the Season, Player’s Player of the Season (evotelwa abadlali) neFootballer of the Season, evotelwa ngabaqeqeshi.Nguyena ohamba phambili ngokushayela iPirates amagoli kwiligi ngayisishiyagalolunye. Ubuye washaya amane ngesikhathi eZimnyama zifinyelela kowamanqamu weTelkom Knockout.“Ngimfanisa nebhubesi elimbethe isikhumba somuntu uThembikosi “Nyoso” Lorch. Isizini yonke ubelokhu eyisibonelo esihle, esihola umdlalo nomdlalo. Kwesinye isikhathi besize sizibuze ukuthi uwuthathaphi umfutho omngaka kulo mzimba anawo.“Ngale kokubukela phansi abanye abadlali bami kodwa lapha ngikholwa wukuthi nguyena umdlali ohambe phambili kule sizini futhi nguyena obashaya bonke eNingizimu Afrika okwamanje. Ngimfisela ukudlondlobala nangesizini ezayo. Wonke umdlali ulikhuphulile izinga kodwa uLorch ubashiye ngamamayela,” kusho uSredojevic.ULorch uthe kumphatha kabuhlungu ukuthi ngemuva kokulwa kangaka kule sizini kodwa iqembu liqede lingenalutho elikuzuzile.“Ngijabule ngendlela iqembu elilwe ngayo kule sizini. Ngibonga kubaqeqeshi, ozakwethu nakubalandeli abebelokhu bewa bevuka nathi. Okubuhlungu wukuthi akukho esikuphethe ngoba abantu bakwehlulela ngokuzuzile kodwa ke ngijabule ngeqembu lami,” kusho uLorch ojoyine iPirates ngo-2017 esukwa kwiChippa United.
title: ULorch uzihambela yedwa: Sredojevic

text: OWAYEYISITOBHA seBafana Bafana, uMatthew Booth, uyayihlaba eyokugxekwa kukaStuart Baxter ngokubiza abadlali beKaizer Chiefs esikwatini esisazohlungwa esiyodlala kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ngenyanga ezayo.Ngesonto eledlule uBaxter umemezele isikwati sabadlali abawu-30 azoqoka kubo abawu-23 azoya nabo kwi-Afcon ezoqala ngoJuni 21 e-Egypt. Nakuba isikwati sakhe sibanelisile abantu abaningi kodwa ugxekiwe ngokubiza abadlali beChiefs oDaniel Cardoso, Ramahlwe Mphahlele nonozinti uBruce Bvuma.“Awukwazi ukubehlulela ngendlela iChiefs edlale ngayo. Kufanele ubehlulele ngabodwana. Ababanga nesizini enhle kuyiqiniso lokho kodwa umqeqeshi kufanele asebenze ngeqembu elidlale emidlalweni yokuhlunga. Angasho ukuthi awukho efomini, angikufaki eqenjini noma athi ezinyangeni ezedlule awubhedanga kakhulu kwiBafana. Ngakho umqeqeshi kufanele abheke zinhlangothi zonke. Kuyingozi ukufaka umdlali ongazange adlale emidlalweni yokuhlunga kodwa osefomini eqenjini lakhe. Abalandeli bebhola bachemile vele. AbePirates bazofuna kugcwale abadlali babo nabeChiefs kanjalo,” kusho uBooth.UBooth uyinxusa leNingizimu Afrika lomqhudelwano iCastle Africa 5’s esongwe eCenturion, eGauteng, ngoMgqibelo. Bekugadulisana amaqembu aqhamuka ezweni lonke awabesilisa nawabesifazane. Kwabesilisa kuwine i-Orlando Pirates kwathi kwabesifazane kwanqoba iDrama Queens. La maqembu asezomela iNingizimu Afrika eTanzania ngoJuni 4-6. Abazowina lapho bazoya phesheya kwezilwandle ezweni elingakamenyezelwa. Ompetha banyakenye iMilano egcine imele i-Afrika eRussia, abalibonanga elidlalayo kulokhu.“Ngiyibukile imidlalo ngisho nasezifundazweni. Bekuhlelwe ukuthi kube yinto yobungani, abantu bahlangane baziphuzele ubhiya badlale ibhola. Kodwa akukho lokho, amaqembu adlalela ukuwina. Angazi noma kungenxa yemiklomelo noma wukulangazelela ukuwina emaqenjini aseMzansi.”“Nyakenye uBrian Baloyi ubeyimenenja nomqeqeshi weMilano bagcina bewinile. Ngiyathemba ukuthi nami ngizokwenza okufanayo. Amaqembu kwamanye amazwe asevele ayakhuluma ukuthi ngeke siwaphinde. Umbango mkhulu phakathi kwethu nabo. Sengibheke ukuthi siphikelele neqembu eTanzania ngethemba lokuthi sizophinda okwanyakenye.”
title: UBooth uhlaba abagxeka uBaxter

text: UMQEQESHI we-Ajax Cape Town, uStanely Menzo, uthe iqembu lakhe lizifake ehlazweni lishaywa yiqembu eligijima ku-ABC Motsepe League iKwaDukuza United emdlalweni weNedbank Cup Last 32 eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo.IKwaDukuza ishaye i-Ajax Cape Town ngo 4-3 sekukhahlelwa amaphenathi emuva kokuba umdlalo uphele ngo 2-2.Amagoli eKwaDukuza ashaywe wuLungelo Zondi noKhulekani Ndlela, kwathi awe-Ajax eza noNeo Makua noPrince Nxumalo.Leli qembu iKwaDukuza eliqeqeshwa nguThami Ngubane belisho ukuyiqeda i-Ajax esiwombeni sokuqala njengoba beyihluleka ukumelana nebhola elidla utshani ebelidlalwa yiKwaDukuza.Kwale ngisho umqeqeshi we-Ajax esefaka uNathan Paulse ngesiwombe sesibili kodwa abafana abancane bebemqaphile njengoba naye ehlulekile ukusebenzisa ubude bakhe ukudla amabhola aphezulu.UMenzo obethukuthele eqhuma emuva komdlalo uthe abadlali be-Ajax bafake iqembu ehlazweni ngendlela abadlale ngayo.“Angazi ukuthi ngingakhuluma ngithini ngomdlalo wanamhlanje, sihlulwe wukuqedela amabhola sesisebhokisini. Empeleni silihlambalazile iqembu, into okumele siyenze wukuxolisa eqenjini. Ngeke ngigxeke umdlali oyedwa kodwa ngizozigxeka mina, ithimba labaqeqeshi nawo wonke umuntu ozibandakanye nalo mdlalo ngokuhlambalaza abalandeli be-Ajax neqembu uqobo. Siyaxolisa ngalokhu okwenzekile,” kusho uMenzo.I-Ajax ibishiye ngaphandle abadlali abenza kahle eqenjini abafana noMark Mayambela noThabo Mosadi.UMenzo ukholwa ngukuthi leli kube ngelinye iphutha alenzile yize ebengayibukeli phansi iKwaDukuza.“Uma uzodlala nanoma yiliphi iqembu kuba nezinqumo ozithathayo. Nami kube yisinqumo engisithathile ukuthi ngibashiye ngaphandle kodwa ngikholwa ngukuthi kube yiphutha elikhulu. Ngendlela ebengihlele ngayo bengikholwa ukuthi iqembu ebengilibophele belizoyishaya iKwaDukuza,” kusho uMenzo.Lo mqeqeshi uthe okumkhathazayo ngokushaywa yiKwaDukuza ukuthi akazi ukuthi kuzoba nomthelela onjani eqenjini lakhe elivele lingenzi kahle.I-Ajax ayikaze inqobe umdlalo kusukela kuqale umzuliswano wesibili we-Absa Premiership.“Njengoba sesiphumile kuNedbank kusho okuthi sesizogxila ku-Absa Premiership. Kodwa into engikhathazayo ngukuthi ukushaywa yiqembu elincane kuzoba nomthelela onjani ekuzethembeni kwabadlali. Nginethemba lokuthi abadlali ngeke bazwele kakhulu kulokhu kushaywa bazovuka bazithathe njengoba sidinga ukunqoba imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership ukuze sihlale siphephile.”I-Ajax ihlezi endaweni ka-12 ku-log ye-Absa Premiership ngamaphuzu angu- 21 emdlalweni engu-20.
title: Ubona ihlazo ngokushaywa yiKwaDukuza

text: UDKT Makhosi Khoza owasula ekubeni yilungu lePhalamende le-ANC kuzwelonke, ukhuza abathi ipolitiki nomuntu wezifazane, izinto ezimbili ezihlukene.Usho kanje ekhuluma embuthanweni obuhlelwe yisikhungo sezingxoxo, i-Xubera eThekwini, ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.Ukuhambela kwakhe lo mbuthano bekuhambisana nezinhlelo zakhe zokusungula iqembu elisha lezepolitiki njengoba eseshiyile kwi-ANC.“Lapho engiqhamuka khona ngihlale ngibuzwa ngokuthi angesabi yini ngokusungula iqembu elisha lezepolitiki. Ngibuzwa ukuthi waphelelaphi uDkt Mamphela Ramphele (weqembu lezepolitiki i-Agang),” kusho uDkt Khoza.Uthe lokho kumphatha kabi ngoba kwakha isithombe sokuthi abesifazane bayizehluleki.Ngokwakhe kuningi asekufundile emaphutheni enziwe abaholi besifazane bamaqembu ezepolitiki, okukhona phakathi kwabo noNkk Zanele KaMagwaza-Msibi ongumengameli we-National Freedom Party (NFP) owahlubuka kwi-IFP.Uthe akumele ngabe ayangatshazwa amakhono abesifazane ngoba yibona ababedudula umkhankaso wokwamukelwa kwe-Freedom Charter.Phakathi kwezinto athe iqembu lakhe elisha lizimisele ukuzenza, ukulwa nenkohlakalo yokukhishwa kwamathenda kahulumeni ngokobungane nokucwasana ngokobuhlanga.“ITheku sesilivumele ukuthi libhozomelwe yilabo abangenandaba nentuthuko yabampofu,” kuchaza uDkt Khoza.Uthe ngendlela abaholi baKwaZulu-Natal abathanda ngayo ukuthi ubuso babo buphume emaphepheni kwakufanele ngabe bangena ebhizinisini lokuba ngonobuhle.“Ngifisa ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika iphinde ibusiswe ngobuhlakani obanikezwa uMnuz Nelson Mandela,” kusho uDkt Khoza.Uthe iKwaZulu-Natal yisifundazwe esibaluleke kakhulu ngoba sinamaqhawe avela kuso, njengenkosi * -Albert Luthuli, Mfundisi John Langalibalele Dube, Victoria Mxenge, Pravin Gordhan nabanye.Ugxeke nokubulalana kwezepolitiki okuqhubekayo kulesi sifundazwe.Akayishiyanga ngaphandle inyunyana iSadtu athe isixove imfundo yomuntu omnyama yayiqeda.“Uma kungathiwa angikhethe phakathi kukathisha owafundisa ngobandlululo nofundisa kulesi sikhathi samanje, ngingakhetha owafundisa ngobandlululo ngoba babezimisela ngomsebenzi wabo,” kusho uDkt Khoza.Okwamanje uthe ngeke atatazele ngokumemezela igama leqembu lakhe.Uthe asazogxila kukho okwamanje, imibuthano yokubonisana, bese kuthi ngonyaka ozayo alethule ngokusemthethweni. “Ngifuna ukuthi abantu kube yibona abazikhethela ngqo umengameli nesekela lakhe, hhayi ukuthi bakhethelwe amagatsha,” kubeka uDkt Khoza.
title: UKhoza ugxeka ukubulalana okuseKZN

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANEI MENENJA kamasipala weTheku, uMnuz Sbu Sithole isabisa ngokuthi izokuvala ukukhishwa kwamathenda okuqoqa udoti eMlazi ukuze umasipala uzibambele wona mathupha ngenhloso yokunqanda umdonsiswano osudale ukungcola okwesabekayo kuleli lokishi.USithole ukusho lokhu echaza ngokuhoxiswa kwamathenda abesekhangisiwe okuqoqa udoti kwezinye izindawo ezakhele iTheku ngoba ekhala ngokuthi nalolu hlelo selunabantu abangasahambisi ngendlela kulona, alusabahlomulisi abantu bezindawo okusetshenzwa kuzona.Lokhu kumsusele umsindo kwabeDA abafuna ukwazi ukuthi amathenda ahoxiselweni ngoba konke bese kuhleliwe kanti yona isola ukugxambukela kwezepolitiki.“Okokuqala angifuni ukuhlanganiswa nepolitiki yesifundazwe konke engikwenzayo kuwumsebenzi wami. Ake ngiqale ngalolu daba lwaseMlazi, sengibonile ukuthi luyinkinga futhi aluxazululeki yingakho sengifuna ukuthatha isinqumo sokuthi ngivele ngivale ukukhipha amathenda okuqoqa udoti. Ngizothumela abasebenzi bami nezimoto zomkhandlu zokuqoqa imfucuza ukuze lo msebenzi uzokwenziwa wumasipala ngokugcwele ngivale indaba yezinkampani eziwuqoqayo kuleliya lokishi,” kusho uSithole.Mayelana nezikhangiso zakamuva azihoxisile, uSithole uthe beziqondene nokukhishwa kwamathenda asuke ebhekene nemisebenzi emincane ekhishwa wumkhandlu efana nakho ukuqoqwa kukadoti.Uthe le misebenzi kusuke kuhloswe ngayo ukuhlomulisa abantu bakulezo zindawo ezingaphansi komkhandlu kodwa manje akusenzeki lokho ngoba sekunobugebengu. Uthi bese kutholakala ukuthi awusabi ngowabantu bendawo kunalokho kuba ngabazihlalela esilungwini njengabakoBallito nabasuka kwabanye omasipala abafana nakoKokstad.Lolu hlelo sekunesikhathi lususa umsindo ngoba nasembikweni iManase, kwavela ukuthi bekuhlomula inkampani yowayenguSihlalo we-ANC uMnuz John Mchunu, iNyameko.Namanje iDA ngomlomo kaMnuz Zwakele Mncwango ohola ikhokhasi yeqembu kumasipala, iveza ukuthi kunenhlese yepolitiki kulolu hlelo okuholele ekutheni uSithole agcine ehoxisa ithenda yakhona isigubhukane.“Okusixakile wukuthi abanye osomabhizinisi bese bekhokhile ngenhloso yokungena ohlwini lokuthola le misebenzi evamise ukunikwa abantu abangosomabhizinisi abasafufusa ukuze bahlomule. Kuthe singazelele sathola sekuthiwa kunomyalezo ophuthumayo kaSithole wokuthi la mathenda ayahoxiswa.“Sibe sesithola nokuthi lokhu akakwenzanga ngentando yakhe kodwa uthole umyalelo ehhovisini likaNobhala we-ANC esifundazweni uMnuz Super Zuma ukuba ahoxise la mathenda. Sisambhalele incwadi sifuna incazelo ngalokhu,” kusho uMncwango.USithole uthe ubengakayifundi incwadi ayibhalelwe yiDA.UNobhala we-ANC uMnuz Super Zuma, eziphendulela uthe akahlangani nezinto ezingamahlebezi futhi akakwazi ukugxambukela ezintweni zomasipala.
title: USithole usikaza ukuvala ithenda kadoti eMlazi

text: U-DJ ohlonishwayo emhlabeni uBlack Coffee uchazwe yingoma kaZandie Khumalo ethi, i-Ex Yami waze wacela impinda ngesikhathi kwethulwa imiklomelo yezindondo amaKwaZulu-Natal Entertainment Awards (KZNEA), eWarehouse, eThekwini ngoLwesine.UZandie ungene ngengoma iSekwanele ayicula noLindani Gumede, maqede washaya i-Ex Yami, okuyiculo likaMaqhinga Hadebe alenze kabusha.Ngesikhathi ecula ehambisana nabamgidelayo, kuvele kwachwaza. Uthe eqeda kwabonakala uBlack Coffee ecela ukuthi aliphinde.Akapholisanga maseko uZandie, wacula kwasina wonke umuntu eWarehouse. Le ngoma inezinhlamvu ezithi:“Ma nibon’ i-ex yam’ niyitshel’ukuthi (ngijabule kabi)Hhaw’ ngijabule kabi(ngijabule kabi)(Kulolu thando lwam’ olusha)(Ngijabule kabi)We ex yami washonaphi wena?Asisahlangani ngishoemgwaqeni nje,Ngiyafis’ ukuthiNgeliny’ ilanga sihlangane,Ngik’bingelele ngithi“Sawubona silima” We ex yami washonaphi?Into eyenze abantu bamnaka uBlack Coffee ukuthi naye ubeshade noMbali Mlotshwa, asehlukanisile naye. Kuvele kwacacela noma ubani ukuthi lengoma iyamthinta uBlack Coffee.UDJ ubebonakala ezikhululekele kangangoba uke wathi kuSomizi Mhlongo obephethe uhlelo, “hheyi wavele wangikhipha kule nkulumo njengoba sewuthinta umshado”.Kwahleka iningi njengoba lisazi isimo sakhe noMbali.Ukwethulwa kwemiklomelo yezindondo okuzohlonishwa ngayo amaciko aKwaZulu-Natal, bekuhanjelwe osaziwayo, okubalwa uSjava, DJ Tira nabanye.Ntambama kube ne-After Party kwanandisa uBlack Coffee, DJ Kotin, DJ Happygal, Sjerere, Tira noSjava.Uhlelo beluphethwe abasakazi beGagasi FM, uHeazy noNomalanga Shozi.Bekukhona namanye amaciko okungoSandy B, Distruction Boyz, DJ Kabila, Nhlanhla Mdlalose weSibaya, Swazi Mokoena weMbewu:The Seed, Ladysmith Black Mambazo, Khaya Dladla nabanye.Umcimbi wezindondo uzoba ngoDisemba 15, e-ICC, eThekwini. Amaciko azonqoba eminxeni ehlukene azoklonyeliswa ngoR100 000, kanti ozothatha indondo enkulu uzothola uR500 000.
title: UBlack Coffee imhlabe umxhwele ingoma kaZandie Khumalo

text: UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala uxwayise abantu ngokuthi buzovalwa utshwala uma bebuxhaphaza badale izingozi zomgwaqo, bashaye abesifazane nezingane, balwe bagcine sebelaliswa ngobuningi ezibhedlela.Esithangamini nabezindaba ebesiseThekwini izolo uZikalala uveze ukuthi isifundazwe silahlekelwe wuR30 billion obuzongeniswa ngezokuvakasha futhi uyathemba ukuthi ukungena esigabeni sesibili kwezwe kuzosiza ekuhlengeni imisebenzi.“Sithanda ukuxwayisa abantu ukuthi iCovid-19 iseyingozi noma izwe selingene esigaba sesibili. Sicela abaphuzayo bangabuxhaphazi utshwala ngoba sizobuvala uma bebuphuza ngendlela engahlelekile. Sonke isifundazwe sisagcwele iCovid-19, okusho ukuthi kufanele sizivikele, sigqoke izifonyo, sigeze izandla siqhelelane,” kusho uZikalala.Izindawo ezihamba phambili ngeCovid-19 yiTheku, uMgungundlovu neKing Cetshwayo.EThekwini izindawo ezihamba phambili ngabantu abaneCovid-19 Umlazi-3 474, Phoenix-1 439, KwaMashu- 1 434, Chatsworth- 1 138 nePinetown- 956.EMgungundlovu yiNorthdale, Imbali, Edendale izindawo ezinesibalo esiphezulu sabaneCovid-19.EKing Cetshwayo izindawo ezinabantu abaningi abaneCovid-19 yiPanorama, Gratham, Empangeni, Richards Bay, Mhlanga Reserve, Ezimambeni bese kulandela ezinye.Bawu-3 561 abasebenzi bezempilo okutholwe ukuthi baneCovid-19 selokhu kwaqubuka igciwane.Izibalo zangoMgqibelo zikhombisa ukuthi bangu-22 abantu ababulawe yiCovid-19 KwaZulu-Natal.Abashonayo kuvela ukuthi banezifo ezingamahlalakhona okubalwa ushukela, isifo somfutho wegazi, iHIV nobukhulu obudlulele bomzimba.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, ucele abantu ukuthi bangazitsheli ukuthi sekuyigigi, sebezohamba umathanda njengoba izwe selisesigabeni sesibili ngoba kufanele baqaphele.Uthe izibhedlela zimi ngomumo ukuhlenga abangenwa yiCovid-19 futhi zikhona nezibhedlela zesikhashana abazenzile eThekwini, kwiLembe, Mkhanyakude nakwezinye izindawo.“Sixwayisiwe ngesigaba sesibili sokutheleleka kwabantu ngeCovid-19 ngakho siyacela baqhubeke nokuqapha. Bazivikele, balandele imithetho yokuqhelelana, eyokufaka izifonyo nokugeza izandla. Akuyona iphathi kodwa isikhathi esikusona siyingozi kakhulu, sidinga ukuthi sihlale siqaphile,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Bangu-104 619 abantu abaneCovid-19 kulesi sifundzwe, bangu-1 673 abashonile, bangu-78 909 asebeluleme.Isibhedlela Inkosi Albert Luthuli sineziguli eziningi ezilaliswe emagunjni abagula kakhulu, kulandele iNgwelezane neKing Edward.
title: Isexwayiso ngotshwala eKZN

text: KUSHE kwangqongqa amatekisi amathathu nezimoto ezimbili kudubulana izinkampani ezimbili zonogada erenki yaseMandeni enyakatho yeKwaZulu-Natali ngoMsombuluko ntambama.Ngokomthombo obukhona erenki izolo, isidumo sisuke ngesikhathi abanikazi bamatekisi kanye nonogada abaqapha irenki bezokhokha imali yerenki. Kube sekufika amaphoyisa aseMandeni ezobanika incwadi yemvume yokubamba umhlangano waserenki."Sithe sisamile kwafika uSihlalo werenki (igama lakhe eligodliwe) ehamba nonogada abangabalelwa ku-11 abangaziwa. Labo nogada bathe kabafuni ukuthi kukhokhwe lemali ekhokhwa erenki, kusixakile ke lokhu  ngoba phela ihleli ikhokhwa njalo lemali."USihlalo ube esebaleka eqa ujantshi wesitimela wathathwa yimoto esingayazi. Sithe sisathuswe yilokho kwaqhuma isibhamu, salala phansi ngezisu nokuyilapho sibone khona amatekisi amathathu nezimoto ezimbili zonogada berenki zivutha amalangabi," kuchaza lo mthombo.Umthombo uthe omunye wozakwabo usinde ngokulambisa ngesikhathi ezama ukuyohlenga imoto yakhe lapho bekupakwe khona izimoto wagcina esevaleleke khona.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, ngenyanga edlule kudutshulwe kwabulawa omunye usomatekisi, uMnuz Siyabonga Mbonambi (53), owabulawa owesilisa ongaziwa egaraji likaphethiloli kulendawo.Esitatemendeni esithunyelwe okhulumela amaphoyisa, uKapteni Nqobile Gwala uthe, kube nokudubulana erenki yaseMandeni ngo-17h15 ntambama  ngoMsombuluko. Uthe kushe izimoto eziwu-6, kanti abekho abalimele kulesi sigameko."Okwamanje asaziwa isizathu salokhu kudubulana, uphenyo lwamaphoyisa lusaqhubeka," kusho uGwala. UMgcinimafa weSouth African National Taxi Council (SANTACO) ngaphansi kwesifunda iLembe, uMnuz Bongani Mkhwanazi usihlabile lesi sehlo. "Sithole ukuthi bekudubulana onogada bakasoseshini owodwa, okuyisenzo esisigxekayo kakhulu. Ngokujwayelekile usoseshini uba nenkampani yonogada eyodwa. Sifisa ukugqugquzela ososeshini ukuthi bakwazi ukuxoxisana baxazulule izinkinga ezivelayo emsebenzini," usho kanje. Uqhube waveza ukuthi uMnyango wezokuThutha nokuPhepha kuMphakathi uhlele ukuba nomhlangano nalo soseshini namhlanje.
title: Kushe amatekisi nezimoto kudubulana onogada erenki

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEUMSHAYELI weloli elishayisene nemoto encane kwashona abayisithupha ku-N2 eMkhomazi ngeSonto ebusuku uthi kusenzima ukususa emqondweni wakhe isithombe sabashonile azame ukubahlenga sebengene ngaphansi kweloli lakhe.Ingozi ehlasimulisayo phakathi kweloli neVW Polo kushone kuyo abantu abayisithupha, abesilisa abahlanu nowesifazane oyedwa.Kushone elayizolo kusenzima ukuthola ukuthi abashonile bangobani nokuthi bebelibangisephi kepha imoto ibinezinombolo zaseGauteng.Kuthe uma kuhlolwa ukubhaliswa kwayo kwavela ukuthi ngeyowesilisa waseGauteng ohlala eBerea. Amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal abephansi phezulu ezama ukuthola imindeni yabashonile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuphenywa icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso kodwa abakaziwa abashonile.“Amaphoyisa aseMkhomazi aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso emuva kwengozi edlule nemiphefumulo eyisithupha ngeSonto,” kusho uGwala.UMnuz Edwin Baikwa (30) waseZimbabwe obeshayela iloli uthe eminyakeni eyisishiyagalombili eshayela amaloli akakaze asibone isimo esimehlele. UBaikwa ubehamba nomndeni wakhe indodakazi nonina ephuma emsebenzini eseya kwakhe ePort Shepstone. Bathole imihuzuko engatheni kule ngozi.“Bese ngiqedile ukusebenza sengiya ekhaya nomndeni wami ngo-10 ebusuku. Ngidlule kancane ibhuloho laseMkhomazi, ngisakhuphuka intaba, ngibone imoto encane ihamba ngejubane isuka ngaphesheya komgwaqo, ezimotweni ebengiphambana nazo. Ngizamile ukuma kodwa ibigijima kakhulu, ngezwa umsindo omkhulu. Ngimise iloli ngakhipha ingane nonina. Ngithe ngiyobheka ngaphambili ngabona imoto ingene ngaphansi kweloli. Ngizamile ukuba ngihlenge abantu ababengaphakathi kodwa bebengasanyakazi. Namanje leso sithombe silokhu sidlala engqondweni yami. Kunzima kakhulu ukubuka abantu sebeshonile phambi kwakho ungazi nokuthi ungabasiza ngani. Kunzima kakhulu,” kusho uBaikwa.UBaikwa nomndeni wakhe badedelwe esibhedlela izolo. Uthe unesifiso sokuhlangana nemindeni yabashonile.Uthe usesaba ukuthinta iloli emuva kwengozi.“Ngisaqhaqhazela namanje ngenxa yale nto. Selokhu ngafika eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2009 ngiyaqala ukubhekana nalesi simo. Kumanje angazi ngizokwazi kanjani ukuqhubeka nomsebenzi,” kusho uBaikwa. Umbiko wabezimo eziphuthumayo abafike kulesi sigameko uthe akukho abebengakwenzela laba abebesemotweni encane ngendlela abebelimele ngayo.UChris Botha, okhulumela abakwaNetcare 911, uthe bebevaleleke ngaphakathi emotweni abashonile.“Sibizwe endaweni yesigameko safica iloli nemoto encane kushayisene. Ngokombiko esiwutholile imoto encane isuke emzileni wayo, yaqonda elolini. Abantu abayisithupha esibafice kule moto bese bevele beshonile,” kusho uBotha.
title: Uyokhohlwa efile obeshayela iloli elishayisene nemoto encane

text: NGIWUMUNTU okuthandayo ukuthandwa ngoba nami nginothando nje sidalo sami. Angiqondile kona ukuthi ngiyingelosi eyadukela emhlabeni kodwa ngiwumuntu obathandayo abantu ngokwendlela engadalwa ngayo.Ukuthanda nokuthandwa kulezi zinsuku sekwaba yinto eyimpicabadala kakhulu ngoba ikhohlisana ihlomile isikhathi esiningi. Uke uzitshele ukuthi umuntu omthandayo uyakuthanda kanti cha ukomunye nje umqondo wena uthanda wedwa.Sengibonile nokho ukuthi lokhu kufuna kwami ukuthandwa, njengoba ngithanda, sengathi ngeke kuphumelele ngisadla anhlamvana. Sekungicacele kwathi bha okwempahla yentshitane ukuthi umuntu uthandwa kakhulu uma esedlulile emhlabeni. Uyabona nje manje uma kungaphuma igama lokuthi akasekho emhlabeni uBoyah, ungalubona uthando olungavumbuka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Ngiwumuntukazana nje ongabaluleke ngalutho kodwa ngalolo suku lokuvela kwezindaba zokufa kwami ungathola nami sengiphezulu laphaya koTwitter wena owabona abantu abadumile impela njengo-Itumeleng Khune noCaster Semenya.Ngibuhlungu-ke ngokuthi mina ngidinga uthando manje kodwa izindodla zalo ziyoqhamuka kakhulu uma sengingakwazi ukulujabulela sengilele ubuthongo bafuthi. Ngiyazi uma kukhulunywa ngokufa abantu abathandisisi, bazoze bacabange ukuthi sengininga ukuzikhunga.Okwenza ukuthi ngiyiqale kanje le ngosi ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika isiphinde yagubuzelwa yifu elimnyama ngokudlula emhlabeni kukaPhilemon “Chippa” Masinga (osesithombeni). Cha yona le nkunzi isizumile impela yize kwezwakala ngoDisemba ukuthi ingeniswe esibhedlela ibambekile.Kwenzeke lokhu engiqale ngakho ngenhla-ke ngesikhathi kuvela izindaba zokudlula emhlabeni kukaMasinga ngeSonto. Luqubuke okwamagagasi olwandle, edudulwa isivunguvungu somoya, uthando lwakhe kubo bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika. Akugcinanga lapha kwelengabadi ngoba naphesheya cha kuqhume isililo esihambisana nothando kwezwakala bencoma ubumnene, uthando, ukuzinikela nokuphilela ibhola kukaMasinga.Ningangizwa kabi bakwethu. Angisho ukuthi kubi ukukhalisana nomndeni wakwaMasinga nokuncoma amagalelo akhe kunobhutshuzwayo ngoba sonke siyazi ukuthi uyibekile induku ebandla. Okungicasula ngizwe ngincinzelwa amakhwapha kakhulu ukuthi kukhona namanga aqanjwayo manje ngoba nakhu esethule umfo kaMasinga.Uyazi ngezwa ngithukuthela, yize ngingangene, ngesikhathi umengameli weSouth African Football Association (Safa) uDanny Jordaan ephawula ngoMasinga. UJordaan uthe: “Besikulindele ukwamukela uPhil njengesinye sezikhulu zeSafa”.Njengoba ngibhala le ngosi nje iqiniso ukuthi angizazi izingxoxo ebeziba khona phakathi kukaJordaan (noma iSafa) noMasinga. Nokho yinto engihlulekayo ukuyikholwa ukuthi sikhona isikhundla ebesiphendlelwa uMasinga kwiSafa. Yini singakaze sizwe ngalokho? Kwenzeka kanjani ukuthi kuzwakale ngoba nakhu esengakwazi ukuziphendulela uMasinga?Inkinga ebhekene nabaphathi bebhola baseNigizimu Afrika ukuthi banamanga ngale ndlela exakile. Kungekudala bekukhulunywa ngokuthi uLucas Radebe ubefuna ukungenela ukhetho lukamengameli weSafa wachithwa. Ngiyazi ukuthi kwakusetshenziswa umthethosisekelo othi akekho ngaphansi kwezinhlaka zeSafa ngakho akavunyelwe ukungenela ukhetho. Kodwa ngiyazi ukuthi uma engadlula emhlabeni uRadebe, uJordaan angaphinde akhulume into engekho athi kukhona abebekuphendlela yena kwiSafa yize sazi kahle ukuthi akukho. Akayena umuntu ozwana neqiniso uJordaan futhi sengikusho kaningi lokhu kuyona le ngosi phambilini.Ziningi izinkakha ezasenza saziqhenya ngeBafana Bafana ngo-1996 njengaye uMasinga kodwa azisetshenziswa yiSafa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ibhola lethu liyakhula. Akwanele ukuthi nguHelman “Ncane” Mkhalele kuphela okhona ezinhlakeni zeSafa njengoba eyiphini likaThabo Senong eqenjini lesizwe lika-Under 20, Amajita.Ngake ngezwa kuthiwa u-Aaron “Mbazo” Mokoena angase abe yimenenja kwiSafa, ngasho ngathi hhayi sesobona uma sekwenzeka. Kuvimbeni kuyimanje ngoba phela ukhona uMokoena akenzi lutho?Laba abakhona kwiSafa njengamanje abayingeni indaba yokudedela abanye ngoba basafuna ukudla imali okungenani eminye iminyaka emihlanu. Bayongena ezinhlakeni zeSafa mhla liphuma ngakuphike ilanga abadlali abadala beBafana?Into okumele siyiyeke nje siyisizwe ukuthanda umuntu ngoba esefile, okungasizi ngalutho. UMasinga bekumele athandwe aphinde anikwe umsebenzi esaphila hhayi lokhu kumncoma njengamanje okungasasho lutho. Ulale ngoxolo Chippa, bayeke nokukhuluma into engekho oJordaan ngoba nakhu ungasakwazi ukuziphendulela.- Phansi Emgodini
title: [IMIBONO] Sekunongwe namanga ngoba umfo kaMasinga esethule

text: ABAHLENGIKAZI abagomele iCovid-19  ngesikhathi kwethulwa uhlelo lokusatshalaliswa esibhedlela iMshiyeni,  izolo bathi kungcono ukwenza izaba kunokulinda uze ungenwe yigciwane.Bathi kunzima ukuhlalela ovalweni lokuthi ungayithola noma yinini iCovid-19, kungcono uma usugonyiwe.USister Lucia Mngadi (60), osebenza emtholampilo ongaphakathi esibhedlela eMshiyeni, uthi ike yamgulisa iCovid-19  ngesisivunguvungu sokuqala." Ngesivunguvungu sokuqala ngagula kakhulu. Kwesesibili angizange ngigule kodwa zikhona izimpawu engangizibona ezingatheni, ngiyasola ukuthi nganginayo kodwa angihlolanga. Angisafisi ukuthi ngibuye ngigule. Ngiyakholwa ukuthi umgomo uzongivikela. Sengikhulile kanti abantu abadala yibo abagula kakhulu uma kuke kwenzeka bathola leli gciwane,"  kusho uSister Mngadi.Uthe ngaphandle kokuzivikela yena, ufuna ukuvikela umndeni wakhe nabanye abantu.USister Nomusa Ndzimbovu osebenza eMshiyeni, uthe: " Lukhona uvalo ngoba angazi ukuthi lo mgomo uzongiphatha kanjani egazini ngoba yonke imithi inokuthile ekwenzayo egazini lomuntu. Osekunginika isibindi ukuthi umengameli wakuleli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa , uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo uDkt Zweli  Mkhize nabanye abahlengikazi bagomile izolo (ngoLwesibili) asikezwa kuthiwa bayagula.“UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uSihle Zikalala, uthe isibhedlela iMshiyeni sithole imigomo engu-5 040, kwathi isibhedlela Inkosi Albert Luthuli  sathola imigomo engu-5 760.Uqhube wathi uhlelo lokusatshalaliswa komgomo obelukhona kudingeke ukuthi lushintshwe kancane, lulungele umgomo ofikile ngoba mncane. Uthe izolo bekuzogonywa abasebenzi bezempilo abangu-370 eMshiyeni.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uthe  lezi zibhedlela zikhethwe ngenxa yokuthi yizo ezinabantu abaningi abanaleli gciwane." Umgomo uzofika ngezikhawu, uma kukhona ofikile sizolokhu sikhetha izikhungo ezinesibalo esiphezulu kuze kwenele. Ngeshwa asikwazi ukugoma bonke abantu ngesikhathi esisodwa, njengoba sasihlelile ngoba lo mgomo ngeke ufike ube mningi. Lokho kuzosinika ithuba lokuthi sihlele ukuthi yisiphi isikhungo esizothola njalo ezinsukwini eziwu-10 ,"  kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.UMnuz Mandla Shabangu uNobhala weDenosa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe bayalweseka uhlelo lokusabalaliswa komgomo olukhona kodwa mncane." Sifisa ukuthi kube nokuxhumana phakathi kukahulumeni nezinyunyana ngoba sisekomitini elihlanganisa umnyango nezinyunyana kodwa abazange basazise uma sekuzokwethulwa lolu hlelo,"  kusho uNobhala.UMnuz Mlungisi Ndlovu wePublic Servants Association of South Africa (PSA), uthe lo lolu hlelo kumele ngabe kade laqalwa uma kubhekwa amanye amazwe."Sikholwa ukuthi iKZN yonke iyawudinga umgomo izikhungo ezimbili azenele. Sinxusa umengameli noDkt Mkhize ukuthi benze uhlelo oluzoshesha ukuze kuvikelele umphakathi ngobuningi. Uma singaqhubeka kanje kusho ukuthi kungaphela neminyaka emibili  singaqedile ukugoma.
title: 'Kungcono ukwenza izaba ngeCorona'

text: “NGESIKHATHI ngizwa izindaba zokudlula emhlabeni kukaBaby Lee ngihlulekile wukuzibamba, izinyembezi zigcwale amehlo. Ngaso sonke isikhathi uma ngimbuka ejima bengihlale ngibona uKatie Taylor wase-Ireland ongumpetha weWBA, WBC, IBF neWBO Lightweight. Esitebeleni sethu i-All Winners Boxing Club uyena yedwa obeyibhokisa lesifazane, benginezinhloso ezinkulu ngaye”La mazwi ashiwo uMlandeli Tengimfene obeyimenenja kaLeighandre “Baby Lee” Jegels oshone ngoLwesihlanu emuva kokudutshulwa obeyisoka lakhe okuthiwa ubese elifake isivimbelo senkantolo ngenxa yokuthi belimhlukumeza. Kuthiwa lo mshayisibhakela obemakhonokhono njengoba nakwi-karate ubungeke umthinte. Udutshulwe ehamba nonina belibhekise ejimini i-All Winners Boxing Club, eMdantsane, e-East London. Kuvela nokuthi nonina kumbulwa kwembeswa kuye esibhedlela njengoba edubulekile naye. UTengimfene uthe uBaby Lee ushone elungiselela impi yakhe noSiphosonke Nxazonke ebizoba ngo-Okthoba 5, eMthatha. Le mpi obekuhloswe ngayo ukubuyisa umgqigqo wakhe beyizobhulela amazolo eyomhlaba kaThulani “Tulz” Mbenge nebhokisa laseGhana. Le ntokazi eyake yaba yingqwele yesicoco sakuleli seSuper Flyweight igcine ukubonakala eringini ngo-2017 ishaya ngomngqimuzo womlalisa phansi uFatuma Yazidu waseTanzania. Ishone ingawazi umpetshisi. Izinqobe zoyisishiyagalolunye izimpi zayo. Kulesi sibalo eziyisikhombisa iziwine ngemingqimuzo yomlalisa phansi. UTengimfene uveze ukuthi isizathu esidale ukuthi agcine ukulwa ngo-2017 uBaby Lee ukuthi ubesegxile emsebenzini wobuthishela. “Kwi-All Winners Boxing Club, uBaby Lee ufike ngoMeyi wase engitshela ukuthi uyahluleka ukuyeka isibhakela ngoba sisemithanjeni yakhe. Sivumelane ngokuthi simfake ezimpini zango-Okthoba 5. Ubematasa elungiselela le mpi. Besihlela ukuthi ngemuva kwayo simtholele ezomfaka ezilinganisweni zeWBC. Impela sife olwembiza,” kubeka uTengimfene.Njengoba abaqeqeshi bezamankomane behlala bekhala ngobunzima bokucija amabhokisa esifazane, uTengimfene uthe kuBaby Lee bekungolunye udaba.“UBaby Lee ubenzisa kwendoda futhi le eqinile. Ubejima njengamabhokisa abesilisa. Ubuhlungu ubengabusabi nakancane. Ngicabanga ukuthi usizwe ukudlala ikarate ngaphambi kokujoyina isibhakela. Amabhokisa asesitebeleni sethu ebazi kahle ukuthi uma ezongcweka naye abethwala kanzima”UTengimfene uthe umndeni ubungakabazisi ngezinhlelo zomngcwabo nangezenkonzo yesikhumbuzo. Uthe lokhu kudalwa ukuthi unina waleli bhokisa usesibhedlela. Kuvele ukuthi isoka liboshiwe kodwa lisesibhedlela ngemuva kokulimala lishayisa nemoto ngemuva kwesigameko.
title: Ushone engayazi induku esibhakeleni

text: AMAQEMBU akuleli  iMamelodi Sundowns neKaizer Chiefs azibekisele indawo kweyamaqoqo eCaf Champions League enqoba imidlalo yawo yomlenze wesibili wesigaba sokuhlunga.ISundowns ihlule iJwaneng Galaxy yaseBotswana ngo 3-1 ngoLwesibili eLoftus Versfeld Stadium. Amagoli ashaywe uKermit Erasmus, Mothobi Mvala noThapelo Morena. AmaBrazilians adlule ngo 5-1 uma sekuhlanganiswa imilenze yomibili njengoba yanqoba owokuqala ekuhambeni ngo 2-0. Ngale mpumlelo yayo ibe isibhala kabusha umlando wayo kulo mqhudelwano iba yiqembu lokuqala laseNingizimu Afrika ukungena kweyamaqoqo amahlandla ayisithupha kulandelana.Ngakolunye uhlangothi iChiefs inqobe ngo 1-0 ekuhambeni ishaya i-De Agosto yase-Angola. Igoli laMakhosi livalelwe phakathi uLeonardo Castro esiwombeni sokuqala. Leli qembu likaGavin Hunt lifike kulo mdlalo zibambene ngo 0-0 womphumela womdlalo womlenze wokuqala, belidinga ukunqoba noma lidlale ngokulingana ngamagoli ukuze lidlulele kweyamaqoqo.Kumaqembu adlala kwiCaf Confederation Cup, i-Orlando Pirates idlulele esigabeni sokugcina sokuhlungela amaqoqo emuva kokuthi iSagrada Esperanca yase-Angola inqume ukungezi ukuzodlala umdlalo womlenze wesibili weCaf Confederation Cup kuleli ngenxa yokwesaba iCovid-19. IPirates isizoqhathwa nelinye lamaqembu ahlulwe emzuliswaneni wokuqala kwiChampions League emizameni yokuzibekisela indawo esigabeni samaqoqo. IBloemfontein Celtic izodlala namuhla neRivers United ekuhambeni yahlulwa ngo 2-0 kowomlenze wokuqala. Amaqembu azoqhathwa ngoJanuwari 17.
title: I’Downs neChiefs bazibekisele indawo kweyamaqoqo eCaf Champions League

text: BAVALE imigwaqo befuna ukufakelwa itiyela emigwaqweni, abakhala ngokuthi idala izingozi futhi ixoshe nabatshali bezimali.Amalungu enhlangano yosomatekisi, iBhekisizwe Taxi Association, avuke umbhejazane ngoMsombuluko avala imigwaqo eyahlukene eNkandla.Amalungu ale nhlangano afuna ukulungiselwa imigwaqo exhumanisa iNkandla namadolobha akhelene nayo,  okubalwa kuwo iNquthu neKranskop.Ababhikishi bakhale ngokuthi imigwaqo yakule ndawo isesimeni esibi, idala izingozi futhi ixoshe nabatshali bezimali abafisa ukuzosebenza endaweni.Umbhikisho wayizolo uholele ekutheni kujikiswe abafundi basezikoleni ezahlukene kwazise bekuvalwe ezindaweni eziningi ezahlukene njengaseKombe, KwaBaloyi, Dolwane, Manyane, Nsuze nezinye.Amalungu ale nhlangano afuna ukulungiselwa umgwaqo uP90, osuka edolobheni eNkandla uye eKombe, uP16 osuka eKranskop, unqamule ezingxenyeni ezithize zeNkandla uze uyophumela eNquthu, noP50 wona osuka eQhudeni uye edolobheni eNkandla.Unobhala wenhlangano, uMnuz Sabelo Basi, uthe sebekhathele wukubanjiswa udonga wuMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, ngokulungiswa komgwaqo.“Sekudlalwe ngathi kakhulu. Yingakho sivimbile namhlanje (izolo). Lo mgwaqo udala izingozi futhi usibulalela izimoto. Kakulethwa ngisho ugandaganda ozolungisa umgwaqo noma kufakwe inkwali okungenani.”UBasi uthe bake baba nethemba lokuthi umgwaqo uzofakwa itiyela ngesikhathi kuhlatshwa isoyi ngowayengungqongqoshe ngaleso sikhathi, uMnuz Willies Mchunu.“Into abayenza kwaba wukuwumba kancane umgwaqo, base beyanyamalala. Inkinga enkulu wukuthi lapho abawumba khona umgwaqo kakuhambeki uma imvula inile.”UBasi uthe umnyango wabathembisa ngo-2017 ukuqhubeka nokufaka itiyela emgwaqweni, emhlanganweni owawuhanjelwe ngowayengungqongqoshe ngaleso sikhathi, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda.“Akukho okwenzeka emva kwalowo mhlangano.”UBasi uthe manje sebefuna uNgqongqoshe walo Mnyango, uNkk Peggy Nkonyeni, kube nguye ozokhuluma nabo.“Sizoqhubeka nombhikisho kuze kube sithola izimpendulo ezigculisayo.” Uthe isimo esingesihle somgwaqo sixosha nabatshali bezimali endaweni.“Kukhona osomabhizinisi abafuna ukusakhela inxanxathela yezitolo KwaDolwane kepha bakhala ngomgwaqo.”Imizamo yokuzwa ukuphawula kokhulumela uMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwanele Ncalane, kayizange iphumelele.Ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa. Umyalezo awuthunyelwe wona akazange awuphendule kodwa bekubonakala ukuthi uwufundile.
title: Bavale imigwaqo befuna itiyela eNkandla

text: UMLINGISI osezakhele udumo ngokungansinsitheki, uSibonile Ngubane, uthi akulingisa kwiSibaya yizinto ayezibona zenziwa nguyise esakhula.Echaza ngale ndawo ayilingisayo kaMbovu Ngubane, uSibonile (46) uthe kwavele kwaqondana nje ukuthi alingise indawo yomuntu wasebukhosini bakwaNgubane ekubeni naye ezalwa khona.Uthe le ndawo ayilingisayo wayikopela kuyise ongasekho, uGesi.“Ubaba wayeyinduna yasesigodini saseWangu eMacambini ngaphansi kwenkosi esiyakhothama uKhayelihle Mathaba.“Wayeyindoda ehlonishwayo eMacambini. Ngangivamise ukumbona uma ethetha amacala, ngibuka nendlela akhuluma ngayo nabantu.Yingakho-ke ngathi uma nginikezwa le ndawo ngakhumbula konke ayekwenza uma ethetha amacala.”Uthe uyinhlalisuthi yaseThempelini iVunizitha eMandeni ngaphansi komfundisi uMathonsi, okungelohlangothi lwaseBuhleni. “Ngizobe ngikhonza khona nje ngaleli Sabatha.”Lo mlingisi ophinde abonakale nasezikhangisweni zethelevishini, akakufundelanga ukulingisa kodwa wazifundisa yena.“Ngiqale ukufunda eWangu Primary, ngadlulela eSomshoko Secondary lapho ngiphothule khona uGrade 12 ngo-1991.“Ngemuva kokuqeda isikole ngavele ngaba nenhlanhla yokulingisa emdlalweni othi Skwiza ePlayhouse (eThekwini).”Kusuka lapho uSibonile akabange esabheka emuva ngoba wabe esengena emculweni njengoba esebuya emazweni amaningi e-Europe, Asia, North& South America.Uthe ubephelezela ngamazwi futhi edlalela izingwazi zabaculi bakuleli uMbongeni Ngema, Simphiwe Dana noRingo Madlingozi ama-percursions. Ikhono likaSibonile libe seqhakanjiswe yiStar Quality Management.“Yilapho-ke kuqale khona ukuqhakaza kwekhono lami lokulingisa emidlalweni yethelevishini okubalwa kuyo neSibaya.“Ngaphambi kwalo mdlalo, uSibonile ubesebuya emidlalweni yeshashalazi kaMbongeni Ngema okuyiSarafina, Lion Of The East ne-Ipi Ntombi.Selokhu ebonakale kwiSibaya akasahlehli njengoba imisebenzi isimlandela ngapha nangapha.“Khona maduze ngizobokala ngilingisa emdlalweni omusha wethelevishini osihloko sithi Uselwa. Ngizobe ngidlala indawo ephambili kaMzwezwe.”Akasagcini ngokulingisa emidlalweni kuphela kodwa usengenisile nasezikhangisweni okukhona kuzo esakwaFord, DSTV, KFC nesakamuva seLion Lager.USibonile uthe uyise wadlula emhlabeni ngo-2008 kodwa unina uNkk Fezekile uMaKhoza Ngubane usaphila.Ezintokazini ebezisamconsela amathe, azikhohlwe ngoba usenaye umaqondana uBuhle uMaNkomo Ngubane futhi babusiswe ngamantombazane amathathu nomfana oyedwa.
title: Ufunde kuyise akwenza kwiSibaya

text: USATHUKILE owesilisa wasoThongathi ngaphandle kwaseThekwini ozithele phezu kwethuna elingashoni kungcwatshwe kulo ingane eneminyaka elinganiselwa kwemine nonina ngoMsombuluko.UMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu (48) ubeyodayisa amabhodlela ukuze athole ukudla, uzithele phezu kwegazi endleleni esendaweni eyihlathi.Uthe ulandele amachaphazelo egazi waze wafika engqumbini yenhlabathi obekucaca ukuthi kumbiwe kwagqitshwa okuthize kuyo. Uhlabe umkhosi ebiza amaphoyisa afike athola isidumbu sengane nonina abebebulewe.“Namanje ngisashaqekile futhi ngithukile ngenxa yento engiyibonile, ingane ingqitshwe nonina ethuneni elingashoni. Sihlezi sihamba kule ndlela yize iyihlathi. Ngihambe khona ngo-12 ngikade ngiyodayisa amabhodlela kabhiya. Ngithe sengibuya ngo-4 ntambama ngabona ukuthi kule ndawo kunegazi eliningi. Ngilandele amachaphazelo egazi ngafika engqumbini yenhlabathi ngabona ukuthi kukhona umuntu obulewe wagqitshwa. Ngibize abanye abantu, safonela amaphoyisa afike ngokushesha,” kusho uNdlovu.ITHUNA elingashoni ekutholwe kulo owesifazane nengane yakhe oThongathi ngaphandle kwaseThekwini ngoMsombuluko Isithombe:SIBONELO NGCOBOUthe amaphoyisa afike nezinja zahogela zaphanda emgodini kwavela izandla.“Ngimangele sekumbiwa ukuthi kugqitshwe abantu ababili kulo mgodi,” kusho uNdlovu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane uthe amaphoyisa asoThongathi aphenya amacala okubulala.“Isidumbu sowesifazane besinenxeba esiphongweni. Kusolwa ukuthi nengane ibulewe. Imbangela ayikaziwa. Akekho oboshiwe,” kusho uZwane.Omunye wesifazane ongathandanga ukudalulwa ngenxa yokusaba umbulali uthe kusamthusile akubonile“Namanje asipheli isithombe sengane yentombazane ibigqoke isikibha esibomvu esifishane, ibulewe. Nonina ubegqokile kodwa angizange ngizibone kahle izimpahla zakhe ngenxa yenhlabathi. Kungimangazile futhi kwangidabukisa engikubonile njengomzali. Ngifisa umsolwa aboshwe ngoba sesiyasaba nathi esihlala lapha,” kusho lowesifazane.Uthe le ndlela enqamula ehlathini bajwayele ukuhamba kuyo futhi abakaze babanjwe ngisho inkunzi.“Ngisola ukuthi umuntu oyaziyo le ndlela ofike walahla lo wesifazane nengane. Ngokwami ngisola isoka noma uyise wengane ngoba mancane amathuba okuthi umuntu obeyofuna amatoho, ehamba nengane lona obulewe,” kusho lo wesifazane.Amaphoyisa acele usizo ngolwazi emphakathini ukuze athole umndeni walo wesifazane nomsolwa.“Ongaba nolwazi olungasiza amaphoyisa ophenyweni lwawo sicela asithinte ku: 08600 10111,” kusho uZwane.
title: Uthole ingane nonina begqitshwe ehlathini

text: USETHUBENI lokuthola indawo esikwatini seCAF Champions League kwi-Orlando Pirates uFortune Makaringe okuqinisekisile ngempelasonto ukuthi uyayishiya iMaritzburg United.UMakaringe usize iTeam of Choice yagcina indawo yayo kwi-Absa Premiership ngokuwina yonke imidlalo yokuhlunga ebiyidlala namaqembu eNational First Division (NFD) iRoyal Eagles neTshakhuma Tsha. Useyobanga indawo enkabeni yenkundla kwiPirates noMusa Nyatama, Xola Mlambo, Mpho Makola noLinda “Figo” Mntambo.IPirates izophinde imele iNingizimu Afrika kwiChampions League neMamelodi Sundowns.Ngesonto eledlule ngesikhathi kwethulwa ngokusemthethweni umqhudelwano iCarling Black Label Cup, umqeqeshi wePirates uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic uthe abadlali abazobasayinisa ubheke ukuthi bafike noshintsho esikimini sakhe. UMakaringe uzojoyina iPirates nomdlali wasemuva kwesokunxele uTebogo “Messi” Tlolane obeyibamba kwiChippa United. Amaqembu kufanele ahambise kwiCAF uhla lwabadlali ngaphambi kukaJulayi 11.“Lona bekuwunyaka wokushintsha kwekhalenda yeCAF Champions League. Ngokwekhalenda elihambisana nelase-Europe kuzodlalwa kusuka ngo-Agasti kuya kuMeyi. Sizodlala imidlalo yokuhlunga. Abakasiniki izinsuku eziqondile kodwa ngaphambi kukaJulayi 11 sizohambisa uhla. Basazokwenza njengasekuqaleni ukuthi basinike izikhala zabadlali abawu-30 kodwa asizigcwalisi zonke ngoba senzela ukufaka abadlali esizobasayinisa,” kusho uSredojevic.UMakaringe ujoyine iTeam of Choice ngo-2015 esuka kwiMoroka Swallows. Usesikwatini sabadlali abawu-30 somqeqeshi weBafana Bafana uStuart Baxter okuzohlungwa kusona abawu-23 abazoya kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon).Enkulumeni yakhe ezwakale njengobevalelisa ngoMgqibelo uMakaringe.“Usihlalo wasitshela ukuthi ngeke asivimbe uma kukhona amaqembu asifunayo ngoba noma yikuphi lapho esizobe sikhona sizobe simele iMaritzburg. Bangithola ngimncane ngidlala kwiMDC yeSwallows, banginika ithuba. Bangidlalise kwiMDC baphinde banginyusela esikimini esikhulu. Ngibizwe esikwatini ngikuyona iMaritzburg. Noma sengimdala mhlawumbe emuva kweminyaka ewu-10 ngiyosho ukuthi ngaqala lapha. Mhlawumbe ngiyobuya,” kusho uMakaringe.
title: UMakaringe ethubeni lemidlalo yeCaf nePirates

text: IZWE lase-Egypt lizosingatha i-African Cup Of Nations ezoqala ngoJuni 15 kuya kuJulayi 13 nonyaka. Lezi zindaba zimenyezelwe uMengameli weConfederation of African Football (CAF) u-Ahmba Ahmad ngpLwesibili eDakar, eSenegal.Izikhulu zeCAF zincamele ukuqoka i-Egypt kuneNingizimu Afrika ukusingatha i-AFCON kulandela ukuhoxiswa kwezwe laseCameroon ebihluleka ukuhlelela lo mncintiswano.“Ngifisa ukuwabonga lawa mazwe omabili, atakule iCAF ngesikhathi sibona ukuthi umsebenzi wokusingatha i-AFCON eCameroon ubungakaqali,” kusho u-Ahmad.Isikhulu seCAF sazise i-AFP ukuthi i-Egypt ithole amavoti awu-16 kwikomiti ebelivota, iNingizimu Afrika yathola elilodwa.Lesi simemezelo senziwe kusaphele amahora ambalwa iCAF ithe izosenza ngoLwesithathu ukuze ngoLwesibili kuzogxilwa emcimbini yemiklomelo yeCAF eseDakar.Kuzobe kungokwesihlanu i-Egypt isingethe i-AFCON njengoba yenza okufanayo ngo-1959, 1974, 1986 nango-2006.ISAFA ifake isicelo sokusingatha nje baningi abalandeli bebhola abebengajabule ngalokhu.
title: Iphucwe iqatha emlonyeni iSAFA incishwa i-AFCON

text: MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENINGEKE ibekwe engcupheni impilo yesihlabani saseBrazil, uNeymar, okusabalele amahemuhemu okuthi angase adlale kowamanqamu uma iSelecao iphumelela ukudlula kuGermany abebebhekene nayo izolo kowandulela amanqamu, ngokusho kukasoseshini waseBrazil.Emdlalweni weBrazil neColombia ngoLwesihlanu, uNeymar ukhishwe ngohlaka waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela lapho kufike kwatholakala ukuthi ushayeke kabi emgogodleni kwachachamba ithambo.Ngokwemiyalelo yesibhedlela sibambisene nodokotela beqembu lesizwe laseBrazil kuvunyelwane ngokuthi uNeymar angabe esadlala eNdebeni yoMhlaba ka-2014. Kuvelile ukuthi akadingi ukuhlinzwa kodwa kufanele athole isikhathi esanele sokuphumula.Ngemuva kokusabalala kwala mahlebezi uNeymar nososeshini bakhiphe isitatimende becacisa ngokuthi imibiko esabalele ayilona iqiniso.Le mibiko iqhamuke ngemuva kokuthi iphephandaba lebhola laseBrazil licaphune odokotela beSantos okuyiqembu elidala likaNeymar lithi lo mdlali angase abonakale kowamanqamu uma ozakwabo benqobe kuGermany ngaphandle kwakhe. Kulolu daba bekukhulunywa ngemijovo eyisipesheli ebizomenza angabuzwa ubuhlungu.“Asikho isidingo sokubeka impilo kaNeymar engcupheni. Ngokwazi kwethu uNeymar kufanele aphumule izinsuku ezingu-45 ukuze alulame ngokuphelele. Ngikhuluma nje usekhaya uphumule. Asikho isidingo sokuphakamisa amaphaphu kwabaseBrazil ngento engekho. Alikho ngisho nelincane ithuba lokuthi uNeymar adlale ibhola zingakapheli izinsuku esingu-45 anikwe zona,” usho kanje kuGlobo TV omunye wodokotela beBrazil uJose Luiz Runco.Okhulumela uNeymar uthe: “UNeymar uqashwe ngeso lokhozi odokotela beqembu lesizwe hhayi abanye. Azikho futhi izinhlelo zokuzama ukumenza asheshe alulame. Esikwaziyo wukuthi odokotela beSantos bebemvakashele ngoba basebenze isikhathi eside naye esekuyona hhayi okunye. Uma kwenzeka uNeymar esheshe alulame kunalokhu obekubekiwe kuyoba yingenxa yemithandazo yabantu baseBrazil ngoba awupheli umoya kuyena, akukho okunye esikuhlelile.”
title: Bachitha amahlebezi asabalele ngoNeymar

text: UFASIMBA luthi uhulumeni akavikele abampofu ayeke ukubadayisa kwabacebile abafuna ukumba amagugu emhlabeni wabo kulandela umsindo osuke eXolobeni, eMbizana, e-Eastern Cape.UMnuz Molaodi Wa Sekake okhulumela uFasimba kuzwelonke uthe baphoxekile ngesitatimende sikaNgqongqoshe wokuMbiwayo uMnuz Gwede Mantashe othe kuzoba nenhlolovo ezobheka ukuthi umphakathi uyahambisana yini nokuthi kube nemayini noma cha.UWa Sekake uthe bewuFasimba abahambisani nokuthi kube nenhlolovo kodwa abantu kufanele bavikelwe wuhulumeni emhlabeni wabo.“Kuyaphoxa ukuthi osopolitiki nabaholi bomdabu bahambisana nosomabhizinisi abafuna ukuvula izimayini emhlabeni wabantu bakithi. Kade abampofu bathwala kanzima ngenxa yabaholi abahambisana nosomabhizinisi abaxhaphaza abantu bakithi. Kuyaphoxa ukuthi uMantashe ufuna kube nenhlolovo “ezimele” yize umphakathi unqobile eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo,” kusho uWa Sekake.Uthe uhulumeni kufanele anike abantu ubunikazi bomhlaba ukuze kungabi lula ukuthi baphucwe njengoba ezama ukwenza kubantu baseXolobeni.Sicela ongqongqoshe bame nabantu hhayi nezimayini ezingawulandeli umthetho futhi ezingabahloniphi abampofu,” kusho uWa Sekake.Esitatimendeni esikwi-website yoMnyango wezokuMbiwayo uMantashe uthe inhlolovo ihambisana nesinqumo senkantolo ethe kufanele kuxoxwe nabantu. Uthe yimiphumela yenhlolovo ezohlahla indlela.“Uma umphakathi uthi awuhambisani nokuthi kube nemayini ngeke ibe khona. Uma umphakathi uthi uyayifuna imayini izoba khona. Uma imayini iqhubeka kufanele ihambisane nezolimo, ezokuvakasha nezinhlelo zokuthuthukisa umnotho. Umuntu ozonikwa ilayisensi kufanele alandele imithetho yezokumbiwayo. Inhlolovo izoqala emasontweni ambalwa ezayo,” kusho uMantashe.
title: Baphoxwe yisitatimende sikaMantashe

text: UVELE eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza umfundi oneminyaka engu-15 ngokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni.Okhulumela amaPhoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal uBrigadier Jay Naicker ukuqinisekile ukuthi amaphoyisa aseMlaza abophe umfundi oneminyaka engu-15 ngokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nezinhlamvu. UNaicker uthe umsolwa uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza lapho adedelelwe sekufike abazali bakhe. "Amaphoyisa athole umbiko womfundi ophethe isibhamu esikoleni esikwa-U eMlaza aphendula ngokushesha. Amaphoyisa athole lo mfundi ephethe isibhamu sohlobo lwe revolver esinezinhlamvu ezintathu. Uboshwe ngokushesha wabekwa icala. Uzophinde abhekisiswe ukuthi abukho yini ubugebengu aseke wabandakanyeka kubona," kusho yena.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa waKwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant General Khombisile Jula unxuse abazali ukuthi badlale indima enkulu ekufundiseni abantwana babo."Sinxusa abazali ukuthi baqinisekise ukuthi badlala indima enkulu ekufundiseni izingane zabo baphinde basebenzisane namaphoyisa. Abantwana bethu babalulekile kanti futhi kufanele babe sezindaweni eziphephile zokufundela. Kuyakhathaza uma abanye abafundi befika ezikoleni bephethe izikhali ezinobungozi, kepha sisebenzisana nezikole ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabafundi njalo," kusho uJula.
title: Kuboshwe umfundi waseMlaza (15) obanjwe nesibhamu

text: UYAVEVA umndeni wengane (12) yaseLovu ngaseManzimtoti ebelethile ngemuva kokudlwengulwa “umalume” oyihambisa esikoleni.Umndeni wale ngane uvule icala lokudlwengula ngemuva kokubona ukuthi isidlwengulwe yaze yakhulelwa.Kuthiwa le ntombazane yatshela umndeni wayo ukuthi “umalume” wayehamba nayo ayoyidlwengula kwakhe. Lokhu ukwenze izikhathi eziningana.Unina womgilwa, ongeke adalulwe njengoba kuvikelwa ingane, uthe bayaqhubeka nempilo noma kunzima. Uthi ufuna ubulungiswa ngokwenzeke endodakazini yakhe.“Lesi simo simenze wangakwazi ukubhala izivivinyo zakhe esikoleni njengoba kwase kusondele izinsuku zokubeletha. Kodwa sivumelene nesikole ukuthi uzobuyela uma kuvulwa,” kusho unina womgilwa.Ezwa ngalesi sehlo uNgqogqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nonhlanha Khoza uphakamise ukuthi kubhekisiswe “omalume”.Uthe uphatheke kabi ngesenzo esenziwe umuntu obethenjiwe ukuthi anakekele izingane kodwa wajike waba umdlwenguli.“Kumele sisukume senze konke okusemandleni ukuthi sivikele izingane zethu. Kumele kuhlolisiswe “omalume” ukuthi abanawo yini amacala okuhlukumeza izingane abawenza phambilini,” kusho uNkk Khoza.UNkk Khoza uthe uzosebenzisana noMnyango wezeMfundo nowezokuThutha nokuPhepha koMphakathi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi baqala uhlelo lokuhlola “omalume” maduze.USihlalo wenhlangano “yomalume” engaphansi kweSantaco esifundazweni, uMnuz Mandla Mvubu, uthe ushaqekile ngalesi senzo esichaze ngokuthi siyanyanyisa. “Umsebenzi wethu ‘njengomalume’ ukuhambisa abantwana ezikoleni, siphinde siqinisekise ukuthi baphephile.Le nto eyenziwe yilo wesilisa wubulwane futhi akafanele ukwenza lo msebenzi,” kusho uMvubu.Uqhube wathi okwenzekile kuyabathusa ngoba bona bayaqikelela uma beqasha “omalume”.“Uma kuzoqashwa umuntu siyaqikelela ukuthi loyo muntu uletha ubufakazi bokuthi akanawo amacala nokuthi akaziphathi izikhali ngoba senzela ukukhuseleka kwezingane,” kusho uMvubu.UNkk Khoza uphakamise ukuthi kuboshwe umsolwa njengoba kuvele ukuthi akakaboshwa.“Umsolwa uyaqhubeka nje nempilo yakhe sengathi akwenzekanga lutho ebe ehlukumeze ingane. Kumele abhadle ejele,” kusho uNkk Khoza.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCol Thembeka Mbele uthe umnyango ophenya ngamacala odlame lomphakathi, ukuvikelwa kwabantwana nokunukubezwa eMlaza uphenya icala lokudlwengulwa kwentombazane esencane.“Idokodo selidluliselwe kumshushisi ozobe esephuma nesinqumo ngalolu daba,” kusho uCol Mbele. Amaphoyisa aveze ukuthi iminyaka “kamalume” awakayitholi njengoba engakaboshwa. Unina womgilwa uthe umlinganisela eminyakeni ephakathi kuka-30 kuya ku-35.
title: ‘Umalume ukhulelise’ umfundi (12) abemthutha

text: UZOQALA ngo-Ephreli 5, umdlalo okulindeleke ukuthi udonse amehlo abaningi kuSABC 3, ozodlala ngo-7 ebusuku iThe Estate. Lo mdlalo uzokhonjiswa ngoMsombuluko kuze kube uLwesihlanu.Ngenyanga edlule abakwaSABC3, bamemezela izindaba zokuthi bazokhombisa lo mdlalo kodwa bangaphuma nokuthi uzoqala nini, bathi lokho bazokumemezela ekuhambeni kwesikhathi.Ngempelasonto babe sebememezela izindaba zokuthi uzoqala nokuthi uzodlala ngasiphi isikhathi kulesi siteshi.Lo mdlalo omusha uzongena esikhaleni esavuleka emuva kokuphela kweSidingo esase sihluleka ukuheha ababukeli.Phakathi kwabadlali abazobonakala kuwo kubalwa iningi labo elisuke emdlalweni Isibaya, nawo lo mdlalo ophelayo ekupheleni kwale nyanga.Kubalingisi kubalwa uSdumo Mtshali, u-Aubrey Pooe, Zenokuhle Maseko, Linda Sebenzo, Matli Mohapelo, Dineo Langa, Jo-Anne Reyneke nabanye. UPat van Heerden ongumphathi kwaSABC3, uveze ukuthi kulo mdlalo kuzovela izimfihlo ebezifihliwe."Umdlalo uzogxila emindenini eyiziqumama ehlala e-Echelon Estate, bese kuba imindeni ephakathi nendawo ngokomnotho neyabadla imbuya ngothi abangena ngenxa yokuzosebenza. Izinkinga yizona ezenza lo mdlalo ujabulise. Enye indawo ezogqama yilokishi laseThembalethu, abantu bakhona abafuna ukuthatha indawo okwakhe kuyo iziqumama abakholwa wukuthi zakhe emhlabeni wokhokho babo," kusho uPat.Uveze ukuthi kulo mdlalo kuzogqama nezindaba ezimayelana nesimo samanje eNingizimu Afrika, ezothando nokunye. "Okunye okusijabulisayo yizilimi ezizokhulunywa kulo mdlalo njengoba udidiyele abalingisi bebala elahlukene, abakhuluma izilimi zakuleli ezingu-11. Siyathemba ukuthi uzobajabulisa abantu bakuleli futhi wenze kahle ngisho noma kuza kubabukeli,“ kuphetha uPat.Eziteshini zakuleli ezihlukene kulindeleke ukuthi kuqale imidlalo emisha njengoba eminingi kuphela ngayo kule nyanga nasekuqaleni kwenyanga ezayo.
title: Selukhishiwe usuku lokuqala komdlalo iThe Estate

text: MHLELI: Kuke kwaba nongabazane ukuthi ubani ozovala isikhala sikaMzokhona ‘Mzokoloko’ Gumede othole amadlelo aluhlaza emsakazweni Ukhozi FM, besuka kwiGagasi FM.Ngingaqinisekisa abalaleli beGagasi FM ukuthi uFelix Hlophe, uzwakala ezosivala thaqa isikhala esishiywe nguMzo ohlelweni lwasekuseni.Yize kukuningi okungenze ngazinika isikhathi esanele sokulalela uhlelo The Uprising Gagasi FM oluholwa nguFelix Hlophe, engikuqaphelayo kulo msakazo, ikakhulukazi ohlelweni lwasekuseni, wukuthi luzobuyisa intsha ngoba luzoyifundisa ngemvelaphi yayo.Phela ngolwentsha, vele lo msakazo udume ngokuchema nayo ikakhulukazi esezindaweni zomnta kabani.Ngike ngezwa isigatshana esithi NgingumZulu Phaqa.Lesi sigatshana sisiza intsha engazi ngemvelaphi yayo, ikakhulukazi izithakazelo zayo. Kuningi okuzozuzwa yintsha ezifelayo ngalo msakazo Igagasi FM.Ngike ngathola ebengingakwazi kulo, ukuthi uSibiya uhlobene noGumede. Lokhu ngikuzwe kulesi sigatshana salolu hlelo The Uprising 6 to 9. Yingakho ngithi kuningi okuzohlonyulwa yintsha yalo msakazo kuFelix Hlophe.Okumele kwenziwe ngabalaleli wukuthi ke babanike ithuba abasakazi abasaqala ukuzwakala ezinhlelweni ezisindayo njengolwasekuseni nolwantambama.Khabzela MzimelaEZWELIBOMVU
title: [IMIBONO] Ubukeka ezosivala isikhala uFelix Hlophe

text: ABHEKENE nengwadla amaNazaretha aseBuhleni ngokunyuka intaba iKhenana, okungacaci noma azogcina efikile yini kuyona emuva kokuvela kwezindaba ezithi abaseThembezinhle banetayitela lentaba, elikhomba ukuthi ngeyoThingolwenkosazana.Lokho kusho ukuthi kabakwazi ukuya endaweni yoThingo ngenxa yokuthi wonke amafa ebandla asenikwe uhlangothi oluvunwe yinkantolo, lwenkosi Phinda Shembe.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngeSonto, uNyazilwezulu olungaseyena umholi wamaNazaretha osemthethweni, lumemezele ngeSabatha eledlule ukuthi abaseBuhleni bazoqwala intaba kusuka ngomhla ka 5 Januwari babuye ngomhla ka 22, okuyinto ephambene nenqubo yebandla ngoba umhlangano kawukhishwa umuntu ongeyena umholi.Leli phephandaba lihoshe izindaba ezithi abaseBuhleni bangase baphelele eHomisi, okuyindawo ebude buduze nentaba eyingcwele iNhlangakazi ngoba umthetho kawubavumeli ukuthi bafike eKhenana.“IKhenani yindawo yoThingo elwayisikelwa yinkosi yesizwe yakwaGcwensa ukuthi luyisebenzise ezintweni ezithinta ibandla. Lwaze lwayiqamba ngokuthi kuseBambanani. Ngesikhathi uNyazi lumemezela ukuthi abaseBuhleni bazoya entabeni iKhenana, kalubatshelanga iqiniso lokuthi bangase baphelele eHomisi uma kungukuthi amaphoyisa ayabavimba. Ngisho nomhlangano wokuya entabeni kalubachazelanga abantu ukuthi uzoholwa wubani njengoba luhlongoza ukuthi uholwe ngabefundisi njengoba lona seluphuciwe amandla obuholi. Kwakhona ukuthi umhlangano uholwe ngabefundisi yinto engakaze yenzeke kumaNazaretha,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela abaseBuhleni, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi umhlangano uzophuma ngoJanuwari 5 ubuye ngomhla ka 22.“Inkosi imemezele ukuthi umhlangano uzophuma,” kusho uMncwabe.Ebuzwa ngozohola umhlangano, uthe akanasiqiniseko kodwa wazi ukuthi uholwa wumholi webandla.Unobhala wamaNazaretha eThembezinhle, uMshumayeli Chancey Sibisi, uthe likhona itayitela eliqinisekisa ukuthi intaba iKhenana eyoThingolwenkosazana.“Sesibheke amaphoyisa ukuthi kube yiwona agcina umthetho ngokungavumeli abantu baseBuhleni abangenamholi ukuthi baqwale intaba."Uma kungamaphoyisa abavumelayo kuyosho ukuthi uhulumeni kawuwugcini umthetho ngokuphelezela abantu abangenamholi,” kusho uSibisi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe njengayo yonke imicimbi emikhulu, azobe ekhona amaphoyisa azoqapha wonke amaNazaretha aya entabeni.
title: AbaseBuhleni babhekene nomqansa ekuqwaleni intaba

text: SEKUPHINDE kwangena esinye isikhalo ngengqungquthela ye-IFP Youth Brigade okuwuphiko lwentsha yeNkatha ebihleli oLundi ngempelasonto. Iziko Imbabazane elibuye lizibize ngoMtshezi, kuthiwa seliphumele obala lithi kuningi okungahambanga kahle ngengqungquthela ekhethe uMnuz Mthokozisi Nxumalo kwesikaSihalo wophiko.UNobhala walo uNksz Nobuhle Ngubane unqabile ukuphawula ngencwadi okuthiwa ithunyelwe esigungwini esiphezulu seqembu . Akafunanga ngisho ukukhuluma ngesikhalo okuthiwa basifakile uvele wavala ucingo.Umthombo opotshozele leli phephandaba, uthe abaningi bayesaba ukuphumela obala ngoba kuba sengathi bavukela iqembu.Umthombo uthi isigungu esiphezulu siyitholile incwadi evela kuleli ziko.“Awu kuyaziwa nje ukuthi izinto zihamba kanjani eqenjini abantu bakhalaza emakhoneni ngoba abaningi bayesaba. Uvele uthathwe njengomuntu ongahloniphi odicilela phansi iqembu uma uveza izikhalo,” kusho umthombo.Elinye ilungu elingathandanga ukuveza igama lalo lithi kufanele kukhethwe kabusha kulungiswe wonke amaphutha enzeka engqungqutheleni.“Kwakungena noma wubani lapha engqungqutheleni nezigqebhezana zokungena zakhwabaniswa. Wake wayibonaphi ingqungquthela eyenzelwa etendeni ngoba akhona amahholo oLundi. Baningi kakhulu abantu abangagculisekile ngendlela okuqhutshwa ngayo izingqungquthela ze-IFP,” kuchaza ilungu elikhathazekile.Lesi sikhalazo selama eduze esinye esavela ngosuku lokusongwa kwengqungquthela lapho indoda eyazethula ngoNgcobo isibongo, yasukuma yaphikisa imiphumela. Le ndoda ize yazibophezela ngokuthi izolulandela lolu daba kuze kube sekugcineni. Akuqali ukuthi kube nomsindo njengoba kuke kwabangwa imiphumela yokhetho lobuholi besifundazwe KwaZulu-Natal. Owayehola umkhankaso wezikhalo uMnuz Simphiwe Zungu wamiswa eqenjini emuva kwezinsukwana nje ephumele obala ngokungenami kwakhe.Okhulumela iqembu uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa ukuqinisekisile ukuthi incwadi ifikile futhi iyacutshungulwa indaba yayo kodwa wathi ngeke iphindwe ingqungquthela.“Sikholwa wukuthi kwahamba kahle konke engqungqutheleni yeqembu. Siyafuna futhi ukuxwayisa amalungu ethu agijima aye kwabezindaba ukuthi lokhu akufuneki. Wudaba lwangaphakathi lolu kufanele iqembu linikwe ithuba lilulungise,” kusho uHlengwa.
title: Esinye isikhalo ngengqungquthela ye-IFP

text: Unkosikazi wesilomo somsakazi esidlule emhlabeni kuleli sonto, uBob ’’The Jammer’’ Mabena, udalule imfihlo ebeyenza bahlale besothandweni oluvutha amalangabi benesitahndwa sakhe seminyaka eyisikhombisa.U-Eucharist Hadebe uthe uMabena ubeyindoda ekhethekile nebimthanda ngendlela ekhethekile. Ukumqabula ngendlela ekhethekile nsuku zonke, kwenza wazizwa engowesifazane okhethekile empilweni yalo msakazi. “Inhlonipho onginike yona, uthando onginike lona sisobabili nasemphakathini, indlela obungiqabula ngayo, ngisho sithule sobabili bekusuke kuvunguza uthando,” kusho u-Eucharist othe uMabena wenze iminyaka eyisikhombisa bendawonye yaba ngekhethekile.Uchaze ihora lokugcina enoMabena njengelikhetheke kakhulu empilweni yakhe, wathembisa ukunakekela zonke izingane eziyisishiyagalombili athe umyeni wakhe ubezithanda ngendlela engachazeki njengoba zonke bezinamagama eziteketiswa ngawo ingane ngayinye.Nendodakazi endala kaMabena, uKgomotso, ichaze uyise njengomuntu obafundise uthando, wase efunda umyalezo wazo zonke izingane zakwabo ebezime ziklele ebhokisini lalesi silomo njengendlela yokuvalelisa kuyise.UMabena uzoshiswa kwezinye zezindawo ezikhethekile ePretoria namhlanje.
title: Udalule imfihlo ngothando lwakhe noBob Mabena emvalelisa

text: IKings of the Weekend ibuyela kwiMetro FM lapho ezobamba khona uhlelo lwantambama iKings Suite, ngo-3 kuya ku-6 ntambama. Laba basakazi bashiya lesi siteshi ngo-2016. IGagasi belisapholisa isilonda sokudlelwa umsakazi ophambili, uMzokoloko, obebamba uhlelo lwasekuseni kulesi siteshi, oseshayela uhlelo lwantambama kuKhozi FM. IKings of the Weekend izoba yingxenye yezinguquko ezenziwa yiMetro kulandela ukuxoshwa kwentandokazi yabalaleli uDJ Fresh, isikhala sakhe isizovalwa uMo Flava nethimba abesebenza nalo ntambama oPearl Shongwe, Owen Hannie noMoshe Ndiki. Lolu hlelo olungena ngo-5 kuya ku-9 ekuseni luzobizwa ngeMorning Flava. Ukunikezwa kukaMo Flava nethimba lakhe uhlelo lwasekuseni kushiye isikhala ohlelweni lwantambama esizovalwa yiKings of the Weekend noRelebogile Mabotja. Imenenja yesiteshi uSibongile Mtyali uthe bagculisekile ngezinguquko abazethulayo kulo msakazo. Ngemuva kokuxoshwa kwiMetro FM, uFresh uhlabane ngomsebenzi esiteshini saseGoli i-947 FM lapho aseshayela khona uhlelo lwantambama. KwiGagasi bese kuqala ukuba nozinzo ngemuva kokushiya kukaMzokoloko, njengoba ithimba lasekuseni likaFelix Hlophe, Njabs Zwane noKhaya Dladla liza kahle. IGagasi belingakaphawuli ngokushiya kwalaba basakazi.
title: ISABC iphinde yazisikela kwelinonile kwiGagasi FM

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu usolwa ngokudonswa ngekhala yizinyunyana emkhakheni wezeMfundo kulesi sifundazwe.Usho kanje uDkt Imran Keeka okhulumela iDA kwezemfundo, futhi oyilungu lephalamende lale nhlangano kulesi sifundazwe.Ngokusho kwakhe, sekuyisikhathi sokuthi abazali nabafundi kube yibona abangenelelayo ekutheni kuqhubeke ukufunda ezikoleni kulesi sifundazwe, njengoba kwenzeka esifundazweni saseWestern Cape."Izikole zikulungele ukuthi zivulwe. Lokhu kufakazelwa ucwaningo esilwenze kade sivakashela izikole kulesi sifundazwe njengengxenye yethimba elivakashela izikole ukubona ukuthi zikulungele yini ukufunda. Nocwaning olwenziwe yiKwaZulu-Natal Education Portolio Committee, nalo lithole ukuthi izikole zikulungele ukuvulwa," kusho u-Keeka.Uthe ngenxa yokuthi uMnyango wezeMfundo ulandela ngemuva izinyunyana, ugcina nawo ungasazi ukuthi yikuphi okuqondile okumele ukusho ngokuvulwa kwezikole kulesi sifundazwe."Abazali banelungelo lokuvakashela izikole baqhamuke nesinqumo ngokumele kwenzeke ezikoleni ngaphandle kokuvinjelwa wumnyango nezinyunyana," kuchaza uKeeka.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, uthe elakuleli linomnyango owodwa wezemfundo ophethwe kuzwelonke uNgqongqoshe wawo uNkk Angie Motshekga okumele kulandelwe akushoyo."Ngeke ngikhulume kakhulu ngokwenzeka eWestern Cape ngoba angazi ukuthi yini eholele ekutheni bona izikole aziqhubeke nokuvulwa ekubeni ungqongqoshe kazwelonke esememezele ukuthi izikole zivulwa ngomhlaka 8 kuJuni," kusho uMlotshwa.Uthe kusukela ngoLwesihlanu elwedlule bese zingu-4000 izikole kulezo ezingu-6 200 ebesezikulungelo ukufunda kulesi sifundazwe."Sinethemba lokuthi ngoMsombuluko zonke zizobe sezisesimeni esikulungele ukuthi zivulwe ngoba izolo uNgqongqoshe ubehambele izikole eziseMgungundlovu, kanti namhlanje uhambele eziseMsinga ngayo inhloso yokuthi kuqambe kushaya isonto elizayo zibe sezikulungele ukuvulwa," usho kanje uMlotshwa.Izinhlangano zezimfundo ezahlukene zithe zisami esitatimendeni sazo ezisikhiphe ngokuhlanganyela, sokuthi ngeke zivulwe izikole uma kungukuthi izinsiza zokuvikela othisha nabafundi kwiCovid-19, azikahleleki ngendlela efanele.UMnuz Vee Gani okhulumela iKwaZulu-Natal School Governing Body Association, uthe kuyiqiniso ukuthi abazali nabafundi kumele babambe iqhaza elikhulu ekulawuleni ukusebenza kwezikole."Ngaphandle kwabazali nabafundi, ayikho into okuthiwa yisikole," kusho uGani. Ngokwakhe, iqiniso ukuthi imfundo ngeke iphinde ibe yisimo ebikade iyisna phambili, wathi yingakho kumele kubhekisiswe iqhaza elibanjwa kwezemfundo. Uthe nakuba izinyunyana nazo zibalulekile ngenxa yokweseka ezemfundo, kodwa bazali nabafundi yibona okumele babonakale bekhombisa intshisekelo kunawo wonke umuntu ngmfundo yezingane zabo. UMnyango wezeMfundo, uphakamise ukuthi izikole zivulwe ngoJuni 8 okunguMsombuluko ozayo.Phambilini bekulindeleke ukuthi izikole zivulwe ngoJuni 25, kodwa kwabuye kwashayeka ingwijikhwebu njengoba umnyango wezemfundo kuzwelonke usuthe sezizovulwa ngoMsombuluko ozayo.
title: Kusolwa owezemfundo ngokudonswa ngekhala yizinyunyana

text: KUBUKEKA sengathi usazolokhu uqhubekile umkhankaso wokulwa nokushima kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika kuMzansi Magic njengoba kuza uhlelo olusha iKheth’ Omthandayo.Lolu hlelo oluzobhekela intsha edinga uthando luzodlala ngo-5.30 ntambama ngeSonto.Luzosiza abaxakekile kwezothando, abangenazo izithandwa zabo kanti sekuqaliwe ukuqoshwa kwalo eGauteng.Yize sekuqaliwe ukuqoshwa kodwa iminyango ayikavalwa kwabanesifiso sokuyohlwaya inhlanhla ukuqeda umzwangedwa nokushima.Okhulumela uMzansi Magic, uNondumiso Mabece uthe uthando yinto ebalulekile empilweni yomuntu kanti uma umuntu eludinga angaze aluthole nalapho ebengacabangi ukuthi angaze aluthole khona.“Ngaphandle kokuthi sizosiza abantu bathole uthando kuzophinde kudlalwe kube mnandi kulolu hlelo. Sifuna athi eqambe emthola umuntu wakhe lowo othungathayo kodwa ebe ethokozile futhi enokulangazelela okuningi njengobungani obuqinile,” usho kanje.Uluchaze lolu hlelo ngokuthi luzoba nomuntu oyedwa, kungaba owesilisa noma owesifazane ozobekelwa ubulili abudingayo akhethe kubona.Lesi siteshi sethelevishini kumanje sineDate My Family, Uyang’thanda Na?, okuyizinhlelo zabathungatha uthando. Idumela lazo lezi zinhlelo lishiya isithombe sokuthi baningi abantu abashaywa yigwababa (uvalo lokushela) asebequnge isibindi bajoyina indlela entsha yokuthola uthando phambi kwababukeli.
title: Sekukhona olunye futhi uhlelo lokuqeda igwababa nokushima

text: KUZOBUYEKEZWA umgomo wokulandelwa kwezokuphepha esibhedlela iClairwood, ngemuva kwesigameko sokudutshulwa kwesiguli ebesilaliswe kulesi sibhedlelala ngabasolwa abangaziwa, okuthiwa senzeke ngoLwesihlanu ntambama.Kuthiwa abasolwa ababili abangaziwa, abebehlome ngezibhamu bangene ngodli kulesi sibhedlela baphoqa onogada ukuthi babavulele indlela baqonda embhedeni obekulele kuwo owesilisa ena-47 ongowokufika kuleli, bamdubula ekhanda kubuka iziguli nezisebenzi.Kuthiwa isiguli sidluliselwe kulesi sibhelela emva kokuthi singeniswe esibhedlela iKing Edward ngoDisemba nyakenye, sinamanxeba okudutshulwa.UMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal ukhiphe isitatimende esiveza ukuthi izobuyekezwa imigomo yezokuphepha elandelwayo kulesi sibhedlela.UNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu uthe nakuba izigameko ezinjengalezi zisuke zizihlelwe kahle yizigebengu, kodwa ukungena kwazo esibhedlela zingabanjwa abagadile kushiya imibuzo ngokuzilungiselela komnyango ukubhekana nezenzo zalolu hlobo.“Kusho ukuthi ezokuphepha azikho ezingeni esingathanda zibe kulo. Ngeke sikubalekele ukuthi laba basolwa abebehlomile basabise onogada bethu, kodwa bekumele sibe nendlela ebizokwenza kube nzima kubona ukuthi bashaye bachithe kalula emuva kwesigameko,” kusho uNkk Zulu.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe yilo mnyango, kuthiwa iziguli nabasebenzi bomnyango abebekhona ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko bazokwelulekwa.I-IFP KwaZulu-Natal esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba ithe ungqongqoshe walo mnyango kumele eqhamuke nohlelo elunohlonze lokuqinisa ezokuphepha ezikhungweni zezempilo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uqinisekisile ukuthi senzekile lesi sigameko, wathi kuvulwe icala lokubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa eMontclair.
title: Umnyango uzobuyekeza ezokuphepha esibhedlela okudutshulwe kuso isiguli

text: Umbuzo: Ngingowesilisa oneminyaka ewu-49 ngithandana nowesifazane ona-47.Sesithandane iminyaka engaphezu kwengu-15 kanti sinengane eyodwa yentombane eneminyaka ewu-15.Inkinga yami ukuthi akasafuni siye ocansini. Ukwenza kwakhe kungenza ngibone sengathi akasangithandi noma mhlawumbe useyangijolela. Kwenziwa yini ukuthi angangitsheli ukuze ngingachithi isikhathi sami ngento engekho?Ngicela ningisize.Okhathazekile, KwaDukuzaImpendulo:Akujwayelekile ukuthi umuntu wesifazane avele angafuni ukuya ocansini nje kungenakele lutho.Ake uzinike isikhathi sokubheka ukuthi ngabe yini ngempela engenza ukuthi athathe lesinqumo.Ziningi ke izizathu ezingenza umuntu wesifazane aphelelwe ilukuluku lokuya ocansini.Ezikhathini eziningi mangabe kukhona into emkhathazayo emoyeni kuke kwenzeke ukuthi azizwe engahaleli ukuya ocansini.Kwesinye isikhathi abanye bake bangafuni ukuya ocansini mangabe kubekhona ukungathembeki kulobo budlelwano.Esingasho ukuthi kuyinto enhle kodwa kuyinto eyenzekalayo. Umuntu wesifazane ube esesebenzisa ucansi ukukhombisa ukudinwa kwakhe kanti ila esebulala khona ubudlelwano bakhe engaqondile ukwenzenjalo.Ake nawe uhlale phansi nesithandwa sakho usazize indlela lesomiso esikuphethe ngayo. Mangabe kungukuthi usakuthanda futhi usazimisele ngawe uzophumela obala ngento emudlayo.Kungenzeka ukuthi kukhona okwenzekile kuleminyaka emingaka nithandana ekudale ukuthi agcine eseshintshe ngalendlela.Sinifisela inhlanhla.Umbuzo:Ngisanda kuhlangana nowesilisa engimthanda ngenhliziyo yami yonke. Inkinga nje ukuthi ukhubazekile (uhamba ngesihlalo). Angikaze ngizitshele ukuthi ngelinye ilanga ngiyothandana nomuntu okhubazekile.Ngaphandle kokusaba ukuthi abantu bazothini nginovalo futhi lezidingo zakhe njengomuntu okhubazekile. Ngabe uzokwazi ukumela izidingo zakhe njengendoda? Ngizokwenzenjani uma ngabe sesiba nezinqgqinamba ngokuhamba kwesikhathi?Igama ligodliwe, South CoastImpendulo:Siyakubongela ngokuthola umuntu omthandayo kanti naye okuthandayo. Khumbula ukuthi mekuza othandweni akusho lutho ukuthi abantu bazothini. Ngakho khohlwa abanye abantu ulandele inhliziyo yakho. Inqobo nje mangabe lomuntu othandana naye engelona iqola nombulali.Njengayoyonke into entsha kuzokuthatha isikhashana ukujwayela izidingo zesithandwa sakho, okubalulekile ukuthi uzinikele ekufundeni ukuthi ningaphilisana nganjani ndawonye. Ngaphandle kwaloko naye afana nabobonke abantu besilisa ngaphandle nje kokuthi unezidingo eziyisipesheli ekumele uzijwayeze zona. Jabulela ubudlelwano bakho ukhohlwe ukuzikhathaza ngezinto ezingabalulekile ngaleyondlela.Umbuzo:Ngingowesifazane osekulungele ukushada ngokusho kwabaseduze nami. Ngikusho lokhu ngoba konke la ngihamba khona bangibuza ukuthi kanti ngishada nini. Abangani bami bonke sebeshadile nokwenza ngibe ngaphansi kwenkulu ingcindezi.Kwezinye izinsuku ngize ngicabange ukuthi mhlawumbe kukhona okungalungile ngami ngoba okwamanje angikakawucabangi umshado. Kuningi engisazimisele okukwenza empilweni ngaphambi kokuthi ngiqale umndeni.Yini ngempela eyenza ukuthi uma ungashadile umphakathi ukubuke njengomuntu ongaphelele?Londiwe, KwaMashuImpenduloUmshado uyisigaba esihle empilweni yomuntu kodwa akuyena wonke umuntu odalelwe ukushada. Kona siyavumelana nawe ukuthi umphakathi esiphila kuwona unokufaka enkulu ingcindezi kubantu besifazane mangabe sebefike eminyakeni ethize okuyinto ebuhlungu kakhulu. Futhi kuyinto isikhathi esiningi eyenza abantu besifazane bagcine sebezibona sebeshadela izizathu ezingezinhle.Ukushada ngoba ubona abangani sebeshadile akusona esizathu esifanele sokushada leso. Kubalulekile ukuthi uqale kulaba abaseduze kwakho ubazise ukuthi lengcindezi abakufaka kuyona ayikujabulisi neze. Into yokushada akuyona into encane ngakho awuzimisele ukushada ngoba wenzela bona kodwa uzoshada masekufike isikhathi. Ayikho nencane into engahambi kahle ngawe ngokufuni ukushada okwamanje. Masesifikile isikhathi uyokwazi nawe.Sithumele imibuzo yakho ku:[email protected]Nisilandele kuMo&Phindi on Facebook and Instagram
title: Ezothando: Sesithandane 15 weminyaka akasafuni siye ocansini

text: KULIMALE abantu abawu-20 ngesikhathi itekisi ebithwele abafundi ishayisana nezimoto ezimbili ezincane neloli eMkhomazi izolo.Abafundi bezikole ezehlukene kuthiwa balimale kanzima engozini eyenzeke ekuseni emgwaqweni u-R197.Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo bakwa-ER24, uMnuz Russel Meiring, uthe kube yinhlanhla ukuthi kungashoni muntu.“ Abezimo eziphuthumayo bakwa-ER24 bafike bathola izimoto ezimbili endaweni yengozi. Abantu abahlukene bebehlezi ngaphakathi ezimotweni abanye behamba ngaphandle. Sithe uma sihlolisisa sathola ukuthi umuntu oyedwa uvalelekile ngaphakathi emotweni ebithwele abafundi kodwa wagcina etakuliwe. Sithole ukuthi bawu-20 abantu abalimele. Abaningi abalimele bekuyizingane eziphakathi kweminyaka eyisihlanu newu-15,” kusho uMeiring.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe icala lokushayela budedengu.“Itekisi ebelithwele abafundi lishayisene nezimoto ezincane ezimbili neloli engozini eyenzeke ekuseni. Amaphoyisa aseMkhomazi avule icala lokushayela budedengu. Akekho oboshiwe kodwa uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luyaqhubeka.”Khonamanjalo, amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso ngemuva kwengozi edlule nemiphefumulo emibili ngesikhathi kushayisana izimoto ezimbili eMtubatuba izolo ekuseni.Kuyasolakala ukuthi umshayeli weToyota Corolla bekumele ame emgwaqweni kwaMsane kodwa wangama wabe eseshayisana neLand Rover.Abantu ababili bafele endaweni yesehlakalo. Izidumbu zabo ziyiswe emakhazeni kahulumeni eMtubatuba. Amaphoyisa akwaMsane aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso.
title: Kulimale 20 engozini ehlanganisa itekisi ebithwele abafundi

text:
UMPHATHI wesitebele somculo i-Afrotainment, uDJ Tira, uthi abahambisani nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane noma ngabe okwaluphi uhlobo.Ukusho lokhu emuva kokuboshwa komdansi othandwa yiningi osebonakale ezingomeni zabaculi abahlukene kulesi sitebele uNhlanhla “Sgaqa” Chiliza (31).UNhlanhla ude­delwe ngebheyili kaR5 000 yinkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini, ubhekene necala lokudlwengula intombazane (13).UTira uthe bayakugxeka futhi abakukhuthazi ukuhlukumeza kodwa bazomeseka umdansi kuze kube utholwa enecala.“Uzinikele yena emaphoyiseni ngemuva kokuthola ukuthi uvulelwe icala. Uqhubekile wasebenzisana namaphoyisa ngesikhathi kukhona ukuhlolwa nophenyo olwenziwayo,” kusho yena.FUNDA: 
Unikwe ibheyili umdansi we-AfrotainmentUthe selokhu bemazi ubengumuntu okhuthele emphakathini futhi esiza la kudingeka khona.Kuthiwa wacelwa imali uR8 yintombazane efunda uGrade 8, wase eyibuza ukuthi ihleli nobani ekhaya. Yathi uma ithi ihleli yodwa wase eyilandela. Uma efika ekhaya ufike wayinukubeza ekamelweni labazali.
title: Sizomseka umdansi okwamanje: DJ Tira

text: IMINYANGO owezeMfundo nowezeMpilo ezifundazweni imphathisa ngekhanda umcwaningi mabhuku omkhulu, uNksz Tsakani Maluleke.UNksz Maluleke useveze ukuthi ukhathazekile ngokubisha enkingeni yemali komnyango wezeMfundo nowezeMpilo ezifundazweni eziningi.Ethula umbiko wakhe wonyaka wezimali owedlule, uNksz Maluleke, uveze ukuthi le minyango ibhekene nezinkinga zemali ezifundazweni ezehlukene.UNksz Maluleke ukhale ngokuthi iminyango yezeMfundo isebenzisa ngokweqile isabelosezimali sayo, nokushiya le minyango ibishe ezinkingeni zemali.Umnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal usanda kutakulwa ngemali engaphezu kukaR700 million emva kokuvela kokuthi uzosebenzisa isabelosezimali sawo ngokweqile ngoR970 million.Eminyangweni yezeMpilo, uNksz Maluleke ukhale ngemali ephezulu kakhulu le minyango eyikweleta abantu abawina izicelo zokunxeshezelwa emva kobudedengu ekwelashweni kwabo ezibhedlela zikahulumeni.“Inkinga enkulu wukuthi iningi lale minyango ayikho imali eliyibeka eceleni kwisabelosezimali sayo, ukubhekela ukuthi uma kukhona icala elibalahlayo, babe nemali abazokhokha ngayo.“Lokhu kukhinyabeza le minyango njengoba izicelo zigcina zikhokhelwe kusetshenziswa imali obekufanele isebenze kunyaka wezimali olandelayo, ukuqasha abasebenzi nokwenza okunye.”Ngokwalo mbiko, uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal ukweleta uR27 billion wezicelo zokunxeshezelwa.Kulo mbiko, uNksz Maluleke uphinde waveza ukuthi izinkampani eziningi zikahulumeni zicwile ezinkingeni zemali.Ezinye zalezi zinkampani ziveze ukuthi kumnyama, azazi noma zizokwazi yini ukuphuma ezinkingeni ezibishe kuzo.Phakathi kwalezinkampani kubalwa izinkampani zamabhanoyi ezingaphansi kotakulo lwezamabhizinisi iSAA neSA Express, kube inkampani ephehla ugesi i-Eskom,  iSABC nezinye.UNksz Maluleke ukuncomile ukubhukula kweminyango yesifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal, nathe iningi layo lenze kangcono kuneminyaka yezimali eyedlule.“Iminyango emihlanu yenze kangcono kunendlela eyenze ngayo ngokudlule, kepha umnyango owodwa  uvele wenza kabi kunokudlule.“Mkhulu umehluko obonakalayo kepha kusekuningi okufanele kwenziwe ukuvimbela ukusetshenziswa budedengu kwemali. Ukungaqondiswa ubugwegwe kwabaphuma endleleni, kuholele ekunyukeni kokungalandelwa kwemithetho nokusetshenziswa kwemali budlabha.”
title: UMcwaningi maBhuku ukhathazekile ngoweMfundo nowezeMpilo

text: KUBEKWE isamba sikaR100 000 esizotholwa yiciko elizodla umhlanganiso emqhudelwaneni kazwelonke okuzodliwana kuwo imilala  ngohlelo lwezobuchwepheshe, iProject Perfomer National Online Lockdown Competition kusukela ngoJulayi 2020. Ngokusho kwesitatimende esithunyelelwe imithombo yezindaba ngabeProject Perfomer, ingxenye yenzuzo ezotholakala ngalo mncintiswano izoxhasa isikhwama iThe Theatre Benevolent Fund. Umqondisi weProject Perfomer, uShylo Pereira, uthe lolu hlelo lungaphezu komncintiswano. "Lokhu ukuhlanganisa ndawonye amaciko akhokhelwayo nasafufusa, ukuba akhulume ngezwi elilodwa elikhulu futhi akhombise izwe lethu nomhlaba wonke ukuthi ezokungcebeleka nemboni yezobuciko anendaba ngalesi sikhathi futhi sizobhukula, sinqobe kumnyama kubomvu," kuchaza uShylo.IProject Perfomer National Online Lockdown Competition ivuleleke kuwo wonke amaciko asakhasa futhi ayoyonke imikhakha okubalwa kuyo ukudansa, ukucula nokulingisa. Imingenelo yalo mqhudelwano ivulwe kuze kushaye usuku lokuvalwa okunguJulayi 17, 2020 futhi kubekwe indathane yemiklomelo eyisamba sikaR100 000."Siyaziqhenya ngokubambisana namajaji angu45 asezingeni likazwelonke nelo mhlaba, okuyiwo azihlulela emzuliswaneni wamanqamu, okubalwa nokukhetha umpetha ozobe ewashaye emakhanda wonke amaciko azobe engenelile," kusho uShylo.Phakathi kwamajaji azobe ebambe iqhaza kubalwa uMaps Maponyane, Steaven Stead, Samantha Peo, Jono Johanssen, Lelo Ramasimong noBernard Kruger.Emunxeni wokucula kuzobe kuqhudelwana ngaphansi kwale mikhakha: Musical Theatre/Broadway Pop/Contemporary, kowokulingisa kuzobe kuyile mikhakha: Monologue/Doulogue yanoma yisiphi isikhangiso sethelevishini esingeqile emizuzwini emibili, emidansweni kuzobe kudingeka noma yimuphi umuntu azisungulele wona kanti ezinsimbini zomculo kudingeka ezokudlala iClassical Contemporary.Ukuze ubambe iqhaza kulo mqhudelwano kuzodingeka ungene kule-website:www.projectperfomer.co.za ukuze uthole imininingwane egcwele nemininingwane yokukhokha imali yokungenela ebhange. Uma usukhokhile uyobe sewuthumela ubufakazi [email protected] noma ku-067 244 0313.Ungangena nasekhasini likaFacebook elibhalwe ukuthi -shylopereiraSA.Kwi-video
