ozoyithumela kudingeka ucacise amagama akho aphelele, iminyaka yobudala, isifundazwe okuso negama lesikole (uma usafunda). Uqinisekise ukuthi i-video yakho ayeqi emizuzwini ewu-2.5, ngaphandle kwesikhangiso sethelevishini. Le mizuzu njalo ayihlangene nokuzethula. I-video uyithumela nge-email ku: [email protected] noma ngoWhatsApp ku067 244 0313.Izinsuku ezisemqoka yilezi: Usuku lokuvala okunguJulayi 17, elokumenyezelwa kwabadlulele emzuliswaneni owandulela owamanqamu ngoJulayi 24, elokumenyezelwa kwabadlulele emzuliswaneni wamanqamu ngoJulayi 31 bese kuba elokumenyezelwa kwabahlabane ngo-Agasti 14.Eminye imiklomelo ibandakanya nokuqeqeshwa ngongoti kule mikhakha, umfundaze wokufunda ngonyaka ozayo, ukuyongcebeleka. Ngeminye imininingwane ungangena kuleli khasi likaFacebook: Group Project Perfomer National Online Lockdown Competition neleThe Project Perfomer.
title: Amaciko akuleli asafufusa azobanga isizumbulu sikaR100 000

text: AYILILAHLILE ithemba lokuzibekisela indawo kwi-Absa Premiership, iRoyal Eagles esale idangele ishweba ithuba lokudla umhlanganiso kwiNational First Division (NFD) ngempelasonto.I-Eagles iye emdlalweni wayo noBuntu Cape Town iwafunisa okwetoho amaphuzu amathathu. Nokho lokho bekungasho ukuthi ukuthola kwabo amaphuzu amathathu kuzobenza bangene begijima esigabeni esiphezulu. Leli qembu belidinga ukuthi iMaccabi FC ilenzele ufefe njengoba ibibhekene neStellenbosch FC eKapa.I-Eagles ibihlezi endaweni yesibili ngamaphuzu awu-53 ngemuva kwemidlalo ewu-29, kanti iStellenbosch ibiqhwakele ngamaphuzu awu-55 emdlalweni ewu-29.IMaccabi iwenzile umsebenzi ibamba iStellenbosch ngo 0-0 ekuhambeni. Into ebisisele wukuthi i-Eagles ishaye amagoli amane bese kungangeni lutho ngakubona. Ngaleyo ndlela bebezozibekisela indawo kwelinoju.I-Eagles iguqiswe Ubuntu ngo 1-0. Lokhu kuholele ekutheni iqede endaweni yesibili kwi-log okusho ukuthi isizodlala kweyokuhlunga.ITshakhuma ilale endaweni yesithathu okuyenze yazitholela ithikithi elibheke kweyokuhlunga.Ngempelasonto kuzocaca kahle ngeqembu elizodlala kweyokuhlunga esigabeni esikhulu. Amaqembu asembangweni wezembe yiMaritzburg United, Chippa United, Black Leopards, Free State Stars neBaroka FC.Iqembu eliqede endaweni ka-15 kwi-log lizojoyina i-Eagles neTshakhuma. Kweyokuhlunga iqembu lizodlala imidlalo emine lilodwa, bese kuthi eliqede phezulu kwi-log lingene kwiPremiership.Ukaputeni we-Eagles, uPhilani Cele, ukholwa wukuthi basangawaphendula amatafula ngokuthi badle umhlanganiso kweyokuhlunga.“Asemakhulu amathuba okuthi sisengangena kwiPremiership. Into emqoka wukuthi senze isiqiniseko emdlalweni yasekhaya. Ngakho amathemba asekhona. Kona ngeke ngikufihle ukuthi ngidumele ngoba bengifuna amaphuzu amathathu,” kusho uCele.Imidlalo yokuhlunga izoqala ngoLwesithathu oluzayo. I-Eagles izovula ekhaya neqembu elisuka esigabeni esikhulu.“Umphumela esiwatholile akuwona ebesiwudinga. Silale ngemizuzu yokuqala okuyilapho abakwaze khona ukuthola igoli. Besidinga ukuthi sinqobe ngamagoli amane ukuze singene kwiPremiership. Okwenzekile sekumele sikudlulise bese sigxila ekulungiseni imidlalo yokuhlunga,” kuqhuba uCele.Njengamanje akukacaci ngeqembu elizokwehlela kweyokuhlunga esigabeni esikhulu kodwa uCele uthe lokho akumkhathazi nakancane ngoba ulindele noma yini.“Thina silindele noma ubani. Vele yithina esiqala ekhaya. Sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi siyaqeda ngemidlalo yasekhaya,” kuphetha uCele.Imidlalo yokuhlunga:NgoMeyi 15: Royal Eagles v TshakhumaNgoMeyi 19: PD 15 v Royal EaglesNgoMeyi 22: Tshakhuma v PD 15NgoMeyi 25: Tshakhuma v Royal EaglesNgoMeyi 29: Royal Eagles v PD 15NgoJuni 1: PD 15 v Tshakhuma
title: I-Eagles ayililahlile ithemba

text: UQALE phansi uyadlanga umkhuba wokudunwa kwezimoto zishushumbiselwe eMozambique esifundeni saseMkhanyakude, KwaZulu-Natal.Lo mkhuba odlange kakhulu eManguzi amaphoyisa athi ubhekiswe nasebantwini abanamabhizinisi okwakha,  nawomsebenzi wokubaza amapulangwe.Amaphoyisa athi oduna imoto ufonela umnikazi webhizinisi azenze umuntu ofuna ukwenzelwa umsebenzi.Kuxoxwa kuqedwe ocingweni bese umnikazi webhizinisi ethunyelelwa indawo okumele aye kuyona ayoqala umsebenzi.Uma usomabhizinisi efika endaweni ayalelwe yona, udunwa imoto kuthathwe nako konke asuke ekuphethe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe izimoto zidunwa bese zeqiswa umngcele zithunyelwe kwamanye amazwe.“Sixwayisa bonke osomabhizinisi ukuthi bahlale beqaphile bangazitholi sebeyizisulu zalobu bugebengu,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Uthe iningi lezisulu kuba abantu abaphuma ezifundazweni iMpumalanga, eFree State, eGauteng nase-Eastern Cape.Amaphoyisa acela noma ubani ongaba nolwazi olungaholela ekuboshweni kwezigilamkhuba ukuba axhumane nesiteshi sangakubo noma ashayele abakwaCrime Stop enombolweni ethi: 08600 10111.Phambilini izigebengu bese zintshontsha izimoto zizifake emalolini athwala izinkwa.Ukudlanga komkhuba wokudunwa kwezimoto eManguzi, eJozini nasoPhongolo kuphoqe uMnyango wezokuThutha, ukuPhepha nokuXhumana koMphakathi esifundazweni ukuthi wakhe unqenqema lodonga emgceleni ohlukanisa iNingizimu Afrika nezwe iMozambique.Lo mnyango wathi ufuna ukunqanda izenzo zobelelesi kuqiniswe ezokuphepha.Umphakathi waseJozini uke waba nombhikisho onodlame izinsuku ezintathu uvala thaqa imigwaqo engena nephuma edolobheni ngamatshe, namathayi avuthayo, izihlahla nodoti.
title: Kuqale phansi ukwebiwa kwezimoto eMkhanyakude

text: IZINYUNYANA  zothisha zisho ngazwi linye ukuthi amalungu azobuyela emsebenzini kuphela uma uMnyango wezeMfundo sewenze konke okufanele ukuvikela impilo yabo egciwaneni i-Corona.Izikole zamiswa ukufunda emuva kokubheduka kwe-Corona, nehlalise manzonzo abantu kumanje. Izinyunyana iSadtu, Natu, Naptosa, PEU ne-SAOU zikhiphe isitatimende ngokuhlanganyela zibeka imibandela yokubuyela kothisha ezikoleni.Bebephendula inkulumo kaNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo eyisiSekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga, omemezele ukuthi izikole zizoqala ukufunda ngoJuni 1, ngaphansi kwemibandela eqinile.Isinqumo sikahulumeni sokuvula izikole sidale omkhulu umsindo kukhalwa ngokuthi lokhu kuzobeka izimpilo zabantu engcupheni yokuthelelana nge-Corona. Izinyunyana zithi zifuna uhulumeni agcine izethembiso zakhe zokuvikela abasebenzi nabafundi ngoba uma ehluleka ukwenza lokho, zizowuthathela izinyathelo umnyango.‘’Umthetho ukubeka kucace ukuthi umqashi kufanele alandele yonke imigomo yokuqinisekisa ukuthi impilo yabasebenzi iphephile. Kufanele kube nemithi yokuhlamba izandla yonke indawo nezifonyo zisemqoka uma kunje. Ithimba kufanele liqikelele ukuthi yonke into imi ngomumo,’’ ngokwesitatimende esihlanganyelwe.Izinyunyana zithi zisazocela umhlangano nongqongqoshe bese onobhala bezifundazwe becele imihlangano nongqongqoshe bezemfundo ezifundazweni ukuze kuxoxwe kabanzi ngazo zonke izinhlelo, ukuziqinisekisa ukuthi uhulumeni ugcina izethembiso zawo zokuvikela abasebenzi. ‘’Uma kukhona izinselelo ungqongqoshe kufanele akhulume nesizwe esidlangalaleni achaze ukuthi zizosonjululwa kanjani. Uma kungalungi ngeke abasebenzi baye emsebenzini ngoba abakwazi ukugembula ngezimpilo zabo."Izinyunyana zicele uhulumeni ahlinzeke abaholi bazo ngezimvume zokuhamba ukuze zihlole ukuthi kuhamba kahle emahhovisi omnyango ezifundeni. Isitatimende siveze nokuthi izinyunyana zizohlola amalungiselelo uma kukhona lapho kuxega khona ngeke zisonge izandla.
title: Baxwayisa ngokuvulwa kwezikole

text: UMBUZO: Nginenkinga kankosikazi ongangithobeli nokungumkhuba omusha. Ngaphambi kokuthi sishade ubezithobile nobekungesinye sezizathu ezangenza ngamshada ngokukhulu ukushesha ngoba akusajwayelekile ukuba nenhlanhla yokuthola umuntu wesifazane onesizotha kulesi sikhathi esiphila kuso. Kungabe yini ebanga lolu shintsho engilibona kwisithandwa sami?Ndlovu, eMlazaImpendulo:Siyazwelana kakhulu nawe mfowethu. Kuhle ukuthi uhlale phansi naye ukuthola ukuthi yini ngempela eshintshile phakathi kwenu. Kungabe kukhona okumkhathazayo emshadweni wenu ngoba akavele ashintshe nje umuntu esikhaleni ngaphandle uma ubevele ezenzisa kwasekuqaleni ngoba efuna umshado.Umbuzo:Sineminyaka emithathu sishadile nomyeni wami. Selokhu sashada ngamaholidi kaKhisimusi siba nomndeni wakhe. Anginayo nencane inkinga ngalokhu ngoba ngikholelwa ekutheni isikhathi sikaKhisimusi isikhathi sokujabula nabantu obathandayo kodwa umndeni wakhe wona ubona lesi sikhathi kungesokungenza isigqila. Kuma mina ngedwa ekhishini aze aphele wonke amaholidi. Ngisho nosisi bakhe abancane bahlala phansi uma sengifikile bamemeze abakufunayo. Okungiphatha kabi kakhulu wukuthi umyeni wami akangivikeli nhlobo kubantu bakubo. Uyena muntu ongakwazi ukubatshela ukuthi le nto abayenzayo ayiyinhle kodwa lutho. Ngenzenjani ukuze umyeni wami angivikele emndenini wakhe ngamaholidi kaKhisimusi?Okhathazekile, eMelmothImpendulo:Akukholakali ukuthi kusekhona abantu abasenza into enjena komakoti. Kuyinto ejwayelekile ukuthi bazothanda ukutatanyiswa uwena njengomakoti wabo ikakhulukazi njengoba ungahlali nabo. Kodwa akumele aze aphele amaholidi kumi wena wedwa bona betatamiswa uwena nje kuphela. Sicabanga ukuthi sekungukuhlukumeza lokhu abakwenzayo. Umyeni wakho nguye okumele akuvikele esimeni esinjengalesi. Kusengenzeka futhi ukuthi akakuvikeli ngoba akazi yonke lento eyenzeka kuwe ngoba ungathola ukuthi benza kanje uma engaboni. Ngakho ayikho into edlula ukuthi umazise umyeni wakho ngenhlalo yakho uma nivakashe kubo ngamaholidi. Lokho kuzomenza akhulume nomndeni wakhe noma nizame ukuthi ningahlali isikhathi eside kubo kunesikhathi enisichitha nobabili ngaphandle komndeni wakhe.Umbuzo:Unkosikazi wami uthanda impilo ephezulu nokuphilela abanye abantu. Uhlezi engifaka ingcindezi yokwenza izinto engingafuni ukuzenza ngoba ebona okwenziwa omakhelwane nabangani bethu. Kumanje ufuna sishintshe imoto esisanda kuyithenga ngoba ebona abangani bethu beshintshashintsha izimoto. Mina ngingumuntu owakhula kanzima ngakho angizwani nokusaphaza imali. Ngikholelwa ekongeni imali ukuze izingane zami zingakhuli ziswele njengami. Ngenzenjani ukuze unkosikazi wami ayibone njengami impilo?Igama ligodliweImpendulo:Unkosikazi wakho unenhlanhla yokuba nomyeni ocabangela ikusasa njengawe. Ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi umazise ngezinto ezibalulekile kuwena nezinto ozisabayo ukuze naye ame nawe kuzona. Ayikho into edlula ukuthi niziphilele impilo yenu, ngezinga lenu futhi nibhekele ikusasa.Umbuzo:Nginonyaka ngishadile nomyeni engimthanda ngenhliziyo yami yonke. Inkinga wukuthi yena ufuna sisheshe sibe nabantwana kanti mina ngisafuna ukulinda kancane ngiqedele ngisho isikole. Ngibona sengathi isinqumo sami sizoba yinkinga enkulu emndenini wakhe ngoba sebehlale bengibuza uma sihlangana emicimbini ukuthi beza nini kanti abazukulu. Ngabe ngiyona uma ngibatshela ukuthi ngisazimisele ngokufunda ngakho abantwana bazothi ukuma kancane?Okhathazekile, eNtuzumaImpendulo:Ukuqala umndeni kuphakathi kwakho nomyeni wakho. Kepha kuhle nazi ukuthi abantu abadala ayikho into ebaluleke kubo njengokubona kwanda umndeni.Ngakho bayohlale benibuza uma nihlangana ukuthi beza nini abazukulu.Singanicebisa nje ngokuthi yebo kuhle ukuqala umndeni uma senikulungele kodwa kuhle futhi ukubhalansisa phakathi kwemfundo nomndeni. Ningalindi isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuqala umndeni ngoba usengakwazi ukufunda ngasese ube ukhulisa nabantwana futhi. Kuhle futhi nokufika kwabantwana nisenawo amandla okugijima nabo, nithokozele impilo ndawonye. Vumelanani nomyeni wakho ukuthi nizimisele ukuwuqala nini umndeni nokuthi izifundo zizodinga esingakanani isikhathi ukuze nizilungiselele kahle.
title: #Ezothando: Uma kuwuKhisimusi ngiphenduka isigqila sasemzini

text: ISINGENWE nangezinye izinhlangano indaba yomhlaba weSilo Samabandla, ongaphansi kweNgoyama Trust, asesabise ngokuthi azobhekana ngqo nabagqugquzela lolu daba.Inhlangano yabangcwabi, iNational Funeral Parlours Association SA, (Nafupa SA), iBlack First Land First, nenhlangano yosiyayinyomfa, iDelangokubona, bonke bathe bazozibona ukuthi bafana nobani abafuna ukudla lo mhlaba.Lezi zinhlangano bezihlangene emcimbini wokuvula ngokusemthethweni weNafupa SA obuse-Olive Convention Centre eThekwini ngoLwesine ebusuku.“Basaba ukuthatha umhlaba wamaBhunu, bazoqinela oweNgonyama, bazozibona ukuthi bafana nobani,” kuvutha uMnuz Muzi Hlengwa.Uthe kuningi abahlele ukuthi bakuthathe ngenkani ngoba isikhathi sokuncenga sesiphelile.Ubale enye yezinkampani zomshwalense enkulu, ukuthi uma ingavumi ukusebenzisana nabo, bazoyidla ngenkani.Kanjalo nomhlaba abebethenjiswe wona yiMeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, bathe nawo bawubalela izinsuku ezimbalwa ukuthi bawudle uma kungukuthi iMeya ayicacisi.Le nhlangano isebenzisana neDelangokubona edume ngokufuna ngenkani amathenda akhishwa omasipala KwaZulu-Natal, yiBlack First, Land First eholwa * -Andile Mngxithama, abangcwabi iDoves nezinye izinhlangano.Owayengumegameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma obeyisimenywa esiqavile kulo mbuthano, uncome ukuhlanganyela izinto kwale mibutho, wathi yikona okuyokhipha abantu abamnyama ekuhluphekeni.“Ngiyabonga ukuthi ningimeme. Lokhu kusho ukuthi yingoba nisakholwa wukuthi kukhona iqhaza engingalibamba ekuthuthukiseni isizwe sakithi esimnyama,” kusho uZuma obenanelwa yihlombe inkulumo yakhe yonke.NgokukaZuma, usemkhulu umshikashika okumele wenziwe ekukhululeni abantu abamnyama, phezu kokuthi sekuphele iminyaka engu-24 sakhululeka.Ugxeke ukuqhwagwa komhlaba wabantu abamnyama njengenye yezimbangela ezaholela ekuhluphekeni kwabantu abamnyama.Uphinde waveza ukuthi isizathu esiholele ekutheni axoshwe njengomengameli, wukuthi ubesho izinto ezicasula abamhlophe.“Uma umuntu esho into abamhlophe abangayithandi, uyahlaselwa kusebenziswa abamnyama,” usho kanje.Uthe lokhu kuwuphawu olusobala lokuthi leli lizwe alikakhululeki kodwa lisesezandleni zabantu abamhlophe. Enkulumeni yakhe, ungene wagxila ekutheni abamhlophe abamfuni kanjani umuntu omnyama onezimibono.Zonke izikhulumi ebezikulo mcimbi, bezincoma kakhulu uZuma ngeqhaza alibambile ekwakheni leli lizwe.“Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi umhlaba ubuye ngoba akuzange kuvele kuNkulunkulu ukuthi abantu abamnyama bahlupheke,” kugcizelela uZuma.UZuma uhlonishwe yiRadical Economic Transformation, njengomholi okwazile ukuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda kuleli lizwe.
title: EyoweSilo ingenwe yizinhlangano

text: I-IEC ithi bazoboshwa abantu bakuleli abavote kabili ngoLwesithathu. Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu basabalalisa ama-video nezithombe bekhombisa ukuthi kulula kangakanani ukususa umaki ka-ink wokuvota esithupheni. Kube sekusabalala imibiko yokuthi kunabantu asebevote kabili kwezinye izindawo, i-IEC ethe iyaphenya ngayo. Iphawula kulolu daba i-IEC ithe asikho isidingo sokuthi abantu bayingabaze imiphumela yokhetho ngoba ziningi izinhlelo abazibekile zokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bavota kanye futhi kubalwa amavoti angempela uma sekukhishwa imiphumela. Ukhomishana we-IEC uMnuz Mosotho Moepya ube esebala izindlela i-IEC eqinisekisa ngayo ukuthi umuntu uvota kanye: - IVoters Roll, ivumela abantu abakubhaliselile ukuvota ukuthi bavote. Kubhaliselwa kanye ukuvota. - Abavotayo kumele baphathe umazisi wabo esandleni - Umazisi udlula kwi-scan ngaphambi kokuthi uvote - Kubekwa umaki ngo-ink ongasuki esithupheni sovotayo - Kugcwaliswa ifomu lomuntu ovotayo kufakwe imininingwane yabo. Abavota ezikhungweni abangabheliselenga ukuvota kuzo basayina isitatimende esifungelwe. - Kuba khona amalungu ezinhlangano, nazimele, aqapha konke okwenzekayo ezikhungweni zokuvota ngokubambisana nabasebenzi be-IEC - I-IEC igcina amavoti ngohlelo lwe-digital lapho sikwazi ukuwabala khona kabusha ngalinye. UMoepya uthe uma butholwa ubufakazi bokuthi kunabantu abavote kabili, bazobhekisisa amavoti ezikhungo ezithintekayo, kulandelwe abathintekayo babhekane nengalo yomthetho. Uthe sekuneminyaka i-IEC isingatha ukhetho olukhululekile futhi olukhipha imiphumela eyiyo.
title: #Ukhetho2019: Bazoboshwa abavote kabili - IEC

text: SIFUNA intsha ingalindi ukwenzelwa izinto nguhulumeni isitshudeni sase-University of Zululand (Unizulu) ebesiyocijwa ngobuholi e-USA.UYanelisa Menzangabom (22) owenza unyaka wokugcina kwezomthetho, ubeyingxenye yohlelo iStudy of United Institute for Student Leaders ngenyanga edlule.UMenzangabom waseKokstad uthe akubanga yiphutha ukuba yingxenye yalolu hambo ngoba uyathanda ukusebenzisana nomphakathi. Kwabathathu bakuleli abebeyingxenye yalolu hlelo, bekunguye yedwa ophuma enyuvesi yabamnyama.“Okwenze ngifake isicelo ukuthi izitshudeni ezimnyama sezilahle ithemba. Ngisho kuvela amathuba afana nalolu hlelo abanye abanawo umdlandla wokufaka izicelo,” echaza.Uthe ufunde lukhulu kulolu hlelo njengoba bevakashele esiShayamthetho, emisakazweni nakwezinye izikhungo zomphakathi.“Abantu abaningi bayithatha ngesinxele indaba yobuholi. Kungisizile ukuba kulolu hlelo ngoba sengiyazi ukuthi ukuba umholi akusho ukuthi wazi konke,” kusho yena.Yize efundela ukuba ngummeli, uthe uthanda kakhulu ukusebenza nomphakathi ngezamalungelo abantu.Echaza ngokuba yingxenye yalolu hlelo, uthe bekufuneka izitshudeni ezisebenza nemiphakathi. UMenzangabom uyingxenye yeYouth Citizen Action lapho besiza abafundi ezikoleni ezahlukene, bebafundisa ngobuholi. Uthe laba bafundi babafundisa ukuthi benze okuthize okuzosiza umphakathi, babacije ngamakhono. Uhlabeke umxhwele ngendlela athe e-USA ahlonishwa ngayo amavolontiya ezinhlangano zomphakathi. Isifiso sakhe ukuthi nakuleli zihlonishwe izinhlangano ezisiza imiphakathi.“Siyabadinga abaholi kodwa kumele kuqale kumuntu ngamunye, abe nesifiso sokuba ngumholi. Akulula ukuholwa uma nawe ungafuni kwenza lutho. Wonke umuntu unamandla okuzenzela okuthize, ngaphandle kokulinda uhulumeni,” kusho yena.UMenzangabom unethemba lokuthi ukuya kwakhe e-USA kuzomvulela namanye amathuba.Uthe ukukhulela emakhaya yikona okumnike ugqozi lokufunda nokuba ngumholi ngoba ebona indlela abamnyama ababecindezeleke ngayo. Uma eseqede izifundo zomthetho nonyaka, ufisa ukwenza iMasters in Human Rights.Ungusihlalo we-Unizulu Debating Union lapho besebenzisana khona nabafundi abahlukene nezikole zamabanga aphezulu KwaDlangezwa.
title: Unefuzela lobuholi entsheni

text: WILLEM PHUNGULAKUNUKA ukhukhulelangoqo wesiteleka sabasebenzi baseSABC, ngenhloso yokunqanda inhlangano ingadilizi izisebenzi.Lokhu kudalulwe yinyunyana yabasebenzi, i-Communication Worker’s Union (CWU), emva kokuba iSABC imemezele ukuthi iqala uhlelo lokudiliza izisebenzi eziwu-400.Esitatimendeni, le nhlangano ithe emva kokuxoxisana izikhawu eziwu-16 nezinhlaka ezifanele, inqume ukuthi ichithe izisebenzi ukuze ikwazi ukuqhubeka nokusebenza.Iqhube yathi iyazi ukuthi lesi sinyathelo sibi kodwa akukho engakwenza ukuzeinhlangano iqhubeke nokusimama, kumele inciphise izisebenzi.Unobhala-jikelele weCWU uMnuz Aubrey Tshabalala, utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi badumele ngesinqumo seSABC, wathi bazolwa naso nanoma ngayiphi indlela.Ugxeke iSABC ngokubadla izithende gwaza ngemuvangoba bona beyizinyunyana, bebazi ukuthi kusaxoxiswana.Uthe ngesikhathi inhlangano imemezela okokuqala, njengezinyunyana baphuthuma enkantolo bathola incwadi yokuvimba ukuba iSABC ingaqhubeki nokudiliza.Uthe le nhlangano ibuyele kubo yathi asikho isidingo ngoba ngeke idilize kungakaboniswana, okwenze izinyunyana zahoxisa umyalelo wenkantolo kanti iSABC izobavukela esiswini njengotshwala.Uthe ngenxa yokungathembeki kwe-SABC sebenqume ukuba babeke phansi amathuluzi bagcwale umgwaqo balwe nokudilizwa kwezisebenzi.“Sesiqalile siyabonisana nezinye izinyunyana ngenhloso yokuya esitekeleni. Abameli bethu bamatasatasa balungisa amaphepha futhi baseluleka ngokuthi siya kanjani phambili,” kuchaza  uTshabalala.Isitatimende seSABC sibalule nokuthi isibalo sokuqala besiwu-600 kodwa sancipha sehlela ku-400, kanti sizokwehlela ku-230 ngoba sekuvele izikhala eziwu-170 okumele zigcwaliswe.Ngaphandle kokudiliza inhlangano ithe ngeke ikhushulwe imali yemiholo kwabasele kuze kuphele iminyaka emithathu. Imemezele nokunciphisa amalivu nawezinsuku zokugula imbala.Umthombo ongaphakathi kwaSABC uthe kugxabha izisu kubasebenzi, njengoba kulindeleke ukuthi ngoLwesithathu zaziswe ngokusemthethweni lezo ezichithwayo.
title: Bahlela isiteleka abaseSABC ukuvimbela ukudilizwa

text: UZOBOPHA uMnyango wezoBulungiswa owesifazane obebhadle ejele iminyaka eyisithupha ngecala okugcine kuvele ukuthi akalenzanga.UNksz Nolubabalo Nomsuka (29) waseLamontville udedelwe ejele laseKokstad ngoMsombuluko odlule emuva kokutholakala ukuthi akanacala.Uthe wahlazeka futhi wahlukana nomndeni wakhe kulandela ukuboshelwa icala lokubulala ingane yakhe ezelwe ngo-2011.Ugwetshwe ngoJuni 2012 kulandela ukulahlwa yicala lokubulala ingane yakhe okwakuthiwa wayiklinya.Uthe yize kunzima ukubuyela emphakathini kodwa uyajabula ukuthi usezokwazi ukusebenza ondle ingane yakhe.“Ngifuna ukubopha uMnyango wezoBulungiswa ngokungibopha ngecala engingazange ngilenze, nangendlela engaboshwa ngayo yayingekho emthethweni. Okubuhlungu wukuthi impilo yami imoshakele, ngiphume ingane yami eyayineminyaka emibili isikhulile, ingasangazi,” kusho uNksz Nomsuka.Elandisa Isolezwe ngesehlo esenzeka ngoDisemba 3, 2011 eWema ehostela eliseMlaza uthe: “Ngashayela ucingo umngani wami ngamtshela ukuthi ngicela angiphelezele siye kwadokotela ngoba ngangizizwa ngisikwa. Ngagcina ngizibelethele ngingedwa, ngoba nganginezinyanga eziyisishiyagalombili, ingane yashona. Ngayisonga ngendwangu ngayibeka ngasemnyango,” kusho uNksz Nomsuka.Omakhelwane bayibona, babiza amaphoyisa ngaboshwa kanjalo.Wabhekana necala lokubulala ngoba kwakuvele ukuthi ingane inomaka bokuklinywa.“Angiboni ukuthi ngiyoke ngibuyele eWema ngoba isithunzi sami sadicileleka phansi. Ngabizwa ngombulali ekubeni ngingeyena,” kusho uNksz Nomsuka.Uthe wahlala esitokisini waze wathola ukudedelwa ngesexwayiso ngoFebhuwari 2012. Icala laliqhubeka liqulwa engaphandle.“NgoJuni 2012 ngagwetshwa enkantolo yaseThekwini. IMantshi yaqala yanginika isigwebo sikadilikajele, ngemuva kwemizuzwana bashintsha banginikeza iminyaka engu-20,” kusho uNksz Nomsuka.Wayefunda uGrade 11 ngesikhathi kwenzeka lokhu.Ngo-2013 uthe kwafika abakwaLegal Aid South Africa, bamsiza ukufaka isicelo sokuba adlulise icala.“Ngesikhathi abameli befaka isicelo sokuba ngidedelwe, kwatholakala ukuthi icala aliqulwanga ngendlela. Isigwebo sabekwa eceleni ngoba kwavela ukuthi anginalo icala,” kusho uNksz Nomsuka.UMnuz Bongani Mahlangu wezokuxhumana kwaLegal Aid eKZN uthe bayajabula kakhulu ukuthi kwavela ukuthi akanacala uNksz Nomsuka.Uthe umsebenzi wabo wukuvakashela amajele babheke izigwebo, bese labo abafaka izicelo zikashwele babheke amacala abo.Uthe elikaNksz Nomsuka kwakucaca ukuthi baba buningi ubudedengu obenzeka kulo njengoba kukhona nodokotela owahlola ingane owaveza ubufakazi bokuthi ayizange iklinywe kodwa yalimala ngesikhathi ezibelethisa uNksz Nomsuka.“Babungekho ubulungiswa kuleli cala nokwenza siqhubeke sibophe umbuso ngokuthi uNksz Nomsuka waboshwa ngokungekho emthethweni,” kusho uMahlangu.UNksz Nomsuka uthe impilo yasejele ibinzima kakhulu futhi akafisi ukubuye aphindele.
title: Ufuna isinxephezeloobhadle ejele emsulwa

text: ILIBANGISE e-England i-Orlando Pirates edlala i-Five-a-side eshaya kwasani kontanga yabo eNingizimu Afrika kulesi sigaba.EZimnyama zizodlala imidlalo yesihle namaqembu ase-England angakaqinisekiswa kusuka ngoNovemba 22, kuze kube uNovemba 27.I-Bucs (esebenza ngaphansi kwesitifiketi seqembu elikhulu) ibisingethe umqhudelwano kazwelonke owaziwa ngeKlipdrift Cup ngo-Okthoba 27.Lo mqhudelwano ubungaphansi kwenhlangano eyengamele i-Five-a-side eyaziwa ngeFives Futbol.Lo mqhudelwano ubunamaqembu ayisishiyagalombili aqhamuka kuzo zonke izifundazwe zakuleli. Abe esehlukaniswa, kwaba ngamane iqoqo ngalinye. Emidlalweni emithathu, iPirates iyinqobe yonke yaqhwakela eqoqweni layo.Umgadli weZimnyama uJose "Jokabonita" Garcia (oke wadlalela iBaroka FC), ushaye amagoli ayisithupha emidlalweni emithathu esigabeni samaqoqo.Sekungumlando ukuthi kowamanqamu iBhakabhaka linqobe ngo 5-3. Kungakho lizolibangisa e-England emidlalweni yesihle namaqembu akhona. Okuzojabulisa kakhulu abadlali beBucs ukuthi bazothola ithuba elingandele bani lokuyobuka umdlalo phakathi kweWest Ham United neManchester City ozobe use-Olympic Stadium ngoNovemba 24.Phakathi kwabaxhasi abeseka iBucs Five's singabala inkampani yezingubo zokugqoka zemidlalo i-Adidas, kube inkampani yezinto zokugcoba iHerbal Icema eneminyaka engu-20 isebenza eNingizimu Afrika. Le nkampani isiza kakhulu kubantu abaphukile njengoba ikwazi ukupholisa iphinde ithambise namamasela.Enye inkampani exhase leli qembu i-340 on Main Health & Wellness Centre esiza ngokululeka abadlali ngokomqondo nakwezinye izinto ezithinta ukusebenza komqondo.
title: IBucs iyoyibamba phesheya

text: NOKUBONGWA  PHENYANEUZIMISELE ngokududuza abangeke bawine kumaGrammy Awards usomahlaya wakuleli uTrevor Noah oqokelwe ukupha lo mcimbi ngonyaka ozayo.Sekungokwesi-63 lo mcimbi usingathwa ngoJanuwari 31, e-USA kepha kungokokuqala ukuthi uhlelo lwawo luphathwe ngumuntu waseNingizimu Afrika.Abaqokwe kuwona bamenyezelwe ngoLwesibili kwi-website ethi grammy.com ngo-7 ebusuku. Abahleli bamaGrammy Award badalule ukuthi akekho omunye umuntu ongcono abebengamcabanga akade bengamcabangaekuphatheni umcimbi ngaphandle kukaTrevor.Usomahlaya wakuleli uTrevor uthe, yize eseke waqokwa kulo mcimbi kepha wangawina, ukuba ngumethuli wawo kuzomsiza ukududuza bonke abangazukuwina njengoba ekwazi kahle ukuthi kubuhlungu kanjani ukungayitholi le ndondo.“Wonke umuntu usefisa ukuthi unyaka udlule, sikhohlwe yiwona ngenxa yezigameko ezenzeke kuwo. Kodwa ikhona into eyodwa esihlanganisayo futhi kuyona sithole injabulo, leyo nto umculo. Ngizizwa ngithobekile ngempela ukuthola ithuba lokuphatha lo mcimbi. Ngalobu busuku kulapho siyobe sibungaza khona abaculi bethu esibathandayo. Umculo wabo usenze sakujabulela ukuhlala ezindlini ngesikhathi sivalelwe emazweni ahlukene,” kubhala uTrevor.Uthe usekubheke ngabomvu ukuphatha umcimbi.“Yize ngidumele ukuthi abahleli bomcimbi banginqabele ukuthi ngicule kuwona futhi baphinde banginqabela ukuthi ngiqokwe emkhakheni weBest Pop Album, kodwa kungijabulisile ukuthi ngizophatha umcimbi omkhulu emhlabeni,” kuphetha uTrevor.Iningi labantu bakuleli okuhlanganisa nosaziwayo limshayele ihlombe uTrevor ngokuthola leli thuba.Kulo nyaka uTrevor ubengomunye wabakade beqokwe kulo mcimbi.Kuwona wayeqokwe emkhakheni weBest Comedy album, nge-albhamu yakhe yamahlaya ethi Trevor Noah: Son of Patricia.
title: UTrevor uthole ingqayizivele yokuphatha amaGrammy

text:
NONTUTHUKO NGUBANE noNOKUBONGWA PHENYANEBUZOBE buthe chithi saka ubumnandi kule mpelasonto eDundee njengoba umjaho wamahhashi osuzakhele udumo iDundee July ususemome nabahleli bawo bethi sekulunge konke.Lo mcimbi ozoqala ngoLwesihlanu uzohambisana nemicimbi eminingi njengoba ngalo usuku lwakusasa kuzoba nomcimbi wesidlo sasebusuku la kuzobongwa khona abantu abaqala lo mcimbi.Lo mjaho ovame ukushaywa indiva ngabaningi kwazise ulandelana neDurban July, abahleli bawo bathembise ukuthi izinga lawo lizobe liphezulu kunakuqala kanti lokho kuzoheha izindimbane zabathandi balo mdlalo eminyakeni ezayo.UMike Mthembu okunguyena ophethe izintambo kulo mcimbi utshele 
Isolezwe ukuthi ubumnandi buzobe bubuzwa eDundee impelasonto yonke nezinga lamahhashi lizobe liphezulu kunakuqala.“Kusukela ngoLwesihlanu kuzobe kunomcimbi ozoba kulo lonke idolobha ozosuka eTalana Museum uze uphele elokishini laseSibongile. Abantu bazobhema bakholwe yiGala Dinner esizoba nayo ntambama ngalo uLwesihlanu.Le micimbi yekhethelo ibingekho phambilini kwi-Dundee July,” kusho uMthembu.Lo mjaho wamahhashi waqalwa eminyakeni eyisishiyagalombili edlule nathi uMthembu bese kuyisikhathi sokuba ukhule ufike kuleli zinga lo mjaho onesasasa kosomabhizinisi abaningi kule ndawo.“Bangu-101 osomabhizinisi abazobe bekhangisa ngezinto zabo ngoMgibelo.Sikhulu kakhulu lesi sibalo uma usiqhathanisa nabangu-30 esasinabo ngonyaka odlule.Ngicabanga ukuthi wonke umuntu waseDundee nosondelene nale ndawo uzofisa ukuba lapha ngoba akukho okuzobe kungekho. Okumnandi wukuthi umasipala waseThekwini nawo usuyingxenye yalo mjaho,” kusho yena.Isiteki somjaho wamahhashi singu-R150 000 kulo nyaka.Abaculi abadumile nabo abasalanga ngaphandle kulo mjaho.Phakathi kwabaculi abazonandisa kubalwa uZakes Bantwini, Big Nuz, Zakwe, Bullistic, Tzozo, Msawawa, DJ Zinhle, DJ Cyndo, DJ Oros, DJ Gukwa nabanye.“Ubumnandi buzobe bubuzwa kwiDundee July, kusukela ngoLwesihlanu (kusasa) kuze kube yiSonto. Ngeke kuze kulalwe,” kusho uMthembu.
title: Bathembisa elicokeme kuDundee July

text: KUWE umuthi omkhulu endimeni yezokusakaza nokulingisa ngokudlula emhlabeni kwenye yezingqalabutho, uMduduzi Hlophe odabuka endaweni yaseMatimatolo, eGreytown. Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe udadewabo kamufi, uNkk Bongekile uMaHlophe Chonco. Uthe uHlophe udlule emhlabeni namhlanje kwakhe ePimville, eSoweto namhlanje ekuseni. “Ubengaguli kodwa ubesenamahlalakhona ngenxa yobudala njengoba ubeseneminyaka engaphezu kuka-70. Angikabi nayo imininingwane egcwele ngenxa yokuthi bengingekho ekhaya,” kusho uNkk Chonco.UHlophe waqala enguthisha ezikoleni zangakubo eGreytown. Wazakhela udumo ngokuba wumsakazi wokuqala weRadio Bantu eThekwini  ngaphambi kokufudukela eGoli eseyofunda izindaba izindaba zesiZulu esiteshini iTV2 (osekunguSABC 2) eGoli. Ubuye wabhala imidlalo yethelevishini okubalwa kuyo othi Senzekile, Ngibuyela Kwabakithi nothi Hlela Imindeni.Izwi lakhe lalibuye lizwakale emdlalweni wethelevishini owawuthi Deliwe, lapho ayethatha ababukeli ebabeka ngalo mdlalo. UNkk Chonco uthe umnewabo ushiye emhlabeni izingane ezimbili okunguNkk Tholakele Mpungose noMnuz Ntuthuko Hlophe.
title: Kuwe umuthi omkhulu endimeni yezokusakaza

text: IQALE phansi inkinga yokungaqoqwa kukadoti eMlaza njengoba izakhamizi zaleli lokishi zithi sekuphele isonto udoti ungathathiwe.Izakhamizi zithe zixakekile ukuthi awuqoqiwe ngani ngoba sekunesikhathi eside bagcina ukubhekana nale nkinga kwazise beseluhamba kahle uhlelo lokuthuthwa kukadoti.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi osonkontileka abancane abaholeliwe imali yabo yokuqoqa udoti yingakho bengawuthathi udoti wezakhamizi zaseMlaza.Osonkontileka abancane abakhulume neSolezwe kodwa abangathandanga ukudalulwa bathe bazoze bawuqoqe uma sebekhokheliwe ngoba abakwazi ukusebenza belambile nabo kufanele bondle imindeni yabo, bakhokhele nezingane ezikoleni.Esitatimendeni abophiko lwezokuxhumana kuMasipala weTheku bacele izakhamizi zaseMlaza ukuba zingawukhiphi udoti emizini yazo kodwa ziwugcine ngaphakathi kuze kube luqala phansi uhlelo lokuwuqoqa.“Siyacela abantu bangawukhipheli emgwaqeni udoti kuze kube siyabazisa. Ukungaqoqwa kukadoti kuqalwe yizimo ezingaphezu kumasipala nosonkontileka (main contractor). Umasipala unomhlangano nosonkontileka ukuze uze nesixazululo salolu daba,” kusho abakwamasipala esitatimendeni.Njengamanje umasipala uthe uqoqa udoti osuvele ubekiwe emigwaqeni ngamaloli awo.“Sizozazisa izakhamizi zaseMlaza uma sekuqala ukuqoqwa kukadoti, okwamanje siyacela ziwugcine emagcekeni azo. Siyaxolisa kakhulu ngokuphazamiseka kokuqoqwa kukadoti,” kusho abakwamasipala esitatimendeni.
title: Bagodle amandla osonkontileka bakadoti eMlaza

text: LIYASHUBA icala likasomabhizinisi osolwa ngokudubula, abulale ibhungu ebelidume ngokudla indlangu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uMnuz Mlungisi Mbewana.NgoLwesihlanu eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini, umbuso udalule ukuthi umsolwa uMnuz Jonas George Tsautse akasezukubhekana necala lokubulala uMbewana kuphela kodwa sekwengezwe nesigaba sokuthi wayehlelile ukumbulala.Umbuso ushintshe icala lokubulala abebhekene nalo wamthwesa elokubulala ngenhloso.Lo msolwa usagqunywe esitokisini, icala lakhe lihlehliselwe uLwesibili ukuze afake isicelo sebheyili.Usolwa ngokubulala uMbewana endaweni yobumnandi eSpringfield eThekwini, ngoSepthemba 23.Uze wazinikela emaphoyiseni ephelezelwa ummeli ngo-Okthoba 6 wavela enkantolo ngemva kwezinsuku ezimbili eboshiwe.Lisale likhexile ithimba lamameli bakaTsautse izolo, ngenkathi umshushisi u-Advocate Nhlanhla Shange, etshela inkantolo ukuthi sebeyalishintsha icala lokubulala eliwuschedule 5 ebelibekwe umsolwa, sebemthwesa icala lokubulala ngokuhleliwe.Lokhu kudide abameli bakaTsautse abafike enkantolo bemagange behlome nangencwadi efungelwe kamsolwa yecala lokubulala eliwuschedule 5 kepha bagcine becela inkantolo ukubuyela emumva bayohlela kabusha.UShange uthe uTsautse kuzomele abeke izizathu ezibambekayo, eziqinile futhi ezingejwayelekile azonxenxa ngazo inkantolo ukuthi imkhulule ngebheyili. Uthe bewumbuso bazophikisana nalesi sicelo.Imantshi uMelanie de Jager ibe isilihlehlisa icala yenza nencwadi egunyaza ukuthi uTsautse asuswe esiteshini saseSydenham, avalelwe kusona bese eyogqunywa kwesaseDurban Central.UTsautse ungene ebhokisini labasolwa egqoke itracksuit empunga efake nesifonyo esimnyama.Uthe engena enkantolo kwanemvunge yabantu abebezokweseka umndeni kamufi. Bese kungokwesithathu evela kule nkantolo uTsautse. Egcina ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule, umbuso wacela inkantolo iwunike izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ukuze uqhubeke nophenyo ngoba wawungakakulungeli ukulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyli sikaTsautse.Wawufuna kuqinisekiswe amakheli ezindawo ezimbili eSandton eGoli, naseMatatiele lapho kuhlala khona uTsautse. Amaphoyisa ayesaqinisekise amakheli ezindawo ezimbili zemizi kaTsautse KwaZulu-Natal.Ngaleso sikhathi umbuso wathi awunawo umazisi nencwadi yokuhambela amazwe kaTsautse. Wahabula nokuthi kungenzeka ukuthi uTsautse akasona isakhamuzi saseNingizimu AfrikaWawufuna nolwazi ngamabhizinisi akhe nempahla anayo futhi sasingakatholakali isibhamu esasetshenziswa kubulawa bese kuvikelwa ofakazi.
title: Usezobhekana nelokubulala uMlungisi Mbewana ngenhloso

text: LIGCWALE umoya ibhantshi kumsakazi wesiteshi somphakathi, Imbokodo FM osungule iqembu lezepolitiki elizongenela ukhetho lukazwelonke ngonyaka ozayo.U-Alex Mdunge wethule iqembu lakhe elisha, iSouth African People’s Movement (SAPM) ngoMgqibelo eMorningside, eThekwini, lapho abebize khona abezindaba. Isolezwe ngeSonto libike ngokwethulwa kwaleli qembu elididiyele abaholi abebeyizintatheli asebelaxaze lo msebenzi bahambaa neqembu elisha. UMphathisiteshi uSandile Ngema uthe lo msakazi banqume ukumdedela ngoba imithetho yokusebenza kwemisakazo ayikuvumi ukuthi umsakazi azimbandakanye neqembu lezepolitiki.‘’Simbizile impela samchazela ukuthi ngeke sisakwazi ukuqhubeka sisebenze naye ngoba ngeke sikwazi ukuba nomuntu obuye abambe iqhaza kwezepolitiki. Simfisela okuhle kodwa ezinhlelweni zakhe anazo njengoba sesehlukene naye. Siyabonga ngamagalelo akhe abe nawo nakho konke akwenzele isiteshi ngesikhathi esekhona,” kusho uNgemaUthe nabenhlangano i-ICASA ngeke bakuvume ukuthi isiteshi sibe nomsakazi ongusopolitiki. Uqhube wathi bebengazi ngezinhlelo zalo msakazi, bethuke sebezwa kuthiwa wuyena owethula iqembu ngempelasonto edlule.UMdunge ethintwa ngodaba, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi usekhonjwe indlela ngenxa yokusungula iqembu lezepolitiki. Uthe uyayiqonda imithetho yesiteshi futhi ukwemukele ngenhliziyo emhlophe ukuxoshwa kwakhe.‘’Bengazi nami ukuthi vele akuvumelekile kodwa bengilinde isikhathi esifanele ukuthi ngibazise abaphathi bami, ngibabonge ngivalelise. Bekufanele ngiqale ngilungiselele ikusasa lami, konke kume ngomumo ngaphambi kokushiya, nakho-ke sebengibiza bengitshela lezi zindaba,’’ kuchaza uMdunge.Uthe bekufanele angene ohlelweni lwakhe ngoMgqibelo olubizwa nge-Asidlali Saturday Drive kusukela ngo-3 kuya ku-6 ntambama, okungeke kusenzeka.
title: Uxoshiwe emsebenzini umsakazi oqale iqembu lezepolitiki

text: Lo mbono uqhamuke nomaskanda uNgiga Ndlovu waBangani Bakhe noBanganakiwe ngesikhathi kuyocelwa izinhlanhla emzini kaPhuzushukela kwaGolokodo eNkandla, izolo.Komaskanda ebebeholwa nguKhuzani Mpungose kubalwa uPhuzekhemisi, Cevuzile Mchunu, Qhoshangokwenzakwakhe, Buselaphi, Udidi Olumashoba, Ali Mgube, Umlamuli Umfana KaBuselaphi, owayengumsakazi woKhozi FM uNgizwe Mchunu nabanye.“Siyacela kuhulumeni ukuba asihloniphele lo muzi ukuze uhehe izivakashi. Lo mqondo ungifikele ngesikhathi ngiseRussia. Ngathola ukuthi abaculi bakhona bayanakekelwa futhi bayahlonishwa wuhulumeni wakhona,” kusho uNgiga. Nomfowabo kaPhuzushukela, uFana Bhengu, usishayele ihlombe isiphakamiso wabuye waphonsela inselelo uKhuzani ukuba alekelele ekwakhiweni kabusha komuzi kaPhuzushukela. “Njengoba uyi-yogurt edliwa yonke indawo, singajabula uma ngelinye ilanga ungafika kulo muzi usungcono.” UBhengu usishayele ihlombe isenzo sikaKhuzani wathi ungumculi wokuqala kamaskandi ukuhlonipha uPhuzushukela. UKhuzani uthe uzocela izinhlanhla kuPhuzushukela owasungula lo mculo. “Ngiqhubeka lapho agcina khona njengoba nami sengiba wumaskandi wokuqala ofuna lo mculo waziwe yizwe lonke,” kusho uKhuzani obephethe izimbuzi ezimbili, umnikelo wemali nesikibha esenziwe isithombe esikhulu esibhalwe ukuthi Phuzushukela. Enye imbuzi ikhishwe uBuselaphi othe usanda kuhlonishwa ngeziqu zobudokotela kulo mculo ngenxa yale ngqalabutho. UPhuzekhemisi uthe wake wahlangana noPhuzushukela ngesikhathi esasebenza njengenogada. “Wayeqopha enkampanini kaNzimande (uHamilton). Wayesemdala kakhulu futhi waze washonela e-studio,” kusho uPhuzekhemisi.UBhengu uthathe izimbuzi nesikibha wayokushisela impepho endlini. Basuke emzini kaPhuzushukela, balibhekisa elibeni beholwa wuBhengu. Omaskanda, beholwa uNgizwe, babuye bahlabelela izingoma zikaPhuzushukela basina. Ayisalanga ingoma kaKhuzani ethi Izwe ElikaKhuba. UPhuzushukela wazalwa ngoMashi 24, 1930 kodwa washonela e-studio ngoFebhuwari 22, 1985. Icwecwe lakhe lokuqala lalithi Ilanga Libalele kanti agcina ngalo lalithi Sehlule Umkhomazi. Wayenabantwana ababili bamantombazane, enye seyashona kanti enye yabhungukela eGoli. Kwakhe kuhlala izingane zabafowabo, odadewabo nabazukulu babo.
title: Isiphakamiso sokuhlonishwa kukaPhuzushukela

text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane, uxwayisa amaqembu akwi-Absa Premiership ngezingqinamba asazobhekana nazo ngemva kokuthi yena neqembu lakhe beyeke ithuba lokuvala igebe esicongweni, ngokubanjwa i-Orlando Pirates.UMosimane uvumile ukuthi kube inhlanhla ngisho ukuthi athole iphuzu ngemuva kokubambana neBucs ngo 0-0 koweligi ngoLwesibili ebusuku eDobsonville Stadium, eSoweto.Yize iSundowns ibisike yadlala neBidvest Wits ngoMgqibelo kwiNedbank Cup kodwa iPirates eyakhe amathuba angcono okuwina umdlalo, nabadlali bayo bebebukeka beyiqemane kunabeSundowns ikakhulukazi esiwombeni sesibili.“Siqale kahle impela kodwa bekusewumfutho wokuthi besidlalile ngempelasonto. Esiwombeni sesibili besisenkingeni ngoba yilapho bese kuqala khona kuvela izinkinga ezizoza nale ndlela entsha yokudlala (kaningi eduze nendlela yokuziziqesha iyinkinga kwiBio Bubble).“Yebo isimo esibhekene naso sonke lesi kodwa kusemqoka ukuthi ngiwaxwayise amanye amaqembu ukuthi angalokothi abuswe umphumela, kumbe indlela yokudlala emdlalweni wokuqala ngoba kowesibili kulapho kuvela khona ukuthi lesimo esidlala ngaphansi kwaso asijwayelekile,” kusho uMosimane.Uqhube wathi: “Akekho ongabonanga ukuthi iPirates ibingcono kunathi esiwombeni sesibili ngoba ibingakhandlekile (kwazise ibingadlali ngempelasonto). Besithwele kanzima impela nje. Lokhu kufanele kube isifundo nakwabasazolandela.“Ngesikhathi sekhefu kunabadlali bami abese bengincenga ukuthi angibaphumuze ngoba imisipha isivutha, okuyinto engingayichaza ngokuthi ifike nalesi simo esidlala ngaphansi kwaso.“Ngiyalamukela leli phuzu ngoba besibhekene neqembu elinzima ngendlela emangalisayo. Kusekude phambili!“Ubani owaziyo mhlawumbe leli phuzu lanamuhla liyosiweza ekugcineni.”Amaqembu ePremier Soccer League abuyele enkundleni ngemuva kwezinyanga ezine ibhola limile ngenxa yeCorona. Lokhu sekuphoqa ukuthi imidlalo icinane kuphuthunywa ukuthi kusongwe isizini ka-2019/2020. UMosimane uthe izinkinga zokudlala ngaphansi kwalolu hlelo zimphoqe ukuthi enze into angayijwayele ehlakaza isikimu asuke eqale ngaso.“Inkinga yethu enkulu kulo mdlalo ibisesiswini. Laba abawuqalile umdlalo bekumele ngibaphumuze kwazise bebedlalile nangoMgqibelo. Laba engibafakile bengizama ukuvala ngabo ngoba bekucacile ukuthi iPirates iyageleza maphakathi nenkundla.“Ngiyabazwela abasazobhekana nala maqembu esengidlale nawo. Anzima ngendlela emangalisayo ngakho imiphumela engiyithole kuyona yomibili le midlalo ngiyayamukela ngenhliziyo emhlophe,” kusho uMosimane.Kusasa iSundowns izodlala neHighlands Park koweligi eDobsonville Stadium ngo-6 ebusuku.
title: Uxwayisa ngesimo semidlalo esingajwayelekile

text: IKHEHLA elineminyaka engu-76 lakwaNqetho eHillcrest, likhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela namhlanje ekuseni ngemuva kokudubula amaphoyisa abezoliphenya.Ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, leli khehla elisagodliwe igama lalo livele ladedela intululwane yezinhlamvu ngesikhathi amaphoyisa esazethula kulo.“Amaphoyisa abethungatha umuntu osolwa ngokubulala. Athe esathi ayazethula kule ndoda yavele yadubula ibhekise emaphoyiseni maqede yabaleka.”Uthe kulesi sigameko kulimale iphoyisa eligcine liphuthunyiswe esibhedlela kukubi.“Kuvulwe icala lokuzama ukubulala. Umsolwa ubefunelwa icala lokubulawa kukaMnuz Sibusiso Bhengu (32) okusolwa ukuthi washaywa, waboshelwa ngemuva evenini maqede wahudulwa ngayo. Wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela lapho afike washonela khona.”Yize ebengasaphelele, amaphoyisa aqhubekile nokuthungatha umsolwa, aze amthola ngemuva kokudubulana nawo.“Le ndoda utholwe nesibhamu sohlobolwe-9 mm okukholakala ukuthi sisetshenziswe ngesikhathi idubula nezinhlamvu eziwu 37. Izobekwa icala lokubulala, elokuzama ukubulala, elokutholakala nesibhamu nezinhlamvu.Uzovela eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown khona maduze.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisaKwaZulu-Natal uMajor General Bheki Langa uwatuse kakhulu amaphoyisa ngokusebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuze kuboshwe umsolwa.Kwenzeka lesi sehlakalo nje, amaphoyisa aseHillcrest aphinde abopha abalisa abane ngamacala ahlukahlukene okubalwa kuwo elokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza.Abasolwa ababoshiwe bayiswe esiteshini samaphoyisa eHillcrest ukuze bayotoka bese bebekwa amacala ngaphambi kokuvela eNkantolo yeMantshi ePinetown ngoMsombuluko.Khonamanjalo nasehostela eGlebe kuboshwe abasolwaabawu-40 izolo ngokuthinteka ohideni lwamacala okukhonakuwo nelokuzama ukubulala, ukusabisa umphakathi, ukushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza, ukulimaza impahla, ukudayisa utshwala ngaphandle kwemvume, ukubhadanywa nezidakanyiswa nokutholakalanezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni.Ingxenye yababoshiwe izovela eNkantoloyeMantshi eThekwini ngoMsombuluko.
title: Ikhehla lidubule iphoyisa liboshwa

text: USIZO lwePremier Soccer League (PSL) kwiMamelodi Sundowns ngenxa yama-quarter final eCAF Champions League okumele (iDowns) iwadlale ngo-Ephreli lungase luthwalise kanzima i-Orlando Pirates esembangweni wesicoco seligi ye-Absa Premiership.Uhlelo olusha lwePSL lukhomba ukuthi iPirates isizokwamukela iDowns e-Orlando Stadium, ngoMsombuluko ngo-Ephreli 1. Ngokwe-website yePSL umdlalo obekumele ube ngo-Ephreli 27 ususondeziwe.Umdlalo iPirates obekufanele ibuye ngawo ekhefini lemidlalo yeFifa neBlack Leopards ngeke usaba ngoMashi 29 kepha usuzodlalwa ngo-Ephreli 10.Nakuba kunjalo kodwa iligi ibingakasho lutho ngomdlalo weSundowns neSuperSport United okufanele udlalwe ngo-Ephreli 7. Ngaleyo mpelasonto iSundowns izobe ibhekene ne-Al Ahly yase-Egypt kwi-quarterfinal yeChampions League.I-PSL iphoqeleke ukuthi yenze lezi zinguquko ukusiza iDowns ukuthi ihlele kahle uma seyenza amalungiselelo ale midlalo emqoka. Okuyimbangela yalokhu ukuthi i-quarter final ingawo u-Ephreli kanti uma idlula kwi-Al Ahly ne-semi final ingenyanga efanayo.ISundowns ezihola phambili kwi-log ishiya iPirates ngamaphuzu amathathu. La maqembu asele ngomdlalo owodwa kwamanye. Okwenza lokhu kubukeke sengathi kuzothwalisa kanzima iPirates ukuthi njengoba idlala ngo-Ephreli 1 inomdlalo omqoka ngendlela efanayo futhi ngo-Ephreli 6 neBidvest Wits.Womabili amaqembu iPirates okumele idlale nawo asembangweni wesicoco nayo (iPirates). Uma iPirates iwina ngoMsombuluko ozayo ingazithola isilingana ngamaphuzu neDowns. Lokhu kungayibeka endaweni enhle uma inqoba kwiWits ngoba ingavula igebe lamaphuzu amathathu esicongweni.Okungaba yinkinga kwiPirates ukukhala ngaphansi kwiSundowns. Lokhu kuzobenza baye kwiWits bexhamazela okuyinto engabanika enkulu inkinga.Njengamanje iWits isendaweni yesibili. Ingcono ngephuzu kwiPirates kodwa isidlale owodwa ngaphezulu kwesibalo esidlalwe yiBucs.Akungabazeki ukuthi umqeqeshi weBucs uMilutin Sredojevic uzofuna ukuzibambela amaqembu abanga nawo.
title: Uhlelo lwePSL oluzosiza iSundowns

text: USHAQEKILE umshayeli wetekisi waseThekwni ethola umbungu etekisini abeyishayela okungaziwa ukuthi ushiywe ngubani.Imenenja yerenki yaseChesterville esenkabeni yeTheku, uMnuz Mbusiswa Madlala, uthe izolo ekuseni umshayeli wetekisi uthathe abagibeli njengenjwayelo kule renki ebheke eMbilo kanti endleleni babe sebekhala ngephunga.Umshayeli wetekisi, uMnuz Mondli Ncube, uthe abagibeli bebekhala ngephunga ebelingabekezeleleki ngaphakathi etekisini nokuthe ngesikhathi sebehlile bonke etekisini wabe esehlolisisa itekisi ukuze athole ukuthi yini ebinuka.UNcube uthe ubone uplasitiki omnyama ngaphansi kwesihlalo setekisi wazitshela ukuthi unenyama kodwa uthuke woma ngesikhathi ewuvula ebona ukuthi yingane.“Ibigoqwe ngamaphephandaba yafakwa koplastiki ababili. Owokuqala ubunegazi,” kushouNcube.Ingane itholakale isishonile.UMadlala uthe kuqale kwaziswa yena njengomuntu olawula irenki babe sebeshayela amaphoyisa ucingo bewazisa ngalolu daba.Ngokusho kukaNcube kusolakala ukuthi umbungu ubekwe ngeSonto ntambama kanti bekungelula ukuthi awubone ngoba uma amatekisi eseqedile ukusebenza ahlala erenki futhi akekho obhekayo ukuthi yini esele etekisini njengoba abasizi babashayeli bengasekho.Uveze ukuthi amaphoyisa aseMontclair afikile ezothatha umbungu kodwa amaphoyisa esifundazwe awakuqinisekisanga ukuthi kukhona icala elivuliwe njengoba ebike ukuthi awazi lutho ngalesi sigameko.UNcube uthe lesi sehlo simhlukumeze kakhulu emoyeni njengoba bekunzima ngisho ukusebenza ngemuva kokuthola umbungu.
title: Uhlukumezekile umshayeli othole umbungu etekisini abeyishayela

text: UMISIWE emsebenzini uthisha waseLusikisiki, e-Eastern Cape osolwa ngokudlwengula umfundi oneminyaka eyisithupha waseMkhoto High School.  UMnyango wezeMfundo uveze ukuthi lothisha umiswe okwesikhashana ngoLwesibili. Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo uMnuz Loyiso Pulumani uthe lothisha ugcinwe esitokisini ngemuva kokuba umthombo ongadalulwanga igama, uputshuze lezi zinsolo zokudlwengula. “UMnyango ukhiphe umyalelo wokumisa lothisha emsebenzini ngokumgcina esitokisini,” kuchaza uPulumani.  UPulumani uveze ukuthi bazophenya kabanzi ngalolu daba njengoba kuzolandelwa imigudu efanelekile yokuqondisa izigwegwe. UPulumani uthe kuzolandwa ukhomishana kwi-Education Labour Relations Council (ELRC) ukuba asingathe lolu daba. “UMnyango uzonikezela ngolwazi nobufakazi obumqoka kwi-ELRC kanye nombiko wophenyo ogcwele, ezinsukwini ezimbili ezilandelayo. Ngenxa yobukhulu balezi zinsolo, uMnyango uzokwenza isiqinisekiso sokuthi ukuboshwa kukathisha ngeke kuliphazamise uphenyo. UMnyango uzofaka isicelo kwiSouth African Police Services ukuze icala lizoqulwa esiteshini samaphoyisa noma enye indawo lapho lingaqulwa khona,” kuchaza uPulumani.UPulumani ugcizelele ukuthi uMnyango usuhlinzeke abafundi nothisha besikole ngosizo lokululekwa ngokwengqondo.
title: Umisiwe uthisha osolwa ngokudlwengula umfundi (6)

text: MBALI KHANYILEINYUNYANA yamaphoyisa nojele igxeka uMnyango wezokuHlunyuleliswa kweziMilo,  ngokushaya indiva inkinga yabasebenzi balo mnyango abalala neziboshwa.Ukungagculiseki kwale nyunyana kulandela isigameko sakamumva sokumiswa kukajele wesilisa eWestville, okuthiwa ubanjwe ezitika ngocansi nesiboshwa sesifazane.Ujele okubikwa ukuthi umiswe ekuqaleni kwale nyanga, uyaphenywa.UNobhala wePolice and Prisons Civil Rights Union ( Pop Cru)  KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Nthabeleng Molefe, uthe bayawugxeka umkhuba wokwanda kwezigameko zokuya ocansini phakathi kwabasebenzi bomnyango neziboshwa.“Lo mkhuba ubeka impilo yojele neziboshwa engcupheni njengoba lezi zigameko zivamise ukusabalala kulo lonke izwe. Umnyango kumele ubheke izinhlelo zokulwa nale nkinga, ukuze ojele neziboshwa baqondisise inhloso yokuhlumuleliswa kwezimilo. Sikholwa wukuthi singalibamba iqhaza ekufundiseni wonke umuntu ngokubaluleka kokuziphatha emajele,” kubeka uNksz Molefe.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuHlunyuleliswa kweziMilo esifundazweni, uMnuz Thulani Mdluli, uthe  bamatasa nophenyo mayelana nalesi sigameko.“Lezi zinsolo zithunaza isithunzi somnyango futhi ngeke siwubekezelele umkhuba wojele abathandana neziboshwa. Uzothathelwa izinyathelo ezinzima ujele uma uphenyo luveza ukuthi uphule imigomo ebekelwe bonke abasebenzi bomnyango,” kubeka uMdluli.Ngenyanga edlule, Isolezwe libike ngokusabalala kwe-video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, eyayinojele owayezitika ngocansi nesiboshwa,  kwelinye lamahhovisi aseNcome.Ujele wesifazane ugcine ngokuthi axoshwe nomunye uzakwabo wesifazane,  owamdedela ukuthi asebenzise ihhovisi nesiboshwa sesilisa.Isiboshwa esakhishwa kuleli jele, sayogcinwa kwelinye, kubikwa ukuthi saphucwa amagunya.
title: Kugxekwa umnyango ngocansi kojele neziboshwa

text: NJENGOBA ukuhushula isisu kuyinto esemthethweni eNingizimu Afrika, kulula kumuntu wesifazane ukunquma ukuthi akhiphe isisu ngisho engavumelananga nathandana naye. Yize kunjalo, ongoti besintu bathi akumabhadi kuyafiwa kwabesifazane abahushula izisu ngases.Bakhuza nanomkhuba wokufuna ukuhlawulwa yisoka kowesifazane osuke ehushule isisu.Isigameko sakamuva sentokazi yaseSiphingo, uNomfundo Ngcobo (21), osola isoka lakhe eliwumculi wowokholo, uDumi Mkokstad ngokumkhiphisa isisu maqede ayilaxaze, kuvukuze lesi sexwayiso kulabo ngoti bamasiko.UDkt V.V.O Mkhize, uthi alikho isiko elivuna ukukhishwa kwezisu.Uthi owesifazane okhokhelwa inhlawulo nogezwayo ophuphunyelwe yisisu, hhayi osuke esikhiphile.“Umuntu okhiphe isisu usuke efana nobulele, ngakho ayikho into okumele umfana amgezele yona.“Uma kufika isikhathi lapho ehlushwa ingane ayikhipha, kufanele agezwe wumndeni wakhe ukususa lelo thunzi.“Ngokwesintu, sikholelwa ukuthi umphefumulo usuke usaphila ngokomoya, yingakho uthole omunye umuntu esenenkinga yengane ayikhipha.“Ngokujwayelekile uma ingane ike yahlala esiswini yase ishona, iyaba yithunzi kunina iphazamise nezinto zakhe kudingeke agezwe,” kusho uMkhize.Eqhuba uthe noma ukukhishwa kwezisu kungeyona into ehambisana nesintu namasiko, kodwa noyise wengane uma esazi ukuthi intombi yakhipha isisu kumele agezwe.UMkhize uthi ingane ayigcini ngokuhlupha unina owayikhipha kuphela kodwa noyise imbala ziyama nse izinto zakhe kuyingane ehluphayo.“Nowesilisa kusuke sekufanele abakubo bamgeze bamsuse ithunzi elimnyama uma esazi ukuthi kunentombi eyakhipha isisu.“Uma wayengazi noma babevumelene, kuyefana ngoba usuke esewubaba wengane engasekho emhlabeni,” kusho uMkhize.Ungoti wokuhlolwa kwezintombi kuleli uDkt Nomagugu Ngobese naye uhambe emazwini kaMkhize.UDkt Ngobese uthi uma umuntu kade eyintombi bese ekhulelwa, kusuke kufanele isoka lihlawule kodwa hhayi okhiphe isisu.“Kuzozwakala kabi kodwa kuyiqiniso ukuthi busuke bungekho ubufakazi bokuthi ubeqala ukukhipha isisu owesifazane owenze lokho.“Umuntu okhiphe isisu ufana nobulele ngeke afaniswe nomuntu ochithekelwe isusu okumele agezwe. Yingakho samasha ngesikhathi kuphasiswa ukuthi amantombazane avumeleke ukukhipha izisu kuleli.“Akungadlalwa ngabafana uma intombazane ikhiphe isisu. Kusuke kuyisinqumo sayo akukho okumele umfana akuhlawule noma akugeze,” kusho uDkt Ngobese.Ephetha uthe intombi ephunyelwe yisisu okusuke kufanele isoka liyigeze, ligeze umuzi kayise bese ligeza nezintombi zendawo ebihlolwa, nakhona uma eyithole iyintombi nto.Esinjani isisu esihlawulwayo nesigezwa umfana?UMkhize uveze ukuthi uma owesifazane ekhulelwe ingane isese siswini kufanele umfana aziveze kubo bese ehlawula ngokuyikhulelisa. Inhlawulo yokuqala eyokugeza umuzi wakubo ntombi.Aphinde ageze izintombi ezikhula nalo wesifazane. Emva kwalokho bese kungena nezinye izinto njengokhokha ezinye izinhlawulo okubalwa neyengane.Lokhu kuthiwa kuyenziwa noma ngabe ingane ayisaphilanga ngenxa yezimo ezithile.Ngeyiphi intombi efanelwe ukugezwa isoka noma ikubo kasoka?Kuthiwa uma isoka bese laziwa kubo kantombi selike lavela nokuncane lahlephula ilobolo lifanele ukugeza intombi.Lokhu isoka likwenza ngembuzi futhi ligezwe ndawonye nowesifazane ngoba bobabili imindeni seyababika emsamo njengomakoti nomkhwenyana.Umehluko ukuthi kugezwa isisu esiphuphumile hhayi esikhishiwe.Uma kulungiswa inkinga yesisu esakhishwa kwenziwa njengale ndlela engenhla.
title: Okhiphe isisu ufana nobulele - VVO Mkhize

text: SENYUKELE kwabangu-25 isibalo sabamabhizinisi ababoshwe ngezinsolo zokwenyusa ngokweqile intengo yokudla nokwephula imigomo kathaqa KwaZulu-Natal.Lokhu kudalulwe uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho ezokuVakasha nezeMvelo esifundazweni.Okhulumela lo mnyango uMnuz Ndabezinhle Sibiya, uthe sebethole izikhalo eziningi emnyangweni mayelana nokukhushulwa ngokumangalisayo kwentengo yokudla ngalesi sikhathi kanjalo nokuvalelwa kwezisebenzi ngaphakathi ezindaweni zokusebenza zihlale khona, zingayi emakhaya. Kusolwa ukuthi lo mkhuba wenziwa ngabaqashi ngenhloso yokukhiqiza impahla eningi kanti abanye abasebenzi abanazo izimvume zokusebenza kuleli. Kuthiwaezinye zezinkampani aziklelisiwe ngaphansi kwalezo ezenza imisebenzi ebucayi.Esigamekweni sangoMsombuluko kuboshwe abangu-10 abangabokufika kuleli nemenenja uMnuz Ramsamy (esingenalo igama lakhe) abasebenza ebhizinisini elisabalalisa ukudla iTrade Port Distribution Centre, nabavele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam izolo.Okhulumela uPhiko lwezokuShushisa KwaZulu-Natal uNksz Natasha Kara, uthe uRamsamy uthole ibheyili kwathi bonke abokufika bagcinwa ezitokisini ukuze kuphenywe ngemibandela yokubanikeza ibheyili.Uthe babhekene namacala okungena kweleli zwe ngokungemthetho nokwephula imigomo kathaqa kanti bazobuyela enkantolo ngoMeyi 4, nonyaka.USibiya uthe ngaphandle kokuthi abaqashi baphula imigomo yokuvalwa thaqa kwezwe ngenhloso yokulwa nokubhebhetheka kwegciwane i-Corona, kodwa baphinde babeke impilo yezisebenzi engozini.“Sithole imibiko ngezinsolo zokuthi kukhona izisebenzi ezilala zibe ngamaqeqeba ndawonye, okuphambene nemigomo kathaqa ephikisana nokusondelana ngokweqile kwabantu,” kusho uSibiya.Uthe bazokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi zonke izikhalo ezifinyelela emnyangweni zithathelwa phezulu futhi kubhekwa nalabo abaphula umthetho. Kuphinde kwatholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni. Ngesonto eledlule kwesinye isigameko esingaqinisekiswanga, amaphoyisa agasele kwenye yamafemu esebenza ngendwangu KwaSithebe eMandeni, afike akhipha izisebenzi ebezivalelwe ngaphakathi ngemuva kokulunywa indlebe wumphakathi.
title: Kuboshwe abaqashi abephula ekathaqa

text: NGICELA ukuqala ngokudlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini kaMuzi Sibiya obengumgcinimafa wesigungu semisakazo yomphakathi, iNational Community Radio Forum (NCRF).USibiya, obengumnikazi woMgungundlovu FM, kuthiwa ushone ngoLwesine nokusolwa ukuthi uhlaselwe yisifo senhliziyo.Ukushona kukaSibiya kungikhumbuze uBhekisisa Ngcobo odlule emhlabeni kuqala u-2021 ngenxa yokugula.UNgcobo ubengumnikazi nomphathi wesiteshi somphakathi esizinze eMelmoth, iZululand FM.IZululand FM yisiteshi engisazi kahle ngoba ngikhulele oLundi lapho esasizinze khona ngaphambi kokuya eMelmoth. Bengijwayele ukuya khona ohlelweni lukaDJ Priest, siyodlala khona ngoba ngaleso sikhathi nganginguDJ.Kwakuyinkundla yokuqhakambisa amakhono asoLundi. Kungagcini nje lapho kodwa nokwazi nje ngezindaba zomphakathi esiwakhele, besilalela yona iZululand FM.Iziteshi zomphakathi zibaluleke lapho-ke uma ziyenza ngendlela into eziyidalelwe ngoba zazisa umphakathi eziwusakazelayo ngezinto ozithinta wona ngqo. Ngike ngizizwe nje ezinye sezizitshela ukuthi zincintisana neziteshi ezisakaza izwe lonke, sezifuna ukukhuluma ngezinto ezingamthinti umuntu oseduze nalapho sisakaza khona.Kuthe uma iZululand FM isithuthele eMelmoth, yafika yaba wusizo olukhulu emphakathini wakhona nakumasipala obuyisebenzisa ukudlulisa imiyalezo onayo emphakathini.Ngiphatheke kabi ngidlula ngakhona muva nje, ngithi ngifaka u-97.0 FM, engazi ukuthi yilapho ngithola khona lesi siteshi kodwa ngayizwa ihlohloza.Ngizwe engathi inkinga ikwilayisensi yayo yokusebenza. Lokhu kufanele ukuba yinto ebuhlungu emphakathini obusakazelwa yiZululand FM. Kungagcini nje lapho, nabasebenzi bayo nabasakazi abasakhula abebethola ithuba lokufunda kabanzi ngomsakazo, bayashayeka.Ngiyakholwa ukuthi ukuba khona komuntu ofana noMdonso Ngcobo obesebenza khona kulesi siteshi kodwa wagcina esekuKhozi FM, bekubagqugquzela kakhulu ukuthi nabo ngelinye ilanga ithalente labo liyonakwa basebenzele iziteshi ezithathwa njengezinkulu.Kumele kube khona imizamo yokuthi lesi siteshi singafadalali ngokuhamba kukaNgcobo. UMdonso ngenhlanhla ubengahlukani nomfowabo. Ngiyakholwa ukuthi kukhona amfundise khona ngokuphathwa kwesiteshi, ngakho kuzomele azame ukusivusa ungapheli umlando waso nowomfowabo. Ngenhlanhla bakhona nabangani bakaNgcobo njengoSandile Ngema ophethe iMbokodo FM noLucky Dlamini weVibe FM abangamsiza.NakuMgungundlovu FM, nginethemba lokuthi ngeke kube khona ukuphazamiseka ngenxa yokuhamba kukaSibiya.Imisakazo yomphakathi ineqhaza elikhulu elidlalayo emiphakathini ngakho kumele ingashabalali.Ungangibhalela [email protected], kwiTwitter @fanelebengu noma kwiFacebook Fanelesibonge Bengu
title: Kumele ivuswe kabusha iZululand FM

text: ULusanda Beja wodumo lwengoma ethi Jesu Lidwala usethatha ngokuthi kwakungakabi yisikhathi sakhe ukugqama emculweni ngesikhathi ehlulwa kuma-Idols ngo-2016. Waphuma esakwiTop 16 eseshiye umsebenzi wokuba yiMarketing Assistant, wayohlala eGoli enzela lo mncintiswano.Ubengaqali ukuphoxeka emncintiswaneni njengoba aqala kowethelevishini i-I Want To Sing Gospel ngo-2008 waphuma kwiTop 7.“Ngifundile ukuthi kuhle ukulinda isikhathi sikaNkulunkulu. Sonke lesi sikhathi ngizama emculweni ngangingazi ukuthi nginobizo. Ngaqala ukunaka uma ngicula abantu bethi bayathinteka, kwenzeka okuthize empilweni yabo,” echaza.Ingoma asedume ngayo eculwa nasemasontweni, iphume ngonyaka odlule.Naye usamangala indlela edume ngayo kodwa uthi kwabonakala ukuthi iqale ikhalise yena esayibhala.“Ngangizihambela ngishayela imoto ngesikhathi ngifikelwa yile ngoma. Ngayicula kodwa uma sengifika kula mazwi athi Jesu Lidwala, bengivele ngikhale.“Kwaphela amasonto amabili ngayethula kwengicula nabo, kwehla umoya ungcwele sizilolonga.“Saqopha i-video eyagcina isabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana,” kusho uLusanda.Yize kuyile ngoma emenze waduma, uthe ubevele engayekile ukucula emuva kokuhluleka emincintiswaneni. Wasungula inkampani yakhe yokuqopha iBeja Music ngo-2010, waqopha i-albhamu ethi Revelation of Grace ngo-2013.Wabuye wenza isingili ethi Uzokuphendula ngo-2016. Ubuye wasungula i-International Gospel Festival ngonyaka odlule, ayenzela eCape Town ahlanganise bonke abaculi.Akazisoli ngokuyeka umsebenzi yize ethi kwake kwaba nzima ngoba wayondla nasekhaya. Indlela amatasa ngayo umenywa zonke izimpelasonto emicimbini ehlukene. NgoJulayi 27 uzoba ezokwethula i-albhamu ephelele enengoma adume ngayo eDurban Christian Centre, eThekwini ehambisana nabanye abaculi. Omunye wabo ngunina, uNkk Dideka Beja, ozoba umculi wokuqala azomkhipha ngaphansi kwenkampani yakhe maduze.ULusanda uthe uyise washona ngo-2005 kusha indlu, esezogcotshelwa ukuba umfundisi. Bobabili omkhulu bakaLusanda babengabefundisi futhi noyise ubecula. Udabuka eGugulethu, eCape Town.
title: Owokholo ukhaliswa yingoma yakhe

text: MHLELI: Ngithi angicele isikhala ngiphawule ngomyalezo wemenenja yoMkhandlu weTheku kwiSolezwe langoFebhuwari 14 mayelana nokwakhiwa kwemijondolo emhlabeni kaMasipala weTheku.UMnuz Nzuza ngiyavumelana naye uma ethi kusuka ngo-1994 umkhandlu sewakhe izindlu eziningi eThekwini noma ke ngingeqinise ngesibalo asishoyo sezindlu asebezakhile kodwa kukhona lapho engidideka khona. Angiqondi kahle uma ethi kunezinhlangano zomphakathi nezepolitiki ezibhebhezela abantu ukuthi badle umhlaba kamasipala.Empeleni imenenja ithi kunomthetho i-Occupation of Land Act 19 ka1998 ovimba ukudliwa komhlaba kamasipala ngokungemthetho. Nginenkinga yokuthi lo mthetho usebenza nini, kobani futhi kanjani?Lapha nje eLamontville sibone ngaphesheya komfula uMlazi kuvumbuka imijondolo yaqanjwa negama kwathiwa yiMegavillage. Ilapha ku-Ward 74. Sithe sisabheke labo nogada bakhe ukuthi bazofika badilize njengoba esho sabona wona belu umkhandlu usubafakela amanzi nogesi. Saxakeka sikhumbula lo mthetho akhuluma ngawo. Baba uNzuza ngabe bona babebhebhezelwa wubani?Yebo umthetho niyawuqinisa akuphikiwe. Kodwa umbuzo uthi la madoda eqembu elibusayo adla izindlu esezakhiwe zomxhaso niwabopha nini njengoba usipha izibalo zesenibabophele ukudla umhlaba kamasipala? Ungasisiza usiphe leso sibalo senibabophile noma ke asebevele besezikhindini njengoba kade la madoda awuqala lo mkhuba? Ngabe isandla somkhandlu wakho siqine nganxanye, kukhona abavunyelwa ukuphula umthetho?Okunye futhi kunabantu abaningi abahlala emijondolo engemuva kwezindlu zasemakubo emalokishini umkhandlu wakho ongenandaba nabo noma bekhala kangakanani. Bona bakhelwa nini izindlu?ELamontville
title: [IMIBONO] Umthetho usebenza kanjani koweTheku?

text: Abaqokiwe bamenyezelwe izolo ebusuku emcimbini obuse-Alberton Civic Centre, Ekurhuleni.Lo DJ ohlonishwa umhlaba wonke uqokwe emunxeni we-Album of the Year, Male Artist of the Year, Best Dance Album, Collaboration of the year kabili.Le miklomelo izobe igubha iminyaka engu-25 yasungulwa kulo nyaka. Izosingathwa eSun City, eNorth West ngoMeyi 31, ize isongwe ngoJuni 1.Abaqokwe emunxeni weRecord of the Year bazomenyezelwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.Eminye iminxa efingqiwe ime kanje:Male Artist of the YearAnatii - IYEZABlack Coffee - Music is KingNakhane - You will not dieSjava - UmqheleThokozani LangaIyabuza IndunaAlbum of the YearBlack Coffee - Music is KingBlack Motion - Moya Wa TaolaSjava - UmqheleVusi Nova - Manyan-nyanZonke - L.O.V.EBest Dance AlbumDJ Fistaz - Mixwell SummerSun-El Musician - Africa To The WorldMobi Dixon - 10 Steps ForwardBlack Coffee - Music is KingBlack Motion - Moya Wa Taola
title: UBlack Coffee eminxeni eminingi kumaSama

text: UKUBE umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns ungumculi kaMaskandi mhlawumbe igama elimfanele yileli elithi “iS’çhomane”.Kwalile kuMosimane ukwamukela ukuthi iqembu lakhe lihlulekile ukuvikela isicoco se-Absa Premiership libanjelwa ekhaya yiMaritzburg United ngo 2-2 eLucas Moripe Stadium ngeledlule.Umphumela namagalelo eBidvest Wits eshaye iPolokwane City ngo 2-0 eBidvest Stadium, kuqede konke ukuqagela nokushaya izibalo ngokuthi sizoya ngakuphi isicoco seligi kule sizini.Esikhundleni sokuthi uMosimane abongele iWits ngokudla umhlanganiso, noma-ke agxile ekutheni iqembu lakhe libanjwe kanjani yi-United, uthe alikho iqembu elizodlula lokhu okuzuzwe yiSundowns kule sizini.Ephawula ngemuva komdlalo ubonge kancane iWits ngesicoco, wase egcizelela kwelokuthi alikho iqembu elingaqhathaniswa namaBrazilians.“Ngiyaziqhenya kakhulu ngeqembu lami. Namanje sisesembangweni wokuqeda endaweni yesibili kwi-log. Sesidlale cishe imidlalo ewu-56. Ngeke usiqhathanise namuntu, akekho ongakhuluma.“Ngeke uthi ugijima kwiComrades Marathon namhlanje bese kuthi ngesonto elizayo ungihlule kwiTwo Oceans bese uthi ungcono, ekubeni ubuhlezi uziqeqesha ngesikhathi mina ngigijima. Hhayi, ayisebenzi kanjalo. Kumele uqhathanise ama-aphula nama-aphula. Kufanele ugijime umjaho ofanayo nami bese siyakhuluma-ke. Siwine iChampions League neSuper Cup, okuyizicoco ezinkulu,” kusho uMosimane.UMosimane sekuwumkhuba wakhe ukuchoma ngempumelelo yeSundowns engeke ingatshazwe. Ngesikhathi iSundowns ishaywa yiWits ngo 3-0 kowamanqamu weMTN 8, uMosimane wathi amanzi amancane lawo bona babheke izinto ezinkulu njengokudlala kuFifa Club World Cup neSuper Cup.Uphinde wakhwela wadilika kwi-United eyisola ngokuhlala emuva.“Lena yindlela elula yokuqeqesha abadlali, uthi hlalani emuva nilindele iSundowns ize kinina. IPirates kuphela edlala ibhola. NoDan (Malisela kuChippa United) uyawuvula umdlalo,” kusho uMosimane.Ngaphambi komdlalo ukuvezile ukuthi ukube iPirates neSundowns abenzanga kahle ngabe iWits ayilitholanga ithuba lokubhekana ne-Al Ahly.IWits ikhishwe yi-Al Ahly yase-Egypt esigabeni sokuhlungela amaqoqo kwiChampions League yalo nyaka.
title: Kunzima kuMosimane ukwamukela ukuhluleka

text: UXOLISE kusihlalo wePremier Soccer League (PSL) ne-Orlando Pirates uThandani Ntshumayelo owehliselwe isigwebo sokutholakala nesidakamizwa i-cocaine egazini lakhe eminyakeni emibili edlule.UNtshumayelo (28) ugcine enikezwe isigwebo seminyaka emibili sisuka kwemine ngemuva kokuthi efake isicelo sokuphikisa isigwebo ayesinikezwe yiSouth African Institute for Drug Free Sports (SAIDS).Njengoba uNtshumayelo ebesevele ehlale iminyaka emibili engalithinti ibhola, ukuphuka kwesigwebo kusho ukuthi usengabuyela enkundleni.NgoLwesibili ebusuku okumenyezelwe ngazo lezi zindaba, ufake i-video ekhasini lakhe le-twitter exolisa.“Ngifuna ukuphinde ngixolise kusihlalo wePSL * -Irvin Khoza naseqenjini lami lakudala i-Orlando Pirates nakuwona wonke umndeni kanobhu-tshuzwayo,” uyivale kanje inkulumo yakhe uNtshumayelo.Ngesikhathi uNtshumayelo emiswa, inkontileka yakhe nePirates yanqanyulwa isasalelwe wunyaka.Lo mdlali oke wadlala nakwiSuperSport United uthe ufundile emaphutheni akhe.Walivuma icala lokuthi wayidla eyazi i-cocaine ekade esephathini edudene nabangani bakhe. Wathi wadonsa olayini abathathu balesi sidakamizwa abasihogelayo abasisebenzisayo.Kuvele ukuthi elinye iphuzu elibekwe abebemumele ngesikhathi kudingidwa eyokwehlisa isigwebo, wukuthi wakwenza lokhu ngesikhathi sakhe, hhayi esiqondene nomdlalo.Yena wahlolwa ngoJanuwari ka-2016 iPirates idlala nePlatinum Stars koweligi ngoJanuwari 9.“Ngifuna ukuqala ngokubonga umndeni wami, abalandeli neNingizimu Afrika ngokuma nami kule minyaka emibili ebinzima. Ngiyabonga kakhulu ngaleli thuba lesibili ngoba sengizokwazi ukwenza into engiyithandayo, ukudlala ibhola nokunakekela umndeni wami. Ngifundile emaphutheni futhi ngiyathembisa ukuthi ngeke ngiphinde nginenzele phansi. Ngifisa ukuba yisibonelo esihle,” kusho uNtshumayelo.Isikhulu se-SAIDS, uKhalid Galant esiqinisekise izindaba zokwehliswa kwesigwebo sithe: “Ngesikhathi sikhuluma uThandani ukhombise ukuthi ungumuntu ofundile emaphutheni akhe. Ngiyethemba ukuthi uzoqhubeka nokuhlala emnene.”
title: Kuphuke isigwebo waxolisa uNtshumayelo

text: MINENHLE MKHIZE noMTHOKOZISI MNCUSENI‘K ULE MINYAKA engu-99 ezayo uma inkosi isangigcinile umqeqeshi weJomo Cosmos kuyobe kuyimina lo, uJomo Sono,” usho kanje ezishaya isifuba umqeqeshi nosihlalo weZenkosi u-Ephraim “Jomo” Sono ngemuva kokugencwa kwazo izembe ngoMgqibelo.Le nkulumo ebigcwele ukuzethemba kodwa kusobala ukuthi iphelezelwa wumunyu nendumalo ikucacise kwahlala obala okwekati elimhlophe ehlungwini ukuthi eyokudedela izintambo zokuqeqesha iqembu lakhe yinto angayiphuphi ngisho ebusuku uSono.ICosmos isiphenduke iyoyo ku-Absa Premiership. Kule minyaka eyisishiyaga-lombili edlule eZenkosi sezigawulwe yizembe amahlandla amane.EZenkosi zidliwe yizembe okokuqala kuPremier Soccer League (PSL) eyasungulwa ngo-1996/97 ngesikhathi ziqeda ekugcineni ngo-2007/2008. Ngo-2008/2009 iCosmos idle ubhedu kuNational First Division (NFD).Ngo-2009/2010, uMjomane uphinde wagawulwa yizembe futhi kwathi ngo-2010/2011 wabuyela esigabeni esikhulu. Ngo-2011/2012 uSono limphindile izembe ngemuva kwalokho wahlala amasizini amabili kuNFD wabe esebuyela esigabeni esikhulu njengoba esephinde wangencwa yimbazo futhi.Exoxa nabezindaba ngemuva kokushovelwa yiMaritzburg United ehlathini emdlalweni wokugcina weligi e-Olen Park ngoMgqibelo, uSono ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi akaziboni eshiya isikhundla sokucija iCosmos.“Sifake isicelo sokuyenza eyethu le nkundla (esePotchefstroom). Siyaxolisa kubalandeli, imindeni yabadlali, imeya engeseke ngendlela emangalisayo. Le nkundla sifuna ukudlalela kuyona iminyaka engu-99 ezayo futhi kuleyo minyaka yimina lo ozobe elolonga iqembu,” kusho uSono.ICosmos iqede endaweni yokugcina ku-log ngamaphuzu angu-25 emidlalweni engu-30. EzikaMjomane zinqobe imidlalo eyisithupha zashaywa engu-17 zase zidlala ngokulingana kwesiyisikhombisa.“Kusale kancane ukuthi sizuze ebesizibekele kona kule sizini. Asilona iqembu elilwela i-Top 8 kepha besizibekele ukuqeda endaweni ka-14. Kusale kancane ukuthi sikwenze lokho. Sishaye amaqembu amakhulu kule sizini ngakho-ke sizophinde sibuye esigabeni esikhulu. Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi sonke siyibonile iBlack Leopards ukuthi yenze kanjani kule sizini kodwa ngesizini ezayo uzoyibona. Uzowabona amaqembu azolwa kanjani njengoba sekubuye thina kuNFD. Iyangixaka le ndaba ngoba awalwi ngale ndlela alwa ngayo uma iCosmos ingekho. Ungaze ufunge ukuthi basuke bengikhumbule,” kusho uSono.Kusasa:Mbombela United v Highlands Park (KaNyamazane, 3pm)NgeSonto:University of Pretoria v Mbombela United (Tuks Stadium, 3pm)NgoJuni 11:Highlands v AmaTuks (Makhulong, 3pm)NgoJuni 15:Highlands v Mbombela United (Makhulong, 3pm)NgoJuni 18:Mbombela United v AmaTuks (Kanyamazane, 3pm)NgoJuni 22:AmaTuks v Highlands (Tuks Stadium, 3pm
title: UJomo uthi uyofa nayo iCosmos eyiqeqesha

text: UMQEQESHI weSuperSport United uKaitano Tembo uthi uphoxekile ehluleka ukunqoba isicoco seMTN8 ekubeni eseshaye izinkunzi zaseSoweto, i-Orlando Pirates neKaizer Chiefs, kweyomkhumulajezi emqhudelwaneni ofanayo.Amatsatsantsa A Pitori akhale ngaphansi kwiCape Town City FC ehlulwa ngo 4-1 sekukhahlelwa amaphenathi kowamanqamu obuseMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Umdlalo ubuphele ngo 0-0 emizuzwini engu-90, nasesikhathini esengeziwe.UTembo uthe akwehli kahle ukuthi angafike ashaye zombili izinkunzi zaseSoweto kweyomkhumulajezi, bese kuthi nxa sekufanele aqedele umsebenzi aphikwe yizinto.Amatsatsantsa A Pitori ehlule iBucs ngo 4-2 sekukhahlelwa amaphenathi kuma-quarter final.ISuperSport idlulele phambili yahlangana neChiefs kowandulela amanqamu emilenzeni emibili. Kowokuqala badlale ngokulingana kuba ngu 2-2, kwathi kowesibili Amatsatsantsa anqoba ngo 1-0.Ziye kulo mdlalo iSuperSport kuyiyona ebithwelwe ngeqoma ngenxa yokuthi iyona kadeni ebivikela lesi sicoco eyayisinqobe ishaya iCity ngo 4-2 sekukhahlelwa amaphenathi enkundleni efanayo.“Ngiphoxekile ukuthi sehlulekile ukuqedela umsebenzi omuhle ebese siwuqalile. Kuhleze kubuhlungu ukufika kowamanqamu, bese wehluleka ukunqoba. Iqiniso ukuthi asidlalanga neze kahle, sehlulekile ukugcina ibhola. ICape Town City idlale kahle kunathi, ngakho kuyifanele ukunqoba lesi sicoco,” usho kanje ngemuva komdlalo uTembo.Ngokusho kukaTambo, iSuperSport izofunda kokwenzeke ngoMgqibelo. Uthe emdlalweni olandelayo amaphutha bazobe sebewalungisile.“Singenza kangcono kakhulu kunalokhu esikwenzile. Siyafunda njalo emidlalweni esiyidlalayo, ngingathi njengamanje okubalulekile ukuthi sikhohlwe okusehlele, sibheke emdlalweni wethu olandelayo njengoba sizodlala nePolokwane City emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership,” kusho uTembo.Umdlalo ukusasa e-Old Peter Mokaba Stadium ngo-7.30 ebusuku.
title: UTembo uphoxekile ehlulwa ukunqoba iMTN8

text: UMHOLI wamalungu e-ANC axhasa iMeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede, weluleka i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ukuba ihloniphe amakhansela ayo kuMasipala weTheku ukuze ingazisoli.UMnuz Mzomuhle Dube, ukhala ngokuthi i-ANC ibiwabukela phansi amakhansela ayo eThekwini ingawachazeli lutho ngokususwa kwemeya.UDube uphawula kanjena nje, kulindeleke ukuthi amakhansela eTheku avotele imeya entsha maduze nje.UDube uphinde wazwakalisa ukuthi umthetho awuvumi ukuba kubekwe imeya uma kukhona engakhishiwe esikhundleni njengoba i-ANC iqhubeka nezinhlelo zokugcoba imeya. Uthe iMunicipal Systems Act ayivumelani nalokho, kuzomele kusheshe kucace ukuthi kwenzekani.UDube kulokhu ubehamba emazwini omhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele, uMnuz Thabani Khumalo, naye othe akukaze kwenzeke ukuthi kugcotshwe imeya phezu kwenye. Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ricardo Mthembu, uthe abanalo uvalo ngamakhansela abo ngoba bazowabiza bawachazele okufanele akwenze ngosuku lokuvotelwa kwemeya entsha.UNkk Gumede akaphawuli kwabezindaba selokhu ehoxise incwadi yakhe yokwesula esikhundleni.“Okwamanje ngicela ukuqhubeka nenqubo yangaphakathi ku-ANC, angikathandi ukuphawula ngalolu daba. Ngizokhuluma kahle uma konke sekwedlulile ngicela nihloniphe lokho," kuchaza uNkk Gumede ocingweni.I-ANC idinga ukuthi amakhansela ayo avote ngobuningi uma sekukhethwa imeya entsha ezongena esikhundleni sikaNKK Gumede. Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, uNkk Gumede usamile kwelokuthi abukho ubulungiswa ngokuphathwa kwakhe, useze wahoxisa nencwadi yokwesula.UMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda kulindeleke ukuba afungiswe njengekhansela kuMasipala weTheku kuqala, bese evotelwa ukuba abe yimeya yeTheku.
title: Baxwayisa i-ANC abaxhasa iMeya yeTheku

text: CHARLES KHUZWAYOUSEPHENDUKE uMother Theresa uNkk Puleng Mokoena wasesigcemeni kwaL oLundi, ngenxa yokunakekela inqwaba yezingane angahlobene nazo.UNkk Mokoena (67) usebenzisa imali yakhe yempesheni yokuguga ukondla izingane zendawo ezibalelwa ku-67. Kulezi zingane kukhona nezikhubazekile.“Ngaqala ukusiza lezi zingane kusukela ngeminyaka yo-1990 ngoba zazifika kwami zihlale zize zilambe. Empeleni bengiwumuntu obevamise ukuwashela abantu. Bengithi uma sengihamba izingane zabo zingivakashele, ezinye zigcine sezilala kwami. Yize bengipheka ngebhodwe elincane kodwa bengizinconzulela lokho ebengisuke ngikuphekile,” kusho uNkk Mokoena.Eqhubeka uthe ukudla akuthenga ngesibonelelo sikahulumeni akuyiqedi ngisho inyanga.Yize esenenhlangano ayisungula ngo-1994 kodwa namanje usadinga usizo.“Uxhaso bengingakalutholi kodwa kuke kwenzeke isitolo sakwaBoxer singixhase ngokudla. Bengingajabula nje uma uhulumeni engangakhela ikhishi axhase nangokudla nyanga zonke ukuze ngikwazi ukondla lezi zingane ngoba ezinye zazo ziphuma emindenini ehlwempu. Ngidinga namabhodwe namatende,” kusho ugogo.Esephetha ubuye wahlaba ikhwelo walibhekisa nakosomabhizinisi ukuba baphonse nabo itshe esivivaneni ukuze akwazi ukukhulisa laba baholi bakusasa.“Kuningi engikufisela lezi zingane ukuze zikwazi ukuba nekusasa eliqhakazile. Ngakho ngaphandle koxhaso leli phupho ngeke lifezeke.”Lezi zingane azigcini ngokudla kuphela kodwa uNkk Mokoena ubuye azifundise, ikakhulukazi lezo ezingakalubhadi olwazo esikoleni.Leli phephandaba lizifikele mathuba kulo muzi lafica inqwaba yezingane.Egcekeni lomuzi kuyabhuza futhi uyabona ukuthi abantwana basekhaya elithokomele.Kuthi kusa babe sebegcwele emzini kaNkk Mokoena bedlala kunjeya yana.Ikhansela lakule ndawo, uMnuz Musa Mdlalose, lithe muhle kakhulu umsebenzi owenziwa nguNkk Mokoena kwi-ward yalo njengoba eqoqa izingane ukuze zingabi luvanzi.“Njengomasipala wasoLundi siyazibophezela ekumthengeleni amabhodwe amakhulu amathathu nesitofu esikhulu esinamapuleti amane. Sikhona esinye isakhiwo esike sazama ukumtholela sona. Okusijabulise kakhulu ukuthi naye uyazama njengoba enengadi atshale kuyona imifino,” kuncoma uMdlalose.
title: Ugogo osephenduke isibusiso ezinganeni ezingu-67

text: AKUCACI ngekusasa lesilomo somlingisi weSibaya, uThembi Nyandeni, njengoba kuvela ukuthi akasaqophi kulo mdlalo.UThembi, ongomunye wabalingisi ababa khona kusukela lo mdlalo uqala, ulingisa indawo kaMkabayi ongusomatekisi ongawubambi umshini. Ungudadewabo kaMpiyakhe olingiswa wuSiyabonga Thwala.Umthombo weSolezwe ozazi zonke ezenzeka kulo mdlalo udalule ukuthi akuveli ukuthi kuzokwenzekani kulo mdlalo.“Useqedile ukuqopha indawo yakhe. Asazi ukuthi uhlabe ikhefu noma akasabuyi ngoba akuveli kahle. Engingakusho nje kodwa wukuthi akasaqophi futhi kusathulekile ngokuthi kwenzekani ngendawo yakhe,” kusho umthombo.Imizamo yokuthola uThembi izolo ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe lulokhu lungena kwi-voicemail ngesikhathi ezanywa izikhawu ezehlukene.Kumazwibela alo mdlalo igama likaMkabayi aliveli kusukela ngoMsombuluko.“Umdlalo uzogxila kakhulu kuMpiyakhe nephoyisa uSibongile (Lerato Mvelase) njengoba ubudlelwane babo buya ngokukhula. Empeleni uMpiyakhe ufuna ukumenza unkosikazi wakhe wesithathu,” kusho umthombo.Ngokwezibalo zeBroadcast Research Council, Isibaya, sisendaweni yesine ngesibalo sababukeli kwiDStv. Izibalo zangenyanga edlule zikhomba ukuthi sibukwa ngabantu abangu-1 194 715.Okhulumela iMzansi Magic, u-Emmah Ngomane, uthe uThembi uhlabe ikhefu kulo mdlalo.“Umam’Thembi usayingxenye yeSibaya. Uhlabe ikhefu ngesikhathi esahambela e-US ne-Umoja,” kusho u-Emmah.Umoja wumdlalo weshashalazi uThembi angomunye wabasunguli bawo.
title: Usahlabe ikhefu oqavile kwiSibaya

text: AMAPHOYISA abophe indoda eneminyaka engu33 ngokuthinteka ekubulaweni kwabantu abane eCraighton, esifundeni saseHarry Gwala ngoLwesithathu. Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe indoda yafika endaweni yesigameko, yaxabana neqembu labantu abayisikhombisa. "Yabe seyiqala ukudubula iqeqebana kwathi abane , abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka25 no50, bafa. Ababili basinda ngokulambisa, kwathi abanye baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela ukuyoxilongwa lapho belimale khona." UCaptain Gwala uthe amaphoyisa aseCraighton alandele umkhondo owaholele emzini waseXobho lapho umsolwa ekhalelwe khona ngamasongo kaSigonyela. Uthe umsolwa uzobekwa amacala okubulala nawokuzama ukubulala. Kulindeleke ukuba avele maduze enkantolo futhi okwamanje ayikaziwa imbangela yalokhu kudubula. Khonamanjalo kuboshwe amadoda amane emuva kokugwazwa kubulawe umlisa oneminyaka engu-30 enkabeni yeTheku ngoLwesithathu. UCaptain Gwala uthe amaphoyisa ayepatrola ngesikhathi etshelwa ngesidumbu esesiphumile. Uthe amaphoyisa athi uma efika endaweni yesigameko azithela esidumbini sidindilizile phansi. "Indoda yayinoxhaxha lwamanxeba futhi engasekho emhlabeni. Ukunyakaza kwamaphoyisa kwenza ajahe imoto eyayibaleka futhi babopha abasolwa abane ngecala lokubulala. Abasolwa bazovela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini lapho bezobhekena khona namacala okubulala," kuphetha uCaptain Gwala.
title: Zimkhalele umlisa owabulala abane ngentululwane yezinhlamvu

text: IZIMO ezinzima ababhekana nazo empilweni abazange bazivumele ziphazamise amaphupho abo okuphumelela abesifazane abasemabhizinisini, abenza ezibukwayo kwezemidlalo nakweminye imikhakha abebekhuluma emcimbini weForbes Leading Women ngaphansi kwesihloko esithi: The Spotlight.UNksz Kgothatso “KG” Montjane, wakuleli ukleliswe kubantu abangu-10 ezweni lonke abenza ezibukwayo kwi-wheelchair tennis. Waba owokuqala owesifazane omnyama ukuqhudelana nabanye abadlali eWimbledon. Uthe ukuze afike lapha kwakungelula neze njengoba wayengowesifazane okhulele emakhaya, okhubazekile futhi engazi nokuthi i-tennis idlalwa kanjani.“Uma owesifazane wasemakhaya ethole umntwana okhubazekile uye amfihle ngoba kuba sengathi ihlazo futhi umntwana wakho engeke abe yilutho ezweni. Abazali bami benza okuhlukile, bangiyisa esikoleni bazama ukuthi ngibe nempilo. Kwakungelula nhlobo ezinye izingane zingafuni ukudlala nami ngoba nginokukhubazeka emlenzeni. Ngelinye ilanga uthisha wami wathi ngizomela isikole emdlalweni we-wheelchair tennis, ngangingazi nokuthi yini leyo ngoba ngangazi umdlalo webhola kuphela. Ngaya okokuqala ngaqokwa ukuba ngimele elakuleli, kumanje ngiqopha umlando,ngiyaqhubeka ngiyazimisela. Umdlalo onzima nobizayo lona njengoba kusagcwele abamhlophe bodwa, yize kunjalo ngiyaphumelela kuwo. Ungalilahli ithemba ngempilo,” kusho uNksz Montjane.UNksz Linda Ikeji usomabhizinisi waseNigeria yena wake waboshwa ngoba ehluleka ukukhokha imali ayeyiboleke ebhange ngoba eqala ibhizinisi lakhe lephephabhuku.Uthe ukulandwa amadoda ayehlome eyizingovolo kubo ezofuna imali yakhe kwameza wavuka emaqandeni.“Kumanje nginenhlangano esiza abesifazane abancane abaqala amabhizisini kodwa bengenayo imali. Kunamantombazane angu-30 engiwaphe imali ukuze aphembe amabhizinisi abo, ngenxa yokubona ukuthi ngaxakeka kakhulu ngiqala. Ngazithembisa ukuthi akekho omunye owesifazane omncane okumele asokole njengami ngisaqala ibhizinisi. Engingakusho ukuthi uma unephupho lilelwe lelo phupho, ungayeki, ungapheli amandla. Yebo kunzima ukulandela iphupho kodwa akukho okungeke kwenzeke uma uzimisele.
