Imali engangiboshelwe yona ngihluleka ukuyikhokha manje sengithenga ngayo izicathulo,” kusho uNksz Ikeji ehleka egcwele izinyembezi emehlweni.UNksz Simidele Adeagbo ongumdlali (Olympian) waseNigeria owaqopha umlando ngokuba owesifazane wase-Afrika nomnyama ukumela izwe lakhe emdlalweni wamaSport Skeleton, lapho usuke ushushuluza khona eqhweni elibandayo, uqhudelana nabanye. Uthe akuzange kube lula kodwa ukubekezela nokuzimesela ngayefuna ukukufeza ikhona okwenza waphumelela.“Kukhona isikhathi lapho ngingazange ngiqokwe ukuba ngiyomela izwe lami, kwaqoka umngani wami. Ngangibona umngani wami ephila impilo yami, amaphupho enganginawo, uyena owayewaphila. Ngizikhumbula ngikhala ngizibuza ukuthi kungani mina ngingakwazi ukwenza ayekwenza, ngafikelwa umcabango wokuthi isikhathi sami siyeza. Ngasebenza kanzima nami ngagcina ngiqokiwe, amaphupho ami afezeka. Kudinga ukuba ubekezele noma kunzima uphikelele kulokho osuke ufuna ukukufeza, ungavinjwa yilutho. Noma abanye bekudlula endleleni wena phikelela ekuqedeni ibanga lakho,” kusho uNksz Adeagbo.Laba besifazane bebeze bekhale izinyembezi uma bekhuluma ngobunzima abadlule kubo ukuze baphumelele. Ngazwi linye bonke bathe, ekugcineni awuzisoli ngokuphikelela ekufezeni amaphupho akho noma kunjani, noma kuthiwani.
title: Kwakunzima babekezela manje sebevelele emikhakheni ehlukene

text: SIDLALA izigebengu ezingena ngophahla isalukazi saKwaDukuza esesidilikelwe yindlu kaningi, sisalinde eyomxhaso.UNkk Thandi Madikizela (65), ohlala nomzukulu oneminyaka emihlanu, uselala obenyoni njengoba indlu enamakamelo amabili isengcupheni yokudilika.Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi isidilike kaningana ngenxa yemvula, walubika udaba lwakhe ekhanseleni. Ngaphandle kokuthi akanawo amandla okuyiphahleka indlu, nemali yesibonelelo sikahulumeni ayanele njengoba ondla abazukulu ababili abashonelwa abazali.“Omunye umzukulu oneminyaka engu-14 angihlali naye kodwa wondliwa yimina. Ngeke ngiqale nokuzama ukupatanisa ukwakha indlu ngoba kudingeka imali. Kusukela ngo-2017 ngalubika udaba lwami ekhanseleni kodwa namanje ngisalindile.”UNkk Madikizela obuye aphekele phansi kuyona le ndlu ngenxa yokonga imali, uthe usesaba kakhulu izigebengu.Uveze ukuthi sezike zazama ukungena ngenxa yokuthi indlu inopotsho abaningi. Uze amboze nangezingubo zokulala lapho kudilike khona ngoba nemali yokuthenga ukhethe ayikho.“Kwasiza ukuthi ngimemeze kakhulu, izigebengu zabaleka. Zase zingenile ngazo lezi zikhala ezidalwe ukudilika,” kusho yena.UMnuz Njabulo Cele oyikhansela, uthe akuyena uNkk Madikizela kuphela olinde indlu yomxhaso. Uthe wabhalisa ohlelweni iToldale Housing Project, esenenkinga yokubangwa komhlaba.“Ngafika ngo-2016 zivele zikhona izinhlelo zokwakhiwa kwezindlu kodwa azikaze zakhiwe. Inkinga ukuthi abantu abanxeshezelwa badayisela umasipala umhlaba, sebebuye badayisela abanye. Kwakumele zibe ngu-3 000 izindlu ezakhiwayo, ezingeke zisafika kuleso sibalo ngenxa yokuthi umhlaba usudayisiwe,” kusho yena.USELALA obenyoni uNkk Thandi Madikizela osedilikelwe yindlu kaningi, engaphinde iwe noma yinini njengoba esalinde eyomxhasoUCele uthe akaboni ukuthi lezi zindlu zizokwakhiwa kulo nyaka wesabelomali. Uthe kule ndawo azikaze zakhiwe izindlu zomxhaso, yingakho uNkk Madikizela kumele alinde ezizayo.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu esifundazweni uMnuz Mbulelo Baloyi, uthe kusekude ukuthi luqalwe uhlelo lokwakhiwa kwezindlu ngenxa yombango womhlaba. Uthe uNkk Madikizela kumele akhelwe izindlu zesikhashana, ezinikwa abanezimo eziphuthumayo.“Ikhansela kumele lixhumane nomasipala ukuze kuzobhekwa isimo sikagogo bese efakwa ohlelweni lwesikhashana lwezindlu. Ukuthola indlu yesikhashana akusho ukuthi ngeke esahlomula uma sekwakhiwa ezomxhaso,” kusho uBaloyi.
title: Ulala obenyoni ohlala endlini edilikayo

text: UMQEQESHI weMaritzburg United, uMuhsin Ertugral, uqinise abalandeli idolo ngokuthi bangalokothi baphonse ithawula eqenjini labo ngoba iseminingi imidlalo yokuguqula isimo iTeam of Choice eibhekene naso.Umqeqeshi ukusho lokhu ngoLwesithathu ebusuku eqeda ukudedela amaphuzu ekhaya ekhala ngaphansi ngo 2-1 kwiFree State Stars emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu.Lapha iMaritzburg iqhubekile nokudlala into engayi phambili kodwa okuhlukile kulokhu wukuthi iyona ewabone kuqala lapho egxunyekwe ngakhona amapali ngonyawo lukaDoelin Mekoa. Nokho iphinde yavumela izivakashi ukuthi zishaye amagoli amabili yashaywa kanjalo.Okuqaphelekile lapha ngemuva komdlalo wukuthi abalandeli beMaritzburg bebekhombisa izimpawu zokulahla ithemba. Bebechaya izandla kucaca ukuthi abaningi sebeliphonsile ithawula ngeqembu labo.Iqembu elisashaye amagoli ayisithupha emidlalweni engu-16 akwethusi ukuthi kube yilona elibambe ibhuleki. Lisaphumelele ukunqoba kanye nje vo kusuka kuqale isizini.U-Ertugral obekungumdlalo wakhe wesibili kusuka ethathe lo msebenzi, ukholwa wukuthi iseminingi imidlalo abangaguqula ngayo lesi simo. Phakathi kwezinto akhala ngazo ukulinyalelwa yinqwaba yezithenjwa.“Ngifike iqembu lisashaye amagoli amahlanu emidlalweni engu-15 ngakho-ke elilodwa emidlalweni emibili liyathembisa. Ngabe benza iphutha elikhulu abalandeli uma bengaphonsa ithawula ngoba kuningi engifike kungalungile kodwa sekuyakhanya manje. Ngifike kukhona umgadli oyedwa. Sebezoba babili kumbe babe bathathu ngoba noMohau (Mokate) uyelulama. Akukho okufanele sikwenze ngaphandle kokuzigxeka thina ngoba konke okwenzeke kulo mdlalo kungenxa yobudedengu bethu. Zizolunga zonke lezo zinto ngesikhathi esikahle sebeluleme bonke abadlali bethu njengoba kuzokwenzeka nangoFortune (Makaringe),” kusho lo mqeqeshi.Uvumile ukuthi isimo sibi futhi nabadlali sebeqala ukugebisa amakhanda ngenxa yendawo abahleli kuyona kodwa yikhona lokhu akulandelwe.“Ngesonto elizayo kuzobe sekucaca. Ngikholwa wukuthi sinawo amava okuphuma lapha. Ngihlela ukuqasha abanye abathile abazoba wusizo kithina ngoba lesi simo esibhekene naso asisihle kodwa kusezandleni zethu ukuzikhipha. Imidlalo isekhona futhi miningi,” usho kanje. Umdlalo weMaritzburg olandelayo izowudlala neMamelodi Sundowns.
title: U-Ertugral uthayiza kubalandeli beqembu

text: YIZE ungakabhekwa umonakalo nokuphazamiseka kwezivakashi KwaZulu-Natal kodwa uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha nezeMvelo uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube uthe uyathemba izivakashi zizosibekezelela isimo sokuhlehliswa kwamabhanoyi.UNkk Ncube-Dube uthe noma yini esuke iphazamisa ezokuvakasha, kusuke kuyinto ebakhathazayo.UNkk Dube-Ncube uthe yize umnyango wakhe ungakazibheki izinombolo, ukuze babone ukuthi ziphazamisekile yini nokuthi kangakanani ezokuvasha, kodwa isimo sokuphazamiseka kwamabhanoyi siyakuthikameza ukufika nokuhamba kwabantu.Umnyango uthe uma lesi simo sokuphazamiseka kwamabhanoyi siqhubeka sizophazamisa abantu abaningi abavakashela eKZN.UNksz Dube-Ncube uthe uyathemba abahlele ukuvakasha eKZN ngeke bedikibale.Esitatimendeni salo mnyango uthe bayawuthemba uMnyango wamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni kuleli, uMnyango wezokuThutha kuleli neSouth African Civil Aviation Authority (SACAA), bazosithola isixazululo maduze, isimo sibuyele kwesijwayelekile.Kusukela ngoLwesibili nayizolo, amabhanoyi abehlehliswa.Isitatimende esithunyelwe kwabezindaba izolo esivela eMnyangweni wezokuThutha, oholwa uNgqongqoshe uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, siveze ukuthi namhlanje uzoba nesinye isithangami sabezindaba ukucacisa ngesimo.Okhulumela iSAA uMnuz Tlali Tlali, izolo ekhuluma ne-eNCA uthe: “Kuyasijabulisa ukuthi amabhanoyi ethu amaningi asehamba ngokujwayelekile. Emabhanoyini angu-25 abethinteka, * -80% wawo aseyandiza. Kuthi lawa angu-20% asamile. Amabhanoyi ahamba kahle nohlelo lwethu lokubhekana nezimo ezifuze lezi silusebenzisile.”
title: Awukabhekwa umonakalo ngokumiswa kwamabhanoyi

text: UJABULISA okwengane encane uFezile Makhanya ngemuva kokuthola ithuba lokuba wumethuli wohlelo lwebhola iNedbank Ke Yona Team Search (KYTS).UFezile uthi impilo ayibanga lula ngemuva kokuphela kwendawo ayeyilingisa emdlalweni iThe Queen.Kulo mdlalo wayelingisa indawo kaTebogo ongumhlukumezi, owayeshaya isithandwa sakhe uKea Khoza (Dineo Moeketsi).“Ngemuva kokuphela kwendawo kaTebogo abantu bangibheka ngelinye iso futhi akubanga lula ukuhamba emphakathini njengoba abantu babenemibono ehlukene ngami. Okwaba nzima kakhulu yingemuva kokulimala kukankosikazi wami owaphuka umlenze abantu bangisola bethi yimina engimlimazile,” kusho uFezile.Uthe abanye babefika bamthathe (unkosikazi) bahambe naye ngoba bethi bayokhuluma naye ngasese. “Babethi bafuna ukukhuluma naye ngingekho mina. Kodwa wayebatshela ukuthi kube yingozi. Kodwa le ndawo iyona engathi ibe nkulu nakumina futhi nami kuningi engikufundile kuyona emkhakheni wokulingisa,” kuchaza uFezile.Kulolu hlelo alwethulayo manje oluqale ngesonto eledlele, uFezile uthe bazobe behambela izifundazwe ezahlukene bethungatha ithalente entsheni edlala ibhola.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngokuthola ithuba elifana naleli njengoba ukusiza intsha ifeze amaphupho ayo kuyinto enkulu kakhulu. Nokuba ngumethuli nje walolu hlelo kumina kusho lukhulu futhi ngiyazi kukhona engizophuma nakho kulona,” kusho uFezile.Lolu hlelo phambilini belethulwa ngu-Andile Ncube noBoity Thulo.INedbank Ke Yona Team Search idlala ngoLwesine ngo-9.30 ebusuku kuMzansi Magic (DStv channel 161).
title: UFezile usezokwethula uhlelo kuMzansi

text: BANGASE bavalwe abashumayela ezitimeleni kulandela isigameko sowesilisa oyiNazaretha ozwakala enkulumweni eqoshiwe ethuka owesifazane ngoba ecasulwa ukuthi ukhombise ukungayithakaseli intshumayelo yakhe.Okhulumela iPassenger Rail Agency of South Africa (PRASA), KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zama Nomnganga, uthe akuvumelekile ukuthukwa kwabantu ezitimeleni.“Akukhathalekile ukuthi umuntu wenzeni, akumele athukwe. Udaba lalo wesilisa ozwakala ethuka, siyaluphenya. Ngizothumelela abaqapha ezitimileni le nkulumo ngicele bangiphenyele.“Ngicela ukuthi nohlangabezana nesigameko esifanayo abike esiteshini sesitimela ehla kusona. Uma sithola ukuthi yinto eyenzeke esitimeleni, kuzophoqeleka ukuthi bavalwe abashumayelayo ezitimeleni,” kusho uNomnganga.Owesilisa ozwakala ethuka owesifazane kule nkulumo ozibize ngoMkhathini, uthe akajiki kwakushilo kulo wesifazane.“Ngeke ngixolise ngokumthuka. Uyena owangisukela ngishumayela wathi “Hawu.” Lento ayishilo ngiyibone kungukuthuka uBaba uNyazilwezulu nokubukela phansi ibandla lami,” kusho uMkhathini.Okhulumela abaseBuhleni kwaShembe, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe uluphenyile lolu daba wathola ukuthi selwalungiswa.“Ngithole ukuthi le nkulumo eyangonyaka odlule futhi sekwakhulunywa nabo abathintekayo. Bobabili bangamaNazaretha. Uma kwenzeka kukhona omunye ohlangabezana nale nkinga, ngicela abike ekomitini, uzothathelwa izinyathelo othukayo,” kusho uMncwabe.
title: Bangase bavalwe abashumayela ezitimeleni

text: OGAQELE isikhundla sokwengamela i-ANC Youth League, uMnuz Reggie Nkabinde usola abaholi be-ANC ngokubakhipha inyumbazane emngcwabeni wesishoshovu somzabalazo, uNkk Winnie Madikizela-Mandela. Ukhale ngokuthi kunikezwe uSihlalo we-ANC uMnuz Gwede Mantashe nomholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema ithuba lokukhuluma kodwa i-ANCYL ayizange ibizwe.Esikhundleni sayo kubizwe uMnuz Fikile Mbalula ukuthi azokhulumela intsha yaseNingizimu Afrika. Izolo uNkabinde uthe ukukhishwa inyumbazane kwe-ANCYL kukhombisa ukuthi ayihlonishwa yi-ANC."Sibukelwe phansi wubuholi be-ANC, awukwazi ukuthi ube nomngcwabo kaMama (Madikizela-Mandela) bese ungasiniki ithuba lokukhuluma. Umama ubengumholi othanda abantu abasha, lokhu kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi i-ANC ayibuthembi ubuholi bethu. Kufanele isichazele ukuthi kungani isikhiphe inyumbazana," kusho uNkabinde. Ukhala nje uNkabinde, uMengameli we-ANCYL uMnuz Collen Maine ubike ukuthi nguNdunankulu waseNorth West uMnuz Supra Mahumapelo owamethula emndenini wakwaGupta. UMaine uthe uNkk Madikizela-Mandela ubengumholi oqotho ongazange aye kwabakwaGupta ngesikhathi abaholi abaningi be-ANC bethutheleka emzini walo mndeni odume ngokudla imali kahulumeni. "Ukukhuluma kanjena kukaMaine kusho ukuthi usekhathele wukusetshenziswa nguMahumapelo ukufeza izinhloso zakhe. Kufanele kube yisifundo kubaholi be-ANC ukuthi bayeke ukusebenzisa i-ANCYL," kusho uNkabinde. USihlalo we-ANCYL KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu uthe uMaine kufanele aziphendulele ezinsolweni zokuthi uxolisile ukuthi ubengamkhankaseli uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngaphambi kwengqungquthela yangoDisemba. "Izinsolo abekwa zona zimfakela isigcwagcwa kodwa zenza sonke sibukeke kabi njengabaholi be-ANCYL," kusho uMshengu. Uthe uMaine kufanele aphendule nakushilo ngomndeni wakwaGupta ngoba ubehlala ephika ukuthi uyawazi lo mndeni ngisho sekusolwa ukuthi umthengele umuzi.
title: Oqaqele isikhundla sokuhola i-ANCYL uthi i-ANC ibabukela phansi

text:
UMHOLI weDA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane usephumele obala waveza ukuthi akahambisani nombono kaNkk Helen Zille odabeni lweziguli ezashona zithuthwa zisuswa eLife Esidimeni. UZille ususe isidumo kutwitter kuleli sonto ngesikhathi ephakamisa imibuzo ngemizamo eyenziwa abemindeni ukugwema ukushona kweziguli ezingu-144 kule nhlekelele. Iziguli zasuswa esikhungweni sezempilo iLife Esidimeni zathuthelwa kwizikhungo ezingenzi nzuzo ezihlukahlukene nokwaholele ekutheni kushone inqwaba ngenxa yendlala, ukoma, amakhaza kanye nokunganakekelwa ngendlela.Kuleli sonto owayeyiPhini leNhloko yamaJaji osewathatha umhlalaphansi, uJaji Dikgang Moseneke, obewusihlalo weKhomishini ebiphenya ngale nhlekelele eyenzeke ngonyaka ka-2016 umemezele ukuthi imindeni izonxeshezelwa ngemali ebalelwa kuR1.2 million, umndeni ngamunye. Ebhala kutwitter ngemuva kwalesi sinqumo uZille uthe: "Kuhle ukuthi imindeni yabadlule ngenhlekelele yaseLife Esidimeni bathole ubulungiswa nokunxeshezelwa. Ngingathanda nokho ukuthola impendulo ngokuthi imndeni yenzani ngaphambi kokuthi kushone abantu, ukuxwayisa ukuthi abantu abasondelene nabo balambile futhi abanakekelwa ngendlela?" Inkulumo kaZille igxekwe nxa zonke kutwitter, abaningi bethi ukhombisa ukungazwelani nemindeni elahlekelwe. It is good that the families of the Life Esidimeni victims have received a measure of justice and compensation. I would like an answer to this question: What did they do, before these tragic deaths, to raise the alarm about their loved ones starving + living in profound neglect?— Helen Zille (@helenzille) 
March 20, 2018Enye inhlangano engenzi nzuzo ize yathembisa ukuthi izombika kwinhlangano yamalungelo abantu kuleli iHuman Rights Commission. Ephawula ngalolu daba uMaimane uthe, abantu kumele bazwelane nemindeni enezihlobo ezingaphilile kahle ngokomqondo. "Abantu bakithi sebedlule esikhathini esinzima kakhulu ngenxa yale nhlekelele, ngicabanga ukuthi kufanele sizwelane nabo futhi sazi nobuhlungu obuhambisana nabadlula kukho," kusho uMaimane. Akukhona okokuqala uZille esusa umsindo enkundleni yokuxhumana itwitter. Nyakenye wazidonsela amanzi ngomsele ethi kuningi okuhle okwazuzwa ngesikhathi kudliwa isizwe (colonialism).  Lokhu kwaholela ekutheni iDA imbizele esigungwini sokuqondisa ubugwegwe, waphucwa igunya lokuba sezigungwini ezithatha izinqumo eqenjini. Nakulokhu abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bathi kumele aphinde aqondiswe ubugwegwe.
title: UMaimane uphikisa umbono kaZille osola imindeni kolwaseLife Esidimeni

text: UYISE uhilele amadodakazi akhe amabili wase esezilengisa naye emuva kwengxabano yasekhaya ePolokwane, eLimpopo, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Izikhulu zamaphoyisa aseLimpopo zikugxekile lokhu okwenzeke ngo-10 ebusuku esigodini saseNgaleng, eGa-Mamabolo, eMankweng, ngaphandle kwasePolokwane.Kuthiwa indoda yaxabana nenkosikazi yayo ngonyaka odlule baze bahlala ngokuhlukana. Inkosikazi yathatha izingane zabo ezimbili yahamba nazo yabuyela kubo eSekgosese, eGiyani.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseLimpopo, uColonel Moatshe Ngoepe, uthe: “NgoMgqibelo izingane zibuyele kubo eMankweng zizovakashela uyise njengoba kuvalwe izikole. Ngesikhathi zifika uyise ube eseshayela ucingo inkosikazi yakhe, bahilizisana ocingweni.”“Eqeda ukukhuluma nocingo, uyise wezingane uphendukele kuzo, wazihilela emakamelweni ahlukene. Ube esebaleka. Amaphoyisa athintiwe aphuthuma ekhaya lendoda. Ube esethungathwa uyise wezingane watholwa komunye umuzi endaweni naye esezilengisile.”Amantombazanyana abeneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili nemihlanu.Uyise wezingane ubeneminyaka ewu-38.UNgoepe uthe amaphoyisa avule amacala amabili okubulala nedokodo ngokushona komuntu. Uphenyo luyaqhubeka.Ibamba likakhomishana waseLimpopo, uMajor General Jan Scheepers, usigxekile lesi senzo.Unxuse ukuba amalungu omphakathi acele usizo uma enezinkinga zasekhaya, angakhethi ukubulala, ikakhulukazi izingane ezingenacala.
title: Ulengise amadodakazi naye wazikhunga

text: UMVIKELI woMphakathi u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane ngoMsombuluko umemezele ukuthi uzosiphikisa isicelo sikaMengameli Jacob Zuma sokuthi kubuyekezwe kuphinde kubekwe eceleni umbiko mayelana nokuhaqwa kwamandla ombuso owahlanganiswa u-Advocate Thuli Madonsela obenguMvikeli woMphakathi ngaphambi kwakhe."Odabeni lokuhaqwa kwamandla ombuso, ngesikhathi sigcina ukuba ndawonye ngathi ngisathatha izeluleko zomthetho, sengingakusho manje ukuthi sizophikisana nesicelo esenziwe nguZuma sokuthi kubuyekezwe umbiko kaMadonsela," kusho uMkhwebane ngesikhathi enesithangami nabezindaba ePitoli izolo.UMkhwebane uthe manje basaqedela ukuqoqa bonke ubufakazi ababudingayo."Ubufakazi obudingwa ngumengameli, sizobethula ngokulandela umthetho," usho kanje.UZuma ufake isicelo sokuba kubuyekezwe kuphinde kubekwe eceleni umbiko kaMadonsela eNkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli nyakenye. Abameli baZuma bathi akukho kumthethosisekelo ukuthi uMadonsela ayalele uZuma ukuba asungule ikhomishini nokuthi asho ukuthi kumele iholwe ngumuntu oqokwe yiNhloko yamaJaji uMogoeng Mogoeng, njengoba lamandla ebekwe emahlombe kamengameli.Umbiko kaMadonsela uveza ukuthi amabhizinisi omndeni wakwaGupta oyazitamuzela kumathenda ezinkampanini zikahulumeni ikakhulukazi kwa-Eskom. UMadonsela ube eseyalela ukuthi kusungulwe ikhomishini ezoqhubeka nophenyo njengoba isakhathi yena inkontileka yakhe kade isiphela.
title: UMvikeli woMphakathi uzophikisa isicelo sikaZuma

text: IDISTRUCTION Boyz inethemba lokuthi impumelelo yayo izogqugquzela nabanye. Leli qembu limemezele ukuthi i-albhamu yalo isidayise igolide (amakhophi angu-15 000).Ngesikhathi ikhipha i-albhamu ethi Gqom Is The Future ngo-Okthoba 6 iDistruction Boyz, ebunjwe nguZipho “Goldmax” Mthembu noQuinton “Que” Mgobhozi, yaveza ukuthi inephupho lokudayisa igolide.Yathi ifuna ukuthi i-albhamu yayo kube ngeyokuqala yegqom’ ukuthi idayise amakhophi alesi sibalo.Imenenja yeqembu, uLindo Buthelezi, ithe babonga kakhulu abantu abathenge umculo wabo.“Siyathemba ukuthi nabanye bazobona ukuthi amaphupho ayafezeka. Nazi izintwana zaselokishini zenze okungakaze kwenziwe. Lokhu kufana nokwenziwa nguBlack Coffee enza iDVD yakhe noCassper Nyovest egcwalisa izinkundla,” kusho uLindo.Uthe umculo weDistruction Boyz ufike ngesikhathi igqom’ ingakandi kakhulu emsakazweni.“Ifike yakushintsha konke lokho futhi kuvuleke neminye iminyango ngisho nase-Europe.”Uthe manje into abayibhekile wukuhlukanisa unyaka emisakazweni ehlukene. Unxuse abantu ukuthi babavotele.Ngaphandle kwalokhu uthe ziningi izinhlelo zokuthuthukisa iqembu abanazo.“Angifuni ukuzidalula okwamanje kodwa kuningi esikuhlelile nokuthuthukisa abanye. Isasasa liyaphela kodwa ngifuna ukwenza into enkulu ezokwenza ukuthi ngisho ngabe abanayo ingoma eshisa izikhotha kodwa abantu bakhulume ngabo njengoCassper,” kusho uLindo.
title: I-albhamu yeDistruction Boyz isidayise igolide

text: ZAKHELE XABAU SETHOLE uphromotha omusha wase-East London umshayisibhakela waKwaZulu-Natal, uMoruti “Babyface” Mthalane, osanda kulaxazwa wuMnyango wezemidlalo kulesi sifundazwe.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uMthalane waseLindelani, osizwe wuMnyango kaNtombikayise Sibhidla-Saphetha esephelelwe wumhlaba, usayine isivumelwano sokuhlelelwa izimpi yiRumble Africa Promotions kaTeris Ntutu wase-Eastern Cape. EKZN uMthalane ubelwa ngaphansi kweLudonga Boxing Promotions kaThulani Magudulela.UMnyango wezemidlalo yiwona obukade ufaka imali yokutakula uMthalane, ozinze eGauteng lapho ephekwa khona nguNick “Mthakathi” Durandt, obesethathe amasakana akhe wabuyela ekhaya. Ngosizo lomnyango neLudonga, uMthalane unqobe ibhande le-IBO flyweight ehlula uJether Oliva wasePhilippines empini ebiseNkosi Albert Lithuli Cenvention Centre. Ulivikele ku-Odilane Zaleta waseMexico ngasekupheleni konyaka odlule, eThekwini.Ngaphambi kwalokho uMthalane uthwale kanzima kubhuntsha izimpi zokuvikela ibhande le-IBF nagcine ephoqelekile ukulilaxaza.Ukusayina kukaMthalane kwenzeka kusaphele amasonto ambalwa umnyango uveze ukuthi ufuna ukuthi ukusiza nabanye abashayisibhakela, ungafuhleli yonke imali kumuntu oyedwa. Kuvele ukuthi usuduma noThabiso “The Rock” Mchunu ohlelelwa impi yokuhlungela ibhande le-WBC cruiserweight no-Ilunga “Junior” Makabu ngoMeyi.UNtutu ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uMthalane usezolwa ngaphansi kwabo.“Kuyiqiniso ukuthi uMthalane usesayine kithina. Abashayisibhakela asibesheli kodwa yibona abeza kithi bezocela ukusebenza nathi. Besilokhu sikhuluma noMthalane nemenenja yakhe kusukela kuqale unyaka,” kusho uNtutu.“Sesivele sinezinhlelo zokuthi alwe impi yakhe yokuqala yokuvikela ibhande le-IBO ngo-Ephreli e-Orient Theatre. Impi yakhe yesibili izoba ngoJulayi eThekwini ngoba kubalulekile ukuthi alwele ekhaya.”KuRumble Africa, uMthalane ujoyine abashayisibhakela abafana noThabo “Eagle” Sonjica ohlelelwa impi yebhande le-WBC Silver, Lusanda “Mexican” Komanisi ophethe ibhande le-IBO bantamweight, Sipho Taliwe owayengumpetha weWBC International super featherweight, Siphosethu Mvula, Ludumo “9mm” Lamati, Aphiwe Masangwana nabanye.Lokhu kungabukeka njengokusondeza iphupho labalandeli besibhakela base-East London osekunesikhathi belobizela ukuthi uMthalane abhekane nomfana wendawo uMakazole “Professor” Tete.“Sifuna ukubanga nabagqugquzeli bazimpi abaphambili kuleli abafana noBerman (Rodney) noBranco (Milenkovic). Sifuna ukushubisa umbango,” kusho uNtutu.“Isifiso sethu ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abashayisibhakela bayazithola izimpi. Sesivele siqalile ukukhuluma neSuperSport.”
title: Usenophromotha omusha uMthalane

text: Bantabami ngokuzithoba ngiyacela isale seyimiswa le Khomishini kaZondo okuthiwa ngeyophenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana. Ngicabanga ukuthi nobengaboni useyabona manje ukuthi iKhomishini yokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana ifana nenunu emakhandakhanda ezoshaya ibhuqe u-ANC. Ukube nginawo amandla okufinyelela egoseni le Khomoshini yokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana, uSolwazi uThuli Madonsela, kungabe ngiyambuza manje ukuthi uyathokoza yini njengoba abantu bakaKhongolose sebejikijelana ngemikhonto ongathi baloyiwe. Kungenzeka ukuthi leKhomishini yasungulwa ngoba kuhloswe ukuthi kwembulwe izinqe zikaZuma kodwa manje kubukeka sekuvela nezinqe zabantu abaningi.Ngisho ingane ekhasela eziko iyabona ukuthi kule khomishini kuhujwa inyamazane eyodwa enguZuma kodwa kugcina sekulimala nezinye izinyamazane ngenxa yokuthi abazingeli bazingela ngokushisa umlilo. MaSolezwe ngiyaphinda ngiyasho ukuthi lo mlilo obaswe kuleya Khomishini uyoshiya uKhongolose ushe wahanguka amashiya nezinkophe. Lezi gubhu ezishawayo kuthiwe uKhongolose ubumbene ngibona ongathi kusiniswa amahleza ngoba le Khomishini ikuveza obala ukuthi uhlakazeke phakathi okwamaqhezu ezinqe. Okufike kube yinkinga wukuthi ofakazi beza ngogqozi nofuqufuqu lokupenda uZuma njengesikhohlakali kodwa bagcine sebechaphazele noGwede Mantashe, uGodongwana noJeff Radebe sekuvela ukuthi babekhona emihlanganweni ethile. OkaVolos uthi le Khomishini kaZondo ifana nomgangela wezinsizwa nezintokazi zikaKhongolose okufanele umiswe ngokushesha ngoba kuyofikwa okhethweni sekukhishwene amehlo abanye bengasanamazinyo. Kuyishwa ukuthi amalungu ka-ANC abukeka engaboni ukuthi ukuyofakaza kule Khomishini kufana nokuthatha intambo uzikhunge ngoba ugcine usungene wavela ngesicoco. Ubufakazi bale nto engiyishoyo kube yisehlo esehlele uNhlanhla Nene osukwe wusinga wayokwethula ubufakazi kodwa wagcina eselahlekelwa yisikhundla sokuba uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali. Kufikisela ngosizi ukubona uPravin Ghordan efakaza, echaza ukuthi yena wakubona kanjani ukulawulwa koMbuso. Thina esibukelayo sesinovalo lokuthi kwayena uGhordan uyogcina eselahlekelwe yisikhundla sakhe ngoba kuyabonakala ukuthi akekho omsulwa.MaSolezwe, angisho ukuthi ngithini kodwa ngithi angiyenameli le nkulumo kaMengameli uRamaphosa yokuthi naye uzimisele ngokuyofakaza kule Khomishini. UMatamela kufanele ngabe usebonile ukuthi umuntu oyofakaza kule Khomishini usuke eqiqinge umgqomo kadoti eyowuchitha ngenhloso yokungcolisa abathile. Inkinga isekutheni ngesikhathi uchitha udoti uthi ungcolisa abantu ugcina nawe sewungcoliswe yilo doti owuchithayo. Bakwethu, mina nginovalo lokuthi ngelinye ilanga noZuma uyosukwa yikhanda lakhe aqiqinge amanabukeni angcolile kaKhongolose ayowachitha kule Khomishini kaZondo kuhayize abantu.MaSolezwe, ngiyazi uVolos waziwa njengesibhedi kodwa mina angikuboni ukubheda uma kungathiwa le Khomishini kaZondo imiswe okwesikhashana ngenxa yokushoda kwezimali. Kuyiqiniso ukuthi kuyosuka umsindo kube nemibuzo yokuthi imiswe kanjani iKhomishini isanda kuqala umsebenzi wayo. Ngibona ungcono umsindo wokuthi iKhomishini ibanjwe ngophondo kunokuthi idedelwe igabavule, iveze amahlazo kube kubhekwe okhethweni.- Ngeso likaVolovolo
title: Le Khomishini kaZondo izoyishaya iyibhuqe i-ANC

text: UMNYANGO wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uphenya ngezinsolo zokunyamalala kukaR70 000 esikoleni eMthunzini okuthiwa wakhishwa wuthishanhloko namalungu esigungu sabazali esesiphumile.Kuthiwa abazali baseZenzele-Mashimane Secondary bayavutha, basola uthishanhloko ngokusebenzisa amalungu esigungu esidala sabazali ekukhipheni imali. Ngokuthola kwephephandaba kuthiwa imali yakhishwa ngo-Agasti 8 kwi-akhawunti yesikole kukhona nothishanhloko. Abazali abakhathazekile babikele amahhovisi omyango esifundeni ukuze kuphenywe.UMqondisi woMnyango esifundeni iKing Cetshwayo, uMnuz David Chonco, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bayaphenya emuva kokubikelwa ngodaba.“Ngathola umbiko ngezinsolo, ngamshayela nothishanhloko ngimbuza ngazo. Ngithole ukuthi imali yakhishelwa ukuthenga amadeski kodwa abanye abanelisekile ngendlela okwenzeke ngayo. Sekujutshwe abahloli abazophenya kahle,” kusho uChonco.Kuthiwa isigungu esidala size sakhishwa ngokusemthethweni ngo-Agasti 22 kodwa amalungu amasha akhethwa ngoMashi kuzo zonke izikole. Kusolwa ukuthi ukungakhishwa kwamalungu amadala esigungu sabazali bekwenzelwa ukuthi aqhubeke nokukhipha imali yesikole.Omunye wemithombo esondelene nodaba uthe kuyaxaka ukuthi kungakhishwa imali engaka yesikole ngosuku olulodwa. Uthe ngokwazi kwakhe akumele kukhishwe imali engaphezu kukaR3 000 ngosuku futhi abakhokhelwayo kumele bakhokhelwe ngamasheke. Usola ukuthi udaba lokuthengwa kwamadeski selwakhiwe ukuze kuvikelwe abasolwayo.Kuthintwa uSihlalo wesigungu esidala, uMnuz Walter Dube, uvumile ukuthi wayekhona kuyokhishwa imali. Uphikile ukuthi inyamalele kodwa wathi kwathengwa amadeski kwakhokhelwa nabanye osomabhizinisi.Usole abathize abafuna ukukhipha uthishanhloko esikhundleni behlise nesithunzi sakhe. Akakwazanga ukuphendula uma ebuzwa ngokungasheshi kwabo ukuphuma ezikhundleni. Ukhale nangezikweletu athe zikhungethe isikole.“Imali yakhishwa ngosuku olulodwa nabantu bakhokhelwa ngokheshi ngoba babeyijahile imali ngenxa yokuthi kwakuzoba yiholidi ngakusasa. Nabo bakhokhelwa ngokheshi laba abebekweletwa namadeski athengwa ngokheshi,” kusho uDube.
title: Kusolwa uthishanhloko ngokunyamalala kukaR70 000 wesikole

text: LIHLEHLISELWE uMsombuluko ozayo icala labathathu abasolwa ngokushaya izingane ezimbili zaze zashona bezisola ngokuba namadimoni.Abasolwa uMnuz Makhosonke Sibisi (31), Nksz Nkosingiphile Sithole (35) noNksz Nompumelelo Langa (25), bavele ngoMsombuluko enkantolo yaseNkandla.Laba babhekene namacala amabili okubulala izingane ezineminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye. Icala kuthiwa lenzeke ngoMashi 24 nonyaka.Ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Thembeka Mbele, laba basagcinwe esitokisini.Baboshwa ngoLwesine ngezinsolo zokubulala izingane ababethi bazikhipha amadimoni.Kwababoshiwe kukhona unina wenye ingane eyabulawa, isihlobo sezingane nomfundisi.Laba kuvele ukuthi babethi lezi zingane zazikhala zithi 'zishaywa ngamadimoni futhi athi aziphuze igazi'. Abasolwa kuthiwa nabo babe sebeshaya izingane, kwaze kwaba khona nenye abayigwaza esandleni.Kwabizwa amaphoyisa endaweni yesigameko. Eyodwa ingane yashonela endaweni yesehlo enye yayiswa esibhedlela yafika yashonela khona.
title: Bavelile abashaya babulala izingane

text:
SEKUPHINDE kwagobhoza igazi embonini yamatekisi emuva kokuba ngoMgqibelo kubulewe abashayeli abawu-11 abebephuma emngcwabeni womqashi wabo naye obebulewe.Ababulewe basale endaweni yobugebengu kwathi abalimele baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela. Bebekade behamba ngemoto eyodwa balalelwa unyendle eColenso, ngaseMnambithi. Kukhona nabathathu abalimale kanzima. Kusolwa ukuthi abashayeli bamatekisi, abazinze eGauteng, babulawe ngenxa yombango okhona phakathi kosomatekisi baseTembisa naseKempton Park.Kuyacaca ukuthi ababulali bebefuna ukusizila uma kubhekwa ukuthi kutholwe amagobolondo ezinhlamvu awu-250.Izithombe zetekisi ebimbobombobo futhi imanaphanapha yigazi ezicabheni nasemawindini ziyixoxa yonke indaba yesihluku esinyatisa igazi.Akuselula ukuqonda ukuthi bantu abasebenza embonini kumele babizwe ngani ngoba igama elithi osomabhizinisi alisabafanele ngendlela abenza ngayo futhi kwakona ukuthutha umphakathi abasakulungele.Abashayeli abawu-11 ababulewe abavelanga nje badutshulwa, ukhona noma bakhona abathume ababulali futhi basembonini yamatekisi abebazi ukuthi bazobe bekuphi futhi behamba ngayiphi imoto.FUNDA: 
Abasayingeni eyamatekisi abasinde esibhicongweniAkuqondakali ukuthi yini ebanga abantu abangabanikazi bomsebenzi uma belwa izimpi zabo babulale nabashayeli. Impi yamatekisi isimehlule uhulumeni namaphoyisa. Akwazeki noma yinto yamabomu ngenxa yokuthi kunezikhulu zikahulumeni namaphoyisa okusolwa ukuthi zinamatekisi yize lokhu kungavumelekile.Yize kungasho ukuthi abantu bayaphazamiseka uma evalwa amatekisi kodwa ukube uhulumeni uzimisele ngempela ukunqanda lolu dlame kufanele ngabe kade satholakala isisombululo.Kodwa kunalokho abantu bamatekisi bazenzela umathanda, bayacanasa sengathi baphethe izwe.Kwenzeka kanjani ukuthi ezweni elinezobunhloli kube nezigebengu ezenza umathanda njengabantu bamatekisi kodwa ingalo yomthetho ingafinyeleli kuzo?Kuyishwa nje ukuthi inqwaba yabantu ithembele ematekisini ngoba kufanele ngabe ayavalwa kuze kube abanikazi bawo bafunda ukuthi izinto azixazululwa ngesibhamu kodwa zilungiswa ngomlomo.
title: [IMIBONO] Abamatekisi abafunde ukuxazulula izinto ngomlomo

text: ISILO Samabandla uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu sithi kuzoma kwasani eGoli uma sesifikile sizokhuza ukuhlaselwa kwabantu bokufika osekudlule nemiphefumulo kwaphazamisa namabhizinisi.IMbube ikhulume kanje ngesikhathi yethula inkulumo eMkhosini woMhlanga esigodlweni eNyokeni, KwaNongoma ngempelasonto. IMbube ikhuluma nje ngeledlule eGoli abantu bebezitapela ezitolo zabokufika bebaxosha."Amakhosi nezinduna kufanele balungele ukuthi baya eGoli ngokuphela kwenyanga esikuyona. Kade ngithola imibuzo kuthiwa ngithuleleni abantu belwa eGoli kuhlaselwa abokuhamba. Angizenzi izinto ngoba ngifuna ukubukwa mina ngenza ngendlela yami,’’ kusho iSilo.Sikhale kakhulu ngembizo ebizwe ngaphandle kokuxhumana naso ngoba sithi izinduna zilawulwa yisona. Sinxuse uNdunankulu kaZulu ukuba alusingathe kahle udaba lungaphumi esandleni ngoba kunabantu abaluthatha ngesinxele."Ukhona umnikazi wamabutho nezinduna oyimina futhi akukona okwendoda ebekwe yakalelwa iminyaka emihlanu. Ngimangele uma ngizwa kuthiwa kubizwa imbizo ngaphandle kokuthi ngaziswe mina mnikazi wezinduna,’’ kusho iSilo.ISilo sithi kuzogcina kuba sengathi yizinduna eziphehla udlame olubhekiswe kwabokufika njengoba zibizelwa imbizo.Imbizo ebibizwe yihhovisi likaNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele igcine ihoxisiwe kodwa zangabekwa izizathu zokuhoxiswa kwayo.UNomthebe wesizwe uthe akahambisani nempi ngoba kwaliwa kakhulu KwaZulu-Natal akasafuni ukuphinde abone udlame noma ngabe lukuphi kufanele lukhuzwe.Unxuse ukuba kuvikelwe impahla nesithunzi sikaZulu ngokuba iqedwe impi ebhekiswe kubantu bokufika.Kulo mcimbi iMbube imemezele nokuthi asesenkantolo amaphepha okulwa udaba lomhlaba okuthiwa ingase iphucwe wona. Ikhale ngohulumeni yathi uyayidelela futhi sekufike lapho kuyima khona emphinjeni."Ngiyabahlonipha mina bonke abantu ngokwezigaba zabo kodwa bakhona abacabanga ukuthi ngiyisiphukuphuku bese benyuka ngengalo kimi. Bafuna ukusiphuca ingubo yethu esiyembethe okuwumhlaba. Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi amaphepha asenkantolo njengoba sikhuluma nje,’’ kusho iMbube.
title: ISilo Samabandla siyokhuza udlame eGoli

text: ULUCAS “Rhoo” Radebe odlalele iBafana Bafana neLeeds United, usalobizela ukuphatha inhlangano engamele unobhutshuzwayo eNingizimu Afrika, iSouth African Football Association (Safa).Ngonyaka odlule uRadebe washaywa ngesithende okhethweni lwale nhlangano ngoba wayengelona ilungu leLocal Football Association (LFA).Ngokomthethosisekelo weSafa awukwazi ukungenela ukhetho uma ungelona ilungu leLFA. Konke lokho sekushintshile njengoba uRadebe eseyilungu leLFA yaseDiepkloof, eGauteng. URadebe ukhulume nezintatheli ehambele imidlalo eqanjwe ngenkakha edlalele iBafana ne-Orlando Pirates, iSiyabonga Sangweni Youth Festival and Mayoral Sport Day ebidlalelwa eDondotha, ngempelasonto.“Sifuna ushintsho kwiSafa. Angisho ukuthi abasebenza kule nhlangano njengamanje kufanele baxoshwe. Kodwa kungani bangasisondezi siyizinkakha ukuze sizoncela ulwazi kubona? Ngeke baliphathe ibhola ungunaphakade. Kudingeka ushintsho kwiSafa, kudingeka igazi elisha. Yingakho sengijoyine iLFA yaseDiepkloof ngoba ngifuna ukungena kule nhlangano,” kusho uRadebe okubeke kwacaca ukuthi akazimisele ngokufundela ukuqeqesha.Ebuzwa ukuthi ubudlelwane bakhe nomengameli weSafa, uDanny Jordaan bunjani, uRadebe uthe: “Siyaxoxa phela lokho nje okungatheni. Kuba ukubingelelana nje, kuphele lapho. Mina ngisafuna sihlale phansi naye sixoxe ngoba ekugcineni akukho mayelana nami kodwa kumayelana nebhola lethu. Kunenqwaba yezinkakha eduve emakhaya engasebenzi. Laba bantu siyabadinga ngoba balidlalile ibhola”.Eqhubeka echaza uRadebe, uthe kuyamkhathaza ukuthi ibhola lakuleli lishona phansi, alikhuphuki.“Yiliphi ibhola lethu? Ngokwami asisenalo, siyafunisela. Kufanele lokho kushintshe, yikho ngithi kudingeka ushintsho. Sidinga abantu abadlalile ebholeni. Uma ubuka iBafana kwi-Afcon, ayidlali kahle neze. Ibhola lethu alikho, sizama ukuhlanganisa okwamanye amazwe, asigxilile kokwethu. Akufanele uma iqembu lesizwe lihlungela imiqhudelwano simince. Kufanele siye emiqhudelwaneni kukhalwe ngathi. Indaba yokubala, ukuminca nokuhlala ethembeni kufanele konke lokho kuphele. Sinethalente nezinsiza ezanele kuleli lizwe ukuthi singaba yizwe eligcwalisayo nje emiqhudelwaneni emikhulu,” kusho uRadebe.IBafana izobhekana neMorocco emdlalweni wokugcina wamaqoqo namuhla ngo-6 ntambama.
title: ULucas Radebe ufuna uguquko kwiSafa

text: UZANYELWA umsebenzi kwiMamelodi Sundowns uKagisho “KG” Dikgacoi inkontileka yakhe engazange ivuselelwe yiLamontville Golden Arrows.UKG (32) odlale phesheya iminyaka ewu-7 ukhuze ibuya ku-Absa Premiership ngoJanuwari. Lo mdlali odabuka eFree State udlale kwiFulham, Crystal Palace nakwiCardiff City wonke okungamaqembu adlala kwiPremier League yase-England.Isolezwe lansukuzonke lidalule izindaba zokuthi uDikgacoi ngeke abuyele kwi-Arrows ngesizini ezayo.“UDikgacoi uxoxa neSundowns njengoba inkontileka yakhe ingeke ivuselelwe ku-Arrows njengoba iphela ngoJuni 30. UPitso Mosimane usebenzile naye kwiBafana Bafana. Ngaphansi kwakhe ubengasali kwelesizwe. UManqoba Mngqithi oyiphini likaMosimane usebenzile naye kuLamontville Golden Arrows,” kusho umthombo.UDikgacoi uchithe isikhathi esiningi elimele ngomzuliswano wesibili wemidlalo yePremier Soccer League (PSL). Lo mdlali oyibamba enkabeni yenkundla useyidlale yonke imiqhudelwano emikhulu emhlabeni. Ubekhona ngo-2008 iBafana idlala kwiCaf Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) waphinde wayibamba emiqhudelwaneni ofanayo ngo-2013.Ngo-2009 udlalile kwiFifa Confederation Cup kwathi ngo-2010 wayibamba kwiNdebe yoMhlaba eNingizimu Afrika.“UKG uselinde ukuthi iSundowns ibuye eTunisia bese eqhubeka nezingxoxo,” kusho umthombo.Imenenja kaKG, uLwazi Mazibuko ikhale ngokuthi uKG usawumdlali we-Arrows.“Inkontileka kaKG ne-Arrows iphela ngoJuni 30. Ngakho asiyilinde iphele bese sibhunga ngekusasa likaKG.“Ngicabanga ukuthi kumqoka ukuthi siyihloniphe i-Arrows,” kusho uMazibuko ngesikhathi ethintwa yileli phephandaba ngendaba kaDikgacoi.Kuze kube yimanje akucaci ngekusasa likaTeko Modise ophelelwa yinkontileka kuSundowns ngesonto elizayo.UThulani Thuswa wezokuxhumana kuSundowns ethintwa ngendaba kaDikgacio uthe: “Ngiqala ukuyizwa ngawe indaba kaDikgacio. Iqembu belingakaze lingitshele lutho ngaye.”ISundowns ibuye izolo ekuseni ivela eTunisia lapho ibambane khona ngo 0-0 ne-Esperance abayibeke ezithendeni kwilog yeCAF Champions League. Umdlalo olandelayo weDowns izowudlala neSaint George, e-Addis Ababa Stadium, e-Ethiopia ngoJulayi 1.
title: Uzanyelwa umsebenzi kwiSundowns uKG

text: UMNDENI waseNorth West usashaqekile emuva kokuba isoka lendodakazi yawo ebizithwele liyigwaze uxhaxha lwamanxeba ngaphambi kokuba lizibulale.Lesi sigameko senzeke emasontweni amathathu adlule kodwa owesifazane uNksz Bonolo Sealelo (32) owaphuthunyiswa esibhedlela ngesikhathi kwenzeka le nhlekelele, kusabonwa ngokusa kuye esibhedlela. Ingane yakhe ayeyithwele ayisindanga kodwa yashona kuleso sehlakalo.  Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuPhepha koMphakathi eNorth West, uMnuz Alpheus Koonyaditse,uthe lesi sigameko senzeke eLokaleg eTaung kodwa umnyango uze wezwa ngaso kuleli sonto. Uthe umufi, uMnuz  MacMillan Oliphant, ucele lo wesifazane obekhulelwe ukuba ambilisele amanzi ukuze ageze. Kuthe uma amanzi esebila, wamthelela wona endishini yokugeza,esikhundleni sokuthi le ndoda igeze, kubikwa ukuthi iye yakhiya igumbi lokugeza lapho umuntu wesifazane abesalele khona.  Emuva kwesikhashana, umndeni wakwaSealelo uzwe umsindo obuvala amadlebe uphuma egunjini lokulala, owesifazane ememeza igama lesoka lakhe ebelizama ukumbulala. "Baphuthume egunjini lokulala kodwa bafica umnyango uvaliwe. Babe sebebulala iwindi. Owesifazane ubeselele phansi,elimele futhi indoda ibe seyithi ifuna ukufa nengane yayo maqede yazisika isihlakala sengalo, yazinquma noqhoqhoqho". "Kube sekubizwa amaphoyisa nabezimo eziphuthumayo, owesifazane wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela, isoka lona lafela endaweni yesigameko."
title: Isoka lizame ukubulala intombi ekhulelwe maqede lazisika uqhoqhoqho lizibulala

text: MBONGISENI BUTHELEZIEseGoliU KHALE ezimathonsi umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs uSteve Komphela ngonompempe abebephethe umdlalo wabakhaya wathi kungcono abeligi bacabange eyokufaka abangaphandle ukuthi bazophatha lo mdlalo.UKomphela ubekhuluma ngemuva kokuthi iqembu lakhe lidlale ngokulingana ngo-1-1 ne-Orlando Pirates eFNB Stadium, eSoweto, ngoMgqibelo.Igoli leChiefs lishaywe nguWillard Katsande kwathi elokulinganisa lePirates lashaywa nguThamsanqa Gabuza.“Ngiphoxekile kakhulu. Uma kuyinto engenzeka kungakuhle ukuthi umdlalo wabakhaya uphathwe ngonompempe bangaphandle. Onompempe kufanele baziyeke zibulalane enkundleni, benze umsebenzi wabo kahle,” kusho uKomphela.“Ngeke ngibatshele ukuthi benzeni noma ngibabonise kodwa ngivunyelwe ukuzwakalisa ukungeneliseki ngezinqumo zabo. Ngiyambonga uMdali akubanga nanhlekelele kulo mdlalo.“Benze amaphutha ku-Itumeleng Khune kabili. Kufanele onompempe bawuphathe kahle umdlalo bangachemi ngoba uma benza kanjalo babulala iligi enhle kangaka. IPirates neChiefs amaqembu amakhulu nahlonishwayo eNingizimu Afrika ngakho kufanele uhlonishwe umdlalo wawo. Angijabulanga neze ngezinye zezinqumo zonompempe namuhla. Lokhu kungaxosha abantu ebholeni.”Uncome iqembu lakhe ngendlela elidlale ngayo esiwombeni sokuqala somdlalo. “Sidlale kahle umdlalo sashaya igoli sahamba phambili. Besilokhu sigxile emdlalweni wethu kahle kwaze kwamoshakala ngokuthi siyeke uqhwasha wegoli ukuthi lisidle. Besiqinile futhi siphaselana ibhola kahle sidlala kahle kunabo kodwa ukufika kukaMpho Makola noSifiso Myeni kushintshe izinto umdlalo waba ngowabo. Thina besisethubeni elihle lokuthi sinqobe umdlalo kodwa kwala,” kusho uKomphela.UKhune uzobe esekulungele ukudlala uma sebebhekene neLamontville Golden Arrows.“Uthinteke kancane, besinaye ngemuva komdlalo endaweni lapho sishintshela khona. Sizozwa ngodokotela beqembu ukuthi bathini, ngiyethemba uzobuya masinyane,” kusho uKomphela.Uncome uWilliam Twala ngendlela adlale ngayo kulo mdlalo yize ethi kwesinye isikhathi ubedinga ukulekelelwa.“Udlale kahle uzobe engcono kakhulu kolandelayo wabakhaya. Ubedinga ukusizwa kwesinye isikhathi,” kusho uKomphela.Uthe uThabo Qalinge noThabo Rakhale bayayijika indoda kodwa bebefuna ukuthi badle iPirates ngamaphutha abo.“Sibheka ukuthi iphasi yinde kangakanani noma uthinta ibhola kabi bese silithatha sibahlasela ngokuzuma ngalo. Kodwa bona bayakwazi ukujika indoda,” kusho uKomphela.
title: Usole unompempe kowabakhaya

text: MHLELI: Ngikhathazekile ngeqembu lami engilithandayo iKaizer Chiefs. Kulezi zinsuku idlala umbozo webhola, okokuqala nje ungambuyisa kanjani umqeqeshi owahluleka ukuqeqesha iqembu?Ngikhuluma ngo-Ernst Middendorp. Abalandeli baze bametha igama elithi uMiddendraw ngakho ukudlala ama-draw angenasidingo.Selokhu efikile nje usawine imidlalo emingaki? Indlela adlalisa ngayo iqembu iyangikhonondisa. Umdlalisa kanjani uKgotso Moleko noRamahlwe Mphahlele kanyekanye ngoba badlala into efanayo? Lo mqeqeshi uxova isikimu njengoSolinas.Ngiyakhala ngokuthula kukaKaizer Motaung kube konakala. Uma iqembu engasalifuni akalidayise, kukhona laba bantu okuthiwa abalandeli abawa bevuka neqembu, badela imfudumalo nemindeni yabo bayobuka lo mbozo weChiefs. Bahamba ngemali yabo, ngezimoto zabo.IChiefs ayihlukile kula maqembu okuthiwa mancane sekwasala igama, kuvalwe iligi imi kunombolo 9 we-log. Yenza umhlola ixosha abadlali ingakapheli isizini. Impela izikhulu zeChiefs zithatha izinqumo sengathi ziqale zidlule “kwaMama uyangichaza”.Kuyaqala ukwenzeka emilandweni weChiefs ukuba kuphele amasizini amane ingawini lutho.Uma kusekhona uBobby Motaung kusazoba nje. UBobby akanandaba nabalandeli beKaizer Chiefs abawa bevuka neqembu. Lo muntu wasayinisa lolu vucu lwabadlali, akahambe nabo ngoba vele kusho ukuthi akawazi umsebenzi wakhe. NgoMgqibelo sidlala owamanqamu weNedbank eThekwini. Sowina kanjani imimoya yabadlali iphansi. Angithi abanye kuxoshwe abangani babo, selokhu kuxoshwe uPule Ekstein abadlali abathokozile bahudula izinyawo. Abaphathi abanjani abathatha izinqumo ezinje?IChiefs yayingadlalelwa noma wubani njengoba sekwenzeka nje. Abadlali abafana noBhongolwethu Jayiya, Siphosakhe Ntiya Ntiya, Gustavo Paez, Virgil Vries, Daniel Akpeyi, Teenage Hadebe abakufanele ukudlala kwiChiefs. Ijezi leChiefs liyasinda.Baningi abadlali abawuvucu okumele bahambe, kuqalwe kuthengwe abadlali, kutholwe umqeqeshi osezingeni hhayi uMiddendorp.Ngicela uSihlalo weqembu, uMotaung azibambele iqembu lakhe uBobby ayiswe kwenye indawo ngoba selokhu athatha izintambo iqembu alenzi kahle.Ngicela ikilabhu ibheke indaba ka-Itumeleng Khune, naye uphelelwe ushatini manje, uselimala njalo. Asithathe unozinti ovimbela iWits uDarren Keet azoqinisa emapalini. Lolu vucu okuthiwa luyavimba lubolekiswe, ayikho leya nto.UBruce Bvuma kuyasho akakulungele ukuvimbela ikilabhu enkulu njengeChiefs.Baba Motaung, sizwele, sukuma uzithintithe njengenkawu ethi uma iwile ivuke izithintithe.Innocent M MeyiwaEMALANGENI
title: [IMIBONO] Phakama baba Motaung uzibambele konakele

text: KUSOLWA ukuthi uyiphoyisa owesilisa ongene eNkantolo yesifunda eThekwini wavulela inganono ebulala abantu ababili ngaphambi kokuthi azame ukuzibulala  namhlanje ekuseni.Ngokwabantu abazibonele engena enkantolo kuthiwa uzethule njengephoyisa wakhipha nekhadi elimgunyaza ukuthi angene nesibhamu enkantolo.Lo wesilisa ungene kuRegional Court O wadubula owesifazane okuthiwa wayengunkosikazi wakhe nomfowabo, wabe esezidubula yena kodwa wasinda. Kubikwa ukuthi umsolwa uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela.Imithombo engaphakathi enkantolo ithe ukudutshulwa kwalaba kuhlangene nengxabano ethinta ukwehlukaniswa komshado.Udaba lusaqhubeka.
title: Iphoyisa lidubule labulala ababili enkantolo kweledivosi

text: SEKUQUBUKE indida kuvela omunye umndeni wowesifazane obekusolwa ukuthi owaseXobho, ‘ovuke ekufeni’ emuva kweminyaka engu-15 angcwatshwa.Lo mndeni wakwaDuma, KwaDumisa, eMayfield, uveza ukuthi lo wesifazane leli phephandaba elibike ngaye ngempelasonto edlule, akuyena uNksz Nomvuyo Dlamini (30) obesegcinwe eClermont, kodwa uNksz Ntombifikile Duma (41).UMnuz Maqili Duma uthi udadewabo omdala lona futhi sekunezinyanga ezimbili enyamalele ekhaya.UDuma uthi kuyinto ejwayelekile ukuthi anyamalale bamfune babuye naye kodwa aphinde ahambe ayocela amashumi edolobheni.“Usisi wami omdala, waqala ngo-2008 ukuphanjanelwa umqondo kodwa uyakwazi ekhaya ngoba noma enyamalala ubuye aqhamuke. Kulokhu bengisebenzela e-Eastern Cape ngatshelwa ukuthi uhambile ekhaya. Ngibuya manje sekuthiwa uthathwe abantu bakwaDlamini eThekwini. Sizamile ngesonto elidlule ukuyomfuna njengoba size sibuya namaphoyisa manje,” kusho uDuma.Eqhuba uDuma uthe uyabona ukuthi amalungu omndeni wakwaDlamini abesenethemba lokuthi owabo kodwa iminyaka kadedewabo ayilingani nakancane neyendodakazi yakhona eyashona.“Usisi unendodana eno-19, mdala kakhulu kunomuntu wabo. Kodwa ukubagculisa sizolinda imiphumela yolibofuzo. Angeke silwe nabo noma simbange usisi ngoba siyazi owalapha ekhaya,” kusho uDuma.Uthe abantu baseHighflats abaningi bangaba ofakazi ngoba udadewabo ukhule edayisa khona nokwenza ajwayele kakhulu kuleli dolobha.Uthintwa umndeni wakwaDlamini, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uthathiwe lo wesifazane.UMnuz Mlekeleli Dlamini uthe baxoxile nomndeni wakwaDuma futhi banelisekile ngencazelo yabo. Kodwa bagcine ngokuvumelana namaphoyisa ukuthi abuyele ngakubona lo wesifazane kuze kube kuphuma nemiphumela yolibofuzo. “Ngokwemininingwane abebenayo, bekukhombisa ukuthi uyilunga lomndeni wabo. Kuningi abasivezele kona mayelana nesimo sempilo yakhe. Akukho esesingakwenza ngoba nathi siyabona ukuthi kungenzeka kube ukufana kwabantu. Asisayikhaleli kakhulu nemiphumela yolibofuzo ngoba ukhombise nokubazi abantu ebebezomlanda. Kodwa zona izimpawu ebezisenza sibone sengathi owethu zikhona nokwenze samsukumela ngoba bese sinethemba,” kusho uDlamini.Le mindeni yomibili ilindele imiphumela yolibofuzo okuthiwa izophuma emuva kwamasonto ayisithupha.Imiphumela yolibofuzo lokuqala olenziwe umndeni wawkaDlamini kulindeleke yona iphume emuva kwamasonto awu-14.Iphoyisa elingavumelekile ukuphawula kwabezindaba, likuqinisekisile ukuthi kube nokuvumelana kwale mindeni ukuthi kuthathwe ulibofuzo. Yilona oseluzohlukanisa inhloko nesixhanti.
title: Ingwijikhwebu 'ngofe wavuka'

text: UPHROJUSA womculo weHouse kuleli, uBlack Coffee, usephinde wahlabana ngendondo yeBest Deep House. Kuthe ngoMsombuluko ebusuku kuma Ibiza DJ Awards, eSpain loDJ wahlabana ngale ndondo. UBlack Coffee nyakenye uwine indondo yeBest Breakthrough DJ kulo mcimbi, kudingeke ukuthi athumele ivideo kutwitter ebonga le award kwazise umatasa neminye imisebenzi kuleli.“Ngiyabonga kakhulu ngale ndondo, ngeshwa angikwazanga ukuba khona ngoba ngimatasa nemicimbi nezinye izinto eNingizimu Afrika. Ngibonga bonke abantu engisebenzisane nabo, ithimba labantu elingivulele iminyango ukuthi ngaziwe emhlabeni wonke, ngiyabonga.”Ubebhekene nabanye boDJ abahamba phambili emhlabeni njengamanje emnxeni wale ndondo okubalwa kubo uDuke Dumont, Sonny Fodera, Adam Port, Dixon, MK noCatz ‘N Dogz. Ama DJ Awards abanjelwa e-Ibiza eSpain minyaka yonke, kanti iwona wodwa obungaza oDJ bakuwo wonke amazwe. Le ndondo izothayisela kwinqwaba yezindondo uBlack Coffee asehlabane nazo nonyaka okubalwa eyeBET, South African Music Awards, Metro FM Music Awards. Usasethubeni lokuqoqa ezinye kumaMTV Africa Music Awards (MAMA) njengoba engene emnxeni weBest Male Artist nowe Artist of the Year. AmaMAMA azobe ebanjelwe eTickePro Dome eGoli ngo-Okthoba 29.
title: Uhlabene futhi uBlack Coffee

text: “Ngisemncane, ngisadinga ukwenza imali. Imali iyikho konke. Uyayidinga ukuze ugqoke, uyayidinga ukuze udle. Uzoyikhokhela ngani irenti,” uphendule kanje kade ebuzwa ukuthi useyakucabanga yini ukuba nomndeni.USneziey uthe konke ukuyekele ezandleni zikaNkulunkulu, yena akanawo amandla okulawula izifiso zakhe. “Kuyenzeka ufise into kanti uNkulunkulu ukuhlelele okunye.”Lo mculi usematheni kulezi zinsuku emuva kokukhipha umucu wokholo osihloko sithi Ungubaba. Uthe inhloso yakhe ngeculo ukuzama ukukhumbuza abantu ngalesi sikhathi sobhubhane, ukuthi kufanele babhekise konke kuNkulunkulu ngoba uyena isiqalo nesiphetho. “Angikaze ngimngabaze uNkulunkulu futhi angikaze ngiqhele kuye. UnguBaba kukuhle kukubi.” Uthe lo mucu ulandela ezithendeni zalowo awukhipha nyakenye ngesikhathi esemncintiswaneni wama-Idols, owawuthi Kungumusa. “Mina emculweni wami ngihlale ngikhuluma ngomusa.” Ebuzwa ukuthi angaqopha yini ngokuhlanganyela nezintokazi ayenazo kuma-Idols SA, uViggy noVirgirnia Qwabe. Uthe akukho okungavimba ngoba akananxa nabo futhi uke wacula ngokuhlanganyela nabo engomeni eqwashisa ngeCorona ethi Heal Our Land-Siyaphumelela.Laba baculi babehlanganiswe kule ngoma nguphrojusa uSipho Malembe futhi beshiyelana inkundla noHlengiwe Mhlaba, Mbuso Khoza, Malusi Mbokazi, Babo Ngcobo, Mondli Ngcobo nabanye.Kuzokhunjulwa ukuthi kwasolwa uSneziey ngokushiya kukaViggy kuma-Idols SA emuva kokuba sekukhishwe udadewabo, uVirginia ngamavoti kulo mqhudelwano.Uthe yena akazani nokwakushiwo ngaye ngoba amawele akakuqinisekisanga kanjalo nama-Idols baziqhelanisa nalesi sigameko.
title: Akawujahile umndeni usafuna imali

text: UPHITHENE amakhanda umndeni waKwaNdengezi osekuphele izinyanga ezimbili indodana yakhona, eshayela iTaxify, ingatholakali kodwa imoto eyayihamba ngayo yatholakala e-scrapyard thizeni.UNkululeko Ngidi (28) wagcina ukubonakala ngoNovemba 8 emini, okwathi uma ethintwa wangabe esatholakala ezingcingweni zakhe zontathu.Unina, uNksz Gugu Zondi, uthe akasabuthi quthu ubuthongo ecabanga ukuthi engabe ikuziphi izinkalo indodana yakhe ebinonyaka iqalile ukushayela imoto yasekhaya ebisebenza iyiTaxify.“NgoNovemba 9 ekuseni ngazama ukumshayela ucingo kodwa zase zivaliwe zontathu izingcingo zakhe. Ngabe sengishayela abenkampani ye-tracker okuyibona abangitshela ukuthi imoto ise-scrapyard esiseClairwood,” kuchaza uNksz Zondi.Ukhala ngokuthi yize imoto yatholwa lapho kodwa kawukho umkhondo ocacile ngokuthi yashonaphi indodana yakhe njengoba nomnikazi wendawo ezihlangula.“Ngokusho komphenyi wecala, umnikazi wendawo wathi kunowesilisa owayishiya imoto endaweni yakhe. Uma kushayelwa inamba yalowo wesilisa oshiwoyo, ayeyibhalisile ngesikhathi eshiya imoto, kayisabanjwa muntu,” usho kanje.UNkululeko Ngidi (28) wagcina ukubonakala ngoNovemba 8 emini, okwathi uma ethintwa wangabe esatholakala ezingcingweni zakhe zontathu.Okunye okuphinde kuvele kulolu lwazi oluncane abanalo, wukuthi ngaphambi kokuthi imoto iye e-scrapyard yaqala eSeaview, okukholakala ukuthi yikhona lapho enzakaliswa khona ngabantu noma ngumuntu owayezenza ikhasimende lakhe.“Kakufani nhlobo noNkululeko ukuhamba isikhathi eside kangaka, angashongo ukuthi uyaphi. Yingakho ngingakhululekile ngalesi simo ngoba sikhomba ngokusobala ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle,” kubalisa uNksz Zondi.Uthe into ayicelayo wukuthi noma ngubani onolwazi noma ombonayo, asize ukuze ezokwazi ukuthi kwenzekani ngendodana yakhe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa aphenya icala lomuntu odukile elavulwa esiteshini samaphoyisa saseMalvern.“Amaphoyisa asaqhubeka nokuphenya ngokuduka kukaNkululeko Ngidi njengoba engakatholakali," kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Badidekile ngendodana engatholakali

text: UFresh, sekuphele amasonto amathathu engekho kulo msakazo. Wamiswa ngemuva kokuthi omunye wabalaleli efake isikhalo kwiThe Broadcasting Complaints Commission of South Africa.Lowo mlaleli wayekhala ngokuthi uFresh ubize igama elithi msuneri neliyinhlamba ethi ms&%$ emoyeni.Kungakapheli nesonto elilodwa ehambile uFresh, abalandeli bakhe kulolu hlelo alwenza noRelebogile Mabotja bakhala ngokuthi alusanambitheki bamfuna ebuyile.Abanye baveza ukuthi abamfuni uThomas Msengana osesikhaleni sakhe.Ngemuva kwesonto elilodwa ebambile uThomas, washiya kwangena uMo Flava, osabambile namanje kulona.UVuyo Mthembu, okhulumela iSABC uthe indaba kaDJ Fresh yokubuya emsakazweni isami njengasekuqaleni njengoba engakezukubuya.“UDJ Fresh okwamanje singasho nje ukuthi usamisiwe, ngeke nami ngisho ukuthi uzobuya nini. Kodwa akukho ebengisakutsheliwe ngokubuya kwakhe,” kusho uVuyo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje kwiMetro FM nasemsakazweni uKhozi FM, uNongcebo usanda kubuya emsakazweni njengoba naye ebemisiwe emsakazweni.UNongcebo ubemiselwe ukunganaki isihambeli esasizoba nengxoxo emoyeni, okwavela ukuthi walibala iselula, okuyinto eyacika isihambeli sambika kubaphathi.Kuthe kusenjalo kulona uKhozi kwamiswa uSipho Mbatha noZimiphi “Zimdollar” Biyela.Laba basolwa ngokungena nesiphuzo estudiyo, okuvela ukuthi sachitheka saphazamisa imishini.USipho wabuya emsakazweni kodwa kuze kube manje uZimdollar akakabuyi.UVuyo uthe okwamanje uZimdollar usamisiwe futhi ngeke bakwazi ukusho ukuthi uzobuya nini njengoba lolo kuwudaba lwangaphakathi.
title: Kusemnyama kuDJ Fresh ngokubuya

text: UDIDEKILE umndeni wowesilisa owagcina ukubonakala ngo-Agasti 6 ethunywe esitolo sangakubo eNkanyezini, eMgababa.UNksz Zama Mnare, ongumakoti wakubo kwaNtokozo Cyril Mhlungu (22), uthe bakhathazekile ngokunyamalala kwakhe ngoba babemthume esitolo kodwa wangaphinde abuye.“UNtokozo ufunda * -matric eMcothoyi High. Uyingane elalelayo engakaze ihambe ingabuyi ekhaya.“Ngo-Agasti 6, ngamthuma esitolo ngamcela nokuthi angihambisele imali komunye umuzi.“Ngaxakeka engasabuyi ekhaya ngayombheka lapho engangithe ahambise khona imali kwathiwa akazange afike, nasesitolo kwathiwa akafikanga. Sididekile ukuthi washonaphi ngoba sekuphele amasonto amabili edukile,” kusho uNksz Mnare.Uthe uNtokozo udume ngegama likaTelele endaweni, uthanda ukujima nokufunda izincwadi zakhe zesikole.“Sididekile ukuthi ukuphi uNtokozo ngoba akahambanga egqoke kahle ngesikhathi simthuma, wayezigqokele ophaqa bokuhlala ekhaya.“Simbikile ukuthi udukile emaphoyiseni aseMkhomazi okwamanje abengakamtholi nawo.“Siyacela abantu basilekelele ukumfuna ngoba sikhathazekile ngaye,” kusho uNksz Mnare.UCol Thembeka Mbele, wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi babikelwa ngomuntu odukile eMkhomazi.“Amaphoyisa aseMkhomazi asafuna odukile.“Siyacela noma wubani onolwazi ngokuduka kwalo muntu ukuthi athinte amaphoyisa aseMkhomazi ku-039 973 6112 noma iCrime Stop ku-08600 10111. Udaba luphenywa nguD/SGT S Dube,” kusho uCol Mbele.
title: Kucelwa usizo konolwazi ngodukile

text: UMNYANGO weMfundo ePhakeme, iSayensi nobuChwepheshe udonse ngendlebe abazobhalisa emakolishi azimele, ukuthi babheke ukuthi awasiwona yini ombombayi. Wathi kumele babhekisise nokuthi izifundo azihlinzekayo zisemthethweni futhi zigunyaziwe wumnyango.UNgqongqoshe uDkt Blade Nzimande uxwayise ngalabo galakajane athe kunengcosana esaqhubeka nokuqola abantu ngalolu hlobo.Labo qhibukhowe bamakolishi ababhalisiwe ohlwini lwezikhungo zemfundo  emnyangweni, kwaSector Education and Training Authorities (Setas) nezinye izikhungo ezisemthethweni.UNzimande unxenxe nabazali ukuthi baqikelele ukuthi izingane zabo azizitholi seziyisulu zalobu bugebengu.“Lawa makolishi awaka futhi adukise abahlela ukuqhuba imfundo yabo emazingeni aphakeme. Enza sengathi ahlinzeka iziqu ezisemthethweni ezigunyazwe yiSouth African Qualifications Authority (SAQA),” kusho uNzimande.Uthe basebenza kanzima ngokubambisana nezinhlaka zezomthetho ukuvala amakolishi awombombayi. Nakuba ulwa nalobu bugebengu umnyango kodwa bayaqhubeka abantu ukubhalisa kuzona ekugcineni banikwe iziqu eziwombombayi.Weluleke abayobhalisa emakolishi azimele ukuthi baqale bahlole ukuthi abhaliswe ngokusemthethweni emnyangweni wakhe ngokuthi bashayele inombolo yocingo yamahhala ethi: 0800 872 222.Olunye ulwazi lungatholakala ngokuthi abantu bangene kwi-website yomnyango ethi: www.dhet.gov.za/resources/registers ngaphansi kwekhasi elithi: “Register of Private Colleges”,  lapho kunohlu lwamakolisi asemthethweni nezifundo agunyazwe wumnyango ukuba azifundise.UNzimande ugcizelele ukuthi kumele ababhalisayo emakolishi azimele bafune ubufakazi obuphathekayo, bokuthi isikhungo nezifundo esizihlinzekayo kusemthethweni.
title: UMnyango uxwayisa ngombombayi bamakolishi

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZENGESIKHATHI  izinhlangano zemidlalo zishiywa ngabaxhasi ngenxa yokuhlasela kweCovid-19 eshaye nasemkhakheni wamabhizinisi, iComrades Marathon Association (CMA)  inyelwe inyoni esandleni.ICMA ivuke ngesikhondlakhondla senkampani yokugembula iHollywoodbets yelula isivumelwano sokusebenzisana phakathi kwabo.  Umcimbi  wokwethula ngokusemthethweni abaxhasi ubuseThekwini kuleli sonto  emahhovisi ale nkampani aseMhlanga.ICMA isayine neHollywoodbets isivumelwano seminyaka emithathu.Kusukela ngo-2017,  le nkampani beyingabanye babaxhasi nokho igxile  kuhhafu webanga  lalo mjaho elaziwa ngeDrummond Halfway.Izikhulu zeHollywoodbets nezeCMA zale zaphetha ukudalula isamba semali okuzoxhaswa ngaso kule minyaka. Nokho kuvele ukuthi le nkampani isizogxila kokuningi okubalwa kuko ukwandisa isibalo sezinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo ezozixhasa.UCherly Winn ongusihlalo weCMA uthe kuyabajabulisa ukumemezela ukukhulisa ubudlelwano babo neHollywoodbets.“Selokhu kwafika iHollywoodbets iDrummond iphenduke intandokazi kubasubathi. “Ubani ongalibala ubumnandi obenzeka khona okubalwa kubo umculo uhambisana nemidanso efana nesipansula. “Kuba wubukhwebezane bodwa (echaza ngombala o-purple osetshenziswa abeHollywoodbets),” kubeka uWinn.UMorgan Shandu oyisikhulu esiphezulu kwaHollywoodbets kuzwelonke, uthe nakuba besayine iminyaka emithathu kodwa bahlela ukubuqhuba lobu budlelwano. “Kuningi esesizokwenza, ngeke kusafana nakuqala. Sizogxila ekuxhaseni emazingeni aphansi  awumgogodla weComrades. Sinethemba lokuthi le minyaka emithathu izothela imiphumela ebeka lo mjaho kwelinye izinga,” kusho uShandu.IHollywoodbets ilandela iMaxed Elite ekumemezeleni ukuqhubeka nobudlelwano bayo nabeCMA. Kulo nyaka iComrades obekumele ibe ngoJuni ayibange isabakhona njengoba bekuvalwe izwe ngenxa yeCovid-19. Umjaho obekumele usuke eMngungundlovu uyophelela eThekwini, usuzoba ngonyaka ozayo.Kuwo lo nyaka iComrades ilaxazwe iBonitas Medical Fund ebese ibe ngabaxhasi iminyaka ewu-15. Ngonyaka kubikwa ukuthi beyifaka u-R8 million.Umsebenzi wakwaCMA ongavumelekile ukukhuluma nabezindaba uveze ukuthi bakhuluma nezinkampani ezimbili, abathemba ukuzimemezela maduze.
title: Isivumelwano esisha soxhaso kwiCMA

text: ISILO samabandla uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu siyaziqhelelanisa nophenyo olwenziwa “ngoMntwana u-Ishwar Ramlutchman Mabheka Zulu” oluthinta inkohlakalo yethenda kaR95 million yokumba amanzi ngaphansi komhlaba.Izolo uMntwana uMbonisi Zulu, okhulumela indlunkulu, uthe lolu phenyo aluthinti iSilo noma indlunkulu.“Baningi abantu abasondelene neSilo futhi uma benezinkinga zabo iSilo sisuke singathinteki ndawo,” kusho uZulu.URamlutchman wanikwa isigaba sokuba “wuMntwana waseNdlunkulu” emcimbini wangonyaka odlule ngenxa yokuthi iSilo sasikhombisa ukuthi sivulelekile ekusebenzisaneni nazo zonke izizwe futhi asihambisani nokucwaswa kwabantu.Akuqali ukuthi uRamlutchman athinteke ekukhwabaniseni nasenkohlakalweni kwazise ngo-2013 walahlwa ngamacala awu-21 okukhwabanisa nenkohlakalo.OKlebe baphenya izinkontileka ezanikwa uRamlutchman ngesikhathi kunesomiso eMzinyathi.Wayezomba amanzi ngaphansi komhlaba ukusiza abantu baseNdumeni, Nquthu, Msinga nabakhele uMasipala waseMvoti.Kuthiwa imali yanyamalala umsebenzi ungenziwanga.Izolo uRamlutchman uphikile ukuthi kunenkohlakalo ayenzile.“Angikaze ngikhwabanise mali mina. Umsebenzi ngawenza futhi izinsolo nje ezenziwa ngabantu lezi,” kusho uRamlutchman.Uthe uyamangala ukuzwa ukuthi oKlebe bayamphenya ngoba abakaze bamthinte.UCaptain Simphiwe Mhlongo, okhulumela oKlebe KwaZulu-Natal, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kunecala eliphenywayo njengoba lavulwa ngonyaka odlule livulelwa uRamlutchman.IMeya yaseMzinyathi, uMnuz Mthandeni Ngubane, ithe ngeke ikwazi ukuphawula ngethenda kaRamlutchman ngoba iyaphenywa.“Kuqashwe inkampani ukuze iphenye ukuthi ama-boreholes ayasebenza. Amanye ayasebenza kodwa amanye adinga ukulungiswa futhi iGift of the Givers iyawalungisa. Siqale uhlelo lokulungisa ama-boreholes ngemali esiyithole eMnyangweni wezaManzi neNhlanzeko,” kusho uNgubane.Uthe uR95 million yimali yama-boreholes akhona nalawo adinga ukulungiswa futhi umbiko ukhombisa ukuthi akhona.
title: Isilo siyaziqhelelanisa ‘noMntwana’

text: UHEKKIE “Hexecutioner” Budler uyifanisa nekaNkosinathi Joyi impi yezicoco ezintathu ebhekwe wumhlaba wonke azoyilwa nengqwele uRyoichi Taguchi waseJapan.UBudler uzozama ukuphuca uTaguchi ibhande le-International Boxing Federation (IBF) light flyweight, ele-World Boxing Association (WBA) nele-The Ring Magazine empini ezoba se-Ota-City General Gymnasium, eJapan, kusasa.Kuzobe kungokuqala emlandweni wesibhakela ukuthi umshayisibhakela waseMzansi alwele amabhande amathathu ahlonishwayo emhlabeni.UBudler uthole leli thuba emuva kokuthi ikhona lakhe lifake isikhalo ngendlela ahlulwe ngayo nguMilan Melindo wasePhiliipines empini yebhande le-IBF nyakenye.I-IBF inqume ukuthi impi ibuyele eringini. Lokho kwenzeke uMelindo esephuciwe ibhande nguTaguchi obekade evele ephethe ele-WBA. Lokhu kuholele ekutheni i-IBF iqhathe uBudler noTaguchi.UBudler uthe ubunzima bale mpi ubufanisa neyebhande le-International Boxing Organisation (IBO) strawweight ahlula kuyona uJoyi owayengumpetha we-IBFngo-2013 e-Emperors Palace.“Lena yimpi cishe enkulu kunazo zonke empilweni yami. Ngobunzima ifana nekaJoyi, bobabili sebehlule abashayisibhakela abahlonishwayo emhlabeni. UTaguchi uhamba phambili emhlabeni okwamanje uphethe izicoco ezimbili zomhlaba futhi uphethe nebhande le-The Ring Magazine.“Yigxathu elikhulu kimina, kuzoba nzimakodwa ngiyilungele impi. Leli yithuba elikhulu empilweni yami, kufanele ngilibambe ngezandla zombili. Bekuyiphupho lami kusuka ngaqala isibhakela ukuwina ibhande le-The Ring Magazine,” kusho uBudler.Umqeqeshi wakhe uColin “Nomakanjani” Nathan, uthe bazobuya kuleli ibhokisa lakhe selisezingeni elilifanele. Ngaphambi kokufulathela iNingizimu Afrika, uBudler nekhona lakhe bavaleliswe yinhlangano yesibhakela kuleli iBoxing South Africa (BSA) esithangamini nabezindaba.“Kuhle ukwazi ukuthi iBSA iyameseka uHekkie ngoba eqinisweni sekuneminyaka eyinxusa lesibhakela e-Afrika, hhayi eNingizimu Afrika kuphela. Sisalelwe yimpi eyodwa sifinyelele lapho uHekkie afanelwe wukuba khona.“Ngikholwa wukuthi uTaguchi uzomangazwa wumshayisibhakela onenhliziyo, ukusebenza kanzima kwase-Afrika kuhlanganiswe nokwaseJapan. Ngicabanga ukuthi lena yimbangi enesigqi kunazo zonke uHekkie azobhekana nayo ngenxa yamabhande abangwayo futhi kungokokuqala ibhokisa laseMzansi lilwela izicoco ezintathu empini eyodwa,”“UTaguchi usezingeni eliphezulu kodwa ngibubonile ubuthaka kuyena.“Ngiyazi ukuthi uHekkie engamhlula, inqobo nje uma esefomini. Uhlakaniphile futhi uyakwazi ukuvika. Uma engaletha lokho eringini, angingabazi ukuthi sizojabhisa izihlwele.”
title: OwaseMzansi nomqansa wempi yezicoco ezintathu

text: UMGADLI weKaizer Chiefs, uSamir Nurkovic, ufuna bengabe besawudedela umgqigqo abahamba ngawo obasuse ngasemsileni we-log yeDStv Premiership.UNurkovic ubuye ekulimaleni washayela Amakhosi igoli awine ngalo ehlula AmaZulu  ngo-1-0 ngesonto eledlule. Amaphuzu amathathu abuyise ukuzethemba kubadlali beChiefs. Lokhu kuhlale obala behlula iCape Town City ngo-2-1 ngempelasonto okuholele ekutheni iChiefs ixebuke emshungwini wamaqembu asengozini yezembe. Ngokuwina le midlalo, inyukele endaweni yesishiyagalombili."Emidlalweni edlule sibhekene neCape Town City naMaZulu, iqembu lisebenze kanzima. Ngeke siliphose ithawula. Kufanele sisebenzise lo mgqigqo ukuqhubekela phambili, sibhekane nomdlalo ngamunye. Kufanele senze konke okusemandleni ukuzuza lokhu esikufunayo," kusho uNurkovic.Lo mgadli waseSerbia akazange ayiqale isizini neChiefs ngenxa yokulimala. Ngesizini edlule uqede isizini ehamba phambili ngamagoli kuMakhosi eyishayela awu-14. Ukungabibikho kwakhe kugqamile, iChiefs ihluleka wukushaya amagoli emidlalweni edlule.Namuhla ngo-5 ntambama eFNB Stadium, eNasrec, Amakhosi azobhekana neTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) emdlalweni weligi. I-TTM selokhu iqalile ukudlala kwiPremiership yenganyelwe yizinkinga okukhona kuzona ukungaholelwa kwabadlali. Lokhu kwenze abanye bajokole, bayozama amadlelo aluhlaza kwamanye amaqembu. Abanye kubikwa ukuthi sebenqume ukungazihlanganisi neqembu baze bakhokhelwe okungokwabo."Asinaso ngempela isikhathi sokubheka amanye amaqembu. Kufanele sigxile kithina nasendleleni esidlala ngayo. Kufanele siqhubeke nomoya omuhle wokulwa okuyinto esiyinike abalandeli emidlalweni emibili edlule. Kufanele siqhubeke nomgqigqo, sibheke phambili. Angicabangi ngeqembu esizodlala nalo (TTM), bengicabanga ngathi nezindawo okufanele sizilungise ukuze senze kangcono emidlalweni ezayo," kusho uNurkovic. I-TTM esawine kanye emidlalweni engu-11, isendaweni ka-15 ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili.
title: UNurkovic ufuna iChiefs ingabe isabheka emuva

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANESEKUNOKUNGENAMI ngezindleko zeSilo samabandla wonke eMnyangweni wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu ezidalwa ukuhamba kwaso namakhosikazi aso namabutho, okugcina kudla imali eningi uma simenywe emicimbini kahulumeni.Lokhu kugqame ngesikhathi kunekomiti lezindaba zaseNdlunkulu esiShayamthetho lapho uSihlalo wekomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwalo mnyango, uNkk Nonzwakazi Swartbooi, ebekhononda ngokuthi ngubani ngempela okumele athwale izindleko ngoba uMnyango wakhe awusenamali.“Ngifisa ukwazi ukuthi ngempela ubani okumele akhokhe izindleko zeSilo namabutho, noNdlunkulu nezintombi uma beze emicimbini? Ngikusho lokhu ngoba ngesikhathi kuvulwa isiShayamthetho kwagcina sekuyizimoto zakwaCogta (uMnyango wezokuBusa nokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu), ezazehla zenyuka ekubeni umcimbi wawusingethwe yisiShayamthetho. Le nto iyakhathaza ngempela ngoba thina eMnyangweni wethu asisenayo imali ngakho le nto iyizindleko. Ngiyafisa icaciswe ngoba yizindleko eziningi lezi engikhuluma ngazo,” kusho uNkk Swartbooi.Uveze nokuthi kuneminyango okuthi uma imeme iSilo bese konke ikubeka emnyangweni wakhe ukuba kube yiwo othwala izindleko zeSilo.Umqondisi wesiFundazwe osabambile, uMnuz Frikkie Brooks, uthe izindleko ezithinta ukuhamba kweSilo nezindawo zokulala kusuke kubhekene neHhovisi likaNdunankulu.“Umnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana yiwo obhekele indaba yokugcotshwa kwamakhosi nalapho kufanele amabutho abekhona naso iSilo noNdlunkulu.“Okubalulekile lapho wukuthi iHhovisi likaNdunankulu libhekana nezindleko zeSilo kodwa konke okunye kuba izindleko zoMnyango osuke unomcimbi,” kuchaza uBrooks.Okunye okuvelile kube wudaba lokuthi abashayeli bezimoto zeSilo okuthiwa abavumelekile ukulala ezigodlweni zeNgonyama kwaNongoma kumele noma ngabe bebeyekude kangakanani bafike babeke iSilo eZululand bese bebuya bezopaka izimoto eMgungundlovu.UMnuz Blessed Gwala, wekomiti laseNdlunkulu esiShayamathetho, ubuze ukuthi kungani lokhu kwenzeka ngoba laba bantu bagcina behamba amakhilomitha angu-500 ashaya iphakethe labakhokhi bentela.Uthe lokhu kwenzeka ngoba la makhilomitha awabalwa ohambeni lweSilo ngoba abashayeli basuke besuke eMgungundlovu bayosilanda kwaNongoma bese beqala ukubala uma bephuma esigodlweni.Izikhulu zeHhovisi likaNdunankulu ziveze ukuthi nakuba ungekho umthetho ovimba ukuba izimoto zilale kwaNongoma kodwa bakubeka kwaba umgomo ukuthi uma iSilo sesibuyile lapho besiye khona kumele izimoto zizopaka eMgungundlovu ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuphepha kwazo.Kuvela nokuthi abashayeli bazo bagcina behamba amahora angaphezulu kangu-24.Khonamanjalo uNdunankulu Senzo Mchunu ucacise ngokuthengwa kwamaMercedes Benz ayisikhombisa oNdlunkulu beSilo kuhlanganisa nonina waso uMaZungu. Uthe bakwenze lokhu ngoba bevala indaba yokuqashwa kwezimoto obekudla izigidi kuhulumeni.ISilo sona sithengelwe iMercedes Benz S500 ebiza ngaphezulu kwesigidi samarandi ngonyaka odlule.
title: Umnyango ukhala ngezindleko zeSilo

text: USOLA isiteshi uMzansi Magic nenkampani ekhiqiza uhlelo iOur Perfect Wedding, iConnect TV, owesifazane waseManguzi, ochashwe ngenhlamba ngemuva kokuvela kulolu hlelo enxusa umkhwenyana ukuthi athengele umakoti isiqholo esizomenza anuke kahle.Lona wesifazane ogama lakhe uMavuyi Vuyi kuFacebook kodwa kulolu hlelo ubizwe ngoPromise Sithole, ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokuchashwa ngenhlamba abesifazane ekhasini elaziwa ngokuthi iLadies House enkundleni yokuxhumana uFacebook.Ubekhuluma emshadweni kaNonkululeko noNjabulo Mkhumbuzi obekukhonjiswa umshado ngeSonto.Kusuka ngeSonto ngemuva kwalolu hlelo inkulumo kaMavuyi idine abaningi njengoba athi kuyashisa ngakho kudingeka umakoti anuke kamnandi.NgoLwesibili ngemuva kokuthola igama lalona wesifazane iningi limthelekele limbuza ukuthi kungani athunaza isithunzi somunye umuntu wesifazane.Eziphendulela khona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana uthe, ababesemshadweni bayazi ukuthi wayethini.“Babehleka umakoti nomkhwenyana ngesikhathi ngisho le nto kodwa kulolu hlelo babaveza sengathi badiniwe ukuze kudonseke amehlo abaningi futhi kube nokukhuluma. Kule nkulumo yami basusa okuningi bagqamisa lokhu okuvelile,” kubhala lona wesifazane.Uthe izinhlelo zethelevishini ziyathanda ukunonga izinto ukuze zihehe zisuse nomsindo.AbeMzansi Magic abayiphendulanga imiyalezo abathunyelelwe yona nge e-mail nemiqhafazo yileli phephandaba.
title: Uchashwe ngenhlamba ocelele umakoti isiqholo kwi-OPW

text: UPHASE ngamalengiso umfundi omncane kunabo bonke obenza U-matric nyakenye KwaZulu-Natal njengoba edabule o-A abayisithupha ezifundweni eziyisikhombisa abezenza.USandile Nduduzo Kunene (15) waseMondlo, eVyrheid, obefunda e-Isolomuzi Secondary udabule o-A kwiPhysical Science, Life Science, Maths, Life Orientation, IsiZulu ne-English. Uthe uqale ukuthanda ukufunda esemncane njengoba eqale uGrade R eneminyaka emithathu, wadlulela kwaGrade 1 eneminyaka emine.Nakuba othisha babemanqika ukumthatha kodwa ngemuva kokuthola incwadi evela enkulisa etshengisayo ukuthi uyakwazi ukufunda bamamukela.“Ngashesha ngaqala ukuhamba nginezinyanga eziyishagalombili. Izinto zami kuthiwa zonke zashesha zenzeka ngisemncane, angikaze ngiphinde ikilasi selokhu ngaqala ukufunda,” kusho uSandile.Imininingwane yomnyango wezemfundo esifundazweni iveza ukuthi uzalwe ngoJuni 18, 2002.Uyise uMnuz Nxeba Kunene, uthe samangaza isiphiwo esisenganeni yakhe.“Ngangiqala ukubona into enje. Waqala ukukhuluma into eyomile enezinyanga eziyishagalombili. Uhlakaniphile enjalo ngoba ufundisa ozakwabo i-maths. Kunezinye izingane ezize zazolala lapha ekhaya kuzobhalwa ukuze azifundise,” kusho uKunene.Uthe babemanqika ukumthatha esikoleni ngoba bethi muncane kodwa ngemuva kokubona iripoti yasenkulisa bamthatha.“Uyasimangaza nje. Ungumuntu othanda ukufunda, uze alale ephethe incwadi.”USandile uthe ufuna ukwenza iziqu zobudokotela enyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal.“Bangithathile sebelinde imiphumela yakwamatric. Ngingowesibili ekhaya, umfowethu omdala waqeda umatric ena-17 (okuyiminyaka abafundi abaphothula ngawo leli banga) kumanje wenza iziqu zobuchwepheshe e-TUT,” kusho uSandile.Lo mfundi obhalisele ukwenza iziqu zobudokotela enyuvesiyase-UKZN.
title: Ubelala egone incwadi oqede ena-15

text: KUSOLWA ukuthi belishela ibhungu eliboshelwe ukubulala owesifazane waKwaMashu isidumbu sakhe esitholwe sifihlwe ngaphansi kwesihlahla emzini abehlala kuwo ngoMgqibelo.Ibhungu (19) elihlala eduze nalapho kuhlala khona uNksz Cindy Bailey (40) oshonile kuthiwa liqale ukumlandela ngesikhathi ephuza nabangani bakhe esipotini.Omunye wabangani bakamufi obekhona kodwa ongathandanga ukudalulwa igama lakhe uthe ibhungu liqale ukusondela kumufi besesipotini.“Ubelokhu emthintathinta kodwa anginakanga ngoba lo mfana mncane thina sibadala. Siphelelwe ideshi entathakusa ngoMgqibelo. Saphuma sayoyithenga kwenye indawo ekwaK, sihamba ngezinyawo ngoba kuseduze,” kusho yena.Sebebuya, umufi kuthiwa uthe usaya endlini uyobheka izingane zakhe.“Sahlukana eyobheka izingane. Wahamba isikhathi eside engasabuyi. Silandelile saya endlini sayobheka ukuthi kwenze njani. Sifike endlini obegade izingane wathi uCindy ufike wangqongqoza kodwa wangamuzwa, kwezwa ingane yakhe ebikwelinye ikamelo. Ithe iyalunguza yambona ehleli phansi. Esahleli kanjalo kwaqhamuka umuntu engamazi wamhudula wayosithela naye,” kusho yena.Obegade izingane uthe uphumile wayobheka wangaboni muntu, wabuyela endlini, walala.“Nathi silandelile saya kubo kwebhungu ngoba ingane ichaze ukuthi lowo muntu ubegqokeni. Umfowabo ulilandulile wathi alikabuyi, sabuyela esipotini sizitshela ukuthi mhlawumbe uhambe nesoka lakhe,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi umufi waqala ukuphuza ngoLwesine ephuma kohola imali yeqolo esiteshini.Wabuya esiteshini ehamba nabanye abantu besilisa ababethenge utshwala kwaphuzwa.Uthe kabasebenzi kodwa baziphilisa ngokuwashela amadoda abathengela utshwala abanike nemali. “Siqale ukukhathazeka uma sibona kuze kushaya * -11 ekuseni ngoMgqibelo, engabuyi. Sabuyela kubo kwesesheli. Umfowabo uthe sikhona silele kodwa umufi akekho. Isidumbu sakhe sitholwe nguye umfowabo esihlahleni esisegcekeni.”Unina omncane kamufi, uNkk Thabile Maphanga, uthe bashaqekile ngokwenzeke kumufi.“Besazi ukuthi uyaphuza kodwa besingalindele ukuthi impilo yakhe ingaphela kanjena. Ushiye izingane ezimbili. Eneminyaka emibili ilokhu ikhala imbuza asazi nokuthi sizothini,”UColonel Thembeka Mbele, okhulumela amaphoyisa, uthe kuboshwe owesilisa oneminyaka ewu-19 ngecala lokubulala owesifazane oneminyaka ewu-40.Uthe isidumbu sikamufi besigxishwe izingubo emlo­nyeni, kusazohlolwa ukuthi akadlwengulwanga yini. Ibhungu lizovela enkantolo yeMatshi eNtuzuma maduze.
title: Isesheli (19) 'sibulale' ona-40 kuphuzwa

text: MHLELI: Njengomlaleli nomthandi webhola lezinyawo, olandela elinye lamaqembu asesifundazweni, iGauteng, ngivumele ngibongele iqembu likaManzini. Empeleni le njinga yasesifundazweni sethu ifike kwezwakala. UZungu wathi ethatha izintambo kuSokhele, wabekela umqeqeshi umgomo wokuthi udinga Usuthu lube kunamba 4.Kube sekuhlangana nenkulumo kaBenni eyathi uzoqoqa bonke laba balandeli baseKZN abeseka amaqembu aseGauteng amakhulu ukuba bafudukele oSuthwini. Akuphelanga sikhathi esitheni, kwenzekile lokho njengoba sibone abantu abadumile sebejoyine Usuthu njengoDJ Tira noSgqemeza. Bonke laba sebefudukele kulo Usuthu ekubeni bebehamba neKhosination phambilini. Okungenze ngabhala kwelakho yingoba ningabantu enilwaziyo udaba lwalabo saziyo. Ngibafisela okuhle kodwa abafana bakaZungu uma sebeyodlala e-Africa kwiCAF. Lokhu kuyingqophamlando ukubona iqembu lakithi lidlala kwiCAF. Ngingomunye osezifela ngebhola elidlalwa Usuthu futhi ngibona ukuthi mhla kwavulwa ukungena kwabalandeli enkundleni, kuyoba yizimpethuzendlovu abalandeli befuna ukubuka Usuthu bukhoma.KHABZELA KB MZIMELA EZWELIBOMVU
title: Kuya ngamagama enkehli oSuthwini

text: UYAVEVA owesifazane obetolikela abantu abangakhulumi enkonzweni yokufihla umculi uSfiso Ncwane, ebisezinkundleni zemidlalo iMoses Mabhida, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo. UDkt Thuli Nhlapho ugxekwe kakhulu ngendlela abetolika ngayo.UDkt Nhlapho ubenikezwe ithuba lokuba utolika kulo mngcwabo obuvezwa eziteshini eziningi zethelevishini.Uthe abamgxekayo mabahambe bayofundela ukutolika ngoba konke abekutolika bekuyikhona.Umsindo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana usuke ngesikhathi uDkt Nhlapho etolika inkulumo yomlingisi uMenzi Ngubane obechaza ukuthi wathola ukuthi uNcwane ushonile eshutha kuSibaya. Echaza le nkulumo ngezandla uDkt Nhlapho wavele wakhomba iminwe esho eyimisa sengathi uyadubula.“Ungabuza noma ubani okufundele ukutolika ngezandla ukuthi indlela yokukhombisa ukushutha siyenza kanjani. Okwesibhamu kukodwa nokokushutha uma sichaza amakhamera nakho kukodwa,” kuchaza uDkt Nhlapho.Uthe ngemuva komngcwabo uhambile waya esikoleni akade efunda kuso eHillcrest, iFullteen wafike wabuza ukuthi babone kanjani.“Umuntu uma ebona ukuthi senze amaphutha akasikhulise angasigxeki ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba kwenzeka. Yimbi le nto eyenziwa abantu bakuleli,” kuchaza yena.Uthe yena lo msebenzi uhlala ewenza masonto onke njengoba esiza abantu abangakwazi ukukhuluma abasonta eThekwini Community Church (ECC) okuyibandla eliholwa nguMfundisi uVusi Dube.Ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi kwabona laba abasiza ngokubatolikela masonto onke ukube ikhona into abangayizwa ngabe bayasho.Abebekhala ngalo tolika okunye abakuhlabile ngaye wukuthi ubeze atolike amaculo abeculwa kulo mngcwabo okuyinto engavamile ukwenzeka.UDkt Nhlapho uthe kulula kakhulu ukutolika amaculo okholo ngoba izinhlamvu zakhona azisheshi.Umqondisi weDeaf SA KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Odette Swift, uthe ngemuva kokubona kugxekwa uNhlapho kuTwitter, ube esezinika ithuba lokubuka lonke uhlelo lomngcwabo kuYouTube."Akukho engikubonile okungalungile, ngibe sengiphuthuma la abekhuluma khona ngokushutha njengoba ngasibona isithombe, ayikho indlela abengachaza ngayokushutha kodwa sisebenzisa yona leya ayenzile,” kuchaza uNksz Swift.Uthe ukuba bekukhona akwenzile okuphambene bebezohlala naye phansi bakhulume bambonise.
title: Udinwe abamgxekayo obetolika kokaNcwane

text: UBESABISE ngokubulala unina wengane (3) yakhe bese ezibulala naye owesilisa waseMlaza osolwa ngokubhokoda unina wengane yakhe amanxeba angu-12 washona.Kuthiwa uNksz Philile Mbongo (26) ubekubo endlini eMlaza kwa-L ngesikhathi kufika uyise wengane yakhe emshaya emuva kokuthi bebe nokuhilizisana ngamazwi.Umalumekazi wakhe, uNkk Nompumelelo Mbele (38), uthe ubegeza ngesikhathi ezwa uNksz Mbongo ekhala.“Ngiphume ngokushesha ngithi ngiyobheka ukuthi kwenzekani ngamfica emshaya. Ngithe uma ngibuza ukuthi umshayelani wavele wakhipha ummese wamgwaza kathathu engalweni. Ngiphume ngabaleka ngiyomemeza abanye kodwa safica umsolwa engasekho esebalekile. UPhilile ubelele phansi engasakwazi ukunyakaza enamanxeba engalweni namanye ngasenhliziyweni,” kuchaza uNksz Mbele.Uthe ngaphambi kokuthi umsolwa afike, ubeke wakhuluma noNksz Mbongo ocingweni - bexabana.Uthe uNksz Mbongo umtshele ukuthi ubezwa sengathi uyahamba ngesikhathi bekhuluma naye ocingweni okungangokuthi umbuzile ukuthi akasoli yini ukuthi uza kuyena.“Le nto yenzeka nje uPhilile ubevakashele yena umsolwa esuka eMzinto kodwa umsolwa wamshaya waze wamklinya wase ebaleka eza la ekhaya. Uye nasemaphoyiseni wayothola i-protection order emvimbela ukuthi asondele kuyena, esho nokuthi akasamdingi empilweni yakhe. Umsolwa ube esemsongela wathi uzombulala bese ezibulala naye. Ubevele evamile ukuthi amshaye kodwa uPhilile amxolele,” kusho uNkk Mbele.Uthe naye uhlalele ovalweni njengoba umsolwa esagcwele amathafa ngoba lesi sigameko senzeke phambi kwakhe nezingane ezincane okukhona kuzo nengane kaNksz Mbongo nomsolwa.UNksz Philile Mbongo ‘obhokodwe’ nguyise wengane yakhe ngommese washonaUmzala kaNksz Mbongo, uMnuz Khulekani Mzobe, uthe babuhlungu ngokubulawa kwakhe ngesihluku esingaka. Uthe umsolwa njengoba egcwele amathafa nje ubeke washaya ucingo emuva kwalesi sigameko wathi ufuna ukukhulunyiswa nengane yakhe ukuze asho amagama akhe okugcina kuyona kodwa wangakhulunyiswa nayo. UMzobe uthe sebebeke amathemba abo emaphoyiseni kodwa abafisi ukubona umsolwa ezulazula phambi kwabo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala emuva kokushona kowesifazane okusolakala ukuthi ugwazwe umsolwa owaziwayo. Uthe lona wesifazane ugwazwe amanxeba amaningi kwesingenhla washonela khona endaweni yesigameko.
title: Ubhokode unina wengane ka-12 obaliwa
