text: Sithembiso Mkhize IBAFANA Bafana ishaywe umqeqeshi uMolefi Ntseki wakhala ngokuthi ulinyalelwa nguLyle Foster umdlalo usanda kuqala.Ithole induku ka 2-1 emdlalweni wobungani obuseRoyal Bafokeng Stadium, eRustenburg, izolo ntambama.EzikaNtseki bezidlala kowesibili wobungani, owokuqala ubungoLwesine ezibambane kuwo ngo 1-1 neNamibia.Imidlalo ibinikeza uNtseki ithuba lokuhlanganisa kahle isikimu sakhe ngaphambi kwemidlalo emqoka yokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) iBafana ezoyidlala neSao Tome and Principe ngoNovemba. Kodwa imiphumela nendlela iBafana edlale ngayo ikhombisa ukuthi umsemkhulu umsebenzi ohlalele umqeqeshi othathe izintambo kuStuart Baxter.Amanye amaqembu eseqoqweni neBafana kweyokuhlunga yiGhana neSudan.“Ukulimala kukaFoster uqala ngakho kodwa umdlalo kuzibulale kwaziqeda izinhlelo zethu. Okuningi besikwakhele phezu kwakhe. Okunye okusibulele kube wukulahla kwethu ibhola kalula. Ingiphoxile nendlela izitobha zami ezidlale nayo. Kazitshengisanga ukuthi zisezingeni eliphezulu,” kusho uNtseki kwiSABC emuva komdlalo.UFoster ulinyazwe kanzima nguBenson Sakala waphuma ngohlaka, indawo yakhe yathathwa uKeagan Dolly.Emdlalweni wayizolo, amagoli eChipolopolo, ecijwa uMilutin Sredojevic, obeqeqesha i-Orlando Pirates, ashaywe ngabadlali abebesuka ebhentshini esiwombeni sesibili, uKelvin Kapumbu ngomzuzu ka-77 noChainza Zulu ngoka-81.YiBafana eyibone kuqala imbobo yepali ngegoli likaDolly ngemuva kobuchwepheshe bephasi kaPercy Tau obelokhu engqongqozile emapalini ezitha.IBafana ishaywe isibophele uTau, Themba Zwane noThulani Hlatshwayo abebesebhentshini emdlalweni neNamibia. Kusize unozinti weZambia uSebastian Mwenga, uTau ethi uyibeka phakathi i-free kick.Ngemuva kwalokhu ezikaMicho bezingena zingenile ebhokisini leBafana kubhoke abadlali uFashion Sakala noLubambo Musonda.UTau ubuyile wacishe walibeka phakathi ekhahlela engaphandle kwebhokisi inguzunga yeshodi echithwe unozinti. Emuva kwalokhu ubengasapheli ebhokisini lezitha nokho kugqame ukungalekelelwa wozokwabo. Kucishwe kwayiwa esiwombeni sesibili iChipolopolo ihamba phambili emuva kwephutha elenziwe yizitobha zeBafana, kwasiza isigxobo sepali.
title: UNtseki ukhale ngokulimala kukaFoster iBafana ishaywa

text: UKUFAKA iChelsea FC emaqenjini amane azomela i-English Premier League (EPL) kwi-Uefa Champions League ngo-20202/2021 kube wumsebenzi owanele ukuphosa uFrank Lampard embangweni womqeqeshi ovelele kule ligi ngesizini esongiwe.EzikaLampard ziqede endaweni yesine ngemuva kweManchester United, ebashiye ngamagoli kodwa belingana ngamaphuzu angu-66.EzikaLampard ziguqe ngo 2-1 komkhaya, i-Arsenal, kowamanqamu eFA Cup eWembley Stadium ngempelasonto eyedlule.Bekuyisizini yakhe yokuqala uLampard eqeqesha kwiPremier League kanti ubanga nezinsephe kuJurgen Klopp weLiverpool FC, Brendan Rodgers weLeicester City noChris Wilder weSheffield United.Wumlando ongeke ugqwale oqoshwe nguKlopp ehola iLiverpool igqiba ishobolo leminyaka engu-30 isizwa ngedaba isicoco seligi.URodgers kwale kancane afake iLeicester kwiChampions League kodwa ike yadlala imidlalo eminingi iyizwa ngendaba induku.UWilder nokho ubonwa abaningi njengengozi kulo mqhele ngenxa yendlela iqembu lakhe elidlale kahle ngayo ngesizini yalo yokuqala kwiPremier League.EzikaWilder ziqede endaweni yesishiyagalolunye nokuyinto eyivela kancane eqenjini elisuka kwiChampionship.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi iNorwich City abanyuke nayo igcine idliwe yizembe kanti i-Aston Villa isinde ngokulambisa.
title: ULampard noRodgers kowomqeqeshi ovelele

text: NKOSIKHONA CELEUKHUNGATHEKILE umndeni waKwaZulu, eMbhedule, eKlaarwater, entshonalanga yeTheku oxoshwa yintombi eyayijola nendodana yawo, emzini owakhiwa ngezithuthuku zendodana.UNksz Lungile Zulu, uthe akasazi ukuthi benzeni njengoba intombi kaSfiso Zulu, okungomfowabo omdala, odlule emhlabeni ngo-2019, ithe mabaphume emzini wowayeyisoka layo.Iphethe nencwadi yenkantolo eyigunyazayo.“Asisazi ukuthi kumele senze njani. Le ntombazane kayidlali, isize yasinqumela ugwayi katiki. Ithi uma singaphumi kulo muzi sizophuma kabuhlungu. Okusixakayo wukuthi ulithathaphi ilungelo lokuba asixoshe emzini owakhiwa ngumfowethu. Okusixakayo wukuthi babejola nje babengashadile futhi engalotsholiwe.”Eqhuba uNksz Zulu uthe okuyikhona osekubasanganisa kakhulu wukuthi ngomhla ka-17 ku-Okthoba, intombi ifike nencwadi ebinesigxivizo sekhansela.Uthi incwadi ibikubeka ngokusobala ukuthi umuzi ngowentombi. “Le ncwadi namanje siyazibuza ukuthi le ntombazane ikwaze kanjani ukuyenza. Phela lo muzi kuyaziwa ukuthi ngokaSfiso. Ukuthi iyithole kanjani eKhanseleni incwadi enjena, cishe yilona ikhansela elinezimpendulo."UNksz Zulu uthe ngesikhathi intombi iqala ibaxosha, lolu daba baluyisa kulona ikhansela, uMnuz Khehla Khwela, waku-ward 17, khona eKlaarwater.Uthe ikhansela lahlala phansi nabo, labanxusa ukuthi mabaphindele ekhaya bahlale phansi bathole isixazululo odabeni. Uthe laze lathi kakukuhle ukubona umndeni uxabana wodwa.Gwiqiqi, ikhansela labashintshela. Manje libashayele ucingo libanikeza isikhathi esingangenyanga. Libatshele ukuthi mabaphume kuleya ndlu. Uthe lize labatshela ukuthi uma beqhubeka begoloza ukuphuma endlini  bazowukhomba umuzi onotshwala.“Ikhansela selishintshile manje. Ekuqaleni lalikade likhuluma kahle kabi. Manje sisola sengathi selihlangene nayo intombi,” kubalisa uNksz Zulu. IKhansela uKhwela lithe kalilwazi udaba okukhulunywa ngalo. Libuye lashaya ungqimphothwe, lathi: “Mhlawumbe intombi leyo okhuluma ngayo yayinencwadi yenkantolo eyinikeza ilungelo lendlu ngokugcwele.”Lithe kodwa ngeke lize libenawo amaningi ngenxa yokuthi likholwa wukuthi konke okuphakathi kwabahlali baseKlaarwater nekhansela kumele kugcinwe kuyimfihlo, kungasakazwa emaphepheni.ISolezwe likhulume nayo, intombi evumile ukuthi iyabaxosha abakwaZulu endlini. Ithe inencwadi yasenkantolo eyigunyaza ukuba ibakhiphe endlini. Ithe indlu yakhiwa yindoda yayo, ababe nabantwana abayisihlanu nayo.“USfiso le ndlu wayishiya nami. Bona bacabanga ukuthi abantwana bami bazohlala kuphi? Futhi bayangixaka ngoba ngesikhathi le ndlu uSfiso eyakha bona babeduke nezwe, beziganisile,” isho kanje. Ithe incwadi yayithola enkantolo, ibhalwe ukuthi: Letters of Authority.Uthe unelungelo lokuthi yena nezingane zakhe babe nophahla abakhosela kulo ngisho wayengashadanga nomufi.Uqweqwe lommeli, uMnuz Bhekinkosi Nkosi, luvumelane nowesifazane, lwathi uhlobo lwencwadi enalo luyayigunyaza ukuthi ngempela kumele ingene nezingane zayo kulowo muzi. Kodwa mayelana nokukhipha umndeni, uthe kumele umndeni uhlale phansi uludingide udaba ukuze kungabi khona ogcina entunta nendishi.
title: Intombi ixosha umndeni endlini yesoka

text: KUSOLWA ingxabano esuke endaweni yokucima ukoma ngokubulawa komlisa wasehostela laseMlaza, iGlebelands.Kuthiwa lo mlisa ohlala eBlock 48 ezitezi ezindala udutshulwe amahlandla ayisishiyagalolunye endaweni yokucima ukoma eChiefs Tavern eduze kwaseReunion ngezikhathi zasekuseni ngeSonto.Umhlali wakuleli hostela ocele ukuthi igama lakhe ligodlwe uthe udutshulwe yilo mlisa emuva kokuthi bexabene. Uthe umgilwa nomsolwa bebehlala ezitezi ezindala bobabili.“Akwaziwa kahle ukuthi yini abayibangile kodwa kube nengxabano phakathi kwabo wase emdubula. Abanye abantu bathi bazwe kuqhuma isibhamu kaningi babona sekuphuma abantu bebaleka nomsolwa ubalekile,” kusho lo mhlali.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Col Thulani Zwane ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala.“Kukholakala ukuthi umsolwa nomgilwa bebephuza endaweni yokucima ukoma ngesikhathi kusuka ingxabano. Ngokusho kwabantu abebekhona endaweni yokucima ukoma bobabili baqhubekile baxabana ngaphandle. Bezwe kuqhuma isibhamu baphuma bathola umufi eselele phansi eseshonile. Umsolwa ubalekile,” kusho uZwane.Uthe usagcwele amathafa kodwa kulindeleke ukuthi aboshwe maduze.Kwenzeka lesi sigameko nje kusanda kudutshulwa itekisi yelinye ilungu lomphakathi ipake ngaphandle ehostela. Kuthiwa umnikazi wetekisi ohlala eBlock R uvuke itekisi yakhe imbobombobo ekuseni ngoLwesine oludlule.Kulesi sigameko akulimalanga muntu. UZwane uthe amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokulimaza impahla.Isishoshovu esilwela amalungelo abantu, uNkk Vanessa Burger sizwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokungakhanyi kukagesi okhanyisa emgwaqweni ehostela.
title: Kusolwa ingxabano esuke ethaveni ngobulewe

text: IBLACK Leopards iyinyomfe ekugcineni inikela ngawo wonke amaphuzu kwiSuperSport United emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ophele zibambene eFNB Stadium ngoLwesibili ebusuku.Igoli eliholele ekutheni iLeopards iphume ingaphethe lutho enkundleni lishaywe nguGhampani Lungu sekusele umzuzu kuphele umdlalo.ILeopards ingene enkundleni ibheke ukuthola amaphuzu azokwenza ithole intuba yokuphefumula ngokuxebuka kancane emshungwini ovika izembe ngasemsileni we-log yePremiership okukhona kuwona omakhelwane bayo iBaroka, AmaZulu nePolokwane City.ISuperSport kade idinga ukuwina ukuze izobuyela endaweni yesithathu kwi-log njengoba isemkhankasweni wokuyodlala emqhudelwaneni iCAF Confederation Cup ngesizini ezayo.Esiwombeni sokuqala iSuperSport iyona eyakhe amathuba amaningi okushaya amagoli, ikakhulukazi umgadli uBradley Grobler ohluleke esebhekene nonozinti uKing Ndlovu ngomzuzu ka-11. UGrobler, onamagoli angu-13, ngomunye wabagadli abasembangweni oshubile womkomelo iLesley Manyathela Golden Boot Award. Kulesi siwombe lilodwa kuphela ithuba elicacile eliwele iLeopards ngebhola elishaywe nguMwape Musonda kodwa walivimba unozinti uRonwen Williams.Esiwombeni sesibili, uGrobler uphinde wathola ithuba lokushaya igoli lika-14 ngesikhathi unompempe ebeka iphenathi ngomzuzu ka-73 kodwa wayivimba uNdlovu. Nokho ligcine limdlile ngomzuzu ka-89 emuva kokuthi evimbe ibhola lawela kuLungu, walivalela phakathi. Emuva kwalokho uNdlovu uphume eselimele, indawo yakhe yathathwa nguJonas Mendes esikhathini esengezwe unompempe. NgoMgqibelo iSuperSport izobhekana ne-Orlando Pirates. ILeopards izovakashela AmaZulu eLucas Moripe Stadium ngo-1.30 emini. ILOG YE-ABSA PREMIERSHIPAmaqembuPWDLFAPtsChiefs261655462453Sundowns261484362150SuperSport271386382247Wits261295281945Pirates2711106362843Maritzburg2710116272241CPT City27999353536Highlands278109283334Stellenbosch279711243134Celtic26899393733Arrows278910223033Chippa277911162430Leopards277515264026Baroka276714162325AmaZulu276714173125Polokwane277317243824Imidlalo ye-Absa PremiershipKusasa - Ngo-3.30pm: Bloemfontein Celtic v Bidvest Wits (Absa Tuks Stadium).Ngo-6pm: Kaizer Chiefs v Mamelodi Sundowns (Orlando Stadium).NgoLwesihlanu - Ngo-6pm: Stellenbosch v Chippa United (Absa Tuks Stadium).
title: ILeopards inikele ngamaphuzu ekugcineni

text: SEBEZWAKALISE ukunengeka abathandi bebhola likanobhutshuzwayo eNingizimu Afrika ngesinqumo sikamqeqeshi weClub Brugge uPhillipe Clemment sokugquma uPercy Tau ebhentshini yize edlala ibhola elinenkosi phakathi.UTau ungene ngesiwombe sesibili esuka ebhentshini emdlalweni weBelgian Cup njengoba iBrugge ishaye iFrancs Borains izolo ebusuku eRobert Urbain Stadium. UTau ushaye igoli lokuqala lomdlalo ngomzuzu ka-75, waphinda waphase amabhola amabili avalelwe enethini uDavid Okereke. UTau (25) ubengabonwa nangokhalo emdlalweni we-UEFA Champions lapho iBrugge idlale ngokulingana neGalatasaray ngesonto eledlule. Emuva kokudlala kahle izolo kanye nasemdlalweni weligi bedlala ngokulingana ne-Anderlecht, abalandeli bakuleli bamfuna enkundleni uma iBrugge isibhekene neReal Madrid ngoLwesibili kwiChampions League. Lomdlali obolekwe kwiBrighton & Hove Albion kuze kuphele isizini, useshaye amagoli amathathu, waphasa amabhola amathathu aholela egolini, njengoba esadlale imidlalo ewu-9 kule sizini. Ukuzimisela kukaTau sekumlandele izincomo kwabezindaba eBelgium ikakhulukazi intatheli uPeter Vandenbempt, othi uTau ukhombisa ukukhula ebholeni. “Phakathi kwabadlali abazimiselile emdlalweni we-Anderlecht kukhona uPercy Tau. UTau uthandwa kakhulu ngabaqeqeshi futhi ubenomfutho ngenkathi ecindezela i-Anderlecht. UTau ubevele eyinkinga kwi-Union Saint Gillose waphinde wenza isinqumo esikhaliphile ngokuthi ajoyine iClub Brugges,” kusho uVandenbempt ecashunwa yiVoetbalmagazine. UTau uzothola elinye ithuba lokuzifaka esikimi esizodlala kwiChampions League uma iBrugge isitholana neMechelen kwiBelgian Pro League ngoMgqibelo ntambama eJan Breydel Stadium.
title: Bamfuna kwiChampions League uTau ogila izimanga eBelgium

text: KUSOLWA ukuthi lidinwe ukwaliwa lagwaza labulala intombi engunina wengane isoka okuthiwa beligajwe yisikhwele, esehlakalweni esenzeke eTshelimnyama, eMariannhill, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Umsolwa kuthiwa usagcwele amathafa kanti ufunwa amaphoyisa.Kuthiwa umufi (27), igama lakhe eligodliwe kuze kukhulunywe nomndeni waseTshelimnyama ugwazwe wabulawa yisoka elinguyise wengane yakhe okuthiwa wathandana nalo esafunda u-matric.Kuthiwa limlande kubo kwesoka lakhe elisha lamhudulela ehlathini lafike lamgwazela khona. Udadewabo wesoka elisha okhulume neSolezwe (igama lakhe eligodliwe ngokusabela ukuphepha kwakhe), uthe bebehleli nomufi sebelungiselela ukulala ngesikhathi bezwa kukhona ogaklaza isicabha segumbi abebehleli kulo.“Umfowethu (isoka elisha) ubesaphumile ngesikhathi * ...(esho umsolwa), eshaya isicabha ethi ufuna unina wengane yakhe. Besithuke kakhulu ngesikhathi kuvuleka isicabha ngoba ungumuntu onodlame. Ungene ephethe ibhodlela likabhiya abehamba ewuphuza wamshaya ngalo esiphongweni wamdonsa ngenkani emhudula esho nokusho ukuthi ufuna ukumbulala,” kusho udadewabo wesoka elisha.Uthe ngesikhathi kwenzeka lokhu, yena (udadewabo wesoka) ugijime wayobiza abafowabo abebeme buqamama nomuzi wakubo abebengaboni okwenzekayo kodwa ngesikhathi bezama ukukhalima umsolwa ubesevele esesithele ebumnyameni emhudula enqamula naye komakhelwane.Umakhelwane okhulume neSolezwe, naye ocele ukungavezwa, uthe uvuswe ngomunye umakhelwane obememeza enxusa ukuthi kusizwe intombazane ehudulwa ngowesilisa oyihudulela ehlathini elingezansi kwemizi.“Ngithathe ithoshi nenduku sehla sanikela lapho beshone ngakhona. Ngimkhanyise ngethoshi sisebuqamama sambona emcindezele phansi umufi. Kuthe uma ebona ukuthi siyeza wamgwaza kanye esifubeni wabaleka,” kusho umakhelwane.Uthe ngesikhathi abanye bezama ukukhalima umsolwa, abanye bazame ukusiza umufi ogcine ngokushona kusaphele imizuzu embalwa egwaziwe.Kuthiwa umsolwa ungowakhona endaweni kanti kusolwa ukuthi udinwe yisenzo sikamufi obesebaleke wayohlala kubo kwesoka elisha njengoba kuthiwa umsolwa ubehlala emshaya emfuna nemali.Omakhelwane bathi bebazi ngokuhlukumezeka kukamufi obezihlalela nogogo nomalume wakhe. Kuthiwa ubesaba ukubuyela kubo njengoba uyise wendodana yakhe eneminyaka emibili ubemsabisa okwenyoka, wanquma ukubhaca kubo kwesoka elisha nendodana yakhe.Kuthiwa umsolwa ulandele umkhondo wathola ukuthi bahlala kuphi kanti ngesikathi engena endlini indodana yakhe ibilaliswe kwelinye igumbi.Imizamo yokuthola ilungu lomndeni ayiphumelelanga kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.Iphoyisa elingagunyaziwe ukukhuluma nabezindaba esiteshini samaphoyisa iMariannhill, likuqinisekisile ukuthi likhona icala elivuliwe. Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilelela okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal engabuyeli entathelini ukuqinisekisa udaba.
title: Ugajwe yisikhwele wabulala unina wengane

text: IBUYISE owaduma kwi-Orlando Pirates nakwiKaizer Chiefs uKostadin Papic i-Royal Eagles egijima kwiNational First Division (NFD).Isolezwe lihabule lezi zindaba ngomthombo walo ongashayi eceleni. UZipho Dlangalala nguyena obesabambile njengomqeqeshi.Ekuqaleni kwesizini i-Eagles ihlukane no-Allan Freese ngemuva kokuphikwa yimiphumela. Ngemuva kwalokho izikhulu zeqembu zilande uDlangalala ukuthi azotakula iqembu kodwa naye uthwale kanzima ephikwa yimiphumela.“Izikhulu zeqembu zizamile ukubekezelela uDlangalala. Zibonile ukuthi isikhathi siyahamba futhi izinto azenzeki. Ngaleyo ndlela zithathe isinqumo sokubuyisa uPapic. Ulandwe esinye isikhulu se-Eagles esikhumulweni sezindiza ngoMgqibelo ngo-6 ntambama. Uzoqala ukusebenza ngoMsombuluko (esho namuhla),” kusho umthombo othembekile.UPapic ubekwi-Eagles ngesizini edlule. Udedelwe yi-Eagles sekusele imidlalo emincane kusongwe isizini. Ubezihlalele kwelakubo eSerbia njengoba ahamba kuthiwa uzoya kohlinzwa umgogodla.Kuqashwe uFreese ukuthi azovala isikhala sakhe.“Iqembu liyakholwa wukuthi uPapic washiya umsebenzi ongaphelile eqenjini. Yingakho kunqunywe ukuthi abuyiswe,” kusho umthombo.UPapic odabuka eSerbia wazakhela udumo kwiPirates ayidlalisa ingcwenga yebhola ngo-2003/04 nango-2004/05 kodwa wagcina engawinanga lutho. Lo mqeqeshi uke wabamba izintambo nakwiChiefs ngesikhathi ixosha * -Ernst Middendorp.UPapic owaziwa ngokudlala ibhola elihehayo uke wayibamba nakwiPolokwane City ku-Absa Premiership. Kuthintwa uJames Dlamini oyimenenja jikelele yeqembu izolo ekuseni uvumile ukuthi bayaxoxa noPapic.“Izikhulu ziyaxoxa noPapic. Ubengakafiki kodwa izingxoxo ziyaqhubeka. Umqeqeshi obekade ekhona sesihlukene naye ngenxa yokuthi besingeneme ngemiphumela. Uma izikhulu seziqede yonke into sizobe sesiyamemezela. Okwamanje akukho esisakuqedile noPapic,” kusho uDlamini.I-Eagles ngesizini edlule ishwebe kancane ukungena kuma-Play Offs okuhlungela ukunyukela kwi-Absa Premiership. Njengamanje ibalwa namaqembu avika izembe. Isawine imidlalo emibili kwengu-13.Imiphumela yeNFD ngempelasonto:Ubuntu Cape Town 0-2 Cape Town All Stars; Witbank Spurs 2-2 Jomo Cosmos; Richards Bay FC 0-3 Highlands Park; University of Pretoria 1- Tshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila; Royal Eagles 1-1 Black Leopards; Stellenbosch 1-0 Super Eagles; Uthongathi FC 2-0 Real Kings; Mbombela United 2-1 Mthatha Bucks.
title: I-Eagles ibuyisa odume kwiChiefs nePirates

text: UMQEQESHI weFree State Stars, uLuc Eymael, uthi abantu abebekade bemchapha ngenhlamba kwabezindaba ngesikhathi enqumela ugwayi katiki iKaizer Chiefs yingoba bebengayiqondi inhloso yakhe.U-Eymael kuvalwe isizini edlule efunwa yiChiefs ebikade isemkhankasweni wokuvala isikhala ebesikade sivuleke ngemuva kokushiya kukaSteve Komphela. Ngasekupheleni kwesonto eledlule Amakhosi amemezele owayengumqeqeshi we-Ea Lla Koto, uGiovanni Solinas, wase-Italy njengozoyihola ngesizini ka-2018/2019.Ukulangazelela ingcaca ukuqeqesha iChiefs kuka-Eymael kumfake ekukhulumeni. Kuvele ukuthi uhamba ngaphansi kwezinyawo uKomphela. Nokho ugcine enikeze iChiefs umnqamulajuqu kaJuni 12 ukuthi imthinte, kungenjalo ubuyela kwiStars.“Izintatheli nabanye abantu kade bethi ngiyaziqhayisa ngesikhathi ngithi uma kungenzeki lutho ekupheleni kwezinsuku engizibekele zona kuze kuba uJuni 12, ngizobuyela kwiFree State Stars. Abantu kade bethi, engicabanga ukuthi akulona iqiniso, ngiyazithwala futhi nginqumela ugwayi katiki amaqembu. Akukaze kube njalo. Bekuwukuma emazwini ami ngoba ngethembisa uRantsie Mokoena (imenenja yeStars) ukumgcina ewazi amaqembu akhuluma nemenenja yami,” kusho u-Eymael.“Ngamthembisa ukuthi angifuni ukumenzela phansi, uma kukhona okwenzekayo kuzoba ngaphambi kukaJuni 12. Isizathu esenza ngenze lokho kungenxa yezintatheli nabantu abathize. Ungayihumusha ngendlela yakho kodwa mina ngangigcina amazwi ami. Abanye abantu kade bengithuka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kodwa manje niyabona ukuthi ngibuyile kwiStars ngaphandle kokuthi kade ngifunwa naphesheya.”IStars ihlulwe yiChiefs ngo 6-5 sekushaywa amaphenathi kowamanqamu weBokone Bophirima Maize Cup eJames Motlatsi Stadium, eNorth West, ngoMgqibelo. Nakuba umqhudelwano uthathwa njengowokuzicijela ukuqala kwesizini nokuhlola abadlali abasha kodwa u-Eymael ubebukeka efuna ngakho konke ukwehlula iChiefs. IStars idlalise nabadlali abasha okukhona kubona umgadli, u-Eleazar Rodgers, ohlukane neBidvest Wits, Linda Bengu, owayedlalela AmaZulu noDevon Saal, oxoshwe yiMaritzburg United ngemuva kokuchapha ngenhlamba umqeqeshi uFadlu Davids ngesizini edlule.I-Ea Lla Koto izovula isizini neChiefs emdlalweni weMTN8 ebhekwe ukuthi iqale ngempelasonto yokuqala ka-Agasti. U-Eymael uhole iqembu lawina indebe yeNedbank Cup nokulifake emqhudelwaneni iCAF Confederation Cup ezohambisana kuwona neChiefs eqede endaweni yesithathu ye-log ye-Absa Premiership.“Sikhulumile mayelana nokwenza okungaphezulu ngesizini ezayo kodwa asikayiqedi imininingwane. Akulula ukuphinda okwangesizini edlule. Ukwenza lokho sekuvele kunzima ngeqembu elingenasimanga njengaleli. Kodwa ukuyiphinda kunzima ngokuphindwe kayishumi. Sizoqala ngomdlalo onzima neChiefs kwiMTN8 emuva kwalokho siya kuMaZulu. Sizozama ukuqala kahle kwiligi njengomuntu wonke ngoba kungcono ukuthola amaphuzu kusakhanya. Sizobona ukuthi simelana kanjani nesimo ngoba manje kufanele sidlale iMTN8, iligi, Telkom Knockout, Nedbank Cup neConfederation Cup ekupheleni kukaNovemba futhi umdlalo unzima. Kodwa sizozama ukushintshanisa abadlali ukuze sithole imiphumela,” kusho u-Eymael.
title: Abantu abangiqondi kahle: Eymael

text: ISIKHWISHIKHWISHI seKaizer Chiefs kwiMultiChoice Diski Challenge (MDC), * -Itumeleng Shopane, sibona kungasekude sidlale eqenjini elikhulu laMakhosi.Ngokusho kukaShopane umqeqeshi weqembu elikhulu * -Ernst Middendorp uchazekile ngebhola alidlalayo kodwa kunezinto ezimbalwa afuna azilungise.UShopane (21) udlala ophikweni lwesokudla kuMakhosi. Usezakhele udumo ngokungayibheki indoda phambi kwakhe, ukugoba amabhola amahle nokushaya amagoli abalulekile kwiMDC. Udlalela iqembu lesizwe lika-Under 20 eliphekwa uThabo Senong.Useneminyaka ebalelwa kwemine edlala kwiMDC. Phakathi kwabadlali asebedlalela iqembu elikhulu adlale nabo kwiMDC singabala uLucky Ngezana, Nkosingiphile Ngcobo, Emmanuel Letlotlo, Happy Mashiane noWiseman Meyiwa.UShopane uthe kuyamthokozisa ukubona igenge abedlala nayo yenza kahle eqenjini elikhulu wathi ulinde isikhathi sakhe akholwa wukuthi sesiseMome.“Ngiyabajabulela kakhulu abafowethu abakhushulelwe eqenjini elikhulu kwiChiefs. Yonke into inesikhathi sayo, ngiyethemba ukuthi siyeza nesami isikhathi sokuba ngikhushulelwe eqenjini elikhulu. Engizokwenza nje ukuqhubeka nokudlala bese ngilinda elami ithuba,” kusho uShopane.Eqhubeka echaza uShopane, uveze ukuthi uMiddendorp usejwayele ukumbiza eqenjini elikhulu ukuba azoziqeqesha nalo.“Sengiziqeqeshe kaningi neqembu elikhulu. UMiddendorp unendlela afuna ngidlale ngayo engicabanga ukuthi angikafiki esigabeni afuna ngibe kusona okwamanje. Ngilindele ukuthi kube nguyena ongitshelayo ukuthi sengikulungele ukudlala kwelikhulu. Ukuthi nje kwesinye isikhathi uMiddendorp uyathula, uvele ungazi ukuthi wenza ngakho yini noma uyageja. Kodwa ngizoqhubeka nokusebenza kanzima ngethemba lokuthi nami kuzongilungela,” usho kanje uShopane.Isizini yeChiefs isiphelile kwiMultiChoice Diski Shield (MDS) njengoba yehlulekile ukuvikela lesi sicoco eyasinqoba nyakenye idlala ngokulingana ngo 1-1 ne-Orlando Pirates emdlalweni kaGroup A obuseHammarsdale ngempelasonto. Amaqembu azodlala kowandulela owamanqamu yiPirates, SuperSport United, Mamelodi Sundowns neLamontville Golden Arrows.Iqembu elikhulu leChiefs linomsebenzi onzima ngempelasonto njengoba lizobhekana neChippa kowandulela owamanqamu weNedbank Cup. Umdlalo useNelson Mandela Bay Stadium, eBhayi, ngoMgqibelo ngo-8.15 ebusuku.Komunye umdlalo weNedbank Cup kuzotholana phezulu iLamontville Golden Arrows neTS Galaxy eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont, ngoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama.
title: 'Ngilinde ithuba lokudlala kwelikhulu'

text: UKUKHOMBISA izimpawu zokukhula kwezinga lokudlala komdlali waMaZulu, nothando olukhonjiswe yiqembu laphesheya kumdlali wawo, uSamuel Darpoh, yikhona okube nomthelela ekutheni abaphathi beqembu bamelulele inkontileka yakhe ngamasizini amathathu.Ngokutholwa kweSolezwe ngeSonto leliqembu yi-Espanyol edlala kwiLa Liga efuna lomdlalli azokwenza izivivinyo ukuze limbonele eduze.AmaZulu ngoLwesihlanu akhiphe isitatimende lapho ebeqinisekisa khona ngokuvuselelwa kwesivumelwano samasizini amathathu lomdlali egijima kuleli qembu.Ephawula ngale ndaba yenkontileka yalo mdlali odabuka eGhana, uQedusizi Dlamini, oyimenenja yoSuthu akaphikanga futhi akavumanga ngokuthi kungenzeka nakho lokhu kweqembu laphesheya kube nenhlese ekutheni bavuselele isivumelwano nalo mdlali.“Ukuvuselelwa kwesivumelwano nalo mdlali akuphenjelelwanga kuphela ukubakhona kweqembu laphesheya elimfunayo. Indlela asebenze ngayo ngale sizini ikhombisa ukuthi usebenze kahle ngoba kunezimpawu zokuthi lenyukile izinga lakhe. Nomakunjalo, sisesikhathini lapho sibuyekeza izivumelwano zabadlali esibabonayo banekusasa eliqhakazile eqenjini siyazivuselela,” kusho uDlamini.Empi-ntshelwa ekhoneni ngokuthi nakuba ezibeka izizathu eziholele ekutheni bavuselele ngamasizini amathathu nalo mdlali kodwa esinqala ngeso-kuthi kunge-nzeka athole ikhaya elisha phesheya ngakho kufanele uma sekuxoxiswana babe nento ebambekayo ngokuba mqoka kwalo mdlali oSuthwini akaphikanga futhi akavumanga.“Nakuba lokho nakho kungabakhona (ukuvuselela ngoba befuna umbengo othe xaxa ngaye) kodwa njengoba sengike ngasho baningi esivuselelayo nabo, ikakhulu abanombandela wokwelula inkontileka ngokubona kweqembu,”kubeka uDlamini.“Sixoxisana noSiyethemba Sithebe naye okunombandela wokwelula ngokubona kweqembu kodwa sibone kungcono ukuthi sivele siqale izingxoxo naye.”Omunye umdlali athe bavuselele isivumelwano ngombandela wokubona kweqembu nguPhu-mlani “Wele” Gumede, ngonyaka owodwa.“Phezu kokuthi siselulile isivume-lwano ngokombandela obukhona kwinkontileka kodwa sisazoqhu-beka nokuthi sixoxisane naye ngoba abadlali abaseba-ncane esibadinga-yo esikhathini esizayo,” kuchaza uDlamini.Abanye abadlali athe akanalo uvalo ngezinko-ntileka zabo ngoMhlengi Cele, Jabulani Ncobeni noSduduzo Dlamini athi ezabo ziphela ngale kuka-2020.
title: OwoSuthu ushelwa yi-Espanyol yaseSpain

text: KUTHOLWE isidumbu sowesilisa silenga esihlahleni ngasebhulohweni eVerulam izolo ekuseni.Owesifazane obedlula ngendlela ngezithuba zabo 8 ekuseni izolo uthe akwaziwa ukuthi isidumbu ngesendoda yakuphi. Uthe usondele ngoba ebona isixuku, wathola ukuthi indoda ibisishonile. “Ubelenga endaweni esobala ebonakalayo ngisho udlula emgwaqweni. Utholakale eseshonile, ngishiye sekukhona ngisho abezimo eziphuthumayo,” kusho owesifazane.Kuthiwa kayikho imizi eduze kwendawo okusolwa ukuthi umufi uzihilele kuyo. Kushaye isikhathi sokuloba amaphoyisa engakayitholi imininingwane ephelele.UColonel Thembeka Mbele okhulumela amaphoyisa uthe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-24 utholwe elenga ngasebhulohweni.Uthe kuphenywa idokodo ngokushona komuntu esiteshini eVerulam.
title: Kutholwe indoda ilenga esigangeni

text: UZAMA inhlanhla kuMaZulu FC U-Ayabulela Konqobe oke waziqeqesha neKaizer Chiefs ngasekuqaleni kwesizini.Ngokusho komqeqeshi woSuthu uCavin Johnson, iqembu alizozifaka ingcindezi yokusheshe lithathe isinqumo ngoKonqobe.Alingatshazwa ikhono uKonqobe analo kunobhutshuzwayo kodwa inkonzo yokuziphatha iyona esimenze wanephunga lomzondo emaqenjini amaningi.Phakathi kwezinto asolwa ngazo uKonqobe, ukuthanda impilo yasebusuku kanti uphinde abe ngu-mrepha, okuhumusheka ngokuthi akazazi ukuthi yikuphi afuna ukukwenza phakathi kokuba wumdlali webhola elikhokhelayo nokuba ngumculi.UJohnson usezakhele igama ngokunika ithuba abadlali abangasaqasheki ngenxa yokuthanda uphuzo oludakayo, nokunye okungekuhle.Phakathi kwabadlali asebesizwe uJohnson singabala uJabu Mahlangu (owayaziwa ngoPule) noMasibusane “Zizou” Zongo abake baduma ngokungalawuleki eminyakeni edlule.“Simbizile uKonqobe ukuba azoziqeqesha nathi. Uqale ngoLwesibili. Okunye sekulele kuyena. Mina ukumsiza kwami kuphelela ekutheni ngimnike ithuba, okunye sekungokwakhe. Anginaso isiqiniseko sokuthi uzohlala nathi kuze kube nini, angifuni ukumfakela ingcindezi, ngifuna ajwayele ukuba seqenjini,” usho kanje izolo uJohnson engxoxweni naleli phephandaba.Phakathi kwamaqembu uKonqobe aseke wawadlalela, yilona Usuthu eminyakeni edlule, Thanda Royal Zulu neChippa United. Ukhulele kwinkulisa ye-Ajax Cape Town yangakubo eKapa njengoba edabuka eGugulethu.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, uJohson ubevele efuna umdlali owuhlobo lukaKonqobe, onobuhlakani emuva okwaziyo futhi ukuhlasela uma sekunesidingo. Lo mqeqeshi ukhala ngokuthi bangenelwa amagoli abebengawagwema emuva.Okhulumela AmaZulu, uBrilliant Mkhathini, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi akukuhle ukuthi kuvundululwe umlando kaKonqobe nxa kukhulunywe ngaye.“Abaphathi beqembu bamnikile ithuba lokuba azibonakalise. Naye ungumuntu akufanele njalo uma kukhulunywa ngegama lakhe, bese kushiwo izinto azenza eminyakeni edlule. Konke lokho sekudlulile, njengamanje sekufanele sibheke phambili. Okuhle ngaleli thuba alitholile wukuthi konke kulele kuyena,” kucacisa uMkhathini.
title: Uzama inhlanhla kuMaZulu odume ngobuhlongandlebe

text: UPHILE saka umholi we-African Christian Democratic Party (ACDP) uMfundisi Kenneth Meshoe, ongomunye wabaholi bokuqala kuleli abaveza ukuthi bahaqwe wubhubhane iCoronavirus ngenyanga edlule.Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe yilo mholi kwi-video ayifake ekhasini leqembu kwiFacebook ngeSonto.UMeshoe ophinde abe yilungu lePhalamende ubebukeka egcwele ukuzethemba ngesikhathi ekhuluma kwi-video.Unxuse abantu bakuleli ukuthi behlise amaphaphu bangabi nakho ukwesaba, wathi leli gciwane liyafana neminye imikhuhlane akusho ukuthi otholakale enalo kusuke sekuphelile ngaye.“Kuyona yonke le minyaka edlule ziningi izivunguvungu esidlule kuzo kodwa sizinqobe. Ngakho abantu abangatatazeliswa ukuthi igciwane kukhulunywa ngalo kakhulu kwithelevishini ngakho osenalo usezofa,” kusho uMeshoe.Uthe selokhu atholakala ukuthi unalo akazikhumbuli ekhwehlela noma ethimula okukanye enezinye zezimpawu eziyizinkomba zalo kodwa uphile njengosheleni.UMeshoe nonkosikazi wakhe uNkk Lydia Meshoe bazivalele emzini wabo ngemuva kokuhlolelwa leli gciwane ngenyanga edlule.Yena noSotswebhu waleli qembu uMnuz Steve Swart, babehambele umkhuleko eRibbledale, eBloemfontein, ngenyanga edlule ngaphambi kokuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa amemezele ukuthi akusavumelekile ukuhlangana kwabantu abevile ku-100. USwart nabanye abahlanu okuthiwa babevela emazweni ahlukene okuyi-United States, France nakwa-Israel nabo batholakala ukuthi banegciwane.Ngesonto eledlule kubikwe ukuthi noNobhala-Jikelele womfelandawonye wezinyunyana iSouth African Federation Trade Unions, uMnuz Zwelinzima Vavi, naye kutholakale ukuthi ungomunye wabahaqekile.UVavi ufake i-video ekhasini lakwiTwitter eyimizuzwana engu-37 lapho ethi iCorona ifike zigawulwe zabekwa kuyena, ayinalo ithuba lokuzenzela umathanda.Uthe nakanjani izophuma iphele emzimbeni wakhe, izofa.Ushiye abaningi bemangele njengoba kule video ebejuluke econsa nokungaziwa ukuthi ubegquma yini.
title: ‘Ukuba neCorona akusho ukuthi sekuphelile ngawe’

text:
KULELI sonto Isolezwe libike ngomsakazi woKhozi FM uZimiphi 'Zimdollar' Biyela ophuthunyiswe esibhedlela isimo sakhe sisibi ngemuva kokuquleka ngoMsombuluko. Lo msakazi utholwe ithimba lasekuseni labezindaba ebelizongena ewile kade esakaza uhlelo oluthi “Lwasa Olungaliyo” olungena ngo-2 luphele ngo-4 ekuseni.Sekuqala ukuba yinjwayelo nokho ukugula kwabasakazi estudiyo soKhozi FM. UMandla Ngcobo owadlula emhlabeni wakhala ngekhanda esakaza nokwagcina ngokuthi angeniswe esibhedlela wagcina ngokushona.FUNDA: 
UZimdollar utholwe equlekile oKhoziniUNkosinathi Mshengu naye ngonyaka odlule washaywa yisifo sohlangothi waze watshekelwa wumlomo esakaza.Kwesinye isiwombe uNonhlanhla Buthelezi odume ngelikaMroza naye wake wakhala ngekhanda esemsakazweni.UMdonso washelwa yizwi kuqhubeka uhlelo alushayela naye uZimdollar.
title: Sekuyinjwayelo ukugula kwabasakazi boKhozi FM

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESEKUVUKA inkumbulo yezikhathi ezimnandi zeminyaka eyedlule kuClive “The Dog” Barker uma ebona AmaZulu FC ayewaqeqesha phambilini edlala ibhola eliseqophelweni eliphezulu kule sizini ka-2020/2021 esigabeni seDStv Premiership.AmaZulu abonakala eya ngokuhlangana ngaphansi kukaBenni McCarthy othathe izintambo ku-Ayanda Dlamini. USuthu lubalwa namaqembu akwi-Top 8 kwi-log okuyinto engajwayelekile, kwazise kumasizini edlule bese kuwumkhuba walo ukubalwa namaqembu avika izembe. Seliqoqe amaphuzu awu-25 emidlalweni ewu-17.Ngesonto edlule, uSuthu luphinde lwaba ngundabamlonyeni kubathandi bebhola ngesikhathi luxebula ngo 2-1 izinkunzi zaseSoweto iKaizer Chiefs emdlalweni weligi obuseFNB Stadium, eGoli.Abafana baseMbelebeleni sebedlale imidlalo emihlanu bengahlulwa nokuyinto ebiyiphupho ukuthi ibingenzeka kumasizini ambalwa edlule.Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngokudlala kahle koSuthu, uBarker uthe kumjabulisa kakhulu ukubona iqembu lakhe lakudala lisefomini enhle.Uthe ukwenza kahle kwaMaZulu kumkhumbuza iminyaka yawo-1970, 1980 nasekuqaleni kweyo-1990 lapho leli qembu lalibalwa namanye kwahamba phambili futhi amakhulu ebholeni eNingizimu Afrika.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngesimo AmaZulu akuso njengamanje, adlala ibhola eliseqophelweni eliphezulu kakhulu. Ngicabanga ukuthi kuzowasiza kakhulu nokuba nomqeqeshi osemusha  njengoBenni. Nokulanda kwawo abadlali abanohlonze kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi afuna ukushintsha izinto esikhathini samanje,” usho kanje uBarker owanqobela uSuthu indebe yeCoca-Cola Cup ngo-1993.“Nakuba engayiqalanga kahle isizini kodwa ukudlala kahle kwawo emidlalweni yakamuva kungikhumbuza izikhathi ezimnandi zakudala ngesikhathi ngisawaqeqesha lapho sasibhubhisa khona amaqembu amaningi.“Uyabona nje laba badlali abakhona njengamanje eqenjini indlela abadlala ngayo bangikhumbuza abanye babadlali bami bakudala okukhona kubo uJoel Faya, Archie “Juluka” Hadebe (ongasekho) noBonginkosi “Ace” Mnikathi ukubala nje abambalwa okungabadlali abawabeka kwelinye izinga.”Le ngwevu yomqeqeshi ithe inethemba elikhulu lokuthi ngesizini ezayo AmaZulu azokwazi ukunqoba noma indebe eyodwa kwiDStv Premiership.“Njengoba izinto sezishintshile ohlangothini lwabaphathi nabadlali abalethwa eqenjini manje, nginethemba elikhulu lokuthi ngesizini ezayo azokwazi ukujabulisa abantu bakulesi sifundazwe ngokunqoba noma isicoco esisodwa. Akumele njalo kuhlalwe kukhulunywa ngokunqoba kwethu indebe yeCoca-Cola ngo-1993. Sekumele abadlali abakhona njengamanje nabo babhale owabo umlando omusha eqenjini ngokunqoba izicoco.”Ngo-2010, amaZulu acishe aliqeda ishobolo leminyaka lokunganqobi sicoco kodwa-ke iBidvest Wits yaphinde yalishabalalisa iwahlula ngo 3-0 kowamanqamu eNedbank Cup, e-FNB Stadium.
title: UBarker uchazekile ngomgqigqo omuhle waMaZulu

text: PHEZU kwezinkinga ebezikhungethe inhlangano eyengamele unobhutshuzwayo eNingizimu Afrika (iSouth African Football Association), nobekufaka ungabazane ngokuthi izobakhona yini ingqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi obusha beSafa, kodwa igcine iqhubeke ngempumelelo eSandton Convention Centre, eGoli izolo.UDanny Jordaan ubuyele esikhundleni sokwengamela le nhlangano kuze kuyolamula u-2022.Ukuqokwa kukaJordaan kusho ukuthi uselandela uMolefi Oliphant ukuhlala kulesi sikhundla ahola kuso izifunda eziwu-52.Ubuyele ngamavotiawu-234 kulawo abewu-246, kwathi amabili aphikisana nokukhethwa kwakhe, elilodwa belonakele.Esigungwini sikazwelonke seSafa iPremier Soccer League izomelwa usihlalo wayo u-Irvin Khoza, uJose Ferreira oyisikhulu esiphezulu kwiBidvest Wits, Mato Madlala osabambe njengesikhulu esiphezulu kwiPSL nosihlalo weKaizer Chiefs, uKaizer Motaung.U-Andile “Ace” Ncobo oke wayimisa kabi iSafa eyisola ngokuphambanisa izinkomishi ekulandeleni ngendlela umthethosisekelo weFifa nokwaholela ekutheni ukhetho lwangoMashi 24 lungabe lusaqhubeka uhoxile ngoba ethi ayikho emthethweni.Ukushaya amakhala kukaNcobo kwaholela ekutheni i-IEC ihoxe isigubhukane ngoba ithi wayekhombe okungahambi kahle kumthethosisekelo mayelana nalolu khetho.NgoLwesihlanu iNkantolo eNkulu yaseSouthern Gauteng, ichithe isicelo ebesifakwe isifunda sase-Waterberg, eLimpopo simelwe yiNKosi Mwelo Nonkonyana.Kuthiwa bebefuna ukuthi kumiswe ukhetho lungabikhona futhi befuna kuboshwe uJordaan, Dennis Mumble oyisikhulu esiphezulu noTeboho Motlanthe ophethe ihhovisi lezomthetho.Ezinye ezitholakale ntathakusa yangoMgqibelo bezithi kucishwe kwabanjwana ngezihluthu kwizithunywa ebeziqhamuka KwaZulu-Natal (KZN) ngemuva kokuthi emhlanganweni wekhokhasi yazo kumenyezelwe ukuthi babili kuphela okuphakanyiswe amagama abo ukuthi bazomela iKZN Kuthiwa lesimemezelo senziwe obengusihlalo weSafa KZN, uVelaphi Kubheka.Emagameni aphakanyisiwe elikaKwenzakwakhe Ngwenya noThabile Msomi nobekuchaza ukuthi bebezongena ngaphandle kokuphikiswa.Okuvusele abanye uhlevane wukuthi ngesikhathi kuhanjiswa amagama obekuzokhethwa kuwona ngevoti kwakukhona nelikaThemba Phiri ongumengamelo wasoThukela noMelusi UKubheka oseMajuba, kodwa abengasabonwa ekubeni kunobufakazi obubhalwe phansi bokuthi bathumela amafomu okungenela ukhetho lwesifundazwe.UPhiri noKubheka kuthiwa bagcine belulekwe uJordaan ukuthi udaba lwabo lokuvalelwa ngaphandle baludlulisele ekomitini lokwedlulisa izikhalo ngokhetho.Ngaphambi kokuthi kungene inguqungquthela leli komiti libabuyisele nobekuchaza ukuthi abaseKZN besekufanele bavotelwe nabo.Ngenxa yalezi zinkinga iKZN itshelwe ukuthi ayibuyele ekhaya iyolungisa izinkinga ezifundeni ezingu-11 bese kuba yizona ezikhetha ikomidi leSafa elizongamela isifundazwe.
title: UJordaan ubuyiselwe kwesokwengamela iSafa

text: NGESIKHATHI uSenzo Meyiwa edlula emhlabeni wayethole izibusiso kuLucky Lekgwathi okunguyena owathatha kuyena ibhande lobukaputeni kwi-Orlando Pirates ngemuva kokuthi lesi sitobha sithathe umhlalaphansi.ULekgwathi uveze lokhu ngempelasonto ehambele imidlalo yokukhumbula uMeyiwa eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza. Uthe washiya uMeyiwa nomyalezo wokuthi aqhubeke lapho ayegcine khona ngokuhola iqembu liwole izicoco.Nokho kusukela uMeyiwa abulawa ngo-2014 kusalokhu kumnyama kwiPirates ngezicoco. Kule minyaka cishe idlale kweyamanqamu eyisithupha kodwa lutho indebe.EZimnyama zagcina ukujabulela isicoco zidla iNedbank Cup ngoMeyi ka-2014. UMeyiwa owayesengukaputeni kwiBucs naseqenjini lesizwe iBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa ngo-Okthoba walowo nyaka iqembu liyibambe kwiTelkom Knockout.ULekgwathi uthe njengomuntu osezithatha njengomlandeli wePirates kumphatha kabi ukuthi abawini.“Kuyangidumaza. Uyazi ngaphambi kokuthi ashone uSenzo ngamtshela ukuthi ngimnikeza izibusiso. Ngebhadi ke uNkulunkulu wamthatha. Kodwa manje senginethemba lokuthi kukhona esizokuwina ngenxa yendlela iqembu elidlala ngayo ngaphansi kobuholi bukaMicho (umqeqeshi uMilutin Sredojevic) noRulani (Mokwena),” kusho uLekgwathi.Kuleli sonto iBucs imemezele abadlali abayishiyagalolunye abasha. Laba badlali, uBrilliant Khuzwayo, Vincent Pule, Ben Motshwari, Linda Mntambo, Paseko Mako, Asavela Mbekile, Abel Mabaso, Kudakashwe Mahachi noMeshack Mphangule.UMicho ufike ngesizini edlule kwiPirates ezoyitakula ngemuva kokuqeda isizini ka-2016/2017 ingaphandle kweTop 8. Ulande uMokwena obekwiMamelodi Sundowns ukuthi azoba yiphini lakhe benoBenson Mhlongo.Isizini edlule iphele iyibambe endaweni yesibili okuyibuyisele kwiCAF Champions League.ULekgwathi owahola iBucs kwaze kwayikabili inqoba izicoco ezintathu ngesizini eyodwa, uphinde wanikeza umphako * -Andile Jali.UJali naye ufikele kuPhinda Mzala kwiPirates njengoba ezoya kodlalela izimbangi iMamelodi Sundowns. Lo mdlali oyibamba esiswini usayine inkontileka yeminyaka emithathu namaBrazilians.ULekgwathi uthe bekungokokuqala ekhuluma noJali ngesikhathi behlangana emidlalweni kaMeyiwa ngemuva kokujoyina iSundonws. UJali ushiye kwiPirates ngo-2014 wayodlala eBelgium kwi-KV Oostende njengoba esebuyela kwiPremiership.“Uma umuntu ekuchazela isimo sakhe ngokwenzakele uyasizwa. Ngiyameseka ngakho konke. Ngimkhulisile * -Andile efika kwiPirates emncane. Ngamtshela efika ukuthi kumele ahloniphe ibheji, aziqhenye ngalo njengoba nimbona ukuthi uyibhubesi. Sisamthanda singamaBhakhaniya kodwa mina ngiyamjabulela ngokuthi aye kwiSundowns,” kusho uLekgwathi.
title: Ukungawini kweBucs kukhathaza uLekgwathi

text: USOLA  ukuthi kukhona into abamfakele yona esiphuzweni umculi wakuleli, okusabalale i-video yakhe ehlulwa wukuma esesiteji kade enandisa.UMlindo The Vocalist, wodumo lwengoma ethi Macala, uvele kule video efakwe kwiTwitter sengathi uhlulwa wukuma, wagcina ngokuhlala phansi esiteji.Iningi labantu belisona izinkamba zikaFaro ukuthi ziyimbangela yalokhu.UMlindo ube esebhala ekhasini lakhe kwiTwitter ethi: “Ngithanda ukuxolisa kakhulu kubalandeli bami nakuwo wonke umuntu ngalokhu okwenzeke ngempelasonto edlule. Ngeke ngingene kakhulu emininingwaneni ephelele kodwa ngiyalivuma iphutha lami. Ngizokwenza kangcono ngokuzayo."Kule video uMlindo uze asizwe ngamadoda amabili, okuyiwona amphakamisayo amkhiphe esiteji.Ethintwa yiSolezwe ngeSonto, uthe ubenandisa eMacNose Short Left, eSoshanguve ngoMsombuluko.“Bese ngiqedile ukunandisa, sengicula ingoma yokugcina. Iphutha lami kube wukuphuza isiphuzo engisinikwe ngomunye wabantu obesezihlweleni.  Kakuphelanga ngisho imizuzu emihlanu ngisiphuzile, ngangabe ngisazizwa kahle,” kuchaza uMlindo.Uthe uyalibona iphutha lakhe lokuphuza isiphuzo somuntu angamazi kodwa yena ubezama ukukhombisa ubuntu ngokuphuzisana nomlandeli.Uqhube wathi ngendlela abebuthaka ngayo kuze kwagudluka inkomishi yedolo kodwa uyalulama.“Noma kungathiwa ngiyaphuza kodwa umsebenzi wami ngiwuhlonipha kabi, ukuthi ngingadakwa ngize ngibe njeya. Ngiyazi kuzongakholakali kwabanye nakubantu abadala kodwa ngiyabathembisa ukuthi kangisoze ngeqiwa wuphuzo, ngibe ngisemsebenzeni,” kusho uMlindo.Uveze ukuthi emuva kwalesi sigameko uthole umyalezo kwiWhatsApp, kukhona abamtshela ukuthi bebemuyala ngalokhu okwenzekile.“Kangazi ukuthi bengiyalwa kade ngenzeni. Kodwa ngifunde isifundo sokuzigada kakhulu kunakuqala ngoba kusobala ukuthi kunabantu abangasifiseli okuhle,” kusho uMlindo.Uphethe ngokuthi kunengoma azoyikhipha ngoLwesihlanu oluzayo lapho ecula khona noNathi Mankayi ethi Imali.
title: Uyazisola umculi ophuziswe isiphuzo wanaba esiteji

text: ABABETHAMELE indumezulu yomcimbi kaKhuzani, iGcwalis’ iMabhida Maskandi Concert eThekwini ngenyanga eyedlule, bazovuma ukuthi uMkhathazi useyibhoza yasesteji. Wayegila izimanga nendodana yakhe eyayigqoke i-pampers, uPi$%liyasha. UCHARLES KHUZWAYO ukhiphele eshashalazini uMkhathazi wodumo lwengoma ethi Ibhinca Dance ngomlando wakhe kusukela ezalwa kuze kufike emculweni.CHARLES (CK): Ngubani ngempela loMkhathazi osebalwa nezinkunzi emculweni kamaskandi futhi ufundephi?MKHATHAZI (MK): NgiwuMzamo Longlife Nsibande, owazalelwa KwaHlabisa ngoDisemba 13, 1982. Umama, uBatshaziwe Khumalo kanti ubaba, uJabulani Nsibande. Sibathathu, ngingowokuqala bese ngelanywa ngamantombazane amabili.Ngafunda eNcwabakazi Primary, ngadlulela eKhongela Higher Primary, ngaphothula uGrade 12 eBukimvelo High. Ngangithanda ukwenza izifundo ze-Engineering ngoba ngangimuhle kakhulu kwiMaths nePhysical Science. Ngiganiwe uNomonde Masondo, futhi nginezingane eziwu-4, okuyintombazane eyodwa nabafana abathathu.CK: Ngumuntu onjani owawuvele ufisa ukushadelwa nguye?MK: Ngumuntu wesifazane ozithandayo, ozihloniphayo, okholelwayo nje ebuhleni bakhe bendalo, hhayi oziphaqulayo.CK: Ungene nini futhi kanjani emculweni?MK: Ngangena ngo-2008 emculweni, ngokusungula iqembu, Amagusheshe sinoXola Zondo, siphethwe nguMasondo. Ngafakwa uthando nje nekhono ngoba akekho owangifundisa umculo.CK: Ngesikhathi usakhula, wawufisa ukuhamba ezinyathelweni zamuphi umculi owayedumile?MK: Umculi ebengifisa ukufana naye, uDavid Masondo ngoba bengiwathanda amaSoul Brothers (iqembu lombhaqanga), namanje ngisawadlala kakhulu.CK: Selokhu wangena emculweni, yimaphi ama-albhamu osuwaqophile?MK: Sengikhiphe eyaMagudla ethi Vele Asazani, eyaMagudla ethi Solve 4 X nenye yaMagudla ethi iVoicemail. Ngibe sengilandelisa ngekaMkhathazi ethi Pastor Zondo, Heavy Weight Champion neyakamuva ethi Man of the Match.CK: Yibaphi abaculi abadumile osuke wasebenza nabo?MK: UMroza, uMthandeni, ubaba uMzwakhe Mbuli, uSesheli Sentombi, Ama-Abnormal.CK: Yibaphi osafisa ukusebenza nabo?MK: Ngisafisa ukuhlabelela nabaculi begospel, ikakhulukazi umama uRebecca Malope.CK: Selokhu ungenile emculweni, yini osuyizuzile ngawo?MK: Kuningi kakhulu engikuzuzile, ukuthi-ke angikukhonzile ukubukwa nokuchoma. Engisanda kukuzuza nje ngalo mculo imoto yohlobo lweLand Rover. Ngizobonga abalandeli bomculo ngoba bangithwale kunzima.CK: Yiziphi ezinye izinhlobo zomculo ozikhonzile?MK: iRnB, umculo wamaRasta (reggae) negospel.CK: Ekudleni uzifela ngakuphi?MK: Ngikhonze ukudla kwesiZulu, imifino noma yimiphi, amasi, isijingi sethanga nobhontshisi.CK: Yiziphi izinhlelo okhonze ukuzibuka kwiTV?MK: Ngikhonze iWrestling futhi ngingumlandeli kaRomans Reigns, namahlaya esiZulu bese kuba Isibaya neThe Queen.CK: Njengoba sekwande lo mkhuba wokungcofana komaskanda, wena ungcweka namuphi?MK: Angikamboni umculi engingangcweka naye ngoba laba culi bamanje abawazi lo mdlalo, bakhuluma kakhulu njengomama, ngakho nje ubunsizwa bokungcweka sabugcina kuMgqumeni noMtshengiseni, Thokozani Langa noBhekumuzi Luthuli, hhayi labo sisi bamanje abakhonze ama-video nama-voice clip nokuhleba-ke. Akekho engingangcweka naye ngoba mina ngishaya ingoma ephelele, engadingi ukulekelelwa ngabathize.CK: Ngaphandle kokucula, yini enye omatasatasa ngayo?MK: Ngiyasebenza enkampanini egqugquzela ezokuvakasha eHluhluwe, iZulu Nyala. Ngichazela izivakashi ngamasiko akuleli.CK: Uma ungaxiniwe wumculo nomsebenzi, usichitha ngani isizungu?MK: Isikhathi ngisichitha nomndeni wami, okungunkosikazi nezingane zami ngoba kuyangithokozisa ukuhlala nabo.CK: Yiluphi uhlobo lomdlalo olukhonzile?MK: Ngikhonze ibhola lezinyawo nokudlala amakhadi, uKhasino. Iqembu lebhola engililandelayo yiKaizer Chiefs. NgiyiMpofana, Khosi 4 Life.CK: Uyasonta?MK: Ngikhonza ebandleni lamaNazaretha, ngiwu-100% uNyazi.CK: KuMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika, yimuphi umthetho ongahambisani ngawo?MK: Owokuthi amadoda noma osisi baganane bodwa nokudayiswa komzimba. Nokuthi kuvumeleke onke amabhimbi e-studio lokho kwehlisa isithunzi sethu baculi, kumele kube nomthetho wokuthi kuya omculi onjani e-studio ngoba sigcina sesizwa abantu abacula ngezwi lokukhuzela izinkabi ngoba bethembe ukuthi bazodunyuswa ukukhohlakala okusemculweni.CK: Yimuphi usaziwayo ozifelayo ngaye?MK: UNtwenhle weSibaya (okungu-Asavela Mngqithi) futhi uma ngingathola ithuba (lokuhlangana naye) ngingazibika impela...Hehehe. NoMaNgcobo woZalo (okunguDawn Thandeka King).CK: Ezimotweni, uthanda yiphi?MK: Ngikhonze iLand Rover neJeep.CK: Yisiphi isilwane esifuywayo osithandayo?MK: Ngikhonze inkomo.CK: Sesiphetha, yisiphi isigameko esake sakwehlela nesakuphoxa ongasoze wasikhohlwa?MK: Esokuzwa ukuthi omunye wabaculi, othi uma engibona angihlekise, kanti emakhoneni unesandla semfene, nguye ohlale efuna ukuba ngikhishwe kweminye yemicimbi, aphinde asebenzise ipokloza (fake account) koFacebook ukudicilela phansi abaculi baseMkhanyakude kodwa-ke ngeke uphiwe konke. Uma ungaphiwe emculweni, ugcine ususebenzisa khona ukukhohlakala.
title: UMkhathazi uyazifela ngomculo

text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, ayimkhathazi eyecala elibhekene neqembu abazodlala nalo koweCAF Championship League iRayon Sport yaseRwanda.Umdlalo womlenze wokuqala wokuhlungela amaqoqo phakathi kwala maqembu kufanele ube kusasa ekuhambeni ngo-6 ntambama.ISundowns ibhekise amabombo eRwanda ngoMgqibelo.Nokho ngesonto eledlule kuvele imibiko ethi inhlangano eyengamele ibhola e-Africa, iCAF, iphenya icala lokupheka umphumela womdlalo elibhekene neRayon Sport. I-CAF kulindeleke ikhiphe isinqumo namuhla.Kuthiwa iLydia Ludic Academi yaseBurundi edlale neRayon Sport emzuliswaneni wokuqala ifake icala isola izimbangi ngenkohlakalo.Lokhu kungemuva kokuthi izikhulu zeRayon zabonakala zixoxa nonompempe ngaphambi komdlalo wala maqembu. I-Rayon yagcina idlulele phambili ngo 2-1 uma sekuhlanganiswe imiphumela yemilenze emibili.Eziphinde zavela ngempelasonto, ezokuthi umqeqeshi weRayon Sport engompetha beligi banyakenye, * -Olivier Kerekezi, usulile ngemuva kwalezi zinsolo. Imibiko eqhamuka kuleliya lizwe ithe ushiye isigubhukane ngemuva kokuhlulwa ngo 1-0 koweligi.“Hhayi cha bengingazi ngalezo zinsolo kodwa ke ayikho inkinga ngoba la mazwe angomakhelwane. Sizowelela ngaphesheya uma kuwukuthi kukhona isidingo,” kusho uMosimane.Ngaphambi kokuthi babhekise amabombo eRwanda, uMosimane ukuvezile ukuthi alukho ulwazi abasenalo ngeRayon Sport.“Ngizokhuluma iqiniso nje, bengingakababheki. Kodwa kukhona ebese sibathumile ukuthi basitholele ulwazi ngabo. Ngizoqala ngicubungule imidlalo yabo uma sesisendizeni sibheke khona. Okunye engikutholile wukuthi kunabadlali babo abayisithupha abebedlala kwiCHAN, sizobheka leyo midlalo sibone ukuthi bawuhlobo luni,” kusho lo mqeqeshi owaziwayo ngokufunda umdlali ngamunye osuke ezobhekana nezakhe.Ngaphambi kokugxilisa umqondo wakhe kwiCAF, uMosimane wenze isiqiniseko sokuthi uthola amaphuzu amathathu emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership behlula AmaZulu FC ngo 3-1 ngempelasonto.La maphuzu aqinisekise ukuthi kusekhona amaphuzu amane phakathi kweSundowns neqembu eliza ngemuva, i-Orlando Pirates ebhaxabule iKaizer Chiefs ngo 3-1 kowabakhaya ngempelasonto.Eqenjini elidlale naMaZulu wenze izinguquko, lapho “ephumuze” abanye abadlali ngoba elungiselela umdlalo weCAF.Ezintini ubophele unozinti waseGhana, uRazak Brimah, uDenis Onyango ehleli nezihlwele, uJeremy Brockie odlale kwiConfederations Cup neSuperSport United, ubesebhentshini. USibusiso Vilakazi noThemba Zwane bawuqalile umdlalo kanjalo noHlompho Kekana benoTiyani Mabunda abake baphunyuzwa kweminye yeligi.“Kuwukugembula khona kodwa ke kumele sikwenze ukushintshanisa abadlali. Emidlalweni emihlanu yokugcina yeligi sizodinga abadlali abaqinile. Abadlali beBafana bona bayakwazi ukudlala kwiChampions League ngoba sebeke bayinqoba. Yingakho sibone kuyisikhathi esingcono ukubabuyisa manje,” kusho uMosimane.
title: Liyinto engathi shu kuPitso icala leRayon

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZENGEKE balithole ikhefu abadlali be-Orlando Pirates abahlulwe izimbangi zaseSoweto, iKaizer Chiefs ngo 1-0  koweDStv Premiership, eFNB Stadium ngempelasonto edlule.Ngokusho komqeqeshi wePirates, uJosef Zinnbauer, obedinwe egane unwabu, ubehlele ukuthi aphumuze abadlali bakhe njengoba kunekhefu leFifa.Nokho ukungcwatshwa yigoli likaSamir Nukorvic kumshintshise umqondo."Ngeke ngikufihle ukuthi besisophe ukuthi uma sesinqobile nginike abadlali bami izinsuku ezimbili zokuphumula. Kodwa manje lokho ngeke kusenzeka ngoba angeneme ngenxa yomphumela. Asikho isidingo sokuphumula ngoba kumele kusetshenzwe. Sinezinto eziningi okumele sizizuze kule sizini. Sihlalelwe nawumsebenzi wokujabulisa abalandeli bethu," kusho uZinnbauer. Njengoba kuleli sonto abanye abadlali bePirates bezobe bejuluka ejimini ekomkhulu layo, eMayfair, uThulani" Tyson" Hlatshwayo, Innocent Maela, Ben Motshwari, Vincent Pule babizwe kwiBafana Bafana. UDeon Hotto noGabadinho Mhango babizwe eNamibia naseMalawi ngokwehlukana. Echaza mayelana nokusebenzisa uHotto njengomgadli wabeka uMhango noTshegofatso Mabasa ebhentshini, uthe:" Abanye abadlali bethu basanda kubuya ekulimaleni, ngaleyo ndlela abakakulungeli ukugijima umdlalo wonke." Ukwehlulwa kweBucs kuyibeke endaweni yesine ngemuva kwemidlalo engu-21 namaphuzu awu-35.Iyeke ithuba lokulala endaweni yesibili, beyizogudluza iLamontville Golden Arrows. Isele ngemuva ngamaphuzu amahlanu kwiMamelodi Sundowns enemidlalo emithathu engakayidlali ngenxa yokuxinwa eyeCaf Champions League neyeNedbank Cup. UZinnbauer akakufihlanga ukuthi imcasulile indlela iChiefs epake ngayo ibhasi ekubeni ibidlalela ekhaya. "Sibonile ukuthi asibukhali phambili ingakho sizame ukuphusha u" Figo" (uLinda Mntambo) noNtsiki (uNtsikelelo Nyauza), kanti noKabelo Dlamini noSiphesihle Ndlovu bazame konke okusemandleni. Kumele sikhumbule ukuthi siyinqobile imidlalo emithathu eyedlule abalandeli bajabula kakhulu. Uma ngalelo langa izinto zingahlangani isuke ingekho into ongayenza.“Kolandelayo eZimnyama zizobhekana ne-Al Ahly Benghazi yaseLibya, ngo-Ephreli 2, eMartyrs Of February Stadium koweCaf Confederation Cup. Oweligi ziyoze ziwudlale ngo-Ephreli 7, neMaritzburg United, e-Orlando Stadium.
title: Bancishwe ikhefu abadlali bePirates

text: Nokubongwa PhenyaneUMCULI waseThekwini uShekhinah usememezele ukuthi uzoba khona nakulo nyaka umcimbi lapho kusuke kunandisa khona abaculi bakuleli besifazane iRosefest.Lo mcimbi oba seGoli naseThekwini, ungo-Okthoba 11 kanti uzokwenziwa ngohlelo lobuchwepheshe besimanje.Kulo mcimbi kuke kwanandisa abaculi okukhona kubo uSho Madjozi, DJ Zinhle, Kim Jayde, Lady Zamar, DJ Doowap nabanye.Le ntokazi ithe lo mcimbi uzobanjwa ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi, “Power to She!’“Umcimbi iRosefest ube yinto emangazayo selokhu waqala, inhloso ngawo akubi nje kuphela umculo kodwa siqala kokuningi abantu besifazane ababhekana nakho okukhona kukho izingxoxo ezithinta imizimba yabo, ukhwantalala, izigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwabo, indlela abaphathwa ngayo emsebenzini nokunye okuningi,” kuchaza uShekhinah.Uqhubeke wathi: “Bekungelula ngiqala lo mcimbi kodwa ngiyaziqhenya ngesikwenzayo njalo ngonyaka ngalo mcimbi. Esengifisa ukukubona wukuthi abantu bazoqhubeka yini bajabulele lo mcimbi njengoba uzobe uqhutshwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, siyathembisa ukuthi sizokwenza konke ukugcina lo mcimbi usezingeni okwenza bonke abazowuhambela bazizwe bendawonye.”Uthe ingxenye yemali ezotholakala kulo mcimbi izoya esikhwameni senhlangano iLife Line PMB, esiza ekhuthuthukiseni amantombazane nabafana abasebancane.Abafuna amathikithi alo mcimbi ayatholakala kwi-website yakwaComputicket ngoR70.
title: Usazoba khona umcimbi kaShekhinah wembokodo

text: KUMA nse ukufunda nokufundisa esikoleni samabanga aphansi KwaMaphumulo, lapho othisha beshintshana ngokuphipha nokugada izingane ezincane uma ziyozikhulula ngenxa yobungozi bezindlu zangasese. I-OTimati Primary, okungesinye sezikole ezinabafundi abaningi kule ndawo njengoba bengu-600, kuvela ukuthi sekuphele iminyaka engaphezulu kwewu-10 isebenzisa izindlu zangasese ezingumahamba nendlwane, emuva kokugcwala ngokweqile kwezomgodi ezazakhiwe umphakathi.Abazali abebedinwe beveva batshele Isolezwe  ukuthi ekuqaleni konyaka kufike inkampani yathatha ezinye zezindlu zangasese ikhala ngokuthi umnyango awusakhokhi. Kube sekusala izindlu eziyisithupha, kwafika enye inkampani izozilanda, banqaba abazali. Bathe izindlu zangasese zibekwe phezu kwalezi zomgodi ezindala kanti ziphezulu ngokweqile okwenza zibe yingozi kubafundi. "Kunzima kulesi sikole othisha bathi befundisa bebe beshintshana ngokuyogada ezindlini zangasese ngoba kuyingozi ezinganeni zikaGrade R, zingaphonseka phakathi. Kade zicelwa izindlu zangasese zangempela umnyango uthembisa kodwa asisizakali bafuna kuze kulimale izingane okuyinto esingafisi yenzeke," kusho omunye wabazali ocele ukungadalulwa.Okhulumela isigungu sabazali uMnuz Sandile Nxumalo, uvumile ukuthi abazali abaneme futhi udaba okade balufaka emahhovisi omnyango wezemfundo kodwa lutho usizo. "Abazali badinwe kakhulu ngoba sesiside isikhathi sidlulisa izikhalo ngezindlu zangasese kunalokhu kwalethwa ezinye ezingumahamba nendlwane okuyinto engasadingeki. Okwenze kwazwela ziphinde zalandwa izindlu zangasese, nenye nkampani yafuna ukuzilanda lezi eziyisithupha ezisele, sanqaba. Manje azisalungiswasekwandisa izinkinga," kusho uNxumalo.Leli phephandaba liphinde lathola ukuthi kunezikole ezingomakhelwane, esinye esinabafundi ababalelwa ngaphezulu kuka-200 nesinabafundi abaw-94 kodwa zakhelwe izindlu zangasese. Abazali bathe ngeke liphele leli sonto bengathathanga izinyathelo ezizoshaqisa nezikhulu zomnyango ukuze zizwe lento eziwa abafundi. Okhulumela umnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe bakubeka phambili ukuvikelwa kwesithunzi sabafundi nothisha ngakho bazosisukumela lesi sikhalo. "Uma ngiqeda ukukhuluma nawe ngizothinta umuntu esizokwazi ukumthumela ayobheka. Umnyango uyakuqonda ukubaluleka kokuvikelwa kwesithunzi sothisha nezingane okuyingxenye yamalungelo abo. Yingakho umnyango uhlala uqinisekisa ukuthi uyangenelela uhlinzeke nengqalasizinda lapho kudingeka khona," kusho uMahlambi.Ethula isabelo sezimali ngeledlule uNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, uthe zingu-410 izindlu zangasese zomgodi asebezakhile kwezingu-1377. Uthe zingu-526 ezakhiwayo ezizophothulwa kulo nyaka wezimali.
title: Othisha basebenza ukuphipha abafundi

text:
NOKUBONGWA PHENYANEI YAZIQHENYA ngokuphinde ibuye nomklomelo ka-R750 000 ikhwaya yaKwaZulu-Natal ephinde yadla umhlanganiso ohlelweni lwethelevishini lomncintiswano wamakhwaya i
Clash Of The Choirs.Ukuwina kwekhwaya ebiholwa nguRobbie Malinga kujabulise nabantu baseKZN abebelandela uhlelo njengoba nakwisizini yokuqala kwawina ikhwaya yaseKZN iholwa nguKhaya Mthethwa.Bekungacaci kahle ukuthi iyiphi ikhwaya engadla umhlanganiso kwamathathu akade esele ngoba izinga lomncintiswano beliphezulu futhi wonke bekuthi uma ecula ashaye into ecokeme.Ikhwaya kaMonea yaseMpumalanga ibihlala inconywa ngokushaya into ecokeme kanti ekaShugasmakx yaseGauteng ayikaze ibe sohlwini lwababili abangase baphume.Bese kucaca ngempela ukuthi amavoti abantu yiwo azokhomba ikhwaya ezohamba nesicoco salo nyaka.Kuvele kwenzeka kanjalo iKwaZulu-Natal yahamba phambili ngamavoti emuva kwemikhankaso kunxuswa abantu ukuthi bavote.U-Ayanda Hlongwa waseMlazi kwa-L, obejwayele ukucula phambili ezingomeni eziningi, ekhuluma ne
Solezwe uthe umsebenzi abebebhekene nawo wokuhlanganisa izingoma ubungelula.“Siyabonga kakhulu ukusekwa ngale ndlela ngabantu basesifundazweni sakithi. Bekungelula neze ukuhlanganisa izingoma zibe yile nto amajaji ayifunayo. Kodwa ukuzikhandla kwethu namhlanje sikubonile kuthela izithelo,” kusho u-Ayanda.Uthe ikhwaya ebibasabisa kakhulu kulawo abebesele nawo ngeyaseGauteng, ikakhulukazi ngoba ike yahamba ngoLwesine iyogaya amavoti bona lelo thuba bangalithola njengoba bebekude nasekhaya.“Sonke ekhwayeni yethu besihlala sishayela emakhaya sibanxusa ukuthi sicela bavote. ngempela sibonile ukuthi wonke umuntu ubehamba nathi ohlelweni. Kumanje njengoba ngikhuluma nawe sisestudiyo noZwai Bala kukhona ingoma esiyihlanganisayo,” kusho yena.URobbie uthe kube wumzuzu omjabulise kakhulu wokuhamba nesicoco salo nyaka.“Benginomthwalo omkhulu kakhulu emahlombe ami wokugcina isicoco salolu hlelo sihlezi kulesi sifundazwe njengoba nangonyaka odlule sagcina khona. Ngibonga bonke abangixhasile kuze kube manje nabo bonke abasivotelile,” kusho uRobbie.Uthe ikhwaya izobuyela emakhaya namhlanje. ngoMgqibelo bazohambisa isheke lemali eMandeni ekhaya lezintandane Ikhwezi Charity ngoba babekhethe lona.UNkateko Mabaso, umqondisi ezinhlelweni kwaM-Net, uthe bajabule kakhulu ukuthi uhlelo selunabalandeli abaningi kakhulu.“Siyamhalalisela kakhulu uRobbie nekhwaya yakhe ngomsebenzi omuhle abawenzile. Uhlelo luyakhula unyaka nonyaka futhi luthola abalandeli usuku nosuku njengoba kukhombisa amavoti angenile ngesonto elilodwa nje vo,” kusho uMabaso.Uthe kuyacaca ukuthi likhulu ithalente elikhona ezifundazweni ezehlukene njengoba bezimisele ukuthi baqhubeke benze izinhlelo ezifana nalezi ezizothuthukisa intsha.Kulolu hlelo bekukhona nenkosikazi kaMengameli, uNkk Bongi Ngema, obexhase ikhwaya yaKwaZulu-Natal ngesikhathi isakhankasela amavoti.
title: Abanqobile bahlanganise ingoma noZwai

text: ULAMBELE ukudlalela iBafana Bafana umdlali omusha weKaizer Chiefs, uKearyn Baccus, obeyibamba ezikwatini ezincane zase-Australia.UBaccus (27) odabuka eWentworth eThekwini, ufudukele phesheya kwezilwandle nabazali bakhe esemncane.Ubuye okokuqala eMzansi njengoba esezodlalela iChiefs ephekwa ngumqeqeshi u-Ernst Middendorp.UBaccus uncamele ukushiya ubukhazikhazi base-Australia nethuba lokudlalela iqembu lesizwe lakhona elikhulu elishaya ngabadlali abadumile ngoba efuna ukufezekisa isifiso sakhe sokudlalela iBafana eNingizimu Afrika. Ubegijima kwiMelbourne City yase-Australia.“I-Australia inginike ithuba lokudlala khona. Ngabona kulungile ukuthi ngidlalele izikwati ezincane zakhona.“Ngidlalele esika U/18 nesika U/21. Ngike ngabizwa ekhempini yeqembu lesizwe elikhulu kodwa angikaze ngidlale. Ngicabanga ukuthi ngisengayidlalela iBafana noma yona i-Australia. Ngiyafuna ukuyidlalela iBafana kodwa uma kungenzeki ngingabuyela kwi-Australia,” kusho uBaccus.“Kodwa okwamanje ngisafuna ukugxila ekutheni ngenze kahle kwiChiefs ngiyisize iwine imidlalo.“Okunye kuzolandela. Womabili amazwe kukhona anginike khona. Uma ngenza kahle eqenjini lami, ngiyathemba ukuthi kukhona okuzoqhamuka.”IChiefs inejoka lokuwinela abalandeli bayo izindebe njengoba ngonyaka ozayo izogubha iminyaka engu-50 yasungulwa.Ukungenzi kahle kwabadlali abasha kuzophinda kwengeze isigcwagcwa kuBobby Motaung oyimenenja okunguyena osayinisa abadlali. Abalandeli baMakhosi sekuneneminyaka bengabethembi ubuholi bakhe eNaturena.“Bekungamasizini ambalwa anzima lapha kwiChiefs. Kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi yisona isikhathi esikahle sokuyijoyina ngenxa yalokho. Noma ubani engafika uma iqembu liwina, izinto zilula kodwa ngithanda ukufika uma izinto zinzima ukuze ngisebenze kanzima ukubuyisa izinsuku zenjabulo.“Ngeqembu esinalo kule sizini, lokho kungenzeka. Sidinga ukusebenza kanzima, sibambisane. Ngiyathemba ukuthi izinto zizobuyela endaweni yazo,”kusho uBaccus.“Kujwayelekile ukuthi ingcindezi ihlale kubadlali abasha. Wonke amaqembu afuna abadlali abasha benze kahle. Engingakusho ukuthi kuthatha isikhathi ukujwayela indlela okwenziwa ngayo izinto futhi abalanndeli kufanele bakuqonde lokho.“Awukwazi ukwahluleka umdlali ngomdlalo noma emibili.Kufanele umbekezelele. Nginethemba lokuthi sizowenza umsebenzi.“Angibasabi abalandeli. Ngiyayithanda ingcindezi nezimo ezinjalo. Sengike ngadlala ezinkundleni ezigcwele abantu abantu 70 000. Uzothola abalandeli abakuthandayo nabangakuthandi. Kujwayelekile.“Ongakwenza njengomdlali wukusebenza kanzima wenzele iqembu nabantu abakhokhela ukulibuka.Yilokho esingakwenza singabadlali.”NgoLwesihlanu iBafana akhuluma ngayo ishiywe umqeqeshi uStuart Baxter nokushiye iSafa ibhekene nenselelo yokuthol umqeqeshi ngokushesha ukuze iqale imidlalo yokuhlungela i-Afcon 2020 ngoNovemba isimi ngomumo.
title: Umdlali omusha weChiefs nelukuluku lokudlalela iBafana

text: KUNYOMFEKE izinhlelo zomqeqeshi weBafana Bafana  ngesitobha seMamelodi Sundowns, uMotjeka Madisha okuvele ukuthi sishone engozini yemoto izolo ekuseni.Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo eKurhuleni, uWilliam Ntladi, uthe abanaso isiqiniseko sokuthi yimuphi onguMadisha kubantu ababili ababafice endaweni yesehlakalo ngenxa yokuthi bashe kakhulu wathi kodwa bakholwa wukuthi yilona obekade eshayela ogcine eshele phakathi emotweni.Ingozi yenzeke eKampton Park, eGauteng, entathakusa izolo emuva kokuthi imoto iBMW 1 Series iphaphalaze yaphuma emgwaqweni yashayisa yagqamuka amalangabi. Kule ngozi kushone nomunye umuntu  obehamba nobeshayela.Abezimo eziphuthumayo bathe bahlulekile ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ungubani umuntu obehamba nomshayeli.UMadisha (25)  ushona nje kusaphele amasonto amathathu kushone u-Anele Ngcongca obesebolekiswe kuMaZulu, naye ohambe ngengozi yemoto eyenzeka KwaZulu-Natal. UNgcongca ufihlwe ngoLwesine olwedlule. Umthombo weSolezwe ongaphakati eqenjini uthe, izolo ekuseni, iSundowns ihlanganile, abadlali babikelwa ngokwenzekile. Kuhoxisiwe ukuziqeqesha ngenxa yokuba muncu kwesimo.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe yiSouth Africa Football Association (Safa) kwabezindaba izolo, umqeqeshi weBafana, uMolefi Ntseki, uthe ufe olwembiza.“Sinohlelo esisebenza ngalo njengoba sisembhidlangweni wokuzibekisela indawo kwi-Afcon. UMadisha ubengomunye wabadlali ebebekulona. Ubengumfana ozithobile ehlala ezihlekela ekhonze kakhulu unina. Kubuhlungu ukuhamba kwakhe ngale ndlela. Ngicela abadlali bebhola bayinakekele impilo yabo,” kusho uNtseki.Uqhube wathi: “Ubengumdlali osemncane obeza kahle futhi elungile. Kuyadumaza lokhu. Kubangani bakhe, eqenjini nasebholeni ngobubanzi, sidumele kakhulu. Silimele. Ngithemba ukuthi umoya wakhe uzosigqugquzela emizameni yethu yokuzibekisela indawo kwi-Afcon nakoweNdebe yoMhlaba.”Esitatimendeni kulile nomengameli weSafa, UDanny Jordaan.UMadisha ubekhona esikwatini sakamuva esidlale imidlalo emibili yokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) neSao Tome and Principe.Ukhushulelwe eqenjini elikhulu leSundowns eminyakeni embalwa edlule emuva kokushaya into ecokeme eqenjini leMultichoice Diski Challenge. Eqenjini elikhulu uwine iCaf Champions League, isicoco seligi kathathu, Telkom Knockout neNedbank Cup. Ngesizini edlule uMadisha udlale imidlalo engu-46 kwiSundowns kumqeqeshi uPitso Mosimane.Eqenjini lesizwe uwine indebe yeCommonwealth Cup eRussia engukaputeni weqembu lesizwe lika-Under 20 ngo-2015.UMadisha ushone emuva kwamahora ambalwa kuphele umcimbi weSundowns wokugubha ukuqeda iminyaka engu-50 obukade useSandton Convention Centre ngoMgqibelo ebusuku. Kulo mcimbi ubengekho yena. Umthombo weSolezwe uthe ubecele ukungaphumeleli ngoba kukhona akulungisayo okuqondene naye.Emcimbini bekukhona bonke abadlali beSundowns bamanje nabeminyaka edlule. Bekukhona nenkakha yaseCameroon, uSamuel Eto’o.Yize amaqembu ePremier Soccer League okukhona  kuwo i-Orlando Pirates, Lamontville Golden Arrows, Cape Town City neSuperSport United nawo ebhonge emswanini edlulisa amazwi enduduzo ngokushona kukaMadisha, iSundowns ayizange iziqinisekise izindaba laze lashona izolo.Emini ikhiphe isitatimende esifushane ithi iyayibona imibiko yabezindaba izokhipha isitatimende uma sekufanele.UMOTJEKA Madisha obengumdlali weMamelodi Sundowns ejabula nozakwabo ngemuva kokunqoba isicoco seligi sesizini ka-2017/2018Izithombe: BACKAPAGEPIX
title: Kudumale umqeqeshi weBafana ngoMadisha

text: UHLULEKILE ukuzibamba umdidiyeli wamabutho aKwaZulu, uMnuz Mlandeni “Mgiliji” Nhleko, waze wagiya ejabula  ngesikhathi ephiwa imoto.UNhleko, osanda kuba ngundabuzekwayo ngokuhola izinkumbi zamabutho aphelezele iSilo samabandla onke uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu ngesikhathi eyotshalwa emasontweni amabili edlule, uphiwe imoto eyiveni nezinkomo ezimbili, izolo.Les sipho besivela enyangeni  edumile uDkt Khehlelezi.Ngesikhathi enikezwa imoto emzini wakhe oseHlalangwenya, kwaNongoma, injabulo ibibhalwe emehlweni kuNhleko, obelokhu egcizelela ukuthi le moto ithi yena.UNhleko utshele Isolezwe ukuthi uhlukene nosizi lokulinda amatekisi.“Uma ngihamba, noma ngabe ngiya emihlanganweni, angisezukulinda amatekisi. Sengizodumisa imoto yami. Ingijabulisile kakhulu le nto eyenziwe uDkt Khehlelezi.”Bebefinya ngendololwane abebehambele emzini kaNhleko izolo, njengoba bekubuswa, kujatshulelwa imoto entsha.Kwabebezomhalalisela bekukhona nabantwana basendlunkulu, okubalwa kubo umntwana uThulani Zulu, okhulumela indlunkulu, ezinye izinyanga namalungu omphakathi.Ngesikhathi exoxa neSolezwe, ingxoxo ibibuye iphazamiseke njengoba uNhleko ebematasa, enza isiqiniseko sokuthi bonke abebemsingethe izolo bagoduka bebusile.Echaza ngesenzo sakhe, uDkt Khehlelezi uthe babone kunesidingo sokuthi benze umsebenzi kaNhleko wokudidiyela amabutho ube lula.“Imoto izokwenza ukuthi kube lula ukuthi uma eya emihlanganweni angasweli izinto zokuhamba. Ngezinkomo, besithi amabutho awadle.”
title: Ujabule wagiya waqephuza uMgiliji ephiwa imoto

text: ULAHLWE elakubo owesilisa waseSkhwebezi, eVryheid oboshwe ngemuva kokutholwa nenyama yenkomo okusolwa ukuthi eyokwebiwa.Umsolwa uboshwe amaphoyisa aseVryheid ophiko olulwa nokwebiwa kwemfuyo nawezobunhloli esehlathini okutholwe kulo inyama nenkomo efile nezinye ebeziphila.Inkosi yaseMpithimpithini, eNgome, uuDerrick Buthelezi, ithe umsolwa ubesekhathazile endaweni.“Lo muntu usehluphe ngisho umndeni wakhe njengoba egcine ehamba ekhaya ngayo le mikhuba yakhe. Izinkomo abasazintshontshi ebusuku kodwa sebezithatha emini bayozihlinza badayise inyama yazo emabhusha aseVryheid angekho emthethweni. Le nto isiphethe kabi kakhulu ngoba umnotho wethu lona abawucekela phansi,” kusho uButhelezi.Uthe okwamanje usalinde izinduna zakhe zimbikele ukuthi eyakwabani inkomo ebiyebiwe ngoba ibisayobhekwa kuzobonwa nesikhumba sayo.Umthombo weSolezwe ongathandanga ukudalulwa uveze ukuthi lo msolwa akwaziwa noma uyathinteka yini kwamanye amacala okwebiwa kwezinkomo ezingu-27 ezebiwe eVryheid, epulazini ngesonto eledlule. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe umsolwa oneminyaka engu-43 kulindeleke ukuba avele maduze enkantolo ngecala kokutholwa nemfuyo yokwebiwa.
title: Ubanjiwe 'owebe' izinkomo

text: UFUNA ukuqinisa udonga lwezakhe umqeqeshi we-Lamontville Golden Arrows uSteve Komphela.UKomphela usho lokhu izolo kwethulwa iKwaZulu-Natal Premier’s Cup eMoses Mabhida Stadium. Imidlalo iphakathi kwamaqembu ayisikhombisa aKwaZulu-Natal ayibamba kwiPremier Soccer League, okuyi-Arrows, AmaZulu FC, Uthongathi, Maritzburg United, Real Kings, Royal Eagles neRichards Bay FC. Izoba sePrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu ngoJulayi 27 okuzobe kuyimidlalo yokuhlunga. NgoJulayi kuzodlalelwa eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza isigaba semidlalo eyandulela owamanqamu nowamanqamu.Abafana Bes’thende abakabi mandla emakethe yokusayinisa abadlali njengoba kuvaliwe. EzikaKomphela zisabuyise uGladwin Shitolo oke wagijima kuleli qembu phambilini.“Ngicabanga ukuthi sinenkinga maphakathi emuva. Singenelwe amagoli amaningi abeqhamuka maphakathi futhi besihluleka ukuvala amabhola emoyeni. Sekuzoba kubi kakhulu njengoba kuhambe * (Limbikani) Mzava, kumele siyilungise leyo nkinga. Esiswini sibatholile abazovala into engikakhathaza kakhulu wudonga,” kusho uKomphela.Ngale kokuxega kodonga i-Arrows ayiqinile nakonozinti njengoba uNkosingiphile Gumede benoMaximilian Mbaeva benamaphutha.Ebuzwa uKomphela ukuthi unazo izinhlelo zokuqinisa le ndawo, uthe: "(Nabo) bayingxenye yodonga futhi ngicabanga ukuthi sizokwazi ukuthola isisombululo kodwa sizobona ukuthi lokho kuzohamba kufike kuphi.”Exinwa ngokuthi ngabe bayambheka unozinti akazange afune ukuphumela obala ngaphandle kokugcizelela elokuthi unaso isixazululo.Ngesizini edlule i-Arrows igcine iqede ngaphandle kweTop 8. UKomphela uthe kusenzima ukusho ukuthi yikuphi abazimisele ngakho kwisizini etsha ngoba basalihlanganisa iqembu.“Ongakusho okwamanje ngabe kungamanga njengoba sisesesigabeni sokuzicija. Imidlalo emibili noma emithathu yokuqala kwesizini yiyona ezosikhombisa ukuthi sibheke kuphi kodwa okusemqoka wukuwina umdlalo esiwudlalayo.”Ngesikhathi kuqhathwa amaqembu i-Arrows itonyulwe njengeqembu elizokweqiwa yimidlalo yokuhlunga okusho ukuthi izoze idlale kweyandulela owamanqamu ngeSonto ngo-9 ekuseni.Izobhekana nozowina phakathi koThongathi naMaZulu FC abazodlala kowokuqala wokuhlunga eMagogo ngo-11 ekuseni.IRichards Bay izobhekana neReal Kings ngo-1 ntambama kuthi i-Eagles ithuthane neMaritzburg United ngo-3 ntambama.
title: UKomphela nezinhlelo zokuqinisa udonga

text: Mhleli: Ngikhathazekile ngezinto ezenzeka eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya esifundazweni sakithi eKZN.Uma uyofuna usizo khona kumele uvuke kakhulu uyobamba ulayini ngo 2.00 ekuseni ngoba uma ufika ngabo 6.00 ekuseni kufanele ukhohlwe wukuthi usizo uzoluthola ngoba kuyoze kushaye u-4.00 ntambama usame kulayini uze ugoduke ungasizakele.Uma ufuna ukusizakala kumele abantu bakhokhele amaphara ukuthi ayobalalela khona esikhungweni. Bakhokha uR250 kuya kuR400 ngokuma kulayina ukuze ube phambili ekuseni. Ngicela uNgqongqoshe uMalusi uGigaba ashintshe uhlelo lokusebenza ezikhungweni ukuze basizakale bonke abantu abasuke bekhona ngalolo suku.Izikhungo esengike ngaya kuzona ngafica le nkinga yiseMngeni, Commercial nasePinetown lapho engangifike khona ngo 4.00 ekuseni kodwa kwathi sekuzovulwa ngathola phambi kwami sekunabantu ababalelwa ku-150 ababekhokhile kumaphara. Ngaze ngagoduka ngingasizakele.Mlungisi Mbambo
title: [IMIBONO] Kuyakhathaza okwenzeka eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya

text: USAPHITHENE amakhanda umndeni womhlengikazi waseGamalakhe obenezinyana eziyisithupha ekhulelwe otholakale ebulewe emuva kokunyamalala.Umndeni kaNksz Nelisa Cele (30) obengumhlengikazi eGamalakhe Community Healthcare usadidekile namanje ngokutholakala kwakhe ebulewe ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule. Kuthiwa isidumbu sikaNksz Cele sitholwe yisivakashi saseGoli ebesihambele e-Oribi Gorge eduze kwasePort Shepstone eweni, sigaxele emagatsheni ezihlahla. Kusolakala ukuthi abantu abambulele bebethi basiphonsa kuleya ndawo ukuze singatholakali.Unina, uNkk Babongile Cele, uthe balokhu bemgcine ngoLwesithathu eyoqedela izinhlelo zokuthenga imoto yakhe - ezobuya nayo. Bathukile ngesikhathi bebona kushaya uLwesine engatholakali ocingweni.Uthe indodakazi yakhe beyingakaze ikhulume ukuthi kukhona inkinga enayo noma umuntu obeyisabisa noma ebingezwani naye.Uthe beyijabule ngenxa yezinto ebezenzeka empilweni yayo.“Sishaqeke ngokungaphezu kwamandla ngale nto eyenzekile. Ubejabule kakhulu ngokuthi emuva kokusebenza kwakhe usezokwazi ukuthi abe nemoto yakhe,” kusho uNkk Cele.Ngesikhathi bezama ukumthola ocingweni ngoLwesine bengamtholi babe sebeqala besola ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle.UNkk Cele uthe emuva kokumthungatha nasezibhedlela babe sebethola esiteshini samaphoyisa ePaddock ukuthi isidumbu sakhe sitholwe yisivakashi saseGoli ebesihambele e-Oribi Gorge eduze kwasePort Shepstone.Uthe babe sebethathwa bayokhonjiswa lapho atholakale khona base beyoqinisekisa isidumbu sakhe. UNkk Cele uthe babuhlungu bewumndeni ngesehlakalo sokubulawa kukaNksz Cele. Uthe sebethembele ophenyweni lwamaphoyisa ngokutholakala kwababulali bendodakazi yakhe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala emuva kokutholakala kwesidumbu sikaNksz Cele sinezibazi zokushaywa.Uthe imbangela yokubulalwa kwakhe ayikaziwa kanti nabenzi bobubi nabo abakaziwa. Uthe amaphoyisa asaphenya.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo usezwakalisa ukudabuka ngesigameko sokubulawa kukaNksz Cele.Uzwakalise ukushaqeka nokudabuka ngokushona komuntu wesifazane ophinde abe ngumsebenzi wezempilo.Uthe ukubulawa komsebenzi wezempilo kuhlezi kuyisimo esibuhlungu kubona njengomnyango ngoba laba bantu babekwe ukuthi benze umsebenzi wokusindisa impilo yabantu.UNobhala weDemocratic Nursing Organisation of South Africa (Denosa) uMnuz Mandla Shabangu udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini wathi zibaphatha kabi izigameko zokubulawa kwabahlengikazi. Uthe ukubulawa kwabahlengikazi kugcina kuholele ekushodeni kwabasebenzi bezempilo ezikhungweni njengoba ethe namanje kusele isikhala lapho obekusebenza khona uNksz Cele.Uthe bafisa ukuthi amaphoyisa asebenze kanzima ekutholeni labo abathinteka ekufeni kwakhe.Kulindeleke ukuthi inkonzo yesikhumbuzo salo mhlengikazi ibanjelwe esontweni iWeseli eduze kwaseGamalakhe CHC namuhla bese yena efihlwa ngoMgqibelo.
title: Unesi obenyamalele utholwe eseshonile

text: UNakanjani Sibiya ungomunye wababhali besiZulu baseNingizimu Afrika abavelele nasebekhiqize kakhulu. Usezuze indathane yemiklomelo futhi usebhale yedwa, wabhala nabanye futhi wahlela imibhalo engaphezu kwamashumi amahlanu eminxeni enhlobonhloboZiningi izizathu okuye kuthiwe yizona eziyimbangela yokuba abantu bakithi bakwenqene kangaka ukufunda. Iningi lalezo zizathu liyizaba nje ezingathi shu futhi esingeke sagxila kuzo ngoba ziwumshonisalanga. Okugcina sekugqama nokho ngukuthi indaba yokungakuthandisisi ukufunda igcina isiyinkombankombane. Bonke abathintekayo kule ndaba bayazihlangula bethi kalingethweswa bona kuphela icala lokungachumi kwesiko lokufunda. Kuqala bona nje abantu okufanele ngabe bayafunda; babalise ngokuthi bazofundani kungekho abazokufunda; bakhale ngokuthi okuningi kokufunda kubhalwe ngesiNgisi abangasiqondi kuyaphi. Labo okufanele bakhiqize okokufunda bazihlangula ngokuthi kuyizindleko ezingenasidingo ukushicilela izincwadi ezingezukufundwa muntu.Yebo, ziningi izizathu. Sengathi kodwa inkinga isuka kude ekutheni abantu abaningi sebazithela ngabandayo nje, kabanandaba kangako nezinto ezibazungezile. Kabasiboni isidingo sokufunda kuzo nesokufunda ngazo. Lokhu kwenza singaphembeki isidingo sokuba kubhalwe izincwadi noma kushicilelwe ulwazi oluphathelene nezinto ezithile. Ngokwesibonelo nje, abantu abaningi kabazihluphi kangako ngezinto eziphathelene nomlando nemvelaphi yabo; beneliswe yilolo lubadlana nje abalwaziyo. Nalolo lubadlana kabanandaba kangako nokuzikhathaza nokuqikilela ukuba lusabalaliswe noma lugcinelwe abanye. Abantu abaningi nanxa bewagcina amasiko kodwa kabanandaba kangako nawo; bawagcina ngoba sebephoqwa yizimo ezithile. Yikho nje amasiko amaningi esaxoveka, asonteka; amanye agcina eseyimisangano yemikhuba; amanye agcina eseshabalele ngenxa yokuphunza kolwazi.Kuyedusa kakhulu ukuba uma kukhulunywa ngokufunda kucatshangwe incwadi noma izinto ezibhaliwe kuphela. Uma kukhuthazwa abantu ngokufunda kufanele kuqalwe ngokuthi bakhuthazwe ukuba bathande futhi babe nolwazi ngezinto ezibazungezile nezinto ezibalulekile ezingamagugu kubona. Lolo lwazi abanalo mabakhuthazwe ukuba balubhale phansi ukuze lufundwe ngabanye ngomuso. Ulwazi abangenalo mabalwethekele ngokulufuna kwabanye noma kweminye imithombo yolwazi. Lokhu kungasiza ekutheni kube nobufakazi besidingo sohlobo oluthile lwezincwadi noma ulwazi abantu abalufunayo kodwa abangalutholi kalula noma abangalutholi nhlobo. Ngamanye amazwi uma abantu behlale bebalisa ngokungatholakali kolwazi oluthile kungabalula ukuba kushicilelwe incwadi enalolo lwazi ngoba singabe sicacile isidingo sayo, kungangabazeki futhi nokuthi izothengwa ifundwe uma isishicilelwe.Elinye iphutha ngukuba kukhuthazwe kuphela ukuba abantu bafunde ngezilimi zabo zebele; kube sengathi bakukhuthalele kakade ukufunda nangezinye izilimi ezinjengesiNgisi kanje. Iqiniso elibuhlungu ngukuthi kwasiNgisi leso abantu abaningi kabazihluphi kangako ngokufunda izinto ezibhalwe ngaso. Ngakho okufanele kugcizelelwe ngukuthi kabakukhuthalele ukufunda ngisho ngabe yisiNgisi kunokuba bangafundi nhlobo. Umuntu okhuthalele isiNgisi angasheshe abone ukuthi kuningi okungatholakali ngesiNgisi kodwa okutholakalayo olimini lwebele bese ekufunda ngolimi lwakhe.Kakulona ihaba ukuthi kuningi okungatholakali ngesiNgisi kodwa okutholakala ngezilimi zethu kuphela. Ngokwesibonelo kazikho kahle esiNgisini izincwadi ezichaza ngokucacile izinkolelo namasiko esintu; ngakho kuba ngcono uma umuntu ezifundela lokhu ngolimi lwakhe ngoba ziyinsada ezilimini zomdabu izincwadi ezikhuluma ngalokhu. Ngamanye amazwi uma ufuna ukufunda ngesiko lokulobola ngeke kukusize kangako ukufunda incwadi yesiNgisi ngoba isiNgisi ngeke sibe nalo igama lengqaqamazinyo, umembeso, umqhoyiso, namanye amaningi.Iphutha elikhulu nokho ngukuba abantu bacabange ukuthi izincwadi ezinhle nezibalulekile zitholakala ngesiNgisi kuphela. Iqiniso ngukuthi ziyindathane izincwadi ezibhalwe ngezilimi zomdabu. Ishwa nje ngukuthi kazifundwa muntu; ngakho kazaziwa muntu. Ezinye zigcina zingasashicilelwa kabusha ngenxa yokuthi ziduva zize zilale uthuli emashalofini ezitolo zezincwadi noma emitapo yolwazi.Abanye baye babalise ngokungabi nasikhathi sokufunda. Kuyizaba nje lokhu ngoba isikhathi sento ebalulekile kuyampintshwa sakhiwe. Noma umatasatasa kangakanani ungayizama okungenani imizuzu eyishumi ngosuku uyisebenzise ekufundeni okuthile. Ngokwesibonelo nje iBhayibheli, okuyincwadi abaningi abanqenayo ukuyifunda bayiqede, kungaphela unyaka usulifunde waliqeda uma ungafunda isahluko esisodwa nje kuphela ngosuku. Abazali abazikhathazayo ngokufundela izingane zabo, ngisho imizuzu eyishumi nanhlanu ngosuku, bangazisiza izingane zabo ukuba kuphele unyaka sezifunde cishe amagama angama-900 000 ngonyaka okungenza lezi zingane zikujwayele ukude zifunda ngezikhathi ezithile; okuyinto ezingagcina seziyenze umkhuba omuhle impilo yazo yonke.
title: Alichume isiko lokufunda ebantwini

text: AKAKHOLWA ukuthi usinde kanjani owesifazane (21) waseMayville osinde kushona abathathu beshayiswa yi-ambulensi ezimele ephaphalaze emgwaqweni.UNksz Thobisile Ngema waseNsimbini uthe namanje akazi ukuthi usinde kanjani esigamekweni esidlule nemiphefumulo yabantu abathathu okuthiwa bashayiswe yi-ambulensi okuthiwa beyidla amagalani, yaphaphalaza yashayisa abantu abane abebehamba eceleni komgwaqo.Uthe ubeya emsebenzini emuva kwehora lesithupha ekuseni ngoMsombuluko elandelana nabanye abantu abathathu nabo akholwa ukuthi bebelibangise emsebenzini. “I-ambulensi iqhamuke phambi kwethu ihamba kwelinye icala lomgwaqo. Beyigijima ngesivinini esikhulu futhi umshayeli ehambe esika ezinye izimoto. Ibe seyiphaphalaza yashayisa enye imoto yeqa yaqonda kithina yasishayisa. Okuningi angikukhumbuli ngoba ngikhumbula ukuthi ishayise mina nabanye abebehamba eceleni komgwaqo. "Mina ngivuke sekugcwele abantu besingungile sekukhona namanye ama-ambulensi kanye nayo lena esishayisile. Oyedwa walabo esishayiswe nabo ushonele khona lapho.
