Abanye ngizwa manje ukuthi bashonele esibhedlela kwasinda mina - angazi ukuthi ngisinde kanjani,” kusho uNksz Ngema.UNksz Ngema uthe uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela eKing Edward VIII kodwa nakhona wachitha ihora nje kuphela njengoba ethe uthole imihuzukwana emzimbeni kodwa akazange aphuke ndawo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aseCato Manor aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso emuva kokuthi imoto yabezimo eziphuthumayo iphaphalaze yashayisa abantu abane abebehamba eceleni komgwaqo. Uthe oyedwa walaba abashayisekile nokukholakala ukuthi uneminyaka engu-28 ushonele khona endaweni yesigameko kwase kuthi ababili bashonela esibhedlela.
title: Usinde i-ambulensi ibashayisa kwashona 3

text: ILUNGU le-ANC ephalamende uDkt Makhosi Khoza usecele ukukhulekiswa njengoba ngoLwesibili kungenzeka abekwe icala ku-ANC ngezinsolo zokudicilela phansi isithunzi senhlangano.Lokhu kulandela izinkulumo zikaDkt Khoza ngesonto eledlule lapho akhuluma khona esidlangalaleni ethi uJacob Zuma akasadingeki esikhundleni sobumengameli.Ngemuva kwale nkulumo ayenze emcimbini wokukhumbula uDkt Nelson Mandela, i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal yathi uzoqondiswa ubugwegwe.Ebhala ekhasini lakhe kuFacebook ngoMsombuluko uDkt Khoza uthe ukholelwa kwi-ANC nohulumeni olalela abantu.“Ngikholelwa kuhulumeni wabantu, lapho abaholi be-ANC bezokwazi ukuhlangana badingide ukuthi ubani ozoqokelwa ukuhola nokuthi ubani ozosuswa. Kulokhu kuyacaca ukuthi kubusa inkohlakalo,” usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi abaholi bamaqembu eyimufelandawonye nabo sebecele okufanayo, ukuthi uZuma asuswe esikhundleni. Uthe inkohlakalo isona sizathu esihamba phambi ngokugqoza kwentuthuko emazweni ase-Afrika, nokuyinto ezomenza aqhubeke alwe.“Namhlanje ngokwazi kwami i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, le esazovela enkantolo ngezinsolo zokupheka imiphumela yokhetho, izongibeka icala ngoba angifuni ukufa ngithule,” kusho yena.Ugcizelele ukuthi akeseki amaqembu aphikisayo kodwa weseka ubulungiswa obufunwa ngabantu bakuleli.“Ningithandazise bazalwane. Ngibhekene noSathane ngqo. Inzima lempi. Sengimema nabo oBhambatha kaManciza, Sekhukhune, Moshoeshoe, Shaka kaSenzangakhona, Mkabayi kaJama, DiniZulu. Ningathuli,” kuphetha yena.
title: ‘Ningithandazise bazalwane, ngibhekene noSathane ngqo.’ - Makhosi Khoza

text: KUVELA ukuthi ukulimala yikona okwakhele iphunga lomzondo uThabo “Section 10” Qalinge ethimbeni labaqeqeshi be-Orlando Pirates.Isolezwe lihoshe ngomthombo ukuthi uQalinge ochithwe kwiPirates ngenyanga edlule, udinwe uyaveva ngesenzo sabaqeqeshi beZimnyama asibiza ngesihluku, nokungamzweli.UQalinge uthinteke umsipha wahlala isikhathi eside engadlali nokugcine ngokuthi aphelelwe yindawo esikimini sePirates.Ngesikhathi ebuya ekulimaleni iPirates ibisihlangene, kwanzima ukuthi adlale kwazise ibisijaha isicoco seligi egcine isishwebile sadliwa yiMamelodi Sundowns. Empeleni uQalinge udlale imidlalo ewu-79 kwiBucs, wavalela phakathi amagoli ayisithupha.Ngaphambi kokulimala ubeyisethenjwa kwezikaMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic eshaya namagoli abalulekile.“UQalinge akeneme ngendlela aphathwe ngayo kwiPirates nangendlela ahambe ngayo. Ukhala ngesihluku sethimba labaqeqeshi elingafunanga ukumbekezelela ebuya ekulimaleni. Ubesafuna ukuyidlalela iPirates kodwa bekucaca ukuthi ithimba labaqeqeshi alisayizwa indaba yakhe,” kusho umthombo osondelene kakhulu noQalinge.Umthombo uwaqinisekisile amahlebezi okuthi uQalinge uxoxisana nezimbangi ezinkulu zeBucs, iKaizer Chiefs.“Yebo uQalinge uyaxoxa neChiefs, futhi kungenzeka asayine kuyona. Nokho kimina uveze ukuthi kukhona iqembu laphesheya kwezilwandle elimfunayo, uzoqala ngokuthi axoxisane nalo. Uthe uma kuwukuthi azihlangani izinto naleli qembu laphesheya kwezilwandle, kungenzeka-ke adlalele iChiefs,” kuqhuba umthombo.UVina Maphosa, okhulumela iChiefs, akayivumanga futhi akayiphikanga eyokumataniswa kukaQalinge naMakhosi.“Noma ngabe kuthiwa siyaxoxa naye besingeke sinekele izwe. Kodwa cha okwamanje akukho okubambekayo engingathi ngiyakuxoxa mayelana neChiefs noQalinge,” kusho uMaphosa ngezinqamulelayo.Abanye abadlali abachithwe yiPirates * -Abbubaker Mobara (osekwiCape Town City), Jackson Mabokgwane no-Ayanda Nkosi. UThamsanqa Gabuza noKudakwashe Mahachi bajoyine iSuperSport United.EZimnyama zisayinise uSiphesihle “Mbesuma” Ndlovu, Fortune Makaringe, Kabelo Dlamini, Bongani Sam, Tebogo Tlolane nonozinti uJoris Delle.Amakhosi wona izinto azikawacaceli kahle ekusayineni njengoba esasayinise kuphela abadlali ababili futhi abangabokufika.IChiefs isayinise uLazarous Kambole waseZambia obedlalela iZESCO United noJames Kotei obedlalela iSimba yaseTanzania.
title: UQalinge uyaveva ngesihluku seZimnyama

text: Lo mcimbi ubuseSun City, eNorth West, kuwo abaculi abaningi behlonishwe ngegagelo labo emculweni.USimmy ubeqokwe emunxeni weNewcomer of the Year neBest Afro Pop.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uthe lusekude ukhalo njengoba yena azi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga uyohlonishwa emicimbini efana nalena.“Angiphathekile kabi okwangempela njengoba bengiqala ukuqokwa emcimbini ofana nalona. Ngiyababongela bonke ozakwethu abathole izindondo kulo mcimbi basebenze kanzima bonke, nami olwami usuku luyeza,” kusho uSimmy.Uthe ukuqokwa kwakhe kulo mcimbi kumkhombisile ukuthi abantu bazithandile izingoma zakhe azakhele ngazo igama endimeni yomculo.“Izingoma zami abantu bazithande kakhulu, nalokho okube ngenye yezinto ezingenze ngaziqhenya. Kuningi okusamele ngikwenze ukuze umsebenzi wami ungashabalali kodwa ube muhle kunalokhu oyikhona manje,” kuchaza yena.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kube nezikhalo uSimmy noMlindo the Vocalist bebuya belambatha njengoba bengatholanga neyodwa indondo.Kodwa uSjava usule izinyembezi zabaningi njengoba ekhale wemuka nendondo ye-Album of the Year neyeBest Pop Album (African).Abanye bakhale ngokuthi uSjava indondo yeSong of the Year ethathwe uHolly Rey bekumele itholwe nguyena.Kodwa le nsizwa yaseBergville kucacele abaningi ukuthi izithokozele izindondo ezitholile.USho Madjozi naye uhambe ehleka yedwa kulo mcimbi njengoba ekhale wemuka nendondo yeBest Female neyeBest Newcomer.Kulo mcimbi kubuye kwahlonishwa abaculi okukhona kubo uHHP, indondo yakhe eyamukelwe indodana yakhe uLeano, iqembu iTKzee neMango Groove.Umcimbi walo nyaka ubungahlukile kweminye njengoba izinga lawo lilokhu liqhubekile nokwehla.Kuwona kunandise abaculi okukhona kubo iBongo Maffin, Ntokozo Mbambo, Rebecca Malope, Thebe nabanye.Uhlelo beluphethwe wuNomzamo Mbatha, Mpho Popps, Melanie Bala, Bob Mabena, Khuli Chana noThwasa.
title: Akajabhanga engatholi neyokubika kumaSama

text: UMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs, uSteve “Mphathi” Komphela, uchaze umgadli waleli qembu uBernard Parker njengensephe.UParker uke wehlelwa yifomu ngendlela eyisimanga okwenze abaningi balibeka ngembala elokuthi usephelelwe ushatini. Lo mgadli ohlezi endaweni yesithathu ohlwini lwabagadli abanamagoli amaningi kuBafana Bafana ngamagoli angu-22, uhlale unyaka engashayi igoli.Uqede ishobolo lokuphikwa amagoli ngesikhathi iChiefs ithela othulini iPolokwane City ngo 3-2 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership. UParker uphinde washaya elinye igoli elimqoka ngesikhathi Amakhosi equmba phansi iLamontville Golden Arrows ngo 2-0 eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, emdlalweni wokugcina wokuvala unyaka.UKomphela ebuzwa ngokwenza uParker akhombise izimpawu zokubuyela efomini, akazange asebenzise amagama amaningi.“Ubunsephe yinto ozalwa nayo. Uma unabo, usuke unabo, akekho ongabuthatha kuwena. Naye-ke uParker unabo,” kusho leli ciko elinguKomphela.UParker ufike kuMakhosi kumasizini amane edlule. Kuleli qembu ubesephenduke ithemba lamagoli ngaphambi kokuthi ehlelwe yifomu. Ngo-2014/2015 nguyena odle umklomelo womdlali oshaye amagoli amaningi ehlohla angu-10.Phakathi kwamagoli amqoka aseke wawashayela iChiefs, singabala nalinamathelisa enethini ngo-2013 ngesikhathi Amakhosi eguqisa iSuperSport United ngo 1-0 kowamanqamu weNedbank Cupe Moses Mabhida, eThekwini. Kulo mdlalo uParker nguyena owaba yiqhawe.Njengamanje ubanga ijezi noMitchelle Katsvairo, Lewis Macha, Siphelele Mthembu, obheke kuBleomfontein Celtic, no-Edward Manqele.UKomphela uke wathembela kakhulu kuKatsvairo odabuka eZimbabwe. Nokho lo mgadli uhlulekile wukulenza elakhe ijezi ephikwa amagoli.UParker kubhekene ukuthi aqhubeke nefomu yakhe uma sekubuya imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership ngoFebhuwari. IChiefs izobhekana neFree State Stars koweligi eFNB Stadium, eSoweto, ngoFebhuwari 7.
title: UKomphela uchazekile ngensephe enguParker

text: ISIHLABANI se-hip hop, uMthembeni "eMtee" Ndevu, uthi kulilimazile igama lakhe emphakathini ukubhecwa ngokuthi udla izidakamizwa. U-eMtee (28) waseMatatiele, KwaZulu-Natal, ubalule ukuthi umzansi Afrika wonke uyazi ukuthi yena uzihuqela insangu kuphela."Anginamahloni ngalokho. Ngiyazi umphakathi awukayamukeli insangu njengogwayi osemthethweni. Yingakho abantu bengixhumanisa nezidakamizwa." Uthe ubhekene nempi enkulu selokhu athatha isinqumo sokuzimela. "Kunabantu abakhokha emisakazweni ukuba umculo wami ungadlalwa. Abantu bazitshela ukuthi angiqophi kanti ngisaqhubeka nokuqopha umculo wami. Usemnandi njengasekuqaleni kodwa awudlalwa emisakazweni." Uthe inhliziyo yakhe ibuhlungu ngoba kunenqwaba yabantu abamkweletayo. "Abanye abangikweleti imali kodwa bangikweleta izihe engibenzele zona." Uthe ngenxa yokuthi akasiye umuntu ophiwe ukukhuluma, uthathe isinqumo sokwenza ingoma ephume izolo esihloko sithi Laqhasha napike kuyo uLolly noFlesh. "Nami ngiqoqa ngayo izikweleti. Ngiyibhekise kubo bonke abantu abangikweletayo. Ngifuna bangikhokhele." Uthe lo mucwi ulandela awukhiphe ezinyangeni ezedlule othi Ithemba futhi lezi zingoma zizobe ziyingxenye ye-albhamu yakhe ezophuma ngo-Ephreli esihloko sithi Logan. Eqhuba uthe leli cwecwe uliqambe ngendodana yakhe yesibili uLogan. Kuzokhunjulwa ukuthi eyokuqala yango2015 eyayithi Avery, yayiqanjwe ngendodana yakhe. Abaningi bazoyikhumbula ngamanoni ayethi Roll Up, Pearl Thusi  nelalithi We Up. Uthe nakule abantu abalindele ubumnandi bodwa njengoba inezingoma ezingu-18. "Kulena ngibuye ngavezela abalandeli bami elinye ikhono ebebengalazi ngami, lokucula. Abantu abazi ukuthi mina ngangicula futhi ngibhidisa ikhwaya esikoleni futhi ngangicula nebhendi. Bazokuzwa konke lokhu kule-albhamu." Esephetha ubonge abalandeli bakhe noNkulunkulu ngokuwa bevuka naye kwaze kwalapha.
title: “Akekho oyongiyekisa insangu” - eMtee

text: Igcokama Elisha belihlangene namakhosi ngoLwesihlanu eSanlam Centre, eMpangeni lapho ebelibizelwe khona ukuzochaza ngesihloko se-albhamu iDog Style, nezidubedube zaseMoses Mabhida.Indaba yonakale ngokuthi Igcokama litheleke neqululabalandeli abebengalawuleki bethuka nenhlamba bebuza ukuthi lenzeni Igcokama.Abalandeli bangene nalo enxanxatheleni yezitolo lapho bekubanjwe khona umhlangano.Bafike bavinjwa emnyango wegumbi lomhlangano kwasuka omkhulu umsindo bethi abayi ndawo. Bebephethe nezingqwembe ezibhalwe amagama asongayo abhekiswe kumdidiyeli wekomiti uDr 3 Seconds, omunye umbhalo uthi “3 Seconds Must Fall". Elinye libhalwe "3 Seconds usenzela iDog Style".Kuphoqeleke ukuthi kungenelele amaphoyisa elekelelana nonogada bale ndawo. Kuthe selingenile Igcokama kwathatha isikhathi ukuthi umhlangano uqale ngoba umsindo ububhokile. Kuze kwacelwa lona Igcokama ukuthi likhuze abalandeli balo abebengezwa mshini.Belilokhu liphuma lingena liyaluza kuchitheka injobo njengoba belibhince ibheshu nembatha lase limboza ithawula elimhlophe ekhanda. Belilokhu lixolise njalo ekomitini lamakhosi ngobekwenzeka. Lithi belingaqondile lutho olubi kodwa abalandeli bayaliphelezela.Uthe ukuba ngcono umsindo kwangenwa odabeni ikomiti lacela incazelo ngesihloko esithi iDog Style. Igcokama lithe licela uxolo uma liphambukile kodwa lalizama ukucikoza lihehe nabathengi bomculi ngesihloko."Njengoba sazi ukuthi siphila esikhathini samanje, umculo usulalelwa abantu abehlukene ngisho intsha emanyuvesi iyawuthanda umaskandi. Ngondla izingane ngomculo, yiwona msebenzi wami," kuchaza Igcokama.Lithe selingena odabeni lwaseMoses Mabhida kwacaca ukuthi umhlangano uyadungeka, kwangena abaqaphi bathi akuhlakazekwe.Isikhulu sezokuxhumana eSanlam Centre, uLindiwe Dube, sithe isimo siyaphuma esandleni kuphazamiseka nokusebenza ezitolo.UMdidiyeli wekomiti uDr 3 Seconds uthe baphoqelekile ukuthi kuhlehle umhlangano ngoba bebengazi ukuthi Igcokama lizofika nabalandeli.
title: Umhlangano ngeDog Style ubhuntshiswe abalandeli

text: KUMCASULILE umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, ukudedela iphenathi ngemizuzu yokugcina kweqembu lakhe okuholele ekutheni bahlulwe yi-Esperance Tunis emdlalweni wamaqoqo kwiCaf Champions League.ISundowns engompetha beChampions League igcine ihlulwe ngo 2-1 ngemuva kokuthi uBangaly Soumaharo edale iphenathi ngomzuzu ka-89.Amagoli kulo mdlalo obuseLucas Moripe Stadium ashaywe uYassine Khenisse.Kwathi uSibusiso Vilakazi washaya elokulinganisa esiwombeni sokuqala.UMosimane ubeze kulo mdlalo elibeke ngesihloko elokuthi ufuna amaphuzu amathathu, njengoba ubezibekele ukuthi okungenani baphume namaphuzu amane kwi-Esperance. Umdlalo olandelayo usekuhambeni ngoJuni 21 eStade Olympic de Rades, eTunisia.Umphumela ubeke i-Esperance eqhulwini ku-Group C ngamaphuzu ayisikhombisa. ISundowns inamaphuzu amane. Amaqembu amabili azoqeda phezulu iqoqo ngalinye azodlulela kuma-quarterfinal.“Sizenzele phansi ngesikhathi esimqoka somdlalo, sidala iphenathi ngomzuzu ka-89. Nami ngendlela engibone ngayo sidlale kabi. Uma udlala kabi ke ebhokisini iphenathi leyo, angizange ngikholwe,” kusho uMosimane.Uthe bekusobala ukuthi i-Esperance izele iphuzu kuleli.“Uma bebengawinanga besizoqhubeka nokulingana ngamaphuzu phambili. Ngibatshelile (abadlali) ukuthi kumele bawaqaphele amaqembu asenhla ne-Afrika, ayakwazi ukudlalela amaphenathi, yize ngingasho ukuthi bekungesiyona. Kumele ukhaliphe ungadlali njengoba wenza lapha kwiPSL kodwa ke sibe budedengu, ingicasule kabi leya phenathi. Kodwa ke njengomqeqeshi kumele ubhekane nesimo esifana nalesi.”UMosimane wethemba ukuthi kuzofika isikhathi somdlalo sekukhona abadlali abaluleme njengoMotjeka Madisha olimele ngempelasonto. Uthembisile ukuthi bazobuya nawo amaphuzu agcwele eTunisia.“Ngikholwa wukuthi uma sesinabadlali abaluleme, singalishaya leli qembu khona eTunisia. Kunzima khona ukwamukela (ukuhlulwa) nabo bayazi ukuthi bebengeke baphume ePitoli ukube basifice siphelele,” kusho uMosimane.Lena yinkulumo angazange ayamukele umqeqeshi we-Esperance, uFaouzi Benzarti.“Ngicabanga ukuthi kuzoba nzima ukwenza lokho (ukuthi iSundowns ibashayeleekhaya).“Uma ningakwazi ukuwina lapha, nizowina kanjani ekuhambeni,” kusho uBenzarti.Khonamanjalo iSuperSport United ibambane ngo 2-2 neTP Mazembe yaseDR Congo ekuhambeni emdlalweni weCAF Confederation Cup.
title: UPitso udangele ngoweDowns

text: KUSAZOQHUTSHEKWA nokudilizwa kwiPlatinum Stars ngemuva kokuthi izolo leli qembu limemezele ukuthi ngeke liyivuselele inkontileka yomqeqeshi uCavin Johnson. Ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe iqembu, ukudedelwa kukaJohnson kuyindlela yokufuna isiqalo esisha esibheke ezintweni ezinkulu, nokusho ukuhlukana nabanye abadlali.IDikwena ayizange imlinde uJohnson aze abuye eTunisia lapho ebehambe neqembu liyodlala koweCAF Confederation Cup.Leli qembu lakuleli lithole isibhaxu sika 3-0 kwiCS Sfaxien. Lona bese kuwumdlalo wesibili iDikwena ithola induku. Kodlule yabhajadiswa iMbabane Swallows ngo 4-2 ekuhambeni.Iqembu lizithola lidlala kwiConfederation Cup ngemuva kokuqeda endaweni yesithathu kwi-log ngaphansi kukaJohnson ngesizini ka-2015/2016.Kule ka-2016/2017 esanda kusongwa izinto azizange zihambe kahle njengoba ligcine lihlulekile nokuthola indawo kwiTop 8 liqeda endaweni yesishiyagalolunye.Ngesikhathi imiphumela ingaqhamuki, uJohnson ubelokhu ekusho ukuthi inhloso yakhe wukwakha iqembu elizoba yinsimbi engagobi ngomuso njengoba kule sizini enikeza ithuba nabadlali abancane.Kungenzeka ukuthi ke kube nokushayisana kwemibono phakathi kwakhe nezikhulu zeqembu. Isitatimende okucashunwe kusona usihlalo weqembui uCliff Ramaroa, siyakuveza ukuthi nabadlali basazokhonjwa indlela kwiDikwena.“Sithanda ukudlulela kwelinye izinga. Sikholwa wukuthi ushintsho olufana nalolu luzoletha umuntu ozokwazi ukukhuphulela iqembu kwelinye izinga. Lapha akekho umuntu oxoshiwe kodwa inkontileka engeke isavuselelwa,” kusho uRamaroa.Imibiko yayizolo ibisiqhakambisa phambili igama likaRoger de Sa njengongenzeka athathe izintambo.Isitatimende siqhube sathi kuzoba nezinye izinguquko nakubadlali.“Sizomemezela ezinye izinguquko ethimbeni labaqeqeshi nakubadlali. Sizomemezela nomqeqeshi omusha ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini entsha,” kusho uRamaroa.
title: Kunabadlali beDikwena abazodilizwa noJohnson

text: IZINKINGA zokudlanga kwezifo ezithikameza umqondo nezinye ezitshudenini nakothisha basezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme kudinga ukuthi zibhekwe.Lokhu kuvezwe uSolwazi Adam Habib, ongumphathi weNyuvesi iWits ekhuluma engqungqutheleni yeNational Professional Teachers’ Organisation of South Africa (Naptosa) eGreyville ngeledlule.UHabib uthe emhlabeni wonke kunenkinga enkulu yokudlanga kwezifo ezithikameza umqondo wezitshudeni ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.Uthe ukholwa wukuthi inkinga ingaphezu kwalokhu okushiwo wucwaningo.“Siyayibona emanyuvesi ngoba siyayilandelela futhi amanyuvesi ayindawo encane okwenza kube lula ukuthi siziqondisise izingqinamba ezikhona. Sibe nezehlo ezibuhlungu zezitshudeni ezine ezizibulele nyakenye, lokhu azikwenzanga enyuvesi ngaphakathi,” kusho uHabib.Uthe asebekwenzile esikhungweni sabo wukusungula izinhlelo ezinqala zokusiza izitshudeni okubalwa kuzo ukuxoxa nongoti bezengqondo ukuze bathole ukuthi yini abangayenza ukusiza izitshudeni.UHabib uthe emuva kwalokho bafake izinhlelo ezehlukene okubalwa kuzo ukuba nenombolo esebenza ubusuku bonke engafonelwa uma izitshudeni zinenkinga zizizwa zinomuzwa wokufuna ukuzibulala.Uthe izitshudeni zisuke zingakhuluma nothile oqeqeshiwe ukuthi alalele aphinde anike iziyalo.“Sinongoti ekulashweni kwezifo ezithikameza umqondo nezinye izinhlelo zokweseka izitshudeni emikhakheni ezikuyo. Izinkinga ezihlangabezana nezitshudeni ezinye zazo kufanele ngabe zalungiswa emazingeni aphansi.”Uthe izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme zibhekene nengwadla ngoba kufanele zenze yonke imisebenzi engenziwa ngendlela ukuze ziqinisekise ukuthi izitshudeni zisesimeni esifanele somqondo ukuze zikwazi ukufunda.“Alukho usizo lwezempilo olufanele ngakho inyuvesi kufanele iluhlinzeke. Abantu abadli ngendlela manje inyuvesi kufanele ibe nohlelo lokuletha ukudla. Azikho ezinye izinhlelo zokweseka izitshudeni ngakho sekufanele thina sizifakele ezethu izinhlelo ezizohlanganisa zonke izinto ukuze kusizakale izitshudeni,” kusho uHabib.Isikhulu esiphezulu seNaptosa, uMnuz Basil Manuel, sithe nothisha babhekene nenkinga ngoba ayikacwaningisiswa kahle indaba yesimo somqondo sabo.“Othisha abaningi banengcindezi, elinye iningi labo lithatha imishanguzo yomfutho ophezulu wegazi abanye bathatha imishanguzo yokhwantalala i-prozac,” kusho uManuel.Uthe uyazi ukuthi imininingwane anayo ayinalo ucwaningo olwenziwe ngayo kodwa wathi lena yinto ekhona nabayibonayo.Uxwayise ngokuthi isimo sizogcina sesingasalawuleki uma kungabhekwana naso.Uthe bamatasa nocwaningo njengamanje olubheka ukuthi inkinga seyidlange kangakanani.UManuel uthe bafisa sengathi lungenziwa ngcono uhlelo olukhona lapho othisha bekwazi ukwelulekwa ngokomqondo baphinde bakhulume ngezinkinga abahlangabezana nazo.Uthe kukhona iziphakamiso asebezenzile futhi bafuna ukubamba iqhaza ekufunweni kwesisombululo bangagcini kuphela ngokukhomba izinkinga nezingqinamba ezikhona kodwa bangenzi lutho.
title: ‘Azisukunyelwe izifo zomqondo ezitshudenini nakothisha’

text: Icala lavulwa ngemuva kokuthi kuthiwa bashaye owesifazane bemsola ngokusabalalisa i-video eyayibaveza behlezi bephuza utshwala endaweni yokulala okwakugcinwe kuyo uBabes ngemuva kokusabalala kwe-video eshaywa yisoka lakhe uMampintsha. I-video yasabalala ngemuva kokuthi kuvele ukuthi uBabes uyelashwa. Wavela ephila saka kanti abantu abaningi yabashiya bezibuza imibuzo.Kuvela ukuthi sabacika isenzo sowesifazane sokusabalalisa i-video njengoba sakubeka kwacaca ukuthi umndeni ukhuluma amampunge uma uthi uBabes ulimele.UNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara, okhulumela uphiko lwezokushushisa esifundazweni, uthe idokodo lecala liphindele emaphoyiseni ukuze ayoqhubeka nophenyo.“Icala siyaqinisekisa ukuthi linikwe umshushisi omkhulu eNkantolo yaseThekwini ukuze alibheke wabe esenxusa ukuthi amaphoyisa aqhubeke nophenyo. Ngakho idokodo selibuyiselwe emaphoyiseni aseMbilo ukuze aqhubeke nophenyo,” kuchaza uNatasha.UBabes noMampintsha babe undabamlonyeni ngesonto eledlule ngesikhathi ngoMsombuluko ekuseni kuvukwa nge-video ekhombisa uMampintsha eshaya uBabes.UBabes wavula icala nokuthe ngoLwesibili uMampintsha waya emaphoyiseni wagcina ngokuya eNkantolo yasePinetown wadedelwa ngebheyili kaR2 000. UMampintsha ugcine evulele uBabes icala lokumshaya. Uzobuyela enkantolo ngoMeyi 15.
title: Liphindele emaphoyiseni elecala elavulelwa oBabes

text: OBENGUSIHLALO we-African Union (AU) uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma usegxeke abaholi abakhuluma esidlangalaleni izinto zangaphakathi ezithinta i-ANC.UDkt Dlamini Zuma, obekhuluma engqungqutheleni yokuvala yophiko lwabesifazane yesifunda iTheku izolo, uthe uyakuqonda ukuthi amalungu anombono ngezinto ezenzekayo.“Kukhona izinkundla zangaphakathi zokuzwakalisa ukungenami. Kwi-ANC, abantu bakhuluma ngokukhululeka, siyazixoxa izinto siphikisane ngazo kodwa uma sekunesivumelwano sonke kumele siseseke,” kusho uDkt Dlamini Zuma.Abaholi abaphezulu okubalwa uNobhala jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Gwede Mantashe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa nenkosikazi yengqalabutho yomzablazo, uMnuz Ahmed Kathrada, uNksz Barbara Hogan bagxeke uMengameli Jacob Zuma ngokuxosha abanye ongqongqoshe kubalwa nowezeziMali uMnuz Pravin Gordhan nePhini lakhe uMnuz Mcebisi Jonas.Abaholi be-ANCWL izolo basebenzise ithuba lokuphakamisa uDkt Dlamini Zuma njengomengameli olandelayo we-ANC.IMeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, yamukela uDkt Dlamini Zuma, ithe ungumuntu onamava ongaba ngumengameli.USihlalo omusha we-ANCWL eThekwini, uNksz Lindiwe Mthembu, ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi uDkt Dlamini Zuma kumele abe ngumengameli.“Uma uhluliwe awuphumeli ngaphandle uyokhalaza, ubani ofuna akudabukele?” kubuza uNksz Mthembu.
title: UDlamini Zuma akayizwa eyabagxekayo

text: UHLALELE ovalweni umndeni wamalungu amathathu abengcwatshwa eMondlo ngoMgqibelo, adutshulwa emasontweni amabili edlule e-Utrecht, okuthiwa umsolwa ubonakale ewalandela ngoLwesihlanu.Kwabangcwatshiwe kubalwa uNkk Mavis MaPhenyane Nzima owayeyikhansela le-ANC KwaNzimane, e-Utrecht, owabulawa nendodana yakhe uMnuz Siyanda Nzima noNksz Thobile Phenyane.Kwasinda abane kulesi sigameko okukhona nowesifazane oyisihlobo.Kulesi sehlakalo kwashona noMnuz Maxwel Dlamini waseSwatini namanje ongakatholakali umndeni wakhe.Isidumbu sakhe sisaduve emakhazeni kuleli njengoba amaphoyisa esazama ukuthola izihlobo zakhe.UNkk Nzima ungcwatshwe ngosuku olulodwa nomyeni wakhe uMnuz Andries Nzima owabulawa wukwethuka ngemuva kokushona komkakhe.UNzima ungcwatshwe ngoMgqibelo kubo ePaulpietersburg ngenxa yokuthi umndeni wakhe ucele ukuthi angcwatshwe ngokuhlukana nomkakhe.Ilungu lomndeni kaNkk Nzima, elicele ukungadalulwa ngenxa yokwesaba, lithe yize sebethuthile ekhaya kodwa basesaba ngoba umsolwa akaboshiwe.“NgoLwesihlanu amanye amalungu omndeni abeyothengela umngcwabo alandelwe umsolwa. Ubonwe yile ntombazane eyasinda. Kuthiwa imoto uyipake eduze kwalena abebehamba ngayo wabalandela ngaphakathi esitolo,” kuchaza ilungu.Lithe kushayelwe amaphoyisa ngaleso sikhathi afika alandela imoto yomsolwa kodwa yangatholakala.Kuthiwa amakhamera asesitolo ayayiveza imoto yakhe ephume yangabonakala ukuthi ibheke ngakuphi.Emngcwabeni bekukhona uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha nokuPhepha koMphakathi, KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, othembise ukuthi akusekude atholakale umsolwa. Phambilini emuva kokuvakashela umndeni, uKaunda uthe ukhathazekile ngokuchitheka kwegazi esifundazweni.Kusolwa ukuthi umndeni ubulawelwe ukusolwa ngokubulala owesilisa owayelusa izinkomo zikaNkk Nzima. Kuthiwa umndeni kamufi wasola uNkk Nzima ngokuthi wabulala umfana ukuze athwale ngaye.Kuthiwa umsolwa wafika wafuna ubhiya esitolo sikaNkk Nzima watshelwa ukuthi awukho waphinde wabuya esezodubula. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe kuphenywa amacala amane okubulala.
title: Uvalo emndenini wabebengcwatshwa

text: UMNDENI wesilomo sikamaskandi, uMjikijelwa “Ichalaha LikaShafuza” Ngubane, uthi ushona nje ubesekhombe isiza abesesimbile emzini wakhe kaJikijiki KwaMaphumulo. Ubezokwakha indlu yezinsizwa ebezimgidela. Kuthiwa ubehlele ukuthi ayakhe afake yonke impahla kuyona ukuze bafike bahlale kahle uma befikile.Umndeni uthe ugqemeke engeqiwa ntwala ngokushona kwalo mculi ngenxa yokuthi ubewusizo.Udadewabo oyimenenja yakhe emculweni, uThembi Ngubane, uthe uMjikijelwa ubengafuni ukubona amalungu omndeni ehlupheka.Uthe ubebondla aphinde abathengele nezingubo zokugqoka.“Ubengafuni ukubona umuntu wakubo elambile noma egugelwe. Uma ezwe ukuthi kukhona ongenakudla ubengakhulumi, ububona esengena ngeGTI yakhe igcwele ukudla. Uma ugugelwe ubengahlekisi ngawe, ubevele athenge oshoda ngakho akunike. Ubethengela umuntu ngisho impahla yangaphansi. Uma kungamaholidi kaDisemba noma awePhasika, ubefonela bonke abafowabo nodadewabo abahlala edolobheni abatshele ukuthi uyabadinga. Ubengagcini ngokusho kuphela, ubesithumelela imali nge-eWallet athi eyokugibela akuyiwe ekhaya,” kusho uThembi.Uqhube wathi ubengafuni ukuphoxa amalungu omndeni wakhe.“Ubeze enze iphutha ngoba enqena ukukuphoxa uma ucela ukuthi nibonane avume ebe azi ukuthi ngeke eze,” kuqhuba uThembi.Uma ekhona kubo kuthiwa bekuhlala kosiwa inyama kujatshulwa.Umndeni ukhala ngokuthi kumsheshisile ukugula futhi ubungazitsheli ngesikhathi kumqala ukuthi kungagcina kumthathile. Uthe uze wamyisa esibhedlela sikahulumeni ngemuva kokuvumelana nomndeni, ekhala ngokuthi usechithe imali eningi ngesikhathi esifushane njengoba eqale walashwa eCity Hospital eThekwini.Uthe bekungekhona ukuthi ushoda ngemali ngoba ubengathembele emculweni kuphela kodwa ubengusomabhizinisi njengoba enamatekisi amane athutha umphakathi ahambela eGoli.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe ngeSonto lifika emzini kaMjikijelwa izolo, lifice Igcokama Elisha ebelizobhonga emswanini.Kuphinde kwatheleka nabalandeli bakaMjikijelwa abafike bakhihla isililo egcekeni. Abanye baze bathuliswa amalungu omndeni ebaphuzisa amanzi bezibhonqa phansi. Kuphinde kwafika namalungu ebandla laKwaShembe elethe umkhuleko.Kushone elayizolo lungakaziwa usuku azongcwatshwa ngalo uMjikijelwa kodwa umndeni wakhe uthe, uzongcwatshwa khona emzini wakhe.
title: Ubezokwakhela amagidangoma uMjikijelwa

text: I-NFP ithi izoyinyusa ifike kuR1 000 imali yesibonelelo sikahulumeni uma ikhethwa ukuthi iphathe uhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika emuva kokhetho lukaMeyi 8.Izolo iNFP ithule usomqulu wayo wokhetho eVryheid, lapho uMnuz Simo Mkhwanazi, okhulumela iNFP kuzwelonke, ethe imali yesibonelelo sezingane iqedwa amanabukeni.“Omama abahola imali yesibonelelo bayasho ukuthi iqedwa amanabukeni. Sizoyisusa kuR420 siyibeke kuR1 000. Impesheni yabadala sizoyinyusa ibe wuR2 500 ngoba iphelela kwigilosa nezinye izidingongqangi. Abantu abadala abasali nalutho,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Uthe bazoqinisekisa ukuthi imitholampilo inemishini ekhipha imithi ngaphandle kokuthi abantu bame kolayini.“Ogogo bavuka ekuseni bejahe ukufika emtholampilo ngo-6 ukuze bame kulayini. Bahlala ilanga lonke beyolanda amaphilisi abo kashukela nezinye izifo zamahlalakhona baze babuyele emakhaya ngo-6 ntambama. Uma sesiphethe kuzophela konke lokho ngoba kunomshini ozokhipha imishanguzo umuntu asheshe abuyele ekhaya.”Uthe bayazi ukuthi intsha ayisebenzi ngakho bazoqala balungise ezemfundo ukuze abantu abasha babe namakhono adingeka ezinkampanini ezehlukene.Inkinga ye-Eskom uMkhwanazi uthe yenziwa ngamabomu ukuze uhulumeni adayise le nkampani.Odabeni lomhlaba uthe bayahambisana nokuthi ubuyiselwe kubantu kodwa kufanele bahlonyiswe ngamacebo okuzibekela amanzi ukuze babhekane nesomiso.Uthe bafuna kube namahhovisi akwaSeda, NYDA nawakwaSARS kuzo zonke izifunda.Uphinde wathi bafuna kube namabhange omphakathi ngoba abantu abaningi abakwazi ukuxhaswa emabhange amakhulu.Uthe zonke izinduna kufanele zihlonishwe, ziholelwe imali efanayo noma ngabe zihambisana naliphi iqembu lepolitiki.UMengameli weNFP, uNkk Zanele Magwaza-Msibi, ucele ukunikwa imizuzu emibili ukuze akhulume nabantu wathi ubengubani-ke yena ukuthi kungaze kuze abantu emcimbini wabo.Ucele ukuthi baphume ngobuningi babo bayovotela iNFP ngoba uzosebenza ngokuzikhandla ukubalethela impilo engcono.
title: Izethembiso zeNFP yethula usomqulu

text: ABAGIBELI abangaphezu kuka-1 000 ebebethukuthele begane unwabu, bagasele kwaLoliwe eMlaza, bangqongqisa isitimela nezimoto zabasebenzi ezine.Ngokusho komthombo ozibonele ngesikhathi kwenzeka lesi sigameko, abagibeli ebebehamba bekhuza iziqubulo, bacikwe ukungafiki ngesikhathi kwezitimela eziteshini abagibela kuzo.“Bebethi sebekhathele ukufika sekwedlule isikhathi emisebenzini. Abanye bathi sebebhuquza emakhaya ngemuva kokuxoshelwa ukufika sekwedlule isikhathi,” kusho umthombo ocele ligodlwe igama lawo.Omunye umthombo uthe laba bagibeli badinwe ukulinda isitimela kusukela ngabo-4 ekuseni.“Bathe uma bebona kuphela imizuzu engaphezu kuka-30 singaqhamuki, baqala bashisa isitimela ebesinosuku sizimele.“Basuke lapho baqonda emahhovisi akwaPrasa, lapho befike khona bajikijela ngamatshe ibhilidi maqede bashisa izimoto ezine okuyiVW Polo Hatchbag, amaVW Sedan amabili neNP200. Bacekela phansi iHyndai 120 nekhanda lekhoshi yesitimela.”Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal, uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko, wathi kube yiqulu labantu abangaphezu kuka-1 000 elihlasele eMlazi Railway Station ngenxa yokucikwa ukufika sekwedlule isikhathi kwezitimela.“Bacekele phansi amahhovisi adayisa amathikithi, bashisa izimoto ezine futhi balimaza ikhoshi yesitimela.”Uthe kuthunyelwe uphiko oluqapha umphakathi uma kunezibhelu, iPublic Order Police namaphoyisa akwaMetro ukuyoqapha isimo.Isolezwe ngoMgqibelo lithole ukuthi umonakalo odalekile okaR8.5 million kodwa akukho msebenzi olimele yize bethukile ngesikhathi kwenzeka lesi gameko.
title: Abagibeli badinwe bashisa isitimela nezimoto ezine

text: KUSHONE intombazanyana eneminyaka emibili nowesilisa oneminyaka engu-40 kwalimala abanye abayisithupha ngesikhathi kudutshulwa imoto abebehamba ngayo eCato Ridge, eNtshonalanga neTheku, ngoLwesibili.Ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, umndeni wabantu abangu-8 ubuhamba ngemoto emgwaqweni uNagle Dam Main ngemuva kuka-9 ekuseni ngesikhathi amadoda amathathu evulela ngenhlamvu ebhekise ngasemotweni. "Badubule babhekisa ngakubona nabo baphindisela. Ababili abebesemotweni, owesilisa oneminyaka angu-40 nentombazanyana eneminyaka emibili badutshulwe bafa. Abasolwa babaleke bangena ehlathini eliseduzane. Abanye abebelimele baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela ukuze bathole ukwelashwa. Ayikaziwa imbangela yalokhu kanti uphenyo lusaqhubeka," kusho uMbele. Okhulumela i-ER24, uMnuz Russel Meiring, uthe abezimo eziphuthumayo uthe akukho obekungenziwa ngabashonile.  "Akukho abebesengenzelwa khona. Ngemuva kwesikhashana, abezimo eziphuthumayo batshelwe ukuthi abanye abayisithupha abebesemotweni bese bephuthunyiswe emtholampilo oseduzane. Emtholampilo, abezimo eziphuthumayo bahlenge abalimele bathola ukuthi umfanyana onemimnyaka emithathu usesimeni esibucayi ,abadala balimele kancane," kusho uMeiring. "Ngemuva kokuhlengwa, umfanyana undiziswe ngendiza enophephela emhlane wayiswa esibhedlela esiseduzane ngesikhathi abadala behanjiswa i-ambulensi ibayisa esibhedlela. Imininingwane yalesi sigameko ayikaziwa kodwa abomthetho bebesendaweni yesigameko beqhuba uphenyo," kusho yena.
title: Kushone intombazanyana (2) kudutshulwa imoto eCato Ridge

text: UZIBOPHEZELE ekulweni nobugebengu nenkohlakalo uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.Lokhu ukusho ethula inkulumo yakhe ePhalamende, eKapa izolo.URamaphosa uthe kubalulekile ukuthi izwe libe ngeliphephile.Uthe okokuqala ekulweni nobugebengu, kumele kwandiswe amaphoyisa anamava naqeqeshiwe.“Indlela yokwandisa amaphoyisa emphakathini wukuthi siqashe amanye siqinise nokusebenzisana kwamaphoyisa nomphakathi.”“Okwamanje kunamathwasa amaphoyisa angaphezu kuka-5 000 abhalisele ukuqeqesha ngaphansi kohlelo lwethu lokuqeqesha amaphoyisa.”“Kuleso sibalo sizokwandisa isibalo sibe ngu-7 000 esizowuqeqesha,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe basebenza kanzima ukwenza kube ngcono ukuphenya nokushushisa amacala.“Kumele sisebenzisane ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi udlame siyalwehlisa eminyakeni engu-10. Sizokwenza lokhu ngokusebenza nezinhlangano zomphakathi ukuze siqhamuke nezindlela zokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane,” kusho uRamaphosa. Uhlaka olungaphansi kwezokuShushiswa koMphakathi (NPA) iSpecial Investigation Unit, kumele lusebenze ngokushesha ukuze kubuyiswe imali eyathathwa ngokungemthetho elinganiselwa kuR14.7 billion.Uthe balwa nokulawulwa koMbuso yindlazana, ngokuqinisa imithetho yeNPA.“Ezinye izinto esizenzile ukulwa nokulawulwa koMbuso yidlazana, ukuqiniswa kwemithetho kwiNPA neSIU. Lokhu kulethe imiphumela,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe yize kunjalo kuningi okunye okusamele kwenziwe.
title: Uzibophezele ekulweni nobugebengu

text: KUZOQINISWA imithetho eThekwini ngenhloso yokulwa nokusabalala kweCoronavirus njengoba abantu abaningi kulo masipala sekuvele ukuthi baziqhubekela nempilo sengathi akumisiwe ukwenziwa kwezinye izinto.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala izolo, uthe kubantu abangu-587 abanaleli gciwane kulesi sifundazwe (lesi sibalo sesinyukele ku-617) abangu-383 abaseThekwini.Uthe ithimba lesifundazwe elibhekele igciwane belihlangene ngoLwesihlanu licubungula ukuthi isifundazwe simi kanjani ngaleli gciwane lathola ukuthi akuhambi kahle kudingeka ukuthi kuthathwe izinyathelo ezisheshayo zokunqanda ukusabalala kwegciwane.“Kubantu ababulewe yigciwane kuleli, abangu-21 abakwaZulu-Natal, abasebenzi bezempilo imiphumela yabo yokuhlolwa ikhombisa ukuthi abanaleli gciwane bangu-108. Ezibalweni zikazwelonke lesi sibalo senza u-18%. Zingu-83 iziguli ezilaliswe ezibhedlela ngenxa yaleli gciwane, ezintathu zisegumbini labagula kakhulu. Kuyaqapheleka ukuthi uhhafu weziguli ezinaleli gciwane zihleli ngazodwana emakhaya ukuze zingahlangani nabanye abantu,” kuchaza uZikalala. Izibalo ngokomasipala eKZN zikhomba ukuthi eMajuba bayisishiyagalombili abanaleli gciwane, eKing Cetshwayo bangu-11, kwiLembe bangu-26, Ogwini bangu-15, eMgungundlovu bangu-46, eMkhanyakude bangu-21, eMzinyathi babili, oThukela bangu-19 , eZululand babili“Okuqaphelekayo ukuthi eThekwini baningi abantu abangayishayi mkhuba imithetho ebekiwe kathaqa. Enkabeni yedolobha uthola abantu behla benyuka singekho isidingo esiphuthumayo esibakhiphe emakhaya, nezimoto ziningi. Intsha ihamba ngamaqoqo ezitaladini ayiqhelelani, le ndlela yokuziphatha kumele iphele. Abantu abayeke izinkolelo-ze zokuthi leli gciwane lingena abohlanga oluthile nabahlala ezindaweni ezithile,” kuxwayisa uZikalala.Uthe ithimba elihlola nelikhomba abanegciwane lizongena umuzi nomuzi. Abahloliwe kwatholakala ukuthi banegciwane bazohlaliswa ezikhungweni. Emarenki amatekisi, ezinxanxatheleni zezitolo nakuyo yonke imizila yezithuthi zomphakathi kuzoba nezikhungo ezingumahamba nendlwana zokuhlola. Emijondolo kuzokwenziwa uhlelo lokubulala amagciwane. Konke lokhu uthe kuzoqala namhlanje.Uthe bazoqinisa nezivimbamgwaqo ezihlanganisa amaphoyisa, amaphoyisa omgwaqo, umbutho wezokuvikela nomnyango wezokuthutha ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu ababi ngaphandle kwamakhaya abo kungenasidingo.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uthe kubonakele ukuthi bantu abanaleli gciwane okumele ngabe bahlala ngokuhlukana nabanye abantu emakhaya baze balulame bayaphuma bahlangane nabanye abantu. Yingakho kuthathwe isinqumo sokuthi abazotholakala ukuthi banaleli gciwane manje bazohlala ezikhungweni baphume sebeluleme.UNkk Simelane-Zulu ubuye wacacisa ngodaba lwezibhedlela ezimbili ezimise ukwamukela iziguli, iNetcare St Augustine’s neKingsway wathi uphenyo ngazo alukapheli.Uthe eSt Augustine’s ibhilidi ebelisebenza ukuhlanza izinso nokuyilona kuphela ebelisebenza ngoba isibhedella besithe abanaleli gciwane abakaze bangene kulo kodwa nalo selivaliwe ngenxa yokuthi kunabantu abayisikhombisa abalisebenzisayo okutholakale ukuthi banaleli gciwane.“Isibhedlela sisitshele ukuthi kuzomele sithole enye indawo esizokwenzela kuyo lolu hlelo ngoba ngeke lumiswe ngoba zincane izibhedlela ezilwenzayo. Okunye okuzoqiniswa indaba yezimakethe lapho abantu bengawugcini khona umthetho wokuqhelelana, kuzobekwa umgomo wokuthi kube nabantu abathile abaphakathi bathenge baphume bese kungena abanye,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Uthe ukuhlolwa kuzoqala ngezindawo okubonakala sengathi i gciwane lisabalala kakhulu kuzo.
title: ITheku liqinisa eyokulwa neCorona

text: KUQHUME isililo enkantolo kumalungu omndeni wowesifazane  waseNorthdale eMgungundlovu,  owabulawa ngesihluku yisoka lakhe eliyiphoyisa, ngesikhathi licela uxolo emndenini eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu, izolo.USipho Chonco (35), waseGreytown, esebhokisini lofakazi izolo ucele ukuxolelwa ngokubulala ngesihluku uNksz Wendy Dlamini (29)  owatholwa ebulewe ngo-Ephreli 15 2018.Amalungu omndeni kamgilwa, azwakale ekhala , aze aphuma enkantolo.Lesi simo siphoqe ukuba inkantolo ime kancane ukulalela uChonco, obezicelela ukuba isigwebo azonikwa sona sibe sincane njengoba esevele elahlwe icala lokubulala uNksz Dlamini.Kubuye kwaqhubeka, abomndeni wakwaDlamini abebekhala sebephumile enkantolo.“Emndenini wakwaDlamini ngithanda ukuzehlisa, lokhu kwenzeka ngokushesha ngelanga lesigameko, ngangingaqondile ukumbulala, kwaba iphutha. Imina engafika ngazocela kinina ukuba ngakhe umuzi nendodakazi yenu, ngicela ningixolele. Ngiyazi ukuthi ngeke ngisambuyisa umufi kodwa ngiyafisa ukuthi ngelinye ilanga nikwazi ukungixolela,” kusho uChonco.Ummeli wakhe u-Advocate Thabiso Khazi, ecelela uChonco isigwebo esingcono uthe uyazisola ngakwenzile futhi ufisa ukubuyela emphakathini ayokhulisa izingane zakhe ezinhlanu. Ingane yakhe nomufi eneminyaka emithathu manje uthe ufisa ukuphuma ejele ayoyichazela ukuthi kwenzekani njengoba agcina ebulale unina.Umshushisi, u-Advocate Dorain Paver uthe akulona iqiniso ukuthi uyazisola uChonco kodwa uzicabangela yena yedwa.“Ukuba uyazisola ngabe uvume konke enkantolo ngokwenzeka, kumanje uyaqhubeka nokuthi wayebanga isibhamu nomufi wabe esedubuleka. Uqhubeke nento inkantolo esivele iyichithile. Kumanje umndeni kamufi uze waphuma enkantolo ukhala kodwa uyaqhubeka nokuphikelela nokungaphumeli obala ngokuthi wambulala kanjani umufi. Ufanelwe udilikajele kuleli cala. Wena wabulala umuntu, wafonela umndeni wakhe ukuba uzolanda isidumbu owawusishiye sodwa eceleni komgwaqo, awuzisoli nhlobo ngowakwenza,” kusho uPaver.Usonhlalakahle owahlola isimo sikaChonco, uMnuz Muzikhona Msomi,  uthe isigwebo sokubhadla ejele simfanele ngoba izingane zakhe ezinhlanu bakhona abazozinakekela, nobunzima becala ubona kufanele ajeze ngoba akazisoli ngakwenza.Ijaji lithe lisadinga ukucubungula isinqumo ngokushiwo, bese egwetshwa ngoLwesithathu oluzayo uChonco.
title: Licele uxolo iphoyisa elabulala intombi

text: UMENGAMELI Jacob Zuma usezwakalise ukuthi ufisa ukuba iMeya yaseNkandla uma eseshiya ekubeni uMengameli wezwe.Ekhuluma emngcwabeni wengqalabutho uMnuz Riot Mkhwanazi enyuvesi yaseZululand izolo, uZuma uthe ufuna ukuba ikhansela angenele ukhetho kwi-ward yakhe.“Uma ngithi ngifuna ukuba ikhansela uma sengithathe umhlalaphansi, abantu bayangihleka. Bengitshela omunye ngoMgqibelo ukuthi izinhloso zami ngukuthi ngibe iMeya yaseNkandla ngelinye ilanga,” kusho uZuma.UMkhwanazi noZuma baboshwa ndawonye ejele iRobben Island iminyaka engu-10 kanti basebenza ekudingisweni.I-IFP yawina uMasipala waseNkandla ngo-54% wamavoti kwathi i-ANC yawina ngo-44% okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya ngo-Agasti 3.U-ward 14 uZuma ahlala kuwo wawinwa yi-ANC.UZuma uthe uMkhwanazi yize ayenamava kwezomzabalazo kodwa wayeyikhansela le-ward KwaDlangezwa.“Wayeyingqa-labutho kodwa akazange angabaze ekutheni abe ikhansela. Akanqabanga wathi kumele ngibe le phezulu nabanye. Akazange azibone ebalulekile, iyona politiki leyo,” kusho uZuma.Uthe ukuze i-ANC iphumelele kumele ibukele kubantu abafana noMkhwanazi.Khonamanjalo, ihhovisi likaZuma izolo likhiphe isitatimende sokuthi uhulumeni ukulungele ukunxephezela izisulu ezashona eMarikana, eNorth West ngo-Agasti 2012.“Mayelana nesinxephezelo saseMarikana uhulumeni usekulungele ukukhokha. Amaphoyisa ayalele abameli ukuthi banxephezele abafaka izicelo,” kusho ihhovisi likaZuma.Lesi sitatimende sithe lezi ngezinye zezinyathelo ezithathwe nguhulumeni emva kweziphakamiso zeKhomishini yeJaji Ian Farlam.Kwashona abantu abangu-44 ngesikhathi kunesiteleka esasingekho emthethweni emayini iLonmin ngo-Agasti 2012.Amaphoyisa adubula kwashona abantu abangu-34 iningi labo okwakungabasebenzi baseLonmin ngo-Agasti 16. Ngaphambi kwalesi sibhicongo bangu-10 abantu abase bebulewe kule mayini kubalwa nonogada ababili baseLonmin.
title: Ufisa ukuba yikhansela laseNkandla uZuma

text: ALIKAZUKUMENYEZELWA igama laloyo ozongena esihlalweni esishiwe Isilo samaBandla onke, uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu, okhothame emasontweni amabili edlule.UNdunankulu KaZulu, Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, useveze ukuthi igama lomuntu ozongena kulesi sikhundla lizomenyezelwa uma iNdlunkulu isiqedile ukuzilela iMbube, etshalwe ngesonto eledlule.Lesi sinqumo sithathwe emhlanganweni obuhanjelwe ngamalungu aseNdlunkulu angaphezu kuka-200, lapho kufundwe khona ifa elishiywe Isilo.Kulo mhlangano obubanjwe esigodlweni KwaKhethomthandayo izolo, kuvunyelwane ngokuthi iNdlovukazi Mantfombi Dlamini Zulu, yiyo ezobamba kuze kube kuqokwa ozongena esihlalweni.“Ukukhothama kweSilo kube umthwalo onzima kakhulu emndenini waseNdlunkulu, ngakho kufanele unikezwe ithuba elanele lokuzila,” kusho uButhelezi.Bekukuningi ukuqagela ngongase aqokelwe kulesi sikhundla kanti abaningi bebelindele ukuthi lo mhlangano ukuqede lokho kuqagela ngokuthi umemezele igama lozongena esihlalweni.INdlovukazi uMantfombi, yasesigodlweni saKwaKhangelamankengane, unguNdlunkulu wesithathu weSilo kanti bashada ngo-1977. UButhelezi uthe isikhathi sokuzila sizoba yizinyanga ezintathu.“Kusuka ngoMashi 26 (kusasa), Isilo sasifise ukuthi abantu bangahlali isikhathi eside bezilile, ngakho bangaqala benze izinto ezifana nokulima amasimu. Isifiso seMbube eyathi ayifuni abantu bazile isikhathi eside,”  kusho uShenge. Isazi sezamasiko eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Gugu Mazibuko, sithe akuthusi ukuthi kuzobamba uNdlunkulu.“Naso Isilo besisibona ezindaweni ezahlukene KwaZulu-Natal, sibeka amakhosi esifazane. Njengamanje ziningi izizwe esifundazweni ezibuswa ngabantu besifazane. Akukhona okokuqala emlandweni ukuba kubambe umuntu wesifazane. Ngicabanga ukuthi iNdlunkulu ivumelene ngokuthi basadinga isikhathi esanele sokuhlonipha Isilo, ingakho bethathe lesi sinqumo.”UDkt Mazibuko uthe akulula ukuqagela njengamanje ukuthi ubani ozongena kulesi sihlalo.
title: Uzokwaziwa ngemva kokuzila ozoba Isilo

text: ISIKWIBHISI seBloemfontein Celtic, uKabelo Mahlasela, sibona kungaba wukufezeka kwephupho ukusayiniswa yiKaizer Chiefs okuvela izindaba zokuthi iyasifuna.UMahlasela, odle ngomjiko nejubane, usayine inkontileka yeminyaka emithathu kwiCeltic ekuqaleni kwesizini esuka kwiRoyal Eagles edlala kwiNational First Division (NFD). I-Eagles ibikade imboleke kwi-Orlando Pirates abekade esesikhungweni sayo sokuthuthukisa amakhono. UMahlasela ufiike kwiCeltic wazakhela udumo, wayishayela amagoli abalulekile.IPhunya Selesele ngelinye lamaqembu abekade ebambe umoya ngendaba yezembe ngesikhathi kusongwa isizini ka-2016/2017. Iqede endaweni ka-12 ngamaphuzu awu-29 emuva kwemidlalo ewu-30.Emasontweni edlule kuvele ukuthi igama likaMahlasela likhona kwawabadlali abafunwa yiChiefs ezimisele ukuqinisa isikimu ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini ka-2017/2018.“Ngiyezwa kuyakhulunywa ukuthi iChiefs iyangifuna kodwa akukho engikwaziyo ngalokho. Wonke umdlali okhona eNingizimu Afrika uyafuna ukudlalela iqembu elikhulu elifana neChiefs. Kuyangijabulisa kakhulu ukuzwa ukuthi iChiefs iyangifuna,” kusho uMahlasela.IChiefs, eqede isizini yesibili yePremiership iqeqeshwa nguSteve Komphela ingawinanga neyokubika indebe, kulindeleke ukuthi ingene ishone emakethe ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini entsha. Izikhulu zaMakhosi zihlale zibalisa ngokuthi amaqembu afuna izindodla zemali uma kuyiyona efuna umdlali kodwa abashibhise kwamanye. Ngaphandle kukaMahlasela, kuthiwa isafuna no-Evans Rusike weMaritzburg United okuvela ukuthi izikhulu zeqembu sezivumileukumdayisa.Okhulumela iChiefs, uVina Maphosa, uthe okwamanje akukho okusakhulunyiwe mayelana nabadlali abafunwayo wathi iqembu lihlabe ikhefu izolo akakakhulumi nemenenja nomqeqeshi.Mayelana nokushaya into ephansi kweCeltic kule sizini, uMahlasela uthe sebeyibonile inkinga.“Ngibe nesizini emnandi lapha kwiCeltic, ngidlale imidlalo eminingi ebengingacabangi ukuthi ngizoyidlala ngiqala ukufika kwiPremiership. Ngicabanga ukuthi ngiyithokozele kakhulu,” kusho uMahlasela.“Indlela esivale ngayo isizini ngegiya eliphezulu ngiyithandile. Ngijabule ukuthi silivikile izembe. Ngesizini ezayo ngibona kufanele sisebenze kanzima ekushayeni amagoli ngoba amathuba siyawakha kodwa kufanele sisebenze ngokushaya inethi.”Ngesizini esongwayo iCeltic yehlelwe okungajwayelekile ngesikhathi umqeqeshi, uLuc Eymael, obekade eshiye iPolokwane City wajoyina iPhunya Selele, eyalelwa ukuthi aphindele emuva. Kusongwe isizini izintambo zokuqeqesha zibanjwe nguLehlohonolo Seema. USeema usanda kuphumela obala ngokuthi akakakulungeli ukuthatha isikhundla sokuqeqesha iCeltic ngokugcwele.
title: Bafuna uMahlasela ukuqinisa iChiefs

text: AKAKHOHLWA namanje yisenzo seCell C Sharks inqoba isicoco seCurrie Cup ekuhambeni ishaya iDHL Western Province ngo-2013, uJean-Luc du Preez oyi-flanker yeqembu laseThekwini.Ngokusho kukaDu Preez, owayenza u-matric ngaleso sikhathi, oShaka bamangaza abaningi benqoba isicoco benganikwe thuba.UDu Preez uthe kungenzeka ngoMgqibelo amaSharks, azodlala neqembu elifanayo emqhudelwaneni ofanayo ekuhambeni, akuphinde lokho.Umdlalo wamanqamu obhekwe ngabomvu uzoba seNewlands Stadium, eKapa, ngo-4 ntambama.“Sibheke ukuthi sisinqobe isicoco seCurrie Cup ngoba sekuphele iminyaka emihlanu sagcina ukusinqoba. Empeleni ngesikhathi iSharks igcina ukunqoba isicoco ngangisenza u-matric. Lokhu kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi isikhathi sesihambile, kumele nakanjani sisinqobe lesi sicoco,” usho kanje uDu Preez ngemuva kokuziqeqesha nezakhe eKings Park Stadium.UDu Preez ubuya ekulimaleni okumhlalise izinyanga ezintathu nohhafu engadlali. Selokhu ebuyile usadlale imidlalo emibili kwiCurrie Cup. Udlale neTafel Lager Griquas (imizuzu ewu-20), wabhekana neXerox Golden Lions (imizuzu engu-30).“Kumnandi ukubuyela emdlalweni engiwuthandayo. Empeleni ngizizwa ngiwumqemane, kangangoba ngagcina ukuzizwa kanje eminyakeni emibili edlule,” usho kanje uDu Preez.Ngesizini edlule iSharks ishaywe yiqembu elifanayio kowamanqamu kulo mqhudelwano eKings Park Stadium. Umdlalo waphela abalandeli beSharks bekhala emuva kokushaywa ngo 33-21.“Kusebuhlungu ukuthi sashaywa ngesizini edlule futhi sishaywa yiqembu elifanayo. Okubalulekile njengamnje wukuthi sibe nenhlanhla yokuzithola kowamanqamu futhi, ngakho kufanele sinqobe kulokhu,” kusho uDu Preez.Kusuka ngo-1999, iSharks isidlale kowamanqamu amahlandla ayishumi, yanqoba isicoco kathathu.
title: ‘AmaSharks angase akuphinde lokho’

text: OMUNYE wabaqokwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukuheha abatshali bezimali uthi abantu kumele babekezele ngoba kusazothatha isikhathi ukuguqula isimo sezwe.UNksz Phumzile Langeni, oyiPresidential Investor Emissary, ubekhuluma nosomabhizinisi izolo esithangamini senhlangano iBusiness Leadership South Africa (BLSA) eThekwini. Uqokwe ngo-Ephreli nabanye abathathu ukuthi bazame izindlela zokungenisa ezweni li * $1 billion eminyakeni eyisihlanu. Utshele osomabhizinisi ukuthi umkhankaso kamengameli obizwa ngeThuma Mina, ngeke uphumelele uma engalekelelwa.Uvumile ukuthi isimo ezweni simanzonzo kuzo zonke izinhlangothi, ikakhulukazi kwezomnotho.“Abantu balahlekelwe yithemba, kubonakala ngokwanda kwemibhikisho nsuku zonke. Awulula umsebenzi esinikwe wona kodwa okuhle wukuthi umengameli uhambe phambili wadlulisa umyalezo. Kuzothatha isikhathi ukuthola izindlela zokuheha abatshali bezimali nokudayisa kahle izwe lethu. Emazweni angaphandle uma ufika khona babuza ngesimo sezepolitiki esingesihle nenkohlakalo. Lezi ngezinye izinto ezixosha abatshali bezimali,” kusho uNksz Langeni.Yize ethe kuzothatha isikhathi ukulungisa isimo, uNksz Langeni uthe kukhona okuthembisayo osekwenzekile selokhu kuthathe umengameli omusha. Phakathi kwakho ubale ukuqokwa kukandunankulu omusha eNorth West emuva kwezinkinga nokungalawuleki kwesifundazwe. Unxuse osomabhizinisi ukuthi basizane nohulumeni ukushintsha isimo, wathembisa ukuthi bazohlangana nabo ezifundazweni zonke ukuzwa umbono wabo. Ugcizelele nokuthi balekelele ukudala amathuba omsebenzi ngoba uhulumeni ngeke akwazi eyedwa.UMnuz Bonang Mohale oyisikhulu seBLSA, uthe osomabhizinisi bahlalelwe wumsebenzi omkhulu wokubuyisa isithunzi sezwe. Uthe inkinga yamazwe ase-Afrika akukona ukuthi ahlwempu kodwa ukuthi awalawulwa ngendlela efanele.“Inkinga yisekutheni sikhetha abaholi abangafanelekile kodwa sinayo ingcebo. Umsebenzi esibhekene nawo manje wukubheka ukuthi silwa kanjani nokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana. Kumele sibheke nokuthi sizozinciphisa kanjani izindleko zikahulumeni nengqalasizinda ebizayo engadingeki,” kusho uMohale.Uthe osomabhizinisi kumele babe phambili ekusizeni umengameli emkhankasweni wokuthunywa. Njengoba bezohambela zonke izifundazwe bebonisana noso­mabhizinisi, kumele basho ukuthi kungani bengafuni ukutshala izimali kuleli. Abanye osomabhizinisi izolo bakhale ngezinga lokwehla kwemfundo abathe linomthelela ekungaqashweni kwentsha.
title: Kusazothatha isikhathi ukuguqula isimo sezwe: Langeni

text: UKHALA uyazithulisa owesilisa othi uthathelwe indoda wumlingisi woZalo ongaconsi phansi kwabaningi uKhaya Dladla owaziwa ngoGC kulo mdlalo wakwaSABC1.UMkabayi “Smiley” Sibiya waseRichards Bay, uthi ubezitshela ukuthi uGC ungumngani wakhe kanti uyinyoka.Umsola ngokumthathela isithandwa sakhe seminyaka eyisikhombisa uMercutio Buthelezi. Uthi okumphatha kabuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi usuka kude noMercutio futhi kudala bewa bevuka njengoba yonke into abanayo bayithenge ngokuhlanganyela. Njengamanje uSmiley uthe akasakwazi ngisho nokuya eflethini labo noMercutio eliseMhlanga Rocks, eThekwini, abaliqashile.Uthe uMercutio usehlala noGC kuleli flethi. Ngisho nemoto eyiBMW ehamba uMercutio, uthe bayithenga ngokuhlanganyela naye kodwa manje usetetemuka ngayo noGC.USmiley udansa ku-Umoja futhi useke waba nemijikelezo emazweni ehlukene nalo mdlalo weshashalazi. “Angazi ukuthi uMercutio uthandane nini noKhaya (GC) kodwa ngiqale ukwazi ngoFebhuwari kulo nyaka ukuthi umngani wami usengithathele indoda. Bengilaliswe esibhedlela ngenxa yokungaphili ngiyohlinzwa esinqeni ukuze silungiswe ngenxa yokuhlaselwa yiTB yamathambo. Ngithe ngiphuma esibhedlela ngasekupheleni kukaFebhuwari ngazithola ngingasenandawo eflethini lethu. UMercutio ungitshele ukuthi kunabantu bakubo abavakashele eflethini ngeke ngikwazi ukuza kulona kanti ufihle uKhaya,” kusho uSmiley.Uthe uthathe isinqumo sokuthi ayohlala eGoli ngoba ededela abantu bakubo kaMercutio. Uthe uze watshelwa abangani bakhe ukuthi indoda yakhe imenze impatha ngoba isihlala noGC futhi sebejwayele ukubonakala benza amaphathi ndawonye. Uthe uzamile ukuxhumana nayo kodwa yangabe isamvumela nhlobo ukuthi eze eflethini. Uqhube wathi uzamile nokuxhumana noGC kodwa uyamziba njengoba engasazibambi nezingcingo zakhe.Ethintwa uGC uvele wabhoka ngolaka. “Kungani ningaxoxi naye kuphela uSmiley lo onitshele lokho? Azikho nje izinto ezinhle enifuna ukuzibhala ngami nifuna ezimbi kuphela. Kumanje ngifundisa izingane kodwa anikhulumi ngalokho. Sengizonibhlokha manje ngikhathele yinina. Yazi wavele wawuxova umoya wami,” kusho uGC evala ucingo.UMercutio, uthe uyabazi bobabili uGC noSmiley kodwa wangavuma wangaphika futhi ukuthi uyathandana nalaba. “Bekumele akhulume nami uSmiley uma kukhona afuna ukukusho hhayi ukuya emaphepheni. Umsebenzi wami awungivumeli ukuthi ngikhulume ngabantu enginobudlelwano nabo. Ngicela ukungasho lutho.”USmiley uthe uMercutio ungomunye wezimenenja zakwaHollard, KwaZulu-Natal.Isolezwe lisanda kubika ukuthi uGC usezinhlelweni zokushada nowesilisa okuthiwa uSbusiso Msomi.
title: Umlisa waseBay usola uGC ngokumthathela indoda

text: ASHAQEKILE amalungu omphakathi aseNyanisweni eMzimkhulu ngokwanda kwezigameko zokudlwengulwa kwabesifazane, okuthiwa sekuphenduke insakavukela kule ndawo.Esigamekweni sakamuva kudlwengulwe abafundi ababili abaneminyaka engu-18 abafunda u-grade 12 eMfulamhle Combined ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.Kuthiwa la mantombazane abephuma esikoleni ebuya kofunda amakilasi engeziwe, esesendleleni ebuyela ekhaya kanti azovukelwa yindoda egcine iwanukubezile.Kuthiwa indoda ibizisithe ngesigqoko esimboza ubuso, ifake nesifonyo. Iwathuse ngokuhosha isibhamu yawakhomba ngaso.Omunye wabaholi bomphakathi, uMnuz Bheki Dzanibe, uthe sekuyinsakavukela ukudlwengulwa kwabesifazane kule ndawo.Ulandise wathi ngonyaka odlule kudlwengulwe owesifazane obekhulelwe, ongenelwe ngabantu abangaziwa kwakhe elele. Uphawule  nangesigameko sokudlwengula kubulawe umfundi wakule ndawo ngoJuni 2018 nezinye izehlo.“Sisola ukuthi kunomuntu oyedwa obhizi odlwengula abantu besifazane kule ndawo. Akaboshwa futhi bonke abagilwa uma bemchaza bathi mude futhi mncane ngomzimba. Kukhona isehlakalo lapho le ndoda yadlwengula kwasala isikhafu sayo, okwathi uma sitshela amaphoyisa ngomnikazi waso angenza lutho,” kusho uDzanibe.Uthe bahlela ukubhikishela esiteshini samaphoyisa saseMzimkhulu ngesonto elizayo, bayokhala ngendlela okungathathelwa ngayo phezulu amacala okudlwengulwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe amacala amabili okudlwengula esiteshini samaphoyisa eMzimkhulu, mayelana nesehlakalo sangoMsombuluko.Uthe kusolakala ukuthi laba bafundi banukubezwe ngowesilisa obebakhombe ngesibhamu ngesikhathi bebuya esikoleni ngo-7 ebusuku.“Umsolwa uwadlwengule womabili amantombazane, waqeda wabaleka ngezinyawo. Idokodo selidluliselwe ophikweni oluphenya amacala athinta udlame lwasemndenini, ukuvikelwa kwezingane nathinta ucansi ePort Shepstone,” kusho uCapt. Gwala.
title: Bakhathazekile ngomlisa odlwengula ephindelela

text: UKWANDA kwezigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane ngokocansi ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme eNingizimu Afrika, sekuholele ekusungulweni kwe-App ebizwa ngoKwezi, okuhloswe ngayo ukulwa nalesi sihlava.Abasunguli bale App, uRefilwe Semenya 22, noNgoako Monyebodi 23, bayizitshudeni ezenza unyaka wokugcina kwi-Electrical Engineering esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme, iWits University.“Inhloso ukubika abahlukumezi ngaphakathi esikhungweni semfundo. Asikho isidingo sokuthi owesifazane aziveze ukuthi ungubani,” kusho lezi zitshudeni.Ngokwalezi zitshudeni, isikhungo semfundo ephakeme yisona esizokwazi ukuthola ukuthi umhlukumezi wubani, sisize ekwelulekeni ngokwengqondo isisulu kuze kuyofinyelelwa ekuvulweni kwecala emaphoyiseni.Lesi senzo sesishayelwe ihlombe nayizinhlangano ezilwelwa amalungelo abesifazane.OWAYEYISITSHUDENI saseRhodes University uNksz Khensani Maseko ungoimunye okusolwa ukuthi wazibulala emva kwezinsolo zokudlwengulwa yisoka lakhe ayefunda nalo kule nyuvesi Isithombe: ESAN.TVUNksz Nonhlanhla Mokwena onguMqondisi omkhulu enhlanganweni iPeople Opposing Women Abuse (POWA), usishayele ihlombe isinyathelo esithathwe yilezi zitshudeni.“Nanoma yiziphi izindlela ezikhona zokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane esikhathini lapho kwanda kakhulu ukuhlukunyezwa kwabo, siyozamukela,” kusho uNksz Mokwena.Uthe okuhle ngomqondo kaKwezi, ukuthi uqhamuke nabantu abasha abasethubeni elihle leminyaka evunwa imiqondo emisha ehambisana nobuchwepheshe besimanje.“Singakujabulela ukuthi lo mkhankaso, utholakale kulo lonke uhlobo lwama selula ngoba enye yezinselelo ukuthi kuyenzeka itholakale kuma smart phones kuphela,” kuchaza yena.Ngokwakhe, leli yithuba elihle lokusebenzisana phakathi kwezinhlangano ezilwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane.Uthe usho kanje ngoba nabo banayo i-App ebizwa ngokuthi yiPOWAgbr, abayisungule nyakenye.“Inselelo esibhekene nayo ukuthi asikwazi ukuyisabalalisa ngendlela esifisa ngayo ngenxa yokuthi siyinhlangano ezimele engenazo izimali ngokwanele,” kusho yena.Uthe eyabo i-App ixhumene neminyango kahulumeni ebhekele ukuthuthukisa umphakathi, wathi okwamanje basagxile esifundazweni saseGauteng.“Siyafisa ukusabalala izwe lonke, inkinga wukuthi asinayo imali eyanele. Ngeke kusisize ukuthi sisabalale naKwaZulu-Natal, kodwa uthole ukuthi asinabo osonhlalakahle abazobhekana nezigameko ezenzeka kuleyo ndawo,” usho njalo.Ngokwakhe, kubalulekile ukuthi owesifazane ohlukumezekile, abonane ubuso nobuso nosonhlalakahle ukuze athole ukwelulekwa okumfanele.UMnuz Ndumiso Madubela wenhlangano iWomen in Dialogue neMen March, uthe bona bafana namathuluzi okulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane ngezindlela ezahlukene, yingakho kubajabulisa ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuzwa ukuthi ababodwa kulo mkhankaso.“Iqhaza elifana naleli yinto okumele ukuthi wonke umuntu azibandakanye nalo,” usho kanje uMadubela.Uthe emikhankasweni yabo yokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane, usethole ukuthi kusenomqansa wokubonisa abesilisa ngobungozi bokuhlukumeza abesifazane.“Iningi labantu besilisa lisakholelwa wukuthi kuwusiko ukushayela owesifazane ikhwela nokumthina ekubeni ethe akathandi,” echaza.Ngokusho kwalaba bafundi, le App izoqala ukusebenza eWits University, bese kuthi ngonyaka ozayo, yenabele nakwezinye izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme.
title: Kusungulwe i-App yokubika abahlukumezi

text: UNOZINTI weKaizer Chiefs, u-Itumeleng Khune, usephonse ithawula ngokudlala phesheya kwezilwandle emuva kweminyaka kugxekwa obeyimenja yakhe uJazzman Mahlakgane ngokuhluleka ukumtholela iqembu.UKhune, osekuneminyaka engunozinti wokuqina kwiChiefs, bekubhekwe lukhulu kuyena ngesikhathi kugqama ikhono lakhe ephuma enkulisa yaMakhosi. Uvimbele iBafana Bafana emiqhudelwaneni emikhulu, okukhona kuyona iNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2010 ne-Africa Cup of Nations. KwiChiefs kunenqwaba yonozinti abafikele kuyena kodwa bathwala kanzima ukumephuca ijezi.Iningi labo ligcine lijokolile, lazifunela izindawo kwamanye amaqembu. Kulaba onozinti kukhona uMetsimetsi noReyaad Pietserse osevimbela iSuperSport United. UBrilliant Khuzwayo sekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi uzoyishiya iChiefs ngenxa yokuphenduka ukudla kwebhentshi emuva.UKhune uphumele obala ngobuhlungu bokushabalala kwesifiso sakhe sokudlalela amaqembu aphesheya kwezilwandle.“Ngatshelwa ukuthi ngimfushane. Kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi uma umfushane utshuza kalula. Ngicabanga ukuthi ngishesha ngokwanele ukutshuza futhi ngigxuma ukudlula onozinti abaningi abade. Yebo, ngihlala ngicabanga ngakho (ukudlala phesheya) kodwa kufanele ngamukele ngoba ngijabule lapho engikhona. Kodwa anginethezekile, ngizoqhubeka nokusebenza kanzima,” kusho uKhune osedlale imidlalo engaphezu kuka-300 kwiChiefs.“Uma iqembu liqhamuka ngizoya ngiyokwenza umsebenzi. Uma kungenzeki, kuzofanele ngigxilise umqondo wami lapha eNingizimu Afrika. Uma kufanele ngiphanyeke amakhokho emgibeni ngidlala lapha ekhaya, kulungile. Bakhona onozinti abagcine ngokudlala ekhaya. Ngifuna ukugijima owami umjaho lapha eNingizimu Afrika ngibe namarekhodi.”UKhune uchaza abaningi ngendlela atshala ngayo ibhola kubadlali baphakathi ensimini. Izingwazi ezingonozinti ziphumele obala ngokuthi azimboni omunye unozinti osezingeni lakhe eMzansi. “Baningi onozinti abahle noma ubuka emaqenjini eMDC (Multichoice Diski Challenge), liningi ikhono. Abantu banemibono ngokuthi uma * -Itu ephanyeka amagilavu emgibeni, wubani ozothatha indawo yakhe. Sekunesikhathi ngibuka onozinti abehlukene. Ngichazekile. Kodwa kufanele bazithobe, basebenze kanzima. Bazofinyelela esicongweni,” kusho uKhune.Imidlalo yeNedbank Cup:NgoMgqibelo: Ubuntu Cape Town v Free State Stars (Athlone Stadium, 3.30pm); Maritzburg United v Bloemfontein Celtic (Harry Gwala Stadium, 3.30pm); Kaizer Chiefs v Baroka FC (Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Cape Town City FC v Mamelodi Sundowns (Cape Town Stadium, 3pm)
title: U-Itu Khune uselahle ithemba

text: USESABA ngisho ukuphumela emnyango owesifazane waseMpangeni oshonelwe yishende beqeda inkonzo yasekamelweni endlini yalo eShakaville, KwaDukuza, ngoLwesihlanu.Kuthiwa uMnuz Xolani Mnyandu (46) waseMpangeni, uxinwe wukugula eqeda kuzitika ngocansi nesinqandamathe ebesimvakashele.Kuthiwa uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela eseyimvithi lapho efike washonela khona.Ngokusho kwentombi yakhe engumfelokazi, uNkk Thembekile Mfekayi (45), umufi uxinwe wukugula besanda kuqeda umjikelezo wokuqala.“Beyina imvula sizivalele endlini sihleli embhedeni simbathile. Ukhale ngokushisa, wajuluka wamanzi te. Ngiphuthumile ngavula ifeni kodwa kwazifanela nje.“Ngize ngavula nomnyango. Ngithathe amanzi ngamphuzisa amanye ngamthela ngawo ebusweni, wavula amehlo kancane waphinde wawavala. Ngabiza usbari wakhe samkhiphela ngaphandle. Ubeseyimvithi, kubonakala ukuthi uyaphela,” kusho uNkk Mfekayi.Uthe uninalume kamufi ube esemphuthumisa esibhedlela ngemoto, wasala yena elandela nodadewabo ngemuva.“Sithe sifika esibhedlela basitshela ukuthi useshonile. Ngivele ngaphelelwa amandla. Ngazibuza ukuthi ngingahamba izwe elingaka ukuthi azofela ezandleni zami.“Kubuhlungu ngoba uxinwe wukugula sisobabili. Bengingasiye nomaqondana wakhe, umuntu nje ebesintshontshana naye ngemuva kokushona komyeni wami ngo-2015. Besike siye ocansini, singabi nenkinga. Akukho nokugula engimazela khona kodwa ngeke ngazi uma ubekufihla,” kusho uNkk Mfekayi.Uqhube wathi izolo ekuseni uvukele kubo kwesoka lakhe abangomakhelwane bakhe.Uthe bamazi njengomakoti waKwaMfekayi bebengazi ukuthi ubethandana nomufi.“Ibingasekho into engingayenza, bekuphoqa ukuthi ngiyochaza ukuthi kwenzekeni njengoba eshone enami. Bacasukile, bangibuza ukuthi ubeze afele kimina nje bekwenzenjani ngoba mina ngihlala emzini wami.“Bacasulwa wukuthi ngisuke la ekhaya ngaya kuye eStanger. Ngibachazele konke engikwaziyo. Ngiyazi abanye bazocabanga ukuthi bengicushiwe, bengingacushwa ngubani ngoba bengithandana naye yedwa. Angisiye nomuntu okhonze imithi,” kulandisa uNkk Mfekayi.Uveze ukuthi abasemzini wakhe bebengakazi ngokwenzekile kodwa uyazi ukuthi ekugcineni indaba izosabalala njengoba bakhelene nomndeni kaMnyandu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant Colonel Thulani Zwane uthe amaphoyisa aKwaDukuza aphenya icala lokufa komuntu ngemuva kokuthi owesilisa eshonele esibhedlela ngemuva kokukhala ngezinhlungu.
title: Ukhale ngokushisa washona eqeda umzuliswano wocansi nomfelokazi

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho eliwela umfula ugcwele bengicela ungiphe ithuba ngike ngiphawule ngento eyenzekayo esithanda ukuba yimbi lapha kwelethu. Ukuphawula kwami kusukela ezigamekweni ezenziwa abesilisa bakuleli kubantu besifazane, izingane, nakubantu abadala.Sekunezinto ezenziwa abanye abantu besilisa ezithusayo nezinyantisa igazi. Ngikhuluma nje izindaba ezisematheni kulezi zinsuku zimayelana nokubulawa, ukuthunjwa nokudlwengulwa kwabantu besifazane abasebasha, izingane ngisho nabadala imbala. Kunabantu besilisa asebephenduke izilwane ezingenazwelo impela. Okumangazayo wukuthi le nto iyanda futhi iyaqhubeka kunokuba iphele.Kula masonto adlule kunomuntu wesilisa obulale izingane ezine eWyebank, ezintathu kungezakhe eyesine ibizalwa ngunkosikazi wakhe, ngenxa yokuthi unkosikazi bese efuna isehlukaniso. Kubi ukuzwa ukuthi kanti noyise bezingane ngeke sisabethemba ngezingane zethu ngesimanga sokuthi umuntu ngeke usamazi ukuthi unamaqhinga mani ekhanda lakhe. La bantu okuyibona engabe bayasivikela kujike kube yibona abasihlukumezayo nezingane zethu ezingenamacala.Ukuphepha akusekho kule lizwe, akuphephile ngisho izaguga lezi. Kukhona izalukazi ezimbili ezike zanukubezwa ngokocansi eMgangeni, eMzinto. Isalukazi ebesizihambela ngodondolo sike sabhekana nobunzima singakwazi nokuhamba emva kokuthi owesilisa esidlwengule ephindelela. Lokhu kubonisa ukuthi abanye besilisa abasabahloniphi ngisho nabantu abadala laba. Umuntu usengaze akhumulise isalukazi esidala esingazala ngisho unina azitike impela ngaso? Uphi unembeza kubantu besilisa? Ayiyinhle neze le nto asebeyenza.Okunye banesibindi sokukwenza ngisho ezinganeni abangazizala. Angisayiphathi-ke le eke yasusa enkulu intukuthelo lena eyowesilisa oneminyaka engu-42 odlwengule intombazane yaseKapa maqede wayibulala ngesihluku. Le nto abayenzayo ayibukeki neze. Umthetho walapha eNingizimu Afrika kuzomele udlale indima yawo kuqhamukwe nezisombululo ngoba impela iyaphela imbokodo ngenxa yabantu besilisa abangafundisekile.Silindile GumedeKwaMashu
title: Zinyantisa igazi izinto ezenziwa abantu besilisa

text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, ukholwa wukuthi nakuba abadlali bakhe bephisane ngamagoli amabili aholele ekutheni behlulwe yiFC Barcelona yaseSpain kodwa abalihlazanga izwe.ISundowns ihlulwe yiBarcelona ngo 3-1 emdlalweni wokugubha iminyaka ewu-100 kwazalwa owayenguMengameli wokuqala wentando yabantu eNingizimu Afrika, uNelson Mandela, eFNB Stadium, eNasrec, ngoLwesithathu ebusuku. Amagoli eBarca ashaywe ngu-Osmane Dembele, Luis Suarez no-Andre Gomes esiwombeni ngasinye.EleSundowns lishaywe nguSibusiso Vilakazi. Amagoli amabili eBarca angene ngenxa yamaphutha kaSoumahoro Bangaly, ngesiwombe sokuqala, nelikakaputeni uHlompho Kekana, ngesiwombe sesibili.“Igoli lokuqala ngemizuzu yokuqala basijezisile. UBangaly wenze iphutha bashaya igoli. UKeke (Kekana) unikeze umgadli ibhola bashaya igoli. Elinye kube yigoli leBarcelona, yindlela abadlala ngayo. ULangerman ubhekane nonozinti waqoka ukuliphasa ibhola kodwa sibhekene neMaritzburg washaya imbumbulu. UPercy (Tau) ubhekane nonozinti. Sikwazile ukudlala indlela yethu yeSundowns, saliphatha ibhola. Nendlela esithole ngayo igoli, yindlela esidlala ngayo,” kusho uMosimane.“Kodwa mkhulu umehluko phakathi kwethu nabo, ubonakele. Indlela abaphatha ngayo ibhola nezinga labadlali ihluke kakhulu. Akufanele sizikhohlise, lona bekuwumdlalo wobungani. Ukuba bekuwumdlalo osemthethweni ngabe kukhulunywa okunye. Ngicabanga ukuthi asibahlazanga abantu bakuleli. Kodwa angijabule ngamagoli esibaphe wona.”Nakuba iBarca idlale ngosuku efike ngalo eMzansi kodwa iphumelele ukujabulisa abalandeli bayo. Umqeqeshi * -Ernesto Valverde uthe ubengakulindele akubone kwiSundowns.“Kube wumdlalo omuhle. ISundowns isimangazile ngendlela eshesha ngayo nokudlala ngomdlandla. Ngikuthandile futhi ukuthi abantu kade beweseka womabili amaqembu nokwenze umdlalo ube muhle,” kusho uValverde.ISundowns isizogxilisa imiqondo yayo emdlalweni weCAF Champions League neHoroya yaseGuinea ozoba ngoLwesibili ekuhambeni.Lo mdlalo uhlehlisiwe ngenxa yoweBarca.nKhonamanjalo iPremier Soccer League (PSL) imemezele ukuthi umcimbi wokuklomelisa abadlali abadlali abenze kahle waminyaka yonke uzokuba ngoMeyi 29 eSandton Convention Centre, eGoli. Abaqokelwe le miklomelo bazomenyezelwa ngoMsombuluko emahhovisi ePSL eGoli.
title: Asizange silihlaze izwe: Mosimane

text: UNtando, owabopha ifindo likasofa silahlane nomculi uKhaya Mthethwa ngo-2017, waphinde wathola nomntwana wakhe wokuqala kulo nyaka, uthi akukho okushintshile uma kuza ekufezeni izifiso zakhe.Ngemuva kokuthatha isicoco sikaMiss South Africa ngo-2016, uNtando wabe eseyohlala eNelspruit kodwa umendo wambuyisela eThekwini la esezinze khona.“Impilo ishintshile kodwa kumnandi kakhulu. Ukuba umzali kuyintokozo eyisimangaliso,” kusho uNtando.Lolu shintsho uthi lumnike nethuba lokuzithola, azikhumbuze nangakho konke ayefisa ukukufeza ngaphambi kokushada.“Konke engangifisa ukukwenza, ngizokufeza. Ukushada akungivimbile kanti ngabusiswa nangomyeni onothando futhi ongesekayo kukona konke,” kuchaza uNtando.Uchaze umyeni wakhe njengomuntu abazwana kakhulu naye futhi omqondayo aphinde azwelane naye. Uthi uma kungase kuthiwe unikwa ithuba lokubuyela ekubeni wumuntu ongashadile, anganqaba.UKUTHOLA ingane nomyeni wakhe uKhaya Mthethwa akumnqindi uNtandoyenkosi Kunene-Mthethwa ukufeza izifiso zakhe“Kwakumnandi ukuzimela ngingakashadi kodwa ukushada kumnandi kakhulu ngendlela yokuthi angisaziboni ngingaphandle komndeni wami,” kuchaza uNtando.Yize impilo yokumodela eseyishiye ngemuva njengoba esenguMam’ Mfundisi, enake nomndeni wakhe, uthe uma kungase kwenzeke, ngeke angalithathi ithuba lokukwenza konke, amodele aphinde abe wumama wekhaya.“Akukho la umyeni wami noma abasemzini abangivimbe khona noma nokubakhalisayo ngomsebenzi wami wokumodela,” echaza.Umcimbi kaMiss South Africa walo nyaka uzobanjwa ngo-Agasti 9 okobe kuwusuku lokubungaza abesifazane eNingizimu Afrika.UNtando uzoba ngomunye wozime abahlanu abazomukela izintokazi ezizoba yingxenye yalo mncintiswano kulo nyaka.
title: UmkaKhaya Mthethwa usafisa ukufeza amaphupho

text: I-ANC ithi izocubungula isiphakamiso sokuthi uhulumeni aqhubeke nokuholela abangasebenzi isibonelelo ngoba ubhubhane iCorona, lusaqhubeka nokuba nomthelela ongemuhle kwezomnotho.Lesi sibonelelo sikaR350 esaqala ukuholelwa ngesikhathi izwe liya esigabeni sesihlanu sikathaqa, bekulindeleke ukuthi sigcine kule nyanga.Izolo uMengameli we-ANC uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, umemezele ukuthi singase siqhubeke isibonelelo.  Ethula inkulumo yokuvala umhlangano we-ANC  wezinsuku ezintathu izolo, uRamaphosa uveze ukuthi kuthathwe isinqumo sokuthi kucutshungulwe isiphakamiso sokuthi kuqhutshekwe nokuholela lesibonelelo.“Konke lokhu kuzoncika ekutheni zisekhona yini izimali esikhwameni sikahulumeni futhi kuzomele kube neqhinga elicacile lokuthi yikuphi okunye okuzokwenziwa uma kumiswa lesibonelelo,” kusho uRamaphosa.Ethula inkulumo yakhe kwisithangami ebesibanjwe kusetshenziswa ezokuxhumana, uRamaphosa uveze ukuthi amaphoyisa azoqinisa umthetho kwizinhlangano zosomabhizinisi eziphazamisa imisebenzi kahulumeni ngoba zithi zifuna ukuhleshulelwa amathenda.“Miningi imisebenzi kahulumeni ephazanyiswe yilaba bantu. Kepha kulo nyaka ngeke sikuvume lokho. Ngeke sivumele abantu abathile ukuthi baphendule leli zwe kube iKwampunz’ idlemini. Umthetho kuzofanele udlale indima yawo kulabo abaphazamisa imisebenzi kahulumeni, ngoba lokho kuphazamisa intuthuko edingwa abantu abahlwempu.”URamaphosa uthe le nhlangano izobhekisisa uma isikhetha amagama abazoyimela okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya.“Sizobhekisisa ikakhulukazi kulabo abavele bangamakhansela njengamanje. Sizobheka ukuthi basebenza kanjani njengamanje. Ngeke sibabuyisele abakwimikhandlu engenzi kahle.”
title: I-ANC ifuna siqhubeke isibonelelo sabangasebenzi

text: ISIBHEKE abomthetho indoda yaKwaMadlala, ePort Shepstone emangalele ikhansela le-ANC endaweni ilisola ngokuyihlasela ngocelemba emzini wayo kubangwa ukuklabisa izinkomo. Umgilwa uMnuz Sipho Mavundla, uthe vele abatholani nekhansela kubangwa indawo elakhe kuyona athi langena kuyona ngenkani. UMavundla uthe ikhansela livele lachitha umhlambi walo wezinkomo egcekeni lakhe nokuyilapho okusuke khona ingxabano waze wahlaselwa ngocelemba. “Ngithe ngiyabuza ngezinkomo wavele walanda ucelemba endlini, hhayi ubengibulala lo muntu ukube bengingaviki. Wangishaya ngawo ezimbanjeni namanje kubuhlungu. Isigungu sendawo okufanele ngabe besingilamulela besivuna yena lo muntu,’’ kusho umgilwa. Uthe akasenandaba nakufa ngeke aye ndawo uzohlala endaweni noma lingambulala uma lithanda ikhansela. Umgilwa uthe kade befakana ezinkantolo nekhansela kubangwa udaba lomhlaba. Umgilwa uthe usebheke ukuthi amaphoyisa athathe izinyathelo ngaphandle kokwenzelela ngoba uhlukumezeke kakhulu. Ikhansela uMnuz Tholokwakhe Zulu uthe baxabane nomgilwa baze balwa kubangwa udaba lwezinkomo futhi nalo ikhansela lilivulile icala. UZulu uthe ubezivikela ehlaselwa, ubengeke amyeke ngoba nakhu yena eyikhansela. “Yimina ovule icala ngoba ubaba uMavundla ubejikijela izinkomo zami ngamatshe wagcina esejikijela mina uqobo ngivika amatshe. Ngiphatha ucelemba nenduku uma ngiyolusa mina hhayi ngoba bengiwuphathele yena. Sixabanile saze salwa ngambamba ngamgingqa phansi  futhi ukube bengifuna ukumbulala ngabe ngimbulele,’’ kusho ikhansela uZulu. Ikhansela lithe linezibazi lapho lilinyazwe khona wuMavundla yikho livule icala nalo. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uKaputeni Nqobile Gwala uthe likhona icala elivulelwe umsolwa. “Umgilwa uthe kungene izinkomo kwakhe wase ezikhipha emuva kwalokho wahlaselwa ngobhushu wumsolwa owaziwayo. Kuvulwe icala uphenyo luyaqhubeka,’’ kusho ukaputeni Gwala. Ebuzwa ngecala elivulwe yikhansela uKaputeni Gwala uthe likhona, kuthiwa ubeqhuba izinkomo ngesikhathi ehlaselwa wuMavundla ejikijela amatshe base belwa uMavundla wakhipha ummese.
title: Ikhansela le-ANC lisolwa ngokuhlasela ngocelemba

text: ITHANDA ukuba wumqansa indlela yeMamelodi Sundowns ebheke ekubuyiseni udumo lwango-2016 kwiCAF Champions League uma kubhekwa umlando wayo namaqembu okufanele idlule kuwona ukuze ifike kowamanqamu.ISundowns bekufanele idlale ne-Al Ahly yase-Egypt kowomlenze wokuqala we-quarter final ekhaya ngo-Ephreli 5 kodwa sekuhlehliselwe osukwini olulandelayo ngemuva kwesicelo saleli qembu. Ijwayele ukuthwala kanzima uma ibhekeke neRed Devils.Ngaphandle kwalokhu iSundowns izigwaze ngowayo ilala isibili eqoqweni layo ngoba uma idlula kwi-Al Ahly izobhekana noyedwa phakathi kweWaydad Casablanca yaseMorocco neHoroya FC yaseGuinea. Umlando ukhomba ukuthi owamagqubu umdlalo weSundowns ne-Al Ahly kwazise kumahlandla amabili la maqembu ebhekene kulo mqhudelwano, ezikaPitso “Jingles” Mosimane zikhale ngaphansi.Uma idlula lapho iya kwiWaydad kumbe iHoroya. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngonyaka odlule iSundowns ibidinga ukunqoba ngembudlu ekhaya ukuze idlulele phambili kodwa yadlala ngokulingana neHoroya.Iyona futhi iHoroya ekhiphe i-Orlando Pirates kwiChampions League kule sizini.Kungaba nzima nokubhekana neWaydad kwazise leli qembu lifana namasosha uma libhekene neSundowns. Kowokugcina eliwudlale neSundowns ePitoli kucishe kwabanjwana ngezandla kubangwa khona belu ukuthi ngobani omakhonya e-Afrika.Kowokusonga iqoqo iSundowns eye kuwona isivele isizibekisele indawo esigabeni esilandelayo, unqotshwe iWydad ngo 1-0.I-Downs ne-Al Ahly baqale ukuhlangana kowamanqmu ngo-2001 lapho iqembu elabe liholwa nguTed Dumitru ongasekho lashaywa khona ngo 4-1 sekuhlanganiswe yomibili imilenze.Baphinde bahlangana ngemuva kweminyaka eyisithupha kwenzeka lokhu iRed Devils iphinda inqoba ngo 4-2 ukudlulela kweyamaqoqo.Uma iSundowns izimisele ngokuxwayisa iWydad noma iHoroya kumele ikhombise ngokunqoba okokuqala kuleli qembu elinomlando omuhle ukuwedlula wonke akhona kwiChampions League.Isiyonke imidlalo yama-quarter final imi kanje:CS Constantine (ALG) v Esperance (TUN, holders)Mamelodi Sundowns (RSA) v Al Ahly (EGY)Horoya AC (GUI) v Wydad Casablanca (MAR)Simba SC (TAN) v TP Mazembe (COD)Eyomlenze wokuqala: April 5/6, owesibili: April 12/13Ama-semi final: Horoya/Wydad v Sundowns/AhlyConstantine/Esperance v Simba/MazembeEyomlenze wokuqala: April 26/27, owesibili: May 3/4Owamanqamu:Horoya/Wydad/Sundowns/Ahly v Constantine/Esperance/Simba/MazembeEyomlenze wokuqala: May 24/25, owesibili: May 31/June 1.
title: Inzima indlela yeSundowns kwiChampions League

text: UKUDLALA indawo yowesilisa othandana nowesifazane osekhulile kunaye kwiSibaya kuMzansi Magic, uthi kumenza alandelwe abesifazane asebekhulile uSayitsheni Mdakhi (38).USayitsheni udlala indawo kaSaddam onguBen 10 kaLillian olingiswa wuLinda Sebezo (53).Uthe ukuthandwa ngabesifazane abadala ngenxa yale ndawo, kumenza abone ukuthi uwenza ngendlela umsebenzi wakhe ngoba sebebaningi abaqala ukunaka indawo ayidlalayo.Uthe ngisho emphakathini abesifazane abadala sebembiza ngomuntu wabo.“Lokho kuyangijabulisa ngoba kusho ukuthi umsebenzi engiwenza kwiSibaya bayawuthanda abantu. Ngesikhathi ngithola indawo kaSaddam bekungeyona indawo ebizokwenza ukuthi ngigqame futhi bengibizelwa ukushutha iziqephu ezithile kuphela. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi abanikazi balo mdlalo bathe bafuna into ezobuye ihlekise abantu ngoba isikhathi esiningi kuhlala kuliwa kuwona.Kungaleso sikhathi okuvele ngaso ukuthi kumele ngidlale le ndawo ezohlekisa abantu,” kusho uSayitsheni.Uthe ucwaningo lokudlala le ndawo ulwenze ngokuthi abhale kuTwitter ebuza abantu ukuthi oBen 10 benzenjani uma behleli nabesifazane abadala abathandana nabo.Lokho uthe ubekubuza sengathi uyazidlalela bese ethatha izimpendulo abona ukuthi zingayithaka kamnandi le ndawo ayidlalayo.Uthe usazobonakala elingisa le ndawo futhi usazoxabana noLillian ngokwalo mdlalo. Lokho uthe kuzokwenza babonakale bethandana kakhulu.USayitsheni udakuka eMadadeni, eNewcastle kodwa umndeni wakhe wagcina usuwakhe eSoweto, eGoli.Ekulingiseni uthe uqale esesemabangeni aphakeme esikoleni edlala izikeshi.Ngaleso sikhathi uthe ubengazitsheli ukuthi ukulingisa kungaba wumsebenzi wangempela kodwa ekuthanda. Uthe uneziqu ze-Information Technology azithole eWits Technikon esibizwa nge-University of Johannesburg.Uthe nazo wazenza ngoba enzela abazali bakhe abebengayethembi indaba yokulingisa ukuthi angaphila ngakho.Uthe ngesikhathi esalingisa kwiRhythm City ubesheba ukulingisa nokusebenzela inkampani yamabhanoyi iSouth African Airways (SAA).Njengamanje uthe ungomunye wababhali bomdlalo woMzansi Magic, Isithembiso abuye alingise kwiSibaya. NgoFebhuwari wonyaka ozayo uthe uzoshutha ifilimu yakhe yokuqala iCrossroads exhaswe wuMzansi Magic.Eminye imidlalo yethelevishini aseke walingisa kuyona uSayitsheni yi-eKasi: Our Stories, Emoyeni, Heist, Home Affairs, iNumber Number, Yizo Yizo neminye.
title: Uselandelwa 'o-sugar mama' oweSibaya

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUSEKUQUBUKE ukungaboni ngaso linye eqenjini lowokholo elicula ngaphandle kwezinsimbi Abanqobi, ngemuva kokuthi ilungu leqembu uMalusi Mbokazi ememe ozakwabo ngo
WhatsApp emcimbini wokuqoshwa kweDVD neCD yakhe nokungehlanga kahle kozwakwabo.Ngasekupheleni konyaka odlule uMandla Ntuli ocula ibhesi kuleli qembu waveza ukuthi sebekhulule uMalusi ocula phambili ezingomeni eziningi zeqembu ukuthi akhiphe i-albhamu yakhe eyedwa.Wathi i-albhamu izophuma ngaphansi kwenkampani yabo njengeqembu futhi wagcizelela ukuthi akashiyile njengo-Andile Mbili osecula eyedwa.Ngesikhathi uMalusi eqopha iDVD bukhoma ePlayhouse, eThekwini, ngoFebhuwari 28 Abanqobi babengabonwa nangokhalo. Kuthiwa babenandisa eCity Hall okuyindawo esondelene kakhulu nePlayhouse.UMandla uthe okwabenza bangaya emcimbini kungenxa yokumenywa enkundleni yokuxhumana i
WhatsApp.“Ukhona omunye uzakwethu owake wasimema ku
WhatsApp futhi uMalusi kwaba nguye kuqala ukumgxeka. Yena kanye futhi usesimema ku
WhatsApp ekubeni wayekade ehleli nathi imini yonke ngalolo suku,” kusho uMandla.Uthe okunye okwabenza bangaya emcimbini kaMalusi wukuthi wayengabazisi lutho ngesikhathi usahlelwa.“Sasazi ukuthi sizokwenza yonke into ngokubambisana kanti uzovele aqhamuke esethi uzozenzela izinto enkampanini yakhe nomkakhe,” kusho uMandla.UMalusi uthe ngesikhathi ememe ozakwabo bavele bathi bamatasa.“Namanje angazi ukuthi kungani bengezanga ngoba ePlayhouse naseCity Hall kuseduze. Kuze kube yimanje asikaze sihlangane sikhulume. Ngiyathemba ukuthi kuzolunga kodwa,” kusho uMalusi.Uthe uhlele ukuthi iDVD yakhe iphume ngePhasika kanti izobizwa ngokuthi yi
My Gospel Journey.UMandla uthe njengoba uMalusi engaxoshwanga eqenjini uvumelekile ukuza bahlale phansi bakhulume.“Siyaqhubeka nokunandisa thina. Cishe sesinandise ezindaweni ezingaphezulu kwezilishumi ngaphandle kwakhe. Abacula phambili sinabo baningi, yikho ukuthi izingoma eziningi esimnika zona ukuthi azihole, zithandwa ngabantu,” kusho uMandla.
title: Bazimisele ukuxoxa abaculi abaxatshaniswe yiWhatsApp
