text: KUSOLWA isandla esinoboya ngokufa kukaNduduzo Shezi obengumfundi obekusoleka ukuthi uzilengise eThempelini lamaNazaretha eMpumelelo, eFrance eMgungundlovu ngempelasonto.Ngokukanina walo mfundi, uNkk Smangele Shezi engxoxweni abe nayo neSolezwe kwakhe, ukholelwa wukuthi indodana yakhe ibulawe ndawana thile endaweni, yase igqunywa endlini ngoba kunezimpawu ebezikhombisa lokho.Uphawule ukuthi ikhanda nobuso bendodana yakhe bese kuqala ukonakala, okuyizimpawu zokuthi ibigqunywe endaweni eshisayo.“Okunye okwenza ngisole isandla sesithathu, ukuthi ngihambe abantu ababonayo cishe abathathu bengitshela into eyodwa, bathi ubanjwe wagqunywa kweminye yemizi endaweni,” kusho uNkk Shezi.Ababonayo ngokusho kwakhe, bathe ababulali babe nomona ngokuthi indodana yakhe iyahlonipha, ibingaphuzi futhi ingabhemi.Uphinde asole nokuthi cishe indodana yakhe iphambaniselwe ephathini ebisendaweni, ngoba ibuye khona ingeseyona le nto ayazi iyiyona - yokungamhloniphi.Uthe ibuye ephathini isiboqokile ebusweni, nesikhumba sayo sesishintshile, ingasafuni nkuzwa lutho. Ngokwakhe, umzimba wendodana yakhe ubungefani nekhanda nobuso okukade sekunezimpawu zokonakala.“Emzimbeni ubengenalutho ngaphandle komhuzuko obukade usebusweni,” kugcizelela yena. Uthe baphatheke kabi ukuthi indodana yakhe bayifune emakhazeni isikhathi eside kangaka kodwa igcine itholakale eThempelini abakhonzela kulo eliseduze nakwakhe.Ngokwakhe, ababulale indodana yakhe, usola ukuthi balinde ukuthi kuphele inkonzo ka-23, ebikade iseThempelini, Impumelelo kule ndawo, emva kwalokho isidumbu sayo bayosishiya khona.“Omakhelwane abaseduze nethempeli, bathe bezwe imoto iduma emva kwenkonzo ka-23, kwazwakala nokukhala kwezicabha okusolisa ukuthi kube yisona isikhathi ebebeyombeka khona ngaso,’’ usho njalo.Uthe indaba yentambo ebiboshelwe esihlahleni nasentanyeni yendodana yakhe ethempelini, kade kuyindlela nje yokudidisa umkhondo kube sengathi izilengisile.UNkk Shezi uthe ufe olwembiza ngendodana yakhe efihlwa namhlanje, ebizimisele ngemfundo njengoba inhloso yayo bekungukuthi ibe ngumphathi emaphoyiseni.Isolezwe libikile ngalolu daba izolo lapho kade kusolwa khona ukuthi lo mfundi uzibulele.Ethintwa izolo okhulumela amaphoyisa, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe basaphenya.
title: Kusolwa esinoboya ngofe ethempelini

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANES IBONAKALA sizoba yingozi ePhalamende isinqumo seCongress of the People (Cope), sokuduba izinhlelo zePhalamende uma amanye amaqembu aphikisayo ehambisana nayo.Lokhu kuvezwe ngabahlaziyi bezepolitiki ngemuva kokuthi leli qembu lithathe isinqumo sokuthi akukho noyedwa umholi walo osePhalamende ozobonakala ezihlanganisa nezinhlelo zalesi sakhiwo.ICope ihoxe ezinhlelweni zePhalamende ngoba ithi iqembu elibusayo likhombise ukudelela isinqumo seNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ngokuphikisana nesiphakamiso sokukhipha uMengameli Jacob Zuma esikhundleni.Leli qembu lithi lizoduba zonke izinhlelo zePhalamende kuze kube kutholakala isixazululo kuyo iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki, uMnuz Sanele Nene, uthe kungaba nobungozi uma amanye amaqembu aphikisayo engaduba iPhalamende njengeCope..“ICope iyiqembu elincane kangangokuthi noma ngabe yini eliyenzayo kayizwakali ngenxa yobuncane balo nasePhalamende. Ngakho lesi sinqumo sabo awukho umehluko esizowenza ngokusebenza kwePhalamende kodwa uma amanye amaqembu aphikisayo nawo enquma ukujoyina iCope kuzoba nengozi. Lokho kuzosho ukuthi sekuyinhlangano eyodwa esePhalamende okuyi-ANC ezobhekana nesimo sokuba ishaye imithetho ingaphikiswa muntu. Empeleni lokho sekuyosho ukuthi sekumele kubhekisiswe imithetho yePhalamende indlela esebenza ngayo,” kusho uNene.UMnuz Xolani Dube wesikhungo sokucobelelana ngolwazi, iXubera, uvumelane noNene wathi kuzoba nzima ukuba iPhalamende lisebenze uma amanye amaqembu engagcina ejoyina iCope.“Empeleni iCope nakuba incane kodwa umholi wayo uMosiuoa Lekota usakhuluma kuzwakale ngenxa yomlando wakhe ohlonishwayo emzabalazweni naku-ANC. Ngakho ngibona nakulokhu kuzoba khona ukuthinteka kokusebenza kwePhalamende, ikakhulukazi uma kuzogcina kungena namanye amaqembu eduba iPhalamende ngoba kuyosho ukuthi alikwazi ukusebenza ngenhlangano eyodwa. Kungasho nokuthi kumele kubuyelwe emuva emithethweni elawula ukusebenza kwalo iPhalamende mayelana nalesi sinqumo ngoba kuyaqala ukuthi kwenzeke,” kusho uDube.ICope ikhala nangokuthi indaba kaZuma isidale uqhekeko ngisho emabandleni ngoba kukhona abafundisi abaphumele obala bethi uZuma akasule, kanti sekukhona abathi asikho isidingo ngoba usexolisile kodwa akushushiswe abamhlomekisa ngodaba lwaseNkandla.Omunye womakadebona be-ANC, uMnuz Mavuso Msimang, uthe kunzima ukutshela uZuma ukuthi akehle esikhundleni ngoba amalungu esigungu sakhe ayamsaba, esho nokuthi naye uyamsaba ngoba uyamazi kodwa ubona kufanele ehle.
title: ‘Singaba nobungozi isenzo seCope’

text: SISEZANDLENI ze-Icasa isimangalo seDemocratic Alliance (DA) njengoba imangalele Ukhozi FM.IDA iqale yamangalela Ukhozi FM kwiBroadcasting Complaints Commission of South Africa (BCCSA) kodwa yehluleka ukufinyelela esinqumweni.IDA ikhala ngokuthi uNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa nokuBambisana uNkkNomsa Dube-Ncube wenze inkulumo ohlelweni Indumiso olwethulwa nguSiya Mhlongo, ngoJuni 10 nonyaka ngeSonto ekuseni.Umholi weDA uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bafake isimangalo.Uthe isimangalo basifake ngenxa yokuthi uNkk Dube-Ncube wasebenzisa ithuba elingafanele esemsakazweni ngokuphendula ngezinsolo ezimthintayo, esebenzisa isikhathi esikhokhelwe ngemali yabakhokhi bentela.UMncwango uthe ngokwazi kwabo isikhathi ayekusona uNkk Dube-Ncube kuKhozi FM siyakhokhelwa.Ngakho akufanele akhulume izindaba zakhe kodwa kufanele atshele umphakathi ngezinhlelo zomnyango awuphethe.“Umsakazi wabuza umbuzo engathinti umnyango kodwa wabuza ethinta yena uqobo ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo yaseNkandla naseMthonjaneni esimsola ngayo,” kusho uMncwango.Uqhube wathi: “Sifisa ukwazi ukuthi ngubani owahlela imibuzo? YiSABC noma ngungqongqoshe uqobo?Ingabe kubhalwe kwisivumelwano sokusebenza sikaCogta neSABC yini ukuthi angabuye asebenzise leli thuba ukuphendula izinsolo ezibhekene naye?”Uthe uma lokhu kuyiqiniso ngeke kusho yini ukuthi ungqongqoshe usebenzisa imali kahulumeni.“Kungani ungqongqoshe esebenzise isikhathi esikhokhelwayo ukuphendula izinsolo ezibekwe kuyena. Uphendule esebenzisa imali yabakhokhi bentela,” usho kanje.UMncwango uthe ungqongqoshe walitholaithuba lokuphendula kwinkulumo-mpikiswanoeyaba khona ngoLwesihlanu ohlelweni Abasiki Bebunda.Kulolu hlelo kwakukhona uNkk Dube-Ncube, uMncwango nokhulumela uMnyango wezokuBusa nokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu uMnuz Lennox Mabaso.UMabaso uthe akukho azokusho kulolu daba ngaphandle kokuthi iDA ayihlukane namanga.“Sisezinhlelweni esizozimemezela khona maduze mayelana nezinyathelo esizozithathela iDA njengoba isemkhankasweni wokungcolisa nokudicilela igama likangqongqoshe nelomnyango phansi. Sifuna baligeze igama lakhe nelomnyango,” usho kanje.Imizamo yokuthola okhulumela i-Icasa uMnuz Paseka Maleka ayiphumelanga njengoba ethe usemhlanganweni kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engatholakalali.
title: IDA imangalele Ukhozi FM  ngohlelo

text: UNGQONGQOSHE omusha wamaphoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, uthe amaphoyisa akufanele afe nezibhamu kodwa kufanele azivikele uma edutshulwa yimigulukudu.Izolo uCele ubehambele inkonzo yesikhumbuzo yamaphoyisa amahlanu nesosha ebeselathatha umhlalaphansi adutshulwa esesiteshini samaphoyisa esiseNgcobo, e-Eastern Cape.UCele ufike enkonzweni yesikhumbuzo, ibisesontweni laseWeseli, ngaphambi kokufungiswa njengongqongqoshe omusha wamaphoyisa.Amaphoyisa adutshulwa yizigebengu ezingu-20 ezaziholwa nguMnuz Thandazile Mancoba wesonto iMancoba Seven Angels Church Ministries.Efika enkonzweni yesikhumbuzo, uCele ubingelelwe ngeziqubuko ezithi: “Ubuyile uBheki”.Utshele abantu ukuthi amaphoyisa awabona abanikazi bamakhaza, abalindele ukungcwaba ozakwabo.“Ayiphele le nto yokudutshulwa kwamaphoyisa ngoba inhloso yawo wukuvikela umphakathi hhayi ukuthi abulawe. Akufanele izigebengu zizenzele umathanda zibulale abantu abangenacala. Kufanele niziphindiselele kwabanihlaselayo. Esikoleni othisha banoshoki obasiza ukwenza umsebenzi wabo, nina njengamaphoyisa ninezibhamu, zivikeleni ngazo.”BEBEHLULEKA nawukuzibamba abantu enkonzweni yesikhumbuzo samaphoyisa amahlanu nesosha elilodwa adutshulwa esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseNgcobo Isithombe: SITHANDIWE VELAPIUthe isonto laseMancoba akulona isonto kodwa yindawo yobugebengu futhi kuzohlala kunjalo.Uncome amaphoyisa abophe izigebengu zaseNgcobo wathi wonke amasonto kufanele abhekwe ukuthi enza okufanele yini. Ududuze abashonelwe ngokuthi bazonakekelwa futhi nezingane zamaphoyisa bazokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi ziyafunda. Imindeni yamaphoyisa ashonile iwachaze njengabantu abanothando.UNksz Nowinti Pongco, udadewabo kaConstable Nkosiphendule Pongo (32), uthe umfowabo ubeyinsika yomndeni wakubo oseMabomvini, eNgqeleni.“Siyizingane eziyisikhombisa, umfowethu ubengowesihlanu. Ubewusizo kakhulu yingakho ebeyiphoyisa. Ushone ematasa nezinhlelo zokwakha umuzi omkhulu ekhaya. Ubesanda kuthenga izitini, angazi ukuthi sizokwenzenjani njengoba engasekho,” kusho uNksz Pongco.UMnuz Julius Sidumo Mathetha, umalume kaConstable Kuhle Mathetha (27), uthe umshana wakhe babefuna enze izifundo ze-Information Technology kodwa wathi ufuna ukuba yiphoyisa.
title: ‘Amaphoyisa akufanele afe nezibhamu’

text: ISAZI sezomnotho nezomthetho uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa sithi izikhulu zebhange iVBS zizidonsele amanzi ngomsele ngokuboleka imali obengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma.Leli bhange laboleka uZuma uR7.8 million ngesikhathi efuna ukukhokhela isikweletu somuzi wakhe waseNkandla.I-VBS isematheni kulezi zinsuku ngemuva kokuthi uMnyango kaMgcinimafa kuzwelonke uyifake ngaphansi komlawuli ngenhloso yokuyitakula njengoba intula izimali.Engxoxweni neSolezwe izolo, uDumisa uthe iVBS yagagamela ngokuboleka uZuma imali.Uthe isinqumo saleli bhange sokuboleka uZuma imali, yisona esidale ukuthi libe nengcindezi uma selibhekene nezinkinga zemali.“Abantu bazothi mhlawumbe leli bhange ngabe alikho obishini ukube alizange limsize uZuma ngezimali,” kusho uDumisa.Uthe omasipala abafake imali kwiVBS baphule umthetho, iMunicipal Finance Management Act.“Inkinga wukuthi njengoba befake imali kwiVBS, iVBS ibolekisa ngayo kubantu abayiboleka isikhathi eside. Lokhu kungenzeka kuphazamise ukuthunyelwa kwezidingo kubantu,” kusho uDumisa.IBhange loMbuso lithi isizathu esidale ukuthi lifake iVBS ngaphansi komlawuli wukuthi alinayo imali yokukhokhela izikweletu zayo masishane.“Uma uyibhange kufanele ube nemali okuzothi uma kwenzeka noma yini ukwazi ukukhokhela izikweletu zakho zonke. E-VBS ayikho imali eyaneke okuzothi uma omasipala bekhipha imali yabo kube yiyona evala isikhala semali ephumile. Omasipala abafake imali kwiVBS kufanele bathathelwe izinyathelo zomthetho,” kusho uDumisa.Uthe umlawuli, iSizwe Ntsaluba Gobodo izokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi omasipala bayayithola imali yabo futhi abakweleta iVBS kufanele bayikhokhe imali yakhona ngoba isikweletu ngeke sicime njengoba ingaphansi komlawuli.Umphathi weBhange loMbuso, uMnuz Lesetja Kganyago, uthe akusilo iqiniso ukuthi baphazamisa ukusebenza kweVBS ngoba iphethwe ngabantu abamnyama kodwa benza isiqiniseko sokuthi ilandela umthetho wokusebenza kwamabhange aseNingizimu Afrika.“Uma ufake isicelo selayisensi yebhange sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi amadephozithi owathathayo asemthethweni. Ngeke sihlasele ibhange ngoba liphethwe ngabamnyama. Esikwenzayo wukuqinisekisa ukuthi kulandelwa umthetho futhi sivikela abantu baseNingizimu Afrika,” kusho uKganyago.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uMnuz Thabani Khumalo uthe sikabili isinqumo sokufaka iVBS ngaphansi komlawuli.“Kungenzeka ukuthi ibhange balifake ngaphansi komlawuli ngenhloso yokulitakula njengoba lisezinkingeni, ngeke futhi ikhishwe ngaphandle inhlese yepolitiki njengoba leli bhange lake laboleka uZuma imali,” kusho uKhumalo.
title: Lisotakwini ibhange alaboleka uZuma imali yomuzi

text: ZANELE MTHETHWAUKUSATSHISWA ngokubulawa nokuthukwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana akumenzi angenwe yitwetwe uSihlalo weKhomishini eVikela iNkolo, Izilimi noMphakathi, ozakhele udumo ngokuphenya amabandla nabefundisi abazicebisa ngawo.UNkk Thoko Mkhwanazi-Xaluva (55) okhulele eMlazi, eThekwini uqale ukugqama ngonyaka odlule ngesikhathi iKhomishini imemezela ukuthi izophenya amabandla. Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ukube akanawo umndeni omesekayo ngabe usesilaxazile isikhundla ngenxa yengcindezi. Yize eqokwe uMengameli Jacob Zuma ukuhola iKhomishini ngo-2014, kuningi asedlule kukho osekumqinise ukhakhayi.Ukuqala kweKhomishini ukuphenya abefundisi ngonyaka odlule kumdalele amazinyo abushelelezi njengoba ethi usemanaphanapha yinhlamba yamakholwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.“Kungaphezu kwamandla ukuhola iKhomishini ephenyayo futhi ukube angisekwa wumndeni wami ngabe sengiyekile. Ngifunde lukhulu selokhu siqale ukuphenya abefundisi. Bengimangala abanye bengena behamba nonogada behlomile. Lokhu sekwenze ukuthi uma sihlangene nathi siqinise ezokuphepha, kuseshwe wonke umuntu ongenayo ngenxa yokwesatshiswa,” kusho yena.UNkk Mkhwanazi-Xaluva uthe uyaqonda ukuthi okwenza kuphakame imimoya kubazalwane uma bephenywa ukuthi yinto entsha ukuphenywa kwabo.Ukujutshwa kule Khomishini kumphoqe ukuthi afunde kabanzi ngezinkolo namasiko ahlukene kuleli njengoba kuwumsebenzi wabo ukuvikela. Usebenza nokhomishana abangu-11 baphenye, bafake nezincomo ukuvikela umphakathi, inkolo nezilimi.“Siyajutshwa ukuthi siphenye, uma kube nezikhalo ezithize, kodwa kwesinye isikhathi siziqalela thina uphenyo uma sibona okungahambi kahle emphakathini. Uma sesiphenyile senza izincomo, siludlulisele enkantolo udaba uma kungenzeki esikuphakamisile,” echaza.UNkk Mkhwanazi-Xaluva uthe bavikela namasiko ababona sengathi asethubeni lokuqedwa, nokungahambisani nomthetho-sisekelo. Basanda kuphikisa abebefuna kuvalwe ukuhlolwa kwezintombi futhi basazophenya nangokusokwa.Yize ebheka nezinkolo ezahlukene okumele azivikele, uNkk Mkhwanazi-Xaluva akaphumelanga obala ngenkolo yakhe.“Engingakusho ukuthi ngiyakholelwa kuNkulunkulu futhi ngiyawuthemba umkhuleko uyangiqinisa. Kulo msebenzi kumele ngikhohlwe inkolo yami kodwa ngiqonde futhi ngivikele yonke inhlobo yenkolo namasiko. Kwesinye isikhathi kudingeka ngivikele inkolo nami engingahambisani nayo,” usho kanje.Wayenguthisha ngaphambi kokujoyina inhlangano ezimele ebhekene nokukhuliswa kwezingane. Ubuye wasebenza ehhovisi likaMnuz Thabo Mbeki esenguMengameli, egxile ezindabeni ezithinta izingane. Uphinde wasebenza nehhovisi lezemfundo wabuye waba yilungu lebhodi yeNational Lotteries.
title: Uyafa inhlamba yamakholwa

text: AKEKHO umfundi ozofika ekilasini engekho uthisha ozomfundisa ngenxa yokuthi uthisha wakhe unesifo esimvimbayo ukuthi abe sesikoleni namhlanje. Lawa ngamazwi kaNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, awagcizelele izolo.Ungqongqoshe uthe umnyango uthole izicelo ziphuma kothisha abangu-5 979 abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona, zokuthi basebenzele emakhaya. Kubona uthe bangu-4 475 abanezifo ezibalwe esivumelwaneni esikhona phakathi komnyango nezinyunyana, esichaza izifo okumele othisha abanazo babhekelelwe.“Othisha abangu-1 504 abangeni kulolu luhla ngoba izifo abanazo azibaliwe kulesi sivumelwano, silinde ukuthi sithole ukwelulekwa ukuthi kumele sibavumele yini basebenzele emakhaya. Ngicabanga ukuthi kumele ngicacise, labo thisha abafakanga amalivu kodwa bafake izicelo zokusebenzela emakhaya. Kuzoba nohlelo lokuthi labo thisha bazozifundisa kanjani izingane, uma kufanele bafike esikoleni ngesikhathi sabo sokufundisa uma sebeqedile bagoduke, bazokwenza njalo, kodwa umfundi ngeke afike ekilasini engekho uthisha ozomfundisa ngoba kuthiwa unesifo esimenza abe sengcupheni yokuthola iCovid-19,” kuchaza uMshengu.Uthe namhlanje nakusasa abafundi abazobuyela ezikoleni uGrade R, 1, 6, 10 no-11. NgoLwesithathu noLwesine kuzobuyela uGrade 2, 5, 8 no-9. NgoLwesihlanu kubuyele uGrade 3, 4 10 no-11 ngoba esikoleni kumele kube no-50% wabafundi.Uthe zintathu izifunda ezisilele ngemuva ngokunikezwa izimpahla zokuzivikela kwiCorona ngenxa yokuthi ababenikezwe umsebenzi wokuthengela umnyango babenezinkinga zokuthi bebesalinde imali yokuthi bazithenge, abanye bebengenaso isitokwe esenele abanye bathe bazokwazi ukuthumela izimpahla ngesonto elizayo.“Umnyango ubungeke ukwazi ukulinda leso sikhathi yingakho wenze izinhlelo zokuthi namhlanje (izolo ) izinsiza zidiliviwe ezikoleni kulezi zifunda,” kusho uMshengu.Uthe kukhona okuhle umnyango okwenze ngokushesha ngenxa yeCorona njengokuthi uqale ukufaka ingqalasizinda yohlelo lokufundisa kusetshenziswa i-internet, i-e-learning nokuqedwa kwamathoyilethi omgodi.“Njengamanje zingu-20 izikole ezifakelwe ubuchwepheshe obuzozenza zikwazi ukufundisa nge-e-learning. Lolu hlelo luyadingeka ngoba isikhathi sesishintshile kuzosisiza nangokuzayo. Amathoyilethi omgodi besivele sinohlelo lokuthi aqedwe. Njengamanje sifake asebenzisa amakhemikhali kulezo zikole ebezisebenzisa awomgodi ngoba kudingeka inhlanzeko njengoba kuneCovid-19. Sisazoqala phansi sifake amathoyilethi anamanzi ahambayo, okuyiwo adingekayo,” kusho yena.
title: 'Akekho umfundi ozofika engekho uthisha'

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane, uthi uzwile ukuthi izinkinga zaseGobizembe High, KwaSwayimane, ziqhamuka ngaphandle bese zikapakela esikoleni.UDlungwane ukusho lokhu ekhuluma nabafundi bakulesi sikole izolo ngesikhathi esihambele ngemuva kokugwazwa komfundi washona ngoMsombuluko elamulela umngani wakhe.Uthe abafundi kumele bagxile ezifundweni zabo bayeke ezinye izinto ezingeke zibasize ngalutho.“Yekani izidakamizwa notshwala, ningazijahi lezi zinto. Gxilani ezifundweni zenu niyeke izinto ezingeke zinisize ngalutho,” kusho uDlungwane izolo.U-Ayanda Chonco obefunda uGrade 9, kuthiwa ubezama ukulamulela umngani wakhe obehlaselwa ngabanye abafundi wase egwazeka washona.UDlungwane uthe uyazwelana nabafundi ngokulahlekelwa nguzakwabo.“Ngiyazi abanye benu bahlalele ukubheka uthisha bamsuse phezulu bamyise phansi. Othisha baphumelele kakhulu kunani yingakho kumele nichithe isikhathi esiningi nicabanga ngemfundo,” kusho uDlungwane.Uthe amaphupho akhe ngukuthi eminyakeni emithathu abe engasekho la ekhona.“Ngiphupha ukuthi ngibe sengikwenye indawo ngihlonishwe ngemisebenzi yami njengoba ngiqhamuka KwaNxamalala emakhaya. Ngizonifisela okuhle konke ezivivinyweni zenu, nibhale kahle nizimisele. Kubalulekile ukuthi niphume esixukwini niphuphe ukuze niphumelele,” kusho uDlungwane.Uthe unethemba lokuthi abeluleka ngezengqondo bazobasiza abafundi abaphatheke kabi ngokushona kukazakwabo.Ukubhalwa kwezivivinyo kuqhubeka ngendlela kulesi sikole yize kube nalesi sigameko.Lesi sikole asiqali ukuthi sibe sematheni njengoba nanyakenye kwabulawa umfundi, ababulali basanda kugwetshwa.UDlungwane uvakashele umndeni kaChonco lapho edlulise khona amazwi endunduzo ngalesi sehlo.Kuboshwe owesilisa mayelana naleli cala okulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo maduze.
title: UDlungwane uhambele abomfundi obulewe

text: Buza KuMaGumede Umbuzo:Ngingowesifazane ngihlala emqashweni. Lapho engiqashe khona kunobhuti esintshontshana naye kodwa manje sesiqala ukuthandana ngempela, uyayazi indoda yami nami ngiyayazi intombi yakhe futhi sike sihlale sonke ngamasonto siziphuzele kodwa manje sesiyahluleka ukufihla sobabili ngoba ngisho siya ocansini senginokumuzwa ethi uyangithanda.Nami sengiyamthanda kodwa inkinga sobabili sithandana nabanye abantu. Ngicela ningiluleke ngingaze ngiyeke umuntu wami ngenxa yomuzwa wesikhashana osazodlula.Ngiyazi kuyiphutha lokhu engikwenzayo kodwa nami ngihlulwe imizwa.Impendulo:Kwesinye isikhathi kuba nesizathu esigcina sixegisa isimilo kumuntu wesifazane, kade ngibheka ngithi mhlawumbe ngizobona la ochaza khona ukuthi kungani usuzizwa uthanda lo mlisa enihlala naye emqashweni.Ingabe isoka lakho alikwanelisi okanye liyakuhlukumeza? Ngibuhlungu ngento eyokwenzeka emzini womuntu lo eniqashe kuwo ngamhla kwakhona oyedwa wenu obanjwayo. Ngicela nje dadewethu uma ungakwazi uhlukane naloyo mlisa okanye uhambe uyoqasha kwenye indawo ngaphambi kokuthi nibe senkingeni.Nobabili anibahloniphi ophathina benu futhi le nto yenu inhlansi yesikhashana nje esazophela.UmbuzoNgingowesilisa nginenkinga lana dadewethu ngithandana nomzala wami omama bethu abandawonye, saqala sakudlala ngokuthi siqabulane siphuzile sagcina sesithandana ngempelaNgikhuluma nje sithandana ngendlela yokuthi uyena umemu wami nalana engihlala khona kwaziwa yena kodwa abazi abantu ukuthi singabandawonye.Ngiyamthanda naye uyangithanda kodwa nginovalo lokuthi singase sikhulelisane nokuyinto engaziyo ukuthi angeke yehle kahle emndenini yethu ikakhulukazi omama abasizalayo.Sike sazama ukuyikhuluma le nto sacabanga nokuthi sihlukane kodwa akuvumanga ngoba akuphelanga nesonto sihlukene sabuyelana futhi.Ngicela ningibonise ngiyenzenjani into enjena?Impendulo:Wena nomzala wakho nifana nokuthi nabandawonye njengoba kulamana omama benu.Idlozi elinibhekile elakomalume wenu lilodwa nengikholwa ukuthi le nto eniyenzayo izonenzela amakhulu amabhadi futhi uma le nto ingafika kubazali benu okanye emindenini yenu, angeke impela kube kuhle futhi iyodala ingxabano enkulu.Yebo, senizamile ukuhlukana nahluleka kodwa ngokwami ngibona sengathi nisangakwazi ukuhlukana ngaphambi kokuthi izinto zonakale kakhulu.Kumele nithole usizo lokululekwa ngengqondo nobabili nikhulume nomuntu ongeke anahlulele kodwa ozokwazi ukunibonisa iphutha lale nto eniyenzayo bese niyayiyeka ngaphandle kokuthi kube khona ozonda omunye.Iyekeni nje le nto ingakafiki emakhaya enu ngoba izodala ingxabano emndenini.UmbuzoNgiyintombazanyane esencane, ngifunda ibanga leshumi kodwa sekwenzeke iphutha ngakhulelwa inyanga iseyodwa ngitholile ukuthi ngikhulelwe.Angikulungele ukuba umama kwazise ngisafuna ukuphothula izifundo zami ngiye nasesikhungweni semfundo ephakeme, ngaphandle kwalokho angazi ukuthi ubani ubaba wale ngane njengoba ngithandana nabantu abathathu.Ngiyazi ngimoshile futhi abazali bami bangaphoxeka impela uma bengathola ukuthi ngikhulelwe yingakho ngicela ukubuza ukuthi ngabe ngiyona yini uma ngiyosikhipha lesi sisu singaze sivele?Okwamanje akwazi muntu ngaso ngaphandle kwami futhi angifisi kube khona owaziyo ngoba anginawo amandla okondla nokukhulisa ingane mina kwamina ngisayingane futhi ngisondliwaImpendulo:Bekumele ungabe usabuza nokubuza kodwa uvukele esibhedlela uyobachazela ukuthi uzocela ukukhipha isisu, yimbi le nto oyenzile ikakhulukazi njengoba usemncane kangaka futhi abazali bakho besabheke okuhle kuwe kodwa ngabe ngidlala ngawe uma ngingathi sigcine leso sisu ngoba nawe usewumthwalo ngokwakho uma usubuya kosikhipha.Ngicela ungisize-ke ntombi ubacele bakujove ngomjovo wokuhlela umndeni ebese uzwana nokusebenzisa ijazi lomkhwenyana ukugwema inkinga efanayo kanye nokuzibeka engcupheni yokuthola izifo ezithathelana ngokocansi usemncane kangaka.Abafana ababaleki ntombi noma usuqede isikole ususebenza bazobe bekhona futhi uzobabona kahle nawe usunezinto zakho usukwazi nokuzimela.Ngifisa lingenzeki futhi iphutha elifana nalelo futhi kumele wazi ukuthi akulungile ukuhushulana nezisu kungagcina kukulimaza kwasa wena.– Elawini likaMaGumede – Ungaphuthelwa yingosi kaMaGumede kule mpelasonto kwiSolezwe ngoMgqibelo!
title: Ngingumfundi okhulelwe othandana nabantu abathathu

text: INKANTOLO yokudlulisa kwamacala yaseBloemfontein, izolo inqume ukuba umndeni womfundi, uMichael Komape, owashona kulandela ukukhalakathela ethoyilethi lomgodi esikoleni, unxeshezelwe ngoR1.4 million.Le mali inxephezela umndeni ngokuthuka nobuhlungu owabuzwa ngokushonelwa kwawo.Lesi sinqumo senkantolo silandela ukudluliswa kwecala umndeni kaMichael, icala laliseNkantolo eNkulu ePolokwane ngo-2018.UMichael (5), owayefunda uGrade R, walimala kanzima ngesikhathi ithoyilethi lomgodi liwa, wabe esewela phakathi kulo ngoJanuwari 20, 2014.Inkantolo yakuchitha ukunxeshezelwa kwalo mndeni.Isinxephezelo sokuqala; babefuna ukunxeshezelwa ngokuthuka. Isinxephezelo sesibili; babefuna ukunxeshezelwa ngobuhlungu bokushonelwa umndeni owabhekana nabo.Inkantolo iyalele ukuthi uMnyango wezeMfundo oyisiSekelo ukuba uqinisekise ukuba uhlinzeka izikole zasemakhaya ngamathoyilethi.Inkantolo iyalele umnyango kazwelonke noNgqongqoshe waseLimpopo woMnyango wezeMfundo ukuba bekhokhele abazali balo mfundi, ngamunye uR350 000, noR200 000 ezinganeni zakubo uMokibelo Lydia Komape noLucas Komape.Inkantolo iyalele ukuba izingane zakubo kamufi ezincane ezintathu zikhokhelwe uR100 000, umuntu ngamunye.Inkantolo iphinde yayalela uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo eyisiSekelo kuleli noNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo eLimpopo ukuba bakhokhele uR6 000 umuntu ngamunye ngezindleko zokulashwa.
title: Bazonikwa uR1.4m ngowafa kwelomgodi

text: Sekukaningi ngithola imibuzo izungeza ekutheni abesifazane abatshelwa ukuthi bayabanda ocansini; bebuza ukuthi ikhona yini into enjalo, uma ikhona kungabe yini imbangela? Le mibuzo iyaqhubeka ithi uma kungekho into ewukubanda ocansini, yini eyenza abesilisa okanye abesifazane baze baphimise la magama ahlabayo?Ekuhlahleleni le mibuzo, ngiyafisa siphinde sibuke indima yabefundisi. Ngikhuluma ngabagcotshwa ekufundiseni ngocansi ikakhulukazi labo abangena emshadweni. Lokhu kubalulekile ngenxa yomthamo omkhulu wolwazi olunezimbomo eziningi, esizithola njengoba abantu bakithi bekhala ngapha nangapha ngento eyodwa: ewucansi.Asibuyele kule mibuzo yokubanda kwezitho zangasese, sikwenza lokho sigibele kwabesifazane ikakhulukazi ngenxa yokuthi le mikhonto yemibuzo ijwayele ukubhekiswa kubona. Ngicela sibuke izitho zokuya ocansini kumuntu wesilisa nowesifazane. Lapha ngikhuluma ngenduku kwabesilisa nanomgudu lona owejwayekile kowesifazane wokuya ocansini uphinde ube ngumhubhe wokukhipha umntwana uma owesifazane ebeletha. Ngicacisa kanjena ngoba phela ayiyodwa indawo engasetshenziswa uma kuyiwa ocansini. Sehluka ngokuzihlungela ukuthi mina ngithanda lena kunalena, uma kunjena ngisebenzisa lena. Induku yowesilisa yakhelwe yaba ngaphandle komzimba uma uyithekelisa neyesifazane. Esinye sezizathu zokuthi ibe ngaphandle ukuthi imvelo imelwe ukugcina imbewu yesilisa isendaweni engashisi kakhulu ukuze okuqukethwe ezindunjini okuyile mbewu kungalinyazwa ukushisa nokushintshashintsha kwamazinga emzimbeni. Lokhu cishe kuyinto efanayo uma ubheka ezilwaneni ezifana nezinkomo, amahhashi, izimbongolo, nezinye. Izindumbu nenduku uyaye ukuthole kungaphandle komzimba. Akusiwona umbukiso lona. Njengoba sesishilo lokhu kwenzelwa ukugcina la mathuluzi abaluleke kangaka epholile, nakuqukethe kungahlukunyezwa amazinga aphezulu okushisa kwangaphakathi emzimbeni. Ngakwelinye isayidi amathuluzi esifazane ayingxenye yomzimba, ayingxenye yokugeleza kwegazi nokufuthelana kwalo. Lokhu kucacisa bha ukuthi esimeni lapho zonke izinto zisemazingeni angaphazamisekile, ubulili besifazane buyashisa kunobulili besilisa. Okusho ukuthi amathuluzi ethu thina madoda uma sikulezi zimo esikhuluma ngazo, ayabanda uma uwangcwekisa nawesifazane.Ake siye esimeni lapho sesivukelwe, nakhokhe kowesilisa induku isifuna obekula, isiphungwa ngezithebe. Sekwenzekeni manje? Igazi selehlile laya emazansi endukwini, ubulili besilisa nenduku sekuvokomele igazi elishisayo bese nenduku isiyashisa manje. Omunye uNjingalwazi owayesifundisa wayethanda ukuthi, lokhu kwehla kwegazi lisuka emzimbeni liya ebulilini besilisa, bushodisa igazi ebuchosheni; lokhu bese kwenza kwabesilisa kwehle okanye kuphunduleke ukucabanga uma induku isimile, isiphungwa ngezithebe.Abaziyo bazoba nombono wezinto ezenziwa ngabesilisa uma isimo sesinjena. Lokhu kuyashesha kumuntu wesilisa akufani nakowesifazane. Kowesifazane lo mgudu wokuvukelwa uthatha isikhashana, empeleni isikhathi esiningi kumele umjikeleze ngothando, ngisho amazwi amtoti, amehlo, ukwenza nje kwakho; uthi nje usufika ekusondezeni ucikicane wakho kuye; usungathi uma kuthiwa kukhona isidumo esikuthathayo esikusa kwenye indawo angavele akhale mi izinyembezi ngenxa yokufudumalelana kwegazi osekuseqophelweni eliphezulu. Ngalesi sikhathi igazi seligijime layothi mikithi esithweni sowesifazane, umgudu wakhe usunemfudumalo evele uyibambabambe induku, kowesilisa ezwe esezulwini elincane, kuqhakaza izinkanyezi azithole esehhuma engazazi uthini. Khumbula-ke ukuthi kwasekuqaleni kungakenziwa lutho, umgudu wowesifazane ubuvele uzishisela. Ukuhlangana komgudu wesifazane nenduku yesilisa, nakho konke okusondelene nawo; lokhu kuphehla ukushisa okuyisipesheli. Asikuhlonizi lapha ukuthi kulesi sigaba umuntu wesifazane ushisa bhe kunomlingani wakhe wesilisa.Kulesi sigatshana esingenhla sikhuluma ngenduku evukelwe yaze yashisa ngenxa yezimvula zegazi ezithelekile. Le nduku ingena kowesifazane naye okuthe ngokwehla kwegazi wavukelwa, wagcine eseshisa bhe kunakuqala. Ake sithi ke lona wesifazane akavukelwe, okusho ukuthi alikho igazi elithelekile ukuze umgudu nomakhelwane kufafaze imvula yemfudumalo. Kanti lona owesilisa ngenxa yokushesha kwawakhe amathuluzi, igazi selitheleke lageleza, induku isime mpo; imfudumalo isibuzwa kuyo. Uma induku eshisayo, isingena emgudwini opholile ongavukelwe; kuzokwenzekani? Njengoba kulindelekile, uzozwa ukuphola lona wesilisa; kuze kusuke ukushisa kulona wesilisa kuguduze kuye kulona wesifazane. Umphumela walapho yini, owesilisa uzothi owesifazane uyabanda. Yini ezwe ebanda? Inkinga nguyena owesilisa ongene owesimame engakakulungeli, igazi elishisisayo lingakafiki. Ngenxa yokuthi ungene izinga kuye lenyukile ngenxa yokujaha wangabe esaqinisekisa ukuthi nakumlingani usevukelwe ngokwanele. Azokuzwa lapho vese umgudu opholile uma uqhathanisa nenduku yakhe. Ngigcizelela * ‘ngokwanele’ ngoba izikhathi eziningi abesilisa bayajaha kakhulu ukungena ngenduku abesifazane ngenxa:Yolwazi oluphundulekile ngocansi, umuntu acabange ukuthi uyazi abesilisa abahlale besaba ukuthi induku ingaze iwe engakangeni.Amanzi amponjwana Utshwala behlisa izinga lokushisa ngamazinga amabili (2 degrees Centigrade) emzimbeni. Inani elikhulu leli uma ukhuluma ngokwehla kokushisa emzimbeni womuntu. Uma uphuze utshwala, kufanele wazi amazinga akho nasemathuluzini aphansi.Owesilisa onede angezwa ubumanzana obuncane emgudwini wesifazane, hhayi usesho phakathi; dlubhe!Ukujwayelana ocansini, nokuya ocansini endaweni efanayo nangendlela efanayoOwesifazane osabayo, engaphumeli obala asho ukuthi akakabibikho esimeni, makulindwe aze abe kahle.Ake sibuke ezinye izimo ezingenza ukuthi umgudu wowesifazane uphole okanye uthathe kude ukunyuka uye ezingeni eliphezulu lokushisa:Umgudu osuhlanzeke ngale ndlela kwaze kwehla isibalo samagciwane ayindalo okumele ahlale ekhona. Amagciwane asesithweni sowesifazane anomsebenzi wawo. Ngaphandle kwalokho ayazitshuzela, ayachamsela, ayadla, anemikhiqizo ethile. Ukuba khona kwawo kuyalinyusa izinga lokushisa ngenxa yemikhiqizo yawo. Uma lo mgudu usuhlanzwe ngale ndlela yokuthi inani lala magciwane lehlile, kusho ukuthi nezinga lokushisa kwawo umgudu liyothi kancane ukwehla. Kumele siqaphele imikhiqizo esiyisebenzisayo uma sihlanza imigudu yesifazane. Kukhona nabesilsa abathandayo ukuya ocansini nomuntu okuzolokhu kuthi “thaphu” iphunga lomgudu wakhe. Iphunga elingekho mandla kodwa eliletha lawa makha azoba ngumehlukwana.Umgudu osunezicubu esezithambile uthatha kude ukusebenzelana ukuze kugeleze igazi elizovokomalisa lishisise. Okusho ukuthi qinisa izicubu zomgudu ukuze kungehli ukushisa. Sikhulumile kule ngosi ngendlela yokuhlola ukusebenza kwezicubu.Ukuvula imilenze kakhulu uma kuyiwa ocansini kungenisa umoya omningi emgudwini wowesimame, bese ungathi uyaphola umgudu lona kwehle ukushisa; kwesinye isikhathi lomoya osungenile wenza kube nomsindo ozwakala kabi, osuka ebulilini besifazane. Ngiyethemba nanamhlanje siyabona ukuthi ‘gengelezi’ imilenze, kunokuphaphalaza okuningi uma kuyiwa ocansini.Ubudala ngeminyaka, kusho ukuhamba kancane kwezinto eziningi kuhlanganisa nokuncipha ngokwesakhiwo (atrophy) kwezingxenyana eziningi.Lokhu kungaholela ekutheni owesifazane athathe isikhathi eside ukuvukelwa. Lokhu kungasho ukuthi umlingani wakhe kumele akuqonde lokhu, ukuze akwazi ukumnikeza isikhathi esanele ukuze umzimba wakhe utotobe kahle kuze kufike endaweni efanele. Uma lokhu kungenzeki, uyothi umlingani wakho ungena kuwe, akuthole usapholile; bese egcine ethi uyabanda.Isimo okanye ingcindezi emqondweni ingakudodobalisa ukugeleza kwegazi emzimbeni bese kuhamba kancane ukufika kwegazi emgudwini wesifazane. Okusho ukuthi ngaphambi wena wesilisa uthi umlingani wakho uyabanda, zibuze ukuthi ayikho na into esemqondweni alwa nayo engenza ukuthi ukugeleza kwegazi kwehle? Mhlawumbe uyothola ukuthi nguwe ngqo oyimbangela yalokhu kufadalala kwegazi.Uma sihlanganisa lokhu okungenhla, kuyacaca ukuthi ukukhala ngokubanda kowesifazane kunokwenza kakhulu ngokungaqondi kahle kowesilisa ngocansi, nangendlela umzimba osebenza ngayo. Ezinye izizathu zokwehla kwezinga lokushisa emgudwini wesifazame, yizimo nezinto ezingashintsheka.Esigabeni sesibili ngifisa sibuke ukungafundiseki ngocansi okudalwa yizimo eziningi. Kulezi kukhona nokungafundiswa ngalo ngabefundisi uma kulungiselelwa umshado. Abefundisi babalulekile kakhulu kule ndima ngoba yibona abawezela abashadayo ngaphesheya ezweni lendoda nenkosikazi. Kuleli banga engikulo lempilo, sengihlangane nabefundisi abaningi, ngaxoxa nabantu abanhlobonhlobo. Ngiphinde ngahambela nezimfundiso eziningi ezikhuluma ngomshado. Abazoshada uma sekufikwa kwezocansi kukhiwa phezulu kakhulu, kwesinye isikhathi kuthiwe thengani izincwadi nizifundele okanye nithenge iziqephu zocansi nibukele. Lokhu kukude kakhulu kunalokhu okudingekayo. Abantu bazoshada bagcina sebelinde loya mndondoshiya wenduku oseziqeshini zocansi, induku efakwa ngapha ikhishwe ifakwe ngapha. Uma bethi bayenza laba asebeshadile akusenzeki. Imiphumela yalapho ukungezwani okumsusa wakho wucansi kugcine sekuxhantele okuningi bese kuyahlukwanwa ekugcineni. Abazoshada badinga ukufundiswa ukuthi kuyiwa kanjani ocansini? Baphathi bamabandla, abashadayo bayazi ucansi lukhona, bayazi kufanele kuyiwe kulo, abangakwazi ukuthi kanjani? Yikho usuthola abantu bevula imilenze gengelezi. Bese eyakhala omunye athi: Mkami ubulili bakho buyabanda, abungenelisi”. Amagama abuhlungu kakhulu lawa ongawasho kumuntu othandana naye, angiphathi koshade naye. Uma ususho njalo usumqedile, bayothi beza kuwe mfundisi kuyobe sekuyizaba nje. Abashadile, ibandla, isizwe; uwonke wonke osezingeni elifanele; makafundiswe ukuthi kuyiwa kanjani ocansini. Izinto ezithile zenziwelani? Abagcotshwa mabenze izinhlelo eziqondile ngalokhu ngoba uma ushadise abantu ungaqinisekisanga ubunzulu bokufunda kwabo ngocansi. Kumele wazi usutshale, wavundisa, wanisela imbewu yenhlukanhlukano. Ukuthi ubani unengane akusho ukuthi bayazi ngocansi. Abantu mabafundiswe, thina esifundiswayo sithobele imfundiso.UDokotela uBongani Nxumalo utholakala:078 499 0355076 620 4598060 917 0943[email protected]Instagram: eyangakithi medical centreMpilonhle Mpilonde!!
title: Ukujiya kocansi nenselelo kubefundisi

text: UZONQUNYWA ebandleni umfundisi wenkampani kamasingcwabisane wasoLundi oboshelwe icala lokutholwa nebhokisi elintshontshiwe.UMnuz Nkosinathi  “Nathi” Mbatha (50) webandla i- Corinthians Christian Church in Zion, elaziwa kakhulu ngamaJerusalema, Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uvele eNkantolo yaseMahlabathini ngoMsombuluko, lahlehliselwa uMeyi 24 ukuze ezofaka isicelo sebheyili. Ugcinwe esitokisini. Okhulumela abashushisi i-NPA KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Kara, uthe: “UMbatha uvelile eNkantolo yaseMahlabathini ngoMsombuluko. Icala lihlehliselwe uMeyi 24 ngemininingwane yebheyili. Umsolwa ubhekene necala lokugqekeza ngenhloso yokweba nelokuntshontsha,” Lo mfundisi kunezinsolo zokuthi waya komunye umasingcwabisane eCelani eyofuna ukuthenga ibhokisi.Kuthintwa umbhishobhi wakhe, uMnuz Mthandeni Dlamuka, ebuzwa ngalesi sigameko uvumile ukuthi wumfundisi wakhe oboshiwe futhi kumele kulandelwe imithetho yebandla lokuba anqunywe.“Nina senizizwa ngobani izindaba zokuthi umfundisi wami lona. Impela uyena, sitholile ukuthi uboshiwe ngecala lebhokisi. Bengingakamboni ngoba kuthiwa ubesenkantolo ngoMsombuluko. Omunye umkhokheli odlulile enkantolo kodwa angiyazi imininingwane yecala.  Sizobe sesilandela umthetho webandla ukuba anqunywe. Umthetho webandla uthi umuntu obhekene necala enkantolo uyanqunywa kuze kube liyaphela icala noma lifike ekugcineni. Amanye amabandla angathini nje sinomfundisi ohamba icala,” kusho uDlamuka.Uthe akazange alubhade enkantolo njengoba le nto eyenzekile ibafake ehlazweni njengebandla.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi amanye amalungu ebandla ayile enkantolo ukuyoseka umfundisi wabo.Elinye ilungu lebandla elicele ukungadalulwa lithe impela bakulindele ukuba amiswe umsolwa.“Ebandleni uma unecala nje imijiva yakho iyalengiswa ensikeni ungayigqoki nezinto zebandla ungazenzi kuze kube liyaphela icala lakho. Inqubo yebandla esiyaziyo leyo. Yize phela sisazolindela ukuba umfundisi amiswe phambi kwebandla anqunywe sizwa sonke,” kusho owebandla.Umsolwa uboshwa nje kuvele ukuthi waqala wayofuna ukulithenga ibhokisi kumasigcwabisane iCelani’s Funeral oLundi.Ngakusasa kwatholaka sekugqekeziwe kwathatha leli bhokisi.Amaphoyisa alandela umkhondo alithola emahhovisi omasigcwabisane ekusebenza kuwo umsolwa wabe eseboshwa.
title: Uzomiswa ebandleni umfundisi osolwa ngokweba ibhokisi

text: USAZIWAYO wakuleli, uNomzamo Mbatha, usememezele ukuthi nakulo nyaka uzonikela ngemifundaze yenani likaR1 million kubafundi abasezikhungweni ezahlukene zemfundo ephakeme.Le mali uzoyikhipha ngaphansi kwenhlangano yakhe iLighthouse Foundation nenkampani iHollywoodbets.Le ntokazi yaKwaMashu, eThekwini, ingomunye usaziwayo wakuleli olula isandla emiphakathini ehlukene, hhayi kuleli nje kodwa nakwamanye amazwe ase-Afrika njengoba iyinxusa lakwa-United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees.KwiTwitter uNomzamo uveze ukuthi nakulo nyaka bazonikeza abafundi abafanelekile, nabasazimukela izicelo zabo namanje njengoba bezoze bavale ngoJanuwari 11.Uveze ukuthi ngokuhlanganyela neHollywoodbets nakulo nyaka bakhethe ukuyikhipha le mifundaze. Ngonyaka odlule abakhipha ekaR500 000, kubafundi abangu-70.“Kulo nyaka sikhethe ukwandisa imali esiyifaka kule mifundaze ukuze sifake isandla entsheni yakuleli efuna ukungena ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme. Ngeke sinike abasayongena kuphela kodwa nasebengaphakathi abanenkinga yemali nabangaqedile ukukhokhela izifundo abazenzayo bangafaka izicelo zabo kulo mfundaze,” kusho uNomzamo.Uthe lesi isipho sakhe sikaKhisimusi asinika intsha ezoba nenhlanhla yokukhethwa.’’Abafuna ukubhalisela le mifundaze bangathola i-link lapho bezolandela khona yonke imiyalelo yokufaka isicelo, kuzona zonke izinkundla zokuxhumana. Ngibafisela inhlanhla bonke abazofaka izicelo zabo,“ kuphetha uNomzamo.Ngonyaka odlule abafundi ababeqhamuka ezikhungweni ezahlukene babonga igalelo likaNomzamo emcimbini owawuseZimbali.Le ntokazi yaveza ukuthi le mifundaze inesifiso sokuthi ihambe yonke iKwaZulu-Natal ifike kubantu basemakhaya abangakwazi ukuthola kalula izinto ezisebenza nge-internet nabakuthola kunzima ukufaka izicelo zemifundaze efana nalena.
title: UNomzamo nemifundaze yezitshudeni zasemanyuvesi

text: KUBATSHAZWA isihluku sesoka okuthiwa libhokode ngommese intombi phambi kwamalungu omndeni wayo ngoba lingafuni ukwamukela ukwaliwa, eMvelabusha, eManguzi.UNksz Nomfundo Mlungwana (22) ugwazwe amanxeba amaningi emzimbeni ngoLwesibili.Kuthiwa umsolwa ufike kubo kamufi bahilizisana wabe esemgwaza kaningi, ngisho noma amalungu omndeni esengenelela kuthiwa uqhubekile nokugwaza umufi maqede wabaleka.Umsolwa ugcine eboshiwe izolo.Kuthiwa umufi nomsolwa bese bethandane isikhathi eside kodwa muva nje bese behlala ngokuxabana.Kuthiwa umufi wale isoka wacela ukuqhubeka nempilo kodwa kuthiwa alizange likwamukele lokho njengoba lifike kubo selihlome ngommese.Umthombo weSolezwe osondelene nodaba, ocele ukungadalulwa, utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi umsolwa ubengafuni kwakuyizwa eyokuthi intombi ithi ucu kalusahlangani.“Okwenzekile ukuthi umufi wale isoka ngoba bengazwananga, isoka lifike kubo likhala ngokuthi ngeke likwazi ukuhlukana nalo wesifazane. Ingxabano iqale lapho, wabe esemgwaza,” kuchaza umthombo.Unina omdala kamufi, uNkk Busisiwe Ndlazi, uthe namanje kusenzima ukukhuluma ngabakubonile kubulawa indodakazi ngesihluku.“Bengikwenye indlu, unina wentombazane esemasimini ngesikhathi sizwa ukukhala. Siphuthumile safica emgwaza, ephethe ummese ngesandla. Umgwaze inqwaba yamanxeba. Sihlukumezekile kakhulu ngesihluku esisibonile,” kusho uNkk Ndlazi.Uthe umufi ubengasebenzi futhi engafundi ehlala ekhaya.UNkk Ndlazi uthe yena siqu ubengalazi isoka lendodakazi kodwa akhona amanye amalungu omndeni abelazi ngoba bese kunesikhathi bethandana.“Akukho abesekukhiphile ukuze abe ngumkhwenyane lapha ekhaya, bebethandana nje,” kusho uNkk Ndlazi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe amaphoyisa aseManguzi aphenya icala lokubulala.“Owesilisa oneminyaka engu-36 uboshelwe icala lokubulala owesifazane oneminyaka engu-22 eManguzi. Umsolwa uzovela kusasa (namhlanje) enkantolo,” kusho uCol Mbele.
title: Isoka ebelaliwa libhokode intombi phambi komndeni

text: SIZWE BLOSEEbika eseSun CityUKUTHATHA ikhefu leminyaka isebenze ngokuhlukana kubonakala kuyisebenzela iMafikizolo njengoba ibuthe izindondo eziyisikhombisa kumaSouth African Music Awards (Sama), eSun City, eNorth West, izolo ebusuku.Leli qembu elihlanganiswe wuNhlanhla Nciza noTheo Kgosinkwe lithathe ikhefu leminyaka eyisithupha njengoba lagcina ukukhipha ngo-2006 i-albhamu ethi Six Mabone.Izolo linqobe nge-albhamu yanyakenye iReunited indondo ye-Album of the Year, Duo/Group of the Year, Best Pop Album, Best Collaboration (Happiness), Best Selling Ring-back Tone (Khona), Best Selling full-track Download (Khona) neBest Selling Total Download (Khona).IMafikizolo icishe yalingana noZahara owanqoba izindondo eziyisishiyagalombili kumaSama ngo-2012.Inqoba lezi zindondo nje isanda kuthola ezintathu kumaMetro FM Music Awards eThekwini muva nje.Leli qembu lisethubeni lokuqhubeka nokuwola izindondo kwazise liqokwe kane kumaMTV Africa Music Awards azoba seThekwini ngoJuni 7.Abaculi abangatholanga lutho kumaMetro FM Music Awards basulwe izinyembezi kumaSama njengoba bethole izindondo.Umculi wasePort Shepstone, uNaima Kay, owayengomunye wabaqokwe kakhulu kumaMetro FM Awards kodwa wangawina uthole indondo yeNewcomer of the Year nge-albhamu yakhe ethi Umsebenzi.U-iFani oshisa izikhotha ngengoma ethi Izingoma Ezimnandi unqobe indondo yeBest Rap Album kwathi iMi Casa yathola eyeBest Dance Album.Inkakha yomculo kamaskandi uPhuzekhemisi neqembu lombhaqanga elidume umhlaba wonke iLadysmith Black Mambazo bahlonishwe ngendondo yeLifetime Achievement Award.AMambazo abuye athola eye-International Achievement Award.Sebebonke abawinile:Female Artist of the Year - Zahara (Phendula)Male Artist of the Year - Kabomo Memory RemainsBest Rock Album - Van Coke Kartel Bloed, Sweet & TraneBeste Pop Album (Afrikaans) - Karlien van Jaarsveld UitklophouBest Adult Contemporary Album - Shaun Jacobs Love CanBeste Kontemporêre Musiek Album - Elvis Blue AfrikaansBest African Adult Album - Zonke Give And Take LiveBest Kwaito Album - Big Nuz Made In AfricaBest Dance Album - Mi Casa Su CasaBest Traditional Faith Music Album - Rebecca Bayos'KhombaBest Selling Album - Zahara PhendulaBest Maskandi Album - Thokozani Langa InyakanyakaBest Jazz Album - Shane Cooper OscillationsBest Contemporary Faith Music Album - Nqubeko Mbatha Sentiments Of A WorshiperBest Traditional Album - The Arrows Spin My World Around
title: Ibukisile kumaSama izolo iMafikizolo

text: BEVILE ku-18 million abantu bakuleli abazothola imali yesibonelelo sesikhashana sikahulumeni esizobasiza kulesi sikhathi sokuhlasela kweCovid-19.Lokhu kushiwo nguNgqongqoshe wezeziMali kuzwelonke uMnuz Tito Mboweni ngoLwesithathu, ngesikhathi ethula isabelomali esiyisipesheli.UMboweni uthe bangu-1.5 million asebethole isibonelelo esisha, wagcizelela ukuthi senzelwe abantu obangaholi mali, kwenye indawo.“Ukuxhasa abathembele kulesi sibonelelo, uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi wabelwe imali enguR25.5 billion eyengeziwe emalini enguR41 billion eyabelwe lo mnyango ukubhekana nesimo,” kusho uMboweni.Ivikela isinqumo sokwehliswa kwemali okuthiwa yasuswa kuR50 billion yaya kuR41 billion ebhekele uhlelo lwezibonelelo, iNhloko yoMnyango ehhovisini loMgcinimafa uMnuz Dondo Mogajane, ithe ihhovisi belibheka izinsiza ezisetshenziswayo kubhekwa nemali okumele ichithwe ngazo.UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wamemezela ukuthi inguR500 billion ebekelwe ukubhekelela abakhahlanyezwe yigciwane. Waphinde wadalula ukuthi abantu abangasebenzi futhi abangahlomuli esikhwameni esibhekelele abangasebenzi, bazothola isibonelelo sikaR350 ngenyanga, kuze kuphele izinyanga eziyisithupha.Leli hhovisi lithi uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi ubusagxile ekuhleleni imihlangano lizama ukuthola indlela engasetshenziswa ukuze imali ifinyelele kubantu, lathi yikho okwenze abanye abafake izicelo, bangayitholi ngokushesha.“Uhulumeni uhlose ukusebenzisa imali ngendlela elungile, ” kusho leli hhovisi.
title: Bevile ku-18 million abazohola isibonelelo sikaR350

text: ABAHLELI bamaCrown Gospel Music Awards baqinisekise usuku okuzosingathwa ngalo imiklomelo yalo nyaka.Emasontweni amabili edlule leli phephandaba libike ukuthi abahleli bathi izoba khona kodwa imininingwane ephelele ibingakakabikhona.Inkampani ewahlelayo iWorld Gospel Powerhouse, ithe amaCrown alo nyaka azoba ngoNovemba 29.“Sesifile yizingcingo nemibuzo yabantu abasendimeni yomculo,” kusho umsunguli wemiklomelo uZanele LaMbokazi Nkambule.“Abaculi bebefuna amafomu okungenela kusukela ngoJulayi. Kuyasijabulisa ukuthi ekugcineni sesingaqinisekisa ukuthi amaCrown azoba sekupheleni kukaNovemba futhi sizogcina yonke imithetho yezokuphepha ethinta iCovid-19.”Uthe bazinikeze isikhathi kuze kube uSepthemba 15 ukubona ukuthi umcimbi uzoba online ngokuphelele noma okunye kuzokwenzelwa lapho uba khona.“Kuzoncika emiyalelweni kahulumeni. Sihlelela zonke izimo futhi sizowenza isimemezelo esiqondile ngoSepthemba 15,” kusho imenenja yamaCrown, uZama Mkhize.UZanele uthe abantu abaningi baphethwe wukhwantalala ngenxa yeCovid-19 abanye sebelahle ithemba.Uthe abanye abakwazi ngisho ukuya ezinkonzweni, okushiya isikhala empilweni yabo esizogcwaliswa ngamaCrown.“Indikimba yalo nyaka ithi Hope and Revival. Siletha imvuselelo enkulu ngoNovemba 29. Abaculi bowokholo bazoyisa abantu enkonzweni futhi sithi uJehova usekhona,” kusho uZanele.Uthe ukungenela kuzovulwa ngo-Agasti 15 kuze kube uSepthemba 30 futhi abafuna ukungenela bangathola amafomu ngokuthumela i-email [email protected]
title: Selumenyezelwe usuku lwamaCrown

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa ubuyise ithemba izolo ememezela izinhlelo zokufukula umnotho wezwe, ukwakhiwa kwamathuba emisebenzi nokwelulwa kwesikhathi sokuholelwa kwabangasebenzi isibonelelo.URamaphosa ekhuluma ePhalamende izolo ntambama, uthe isibonelelo sabangasebenzi sikaR350 sizolulwa ngezinyanga ezintathu.Lesi sibonelelo sasihlelelwe ukuthi sehlise ingcindezi kwabangasebenzi ngesikhathi seCovid-19 kanti bekumele siholwe okokugcina kule nyanga.Sesizoholwa kuze kube wuJanuwari wonyaka ozayo.“Abantu bebenginxenxa bephakamisa izinto eziningi ngalesi sibonelelo yingakho sinqume ukuthi selule isikhathi sokuholwa kwaso ngezinyanga ezintathu. Kubalulekile ukuthi seseke abantu abahluphekayo.”Akazange asho lutho mayelana nokuthi siholwe unomphela lesi sibonelelo njengoba kunesiphakamiso esisho njalo noma kunyuswe imali yaso.URamaphosa uthe umnotho wakuleli ukhahlamezeke kakhulu ngesikhathi kuhlasele iCorona okuholele ekutheni abantu abangu-2 million balahlekelwe yimisebenzi, umnotho wehla ngo-16.4% ngekota yesibili uma uqhathaniswa nangesikhathi esifanayo nyakenye.Uthe lokhu kwenziwe wukuthi uhulumeni wamisa ukwenziwa kwezinto eziningi ezihambisana nokuthi leli lizwe belibekwe esigabeni senhlekelele.“Ukumiswa kokwenziwa kwezinto eziningi kuleli kusize ekutheni leli gciwane lingasabalali kakhulu. NgoJulayi izinkomba zazithe lizosabalala kakhulu ngawo. Njengamanje seyixegisiwe imithetho kodwa isimo asikakabuyeli esimeni nalo leli gciwane alikapheli, lisekhona. Ukukhushulwa kwezibonelelo nesibonelelo sabangasebenzi kuholele ekutheni abantu abangu-5 million bangabulawa yindlala,” kusho yena.Ngokohlelo lomnyango wezemisebenzi obelwenzelwe ukuthi lunciphise ukucindezeleka kubasebenzi abebengasebenzi ngendlela eyejwayelekile, uthe bangu-4 million abahlomule kulo bakhokhelwa uR49 million obuphuma kwi-UIF.Uthe zingu-960 000 izinkampani ezihlomule ngaphansi kohlelo kanti zibuye zahlomula nakwezinye izihlelo ezinjengokwehliswa kwentela.Uthe uhulumeni ngokubambisana nezinhlaka zezomnotho baqhamuke namasu okuvuselela umnotho ukuze kuvuleleke amathuba omsebenzi angu- 800 000.Kula masu uthe kukhona awokuhlela kabusha izinhlelo zikagesi, ukwakhiwa kwezinhlelo zengqalasizinda okuzoqhubeka iminyaka emine. Kulezo zinhlelo kuzoqashwa abantu abaningi abangasebenzi.“Ngasekupheleni kukaJuni bese sinezinhlelo ezingu-276 eseziqaliwe, kuzo okutshalwe uR2.3 trillion. Ngaphezu kwalokho kunezinye izihlelo ezingu-50 eziqalwe ngoJulayi nezingu-12 esezishicilelwe emqulwini kahulumeni ukuze ziqalwe ezifundazweni ezahlukene. Lezi zinhlelo ziyasheshiswa ukuze kuvuleke amathuba omsebenzi.”Olunye uhlelo olukhona lokuvuselela umnotho, uthe ngolokuthuthukisa imikhiqizo yakuleli ebese ifadabele kuphinde kuthuthukiswe nezimboni nokukhucululwa kwenkohlakalo.Ngokohlelo olwenziwe wumgcinimafa, lezi zinhlelo zizoholela ekutheni umnotho ukhule ngo-3% eminyakeni engu-10. Ezinye zezinhlelo ezizoqasha abantu seziqalile, uthe ngezokwakhiwa kwezindlu okubalwa ukwakhiwa kwezindlu eMatlosana N2 eseNorth West, iLufhereng eseGauteng, iGreater Cornubia eKwaZulu-Natal neVista Park eseFree State. Kuzo uthe kutshalwe uR44 billion.Ubalule nokuthi kuzoba namathuba omsebenzi angu-300 000 entsheni ezosebenza isize othisha ezikoleni ukuze bagxile ekufundiseni.“Kuzokwakhiwa imisebenzi engaphezu kuka-60 000 ekwakhiweni kwengqalasizinda zomasipala. Kwezempilo sizokwengeza abasebenza emphakathini nabasizi babahlengikazi abangu-6000 ezweni lonke njengoba kuzoqala iNational Health Insurance. Sisiza abalimi abasafufusa abangu-75 000 kanjalo nabafundisa odado abangu-100 000.”Okunye uRamaphosa athe kumele kusheshiswe ngukugunyaza kwabakhiqizi abazimele bagesi kuphinde kube nohlelo lokuthi kukhiqizwe ugesi othe xaxa athe kuzokwenzeka ngo-2022. Amaqembu aphikisayo asamukele isinqumo sokwelula isibonelelo sabangasebenzi.
title: Siluliwe isibonelelo sabangasebenzi

text: INSIZWA esizakhele igama kuleli ngokuba usomabhizinisi onegama, abaningi abambiza ngephanta, uSbusiso “DJ Sbu” Leope (39), isiveze ukuthi isifuna umuntu ezoshada naye.USbu ukusho lokhu ohlelweni oluyinkulumo ngxoxo, iReal Talk, olwethulwa u-Azania Mosaka, ngoLwesibili ntambama.USbu uthe, njengoba ngonyaka ozayo ehlanganisa iminyaka engu-40, kukhona izinto ezimbalwa asefuna ukuzilungisa.“Nginomama engimthanda ngayo yonke inhliziyo yami nawo wonke umndeni wami, bese kuba indodakazi yami engiyithandayo. Kodwa isikhathi sokuthi ngithole unkosikazi sesifikile futhi uma ngimbona ukuthi ngowami nakanjani ngizomshada,” kusho uSbu.Uthe, okwamanje akanaye umuntu athandana naye yingakho ephumela obala.“Ngifuna umuntu othanda uNkulunkulu, lokho kubalulekile kimina. Ngiwumuntu othanda ukuhlala ejabule njengoba ngisho abantu engake ngaba sebudlelwaneni bezothando nabo ngisho umama wendodakazi yami sinobudlelwane obuhle kakhulu.”
title: U-DJ Sbu usekulungele ukushadelwa

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESEUMQEQESHI weqembu lesizwe iBafana Bafana, uMolefi Ntseki, weluleka abadlali bakuleli abagijima emaqenjini aphesheya kwezilwandle ngendlela okumele baziphathe ngayo uma sebengaphandle kwenkundla.Emasontweni ambalwa edlule uBongani “Ben 10” Zungu oyinjini yesisu kwiBafana aphinde agijime nakwiGlasgow Rangers FC esanda kuba ngompetha beScottish Premiership yaseScotland, uphenduke undabuzekwayo yena nozakwabo abane uBrian Kinnear, uCalvin Bassey, uDapo Mebude noNathan Patterson, ngokuphula imigomo ebekiwe yeCovid-19 eScotland, kutholwa ukuthi babezijuxuza kwenye yamaphathi kwaze kwaba yizintatha.Isenzo sabo sabafaka kolukhulu ubishi, bajeziswa ngokumiswa izinsuku eziyishumi bengazihlanganisi neqembu. Kwaze kwalandela ngokuthi uSteven Gerrard aphawule kwabezindaba ngekusasa likaZungu eqenjini, nokwazwakala engathi asenciphile amathuba okuthi asayiniswe ngokugcwele njengoba ebolekiwe.UZungu ungomunye wabadlali abangu-26 ababizwe nguNtseki esikwatini seBafana esizokuba nemidlalo emibili emqoka yokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ezokuba seCameroon ngonyaka ozayo. IBafana izobhekana neGhana kanye Sudan kuyona le nyanga.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uNtseki uthe kuyishwa elikhulu ukuthi namanje abadlali abakafuni ukufunda kwabanye abadlali baphambilini abagcina ngokubanjwa ngunoxhaka wokungaziphatha kahle, nokuphetha ngokuthi  abanye ikusasa labo laphelela emoyeni phezu kokuba kwakubhekwe lukhulu kubona.“Njengoba sikhuluma indaba yokungaziphathi kahle kwabadlali uma sebengaphandle kwenkundla, angifuni ukulushiya ngaphandle udaba olusematheni lukaBongani ngoba ungumdlali wethu kwiBafana.“Ngingasho ngithi kube yishwa futhi into embi ekutheni azithole esimeni abekuso ngenxa yokungaziphathi kahle. Ngikhulumile naye njengobaba nendodana wangichazela ngakho konke okwenzekile futhi uxolisile eqenjini lakhe iRangers kanye nakubantu balapha eNingizimu Afrika ngesenzo sakhe kanye nabanye ozakwabo. Nginethemba elikhulu lokuthi usifundile isifundo,” kusho uNtseki.Lo mqeqeshi ube eseluleka abadlali abagijima emaqenjini akuleli kanye naphesheya kwezilwandle ngokuthi kumele bakugweme ukubuswa wudumo kanye nemali ngoba lokhu kulicekela phansi kalula ikusasa labo.“Njengomqeqeshi weqembu lesizwe, ngithanda ukweluleka abadlali balapha ekhaya ikakhulukazi labo abagijima emaqenjini aphesheya kwezilwandle ngokuthi kumele bawuhloniphe umsebenzi wabo wokudlala ibhola. Kumele bazi ukuthi njengoba besemazweni nje, abazimele nje bona kuphela kodwa bamele nesizwe nemindeni yabo ngokunjalo.“Kumele bazifundise ukuba nomgogodla ngokungazinaki ezinye izinto ezisemaceleni futhi ezingabuyiseli ngalutho ngoba yizona eziphazamisayo esikhathini esiningi. Akubi mnandi ukubona ithalente lomdlali livele lishabalale kalula ngenxa yokuhluleka ukumelana nempilo yezinga eliphezulu. Kumele bakugweme nokuzibandakanya nabantu abenza sengathi bayabathanda kanti bazisondeza kubona ngenxa nje yodumo.”UNtseki uthe bazoya ekhempini ngoMashi 21 kodwa abadlali abagijima phesheya bona kulindeleke ukuba batheleke kuleli phakathi kukaMashi 22-23 kwazise bazokube bedlala emaqenjini abo kuleyo mpelasonto.
title: UNtseki  neseluleko ngokuziphatha kubadali

text: ‘UNKOSIKAZI wami wesibili ngamshelelwa wuJohnny, engibhalela izincwadi eziya kuyena. Ubudlelwane ebesinabo bebumangalisa. Ukube kuya ngami ngabe angikhulumi ngale nto, inhliziyo yami ibuhlungu. UJohnny ubesegulile, uma ngimvakashela ubeze asishiye sihlezi ethi uyolala udinga ukuphumula, umdlavuza ubusumphathe isikhathi eside”.Lawa ngamazwi ashiwo nguSipho Mchunu owahamba amazwe noJohnny Clegg (66), oshone ngoLwesibili ntambama emzini wakhe eGoli.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uSipho Mchunu uthe, uJohnny ubeseya nasezibhedlela zaphesheya kwezilwandle efuna usizo lokulashwa umdlavuza.“Kuhluleke odokotela abaningi waze wakhishwa esinye isitho somzimba. Ngike ngamvakashela muva nje ngafika kwakhe egula kakhulu. Ngigcine ukukhuluma naye ngesonto eledlule lapho ayekhuluma khona aphinde athule athi uyaphumula. Kuthe ngithola ucingo lokuthi ushonile ngoLwesibili ngehora lesibili emini ngacishe ngawa ebaleni,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe unina kaJohnny uyena owamfaka ekuthandeni abantu abamnyama namasiko abo.“UJohnny ubefunze unina ngokuthanda izinto zabantu abamnyama. Besihlala emahostela senze konke sobabili. Bewungeke usho ukuthi ungumlungu. Ubefuna ukwazi yonke into ngamasiko ethu. Engikujabulelayo nje wukuthi emhlabeni sihambe wonke amazwe senza izinto ezahlukene asikaze sithoalakale sisephutheni, besenza konke ngendlela,” kuchaza yena.Isolezwe limbuza ukuthi iyiphi ingoma eyayithandwa ngabantu uma becula, uthe yizo zonke.“Ayikho ingoma engingathi ngizomkhumbula ngayo, zonke izingoma zethu esazenza kwiJuluka kumina naye bezisho lukhulu. Inhliziyo yami igcwele usizi, angazi ngenzeni ngalesi simo. Angifuni nokucabanga ukuthi kuzoba nomgcwabo wakhe,” kuchaza uMchunu.Uthe usazohlela ukuthi uzomvalelisa kanjani uJohnny ahlangana naye ngo-1969, baze bahlukaniswa wukufa.Izolo umndeni kaJohnny ubungakazimemezeli izinhlelo zomgcwabo kodwa esitatimendeni osithumele abezindaba uthe bazoba nomgcwabo ongavulelekile obekuyisifiso sikaJohnny.Uthe izinhlelo zenkonzo yesikhumbuzo uzozimemezela okuzokuba ngeyawo wonke umuntu.UJohnny ushiye emhlabeni inkosikazi abeseshade nayo iminyaka engu-31, uJenny.Bebenamadodana amabili uJesse noJaron.
title: UMchunu washelelwa wuJohnny inkosikazi

text: UMCULI waseThekwini, uDJ Tira useveze ukuthi akanavalo lokuthi kungaphazamisa ibhizinisi lakhe ukuphumela obala aveze ukuthi uzovotela i-ANC ngoLwesithathu.UTira ubengomunye wosaziwayo izolo abazibophezele ekutheni bazokhankasela uKhongolose njengoba kuyiwa okhethweni ngesonto elizayo.UTira uthe wonke umuntu uyazikhethela ikhaya lakhe lezombusazwe.“Angiboni ukuthi kuzoba nenkinga kubalandeli bethu ngokuthi yiliphi ikhaya esizikhethele lona. Iqembu i-ANC mina nozakwethu abakhona lana yilona esilithembayo, yikho sizibophezela ukusebenza nalo,” kusho uTira.Uthe intsha ayiphume ngobuningi bayo iyovota ngesonto elizayo.Osaziwayo okukhona kubo uDJ Siyanda, DJ Chynaman, DJ Sox, DJ Merlon, DJ Bongz,DJ Happygal, Brenda Mhlongo ongumlingisi, Mondli Ngcobo, Thembinkosi Thwala olingisa indawo kaMondli kuZalo, Andile KaMajola ngabanye osaziwayo abazibophezele ekusebenzisaneni noKhongolose.Bonke bathembise ukuhamba naleli qembu lapho liya khona ukuze banxenxe abantu ukuthi bavotele umbutho.Ngemuva nje kokuzibophezela, izolo bonke babe sebeqala umsebenzi njengoba behambele emakethe eThekwini naseBerea la bebeyonxenxa khona umphakathi ukuthi uvotele iqembu elibusayo.Labo saziwayo bakhulume ngazwi linye lathi uKhongolose umbutho omdala eliwethembayo, kungakho likhethe ukusebenza nawo.Umkhulumeli we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu uthe uKhongolose ubhekile wathola ukuthi njengoba kuyiwa phambili ziningi izinhlaka zomphakathi odinga ukusebenzisana nazo.“Uma ubulandela umkhankaso wethu, uzokwazi ukuthi sinohlelo lapho sithatha khona odokotela sihambe nabo siye ezindaweni zasemakhaya lapho bafike khona basize abantu abadala, sinohlelo futhi lapho sithatha khona abammeli nabo bahlinzeke ngosizo lwezomthetho mahhala kubantu,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.
title: Osaziwayo bethemba i-ANC okhethweni

text:
INTATHELI YESOLEZWEU ZOKHONJISWA bukhoma ku-SABC umcimbi owubukhazikhazi wokuhlonipha amaciko asebenza emkhakheni wezamafilimu netheleveshini.Umcimbi wamaSouth African Film and Television Awards (Safta) ongowesishiyagalolunye kulo nyaka, uzosakazwa ku-SABC 2, ngeSonto, ngo-7.30 ebusuku kuya ku-10.30 ebusuku.Lo mcimbi okuklonyeliswa kuwo amaciko ngendondo ebizwa ngeGolden Horn, uzoba seGhalagher Estate, eMidrand, eGoli, ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku kuthi isigaba sesibili sibe ngeSonto nokuyiso esizotshengiswa bukhoma.Inhloso yalo mcimbi ngukuhlonipha nokugqugquzela abakule ndima ngomsebenzi wabo wokujabulisa ababukeli nokuvundulula ikhono labalingisi.Umcimbi wakulo nyaka ubhekwe ngabomvu njengoba uqhamuka neqoqo elisha elihlabahlosile leBest Presenter Award nokuzovota kulo abalaleli.Kulo mqhudelwano yileli qoqo kuphela elivotelwa ngababukeli.Okunye obekwenza amaqoqo alo mqhudelwano abhekwe ngabomvu ngukuthi uzongena yini umdlalo owuchungechunge i
Generations: 
The Legacy.Lokhu kungenxa yothuli olwasuswa ngabalingisi abangu-16 be
Generations ngonyaka odlule abangenela isiteleka esingekho emthethweni bekhala ngamaholo, izinkontileka ezivuselelwa njalo ngonyaka nokungakhokhelwa imali yeziqephu eziphindaphindwayo.IGenerations: The Legacy ayiqokwanga nakowodwa umkhakha okunalokho kugqame iSkeem Sam esangena esikhaleni salo mdlalo ngenkathi umisiwe ngenxa yesiteleka sabalingisi.Uhla lwabaqokwe kwiBest Presenter Award lumi kanje:1 Lungile Radu- 
Big Brother Mzansi2 Jessica Mtimkulu 
- Blue Couch3 Bonang Matheba- Clash of the Choirs SA4 Bujy Bikwa
- Cula Sibone5 Darren Green 
- Doctor's Orders6 Masechaba Lekalake 
- Ekse let'stalk with Masechaba Lekalake7 Katlego Maboe- Expresso Morning Show8 Tshepo Maseko 
- Gospel Classic9 Ntombi Ngcobo-Mzolo
- Gumba10 Masechaba Lekalake- I love South Africa11 Katlego Mlambo 
- Kasi-Licious12 Jeremy Maggs- Maggs On Media13 Mooiloop (Ensemble)14 Vusi Zion 
- Movers & Shakers15 Thembi Seete
- Nguwe Na16 Johan Stemmet- Noot vir Noot17 Phat Joe 
- The Real Goboza18 Siyabonga Ngwekazi 
- Turn.
title: Izovezwa bukhoma eyamaSafta

text: MAYIBONGWE MAQHINAI NGOZI yabaqaphi baNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, ebulale abesifazane ababili abebezihambela ngeToyota Yaris, ngoLwesihlanu isisuse omunye umsindo ngobungozi bezimoto zamalambu aluhlaza emigwaqweni yesifundazwe.Kule ngozi eyenzeke ngaKwaDukuza, ku-N2 kushone abesifazane ababili okunguNksz Buyi Hadebe noNksz Nonto Ximba abebehamba ngeToyota Yaris baseMpangeni ngesikhathi beshayisana neFord Ranger yabaqaphi bakaNdunankulu kodwa bona abathole imihuzukwana.Amaqembu aphikisayo aseqale phansi ahlaba ikhwelo lokuba kuvalwe amalambu aluhlaza ezimotweni zabaholi bakahulumeni ngoba le nqubo idala izingozi emigwaqweni futhi abanye abashayeli abayihloniphi imithetho ehambisana nejubane eligunyaziwe.Umholi weDA esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sizwe Mchunu, uthe sekukaningi kukhalwa ngalezi zimoto zosopolitiki ezinamalambu aluhlaza ngenxa yegazi esezilichithile emigwaqweni yesifundazwe.“Baningi abantu asebeshonile esifundazweni sethu ngenxa yalezi zimoto zamalambu aluhlaza ezithwala abaholi. Yingakho njengeDA sihlale sisho ukuthi uhulumeni kufanele awavale la malambu aluhlaza noma abeke imithetho eqinile yokusetshenziswa kwawo. Sizwelana kakhulu nemindeni elahlekelwe futhi sizoqinisekisa ukuthi uphenyo lwenziwa ngendlela efanele,” kusho uMchunu.Umholi we-IFP uMnuz Blessed Gwala, uthe izimoto zamalambu aluhlaza azibanikezi abashayeli bazo ilungelo lokushayisa abantu ngendlela abafisa ngayo.EWestern Cape uNdunankulu wakhona uNkk Helen Zille wakuvala ukusetshenziswa kwamalambu aluhlaza ngemuva kwezigameko eziningana zokungaziphathi kahle kwabashayeli.Ngaphandle kwalokho nabashayeli balezi zimoto babuye bakhale ngokuthi abaholi yibo ababathethisayo bafune bashayele ngesivinini ngoba bahlale bejahile.UMchunu uhambele imindeni yabashonelwe eyobaduduza kanti uthembise ukuthi bazobahlinzeka nganoma yiluphi usizo abalundingayo nangolweRoad Accident Fund (RAF).Amalungiselelo omngcwabo alaba besifazane ababili abengakaphothulwa kodwa uMchunu uthe azomenyezelwa ngokuqhubeka kwesonto.Le ngozi akuyona eyokuqala njengoba eminyakeni embalwa edlule abaqaphi beSilo samabandla bashayisana nemoto yentatheli yakwa-SABC, uMnuz Tim Ncube owashonela endaweni yesehlakalo.Ngonyaka odlule ngaseBallito kwaba nengozi eyabulala iphini leMeya yasoThungulu, uMnuz Thulani Mashaba, kwalimala onogada ababili. Enye ingozi eyasusa umsindo kwaba eyabaqaphi bakaDkt Meshack Radebe lapho kwalimala khona amalungu omndeni ayezihambela ku-N2.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu uNkk Nomsa Dube-Ncube naye waba semsindweni ngenxa yesivinini esasidlulele ku-200km/h semoto ayehamba ngayo yamalambu aluhlaza ku-N3 eyaze yavinjwa amasosha namaphoyisa seyibikwe ngabantu ababekhala ngesivinini sayo.
title: Umsindo ngezimoto zamalambu aluhlaza nezingozi

text: UKHALA ezimathonsi owesifazane waseBhamshela oxoshwe ngumyeni emzini wabo ngemuva kokuthi inyanga imsole ngokuphinga nokukhuleliswa umngani womyeni. UNkk Zanele Mahlaba (36) usephenduke umabuya emendweni njengoba esebuyele kubo ngemuva kokuxoshwa ngumyeni wakhe emzini wabo eNewlands West eThekwini.Ufuna kugezeke igama lakhe njengoba ethi umyeni wadlala inyanga mbumbulu eyabaxabanisa.“Umyeni wami ungixoshe emzini wethu nengane yentombazane inamasonto amathathu izelwe. Ingane yethu isineminyaka emibili manje kayimazi uyise. Akafuni nokuyibona ngoba ukholwa wukuthi umbathiswa ibhantshi. Angimazi noma udungwe yimithi yale nyanga yini. Inkinga akafuni ukuthi siyokwenza iDNA,” kusho uNkk Mahlaba.Uthe okumphatha kabi ukuthi le ngane umyeni wakhe angayifuni ingane yabo yokuqala ephilayo.“Ngaphuphunyelwa izisu kwaze kwaba kathathu emshadweni. Sishade ngo-2009 ngoMashi kodwa ngo-Okthoba ngathola ukuthi uthandana nosisi asebenza naye owayekhona ngisho emshadweni wethu. Ngathola lokhu ngokupequlula ifoni yakhe ngoba ngimsola. Ngo-2011 ngathola ukuthi sebenengane ngemuva kokubona izithombe zengane ishuthe emotweni yomyeni wami. Ngehlisa umoya ngayamukela ingane ngoba ngihluleka ukukhulelwa,” kusho uNkk Mahlaba.Uthe ngo-2012 wachithekelwa izisu kwaze kwaba kabili esesithathu sachitheka ngo-2013.“Ngo-2014 ngiphinde ngakhulelwa, kwaqala izinkinga. Umyeni wami wayengafuni nokungibheka. Ngangizithsela ukuthi uyangaliswa, ngabekezela ngoba ngithi kuzolunga uma sekukhona ingane. Kunokuthi kulunge kuvele kwanyukela ngoba wangiyisa enyangeni yakhe oBonjeni kwaMhlabuyalingana eyathi ngiphinge nomngani wakhe ngaze ngakhulelwa,” kusho uNkk Mahlaba.Uthe wacela ukuba kwenziwe ulibofuzo, umyeni wakhe wabhoka ngolaka, ngisho ebizwa enkantolo akalubhadi.“Ngifuna kugezeke igama lami. Bengingafuni ukuthi size sidivose ngoba ngibona engathi udlale inyanga. Ngiyamkhumbula umyeni wami, wayengiphethe kahle. Namanje ingane uyondla ngenkantolo,” kusho uNkk Mahlaba.Ethintwa umyeni uMnuz Robert Mahlaba uthe izindaba zomuzi wakhe akathandi ukuzixoxa emaphepheni, unomndeni yena. Osolwa ngokukhulelisa uNkk Mahlaba uMnuz Mandla Dlamini uthe, uNkk Mahlaba wamtshela ngalezi zinsolo kodwa akazange azinake.“Wangitshela sekunezinkinga phakathi kwami nomngani wami. Kungakuhle uma bengenza iDNA, ingane ngeyakhe. Le nyanga kumele iyekiswe ukusebenza ngoba umsebenzi uyayihlula, ihlakaze umuzi womngani wami,” kusho uDlamini.
title: Ukhala ngenyanga oxoshwe wumyeni emsola ngokuphinga

text: UKUZITHENGELA imithi yomkhuhlane ekhemisi akuwelaphi umkhuhlane kodwa kulapha izimpawu zawo.Lokhu kushiwo yisikhulu esiphezulu senkampani yesikhwama sezempilo iProfmed, uMnuz Graham Anderson.Uthe iningi labantu uma ligula liya emakhemisi ngoba lithi alinayo imali yokuyobona udokotela.“Usokhemisi ubuza kuwe ukuthi yiziphi izimpawu onazo, akunike imithi yokwelapha zona. Uma lezi zimpawu ziqhubeka kumele ubonane nodokotela ozokuhlola,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi umkhuhlane ongalashwanga ungaba yingozi kakhulu kangangoba kwesinye isikhathi onawo angagcina efile.U-Anderson uthe abantu abaningi bajwayele ukuhlaselwa wumkhuhlane bangenwe nangamakhaza ngesikhathi sasebusika kodwa ngenxa yokuthi sekuyinto ejwayelekile abanye abantu abakukhuthaleli ukuwelapha uze uziphelele.Uthe okunye okuba yinkinga wukuthi iziguli kazikwazi ukwehlukanisa phakathi komkhuhlane nokungenwa ngamakhaza ngenxa yokuthi izimpawu zakhona zicishe zifane.Uthe kokubili kungena ngokuthintana nabantu abanako noma ukuphefumula amagciwane asemoyeni omuntu onakho.“Ngokujwayelekile umuntu ongenwe wumkhuhlane uyashesha ukuba nezimpawu, uma ungelashwanga kungenzeka ongenwe yiwo agcine engenwa ngezinye izifo eziyingozi kakhulu ezifana ne-pneumonia noma avuvukale inhliziyo kanti uma ungenwe ngamakhaza akusheshi ukuthi ube nezimpawu ezibonakalayo.“Izimpawu zakhona kuba wubuhlungu bomphimbo, kwesinye isikhathi kube ukuba namafinyila. Uma une-influenza lokhu okungenhla kungakuphatha kodwa uphinde uphathwe yikhanda elinkenkethayo nobuhlungu bamalungu okuyizinto ezingeke zikuphathe uma ungenwe ngamakhaza,” kusho * -Anderson.Uthe ukhona umjovo otholakala kodokotela nasemakhemisi wokugomela ukuthi ungangenwa wumkhuhlane kodwa awukho owokugomela ukuthi ungangenwa ngamakhaza.“Lokhu kusho ukuthi umuntu ogomele umkhuhlane kusengenzeka angenwe amakhaza. Umgomo womkhuhlane wangaleso sikhathi usuke wenzelwe ukuthi ukwazi ukuvikela izinhlobo zamagciwane asuke ekhona, ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi uzivikele emkhuhlaneni ngokuwugomela,” kusho yena.
title: Yingozi ukuzithengela umuthi womkhuhlane ekhemisi

text: MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENII QHAWE leNingizimu Afrika kubafana abaneminyaka engaphansi kwengu-23, uJody February ogile izimanga evimba amaphenathi amane okufake abeSA Under 23 kuma-Olympic aseRio de Janeiro, eBrazil ngonyaka ozayo, uze wakholwa ukuthi wenze okukhulu ngoba esethintwe u-Itumeleng Khune.UFebruary (19) ovimbela i-Ajax Cape Town ubengaziboni njengeqhawe njengoba ubethi ukuvimba amaphenathi kungumsebenzi wakhe. Kuthe angathola ucingo luvela kukaputeni weBafana Bafana futhi ongumdlali weKaizer Chiefs, uKhune amchaze njengeqhawe lakhe, kwayima ebona ukuthi wenze umsebenzi omkhulu ngesikhathi elakuleli lehlula iSenegal ngo 3-1 kumaphenathi emdlalweni we-Under 23 African Nations Cup ephele ngempelasonto inqotshwa yiNigeria ehlule i-Algeria ngo 2-1 kowamanqamu.Bese kuphele iminyaka engu-15 iqembu labesilisa lagcina ukudlala kuma-Olympic, okwenzeka eSydney, e-Australia ngo-2000.Ukunqoba kwelakuleli ngamaphenathi kaGift Motupa, Menzi Masuku noPhakamani Mahlambi okuphelezelwe ubuqhawe bukaFebruary, kusho ukuqopheka komlando omusha lapho kuzobe kungokokuqala ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika imelwe iqembu lesilisa nelabesifazane kule midlalo eqala ngo-Agasti 5 ka-2016 eBrazil.UFebruary uqale wabamba iphenathi ngomzuzu ka-78 waphinde wavimba amathathu sekukhahlelwa amaphenathi ngemuva kokuthi umdlalo wokuhlungela indawo yesithathu uphele ngo 0-0.Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngosizo lukaMatlomola Morake wezokuxhumana emaqenjni esizwe akuleli ngoMgqibelo ebusuku eseSenegal, uFebruary uthe: “Ukuthola ucingo oluvela kumuntu engimthatha njengobhuti omdala kimina ngoba ngiyafunda nsuku zonke uma ngimbuka edlala, kungenze ngabona ukuthi kusho ukuthi kukhona okukhulu engikwenzile. UKhune ungunozinti ovelele eNingizimu Afrika futhi ukusebenza naye ngingakujabulela. Ngiphinde ngajabula kakhulu futhi esengibongela kubuka wonke umuntu ku-instagram,” usho kanje uFebruary ezwakala ukuthi weneme.Kungenzeka iphupho likaFebruary lokusebenza noKhune lifezeke njengoba kunomthetho wokuthi amaqembu adlala kuma-Olympic angafaka abadlali abathathu abaneminyaka engaphezulu kwengu-23.Ukuzifaka kukaFebruary nozakwabo kuma-Olympic sekuqubule inkulumo-mpikiswano kubathandi bebhola ngokuthi yibaphi abadlali abaneminyaka engaphezulu kuka-23 okufanele bafakwe kuleli qembu lesizwe uma sekuyiwa eRio. Eqhulwini kuhleli igama lakhe uKhune, u-Andile Jali odlala kuKV Oostende, Bongani Zungu weMamelodi Sundowns no-Eric Mathoho. Ngesikhathi iSA Under 23 igcina ukuya kuma-Olympics u-Ephraim “Shakes” Mashaba wayehambe noDumisa Ngobe noBrian Baloyi bobabili abebeyingxenye yeBafana ngaleso sikhathi.Ephawula ngalokhu kunqoba u-Owen Da Gama oqeqesha iqembu uthe: “Ukuzimisela kwabafana kubonakele emdlalweni obunzima. Besibhekene nezwe eliyingozi kodwa sabambelela. Ngeke ngivume kunconywe mina ngalokhu kuhlabana kwezwe kepha abadlali okufanele bachonywe uphaphe lwegwalgwala ngoba kungukuzikhandla kwabo okusibeke kuleli zinga.”
title: Iqhawe le-Under 23 aliboni simanga

text: USHAQE abaningi umrepha we-Ambitiouz Entertainment, uGigi Lamayne evalelisa kubalandeli bakhe ngaphambi kokuzama ukuzibulala ngoMgqibelo.Lo mrepha ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uzame ukuzibulala kodwa wangaphumelela nokuholele ekutheni alaliswe esibhedlela lapho athola khona usizo.NgoMgqibelo ekhasini lakhe kutwitter uGigi ubhale kanje: ‘7 Julayi 1994 - 3 Novemba 2018’ - okuwumbhalo awulandelise ngomunye othe ‘The end’.Ephendula uNgqongqoshwe wezobuCiko namaSiko uMnuz Nathi Mthethwa, uGigi uthe usethola ukwelulekwa ngokomqondo (therapy).“Sonke singabantu, uma sizwa ubuhlungu noma singaphansi kwengcindezi kuyazwela. Ukwelulekwa engikutholayo manje sekwenze isimo sangcono kakhulu. Sengiqala ukubona ukuthi sekunesikhathi ngalimala,” kusho lo mrepha.Lo mrepha ngoMsombuluko kutwitter ufake isithombe eveza ukuthi ubelaliswe esibhedlela. Kulesi sithombe isandla sakhe besibhalwe ukuthi ‘ukhwantalala ngeke lunqoba’ - ebesihambisane nombhalo othi, “ngivukile, besingakashayi isikhathi…”Ngemuva kokuhlala e-ICU impelasonto yonke, ngokwephephandaba iThe Citizen, namhlanje ekuseni lo mrepha ubhale ku-WhatsApp waveza ukuthi uphila nesifo sokhwantalala.“Ngiphila nokhwantalala. Ngelinye ilanga ngizonazisa konke ngalokhu. Ngiyabonga kuwe ofunde lo mbhalo, ngiyabonga. Ngizame ukuqeda ngempilo yami ngenxa yengcindezi ngezinti ezenzea empilweni yami. Ngiyaxolisa ngokunizwisa ubuhlungu nangokunikhathaza, besengikhathele. Sekunesikhathi ngiphukile emoyeni.” kubhala yena.
title: Umrepha uzame ukuzibulala ngenxa yokhwantalala

text: USHUKWE amankwahla aze aqhuma owesilisa obesolwa wumakhelwane ngokuntshontsha imoto yomngani wakhe wesifazane okuthiwa ubesazitika ngocansi.UMnuz Sphelele Hlatshwayo waseMnambithi kuvela ukuthi wehlelwe yilesi sehlo ekade ehambe nabangani bakhe noNksz Lungile Mbonambi osebenza kumasipala ngenhloso yokuzijabulisa.Umthombo osondelene nalaba bobabili uveze ukuthi uNksz Mbonambi wafakelwa uyise wezingane imali, wase ekhipha ngayo umfowabo kayise wezingane nalaba bangani bakhe agcine esebasola ngokuntshontsha imoto yakhe.“Ngangihamba nabo sabuya ebusuku kakhulu kukhona nenye intombazane yesibili ewumngani wakhe. Uma sifika endlini wathi asihambe siyothenga utshwala nogwayi ngemoto yakhe. Sonke sasidakiwe sikhathele kodwa sasola ukuthi kukhona abafuna ukukwenza ngendlela ababesixosha ngayo.“Sama emnyango sacutha. Sabona sebenza ucansi bobathathu nale ntombazane esingayazi. Sahamba ngemoto sathi sesibuya savelelwa yingozi,” kusho lo mthombo.Ethintwa uHlatshwayo uvumile ukuthi unolwazi ngalolu daba wakhala ngezinhlungu emankwahleni.“Ngiyasaba manje ukukhuluma ngalolu daba, ngiyabona ukuthi angiphephile. Asizange siyintshontshe imoto yingakho sashayela ucingo nomphathi wethu sivelelwa ingozi."Ngiyafisa lo sisi ayilungise le nto ngoba sithathwe amaphoyisa sesisolwa ngokuntshontsha imoto ekubeni besiyibolekiwe,” kusho uHlatshwayo.Ngaphandle kwakhe kunowesilisa okuthiwa usinde eklajwa ngebhodlela nguNksz Mbonambi.Ethintwa uNksz Mbonambi uvumile ukuthi wayekhona kodwa wathi laba bazithathela izikhiye zemoto ngokungemthetho.“Ikhona into ekanjalo, omakhelwane bami. Bayiboleka imoto nganqaba, kanti ngizozela ngilale, bantshontsha izikhiye.“Ngamanga ukuthi ngangenza ucansi. Ngishilo ngathi abeze sixoxe. Vele ngimgwazile ngoba uyena oqale waphakamisa ibhodlela ngamphuca ngamgwaza,” kusho uNksz Mbonambi.Mayelana noshukwe amankwahla, lo wesifazane uthe akanalwazi lwalokho. Abalimele bathi bawavulile amacala emaphoyiseni.
title: Uqhunyiswe amankwahla esolwa ngokweba imoto

text: USAZOHLALA esitokisini uNobhala we-EFF esifundeni Ugu, uMnuz Mpume Mbono, owaboshelwa icala lokushaya.Bekulindeleke ukuthi uMbono afake isicelo sebheyili eNkantolo yeMantshi eRamsgate izolo, kepha icala lakhe liphinde lahlehla.Lihlehlele uJanuwari 21.UMbono waboshwa kanye nabanye abasolwa abathathu ngecala lokushaya elenzeka olwandle eMargate.Lesi gameko senzeka ngoDisemba 27 kanti laba abanye abasolwa badedelwa ngesexwayiso babe sebeyalelwa ukuthi bavele enkantolo ngoJanuwari 23.Amalungu e-EFF abebhikisha ngaphandle kwenkantolo efuna ukuthi uMbono adedelwe ngebheyili.La malungu athi uMbono umsulwa emacaleni abekwa wona njengoba bethi uyena owahlaselwa kuqala wabe esephindisela ngoba ezivikela.La malungu athe azophinde abuye uma esephinda esevela enkantolo uMbono, ezomeseka.
title: Usazobhadla esitokisini owe-EFF

text: UMAKADEBONA kwezokulingisa uLinda Sebezo  uthi wondliwa ngunina ngemali yempesheni emuva kokuphoxwa nguNgqongqoshe wezeMidlalo, ezobuCiko namaSiko, uNathi Mthethwa.ULinda (55), olingisa indawo kaLillian Nyandeni kwiSibaya aphinde adlale ekaMaki Magwaza kwiLockdown kwiMzansi Magic, ukhulume ngosizi lwakhe kwiTwitter.“Ngiphoxwe nguNgqongqoshe wezobuCiko namaSiko. Amaciko ayingxenye yabantu akhahlamezwe ukuvalwa thaqa kwezwe, kodwa sitshelwa ukuthi akufanele sithole imali yesibonelelo. Kufanele siyephi? Kumele sidleni?“Silindeleke ukuba sondle imindeni ngemali engekho? Singabakhokhi bentela, sikhokha u-25% wentela kodwa uhulumeni akakwazi ukusisiza.”Uthe bona njengamaciko angaqashiwe ngokugcwele.“Angiholi uma ngingasebenzanga. Sisathola izingcingo zemali yesikole edinga ukukhokhelwa. Kufanele ngiphile ngempesheni kamama ukuze kudliwe ekhaya. Iqiniso yilelo.”Uthe kuze kube yimanje mathathu amaciko asezibulele ngenxa yokhwantalala lokucabanga kakhulu ngokuthi ikati lizoxoshwa ngani eziko.ULINDA Sebezo uthi usephila ngemali yempesheni kanina njengoba encishwe nguhulumeni imali yoxhaso lwamaciko“Uthini uNathi Mthethwa? Kufanele silahlekelwe ngeminye imiphefumulo ukuze avuke emaqandeni?”Uthi ulale inhliziyo yakhe iqaqamba ngenxa yobuhlungu bokwenzelwa phansi “nguhulumeni wethu. Senzeni engaka size siphathwe kanje,” kuphetha uLinda oseneminyaka engu-40 eyibambile kule ndima. Leli ciko laqala ukulingisa emidlalweni yeshashalazi kaGibson Kente ngeminyaka yo-1980.Okhulumela ungqongqoshe, uMasechaba Khumalo, uthe uMthethwa ubehlangene namaciko ngoLwesithathu mayelana negxathu eliya phambili.“Ngesikhathi etshelwa yithimba labahlungi ukuthi iningi labantu ebebefake izicelo aliphumelelanga ngenxa yezizathu ezahlukene, okukhona kuzo ukuduka nokungagcwaliswa ngokuphelele kwamafomu, ungqongqoshe ube esememezela ukuthi amaciko azonikezwa ithuba lokudlulisela phambili izicelo ngesikhathi ekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba ngoMsombuluko.“Labo abafake izicelo ngosuku lokugcina nabo basengaqhubeka bafake izicelo ngokuzithumela kule email: [email protected]”Uqhube wathi ngoLwesithathu ungqongqoshe uhlangane nezinhlangano ezimele amaciko namasiko kuzwelonke kwavunyelwana ukuthi kusizwe amaciko okwachithwa izicelo zawo, ukuze akwazi ukugcwalisa ngendlela amafomu, kubuye kuthanjiswe eminye imithetho kwabafaka izicelo.“Yize kunemithetho okumele ilandelwe kodwa ungqongqoshe uyezwelana namaciko akhahlamezekile ngalesi sikhathi futhi wenza konke okusemandleni ukutakula labo abadinga usizo ,” kusho uMasechaba.
title: Ngondliwa yimpesheni kamama, kukhala uLinda

text: UPHIKO lwamaphoyisa ezinja lushaqe izibhamu ebezigcinwe komunye umuzi kwa-Q eMlaza, ngoMsombuluko.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa athola ulwazi ngesigameko sokubulala esasenzeke ngeSonto lapho kusakazwa khona izindaba zezigameko zobugebengu ezenzekile ngaphakathi emaphoyiseni. Ngaleso sikhathi kuthiwa umsolwa kulesi sigameko wayehamba ngezinyawo eyodlula esiteshini esingumahamba nendlawane esikwa-U.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Ntaal, uLt Col Thulani Zwane, uthe uphiko lwamaphoyisa ezinja lwelamele umsolwa esehamba nabanye abathathu. Laba basolwa bathe uma bebona amaphoyisa baqala badubula. Abathathu uthe babaleka becasha ngezindlu, oyedwa oneminyaka ewu-48 obekunguyena obefuneka wadubuleka emlenzeni ngesikhathi amaphoyisa edudulana ngenganono nabasolwa.“Lo msolwa kuthe uma eseshwa kwatholakala i-9mm Norinco nezinhlamvu kuye. Umsolwa uholele amaphoyisa komunye umuzi okwa-Q lapho kutholakale khona ezinye izibhamu ezincane nezinkulu kanye nezinhlamvu. Kuyo le ndlu kubuye kwaboshwa nomunye umsolwa oneminyaka ewu-58 otholakale nesibhamu nezinhlamvu ezingekho emthethweni,” kusho uLt Zwane.Bobabili abasolwa uthe bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi yakule ndawo ngamacala ababekwe wona ngoLwesibili.
title: Amaphoyisa ashaqe izibhamu emzini oseMlaza

text: NGALESI sikhathi ngonyaka ozayo iNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2019 izobe isiwumlando, sekulindwe eminye iminyaka emine ukuze kuphinde kuzanywe futhi.Uma i-Australia ingaphumelelanga ukuvikela isicoco sayo e-England, kuzobe sekunompetha omusha.Nakulokhu, abathandi bamaProteas bazoya kulo mqhudelwano benethemba lokuthi leli qembu lizoliqeda ishobolo leminyaka ewu-27 lobuhlungu bokweqiwa yilesi sicoco esimqoka kakhulu kwikhilikithi yomhlaba.
