Umbuzo omkhulu uthi kungenzeka ngempela yini ukuthi amaProteas alingcwabe leli gama elingelihle lamaChockers?Wenzenjani * -Ottis Gibson oseqede unyaka nangaphezulu eqeqesha?Njengamanje amaProteas akleliswe endaweni yesine emidlalweni yosuku olulodwa kodwa iqiniso ukuthi kunzima ukuwabona eguqula isimo, afike e-England aqhobozele kwasani okubekwe phambi kwawo.Phakathi kwamazwe abhekwe ukuba athwalise kanzima uGibson nezakhe singabala kuwona i-England, India, Australia, New Zealand nePakistan.Kusukela ethathe izintambo kumaProteas, uGibson usebhekane nezinkinga eziningi njengokushiya kuka-AB de Villiers okuthuse abaningi ngoba bekungalindelekile. Emidlalweni ewu-14 yokuqala edlalwe uGibson njengomqeqeshi, ushaywe kweyisikhombisa wanqoba eyisibalo esifanayo.Kuthe kusazanywa ukuvala isikhala sikaDe Villiers kwashiya uMorne Morkel. Lokhu kusho ukuthi uGibson olandelwe ukudla isicoco somhlaba umelwe ukuzivala lezi zikhala ngaphambi kokuqala kweNdebe yoMhlaba e-England ngoMeyi wonyaka ozayo. Abadlali abafana noLungi Ngidi no-Aiden Makram bazivezile kodwa umbuzo omkhulu uthi isipiliyoni ngeke yini sidingeke lapha?Uma eziphendulela uGibson, uthi mhlawumbe ukuya kwabadlali abangalwazi usizi lwamaProteas kwiNdebe yoMhlaba kungaba yisona isisombululo.Isize kakhulu iMzansi Super League (MSL):Kube yisibusiso kuGibson ukuqala komqhudelwano osanda kusongwa owaziwa ngeleMzansi Super League ogcine udliwa yiJosi Stars. Kulo mqhudelwano kuvele amagama amaningi okufanele ngabe uwabhale phansi uGibson. Phakathi kwala magama kuvele uLutho Sipamla, Ryan Rickelton, Nono Pongolo, Janneman Malan, Bjorn Fortuin no-Anrich Nortje ukukha nje phezulu.Okumele kwenziwe amaProteas ngaphambi kukaMeyi (iNdebe yoMhlaba)Ayamfimfa wona amathuba amaProteas uma kungukuthi konke okufanele kwenzeke ngeke kwenzeke. Okokuqala ukuthi bakhulume kahle noDe Villiers, bamncenge ukuthi abuye. Yebo, omunye uzothi akufanele kwenzeke kodwa indlela amaProteas ayinqobe ngayo imidlalo engekho kusobala ukuthi sisesikhulu isikhala sakhe. Akuyona into okumele ijatshulelwe kangako ukuthi emdlalweni wosuku olulodwa wokugcina amaProteas ashaye iSri Lanka. IWest Indies, Afghanistan neZimbabwe yiwona kuphela amaqembu esizwe akleliswe ngaphezulu kweSri Lanka.Kube unyaka omuhle kunayo yonke kwiTestU-2018 uyohlale ukhunjulwa ngokuthi iwona nyaka amaProteas enze kahle kunayo yonke uma kudlalwa ngebhola elibomvu (Test). Kulo nyaka ezikaGibson ziqhobozele i-India ekleliswe yahlala phezulu kanti ziphumelele nokubhabhadisa i-Australia okuyinto ebese izehlule amahlandla ayisishiyagalombili zizama.Yomibili le midlalo iqinise idolo kwazise amaProteas adlale le, okuthiwa inenkosi phakathi, ikhilikithi. Kuqale ngokuthi i-India iyeke ithuba (sekucacile ukuthi iwinile) ngenxa yokuxinwa amaProteas kwalandela ngokuthi i-Australia iqale ngokunqoba kodwa ishaywe kweminye yonke elandelile. Lo mdlalo uyohlale ukhunjulwa ngokuganga kwabadlali base-Australia, behlikihla ibhola ngo-sandpaper.Imidlalo yokuqala eyisikhombisa iyohlale njalo ikhumbuleka kwabayibuka ngokunjalo nakulaba abayidlala kwazise bekungeyokugcina kaDe Villiers noMorkel.Babanjwe bekhuhla ibhola ngo-sandpaper abe-Australia!Ngaphambi kokuthi uDavid Warner nozakwabo abavula naye uCameron Bancroft nobengukaputeni, uSteve Smith, babanjwe baphinde batholakala benecala lokukhuhla ibhola ngo-sandpaper. Kuqale kwasaphazeka izithombe ze-video eKingsmead, eThekwini lapho uWarner ebefuna ukushaya uQuinton de Kock. Kuwona lo mdlalo uKagiso Rabada uze wadinga ukuxolelwa yiCSA ngodaba lokuncwintana kwakhe ngehlombe noSmith. NgokukaSmith uRabada obejabulela ukumkhipha umgudlule kabuhlungu kodwa kuthe uma sekubhekwa kahle kwacaca ukuthi bancwintane kancane. Kuze kube yimanje uBancroft, Warner noSmith basadingisiwe eqenjini lesizwe lase-Australia. Kusele uchungechunge lwemidlalo yeTest yokuvala unyaka nePakistan. Iqala ngoDisemba 26.Emiqhudelwaneni yasekhaya ngaphandle kweMSLI-Hollywoodbets Dolphins neWarriors kuphoqeleke ukuthi bacazelane ngokubamba isicoco seMomentum One Day Cup kwazise umdlalo awubanga khona ngenxa yesimo sezulu ngoFebhuwari. Isaqhubeka eye-4 Day Franchise Series.
title: U-2019 uzocacisa ngozohlwitha isicoco

text: UGWETSHWE iminyaka engu-12 ebhadla ejele owayengumsebenzi wakwaFidelity owayeseqenjini lezigelekeqe elaphanga uR12 million eVryheid.INkantolo eNkulu yaseMadadeni igwebe uMbuyiseni Mthembu (37) ngoMsombuluko.NgoSepthemba 2017, uMthembu nayehamba nabo batheleka endaweni yakwaFedility ngemuva kwehora lesishiyagalolunye.Kuthiwa bafike bakhomba onogada ngezibhamu, babaphoqa ukuthi babatshengise izikhiye zalapho kuhlala khona imali. Ngenkathi sebezitholile bavula bayithatha base bebaleka nemali enguR12 million.Icala lokuphanga lavulwa esiteshini samaphoyisa eVryheid. Idokodo lecala labe selidluliselwa koKlebe ophikweni oluphenya ngamacala abucayi.UCaptain Simphiwe Mhlongo woKlebe uthe abasolwa abahlanu okunguPhakamani Hadebe (32), Mnikeni Khohlwezakhe Majozi (59), Thembokwakhe Robert Nzama (41), Zakhele Ernesty Xulu (32) noMthembu babe sebeboshwa.“OKlebe bakwazi ukuthola imali enguR700 000 ngenkathi bebopha abasolwa,” kusho uMhlongo.Uthe abasolwa ababili okunguMajozi noNzama babaleka ngemuva kokuphuma ngebheyili kaR30 000. “Kwakhishwa incwadi egunyaza ukuthi beboshwe. Okwamanje abakatholakali kodwa amaphoyisa aphansi phezulu ayabathungatha,” kusho uMhlongo.
title: Ugwetshwe iminyaka ewu-12 ophange R12 million

text: UMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs, uGavin Hunt, uzwakala esephelelwe ngamaqhinga okulungisa udonga lwasemuva oluvuzisa amagoli kule sizini.IChiefs iphinde yajabhisa abalandeli bayo ngoMgqibelo koweDStv Premiership idlala ngokulingana ngo 2-2 neBloemfontein Celtic ekubeni ibikade isihamba phambili ngo 2-0. Ukungenelwa ngamagoli kweChiefs, ikakhulukazi ngenxa yamaphutha, yisifo esihlasele leli qembu kusukela efika uHunt ekuqaleni kwesizini. Ubelokhu ekhala ngaso ethi uyaselapha. Maphakathi nesonto eledlule, iChiefs ihlulwe ngo 1-0 emuva kwephutha elenziwe ngu-Erick Mathoho umdlalo usuyophela. Amakhosi, asendaweni yesishiyagalolunye kwi-log yePremiership, asengenelwe ngamagoli angu-30 emidlalweni engu-25."Sidlale kahle. Sidlale kahle futhi nangoLwesithathu sihlulwa ngo 1-0. Sidlale kahle nanamuhla kodwa kwavuka isifo sethu esidala sokuhluleka ukumaka. Ngihlale ngithi ngeke uwine lutho ngaphandle kokuvala emuva. Ukumaka kuqala phambili," kusho uHunt."Sihlaselwe yishwa isizini yonke. Senze izinguquko eziphoqelekile esiwombeni sokuqala nesesibili. Ebholeni kwesinye  isikhathi lokho kuyakuphazamisa. Sakhe amathuba anele ukuwina umdlalo. Kodwa awukwazi ukushaya amagoli amabili ekuhambeni  kodwa udlale ngokulingana. Kufanele wenze kangcono emuva."Kusasa, iChiefs izovakashela iTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) emdlalweni wePremiership ePeter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane, ngo-5 ntambama. Akubuzwa ukuthi kulo mdlalo uHunt uzolindela okuhlukile kubadlali bakhe. Bazobhekana neTTM elengela engozini yezembe ngasemsileni we-log. Ukuwina kweChippa United nokuhlulwa yiBlack Leopards, kuyishovele endaweni ka-15 iTTM.UHunt uthe akakhali ngezinga lokuzinikela kwabadlali."Sidlala ibhola elihle. Ngeneme ngabadlali, banginika konke. Uma benganginiki konke lokho kungasho inkinga. Banginika konke, masonto wonke. Bayazana, basebenza kanzima. Yilokho okubaluleke kakhulu ebholeni," kusho uHunt.
title: UHunt uzwakala ephelelwe amaqhinga okuvala emuva

text: BANGU-62 000 abahola impesheni KwaZulu-Natal okuthiwa abakawenzi amakhadi amasha njengoba sekuzonqanyulwa ukuwasebenzisa maduze.Lokhu kushiwo uMnuz Mbizeni Mdlalose okhulumela abakwaSouth Africa Social Security Agency (Sassa) esifundazweni, onxuse ukuthi njengoba sekuqalile ukuholela abantu basale sebeshaya namakhadi amasha.Phezu kokuba kuvalwa ukuholela impesheni ngoDisemba 14 njengoba kuqale ngoLwesithathu, uMdlalose uthe abahola emabhange nasePosini abaphoqiwe ukukhipha imali ngaphambi kwalolu suku lokuvala.Ukuholela ngalesi sikhathi kwenzelwa ukunqanda isiphithiphithi sikaDisemba njengaminyaka yonke. AbakwaSassa baxwayise ngokuthi umholo olandelayo uyoze ube ngoJanuwari, okusho ukuthi kumele bazicabangele.“Siqalile ukuholela ezikhungweni kodwa imali esekhadini ngeke iye ndawo ngisho sekudlule uDisemba 14. Okusiphatha kabi yilesi sibalo sabantu abasasebenzisa amakhadi amadala ngoba uma bengawenzi amasha bazoba nenkinga ngempela ngoJanuwari.“Kumele kushaye uDisemba 10 sebewashintshile ngoba uma kungenjalo ngeke bahole nhlobo ngoJanuwari. Akusagcwali ePosini futhi kuyashesha nokwenza ikhadi,” echaza.Mayelana nokuvalwa kokuhola ngoDisemba 14, uthe kushiwo kulabo abayithola ezikhungweni kuphela. Uthe ngoJanuwari konke kuzobuyela esimeni esijwayelekile, ukuhola kuzoqala ngomhlaka 1.UMdlalose unxusa abantu ukuthi bavuselele amakhadi nje, kukhona abakhalayo ngokuqolwa izimali zabo ezikhishwa emakhadini bengazi. Isolezwe selibike izikhawu ezimbili ngabakhishelwa imali emakhadini, ekhishwa kwenye indawo.UNksz Nobuhle Njapha okhulumela abePosini eKZN uthe ukuholela kuqalile futhi kuhamba kahle.Ukuqinisekisile ukuthi abahola ePosini imali bangayikhipha noma yinini ngisho sekudlule umnqamulajuqu wokuholela.Kuthiwa babalelwa ku-500 000 kulo lonke elakuleli abangakawashayi amakhadi amasha okuhola.OyiNational Advocacy Manager yeBlack Sash uMnuz Hoodah Abrahams-Fayker ugcizelele ukuthi abantu bawashintshe amakhadi okuhola ukuze bangabi nenkinga ngoJanuwari.
title: I-Sassa  inxusa kushintshwe amakhadi

text: IMPILO yabantu baseMtshezi isizoba ngcono ngemuva kokuvulwa ngokusemthethweni kwesikhungo sikahulumeni esineminyango eminingi ebalulekile esibize uR16 million.Lesi sikhungo esaziwa ngamaHlubi Community Services Centre esizoba namahhovisi oMnyango wezaseKhaya, awezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, iPosi nawomkhandlu wenkosi sithulwe ngokusemthethweni ngoLwesibili nguNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube.Ukwethulwa kwaso kuzokwenza ukuthi umphakathi waseBhekuzulu nezinye izindawo ezingomakhelwane ungabe usahamba amabanga amade uma ufuna izidingo.Phambilini abantu baseBhekuzulu nezindawo ezingomakhelwane bekumele baye eLadysmith noma e-Estcourt uma befuna izidingo.“Sizibophezele ekushintsheni impilo yabantu basoThukela abahlala ezindaweni zasemakhaya. Kumanje intsha ehlala lapha yenza izifundo zekhompyutha esikhungweni sezobuchwepheshe esikhona kulesi sikhungo sethu, lokhu kuzoyisiza intsha yethu ukuthi ikwazi ukumelana nesimo semisebenzi yamanje edinga ulwazi olunzulu kwezobuchwepheshe,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.Isakhamuzi saseBhekuzulu, uMnuz Sabelo Buthelezi (26), sithe ukuvulwa kwalesi sikhungo kuzowusiza kakhulu umphakathi ngezinto eziningi ngoba ngeke usahamba amabanga amade uma ufuna izidingo.“Ukuvulwa kwalesi sikhungo kuzongisiza kakhulu nami njengomuntu omusha njengoba sengizenzela izifundo zekhompyutha,” kusho uButhelezi.Ithula inkulumo yayo inkosi yesizwe samaHlubi eMtshezi, uJobe Radebe, ibonge uNkk Dube-Ncube ngokuzibophezela kukahulumeni wakhe ekuletheni izidingo kubantu.Umnyango kaNkk Dube-Ncube sewakhe izikhungo ezintathu zalolu hlobo ngaphansi kwesifunda uThukela njengoba sikhona Okhahlamba, eKuvukeni naseMtshezi.
title: Kuvulwe isikhungo esizobakhipha osizini eMtshezi

text: UMPHATHI weDurban University of Technology, uSolwazi Thandwa Mthembu, uphume ngesamagundane izolo ehholo obekukade kunenkonzo yesikhumbuzo sikaMlungisi Madonsela kulo ngesikhathi ehhewulwa ngamalungu omkhandlu omele abafundi i-EFFSC.USolwazi Mthembu bekulindeleke ukuthi ethule inkulumo yokuhlonipha uMlungisi kubantu abebehambele inkonzo yesikhumuzo wagcina engakwazanga.Amalungu e-EFFSC aqale ukuhhewula umphati wohlelo, uMnuz Zwakele Ngubane, ngesikhathi ememezela ukuthi uSolwazi Mthembu uzohlonipha uMlungisi ngenkulumo. Abe eseqala ukucula amaculo omzabalazo.Kodwa ilungu le-EFF, uMnuz Komisa Dlamini, linxuse ukuthi amalungu athule ukuze kuqhubeke uhlelo.Kuphoqeleka ukuthi uSolwazi Mthembu akhulume ekugcineni ngoba amalungu e-EFFSC ebengafuni nokuyizwa eyakhe.Kuthe lapho esengenile esiteji ukuzoqala inkulumo yakhe, kwavumbuka abesifazane abebegqoke umfaniswano we-EFF bama phambi kwesiteji bephethe izingqwembe ezinemibhalo ethi: Lala ngoxolo Mlu.Amalungu eEFFSC avele acula amaculo omzabalazo, amanye elokhu emhhewula emtshela ukuthi akadilike esiteji.Kuphoqeleke ukuthi uSolwazi Mthembu aphume eseqashwe wonogada engakayithuli nenkulumo yakhe.
title: Izitshudeni ziphazimise inkulumo yomphathi

text: INYUNYANA yabasebenzi icele abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi bayeke ukuthenga imikhiqizo yakwaClover ngoba le nkampani ayifuni ukunyusela abasebenzi amaholo ngo-16%.Izolo abasebenzi bakwaClover ezweni lonke baqale isiteleka okungaziwa ukuthi sizophela nini ngoba befuna amaholo nokuthi ozakwabo abayitoho baqashwe ngokugcwele.UMnuz Charles Phahla, oyiPhini likaNobhala Jikelele weGeneral Industries Workers Union SA (Giwusa), uthe iClover ijezisa abasebenzi ngokuqubuka kweCovid-19 ezweni.“Ukuqubuka kweCovid-19 kunike iClover ihawu lokuzivikela ngoba abanikazi bale nkampani abafuni ukunyusela abasebenzi amaholo. Bavele bathi abafuni ukuxoxa nathi saze sayofaka udaba lwethu kwiCommission for Conciliation, Mediation and Arbitration (CCMA). Bafike lapho bathi bazokwazi ukunyusa amaholo ngo-3%, sawunqaba,” kusho uPhahla.Uthe ngeke abasebenzi bamukele ukunyuselwa iholo ngamakinati ngoba ngoMsombuluko ebusuku iClover ibuye yabeka etafuleni u-5% nawo iGiwusa ewunqabile.“Sicela abantu bayeke ukuthenga imikhiqizo yakwaClover kuze kube le nkampani inyusela abasebenzi umholo ngo-16%. Sifuna kuqashwe ngokugcwele nabasebenzi osekuphele iminyaka beyitoho. Asazi kungani bengafuni ukunyusa imali ngoba abasebenzi abakaze bahlale emakhaya ngisho nangesikhathi somvalelandlini bebesebenza. Ngeke sibuyele emsebenzini esikufunayo kungakazwakali,” kusho uPhahla.UMnuz Johann Vorster oyisikhulu esiphezulu kwaClover Proprietary Limited, uthe isiteleka siqale emva kokuthi izingxoxo phakathi kwabo nabasebenzi zifinyelele kwangqingetshe.Uthe babeke u-5% wokunyusa amaholo kusukela ngoJulayi 1 kodwa abasebenzi bawuchitha.“Sinazo izinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi isiteleka kasibi nomthelela omkhulu emkhiqizweni wethu. Sinethemba lokuthi sizotholakala isixazululo. UClover kade waqala ukudonsa kanzima ngoba izindleko zinyuka njalo kanti nabathengi abasakhithizi njengakuqala ngenxa yesimo esibi somnotho nokuphela kwemisebenzi. Yize besisebenza nangesikhathi somvalelandlini kodwa isimo besinzima nezindleko zebhizinisi zinkulu. Siyabachazela abasebenzi ngesimo esibhekene naso, sidinga isixazululo esizovuna zonke izinhlaka,” kusho uVorster esitatimendeni.
title: Bafuna ukunyuselwa amaholo  abasebenza kwaClover

text: Willem PhungulaKUSOLWA ukuthi umkhuba usekhaya, ngemva kokubulawa kwesishoshovu ebesiphikisana nokususwa kwabantu, ukuze kungene imayini yamalahle eMtubatuba.UNkk Fikile Ntshangase (60) ongumholi weNFP wesifunda uMkhanyakude, uthelwe phansi ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu waphelela khona lapho ebusuku ngoLwesine.Ubephuma emhlanganweni weqembu wokukhankasela ukhetho lokuchibiyela kuwadi 10 oluzoba ngesonto elizayo.Umthombo obusondelene kakhulu nomufi uthe awungabazi ukuthi ukubulawa kwakhe akuhlangene nezepolitiki kodwa ubulawelwe ukulwa nokufakwa kwemayini ezomba amalahle endaweni yangakubo.Lo mthombo ocele ukuba ungadalulwa uthe umufi udayiswe ngamalungu ekomiti elilwa nokususwa kwabantu endaweni, wathi bese kuvele kunezinsolo zokuthi asegwazelwe awasayingeni eyokulwa nokususwa kwabantu.“Yinto esobala le. Uma amaphoyisa aKwaMsane ezokwenza umsebenzi wawo ngendlela, abakhi betulo bangatholakala kalula. Umkhuba usekhaya ngokubulawa kukaNkk Ntshangase. Ngicela uma ubhala ungaxovi izinto ngoba le nto ayihlangene nepolitiki. Umufi udayiswe abebehamba naye,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi umufi ubesehlule bemncenga bethi bazomakhela umuzi kanokusho, endaweni ezokhethwa nguye kodwa wathi cha, yena uthunywe abantu ukuthi abamele ngakho-ke ngeke akwazi ukubadayisa.UNobhala-jikelele weNFP uMnuz Canaan Mdletshe, uthe iqembu lishaqeke kakhulu ngokubulawa ngesihluku esingaka somholi wabo, ikakhulukazi ongowesifazane.Uthe abafuni ukuhlawumbisela ngokubulawa kwakhe, bafisa ukudedela amaphoyisa aphenye kutholakale ababulali.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kukhona icala lokubulala eliphenywa ngamaphoyisa aKwaMasane, emva kokuba owesifazane oneminyaka engu-60, edutshulwe wabulawa.
title: OweNFP ‘ufele ukulwa nokususwa kwabantu’

text:
LIBOBONGA abaphansi ilungu lomphakathi elizibonele ngawalo kudutshulwa itekisi ebelithwele abashayeli bamatekisi eColenso, KwaZulu-Natal ngoMgqibelo. Kudutshulwe kwabulawa abashayeli abawu-11 behlaselwa ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu ngabantu okuthiwa bebelele unyendle emahlathini aseduzane nomgwaqo uR74 obekuhamba kuwo leli tekisi. Umama wasendaweni uthi ubevika izinhlamvu nezingane zakhe ebezindiza igceke lonke ngezikhathi zehora lesithupha ntambamama.“Ngiphuzile ukuqala ukupheka ngoba bekuyiSabatha. Ngithe ngisabeka amabhodwe kusanda kushaya u-6 ntamabama, ngezwa ngomsindo obuqhuma kungathi uthayela. Ngithuke ngafa ngihlangana nezinhlamvu ngaphandle ebezindiza igceke lonke,” kusho owesifazane eligodliwe igama lakhe ukumvikela.Uthe ubezitshela ukuthi kuhlaselwa umuzi wakhe. Uthi umemezile ezincengela ukuthi bangamubulali nezingane zakhe.“Ngibuyele endlini saqoqana nezingane ngimemeza ngincenga abadubulayo ukuthi bangasibulali. Bengilokhu ngithi ningasibulali zingane zami.”Elinye ilungu lomndeni nalo elingafunanga ukudalulwa lithe alisakhumbuli nokuthi ziyeke nini ukukhala izibhamu ngendlela ebebephithene ngayo.FUNDA: 
Zibalelwa ku-250 izinhlamvu okudutshulwe ngazo abashayeli“Ngikhumbula nje ngifonelwa umfana wami engibuza ukuthi kwenzekani, ngangazi ukuthi ngimphendule ngithini ngoba nami bengingazi ngaleso sikhathi ukuthi kwenzekani,” kuchaza ilungu lomphakathi.UKhomishana wamaphoyisa kuzwelonke uGeneral Khehla Sitole usigxekile lesi sehlakalo.Uthe amaphoyisa ophiko okukhona kuwo awobugebengu obuhleliwe, oKlebe, nabaseshi ubanika amahora angu-72, ukuzama ukubopha abasolwa abathinteka kulesi sigameko.Obambe njengoNdunankulu esifundazweni, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, naye usigxekile lesi sigameko. Uthe ukubulawa kwabantu kusho ukuthi kunemindeni engasenabo abantu abayondlayo.
title: Ubonga abaphansi osinde kudutshulwa abamatekisi

text: UBEKE impilo yakhe engozini evikela umndeni wakhe owesifazane oneminyakaengu-49 waKwaBester eThekwini, elwa nezigebengu ezigqekeze emzini wakhe zifuna ukuntshontsha.Owesifazane igama lakhe esingeke silidalule ukuvikela yena nomndeni wakhe, ngoLwesithathu ngabo-1 ekuseni uhlaselwe izigebengu ezimbili ebezihlome ngesibhamu.Kuthiwa abasolwa ababili bangene ngophahla kwakhe.Kuthe uma bengena, owesifazane obenezingane zakhe nabazukulu belele wavuka wazibambela kubasolwa.Kuthiwa ubambane nezigebengu washo ukuziqeda ngesibhaxu, esinye saphuma sabaleka.Ngesikhathi esisele sesimklinya ukhalile, indodakazi yakhe eneminyaka engu-24 yaphuma ekamelweni izolekelela unina.Isolezwe likhulume nendodakazi ethe iyasola ukuthi izigebengu zibahlasele ngoba zazi ukuthi bangabesifazane futhi bahlala bodwa.“Besiyisithupha endlini, singabesifazane kukhona nengane enezinyanga ezintathu. Kuthe uma sizwa izigebengu zingena ngophala umama wazama ukusivikela ngokulwa nazo. Esinye sibalekile. Lesi esinye sibe sesiklinya umama. Ngizwe esekhala ethi kungcono amdubulele endlini. Lawo mazwi angikhiphe ekameleni, ngayosiza umama. Sibe sesilekelelana silwa nesigebengu, sasinqoba. Sabe sesicela usizo,” kusho indodakazi.Ithe ngesikhathi bembula umsolwa ubuso babonile ukuthi umfana wasendaweni, ohlala ngezansi komgwaqo wabo.“Siyasaba kakhulu emuva kwalesi sigameko ngoba abantu abasihlasele bayasazi. Bayazi ukuthi sihlala sodwa njengoba eboshiwe nje asazi ukuthi kuzokwenzekani.”Okhulumela amaphoyisa uColonel Thembeka Mbele, usiqinisekisile lesi sehlo wathi oboshiwe uzovela enkantolo maduze ngecala lokugqekeza.“Namhlanje (ngoLwesithathu), ngo-1 ekuseni kungene abasolwa ababili komunye umuzi KwaBester. Kuthiwa bawele efenisheni, kwaba nomsindo ovuse amalungu omndeni. Omunye ubanjiwe, omunye wabaleka nesibhamu.“Obanjiwe ushaywe umphakathi. Amaphoyisa aseNtuzuma abiziwe, athatha umsolwa amyisa esibhedlela. Uqashwe amaphoyisa khona. Kuvulwe icala lokugqekeza nelokweba,” kusho uMbele.Omunye umsolwa usathungathwa.
title: Umama uvikele umndeni wakhe elwa nezigebengu

text: UMENGAMELI wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa uthi awuphele umkhuba wokuthi abantu bawuhlabe inhlali uma behlukunyezwa yizithandwa zabo ukuze kuliwe ngempumelelo nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane.URamaphosa usho lokhu kulandela ukuthi esontweni elilodwa kubulawe abesifazane abasebancane okusolwa ukuthi babulawe abebethandana nabo.Bekungakapholi maseko kubulawe owesifazane waseGoli uTshegofatso Pule obenezinyanga eziyisishiyagololunye ekhulelwe esehlakalweni okusolwa kuso abathendana naye njengoba wagcina ukubonakala ekade ethe uyovakashela yena.Izolo abantu baseDobsonville eSoweto, bethuke kwaphela nasozwaneni bezithela phezu kwesidumbu sowesifazane obeneminyaka ewu-28 ebulewe walahlwa ngaphansi kwesihlahla. Kusolwa ukuthi ubulawe kwenye indawo wase ezolahlwa kule ndawo.URamaphosa uthe selokhu izwe lingene esigabeni sesithathu sokuvalwa kwezwe, zande kakhulu izigameko zodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane.“Leli yisonto elimnyama esizweni sonkana. Izigilamkhuba sezingene kwelinye igiya lokuba nonya...ngeke ngempela kulunge uma kuzoqhubeka kanje,"kusho uRamaphosa.“Kuyanyanyisa ukuthi ngalesi sikhathi izwe libhekene nempi yecoronavirus, amadoda anonya athatha leli thuba lapho imithetho ithanjisiwe ekuvalweni kwezwe, ukwenza izenzo ezinyanyisayo njengokuhlasela abesifazane nezingane,"kuqhuba uMengameli.“Sisazama ukwamukela ubuhlungu bokulahlekelwa wuTshegofatso Pule, Naledi Phangindawo, Nompumelelo Tshaka nabanye abesifazane e-Eastern Cape naKwaZulu-Natal, izidumbu zabo ezitholwe zilahlwe kabuhlungu bebulawe nangesihluku". Uthe indlela laba besifazane ababulewe ngayo, ichaza ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika inamadoda angamaqaba angenabo nobuntu.Amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal kuleli sonto aveze ukuthi kunesaguga sakulesi sifundazwe esidwenguliwe kwathi ingane yatholwa ibulewe ehlathini thizeni.URamaphosa uthe ngokwamaphoyisa, ezinsukwini ezimbalwa nje, senyukile isibalo sobugebengu kuleli. Kulobu bugebengu kubuye kakhulu ukubulawa kwabantu ngesihluku. Ephawula ngokufa kukaSibongiseni Gabada,36 waseKhayelitsha, otholwe ebulewe ngenyanga edlule, uRamaphosa uthe izisulu zodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane zizizwa zingavikelekile, nomthetho ungabavuni.Yize obethandana noGabada ezivumele yena ukuthi umbulalile, kodwa icala aliqhubekanga enkantolo ngenxa yokushoda kobufakazi.Abazithola besenkingeni yokuhlukunyezwa bangashayela lezi zinombo  08600 10111 noma bathumele myalezo bangazisho kwiCrime Line ku32211, noma basjayele iGender-Based Violence Command Centre ku0800 428 428.
title: URamaphosa ukhala 'ngamaqaba anonya' abulala abesifazane

text: UMNYANGO wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uhlinzeke abazali bezingane ezimbili ezishe emlilweni eRedcliffe, eVerulam, ngosonhlalakahle abazobaluleka ngokomqondo.UNgqongqoshe walo Mnyango, uNkk Weziwe Thusi, izolo uthumele isitatimende kwabezindaba wathi kuyadumaza ukufa kwalezi zingane ngalolu hlobo.UNothando (9) noSiyamthanda (7) Duma kade besele noyise ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko ngezintatha zangeSonto.Uyise uMnuz Zukile Mhlongo ubesayolekelela udadewabo kanina wezingane zakhe obeshaywa yisoka lakhe ngesikhathi eshiya ekhiyile endlini kukhanya nekhandlela. Wabuya sekusha ubuhanguhangu.“Ukwenzeka kwalesi sigameko kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi izinkinga zasemphakathini zingaholela ekulahlekeni komphefumulo womuntu. Uyise walezi zingane kade eyosiza owesifazane obehlukunyezwa yisoka lakhe, wakhiyela izingane zakhe ukuze ziphephe endlini kanti akazi ukuthi usezoziyisa kwagoqanyawo,” kusho uNkk Thusi.Uthe uthumele osonhlalakahle ukuba balekelele lo mndeni ngalesi sikhathi esinzima.“Ngijube osonhlalakahle ukuthi benze isiqiniseko ukuthi abazali bathola ukwelulekwa ngokomqondo njengoba belahlekelwe yizingane zabo. Bazosiza lo mndeni kuze kube bayakwazi ukubhekana nesimo sokushonelwa yizingane zabo,” kusho uNkk Thusi.Lo mnyango unxuse umphakathi ukuba usebenzisane nohulumeni ekulweni nezinkinga ezisemphakathini.
title: Bazolulekwa abezingane ezife ngomlilo

text: B ANDIZELA phezulu kwaMazda Motor Corporation ngemuva kwesimemezelo abasenzile sokuthi ukwakhiwa kweMazda3 sekufinyelele ku-5 million ngo-Ephreli 2016.Lena yiMazda yesibili ukufinyelela ku-5 million emuva kwezimanga ezagilwa yiMazda 323. IMazda3 yenze irekhodi elisha ngokufinyelela kulezi zibalo esikhathini esiyiminyaka engu-12 nezinyanga ezingu 10 kusukela ngoJuni 2003.IMazda3 iyona moto abazishaya isifuba ngayo futhi nezibalo zokuthengwa kwayo zakha isibalo esikhulu sezimoto abazidayisayo ngonyaka.Le ntandokazi yemoto yakhiwa ezimbonini ezihlukene zale nkampani emazweni amaningi okukhona imboni iHofu eJapan, Changan Mazda Automobile Co, Ltd, eChina, AutoAlliance (Thailand) neMazda de Mexico Vehicle Operation, eMexico.Iphinde yakhiwe embonini eseMalaysia naseVietnam. Kusukela kwaba khona iMazda yesizukulwane sokuqala, kwaMazda basebenze ngokuzikhandla ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi iMazda3 iba yimpumelelo, kusuka esakhiweni sayo, ukuyihlela kahle ngendlela kanjalo nomuzwa omnandi wokuyishayela.IMazda yesizukulwane sesithathu bayithuthukisa ngo-2013 ngesikhathi sebeqala ubuchwepheshe be-SKYACTIV TECHNOLOGY neKODO-Soul of Motion ukuze ilandele esizukulwaneni esisha seMazda.Isihlonishwa kakhulu ezingeni lomhlaba kusuka kwi-Canadian Car of the Year's, Best New Small Car in 2013 ne-Red Dot Design Award in 2014. Iphinde yalala endaweni yesithathu kwi-Finalist for World Car of the Year ne World Design Car of the Year ngo-2014.KwaMazda Southern Africa sebedayise ama-Mazda 3 angaphezulu kuka-4200 kusuka kwaqala umsebenzi ngo-Okthoba 2014 kuze kube u-Ephreli 2016.Phakathi kwezinjini ezitholakala eNingizimu Afrika kukhona iSKYACTIV-G 2.0-litre kaphethroli edonsa ngamagiya angu-6 eshintshwayo nezishintshayo, i-1.6 kaphethroli edonsa ngamagiya amahlanu.KwaMazda bathi abamile kodwa bahlabela phambili nokwakha izimoto ezinezidingo zamakhasimende abo.
title: IMazda 3 nomlando ka-5 million

text: LUNGENWE yiNhlangano yeZizwe udaba lukaCaster Semenya lokuphonsela inselelo isinqumo se-IAAF, sokushaya umthetho ovimbela abagijimi besifazane imizimba yabo ekhiqiza i-testestorone ngokweqile, ukuthi bangawagijimi amabanga agijinywa yintokazi yaseNingizimu Afrika.Isinqumo sokwesekela le ntokazi sithathwe engqungqetheleni yale nhlangano eGeneva, eSwitzerland, ekuqaleni kwesonto. Ithathe isinqumo sokwesekela inselelo kaSemenya ayiphonsele i-IAAF sokuthi ayihambisani nokucwaswa komuntu ngesimo adalwe ngaso uMdali.Ephawula ngale sinqumo uNgqongqoshe weZobudlelwano nokuBambisana Kwezizwe eNingizimu Afrika, uLindiwe Sisulu uthe: “Umphakathi wamazwe omhlaba unomsebenzi wokuvikela amalungelo kaCaster Semenya nabanye abagijimi besifazane abafana naye emhlabeni jikelele, ngaphansi kombandela wokuthi bangabantu amalungelo abo ahlukumeziwe.“Umkhankaso wokugcina ilungelo likaCaster lokubamba iqhaza kwezemidlalo emhlabeni, wumzabalazo wabo bonke abesifazane abacwaswa ngokobulili.”Njengoba kusalindelwe isinqumo ngodaba lukaSemenya yena ngakolunye uhlangothi akamile njengoba eseqalile ukugijima ibanga lika-5000m, okuvele kwacaca ukuthi ngeke abe nantanga noma ngabe isinqumo seCourt of Arbitration for Sports (CAS) asimvuni.Umhlanganiso kaSemenya uholele ekutheni uMengameli we-Athletics South Africa (ASA) * -Aleck Skhosana, abize lo mpetha wama-Olympics ngoxam’kavinjelwa.Umjaho abezwa ngawo amanzi ngobhoko kuleli banga ubuhlelwe yiGauteng North Athletics Championships e-University of Pretoria.USemenya unqoba lo mjaho kuleli banga kulindeleke isinqumo ngemuva kokuthi ephonsele inselelo isinqumo se-International IAAF sokuphasisa umthetho ovimbela abagijimi besifazane abanemizimba ekhiqiza i-testosterone eyenza babe namandla ngokwedlulele.Isinqumo esibhekwe umhlaba wonke iCAS isihlehlisele ukuphela kuka-Ephreli ngoba besafuna ukucubungulisisa kahle zonke izinhlangothi ezithintekayo.Eqhuba ngomhlanganiso kaSemenya uSkhosana uthe: “Lena yindlela abatshengisa ngayo ukuthi ngeke bamvimbele ngisho sebethanda kanjani ngoba nguxam’kavinjelwa.“Uyabakhombisa ukuthi ukusebenza kwakhe kanzima angagijima noma yiliphi ibanga abekelwe uma ezilungiselele kahle. Ngisho bangathi akagijime * -200m ezilungiselele kahle.”USkhosana uveze ukuthi beyi-ASA abawabambele amagqubu amazwe ase-Afrika angazange aweseke umkhankaso wayo wokulekelela uSemenya ekuphikiseni kwakhe i-IAAF ngesinqumo esicwasa abesifazane abakhiqiza i-testestorone eningi kuneyemukelekile.“Thina sizoma ne-Afrika ekuphikiseni isinqumo sokuqeda umjaho webanga lika-5000m nelika 10000m okukhonya kulona abasubathi base-Afrika.Labo abangazange baseseke bandage kaCaster asibabambele igqubu,”kusho uSkhosana.Nakuba lomengameli engalibeki ngembaba ukuthi uqondise kuliphi izwe kodwa kwaba nemibuzo ngokuwuhlaba inhlali kweKenya ngodaba lukaSemenya.
title: I-United Nations yeseka uSemenya

text: Bloemfontein Celtic (1) 1Orlando Pirates (0) 0I-ORLANDO Pirates iphinde yathola isifundo sokuthi ukudlala kahle kodwa ungawasebenzisi ngendlela amathuba owatholayo kuvamise ukugcina ngokuthi uwashiye amaphuzuu njengoba kwenzekile izolo ntambama, eFree State Stadium ikhala ngaphansi kwiBloemfontein Celtic.Njengenjwayelo abantu baseBloemfontein bebephume ngobuningi babo bezokwethamela umdlalo. Ziye ekhefini isike yahlekwa indaba yabadlali bePirates nokuba nomqeqeshi obhekene kuphela nokufakwa kwebhola enethini.Okudala ukuthi le ndaba ihlekwe amathuba awele kuVincent Pule noThamsanqa Gabuza esiwombeni sokuqala. Lize langena igoli ngomzuzu ka-17 lishaywa yisitobha seCeltic uBongani Sam. Leli goli lingena nje vele iCeltic iyona ebibukeka inobungozi uma iya phambili.IPirates ifike eFree State kuyiyona ewadinga kakhulu amaphuzu njengoba isizini yayo ingeyinhle kuze kube yimanje. IBucs iqale ngokudlala ngokulingana neHighlands Park. Isuke lapho yanqoba ngenhlanhla kwiChippa United yase ithelwa othulini yiBidvest Wits ngeledlule. Konke lokhu kuhlangene nokukhishwa kwiMTN 8. Inkinga enkulu kwiBucs, wukweqisa ibhola emugqeni osemapalini.Le wini bese kungeyesithathu kulandelana kwiCeltic (engakangenelwa yigoli) kanti kwiBucs bese kungokwesithathu ithola induku (uma kuhlanganiswa nomdlalo weMTN 8).Okusheshe kwaqapheleka wukuthi iCeltic ibisheshe iyixine iPirates uma iphethe ibhola. Lokhu bekudala amaphutha emuva kanti vele ezikaSteve Komphela bezihlele ukubaxina ngesivinini uma kwenzeka zilithola. Lokhu bekwenza ukuthi konozinti abebevimbe kulo mdlalo, uSiyabonga Mpontshane kube uyena obematasa kakhulu.Kube yiPirates nokho eqale kangcono esiwombeni sesibili. Umdlalo ubusuzinze kakhulu engxenyeni enkulu yeqembu lasekhaya kudaleka nama-freekick kodwa engeyona ingozi kuPatrick Tignyemb obesezintini. Ngomzuzu ka-61 noka-67 uGabuza uthole amathuba amabili amahle ngokwahlukana kodwa womabili amehlula ngekhanda egotshelwe uPule. Ngemuva kwalawo mathuba umdlalo uthe ukuthula kancane kodwa ubungozi beCeltic bulokhu buvela.Ibhola elivinjwe uLantshane Phalane esepalini liyikhona umdlalo usesikhathini sikanondweba, langqofwa uHappy Jele, yilona elicacisele iPirates ukuthi amaphuzu izowashiya eFree State.Imiphumela ye-Absa Premiership: Chippa United 2-2 Black Leopards; Bidvest Wits 0-1 SuperSport United; Cape Town City FC 0-0 Golden Arrows; Polokwane City 2-0 Baroka FC; Maritzburg United 0-0 Kaizer Chiefs; Orlando Pirates 0-1 Bidvest Wits; Bloemfontein Celtic 1-0 Orlando Pirates; AmaZulu 2-1 Free State Stars
title: UKomphela wandise usizi lweBucs

text:
MCEBO MPUNGOSEU SEPHINDE wanyelwa inyoni esandleni umculi we-pop ongaconsi phansi kuleli, uToya Delazy, osethubeni lokuyonandisa kwi-50th Annual Midem Music Conference ezoqala kuJuni 3 kuya kuJuni 6 eCannes, eFrance.Le ngqungquthela yomculo yaminyaka yonke isizakhele udumo emhlabeni ngokunikeza abaculi basemazweni ahlukahlukene abasathuthuka endimeni yomculo ithuba lokuthi bazibonakalise.Ngaphezu kwalokho bonke abaculi abaqokwayo, umculo wabo uzwakala esikhangisweni seMidem Artist Accelerator Official Compilation.Njengamanje uToya usesigabeni sokugcina sabaculi abahlungelwa ukungena kwabangu-12 abazobe bevela emazweni angaphandle.“Ngiyazigqaja ngakho nje ukuthi ngifike kulesi sigaba.“IMidem Music Conference ingumcimbi othathelwa phezulu endimeni yomculo kuwo wonke amazwe futhi kuliphupho lawo wonke umculi ukuba yingxenye yayo,” kusho uToya.IMidem Artist Accelerator eyingxenye yale ngqungquthela ibekelwe amaciko nalabo abawasekayo okubalwa kubo izimenenja, abakhiqizi bomculo nalabo abawusabalalisayo abasuke bezofundiswa izindlela zokungena kwimakethe yamazwe angaphandle.UToya Delazy zilokhu zimlandele njalo izibusiso nonyaka kwazise ngoJanuwari lo mculi uhlabane ngendodo yeBest International Songat, kuma-Outmusic Awards eNew York ngeculo lakhe i
Forbidden Fruit.Ngaphezu kwalokho iculo olakhe i
Luv My City like lahlala kunombolo 6 ohlwini lwamaculo ahamba phambili ku-UK Urban Charts.Kamuva nje usanda kumemezela iculo lakhe elisha i
Back To The Roots neqembu lakhe elisha le-hip hop iKlutch Kollective.
title: UToya Delazy esigabeni sokugcina sabaculi abazoya kwelaseFrance

text: ULUNGA Sokhela oyisikhulu esiphezulu kuMaZulu FC uthi akangabazi ukuthi Usuthu luzosiwina isicoco se-Absa Premieship kungekudala.Ngokusho kwalesi sikhulu, uxhaso abalutholayo kwaSpar nabadlali ababasayinisile, kuveza ukujula kwamaphupho abo kuleli qembu.USokhela ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi Usuthu lwethula abadlali abasha nejezi elisha elixhaswe yinkampani yase-United Kingdom i-Umbro, ngoLwesihlanu ePhoenix eThekwini.“Akusasiniswa amahleza manje. Awusekho nowodwa umdlalo esizowudlalela ukuthi sithi sifuna ukuthola iphuzu, cha. Yonke imidlalo yethu siyidlalela ukunqoba. Isifiso sethu esikhulu wukunqoba isicoco seligi. Lokho kuyinto engenzeka kulo nyaka, noma eminyakeni embalwa ezayo. Ngisaphinda ngithi kufanele siqale ukukhombisa ukuthi nathi sesingelinye lamaqembu alwela isicoco seligi,” kusho uSokhela.AmaZulu ethule abadlali abayisikhombisa ngoLwesihlanu, okubalwa kubona umgadli wase-Argentina u-Emiliano Tade, Nhlanhla Vilakazi, Moeneeb Josephs, Marc van Heerden, Charlie Hlalele, Xolani Silawula noBoiki Modikaseng.“AmaZulu ayiqembu elihlonishwayo. Sinabaxhasi abayizinkampani ezinkulu uSpar no-Umbro abakhombisa ukusethemba okukhulu. Sekufanele siqale ukucabanga izinto ezinkulu manje ukuze sijabulise abaxhasi bethu. Muningi umsebenzi owenziwa kuleli qembu kusukela emazingeni aphansi kwi-Under 13 kuze kuyofika eqenjini elikhulu. Kungakho sifuna ukudla izicoco manje. Noma kungeke mhlawumbe kwenzeka njengoba sifisa kodwa okubalulekile siyazazi ukuthi sifunani,” kusho lesi sikhulu.USokhela uphinde wakhuluma ngodaba olungundabamlonyeni kulezi zinsuku lwePremier Soccer League (PSL) ebhekene ngeziqu zamehlo ne-Ajax Cape Town. Umbango usekutheni i-Ajax yaphucwa amaphuzu ngemuva kokutholakala kokuthi yaba necala ngokudlalisa uTendai Ndoro obesedlalele amaqembu amabili (ngaphambi kwe-Ajax). Umthetho weFifa uthi umdlali akakwazi ukudlalela amaqembu amathathu ngesizini eyodwa.Ukuphucwa kwe-Ajax amaphuzu kwaholela ekutheni Usuthu luphume kwiTop 8, kungene iSupersport United.“Ngosuku lokugcina kwiligi sathola unombolo 8. Lona leli qembu elizama ukuthatha unombolo 8 wethu salishaya kabili ngesizini edlule (ekhaya nasekuhambeni). Konke lokhu osekwenzeka manje ngeligi akunabo nhlobo ubulungiswa futhi kuyaxaka. Manje sekulokhu kwehliwa kwenyukwa ezinkantolo ngento engiyibona ilula. Kuthiwa kuyalungiswa, kulungiswani? Angithi yaphela isizini saphelela kunombolo 8? Nokho sekukhona abathile le nto esebeyenza eyabo. Kubi nokho ngoba kuthumela isithombe esingesihle ngebhola lakuleli,” kusho uSokhela.
title: Usuthu luphokophelele ekuwineni isicoco seligi

text: BEKUQHILIKA izihlathi kubafundi abadle umhlanganiso emncintiswaneni wokubona ukuthi abafundi bazi kangakanani ngomthetho nangoMthethisisekelo, i-International Justice Moot Court Competition obusePoland ngoLwesine nangoLwesihlanu.Abafundi baseMathubesizwe nabase-Eden College bebemele i-Afrika emncintiswaneni. Izolo bafike esikhumulweni sezindiza, iKing Shaka International Airport, sebelindwe yizihlobo, abangani, ozakwabo abafunda nabo nezikhulu zoMnyango wezeMfundo bebahalalisela ngempumelelo yabo.Emncintiswaneni abafundi benza sengathi basenkantolo, kube khona umfundi owumshushisi, ovikela ummngalelwa, kuphikiswane ngamaphuzu omthetho, inkantolo bese ithatha isinqumo. Abawine icala kuba yibo abawinayo.Emncintiswaneni bekuqhudelana abafundi abaphuma emazweni wonke omhlaba abawine emazweni abo, kwawina abaKwaZulu Natal abebemelwe iMathubesizwe ne-Eden College.UDkt Enock Nzama, inhloko yomnyango, obengomunye wabebezokwamukela abafundi uthe ukuwina kwabo kukhomba ukuthi iKwaZulu-Natal nayo iyakwazi ukukhiqiza abafundi abakwaziyo ukuncintisana nabanye abafundi emhlabeni.“Sijabule kakhulu lo mncitiswano usinike ithuba lokuthi sivele emhlabeni wonke kanti , ukuwina kwalaba bafundi kuzophinde kunikeze ithemba nakwabanye abafundi bethu,” kusho uNzama.UNkk Sthoko Shange ongumgqugquzeli womncintiswano eKZN, uthe kuthatha izinyanga ezingu-11 ukulungisela umncitiswano, oqala ngokuqhudelana kwabafundi esikoleni kuhlungwe kuze kusale abamele isifundazwe. Nabo baqhathwa nabezinye izifundazwe. Abaphumelele bamela iNingizimu Afrika.UNozipho Dube (17) noNondumiso Ntshangase (17) abafunda uGrade12 bebemele iMathubesizwe High, uCarltlin Scwharer (18) noSarushka Naidoo (18) bemele i-Eden College.IMEYA yakuMasipala waseMandeni, uMnuz Thabani Mdlalose, ngesikhathi ehalalisela abafundi abadle umhlanganiso ePoland uCaitlin Schwarer, Nondumiso Ntshangase, Nozipho Dube noSarushka Naidoo esikhumulweni sezindiza iKing Shaka International Airport izolo. Isithombe: Doctor Ngcobo/African News Agency (ANA)UNondumiso othi ufuna kwenza izifundo zeCommercial Law, uthe: “Uvalo besinalo, obekubuye kusithuse kakhulu wukuthi abafundi abaningi ebebekulo mncintiswano bebemhlophe, bebebahlanu kuphela abafundi abamnyama bonke bebephuma eKZN.Wububona ukuthi akekho ocabanga ukuthi singadla umhlanganiso kodwa sibakhombisile ukuthi nasezikoleni zasemakhaya kuyafundwa, uma uzimisele akukho lapho ungeke ufinyelele khona,” uNondumiso.Uzakwabo, uNozipho naye ofuna ukwenza iziqu zomthetho, uthe ubengalindele ukuthi bazofika sebelindwe yizihlwele ezizobahalalisela, lokho ubeke akubone kubadlali.Unina kaNozipho, uNkk Nonhlanhla Dube uthe akamangali ukuthi indodakazi yakhe isiphuma phesheya ngenxa yobuhlakani bayo ngoba kusukela yaqala ukufunda ihlale iwina.UNkk Nozipho Ntshangase, unina kaNondumiso uthe kumthathe isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuthi akholwe wukuthi ingane yakhe izoya phesheya yize kade ebhalelwa izincwadi etshelwa.
title: Abafundi bamukelwe ngodumo

text: SEMUKELWE eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo isicelo sokudluliswa kwecala lombango wobuholi bamaNazaretha phakathi kwabaseBuhleni nabaseThembezinhle njengoba lizolalelwa ngoSepthemba nonyaka.Ummeli wohlangothi lwaseThembezinhle, uMnuz Trevor Nkosi, uthe yize bengakanikwa usuku elizohlala ngalo leli cala kodwa uyakuqinisekisa ukuthi lizoba ngoSepthemba.Amaphepha okudluliswa kwecala abefakwe ngoJanuwari nonyaka.“Basanda kusazisa ukuthi icala lamukelwe eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo. Saziswe ukuthi izodinga ukuzwa iziphakamiso zazo zombili izinhlangothi bese ithatha isinqumo esingujuqu kulona,” kusho uNkosi.Okhulumela abaseThembezinhle, uMnuz Nkululeko Mthethwa, uthe okwenze icala lamukelwa eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo wukuthi akekho kuzona zombili izinhlangothi ophikile ukuthi umholi owaqokwa ngokusemthethweni yinkosi Vela Shembe Imisebeyelanga osekungene ezicathulweni zayo inkosi Phinda Shembe Ukukhanyakwelanga njengoba (Imisebe) seyakhothama.“Kusijabulisile ukuthi lingene eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo khona amaNazaretha ezocaciseleka ngokusebenza komthethosisekelo webandla noProtocol 293 owasuselwa encwadini eyabhalwa wuMqaliwendlela ngayefisa kwenzeke uma engasekho.“AbaseBuhleni bafake icala ngokuthi bafuna kubhekwe uProtocol 293 ogunyaza izingwevu zebandla ukuthi kube yizona eziqoka umholi uma kungukuthi umholi okhotheme ushiye engamqokanga umholi.“Inkantolo ivumele lesi sicelo ukuze izwe kahle ngokusebenza komthethosisekelo webandla noProtocol 293. Ibingeke isamukele lesi sicelo inkantolo ukube bekusakhulunywa ngokuthi ngubani umholi ofanele ngoba kuyaziwa ukuthi yiMisebeyelanga eyaqokwa wuThingolwenkosazana,” kusho uMthethwa.Uthe abaseBuhleni bafuna kusetshenziswe uProtocol 293 ekubeni inkosi uThingolwenkosazana yashiya imqokile umholi.Lokho uthe yinto engelula ukuthi yenzeke manje futhi noProtocol 293 akulula ukuthi uqale ukusetshenziswa manje.Nasebufakazini benkosi yamaQadi uMqoqi Ngcobo yakuveza ukuthi umholi wakhethwa wuThingolwenkosazana. Lokho uthe kuyashayisana nokwashiwo wuMfundisi uMbongwa Nzama owafaka amaphepha enkantolo kusaqala icala wathi umholi ukhethwe yisigungu sebandla kusetshenziswa uProtocol 293. Uveze ukuthi ukube belingekho igama elabhalwa phansi wuThingolwenkosazana, bekuzophoqa ukuthi kusetshenziswe uProtocol 293 njengoba ukuvumela ukuthi kube yizingwevu eziqoka umholi olandelayo uma osekhotheme eshiye engaqokanga muntu.Okhulumela abaseBuhleni, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe akazimisele ngokukhuluma kakhulu ngecala njengoba lisazongena enkantolo.“Engingakugcizelela nje wukuthi amaNazaretha ngicela afundisise uProtocol 293 ukuthi uthini ukuze baqonde kahle okwenzekayo,” kusho uMncwabe.
title: Libuyela enkantolo icala lakwaShembe

text: BALALE emgwaqweni abahlala eMadiba House abakhishwe ngabanikazi befulethi izolo.Isolezwe like labika ngodaba lwaseMadiba House esemgwaqeeni uSt Georges, eThekwini njengoba abahlali babeyalelwe ukuthi baphume ngonyaka odlule.Abanikazi befulethi basola abahlali ngokungakhokhi irenti nokuhlala ngenkani yize bese betsheliwe ukuthi abadingeki.Ngonyaka odlule lolu daba belulokhu lungena ezinkantolo abahlali bekhala ngokuthi abanayo imali ephelele yokukhokha izikweletu zabo kodwa bazokwazi ukukhokha kancane kancane.Abanye baveze ukuthi baphelelwe wumsebenzi ngenxa yeCovid-19 ngakho abakwazi ukukhokha irenti.Izolo, izikhonzi zenkantolo zifike zakhipha impahla yabahlali baseMadiba zayibeka emgwaqweni.Bezingenandaba nokuthi kukhona okufayo, bezikhiphela yonke into emgwaqweni.UMnuz Sthembiso Mlungwana oveze ukuthi uneminyaka ehlala eMadiba House uthe bazoya enkantolo ukuze baphikise isinqumo sokukhishwa kwabo.Ifulethi eleKun Yang Family Trust, Chijan Chou Lee, Pin Jing Lino noMohamed Zaid Mansoor.UMnuz Mthembiseni Thusi we-IFP ku-ward 32, uthe kumphethe kabi ukukhishwa ngesihluku kwabantu baseMadiba House ngoba behluphekile.Uthe kuyacaca ukuthi eNingizimu Afrika kusebenza imali, uma ungenayo uyacindezeleka.
title: Balale emnyango bekhishwa eflethini

text:
ZANELE MTHETHWAA BESIFAZANE akumele bakhohliswe wukufakwa iringi bathenjiswa umshado, okubalulekile ukulotsholwa.Lokhu kushiwo ngumeluleki wezothando nombhali wezincwadi, uMnuz Lunga Ntuli, odume ngencwadi ethi 
‘Why Men Cheat and Why Women Do It Better.’Yize sekuyisitayela ukuthembisana umshado phambi kwezihlwele, uNtuli ukhuthaza ukuthi zibuyele emasisweni kuqalwe ngokuyovelwa ekhaya.Kujwayelekile ukuthi kuthi kungazelele muntu, insizwa ihlabe phansi ngedolo, icele umshado entombini ngeringi kanokusho, okubeka isithombe sokuthi sekuseduze emshadweni.Nokho kubuye kuvele ukuthi abanye bathembisana umshado nje kungakavelwa ngisho ekhaya, abanye bagcine behlukene kungenzekanga lutho.UNtuli uthi kwakuvele kungelona isiko labamnyama ukumangazana ngokucelana umshado ngeringi ngoba okubalulekile yilobolo.Uthe abathandanayo kumele bazane kahle baqinisekise ukuthi bazimisele ukushada ngaphambi kokuthembisana.“Asikho isikhathi esibekiwe nesilungele ukuthembisana umshado kodwa okungenani abantu abaqale ngokwazana kahle. Ngokwesintu awusheshi ukuveza othandana naye ekhaya ngoba kuyaziwa ukuthi uthando luyalinda. Kumele indoda izilungiselele ngokwanele, ibe nemali yokulobola nokushada.“Esikhathini samanje umuntu ugijimela ukuthenga iringi ebizayo ethembisa umshado kanti akanayo nemali yokucela, usisi agcine eshade neringi,” usho kanje.Uthe yize kungowesilisa ocela umshado, esikhathini esiningi ngowesifazane osuke ecabe indlela.Uveza ukuthi abesifazane banendlela abenza ngayo ukukhombisa ukuthi sebekulungele ukushada. Uveza nokuthi abesilisa bathenga amaringi okucela umshado ngenxa yengcindezi yabanye abakwenzayo nosisi abakufunayo.“Ngiyakuncamela ukuthi ubhuti angabi nayo imali yeringi yesethembiso uma ezokwazi ukulobola. Iringi ayisho ukuthi uzoshada ngempela kodwa ukuzibophezela ngokuyolobola okubalulekile. Akusizi ukwenzela abantu, uthenge iringi ebizayo ngoba ufuna ukubukwa kanti akukavelwa ngisho ekhaya. Lokhu kwehlisa isithunzi kwabesifazane ngoba abanye bagcina befakwe iringi, ungabi khona umshado,” kusho uNtuli.Njengoba sekukhona nezinkundla zokuxhumana abanye bakumemezela nakuzona uma sebecelwe umshado. UPearl Modiadie ongumsakazi weMetro FM ungomunye wabakhombise ukujabula ngokucelwa umshado yisoka lakhe uNkululeko beseholidini eZambia. Kubuye kwavela ukuthi useyalotsholwa.Wenze okungajwayelekile uMnuz Sanele Mhlungu ngo-Ephreli ecela umshado ezihlweleni kuNksz Nosipho Nguse obethweswa iziqu zezemfundo e-University of KwaZulu-Natal.UNksz Nguse uthe yize athuka kodwa akubanga kubi nakubazali ababekhona ngoba uMhlungu ubesevelile ekhaya. UMhlungu othe unamahloni, uveze ukuthi kwamthatha isikhathi ukwenza isinqumo sokucela umshado ezihlweleni kodwa wabona kuzoba yisikhumbuzo saphakade.Abanye abakumemezele emphakathini ukuthembisana umshado, kubalwa uLebo M noZoe Mthiyane asebehlukene.
title: Sihle isitayela sokucelana umshado kodwa akuqalwe ekhaya

text: IJIMELA endlini intokazi yaseDududu efike kwezwakala esibhakeleni.UThema “Stone Cold” Zuma (25), uthe kunzima ukuba umshayisibhakela wesifazane eNingizimu Afrika ngoba abanakwa bantula noxhaso.Ngokusho kwale ntokazi, esilwe izimpi eziyisikhombisa selokhu yaqala lo mdlalo, ilekelelwa ugogo wayo embize ngoMaButhelezi oyisiza ngemali yokugibela uma iya ezimpini zayo.UZuma ungaphansi kukaphromotha uThobile Khumalo weDiva Studios Promotion. Nokho impi kaZuma yokuqala wayilwa ngaphansi kweZantsi Promotion ephethwe uMbali Zantsi.Ezimpini eziyisikhombisa azilwile unqobe eziyisithupha washaywa empini eyodwa ahlulwe kuyona uMellissa Miller, eSandton empini yebhande elibizwa ngeSA Title kwiBantamweight.Abashayisibhakela abayazi kahle induku kaZuma nguNatalia Bannia, Tsepiso Majola noCynthia Mthembu, ukusho abambalwa asebeke babuzwa ubunzima bokubhekana nale ntokazi.“Ngijimela endlini yami engilala kuyona. Ngiphuma endlini ngoba sengifuna ukwakha umoya, ngigijima. Okudala lokhu wukuthi alukho uxhaso esibhakeleni sabantu besifazane ngakho nokuziqeqesha kwami akufiki ezingeni engifuna kulona ngenxa yokwentula imali yokuthenga nokuhambela izindawo ezisezingeni elifanele. Kwesinye isikhathi ngigcina sengicela imali kugogo wami yokuhambela izimpi zami. Kunzima ngoba naye uzidonsela kanzima ngemali yempesheni,” kusho uZuma oveze ukuthi abazali bakhe sebadlula emhlabeni.Ngokusho kwale ntokazi, impi yayo elandelayo izoyilwa kuyona le nyanga ngoNovemba 24 endaweni esazoqinisekiswa. UZuma uthe nesitha azolwa naso asikadalulwa.“Isifiso sami esikhulu ukuzibona ngisezingeni likaFloyd “Money” Mayweather. Okungenza ngikhethe umuntu wesilisa wukuthi akekho owesifazane osezingeni elifana nelakhe. Lokho kukodwa kukhombisa ngokusobala ubunzima obubhekene nesibhakela sabesifazane kuleli,” kuqhuba uZuma.Le ntokazi ithe ikhethe ukuthi ibuyele esikoleni kulo nyaka ngoba ayiwuphasanga kahle * -matric wayo eminyakeni edlule.“Ngiyaqedela ePhindavele High School ngasekhaya ngoba angiwuphasanga kahle * -matric wami. Ngifuna ukusheba isibhakela nemfundo,” kuphetha uZuma.
title: Kunzima kowesifazane osesibhakeleni

text: ISIPHENDUKE umantunta nendishi indoda yaseMlaza edindwe ngenduku yashiselwa umuzi ebiqashe kuwona ngabantu ethe bayisola ngokuba yimpimpi yamaphoyisa.UMnuz Thembinkosi “Smothozi” Nzuza (41) uthe inkinga yaqala mhla eyisa umngani wakhe enyangeni ukuba iyomelapha ngenxa yokumbona ukuthi unamashwa.Uthe babefelwa imoto njalo uma beyokwenza wumsebenzi wokwakha izitebhisi zemixhaso abathole inkontileka yawo eMzinyathi, eNanda.“Sabuya kosebenza intombi yomngani wami engumakhelwane yangikhomba ngesibhamu, yathi kungani ngifuna ukukhipha idliso endodeni yayo. Yabuza ukuthi kungani ngifuna ukuchitha umuzi wayo,” kusho uNzuza.Uthe waya kovula icala emaphoyiseni, icala lagcina lingene enkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza.Uthe lesi sehlo senzeka ngoFebhuwari kulo nyaka.Ekuqaleni kukaMeyi, uNzuza uthe ngemuva kokuhluleka kwentombi yomngani wakhe ebimphoqa ukuthi asule icala, ivele yamthumela ngabantu abafike bamshaya bambiza ngempimpi yamaphoyisa.“Bathi mina ngitshela amaphoyisa ukuthi zifihlwephi izibhamu. Bathi bazongibulala uma ngingalisuli icala. Kubuhlungu ukushiselwa yonke impahla yasendlini nezingubo zokugqoka. Anginakudla nandawo yokuhlala, ngisele nengikugqokile. Nemoto yami ebengisebenza ngayo umsebenzi wamathenda isintshontshiwe,” kusho uNzuza.Uthe impilo yakhe isengcupheni ngoba umsolwa nabangani bakhe bayamthungatha.“Amaphoyisa awangisizi ngalutho uma ngicela angivikele kule nkinga engibhekene nayo. Owesifazane owangikhomba ngesibhamu wangishayanisa nabantu, uthi yena akabopheki futhi uzongibamba,” kubalisa uNzuza.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula komsolwa ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwesoka lakhe okuthiwa uhlala nalo, belukhala lungabanjwa. Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela udaba nomyalezo abathunyelwe wona obubacela ukuba baphawule, ungaphendulwanga.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCapt Nqobile Gwala, uthe ngoFebhuwari 2, 2020 ngo-4.45 ntambama kusolwa ukuthi owesilisa wakhonjwa ngesibhamu esigcemeni sakwaY eMlaza.“Kwavulwa icala lokukhomba ngesibhamu esiteshini samaphoyisa eBhekithemba, kwaboshwa umsolwa oneminyaka engu-30. Wavela eMkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza icala lahlehliselwa uMeyi 27,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Usale nakugqokile oshaywe washiselwa nomqasho wakhe

text: UMnuz Elisha Langa (32) usaphithene ikhanda ngemuva kokugaya ngeloli uthumbu wakhe u-Akhona Ngcebo Langa, ngeSonto ebusuku.Izolo, uLanga utshele Isolezwe ukuthi inhliziyo yakhe isankenketha nezinyembezi zisalokhu zigobhoza kusukela kwenzeke lesi sigameko.ULanga onebhizinisi lokwakha ama-blocks kwakhe uthe ubehambisa amablocks kweminye imizi njengoba ejwayele uma kungamaSonto.Uthe indodakazi yakhe kade idlala nezinye izingane emini yabe isilala ngaphansi kukaseyili okumbozwa ngawo ama-blocks, wangayibona.ULanga uthe uhambe njengenjwayelo ngaphezu kukaseyili engazi ukuthi kukhona ingane yakhe ngaphansi.Esebuya kohambisa ama-blocks ufice omakhelwane begcwele kwakhe, bamkhombisa isidumbu sengane yakhe ngaphansi kukaseyili, ishayisekile.“Kuhlale kuthiwa indoda kayikhali kodwa ngikhalise okwengane encane sengifica kugcwele omakhelwane emzini wami bengikhombisa ingane yami ngaphansi kukaseyili igayekile futhi isishonile. Kube nzima ukubhekana nokuthi ngizibulalele mina ingane yami, ngahamba ngaphezu kwayo ngeloli, ngangakwazi nokuyizwa,” kusho uLanga.Uthe ngabe basayifuna namanje indodakazi yakhe ukube enye ingane encane ebidlala nayo ayizange idonse umuntu omdala ngengalo izomkhombisa.“Ingane ebidlala no-Akhona ibingakwazi ukukhuluma kodwa ibilokhu idonsa udadewethu ukuthi azobona ngaphansi kukaseyili. Kuthe uma sebeyilandela bewuphakamisa, indodakazi yami yatholwa isishonile,” kusho uLanga.Ubenabantwana abayisithupha.“Unina ubekhona endlini ngesikhathi kwenzeka lokhu, naye uphazamiseke kakhulu. Ukubona ingane yakho ikulesi simo akulula, kusenzima kuwo wonke umuntu ekhaya,” kusho uLanga.Bewumndeni uthe bakhethe ukusheshe bayifihle namuhla ingane. Amaphoyisa ase-Muden abiziwe endaweni yesehlo. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe idokodo ngokushona kwengane.
title: Isililo kuyise ogaye ingane yakhe ngeloli

text: UMHOLI weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, ubhalele iMenenja kaMasipala weTheku uMnuz Sipho Nzuza incwadi lapho efuna ukuchazelwa kabanzi ngohlelo lokwakhiwa kwemifuziselo yomengameli be-ANC uMnuz Oliver Tambo noMnuz Nelson Mandela ezodla uR20 million.Le mifuziselo kulindeleke ukuthi ivulwe ngokusemthethweni uma sekuzophela unyaka.UMncwango uthe bayalazi iqhaza likamengameli Mandela noTambo ekulweni nobandlululo kodwa bakholwa wukuthi uhlelo lokwakhiwa kwemifuziselo yabo kufanele kwenziwe ngemali ye-ANC, hhayi eyabantu baseThekwini.“Imali okuzokwakhiwa ngayo le mifuziselo ngabe yenza izidingo zabantu baseThekwini ukuze bathole imisebenzi, hhayi ukuthi isetshenziselwe izinhlelo zokugayela i-ANC amavoti njengoba kuza ukhetho ezokwehlulwa kulo,” kusho uMncwango.Uthe bafuna uNzuza abakhombise uhlelo okwakhulunywa kulo ngalolu daba kwisabelomali sangonyaka ka-2018/19 nokuthi lwasekwa wobani ngesikhathi luphakanyiswa.“Asikwazi ukuvumela i-ANC ukuthi izenzele umathanda ngemali yabantu,” kusho uMncwango.UMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uthe isithangami sabezindaba ngalolu daba ebesihlelelwe inamuhla sihlehlisiwe ngenxa yezimo abebengazilindele, bazomemezela olunye usuku ngesikhathi esizayo.Khonamanjalo; kunabantu abakhalayo ngokufakwa kwemifuziselo yabaholi be-ANC emgwaqweni uRuth First Highway, eDurban North njengoba bethi zidala isiminyaminya uma sebeya koshutha nazo.
title: OweDA ulwa nemifuziselo ezobiza uR20 million

text: UKUQOKWA kweBhokobhoko elingu-Aphiwe Dyantyi emklomelweni wombhoxo womhlaba, iWorld Rugby’s Breakthrough Player of the Year Award kwenza izikhulu zeSouth African Rugby Union (Saru) zimbone efanelwe wukuphonswa ogqokweni olulodwa nezinkakha, uSchalk Burger noBryan Habana.Ngokwesine kulo nyaka umklomelo okuqokwe kuwo uDyantyi ukhona kanti ngokokuqala ukuthi umdlali waseNingizimu Afrika aqokwe kuwo.U-Andy Colquhoun weSaru uthe uDyantyi uyobe ulandele ezinyathelweni zezingwevu ezinjengoBurger noHabana uma ewunqobile umklomelo weWorld Rugby.“Wumklomelo omusha lo, asikaze sibe nomdlali oqokelwa kuwo. Kuyaqala kodwa kuyajabulisa kakhulu.Cabanga uma engawunqoba, akazugcina nje ngokungena emlandweni.Abantu asebeke banqoba umklomelo weWorld Rugby nguBryan Habana noSchalk Burger, benqoba owomdlali ovelele, kuyajabulisa kakhulu,” kusho uColqhoun.UBurger uhlabane ngomklomelo weWorld Rugby ngo-2003 kanti uHabana waqokwa njengomdlali ovelele emhlabeni ngemuva kokusiza amaBhokobhoko anqobe iWorld Cup ngo-2007.UDyantyi usevele ufaniswa noHabana ngezinto eziningi. KumaBhokobhokko lesi siqethevu saseNgcobo sigqoka unombolo-11 njengoHabana.Inkakha enguHabana iphethe irekhodi lama-try amaningi emlandweni wamaBhokobhoko kanti ezinyangeni ezinhlanu uDyantyi edlala eqenjini lesizwe usekhombisile ukuthi ungumshini wama-try.Le nsizwa ibingelele nge-try iqala ngoJuni ukugqoka ijezi lamaBhokobhoko edlala ne-England kwi-Incoming Tour.Useqale imidlalo eyisishiyagalolunye wabasela ama-try ayisithupha.Wabasela ama-try amabili amaBhokobhoko eqopha umlando ehlula iNew Zealand okokuqala eWellington.Kuphethe ngokuthi aqede iRugby Championship ebambene ngamahlanu kwabahambe phambili ngokubasela ama-try.UDyantyi kumfanele kwazise neSuper Rugby ubeqala ukuyidlala kulo nyaka, emele iLions afinyelele kowamanqamu nayo.UDyantyi ubanga noJordan Larmour wase-Ireland noKarl Tu`inukuafe waseNew ealand.Asebeke bawunqoba lo mqhudelwano nguNehe Milner-Skudder noRieok Ioane baseZew Zealand noMaro Itoje wase-England.Ozodla ubhedu ngo-2018 uzokwethulwa kumaWorld Rugby Awards azoba seSalle des Etolies eMonte Carlo, eMonaco, eFrance ngoNovemba 25.
title: UDyantyi ethubeni lokuhlabana ngesomdlali ovelele emhlabeni

text:
MCEBO MPUNGOSEINGQUNGQUTHELA yengculazi i-International Aids Conference izobuya kuleli ngenyanga ezayo ihambisana nezihlabani ezimbili zaphesheya uQueen Latifah noCommon. Yagcina ukuba eNingizimu Afrika eminyakeni ewu-15. kulokhu izoba sedolobheni laseThekwini ngoJulayi 16.UCommon noQueen Latifah bazojoyina amanye amaciko akuleli okubalwa kuwo iMi Casa neBig Nuz eSahara Stadium Kingsmead. Kulo mcimbi kuzobe kungenwa mahhala kanti ngemuva kwawo kuzolandela imashi edolobheni laseThekwini, okuhloswe ngayo ukuthi kuxhaswe izinhlangano nezibhedlela ezisiza abanesifo sengculazi.Abahleli bomcimbi, i-Aids Healthcare Foundation (AHF), bathe ingqungquthela izohambisana nesiqubulo esithi 
Keep the Promise 2016. Kuzobe kungokokuqala uQueen Latifah ehambela eNingizimu Afrika.uQueen Latifah, ophinde abe ngumrepha, uzakhele udumo ngamafilimu okubalwa kuwo i
Set it Off, Bringing Down the House neChicago. Ekhuluma ngokuza kuleli uthe: “ngikujabulele kakhulu ukuba kuKeep the Promise eNingizimu Afrika futhi ngikuthokozele kakhulu ukuhamba ngaphansi kohlelo olufana nalolu.” UCommon yena kuzobe kungokokuqala enandisa kuleli noma eseke wavakasha. UCommon, osanda kunqoba i-Academy Award noJohn Legend ngeculo labo i
Glory, uzakhele udumo e-United States ngeculo i
Go nelithi 
Come Close.
title: Kuzotheleka izihlabani zaphesheya zizonandisa kweye-Aids eThekwini

text: USUSWE esikoleni ngenxa yezokuphepha uthishomkhulu waseNjomelwane High, eMelmoth ngemuva kokuthi abazali bephazamise ukuqala kokufunda ngoLwesithathu befuna axoshwe ngoba bekhala ngokuthi kwa-matric kuphase abafundi ababili kwabangu-40.Abazali bakulesi sikole bavale amasango befuna axoshwe uthishomkhulu abebesola yena ngokufeyila kwezingane.NgoLwesithathu kube nomhlangano wabazali nezikhulu zomnyango ebezizokhuluma ngalolu daba. Uthishomkhulu kuthiwa akaze alubhade esikoleni selokhu kuvulwe izikole.Kanti ngalolu suku kugcine sekufika amaphoyisa ezodambisa ulaka kubazali abebevale esangweni ngezingqwembe ebezixosha uthishomkhulu zikhononda nangothisha abafika bephuze utshwala esikoleni, zinemibhalo ebichitha nesigungu esilawula isikole.Omunye wabazali uMnuz Joe Madlokovu uthe sekuneminyaka isikole sabo singenzi kahle.“Size sacela induna ukuba ikhulume nothishomkhulu ukuze sihlangane naye sibonisane ngale nkinga. Kunokuba avume umhlangano wethu wavele wathi akakhulumi nabantu bangaphandle. Kulo nyaka kuvele kwakubi kakhulu ngoba ezinganeni ezingu-40 ebezibhala * -matric kuphase ezimbili kuphela. Sibuhlungu yikho sithi, akahambe!” kusho uMadlokovu.Omunye wothisha osesigungwini esilawula isikole, uNkk Nompumelelo Biyela, utshele umhlangano ukuthi inkinga ngabazali ngoba yibo abangabambisene nothisha.“Sinenkinga yokuthi abazali abezi ngisho emihlanganweni yesikole. Laba bazali abalapha ngiyaqala ukubabona, angibazi. Ngikhuluma nje nalesi sigungu asikhethwanga yibo kodwa kwathathwa abazali ababekhona emhlanganweni bafakwa kuso,” kubalisa uNkk Biyela.NgoMsombuluko kuzoba nomunye umhlangano kulesi sikole. Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe uthishomkhulu akamisiwe kodwa ususiwe ukuze kudanjiswe isimo ebesimanzonzo. Uthe abazali bavale amasango. “Isikole sithole * -33% okusho ukuthi kuphase abafundi abangu-7. Sekubunjwe ithimba elizobheka lolu daba ukuze isimo sibuyele kwesijwayelekile,” kusho uMahlambi.Induna yendawo, uMnuz Gerald Ngema, ithe izikhulu zomnyango zibatshele ukuthi okwamanje isikole sizohlala singenaye uthishomkhulu kuze kube abazali bayabonisana ngodaba lwakhe ngoba akekho omusha abazomthola.
title: Abazali babhodlele kuthishomkhulu

text: UNOZINTI ongukaputeni weKaizer Chiefs, u-Itumeleng Khune, kuthiwa uhambela phezulu kulezi zinsuku njengoba kunezinsolo zokuthi uthembise umshado intombi yakhe uSbahle Mpisane.USbahle, owaziwa ngelikaFitness Bunnie, udume ngokujima nokujimisa abantu. Uyindodakazi yezimpunyela zaseThekwini uSbu noShauwn Mpisane.Kulezi zinsuku ufake indandatho nokuqinisa izinsolo zokuthi yena noKhune bathembisene umshado.Umthombo weSolezwe ulipotshozele ukuthi uKhune uyachichima yinjabulo ngalokhu.“USbahle akusiyo nje intombi yakhe (Khune) kodwa ngumkakhe nokwenza sisole ukuthi indandatho akusiwo umhlobiso kodwa ngeyokuthembisa umshado,” kusho umthombo osondelene nalaba bobabili.Imizamo yokubathola ayiphumelelanga. Nemiyalezo abathunyelelwe yona kumaselula abo ngokwehlukana abayiphendulanga.Bobabili bebesendaweni yokujuxuza eMlaza, Eyadini Lounge, ngeSonto bengenankinga nokuthathwa izithombe.Ngonyaka odlule uSbahle wabhala ekhasini lakhe ku-Instagram ukuthi yena noKhune sebehlukene.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana muva nje bebelokhu befaka izithombe okubonakala ngathi basendaweni eyodwa yize bebengashuthi ndawonye.Nangesikhathi uSbahle emuliswa kubo uKhune waqeda ukudlala eGoli wabamba ibhanoyi elibheke eThekwini ukuzothamela umcimbi. Lokhu kwaqubula izinsolo zokuthi babuyelene.
title: UKhune uthembise uSbahle umshado?

text: UKUPHELA kweminyaka eyisikhombisa kwasungulwa i-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF), kuwubufakazi bokuthi iminyaka iyahamba abantu benganakile. I-EFF isungulwe ngo-July 26, 2013 eGoli , emuva kokuba uMnuz Julius Malema exoshwe kwi-ANC.Bagqamisa indaba yokunika abantu abamnyama umnotho nokubuyiswa umhlaba ngokushesha. Bathi izimayini kufanele zifakwe ngaphansi koMbuso ukuze kuhlomule abantu bakuleliNgoDisemba 2014 babambe ingqungquthela yabo yokukhetha ubuholi eBloemfontein, yaba yimpumelelo.Ngonyaka odlule ngoDisemba baye engqungqutheleni yobuholi ebiseNasrec, eGoli nalapho bekhethe ngempumelelo. I-EFF ifike ngomfutho kwezepolitiki yanyakazisa inkundla ikakhulu ePhalamende, lapho igqame khona kakhulu.Abantu abaningi ababengalinaki iPhalamende bebegcina belinaka ngoba i-EFF ibihlala iqhamuka nezigameko ezingajwayelekile, kokunye ezinodlambedlu. Okunye okwenze i-EFF yehluka wukuthi igqame ngobuholi babantu abasha abahlala benomfutho.Kabagcinanga nje ngokubanga umsindo kodwa namavoti abo anyukile ngonyaka odlule bathola izihlalo ePhalamende badlula amanye amaqembu abevele ekhona, nokuwubufakazi bokuthi bakhona abantu abawuzwayo umyalezo nombono wayo.Ngo-2014 babethole izihlalo ezingu-25 bengena okokuqala okhethweni kanti ngonyaka odlule zenyukele kwezingu-44 nokuchaza ukuthi bengeze ezingu-19. UNobhala -Jikele we-EFF uMnuz Marshall Dlamini uthi ukukhula kwe-EFF, iqede iminyaka eyisikhombisa akuyona inhlanhla nje kodwa kungenxa yemigomo yayo ephusile.Uthe imigomo yabo icace bha ngisho umuntu owelusa izimbuzi uma umbuza nge-EFF uyazi ukuthi imele ini futhi ayikaguquki. Uthe ngeke balwe babange izikhundla ngoba babeka abantu phambili hhayi izisu zabaholi beqembu labo."I-EFF yasungulelwa abantu baseNingizimu Afrika hhayi ukuhlomulisa abaholi bayo njengoba kwenza amanye amaqembu. Thina simele unogada, umuntu othela uphethiloli, osebenza ekhishini nasepulazini.“Bonke nje laba abanganakiwe abadlala inhlupheko. Sifuna ukukhulula labo bantu. Izwe silithanda ngaphezu kwe-EFF, yingakho nanamuhla sisamile,’’ kusho uDlamini.Ubonge abantu bakuleli ngokwethemba i-EFF nokuyamukela ngenkathi ingena kwezombusazwe.`I-EFF egubha iminyaka eyisikhombisa yafika nokugqoka ngendlela ehlukile ePhalamende njengoba idlubha izimpahla zokusebenza nomakalabhaIsithombe : PHANDO JIKELO/AFRICA NEWS AGENCY(ANA)Uthe sebeqinile ukhakhayi bakulungele ukuba ngabaholi bezwe kuwo wonke amazinga ngisho nakohulumeni basekhaya.UDlamini uthe kulo nyaka ngeke bakwazi ukuba nomcimbi wokugubha kodwa bazofundisa abantu ngepolitiki ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Abahlaziyi bezepolitiki baveze imibono yabo ehlukene ngohambo lwe-EFF, lweminyaka eyisikhombisa.UMnuz Xolani Dube weXubera Institute of Research and Development, uthi kufanele i-EFF ikalwe ngoshintho elwenze empilweni yabantu abamnyama.“Uma besePhalamende bavela njengenye ikhempu ye-ANC ngoba bakhuluma izindaba zayo zangaphakathi namahlazo ayo abawahletshelwa yiyona i-ANC.“Emakhanda abo nje kuduma izindaba ze-ANC. Indaba yepolitiki bona bayibuka njengebhizinisi lokuzenzela imali ukuze baphile. Kabanendaba kangako nabantu,’’ kusho uDube.Uthe i-EFF iholele abantu ophathe izenza sengathi imele usizi lwabo kanti ifuna ukubasebenzisela izidingo zayo zezepolitiki. Ukhale nangendaba yeVBS Mutual Bank wathi yenze i-EFF yaba nogcobho uma kuvela ukuthi yaba nesandla.UDube ukhale nangamalungu e-EFF ayesekhaleni le#FeesMustFall angena ePhalamende athula sengathi afile engabe aqhubeka nokulwela izitshudeni.USolwazi Bheki Mngomezulu ongumhlaziyi wezepolitiki uyibona ngenye indlela i-EFF.Uthi noma ngabe kukhona abangathandi kodwa i-EFF ifike nepolitiki eyehlukile ezweni.“Ifike nabaholi abasebasha futhi babeka izinto ngembaba nokufike kwathandwa yintsha yabajoyina, yabavotela ngobuningi.“Bathinta izihloko ezithinta abantu ngqo uma besePhalamende futhi kabananazi babuza ngomfutho, bangapheli mandla.“Uma bekhuluma kabahhemi nje kodwa bayezwakala ukuthi balwenzile ucwaningo futhi  bayayazi imithetho yePhalamende,’’ kusho uMngomezulu.Uthe enye into ebasizile wuqhekeko lwe-ANC olusobala futhi i-EFF ibilusebenzisa kakhulu. Uthe isizwa wukuthi kunezingede eqenjini elibusayo eziphakela i-EFF amahlazo nezimfihlo zalo.Uyincome kakhulu ngokuba nengqungquthela yobuholi ebe wuthula msindo.UMngomezulu uthe kodwa akayiniki lutho i-EFF okhethweni lohulumeni bezindawo uma kwenzeka luba khona ngonyaka ozayo.
title: I-EFF yafika yanyakazisa ePhalamende

text: KUFE amadoda amabili kwalimala eyodwa emuva kokuba imoto abehamba ngayo ithelwe ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu phezu kwebhuloho lomgwaqo uR102 elihlukanisa iDuffs Road neMount Moria, eThekwini ngoMsombuluko ntambama.Imoto iVW Golf 7 R emhlophe abehamba ngayo ibimbobombobo yizinhlamvu, igazi lichaphazeleke yonke indawo.Kuthiwa ibime erobhothini ngo-4.20 ntambama kanti kuzoqhamuka imoto ebihamba abantu abafike bavulela ngenhlamvu bebhekise kuyo.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa athole izibhamu ebhuthini yemoto.Kuphazamiseke ukuhamba kwezimoto ezingenela emgwaqweni omkhulu uDumisani Makhaye ngesikhathi sesiphithiphithi santambama.Kuthiwa amadoda abesuka ngaseBridge City elibangise eClermont kanti kuzoqhamuka abantu abafike bawathunqisela ngomsizi. Enye indoda kuthiwa iyelulama esibhedlela.Umshayeli wemoto, uMnuz Thulani Jeffrey Zondi, ufe ujuqu, omunye umgibeli ufe emuva kwesikhashana endaweni yobugebengu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala nelokuzama ukubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa eGreenwood Park.UColonel Mbele uthe amaphoyisa afice izidumbu ezimbili emotweni zinamanxeba okudutshulwa ekhanda nasemzimbeni.“Indoda yesithathu inqwindwe yinhlamvu ekhanda yaphuthunyiswa esibhedlela. Kusolwa ukuthi ababulewe bayathinteka emacaleni okubulala nelokuzama ukubulala KwaDabeka okwenzeka ngoFebhuwari 8. Kwafa abantu abathathu,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Kwesinye isehlo esenzeke ngoMsombuluko ntambama, uColonel Mbele uthe kudutshulwe abangani abaneminyaka ewu-23 no-39 eMolweni, eThekwini.“Baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela lapho befike bashonela khona. Kuvulwe amacala amabili aphenywa amaphoyisa seHillcrest,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Kuthiwa uMnuz Cyril Maduna (39) udutshulwe ngabantu abangaziwa engena kwakhe ngemoto.Abahlaseli bamdubule bephindelela besemotweni kodwa wangena kwakhe.“Ngenkathi sebebaleka ngemoto, badubule indoda ewumakhelwane kaMaduna ebonile ngenkathi edutshulwa,” kusho umthombo.
title: Amadoda amabili adutshulwe afa emgwaqeni

text: SEKUQUBUKE inkombankombane phakathi kwe-ANC ne-IFP ngokuqhubeka kokubhuntsha kwemihlangano yomkhandlu wesifunda uMkhanyakude.Izolo kuphinde kwabhuntsha omunye umhlangano womkhandlu ngenxa yokungafiki kwamakhansela enza isibalo esanele ukuthi kuhlale umhlangano womkhandlu.Kulo mhlangano bekufanele kulalelwe isiphakamiso sokungabethembi ubuholi beMeya, uMnuz Tim Moodley, oyikhansela le-IFP, kepha umhlangano wabhuntsha ngenxa yokungafiki kwamakhansela e-IFP.Lo mkhandlu wafakwa ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli ngoFebhuwari. Ukungahlali kwemihlangano yomkhandlu kungesinye sezizathu ezaholela ukuthi lo mkhandlu ufakwe ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli.Njengoba le nkinga isalokhu iqhubeke njalo yize sekuphele izinyanga ezintathu umkhandlu wafakwa ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli, sekuqubule inkombankombane phakathi kwe-ANC ne-IFP ngokuthi yiliphi iqembu eliyimbangela yokuthi imihlangano ingahlali?I-IFP isanda kubhalela uNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, inxusa ukuba kuxoshwe wonke amakhansela e-ANC, abathi yiwona alovayo emhlanganweni.Kule ncwadi, i-IFP esifundeni uMkhanyakude, yesabisa ngokungalubhadi emhlanganweni yomkhandlu uma uHlomuka engangeneleli.USihlalo we-IFP kulesi sifunda, uMnuz Makhosonke Sithole, uthe izinkinga eziningi zaqala emva kokuthi I-IFP ifuna ukube kwethulwe imibiko yenkohlakalo emhlanganweni womkhandlu.USithole uthe emva kwalokho, imihlangano kayibange isahlala ngenxa yokungafiki kwamakhansela e-ANC emihlanganweni.Ubale imihlangano eyisihlanu egcine ngokubhuntsha ngenxa yokungafiki kwamakhansela e-ANC. Manje uSithole ufuna axoshwe onke lawo amakhansela."Empeleni bazixoshe bona laba bantu ngoba umthetho olawula ukuziphatha kwamakhansela awukuvumi ukuthi amakhansela aphuthe emihlanganweni emithathu ilandelana ngaphandle kwesizathu."USithole uthe futhi kabahambisani nokuqokwa kukaMnuz Thokozani Ngema njengosomlomo walo mkhandlu, oqokwe ngenyanga eyedlule kulandela ukusula kukaMnuz Solomon Msane.USithole uthe uNgema kwakungafanele aqokelwe kulesi sikhundla ngoba kufanele engabe akasesilona ikhansela lomkhandlu.USithole uthe bazonikeza uHlomuka amasonto amabili ukuba aphendule, wathi uma ehluleka, udaba bazolufaka enkantolo. Kepha uNobhala we-ANC esifundeni iFar North, uMnuz Siphile Mdaka, uthe amakhansela e-IFP yiwona angafiki emihlanganweni.Ubale imihlangano emine ebhuntshile ngenxa yokungafiki kwamakhansela e-IFP.“Ikhona le nto bona abayibalekelayo. Kuwubuxoki ukuthi babhale incwadi ekubeni bazi kahle ukuthi imbangela yokubhuntsha kwemihlangano ukungafiki kwamakhansela abo.”Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisa neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Senzelwe Mzila, uthe uHlomuka uzolubhekisisa lolu daba uma eseyitholile incwadi ebhalwe yi-IFP.
title: Kubhuntshe umhlangano ngenkombankombane ye-ANC ne-IFP

text: SIPHAZAMISE imingcwabo isiteleka sabamakhaza kahulumeni asemgwaqweni uGale eThekwini njengoba izidumbu zabashonile zingadedelwa.Izolo Isolezwe likhulume nemindeni emibili ngaphandle kwalawa makhaza ilindele ukulanda izidumbu kodwa bathola ukuthi akusetshenzwa njengoba kutelekiwe.Omunye umndeni uveze ukuthi asemabili amasonto behlezi emakhandleleni bengalutholi usizo kulawa makhaza.UNksz Zandile Dube, oshonelwe umyeni wakhe uMnuz Khayelihle Mfeka, baseNdwedwe, uthe akasazi kumele enze njani.“Umyeni wami ushone ngo-Agasti 26 esibhedlela. Wayekade esengozini yemoto. Ulethwe kulawa makhaza. Bekumele singcwabe ngoMgqibelo odlule kodwa akwenzekanga njengoba bengilokhu ngigqigqa lapha, isidumbu kuthiwa ngeke ngisithole ngoba kunesiteleka. Ngifike ekuseni (izolo) ngoba bangishayele ucingo bethi isidumbu sihlinziwe. Uma sengilapha bathi ngeke banginikeze ngoba bona batelekile, abasebenzi. Ngihlukumezekile ukuthi umyeni wami ushonile, manje sengihlukunyezwa yilesi simo sabasebenzi engingahlangene nhlobo naso,” kusho uNksz Dube ezikhalela.Udadewabo, uNksz Dolly Hlela, uthe manje abasazi ngempela ukuthi babatsheleni abomndeni nezihlobo ngomngcwabo, uthe abanye bafikile ngoMgqibelo odlule bezitshela ukuthi bayangcwaba. Omunye umndeni obuvela eMandeni ngethemba lokuthi uzothola isidumbu, nawo ubuyele emuva ulambatha.UNkk Qhamukile Ndlovu, ubezolanda isidumbu sikamfowabo uMnuz Sipho Ngcobo.“Umfowethu ushone ngoMsombuluko, besihlele ukuthi simfihle ngoMgqibelo. Njengoba singasitholi isidumbu namhlanje, asikwazi nokuthola isitifiketi sokushona kwakhe. Lokhu kuphazamisa ukuyofaka isicelo semali emshwalensini wethu. Umngcwabo ungahle uhlehle uma singasitholi lesi sidumbu. Okusiphatha kabi ukuthi sithintwe kuthiwa kumele sizolanda isidumbu namhlanje (izolo). Uma sesifika bathi batelekile bona,” kusho uNkk Ndlovu.Lo mndeni ubusuhamba nemoto yabamakhaza abo azimele.Uthe umfowabo wawelwa udonga lendlu eyayishile.UNobhala wenyunyana yabasebenzi basemakhazeni kahulumeni, iPublic and Allied Workers Union (Pawusa), uMnuz Halalisani Gumede, uthe abasebenzi abaneme ngesinqumo sabaphathi sokubuyisa umphathi abebengasebenzisani kahle naye nowasuswa ngowayengungqongqoshe uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo. Uthe abasebenzi bazibona besazoqhubeka nokuhlukumezeka uma kubuyiswa lo mphathi.“Isenzo sabaphathi sikhombisa ukungabi nandaba nomphakathi ngoba ngenxa yaso sekuzophazamiseka izinhlelo zemindeni zokungcwaba,” kusho uGumede.Uthe izolo akuzange kwenziwe lutho kulawa makhaza ngoba izidumbu azilandwanga ezibhedlela kanti futhi azizange zihlinzwe.UGumede uthe bacele umhlangano ophuthumayo noNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo esifundazweni uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu ukuze badingide izinkinga ezikhona emakhazeni kahulumeni.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Noluthando Nkosi, uthe: “Umnyango uyazi futhi ukhathazekile ngokuphazamiseka kokusebenza emakhazeni akuGale (Magwaza Maphalala). Umnyango ungakuqinisekisa ukuthi kukhona izingxoxo phakathi kwawo nama-shop steward amele abasebenzi ukuze kutholakale isisombululo. Umnyango uzimisele ngokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imindeni edinga ukufihla izihlobo zayo izokwazi.Umnyango ufisa ukukhumbuza abasebenzi bezimo ezibucayi nezibalulekile njengalaba ukuthi abavumelekile ukuzibandakanya nezenzo eziphazamisa ukusebenza ngoba lokho kungabafaka enkingeni.”
title: Kuhlehle imingcwabo kutelekwa emakhazeni

text: UCWEBE izinyembezi uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa emenyezelwa njengomengameli omusha we-ANC izolo njengoba ehlule uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma kwesokuhola le nhlangano.URamaphosa uthole amavoti angu-2 440 kwathi uDkt Dlamini Zuma wathola angu-2 261.Ngesikhathi eya esteji uRamaphosa ubephelezelwa abebemeseka bemhalalisela.Amaphoyisa nonogada bebegudluza abebemhalalisela.Ubonakale ecweba izinyembezi uRamaphosa wathula wahlanganisa izandla sengathi ushaya umthandazo omncane.UMnuz David Mabuza, udle umhlanganiso kwesePhini likaMengameli ngamavoti angu-2 538 wahlula uNksz Lindiwe Sisulu ngamavoti angu-2 159.KwesikaSihlalo kaZwelonke uMnuz Gwede Mantashe uthole amavoti angu-2 418 ehlula uMnuz Nathi Mthethwa ngamavoti angu-2 269.KwesikaNobhala Jikelele uMnuz Senzo Mchunu owayengundunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal ukhale ngaphansi ngamavoti angu-2 336 ehlulwa nguMnuz Ace Magashule ngamavoti angu-2 360.KwesePhini likaNobhala Jikelele uNksz Jessie Duarte uthole amavoti angu-2 474 ehlula uNksz Zingiswa Losi ngamavoti angu-2 213.KwesikaMgcinimafa uMnuz Paul Mashatile uthole amavoti angu-2 517 ehlula uNkk Maite Nkoana Mashabane ngamavoti angu-2 178.Okucacile wukuthi zombili izinhlangothi zimelelekile ebuholini njengoba uMabuza, Magashule, noNksz Duarte bebehamba noDkt Dlamini Zuma kanti uMashatile noMantashe bebehamba noRamaphosa.Ngemuva kokumenyezelwa kwemiphumela uDkt Dlamini Zuma wangane noRamaphosa.NguNksz Duarte kuphela umuntu wesifazane osebuholini be-ANC.Isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal sikhale ngaphansi njengoba kungekho noyedwa okhethiwe esigungwini esiphezulu se-ANC.Abeseka uRamaphosa bagubhe ubusuku bonke kanti izolo ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa imiphumela bese iqalile imigubho lapho ezalwa khona eSoweto.Kube nokubambezeleka kokukhishwa kwemiphumela njengoba kuze kwamenyezelwa ngo-7 ebusuku ekubeni bekulindeleke ukuthi kumenyezelwe ngo-5 ntambama.Noma i-ANC ingazange ichaze ukuthi yini ebibambile kodwa imibiko engaqinisekisiwe ithe bekuphindwa kubalwa amavoti ngoba abebesengqungqutheleni bebethi cishe kuphindwe kathathu ukubalwa.UNksz Bontle Mpakanyane, wenhlangano yezokhetho i-EleXions Agency, kuthe efika wathi ngeke esasichitha isikhathi wamemezela imiphumela.Ngaphambi kokuba kumenyezelwe imiphumela bekuculwa izingoma ezeseka uRamaphosa noDkt Dlamini Zuma.Umengameli weCosatu, uMnuz Sdumo Dlamini, uthe kudingeka i-ANC ibumbane wathi amaphutha enzekile phakathi kwamadlelandawonye kumele angaphinde enzeke.“Imigomo ye-ANC kumele kuqinisekiswe ukuthi iyafuqwa. Kumele kufuqwe imigomo yezinguquko kwezomnotho,” kusho uDlamini.UNobhala jikelele we-SACP, uDkt Blade Nzimande, uthe izwe liyayidinga i-ANC ebuholini.Uthe kumele i-ANC ingakuthathi kancane ukwehlelwa wukwesekwa okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya.Umholi we-DA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane uthe uRamaphosa ngeke ayihlenge i-ANC.“URamaphosa usehola iqembu elizibhekelela lona elikhohliwe abantu abahluphekayo. Sekukubantu ukuthi ngo-2019 bakhiphe i-ANC emandleni,” kusho uMaimane.
title: Izinyembezi zenjabulo kuRamaphosa enqoba

text: USELAHLE ithemba ngokwenza umsebenzi othinta ibhola owayewunyazi lomgadli weqembu lesizwe labesifazane iBanyana Banyana, njengoba esephila ngokubamba itoho esitolo samaChina sezingubo zabesifazane.UVeronica ‘Bhudu’ Phewa (38) odabuka esigodini KwaManqoba, KwaNyuswa uxoxe neSolezwe ngeSonto maqondana nomsebenzi awenzayo wokusiza esitolo ekubeni wake waduma wadlala naphesheya kwezilwandle.Ithimba laleli phephanda lifice uPhewa ematasa nomsebenzi epakisha izimpahla phakathi esitolo ebonakala ukuthi usewujwayele umsebenzi. Ubedlubhe nomfaniswano wasemsebenzini kulesi sitolo esisenxanxatheleni ePinetown.“Angiboni ukuthi kukhona okusazohlangana ngoba iSafa ayikaze yangithinta nje ngisho ukuzwa impilo lokhu. Ngihlale phansi ngabona ukuthi ngeke kungisize ngalutho ukubhuquza ekhaya ngizogcina ngiswela ngisho izinto zokugcoba ngibe umthwalo,” kuchaza uVeronica.Uthe useze wajwayela njengoba kuhlala kufika abantu esitolo bambuze imibuzo eminingi bethi ubekwa yini ezitolo zezimpahla ngoba bamazi njengesikwebhisi somgadli weqembu lesizwe.Uthe abantu kufanele bakuqonde ukuthi akayisebenzisanga budedengu imali njengoba esebamba amatoho ezitolo. Ugcizelele ukuthi yayingekho imali ebholeni labantu besifazane, babethola onsumbulwana nje abangatheni.“Ngangize ngisizwe abaxhasi bami bakwaNike ababenginika imali njalo uma ngishaye igoli. Akufani neBafana Bafana lapho abayikha ngamafosholo khona imali. Uma umuntu ebizwa kuBafana Bafana uthola imali ngalokho nje kukodwa engakadlali. Thina kwakunzima ngoba nabaxhasi bebengekho kahle, kwakuba wuthando lwethu lwebhola.”LAPHA UVeronica Phewa wathathwa edlalela iqembu lesizwe iBanyana Banyana bebhekene neTanzania bedlalela eHunters Field, eKatlehong. Kulo mdlalo uVeronica washaya igoli Isithombe: Etienne RothbartUveze ukuthi namanje awukho umehluko ongako ebholeni labesifazane njengoba kuculwa amaculo okuthi lizonakwa akuvulwe neligi ebhekene ngqo nabo bathole abaxhasi. Uthando lwebhola alukapheli enhliziyweni yakhe njengoba ethi ubuye asize abadlali abasafufusa ngakubo abaqeqeshe njengoba yena enolwazi olunzulu.Okhulumela iSafa, uDominic Chimavhi, uvele wabhoka ngolaka wazihlangula wathi akufanele kugxekwe bona ngalolu daba ngoba bayinhlangano yebhola futhi safika sedlula isikhathi sikaPhewa abamkweleti lutho.UVeronica esagijima phesheya kwezilwandle ubekwi-Arsenal e-England, iFC Indiana yase-USA neNaftohimik WFC yase-Ukraine. Uhlome nangeziqu zokuqeqesha, iD Licence, ayenze ngaphansi kohlelo lweSasfa.
title: Uqhatha usizi owayeyisihlabani seBanyana

text: SEKUNOKUNGABONI ngaso linye mayelana nokumenywa kowayengumengameli we-ANC nezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, emibuthanweni yesifunda sakhe, iMusa Dladla, ngenxa yokuthi kuthiwa kwenziwa ngabamsebenzisayo ukudala uqhekeko endaweni.Lokhu kuthiwa kwenziwa ngabanganeme ngobuholi obakhethwa engqungqutheleni ebingenyanga eyedlule yesiFunda.Kuthiwa sekube nemicimbi eminingana ye-ANC uZuma abonakala esevumbuka kuyo kodwa ubuholi obumphethe bube bungazi lutho futhi bungazange bummeme.Kukhalwa ngokuthi labo abangaphumelelanga engqungqutheleni benza isiqiniseko sokuthi uZuma uba ngumuntu osondelene nabo ukuze kubukeke sengathi ubuholi obusha bangakubo sebumjikele abusamfuni.IMusa Dladla ihlanganisa iNkandla, Mthonjaneni, iShowe, iMpangeni neRichards Bay.Okhulumela i-ANC eMusa Dladla, uMnuz Nathi Xulu, uthe okwakamuva kube yinkonzo yesikhumbuzo yesigagayi senhlangano, uMnuz Sthe Sibiya, waseShowe.“Enkonzweni ubuholi bubone sekutheleka uZuma bungazi lutho. Kuthe uma sekuvela kwatholakala ukuthi umenywe yilaba abehlulwa engqungqutheleni nababehambisana noNkk Nonhle Mkhulise. Empeleni sinenkinga yokuthi kubikelwa uNkk Mkhulise, osanda kuphuma ekubeni wuSihlalo, izinto ezisuke zidinga ubuholi obakhethwa kodwa bona abaziswa lutho.
