Nakulolu daba lukaZuma uthola ukuthi kusuke kubikelwe yena kodwa ebe engeseyena usihlalo we-ANC,” kusho uXulu.Abanye babaholi bezinhlaka ze-ANC eMusa Dladla, abacele ukungadalulwa, baveze ukuthi lobu buholi obukhona manje abuzazi ukuthi bumiphi kodwa buqalaza lapho okunebhodwe eliconsayo khona yingakho bungaphumeli obala ngokuseka uZuma.“Empeleni ukusekwa ngokuphelele kukaMsholozi ezinkingeni abhekene nazo kulesi siFunda naye adabuka kuso kwagcina ngesikhathi sikaThulani Mashaba ngoba nomama uNonhle Mkhulise uzamile ukuhamba kuleyo ndlela kaMashaba kodwa kwacaca ukuthi usesala yedwa ngoba abaholi sebeqala ukudonsa izinyawo. Kube mandla kakhulu sesibuya eNasrec ngoba abanye sebefuna ukubonakala behamba noMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa. Siqale sathi benza ngoba ubuholi bukazwelonke bathi buzoziqhelelanisa noZuma enkantolo kodwa sibona abaholi balapha sebeziqhelelanisa nangokwesiqu sabo kuye.Muva nje bekunomkhuleko eMnyakanya obuhlelwe abefundisi kuthandazelwa ukuthi uZuma ahambe kahle emacaleni. Kulowo mkhuleko akufikanga noyedwa umholi waseMusa Dladla, kunalokho kwafika uMama uNonhle Mkhulise naye ezizela njengeMeya,” kusho omunye wabaholi ocele ukungadalulwa.Ephendula uXulu uthe umkhuba wokwenza sengathi uZuma ungowabathile kuphela ubaphethe kabi.‘”Okokuqala thina siyisifunda esihamba phambili ekushumayeleni ivangeli lobumbano. Yingakho kuthe uma sibuya engqungqutheleni sacela amanye amaqabane abehambisana noNonhle Mkhulise, owehlulwa esikhundleni sokuba nguSihlalo, ukuthi angene esigungwini sobuholi obusha. Sayivala le nto eyenzeke phambilini lapho kukhona amaqabane abesekhishwa inyumbazane eseyizinto ezingelutho ngoba nakhu engayinqobanga ingqungquthela. Le nkonzo eshiwoyo yaqondana nosuku lapho abaholi babekhankasa khona eMangidini, belungisela nokhetho lwaseMthonjaneni,” kusho uXulu.Uthe ebuholini akekho umuntu ozonda uZuma noma osemjikele ngoba abaholi ababenoMashaba basekhona namanje esigungwini futhi abananxa noZuma.Lapha ubebala uMnuz Mduduzi Mhlongo, osenguSihlalo omusha, uNkk Thembeka Mchunu, oseyiphini likaSihlalo noyiNkosikazi kaMnuz Senzo Mchunu, uMnuz Tholi Gwala, obuyiselwe ekubeniuNobhala.Imizamo yokuthola uNkk Mkhulise kayiphumelelanga. Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela, kwale noma esethunyelelwa umqhafazo.
title: Kuhlukene ukubona ngoZuma

text: USHAYE ungqimphothwe ngesenzo sakhe sokuxolisa emphakathini wabenkolo yamaSulumane, uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Bheki Cele.Esitatimendeni esifakwe ekhasini lamaphoyisa kwiTwitter ngokhulumela ihhovisi likaCele, uBrigadier Mathapelo Peters, ugcizelela ukuthi ukuxolisa kukaCele kuhumusheke ngendlela okungesiyo.“Ungqongqoshe uyakugxeka ngayo yonke indlela ukuhlangana kwabenkolo yamaSulumane njengoba kuphambene nemigomo enqabela imihlangano ukuze kungasabalali iCoronavirus. Ukuqaphele ukuthi kunabahumusha isitatimende esikhishwe yihhovisi lakhe ngesixoliso esigcizelela ukuthi akekho ongaphezu komthetho ngakho abenkolo yamaSulumane abatholi ukuphathwa kangcono kunabezinye izinkolo,” kusho uPeters.Uthe uma kuphinde kuba khona okunye ukuhlangana okuthinta inkolo, amaphoyisa ayokwenza okufanayo abophe abaphula umthetho ngaphandle kokuthi adelele inkolo yabazobe beboshwa wathi lokhu kufaka zonke izinkolo.“Amaphoyisa ethu kumele enze umsebenzi ngokulandela imigomo yokusebenza. Selokhu kuqale ukuvalwa thaqa kwezwe sithole izikhalo eziningi ezivela kubantu abehlukene ngokungalungile okwenziwe ngamaphoyisa, zonke lezo zikhalo ziyaphenywa ngabophiko olubhekele ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa i-Independent Police Investigate Directorate (Ipid).” kusho uCele.Abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bagxeke uCele ngokubukela phansi ezinye izinkolo njengoba kuke kwaba khona izithombe ezitshengisa ubudlova bamaphoyisa echitha imisamo yabantu kunemicimbi yesintu.Khonamanjalo, kuboshwe abazalwane abangu-41 ezehlweni ezehlukene ngempelasonto. Kwesokuqala uphiko lweTactical Response, lubophe abantu abangu-17 ngoLwesihlanu ngo-1 emini.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuleli, uBrig Vishnu Naidoo, uthe laba baboshwe kwisakhiwo sasePitoli kade besenkonzweni.“Abasolwa abangu-17 basagcinwe emaphoyiseni ukuze kuqinisekiswe ubuzwe babo eMnyangweni wazaseKhaya. Bazodedelwa ngebheyili noma bakhokhiswe inhlawulo noma bavele enkantolo,” kusho uNaidoo.Esigamekweni sesibili, kuboshwe abazalwane abangu-24 ngoMgqibelo, eMpumalanga.“Kuzo zombili lezi zigameko baphule imithetho kathaqa,” kusho uNaidoo.UNaidoo unxuse ukuba abazenkolo ezahlukene balandele imithetho kathaqa.
title: Bathi sihunyushwe kabi isixoliso sikaCele

text: AMAPHOYISA aphenya ngecala lokubulala ngemuva kokudutshulwa kushone umnikazi wamatekisi akusoseshini iDolphin Coast Taxi, ngaKwaDukuza, ngoLwesithathu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Col Thulani Zwane, uthe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-40 udutshulwe washona ehleli emotweni yakhe iMercedes Benz ngehora lesishiyagalolunye ekuseni.“Kukholakala ukuthi uhlaselwe abasolwa ehleli emotweni yakhe ebipakile. Abasolwa babaleke ngezinyawo emva kokumdubula. Icala libe selivulwa emaphoyiseni aseMhlali,” kusho uLt Col Zwane.Ngenkathi abosizo oluphuthumayo befika ndaweni yesigameko bafice owesilisa obesemotweni yakhe eseshonile.Okhulumela abosizo oluphuthumayo, i-International Prostate Symptom Score (IPSS), uMnuz Paul Herbst, uthe umsolwa udutshulwe kaningi.UMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal uthe ukhathazekile ngokwanda kwezigameko zokubulawa kosomatekisi.Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Kwanele Ncalane, uthe ukubulawa kosomatekisi kudala ukwesaba kubantu abakule mboni.“Sihlela ukuhlangana neSouth African National Taxi Association (Santaco) ukuze sidingide izinkinga ezibhekene nomkhakha wamatekisi,” kusho uNcalane.Uthe ababaningi ososeshini abanenkinga yokubulawa kosomatekisi kodwa uthe inkinga yokubulawa kwabo kumele ixazululwe.USihlalo weSantaco, uMnuz Boy Zondi, uthe ushaqekile ngalesi senzo.“Asikho isidingo sokubulalana phakathi kosomatekisi. Sigqugquzela ukuthi osomatekisi uma benezinkinga baxoxisane ukuze baxazulule izinkinga,” kusho uZondi.
title: Uphenyo ngokufa kukasomatekisi

text: SEKUZOPHELA ukuhamba amabanga amade beyotheza izinkuni abantu baseNquthu esigodini sakwaQwabe kulandela ukwethulwa kohlelo lukagesi olwethulwe ngoLwesibili.Lolu hlelo lokufakelwa kwemizi engu-461 ugesi olubiza uR5 million lwethulwe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMidlalo ezobuCiko namaSiko, KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Hlengiwe Mavimbela obemele uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka.Lolu hlelo lwethulwe ku-ward 2 kwaQwabe.IPhini leMeya yaseNquthu, uNksz Nothile Zungu, lithe bese kuyiminyaka umphakathi ukhahlanyezwa izigameko zokwebiwa kwemfuyo.“Obekubuhlungu ukuthi indawo yakwaQwabe ibisifana nesiqhingi ngoba kuyiyo yodwa ebingenawo ugesi njengoba zonke izigodi eyakhelene nazo okuyiseSandlwana, KwaNyezi, eNgxibongo nakoHlazakazi sekunogesi. Okunye esifisa kucace ukuthi abantu bakwaQwabe abakaze bathi abawufuni ugesi ngoba bethi uzoxhopha izinkomo. Yinkolelo leyo ebifafazwa abantu abangenalo iqiniso ngomphakathi wakule ndawo,” kusho uNksz Zungu.UNksz Mavimbela uthe impilo yabantu bakwaQwabe ayisophinde ifane ngoba sebezoyeka ukuvuka ekuseni ngovivi beyotheza izinkuni, bashiye izingane zilele ngenxa yokuthi manje sebezofakelwa ugesi emzini yabo.“Kade sihamba lapha sikhuluma nomphakathi ngesikhathi kuza ukhetho. Ngakho izikhalo nosizi lwale ndawo sikuqonda kahle kakhulu njengohulumeni oholwa uKhongolose neniwukhethe kulezi zinyanga ezimbili ezedlule. UNdunankulu ubaba uSihle Zikalala ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yesifundazwe uzibophezele njengohulumeni ukuthi sizobeka eqhulwini uhlelo lokuhanjiswa kwezidingo zabantu. Namhlanje silapha sihambisana nesikhondlakhondla senkampani kagesi okungu-Eskom, sizothi luyaqala luyashikisha ufudu. Ukufakwa kukagesi kule ndawo kuzokwenza nezinhlelo zamanzi ezenziwayo zisheshe,” kusho uNksz Mavimbela.Uthe bayazi ukuthi udaba lwamanzi lube wuhlupho kakhulu kulo mphakathi ngenxa yezigebengu ebezitshontsha ama-generator aphehla amanzi.Uthe usonkontileka ozofaka ugesi uzoqala kuleli sonto.UNkk Phetheni Mbokazi oyilungu lo mphakathi uthe kubajabulise kakhulu ukuthi ngemuva kweminyaka sebezoba nogesi. Uthe besebefile ukutheza izinkuni kude namadaka ezinkomo abebebasa ngawo.
title: Injabulo kwethulwa uhlelo lukagesi eNquthu

text: UGWETSHWE udilikajele neminyaka engu-15 eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini owesilisa olahlwe yicala lokubamba inkunzi nelokudlwengula.UReggie Dlamini (36) ugwetshwe yinkantolo ngoLwesithathu emuva kokulahlwa yicala elithinta owesifazane oneminyaka engu-53.Kuthiwa owesifazane wagitsheliswa imoto nguDlamini ngasemgwaqweni uManor Drive eMbilo. Esesemotweni kuthiwa uDlamini washayela imoto yabheka emathuneni. Kuthiwa wafika emathuneni wambopha owesifazane wamdlwengula ephindelela maqede wabaleka nezimpahla zakhe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni uLieutenant-Colonel Thulani Zwane uthe owesifazane waficwa amaphoyisa esaboshelwe esihlahleni emathuneni.Uthe umsolwa wazama ukubaleka kodwa amaphoyisa ambamba.“Kwavulwa icala lokudlwengula esiteshini eMbilo, idokodo ladluliselwa ophikweni oluphenya amacala odlame lomndeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane nawocansi. Umsolwa uvalelwe esitokisini waze wagwetshwa,” kusho uZwane.Umsolwa ugwetshwe udilikajele ecaleni lokudlwengula, wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-15 kwelokubamba inkunzi.
title: Udilikajele neminyaka engu-15 ngelokudlwengula nenkunzi

text: UZOTSHALWA esithe ngokwesiko uNdlunkulu Mantfombi Shiyiwe Dlamini Zulu (65), okhothame eyiBambabukhosi lombuso kaZulu. Isilo esisanda kukhothama, uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu, satshalwa ngokwemfihlo kodwa uhulumeni wasihlonipha ngenkonzo yomgcwabo wombuso ngokwesigaba sokuqala, lapho kwakukhona umengameli wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa. Umthombo upotshozile ukuthi isihlalo sobukhosi sisendlini yaKwaKhangelamankengane, futhi igama eliseqhulwini ngelikaMntwana uMisuzulu ozalwa wuNdlunkulu okhotheme. Umthombo osondelene namalungiselelo uthi kuzocishe kufane nokweSilo ukutshalwa kwakhe. “Angithi, ngoba ubehleli esihlalweni vele uyiyo inkosi, kufanele abekwe ngendlela yakhona. Angase abekwe ngoLwesihlanu entathakusa uma konke kuhambe kahle. Silinde nohulumeni ukuthi asho ukuthi uzohlonishwa ngasiphi isigaba sokutshwalwa wumbuso,’’ kusho umthombo ozazi ukusuka nokuhla ezaseNdlunkulu. Umthombo udalule ukuthi kunethimba laseNdlunkulu eliphume laphikelela eSwatini, liyobikela iNgonyama uMswati Wesithathu ngokusithela kukadadewabo. Kuthiwa kunezingxoxo nohulumeni wesifundazwe obona kufanele ahlonishwe ngendlela emfanele uNdlunkulu, sekuzolindwa umengameli wezwe. Ngesikhathi siloba belisahambile ithimba laseNdlunkulu laya eGoli, ukuyolanda uNdlunkulu lapho akhothamele khona esibhedlela eMilpark.Phakathi kwabebezolila kufike iMeya yaKwaNongoma, uMnuz Albert Mncwango, omemezele ukuthi bewumkhandlu banqume ukuhlonipha uNdlunkulu ngokumisa eminye imisebenzi yomkhandlu kuze kwedlule ukutshalwa kwayo. UMncwango ubabaze amagalelo kaNdlunkulu ekuthuthukiseni amasiko, wathi bazohlala bemkhumbula abantu baKwaNongoma. Okhulumela ihhovisi likaNdunankulu KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Lennox Mabaso, uthi uhulumeni uzomemezela uma kukhona isinqumo esithathiwe ngokutshalwa kukaNdlunkulu. Akabange esafuna ukwanda kakhulu ngamaningi maqondana nalolu daba.
title: Kuzoba yimfihlo ukutshalwa kukaNdlunkulu weSilo

text: SEKUQUBUKE umbango ngaphakathi kwiKaizer Chiefs ngokuthi yikuphi lapho kufanele abonakale khona okokuqala edlubhe umfaniswano waleli qembu uNkanyiso Nene obengukaputeni weNedbank Ke Yona Team waphinde wawela kuMakhosi ngesikhathi (abeKe Yona) sebabelwa amaqembu e-Absa Premiership.UNene (22) waseMgungundlovu ulihole njengesibani iqembu leKe Yona nakuba ligcine likhale ngaphansi ngo 2-1 kompetha beNedbank Cup iFree State Stars. Ngaphandle kombango ongaphakathi kwiChiefs, umthombo wethu okwiMamelodi Sundowns usitshele ukuthi bayamnyonyobela kodwa konke kulele ekutheni iChiefs iyamsayinisa ngokushesha yini noma izoqale ilinde njengoba ihlale yenza.Okwenza kube sambango kwiChiefs wukuthi iqembu alazi noma limsebenzise kwiMacufe Cup abayidlala neBloemfontein Celtic ngeSonto ngo-3 ntambama, eFree State Stadium noma adlaliswe kwiMultichoice Diski Challenge (MDC) ngalo iSonto.IChiefs, eholwa u-Arthur “10111” Zwane, izobhekana neFree State Stars kwiDiski Challenge ngo-12 emini eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont.UZwane kuthiwa uyena omuzwa ngaphakathi kakhulu uNene kangangokuba ube nesandla ekutheni lisheshe lifike iphepha elikhulula lo mdlali eqenjini abelidlalela. Ubegijima kwiDynamos edlala kwiKZN ABC Motsepe League.Kuthiwa ngisho bengakabiwa abadlali beKe Yona uZwane ubelokhu eyicele njalo iChiefs ukuthi imlande lo mdlali.Kusukela efikile kwiChiefs uNene ubeziqeqesha nawo womabili amaqembu eChiefs. Kwesinye isikhathi ubesebenza noGiovanni Solinas nabadlali besikwati esikhulu kwesinye isikhathi aziqeqeshe noZwane nabafana bakhe beDiski Challenge.Yize isinqumo kungesikaSolinas kodwa akekho ongazi ukuthi uZwane umthanda kakhulu lo mdlali. Kuthiwa ekuseni uziqeqesha noSolinas bese kuthi ntambama asebenze noZwane omuzwa ngaphakathi futhi ongezwa mshini ngokuhamba naye kwiDiski Challenge.Ngendlela afike kwaba nesasasa ngayo kwiChiefs uNene ngeke kuthuse ukuthi sizwe kuthiwa usesayinile ingakapheli kwanyanga obekuwumgomo ukuthi imhlole kuyona. Ukuthi iphepha elimkhulula kwiDynamos abeyidlalela selikwiChiefs kungezinye zezinkomba zokuthi uBobby Motaung oyimenenja akafuni kumphinde okwenzeke ngoSiyanda Xulu ehlwithwa yiSundowns ekade ekhuliswe yibona.IChiefs izobuyela ensimini neBlack Leopards emdlalweni weTelkom Knockout Last 16 ngempelasonto ezayo.Imidlalo yeTelkom Knockout Last 16:AmaZulu v Cape Town City; Sundowns v Bloem Celtic; Polokwane City v SuperSport; Free State Stars v Bidvest Wits; Orlando Pirates v Chippa United; Kaizer Chiefs v Black Leopards; Maritzburg United v Highlands Park; Baroka FC v Lamontville Golden Arrows.
title: Ufike kwezwakala kwiKaizer Chiefs

text: UZOBE ehambisana nabangani bakhe abangosaziwayo, u-Unathi Nkayi njengoba eseqale uhambo lokujabulisa abalandeli bakhe ngomculo olwaziwa nge-5 City Album Tour.Lolu hambo luqale eGoli ngo-Agasti 18.NgoSeptemba 20, U-Unathi uzobe ejabulisa abalandeli bakhe ePlayhouse, eThekwini.Kulo mcimbi uthe uzobe ehambisana nomngani wakhe omkhulu ophinde asebenzisane naye ohlelweni ama-Idols SA, uSomizi Mhlongo.“Kuwona wonke amadolobha esengiwahambelile bekukhona usaziwayo oyedwa engihamba naye engimkhonzile futhi ongixhasa kuzona zonke izinto engizenzayo empilweni yami ukuze abone ukuthi ngimbonga kangakanani. EThekwini ngiza nomuntu olikhonze kakhulu leli dolobha ozofike abajabulise ngezinto eziningi abazohambela umcimbi,” kusho * -Unathi othe ngaphandle kukaSomizi uzobe ehamba noMondli Ngcobo noMerlon abathandwa kakhulu nabazakhela udumo ngengoma ethi Koze Kuse.Uthe iTheku yikhaya lakhe lesibili ngakho ujabule ngokuthi uhambo lwakhe luzoza nakuleli dolobha.“Ngibonga uNkulunkulu ngokwenza yonke imizamo yami ibe yimpumelelo. Ngiyacela ukuthi abantu baphume ngobuningi bayothenga amathikithi alo mcimbi, ngiyabathembisa ukuthi ngeke baphoxeke. Emadolobheni esesiwahambelile abantu bakhombise ukuwuthokozela lo mcimbi ngisho amadolobha esingakwazanga ukuya kuwona abantu bayafuna ukuthi size kuwona,” kuchaza * -Unathi.Ngaphambi kwedili lomculo, * -Unathi uthe uqale ahlangane nabalandeli bakhe abasayinele ama-CD abasuke bewathengile.
title: Uza eThekwini umjikelezo ka-Unathi

text: INHLANGANO yezokusakaza iSouth African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC), idilize abasebenzi abangu-621, iningi labo eligcina namhlanje.Le nhlangano yamemezela ukuthi izodiliza abasebenzi ukuzama ukwehlisa izindleko.I-SABC ithe abasebenzi abangu-346, yize kukhona eminye imisebenzi abebengafaka izicelo zokuyenza,  banqume ukuthi bathathe imali yabo bahambe."Abanye bebekhathazeke ngomthelela wokwehla kwemali abebezoyihola okudalwe ukubuyekezwa kabusha kwamaholo nempesheni," kusho umkhulumeli wale nhlangano obambile, uMmoni Seapolelo.Uthe abasebenzi abangu-275 bebenza imisebenzi esivaliwe futhi abanye bazamile ukufaka izicelo zemisebenzi kodwa bangaphumelela.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, kulindeleke ukuthi kuqale izinhlelo ezintsha emisakazweni yale nhlangano kusasa njengoba kwenziwa izinguquko.Abasakazi beMetro FM uLuthando "Lootlove" Shosha noPearl Modiadie sebevalelisile futhi uPearl uyagcina kuleli sonto.KuKhozi FM kuthiwa ungoti wengqephu uSwenka Chiyi, usevalelisile kozakwabo njengoba naye egcina emsebenzini.UDJ woKhozi FM uSihle "DJ Mngadi" Mngadi uthathe isinqumo sokushiya.UMngadi, odume kakhulu ngokuqhulula ama-mix kulesi siteshi uqashwe njenge-digital specialist okunguye owengamele amakhasi ezinkundla zokuxhumana zoKhozi kanjalo ne-website."Sibaningi esithole izincwadi nami ngingomunye wabo. Akukhona ukuthi isikhundla sami asisekho kodwa sishintsha igama futhi kwehle nomholo njengoba iSABC izama ukonga imali. Noma ngingazi ukuthi imali ibizokwehla kanjani kodwa ngithathe isinqumo sokuthi ngihambe," kusho uMngadi obesehlale iminyaka engu-15 kuKhozi.Uthe njengamanje uzogxila emculweni futhi uhlela ukukhipha i-EP yakhe yokuqala aphinde asayinise nabanye abanethalente enkampanini yakhe."Uyazi ukuphuma kuKhozi kuyisibusiso ngoba kuzonginikeza ithuba lokungena noma yikuphi. Uma umataniswa nesiteshi omunye angakubona kukuhle kodwa nokuvaleleka kuyenzeka. Uthi ufuna ukuyophusha umculo kube nzima ngoba igama lakho limataniswa nesiteshi esithile," kuchaza yena.
title: I-SABC idilize abasebenzi abangu-621

text: BAHLULEKA ngisho wukuluzeka udaba lwezelamani ezimbili zakwa-AA eMlaza, ezineminyaka ewu-14newu-21 abomndeni wazo emuva kokuthi zigwaze zabulala unina ngoMgqibelo.Isolezwe liziyele mathupha emzini wakwaGumede liyokuzwa ngesehlakalo esenzekile kodwa abomndeni bathi ngeke bakwazi ukukhuluma nabephephandaba okwamanje kwazise izinhliziyo zabo zibuhlungu.Igama likamufi ligodliwe ukuvikela umsolwa osemncane.Okhulume neSolezwe, uthe uyindodakazi kamufi endala wakuqinisekisa ukuthi wodadewabo abagwaze unina ngomtafula waze washona kodwa wacela izintatheli ukuthi zibuye ngelinye ilanga mhlawumbe nesilonda sokushonelwa wumzali sizobe singasaqaqambi ngalolu hlobo.Abanye abangathandanga ukudalulwa bavezeukuthi lezi zelamani bezithanda ukulwa nonina futhi basola ukuthi bekudalwa ukuqoma ngoba amadodakazi akhe ebengamthandi umuntu wesilisa akade ehlekisana naye.“Sisola ukuthi umufi ubexabana nabo ngenxa yokuthi usezwana nomunye umuntu emuva kokushona kukayise walezi zingane.“Zikhala ngokuthi ubezihlinela, angazikhulumisi uma kukhona indoda abezwana nayo.“Asazi nokuthi siyiqale ngakuphi le ndaba ngoba ibuhlungu. Ubulawe yizingane azizalayo, igazi lakhe,” kusho omunye.Abanye bathe kuzocaca enkantolo ukuthi kwenzekalani ngoba bayasola ukuthi indodakazi ena-14 izodedelwa ngoba isencane kuboshwe lena eno-21.“Unina kuyabonakala ukuthi ubezabalaza ngasewindini le-tuckshop yakhe.“Ngisho namanje kugcwele igazi lapho eshonele khona,” kusho omunye.Indaba yokubulawa kwalona wesifazane yinto osekuphuzwa ngayo amatiye kwazise neSolezwe alizange liduke kodwa lithe lingena kwa-AA, abesifazane elihlangane nabo bebebabaza, bekhuza lesi sehlo beliyalela nokuthi ukuphi umuzi wakwaGumede.UBrigadier Jay Naicker wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe amaphoyisa aseBhekithemba aphenya icala lokubulala emuva kokuthi abasolwa abaneminyaka engu-14 no-21 begwaze owesifazane (44) amanxeba amaningi ngoMgqibelo ngabo-3 ntambama.“Umufi utholweeseshonile khona endaweni yesigameko kwase kuboshwa abasolwa abababili ababhekene necala lokubulala. Bazovela enkantolo maduze,” kusho uNaicker.
title: Amadodakazi 'abulale' unina ecikwa wukuthi useqomile

text: Laba balingisi, abacele ukuba kugodlwe amagama abo ukuze bagweme ukuba yimigilwa yokukhishwa inyumbazane, bathi sekubame emphinjeni ukuxhashazwa ngabaqashi babo iMizen Casting Agency kaZodwa Zuma.Omunye wabo uthe wagcina ukuhola ngo-Okthoba.“Sengilingise eziqeshini eziningi kabi kodwa kuze kube yimanje angikawutholi umholo wami."Okubuhlungu size siboleke izimali komashonisa uma siyoqopha ngoba sinethemba lokuthi sizokhokhelwa kodwa sigcine singaholelwanga.”Omunye uveze ukuthi uma kuqoshwa bangena ngo-5.30 ekuseni baze bashayise ebusuku ngabo-9 ebusuku.“Thina asiholi ngokuvela esiqephini kodwa sihola uR180 ngosuku. Akukhathaleki ukuthi ushuthe eziqeshini ezingaki kodwa unikezwa ngosuku le mali. Kuhlula ngisho kunalapho ukhulume khona kodwa unikezwa lo R180.”Umthombo wesithathu uthe:“Siyahlukumezeka, sisebenza sihole imali engaphelele okanye singayitholi, kuthiwe kulindwe abakhiqizi iStained Glass. Siyacela ukuba sikhokhelwe wona lawo makinati.”Ethintwa uZodwa uthe yena uyakujabulela ukwaziswa ngezinkinga ezibhekene nalaba balingisi ababizwa ngama-extras.“Lolu daba lusemqoka kithina njengenkampani. Amalungu ethu akhokhelwa njalo njengoba esuke esebenza. Uma kunomuntu okungenzeka ukuthi usala ngaphandle futhi ongakhokhelwe, nanganoma yisiphi isizathu, sifisa ukuba eze emahhovisi ethu ukuze silungise lolu daba.”Uqhube wathi asikho isizathu esingabangela ukuthi agweve nemiholo yabantu abasuke beyisebenzele.“Wonke umuntu usemqoka. Amahhovisi ethu ahlala evuleliwe,” kuphetha uZodwa.Nakuba uZodwa ekhuluma kanje kodwa abalingisi bathe usenga ezimithiyo.“Wazi kahle ukuthi asiholile futhi ubelokhu ethi iSABC abalukhokhele Uzalo."Ubelokhu ethi asilinde uzokhokha, kwaze kwaphela izinyanga ezintathu. Ufuna sithi sizokhuluma ngale mali emahhovisi, bafike babone ukuthi yibaphi abalingisi asebemneke ephepheni,” kuphetha umthombo.Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela njengoba abeStained Glass bethunyelwe imibuzo bangaphendula kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicelela.Kwenzeka lokhu nje abalingisi abaqavile boZalo bake babeka phansi amathuluzi nyakenye ngenxa yokungaholi ngo-Agasti. Inkinga yayikhonjwa kwiSABC.Kuke kwavela nokuthi kunabalingisi abashiya phansi kulo mdlalo ngoba bengenelisekile ngamaholo okubalwa kubo noLeleti Khumalo, Sifiso Simamane nabanye.
title: Bakhala ngokungaholelwa abalingisi abengeziwe boZalo

text: BONISWA MOHALEUNGQONGQOSHE wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uNkk Lindiwe Zulu, uthi basanezingqinamba zolayini abade eposini ngenxa yokuthi u-70% wabathola izibonelelo zabangasebenzi usebenzisa iposi.UNkk Zulu uthe bathole izicelo ezintsha eziwu-65 795 zabafuna ukuthola isibonelelo sabangasebenzi esiwuR350 ngenyanga.“UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa umemezele ukuthi isibonelelo sikaR350 sizokwelulwa izinyanga ezintathu. Sithole izicelo ezintsha eziwu-65 795 kanti bawu-9.7 million abasiholayo. Labo sizoqhubeka nokubabheka nyanga zonke ukuthi basafanele wukusiwuthola,” kusho uNkk Zulu.Yize olayini abade besayingqinamba, uNkk Zulu uthe sebefake amavolontiya alawula olayini. Banohlelo lokuholisa abantu ngezinsuku ezihlukene, kubuye kusetshenziswe ezinye izikhungo ukuhola lesi sibonelelo abale kuzo amahholo.Isolezwe  lithole ukuthi amaposi abhalisa izinamba zomasizi zabahola izibonelelo ukuze bafike bazohola ngezinsuku ezifanele.Ngaphambi kokuthi kuvalwe izicelo, uNkk Zulu uthe bese bathole izicelo eziwu-27 000 neziwu-117 000 kubasebenzi basezinkulisa.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi izinhlangano ezisebenzela umphakathi zakugxeka ukuvalwa masisha kwezicelo zezibonelelo.Abasebenzi kulindeleke ukuthi bathole uxhaso lukaR4 470 kanti uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi ubeke uR496 million ukubhekelela izinkulisa ezikhahlanyezwe yiCovid-19.Mayelana nezibonelelo zabakhubazekile, okwesikhashana, uNkk Zulu uthe abantu abaziholayo kufanele bazivuselele kabusha njengoba umthetho usho njalo.Uthe lezi zibonelelo aziholwa unomphela, ngakho osiholayo uyahlolwa ngudokotela okunguye owenza umbiko wokuthi usafanele yini ukusihola.
title: Iyalungiswa eyolayini abade eposini: Ungqongqoshe

text: SEKUQUBUKE indida ngodokotela waseDannhauser odukile eya emsebenzini, imoto yakhe itholwe yodwa emgwaqweni e-Utrecht.UDkt Lindani Tebello Sithole (27), obesebenza emtholampilo waseDannhausereyi-Dietician, udukengo-Okthoba 30 nonyaka.Wagcinwa ngumndeni wakhe eya emsebenzini. Kuthiwa akafikanga emsebenzini.Umndeni usukhathazekile wabika udaba emaphoyiseni.Imoto yakhe yatholwa ishiywe emgwaqweni e-Utrecht, yena akaziwa ukuthi washonaphi.Umthombo weSolezwe osondelene nalolu daba ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe kuyindida ukulahleka kwalo dokotela.“Okwenza kube yindida ngokulahleka kwakhe wukuthi imoto yakhe itholakele kodwa yena lutho, akuveli ukuthi kukhona okulahlekile kuyo. Akatholakali ocingweni lwakhe. Akwaziwa ukuthi washonaphi, akekho nothi wambona,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe amaphoyisa aseNewcastle avule icala lokulahleka komuntu.“Amaphoyisa aseNewcastle acela umphakathi uwasize ukuthola uDkt Sithole olahlekile eDannhauser. Ugcinwe ukubonakala ngo-Okthoba 30 eya emsebenzini. Imoto yakhe ayeyishayela yatholwa ishiywe yodwa e-Utrecht. Sicela noma ngubani ongaba nolwazi ngokulahleka kwakhe angathintana noColonel Kubheka kwethi: 082 373 8693 noma beshayele inombolo yamahhala elwa nobugebengu,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Isolezwe izolo lithinte umndeni wakhe, ucingo belukhala lungabanjwa.
title: Kufunwa udokotela owaduka eya emsebenzini

text: ISILO samabandla, uGoodwill Zwelithini, sizwakalise ukungenami ngokushintshwa kwegama elithi Radio Zulu kwathiwa wuKhozi FM.Sikhuluma ngesikhathi sigubha usuku lokuzalwa esigodlweni KwaLinduzulu, KwaNongoma, izolo ezintatha, iSilo sithe asazi ngempela ukuthi kwakwenzenjani kuze kushintshwa igama.“Kuzomele ixoxwe le ndaba ngithole ukuthi kwakwenzenjani kuze kuthiwa alishintshwe igama ngoba isizwe samaZulu sisekhona kanti neSilo sawo sikhona,” kusho Ongangezwe lakhe.Sithe iRadio Zulu yaqala ukusakaza bukhoma ngasekuqaleni kweminyaka yama-70s ngesikhathi sisanda kugcotshwa njengeSilo.“Njengoba namanje ngikhuluma lapha inkulumo yami iyasakazwa bukhoma ibukwa umhlaba wonke, le nto yokusakaza bukhoma yaqala ngesikhathi seRadio Zulu,” kusho iMbube.UKhozi FM lubalwa nemisakazo emikhulu emhlabeni kanti lulalelwa yizigidi zabalaleli.Lo msakazo usakaza ngolimi lwesiZulu olukhulunywa kakhulu kwelikaMthaniya.Bekungesikho okokuqala kushintshwa kwegama lalo msakazo njengoba kuqala kwakuthiwa yiRadio Bantu ngaphambi kokuba ubizwe ngeRadio Zulu.IMbube iphinde yathi uhulumeni kumele uphathe izwe ngendlela.“Kubuhlungu ukuphathwa ngabantu abangakwazi ukuphatha, ngiphonsela osopolitiki inselelo ngithi ababuse ngendlela efanele ngoba siyonquma thina ngelinye ilanga singuZulu sithi siyabaphuca ivoti lethu, kuyoba buhlungu uma sesenza njalo.”Ithe njengoba izwe lidunguzela kungathi aliphathekile kahle yingenxa yosopolitiki abaxabene abasuka lapha eKZN.Siqhube ngokuthi akumele kube khona isifundazwe esizenza ungqoshishilizi kunezinye izifundazwe.“Akungabikhona isifundazwe esizenza ungqaphambili okomqado wethole,” kusho iMbube.IMbube iphawule kanje nje, iKwaZulu-Natal iqale umkhankaso wokuhambela ezinye izifundazwe njengoba kuyiwa engqungqutheleni yokukhetha ubuholi obusha kuKhongolose ezokuba ngoDisemba.Ubuholi be-ANC esifundazweni buhambele eMpumalanga bathembisa ukuthi buzophinde buhambele ezinye izifundazwe ngenhloso yokunxenxa ubumbano embuthweni.I-KZN yisona sifundazwe esikhulu kunazo zonke kwi-ANC ngokwezibalo zamagatsha.
title: ISilo kaseneme ngoKhozi FM

text:
SIZWE BLOSEN GICABANGA ukuthi ayiyinhle indaba yokugxeka umsakazi uma izinombolo zabalaleli zingahambi kahle.Ngokwami kumele iziphathimandla zomsakazo zibheke konke okuthinta umsakazo ngaphambi kokuthi zikhale ngomsakazi.Ungalanda nanoma yimuphi umsakazi ngethemba lokuthi kuzonyuka izibalo zabalaleli kodwa uthole ukuthi umsakazo ugidagida ndawonye.Uma kukhona umnyango oxegayo emsakazweni, izibalo zabalaleli ngeke ziye ndawo.Isibonelo, uma kungukuthi imibhoshongo kayinawo amandla umsakazo uyahohoza, ngisho ungalanda muphi umsakazi ngeke enze lutho.Imibhoshongo ineqhaza elibalulekile ekunyukeni kwezinombolo.Isikimu onaso sabasakazi sibaluleke kakhulu, emsakazweni ngeke ugxile kumsakazi oyedwa onedumela bese uthi uqedile, izibalo sezizonyuka, ngisho sewukhala ngeke zenyuke ngoba kukhona lapho okuxega khona.Uma umdidiyeli wohlelo ebuthaka, vele ukhohlwe ukuthi izibalo zabalaleli zizonyuka, phela umdidiyeli wohlelo ufana nenjini yemoto, uma kunobuthakathaka ohlangothini lwakhe izinto zigcina zibheka eceleni.Ngakho-ke ngibona kuyiphutha ukugxeka noma ukuxosha umsakazi uma isibalo sabalaleli sehla.Enye into eyaye ibaluleke ngukubeka abasakazi endaweni ebafanele, isibonelo uma uzothatha umuntu okumele enze izinhlelo zemingcwabo umfake ekuseni emsakazweni, uyadlala uma uthi ufuna ukunyusa isibalo sabalaleli.Ngiyazi inkinga ephinde idale lokhu ngukuthi sekungenwa ngezindlela eziningi emsakazweni. Kodwa ekugcineni lokhu kuyaphazamisa ekunyukeni kwesibalo sabalaleli yingakho ngithi akukuhle ukugxeka umsakazi noma umxoshe uma umsakazo ungenzi kahle ngasohlangothini lwabalaleli.Enye inkinga enkulu kuba ngukudayiseka komsakazo, umsakazi angeza nawo wonke amaqhinga kodwa uma kungukuthi umnyango wezokumaketha awubenzi ubulungiswa, abalaleli bazogidagida ndawonye noma behle, angibaboni bekhula.Isibonelo esihle yi-East Coast Radio, uphiko lwezokumaketha lwalo msakazo luyabenza ubulungiswa.Lo msakazo ubamba iqhaza emicimbini eminingi eyenzekayo futhi uyaqhamuka nemicimbi ezisungulele yona, awulindi ukuxhasa imicimbi yabantu njengoba kwenza eminye imisakazo.Abasakazi bayo ubathola beshayela izimoto zezinkampani ezehlukene, uphawu lwayo alusali, ngisho emagaraji ahlukene nasezitolo uthola kulalelwe lo msakazo.Akuwona umlingo, nanoma yimuphi umsakazo ungakwenza lokhu kodwa isikhathi esiningi uthola ukuthi iminyango yezokumaketha nayo ayikwazi okulindeleke kuyona.Nabo abasakazi sizobagxeka kulokhu, iningi labasakazi beminye imisakazo alibonakali ndawo, bheka i-5FM, abasakazi bayo abanjengo-Euphonik, Milkshake, Miss Cosmo bahlale besemehlweni abantu.Ngike ngizibuze nje ukuthi kungani abasakazi beGagasi FM noma boKhozi FM kumbe abeVuma FM bengangeni kwithelevishini.KunoWarras abaqala ukubonakala besekwiYFM noDJ Fresh kodwa kulena do.Angigxeki abasakazi kodwa umbuzo oba mkhulu ngothi umnyango wezokumaketha uyabenza yini ubulungiswa ekumaketheni abasakazi nomsakazo?OkoKhozi okwezandla ngoba luyingxenye ye-SABC, abasakazi bayo kumele ngabe banezinhlelo abazenzayo, angikhulumi ngolukamaskandi olwaqalwa oBhodloza Nzimande kudala mhlawumbe ne-SABC ngaleso sikhathi yayisabuka uKhozi njengomsakazo womculo wesintu nje kuphela.Kungani singabi nomsakazi woKhozi owenza i
Live Amp, 
The Link,
Zaziwa nezinye izinhlelo?Ngisho ngoba sike saba noCyril Bongani Mchunu owayenza uhlelo kwa-SABC TV olwalubizwa 
NgoMgqibelo KaMokebelo olwalunedumela.Sekonakelephi pho manje?Ngiyazi abalaleli bayathanda ukuzibonela abasakazi babo, kuningi nje nokunye okungadala isibalo ukuthi sehle kepha okubi ngukugxeka noma uxosha umsakazi.
title: Kuningi okwenyusa izibalo zomsakazo

text: SESILULIWE isikhathi sokuthi abaculi abafuna ukuqokwa kumaSatma bangenele njengoba bekuzovalwa ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule.Sekuyoze kube wuJulayi 21 kuvuliwe.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi abahleli bale miklomelo bethula ibhasi ngoLwesihlanu eThekwini elizokuya ezindaweni ezahlukene kukhuthazwa abantu ngemiklomelo yabo.NgoLwesihlanu belisuka eThekwini libheke e-Eastern Cape.Okhulumela imiklomelo uSeipati Shange uthe abantu abamnyama banomkhuba wokwenza izinto ngemizuzu yokugcina okuyingakho benqume ukulula isikhathi sokungenela.“Wonke umuntu uvumelekile kulo nyaka. Amafomu ayatholakala kwi-webiste yethu,” kusho uSeipati.Emcimbini wokwethula ibhasi bekulindeleke ukuthi kube khona uKhanyi Mbau ogcine engafikanga. USeipati uthe kukhona okumbambile.Uthe ibhasi uma libuya e-Eastern Cape kuleli sonto lizolibhekisa eBokone Bophirima Province (North West).“Abaqokiwe bazomenyezelwa ngo-Agasti 12 e-ICC, eThekwini bese kuthi imiklomelo ibe seMabatho Convention Centre eBokone Bophirima Province ngoSepthemba 30,” kusho uSeipati.Ibhasi lilayisha abagibeli abangu-25, linendawo yeziphuzo, igumbi lokuphumula nendlu yangasese.
title: Balule isikhathi kwabafuna ukungelema kumaSatma

text: INKAMPANI elawula iLotto yaseNingizimu Afrika, Ithuba, imemezele ukuthi ithikithi eliwine isamba sika-R141 million kwiPowerball lithengwe eKapa.Leli thikithi lithengwe eSpar oseGroot Brak ngo-R105 kweQuick Pay yangaphakathi esitolo.Lokhu kwenza owinile abe ngowesithathu ukubamba imali enkulu eNingizimu Afrika, owokuqala ngowabamba u-R232 million ngoFebhruwari kanti owesibili ngowabamba u-R145 million ngo-Agasti nyakenye.NgoMsombuluko, Ithuba liqinisekisile ukuthi lowo owinile akakaxhumani nabo ukufaka isicelo semali yakhe.Kepha lona akuyena kuphela owinile kuleli sonto. NgoLwesithathu mhlaka-21 Agasti omunye uwine u-R9 million kwiLotto Plus Jackpot ngethikithi alithenge ngo-R10.Ekhuluma ngabawinile, Isikhulu esiphezulu se-Ithuba uKhensani Mabuza uthe; "Siyethemba ukuthi laba abawinile bayazi ukuthi bawinile futhi bazoxhumana nehhovisi lethu maduze. Ihhovisi lethu labawinile likulindele ukubamukela libasize ekutholeni imali yabo."Ekuqaleni kwale nyanga, omunye ufake isicelo sika-R232,774 milliion ngaphambi kwamasonto nje aphelewe yisikhathi sokuletha ithikithi awine ngalo. Ithikithi lathengwa ngoSepthemba 19 2018 kanti bekulindeleke ukuthi liphelelwe yisikhathi ngoSepthemba 2019.Ekhuluma ne-Ithuba, owinile wathi wayesola ukuthi nguyena owinile ngesikhathi imininingwane yethikithi ivezwa ezindabeni. Ngesikhathi ebheka amathikithi amadala walithola leli awayelithenge ngosuku olufanayo nolowinile wabe esenikela emahhovisi eThuba eSandton ukuyofaka isicelo semali yakhe.
title: Akakaphumeli obala owine iPowerball ka-R141 million

text: UMENGAMELI weSouth African Football Association (Safa), uDanny Jordaan, ukholwa wukuthi kuzolotha konke obekwenzeka ngombango wesikhundla, kugxilwe emsebenzini wokuthuthukisa ibhola eNingizimu Afrika.UJordaan uphinde waqokelwa kwesokwengamela iSafa ngaphandle kokuphikiswa embuthanweni wokukhetha obukade useSandton Convention Centre eGauteng ngoMgqibelo. Ezinyangeni ezimbalwa bekubukeka uzoshisa phansi umbango wesikhundla kodwa uJordaan ugcine eselungenele yedwa ukhetho. Ukhetho lucishe lwabhuntsha kulandela ukuthi kube khona abafaka incwadi yokulumisa enkontolo kodwa bachithwa.UJordaan uthe ukholwa wukuthi sesidlulile isivunguvungu, wadalula izinhloso zakhe njengoba esethatha elinye ihlandla.“Ngethemba ukuthi konke kuzobuyela esimeni esijwayelekile ebholeni laseMzansi. Ikakhulukazi isikhathi esiphakathi kuka 2018 no-2022. Sifuna ukubheka ukuthi singaliqinisa kanjani ibhola labesifazane ezweni. Sibonile kusukela kwabaphethe imidlalo ukuthi esigungwini sikazwelonke sinabesifazane abathathu kuphela. Kodwa kumaLFA nasezifundeni sinabesifazane abangu-810 abasebenza ebholeni emazingeni aphansi,” kusho uJordaan.UJordaan ubuyela esikhundleni nje, ubhekwe ukuthi afeze izethembiso zakhe ngokuthuthukiswa kwebhola eMzansi. Iningi aliyizwa indaba yakhe.UJordaan uphumele obala ngesifiso sokuthi iNingizimu Afrika ingenele umbango wokusingatha iNdebe yoMhlaba yabesifazane.“Ngokwabadlali sifuna ukwenyusa isibalo sabesifazane nokwethula iligi ngo-2019 nokubheka ukuthi singakwazi yini ukusingatha iNdebe yoMhlaba yabesifazane. Sizoqoka ikomiti elizohlela, uma sekukhona elikhutholile, sizohlala phansi nohulumeni nongqongqoshe wezemidlalo ukuzwa ukuthi uyahambisana yini nathi. Uma ubheka amanye amazwe asingathe iNdebe yoMhlaba, ngo-1994 asingatha eyabesilisa kwathi ngo-1999 asingatha eyabesifazane. Lokho kwasiza ekukhuliseni ibhola labesifazane.“Uma ubheka iFrance yasingatha iNdebe yoMhlaba ngoo-1998 futhi izosingatha eyabesifazane ngonyaka ozayo * -2019. I-Germany yasingatha eyabesilisa ngo-2006, yasingatha eyabesifazane ngo-2011,” kusho uJordaan.“Inselelo wukuthi uyisebenzisa kanjani ingqalasizinga yeNdebe yoMhlaba. Ngo-2010 sadlula kakhulu kokwakulindelwe kithina. Eyabesifazane inamaqembu angu-24, hhayi angu-32 kodwa ngesikhathi siqeda iNdebe yoMhlaba ngo-2010, isidingo sezinkundla sanyuka. Sesihlale iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili, akufanele silinde kakhulu.”
title: UJordaan nezinhlelo ngabesifazane

text: PHEZU kokuba ezinye zezikole ezisemakhaya ezingo-Quintile 1 KwaZulu-Natal zibhekene nengwadla yokushoda kwezidingo kodwa ziphase ngamalengiso zahlula lezo okukhokhwa kuzona ezinazo zonke izidingo.Lokhu kufakazelwe nayisikhalo sikaNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo esifundazweni uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane ngezifunda ezisemadolobheni ezihlulwe yizifunda ezisemakhaya ngokuphasa.UDlungwane ukhale ngesifunda uMlaza, esinezikole ezisedolobheni iTheku nezinye ezisemakolishini nePinetown enezikole okwakungezamhlophe ezihlulwe yizifunda Amajuba, uMkhanyakude esemakhaya kanjalo noGu.Izikole ezisezifundeni ezisemadolobheni, uthe zinazo zonke izinsiza okubalwa ama-laboratory, imitapo yolwazi nezinye izidingo uma uqhathanisa nezikole ezisezifundeni ezisemakhaya.“Sikhathazekile ngezifunda uMlaza nePinetown kanjalo noMgungundlovu owehle ngo-4% emiphumelweni ka-matric.“Sizozeseka lezi zifunda ngoba uma kungase kunyuke zona imiphumela yethu inganyuka kakhulu.“Kumele ngixoxe noMqondisi waseMgungundlovu ngoba ilapho kukhona nekhaya lami, akukwazi ukuthi imiphumela ingehla lapho ngiqhamuka khona,” kusho uDlungwane.Amajuba alale indawo yokuqala esifundazweni, alandelwe uGu, kube uMkhanyakude.UDlungwane uthe izikole ezingo-Quintile 1 ziphase ngo-71%.“ Ukwenza kahle kwalezi zikole kusho khona ukuthi sibambe ngakho, sisendleleni efanele. Sizoqhubeka siqinise kulezi zikole,” ksho uDlungwane.UMgungundlovu ulale isine kwalandela iPinetown kwathi uMlaza walala endaweni yesikhombisa. Isifunda esisemsileni yiLembe esibe ngunombolo 12.Okushayelwe ihlombe ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa imiphumela ngoLwesihlanu eThekwini, ngukuthi asikho isifunda esithole ngaphansi kuka-70% esifundazweni.Ibamba likaNdunankulu wesifundazwe uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe izifunda ezisemadolobheni azigawule zibheke ngoba ezisemakhaya ziyangenisa.“Aziqaphele izifunda ezifana noMlazi nePinetown ngoba uMkhanyakude usukhanya eduzane awusakhanyi kude. Lezi zifunda ezisemakhaya zihlule izifunda ezisemadolobheni.”UDlungwane ubuye wakhala ngokubiza kwemali yokufunda wathi bakhathazekile ngalokhu.“Sekubiza kakhulu kwezinye izikole okuyinto esikhathazayo. Asisazi isizathu esenza imali inyuke kanje. Akumele imfundo kube eyabambalwa kuvinjelwe abanye abafuna ukufunda kodwa abangakwazi ngoba bengenawo imali,” kusho uDlungwane.Izinga lokuphasa kulesi sifundazwe linyuke lafinyelela ku-76.2% kuzwelonke libe ngu-78.2%.UNgqongqoshe wemfundo eyisisekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga, uncome izikole ezisemakhaya, emadolobheni nasemapulazini ukuthi zenze kahle.Isifundazwe iGauteng yisona esizishaye zonke emakhanda kuleli ngokuthola * -87.9%.UNkk Motshekga uthe bangu-84700 abafundi abebefunda ezikoleni zasemakhaya abaphase ngamaBachelor kwathi abangu-76 599 abaphase ngamaBachelor bebefunda ezikoleni okukhokhwa kuzona imali.Asikho isifunda kuleli esithole ngaphansi kuka-50%.“Kuyangijabulisa ukuthi abafundi abangu-241 340 abaphase * -matric bebefunda ezikoleni okungakhokhwa kuzona. Ngiyajabula ukuthi abangu-91 400 baphase ngamaDiploma bebefunda ezikoleni okungakhokhwa kuzona.”Lesi sifundazwe silale isithupha kuzwelonke.Zenze kanje izifundazwe:1.Gauteng:87.9%.2. Free State:87.5%3. Western Cape:81.5%4. North West:81.1%5. Mpumalanga:79%6. KZN:76.2%7. Northern Cape:73.3%8. Eastern Cape:70.6%9. Limpopo:69.4%.
title: Izikole zasemakhaya zibukise ngezasedolobheni ku-matric

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEEbika eseMgungundlovuU KWAZE ngendodakazi yakhe ukuthi kukhona into okuthiwa yi-hug uyise womfundi kaGrade 1 oshone engozini yemoto enyantisa umzimba e-Elandskop, eMgungundlovu.U-Olwethu Maphanga (6) noSphamandla Mncwabe (10) ebebefunda uGrade 5 bashone engozini yemoto ehambisa izingane edume ngokuthi yimoto ‘kamalume’.Kule ngozi iVenture kamalume ishayisane nebhasi, kwalimala nabanye abafundi abebephakathi besikole iNkabini Primary nabanye baseLangalakhe High.Uyise ka-Olwethu, uMnuz Themba Maphanga (44), uthe ayikho into eyoke ifane nendodakazi yakhe emhlabeni futhi usashaqekile kusanzima nokukholwa ukuthi ushonile.“Bengiyikhonze kakhulu ingane yami, mina bengingayazi ngisho ne-hug kodwa iyona eyangifundisa yona. Indodakazi yami ibikhaliphe ngokweqile. Ibifunda amabanga aphansi kodwa ibisikhipha ngamakhala isiNgisi. Ngife olwembiza ngayo,” kusho uMaphanga ngosizi.Bebefunda eNkabini Primary bobabili laba bafundi, lesi sikole asikude kakhulu nekhaya lakwaMaphanga kodwa uyise uthe bebefuna iphephe ingane yakhe njengoba ubeyigibelisa imoto ‘kamalume’.“Bengingazi ukuthi kanti ingane yami sengiyifaka ekufeni.Bengithi iphephile ezingozini kanti angazi ukuthi izofela kuyo le moto,” kusho uMaphanga.Lo baba onezingane ezimbili, endala ina-19, uthe akukho abekusola kule moto phambilini ngaphandle komsindo obuhlezi uqhuma phezulu.UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo Kwa-Zulu Natal uMnuz Senzo Mchunu udlulise amazwi endunduzo emindenini, abafundi nakothisha wathi lesi sigameko silimaze ikusasa lalaba bafundi.“Siphatheke kabuhlungu kakhulu ngalolu daba njengoMnyango. Kuyishwa ukulahlekelwa ngabantu abasebancane futhi benekusasa eliqhakazile. Ngokushona kwalaba bafundi ababili kusho ukuthi uMnyango usulahlekelwe ngabafundi abathathu, uma sibala nomunye umfundi uMpendulo Mzulwini oshone ngeSonto,” kusho uMchunu.Abafundi baseNkabini kubikwe ukuthi bazothola ukwelashwa ngokomphefumulo ngenxa yokushaqeka kwabo ngalesi sigameko.AbakaMaphanga bazofihla kusasa.Uphenyo lamaphoyisa lusaqhubeka ngalolu daba.
title: Ugqemeke udume ubaba ngengane eshone engozini

text: ITSHE limi ngothi kumholi weqembu iDA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane okuvele imibiko emaphephandabeni eveza ukuthi ubehamba ngemoto ekhokhelwa owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu sakwaSteinhoff, uMnuz Markus Jooste.Imibiko yephephandaba iRapport ne-News 24 iveze lokhu izolo kanti kuthiwa uMamaine wenqabile ukuphindisela le moto emuva yize abalingani bakhe bebemxwayisa bethi makayiphindise.Kuthiwa imoto yohlobo lweToyota Fortuner inikezwe uMaimane ngaphambi kokhetho lohulumeni basemakhaya lwango-2016.USihlalo wesigungu esiphezulu kuleli qembu, uMnuz James Selfe, ucashunwe ekuqinisekisa ukuthi imoto ngeyenkampani eqashisa ngezimoto futhi ikhokhelwa abakwaSteinhoff.Okhulumela i-DA, uMnuz Solly Malatsi, ekhuluma nabezindaba uthe lona kwakungumnikelo owawubhekiswe eqenjini.“Le moto kwakuhloswe ukuthi ilekelele emikhankasweni yeqembu esifundazweni iWestern Cape. Yayizosetshenziswa ngumholi ekwenzeni imisebenzi yakhe,” kusho uMalatsi.Ugcizelele ukuthi kwabe kungesiyona eyomuntu oyedwa kodwa ngemuva kokuvela kwegama lakwaSteinhoff ubuholi beqembu banquma ukuthi iphindiswe emuva.Le mibiko ifika ngesikhathi lapho uMaimane ePhalamende aveza ukuthi ungumnikazi womuzi oseClaremont okugcine kuvele ukuthi ungokasomabhizinisi waseThekwini uMnuz Wessel Jacobs.UMalatsi uthe emuva kokuthi isigungu esiphezulu seqembu siludingidile lolu daba sinqume ukuthi akukho okubi ngalo futhi akunamthetho ophuliwe.Ebhala enkundleni yezoxhumama iTwitter izolo, uMaimane ucashunwe ethi lena yimikhankaso yabathile abazama ukucekela phansi igama lakhe nelomndeni wakhe.
title: Umsindo ngemoto ebihamba uMaimane

text: IZINGWEVU zomzabalazo i-ANC Veterans League, zikhononda ngesinqumo sokuthi owayengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ethule inkulumo yokuhlonipha nokukhumbula isishoshovu somzabalazo esishonile, uMnuz Andrew Mlangeni (95).Umufi ushone emuva kokungeniswa esibhedlela sombutho wezempi ekhala ngezinhlungu kwesingezansi. Ube ngowokugcina, obesaphila kulabo ababoshwa bashushiswa ecaleni lodumo laseRivonia futhi ubehlonishwa ngeleSithwalandwe.UZuma wethule inkulumo kwezobuchwepheshe ekhumbula uMlangeni echaza nangesikhathi behleli naye ejele emuva kokuboshelwa ukuvukela umbuso ngezikhathi zobandlululo.UZuma ubabaze ubumnene nobuhlakani bukaMlangeni, wathi waba yingxenye yabaholi abenza ushintsho eqenjini, i-ANC.UZuma uvale inkulumo yakhe wathi uMlangeni ulibambile iqhaza lokutholela izwe inkululeko namandla ezepolitiki kodwa abaholi abasele kumele balwele inkululeko yezomnotho.Kuphele amahora acela kwamahlanu kwase kungena isitatimende se-ANC Veterans League, ikhala ngokuthi uZuma bekungafanele ethule inkulumo ngoMlangeni.Bakhala ngokuthi umufi ubehlala ekhala ngokuthi akahambisani nendlela uZuma abeziphethe ngayo esengumengameli.Izingwevu zize zakhala nangokuthi uZuma uhamba icala lenkohlakalo futhi igama lakhe livela kaningi kofakazi bekhomishini ephenya ngokubhozonyelwa koMbuso.Izingwevu ziqhube zathi zifisa uMlangeni athole ukuhlonishwa okumfanele futhi kuhlonishwe nomndeni wakhe.Okhulumela i-ANC, uMnuz Pule Mabe, akatholakalanga ocingweni ukucacisa futhi ushiyelwe umyalezo kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engakaphenduli. I-ANC kuzwelonke yiyona ebimemezele ekhasini layo kuFacebook ukuthi uZuma uzokwethula inkulumo.UMlangeni kulindeleke ukuthi afihlwe ngoLwesithathu ahlonishwe ngomngcwabo woMbuso.
title: Azeneme izigwevu uZuma ehlonipha uMlangeni

text:
SEBEZOSESHWA abantu abangena ezitolo zakwaWoolworths, eThekwini, emuva kokwanda kwezigameko zamabhomu ezitolo zawo ezikuleli dolobha.AbakwaWoolworths bazwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokutholakala kwamabhomu ezitolo zabo ezisePavilion, Gateway nesisenkabeni yeTheku.Abophiko lwezokuxhumana kwaWoolworths batshele Isolezwe ukuthi bazoqinisa ezokuphepha ezitolo zabo futhi amakhasimende azokubona lokhu. “Sikhathazekile ngezigameko zamabhomu ezenzeka ezitolo zethu eziKwaZulu-Natal nakwezinye izindawo zakulesi sifundazwe. Sesiqale uhlelo lokuthi uma umuntu engena esitolo kube nobuchwepheshe obubheka ukuthi akukho yini okuyingozi akuphethe. Lokhu sikwenzela ukuphephisa amakhasimende ethu nabasebenzi,” kusho abophiko lwezokuxhumana esitatimendeni. FUNDA: 
Sekuqiniswe ezokuphepha ezitolo zakwaWoolworthsBebuzwa ukuthi bangathini kumakhasimende abo asesaba ngisho ukubeka unyawo ezitolo zakwaWoolworths, bathe basebenzisana namaphoyisa, oKlebe futhi kunethimba labo langaphakathi eliphenya izigameko zokutshalwa kwamabhomu kulezi zitolo.“Amakhasimende ethu sicela ehlise umoya aqhubeke eze ezitolo ngesikhathi sisaphenya ngalezi zigameko. “Siyawathembisa ukuthi senza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi aphephile. Kuzokwenzeka ukuthi aseshwe uma engena ezitolo zethu ngoba sifuna ukuthi ahlale ephephile. Sicela abekezele aqonde ukuthi siqinise ezokuphepha ngenxa yezigameko zakamuva,” kusho abakwaWoolworths.UBrigadier Hangwani Mulaudzi woKlebe, uthe basebenza kanzima ukuthola isixazululo enkingeni yokutshalwa kwamabhomu neyokusabisa ngokuthi kunamabhomu angase aqhume.Ukhumbuze abantu ukuthi kuyicala ukusabisa ngebhomu elingekho futhi owenza lokho uzovalelwa ejele.
title: Sebezoseshwa abathenga kwaWoolies

text: INHLOKO yamaJaji uMogoeng Mogoeng ixwayisa ngokuthi impi ayisona isisombululo ezingqinambeni ezibhekene nezwe kubalwa kuzo udaba lomhlaba nokucwasa.Ethula inkulumo yakhe kade enza isifundo ngowayengumegameli we-ANC ongasekho inkosi Albert Luthuli e-UKZN ngoMgqibelo, uMogoeng uthe udaba lomhlaba akumele lumbambathwe kodwa kumele kubhekwane nalo ukuze kutholakale isisombululo.Uxwayise ngokuthi yize kumele kubhekanwe nalo kodwa akumele luhlukanise phakathi isizwe.“Indaba yomhlaba kumele igcine ixazululiwe ukuze kuphele izilonda ezadaleka ngesikhathi abantu bephucwa umhlaba wabo. INingizimu Afrika iphiwe futhi inabantu abahlakaniphile, ngiyathemba ukuthi izokwazi ukuluxazulula lolu daba ngaphandle kokuthi kusuke impi,” kusho uMogoeng.Uthe kodwa udaba lomhlaba ngeke luze luxazululeke ngaphandle kokuxazulula udaba lokucwasa ngokwebala.“Ngiyabathanda abantu abamhlophe kukubona ukuthi bayakukholwa yini kodwa ngeke ngize ngimbandaze ngithi ukucwasa akukho lapha eNingizimi Afrika,” kusho uMogoeng.Uthe abamhlophe ibona abahamba phambili kwezomnotho, ngesikhathi abantu abamnyama bebhuqwa indlala.“Udaba lomhlaba lungaxazululwa ngokuthula kube nobumbano kodwa abamhlophe kumele bazi ukuthi abazange bafike namhlaba lapha,” kusho uMogoeng.Uthe lolu daba kumele luxazululwe egameni likaLuthuli owalwela isithunzi sabantu abamnyama.UMogoeng uphinde wakhwela wadilika kubaholi bezombusazwe wathi sebengenwe umkhuba wokufuna ukuzicebisa.Umzukulu kaLuthuli, uMnuz Mthunzi Luthuli, uthe bajabule ngoba isicelo sabo sokuthi kuphenywe kabusha ngokushona kukamkhulu wabo sesize savunywa.
title: ‘Impi ngeke ixazulule olomhlaba’

text: USIHLALO weBaroka, uKhurishi Mphahlele, ugonyuluka ngokushiya kwesikhulu esiphezulu, uMorgan Mammila, esijoyine iChippa United.UMamilla, osebenze kwiBaroka iminyaka eyisihlanu, uthumelele uMphahlele incwadi yokusula isigubhukane ngeSonto. Lingakashoni ilanga iChippa ikuqinisekisile ukuthi uzovala isikhala sikaPeter Kotroulis oxoshwe ngoDisemba. UMphahlele utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi akakugqizi qakala ukuhamba kukaMammila okuvele ukuthi uzoqala kwiChilli Boys ngoJanuwari 14.“Abantu bahlale beshiya amaqembu bajoyine amanye. Unelungelo lokugcogcoma naye. Ungibhalele incwadi yokwesula. KwiChippa bamthembise imali engcono. Angizange ngizame ukumenyusela ngifinyelele kweyeChippa. Ngisebhizinisini mina. Uma efuna ukuhamba, akahambe ayikho inkinga. Uma iChippa imfuna ayimthathe. Ngeke sixabane noMpengesi (Siviwe) ngenxa kaMorgan. Iminyango lapha ihlale ivuliwe. Ofuna ukuhamba uvumelekile. Mhlawumbe ngelinye ilanga uMorgan uyobuya, asazi. Angixabene naye,” kusho uMphahlele.Mayelana nozovala isikhala sikaMamimla, uMphahlele uthe: “Ngeke ngiqashe muntu. Maningi kwiPremier Soccer League amaqembu angenazo izikhulu eziphezulu. Akukho emigomeni yeFifa ukuthi kufanele iqembu libe nesikhulu esiphezulu noma yikanjani. Akuphoqelekile. Ngikhona mina, ikhona imenenja, ukhona nomqeqeshi. Iqembu lalikhona uMorgan engekho, lisazoqhubeka futhi njengoba esehambile.”UMammila ujoyine iChippa enezinkinga zemali njengoba kuvela ukuthi kunabadlali abangasaholi nabakweletwa imali yokusayina. Abanye sebeze bashiya. Kulaba badlali kukhona uJames Okwuosa waseNigeria ozama inhlanhla lwiHighlands Park, Thato Mokeke obuyele kwiCape Town City noNkosinathi Mthiyane obebuyele ekuqaleni kwesizini kwiChilli Boys. Kuvele ukuthi nabanye bayalandela okukhona kubona ukaputeni uMark Mayambela.Esitatimendeni sokwamukela uMammila, uMpengesi uthe uzoletha amava kulandela ukwenza kahle kwiBaroka.“Akukhona kuphela ukuthi uyaliqonda ibhola kodwa ungusomabhizinisi omkhulu futhi angingabazi ukuthi uzosiza kakhulu ekuphathekeni kweqembu ahole ngendlela efanele,” kusho uMpengesi.NgoMgqibelo iBaroka inmdlalo onzima njengoba izobhekana neCape Town City emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eCape Town Stadium, ngo-8.15 ebusuku.Leli qembu eliqeqeshwa nguWedson Nyirenda libuya endukwini eliyithole kubakhaya iBlack Leopards ebashaya ngo 1-0 ngempelasonto. Selokhu iBaroaka iwine iTelkom Knockout ngokushaya i-Orlando Pirates kowamanqamu ngoDisemba izinto aziyihambeli kahle emidlalweni yeligi.Isendaweni ka-13 kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-14 ngemuva kwemidlalo ewu-16.
title: Akuthi ndiki kusula isikhulu koweBaroka

text: ZIVULWE namhlanje ngaphansi kwemibandela eqinile izibhedlela ezimbili ezizimele iSt Augustine’s neKingsway, ebezivalwe ngenxa yabahaqwe yigciwane iCorona.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, umemezele ukuthi lezi zibhedlela kumele zilandele umyalelo kamengameli ngokuhlinzeka bonke abasebenzi ngezokuzivikela, nokuba nomtholampilo ozobhekela abanemfiva nokuqeqesha abasebenzi ngeCovid-19.“UMnyango wezeMpilo uzotheleka kulezi zibhedlela ngaphandle kokubazisa.Sithathe isinqumo sokuvula lezi zibhedlela emuva kokubona umbiko.”Inyunyana yabasebenzi bezempilo iDenosa ithe ayeneme ngokuthi lezi zibhedlela ziyavulwa namuhla yathi ayiwutholanga umbiko.Phezu kokuba abaphathi balezi zibhedlela bethi konke kumi ngomumo ukuthi kuvulwe namuhla, iDenosa ithi ibifuna ukubona umbiko kuqala.Kwavalwa kuqala iSt Augustine’s emuva kokuhaqeka kwabangu-66 obekukhona abangu-48 okungabasebenzi bezempilo. Kwalandela iKingsway ebinabangu-10 abahaqekile kanti sekushone abane ngenxa yeCovid-9 kulezi zibhedlela. OnguNobhala weDenosa eKZN, uMnuz Mandla Shabangu, uthe umbiko wophenyo ngokuhaqeka kwamalungu abo bawuzwa ngendaba.Uthe bebefuna kuvulwe lezi zibhedlela sebewubonile umbiko njengoba kwahaqeka namalungu abo.“Ukuthola umbiko bekuzosisiza ukubheka ukuthi yini ebidale izibalo ezingaka zabahaqekile nokuthi lesi simo sizovikelwa kanjani. Esasikutholile kumalungu ethu wukuthi ukuhaqeka kwawo kwadalwa ukuthi bezingekho izivikelo zokusebenza,” kuchaza uShabangu.UShabangu uthe sebekhulumile namalungu abo ngalolu daba, avuma ukuthi azoqala namuhla ukusebenza.Uthe bawadonse ngendlebe ukuthi afune izivikelo zokusebenza kuqala. UShabangu usenethemba lokuthi mhlawumbe abaphathi bezibhedlela bazobanika umbiko uma sebevulile.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo eKZN, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, udalule ukuthi abaphathi balezi zibhedlela babafakela ingcindezi yokuthi zivulwe.Izolo esithangamini nabezindaba uthe zonke izibhedlela kuzomele zibe nemitholampilo yemfiva ukuze abantu bahlolwe.Uthe ngomuso babheka ukuthi bavale sonke isibhedlela uma kukhona abahaqekile noma bavale ingxenye ethile noma iwodi kuphela.Esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe Isolezwe abaphathi besibhedlela bathi konke kumi ngomumo futhi bavumelene nomnyango ngoLwesihlanu ukuthi bavule.UMnuz Craig Murphy onguMqondisi wezibhedlela zakwaNetcare esifundazweni, uthe benze konke ukuqinisekisa ezokuphepha ngaphambi kokuthi bavule.“Kusukela kwavalwa ukwamukelwa kweziguli ngo-Ephreli besisebenza nomnyango ngezinhlelo zokulwa neCovid-19. Ngesonto eledlule izibhedlela zethu ziphinde zathuthukisa izinhlelo zokuhlanza nokufutha ngezibulalimagciwane zonke izindawo zokusebenza. Bonke odokotela kuzo zombili izibhedlela bazoqala ukubona iziguli ngoMsombuluko (namuhla),” kusho uMurphy.Ubonge umphakathi ngokubekezela njengoba lezi zibhedlela bezisavaliwe, wathembisa ukuthi bazoqhubeka nokwenza umsebenzi ngokuzimisela.UMurphy uncome nabasebenzi babo athe bakhombise ukuzimisela phezu kokuqubuka kwalezi zibalo kulezi zibhedlela. Uthe uyazi ukuthi kunzima kanjani ukusebenza ngaphansi kwalezi zimo zobhubhane kodwa bayawuncoma umsebenzi wabo.
title: Zivuliwe namuhla izibhedlela ebezivalwe ngenxa yeCorona

text: AMAQEMBU aphikisayo athi ayikho into entsha eshiwo nguNgqongqoshe wezeziMali kuleli uMnuz Tito Mboweni ngesikhathi ethula isabelomali samaphakathi nonyaka ePhalamende izolo.USotswebhu we-EFF ePhalamende uMnuz Floyd Shivambu, uthe awusoze wakhula umnotho wakuleli uma kusasetshenziswa kakhulu umkhiqizo wamazwe angaphandle.UShivambu uthe bebenze izincomo eziningi bazinika uMboweni ezichaza ukuthi ungasimamiswa kanjani umnotho wakuleli kodwa wazishaya indiva.“Ukuze sikwazi ukukhulisa umnotho wezwe lethu kumele siqinise ekwakheni izimboni zomkhiqizo zalapha hhayi indaba yokusebenzisa imikhiqizo yangaphandle. Ngingasho ngingahlonizi ukuthi ayikho into entsha eshiwo nguMboweni ebuyisa ithemba kubantu bakuleli ngokuthi umnotho ungakhuliswa kanjani,” kusho uShivambu.Umholi we-IFP, inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, ithe lesi sabelo sikhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika isenkingeni.UMnuz Jordan Lewis weDA, uthe kuyadumaza ukuthi izikweletu zezwe ziyaqhubeka nokunyuka kunokuthi zehle. Uthe asikho isimemezelo esisha esishiwo nguMboweni.Okhulumela i-ANC uMnuz Dakota Legoete, uthe bayasamukela isabelo wengeza ngokuthi banethemba lokuthi sizoletha izinguquko emnothweni wezwe.Uthe baneme ukuthi uhulumeni uzibophezele ekufakeni imali eningi kwingqalasizinda ukuze kufukulwe umnotho.Uthe ukufakwa kwemali kwaSars nakwi-NPA kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi uhulumeni uzibophezele ekulweni nenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.
title: Amaqembu aphikisayo aweneme ngekaMboweni

text: UKUBA namakhono amaningi kumphendlele indawo yokulingisa kwiMbewu:The Seed, umlingisi uNtombehle Gambushe obuye abizwe ngoMajola (21) oshone engozini yemoto ngeledlule.Lokhu kuvele enkonzweni yomngcwabo wakhe ebiseMlazi Cinema izolo.Abaphathi beMbewu: The Seed bathe abamfakanga kulo mdlalo ngoba emuhle kodwa yikhono lakhe elamphendlela indawo. Bathe nendawo kaNonhlanhla abeyilingisa kulo mdlalo yayingekho ezinhlelweni zabo ngesikhathi besungula umdlalo kodwa bazizwa bephoqelekile ukuthi babe nayo ngesikhathi bebona ikhono lakhe.Umqondisi weMizan Casting Agency, uThemba Zuma, abengaphansi kwayo uNtombehle, uthe noma ebengumlingisi obenekhono uNtombenhle kodwa ubengakuthandi ukulingisa, ubenesifiso sokuba ngumqondisi wemidlalo yethelevishini.EMizan Casting Agency, uNtombenhle ubethuthukisa ikhono kubalingisi abasafufusa.Uyise kaNtombenhle, uZumah Majola odlulise umyalezo ngomngani wakhe uBiyela enkonzweni yomngcwabo wendodakazi yakhe, uthe uNtombenhle ubehlala ematasa kakhulu futhi ubeze angabi naso ngisho isikhathi somndeni.“Besike sihlele ukuba nomhlangano noNtombenhle kodwa awuchithe ngomzuzu wokugcina, athi sekukhona osekuvelile uyaphuthuma. Bengize ngibuze kubazala bakhe ukuthi umatasa nani ngempela uNtombenhle njengoba ehlala ematasa kanje. Lokho bekusixabanisa ngoba bengibona sengathi unake abangani kunomndeni. Namhlanje ngitholile ukuthi indodakazi yami ibingadlali ibisebenza kanzima. Lokho ngikuzwa ngezinkulumo ezethulwa ngaye ngoba besingahlali sinaye,” kusho uyise.Kuthiwa ubenomoya omuhle futhi enabangani abaningi.UNtombenhle ufundele ukulingisa e-AFDA.Ushiye uyise, unina, uninakhulu, abafowabo abane nodadewabo.Bekunabalingisi beMbewu: The Seed nabaphathi bayo okuthiwa bamise ukuqopha ukuze bayovalelisa okokugcina emngcwabeni kazakwabo.Kunandise uMelusi Mbokazi, Ithimba le-Africa, Amazing Grace nabanye. Ungcwatshwe emathuneni Ezinkawini, eChesterville izolo.
title: Bamise ukuqopha beyovalelisa abeMbewu

text: KUMASIZINI amahlanu edlule kukhonya iMamelodi Sundowns ngokunqoba izicoco kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL). Yize kunjalo, sisodwa isicoco leli ebingakasinqobi - yiMTN 8.UManqoba “TV” Mngqithi, oqokwe noRhulani Mokwena ukuba bahole amaBrazilians, uthe bafuna ukukuqeda ukuhlulwa kwabo wukunqoba isicoco seMTN 8.UMngqithi ukusho lokhu ebonga kumengameli weqembu, uPatrice Motsepe, nebhodi lakhe ngokubanika ithuba benoMokwena lokuthatha umsebenzi onzima.Bavala isikhala sikaPitso “Jingles” Mosimane, oseqeqesha i-Al Ahly yase-Egypt.“Sifisa ukuzibongela ebhodini nomengameli weqembu ngokusethemba ngomsebenzi. Okubaluleke kakhulu wukuthi sifuna ukwesekwa ngabalandeli bethu. Lesi yisikhathi esibadinga ngaso. Angingabazi ukuthi uma bengaseseka, iqembu lizoqhubeka lapho ligcine khona kusekhona uMosimane. Sifuna ukwenza okungakaze kwenzeke eqenjini. Sizoqala ngokunqoba isicoco seMTN 8 ngoba iqembu liyasihlonga,” kusho uMngqithi.Yize bekhethwe bobabili (uMngqithi noMokwena) ukuba bahole Abafana Ba Style kodwa uMngqithi uzoba nezwi lokugcina. Ukungenzi kahle kwi-Orlando Pirates nokushiya isigubhukane kwiChippa United kungenzeka ukube yikhona okumenzele phansi uMokwena.“UMokwena ngumqeqeshi osezingeni eliphezulu kakhulu kabi. Ngiyanxusa ukuba abalandeli beSundowns basinike ithuba. Ngiyakholelwa ekutheni uma sithole ukwesekwa, sizogila izimanga. Ngijabule ngendlela abadlali abasamukele ngayo ngesikhathi siziqeqesha. Lapha kwiSundowns sinabadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu abawuhloniphayo umsebenzi wabo,” kusho uMngqithi.Bese kukhona ukusola ukuthi iSundowns ingase ifune umqeqeshi wangaphandle emuva kwamahlebezi okuthi uFlorent Ibenge waseDRC nguyena ongase athathe izintambo.“Ngokwejwayelekile uma iqembu likulesi simo, lingabuka ngaphandle liqashe umqeqeshi wokuhamba. Kumele sikubonge ukuthi uMotsepe uqalaze khona la ebaleni wathatha thina. Okumele sikwenze manje wukumbonga ngokuqhubeka nomsebenzi omuhle,” kusho uMngqithi.Imidlalo ye-MTN 8Ngo-Okthoba 17: Tshakhuma FC v SuperSport United (3pm, Thohoyandou Stadium); Orlando Pirates v Cape Town City (6pm, Orlando Stadium).Ngo-Okthoba 18: Kaizer Chiefs v Maritzburg United (3pm, FNB Stadium); Mamelodi Sundowns v Bloemfontein Celtic (6pm, Lucas Moripe Stadium).
title: Phezu kokukhonya iDowns ihlonga eseMTN 8

text: KUZOSHUBA ezinkampanini eziphula umthetho wokusebenza konogada njengoba iPrivate Security Industry Regulatory Authority (Psira) isimise inkampani edume ngokukhipha abakhe ezindaweni ezingafanele, iRed Ants Security Relocation and Eviction Services.IPsira imise ukusebenza kweRed Ants emuva kwezikhalo zokuthi inesihluku uma yenza umsebenzi wayo futhi ayibaphathi kahle abantu esuke izobakhipha.IRed Ants idume kakhulu eGauteng kwazise muva nje iyona ebikhipha abantu abebakhe imijondolo endaweni engafanele e-Alexandra.Isikhulu esiphezulu sePsira, uMnuz Manabela Chauke sithe iRed Ants inikezwe ithuba lokuthi iziphendulele ngaphambi kokuthi imiswe.Uthe inalo ilungelo lokuphikisa isinqumo sokumiswa kwayo.“Zonke izinkampani zonogada zizoqashwa ngeso lokhozi, ukuthi ziwenza ngokufanele yini umsebenzi wazo. Uma kunezikhalo sizoziphenya, sibamise okufanele bamiswe. Banalo ilungelo lokuphikisa izinqumo zethu kodwa umsebenzi sizowuqapha,” kusho uChauke.Khonamanjalo inhlangano elwela amalungelo abantu, i-AfriForum ithe ayihambisani nomthetho ohlongozwayo wokuthi izinkampani zonogada zingabi nezibhamu ezinkulu ezizishintshayo.UMnuz Marnus Kamfer, obhekele ezomthetho nokuphepha komphakathi kwi-AfriForum uthe akazi ukuthi uhulumeni ufuna onogada bazivikele kanjani uma kuthiwa bangaziphathi izibhamu ezizishintshayo.“Siphakamisa ukuthi uhulumeni ayibuyekeze le mithetho. Siyitshelile nePsira ukuthi asineme ngokuthi kuzoncishiswa izibhamu ezinkulu ezizishintshayo.Bekungafanele uhulumeni achibiyele imithetho ethinta ukusebenza kwalezi zibhamu ngaphandle kokuxoxa nezinkampani zonogada. Uthi sizozivikela kanjani ezigebengwini eziphatha izinhlokohlela zezibhamu?” kusho uKamfer.
title: Amisiwe ukusebenza amaRed Ants asatshwayo

text: ZIYANDA izinhlangano ezifaka uMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo enkantolo ngodaba lokubhalwa kabusha kwamaphepha aputshukile kamatric njengoba ne-AfriForum izoya enkantolo kusasa. Kushone elayizolo kungacaci ukuthi iSouth African Democratic Teachers Union (Sadtu) iwafakile yini amaphepha okuvimbela ukubhalwa kwephepha leMathematics nelePhysical Science.UNksz Nomusa Cembi okhulumela iSadtu, uthe abameli babo bamatasa namaphepha abazowathumela enkantolo.Izolo uNksz Natasha Venter we-AfriForum, uthe kusasa bazofaka amaphepha okuvimbela uMnyango wezeMfundo ukuthi ubhalise abafundi amaphepha aputshukile.Uthe bawu-195 kuphela abafundi ababone amaphepha aputshukile ngakho akufanele kujeziswe ababalelwa ku-400 000, ngokuthi baphindiswe amaphepha akade sebewabhalile.Uveze ukuthi bazobe bemele abafundi abane bakwamatric abangafuni ukuphinda babhale lezi zifundo.“Ziningi izindlela zokuxazulula udaba lokuputshuka kwamaphepha ngaphandle kokuqalisa phansi bonke abafundi. Umthetho woMnyango wezeMfundo uthi uma kwenzeke isigameko esingelona iphutha lomfundi iphepha kufanele limakwe. Ucwaningo lo mnyango kufanele lubheke ukuthi yibaphi abafundi abahlomulile. Okokuqala nje abafundi abaputshuzelwe iphepha babeyingxenye kaWhatsapp womnyango owenzelwe abafundi abenza kahle,” kusho uNksz Venter.Uthe ngeke bavumele uNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uNkk Angie Motshekga, ukuthi adlale ngabafundi abasebenze kanzima ngephutha elenziwe wumnyango.UMnuz Lucky Ditaunyane okhulumela uhlaka olubhekelele izingabunjalo likamatric Umalusi, uthe kubalulekile ukuthi amaphepha aputshukile abhalwe kabusha ukuvikela isithunzi sezivivinyo zikamatric.“Siyawahlonipha amalungelo ezinyunyana okuya enkantolo kodwa uma kunesidingo sizoya enkantolo siyovikela isinqumo sokuthi abhalwe kabusha amaphepha aputshukile. Kubalulekile ukuthi isithunzi sezivivinyo sivikelwe ukuze kuvikelwe ikusasa labafundi. Uma imiphumela ibonakala sengathi inogcobho lokho akubi nemiphumela emihle,” kusho uDitaunyane.UMnuz Elijah Mhlanga wezokuxhumana emnyangweni, uthe uma iSadtu nabanye abafuna ukubopha umnyango sebewafakile amaphepha enkantolo, umnyango uzoziphendulela ngoba kuyimanje abameli bawo balindele noma yini.I-Equal Education ne-Equal Education Law Centre ithe Umalusi nomnyango weMfundo awuwenzanga okwenele ukuqinisekisa abantu ukuthi ukubhalwa kabusha kwamaphepha aputshukile iyona yodwa indlela yokuvikela isithunzi sezivivinyo.Esitatimendini esithunyelwe kwabezindaba i-Equal Education, ithe ikhathazekile ngokhwantalala oluqale ngesikhathi kuputshuka amaphepha.Lolu khwantalala luyaqhubeka njengoba abafundi bezozibhala kabusha lezi zifundo."Othisha nabafundi bakamatric bebethwele kanzima kulo nyaka ngoba ngaphambi kokuqubuka kweCovid-19, bekunenkinga yokushoda kwezinsiza kufunda. Asinaso isiqiniseko sokuthi ukubhalisa kabusha bonke abafundi bakwamatric iphepha lesibili lemathematics nelephysical science kulungile. Ukuputshuka kwephepha yinto ebucayi kodwa Umalusi nomnyango awukasho ukuthi ngabe ukubhala kabusha iyona ndlela yokulungisa isimo."
title: Ziyanda ezibopha owezemfundo ngomatric

text: BUNGASE buqine ubufakazi obethulwa ngomfowabo kaJaji Raymond Zondo kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana kuleli sonto.Ngesonto eledlule  ngesikhathi kufakaza owayeyinhloko ye-Independent Police Investigative Directorate (Ipid), uMnuz Robert McBride waveza ukuthi usazogeqa amagula ngoMnuz Mxolisi Zondo, owayelawula ukuqondiswa kobugwegwe komphenyi we-Ipid.UZondo wathi uzolulalela lolu daba bese exhumana nezinhlangano ezizimele ezazi ngomthetho ngokuthi alusingathe kanjani.Umholi wobufakazi kule khomishini uMnuz Paul Pretorious uthe sekunofakazi wesibili ozofakaza ngoMxolisi Zondo.“Ngicabanga ukuthi kungangcono uma singalinda obunye ubufakazi, uma uGeneral (Johan) Booysen enokunye afisa ukukuveza akakuveze ngaphambi kokuthi sithathe isinqumo ngalolu daba,” kusho uZondo.Isazi sezomthetho, uMnuz Bonke Dumisa uthe uma ubufakazi obuzothulwa ngomfowabo kaJaji Zondo bumthinta kakhulu, uSihlalo weKhomishini kuzodingeka ukuthi ahoxe ekulaleleni isigaba esithinta umfowabo.“Asikho isidingo sokuthi ahoxe njengoSihlalo weKhomishini ngoba ngokuzwa kwami lobu bufakazi yinto nje emthinta kancane umfowabo. Akubona  ubufakazi obuqanda ikhanda,” kusho uDumisa.
title: Luyashuba olukaZondo kufakazwa ngomfowabo

text: KUQALE phansi ukungcofwa komculi wakuleli uLady Zamar ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ebesekubukeka kudambile emasontweni edlule. Kule mpelasonto uLady Zamar akazange akuthole ukuphumula etinyelwa ngapha nangapha ezithombeni abezinameka emakhasini akhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Yize ebengandile ngamazwi, ubebukeka ezijabulele epholile kodwa abantu abaningi bakushaya indiva lokho bamvusela amagqubu.Iningi labantu lithi ngisho anganama kangakanani lo mculi kodwa akasoze akuthola ukuphumula engakalikhulumi iqiniso abalifunayo ngokwenzeka phakathi kwakhe nesilomo somculo uSjava. Babodwa abamqalekisa ngokuthi uzoba namabhadi njengoba isizwe samaZulu sizilile bekufanele ngabe uyazehlisa axolise. Lokhu kwenziwa abesilisa ngokulinganayo nabesifazane abazwakalisa ukuthi abaneme ngezinsolo azibeka ngoSjava abambiza ngenhlalisuthi.Yize kunemibhalo ezwakalisa ukungenami ngalolu daba, uLady Zamar akabaphendulanga abantu njengoba engakaze aphawule ngalo selokhe lachithwa enkantolo. Bakhona nabalandeli bakhe abazwakalise ukumeseka bethi noma engathukwa kodwa umculo wakhe uyawelapha umoya.
title: ULady Zamar usabanjelwe igqubu ngolukaSjava

text: USIHLALO wekomiti elibhekelele izinkampani zikahulumeni ePhalamende, uMnuz Khaya Magaxa uthi uR3.5billion okhishwe yiDevelopment Bank of Southern Africa (DBSA) uzosiza iSouth African Airways (SAA) ukuze iqhubeke nokusebenza.Uthe le mali izokwazi ukususa ungabazane olukubantu lokuthi isazokwazi ukusebenza.“Abezindaba babike ukuthi ababhekelele ukuhlengwa kweSAA bathole uxhaso lukaR3.5billion. Le mali inikezwa iSAA ukuze ikwazi ukuqhubeka nomsebenzi wokuthutha abantu nomunye okufanele iwenze njengenkampani yamabhanoyi ezwe. Ikomiti lizofuna umbiko kwababhekelele ukuhlenga iSAA ukuze basho ukuthi bazozishintsha kanjani izinto kule nkampani,” kusho uMagaxa.UMnuz Stanford Mazhindu okhulumela inyunyana i-UASA uthe baphoxekile ngokuthi kulahlwa enye imali kwiSAA ekubeni kungaziwa ukuthi izobuya kanjani.“Kuyasimangaza ukuthi ibhange eliphethwe wuhulumeni iDBSA livumile ukulahla imali eSAA ekubeni sazi ukuthi imali yaleli bhange kufanele isetshenziselwe ukuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda. Besingazi ukuthi iDBSA yasungulelwa ukusiza izinkampani zikahulumeni eziwayo. Siphoxekile ukuthi esikhundleni sokuxhasa izinkampani ezizodala amathuba omsebenzi, kufakwa imali entweni engeke ibasize ngalutho abantu,” kusho uMazhindu.Uqhube wathi iSAA isitakulwe ngoR16.5billion wabakhokhi bentela kodwa njalo ihlale idinga imali ngakho nalena eyinikwe yiDBSA, ngeke iyisize ngalutho.UMnuz Alf Lees weDA uthe uzobhalela uNgqongqoshe wezoHwebo neziMboni, uMnuz Ibrahim Patel, ambuze ngemibandela yokubolekwa kweSAA uR3.5 billion yiDBSA ngoba bafuna ukwazi ukuthi iDBSA izohlomulani kwiSAA.
title: Inyunyana ithi imali okutakulwe ngayo iSAA ifana nelahliwe

text: ZAKHELE XABALISHABALELE ikusasa lowayengunozinti we-Orlando Pirates, uBrighton Mhlongo, okuvela ukuthi uzophoqeleka ukuwagaxa emgibeni amakhokho akhe ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2020/2021 ngenxa yokulimala esweni.UMhlongo (30), osevimbela iTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM), uwukudla kwebhentshi kuleli qembu ngenxa yokuba sefomini enhle kukamakadebona, uWashington Arubi, waseZimbabwe. Empeleni uMhlongo akakaze alithole ithuba lokuvimba njalo selokhu ahlukana nePirates ngo-2017. KwiChippa United, ayijoyine esuka kwiPirates, ubecwebezelisa ibhentshi okuyisimo abhekane naso futhi kwiBidvest Wits ngaphansi komqeqeshi, uGavin Hunt. UMhlongo ngomunye wabadlali abathuthele kwiTTM emuva kokuba ithenge iWits ekupheleni kwesizini edlule.Emuva kokuwina indebe, iNedbank Cup, umqeqeshi weTTM, uDylan Kerr, udalule ukuthi uMhlongo uzoliyeka ibhola ekupheleni kwesizini. Kuthiwa lo nozinti ushaywe yibhola emehlweni ngesikhathi iqembu liziqeqesha emasontweni adlule. Kuthiwa odokotela abahlukene bakuqinisekisile ukuthi elinye iso lakhe selilimele unomphela."Angikhulume ngoBrighton osekufanele awaphanyeke emgibeni amakhokho akhe ekupheleni kwesizini ngenxa yokulimala. Wethule inkulumo kubadlali namuhla ekuseni (ngoMgqibelo) engicabanga ukuthi kukhombisa indlela iqembu eliyiyona nobumbano olukhona. Ngeke lokho sikuzibe ngoba kumephule umoya ukuma phambi kozakwabo ekubeni ezazi ukuthi ngeke aphinde alidlale ibhola," kusho uKerr.Ukulimala kukaMhlongo kwenzeke kungakapheli neminyaka emibili kushabalale amaphupho kaBrilliant Khuzwayo obekubhekwe lukhulu kuyena. UKhuzwayo, ovimbele iKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates, uyeke ibhola ngo-2019 ngenxa yokulimala eqakaleni engakaze adlale nowokubika umdlalo kweZimnyama. Ngaphandle kokulahlekelwa yisinkwa, uMhlongo uzophunyukwa yithuba lokudlala kwiCAF Confederation Cup ezodlalwa yiTTM ngenxa yokuba ngompetha beNedbank Cup.Okhulumela iTTM, uRufus Matsena, uthe bazozidalula kungekudala izinhlelo abanazo ngoMhlongo."Okwamanje ngeke ngikwazi ukudalula lutho. Kuningi obekufanele sikuxoxe naye. Okuningi kwakho asikakunekeli izwe. Sihlele isithangami nabezindaba lapho esizochaza kahle khona ngesimo sakhe ngoba ngeke kwehle kahle kumuntu okule minyaka akuyo ukuthi abone izinhlelo ngaye sezigcwele kwabezindaba," kusho uMatsena.
title: UMhlongo uphoqeleke ukuyeka ibhola elimala esweni

text: UNQUNYELWE ugwayi katiki umasikanda uKhuzani “Indlamlenze” Mpungose emuva kokwehluleka ukufika emhlanganweni abebizwe kuwona yikomiti loxolo elibunjwe amakhosi ezizwe ezahlukene.UKhuzani ubebizwe ukuba avele ekomitini ngoLwesine, eSanlam Centre eMpangeni kodwa wangafika. Umdidiyeli wekomiti uDkt 3 Seconds obuye abe yinyanga, uthe lo mculi kufanele afike ngoJuni 21 uma kungenjalo uzolutheza olunenkume.Ukubizwa kwakhe kusukela empini ephakathi kwakhe noMthandeni “Igcokama Elisha” Manqele, angcofana naye ngezingoma. Impi yalabo maskanda inomlando omude njengoba kuke kwaphuma nesidumbu komunye umcimbi womaskanda nokwadala ukuthi amakhosi angenelele ngoba ephebeza umkhokha wokufa kwabalandeli bakamaskandi.UKhuzani usolwa ngokuphehla udweshu nakuba sebalanyulwa kodwa yena wakhipha icwecwe elithi Inhlinini Yoxolo nokusolwa ukuthi uhlekisa ngoxolo olwaba phakathi kwakhe neGcokama.“Akakazwanga ukufika kodwa inkosi yakhe ifikile yachaza ukuthi umatasa nomsebenzi, ngeke akwazi ukuvela. Umhlangano olandelayo kufanele angaphuthi nhlobo ngoba uyobe ezithintele iziqandu," kusho u-3 Seconds.Uthe amakhosi aphoxekile ngesenzo sikaKhuzani ngoba nawo abeshiye imisebenzi yawo ebalulekile eza emhlanganweni.UKhuzani ethintwa ngalolu daba uthe, ubematasa ethwebula ivideo ehambisana nomkhankaso wakhe wokusoka ayinxusa lawo.Uthe uxolisile emakhosini.“Lo msebenzi engimatasa nawo uxhaswe ngabelungu baphesheya, manje bekuyinto ebalulekile ukuthi ngingaphuthi kuwo. Uma ngike ngaphutha bengingaphucwa ngisho ukuba yinxusa. Ngicele inkosi yakithi ukuthi ifike ingixolisele kubo bonke abahlonishwa,’’ kuchaza uKhuzani.Uthe zonke izinqumo ezithathwe kulo mhlangano uyahambisana nazo, futhi uyazihlonipha.Kuvele nokuthi emhlanganweni olandelayo kubizwe nabaphathi beziteshi zomsakazo ezidlala umculo kamaskandi ukuze bazoba yingxenye yokuzama ukuphemba ukuthula.
title: Amakhosi anqumele uKhuzani ugwayi katiki

text:
NGEMUVA kokuphika izinyanga ukuthi uzojoyina i-Orlando Pirates, ligcine livelile igama likaBrilliant Khuzwayo ohlwini lwabadlali abasha abamenyezelwe eziMnyama namhlanje.Kuleli qembu uKhuzwayo uzobanga ijezi noSiyabonga Mpontshane, Jackson Mabokgwane noWayne Sandilands.Abanye abadlali abamenyezelwe yiPirates ngoVincent Pule, Ben Motshwari, Meshack Maphangule, no-Asavela Mbekile, Linda Mntambo, Paseka Mako, Abel Mabaso noKudakwashe Mahachi.IPirates izoqala ngoMsombuluko ukulungiselela isizini entsha. Ebhala ekhasini lakhe ku-Instagram ngempelasonto uKhuzwayo uthe useqalile ukuziqeqeshela isizini entsha ye-Absa Premiership ezoqala ngo-Agasti.Gauteng see you soon ... I’m going to resume my personal preseason training before the actual preseason 😊🦁A post shared by 
Brilliant Khuzwayo16(@bk____16) on Jun 9, 2018 at 12:55am PDTI-Orlando Pirates ithenga laba badlali nje ilungiselela ukuyodlala kwiCAF Champions League ezoqala ngoNovemba.☠Bucs' New Signings💻
https://t.co/EDimol33sY⚫⚪🔴⭐
#OnceAlways
pic.twitter.com/BFIu1XHa51— Orlando Pirates FC (@orlandopirates) 
June 11, 2018
title: IPirates imemezele abadlali abawu-9 abasha

text: UDUMELE ngokuphoxa abalandeli koweCAF Champions League umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns uPitso Mosimane, osethubeni lokuzithoba amanxeba ngesicoco se-Absa Premiership.ISundowns ikhishwe kowandulela owamanqamu weChampions League yiWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco emuva kokudlala ngokulingana ngo 0-0 eLucas Moripe Stadium ngoMgqibelo.ISundowns iphume ngoba ibikade ihlulwe ngo 2-1 emlenzeni wokuqala ekuhambeni. Lokhu kusho ukushabalala kwephupho likaMosimane lokuwina iChampions League okwesibili.“Leli qembu lenze konke okusemandleni. Ngijabule ngokuthi lizamile. Uma uphuma kowandulela owamanqamu ngo 2-1 emuva kwemilenze emibili, kufanele ubhekane neqiniso, wamukele.Angisho ukuthi iqembu sisalakha ngoba sihluliwe, lokhu ngikusho njalo. Izinto zizohlangana,” kusho uMosimane.“Angiphoxekile ngeqembu kodwa ngiphoxeke ngomphumela. Niyangazi ngifuna ukuwina. Besinalo ithuba lokufinyelela kowamanqamu kodwa asiqalanga kahle. Emizuzwini ewu-15 yokuqala kade kunokwethuka eqenjini. Ngiphoxekile ngomphumela kodwa abantu basesekile, iNingizimu Afrika isesekile. Angicabangi ukuthi bekungabalandeli beSundowns kuphela. Kade sibumbene. Ngiphoxekile ukuthi sihlulekile ukudlulela phambili ekubeni sesekwe kangaka. Kunzima ukukwamukela okwamanje. Kodwa yibhola kufanele samukele, sizophinde sizame,” kusho uMosimane.Ngesizini ezayo yeChampions League, iSundowns ngeke iqale emidlalweni yokuhlunga ngenxa yokufinyelela kowandulela owamanqamu. Izophinde ihambisane ne-Orlando Pirates ebanga nayo isicoco sePremiership.ISundowns isinethuba elikhulu lokuwina iligi emuva kokudlala ngokulingana kwePirates neCape Town City. Uma inqoba kusasa kwiLamontville Golden Arrows eLoftus Versfeld, izohlala esicongweni. Lokhu kuzosho ukuthi ompetha beligi besizini ka-2018/2019 bazocaca ngoMgqibelo.UMosimane uthe ngeke asheshe ajabule ngethuba asebekulo lokuwina iligi.“Sinaso isiqiniseko (sokuwina) ngoLwesibili? Angithandi ukusheshe ngijabule. Kungenzeka noma yini ngoLwesibili. Awukwazi ukubhiyoza. Kufanele uwine kuqala. Emuva kokuwina sizokhuluma okwehlukile. Kusafanele siwine. Umdlalo esisele ngawo asikawuwini, kusafanele sidlalele ukuwina. Imidlalo eyisithupha ezinsukwini eziwu-15 kulaba bafana ayilula. Ngethemba ukuthi niyazi ukuthi i-Arrows iphumule kangakanani. Angicabangi ukuthi kufanele siwulawule umdlalo, sidlale ngendlela yeSundowns. Ngiyakholwa ukuthi singawuwina umdlalo njengoba nePirates kade ikholwa ukuthi ingayihlula iCape Town City. Ibhola linjalo nje. Asibone ukuthi kwenzekani emuva koLwesibili,” kusho uMosimane.
title: UPitso uphoxekile ngodaka koweCAF

text: BONGIWE ZUMANGAPHANDLE kwephimbo lakhe nezingoma ezinomyalezo owakhayo, bekukuningi okwenza umsebenzi kaSfiso Ncwane uvelele futhi ube sezingeni eliphezulu.Isandla sikankosikazi wakhe u-Ayanda Ncwane obeyiMenenja yakhe ofike empilweni kaNcwane washintsha izinto eziningi kusukela endleleni yokugqoka nabukeka ngayo esiteji, emicimbini kanjalo nasehhovisi kwenze omkhulu umehluko.U-Ayanda ufike kwacaca ngomsebenzi weNcwane Communications lokhu ekwenza njengomphathi nonkosikazi wakhe ophinde athole izindaba ezingamthokozisi.Abasondelene no-Ayanda bawushayela ihlombe umsebenzi wakhe ngokukwazi ukushaya izinyoni ezimbili ngetshe elilodwa.Omunye wabantu abazi kangcono ngeNcwane Communications ngusomabhizinisi wodumo eThekwini, uNkk Nto Majozi, ochaze u-Ayanda njengowesifazane onesibindi obekwazi ukwamukela izinto ezingezinhle nezingelona iqiniso ebezibuye zishiwo ngomyeni wakhe. Uthe ngaphandle kwalokho bekuthi uma kunzima kube u-Ayanda omisa isibindi uNcwane.“Wenze umsebenzi wokuba ngunkosikazi waphinde wakwazi ukuhlukanisa umsebenzi nezothando. Bekungakaze uzwe kuthiwa u-Ayanda uhlulekile ukumelana nezindaba ezithinta umyeni ngisho noma bezingezinhle ubekwazi ukwehla, ehlukanisa nezinto ezingehlisa isithunzi somyeni wakhe.“Ubemthanda umyeni wakhe emhlonipha, emkhulisela nezingane ngaphandle kokukhononda. “Ngimfisela isibindi namandla okuqhubeka nokunakekela umndeni wakhe noma engasekho uNcwane,” kusho uNkk Majozi .Omunye futhi umuntu osondelene kakhulu no-Ayanda nowaqala ngokuzwana noNcwane behlanganiswa umsebenzi wobuntatheli uNksz Sanelisiwe Bhengu we-Unique PR and Events. Uthe u-Ayanda ubezithobile kumyeni wakhe nakubantu abasondelene naye.“Ukuba unkosikazi nemenenja uphinde uhleke nabo bonke abantu abathanda umyeni wakho ngisho nabesifazane abahle akubi lula futhi akuwona wonke umuntu okwazi ukwenza njengo-Ayanda.“U-Ayanda ubeqinisekisa ukuthi uyabalalela abalandeli bakaNcwane futhi azisebenzise iziyalo zabo ngoba ubebeka umsebenzi womyeni wakhe phambili.Ukushona kukaNcwane akusho ukuphela kobungani kuthina njengabantu ebesisondelene nabo ngoba ukube wayengenalo uthando lwabantu ngabe bekungenzeki,” kusho uNksz Bhengu.
title: Uchazwe njengomuntu onesibindi u-Ayanda

text: UMLINGISI ozakhele udumo kwiThe Queen neSkeem Saam uNatasha Thahane, ucishe wangawubona lo nyaka ngenxa yokuxinwa yisifo sofuba.UNatasha (22), oqhuba uzifundo zokulingisa esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme sase-USA iNew York Academy, udalule kwiTwitter yakhe ukuthi waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela kumbulwa kwembeswa.“Yilesi sifo sofuba. Ngichithe amahora ayisithupha egunjini lezimo eziphuthumayo. Ngihlale izinsuku ezimbili esibhedlela kodwa ngomusa kaNkulunkulu ngiphumile, angibange ngisaficwa uNcibijane esibhedlela,” kusho uNatasha.Kwenzeka lokhu nje uNatasha uqhuba kahle kakhulu ezifundweni zakhe azenza kulesi sikhungo njengoba esanda kufaka imiphumela yakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Ubeveza nalapho etuswa khona nawuthisha omfundisayo.UNatasha uqale ukwaziwa ngokudlala indawo ka-Enhle emdlalweni osakazwa kuSABC1 iSkeem Saam ngo-2015.Washiya phansi lo mdlalo ngoJulayi 2016 eseyolingisa indawo ka-Amo Maake kwiThe Queen yakuMzansi Magic.Eminye imidlalo alingise kuyona kukhona iThe Saints and Sinners, Drama King, Single Galz, Ses’Top La, Umanqoba kanti ubevela nasezikhangisweni zethelevishini.Ungumzukulu ka-Archbishop Emeritus Desmond Tutu.
title: Kucishe konakala kumlingisi osenegama
