text: UYanga (17) omncane kunabo bonke abebekade bengenele lo mncintiswano, ukuveze lokhu esithangamini sabezindaba ebesibanjelwe eCarnival City, eGoli, ngemuva kokuhlwitha lesi sicoco.Bekunguqhude manikiniki phakathi kwakhe noThato Makape naye obesibheke ngabomvu lesi sicoco.UYanga uthe imali ayiwinile ngeke ayithinte, “uzoyivalela” unyaka wonke, aphile ngemali azobe eyithola ngomculo wakhe.Isinqumo sakhe sishayelwe ihlombe njengoba abanye besidalule njengobuhlakani obungaphezu kweminyaka yakhe.UYanga uveze ukuthi uhlela ukuqhubeka nezifundo zakhe njengoba enesifiso sokugcina eneziqu zomculo.Ugoduke ehleka yedwa uYanga njengoba ngaphezu kukaR1 million, obuhlanganiselwa abakwaTelkom, Capitec nabakwa Idols SA awutholile, uphinde wathola imoto iFord Titanium elinganiselwa kuR300 000. AbakwaYamaha bamnikeze i-voucher kaR80 000 yokuthi angathenga noma iziphi izinsimbi ezifunayo. AbakwaTruworths bamnikeze i-voucher kaR100 000 yokuthenga izingubo azithandayo esitolo sabo.Ezibongela uthe uzibona singamfanele lesi sicoco kodwa ubonga bonke abantu abamesekile kusukela ekuqaleni kwalo mncintiswano.Ubonge nomndeni wakhe ngokumeseka, wathi uvele ahlengezele izinyembezi uma ebona indlela abazali bakhe abaziqhenya ngayo ngaye.Umqondisi ophinde abe ngumdidiyeli we-Idols SA, uGavin Wratten uzwakalise ukujabula ngokuthi lolu hlelo luqophe umlando lathola amavoti angu-142 million kulo nyaka.Uncome ithalente likaYanga noThato, wabafisela okuhle kodwa endimeni yomculo asebengena kuyo.UThato uzishaye isifuba ngokugqamisa idolobha elincane aphuma kulo iPostmasburg.Yize engawinanga kodwa uthe iphupho lokugqamisa indawo yangakubo lifezekile.Uthe ngaphambi kokungenela lo mncintiswano bambalwaabantu abebazi indawo yangakubo.“ Manje akekho umuntu ongazi ukuthi kunendawo ebizwa ngePostmasburg. Abantu bangasekhaya bangadikibali ngoba ngingawinanga. Ngiyafana nowinile njengoba ngiphume isibili kulo mncintiswano omkhulu kangaka obungenelwe izinkumbi zabantu iNingizimu Afrika yonke,” kusho uThato.
title: UYanga uzowubekaebhange uR1 million

text: KUTHOLWE isidumbu sendoda sinenxeba esiphundu emgwaqweni owubhuqu e-Oakford, eVerulam, izolo ekuseni.Sibonwe ngamadoda amabili abezivocavoca emgwaqweni, abe esemisa imoto ebidlula ahlaba umkhosi.Okhulumela inkampani yonogada bakwaReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa), uMnuz Prem Balram, uthe bafonelwe ngumnikazi wemoto emile ebazisa ngesidumbu esitholakele.“Onogada nabezimo eziphuthumayo kwaRusa bajutshwe endaweni yesehlo ngo-7.09 ekuseni. Bathole isidumbu sendoda eneminyaka elinganiselwa ku-20. Besinenxeba elophayo esiphundu,” kusho uBalram.UBalram uthe le ndoda ibingazikhombisi izimpawu zomuntu ophilayo, yabe isiqinisekiswa njengomuntu oshonele endaweni yesehlo.Uthe ayaziwa imbangela yokufa kwayo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala eliphenywa ngamaphoyisa aseVerulam.UColonel Mbele uthe izolo kutholwe isidumbu somuntu e-Oakford, eVerulam.“Ubenenxeba elivulekile esiphundu. Amaphoyisa ayaphenya ngalesi sehlo,” kusho uMbele.
title: Kutholwe isidumbu sendoda sinenxeba esiphundu

text: LIGWETSHWE odiikajele ababili iphoyisa laKwaZulu-Natal ngamacala okubulala owesifazane owayeyintombi yalo nesoka lakhe elisha.UHlanganani Nxumalo (39) obesebenza njengosayitsheni ophikweni lweVIP Protection eMgungundlovu ngoMsombuluko uphinde wagwetshwa eminye iminyaka emihlanu ngokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza ngesikhathi kwethulwa isigwebo sakhe enkantolo enkulu eGoli. Kubikwa ukuthi ngoJuni nonyaka, uNxumalo washayela esuka KwaZulu-Natal elibhekise e-Alexandra eGoli, lapho afike wadubula wabulala khona lowo owayeyintombi yakhe nesoka lakhe elisha. "Ngemuva kokuthi umsolwa enze lesi senzo washayela wabuyela KwaZulu-Natal lapho afike aboshwa khona," kusho obambele okhulumela i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate (IPID) uMnuz Sontaga Seisa.USeisa uthe isigwebo sithumela umyalezo obalulekile wokuthi labo abangawuhloniphi umthetho bazobhekana nengalo yomthetho. Uncome umsebenzi owenziwe umseshi uMnuz Phihlela Nelson Poopedi waphinde wabonga nemindeni yababulewe ngokubambisana namaphoyisa.
title: Ligwetshwe odilikajele ababili iphoyisa elabulala owayeyintombi nesoka elisha

text: INKAKHA yomculi kamaskandi, Ihhashelimhlophe, ithi iswele amaphiko okundiza yinjabulo emva kokuba ngomunye wamaciko asemnkantshubomvu azohlonishwa ngeLifetime Achievement, emiklomelweni yezindondo amaSouth African Popular Music Awards (Sapma).Ihhashelimhlophe lithe yinto ebelingayilindele ukuthi lizonikwa indondo ekhethekile kumaSapma azoba seSun Arena, ePitoli ngoJulayi 31 nonyaka.Lithe belingalindele lutho njengoba iningi labaculi livalelwe yiCovid-19 ukuqhubeka kahle nomsebenzi walo njengoba izinto eziningi zisamisiwe.“Kuyajabulisa ukuthi kube nabantu ababonayo ukuthi kuneqhaza elikhulu engibe nalo emculweni. Sengisebenze kakhulu kule ndima. Kuyathokozisa ukuthi kukhona abantu abakubonayo lokho. Angigcini ngokuba kumaskandi kodwa kukhona neminye iminxa yomculo engisebenze kuyona, okwenza umsebenzi wami ugqame. Baningi nabaculi esengisenze nabo. Ukukha phezulu nje, singabala uJabu Khanyile, Black Motion, Boom Shaka, Sxaxa Mbiji, Yvonne Chaka Chaka nabanye abaningi,” kusho Ihhashelimhlophe.Kule miklomelo emenyezelwe ngokusemthethweni kuleli sonto kuzohlonishwa nezinye izinkakha zamaciko. Phakathi kwawo kukhona uJabu Khanyile, Lebo Mathosa, Mahotela Queens, Yvonne Chaka Chaka, Nana Coyote Motijoane, Stompie Mavie, Morris Sipho Roda noVusi Leeuw.Ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa le miklomelo neminxa ezongenelwa kuyona, abahleli bayo bathe abantu sebengaqala ukuqoka abaculi ababathandayo ukuthi bahlomule emiklomelweni. Baqokwa ngokugcwalisa ifomu elitholakala kwi-website yamaSapma. Kuvumeleke ukuthi kuqokwe abaculi abese benomculo oqoshiwe phakathi kuka-2010 no-2020.Phakathi kweminxa okuzoqokwa ngaphansi kwayo no-wehip hop, Afro, mbhaqanga /maskandi, gospel, amapiano /gqom/kwaito. Eminye iminxa izovotelwa. Kweminye abaculi bazoqokwa ngabahleli bale miklomelo. Ngaphambi komcimbi omkhulu kuzoqala iGala Dinner ezoba ngoJulayi 24 ePitoli.
title: Kuzohlonishwa Ihhashelimhlophe kumaSapma

text: NAKUBA izinto zibukeka zimhambela kahle kwezikanobhutshuzwayo u-Amanda Dlamini kodwa uthi akakaqedi ukuphupha ngafisa ukukwenza ebholeni.Selokhu uDlamini ashiya phansi eqenjini lesizwe iBanyana Banyana ayengukaputeni walo, uthole ithuba lokuba owokuqala wesifazane ukuhlaziya imidlalo yebhola esiteshini sethelevishini sezemidlalo, iSuperSport.Yilapho ekhombise khona abathandi bediski ukuthi akaphiwanga ekulidlaleni nje kuphela kodwa futhi uyakwazi ukukuthatha akubeke ngokulihlaziya.Kungekudala unyelwe yinyoni esandleni eqokwa njengenxusa lokuqala elimele isibhuda kwiCastle Africa 5s Social League, lapho efakwe khona nezinkakha uSamuel Eto’o, Christopher Katongo noMatthew Booth.Umqhudelwano uzodlalwa kuzona zonke izifundazwe ngamaqembu abesifazane nawabesilisa.“Ukuqokwa njengenxusa ngikuthatha njengethuba lokukhombisa abanye abantu besifazane ukuthi ibhola lingakuvulela amathuba. Ngikhuthaza abesifazane abalithandayo ibhola kodwa abangazange bathole ithuba lokudlala kwiBanyana noma emaqenjini aphezulu ukuthi beze nabangani babo bazofeza amaphupho abo. Umqhudelwano uvuleleke kulona lonke uhlobo lomuntu - ngabe unogada, uthisha noma umhlengikazi ungeza sizodlala ndawonye,” kusho * -Amanda.Amaqembu azonqoba ezifundazweni azoya emqhudelwaneni kazwelonke. Eliyoba ngumakhonya lizomela iNingizimu Afrika eTanzania ngoJuni 6 bese kuthi eliyokhonya e-Afrika linqobe uhambo oluya e-Europe no-Eto’o.Ngempelasonto edlule uDlamini nozakwabo uSimphiwe Dludlu banikezwe ithuba lokusakaza umdlalo we-quarterfinal yeNedbank Cup lapho bekubhekene iBidvest Wits neChippa United.“Kusho lukhulu kimina, ngesikhathi ngisuka le emakhaya eHarding angikaze ngicabange ukuthi ibhola lingangizuzisa kangaka. Kungenza ngibone ukuthi ngebhola ungaphupha ufike lapho ufisa khona. Isifiso sami esikhulu manje wukuthi ngibe wumhlaziyi ozosebenzisana namaqembu akwi-PSL. Ngifuna ukuya kwamanye amazwe ngifunde kabanzi ukuthi kwenziwa njani khona,” kusho u-Amanda.Ugqugquzele amantombazane asemancane ukuthi aziphathe kahle ngoba ukholwa wukuthi yikhona okumsizile ukumvulela amathuba.“Umsebenzi owenza njengamanje ufana ne-CV yomsebenzi wakho olandelayo.Ngiyakholelwa ekutheni ukuziphatha kwakho kubantu osebenzisana nabo yikhona okubalulekile. Nokungesabi ukuwamukela lawo mathuba uma evela kuyasiza,” kusho u-Amanda.Imininingwane ye-Africa 5s* Ukubhalisa kwamaqembu kuvalwa ngo-Ephreli 23.* Imali yokubhalisa u-R1 200 iqembu.* Abadlali kumele babe wu-10 eqenjini.* Kubhaliswa ku- www.Africafives.com noma www.actionsports.co.za
title: 'Kusekuningi engisafisa ukukwenza ebholeni'

text: UKHOMISHANA wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt General Khombinkosi Jula, uthi amaphoyisa azoqhubeka nokulwa nokudayiswa kwezidakamizwa esifundazweni.UJula usho lokhu emuva kokuthi amaphoyisa ethole izidakamizwa, abopha nabasolwa. Amaphoyisa ophiko olulwa nokushushumbiswa kwezidakamizwa nezibhamu, ebambisenei namaphoyisa eTask Team yasePhoyinti, abophe amadoda amabili aneminyaka engu-39 no-44 eBallito ashaqa izidakamizwa ezingabiza uR3 million.Lawa madoda bekulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi KwaDukuza izolo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe amaphoyisa athole ulwazi ngabantu abebedayisa izidakamizwa e-Ozard Way eBallito, abe esenikela khona. Kule ndawo afike athola izingcezu ezingu-6 400 ze-rock cocaine, i-rock cocaine enhlanu ebingakasikwa, ezinye izigcezu ezinkulu ezingu-12 ze-rock cocaine, opulastiki abayisikhombisa abanempuphu okusolakala ukuthi bekuyi-cocaine engu-5kg nenye i-cocaine ebigoqwe ngopulastiki, isisindo sayoesingu-2kg.Lezi zidakamizwa kuthiwa zingabiza uR3 million. Abasolwa ababili baboshiwe, bagcinwa esiteshini samaphoyisa eMhlali ngecala lokutholwa nezidakamizwa.
title: Utuse amaphoyisa ashaqe izidakamizwa

text: MHLELI: UNgqongqoshe wezeziMali, uMnuz Tito Mboweni, uhlalelwe wumsebenzi wokwethula isabelo-mali esizokhanyisa ukuthi imali yokuthenga imigomo yeCovid-19 izovelaphi njengoba engalindelekile ukuthi anyuse intela ngenxa yesimo somnotho.Okunye okubhekwe ngabomvu wukuthi zilekelelwa kanjani ezempilo nezemfundo ngemali ukuze zibhekane nombhedukazwe weCovid-19.Kungokokuqala selokhu sabuswa ngokwentando yabantu ukuthi ungqongqoshe abe nengcindezi yokwethula isabelo-mali izwe libhekene nezinselelo kwezomnotho, inqwaba yabantu abangasebenzi kanye nobhubhane iCorona.Kuningi osekushintshile kusukela uMboweni ethula isabelo-mali ngonyaka odlule ngenxa yeCovid-19 elahlekisele abantu ngemisebenzi nomnotho wezwe uqumbeke phansi. Ukungasebenzi kwabantu kusho ukuncipha kwentela eqoqwa uhulumeni.Njengoba bekuvalwe izwe uhulumeni ulahlekelwe imali eningi okubuye kwangezwa wukuvalwa kotshwala nogwayi okuyizinto ezifaka itshe lemali esikhwameni sikahulumeni.Esikulindele kuMboweni ukuthi ethule isabelo-mali esizobuyisa ithemba ngokuvuka komnotho. Okubalulekile wukuthi abantu basheshe bazibonele umnotho ubuyela emgqeni ngokudaleka kwamathuba emisebenzi.Kodwa-ke ngabe senza iphutha uma singalindela ukushintsha kwesimo ngokushesha kwazise mkhulu kakhulu umonakalo odalwe yiCovd-19. INingizimu Afrika izithole seyiboleka imali okuyinto ekade ingayihlelele. Lokhu kwenzeke kade vele izwe lidonsa kanzima ngenxa yezikweletu ebelinazo. Ukusimama kahle komnotho kulindeleke ngo-2025 ngakho okwamanje wukuthi uMboweni akhombe indlela ezosibeka lapho.Siyakuqonda nokuthi uMboweni ucindezwa nawukuthi umnotho weNingizimu Afrika ubekwe kuvobe. Lokhu kusho ukuthi izinkampani zomhlaba ngeke zisiboleke kalula imali futhi kwazinkampani zikahulumeni ngeke zibathole abatshalimali bakwamanye amazwe.Ukhiye womnotho usenkampanini kahulumeni i-Eskom edonsa kanzima. Lokhu kuyinkinga ngoba uMboweni akakwazi ukuyekelela le nkampani yehluleke. Ngakolunye uhlangothi akakwazi ukulokhu equlele imali kuyona lungabonakali ushintsho. Kade sathenjiswa ukuthi kunohlelo lokutakula i-Eskom, kepha sekuthulekile. Kungakuhle uMboweni asicacisele ukuthi sekuhanjwe kwafikwaphi nalolo hlelo.Mazwakhe MkhizeENTSHANGWE
title: UMboweni uhlalelwe wumsebenzi onzima

text: LIVULELWE icala lokuzama ukubulala ikhansela le-ANC eMkhandlwini weTheku ngemuva kwezinsolo zokudubula owesilisa ohlala kwi-ward yalo eDassenhoek ngaphandle kwasePinetown.Ikhansela, elingeke lidalulwe ngoba alikaboshwa, kuthiwa lishaye uMnuz Sabelo Msomi (27) kanzima ngaphambi kokuthi limdubule ngeledlule.UMsomi kuthiwa ubefuna owesifazane abebehamba naye nomngani wakhe ngesikhathi bembheka baze bangena nakubo kwekhansela kanti bazidonsela amanzi ngomsele.Elanda ngokwenzekile uMsomi uthe ubehamba nomngani wakhe befuna owesifazane wangakubo ngesikhathi bengena kubo kwekhansela.“Ngasuka nentombazane ngasekhaya ngaya ngakubo kakhansela. Endleleni le ntombazane ingene komunye umuzi mina ngaqhubeka ngangena esitolo ngiyothenga ugwayi. Ngithathe omunye umfowethu ngathi asiyobheka le ntombazane ebengihamba nayo. Singene komunye umuzi safika kukhona abahleli emnyango babuza ukuthi sifunani sachaza, ikhansela lasukuma laya emotweni ladonsa isibhamu lathi asilale phansi lasishaya lasigxoba ngezinyawo,” kusho uMsomi.Uthe liqhubekile labashaya labe selibasesha lathola ukuthi abaphethe lutho.“Lisixoshile lathi asihambe kodwa mina ngabuye ngabuyela emuva ngithi ngiyolanda uphaqa wami obusele nokuyilapho lingidubule khona,” kusho uMsomi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuthi likhona icala lokuzama ukubulala eliphenywa ngamaphoyisa aseMariannhill ngemuva kokuthi owesilisa oneminyaka engu 27 edutshulwe walimala ngoJuni 4.UGwala uthe imbangela yokuhlasela ibingakaziwa, wengeza ngokuthi bekungakaboshwa muntu, uphenyo lusaqhubeka.Lithintwa izolo ikhansela liphikile ukuthi kukhona umuntu elimdubulile. Lithe alimazi kwayena uMsomi okuthiwa limdubulile.USomlomo kuMkhandlu weTheku uMnuz William Mapena uthe ngeke aphawule ngalolu daba ngoba akalwazi.“Udaba lwamaphoyisa lolo oludinga umthetho usebenze,” kusho uMapena.
title: Ikhansela ecaleni lokuzama ukubulala

text: LIGQASHUKILE igoda lokusebenzisana phakathi kukaNomalanga “The Flame” Shozi (osesithombeni) neGagasi FM obesekuphele amasonto amathathu engekho emoyeni ngemuva kokumiswa.Ubethula uhlelo, iThe Flame at Night engena ngoMsombuluko ngo-10 ebusuku kuya ku-1 entathakusa.Ubephinde enze, iThe Plug Point ngo-4 kuya ku-7 ebusuku ngokubambisana noHeazy.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngomthombo ongaphakathi, sengathi okuqhathe lo msakazi nabaphathi ukungaphumeleli ukuza kwezinye izinhlelo zakhe.Kuphinde kwabikwa ukuthi wabanjwa wubuthongo wazumeka walala esemsebenzini ihora lonke.Emasontweni amabili edlule Isolezwe labika ngokumiswa kwakhe nokuthi uhlangane nabaphathi kudingidwa udaba lwakhe njengoba wayeqondiswa ubugwegwe.Okhulumela iGagasi FM, uKhulekani Shandu, uthe bafinyelele esivumelwaneni sokuthi bahlukane noNomalanga.“Isinqumo sathathwa ngemuva kokuthi kwakhulunywa ngodaba oluthinta inkontileka yakhe, kubhekwa kakhulu ukwanda kweminye yemisebenzi yakhe ngaphandle kwaseKZN,” kusho uKhulekani.Imizamo yokuthola uNomalanga izolo ayiphumelelanga.Ngaphandle kweGagasi FM uphinde abe ngumlingisi weRhythm City lapho edlala khona indawo esematheni kaNomalanga. Ubuye abe nohlelo alwethulayo kuMTV Base futhi uyavela nakwiSupersport.UKhulekani uthe uNomalanga uzobonakala okokugcina njengomsakazi weGagasi FM emcimbini abawuxhasile iDurban Day Picnic ezoba sePeople’s Park, eThekwini ngeSonto.Uzobe ephethe uhlelo kulo mcimbi.
title: Ugcine esekhonjwe indlela umsakazi weGagasi FM

text: INGANE (2) yaseNhlungwane, eMahlabathini, ishonile emuva kokuthi ikhalakathele ethoyilethi lomgodi kade idlala.UQiniso Dladla ubedlala emnyango ngesikhathi kwenzeka ingozi ngoMsombuluko.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, ukuqinisekisile okwenzekile wathi kuvulwe icala ngokushona komuntu. “Amaphoyisa aseMa­hlabathini aphenya icala lokufa komuntu ngo-Msombuluko ngo-3 ntambama eNhlungwane. Esisakutholile wukuthi ingane yomfana iphoseke ethoyilethi lomgodi ngesikhathi idlala,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Indoda ezibize ngoPhathumuzi, isibongo sayo esingatholakalanga, ithe yingane yomfowabo eshonile.Ithe: “Umfowethu akakwazi ngisho nokukhuluma nathi ngalolu daba, ngeke akwazi ukukhuluma nawe. Nathi sishaqekile, akukho nje engingakusho ngalolu daba,” kusho uPhathumuzi maqede wavala icingo.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Sibusiso Buthelezi, igama lalo elingatholakalanga, lithe: “Sitholile ngokwenzekile, sidlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini nasemphakathini,”Umthombo osondelene nodaba, ingane kusolwa ukuthi ihambe ingabonwa imuntu, yafika yangena ethoyilethi. Kuthiwa ibonwe elinye ilungu lomndeni, bazama ukuyitakula kodwa kwangasiza lutho.Kuthiwa omakhelwane bafikile bazama ukusiza umndeni ngokutakula ingane kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.
title: Ingane iphonseke ethoyilethi yafa

text: INGODUSO yowayengumengameli wakuleli, uNksz Nonkanyiso Conco, yethuse abaningi ngoLwesihlanu enkundleni yezokuxhumana iveza iminjunju ehambisana nomzwangedwa ebhekene nayo okuthiwa ikhulisa indodana, uyise wayo nguMnuz Jacob Zuma.NgoLwesihlanu indodana yakhe ibigubha usuku lokuzalwa. Embhalweni uNksz Conco owumsakazi kwiVuma FM, ubhale ukuthi impilo yakhe inzima ngoba ubhekene nomsebenzi wokukhulisa ingane eyedwa, uyise akabonwa.“Kubuya imizuzu eminingi ngingedwa. Kodwa kugqama kakhulu lapho ngihlela khona ukugubha usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa kulo nyaka odlule.Ngangingeneme kakhulu emoyeni wami ngoba konke ngakwenza ngedwa .....nobuhlungu bokwamukela isimo sokuba wumzali oyedwa. Kukhona izimo ezike zifike ezidinga ubaba wengane kodwa amukho, wubuhlungu obujulile engingasoze ngabukhohlwa.Ikhula ngamandla indodana, inhliziyo ihaqwa wuvalo uma ngicabanga ukuthi engabe imibuzo ayoba nayo ngoyiphendula ngithini. Konke ukusebenza kwami ngokuzikhandla ukuze yena ezoba nempilo engcono kunale engiyiphilile.Uma ufikelwa wukucasuka noma wukudideka ngebhodwe eliseziko, khumbula lokhu, ngiwumzali oyedwa, osemncane onamaphupho okumele afezeke,” ubhale kanje uNksz Conco.Kuze kube manje kakucaci ukuthi uNksz Conco ume kanjani kwaZuma njengoba engakaze agcagce.Uke athi uma ebhale ezinkundleni zakhe zokuxhumana, alibeke ngembaba elokuthi naye uwunkosikazi wokuqina kwaZuma.Abangani bakaNksz Conco bazwakalise ukumeseka embhalweni wakhe, bemqinisa idolo, nabo beveza izimo ababhekene nazo bekhulisa izingane bebodwa.UNksz Conco ukhale nangokuthi kumzwisa ubuhlungu ukuthi kuzomele kuthi uma kushaya isikhathi sokuthi indodana yakhe iye esikoleni, uzobe enza yonke into eyedwa.Okunye okugqamile kwi-Instagram kaNksz Conco, wukuthi usezisuse zonke izithombe azishuthe noZuma, okubalwa nesithombe asifaka ngesikhathi uZuma egubha usuku lokuzalwa ngonyaka odlule.“...Sengizitshelile ukuthi ngizoba ngedwa uma kufikwa entweni ethinta isikole, ngizohamba umhlaba nawe sisodwa.....konke okuyizidingo zokukhulisa ingane yomfana ngizokwenza ngingedwa.”Khula- ke zibulo lami, isibani sakho sikhanye njalo.Phambilini uNksz Conco uke wafaka imibhalo encoma uZuma njengesithandwa sakhe esikhethekile.Ebala nokuthi bajwayele ukukhuluma izinto ezijulile “uma sebebeke amakhanda emcamelweni.”Ethintwa yiphephandaba elinguzakwabo weSolezwe, iSunday Tribune, uNksz Conco uthe empeleni umbhalo wakhe ubuyindlela yokwamukela ukuthi njengomuntu wesifazane ozoshadela esithenjini ngeke abe nobudlelwane obujwayelekile noZuma. "Noma ngubani okwazi ukucabanga angaqonda ukuthi umuntu wesilisa oyinhloko yomndeni omkhulu kangaka ngeke abe naso isikhathi sezinto ezifana nokuya epaki nengane, ukuya kodokotela noma ukuthenga u-ice cream ezitolo ngazo zonke izinsuku. Siyazi sonke ukuthi kuMnuz Zuma akukho lula ukwenza izinto nomndeni ngazo zonke izinsuku. Ubengekho sigubha usuku lokuzalwa lokuqala lendodadana yethu nyakenye ngoba ubengekho kuleli, kodwa nonyaka mhlawumbe uzobe ekhona. Usephuthelwe okuningi okubalulekile empilweni yendodana yethu, kodwa ngeke silindele ukuthi abe khona njalo," usho kanje.
title: Ingoduso kaZuma ikhala ngomzwangedwa

text: KUPHAZAMISEKE ukusebenza enxanxatheleni yezitolo iBridge City KwaMashu, eThekwini, ngesikhathi kubulawa amadoda amabili abezama ukubamba inkunzi imoto ethwala imali.Izolo ekuseni kube nesixakaxaka ngesikhathi amadoda ethelwa othulini inkampani ezimele yonogada. Kulimale unogada oyedwa, odubulekile kulesi sigameko.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi amadoda ayisikhombisa agasele kulezi zitolo, akhomba onogada ngezibhamu besamatasa befaka imali emotweni. Kuthiwa kube nokudubulana phakathi konogada nalezi zigebengu, ezinye zabaleka zilambatha, ezinye zasala enkundleni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuleli uBrigadier Vishnu Naidoo usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko wathi amaphoyisa agcwele izinkalo athungatha abanye abasolwa.“Abasolwa bebezama ukubamba inkunzi, badubulane nonogada benkampani ezimele. Kube sekudubuleka abasolwa ababili, bashonela endaweni yesigameko. Omunye unogada udubulekile kodwa uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela. Kutholwe izibhamu ezimbili i-rifle nesincane endaweni yesigameko. Abanye abasolwa babalekile endaweni. Basathungathwa,” kusho uNaidoo.Abasolwa kuthiwa abazange bayithole imali njengoba benqandiwe.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi ezinye izitolo kule ndawo zivaliwe ngesikhathi kunalesi sixakaxaka, zabuye zavulwa. Ezinye kuthiwa ziphazamiseke kakhulu njengoba abantu bebemi izixongololo bebukela obekwenzeka.Lesi sigameko akusona esokuqala senzeka kule nxanxathela yezitolo.NgoJune nonyaka, abasolwa abane, bahlasela kule ndawo, badubula unogada, walimala, bathatha imali engazange idalulwe.Ngonyaka odlule ngoNovemba, kwabulawa owesilisa owayekade ekhiphe imali eningi yokwakha. Wahlaselwa abasolwa abathathu, bambamba inkunzi base bembulala.
title: Basale enkundleni ababili abebebamba inkunzi eBridge City

text: ANGENE ngendlovuyangena amasosha ayelwa nohulumeni wobandlululo izolo ehhosivi likaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala.La masosha angene ngodli ngemva kokulinda isikhathi eside kungekho muntu ophumayo ukuzokwamukela uhlu lwezikhalo zawo, abebezilethe ehhovisi likaZikalala eliseMgungundlovu.Amasosha ahlanganisa amalungu oMkhonto weSizwe Military Veterans Association, awe-Azanian People’s Liberation Army nawe-Azanian National Liberation Army, amashele kuleli hhovisi ekhala ngokuthi uhulumeni uwashaya indiva.Badele ilanga ebelishisa eMgungundlovu izolo, bekhala ngosizi abhekene nalo futhi bathi babhuqabhuqwa yindlala ngoba abasebenzi kanti abanazo izindlu.Bafike bafuna ukukhuluma nondunankulu obesemhlanganweni kahulumeni kazwelonke iLekgotla, noma uNgqongqoshe wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Peggy Nkonyeni.Emva kokuqhinqa amahora ehhovisi likandunankulu, uhlu lwabo lwezikhalo agcine elunikeza iPhini loMqondisi jikelele eHhovisi likaNdunankulu, uMnuz Zakhele Mnqayi, ngenkathi sekucaca ukuthi akekho obezokwazi ukulamukela phakathi kukaZikalala noNkk Nkonyeni.Efunda uhlu lwezikhalo uMnuz Christopher Ngubu, uthe bafuna ukuthi uhulumeni asheshise uhlelo lokwakhela omakadebona izindlu, nabathe lwaqala ngeminyaka yama-90.UMnuz Thamsanqa “Fafa” Mngadi, uthe bafuna amasosha anikezwe amathuba emisebenzi kuhulumeni.“Sifuna * -10% wabasebenzi eminyangweni kahulumeni kube omakadebona. Asifuni ukuthi uma siqashwa sigcine sibe onogada kuphela. Abanye bethu bafundile, kufanele sinikezwe amathuba, siqashwe ezikhundleni eziphezulu. Iningi lethu liyafa, sibulawa yindlala ngoba asiyitholi imisebenzi.”Emukela uhlu uMnqayi uthe bayazwelana nomakadebona.“Ibuhlungu le nto engiyibona lana. Awamaningi amazwe lapho uthola amasosha alwela inkululeko, ehlupheka. Akukwazi ukuba nozinzo ezweni uma ungawanakekeli amasosha alwela inkululeko.”UMnuz Melusi Hlatshwayo usabise ngokuthi bazobuya bengasagayelwe mphako uma izikhalo zingaphendulwanga ezinsukwini ezingu-14.
title: Amasosha angene ngodli kwelikaZikalala

text: ZAKHELE XABAUKUZITHELA kwabanye abadlali ngabandayo emidlalweni ye-Absa Premiership yikhona okwenza iMamelodi Sundowns idonse kanzima kule sizini emidlalweni yeligi.Lokhu kudalulwe ngoyiphini lomqeqeshi kumaBrazillians, u-Alex “Barnes” Bapela, owayengomunye wabadlali ababeletha injabulo kuleli qembu ngesikhathi linqoba isicoco seligi amahlandla amathathu kulandelana eminyakeni yawo-1990. ISundowns esanda kusuka emsileni we-log yePremiership izobhekana neBloemfotein Celtic emdlalweni wamanqamu weTelkom Knockout kusasa eMoses Mabhida Stadium eThekwini ngo-8.15 ebusuku.UBapela ubephendula imibuzo esithangamini sabezindaba izolo mayelana nokushaya into ephansi kwaleli qembu emidlalweni yeligi ekubeni lenza ezibukwayo kweyo-mkhumulajezi.“Ngicabanga ukuthi abanye babadlali bethu abazinikeli ngokuphelele emidlalweni yeligi,” kusho uBapela oveze ukuthi alikashintshi isiko leSundowns ngaphansi kwenjinga uPatrice Matsepe lokugixabeza abadlali ngayo yonke imali uma benqobe indebe.Iqembu elizonqoba iTelkom lizogoduka nesheke lika- R4.25 million.Yize kuhlale kukhalwa ngokuthi abadlali abaningi kuSundowns bazela imali kunokulangazelela ukuzuza okuthile neqembu kodwa uBapela ubona okwehlukile.“Angikholwa wukuthi okwenza iqembu lenze kahle kweyomkhumulajezi wukuthi abadlali basuke belangazelele ukuzenzela imali esheshayo. Kukhona mhlawumbe okunye, futhi nokulimala kwabadlali kungayenza leyo nto njengoba siqale isizini singenalo udonga lwasemuva oluzinzile.”ISundowns engakaze ingenelwe nangelilodwa igoli kuTelkom isivuzise awu-13 emidlalweni ewu-12 yePremiership. Idlule ku-University of Pretoria ngo 1-0 wegoli lika-Anthony Laffor, yadlula kuMaZulu ngo 2-0, ngaphambi kokukhipha omakhelwane iSuperSport United ngo 1-0 wegoli lika-Eleazor Rodgers endleleni ebheke kowamanqamu.“Konke lokho kuzoshintsha njengoba sizimisele ngokubuyisa izinsuku zenjabulo. Siyazi ukuthi abalandeli bethu abajabule ngesimo seqembu. Isomiso seminyaka eyisikhombisa sesidlulile, ziyabuya izinsuku zenjabulo. ICeltic iyingozi kodwa uma singayibhudubeza ngemizuzu yokuqala ngiyakholwa ukuthi singawuwina umdlalo.”AmaBrazillians azophinde athembele kuRodgers oseshaye inethi amahlandla amabili kuTelkom.Ngasohlangothini lweCeltic esathwele udumo lokukhipha ompetha bangesizini edlule, i-Orlando Pirates, kulindeleke umfutho njengoba ishaya ngabadlali abagijimayo esiswini naphambili.Iphini lomqeqeshi, uBoebie Solomons, lithe bazosebenzisa ubuthaka beSundowns ukunqoba lo mdlalo.“Siyazi ukuthi iSundowns izoshiya izikhala emuva njengoba inabadlali abakhonze ukuya phambili. Sizosebenzisa leyo ntuba-ke thina sibahlasele ngejubane,” kusho uSolomons osizana noClinton Larsen ebhentshini lePhunya Selesele.ICeltic igabe ngabadlali abafana noJoel Mogorosi, Lerato Manzini, Lennox Bacela nabanye abayitakula kunzima icishe imimilitwa yiPirates.
title: ‘Abadlali bayadembesela kweyeligi’

text: UMQEQESHI weTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila, uMpho Maleka, ucacisa ngezilomo zakhe uTokelo Ranite ozakhele ugazi kwi-Orlando Pirates noGeorge Lebese odume kwiKaizer Chiefs.URantie ufike kwiTshakhuma ekuqaleni kwesizini ngemuva kwesikhathi eside izinto zingamhambeli kahle echithwa amaqembu okubalwa kuwo iCape Town City neMamelodi Sundowns.Lokho kwenze akangashesha ukungena egiyeni kodwa uMaleka uthi useyaqala ukuba wumshini.“UTokelo! NgoTokelo kufanele sibonge umlolongi wemiziba (fitness trainer) ngokuthi kade elokhu emuphusha, emkhuthaza ukuthi akhiphe amangwevu akhe,” kusho uMaleka.“Nguye obemfuna ukuthi enze okungaphezu kwabezicabangela khona. Nokumdlalisa kwethu imizuzu ethe xaxa (engaphezu kuka-80 behlula iTS Galaxy koweligi ngo-Ephreli 10) yize bekuhambisana nezinhlelo zethu kodwa bekuncike nasekuzinikeleni. Siyakubonga ukunikela akukhombisile. Sethemba ukuthi uzoqhubeka asinikeze okungaphezulu.“Okumqoka wukuthi ube ngaseqenjini elinqobile ngokwakha igoli. Njengomgadli siyazi ukuthi uma ungayibonswanga inethi uke uhalele ukuthi noma-ke usungakhela ozakwenu. Ngilangazelele ukuthi lokho kumkhuthaze enze okuthe xaxa emdlalweni olandelayo.KwiTshakhuma uRantie kulindelwe abuyise ithalente lakhe ebeselicwila kungaqondakali ukuthi kubangwa yini.Empeleni ngemuva kokuganwa eminyakeni edlule uRantie uvele wacwila waphenduka neqaqa emaqenjini aphesheya kwazise uqale ukugqama khona. Uficwa yisinyama nje uke waba semabhukwini eFC Bournemouth inyukela kwi-English Premier League.Nokho ugcine esethutheleka naseTurkey kwaya walahlekelwa nayindawo yakhe kwiBafana Bafana abebukeka enekusasa eliqhakazile kuyo.Esinye isilomo okulindelwe lukhulu kuso kwiTshakhuma nguLebese yena izinto eziqale ukumbhedela esekwiChiefs esolwa ngokuvilapha.Bekulindelwe ukuthi afike avuke ngaphansi kukaPitso Mosimane kwiSundowns kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya  wabolekiswa kwiSuperSport United. Ugcine evumbuka e-USA kodwa kuthe izinto zisamhambela kahle, kwafika iCovid-19 yavala imingcele nokuholele ekutheni aze afike kwiTTM.“UGeorge silindele ukuthi abekhona emidlalweni esemthethweni esontweni noma amabili ezayo,” kusho uMaleka. “Naye njengoba ngike ngasho ngoTK (Tokelo) usebenza kakhulu nomlolongi womzimba ukuze abuyele egiyeni lokudlala. Ngokomqondo kodwa uyambambona ukuthi usekulungele.”
title: Umqeqeshi ucacisa ngezilomo kuRante noLebese

text: UKUNGAYITHOLI inkampani ezomqeqesha ukuze athole isitifiketi sakhe kuholele ekutheni agcine esewusomabhizinisi.UNksz Sabeliwe Gwala ungomunye wabanikazi benkampani iBambelela Steel Works And Alluminium eyenza amafasitela e-alluminium, ama-carports, amasango ensimbi, ama-buglar gaurds.UNksz Gwala ungene kulo msebenzi ngo-2015. Ngaleso sikhathi ubenza uN6 kwiHuman Resource, eLangeni College, eseNtuzuma.“Angiyitholanga inkampani ezongiqeqesha kwiHuman Resource. Angizange ngidikibale kodwa ngaphuma ngingena ezinkampanini ngenza noma yimuphi umsebenzi engiwutholayo,” kusho uNksz Gwala.Ngo-2015 uthe wahlangana noMnuz Joe Munguembe owayenza lo msebenzi.“Ngamtshela ukuthi ngifuna umsebenzi, akazange anginake wabona intombi washela. Ngaleso sikhathi ngangigxile ekutheni kumele ngithole umsebenzi ngamziba ngaqhubeka ngafuna umsebenzi. Ngenza amatoho ehlukene okubalwa kuwo ukuhlanza izindlu, ukuba uweta neminye. Ngabuye ngahlangana naye wangitshela ukuthi ibhizinisi lakhe selikhulile kungaba njani ngifike ngizobona ukuthi yini engingayenza,” kusho uNksz Gwala.Wafika ibhizinisi selikhulile kodwa indlela uMunguembe ayeliphethe ngayo yayenza ukuthi lingakhuli ngendlela efanele. Wabona ithuba lokuthi alikhulise. Waqala ngokuvula ikhasi lalo ibhizinisi wamsiza ekutheni benze izinhlobo eziningi zamafasitela neminye imisebenzi yensimbi ukuze amakhasimende athole konke akufunayo.“Ngenxa yokusebenza kwami savumelana ngokuthi kungcono ngingabi ngumsebenzi kodwa nami ngibe ngomunye wabanikazi bebhizinisi. Njengamanje sinemoto yethu esidiliva ngayo umkhiqizo wethu. Kancane kancane kuzogcina kuyile nto esiyiphuphayo,” kusho uNksz Gwala.UNksz Gwala noMunguembe sebeyizithandani kanti bathi ukuthandana kwabo akuliphazamisi iphupho labo.UNksz Gwala umsebenzi wakhe omkhulu ukufuna amakhasimende, ahambe aye emizini yawo ayokala amafasitela, izicabha, amasango nalapho kuzofakwa khona i-carport.“Ngesinye isikhathi amakhasimende aba nokungingabaza ukuthi ngiyakwazi ukukala kahle. Bangibuza kaningi ukuthi sengike ngawenza yini lo msebenzi phambilini noma ngiyaqala. Uma sekuzofakwa bebona ukuthi lokho okufakwayo kungena ngendlela baba nokungethemba baze babuze nezinye izinto kimi. Ngemuva komsebenzi ngibuye ngibafonele ngibabuze ukuthi benelisekile yini ngomsebenzi wethu. Lokho kwenza ukuthi kube yibo abasitholela amanye amakhasimende,” kusho yena.Uthe ziningi izinto ezintsha eziqhamukayo kulo mkhakha wabo. Yena uhlale efunda izinto ezintsha bese etshela isoka lakhe ngazo baqale ukuzikhangisa amakhasimende azibone.Nakuba ibhizinisi labo ethi likhula kahle uthe kukhona ababona bebancane bangafuni ukubakhokhela ngendlela.“Sesize safunda ukuthi ingxenye enkulu yemali umuntu ayikhokhe ngaphambi kokuthi senze umsebenzi ngoba besiba nenkinga amakhasimende engasikhokheli kahle. Sigcina sishodelwa yimali yokwenza imisebenzi yamanye amakhasimende,” kusho yena.
title: Ubambisene nesithandwa sakhe enkampanini yabo

text: LUNGILE MAJOKA noMBONGISENI BUTHELEZIU KUQEQESHA amaqembu amabili, iKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates, athathwa njengamanye amakhulu ebholeni laseNingizimu Afrika, kuhlezi kuzofika nengcindezi ngenxa yabalandeli asebajoveka ngokuthi amaqembu abo yiwona anelungelo lokubanga nokudla izicoco ebholeni lakuleli.Ngesikhathi kuqala isizini kube nesasasa kubathandi bebhola ngokubona la maqembu ephonsa izintambo kubaqeqeshi abayimisinsi yokuzimilela kuleli, u-Eric Tinkler opheka iPirates noSteve Komphela oyibamba kuMakhosi.Kusasa kungenzeka kube khona ozobe esefaka isigxivizo sokugcina esizokwenza aphume ngomnyango ngenxa yomphumela ozotholakala emdlalweni wabakhaya oseFNB Stadium ngo-3.30 ntambama.UTinkler uzofika emdlalweni enyamanambana kwabanye abalandeli beZimnyama ngemuva kokuthelwa ngehlazo lika 2-0 yiLamontville Golden Arrows (ngoLwesithathu), obese kuphele iminyaka eyisithupha ihluleka wukubashaya.IPirates isanqobe kanye emidlalweni eyisikhombisa kuligi okuyibeka endaweni ka-13 ku-log.“Umqeqeshi, ikakhulukazi weqembu elikhulu njengePirates, uyohlezi enengcindezi. Lona ngumdlalo omkhulu, lapho uzakhela khona igama. Noma ngabe ngubani ozothola ithuba uzolisebenzisa. Sizobe sidlala phambi kwabalandeli abangu-90 000, okuyinto wonke umdlali aphupha ngayo kusukela esemncane. Sifuna ukubuya nomphumela omuhle,” kusho uTinkler izolo. Uma iPirates ingase iqhubeke nokulahla amaphuzu kusasa lokho kungasho ukuthi uma ehluleka kowamanqamu weCaf Confederation Cup uTinkler kuyobe sekuphelile ngaye kweZimnyama. Ngesikhathi kuvela ukuthi uTinkler uzobamba lesi sikhundla, usihlalo weBucs, u-Irvin Khoza akazange asho ukuthi umnikeza inkontileka engakanani ngaphandle kokuthi ubone kungcono aqhubeke ngenxa yomgqigqo weqembu emidlalweni yeCaf. UKomphela yena uthole ithuba lokuphefumula ngokuhlula iMpumalanga Black Aces ngo-1-0 ngoLwesibili. Lo mphumela ubulandela uxhaxha lwemidlalo yeligi ephele ngokulingana, obese kucasule abanye babalandeli beChiefs.“Njengamanje iPirates ifana nebhubesi elilimele okuyenza ibe yingozi kakhulu, ingavuka ngathi. Umdlalo wabakhaya ngeke uwahlulele ngemiphumela edlule. Kuzomele silwe ukuze sithole amaphuzu amathathu. Uma singahlulwa kuzofana nokuthi asenzanga lutho ngokuwina emidlalweni edlule ngoba izobe isishayile,” kusho uKomphela.Uma iChiefs inqoba kusasa izofaka ingcindezi emaqenjini aphezulu futhi lokhu kungasiza ekwehliseni ukungabaza kwabanye abalandeli ngobuholi bukaKomphela kuMakhosi.
title: Ugibe kozohlulwa kowabakhaya

text: MLUNGISI GUMEDEKUHLUKENE  imibono mayelana nesabelo-mali esethulwe nguNgqongqoshe weziMali kuleli uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, ePhalamende, izolo.UMholi we-Freedom Front Plus uMnuz Peter Groenewald uthe lesi sabelo-mali asizona izindaba ezinhle kubakhokhibentela kuleli njengoba kumenyezelwe ukuthi izokwenyuka intela eningi.UGordhan izolo umemezele ukuthi kuzoba nokwenyuka kwentela okufinyelela ku-R88 billion.Uthe akukwazi ukuthi abantu bakuleli abangu-55 million bazolokhu beqhubeka nokukhokhela intela abanye abangu 55 million.UMgcinimafa-Jikelele  we-ANC uDkt Zweli Mkhize usishayele ihlombe isabelo-mali sikaGordhan wathi siletha ithemba kubantu bakuleli."Isimo sinzima kodwa uNgqongqoshe ukwazile ukwethula isabelo-mali esizinzile esithinta izinto eziningi ezibalulekile kuleli," kusho uMkhize.Okhulumela i-DA ezindabeni ezithinta ezeziMali ePhalamende uMnuz David Maynier uthe bakhathazekile ngentsha ehleli emakhaya esilahle ithemba ngenxa yokuthi ayiwutholi umsebenzi.UMaynier uthe badumele ngokuthi uNgqongqoshe akazange aphawule kabanzi ngokuthi ingaqedwa kanjani indaba yokumoshwa kwezimali izikhulu zikahulumeni."Yingakho siphakamisa ukuthi kube nohlelo oluqinile oluzobheka indaba yokumoshwa kwezimali izikhulu zikahulumeni," kusho uMaynier.Uthe ukunqanda ukumoshwa kwezimali kungasiza ezintweni eziningi kubalwa nokudala amathuba emisebenzi.Thola lonke udaba ephepheni kusasa
title: Kuhlukene imibono kosopololitiki ngesabelo mali

text: UMENGAMELI uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa uxwayisa ngokuthi iNingizimu Afrika ngeke ibe nozinzo uma umhlaba ungabuyiselwa kubanikazi bawo.Ethula inkulumo yakhe ngesikhathi enikeza isizwe saKwaMkhwanazi KwaDlangezwa itayitela lomhlaba waso ongu-4 853 hectares, uRamaphosa uthe uma ubulungiswa bungekho alubikhona uzinzo. Kube nenjabulo uMengameli ethi umhlaba ubuyela KwaMkhwanazi kubantu abakhele le ndawo abebegcwele eBhekuzulu Hall, Ongoye.“Namhlanje yilanga elibaluleke kakhulu lapha esizweni saKwaMkhwanazi nakubona bonke abantu baseMzansi Afrika njengoba sibuyisela umhlaba waKwaMkhwanazi,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe njengoba bebuyisela umhlaba kumele bakhumbule ukuthi kufikwe kanjani kulesi sigaba.“Kumele sivume ukuthi lo msebenzi esiwenza esizweni saKwaMkhwanazi namhlanje kumele ngabe wenziwa kudala,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe uhlelo lokubuyiswa komhlaba beluhamba kancane ngenxa yezizathu ezehlukene okwenze ukuthi kube nokuvungama.“Abanye abantu abebekhala kakhulu ngokuhamba kancane kohlelo yi-ANCYL,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe bewuhulumeni manje bazolusheshisa uhlelo lokubuyiselwa komhlaba kubantu.UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngesikhathi enikeza isizwe saKwaMkhwanazi KwaDlangezwa itayitela lomhlaba waso ongu-4 853 hectare. Isithombe: GCIS“Lo msebenzi esiwenza namhlanje KwaDlangezwa kumele ubuyise ithemba nakwabanye abantu abasalinde ukuthi kubuyiswe umhlaba wabo,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe uqale ukuzwa ngesicelo sokuthi kubuyiswe umhlaba waKwaMkhwanazi ngePhasika kulo nyaka ekade esenkonzweni yebandla iCovenant eliholwa uMphostoli Collins Dhlomo.“UMphostoli uDhlomo uyena owabasa umlilo wangivalela ekhoneni wathi kunesicelo esidala sokuthi kubuyiswe umhlaba waKwaMkhwanazi kodwa abazi ukuthi kubambeni, wathi angisayine ukuthi umhlaba uzobuya kodwa nganqaba ngathi uhulumeni akasebenzi kanjalo ngaze ngacela ukuthi okungenani akanginike izinyanga eziyisithupha njengoba manje lolu daba sesiluxazululile,” kusho uRamaphosa.URamaphosa uthe uhlelo lokubuyiswa komhlaba waKwaMkhwanazi lwenziwe kulandelwa umthetho.Uthe kukhona lapho bezowuthatha khona umhlaba kodwa kube khona izinxephezelo abazikhiphayo.URamaphosa uthe lesi isicelo sokuqala sokubuyiswa komhlaba kwabazobe bezixazulula ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo.“Lo mhlaba esiwubuyisayo ngicela ukuthi niqhubeke niwusebenzise ukuze kudaleke amathuba emisebenzi kuphinde kufukulwe umnotho,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe imali ezongeniswa yilo mhlaba kumele ingangeni emaphaketheni abantu abambalwa.“Sicela ukuthi ningasiphoxi ngoba siyazi ukuthi lapho okukhona imali khona kujwayele ukuthi kube nomsindo,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe umzabalazo wawungeve umayelana namavoti kuphela kodwa ubumayelana nokufukula abantu.“Sizokhipha imifundaze lapho sizoxhasa khona intsha efuna ukuthi iyofunda ngamahlathi ukuze ibuye izosiza imiphakathi efana nalona waKwaMkhwanazi,” kusho uRamaphosa.
title: Injabulo uRamaphosa ebanika umhlaba

text: IQEMBU elikhulu kunawo wonke eSpain iReal Madrid lisaqhubeka nomlando walo wokuphetha kabi ubudlelwano nabadlali abayizintandokazi kubalandeli bayo. Kuleli sonto zishaqise abaningi izindaba zokushiya kukakaputeni weminyaka kwiLos Blancos, uSergio Ramos, okuvele ukuthi ngeke ayithole inkontileka entsha kuleli qembu. Izolo uRamos evalelisa eqenjini asehlale kulo iminyaka engu-16, uthe naye kumethusile uma etshelwa ukuthi inkontileka ebibekwe yiMadrid ukuthi ayisayine, ibiphelelwa yisikhathi. “Into yokuqala engifisa ukuyisho ukuthi bengingafuni ukushiya. Bengisafuna ukuhlala kwiMadrid. Besinezingxoxo zokuthi kwelulwe inkontileka yami kodwa zaphazamiseka ngenxa yeCovid-19. Bezilokhu zishintsha izinto ebesivumelana ngazo kodwa abakaze bangitshele ukuthi ngizophelelwa yisikhathi sokusayina inkontileka entsha,” kuchaza uRamos.URamos (35), uthe iMadrid imnikeze inkontileka yonyaka owodwa ehambisana nokuncishiselwa umholo. Uthe ubenganankinga nokuncipha komholo kodwa ubefisa kube yinkontileka yeminyaka emibili ukuze ezokhululeka benomndeni wakhe. Iphephandaba laseMadrid, iMarca libika ukuthi leli qembu lihoxise inkontileka uRamos esevumile ukuyisayina. URamos unqobe izindebe eziwu-22 eminyakeni ayidlalele iMadrid. Kulezo zindebe kubalwa ama-UEFA Champions League amane, izicoco zeLa Liga ezinhlanu, amaClub World Cup amane kanye nezinkomishi ezimbili zeCopa Del Rey. Ushiya leli qembu nje, seliqala ukuzakhela umlando ngokuphetha kabi ubudlelwano balo nabadlali abayizintandokazi kubalandeli beqembu. Ngo-2018 kushiye cishe umdlali omkhulu kunabo bonke emlandweni waleli qembu, uChristiano Ronaldo, okwathusa abaningi ukuhamba kwakhe kwazise uhambe esayidabula inethi. URonaldo uhambe kwiMadrid eshaye amagoli awu-451 emdlalweni ewu-438. Ufike kwiSeria A washaya amagoli awu-21 kwisizini yakhe yokuqala kanti nakule sizini ephelelile ushaye into ecokeme elibasela izikhawu eziwu-29 ibhola enethini. IMadrid ibiwadinga amagoli akhe kule sizini kwazise isishwebe kancane isicoco seligi kanti nakwiChampions League, kwacacela ngisho ingane incane ukuthi leli qembu ebeliphekwa wuZinadine Zidane, lishoda ngamagoli phambili. Sisakhuluma ngamagoli, omunye umdlali olaxazwe yiMadrid kule sizini nguGareth Bale (31), ovutha engabaselwe emdlalweni yeEuro eqhubekayo njengamanje. Lo mdlali ube nobudlelwano obubi noZidane owamfaka ohlwini lwabadlali afisa ukubadayisa, ukuze athole imali yokuthenga abadlali abasha.IMadrid yavimba isifiso sikaBale sokuyodlala eqenjini laseChina iJiangsu Suning ngo-2019, yajike yambolekisa kwiTottenham Hotspur kule sizini ephelile kulandela isikhathi ekhuhla ibhentshi. Ngasemaphethelweni e-English Premier League, uBale ubengomunye wabadlali abayingozi phambi kwepali, okuyifomu aqhubeke phezu kwayo kwi-Euro. Umqeqeshi okhuza ibuya kwiReal Madrid uCarlo Ancelotti, usheshe waphumela obala wathi uzomdinga uBale ngesizini ezayo, usezinhlelweni zakhe. Ngenxa yobudlelwano obungebuhle phakathi kwabaphathi beqembu noBale akukacaci ukuthi lo mdlali uzimisele ngani ngesizini entsha. Omunye umdlali ohambe kamuncu kuleli qembu nguMesut Ozil. Lo mdlali kwethusa abaningi ukuvela kwezindaba zokuthi usejoyina i-Arsenal. U-Ozil wajoyina Ezimhlophe ngo-2010 esuka kwiWerder Bremen. Ngesikhathi eshiya ngo-2013, uRonaldo wazwakalisa ukungenami ngokudayiswa kwakhe: “Ungenze ngaba wumdlali ongcono. Uma udlala nabadlali abaseqopheleni eliphezulu nawe liyakhuphuka izinga lakhoU-Ozil uhambe kwi-Madrid enama-assist awu-61 kuyo yonke imidlalo ayidlalile kumasizini amathathu nokumenze wahamba esebizwa ngenkosi yama-assist. IMadrid ibukhombisile ubunya nakonozinti. Icishe ibe ngcono indlela okwahamba ngayo owayengukapteni u-Iker Cassilas kwazise wayesenamaphutha epalini futhi emmise kabi uDiego Lopes ngaphambi kokuthi leli qembu lisayinise uKeylor Navas. UNavas washaya ingcwenga eminyakeni ayichithe kwiMadrid edla izicoco ezintathu ze-Eufa Champions League nesicoco esidowa seLa Liga kodwa naye washaywa ngesithende kalula sekufike unozinti omusha. UNavas usedlalela iPSG eFrance. Ekhuluma ngoMashi ngokudayiswa kwakhe wathi: “kunezinto ezenzeka engingazi zadalwa yini kodwa zenzeka. Ngiyaye ngizame ukucabanga ngokuhle kuphela. Ngikhumbula okuhle kuphela ngesikhathi sami noZidane, owayengilwela isikhathi esiningi futhi ngiyambonga ngokungethemba."IDiski Yomhlaba
title: Sekuphenduka usiko ukuphuma kumuncu kwezintandokazi kwiMadrid

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUS ESIDALULE ukuthi sihlela ukuhlaba ikhefu sibuyele esikoleni siyofundela ukuba wumqondisi wamafilimu isilomo somlingisi waKwaMashu, uNomzamo Mbatha.UNomzamo ulingisa emdlalweni okuMzansi Magic, 
Isibaya aphinde alingise ku
Mlilo ku-e.tv. NgoSepthemba 4 kulindeleke ukuthi kuphume ifilimu alingisa phambili kuyona i
Tell Me Sweet Something.Engxoxweni abe nayo ne
Solezwe uNomzamo udalule ukuthi iphupho lakhe wukungagcini kuphela ngokuqhubeka nokulingisa kumafilimu kodwa ufuna nokuba wumqondisi wawo.Uthe ukuze kufezeke leli phupho lakhe kumele aye esikoleni.Ukulingisa akakufundelanga njengoba enza izifundo zeB Com Accounting e-University of Cape Town.“Bengiqedela izifundo zami zeB Com ngoba ngagcina ngingaziqedanga. Njengoba ngifuna ukuba wumqondisi wamafilimu bengilulekwa ngokuthi izikole zalokhu zivame ukuba se-USA. Kusho ukuthi kumele ngingasebenzi iminyaka emithathu ukuze ngifunde. Ngizobona ukuthi ngenza izifundo zokuqondisa kuphela noma nokunye,” kusho uNomzamo.Uthe ujabule futhi uthukile ngokuphuma kwe
Tell Me Sweet Something osekunesikhathi kukhulunywa ngayo.Le filimu ikuthatha ikubeke ngoMoratiwa (Nomzamo) onesifiso sokubhala izincwadi kodwa onebhadi uma kuza kwezothando selokhu alaxazwa yisoka lakhe uNorman, elanyamalala liyothenga ubisi.Ukushima kukaMoratiwa kwakhathaza umngani wakhe uTashaka obe esemumemela emcimbini ahlangana kuwo nomkhangisi odumile uNat Masilo odume ngelikaThe 45 Foot Man.“Kuhlangene konke, wukuthuka nokujabula. Angazi abantu bazocabangani ngayo. Abanye bake bayibona eK Cap KwaMashu ngesikhathi kuneDurban Film Festival. Ngiyazi abazoyibona uma isikhonjiswa bazoyeseka, ikakhulukazi ekhaya eThekwini. ITheku lihlale lingeseka kukho konke engikwenzayo,” kusho yena.Uthe uhlalele ethembeni lokuthi le filimu izomdalela amanye amathuba okuqhubeka nokulingisa kwamanye amafilimu.“Ngisemusha endimeni ngakho ngizimisele ukusebenza kakhulu. Ikhona ifilimu engiphezu kwayo kodwa angivumelekile ukukhuluma ngayo okwamanje. Ngibonga umusa weNkosi ukuthi ngisebenze kangaka nokwazi ukuthi eGoli angiyile ukuyodlala kodwa ngiyosebenza. Kumele uma uwumuntu ubuke isimo sakho ukuthi sinjani bese uyakhetha ukuthi ufuna ukuphila mpiloni. Amathuba akhona kukuwe ukuthi uzimisele kangakanani,” kusho uNomzamo.
title: Sifuna ukuqondisa amafilimu isilomo somlingisi weSibaya

text: INSEPHE edlalele amaligi amakhulu emhlabeni uTsepo Masilela isazohlala kuMaZulu FC ngemuva kokuvuselela inkontileka. Leli phephandaba lihoshe ngemithombo yalo ukuthi uMasilela odlala kwesokunxele emuva uvuselele inkontileka yakhe ngonyaka noSuthu.UMasilela ufike ngesizini edlule kuMaZulu kusekhona uJozef Vukusic, enesisindo esixakile. Nokho ukusebenza kanzima kumenze wehla waqala nokuthola ijezi. Kubukeka sengathi akwenze ethole ithuba lokudlala kujabulisile izikhulu zoSuthu (yize kungacaci noma abaphathi abasha noma abadala), njengoba esevuselele ngonyaka.Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe u-Ayanda “Cobra” Dlamini oqeqesha aMaZulu.“Yebo uMasilela uvuselelile, sijabule ukuthi sikwazile ukumgcina. Uvuselele inkontileka ngonyaka kuMaZulu,” kusho uDlamini. UMasilela udlalele iKaizer Chiefs waphinde wadlala kumaligi amakhulu okubalwa kuwona iLa Liga waphinde walunguza nakwa-Israel edlalela iMaccabi Haifa. Udlale amahlandla angaphezu kuka-50 kwiBafana Bafana.UMakhehleni Makhaula obedlalela iHighlands Park noSiphelele “Shaka Zulu” Mthembu ogcine ukubonakala kwiCape Town City ngabanye babadlali abaziqeqesha noSuthu ngenhloso yokuthola izinkontileka. UDlamini usichazile isimo sabo kuze kube manje.“Yebo baziqeqesha nathi. Sijabule ngesikubona kuMakhaula, osekusele ukuthi ngidlulise kubaphathi umuzwa wami ngaye bese esayina. Nendawo ayidlalayo (esiswini) ibalulekile, Sifuna ukuqinisa kule ndawo ayidlalayo,” kucacisa uDlamini.“UMthembu sekuphele unyaka engadlali. Ngakho isimo sakhe okwamanje sisenzima, kusamele sizinike isikhathi simbhekisise. Ngijabule kodwa ngokuthi usuku nosuku ukhombisa ukubuyela kwesimazela khona,” kulandisa uDlamini.Ngeledlule leli qembu limemezele ukuthi lishintsha izandla njengoba selinabaphathi abasha. USandile Zungu usengumengameli woSuthu, njengoba ethenge amasheya angu-100% kuPatrick Sokhela. UZungu uthe uzimisele ngokweseka uDlamini kukho konke akudingayo ukuze uSuthu lube ngelinye lamaqembu aphezulu kwiligi.
title: UMasilela usazohlala kuMaZulu

text: SABELO NSELEUMHLANGANO wesigungu esiphezulu kuMasipala waseThekwini, usunqume ukunikeza imenenja kaMasipala, uMnuz Sipho Nzuza, ikhefu lesikhashana, kuze kube wunyaka ozayo noma kuze kuba inkantolo ixegisa imibandela yebheyili, uma esevela enkantolo ngenyanga ezayo.Lo mhlangano oyimfihlo wesigungu esiphezulu, obubanjwe izolo, ubizwe emva kokubhuntsha komhlangano womkhandlu oyisipesheli obekufanele uhlale ngoMsombuluko ukuze unqume ngesicelo esafakwa nguNzuza sokuthatha ikhefu eliyisipesheli kuze kube uvela enkantolo ngoDisemba 10.UNzuza wafaka lesi sicelo emva kokuboshwa wuphiko oluphenya amacala abucayi, oKlebe, abambophela ukuphula imibandela yebheyili yakhe.OKlebe bathola ukuthi uNzuza ubesesayina amathenda kaMasipala, lokho okuphikisana nemibandela yebheyili yakhe.Inkantolo yamdedela ngesexwayiso uNzuza, wabe esefaka lesi sicelo ngethemba lokuthi izoxegiswa imibandela yebheyili yakhe uma esevela enkantolo, bese ebuyela emsebenzini.Ngokomthombo weSolezwe, isigungu esiphezulu sinqume ukuthi uNzuza anikezwe ikhefu kuze kube uFebhuwari wangonyaka ozayo noma kuze kube wukuthi imibandela yebheyili yakhe iyaxegiswa.UMnuz Sipho Cele, oke wabamba kulesi sikhundla ngesikhathi uNzuza ethathe ikhefu eliyisipesheli phambilini, nguyena ozobamba kwesemenenja kuze kube kubuya uNzuza.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, i-IFP isiphikisile lesi sinqumo kwathi iDA yakhetha ukungavoti ngesikhathi kuthathwa isinqumo.Ohola inguyazana ye-IFP, uMnuz Mdu Nkosi, uvumile ukuthi kabahambisani nalesi sinqumo ngoba ethe kabahambisani nokukhethwa kukaCele.UNkosi uthe akazi kungani kwabizwa umhlangano womkhandlu ohanjelwa yiwo wonke amakhansela ngoMsombuluko ukuthi uzobhunga ngalolu daba, uma kuwukuthi isigungu esiphezulu besingakwazi ukuthatha isinqumo.“Kumoshwe imali yomphakathi ngomhlangano ogcine ungahlalanga. Le nto yokungafiki kwamakhansela emhlanganweni ilimaze isithunzi somkhandlu.”Okhulumela uMasipala, uMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, uthe bebengakaziswa ngalesi sinqumo.Okhulumela iMeya, uMnuz Mluleki Mtungwa, uthembise ukubuye athinte intatheli uma esenikeziwe ulwazi, kepha kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engaphawulanga.UNzuza waboshelwa icala lenkohlakalo kwithenda kaR430 million kadoti nowayeyimeya uNkk Zandile Gumede.
title: Inikezwe ikhefu imenenja yeTheku

text: USHUMAYELA ivangeli lokuzithoba umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, ezakhe ezithele ngehlazo izingqwele zase-Afrika, i-Al Ahly emdlalweni womlenze wokuqala wama-quarterfinal weCAF Champions League uLucas Moripe Stadium ngoMgqibelo.ISundowns ibhudluze i-Al Ahly yase-Egypt ngo 5-0 wamagoli kaThemba Zwane, Wayne Arendse, Ricardo Nascimento, Gaston Sirino noPhakamani Mahlambi. Lo mphumela uyibeka ethubeni elihle lokudlulela kowandulela owamanqamu. Umdlalo womlenze wesibili uzoba ngoMgqibelo e-Egypt.Nakuba iSundowns kubukeka isiwuqedile umsebenzi kodwa emuva komdlalo uMosimane ubelokhu ekugcizelele ukuthi kufanele bazithobe ngoba asengaphenduka amatafula ekuhambeni.“Akujwayelekile ukuthi iSundowns iwine ngamagoli amaningi kangaka. Siyiqembu elincane uma kuqhathaniswa ne-Al Ahly. Wumlando lona. Le wini izongena emlandweni weqembu. Kuyinto enkulu kubantu, eqenjini nakimina. Kodwa kusafanele siye e-Egypt. Sengike ngayibona i-Al Ahly idlala neWydad kuba u4-0, waphendulwa kwaba 5-4. Ngakho angisona isiphukuphuku, ngeke ngijabule. Ngizozithoba futhi ngizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi iqembu liphansi nalo. Esikhathini esinjena kubalulekile ukuzithoba. Ngethemba ukuthi sizodlulela kowandulela owamanqamu. Ngeke wazi. Lo mphumela awujwayelekile,” kusho uMosimane.Emuva kwesikhathi uMosimane uphinde washintsha wathi: “Sijabule ngoba sihlule iqembu eliphambili. Ngakho sivumelekile ukujabula kancane, hhayi kakhulu. Lokhu kungenzeka kungaphinde kwenzeke sisaphila. Siwahlulile amaqembu ngamagoli amaningi kodwa asizange sibhiyoze. Kodwa kulokhu sihlule i-Al Ahly, asijabule kancane.”UMosimane uthe akuwona umlingo ukuhlula i-Al Ahly ngale ndlela kodwa njengethimba labaqeqeshi bawenzile umsebenzi wabo wokuyicubungulisisa.“Ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi sinakho konke siyibuke emidlalweni eyisishiyagalombili. Lokho kwenze sathola izinto abajwayele ukuzenza enkundleni, indlela abacabanga ngayo. Siwulungiselele kahle lo mdlalo. Kwesinye isikhathi uma uwina kanjena, singabaqeqeshi sizwakala njengongqondongqondo. Kodwa eqinisweni siwenzile umsebenzi wethu. Konke kwenzeke ngendlela ebesikade siyilindele. Akwenzekanga inhlanhla. Siyabazi abantu ababalulekile eqenjini labo. Obekubalulekile wukudlala ibhola lethu,” kusho uMosimane.ISundowns iphule irekhodi lokuhlulwa yi-Al Ahly kwiChampions League kwazise ibingakaze iyithele isibhaxu.UMosimane uveze ukuthi ekuhambeni uhlela ukuqalisa abadlali abanejubane phambili okuwuMahlambi noLebo Maboe ngoba i-Al Ahly izobe ibahlasela ngakho konke.“Kuzoba nzima laphaya. Kufanele sikuphindisele konke abazokuletha kithina. Ngethemba ukuthi sizoqhubeka nokudlala kanje. Ngethemba ukuthi sizowuvikela umsebenzi esiwenzile. Asinaso isiqiniseko kodwa konke kusemqondweni. IBafana ihambile idinga iphuzu yawina. Kufanele sikholelwe endleleni esidlala ngayo kodwa kufanele sisebenze ngokuphindiwe. Kodwa ngeke siyiphunyule. Uma kuseyimina umqeqeshi, uma sihlulwa kuzobe kungekho kuwukuthi laba bantu badlale kahle ngempela, hhayi ngenxa yomqondo esize ngawo. Angisoze ngakuvumela lokho. Ngethemba ukuthi sizolishaya igoli laphaya,” kusho uMosimane.
title: UPitso ugqugquzela intobeko kubadlali bakhe

text: UTHI wasinikwa emazulwini isikhundla sokudidiyela amabutho aKwaZulu uMnuz Mlandeni "Mgiliji" Nhleko, usebe kulesi sikhundla iminyaka engaphezu kuka-30.UNhleko uhole izinkumbi zamabutho aphelezele iSilo Samabandla onke uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu, ngaphambi kokuthi sitshalwe ngoLwesine ezintathakusa.ISilo yiso esaqoka uNhleko kulesi sikhundla ngeminyaka yawo-1980.Exoxa neSolezwe ngeSonto emzini wakhe oseHlalangwenya, uNhleko uthe wajabulisa okwengane mhla iMbube imkhomba ukuba abe wumdidiyeli wamabutho.Njengoba ehambe neSilo ehola amabutho ngisho nasemazweni aphesheya, uNhleko uthe ubudlelwano babo bukhule kakhulu okuyisizathu esenze ukuthi azidele ngeCorona, ahole amabutho aphelezele iSilo phezu kwesimo esinjalo."Uma kushaywa ubaba wakho, wena wawungeke uye? Kungaba ngcono nokuthi ngivele ngimuke nomfula. Sasingeke singayi kopheleza uNomthebe wethu. Yingakho ngathi uma uhulumeni kungeyakhe iCorona, akayisuse lapho kuzohamba khona amabutho."UNhleko uthe bekumnandi ukuba seduze kweSilo,  besingumuntu oneziyalo ezinhle. Uncome igalelo laso ekukhuzeni udlame olwaluphakathi kwe-IFP ne-ANC.Yiso lesi sizathu esenza uNhleko athi uzokwenza noma yini ukuvikela ingonyama ezolandela, ukuze ingashabalali imisebenzi yeMbube.Echaza ngomsebenzi wokudidiyela amabutho, uNhleko uthe wumsebenzi ongelula."Ngeke uwenze wena. Le nto uyayinikwa emazulwini. Alikhuni amakhanda abantu uma sebephethe izinduku. Kunzima ukubalawula uma sebedle intelezi. Maningi amacala, kubizwa mina, kuthiwe angizolamula. Izinsizwa uma zike zahlangana, zishayelana amahawu, zilwe.“Kulo msebenzi uthe wuxhumana nezinduna zamabutho ahlukene, zikhona ngisho nasemazweni aphesheya, yena ubika kuNdunankulu waKwaZulu uMntwana Mangosuthu Buthelezi.UNhleko uthe esakhula wayengakaze aziphuphe egibela ibhanoyi eya phesheya, kepha umsebenzi usumhambise eNgilandi naseWales izikhawu eziningi.Odongeni lwendlu yakhe kugcwele izithombe lapho ethathwe khona ehola amabutho emicimbini emikhulu.Phakathi kwezithombe kukhona lapho enoPrince Charles wobukhosi bamaNgisi, eWales; kwesinye wumgubho wokuqala wosuku lwenkululeko owawungo-1995.UNhleko uthe usazophindela maduze kwelamaNgisi lapho ezobe eyolanda imikhonto nezizenze okwaqoqwa ngamaNgisi emva kwempi yaseSandlwana.Ekukhuleni kwakhe, uNhleko ubedlala isigingci, ecula umasikandi. Kodwa uthe uma efika eThekwini eyofuna amatoho, wajoyina ukarati.Njengamanje uNhleko usathatha umhlalaphansi, uke wasebenza ezinkampanini ezehlukene naseminyangweni kahulumeni.UNhleko uthe wawathola onke amabhande kakarati ngaphandle kwelimnyama.Uke washayelela owayengungqongqoshe woMnyango wezeNhlalakahle KwaZulu-Natal, uMntwana Gideon Zulu ongasekho.UNhleko uganwe ngamakhosikazi amathathu, uMaZulu, uMaKhanyile  noKaMagwaza.Ubukeka eyindoda enomthetho.Ngesikhathi kuqhubeka ingxoxo, ubebuye asho ngengila athi, "hheyi" uma efuna umuntu azomthuma, bese kugijima ingane ize kuye.Yize ethi wagcina ebangeni lesibili esikoleni, uNhleko uthe wasiqeda isikole."Mina ngaqeda. Abantu abasala yilaba abanenkinga, ababefuna ukufika ka-10, ekubeni bebona ukuthi akufikeki."
title: Uthi wabekwa ezulwini kwesokudidiyela amabutho

text: USHIYE umndeni udidekile owesilisa waseNtshangwe obehlala nengoduso yakhe kubo, ovakashelwe yintombi ngoLwesine baxabana wayibulala maqede naye wazibulala.UMnuz Lindokuhle Shange (31) waseDiphini, eFredville, eNtshangwe udubule uNksz Busisiwe Nqayi (28) waseTin Town kule ndawo phambi kwengoduso yakhe.Ngokomndeni kaShange, ubejwayele ukubatshela ukuthi uzobe esefile emasontweni alandelayo. Uma efa, ucela ukugadelwa ingane yakhe.Akucaci nokho ukuthi lokhu ubekusho ngani njengoba nobudlelwano bakhe nengoduso kungaveli ukuthi bebuhamba kanjani.Udadewabo kaShange uNksz Londiwe Shange uthe: "Ubevakashelwe yintombi yakhe abanengane nayo. Ufike wathi ingane ayizongibingelela. Ngaleso sikhathi intombi ibikwenye indlu.”Uthe nangosuku lwesigameko umfowabo uphinde amazwi avamise ukuwasho ukuthi ucela bamgadele ingane uma eshona.“Ngithathe ngokuthi uyazidlalela ngoba ubevamisile ukuyisho le nto yakhe simkhuze kodwa bese size sajwayela. Ubevele kungonakele lutho athi uzoshona ngesonto elizayo,” kusho udadewabo kamufi.Uthe bezwe ngezingane ukuthi umufi uxabana nentombi yakhe kwenye indlu.Uthe ngenkathi efika endlini ebebekuyo ubafice beshudulisana bebanga isibhamu.“Ngishaywe wuvalo ngaya kocela usizo kwabesilisa ngoba bengingazi nokuthi kanti unesibhamu.”Esebuyela ekhaya nabantu abebezosiza, uNksz Shange uthi uzwe isibhamu sikhala kabili.Sebefikile endlini, uthe umfowabo ubesevele eshonile intombi yona ishonele endleleni iphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.Imizamo yokuthola umndeni kaNksz Nqayi ayiphumelelanga.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thandeka Mbhele usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko.
title: Udubule unina wengane, maqede wazingqokloza

text: SISULWA uma isitshudeni sishona noma sikhubazeka unomphela isikweletu soxhaso lweNational Students Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS).Lokhu kuvele empendulweni yoMqondisi jikelele woMnyango weMfundo ePhakeme uMnuz Gwebs Qonde, obephendula uSolwazi Belinda Bozzoli ePhalamende, okhulumela iDA emfundweni ePhakeme.USolwazi Bozzoli ubuze ukuthi zingaki izitshudeni ezishiya phakathi izifundo zingaqedile ukufunda.Impendulo yomnyango ithe zingu-122 769 ezishiya phakathi zingaqedanga ukufunda.“Kulezo ezingu-31 627 kuneminyaka emithathu zishiyile, ezingu-67 348 zineminyaka emithathu kuya phezulu zishiyile kanti ezingu-23 794 akukadingeki ukuthi zibuyise imali. I-NSFAS ayisibuzi isikhungo ukuthi kungani isitshudeni sishiye phakathi ukufunda singaqedanga,” kuphendula uQonde.Izitshudeni ezishiye phakathi yilezo ezingaphothulanga ukufunda zibe zixhaswe isikhwama futhi zingafundi.UQonde uthe iNSFAS iyakwazi ukubona izitshudeni eziphothule izifundo zazo.Uthe isikweletu sikhokhwa uma isitshudeni sesisebenza sesihola ngaphezulu kukaR30 000 ngonyaka.Abakweletayo kumele baxhumane nabesikhwama babazise ukuthi sebeyasebenza ukuze bakhokhe.I-NSFAS isebenzisana nabaqoqa izikweletu abazimele ukuze baxhumane nabakweletayo ukuze kuqoqwe imali.Kuthunyelwa nezitatimende ukuze abakweletayo bazi ukuthi sebekweleta malini kanti lesi sikhwama sisebenzisana nophiko oluqoqa intela kuleli iSars ukuthola abakweletayo.UQonde ephendula umbuzo kaNksz Hlomela Bucwa weDA obebuza ukuthi yimalini ebikweletwa yizitshudeni ngonyaka wezimali * -2016/2017, uthe nguR2.543 billion.
title: Isikhathi sokusulwa kweseNSFAS

text: KUFE oyedwa kwathi abanye bashaya bachitha ngesikhathi amaphoyisa nonogada betholana phezulu nabasolwa abathathu okuthiwa bebezama ukweba amabhethri ombhoshongo okudonsa kuwo amaselula, esigamekweni esenzeke eCanelands, eVerulam, izolo ezintatha.Okhulumela inkampani yonogada bakwaReactions Unit of South Africa (Rusa), uMnuz Prem Balram, uthe onogada babo namaphoyisa iSAPS bafike endaweni yesehlakalo emuva kokulunywa indlebe unogada obegade kule ndawo mayelana namadoda abezama ukweba amabhethri ombhoshongo.“Amaphoyisa afike athola ukuthi kunabasolwa abathathu abagqekeza lo mbhoshongo osehlane, ophakathi emasimini omoba. Ngesikhathi kutheleka onogada abasolwa bebesematasa bezama ukuntshontsha amabhethri okusolwa ukuthi ngesikhathi bebona onogada, bavele bavulela ngenhlamvu bebhikise kubo okuphoqe onogada namaphoyisa ukuthi baphendule ngenhlamvu bebhekise kubasolwa,” kusho uBalram.Uthe umsolwa oyedwa udubuleke kabili esifubeni wafa endaweni yesigameko.Uthe abanye abasolwa ababili babaleke ngezinyawo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, usiqinisekisile isigameko.“Kuvulwe idokodo ngokufa komuntu necala lokuzama ukubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa eVerulam. Amaphoyisa ayaphenya,” kusho uColonel Mbele
title: Kufe umsolwa beba amabhethri embhoshongweni

text: UBOSHIWE umnikazi wezinja ezadephuna abesifazane ababili eLovu Beach ngesonto eledlule, asebelulamela emakhaya.UNkk Prudence Majola noNkk Kaylie Vermeulen badedelwe ngoMsombuluko ezibhedlela ezehlukene emuva kokulaliswa ngesonto eledlule.UNkk Vermeulen wayezama ukusiza uNkk Khuzwayo (49), odlule ngesikhathi naye edephunwa yizinja.UNkk Khuzwayo walimala kanzima kulesi sigameko edephunwa yizinja eziyisihlanu eya emsebenzini ekuseni.UNksz Thola Khuzwayo, oyindodakazi yakhe, uthe unina usephumile esibhedlela yize engakalulami kahle. Uthe bashayelwe ucingo wumphenyi wecala esho ukuthi useboshiwe umnikazi wezinja wavela nasenkantolo.UNkk Vermeulen uthe uyalulama kodwa usebonana nodokotela oweluleka ngokomqondo ngendlela lesi sigameko esamhlukumeza ngayo.“Ngiyabonga ukuthi sengiyalulama kodwa namanje asidluli lesi sithombe emqondweni. Kumanje okuningi angikukhumbuli ngoba ngagcina ngizama ukulekelela uNksz Khuzwayo, ngaphaphama esibhedlela,” kuchaza yena.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant-Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa aseManzimtoti aphenya icala lokufuya izinja eziyingozi emphakathini.“Kuboshwe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-45, wavela eNkantolo yeMantshi eManzimtoti ngoLwesine olwedlule. Uzophinde avele enkantolo ngoMeyi 16,” kusho uZwane.Akucaci ukuthi hlobo luni lwezinja ezaluma abesifazane njengoba nabo besadidekile. Kuthiwa uNkk Khuzwayo udlula njalo kule ndawo alunywa kuyona yizinja uma eya emsebenzini. Ngosuku lwesigameko wahlangana nezinja emgwaqweni zamdephuna emzimbeni wonke. Kuthiwa emuva kokuthi sezilume noNkk Vermeulen owayezama ukumsiza, kwaqhamuka umnikazi wazo waphuthumisa uNkk Khuzwayo esibhedlela wamnikeza noR200. Umndeni kaNkk Khuzwayo uthe awazi ukuthi wasinda kanjani ngoba ubengakwazi ngisho ukuphenduka embhedeni emuva kokuhlanganyelwa yizinja.
title: Kuboshwe owezinja eziyingozi

text: UNOBHALA-JIKELELE we-ANC, uMnuz Ace Magashule, uthi kunetulo lokuhlasela nokungcolisa amagama abaholi abathile baKhongolose kubalwa naye ngenhloso yokunqinda amandla ombutho.Engxoxweni ne-eNCA izolo, lapho uMagashule kade ekhuluma ngohlu lwamagama abaholi babo abaya ePhalamende, uthe uma abaholi be-ANC behlaselwa kuwumsebenzi wakhe njengoNobhala-jikelele ukuthi abavikele. Uphike wama ngentaba ukuthi ukhohlakele.Uthe ubumsulwa bakhe uzobuveza enkantolo njengoba esehlanganise ithimba labameli abaphezulu abazomsiza.UMagashule uphawule kanje echitha izinsolo zokuthi ukhohlakele okukhulunywa ngazo ebhukwini elibhalwe yintatheli, uPeter-Louis Myburgh elithi The Gangster State.Uthe uyazi ukuthi kukhona abaqhuba umkhankaso wokuthi akhishwe esikhundleni.“Abaholi be-ANC bayahlaselwa ngoba kuhloswe ukuthi kubuyiselwe emuva umzabalazo wabantu,” kusho uMagashule.Uthe lo mkhakhankaso uqhutshwa ngabathile behlangene nabezindaba ukuze kungcoliswe isithunzi se-ANC.“Bangaki abantu okusolwa ukuthi benza izinto ezithile ezweni lonke ngaphandle kwe-ANC kodwa akushiwo lutho ngabo,” kusho uMagashule.Uthe yonke le mizamo yokubanyundela ngeke ize iphumelele futhi ngeke ibaphazamise.“Siyabona futhi ukuthi lo mkhankaso okhona uhlose ukungcolisa abathile ushiye abanye ngamabomu,” kusho uMagashule.Uthe yena uwumkhiqizo wamagatsha e-ANC akawona umkokotelo.“Umlando wami emzabalazweni uyaziwa, ngilapho engikhona ngoba ngikhethwe amagatsha, uma esethi awangifuni azongikhipha,” kusho uMagashule.Uthe beneme ngohlu lwamagama abaholi babo abaya ePhalamende ngoba baqokwe ngamagtsha abo.UMagashule uzobathathela izinyathelo bonke abantu abathi ukhohlakele.“Amanga aluhlaza wonke lawo abhalwe ebhukwini ngami, iqiniso lizovela enkantolo,” kusho uMagashule.Ebuzwa ukuthi akasebenzisanga yini isikhundla sakhe ukuze indodana nendodakazi yakhe bazitamuzela amathenda eFree State, uMagashule uthe izingane zakhe zindala futhi zizimele, wengeza ngokuthi zinelungelo lokuba ngosomabhizinisi.Uthe umndeni wakwaGupta uwujwayele njengabo bonke abanye abaholi bezombusazwe.“ONkk Helen Zille, uMnuz Bantu Holomisa, uMnuz Mosiuoa Lekota neNkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, bonke sebeke baya emzini wakwaGupta,” kusho uMagashule.Uthe yena wethulwa emndenini wakwaGupta ngesikhathi sikaMnuz Thabo Mbeki.
title: 'Kunetulo lokungcolisa i-ANC' - Magashule

text:
THOKOZANI NDLOVUAKHONJWE indlela amalungu amabili ohlelo loMzansi Magic, i
Diski Divas uWendy Parker noKatlego ‘Kat’ Mohoaduba.Uhlelo luxoxa ngempilo yabesifazane abashade nabadlali bebhola, abathandana nabo kanye nasebahlukana nabo.Ukuxoshwa kukaWendy Parker noKatlego kusukela esigamekweni sangesonto eledlule lapho kushayane khona uNonhle Ndala noWendy Parker estudiyo seKaya FM.UBongi Potelwa woMzansi Magic uthe okwenze kwaxoshwa uWendy noKat wukuthi yibona abahlanganyela uNonhle.“Ngokuqonda kwethu uNonhle washaywa uWendy noKat. Akazange aphindisele futhi wasuka endaweni yesigameko. Ngalolu suku uKatlego wayelinde ukuthi uma kukhona ofika sekwedlule isikhathi phakathi kukaWendy noNonhle kube uyena ovala leso sikhala. Ngesikhathi ingxabano iqhubeka sebengasekho emoyeni kungaleso sikhathi okungenelele ngaso uMohoaduba,” kusho uBongi.Uthe uWendy noKat basazobonakala amasonto amabili ngaphambi kokuba banyamalale njengoba iziqephu eseziqoshiwe zizoqhubeka nokutshengiswa. Usho kanjena nje uBongi ngeledlule kuvele ukuthi kushayane uNonhle noWendy besemoyeni.Akuzange kuvele ukuthi noKatlego uyathinteka kulesi sigameko kepha akusho ngeledlule wukuthi uyilungele impi.Ubudlelwano bukaNonhle noMzansi Magic abuqalanga nge
Diski Divas ngoba ubenohlelo lokujimisa olusanda kuphela i
Bootcamp.I
Diski
Divas ikhuluma ngoNonhle Ndala othandana no-Andile Jali, Wendy Parker ongunkosikazi kaBernard Parker, Katlego ‘Kat’ Mohoaduba owayethandana noJimmy Tau, Felicia Modise owayeshade noTeko Modise noGaositwe ‘Gigi’ Pule ongunkosikazi kaTokelo Rantie.Okunye osekuvelile ngezinhlelo zakwaDStv ezikhuluma ngempilo yangempela yabantu wukuthi ezinye akuzona ezangempela.Kusanda kuvela ukuthi ohlelweni oluveza impilo yezingane zeziqumama ezidla izambane likapondo i
Rich Kids, kukhona ongesona isicebi osebenzisa izimpahla zomngani wakhe.Kuvela ukuthi esinye seziqephu ze
Rich Kids saya emoyeni uphrojusa esetholile ukuthi ozovezwa akanalutho kodwa uzosebenzisa izinto zomuntu amaziyo. Ngenxa yokuthi isikhathi sasingasekho wayeka uhlelo lwaya emoyeni.UCheryl Reddy wezokuxhumana kwaM-Net uthe sebezwile ngezinsolo ezibhekiswe kwi
Rich Kids.“Sisaxhumana nabathintekayo ukuthola iqiniso ngalezi zinsolo. Uma kukhona owenze okuphambene uM-Net ngeke ungabaze ukumthathela izinyathelo nokungaholela ekutheni uhlelo luqedwe,” kusho uCheryl.
title: Akhonjwe indlela ama-Diski Divas

text: KUNQUNYWE ukuthi ihambe inkampani yonogada eqaphe amapulazi aseShowe emuva kokuqala phansi kwemibhikisho, eshiye kushe ipulazi elilodwa, indlu yaseplazini, imoto yomlimi kwalinyazwa iphoyisa namaveni amaphoyisa amathathu.Umbhikisho uqale ngesonto abantu bekhala ngokuthi inkampani yonogada eyadubula uMnuz Sphamandla Xulu (30) owayedoba edamini epulazini isaqhubeka nokugada amapulazi yize babethe abayidingi. UMnuz Dludla ongumholi womphakathi eShowe, uthe abantu babecele ukuthi ihambe inkampani egada amapulazi ebizwa ngokuthi yi-V1 Security nokuthi icala lokubulawa kukaXulu lihamba kancane, abaziswa ngophenyo. UMnuz Seli Buthelezi obhekele ezokuxhumana kuMasipala waseMlalazi, uthe bekunomhlangano ophuthumayo eShowe ngombhikisho, kwavunyelwana ngokuthi inkontileka yokugada amapulazi yeV1 Security isiphelile, ngeke isaqhubeka nokugada amapulazi. Uthe akusilo iqiniso ukuthi umphakathi awaziswanga ngokuqhubekayo ngecala lokubulawa kukaXulu elisenkantolo. “Imeya iyazigxeka izigameko zodlame ebezihambisana nombhikisho ngoba ukushiswa kwempahla nokuqhunyiswa kwezibhamu sekuwubugebengu. Icele amaphoyisa ukuthi asiqaphe ngeso lokhozi isimo. Abantu uma benezikhalo kufanele baxoxe nobuholi bukamasipala nazo zonke izinhlaka ezithintekayo hhayi ukuthi bashise impahla,” kusho uButhelezi.AMAPHOYISA nabanikazi bepulazi behlola umonakalo owenzeke ngesikhathi kushiswa ipulazi nomuzi, umuzi nemoto yomlimi eShowe Isithombe:BONGANI MBATHA AFRICAN NEWS AGENCY (ANA)UMnuz Kwanele Ncalane obhekele ezokuXhumana eMnyangweni wezokuThutha nokuPhepha koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uthe bayalihlonipha ilungelo lomphakathi lokuteleka kodwa abahambisani nokushiswa kwempahla nokuvalwa kwemigwaqo.“UNgqongqoshe ujube ithimba elibhekele udaba lwaseShowe. Siyawucela umphakathi uvumele umthetho wenze umsebenzi wawo ngoba icala lisenkantolo. Izinhlaka ezithintekayo odabeni ziyasebenzisana ukuze kutholakale isisombululo,” kusho uNcalane.UColonel Thembeka Mbele wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe amaphoyisa asiqaphile isimo, akukaboshwa muntu.
title: Ulaka lomphakathi luxoshe onogada eShowe

text: SEKUYINSAKAVUKELA ukubona intsha ezindaweni zobumnandi, iphafuza ugwayi obizwa ngeHubbly Bubbly, okuyinto enamapayipi afakwa emlonyeni ihogelwesagwayi.Kulezi zindawo ubona ngisho umuntu ongabhemi ezitika ngayo futhi ibukeka isesitayeleni futhi ingenisile ngendlela yokuthi abasuke benze iphathi, baze bawaqashe abe yinqwaba, abe yingxenye yobumnandi.Abayibhemayo bayaye bazitshele ukuthi ukubhema lolu hlobo lukagwayiakunabo ubungozi obufana nokubhema ugwayi ojwayelekile kodwa ongoti bathi abazitshela lokhu basuke beshaya eceleni.IHubbly Bubbly iwugwayi ophelele, umehluko yindlela obhenywa ngayo njengoba amapayipi eletha okunye ukunambitheka okusazithelo okungaba wubhanana,i-strawberry, i-aphula, ikhabe, i-mint, umango, amagilebhisi, i-kiwi, ushingamu, ama-cherries, iwolintshi, upapamuzi, vanilla nokunye.Yize lolu hlobo lukagwayi lunambitheka kangcono kunogwayi ojwayelekile futhiseluzakhele udumo kubantu abasha kodwa linobungozi obeqile kunobagwayi.AbeCansa Foundation baveza ukuthi abantu ababhema iHubbly Bubblybasengcupheni enkulu yokuba nezifo esingabala kuzo umdlavuza, isifo senhliziyo,izinkinga zokuphefumula, isifo sohlangothi futhi kungadala nezinkinga lapho oyibhemayo ekhulelwe.Okuphinde kube yingozi ngeHubbly Bubbly ukushintshana noma ukusebenzisa ipayipi elilodwa uma kubhenywa okungadala ukuthelelana ngezifo ezifana no-herpes simplex, hepatitis nesifo sofuba.Ngokombiko weWorld Health Organisation (WHO), amalahle asetshenziswaukushishisa iHubbly Bubbly akhipha intuthu enobuthi obufana ne-carbon monoxide,formaldehyde, polyaromatic hydrocarbons, arsenic ne-lead.Yingakho ukubhema lo gwayi kunobungozi obuphindaphindeke kabili, kungenxa yentuthu ephuma kwizisusa ezimbili, isisusa sokuqala kungamalahle kanti esesibili i-tobacco le efakwa phakathi.Okunye abakuvezayo indlela eyakhiwe ngayo iHubbly Bubbly, idala ukuthi uma oyibhemayo edonsa intuthu kudonseke kakhulu ubuthi lobu obuphuma kuyona. Labo abayibhemayo abakunaki lokhu futhi nalabo abayikhiqizayo ababatsheli nobungozi bayo.IHubbly Bubbly ivutha isikhathi esingalinganiselwa kwihora elilodwa, lokhu okuchaza ukuthi ukuvutha kwayo okukodwa kungadonswa amahlandla alinganiselwa ku-200 kanti akagwayi owejwayelekile amahlandla alinganiselwa kwangu-20.Lokhu kusho ukuthi ubungozi obutholakala kwiHubbly Bubbly buphindaphindeke kaningi uma ukuqhathanisa nalobu obutholakala kugwayi ngoba yona ibhenywa isikhathi eside.Abantu abaningi bakholelwa ukuthi uma ubhema iHubbly Bubbly awuqaleki njengoba kusuke kuqaleka umuntu obhema ugwayi owejwayelekile.Eqinisweni, iHubbly Bubbly ikhiqiza i-nicotine njengeminye imikhiqizo ewugwayi, kanti le nicotine yiyona eyenza abantu ababhemayo bagcine sebeqalekela ugwayi.Lokhu futhi kusho ukuthi ababhema i-hubbly basengozini enkulu yokugcina sebeyiqalekela ngoba yona ikhiqiza ubuthi obuningi kanti futhi ibhenywa isikhathi eside.Ngokocwaningo lweWHO lwango-2005, iHubbly Bubbly iqukethe itiyela eliphindaphindwe kawu-36 ne-carbon monoxide ephindaphindeke kawu-8 uma iqhathaniswa naleyo equkethwe kugwayi.Abezempilo sebekhathazekile ngokukhula ngesivinini kokusetshenziswa kwe-hubbly, ngoba lokhu kuchaza ukuthi baningi abazibeka engcupheni yokugula.Ongoti baveza ukuthi abantu abayibhema kakhulu iHubbly Bubbly ilabo abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-21 kuya kwengu-35.Bathi lokhu kuyakhathaza kakhulu ngoba kule minyaka amaphaphu asuke esakhula, kanti ukubhema kungaholela ekulimaleni kwawo ingunaphakade.IHubby Bubbly ayinabo ubungozi kulabo abayibhemayo kuphela, kepha inobungozi obufanayo nakulabo abangayibhemi uma behlala nabayibhemayo.Yingakho kubalulekile ukuziqhelelanisa nalabo abayibhemayo uma beyibhema, ngoba nawe ungazithola usugula uzazi kahle ukuthi awubhemi.Lolu hlobo lukagwayi lubiza inani elilingalinganiselwa kuR100 kuya kuR1 200 kushiyana ngohlobo lwawo, kanti nesinambithi lesi esifakwa phakathi naso sibiza eyaso imali engafinyelela kuR1 600.Izindawo zobumnandi eziningi sezikwenza ibhizinisi ukuqashisa ngamaHubbly Bbubbly kanti lokhu kubazuzisa enhle imali le, kwazise baningi abantu abayiqashayo uma kuhleliwe ezindaweni zokuqeda ukoma, ezokudla nezobumnandi.IHubbly Bubbly iqashisa ngemali engasukela kuR150 iye iyofinyelela kuR500, kuye ngokuthi isezingeni laleyo naleyondawo.
title: Isexwayiso ngeHubbly Bubbly

text: URenate kulo nyaka obonakale emdlalweni ubukhuluma ngabesifazane ababhekene nezinkinga ezahlukene ebudlelwaneni bezothando, i-Unmarried.Lo mdlalo ubukhonjiswa ku-1Magic ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka ubhalwe abashadikazi uShona noConnie Ferguson.Akagcinanga lapho uphinde wabonakala emdlalweni iThe River khona ku-1Magic.Engxoxweni abe nayo neSolezwe uthe, lona kube unyaka omuhle kakhulu kuye uma kuziwa emkhakheni awuthanda ngenhliziyo yakhe yonke wokulingisa.“Umdlalo i-Unmarried ube yimpumelelo kakhulu, wathandwa ngabantu abaningi futhi nathi njengabalingisi bawo kukhona esikufundile uma kuziwa kwezothando,” kusho uRenate.Uthe nokuba yingxenye yomdlalo iThe River kusho lukhulu kuye njengoba kuwumdlalo osemusha futhi omenze walingisa indawo edonse amehlo abaningi.“Ngiyathemba unyaka omusha uzoza nezibusiso zodwa njengoba kukuningi engifuna ukukwenza kule ndima esikuyona. Ngiyabonga uthando abantu abalokhu bengikhombisa lona uma bengibona ngilingisa emidlalweni ehlukene,” kuchaza yena.Uthe okwamanje usagxile emidlalweni yeshashalazi.Ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi akafuni ukugxila kweyethelevishini kuphela njengoba imidlalo yeshashalazi ibalulekile kunoma yimuphi umlingisi.
title: URenate uthi gozololo kwithelevishini

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESEUGCWELE ukuzethemba umqeqeshi weBanyana Banyana, uDesiree Ellis, ngokuthi iqembu lakhe lizobe selihlangene kahle uma selibhekene neBotswana emdlalweni wesihle onamuhla ngo-3 ntambama eBidvest Wits Stadium, eMilpark.Ngempelasonto, iBanyana ikwazile ukuguqisa iZambia ngo-3-1 emdlalweni obukuyona le nkundla.Amagoli eqembu lasekhaya ebelilandela emuva abekwe enethini nguNoko Matlou noThembi Kgatlana bobabili abagijima kwiSD Eibar yaseSpain.Igoli leZambia okumanje ilungiselela imidlalo yama-Olympic azokuba seJapan phakathi kukaJulayi no-Agasti nonyaka, lona lize nokaputeni wayo uBabra Banda ovule inkundla.Le midlalo yesihle yeBanyana ingeyokulungiselela imidlalo yokuhlungela umqhudelwano weCaf Africa Women Cup of Nations (AWCON) ozokuba seMorocco ngonyaka ozayo.Ngemuva komdlalo neZambia, u-Ellis uthe nakuba benqobile lapha kodwa kukhona lapho engagculisekanga khona.“Sijabule ngokuthi umdlalo sikwazile ukuwunqoba phezu kokuba bese silandela ngemuva ngegoli elihle abalishayile. Kodwa-ke, angigculisekanga ngendlela esidlale ngayo esiwombeni sokuqala ikakhulukazi abadlali bethu abahlaselayo okuyibona okufanele baqale iminyakazo,” usho kanje u-Ellis.Lo mqeqeshi uqhube wathi kodwa esiwombeni sesibili bakwazile ukuziqoqa baqala badlala ibhola ngokukhulu ukukhululeka njengoba bese bekwazi ukugcina ibhola futhi babopha namabhawodi emuva.“Esiwombeni sesibili, sikwazile ukuwulawula umdlalo njengoba bese sikwazi ukudlala ngendlela esiyijwayele kodwa ebesikubhekile kubona wukuthi bangasizumi ngezikhawu ngoba bayingozi kakhulu ngalapho.“Ngicabanga ukuthi emdlalweni wethu olandelayo neBotswana sizokube sesehluke kakhulu kunalokhu ebesiyikho ngesikhathi sibhekene neZambia,” kusho u-Ellis. Umdlalo weBanyana neBotswana uzofana nowamagqubu kwazise iyona eyakhipha elakuleli emidlalweni yokuhlungela ama-Olympic ngo-2019.
title: OweBanyana ubheke okungcono ’kowamagqubu’

text: IRoots wuhlelo obelwethulwa uNgizwe noTebogo Mahlaela kuSABC1 ngoMgqibelo ngo-5.30 ntambama.Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe nguphrojusa omkhulu weRoots u-Ali Mpofu woKhamba Productions.“Isivumelwano esasinaso noSABC asivuselelwanga. Sagcina nje ukuthola imali yokuholela abasebenzi kudala kabi."Kusukela ngoMashi wangonyaka owedlule kuphindwa iziqephu ezindala zeRoots,” kusho uMpofu obezwakala ukuthi ukhathazekile emoyeni.Ebuzwa ukuthi asekhona amathemba okuthi lolu hlelo lungase lubuyele kuSABC, uMpofu uthe akazi kuSABC. Okhulumela iSABC, uVuyo Mthembu uthe uzophendula uma esenolwazi olugcwele ngalolu daba.Ethintwa uNgizwe uvele washaya ngezimfishane wathi “Angikwazi lokho. Bekuwuhlelo oluhle lona kodwa uma sebenqume ukulivala, mina angingeni ndawo.” NoTebogo Mahlaela, uhambe emazwini kazakwabo, “Njengomethuli walolu hlelo ngiyaqala ngqa ukuzwa lezi zindaba. Bengingazi lutho.”Akubona oNgizwe abalimele kodwa noVee Mthembu obethula Imizwilili naye ugqemeke eyakhe ingozi njengoba nenkontilaki yalolu hlelo noSABC ingavuselelwanga.
title: ISABC isiphuce uNgizwe esinye isinkwa

text: BAFUNA ijeziswe kanzima indoda okuthiwa idlwengule owesifazane (51) nomzukulu wakhe oneminyaka eyisikhombisa.Lokhu kwenzeke eChesterville extension 2 ngeSonto ntambama ngesikhathi indoda (30) eyaziwayo igasela emzini ohlala owesifazane nabazukulu bamantombazane ababili.Ilungu lomndeni, elingeke lidalulwe igama ukuvikela isithunzi sabadlwenguliwe, lithe indoda eyaziwayo ifike ngeSonto ntambama kukhona owesifazane nabazukulu bakhe.“Ugogo ukhonza esontweni elikubo kalo mfana lasezayoni. Akazange axwaye ngesikhathi efika ekhaya. Sithole ukuthi uye wangena wase esabisa ugogo ngommese wamfaka ekameleni alala kulo wamdlwengula. Uthe uma eqeda wadlulela enganeni yentombazane eneminyaka eyisikhombisa wayivalela ethoyilethi nayo wayidlwengula. Omunye umzukulu usindiswe wukubaleka. Yena uneminyaka ewu-12,” kuchaza ilungu lomndeni.Lithe lifuna umthetho uyijezise kanzima indoda ngoba ekwenze emndenini wakhe kuwuphazamisile kakhulu.“Ngikhuluma nawe nje ugogo nomzukulu balaliswe esibhedlela ngoba balimele. Umzukulu akakwazwanga nokuthi atishwe ngeSonto ngoba udokotela uthe ulimele kakhulu futhi uvuvukele. Ibuhlungu le nto esiyenziwe yilo mfana, sifuna umthetho umjezise kanzima,”Unina wengane edlwenguliwe uthe indoda eyenze lo mhlola akufanele iphile nabantu ngoba iphuce ingane impilo yayo.“Kufanele afe nje ngoba uyithathile impilo yengane yami. Ayikwazi nokuhamba, bekufanele siyiphathe ngesikhathi siyihambisa esibhedlela. Udokotela uthe impilo yayo ngeke iphinde ifane,” kusho unina.Uthe intombazane eneminyaka ewu-12 iye yabalekela kwamngani kanina okuwuyena ofonile wazisa nomakhelwane ukuze bayohlola unina. Bafice impahla isakazeke yonke indawo kubonakala ukuthi unina ubezama ukulwa kodwa isigebengu sagcina simdlwengulile.Umndeni uthe umsolwa, obesebalekele emaflethini asePhoyinti, eThekwini, utholakale ngosizo lomphakathi ngenxa yokuthi kusatshalaliswe isithombe sakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.UColonel Thembeka Mbele wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uthe kuboshwe owesilisa (30) ngamacala amabili okudlwengula.
