Uzovela enkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini namhlanje.UNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza, uncome ukusebenzisana komphakathi namaphoyisa okuholele ekuboshweni kwendoda.Uthe kumphatha kabi ukuzwa ngokudlwengulwa kwabesifazane nezingane nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane emphakathini.“Sinezinhlelo ezehlukene zokulwa nesihluku esibhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane kodwa lezi zigameko zilokhu zenzeka. Sicela umphakathi usebenzisane namaphoyisa ukuze kuboshwe abenza lokhu,” kusho uNkk Khoza.Ikhansela le ndawo, uMnuz Sfiso Mngadi, lithe umndeni uzokwelulekwa ngokwengqondo ngosonhlakalahle emuva kwesehlo.“Sidiniwe yilesi senzo, sifuna ajeziswe wumthetho lo muntu odlwengule ugogo nengane,” kusho uMngadi.
title: Bafuna ajeziswe ‘odlwengulile’

text: UDINGA ukululekwa ngokomqondo unina wengane enezinyanga ezintathu kulandela ukuhlukunyezwa kwayo umzanyana obeyishaya, eyiklinya aphinde ayicindezele ngezingubo.Owesifazane waseMlaza, esigcemeni u-Q, ongeke adalulwe ukuvikela ingane, uthe usathuthumela kulandela isigameko esenzeke ngoLwesithathu lapho indodakazi yakhe ihlukunyezwe owesifazane obeyigada.Lo wesifazane wakhona eMlaza, igama lakhe elingeke lidalulwe njengoba engakaveli enkantolo, kuthiwa uboshwe khona ngoLwesithathu.Unina wengane uthe ubenesonto elilodwa egada ingane yakhe umsolwa.“Indodakazi yami ngiqale ukuyishiya nalo wesifazane obeqashe kamakhelwane ngesonto eledlule ngoba sengibuyela emsebenzini. Uyena owazicelela ukuba ngishiye izingane zami (nenye eneminyaka emithathu), kuyena ngoba vele ubegada enye ingane eneminyaka emithathu,” kusho unina wengane.Uthe ngoLwesithathu ebuya emsebenzini, owesilisa oqashise umsolwa, umtshele ukuthi ingane yakhe ayihlezi kahle nalo mzanyana.“Simbizile lo wesifazane ngambuza ukuthi ngempela kwenzekani uma ngisemsebenzini. Uphikile ukuthi uhlukumeza ingane. Lo wesilisa ube esekhipha i-video, ayithathe evele ngewindi endlini obekuhlezi kuyo izingane. I-video ibiveza ingane yami ishaywa embhedeni, icindezelwa sakuyiklinywa, iphinde ivalwe ngengubo ebusweni. Lo wesifazane uvele wathi uyaxolisa lokhu ukwenza ngoba isuke ikhala ingane yami. Ngibe sengiyovula icala,” kusho unina wengane.Uthe omakhelwane babe sebemtshela ukuthi ingane yakhe ibikhala zonke izinsuku, amahora ingathuli. Enye eneminyaka emithathu kuthiwa yona ibivele ibuyele kubo, ihlale emnyango, ingafuni ukuhlala nalo wesifazane nasola ukuthi nayo ibihlukumezeka.Uthe ngokwakhe, ufuna lo wesifazane avalelwe isikhathi eside ejele.“Engikufundile ngalesi sigameko ukuthi akumele ushiye ingane nomuntu ongesona isihlobo sakho, nongamethembi,” kusho unina wengane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa aseMlaza aphenya icala lokuzama ukubulala.Amaphoyisa anxuse ukuba izingane zishiywe nabantu abanolwazi ngokugada izingane.
title: Kuboshwe umzanyana oklinye usana

text: UMHOLI weqembu iGood Party, onguNgqongqoshe omusha wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi neNgqalasizinda, uNkk Patricia De Lille, uthi ayikho indaba yokuthi uzogwinywa yi-ANC.UDe Lille udlane indlebe neSolezwe ngeSonto ngesikhathi eyisimenywa somshado womholi weDA KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango KwaNongoma.UDe Lille uthi uyazizwa lezi zinkulumo futhi zokuthi i-ANC ihlela ukumgwinya neqembu lakhe njengoba imnike isikhundla esiphezulu.Uthi le nkulumo ivela komonase abangafuni ukwemukela ukuthi ungumholi othembekile ukusebenzela abantu. Babodwa abebethi ukusungulwa kweGood Party kwagqugquzelwa yi-ANC ukuze iphazamise iDA eWestern Cape.Bakubona njengomklomelo ukunikwa kukaDe Lille isikhundla. Usungule iqembu lakhe emuva kokwehlukana neDA kukubi imkhipha nasesikhundleni sokuba yiMeya yaseKapa.Kumangale abaningi ngesikhathi kuqhamuka igama likaDe Lille kumenyezelwa ikhabhinethi.“Bakhuluma umbhedo abasho njalo futhi ngiyazi ukuthi isukaphi leyonto. Umengameli ungethembile wanginika umsebenzi futhi ngizowenza ukuze ngithuthukise izwe lethu. Sonke sinomthwalo wokusebenzela isizwe,’’ kuchaza uDe Lille.Uthe ukuba wungqongqoshe akusho ukuthi umsebenzi wakhe wokumela iGood Party uzophazamiseka. Uveze ukuthi unalo uhlelo lokwenza le misebenzi ngaphandle kokuthi kube khona okuphazamisekayo ezinhlelweni zeqembu lakhe.IGood Party inezihlalo ezimbili ePhalamende futhi uDe Lille uthi isazoqhubeka nokuba khona balelwe nokuthi ikhule ngoba abangenanga ngenhlanhla ePhalamende.Ebuzwa ngezinhlelo anazo ngomnyango wakhe uthe ubeselinde ukuthi umengameli athule inkulumo yakhe ebhekiswe esizweni bese kuyaqala kushunqa uthuli kusetshenzwa.
title: UDe Lille ucikwa eyokugwinywa yi-ANC

text: KUSOLWA umbango wokushendeza oholele empini yabaholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, okuthiwa bahluthane ngesibhakela bacishe badubulana, kwaze kwasiza ukulamula kwabebekhona.Izimpukane eziluhlaza zipotshozele Isolezwe ngeSonto ukuthi uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, uNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal,uhlubane ngesibhakela noMnuz Arthur Zwane.Kuthiwa uZwane oyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu, udabuka ngaphansi kwesiFunda se-ANC Emalahleni, eNewcastle.Kuthiwa amankomane aqhume emahhovisi kaKhongolose eThekwini emuva kokuthi uZwane eqonde uHlomuka, emsola ngokushendeza nomkakhe.Kuthiwa balwe kwamnyama phansi, uZwane esho ukumjuqa uHlomuka, wakhuzwa. UHlomuka obuye abe yiPhini likaNobhala KwaZulu-Natal, usemanzini njengoba kwenzeka lokhu nje, ushonelwe ngumfowabo odutshuliwe.Umthombo uthe kusize ukuthi abebekhona bancenge isikhulu ebesingezwa mshini, sifuna ukudubula uHlomuka.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ricardo Mthembu uqinisekisile ukuthi kunesigameko sokuxabana kwamaqabane kodwa wathi imininingwane ephelele ibingakafiki kubona.“Asikawutholi umbiko osemthethweni. Kodwa sinalo ulwazi ngamaqabane athe ukuhilizisana. Ngeke kube lula ukwenaba ngoba sisazama nathi ukuthola kahle konke okwenzekile,’’ kuchaza uMthembu ngamafuphi.KUTHIWA ubekhipha izibhakela ezinzima uMnuz Arthur Zwane, esho ukuqeda uzakwabo ngesikhathi belwa emahhovisi e-ANC. Isithombe : FACEBOOK/ARTHUR ZWANEUHlomuka ethintwa akafunanga nokuyikhuluma le ndaba yokulwa kwakhe nozakwabo.“Ngisekhaya ngishonelwe, ngizama ukubhekana naleso simo okwamanje. Ngicela ungixolele kakhulu ngalokho,” kushaya uHlomuka ngamafuphi.Okhulumela umnyango kaHlomuka, uMnuz Lennox Mabaso uthe ubona sengathi akusona isikhathi esifanele sokudingida lolu daba ngoba uHlomuka usavelelwe yisifo ekhaya.“Ubuntu sibuhambisa phambili. Okwamanje sisazama ukududuza nokweseka umndeni kaHlomuka.”UZwane ushayelwe kaningi kodwa belungabanjwa ucingo nemiyalezo abethunyelwe yona ubengayiphenduli.
title: Kuqhume iqupha izikhulu ze-ANC zibanga owesifazane

text: UKUPHUMELA eshashalazini kukaTeddy (okuyindawo elingiswa nguSicelo Buthelezi kwiGomora) kugqugquzele isilomo sikathisha waseMpangeni ukuba sikhulume ngokudlwengulwa kwaso ngesikhathi sisesincane. UMlungisi Mhlongo (29), osedume ngelikaNomalizo emuva kokushintsha ubulili bakhe, uthi ukunukubezwa ngocansi kukaTeddy nguthisha wakhe uMiss Manzi, kumthunuke amanxeba abesaphola.  UNomalizo uthi esakhula ubedlwengulwa nguninalume kusukela eneminyaka ewu-10. "Kungithinte kakhulu ukubona uTeddy edlula kulesiya simo. Kubuyise imicabango eminingi ebengithi sengadlula kuyo," kusho uNomalizo.Uma echaza uthi uninalume wakhe wayemdlengulwa  nsuku zonke uma ebuya edakiwe.  "Ngangisemncane, ngingaqondi ukuthi kwenzakalani kwaze kuba ngiyakhula." Uthi ukhule azi ukuthi uhlukile kwabanye abafanyana ayekhula nabo."Kodwa ngingazi ngizothi yini le engiyizwayo. Ngaze ngafika esikoleni samabanga aphansi." Mayelana nokunukubezwa nguninalume, uNomalizo uthi wawazisa umndeni kodwa wathi lolu daba luzodingidwa njengabantu abadala."Umalume akaze aboshwe kodwa wasuswa ukuhlala nathi bamyisa emakhaya. Angiphindanga ngambona." Ebuzwa ukuthi usafisa yini ukuba uninalume ajeziswe ngamanyala awenza kuye, uNomalizo uthe ngeke kusamsiza ngalutho yena. "Kungamsiza ngani? Ngiyethemba wagcina ngami ukudlwengula."Ugqugquzele intsha ukuba iphumele obala uma ihlukunyezwa ngokocansi."Abantu abaningi abazi futhi abakholwa ukuthi bayahlukunyezwa ngokocansi ngabantu besilisa. Ukuphumela kwami obala ukuthi ngifundise futhi ngiqwashise abanye." Mayelana nokushintsha ubulili uthi isinqumo asithatha ngemizwa abeyizwa ngaphakathi."Kudala ngangazi ukuthi ngaphakathi ngiwumuntu wesifazane. Ngisakhula ngiseNyuvesi  ngiphile njengoweslisa othandana nabanye abanobulili obufuze obami. Ngifuna ukwazi kabanzi ngalokhu engikuzwayo ngaphakathi, ngezwa ngokuthi kukhona abantu abazibiza ngama-transgender. Ngaqala lapho ukuxhumana nodokotela bengqondo maqede ngadla amaphilisi  ama-hormone. Sekuyinyanga yami yesine ngikuwo,“ kulandisa uNomalizo. Le ntokazi ifundisa isiNgisi kwaGrade 10 no11 esikoleni eyaphothula kuso u-matric ngo-2009 i-Old Mill High. uNomalizo waphothula iziqu zeB Ed eNyuvesi iZululand, oNgoye. Ngaphandle kobuthishela, udume njengomphathi wezinhlelo emicimbini ehlukene futhi unesifiso sokuba wumsakazi.
title: Ushintshe ubulili bakhe obedlwengulwa nguninalume

text: WEHLULEKE nokuzibamba wasikhihla isililo owesifazane ohlala ehlathini eliseWestville, eThekwini, ebona kufika ungqongqoshe ezomnika usizo.UNksz Bonisile Dlamini waseXobho, uhlala ehlathini nezingane zakhe ezinhlanu uThulebona Dlamini (17), indodana kamfowabo * -Andile Zulu (26), ekamzala uMbulelo Mdledle, indodakazi uDineo (10) nomzukulu uPrincess (5) abangafundi, okumele ngabe basesikoleni.UNksz Dlamini wafika eThekwini ezosondelela ukuzobheka indodakazi eyayishayiswe yimoto uSne, eyagcina ishonile.Esebuyela ekhaya, uthi wafika umuzi wakhe oseXobho ucekelwe phansi.ISolezwe libike ngosizi lwalo mndeni ngeledlule njengoba selusukumise uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu noSihlalo wekomiti elibhekele ukuhlaliswa kwabantu kumasipala weTheku uMnuz Thanduxolo Sabela.UMshengu obehamba nabahloli uthe ufuna izingane zakulo mndeni okuthiwa azikaze zilubhade esikoleni zingene ngonyaka ozayo.“Ithimba labahloli lizocubungula uhlelo olukhona lwezemfundo lokuthi bangafakwa kumaphi amakilasi ikakhulukazi lo oneminyaka engu-10 ngoba uselahlekelwe yisikhathi esiningi. Lo oneminyaka ewu-17 owagcina kwaGrade2 sizomzamela izinhlelo zokuthuthukisa amakhono. Kungumsebenzi kahulumeni ukuthi uma uzwa ngesimo esehlisa isithunzi esinjengalesi usukume uyosilungisa. Ngiyethembisa ukuthi ngonyaka ozayo lezi zingane zizobe zifunda,” kusho uMshengu.USabela uthe lo mndeni uzokwakhelwa umuzi ngokushesha, ngaphambi kokuthi wakhelwe umuzi uzotholelwa indlu ozoquba kuyo.UNksz Dlamini oziphilisa ngokudayisa emgwaqweni, uthe akanayo imvume yokwenza lokhu ngezinye izikhathi uma amaphoyisa embambile amphuca izimpahla zakhe.Ucele uSabela ukuba amsize ngemvume.“Udaba lwezimvume zokudayisa luphethwe ngomunye umnyango okwamanje ngeke ngisho ukuthi kuzokwenzekani ngoba le ndawo odayisela kuyo anginalo ulwazi lokuthi kuvumelekile yini kodwa isicelo sakho ngizosidlulisela.”UMfundisi Bheki Nxumalo obuye afundise eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uthe waqala ukubona lo mndeni ngePhasika ethi ubezama ukuxhumana nomasipala weTheku kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.Uzame ukutholela izingane isikole, eziningi zanqaba ukwamukela lezi zingane wathi ezinye zikude nehlathi elihlala lo mndeni.
title: Ujabulele usizo oluvela kungqongqoshe owesifazane ohlala ehlathini

text: IMEYA yaseGoli uMnuz Herman Mashaba imemezele ukuthi iyasula esikhundleni ngoMsombuluko ekuseni. UMashaba ukusho lokhu esithangamini nabezindaba eBraamfontein, maphakathi nedolobha iGoli.UMashaba uthe uzogcina ukusebenza ngoNovemba 27, waphinde waveza ukuthi uyesula njengelungu leDemocratic Alliance (DA). “Ngeke ngikwazi ukusebenzisana nabantu abahluleka ukubona ukuthi ukungalingani okuseNingizimu Afrika kudlula lokho okwakukhona ngeminyaka yobandlululo,” kuchaza uMashaba. “IDA igxeke futhi isole indlela engisebenza ngayo. Bafuna ngiphathe ngendlela yokuzikhukhumeza, kube sengathi ngiphethe ngedwa. Bengisebenza nabantu abangafuni ngisize abanye abantu yize bekuhlomula imindeni engu-7 000 ngenxa yokuthi akuyona inqubomgomo yeDA. Kungani bengakwenzi inqubomgomo yeDA lokhu?"  Amahlebezi abesabalele abeveza ukuthi isinqumo sokushiya kukaMashaba silandela izindaba zokuqokwa kowayengumholi weDA uNkk Helen Zille njengoSihlalo weFederal Council kule nhlangano (Fedco) engqungqutheleni ebingempelasonto. Imibiko yabezindaba ngempelasonto ibiveza ukuthi uMashaba utshele abasebenza ngaphakathi kwiDA ukuthi uzoshiya esikhundleni sobumeya uma uZille eqokwa njengoSihlalo weFederal Council. UZille uqokwe ngeSonto njengoba ezongena esikhundleni ebesiphethwe uMnuz James Selfe. USelfe ubememezele izinhloso zokushiya phansi lesi sikhundla ngemuva kokhetho lukazwelonke obelungoMeyi 8. Umholi weDA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane ubonge uMashaba ngomsebenzi omuhle awenzile, wambiza ngeqhawe ngesikhathi ekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba. UMaimane uthe uMashaba ubesebenzela ukuthuthukisa idolobha iGoli.  UMashaba usinde ngokulambisa ngenkathi i-ANC iphakamisa ivoti lokungabethembi ubuholi bakhe ngo-Agasti. I-ANC igcine ilihoxisile ivoti lokungabethembi ubuholi bakhe.
title: UMashaba usulile kwesobumeya eGoli

text: UFUNA kuboshwe abasolwa umndeni womfundi oneminyaka engu-24 odutshulwe emini kabha eLindelani phambi kwabafowabo elamulela umngani wabo.USanele “Ngogo” Zondo obefunda uGrade 11 eGugulabasha High udutshulwe ngeSonto emini kubuka abantu KwaNdlazi erenki khona eLindelani.Ngokusho komfowabo, uMnuz Msizi Zondo obekhona kwenzeka isigameko, babehamba bebahlanu beyobuza igama losolwa ngokugwaza umfowabo omncane uManelisi ngesikhathi behlaselwa. UManelisi kuthiwa wagwazwa ngebhodlela ebusweni ngoMgqibelo ngumsolwa ongaziwa ngaphandle kwesizathu.“Sasihamba ngemoto umngani wethu wehla eyobuza igama losolwa ngokugwaza umfowethu ngebhodlela ebusweni, sasifuna ukuya emaphoyiseni siyobika sesiliphethe igama lomsolwa ukuze aboshwe. Abafana esasibuza kubona bahlasela umngani wethu kwathi sesiyolamula kwavele kwaqhamuka iqulu labafana lihlome ngezibhamu lasidubula. Inhlamvu yangigeja, umfowethu bamdubula ekhanda ngibuka, washonela khona lapho,” kusho uZondo.Uthe abazi ukuthi kungani ababephethe izibhamu bebahlasele.“Ngabe kungcono ukuba sikhuluma ukuthi sasilwa njengoba besidubulile kodwa akunjalo bavele baqhamuka sebesidubula nje ngaphandle kokubuza,” kusho uZondo.Uninalume kamufi uMnuz Bheki Ntshangase uthe kwenzeka lokhu nje basemanzini njengoba ubabekazi kamufi kulindeleke ukuba afihlwe namhlanje.“Uyise walezi zingane ushone ngonyaka odlule ngo-Agasti njengoba unina esazilile, ngaphezu kwalokhu kwenzeka lesi sigameko kushoniwe njengoba kuzongcwatshwa ngoLwesibili (namhlanje). Kunzima ukwamukela okwenzekile. Esikufunayo wukuba abasolwa baboshwe ukuze bajeze ngabakwenzile,” kusho uNtshangase.Umufi uchazwe njengomuntu obezithulela ethanda imfundo njengoba ngo-2014 waqeda * -matric kodwa wangaphasa kahle. Emuva kokubamba amatoho iminyaka emithathu wakhetha ukubuyela esikoleni kulo nyaka eyoqala uGrade 11.“Isikole ubesikhonze kakhulu njengoba ebuyele yize esemdala. Kuyadumaza ukuthi abulawe ngale ndlela ngoba ubenekusasa eliqhakazile,” kusho uNtshangase.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe amaphoyisa aseNtuzuma aphenya icala lokubulala emuva kokuba kudutshulwe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-24.“Imbangela yokubulawa kukamufi ayaziwa, uphenyo lwamaphoyisa lusaqhubeka,” kusho uColonelMbele.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi KwaNdlazi erenki sekuphenduke kwajombigazi njengoba kujwayele ukuba nezigameko zokuhlaselwa kwabantu.Umfowabo kamufi, uManelisi, naye wagwazwa kule ndawo ngoMgqibelo okuyisigameko esiholele kwesokubulawa kukamfowabo.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi kule ndawo kudliwa izidakamizwa emini kabha, kanti amaphara ayazicanasela nje.
title: Udutshulwe belamulela umngani obehlaselwa

text: AMAPHOYISA aKwaZulu-Natal anxusa abesifazane ukuthi baqaphele ngaso sonke isikhathi bangabi abagilwa bamadoda afuna ukubaqola imali yabo abayisebenze kanzima.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kunezigebengu ezicuthela abesifazane abadala, abangabafelokazi nabadivosile zenze sengathi ziyabathanda kanti zifuna ukubaqola.Uthe izigebengu zincenga abesifazane ukuthi basule emsebenzini ukuze batshale imali yabo noma zibancenge ukuthi babonane nenyanga ezobasiza ukuthi yandise imali yabo iphindaphindwe.UColonel Mbele uthe sekuke kwenzeka ukuthi abesifazane babe ngabagilwa balobu buqola. Inkinga wukuthi akulula ukuphenya lolu hlobo lwamacala ngoba kusuke kade kunesivumelwano sokunikana imali futhi kade kuthandwana.Uthe abesifazane bayaxwayiswa ukuthi baqaphele bangathembi noma ngubani ngemali yabo abasuke beyonge impilo yabo yonke.
title: Kuxwayiswa abesifazane ngabantu abazobaqola

text: UGWETSHWE odilikajele abahlanu owesilisa waseRichards Bay ngokudlwengula ephindelela indodakazi yakhe angayizali kusukela ineminyaka emine ngo-2005 kwaze kwaba u-2016.Le ndoda eneminyaka ewu-38 igwetshwe yinkantolo yaseRichards Bay, ngoMsombuluko.Isigwebo sayo sihlanganisa necala lokudlwengula umngani wendodakazi yakhe le abeyidlengula, owayevakashile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe icala lokudlwengula lavulwa esiteshini samaphoyisa eRichards Bay, idokodo lathunyelwa ophikweni oluphenya izigameko ezithinta udlame lwemindeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane namacala athinta ucansi, okuyilo olwabopha le ndoda.Lo mdlwenguli wavela enkantolo wadedelwa ngebheyili, ngoMsombuluko utholakale enecala wagwetshwa odilikajele abahlanu.
title: Odilikajele abahlanu kodlwengule indodakazi

text: AMASISTELA ebandla lamaRoma aKhatholika, kuthiwa asekhathele wukuthunyelelwa woFata imiqhafazo bebavezela imiphambili yabo.Lokhu kuvele esithangamini saleli bandla ebesisePort Shepstone, kulandela ukungenelela kwekoMkhulu laleli bandla ezingeni lomhlaba, abajube omunye woFata ohlonishwayo ukuthi aphenye ngezinsolo zokungalungi okuthiwa ziqhubeka kwisiFundabhishi eMarrianhill ngaphansi kukaFata Mlungisi Dlungwane.Kulezi zithangami ezengamelwe nguMbhishobhi William Slattery, bekukhona amasistela, abaPristi noFata.Kuthiwa bagonyuluka ngobubi obenzeka kuleli bandla ngaphansi kwalesi siFundaBhishobhi.USlattery omele ikomkhulu laleli bandla iVatican yaseRome, ezingeni lomhlaba, uphenya ngokuziphatha kukaMbhishobhi Dlungwane noFata Alexius Madela abasolwa ngokuhluleka ukuphatha ngendlela efanele nokwenzelela ngendlela abaphethe ngayo.Umthombo okulezi zigcawu utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi namakhosikazi abantu akhale esifanayo.“Abazali baphinde batshela uMbhishobhi Slattery ukuthi izingane zabo eziyizikhonzi azisayi esontweni ngoba zesaba oFata abalala nazo,” kusho umthombo obuyingxenye yalesi sigcawu.Kuvele nezinsolo zokuthi ukudliwa kwemali kudla lubi njengoba kunabaPristi abanikezwa izimishini ezinemali nguMbhishobhi ngoba efuna ukudla imali yebandla ngokubasebenzisa.“Kuphinde kwavezwa nobudedengu bokunikezwa koFata abathize abaxegelwa yisimilo izikhundla zokwengamela imihlangano yamantombazane neyabesifazane,” kubalisa umthombo.Okunye okuthiwa okuvelile kulesi sigcawu, ukuqashisa koFata nabaBhishobhi ngezindawo zebandla bese imali etholakalayo iye kubona.Kukhalwe nangoMbhishobhi ngaphansi kwalesi siFundabhishobhi, ngokutshela ibandla ukuthi kuzomele limxhawule ngoR1 000 njengoba esezothatha umhlalaphansi.Ukuxegelwa oziphu, ukuthanda amakhosikazi abantu, ukunganakwa kwezikhalazo zamalungu ebandla nokunye okuningi, umthombo uthe kushiye uSlattery ebambe ongezansi.“Kusazoshuba njengoba kusalindeleke ukuthi kuyiwe oKhahlamba Deanery, naseXopo Deanery lapho kusazovela nokunye okuningi,” kuchaza umthombo.Ngeledlule leli phephandaba like labika ngokubheda kwesimo esithinta uMbhishobhi Dlungwane okuyimanje kuthiwa wehlisiwe kulesi sikhundla ngenxa yokwehluleka kwakhe ukulawula oFata nokuphatha kwisiFundabhishobhi asengamele.UFata Alexius Madela omunye wabasolwa ngokuziphatha kulezi zigcawu. Ubesolwa ngokunqwaha nezimpahla zikankosikazi womuntu osewashona okuthiwa wayekipite naye.Lezi zigcawu kuthiwa sezike zahlala KwaMakhutha, eMzumbe nakwezinye izindawo.
title: 'Ofata bathumela izithombe zangasese'
Izimanga zikaTau eBelgium zizosiza iBafana e-Egypt

text: SIBI isimo kumfundi (15) ogwazwe womunye (16) ezintatha zayizolo endaweni yokucima ukoma eseMlaza.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uThabiso Maduna (15) ungumdansi ojwayele ukunandisa ezindaweni ezihlukene zobumnandi neqembu lakhe.UMnuz Bonginhlanhla Maduna onguyise kaThabiso, uthe indodana yakhe ibihambe nomfana wakwamakhelwane oyigwazile ojwayele ukuhamba nayo vele uma iyonandisa.“Lo mfana omgwazile akayena umdansi kodwa ujwayele ukuhamba nomfana wami nabanye abadansayo. Angazi ukuthi bekubangweni kodwa kuthiwa kube nengxabano eholele ekutheni lo wakwamakhelwane agwaze uThabiso nomunye umfana. Ngenhlanhla lo omunye akalimalanga njengowami ngoba owami ulele esibhedlela nommese obhajwe ekhanda,” kusho uMaduna.Izolo uMaduna nomndeni wakhe bebesalinde ukuzwa ukuthi uThabiso uzodluliselwa nini esibhedlela iNkosi Albert Luthuli Memorial lapho kunongoti abakwazi ukuhlenga abasesimeni esibucayi.UNksz Busisiwe Sibiya ongunina kaThabiso izolo ntambama uthe kumphethe kabi ukulimala kwendodana yakhe, ilinyazwa wumfana wakwamakhelwane.“Ulimele kakhulu umfana wami, ngisalindile ukuzwa ukuthi uzosuswa nini ePrince Mshiyeni ayiswe eNkosi Albert ngoba ummese usahleli ekhanda.“Okubuhlungu wukuthi omakhelwane bami, okungabazali balo mfana omgwazile abakaze bazobonana nami noma balethe umfana azoxolisa, isenzo sabo asikhombisi nje ukuthi singabantu abaphilisanayo.Uthe uzwe kuthiwa umfana ogwaze uThabiso uboshwe ihora elilodwa wase ededelwa.“Ngiyafisa ukwazi ukuthi bekwenzenjani kuze kugwazwe uThabiso, ngiyadinga nokuthi omakhelwane beze sizoxoxa ngoba sonke besingekho ngesikhathi kwenzeka le nto egcine ngokulalisa ingane yami esibhedlela,” kusho uNksz Sibiya.Uthe njengoba namhlanje kuwuMsombuluko uThabiso kufanele aye eMzwamandla High lapho efunda khona uGrade 11 kodwa ngeke kwenzeke lokhu ngoba usesibhedlela.“Angazi-nje ukuthi ingane yami isayophinde ikwazi yini ukufunda njengoba ummese usabhajwe ekhanda kuyimanje,” kusho uNksz Sibiya.UCaptain Nqobile Gwala, wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe amaphoyisa aseBhekithemba aphenya icala lokuzama ukubulala emuva kokuthi umfana (16) egwaze omunye (15) ekhanda ngabo-2.30 ezintatha zayizolo.Lesi sigameko sehle kwa-L eMlaza kanti umfana ona-16 uye waboshwa kodwa wabuye wadedelwa ngaphansi kweso labazali.Uzovela namhlanje enkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza.
title: Ummese ubhajwe ekhanda egwazwa

text: KULINDELEKE ukuthi ivele eNkantolo yeMantshi ePinetown namhlanje indoda (36) yaseThornwood, eMariannhill, esolwa ngokushaya ingoduso yayo ngentambo kagesi yayimuhluza nangezibhakela amahora amathathu yaze yafa entathakusa yangoMsombuluko.Kuthiwa uPhindile (24), (isibongo sakhe esingatholakalanga), abanezingane ezintathu nendoda, ushone ekhala endlini abehlala kuyo.Kuthiwa ushaywe kusukela ngo-1 kwaze kwashaya * -4 entathakusa. Ushone kade evakashile efike ngoLwesihlanu esuka eBhamshela.“Umsolwa ubenanencwadi yesivimbelo senkantolo ukuthi angamshayi umufi. Ubehlala ngokumhlukumeza, nezingane zimsabisa okwenyoka ngoba wake wambopha izandla wamshaya embeke nesibhamu esiphongweni. Bekuthi uma emshayile, bese efuna ukulala naye akhombise ukuthi usemxolele,” kusho umthombo.Kuthiwa indoda ike yacabanga ukubaleka umkayo eseshonile kodwa umfowabo wabiza amaphoyisa yaboshwa.“Banezingane ezintathu endala ina-9 ifunda uGrade 2, ezimbili bezihamba inkulisa. Sisathukile isimo esimbone eyisona uPhindile. Sishaqekile akulaleki ebusuku isithombe asisuki emqondweni. Ubezishaya izingane sezimsaba zicasha ngonina uma efika ebuya emsebenzini.”Ikhansela lika-ward 14 eThekwini, uMnuz Patrick Mfeka, ubabaze isihluku wathi ibuhlungu into eyenzekile ngakho amadoda awasukume avikele abesifazane nezingane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe umufi ushaywe waze wafa lapho ebehlala khona eThornwood.
title: Uzovela enkantolo okuthiwa ubulale ingoduso eyishaya

text: UKAPUTENI we-Orlando Pirates, uHappy Jele, uthembisa isiqalo esisha sezindebe kwisizini ezokwethwasa yePremier Soccer League (PSL).UJele ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi amaBhakabhaka ethula ijezi lawo elisha azobe eswenka ngalo ngesizini ezayo lapho neligi izobe ishaya ngabaxhasi abasha iDStv.Ngesikhathi abanye abalandeli beZimnyama ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bebekhala ngokuthi ijezi elisha alishayi khona, ikakhulukazi elasekuhambeni elinombala o-orange, uJele uthe yiwona impela lo mbala ogqamile obuyisa ukuzethemba kubona.Ijezi lasekhaya lona limnyama bese ligqiza ngemigqa emithathu emhlophe emahlombe ewuphawu lwe-Adidas engabasiki bale ngqephu. Elasekuhambeni linombala omnyama emahlombe. Womabili anophawu lodumo lweZimnyama lwamathambo esifubeni.IPirates sekuphele iminyaka eyisithupha yagcina ukujabulela izicoco.Lokhu kwagcina ukwenzeka benqoba iNedbank Cup ngo-2014. Ngesizini edlule igcine iqede endaweni yesithathu kwiligi nokuyifaka kwiCaf Confederation Cup.“Nathi lisimangazile ijezi eli-orange kodwa lihle lihlukile. Umbala ogqamile ukhombisa ukuzethemba. Nathi sithembisa ukubuya ngamandla silwele izicoco,” kusho uJele emcimbini obukhonjiswa ekhasini leBucs leYou Tube izolo ekuseni.“Sijabule ngendlela esiqede ngayo isizini. Manje sekumele silwele izicoco kwisizini ezokwethwasa bese senza kahle nasemidlalweni yeCaf. Ngijabule nangabadlali esibasayinisile, sihlangana kahle.”Kubadlali abasha kwiPirates kukhona nokaputeni weBafana Bafana, uThulani Hlatshwayo obehambisana noJele kwethulwa ijezi.UHlatshwayo ulincomile ijezi, wabuye waqinisekisa kubalandeli ukuthi ikhona inkanyezi ejezini elisha.“Ngokwejwayelekile inkanyezi ekhombisa ukuthi iqembu lanqoba iCaf Champions League, iba ngenhla kwebheji leqembu. UHlatshwayo uthe itholakala ezansi ngasemphethweni wejezi elisha.Abanye abadlali iPirates eqinise ngabo iqembu nguDeon Hotto,Terrance Dzvukamanja abebeyibamba noHlatshwayo kwiBidvest Wits engasekho. Kukhona noCollins Makgaka obedlala kwiBaroka FC.
title: UJele uchazekile ngejezi elisha eligqamile lamaBhakabhaka

text: ISILO uMisuzulu kaZwelithini sithembise ukuwuhlanganisa umndeni wasendlunkulu.IMbube ithe ibivele ikulindele ukuthi kuzokuba nezinselelo emva kokukhothama kweSilo uGoodwill Zwelithi kaBhekuzulu nokuguqa kwebambabukhosi, iNdlovukazi Shiyiwe Mantfombi Dlamini.Ekhuluma nesiteshi sikamabonakude esikhokhelwayo, i-eNCA, oNgangezwe uthe uzoyihlanganisa imihlambi eyalanayo.Umndeni wasendlunkulu uhlukene phakathi ngokumele angene esihlalweni sobukhosi. Kukhona abakholelwa ekutheni lesi shlalo sifanele izinyane likaMdlokombane, uMntwana uSimakade.Selokhu kwakhothama uBhejane, lo mndeni ubhekene ngeziqu zamehlo,  kukhona amalungu alo mndeni ajikijelana ngamazwi esihlangaleni.ISilo ebesiqala ukukhuluma nabezindaba selokhu saphakanyiswa, sivumile ukuthi njengamanje lo mndeni ubhekene nezinkinga, kepha konke kuzodlula.ISilo sithe kuyinto ejwayelekile ukuthi uma kuhambe inhloko yomuzi, kube khona ukudideka.“Yonke imindeni inazo lezi zinkinga. Ngiyakholwa wukuthi njengomndeni sizokwazi ukubumbana. Akekho emndenini wami engingathi kangimphiwe, ngiyawuthanda kakhulu umndeni wami.“Ngizowuhlanganisa lo mndeni, ukuze sizokhombisa isizwe sonke samaZulu ukuthi ubumbano kufanele luqale ekhaya. Vele ngisezinhlelweni zokubumba isizwe samaZulu, okuwumsebenzi engizowenza ngokubambisana nezinduna.”ISilo sithe sesikulungele ukuhlanganisa umndeni.“Ngikulungele ukuhlanganisa umndeni futhi ngiyazethemba ukuthi ngizokwazi ukukwenza lokho.”ISilo sithe sikulungele ukusebenza nawo wonke umuntu, kubalwa nalabo abaphikisana nokuqokwa kwaso, uMtwana uThembi Ndlovu nabaNtwana uMbonisi noSimakade Zulu.“Mhlawumbe ngelinye ilanga uSimakade uyobuya ekhaya, sisebenze ndawonye. Ngiyamthanda kakhulu umfowethu nodadewabo kababa wami, nobaba wami uMntwana uMbonisi. Ngibathanda ngenhliziyo yami yonke. Ngokuthemba uNkulunkulu, ngithemba ukuthi bazobuya beze ekhaya.’’Yize iSilo singathandanga ukungena sigxile ecaleni elifakwe enkantolo eliphonsela inselelo ukuqokwa kwaso, sikuvezile ukuthi sona siyazethemba kukho konke esikwenzayo.Icala eliphonsela inselelo incwadi yefa eyashiwa nguMdlokombane lafakwa ngabaNtwana, uNtandoyenkosi noNtombizosuthu, baKwaKhethomthandayo.Basola ukuthi ukusayina kukaMdlokombane kukokoteliwe encwadini yefa eyaqoka iNdlovukazi njengebambabukhosi.Izolo iSilo sithe nakuba kwasikhuba emoyeni ukukhothama kwabazali baso ngokushesha okukhulu, kodwa sesikulungele ukusebenzela isizwe.“Ngifuna ukwenza isethembiso esizweni ukuthi sengiwulungele lo msebenzi. Ngizosithatha ngisibeke kwelinye izinga isizwe. Ngicela ukuba isizwe singethembe.“Ngesikhathi ngiqokwa ukuba yiSilo, kwangicacela ukuthi sekufanele ngishintshe ukwenza. Kwangiphoqa ukuba ngikhule ngalo lelo langa.”ISilo sithe zizowushaya maduze kuso uma indlunkulu isiqedile ukuzila.ISilo sisasanda kuzishaya zaphelela, silobola isinqandamathe saso seminyaka, uNksz Ntokozo Mayisela, abanezingane ezimbili naso.ISilo sithe alikakavalwa ithuba kwabanye abafisa ukugcagcela endlunkulu njengoba sona siqhamuka esithenjini.“Kodwa okwamanje ngisajabule ngalo enginaye.”
title: ISilo sithembisa ukuhlanganisa indlunkulu

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANEU MFOWABO wowayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Thabo Mbeki uthi besingekho isidingo sokuthi kugxekwe abantu abampofu bakuleli abathinteka ezigamekweni zokushaywa kwabokufika ngoba konke lokhu kube yiphutha likahulumeni ngokungayivikeli imisebenzi yabantu abangenamakhono ethathwa abangaphandle.UMnuz Moeletsi Mbeki ukusho lokhu ekhuluma ohlelweni lwezingxoxo ekuseni izolo ku-SAFM, lapho ebephawula ngokuhlaselwa kwabokufika.“Okokuqala abantu ikakhulukazi baseZimbabwe yibona abaqashwe ezindaweni okwenziwa kuzo imisebenzi engadingi amakhono kuleli okufanele engabe ithathwa ngabantu balapha abangafundile abahluphekayo.Yilesi sizathu esidale ukuthi abantu bagcine bethukuthela belwa.“Ngaphandle kwalokho ngesikhathi uMengameli waseZimbabwe uMnuz Robert Mugabe ewisa umnotho wezwe lakhe ngo-2000 kwathi ngo-2002 uhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika waqoka ukuthi ahoxise wonke amasosha ayesemingceleni ngenhloso yokuthi abantu baseZimbabwe ababebalekela indlala ezweni labo bangene kalula kuleli.“Waphinde wabavumela ekutheni bazoncintisana nabakuleli abahluphekayo emisebenzini engadingi amakhono. Kumanje sinabantu baseZimbabwe abangaphezulu kuka-1 million kuleli.“Laba bantu bahlala ezindaweni zabantu abampofu okuyimijondolo kodwa futhi yibona abaqashwe kule misebenzi okufanele ngabe kusebenza kuyo abalapha abangenawo amakhono nokuthi bona bafundile uma beqhathaniswa nabaseNingizimu Afrika,” kusho uMbeki.Uthe yingakho kube yiphutha ukuthi kugxekwe abantu emazingeni aphansi ngodlame ngoba bekumele kugxekwe abaholi abahluleke bancama ukubhekana nalesi simo kusuka ngo-2002 njengoba abantu bakwamanye amazwe bezingenela ngendlela abafisa ngayo kuleli bathathe nemisebenzi yabampofu.Lokhu uthe umphumela wakho wudlame, abantu bakuleli iningi labo elingafundile ligcina lizithola lingasebenzi, bese libona ukuthi amathuba engabe liyawathola athathwa yilaba bantu bakoZimbabwe.Ubesho lokhu ebeka nesibonelo sokuthi eZimbabwe akulula ukuthola umuntu wakwelinye izwe ohluphekayo edayisa emigwaqweni yakhona ngoba uMugabe wakubeka kwacaca ukuthi akukho noyedwa umuntu wangaphandle okumele athathe amathuba abantu baseZimbabwe azodayisa emigwaqweni yakhona.UMbeki uthe kwaba yiphutha elikhulu ukuthi kuhoxiswe amasosha emingceleni ngoba kusho ukuthi izwe alivikelekile ngokwanele ngakho kudingeka kufakwe ingcindezi ukuthi uhulumeni alungise lesi simo.Ukusho lokhu nje eMlazi abantu bakhona abasebenza kwaJeena Super Market bashaya abantu bangaphandle becasulwa ukuthi betelekile baxoshwa kwaqashwa abokufika.
title: ‘Akusolwe uhulumeni  ngolwabokufika’

text: BANQATSHELWE ibheyili abasolwa abathathu ecaleni lokubulawa kowayeyisishoshovu se-ANCYL uMnuz Sindiso Magaqa.NgoLwesibili abasolwa oMnuz Sibonelo Myeza, Mbulelo Mpofana noMxolisi Ncalane bavele enkantolo yeMantshi eMzimkhulu. Basolwa ngecala elilodwa lokukubulala namabili okuzama ukubulala.UMagaqa wadutshulwa ngoJulayi 13 ehamba noNksz Nontsikelelo Mafa noNksz Jabulile Msiya e-Ibisi eMzimkhulu ngo-2017.IMeya yaseHarry Gwala uMnuz Mluleki Ndobe nemenenja kamasipala uMnuz Zweliphansi Skhosana nabo baboshwa besolwa ngokuthinteka kuleli cala kodwa badedelwa ngenxa yokushoda kobufakazi.UMnuz Lwazi Magaqa, okhulumela umndeni wakwaMagaqa uthe bajabule ngokunqatshelwa kwalaba basolwa ibheyili. Uthe bewumndeni bafuna kuboshwe nabanye abathintekayo ekubulaweni kukaMagaqa.Okhulumela uphiko lwezokushushisa KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Natasha Kara uthe abasolwa bazobuyela enkantolo ngo-31 Meyi.
title: Banqatshelwe ibheyili abasolwa ngokubulala uMagaqa

text: UMHOLI weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, usenxuse abantu bakulesi sifundazwe ukuthi bavote ukuze bakhiphe i-ANC emandleni.UMncwango uthe uzoletha izinguquko kulesi sifundazwe uma esengene ekuholeni isifundazwe njengoba iDA ifolosa ngalo mholi okhethweni lwangonyaka ozayo.Uthe uNdunankulu uMnuz Willies Mchunu nesigungu sakhe soNgqongqoshe bahlulekile ukushintsha impilo yabantu.“Sifuna kube nezinguquko kulesi sifundazwe. Sifuna wonke umuntu abe yingxenye yalesi sifundazwe. Nginqume ukwamukela ukuthunywa yiDA ukuthi ngiyimele kwesikaNdunankulu,” kusho uMncwango.Ukusho lokhu izolo ekhuluma esikoleni esinomlando Ohlange High, eNanda, lapho kuneliba likaDkt John Langalibalele Dube.Lesi sikole sinomlando onzulu njengoba nowayengumengameli wokuqala wentando yeningi uMnuz Nelson Mandela avotela khona okhethweni lokuqala lwentando yabantu ngo-1994.UMncwango uthulwe ngumholi waleli qembu uMnuz Mmusi Maimane.Ukhale kakhulu ngenkohlakalo edla lubi kulesi sifundazwe wathi nokukhulisa umnotho ngezinye zezinto azogxila kuzona uma ethatha izintambo.“Cishe * -40% wabantu abasha abasebenzi kulesi sifundazwe. Sifuna ukukushintsha lokhu ngoba lokhu kusho ukuthi abantu babulawa yindlala uma bebaningi kanje abangasebenzi.”Uthe ufuna wonke umuntu azizwe eyingxenye yesifundazwe noma kuthiwa umuntu uhlala kuyiphi indawo.Ukhale ngobugebengu wathi uNgqongqoshe uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda uhlulekile ukulwa nobugebengu.Uphinde wakhala ngezemfundo kanjalo nezempilo wathi oNgqongqoshe bale minyango, uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane noDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo bahlulekile.Uthe uzomemezela ithimba azosebenza nalo kanjalo nomqulu abazokhankasa ngawo bekhankasela ukhetho.UMaimane uthe uyajabula ukuthi uthula uMncwango esikoleni esasungulwa nguDube owayengumengaeli wokuqala we-ANC.Uthe unethemba lokuthi uMncwango uzoshintsha izinto njengoba lesi sifundazwe singakwazi ukwakha imisebenzi.“UMncwango unombono wokwakha imisebenzi, owokuqeda indlala nokungalingani. Ungumuntu ozalelwe KwaNongoma ngakho uqhamuka kulesi sifundazwe,” kusho uMaimane.Laba baholi baqale ngokuvakashela iliba likaDube badlulela emzini ayehlala kuwona kulesi sikole.UMncwango uzalelwe KwaMandlakazi, uyise wayengunogada unina edayisa emarenki.Ukhule elusa izinkomo. Uneziqu ezehlukene okubalwa iNational Diploma in Electrical Engineering, iBachelor of Technology in Engineering Management neMaster’s in Business Administration.
title: I-DA ifuna iphume i-ANC eKZN

text: KUBOSHWE owesilisa ngemuva kokutholakala ukuthi uhlomule ngoR87 500 ngokubhalela abantu abangu-25 izivivinyo zokuhlolelwa izincwadi zokushayela imoto.Umsolwa oneminyaka engu-39, uboshwe esikhungweni sokuhlolela ukushayela izimoto ePinetown ngoLwesithathu, wabekwa icala lokukhwabanisa.Kusolwa ukuthi ubekhokhisa umuntu ngamunye uR3 500 ngokubhala isivivinyo.UChief Inspector Lance Colborne, osebe ngumphenyi wamacala alolu hlobo iminyaka engaphezu kweshumi uthe bathole amaphepha angu-25 ezivivinyo abhalwe ngumsolwa, esebenzisa amagama ahlukene.“Sibone umazisi oyibhuku eliluhlaza, obunesithombe esinanyathiselwe phezu kwesinye salo mazisi.Besingaphezulu isithombe sikamsolwa, obekwenza kubukeke sengathi wumazisi wakhe. Kodwa bekwehluke igama inombolo kamazisi namagabelo. Sibe sesithola ukuthi kunamafayela angu-25 anesithombe sikamsolwa esebenzisa amagama ahlukene.“Ngikwazile ukusheshe ngibone umsolwa ngoba sengike ngambopha phambilini ngecala elifuze leli,” kusho uColborne.Uthe kusolakala ukuthi umsolwa ubewaka abantu ezikhungweni ezehlukene KwaZulu-Natal.Uqhube wathi kulindeleke ukuba kuboshwe abanye abantu ngalo mkhuba.“Abasolwa bafika ezikhungweni zokuhlolela izincwadi zokushayela imoto, babhalele abantu.Akupheli ngisho imizuzu emihlanu bebhala. Sizobathungatha ngenhloso yokubopha abantu abanika abasolwa omazisi babo, ukuba bababhalele,” kusho uColborne.Uthe ngeke baphumule bengakababophi ongqondongqondo balokhu kukhwabanisa.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwanele Ncalane unxuse bonke abantu abahlomule ama-learner’s licence kulo mkhonyovu ukuba bazinikele bona emaphoyiseni.“Kuseyisiqalo lesi, ithimba lethu leRoad Traffic Management Corporation (RTMC) noKlebe basebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuqeda lo mkhuba.“Kuzokwenziwa isibonelo ngozobanjwa ewaka abantu ngale ndlela,” kusho uNcalane.AbeRTMC bathe kuboshwe nabasebenzi babo abayisikhombisa eLimpopo.
title: Zimkhalele obebhalela abafuna ama-learner’s

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa uthe yinhlekelele ukuthi bangaphezulu kuka-50% abantu abasha bakuleli abangasebenzi.URamaphosa uthe kudingeka izinhlelo ezinqala zokuqinisekisa ukuthi intsha ithola imisebenzi.Uthe umnotho kudingeka wakhe amathuba emisebenzi ukuze intsha ithole imisebenzi.“Iqiniso elibuhlungu ngukuthi kudingeka sigijime ukuze sakhe imisebenzi yentsha. Kumele sisheshe ngohlelo oluvela ehhovisi likaMengameli ukuze okungenani kwakheke imisebenzi yentsha engekho ngaphansi kuka-2 million eminyakeni engu-10 ezayo,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe uhlelo lukaMengameli lwemisebenzi luzohambisana nolomkhakha ozimele kanjalo neminyango kahulumeni.Uthe bazoqhubeka nokuhlinzeka imisebenzi ngokohlelo i-Expanded Public Works Programme, ikakhulu emkhakheni wokuhlanza, ukunakekela amabhilidi, ukuvala amapayipi avuzayo, ukususa izihlahla kanjalo nokwakha imigwaqo.“Sizoba nezinhlelo lapho abantu abasha bezokwazi ukuthi bamukelwe ezindaweni lapho bedingeka khona. Imikhakha abadingeka kuyona kubalwa owezokulungisa izinto, ezolimo neminye.”Uthe bazoqinisekisa ukuthi iNational Youth Service ithatha intsha engu-50 000 njalo ngonyaka.Uqhube wathi bazoba nezinhlelo zokuthi intsha iziqalele amabhizinisi.URamaphosa uthe intsha awukwazi ukuyifunza izinto kumele kube yiyo ezozenzela futhi akukho ongakwenza ngaphandle kwayo.“Ngibe nomhlangano muva nje nabantu abasha. Bangitshelile ukuthi bafuna ukuqashwa futhi bafuna ukuba abaqashi. Intsha ithe ifuna ukuzenzela kumele thina siyeseke. Le ntsha inomdlandla idinga ukuthi igqugquzelwe,” kusho uRamaphosa.
title: ‘Sizosungula imisebenzi engu-2million’

text: ILINDELWE ngabomvu imidlalo yamaqoqo ye-UEFA Champions League njengoba amanye amaqembu athathwa njengamakhulu ezogijimisana namhlanje, ukuze aziphendlele indlela yokunqoba lesi sicoco esikhulukazi e-Europe. Phakathi kwamaqembu abalwa njengezimfivilithi kukhona iReal Madrid eqophe umlando ithatha lesi sicoco amahlandla amathathu elandelana kulama sizini adlule; (2015/16) (2016/17) (2017/18). Leli qembu lithenge u-Eden Hazard okulindeleke ukuthi abambe iqhaza elikhulu kuleli qembu. ILiverpool evikela lendebe, ivule ngenduku ishaywa yiNapoli eSan Paolo Stadium izolo ebusuku. Womabili lamaqembu abalwa njengezimfivilithi njengoba ethenge abadlali abasha aphinde ayiqala kahle isizini. ILiverpool ishaye iSpurs ngo 2-0 kowamanqamu ngesizini ephelile kwazise yaikade ishaywe iReal Madrid kowamanqamu ngaphambi kwesizini edlule.  IJuventus izokwethembela kwisilomo somgadli uRonaldo ukuthi sibahambise ibanga elide kulomncintiswano kwazise benze ushintsho olukhulu ethimbeni labaqeqeshi ngenhloso yokudlala ibhola elihle elizobawinisa lendebe baphinde bathenga nabadlali abasha. IJuventus ilande uMaurizio Sarro odume ngokudlalisa ibhola elinenkosi ophakathi, leli elifunwa abalandeli beJuventus njengoba behhewule uMassimiliano Allegri ngokudlala ibhola elimile ngesizini ephelile. IBarcelona, eqale ngegiya eliphansi idlala ngokulingana izolo ibhekene neBorussia Dortmund, izoqhuba umkhankaso wayo wokufuna lesicoco njengoba yagcina ukusinqoba ngo-2015. IManchester City, engenye yamaqembu asekubeke obala ukuthi afuna lesi sicoco izotholana neShakthar Donetsk Ngolwesithathu ebusuku ekuhambeni. ICity eholwa uPep Guardiola osenqobe lesi sicoco kabili esaqeqesha iBarcelona, ithenge uRodri waseSpain noJoao Cancelo kwi-Juventus njengoba ifuna ukunqoba lendebe okokuqala emlandweni weqembu kwazise ikhishwe yiSpurs ngesizini edlule. Phakathi kwamaqembu athathwa njengalawo angathusa abaningi kukhona i-Inter Milan eqeqeshwa u-Antonio Conte ebhekwe ngabomvu kwazise iyiqale isizini iqhwakela esicongweni kwiSerie A, iBayern Munich eyagcina ukunqoba lesi sicoco ngo-2013 kanye ne-Athletico Madrid esihlulwe kabili kweyamanqamu (2013/14 : 2015/16). I-Inter ngoLwesithathu iyiqale kabi iChampions League idlala ngokulingana neqembu obekulindeleke ukuthi ilishaye iSlavia Praha. IPSG ibukeka ingazama kulesizini njengoba izobhekana namaqembu angathusi kakhulu kweyamaqoqo okukhona kuwo iGalatasaray, iClub Brugge neReal Madrid. IBrugge kaPercy Tau edlule kunzima kweyokuhlungela amaqoqo, izotholana neGalatasaray namhlanje ebusuku eJan Breydelstadion. Isizini ephelile yeChampions League ikhombisile ukuthi akumele athathwe kancane amaqembu njengoba i-Ajax Amsterdam, Tottenham Hotspurs neFC Porto benze ezibukwayo begudluza amaqembu amakhulu. I-Ajax idayise izethenjwa ezimbili uFrenkie De Jong noDe Ligt, okuzoyenza ihluke eqenjini langesizini edlule elikhishwe kabuhlungu yiTottenham kumasemi-finals. Nokho leli qembu libukeka lisaqinile njengoba livule i-UCL ngewini ka 3-0 libhekene neLille OSC yaseFrance
title: Usuqalile umshikashika weChampions League

text: EZINGANENI zakuleli ezizalwe nyakenye u-62% wazo azinabo oyise. Lokhu kuvezwe yimininingwane yoMnyango wezaseKhaya kuleli.Izibalo ezishicilelwe ngabakwaStats SA ngoMsombuluko ziveza ukuthi ezinganeni ezingu-10 ezizelwe eNingizimu Afrika, eziyisithupha zazo azinabo oyise. Lolu lwazi lushicilelwe emqingweni wezingane ezizalwe ngo-2017.Kuthiwa amafomu agcwaliswa uma kuzelwe ingane, anesikhala esifakwa imininingwane kayise wengane kodwa kwamaningi akubhaliwe lutho kulesi sikhala.Ngokwalezi zibalo zingu-989 313 izingane ezizalwe nyakenye imininingwane yazo ebhalisiwe kulo mnyango, u-62% wazo awunabo oyise.Lezi zibalo zikhombisa ukuthi zingaki izingane eziphilayo ezizalwe kuleli, ukuthi mingaki iminyaka yonina, ukuthi bazibhalisa nini eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya nokuthi ziqanjwa maphi amagama.Ngokwalo mbiko izingane eziningi ziqanjwe ngo-Enzokuhle. Leli gama alikhethi, lisetshenziswa kubafana nasemantombazaneni, kodwa e-Eastern Cape naKwaZulu-Natal ngabafana abaningi abaqanjwe ngalo. Amanye ahamba phambili uLethabo noMelokuhle. Ngokwalo mbiko lawa magama kujwayele ukuthi kube ngawokuqala ezinganeni zabafana ezinamagama amabili, awesibili nawo athandwa kakhulu uJunior, kulandele uBlessing noGift.Ezinganeni zamantombazane amagama ahamba phambili Enzokuhle, Melokuhle, no-Amahle, awesibili okuqanjwe kakhulu ngawo amantombazane uPrecious, uPrincess no-Angel.Emagameni amahlanu ahamba phambili okuqanjwe ngawo abafana namantombazane ngu-Enzokuhle noMelokuhle.UNksz Gwen Lehloenya weStats SA esitatimendeni, uthe lezi zibalo zikhombisa ukuthi senyuke ngo-2.1% isibalo sezingane ezizelwe uma kuqhathaniswa nezizalwe ngo-2016.Uqhube wathi isifundazwe esinezingane eziningi yiGauteng (239 457), ilandelwe yiKwaZulu-Natal (197 913).Izingane eziningi ngezakwaDlamini (6 243), zilandelwe ngezakwaNkosi (5 735) noNdlovu (5 573. Izingane zakwaNkosi ezaseGauteng naseMpumalanga, KwaZulu-Natal izingane eziningi ngezaKwaDlamini nezakwaNdlovu.
title: Iningi lezingane ezizalwe nyakenye kazinabo oyise - umbiko

text: BAKHONJWE indlela abasebenzi abayisithupha bakaMasipala Ugu abalahlwe amacala okukhona kuwo awokulova emsebenzini nokusebenzisa izimoto zomkhandlu budedengu.Abasebenzi abebesophikweni lwamanzi, bebemisiwe emsebenzini ngesikhathi kuphenywa ngabo emkhandlwini.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba uMnuz France Zama, okhulumela umkhandlu, uthe kwabaxoshiwe bekukhona nabebemele abasebenzi abangamalungu enyunyana iSamwu.“Lubalahlile uphenyo lwangaphakathi lokuqondiswa ubugwegwe abasebenzi abayisithupha. Umasipala ube usuthatha isinqumo sokubaxosha ngokushesha,” kusho uZama.Uthe umasipala uzoqhubeka nokugcina umthetho nendlela efanele yokusebenza ngenhloso yokudala ukuthula emkhandlwini.USihlalo weSamwu, uMnuz Mthandeni Ngcobo, uthe bazosiphonsela inselelo isinqumo sokuxoshwa kwabasebenzi.Uthe baxoshwe ngaphandle kokubanika amaphepha abazisa ngalokhu.“Sizosebenzisa uhlaka olwasungulwa yihhovisi likandunankulu ukuba lubheke izinkinga zomkhandlu ukuphikisana nesinqumo somkhandlu. Sizophinde siye kwiBargaining Council sisiphonsele inselelo isinqumo,” kusho uNgcobo.Uthe abaxoshiwe bebesekhaleni lempi yenkohlakalo beneka iziphathimandla, namakhansela okusolakala ukuthi basebenzisana nezinkampani ezizimele ukudla imali yomkhandlu.“Kwamina ngamiswa umasipala emsebenzini ngoJanuwari kuze kube yimanje ngihlezi ekhaya ngoba kwathiwa ngaphazamisa isigcawu esasiqondisa ubugwegwe umsebenzi engangimumele. Abasebenzi bayizisulu ngenxa yokuthi umbiko woMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu uveze inkohlakalo eyenzeka kulo masipala,” kusho uNgcobo.Umnyango usanda kukhipha umbiko oveza isithombe esibi ngomkhandlu usola ukuthi kunezikhulu ezisolwa enkohlakalweni okumele zithathelwe izinyathelo. Kwavela nokuthi kunabasebenzi abangu-300 abaholayo okungafanele ngabe basebenzela umkhandlu.Ngasekuqaleni konyaka umasipala wakhomba indlela inqwaba yabasebenzi ababengenele isiteleka esinodlame kwacekelwa phansi nengqalasizinda yamanzi emadepho.Abasebenzi babefuna kubuyiselwe emsebenzini abasebenzi ababamele abamiswa umkhandlu ngezinsolo zokuphazamisa uhlelo lokuqondiswa ubugwegwe kwabasebenzi ngoDisemba.Izinkinga zalo mkhandlu ziholele nasekulandweni kukamakadebona wemenenja kamasipala uMnuz Sbu Sithole ukuba azoba umlawuli, alethe uzinzo emkhunjini owawubonakala ucwila.USithole wafika ngesikhathi imenenja kamasipala uMnuz Dhanpalan Naidoo isanda kuhlaba ikhefu lokugula emsebenzini. ISamwu yayisola uNaidoo ngokuba sekhaleni lenkohlakalo ezixebulela umkhoma emalini yomkhandlu esebenzisana nezinkampani ezihambisela imiphakathi amanzi ngamaloli.
title: Umasipala uxoshe abasebenzi abanamacala

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa namhlanje kusihlwa uzokhuluma nesizwe ngezinye izinhlelo zokutakula umnotho ngokunjalo nokulekelela abantu abahlwempu kulesi sikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe njengendlela yokulwa nokusabalala kweCovid-19. URamaphosa uzokhuluma nesizwe ngemuva kwemihlangano neKhabhinethi, umkhandlu obhekelele ukulwa neCovid-19, umkhandlu kamengameli nomkhandlu wezokuthuthukiswa komnotho nezabasebenzi kuleli. Ngokuhamba kosuku ihhovisi likamengameli lizomemezela isikhathi uRamaphosa azokhuluma ngaso nabantu bakuleli.President Ramaphosa will address the nation this evening – Tuesday, 21 April 2020 – on additional economic and social relief measures that form part of the national response to the COVID-19 pandemic. https://t.co/BlJvxpFClyAbaningi sebeyilindele ngabomvu inkulumo kaRamaphosa njengoba abantu befuna ukwazi ukuthi kusazoqhubeka isikhathi esingakanani ukuvalwa kwezwe nokuthi kungase kuphele nini. Ngemuva kokwelula isikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe ngamasonto amabili kuze kuphele inyanga ka-Ephreli, oNgqongqoshe bamemezela ukuthanjiswa kweminye imithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe. Phakathi kwemithetho eyathanjiswa, kwamenyezelwa ukuthi izimayini zizovulwa zenze u-50% womkhiqizo ojwayelekile. Kwavulwa izindawo zokulungisa izinto zobuchwepheshe, nabalungisa izinto ezithinta izimoto bavunyelwa ukuvula ukuze balekelele abanezinkinga zezimoto kodwa abenza imisebenzi ehlonzwe njengebalulekile kulesi sikhathi sikathaqa.Izolo isibalo sabantu abahaqwe yiCovid-19 kuleli sinyukele ku-3 300 kanti leli gciwane selidlule nabantu abawu-58 eNingizimu Afrika. Kunokwesabela ukuthi iningi labantu bakuleli lizobulawa yindlala ngaphambi kwegciwane njengoba abaningi bengasebenzi. Ngaphandle kokutakula amabhizinisi, kulindeleke ukuthi uMengameli aveze izinhlelo zikahulumleni zokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abahlwempu kuleli bayalekelelwa kulesi sikhathi.
title: URamaphosa uzokhuluma nesizwe ngezinye izinhlelo zokutakula umnotho nabahlwempu

text: Ngiyazi omunye umuntu angacabanga ukuthi nginomhawu kanti akunjalo. Kunezigameko ezingishiya nginemibuzo ngamaBrazilians.Esokuqala esakamuva nje emdlalweni neLamontville Golden Arrows lapho kwavele kwasuka umdlali waBafana Besthende waphasela abadlali beSundowns ibhola engekho ngaphansi kwengcindezi.Isigameko esagqama kakhulu esangomzuzu ka-86 lapho lo mdlali abamba khona ibhola eyedwa walikhahlelela ngasemapalini angakubo kodwa ngenhlanhla i-Arrows yawunqanda umonakalo.Lapho zazibambene, ingekho evuma ukugoba uphondo. Kuyiqiniso elingephikwe ukuthi iSundowns yayiwadinga kakhulu amaphuzu aphelele, kwazise ukunqoba umdlalo kwakuzoyenza isale ngamaphuzu amathathu kuphela kwiKaizer Chiefs ezihola phambili ngamaphuzu esicongweni se-log ye-Absa Premiership.Umdlali engikhuluma ngaye ushayelele isipikili sokugcina ebhokisini le-Arrows umdlalo ususemseni kanondweba, ngesikhathi ebamba ibhola maphakathi nenkundla waliphasela umgadli weSundowns ngokukhulu ukuzimisela.Lokho kwaholela ekutheni iSundowns ifake igoli elayifaka yagamanxa embangweni wesicoco. Amaphutha enziwa wumdlali waBafana Besthende abonakala eyinhloso. Lezi zigameko zashiya imibuzo yokuthi ngabe alikho yini intshontsho ayethenjiswe lona umdlali ukuze amaBrazilians awathole ephelele amaphuzu.Ngeke ngithuke uma iSundowns ingagcina ibe ngompetha nakulo nyaka, izobe ingaqali ukunqoba indebe ngendlela eshayisa amakhala. Ubani ongakhohlwa yisigameko sangonyaka ofile lapho yalahlwa yicala lokudlalisa umdlali ongafanele, nokwakuchaza ukuthi amaphuzu amathathu eyayiwathole kulowo mdlalo kumele iphucwe bese enikezwa iqembu ababedlala nalo ngelanga lesigameko. Kwashiya imibuzo eminingi ukuthi lithi icala liyilahlile iSundowns kodwa ingaphucwa amaphuzu. Ukuba ubulungiswa benzeka, iSundowns yayizolala isibili emuva kwe-Orlando Pirates, okwakuzoyishiya isele ngephuzu elilodwa kumaBhakabhaka.Leli qembu eliholwa yinjinga uPatrice Motsepe futhi eselike lanqoba umqhudelwano omkhulu ezwenikazi i-Afrika, iCAF Champions League namanje abaningi basashaya amakhala ngendlela elawunqoba ngayo umqhudelwano njengoba labuyiselwa kuwona likade selihluleke lancama ukudlulela phambili.Kubukeka zanda izinsolo zokuthi leli qembu impumelelo yalo liyayithenga kwesinye isikhathi. Sengiphetha ngithanda ukuthi noma iSundowns ingazibiza ngompetha kodwa iqiniso lithi inkanyezi yayithola ngomgunyathi, iligi yango- 2018/19 kwakumele iye kwiPirates kodwa leli qembu lesigwili layithatha ngomgunyathi, nakhu namanje bazama ukuhlwitha iChiefs isicoco ekubeni isisebenzele kanzima.Ngicabanga ukuthi sekuyisikhathi sokuthi uDkt Irvin Khoza noKaizer Motaung nabanye abaphathi bamaqembu bayibhekisise indaba yeSundowns, uma kucaca ukuthi ziyiqiniso zonke izinsolo ehlale isolwa ngazo, ijeziswe noma idingiswe kwiPSL. ISundowns izosibulalela ibhola lethu ngezenzo zayo.Nathi CeleeMzinto
title: Ngishaya amakhala ngempumelelo yeSundowns

text: SIFINYELELE ku-30.1% isibalo sabangasebenzi ezinyangeni ezintathu zokuqala kwalo nyaka ngokweStatistics South Africa.Umbiko udedelwe izolo kanti lokhu kusho ukuthi abangasebenzi bangu-7.1 million. Isibalo sinyuke ngabantu abangu-344 000. Umkhakha wezolimo wehlelwe yisibalo semisebenzi ngabantu abangu-21 000. Kwenzeka lokhu nje, uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali uMnuz Tito Mboweni kulindeleke ukuthi athule isabelomali esibuyekeziwe namhlanje ePhalamende kodwa osomnotho bathe kuzoba isabelo esingezi nezindaba ezinhle.Usomnotho we-Efficient Group uMnuz Dawie Roodt, uthe lesi sabelo asizi nezindaba ezinhle. Uthe izwe linesikweletu esikhulu.UMnuz Mervyn Abrahams wePietermaritzburg Economic Justice and Dignity Group’s, uthe kuzoba isabelomali esinzima.UNobhala weCosatuKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Edwin Mkhize, uthe bafuna izinhlelo ezicacile kuMboweni ngezinkinga zezwe.
title: Bangu-7.1 million abangasebenzi

text: AKEKHO umfundi okufanele asalele emuva ezifundweni zakhe ngenxa yeCoronavirus, usho kanje uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu.UMshengu uthe abazali kufanele benze isiqiniseko sokuthi abafundi benza umsebenzi wabo wesikole ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lweVodacom e-schools, KZN Funda nezinhlelo zoMnyango wezeMfundo.“Sinezinhlelo zokufundisa abafundi emsakazweni. Esikucela kakhulu wukuthi abazali basilekelele. Benze isiqiniseko sokuthi izingane zisemakhaya ngesikhathi sezifundo ezisakazwa emisakazweni ehlukene. Sikhipha isitatimende njalo ngosuku ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukwazisa abantu ukuthi namhlanje kufundwa ziphi izifundo,” kusho uMshengu.Uthe kumahhala ukungena kwiVodacom e-schools okusho ukuthi abafundi bathola lonke ulwazi abaludingayo ngaphandle kokumosheka kwe-data yabo noma eyabazali uma bengenawo amaselula.“Zonke izifundo zethu kusukela kwezakwaGrade R kuya kwaGrade 12 sizifakile kwiKZN Funda portal. Siyacela abazali basilekelele noma ngabe abafundi bakwaGrade 12 bayafunda noma besemaholidini. Namanje sithi bonke abafundi akufanele basalele ezifundweni zabo abasebenzise ama-app ethu ukuqhuba izifundo zabo. Esikucela kakhulu wukuthi abazali basilekelele kakhulu bafundise izingane njengoba zisemakhaya zonke izifundo zikhona kuma-portal ethu,” kusho uMshengu.
title: UMshengu ucela abazali bafundise izingane ukuze zingasali ezifundweni

text: SIBUSISO MDLALOSEKULINDELEKE buqhubeke ubutha phakathi kwe-Orlando Pirates neSuperSport United  njengoba “izintwana” zalawa maqembu zidudulana koweDStv Diski Challenge  eGiant Stadium, eSoshanguve, ePitoli namuhla.Isizini ka-2020/2021 yeDStv Diski Challenge, ebikade yaziwa ngeMultiChoice Diski Challenge (MDC), iyaqala namuhla eGiant Stadium, ePitoli. Le midlalo yokuvula isizini izodlalwa enkundleni eyodwa kusukela namuhla kuze kube kusasa.IChippa United neBlack Leopards bazobhula amazolo ngo-11 ekuseni, bese kulandela owezinkani zababili phakathi kweSuperSport nePirates ngo-1.00.Kula masizini edlule iSupersport ibilokhu iyishobolo kwiPirates. Wubani ongekhumbule Amatsatsantsa exebula iPirates ngo 6-1 ngesizini yeDStv Premiership (Absa Premiership)  ka-2016/2017 okwaholela ekutheni owayengumqeqeshi weZimnyama, uMuhsin Ertugral asule isigubhukane? Ngaphandle kwalokho leli qembu lasePitoli seliyiphuze inyongo iPirates emqhudelwaneni weNedbank Cup, njengoba seliyigingqe phansi amahlandla amabili kowamanqamu alo mqhudelwano.Nokho, kule sizini esanda kuqala yeDStv  eZimnyama zithele muva njengembumba ngoNovemba 21 ziguqisa ngo 2-1 Amatsatsantsa e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto.Kulo mdlalo kubhekwe ngabomvu ukuthi ngabe “izintwana” zeSuperSport zizokwazi yini ukuphindiselela “obhuti” bazo, njengoba ngakolunye uhlangothi kuzobe kubhekwe ukuthi ezePirates zona zizokwazi yini ukuqhubeka lapho kugcine khona “obhuti” abadala ngokuphinde zithele esinye isibhaxu.Isiyonke imidlalo yeDStv Diski Challenge imi kanje:Namuhla:Supersport United vs Orlando Pirates (Giant Stadium, 1pm)Kusasa:Tshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila vs Maritzburg United (Giant Stadium, 11am); Mamelodi Sundowns vs Kaizer Chiefs (Giant Stadium, 1pm)
title: Kubhekwe lukhulu koweSupersport nePirates

text: BAFICWE uthaqa sebevele bezilungiselele abafundi nothisha basesifundeni iMajuba, abaqale isiteshi se-internet esesitakula nabanye njengoba kuvalwe izikole.Isiteshi siqalwe ngothisha basePhendukani Full Service High eNewcastle ngoJanuwari, ngenhloso yokusiza abafundi ezifundweni ezahlukene.Uthishanhloko uMnuz Bheki Kubheka, uthe uke waba nguNobhala weNewcastle Community Radio phambilini. Uthe isiteshi esibizwa ngeSchool FM, basivule ngoJanuwari kodwa baqala ukusebenza kahle ngoFebhuwari.“Besifuna ukusiza izikole ezingaphansi kwesifunda ukuze silekelelane ezintweni ezahlukene, sisekane. Sisebenza nabafundi bethu bamanje, nabanye asebeqedile esikoleni. Sinothisha bezikole ezahlukene abasiza ukufundisa,” kuchaza uKubheka.Uveze ukuthi baqala ukufundisa ngo-10 ekuseni kuze kushaye u-6 ntambama. Ezinye izifundo bayaziqopha ukuze babuye baziphinde uma kukhona abafundi abaphutheliwe. UKubheka uthe bafundisa izifundo eziyisihlanu ngosuku, isifundo ngasinye sithatha ihora nemizuzu engu-15. Izifundo okugxilwe kuzo ngezamabanga aphezulu.“Sisungule i-App ukuze abafundi bakwazi nokubuza ngeWhatsApp nange-email uma kukhona abangakuzwanga kahle. Sesekwa kakhulu ngisho abazali bayancoma. Sesinabafundi abangaphandle kwesifunda iMajuba, abancoma lolu hlelo nabo olubasizayo,” kuchaza uKubheka.Njengoba kunenkinga yokumba eqolo kwe-data, uthe nakubona ikhona leyo nselelo. Uthe sebekhulume noMnyango wezeMfundo esifundazweni ukuze bazame uhlelo lokulekelelwa. Uthe bafuna ukuthi umnyango ubaxhumanise nezinkampani zamaselula ukuze bangasebenzisi i-data ukungena kulo msakazo. Ngaphandle kokufundisa kulo msakazo kubuye kudlalwe umculo wamakhwaya wezikole zaseMajuba. Kuphinde kudlalwe imiyalezo yezempilo ukuxwayisa ngeCoronavirus edlangile.UKubheka uthe banethimba lezobuchwepheshe okuyilona elibalekelelayo okubalwa nabanye abebesebenza esiteshini somsakazo eNewcastle.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo esifundazweni, uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, uthe bayakuncoma okwenziwa yilo msakazo.Uthe uzwile ukuthi abaphathi bawo banesifiso sokuthi umnyango ubasize ukubaxhumanisa nezinkampani zamaselula kodwa akukho okusavunyelwene ngakho.
title: Kuhlomule abaningi ngesiteshi sothisha

text: USENKINGENI owesifazane waseManzimtoti onezincwadi zomshado ezikhomba ukuthi ushade namadoda amabili.UNkk Ernestina Nkabinde owumfelokazi ka-Edward Muziwenkosi Masinga owashona engozini yemoto ngo-1990, usola uMnyango wezaseKhaya ngokuthi ngemuva kokushona komyeni wakhe wanikeza enye indoda enegama, isibongo nosuku lokuzalwa okufanayo nokomyeni wakhe inombolo kamazisi yomyeni wakhe, maqede ‘wamshadisa’ nayo le ndoda, ekubeni yena wabuye washada noMnuz Duncan Themba Nkabinde ngo-1997.Le nkilayitheka uthe uyizwe ngo-2015 ngesikhathi eshayelwa ucingo yibhange lithi uMasinga uyalikweleta njengoba beshade umshado ohlanganisa amafa kanti kumele azokhokha, kungenjalo ibhange lizodla imoto yakhe. “Ngabatshela ukuthi uMasinga washona. Bathi ngokolwazi abanalo uyaphila baze bangikhombisa umazisi afaka ngawo isicelo sokuboleka imali. Kulapho ngabona khona isithombe esifakwe kulo mazisi ngabona ukuthi ngesomunye umuntu.”Uthe waya eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya eSiphingo bamkhomba enhlokohhovisi eMgungundlovu. Kwathiwa akazibhekele ifayela lomyeni wakhe ngoba ngaleso sikhathi izitifiketi zazingakenziwa ngekhompyutha. Walithola ifayela, wafaka isikhalo ecela ukuthi lo mnyango ‘umbulale’ umyeni okuvela ukuthi usadla anhlamvana. “Akekho owake wangishayela ucingo engazisa ukuthi kwenzekani. Kwathuleka ngaze ngabuyela emahhovisi ngonyaka olandelayo. Ngatshelwa ukuthi ngeke bakwazi ukumesula umyeni ngoba inombolo yakhe isetshenziswa ngomunye umuntu ophilayo ohlala eGoli. Uma ngibuza ukuthi kwenziwa yini ukuthi lo Masinga ophilayo naye ashade nami, uma kungabantu abehlukene, abakwazanga ukungiphendula. Ngabuza ukuthi kuzokwenzekani uma kushona oyedwa wethu nakhona ayiphumanga impendulo.”Uthe wanikwa inombolo yasePitoli kwathiwa akashayele khona ucingo abuze ukuthi kwenzekani ngalolu daba. Uma eshaya ucingo bathi akukho abakwenzayo akabuyele lapho afaka khona isikhalo, baqale phansi. Akuchazwa ukuthi yini eyinkinga.“Ehhovisi eliseMgungundlovu nabo bangikhomba ePitoli, angisazi ukuthi kumele ngenze njani. Kwenziwa yini umnyango ungibhalise imishado emibili kodwa wehluleke ukulungisa iphutha? Kanti lo mazisi wadayiswa yini?”Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, uMasinga ophilayo uhlala eKlerksdorp, wafaka isicelo sikamazisi ngo-1992. Akucaci ukuthi washada nini noNkk Nkabinde okubuye kuvele ukuthi ushade noNkabinde ngo-1997.UMnuz Thabo Mokgola wehhovisi lomnyango lezokuxhumana kuzwelonke uthe lolu daba uludlulisela kwimenenja yalo mnyango eKZN uMnuz Cyril Mncwabe ukuthi aluphenye.
title: 'Ushade' namadoda amabili

text: AMACIKO aKwaZulu-Natal asethubeni lokuhlomula ngoR100 000 emiklomelweni emisha ethulwe izolo eThekwini, ebizwa ngokuthi, iKwaZulu-Natal Entertainment Awards (KZNEA).Ama-KZNEA ahlelwa yinkampani, iSongs on the Charts ethulwe kwabezindaba eWarehouse.USifiso Kalinjani obemele inkampani, udalule ukuthi kuyona yonke iminxa abanqobayo bazothola uR100 000 kuthi ozodla umklomelo omkhulu weKZN Darling, azuze uR500 000.Phakathi kweminxa ekhona kubalwa eyomsakazi wesifazane nowesilisa abavelele, umlingisi ovelele, usomahlaya, inkampani evelele neminye.Ikhona neyokuhlonipha nokugqamisa isifundazwe ngoba imiklomelo isungulelwe amaciko aKwaZulu-Natal kuphela.“I-KZN inothe ngethalente kodwa angiwukhumbuli umculo lapho kuhlonishwa abantu bethu bodwa. Kumele sibahloniphe ngaphambi kokuthi babajabulele kwezinye izindawo ngoba bagqamisa isifundazwe,” kusho uKalinjani.Esithangamini nabezindaba uhlelo beluphethwe nguSomizi Mhlongo. Bekukhona iLadysmith Black Mambazo, kwacula uZandie Khumalo noLindani Gumede.UDJ Black Coffee, DJ Tira noSjava batuse ukuba khona kwale miklomelo bathi bayayeseka.UBlack Coffee uthe esinye sezizathu esenza wathuthela eGoli yingoba amathuba ayengekho kuleli dolobha ngakho unethemba lokuthi ukuba khona kwale miklomelo kuzovulela nabanye amathuba.Ikhansela loMkhandlu weTheku uThanduxolo Sabelo, lithe kuliphatha kabi ukungaliboni igama lalo masipala kubaxhasi.“Akuzwakali kahle ukuthi kungani umasipala ungayiseki imiklomelo. Ngiyazi ukuthi uBlack Coffe noSomgaga abaseThekwini. Laba ngabantu abadume umhlaba wonke. Ngizoya esigungwini esilawula umkhandlu senze isiqiniseko sokuthi siyasibheka isicelo soxhaso walo mcimbi.Ngeke ungitshele ukuthi ungathi ufuna ukuhlonipha abantu abakhulu njengeMambazo kodwa ungaxhasi.”AmaKZNEA kulindeleke ukuthi abe seDurban ICC ngoDisemba 15.Imininingwane yokungenela neminye izodalulwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
title: Kuzohlonishwa amaciko aKwaZulu-Natal

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa usememezele ukuthi sebeziqalile izingxoxo zokuthi kusukela ngenyanga ezayo izwe lingene esigabeni sesithathu sikathaqa, kodwa akuzona zonke izindawo ezizongena kulesi sigaba. Ekhuluma nesizwe ngoLwesithathu ebusuku uRamaphosa uthe bazokwenza isimemezelo ngesigaba sesithathu sikathaqa uma sebephothule izingxoxo zabo nezinhlaka ezithintekayo. Ngesikhathi ememezela ukuvulwa kwezwe ngokwezigaba ngenyanga edlule uRamaphosa waveza ukuthi izindawo ezinesibalo esiphezulu sabahaqekile zizoqashwa ngelokhozi. "Kusukela ngoMeyi 1 sisuke esigabeni sesihlanu sokuvalwa kwezwe sehlela esigabeni sesine esihambisane nokuxegiswa kwemithetho. Sesikulungele futhi ukwehlela kwesinye isigaba. Ngiyafisa kodwa ukugcizelela ukuthi asikwazi ukumisa uthaqa ngokushesha," kusho uRamaphosa ngaphambi kokumezela ukuthi izwe selizongena esigabeni sesithathu. UMengameli uthe sebebalelwa ku-12 074 abantu osekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi baneCovid-19 kuleli. IWestern Cape, iGauteng, iKwaZulu-Natal ne-Eastern Cape yizifundazwe ezisengcupheni yokuhlala ngaphansi kwesigaba sesine sokuvalwa kwezwe. Bangaphezulu kuka-50% abantu abahaqekile abakhonjwa esifundazweni iWestern Cape kuleli. %%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/Ramaphosa?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#Ramaphosa: The transition to the next phase of the coronavirus response will in many ways be more difficult than the present one.The risk of infection outbreaks will increase as more people return to work.— Presidency | South Africa 🇿🇦 (@PresidencyZA)%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/Ramaphosa?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#Ramaphosa: It is our actions now that will determine whether the great sacrifices that people have made over these last two months will ultimately save the lives of thousands of South Africans & spare our country from the huge devastation that this pandemic can cause.— Presidency | South Africa 🇿🇦 (@PresidencyZA)%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/Ramaphosa?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#Ramaphosa: I have been encouraged that so many people are wearing face masks in public since the start of Alert Level 4.We will need to re-organise workplaces, schools, universities, colleges and other public places to limit transmission.— Presidency | South Africa 🇿🇦 (@PresidencyZA)%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/Ramaphosa?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#Ramaphosa: As restrictions are eased, we will need to observe social distancing even more carefully, wear face masks whenever we leave home, wash hands regularly with soap and water or sanitiser, and avoid contact with other people.— Presidency | South Africa 🇿🇦 (@PresidencyZA)URamaphosa uthe ongoti bezempilo bathi sizonyuka isibalo sabathelelekayo kuleli njengoba kuxegiswa imithetho kathaqa. "Yingakho abantu bakuleli sekumele baqinisekise kakhulu kunakuqala ukuthi bayayilandela imigomo ebekiwe njengokuhlala ngokuqhelelana, ukugqoka isifonyo kante nokugeza izandla ngenspho namanzi noma ngesibulali magciwane."UMengameli uphinde wamemezela ukuthi sebengaphezulu kuka-3 million abantu asebebhalisele uxhaso lukahuluma lukaR350 lwabantu abangasebenzi kuleli.Ngokuhamba kwesonto kulindeleke ukuthi oNgqongqoshe bachaze kabanzi ngemithetho exegisiwe ngaphansi kwesigaba sesithathu sokuvalwa kwezwe.
title: 'Akuzona zonke izindawo ezizongena esigabeni sesithathu' - Ramaphosa

text: UXOSHWE wukuhola amakinati emaqenjini aKwaZulu-Natal umdlali wasesiswini uJabulani Shongwe obekade ebolekiswe yiBidvest Wits kwiLamontville Golden Arrows ngesizini ka-2017/2018.UShongwe, okhulele kwiMamelodi Sundowns, uthole ikhaya elisha kwiChippa United kaSiviwe Mpengesi. Uthole ithuba lobuyisa ibhola aziwa ngalo ngesizini edlule ngesikhathi edlala kwi-Arrows ngaphansi komqeqeshi uClinton Larsen.UShongwe ubekade esizwa ngendaba isikimu kuGavin Hunt kwiWits. Inkontileka yakhe neZitshudeni iphele ekupheleni kukaJuni nobekusho ukuthi usengajoyina noma yiliphi iqembu alithandayo.Ngesikhathi kulindeleke ukuthi asayine inkontileka naBafana Bes’thende, kuvele ukuthi uLarsen ngeke amgcine kuleli qembu. Emuva kwalokho uShongwe uzame inhlanhla kwiMaritzburg United kodwa nakhona bamchitha.“Kwi-Arrows asizange sivumelane ngendaba yemali. Emuva kwalokho ngifoneliwe ukuthi ngiye kwiMaritzburg, nakhona kwaba ngokufanayo.Ngifike kwiChippa ngoba ngifonelwe ngumqeqeshi uDance (Dan Malesela) wathi uyangidinga lapha. Kade kuyisinqumo esilula ngoba ngasebenza naye enkulisa. Nami ngifuna ukubuyela ezingeni lami ngoba kade ngishone phansi. Bengidinga umuntu ongethembayo futhi okholelwayo kimina,”kusho uMalesela.“KwiMaritzurg ngicabanga ukuthi kade sebevele belihlanganisle iqembu ngakho bebengeke bakhokhele abadlali abaningi. Yikho kubenzima. Kodwa ngiyajabula ukuthi ngiyile khona. Kodwa bekufanele ngithathe isinqumo sokuthi ngiyahlala khona, ngihole imali encane noma ngiyahamba. Kodwa kube yisinqumo esiwubuhlakani ukuza lapha kwiChippa.”IChippa isayinise inqwaba yabadlali, yabuyisa noMalesela obeyidlalisa ibhola elithakaselwa yinqwaba yabalandeli eMzansi. Ilahlekelwe ngabadlali abamqoka okunguPaseka Mako, Linda Mntambo no-Abel Mabaso abajoyine i-Orlando Pirates.Umgadli uMxolisi Macuphu uthole ikhaya elisha kwiWits. UShongwe unikezwe ijezi unombolo 10 kwiChilli Boys ebelikade ligqokwa ngukaputeni * -Andile Mbenyane ongumdlali osehlale isikhathi eside kunabo bonke kuleli qembu.UMbenyane ubekhona kwiChippa idla umhlanganiso emidlalweni yokuhlunga amaqembu ye-ABC Motsepe League ngo-2011 eKapa, yangena kwiNational First Division (NFD).“Kuyinto enkulu kimina ukunikwa unombolo 10. Leli jezi kade ligqokwa ngumdlali osehlale isikhathi eside kunabo bonke lapha kwiChippa futhi engukaputeni. Banginike lona. Ngiyajabula ngokungithemba kwabo. Lokhu kusho ukuthi kufanele zibonakale izithelo, ngisebenze kanzima, ngikhombise ukuthi abenzaga iphutha. Ngiyabonga naku-Andile ngoba ngesikhathi bemtshela ukuthi bazonginika unombolo 10,akazange aphatheke kabi. Uzongifundisa okuningi ngeqembu,”kusho uShongwe.Leli nxele kulindeleke liyibambe esiswini noThamsanqa Sangweni okhululwe yi-Orlando Pirates ngemuva kokuhlala isizini eyodwa kuyo.
title: Uxoshwe wukugodola nemali kwamaqembu aseKZN

text: SIDUMISA NOSAZIWAYOLE ngosi isaqhubeka nokuveza osaziwayo nenkolo yabo. Namuhla sikwethulela isilomo somsakazi wo-Ukhozi FM, uKhathide “Tshathugodo” Ngobe owenza uhlelo lwantambama kulo msakazo kusukela ngo-3 kuya ku-6 ntambama, oveze ukuthi usenkolweni yoFakazi bakaJehova. UTHOKOZANI MBUNDA uxoxe nayeTSHATHUGODO NGOBE (TN): Ngimi enkolweni yoFakazi bakaJehova okuningi engikwenzayo kusenkolweni.TM: Ngabe umndeni wakho wonke okule nkolo noma uwena kuphela?TN: Ngakhula umndeni wami ukuyo, nami ngaze ngabhabhadiswa kuyo, ngakho ngingathi umndeni wami ulapho wonke.TM: Ngabe njengoba ungusaziwayo nje, sebekunikile isikhundla esithile enkonzweni.TN: Enkonzweni akuyi ngodumo ukuze ube nesikhundla, kodwa kunezabelo ezithile owabelwa sona ngokukosebenza kwakho. Asibizi ngokuthi izikhundla thina , sithi izabelo.TM: Sikhona kodwa isabelo osigaqele nongafisa ukunikwa sona?TN: Ngiyasihalela esokukhuluma amazwi akhaya ngokucaphuna eBhayibhelini uma sinemihlangano ethile.TM: Njengoba abakule nkolo yakho bengena imizi nemizana befundisa ngenkolo yabo, ngabe wena usithola nini leso sikhathi?TN: Ngiyasithola ngoba abaningi bayangibona enkabeni yeTheku ngiphethe izincwajana ezibizwa ngoPhaphama neNqaba Yokulinda, ngizinikezela kwabanesifiso sokuqonda ngombuso kaNkulunkulu.TM: Ngabe abantu abasondelene nawe bayazi yini ukuthi uyakholwa, noma awukaze ubatshele ngenkolo yakho?TN: Bayazi abaseduze kwami ngenkolo yami, abanye sebephendukele kuyo ngenxa yokuthi ngihlala ngibatshele ngezindaba zikaNkulunkulu.TM: Iliphi izwi nje ovame ukubacaphunela lona nelenza uhlale ubambelele ekukholweni?TN: Kunezwi elitholakala encwadini yeSambulo 21, evesini lokuqala wehlele nalo,elikhuluma ngokuthi abafileyo basazovuka, siphinde siphile nabo kamnandi emva kokuba kunqontshwe ukufa.TM: Yini eyenza uthande lelo vesi?TN: Ukuthi abazali bami angiphilanga nabo, manje ngijatshuliswa ukuthi basazovuka ngibabone bese sihlala sonke ngokuthula emhlabeni.TM: Ithini kanti eyakho inkolo ngokufa komuntu?TN: Eyami inkolo incike kakhulu eBhayibhelini kakhulu ngoba kunevesi elitholakala encwadini kaMshumayeli ethi “abafileyo abazi lutho, abacabangi, abananzondo.” Ngakho sikholwelwa ukuthi uma umuntu efa akazi lutho, kuyaphela nje ngaye kuleso sikhashana kuze kufike isikhathi esisilinde sonke sokuvuswa kwabafileyo.
title: 'Ngimi enkolweni yoFakazi bakaJehova'

text: ITHUKUTHELE iyavutha imbongi yesifazane yodumo lwengoma kaVusi Nova ethi, Asiphelelanga, uJessica Mbangeni, emuva kokuhlanjalazwa phambi kwezinkumbi zabantu ngesikhathi kutshalwa iNgonyama yamaXhosa, uZwelonke Mpendulo Sigcawu, esigodlweni sayo iNqandu e-Eastern Cape ngoLwesihlanu.Le mbongi iyalelwe ukuba yehle esteji isathi ibongela owayengumengameli wakuleli, uMnuz Thabo Mbeki, enkonzweni yalo mngcwabo. Kuhlukane imibono ngesikhathi uMkhuzi wamasosha kuleli, uGeneral Mbuyiselo Mgwebi, ehlwitha kabuhlungu i-microphone kuJessica eseqalile ukuhaya.Lesi sigameko esigcwele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana senzeke kubheke umhlaba.Engxoxweni neSolezwe, uJessica uthe uhlambalazekile.“Ngiyeke konke ngoba ngithi ngizohlonipha iNgonyama yami. Bekufanele ngiye e-Angola lapho bengizohola khona uR150 000 kodwa ngakhetha ukuyongcwaba inkosi yami. Mina angiyona imbongi kuphela kodwa ngiwumkhulumeli wesizwe samaXhosa. Emhlabeni wonke ngiyahlonishwa ngoba ngisezingeni loBeyonce.”Uvumile ukuthi kunamaphutha enzekile ngokungawaqondi amanye amasiko esintu.“Noma kunjalo kodwa bekungafanele ngihlambalazwe. Angiyona imbongi kuphela kodwa ngibuye ngibe wumbhishophi ebandleni futhi bengibonisiwe ngalesi sigameko ngaphambi kokuba senzeke. Ngisho nasemathuneni ngibuye ngaxoshwa, kwathiwa angisuke phambili, ngiyohlala emuva. Nakhona angisusanga msindo kodwa ngithobele umthetho ngoba ngihlonipha iNgonyama. Ukube ngiyihlongandlebe bengizosusa umsindo.”Uthe uSigcawu ubemkhonzile kangangoba kukhona abake bathi akabizelwe koMkhulu ayohlawula njengoba ayevunule ngesikhumba sebhubesi kodwa uSigcawu washaya phansi ngonyawo.“Nalapho babefuna ngihlambalazeke phambi kwabantu ngoba babengazi ukuthi mina ngase ngiyazisile iNgonyama ukuthi ngizovunula ngesikhumba sebhubesi futhi yangivumela.”Uthe akuqali ngaye ukuba umuntu wesifazane abe yinyosi njengoba uNontsizi Mgqwetho, owayezibiza ngeMbongikazi uChizama, aba yimbongi yokuqala eyashicilela izinkondlo zayo ephephandabeni laseGoli, Umthetheleli Wabantu.“Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi nathi singabantu besifazane sibhukule ukuze sikhululeke,” kusho uJessica.Okhulumela iNdlunkulu yamaXhosa, uMntwana Xhanti Sigcawu, uthe okwenziwe nguJessica kukhombise ukubukela phansi iNdlunkulu ngoba bebeceliwe ukuba bangabongeli kodwa wabongela ngenkani futhi undendende.“Into ayenzile iyanyanyisa nje. Besingeke sibe nendaba ukube beyenziwe ngumuntu wakwelinye izwe. Nasemathuneni bebeceliwe abesifazane ukuba bangezi kodwa yena waqhamuka esegqoke ezobufundisi. Bakhona nabanye abefundisi besifazane abebekhona kodwa abayanga emathuneni,” kuphawula uSigcawu.
title: Ucasulwe wukuphoxwa kutshalwa inkosi

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWE UZOBUYELA enkantolo ngenyanga ezayo unkosikazi kalowo owayengungqongqoshe wezezimali kuleli uMnuz Malusi Gigaba, uNkk Nomachule Norma Gigaba, izolo obevele enkantolo yaseHatfield ngecala lokucekela phansi impahla.Uzobuyela enkantolo ngoSepthemba 14.UNkk Gigaba ufike enkantolo ehambisana nabameli bakhe oVictor Nkhwashu, o-Advocate Dali Mpofu noTembeka Ngcukaitobi.UMpofu uthe isizathu esenze bafuna lolu suku yingoba bafuna ukumangalela abathile ngecala lombango, okungenzeka liqede indaba yecala abhekene nalo manje.UMbuso nabameli bakamsolwa bavumelene ngalolu suku ngoba kuzobanikeza amasonto ayisithupha ukuba kuxoxwe ngodaba lwamacala ombango abafuna ukuwavula.UMpofu ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ngoMgqibelo uNkk Gigaba uthole ibheyili, kwaba nohlelo lokuthi uzoya kohlala nabangani ngempelasonto.Ube esefuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi angakwazi yini ukubuyela ekhaya.Imantshi iphendule ngokuthi akukho okubhalwe phansi okunqanda ukuba kube khona indawo angeke aye kuyona kodwa ucela baxhumane nemantshi emnikeze ibheyili.UNkhwashu uthe uma uNkk Gigaba esebuyela enkantolo kuyobe sekucaca ukuthi ngabe ukuqulwa kwecala kuzoqhubeka yini.“Ngesikhathi sifaka isicelo sebheyili ngempelasonto sitshelwe ukuthi kunamacala okushaya kodwa namhlanje (izolo) ekuseni akushiwongo lutho ngawo,” kusho uNkhwashu.Ngodaba oluthinta oKlebe uthe lokho akukho ezandleni zabo.Uthe kulethwe ummeli omkhulu ukuba angenelele kulolu daba, abheke ukuthi imvume yokuboshwa kwakhe (uNkk Gigaba) yenzeka kanjani.“OKlebe bayazi ukuthi uhlala kuphi futhi sebake bamvakashela kaningana. Ukuboshwa kwakhe ngala macala bekungamele kwenzeke. Bekumele athole incwadi embizela enkantolo hhayi ukuba aboshwe ngoLwesihlanu ntambama, bazi kahle ukuthi izinkantolo zivaliwe ngakho uzohlala etokile impelasonto yonke,” kuchaza uNkhwashu.Uthe lolu daba luzoya enkantolo enkulu ukuze kuzobekwa eceleni ukuboshwa kwakhe nencwadi eyayigunyaza ukuba abosh
title: Ubuyela ngenyanga ezayo enkantolo umka Gigaba

text: BANGU-291 747 abafundi asebexhaswe yiNational Students’ Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS) selokhu kuqale unyaka kanti lesi sibalo kulindeleke ukuthi sinyuke njengoba kululwe nesikhathi sokuthi abafundi basemakolishi bafake izicelo.Lokhu kuvezwe nguSihlalo walesi sikhwama uMnuz Sizwe Nxasana esitatimendeni asithumelele abezindaba ngemuva kokuvela phambi kwekomiti lezemfundo ePhalamende.UNxasana uthe balule isikhathi sokuthi abafundi basemakolishi amaTechnical Vocational Education and Training, bafake izicelo zokuxhaswa njengoba sekuvalwa namhlanje.“Iningi labafundi abaxhasiwe lisemanyuvesi. Kusaqhubeka ukubhalisa kubafundi basemakolishi. Bangu-180 944 abasemanyuvesi asebexhasiwe, babe ngu-110 803 abasemakolishi. Kwabasemanyuvesi bangu-71 098 abazokwenza unyaka wokuqala kuthi abangu-109 846 kube abebevele befunda ngonyaka odlule,” kusho uNxasana.Uthe emakolishi bangu-15 375 abafikayo asebexhasiwe, babe ngu-95 428 abebevele befunda ngonyaka odlule.Uqhube wathi bayavuma ukuthi kuba nokubambezeleka ekuxhumaneni nalabo abathole uxhaso ngesikhathi.“Ziningi izinselelo esibhekene nazo ekuxhumaneni nabafundi ngesikhathi. Inkinga enkulu yizinguquko emakhalendeni ezinye zezikhungo ngenxa yeziteleka. Enye inkinga yindaba yokuthi labo abasuke befake izicelo abafaki zonke izimfanelo ezisuke zidingeka bese kuba nokubambezeleka,” kusho uNxasana.Uthe bangu-9 976 abafundi abachithwe yilesi sikhwama ngoba baseqoqweni i-missing middle abazali babo bahola kufinyelele ku-R600 000 ngonyaka.Laba bafundi uthe bangafaka izikhalo kulesi sikhwama ukuze zibhekwe kabanzi izikhalo zabo.USihlalo wekomiti leMfundo ePhakeme ePhalamende, uNkk Connie September, uthe ujabule ngokuthi abalesi sikhwama baveze ukuthi bathole izicelo ezingu-380 000.Uthe bathole nokuthi akubanga nezinkinga kususwa abafundi ohlelweni oludala beyiswa ohlelweni olusha.Izolo esithangamini nabezindaba ngemuva komhlangano weKhabhinethi, uNgqongqoshe ehhovisi likaMengameli, uMnuz Jeff Radebe, uthe uhulumeni usexhase inqwaba yabafundi abafikayo emanyuvesi kulo nyaka.
title: Isibalo sabaxhaswe yiNSFAS

text: I-ANC kuzwelonke isigxeke isigameko sokuhlaselwa kwethempeli eVerulam, eThekwini, ngoLwesine ithi lesi senzo siwukuphazamisa inkululeko yezenkolo eshicilelwe kumthethosisekelo wezwe.UMnuz Pule Mabe okhulumela i-ANC uthe ofakazi kulesi sigameko baveza ngokusobala ukuthi yinto ebihleliwe le yokuhlasela leli thempeli. Uthe kufanele kugxekwe ngazo zonke izindlela noma yimiphi imizamo yokuhlalisa lubhojozi abantu ngenxa yezenkolo.UMabe uthe beyinhlangano ebusayo bashaqekile ukuthi kukhona abantu abenza isenzo esibi kangaka njengoba onke amabandla ezenkolo evikelwe kumthethisisekelo.“Siyacela amaphoyisa uphiko loKlebe ukuba lusilekelele ngoba sifuna ukubabona bejeza abenze lokhu. Sithi dudu emndenini yoshonile, sifisele nalabo abasesibhedlela ukululama okusheshayo.”Kulesi sigameko esinyantisa igazi kutheleke abalisa abangaziwa abahlasela amalungu ebandla abethandaza ababhokoda ngommese ebanquma noqhoqhoqho kwafa oyedwa abanye baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela.Kunezinye izingxenye zethempeli ezithungelwe ngomlilo ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko.Leli cala ligcine lithathwa uphiko loKlebe nokuyilona oluzolulandela luzame ukuthola umnyombo walo. Lokhu kuhlasela akuqondakali ukuthi kusukelaphi njengoba sekusabalele nemibiko ethi kungase kuhambisane nezenzo zobushokobezi.Ibamba loMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uGeneral Bheki Langa uthe, kunethimba labaphenyi elijutshwe ukuba lizingele libambe abasolwa bajeziswe.- ANA
title: Bagxeka ukuhlaselwa kwethempeli

text: MBONGISENI BUTHELEZIEseGoliUPHOXEKILE umqeqeshi weMaritzburg United, u-Ernst Middendorp, kulandela ukuhluleka kweqembu lakhe ukungena kuTop 8.Leli qembu lishaye i-Orlando Pirates ngo 3-2 ngempelasonto kodwa lagcina lehlulekile wukungena kuTop 8 yize like lahlala endaweni yesine isikhathi eside.Amagoli eMaritzburg ashaywe ngu-Heinrich Isaacks, Ryan De Jongn noCuthberth Malajila kwathi awePirates ashaywa nguTlou Segolela noKhethowakhe Masuku.“Umphumela esiwutholile muhle kakhulu kodwa besifuna ukungena kuTop 8. Kuhle ukuthi sivale isizini ngewini. sesizobheka ukuqala kwayo njengoba sizoqala amalungiselelo ngoJuni 18. Sizobheka abanye abadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu abangasijoyina ngesizini ezayo,” kusho uMiddendorp.Leli qembu lisayinise abadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu okubalwa kubona uMthokozisi Yende, Delron Buckley nabanye kodwa uMiddendorp uthe ukusayinisa umdlali ophezulu akusho ukuthi sewuzongena ugijima kuTop 8.“Yebo sibasayinile abadlali abahle kule sizini kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi sebezovele benze imilingo eqenjini ngoba abanye basuke benezinyanga bengadlali emaqenjini abo. Abanye basuke sebehlile ngendlela esibazi bedlala ngayo sekudingeka isikhathi eside ukuze bakwazi ukuphinde badlale kahle,” kusho uMiddendorp.Uthe noma yimuphi umqeqeshi ongathatha kuMaritzburg angaba nomsebenzi olula. “Ngisenzile isizinda esihle kuleli qembu noma ngabe ubani ozoqhubeka ngeke ahlupheke. Ngiwenzile umsebenzi wami, abezindaba bangakhuluma abakuthandayo.”Uqhube wathi alikho iqembu eliyohlale lidlala kahle amasizini wonke.“Bheka iSuperSport United inqobe iligi kathathu kwase kwenzekani ngemuva kwalokho?
