Abadlali ababe besazimisela uma sebenqobe izindebe, bakhululeka kakhulu bese kudingeka iqembu lakhiwe kabusha,” kusho uMiddendorp.Amaqembu agcine engene kuTop 8 nazodlala kuMTN 8 ekuqaleni kwesizini ezayo, yiKaizer Chiefs, Platinum Stars, Orlando Pirates, Bidvest Wits, SuperSport United, Bloemfontein Celtic, Free State Stars ne-University of Pretoria.Okuphawulekayo wukuthi njengoba iChiefs isizini ibhekene namaTuks ayishaye ngo 1-0 izophinde ivule isizini nawo emdlalweni weMTN 8.
title: Ngiwenzile umsebenzi wami kwi-United: Mazinyo

text: IBHEKENE ngeziqu zamehlo imindeni emibili yaseMondlo, eVryheid, ebanga isidumbu sowesifazane okuthiwa wayesehlukanisile nomyeni wakhe kodwa usenqwahe nesidumbu sakhe.Sekuphele amasonto amathathu engangcwatshiwe uNksz Mimi Nene (53) owashona ngoMeyi 9 emuva kokugula. Umbango wesidumbu usufakwe eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe umndeni wakwaNene ubufuna ukuzingcwabela umufi kodwa isidumbu sithathwe ngobengumyeni wakhe uMnuz Nkosinathi Hlengwa.UMnuz Bhekumuzi Nene, umshana kamufi, uthe ubabekazi wakhe wahlukanisa eminyakeni eyishumi edlule futhi bebengasabhekani noHlengwa.“UHlengwa ubesefuna ukubuya baxolelane kodwa ubabekazi ubengezwa lutho ngalokhu. Ugulile wahanjiswa esibhedlela yibona abakwaHlengwa, babuye sebesitshela ukuthi ushonile. Okusixakayo wukuthi washona ebusuku kodwa bona bafika ekuseni sebenaso nesitiketi sokushona esingazi ukuthi basenza nini. Ngalo usuku ashona ngalo uHlengwa ungene emzini kamufi wasebenzisa nemoto yakhe,” kusho uMnuz Nene.Uthe benze incwadi yokubakhipha endlini ngesonto eledlule.Umndeni wakwaNene uphinde wenza incwadi yesivimbelo sokuthi abakwaHlwengwa bangasondeli emzini kamufi emuva kwengxabano kodwa abakwaHlengwa banqabile ukuyisayina.Kumanje akwaziwa ukuthi kuzongcwatshwa nini ngoba kulindwe kuzwakale ukuthi inkantolo izovuna muphi umndeni.UHlengwa uthe ngeke aphawule ngoba selusenkantolo. Ucele ukuthi kuthintwe ummeli wakhe, uMnuz Melokuhle Shabangu weMM Shabangu Attorneys.UShabangu ukuqinisekisile ukuthi udaba lusenkantolo kodwa abakanikwa usuku lokukhishwa kwesinqumo. Uvumile ukuthi kunombango wesidumbu. Uphikile ukuthi umufi wahlukanisa eminyakeni eyishumi edlule wathi wahlukanisa ngo-2012. Uthe kufakwe isinqumo esisheshayo sokuthi kungenelele inkantolo.“Umufi wadivosa ngo-2012 futhi kunencwadi yefa kulolu daba yingakho udaba lusenkantolo. Ngeke ngikwazi ukuveza eminye imininingwane ngencwadi yefa ngoba akukayiwa enkantolo. Silinde ukuthi lingakapheli isonto sinikezwe usuku lokuya enkantolo,” kusho uShabangu.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Khonza Thwala, uthe ubikelwe ngalokhu kodwa watshela umndeni wakwaNene ukuthi kungaphezu kwamandla.Umufi ubesehlala nowesilisa obemgadile emzini wakhe ngoba ubengenangane. Umndeni wakwaNene usola ukuthi izimbangi zawo zifuna ifa likamufi nemishwalensi yakhe. AbakwaNene bathe umufi walala esibhedlela izinsuku ezintathu. Bathe uHlengwa ubenomunye wesifazane okusolwa ukuthi ngumkakhe, okuthiwa uyathinteka embangweni.
title: Umbango wesidumbu enkantolo

text: NGESIKHATHI kuqhubeka umhlangano we-National Executive Commitee (NEC) ye-ANC e-Irene, ePitoli, izolo, amaqembu aphikisayo aphakamise ukuthi kuhlakazwe iPhalamende kusondezwe ukhetho.Amaqembu aphikisayo abize isithangami nabezindaba athi afuna ukushaya uMengameli Jacob Zuma ngevoti lokungabethembi ubuholi bakhe kuleli sonto bese emuva kwalokho kuhlakazwe iPhalamende.Ukubiza kwawo isithangami kungenxa yenzukazikeyi yodaba lokwehla kukaZuma esikhundleni emuva kokuthi kuhlehliswe inkulumo yesizwe kaMengameli ebizoba ngoFebhuwari 8. Emuva kwalokho kuvele imibiko yokuthi ubuholi obuphezulu be-ANC buxoxa noMengameli ngezinhlelo zokuthi ehle esikhundleni ngendlela engeke imhlambalaze.Azihambanga kahle izingxoxo ubuholi obuphezulu be-ANC bagcina buxoxe neNational Working Commitee nayo engaphumanga nesixazululo. Ngemuva kwalokho uMengameli we-ANC, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, uthe uxoxe noMengameli wezwe ngohlelo lokuthi ehle.Azihambanga kahle lezi zingxoxo okufalazelwe wukuthi uMgcinimafa we-ANC, uMnuz Paul Mashatile, atshele abatshalizimali ngesonto eledlule ukuthi uZuma uyagoloza ukwehla esikhundleni.Kuthe ngoLwesithathu kwahlehla umhlangano weNEC kodwa uMengameli akazange ehle esikhundleni njengoba ngeSonto, uRamaphosa ememezele ukuthi kuzoba nomhlangano ophuthumayo izolo wokubhunga udaba lokwehla esikhundleni kukaZuma.Umholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, uthe uma uSomlomo wePhalamende, uNksz Baleka Mbete, engasiphenduli isicelo sabo sokuthi ivoti lokungabethembi ubuholi bukaMengameli libe kuleli sonto bazoya enkantolo ngo-10 ekuseni namuhla.“Uma uMengameli esekhishiwe sizovusa isigaba-50 soMthethosisekelo esikhuluma ngokuhlakazwa kwePhalamende. Kufanele kube nokhetho kungakapheli izinsuku eziwu-90,” kusho uMnuz Mmusi Maimane ongumholi weDA.Mayelana nokuthi uZuma ufuna ukuvikelwa, uMaimane uthe uZuma uzovikeleka uma esejele, akukho okunye abangamvikela ngakho.Uthe bakhathele wukubuka i-ANC ingamehlisi esikhundleni uMengameli Zuma yingakho behlangene bengamaqembu aphikisayo ukuza neqhinga lokuthi kube nomholi ozoqokwa ngabantu.“O(Mnuz) Derek Hanekom bebekhuluma ngokukhululeka kudala bethi akehle uZuma kodwa manje usubabona beculela izisu zabo. Balokhu bethi asilinde, sizolindani? Asisayifuni i-ANC ngoba ayizimisele ukulungisa isimo sezwe,” kusho uMalema .Amazwi akhe ananelwe nguDkt Mbuyiseni Ndlozi, okhulumela i-EFF, othe noma ngabe uMengameli uyaphuma esikhundleni kodwa lokhu akusho ukuthi i-ANC izokwazi ukuphefumula.“Uma kuwukuthi uMengameli Zuma uyazehlela esikhundleni kusho ukuthi kuzongena iPhini likaMengameli, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, ozophatha izinsuku eziwu-30 ngesikhathi kungakakhethwa muntu. Asimboni uMengameli Zuma ezehlela ngokuthanda kwakhe ngakho sifuna kube nokhetho olusha lapho abantu bezoziqokela bona uMengameli wabo,” kusho uNdlozi.Uthe ngeke bakwazi ukubekezela ukuthi bavotele ukungabethembi ubuholi bukaMengameli Zuma ngoFebhuwari 22 ngoba izwe lidinga umhlahlandlela maduzane.“Ngeke sivume ukuthi amadoda athile ahlangane ehlathini aqoke umuntu acabanga ukuthi kufanele aphathe izwe. Sizoya enkantolo ngoba sikhathalele abantu baseNingizimu Afrika. Asimfuni uZuma, asimfuni uCyril sifuna kube nokhetho kungakapheli izinsuku eziwu-90 uma sekuhlakazwe iPhalamende,” kusho uNdlozi.Umholi weCope, uMnuz Mosiuoa Lekota, uthe ngeke bavume ukuthi i-ANC yenze okuphambene nomthethosisekelo.Umholi we-UDM, uGeneral Bantu Holomisa, uthe amaqembu aphikisayo afuna kubuyelwe ebantwini ukuze kube yibona abakhetha umholi oqotho.UDkt Corne Mulder, we-FF Plus, uthe balandela umthethosisekelo ngokuthi kulandelwe isigaba somthetho-102 ovumela ukuthi babe nevoti lokungamethembi uMengameli bese kuvuswa isigaba-50 esikhuluma ngokuhlakazwa kwePhalamende.Umholi we-APC, uMnuz Themba Godi, ekhasini lakhe le-twitter, uthe amaqembu aphikisayo afuna kube nokhetho ayadlala, yinto engasoze yenzeka leyo.IPhini likaSomlomo wePhalamende, uMnuz Lechesa Tsenoli, obemele uNksz Mbete, uthe bayiphendulile incwadi ye-EFF efuna inkulumo yokungabuthembi ubuholi bukaZuma ibe namhlanje.Uthe uNksz MBete umatasa nabameli mayelana nalolu daba futhi bayasicubungula isicelo. Imigomo yePhalamende ithi kumele kuxhunywane nazo zonke izinhlaka okubalwa kuzo noSotswebhu weqembu elibusayo.Uqhube wathi ayilona iqiniso imibiko ethi sichithiwe isicelo se-EFF sokuthi kube nale nkulumo namhlanje.
title: ‘Alihlakazwe iPhalamende kube nokhetho’

text: SIBUSISO MDLALOSE UMHLELI wezimpi zesibhakela KwaZulu-Natal, uThulani "Nkunzi" Magudulela, usephonsele inselelo abahleli bezimpi abasathuthuka ngokufunda kobekwenziwa yingqalabutho engasekho kwezokuhlelwa kwezimpi zesibhakela, uMzimasi "Bra Mzi" Mnguni.UMnguni (73), waseMdantsane, eMonti, e-Eastern Cape, ubengomunye wabahleli bezimpi abahlonishwayo kwezesibhakela eMzansi.Udlule emhlabeni izolo ekuseni ngemuva kokuxineka isikhathi eside, okwaqala ngemuva kokuba ehlaselwe yisifo sohlangothi ngo-2014."Uma ukhuluma ngoMnguni, ukhuluma ngomqhathi wezimpi osezingeni eliphezulu kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika. Futhi engingasho ngingahlonizi ukuthi kusayothatha cishe iminyaka engaphezulu kwamashumi amahlanu ngisho nangaphezulu ukuthi kuphinde kube khona uphromotha onjengaye ngokwezinga nangendlela yokusebenza," kusho uMagudulela weLudonga Boxing Promotions."Ngifunde lukhulu kuye futhi ngikuthatha njengenhlanhla nesibusiso esingandele bani ukusondelana nokusebenza nomuntu onjengaye, obesiphila isibhakela, siyinto obekucacela noma ngubani ukuthi sisemizweni yakhe.“ UMagudulela, osezakhele igama ngokukhiqiza abashayisibhakela abasezingeni eliphezulu ejimini yakhe, i-International Standard Gym, ekuJohannes Nkosi Street, eThekwini, uthi abahleli bezimpi zesibhakela kufanele bafunde ngokubaluleka kokuba namajimi lapho bezocija, bakhulise khona abashayisibhakela.Uthi kulapho bazophinde babahlelele namakhempu, okuyinto esiyivelakancane eningini labahleli bezimpi banamuhla, ababeka imali phambili."UMnguni umshayisibhakela ubemqala esigabeni sama-amesha, anyuke naye njalo aze amenze umpetha. Ubehlala enama-amesha, kube ngasebelwa esigabeni esikhokhelayo nompetha esitebeleni sakhe.“Lokhu abasakwenzi abanye abahleli bezimpi esesinabo namuhla, engikholwa ngukuthi basengafunda lukhulu kule nkakha yakwaMnguni, njengoba nami ngafunda kuyo ekwenzeni izinto," kuqhuba uMagudulela.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, uRodney Berman, oyinkunzi emdwayidwa ekuqhatheni izimpi kuleli, osebenze isikhathi eside noMnguni, uchaze ukuhamba kwale nkakha njengokwelelesa komphezulu, oshiye kukhalwa, ngenxa yamagalelo nobumnene bakhe emkhakheni wezamankomane.UMnguni, obengumnikazi we-Eyethu Boxing Promotions, ne-Eyethu Boxing Gym yodumo, eMdantsane, uhlonishwe amahlandla amabili ngomklomelo iSteve Tshwete Lifetime Achievement Award, ngo-2017 nango-2018.Ukhiqize ompetha abaningi esibhakeleni, okubalwa kubo uWelcome “The Hawk” Ncita, Vuyani “The Beast” Bungu‚ Masibulele “Hawk” Makepula noZolani “Tiger” Petelo.
title: Inselelo kwabesibhakela kushona uMzimasi Mnguni

text: KUBOSHWE abantu abangaphezu kuka-310 000 bathweswa amacala okuphula imithetho kathaqa kusukela ngoMashi nonyaka.Ngesikhathi esifanayo kutheleleke ngeCorona amaphoyisa angaphezu kuka-16 000, angu-215 ashona.Lokhu kuvezwe uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele esithangamini nabezindaba izolo.UbenoKhomishana wamaPhoyisa, uGeneral Khehla Sitole.Ukhombise ukunyanya nentukuthelo ngakubone kwenziwa yizindawo ezidayisa utshwala azihambele namaphoyisa ngempelasonto, Ekurhuleni eGauteng.Uthe zivala thaqa izicabha namawindi ngo-10 ebusuku zivalela ngaphakathi amakhasimende ziqhubeke nokudayisa kuse emnyango.“Ngishaqekile ngokuphulwa komthetho ngale ndlela kubekwa phambili inzuzo kunempilo yomuntu. Abantu bavalelwa endaweni encane esuke ivalwe amawindi nezicabha bephuza. Uma sesishayile isikhathi sokuvala, dedelani abantu bagoduke bengaphethe lutho,” kusho uCele.Utshwala buvumeleke ukudayiswa kusuka ngoMsombuluko kuze kube uLwesihlanu ngo-9 kuze kushaye * -5 ntambama. Ngempelasonto nangamaholidi abuvumelekile ukudayiswa. Azikavunyelwa ukusebenza izindawo zokuzijuxuza ebusuku.Njalo phakathi kwamabili kuze kube * -4 ekuseni, umthetho uthi wonke umuntu kumele abe sekhaya.Kuvele nokuthi kudlangile ukuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane eMlaza, eMpangeni, eNanda, ePlessislaer, oSizweni, KwaMashu okuyizindawo ezivela ohlwini lwezingu-30 ezihamba phambili emacaleni okuhlukunyezwa kwembokodo eNingizimu Afrika.UCele uthe bazoqinisa imikhankaso elwa nodlame lwasekhaya, kucijwe ngamakhono amaphoyisa aphenya amacala alolu hlobo futhi sonke isiteshi sizoba nendawo eqondene nala macala.UCele ufanise udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nobhubhane wathi bakubeke eqhulwini ukulwa nabenza lobu bugebengu.USitole uthe basungule ikomiti elilwa neCorona nemithetho elawula ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa ngesikhathi sikathaqa.Uthe uma kunephoyisa elingasifakile isifonyo emsebenzini, lokho kuthathwa njengokuphula umthetho kathaqa.UCele ugcizelele ukuthi ayivumelekile imilindelo futhi bangu-100 abagunyazwe ukuba semngcwabeni.“Alikapheli igciwane nakuba kuxegiswe imithetho ngakho abantu kumele bazinakekele,” kusho uCele.
title: Kubekwa phambili inzuzo: Cele

text: UNCONYWE ngeqhaza lakhe ekuthuthukiseni uMasipala waseRichmond uMnuz Sibusiso Joseph Mchunu obeyimeya kulo masipala, oshonele esibhedlela izolo ngemva kokuhlaselwa yisifo sohlangothi ngo-2018.UMchunu (64) isifo samhlasela esehhovisi lakhe ngoJanuwari 2018 kusukela lapho ubelokhu ephuma engena esibhedlela kanti izolo kugcine kumnqobile ukufa. Ushonele esibhedlela iRoyal eMgungundlovu. Ubeyimeya kulo masipala kusukela ngo-2016.UMnuz Manqoba Mchunu oyindodana kamufi uthe uyise obeyilungu le-ANC unikele ngempilo yakhe esebenzela umphakathi ezinikele nasemigomeni yenhlangano.“ Sithanda ukubonga abebemfisela ukululama egula. Ngosuku lokufihlwa kwakhe sizolandela imigomo okuhloswe ngayo ukugwema ukubhebhetheka kweCorona,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe imininingwane ngokufihlwa kwakhe izokhishwa uma umndeni usunqumile.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nobuHoli boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka uthe ubezinikele emsebenzini wokuhlinzekwa kwabantu ngezidingo.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Nhlakanipho Ntombela uthe uMchunu uzokhumbuleka ngeqhaza lakhe ekuthuthukiseni umasipala nasekwakhiweni kombutho esifundeni iMoses Mabhida.
title: Kushone obeyimeya yaseRichmond

text: ISIZOTHOLAKALA ezitolo inkontileka esayinwa yimindeni ibe yisivumelwano selobolo.Usomabhizinisi uMnuz Jabulani Mahlangu enabakwa-Hortors Stationery bahlanganise umqulu obizwa ngokuthi yi-Lobola Agreement for Marriage edayiswa ezitolo eShoprite nase-USave ngo-R99.Incwadi yesivumelwano enamakhasi amahlanu iqale ukudayisa ngoMsombuluko.Imayelana nohlelo okwenziwa ngalo uma kulotsholwa noma kukhulunywa ngelobolo.Iyisibophezelo esibhalwe phansi esiwubufakazi bokuthi ngempela imindeni yomibili yahlangana yaxoxa ngelobolo.Kuthiwa isiza ekutheni kubhalwe konke phansi okwenzeka ngelanga lezingxoxo zelobolo.Kodwa laba abasuke beganana, kumele bayibone le nkontileka, bayivume ukuthi ithinta bona. Babhala amagama abo nezinombolo zikamazisi.Ayisona isinqumo esingujuqu, akusho ukuthi laba bobabili bashadile ngenxa yenkontileka.Ayibaniki ilungelo lokuba yindoda nomfazi.Sekuyoba wumthwalo wabafuna ukugana ukuba balandele yonke imiyalelo nemithetho yezwe yokuganana ngokwesintu.Kuyo kufakwa nokuthi yimalini esalile ngesikhathi kukhokhwa ilobolo, umkhwenyana usuke ezobuya nini ezoqedela futhi uzimisele ukuqedela nini.Kukhona nohlu lwezipho okunikezwana zona phakathi kwemindeni yomibili.Bonke abasuke bexoxa ngelobolo bayasayina babhale amagama abo namakheli nezinombolo zabo.UMahlangu uthe wabona ukuthi kade ayehlala ezingxoxweni zelobolo kodwa kumhlupha ukuthi akukho okubhalwayo okucacile.“Nginabashana abaningi. Ngangiye ngibone ukuthi ekugcineni kwezingxoxo ayikho into ebhalwa phansi ecacile ukuthi ulotsholwe ngezinkomo ezingaki nokuthi kuvunyelenwe ngani. Ngabe sengihlala phansi ngicubungula ukuthi yini engabasiza ukuba lolu siko lwethu oluhle kangaka lubhalwe kahle phansi.“Lokhu akukona ukudelela usiko kodwa ukulinika indlela ehloniphekile. Abaningi bebegcina bebhale ephepheni elincane elingahlelekile kodwa bebe bebhala into ebucayi kangaka,” kusho uMahlangu.Uthe ngaphezu kwalokho ufuna ukuvikela omalokazana basemakhaya abalotsholwayo bese beyogana ngaphandle kokubhalisa umshado.“Inhloso yami enkulu wukuba abantu abalotsholiwe bengalahlekelwa yilungelo labo, bahlonishwe bakwazi nokuyolwela izimali nefa labayeni babo besebenzisa leli phepha. Kokunye imindeni iphika nokuthi balotsholwa uma isifuna ukudla ifa labayeni babo,” kusho uMahlangu.
title: Inkontileka yelobolo isitholakala ezitolo

text: BAGWETSHWE iminyakaewu-15 umuntu emunye abesifazane ababili ababengabasebenzi boMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal ngokukhwabanisa * -R7.5 million.Inkantolo ephenya amacala athinta izimali eThekwini izolo igwebe uHlengiwe Hlela (35) noPatricia Chule (33) iminyakaewu-15 ngokukhwabanisa yengeza eminye iminyaka ewu-10 ngokuphula isigaba somthetho olwa nezenzo zobugebengu obuhleliwe.Imantshi * -G Davis ithe bazozidonsa kanyekanye izigwebo zabo.UNgqongqoshe obambile walo mnyango, uNkk Peggy Nkonyeni, uthe: “Izigwebo ezinde ezitholwe ababengabasebenzi bomnyango zithumela umyalezo oshubile ukuthi ngeke zibekezelwe izenzo zokukhwabaniswa kwemali kahulumeni.Abasebenzi babesophikweni olubhekelele ukukhishwa kwamathenda emnyangweni. Inkantolo yayikade ibalahle ngamacala ngo-Okthoba.Ukugwetshwa kwabo kulandela okukaMex Dladla ogwetshwe iminyaka ewu-12 ebhadla ejele ngecala elifanayo.UDladla wayewungqondongqondo ekukhwabaniseni okwenziwa ngabesifazane abagwetshiwe ngobugebengu obenzeka ngo-2015.“Izigwebo zisiza ukwakha uhulumeni ongenayo inkohlakalo ngokuthi kuqedwe ukukhwabanisa ezikhulwini zikahulumeni. Ukukhwabanisa ngenye yezingqinamba ezidala ukuthi igqoze intuthuko eyiswa kubantuo. Lolu (esho izolo) wusuku oluhle kuhulumeni wesifundazwe. Siyethemba bonke abasebenzi bakahulumeni bazofunda isifundo kokwenzekile,” kusho uNkk Nkonyeni.Emuva kwesigwebo uNkk Nkonyeni uthe baqinisa izinhlelo zangaphakathi zokukhokhela izinkampani ezenzela uhulumeni umsebenzi ukuvikela izenzo zenkohlakalo kubasebenzi.
title: Bagwetshiwe abakhwabanisa kuhulumeni

text: SEKUNGUMLANDO ukuthi ukhetho lukazwelonke selufike lwedlula eNingizimu Afrika futhi amaphupho nokuklolodelana kuphelile njengoba isiyaziwa inkunzi ekhonyayo esibayeni esiyiPhalamende.U-65.5% wabantu abebebhalisile uphumile wayovota uzwakalisa umbono wawo okhethweni.Ukwabiwa kwezihlalo kuya ngamavoti iqembu eliwatholile ngesikhathi zidlana imilala.Kudingeka * -0.25 wesibalo samavoti ukuze iqembu lithole isihlalo ePhalamende likazwelonke.Ngokubeka ngendlela ethanda ukucaca lokhu kusho ukuthi okungenani iqembu kufanele lithole amavoti angaphezu kuka-46 000.Nakuba inqobile i-ANC kodwa ngeke izishaye isifuba ngokuthi iyona eshaya amaphiko ngoba iDA ne-EFF bayibhincisele nxanye futhi kwehlile ukwesekwa kwayo.Silobe i-ANC ihamba phambili ngo-57.50% kuzwelonke, ilandelwa yiDA ngo-20.78%, i-EFF ilele isithathu ngo-10.79%.I-IFP ibilandela ngo-3.37%, endaweni yesihlanu kukhona iFreedom Front Plus ngo-2.38%.Akungabazeki-ke ukuthi lezi zinkunzi ezinhlanu zizobe zidudulana ePhalamende kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo.Izibalo zikhomba ukwehla kwezihlalo ze-ANC zisuka ku-249 ziya ku-230.Lokhu kusho ukuthi i-ANC ilahlekelwe yizihlalo ezingu-19, ngakho kuzoncipha isibalo samalungu ayo ePhalamende.I-DA ithola izihlalo ezingu-85 nokusho ukuthi ilahlekelwe izihlalo ezine ePhalamende.I-EFF ithole ezingu-43 nokuchaza ukuthi bakhule ngezihlalo ezingu-18 besuka kwezingu-25, kuzokwanda amalungu e-EFF ePhalamende.Ukwenyuka kwesibalo sezihlalo ze-EFF ephalamende kuzobe kuchaza ukuthi izojuba amalungu engeziwe. Iyaziwa ukuthi isusa ukushisa ePhalamende kube ncane indawo njengoba ePhalamende eledlule livalwe abaningi bengayifisi indaba.Onke amalungu ePhalamende azobonakala kahle ngoMeyi 22 lapho sekunomcimbi wokufungiswa kwawo eselungiselela ukuqala umsebenzi.Amaqembu azobe esePhalamende cishe angu-12 esephelele wonke, nokusho ukuthi angu-36 awakwazanga ukungena njengoba kade engu-48 amaqembu abebhalisele ukhetho kuzwelonke.Akukashintshi ukuthi i-DA yiyona eyiqembu eliphikisayo.I-ACDP, UDM, ATM, Good, NFP, AIC, neCope bakwazile ukuthola izihlalo. I-PAC ne-APC ne-Agang SA ngeke babuyele ephalamende njengoba bephikwa yizibalo.Okuqaphelekayo ukuthi i-APC iphuma nje umholi wayo uMnuz Themba Godi ubenguSihlalo wekomidi elibhekele izimali, iStanding Commitee on Public Accounts (Scopa), nokungase kwenze ukuthi angabe esabuyela esikhundleni.Okunye okuqaphelekayo ukuthi iGood ne-ATM bangomakoti kwezepolitiki kodwa bafike kwezwakala njengoba bezobe bemelwe ePhalamende.IGood izojuba umholi wayo uNkk Patricia De Lille owashiya iDA esuka kwi-Independent Democrats (DA), nakhona ephuma kwiPAC.IGood ithola isihlalo esisodwa. Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi i-ATM neGood bafike kwezwakala futhi bakhona abantu abawuzwile umyalezo wabo base bebathemba ngamavoti.Sekuzofanele kuye ngamagama enkehli-ke amaqembu aye ePhalamende eyokwenza lokhu kade ekwethembisa abantu okhethweni.Abantu balindele ukuthi kuphasiswe imithetho ezofeza izifiso zabo. Ukuba nezwi ePhalamende kuya ngezinombolo iqembu elinazo okulinika amandla okuthatha izinqumo.Amanye amaqembu kuyenzeka abe nemibono ephusile kodwa igcine ingaphasanga ngenxa yokushoda kwezinombolo.IPhalamende linezihlalo ezingu-400 nokuyisibalo esibekiwe esingashintshi okwamanje.NgoMeyi 25 kugcotshwa umengameli nokuwumcimbi ozoba seLoftus Versfeld Stadium. Kuyaqala ukuthi lomcimbi ungabi se-Union Buildings.Lolu suku lokugcotshwa kukamengameli luqondene nokugujwa koSuku lwe-Afrika.
title: Sebekhulumile abavoti, ingcabha isele namaqembu

text: INZIMA impilo endodeni yakwesaKwaBiyela, eMpangeni, esinde yosiwa emcimbini.UMnuz Muzikayifani Gumede (42) uthi usephenduke inkubela njengoba eshe kabi ezithendeni nasesiswini.Uthe ubesemcimbini komunye umuzi endaweni lapho bekuhlatshwe khona inkomo emasontweni edlule.“Angisona isihlobo kulo muzi kodwa ngaya ngoba ngiyaphuza futhi ngiyindoda. Ngahlala kwaze kwahlwa namanye amadoda esibayeni,” kusho uGumede.Eqhuba uthe esibayeni bekuphuzwa utshwala, kothiwe umlilo ababekade bosa kuwona inyama.“Kwathi ngingazelele lutho kwangena amadoda engingawabonanga ebusweni ngoba kwase kumnyama. La madoda awakhulumanga lutho avele angigxavuna angiphosa phakathi emlilweni. Ngenxa yokuthi ngase ngeqiwe yizinkamba, ngapaquza emlilweni isikhathi eside ngihlekwa. Emva kwalokho ngavuka nganikela ekhaya ngejubane,” kuchaza uGumede.Uqhube wathi akananxa namuntu futhi akasazi isizathu sokushiswa kwakhe.Uthe lesi sigameko senze impilo yanzima ngoba akasakwazi nokuvuka ayobamba amatoho ukuze aziphilise nomndeni wakubo.“Ngaya esibhedlela ngalaliswa ubusuku obubodwa. Kumanje ngisadla amakhambi. Esiswini kungcono ngiyabona ukuthi kuzophola ngokushesha. Inkinga isesithendeni lapho ngasha kwacishe kwagqashuka imisipha. Ngihamba ngezinduku ngikhuluma nje. Angibazi abantu abangenze le nto. Abanikazi bomuzi owawunomcimbi angikaze ngikhulume nabo ngoba kungahambeki,” kusho uGumede.AKUHAMBEKI kuMuzikayifani Gumede osinde ephoswa emlilweni emcimbiniUveze ukuthi uzimisele ngokuvula icala ukuze amaphoyisa ezophenya.“Okwamanje akukahambeki,” kusho uGumede.UNksz Ntobeko Gumede (20) owumshana walo mlisa uphawule wathi: “Umalume akanalo uchuku futhi akajwayele ukuba unoziga. Siyafisa bajeze abantu abamshisile.”Uthe ngoLwesine kuleli sonto uphelezelwe amanye amalungu omndeni baya kobika isigameko emzini obunomcimbi ngenhloso yokuthola umkhondo wabasolwa.“Umama wakhona usixoshile wathi akahlangani nokusha komuntu angazange am'meme,” kusho uNtobeko.Induna yendawo uNkk Busisiwe Gcabashe ithe ubuholi bendabuko abuhambisani nodlame emicimbini.NgokukaNkk Gcabashe, ababekhona ngelanga lesigameko sebembikele ngokwenzeka, kodwa uMnuz Gumede ubengakafiki ukuzobika ngokwakhe.“Sengizwile ukuthi bayaziwa abantu abamshisa lo mlisa nokuthi babeganga ngaye ngoba wayeqiwe yizinkamba. Ngizoluphenya udaba ngiludlulisele enkosini,” kusho uNkk Gcabashe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant-Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe kuyicala ukulimaza umuntu ngokumshisa.“UMnuz Gumede akaye emaphoyiseni ukuze kuphenywe udaba lwakhe kutholakale nokuthi ukulimala kwakhe kubi kangakanani,” kusho uZwane.Umnikazi womuzi owawunomcimbi akatholakalanga ukuba aphawule.
title: Usinde osiwa emcimbini

text: AMAPHOYISA ayithele othulini indoda okuthiwa ibambe inkunzi esitolo, yantshontsha isibhamu sephoyisa yadubula amaphoyisa KwaNgcolosi ngaseHillcrest ngaphandle kwaseThekwini.Kulesi sigameko, esenzeke ngeSonto ngo-10 ebusuku, kuboshwe amadoda amabili azobhekana necala lokubamba inkunzi, elokuzama ukubulala, ukutholwa nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nezinhlamvu.Ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, amaphoyisa aseHillcrest abeqaphe ubugebengu KwaNgcolosi ngesikhathi ezithela phezu kwezigebengu zibamba inkunzi.“Elinye iphoyisa lingene kwaMkhuli ethaveni liyothenga kanti lizozithela phezu kwabasolwa abebebamba inkunzi. Abasolwa baliphuce isibhamu iphoyisa base bebaleka ngeToyota Hilux ebigcwele ugwayi, utshwala nemali abebekuntshontshile. Amaphoyisa abajahile, abasolwa babe sebedubula amaphoyisa aphendula ngalo izulu lezandla kwashona umsolwa oyedwa. Omunye umsolwa odubulekile usesibhedlela ugadwe amaphoyisa. Umsolwa wesithathu ubalekile kodwa wabuye wabanjwa amaphoyisa ophiko lwezinja. Abanye abasolwa basagcwele amathafa. Ababoshiwe kulindeleke ukuba bavele enkantolo yasePinetown maduze,” kusho uZwane.Impahla ebintshontshiwe, okubalwa isibhamu sephoyisa, itholakele kanti igcinwe amaphoyisa.Khonamanjalo izolo ekuseni ePinetown umshayeli obebanjwa inkunzi ekhonjwe ngommese udubule isigebengu wasibulala.Imoto ibimi ekhoneni lomgwaqo * -Anderson noJosiah Gumede.UZwane uthe amadoda amabili afice umshayeli esemotweni yakhe emile eceleni komgwaqo. Omunye uvele ngewindi wacisha imoto, omunye wabeka ummese entanyeni yomshayeli. Umshayeli kuthiwa uvele wakhipha isibhamu wabadubula bobabili.Oyedwa ushonele eduze kwale moto omunye wabaleka. Amaphoyisa asePinetown ayaphenya ngalesi sigameko.
title: Sithelwe othulini isigebengu

text: Lokhu kulandela ukuthi umethuli walo uMoss Makwati, nethimba ashutha nalo behlaselwe umndeni akade bezofuna kuwo owesilisa ongondli nabamfice eshada.Lesi sigameko senzeke ngempelasonto edlule eGermiston, eGoli.ULindiwe Mbonambi wezokuxhumana kulesi siteshi uthe, laba bayalulama ngemuva kokuhlaselwa.“Onogada abebehamba nabo abawenzanga umsebenzi wabo sagcina sithathe isinqumo sokuthi sibakhombe indlela. Sibonga ukuthi akekho olimale kabi kulesi sigameko njengoba yize kube khona ukuhlaselwa kodwa imimoya yabo bonke ngisho neyomndeni igcine yehlile, kwakhulunywa ngodaba akade beze ngalo,” kusho uLindiwe.Uthe ukuqoshwa kube sekuqhubeka ngendlela ngemuva kokuthi kwehle imimoya.Ithimba lalolu hlelo kuthiwa lihlaselwe umakoti nomkhwenyana namanye amalungu omndeni okukhona kuwo nezalukazi zakhona emndenini.Lona wesilisa kuvela ukuthi ubeyiswe unina wezingane zakhe ezintathu kulolu hlelo ngoba engafuni ukuzondla.Ithimba lalolu hlelo kuveza ukuthi lawabiza amaphoyisa ngesikhathi lihlaselwa kodwa awangafika kwagcina lingavulwanga icala.Lolu hlelo oluhambela obaba abangondli, akukhona okokuqala ukuthi umethuli walo ahlaselwe njengoba nasemasontweni adlule owesilisa ayemvakashele emzini wakhe washo ukumqeda ngesibhakela wasizwa ngukuthi avike.
title: Kulinyazwe oweTV kwaxoshwa onogada

text: SIMPHIWE NGUBANESISHAQISE umphakathi waseMpola, eMariannhill, isigameko sokudutshulwa kubulawe umnikazi wesitolo kwathi inkosikazi yakhe nengane balimala kanzima ngoLwesithathu ntambama.Kushone uMnuz Muziwoxolo Dikela (47), odabuka eMount Fletcher, inkosikazi (42) nengane yentombazane eneminyaka emihlanu baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela belimele.Kuthiwa bangenelwe ngamadoda amahlanu abehlome ngezibhamu ezinkulu ngo-5 ntambama angabuza avele avulela ngenhlamvu ebhekise kuwona wonke umuntu obesendlini.Abasolwa kuthiwa bashaye bachitha nesamba semali esingadalulwanga, bashiya kuleli khaya nasesitolo kumapeketwane.Ngemuva kwesigameko kuthiwa lawa madoda awazange abaleke, avele azihambela kancane kwaba sengathi akukho okubi abakwenzile.Abantu bakule ndawo abakhulume neSolezwe, bacela kugodlwe amagama abo, badalule ukuthi bekungesikhona okukuqala kuhlaselwa lo mndeni.Esigamekweni sokuqala kuthiwa izigilamkhuba zafika ezintathakusa zadubula kodwa akekho owalimala.“Lesi sigameko senzeke ngesikhathi wonke umuntu esabhekile kungakahlwa. Bekungelula ukusondela uyolamula umuntu ohlome ngesibhamu ngoba ubungaze uthole amachaphazelo,’’ kusho ilungu lomphakathi.Omunye uthe bekushubile kangangoba uze wafisa sengathi angamane athathe imithwalo yakhe ahambe kule ndawo.Izolo emini ubuvalwe thaqa umuzi kamufi, kulenga ngidi emnyango njengoba kukhona abantu abathe ubungahlanziwe. Kubikwa ukuthi izingane zikamufi ezimbili ezisinde ngokulambisa, zithathwe yizihlobo.Enye yezingane ezisindile kuthiwa ibiyodlala ibhola, enye akuqondakali ukuthi isinde kanjani njengoba beyikhona ngesikhathi sesigameko.Imizamo yokuxhumana namalungu omndeni kamufi ayiphumelelanga ngoba bekukhala ibhungezi, nomakhelwane belandula bethi kabanazo izinombolo zamalungu omndeni oshonelwe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko, wathi kuvulwe amacala okungelokubulala, awokuzama ukubulala nelokuphanga, aphenywa esiteshini samaphoyisa eMariannhill.
title: Kubulawe usomabhizinisi ehlaselwa kwakhe

text: Kulindeleke ukuthi sikhishwe namuhla isinqumo ecaleni lomlisa oneminyaka engu 30 osolwa ngamacala okudlwengula ayisikhombisa, awokuthumba ayisishiyagalombili namabili okubamba inkunzi ehlomile.UMnuz Mthokozisi Mnyandu waseWyebank, usolwa ngokuthumba, ukudlwengula nokubamba inkunzi ehlomile abesifazane abayisishagalombili ezindaweni ezehlukene okubalwa kuzo eNanda, KwaNdengezi nasePinetown.Abanye balaba besifazane kuvele ukuthi wayebabamba bezihambela bese enza sengathi uyabashela bese eyabathumba ayobadlwengula.Kuvele ukuthi uma benqaba wayebashaya ngezimpama abakhombe nangommese.IJaji uMadam Justice Masipi uthe uMnyandu uwaphikile wonke amacala athweswe wona.Uveze ukuthi laba besifazane abebathumba ebadlwengule bonke babeneminyaka engu-16 abanye beneminyaka engaphansi kwalokhu futhi abanye beseyizintombi nto, bengakaze bazibandakanye ngokocansi.Kuvele ukuthi ummangalelwa ubedlwengula abagilwa ngaphandle kwekhondomu.Kwesinye isehlo, kuthiwa umgilwa wadlwengulwa ummangalelwa nabanye abangani bakhe ababili beshintshana ngaye.Enkantolo kuvele ukuthi ummangalelwa uthi wayethandana nabagilwa futhi babevumelene ngokuthi baye ocansini.Uveze enkantolo ukuthi ulale nabesifazane abaningi kangaka ngoba akakwazi ukulala nomuntu wesifazane kabili.
title: Isigwebo kwawokudlwengula

text: Ukudla abasiphakela khona abasakazi akukho mnandi ikakhulu uhlelo olungena ngo-12-3 nolungena 3-6.USiya Mhlongo luyamhlula noma ezama ngamandla akhe kodwa akulungi uyabonakala ukuthi ugqiba lento yokuthi uke wathanda isonto uzama ngayo yonke indlela ukuthi abengumuntu wezwe nongakaze awungene umnyango wesonto ngenxa yokuzama ukujabulisa abantu.NoSelby akasiphi lutho ngaphandle kokubanga umsindo estudio wena wabona izintombi ziqhumisa uhleko emfuleni.Ayike lolu lwantambama lufile fi kungcono ukuba uMroza ungena yedwa uyabona ukuthi le nsizwa imsebenzisa kanzima kubengathi akanalo ikhono kanti likhulu inkinga ile nsizwa asebenza nayo.Ufike umsakazo wawenza owomphakathi ungathi ulalele umsakazo omncane uze azikhuze umuzwe esethi iGagasi FM. Sicela Ukhozi FM abanye lubafake ebusuku silele ikakhulu uma befika njengayo nje le nsizwa iyalubandisa uhlelo.Okokugcina thina Ukhozi FM sikhule silulalela abaphathi boKhozi asibazi asazi nokuthi bafika nini kusho ukuthi siphethwe abantu abangenawo umlando woKhozi FM yikho bebulala umsakazo.Ukhozi FM lwagcina ukuba nomphathi ovuthiwe ngobaba uBhodloza Nzimande emuva kwalokho alukaze luphinde lulunge.Pastor Goodman NseleMtubatuba
title: [IMIBONO] Sicela uKhozi lubafake ebusuku

text: INTOKAZI yakuleli ezakhele igama yethula izinhlelo zethelevishini, uFarieda Metsileng, iyona ezolingisa indawo ephambili emdlalweni omusha wamahlaya othi uBettina Wethu.Lo mdlalo osuselwe kowamahlaya othi Ugly Betty osungulwe e-USA, uzoqala ngo-Ephreli 5 ngo-7.30 ebusuku ngoMsombuluko kuze kube uLwesithathu.Kulo mdlalo wakuleli kuzobe kukhulunywa izilimi ezihlukene.Abanye abalingisi abamenyezelwe noFarieda kubalwa uZweli Dube, Tsholofelo Mashishi, Linda Jiyane, Coconut Kelz, noZaza Moloi.UTshepiso Sello Phiri onguphrojusa walo mdlalo ngaphansi kwenkampani iKnown Associates Entertainment, uveze ukuthi baqale ukuthungatha abalingisi bawo ngonyaka odlule ngesikhathi sikathaqa ezweni.“Kusithakaselise kakhulu ukuthola izicelo zabalingisi abadumile nabanye abasafika kulo mkhakha. Yingakho kulo mdlalo kuzogqama ubuso obusha nobudala futhi kuzogqama izinhlanga ezihlukene zabantu bakuleli. Ngesikhathi senza inhlolokhono, sathatha abalingisi abaningi ukubheka kahle ithalente nokunika ithuba lomlingisi othi yena akaze abizwe kwinhlolokhono, konke kwahamba kahle njengoba sesilana namhlanje,” kuchaza uTshepiso. Uveze ukuthi isililo esasikhalwa intsha yakuleli ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi  #OpenTheIndustry, basebenze ngaphansi kwaso.“Ngesikhathi senza inhlolokhono asitholanga nje kuphela intsha yakuleli kuphela kodwa neyakwamanye amazwe njengoba konke babekwenza ngobuchwepheshe besimanje. Ubuso obusha kulo mdlalo kuzokwenza abantu bawuthakasele lo mdlalo njengoba ugcwele intsha,“ kuchaza yena.Umphathi weSABC1, uPhumzile Zonke, uthe kuyabathokozisa ukubiza lo mdlalo owabo njengesiteshi.“Indlela lo mdlalo oyiwona kwamina ungimangazile, kusetshenziwe kakhulu kuwona ngesikhathi uqoshwa. Njengenhlangano yezokusakaza enkulu kuleli nase-Afrika, senza okusemandleni ethu ukuletha imidlalo ekhuluma ngento eke yenzeke ngempela kwabanye abantu. Nakulokhu ke kuyisiqalo sezinto ezinkulu esisazozimemezela kubabukeli bethu okukhona kuzo ezobumnandi, ezemfundo nokunye,” kuchaza yena.Abanye babalingisi abakulo mdlalo oMichael Potter ( Brandon Thomas), Elliot Makhubo (Israel Sikhakhane), Mbasa Msongeli (Mpilo Hadebe), Brighton Ngoma (T-Bang Moeketsi), Ayanda Bandla (Lakhe Amon) nabanye.
title: Bethuliwe abalingisi bomdlalo

text:
MALIBONGWE MDLETSHEUPHELE sekukhonjwana ngeminwe emehlweni umcimbi wokwethula i-Under 17 Engen Knockout Challenge ka-2012 obuse-Engen Refinery Sports Complex eWentworth izolo emini.Lolu thuthuva luqutshulwe wukuthi ngesikhathi kuqhathwa amaqembu, abengabonwa nangokhalo amaCherrians angompetha banyakenye nokwethuse abaningi kwazise bekulindeleke ukuba azovikela isicoco sawo kulo nyaka.Ebuzwa ngohlelo olusetshenzisiwe ukuqoka amaqembu azobanga isheke lika-R10 000 elitholwa ngompetha balo mqhudelwano, umqondisi wawo uRonnie Moroka 
(osesithombeni), uthe umyalelo wokushiya ngaphandle amaCherrians uvele neThekwini Central Local Football Association (LFA) okudlala kuyo leli qembu.“Akumina noma AmaZulu anqume ukushiya amaCherrians ngaphandle kodwa yi-LFA okudlala kuyona amaCherrians esinike iqembu elizoyimela kulo nyaka. Thina sizinike ukuthi amaCherrians akhale ngaphansi emidlalweni yawo yokuhlunga iqembu elizowamela kulo nyaka,” kusho uMoroka oyinhloko yenkulisa yoSuthu.AmaZulu yiwona angabadidiyeli balo mqhudelwano KwaZulu-Natal kanti iLamontville Golden Arrows, Maritzburg United neThanda Royal Zulu, edlala okokuqala kulo nyaka, bangene ngoba beyizingqwele zesifundazwe.“Thina (AmaZulu) singene kulo mqhudelwano njengosokhaya, samema i-Arrows, Maritzburg neThanda ngoba sihola nabo ukuthuthukiswa kwebhola esifundazweni. Amanye amaqembu adlale imidlalo yokuhlunga eyenganyelwe ama-LFA awo angaphansi kweSafa eThekwini Region,” kusho uMoroka.Umqeqeshi wamaCherrians, uJoey Labistour, obedinwe egane unwabu ngokushaywa ngesithende kweqembu lakhe elingobhongoza eThekwini kuleli zinga uzwakalise ukuphoxeka.“Sonke lesi sikhathi besazi ukuthi sizoyivikela indebe yethu. Asiyidlalanga ngisho nemidlalo yokuhlunga ngoba sinikwe isiqiniseko sokuthi sizoba khona,” kusho uLabistour.Isikhulu seThekwini Central LFA esizincengele ukuba lingashiwo igama laso sithe: “Siyalelwe ukuba sihlunge amaqembu ngaphandle kwamaCherrians ngoba wona avele azothola ithuba lokuvikela isicoco kodwa kuleli sonto sitshelwe ukuthi ngeke esabakhona.”Ngasekuqaleni kwalo nyaka amaCherrians avakashele e-USA lapho efike aguqisa khona u-Under 17 weGalaxy okugijima kuyona uDavid Beckham.
title: Umsindo kwethulwa i-Under 17 Engen Challenge eKZN

text: KULINDELEKE ukuthi abuyele enkantolo namhlanje owesilisa osolwa ngokudlwengula udadewabo oneminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye namadodakazi abafowabo amabili ebakhokhisa ngokubadlalisa imidlalo kwiselula yakhe.Umsolwa owumfundi oneminyaka ewu-19 ofunda uGrade 11 esikoleni esiseNkandla, kuthiwa uconsisele udadewabo omncane ngamafutha okupheka esithweni sangasese ukuze akwazi ukumdlwengula.Kuthiwa ubemyenga ngokuthi amdlalise imidlalo ekwiselula yakhe, bese ethi akakhokhe ngokuthi avume amgile lo mkhuba.Amanye amantombazane amabili asolwa ngokuwadlwengula aneminyaka ewu-11 no-13.Umzali wenye yala mantombazane utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi isimo simuncu ekhaya njengoba umsolwa kuyingane yomndeni futhi enukubeze izingane zasemndenini.Uthe lezi zingane sisesimeni esingesihle njengoba zingasafuni nokuya esikoleni.Kuvela ukuthi umsolwa ubenesikhathi sonke sokugila le mikhuba njengoba lezi zingane zonke bezihlala nogogo, amanye amalungu omndeni ayasebenza futhi asebenza kude nekhaya.“Ngiqale ukuqaphela ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi ngenkathi ingane yami ingivakashele. Ibinuka iphunga elixakile okungathi elomuntu omdala osewake walala nomuntu wesilisa,” kuchaza unina.Uthe ngenkathi eyibuza indodakazi ukuthi seyake yalala yini nomuntu wesilisa, iqale yaphika kodwa ngokuyihlohla imibuzo nangokuthi ayihlole isitho sayo sangasese, wathola okumjabhisile.“Ngiyibuzile ukuthi ngubani obelala nayo, yathi uyise omncane. Ngiyiyise emaphoyiseni, angiphelezela saya kwadokotela wakuqinisekisa ukuthi idlwenguliwe,” kusho unina.Uthe zonke izingane okusolwa ukuthi bezigilwa wumsolwa, zihloliwe wodokotela kwase kuboshwa leli bhungu lomndeni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kunecala eliphenywa ngamaphoyisa aseShowe.“Kuboshwe umsolwa (19) wabekwa icala lokudlwengula,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Uthe ngesonto eledlule umsolwa uvelile enkantolo, wenqatshelwa ibheyili. Kulindeleke ukuthi aphinde abuye kule nkantolo ngoLwesibili (namhlanje).UMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uthembise ukungenelela kulolu daba oluchaze njengoluhlasimulisayo.Okhulumela lo mnyango, uMnuz Mhlaba Memela, uthe abafuna ukuqala bakuthole wukuthi kwenzeka kanjani ukuthi izingane zihlale nogogo abazali bekhona?Uthe okubalulekile wukuthi uma sebeluphothulile uphenyo, yilona oluzosho ukuthi kumele yini abantwana laba bathathwe bayohlaliswa ezindaweni eziphephile ukuze banakekelwe ngendlela efanele?
title: 'Udlwengule' udadewabo emkhokhisa ngomdlalo

text: SIKHALE ngaphansi isihlabani somculo kamaskandi, uMtshengiseni “Indidane” Gcwensa waMageza Amahle, emqhudelwaneni wezingwazi ezingasekho. Indidane ibiqhathwe noMgqumeni “Ibhova LikaDikadika” Khumalo, Khwelebhasini noMfazomnyama.Abagqugquzeli beMpucuzeko Maskandi Festival ezoba sePeople’s Park (Moses Mabhida Stadium), eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo kusukela ngo-10 ekuseni, bebekhiphe uhlu lwabaculi okufanele bahlonishwe ngozakwabo abasaphila ngalolu suku.Abantu bekufanele bavotele enye yezingoma ezimbili okufanele iculwe ngesinye isihlabani. Ezingomeni obekufanele uKhuzani Mpungose azicule bekukhona eyeThwasa Langempela (elinye igama leNdidane) ethi Shwi Nomtekhala nekaMgqumeni ethi Uthando Aluboni, kwaphumelela ekaMgqumeni ngamaphesenti awu-53 kwawu-47. UNyonemhlophe bekufanele acule ekaMfazomnyama ethi Ngisebenzile Mama noma yaMageza Amahle ethi Ngicela Ningishuthe kwaphumelela ekaMfazomnyama ngamaphesenti awu-70 kwawu-30. Amageza Amahle bekufanele acule eyeNdidane ethi Sishaya Kwasani noma ekaKhwelebhasini ethi Mina Ngistress, kwaphuma phambili ekaKhwelebhasini ngamaphesenti awu-64 kwawu-36.INDIDANEUShwi Nomtekhala bazokhumbula uSandile Mbongwa waMabongwa ngethi Uloliwe, uThokozani Langa uzokhumbula uBhekumuzi Luthuli ngethi Awungisize, uMthandeni “Igcokama Elisha” Manqele uzothulela isigqoko uMgqumeni ngethi Isitolo Sendoda, uKhangelani “DSD” Mhlongo woSaziwayo uzokhumbula uMgqumeni ngethi Isemlenzeni kuthi uJaiva Zimnike ahloniphe uMgqumeni ngethi Sakhala Kamnandi.Umgqugquzeli womcimbi, uXolani Mcineka, uthe unqume ukuhlonipha abangasekho ngokuzwa uvo lwabalandeli balo mculo. Uthe abantu bebevotela ingoma ezinkundleni zokuxhumana nangama-e mail. Amathikithiki akuma-computicket ngoR100 nangoR500.
title: IBhova liqumbe phansi Indidane kokamaskandi

text: ABANJWE oqotsheni epulazini eliseMbumbulu ngaphandle kwaseThekwini, amadoda amathathu abezama ukugqiba isidumbu sowesilisa obulewe. Amaphoyisa aseMid Illovo abophe amadoda amathathu asolwa ngokubulala. Ngokuzwa kweSolezwe umufi kusolwa ukuthi ngowesilisa oneminyaka engu-26 waseHammarsdale.Ngokusho kosondelene nodaba, ocele ukungadalulwa, abasolwa bebehamba ngemoto ebisolisa. Kuthiwa babonakale bengena emobeni, onogada bahlabe umkhosi emaphoyiseni yabe isilandelwa imoto.Abasolwa baficwe emobeni bathe bayazingela. Imoto yabasolwa kuthiwa ibigcwele igazi, abasolwa kuthiwa bathe yigazi lesilwane abebezizingela. Amaphoyisa nonogada ngesikhathi belandelela bathole isidumbu sowesilisa okusolwa ukuthi bebeyomgqiba emobeni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala nelokuthumba, abasolwa bazovela maduze enkantolo.Imizamo yeSolezwe yokuthola imininingwane kamufi ayizange iphumelele.
title: Babanjwe begqiba isidumbu emobeni

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANEY EHLISWE ngo-R9 million imali yesabelo esibhekene nezinhlelo zeSilo samabandla ngenxa yesimo somnotho esingesihle.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uSenzo Mchunu ethula isabelo sehhovisi lakhe esingu-R658.644 million sonyaka ka-2016/2017.Bekuqala ukuthi iSilo siphulelwe isabelo nezinhlelo zaso zeNdlunkulu njengoba eminyakeni edlule besithola imali engaphezulu kuka-R57 million.“Ngemuva kokuhlakazwa koMnyango wezaseNdlunkulu kwasungulwa isikhwama iRoyal Household Trust esasizobhekana nezinhlelo zaseNdlunkulu ngokulekelelwa yihhovisi likaNdunankulu. Ngonyaka zimali ka-2016/17 sizonikeza lesi sikhwama u-R15.167 million ukuze sikwazi ukubhekana nomsebenzi wokulungisa izigodlo, ukunakekelwa kwabantwana ngokwezempilo, ukukhokhelwa kwezidingo zemfundo nokunye,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe njengehhovisi bazibophezele ngokusiza iSilo emicimbini yokugcoba amakhosi ngezinye izinhlelo zokudala ukusebenzisana kuhulumeni.Nokho ihhovisi likaNdunankulu libhekene nengwadla yemali yokulungisa izigodlo. UMchunu uthe lokhu kwenza kube nzima ukuthi benze izigodlo zibe sezingeni elifanele ukuheha izivakashi.Uqhube wathi bazoqala uhlelo oluzosiza ekutheni isikhwama saseNdlunkulu siqoqe imali ezobhekana nezidingo ezifuze lezi zokulungiswa kwezigodlo.UNdunankulu ucacisile ukuthi zonke izinhlelo zehhovisi lakhe zishayekile ngenxa yokwehliswa kwesabelo-mali.Ubuye wakhala ngodlame lwasehostela iGlebelands wathi uzizwa enamahloni ngalo.Umholi weDA esiShayamthetho, uMnuz Sizwe Mchunu uthe bayayibona imisebenzi kaMchunu kodwa inkinga emphazamisayo (uMchunu) ngukulwa abhekene nakho ku-ANC.Uthe nakuba kunjalo kodwa akakhumbule ukuthi yena usebenzela abantu baKwaZulu-Natal okufanele ababeke phambili.UMnuz Blessed Gwala uthe inkinga ihhovisi likaNdunankulu libhekene nombango wamandla okuKhongolose esifundazweni.Uqhube wathi nakuba kunjalo kodwa bayaseseka isabelo asinekele isiShayamthetho.UNkk Makhosi MaNzimande Khoza we-ANC uthe iyamxaka i-IFP ukuthi yini ingayikhulumi indaba yozovala isikhundla sikaMntwana wakwaPhindangene uma esephuma njengoba belibele yi-ANC.UMnuz Makhosini Nkosi we-ANC uxwayise uMchunu weDA wathi akahlukane nezindaba ze-ANC ngoba nabo abakaze bazixake ngaye ngesikhathi ehlulwe engqungqutheleni yaleli qembu eyayiseRichards Bay ngonyaka odlule. Bonke bancome uNdunankulu ngemizamo yakhe yokwenza isifundazwe sibe ngcono nangokunakekela iSilo.
title: Yehliswe ngo-R9m imali eyabelwa iSilo

text: SITHOLWE emgodini ombelwe izigxobo zokubiya, isidumbu sengane okubikwe ukuthi iduke idlala egcekeni.Isidumbu sika-Alwande Mtshali (3) wakwaMteyi eMnambithi, nobegcine ukubonakala ezidlalela egcekeni lakubo ngoMsombuluko emini, sitholakale ngoLwesibili emgodini wesigxobo sokubiya kubo, sivele ngezinyawo.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lithinta umndeni, unina kamufi uNksz Nosipho Zwane obehluleka nawukukhuluma ngenxa yomunyu, uthe bayitholile ingane kodwa ingasiphili wadlulisa ucingo kwelinye ilungu lomndeni.Elandisa ngokwenzekile umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Ngcebo Mtshali, uthe u -Alwande ubesele nomzanyana wakhe ngesikhathi abazali babo besemsebenzini.“Naye umzanyana unengane encane. Ubesafunza ingane yakhe ngesikhathi u -Alwande edlala emnyango. Ungumuntu onomsindo uma edlala, omgadayo usolile ngesikhathi engasawuzwa umsindo wakhe waphuma ukuyobheka kodwa lutho ukumbona,” kusho uMtshali.Uthe bekungabo-11 emini ngesikhathi kuqala ukuthungathwa ingane kodwa lutho ukutholakala, okuthe ngakusasa ekuseni isidumbu sayo satholwa sisemgodini.“Ngendlela umgodi omncane ngawo, bekungeke kube wukuthi uphonsekile kodwa kuyacaca ukuthi ushuthekiwe kuwo. Ngayizolo besibheke kuyo yonke indawo nakuyo imigodi ngoba isobala kodwa asizange simthole, okucacayo ukuthi abantu abathile abangasifuni abenze lesi senzo.”Uveze ukuthi nakuba besola ukuthi yisenzo sabantu abangawufuni lo mndeni, kodwa akekho obamsolayo. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe idokodo lophenyo ngokufa komuntu esiteshini samaphoyisa saseZakheni.“Izimo eziholele kulesi sigameko ziyaphenywa. Ingane ibibikwe ukuthi ilahlekile ngoMsombuluko, yatholwa ishonile ngosuku olulandelayo isemgodini owawumbelwe ukubiya kubo,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Sitholwe emgodini isidumbu sika-Alwande

text: KUFE umhlali waseGlebelands Hostel kwalimala kanzima omunye ngesikhathi bedutshulwa ngamadoda angaziwa erobhothini eliseduze kwaleli hostela.Lesi sigameko senzeke ngabo-8 ngoLwesihlanu ngesikhathi amadoda ahlala eGlebelands ewela umgwaqo emuva kokukhipha imali enxanxatheleni yezitolo.Isishoshovu esilwela umphakathi uNksz Vanessa Burger sithe kusolwa ukuthi amadoda adutshuliwe ebenqaba ukukhokha uR80 oqoqelwa ukukhokhela abameli bamadoda ayisishiyagalombili azovela eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu namuhla ngamacala ahlukene athinta ukubulawa kwabahlali baseGlebelands.UColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe amaphoyisa aseMlaza aphenya icala lokubulala nelokuzama ukubulala emuva kokudutshulwa kwamadoda amabili esemarobhothini.Uthe eyodwa eneminyaka ewu-30 ishonele endaweni yesigameko kwathi enye yaphuthunyiswa esibhedlela ilimele.Ukugcizelele ukuthi lesi sigameko asenzekanga emagcekeni aseGlebelands Hostel.Namhlanje kulindele ukuthi kuqalwe ukuqulwa kwecala loDetective Sergeant Bhekukwazi Louis Mdweshu, oMnuz Khanyelihle Mroza Mbuthuza, Vukani Manenze Mcobothi, Eugene Wonderboy Hlophe, Mbuyiselwa Mkhize noNcomekile Matlala Ntshangase.Bazobe behamba nabanye ababehlala eGlebelands oMnuz Mondli Thalente Mthethwa noBongani Mbhele.Abamangalelwa babhekene namacala okushushumbisa imali, awokubulala, awokuzama ukubulala, awokuqola abantu imali nawokutholakala nezibhamu nezinhlamvu ezingavumelekile okungekho emthethweni.UNksz Burger ucele amaphoyisa ukuthi aqinise ezokuphepha eGlebelands nasenkantolo enkulu ngoba njalo uma kuzoyiwa enkantolo abahlali baseGlebelands bafunwa imali ngenkani.Uthe kulindeleke ukuthi kubizwe ofakazi abawu-107 okufanele bavikelwe ngoba impilo yawo wonke umuntu othinteka kuleli cala isengcupheni.Ubuye waveza ukuthi kwakunezinhlelo zokubulala umshushisi wecala * -Advocate Dorian Paver okwaphoqeleka ukuthi anikwe onogada.Uthe imali iqoqwa ngezindlela ezihlukene manje kubantu ngoba kuthunyelelwa umuntu othile incwadi ukuthi aqoqe oR80 kubantu ahlala nabo.Uma eseyiqoqile kufika umuntu ongaziwa azothatha imali ngosuku olusuke lunqunyiwe.Kuthiwa ngisho abantu abahlala emijondolo eseduze kwaseGlebelands bayacelwa ukuthi bakhokhe imali.
title: Ingebhe ngodlame lwaseGlebe

text: UZOFAKA isicelo sebheyili ngoLwesibili owayenguNobhala we-ANC esifundeni iGeneral Gizenga Mpanza eyayaziwa ngeKwaDukuza, uMusa Zondi emuva kokuphumelela kwesicelo sakhe sokudlulisa icala.NgoLwesine, eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini bekugcwele abebefake izikibha ze-ANC, imindeni nezihlobo zabane abafake isicelo sokudluliselwa kwesinqumo nesigwebo secala lokubulala umuntu.Inkantolo isivumile isicelo soNoh Zondi, Mzwandile Chamane, Musa Khumalo noMusa Zondi.Icala selizolalelwa ngamajaji amathathu, okuyiwona azothatha isinqumo.UZondi nagwetshwe nabo babhekene necala lokubulala uMnuz Thandanani Moyane.Batholwa benecala eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ngenyanga edlule, bagwetshwa ekuqaleni kwale nyanga ngokuhlukana.UZondi wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-26 ngamacala.Izolo ijaji uNkosinathi Chili likhiphe isinqumo sokuba uZondi aliqhube icala kwenye inkantolo.“Ummangalelwa wesikhombisa (uZondi) ngiyamnikeza imvume ukuba alidlulisele kwenye inkantolo icala mayelana nokulahlwa kwakhe icala, nokugwetshwa kwakhe kuwo wonke amacala.“Laba abanye abathathu nabo ngibanikeza imvume yokulidlulisa icala, ukulahlwa icala nokugwetshwa kodwa lokhu kuzoba emacaleni amathathu, kwelokubulala nawokuzama ukubulala amabili. Ecaleni lesine nelesihlanu, okuthumba kungadluliswa isigwebo kuphela,” kusho uChili.Icala libe selihlehliselwa uLwesibili khona eThekwini ukuze bezofaka isicelo sebheyili njengoba bese bevele beziqalile izigwebo zabo.Lesi sikhulu nabayisithupha bavulelwa icala lokubulala nelokuthumba nelokushaya, elenzeka ngo-2015 kulandela ukungena kwabantu ebhizinisini lomndeni.
title: Bavunyelwe ukwedlulisa icala ababoshwa nesikhulu sikaKhongolose

text: IZIHLATHI zizovakashela izindlebe kubashayeli bezimoto kwazise uphethroli uzokwehla ngo-14 cents ilitha ngoJanuwari.Udizili uzonyuka ngo-9 cents ilitha.Upharafini uzonyuka ngo-5 cents ilitha ngokusho kwaboMnyango wezaMandla.Lezi zindaba zimenyezelwe ngoMgqibelo, aboMnyango wezaMandla bathe uphethroli wehliswa yizigameko ezenzeka ezimakethe zomhlaba nokudlondlobala kweRandi uma liqhathaniswa neDollar lase-United States.USolwazi Bonke Dumisa oyisazi somnotho nezomthetho uthe iRandi likhombisa ukudlondlobala uma liqhathaniswa nesimo ebelikulo ezinyangeni ezintathu ezidlule.Uthe yizindaba ezinhle lezi ngoba zisho ukuthi uhwebo luzohamba kahle eNingizimu Afrika.Mayelana nokwehla kukaphethroli uDumisa uthe kuzokwehla umthwalo kubashayeli bezimoto ezithela uphethroli ngoba ubunyuke ngo-22 cents ngoDisemba kodwa udizili wehla ngo-15 cents.Upharafini wona ubuwehle ngo-24 cents.Khonamanjalo uMnuz Neil Roets oyisikhulu esiphezulu senkampani esiza abanezikweletu iDebt Rescue ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi bangakhithizi izinto ezingenasidingo njengoba sekuphela amahholidi.Uthe abantu abakhumbule ukuthi uJanuwari ukhona kusafanele bakhokhele izingane imali yesikole nabo babuyele emsebenzini, abanye bazodinga imali kaphethroli noma imali yokugibela uma bengenazo izimoto.
title: Bazohleka bodwa abashayeli kwehla uphethroli

text: UMNYANGO wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana KwaZulu-Natal unxuse umphakathi ukuthi uqaphele ngemva kwesexwayiso esikhishwe ngabeSouth African Weather Service ngesimo sezulu esingesihle, esihambisana namakhaza ashubisa umnkantsha nezikhukhula esifundazweni, kuleli sonto.Umnyango uthe ithimba lababhekele izinhlekelele lizotshalwa kuyo yonke imizila yesifundazwe ezindaweni ezaziwa njengezisethubeni lokukhahlanyezwa yilesi simo, ngenhloso yokuqapha.UNgqongqoshe womnyango uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka unxuse amalungu omphakathi ukuthi aqaphele uma kukhona uhambo aluthathayo.“Sinxusa amalungu omphakathi kulezo zindawo ezingase zihlaselwe yiqhwa ukuthi aqaphele futhi ahlehlise uhambo olungabalulekile,” kusho uHlomuka.AbeSouth African Weather Service  bakhiphe isexwayiso  ngamakhaza angabekezeleki kuleli sonto ngenxa yeqhwa elihlasele ezintabeni zoKhahlamba nezindawo ezakhele lezi zintaba, okubalwa kuzo iKokstad nase-Underberg.Umnyango uthi lesi simo singaholela ekuphazamisekeni kokuhamba kwezimoto nokuvalwa kwemigwaqo kulezi zindawo.Izindawo okulindeleke ukuthi zikhahlanyezwe yizikhukhula ngezakhele uMasipala waseMkhanyakude, owaseZululand noMasipala waseKing Cetshwayo.Kusuka ngoLwesibili bese imigwaqo imihlophe yiqhwa kwezinye izingxenye zesifundazwe. Ungqongqoshe wezokuThutha ukuPhepha nokuXhunmana koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Peggy Nkonyeni unxuse abashayeli ukuthi baqaphele. “Sesithole imibiko eveza ukuthi eminye imigwaqo namabbhuloho  kwabanye omasipala kugeleza izikhukhula. Sinamathimba atshalwe emigwaqeni ukuqapha isimo amahora angu- 24 alawula ukuhamba kwezimoto lapho kuhlasele khona lesi simo sezulu ikkhul ezindaweni eziphansi ezingase zikhahlanyezwe izikhukhula,”  kusho uNkonyeni.Uthe kuzojutshwa ithimba elizohlola umonakalo  odalwe yilesi simo lishicilele umbiko uma lesi simo sesidlulile.
title: Isexwayiso ngezikhukhula namakhaza ashubile

text: LOWO owayenguMengameli wase-United States uMnuz Barack Obama ukhala ngokuthi lusadla lubi ubandlululo lapha eNingizimu Afrika naseMelika.Ekhuluma ngesikhathi ethula isifundo ngomengameli wokuqala wentando yeningi kuleli uDkt Nelson Mandela eGoli izolo, u-Obama uthe akekho umuntu owazalelwa ukuthi azonde abanye abantu bezinye izinhlanga."Uthando luyimvelo, kumele singabantu sibe nothando ukuze sikwazi ukuhlalisana kahle singacwasani," kusho u-Obama.Uthe uMandela wabafundisa ukuthi ukuze intando yeningi yenzeke kahle, kumele abantu bakwazi ukuxoxisana ngisho nabantu abanemibono ehlukile kweyabo."Okunye asifundisa kona ukuthi intando yeningi ingaphezulu ngisho kokhetho," kusho u-Obama.Uthe intando yeningi ibafundisa ukuthi kumele basondelane kakhulu nomphakathi.Inkulumo eyethulwe u-Obama ngoLwesibili izokwandulela eminye imigubho ethinta usuku lokubungazwa kukaMandela emhlabeni. Ngezansi izithombe ebeziphambili namhlanje esithinta le migubho:UMHOLI we-IFP iNkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi noPenuel Nkosi waseMafu Secondary School beshutha isithombe ndawonye eDelta Park lapho inhlangano yabadala itshale izihlahla eziwu-100 njengendlela yokugubha iminyaka engu-100 azalwa. Isithombe: Nokuthula Mbatha/African News Agency/ANAISILO Samabandla uGoodwill Zwelithini obeyingxenye yezicukuthwane ebezihambele inkuluma kaMnuz Barack Obama eGoli. Isithombe: Reuters/Siphiwe SibekoOWAYENGUMENGAMELI wase-United States uMnuz Barack Obama ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yakhe eceleni kukaMnuz Patric Motsepe ngoLwesibili kwi-16th Annual Nelson Mandela Lecture eWanderers Stadium eGoli. Isithombe: AP Photo/Themba HadebeUGRACA Machel, oyinkosikazi kaNelson Mandela ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yakhe ngoLwesibili eWanderers Stadium, eGoli, kwi-16th Annual Nelson Mandela Lecture ebiyethulwa ngowayengumengameli wase-United States uBarack Obama. Isithombe: AP Photo/Themba HadebeOWAYENGUMENGAMELI wase-United States uMnuz Barack Obama ebingelela inkosikazi kaDkt Nelson Mandela, uNkk Graca Machel, lapho abezothula inkulumo ngaleli qhawe laseNingizimu Afrika eWanderers Stadium, eGoli. Eceleni kwabo ngumengameli Cyril Ramaphosa. Isithombe: Reuters/Siphiwe SibekoUMNTWANA uHarry nenkosikazi yakhe uMeghan basendlunkulu yase-United Kingdom abebevakashele umbukiso obuseNelson Mandela Centenary Exhibition, eSouthbank Centre's Queen Elizabeth Hall eLondon. Isithombe: REUTERSOwesilisa ubuka uhlelo losuku lapho obekuzokhuluma khona owayengumengameli wase-U.S uBarack Obama. Isithombe: REUTERS
title: IZITHOMBE: isiqalile imigubho yokubungaza usuku lukaMandela

text: KUSHAQEKE abazalwane kwaphazamiseka inkonzo isikhathi esingangehora ngesikhathi umfundisi eveza ukuthi usebenzisa inkosazane yasemanzini, okuyisilwane sasemanzini okunenkolelo yokuthi simise okwentokazi ngasenhla nenhlanzi ngezansi.Odalule lezi zindaba ezishiye abazalwane bekhexile, uMfundisi Bongani Gumede (31) webandla Ubizo International Church.Ubekhuluma ngempelasonto kwindumezulu yenkonzo kaJulayi yaleli bandla ebibanjelwe etendeni ebeligxunyekwe KwaMakhutha.UGumede uthe lena yimfihlo emayelana nenhlanhla yakhe. Uthe le nhlanhla uyilanda emfuleni ongaseRiverside eMzimkhulu lapho kuhlala khona lesi silwane, yize yena edabuka endaweni yaseKorinte. Uthe izinkumbi zabantu abathutheleka masonto onke kuleli bandla, umcebo wakhe, yimfuyo egcwele isibaya, yizimoto zikanokusho nemizi yakhe, konke lokhu kungamandla ale nkosazane yasemanzini.UGumede waziwa nayingane encane eMzimkhulu ngenxa yamagalelo akhe ekwelapheni nasekusizeni abantu abahlwempu. Uthe waqala ukuxhumana nalesi silwane esafunda ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi.“Ngangineminyaka engu-11. Ngangivamise ukuphuma esikoleni ngiqonde kulesi siziba ngiyoxhumana nenkosazane. Abantu babexakeka ukuthi yini lena engivamise ukukhuluma nayo kulo mfula kanti yile nkosazane. Ekhaya baze bayohlola komunye umthandazi wakwaDlamini, wafike wabatshela ukuthi mina ngizokwelapha abantu ngenxa yamandla enginawo,” usho kanje.Uthe nasesikoleni washiya kwaGrade 11. “Nakhona ngangifinyelele kanzima kuwo ngenxa yalo lolu bizo.”Ngokwakhe, baningi abantu asebasizile ngenxa yamandla awathola kulesi silwane.“Kunenqwaba yabefundisi abaziwayo abeza kumina ukuba ngibayise kwinkosazane ukuze ibandisele abazalwane. Nezikhulu zamaqembu ebhola zifika zidedelana. Abanye bayaba nenhlanhla yokuzikhulumela nenkosazane noma kube yimi obakhulumelayo,” echaza.Nakuba Isolezwe ngoMgqibelo belizifikele mathupha kule nkonzo kodwa lithe uma lithinta lo mfundisi ngemuva kwenkonzo, wakuqinisekisa ukuthi abekusho bekuyiqiniso.“Yona inkonzo ike yama ihora lonke kodwa ngiyazi abathukile yilabo ebebeqala ukuza enkonzweni yami.”NangoLwesine uthe abantu bebesaqhubeka nokuhambela emfuleni. “Ngikhuluma nje kunabantu abangaphezu kuka-200 abavela ngisho nasemazweni angaphandle.”UGumede ugonyuluka ngalolu daba nje, kuhlaluka ukuthi kukaningi abantu bakule ndawo bemsola ngokuthi uthwele okuyinto ayiphikayo.“Mina angithwele, phela umuntu othwele kuyafiwa kwakhe. Mina akukaze kufiwe lapha ekhaya, izingane zami zonke zisaphila. Le nkosazane nje yenza izinto zenzeke ngaphandle kokubulala abantu,” usho kanje.Kubazalwane abakhulume naleli phephandaba, abanye bathe yize beshaqekile kodwa basazobambelela kuGumede ngenxa yokuthi kunemindeni ayondlayo nezingane azifundisa ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.
title: Umfundisi othi unesilwane senhlanhla

text: IZONXESHEZELWE ngo-R1.2 million imindeni yeziguli ezibalelwa ku-144 ezashona ngesikhathi uMnyango wezeMpilo eGauteng, ususa iziguli esikhungweni sezempilo, iLife Esidimeni, ziyobekwa ezikhungweni ezingenzi nzuzo. Lokhu kumenyezelwe izolo ngowayeyiPhini leNhloko yamaJaji osewathatha umhlalaphansi, uJaji Dikgang Moseneke, obewusihlalo weKhomishini ebiphenya ngale nhlekelele eyenzeke ngonyaka ka-2016."Uhulumeni kumele ukhokhe uR20 000 wezindleko zomngcwabo, uR180 000 wokwethuka nokuphatheka kabi kwemindeni emoyeni, kanye noR1 million wokwephulwa komthetho owengamela ukunakekelwa kwabagula ngokomqondo," kusho uMoseneke ngesikhathi ethula umbiko wale khomishini. UMoseneke wethule lo mbiko ngemuva kwezinyanga le khomishini iqhubeka. Kuyo amalungu emndeni aphawula ngokuthuthwa kwezihlobo ngamaloli ziboshiswe 'okwezinkomo'. Iningi leziguli kuthiwa zabulawa yindlala, ukoma, amakhaza kanye nokunganakwa kulezi zikhungo. Kunemibiko yokuthi ezinye zeziguli, isibalo sazo esingaqinisekisiwe, azikatholwa ukuthi zikuphi. Kwikhomishana kuphekwe ngemibuzo izikhulu zikahulumeni okubalwa kuzo uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi olwamushiya egcwele izinyembezi emehlweni lolu daba wathi lumkhumbuza izinsuku zobandlululo kuleli. OWAYEYIPHINI leNhloko yamaJaji osewathatha umhlalaphansi, uJaji Dikgang Moseneke, obewusihlalo weKhomishini ebiphenya ngale nhlekelele eyenzeke ngonyaka ka-2016. Isithombe: SIMPHIWE MBOKAZIKwaphinde kwabizwa nowayengungqongqoshe wezeMpilo eGauteng ngesikhathi senhlekelele, uNkk Qedani Mahlangu, okwasekuphele izinyanga ebizelwa esigcawini sekhomishini kodwa engalubhadi. Ngesikhathi ephekwa ngemibuzo uMahlangu wakuchitha ukuthi kwaba yisinqumo sakhe yedwa ukuthuthwa kweziguli. Uthe kubantu abathatha leso sinqumo kubalwa owayeyiNhloko yoMnyango uDkt Tiego Selebano, nobeyiNhloko yegatsha elibhekela abagula ngokomqondo uDkt Makgabo Manamela, nabo abasebevelile kwikhomishini basola yena ngokuba ngubhongoza wohlelo. "Ukufa nokuhlukmezeka kwalabo abashona kwenzeka ngenxa yokuxhashazwa kwamandla emphakathini," kuphetha uMoseneke.
title: Basulwe izinyembezi abe-Life Esidimeni

text: IZIKHULU zoMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal ezithinteka embikweni wenkohlakalo yezigidi zamaRandi ekuthengweni kwezinsiza zokulwa nokusabalala kobhubhane iCorona, azikaqondiswa namanje ubugwegwe.Lezi zikhulu ezamiswa emsebenzini ngo-Agasti, ziyaqhubeka nokuhola zihleli emakhaya njengoba umnyango ungakaluqali uhlelo lokuziqondisa ubugwegwe.Lokhu kuhlaluke ngesikhathi umnyango uvele phambi kwekomiti elibhekelele ukusetshenziswa kwemali yomphakathi, iStanding Committee on Public Accounts (Scopa), esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, izolo.Lezi zikhulu zamiswa emsebenzini emuva kombiko owathola ukuthi kwaba nenkohlakalo ekusetshenzisweni kwezigidi zamaRandi ekwakufanele kuthengwe ngazo izinsiza zokuvikela lolu bhubhane.Abaningi bashaya amakhala ngesikhathi kuvela ukuthi lo mnyango wasebenzisa uR22 million ukuthenga izingubo zokulala ezingu-48 000 ezazizonikezwa labo abangenamakhaya ngesikhathi sikathaqa.Umbiko wathola ukuthi iningi lalezi ngubo zagcina ngokuduva emahhovisi omnyango njengoba zathengwa ngaphandle kokwenza ucwaningo lokuthi zizosatshalaliswa kanjani.Kwabe sekumiswa emsebenzini izikhulu zomnyango ezingu-13 ezithintekayo kule nkohlakalo.Inhloko yomnyango, uNkk Nelisiwe Vilakazi, utshele amalungu ekomiti izolo ukuthi zonke lezi zikhulu ezisamisiwe emsebenzini bezingakaze zivele phambi kwekomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe.“Sesiqedile ukwenza uphenyo. Seluzoqala uhlelo lokuqondisa abantu ubugwegwe. Ngesonto elizayo bakhona abazovela phambi kwekomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe.”Uveze ukuthi lezi zikhulu zibhekene nenqwaba yamacala njengoba ethe esinye sazo sibhekene namacala angu-40.Ababili balabo abathintekayo angeke babhekane nekomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe njengebo omunye wesula ngaphambi kokuthi kuphothulwe umbiko kanti omunye washona.Amalungu eScopa akugxekile ukuthatha isikhathi eside ukuthi lezi zikhulu zivele phambi kwekomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe.Ilungu leScopa uMnuz Sipho “KK” Nkosi, uthe okukhathazayo kakhulu ukuthi izikhulu lezi ziyaqhubeka nokuhola imiholo ephelele nakuba zihlezi emakhaya.“Sekunesikhathi eside zamiswa emsebenzini. Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sibone kukhona abantu abaxoshwayo.”Elinye ilungu leScopa, uMnuz Francois Rodgers, lithe lesabela ukuthi kukhona ezinye izikhulu ezingagcina zisulile ngaphambi kokuthi ziqondiswe ubugwegwe.“Sesike sayibona le bhayisikobho ngaphambilini. Uma sekuqala ukushisa exhibeni, ilapho kwanda khona izikhulu ezesulayo emsebenzini.”
title: Azikaqondiswa ubugwegwe izikhulu ezamiselwa inkohlakalo

text: UFezile akagcini ngokwethula lolu hlelo olungena ngo-6 ntambama ngoMgqibelo kodwa uphinde abe ngudokotela.Unqobe umncintiswano uMr World South Africa wazibekisela indawo kowomhlaba jikelele.UFezile udle umhlanganiso emncintiswaneni oyingxenye kaMr World, iTop Sportsman wathola indawo kwiTop 12.Umncintiswano ubuseManila, enhlokodolobha yasePhilippines. Bebenziswa imidlalo ehlukene njengokugijima, ukubhukuda nokunye. Bebonke abangenele bangu-40 kanti bavela emazweni ahlukene okubalwa kuwoi-Angola, Argentina, Botswana, Cameroon, China, England, Ghana namanye.UFezile uthe ujabule ngokunqoba kwiSports Challenge.“Kusicabele indlela yokungena kwiTop 12 nokungokokuqala eNingizimu Afrika kusuka ngo-2007,” kusho uFezile ekhasini lakhe le-Instagram.Unxuse abantu ukuthi bafake i-app iMobStar kumaselula abo ukuze bamvotele.Umcimbi wokukhetha uMr World uzoba ngo-Agasti 23 eSmart Araneta Coliseum, ePhilippines. Izinsizwa zizobe zibanga isicoco esiphethwe nguRohit Khandelwal wase-India osithathe ngonyaka odlule.Umcimbi uzosakazwa bukhoma emhlabeni jikelelekwi-website yale miklomelo.
title: OweTop Billing kwabaphambili kuMr World

text: BAWINILE NGCOBOU GCINE isithembiso asenze ekuqaleni konyaka odlule uMengameli Jacob Zuma izolo enika ibandla lamaRoma isheke lika-R500 000 okuyimali yokuhumusha kabusha iBhayibheli ngesiZulu.UZuma uye eSt Josephs Cathedral eMariannhill kwisiFundabhishobhi iMariannhill izolo lapho inhlangano yakhe esiza umphakathi iJG Zuma Foundation inikele ngaleli sheke.Imali izosetshenziselwa ukuhumusha kabusha iBhayibheli liye olimini lwesiZulu esiqondile.Uthe baningi abantu abakhuluma isiZulu kodwa alikho iBhayibheli elihunyushwe ngolimi lwabo ngendlela eyiyo.UZuma uthe bafuna iBhayibheli elizohunyushwa lisuka ezilimini elalibhalwe ngazo okubalwa isiGreek nesiHebheru hhayi elisuka esiNgisini.“Lokhu sikwenza ngoba sinothando ngoba sikholwa, asikwenzi ngenxa yezinye izizathu. Sinesifiso sokuthi isizwe sikaNkulunkulu sikholwe kungekho okunye,” kusho uZuma.Uthe benza lesi sithembiso besuswa wukuba nogqozi lokuthi kube namaBhayibheli abhalwe ngesiZulu ngqo.“AmaBhayibheli ahunyushelwe esiNgisini angaphezulu kweshumi. Ngeshwa esiZulwini linye vo yize bebaningi abantu abakhuluma isiZulu okwedlula isiNgisi kwelakuleli,” kusho uZuma.Uthe lo msebenzi obalulekile usuyasetshenzwa kanti uhambisana nomthetho omusha kahulumeni othi zonke izilimi kumele zihlonishwe futhi ziqhakanjiswe, zithandwe, zisetshenziswe.“Iminyango kumele kube nezilimi ezozisebenzisa noma kube isiTswana, isiXhosa noma isiZulu. Ngilindele ukuthi yonke iminyango inike uNgqongqoshe wamaSiko izethulo zokuthi yini ezoyenza,” kusho uZuma.Uthe izilimi ezikhona ziwu-11 kodwa ezinye azinakiwe.“Siyazibophezela kulo msebenzi wokuhumusha iBhayibheli ngolimi lwesiZulu oluchaza ulimi ngokujulile. Ngiyazi kunethimba ebelithunyelwe ukuyofunda izilimi okwakubhalwe ngazo iBhayibheli eselibuyile elikhuluma lezo zilimi. Lizosiza ngokuhumusha,” kusho uZuma.Ithimba elizohumusha lizolekelelana nezazi zolimi lwesiZulu namasiko.UMbhishobhi wamaRoma uMlungisi Dlungwana uthe babonga kakhulu kuZuma neJG Zuma Foundation.“Abantu abakhuluma isiZulu banelungelo lokuzwa izindaba zikaNkulunkulu ngendlela akhuluma ngayo. Mukhulu lo msebenzi,” kusho uDlungwana.Uthe kunethimba labahlanu elisebenza ngokugcwele ukwenza lo msebenzi okubalwa izindela ezine zaseMontebello nomfundisi oyedwa.“ITestamente elisha bese lihunyushiwe kwatholakala ukuthi kunamaphuthana amancane kodwa aselungisiwe. Njengamanje seziqaliwe ukuhunyushwa izincwadi ezinhlanu zokuqala kwiTestamente elidala,” kusho uDlungwana.Ubonge uhulumeni ngokuthatha izintambo ngokugcwele esibhedlela eSt Mary’s emuva kokuba nezinkinga ezaphazamisa nokusebenza.
title: UkwelamaRoma oka-R500 000

text: IMENENJA yeKaizer Chiefs, uBobby Motaung, ivumelana nosanda kusula isigubhukane ekucijeni leli qembu, uSteve Komphela, ngokuthi akahlulekanga kuMakhosi kodwa “yizimo” eziphoqe ukuthi esule ngo-Ephreli 21.Lokhu kuvele izolo kwiFresh Breakfast eshayelwa nguDJ Fresh, Somizi noNOMALUNGELO MABOI kuMetro FM ngo- 5-9 ekuseni.Omunye umlaleli ngokukaFresh usole kwiTwitter, uKomphela ngokucasha ngesithupha ekutheni wehlulekile kwiChiefs, aqophe kuyo umlando omubi eba ngumqeqeshi wokuqala emlandweni wayo ukuqeda amasizini amathathu elandelana engakaze anqobe sicoco.“ENingizimu Afrika abantu bafuna ama-2 minutes noodles. Abayifuni into eyakhiwayo,” kusho uKomphela. “Angihlulekanga kwiChiefs. Uma kuthiwa zibekisele indawo kuma-Olympics, ama-All Africa Games, bumba abadlali abazobizwa kwiBafana Bafana bese uzuza okubili, uzokubiza lokho ngokwehluleka uma kungukuthi amaphupho akho antweza emkhathini. Ebholeni kwahlulelwa ngezicoco, kulungile-ke, yilokho kuphela engingakuzuzanga. Ngiyakwamukela lokho. Mina angisiye umuntu ocasha ngesithupha, ngiyakwamukela. Ngamukela ngisho amaqiniso ababayo. Ukwamukela yisigaba sokuqala sokulungisa izinkinga. Uma ungamukeli, uyocwila unomphela.”UKomphela usho kanjena nje ushiye efake * -R13.1 million kwiChiefs uma kubalwa imihlomulo yokuphuma kuma-semi final, ukuhlulwa kweyamanqamu nokunye njengokuqeda kwi-top 4 kwiligi. “USteve yindoda ongayethemba. Ngeshwa nje umqeqeshi wahlulelwa ngezicoco nokuyinto uSteve angaphumelelanga ukuyinqoba. Iqiniso kodwa wukuthi wenze umsebenzi oncomekayo uma ubheka ikusasa leqembu, ukukhushulwa kwabadlali abasebancane, ukubunjwa kweqembu nokuphathwa kwebhola kwiKaizer Chiefs. Abantu abazukukubona lokhu manje kodwa usishiye neqembu elizokwenza kahle iminyaka emihlanu ilandelana. Sizomqasha omunye umqeqeshi nabanye abadlali kodwa bazobe bakhela esizeni nasemsizilweni oshiywe nguSteve,” kusho uMotaung.Mayelana nokuhlukana noKomphela eMoses Mabhida Stadium, uthe: “Okwenzeka eThekwini kwakungamukelekile. Kwakumele senze okuthile ngokushesha ngokucabangela ukuphepha kwabadlali, umqeqeshi, abalandeli nathi uqobo. Kwakungekho esasisangakwenza. Kwakumele siphendulo isililo sabalandeli.”UKomphela uphinde waveza ukuthi ubhala incwadi ekhuluma ngokubhekana nobunzima ngoba yinto ayaziyo.Kulolu hlelo kuvele nokuthi uKomphela uke wasebenza epulazini, emayini, waba nguthisha wesayensi ePJ Simelane -eDobsonville naseQwaqwa, waqhubeka waba ngumdlali webhola kanjalo nencushe emkhakheni we-philosophy njengoba esaziwa ngokuba ngumqeqeshi.Efunda isahluko sesithathu sencwadi yakhe ucaphune lapho ekhuluma khona ngemithangala ebekelwa abantu abamnyama ukuba baphoseke kuyo njalo nxashana benikwa ithuba elikhulu lokuzibonakalisa.Akaphumanga nampendulo ephathekayo ngokuthi useke wakucabanga yini ukungena emkhakheni wezinkulumo ezakhayo. “Ngihamba sengibheke eTurkey ngayivala i-account yasebhange ngalinika umama ibhuku lakhona ngayoqala phansi eTurkey,” kusho uKomphela.
title: USteve Komphela yindoda ongayethemba - Motaung

text: OBENGUMSAKAZI weVuma FM kodwa osezothula uhlelo lwethelevishini, uJacinta Ngobese, uthi bekuhlezi kuyisifiso sakhe ukwethula izinhlelo kwiTV ngangokuthi akakakholwa namanje ukuthi selifezekile iphupho lakhe.UJacinta uzoba ngumethuli wohlelo oluthungatha intsha efuna ukucula umculo wokholo, iSA Gospel Top Stars. Uhlelo luzoqala maduze esiteshini esikhonjiswa kuDStv i-1 Gospel (channel 331).UJacinta uthe yize ukusakaza kuyinto ayithanda kakhulu kunokwethula izinhlelo kodwa ithuba elifana naleli ubengeke aliyeke.“Bekuyisifiso sami ukuthola ithuba elifana naleli kodwa kuthe selifikile ngashaywa wuvalo. Ngizwe ngocingo, angazi nokuthi abaphathi bohlelo bangazelaphi kodwa bangitshela ukuthi akekho omunye abamfunayo ngaphandle kwami.”Uthe abantu bebehlezi bemtshela ukuthi angenza umsebenzi omuhle phambi kwekhamera kodwa angakukholwa ngoba engumuntu ozifela ngokuba wumethuli wezinhlelo zomsakazo.“Ngicabanga ukuthi ithuba lifike ngesikhathi esikahle empilweni yami nami ngifuna ukuqala izinto ezintsha. Angikaze ngilwethule uhlelo bukhoma kuthelevishini kodwa konke kunesiqalo sakho,” kusho uJacinta.Uthe ukuhlangana nentsha yaseThekwini ebizokwenza inhlolokhono ngempelasonto kumfundise izinto eziningi naye abengazazi ezithinta umculo.“Ithalente litholakala ngemuva kokuthi lo ozama inhlanhla enze izinto eziningi. Ngibheke phambili manje ekwenzeni izinto ezehlukene kuthelevishini, njengoba sengiqalile ngiyathemba ukuthi akukho okuzongidonsela emuva ngoba umkhakha esikuwo ukhula usuku nosuku,” kuchaza yena.Uthe uma kungaqhamuka ithuba emsakazweni angalithatha njengoba nawo engawuyekile.KwiSA Gospel Top Stars uthe oyedwa oyodla umhlanganiso uyozihambela nemiklomelo okukhona kuyo imoto uR200 000 ewukheshi, inkontileka yokuqopha umculo neminye imiklomelo.
title: Kufezeke iphupho lomsakazi

text: KUPHITHENE ikhanda kumqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns uPitso Mosimane oveze ukuthi umgadli omusha uMauricio Affonso othunukale ejimini, usazohlala isikhathi engalithinti ibhola. Ukulimala kwalo mgadli kuzokwenza ukuthi alinde esinye isikhathi ngaphambi kokuthi abonakale okokuqala eqenjini leSundowns elivikela isicoco seligi. Ukwehlelwa umshophi wokulimala kuzohlala kabi kulomdlali obese kusele kancane ukuthi alulame ngokugcwele kwazise nesikhala sabagadli sivulekile selokhu kubolekiswe uJeremy ‘Sniper’ Brockie kwiMaritzburg United. U-Affonso, ongowokudabuka e-Uruguay, walimala eqakaleni ngesikhathi iDowns isaziqeqeshela ukuqala kwesizini ka-2019/20 ekhempini eyayibanjelwe eMbombela ngoJulayi.UMosimane ukuqinisekisile ukuthi lomgadli usephinde wathinteka eqakaleni. “Usephinde walimala futhi u-Affonso. Uthinteke eqakaleni futhi, kunzima ukuthi ngikholwe. Sekumele aqale phansi," kusho uPitso. UMosimane ubeseke watshela abezindaba ukuthi lomgadli akasabuzwa ubuhlungu eqakaleni, okuyinkulumo eyenza abalandeli bemlindele ngabomvu lomdlali. Lomgadli ubehambe neqembu elishaye iBloemfontein Celtic ngo 2-1 emdlalweni weligi ngesonto eledlule, kodwa ubengekho ohlwini lwabadlali abangu-18 abekade bezosetshenziswa uMosimane kulomdlalo. U-Affonso uzojoyina abanye abadlali beDowns abalimele okubalwa kubo uThapelo Morena, Phakamani Mahlambi, Anthony Laffor, Rivaldo Coetzee, Keletso Makgalwa noRicardo Nascimento. Iqembu likaPitso seliyaziwa ngokuthenga izibabuli zabadlali baseSouth America okukhona kubo izethenjwa uGaston Sirino noRicardo Nascimento abasuka e-Uruguay naseBrazil ngokwehlukana kwamazwe. IDowns seyike yadlalelwa umgadli uLeonardo Castro waseColombia osegijima kwiKaizer Chiefs kanye noJose Ali Meza osedlalela iMaritzburg United.IDowns isiqinisekise ukuthi izobhekisa mabombo eSeychelles ngoLwesibili oluzayo ukuze izozilungiselela umdlalo womzuliswano wesibili weCAF Champions League lapho izotholana khona neCote d’Or.
title: Imphathisa ngekhanda eyomdlali olimele uPitso

text: BATHWELE kanzima abasebenzi benkampani yamabhasi i-Autopax ephethe iTranslux neCity to City kwazise bahole uhhafu womholo wabo.Lokhu kuza emuva kokuthi i-Autopax iveze ukuthi inenkinga yemali okuyiyona eyenza ukuthi ihluleke ukuholela abasebenzi imali ephelele.UNksz Nana Zenani okhulumela iPassenger Rail Agency South Africa (Prasa) ephethe i-Autopax, uthe kuyiqiniso ukuthi le nkampani ibhekene nezingqinamba zemali okuyizona ezenza iholele abasebenzi imali engaphelele.Uthe iPrasa, aboMnyango wezokuThutha ne-Autopax bazohlangana nezinyunyana ukuzichazela ngesimo esikhona nezinhlelo zokuguqula isimo sale nkampani.Izinyunyana ziyigxekile i-Autopax, zathi ayiqali ukungabaholeli abasebenzi kwazise nangonyaka odlule kwenzeka esifanayo.UNkk Phakamile Hlubi-Majola okhulumela iNational Union of Metalworkers of South Africa (Numsa), uthe i-Autopax ikhiphe isitatimende sokuthi abasebenzi bazohola * -50% kule nyanga kodwa ayizange isho ukuthi imali esele bazoyithola nini.“Akuqali ukuthi i-Autopax iholele abasebenzi imali engaphelele njengoba ngonyaka odlule bengazange bahole ngesikhathi esifanele abasebenzi ngoba imali yango-Okthoba neyangoNovemba yangena sekudlule isikhathi. Ngo-Okthoba abasebenzi bathole umholo wabo ophelele nohhafu webhonasi. Enye baze bayithola sekudlule izinsuku ezinhlanu,” kusho uNkk Hlubi-Majola.Uthe amalungu abo asebenza e-Autopax adiniwe ngoba afika ngesikhathi emsebenzini, asebenze ngokuzikhandla kodwa inkampani iwaholela uhhafu womholo wawo.“Ukwaziswa kwabasebenzi ngoLwesihlanu ukuthi bazohola imali encane sekusele izinsuku ezincane ukuthi kuphele inyanga kuyasikhathaza. Sicela iPrasa iyithathe le nkampani iziphathele yona.“Sizohlangana nobuholi base-Autopax namhlanje (izolo) ukuthola ukuthi kwenzekani nokuthi nathi size neziphakamiso zethu,” kusho uNkk Hlubi-Majola.
title: Kunzima emabhasini beholelwa uhhafu weholo

text: ISITSHUDENI sasoNgoye izolo sihloniphe owayengumengameli we-IFP, inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, esaphila ngokugijima ibanga elingu-91.06 km kwi-Comrades Marathon Legends Virtual Race.U-Elijah Mushka Mantshi (37), owaseTembisa, eGauteng, kodwa usehlala eMpangeni njengoba eyisitshudeni oNgoye enza i-Honours kwi-BSC Microbiology.Ekhuluma neSolezwe izolo emuva kokugijima, uthe: “Inhloso yami enkulu ngalokhu ukuhlonipha uMntwana wakwaPhindangene esaphila. Ngimhlonipha ngegalelo lakhe enkululekweni yakuleli ngiphinde nje ngimhloniphe ngokuba umuntu ogqugquzelayo, uyisibonelo esihle. Ngigijime * -91.06km ngoba uneminyaka engu-91. I-medal engizoyithola kwabakwa-Comrades izoba yisipho engiyomnikeza sona. Ngeke ngimnikeze imali ngoba unayo kodwa ngizomupha i-medal njengophawu lwami lokumhlonipha,” kusho uMantshi.Usuke sibhedlela eNtunjambili, eKranskop, waze waphothula umjaho wakhe esibhedlela e-Stanger.Kulo mjaho ubehambisana noMtheleli Myaka, abasuke naye baze bawuphetha umjaho.Endleleni uthe amalungu e-IFP abemeseka, abanye bemupha amanzi nokunye ukumlekelela.Lo msubathi uyilungu le-Unizulu Athletics Club. Usegijime iComrades kane. Uthe uma ngonyaka ozayo ubuya lo mjaho nakanjani uzoba yingxenye yawo.Isiqubulo salo mjaho nonyaka besithi: “Race the Comrades Legends.”Owezokuxhumana nabezindaba kulo mjalo uNkk Delaine Cools uthe: “Abantu bawesekile umjaho. Ungenelwe abangaphezu kuka-40 000 abavela emazweni angu-86 ahlukene. Abantu abadala nabancane, benze imijaho yabo lapho bekhona. Abantu bazogijima kuze kube phakathi kwamabili namhlanje (izolo),” kusho uNkk Cools.IComrades egijinywa phakathi kweTheku noMgungundlovu ayibanga khona kulo nyaka ngenxa yeCorona. Bekuzoba umjaho ka-95 nonyaka.
title: Isitshudeni sigijime sihlonipha obehola i-IFP

text: MHLELI: Ngikhathazekile ngokwenziwa uNgqongqoshe uNonhlanhla Khoza wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi. Kunezikhangiso zomsebenzi zomnyango eziphume ngomhlaka 2 Agasti ezivale mhlaka 16 Agasti. Ngidumele kakhulu ngokuzwa ukuthi ungqongqoshe usezihoxisile lezi zikhangiso ngosuku lokugcina.Thina siyintsha yasemakhaya engasebenzi sisukumele phezulu sifaka izicelo sipatanisa singenayo nemali yokwenza ama-copy namaCV nokuposa ikakhulukazi eyokugibela siyoposa emadolobheni aseduzane.Sisizwa ogogo bethu ngemali yempesheni yokwenza konke lokhu. Size sasebenzisa no-fast mail ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izicelo zifika ngesikhathi. Ngisebenzise imali ewuR450 ukwenza konke lokhu. Ngiyakholwa ukuthi lokhu akuhlukumezanga mina kuphela ngalezi zindleko.Uma ngilandela ngithole ukuthi uNgqongqoshe uKhoza ukhiphe umyalelo wokumisa izikhangiso ngaphandle kwesizathu noma incazelo.Umbuzo wami uthi ngicela ukwazi ngezinhlelo zikangqongqoshe zokusibuyisela le mali esiyisebenzisile njengoba sizihluphekela nje.Thembelihle TembeEMboza
title: Kusilimazile ukuhoxiswa kwezikhangiso zomsebenzi

text: OWAYENGUMENGAMELI kuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma uthi abomndeni wakwaGupta bangabangani ahlanganiswa nabo owayengumengameli wakuleli, uMnuz Thabo Mbeki. UZuma uthe empeleni abakwaGupta banobudlelwano obungcono noMbeki kunaye kwazise nguye owabethula kuye esaqala ukuhlangana nabo. Uthe abalomndeni bethulwa kuye njengosomabhizinisi abasebenza ngokuzikhandla futhi abephethe kahle abasebenzi babo ezinkampanini zabo. Uthe elinye ilungu lalo mndeni lalisebenza njengomeluleki kaMbeki kwezomnotho. “Kuyangixaka ukuthi ngiyabuzwa ngobudlelwano bami nabomndeni wakwaGupta ekubeni lo mndeni wawunobudlelwano nomengameli ababili abangena ngaphambi kwami. Izithombe ezifakazela lokhu zikhona nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana,” kuchaza uZuma. Uthe ngaphezu kwalokho abakwaGupta bebaziwa njengamalungu e-ANC. UZuma ube eseveza ukuthi wakhetha ukuqinisa ubudlelwane bakhe nabakwaGupta ngoba kuyisifiso sawo wonke umholi ukuba nobudlelwano nabantu abasemabhizinisini. UZuma uthe ngenxa yokubona ukuthi abezindaba babika ngokuchema, wazisa abanye abaholi kuhulumeni ukuthi kunosomabhizinisi abahlongoza ukuqala iphephandaba elizobika ngokungachemi. Uthi waphakamisa ukuthi abakwaGupta basungule iphephandaba ngokunjalo nesiteshi sethelevishini (ANN7). “Lokhu kwabafaka enkingeni kodwa imina engaya kubo ngathi abasungule iphephandaba. Uma seliphumelela, ngababuza ukuthi uma liza kahle kanje iphephandaba labo kunganjani babe nesiteshi sethelevishini. Imina engaya kubo,” kusho uZuma. Uthe ngesikhathi isisunguliwe i-ANN7, yeza nezwi elisha endimeni yezindaba futhi yaba impumelelo.“Lokhu akukaze kwenziwe ngobukhonyovu noma ngendlela engekho emthethweni, kwaxoxwa njengoba kusuke kuxoxa abantu bebonisana ngamabhizinisi,” usho kanje. UZuma uthi ngoba ungumngani namaGupta, kwaqala kwathiwa kunenkohlakalo abayenzayo. “Ngabuza ukuthi kunenkohlakalo kuphi? Akekho oseke wabuza ngobudlelwano bamaGupta noMbeki, akekho oseke wabuza ngobudlelwano bamaGupta noMandela,” usho kanje. UZuma uthi usalindele ukuzwa ukuthi yini embi eyenziwa abakwaGupta. Uthe abalomndeni babazisa ubuholi be-ANC ngephephandaba nesiteshi sethelevishini, ngokunjalo nobuholi be-ANC ezifundazweni ngoba yinto eyenziwa yiwo wonke umuntu ukufuna izikhangiso uma benebhizinisi lezindaba. UZuma ukuchithile ukuthi amaGupta ake aba nesandla ekuqokweni kongqongqoshe. “Laba abantu engahlanganiswa nabo embuthweni. Abenze lutho olubi. Yingakho indodana yami yabona kukuhle ukuthi isebenzisane nabo,” usho kanje.
title: UZuma uchaza ngobudlelwano bakhe namaGupta
