text: ISIXAKE nomakhelwane indaba yezelamani zaseChesterville eseziphila ngokulwa ngenxa yombango womuzi owashiywa ngabazali.UMnuz Thulasizwe Zungu (49) akasabhekani nodadewabo uNksz Hlengiwe Chakwe (42), amsola ngokumhlukumeza nokumxosha kulo muzi athi ubhalwe ngaye.UZungu utshele Isolezwe ukuthi usephila ngokulala emizini yabantu ngenxa yokuhlukunyezwa ngudadewabo. Uveze ukuthi izinkinga ziqale ngonyaka odlule udadewabo esebuyela kulo muzi ebengasahlali kuwo. Uthe phambilini udadewabo ubelandwa wuyena ukuthi azohlala naye njengoba ebelokhu eyoqasha namasoka. Uthe umjikele esiswini njengotshwala engasafuni ahlale kulo muzi.“Ngize ngavula amacala ngoba udadewethu engishaya engihlanganyela nomshana. Ngibenzele nencwadi yesivimbelo sasenkantolo ngenxa yokuhlukumezeka,” echaza.Isolezwe liyibonile incwadi yesivimbelo eyenziwe nguZungu ngoMashi 22 nonyaka. Kuvele nokuthi naye uZungu useke waboshwa ngoJanuwari ngenxa yokulwa noNksz Chakwa. UZungu uthe wagwetshelwa ngaphandle izinyanga ezimbili. Uthe unelungelo lokubuyela kubo ngoba kubhalwe yena futhi ukuboshwa kwakhe akuhlangene nombango womuzi.Iphephandaba lifike uZungu izolo ekomunye umakhelwane naye othe usekhathele yilolu daba. Uthe akazi ukuthi umbango usukaphi kodwa lezi zelamani seziphila ngokulwa.UNksz Chakwa uficwe ezivalele endlini ekhiyile, kuvulwe ngisho amafasitela. Ebona umfowabo, kuvele kwehla izinyembezi ekhala ngokuhlukunyezwa nguyena. Ubekhuluma eqhaqhazela izandla abuye akhohlwe azokusho athe konke lokhu kudalwa wukhwantalala.“Kade aqala ukungishaya kusukela ngonyaka odlule. Ngize ngavula icala kulo nyaka waboshwa, ngalaliswa esibhedlela ngilimele. Sengihlala ngizivalele endlini ngoba uma efikile uyangishaya. Sengiyabona kuyosiza ukuthi ngihambe la ekhaya,” uNksz Chakwe.Uvumile ukuthi umuzi ubhalwe umfowabo kodwa bebehlala bobabili. Uthe okumbuyise emqashweni ukuthi akasebenzi, ubengasenamali yokuqasha. Uphikile ukuthi nguye ohlukumeza umfowabo.UMnuz Sfiso Mngadi oyikhansela uthe ngokwefayela elisemnyangweni wezezindlu, babhalwe bobabili kulo muzi.“Isikhathi esiningi uThulasizwe ubeboshwa njalo njengoba esanda kuphuma ejele namanje. Bona bahlulwa ukuhlalisana bewumndeni. Kukaningi beyisana ezinkantolo ekubeni bobabili banelungelo lokuhlala kulo muzi,”kusho uMngadi.
title: Kubi izelamani zibanga indlu

text:
UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo kuleli uDkt Zweli Mkhize usezwakalise ukukhathazelka ngokunyuka kwesibalo sabantu abaneCovid-19 esifundazweni iWestern Cape. Ngokwezibalo ezimenyenzelwe uMnyango wezeMpilo ngeSonto isibalo sabantu abahaqekile kuleli sinyukele ku-15 515 kanti isibalo sabashonile sinyukele ku-264 kulandela ukushona kwabanye abathathu. Sekuhlolwe abantu abawu-460 873 kuleli. %%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/COVID19?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#COVID19cases in South Africa is 15 515, the total number of deaths is 264 and the total recoveries is 7006. 
pic.twitter.com/MH3KJqKSnw— Dr Zweli Mkhize (@DrZweliMkhize)%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/COVID19SouthAfrica?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#COVID19SouthAfricaStatistics as at 17 May 2020. 
pic.twitter.com/ivAa02sxXw— Dr Zweli Mkhize (@DrZweliMkhize)"Sisakhathazekile ngesibalo sabantu abahaqekile eWestern Cape njengoba sesisondele ku-60% wabantu abahaqekie ngaleli gciwane eNingizimu Afrika yonke. Ezibalweni ezingene emahoreni awu-24 edlule, u-76% wabantu abathelelekile ngabaseWestern Cape," kusho uMkhize. UMkhize uthe sebekuqaphile ukuthi kubantu abashonile, abawu-148 abesilisa, abawu-116 abesifazane. Sekushone abantu abawu-149 eWestern Cape, KwaZulu-Natal sekushone abawu-45, e-Eastern Cape sekushone abawu-35 kanti eGauteng kusashone abawu-25. Okuzothokozelwa abaningi nokho ukunyuka kwesibalo sabantu asebesindile kuleli gciwane kuleli njengoba sebewu-7 006. Emhlabeni jikelele babalelwa ngaphezulu kuka-1.8 million abantu asebesindile kuleli gciwane eselihaqe abangaphezulu kuka-4.7 million. %%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/ListenToTheExpert?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#ListenToTheExpertIt is important that we adhere to the conditions of the lockdown, says Professor Khangelani Zuma of the HSRC. 
pic.twitter.com/HdCLkHjEKi— Dr Zweli Mkhize (@DrZweliMkhize)Ngemuva kwesimemezelo sikamengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sokuthi izingxenye zeNingizimu Afrika zizokwehlela esigabeni sesithathu sokuvalwa kwezwe, kuleli sonto kulindeleke ukuthi oNgqongqoshe bomkhandlu obhekelele ukulwa neCovid-19 benabe ngokuxegiswa kweminye imithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe.
title: #Coronavirus: Sinyukele ku-7 006 isibalo sabasandile, sekushone abawu-264

text: ZILOKHE zimnethe njalo ezinkantolo zakuleli uMvikeli womphakathi u-Adv Busisiwe Mkhwebane osekuchithwe omunye umbiko wakhe.  NgoMsombuluko inkantolo enkulu ePitoli ichithe izincomo ezaphakanyiswa uMkhwebane kumbiko awethula ngophenyo ayelwenza ngoNgqongqoshe wamaBhizisni kaHulumeni kuleli uMnuz Pravin Gordhan. UMkhwebane uthole uGordhan enecala lokusungula igatsha elaziwa nge-rogue unit, elaliphenya izigilamkhuba eSars ngokungemthetho, eyasungulwa ngesikhathi esanguKhomishana weSouth African Revenue Services (Sars). Ngaphezu kwalokho, uGordhan usolwa ngokuthi waphula umthetho ngokunika lowo owayeyiPhini likaKhomishana wakwaSars uMnuz Ivan Pillay, impesheni kungakashayi isikhathi. Leyo mpesheni wayisayina ngo-Agasti 2010.UGordhan uphikise umbiko kaMkhwebane enkantolo wathi awukho semthethweni, awulona iqiniso futhi ugcwele amaphutha. Ngesikhathi linquma ijaji ngoMsombuluko lithole ukuthi uMkhwebane kwakungamele aphenye ngisho ukuphenya ngokwenziwa uGordhan eSars. “UMvikeli Womphakathi kwakungamele alusukumele udaba lukaGordhan ngoba luthinta into eyenzeka eminyakeni elishumi edlule,” kusho uJaji Sulet Potterill. Imigimo yoMvikeli Womphakathi iyalinqanda ihhovisi lakhe ekuphenyeni ngezinto osekuphele iminyaka engaphezulu kwemibili zenzeka. UPoterrill uthe uGordhan ubenelungelo lokuvimba izincomo zikaMkhwebane kulolu daba. Uthe lokho ngeke kwehlise isithunzi sehhovisi loMvikeli Womphakathi. Ngaphezu kwalokho uPoterill uthe kunezingxenye zombiko kaMkhwebane ebezingaqondakali futhi zingacacisi ukuthi uzama ukuthini.UPoterrill uthe akusiyona indawo yakhe nokho ukunquma ukuthi ngabe uMkhwebane kusamufanele yini ukuba nguMvikeli Womphakathi. Kuvela lezi zindaba nje, ngeledlule iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ichithe uMkhwebane yathi waqamba amanga odabeni oluthinta uphenyo lweBhange loMbuso.Inkantolo enkulu yachitha isinqumo sakhe sokuthi ibhange i-Absa kumele libuyise uR1.1 billion kwibhange lombuso ngoba latakulwa leli bhange ngesikhathi sobandlululo. Ngenxa yalokho uMkhwebane wayalalewa ukuthi akhokhe imali ecela kuR900 000, ephaketheni lakhe wezindleko zecala.Inkantolo ithole ukuthi akazange ahambise ngendlela uma enza uphenyo futhi waqamba amanga, wangalandela imigomo yehhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi.
title: UMkhwebane usephinde wagqemeka engeqiwantwala

text:
IBHANTSHI ligcwale umoya kumqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs uGiovani Solinas obephikwa yimiphumela kuleli qembu.IChiefs imemezele lezi zindaba ekhasini layo kuTwitter kanti iveze ukuthi noyiPhini lakhe uPatrick Mabedi ukhonjwe indlela.“IKaizer Chiefs noGiovani Solinas bavumelene ngokunqanyulwa kwenkontileka yakhe njengamanje. Simufisela okuhle,” kusho isitatimende esikhishwe yiChiefs.Breaking News! Kaizer Chiefs terminate Solinas’ contract.Kaizer Chiefs and coach Giovanni Solinas have mutually agreed to an amicable termination of his contract with immediate effect.We wish him well.
#Amakhosi4Life
pic.twitter.com/kaiVkPXLWL— Kaizer Chiefs (@KaizerChiefs) 
December 7, 2018Leli qembu laseSoweto lixosha lomqeqeshi nje ibilokhu yande njalo ingcindezi ebivela kubalandeli ukuthi akhululwe ngoba bengaboni ukuthi ulisaphi iqembu.Kamuva nje usanda kutitinywa yi-Orlando Pirates emdlalweni oncishe iChiefs ithuba lokuzibekisela indawo kowamanqamu kwiTelkom Knockout.Breaking News!Assistant coach Patrick Mabedi’s contract has also been terminated.We would like to express our gratitude to him for all the efforts during his time at Kaizer Chiefs and wish him well.
#Amakhosi4Life
pic.twitter.com/0o9t0m5M6D— Kaizer Chiefs (@KaizerChiefs) 
December 7, 2018Yize iChiefs inqobe kalula kwiCAF Confederation Cup lapho ishaye khona iZimamoto yaseZanzibar, ihluleke yancama ukuqhubeka lapho ibigcine khona ishaywa yi-Arrows ebingasaphelele ngo 2-1.Emidlalweni ewu-14 yeligi, iChiefs isishaywe kane. Idlale ngokulingana kweyisithupha yase inqoba emine okuyishiya endaweni yesikhombisa kwi-log.IChiefs izobhekana neSupersport United,Mamelodi Sundowns, Bidvest Wits, AmaZulu neCape Town City FC. Kubaqeqeshi abamataniswa naleli qembu kubalwa noRuud Krol owake washaya into ecokeme eqeqesha i-Orlando Pirates.
title: Kuhlukane inhloko nesixhanti kuSolinas neChiefs

text: ABAHOLI be-IFP Youth Brigade bayaveva ngokugxambukela kwabaholi abadala abazama ukudunga lolu phiko lwentsha yeqembu. Lokhu kulandela ukuputshuka kwephimbo eliqoshiwe lomunye umholi oqavile eqenjini enyundela umholi othwelwe ngeqoma njengoba kuyiwa engqungqutheleni yophiko lwentsha.Abanye abaholi abakhulume neSolezwe bathe bakhathazekile ngendlela osekuhletshwe ngayo ngoDkt Andile Biyela, okuthiwa kuhlohlwa izinhlaka zentsha ukuba zingamkhethi.Emhlanganweni obuseNdumeni wesiyingi abaholi bakhona bazwakalise intukuthelo ngomholi abathi uhola umkhankaso wokudicilela phansi abanye abaholi abathile balolu phiko ngoba efuna bangakhethwa ngoMgqibelo engqungqutheleni ezobe isoLundi.Kule nkulumo eputshukile, neSolezwe elinayo, lo mholi osolwayo uzwakala emhlaba emhlikiza uBiyela emchaza njengomuntu ozofaka intsha ehlathini.“Nkunzi ngizocela ukuyichaza le ndaba ka-Andile njengoba ubuyibuza ukuze uyifake egruphini yethu njengoba singama-Afrika. Uzokhumbula ngesikhathi ngiyokhuluma eMtuba kukhona uMkhuleko no-Andile. Wafika emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu wangiqambela amanga wabhala incwadi efungelwe wathi mina ngithe uMntwana waKwaPhindangene ungundlovukayiphikiswa, ngathi iqembu selineminyaka engu-40 linezinkinga ngenxa yakhe. Kusukela lapho asiphindanga sakhulumisana. Muva nje sinomhlangano wamakhansela e-Ace Butchery siyadla njengama-Afrika, u-Andile wafika wasedlula negenge yakhe. Uyazi-ke u-Andile ngeke umhlukanise noMkhuleko. Kodwa ngokumhlaziya kwami akekho ngakithi ukuthi ufuna ukuba muhle yonke indawo. Thina-ke sisemzabalazweni hhayi indaba yokuthandwa yiwo wonke umuntu,” kusho izwi lalo mholi.Uzanywe kaningi lo mholi ocingweni wangatholakala.UBiyela ethintwa uthe uyizwile le nkulumo futhi waqinisekisa ukuthi izwi lomholi osolwayo.UHlengwa osezibeka phansi izintambo kulolu phiko uthe nakuba ebengakayizwa inkulumo kodwa uxwayisa abaholi ukuba bahlukane nokudala uqhekeko kulolu phiko.“Singakujabulela ukuba bonke abaholi bangenele kulolu phiko ngokuzosikhulisa nokweluleka intsha ngokwakhayo hhayi ngokuzodala uqhekeko. Ngicela kucace futhi ukuthi amagama abazophakanyiswa ukuhola lolu phiko ayovezwa engqungqutheleni ezoba khona ngoMgqibelo iphothulwe ngeSonto oLundi,” kusho uHlengwa.Abaholi abagaqele ukukhethwa uBiyela, uMnuz Mthokozisi Nxumalo oseyilungu lePhalamende noMnuz Sthembiso kaShandu obeyisigagayi seFees Must Fall.KwesikaNobhala uMnuz Mncedisi Maphisa oyiphini leMeya yaseBaqulusini noMnuz Mlungisi Mabaso oyikhansela eGoli.
title: Okucasula abaholi bentsha ye-IFP

text: MBALI KHANYILEINJINGA ebekwe icala lokubulala uMnuz Mluleki Mbewana owashonela ngaphandle kwekilabhu iRich Durban, eseSpringfield, isiphonsele inselelo isinqumo sokuchithwa kwesicelo sebheyili eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini. UMnuz Jonas Tsautse, ovele kafushane enkantolo ngoMsombuluko, kulindeleke ukuthi kusasa aveze ubufakazi obusha azobethula mayelana nesicelo sakhe sebheyili.IMantshi, uNkk Varnitha Armu, ithe icala lihlehla ngesizathu sokulalela ubufakazi  obusha  enkantolo mayelana nesicelo sebheyili sikammangalelwa.Isicelo sakhe sachithwa ngoNovemba 8, usuku ayegcine ngalo ukuvela enkantolo.Ngenkathi evela enkantolo uTsautse, iMantshi uMelanie de Jager  yasichitha isicelo sakhe sebheyili ngenxa yokungabi nesizathu esibambekayo mayelana nokuthi aqule icala engaphandle.Phakathi kokwabalulwa yimantshi mayelana nokungagculiseki ngezizathu ezabekwa nguTsautse encwadini efungelwe ngesikhathi ecela ibheyili, wukungavezwa kwesakhiwo samabhilidi enkampani yakhe athi yenza ithenda yokuthutha amanzi.Imantshi yabuye yashaya amakhala ngokungabi bikho kwekheli eliqondile likaTsautse owaveza amakheli amabili emizi  okubikwa ukuthi ubeqashile kuyo yomibili. Imantshi yabuye yabalula ukuthi ukungabi kwakhe nomndeni eThekwini ngesinye sezizathu ezenza ukuthi isichithe isicelo sakhe sebheyili.Unina kamufi, uNkk Lulama Mbewana, ojwayele ukubonakala enkantolo nonina wezingane zikamufi, uNksz Mbali Mtshali, nendodakazi yakhe, ubonakale ehamba nowesifazane oyedwa. Abangani abavamise ukugcwala enkantolo bebengabonwa.
title: UTsautse uzoveza ubufakazi obusha bokucela ibheyili

text: ANGASE ahlale izinyanga eziyisithupha engalithinti ibhola uTaariq Fielies weCape Town City kulandela iphutha elenzeke esibhedlela sikahulumeni abeyohlinzwa kusona esiswini.UFielies obekufanele ngabe ubehambe neBafana Bafana kwi-Afcon ngokukaBenni McCarthy ongumqeqeshi wakhe, akazange alitshele iqembu lakhe ngalokhu kuhlinzwa kodwa kuthe sekuvele ukuthi kube nephutha kwaba yima iCitizens izwa ngalokhu.Usihlalo weCity, uJohn Comitis, uyena oqinisekise lezi zindaba ngokuhlinzwa kukaFielies okuze nezindaba ezimbi ngekusasa lakhe ebholeni.“Besingazi nokuthi kukhona into enje kodwa kuthe uma sekubonakala ukuthi kwenzeke iphutha ngesikhathi ehlinzwa eGroote Schuur, kwaba yima sizwa. Sithole ukuthi kukhona iphutha elenzekile kodokotela abebemhlinza. Ngisukumele phezulu ngizwa lokho ngoba kuthinta impilo yakhe. Sibe sesimyisa esibhedlela esibona ukuthi simfanele (Christiaan Barnard). Kulapho odokotela bakhona befike bayibona inkinga base beqala ukulilungisa leli phutha. Kuzogcina kulungile,” kusho uComitis.Lesi sikhulu esihlale njalo sisukumela phezulu uma umdlali waso enenkinga, sithe namanje sisabanxusa abadlali ukuthi bangalokothi bazenzele bodwa engxenye izinto ezithinta impilo yabo ngoba iqembu linabo odokotela futhi uma ithimba (lodokotela) lingakwazi ukusiza lizokwazi ukuthi isiphi isinyathelo okufanele sithathwe.“Siphoqelekile ukuthi sisukumele phezulu ngoba iqembu liyamdinga, futhi limdinga ngokushesha. Kuzothatha izinyanga khona engadlali. Lokho kufana nodume lwengozi. Kwenzeka konke lokhu uKeano (Cupido) noKouassi (Kouadja) nabo balimele.”UFielies ungomunye wabadlali abamqoka kwiCity kanti ukuhlala kwakhe izinyanga eziyisithupha engadlali ngeke kuphazamise uMcCarthy kuphela kepha nekusasa lakhe lo mdlali ebholeni libukeka lisengcupheni ngoba kungenzeka ukuthi uhlala izinyanga eziningi kanjena engadlali nje, umonakalo mkhulu kunalokhu okucatshangwayo,” kubeka uComitis.
title: Ukuhlinzwa kucishe kwalimaza ikusasa kunobhutshuzwayo

text: INHLANGANO eyengamele ezokugijima emhlabeni i-IAAF isimemezele ukuthi izokuhlehlisa ukuqala kokusebenza komthetho osuse umsindo ovimbela abagijimi besifazane abathile ukuthi baqhudelane kumabanga aphakathi nendawo.Maphakathi nonyaka i-IAAF ikhiphe umthetho othi abasefazane abakhiqiza isikalo se-testosterone esiphezulu kunesijwayelekile kwabesimame ngeke besavunyelwa ukugijima ku-400m, 800m naku-1500m kusukela ngoNovemba 1. Umgijima wakuleli uCaster Semenya ongomunye wabagijimi omthintayo lo mthetho ufake isikhalo kwiCourt of Arbitration for Sports (CAS). Esitatimendeni se-IAAF ngoLwesibili le nhlangano igcizelele ukuthi inethemba lokuthi ucwaningo lwayo luzoveza ukuthi umthetho wayo unobulungiswa kubona bonke abagijimi. "Nokho i-IAAF iyakuqonda ukuthi bonke abagijimi abathintekayo badinga ukucacisekela ngokuthi bami kuphi, ngakho ngokuvumelana nonkosazane Semenya ne-ASA (Athletics South Africa) sinqume ukuthi kume ukuqala kokusebenza komthetho kuze kube iCAS iyakuphasisa okulindeleke ukuthi kube ngoMashi 2019," kusho isitatimende. Umthetho uthi abagijimi abathintekayo kuzomele basebenzisa imishanguzo ukwehlisa i-testestorone emizimbeni yabo ukuze bakwazi ukuqhubeka nokuncintisana kula mabanga athintekayo.
title: I-IAAF Ikuhlehlisile ukusebenza komthento ocindezela uSemenya

text: Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngeSonto ngomthombo walo ongashayi eceleni, kuthiwa uNgema usemisiwe ukuza eJoburg Theatre njengoba kusenziwa uphenyo ngezinsolo abhekene nazo.Isikhulu esibambile eJoburg Theatre, uBridget Mashika uluqinisekisile uphenyo abaluqalile olubhekiswe kuNgema nokumiswa kwakhe.“Kunomunye wabalingisi beSarafina ofake isikhalo eJoburg Theatre ngoLwesithathu, wathi uhlukunyezwe ngokocansi wuNgema. Uveze ukuthi isigameko senzeke ngoLwesibili. Okwamanje asikakabi nayo imininingwane egcwele ngoba lolu daba alukakahlalelwa phansi lwacutshungulwa. Ngenxa yalesi sikhalo kuphoqe ukuthi uNgema amiswe ukubonakala eJoburg Theatre kuze kuhlale udaba lwakhe ngezinsolo abhekene nazo. Engifuna ukukucacisa ukuthi akamisiwe ngoba sesinobufakazi ngesikhalo kodwa inhloso ukwenza uphenyo. Uma seluphothuliwe uzobizwa azochaza uhlangothi lwakhe,” kusho uBridget.Ethintwa uNgema ubengalubambi ucingo. Esethunyelelwa umyalezo kuWhatsApp umyalezo uphendule kuwona, wathi usematasa eJoburg Theatre uzoze atholakale ngehora lesithupha ngoLwesihlanu. Esezanywa nangocingo kuze kwashicilelwa engatholakali.UBridget uthe iSarafina ngeke iphazamiseke izoqhubeka ngendlela obekuhlelwe ngayo ngoba uNgema akanankontileka nabo ngokuletha lo mdlalo wakhe khona.“IJoburg Theatre inesivumelwano neKeeloz Global Entertainment kaNhlanhla Ngema okunguyena ongumqondisi womdlalo. Awukho umsebenzi omningi odinga uNgema ngaphandle kokuthi iSarafina eyakhe nokuthi ubeza ukubona okwenziwa kuwona,” kuqhuba uBridget.Kusenjalo kunomthombo oveze ukuthi umqondisi womdanso weSarafina uVusi Majola umisiwe ngaphandle kwesizathu.“UVusi ubeqashelwe ukuzoqeqesha abadansi abasha beSarafina. Ubesenamasonto amathathu enza umsebenzi. Uvalelwe amasango eJoburg Theatre ngesonto eledlule. Utshelwe ukuthi umyalelo ukhiswe wuMbongeni ukuthi angangeniswa kodwa kwangachazwa isizathu. Esikhundleni sakhe kufakwe unkosikazi kaNgema uNompumelelo Gumede. UVusi usefake icala kubameli bakhe njengoba ekhala ngokudliwa kwamandla akhe engakhokhelwe,” kusho umthombo.Umthombo uthe imali ekweletwa uVusi yiSarafina ingaphezu kukaR50 000.Ethintwa uVusi uthe akazimisele ukuphawula ngalolu daba kodwa selusingethwe abaphathi bakhe.
title: UMbongeni Ngema usolwa ngokunukubeza ngokocansi

text: UMVIKELI woMpakathi u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane, uthe uzokwenza isiqiniseko sokuphenya ukuthi yonke imali eyahlinzekwa ukuba ithenge izinsiza zeCovid-19 eGauteng, yasebenza ngondlela efanele.U-Advocate Mkhwebane ukhulume kanje ngenkathi ehambele izibhedlela ezahlukene kule ndawo ngoLwesibili, ukubheka ukuthi zahlinzekwa ngokuyikho yikho ngezidingo zokunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwecoronavirus.“Sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi siphenya ngezinkampani ezanikezwa umsebenzi wokuhlinzeka ngezidingo zeCovid-19, ukuthi abasebenzi bezempilo banikezwa izinsiza ezisezingeni elifanele yini,” kusho u-Advocate Mkhwebane.Uthe ukuthunyelwa kwezinsiza eziseqopheleni elifanele, kusiza abasebenzi bezempilo nomphakathi ohambela izibhedlela kule ndawo.“Sifuna nokuthola ukuthi uhulumeni wesigcina yini isethembiso sokwakha izibhedlela kulesi sikhathi seCovid-19, nokuthi izinsiza zathunyelwa ngendlela efanele yini,” usho njalo.Ukhuluma kanjena nje u-Advocate Mkhwebane kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi kuyimanje kusaqhubeka uphenyo ngezinsolo zokusetshenziswa budedengu kwemali yabakhokhibentela ngokunikezwa abathile amathenda okuhlinzeka ngezinsiza zeCovid-19, okusolakala ukuthi akwenziwanga ngendlela efanele.
title: Kungenelela uMvikeli woMphakathi ngokusebenza kwemali ye-Covid-19

text:
UHLANGANE nembibizane umsebenzi waseShoprite ozithwele eshaywa owesilisa obezothenga eStrand, eKapa.UNkk Zimkhitha Xhalabile onezinyanga ezingu-8 ezithwele, ubesevalile kwi-till yokukhokha asebenza kuyona eShoprite osenxanxatheleni yezitolo iBroadway ngesikhathi ikhasimende lifuna ukusizwa ngenkani. "Uphawu lokuthi ngivalile belukhona, walususa wathi ngoba angikahambi angimsize," kusho uXhalabile.Uthi, ekuqaleni baqophisane ngamazwi nekhasimende elitshela ukuthi alisebenzise enye itill kepha ngesikhathi selikhombisa udlame ulisizile. "Ngesikhathi ngishaya impahla yakhe besilokhu siqophisana ngamazwi, engithuka ethi ukuze ngihole kufanele athenge futhi kufanele ngimhloniphe njengekhasimende."Kwivideo yasesitolo, ikhasimende libonakala likhomba uXhalabile ngaphambi kokuthi limushaye ngesibhakela. Unogada wasesitolo obeyibuka le ngxabano ungenelelile eseshayiwe uXhalabile. Kube sekufika imenenja yasesitolo izokhipha ikhasimende."Kudingeke ngifonele umyeni wami ukuthi angihambise esibhedlela nasesiteshini samaphoyisa. UShoprite awuzange ulibambe ikhasimende elingishayile. Ukhishwe wonogada," kusho yena.UXhalabile uthi, unikwe izinsuku ezine engasebenzi watshelwa ukuthi abuye emsebenzini uma efuna ukudlula kokumehlele. "Ngithole ukwelulekwa ngokwengqondo kanye ngase ngitshelwa ukuthi angiyobhekana namadimoni ami uma ngifuna ukudlula kulokhu. Ngenqatshelwe ukuthathwa ikhefu emsebenzini njengoba sengizoya ekhefini lokuyobeletha maduze," kusho yena.Uthe, uyesaba ukuthi uma ehlangana nalo wesilisa omshayile uzomhlasela futhi.Abaxhumana nabezindaba kwaShoprite bathe inkampani ayihambisani nokushaywa komsebenzi wayo kanti umsolwa kuthiwe angaphinde alubhade ezitolo zabo. "Kuyibhadi ukuthi ikhasimende elingeneme lishaye umsebenzi wethu obesevale itill yakhe kepha waqhubeka nokumsiza. Onogada nabaphathi abebekhona bangenelele basiza lo wesifazane kwafonelwa nomyeni wakhe ukuba amhambise esibhedlela ngoba ama-ambulensi engeke akwazi ukufika ngokushesha," kusho bona.Okhulumela amaphoyisa uKapteni FC Van Wyk uqinisekisile ukuthi uXhalabile uvule icala lokushaya.*Lolu daba lushicilelwe kuqala kwi
GroundUp
title: BUKA: Umthengi ushaye umsebenzi waseShoprite ozithwele

text: IMAMELODI Sundowns iphikwa wumlando ngaphambi komdlalo weCAF Champions League nezinkunzi zaze-Afrika, iTP Mazembe yaseDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC).ISundowns ivakashele eLubumbashi, eDRC lapho izogadulisana khona neMazembe emdlalweni ozoba seStade Du TP Mazembe kusasa ngo-3 ntambama. Lona wumdlalo wesithathu weSundowns wamaqoqo kaGroup B. AmaBrazilians azihola phambili ngamaphuzu ayisithupha kulandela ukuwina imidlalo emibili yokuvula ibhekene ne-Al Hilal yaseSudan neCR Belouizdad yase-Algeria.ISundowns iyobhekana neMazembe eLumbashi nje, awumuhle umlando wamaqembu aseMzansi uma evakashele iMazembe. Empeleni alikho iqembu lakuleli eselake lahlula iMazembe eDRC. Ngo-2015 iSundowns yakhala ngaphansi kwiMazembe ngo 3-1 koweChampions League, yawina ngo 1-0 eMzansi kowomlenze wesibili. Ngo-2017 iSundowns yayehlula ngo 1-0 iMazembe emdlalweni weCaf Super Cup eLoftus Versfeld Stadium.I-Orlando Pirates iyona eyazama kuqala ukuwina eLubumbashi ngo-2002 kodwa yabanjwa ngo 1-1, yahlulwa ngo 3-1 eMzansi. Ngo-2013 eZimnyama zawina ngo 3-1 kowomlenze wokuqala kowandulela owamanqamu weChampions League ekhaya kodwa zakhala ngaphansi ngo 1-0 eLubumbashi emdlalweni umufi uSenzo Meyiwa avimba kuwona amaphenathi amabili. ISuperSport United yadlala neMazembe ngo-2015 kowamanqamu weCaf Confederation, yahlulwa ngo 2-1 eDRC, badlala ngokulingana ngo 0-0 ePitoli.Umqeqeshi weSundowns, uRhulani Mokwena, uthe bayakwazi okufanele bakulindele kwiMazembe."Bayiqembu elihle kakhulu. Baqinile emuva. Sibabukile bedlala owomkhaya (Saint Eloi Lupopo), nangesikhathi bedlala ne-Al Hilal neBelouizdad. Sibonile ukuthi badlala indlela ye- 4-4-1-1. Kusafanele sizilungiselele, sihlanganise amaqhinga senze isiqiniseko sokuthi sililungele iqembu elidlala izindlela ezihlukene," kusho uMokwena.Komunye umdlalo weChampions League, iKaizer Chiefs egcine ibhabhadiswe ngo 4-0 yiWydad Atletic yaseTunisia ngempelasonto edlule, izokwamukela iPetro de Luanda yase-Angola emdlalweni wesithathu wesigaba samaqoqo kaGroup C eFNB Stadium kusasa ngo-6 ntambama.ULebohang Manyama uthe kufanele bavuke bazithathe balwele amaphuzu."Kuzoba wumdlalo onzima njengoba sizobhekana neqembu esingalazi. Sifuna ukuqoqa amaphuzu ukuze sizongena emjahweni namanye amaqembu. Wumdlalo wasekhaya, kufanele senze ngakho konke okusemandleni ukuthi sitholea amaphuzu amathathu," kusho uManyama.Amakhosi asendaweni yesithathu kwi-log kaGroup C ngephuzu alicoshe kwiHoroya yaseGuinea emdlalweni wokuvula."Sinemidlalo emine esisazoyidlala esigabeni samaqoqo. Uma singayiwina yomibili eyasekhaya, sizame ukuthola amaphuzu aphelele ekuhambeni kwelinye lamaqembu, ngicabanga ukuthi sinethuba elihle ngoba wonke amaqembu asazobhekana. Ebholeni manje nomayiliphi iqembu lingalehlula elinye. Akukapheli ngathi. Sisenalo ithuba," kusho uManyama.
title: ISundowns iphikwa wumlando kwiMazembe koweCaf

text: UMAKADEBONA womlingisi ophinde abe wumdidiyeli wemidlalo yeshashalazi, uThembi Nyandeni, uthe “wudoti” ukuthi abantu basafuna ukwenza imidlalo ekhuluma ngocansi, uthando nemishado ngoba kwenziwa kudala lokho.UThembi, odlala indawo kaMkabayi kwiSibaya kuMzansi Magic, uthe eNingizimu Afrika zikhona izindaba zangempela okungakhulunywa ngazo.“Banazo izindaba ezinhle kodwa abafuni ukukhuluma ngazo. Bafuna ukuxoxa ngezinto abantu abazozinaka manje, okuwubunqunu, uthando okuyinto esiphelelweni yisikhathi. Ubani ongazi ngothando? Uthando selube khona iminyaka.“Asifuni ukukhuluma ngalokho nangocansi nangawo wonke lowo “doti”. Kimi wudoti ngoba sekube khona ngeke ukubalekele, ucansi, uthando nomshado. Kodwa sifuna ukwazi izindaba zangempela ezenza abantu baphile ngale ndlela abaphila ngayo,” kusho uThembi.UThembi ubekhuluma ohlelweni iLunch with Thomas and Pearl izolo emini obelushayelwa nguDJ Mlu. Uthe yena yonke into ayenzayo uyenza, hhayi ngoba efuna ukuyenza kodwa uba nesizathu. Uveze ukuthi usanda kuphothula ukuqopha iLockdown yakuMzansi Magic lapho ezodlala khona indawo kaMinister Mazibuko. Isizini entsha izoqala ngoMsombuluko.“Ngizizwa ngincipha iminyaka mihla namalanga. Kusekuningi engisazokwenza. Abantu bazongibona mihla namalanga kuthelevishini, esiteji yonke indawo ngisebenza nezingane yonke indawo.” Weluleke abafuna ukungena kwezokungcebeleka ngokuthi babe nothando lomsebenzi, bazehlise futhi baqede isikole.
title: Ukhuza eyocansi kwiTV

text: UMGADLI waMaZulu FC uBongi Ntuli, uthi nakuba ejabule ngokuthi uphumile “eGibhithe” kodwa inkumbulo yomlingane wakhe u-Emiliano “Nkathazo” Tade osejoyine iqembu lakhe elidala iMamelodi Sundowns, isazoba khona.UNtuli usengumdlali woSuthu ngokuphelele manje kulandela ukuthi iMamelodi Sundowns isayine uTade abedlala naye oSuthwini, yaphinde yanezezela ngemali ngaphezulu. Indawo kaTade, ivalwe uTalent Chawapiwa waseZimbabwe obegijimela iBaroka FC.Laba bagadlali bobabili (uNtuli noTade) bebedlala kahle kwiNyokana Eluhlazana ezinyangeni eziyisithupha njengoba beneziphiwo ezingefani kodwa ebezibenza bashaye amagoli.UNtuli unomzimba, namandla futhi uyakwazi ukufohla nokugcina ibhola. Ngakolunye uhlangothi uTade, ubeshesha kakhulu, ekwazi ukubona ipali futhi nama-free kick ubekwazi ukuwashaya. Lokhu kwenze amaqembu amaningi athwala kanzima kwi-Absa Premiership ngeziphiwo zabo.UNtuli uveze ukuthi ujabule ngokuthi ushiyile kwiSundowns ebimphendula umantuntanendishi ngokumbolekisa. “UTade ubengenza ukuthi ngikwazi ukudlala kahle, futhi ngishaye namagoli. Nginganezezela ngokuthi bese sazana kahle kakhulu, neminyakazo yethu besiyazi. Kodwa-ke ibhola linjalo, kufanele sikwamukele ukuthi usehambile, sisebenze ngabadlali abakhona. UTade ngimfisela inhlanhla eqenjini lakhe elisha,” usho kanje uNtuli.UNtuli oke wagijima nakwiLamontville Golden Arrows, uphinde waphawula ngokushiya kwakhe kumaBrazilians.“Ngijabule kakhulu ukuthi ekugcineni ngigcine ngiphumile laphana kwiSundowns. Bekuyisifiso sami ebese kunesikhathi ngifisa senzeke,” kuqhuba uNtuli.Ngokusho kukaNtuli, uChawapiwa odlalela iqembu lesizwe laseZimbabwe, uzosivala khaxa isikhala sikaTade.“Ukuhamba kukaTade kusinike amanye amaqhinga okuhlasela, nengicabanga ukuthi uChawapiwa uzodlala kahle nathi. Simbonile abekwenza kwiBaroka, nakuba engafani noTade, kodwa asingabazi ukuthi uzofika aqhubeke lapho egcine khona lapha kuMaZulu,” kuphetha uNtuli.
title: Ujabule uNtuli ekhululwa yiMamelodi Sundowns

text: ABAZALI babafundi baseSidumbini Primary, ngasoThongathi bavale amasango esikole bethi sekuphele unyaka izingane zabo zinethwa yizimvula zisemakilasini.Laba bazali bathi angaphezulu kweshumi amakilasi aphephuka nyakenye ngoFebhruwari, abahloli bafika ngesikhathi kusanda kuphephuka bathembisa ukuthi bazobuya masinyane kodwa sekuphele unyaka bengabuyi.Omunye umzali obeyingxenye yabazali abebevale isango ekuseni izolo, uthe uyazi ukuthi bazogxekwa ngokuthi baphazamisa ukufunda kodwa vele izingane zabo ziphazamisekile ngoba uma lina ziyalova.“Ilanga elishisayo langoJanuwari noFebhruwari liphelele kuzo izingane zethu. Sesibona sekungena ubusika obulandelayo kungalungiswa. Uthishanhloko uma simbuza uthi wakwenza konke okwakumele akwenze. Sifuna ukuthi abahloli babuye bazosichazela ukuthi yini ebambile. Kulindweni, kumele kuze kuphephuke nengxenye esasele yophahla?” kusho yena.Usihlalo wesigungu sabazali kulesi sikole uMnuz Kwazi Mngadi, uthe bengabazali babone ukuthi basebenzise enye indlela yokubiza umnyango ukuthi usondele.“Ikota yokuqala yonyaka abafundi abaqedanga ukubhala ngoba belina silokhu sibalovisa, manje siyabona ukuthi njengoba kungena ubusika nje kunezinye futhi izinsuku izingane ezingeke ziye ngazo esikoleni ngenxa yesimo sezulu. UMnyango wezeMfundo uzithele ngabandayo ngalolu daba. Sifuna ukuthi usondele ngoba njengamanje uqhelile kithina, abahloli bafika kanye ngemuva wesiphepho, abasabuyi bezosichazela ukuthi yini ebambe ukuthi isikole silungiswe,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi bazowavala amasango kuze kube abahloli bayafika, bezochaza.“Asizimisele ngokulimaza impahla yesikole ngoba izingane zethu ziyayidinga kodwa sizovala amasango, kungafundwa,” kusho yena.UMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, usigxekile isenzo salaba bazali wathi ukuvala kwabo amasango esikole kuphazamisa ukufunda nokufundisa.“Abazali banesigungu esibamele okuyiso esihlangana nothishanhloko sixoxe ngezindaba ezithitha isikole, ngiyaxakeka uma iSGB nayo ithi ayazi ukuthi yini ebambile kodwa ibe ikhuluma nothishanhloko. Siwumnyango silandela imithetho ethile uma kulungiswa izikole kuye ngokuthi umonakalo ungakanani. Uhlelo lwamathenda nalo lunemigomo, njengoba abazali bevale amasango nje uma abafundi sebefeyila yibo futhi abazobuya bezokhala kube kuyibo abaphazamisa ukufunda. Uma bengawuyeki lo mkhuba wokuvala amasango sizothumela amaphoyisa, abasuse, “ kusho yena.
title: Abazali bavale isikole befuna kulungiswe uphahla

text: AKAFUNI nokuyizwa eyama-playoffs, u-Eric Tinkler ongumqeqeshi weMaritzburg United ehlokomise izihlwele ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku ishaya ngo-2-1 AmaZulu FC, eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu.Kulo mdlalo womkhaya oshise uqala waze wayophela, uSuthu luyibone kuqala imbobo yepali ngomkhonto ogwaze ekhaya kaBandile Shandu ngesiwombe sokuqala.Amagoli eTeam of Choice okunqoba eze noFortune Makaringe noJudas Moseamedi olibeke enethini sekusele amanjenjana umdlalo uphele.Nakuba ezikaTinkler zingasukanga endaweni yokugcina kwilog kodwa kuzamazame wonke uMgungundlovu ngokudlala ibhola elihle nokunqoba kweTeam of Choice evale ibhuleki ngamaphuzu angu-17 emuva kwemidlalo engu-22.Ukungenisa mahhala abalandeli kukaFarouk Kadodia ongusihlalo weTeam of Choice kubukeka kube nezithelo njengoba inkundla beyiluhlaza cwe yimibala yeqembu.Ngemuva komdlalo uTinkler obenqoba umdlalo wakhe wesibili njengoba kowokuqala ashaya iPolokwane City ngo-3-1 uthe akafuni ngisho ukuyicabanga eyokuya kuma-playoffs.Uthe okuzobasiza ukuthi kule midlalo engu-6 ebasalele benze isiqiniseko sokuthi bayanqoba. Uveze ukuthi banejoka lokufinyelela emaphuzwini angu-27 kuya kwengu-28 ukuze bavike izembe.“Izembe namaplayoffs into esingaphuphi ngayo nakancane. Sizibekele umgomo wokuthi kumele sithole amaphuzu aphelele kule midlalo esele ukuze sizofinyelela kumaphuzu angu-27 kuya kwangu-28 ekusongweni kwesizini. Ukugencwa yizembe kweqembu elikhulu nelihlonipheke njengeTeam of Choice kungababulala kubaqede abantu baseMgungundlovu,” kubeka uTinkler.NgoMgqibelo olandelayo amabombo uwabhekisa eFNB Stadium, eGoli ukuyobhekana neKaizer Chiefs. NgoMashi 12 ubuyela ekhaya eHarry Gwala Stadium ukuzobhekana neMamelodi Sundowns esilobe isaqhwakele esicongweni selog bese kowesithathu adlale neBloemfontein Celtic khona eMgungundlovu.Mayelana noweChiefs uthe wazi kahle ukuthi uzothwala kanzima kwazise * -Ernst Middendorp ocija amaKhosi uke wayiqeqesha iTeam of Choice.Uqhube wathi: "Ngesonto elizayo kuzomele sibambisane ekutholeni amaqhinga okubhekana noMiddendorp oyaziyo iMaritzburg. Nginethemba lokuthi ukunqoba kwethu namhlanje (esho ngoLwesihlanu) kuzokwenza abadlali bami baqhubeke naleli bhola lokuzethembae. Okuhle ukuthi kasikho isidingo sokugqugquzela abadlali kakhulu uma kuzodlalwa namaqembu anjengeChiefs neSundowns, bayakwazi okumele bakwenze."
title: Akafuni nokuyicabanga eyama-playoffs uTinkler

text: SIZWE BLOSEKUNGAKAPHELI nesonto uDJ Sbu Leope exoshwe kwiMetro FM usephinde wabuyela emsakazweni njengoba esetakulwe wumsakazo otholakala kwi-internet, iCliff Central.Ngeledlule iMetro ixoshe uSbu imsola ngokumaketha isiphuzo sakhe iMoFaya emcimbini wamaMetro FM Music Awards ngokuveza nokukhuluma ngalesi siphuzo esiteji ngesikhathi ethula indondo ehambisana noKhanyi Mbau.Lesi senzo sacasula abaphathi beMetro baze bathatha isinqumo sokummisa emsebenzini nokulandelwe ngukuxoshwa kwakhe. Konke lokhu akumvimbanga uSbu ukuthi aqhubeke nokumaketha isiphuzo sakhe njengoba abonakala enza lokhu nasesiteshini sezindaba i-eNCA.USbu ukuqinisekisile ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi useyongena kwiCliff Central ngenxa yesivumelwano abe naso noGareth Cliff ongumnikazi walo msakazo.Lo msakazo waziwa ngokuthi ukwazi ukusho noma yini kuwona ngaphandle kwenkinga.UGareth osebenzele i5FM iminyaka engu-10 wayevamise ukumiswa njalo emsebenzini ngezinto ezazingavumelekile ayezisho, yingakho ngoMashi 21 wonyaka owedlule wanquma ukuwushiya phansi lo msakazo wasungula owakhe.Lo DJ uthe uzongena ngoLwesine ngo-9 kuya ku-10 kanti lolu hlelo luxhaswe yisona isiphuzo sakhe iMoFaya.
title: Umsakazo ongadumile utakule u-DJ Sbu

text: South Africa (0) 2IBAFANA Bafana ibuyise uthando lweqembu lesizwe ngesikhathi izifaka yona emidlalweni yamanqamu ye-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ezokuba se-Egypt maphakathi nonyaka ngokunqoba koka-Group E kwiLibya izolo ebusuku eTunisia.Njengomlilo wequbula iqembu lasekhaya liqale ngamandla lihlasela kulandelana kuDarren Keet obekuqokwe yena ngaphambi kukaRonwen Williams.Lokhu bekubangwa nayizinkumbi zabalandeli abebethe phama enkundleni iStade Taieb Mhiri beseka iLibya. Ukucindezeleka kweBafana kufakazelwe nawukuthola ikhadi eliphuzi ingaphelile imizuzu emihlanu kuka-Ennocent Maela. Akhona amathuba ambalwa abevela kwiBafana kodwa kubhede ngoba ebetholwa izitobha njngaye uMaela noSifiso Hlanti.Iqiniso lapha ukuthi uStuart Baxter uqale lo mdlalo ngesikimu ebesikhombisa ukucabanga ngokuvala emuva konokuhlasela. Bekuwukuziphikisa lokhu kuBaxter ngoba isonto lonke ubeshumayela ivangeli lokuthi uyela iwini eTunisia hhayi iphuzu.Lonke udonga lwasemuva belwakhiwe ngeBidvest Wits njengoba oKeet, Thunali Hlatshwayo, Buhle Mkhwanazi noHlanti yibona obekuvalwe ngabo. Ngaphezulu kwalokhu bekukhona uDean Furman esisiwini noKamohelo Mokotjo bese kuba uThemba Zwane yedwa obehlasela.Sihambe saze saphela isiwombe iBafana ithwele kanzima kuvela lawo mathuthsna kodwa bangawasebenzisi ngendlela oPercy Tau naye uZwane. Uzigezile uTau evalela enethini igoli ebelidingeka kwiBafana ngomzuzu ka-50.Ngomzuzu ka-65 u-Ahmed Ben Ali unikwe iphenathi engacacile wayibeka enethini. Ngemuva kwale phenathi inkundla yonke isukume yama ngezinyawo. IBafana ithole igoli elicacile, laphikwa. Ngomzuzu ka-68, uTau uphinde wakuphinda lokho ebeka ezikaBaxter phambili. UKeet ubeyiqhawe leBafana.Regards
title: Injabulo iBafana iguqisa iLibya

text: I-UNIVERSITY of KwaZulu-Natal (UKZN) ixoshe izitshudeni ezingu-2 000 esezifunde isikhathi eside zingaphothuli iziqu zazo okusolakala ukuthi ziyinhlese ekukhwezeleni imibhikisho enodlame ezikhungweni zenyuvesi neyenza isimo singazinzi.IPhini likaShansela kule nyuvesi uSolwazi Nana Poku esitatimendeni esithunyelwe Isolezwe izolo, lithe emizameni yokubuyisa isithunzi nozinzo phakathi kokunye abakwenzile, wukuxosha lezi zitshudeni esezifunde iminyaka eyevile kweyisishiyagalombili ngaphandle kokuphothula iziqu zokuqala zeminyaka emithathu ekubeni zisebenzisa izinsiza zenyuvesi futhi zingazikhokheli.“Sizoqhubeka nomsebenzi obalulekile wokuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwezitshudeni zethu nabasebenzi nokuthi umsebenzi esiwenzayo ndawonye uyasimama. Amagwala kuzobhekwana nawo, athole izijezo ezifanele ukuvikela wonke umphakathi wenyuvesi,” kusho uSolwazi Poku.USolwazi Poku ukusho lokhu kulandela isigameko sakamuva sokokhelwa ngomlilo kwesinye sezakhiwo zenyuvesi ophikweni lwayo i-Edgewood ngoLwesithathu ebusuku okusolakala ukuthi kwenziwe ezinye izitshudeni ezinganelisekile ezifuna kunwetshwe isikhathi sokubhalisa.Emhlanganweni wakamuva nomphakathi obuseDenis Hurley Centre, abaholi bezitshudeni banxuse ukuthi kuphenywe abenkampani yonogada iMI17 ngezigameko zokushiswa kwezakhiwo ngoba besola isandla semfene konogada bale nkampani.Kuwo lo mhlangano kuvele umbono wokuthi inyuvesi kumele okungenani iluhlehlisele ukuphela kwale nyanga uhlelo lokubhaliswa kwezitshudeni. Kukhalwa ngokuthi zisengaphezu kuka-1 000 izitshudeni ezingakabhalisi kodwa inyuvesi iluvale ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule lolu hlelo obekumele luvalwe ngoFebhuwari, kwelulwa isikhathi ngenxa yokuphazamiseka kwalo kulandela imibhikisho ezikhungweni ezehlukene zale nyuvesi.USolwazi Poku ukuqinisekisile ukuthi esigamekweni sokushiswa kwesakhiwo, abekho abalimalile noma abashonile. Uthe benza konke okusemandleni ukuthi izigilamkhuba ziboshwe.“UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, usesinikeze ithimba eliyisipesheli elizophenya waphinde wengeza nesibalo samaphoyisa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izimpande zobugebengu ziyasumpulwa ezikhungweni zethu,” kuqhuba uSolwazi Poku.Ugcizelele ukuthi lesi sigameko siyethusa ngoba senzeke ngemuva kwamasonto iziphathimandla zenyuvesi nabaholi bezitshudeni bevalelene ezingxoxweni ukuqhamuka nekhambi lokubuyisela isimo kwesejwayekile enyuvesi.Uthe beyingekho imibhikisho emasontweni adlule. Udalule ukuthi lesi yisenzo seqeqebana elifuna ukubuyisela inyuvesi emuva ngezenzo zobukhotheni okuhloswe ngazo ukuzuzisa abathile noma iqeqebana ngegama lenyuvesi.Akukho lapho aveze khona ukuthi izinhlelo zenyuvesi zimisiwe ngenxa yalesi sigameko.UMengameli womkhandlu wezitshudeni, uS’fiso Simelane, uthe bengabaholi bezitshudeni bayaziqhelelanisa nalesi sigameko.“Kusho ukuthi sonke asiphephile enyuvesi. Asihambisani nokushiswa kwesikhungo ngoba bekungekho nkinga ukufunda kuqhubeka kahle, asazi ukuthi obani abenze lokhu. Sithi akuyiwe kobheka okuqoshwe amakhamera ukuze kutholakale abenze lokhu, bajeze,” kusho uS’fiso.
title: Kuxoshwe-2 000 wezitshudeni e-UKZN kwasha nesakhiwo

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMQEQESHI waMaZulu, uBenni McCarthy, ujatshuliswe ukulungisa iphutha abalenza ngeledlule, bevumela ukubanjelwa ekhaya yiMamelodi Sundowns, emdlalweni weDStv Premiership eJohnsson Kings Park Stadium.Iphutha akhuluma ngalo ulilungise ngokushaya iTS Galaxy ngo-2-1 ngoMgqibelo. Amagoli okunqobe ngawo ezikaMandlakazi, ananyathiselwe enethini uLehlohonolo Majoro ngesiwombe sokuqala, elokubika le-The Rockets ezicijwa ngu-Owen da Gama, lashaywa uLindokuhle Mbatha seliyoshona ilanga.Ngaphezu kokubuyela ekuwineni ekhaya kuSuthu, ukushaya iGalaxy bekusho ukubuyisa izinduku kuleli qembu njengoba lanqoba ngo-1-0 emzuliswaneni wokuqala weligi. USuthu luqhubekile nokuhlala endaweni yesibili ngamaphuzu awu-44, emidlalweni ewu-24. Lusele ngamathathu kwiSundowns eqhwakele, enemidlalo ewu-21."Siphinde sathola amanye amaphuzu amathathu. Ngijabule kakhulu ngendlela abadlali bami abaziphathe kahle ngayo. Siwuqale kahle umdlalo, waphinde wahamba ngendlela ebesiwuhlelele ngayo. Umdlali ngamunye ubezimisele, nalabo abasuke ebhentshini bangene benza umehluko.  IGalaxy asiyivumelanga ukuthi ibone iqhinga lethu. Uma sidlalela ekhaya silwa ngakho konke, sifake ingcindezi kunoma ubani. Ngeledlule, siphoxekile kancane ngesikhathi sibambana seSundowns ekhaya, kwakumele sinqobe. Siye emdlalweni weGalaxy sizitshelile ukuthi sifuna ukulungisa iphutha esilenze ngeledlule, ngempela sikwazile ukunyusa amasokisi," kusho uMcCarthy."Ngemuva kwezinsuku ezintathu sibhacazile koweSundowns, le iyona ndlela esibuye ngayo. Sozokwenza konke okusamandleni ukufaka ingcindezi kwiGolden Arrows (Lomontville Golden Arrows) nakwiSundowns. Ukuze siqhubeka nalokhu kuzomele imiqondo yethu siyigcine ikulesi simo.“Sekuphele imidlalo eyisikhombisa uSuthu lungawazi umpetshisi. Kulesi sibalo lunqobe eyisithupha, lwadlala ngokulingana kowodwa.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, zimjikele izinto uDa Gama ofike kuma-The Rockets wayishukumisa ngemiphumela emihle.Useshaywe emidlalweni emine kulandelana. Kulesi sibalo, ungenelwe amagoli ayisishiyagalombili. Ezakhe zisendaweni yeshumi ngamaphuzu awu-26, emidlalweni ewu-23.Lo mqeqeshi  uthembise ukuthi ezakhe zizovuka zizithathe."Yisizini yethu yokuqala sidlala esigabeni esikhulu, iqembu sisalakha. Uma ubheka sigijima ngabadlali abaningi abaphuma kwiNFD (GladAfrica Championship). Siqhudelana namaqembu afana naMaZulu, Pirates (Orlando), Sundowns anabadlali bezinga eliphezulu. Ukwakha iqembu kuthatha isikhathi. Ngesizini edlule, AmaZulu abevika izembe, awubheke manje ngaphansi kukaBenni akuthi akuphi manje. Ngithi kubalandeli bethu abangadikibali, sizovuka sizithintithe,“ kusho uDa Gama.
title: UMcCarthy ujabule belungisa iphutha

text: AMAPHOYISA aKwaZulu-Natal aphenya icala lokubulala kulandela ukudutshulwa komshayeli webhasi (31) ngoLwesibili ekuseni eVerulam. Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe inkampani yonogada, iReaction Unit SA, abafike endaweni yesigameko kuqala. UMqondisi weReaction Unit SA, uPrem Balram, uthe batshelwe ngokudubulana okwenzeke ngabo 7:03 am ekuseni, emgwaqeni uBuffelsdraai, eRedcliffe. “Amaphoyisa eReaction Unit SA aphuthumele endaweni yesigameko, athola owesilisa esedutshulwe ekhanda kathathu. Abezimo eziphuthumayo baqinisekise ukuthi lowesilisa ushonile ngemuva kwesikhashana,” kuchaza uBalram. UBalram uthe ofakazi bamtshele ukuthi kungene umgibeli ebhasini, wabe esededela inhlamvu kumshayeli. “Umsolwa ungene ebhasini njengomgibeli endaweni eseduzane neyesigameko. Ofakazi batshele amaPhoyisa eReaction SA ukuthi ibhasi belihamba ngenkathi umshayeli edutshulwa. Ibhasi belizabalaza endleleni, kodwa lama maphakathi nomgwaqo. Umsolwa ubalekile endaweni yesigameko. Ngokusho komunye wofakazi, umsolwa ulandwe imoto iVW Polo emhlophe,” kuchaza uBalram. Uthe kutholakale amagobolondo ezinhlamvu amathathu phakathi ebhasini. Amaphoyisa iSAPS afikile endaweni yesigameko.UBalram uthe kusolakala ukuthi umufi ubehlala oThongathi. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kusolwa umgibeli ngokudutshulw komshayeli webhasi oneminyaka engu-31 namhlanjee ekuseni. "Umsolwa ulandwe yimoto wabaleka endaweni yesigameko. Obulewe udutshulwe ekhanda kanti ufele endaweni yesigameko. Asikaziwa isizathu sokubualwa komshayeli njengoba kusaphenywa," kusho uGwala.
title: Kusolwa umgibeli kudutshulwa umshayeli webhasi eVerulam

text: AMAPHOYISA aphenya ngesidumbu esilethwe umshayeli wemoto esiteshini samaphoyisa ezocela usizo.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi owesilisa obeshayela imoto ungene ngesivinini esiteshini saseDurban North eThekwini ecela amaphoyisa ukuba amlekelele njengoba abehamba naye ubedubulekile ngoLwesibili. UMnuz Sibonelo Shinga, ongusomabhizinisi emkhankeni wezolimo kutholakale ukuthi ushonile kulesi sigameko.Abezimo eziphuthumayo bakwa-Crisis Medical, esitatimendeni sabo esifakwe ku-Facebook bathe babizwe esiteshini esiseDurban North ngabo-4 ntambama ngoLwesibili.Bathe batshelwe ukuthi umshayeli wemoto ufike ehamba nomgibeli obedubulekile, kodwa bese kukudala eshonile. “Ngesikhathi sifika akukho ebesingakwenza ngoba bese eshonile umufi. Umshayeli ubengalimele kodwa ubethukile,” kusho abe-Crisis Medical.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuphenywa icala lokubulala.“Amaphoyisa aseDurban North abenza umsebenzi wawo ngesikhathi kufika owesilisa obeshayela imoto eluhlaza, ememeza ecela usizo, ethi akubizwe nabezimo eziphuthumayo. Ngokusho komshayeli ubehamba ku-N2 ngesikhathi abantu angabazi bedubula obehlezi esihlalweni somgibeli. Amaphoyisa abe eseyomsiza emotweni yakhe, abonile ukuthi owesilisa ubesevele eshonile. Kuvulwe icala okubulala nelokuzama ukubulala esiteshini saseDurban North,”kusho uCol Mbele.KuFacebook ikhasi le- iXolani Weekly Journal libhale kanje: “Kwezolimo kuhambe ngokuzuma esinye isifundiswa ebesifunde sagogoda kulo mkhakha emanyuvesi ahlukahlukene, uMnu Sibonelo Shinga.  IXolani Weekly Journal ibingakayitholi imininingwane egcwele ngokuhamba kwale nsizwa yasoGwini kodwa ebisizinze eThekwini.  Njengabaningi abakulo mkhakha wezolimo, naye okaShinga ngaphambi kokuya emanyuvesi, waqala ukufunda eCwaka Agricultural College, esiyi-Owen Sithole College of Agriculture manje, ekwesaKwaMthethwa, eMpangeni,”Imizamo yeSolezwe yokuthola umndeni kamufi ayizange iphumelele izolo kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.
title: Kuphenywa ngolethwe esiteshini samaphoyisa eseshonile

text: ISIKHULU esiphezulu se-Eskom, uMnuz Andre de Ruyter, sithi sizoyihlenga inkampani yize isesimeni esibi.UDe Ruyter usho lokhu ekhuluma neBusiness Day lapho ethe makuphela uJanuwari uzohlangana nebhodi ye-Eskom ayitshele ngezinhlelo zakhe zokuguqula isimo.Okwamanje izinyunyana ezikhuluma kakhulu ngodaba lwe-Eskom okuyiNational Union of Metalworkers of South Africa (Numsa) neNational Union of Mine Workers (Num) zithe zizomqapha ngeso lokhozi zase zimnxusa ukuthi angaluvumi uhlelo lokuthenga ugesi kubakhiqizi abazimele.Ngakolunye uhlangothi i-ANC ithe ayinankinga nokuthi osomabhizinisi bazikhiqizele ugesi wabo nokuthi omasipala bathenge ugesi ezinkampanini ezizimele (Independent Power Producers).UNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Ace Magashule, uthe omasipala abangakwazi ukwenza imali kufanele balekelelwe ezingqinambeni ababhekene nazo okubalwa kuzo isikweletu sika-Eskom.I-Eskom ibikweletwa * -R26.4 billion womasipala ngoSepthemba wonyaka odlule, kulindeleke ukuthi lesi sikweletu sifinyelele kuR30 billion kwikota yokuqala yalo nyaka.UMnuz Enoch Godongwana, uSihlalo wohlaka olubhekelele uguquko kwezomnotho kwi-ANC, uthe uma izinkampani ezizimele zikhiqiza ugesi kusho ukuthi i-Eskom izokwazi ukulungisa ingqalasizinda yayo.Uthe kufanele kubhekwe kahle imithetho ukuze abakhiqiza ugesi ngokuzimele bakwazi ukwenza lokho ngaphandle kokuphula umthetho nokuthi omasipala abane­mali bazithengele ugesi.
title: Ngizoyihlenga i-Eskom noma kukubi: De Ruyter

text: BASHAYWE baphonsa ithawula ngesicoco seligi abeCape Town City ebinethuba lokunamathela kwiMamelodi Sundowns endaweni yesibili ukube ibizibambela ngokwayo leli qembu lasePitoli emdlalweni obuseKapa ngempelasonto.Igoli leSundowns, ebicindezelwe esiwombeni sokuqala salo mdlalo, elize noKhama Billiat linikeze amaBrazilians igebe lamaphuzu amahlanu esicongweni kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership.Ngemva kwayo yonke imiphumela yemidlalo yeligi yangempelasonto, iCity igcine yehlele endaweni yesihlanu ngamaphuzu angu-31.Ngaphezu kwayo sekuhleli iKaizer Chiefs, Free State Stars enyukele endaweni yesithathu kulandela ukuthatha amaphuzu amathathu kwiBaroka, bese kuba yi-Orlando Pirates esendaweni yesibili ngemuva kokwehlula iMaritzburg United.Ngesizini edlule iCity ebingomakoti kwiligi ngaphansi kuka-Eric Tinkler, igcine iqede endaweni yesithathu ngemuva kweWits neSundowns ngokulandelana.Iphini lomqeqeshi kwiCity, uVasili Manousakis, obekubhalwe ukujabha ebusweni bakhe, utshele abeSuperSport ukuthi sebeliphonsile ithawula ngesicoco seligi.Umqeqeshi uBenni McCarthy ubewubuka ehlezi nezihlwele umdlalo ngemuva kokuthola ikhadi elibomvu bebhekene ne-Ajax Cape Town emasontweni edlule.UPitso Mosimane naye opheka iSundowns akasiqedanga isiwombe sokuqala njengoba unompempe obephethe umdlalo, uVictor Gomes emkhombe ngaphandle.“Ngicabanga ukuthi sekuphelile,” kusho uManousakis ebuzwa ngamathuba abanawo esicoco.“Sizozama ukulwela ukuhlala emaqenjini amahlanu aphezulu. Umbandela abebekelwe wona uBenni owokugcina iqembu kwiTop 8, nginethemba lokuthi sizokwazi ukukufeza lokho.”Uyincomile iSundowns ngokuthola amaphuzu amathathu wahlaba ezakhe ngokungasebenzisi amathuba ngesikhathi bephethe umdlalo.Ubuye wakhomba uGomes ngokungahambanga kahle kulo mdlalo. UManousakis umsole ngokungakhiphi ngekhadi elibomvu unozinti weSundowns, uDenis Onyango obonakale eshayisana kabi nomdlali wabo obevutha uThabo Nodada. Kunalokho esiwombeni sesibili uGomes ukhombe ukaputeni weCity uRobyn Johannes ngaphandle.UMcCarthy osekungokwesibili ethola ikhadi elibomvu, naye umgxekile uGomes ebhala ekhasini lakhe kwi-Twitter @bennimccarthy17.“Halala kuMasandwana ngokuwina kusihlwa (ngoLwesihlanu). Abafana bami babe nomdlalo omuhle bebengakufanele ukuhlulwa. Kodwa ebholeni unqoba ngokushaya amagoli okuyinto esingazange siyenze. Kuphindile ke futhi izinqumo ezibhedayo zonompempe zabulala umdlalo wethu omuhle,” kubhala uMcCarthy.Isicoco esingasidlalela iCity yiNedbank Cup lapho izoshukana neBidvest Wits kwiLast 32 kusasa eBidvest Stadium ngo-7.30ebusuku.
title: I-Cape Town City isincamile ngesicoco seligi

text: INHLANGANO  ebhekelele ukusebenza kolimi kuleli, iPan South African Language Board (PanSALB), imemezele igama okuyilo elidle ubhedu kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika okubizwa ngeWord of the Year. Ukubuyiselwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwenkokhelo, phecelezi i-Land Expropriation without Compensation, kube yilona gama eliphume phambili nelisetshenziswe ukwedlula wonke kulo nyaka.    Le nhlangano njalo ngonyaka ibheka igama okuyilo elisetshenziswe kakhulu ngabantu bakuleli, okungaba yisemaphephandabeni, kuthelevishini nakwezinye izinkundla zokubhala.Emagameni abekulawo okugcine kukhethwa kuwona, kubalwa igama elithi Khomishana (obekukhulunywa ngalo uma kukhulunywa ngamaKhomishini aphenya okuthile), kube elithi Thuma mina.Leli eligcine lidla umhlanganiso kuvele ukuthi lisetshenziswe kwaze kwaba ngaphezu kuka-25 000. UThuma Mina usetshenziswe izikhathi eziwu- 5 228, elekhomishini lona lasetshenziswa izikhawu eziwu-18 690.Ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe yi-PanSALB, njalo ngonyaka ikomidi elibhekene nokubhekisisa amagama asetshenziswa kakhulu liye lihlale libheke lawo amagama ahlale esezindebeni zabantu uma bebhala. Bakwenza lokhu bebambisene nezinye izinhlaka zabezindaba. Limenyezelwa minyaka yonke ngo-Okthoba 16 okuwusuku olwaziwa ngeDictionary Day. Kubhekwa amagama asebenze kakhulu kusukela ngoJanuwari kuya ku-Okthoba.Okunye okubhekwayo ngegama eligcina lidla umhlanganiso, wukuthi abantu bayibheke kangakanani incazelo yalo, baphinde balibhala kangakanani ezindabeni noma balisho kangakanani.
title: FUNDA: Igama elidle ubhedu eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2018

text: KUMINZE umfundi (7) waseSokhulu Primary, ngaseRichards Bay obehamba nezinye izingane beyokha umoba ngaphesheya komfula.UNosifundo Nxumalo, waseNgome, KwaSokhulu uminze emfuleni uMsunduzi ngoMgqibelo ezama ukuwela elandela ezinye izingane ebeziyokha umoba.Kuthiwa unina omncane (13) naye ofunda kuso lesi sikole ubemyalele ukuthi asale ngaphesheya ngesikhathi yena nomgani wakhe bewela ngesikebhe beyokha umoba.UNksz Zanele Nxumalo ongumamomkhulu kamufi uthe la mantombazanya angabangani athi ezwe umufi ekhala kwathi uma ebheka ambona eshona evumbuka emfuleni.“Bathe ubememeza unina omncane. Obemenyezwa ubuyele emfuleni wangabe esasigibela isikebhe ethi uzama ukuhlenga ingane yakubo naye wacishe waminza. Usizwe umngani wakhe omnike induku wathi akabambelele kuyo wabuyela esikebheni bagwedla babuyela ekhaya," kusho yena.Uthe izingane ziphume ekhaya zanyenya zingafuni ukuthi umkhulu wazo azibone. Zitshele ezinye izingane ukuthi ziyokha ugwava. Kuthe seziwukhile zahalele umoba obungaphesheya komfula.Imeya kaMasipala uMfolozi, uMnuz Simangaliso Mgenge, obesethimbeni ebelehla lenyuka osebeni lomfula izolo kufunwa ingane, uthe ithimba lezimo eziphuthumayo libizwe ngoMgqibelo.“Umtshuzi uthe uma ethi uyaqala ukubheka wabona kuvela izimvubu ebezilokhu ziveza amakhanda kancane ngaphezu komfula. Uthe akuphephile ukuthi kube nomuntu ongenayo uma kunje ngoba kulo mfula kukhona nezingwenya futhi bese kuqala ukuba mnyama. Umphakathi uvukele khona ekuseni (izolo) wayohlala osebeni lomfula ulindile. Kuthe uma kuphakama ilanga engafiki umtshuzi izinsizwa zendawo zangena emfuleni zabheka. Akuphelanga isikhathi eside zaphuma nesidumbu sengane,” kusho yena.UMgenge uthe bazowulekelela umndeni ngokufihla ingane.UColonel Thembeka Mbele wamaphoyisa esifundazweni uthe baphenya ngokuminza kwengane.
title: Kuminze umfundi obehamba nabebeyokha umoba

text: SIPHINDE safakelwa ezinye izigidi isikhwama okuhloswe ngaso ukusiza intsha enamabhizinisi KwaZulu-Natal, esethulwa ekuqaleni konyaka. Lesi sikhwama esibizwa ngeKZN Youth Fund sethulwa nguNdunankulu wesifundazwe uMnuz Sihle Zikalala ngoJanuwari. Ethula isabelozimali sehhovisi lakhe izolo, undunankulu umemezele ukuthi kuzokwengezwa uR50 million kulesi sikhwama.Ngesikhathi sethulwa ngoJanuwari, uZikalala waveza ukuthi wuR50 million obekelwe lesi sikhwama. Emuva kokwethulwa kwaso kwabuye kwaba nesidlo sasekuseni nabanye osomabhizinisi abanikele ngoR20 million, okwenze isikhwama saba uR70 million. Kumanje isikhwama sesinoR120 million.Ekhuluma eSishayamthetho sesifundazwe izolo uZikalala, uthe basabafuna abanye osomabhizinisi abazimele abazonikela kulesi sikhwama.“Siyazi ukuthi kunokuhlobana phakathi kosomabhizinisi nokudaleka kwamathuba omsebenzi.Lesi sikhwama esesinguR120 million sizosiza intsha engosomabhizinisi, ezovulela nabanye amathuba omsebenzi. Siyakujabulela ukuthi ibhange i-Absa selibeke eceleni uR70 million ozosiza intsha efuna ukuboleka imali noR500 million wamabhizinisi amancane,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe basazibophezele ukuthuthukisa osomabhizinisi esifundazweni nokudala amathuba omsebenzi. Uveze ukuthi kulindeleke ukuthi lesi sikhwama senyuke njengoba kusekhona izingxoxo nabanye osomabhizinisi abazimele. UZikalala uthe ithimba lokuqala lentsha elifake izicelo zokuhlomula kulesi sikhwama, lizokwethulwa ngenyanga ezayo.Ngesikhathi ethula isikhwama ngoJanuwari, undunankulu wagcizelela ukuthi sizohlomulisa kuphela amabhizinisi angeke aphele endleleni. Uthe kuzoxhaswa amabhizinisi azokwazi ukudala amathuba omsebenzi kwenye intsha, ikakhulukazi kwiFranchising nasezimbonini zokukhiqiza. Uveze nokuthi isikhwama senzelwe ukusiza intsha engalutholi uxhasho lokuqala amabhizinisi emabhange, ezosizwa nangokuqeqeshwa.
title: Kungezwe ezinye izigidi kusizwa intsha

text: ISIKHATHI sobumnandi singakubuyisela emuva uma ulwa impi yokuyeka izidakamizwa ngoba kulapho zisuke zixhaphake khona, okwenza kube lula ukulutheka kumuntu ozama ukuzigwema.Abantu bavame ukuphuza utshwala njengendlela yokuzikhokhela ngokusebenza kwabo kanzima. Bakholwa wukuthi kufanele benze into ezobenza bazibone bejabule.Senyukile isibalo sabantu abasenzisa izidakamizwa eNingizimu Afrika. Ngokusho kwenhlangano eluleka ngezifo ezithikameza umqondo, iSouth African Depression and Anxiety Group (SADAG) izibalo ezisanda kukhishwa ziveza ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ingelinye lamazwe awu-10 anesibalo esiphezulu sabantu abasebenzisa utshwala budedengu nabasebenzisa izidakamizwa. Phezu kwalokhu izigameko eziningi zezingozi zezimoto zidalwa ukusetshenziswa budedengu kotshwala nezidakamizwa.Umqondisi wezinhlelo kwiSADAG, uNksz Cassey Chambers, uthe ngisho kungathiwa abantu basebenzisa utshwala noma izidakamizwa noma amaphilisi abawathole kudokotela ngoba befuna ukubhekana nanoma yiziphi izinkinga ngezikhathi zobumnandi kufanele bazi ukuthi lokhu ngeke kubenzele lutho oluhle.Uthe akubasizi ikakhulu abantu abanenkinga yokusebenzisa izidakamizwa nabasebenze kanzima unyaka wonke bezama ukulwa nenkinga. Ukhuthaze labo abalwa nenkinga yokusebenzisa izidakamizwa ukuthi baqhubeke.“Ungayekeleli umsebenzi ongaka osuwenzile kula masonto awu-50 adlule ngenxa yamasonto amabili, lokhu akubona ubuhlakani. Khona manje sekubuyelwa emsebenzini, akumele ubulale impilo yakho ngamasonto amabili,” kusho uNksz Chambers.Ukuze basizakale abantu abanenkinga yokumelana nempi yokuzama ukuyeka izidakamizwa bangathinta uphiko lweSADAG neloMnyango wezokuThuthukisa uMphakathi olubhekele ukusiza abanenkinga yokusebenzisa izidakamizwa ku-0800 12 13 14. Abadinga usizo bangathinta le nombolo noma yinini.Ungoti owelapha izifo ezithikameza umqondo, uDkt Michael Niss, uthe amaholidi anika abantu ithuba lokuphumula kodwa aphinde alethe izilingo kulabo abalwa nokusebenzisa izidakamizwa. Kumele umuntu aqaphele ukuthi awadluli naye. Kumele umuntu azinakekele ngaso sonke isikhathi.“Amaholidi awagcini kuphela ngokunika abantu ithuba lokuphumula kodwa aphinde alethe ithuba lokuhlala nomndeni nokuba semicimbini nesikhathi esithe xaxa sokuphuza utshwala. Okubalulekile wukuthi uthathe izinto kancane kancane futhi ungakuvumeli ukuthi ugxile kosekwenzekile nokungenzeka,” kusho uDkt Niss.Kukholakala ukuthi * -50% wabantu abatholakala benokhwantalala nanoma yisiphi isifo esithikameza umqondo, basuke benenkinga yokusebenzisa izidakamizwa.Abanye abanesifo esithikameza umqondo basebenzisa izidakamizwa ngenhloso yokulapha isifo sabo noma ukuthithibalisa izimpawu zaso.Abantu abasebenzisa izidakamizwa ukwelapha izifo ezithikameza ingqondo bazibeka engcupheni yokugula kakhulu kokunye baze balaliswe esibhedlela.Isikhathi esiningi abantu abasebenzisa izidakamizwa njengendlela yokuzelapha bona izifo ezithikameza umqondo basuke bekwenza ngoba besaba ukucwaswa.Abanye basuke bezama ukumelana nokushonelwa, ukuphela kothando kwabekade bethandana nabo noma yisiphi isimo esinzima ababhekene naso. Bathi uma besebenzise izidakamizwa bazizwa benamandla okubhekana nempilo. Lawa kuba amandla esikhashana ngoba yonke imizwa abasuke belwa nayo ibuya injengoba injalo noma ibe nzima kakhulu kunalokhu abebekuzwa.Izidakamizwa ezivame ukusetshenziswa wutshwala, insangu, i-cocaine nemithi ekhishwa wodokotela okubalwa kuyo amaphilisi ezinhlungu namaphilisi okulala.“Izidakamizwa ziba yisisombululo sesikhashana kodwa izinkinga zingaxazululeki. Isikhathi esiningi abantu bagcina benezinkinga ezingaphezu kwalezo abebenazo bese bephinda beba nenkinga yokusebenzisa izidakamizwa ngaphezu kwazo zonke lezo zinkinga,” kusho uNksz Chambers.Nakhu ongakwenza ukuzisiza ukuthi ungangeni ogibeni lokubuyela ekusebenziseni izidakamizwa:Funda ukuthi cha, ucele nabangani bakho ukuthi bakwesekeUma uya emcimbini zishayelele futhi uzitshele ukuthi uzozishayelela uma ubuya. Uma ufika emcimbini misa imoto yakho endaweni lapho ongezovalelwa kuyo ezinye izimoto ukuze kube lula ukuthi uhambe uma sewufuna ukuhamba.Azi ukuthi yini eyenza ufune ukusebenzisa leso sidakamizwa ukuze ukwazi ukuyigwema? Qaphela kakhulu uma ulambile, udiniwe, unomzwangedwa nokukhathalaIya emcimbini uphethe into ozoyiphuza. Uma kuwukuthi uthanda iwayini elihlohlozayo noma ichampagne phatha amanzi ahlohlozayo.Gwema ukugcwalisa ingilazi uma ugcina uphuze uphuzo oludakayo ngoba ukugcwalisa ingilazi eyodwa kungaholela ekuphuzeni eziningi kunalezo obuzimisele ngazo.Qaphela izimo ezikucindezayo noma ezikudalela ukhwantalala.Uma usemcimbini thola into ezokugcina umatasa. Gwema ukuma eduze nalapho okuthengwa khonaiziphuzo. Kungcono ugxile ekuxoxeni nabantu noma ube nosizo kulowo owenze umcimbi.Zihlele ngaso sonke isikhathi. Uma ungathandi ukuthi abantu bazi ukuthi ulwa nenkinga yezidakamizwa thola indlela yokubachazela ukuthi yini ndaba ungazimisele ngokuphuza noma ukusebenzisa izidakamizwa.Uma uhalela izidakamizwa thola enye into ongayenza.
title: Indlela yokulwa nezidakamizwa kwabanenkinga yazo

text: IMENENJA kaKhama Billiat, uSiyabulela Loyilane, iphumela obala ngamahlebezi ahlanganisa lo mdlali neKaizer Chiefs.Ngesonto eledlule kusabalale amahlebezi okuthi uBilliat usesayine inkontileka yesibambiso naMakhosi. Inkontileka kaBilliat neSundowns iyaphela ngoJuni.ULoyilane uthe ayikho inkontileka uBilliat aseyisayine neChiefs. “UBilliat usengumdlali weSundowns. Yebo ngokwemithetho yeFifa usengayisayina inkontileka yesibambiso kodwa ayikho asayisayinile. IChiefs ayikaze ingithinte futhi uBilliat akakayisayini inkontileka yesibambiso nayo ngokwazi kwami.”UBilliat akakaze abonakale kwiSundowns emidlalweni emithathu esike yayidlala selokhu kubuywe emaholidini kaDisemba.“Uyajima neqembu, into ayifunayo wukudlala. Isifiso sakhe wukuyodlala phesheya kwezilwandle. Usezinqobe zonke izicoco ezikhona eNingizimu Afrika ezimqoka. Kanti yini engabe usayihlalele?” kubuza uLoyilane.UBilliat kuthiwa ufunwa ngamaqembu aseSaudi Arabia nase-Egypt. Umthombo wethu uthe zikhona izicelo kodwa iSundowns ayizizwa.“Kunzima ukusebenza neSundowns uma umdlali sekufanele ayodlala phesheya. Akukona ukuthi uBilliat akanazo izicelo emaqenjini aphesheya. Unazo futhi ezinhle kodwa iSundowns ifuna okungaphezu kokubekwa amaqembu. UBilliat ngeke ngimeluleke ukuthi ajoyine iChiefs kodwa ngeke wazi ngabadlali. Uma ethi ufuna ukuyodlala kuyona sekungamele kuhlalwe phansi nemenenja yakhe kubonwe ukuthi kwenziwa njani. Phela ukudlalela iChiefs kulaba bafana kuseyinto enkulu,” kusho umthombo.UBilliat ufike kwiSundowns ngo-2013 esuka kwi-Ajax Cape Town. Usezinqobe zonke izicoco ezimqoka neqembu. Ukhale wemuka nezicoco ezimbili ze-Absa Premiership, eseTelkom Knockout, Nedbank Cup, CAF Champions League neseCAF Super Cup.Umdlali wokugcina ukusuka kwiSundowns aye kwiChiefs kube uLeonardo Castro osanda kufika eqenjini. Ngaphambi kwalokho kufike uRamahlwe Mphahlele ofike washaya into ecokeme kuMakhosi ngaphambi kokuthi alimale.ISundowns akuyihambeli kahle kulezi zinsuku. Selokhu kuqale unyaka isishaywe kabili. Iqale yaqunjwa phansi yiPolokwane City ngo 3-2 njengoba iphindwe yi-Orlando Pirates ngo 3-1 ngempelasonto. Isawine umdlalo owodwa lapho ishaye khona i-Ajax Cape Town ngo 2-1.NgoMgqibelo izobhekana nePlatinum Stars eLoftus Stadium, ePitoli, ngo-6 ntambama.
title: Imenenja ichaza ekaBilliat neChiefs

text: NKOSIKHONA CELEYENZE okungajwayelekile indoda yaseBhizana, e-Eastern Cape okuthe uma ilimala umphambili,  yaphisana ngengoduso yayo kumngane wayo ngoba ithi ngeke isakwazi ukuyijabulisa ngenkonzo yasekamelweni. UMnuz Bheki Mchunu (40) uthi lokhu ukwenze ngoba esebona ukuthi kuphelile ngempilo yakhe usefana nento engelutho.Uthe ngo-2019 wazizwa enezinhlungu ezingabekezeleleki esiswini waphuthuma esibhedlela iPrince Mshiyeni Memorial  eMlaza.Odokotela uthi abapholisanga maseko bamhlola bamazisa ukuthi amathumbu akhe anenkinga kuzodingeka ukuba ahlinzwe."Angibanga nankinga nokuhlinzwa ngoba ngangifuna ukululama. Inkinga iqale sengiphaphama amathumbu engaphandle. Uma ngibabuza bathi bazowabuyisela ngaphakathi ngemuva kwezinyanga ezintathu,"echaza.Uthi wabuyela esibhedlela ngemuva kwazo izinyanga ezintathu. Udokotela owayemhlinza uthi wavele wamphendula ngamazwi anzima wathi : "Ngeke ngisakwazi ukaqala phansi ngikuhlinze. Angifuni ukungcolisa izandla zami ngomphefumulo wakho.''Uthi wazifundela kwezakhe ukuthi uqonde ukumtshela ukuthi uma eke waqala phansi wahlinzwa uzokwelusa amadada."Kusukela lapho angiphindanga ngakwazi ukuzithokozisa ngokocansi. Induku yami kayisebenzi nje nhlobo. Ngisho kungathiwa iyasebenza yimuphi nje lo muntu wesifazane ongavuma ukulala nowesilisa onamathumbu ngaphandle," kubuza yena  ehlengezela izinyembezi."Mina ngiyafana nomuntu ofile. Angiseyona indoda uma kunje. Ngifuna isibhedlela iMshiyeni singihlawule,"usho kanje zizehlela izinyembezi. Uthe nokudla akusahlali esiswini udla manje ngemuva kwemizuzu emihlanu kumele aye endlini encane. Nomsebenzi abewenza uwuyekile ngoba akasakwazi ukuma isikhathi eside.Mayelana nomgani wakhe "amuphe'' ingoduso yakhe, uthe uyefana nomfowabo. Umchaze njengowesilisa othembekile, oneqiniso, onozwelo futhi ongazikhukhumezi. "Nomsebenzi ebengiwenza ngaphambi kokubhekana nalesi simo ngangiwutholelwe nguyena. Njalo uma nginenkinga ubengabuzi lutho ubevele angisize ngalokho engikudingayo,"echazaUthe kungcono ingoduso yakhe ilale nomuntu "ongumfowabo'' kunokuthi ilale namanye amadoda angawazi futhi angakaze amsize ngalutho empilweni yakhe.Isolezwe NgoMgqibelo likhulumile nengoduso, uNksz Zandile Mahlangu yavuma ukuthi sikhona isimo esifuze lesi. Uthe uyohlala  emthanda uMchunu ngoba uyindoda enothando lweqiniso futhi eqotho."Angikaze ngimbone owesilisa onenhliziyo enhle njengalona. Uyakwazi ukuphatha kahle umuntu wesifazane futhi namanje uyangihlonipha. Ungaphika ukuthi kukhona lesi simo esiphazamisa impilo yakhe,'' echaza.Umngani ophiwe ingoduso yena ucele igama lakhe lingaveli ephepheni, kodwa wathi usamukelile lesi sipho."UBheki umngani wami weqiniso. Futhi akukho okuyodala ukuthi sixabane nangelilodwa ilanga. Lokhu kwengoduso ngicabanga ukuthi uNkulunkulu okudalile ngoba kwenzeke ngesikhathi vele nami kusanda kudlula emhlabeni owesifazane engangisezinhlelweni zokumlobola," usho kanje wacela ukungandi kade ngalolu daba athe ukuba kuya ngaye ngabe alubhalwa nasephepheni.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu Natal, uMnuz Ntokozo Maphisa ucele ukuxhunyaniswa noMchunu ukuze uMnyango ululandele udaba lwakhe uzame ukungenela.
title: Uphisane ngengoduso onenkinga yomphambili

text: AMAPHOYISA aseGauteng asebophe abesolwa abayisikhombisa abasolwa ngokuthinteka ekubulaweni kwamadoda ayisithupha emjondolo ongasehostela eJabulani eSoweto ngeledlule. Kwasinda oyedwa kulesi sigameko ngesikhathi abantu abangaziwa bevulela bedubula bebhekise emkhukhwini besho ukuqeda ngawo wonke umuntu owayengaphakathi ngoJuni 8 ebusuku. Okhulumela amaphoyisa eGauteng uColonel Noxolo Kweza uthe amaphoyisa abophe abasolwa ababili KwaZuu-Natal ababanjwe nezibhamu okubalwa kuzo i-AK47. "Laba basolwa bahole amaphoyisa athola abanye abasolwa abahlanueGauteng, nabo ababanjwe nezibhamu," kusho uColonel Kweza othe abasolwa bayasolwa nangamanye amacala okubulala kuleli. Uthe owasinda kulesi sigameko usalashelwa amanxeba okudutshulwa esibhedlela. Ukhomishana wamaphoyisa uLieutenant General Elias Mawela uwasheyele ihlombe amaphoyisa ngokuluthathela phezulu lolu daba. Ngesikhathi ekhuluma ngalesi sigameko emsakazweni i702, uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli waveza ukuthi basola utshwala njengomsuka wokubulawa kwalaba. Waveza ukuthi babendawonye bephuza, okungasho ukuthi ababulawe, "kodwa udlame nezigameko zobugebengu kunyukile selokhe izwe lingene esigabeni sesithathu sikathaqa." UCele wakuveza nokuthi lawa madoda ayazana futhi amaphoyisa azophenya ukuthi ababehlasela babengziphindiseleli yini ngokuthile.
title: Kuboshwe abayisikhombisa ecaleni lokubulawa kwabayisithupha ngasehostela

text: INOMTHELELA omubi emnothweni weTheku imibhikisho enodlame, ngokusho kweDurban Chamber of Commerce and Industry.NgoMsombuluko abantu basemijondolo ekuQuarry ngaseReservoir Hills, bavale umgwaqo uM19 bashisa imoto nebhasi bekhala ngokuthi kabanawo amathoyilethi nogesi.Isikhulu esiphezulu seDurban Chamber uNkk Palesa Phili, sicele abantu ukuthi uma kukhona abanganeme ngakho bahlale phansi nezinhlaka ezifanele babeke izikhalo zabo hhayi ukuthi bashise amathayi bavale nemigwaqo.“Umbhikisho wangoMsombuluko obunodlame kuM19 uphazamise ukuhamba kwezimoto emgwaqweni, wabeka engcupheni ukuphepha kwabantu ngoba kugcine sekusha imoto nebhasi. Bekunesiminyaminya esiyisimanga. Ucwaningo lwethu luveza ukuthi kuphazamisekile ukusebenza kwamabhizinisi ahlukene eThekwini. Asikwazi ukuba nesimo esifana nalesi edolobheni lethu,” kusho uNkk Phili.Uthe iTheku lidinga imisebenzi, ukukhulisa umnotho nokuheha abatshali bemali nezivakashi.“Uma kunemibhikisho enodlame, amabhizinisi awasebenzi, okusho ukungangeni kwemali emnothweni nakubantu. Siyacela abantu baxoxe nezinhlaka ezifanele uma benganeme hhayi ukuthi benze imibhikisho enodlame. Kubalulekile nokuthi amaphoyisa asheshe asukume uma kunemibhikisho ukuze kuphephe abantu, ingqalasizinda nempahla yomphakathi neyosomabhizinisi,” kusho uNkk Phili.UMasipala weTheku ulugxekile udlame embhikishweni wemijondolo yakuQuarry.UMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uthe ukhishiwe ugesi wezinyokanyoka ngoba umasipala ulahlekelwa yizigidi ngenxa yalesi senzo.Uthe umasipala uyabanika abantu izidingo kodwa abantu bakha imijondolo ezindaweni okungelula ukuletha intuthuko kuzo.
title: I-Durban Chamber ihlaba imibhikisho enodlame

text: BASASHAQEKILE ozakwabo bephoyisa lasesiteshini saseBabanango elizingqokloze ngesibhamu lashona kulandela ukushayisa izinkomo ezintathu ngemoto yomsebenzi okuthiwa beliyintshontshile.UConstable Ayanda Gwala oneminyakaengu-32, ubesebenza ebusuku ngoMgqibelo, wathatha imoto yomsebenzi ngaphandle kwemvume waya kubo KwaNongoma. Esendleleni eya ekhaya eMahlabathini ushayise izinkomo ezintathu, walimaza imoto yomsebenzi.Leli phoyisa alizange lilimale kulesi sigameko. Kuthe imoto isadonswa kukhona namanye amaphoyisa, lavele lama eceleni komgwaqo lazidubula ngesibhamu salo somsebenzi emlonyeni, lashonela khona lapho.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuvulwe idokodo ngokushona komuntu necala lokushayela budedengu.“Iphoyisa elisebenza eBabanango belihamba emgwaqweni u-R66 ngesikhathi lishayisa izinkomo ezintathu. Alizange lilimale kulesi sigameko kodwa libe selizidubula. Amaphoyisa aseMahlabathini ayaphenya ngesigameko,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Umthombo weSolezwe uthe leli phoyisa belibalisa kulandela lesi sigameko lisaba nokuthi lizobhekana necala.“Ubesephumile endaweni engaphansi kwesiteshi iBabanango, ehamba ngemoto yomsebenzi ngaphandle kwemvume futhi egibelise umuntu ongelona iphoyisa. Sisola ukuthi ubesaba ukuxoshwa noma ukubhekana necala njengoba ubebalisa ngakwenzile,” kusho umthombo.Omunye umthombo osemaphoyiseni uveze ukuthi kubashaqile impela ukuzidubula kwaleli phoyisa ekubeni lisindile engozini yemoto.“Izinkomo ezintathu uzishayise zafa kodwa wakwazi ukusinda. Kuyasishaqisa ukuthi avele azidubule ngoba icala belingathethwa, lidlule. Ubevele enenhlanhla ngoba usindile kule ngozi ebiyimbi,” kusho elinye iphoyisa elicele ukungadalulwa.Imizamo yokuthola umndeni waleli phoyisa ayizange iphumelele izolo njengoba izinombolo zomndeni zingazange zitholakale.Noma sekushayelwa isiteshi asebenza kuso, umphathi wakhe uveze ukuthi akanayo inombolo yomndeni waleli phoyisa futhi ubesalinde umndeni ufike esiteshini uzolanda izimpahla zikamufi.Abanye ozakwabo baleli phoyisa abakhulume neSolezwe kodwa bacela ukungadalulwa, bathe basashaqekile ngalesi sigameko njengoba uGwala ubeyiphoyisa elincane elinekusasa eliqhakazile.
title: Ushayise izinkomo maqede wazibulala

text: KUZOCACA ngesonto elizayo ngekusasa lomdlali weKaizer Chiefs, uHendrick Ekstein, ongakayisayini inkontileka entsha eNaturena.U-Ekstein, ongomunye wabadlali ababalulekile kumqeqeshi * -Ernst Middendorp, wenqabile ukusayina enkontileka entsha emasontweni adlule, ekhala ngomholo ongagculisi iChiefs ebimbekela wona.Lo mdlali nemenenja yakhe, uPalesa Mkhize wePulse Players Management bacele ukuthi iChiefs ibuye nomholo obuyekeziwe. Amakhosi asevele azivuselele izinkontileka zabadlali, okukhona kubona uBernard Parker, Kgotso Moleko noRamahlwe Mphahlele. UJoseph Molangoana olimale ekuqaleni kwesizini noGustavo Paez olizwa ngendaba ijezi, abakazi ukuthi ikusasa libaphatheleni.UMkhize uthe ekuqaleni kwesonto elizayo bazothatha isinqumo ngekusasa lika-Ekstein ozophelelwa yinkontileka kwiChiefs ekupheleni kwesizini.“Sizohlangana nabaphathi ngoMsombuluko noma ngoLwesibili. Lona wumhlangano wokugcina nabo. Sizophuma sesazi ukuthi sibheka kuphi. Uma singavumelani, sizoqala ukuxoxa namanye amaqembu,” kusho uMkhize.U-Ekstein ukhushulelwe esikimini esikhulu seChiefs ngo-2015. Nakuba abalandeli beChiefs behlukene phakathi ngaye kodwa ubenze bacabanga ngenye indlela eshaya into ecokeme ngesikhathi esiza iqembu likhipha iCape Town City kwiNedbank Cup emasontweni amabili adlule.“Kuhle ukuthi uyadlala. Usethole umqeqeshi okholelwa kuyena. Angazi noma kuyaziqondanela yini ukuthi udlala kahle ekubeni ephelelwa yinkontileka.Konke okwenzekayo akafuni kumphazamise. Uhlala elwela ukuthi adlale kahle emdlalweni olandelayo nokuhlala esesimeni njalo uma umqeqeshi emdinga. Umqeqeshi uyakholelwa kuyena kodwa kuzokwenzekani uma exoshwa ngoba baningi abanye abebengakholelwa kuyena,” kusho uMkhize.UMiddendorp akakufihlanga ukuthi uyamdinga * -Ekstein eqenjini futhi ufuna ahlale, wathi ungomunye wabadlali abaphambili aseke wasebenza nabo engumqeqeshi. Ngesonto eledlule uthe * -Ekstein akacabange kahle, angahanjiswa wukuthenjiswa elinye iqembu imali engcono ngoR10.“Ukuba bengiwuyena ngifike esigabeni esikhokhelayo ngina-24, manje ngina-28, nginomqeqeshi othembele kimina futhi ngiseneminye iminyaka eyisihlanu engizoyidlala, ukushintsha ngiye kwelinye iqembu bekuzoba okokugcina emqondweni wami. Bengingabhekisisa konke. Kodwa ke abadlali banezimenenja, banomalume futhi bashelwa amanye amaqembu. Bacabanga ukuthi ukuthola uR10 ngaphezulu kwenza umehluko omkhulu.“Kodwa kufanele abuze noma abheke abanye abadlali abashintshe baya kwamanye amaqembu, bezitshela ukuthi kungcono khona. Emuva kwezinyanga ezimbili sebenwaya amakhanda, sebeyafona sebefuna ukubuya. Ngingamyala ngithi akahlale. Ngethemba ukuthi uzosithola isixazululo,” kusho uMiddendorp.IChiefs izobhekana neBlack Leopards emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eThohoyandou Stadium ngoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama.Kusasa ngo 8 ebusuku: Chippa United v Bidvest Wits (Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium)NgoMgqibelo : Black Leopards v Kaizer Chiefs (Thohoyandou Stadium, 3pm)Highlands Park v Maritzburg United (Makhulong Stadium, 3pm)SuperSport United v Polokwane City (8.15pm)Orlando Pirates v Free State Stars (Orlando Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto ngo 3 ntambama:Golden Arrows v AmaZulu FC (Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium)Bloemfontein Celtic v Cape Town City FC (Dr Molemela Stadium).
title: Kuzocaca maduze ngo-Ekstein kwiChiefs

text: ABELAPHI bendabuko bathi bayizigebengu nabathakathi abantu abacwiya izitho zomzimba ngenhloso yokwelapha ngazo.Abelaphi bendabuko basho lokhu ngesikhathi behlangene ehholo lomphakathi iSiphumelele, KwaMakhutha izolo bedingida izindaba ezibakhathazayo ngomkhakha wabo.UMakhosi Nonhlanhla “Mshanelo” Nkomo onguNobhala wenhlangano yabelaphi iNational Unitary Professional Association for African Traditional Health Practitioners of South Africa (NUPAATHPSA) kulesi sifundazwe uthe bakhathazekile ngabangcolisa igama labelaphi bendabuko okukhona kubo nabatholakala nezicubu zabantu.“Abelaphi abazisebenzisi izicubu ukuze balaphe. Abenza lokhu yizigebengu,” kusho uMakhosi Nkomo.Uthe njengoba bebhalise kuhulumeni kungumsebenzi wabo ukuthi balandelele uma kukhona abelaphi abangenzi kahle. Utshele abelaphi abebesemcimbini ukuthi uma betholakala besephutheni elifana naleli bayocindezelwa nayinhlangano emele abelaphi ngoba bayobe bedicilela phansi umsebenzi wabo.Uthe abanye balabo abazenza abelaphi basuke bengabizelwanga ekutheni babe yibo - bangabelaphi mbumbulu abavuka sebengabelaphi. Ubalule ukuthi ngeke umelaphi atshele umuntu ukuthi ukuze amelaphe kufanele alale naye noma kufanele alethe izicubu zomuntu onebala elimhlophe.Uveze ukuthi kunezinhlelo zokuthi kusungulwe ithimba elizohlola abelaphi liqinisekise ukuthi bangabelaphi ngempela bese becijwa banikwe nezitifiketi abazozilengisa odongeni ezikhombisa ukuthi bakufanele ukwenza lo msebenzi.UMbhishobhi Nqoba Zindela, uSihlalo weMoral Regenaration Movement eThekwini nophinde abhekelele ezokuziphatha kuNUPAATHPSA, uthe abelaphi abenza le mikhuba bangabathakathi.Unxuse abathandazi nezangoma, abefundisi ukuthi bafunde bahlangane ukuze bathole indlela yokusizana nokucobelelelana ngolwazi. Uthe kufanele kuphele ukucwasana phakathi kwazo zonke lezi zinhlaka njengoba kuke kube khona ukugxekana lapho okugxekwa khona izangoma athe kwenziwa abefundisi uma beshumayela.
title: Balahla abelapha ngezicubu

text: ISAZOQHUBEKA nokuqhuma inganono kubaholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal njengoba kubhekwe engqungqutheleni yokukhetha ubuholi kuzwelonke ezoba ngoDisemba eGoli kulo nyaka.Lona wumbono womhlaziyi wezepolitiki wase-UKZN uSolwazi Lukhona Mnguni.Lo mhlaziyi ubephefumula mayelana nesigameko sakamuva sokuhlaselwa kwamakhansela amathathu aseMzimkhulu abephuma emhlanganweni esenzeke ngoLwesine, e-Ibisi, eMzimkhulu.Phakathi kwala makhansela bekukhona uMnuz Sindiso Magaqa oke waba nguNobhala-Jikelele we-ANCYL kuzwelonke oseyiPR kwa-ward 11, uNonsikelelo Mafa wakwa-ward 11 noJabu Mzizi wakwa-ward 16.Kuthiwa basinde ngokulambisa kubalisa abangaziwa abebebadubula.UMnguni exoxa naleli phephandaba uthe zimbili izinto ezidala uthuthuva esifundeni iHarry Gwala, yinkohlakalo kuMasipala iHarry Gwala nokubangwa kwezikhundla kwi-ANC."Kunokhetho lwesifunda oluzoba seHarry Gwala maduze, into eyenza ukuthi lubangwe lolu khetho wukuthi abazonqoba bazoya engqungqutheleni yokukhetha ubuholi bayophakamisa igama lozoba ngumengameli. Lesi sifunda siyikhaya likaDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma osembangweni wesikhundla sobuholi."UMnguni uthe amaphaphu aphezulu eHarry Gwala ngoba abaholi bakhona bafuna isifunda sabo sibe yibekankosi.Uthe okunye okudala uthuthuva ukwehlukana phakathi kwabaholi balesi sifunda odabeni lwenkohlakalo."Abanye bayingxenye yenkohlakalo, abanye balwa nayo yingakho kuqhuma isibhamu. Umengameli uze wajuba ithimba eliphenya ngodaba lwenkohlakalo okuthiwa inuka phu kulesi sifunda. Ziningi izigameko zokuhlaselwa kosopolitiki ezisazoba khona kulo nyaka." kusho uSolwazi Mnguni.Ebuzwa ngesixazululo sodungunyane uthe iqembu elibusayo kufanele lihlakule ukhula emagcekeni alo ukuze konke kuhambe kahle."Le nto kade ngiyichaza kwikhomishini kaMoerane ephenya ngokubulawa kosopolitiki esifundazweni. Izinto zonakele kuKhongolose, akuselona iqembu elilwela abantu. Abaholi sebelwela ukuzicebisa bona nabasondelene nabo, bakhohliwe yimigomo iqembu elasungulwa ngaphansi kwayo yokubeka abantu phambili," kuphetha uSolwazi Mnguni.
title: Umhlaziyi uthi kusazobulawana kuKhongolose

text: UKHUNJULWE ngedili lomculo yizinsizwa nezintokazi ezaziyingxenye yohlelo ama-Idols SA izolo, owaduma kulolu hlelo uThami Shobede enkonzweni yesikhumbuzo ebise-AOG Assemblies of God, eSandton, eGoli.Kule nkonzo osaziwayo bakuleli endimeni yomculo bebephume ngobuningi ukuzovalelisa kule nsizwa ebisakhula endimeni yomculo. Kozakwabo ayenabo kusizini 12 yama-Idols SA, kucule uLucia nabanye.Umngani kaThami, uBlessing Cele, unxuse akade bethamele le nkonzo ukuthi bangayeki ukushayela izihlobo zabo noma abangani babo ucingo bababheke ukuthi banjani empilweni.“UThami ubehlala ekhala ngokuthi endimeni yomculo akanakiwe. Ilelo nje abekhala ngalo. Ngakho ngiyanxusa ukuthi sibhekane ukuthi sinjani empilweni futhi kuhamba kanjani emisebenzini yethu. Uyazi emakhaya thina sakhula sinanelana impuphu nomakhelwane okuyinto eyayikhombisa ukuthi omunye kukhona la ashoda khona bese uyamnika lokho akudingayo. La eGoli ngiyazi kuyaphithizela, kodwa ake sizame ukwenza ngendlela emakhaya okwenziwa ngayo,” kuchaza uBlessing.UThami uzongcwatshwa ngoMgqibelo eMtubatuba lapho azalelwa khona.Inkonzo yakhe yesikhumbuzo izoba sehholo eliselokishini laKwaMsane khona eMtubatuba.UVusi Nova, Brenda Mntambo noKholeka ngabanye babaculi abaduduze izihlwele ngomculo kule nkonzo.
title: UThami ukhunjulwe ngedili lomculo enkonzweni

text: SEKUQUBUKE indida ngoDawn Thandeka King odlala indawo kaMazet kwiLockdown, kuMzansi Magic oveze ukuthi useyashiya kulo mdlalo kodwa uphrojusa womdlalo wangena ezintangeni.UDawn uvalelise kubabukeli beLockdown kuleli sonto ngokubhala kuTwitter ukuthi useyashiya futhi ubonga ukwesekwa ngabantu ngendawo abeyidlala kusuka kwisizini yokuqala yomdlalo. Lokhu ukusho ngemuva kwesiqephu sangoMsombuluko okungacacanga kusona ukuthi ushonile yini, njengoba umdlalo uphele edutshulwa.Yize esho kanje kodwa uphrojusa weLockdown uMandla N, uthe abantu abaqhubeke nokubuka iLockdown njengoba isisalelwe yiziqephu ezine futhi ngeke akuqinisekise ukuthi akasezobakhona uDawn kuyona.“Engingakusho nje ukuthi uMazet (Dawn Thandeka King) uyinsimbi kayigobi futhi ngisazosebenza naye kwiLockdown.
