Kungenzeka ukuthi avuke eseyisipoki noma kwenzeke okunye okuzomgcina ekhona kwiLockdown. Ngonyaka ozayo ngabo-Ephreli, iLockdown izobuya ngesizini yesine."Kuningi okusazokwenzeka kuyona, abantu abalindele futhi sisazosebenza noDawn,” kusho uMandla N.Imizamo yokuthola uDawn ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwakhe belulokhu luvaliwe.Okhulumela uMzansi Magic, uBongi Potelwa-Metsing uthe abakwazi ukudalula okusazokwenzeka ngesiqephu esilandelayo ngendawo kaMazet.“Ngebhadi ababukeli kumele baqhubeke nokubuka isiqephu esilandelayo ukubona ukuthi ubani osindile ngesikhathi kudutshulwa uMazet noMaki (Linda Sebezo). Uma singaveza ikusasa labalingisi kulo mdlalo sizolimaza isiqephu esilandelayo. Umdlalo uba mnandi ngokuthi ushiye ababukeli bemangele futhi besafuna ukwazi ukuthi kuzogcina kwenzekeni. Ngicela silinde isiqephu sangoMsombuluko (kusasa) ukuze sibone okuzokwenzeka,” kusho uBongi.
title: Akucaci ngoDawn kwiLockdown

text: Mbali KhanyileKUNABANTU ababikelwayo uma sekushaye isikhathi sehlobo ngenxa yohlobo lwesikhumba sabo esincikiselayo uma kushisa.Abanye balaba bantu kabakwazi ukuthenga imikhiqizo yesikhumba ebizayo, bagcina sebezama ezinye zezindlela zokulwa nobubi besikhumba. Phakathi kwezindlela abagcina sebethembela kuzo kubalwa ibovu, isibabuli, umuthi wokuxubha amazinyo nokunye.Lezi zindlela abasuke bezisebenzisa bavamise ukuzincoma kakhulu ngokuba nemiphumela emihle. Kepha ungoti wesikhumba usexwayise ngemikhiqizo yokuzakhela engahloliwe izingabunjalo bayongokuthi ingaba yingozi esikhunjeni somuntu.UDkt Cebi Sibisi ongungoti wesikhumba, uthe akabeluleki abantu ukuthi basebenzise imikhiqizo abazihlanganisela yona emakhaya ngoba kwesinye isikhathi abantu iyabashisa esikhunjeni.“Sekukaningi ngibona abantu belinyazwe yimikhiqizo abazihlanganisele bona. Abanye basuke bebona ama-video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoba bethi banqanda inkinga kanti bayayandisa. Lokho kugcina sekubafaka ezinkingeni zokuthungatha usizo kodokotela besikhumba abebebabalekelela,” kuchaza uDkt uSibisi.Uxwayise ngale mikhiqizo, i-apple cider, ujusi walamula, umuthi wokuxubha amazinyo, athe akuvumelekile.Amathiphu okunakekela isikhumba ehlobo:* Phuza amanzi kakhulu-Ukuphuza kakhulu amanzi kuyasiza njengoba ukungcola kwesikhumba kukhishwa ngamanzi osuke uwaphuza.*Hambela kude nelanga- Gqoka uphinde ugcobe imikhiqizo ekuvikela ekushisweni yilanga.* Vakashela udokotela wesikhumba ozokucebisa ngokuhambisana nesikhumba sakho.* Uma usiqonda isikhumba sakho, vakashela ikhemisi ongasizakala kulona ngokumele ukugcobe.* Zijwayeze ukugcoba i-sunscreen njengoba ivikela ebungozini bokusha kwesikhumba.
title: Isexwayiso ngokuzenzela okhilimu bobuso

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANEI SINQUMO sokubeka phansi izintambo ngenyanga ezayo somholi weDA uNkk Helen Zille sishiye abantu benemibono ehlukene kusuka kulabo abayizitha zakhe kwezombusazwe nakubahlaziyi.Izolo uNkk Zille umemezele esithangamini sabezindaba ukuthi usethi khumu ekuholeni iDA kusuka ngoMeyi 9 engqungqutheleni okuzobe kukhethwa kuyo ubuholi baleli qembu obusha.UNkk Zille uthe uthathe lesi sinqumo ngeledlule emuva kweminyaka eyisishiyagalombili ehola i-DA. Uthe usazoqhubeka aqedele iminyaka esele enguNdunankulu wase Western Cape.Uthe i-DA ayimile ngaye kodwa kunabaholi abaningi futhi ukholelwa kakhulu ukuthi wonke umuntu anikwe ithuba.“Uma ubheka nje okhethweni lwango 2009 ngangingebona ubuso beqembu kodwa uLindiwe Mazibuko uyena owabe engubuso beqembu kunguye osekhaleni lemikhankaso oba phambili noma kunezinkulumo mpikiswano,” kusho uZille.Uthi ukuthi umholi ozomlandela uyiliphi ibala akuyona into ebakhathazayo ngoba bayiqembu lawo wonke umuntu futhi alikho iqembu elinobuholi obuxube izinhlanga njenge DA.UMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu ongumhlaziyi wezepolitiki ofundisa eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal uthe lesi sinqumo sethusile futhi sikhombise ngokusobala ukuthi bekuvele sekunenkinga uNkk Zille abebhekene nazo eqenjini.“Lesi sinqumo sakhe asithathe isigubhukane sishiya imibuzo mayelana nokuthi ngabe ngubani ozothatha emva kwakhe ngoba akekho okwamanje umuntu okungathiwa ubemkhulisa ukuze alungiselele ukumshiya ezintanjeni, kwazise noDkt Mamphele Ramphele wathi umenza ubuso beqembu kwangalunga. Okunye wukuthi uma ubheka kuyacaca ukuthi isimo besingasesihle kuye njengoba bese kunenkinga yokungagculiseki ngaye kwabanye abaholi ngaphakathi kwaze kwasula noNksz Lindiwe Mazibuko,”UMnuz Thabani Khumalo ongumhlaziyi ozimele, uthe bese kufike isikhathi ngoba iminyaka engu-10 uma ungumholi isuke seyanele ukuthi umuntu usenganika abanye ithuba.“Inkinga ekhona ngeyokuthi kunzima ukuba nesiqiniseko sokuthi kuzokhethwa umuntu omnyama noma omhlophe ngoba iDA ihlukene kakhulu. Kukhona amaLiberals okungamaNgisi abona kuyiwo aphethe konke kube khona laba abahlubuka kuNational Party abangayizwa nje indaba yokuholwa ngumuntu omnyama bese kuba abamnyama asebefuna kube umholi webala labo othatha izintambo,” kuhlaziya uKhumalo.Abahlaziyi bathi abantu abababona bengabangcono ekutheni bakhulise iqembu njengoNkk Zille kungaba uMnuz Herman Mashaba noma uMnuz John Steenhuisen.I-ANC izolo ngomlomo kaMnuz Zizi Kodwa ithe ayithukanga ngesimemezelo sikaNkk Zille ngoba ubalekela ukwehluleka nehlazo abhekane nalo ehlulwa wukhetho ngonyaka odlule.“Asiqondi ukuthi yini kufanele kube yinto enkulu ukuthi uNkk Zille usethi khumu ngoba kuyenzeka kubona bonke abantu uma umholi esenquma ukungasingeneli isikhundla noma ukuqhubeka naso,” kusho uKodwa.UMnuz Irvin Jim weNumsa uthe liphume nobomvu futhi abasobe bamkhumbula uNkk Zille ngoba ubehlangene nabantu abebeqhuba imigomo yokugqilaza abantu abamnyama abangabasebenzi.UMnuz Blessed Gwala we-IFP uthe abahlanganise lutho nokushenxa kukaNkk Zille ezintanjeni zeqembu lakhe kodwa okubaphethe kabi wukuthi ushiye izinto zimapeketwane KwaZulu-Natal ngenxa yoqhekeko olukubaholi bakhona.UNkk Zille oke waba yintatheli, ube nguNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo eWestern Cape, waba yilungu lePhalamende wabuya ngo-2007 wazoba yiMeya yaKapa kwathi ngo-2009 waba nguNdunankulu wakhona. Uthathwa njengomholi okhulise leli qembu elifaka ezindaweni zabantu abamnyama laphinde lahlwitha iWestern Cape ezandleni ze-ANC.
title: Abathukanga kushenxa uZille

text: UMHOLI weGOOD, uNkk Patricia de Lille, uthi izinkulumo zeDA zokuthi waxoshwa kuleli qembu zilimaza inhlangano yakhe entsha.Uthe uphoqeleke ukuthi ayoyimangalela enkantolo yokhetho iDA ngoba ayifuni ukuxolisa ngokulokhu iqamba amanga ithi yamxosha ekubeni wazihambela. “Izinkulumo zeDA ziyibukela phansi imigomo yokhetho olukhululekile ngoba yize itsheliwe ukuthi ayixolise isaqhubeka nokwenza lezi zinkulumo. Udaba ngiludlulisele enkantolo yokhetho ngaluyisa nasenkantolo eNkulu yaseWestern Cape. Isinqumo ngizosizwa ngoLwesihlanu.”Ummeli kaNkk De Lille uthe lolu daba kufanele luxazululwe ngaphambi kokhetho. Uthe lezi zinkulumo ziyawulimaza umkhankaso wakhe nenhlangano yakhe entsha.“Sichithe imali eningi kabi sikhankasa saze sakwazi ukuthi igama leGood libe sematheni kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika. Amanga eDA ayasilimaza, azokwenza ukhetho lungakhululeki,” kusho uNkk De Lille.Uthe kulezi zinyanga ezine ezedlule iqembu lakhe lisebenza kanzima ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bayayishiya i-ANC neDA bavotele iGood eza nokuhlukile.“Ucwaningo luveza ukuthi abantu bakhathele iDA ne-ANC. Sinabantu abaningi abakhankasayo emazingeni aphansi, senze izikhangiso emsakazweni nakwithelevishini kodwa iDA ilokhu iqamba amanga, ingcolisa igama lethu.”Ngonyaka odlule uNkk De Lille waba nesivumelwano neDA esaholela ekutheni asule esikhundleni sakhe sokuba yiMeya yaseCape Town.NgoLwesibili umholi weDA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane uthe uNkk De Lille washeshe wahamba ngaphambi kokuthi axoshwe kwiDA ngoba vele base bezomxosha.“Sasinenkinga yamanzi eWestern Cape futhi kunemibiko yenkohlakalo kuMasipala waseCape Town, abaholi bethu babethatha izinyathelo ngabantu abathintekayo kule mibiko. Uma esebona ukuthi uzoxoshwa uNkk De Lille wavele wagxuma. Wayazi vele ukuthi isinqumo sokumxosha sesithathiwe,” kusho uMaimane.
title: #Ukhetho2019: U-De Lille ukhala ngezinkulumo zeDA ‘ezilimaza’ iqembu lakhe

text: BAKHALA ezimathonsi abazali babafana baKwaZulu-Natal abathi bakhiphe imali eshisiwe, bekhokhela isikhungo ebesithi sicija abafana kunobhutshuzwayo, osekuvele ukuthi bebenukubezwa ngokocansi wumnikazi okungowesilisa wase-Escourt, KwaZulu-Natal, obezinze eGoli.Laba bafana ababalelwa ku-29, abebeqhamuka kulesi sifundazwe, eLimpopo, nakwezinye izifundazwe, sekuvele ukuthi bebehlukunyezwa ngokocansi, abanye beshaywa kanzima.Kuze kwadingeka ukuthi abazali babo babalande ngokushesha kulesi sikhungo esiseProtea Glen, eGoli.Omunye wabazali, uNksz Ningi Mtolo ongunina kaLungelo Mtolo obehlala kule ndawo, uthi ubonga uMdali ukuthi ingane yakhe yona ayinukubezekanga ngokocansi, kodwa uthi ubesekhokhe imali engaphezu kukaR28 900 kulo mlisa, ethi yizindleko zokusiza ingane yakhe ifeze iphupho layo.Lo mzali okhulume naleli phephandaba esendleleni ebuya kolanda lo mfana, uthe ufuna le ndoda iboshwe ijeze ngobuqili bayo."Ngangithi ngilekelela ingane phela ngoba iyalithanda ibhola futhi inekhono kanti sidlala umuntu. Iningi imali engiyichithile, kuduma ikhanda kumanje angazi ngizothini,’’ kubalisa uNksz Mtolo.Uthe uphoxekile ngoba bebemethemba lo mlisa njengoba naye edabuka KwaZulu-Natal.“Indodana yami ibidlala ibhola KwaMashu. Saxhunyaniswa nalo mqeqeshi womunye umqeqeshi, sabe sesihlangana naye e-Estcourt,” kusho omunye umzali.Uthi waqale wakhokha uR1 800 kwalandela uR14 000 ngaphezulu. Uthe ubizwe amaphoyisa ukuthi azolanda ingane yakhe.Omunye wabafana (17), utshele iphephandaba eliwuzakwabo waleli, iThe Star, ukuthi wadlwengulwa yilo mqeqeshi emva kokumthembisa indawo kwiKaizer Chiefs.“Ngifike kule ndawo ekuqaleni konyaka ngethemba lokuthi ngizodlalela iKaizer Chiefs,” kusho lo mfana.Uthe abazali bakhe bebekhokha uR4 500 wokuhlala nokudla njalo ngenyanga kule ndawo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eSoweto West, uMzwakhe Xazi, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi lo mqeqeshi uvulelwe icala lokunukubeza umfana oneminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye.Uthe eminye imininingwane izotholakala ngokuqhubeka kophenyo.Ngokwemibiko, bese kuphele izinyanga abafana bedlwengulwa bephindelelwa, futhi beshaywa yilo mqeqeshi wabo.Iminyaka yabo isukela kweyisishiyagalolunye kuya kwengu-18. Bathe bebesaba ukubika ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabo izinyanga ezine.Bathi bebeshaywa ukuthi bavume ukugilwa yilo mqeqeshi.Umsolwa kuvela ukuthi uneminyaka engu-34, kodwa igama lakhe lisagodliwe.Kuthiwa umsolwa uzame ukuzibulala emva kwalezi zinsolo ngokuphuza ushevu.Utholakale egaraji kwakhe ezibhonqa ngenxa yezinhlungu, waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.Ngesikhathi sokuloba, kuthiwe uyelulama egumbini labagula kakhulu esibhedlela lapho egadwe khona amaphoyisa.
title: Uzame ukuzibulala umqeqeshi wamanyala

text: KUZOSHAYA u-Agasti sebebuyele bonke abafundi ezikoleni ngemuva kwekhefu lesikhathi eside ngenxa yokubheduka kwegciwane icoronavirus elihlalise kabi umhlaba wonke.Ngokukasomqulu okhishwe wuNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyiSisekelo, uNkk Angie Motshekga izolo, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ngoJulayi 6 uGrades R, 1, 2, 3, 6, 10, no11 nabafundi abanokukhubazeka, bazobuyela ezikoleni.Laba bafundi bazobe beyiqembu lesibili elibuyela ezikoleni njengoba kuqale uGrade 7 no-12 ekuqaleni kukaJuni.Kubafundi abazobuyela ezikoleni kuJulayi kubalwa labo abanezinkinga emqondweni nalaba abaneminyaka engaphansi ewu-13, nalabo abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-18 abenza unyaka wokugcina.Ngo-Agasti 3 kuzobuyela uGrades 4, 5, 8 no9 abazobe beyiqembu lesithathu ukubuyela esikoleni. Kubona kuzoba khona nalabo abaphila ne-Autism abaneminyaka engu-13 nangaphezulu.UNkk Motshekga ukuvezile kule miyalelo yakhe ukuthi lezo zikhungo ezingamaAfter Care, ezivele zikhona ngaphakathi ezikoleni nazo zivunyelwe ukuthi zingavula kodwa kumele ziqikelele ukuthi zihambisana nayo yonke imigomo yeCovid-19.Uthe kodwa imidlalo nokunye okuphathelene nayo kusavaliwe ezikoleni zawo wonke amazinga.Ugcizelelile nokuthi abazali abakhetha ukuthi izingane zabo zingabuyeli ezikoleni kumele baxhumane nezikole bazazise futhi babhalise ngaphansi kohlelo lomnyango lokufundela ekhaya.“Okubalulekile wukuthi umzali akwazi ukwenza okusemandleni ukuthi ingane yakhe iyaqhubeka nokufunda. Kumele aqinisekise nokuthi inazo zonke izinsiza kufunda njengokwemigomo yomnyango wezemfundo, athole izincwadi ezisetshenziswa kulelo banga alifundayo ezifanayo nezifundwa esikoleni,"kusho uNgqongqoshe.UNkk Motshekga uyavuma ukuthi izikole zingachezuka emigomweni yokufunda ebekiwe kodwa kumele bazise abengamele izifundo bachaze ngezinhlelo zabo nohlelo lwabo lokufundisa olusayinwe wuthishanhloko.
title: Kuzoshaya u-Agasti sebebuyele bonke abafundi ezikoleni zakuleli

text: UMCULI wowokholo uHlengiwe Mhlaba, okuvele izinsolo zokuthi ziningi izindodla zemali angazitholanga enkampanini ayeqopha kuyo phambilini, iBig Fish Music, uthi akalwi nomnikazi wayo uSipho “Big Fish” Makhabane.UHlengiwe utshele leli phephandaba izolo ukuthi akananxa noMakhabane kodwa ufuna kulungiswe izinto ezithinta umsebenzi.“Angilwi naye. Empeleni siyakhuluma kodwa kumele eze kimi bese siya kumuntu ozositshela ukuthi amaphutha esawenza yimaphi futhi singawalungisa kanjani,” kusho uHlengiwe.Iphephandaba lesiNgisi eliphuma ngeSonto libike ukuthi uMakhabane, owavumbulula uHlengiwe, usolwa yilo mculi ngokudla uR8.5 million wemali etholwa ngokudlala komculo emsakazweni nakwezinye izindawo, okubizwa ngama-royalties.Kuvela ukuthi uHlengiwe uthole ukuthi ezingomeni zakhe ezingu-90 ezaqoqa ama-royalties akhekwaSouth African Music Rights Organisation (Samro), zingu-24 kuphela ezakhokha * -16.7% wemali okumele ize kuye.Kuvela ukuthi ukweletwa omunye uR8.5 million wemali yokudayiswa kwamaCD. Kuthiwa eminyakeni engu-10 wathola uR4.5 million kuMakhabane.Kubikwe nokuthi ucwaningo lommeli uGraeme Gilfillan yilo oluveze ukuthi kunemali eningi ethathwe wumqambi ongaziwa obizwa ngoDominas Publicas. UHlengiwe uthe akuyena oye kwabezindaba eyokhuluma ngalolu daba futhi uzimisele ngokuthi luphothulwe nguMakhabane naye ngosizo lomuntu owazi ibhizinisi lomculo.“Angizicabangeli mina ngedwa kodwa ngicabangela umculo waseNingizimu Afrika wonke. Ngicabanga ukuthi izinga kumele ngabe likude kakhulu. INigeria iyasihlula ngoba abaculi bakhona bakhokhelwa kakhulu kunathi.”UMakhabane uthe abantu abazi iqiniso nguye, uHlengiwe noNkulunkulu.“Iqiniso engilaziyo mina elokungena estudiyo ngiyoqopha. Obekwenzeka ngemuva kwalokho angikwazi,” kusho uHlengiwe obiza uMakhabane ngoDaddy.Uthe njengoba ezimele kuyasebenzeka yize esacathula futhi usafunda izinto eziningi. Uthe usazophusha i-albhamu yakhe iSthandwa Sami ethokozelwa kakhulu ngabantu.“Ngiyakubonga ukwesekwa engikutholayo. Ngicabanga ukuthi ngaphambi kokuphela konyaka ngizokhipha enye yesiNgisi.”
title: UHlengiwe uthi akalwi noBig Fish ngezigidi

text: OMUNYE wabaqondisi beHighlands Park uSinky “Twalatsa” Mnisi, uzishaya isifuba ngokuthi amava ento oyenzayo ngeke uwathenge.UMnisi, owaduma kwiTembisa Classic ukusho lokhu ngenxa yokuthi sekucacele noma ngubani ukuthi yiqembu lakhe elizokudla umhlanganiso kwiNational First Division (NFD).Izibalo zikhomba ukuthi iLions of the North, isidinga amaphuzu amane emidlalweni eyisithupha esele ngaphambi kokuthi ichonye umqhele wokuba yizingqwele.“Ngesilungu kuthiwa kusuke kungakapheli ingakaculi intokazi eyinkunyumba. Nathi sisho kanjalo ngoba sisebholeni.“Sidinga amaphuzu amathathu namagoli amaningi. Ngiyavuma ngendlela obale ngayo ethi sidinga amaphuzu amane kodwa mina ngithi amathathu namagoli amaningi ayobe enele ngoba akekho umuntu ongakwazi ukuvala igebe lamaphuzu awu 37 ngale midlalo esalele,” kubeka uMnisi.Uthi ngesonto eledlule baphoxekile bezwa ukuthi iMbombela itshela abantu ukuthi sayibamba inkunzi.“Ngiyamangala ukuthi abantu bangabanjwa inkunzi ngamagoli ayisikhombisa wonke. Ngabe neRoyal Eagles sayirobha njengoba sayihlohla amagoli amane ngokunjalo neCosmos eyangenelwa isibalo esifanayo?” kubuza uMnisi.“Abantu abancome ukuthi besineqhinga esilisebenzise ngendlela yingakho sikule simo. Nathi singabaphathi beqembu sisebenzise amava esiwathole ngokuthi sihlaziye isimo esibangele ukuthi sidliwe yizembe ngesizini edlule. Ngakho sabona kungcono ukuthi sigcine abadlali abawumgogodla nokuthi sithole ithimba labaqeqeshi elenza umsebenzi oncomekayo. Ngempela kufanele simcome kakhulu * -Owen (Da Gama) ngomsebenzi abawenzile nethimba lakhe. "Sesilinde ukuthi umqeqeshi asitshele ngabadlali abadingayo, kodwa ngokwami ngibona sizoqala ngokuqinisa endaweni kanozinti, uKapini (Tapuwa) usekhulile."Kufanele simbonge ngamava akhe ngale sizini ngoba kunemidlalo esiyinqobe ngawo."Umdlalo wethu neRichards Bay kwakufanele silingane ngokuthola iphenathi ayivimba ngemizuzu yokugcina yomdlalo,” kusho uMnisi.Uthi bebengazi ukuthi sebeqophe umlando ngokunqoba imidlalo ewu-19 kulandelana.“Ngizwa kuthiwa iThanda (Royal Zulu) yadlala yanqoba imidlalo ewu-18 ilandelana ngesizini edlule.Manje sesifuna ukuqopha omunye umlando wokusonga isizini sinamaphuzu awu-71, okuchaza ukuthi imidlalo esele kufanele siyinqobe yonke,” kuphetha uMnisi.
title: IHighlands nawokuphula irekhodi

text: UMNYANGO wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nobuHoli bezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni uthi usuzimisele ukwelekelela osomabhizinisi abasebancane abafuna ukwenza imikhiqizo yensangu kuleli.Lokhu kuvezwe ngungqongqoshe uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube ngesikhathi ekhuluma kwingqungquthela yensangu, iCannabis Investment Protocol, ebiseNkosi Albert Luthuli International Converntion Centre, eThekwini ngoLwesithathu. Ethula inkulumo yakhe phambi kwezihambeli zalo mcimbi uthe, ngesikhathi benesidlo sasekuseni iKZN Growth Coalition ngo-Agasti bahlongoza ukuthi bewuhulumeni bahlose ukulekelela abalimi abancane njengendlela yokulwa nokwentuleka kwemisebenzi."Sikholelwa wukuthi, maningi amathuba okusebenzisa insangu ukuze ithuthukise imboni yezolimo neminye imikhakha. Imininingwane ekhona iveza ukuthi imboni yensangu ingenza inzuzo engu-R100 billion. I-United Nations ikholwa ngukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ikhiqiza u-2,300 tons wensangu ngonyaka okuyenza ilale isithathu emazweni akhiqiza insangu eningi e-Afrika," kusho uDube-Ncube.Uthe iKwaZulu-Natal isona sifundazwe esisethubeni lokukhiqiza insangu eningi ngenxa yesimo sezulu kulesi sifundazwe esivuna ukukhula kwensangu kalula uma siqhathaniswa nezinye kanye namanye amazwe aphesheya, ikakhulukazi e-Europe."Siwuhulumeni asifuni ukuthi bantu basemiphakathini yethu abebevele beyitshala insangu bavaleleke ngaphandle. Siwuhulumeni sizogxila ezindaweni ezisemakhaya ngoba zinomlando omude wokutshala nokusebenzisa insangu yize bebekwenza ngokungemthetho. Njengoba uhulumeni esevula amathuba, asifuni ukuthi abantu basale ngaphandle," kusho yena.Umnyango kaDube uphinde waveza ukuthi uyazi kunezinhlangano ezikhokhisa abantu ukuze zisabalalise ulwazi ngemboni yensangu. Uthe bewumnyango basazoqhubeka nezinhlelo zamahhala zokusabalalisa ulwazi ngale mboni.
title: Uhulumeni uzolekelela abafuna ukutshala insangu

text: INYELWE inyoni esandleni intokazi yaKwaZulu-Natal ebingumsakazi weGagasi FM, uNomalanga Shozi njengoba esemenyezelwe njengozomela isiteshi sakwaBET in Africa kuyona yonke imicimbi yakwaBET phesheya kwezilwandle.Le ntokazi yasePort Shepstone eneminyaka engu-23, muva nje ibihambele umcimbi wezindondo obuseLas Vegas, eNevada eMelika nala ebehambele khona umcimbi walo nyaka, amaBET Soul Train Awards.Kuwo ubekhuluma nosaziwayo abahlukene akade bewuhambele.Ekhuluma ngokunikwa leli thuba uNomalanga uthe, ujabule ngokuthola leli thuba lokumela izwekazi lase-Afrika.“Kusho lukhulu kimi nje okokuqala ukuthola ithuba lokuhlangana nosaziwayo emcimbini, iSoul Train Awards njengoba uzokhonjiswa maduzane esiteshini iBET e-Africa. Ukukhuluma nosaziwayo okukhona kubo uFaith Evans, SZA, Normani, Kelly Price noRobert Glaspe kube yinto engingeke ngiyikhohlwe futhi ngiyabonga kakhulu kwabakwaBET ngaleli thuba nokungethemba ngalo msebenzi,” kuchaza yena.Le ntokazi ngeke imele i-Afrika nje kuphela kulesi siteshi kodwa izophinde yethule uhlelo lwentsha, iBET Breaks ezoqala ngoJanuwari wonyaka ozayo.“Ngicabanga ukuthi lolu hlelo luzoba nesikhala esikhulu ezinhliziyweni zabantu abaningi abasha base-Afrika.“Luzophinde lukhombise intsha ikhuluma ngezindaba ezihlukene ezizobe zixoxwa yiyona ngezinto ezihlukene ezenzeka la ihlala khona,” kuchaza yena.UNomalanga uzobonakala ethula lolu hlelo ngoMsombuluko, uLwesithathu noLwesihlanu.
title: Uyomela isiteshi iBET Africa phesheya

text: INHLANGANO ephethe ibhola e-Europe, i-UEFA, isisongele amaqembu ezimpunyela ase-Europe asememezele ukuthi azoba yingxenye ye-European Super League (ESL) ngokuthi bazowakhipha kuyo yonke imincintiswano engaphansi kwe-UEFA. NgeSonto, amaqembu ahamba phambili e-Europe athuse iziphathimandla zebhola ngokunjalo nabalandeli ememezela izinhlelo zomncintiswano omusha ozobizwa nge-ESL. Kulawo maqembu kubalwa ayisithupha ase-England (Manchester United, Manchester City, Liverpool, Arsenal,  Chelsea, neTottenham Hotspur), amathathu ase-Italy (Juventus, Inter Milan, AC Milan), namanye amathathu ase-Spain (Barcelona, Real Madrid, Athletico Madrid). Onke lawa maqembu ajoyina i-ESL njengabasunguli, kanti uma isiqalile ngeke agawulwe yizembe futhi ngeke adinge ukuhlungela ukudlala kuyo minyaka yonke. Ngokwemibiko yamaphephandaba ezemidlalo e-Europe, kuvela ukuthi iBayern Munich neDortmund banqabile ukuba yingxele yale ligi, okwamanje. NePSG yaseFrance, equkethe abadlali abaphambili emhlabeni, kuvela ukuthi isaziqhathulula, kayifuni ukumataniswa nalo mncintiswano. I-Juventus ibe yiqembu lokuqala ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izobe idlala kwi-ESL abathemba ukuthi izoqala ngesizini ezayo.Iphendula lezi zindaba i-UEFA nezinhlangano ezengamele amaligi emazweni ase-Europe, bathe bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuvimba lo mncintiswano.“Sizobheka konke esingakwenza ngokomthetho wezinkantolo ngokunjalo nangokomthetho wezemidlalo. Ingqikithi yebhola isekubeni khona kokuncintisana kumdlalo, akukwazi ukuba okunye,” kusho UEFA esitatimendeni. Ithe amaqembu azoba yingxenye ye-ESL azovalelwa ngaphandle kuyo yonke imincintiswano ye-EUFA yamaqembu okubalwa kuyo i-UEFA Champions League (UCL) ne-Europa League. I-UEFA isongela kanjena nje kuyimanje iManchester City, Real Madrid neChelsea bakuma-semifinal e-UCL. Kwi-Europa League nakhona kubusa amaqembu afuna ukudlala kwi-ESL njengoba kuma-semifinal kukhona iManchester United ne-Arsenal. Ngaphandle kokuvalelwa ngaphandle kule mncintiswano, i-UEFA ithe abadlali abagijima kuleli qembu bangase banqatshelwe ukudlalela amaqembu esizwe.
title: I-UEFA isongela amaqembu ezimpunyela aqala iSuper League

text: Mhlengi Shangase I-Universities South Africa (Usaf), inhlangano ehlanganisa zonke izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme, ikhiphe isitatimende ithi izitshudeni sezingafaka izicelo zokufunda. Isho lokhu nje izivivinyo zika-matric ziphothulwa ngoDisemba, imiphumela ka-matric ikhishwe ngoFebhuwari ngonyaka ozayo. Ithe i-Unisa izoqala yamukele izicelo kusukela kusasa.Ithe nakuba ezinye izikhungo ezifana neSefako Makgatho University of Health Sciences neWalter Sisulu University sezivale ezinye izinhlelo zazo ikakhulu zabafuna ukwenza imikhakha yezempilo kodwa ezinye izinhlelo zisavuliwe kuze kube yisekupheleni kwenyanga ezayo.“Izikhungo eziningi zizovula izicelo kuze kuphele inyanga ezayo. Ezinye kuze kube sekupheleni kuka-Okthoba kanti ezinye kuze kube isekupheleni kukaNovemba nonyaka.”I-Usaf ithe inyuvesi yaseZululand izokwamukela izicelo kuze kube uJanuwari 29, 2021.Ithe inyuvesi iStellenbosch, ivalile ukwamukela izicelo okuyinto eyenzeka ngoJulayi.EWits, izicelo zavalwa ngoJuni emkhakheni iHealth Sciences; Bachelor of Architecture; Bachelor of Audiology, Bachelor of Speech Language Pathology;(Film and TV) kanti ezinye zezinhlelo zisavuliwe kuze kube yisekupheleni kwenyanga ezayo.Abafuna ukufunda e-University of Pretoria, banxuswa ukuba bavakashele kwi-website yale nyuvesi ukuze babone imikhakha esavulile.Isikhulu esiphezulu se-Usaf uSolwazi Ahmed Bawa, sithe izifundo eziningi zizophothulwa ngonyaka ozayo.Uthe izikhungo zivumela izitshudeni ukuthi zibuyise isikhathi esilahlekile.UNgqongqoshe uDkt Blade Nzimande uthe unyaka wokufunda uzophothulwa ngonyaka ozayo.
title: Izitshudeni sezingafaka  izicelo zokufunda

text: LIKHULU ithemba lokuthi azomthetha amacala abhekene nawo owayengumkhuzi wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutanant-General Mmamonnye Ngobeni.Ubekwe amacala okugwazelwa, ukuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho nokungabiki ngenkohlakalo.ULt-General Ngobeni nowayeyiphoyisa, uCaptain Aswin Narainpersad, bavele enkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini izolo. Inkantolo ithe amacala abathweswe wona abucayi awuSchedule 5.Amayelana nethenda kaR47 million yezindawo zokuhlaliswa kwamaphoyisa ngesikhathi seNdebe yoMhlaba ngo-2010.ULt-General Ngobeni udedelwe ngebheyili kaR20 000, uNarainpersad wakhululwa ngoR10 000 emuva kokuzinikela esiteshini samaphoyisa iDurban Central izolo ekuseni.Icala libe selihlehliselwa uNovemba 11.Ngalolu suku bazobe sebehlangana nabanye ababili ababekwe nabo amacala - usomabhizinisi uMnuz Thoshan Panday nephoyisa uColonel Navin Madhoe.Baboshwe ngoLwesihlanu bavela enkantolo enike uPanday ibheyili kaR100 000, uMadhoe waphuma ngoR10 000.Ubeswenke econsa uLt General Ngobeni engena enkantolo, ebukeka ekhululekile waze waphakamisa isandla ebingelela abebethamele icala watshela abezindaba ukuthi uzizwa ekahle.UMbuso uthi uNkk Ngobeni wathola izipho ezabiza uR26 000 zivela kuPanday, wangabika ngenkohlakalo futhi wamisa uphenyo olwalumayelana nethenda eyanikwa uPanday nokungadaluli ngemihlomulo ayithola.UNarainpersad wayesebenza emaphoyiseni eSupply Chain Management, okusolakala ukuthi naye wafunjathiswa nguPanday emuva kokuhlomula ngethenda.Ummeli kaNgobeni, uMnuz Ravindra Maniklall, uthe kumthusile ukuvuswa kwecala eselidonse iminyaka ewu-10 ngoba owayeyinhloko yeNPA KwaZulu-Natal walihoxisa ngo-2014.UManiklall uthe iNPA kuzwelonke yagcina ngokubuyekeza isinqumo sokuhoxisa uphenyo ngoPanday, Madhoe noNarainpersad.“Kusithusile uma selivuswa icala ekubeni kungekho ncwadi eyayiphikisana nesinqumo sokulihoxisa ekuqaleni. Sibona kuwukuphula uMthethosisekelo lokhu okungaholela ekutheni sifake isicelo enkantolo sokuthi iwachithe amacala. Siyethemba uzophuma phambili,” kusho UManiklall.Uthe uLt-General Ngobeni uzowaphika amacala abekwe wona futhi unabo ubufakazi balokhu.ULt-General Ngobeni wathatha umhlalaphansi ngo-2018.Imibandela yebheyili ithi babike kumphenyi wecala uma bezophuma KwaZulu-Natal noma eNingizimu Afrika, bangahlangani nofakazi banikezele emaphoyiseni ngencwadi yokuhambela amanye amazwe.
title: Uzophuma phambili uNgobeni: ummeli

text: AKAYIZWA eyokuduma ngokushaya amaqembu amakhulu nokudlala ibhola elihehayo, ekubeni imiphumela ikhomba okunye umqeqeshi weChippa United, uTebogo “Tebza” Moloi.UMoloi uthathe izintambo zokuqeqesha kuDan “Dance” Malesela kwiChippa United eyaziwa ngokudlala ibhola elidla utshani. Selokhu efikile usezakhele igama ngokushaya amaqembu athathwa njengamakhulu.Uqumbe phansi iKaizer Chiefs ngo 1-0 wegoli likaMark Mayambela eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium, eBhayi emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngoDisemba 6. UMoloi nguyena futhi okhiphe iMamelodi Sundowns kwiLast 16 yeTelkom Knockout ngegoli likaPaseka Mako.NgoNovemba 17, uMoloi uthele othulini iBidvest Wits ngo 2-0 wamagoli kaSamuel Julies emdlalweni weligi eBidvest Stadium. Uphinde wabambana neSundowns ngo 0-0 emdlalweni weligi ekhaya ngemuva kokuyikhipha kowomkhumulajezi.NgeSonto ngo-3.30 ntambama iChippa United izoshukana ne-Orlando Pirates eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium, eBhayi.“Angiyithandi le nto yokuthi saziwe njengeqembu eliqumba phansi amaqembu amakhulu futhi sidlala ibhola elimnandi. Lisiza ngani ibhola elimnandi kodwa elingenayo imiphumela nezicoco?“IChippa ijwayele ukuqeda konombolo 11 no-14 okuyinto engifuna ukuyishintsha. Awukwazi ukuhlala kule ndawo kodwa uthi udlala ibhola elihle. Abadlali bami bakhonze ukudlala uma benengcindezi. Uma izinto zike zaqala zahamba kahle bavele bathathe izinto kalula. Babonile ukuthi siqede umzuliswano wokuqala sihlezi kunombolo 5 bavele bathela imizimba phansi. Bathe uma bebona ukuthi siyaphuma kwiTop 8 bavele benyusa izinga. Badlala uma benengcindezi,” kusho uMoloi.IChippa ihlezi endaweni yesikhombisa kwi-log.“Njengoba sebengasekho endaweni engabahlanganisa nezembe sebezoqala bathathe izinto kalula. Usihlalo wePirates (* -Irvin Khoza) wangitshela ukuthi kunabadlali abazalelwe ukuwina, abathanda ukuwina nabakwaziyo ukuthi kuwinwa kanjani. Iqembu lethu lakhiwe yilo lonke uhlobo lwalabadlali. Ibhola elihle kumele lihambisane nemiphumela enkundleni, yindawo enhle kwi-log bese iqembu lenza kahle ngokuthi okungenani lifinyelele kowodwa umdlalo wamanqamu kule miqhudelwano emithathu yemikhumulajezi. Iqembu lethu kumele lilwele ukuqeda kwiTop 4 noma kwiTop 5 hhayi ukuvika izembe,” kusho uMoloi.IChippa ayikaze idlale emdlalweni wamanqamu kusukela yasungulwa. Ngesizini edlule ifinyelele kwi-semi final yeNedbank Cup neyeMTN 8.“Iqembu lami ngifuna lifane neKaizer Chiefs eyayigqoka i-Admiral. Leli qembu laligijima ngoSputla Nhlapo noComputer (Vusi Lamola). Uyamazi uTeenage (Dladla) egijima ezinhlangothini? Mhlawumbe wawumncane. Ngelinye ilanga bake badlala ngokulingana ngo 5-5 neMoroka Swallows e-Orlando Stadium. Leli qembu lalidlala ibhola elimnandi, elinamagoli, imiphumela nezicoco. Nami ngifuna lokho kwiChippa,” kusho uMoloi.UMoloi uke wasebenza nomqeqeshi weBucs uMilutin Sredojevic.“I-Pirates ngeke siyibhayizele. Iphethe ongqondongqondo ebhentshini. Uma ungayifundi kahle izokubulala ngesibhaxu. Lapha kukhona uMicho osekhule kakhulu kunalo Micho engangisebenza naye kwiPirates. URulani Mokwena akalali, uhlaziya yonke into ngabadlali bethu. Angizazi ukuthi ngizothi ngijabule noma ngiyasaba,” kuphetha uMoloi.
title: UMoloi ufisa bafane neChiefs

text:
INTATHELI YESOLEZWEU MNTWANA waseNhlangwini Inkosi uMelizwe Dlamini 
(osesithombeni) uzama ngayo yonke indlela ukuvimba ukudliwa kwemuzi wakhe osendaweni yabadla izambane likapondo eLa lucia, eThekwini okhangiswe kanye nezimoto zakhe zikanokusho njengodayisayo.Umsebenzi wenkampani edayisa izindlu ezidliwe ngamabhange bese zidayiswa ezidlangaleni, uMnuz Edward Nxumalo, uxoshwe ngabaqaphi boMntwana ngesikhathi eyothatha izithombe zalo muzi ukuze zifakwe ezikhangisweni.Ibhange iNedbank lithi uMntwana ulikweleta imali engu-R3 million kanti kwakuvunyelwane ngokuthi uzokhokha u-R30 000 njalo ngenyanga ngesikhathi engena kuyo.UMntwana kuthiwa useyahluleka ukumelana nezikweleti zakhe kanti nomuzi wakhe usuyadliwa.Isikweletu sawo silinganiselwa ku-R3.3 million uma sekuhlangene nemali yenzalo.UMnuz Ian Wyles, wenkampani edayisa umuzi woMntwanai, uthe ungathengwa ekuseni uma konke kugcina kuhambe ngezinhlelo zebhange ngoba usendaweni eseduze nezitolo nezikole ezisezingeni eliphezulu.Uthe kuze kwasiza ukuthi kungenelele amaphoyisa ukuze bakwazi ukuthatha izithombe ngaphakathi kwalo muzi njengoba onogada benkosi bebengafuni lutho olusondelayo.Ummeli wakwaNedbank, uNksz Sijabulile Ntshangase, uthe sekunezikhawu eziningana impela bebonana noMntwana uMelizwe bexoxa ngendaba yokukhokha kodwa zangagcinwa izethembiso.UNksz Ntshangase uthe ibhange linikeze uMntwana izinhlelo eziningi zokuthi akhokhe kodwa wehluleka.Ulwa eyendlu nje uMntwana usanda kudlelwa izimoto ezimbili zohlobo oluphambili okuyiJeep Grand Cherokee ne-Audi A4.Lezi zimoto zathathwa kulandela ukungakhokhi koMntwana imali obekufanele ayikhokhele lezi zimoto azithatha kanye kanye kuhlanganisa neLand Rover yona angakayibuyiseli emuva.Ummeli woMntwana, uMnuz Rajesh Sunker uthe udaba lwezimoto seluxazululiwe. “Usezikhokhelile zonke izimoto anazo,” kusho uSunker.Mayelana nokudayiswa kwendlu, uSunker uthe basaxoxisana nebhange ngenhloso yokuthi “likumise ukudayiswa kwendlu”.
title: Bathwaliswe kanzima abadla umuzi weNkosi

text: UMSAKAZI obuye abe yijaji emncintiswaneni ama-Idols SA u-Unathi Nkayi, uzokwethula uhlelo olusha lwe-1Magic iFestive Get-together.Wuhlelo oluzodlala ngamaholidi kaDisemba kuphela. Luzoqala kusasango-3.30 ntambama.Luzophinda kuMansi Magic ngoDisemba 21 ngo-9.30 ebusuku nakuMzansi wethu ngo-10 ebusuku. Kulolu hlelo u-Unathi uzobe ehleli nosaziwayo impumelelo yabo eyenza kube nzima ukuthi bahlangane nezihlobo zabo.Umpheki owaziwayo, u-Alessandro Khojani, uzohlangana no-Unathi ukushintsha amakhaya ezimenywa awenze izindawo eziseqophelweni eliphezulu zokudlela.U-Unathi uthe impilo abayiphilayo nendlela unyaka obe ngayo, abakaze basithole isikhathi sokuhlala nemindeni nabangani.“Kubalulekile ukuchitha isikhathi nalabo abenza impilo yethu ibe yindlela eyiyona. Lolu hlelo lumayelana nokuxhumana nokuthi isipho esikhulu ngala maholidi wukuba nabantu esibathandayo,” kusho u-Unathi.Esiqeshini ngasinye osaziwayo bazobe bekhuluma ngasebekuzuzile empilweni, amaphupho abo nokuthi kubaluleke ngani ukusondelana.Abazobonakala ohlelweni, kubalwa abaculi uZakes Bantwini nomkakhe uNandi Madida, osaziwayo uKefilwe Mabote noSarah Langa nabanye.
title: U-Unathi uzobonwa ohlelweni olusha lweTV

text: SEKUSABALALE amahebezi okuthi kuzoqiniswa ezokuphepha eThembezinhle naseBuhleni njengoba kuyophuma isinqumo ngecala lombango wobuholi bamaNazaretha elizoba seBloemfontein kusasa. Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo ongashayi eceleni ukuthi abaseThembezinhle sebekhulume namaphoyisa ukuthi aqaphe lezi zinhlangothi kusasa ngemuva kokusabalala kwenkulumo eqoshiwe lapho abaseBuhleni becaza izinsizwa zebandla ezizobe zigadile kusasa.Kule nkulumo kuzwakala owesilisa ethi iNkosi uZwane ithunyelwe wuNyazilwezulu ukuthi idlulise umbiko wokuthi kwabiwe izinsizwa ezizobe ziqaphe umuzi waseBuhleni ezinye ziyogada abaya enkantolo eBloemfontein. Le nkulumo kuthiwa iqoshwe ngesikhathi kukhuluma obedlulisa lo myalezo ebandleni njengoba kunezinsolo zokuthi kuzosuka umsindo ngemuva kwesinqumo senkantolo. Kule nkulumo kuphinde kuvele ukuthi namakhosi esizwe azobe elinde eBuhleni kusasa. Umbango ophakathi kwabaseBuhleni nabaseThembezinhle, uqale ngo-2011 ngemuva kokukhothama komholi webandla inkosi Vimbeni Shembe, uThingolwenkosazane.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngeSonto kuthiwa abaseBuhleni banezinhlelo zokushiya ikomkhulu lebandla okuyiseBuhleni bayoqala elisha bashintshe negama lebandla. Lokho kuthiwa kungenxa yokuthi kunovalo lokuthi izinto ngeke zihambe kahle enkantolo futhi bazotheleka ngehlazo uma kwenzeka belahlwa yicala.Kuthiwa lokho kususe isiphithiphithi eBuhleni njengoba kunemizamo yokuthi kumbiwe nesidumbu somholi wesithathu wamaNazaretha, inkosi Amos Kula Shembe, Inyangayezulu esiseBuhleni, ukuze siyotshalwa kabusha eNtabazwe okunenkulumo yokuthi kungase kube yikomkhulu labaseBuhleni. Udaba oluphelele ephephandabeni lakho kusasa.
title: Ziqinisa ezokuphepha izinhlangothi ezibanga ubuholi kwaShembe

text: UNGENE kwelinye igiya umbango wokuhola iDA KwaZulu-Natal.Iningi labaholi abagaqele izikhundla liqinise imikhankaso yalo njengoba sekuvaliwe ukuphakamiswa kwamagama abaholi abazongenela umbango wezikhundla kwingqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi.Nakuba amehlo ethe njo kozongena ezicathulweni zikaMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, othi khumu emva kokukhethelwa kulesi sikhundla amahlandla amabili, umbango ushisa phansi nakulabo abagaqele ezinye izikhundla ngaphandle kwesomholi wesifundazwe.Kwesabagaqele ubuholi besifundazwe, wuSotswebhu wale nhlangano esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, uMnu Francios Rodgers, kanye namakhansela amabili ale nhlangano kuMasipala waseThekwini, uNksz Nicole Graham noMnuz Emmanuel Mhlongo, asebekuqinisekisile ukuthi bazowungenela umbango walesi sikhundla.Emkhankasweni wakhe, uRodgers uzishaya isifuba ngokuba nesipiliyoni ekuholeni le nhlangano njengoba njengamanje engusihlalo wesifundazwe kanti phambilini ubeyisekela lomholi wesifundazwe.URodgers uphinde azigqaje ngokukwazi ukukhulisa le nhlangano esifundazweni.UNksz Graham, ohola inguyazana yeDA kuMasipala waseThekwini, ushumayela elokuthi isifundazwe sidinga ubuholi obusha obuzoqhamuka namaqhinga amasha okukhulisa le nhlangano.UMhlongo, ongemusha embangweni walesi sikhundla njengoba akhala ngaphansi kwingqungquthela edlule, uthembisa ukubuyisela leli qembu ekubeni ngeliphikisayo ngokusemthethweni esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, lapho elehliswa khona i-IFP ngokhetho olwedlule.Ngaphandle kwalaba, abanye abaholi baqinise imikhankaso yabo embangweni wezinye izikhundla okuzokhethwa kuzo kule ngqungquthela.Kwabagaqele isikhundla sikasekela mholi, kuvela uNkk Hlengiwe Shozi, oyiKhansela kuMasipala waseThekwini, kube ilungu lesiShayamthetho uMnuz Cris Pappas noMnuz Samier Singh, oyiKhansela kuMasipala waseThekwini.Kwabangenele esikasihlalo, iloyo ohola inguyazana yaleli qembu kuMasipala wesiFunda uMgungundlovu, uMnuz Bongumusa Nhlabathi, kanye nelungu lePhalamende, uMnuz Dean MacPherson, elingazange lilibone elidlalayo embangweni walesi sikhundla kwingqungquthela eyedlule. Le ngqungquthela izohlala ekupheleni kwenyanga, kanti le nhlangano ithe amalungiselelo asahamba kahle.UMncwango uthe abakuboni okungaphazamisa ingqungquthela njengoba izwe selibuyele esigabeni sokuqala somvalelandlini, ovumela imihlangano yezepolitiki.Le ngqungquthela izobanjwa kusetshenziswa ezobuchwepheshe.UMncwango uthe bazothumela uhlu lwabaphakanyiselwe ezikhundleni maduze njengoba sekuvaliwe ukuphakanyiswa kwamagama.
title: Uyashuba umbango wokuhola iDA eKZN

text: Osaziwayo emhlabeni wonke bavotelwa yizingane eminxeni ehlukene abaqokwe kuyo ngezinto abazenzayo emphakathini nangomunxa abakuwo endimeni yobumandi.Kulo nyaka iNingizimu Afrika ithole umunxa wayo wodwa okuqokwe kuwo osaziwayo abahlukene.Kulo munxa kukhona uNomzamo Mbatha, AKA, Siya Kolisi, Kagiso Rabada noSomizi.Baqokwe izingane ezehlukene zaseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi bahlanganyele emcimbini.Ekhuluma ngokuqokwa, uNomzamo Mbatha uthe kumjabulisile ukukhethwa yizingane.“Kuyacaca ukuthi konke engikwenzayo kukhona okukwenzayo ezinganeni zasezweni lakithi. Inhliziyo yami iyasasa ngempela ngokuzwa lezi zindaba. Umcimbi owokujabula futhi ungawuthatha njengedili lezingane ezikhona emhlabeni wonke. Ngiyathemba ukuthi nazo zizojabula ukubona osaziwayo abahlukene behlangene kuwo.”U-AKA yena uthe indlela anothando ngayo lwezingane kumjabulisile ukuqokwa kwakhe. “Kuyacaca ukuthi kukho konke esikwenzayo izingane ziyabuka futhi ziyalalela, yingakho sila sikhona manje ngenxa yazo,” kusho u-AKA.Umcimbi walo nyaka uzokwethulwa uDJ Khaled, osezakhele igama emculweni.Okuqokwe kakhulu ngamafilimu okukhona kuwo i-Infinity War, eqokwe izikhawu eziyishumi, iBlack Panther eqokwe kahlanu.Abaculi abadumile abaqokwe eminxeni ehlukene kukhona kubo uDrake, Beyonce, Cardi B nabanye.
title: Bazoncintisana emunxeni owodwa
Bahlukene phakathi abalandeli ngolukaZodwa

text: BASOBISHINI abaholi be-IFP abasolwa ngokuhlasela ngamazwi umsunguli waleli qembu, Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, emhlanganweni owawubizelwe ukweseka uMnuz Siyabonga Mabilabila Kunene, ngesikhathi ekhishwa esikhundleni sokuba yimeya kaMasipala waseNquthu.I-IFP isikhiphe amasamanisi abizela kwikomiti lokuqondisa ubugwegwe amalungu alo ahambela lo mhlangano owawuseNquthu, ngoJulayi wangonyaka odlule.UKunene waphucwa amaketanga obumeya ngasekuqaleni konyaka odlule, kanti abamesekayo babe sebebamba umhlangano ukukhombisa ukuzwelana naye.Uphenyo olwaqalwa yisigungu esiphezulu saleli qembu, luthole ukuthi kulo mhlangano kwagcina sekuxoxwa nezindaba ezidala uqhekeko eqenjini, kwahlaselwa ngamazwi noButhelezi.Lo mbiko uthole abahleli balo mcimbi benecala lokuphula imigomo yeqembu, waphakamisa ukuba baqondiswe ubugwegwe.Ngokwalo mbiko wesigungu esiphezulu obonwe Isolezwe, lo mhlangano wawuhanjelwe uhlangothi olwaziwa ngokuthi ama“AU” (Abusekho Ubunzima) ngaphakathi kwi-IFP, okuwuhlangothi olweseka uMengameli uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa.Lo mhlangano wawuhanjelwe ngisho nangamalungu aqhamuka esifundazweni iGauteng, nasezifundeni eThekwini, uThukela, King Cetshwayo  naseMkhanyakude.Lo mbiko wenza izinsolo zokuthi kulo mhlangano kwagcina sekubaliswa ngokungathathi umhlalaphansi kukaButhelezi, kwenziwa izinsolo zokuthi lokhu kwenza kube nzima ukuba uHlabisa ahole leli qembu.Uqhuba lo mbiko, uveze ukuthi omunye walabo ababehambele lo mhlangano wathi, “ukufa kwenza kancane, uButhelezi uyanqaba ukufa ukuze isikhundla sokuhola sizothathwa uHlabisa”.Kuphinde kuvele ukuthi kulo mhlangano kwabhungwa ngokusungulwa kwenhlangano ezohlubuka kwi-IFP, njengoba labo ababehambele lo mhlangano baveza ukuthi bayazi ukuthi bazoshaywa ngesithende uma iqembu selikhetha abantu abazolimela okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya oluzobanjwa kulo nyaka.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, okucasula kakhulu isigungu esiphezulu saleli qembu ukuthi kulo mhlangano kwagcina sekuhlaselwa abaholi abasohlangothi olwaziwa ngokuthi ama“KKK” (Konke Kuhamba Kahle), olwaziwa ngokuthi ilona olunamandla kuleli qembu.La malungu abhekene namacala amathathu okuwukufaka iqembu ehlazweni, ukudala uqhekeko kanye nokuphazamisa ukusebenza kwezinhlaka zeqembu.Okhulumela i-IFP uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kunohlelo lokuqondisa ubugwegwe oluqhubekayo.“Ababizelwanga ekomitini eliqondisa ubugwegwe ngenxa yokuthi baba ingxenye yomhlangano, kepha kungenxa yokwahlaluka kulo mhlangano.”Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, abalelwa ku-80 amalungu aleli qembu okukholakala ukuthi ahambela lo mhlangano.Kepha uHlengwa uthe okwamanje abahleli balo mhlangano abasabizelwe kwikomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe.“Isibalo sizolokhu senyuka uma sekuphenywe abanye ababa yingxenye yomhlangano.”
title: Kuzoqondiswa ubugwegwe ’abahlasela’ umsunguli we-IFP

text: INTOKAZI yaseManzimtoti eThekwini, eyaqoka ukwenza iziqu zokuba wumdwebi yize unina wayengahambisani naleso sinqumo efuna ibe ngudokotela, ithi ayizisoli ngalokho.UNksz Nontobeko Msomi (32) uthi akazisoli ngokungena emkhakheni oneqhaza elikhulu ekuthuthukiseni amaciko.UNksz Msomi owenza izifundo zeFine Arts eDurban University of Technology, uyimenenja eyengamele imisebenzi yesikhungo esibhekelela ukuthuthukiswa kwabadwebi, i-ArtbankSA engaphansi kweMuseum yaseBleomfontein. Uthe lo mkhakha udinga umuntu onothando olujulile kwezobuciko ngoba ukuchuma kuwona, kudinga intshisekelo.UNksz Msomi osemnkantshubomvu kulo mkhakha uthe inhloso yakhe ngukwenza ushintsho empilweni yamaciko angabadwebi ngoba uyabazi ubunzima bokuba kule ndima futhi kuningi akubone ngesikhathi esafika, emuva kokuqeda izifundo zakhe.“Kuningi engifisa ukukulungisa emkhakheni wezamaciko okungangamandla ami nengibona kungalekelela ozakwethu esinabo kulo mkhakha ongelula neze, njengoba waziwa ngokuthandwa ikakhulukazi ngabamhlophe. Ukwentuleka kolwazi ezikoleni zabantu abamnyama nakho kuyangikhathaza ngoba baningi abantu abasha abanekhono eliyisimanga lokudweba,” kubeka le menenja.Echaza ngomsebenzi awenzayo e-ArtsbankSA, uthe isikhungo asisebenzelayo sithenga imisebenzi yabadwebi abasafika kwimakethe ngenhloso yokudayisela iminyango kahulumeni, amabhizinisi azimele kanjalo nabantu abathanda ukuhlobisa ngemidwebo emizini yabo.Usezinze eFree State ngenxa yomsebenzi, uke waba ngusihlalo wekomiti lohlelo lwezamasiko eThekwini, elalingaphansi kwengqungquthela eyayengamele amazwe wonke eyayihlelwe yiTheku, i-21st International AIDS2016. Uke waba ngusihlalo wekomiti lemibukiso yemisebenzi yabadwebi eKZN SA Gallery eseGlenwood, eThekwini.UNksz Msomi uke waveza amagalelo akhe naseBAT Centre Trust waphinde wasebenza eVisual Arts Network of South Africa, ebambe iqhaza ekuthuthukisweni kwamaciko nabadwebi.
title: Ufuna ukufukula abadwebi kuleli

text: BAZOBHALELA kwenye indawo abafundi ababalelwa ku-247 abenza u-matric basezikoleni ezine zaseNgonyameni eMlaza kulandela umbhikisho womphakathi selokhu kwavulwa izikole.Lokhu kuvezwe obhekele izivivinyo emnyangweni wemfundo KwaZulu-Natal uDkt Barney Mthembu othe abafuni ukuthatha amashansi ngekusasa labafundi.UMthembu uthe abafundi baseNwabi, Sikhwama, Mhawu nasePhindavele sebezobhalela eVukuzakhe High khona eMlaza.Sekunesikhathi umphakathi wakule ndawo ubhikisha uvala imigwaqo umisa nokufunda ukhala ngezinto eziningi okubalwa nokungaphumi kwamanzi kompompi.“Noma isimo sisathule kodwa kuthathwe isinqumo sokuthi abafundi basuswe bayobhalela kwenye indawo ukuze bangaphazamiseki uma sebebhala iziviviyo zika-matric. Kunesikhalo ngokuthi selokhu kuvuliwe ekuqaleni kwale nyanga abafundi bazobuyekezela kulesi sikhungo baphinde babhalele kusona,” kusho uMthembu.Uthe abanye abahlala kude bazohlala ngaphakathi ezindaweni zokuhlala abafundi eVukuzakhe.“Abahlala eduzane bazosuka emakhaya baye kobhala kodwa abahlala kude bazohlala ngaphakathi. Nekhabhinethi izwakalise ukukhathazeka ngendaba yalaba bafundi yingakho iyalele ukuthi basizwe.”Ngeledlule umphakathi wakule ndawo umise nse yonke into nangesonto eledlule ukhala ngokuthi awusafuni ukulethelwa amanzi kodwa uwafuni kompompi. Selokhu uqalile umbhikisho sekushiswe inkantolo yesizwe nehholo lomphakathi. Abafundi abayi esikoleni uma kunemibhikisho.Umnyango ususa abafundi nje unengebhe yokuthi umphakathi uzophazamisa u-matric oqala ukubhala kusasa ngephepha lesiNgisi lokuqala.Kusatshwa ukuthi umphakathi ubuzovala yonke into ngosuku lokubhala bese amaphepha engafinyeleli kulezi zikole. Kuzozophothulwa ngenyanga ezayo ukubhala kuka-matric.UMthembu uthe abafundi bazohlala eVukuzakhe baze baphothule ukubhala.UNobhala weCosas esifundazweni uVika Ngcobo ukugxekile ukuphazanyiswa kwabafundi ikakhulu abakwamatric njengoba kuzobhalwa.“Ngizoya kobabheka abafundi ngoba akukuhle baphazamiseke. Nakwezinye izindawo siyanxusa umphakathi ukuthi bangaphazanyiswa ikakhulu njengoba beqala ukubhala,” kusho uNgcobo.Unxuse abafundi ukuthi bazimisele babhale kahle
title: Kuthuthe u-matric ngombhikisho womphakathi

text: UMASIPALA  weTheku usuvuselele izinkontileka zezinkampani zalabo ababoshwe neMeya yawo uNkk Zandile Gumede maqondana nethenda ka R208 million. Izikhulu zikamasipala zithwale kanzima zizama ukuchaza ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani lokhu.  Umbiko uveza ukuthi Ikusasalethu Mthalane Trading ,Ilanga Lamahlase Projects, Elshaddai Holding Group ne-Uzuzinikela Trading 32 cc babuyiselwe bavuselelwe izinkontileka. Ezinye zale zinkampnani bezithole imisebenzi yokuvuselela inkundla yetennis nokubiya eVerulam neminye imisebenzi.Kwenzeka lokhu nje ngo-Ephreli bekusanda kuboshwa izikhulu zikamasipala ngenkohlakalo kwavalelwa nosomabhizinisi abangu-7 balezi zinkampani. Kuthiwa izinkampani zathola izindodla zemali umsebenzi zingakawuqali.IDA ikhale kakhulu ngokubuyiselwa kwalezi zinkampani kube kwaziwa kahle ukuthi zinukeka enkohlakalweni.
title: Umasipala weTheku ubuyise izinkampani ezinukwa ngenkohlakalo

text: BAPHUTHUNYISWE esibhedlela abafundi nothisha baseVukuzakhe High kwa-L eMlaza kulandela ukuhogela igesi eyingozi ngoMsombuluko.Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo kwaRescue Care, uMnuz Garrith Jamieson uthe babizelwe kule ndawo ukuyosiza abafundi abalinganiselwa ku-60 nothisha ababili okuthiwa bahogele le gesi. "Indiza enophephela emhlane yakwa-Lenmed nabosizo lokuqala babizelwe eMlazi kwa-L lapho abafundi nothisha behogele okusolakala ngokuba igesi enobungozi. Abanye balaba bafundi bebe sesimeni esibucayi ngemuva kokuhogela le gesi."Kusolakala ukuthi abafanyana bakulesi sikole bebedlala ibhola lase liyasikeka nokuyilapho kuphume khona igesi. Ezinye zeziguli zihlengelwe endaweni yesigameko ngaphambi kokuphuthunyiswa ezibhedlela ezahlukene zaseThekwini," kusho uJamieson."Oyedwa obelimele kakhulu uthathwe yindiza enophephela emhlane waphuthunyiswa eLenmed eThekwini Hospital okuyilapho athola khona ukwelashwa, kanti abanye basemtholampilo kwa-L eMlaza. Okwamanje akukaziwa ukuthi hlobo luni lwegesi abayihogelile," kuchaza uJamieson.Amaphoyisa nabeziqhumane kanye nabeSearch and Rescue bebesendaweni yesigameko ukuzophenya.Abafundi balesi sikole bathunyelwe emakhaya isikole savalwa.
title: Kuphuthunyiswe othisha nabafundi (60) esibhedlela behogela igesi

text: USALE nesilonda esingeke siphinde siphele umkhwenyana okumosheke umshado wakhe eboshwa nomakoti nezihambeli zomshado eNseleni ngaphandle kwaseMpangeni.UMnuz Dumisani Zondi, waseMbuda, eGreytown, obeshadelwa nguThabile uMaMkhize izolo, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi inhliziyo yakhe isale ibuhlungu futhi ephoxekile ngokumosheka komshado wakhe. Lezi zithandani ebese zithandane iminyaka engu-20, zinabantwana abathathu.Uthe bese kuyisikhathi eside behlela ukushada njengoba bebepatanisa.“Angeke ngikwazi ukukhuluma nginabe ngokuboshwa kwethu ngelanga lomshado ngenxa yokuthi udaba lusenkantolo. Engingakusho nje wukuthi inhliziyo yami iphatheke kabi futhi ngiphoxekile ngokusivelele. Yisilonda esingeke siphele lesi njengoba kumosheke umshado wami,” kusho uZondi.Uthe nonkosikazi wakhe uphatheke kabi wukuboshwa ngelanga lakhe elikhulu.“Unkosikazi kumanje uzithulele akuvumi noma akhulume ngoba uphatheke kabi ngokusivelele,” kusho uZondi.Elandisa Isolezwe uthe amasosha namaphoyisa yize afika sebefungile kodwa ngokwakhe umshado wonakala ngoba abazange besakwazi ukuphothula zonke izinhlelo zabo.“Umshado uba yimpumelelo uma uze waphela kwenzeka konke. Thina silibophile ifindo lomshado kodwa bekukuningi obekungakenziwa ngesikhathi siboshwa. Lokhu kusho ukuthi umshado wethu awuzange uhambe kahle, kubuhlungu khona,” kusho uZondi.Ebuzwa ukuthi kungani eqhubeke nokushada ekubeni kuphume umyalelo wokuthi kumiswe yonke imicimbi ngenxa yobhubhane lweCorona, uthe ngeke akwazi ukukuphendula lokho ngenxa yokuthi udaba selukwabomthetho. Uthe umshado wabo ubufana nephupho ngenxa yokuthi bebekade befisa kodwa amandla engekho.“Ngiphelelwe wumsebenzi ngoDisemba ngonyaka odlule lapho ebengiwunogada khona. Bese ngibona ukuthi umshado ngeke usenzeka kodwa-ke ibandla likankosikazi lasilekelela. Naye usebenza esibhedlela lapho epheka khona. Bekuyiphupho lethu ukuba sigcine sishadile,” kusho uZondi.
title: Uyabalisa oboshwe bebopha ifindo ngokuphula umthetho wezwe

text:
INTATHELI YESOLEZWEU MNYANGO wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi kuzwelonke oholwa nguNgqongqoshe uNksz Bathabile Dlamini (
osesithombeni) usulande izingane eziwu-16 ezizalwa ngabesifazane abasemajele kwamanye amazwe.Usho kanje ungqongqoshe izolo esithangamini sabezindaba ePitoli ethula ngokusemthethweni uhlelo lokusiza abazali bezingane ababoshwe phesheya.Ungqongoshe uthe onina bezingane eziyisishiyagalolunye baboshwe eBrazil. Kulezi zingane kubalwa nezisanda kulandwa eRio naseSao Paolo.Uthe kwezimbili ezisanda kulandwa eBrazil kukhona enonyaka nenye enezinyanga eziwu-10.Utshele abezindaba ukuthi zisagcinwe esikhungweni sikahulumeni okwesikhashana ngaphambi kokuthi zinikezwe abangazikhulisa.Kunezinye ezine okuthiwa zisazolandwa yizikhulu zomnyango eBolivia, Hong Kong, Mozambique naseTanzania.Kwezingakalandwa kukhona lezo onina abasazikhulelwe okulindeleke ukuthi babelethe maduze.Abazali bezingane ezilandwe phesheya bangabanye besifazane abawu-337 ababoshelwe ukushushumbisa izidakamizwa emazweni angaphandle.Kuthiwa balinganiselwa eminyakeni ephakathi kuka-29 no-62 ubudala.Ungqongqoshe uthe usekhulume namazwe athathwa njengayintuba yokushushumbisa izidakamizwa ukuthi aqinise umthetho.Uthe ukhathazekile ngokwenyuka kwezibalo zabesifazane bakuleli ababoshelwa izidakamizwa eBrazil.“Bawu-28 abesifazane bakuleli asebeboshwe eBrazil kusukela kuqale lo nyaka. Kungenzeka ukuthi nokuba khona kwe-Confederations Cup ebiseBrazil kunomthethela,” kusho uNksz Dlamini.Uthe izibalo zizonyuka kakhulu ngonyaka ozayo njengoba kuzoba neNdebe yoMhlaba eBrazil uma kungaqiniswa umthetho.Umphenyi woklebe uBrigadier Ebrahim Kadwa uthe kusukela ngoJanuwari 2012 kuboshwe abawu-281 esikhumulweni sezindiza i-OR Tambo International, eGoli. Kukhona abakuleli nabavela kwamanye amazwe abebeshushumbisa izidakamizwa.
title: Izingane zababoshelwe ngaphandle zilandiwe

text: LIPHINDE lahlehliswa icala elibhekene nowayengumengameli wakuleli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma obekulindeleke ukuthi liqale ukuqulwa namhlanje enkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu. Icala lenkohlakalo elithinta uZuma nenkampani yezikhali yaseFrance, iThales, selibekelwe ukuhlala ngoJuni 23 ngenxa yeCovid-19. Leli cala sekuneminyaka lingaqali ukuqulwa kwazise uZuma uyaziphikisa izinsolo abekwe zona zokuthi wathola amaqatha omngenandlini ngokungemthetho, futhi uthi amacala abekwe wona anenhlese yepolitiki. UZuma uya kuleli cala nje, usanda kwenza ushintsho ebuthweni labameli azogadla ngabo.Umangaze abaningi elaxaza ummeli uMnuz Daniel Mantsha waqasha omunye uMnuz Eric Thumbumuzi Mabuza.Ithimba labameli bakaZuma liholwa wugalagala lommeli u-Advocate Muzi Sikhakhane SC.Ushintsho ebuthweni labameli lingase lichaze ukuthi uZuma ufuna ukuya ecaleni enethemba lokuthi ngeke zephuke izinduku azogadla ngazo.Emuva kokuqashwa kukaMabuza, kumenyezelwe ukuthi uZuma usihoxisile isicelo sakhe sokuthi angashushiswa abesifake enkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.UMabuza uke waxoxa nesiteshi sezindaba i-eNCA lapho acacise khona ukuthi uZuma unqume ukusihoxisa isicelo sakhe ngoba ufuna ukuthi ayobhekena kahle nenkantolo ukuze achaze konke okwenzeka.Ungubani uMabuza oqashwe wuZuma? Uphuma kwiMabuza Attorneys ezinze eGoli, kanti ungesinye sezikhulu zayo kodwa ubambisene nabanye ozakwabo.Akungabazeki ukuthi uMabuza ungomunye wabahlonishwayo kwezomthetho njengoba eke waphatha amacala amakhulu.Nguyena owayemele uMnuz Peter Moyo empini ende nabakwa-Old Mutual abangabaqashi bakhe.Uphinde wamela uMnuz Tom Moyane ngesikhathi ephikisana nokuxoshwa kwakhe kwaSARS.Nguyena uMabuza osanda kuqasha uMnuz Godrich Gardee we-EFF ukuba azoba wummeli oyithwasa enkampanini yakhe.
title: Lihlehlele uJuni icala likaZuma

text: USIZI lubiza olunye kumqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uGavin Hunt, okhala ngokulimala okuhlasele iningi labadlali bakhe asebekhulile nokwenza kubathathe isikhathi ukubamba umgqigqo.Lokhu kwandisa usizi kuHunt, obhekwe yisambane kwiChiefs njengoba efike wabhekana nesimo esingandile sokungakwazi ukuqinisa isikwati sakhe ngabadlali abasha.Eyokungakwazi ukusayinisa igcwale ngeledlule bechithwa yiCourt of Arbitration ecaleni abebelidlulise kade belahlwe kulo yiFifa ibasola ngokusayina ngesinxele umdlali waseMadagascar.NgeSonto ngo-3 ntambama uHunt nezakhe bamelwe wukulwela ukubuyisa isithunzi kwi-Orlando Pirates ebathele ngehlazo lika 3-0 emlenzeni wokuqala weMTN8 eSoweto ngoMgqibelo owedlule.UHunt uthi usizi lumsheba nolunye ngokuthinteka kwabadlali asebebadala eqenjini ekubeni nalaba abasebancane basadinga ukulandelelwa.“Akukho okunye ngaphandle kokuthi sibadlalise benjalo (besanda kubuya ekuthintekeni). Ukubafithi kwabo bazokuthola ngakho ukudlala, akukho kunye ngaphandle kokuzama ukukwakhe ngendlela,” kusho uHunt esithangamini nabezindaba seMTN8 ngoLwesine ekuseni.“Bonke babuya ekulimaleni uma bengalimele. UKatsande (Willard) udlalile imizuzu izolo ebusuku (emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ababambane kuwo ngo 0-0 neTS Galaxy).“YInto efanayo nakuCastro (uLeonardo) kanjalo noKgotso Moleko. Omunye izolo engimshintshile yize bengingathandi nguTower (u-Eric Mathoho).“Bonke laba badlali abakabi yimiqemane ngokugcwele. Ngakho ukuba qatha kwabo sizokwakha ngendlela ngokubadlalisa. Akukho okutheni esinakho vele esingabashintsha ngakho,” kusho uHunt.NgeSonto uHunt uzobhekana nomdlalo wakhe wesithupha kusukela efike kwiChiefs osekweve iminyaka emihlanu ingasazi isicoco.
title: UHunt ukhala ngokulinyalelwa nayizethenjwa

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESEIPHINDE yahlala obala inkinga yokuvuza kodonga lwasemuva lweLamontville Golden Arrows ngesikhathi ithelwa ngehlazo lika-3-0 yiCape Town City emdlalweni wesigaba seDStv Diski Challenge obuseMpumalanga Stadium, eHammarsdale izolo ntambama.Amagoli eCity angcwabe i-Arrows abekwe enethini nguSanele Gaxa ngomzuzu ka-10, u-Anathi Ngwadla ngoka-32 noJaedin Rhodes ngoka-59. Lo mdlalo ubudlalwa ngaphansi kweqoqo lokuqala okuyiCoastal.ABafana Bes’thende abacijwa nguTom Mtambo baye kulo mdlalo bevele bephefumula ngenxeba bebebuya endukwini ka-5-3 abayithola komkhaya iMaritzburg United.Ngaphambi komdlalo wabo neThe Citizens, uMtambo wakhala kakhulu kuleli phephandaba ngokuvuza kodonga lwakhe lwasemuva wathi le nkinga bayayilungisa. Nokho kubukeka ingakalungiseki. Emdlalweni wayizolo kucace zisuka nje ukuthi abafana beCity abacijwa nguMatt Haywood, bafuna ukuwunqoba kumnyama kubomvu. Bebehlasela kuvalwe amehlo odongeni lwasemuva lwe-Arrows.Akumangalisanga uGaxa eshaya igoli elihle ngomzuzu ka-10 engaphandle kwebhokisi ngemuva kokuthola isipho sebhola kuWandisile Ndisile ongukaputeni we-Arrows.Ngemuva kwaleli goli, iCity iqhubekile nokucindezela. UNgwadla uthole iphasi enhle edide yaziqeda izitobha ze-Arrows ebivela ku-Olwethu Nyembe, walibeka enethini. Ziye ekhefini iCity ihamba phambili ngo-2-0.Ngesikhathi zibuya, Abafana Bes’thende bacishe balithola igoli ngomzuzu ka-47 ngonyawo luka-Ismail Zuma kodwa nokho ibhola lakhe lachithelwa ngaphandle ngunozinti weCity, uDiana Oliaro Luca. I-The Citizens ithole igoli lesithathu ngonyawo lukaRhodes ngemuva kokuthola ibhola ebelivela kuNgwadla obefana nomiyane endlebeni kubadlali basemuva be-Arrows.Ukuhlulwa kwe-Arrows lapha kubukeka kuyinciphisela amathuba okuzibekisela indawo emidlalweni eyandulela owamanqamu ezodlalwa amaqembu amabili aphezulu iqoqo ngalinyeImiphumela yeDStv Diski Challenge yangempelasonto:TS Galaxy 2-2 Chippa United; Bloemfontein Celtic 0-4 Kaizer Chiefs; Orlando Pirates 2-1 Black Leopards; Tshakhuma 1-1 Swallows FC; Maritzburg United 3-3 Stellenbosch FC; Arrows 0-3 CT City; AmaZulu FC 2-1 Supersport United; Baroka 3-2 Mamelodi Sundowns.
title: Iqhubekile nokugqama inkinga ye-Arrows kwiDiski

text: ASALE dengwane amakholwa ebandla lakwaShembe edilizelwa abasebenzi bakwaMasipala weTheku ithempeli lawo eThornwood, eThekwini.Ngokusho kwelungu lebandla sekuneminyaka engaphezu kwelishumi amakholwa ekhonzela kuleli thempeli kule ndawo. NgoLwesine olwedlule kuthiwa abasebenzi bakamasipala badilize indlu ebisethempelini kwasala amatshe amhlophe. UMnuz Vusumuzi Ngobese, okhonza kuleli thempeli, uthe bachitha imali enkulu benikela ukuze kwakhiwe ithempeli eselidiliziwe. UNgobese uthe imvume yokwakha bayinikezwa yikhansela, abalibikelile ngokudilizwa kwethempeli labavumela ukuthi mabathathe izinyathelo. Uthe ngoMgqibelo bakhonzele esigangeni ngoba kudilizwe zonke izindonga zethempeli.Kuthiwa abasebenzi bakamasipala bafika ngezithuba zawo 11 emini, badiliza indlu.“Okusiphatha kabi wukuthi akulona ibandla lethu kuphela elakhe kule ndawo. Zikhona izindlu zamanye amabandla kodwa zona azidilizwanga. Sisola ukuthi kukhona nokucwasa ibandla lethu nokungasihloniphi,” kusho uNgobese.Lolu daba selubikwe emkhandlwini iNazareth Judiciary Council ukuze uphenye.Okhulumela umkhandlu, uMnuz Willington Myeni, uvumile ukuthi babikelwe lolu daba.Uveze ukuthi bacele amalungu ebandla eThornwood ukuthi abhale incwadi ayilethe emahhovisi akhe. Uthe udaba bazoludlulisela kwiKhomishini eVikela Inkolo, Amasiko neZilimi ezobheka ukuthi akukho yini ukucwaswa ngokwenkolo kulolu daba.UMnuz Reginald Clute oyikhansela ku-ward 13 uvumile ukuthi uyazi ngalolu daba futhi basazama ukululungisa. Uthe amaNazaretha sekunesikhathi ekhonza kuleli thempeli futhi acela kuyena ukwakha umpheme ukuze akhosele uma lina.“Ngabanika imvume yokuthi babeke umpheme ngoba vele indawo ekaMasipala. Uphiko lwakwaLand Invasion kuthe uma selufika lwadilizela nawo amaNazaretha engicabanga ukuthi bekungafanele. Kuthiwa bathe bathunywe ikhansela, okungemina ngoba bengingeke ngivumele abantu babeke umpheme bese ngithi awudilizwe,” kusho uClute.Imizamo yokuthola okhulumela uMasipala, uMnuz Mandla Nsele, ayiphumelelanga. Isolezwe limzame kusukela ngeSonto ucingo engalubambi, wathunyelelwa umyalezo nge-email nangeSMS, kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engaphendulanga.
title: Kudilizwe ithempeli lakwaShembe

text: INKULU inkulumo mpikiswano ekhona kwabesifazane mayelana nokugqokwa nokungagqokwa kwamaphenti.Abanye sebakwenza kwaba wumkhuba wabo nje ukuthi iphenti baligqoka kuphela ngaleso sikhathi senyanga, kungenjalo akukho lutho olubahlanganisa nephenti.Odokotela bathi ayikho into embi ngokungaligqoki iphenti, kunalokho kuningi owesifazane ongaligqokile iphenti angakuzuza. Bathi njengoba sekuyisikhathi sonyaka lapho abesifazane abaningi begqoka khona izingubo ezishayisa umoya, baningi asebezoqala bathuntuthe izimpahla zangaphansi eziqinile nezibamba umzimba, ngenhloso yokuthi izingubo zabo ezilula zingavezi lutho ngaphansi okanye zibukeke zime kahle emizimbeni yabo.Baxwayisa lama besifaza ne ngokuthi baziyeke lezi zingubo zangaphansi ezingonamathela, eziqoqa umzimba. Bathi ukufudumala ezikuletha enkomeni kunengozi enkulu nezinkinga ezingadalela owesifazane isicefe esingenasidingo.Bathi okungenani abesifazane abalungise imizimba yabo, bajime ukuze bangabi nezinyama abasaba ukuthi zizoputshuka uma sebegqoke okubakhululayo njengezingubo zasehlobo. Kunalokho babala izinto ezinhle abathi zenziwa wukungadilozi kwabesifazane.Nazi ezinye abazibalayo:Umoya ushaya kamnandi- Isitho sangasese siyakudingwa ukushaywa wumoya, kuvikela amagciwane. Ukungadilozi kwenza ukuthi umoya ushaye kahle, isitho sihlale sisesimweni esifanele, kodwa baxwayisa abesifazane abangadilozile ukuthi bangahambe behlala phansi noma kuphi ngoba lokho kuyingozi.Izifo ezidalwa ngamagciwane ziyabaleka-Ukugqoka iphenti okungenzeka uthi uyalikhumula uchama ethoyilethi lomphakathi, lisukume namagciwane bese ulinameka esithweni sangasese, kungenzeka uzithole usugula. Kanti uma ungaligqokile, usukuma wesule umchamo uzihambele.Uhlobo lwamaphentiInqwaba yabesifazane igqoka uhlobo olungafanele lwamaphenti. Ngokodokotela, amaphenti alungile ngakhiwe ngokotini kuphela. Lawa ahambisana nemfashini awosilika nezinye izindwangu, awakhuthazwa ngoba enza kungabi lula ukungena komoya enkomeni.Kwabazivocavoyo-Ukugqoka iphenti ngesikhathi uzivocavoca bathi akulungile neze. Umjuluko ohambisana nokushukeka kwephenti nosuke ukugqokele ukujima, kungenza omkhulu umonakalo esikhumbeni esithambile esiqaqele inkomo.Ungagcina ususikeka noma uhlaselwe okubizwa ngeYeast Infection ngenxa yokushisa nokushukana okwedlulele.Odokotela bathi kungcono owesifazane ojimayo agqoke asuke ezivocavoca ngakho ayeke iphenti.Ocansini-Yize bungekho ubufakazi obanele balokhu kodwa ikhona inkolelo kwabanye odokotela yokuthi owesifazane ongaligqoki iphenti uvamise ukulungela kahle ucansi ekupheleni kosuku.Ukushukana kwamathanga nokuthinteka okuncane kwezinyamana zenkomo kongadilozile, bathi kuyenzeka kuwuvuse kahle umuzwa wocansi.Nokho odokotela bathi luningi ucwaningo okusamele lwenziwe ukuqinisekisa le nkolelo.* Olunye ulwazi lucashunwe ku-www.women’shealth.com
title: Odokotela bancoma ukungagqoki iphenti

text: KUVELE ukuthi unyamalele umgadli we-Ajax Cape Town, uPrince Nxumalo, okuke kwabikwa ukuthi ufunwa uthuli ngamaqembu aseGauteng.Izindaba zokuduka zivezwe umqeqeshi we-Ajax, uStanley Menzo, okusho ngaphandle kokunanaza ukuthi akamazi ukuthi ukuphi lo mgadli.UMenzo ubekhuluma nabezindaba ngemuva komdlalo we-Absa Premiership lapho ezakhe zikhale ngaphansi kwiKaizer Chiefs ngo 1-0 eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngempelasonto.“Ukukhuluma iqiniso ngoPrince, angimazi ukuthi ukuphi. Uyafika aphinde anyamalale usuku noma ezimbili. Namanje angazi ukuthi ukuphi. Ngizobona ngaye uma esenquma ukubuya. Angikwazi ukusebenza nomdlali onjalo,” kusho uMenzo ebonakala nasebusweni ukuthi uyanengeka.UNxumalo kule sizini usashaye amagoli amabili emidlalweni yeligi. UMenzo uveza eyokunyamalala kwakhe nje, usanda kutshela abezindaba emasontweni edlule ukuthi lo mgadli odabuka eMlaza akazimiseli.“Asikwazi ukuba nabadlali abasinika 60% noma 50%, bonke abadlali kufanele basinikeze 100%. Uma umdlali enza njalo siyamnika ithuba lokudlala. Kodwa uma kukhona osinikeza okungaphansi kusho ukuthi sinenkinga,” kusho uMenzo phambilini.UNxumalo ufike kwi-Ajax kumasizini amabili edlule esuka kwiSuperSport United. Ufike wakhombisa izimpawu zokuvutha phambi kwamapali eqhulula amagoli phezu kokuxinwa yisifo sokuwa.Leli qembu libe naye limeseka kuvela ukuthi limhambisa kodokotela okuyibona abagcine beyibonile inkinga yokuthi uphathwa yi-epilepsy.Njengoba eseshaya eyokunyamalala umthombo osondelene naye uNxumalo, uhlebele Isolezwe ukuthi ucathanyelwa iMamelodi Sundowns neBidvest Wits.NgoJanuwari amaqembu azobe esemkhankasweni wokusayinisa abadlali afisa ukuqinisa ngawo izikwati zawo.Ngasohlangothini lwe-Ajax eyehlele endaweni ka-14 kwi-log, uMenzi uthe ikhona ingcindezi yokukhipha iqembu otakwini elikuyona. Uthe ufisa ukuletha abadlali abazokwenza umehluko eqenjini lakhe uma sekuvulwe iwindi.
title: Unyamalele umgadli we-Ajax ofunwa ngamanye

text: IZINHLANGANO ezingenzi nzuzo kwezemfundo nezinyunyana zothisha zisamukele ngo-elethu isimemezelo sikaNgqongqoshe weziMali, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, sokuthi uzofaka * -R317million kwi-Early Childhood Development (ECD).Kungokokuqala ngqa kulo nyaka ukuthi kube nemali ye-ECD. Izinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo kwezemfundo nezinyunyana zothisha bezihlale zikhala ngokunganakwa kwayo kodwa ibe iyisisekelo semfundo.Ethula isabelo sezimali ePhalamende eKapa kuleli sonto, uGordhan umemezele ukuthi imali ibihlelelwe khona lokhu kulo nyaka wezimali * -2017/2018 ukuze ifukule i-ECD nengqalasizinda.“Eminyakeni emithathu ezayo imali izonyuka ibe ngu-R1.3billion,” kusho umbiko wezimali kaGordhan.UNkk Leanne Jansen-Thomas, inhloko yemigomo kwi-Equal Education (EE) ukushayele ihlombe ukufakwa kwemali kwi-ECD wathi ngezinye zezinto ebebezilwela kakhulu.Uthe yize izofakwa emnyangweni wezenhlalakahle yomphakathi kumele iqinisekise ukuthi ifinyelela ezikhungweni ezine-ECD.Imali inikwa abasebenza ezinkulisa, kusho uNkk Jansen-Thomas.Uthe bathemba ukuthi imali efakiwe izophucula imiholo yabasebenzi eqala ku-R1 400 ize ifinyelela ku-R2 000 kwabanye.“Abasebenzi abanayo imihlomulo enjengama-medical aid, imihlomulo yokuthenga izindlu neminye ekhishwa nguhulumeni. Ucwaningo luyaveza ukuthi umfundi oqale emazingeni aphansi ikakhulu i-ECD wenza kahle kakhulu kwaGrade 1 namanye amabanga,” kusho uNkk Jansen-Thomas.UMnuz Allen Thompson, oyiPhini likaMengameli weNatu, uthe bayakwamukela ukufakwa kwemali kwi-ECD ngoba ne-ANC yanquma ukuthi kumele kube yimpoqo ukuthi umfundi enze uPre Grade R ngaphambi kokuba enze uGrade R noGrade 1.Uthe bafuna ukuthi i-ECD ifakwe ngaphansi komnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo ngoba yonke into eyithintayo ikhuluma ngemfundo.“Uma ubheka, kusuka umfundi enonyaka ezelwe kuya esezoqala ukungena kwaGrade 1, i-ECD yonke leyo ngoba imfundo eyimpoqo iqala kwaGrade 1. Akuphuculwe izimo zokusebenza kubo bonke abasebenzi be-ECD ukuze izwe lithuthuke kwezemfundo ngoba wonke amazwe enza kahle kwezemfundo yingoba abeka phambili isisekelo semfundo,” kusho uThompson.UNobhala weSadtu, uMnuz Mugwena Maluleke, uthe bayasamukela isabelo sezimali wathi banethemba lokuthi imali efakiwe izoqeda ngezikole zodaka.Uthe bayakwamukela ukutshalwa kwemali kwi-ECD okuyisekelo sezemfundo.
title: Imukelwe ngo-elethu imali uGordhan ayabele i-ECD

text: AHLULEKILE amaqembu aphikisayo ukuphoqa iMeya yoMkhandlu weTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, ukuba ihoxe ingasethuli isabelomali somkhandlu sikaR50.6 billion eCity Hall izolo.Amaqembu aphikisayo abekhala ngokuthi uNkk Gumede ubhekene nezinsolo zenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa, akakwazi ukuthi angathula isamelomali sikamasipala.UMnuz Thabani Mthethwa weDA uthe izinsolo ezibhekene nemeya zinzima ngakho akukuhle ukuthi iqhubeke nokuthula isabelomali sikamasipala.“Njengemeya ungubuso bomkhandlu kanti nezinsolo obhekene nazo zibucayi kumele ngabe ulandela unembeza wakho uhoxe ungasithuli isabelomali ukuvikela isithunzi sikamasipala,” kusho uMthethwa.Umholi wekhokhasi ye-IFP kuMasipala weTheku uMnuz Mdu Nkosi uthe kusukela emhlanganweni wesigungu esilawula umasipala ngoLwesibili babuzile ukuthi uNkk Gumede ukhona ngaliphi ngoba umbandela webheyili yakhe awumvumeli ukuthi abe yingxenye yawo.“Omunye umbandela webheyili uthi imeya ayingaxhumani nenhloko yezimali. Manje umbuzo okhona uthi imeya isethula kanjani isabelomali ingaxhumananga nenhloko yezimali. Kodwa-ke siyathemba ukuthi abaphenyi becala bayulandela lolu daba, bazobona ukuthi imibandela yebheyili ayiphulwanga yini,” kusho uNkosi.Kodwa ikhansela le-ANC, uMnuz Nkosenhle Madlala, uyivikele iMeya wathi iNingizimu Afrika ilawulwa uMthethosisekelo, hhayi izinqumo zezinkantolo.“UMthethosisekelo wezwe uyedlula yonke imithetho ekhona futhi uthi umuntu umsulwa kuze kube utholwa yinkantolo enecala,” kusho uMadlala.UMadlala uthe futhi uNkk Gumede akabhekene nezinsolo zenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa kodwa usolwa ngokusebenzisa isikhundla sakhe kabi.Imizamo yamaqembu aphikisayo yokuvimba uNkk Gumede ingenxa yokuthi uboshwe ngoKlebe wabuye wadedelwa ngebheyili mayelana nezinsolo zenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.UNkk Gumede naye akayingenanga eyokuthi angasethuli isabelomali somkhandlu, waqhubeka nokwesethula.“Namhlanje usuku olubalulekile, lapho siphasisa khona isabelomali esizosiyisa kwesinye isigaba, sithatha esinye isinyathelo ekuvuseleleni ithemba kwizakhamizi zaseThekwini, ezibeke amathemba azo emahlombe ethu,” kusho uNkk Gumede.Uthe lolu suku luza ngemuva kokuthi kube nemicimbi eminingi kubalwa nokugcotshwa kwamalungu ePhalamende amasha.“Kuningi osekuzuziwe kusukela izwe langena kwintando yabantu, kuningi futhi esisazokuzuza uma sibambisene,” kusho uNkk Gumede.Imeya ibalule izinto eziningi asebenzenzile njengomasipala kubalwa ukufakelwa kukagesi emizini engu-700 000, ukufakela kwamanzi nokwakhiwa kwezindlu ezingaphezukuka-2 000 000.UNkk Gumede uthe angaphezu kuka-46 000, amathuba emisebenzi engamatoho asebewadalile“Kunezikhungo zezempilo ezingu-59, esesizakhile ezisebenza amahoraangu-24, kuningi esesikuzuzile singathatha usuku lonke uma singakhuluma ngakho,’’ kusho uNkk Gumede.Uthe into ebaluleke kakhulu abayenzayo ukuthi bashintsha impilo yabantu.“Isabelomali sethu manje sihleli kuR50.6 billion, enye into eseqhulwini esifisa ukuyenza ukuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda.Uthe kunemali enguR3.7 billion ebekelwe ukwakhiwa kwezindlu.Uthe bazibophezele futhi ekufukuleni osomabhizinisi abasathuthuka.Amanzi azonyuka ngo-15%, kwabamabhizinisi, ugesi uzonyuka ngo-13.07%. Ama-rates azokhuphuka ngo-6.9%.
title: Imeya yenqabe ukushenxa icelwa

text: IQULU lomakadebona beMK izolo ligasele emahhovisi esifundazwe e-ANC eThekwini liyothula uhlu lwezikhalo zawo.Ukugasela kwalawa masosha alinganiselwa ku-200, kuphazamise amalungiselelo omgubho omkhulukazi iJanuwari 8 abeqhubeka izolo, njengoba kuphoqeleke ukuthi ingxenye yobuholi baseThekwini nobesifundazwe bubambe umhlangano nawo.I-ANC kulezi zinsuku imatasa njengoba ilungiselela umgubho wayo kazwelonke ozoba esifundazweni ngoMgqibelo.Phakathi kwezinto akhala ngazo amasosha; indaba yokuqashwa eMkhandlwini weTheku, ukungahlinzekwa ngezindlu zomxhaso nodaba lwempesheni.USihlalo weMKMVA esifundeni iTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Nyuswa, uthe lolu udaba lwesifunda iTheku kodwa bagcine sebeya emahhovisi esifundazwe ngoba bebefuna ukuthi udaba lwabo lusheshe luzwakale.“Into esikhala ngayo kakhulu udaba lokuqasheka kwethu eMkhandlwini weTheku. Kunohlelo obeluqhubeka lokuthi siqashwe oluvele lwama, nathi asazi ukuthi kuqhubekani? Lokhu esikwenzayo sikwenza ngoba silwela amalungelo ethu ngoba kunomgomo owaphasiswa othi omakadebona bamasosha kumele bahlinzekwe ngamathuba emisebenzi,” kusho uNyuswa.Uthe ezinye izinto abakhala ngazo indaba yezindlu nempesheni.“Siyakhala kakhulu nangokukhishwa ngaphandle ezinhlelweni zokuhlinzekwa kwabantu ngezindlu ngoba nathi kumele ngabe siyahlomula,” kusho uNyuswa.Uthe okunye abakhala ngakho udaba lwempesheni ebitholwa amasosha amadala esivele yanqamuka.Lawa masosha uhlu lwezikhalo zawo aludlulisele kuNobhala we-ANC eThekwini, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli nobuholi benhlangano esifundazweni.Imizamo yokuthola uNtuli izolo ayizange iphumelele. Ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa kanti nomyalezo athunyelelwe wona kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engakawuphenduli.Ethintwa izolo uMnuz Mthunzi Gumede, okhulumela iMeya yoMkhandlu weTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede, uthe ngeke bakwazi ukuphawula kakhulu ngalolu daba ngoba kunomhlangano oqhubekayo phakathi kwamasosha nobuholi.“Engingakusho ukuthi kunomgomo owaphasiswa ohambisana neMilitary Veterans Act othi kumele abhekelelwe amasosha ezinhlangano ezabamba iqhaza emzabalazweni,” kusho uGumede.
title: Kuphazamiseke aweJanuary 8 kugasela iMK

text: Sibusiso MdlaloseUMGADLI ongalibheki ipali weLamontville Golden Arrows, uKnox  “Mjomana” Mutizwa, uthi bakubeke emahlombe abo njengabadlali beqembu ukuhluleka kwalo ngesizini ephelile ukuzibekisela indawo kwiMTN 8 yangesizini ezayo ka-2020/2021.UMutizwa (26), ongomunye wabadlali abamqoka nabayizinsika kwi-Arrows, uthi nakuba ekwazile ukushayela iqembu lakhe amagoli amqoka kule sizini ephelile, kodwa  akumthokozisi njengoba yena nozakwabo behlulekile ukufaka iqembu ohlwini lwamaqembu ayisishiyagalombili aphezulu kwi-log, obesekuyisizini yesibili kulandelana ngaphansi kukaSteve “Mphathi” Komphela.Ngesizini ephelile Abafana Bes’thende baqede isizini behlezi endaweni yeshumi nambili kwi-log yePremiership ngaphezudlwana komkhaya babo AmaZulu, nobesekuyisizini yesibili kulandelana leli qembu lihluleka ukungena kuTop 8.Kusukela leli qembu likhuze ibuya kuPremiership ngesizini ka-2015/2016 lisuka kuNational First Division (NFD) – kulandela ukugawulwa kwalo yizembe ngeka-2013/2014  – bese likwenze injwayelo ukuqeda isizini libalwa namaqembu ayisishiyagalombili aphezulu kwi-log yePremiership. Likwenzile lokho kulandelana ngesizini ka-2016/17 neka-2017/18 liqeda endaweni yesishiyagalombili ku-log yePremiership.“Kungumsebenzi wami njengomgadli ukushaya amagoli, kodwa akekho umgadli noma umdlali wanoma yiliphi iqembu okujabulelayo ukushaya kwakhe amagoli ekubeni iqembu lakhe lidonsa kanzima ngoba phela wonke umdlali ufuna ukubona iqembu lakhe lenza kahle.“Nami-ke ngiwashayile amagoli kule sizini ephelile, amanye awo enze umehluko emidlalweni emqoka esiyidlalile.“Yize ukushaya amagoli kuhlale kuyinto ehlale ingijabulisa ngaso sonke isikhathi njengomgadli, kodwa angijabulanga ngokuphelele njengoba iqembu lingenzanga kahle ngesizini ephelile.“Zibe ningi zona izingqinamba kule sizini esanda kuphela okubalwa kuzo nokudlala egunqwini (bio-buble), okuyinto ebesingakaze sibhekane nayo ngaphambilini,” kubeka uMutizwa.Uthe kodwa nabo njengabadlali beqembu kufanele bakubeke emahlombe abo ukungenzi kahle kweqembu kule sizini ephelile.“Kuyinto evamile ukuthi iminwe ikhombe kuphela umqeqeshi uma iqembu lingenzanga kahle,” usho kanje.Lo mgadli ogijima naseqenjini lesizwe laseZimbabwe nowahlabana ngomklomelo wokuba yiPlayer of The Tournament emqhudelwaneni weCosafa Cup owanqotshwa yiyo iThe Warriors  ngo-2017 udlalelwa eNorth West, ubanga ijezi kuleli qembu lesizwe nezinkalimeva zabagadliokubalwa kuzo uKnowledge Musona, Tino Kadewere no-Evans Rusike.UMutizwa obambane noKermit Erasmus, Bongi Ntuli noSamir Nurkovic ngamagoli angu-13 kule sizini ephelile, akakufihli ukulubela kwakhe ukuhlabana ngomklomelo wokuba ngumshayi-magoli ohamba phambili kuPremiership ngelinye ilanga.“Kuyisifiso sami esikhlulu ukuthi ngelinye ilanga ngihlabane ngeLesley Manyathela Golden Boot Award, futhi kuyangikhuthaza ukuthi isizini nesizini ngiya ngokuya ngithuthuka ekushayeni amagoli, njengoba ngeka-2018/19 ngishaye ayisishiyagalombili kanti kweyandulela leyo bengishaye ayisikhombisa,” kuphetha uMutizwa.UMGADLI weLamontville Golden Arrows uKnox Mutizwa ogqoke elinokuhlaza nokuphuzi nesikhindi esiphuzi oxinwe kabi nguThaho Mokeke weCapeTown City ongomunye wabagadli abashaye amagoli amaningi kule sizini ufisa ukunqoba isicathulo somdlali oshaye amagoli amaningi okuthiwa yiLesley Manyathela Golden Boot AwardIsithombe: Backpagepix
title: Kusemahlombe ethu ukufukula iqembu – Mutizwa

text: Lokhu kulandela ukudlwengulwa kuphinde kubulawe ngesihluku isitshudeni saseNyuvesi yaseKapa, * -Uyinene Mrwetyana.Ukubulawa kwakhe kuholele ekutheni kube khona abavula amakhasi ehlukene enkundleni yokuxhumana iTwitter nalapho abesifazane bebefaka abantu besilisa abathi babahlukumeza.Ekhasini iDBN Survivors ne-Am I Next? kunamekwe ubuso babaculi nosaziwayo nabahleli bemicimbi.Abesifazane bebekhala ngokuthi abenza lokhu benza izinto ezehlukene kubona behlangana nabo ezindaweni ezehlukene.Kukhona owesifazane othe wayenomunye umculi endaweni yobumnandi nalapho athatha khona isikhwama sakhe.Uveze ukuthi ngesikhathi esesifuna wamtshela ukuthi unesibhamu ngakho angalinge amphoqe ukuthi asisebenzise.Uveze ukuthi wayesezimisele ngokuhamba engasiphethe isikhwama kodwa umculi wamlandela wamfaka emotweni yakhe.Uveze ukuthi waya naye emzini wakhe oseThekwini lapho afike wamtshela ukuthi ufuna ukulala naye.Uthe walwa naye imizuzu engaphezu kuka-20 kodwa ngenxa yokondleka kwakhe wagcina emdlwengulile.Omunye uthe wadlwengulwa wumculi weqembu lekwaito ngo-2015.Uthe endlini yomculi kunesicabha esingavuleki uma bengaphakathi ekamelweni.Uthe wayekhala ngesikhathi kwenzeka lokhu futhi namanje usamkhumbula lo mculi equma phezu kwakhe emdlwengula.Uqhube wathi akakwazanga ukuyovula icala ngoba umculi wasebenzisa ikhondomu.Owesifazane uthe lo mculi lokhu usekwenze emantombazaneni amaningi.Omunye umhleli wemicimbi naye igama lakhe belindiza phezulu kuvela inqwaba yabesifazane abathe wake wabadlwengula.Kuvele ukuthi wenza lo mkhuba kwabesifazane abasuke becwile ezinkambeni zikaFaro.Ekhasini elithi Am I Next? kukhona abesifazane abaveze ukuthi badlwengulwa womrepha.Kwenzeka lokhu nje ngesonto eledlule intokazi ewumxhumanisi wabezindaba nabaculi, uBonnie Meslane, iveze ukuthi yadlwengulwa yimenenja yosaziwayookukhona kubo uDJ Zinhle,Boity, Black Coffee noNomalanga Shozi.Lokhu kwathusa iningi kodwa kulabo saziwayo akekho owaphawula ngalokhu.UDJ Tira izolo uthe usebhaleingoma ngesihlava sokubulawa kwabesifazane.Uthe njengabantu besilisa kumele bakhombisenjalo ukuthi abesifazane babalulekile futhi nohulumeni kube khona akwenzayo ngalokhu.
title: Kunekwe abasolwa ngokudlwengula kuTwitter

text: KUSOLWA ukuthi zishaywe inyoka imamba, izingane zandawonye ezimbili ezibhuqwe isisu zagcina ngokushona oShabeni, eShowe.ULungelo Mngadi (8) noSimo Swane (7) bashone ngoMsombuluko kulandela ukukhala ngokubhuqwa isisu, bephalaza bekhala nangokukhathala.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi lezi zingane kukhona ushevu okungathi ziwudlile ngendlela ebezigula ngayo.Enye ingane yakwaSwane nayo ibikhala esifanayo kodwa isindile.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo osondelene nalolu daba ukuthi laba bafanyana bebebuya ukuyolanda izinkomo emadlelweni babe sebekhala ngokuthi kukhona into ebalumile.Kuthiwe kube sengathi iqhuqhuva nje elidumbile. Bafakwe iqhwa ukuze kudambe.Kuthiwa lezi zingane zikhale ngokukhathala, zafuna ukuyolala.Ebusuku zivuke sezigulela ukufa, ziphalaza zikhala nangesisu.Kubizwe abezimo eziphuthumayo, eyokuqala ingane kuthiwa ishonele ekhaya, enye yashonela esibhedlela.Esindile kuthiwa isalulama esibhedlela, kuthiwa asikho isiqiniseko ukuthi nayo ilunywe inyoka yini.Umthombo osondelene nalolu daba nocele ukuba ungadalulwa uthe kusolwa inyoka imamba ukuthi iyona elume lezi zingane.“Okwamanje kusavele ukuthi kuthinteka uphoyizeni ekushoneni kwalezi zingane. Ekuqaleni bekucatshangelwa ukuthi ukudla ezikudlile kodwa kwabonakala ukuthi kunokudumba ezinakho okungenzeka ukuthi okokulunywa inyoka imamba,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe amaphoyisa aseShowe avule amadokodo ngokushona komuntu. “NgoMsombuluko izingane ezintathu zikhale ngokuphathwa izisu. Kushone izingane ezimbili. Amaphoyisa aseShowe avule idokodo ngokushona kwalaba. Kuzophenywa ngokwenzekile.”Isolezwe lizame ukuxhumana nomndeni walezi zingane kodwa izingcingo zamalungu omndeni bezivaliwe, kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.
title: Kusolwa inyoka ngezelamani ezifile
