text: AKWAZIWA ukuthi iyozala nkomoni odabeni lwePremier Soccer League (PSL) ne-Ajax Cape Town njengoba umdonsiswano wokuthi ngabe leli qembu laseKapa lizodlala kuphi ngesizini ezayo usalokhu uqhubeke njalo.Ngokusho kwePSL i-Urban Warriors kuyifanele ukuphucwa amaphuzu ngokudlalisa uTendai Ndoro ophule umthetho ngokudlala emaqenjini amathathu amaligi ehlukene ngesizini eyodwa.Ngakolunye uhlangothi i-Ajax ilinqobile icala enkantolo ephakeme lokuthi ibuyiselwe amaphuzu ayo, nokuyenza ibuyele endaweni ka-15 kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership.Isinqumo sikhishwe ijaji uDenise Fisher sikubeke kwacaca ukuthi i-Ajax kufanele ibuyele endaweni yayo, waphinde wachitha imidlalo yokuhlunga enqotshwe yiBlack Leopards njengoba eyibiza ngento engekho.NgoLwesibili i-Ajax ithe izofaka isicelo sokumisa ukuqala kwemidlalo yeligi okumele iqale ngo-Agasti 4.UNDUDUZO DLADLA ukhulume nabalandeli bebhola ukuzwa ukuthi ngabe baluthatha kanjani lolu daba oluyimpicabadala olungadala ukuthi imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership igcine ngokuthi ingaqalwa ngesikhathi. USIBONELO NGCOBO uthathe izithombe.ZINHLE GQALAUZINHLE GQALA waseMlaza kwa-J utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi izikhulu zePSL zizixhaphazela AmaZulu nje qha.“Usuthu luphumile kwi-Top 8 ngenxa yale nto eqhubekayo ekubeni lube lwabadlala kahle isizini yonke. Izikhulu zizidlalela ngoSuthu ngoba nakhu lungelona iqembu “elikhulu” laseGoli. Ukube le nto yenzeke kwiKaizer Chiefs noma i-Orlando Pirates ngabe azithathwanga lezi zinqumo.”SIMPHIWE NXUMALOUSIMPHIWE NXUMALO waKwaMashu ka-D yena uthe: “Kuyoba abukho ubulungiswa kwi-Ajax uma kuwukuthi ishaywa nje ngesithende imigudu ayilandelwanga ngendlela. Okwesibili ngabe ubani ozoshayeka kakhulu kubo bonke abathintekayo? Lapha ngibala noSuthu ngoba nalo iyazitshwa eyalo neTop 8. Ukungaqali kwemidlalo yePSL ngesikhathi kungasho ukuthi abadlali bazoba nengcindezi enkulu ngoba imidlalo izobe isithothelana eduze mase kuqale isizini”.ZAMO LUNGWASEUZAMO LINGASWE waseMzinto ukhale ngokuthi bona bazolimala kakhulu njengoba bengamaphanta uma imidlalo ingaqali ngesikhathi.“Ewu ngabe silimele ngoba siyaphanta (esho ukubheja). Ngokwami i-Ajax bekufanele iwazi kangcono umthetho ngabe asikho lapha esikhona,” usho kanje.SANELE DLAMINIUSANELE DLAMINI waseHammarsdale yena uthe unesisombululo esilula kulolu daba.“Abenze amaqembu abe wu-18 qha. Ngikusho lokhu ngoba ngeke kube nobulungiswa uma iBlack Leopards kuthiwa ayiqale phansi imidlalo yokuhlunga ekubeni isiyinqobile,” usho kanje.SITHEMBILE MATHENJWAUSITHEMBILE MATHENJWA waseMlazi kwa-N yena uthe: “Iyinkinga kakhulu le nto futhi idala ukukhuluma okukhulu. I-PSL iyona egangayo lapha, kodwa-ke ngoba sekunje, awasale eseba wu-18 amaqembu.LUCKY SHANGEULUCKY SHANGE ohlala kuRussell Street enkabeni yedolobha iTheku uthe ukuze kuzoba khona ukuthula akwandiswe amaqembu.“Akufakwe i-Ajax neJomo Cosmos kube khona ukuthula kuqale imidlalo. Akuzwakali kwakhona ukuthi kuze kube yimanje akushiwo lutho ngokuqhathwa kwamaqembu (fixture), kukhomba kona ukuthi inkinga inkulu,” kubeka uShange.
title: I-PSL kumele yandise amaqembu: abalandeli

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho ngicela ukubhala mayelana nodaba oluwundabamlonyeni kula malanga lokushaywa kwabokufika nokuphangwa kwezitolo zabo.Mina ngibona sishoda ngabaholi eMzansi ngoba into abayenzayo nje yinkohlakalo, ngamacala, yizinkantolo, wukuxoshana wukubulalana unyaka uqala uze uyophela.I-ANC yenza into eyodwa kusukela ngoJanuwari kuya kuDisemba - inkohlakalo nokuhamba izinkantolo. Ukulalela ukuthi abantu abavotayo bathini kayikwenzi lokho. Empeleni kumele ngabe abaholi bayabalalela abantu. Kade abantu bethi abokufika ababuyiselwe emakubo kusale abanezimvume kodwa bona abalaleli.Abantu baphinda bathi asisebenzi imisebenzi ithathwe abokufika waqhubeka njalo uhulumeni wathula.Baphinda bathi ngoSepthemba 1-2 sizozijezisela nakhona wathula uhulumeni. Manje usethi okwenzekayo kushonisa phansi umnotho.Owami umbuzo uthi kanti ubethule nje ubecabanga ukuthi kuzoze kube njani?Omunye umbuzo ngalezi zinhlangano okuthiwa zimele abokufika uthi zathini abokufika bengena ngaphandle kwemvume beshaya namaphoyisa? Ngabe yinto ehleliwe ukuthi abokufika bangene baphume ezweni bafike benze abakuthandayo kungabi ndaba zalutho?Bezikuphi lezi zinhlangano njengoba seziqhamuka ngoba sekunje. Mina ngiyazibuza ukuthi kanti le lizwe linabaholi abanjani abalinda kuze konakale bese kuyima besukuma.Ngabe sinalo ikusasa kuleli zwe uma sisenabaholi abanjengalaba ngoba kumanje kushe izitolo kwasha amaloli kwashiswa izimoto ezidayisayo. Ngabe kufanele sihlale sigidagida ndawonye? Cha ngigeza izandla ngohulumeni wethu, votani bantu bakithi anginamona.Thanda ChoncoEmpangeni
title: Abaholi bethu balinda kuze konakale izinto

text:

title: Awasekho amathiki amanqamu eNedbank Cup

text: IQEMBU elihlonishwayo kwi-hip hop iSkwatta Kamp, lithi i-albhamu yalo entsha kuzoba ngeyokugcina.Leli qembu lodumo lwezingoma okubalwa kuzo iThe Clap Song, Umoya, Landela nezinye linama-albhamu amane.Ilungu leqembu uBozza, lithe ngesikhathi bengena estudiyo bazitshelile ukuthi i-albhamu abayiphekayo kuzoba ngeyokugcina."Ukuthi ngeyokugcina kungenxa yezinto abanye bethu abazenzayo eceleni kodwa sithathe isinqumo sokuthi sihlangane sinikeze abantu umculo. Kodwa ngeke wazi, uma kuhamba isikhathi izingqondo ziyashintsha. Uma abantu beyamukele ngendlela singashintsha. Nathi siqala besithi senza izingoma ezimbalwa kodwa ngemuva kokuhamba kwesikhathi sekumnandi sithe sizobona ukuthi sigcina kuphi," kuchaza uBozza.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngoFebhuwari iSkwatta Kamp ishonelwe yilungu layo uNish. UBozza uthe lokhu kuziphazamisile ezinye izinhlelo zabo kodwa uNish ukhona kuzona zonke izingoma zabo."Sifuna ukuqeda manje. Empeleni kusele cishe ingoma eyodwa bese ididiyelwa kahle okuyinto ezothatha amasonto amathathu. Silinde uRJ Benjamin kuphela okunguyena mculi obekukade  sifuna ukusebenza naye. Bekumele singene estudiyo naye ngoMgqibqlo kodwa ubengaphilile. I-albhamu izolunga cishe ngoJuni manje."Uthe izingoma zabo zinomyalezo ohlukahlukene ozothinta impilo yabantu."Thina asigijimisi ukwaziwa noma ukuhambisana nesitayela. Sikhuluma ngezinto eziningi nomyalezo obuyisa ithemba kubantu abasha njengoba bebhekene nezimo ezahlukene. Nathi sasinezethu sikhula futhi namanje sisenazo okungaba izinkinga zemali, ezomndeni, ezomshado ngoba abanye bethu bashadelwe futhi banezingane."
title: ISkwatta Kamp sigqobha izozo nge-albhamu

text: “Ngemuva kokuzalwa, ngake ngaquleka isikhashana. Umama waze wacelwa ukuba acishe imishini ngoba lalingekho ithemba. Kunalakho wayethandaza, ngaze ngavuka ekuqulekeni,” kusho le ntokazi edabuka KwaMsane, eMtubatuba kodwa esagobe amadlangala eRondebosch, eCape Town.UFanelesibonge (22) uthe uyethemba ukuthi nguye ozodla umhlanganiso kulo mncintiswano ngoba angaba wumholi oqotho.“Ubuholi buyisikhundla esikhohlisayo. Abanye babuthatha ngoba becabanga ukuthi isikhundla lapho bezokhothanyelwa khona. Ngokungenela lo mqhudelwano, ngikuqonda kahle ukuthi ubuholi bumayelana nokunakekela abantu, hhayi kube yibo abakunakekelayo.”Uthe yena uzogxila empilweni nasekuphepheni kwabesifazane nezingane. Uthe okungamenelisa kulo mqhudelwano wukubona impilo yabantu iguquka.Isizungu usichitha ngokubukela amafilimu nokwenza i-yoga. Echaza ngomndeni wakhe, uthe unina unguthisha osathatha umhlalaphansi futhi ongumuntu wokuqala emndenini wakhe owathola iziqu zasenyuvesi.“Nginodadewethu ababili okungoSilindile (30), Sibahle (26) nomfowethu uSiduduzo (24).”Uthe isifiso sakhe wukuthola iziqu ukuze aqhubekele phambili ayokwenza iziqu zeHonours neMasters e-University of Oxford.“Ngifuna ukuba i-data analyst eCSIR futhi ngisebenzise ulwazi engilutholile ukuvula isikole esizofundisa amantombazane ngekhompyutha emakhaya. Ezobuchwepheshe zineqhaza elikhulu empilweni yethu yemihla ngemihla kodwa akekho ofukula lezi zingane ngezobuchwepheshe.”Umyalezo wakhe kubantu besifazane abasebasha baseNingizimu Afrika uthe abadingi ukuba baze baqome ukuze bafeze amaphupho abo futhi bajabule.“Nawe ungakwazi ukuphendula amaphupho akho abe yiqiniso.”UFanelesibonge njengamanje wenza iziqu zeComputer Science and Applied Statistics e-University of Cape Town.Ungomunye wezintokazi ezinhlanu ezimele iKZN nezingu-35 ezidlulele emzuliswaneni owandulela owamanqamu walo mqhudelwano ozoba seSun Arena, ePitoli, ngo-Agasti 9.Amathemba aseKZN alele kuFanelesibonge, Mbali Dlamini (22) waseNewcastle, Xia Narain (23) waseChatsworth, Danielle Wallace (26) waseMhlanga noLisa Stoffela (26) wasePort Shepstone.
title: Owasinda ekufeni unethemba lokuba uMiss South Africa

text: IPHINI likaNgqongqoshe emMyangweni wezeMpilo, uDkt Joe Phaahla, lizwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuthi kunabantu ikakhulu abasemakhaya abangakwazi ukuthola imishanguzo yabo emitholampilo ngenxa yesimo sezwe.UPhaahla uthe bazokubhekisisa lokhu ukuze bangenele ngoba akukwazi ukuthi kungathi kuliwa nesinye isimo sezempilo bese abantu beba kwenye ingozi.Ukusho lokhu ekhuluma ngeSonto emuva kokudedelwa kocwaningo olwenziwe yiHuman Sciences Research Council ngomthelela weCorona nolwazi abantu abanalo ngayo.Umbiko uveza ukuthi * -13.2% wabantu abakwazi ukuthola imishanguzo ngenxa yesimo.“Kubalulekile ukuthi abantu baqhubeke bakwazi ukuthola imishanguzo yabo yezempilo. Sizoyibhekisisa eyombiko wocwaningo ngoba iqukethe izinto ezibalulekile.”Umbiko ubuye waveza ukuthi abantu abangaphezu kuka-20% abanamali yokuthenga ukudla.Ucwaningo lwenziwe kubantu abawu-19 330.“U-24% wabantu uzwakalise ukungabi namali yokuthenga ukudla. Cishe abangaphezu kukahhafu abahlala emijondolo abangenamali.”Abaphakathi kuka-45% kuya ku-63% bathe kuzoba nzima ukukhokhela izikweletu zabo nokuthola imali ukuze bakwazi ukondla imindeni yabo.
title: Ukhathazekile ngabantu abangatholi imithi ngenxa yesimo

text: USAGCINWE esitokisini owesifazane waseShowe oneminyaka engu-55 oboshelwe icala lokuzama ukubulala umyeni wakhe okusolwa ukuthi babange isithembu.Izolo uNkk Happy Mthembu uvele enkantolo yaseNkanyezi ebhekene necala lokuzama ukubulala umyeni wakhe uMnuz Antony Mthembu (59).UNkk Mthembu wabhunyela umyeni wakhe ngamanzi abilayo ngo-2017 kubangwa udaba lwengane ayithola ngaphandle komshado wabo. Icala lihlehliselwe uLwesihlanu ukuze acele ibheyili.Umsolwa uboshwe ngoLwesihlanu emva kokuba umyeni wakhe emvulele icala.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, usiqinisekisile lesi sehlo wathi uphenyo luyaqhubeka.“Amaphoyisa aseShowe aphenya icala lokuzama ukubulala. Ngokophenyo owesilisa oneminyaka engu-59 wabhunyelwa umsolwa ngamanzi abilayo ngoJuni 19, 2017. Icala lize lavulwa ngoLwesihlanu, kwaboshwa owesifazane oneminyaka engu-55. Uvele namhlanje enkantolo yaseNkanyezi wagcinwa esitokisini. Uzoze avele ngoNovemba 22,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Kuthiwa baxabana emuva kokuba uMthembu akhulelisa ngaphandle komshado umsolwa wambhunyela ngamanzi elele.UMthembu wahlala esibhedlela saseNgwelezane inyanga elashwa njengoba asha ebusweni, emzimbeni nasezinyaweni.Kuthiwa akazange alivule icala ngoba wabona esephutheni lokukhulelisa ngaphandle komshado wabo.Kuthiwa umsolwa ubelokhu emsabisa ethi uzophinda ambhunyele ngamanzi njengoba enza phambilini.Umthombo weSolezwe, osondelene nalolu daba ocele ukungavezwa, uthe umyeni useyasaba kulandela lesi sehlo.“NgoLwesihlanu basusene bebanga udaba lwengane esineminyaka emithathu. Umsolwa ube esethembisa indoda yakhe ukuthi uzophinde ayishise njengoba akwenza phambilini. Umgilwa ube esesaba ukuthi njengoba asinda ngokulambisa embhunyela ngamanzi abilayo uzomphinda futhi. Yingakho evule icala,” kusho umthombo.Uveze nokuthi okunye okubhebhethekisa isimo ukuthi umyeni ubehlongoza ukuthatha isithembu.“Okususe umsindo kakhulu ukuthi umsolwa akafuni nokuyizwa indaba yesithembu. Umtshele ukuthi wayevele ehlose ukuba namakhosikazi amabili. Lokhu kwenze umsolwa wasola ukuthi basathandana nonina wengane,” kusho umthombo.Ilungu lomndeni elicele ukungadalulwa liveze ukuthi bashada ngo-1996.Umsolwa wayevele enengane ayithola komunye wesilisa. Babe sebethola eyabo, umfana oneminyaka engu-23 manje.“Bese behlukene ngamakamelo ngoba indoda isaba ukuthi izobulawa. Isimo sibi phakathi kwabo. Umyeni unovalo lokuthi uma unkosikazi ededelwa esitokisini uzobuya azomqedela. La bantu ngeke besakwazi ukuhlalisana. Ekuqaleni wayemxolela unkosikazi wakhe ngoba ethi wenzela izingane manje isimo sibi,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Umyeni wowesifazane kuthiwa uthe akasamdingi eduze kwakhe ngoba uzizwa engaphephile.
title: Kuboshwe owabhunyela umyeni ngamanzi abilayo kubangwa isithembu

text: UDOTI ovimbanisa emapayipini ahamba amanzi emvula, kusolwa ukuthi yiwo oholele ekutheni kube nomonakalo omkhulu uma kunezikhukhula eThekwini.Ukuhlanzwa kwemihosha namapayipi kukholakala ukuthi kungehlisa umonakalo.Uphiko lokunakekelwa kwemigwaqo nemisele ehamba amanzi emvula, ukukhucululwa kwemihosha nemifula lusungule uhlelo olukholwa ukuthi lungaba yisisombululo enkingeni ebhekene nedolobha yemfucuza embondelene emfuleni eholela ekutheni kuguguleke ingqalasizinda uma kwenzeka kuba nemvulaenkulu.Uhlelo olwaziwa ngeSihlanzimvelo Project olwenziwa yimifelandawonye ewu-59 yaKwaMashu naseMlaza, kusanda kumenyezelwa ukuthi seluzosatshalaliswa nakwamanye amalokishi okubalwa kuwo iMount Moriah, Adams, Clare Estate, Ottawa, Waterloo, KwaMakhutha, Cato Manor, Folweni, Illovu neChesterville/Umkhumbane.Uhlelo lwasungulwa yiRoads Maintanance and Storm Water Department ngo-2008 ukuze ingqalasizinda ehamba amanzi emvula ihlale isesimeni esifanele.Imenenja yohlelo, uMnuz Mark Tomlinson, uthe uphiko olunakekela imigwaqo nemisele lwasungula uhlelo ngo-2008 lukhathazwa wukuthi imifula nemihosha igcwala udoti kwesinye isikhathi udoti wenze ukuthi amanzi ashiye umzila wawo anhlanhlathe okubeka ingqalasizinda engcupheni.“Uma sizolungisa umonakalo, besifika imisele igqitshwe wudoti okungamaplastiki nezihlahla eziwile kwesinye isikhathi sifike kwenile kungaselula ukuthi sifinyelele kuyo. Ngaphezu kwalokho besibuye sithole nokuthi sekuqhume namapayipi ahambisa inyubathi, udoti uchithekela kuwo umfula noma umhosha. Sabona ukuthi uma kungaba nohlelo akuzosizakala thina kuphela kodwa kuzobuye kube lula ukubona uma kunamapayipi ahambisa inyubathi aqhumile angekho eduze kwemizi yabantu asheshe abonakale.”Uthe baqala ukucubungula amasu ehlukene kubhekwa ukuthi ngobani abangase benze umsebenzi ngempumelelo ngoba kwakungekho mali eyabelwe ukuwenza.“Saphuma nesu lokuthi kusetshenziswe uZibambele, uhlelo olususa ukhula, udoti nenhlabathi emigwaqweni enqamula emiphakathini. Abesifazane okuyibona abaningi abenza lo msebenzi behluleka ukuhlanza imihosha nemifula ngoba abaningi sebekhulile. Kwamele sibuye sizocabanga kahle ukuthi ngobani abengenza umsebenzi uma abesifazane behluleka. Kwathathwa isinqumo sokuthi kube nezinkontileka ezizosebenza ezindaweni ezibaliwe ngoba bekusewuhlelo lokuzwa amanzi ngobhoko,” kusho uTomlinson.Nalo lolo hlelo uthe aluzange luhambe kahle kwagcina kuqhanyukwe nesu lokuthi kusetshenziswe imifelandawonye ekhona emiphakathini.“Kwaba nomehluko uma sekusebenza imifelandawonye, kwavela nesayidi lokuthi kuzovuleka amathuba omsebenzi kubantu bendawo. Ngo-2012 uhlelo lwase lukhombisa ukukhula, saluqamba ngokuthi Sihlanzimvelo,”UTimlinson uthe kusanda kuthathwa isinqumo sokuthi uhlelo lunwetshwe kufakwe namanye amalokishi. Uma sekufakwe lawo malokishi kuzovuleka amathuba omsebenzi kwimifelandawonye ewu-40 enabantu abalinganiselwa ku-800.Njengamanje uhlelo lucutshungulwa yinhlangano exhasa ngemali omasipala abanezinhlelo zokunciphisa umonakalo ongadalwa ukushintshashintsha kwesino sezulu, iC40.“Sikholwa ukuthi inhlangano izobona ukuthi uhlelo lwethu lungasiza kakhulu ekuthuthukiseni umnotho, luvikele ingqalasizinda, luthuthukise nezokuvakasha. Ngaleyo ndlela umasipala uzozuza imali. Ezinyangeni ezibalelwa kweziyisithupha izithunywa zeC40 ezicubungula lolu hlelo zizokhipha isinqumo.Okwamanje abasebenza ohlelweni basebenza ngezandla, kabanazo izinsizakusebenza ngakho kweminye imifula nemihosha eyingozi abakwazi ukufinyilela.UNksz Wamkelwe Mbatha, iCivil Engineering Technologist, kulo lolu phiko, uthe umhosha nemifula idinga amasu nezinsiza ezehlukene. “Phambilini besibuye sisizwe ngeminye iminyango esizakalayo ngalolu hlelo kodwa sidinga ukuthi kube nendlela emile okumele siyilandele ukuze kube nomehluko obonakalayo,” kusho uNksz Mbatha.
title: Imizamo yokuvikela umonakalo wezikhukhula

text: ULOKHU eqhubeke njalo nokuba umshini wamagoli eChina umgadli weBafana Bafana, uDino Ndlovu njengoba eshaye igoli lakhe lika-19 lesizini ngesikhathi esiza iqembu lakhe iZhejiang Greentown edlala esigabeni esingezansi.Leli goli elika-19 nje, unemidlalo ewu-23 lo mdlali osethubeni lokusiza iGreentown ikhuphukele lapho kunoju khona.Nakuba ekhishwe ngesiwombe sesibili, uMay Mahlangu, ubewuqalile owezakhe iLudogorets yaseBulgaria inqoba ngo 4-1 kwiSptemvri Sofia. Kube iSofia elishaye kuqala igoli kodwa kuthe kungakhishwa uMahlangu leli qembu elidlala kwi-Europa League lashaya amagoli amane. Uqhwakele uMahlangu nezakhe eBulgaria.Omunye umdlali weBafana oshisayo eqenjini lakhe laphesheya kwezilwandle uKamohelo Mokotjo weBrentford edlala kwi-English Championship. UMokotjo ukhishwe singakapheli isiwombe sokuqala bekhala ngaphansi kwiNorwich ngo 1-0 obekusho ukuthi ezalo mdlali sezidlale amahlandla ayisishiyagalolunye zingayazi iwini.EFrance, bekuhlangene uLebohang Mothiba odlalela iStrasbourg noLebohang Phiri weGuingamp. UMothiba uwudlale wonke lo mdlalo yize engalishayanga igoli kodwa uPhiri ubebukela umkhaya wakhe kwazise yena ubesebhentshini kwaze kwaba uyaphela umdlalo. Azihleli kahle kwi-log ezikaPhiri kwazise yizona ezibambe ibhuleki esigabeni esikhulu saseFrance.Uyaqhubeka nokudlala yonke imidlalo uThulani Serero weVitesse njengoba ephinde wenza ngempelasonto leli qembu linqoba ngo 2-1 kwiFortuna Sittard. Lokhu kubeka ezikaCream endaweni yesihlanu kwi-log yaseNetherlands ngemuva kwemidlalo ewu-10.UPercy Tau uphinde wagqama ngesikhahti esiza i-Union Saint Gilloise, okuthe noma ilandela ngemuva ngo 2-0 sekusele imizuzu ewu-11 ukuthi umdlalo uphele kodwa wangazithela ngabandayo. UTau wakhe igoli elilodwa wase eshaya elokuwina sekusesikhathini somusa kanondweba. Lokhu bese kungokwesibili uTau (eshaya igoli) ekwenza emidlalweni eyisikhombisa kuleli qembu laseBelgium.Eligini enkulu yaseTurkey, uSiphiwe Tshabalala ufakwe ngomzuzu ka-74 lapho ezakhe i-Erzurumspor zicazelane khona amaphuzu neKasimpasa. Okubi lapha ukuthi uphinde wakhishwa umdlalo ungakapheli ngoba sekukhona othole ikhadi elibomvu.
title: Baphinde bagadla abakuleli kweyamazwe

text: AMAPHOYISA adonse abazali ngendlebe athi mabaqaphe izingane ngeso lokhozi ikakhulukazi emabhishi emuva kokuminza komfana (13) ebhishi iSheffield elingaKwaDukuza.UCaptain Nqobile Gwala wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uthe umfana ubebhukuda endaweni okungabhukudwa kuyo ngesikhathi emuka.“Ithimba labatshuzi lisamthungatha umfana ominze ngoMgqibelo eSheffield Beach. Siyacela abazali baqaphe izingane ngeso lokhozi,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.NgoMgqibelo abatshuzi baphoqelekile ukuthi bamise ukufuna umfana ngenxa yokuthi amagagasi abesenolaka.Khonamanjalo abantu bayaqhubeka nokuthutheleka emabhishi aseThekwini njengoba kungamaholidi.IMeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, igqugquzele abazali ukuthi bafake izingane amabhande abhalwa inombolo yomzali atholakala kubasebenzi bakwamasipala ababizwa ngama-beach buddies ukuze uma ingane idukile isheshe ithole usizo.Uthe uma abantu sebesebhishi mabenze isiqiniseko sokuthi babhukuda ezindaweni ezifanele ezibonakala ngokuthi kube namafulegi abasiza abagwilizayo.UNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha neMvelo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala uthe balindele izivakashi ezingu-600 000 ezivela kwezinye izifundazwe ezizothutheleka KwaZulu-Natal.Uthe izivakashi zingenisa * -R1.253 billion emnothweni waKwaZulu-Natal.“Silindele ukwamukela izivakashi ezingu-138 000 zakwamanye amazwe ezichitha * -R773 ngosuku kanti zingenisa * -R1.06 billion emnothweni waKwaZulu-Natal,” kusho uZikalala.Isikhulu esisabambile kwezokuvakasha KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Phindile Makwakwa, ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi bamukele izivakashi ngezandla ezifudumele wadonsa izivakashi ngendlebe wathi mazibhukhe ezindaweni ezisemthethweni.“Izivakashi zingangena kwi-website yethu * -www.zulu.org ukuthola izindawo zokuhlala ezisemthethweni. Zingeza nasemahhovisi ethu ukuze zisizakale uma zinemibuzo ethile,” kusho uNksz Makwakwa.
title: Isicelo samaphoyisa kuminza umfana ebhishi

text: IGUDLUZWE esihlalweni sobukhosi ingekho inkosi yesifazane yakwaHlabisa, ebisolwa ngokugoloza nesihlalo, ngemuva kweminyaka engu-13 ibambile.UNksz Nonhlanhla Jabulile Hlatshwayo uvukelwe wumndeni wakhe namalungu omphakathi ngoba esolwa ngokuphatha ngesandla sensimbi nokungabahloniphi.NgoLwesine umndeni uhlangane enkantolo yesizwe, wathatha isinqumo sokumkhipha, kwabekwa indodana yomfowabo uMnuz Nhlanganiso Hlabisa (21) ofunda eMancosa, eThekwini.UNksz Hlabisa kuthiwa ubesexoshe ezinye izinduna nondunankulu besizwe, wafaka oyedwa wesifazane nabesilisa ukuba bavale izikhala zabaxoshiwe.Ngesikhathi uNksz Hlabisa ethintwa, akatholakalanga ocingweni. Kunalokho lubanjwe oyiphini likaNdunankulu wesizwe, uMnuz Bheki Mthembu.“Inkosi ishiye ucingo emotweni. Isangene kudokotela, ilethe ugogo. Mayelana nomhlangano owushoyo ibingawazi,” kusho uMthembu.Omunye woyise bakaNksz Hlabisa uthe bathulwe umthwalo ngokusuka kwendodakazi yabo esikhundleni.“Uyabona mntanami, izindaba zomndeni lezi ziyinkinga. Ngicela ungalivezi igama lami. Undodakazi ubengaphethe neze kahle.Kuningi okonakele ngaphansi kobuholi bakhe. Sijabule njengoba sekufakwe umzukulu esihlalweni,” kusho omunye woyise bakaNksz Hlabisa.Okunye okuvelile wukuthi belungafakwa kuNksz Hlabisa.Kuthiwa kukhona lapho adla khona umhlaba kamasipala wathi abantu abakhe kuwo ngenkani.Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi umasipala walwa walunqoba udaba enkantolo.Indlela abephethe ngayo, kukhona abanye emndenini abesebemfanisa noMkabayi kaJama, owayenamandla ukwedlula abesilisa ebukhosini bakwaZulu.UNdunankulu wesizwe sakwaHlabisa, uMnuz Zephania Mzinyane, uthe konke kuhambe kahle nenkosi yabekwa ngokuthula.“Lo mhlangano bekungowomndeni. Ngakho abekho abantu bangaphandle abebevunyelwe ukuba yingxenye yawo. Nami ngibe sengibikelwa ukuthi inkosi yesizwe osekunguNhlanganiso, ibekwe ngenkulu impumelelo,” kusho uMzinyane.Ngokomlando, uNhlanganiso uzalwa endlini kaMnyombo kaMfungelwa, kaPhumempini owazala uLwazi okunguyise kaNhlanganiso, ebazala nodadewabo uMayenziwe.Inkosi uNhlanganiso bekufanele ibekwe ngonyaka odlule kodwa kwangenzeka kanti kwabuye kwakhalwa ngokuthi adedelwe aphothule * -matric.Kumanje uzinze kwakhe eThekwini njengoba eseMancosa, kanti kukhona abangayizwa kahle emndenini.Babona sengathi ubalekisiwe ukuze angalitholi ithuba lokuhola isizwe.Umphakathi nawo unethemba lokuthi izinto zizobuyela esimweni.USihlalo weNdlu Yobuholi Bomdabu, KwaZulu-Natal, inkosi Phathisizwe Chiliza, uthe ngenxa yokuthi useLimpopo, ubengakaluzwa lolu daba.
title: Inkosi bayiphuce isihlalo ingekho babeka indodana

text: KUNTWELA ezansi embonini yamatekisi njengoba uhulumeni ehlongoza ukuyixhasa ngemali, nokuthi ilawulwe ngemithetho kusuka ngo-Ephreli ngonyaka ozayo.Kuzoqala ngokuthi kube nombuthano kahulumeni, imboni yamatekisi nezinhlaka zomphakathi ohlelelwe ukuthi ube ngasekupheleni kwale nyanga.Le mboni yenza uR40 billion ngonyaka kanti uhulumeni uthe ukushintshwa kwayo ibe yibhizinisi elikhulu futhi ilawulwe ngemithetho, kuncike ezingxoxweni ezizobanjwa.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha uMnuz Fikile Mbalula izolo ngesikhathi ethula ngokomthetho inyanga yezokuthutha u -Okthoba, eHammarsdale.UMbalula, iphini lakhe uNkk Dikeledi Magadzi noNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Bheki Ntuli bazivule ngokomthetho izimpambano zomgwaqo kuN3 nezichezukela eHammardale, okudle imali elinganiselwa kuR400 million. Kuthathe iminyaka emine ukwakha le migwaqo nebhuloho, kwadala amathuba emisebenzi angu-250.“Imali eyenziwa yimboni yamatekisi kumele iphinde isetshenziselwe ukuyithuthukisa le mboni. Sizoyeseka imboni, siyixhase ngemali futhi umshayeli nomsizi wakhe kumele bahlomule esikhwameni sezimpesheni. Sizocija nabashayeli ngendlela yokuziphatha futhi imboni siyenze ibe yibhizinisi elihlonishwayo,” kusho uMbalula.Umphathi wehhovisi leSantaco KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sfiso Shangase uthe bayakwamukela okuphakanyiswa wuMbalula uma ethi kusazoxoxiswana. Ubeke kanje:“Siyavumelana nokuhlangatshezwa komgibeli ngemali evela kuhulumeni. Lokhu kungenza kwehle nemali yokugibela amatekisi ngoba sizobe sesixhaswa njengasemabhasini. Siyakwemukela ukuxoxisana kungabi sengathi bazosifunza.”Uhulumeni usohlelweni lweminyaka engu-10 lokwandisa olayini bemigwaqo kuN3 ibe mihlanu uhlangothi ngalunye kusuka eThekwini kuya eMgungundlovu. Lokhu kuzodla uR18.4 billion. Kuzoba esifanayo kuthuthukiswa uN2 eThekwini ngoR10 billion.UMbalula ukhwele wadilika enhlanganweni yosomabhizinisi iDelangokubona athe izame yehluleka ukumisa ukwakhiwa komgwaqo waseHammarsdale. Uthe kunoR18 billion obekelwe iPrasa wokuphucula ingqalasizinda yezitimela neziteshi, kuqashwe onogada abasha, kunqandwe ubugebengu nokwebiwa kwezintambo zikagesi.Uthe umthetho uzoqina kwabashayela bephuzile ngoba izingozi zidla uhulumeni imali enkulu uma sekufakwa izicelo zenkokhelo kwiRoad Accident Fund.
title: Bahlela ukushintsha imboni yamatekisi

text: Lo mculi ubekhuluma kwiDepression & Anxiety Dialogue ebisePlayhouse, eThekwini, ngoLwesihlanu.Uthe baningi abantu abathwasa kungafanele ngenxa yokuthi izangoma ziyehluleka ukuhlukanisa phakathi komuntu othwasayo nohlaselwe wukhwantalala.“Ukhwantalala luyisifo okunzima ukuthi usiqonde uma sikuhlasele. Abantu benza izinto ezingefani uma lubahlasele bese izangoma zikutshela ukuthi ungenwa yidlozi.“Emacikweni lwandile ngenxa yezinkinga ezikulo mkhakha. Iningi labaculi liphila impilo engamanga baveze izinto ezinhle ngempilo yabo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukugqiba ihlazo labo,” kusho uMbuso.Uthe naye ubenayo inkinga yokhwantalala oludalwe ukukhula engenabazali nokuthwala kanzima efuna ukufeza iphupho lakhe lokuba ngumculi ovelele.“Ubaba angimazi. Ngikhuliswe umama kuphela owayeyindodakazi yeNkosi yakwaKhoza. Ngebhadi nomama ushone ngineminyaka engu-12. Ukhwantalala lungiqale ngaleso sikhathi.“Nasesikoleni ngangingasenzi kahle othisha bakuqaphela lokho ngathola usizo."Luphinde lwangihlasela sengikhulile ngesikhathi ngizama ukufeza iphupho lami lokuba wumculi. Ngangizifela ngoVuyo Mokoena ngifisa ukufana naye. Ngaze ngaya eGoli ngenhloso yokuthi ngihlangane naye.”Uthe nakhona eGoli izinto azihambanga ngendlela njengoba afika khona engenayo ngisho indawo yokulala.Uveze ukuthi wake walala esitaladini kodwa wagcina ekwazile ukuhlangana noVuyo Mokoena.Uqhube wathi wakwazi ukucula elekelela uVuyo kodwa waphatheka kabuhlungu esethole ithuba lokuthi ahambe nalo mculi eyocula kungenzeki ngenxa yokuthi wayengenazo izimpahla zokugqoka futhi engagezile ngenxa yokuthi wayehlala emgwaqeni.Nangesikhathi esevelele emculweni uthe ubunzima buke bamfica wagcina esedayisa uswidi emgwaqeni.“Okubuhlungu ngaleso sikhathi ukuthi abantu bebengazitsheli ukuthi yimina lo odayisa uswidi emgwaqeni kodwa bezitshela ukuthi ngiyindodana kaMbuso Khoza.Uthe uma uhlaselwe yilesi sifo kumele ukhulume nabantu ukuze uthole usizo uthole nomeluleki wengqondo.U-DJ Sox uthe naye usizwe ukuthatha isinqumo sokuthi athole usizo ngesikhathi ecwile ezidakamizweni.*UMbuso Khoza uzobe enandisa emcimbini we-Africa Month eBat Centre ngoMeyi 17-18 ngo-7 ebusuku eBat Centre eThekwini. Uzobe ephelezelwa yibhendi enamalungu angu-8. Amathikithi abiza uR150.
title: Lwandile ukhwantalala emacikweni - umculi

text: ABANEME ababukeli bomdlalo wethelevishini iDurban Gen, ngokugcwala kwabalingisi abadume kuZalo. Intuthukuthelo yabo bayikhombise enkundleni yezokuxhumana iFacebook, ngesikhathi kuvalelisa omunye umlingisi kulo mdlalo uLerato Nxumalo obenguDkt Ndabezinhle Nxumalo.ULerato uselingisa indawo kaMpumi Cele, emdlalweni omusha osakazwa kwi-1 Magic osihloko sithi Lingashoni. Kwenzeka lokhu nje, ababukeli bebesazikhotha amanxeba ngokuhamba kukaFanele Zulu, obelingisa indawo kaDkt Mnqobi Mchunu, kepha osedlala indawo kaNJ Cele  kwiLingashoni. Okuphinde kwafaka usawoti esilondeni ukugcwala kakhulu kwabalingisi abaziwa bedlala kuZalo."Nasethulela abalingisi abasha, sanithanda kodwa manje seniyabasusa. Senisilethela abalingisi boZalo. Nibaletha ngamunye, ngamunye. Naze nashesha ukusenza imid...i. Anikaqedi nezinyanga eziyisithupha," kubhala uLoyolo Huna. "Ngempela bafunani labalingisi ababhorayo boZalo. Kufanele ngabe bakholelwa kubalingisi babo kunokuthembela kwabo Zalo olufayo," kusho uPoppy Mbuso Nkosi.NoZinhle Zuma ubuze ukuthi kungani bezogcwalisa abalingisi aphuma kuZalo emdlalweni iDurban Gen."Umdlalo omusha futhi omnandi kabi ngenxa yabalingisi abasha. Nizolahlekelwa ngababukeli," kusho uZinhle. NoSiindi Gumede unxuse iStained Glass TV Productions ukuba ihlukane nomkhuba wokulokhu ugcaluzisa amalingisi ababodwa emidlalweni yayo. Ubesho kanje ngenxa yokuthi Uzalo, iDurban Gen neLingashoni badidiyelwa  yile nkampani."Siletheleni ubuso obusha. Baningi abantu abaswele imisebenzi lapha ngaphandle. Ingcono neMbewu ngoba yasilethela abantu esasingabazi, ikakhulu abasebenza eMsamo," kusho uSindi. URefuwe Papiyana uthe isenzo seDurban Gen sizoyilahlekisela ngababukeli. "Nimatasatasa nixoshana nobuso obusha bese nengeza ngaboZalo. Ngokushesha iDurban Gen izophelelwa wumsoco," kuphetha uRefuwe.Phakathi kwabalingisi abasuka kuZalo, kubalwa uThibedi Nyalleng nguZekhethelo, uNoxolo Mathula onguLilly, uNompilo Maphumulo onguNosipho, uThembinkosi Thwala onguMondli, uThulane Shange onguDkt Mandla Ngcobo noL'vovo Derrango obenguMandla. Abanye asebeke balingisa kuZalo kodwa asebekwiDurban Gen ngoZimiphi Biyela onguSister Nobuhle, Sthandwa Nzuza onguZandile Mkhize, Fanele Ntuli osenguDkt Thandekile Zondo, Zulu Boy osenguMcGyver, u-Abdul Khoza onguSmiso, Bheki Sibiya onguDkt Ndlovu noSfiso Simamane onguNxele. Imizamo yokuthola uNomfundo Zondi okhulumela abakhiqiza le midlalo ukuba aphawule, ayiphumelelanga kwaze kwashicilelwa. Kuhluleke esethunyelelwa imibuzo nge-sms, WhatsApp ne-email.
title: Kabaneme ngezinsalela zoZalo kwiDurban Gen

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEINHLANGANO eyengamele isibhakela sama-amesha iKZN Olympic Style Boxing Organisation isizijube ukusiza ngezidingo zesikole amabhokisa adonsa kanzima ngenxa yokudlanga kweCoronavirus eshiye kukhalwa emindenini, kuphela amatoho.USandile Sibisi ongumengameli weKZN Olympic Style Boxing Organisation, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi bazothengela amabhokisa abo umfaniswano wesikole nezinye izidingo.Uthe lokhu bazokwenza kuzona zonke izifunda. Esifundeni ngasinye bazoxhasa amabhokisa amane.Uqhube wathi bathole ukuthi amabhokisa amaningi abo adonsa kanzima emakhaya. Ukuhlasela kweCoronavirus kudale ukuthi abazali bathwale kanzima."Besingeke sihlale phansi sibuke amabhokisa ethu edonsa kanzima. Kasixhaswanga muntu kodwa sicwiye esikhwameni sethu. Siyazi ukuthi lokhu esikwenzayo kakwanele, ukube kuya ngathi besizowaxhasa wonke amabhokisa ethu. Akusenani, sesithokoziswa ukuthi lokhu okuncane esikukhiphayo kuzowenza umehluko emindenini yala mabhokisa," kubeka uSibisi.Lesi sikhulu sithe bagqugquzelwe uMnyango wezemiDlalo nokuNgcebeleka KwaZulu-Natal. Sidalule ukuthi banamabhokisa amane afunda ngomfundaze walo mnyango oholwa uHlengiwe Mavimbela.Laba bashayisibhakela, umakadebona uNomusa Ngema ofunda eTrifocus Fitness Academy, Nkosinathi Sibiya (University of Zululand), Sakhile Hlatshwayo (Talane High School) noPhiwokuhle Mnguni (Dundee High School) ."Sibonga siyanconcoza eMnyangweni wezemiDlalo nokuNgcebeleka ngokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi amabhokisa kawagcini nje ngokudlala kodwa nasesikoleni kawasaleli emuva. Kasithembe ukuthi lokhu uzoqhubeka nokukwenza. Sibonga nangokuhlale usixhasa uma senza imiqhudelwano yezimpi.”USibisi uveze nokuthi babambe umoya ngokugadla kweCoronavirus. Uthe bahlela ukwenza iKwaZulu-Natal Elite Boxing Championship, ngoMashi 27, esifundeni UThukela.Kulo mqhudelwano kuzokhethwa iqembu elizomela lesi sifundazwe kokazwelonke ozoba esontweni lokuqala kuJulayi.Nakuba kungacaci ukuthi azoba khona yini ama-Olympic Games kulo nyaka, uSibisi uthe ngezimpi zasoThukela bazobe belungiselela wona.Uma konke kuhamba ngononina iqembu lakuleli, ngoMeyi lizolibhekisa eFrance, emqhudelwaneni wokuhlungela ama-Olympic.NgoDisemba inhlangano eyengamele isibhakela sama-amesha kuleli, iSanabo, beyisingethe umqhudelwano kazwelonke, eDundee, kuhlungwa kuwo abazoyimela eFrance. Kukhethwe amabhokisa amahlanu esifazane nayisibalo esifanayo abesilisaUSiyabulela Mkhwalo obambe izintambo zobumengameli kwiSanabo, usanda kutshela leli phephandaba ukuthi bazoqhubeka nezinhlelo zama-Olympic ngoba kabafuni ukutatazela uma kwenzeka sehla lesi sifo.Uveze ukuthi maduze bazoqeda konke neSniper Boxing Academy ephethwe yizelamani zakwaSmith, okungoSean, Peter noGeorge.  Bafuna ukuthi amabhokisa ababo azicije kule jimi uma eselungiselela ukuya eFrance ngenxa yengqalasizinda yayo esezingeni eliphezulu.
title: Bazijube basiza amabhokisa akhahlanyezwe yiCorona

text: AZOBUYELA eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza ngoDisemba 24 amantombazane amabili, eyodwa eneminyaka ewu-14 enye eneminyaka ewu-21 abhekene necala lezinsolo zokubulala unina ekhaya kwa-AA eMlaza.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi amantombazane abingelele imantshi ngoDisemba 17, icala lawo lihlehliselwe uDisemba 24 ukuze inkantolo yenze ucwaningo ngokuthile okuthinta icala.NgoMsombuluko umndeni wamantombazane wahluleka ukukhuluma neSolezwe, wacela ukuthi libuye ngelinye ilanga ngoba usaphatheke kabi ngokubulawa kowesifazane (44) ngamadodakazi akhe.Okhulume neSolezwe, othe uyindodakazi kamufi endala wakuqinisekisa ukuthi wodadewabo abagwaze unina ngommese ongumtafula, waze washona. Kodwa wacela izintatheli ukuthi zibuye ngelinye ilanga, mhlawumbe nesilonda sokushonelwa wumzali sizobe singasaqaqambi kakhulu.Abanye abangathandanga ukudalulwa, baveze ukuthi lezi zelamani bezithanda ukulwa nonina futhi basola ukuthi ubangiswa wukuthi uqomile ngoba amadodakazi akhe abengamthandi umuntu wesilisa abehlekisana naye.“Sisola ukuthi bebebanga ukuthi usezwana nomunye umuntu emuva kokushona kukayise walezi zingane.Zikhala ngokuthi ubezihlinela, angakhulumi nazo uma kukhona indoda abezwana nayo. Kasazi nokuthi siyiqale ngakuphi le ndaba ngoba ibuhlungu. Ubulawe yizingane azizalayo, igazi lakhe, abantu abancelise ibele,” kusho omunye.
title: Lihlehlile icala lamantombazane 'ababulale' unina ekhaya

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUU MSAKAZI osanda kushiya kwi-East Coast Radio (ECR), uMakhosi Khoza, usethubeni lokujoyina isiteshi sezingxoxo saseGoli, iTalk Radio 702, aseqalile ukuzwakala kuyona.UMakhosi ubeshayela uhlelo okungena ngo-9 kuya ku-12 emini phakathi nesonto kwi-ECR lapho egcine khona ukuzwakala ekupheleni kukaJulayi.Njengamanje lolu hlelo selwenziwa nguZaba Simbine.Kuthiwa inkontileka yakhe ayivuselelwanga ngesikhathi lo msakazo wenza izinguquko.UMakhosi, oneminyaka engaphezulu kwengu-20 esakaza, ngeSonto uzwakale kwiTalk Radio 702 etholakala nakwiDStv Audio Bouquet.Ubenza uhlelo olungena ngo-10 kuya ku-1 emini i
Solid Gold Sunday ngokwe-website ye-702 olwenziwa ngu-Allan Barnard.UMakhosi uthe akaqashiwe kulo msakazo kodwa ubeceliwe ukuthi azobamba.“Ngikhuluma nawe nje ngisendleleni ebheke eThekwini (esho izolo ekuseni). Ngabe ngiqamba amanga uma ngithi ngiqashiwe. Kukhona ohlabe ikhefu ngase ngicelwa ukuthi ngibambe,” kusho uMakhosi.Okushiwo nguMakhosi kufakazelwe ngozibize ngoLara wakwi-702 othe uMakhosi ungomunye wabasakazi abangaqashiwe ngokuphelele kodwa ababamba uma kukhona umsakazi ongekho.Lokhu kusho ukuthi uma kukhona umsakazi oshiyayo engaba sethubeni lokuqashwa ngokuphelele.UMakhosi uthe njengamanje usacabanga ngekusasa lakhe ukuthi ufuna ukwenzani.“Akusiyona into engiyijahile. Ngithatha isikhathi sami ngiyacabanga ukuthi ngibuyele ekusakazeni noma cha. Kuzoya kodwa ngokuthi yimaphi amathuba avelayo,” kusho uMakhosi oke waphatha izinhlelo kwiGagasi FM.Ukhuluma kanjena nje, kuTwitter usanda kubhala ukuthi kukhona okusha okuzayo, kwale noma abalandeli bakhe bemxina ngemibuzo akafunanga ukudalula.Uveze nokuthi incwadi ekhuluma ngempilo yakhe emsakazweni isiya ngasemaphethelweni.“Ngisahlela izindaba zokuthi ngizoyikhangisa kanjani ngoba ngifuna itholakale ezindaweni eziningi,” kusho uMakhosi.
title: UMakhosi Khoza usebamba itoho kuRadio 702

text: SELUPHENDUKE inkombankombane udaba lokushona kweziguli ezingu-143 ezasuswa eLife Esidimeni Healthcare zathuthelwa ezikhungweni ezingenzi nzuzo ezingekho emthethweni.NgoMsombuluko owayenguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo eGauteng, uNkk Qedani Mahlangu ubephekwa ngemibuzo iJaji Dikgang Moseneke, eliphethe isigcawu somxazululi esiphenya ngalolu daba.UMahlangu bekungokokuqala evela phambi kwalesi sigcawu ngemuva kokusula kwakhe ekubeni ungqongqoshe walo mnyango nyakenye.Ngesikhathi esabeka inkulumo yakhe yokuvula, uqale ngokuxolisa emndenini elahlekelwa abathandiweyo bayo ngale nhlekelele.“Ngokukhulu ukuzithoba nokuxolisa, ngifisa ukudlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini yabalahlekelwe ngale nhlekelele edlule nemiphefumulo yababalelwa ngaphezulu kuka-140.Ngiyazi ngeke kusababuyisa kodwa ngiyaxolisa kakhulu,” kusho uNkk Mahlangu.Ngesikhathi ebuzwa ngesinqumo sokususwa kwabantu eLife Esidimeni, uthe asithathwangwa umuntu oyedwa kodwa kwavunyelwana ngaso ngokuhlanganyela nabanye.Uthe kubantu abathatha leso sinqumo kubalwa owayeyiNhloko yoMnyango uDkt Tiego Selebano, nobeyiNhloko yegatsha elibhekela abagula ngokomqondo uDkt Makgabo Manamela.Udalulale ukuthi uNdunankulu waseGauteng, uMnuz David Makhura wayazi kahle ngokuvalwa kweLife Esidimeni. UMakhura phambilini wakuchitha ukuthi waziswa ngohlelo lokuthuthwa kweziguli.UMahlangu usole uSelebano noDkt Manamela ngokudukisa yena noMakhura ngalolu hlelo.“Ngangingenaso isizathu sokungabaza izinga lomsebenzi wabo,” kusho uMahlangu.Ngesikhathi uDkt Manamela noSelebano bephoswa ngemibuzo kulesi sigcawu baveza ukuthi bayalelwa uMahlangu ukuthi baqale uhlelo lokuthutha iziguli. Baveza ukuthi babemsaba okwaholela ekutheni balandele yonke imiyalelo yakhe.UMahlangu ukuchithile lokhu, wathi umthetho kuleli uyabavikela abantu abathathiswa izinqumo abangahambisani nazo yilabo abangaphezulu kwabo.“Angisoze ngaziba into engabeka impilo yeziguli engcupheni. Ngangingazi ukuthi lolu hlelo luzoba nemiphumela enje,” kusho yena.Uthe uSelebano wayengamazisi ngezinkinga zohlelo futhi waze waqala ukuzinaka ngoJulayi 2016 ngesikhathi sekuvela imibiko emaphephandabeni. Uthe ngesikhathi ebona ukuthi kunezinkinga ngohlelo, wavakashela izikhungo ukuzibonela yena okuqhubekayo kuzo.“Kwangiphatha kabi ukuthi izikhungo esasizethemba ngokunakekela iziguli zazingakhokhelwa ngesikhathi. Yingakho ngacela inhloko yomnyango nenhloko yezezimali emnyangweni ukuthi bangenelele,” kusho uNkk Mahlangu.Isigcawu siguqile izolo sizoze siqhubeke kusasa kusafakaza yena uNkk Mahlangu.
title: Uyiphebezile imikhonto ngeSidimeni uMahlangu

text: ISOUTH African Communist Party (SACP) yamukele isinqumo se-ANC sokumisa ezikhundleni amalungu ayo anamacala enkohlakalo nabucayi ezinkantolo.NgoMsombuluko, i-ANC iphothule umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu odonse izinsuku ezintathu. Kuvele ukuthi kukhona abaholi abazishenxele ngokwabo kwathi labo abahlulekile babhalelwa izincwadi ezibamisayo. I-SACP ithi nayo izoqhubeka nohlelo lwayo lokuqondisa ubugwegwe amalungu ayo anamacala enkohlakalo nabucayi ezinkantolo.Esitatimendeni esithumele ngemva komhlangano we-ANC, i-SACP income isinqumo sikaKhongolose sokumisa abagoloze ukushenxa ezikhundleni yathi yisinyathelo esihle ekulweni nenkohlakalo.Ithe kuzoba yisifundo nakwabanye abebesacabanga ukuzimbandakanya nezenzo zenkohlakalo.Omunye wabaholi ababhalelwe incwadi emumisa enhlanganweni uNobhala jikelele uMnuz Ace Magashule. Lo mholi akahlangabezananga nomnqamulajuqu wezinsuku ezingu-30 ayebekelwe wona nabanye abanamacala ezinkantoloLeli qembu liveze nokuthi liyayeseka iKhomishana kaZondo, ephenya ngezinsolo zokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana.Ithe iyaweseka uKhongolose empini yawo elwa nenkohlakalo yanxenxa amalungu amadlela ndawonye nomphakathi wonkana ukuba benze okufanayo.I-SACP iyalweseka uhlelo lokuhlelwa kabusha kwenhlangano yomakadebona bezempi uMkhonto Wesizwe nokuqinisekiswa kobulungu bamalungu ayo.Le nhlangano ithi iyasamukela isinqumo se-ANC sokulwa nodlame lwangokobulili yathi izosebenzisana nayo ekulweni lempi.AmaKhomanisi anombono ofanayo nowe-ANC efuna kuqiniswe ubudlelwano namaxhama ezokuxhumana nezwe iCuba.
title: I-SACP yeseka uKhongolose empini yokulwa nenkohlakalo

text: Lo mdlalo obubukwa ingcosana uqale ukubonakala kumakhasimende alolu hlelo kusuka ngoLwesine olwedlule.IThe River akulona hlelo lwakuleli kuphela oluzojatshulelwa ababukeli kodwa kukhona nohlelo olukhuluma nosaziwayo, iV-Entertainment nohlelo olusha i-One Night with My Ex.UNkateko Mabaso ophethe kwaM-Net uthe, ngonyaka odlule ngesikhathi bememezela izindaba zokuthi i-1Magic izovala isikhala seVUZU AMP ukuze kube isiteshi esinezinhlelo eziningi zakuleli.“Konke lokhu sasikwenza ngenxa yokucabangela kuqala abantu bakuleli, hhayi ngoba sizozishiya ngaphandle izinhlelo zaphesheya kwezilwandle kodwa nazo siyaqhubeka nokuzidlala. Kungakho ke sithathe isinqumo sokuqhubeka sijabulisa abantu bakuleli ngokubalethela lesi siteshi abakuCompact Plus.“Siyathemba bazobujabulela ubumnandi obutholakala kusona bezihlalele emakhaya abo,” kuchaza yena.Uthe uhlelo i-One Night with My Ex, bayathemba ukuthi luzojatshulelwa abaningi njengoba luqukethe okuningi okuzodonsa amehlo abantu futhi lubashiye bebambe ongezansi.“Ziningi izinhlelo zakuleli esisazozikhombisa kusona, semukela bonke ababukeli abasha abazoqala ukubona izinhlelo ku-1Magic, siyathemba ukuthi kuzoba uhambo olunemiphumela emihle,” kuchaza yena.
title: Igcagcele esokeni kubantu ngeThe River

text: ULANDWE phesheya umqeqeshi ozothwala ijoka elisindayo, lokufaka iBafana Bafana kwi-2022 Fifa World Cup.Lokhu bese kunesikhathi kuhlongozwa ngegama lika-Carlos Queiroz, odabuka ePortugal, kodwa kuqale ukuqina sekuhoxa isithangami sabezindaba ebesizoba izolo ngo-10 ekuseni.Kulesi sithangami ibigcwele incwadi ukuthi kuzokwethulwa umqeqeshi kwabezindaba nasesizweni kodwa kuvele ukuthi “ngenxa yemigudu yokuhambelana kwamazwe omhlaba ehlukene, ngokwemigomo yeCovid-19, umcimbi uhlehlile”.Isigungu esiphezulu kuzwelonke seSouth African Football Association (Safa) sihlanganile izolo emhlanganweni ongabikwangwa kwabezindaba.Kulo mhlangano Isolezwe ngeSonto litshelwe ngaphambi kwawo yisikhulu esiphelu kwiSafa, uTebogo Motlanthe, ukuthi uzoba khona kodwa kasibange sisatholakala emuva kwawo ukuveza ukuthi kuvunyelwane ngani.Nokho imithombo yeSolezwe ngeSonto ivezile ukuthi eqinisweni, zikhale kuye uMotlanthe ukuthi akaqikelele ukuthi isonto elisombulukayo lingapheli engathuliwe  umqeqeshi.Kufanele ngoba ngoMeyi 12 iBafana ihlangana neZimbabwe, iqala imidlalo yokuhlungela iWorld Cup eseQatar.“Ihlanganile iNEC (isigungu esiphezulu seSafa kuzwelonke) kwaphuma isinqumo esithi lingapheli isonto ingaphothuliwe indaba yomqeqeshi,” kusho umthombo ongaphakathi kwiSafa.Umthombo uxinwa ngegama likaQueiroz, okuvele ukuthi umengameli weSafa, uDanny Jordaan ubese zamazamise zonke izinhlaka ukuthi abuyiswe.“Bahlanu abaqeqeshi obese kudingidwa ngabo, nguHugo Broos, Harve Renard, Benni McCarthy kodwa umgwamanda uvumelane ngoCarlos Quieroz, kwathi uPitso Mosimane walala isibili esivumelwaneni,” kusho umthombo uqinisekisa ukuthi uzokwethulwa kwelisombulukayo umqeqeshi.Isolezwe ngeSonto lingakuveza ukuthi babalelwa ku-200 abaqeqeshi abavela kuwo wonke amagumbi omhlaba, abafake izicelo zalo msebenzi onzima.Kusuke ku-100 kwayiwa ku-60 ngokusho komthombo, kwase kuyiwa kwabahlanu.Obekuseqhulwini kobekufunwa ngamava omqeqeshi,  wukuthi uke walifaka yini izwe emiqhudelwaneni emikhulu, abe negama elimisa ithemba lokuthi uzofika angene emjahweni, angalokhu ekhala ngesikhathi futhi  abe namava emidlalweni yamazwe ngamazwe.Ebuzwa ngakho konke lokhu uDominic Chimhavi okhulumela iSafa, uthe: “Mnewethu mina angihlali kwiNEC, ngizifanela nawe. Kanginalo ulwaizi kuze kube nginikwa isitatimende okufanele ngisithumele kwabezindaba. Ngeke ngikuphikise kukho konke okushoyo kodwa asethembe ukuthi ubuholi sebuyikhombile insizwa ethenjiwe,” kusho uChimhavi.Lize lashona elayizolo engasalubambi ucingo uMotlanthe, kanjalo nezinye izikhulu ezisesigungwini esiphezulu.Enye into ekhomba uQuieroz ngokuthi kubukeka kuzobekwa phambi abadlali be-Under 23 abaya kuma-Olympics eJapan kwazise baphethe isithunzi seVision 2022 kanti sebejwayelene.
title: Ulandwe phesheya 'ozofaka' iBafana kweyomhlaba

text: UNGQONGQOSHE weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNkk Angie Motshekga, umemezele imiphumela ka-matric ka-2019, lapho abafundi abangaphezulu kuka-80% beqede uGrade 12 ngempumelelo. I-Free State ihambe phambili njengoba abafundi abangu-88% bephumelele. Izibalo zikhombisa ukuthi abafundi abangaphezu kuka-330 000 bangakwazi ukubhalisela ukuthola iziqu ze-Bachelor noma i-Diploma, kanti abangu-78 000 bangabhalisa emakolishi amakhono, ama-TVET.Imiphumela ka-matric iyakhombisa ukuthi ukutshala imali kwezobuchwepheshe njengengxenye yokufundisa nokufunda kuthela izithelo. Ukwenza isibonelo; kwisabelomali sika-2019, uMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo uhlele ukusebenzisa imali enguR40.5 billion kwingqalasizinda yezikole.Lokhu kufaka phakathi ukuthengwa kwezinsiza-kusebenza ezisetshenziselwa ukufunda nokufundisa. Loku kwenza umsebenzi wothisha nabafundi ubelula. Ukusetshenziswa kwezinsiza-kusebenza ze-Information and Communications Technology (ICT) ezikoleni, okuyingxenye ye-4th Industrial Revolution, kusho ukuthi abafundi bethu kungenzeka bafike ezingeni elifanayo nelabafundi bakwamanye amazwe.Imiphumela iphinde iveze ukuthi isizukulwane samanje sothisha, abaningi babo abaqeqeshwa emanyuvesi, siyakwazi ukufindisa ngendlela edingekayo.Eminyakeni embalwa edlule kube nemibono ethi makuvulwe kabusha amakolishi ayeqeqesha othisha. Le mibono beyithi amanyuvesi awakwazi ukuqeqesha othisha abasezingeni eliphakeme. Kwezinye izifundazwe, othisha basebenza amahora amaningi, kufaka nezimpelasonto, ukusekela abafundi nokubalungiselela izivivinyo. UMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo kumele nawo unconywe ngezinhlelo eziningi zokuxhasa othisha nabafundi.Inani labafundi abaphumelele liyakhombisa futhi ukuthi uhlelo lokufundisa i-CAPS, olwethulwe ngo-2011, nalo luthela izithelo.Nakuba abafundi abaningi bephumelele, akumele siyishaye indiva eyokuthi basebaningi abafundi abangaphumelelanga, ikakhulukazi labo abavela ezikoleni ezintulayo. Luyadingeka ucwaningo olujulile oluzoveza ukuthi yiziphi izimo abafundi ababhekana nazo ezindaweni zabo, ezenza kube nzima ukuthi baphumelele?Lolu cwaningo seluyoveza futhi ukuthi yini engenziwa ukuze kusizwe laba bafundi? Isibonelo; isifundazwe sase-Gauteng sigxile kakhulu ekwenzeni amakilasi esimanje ngokuhlinzeka izinsizakufunda ze-ICT.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, i-Free State yona ibuyele emasisweni ngokwenza ngcono ezemidlalo neminye imisebenzi esekela ukufundisa yaphinda yahlinzeka ngezidingongqangi njengokudla kwabafundi.Lokhu kuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi baya esikoleni njalo futhi bayakuthokozela ukuba sesikolweni. Kuzo zombili lezi zifundazwe, imiphumela ka-matric ka-2019 ihambe phambili.Lokhu kusho ukuthi azifani izisombululo okumele zisetshenziswe. Ngakho-ke, izikole, uhulumeni, amanyuvesi nezinye izikhungo zocwaningo zidinga ukusebenzisana, ukuze kutholakale izinto ezithinta abafundi bese zingenelela ngokufanele.Kulabo bafundi abangaphumelelanga kubalulekile ukuthi bazi ukuthi akulahlwa mbeleko ngakufelwa. Kungcono ukudela unyaka owodwa uphinde uGrade 12 kunokuba uhlale ekhaya ngaphandle kuka-matric bese ungasebenzi impilo yakho yonke.Labo bafundi kumele bakhulume nothisha babo ngamasu okwenza ngcono imiphumela yabo ka-matric. Abafundi bangaphinde babheke amanye amathuba njengokubhalisa kumakolishi e-TVET ukuze bathole amakhono angathuthukisa amathuba abo okuqashwa.Abafundi bangabuye babheke namathuba okuqala amabhizinisi abo basebenze njengama-artisans.Kulabo bafundi abazoya emanyuvesi, kubalulekile ukuthi bazi ukuthi akudlalwa enyuvesi, kuyasetshezwa.Uma bezwa ukuthi kunzima, kumele bacele usizo kothisha bakhona emanyuvesi neminye iminyango yakhona kubalwa ama-SRC, ababhekele ezemali zokufunda nababhekelene nezokuhlala kwabafundi. Ingane engakhali ifela embelekweni.Kumele ukuthi sonke; kubalwa abafundi, abazali, othisha bezikole, amanyuvesi nohulumeni sibambisane ukuze izwe lethu liphumelele.
title: Ukubambisana kwezemfundo kuletha impumelelo ezweni

text: UZinhle ngenyanga edlule ushayelwe izandla abaningi enza umcimbi wokunxusa intsha ukuthi iqhele ezidakamiozweni i-#nyaope must fall.Kulo mcimbi kwanandisa abaculi abahlukene njengoba injongo yawo kwakuwukunxusa intsha esingene shi ezidakamizweni ukuthi iphume ezidakamizweni.Kulo mcimbi osaziwayo ababenandisa bakhuluma nalentsha ngezinto ezihlukene ukuze bayikhuthaze iphume kulo mkhuba.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uZinhle uthe, ekulingiseni usazobuya kodwa usafuna ukuba yizwi lentsha esiyimilutha yezidakamizwa.“Ngibona ngathi akekho obakhulumelayo ngakho ke ngibone kungcono kengimise okunye ngigxile kulokhu njengoba intsha iphela izidakamizwa. Umcimbi lona obukhona kulo nyaka bekungowesithathu futhi ngijabule kakhulu ngendlela okhombise ngawo ukukhula ngiyathemba ukuthi siya phambili njengoba osaziwayo abaningi bazibophezela ekungisizeni silwe nalesi sihlava,” kusho uZinhle.Uthe noma engeke asho ukuthi usazobonakala kuSibaya noma cha kodwa kukhona izinto ezithinta ithelevishini amatasa ngazo.“Ngifuna ukugxila ekukhiqizeni eyami imidlalo nami manje ngiphinde futhi ngisebenze ngemuva ezintweni ezithinta ithelevishini ezizobonakala maduzane,” kuchaza le ntokazi.
title: Uzoma ekulingiseni ogqame kwiSibaya

text: ASIKHO isikhathi esingcono sokubhekana neKaizer Chiefs ukwedlula lesi esamanje kwazise izinto aziyihambeli kahle kuyona yonke imiqhudelwano.Lawa amazwi ephini lomqeqeshi kwiLamontville Golden Arrows uMandla Ncikazi ozwakalise enkulu inhlonipho kuleli qembu abazobhekana nalo ngoMgqibelo ngo-6 ntambama kwi-Absa Premiership, ePrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu.Akekho umqeqeshi othwele kanzima njengoSolinas kwiPremiership kulezi zinsuku. Akukhona kuphela ukuthi emidlalweni eyisishiyagalombili edlule kuyona yonke imiqhudelwano usaphumelele ukunqoba emibili kepha kuleyo midlalo kukhona nesibhaxu esivela kwi-Orlando Pirates (esimphinde kabili esikhathini esingaphansi kwenyanga).Nakuba isimo sikanje kwiChiefs kodwa uNcikazi ukholelwa ekutheni iseyiqembu elikhulu kuleli futhi kufanele njalo ithathwe kanjalo.“Siya kulo mdlalo sinezinkinga ngokulinyalelwa inqwaba yabadlali abamqoka. Ngendlela ababaningi ngayo asazi ukuthi kufanele sithatheni sihlanganise nani. Akusona isimo esikahle ukuhlelela iqembu elikhulu njengeChiefs uma uxhugela kwawena,” usho kanje lo mqeqeshi.Nakuba bebhekene nezinkinga ngokulinyalelwa abadlali abamqoka njengoDanny Phiri, Devine Lunga noZolani Nkombelo, uNcikazi ubheke kakhulu ukuthi iChiefs izokwenzenjani emdlalweni wayo weCAF Confederation Cup kusasa. Kulowo mdlalo iChiefs ivakashelwe yiZimamoto FC yaseZanzibar. IChiefs iqome ukuwususa eGoli yawuyisa ePort Elizabeth lo mdlalo womlenze wokuqala.“Konke kulele ekutheni bazodlala kanjani kwiCAF. Uma bedlale kahle banqoba lokho kungaba enkulu inkinga kithina ngoba uSolinas uzosebenzisa lokho ukubakhuthaza abadlali. Uma bengakhala ngaphansi, lokhu kuzobe kunika thina ithuba lokuthi sithole umphumela oncomekayo kwazise namakhanda abo azobe ebheke phansi. Iphutha elikhulu esingalenza ukuthi sibuke kakhulu imiphumela yakamuva yeChiefs bese siyiyela ngobuso. Abadlali ababoshelwe kuleliya qembu abeqophelo eliphezulu ngakho-ke kumqoka ukuthi abadlali sihlale njalo sibakhumbuza lokho,” uqhube kanje lo mqeqeshi.UNcikazi uthe kungcono kakhulu njengoba iChiefs bezoyivalela eMagogo ngoba uma uyiyisa eMoses Mabhida usuke uyiweza kwazise ilandelwa inqwaba yabantu kanti futhi le nkundla yaseThekwini ifana nekhaya kwiChiefs.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:Mariztburg United v Chippa United (Harry Gwala Stadium, 7.30pm); Namuhla: Highlands Park v AmaZulu (Makhulong Stadium, 7.30pm); Polokwane City v Cape Town City (New Peter Mokaba Stadium, 7.30pm)Kusasa: Bloemfontein Celtic v SuperSport United (Dr Molemela Stadium, 7.30pm); Black Leopards v Mamelodi Sundowns (New Peter Mokaba Stadium, 7.30pm)NgoLwesihlanu: Chippa United v AmaZulu (Nelson Mandela Stadium, 8pm)
title: UNcikazi akafuni ukweya iChiefs

text: INJINI ezakhele igama isagijimela AmaZulu FC, uThamsanqa Sangweni, isigcine iyitholile inkontileka kwiMaritzburg United emuva komzukuzuku iziqeqesha neqembu.USangweni (30) usayine inkontileka yonyaka owodwa neTeam Of Choice, ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe yiqembu elizinze eMphithi izolo.Sekuphele amasonto amathathu uSangweni eziqeqesha neMaritzburg kungacaci noma uzogcina esayinile noma cha. Bekungekhona okokuqala kodwa uke waziqeqesha neMaritzburg maphakathi nesizini edlule.Abadlali abafike ngemuva kukaSangweni kwiTeam Of Choice okunguDaylon Claasen, Dan Morgan noMicah Lea’ alafa akubathathanga sikhathi ukuthi basayine.Abanye abadlali abajoyine iMaritzburg uKwanda Mngonyama noPhumlani Ntshangase.USangweni ungumakadebona ebholeni. Usegijimele i-Orlando Pirates, Mamelodi Sundowns, Chippa United ne-Ajax Cape Town.Uqede isizini edlule eyibamba kwiNational First Division (NFD) edlalela iRichardsBay FC.“UThami ungumdlali waKwaZulu-Natal, ngakho sibone kungcono simnike ithuba lesibili. Siyazi ukuthi uke waba nezinkinga ngaphambilini kodwa akufanele simehlulele ngalokho. Njengamanje ubonakala enezimpawu zokukhula okuyisimanga. Sinethemba lokuthi kukhona azosiza ngakho iqembu kule sizini ezoqala,” kusho usihlalo uFarook Kadodia.
title: Uthole inkontileka kwiTeam of Choice

text: Intatheli yeSolezweIKAIZER Chiefs ihlulekile wukungena kwiTop 8 yeDStv Premiership ngemuva kokubanjwa yiBaroka FC emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ogcine uphele ngo 1-1 ngoLwesine ntambama ePeter Mokaba Stadium, eLimpopo.Amakhosi abedinga ukunqoba ukuze akwazi ukungena kumaqembu ayisishiyagalombili aphezulu kwi-log kodwa ngenxa yalo mphumela asahleli endaweni yesishiyagalolunye ngamaphuzu awu-25.Lona bekuwumdlalo wesibili kulandelana ehluleka wukuthola amaphuzu agcwele. Kodlule ashayana aze abukana neStellenbosch FC umdlalo uphela ngo 2-2. Agcina ukunqoba ngo 1-0 kwiligi ehlula i-Orlando Pirates.Nakuwona lo mdlalo iChiefs bekungathi izogcina inqobe ngalo igoli elilodwa njengoba ibibekwe phambili uLebo Manyama esiwombeni sesibili. Nokho ngemuva kokucindezela kweBaroka, leli qembu lasekhaya ligcine lilitholile igoli lokulinganisa elibekwe enethini u-Evidence Makgopa.IChiefs ayizange ibe nesizini enhle kwiPremier Soccer League njengoba ihlulekile wukuthatha iMTN 8 neNedbank Cup, idonsa ngodizili nakwiligi. Isilwela ukuthi okungenani ukuqeda kwiTop 8 nokuzoyinika indawo kwiMTN 8 ngesizini ezayo.Kulo mdlalo iBaroka iyona eqale yathi ukuphatha umdlalo kodwa kungekho okutheni okuthusa u-Itumeleng Khune emapalini eChiefs. Kunalokho ngemuva kwemizuzu ewu-10 kuqale umdlalo umgadli weChiefs uSamir Nurkovic udlaliswe kabi ebhokisini kodwa unompempe uVelaphi Sicelo wangakubona lokho njengephenathi. EzikaHunt ziqhubekile nokuhlasela kodwa kwangalunga kwaze kwayiwa ekhefini. .Esiwombeni sesibili, iChiefs ithole igoli ngomzuzu-58 ngemuva kwebhola elihle alifakelwe uKhama Billiat ngesithende.  IBaroka iqhubekile nokuhlasela iphindelela. Ngomzuzu ka-81 uMakgopa ushayele iBaroka igoli lokulinganisa emuva kwebhola eligotshwe kwesokudla.
title: IChiefs isakuthola kunzima ukungena kwiTop 8

text: OWAYEYINJINI yeKaizer Chiefs enkabeni yenkundla, uTinashe Nengomasha, uphosele inselelo abaphathi baleli qembu ukuthi ababukele okuhle okwenziwa ezinye izinkunzi ebholeni lakuleli ukuze kuzobuya izinsuku zenjabulo eNaturena.UNengomasha waseZimbabwe wayibamba kuMakhosi iminyaka ewu-10, wadlala imidlalo engu-261.IChiefs isengcupheni yokuqeda isizini yesine ngaphandle kwendebe okuyinto ekhathaza abalandeli bayo. UNengomasha uthe iChiefs idinga ukufunda kokuhle okwenziwa yiMamelodi Sundowns ne-Orlando Pirates. Ubekhuluma nabezindaba ngesikhathi kwethulwa ngokusemthethweni umqhudelwano iCastle 5s eChaf-Pozi, eSoweto ngoMsombuluko.“Kwesinye isikhathi udinga ukufuna abadlali abakulungele ukudlalela iqembu. Abadlali abangakwazi ukukuwinela izindebe. Ungaletha noma yimuphi umqeqeshi kodwa uma ungenabo abadlali angabasebenzisa ngeke uwine lutho. Ngithemba ukuthi u-Ernst (Middendorp) kukhona azokwenza ngabadlali abakhona, akwazi ukuwina iNedbank Cup. Kodwa kudingeka bathole abadlali abafanele ukudlalela iChiefs ukuze izowina izindebe," kusho uNengomasha.Ngesizini ka-2011/2012, uNengomasha ahambe ngayo kwiChiefs, igcine ngokuphakamisa iMacufe Cup. “Kunesikhathi lapho kwenzeke okufanayo kwiMamelodi Sundowns, umqeqeshi uPitso Mosimane wayishintsha indlela okuthungathwa ngayo abadlali. Wabolekisa abadlali abasezinhlakeni zokuthuthukisa ikhono. UPercy Tau wabolekiswa kwiWitbank Spurs wayothola amava, wabuya kwiSundowns wagcina esedlala e-Europe. Lezo ezinye zezinto okufanele bazenze uma bebona ukuthi umdlali unekhono kodwa udinga ukuvuthwa. UThembinkosi Lorch (Pirates) ngangidlala naye kwiCape Town All Stars. Ngazibuza ukuthi uTinkler (Eric) umbolekiseleni ngoba unekhono futhi angaba ngcono ngisho kunoKhama (Billiat). Kodwa mbuke manje, ugcine ebuyile kwiPirates futhi wenza kahle. Ngicabanga ukuthi iChiefs kufanele yenze njalo. Kwesinye isikhathi uma uhluleka udinga ukubuka abanye abantu okwenza baphumelele, ucoshe ukuze kuzokusiza. Ngoba ungabashintsha abaqeqeshi kodwa uma ungenabo abadlali abafanele ngeke uwine lutho,” kusho uNengomasha.IChiefs izobhekana ne-The Magic emdlalweni weLast 16 yeNedbank Cup ozoba seNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ngeSonto ntambama.UNengomasha uzohola iqembu labadlali abayisihlanu baseZimbabwe elizodlala emqhudelwaneni iCastle 5s wamazwe ayisishiyagalombili ase-Afrika. Ezinye izingwazi kade kunguSamuel Eto’o waseCameroon, Siza Dlamini waseSwaziland noChristopher Katongo waseZambia. Iqembu elizophumelela lizoyobuka umdlalo webhola omkhulu phesheya kwezilwandle. Nyakenye iqembu eliphumelele libuke umqhudelwano weNdebe yoMhlaba eRussia. Nonyaka uCastle ufake namaqembu abesifazane okuwumkhankaso ozoholwa ngowayengukaputeni weBanyana Banyana, * -Amanda Dlamini.
title: Inselelo kaNengomashe kubaphathi beKaizer Chiefs

text: KUSIZE ukungenelela koNyazilwezulu kuhoxa isinqumo sokuxoshwa kwabagcotshwa abangu-23 baseBuhleni, kwaShembe, okuphume incwadi yokuthi kabasavumelekile ukuhlangana namakholwa, besolwa ngokuqambela amanga umholi walolu hlangothi.Ngeledlule iSolezwe ngeSonto libike ngokuchithwa kwabagcotshwa basemathempelini ehlukene oPhongolo, obekuthiwa amakholwa kumele ashiye amathempeli uma bengena kuwona ngoba kabasavunyelwe ukuhlangana namalungu ebandla.Omunye wabaholi othintekayo kulolu daba, elingatholakalanga igama lakhe ozibize ngoBiyela, uthe kuthathwe isinqumo sokuthi kube nomhlangano wokuxazulula le nkinga ngemuva kokungenela koNyazilwezulu.“UNyazilwezulu lusibizile, lwasitshela ukuthi kaluhambisani nesinqumo sokuxoshwa kwabagcotshwa abaningi kangaka.“Luthe lucela ukuthi sihlele umhlangano, sixoxe ukuxazulula le nkinga.“Nathi besivele sifisa ukuthi abantu bazi ukuthi lolu daba luyaxazululeka ngoba bese kusele isithombe esingesihle, sokuthi kuxoshwe abagcotshwa abaningi ngalolu hlobo.“Noma singakalunqumi usuku esizohlangana ngalo kodwa bonke abagcotshwa obekuthiwa sebexoshiwe ebandleni, babuyele bayakhonza njengenjwayelo,” kusho uBiyela.Okhulumela abaseBuhleni, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe uthe kuyabajabulisa ukuthi lolu daba luyaxazululeka. Uveze ukuthi kuhamba phezu kwamagama ayewashilo, ukuthi uNyazilwezulu ngeke luvume kuxoshwe abantu ngalolu hlobo ebandleni.
title: UNyazi lubuyise abagcotshwa ebebexoshiwe

text: AMALUNGU amadala e-ANC acele ozakwabo abathinteka emacaleni athile noma abalandelwa yifu lenkohlakalo ukuthi bahoxe ohlwini lokuya ePhalamende nakwizishiyayamthetho zezifundazwe.Le ncwadi ebhalwe womakadebona be-ANC oMnuz Goolam Abubaker, Neeshan Balton, Nksz Cheryl Carolus,Ilse Fischer, Omry Makgoale, Mary Metcalfe,Mnuz Murphy Morobe,Mavuso Msimang, Nkk Sheila Sisulu, Mnuz Terrence Tryon noTim Wilson ithi abantu abasohlwini lokuya ePhalamende nakwiziShayamthetho kufanele kube ngabangenawo ugcobho futhi abawuhloniphayo umthetho.Omakadebona bathe abantu bavotela i-ANC yingoba beyithanda ngoba yayilwa nobandlululo futhi idume ngokuhlonipha umthetho nokulalela abantu.Bathe muva nje sekuphuma imibiko emibi ngokuziphatha kwabaholi abathile kwi-ANC ababale kuyo eyomndeni wakwaGupta eyayithola amathenda ngenxa yobuhlobo bayo nezikhulu zikahulumeni e-Eskom, Denel naseTransnet.Bathe lezi zinkampani zadlelwa imali eningi ngenxa yokukhipha izinkontileka zingalandelanga imigomo efanele.Baphinde baveza ukuthi ukudliwa kwemali ezinkampanini zikahulumeni kwakwenziwa nayizinkampani ezizimele ababale kuzo iKPMG, McKinsey neSAP.Bakhale nangemibiko evele kwiKhomishini yeJaji uRaymond Zondo eveza ukuthi iBosasa yayigwazela izikhulu zikahulumeni nabanye abaholi be-ANC ukuze ithole amathenda.Omakadebona bathe bonke abathintekayo ekudliweni kwemali kufanele bahoxe ngoba benza abantu balahlekelwe yithemba kwi-ANC.Bahalalisele uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngokusungula amakhomishini okuphenya ngenkohlakalo.
title: ‘Abahoxe abathinteka enkohlakalweni’

text: YIZE uhlelo lokunxephezela abalimala ezingozini zomgwaqo i-Road Accident Fund (RAF), lubhekene nezinkinga zemali kodwa sekuyakhanya njengoba uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, eveze ukuthi kusele imali enguR3.2 billion esikhwameni sabo.Bese kuneminyaka lesi sikhwama sibhekene nenkinga yemali. UMbalula uthe lokhu bekwenziwa ukufakwa kwezicelo eziwubugebengu kulesi sikhwama.I-RAF ithola imali kwintela ekhokhwa ngophethroli, bese kukhokhelwa izindleko zabahlangabezana nezingozi zomgwaqo.UMbalula uthe kusukela ngo-1981, bezilokhu zikhuphuka izindleko zaze zafika kuR1.5 billion ngo-2015.Izolo, uMbalula ubenesithangami nabezindaba ngalesi sikhwama nokuthi bazimisele ukwenzenjani ukuxazulula izinkinga ezibhekene naso. Ubehambisana nesikhulu esiphezulu salesi sikhwama uMnuz Collins Letsoalo.UMbalulo uthe lesi sikhwama bese siwumthwalo omkhulu kuleli, silandela u-Eskom, njengoba besinezikweletu eziningi.REDUCING THE LIABILITY OF THE ROAD ACCIDENT FUND We are on the right path and we will continue to work towards a sustainable and equitable road accident benefit scheme. pic.twitter.com/Q68u5yyjeQIsikhwama siqoqe uR43 billion ngonyaka, ngentela, u-60% waleyo mali beyisetshenziswa ukukhokhela abafaka izicelo zesinxephezelo. Enye bekukhokhwa izindleko zabameli, ukwelashwa naminye imisebenzi yesikhwama.UMbalula uthe kungokokuqala ukuthi kusale imali kulesi sikhwama. Ngo-2020, isikhwama siqoqe uR5.2 billion.“Isikhwama sikwazile ukuma yize kube nesimo segciwane leCorona. Isikhwama sibukeka sisimama, yize kube nezinselelo ngenxa yeCovid-19 kodwa kubukeka izinto zilunga kwi-RAF,” kusho uMbalula.
title: Ithemba ngolwemali yabalimala ezingozini zomgwaqo

text: EZINYE zezikhulu zeMamelodi Sundowns seziyalele umengameli weqembu, uPatrice Motsepe, ukuba aqale uphenyo oluphuthumayo ngaphakathi eqenjini ngoba zicasulwa wukuhuduleleka phansi kwegama leqembu ngenxa yomdonsiswano othinta uKeagan Dolly nokuya kwakhe phesheya kwezilwandle.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, ngenxa yalokhu uMotsepe uzoqala uphenyo ukuthola umongo wale nkiyankiya kaDolly.Izikhulu zeSundowns, okukhona kuzona uSizwe Nzimande (General Manager), Yogesh Singh (Legal & Commercial Manager), Alex Shakoane (Supporter Mobilisation Manager), Daniel Mudau (Supporter Co-ordination Manager), Hendi Benade (Finance Manager), Belinda Ndlovu (Administration Manager), Charles Ferreira (Facilities & Projects Manager), Lindokuhle Maluleke (Marketing & Special Projects Manager) no-Eben Benade (Head of Security), kulindeleke ukuthi zihlanganyele emhlanganweni ophuthumayo okuzoqala kuwo uphenyo ngenhloso yokuthola ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani ukuthi iqembu lizithole likulesi simo elikusona manje ngoDolly.Ngesikhathi luqala ukushuba udaba uMotsepe uze waphoqeleka ukuba abize isithangami nabezindaba lapho afika khona wavuma ukuthi iSundowns yenze iphutha elilodwa ngesikhahti uDolly esebhaliswa ngokugcwele ukuthi usengumdlali weSundowns. Lokhu kwenzeke ngo-2015 eseqedile isikhathi okwakuvunyelwene ngaso ukuthi uzosihlala ku-Ajax Cape Town ebimboleke kuSundowns.Yize uMotsepe ebexolisela iphutha elilodwa iDespute Resolution Chamber (DRC) yePremier Soccer League (PSL) ebese ilivumile, kuvele ukuthi ziyisishiyagalolunye sezizonke izinto eziguquliwe enkontilekeni kaDolly.Kulezi zinguquko kukhona isamba (esizokhishwa yiqembu elifuna uDolly), imibhalo emqoka nokunye okuningi kodwa okunezinkomba zokuthi bekuzovuna iSundowns. Abazazi kangcono ezeSundowns bathi uMotsepe nezikhulu ezithi akuphenywe bacasukile sebethola ukuthi ziningi kanje izinto ezishintshiwe enkontilekeni kaDolly, okuyikhona okwenza kungangabazeki ukuthi ngemuva kwalolu phenyo kukhona amabhantshi azogcwala umoya.“Sihlukane kahle noMike (Ntombela) kodwa baningi abasazomlandela ngoba sithe uma sibhekisisa okuningi kwasicacela ukuthi kunabantu abaningi abakhona kuSundowns kodwa esingabazi ukuthi benzani,” lawa ngamazwi kaMotsepe awasho eqinisekisa ukuxoshwa kukaNtombela.Nokho akakaze akhombise ukuthi kukhona abazomlandela uNtombela ngenxa yobudedengu obenzeke odabeni lukaDolly. Kungashintsha nokho lokhu ngoba sekungenelele nezinye izikhulu ezihlonishwayo kuSundowns.Njengamanje udaba lusezandleni zebhodi yeSafa okudluliselwa kuyona amacala futhi kungenzeka ludlulele kuFifa uma kuya ngezifiso zababheke izindaba zikaDolly neSouth African Football Players' Union (Safpu) abavumelana ngokuthi ngeke bakuthole ukuphumula lingavelile iqiniso ngalolu daba.UThulani Thuswa wezokuxhumana kuSundowns uvumile ukuthi lukhona uphenyo lwangaphakathi olwenziwe ngodaba lukaDolly. “Abantu bayibeke ngenye indlela indaba yophenyo. Akekho umuntu ozoxoshwa. Yebo uphenyo lwenziwe. Inhloso yalo bekuwukuthola ukuthi yini eyaholela ekutheni kwenzeke iphutha ukuze ligwemeke ngokuzayo hhayi ukuthi kukhona abazoxoshwa. Nangempela sigcine sitholile ukuthi yini eyadala ukuthi kwenzeke iphutha. Indaba kaDolly yenziwa ngosuku lokugcina lokubhaliswa kwabadlali kuPSL okuyilanga eliphithizelayo.”Ebuzwa ukuthi sezikuphi izingxoxo ngoDolly ofunwa yiMontpellier yaseFrance uthe: “Aseneme ngemibandela ebekwa yiqembu ngakho sisalinde ukuthi baphinde babuye nokungcono.”
title: Uphenyo kwabeDowns ngoDolly

text: UPITSO Mosimane, opheka iMamelodi Sundowns, uthi isicoco se-Absa Premiership sesingamane sihambe nezimbangi inqobo nje uma bona bezibekisele indawo kuCAF Champions League ngonyaka ozayo.INingizimu Afrika inezindawo ezimbili kuChampions League okungompetha beligi neqembu elizoqeda endaweni yesibili kule sizini ka-2016/2017.ISundowns ingompetha beligi bangesizini edlule futhi iyona engompetha base-Afrika emuva kokunqoba isicoco seChampions League ngoDisemba.Embangweni we-Absa Premiership wale sizini ihubhana neBidvest Wits ezihola phambili ngemuva kokuthi bobabili benqobe imidlalo yangempelasonto yeligi.Emidlalweni yangeSonto iWits iguqise iMaritzburg United ngo 1-0 eBidvest Stadium ngegoli elishaywe nguPhumlani Ntshangase. ISundowns yona ithele phansi i-Orlando Pirates ngo 2-0 ngamagoli kaKhama Billiat noYannick Zakri.Imiphumela ibeke iZitshudeni esicongweni ngamaphuzu awu-57. Zihlukaniswe amaphuzu amathathu namaBrazilians anawu-54. Womabili amaqembu asalelwe yimidlalo emithathu.Uma iZitshudeni ziyiwina yonke imidlalo esele zizoba ngompetha be-Absa Premiership bale sizini kanti uma zingaqhuzuka zizobe zivulele ezikaMosimane intuba neCape Town City esekhona embangweni.“Ngeke sizikhathaze ngeWits ngoba akusekho ezandleni zethu. Ukube kusasezandleni zethu besingakhathazeka ngabo,” kusho uMosimane ebuzwa kuthelevishini ngokunqoba kwabo bobabili neWits.“Okwethu wukwenza lokhu okumele sikwenze noma ngabe asiyiwini iligi. Kufanele siwine imidlalo yethu emithathu esele, sithole indawo kuChampions League. Ngeke siwine yonke into, manje ngoDisemba kade siwina iChampions League, ngoFebhuwari siwine iSuper Cup. Uma kuyibona okumele bawine (iligi), abayiwine. Ngibafisela inhlanhla, bayayilwela.”UMosimane esakhuluma ngeChampions League, kule mpelasonto iqembu lakhe lizoqala umkhankaso wokuvikela isicoco njengoba sekungenwe esigabeni samaqoqo kulo mqhudelwano.ISundowns izokwamukela iSaint George yase-Ethiopia eLucas Moripe Stadium ngoMgqibelo ngo-5 ntambama.ISuperSport United edlala kuCaf Confederation Cup inomdlalo wamaqoqo eLucas Moripe ngoLwesihlanu ngo-7 ebusuku lapho izokwamukela iqembu laseGuinea, iHoroya.NgeSonto iPlatinum Stars izodudulana neMouloudia Club yase-Algeria eRoyal Bafokeng ngo-5 ntambama.
title: UMosimane usegxile kuCAF ChampionsLeague

text: UFUNA ubulungiswa umndeni wowesilisa waseMlaza okuthiwa ubulawe ngumlisa osolwa ngokubulala abantu abathathu okubalwa kubo nofakazi.Umndeni womunye wabagilwa abathathu okuthiwa babulawe kwa-U eMlaza, ngempelasonto sewuzwakalise ukukhathazeka njengoba esagcwele amathafa emuva kwalezi zigameko okuthiwa zenzeke ngoMgibelo ntambama nangeSonto ekuseni.Isihlobo sikaMnuz Sibonelo “Spikili” Dlamini (25) ongomunye wabathathu okuthiwa badutshulwe bashona yilo mlisa nesicele ukuthi igama laso ligodlwe ngoba sesaba ukwenzakaliswa, sithe basashaqekile ngesigameko sokubulawa kwabo. Ngokusho kwaso, uDlamini udutshulwe washona ngeSonto ngezikhathi zasekuseni eduze kwendawo yokuqeda ukoma emuva kokuthi ebe nokuhilizisana ngamazwi nalo mlisa.Isihlobo sikaDlamini sithe lesi sigameko kusolakala ukuthi senzeke emuva kokuthi lo mlisa edubule omunye umlisa ababexabane naye.Uthe lo mlisa nabanye bafike kubo kamsolwa kwase kuhiliziswana ngamazwi nokuholele ekutheni umsolwa amdubule ambulale ngoMgqibelo ntambama emuva kwehora lesine. Kuthiwa umsolwa ube esedlulela komunye umuzi ongumakhelwane wakhe nokuyilapho edubule owesifazane okukholakala ukuthi ubengufakazi ombonile ngesikhathi edubula ebulala lona omunye ngoMgqibelo.“Okubuhlungu ukuthi lo muntu ubezidubulela abantu ngoba nalona owakithi ube esemdubula embulala ngakusasa. Kumanje akaziwa ukuthi ukuphi ngoba ngigcine engakaboshwa,” kusho isihlobo sikaDlamini.Sithe bafisa aboshwe lo mlisa mayelana nalezi zigameko zokubulala.Isihlobo sikaDlamini sithe kuze kube manje akekho owaziyo ukuthi yini eholele ekutheni abulawe ngoba akekho owaziyo ukuthi babangeni nalo mlisa ngaphambi kokuthi amdubule amahlandla amabili ekhanda.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aphenya amacala amabili okubulala emuva kokubulawa komlisa obulawe ngoMgqibelo ntambama nokubulawa kowesifazane ona-45 ababulawe ezigamekweni ezahlukene kodwa okukholakala ukuthi zihlobene.Uthe amaphoyisa ayaphenya nangecala lokubulawa kukaDlamini kanti bekungakaboshwa muntu.
title: Bafisa kuboshwe ‘owabulala abantu abathathu’

text: UMQEQESHI wompetha beTelkom Knockout iBaroka FC, uWedson Nyirenda, ukhishwe yiJomo Cosmos kwi-Last 32 yeNedbank Cup wakhombisa izimpawu zokucikwa abadlali bakhe abathile abachaze ngokuthi badlale sengathi bebengenendaba nomphumela.IBaroka ishayelwe ekhaya ePeter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane, ngegoli elibhajiswe ezintanjeni ngu-Inky Masuku ngomzuzu ka-30 umdlalo uqalile. Kulo mdlalo iBaroka ikhombise izimpawu zokuzithela ngabandayo ikakhulukazi esiwombeni sokuqala.Bazamile ukuvusa umhlwenga esiwombeni sesibili ompetha beTelkom sebephungwa ngezithebe kodwa uNyirenda ukholelwa ekutheni baqale ukwenza lokho ngoba eseshiye angalazi kubona ngesikhathi sekhefu. “Okokuqala kusemqoka ngibongele iCosmos ngoba yona ize kulo mdlalo ihlelile ukuthi yini ezoyenza nangempela abadlali bayo bahlala kulokhu abebetshelwe khona. Kusicacele umdlalo uqala ukuthi bazohlala emuva bese besibamba ngesivinini uma sibanika ithuba lokukwenza lokho. Konke lokho bakwenze ngendlela yingakho kubafanele ukudlulela phambili,” kusho uNyirenda.Mayelana nokuvuka kweqembu lakhe esiwombeni sesibili uNyirenda uzwakalise ukunengeka ekhala ngokuthi ngeke baye ndawo uma kunemidlalo abazoyikhetha.“Kucacile lapha ukuthi abanye bethu bebezicabangela okwabo kulo mdlalo. Akukho okujabulisayo esikwenzile ngoba size saphaphama esiwombeni sesibili ngoba sengilwa. Inkinga iqala ngokuthi kube khona imidlalo ekhethwayo ukuthi izoba nzima bese kuba khona neminye ebukelwa phansi. ICosmos isishaye ngoba singene enkundleni sizitshela ukuthi konke kuzozenzekela kanti yona izodlala, nangempela yawina. Ngeke ngikhulume kakhulu kodwa ukuphuma kwethu kwiNedbank kusezandleni zabadlali bethu abathile abebezitshela ukuthi bakhulu kunalo mdlalo,” usho kanje.Ukuvezile ukuthi usebheke iligi manje okuyilapho kumele khona abhukule ngoba izinto azihambi ngendlela ayezitshela ukuthi kuyobe sekuyiyona ngalesi sikhathi.Amaqembu azotholana phezulu kwiNedbnk Cup Last 16 azoqhathwa namuhluma ngo-7.30 ebusuku eGoli.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership: Kusasa: Bidvest Wits v Maritzburg United (Bidvest Stadium, 8pm); NgoMgqibelo: Lamontville Golden Arrows v Highlands Park (Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium, 3.30pm); Free State Stars v Polokwane City (Goble Park, 6pm)NgeSonto: Baroka FC v Chippa United (Peter Mokaba Stadium, 3.30pm); Bloemfontein Celtic v Black Leopards (Dr Molemela Stadium, 3.30pm)
title: UNyirenda ucikwe abadlali kwiNedbank

text: UMASIPALA weTheku udonse ngendlebe izakhamuzi zaseMlaza ukuthi zikhiphe udoti ngezinsuku ezisemthethweni ukuze kukhucululwe udoti olahlwa ezindaweni ezingafanele.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe nguMnuz Mandla Nsele, wophiko lwezokuxhumana kuMasipala weTheku, abasebenzi bakwamasipala basebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuqoqa udoti kuleli lokishi.Baveze ukuthi bakwazile ukuqoqa udoti obulahlwe ezindaweni ezingafanele kodwa kwacelwa abantu ukuthi bawukhiphe ngezinsuku ezifanele.Kukhunjuzwe abantu ukuthi ngoMsombuluko kusuke kuqoqwa udoti kwa-A, AA, B, S, K KwaMgaga, N,Y, G-zone 1 neMalukazi.NgoLwesibili uqoqwa kwa-E - North, D, G-zone 2, J-Stocks, BB, M nakwaQ.NgoLwesithathu uqoqwa kwa-E- South, W, F, J-Emadamini, U, L, R naseZamani.NgoLwesine udoti uzoqowa kwa-V - North, C, H, K ko-7, Z, CC nakwaP.Kuthi ngoLwesihlanu uqoqwe kwaV - South nakwaJ eZwelibanzi.Bathe ukukhipha udoti ngezinsuku ezifanele kwenza ukuthi unganqwabelani endaweni eyodwa.Kuthiwa abantu kufanele basebenzise opulasitiki bakadoti abamnyama.Abantu abahlukaniswe nabanye noma abane-Covid-19, bayacelwa ukuthi bababhangqe opulasitiki babo bakadoti.Ababona udoti olahlwe endaweni engafanele kufanele babike lokhu ngokushayela * -031 311 8804.Eminye imininingwane ngohlelo lokuqoqwa kukadoti itholakala ngokushayela iDSW ku-031 311 8804.
title: Izinsuku zaseMlaza zokukhipha udoti

text: USIHLALO weMaritzburg United uFarook Kadodia, uthi sebekhona abaqeqeshi abambalwa axoxa nabo emuva kokukhomba indlela u-Eric Tinkler.Izolo iTeam Of Choice, ngomlomo kaKadodia, ithe ligqabukile igoda phakathi kwayo noTinkler ngenxa yokugqoza kwemiphumela. Selokhu kuqale isizini iMaritzburg iwukudla kwenduku, ayikaze inqobe nowodwa umdlalo kwemihlanu. Ishaywe yiKaizer Chiefs ngo 2-1 kwiMTN 8 ngaphambi kokushaywa imidlalo emine kulandelana kwiDStv Premiership. Ihleli kunombolo-16 kwi-log.Ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezedlule, uKadodia watshela Isolezwe ukuthi weneme kakhulu ngomsebenzi kaTinkler, kangangoba uxoxa naye mayelana nokuthi elule inkontileka nezakhe ngeminyaka eminingi.Kodwa izembe selibuye lagadla komunye umqeqeshi wePremiership esxoshwa uTinkler. Ngesonto eledlule iLeopards ixoshe uPatrick Aussems yaqasha uDylan Kerr.“Yebo umqeqeshi simdedelile namuhla ekuseni (esho izolo). Imiphumela asiyitholi, kumanje sisemsileni kwi-log yePremiership, asikatholi nelilodwa iphuzu. Asifuni neze ukuzithola sisendaweni engeyinhle kwi-log, size sifike ekutheni sivike izembe. Kusuka kusasa (esho namuhla), sizoxoxa nabaqeqeshi abambalwa, kungenzeka lithi liphela isonto sibe sesimtholile umqeqeshi ozovala isikhala sikaTinkler,” kusho uKadodia.Phakathi kwezinto okungenzeka ukuba ziwumthelela ekuxoshweni kaTinkler wukuthi kuvele nokuthi ubengasahoshelani nabadlali abathile eqenjini. Abanye babadlali, abaxoxe nombhali ngasese, bakhala ngokuthi uTinkler ubebadlalisa izindawo abangazijwayele ngoba nakhu efuna ukufaka “izithandwa zakhe” ezindaweni ezizithandayo.Bakhala nangokuthi uma uveza ilaka lakho ngesihle usho ukuthi awukwazi ukudlala indawo ethile, kuthiwa uvele akuquvele angakukhulumisi.“Okwamanje sisematasa namalungiselelo okuvala isikhala sikaTinkler. Siyakholelwa ekutheni sinalo lonke uhlobo lwabadlali abadingekayo futhi singahamba ibanga elide kakhulu kule sizini,” kusho uKadodia.UTinkler ufike kumasizini amabili edlule, wasindisa iqembu elalisengcupheni yokugawulwa yizembe. Ngesizini edlule iMaritzburg idlale kowamanqamu kwiTelkom Knockout  yehlulwa yiMamelodi Sundowns ngo 2-1.Maningi amathuba okuthi umqeqeshi ozoqashwa yiMaritzburg uzoba ngowakuleli, uma kungaya ngenkulumo kaKadodia njengoba esanda kuveza ukuthi abaqeqeshi bakuleli sebevuthiwe, sebeshaya into ecokeme uma benikwe ithuba.Emdlalweni olandelayo weligi i-United izokwamukela iSuperSport United ekhaya eHarry Gwala Stadium ngo-8 ebusuku.Imidlalo yeDStv PremiershipNamuhla: Swallows FC v Kaizer Chiefs (7.30pm, Volkswagen Dobsonville Stadium).Kusasa: Bloemfontein Celtic v Black Leopards (7.30pm, Dr Petrus Molemela Stadium).
title: Kungenzeka kuphele isonto isinomqeqeshi omusha iMaritzburg United

text: Yebo uyawenza umsebenzi wakhe uTshathugodo Ngobe kodwa uphoxwa yilo pheqepheqe uma efunda imiyalezo yabalaleli ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Sikhulu isikhalo kubalaleli ngalo pheqepheqe kaTshathugodo (osesithombeni) uma efunda imiyalezo, yize bekhala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngale nqubo yakhe uNgobe abona yena imsebenzela kodwa kuyakhalwa. Baningi abalaleli esengike ngababona okungabalaleli boKhozi FM bekhala kodwa basaba ukuphumela obala ngoba besaba ukuzondwa njengami.Ngingomunye owakhala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngokugajwa uNongcebo nokuphindaphinda abantu ababodwana, ngavele ngakhala wavele wayeka ukungifunda angisazihluphi nhlobo ngokubabhalela yize kuyaye kwenzeke ngibalalele.Ukukhala okungaka kukapheqepheqe sekuke kwasusa umsindo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana lapho babebhinqa abalaleli bethi pheqepheqe njengoTshathugodo Ngobe eqa imibono yethu ejahe ekaBongani Miya waseZakheni.Hhayi bo ngayihleka leya nto ngoba noTshathugodo wangena waziphendulela wathi “Brazo ngisuke ngeqa imibono efana nalena.”Manje yimiphi le mibono ayeqayo uTshatha engaze isuse umsindo kubalaleli.Kusho ukuthi imibono ayeqayo usuke ejahe eyobhululu bakhe ukuze abafunde kaningi.Mina engikucelayo kuTshathugodo wukuba ayeke lo pheqepheqe osukhalise abalaleli bakhe.Nabo abasakazi mabayeke ukuba ngabangani nabalaleli ngoba lokho kwenza babe nengcindezi yokubanelisa ekubeni bekhona abadinga ukwaneliswa ngomsakazo.Umsakazo akusiwona owomsakazi futhi nomlaleli akayeke ukwenza sengathi umsakazo owakhe yedwa.Mina ngisasho ngithi mhla abasakazi bayeka ukuba woshomi nabalaleli abathile kuyophela ubupheqepheqe obenziwa wuTshatha.Ngiyakucela mfo kaNgobe yeka ukufunda ngobungani, lokho kuyokwenza ukuba abalaleli baneliseke bonke.Bonke abantu bangabalaleli abamqoka ngaphandle kokuba babhale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kumele wazi Ngobe ukuthi kunabalaleli abangayizwa lena kapheqepheqe nami ngingomunye emhayizisayo ekapheqepheqe. Uyabona kuyeke ukufunda ngale ndlela, uyawushaya impela umsebenzi wakho kodwa yeka lo pheqepheqe owenzayo.Khabzela KB MzimelaEZWELIBOMVU
title: Kuyakhalisa okwenziwa wuTshathugodo
