text: UKUSHAYWA kweManchester United isekhaya emdlalweni we-Uefa Champions League kukhombise ukuthi muningi umsebenzi ohlalele iqembu eliphekwa ngu-Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.NgoLwesibili ebusuku i-United ishaywe okokuqala selokhe uSolskjaer ethathe izintambo kuJose Mourinho ohambe sekumuncu kwiRed Devils ebhinjelwa wuhlelo kwiligi.Ukungabikhona kwezethenjwa zePSG, uNeymar Jnr. no-Edinson Cavani, kufanele ukuba kwenze ezikaSolskjaer ziqala umdlalo zinenhlasi yethemba lokuphazamisa izinhlelo zePSG, osekuneminyaka ithungatha isicoco seChampions League.Obekungenza i-United ilokozelelwe yinhlansana yethemba, wukuthi abekho nje laba, iPSG ivele isanda kubhabhadiswa ngenduku yiLyon yaphinde yakhishwa nayiGuingamp kwiFrench Cup.Bakubeke eceleni konke lokho nokho abafana bakaThomas Tuchel, bafikisa uSolskjaer ekuqeqeshi kwiChampions League ngenduku ka 2-0, ngesikhathi esifanayo bazibeke ethubeni elihle lokudlulela kuma-quarterfinal.UMDLALI wasesiswini we-Manchester United ophume ngekhadi elibomvu esiwombeni sesibili. Isithombe: Martin Rickett/PA via APAmagoli ashaywe nguPresnel Kimpeme noKylian Mbappe.Okufanele kumkhathaze kakhulu uSolskjaer, imiphumela emihle ebisimenze walubalubela ukuqahswa ngokucwele ekupheleni kwesizini, yindlela iPSG ebishibilika ngayo kalula esiswini uma abadlali bayo bephethe ibhola.U-Ander Herrera no-Nemanja Matic, abajwayele ukushanela kwasani enkabeni yesisu, bebengakhululekile njengenjwayelo.UPaul Pogba ubenganikwe thuba lokutshala ibhola ezindaweni ezisophondweni noma phambili nokwenze basokola u-Anthony Martial noMarcus Rashford obezama kwesokudla kodwa kumele abuye azolilanda esiswini ibhola.Umqeqeshi weManchester United ophume e-Old Trafford engeneme kulandele ukushaywa kwezakhe emlenzeni wokuqala weChampions League last 16 zibhekene nePSG. Isithombe: Martin Rickett/PA via APKonke lokhu kuzomele uSolskjaer ahlele ukukushintsha emlenzeni wesibili, kungenjalo lizoshayeka iphupho lakhe lokuthola umsebenzi ngokugcwele.Umqeqeshi we-United ngemuva komdlalo uyivumile induku eveza ukuthi leli qembu libadle ngamava.“Kube wumdlalo ebengiwulindele. Esiwombeni sokuqala amaqembu abesezingeni elifanayo, bashaya igoli kuqala, obekungafanele sibaphe lona, bathola umgqigqo. Baqale ukulawula umdlalo, bakhombisa ukuthi banamava,” kusho uSolskjaer waseNorway ekhuluma neMUTV.“Kuyabonakala ukuthi sekunesikhathi singayidlali imidlalio ekuleli zinga futhi kuzomele sifunde ngalo mdlalo ngoba bekungenzeka noma yini. Isizini yethu ayipheli ngalo mdlalo kodwa sizofunda kuwo.”Emdlalweni olandelayo i-United izobhekana neChelsea kaMaurizio Sarri kwiFA Cup ngoFebruwari 18, ilandela ngeLiverppol kowePremier League bese idlala umlenze wesibili nePSG emlenzeni ngoMashi 6.IDISKI YOMHLABA
title: I-United ikhombise ukuba buthuntu ishaywa yiPSG exhugayo

text: IZINDABA ezimnandi kumqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uSteve Komphela, ngokwelulama kwesithandwa somgadli esinguBernard Parker ziphelezelwe ezingezinhle njengoba kuvela ukuthi kubanjwe umoya ngoPhilani Zulu noGeorge Maluleka.UParker, obengakaze abonakale kwiChiefs kulo nyaka ngenxa yeqakala ebelimumise kabi, useluleme ngokugcwele futhi usethubeni lokubonakala koweLast 32 yeNedbank Cup neLamontville Golden Arrows ngeSonto ngo-3.30 ntambama, eFNB Stadium, eNasrec.Mayelana nesimo sikaZulu noMaluleka, udokotela waleli qembu uDave Milner, uthe kubanjwe umoya ngabo futhi kuphakathi kokuthi badlale kumbe bangabonakali. UZulu unenkinga efanayo nale ebihlupha uParker kwazise ushayeke kabi eqakaleni bebhekene neBidvest Wits muva nje. Ukhala ngesihluzu uMaluleka naye othinteke kuwona lo mdlalo weWits ophele ngo 1-1.“UZulu noMaluleka kubanjwe umoya ngabo kodwa sizoqhubeka nokubabheka njengoba kuhamba isonto kodwa ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi uParker useluleme futhi kusele kuKomphela ukuthi uzomsebenzisa noma cha,” usho kanje uMilner kwi-website yeChiefs.Omunye umdlali oseluleme lapha uTsepo Masilela kodwa akakaqali ukuziqeqesha nabanye. Ayizange ivezwe imbangela yalokhu kodwa kubukeka kuzoba nzima ukuthi lo mdlali oke wagijima kwiSpanish La Liga abuyele esikimini kwazise uZulu udlala kahle. Uma engalulami kowe-Arrows kulindeleke ukuthi kudlale uSiphosakhe Ntiyantiya namanje okusakhulunywa ngaye ngendlela adlale kahle ngayo ebonakala okokuqala.Kule ndawo kusekhona noSibusiso Khumalo oke walimala kodwa ezakamuva zithi useluleme yikhona nje ukweqiwa yijezi. Ngendlela eselimeqe ngayo ijezi nokuphazanyiswa ukulimala, bekulindeleke ukuba adedelwe lo mdlali waseNanda njengoba bekuvuleke iwindi lokushintshana ngabadlali.UMilner uphawulile nangoKabelo Mahlasela othengwe kwiBloemfontein Celtic waphambana noLorenzo Gordinho kodwa waba nebhadi lokulimala eziqeqesha okokuqala naMakhosi.“Useqalile wenza okufanele akwenze kodwa usahamba ngazo izinduku kanti nokhonkolo akakawukhiphi. Kusemqoka simnike isikhathi esanele kwazise uhlinziwe. Ngicabanga ukuthi njengoba eseqalile ewujimisa umlenze olimele, sibheke ukuthi emasontweni ayisishiyagalombili sibe sesikhuluma okunye,” kusonga uMilner.Imidlalo yeNedbank Cup Last 32:Kusasa: Cape Town All Stars v Mamelodi Sundowns (Athlone Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: Swallows FC v Maritzburg United (Dobsonville Stadium, 3.30pm); Steenberg United v Orbit College (Parow Park, 3.30pm); Phiva Young Stars v Chippa United (Kabokweni Stadium, 3.30pm); Orlando Pirates v Ajax Cape Town (Orlando Stadium, 8.15pm): Super Eagles - Free State Stars (Goble Park, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Mariveni United v EC Bees (Old Peter Mokaba Stadium, 3.30pm); Kaizer Chiefs v Golden Arrows (FNB Stadium, 3.30pm); Happy Wanderers v Royal Eagles (Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium, 3.30pm; Celtic v SuperSport United (Dr Molemela Stadium, 3.30pm)
title: Siluleme isilomo kwalimala abanye kwiChiefs

text: UMGADLI waMaZulu, uRhulani Manzini, ukholwa wukuthi bangawaphendula amatafula emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership neKaizer Chiefs uma bengalandela imiyalelo yomqeqeshi uCavin Johnson.Usuthu lozogadulisana neChiefs emdlalweni wePremiership eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza, namuhla ngo-7.30 ebusuku.Ngesikhathi la maqembu egcina ukudlala, AmaZulu akhale ngaphansi ngo 3-0 koweTelkom Knockout, eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini. Emuva komdlalo, uJohson ukhale ngokuhlulwa ngamathuba okushaya amagoli kwabadlali bakhe. Kulaba badlali kukhona uMabhuti Khanyeza, Manzini nabanye.Esithangamini nabezindaba izolo, uManzini uvumile ukuthi bazihlinzela phansi ngokuyeka amathuba koweTelkom. Uyena ohamba phambili ngokushaya amagoli kuMaZulu kwazise usebhakuzise inethi amahlandla ayisihlanu emidlalweni yeligi. UManzini usele ngegoli elilodwa kuRodney “Rama G” Ramagalela wePolokwane City ozihola phambili ngayisithupha.“Sazenzela phansi kuloya mdlalo, asiwasebenzisanga amathuba esawathola. Kulokhu sisebenze kakhulu ejimini ekuqedeleni amathuba. Kudingeka sishaye igoli kuqala siphinde sinciphise amaphutha,” kusho uManzini.“Uma silandele kahle imiyalelo yomqeqeshi, ngiyakholwa wukuthi singayehlula iChiefs. Singabagadli asikudingi ukunconywa uma sishaya amagoli ngoba kuwumsebenzi wethu. AmaZulu anabadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu abazokwazi ukwenza umsebenzi. Sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukunqoba lo mdalo.”Usuthu luphikwa wumlando uma lubhekene neChiefs. Emidlalweni engu-20 kusukela ngesizini ka-2006/2007, Usuthu lusayihlule kanye iChiefs okwenzeka ngo-2007 koweligi luwina ngo 2-1. Imidlalo emine la maqembu adlale ngokulingana. Amakhosi anqobe engu-15.AmaZulu asendaweni yesishiyagalolunye kwi-log yePremiership ngamaphuzu angu-12 emuva kwemidlalo eyishiyagalolunye. Asawine imidlalo emithathu kusukela kuqale isizini ka-2017/2018.Usuthu luqoke ukufudukela eMlaza ngenxa yokuthi iChiefs isebenzisa iMabhida uma idlala imidlalo yasekhaya. UJohnson uthe bayakholwa ukuthi bazozuza ngesinqumo sabo sokudlalela eMlaza.“Ngiyethemba ukuthi kuzosisebenzela ukudlalela eKing Zwelithini. Abadlali badlala ngokunethezeka khona futhi abalandeli bahlala eduzane,” kusho uJohnson.“Siyakwazi okwenze sahluleka koweTelkom futhi sisebenze kanzima ukukulungisa. Sizozama ukubhekana nendlela iChiefs edlala ngayo, siyijezise uma yenza amaphutha.”Ngakoluye uhlangothi iChiefs iphuma esibhaxwini sika 1-0 esithole kwiBidvest Wits kowandulela owamanqamu weTelkom Knockout ngempelasonto. Lokhu kubuyisele ingcindezi kumqeqeshi uSteve Komphela.Kulo mdlalo kuzodayiswa amathikithi angu-15 000 kuphela futhi awekho azodayiswa enkundleni. Atholakala e-computicket nasezitolo zakwaShoprite noCheckers. Ngokohlelo lwaMaZulu, abalandeli bazopaka enxanxatheleni yezitolo KwaMnyandu.IMIDLALO YE-ABSA PREMIERSHIP:Namuhla: Free State Stars v Chippa United (6pm, Goble Park); Platinum Stars v Bloemfontein Celtic (7.30pm, Royal Bafokeng Stadium); AmaZulu FC v Kaizer Chiefs (7.30pm, King Zwelithini Stadium); Polokwane City v Maritzburg United (7.30pm, Old Peter Mokaba Stadium).NgoMgqibelo: Maritzburg United v Bidvest Wits (3.30pm, Harry Gwala Stadium); Chippa United v Mamelodi Sundowns (3.30pm, Nelson Mandela Bay); Kaizer Chiefs v Free State Stars (6pm, Moses Mabhida Stadium); Ajax Cape Town v AmaZulu FC (8.15pm, Athlone Stadium); Golden Arrows v Cape Town City (8.15pm, Princess Magogo Stadium).NgeSonto: Bloemfontein Celtic v Orlando Pirates (3.30pm, Dr Molemela Stadium); Baroka FC v Platinum Stars (3.30pm, Peter Mokaba Stadium).
title: Umgadli woSuthu ufuna kuphenduke amatafula

text: BAQHINQE emahhovisi oMnyango wezeMfundo befuna kungenele uMnyango wezeMfundo ngokuxoshwa kozakwabo, othisha basesikoleni samabanga aphakeme, iMasakhaneni High, KwaMakhutha okuthiwa baxoshwa ngabazali ngoba besola ngokungafundisi nokudayisa izidakamizwa.Kuthiwa labo thisha baxoshwe ngabantu abebezibiza ngabazali, ngoFebhuwari nonyaka emuva kokuthi kube nezinsolo zokuthi abafundisi.Izolo othisha abaqhamuka ezikoleni ezingu-32 okubalwa kuzo ezase-Adams, Mbumbulu, Lovu nezinye ezingaphansi kwesifunda i-Andrew Zondo banikele emahhovisi oMnyango wezeMfundo eMbumbulu.Bafuna kungenele umnyango ukuxazulula inkinga yalabo thisha. Isolezwe lithole ezinye zezikole zikhala ibhungezi eLovu, izingane kuthiwa zinikwe izincwadi ezithi zingezi esikoleni kuze kube ziyabizwa.UNksz Lungile Lushaba ongusihlalo wenyunyana yothisha iSadtu esifundeni i-Andrew Zondo, uthe bakhathazekile ngesimo ababhekene naso othisha abangu-17 okuthiwa baxoshwa ngabazali nothishanhloko eMasakhaneni High. Kube sekulethwa amavolontiya angu-22 okuyiwo afundisa kulesi sikole kumanje. UNksz Lushaba uthe labo thisha abebefundisa esikoleni bayiswe kwezinye izikole lapho abasafundisa khona okwesikhashana.Uthe sekunesikhathi benxusa umnyango ukuthi ungenele, kube sengathi kukhona okwenziwayo, okugcine kuholele ekutheni baqoke ukuyoqhinqa emahhovisi awo izolo.“Sifuna ukuthi uthishanhloko aphenywe ngendlela enza ngayo ngoba akalulandelanga uhlelo olufanele uma kukhona izinsolo ezibhekiswe kothisha. Asisho ukuthi othisha kufanele bangaphenywa uma kunezinsolo ngabo kodwa sithi izinto azenziwe ngendlela,” kusho uNksz Lushaba.Omunye wothisha ogama lakhe ligodliwe, uthe baxoshwa ngabantu ababethi bangabazali, bethi ababafuni esikoleni.“Basisabisa bathi bazosishisela izimoto, basisabisa nangokusibulala ngoba bethi abasifuni esikoleni. Ngaphambi kokuthi sixoshwe saqale saseshwa ngamaphoyisa ngoba sisolwa ngokuthi sidayisa izidakamizwa. Saseshwa phambi kwezingane. Emuva kwalokho sibe sesixoshwa ngoMsombuluko olandelayo. Okubuhlungu wukuthi siyasithanda isikole sethu futhi besizifundisa kahle izingane zethu. Sisafuna ukubuyela esikoleni,” kusho uthisha.Bathe bazoqhinqa emahhovisi omnyango kuze kube umnyango uyabalalela bese uphenya ngokwenzeka.Ukatholakalanga ukuba aphawule usihlalo wesigungu esilawula ukusebenza kwesikole. Ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo, uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa uthe akekho uthisha oxoshiwe.Uthe sebehlanganile nabo bonke abantu abathintekayo kulolu daba. Kulindeleke ukuthi kwenziwe eminye imihlangano ukuze kulungiswe isimo sibuyele kwesijwayelekile.Uthe konke okushiwo ngalolu daba kuseyizinsolo, kuze kuphothulwe umbiko ngemuva kophenyo.“Sizithathela phezulu zonke izinsolo ezishiwoyo. Othisha bayiswe kwezinye izikole ngesikhathi kusaphenywa. Besingeke sibagcine emahhovisi omnyango ngoba ababona abantu abasebenza emahhovisi,” kusho uMlotshwa.
title: Othisha bagoloze emahhovisi omnyango bekhala

text: OKHULUMELA i-IFP uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uxwayisa intsha ngokuthi ilalele imizimba yayo, inakekele impilo iphume emcabangweni wokuthi izifo ngezabantu asebekhulile.UHlengwa uxoxe neSolezwe ngeSonto ebonga uMdali, emuva kokuphuma esibhedlela esiseThekwini, angene kuso ngeledlule egula. Leli phephandaba labikelwa yimithombo yalo ukuthi uHlengwa akaphilile kahle futhi bese kunezinsukwana engazizwa kahle, ethi yinto edlulayo kanti kuzomnamathela.UHlengwa uthe abantu bavamisile ukuthalalisa uma kukhona abakuzwayo emzimbeni nokuyinto eyingozi.“Impela uNkulunkulu ube muhle kimi ngiphumile esibhedlela ngisemsebenzini, kade ngihlalele umhlangano weScopa.“Ngiyabonga ukuthi ngisindile. Into ebalulekile wukuthi abantu ikakhukuazi abasha, bayigade impilo yabo balalele umzimba, bangasho ukuthi yinto edlulayo.“Mina ngingene esibhedlela ngizwa okunye kodwa odokotela bafike bathola okuningi okungahambi kahle,’’ kusho uHlengwa.Uthe ubonile ukuthi ukugula yinto engakhethi muntu kungabamba noma wubani noma nini yingakho eshumayela ivangeli lokuthi kusheshe kusukunyelwe impilo.Ubonge abebemeseka ne-IFP, wagcizelela ukuthi ungumqemane abantu abangakhathazeki .Uthe kufanele kube yinto abayijwayelayo abantu ukuhlola impilo yabo ukuze kusheshe kutholakale kusenesikhathi uma kukhona okungahambi kahle.UHlengwa onguSihlalo weStanding Commitee on Public Accounts (Scopa) ePhalamende, ubebanjelwe wuMnuz Mervyn Dicks emihlanganweni yekomiti ngesikhathi esesibhedlela.Ukugula kwakhe kwakuqinisekiswe nayiqembu lakhe i-IFP, liveza nokuthi uze wahlolela iCovid-19 kodwa kwavela ukuthi akanayo. Isikhundla sokhulumela we-IFP besibanjwe wuMnuz Narend Singh.
title: UHlengwa uxwayisa intsha ngokunaka impilo

text: UMQEQESHI we-Ajax Cape Town, uMuhsin Ertugral, uzimisele ngokujika umqondo uPrince Nxumalo ofuna ukushiya i-Urban Warriors.Lo mgadli uke wanyamalala isikhathi eside kuleli qembu angasathandi ukudlala kulona. Kuvela ukuthi iMamelodi Sundowns imnunusela ngetshe lemali. Useke waba nemihlangano emibili nomqeqeshi weSundowns uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane.Elinye iqembu elimfuna uthuli yiBidvest Wits ematasa kakhulu kuleli windi lokuhwebelana ngabadlali. UNxumalo usasalelwe yizinyanga eziyisithupha enkontilekeni anayo ne-Urban Warriors.Kuvele ukuthi i-Ajax ifuna uR1 million ukuze imdedele. U-Ertugral utshele Isolezwe ukuthi usafuna ukusebenza noNxumalo.“Okwamanje ubengakabuyi. Mina ngilinde ukuthi abuye bese sihlala phansi naye sixoxe. Ngifuna ukuzwa uhlangothi lwakhe. Ungumgadli oseqophelweni eliphezulu futhi ngizimisele ngokusebenzisana naye. Ngizwile ukuthi ngaphambi kokuthi kuvalelwe amaholidi kaDisemba uke wanyamalala kodwa kumqoka ukuthi simlalele ukuthi yini le emenzisa le nto,” kusho * -Ertugral.I-Ajax nayo imatasa kuleli windi. Isisayinise uTendai Ndoro wodumo kwi-Orlando Pirates noFagrie Lakay emboleke kwiSuperSport United.“UTendai kusizile ukuthi sike sasebenza naye. Lokhu kwenze kwaba lula ukuthi ashiye phesheya abuye azodlala lapha kwi-Ajax. Ungumdlali ongalibheki ipali kodwa ngeke simfakele ingcindezi. Kumele simnike isikhathi kodwa siyethemba ukuthi uzokwazi ukusishayela amagoli,” kusho u-Ertugral.UNdoro ubedlala eSuadi Arabia. I-Ajax ilwela ukuvika izembe. Ihlezi endaweni yesibili uma usuka ekugcineni.“Kade kwasa ngiwa ngivuka ne-Ajax. Ngibuke isimo sabo ngase ngibona ukuthi kubalulekile ukuthi ngifake isandla ekutheni ngibakhiphe kusona. I-Ajax ingelinye lamaqembu amqoka eNingizimu Afrika ngoba ihamba phambili ngokukhiqizwa kwabadlali abancane. Ayifanelwe ukugawulwa yizembe,” kusho * -Ertugral.Khonamanjalo, Isolezwe litshelwe nguLwazi Mazibuko ophethe izindaba zikaThato Tlhone ukuthi lo mdlali usejoyine iMaritzburg United. UTlhone usesayine inkontileka yonyaka nohhafu kuTeam of Choice.
title: U-Ertugral unethemba ngoNxumalo

text: ZAKHELE XABAL ISHABALELE iphupho lomshayisibhakela u-Ilunga “Junior” Makabu waseDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC) obefisa ukuwina isicoco se-World Boxing Council (WBC) ukuze avule ithuba lokuthi sibangwe abashayisibhakela base-Afrika.UMakabu uhlulwe ngomngqimuzo womlalisa phansi ngomzuliswano wesithathu nguTony “Bomber” Bellew empini yebhande le-WBC e-Everton, e-England, ebibhekwe wumhlaba wonke ngeSonto ebusuku. Phezu kokuba uMakabu eqale kahle ngomzuliswano wokuqala wamvusa phansi uBellew kodwa kucime izibani ngowesithathu. UBellew umxine ngodalimede bezibhakela, okukhona esokunxele esihlale emhlathini, kwacima izibani kuMakabu obeqala ukuhlulwa ezimpini ezingu-20. Kudingeke ukuthi unompempe ayiqede impi.UMakabu ubethembisile ukuthi uma ewina ibhande le-WBC uzolivikela kuThabiso “Rock” Mchunu waseNingizimu Afrika amehlula empini yokuhlunga ozolwela isicoco nyakenye. Nokho iphupho lakhe lishabalale kabuhlungu.Ngemuva kokuthi uMakabu ehlule uMchunu, obengumqeqeshi wakhe uNick “Mthakathi” Durandt wathi ufuna ukuwina ibhande le-WBC nalo mshayisibhakela. Nokho bahlukane uMakabu eselungiselela ukubhekana noBellew. UDurandt wayesekhoneni likaThulani “Sugarboy” Malinga waKwaZulu-Natal ngesikhathi ewina ibhande le-WBC super middleweight eminyakeni edlule nokwakungelokuqala eNingizimu Afrika. Izolo uDurandt ugxeke uMakabu ngokugcwalisa ekhoneni lakhe abantu abangasazi isibhakela ekubeni elwa impi enkulu kunazo zonke empilweni yakhe.“UMakabu ubeke abashayeli bamatekisi ekhoneni lakhe. Waziqokela kudala, ngingakasiyeki isibhakela, ukuthi uzojima phesheya kwezilwandle. Ukuba nabantu abangazi lutho ekhoneni kumenze wahlulwa. Uthathe umqeqeshi ahlangane naye emasontweni amabili adlule eManchester, wambeka ekhoneni. Izinga le-WBC lidinga abantu abalaziyo asebeke bafinyelela kulo,” kusho uDurandt.“Abaphathi bakhe abebengayizwa kahle eyokuthi aqeqeshwe yimina, yibona abamlahlekisele ngethuba lokukhonya emhlabeni. UMakabu uyiqale kahle impi, ngomzuliswano wokuqala wenza okufanele. Ngowesibili ubuye esezitshela ukuthi kufanele adlalisane noBellew esikhundleni sokuthi alwele ukuyomqeda ngoba ubekade esekuthathile ukuzethemba kwakhe ngokumvusa phansi. Emuva kwalokhu angazi ukuthi uzoshonaphi. Ithuba elifana naleli ngeke aphinde alithole.”Emuva kwempi uBellew uthe: “Ungiphule ikhala, ngikhuluma nje, lihlephukile. Kodwa nginebhande eliluhlaza elinokuyigolide. Uma kungathiwa susa ikhala lami ebusweni, mina ngithathe ibhande, ngingavuma.”
title: Lishabalale kabuhlungu iphupho likaMakabu

text: UBERNARD Parker, oklame indima ebonakalayo kunobhutshuzwayo eNingizimu Afrika, uphupha ngokuba sezinhlakeni zeKaizer Chiefs, kuno kulangazelela ukuvuselelwa kwenkontileka yakhe njengomdlali weqembu. UParker (35) ubalwa ohlwini lwabadlali abambalwa abaphelelwa yizinkontileka kwiChiefs uma kusongwa isizini, futhi uneminyaka egijima kuleli qembu elidume ngokuba nabalandeli abaningi eNingizimu Afrika.Abanye abadlali abasohlwini nguKhama Billiat, Philani Zulu noWillards Katsande kanti iTimeslive ibale noLebogang Manyama noBruce Bvuma, ongaconsi phansi kulezi nsuku.UParker ungukaputeni weqembu okwamanje kodwa indlala yamagoli nokubheda kwezinto eNaturena, kwenza abe mancane amathuba okuthi kuvuselelwe inkontileka yakhe. Nokho imenenja yakhe, uMike Makaab, ithe lo mgadli ubheke ukulisebenzela kwezinye izinhlaka leli qembu.“UBernard uyafisa ukuhlala kwiChiefs. Ufuna ukuqhubeka nokulisebenzela iqembu nangemuva kwezinsuku zakhe zokudlala,” kusho uMakaab.Ngokusho kukaMakaab, uParker usezinhlelweni zokuqala iziqu zokuqeqesha ukuze ahlale ehlomile uma kuqhamuka ithuba lokuqeqesha.“Sike sayikhuluma naye indaba yokuqeqesha, uyafuna ukungena kulo mkhakha. Empeleni yinto azoyiqala ukuyifundela ngonyaka ozayo. Uyakulangazelela ukuqhubeka nokuhlala eqenjini (Kaizer Chiefs),” kusho uMakaab.Ebuzwa uVina Maphosa okhulumela iChiefs, ngenkontileka kaParker nabanye abadlali, ugcizelele ukuthi abaphawuli ngezinkontileka isizini isephakathi. UParker ufike kwiChiefs eminyakeni engu-10 edlule ebuya phesheya kwiFC Twente yaseHolland.Ufike kwiChiefs wanqoba izicoco okubalwa kuzo neligi kabili besacijwa nguStuart Baxter. Nokho kusuka ngo-2015 iChiefs ayikaze iphinde inqobe isicoco kanti kulezi nsuku naye uParker ayamgqozela amagoli. Eqinisweni uPaker usenesikhathi esingaphezu kweminyaka emibili elizwa ngendaba igoli emidlalweni yeDStv Premiership, futhi kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ugcine ukubhakuzisa inethi ngo-Ephreli ka-2019.Uficwa yile somiso nje, kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi liyabalwa negama lakhe kubadlali asebeke bahlabana ngeLesley Manyathela golden Boot. UParker unqobe lo mklomelo wamagoli amaningi ngesizini, ngo-2013/2014.
title: UParker usefuna isikhundla kwiChiefs

text: UKUKHULA kanzima kukaTeko “The Navigator” Modise, agcine asengumdlali ohlonishwayo ebholeni elikhokhelayo kuyamkhuthaza uSonke “Section10” Ntuli ongumdlali weRoyal Eagles okubhekwe ukuthi ikhale yemuke nesicoco seNational First Division (NFD) noma ithole indawo kuma-play offs.UNtuli (23), ongumdlali wasesiswini waKwaMashu, Kwa-N, uthi unephupho lokunqoba okwesibili isicoco seNFD ne-Eagles, njengoba eseke wasinqoba neThanda Royal Zulu okwagcina kudayiswe isitifiketi sayo sathengwa AmaZulu FC eminyakeni emibili edlule. Usayine kwi-Eagles ngasekuqaleni kukaDisemba ngonyaka owedlule.Usayine inkontileka yezinyanga eziyisikhombisa, nesivumelwano sokuvuselela uma kuphela isizini.UNtuli ufunde ePinetown Boys High kodwa waqedela * -matric wakhe eDurban Boys High.“Ngiqale ukudlala ibhola ngineminyaka eyisikhombisa. Kuthe ngineminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye ngadlalela iqembu elibizwa ngeStella FC. Kuthe ngineminyaka engu-12 ngabonwa iLamontville Golden Arrows ngahlala kuyona ngaze ngaba neminyaka engu-18. Ngibe sengijoyina iThanda engihlale kuyona amasizini amathathu, ngashiya kuyona ngemuva kokuthi idayisiwe sesiwine iligi. Ngihlale isizini eyodwa kwiRichardsBay FC, njengoba sengisayinwa yi-Eagles njengamanje,” kulandisa uNtuli.Abadlali uNtuli abukela kubona ngoPhilani Cele oke wadlala kwiKaizer Chiefs nakwiThanda, uMazwi Mncube agijima naye kwi-Eagles, uModise oke wadlala kwiBafana Bafana, Orlando Pirates neMamelodi Sundowns (ukusho ambalwa awadlalelile), Andres Iniesta obedlalela iBarcelona yaseSpain noMarco Verrati odlalela iPSG yaseFrance.“Engikuthanda kuCele ukuthi unekhono eliyisimanga, futhi uzithobile. UMncube ngithanda ukuziphatha kwakhe ejimini, futhi uyazinikela ngeke umuzwe ekhalaza noma ngabe kunjani. Ngiyayithanda indlela uModise akhule ngayo kanzima, ngoba iyangikhuthaza,” kusho uNtuli.UNtuli uthi akakungabazi ukuthi i-Eagles ingasinqoba isicoco seNFD, inkani nje uma bezoqhubeka nokuzwana nokuhloniphana bengabadlali.“Akubona abaqeqeshi nabaphathi beqembu abadlala enkundleni, kepha ithina badlali esenza lokho. Ngizama ukuthi, kubalulekile ukuthi sizwane singabadlali, silekelelane futhi sesekane. Ayikho into eyedlule ukuzwana ningabadlali yikhona okuwukhiye wempumelelo,” kuphetha uNtuli.
title: Ukhuthazwa ukukhula kanzima kukaTeko

text: ABAHOLA izibonelelo zikahulumeni bazokwazi ukuhola imali yabo yesibonelelo sikahulumeni ezitolo ezihlukene zakwaBoxer ezweni jikelele.Ukuze bathole imali yesibonelelo sikahulumeni abantu kufanele beze namakhadi abo akwaSassa bese becela imali yabo.UMnuz Andrew Mills ongumqondisi wezokukhangisa kwaBoxer, uthe:“Siyawuthanda kakhulu umphakathi. Siletha imikhiqizo ehlukene futhi senza ukuthi abantu bahole isibonelelo sabo ezitolo zakwaBoxer. Ugogo uyakwazi ukuthola impesheni yakhe kanjalo nomama uyakwazi ukukhipha imali yakhe yeqolo. Bonke bazophathwa kahle,”Uthe bayakwazi nokwenza igilosa ngekhadi lakwaSassa abantu ngoba inhloso kaBoxer wukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bathola imali yabo yesibonelelo endaweni ephephile bathenge nezimpahla ezihlukene ngentengo engambi eqolo.Ngaphandle kokuholela abantu izibonelelo zikahulumeni iBoxer iphinde iphakele abafundi abawu-350 ukudla.Laba bafundi baseNdwedwe Primary bathola ukudla okunomsoco kuvela kwaBoxer njengoba lesi sitolo sisebenzisana nenhlangano esiza umphakathi iCrossroads.“Kubalulekile ukuthi izingane zidle zisuthe ukuze zifunde kahle esikoleni. Senza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi zithola ukudla okunomsoco,” kusho uNkk Lee-Ann Pillay oyiMarketing Manager eBoxer.Uthe njalo ekuseni abafundi badla iMorvite nesidlo sasemini.
title: IBoxer nezinhlelo zokuthuthukisa umphakathi

text: NGEKE abe nankinga nokudlala kumbe ukuqeqesha kwi-Absa Premiership, uMichael Essien, waseGhana ozakhele udumo ngokugqama kwiChelsea yase-England wadlulela kwiReal Madrid yaseSpain.UbeseGoli izolo lapho bekuthulwa khona ukuxhaswa yiBudwieser kobudlelwano phakathi kweSpanish La Liga ne-English Premiership okungamaligi eyakuleli encela kuwona ulwazi.U-Essien (oyinxusa leBudweiser) okumanje usemabhukwini eSabail FK edlala esigabeni esikhulu e-Azerbaijian, utshele abezindaba ukuthi ukudlala akuseyona into ayibheke kangako kepha osekusemqoka kuyena ukuqoqa lonke ulwazi angaluthola kubaqeqeshi. Usebenze nabaqeqeshi abanzima emhlabeni njengoJose Mourinho asebenze naye kwiChelase nakwiMadrid.“Nginenkontileka neSabail kuze kubeu-2020 kodwa ukudlala akuseyona into engiyibheke kakhulu njengoba sengineminyaka ewu-36 ubudala. Ngiqashwe njengomdlali kodwa isikhathi esiningi ngisebenza njengephini lomqeqeshi eqenjini lika-Under 19. Kumnandi lapho ngikhona futhi indlela engamukelwa ngayo ingenza ngizizwe ngihloniphekile. Ngijabule futhi nangokuthi ababhekile okuningi enkundleni kimina kepha kuwukunginika ithuba lokungena kwezokuqeqesha ngoba vele kulapho ngibheke khona,” kusho yena izolo eGoli.Ebuzwa ngokuthi izinga lePremiership uyalazi futhi angasukuma yini uma kungase kube khona omthintayo ngomsebenzi eNingizimu Afrika, uthe nakanjani.“Ngizizwa ngisekhaya njalo uma ngiseNingizimu Afrika ngakho-ke ngeke ngilizibe ithuba lomsebenzi uma livela. Ngaphandle kwempatho enhle ezweni nokuxhumana phakathi kwabantu baseGhana nabaseMzansi, akufanele ukhethe iphela emasini uma ungumuntu ofana nami osafuna ukukhula kulo mdlalo. Ngingadlala impela kwi-ABSA Premiership ngoba akekho ongazi ukuthi ingenye yamaligi aphezulu emhlabeni kodwa futhi ngingaqeqesha ngoba ngiwumuntu ovulelekile oshintshweni nasemathubeni amasha,” usho kanje.Mayelana nokubhekana neBafana kweyokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ezayo, uthe ufisa kuqhubeke ngendlela obekwenzeka ngayo minyaka yonke.“Angithi siyazi kwenzekani uma kuhlangene la mazwe? Kunqoba iGhana ngakho-ke nakulokhu ngithandazela ukuthi kwenzeke okufanayo."Womabili amaqembu anabadlali abahle futhi ayashintsha kulokhu kuvela abadlali abasha okuyinto enhle ngala maqembu,” kusho * -Essien.
title: Owaduma kwiChelsea akanankinga nokudlala kwiPSL

text: ABAZALI bezingane zesikole samabanga aphakeme okuthiwa izinto zimapeketwane kuso eBulwer bafuna kungenelele ngokushesha ungqongqoshe wezemfundo KwaZulu-Natal.Kuthiwa selwehlule abahloli nesigungu sekomiti labazali udaba lwaseMadulini Secondary School, osekuhambe kuso othisha abathathu ngenxa yezinkinga ngonyaka odlule. Abafundi basala kanjalo.Okwenze isimo sishube kakhulu nonyaka wukunyamalala kukathishanhloko okuvulwe izikole engekho ngaphandle kokwazisa ikomiti labazali.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi ngoSepthemba ungqongqoshe womnyango, uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane, wahlangana nabazali ehholo eGqumeni kuyodingidwa izinkinga esikole, wathembisa nokuletha usizo ngokushesha.UMnuz Sibusiso Dlamini onengane efunda uGrade 10 nenye ekuGrade-12 eMadulini, uthe ukhathazekile ngekusasa lazo.“Inkinga yaqala ngo-Agasti nyakenye sibona izingane zibuyiswa esikoleni kuthiwa othisha abekho. Sathola ukuthi bathathu othisha abangasekho esikoleni futhi bafundisa amakilasi amaningi. Sagcina sesizwa kuthiwa kunengxabano phakathi kothisha nesigungu sabazali, udaba lwagcina enkantolo.“Abazali abebenezingane ezifunda uGrade 12 baphoqeleka ukuthi bazicelele kwezinyeizikole eKokstad ukuze zifundiswe lezi zifundo ebezingekho. Kulo nyaka neyami ingane ifunda uGrade 12 kodwa akucaci ukuthi ikusasa layo limi kanjani ngoba namanje abekho labo thisha,” kusho uDlamini.USihlalo weSchool Governing Body, uNkk Terresa Memela, uthe isingaphezu kwakhe indaba yesikole.Uthe othisha abangekho bebefundisa iMaths, Accounting ne-English.“Kwaqala kwahamba uthisha weMaths ngoSeptehmba balandela nabanye. Basuke babanjwa yizingane bephuzile zabaceba, sababizela umhlangano. Abafunanga ukuzehlisa saze sacela kubahloli ukuthi bamiswe esikoleni ngesikhathi besaphenywa. Sagcina siboshwa ngomunye wabo ethi simsabisile. Kumanje sigqigqa inkantolo ngalelo cala,” kusho uNkk Memela.Uthe emhlanganweni wabo wokugcina nomhloli bathenjiswa ukuthi konke kuzolungiswa ngoJanuwari. Sekuvele kwaqhamuka enye inkinga yokunyamalala kukathishanhloko.“Sathinta uthishanhloko simbuza ukuthi ushonephi wathi uyiswe ngumnyango kwesinye isikole. Sesicela ungqongqoshe angenelele ngoba sesihlulekile nabazali," kuchaza uNkk Memela.Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, uthe bazozama ukuthola ngethimba labo lezemfundo esifundeni iHarry Gwala ukucaciseleka ukuthi kwenzekani esikoleni ukuze babe nombiko ogcwele.
title: Inkinga isikole sihanjelwa wothisha

text: Mbali Khanyile UGQUGQUZELE omama ngokubaluleka kokuncelisa izingane zabo ubisi lwebele uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu ngesikhathi kwethulwa izibalo zabantwana abazalwe ngosuku lokuqala ku2021.Ungqongqoshe ohalalisele  yonke imindeni yezingane ezizalwe ngalolu suku, uthe umnyango uyakholelwa  kakhulu  ekutheni uzihluphe ngesimo sempilo yezingane. Uthe  kusemqoka ukuthi wonke umzali ancelise ingane yakhe ubisi lwebele  ngoba lubalulekile emzimbeni wayo.“ Siyazi ukuthi akusiyo into ehlale ilula ukuncelisa ingane ubisi lwebele kodwa sithi abazame omama njengoba ludlala indima enkulu ekwakheni izakhamzimba enganeni. Lolu hlobo lokuncelisa alugcini nje kuphela ngokwakha izakhamzimba kodwa luphinde luqinise ubudlelwano obuhle phakathi kwengane nonina wayo,” kusho uNgqongqoshe.Eqhuba uthe kumele omama balihloniphe ishadi elibafundisa ngokukhuliswa nokunakekelwa kwezingane ukuze zihlale ziyimiqemane ngaso  sonk iikhathi.Zingu-140 sezizonke izingane ezizalwe  ngosuku lokuqala ku-2021 ngokwembiko yomnyango wezempilo esifundazweni. Zingu-77 izingane zabafana  ezizalwe ngalolu suku. Angu-63 amantombazane esewonke.UNksz Slindile Mkhize (35) waseNhlungwane, KwaSiqobelo otete amawele esibhedlela, iNkonjeni eMahlabathini, ubonge abasebenzi balesi sibhedlela ngokumlekelela ekuteteni izingane zakhe ngale kokuhlangabezana nenkinga.“ Ngibonga indlela abangeseke ngayo  onompilo baseNkonjeni ngesikhathi bengitetisa. Bekunzima kodwa ngikwazile ukunqoba ngenxa yendlela  abebengisingethe ngayo,” kubonga uNksz Mkhize, umama wamawele.
title: Kugqugquzelwa omama ukuthi bazincelise ubisi lwebele izingane

text: ABANTU abangu15 balimale kabi ngesikhathi itekisi ebebeyigibele ishayisana neloli eduze kwezimpambano zomgwaqo uR103 noHarrismith Road ngaphandle kwaseMnambithi. Abezimo eziphuthumayo bakwa-ER24 bafike endaweni yesigameko ngezithuba zabo-7 ebusuku, behambisana ne-ambulensi yakwa-EMS, nezicishamlilo. Okhulumela abakwa-ER24, uMnuz Ross Campbell, uthe bonke abalimele batholakale etekisini futhi bekungabantu abadala. Abagibeli abathathu batholakale isimo sabo sisibi kakhulu, abane belimele okungatheni kwathi abanye bona bathola imihuzuko."Umshayeli yena utholakale esesihlalweni sakhe kodwa ebhajwe ngaphansi kweloli. Abezimo eziphuthumayo, ngokubambisana, baphumelele ukumtakula. Ubengalimele kakhulu, naye uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela saseMnambithi," kusho uCampbell. Amaphoyisa azifikele mathupha endaweni yesigameko ngenhloso yokuphenya kabanzi ngembangela.Khonamanjalo kulimale abantu abayisithupha kwathi ababili baba sesimeni esibucayi, ngesikhathi  kugingqika imoto emgwaqweni obheke eBergville uR616 KwaZulu-Natal izolo ebusuku. UCampbell uthe abakwa-ER24 batheleke ngezithuba zabo8.04 ebusuku,behambisana ne-ambulensi nezicishamlilo. "Abantu abadala besilisa batholwe emgwaqeni betshingwe yimoto futhi belimele kabi. Balashwe maqede baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela saseHarrismith esibizwa ngeThebe ukuze banyangwe kabanzi. "Umshayeli utholwe ebambekile futhi elimele kancane. Abezicishamlilo bamtakulile. Ezinye iziguli, eziphonswe phandle yimoto ngesikhathi igingqika, batholwe belimele lokhu okungatheni. Bonke bobane baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela saseBergville, i-Emmaus Mission ukuze bathole ukunakekelwa okuthe thuthu." Esephetha uthe amaphoyisa azophenya kabanzi ngembangela yale ngozi njengoba efikile endaweni yesigameko.
title: Kucishe kwavalwa ngehlahla eBergville naseMnambithi ngenxa yezingozi zomgwaqo

text: UTHANDO lokudweba izikibha zakhe ayezigqoka lugcine ngokumngenisela imali usomabhizini osafufusa waseMgungundlovu, oqale ibhizinisi lokufaka imibhalo ezimpahleni zokugqoka.UMnuz Siyabonga “Sya” Caluza (23) osezinze eThekwini uphothule izifundo ze-Information Technonogy (IT) eComputer Training Institute. Uqale ibhizinisi lakhe lokudweba izikibha elihamba kahle, iFBS Apparel Pty (Ltd).Le nkampani uyisungule ngo-2016 esengumfundi.“Ngazithola nginesizungu ngoba izifundo ze-IT zazingangijabulisi. Ngibe sengiqala ukwenza into engangiyikhonzile, ngadweba izikibha zami engangizigqoka esikoleni. Imfashini yinto ebengivele ngiyikhonze kakhulu ngisho ngisafunda. Ekuhambeni kwesikhathi abanye abafundi bacela ukuba nabo ngibenzele izikibha ezibhaliwe, bangikhokhele. Kugcine sekuba ibhizinisi lami kusukela ngo-2016. Sengiqedile esikole, ngabe sengenza lo msebenzi ngokugcwele,” kusho uSiyabonga.USOMBHIZINISI osemncane uMnuz Siyabonga ‘Sya’Caluza uhlose ukuthuthukisa abanye abantu abasha ngebhizinisi lakhe lokufaka imidwebo ezikibheniPhakathi komsebenzi awenzayo wokufaka imidwebo emakapisini, ezikibheni nasemajakhethini.Usebenzisana nezinkampani, izikole noma izinhlangano ezifuna ukubhala imidwebo yazo empahleni ethize.USiyabonga wenze isitifiketi seBusiness Management ngaphansi kohlelo lweNational Youth Development ngoJulayi nonyaka ukuze athuthukise ibhizinisi lakhe.Uthe akuhlose kakhulu ukuba athuthukise abantu abasha, avule amanye amathuba omsebenzi.“Baningi abantu abasha abangenayo imisebenzi, abanye abazithola benza izinto ezingalungile nabangani, bagcine bengene ezinkingeni okuba nzima ukuphuma kuzo. Leli bhizinisi indlela yokuba abantu abasha bakwazi ukukhiqiza izinto zabo, bagqoke izimpahla abazithandayo ezibajabulisayo,” kusho uSiyabonga.Ibhizinisi lakhe lisebenzela ehhovisi elikuMhlanga Drive. Uxhumana kakhulu namakhasimende akhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana i-instagram Afbs-apparel noma @apparel_fbs.
title: Uqale ibhizinisi esengumfundi lachuma

text: UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, utuse abantu baseCuba ngokuba nesihe nobuntu wathi bancamele ukubeka impilo yabo engcupheni ngoba befuna ukusiza abantu bakwamanye amazwe.Ethula inkulumo yakhe eMgungundlovu izolo, emva kokwamukela odokotela abangu-27 abavela ezweni laseCuba, abazolekelela ukuze kuliwe nobhubhane lweCorona, uZikalala uthe izinhliziyo zabantu baseCuba zinkulu ukwedlula ngisho umhlaba. Uthe kuningi abangakusho mayelana nezwe laseCuba njengoba labamba neqhaza elikhulu nasenkululekweni yamazwe amaningi ezwenikazi, i-Afrika.“Ukwethembeka kwezwe laseCuba emazweni ase-Afrika kudala. Kwahlula ngisho abacindezeli bezama ukukuqeda lokho kodwa iCuba yama kulokhu ekholelwa kukona ukusiza labo abacindezelwe,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe ubudlelwano bezwe laseNingizimu Afrika nelaseCuba busuka kude.“Ngiyazi ukuthi ngikhuluma egameni labantu baKwaZulu-Natal, abaseNingizimu Afrika nabasezwenikazi lase-Afrika, siyaziqhenya ngempumelelo ezuzwe iCuba kwezemfundo, ezempilo nezesayensi. Ngosuku olubalulekile olufana nalolu, sikhumbula abaholi bethu ababili abangasekho uDkt Nelson Mandela noKhomanda Fidel Castro, owayengumholi waseCuba, namhlanje sifuna ukubahlonipha bobabili ngokuma bangagudluki kulokhu ababekholelwa kukona phezu kwengcindezi abebeyithola kubacindezeli,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe bayaziqhenya ngohlelo lwezempilo phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika neCuba olwasungulwa nguMandela noCastro. Kulolu hlelo yilapho kusuka khona intsha yakuleli ihambe iyofundela ubudokotela eCuba.“Siyakukhumbula ukufika kodokotela bokuqala kuleli baseCuba ngo-1996, ukufika kwalabo dokotela kwahambisana nemigubho eminingi kwaba khona nomcimbi wokubeka izimbali eFreedom Park, ePitoli, lapho kukhona amagama abantu baseCuba abangu-2070, abalahlekelwa impilo yabo e-Afrika besiza ezimpini ezahlukene kubalwa nase-Angola,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe odokotela baseCuba abafikile bazobavikela beyisifundazwe.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uthe odokotela abafikile banele ukusabalala esifundazweni sonke.Uthe kuzonke zonke izifunda zesifundazwe ezingu-11, kuzoba khona udokotela okhona.“Abanye odokotela bazosebenza nezibhedlela ezithile, kodwa eThekwini, iLembe naseMgungundlovu lapho sinezibalo eziphezulu zabantu abaneCorona, khona sizosinyusa isibalo singabi nodokotela oyedwa, eMgungundlovu sizoba nababili kuthi eThekwini nakwiLembe sibe mhlawumbe nabathathu,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Izolo ntambama isibalo sabahaqwe yiCorona kuleli bese senyukele ku-19 137, esabashonile senyukele ku-369 kulandela ukushona kwabangu-30. Kuleli sekuhlolwe abantuabangu-526 433.
title: UZikalala uncoma odokotela baseCuba

text: UMKHANDLU olawula i-University of Zululand, oNgoye, usola abahlohla izitshudeni ngokuthi kuxoshwe iPhini likaShansela.Lokhu kuvele izolo esithangamini nabezindaba lapho onguSihlalo womkhandlu uNksz Nomarashiya Caluza, ephawule ngabafuna kuxoshwe uSolwazi Xoliswa Mtose oyiPhini likaShansela. “Umkhandlu uyalethemba iPhini likaShansela ukuthi lingaqhubeka nokuphatha inyuvesi. Kwezinye izimfuno zezitshudeni kuyacaca ukuthi kukhona isandla sesithathu ngoba zithinta izindaba zabasebenzi. Abantu abadala akumele badidise izingane. Bayazi lapho kumele badlulise khona ngokomthetho izindaba ezithinta abasebenzi,” kusho uNksz Caluza.Uthe bakhathazekile ngesikhathi esesimoshekile ngenxa yemibhikisho. Uveze ukuthi ukube kuya ngabo bekuzovulwa ngesonto elizayo.UNksz Caluza uthe ngoMsombuluko babe nomhlangano bengumkhandlu, okwenze bangakwazi ukuhlangana nezitshudeni. Uthe ezinye zezikhalo zezitshudeni ezithinta ukushoda kwezindawo zokuhlala, bayazama ukuzilungisa. Uveze ukuthi imali yokwakha izindawo zokuhlala ikhona kodwa kusabambe ukuthi bathole itayitela. Uthe basaxoxa nenkosi ukuthi ibanikeze indawo yokwakha ezoba nemibhede engu-3 800.Mayelana nokukhethwa komkhandlu wezitshudeni, uthe:“Ngo-2017 nango-2018 lwaba khona ukhetho lomkhandlu wezitshudeni. Kwadingeka uhlaka luhlakazwe ngo-2018 emuva kokuba amalungu alo ephule imigomo yokuziphatha. Kudingeke sikhethe uMakhoba (Bongumusa) ukuze kube nohlelo lokuxhumana nezitshudeni. Siyaxolisa kuMakhoba ngendlela asehlukumezeke ngayo ekubeni engazikhethanga njengoba egcine esulile,” kusho yena.NgoMsombuluko uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, uDkt Blade Nzimande, uhlangane nezinhlaka ezahlukene zezitshudeni. Uphakamise ukuthi abaphathi besikhungo baxoxe nezitshudeni, kukhethwe ngokushesha umkhandlu wezitshudeni. Mayelana nalokhu uNksz Caluza, uthe abakwazanga ukuhlangana nezitshudeni ngoMsombuluko ngoba nabo bebenomhlangano womkhandlu. Uthe yisifiso sakhe ukuhlangana nezitshudeni maduze.“Okwamanje kukhona uDean of Students okunguye ongumxhumanisi. Sizohlangana nezitshudeni ngoba sezikhona ezihlangane noNzimande. Sizobe sesibuyekeza nomthetho-sisekelo womkhandlu wezitshudeni ukubheka ukuthi kumele kukhethwe uhlaka olusha noma omunye umlawuli. Singakwazi nokuthi kube nekomiti elizomela zonke izinhlaka zezitshudeni ukuze kube nezingxoxo,” kusho uNksz Caluza.UMxolisi Khanyile omele iSasco obekhona emhlanganweni kaNzimande, uthe bebelindele ukuthi kube nomhlangano nabaphathi besikhungo izolo kodwa awusekho.“Sibona kuyibona nomkhandlu ababambezela ukuthi kuxazululwe izinkinga njengoba sebehoxise nomhlangano,” kusho uMxolisi.
title: Basola isandla sesithathu ezinkingeni zasoNgoye

text:
ISILILO siqal phansi emndenini kuthushuka ilungu lomndeni ebebezitshela ukuthi lishonile njengoba kade “belingcwaba” ngempelasonto. UNksz Zandile Phungula (27) waseGreytown ushaqe abaningi ezifikela emini kwabha kubo, ephila ngoLwesithathu.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi kugcwale izinkumbi zabantu kubo bezombona njengoba bekuthiwa “Uvuke ekufeni”.  
u daba oluphelele kwiSolezwe ngoLwesihlanu
title: Isimanga 'evuka' ekufeni ofihlwe ngempelasonto

text: UBONGA uMdali umethuli wezinhlelo zakwaSABC1, oke wasakaza isikhathi eside kwiGagasi FM, uKini Shandu osinde ngokulambisa engozini yemoto emehlele ebuya komunye wemicimbi ebiyandulela iVodacom Durban July, ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku.Lo methuli wohlelo lwezinkulumo, iDaily Thetha, uthe yize engalimalanga kule ngozi kodwa imoto abehamba ngayo iphelile njengoba bemtshele ukuthi ngeke iphinde ilungiseke.Uma echaza ngengozi uthe ubephuma endaweni yobumnandi iMagaba Lounge, eHammarsdale, ngesikhathi ingozi imehlela.“Bengihamba nabangani bami ababili kuyimina oshayelayo. Belikhiza kancane izulu futhi kunemoto esilandelayo ngemuva. Sasola sonke ukuthi sengathi abantu abafuna ukusithathela imoto sakhetha ukuthi sinyuse kancane ijubane,” kusho uKini.Uthe ngenxa yokuthi abayazi kahle indlela umgwaqo ababehamba ngawo wawuphela kumele bajike ngomunye bona baqhubeka kanti sebengena endaweni eyiwa.“Imoto yayisejubaneni ngenxa yokwesaba imoto eyayilokhu isilandela kodwa sibonga ukuthi akekho odlulile emhlabeni kulesi sigameko. Abangani bami ababili baqulekile kodwa ekufikeni kwabosizo lokuqala bababheka bagcina beluleme,” kuchaza yena.Uthe yena akabanga nayo ngisho nemihuzuko kodwa wayethukile.“Kuyimanje ngiseGoli angibange ngisahlala ngiye emcimbini wamahhashi ngenxa yento engivelele,” kuchaza uKini.
title: Usinde engozini owethula uhlelo iDaily Thetha

text: OBELINGISA kwiMbewu:The Seed, uNqobile Sipamla, uthi akasakwazi ukuhamba ngokukhululeka emgwaqweni okwenza ahlale ezigadile ngenxa yendawo ayidlalayo.UNqobile udlala indawo kaThokozile ongusomaqhinga owenza noma yini ukuthola into ayifunayo. IMbewu idlala ngo-9.30 ebusuku phakathi nesonto ku-e.tv."Ayisekho indaba yokuzizulela nje. Abantu babona loya sisi abamsabayo nabamzondayo. Impilo ishintshe kakhulu angikwazi ukuhamba ngedwa kumele ngiqaphele ngoba abanye bayasondela befuna ukushutha kanti kumele sigade, siqhelelane," kusho uNqobile.Lo mlingisi oke walingisa nasemdlalweni wakuMzansi Magic Ikhaya, kuvela ukuthi useshiyile kulo mdlalo.Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba njengoba uThokozile esekubhaceni uzogcina ngokushona."Isiqephu somngcwabo wakhe saqoshwa ngoDisemba ngonyaka odlule," kusho umthombo waleli phephandaba.UNqobile ukuqinisekisile ukuthi akaseyona ingxenye yeMbewu."Yebo angisekho kodwa bekumnandi ukusebenza khona futhi ngibe nesikhathi esimnandi kakhulu. Abalingisi nabasebenzi njengoMaKhumalo (Leleti), Tony (Kgoroge), MaMtshali (Thembi), Nkanyiso Mchunu noDeli Malinga. Abanye abangamukela akusibona abaqhubeka nomdlalo kodwa siyasekana bakwenza uzizwe wamukelekile okuyinto evela kuthelevishini. Abantu baze bakholwe ukuthi siyazondana kanti uma sesingasaqophi siyathandana."Uthe ufunde lukhulu ngokudlala indawo kaThokozile futhi ufuna ukudlala ezinye izindawo ngoba akathandi ukulingisa umlingiswa ofanayo nakweminye imidlalo.Uveze uthi okwamanje usaqhuba imisebenzi yenkampani yakhe ezinze eThekwini lapho afudukela khona ngo-2014.
title: Uthokozile obelingisa ekaThokozile kwiMbewu

text: KUBOSHWE abantu ababili abatholwe nezidakamizwa ezindaweni ezehlukene KwaZulu-Natal.Uphenyo obelwenziwa amaphoyisa ophiko iNewcastle Vispol, awezinja nawezobunhloli luholele ekuboshweni kowesifazane obedayisa izidakamizwa edolobheni laseNewcastle, ngoMsombuluko. Amaphoyisa abelandela umkhondo ngenkathi enikela emgwaqweni uScott kule ndawo. Afike athola khona owesifazane.Amaphoyisa athole izidakamizwa iCAT, heroin ne-crystal meth ezingadayiswa uR80 000 kuyena. Ube eseboshwa ngaleso sikhathi ngecala lokutholakala nezidakamizwa.Kusolakala ukuthi lo wesifazane ubesendleleni ehambisa lezi zidakamizwa kubathengi bazo.Uvele enkantolo yeMatshi eNewcastle izolo ngecala lokutholakala nezidakamizwa.Khonamanjalo, kolunye uphenyo ePort Sheptone kuboshwe indoda (27) etholakale nezidakamizwa ezingadayiswa uR6 520. Iboshwe erenki yamatekisi eMargate lapho itholakale khona nezidakamizwa i-mandrax ne-heroin.Ivele enkatolo yeMantshi eRamsgate ngoMsombuluko yathola ibheyili ka R5 000. Icala layo lihlehliselwe uJuni 21. Uphenyo luyaqhubeka.
title: Kuboshwe ababili abatholwe nezidakamizwa

text: UMENGAMELI wenhlangano yamaciko kuleli, uJoy Mbewana, usekhwele wadilika kuzakwabo, uKhaya Sinayile, ohlambalaze uMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, ngomdwebo. USinayile ufake umdwebo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana oveza ubuso bukaRamaphosa bunekhala eliwumphambili. UJoy uthe unxuse amaciko ukuba asebenzise amakhono awo ukulekelela uhulumeni ekudluliseni umyalezo ngokuphepha kwabantu egciwaneni leCovid-19.Lo mholi weCultural & Creative Industries Federation of South Africa (CCIFSA) uchaze umdwebo kaKhaya njengonyanyisayo futhi okhombisa enkulu indelelo kuRamaphosa. "U-Ephreli inyanga yeNkululeko, nathi njengamaciko, sibambe elikhulu iqhaza ukuze kube nalenkululeko esiyijabulelayo namhlanje. (Nomakunjalo) inkululeko ayichazi ukuthi kufanele bengahonishwa abanye abantu, ikakhulukazi abaholi bethu nabantu abadala. Badinga ukuhlonishwa ngisho noma ngabe bangamalungu omndeni, abangani noma yizihlobo," kusho uJoy. UJoy ugcizelele ukuthi amaciko kufanele adlale indima ekwakheni nasekubumbeni umphakathi wezinhlanga nezizwe ezihlukahlukene ukuze lesisizwe esiwuthingo lwenkosazane siqhakaze. "Ngakho kuyanyanyisa ukubona imidwebo efana nekaKhaya Sineyile obukeka ehlulwa ubuciko. Siyawugxeka kakhulu umsebenzi wakhe. Ngabe lokhu kuchaza ukuthi akasabuthi quthu ubuthongo ecabangana nomphambili kamengameli?" Uthe uKhaya namanye amaciko kumele bakhiqize imisebenzi ezoqwashisa imiphakathi ngeCoronavirus, "okuyisona sitha esisimise kabi futhi saze samisa nezimpilo zethu," kusho uJoy obuye abe ngumlingisi osebuya nakuZalo.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaKhaya ayiphumelelanga kwahluleka ngisho esethunyelelwa umyalezo nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana.UKhaya, ongomunye wamaciko asedume umhlaba wonke kangangoba usebuya nakokhangisa ngemisebenzi yakhe nakoQatar, akaqali ukususa umsindo. Wake wenza umdwebo ayewubiza ngokuthi i-A half a loaf is better than none, lapho kwakunamadoda amabili amnyama ayefakwe kwi-toaster maqede wawudayisela isitolo sakwaNandos. Wabonwa yindoda eyayidla kulesi sitolo sokudla esise-UK, yakhalaza ukuthi umdwebo kaKhaya wawunobandlululo maqede sawususa isitolo futhi saxolisa ngawo. UKhaya, waseNyanga, eCape Town,  akasiye umdwebi wokuqala ukuhlambalaza umengameli wakuleli, omunye onamagangangozi ngu-Ayanda Mabulu, obenoMnuz Jacob Zuma shaqa emidwebeni yakhe. Naye wake wadweba uZuma ezitika nocansi nowaba nguMengameli wokuqala waseNingizimu Afrika wentandoyeningi, uMnuz Nelson Mandela.
title: Uziqhathe namaciko ohlambalaze uRamaphosa

text: ZIKHALA ngokwenza umsebenzi wesizwe zingatholi ngisho indibilishi izinduna ezakhele ubukhosi baKwaCele eMatimatolo, ngaseMdlovane.UMnuz Sipuni Phungula, oyinduna esigodini eNkomimbelwe eMatimatolo, uthe uqale ukuba yinduna kulesi sigodi kusukela ngo-1988 ngaphansi kwenkosi uNkomo Cele athe ikhothame ngasekuqaleni kweminyaka yawo-1990.“Angiyazi into okuthiwa iholo lenduna. Angazi nokuthi ibonelelwa ngamalini. Ngiye ngizwe nje ozakwethu esenza nabo imisebenzi yesizwe efanayo bakwezinye izindawo bethi bayahola kodwa thina kule ndawo yakithi ezigodini ezine engizaziyo yinye induna engike ngizwe ithi iyahola,” kusho uPhungula.Ubale izigodi ezine ezingaphansi kwalobu bukhosi athe Umphise, Inhlangakazi, Indukumahlathi nesigodi esibhekwe nguyena Inkomimbelwe.Uthe sinye isigodi esinenduna eholayo ngaphansi kwalesi sizwe athe esaseMphise.Umthetho wemihlomulo yezinduna usayinwe owayengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma ngo-2014. Ngesikhathi ethula isabelo sezimali soMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal uNgqongqoshe wawo uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, wayinyusa imali yezinduna isuka kuR8 000 yaya kuR10 000.Isolezwe lithinta okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Lennox Mabaso mayelana nodaba lokungatholi kwezinduna imihlomulo, unxuse ukuthi zivakashele emahhovisi omnyango aseduze.“Kumele baye emahhovisi omnyango eMzinyathi bashiye imininingwane yabo ukuze udaba lwabo lubhekisiswe ngoba besingakaze sithole udaba olunjalo,” kusho uMabaso.Inkosi uMbhekiseni Cele ithe udaba lokungaholi kwezinduna ezingaphansi kwayo ilubikile emahhovisi omnyango ibisalinde incazelo evela emnyangweni.“Kuyiqiniso ukuthi ezinye izinduna aziyitholi imihlomulo kodwa udaba lwazo ngitshelwe ukuthi luyasetshenzwa yihhovisi lomnyango njengoba ngilubikile kuwona,” kusho uCele.
title: Ziyabalisa izinduna ezingaholelwa

text: UKUQALA kahle emidlalweni yokuhlunga ye-Absa Premiership kuzokwenza ube lula umsebenzi weMaritzburg United wokugcina indawo yayo esigabeni esiphezulu sebhola.Lokhu kushiwo wumqeqeshi we-United, u-Eric Tinkler, ngemuva kokuzibekisela indawo kweyokuhlunga ngempelasonto.ITeam of Choice iye emidlalweni yokugcina ye-Absa Premiership ihleli emsileni, idinga okungenani iphuzu ukuzisindisa ezembeni ibhekene neBaroka FC.Kuke kwabukeka sengathi izokwenza lokho ihamba phambili ngegoli likaFortune Makaringe esiwombeni sokuqala somdlalo obusePeter Mokaba Stadium ngempelasonto.Nokho iTeam of Choice igcine iwadedelile amaphuzu amabili iBaroka ilinganisa esiwombeni sesibili. Ukushaywa kweFree State Stars kugcine kuyisizile ngokuthi kuchilizele yona ezembeni.EzikaTinkler zizodlala eyokuhlunga namaqembu amabili aqhamuka kwiNational First Division (NFD) ukulwela ukubuyela esigabeni esikhulu.Zizovula neRoyal Eagles ngeSonto ekhaya bese zilandela neTshakhuma ekuhambeni ngoMeyi 22. Imidlalo, okukhona kuyo eyasekhaya neyasekuhambeni, iyoze iphele ngoJuni 1 sekuphuma elizoba ngelika-16 kwi-Absa Premiership ngesizini ezayo.“Sijabule ngokuthi silivikile izembe kodwa kukhona ukuphoxeka ngoba besingathanda ukuyivika eyemidlalo yokuhlunga futhi belikhona ithuba lokwenza lokho. Ngebhadi akwenzekanga. Manje sekumele sizilungiselele amanye amasonto amathathu azoba nzima namaqembu akwiNFD ukuze sizigcine siphephile,” kusho uTinkler.Uthe imiphumela yemidlalo emithathu yokugcina yeligi iyona emqinisa idolo mayelana nokuthi bangayigcina indawo yabo. I-United ishaye iBlack Leopards eThohoyandou, yashaya iSuperSport United eMgungundlovu yase ithola iphuzu kwiBaroka.“Umdlalo wethu wokuqala usekhaya ne-Eagles ngeSonto bese siya eVenda. Ngakho le imidlalo emibili imqoka, esizokuthola kuyo kubalulekile ngoba kungenza umsebenzi wethu ube lula,” kuchaza uTinkler.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe abadlali bakhe banawo yini amandla okubhekana nemidlalo, uthe: “Kumele. Lapha silwela ukuzisindisa ngayo yonke indlela. Sinesonto ukulungiselela umdlalo (wokuqala). Wumsebenzi onzima ngoba kusho ukuthi abadlali bazohlala lapha enye inyanga kanti ngokujwayelekile basuke sebenemindeni yabo. Kodwa bese ngikhulumile nabo ukuthi bangenzi izinhlelo ngoba kungenzeka siye emidlalweni yokuhlunga ngakho kumele bazilungiselele nangokomqondo.”
title: UTinkler unethemba ngeyokuhlunga

text: BATHUKILE abashayeli bamatekisi asebesaba ukupaka ngaphansi kwebhuloho okuqathake kulona iveni ewele phezu kwetekisi kwashona umuntu.Kube ubumayemaye erenki yamatekisi yaseMlaza  esezimpambanweni zomgwaqo uPine (Monty Naicker) noRussell (Joseph Nduli), eThekwini  ngenkathi iveni iwela phezu kwetekisi isuka ebulohweni kuN3 kwafa umshayeli weveni.Kulimale umuntu ophuthunyiswe esibhedlela kulesi sehlakalo esenzeke ngoMgqibelo emini.I-video egcwele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ikhombisa kuwa izinsimbi ezisekele ibhuloho ezilandelwa yiveni iToyota Hilux emhlophe ewela phezu kwetekisi ngaphambi kokuthi ilale ngokhakhayi.Itekisi ewelwe yiveni ibingenabantu njengoba ibisalinde ukulayisha. Abantu abahamba ngezinyawo ngakule renki babalekile bethuswa wumsindo.Umshayeli wetekisi Isolezwe elixoxe naye, ocele ukungadalulwa igama lakhe, uthe mathathu amatekisi ashayekile abengenabo abagibeli.“Sithukile namanje izimoto (amatekisi) azimanga lapha ngoba vele bezincane ebezisebenza. Ayiqali ukwenzeka le nto yokuwa kwemoto kuleli bhuloho. Sicela kwenyuswe izinsimbi ezisekele umgwaqo ngoba sithukile ngendlela okwenzeke ngayo,” kusho umshayeli.Izolo ukusebenza erenki bekuqhubeka ngendlela ejwayelekile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uthe kayaziwa imbangela yalesi sehlo kodwa amaphoyisa aseDurban Central aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso.Uthe ngoMgqibelo ngo-2 ntambama iveni ibihamba emgwaqweni uN3 ongenela kuCommercial.Uthe ngenkathi isebhulohweni, akwazeki ukuthi umshayeli weveni imphunyuke kanjani njengoba iphaphalaze yayowela phezu kwetekisi.“Kucekeleke phansi amatekisi amabili. Umshayeli weveni ona-30 ushonele endaweni yesigameko kwathi abehamba naye waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Sebeyasaba ukupaka endaweni yengozi

text: USIHLALO we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthi i-EFF yayihlose ukubhebhethekisa umlilo woqhekeko kwi-ANC ngesenzo sayo sokuyophunga itiye nowayengumengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma.Uhambo lwe-EFF lwalandela isinqumo seNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo, esasiphoqa uZuma ukuba ayovela phambi kwekhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana.UZikalala uthe ithimba le-EFF, elaliholwa umholi weqembu uMnuz Julius Malema, lalingayile ukuyokweseka uZuma, kepha lalizidlalela ipolitiki.Ethula inkulumo yokuvula ilekgotla yesifundazwe uZikalala, uthe i-EFF vele amavoti iwacosha ngokudunga izingqondo zabantu.“Vele i-EFF iyathanda ukugxambukela ezinkingeni ze-ANC, ukuze izizuzise yona. Inhloso yohambo lwabo kwakuwukwandisa ukudideka ngaphakathi kwi-ANC. Babefuna ukuziveza njengabantu abanesisombululo kule nkinga. Kodwa iqiniso lithi abanaso isisombululo, babefuna nje ukuyozifezela izinhloso zabo.“I-EFF iyingozi kwi-ANC ngenxa yokuthi uma igaya ivoti igxila kakhulu entsheni nakumalungu e-ANC aselahlekelwe ithemba. Ukukhula kwabo bafuna ukukuthola ngokuntshontsha amalungu e-ANC. “Umhlangano wabo noZuma kufanele siwubheke ngalelo so. Loya mhlangano wawungeve ungokuzwelana kwabo noZuma, kepha kwakuwukuyobhebhethekisa amalangabi oqhekeko kwi-ANC.”Ekhuluma kulo mhlangano wezinsuku ezimbili, uZikalala uthe bazolokhu bezama ukucela uZuma ukuba ashintshe umqondo, aye kovela kule khomishini.“Nakuba siziqonda izizathu ezibekwa uZuma ngokungavumi kwakhe ukuvela phambi kwekhomishini, kepha siyakholelwa ekutheni kufanele umthethosisekelo uhlonishwe.“Yingakho sithi ubuholi besifundazwe nobukazwelonke, kufanele buqhubeke nokuxoxisana naye. Lolu daba luzokuba nomthelela kwi-ANC esifundazweni nakuzwelonke. Baningi kakhulu abantu abakholelwayo kuZuma. Baningi abantu ashintsha impilo yabo. Yingakho lolu daba kufanele luphathwe ngobunono.”Lo mhlangano ohanjelwe izithunywa ezisuka ebuholini be-ANC kuzwelonke, esifundazweni nasezifundeni, kulindeleke ukuthi uphothulwe namhlanje.Kuwona kuzodingidwa izindaba eziningi okubalwa ukulungiselela ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya nomthelela wokubheduka kobhubhane iCorona.Phakathi kwalabo abazokwethula izinkulumo, kubalwa noNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma.
title: I-EFF yayidala uqhekeko ngetiye noZuma: Zikalala

text: IPHUTHWE yithuba lokuba nguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, iMeya yaseNewcastle ngemuva kokuboshelwa icala elithinta ukubulawa komholi we-ANCYL waseMalahleni Region.  UDkt Ntuthuko Mahlaba ubethwelwe ngeqoma kuKhongolose ukuba kube nguye ozovala isikhala sikaDkt uSbongiseni Dhlomo.Imithombo yeSolezwe iveze ukuthi uMahlaba nguyena muntu obezothatha izintambo njengoba uDhlomo eya ePhalamende.“UDhlomo nguye kuphela kwiKhabhinethi obengudokotela yingakho kucatshangwe igama likaMahlaba. Kuthe uma kuvela lezi zinsolo abhekene nazo kwaqhamuka igama likaDkt Sbu Shabalala,” kusho umthombo ongathandanga ukudalulwa.Uthe uShabalala uyaziwa kwezempilo futhi uyahlonishwa ngenxa yamagalelo akhe.Omunye umthombo uveze ukuthi uShabalala uhlonishelwa ukuthi ungumuntu ongakaze avele kwabezindaba kabi.“Konke kusemseni kaNdunankulu ozofungiswa ngoba uma kunjalo uzothatha uShabalala amfungise bese emqokela ukuba uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal,” kuqhuba umthombo.Omunye umthombo uthe okhulumela i-ANC, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, nguyena muntu ozojutshelwa kwezempilo.“Izingxoxo ziyaqhubeka kanti igama likaNomagugu liyavela kwezempilo. Ngomunye wabantu ongawubamba lo mnyango,” kusho umthombo.Umthombo ubuye waveza ukuthi obenguSotswebhu we-ANC esiShayamthetho, uNksz Nontembeko Boyce, angase ajutshelwe kwesikaSomlomo wesiShayamthetho.Uthe ngomunye wabantu besifazane abangabaholi kuKhongolose abanamava.“Uzokhumbula ukuthi i-ANC inqume ukuthi bonke oSomlomo kumele kube abantu besifazane. Nguyena muntu onamava esiShayamthetho ngoba ubehola i-ANC esiShayamthetho.”Umthombo uthe kuvela negama likaMnuz Mluleki Ndobe, ongase abe nguNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa nokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu.“UNdobe vele igama lakhe liphezulu kodwa bafuna ukususa uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube kulo mnyango bese bamfake kulona obuphethwe uMnuz Sihle Zikalala. Kodwa njengoba sisho kulele kuye uZikalala ukuthi ucabangani.“Uyazi ukuthi abantu abafakwe emagameni amathathu obekuzokhethwa kuwo ozoba uNdunankulu wesifundazwe, uNkk Simelane-Zulu noMnuz Sipho Hlomuka. Kwenziwe ngamabomu ngoba kubalekelwa uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube noNkk Peggy Nkonyeni asebemnkantshubomvu ukuze kuqokwe uZikalala,” kusho umthombo.UNkk Simelane-Zulu uthe abantu abakhuluma kanje bafuna ukuxova i-ANC. “Okokuqala uShabalala akekho ohlwini oluya esiShayamthetho. Okunye ukuthi nina niyaxova ngoba akukaze kukhulunywe kuPEC (Provincial Executive Committee) ukuthi obani abazoba oNgqongqoshe,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Namhlanje kuzofungiswa amalungu esiShayamthetho, kukhethwe uSomlomo wesifundazwe kanjalo nePhini lakhe bese kukhethwa uZikalala kwesikaNdunankulu.
title: Iphunyukwe iqatha imeya ngecala

text: SIBUSISO MDLALOSEABAPHATHI bebhola KwaZulu-Natal bangafunda lukhulu kubaphathi beSwallows FC, evuswe othuthwini lapho bekubukeka sekuphela ngayo ebholeni ngenxa yemizamo yokushabasheka komlandeli wokuqina, uPanyaza Lesufi.Lona ngumbono wenkakha yebhola yaseKZN, uNgcebo “Malombo” Sibiya, othi osomabhizinisi besifundazwe bangakwenza lokhu okwenziwe ngosomabhizinisi abafake isandla ekuvusweni nasekuxhaseni iSwallows behlangene noLesufi, inqobo nje uma osomabhizinisi baseKZN abafuna ukufaka imali ebholeni bezozihlanganisa nabantu abanolwazi nothando lwebhola.ULesufi usethubeni lokuhlabana ngomklomelo wokuba umphathi nomlawuli wonyaka uma iPSL, seyikhipha  amagama abadle umhlanganiso emikhakheni ehlukene kunobhutshuzwayo.ISwallows idle isicoco seligi yeGladAfrica Championship ngesizini ephelile, yakhuza ibuya esigabeni seDStv Premiership. Yayikade idliwe yizembe kwiPremiership ngo-2014/2015, kwathi ngasekupheleni kwesizini ka-2015/16 yaphindwa yizembe yehlela kwese-ABC Motsepe League nakhona yadliwa yizembe yehlela kuSAB Regional League. Yanquma ukuthenga isitifiketi se-Orange Vaal Professional yabuyela kwi-ABC Motsepe League, kwathi ngo-2019/18 yathenga eseMaccabi FC, ebidlala kwiGladAfrica Championship.Ukuvuswa kweSwallows kugcine kube semahlombe kaLesufi, uNgungqongqoshe wezeMfundo eGauteng, ukugwema ukuthi ungashabalali umlando weZinyoni.ULesufi owenze konke okusemandleni ngenxa yothando lweqembu njengomlandeli wokuqina.Ufake imali lidlala kwiMotsepe League, wanxenxa nabaxhasi ngokubambisana, okubalwa nosengusihlalo walo uDavid Mogashoa, bathenga isitifiketi seMaccabi.“Imvamisa kuyaye kube nosomabhizinisi lapha eKZN abafuna ukufaka imali ebholeni ngenhloso yokufukula ibhola nesike sababona naphambilini bekwenza, nengikholwa wukuthi basekhona abasengakwenza lokho.“Into nje eyaye ibe yinkinga enkulu wukuthi labo somabhizinisi imvamisa bayaye bahlangane nabantu abangenalo ulwazi lwebhola futhi abathanda izikhundla nokugqama nokuzinothisa bona, kunokuthuthukisa ibhola.Okugcina sekwenza abanye osomabhizinisi baphelelwe wuthando lokufaka imali yabo ebholeni,” kusho uSibiya wodumo kwi-African Wanderers.Eqhuba uthe ngakho-ke kufanele abaphathi bebhola eKZN basike iphethini kokwenziwe nguLesufi, eshabashekela ukuvuswa kweqembu elinjengeSwallows ekubeni engusopolitiki, ongenamlando ekuphathweni kwebhola.“ Nakhona lapha esifundazweni sakithi siyabadinga abantu abanjengoLesufi, ngoba ngelinye ilanga singafisa ukubona amaqembu anjengo-African Wanderers noma oBush Bucks evuka, ngenxa yomlando wawo ebholeni."IDurban Bush Bucks ne-African Wanderers, amaqembu osekungumlando okuthi asashabalala ebholeni, angamanye amadala kakhulu ebholeni lakuleli, kanti asungulwa ngo-1902 nango-1906 ngokwehlukana.Phakathi kwezingwazi ezagijima kula maqembu, kubalwa uMlungisi “Professsor” Ngubane, Calvin “Mkhonto kaShaka” Peterson, Daniel “Rhoo” Ramarutsi, Bennet Gondwe, Siyabonga ‘Bhele” Nomvethe, Sibusiso “Rhee” Zuma, ukubala ezimbalwa.Isithombe: Backpagepix
title: Abaphathi bebhola baseKZN bangasika iphethini kwabeSwallows

text: KUKHALWE ngobudedengu babahlengikazi kungcwatshwa owesifazane wasoLuphepheni eMzinto ngoMgqibelo, oshone esemtholampilo.Umndeni kaNksz Thobekile Phungula (26), uthukuthele ngendlela umufi anganakwanga ngayo emtholampilo ePhungashe, okuthiwa walinda i-ambulensi amahora ayisishiyagalombili. Emngcwabeni bonke bakhale ngokunganaki kwabahlengikazi bakulo mtholampilo.Uyise kamufi uMnuz Mthethiswa Phungula, uthe kubuhlungu ukuthi indodakazi yakhe yashona phambi kwakhe, abahlengikazi abaqeqeshelwe ukwelapha bezivalele kwelinye igumbi.Uthe naye kuthe esexakekile eyedwa wabiza unogada wayovusa abahlengikazi, asola ukuthi bebelele ebusuku.“Indodakazi yami yaqalwa ukugula ngoLwesibili ikhala ngokuthi inqanyukelwa umoya.NgoLwesine ngaqasha imoto sayihambisa emtholampilo. Bayibhalisile bathi bazoshayela i-ambulensi ukuze idluliswe. Bekuyizithuba zabo 2 ntambama sifika emtholampilo. Bekubonakala ukuthi ukugula kuyaqhubeka ngoba kuthe indodakazi iyochama, yawa endleleni. Nalapho onesi abezanga ukuzombheka,” kuchaza uyise.Sekushaya isikhathi sokuvalwa emtholampilo ngabo 4 ntambama, uthe onesi abebesiza emini bathe abaqhubeke balinde i-ambulensi.UPhungula uthe bahlale kwaze kwashaya * -10 ebusuku i-ambulensi ingafiki, onesi abasebenza ebusuku bezivalele kwelinye igumbi.Ebona ukuthi kuyonakala uPhungula wabiza unogada, onesi bafika umufi esembozwe ngengubo.Uthe onesi bafike bambuka maqede baphindela lapho bebekhona. Uveze ukuthi washayela imoto yezidumbu, i-ambulensi yafika umufi esekade eshonile.Umfowabo kamufi uMnuz Mboniseni Phungula, uthe bafuna incazelo ephelele ngokufa kukadadewabo. Uthe ukube kwasukunyelwa ukugula kwakhe ubezosheshe aluthole usizo.Umngcwabo kaNksz Phungula ubuhanjelwe uMnuz Zwakele Mngcwango ongumholi weDA esifundazwe futhi oyilungu lesiShayamthetho. Uthe kukhona owambikela ngalolu daba, emcela ukuthi angenele. Uthembise umndeni ukuthi udaba uzolwethula esiShayamthetho nakuNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMpilo esifundazweni uDkt Sbongiseni Dhlomo.“Kumele ilungiswe le nkinga ngoba kusengenzeka nakomunye umuntu. Kumele imitholampilo ihlale ikulindele ngisho ebusuku ukubhekana nezimo eziphuthumayo. Kubuhlungu ukuthi lo mndeni wenzelwe phansi ngabantu okuyibona okumele babanakekele,” kusho uMncwango.Okhulumela uMnyango uNksz Ncumisa Mafunda uthe: “Sikhathazekile ngokuthiwa kwenzekile futhi sidlulisa ukudabuka ngokudlula emhlabeni kwesiguli. Sesiqalile ukuluphenya lolu daba ukuze kutholakale umnyombo walo, kuthathwe nezinyathelo ezifanele.”
title: Bafuna izimpendulo ngoshone enganakiwe

text: ISILOMO somsakazi woKhozi FM, uKhathide “Tshatha” Ngobe (osesithombeni), sishaya phansi ngonyawo sithi asisoze sathwasela ubungoma.UTshatha wethula uhlelo iWoza Nabangani Bakho noSelbeyonce “Selby” Mkhize ngo-3 kuya ku-6 ntambama phakathi nesonto.“Lingawa licoshwe zinkukhu,” kusho uTshatha.“Into engingenaso isiqiniseko sokuthi ngeke yenzeke yini empilweni yami wukuboshwa ngoba kuthiwa limbula ingubo lingene. Ukuphela kwento engingenaso isiqiniseko sayo yileyo kodwa ubungoma, cha,” kusho uTshatha.UTshatha ubekhuluma ngemuva kokuthi uzakwabo emsakazweni, uNgizwe Mchunu oyisangoma, ethe sekushoda yena ekutheni naye abe yisangoma.UNgizwe ufake enkundleni yokuxhumana i-Instagram isithombe somunye umsakazi woKhozi uBheka “Beekay” Mchunu efake amabhayi obungoma.“Makhosi amakhulu. Semukela ilungu elisha @mchunubheka olandelayo uTshathugodo,” kubhala uNgizwe ku-Instagram.UBheka uhlale enza amahlaya ngobungoma emsakazweni.UTshatha uthe akanankinga nezangoma.“Anginanxa nakho ngoba sikhule sizibona phambi kwethu. Ngikhulele emakhaya phela mina. Zinhle kubanikazi bazo, thina ngeke silunge,” kusho uTshatha.Lo msakazi uyaziwa ngokukhonza ebandleni loFakazi bakaJehova njengoba ehlale efaka nezithombe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ethi uya esifundweni nasemihlanganweni yaleli bandla.Imizamo yokuthola uBheka ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa.Ufake ku-Instagram nokho ethi ubedla amagobongo.Sekuphele amasonto amabili engekho emoyeni uhlelo lwakhe iSithakela Isizwe lusakazwa nguNkosinathi Mshengu.Abanye ozakwabo bakaBheka kuthiwa bebengazi ngalokhu ngoba akakaze athi vu.
title: Sekunomunye oseyisangoma kuKhozi FM

text: USENGUMSOLWA wokuqala futhi wengezelwa uhlu lwamacala athweswe wona owayeyimeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede.Ubevele eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini, izolo nabanye abangu-21 athweswe nabo icala lenkohlakalo nokukhwatshaniswa kwethenda kadoti eyabiza uR430 million.Phambilini uNkk Gumede wayengumsolwa wesi-16 kuleli cala.Umbuso wengeze icala lokushintshana ngemali ngendlela engekho emthethweni.Lokhu kwenyuse nomqingo wamaphepha enkantolo anohlu lwamacala athweswe abasolwa waba u-397  esuka ku-324.Angaphezu kuka-2 793 amacala abhekene nabasolwa.UNkk Gumede usengumsolwa wokuqala, alandelwe yikhansela uMnuz Mondli Mthembu owayengusihlalo wekomiti lezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu neNgqalasizinda bese kuba yimenenja kaMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Sipho Nzuza, osahlabe ikhefu emsebenzini.UMbuso usola laba abathathu noMnuz Robbert Abbu owayeyiphini lenhloko kwaDurban Solid Waste, uMnuz Sandile Ngcobo, owayeyiphini lenhloko kwaSupply Chain Management ngokuba ongqondongqondo abakhwabanisa kule thenda.UNkk Natasha Kara, ongumkhulumeli weNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA), uthe abasolwa bavele okokuqala kule nkantolo izolo banikwa uhlu lwamacala olubuyekeziwe.Uthe kube nokushintshwa kwabameli okube khona nokwenze kwahlehliselwa uNovemba 30 icala.U-Advocate Jay Naidoo ongummeli kaNkk Gumede ophinde ahole ithimba labameli babamangalelwa, uthe selubekiwe usuku lokuqulwa kwecala futhi umbuso wengeze icala lokushintshana ngemali ngendlela engekho emthethweni.UNaidoo usamile ekutheni uNkk Gumede umsulwa futhi bazokuvezela inkantolo lokhu.“Ngizofaka isicelo sokuhlinzekwa ngemininingwane yecala ngo-Agasti 15, bese umbuso uyaphendula ngo-Okthoba 15. Kuyobe sekubuyelwa enkantolo ngoNovemba 30 okuyiyona ezonquma usuku esoqala ngalo icala,” kusho uNaidoo.Abanye abasolwa ngokulandelana kwabo oMnuz Mthokozisi Nojiyela, Sduduzo Khuzwayo, Bhekokwakhe Phewa, Nkk Bagcinile Nzuza (inkosikazi kaNzuza), Mnuz Hlenga Sibisi, uMnuz Mzwandile F. Dludla, inkampani Ilanga laMahlase PTY (LTD), uMnuz Zithulele Mkhize, inkampani Uzuzinekele Trading 31 CC, uMnuz Bongani P Dlomo, uNkk Khoboso Dlomo, inkampani i-Omphile Thabang Projects, uMnuz Craig Ponnan, uMnuz Prabagaran Pariah, inkampani i-El Shaddai Holdings Group CC, uNkk Sithamone Ponnan bese kuba inkampani Umvuyo Holdings CC.Umbuso uzobiza ofakazi abangu-55 kuleli cala okukhona kubo nabayizikhulu zikaMasipala weTheku.
title: Kwengezwe amacala athweswe uZandile Gumede

text: OWAYENGUMENGAMELI wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma uthi ukushona kwendodana yakhe uNhlakanipho ngo-2018 kwaba yisandla sezitha zakhe, naye wasinda ngokulambisa zisho ukumqeda.UZuma uveze lokhu ngesikhathi enengxoxo nendodana yakhe uDuduzane besebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje kwi-App iZoom. Isithangami sengxoxo sibizwa ngeZooming with Zumas. UZuma uthe ukufa kukaNhlakanipho kwakuhambisana nemizamo yokulwa naye ngayoyonke indlela ngenxa yembono yezepolitiki anayo nalokho asekwenzile kwezepolitiki.Uthi yena wadliswa ushevu owujuqu kodwa wasinda ngenxa yokushesha athole usizo lokwelashwa phesheya.''Ngathinta umngani wami owayengumengameli kwelinye izwe ukuthi angisize. Ngangazi ukuthi uma sengthinte yena ngizowunqoba ushevu. Angiyena umuntu ogula kalula mina kodwa ngaleso sikhathi ngabona ukuthi kubi '' kusho uZuma.UMNUZ Jacob Zuma udalule lezi zindaba ezishaqisayo engxoxweni nendodana yakhe uDuduzane kwiVideo efakwe kuYouTube. Screengrab: YouTubeUZuma uze waveza nokuthi ngo-2014 indlela ayegula ngayo odokotela babethe akangayi emcimbini wokugcotshwa kwakhe. ''Umfana wami wayenesifo esilawulekayo uze ube madala kodwa yena wavele wafa esithubeni nje. Sengiyazi manje ukuthi abantu ababezama ukungibulala, abadala into ezongizwisa ubuhlungu. Sengiyazi manje ukuthi ukuhluleka kwabo ukuthatha impilo yakho (esho eDuduzane) kwabenza bahlasela umfowenu omncane. Bamphambanisela ngemishanguzo yakhe. '' kuchaza uZuma othe kusamzwisa ubuhlungu namanje ukucabanga ngalento.
title: UZuma usola izitha ngokushona kwendodana yakhe ngo-2018

text: USEQOKELWE kwesinye isikhundla esiphezulu sokuphatha eminye iminyango kahulumeni, oyinhloko yoMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal.UDkt Enock Nzama uqokelwe ukuba ngusihlalo wekomiti leSocial Protection, Human and Community Development Technical Cluster. Uqokwe nguNdunankulu KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala kulesi sikhundla esinikezwa abayizinhloko zeminyango kahulumeni.Usihlalo waleli komiti umsebenzi wakhe ukwehlisa ububha emphakathini, abheke nezinye izindaba zezenhlalakahle.Ememezela ukuqokwa kukaDkt Nzama kulesi sikhundla, uZikalala uthe akangabazi ukuthi kuqokwe umuntu ofanele.“Angingabazi ukuthi uzokwenza umsebenzi omkhulu ukuthuthukisa impilo yabantu kulesi sifundazwe nakuzwelonke,” kusho uZikalala.UDkt Nzama uthe uyazithoba ngendlela abona ubuholi besifundazweni bumethemba ngayo. Uthembise ukuthi uzowenza ngokwethembeka umsebenzi abekelwe wona kulesi sikhundla esisha.Echazela Isolezwe ngesikhundla esisha, uDkt Nzama uthe asizophazamisa umsebenzi woMnyango wezeMfundo awenzayo. Kunalokho uthe kuzokwanda umsebenzi.“Ngizobe ngibheke neminye iminyango okubalwa owezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu neMisebenzi kaHulumeni esifundazweni nezinye izindaba zomphakathi. Kuzothunyelwa kimina imibiko eqondene nale minyango bese ngiyidlulisela ekomitini elikhulu eliya kwiKhabhinethi, inhloso yalo ukuthuthukisa yonke imikhakha kahulumeni,” kusho uDkt Nzama.Uthe asikho isikhathi abekelwe sona ukusebenza kuleli komiti kodwa obekhona ngaphambi kwakhe uhlale iminyaka emithathu.Uveze ukuthi useqalile imisebenzi ayibekelwe kuleli komiti njengoba isimemezelo sikandunankulu siphume ngoLwesibili.UDkt Nzama waqala ukusebenzela uMnyango wezeMfundo ngo-1983, waqala ukufundisa Ohlange High, eNanda. Ngo-1987 waba nguthishanhloko eLihlithemba High eNdwedwe, wabuye waba nguthishanhloko waseSivananda Technical and Comprehensive High KwaMashu ngo-1993.Uke waba yiphini leChief Education Specialist, eqondene nezindaba zabasebenzi, ukuphathwa nokulawulwa kwezemfundo. Ngo-2001 waba yiChief Education Specialist ebhekene nomsebenzi ofanayo.Ngo-2002 waba ngumqondisi we-Education Provisioning, wabuye waba nguChief Director wamaTVET College kusukela ngo-2003 kuya ku-2013.Waqokelwa esikhundleni sokuba yinhloko yoMnyango wezeMfundo ngo-2016.
title: Izoncelisa amawele inhloko yomnyango

text: ISTANDARD Bank inike osomabhizinisi abancane nezitshudeni ikhefu lokuphefumula bangakhokhi izinyanga ezintathu kulandela ukubheduka kweCoronavirus.“Siyayazi ingcindezi ebhekene nosomabhizinisi abancane. Sifisa ukubanika ikhefu lokungakhokhi izinyanga ezintathu kulabo abenza inzuzo enguR20 million kuya phansi.“Leli khefu liqala ngenyanga ezayo,” kusho abaleli bhange esitatimendeni.Leli bhange lithe lizokwakha imigomo emisha yokukhokha kosomabhizinisi abancane.Isikhulu esiphezulu saleli bhange, uMnuz Lungisa Fuzile sithe: “Sethemba ukuthi lokhu kuzosiza kakhulu njengoba kunenkinga yeCoronavirus.“Izitshudeni eziboleke imali yokufunda kodwa ezifunda ngokugcwele zizothola ikhefu lokungabuyisi imali yokufunda kusuka ngenyanga ezayo kuze kube uJuni.“Akuzoba nanzalo, akudingeki ukuthi umuntu afake isicelo ukuze angakhokhi.”Amakhasimende anxusiwe ukuthi axhumane nebhange ukuze achaze udaba lwawo, enzelwe izinhlelo zokuthi abuye akhokhe noma ahlanganise izikweletu.I-DA isincomile isinyathelo saleli bhange sokwenza lokhu.Khonamanjalo, iTelkom imemezele ukuthi izoxhasa ngoR15 million ezinhlelweni zokulwa naleli gciwane kuleli.UMnuz Sipho Maseko, isikhulu esiphezulu kwaTelkom, uthe le mali izosiza abasebenzi bezempilo okuyibo abasekhaleni lokulwa nalolu bhubhane.
title: Ibhange linike ikhefu abalikweletayo ngeCorona

text: Umbuzo: Ngithandana nomshumayeli wasebandleni engikhonza kulona. Sesineminyaka emithathu sijola kodwa isikhathi sami akanaso, lapho ukuya ocansini sagcina ngoDisemba nyakenye. Anginankinga nalokho ngoba vele sisindisiwe ngakho vele akumele siye ocansini.Noma bekhona abaziyo ukuthi siyathandana kodwa abaningi abazi futhi ngathi unokuzama ukungifihla. Ngabe kumele ngizikhathaze ngokungabi nesikhathi nami nokungifihla kwakhe?OkhathazekileeVryheidImpendulo:Kufanele ngempela ukhathazeke. Uma ekuthanda futhi elibona ikusasa nawe umshumayeli akumele akufihle noma angabi nesikhathi sakho. Enye yezindlela zokubonisa uthando ukuchitha isikhathi nalabo obathandayo. Ukungachithi isikhathi nawe kuyasolisa. Ake uyibhekisise kahle le yomshumayeli, kungenzeka ukuthi mhlawumbe ushadelwe noma kukhona omunye athandana naye. Zama nokukhuluma nomuntu omthembile nomaziyo umshumayeli ukuzwa ukuthi yena wazini ngaye. Uzomangala ukuthi kukhona abantu abazi izinto wena ongazazi.Umbuzo:Nginenkinga yomyeni osezinikele ngokweqile otshwaleni. Waqala ephuza ngezimpelasonto kodwa manje usumfica ephuzile naphakathi nesonto. Ngikhathazeke kakhulu ngoba uyena osondlayo kuleli khaya. Ukulahlekelwa kwakhe umsebenzi kungona izinto eziningi.Igama ligodliwe, eMbumbuluImpendulo:Kuyiqiniso elimsulwa ukuthi utshwala sebubulale imizi eminingi. Uke wambuza kodwa ukuthi kushintsheni? Kungani esezinikele kangaka ekuphuzeni? Ngabe kukhona yini okumkhathazayo? Ungasabi ukuzibuza eminye imibuzo ngoba kusengenzeka ukuthi izimpendulo ziphambi kwakho. Zinike isikhathi uxoxe naye. Zama ngayo yonke indlela ukumeseka aze athole usizo aludingayo.Umbuzo:Emva kokushada besinokuzikhipha nomkami. Kwakuyinto esasiyenza noma nini, kungonakele lutho nje - ngikhipha unyawo nokuqinisa uthando lwethu. Inkinga ngangimfihlela unkosikazi ukuthi lokhu kuyangishaya ephaketheni. Manje emva kweminyaka sengiyabona ukuthi le mpilo ingishaye kakhulu ephaketheni. Ngimtshela kanjani ukuthi imali engiyiholayo ayisangivumeli ukuthi ngiqhubeke nokumphilisa impilo ephezulu?Okhathazekile, eMorningsideImpendulo:Kuhle uphumele obala kwamanje kunkosikazi wakho kungaze konakale kakhulu. Kunezikhathi eningavakashela abangani noma nenze izidlo ezimnandi endlini ngaphandle kokusebenzisa imali eningenayo. Ukujabula akukona ukuphuma kuphela kodwa ningazenzela nina ezenu izindlela zokujabula ezingeke zinidle ephaketheni.Umbuzo:Sinezinyangana nje ezimbalwa sishadile nomyeni wami. Ngaphambilini ngangizihlalela ngedwa ngenza noma yini engiyifunayo ngaphandle komuntu okumele ngidlule kuye. Manje ngizithola nginenkinga yokuthi sekukhona omunye umuntu okumele ngidlule kuyena ukwenza izinto ngemali yami. Kuyangihlupha kakhulu ukuthi angisakwazi ukuthatha izinqumo ngempilo nenjabulo yami. Ngicela usizo ngoba ngiyamthanda umyeni wami.ThabisileeThekwiniImpendulo:Emshadweni kuyaboniswana. Ngakho ungakuboni ukuphumela obala ngokwezimali njengengcindezi. Kubalulekile ukuthi nibe mqondo munye. Into ezonenza nibe mqondo munye kuzoba ukwazi ukuthi omunye nomunye wenzani. Buka ukuvuleleka kumyeni wakho njengendlela yokwakha nje kuphela ungayibuki ngelinye ihlo.Umbuzo:Nginenkinga yomyeni ongazondli izingane zakhe zangaphandle. Sisanda kuthandana nganginganaki kodwa manje njengoba sesishadile sengiqala ukukhathazeka ngoba izingane zakhe zizocabanga ukuthi yimina onqaba nemali kanti akunjalo.Ngingenzenjani ukuze abone ukuthi lesi senzo sakhe sizomzondisa nezingane ngelinye ilanga?Igama ligodliweInanda NewtownImpendulo:Ngoba umyeni wakho usezewajwayela ukungondli akasayiboni inkinga ngesenzo sakhe. Wena ngokwenza kwakho ukhombisa ukubambisana nomyeni wakho. Mhlawumbe mtshele ukuthi njengoba usukhona ufisa kubekhona ushintsho ngendlela enenza ngayo. Ningaqala ngokuthi emalini yenu yazinyanga zonke nivumelane ngokuthi imali engakanani eningayinika abantwana.* Sithumeleni imibuzo ku: [email protected]Nisilandele ku Mo& Phindi kuFacebook naku Instagram
title: Ezothando: Ngijola nomshumayeli ucansi ngalugcina nyakenye

text: ILOCKDOWN, ngesonto eledlule okumenyezelwe ukuthi izoba nomlingisi waphesheya uTichina Arnold, izobophela izinkunzi eseziluvava ekulingiseni kwisizini entsha ezoqala ngoJulayi 9.Izolo iziphathimandla zesiteshi uMzansi Magic zimemezele amagama abalingisi abasha abazobonakala kuyo. Phakathi kwabo kukhona uThembi Nyandeni umlingiswa wakhe uMinister Mazibuko, Mmabatho Montsho (Phindi Mazibuko), Manaka Ranaka (Grace aka Zim Zim), Khulu Skejana (Mingus) noDineo Nchabeleng ozobe elingisa indawo ka-Azania.UReneilwe Sema, inhloko yezinhlelo kwiMzansi Magic, uthe sebekubheke ngabomvu ukuqala komdlalo.“Ukuzinikela kwethu ekukhombiseni izindaba ezifana nezizobonakala kulo mdlalo kusho lukhulu kithina ngoba sikwazi ukukhombisa ngawo hhayi eNingizimu Afrika kuphela kodwa nakwamanye amazwe ase-Afrika,” kusho uReneilwe.UReneilwe uthe iLockdown, ekhuluma ngabesifazane ababoshwe ejele laseThabazimbi, izoqhubeka nokukhulumisa abantu abazowubuka njalo ngoMsombuluko ntambama.“Isiqephu sokugcina saphela ngegiya eliphezulu uMonde (Zola Nombona) ebalekela ukusindisa impilo yakhe ngemuva kokuthola amadayimane. Saphinde sabona uMaki (Linda Sebezo) noDeborah (Pamela Nomvete) bebhekene ngeziqu zamehlo ingxabano yabo yaze yafinyelela kwelinye izinga. Sikubheke ngabomvu ukuthi kuzoqhubeka kwenzekeni,” kusho uReneilwe.Uthe esiqeshini sokuqala kuzobonakala impilo kaBeauty nendodana yakhe uNjabulo (Mthunzi Ntoyi) inezinkinga ezehlukene.“UMonde kuzovela esevuka emzini wenyanga ezoba wusizo kakhulu kuye. Ngenxa yokuthi ufuna ukuqala impilo yakhe kabusha uMonde uthatha isinqumo sokuxhumana noSimon (Thabo Rametsi) akholelwa wukuthi uzomsiza ukuthi aphumelele,” kusho uReneilwe.Uthe enye indawo ezogqama ekaTyson (Lorcia Cooper) ozobe esephumile ejele kodwa efuna ukuziphindiselela endodeni eyamehlisa isithunzi.Uthe nendawo kaMazet (Dawn Thandeka King), ozolokhu emlandela njalo uSharon (Lindiwe Ndlovu) owabulala umuntu asondelene naye, izoqhubeka nokudonsa amehlo abantu.
title: I-Lockdown nabalingisi abasha

text: KUKHONYE abanensila yePremier Soccer League (PSL) ekuhlohlweni kwamagoli emidlalweni yokuhlungela ukuzibekisela indawo kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ezokuba se-Egypt, esikhathini esingaphansi kwezinyanga ezine.Esehlangene angu-24 amazwe azodudulana kwi-Afcon yokuqala enezinguquko ezinqala kwazise izobe iqala ukudlalwa maphakathi nonyaka. Inamaqembu angu-24 hhayi angu-16 njengoba bekunjalo ingakashaywa imithetho emisha.Njengoba uPercy Tau ebe yiqhawe leBafana Bafana inqoba ngo 2-1 eSfax lapho ibibhekene khona neLibya, ayavela namagama abadlali abaziwayo kwiPSL kwabadle umhlanganiso ekuhlohlweni kwamagoli emidlalweni yokuhlunga.Lo mqhudelwano use-Egypt nje, kufanele ngabe udlalwa eCameroon kodwa ngenxa yezimpi zombangazwe wafudukela e-Egypt.UTau, obedlalela iMamelodi Sundowns kwiPSL, ugcine eshayele izwe lakhe amagoli amane kwangu-11 iBafana ewashayile eze yazibekisela indawo. Ngalesi sibalo uTau ubambane noMohamed Salah weLiverpool edlala kwi-English Premiership. Ubedlalela i-Egypt kweyokuhlunga.Owagqama kakhulu kwiKaizer Chiefs eminyakeni edlule, uKnowledge Musona ushayele izwe lakhe iZimbabwe amagoli amahlanu kweyokuhlunga. Uyena othathe indawo yesibili njengoba uTau egcine esendaweni yesithathu. UMusona ufinyelele emagolini amahlanu ngokushayela izwe lakhe elinye lamagoli elinqobe ngawo ngo 2-0 kwiCongo-Brazzaville.UFiston Adbul Razak waseBurundi, oke wadlala kwiSundowns uyena ogcine edle umhlanganiso ngokushaya amagoli ayisithupha kule midlalo yokuhlunga.
