Ubambane no-Odion Ighalo weNigeria oke wadlala nakwi-English Premiership.Ngaphandle kokushaywa kwala magoli, kuyacaca lapha ukuthi iPSL izinga layo liphezulu uma uqhathanisa namanye amaligi akhona e-Afrika ngoba akungatshazwa ukuthi iyona ezobe inabadlali abaningi kwi-Afcon. Lokhu kuzofakazelwa iZimbabwe ezibekisele indawo ngabadlali abagijima eNingizimu Afrika cishe bonke.Kulo mqhudelwano ozoqala ngoJuni 21 uze uphele ngoJulayi 19, zizoqhathwa eCairo, e-Egypt ngo-Ephreli 12.Esewonke amazwe azibekisele indawo kwi-Afcon ami kanje: Senegal, Madagascar, Morocco, Cameroon, Mali, Burundi, Algeria, Benin, Nigeria, Ghana, Kenya, Guinea, Ivory Coast, Angola, Mauritania, Tunisia, Egypt, Guinea Bissau, Namibia, Uganda, Tanzania, South Africa, Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) neZimbabwe.
title: Kugqame izinga labePSL emidlalweni yokuhlungela i-Afcon

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho eliwela umfula ugcwele bengicela ungiphe lesi sigatshana ke ngizwakalise ukungenami kwami mayelana nokwenziwa wuKhozi FM okuwumsakazo omkhulukazi e-Afrika jikelele nongowesibili emhlabeni ngezibalo zawo.Isikhalo sami silaphaya ophikweni lwezemidlalo, sicela abaphathi bomsakazo basiqashele abasakazi abasha kulaba balezi zinhlelo ezingena ihora nehora ngoba umuntu osayibambe kahle laphaya intokazi yakwaMachi okunguNolwazi.Nguyena muntu okuthi uma eyibambile umuzwe ukuthi uyayiphila le nto ayenzayo futhi nomdlandla usegazini umsebenzi wakhe.Nangu-ke umuntu engikhala ngaye u-Irvin Sihlophe (osesithombeni) ovele akulalise ungezwa nokuthi ubekhuluma ngani ashaye undendende ukubuya kwemboma echwebeni.Sicela abaphathi boKhozi basiqashele umsakazi ozolekelelana nale ntokazi yakoMachi bakithi kuleya ndawo engiyibalulile.Cha ngapha ngasohlelweni lwezemidlalo oluye lungene ngo-7 ebusuku noma kuyimpelasonto basayibambe kahle oVictor Molefe, Nolwazi noMhlonishwa Sibisi. Ibambeni kanjalo maqhawe oKhozi FM.Vusi Mzilikazi
title: Uyasilalisa uSihlophe woKhozi FM

text: UNOBHALA jikelele we-ANC omisiwe, uMnuz Ace Magashule, usekhethe ukuwufaka enkantolo umdonsiswano ophakathi kwakhe nesigungu esiphezulu saleli qembu, esimyalele ukuthi makaxolise ngencwadi ayibhala, ethi umisa uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa kwesobumengameli. UMagashule wubenqunyelwe ugwayi katiki, kwathiwa lingashoni elanamhlanje engaxolisile kwi-ANC, kuRamaphosa nakubantu bakuleli ngencwadi okuthiwa kayikho emthethweni. Kunokuthi axolise, uMagashule usekhethe ukuthatha elinye ugxathu ngokuphonsela inselelo ukumiswa kwakhe kwi-ANC, ngokunjalo nomgomo we-ANC wokuhoxiswa kwamalungu asezikhundleni, uma ebhekene namacala enkantolo. Ngokwamaphepha asenkantolo aqukethwe yi-Independent Media, udaba luzongena enkantolo ngoJuni 1 nonyaka. UMagashule ufuna ithathwe njengento engekho incwadi evela kwiphini lakhe, uNksz Jessie Duarte, ngokumiswa kwakhe nokuthi inkantolo ichithe umgomo wesigaba u-25.70 we-ANC. UMagashule wamiswa emsebenzini emuva kokuba kuphele umnqamulajuqu wezinsuku ezingu-30, ayezinikeziwe nabanye abaholi be-ANC, ababhekene namacala, ukuba bashenxe ezikhundleni abakuzo .UMagashule ubhekene necala lenkohlakalo, elithinta ithenda kaR230 million yokushintshwa kophahla lwezindlu ezifulelwe ngetsheboya eFree State. Ithenda yakhishwa ngesikhathi esengundunankulu kulesiya sifundazwe.
title: UMagashule akayingeni eyokuxolisa kuRamaphosa

text: UKUHLUKANA kwabazali ngezinye zezinto ezibalwa njengembangela yokuhlukumezeka kwezingane.Lokhu kushiwo uNkk Pearl Ramotsamayi ongumeluleki wemindeni esikhungweni iFamily And Marriage Society of South Africa (FAMSA), eThekwini.UNkk Ramotsamayi ubephawula ngalokhu njengoba elakuleli ligubha izinsuku ezingu-16 zomkhankaso wokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane nabesifazane, oqale ngoNovemba 25 ophela ngoDisemba 10.Ngokusho kwakhe, ukungezwani kwabazali okugcina ngokuthi baphoqeleke ukuthi bahlukanise, kuyazilimaza izingane emoyeni.Uthe ngesikhathi abazali besesezinhlelweni zokuhlukanisa, bavamise ukusebenzisa izingane ukulwa izimpi zabo.“Lokho kuholelela ekutheni kwande isizwe esigcwele inzondo, okuzokuthi kusasa naso sifune ukuziphindisela. Kumele abazali bazivikele izingane zabo,” kusho uNkk Ramotsamayi.Uthe izibazi ezihlala emphefumulweni womuntu zinzima, yingakho kumele zigwenywe ngayo yonke indlela.Nazi ezinye zezinto uNkk Ramotsamayi athi zingenziwa abazali ukuvikela izingane zabo uma sebethathe isinqumo sokuhlukanisa:* Kumele babahlalise phansi abantwana babachazele ngokwenzekayo, bangasho ukuthi bazozibonela bona ukuthi kwenzekani. Uthe akukhatheleki ukuthi bancane kangakanani, abachazelwe ngokwenzekayo.* Akumele izingane zizigxeke ngokuthi zaba nephutha ngokuhlukana kwabazali bazo, yingakho kumele abazali bazichazele ngaso sonke isimo ababhekene naso.* Akumele abazali balwe phambi kwezingane noma ngabe sebethathe isinqumo sokuhlukanisa.* Abazali abakufunde besahlukanisa ukuthi izingane zinelungelo lokuhlala kubona bobabili isikhathi esilinganayo.“Sinxusa abazali ukuthi bazisebenzise izikhungo zethu zokweluleka umphakathi kwezobudlelwano, ngoba isikhathi esiningi beza kithina sebevele benezinkinga,” kusho uNkk Ramotsamayi.Uthe ukuza kwabo sebenezinkinga, kuholela ekutheni bathathe izinqumo ezingaphusile.“Iningi labo liza kithina seliphoqwa yinkantolo kanti ukube baqale kithina izinto zingakonakali kakhulu, sisuke sisengakwazi ukuthi sizilungise isimo sibuyele kwesifanele,” kusho uNkk Ramotsamayi.Umeluleki wezingane ezihlukumezekile kwaChildline SA, uNksz Dumisile Nala uthe kubalulekile ukuthi abazali bahlale bebekaamalungelo ezingane phambili ukuze noma ngabe kwenzekani phakathi kwabo bazivikele.“Ukudivosa kwabazali kuhlala ngaso sonke isikhathi kunomthelela ongemuhle ezinganeni,’’ kusho uNksz Nala.Ezinye zezinto uNksz Nala athe abazali kumele bazichaze ezinganeni zabo uma besezinhlelweni zokuhlukanisa yilezi:Ukuhlela ukuthi njengabazali bazozenzenjani izingane zabo uma sebedivosile.Ngaso sonke isikhathi izingane zisuke zidinga ukunakekelwa abantu abadala, abazali mabangasebenzisi zona ezingxabanweni zabo.Uxwayise abazali ukuthi bapheze ukusebenzisa ithuba lokuxabana nokulwa ngesikhathi izingane sezilele.“Abazali bangazitshela ukuthi izingane zilele kanti zisuke zizwa futhi zibona yonke into eyenzekayo,” kusho uNksz Nala.
title: Asipholi isilonda sokuhlukana kwabazali

text: SABELO NSELEAMAPHOYISA akwaZulu-Natal alahlekelwa yizigidi zamaRandi ngenxa yamademeshe abangelwa wukuboshwa kwabantu ngokungekho emthethweni.Amaphoyisa akhokhe uR340 million eminyakeni emihlanu edlule.Ephendula umbuzo welungu le-IFP, uMnuz Blessed Gwala, uNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha, ukuThutha  nokuXhunyaniswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, uthe imali ikhokhwe phakathi kukaJanuary 2014  no-Okthoba 2019. Awu-13 416 amacala amademeshe ayekade evuliwe.UNtuli uthe kuningi abakwenzayo ukuzama ukwehlisa isibalo sabantu ababoshwa ngokungekho emthethweni.“Kunohlelo esinalo lokuhlola ukuphulwa komthetho emaphoyiseni. Sinohlelo lapho ukhomishana wamaphoyisa esifundazweni efundisa khona abuye abhale izincwadi azibhekise kumalungu ombutho wamaphoyisa.“Kukhona nohlelo olubhekene ngqo neziteshi zamaphoyisa lapho kunokuboshwa kwabantu ngendlela engekho emthethweni. Bathola izifundo zanyanga zonke.”UNtuli uthe baziphenyile zonke izenzo zokuboshwa kwabantu ngokungemthetho base bekhipha izexwayiso emaphoyiseni athintekayo.UGwala, okhulumela i-IFP kwezokuPhepha esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, uthe bakhathazekile ngemali enkulu ekhokhwe ngenxa yokuboshwa kwabantu ngokungekho emthethweni.“Ukubopha umuntu ngaphandle kwesizathu kuyicala kuleli zwe kepha amaphoyisa ayaqhubeka nokuyenza le nto. Kuyaxaka ukuthi amaphoyisa okufanele ngabe avikela izakhamuzi yiwo azihlukumezayo.”UGwala uthe nakuba bekuqonda ukuthi kwesinye isikhathi amaphoyisa abuye aphoqeleke ukuthi athathe izinqumo ngokuphuthuma ukulwa nobugebengu obuphezulu kepha kwesinye isikhathi kuba wubudedengu nokungenzi uphenyo olunzulu okwenza ukuthi kugcine kuboshwa abantu ngokungemthetho.“Kwesinye isikhathi inkinga kuba wukuthi amaphoyisa awaqeqeshiwe ngokwanele noma kube yikhona ukuthi awayilandeli imigomo.”Uthe uKhomishana wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant General Khombinkosi Jula, kuzofanele aqhamuke namaqhinga okulungisa inkinga.
title: Amademeshe kaR340m emaphoyiseni

text: KUBIKWA ukuthi ithathwe yisifo sikashukela indoda (77) yaseMiroram, e-India, ebisidume umhlaba wonke ngokuba nenqwaba yamakhosikazi nezingane. UMnuz Ziona Chana, obezigqaja ngesithembu sakhe, kuthiwa ubenamakhosikazi awu-38 nezingane eziwu-89. Kuthiwa lo wesilisa kuke kwaba khona unyaka lapho aganwa khona amakhosikazi awu-10 kanti waqalwa ukuganwa eneminyaka engu-17.UNgqongqoshe waseMizoram, uMnuz Zoramthanga, umemezele ukushona kukaChana ngesonto enkundleni yokuxhumana uTwitter. Uthe: “Siphuke izinhliziyo njengoba sivalelisa kuMnuz Chan okukholakala ukuthi unomndeni omkhulu umhlaba wonke,” kubeka uZoramthanga.Kuthiwa le ndawo yaseMizoram iphenduke indawo egcwala izivakashi zamanye amazwe bezobona lo mndeni.Umndeni kaChan kuthiwa uhlala esitezi esinamagumbi awu-100 kanti amakhosikazi akhe alala egunjini elikhulu eliseceleni kwelakhe.Kuthiwa uChan ubenesonto lakhe, iChana Pawl, elinamalungu awu-2 000 nokuyilona elivumela isithembu kule ndawo. Leli sonto, elingaphansi kwenkolo yobuKrestu, laqalwa nguyise ngo-1942.Usopolitiki wenhlangano, iCongress party, uMnuz Lal Thanhawla, uthe balahlekelwe kakhulu.“Kuningi esingakufunda emndenini wakhe,” kusho uThanhawla.UChan ushiye abazukulu abawu-33.
title: Ithathwe ushukela indoda ebinesithembu sabawu-38

text: UMGADLI weMamelodi Sundowns, uJeremy Brockie, ukholwa wukuthi nakuba engekho kuleli qembu omfakela ingcindezi ngokushaya amagoli kodwa sekufanele aqale ukwenza umsebenzi awuthengelwe eChloorkop.UBrockie usayine kwiSundowns esuka kwiSuperSport United ngenyanga edlule emuva kwesikhathi efunwa ngumqeqeshi, uPitso Mosimane. Ukufika kwakhe kujabulise ngisho umengameli uPatrice Motsepe.Nokho kuze kube yimanje uBrockie akakashayi nelokubika igoli kusukela esayine kwiSundowns. NgoLwesihlanu lo mgadli uphinde wehluleka “ukususa isikhwakhwalala” ngesikhathi iSundowns ikhipha iCape Town All Stars ngo 1-0 kwiNedbank Cup. Igoli lishaywe nguPercy Tau esiwombeni sesibili.UBrockie usashaye igoli elilodwa emidlalweni ye-Absa Premiership kule sizini. KwiCAF Confederation ubasele ayisishiyagalolunye.“Uma ufika eqenjini elisha uhlale ufisa ukuzinza ngokushesha, ushaye amagoli. Angiwatholanga amathuba amaningi sibhekene neCape Town City, ngiphoxekile ngebhola elishaye ipali sibhekene neChiefs. Kuyasondela kancane, kancane. Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi uma ngingashaya igoli azogeleza,” kusho uBrockie.“Ayikho ingcindezi engiyitholayo ethimbeni labaqeqeshi nabadlali. Bayazi ukuthi uma kwenzeka kuzokwenzeka. Kodwa ngilethwe lapha ukuzoshaya amagoli. Yilokho engikhokhelwa ukuthi ngikwenze. Ngifuna ukuqala ukuwashaya ngokushesha. Ngifisa manje ukungakhulumi ngokushaya elokuqala kodwa ngizibekele ukuthi mangakhi engifuna ukuwashiya enethini.“Ngicabanga ukuthi ukukhuluma eyomklomelo iGolden Boot ayisekho kodwa kule midlalo engu-10 esele, nakuba lokho kuncike emidlalweni engizoyidlala, nokho uma ngingashaya amagoli ayisikhombisa noma ayisishiyagalombili ngizobe ngikwenzile okungangami.”Emdlalweni olandelayo wePremiership, iSundowns izokwamukela iFree State Stars eLoftus Stadium ngoFebhuwari 21 eLoftus Versfeld, ePitoli.AmaBrazilians ahlezi phezulu kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-38 emuva kwemidlalo engu-20. Avule igebe lamaphuzu ayisihlanu phakathi kwawo ne-Orlando Pirates esendaweni yesibili ngawu-33.“Sikhulumile singabadlali ngokuthi sinethuba lokuwina izindebe eziyisithupha kulo nyaka, okukhona kuzoba neNedbank neligi. Sifuna ukuwina yonke imiqhudelwano esikuyona. Yilokho engikuthokozelayo ukuba kuleli qembu, lifuna ukuwina zonke izindebe. Kwesinye isikhathi lokho akwenzeki kodwa yilokho abafana abazimisele ngakho,” kusho uBrockie.
title: UBrockie ufuna ukwenza akuzele eChloorkop ngale kwengcindezi

text: UPORTIA Modise, owayegijima kwiBanyana Banyana, ufisa ukubona abadlali bamanje behlomula ngaphezu kwabekelwe kona uma benqoba i-Africa Women’s Cup of Nations (AWCON).IBanyana izobhekana neNigeria kowamanqamu kusasa ngo- 6 ntambama e-Accra Sports Stadium, eGhana.ISafa nabaxhasi iSasol bathembisa abadlali u-R160 000 ngamunye uma beyiphakamisa indebe. Ukuqeda endaweni yesibili kuzobahlomulisa ngo-R75 000 emunye.UModise akakaze akufihle ukungenami kwakhe ngokunganikezwa imihlomulo efanele kwabadlali beBanyana. Isikhathi esiningi banikezwa u-R5000 ngokuba seqenjini lesizwe.Ngokungena kowamanqamu iBanyana iqophe umlando ngokuzibekisela indawo okokuqala kwiNdebe yoMhlaba eseFrance ngonyaka ozayo.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngokwenziwe amantombazane. Ngiyawahalalisela ngoba lokhu akwenzile kuzoshintsha indlela okubukwa ngayo ibhola labesifazane eNingizimu Afrika. Ngibafisela inhlanhla kowamanqamu babuye nalo igolide,” kusho uModise.Uthe ukholwa wukuthi lokhu kuzobavulela amathuba okudlala namazwe ase-Europe uma sekulungiselelwa iNdebe yoMhlaba.Ebuzwa ngemali abazoyithola, uthe: “Ngikholwa wukuthi isencane. Uma nje beyiphakamisa indebe bafanelwe engaphezulu. Laba badlali bafanelwe wukunakekelwa abangakaze bakubone uma sebebuya. Kumele bathi noma behamba emgwaqweni nabo baziqhenye ngabakuzuzile.”Omunye walabo badlali uRefiloe Jane uzobe engekho iBanyana isitheleka esikhumulweni sezindiza, e-OR Tambo eGoli ngeSonto ntambama.UJane uzophuthwa nawumdlalo wamanqamu kusasa ngenxa yokuthi kudingeke abuyele eqenjini lakhe iCrenberra United yase-Australia. Uyijoyine ngo-Okthoba kodwa wayishiya phakathi imidlalo yeligi iqhubeka.“Ngiyafisa ukuba lapha (kowamanqamu) kodwa futhi kumele ngiyofeza elinye iphupho lami lokudlala phesheya. Ngiyabonga kwithimba ngokungidedela nakwiCrenberra ngokungivumela ngize lapha,” kusho uJane.Emdlalweni ozokhipha iqembu lase-Afrika elizojoyina iNigeria neNingizimu Afrika ngonyaka ozayo, kuzotholana phezulu iMali neCameroon namuhla ntambama. Womabili ahlulwe kweyandulela eyamanqamu.
title: UModise akenele ngemihlomulo yabeBanyana

text: UKUVALWA kwemcimbi nezinto ezimfakela imali kumenze wazama amanye amathuba azomenza akwazi ukuziphilisa usaziwayo osedayisa amaqanda. UZodwa Wabantu useqale ukudayisa amaqanda nolamthuthu ukuziphilisa. Uvuka njalo ekuseni njengabantu abasebenzayo ayodayisa amaqanda ezindaweni ezahlukene eGoli. Lokhu kuchaza abantu abaningi njengoba bebonakala beqhamuka ezindaweni ezahlukene bemeseka ngokuthenga amaqanda.Abapheki bezindawo zokudla ezahlukene nabo bakhombise okukhulu ukumeseka uZodwa Wabantu ngaleli bhizinisi lakhe. Iningi lalaba bapheki libonakala lithenga amaqanda ngamabili nangaphezulu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bamnikeza inzuzo ethexaxa. UZodwa Wabantu ubukeka naye elithakasela kakhulu leli bhizinisi nangendlela awaphatha ngayo amakhasimende kulama video awasabalalisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ebonga kubantu.Osaziwayo nabo bakhombise okukhulu ukumeseka okubalwa uKelly Khumalo okewabonakala elande olamthuthu ababili, uNtando Duma noDineo Ranaka bezothenga amaqanda nabanye abasaqhubeka nokuthenga. Kukhona nowesifazane ovele waqopha umlando ethenga amaqanda ka-R3000 eyedwa.
title: Useziphilisa ngamaqanda uZodwa

text: KUPHUME isidumbu izelamani zasePhoenix, eThekwini zibanga ukuwasha izitsha ngeledlule.UMnuz Nkanyiso Fakude (21) kuthiwa uhoshe ummese ezitsheni wabhokoda umfowabo omdala uMnuz Sifiso Fakude (26) ehlombe ngemuva kwengxabano evuthayo ekhishini.Kuthiwa uSifiso ube esembhozomela emshaya kwaze kwangenelela namakholwa ePrince of Peace Ministries ahlala kulo muzi. Kuthiwa amakholwa amabili esilisa yiwo alekelele uSifiso ukuthi abophe umfowabo izandla nezinyawo ukuze bamshaye kahle esefakwe esakeni.UNkanyiso okuthiwa ushaywe wanaba, ushonele esibhedlela iMahatma Gandhi ngemuva kokuphuthunyiswa khona.USifiso nasolwa nabo okungo-Ayanda Dazela (27) noThabiso Tenza (24) bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam ngoLwesithathu bakhishwa ngebheyili kaR1 500 umuntu emunye.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uqinisekise ukuthi abasolwa abathathu okubalwa nomfowabo kamufi bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi eVerulam ngoLwesithathu ngecala lokubulala.“Bakhishwe ngebheyili kaR1 500 umuntu emunye. Icala lihlehliselwe * -Okthoba 30 ukuze kuqhutshekwe nophenyo,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Ngokusho kukanina kamufi, uNkk Nomusa Fakude (46) ushayelwe ucingo nguSifiso emtshela ukuthi usegwazwe wumfowabo.“Ngisuke lapho ebengikhona ngaphuthuma ekhaya. Ngihlangane noSifiso nomsolwa wokuqala endleleni. Ungitshele ukuthi bekunengxabano phakathi kwabo besekhishini, uNkanyiso wadonsa ummese wamgwaza. Ngithukile saya kwadokotela kodwa wangasizakala, saya esibhedlela eGandhi. Angizange ngisabuza ukuthi uphi uNkanyiso, nabo bangasho ukuthi usele ekhaya ulimele,” kusho uNkk Fakude.Uthe uzwe eseshayelwa ucingo etshelwa ukuthi akaphuthume azolanda uNkanyiso akasaphefumuli, balimazene nomfowabo.“Ngenhlanhla kufike abanye abazalwane bamphuthumisa esibhedlela la ebesikhona. Ufike elimele kakhulu enengozi ekhanda nasemlenzeni engakwazi nokuhamba. USifiso uboshelwe esibhedlela, laba abanye bazinikela emaphoyiseni,” kusho uNkk Fakude.Uthe ngo-2016 waze wahamba kwakhe ecasulwa yile nto yabazalwane abahlala kwakhe, kanti nomufi ubengayizwa eyokuhlala kwabazalwane kubo ngoba kuhlakaze umndeni.Uqhube wathi ukube bebengekho laba bazalwane izingane zakhe bezingeke zixabane kuze kuphume isidumbu.Uthe yize indodana yakhe izisola ngesenzo sayo kodwa ngeke alisule icala, uzoyekelela umthetho udlale indima yawo.Uyise kamufi, uMfundisi Sipho Fakude, wale waphetha ukuphawula ngalolu daba.Uthe ukhona uNkulunkulu abika kuye izinkinga zakhe.
title: Isidumbu izelamani zibanga ukuwasha izitsha

text: ZIZOTHOLA izitatimende zemiphumela yokuhlolwa izitshudeni ezikweleta amanyuvesi kodwa izitifiketi zizobanjwa.Lokhu kushiwo nguNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme uNkk Naledi Pandor, othe kuyilungelo lazo zonke izitshudeni ukuthi zithole izitatimende zazo.UNkk Pandor uthe uxoxile nomkhandlu olawula amanyuvesi ngalolu daba.“Izikhungo zizibophezele ekutheni zizozinika izitshudeni izitatimende zokuthi zenze kanjani noma kuthiwa ziyakweleta. Izitshudeni zinelungelo lokuthi zazi ukuthi zenze kanjani ukuze zikwazi ukuthola imisebenzi,” kusho uNkk Pandor.Ezikhungweni eziningi izitshudeni zihlale ziteleka zikhala ngokuthi azikwazi ukuthola imisebenzi ngoba zisuke zibanjelwe imiphumela yazo.Zihlale zinxusa ukuthi okungenani uma zinikwa izitatimende kubanjwe iziqu lokhu kungasiza ngoba zizokwazi ukuthola imisebenzi.UNkk Pandor uthe akekho okumele angabhalisi uma exhaswe yisikhwama iNational Students’ Financial Aid Scheme ngoba kuthiwa uyakweleta.“Ngikhathazekile ngabenza unyaka wokugcina okungenzeka ukuthi abavunyelwe ukubhalisa ngoba benesikweletu esidala. Ngiyalele umnyango ukuthi usebenzisane nezikhungo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi izitshudeni zibhalise ukuze ziphothule izifundo zazo.”Uthe abakwazi okwamanje ukuthi bangaxazulula indaba yezikweletu zezitshudeni ngoba basagxile kwabahlwempu.“Sakha umgomo wokuthi kube nesikalo esizobizwa yizikhungo zemfundo kusuka ngo-2020. Sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi akubizi kakhulu ukufunda. Kulo nyaka sibeke uR30.8 billion ukusiza abaxhaswe yiNSFAS emanyuvesi nasemakolishi,” kusho uNkk Pandor.Uthe zonke izitshudeni ezixhaswe yiNSFAS zizothola uR5 000 okuyimali yokuthenga izinsiza kufunda.“KunoR154 million okusamele ukhishwe yiSBux uye kwizitshudeni. INSFAS ithungatha abangakayitholi le mali kanti siyacela labo abaziyo ukuthi kumele bathole le mali bashayele iNSFAS.”Uthe kubekwe uR10 million wokwenza ucwaningo besebenzisana nezitshudeni kanjalo nabaphathi bamanyuvesi ukubheka indaba yengqalasizinda yezokuphepha ezikhungweni kanjalo nezikhungo zezempilo ezikhungweni.Mayelana nezindawo zokuhlala ezihlale zitelekelwa yizitshudeni, uthe babeke uR4.1 billion kuze kube ngunyaka wezimali * -2020/21 wokwakha lezi zindawo.“Sakha ingqalasizinda ezohlomulisa izitshudeni ezingu-200 000 eminyakeni engu-10 ezayo. Eminyakeni emithathu ezayo sizohlinzeka ngemibhede engu-18 222.”
title: Zizonikwa imiphumela izitshudeni ezikweleta izikhungo

text: AZOVELA namuhla eNkantolo yeMantshi eGluckstadt amadoda ayisikhombisaaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-20 no-32 aboshelwe icala lokubulala.Lawa madoda aboshwe ngeSonto, emuva kwamahora ambalwa kubulawe indoda okuthiwa idutshuliwe.Okhulumelaamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe kuvele ukuthi umnikazi wezinkomo namanye amadoda aye komunye umuzi wenye indoda kule ndawo ngoba eyisola ngokweba izinkomo.Kuthiwa leli qulu lamadoda lithe selingena emzini wale ndoda abebeyisola lavele lahlaselwa ladutshulwa.Omunye walawa madoda uMnuz Fanana Masondo (32) udubulekile washona.Iqulu lamadodaebelifuna izinkomo kuthiwa libalekile emuva kokudutshulwa.Kuvulwe icala lokubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa eGluckstadt.Amaphoyisakuthiwa asheshe afikalapho kube nokudubula khona abophe abasolwa abayisikhombisa.
title: Bazovela abalisa abasolwa kwelokubulala

text: KUTHELE izithelo okwenziwa wumphakathi wakwa-Q eMlaza uvula izindlu zawo uzivulela abafundi baseShumayela High ababelala kuzona uma befunda. Lesi sikole sikweziklonyelisiwe ngokusuka ku-52% saya ku-83% kwa-matric sathola no-100% kwiSayensi.Lesi sikole siziqwaqwade zonke emakhanda eMlaza kwiSayensi sahlonishwa yiMangosuthu University of Technology (MUT) emcimbini obuseCoastlands Hotel, eThekwini, kuleli sonto.Uthishanhloko uNkk Nonhlanhla Adams, uthe ufike kulesi sikole ekupheleni kuka-2014 wathi emlandweni waso sasingakaze sithole ngaphezulu kuka-60% kwa-matric.Uthe ufike wasebenzisana nothisha bafundisa kwaze kwashaya * -10 ebusuku.“Umphakathi ohlala eduze nesikole wavula izindlu zawo walalisa abafundi abasuka kude ukuze bangagcwelezwa ebusuku. Selokhu siqalile ukufundisa ebusuku akukaze kubikwe lutho olubi ngoba umphakathi uyabagada abafundi. Singena ekuseni siphume ntambama okuyinto esisize kakhulu sathola imiphumela emihle,” kusho uNkk Adams.Ubonge othisha abasebenza ngokuzikhandla badela imindeni ngoba befuna imiphumela emihle.IMenzi High iqhubeke la igcine khona ngokuhamba phambili ezikoleni zakuleli lokishi.Ihambe phambili kwiMaths ne-Accounting kwathi uMlazi Comtech wahlonishwa ngokukhiqiza umfundi owaphasa kahle kwiMaths neSayensi.Uthishanhloko waseMenzi, uNkk Muntu Ntombela, uthe nakuba bengawutholanga * -10% wamaBachelors kodwa basamile ekutholeni * -100% kwa-matric.Uthishanhloko omusha waseVelabahleke High, uMnuz Bheki Mhlongo, uthe akushintshe lutho basaqhubeka lapho kwagcina khona ingqalabutho uMnuz Mbongeni Mtshali osathatha umhlalaphansi. Uthe bazimisele ngokuthola * -100% njengoba nyakenye bethole * -98.6%.“Le miphumela akuyona eyami ngoba ngiyafika kodwa ekathishanhloko obebambile. Sisayibambile nje kusangenwa ekuseni kuphunywe ntambama ngoba sisiza abafundi abangasitholi isikhathi sokwenza ama-homework emakhaya. Abanye bahlala emjondolo abanye abakwazi ukufunda ngoba basuke bethunywa emakhaya,” kusho uMhlongo.UMqondisi wesifunda uMlazi, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, uncome othisha bakulesi sifunda wathi basebenza kanzima. Uthe kwesinye isikhathi abanconywa ngokwanele njengoba bezinikela bephucula imiphumela.“Uma kunyuka imiphumela yaseMlaza kunyuka neyesifundazwe. Siyabancoma kakhulu ngomsebenzi omuhle abawenzayo nsuku zonke bezinikela bengakhokhelwa ngalokho,” kusho uNtuli.UNkk Zama Sishi, onguMqondisi weStakeholder Relations Management, uthe banezinhlelo zokufaka nezikole zamabanga aphansi kule miklomelo.Uthe kunezinhlelo eziqhubekayo zalezi zikole njengokuthi kuthathwa abafundi bamantombazane bayiswe eGoli bafakwe ugqozi lokwenza iSayensi.“Sihlela ukufaka izicelo esikoleni sika-Oprah (Winfrey) ukuze abafundi bamantombazane bayofunda khona.”
title: Izithelo ezikoleni ezizikhandlile

text: BAZOFAKWA ohlelweni loMnyango wezeMfundo lokuhlunyeleliswa kwezimilo abafundi abane abaxoshelwe izidakamizwa esikoleni eMariannhill, eThekwini.Laba bafundi baseSt Francis College bayingxenye yabangu-13 abebemiselwe ukungaziphathi kahle.Abane kubona kuthiwa babhekene namacala abucayi okubalwa nathinta izidakamizwa. NgoLwesithathu uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, ukhiphe isitatimende ecacisa ngokuzokwenzeka kubona. Uveze ukuthi bebemiselwe ukuphambana nomthetho wesikole nokungaziphathi kahle muva nje.Ukuqinisekisile ukuthi emuva kokungenelela komnyango, banqume ukuthi babuyisele esikoleni abayisishiyagalolunye.Yize lesi kuyisikole esizimele, uMshengu uthe ubone kufanele bangenelele ukuxazulula lolu daba.“Emuva kwezingxoxo ezijulile nesikole sivumelene ukuthi abafundi abayisishiyagalolunye babuyiselwe esikoleni. Okwamanje laba abanye sizobafaka ezinhlelweni zokubasiza ukuthi bahlunyeleliswe izimilo. Ezinye zalezi zinhlelo kubalwa nokubathumela ekhempini ehlelwe wumbutho wezempi wakuleli, esizoba nayo esifundazweni.”UMshengu uthe bakholelwa wukuthi awukho umgqomo wokulahla umuntu, ikakhulukazi izingane athe ziyadinga ukunikwa elinye ithuba empilweni.Uthe ukholwa wukuthi njengomnyango wezemfundo kuyadingeka ukuthi bangenelele kuzo zonke izindaba ezithinta izikole noma ngabe kuthinteka isikole esizimele.“Inhloso yethu wukubuyisa isithunzi nokuthula emphakathini. Izikole ziyindawo yokwakha umuntu nokufundisa ukuziphatha yingakho kumele sizisukumele izindaba ezithinta izikole.”Okhulumela uMnyango KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe akekho umfundi obenza * -matric kulabo abebemisiwe.Uthe iningi labo benza uGrade 11 namabanga angaphansi kunalokho.Echaza ngalaba abane, uthe abanye bebenamacala athinta ukusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa, yingakho bengakazobuyela esikoleni.“Sibone ukuthi ngeke kulunge bavele bavunyelwe ukubuyela isikoleni. Bathinteka emacaleni abucayi, okumele bajeze ukuze bathole isifundo. Sibahlelele izindlela zokubahlumelelisa ukuze basizakale ngaphambi kokuthi babuyiselwe esikoleni,” kusho uMahlambi.Uthe akakwazi ukusho ukuthi bazobuyela nini esikoleni.Laba bafundi besilisa kukhona nabaneminyaka engu-16 no-17.Akuqali ukuthi umnyango ungenelele ukuxazulula udaba oluthinta izikole ezizimele KwaZulu-Natal.Uke wangenelela nasodabeni lokucwasa ngobuhlanga esikoleni samabanga aphezulu eMgungundlovungo-2017.
title: Ungqongqoshe usukumele olwabaseSt Francis College

text: ISIHLABANI somculo kamaskandi sithi sesidla imbuya ngothi ngemuva kokudliwa kwamandla aso yinkampani ebesiqopha kuyo.UMroza Fakude, wodumo lwengoma esihloko sithi Elamanqamu Namhlanje (Siyobulal’uVan Damme) usola iMabala Noise ngokumxhaphaza maqede yamlaxaza engasenalutho.“Bengilokhu ngithule kodwa akusangisizi ngalutho ukuthula ekubeni ngihlupheka.”UMroza (osesithombeni)uthe yinqwaba yabantu ethi uma imbona izitshele ukuthi unetshe lemali ngemuva kokuba ingoma yakhe yahlukanisa unyaka.“Abazi ukuthi angisenalutho. Abazi ukuthi ngagcina ngoR250 000 nemoto kuphela. Imali yama-downloads, eyama-caller tunes, eyokudayiswa kweCD yami kaVan Damme nethi Kuyopholela Ethunjini neyama-royalties (okuyimali oyithola kwaSamro ngokudlalwa kwengoma yakho emsakazweni) angikaze ngiyithole. Ngikhuluma nje nezindondo engaklonyeliswa ngazo ngokungena kwiTop 10 nokuphuma phambili angikaze ngazithola. Ngagcina kuphela ngokushutha nazo.”Uthe usezame kaningi ukuxhumana nezikhulu ebezimphethe kwiMabala Noise kodwa zonke zithi azisahlanganise lutho nale nkampani. “Zithi angithinte uReggie Nkabinde. Uma ngimthinta uReggie akasazibambi izingcingo zami futhi usengibhlokhile. Angisazi ukuthi ngenzenjani.”Nemibiko yokuthi ngiyagula yangilimaza kakhulu njengoba kusenabahleli bemicimbi abangasangiqashi ngoba bethi ngisagula. UMroza ukhuluma ngemibiko eyake yasabalala nezwe lonke yokuthi usephambane ikhanda. Akayiphikisi kodwa uthi useluleme ngokugcwele.“Kuhluleka ngisho ngibachazela ukuthi sengiwumqemane kodwa abanginaki. Kufanele ngabe ngise-studio ngiqopha iCD elandelayo kodwa nginenkinga ngenxa yokuthi angazi kwenzekani. Sengifuna abantu abazongisiza ukuze ngiqhubeke nekhono lami futhi ngikwazi ukondla umndeni wami,” kusho uMroza obezwakala ukuthi ukhathazekile.Uthe usefisa ngabe akawuwinanga umklomelo wengoma yonyaka ngoba wambizela izinkinga. Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engatholakali uNkabinde, kuhluleke ngisho ethunyelwa imiyalezo.
title: Sesidla imbuya ngothi isihlabani esinguMroza

text: UVUSELELE inkontileka yakhe kwiBidvest Wits umqeqeshi waleli qembu uGavin Hunt. Izindaba zizwakale ngaye uHunt.Inkontileka kaHunt neClever Boys ibiphela ngoJuni. Lo mqeqeshi ufike kwiWits ngo-2013 esuka kwiSuperSport United.KwiClever Boys usenqobe izicoco ezintathu. Uhlabane ngesicoco se-Absa Premiership, MTN 8 neseTelkom Knockout.“Ngiyahlala kwiWits, inkontileka yami ngiyivuselele. Sekunezinyanga ngiyivuselele. Ngeke ngisho ukuthi ngiyivuselele ngeminyaka emingaki kodwa ngiyivuselele,” kusho uHunt.Kule sizini esanda kusongwa ezikaHunt azenzanga kahle. Ziqede ngaphandle kweTop 8 yize zikwazile ukunqoba isicoco seTelkom Knockout.“Kube yisizini embi kithina. Ngesizini ezayo kumele sibuye ngamandla. Njengawo wonke amaqembu sizongena emakethe ukuze siqinise iqembu,” kusho uHunt.Lolu qweqwe lomqeqeshi seluzakhele igama ngokudla izicoco lapho lufika khona. KwiSuperSport wanqoba izicoco ezintathu zeligi neseNedbank.Njengamanje uHunt uphethe irekhodi lokudla izicoco eziningi nezingwazi ezifana noTed Dumitru ongasekho emhlabeni noGordon Igesund. Bobathathu bashaya ngezicoco ezine zeligi abazinqobe emaqenjini ahlukene.“Ziningi izinto ezibe nomthelela ekutheni singabi nesizini enhle. Sizolwa nokuzilungisa. Ngicabanga ukuthi nokungabi yingxenye yamaqembu azobe egijima emiqhudelwaneni yeCAF kuzosinika ithuba lokuthi sigxile emidlalweni yasekhaya,” kusho uHunt.UHunt useke waqokwa amahlandla amane njengomqeqeshi ovelele kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL). Eminyakeni eyedlule uke wamataniswa neKaizer Chiefs engenaye umqeqeshi kodwa ukuvuselela kwakhe inkontileka kucacise ukuthi ngeke abonakale kuMakhosi.ULuc Eymael weFree State Stars ukhona ohlwini lwabaqeqeshi abaxoxa neChiefs.
title: UHunt uvuselele inkontileka kwiClever Boys

text: LUGCINE lugobile uphondo kubaphathi beMaritzburg United banika uFadlu Davids isikhundla sokuqeqesha iqembu ngokugcwele ngesizini ka-2017/2018.Emuva kwesikhathi usihlalo weTeam of Choice, uFarouk Kadodia, engaphumeli obala ngomqeqeshi ozohola iqembu, kuvele ukuthi usethathe isinqumo sokuthi kuqhubeke uDavids ofake iqembu kuMTN8.UDavids ubanjiswe isikhundla sokuqeqesha iMaritzburg emuva kokushiya kuka-Ernst Middendorp abeyiphini lakhe. Uze wagudluzwa sekuqashwe uRoger De Sa engakaze ahlulwe njengomqeqeshi. Emuva kokuhamba kukaDe Sa, uDavids ubuyiselwe esikhundleni kwaze kwaphela isizini. Izikhulu zeMaritzburg bezilokhu zingena ezintangeni ngokumnika isikhundla, zizeseka ngokuthi uyena ozibona engakakulungele ukuqeqesha ku-Absa Premiership. Ngakolunye uhlangothi bekuvela ukuthi yizikhulu ebezingazimisele ukumnika umsebenzi ngokugcwele ngoba zikholelwa wukuthi akakaqini ukhakhayi.Nokho izolo, umthombo weSolezwe uveze ukuthi uDavids useqashwe ngokugcwele eqenjini.“UFadlu uyena ozoqeqesha iqembu ngesizini ezayo. Ungifonelile. Nakuba engalimisanga ngesihloko elokuthi usesayinile kodwa usevele ukhuluma ngesizini esizoyiqala. Indlela abekade ekhuluma ngayo ingenze ngathola isiqiniseko sokuthi sizoqhubeka naye ngesizini ezayo,” kusho umthombo.UKadodia utshele uthe ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2016/2017 bazomemezela umqeqeshi omusha ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini ka-2017/2018. IMaritzburg izovula ngoJuni 27 lapho kulindeleke ukuthi babuye bonke abadlali ukuzolungiselela ukuqala kwesizini. Kungenzeka iqale isizini entsha ngaphandle kuka-Evans Rusike waseZimbabwe ofunwa yiKaizer Chiefs nelinye iqembu laphesheya kwezilwandle noThemba Shabalala ophelelwa yinkontileka ekupheleni kwenyanga.IMaritzburg izoba nomcimbi wokuklomelisa abadlali abenze kahle ngesizini edlule lapho kulindeleke ukuthi ukaputeni, uKurt Lentjies, azitamuzele khona. Izovula isizini ngomdlalo weMTN8 neMamelodi Sundowns.Izolo, uKadodia uthe: “Sizomemezela ngoJuni 27, uma selibuya iqembu, ukuthi ngubani umqeqeshi. Akufanele sijahe kodwa sidinga isinqumo esifanele. Ebholeni kuthule, bonke abantu izinto bazishayela phansi.”
title: UDavids uzoqeqesha i-United ngokugcwele

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAUKHALA ngokungawubambi umgqigqo owodwa kwabadlali bakhe umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uSteve Komphela, obephawula ngemuva kokuthi ezakhe zihlulekile wukunqoba iChippa United emdlalweni wazo wokuvula we-Absa Premiership.IChiefs ibambane ngo 0-0 ne-Chillie Boys eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ngempelasonto. UKomphela obebonakala edangele ngemuva komdlalo uveze ukungagculiseki ngokuhluleka kweqembu ukugqobhoza iChippa yize idlale sonke isiwombe sesibili ingasaphelele.Lo mqeqeshi akachazekanga ngokuthi kuthiwe umdlalo ubuheha mhlawumbe obekungenzeka ukuthi ukusho ngoba ubengalindele ukuthi iChippa ingabathwalisa ubunzima.“Asikwenzanga obekulindelekile kithina. Siyakwazi esingakwenza. Sifuna ukuba nomgqigqo owodwa endleleni esidlala ngayo. Uma kuwukuthi bekuwumdlalo ohehayo, hhayi kusho ukuthi kumele ngiyowubuka kahle ngaphandle kokufaka imizwa.“Uma iChiefs ifuna ukudlala kumele ibe nomgqigqo owodwa. Bekunesikhathi lapho besiwulawula khona umdlalo kodwa sabuye safadalala. Angazi noma ngingakwazi yini ukwamukela iphuzu, ngokwami besingenza kangcono kabi. Ngibatshelile ukuthi uma iqembu lingaphelele liyawukhuphula umfutho kodwa thina besidlala amabhola amade ebhokisini labo bebe benabadlali ababili abade u(James) Okwuosa noDaylan (Hawes). Bekumele silibeke phansi ibhola,” kusho uKomphela obenganeme neze ngesikhathi ephawula ngomdlalo kuSuperSport.NgeSonto iChiefs izovakashela iBloemfontein Celtic eFree State Stadium emdlalweni womlenze wokuqala we-semi final yeMTN 8. IChiefs iyona evikela isicoco salo mqhudelwano esinqobe ngesizini edlule. Izobe isiyamukela iFree State Stars emdlalweni weligi ngo-Agasti 22 eFNB Stadium.UKomphela uthe kuhle ukuthi abazange bangenelwe yigoli kwazise emdlalweni odlule badedela amathathu bedlala neMaritzburg United.“U(Itumeleng) Khune usizile naye evimba amabhola amabili amabi kodwa uma kuziwa ekuhlaseleni bekumele silishaye igoli, bengizobe sengiyabona ukuthi kukhona lapho esiya khona. Zikhona izindawo engizibonile okumele sizilungise kodwa engingeke ngizidalule emphakathini. Kuzomele siwucubungule kahle lo mdlalo ukuze sikwazi ukuchaza ukuthi sihlulwe kanjani ngoba sifuna ukuwina yonke imidlalo,” kusho uKomphela.
title: UKomphela udumele ngomphumela waMakhosi

text: UMGADLI weBafana Bafana, uDino Ndlovu, uphoxeke ngosuku lokugcina lwesizini sekucaca ukuthi bazodinga enye isizini ukuze bakhushulelwe esigabeni esikhulu. UNdlovu, weZhejiang Greentown, eChina, egcine ilale isithathu kwi-log uqede isizini enamagoli eligi awu-19 emidlalweni ewu-24.Nalapho lo mgadli ubizelwe kwiBafana ezodudulana neNigeria eFNB Stadium emasontweni amabili ezayo kweyokuhlungela i-Afcon ezoba seCameroon ngonyaka ozayo. Ukhale ngaphansi esicathulweni segolide kwazise sigoduke noMary John waseCameroon yena oshaye amagoli awu-24.Umthetho umile eChina ukuthi amaqembu amabili aqede ephezulu akhushulelwa esigabeni esikhulu. Emasontweni ayisikhombisa adlule ezikaDino bezihleli endaweni yesibili. Lokhu kusho ukuthi bezidinga ukugwema ukuhlulwa kuphela ngosuku lokugcina ukuze zingene lapho kunoju khona. Ngebhadi lalo mgadli weBafana, iqembu lakhe lishaywe ngo 2-1 yiMeizhou Hakka esendaweni yesishiyagalolunye.Kwenzeka konke lokhu ngosuku lokugcina nje, iShenzhen (ebisendaweni yesithathu) inqobe ngo 5-0 kwiZhejiang Yitego okubenze beqa iGreenton egcine iphelele endaweni yesithathu.Zimbi lezi zindaba kuDino kodwa uzakwabo kwiBafana, uLebohang Mothiba, uphinde wakwenza lokho elibeka enethini ngesikhathi iStrasbourg ibambana ngo 1-1 neToulouse. Kuyona le ligi enabadlali abaningi beBafana kodwa abanye abalimele, uLebohang Phiri akazange asetshenziswe kwiGuingamp enenebulwe yiNantes ngo 5-0.Ubedlala uThulani Serero kwiVitesse ekhale ngaphansi ngo 1-0 kwiPSV. Lo mdlalo iVitesse iwudlale cishe wonke ingaphelele ngenxa yekhadi elibomvu. EBelgium, uPercy Tau uqale umdlalo wakhe wesishiyagalolunye weligi kwi-Union Saint Gilloise, edinge ukuthi ize ilinganise ngomzuzu ka-92 ibambana ngo 1-1 neLommel.USiphiwe Tshabalala ufakwe sekusele imizuzu ewu-17 ukuthi umdlalo uphele phakathi kwezakhe i-Erzurumspor ne-Akhisarspor. Namanje ezikaTshabalala yizona ezisabambe ibhuleki kwi-log yaseTurkey.
title: UDino Ndlovu uphoxeke ngosuku lokugcina lwesizini eChina

text: USiya B ugxekiwe ngabalandeli bakhe ngemuva kokuphumela obala ngokuzwelana noZuma ngamacala abekwe wona.Kuleli sonto uZuma uvele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ngamacala enkohlakalo, ukukhwabanisa nokushintshisana ngemali.USiya B uthe akukhathaleki ukuthi umuntu weseka liphi iqembu nokuthi uzizwa kanjani ngeqembu elibusayo i-ANC kodwa uyacabanga ukuthi umuntu omnyama wakuleli uzibona ubuyena kuZuma.“Sekwa-nele madoda, hhayi ngeke! Sekuyazwela nakimi,” kusho uSiya B.Uthe iningi labantu likhule lihlupheka emakhaya nasemalokishini kodwa akekho obuqondayo ubunzima uZuma adlule kubo. Ukhale ngokuthi okwenziwa kuZuma akukhombisi ubuntu lokhu okuhlale kushunyayezwa.Uthe akakaze ayibone indoda esike yashushiswa ukudlula uZuma.Utuse ubuqhawe bukaZuma wathi bambalwa abantu abangamelana nokudicilelwa kwesithunzi sabo njengaye.Uphinde wancoma uZuma ngokukwazi ukumelana nemibiko yabezindaba athe ungufakazi wokuthi bayakwazi ukwenza umuntu azizwe engelutho.Ugcizelele ukuthi kubo bonke omengameli abamnyama bakuleli akekho noyedwa oseke washaywa, wagxekwa njengoZuma.Abalandeli bakaSiya B bamsole ngokuzama ukuzincengela kuZuma. Abanye bamgxekile ngokweseka umuntu osolwa ngamacala enkohlakalo, bathi akayekele umthetho udlale indima yawo.Emuva kokutinyelwa abantu uSiya B kunezinsolo zokuthi ugcine eselisusile ikhasi lakhe ku-Instagram njengoba ligcine selingasaveli.
title: USiya B uziqhathe nabalandeli ekhalela uZuma

text: UMENGAMELI we-IFP Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi uthi kumphatha kabi ukubona abaculi bentshontsha umculo wabanye abaculi bawenze owabo.Ekhuluma ngeqhaza likanina uMntwana uMagogo emculweni wakuleli ngesikhathi kade kunesifundo ngaye e-UKZN ngoMgqibelo, uButhelezi uchaze unina njengeciko elalinekhono elalikwazi ukucula iminxa eminingi yomculo.UButhelezi ubekhuluma emcimbini obuhanjelwe amacilko ehlukene.Uthe enye into emphatha kabi ukuzwa abantu becula amaculo ngendlela okungafanele aculwe ngayo.“Muva nje bekunemicimbi yokukhumbula Isilo uCetshwayo, emcimbini owawuhanjelwe Isilo nabantwana baseNdlunkulu, amalungu ebutho acula iculo elinomlando ngeSilo uDinizulu ngendlela engafanele, kwakukhona nezivakashi ezazivela e-United Kingdom, angizange ngifune ukuliphoxa ibutho ngokuveza ukuthi le nto eliyiculayo ayikho, kodwa kwisikhumbuzo sempi yaseSandlwana ngalitshela ibutho ukuthi aliliculanga kahle iculo elaliculwa ngumama, ngasho ukuthi lokho kungiphatha kabi,” kusho uButhelezi.Uthe unina wayekwazi ukuhlabelela nokucula uhlobo oluningi lomculo kubalwa owokholo nosambhaqanga.“Ubekwazi ngisho ukubongela amakhosi, encintisana nezinyosi zesilisa uma kuhashwa amakhosi kuze kugcine kusale yena izinyosi zesilisa seziphelelwa ngamagama,” kusho uButhelezi.Uthe unina uqophe umculo omningi namaciko ehlukene, wengeza ngokuthi omunye umculo wakhe ubudlala ngisho emsakazweni.“Umama waqala ukucula ekhaya, wadlulela esontweni okwamsiza kakhulu ekutheni agcine esengumculi ohlonishwayo,” kusho uButhelezi.Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi akuveze ukuthi umculi ohlonishwayo kuleli, uSbongile Khumalo, ukhona omunye umsebenzi kanina awenze kabusha.“UMntwana uMagogo wayehlukile ngoba wakwazi ukungena emkhakheni wokuba yinyosi okwaziwa ukuthi owamadoda njengoba wayekwazi ukubongela Izilo kusukela kuJama, Senzangakhona, Shaka, Cetshwayo, Mpande ebongela ngisho nabafowabo ababengazalwa ngunina,” kusho uButhelezi.
title: UButhelezi uncoma igalelo likaMagogo

text: Uma kukhona onolwazi lokuthi lidayiswa kuphi ithuluzi lokuhlola izinga lotshwala egazini(Breathalyser) ngiyocela angiyalele ngokushesha ngoba kunesimo esidinga ukulungiswa. Ukuthi angilona iphoyisa akusho ukuthi kunomthetho ongivimbelayo ekutheni ngihlome ngeBreathalyser ezokwazi ukungicacisela ukuthi umshayeli ucwile kangakanani otshwaleni. MaSolezwe, sengikhathele ukubhedelwa ngabantu emgwaqweni ngoba bazi ukuthi akulula ukubona ukuthi beqiwe wuphuzo oludakayo.Ngokomthetho kufanele ngabe sonke sinawo amaBreathalyser ukuze singahlawumbiseli uma sibona umuntu ephula imithetho yomgwaqo. Okusempeleni kufanele ngabe nabagibeli bamatekisi bahlala behlome ngalesi sikalazinga lokudakwa ukuze bakwazi ukuhlola umshayeli oshayela ibhedabheda.Bakwethu sekucacile ukuthi izingozi zomgwaqo azisoze zaphela uma umphakathi ungasukumi uqikelele ukuhlonishwa komthetho. Umbuzo uthi kuyoze kube yinini sikhala ngokuthi sibulawa yizidakwa emgwaqweni? Ngiyazi kunabantu abazothi uVolos uyabheda uma ethi kumele kuvuswe izinkantolo zasehlathini ukuze zilwe nenkinga yezidakwa ezidala izingozi emgwaqweni. Umphakathi kufanele uzihlele ngokwezindawo ohlala kuzona, uma kusezindaweni zamakhosi kuyofanele kusungulwe izigungu ezisebenzisana nezinduna, uma kusedolobheni kuyofanele kusungulwe amakomiti asebenzisana namakhansela.Uma kunomshayeli otholakala eshayela edakiwe kuyofanele ahudulelwe esigcawini, afuthiswe ukuze kutholakale izinga lotshwala egazini lakhe. Uma kuvela ubufakazi obukhomba utshwala kuyobe sekusho ukuthi kufanele ahlawuliswe ngemivimbo. Uma utholakala udakiwe ulayishe izingane zesikole, kuyofanele unenebulwe imivimbo engu-50 ezinqeni. Uma ungumshayeli wetekisi kuyofanele unikezwe isigwebo esifanayo nesomshayeli olayisha izingane zesikole ngoba nilayisha abantu abaningi ngesikhathi esisodwa.Indaba yokufuthiswa akufanele igcine kubashayeli kuphela kodwa nabahamba ngezinyawo kuyofanele bafuthiswe. Kuyiqiniso elingephikwe ukuthi nabahamba ngezinyawo bayathanda ukuhamba emigwaqweni bedakiwe. Uma kunomuntu ohamba eqhuba imbuzi emgwaqweni kuyofanele abanjwe afuthiswe ukuze kutholakale izinga lotshwala egazini lakhe. Uma butholakala kuyofanele anikezwe imivimbo eyishumi ezinqeni ukuze ahlale ekhumbula ukuthi umgwaqo awuyona indawo yezidakwa.Ngokwami kufanele kufuthiswe nabantu abagibela amabhayisikili ngoba abanye babo bashova amabhayisikili izinyawo zibheke eceleni ongathi badakiwe. Umkhankaso wokufuthisa kufanele ungabandlululi ngisho umama obelethe ingane kufanele afuthiswe uma ehamba emgwaqweni. Ingane ebelethiwe nayo ingumgibeli okufanele ivikelwe ekutheni ibelethwe wumuntu oweqiwe yizidakamizwa. MaSolezwe ngicela umuntu nomuntu azithengele iBreathalyser yakhe ukuze akwazi ukuzihlolela umuntu omphazamisa emgwaqweni. Siyacela uhulumeni asakhele amaBreathalyser ensangu, azokwazi nokusivezela nezinga lewunga esegazini.
title: Volos: Sicela amaBreathalyser ensangu nezinga lewunga egazini

text: Mbali KhanyileINKANTOLO yeMantshi yaseHowick ilidedele ngebheyili  kaR1 000 iphoyisa elisebenza esiteshini saKwaNovuka, eMpendle, elisolwa ngokubulala uMnuz Khethukuthula Mkhize ngoMgqibelo kule ndawo, ngemuva kokuthi alikhuze ngesikhathi lincokola nabesifazane ekubeni lisemsebenzini.Leli phoyisa, elinguConstable Sibisi (31), elingatholakalanga igama lalo,  kubikwa ukuthi belihamba nozakwabo ababili ngesikhathi lincokola nabesifazane ekubeni lisemsebenzini. Kuthiwa ngenkathi lifika kumakhelwane kamufi obebike icala lokwebelwa impahla esiteshini sendawo, belidle amanzi amponjwana nozakwabo ebelihambisana nabo. Kubikwa ukuthi leli phoyisa, elikhuzwe ngumufi ngesikhathi lidlalisa abesifazane lisemsebenzini, liqale lamthuka  waliphendula ngenhlamba nokuholele ekutheni bacishe bebambana ngezandla.Leli phoyisa kuthiwa lithathwe ngozakwabo baliyisa emotweni kodwa labuye laya kuMkhize lamdubula esiswini ngesibhamu somsebenzi maqede labaleka nozakwabo. Umufi, ophuthunyiswe emtholampilo ngemoto kamakhelwane wakhe, kubikwa ukuthi ushonele khona esanda kufika. Icala lihlehlele uFebhruwari 25 ngonyaka ozayo.
title: Lidedelwe ngebheyili iphoyisa elisolwa ngokubulala

text: UMBIKO womxazululi woMnyango wezeMpilo uveze isithombe esingesihle ngoNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo eGauteng, uNksz Qedani Mahlangu, kolokungaphatheki kahle kweziguli ezingaphezu kuka-2 000 eziphazamisekile engqondweni zasesikhungweni iLife Esidimeni.Lezi ziguli zasuswa kulesi sikhungo esiseRandfontein, eWest Rand, zayiswa ezinhlanganweni ezingenzi nzuzo ezehlukene ngonyaka odlule kwashona inqwaba yazo.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuzwelonke, uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi ujube umxazululi womnyango uSolwazi Malegapuru Makgoba ukuthi aphenye. Iphephandaba, iSunday Independent, liveze ukuthi umthombo osondelene nalolu phenyo uthe zingu-80 iziguli ezashona. Lesi sibalo siphezulu kakhulu ku-39 obekukholakala ukuthi yisibalo seziguli ezashona. Akuqondakali kodwa ukuthi zonke lezi ziguli zishone emuva kokususwa noma ezinye zazo zishone ngaphambi kokuthi lokhu kwenzeke.Nyakenye uNksz Mahlangu umemezele ngokufa kweziguli ezingu-36 esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe. Ukuvela kwesibalo sika-80 kukhomba ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi ukufa kwezinye iziguli bekufihliwe.Umthombo osondelene nodaba uthe uphenyo luveza ukuthi umnyango waxwayiswa ngokususa iziguli uziyise kulezi zikhungo. Kukholakala ukuthi uMakgoba uthole ukuthi uNksz Mahlangu nezinye izikhulu ezimbili zomnyango yibo okufanele bathwale leli cala lokufa kwalezi ziguli.Bese kuvele kunengcindezi enkulu ekutheni uNksz Mahlangu ehle esikhundleni ngemuva kokuthi eveze izibalo zokuqala zokufa kweziguli ezingu-36. Lokhu kuholele ekutheni uMotsoaledi amemezele ukuthi usejube uMakgoba ukuthi aphenye kabanzi ngokufa kweziguli.Umbiko bekufanele wethulwe ngoLwesithathu owedlule kodwa kubonakale engathi uNksz Mahlangu ubambezela ukukhishwa kwawo ngokuthi athi ucela kululwe isikhathi sokuthi aphendule. Lokhu kucasule imindeni nezihlobo zeziguli.Abasondelene nodaba bathe uNksz Mahlangu wayenikwe isikhathi esenele sokuphendula kodwa kunokuthi aphendula wabhala incwadi ethi ucela ukunikwa isikhathi.Ebuzwa uMakgoba ukuthi akazange acasuke ngesicelo sikaNksz Mahlangu sokululelwa isikhathi, uthe ulandela umthetho kukho konke akwenzayo wathi lokhu kujwayelekile.“Uhlelo luyakuvumela ukuthi kululwe isikhathi. Uma umuntu ecela ukululelwa isikhathi kuyavunywa ukuthi kushintshwe usuku lwesimemezelo,” kusho uMokgoba.Uthe ihhovisi lakhe belibeke usuku lokuthi kwethulwe umbiko ngoba ekholwa ukuthi iyobe seyifikile impendulo kaNksz Mahlangu.“Miningi iminxa kulolu daba njengoba nani nibona nje ngakho noma yiluphi uhlangothi oluzama ukuzitholela amaphoyinti lwehlisa ukuhlonipheka kwalo. Angikholwa ukuthi ngiyafuna ukungena kakhulu kulokho,” kuqhuba uMokgoba.Uthe uqale lo msebenzi ezinyangeni eziyisithupha ezedlule. Lo umbiko wakhe wokuqala futhi ufuna ukuwunika isithunzi osifanele.Okhulumela i-DA kwezeMpilo, uMnuz Jack Bloom uthe uNksz Mahlangu ngeke aphumelele kulolu phenyo.Uthe ukholwa ukuthi imiphumela yophenyo iyashaqisa futhi uNksz Mahlangu nabaholi abathile bowezempilo bayogcina bebekwe amacala.UBloom owaba owokuqala ukuphonsa imibuzo kuNksz Mahlangu ngalolu daba, uthe isisombululo wukuthi ehle esikhundleni njengongqongqoshe.
title: Kuvela okuhlaza ungqongqoshe

text: MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENII SILOMO senjini ye-Orlando Pirates yakudala, uJohn “Dungi” Moeti, sineqhinga esibona kuzokuba yilona ukhiye wezika-Eric Tinkler wokuwelela kowamanqamu weCaf Confederation Cup njengoba zizovakashela eSuez Stadium, e-Egypt, lapho zizodlala khona owomlenze wesibili we-semi final ne-Al Ahly ngeSonto ngo-8.30 ebusuku.Ngokusho kukaMoeti uma iPirates ingaphumelela ukuthi ithole igoli esiwombeni sokuqala konke ekufisayo isingaphumelela kukhona. UMoeti ubona ukuthi ukushaya igoli ngokushesha kuzokwenza abadlali be-Al Ahly baxhamazele okuyinto evamise ukuvula izimbobo emuva.EzikaTinkler zizenzele umsebenzi wathi ukuthamba kancane ngesikhathi ziphumelela ngo 1-0 wegoli likaThamsanqa Gabuza ngeledlule e-Orlando Stadium.Okuhle ngalo mphumela wukuthi iBucs ayingenelwanga yigoli ekubeni bebengekho oSiyabonga Sangweni noHappy Jele abavala emuva kanti nokaputeni ohlale njalo eyihola njengesibani u-Oupa “Ace” Manyisa ubengekho ngenxa yokulimala. Ukungangenelwa yigoli kusemqoka ngoba okudingwa yiPirates wukudlala ngokulingana ngeSonto.Ukufakazelile lokhu uMoeti owayekhona kuPirates eyadla isicoco seCaf Champions League ngo-1995 behlula i-Asec Abijan yase-Ivory Coast ngo 1-0 wegoli likaJerry “Legs of Thunder” Sikhosana.“Okuhle ngalo mdlalo wethu webhola wukuthi akukho ongashaya ngakho phansi uthi ngeke kwenzeke ngosuku lomdlalo. Okusemqoka okwenziwe yiPirates wukushaya igoli bese ivala ukuthi i-Al Ahly ingalinganisi. Kusemqoka kakhulu kule midlalo ukungangenelwa yigoli emdlalweni wasekhaya ngoba uya kowesibili unethuba futhi ukuqonda kahle okufanele ukwenze. Ungaba ungumdlali noma umqeqeshi isimo siyafana,” usho kanje ekhomba leli phephandaba ku-www.goal.com athe ubekhuluma nayo ngento efanayo.UMoeti uthe kuyinto enhle ukuthi iPirates isike yayibhuquzisa ngo 3-0 isekhaya i-Al Ahly eminyakeni emibili edlule.“Lokhu kukodwa kwenza kwayona i-Al Ahly ibe netwetwe. Ukuthola igoli kuqala yikhona kanye okuzolandisa leli twetwe ngoba bonke abaxhumene nayo i-Al Ahly bayazi ukuthi iPirates iyakwazi ukudlala uma ithanda. Ngicabanga ukuthi zonke lezi zinongo kufanele zimqinise idolo uTinkler ngokufanele akusho kubadlali bakhe uma esebakhuthaza. Akekho ongazi ukuthi yibona abazobe behlasela ngoba badlalela ekhaya futhi balandela ngemuva kodwa lokhu yikhona okuwukhiye ekunqobeni kwePirates nokuhluleka kwayo ukudlulela kowamanqamu,” kusho le nkakha.
title: ‘Ukhiye wukushaya igoli kuqala’

text: KUFUNGISWE amalungu amabili amasha e-ANC esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, avale izikhala zabasanda kushona.UMnuz Mpumelelo Zulu noNksz Phumilile Zulu, bafungiswe njengamalungu esiShayamthetho ngoLwesihlanu.Bavala izikhala ezivuleke emuva kokushona kobengungqongqoshe wezokuThutha ukuPhepha nokuXhumanyiswa koMphakathi esifundazweni, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, kanye noNksz Bridget Ntshangase, bobabili abasanda kushona.UZulu uyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC esifundeni iMzala Nxumalo.UNksz Zulu yena uyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC esifundazweni kanti ubenguSomlomo kuMasipala waKwaDukuza.UNksz Zulu uke wasikazwa kwesobumeya kulo masipala emuva kokushiya kongasekho kulesi sikhundla, uMnuz Ricardo Mthembu, owashiya ngo-2019 ngesikhathi eqokelwa kwesokuba yilungu lesiShayamthetho.Ukubhuntsha kwemihlangano eyayibizelwe ukukhetha ozovala isikhala sikaMthembu ngenxa yoqhekeko kumakhansela e-ANC, kwaphuthisela uNksz Zulu ngomgexo wobumeya.I-ANC yagcina ifake uNkk Dolly Govender kulesi sikhundla ukuvimba uqhekeko.USomlomo wesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Nontembeko Boyce, uthe unethemba lokuthi la malungu ngeke akuthole kunzima ukujwayela imithetho yesiShayamthetho.“Ngizwile ukuthi nobabili niqhamuka kumkhakha wohulumeni basekhaya, onemithetho eminingi kakhulu. Angiboni kuzokuba inkinga ukuthi nijwayele imithetho yalapha esiShayamthetho.
title: I-ANC ivale izikhala zababili

text: LIVELE eNkantolo yeMantshi oPhongolo iphoyisa lesiteshi saseNgwavuma elisolwa ngokudubula libulale umlisa ebelimsola ngokupaka kabi imoto emgwaqweni.UContsable Mxolisi Donda (30) usezikhindini ngecala lokufa kukaMnuz Sifiso Sithole (24) okuthiwa ubezoqala ukuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi wobuphoyisa naye. Kuthiwa leli phoyisa elidume ngesihluku endaweni, lahilizisana nomufi baze bashova iqupha isikhathi eside kubuka abantu. Kuthe uma umsolwa ebona ukuthi sengathi akaliboni elidlalayo ngamankomane walanda isibhamu somsebenzi emotweni wadubula umufi emphindelela washona. Kuthiwa ababekhona bathi umufi wadutshulwa ngemuva ekhanda esezama ukubaleka ebona ukuthi kulandwa isibhamu. Ngesikhathi ecela ibheyili enkantolo ubalule ukuthi unezingane azondlayo futhi izindleko zekhaya zibheke yena, wacela inkantolo ukuthi imdedele ukuze ayohlukanisa unyaka nezingane zakhe. Icala lihlehliselwe uLwesithathu lapho okulindeleke ukuthi kukhishwe khona isinqumo ngesicelo sebheyili yomsolwa.UMbuso ubuphikisana nokuthi athole ibheyili ukhala ngokuthi icala abhekene nalo libucayi.Enkantolo bekunenqwaba yabantu abebethamele icala bebhikisha bethi akangayitholi ibheyili ngoba uyiphoyisa elihlupha umphakathi.Umnewabo kamufi uMnuz Freedom Shongwe, uthe babambe umoya ngoba bafuna lo mlisa ahlukanise unyaka ekhulukuthu ngoba bahlukumezekile ngokubulawa komfowabo."Sifuna inkantolo yenze ubulungiswa kungaba kubi uma imdedela ngebheyili ngoba nathi akubanga mnandi kubulawa umfowethu. Ubengasebenzi kodwa indlela yakhe ibisicaca ngoba ubebiziwe emaphoyiseni esezoqeqeshelwa ukuba yiphoyisa," kubalisa uShongwe.
title: Iphoyisa ecaleni lokubulala kubangwa ukupaka

text: AKEKHO umdlali weKaizer Chiefs ongenayo ingcindezi ngesizini ye-Absa Premiership ezoqala kodwa kuqhilika izihlathi enjinini yaleli qembu, uWiseman Meyiwa, ngokufezeka kwamaphupho akhe ezinhlakeni zeqembu lesizwe.Okwenza uMeyiwa ahleke yedwa wukuthi ngisho engakadlali ebholeni elikhokhelayo, wazibekela imigomo yokuzibona edlala emiqhudelwaneni yabasebancane njengeJunior Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) nakwiJunior Fifa World Cups ngaphambi kokuzitholela ithuba lokuyodlala phesheya.Emigomeni eyisikhombisa azibekele yona emihlanu isiphumelele. Empeleni injini yeChiefs eneminyaka engu-18 izodlala emqhudelwaneni weCAF wesithathu ngemuva kokusiza Amajita azibekisela indawo kwi Caf Africa U-20 Cup of Nations ezodlalelwa eNiger ngonyaka ozayo.Amajita azibekisele indawo ehlula iMalawi ngo 2-0 eLilongwe kweyokuhlunga.Yilokho kuhlabana okumenza ahleke yedwa kwazise ubekhona nasesikwatini ebesiyibambe ngo2015 kwi-Afcon ka-U/17 maqede safinyelela kweyamanqamu.Ubekhona futhi kuMajita azibekisele indawo kwiFifa U/20 World Cup.Empeleni uMeyiwa uyazethemba nokuthi uzobakhona kwiFifa World Cup yakhe yesithathu ngenxa yokuthi unethemba lokuthi Amajita azogila izimanga eNiger ngonyaka ozayo.“Yilokho engikholwa wukuthi kuyisifiso sesikwati sonke saMajita njengamanje,” kusho uMeyiwa. “Emdlalweni wethu odlule siphuthwe yithuba lokuba kowamanqamu sehlulwa yiZambia ngo 1-0 kuma-semi final. Kulokhu kumele senze kangcono. Ngihlale ngifisa ukwenza kangcono nokuzuza okuningi,” kusho uMeyiwa“Yingakho nje ngithe ukwengeza isikhathi sokusebenza ngedwana njengoba kade kuvalwe isizini ukuthuthuka emazingeni athile endleleni engidlala ngayo. Ngihlezi ngibheka izindlela zokuthuthuka njengomdlali.“Ngifuna ukuhamba ngiyodlala phesheya. Yilelo iphupho lami elikhulu. Ngake ngaba nengxoxo nje eseceleni namanye ama-agent ebhola bangeluleka ukuthi indlela okuyiyo kuphela yokuyibamba ebholeni lase-Europe wukuba ngumdlali okwazi ukuhlasela aphinde amake futhi ashaye namagoli ngesikhathi esifanayo. Yilelo zinga engilibabele njengamanje.”Ebuzwa ukuthi kumenza azizwe kanjani ukuzibekisela indawo emqhudelwaneni weCaf amasizini amathathu elandelana ekubeni esamncane uphendule wathi: Kumnandi ngempela. Ngihlezi ngizibekele umgomo wokufika ezingeni eliphezulu. Kuhle ukubona amaphupho ami ephumelela iningi lawo.Ngisemncane bengihlezi ngizibona ngidlala emiqhudelwaneni emithathu emikhulu kanobhutshuzwayo njengeFifa World Cup ne-Afcon. Konke lokho njengamanje kuyenzeka. Yingakho nje ngizikhandla kangaka. Iphupho lami manje wukuzibona ngithola ithuba lokuya phesheya. Ngiyazi kodwa ukuthi akuzuba lula, nokho kuyenzeka. Kungenzeka.”Udaba lucashunwe kwiSAFA.NET
title: OweChiefs unamaphupho okudlondlobala  aye phesheya

text: UMNDENI kathisha waseJozini owanyamalala ngoMashi unesiqiniseko sokuthi ngesakhe isidumbu esitholakale sesonakele ngasemfuleni, ngoLwesine.Bese kusuke nezidubedube kunukwana emphakathini ngokuduka kukakaMnuz Xolani Mathenjwa, obefundisa eKuhlehleni Primary.Lo thisha wanyamalala eyohlangana nomngani wakhe okuthiwa babezoya naye eMozambique ngoMashi 15.Okhulumela umndeni, uMnuz Thembelani Ntshangase, uthe yize kusazohlolwa isidumbu kodwa banesiqiniseko sokuthi ngesakhe uthisha.“Indawo atholakale kuyo ingasesiqiwini Usuthu, eduze komfula. Isidumbu bese sonakele ngoba sekusele amathambo. Okwenza sikholwe ukuthi nguyena ukuthi izimpahla ayezigqokile zitholakele eduze kwesidumbu. Kutholakale ngisho amaselula ayehambe nawo, iwashi, ibhande nekhadi lasebhange,” kuchaza uNtshangase.NgoJulayi kuke kwavalwa izikole kwashiswa umuzi namakotishi enduna uMnuz Roman Mathenjwa, ebisolwa ngokuba nesandla ekunyamalaleni kukathisha.Mayelena nezidubedube uNtshangase uthe amaphaphu ehlile emphakathini ngoba uthisha usetholakele.Uthe sebethembele emaphoyiseni ukuthi azokwenza kahle uphenyo, kuvele iqiniso.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe isidumbu sitholakale ngezithuba zabo 8 ebusuku ngoLwesine, sitholwa umfana olusa izinkomo.Uthe kuvulwe idokodo ngokufa komuntu eliphenywa esiteshini samaphoyisa eNdumo.Uthe kuzohlolwa isidumbu ukuze kutholakale ukuthi yini ebulele umufi nokuthi nguye ngempela yini uthisha obenyamalale.UMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uthe bayazwelana nomndeni kathisha, abathemba ukuthi ukutholakala kwesidumbu sakhe kuzothoba amanxeba.Unxuse ukuthi umphakathi udedele amaphoyisa ukuthi aphenye.“Bese kunezinsolo nokuqagela okuningi ngokunyamalala kwalo thisha, esikholwa ukuthi umndeni uzodedela abomthetho ngophenyo,” kusho uMlotshwa.Kuke kwasolwa ngisho umngani wakhe umufi ngokunyamalala kwakhe, owabuye watitinywa ngamalungu omphakathi, wavuka esibhedlela.Kubuye kwanukwa ikhansela nenduna ngokunyamalala kukathisha.Amakotishi enduna ashiswa kwakuhlala kuwo abafundi abakhishwa kubhikishwa, kwaphazamiseka ukufunda ezikoleni ezine ngoJulayi.Kuthiwa umufi ubeyiphini likanobhala wegatsha le-ANC futhi esekomitini lezemidlalo esikoleni.
title: Yehlile imimoya kutholwa amathambo kathisha

text: KUSOLWA isikhulu seWest Ink uMampintsha ngokugweva nemali ayeyikhokhelwe ukuba azonandisa emcimbini waminyaka yonke iSpring Tour Music Festival ebiseMhlathuze Sports Complex, eRichards Bay, ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule.Ngokusho komhleli walo mcimbi uMnuz Sifiso Mthethwa, uMampintsha bekulindeleke ukuba azonandisa kanti nemali ayeyifunile engu-R20 000 ubeseyikhokhelwe yonke.“Sakhuluma kahle noMampintsha sicela ukuthi azocula kulo mcimbi wavuma. Wathi ucela simkhokhele uR20 000, sangaba nankinga ngalokho,” kusho uMthethwa.Uqhube wathi ngo-Agasti 31 bamkhokhela uR10 000 owawuhlukaniseke kabili kuwu-R7400 noR2600 ngoba babevumelene ngokuthi bazomnika uhhafu ngaphambi kokukhipha izikhangiso zomcimbi.“Siphinde samnika uR10 000 ogcwele ngoLwesithathu olwedlule, yaphelela imali,” kuchaza uMthethwa. Isolezwe ngeSonto liwabonile amakhophi amarisidi aseFNB lapho kukhokhwe khona imali. Ngosuku lomcimbi bamlinde kwaze kwathi ngo-9 ebusuku wafona ethi abamthumele ubufakazi bokuthi bakhokhile ngoba akayiboni imali. Uthe kubaxakile lokhu ngoba bebezitshela ukuthi uyayibona imali uma ingena kwi-akhawunti yakhe.“Ngenxa yokuthi besisemcimbini kube nzima ukuqala phansi siye ehhovisi ukuyolanda ubufakazi abebufuna ngoba sonke sasesisenkundleni emcimbini sinake wona. Sazitshela ukuthi uyeza kodwa wangafika,” usho kanje.UMthethwa uthe bazama ukumfonela kodwa ucingo wayengasalubambi. Uthe isonto lonke bebemfonela, bethumela imilayezo ngisho ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kodwa engaphenduli.Ukhale kakhulu ngalesi senzo sikaMampintsha wathi sabaqhatha nezethameli, zagcina zisuse umsindo futhi babukeka njengabantu abangethembekile.“Ngoba ubone imali yethu ingabalulekile, sicela ayibuyise. Kubi lokhu akwenze kithina. Siyayidinga imali esamnika yona. Akathi eyeka umculo kodwa imali abe eseyikhokhile.”Kulo mcimbi kwakukhona abaculi abafana noBabes Wodumo, Tipcee, Dladla Mshunqisi nabanye.Imizamo yokuthola uMampintsha ukuba aphawule kayiphumelelanga ngenxa yokuthi izingcingo zakhe bezivaliwe. Kuthunyelwe imiqhafazo kodwa lutho ukubuyela entatheli kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.
title: UMampintsha usolwa ngokugweva nemali
