text: SEKUQUBUKE umbango ngomcimbi wobumnandi oba se-Amcor Dam, eNewcastle, minyaka yonke, iGumba Fest kangangokuba sekuze kwavulwa icala emaphoyiseni.Umbango uphakathi kukaDJ Tira, Sifiso Gumede noSbu Shabangu.UShabangu uthe umcimbi ngowakhe kodwa useshaywe ngesithende kowakulo nyaka njengoba uhlelwa nguTira noGumede.UGumede uthe umcimbi waqalwa nguye wacela uShabangu ukuthi azomsiza, ngokuhamba kwesikhathi bacela usizo lukaTira ngoba unamava ekuhleleni imicimbi.Izikhangiso zowanonyaka seziqalile kanti uzoba ngo-Okthoba 1.UShabangu uthe umcimbi wawuqala ngo-2010 uTira engekho nokuthe ngo-2012 wamumema ukuthi azobakhulisa.“Siqhubekile nokusebenza ngirojwa ngizwe kuthiwa abaxhasi bakhiphe imali ethize kodwa mina ngingatshelwa. Ngo-2015 uTira uqhamuke esethi umcimbi uya eRichards Bay, ngabuza ukuthi angawuhambisa kanjani umcimbi ngaphandle kwemvume yami. Wathi uma uMasipala waseNewcastle ungaxhasa ngemali enkulu kuneyaseRichards Bay uzoqhubeka,” kusho uShabangu.UShabangu usevulelwe icala lokukhwabanisa ngemuva kokuthi eye eComputicket lapho kudayisa khona amathikithi wavula i-akhawunti ukuze imali yabathengayo ize kuyena.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseThekwini, uCaptain Khephu Ndlovu ukuqinisekisile lokhu wathi basaphenya, bekungakaboshwa muntu.UDJ Tira uthe abawuboni umsebenzi kaShabangu, yingakho bemkhiphile.“Simvulele icala ngoba uye eComputicket engahlangene nomcimbi. ”UGumede uthe umcimbi ngowakhe futhi waziqalela ngo-2009 usabizwa ngeSummer Explosion.“UShabangu waqashwa njengo-stage manager. Ngonyaka olandelayo sasebenza naye ngoba wazi lezi zinto zama-khompyutha sawuhlela umcimbi ingekho into ebhalwe phansi. Sasebenzisa inkampani yakhe. Ngo-2012 sacela ukusebenzisana noTira wafika walishintsha igama,” kusho uGumede.Uthe okubaqhathile wukuthi emcimbini wangonyaka odlule kwalahleka imali abayenza emcimbini, ngemuva kwalokho uShabangu wanyamalala.
title: Umbango ngomcimbi iGumba Fest

text: IPHOYISA lase-Oakford Village, Osindisweni ngaseVerulam ebelisebenza esiteshini saseNanda kuthiwa lidubule inkosikazi yalimala kanzima lase lizingqokloza ngesibhamu lafa, liphuma komalume walo kade kunomcimbi, ngeSonto ntambama.Kuthiwa umufi, uSergeant Nkosi  Nyathi (39) obekade ehlangene nomndeni wakhe eNgonweni, eNdwedwe ngalolu suku, ufike kwakhe ntambama wadubula umkakhe,  uNkk Wendy Nyathi (34) ngemumva kwengxabano okungaziwa ukuthi idalwe yini. Iphoyisa kuthiwa liphendule isibhamu lazingqokloza ngaso ngemumva kokudubula umkalo. Umufi ozidubule ekhanda, kubikwa ukuthi uphelele endaweni yesigameko. Unkosikazi wakhe olimale kanzima uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela.Elandisa umfowabo omncane kamufi, uMnuz Mzokhona Nyathi, uthe umfowabo abebehlezi naye komalume, ubengakaze akhombise ukuthi kukhona inkinga anayo ngenkathi behlangene. Uthe namanje basamangele ngesenzo sakhe engakaze athi vu ngobekungamphethe kahle emoyeni.“ Umama uthole ucingo luvela kumfowethu ngemuva kwehora ehambile  komalume. Enkulumeni yakhe ( umufi)  umtshele ukuthi usethathe isinqumo ngafuna ukukwenza wabe esevala ucingo. Umama ube esengifonela ethi asiphuthume  emzini wakhe  ngoba kukhona okungahambi kahle,” kubeka uNyathi.Eqhuba uthe, bafike sekonakele, umfowabo eselele phansi. Unkosikazi wakhe obelimele, elele eceleni kwakhe.“ Siyazibuza ukuthi kungani enze lesi senzo umfowethu  kodwa asiqhamuki nazimpendulo njengoba ebengumuntu onomoya ophansi. Asikaze nangelilodwa ilanga sizwe kuthiwa kuke kwaba nomsindo phakathi kwakhe nenkosikazi,” kubeka yena.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, usiqinisekisile isigameko somlisa ozibulale ngemumva kokudubula owesifazane.“ Kuvulwe idokodo lokufa komuntu necala lokuzama ukubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa aseVerulam. Amaphoyisa asaphenya,” kubeka uCapt Gwala.
title: Badidekile ngokuzibulala kwephoyisa

text: "NGENXA yenhlonipho enginayo ngoMama, uComrade Kate Mantsho Zuma, ngithathe isinqumo sokungaphenduli amanga ngencwadi ayibhala ngaphambi kokuzibulala"."UComrade Jacob Zuma kumele alusukumele lolu daba ukuqondisa indodana yakhe ngoba uyalazi iqiniso. Ngiyethemba usekwenzile lokho noma usazokwenza lokho."Uziphendule kanje kuTwitter owayenguMqondisi-Jikelele ehhovisi likaMengameli wezwe, uMfu Frank Chikane emuva kokuba indodana yowayenguMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uDuduzane, ithe yagcina ukubona incwadi eyabhalwa ngunina esaphila ithathwa kuyo nguChikane.UDuduzane ubechazela uyise ngokwenzeka emuva kokuba unina ezibulele kwiZooming with Zuma kuYouTube.INGXOXO kowayenguMengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma nendodana yakhe, uDuduzani kwiZooming with Zuma kuYouTube isuse umsindo Isithombe:ESIGCINIWE"Isikhathi engagcina ngaso ukubona incwadi yingesikhathi ngiphucwa yona ezandleni zami."Kuvela ukuthi kule ncwadi kwakukhona lapho kubhalwe khona ukuthi uZuma wayengavunyelwe ukuhambela inkonzo yomngcwabo kamufi. Enkulumeni kaDuduzane uzwakala ethi "Akashonanga, akafanga, wazibulala."Impendulo kaChikane kube sengathi ihlokoloza iziqandu njengoba iwele likaDuduzane, uNkk Duduzile Zuma-Sambudla liqhamuke selivutha, lizovikela umfowabo izolo ngokuthi lisole uChikane ngokuba yingxenye yetulo lokucekela phansi uyise nomndeni wakhe."Malume Chikane, yindlela owethulwa ngayo kumina eMozambique. Ngiyayikhumbula imihlangano eyayibanjwa wubaba eflethini futhi wawuba khona, izwi lakho ngilikhumbula kahle ngoba lalihlala lihlukile kumina, nginesiqiniseko sokuthi nakwabanye. Wawuyisethenjwa sikamama futhi wayekuxoxela yonke into... Wayengakwazi lokhu esesikwazi manje"."Amatulo ayenzelwe ubaba. Wayekwethemba! Ngangizizwa izingcingo ezaziphakathi kwakho nomama ngoDisemba 7. Kwakufanele uze, uzombona kodwa wangalubhada. Izigameko zangomhla ka-8 zenzeka, umfowethu oyedwa u-Edward wafika watshela mina nodadewethu ukuthi sihlale emagunjini ethu. Ngalizwa izwi lakho. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ngezwa umsindo ephasishini, ngaqala. Ngawubona umzabalazo wokuthwalwa kukamama, eyiswa kwi-ambulensi eyayilindile"."Ngababona abafowethu abanesibindi u-Edward, Saady noDudazani bethwele umama. Ngakubona nawe,"kubhala uNkk Zuma-Sambudlu.No-Edward ucashunwe yiNews24 izolo ethi "Ngangikhona. Ngakubona okwenzeka. Angazi kungani umfundisi eqamba amanga kodwa ngambona enencwadi. Wayithatha." UNkk Mantsho-Zuma wadlula emhlabeni ngoDisemba 8 ngo-2000, eneminyaka engu44 ubudala. ISunday Times yabika ukuthi wayedle weqisa amaphilisi okuvikela isifo se-malaria. Wayengumama wezingane ezinhlanu futhi engunkosikazi wesithathu kaZuma, owayesohambeni olumayelana namabhizinisi ngesikhathi kwenzeka lo mshophi.Umufi, owayeseshade iminyaka engu-18 noZuma owayeseyiPhini likaMengameli wezwe, wangcwatshwa ngohlelo lukahulumeni futhi emngcwabeni wakhe kwakhuluma uMnuz Thabo Mbeki noMnuz Nelson Mandela.
title: UChikane uzithintele iziqandu endodakazini kaZuma

text: UMQEQESHI weLamontville Golden Arrows, uSteve Komphela, akafuni abadlali bakhe bazitshele ukuthi sebewuqedile umsebenzi wokubalekela izembe njengoba sebeweqile umugqa wamaphuzu awu-30 kwi-Absa Premiership.I-Arrows ihlule iCape Town City ngo 1-0 emdlalweni weligi ngoMgqibelo eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont. Igoli lishaywe uLerato Lamola. Ibe isinyukela endaweni yesishiyagalolunye kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-31.“Ngokwesipiliyoni ungasho ukuthi sesiphumile ngenxa yokuthi phambilini amaqembu anala maphuzu asindile ezembeni. Kodwa njengamanje iqembu elinamaphuzu awu-20 lingafika kwawu-35 kule midlalo esele. Ngokubheka lokho ngithi cha asikasindi. Awufuni ukukhuluma ngokuthi siphephile ngoba abadlali bazoyifunda leyonto bese bezithela ngabandayo," kusho uKomphela.Ebuzwa lo mqeqeshi ukuthi yisiphi isimo esingamjabulisa ekupheleni kwesizini, uthe: "Akukho ngami kodwa konke sikwenzela ukufeza izifiso ze- Arrows, hhayi ezikaSteve. UClinton (Larsen) wahamba enze umsebenzi omuhle nami futhi ngisengahamba, kufike omunye. Ngakho uma singasimenda indawo kwiTop 8, siqhubeke nokwenza kahle emidlalweni yomkhumulajezi, siqinisekise ukuthi I-Arrows iyayigcina indawo yayo kwiligi ngesizini ezayo nokuvulela amathuba abafana abancane, ngokwami lokho kuyoba kuhle eqenjini.”Leli qembu laseThekwini lingqongqoza kwiTop 8 nje, nasemidlalweni yomkhumulajezi kusalihambela kahle. Selibalwa namaqembu amane asele kwiNedbank Cup, lapho lizodlala neGalaxy FC kowandulela owamanqamu.“Sesidlale imidlalo ewu-13 kusukela ngifikile lapha. Sihlulwe kwemithathu, sadlala ngokulingana kwemithathu. Uma ubuka lokho ungasho ukuthi senza kahle kodwa sisengenza kangcono. Kumele silwele ukuthola imiphumela emidlalweni ezayo. Asikhohlwe osudlulile," kusho uKomphela.
title: Akafuni babhiyozele inkululeko uKomphela

text: I-IFP KwaZulu-Natal isola i-ANC ngokuthenga amavoti ngokwenza sengathi ifuqa intuthuko kubantu njengoba kulungiselelwa ukhetho lokuchibiyela oluzoba ku-ward 9, eMhlathuze ngoLwesithathu oluzayo.Usihlalo we-IFP KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthe isenzo se-ANC asamukelekile futhi sikhombisa ukuthi ifuna amandla ngayo yonke indlela.“Egameni lesiqubulo sosuku lomhlaba lokudla, uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi esifundazweni uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza ngoLwesihlanu uzohambisa izijumbane zokudla kubantu ku-ward 9, ngaphambi kwezinsuku ezine kuyiwe okhethweni lokuchibiyela,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe i-ANC isiyayisaba i-IFP ngenxa yempumelelo yayo okhethweni lwakamuva yingakho isigwazela umphakathi ngokudla.UNtuli uthe akusikho okokuqala ukuthi i-ANC isebenzise imali yabakhokhibentela ithenga amavoti uma kuzoba nokhetho.Ngeledlule, uNgqongqoshe wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu esifundazweni uNkk Peggy Nkonyeni kade ekhona ku-ward 9, eyonika umphakathi amatayitela ezindlu.UNtuli uthe bazofaka isikhalo kwi-IEC ngalolu daba.Unobhala we-ANC eMusa Daldla uMnuz Tholi Gwala, uthe i-IFP idlala ipolitiki eshibhile njengoba isola i-ANC ngokuthenga amavoti ngaphambi kokhetho lokuchibiyela oluzoba ngoLwesithathu.UGwala uthe intuthuko ayilinde ukuthi kuze kudlule usuku lokhetho ngaphambi kokuthi ihanjiswe kubantu.“UNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi esifundazweni uzoza ku-ward 9, ezonika abantu izijumbane zokudla ngaphansi kwesiqubulo sosuku lomhlaba lokudla, ngeke ungqongqoshe ayeke ukusiza abantu ngoba nakhu kuthiwa kuzoba khona ukhetho,” kusho uGwala.Uthe i-IFP inengebhe njengoba seyenza izinsolo ezingabambeki.UGwala uthe abangabazi ukuthi bazonqoba njengoba umphakathi uthi usafuna ukuholwa yibona.
title: I-IFP isola i-ANC ngokucubuza ngokudla

text: LIHLEHLISELWE uNovemba 30 icala elibhekene nabahlanu abasolwa ngokubulala izinyane leSilo uGoodwill Zwelithini, uMntwana Lethukuthula Zulu. Abasolwa oMnuz Tshefogatso Moremane (30), Nksz Margaret Koaile (42), Portia Mmola (28), Gontse Tlhoele (30) noDakalo Mbedzi (32) bavele izolo enkantolo yaseRandburg.UMntwana uLethukuthula (50), watholwa ebulewe endlini yakhe eNorthworld, eGoli, ngoNovemba 6. Ngokusho koMbuso usola ukuthi abasolwa bayingxenye yeqembu lezigebengu ezihamba zidlisa abantu izidakamizwa ngenhloso yokuba zibantshontshele impahla yabo.Abasolwa baboshwe ngoLwesihlanu. Bevela enkantolo izolo, uMshushisi uYusuf Baba uthe uMbuso uyasiphikisa isicelo sebheyili.Uthe laba kusolwa ukuthi bajwayele ukusebenza endaweni yaseBenoni nasePitoli befakela abantu izidakamizwa.Kuthiwa kunamanye amacala abanawo afuze leli enziwa eBenoni nasePitoli. Ngokusho koMbuso bake bahlangana noZulu ngaphambi kokuba bahlele ukumbamba inkunzi kodwa ukubulawa kwakhe kuthiwa akuzange kuhlelwe. Kunalokho kubukela sengathi kwaba yiphutha ukuthi agcine eshonile ngemva kokuba bemfakele izidakamizwa. Kwantshontshwa i-microwave, ithelevishini nemali elinganiselwa kuR30 000 endlini yakhe. Ekuqaleni uMntwana uLethukuthula kwakubukeka sengathi uzishonele njengoba amaphoyisa avula idokodo ngokushona komuntu kodwa kwabuye kwavulwa icala lokubulala sekubonakala ukuthi kunesandla semfene. Abasolwa basagcinwe ezitokisini, bazomelwa wummeli wesihle.Amanye amalungu omndeni kamufi kuthiwa abekhona izolo enkantolo ezozibonela abasolwa.
title: Kuhlehle 'elababulali' boMntwana

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANEI-SACP KwaZulu-Natal isola ukuthi kukhona abangaphakathi kuKhongolose abakha itulo lokudicilela phansi uSihlalo we-ANC esifundazweni uMnuz Senzo Mchunu ngokusabalalisa ezifundeni ezahlukene ukuthi selokhu ethathe izintambo ngo-2013 umbutho unoqhekeko ngendlela engakaze ibonwe.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi iSACP inesithangami nabezindaba eThekwini izolo lapho ibizocacisa ngezinye izinto ezixoxwe emhlanganweni wesigungu sayo esiphezulu sesifundazwe obungempelasonto.Emasontweni edlule kuvele imibiko yokuthi kukhona abaholi abaphezulu ku-ANC nabe-ANCYL abasabalalisa umbiko othi uMchunu uyixove ngendlela engakaze ibonwe i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal okuyinto eyayingekho kusaphethe uDkt Zweli Mkhize.Umgcinimafa weSACP esifundazweni, uNkk Nomarashiya Caluza, uthe sebeyabona ukuthi kukhona imizamo yokubeka kabi uMchunu ukuze adicilelwe phansi ngezinto ezingekho.“Asiboni ukuthi kuyinto efanele ukuba kugxekwe uMchunu ngesimo sesifundazwe ngoba akayiholi yedwa i-ANC kodwa unesigungu abambisene naso. Ngakho awukwazi ukuthi uma kunezinto ezingahambi kahle esifundazweni bese ugxeka umuntu oyedwa,” kusho uNkk Caluza.UNobhala weSACP esifundazweni, uMnuz Themba Mthembu usole i-ANCYL ngokuthi iyona exova izinto esifundazweni.Uthe indlela eziphethe ngayo yiyo eyagcina idale ukuba uMnuz Julius Malema axoshwe ku-ANC kanti uma ingakhuzwa kuzokonakala.“Okunye esikubonayo wukuthi kunabathile abasebenzisa imali ukuxova i-ANC ngoba benezinhloso zabo kanti kunomkhonyovu wokukhwabanisa ubulungu emagatsheni enhlangano. Abanye sizwa sebememeza indaba yokuthi akube noguquko okuyinto esiyibona yenziwa ngamabomu ukuze kuyiwe ku-2017 i-ANC namadlelandawonye ayo KwaZulu-Natal bexovekile. Ngaphandle nje kwalokho asiyiboni inkinga ngobuholi obukhona njengamanje ku-ANC esifundazweni ngoba uma kubhekwa kwezomnotho nokunye izinto zihamba kahle.“Lokhu kukhomba ukusebenza ngokuzimisela kobuholi obukhona. Yingakho thina njengeSACP sifuna lobu buholi bubuyele njengoba bunje uma kufika ingqungquthela ngoNovemba. Okunye sifuna amalungu ethu angalokothi azihlanganise nemibhiyozo yokudicilela phansi i-ANC nabaholi bayo,” kusho uMthembu.Ubuye wathinta udaba lwaseThekwini lwamatekisi wathi kade babesola ukuthi kukhona okunye okuthinta abantu abangaphakathi ku-ANC ngenhloso yokuba kungabinakho ukuthula.I-SACP KwaZulu-Natal ithathwa njengohlaka oluhambisana noMnuz Senzo Mchunu efuna ukuba abuyiselwe esikhundleni sakhe kanti uMthembu naye ubalwa nabantu abafakwe ekutheni bakhethwe njengamalungu esigungu sakhe esiphezulu kodwa esingekho kuTop 5.I-SACP ibuye yakhala ngecala lama-Amigos elahoxiswa elalibhekene noNkk Peggy Nkonyeni noMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu, isola ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi nokudicilela isithunzi salaba baholi, njengoba iDA ifuna kuvuswe amacala abo.UNkk Nkonyeni ufakwa njengomuntu ozoba yiphini likaMnuz Mchunu uma enqoba ukhetho bese kuthi uMabuyakhulu abe nguMgcinimafa.Abanye abaholi abasohlwini lukaMchunu nguMnuz Nhlakanipho Ntombela ofunwa njengoNobhala bese esekelwa nguNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube obuye afunwe wuhlangothi lukaMnuz Sihle Zikalala ukuthi abe nguMgcinimafa.UMthembu uthe maningi kabi amacala okusafanele amaphoyisa awasebenze kanzima ukuze kuvele iqiniso ngawo ikakhulukazi indaba yokubulawa kukaMnuz Sbu Sibiya, Wiseman Mshibe, Wandile Mkhize nowayengunozinti weBafana Bafana ne-Orlando Pirates uSenzo Meyiwa.
title: Basola i-ANCYL ngokuxova

text:
KUBOSHWE iphoyisa leJohahannesburg Metro Police Department (JMPD) kulandela ‘ukugwazelwa’ ngoR10 ngumshayeli wetekisi eSoweto.Okhulumela iJMPD, uChief Superintendent Wayne Minnaar uthe, iphoyisa belimisa itekisi ngasePretoria Glen eSoweto ngoMsombuluko ngoba ingenayo inumber plate nomshayeli wayo engaziphethe izincwadi zokushayela.“Ubanjwe oqotshweni igatsha eliphenya amaphoyisa kulo mnyango, umshayeli wetekisi ukuqinisekisile  ukuthi ugwaze ngoR10, uzoba ngufakazi wombuso,” kusho uMinnaar.Iphoyisa liboshiwe lagcinwa esiteshini samaphoyisa ePretoria Glen.UMinnar uthe inhloko yeJMPD, uMnuz David Tembe, iyaveva ngalesi sigameko.UTembe ubhale kutwitter waveza ukuthi basaqhubeka nokukhuculula inkohlakalo. Umsolwa kulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo kuleli sonto.Our Internal Affairs Unit has just arrested one of our own for accepting a bribe of R10.00 from a Taximan in Soweto. We are committed to rooting out those who dare tarnish the image of all Law Enforcement fraternity.— David Tembe (@AsktheChiefJMPD) 
January 14, 2019Losing night shift allowances, danger allowance, Pension package, Medical Aid, annual bonus, SIMPLY BECAUSE OF R10🙄🙄🙄? Disgraceful...— Donald Mabunda (@MabundaDee) 
January 14, 2019
title: Kuboshwe iphoyisa ‘ebeligwazisa’ ngoR10

text: ULALE ebaliwe izolo umlisa waseNcukeni, ePort Edward, othinteka ecaleni lokubulawa kwezingane zakubo ezintathu.Le ndoda (32) iboshwe ikubo yithimba lamaphoyisa asePort Edward abelisebenza ubusuku nemini liphenya ngale nhlekelele eyenzeke ngoSepthemba 2 nyakenye.Ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, izingane ezineminyaka ephakathi kwemine newu-12 zatholakala sezithule endlini, zinamanxeba esifubeni, emzimbeni futhi zicwiywe izindlebe zangakwesokunxele.“Esinye isidumbu satholakala sidindilize ngaphandle komuzi. Naso sinamanxeba. Imbangela ayaziwa okwamanje. Izingane zazizodwa ngelanga ezahlaselwa ngalo.”UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa wakulesi sifundazwe osabambile, uMajor General Bheki Langa ukushayela ihlombe ukuboshwa komsolwa.
title: Uboshelwe ukubulala izingane zakubo

text: UNDUNANKULU omusha waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala uxwayise ngokuthi inkohlakalo nobugebengu ngeke buze bubekezelelwe esigungwini sakhe songqongqoshe.Ethula inkulumo yakhe ngemuva kokufungiswa njengoNdunankulu omusha wesifundazwe, uZikalala uthe izinhlangano zosomabhizinisi ezifuna imisebenzi ngenkani zizobhekana nengalo yomthetho.“Nabantu abazokwenza inkohlakalo uma sibabamba sizobajezisa ngoba sifuna yonke into icace mayelana nokuphatha kwethu,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe enye into abazoyisukumela wukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi bayaluqeda udlame oluhlale luqubuka esifundazweni.“IKwaZulu-Natal idume kabi njengesifundazwe esihamba phambili ngodlame, kufanele silwe nalesi sihlava ngoba sixosha nabatshalimali, enye into esizolwa nayo yisihlava sokubulawa kosopolitiki okudla lubi lapha esifundazweni sethu kodwa kumele sincome ukuthi kusukela kusungulwe ithimba elibhekelele ukubulawa kosopolitiki ukhona umehluko okhona,” kusho uZikalala.UZikalala uthe ububha yisitha esikhulu somphakathi.“Indlala ayifuneki ngoba iphuca abantu isithunzi sabo,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe bazizwa bethobekile ngenqubekelaphambili esizuzwe yisifundazwe ekwenzeni ngcono impilo yabantu.Uncome uNdunankulu ophumayo uMnuz Willies Mchunu noNdunankulu wokuqala wesifundazwe uDkt Frank Mdlaloso wathi benze isisekelo esibalukelile ekuhambiseni izidingo kubantu okumele aqhubeke kusona.“Isifundazwe sakithi sesizuze impumelelo enkulu ekuhanjisweni kwezidingo kubantu kodwa ngenxa yokuguquka kwesimo sezulu nokuguga kwengqalasizinda konke lokhu sekubuyele emuva,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe inkinga ebhekene kakhulu nabantu esifundazweni wukushoda kwamanzi.“’Uhulumeni wesifundazwe uzoxhumana nomasipala uhlole ukuthi uhlelo lokuhanjiswa kwamanzi kubantu luhamba kanjani ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi siyakwazi ukumelana nezimfuno zabantu,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe into yesibili eseqhulwini wukudala amathuba emisebenzi ukuze behlise izinga eliphezulu lokungasebenzi kwabantu.“Sizoqinisa izinhlelo zokuthuthukisa amakhono kubantu ikakhulukazi intsha ukuze ikwazi ukuthola imisebenzi noma izidalele yona amathuba,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe bazobheka kakhulu imboni kakotini ngoba iyona ekwazi ukuqasha abantu abaningi abasuke bengafundanga kakhulu.“Enye into esizoyibheka ngeso elibanzi ukuthuthukisa umnotho lokho okuzophinde kusisize ekudaleni amathuba emisebenzi,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe ezemfundo nazo bazozisebenzisa kahle bazihlele ngendlela yokuthi ziyakwazi ukuhlinzeka ngamakhono.
title: Izethembiso zikaNdunankulu omusha waseKZN

text: SEKUYOMELE iBafana Bafana iyodlala ibhola lasemasontweni uma ihluleka wukudlulela esigabeni somkhumulajezi kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) engoJuni e-Egypt.Lokhu kushiwo u-Ephraim “Jomo” Sono emuva kokuqhathwa kwamazwe awu-24 azodlala kulo mqhudelwano ngempelasonto.IBafana ingene kuGroup D neMorocco, Ivory Coast neNamibia, iqoqo abaningi abalibona njengelinzima.Kungokokuqala i-Afcon idlalwa ngamazwe awu-24. Amaqembu amabili azoqeda phezulu emaqoqweni ayisithupha azodlulela phambili namanye amane azoqeda ngamaphuzu angcono endaweni yesithathu, okusho ukuthi awu-16 amaqembu okumele angene esigabeni somkhumulajezi.Kungalesi sizathu uSono, owake wapheka iBafana, ebona kufanele iyodlala nezalukazi namakhehla uma ingasheshe iphume kulo mqhudelwano.“Ngicabanga ukuthi bazokwenza kahle. Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi sizoyishaya iNamibia. I-Ivory Coast ayikaze isehlule. IMorocco sayishaya kuma-quarterfinal eBurkina Faso (kunguyena uSono umqeqeshi). Ngokwami akulona iqoqo elinzima leli. Singadlula nje ngoba kufanele kuphume amaqembu amabili phezulu namane azoqeda kangcono. INingizimu Afrika kufanele ibe kwamabili aphezulu noma ibalwe namaqembu amane. Uma bengakwazi ukwenza njalo hhayi kusho ukuthi kumele siyodlala kula maligi amasonto,” kusho uSono.Ngokubona kukaSono iBafana inabadlali abahle, ingahamba ibanga elide kwi-Afcon.“Konke kuzoncika osukwini ukuthi silulungisele kanjani (umdlalo). Kodwa uma ubheka umlando weqembu belenza kahle emidlalweni yasekuhambeni bese lifike lixakeke lapha ekhaya. Singalihamba ibanga elide.”Umqeqeshi weBafana, uStuart Baxter, utshele abezindaba ngoMgqibelo ukuthi ubona enethuba elilinganayo namaqembu abaqhathwe nawo lokudlulela phambili.“Leli yiqoqo esizoya kulo ngaphandle kokuba nokuzingabaza. Nabo bazoza kithina besazi ukuthi siyingozi. Nakuba kunjalo akufanele siyibukele phansi iNamibia uma ubheka indlela ezibekisele ngayo indawo. Ngeke kube lula ukudlala nayo kuwona wonke umuntu. Iqoqo ngilibona linzima kodwa futhi lihle,” kusho uBaxter kwi-website yeSafa.IBafana izovula umqhudelwano ne-Ivory Coast ngoJuni 24 eCairo, ilandele neNamibia ngoJuni 28, ivale neMorocco ngoJulayi 1.
title: ‘Akufanele sisheshe siphume kwi-Afcon’

text: IPHINI likaMengameli wezwe uMnuz David Mabuza uxwayise ngesivuvu sesithathu seCovid-19 kuleli.UMabuza obephendula imibuzo ePhalamende izolo unxuse abantu ukuthi balandele imigomo yezempilo ukuze bangasuleleki ngaleli gciwane.Uthe abantu kumele bayigweme imicimbi egcwala kakhulu njengoba sanda isibalo sabatheleleka ngaleli gciwane. “Siyazi ngokwanda kwabasuleleka ngaleli gciwane. Sinxusa abantu ukuthi balandele imigomo yezempilo ukuze bagweme lesi sivuvu sesithathu.” Uthe lesi sivuvu sizolimaza umnotho ovele udonsa kanzima. Odabeni luka-Eskom, uthe uhulumeni usevumelene ne-Eskom nomasipala ukuba le nkampani kube yiyona eqoqa imali komasipala ababakweleta imali engaphezu kukaR30 billion.Lokhu kuzokwenza omasipala bakwazi ukukhuphula imali abayiqoqayo.UMabuza utshele iPhalamendeukuthi kuvunyelwene nomasipala abangu-18 abakweleta i-Eskom imali eningi.Phambilini i-Eskom ike yazama ukuya nasezinkantolo ifuna ukuba ithole imali eyikweletwa womasipala.Kokunye i-Eskom icime ugesi komasipala abangakhokhi.“Sinesivumelwane nomasipala abakweleta i-Eskom, ikakhulukazi omasipala abangu-18 abakweleta imali eningi. Sizonikeza imvume i-Eskom ukuba iqoqe imali,” kusho uMabuza.
title: UMabuza uxwayisa ngesivuvu seCovid-19

text: SISENGCUPHENI yokunqanyulelwa ugesi sidlelwe nempahla isikole samabanga aphezulu eMlaza, esimanaphanapha izikweletu.Bamincile othisha nabafundi base-Okumhlophe Secondary emuva kokufika kwencwadi yesikweletu esifinyelela kuR726 106.29. Incwadi ebhalwe ngoJulayi 9 wuphiko lukamgcinimafa kuMasipala weTheku iveza ukuthi lesi sikole sizonqanyulelwa ugesi uma ingakhokhiwe le mali. Phezu kwalesi sikweletu lesi sikole siphinde sikwelete uR219 040.95 wenkampani ezimele esebenza ngemishini, okuthiwa yafaka amakhamera ezokuphepha ngo-2013. Isolezwe linalo uhla lwezimpahla esezikhonjwe isikhonzi senkantolo ukuthi zizoshaqwa uma singakhokhwa lesi sikweletu. Kulezi zimpahla kubalwa ezisehhovisini likathishanhloko nasemagunjini othisha. Ezimpahleni ezizoshaqwa kubhalwe imishini emine yokugaya amaphepha nemibili yokuprinta, amafriji amane, amakhamera nenqwaba yezihlalo namadeski.Incwadi esayinwe isikhonzi seNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini,iveza ukuthi kugunyazwe ngoJulayi 27 ukuthi kuhlonzwe impahla ezoshaqwa.USihlalo wesigungu sabazali uNkk Queen Mkhonde uthe usashaqekile ngoba bebengazazi zonke lezi zikweletu.“Ngafika esikoleni ngoLwesibili nganikezwa incwadi yesikweletu sikagesi, kukhona nomhloli. Bengivele ngisamangazwe yilena yokushaqwa kwempahla,”echaza.Uthe ugesi awukanqanyulwa kodwa bahlezi manzonzwane ngoba abazi uzonqanyulwa nini. Mayelana nencwadi yesikhonzi senkantolo uNkk Mkhombe uthe ngo-2013 isikole sathenga amakhamera ezokuphepha ngenxa yokuthi bekuhlasele ubugebengu. Yize ayengakabi yilungu lesigungu, uthe bayazi ngalama khamera kodwa awasekho esikoleni. Uveze ukuthi ngonyaka odlule kwafakwa amanye kwahlelwa nendlela yokuwakhokhela.“Kuduma ikhanda ngendlela izinkinga eziningi ngayo kulesi sikole,"kusho yena."Kumanje abafundi abawatholile amaripoti okusho ukuthi abakwa-matric ngeke bakwazi nokufaka izicelo ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme. Konke lokhu kudalwa ukuthi isikole asinaye uthishanhloko."Uthe namuhla bazoya kubammeli benkampani abayikweletayo ukuyokhuluma ngesikweletu.Ngenyanga edlule abazali bakulesi sikole bavala amasango befuna ukuthi uMnyango wezeMfundo ucacise ngodaba lukathishanhloko okuthiwa sekuphele unyaka isikole singenaye. Kuthiwa kwenziwa inhlolokhono kodwa akekho oseqashiwe. UNkk Mkhombe uthe kumanje abazi ukuthi bazolethelwa nini uthishahloko omusha.Okhulumela uMnyango uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa uthe isifunda saseMlaza asikaze sibikelwe ukuthi kunesikole esikweletayo.Uthe bazolinda ukubikelwa isikole ukuze bakwazi ukungenelela.NgoFebhuwari nonyaka kwanqanyulwa ugesi eMlazi Comtech High ngenxa yesikweletu sikagesi, okwaze kwabizwa umhlangano ophuthumayo ukuxazulula lolu daba. IMeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede eyabiza umhlangano, yakuhlaba ukunqanyulwa kukagesi ezikoleni, yathi bekungewona umyalelo wayo.Izolo isitatimende esithunyelwe uMasipala sithe ngeke uphawule ngodaba lwase-Okumhlophe ngoba luphakathi kwawo nekhasimende.
title: Isikole nesikweletu sikaR700 000

text: UPHINDE wakugcizelela ukuthi uzokwenza indumezulu yomcimbi enkundleni yezemidlalo yaseThekwini, iMoses Mabhida Stadium, kulo nyaka umrepha uCassper Nyovest.UCassper, odabuka eMafikeng eNorth West, wamemezela ukuthi kulo nyaka uzoza eThekwini ezokwenza umcimbi wokugcwalisa iMoses Mabhida Stadium.Wakusho lokhu ngemuva kokudayisa amathikithi alinganiselwa ku-68 000 emcimbini wakhe iFill Up FNB Stadium ngoDisemba 2 ngonyaka odlule.Emcimbini abenandisa kuwo okokuqala eThekwini kulo nyaka obuseYadini Lounge, uCassper utshele izethameli ukuthi uyalithanda leli dolobha.“Ngicabanga ukuthi ngizoshadelwa kuleli dolobha, madoda, ngiyalithanda leli dolobha,” kusho uCassper.Utshele abantu ukuthi nakanjani uzowenza umcimbi wakhe eMoses Mabhida Stadium. Uze wabenza ukuthi bacule bathi “Moses Mabhida, Moses Mabhida”.Abantu baculele phezulu bekhombisa injabulo wathi bazohlangana khona enkundleni ngasekupheleni konyaka.Kuzobe kungokokuqala ukuthi lo mrepha wodumo lwezingoma ethi Doc Shebeleza, Tito Mboweni, Destiny nezinye azame ukugcwalisa inkundla engaphandle kwaseGoli.Waqala ngo-2015 enza iFill Up The Dome wagcwalisa iTicketpro Dome emumatha abantu abangu-20 000. Ngo-2016 udlulele e-Orlando Stadium enza umcimbi iFill Up Orlando Stadium, nyanyeke waya eFNB Stadium njengoba eseza eThekwini nje.Umculi kamaskanda uKhuzani wamphonsela inselelo ngokuthi nguye ozoyigcwalisa kuqala iMoses Mabhida Stadium kulo nyaka.
title: UCassper uqinisekise eyokugcwalisa iMabhida

text: USAHLALELE ethembeni ngokuvikela ibhande lakhe umpetha weWorld Boxing Federation (WBF) Female super welterweight, uNoni “She Bee Stingin” Tenge, osenqunyelwe ugwayi katiki.UTenge wase-East London kodwa osezinze eBhayi, ugcine ukungena eringini ngo-Agasti nyakenye evikela ngempumelelo ibhande kuMapule Ngubane waseMgungundlovu. Kuvele ukuthi inhlangano iWBF isimthumelele isexwayiso sokuthi uma engalivikeli emuva kwezinyanga eziyisithupha, izomephuca.UTenge, okunguyena kuphela umshayisibhakela wesifazane e-Afrika osewine amabhande omhlaba ayisihlanu, uphucwe ibhade le-International Boxing Federation (IBF) ngo-2012 ngenxa yokungalivikeli. Ubekade eliwine emuva kokwehlula uDaniella “Diamond” Smith waseNew Zealand.“Isingifonelile i-WBF mayelana nokuthi ngivikele ibhande. Basinike izinyanga eziyisithupha, ngaphandle kwalokho bazolithatha ibhande ekupheleni kukaMashi. Kodwa sesivele sihlele ukuthi ngiyolivikela ngoJanuwari eLas Vegas. Okwesithathu sithola ithuba kodwa besizichitha izicelo ngoba bengingekho esimeni esihle futhi besithola izimpi zesisindo esingaphezulu,” kusho uTenge.“Kulokhu anginalo uvalo lokuphucwa ibhande ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi konke kuzohamba ngokohlelo. Kuyaphoqa manje ukuthi ngilivikele. Ngiyazi kulokhu ukuthi ngizochitha isikhathi esiningi ejimini kuze kufike usuku lwempi. Isifiso sami wukungena kwiHall of Fame nokuyeka isibhakela ngiwumpetha.”UTenge, oseneziqu zeSport Management, utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi usenabaxhasi okokuqala empilweni yakhe emuva kokudonsa kanzima iminyaka ewu-15 eyibhokisa. Useqeqeshwa nguWinston Wilson e-Edge Gym.“Ngigqokiswa iPuma manje. Ngijabule kakhulu. Ngiyaqala ukuthola abaxhasi empilweni yami. Yinto osekunesikhathi ngiyifuna, angizange ngiyithole ngesikhathi ngisesekhaya. UThixo mkhulu. Ngijima ejimini esezingeni lomhlaba. Akukho engikhala ngakho. Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi kuzofika isikhathi sempi ngisesimeni esihle,” kusho uTenge.
title: UTenge nethemba lokuvikela ibhande

text: UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, uthe uzwile ukuthi kukhona abathi ukuvulwa kwezikole kuzobeka abafundi engcupheni yokubulawa yigciwane.“Akulona iqiniso lokho ngoba selokhu kuvulwe izikole akekho umfundi obulawe ukuhaqwa yigciwane yize bekhona eselike labangena. Kwabona labo bafundi babengalitholanga esikoleni. Sidlulisa amazwi enduduzo emindenini yothisha abashone ngemuva kokuhaqwa yigciwane,” kusho yena.UMshengu usho lokhu ngesikhathi evakashele esikoleni iZwelibanzi High, eMlaza, ngoMsombuluko njengoba kade kuvula amanye amabanga.Uthe izikole zaKwaZulu-Natal bezikulungiselele ukwamukela abanye abafundi.Kulesi sikole uthe bonke abafundi banikezwe izinsiza zokuzivikela kwiCovid-19. Inkinga ayibonile ukuthi isikhala asikho ngaphakathi esikoleni ngakho abafundi kuzodingeka ukuthi bafunde ngendlela engafani nakwenzinye izikole.“Abafundi baningi, amakilasi awaneli uma abafundi behlukaniswa ngenxa yokuthi kumele baqhelelane. Ayikho indawo yokubeka amakilasi angomahamba nendlwana. Akukho okungenziwa ngaphandle kokuthi abafundi bashintshane emakilasini akhona. Umatric kumele uhlale ukhona esikoleni. Kusho ukuthi amanye amakilasi kumele ashintshane ngezinsuku zokuza ezikoleni okungagcina kuholele ekutheni kube nekilasi eliya kanye esikoleni ngesonto,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi iningi labazali KwaZulu-Natal likhethe ukuzibuyisela ezikoleni izingane kunokuthi zizifundele emakhaya.“Kuyasijabulisa ukuthi abazali bakhethe ukuthi abafundi babuyele ezikoleni. Ngakolunye uhlangothi siyazi ukuthi ukufundela ekhaya kudinga ukuthi umzali abambe iqhaza elikhulu ekufundeni kwengane yakhe. Akubona bonke abazali abangakwazi ukwenza lokho ngoba indlela okufundwa ngayo manje ihlukile kunendlela okwakufundwa ngayo phambilini kanti thina sifuna ukuthi bonke abafundi bathole ithuba elilinganayo,” kusho yena.Uthe umnyango usukhiphe izikhala zothisha abangu-20 00 abazosiza uma kwenzeka kuba nothisha abangakwazi ukuya esikoleni ngenxa yokuthi izifo abanazo zingababeka engcupheni yokuthi bayithole kalula iCorona.
title: ‘Akunamfundi ofe ngeCorona eKZN’

text: KUNGENZEKA yini ukuthi kukhona esingakwazi okutshelwe abadlali ngomklomelo ozonikwa umdlali okunguyena ozobaqwaqwada bonke emkhanda ngokuwugwaza ekhaya umkhonto kule sizini ye-Absa Premiership ka-2018/2019?Kuze kube yimanje bane abadlali asebeliqabulise inethi ngasekhaya yize isizini isephansi. Yingakho kuvela umbuzo ngokuthi ukhona yini umklomelo wokuwugwaza ekhaya ozonikwa umdlali ekupheleni kwesizini. Indaba yokuwugwaza ekhaya umkhonto ibisematheni nangesikhathi kudlalwa iNdebe yoMhlaba eRussia.Isibalo samagoli angene ngasekhaya eRussia siphindwe kabili okuyisona ebesiyirekhodi lamagoli ayisithupha angene enethini kungafanele kwiNdebe yoMhlaba eyayiseFrance ngo-1998. ERussia abe wu-12 amagoli angene ngephutha umdlali elishaya ngasekhaya igoli.Nesigaba esikhulu sePremier Soccer League (PSL) sibukeka sisendleleni ebheke ekuphuleni amarekhodi uma uzoqaphela ukuthi ngemuva kwemidlalo emithathu noma emine sekunomdlali osewashaye aze aba mabili amagoli ngasekhaya.UGledwin Shitolo we-Orlando Pirates ushiywe ngaphandle engalimele iqembu lakhe lithelwa othulini ngo 1-0 yiBloemfontein Celtic ngeSonto. Kungenzeka ukuthi uMilutin Sredojevic ubembeke ngaphandle ngoba esaba ukuthi uzophinda akwenze bevula isizini neHighlands Park. Akubanga iphutha lakhe njalo lo mdlalo kulo mdlalo kodwa uWayne Sandilands owenza into engakaze ibonakale kodwa ibhadi lasala noShitolo ngoba igoli libhalwe ngaye.Nangesikhahti beshaywa yiBidvest Wits ngo 1-0 ibhola lithinte yena uShitolo ngaphambi kokuthi lidle uSiyabonga Mpontshane. Akayedwa lapha uShitolo ngoba uDaniel Cardoso weKaizer Chiefs wenze okufanayo eyeka ibhola ukuba ligqome phansi wase ezama ukulungisa lelo phutha ngokuphambanisa unozinti wakhe u-Itumeleng Khune nebhola bebhekene neBaroka FC.UGaona Modisane weChippa United isimo sakhe sicishe sifane nesikaShitolo ngoba yena igoli alishaye ngasekhaya lishaye ipali labuyela kuyena wangakwazi ukulivika. Bekuyi-freekick kaJustin Shonga iBucs inqoba ngalo lelo goli elingene ngasekhaya kwiChippa.UMbongeni Gumede waMaZulu FC uyena umdlali ogcinile ukuyenza le nto. UGumede uvule inkundla kodwa bamsiza ozakwabo bashaya amagoli amabili banqoba ngo 2-1 kwiFree State Stars ngeSonto.
title: Umbuzo ngomkhonto ogwaza ekhaya kwabePSL

text: BAKHALA ezimathonsi abesifazane baseClermont, eThekwini, abalahlekelwa amadilozi ezindlini bekhiyile nasocingweni uma bewanekile.Okubakhathaza kakhulu ukuthi la madilozi afike anyamalale ngokwehlukana kodwa avumbuke ndawonye esegqitshiwe, amanye eyimfumba phezu kwezindlu.Lo mkhuba kuthiwa selokhu uqale ngoDisemba nyakenye. Iningi likhathazekile ngoba kulahleke amadilozi baqala baba nenkinga yokopha okungapheli nenkinga yesinye.Omunye wabantu asebephila ngodokotela, uNksz Thembelihle Khanyile (43) othole amadilozi akhe amabili kwamathathu amlahlekele ngoDisemba.“Ngangiwaneke ocingweni ngathi sengiyowathula awasekho. Okungixakayo ukuthi elomntwana wami lalahleka endlini. Angazi ukuthi kumele ngiwenzenjani njengoba esetholakele. Angazi kuzokwenzekani uma ngiwashisa. Ngiyesaba. Kodwa siyabona kumele singalali manje sigade ngisho ebusuku le nto esintshontshelayo,” kusho uNksz Khanyile.UNksz Kholeka Phungula (23) ukhala ngokuthi usehlala esesikhathini noma kungezona izinsuku zakhe.“Emva kokuthi elahlekile ngaqala ngaba nenkinga esinyeni. Ngaqala ngaya kabili ngenyanga esikhathini ngaze ngaya kumuntu obonayo. Le nto iyangihlukumeza ngoba sengihlala ngopha,” kusho uNksz Phungula.UNksz Nelisiwe Hlongwane (19) obone la madilozi phezu kwendlu aqashe kuyo, uthi ngenkathi evuka belilodwa, kodwa wathi uma edonsa phezulu kwaqathaka inqwaba.Noma sekuvumbuke inqwaba yamadilozi, ivumbuka kusenenqwaba yabesifazane abakhalayo ngoba akuveli noma elilodwa kwawabo.UNksz Xoli Bhengu (26) yena ungomunye wabo njengoba kungakaveli nelilodwa kumadilozi akhe amahlanu alahlekile.UNksz Akhona Dlamini (22) naye ukhala esifanayo njengoba ethi yena kulahleka amaG string kuphela kuye.UNksz Thenjiwe Dlamini (32), uthi kwaduka amadilozi amathathu njengoba esathole amabili, kusekhona elishodayo.UNksz Londiwe Zikode (34) naye wadukelwa amathathu kodwa wathola amabili, wavele wawashisa ngoba esewasaba.Ungoti wezengqondo uDkt Manqoba Myeni, uthi ukunyamalala kwamadilozi abesifazane kuwumkhuba omdala owenziwa abesilisa abenelisa imizwa yabo yocansi ngasese.“Lolu uphawu lokuphazamiseka komuntu emqondweni. Imvamisa bantshontsha amadilozi abantu ababaziyo ukuze ezomcabanga bese kuneliseka imizwa yakhe yocansi. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi baba yingozi kubantu besifazane laba abenza lokhu ngoba uma lingekho eduze, angadlwengula lowo ambonayo,” kusho uMyeni.Ungoti wabeLaphi beNdabuko kuleli, uDkt Sazi Mhlongo, uthe abukho ubungozi obutheni uma litholakala idilozi.“Inkinga uma lingatholakali kusuke kusho ukuthi kukhona umthakathi oyoganga ngalo. Kufanele umuntu odukelwe impahla yangaphansi athole umelaphi ozomnika intelezi yokugeza. Kodwa ngesinye isikhathi kuyenzeka izimpahla zangaphansi zabesifazane zintshontshwe isigangi, hhayi ngoba kukhona okubi,” kusho uMhlongo.
title: Bebelwa amaphenti bewaneke ocingweni

text: SEKUPHELE iminyaka emihlanu owesifazane ‘onewele’ elashona waseTshelimnyama, eMariannhill, entshonalanga yeTheku, elinde ukuvuswa wuMnyango wezaseKhaya.UNksz Nompumelelo Dlamini (24) uthi akazi ukuthi yini eshodayo ngoba kulokhu kuthiwa akalinde udaba lwakhe lusacutshungulwa. Uthe wezwa ngo-2012 ngesikhathi eyoshaya umazisi wakhe wokuqala ukuthi washona ngo-2006.Ngokwemininingwane yomnyango usebenzisa isitifiketi sowesifazane onegama nesibongo esifana nesakhe owazalwa ngosuku olufana nolwakhe. Lo wesifazane owashona owaseGauteng, wazalelwa khona futhi washonela khona.Uma kubhekwa ngaphansi kwegama likanina akaveli, kusolwa ukuthi ngesikhathi unina ezomenzela isitifiketi sokuzalwa akazange afakwe ngaphansi kwegama likanina.“Ngisola ukuthi umsebenzi walo mnyango wavele wagaya isitifiketi ngegama elase livele likhona elifana nelami wangazikhathaza ngokungifaka ngaphansi kwegama likamama ngoba angiveli. Ngo-2012 ngangishaya umazisi ngithi ngenzela ukuthi ngibhale u-matric ngonyaka olandelayo ngahlangabezana nale mbibizane,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi kwathiwa akalethe yonke imininingwane ekhombisa ukuthi ungumuntu ohlukile kuhlanganisa neyezingane zakubo kanye nekanina owashona ngo-2002.“Kwathiwa leli phutha lizolungiswa ngemuva kwezinyanga ezimbili ehhovisi elisePinetown okuyilona engilisebenzisayo kodwa njalo uma ngiyobheka bekufunwa izinto ezehlukene kuthiwe ziyashoda. Ngigcine sengicela umphathi wakhona ngifuna ukwazi ukuthi yini ngempela edingekayo? Wangigcwalisisa wonke amaphepha, manje kuthiwa kulindwe ihhovisi elisePitoli okuyilona okumele lithathe isinqumo ngodaba lwami. Uma ngishaya ucingo kuthiwa kusabhekwa ifomu elagcwaliswa ngesikhathi kushone ‘iwele’ lami. Sekuphele iminyaka emibili ngilinde lelo fomu elibizwa ngeBI form,” kusho yena.Le ntokazi ithi yawubhala u-matric kodwa ngendlela okuchazwa ngayo ibona sengathi leso sitifiketi kufana nokuthi esalo wesifazane owashona.“Nginezingane ezimbili eyodwa ineminyaka emihlanu kumele ngabe sengiyibhalisile esikoleni ukuze iyofunda uGrade R, esikoleni bayenqaba bathi abakwazi ukuthatha ingane engenaso isitifiketi. Angazi ukuthi kumele ngenzenjani? Ugogo obekunguyena obengisiza ngezinto eziningi ezithinta lesi sicelo ushone ngo-Ephreli. Angisenaye omunye umuntu omdala ongafakwa imibuzo ngokuzalwa kwami,” kusho yena.UMnuz David Hlabane okhulumela uMnyango wezaseKhaya kuleli, uthe udaba lukaNksz Dlamini uzolwedlulisela ophikweni olufanele okuyilo oluzophenya ukuthi kungani lungaphothulwa?
title: Usalinde ukuvuswa kwabafileyo

text: OBENYINTOMBI nto ukhala ngomculi wowokholo uDumi Mkokstad ukuthi umkhulelisile maqede wamphoqa ukuthi akhiphe isisu.UNomfundo Ngcobo (21) waseSipingo Hills eningizimu yeTheku, uthe sebevumelene nomndeni wakhe ngokuthi uDumi kumele ahlawule ngamacala akhe. Uthe bavumelene nonina namanye amalungu omndeni ukuthi kuzomele azokhokha amademeshe ageze nomuzi.Uthe wayengakaze alale nomuntu wesilisa ngesikhathi elala noMkokstad odume ngokucula ezokholo aze akhase phansi.“Sahlangana noDumi kuFacebook ngo-Agasti nyakenye. Saqala saba abangani sagcina sesijola. Sahlangana wangiyisa lapho ehlala khona eMusgrave. Endlini safica umfowabo ehleli nentombi yakhe. Sahlala kancane nabo basishiya sobabili. Kulapho-ke uDumi angiqukula khona wayongiphonsa embhedeni, wangikhumula, maqede walala nami. Kwahlula ngimncenga ukuthi akafake ikhondomu, wangibuza ukuthi uzolala kanjani nentombi nto ngekhondomu. Wangizwisa ubuhlungu obuyisimanga. Emva kwalokho walala wabheka phezulu ejuluke emanzi te eqhaqhazela,” kusho uNomfundo.UMCULI wowokholo uDumi Mkokstad okuthiwa ukhulelise owesifazane wase emphoqa ukuthi akhiphe isisu Isithombe: SIGCINIWEUthi emva kwalokho bahlala kancane, uDumi wamphelezela, wamshiya ematekisini aya eMlazi, wamnika u-R100 wawunqaba.“Besesilokhu sixhumana njengabantu abathandanayo. Bengimvakashele nase-studio sakhe esikuWest Walk. NgoSepthemba siphinde sahlangana eflethini lakhe, saya ocansini futhi. Ngamcela futhi ukuthi afake ikhondomu, wanqaba wathi uma esefika kuvuthondaba uzochithela ngaphandle, kodwa wangakwenza. Wathi angithenge amaphilisi ama-morning after. Ngawathenga, kodwa awangisizanga ngoba ngakhulelwa yize ngiwaphuzile.”Uqhube wathi wadlulwa yizinsuku zokuya esikhathini, wathenga ipregnancy test kit, wazihlola kodwa kwangavela ukuthi ukhulelwe.“Ngamtshela uDumi ukuthi ngisola ukuthi ngikhulelwe. Wathi angiye kudokotela, ngathola ukuthi nginenyanga ngikhulelwe. Ngamtshela uDumi ngokukhulelwa kwami, kwathi akangidle angifele. Wathi angisikhiphe isisu ngoba ngeke ayondle ingane uma ngingayikhiphi. Waze wangiyalela ukuthi kuzomele ngiyosikhipha kuWest Walk. Wathi angiyobuza ukuthi yimalini ukusikhipha, kwathiwa * -R500. Ngamtshela wangithumelela uR700, ngasikhipha.”Isolezwe ngeSonto linayo imiyalezo ebhalwe ukuthi iqhamuka kuDumi.Omunye wayo okaR700 ofakwe nge-ewallet.Emva kwalokho bese bumuncu ubudlelwano babo.UNomfundo uthi izinto zibhimbe emva kokuveza ukuthi ukhulelwe.Uveze ukuthi uDumi ubengasazibambi izingcingo zakhe.UNomfundo uthe ngesikhathi etshela uDumi ngokukhulelwa kwakhe wathi akayifuni ingane ngoba enye anayo wayithola ngalolu hlobo.Ethintwa uDumi Mkokstad uqale wakhuluma kahle lungakabuzwa udaba lukaNomfundo.Esebuzwa ngalo uvele washintsha esithubeni wacela ukuthi athunyelelwe i-e-mail ukuze aphendule kuyona maqede wavala ucingo engakayisho nayo.Umyalezo athunyelelwe wona wokuthi athumele i-e-mail akawuphendulanga. Nowesibili athunyelelwe wona wokuthi aphawule ngalolu daba nawo akawuphendulanga.Imenenja yakhe uMxolisi Mhlongo ithe ayiphawuli ngoba lolu daba luthinta ngqo uDumi.
title: Usola uMkokstad ngokumkhiphisa isisu

text: MHLELI: Ake ngiphawule ngalolu daba lokungaqini kwezokuphepha ezikoleni ngoba maningi amacala asebikiwe mayelana nezitshudeni ezishonela emagcekeni esikole okuyinto engayinhle ngoba abazali basuke bethembe ukuthi izingane zabo zivikelekile.Siyizitshudeni sibhekene nezinkinga eziningi sizizwa singaphephile emanyuvesi. Sekukaningi sizwa kuthiwa isitshudeni silimale singaphakathi enyuvesi.Kushone isitshudeni eDUT ngenxa yodlame nokungabibikho kwezokuphepha eziqinile futhi akukho okwenzekayo noma izinyathelo azithathiwe ukukhombisa ukuthi bazoboshwa ababulele isitshudeni. Kungasijabulisa ukuthi abasezikhundleni kuhulumeni bangenele kulolu daba ngoba kubonakala sengathi bayahluleka abaphathi benyuvesi.Okubuhlungu wukuthi konke lokhu okwenzekile kwenzeke emakilasini okufunda. Sesiyesaba nokuyofunda ngoba sizizwa singavikelekile futhi nabazali bethu bathukile ngalesi sigameko. Kunzima uma sekwenzeka izinto ezifana nalezi.Emanyuvesi nasezikoleni kumele kunyuswe izinga lezokuphepha ukuze izitshudeni zivikeleke nokufunda kuqhubeke kahle.Sanelisiwe WenziETHEKWINI
title: Akuqiniswe ezokuphepha emanyuvesi

text: USHAYISANA ngamakhanda umndeni wendoda yaseMnambithi enyamalale isanda kwesula emsebenzini yathola nemali yempesheni.UMnuz Vusumuzi Emmanuel Dlamini (52), obesebenza eMnyangweni wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi, kuthiwa wanyamalala ngoFebhuwari 23 eseyitholile imali yokwesula emsebenzini.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo osondelene nalolu daba ukuthi abanye bafuna kuphenywe unina wezingane, uNksz Mbali Shabalala, obengumasihlalisane ngokunyamalala kwakhe. Kuthiwa ngesikhathi enyamalala unina wezingane ubesephindele kubo.Uninalume kaVusumuzi, uMnuz Dumisani Dlamini, uthe bakhathazekile ngokunyamalala komshana wakhe. Uthe abanandaba nemali abeyitholile kodwa bafuna ithambo lakhe.UDlamini uthe sebebheke ezibhedlela nasemakhazeni kodwa awukho umkhondo.Yize ethe akayazi imali ephumele umshana wakhe, uthe bekungeyempesheni.Uthe bezwe ngonina wezingane ngoba sebeqala imizamo yokumfuna ukuthi ubeseyitholile imali.“Ngokusho kukamasihlalisane wakhe uthe ayikho ingxabano ebiphakathi kwabo. Ngokuqhubeka kokuchaza kwakhe kuvela ukuthi uVusumuzi wabaxosha yena nezingane ngaphambi kokunyamalala, wabaqashela imoto ukuba babuyele kubo nezingane,” kuchaza uDlamini.“Usitshele ukuthi wamupha uR20 000 ngaphambi kokunyamalala. Siyile emsebenzini baqinisekisa ukuthi wesula wayithola nemali esingasibuzanga isamba sayo ngoba kuzoba ngathi sifuna yona,” kuqhuba uDlamini.Uthe uVusumuzi wayesanda kumthumelela umyalezo ethi umkhumbule. Okwenza badideke wukuthi ziningi izinkulumo ngoba naye umasihlalisane ubatshela ukuthi ubesethandana nowesifazane wokufika.Kuthiwa unina wezingane uye yedwa enyangeni athe imtshele ukuthi uVusumuzi useNewcastle. Ngokusho kukaDlamini bebesalinde unina wezingane ukuthi abaphindise enyangeni aya kuyo ukuze nabo bazizwele. Kuthiwa uVusumuzi ubenezingane ezimbili abehlala nazo nonina wazo.UNksz Shabalala uthe uVusumusi wamgcina ngoMsombuluko (Febhuwari 17), wanyamalala ngoLwesithathu (Febhuwari 19).Uthe wathi abaphindele kubo ngoba usafuna ukuyobona unina eThekwini.“Ngamshayela ucingo ngoLwesithathu (Febhuwari 19) wangalubamba. Ngacela udadewethu angiphelezele siyombheka endlini yakhe. Safika kungakhiyiwe kodwa engekho. Kuthe uma kushona ilanga engabuyi, ngakhiya sahamba,” kuchaza uNksz Shabalala.Uthe akazi yimalini ayeyitholile kodwa wamfakela uR20 000 kwi-akhawunti yakhe wathi usathole imali yamalivu emsebenzini.UNksz Shabalala uvumile ukuthi ubemsola ngokuthandana nowokufika, athe naye wamfonela ezama ukulandela umkhondo wangathola lutho.Uthe akufani noyise wezingane zakhe ukunyamalala ngoba uzikhonze kakhulu izingane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe namanje akukho mkhondo ngokunyamalala kukaVusumuzi. Unxuse ongaba nolwazi ngokunyamalala kwakhe ukuthi ashayele amaphoyisa aseMnambithi ku-036 638 3312 noma bashayele iCrime Stop kwethi: 08600 10111.
title: Unyamalele obesule emsebenzini

text: USIHLALO wenhlangano elwa nokwebiwa kwemfuyo iNkanyamba, uMnuz Tallman Zuma ufuna kube nezinkantolo ezibhekele amacala emfuyo. UZuma usho lokhu ngemva kokuboshwa kowesilisa (35) osolwa ngokweba imfuyo nokuzama ukuwagwazela ngoR3000.UZuma uncome amaphoyisa ngokubopha le ndoda wathi umsebenzi wawo awufanele uphelele esithubeni kodwa kufanele agwetshwe kanzima owebe imfuyo.“Siyawabonga amaphoyisa abophe indoda eyebe imfuyo ngoba kulezi zinsuku abantu bayafa ngenxa yokwebiwa kwemfuyo. Ukube amaphoyisa asebenza njengalawa aseMgungundlovu, ngabe asinazo izigameko ezifana nezaseZwelibomvu ngaKwaNdengezi lapho kubulawe abasolwa ngokweba imfuyo,” kusho uZuma.Uqhube wathi akusikhona eZwelibomvu kuphela lapho kufa abantu ngenxa yokwebiwa kwemfuyo kodwa naseWeenen nakoVolkrust uyabizwa ngenxa yamacala emfuyo.“Sidinga izinkantolo ezibhekele amacala emfuyo ngoba amaphoyisa afike ambophe umuntu bese inkantolo imshaya ngoswazi oluncane. Sifuna bagwetshwe kanzima abeba imfuyo ukuze nabasacabanga ukwenza lobu bugebengu bangalokothi baqale,” kusho uZuma.UColonel Thembeka Mbele wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe amaphoyisa ophiko lwemfuyo aseMgungundlovu ehambisana nakaMasipala weTheku, abophe indoda (35) ngoLwesihlanu emuva kokuthi izame ukuwagwazeka ngoR3 000.Kuthiwa le ndoda ibifunwa ngecala lokwebiwa kwezimbuzi eMlaza ngoSepthemba 24.“Amaphoyisa agasele kwa-U eMlaza ehambisana namaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku. Athole lo wesilisa nezimbuzi eziwu-31. Uzame ukuwagwazela ngoR3 000 wacela nokuthi izimbuzi zidedelwe kodwa bambopha. Ubhekene necala lokuzama ukugwazela amaphoyisa nelokweba imfuyo. Uzovela enkantolo yeMantshi yaseMgungundlovu ngo-Okthoba 12 (namhlanje),” kusho uColonel Mbele.
title: Uzovela enkantolo yemantshi umlisa osolwa ngokweba izimbuzi eMlaza

text: AZIZOVALWA isikhathi eside izikole uma kukhona okutholakale ukuthi uneCorona, ngaphakathi esikoleni.Kwi-video ethunyelwe kwabezindaba, uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu uthe uma kutholakala ukuthi kukhona onezimpawu zegciwane, isikole sizovalwa okungenani amahora angu-48 siphinde sivulwe.“Uma kukhona otholakale enegciwane esikoleni, isikole ngeke sivalwe sonke kuzovalwa kuphela indawo ohaqekile abesebenzela kuyo. Noma ngabe siyavalwa ngomyalelo wabezempilo ngeke kube yisikhathi esevile emahoreni angu-48, sifuthwe ngesibulali magciwane,” kusho uMshengu.Uthe bangu- 2 500 osekutholakale ukuthi bahaqekile ezikoleni zakulesi sifundazwe, kubona kubalwa othisha athe yibona abanesibalo esiphezulu njengoba bengu-1 800, abafundi, abahlanza isikole nabanye abasebenzi ngaphakathi ezikoleni.Isekela likaNgqongqoshe eMnyangweni weMfundo eyisiSekelo uDkt Reginah Muhaule uncome izikhulu zomnyango esifundeni iMajuba ngokuba khona kwezinsiza ezikoleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi nothisha baphephile kulo mbhedukazwe.Yena noMshengu bebeye ezikoleni ezintathu Izimbuthu Primary, eMzikilazi Secondary nasesikoleni samabanga aphansi iThamsanqa ezingaphansi kwalesi sifunda khona izolo behlola ukulungela kwazo ukuvula njengoba bekwamukelwa abafundi bakaGrade 7 ngemuva kwekhefu lamasonto amabili behleli emakhaya.“Ezikoleni ezintathu esizivakashele sijabule kakhulu ngoba kukhombisa ukuthi ubuholi bezikole, ubuholi kwisekethe kanjalo nobesifunda buyaziqonda izinselelo zalesi sikhathi futhi buyazi ukuthi kumele bubhekane kanjani nazo,” kusho uDkt Mahaule.Uthe ngokujwayelekile uma bevakashele izikole zasemakhaya kuba nezikhalo ngamanzi kodwa ezikoleni abazihambele esifundeni saseMajuba bekungekho zikhalo namathoyilethi asesimeni esigculisayo.Ekuqaleni kwesonto ekhuluma nabezindaba uMshengu, uthe zizoba namanzi zonke izikole zaKwaZulu-Natal waveza ukuthi bazomba amanzi ngaphansi komhlaba.“Sinezingqinamba zokungabi bikho kwamanzi ezikoleni zethu ngenxa yokuthi imiphakathi ezikuyo nayo ayinawo amanzi. Kwenziwa ucwaningo kwatholakala ukuthi izikole ezingaphezu kuka-650 ezinamanzi ngaphansi komhlaba ngakho sizovula ama-boreholes ukuze zonke izikole zibe namanzi,” kusho uMshengu.Uthe ngalolu ohlelo uMnyango wezeMfundo uzokonga imali ngoba ukuthutha amanzi ngamaloli kudla imali eningi.“Uma senza ama-boreholes kwezinye izikole sizokwazi ukonga imali, siyisebenzisele ukuhambisa ezinye izidingo. Ezikoleni ezingenawo ama-boreholes, sizoqhubeka nokuwathumela ngamaloli,” kusho uMshengu.Uveze ukuthi sebemi ngomumo ukwamukela abafundi ezikoleni njengoba ekupheleni kwenyanga kumele bebe sebebuyele bonke esikoleni. Uthe bazoba nohlelo lokuthi bashintshane ngezinsuku zokuya esikoleni, wanxusa abazali ukuthi balekelele abafundi ngokuthi bafunde emakhaya.Uveze ukuthi bazobuye bathenge namakhishi awu-300 awomahamba nendlwana ngoba kunezikole ezingenawo amakhishi.“Ezinye izikole zisebenzisa amakilasi uma kuphekwa, ezinye zicela ukupheka emizini ewomakhelwane ngoba awekho amakhishi, ” kusho uMshengu.
title: Akuzuvalwa isikhathi eside ezikoleni

text: Kulo mncintiswano kugcine kunqobe uMaster KG ngengoma apike kuyo uZanda Zakuza ethi Skeleton Move. Ngokudla umhlanganiso uzohlomula ngoR10 000 wokuba phambili kwiThobela FM, uR100 000 nemoto iKia Picanto. UPrince Kaybee ophume phambili kuKhozi FM yena uzothola uR10 000.“Kunomsindo okhona kuyimanje abantu bekhalela uKing Monada.“Abanye baze bakhulume indaba yokuthi kunokucwasa ngokobuhlanga kodwa lokho akunasisekelo ngoba uMaser KG naye ngowaseLimpopo.“UPrince Kaybee unqobe kuKhozi kodwa akasiye umZulu. Sizolinda inyanga abantu bafake izikhalo zabo.“Abafuna ukuthi kubalwe kabusha nabo abeze ngoba asifuni ukukhipha umklomelo bese siyowulanda futhi,” kusho u-Owen wenkampani iMichael Owen Productions.U-Owen uthe imthusile indlela abantu abavote ngayo ekubeni bebenezinsuku eziyisikhombisa bevule olayini futhi umncintiswano uqhubeka eziteshini ezimbili.“Sithole amavoti angaphezulu kuka-561 000. Kulokhu sifuna ukuqala ngoNovemba abantu babe nezinyanga ezimbili zokuvota,” kusho u-Owen.UMaster KG, ekhuluma kwiMorning Live izolo ekuseni, uthe akumethusanga ukuphuma phambili.“Bengikulindele lokho. Ngibe nonyaka omuhle. Nginqobe indondo kuma-Afrimma eGhana ngaphinde nganqoba kumaLimpopo Music Awards,” kusho yena.Uthe ivideo yengoma yakhe isibukwe izikhawu ezicela ku-7 million kuYouTube.“Akubanga yinto engithusile,” kusho lo mculi odabuka eTzaneen.Eminyakeni eyedlule kulo mncintiswano kwanqoba uNathi Mankayi ngengoma ethi Nomvula noMroza Fakude ethi Elamanqamu (Van Damme).
title: Umsindo ngeSABC Summer Song

text: UBUQONDA kahle ubunzima obubhekene neqembu lakhe kwi-Under 20 Africa Cup of Nations uThabo Senong olamukele iphuzu acazelane lona neqembu elingosokhaya bemidlalo, iNiger.AmaJita aqale ngokuthola iphuzu ku-Group A lapho ebambane khona neNiger ngo 1-1 eStade Seyni Kountche.“Siqale kahle. Akukho engingakhala ngakho ngoba silitholile iphuzu. Esikwaziyo kodwa wukuthi ubunzima yima buzoqala ngoba imidlalo yethu emibili esele akukhona nje kuphela ukuthi imqoka kepha siyazazela ukuthi izoba nzima,” kusho uSenong.Ezakhe zizobhekana neNigeria kusasa enkundleni efanayo ngaphambi kokuthi zifudukele eMaradi lapho zizovala khona eyamaqoqo neBurundi ngoFebhuwari 8.“Umgomo esizibekele wona wukuthi siphumelele ukudlula kweyamaqoqo. Sinawo wonke umdlandla ngaleli qoqo ngoba linzima nje. Uma siphumelele ukudlula kulo sizobe sesingenile kwiFifa Under 20 World Cup. Wonke amaqembu esizobhekana nawo siwacubungule kahle njengoba nakho konke obekwe­nzeka emdlalweni weNiger, besikulindele. NakwiNigeria kuzoba yinto efanayo kodwa kuzomele sibhukule. Kuzoba yinto enjalo nasemdlalweni weBurundi futhi,” kusho uSenong.Ngokwalo mqeqeshi wonke amaqembu esizwe akhona kulo mqhudelwano eNiger anawo amava okugoduka nesicoco kodwa indaba izoba sekutheni wobani abayilambele ukubedlula bonke abanye inkomishi nayo yonke imihlomulo eza nokudla isicoco.Ngemuva kokuthi iNiger ivule inkundla ebigcwele phama, uSiphesihle Mkhize ubuyisele izwe lakhe ebuhleni ngegoli alishaye ngekhanda kwathula cwaka enkundleni. Ubesuka ebhentshiniumdlali weM Tigers njengoba esize izwe lakhe ngokulinganisa.
title: USenong uyabuqonda ubunzima abhekene nabo

text: BONGIWE ZUMAWADELA impilo ephambili ayeyiphila phesheya kwezilwandle owesifazane waseKlaarwater wazinikela ngokunakekela abantu abadala ngaphandle kokuzuza okuthile.UNkk Thoko Sokhela (69) uma uhlangana naye ehamba ecela iminikelo ezitolo, emasontweni nakubantu ungazitshela ukuthi uxakekile kanti lutho usiza imindeni eminingi ukuze ilale idlile.Uthi into yokuqala ayicabangayo uma ephaphama ebuthongweni yizaguga zakhe njengoba kuhlasele nokunukubezwa ngokocansi kwezalukazi eziningi.“Bathwele kanzima abantu abadala kanti okubi wukuthi abakwazi nokuzivikela noma ukuzilwela uma behlangabezana nezimo ezinzima empilweni. Mina ngiyabavakashela ngibaduduze ngihlale nabo ngibaluleke ngokomqondo. Noma ngingakwazi ukubenzela konke abakudingayo kodwa ngiyaqinisekisa ukuthi bakhululekile emoyeni ikakhulu labo abahlala ngabodwana,” kusho uNkk Sokhela.Uqhube ngokuthi iningi lezalukazi azigadile emphakathini azinabantu zihlala zodwa nokwenza zibe sengozini yokuhlanga-bezana nanoma yisiphi isimo esingesihle.Uthe lokhu kumphatha kabi ngoba kwenza ezinye izalukazi zihlale zibalisa zinomzwangedwa zicabanga nangezinswelaboya.UNkk Sokhela uthe uyafisa ngelinye ilanga ukutholela ogogo indawo ephephile yokuhlanganyela emini bakwazi nokwenza imidlalo eyahlukene kanjalo nemisebenzi yezandla.Usizo aluthola ezitolo akusilo olwemali ngoba izitolo zokudla zikhipha okuya ngasethunjini bese kuthi ezokugqoka zona zimsize ngezimpahla nokuyinto engenzeki njalo.Uphethe ngokuthi ukusebenza nogogo nomkhulu sekwenze nabanye abantu bawabona amagalelo akhe emphakathini njengoba esekwazi nokuxhumana nanezinhlangano zokuthuthukisa umphakathi kucotshelelwane nangolwazi olungasiza ukunakekela abadala.Uthe kuyiphupho lakhe afisa ukulifeza ukuba nesikhungo sabadala ngelinye ilanga wathi uphinde adayise nemikhiqizo yaphesheya kwezilwandle ukuze athole inzuzo ebhekelela izidingo zabantu abadala.
title: Ubuyisa ithemba lokuphila kwabadala

text: USADIDEKILE umndeni wamawele aseMvutshini, eManguzi, okuthe entathakusa yayizolo elinye lagwaza elinye lafa kubangwa intombi yomzala wawo.UBonginkosi Mthembu (30) ugwazwe wafa yiwele lakhe ebelifuna ukuhamba liye ekhaya nentombi yomzala walo abahlangane nayo endaweni yobumnandi.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngephoyisa elingagunyaziwe ukukhuluma nabezindaba, iwele okuthiwa libulele kuvela ukuthi lingumuntu ohluphayo ekhaya, ikakhulukazi uma libukhile.“Umsolwa kuvela ukuthi ubehamba nomzala wakhe besejoyintini. Ube eseqasha imoto ngoba efuna ukuhamba nentombi yomzala wakhe ebeseyeqiwe izinkamba zikaFaro. Imoto uyitholile wathatha intombi yomzala wakhe wayigibeza kuyo bahamba,” kusho iphoyisa.Liqhuba iphoyisa lithe umzala walaba uthe ebona ukuthi intombi yakhe isihambe nomsolwa kula aphuthume khona ekhaya eseyobafuna.“Ubaficile ekhaya intombazane ilele, kwasuka umsindo kwaze kwavuka unina noyise bezokhuza ingxabano. Umzala wakhe ubatshelile ukuthi umsolwa uhambe nentombi yakhe. Umufi naye uqhamuke kusenjalo wakhuza obekwenzeka kanti usegadlile kumsolwa zathathana. Umsolwa uthathe ummese wamgwaza waphelela khona lapho,” kuchaza iphoyisa.Lithe ngemuva kwalokho umsolwa akukho akwenzile ngoba ubedakiwe kwaze kwafika amaphoyisa.“Kube nzima ngisho ukukhuluma naye njengoba ubephuzile. Nentombazane ivuke sekuqhuma isililo ingazi nokuthi ikuphi,” kuchaza iphoyisa.Uyise wamawele, uMnuz Simon Mthembu, uthe imphathe kabi indaba yokulimazana kwamadodana akhe.“Lo obulele iwele lakhe ubengumuntu ohluphayo kakhulu uma ephuzile. Wake wakhiphela unina ummese ngenxa yakho njalo ukweqisa ezinkambeni. Umufi ubezithulela ephansi engayithandi impi,” kuchaza yena.Uthe uvuke sekunomsindo emzini wakhe umsolwa eselwa nomzala wakhe kubangwa intombazane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane, ukuqinisekisile lokhu wathi kuvulwe icala lokubulala. Uthe umsolwa uzovela namhlanje enkantolo kaMantshi yaseManguzi.
title: Iwele ligwaze elinye lafa kubangwa intombi

text: SEKUNGABA umsamo wakhe uPhakamani Mahlambi ongamenza ukuthi ahluleke ukuliveza lonke ithalente lakhe eqenjini laphesheya kwezilwandle, iVitoria Guimaraes yasePortugal kwazise kunabadlali abathathu kuleli qembu abadabuka eNingizimu Afrika.UMahlambi uqalile izolo ukuhlolwa yiGuimaraes edlalelwa uBongani “Ben 10” Zungu esikimini esikhulu. Ezikwatini ezincane zeGuimaraes kukhona uHaashim Domingo noThibang Phete bobabili abazana ukusuka nokuhlala noMahlambi ezikwatini ezincane zeqembu lesizwe.Alikaze lingatshazwe ikhono likaMahlambi okwenza kungethusi nakancane ukuthi kunamaqembu aphesheya kwezilwandle ahlale njalo ebeke iso lawo kuyena. Ukuhlolwa kukaMahlambi kuqinisekiswe umqeqeshi wakhe kwiBidvest Wits, uGavin Hunt emcimbini wePremier Soccer League (PSL) wokuklomelisa abenze kahle.“Ngeke ngilisho iqembu elimbizile kodwa liyaziwa eNingizimu Afrika. Sizokhulekela ukuthi afike abavezele ukuthi unekhono elingakanani ukuze engeke esabuya. Kubi ukushiywa umdlali ofana noMahlambi kodwa kubi kakhulu ukumgcina ekhaya ebe enethuba lokuqhubeka nendlela yakhe ebheke ekutheni aziwe umhlaba wonke,” usho kanje uHunt kungakaveli ukuthi iGuimaraes le efuna uMahlambi.Ngo-2016, uMahlambi ulimale kanzima kwaze kwaba novalo ngekusasa lakhe ebholeni okuholele ekutheni kuze kukhishwe isicubu esihluziwini somfowabo omncane uMthobisi sifakwe kuyena ukuze ezoqhubeka nokudlala ngaphandle kokuthuntubezeka.Ngenxa yethalente elingafani namanye uMahlambi ubuyile waqhubeka lapho ebegcine khona ngaphambi kokulimala njengoba eze waklonyeliswa ngowePSL Young Player of the Season.
title: OweWits uhlolwa elasePortugal

text: UTHATHE abantu abaningi ekhombisa amakhono ahlukene emdlalweni wethelevishini umlingisi odlala indawo ephambi Ehostela. UThobani Nzuza olingisa indawo kaMndeni Ehotela nokuyindawo ehamba phambili kubalandeli balo mdlalo selokhu ijikeleze njalo ivideo yesiqephu ebecula kuzo kulo mdlalo.Yize enomlando omuhle kwezeshashalazi futhi ekhombisa ikhono elikhulu kodwa kulo mdlalo ubukeka ekhombisa esikhulu isipiliyoni nokumenza ehluke kubalingisi abaningi.UThobani kulo mdlalo nakule levideo ubehamba nabanye babalingisi abafike kuqala kunaye endimeni yezokulingisa futhi abaziwayo ngokuba namandla uma bethola ithuba emidlalweni. Kodwa abazange bamnike inkinga njengoba ehamba phambili futhi kungazange kumgqibe ukubakhona kwabo. Abantu abaningi balokhu bemncome njalo ngekhono lakhe lokukwazi ukulingisa ngendlela egculisayo aphinde ababusise nangephimbo lakhe.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngesikhathi kudlala okokuqala ngqa lo mdlalo indawo kaMndeni kwacaca ukuthi bayayivala kulo mdlalo ngesikhathi kubukeka sengathi ubulewe. Kodwa abalandeli balo mdlalo bakubeka kwacaca ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi ngeke besawubukela lomdlalo. Okufakazela lokhu ukuthandwa kwawo njengoba ubuyile nangendlela athola izingcomo ngayo lo mlingisi.
title: Ugadla ngamakhono amaningi Ehostela

text: UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Willies Mchunu, uthi bazibophezele ekuthuthukiseni izindawo zasemakhaya ukugwema indaba yokufuduka kwabantu besuka emakhaya baye emadolobheni.Ethula inkulumo yakhe mayelana nesimo sesifundazwe enkundleni yezemidlalo, eRoyal Showgrounds eMgungundlovu ngoLwesithathu, uMchunu uthe * -46%, wabantu baKwaZulu-Natal bahlala emakhaya.“Kubalulekile ukuba sikuqonde ukuthi * -46% wabantu baKwaZulu-Natal bahlala emakhaya. Siyakuqaphela futhi ukuthi abantu abaningi bayasuka emakhaya baye emadolobheni ngoba belandela izidingo,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe ukuhamba kwabantu abasha emakhaya beyofuna umsebenzi emadolobheni kuhlukanisa imindeni kuphazamise nesimo senhlalo emphakathini abasuka kuyo.Ukugcwala kwezindawo zasemadolobheni kubanga izinkinga. Uthe into abayifisayo wukushintsha imizi yasemakhaya ibe sezingeni laleyo esemadolobheni.“Kumele sisebenze kanzima ukuze abantu baqonde ngokuzimela kwezindawo zasemakhaya nezasemadolobheni.”Uthe ikhona inqubekela phambili esikhona emkhankasweni wabo wokuthuthukisa izindawo zasemakhaya.“Ngalesi sikhathi sale khabhinethi siqede uhlelo Inkululeko Development Programme eNdumo. Uhlelo luhlose ukuthi uhulumeni angenelele ekwenzeni ngcono impilo yabantu bakule ndawo. ENdumo sakhe isikole esisezingeni lomhlaba, siyaziqhenya ukubika ukuthi iMandla Mthethwa Comprehensive School ivulwe ngokusemthethweni ngo-2018,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe zonke lezi zidingo abazifakayo zidinga ingqalasizinda. Balethe nohlelo lokuletha amanzi, iShemula Water Scheme esiza abantu baseNdumo nasezindaweni ezingomakhelwane ukuze bathole amanzi ahlanzekile.“Khona futhi eNdumo sakhe ibhuloho sathuthukisa nomgwaqo uP435. Singakusho singananazi ukuthi Indumo ngeke iphinde ifane nakudala,” kusho uMchumu.Uthe ilinganiselwa ku-5 500 imizi asebeyakhile eNdumo.Ingaphezu kuka-1.2 billion imali evela eminyangweni eyehlukene esetshenzisiwe ukuthuthukisa indawo yaseNdumo.
title: ‘Sizibophezele ekuthuthukiseni emakhaya’

text: UKUFIKA kwesikhathi esinzima sikathaqa eNingizimu Afrika kwenze osaziwayo abaningi babona ukubaluleka kokungathengi izinto ngesikweletu njengoba sebeluleka abanye ngalokhu. Lokhu bakusho ngezinhliziyo ezibuhlungu ngokubona ozakwabo abaningi bebhekene nengcindezi yokungazi ukuthi bazothathani bahlanganise nani ngalesi sikhathi njengoba kumense yonke into ezweni. Akukho mali engenayo.Umculi uDr Malinga wamangaza abaningi kuvela ukuthi uthenge ngokheshi umuzi ka-R3.2 million eminyakeni edlule. Utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi kwakungelula kodwa wabona izimo ababhekena nazo abantu abathenga ngezikweletu uma seyingangeni imali sebedlelwa imizi. "Kwangithatha iminyaka eminingi ngigqoka izinto ezibhedayo ngoba ngazi ukuthi ngibeka imali yokuthenga umuzi. Abantu abaningi bahamba bangishiya empilweni bebona engathi angiyi phambili. Ekugcineni ngakwazi ukuthenga umuzi engiwuthandayo. Nezimoto enginazo ngavele ngazithenga ngoba ngiyayesaba indaba yesikweletu nenzalo yaso engapheli. Akulula kodwa uma wonke umuntu engazokwenzela abantu abeke imali enze ngendlela yakhe angaphumelela,'' kusho uMalinga. UMUZI kaDr Malinga awuthenga ngemali ayiqongelela iminyaka Isithombe: INSTAGRAMNgaphandle kwakhe, nosomahlaya uMondli Mzizi naye usanda kubhala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ethi uyabonga ukuthi unendlu engakweleti ngoba akazi ubengayikhokhela ngani njengoba ebhuquza ekhaya. Umculi wokholo uThinah Zungu unaye ungomunye wabaculi abaphumele obala ezinyangeni ezedlule eveza ukuthi wakhe umuzi eNanda ngoba bekuzomhlula ukwenza isikweletu esilungwini. ISITHABATHABA somuzi womculi wokholo uThinah Zungu awakhe ngakubo eNanda Isithombe: INSTAGRAMBonke labo saziwayo beluleka abantu abahola imali eyisamba ngesikhathi, ukuthi bajwayele ukuthenga izinto ezinkulu njengemizi ngokheshi okanye bazakhele.Bathi ukufika kwalolu bhubhane kumele kube yisifundo esikhulu."Ukuba nomuzi ongakweleti kwenza ukuthi ungaxakeki ukuthi ikhanda uzolifihla kuphi, ube semzii wakho, olunye usizi lukuthole kodwa ungaphakathi endlini ongeke ukhishwe muntu kuyona,"kusho uDr Malinga.
title: Kwabasiza ukungenzi izikweletu ezinkulu abanye osaziwayo

text: ISIGUNGU esiphezulu se-ANC sikhathazekile ngezingqinamba ezibhekene nezinkampani zikahulumeni ikakhulukazi iSouth African Airways (SAA) ne-Eskom njengoba sifuna zixazululwe ngokushesha.Unobhala jikelele uMnuz Ace Magashule ekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba emuva komhlangano wabo ukuchithile ukuthi bahlukene phakathi abaholi abaphezulu be-ANC.“Kunobumbano kubaholi abaphezulu be-ANC, asazi ukuthi lokhu okubhalwa emaphepheni kumayelana nani. Asinazinkinga. Siyabona kunemizamo yokuba kube nokungaboni ngaso linye kwi-ANC nakubaholi, siyakugxeka lokhu. Sisebenzisana kahle kakhulu nabaholi abaphezulu,” kusho uMagashule.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba phakathi kwezinye izinto ebeziseqhulwini kube udaba lwezinkampani zikahulumeni ezibhekene nezinkinga.“Sivumelene ukuthi izinkinga ezibhekene nezinkampani zikahulumeni kumele zixazululwe. Inhloso yalezi zinkampani ukuba zilekelele uhulumeni odabeni lokuthuthukisa umnotho kuleli. Kumele kuthathwe izinyathelo ezinqala ukuze kwenziwe ngcono ukuphathwa nokwenza kahle kwalezi zinkampani zikahulumeni. Lokhu kuzokwenziwa ngokuba kuqashwe abasebenzi abanamava nabazovikela lezi zinkampani ukuba kungabi khona ukugxambukela ekuphathweni kwazo.”Uthe njengoba kucishwa ugesi kuleli lokhu kuzophazamisa kakhulu amabhizinisi amancane kanjalo kuzodilizwa nabasebenzi.I-ANC izwakalise ukukhathazeka ngezikhukhula ezikhahlameze abantu eGauteng, nase-Eastern Cape.Isigungu sinxuse ukuba uhulumeni asize ngokushesha umphakathi omukelwe yizindlu zawo.Isigungu sikhathazekile ngesibalo esiphezulu sabantu abangasebenzi kuleli, sathi siyathemba ukuthi iPresidential Investment Summit, ebikhona izolekelela kule nkinga.Kudluliswe amazwi enduduzo ngokushona kukaSolwazi Ben Turok owazabalaza ngesikhathi sobandlululo.Kubongelwe nozime uNksz Zozibini Tunzi othweswe esikaMiss Universe.Kubongelwe iMeya entsha ye-ANC eGoli uMnuz Geoff Makhubo, bamnxuse ukuba asebenze ngokushesha ukulethela abantu balo masipala intuthuko.Ukuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane, i-ANC ithe ngeke kubekezelelwe.Yize sekuphele umkhankaso wezinsuku ezingu-16 wokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane.Ingqungquthela ye-ANCYL izoba ngoMashi ngonyaka ozayo, eye-ANCWL ibe ngo-Agasti ngo-2020. Umgubho waminyaka yonke iJanuwari 8, uzoba seKimberley. NgoJuni ngo-2020 kuzoba nomhlangano omkhulu we-ANC ozohanjelwa ngabantu abangu-3 000.
title: UMagashule uphika uqhekeko ebuholini

text: Usho kanje umculi wekwaito uThokozani “Tzozo” Zulu emcimbini, i-Articulate Africa Book and Art Fair, ebise-Exhibition Centre, eThekwini, eqale ngoLwesine kwaze kwaba uMgqibelo.UTzozo uveze ukuthi yena ungomunye wabantu besilisa abathanda ukuba sothandweni namantombazane amancane.Ubekhuluma ngaphansi kwesihloko esithi Blessers, lapho bekulindeleke ukuthi kufike usaziwayo wakuleli uKhanyi Mbau, ogcine engafikanga.UTzozo nentokazi engumbhali wencwadi ethi Bare uJackie Phamotse, yibona abavule izifuba ngempilo yabo. “Ngiwumuntu wesilisa othanda izintokazi ezisencane futhi ezibukekayo. Ngiyiphilile impilo lapho ngilala khona nabesifazane abaningi ngobusuku obubodwa futhi ngingayiboni inkinga. Bengiqeda ukungena komunye ngibuke omunye, ngiye kuyena ngilale naye, uma nje sengibona omunye ngimhalele ngiye kuyena,” kuchaza uTizozo.Uthe njengoba kukhulunywa ngalesi sihloko kumthokozisile ukubamba iqhaza kuso njengoba eyichithile imali kubantu besifazane ebenzela izinto ezihlukene.“Kukhona omunye wesifazane owangitshela ukuthi useyitshitshi, ngamthanda ngaze ngayeka engangimlobola. Lowo muntu wesifazane ngangimenzela yonke into, ngimthengela nokudla.Kwaphela iminyaka emithathu singalali mina naye kodwa ekugcineni ngaphoxeka esethi ukhulelwe. Akukho okuholela owesilisa ekutheni anikele ngemali kwabesifazane njengoba besuke befuna izinto ezifana nezinwele, ubakhokhele imali yokuhlala lapho beqashe khona, kwesinye isikhathi bajabulela ukuhamba nathi imicimbi bese sizithola sesilala nabo,” kuchaza uTizozo.Ukukhuluma kukaTzozo kuvuse imibuzo eminingi egcine ingaphendulekanga njengoba kuphele isikhathi.UJackie, umgxekile uTzozo ngalesi senzo, wathi akakhombisi ukuzisola. Naye uxoxe ngokuthandana nabesilisa abadala ngenxa yokufuna imali.Yize le ntokazi isiyayiyeka le mpilo kodwa ikuvezile ukuthi yayingelula futhi ayifuni ukuphinde iyiphile.
title: 'Bengilala namantombazane amane ngosuku' - Tzozo

text: AYICHITHANGA sikhathi iSouth African Football Association (Safa) ukuqasha umqeqeshi omusha weBafana Bafana.Namuhla iSafa imemezele uMolefi Ntseki njengebamba lomqeqeshi ngemuva kosuku kusule uStuart Baxter, odikile ngenxa yokugxekwa ngodaka alushaye kwi-2019 Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) e-Egypt."Ngemuva komhlangano wekomidi losomaqhinga namuhla, iSafa inentokozo ukuqhuba ngokwezincomo zaleli komidi, ngokuphakmisa uMolefi Ntseki njengebamba lomqeqeshi weqembu lesizwe lamadoda laseNingizimu Afrika, iBafana Bafana kusukela manje,"kusho isitatimende iSafa eiphanyeke kwi-website yayo."Ngenxa yokuthi uNtseki usenesikhathi ekwiBafana Bafana, kubonakale kungumqondo omuhle ngenhloso yenqubekela phambili, ukumdedela aqhubeke lapho kugcine khona uStuart Baxter, osule ngoLwesihlanu, Agasti 2, 2019."Okuvelayo kulesi sitatimente wukuthi uNtseki nguye ozobe ehola iqembu emidlalweni emibili yobungani engoSepthemba 6/7 no-10.UNtseki ungumqeeqshi ka-Under 17 kanti iSafa ichoma ngokuthi uyingxenye enkulu yeVision 2022."Mayelana nokuqasha ngokusemthethweni umqeqeshi, ikomiti losomaqhinga seliqoke ithimba elisipesheli, amagama alo azovezwa phakathi nesonto okuyilo elizobheka umqeqeshi weBafana Bafana,"kuqhuba isitatimente.Kwenzeka lokhu nje andiza emoyeni amagama abaqeqeshi abayizinkakha zaleli qembu, uSteve Komphela noPitso Mosimane kanjalo noBenni McCarthy.UKomphela, okunguye obukeka eseqhulwini, usebenza kwiLamontville Golden Arrows, uMosimane kwiMamelodi Sundowns kuthi uMcCarthy abe kwiCape Town City.
title: UNtseki ngumqeqeshi omusha weBafana

text: BUCISHE bachitheka bugayiwe emcimbini wokwethulwa komjaho wamahhashi oba seNdumeni, okuyiDundee July izolo ngesikhathi izinsizwa zendawo ezizibiza ngosomabhizinisi zingene ngodli zifuna ukunikezwa umsebenzi ngenkani.Lesi simo siphoqe ukuba lo mcimbi ugcine usuqale ngemuva kwesikhathi njengoba ungene ngehora lesibili esikhundleni sika-12 emini.Lezi zinsizwa bezithuka izisebenzi zoMnyango wezobuCiko namaSiko nezeMidlalo KwaZulu-Natal, zizibiza ngaphansi kweziketi zonina. Zithe zikhathele ukulethelwa abantu baseMgungundlovu naseThekwini ukuba kube yibo abanikezwa amathenda eDundee July.Kwale noma sebencengwa ukuba behlise umoya ukuze bangaphazamisi umcimbi kodwa bebengafune lutho.Bavale isango bathi abafuni ukukhuluma neMeya futhi abayingeni indaba yamakhansela kodwa bafuna uNgqongqoshe, uNkk Bongi Sithole Moloi ukuba akhulume nabo.Ngesikhathi kwenzeka lokhu uNkk Sithole Moloi neMeya yaseNdumeni, uMnuz Siboniso Mbatha, nabaxhasi bomjaho iDundee July, bebesahlangene ngasese belungiselela ukuqala umcimbi wokwethulwa komjaho ozoba ngesonto elizayo, okunguMgqibelo wangoJulayi 21.Kwale ngisho izikhulu zoMnyango okunguMnuz Mike Mthembu noMnuz Vejay Baram bekhuza kodwa inhlamba ibisho phezulu kulezi zinsizwa.“Sikhathele thina uMike Mthembu kade bedlala ngathi. Njalo uma kuneDundee July silethelwa abantu bokuhamba. Sifuna ithenda yeSecurity neye-stage neyokufaka amatende. Sikhathele ukudlala laba bantu besilethela abangani babo. Asiyindawo la futhi noNgqongqoshe akaphumi la engakhulumanga nathi.” Kusho enye yalezi zinsizwa ebinolaka igqoke ijakhethi ebomvu nebhulukwe elinsundu.Ibingafuni ngisho nangegama layo, ithuka nezintatheli ebezizama ukuthwebula izithombe.IMeya yaseMzinyathi, uMfundisi Petros Ngubane, uthe kuyiphutha lokhu okwenzekile ngoba laba bantu sebenza sengathi le mpi iqondene noNgqongqoshe.“Siyaqonda ukuthi isimo sendlala sihlasele wonke umuntu ngisho abezamabhizinisi. Kodwa sesithathe isinqumo sokuba osomabhizinisi bendawo bangasali ngaphandle uma kunomsebenzi okungaba owokulungisa umgwaqo noma owanoma yiluphi uhlobo ,” kusho uNgubane.UNgqongqoshe uSithole Moloi uxolise kubaxhasi nezihambeli wathi naye kube ngaphezulu kwamandla akhe osekwenzekile.“Siyaxolisa kakhulu ngesimo esesibhekane naso. Nami bese nginovalo lokuthi kungenzeka laba bantu bangene banishaye ngezihlalo. Kade sinenkinga muva nje lapho umphakathi ubukhalaza ngekhansela kodwa wavele washisa isikhungo somtapo wolwazi. Nalapha size ngobuhle kodwa sekwenzeka lokhu,” kusho uNkk Sithole Moloi.
title: Kusuke isidumo koweDundee July

text: ISIKHUNGO esigunyazwa ukusetshenziswa kwamakhambi kuleli, iSouth African Health Products Authority (SAHPRA), sigunyaze ukuthi abesifazane abazithwele nabancelisayo abasengcupheni yokuhaqwa yiCovid-19, bangagoma.Lesi sikhungo sithe abesifazane abafuna ukugoma kumele belulekwe ngodokotela babo ngaphambi kokuthi bagome ngomgomo wakwaJohnson&Johnson, ngaphansi kohlelo lokugoma iSisonke Protocol olwenziwayo kuleli.Isitatimende esikhishwe yiSAHPRA sithi okwamanje abukho ubufakazi bokuthi uma sebegomile umgomo, ngeke uphume nobisi oluncelwa yingane ngesikhathi bencelisa."Abesifazane abazogonywa kuzomele bathole ukwelulekwa kuqala njengoba lungekho ulwazi oluphelele mayelana nalokhu. Ongoti bezempilo abazobe begoma abantu kumele babahlole abesifazane abancelisayo ukuthi yibuphi ubungozi abangaba nabo,"  kusho isitatimende.Lesi sikhungo sithe bakhona abantu besifazane abasesigabeni sokugcina sokukhulelwa kwabo, asebeke bagonywa ngemigomo esebenzisa iviral vector efana neJ&J,  akekho oke waba nokuphatheka kabi noma kube nokuphatheka kabi kwengane yakhe ayikhulelwe.Ucwaningi nombhali uDkt Jarrod Zampirini waseWits University  uke wabhala emqingweni wezempilo iSA Medical Journal esanda kushicilelwa, uthe udaba lokuthi abakhulelwe ngabe kumele yini bagone noma cha kumele lucaciswe kabanzi ukuze bathathe isinqumo benolwazi." Nakuba kukuhle ukuthi lukhona ulwazi esitshelwa lona kodwa alubambeki ngoba asikho isiqiniseko ngalo. Kubalulekile ukuthi abasifazane abazithwele banikezwe ulwazi olutholakale ngesikhathi kwenziwa ucwaningo bese bezithathela isinqumo ngolwazi oluphelele abalutholile,'  kusho uDkt Zampirini  kulo mqingo.Inhlangano yezempilo emhlabeni, iWorld Health Organisation (WHO),  ithe akumele omama abancelisayo bayeke ukuncelisa uma sebegomele iCovid-19.
title: Bangayigomela iCovid-19 abazithwele nabancelisayo

text:
UMDWEBI osezakhele igama ngokudweba osaziwayo emngcwabeni, uLebani ‘Rasta’ Sirenje, usephinde wasusa ukukhuluma edweba umrepha wakuleli osanda kudlula emhlabeni, uHHP.URasta njengamanje umatasa nomdwebo kaHHP kwinkonzo yesikhumbuzo yalo mrepha eseBassline, eNewtown, eGoli.Le nkonzo ihanjelwe inqwaba yabangani baHHP, osaziwayo kanye namalungu omphakathi azovalelisa leli ciko elihlonishwayo emlandweni weHip Hop kuleli.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu bebengawuvali umlomo ngomdwebo kaRasta osabalale ngaphambi kokuthi kuqale le nkonzo. Akukhona okokuqala uRasta egxekwa ngomdwebo wakhe njengoba ngaphambilini wazama ukudweba abanye osaziwayo okubalwa kubo uRobbie Malinga, Prokid no-Akhumzi Jezile.UHHP udlule emhlabeni ngesonto eledlule kanti kusolwa ukuthi wazibulala. Uzofihlwa eMahikeng ngoMgqibelo.Ai ai ai no guys kanti can’t people who are attending the memorial just tell Rasta that he is not drawing HHP??— Rahab (@rahab_seloane)
