title: Usephinde wakususa futhi lokho uRasta edweba uHHP

text: UMA kuya ngezinkulumo eziqhamuka ekhempini yeBaroka FC neyeBidvest Wits, kulindeleke ukuthi kusiphuke izidindi ePeter Mokaba Stadium lapho la maqembu ezobe etholene khona emdlalweni wesibili owandulela owamanqamu kwiTelkom Kncockout.Umdlalo ungeSonto ngo-3 ntambama.Yize iningi kungenzeka ukuthi libheke umdlalo wabakhaya baseSoweto phakathi kweKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates eMoses Mabhida Stadium kusasa, mhlawume ibhola elineNkosi phakathi lizothakaselwa yilabo abazobe bethamele umdlalo oseLimpopo.Womabili amaqembu asekusho ngaphandle kokunanaza ukuthi afuna ukuzibona kowamanqamu eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ngoDisemba 8.Ekhuluma nabezindaba umdlali wasemuva weBakgaga, uThabiso Semenya, uhambe emzwini omqeqeshi wakhe uWedson Nyirenda oseke wakusho ukuthi ufuna babonge abalandeli ngokuphakamisa indebe.“Inhloso yethu wukuya kowamanqamu. Kodwa siyazi ukuthi sidlala neWits eyiqembu elinomlando kweyomkhumulajezi. Kuzoba wumdlalo onzima kodwa siyafuna ukuya kowamanqamu. Asibesabi, wukuthi siyakuqonda ukuthi banabadlali asebeke badlala kweyamanqamu kunabethu abazobe belwela ukungena okokuqala. Ukuzimisela osukwini ngicabanga ukuthi yikhona okuzocacisa (ngomdlalo),” kusho uSemenya kwi-twitter yeLimSportsZone.IBaroka ihlule iLamontville Golden Arrows neMamelodi Sundowns njengoba isizithola isilapha.IWits esinqobile lesi sicoco nyakenye ihlula iBloemfontein Celtic kowamanqamu, yona idlule kwiFree State Stars neMaritzburg United.Umqeqeshi weZitshudeni, uGavin Hunt, ekhuluma nabezindaba kuleli sonto uthe ufuna balwe njengoba benzile bebhekene neMaritzburg ekuhambeni. Yonke imidlalo yezakhe isabe sekuhambeni emqhudelwaneni walo nyaka.“Sadlala kahle sibhekene neMaritzburg kuma-quarterfinal. Sidinga nje ukuthi siwulawule kangcono umdlalo. Sesikulungisile lokho sekuyithuba lokuthi siyokuzama futhi ekuhambeni. Ngethemba ukuthi izinto zizohlangana singene komunye umdlalo wamanqamu,” kusho uHunt.
title: IBaroka neBidvest bathembisa oshisayo koweTelkom

text: UMREPHA ovutha engabaselwe ngomculo nangezinto azenzayo endimeni yezokungcebeleka, u-AKA ufuna ukushiya abalandeli bakhe bemuzwa ngaphakathi. Lokho kuzwakala ngemuva kokulalela i-albhamu yakhe eqale ukutholakala ezitolo namhlanje. Lo mrepha ogama lakhe nguKiernan Forbes namhlanje ukhiphe i-albhamu yakhe, aveza ngoMashi ukuthi eyokugcina, iTouch My Blood.Engxoxweni neSolezwe uveze ukuthi njengesihloko sayo, ufuna abantu bezwe yena uqobo kule albhamu.“Ngifuna ukuthinta impilo yabantu nokuthi abantu bezwe izinto engidlule kuzo empilweni yami yangasese ngokunjalo nasendimeni yomculo. Ngijabule kakhulu ngezinga le-albhamu futhi ngiyethemba abantu bazoyithakasela kakhulu,” kuchaza lo mrepha.Phakathi kwamaculo asewakhiphile akule albhamu kubalwa iCaiphus Song, The World is Yours, Sweet Fire, Beyonce, neStar Signs. Kuwo wonke lawa maculo kuqaphelekile ukuthi ubeseqalile eveza okuningi okwenzeka empilweni yakhe yangasese. IBeyonce kamuva nje isuse umsindo kwazise kuyo uzwakala sengathi ucula ngowayeyisinqandamathe sakhe uBonang Matheba, ahlukane naye ekupheleni konyaka odlule.Njengoba engumrepha obuye aphrojuse, u-AKA uthe akukaze kube yinto yakhe ukungasebenzi nabanye ophrojusa. Nakulena usebenze nenqwaba. Kubo kubalwa uTweezy, Maphorisa, Gemini Major, Makwa, JR, Kiddominant, Anatii, noMaster A Flat.Emacikweni awapikile kubalwa uStogie T, Okmalumkoolkat, Yanga, Kwesta namanye.Njengoba kuvele ukuthi lo mrepha usekhipha i-albhamu yakhe yokugcina, uthe uzimisele ukuyiphusha bese egxila enkampanini yakhe iBeam Group.“Ngaphandle kokuba ngumculi ngiwusomabhizinisi endimeni yezobuciko. IBeam Group ngayisungula ngemuva kokuhlukana neVth Season. Kuningi esikwenzayo, sisazokhiqiza namaciko okuzobaluleka ukuthi ngiwanikeze isikhathi sami ukuze azinze endimeni,” kusho u-AKA.
title: U-AKA uvalelisa ngeveza impilo yakhe yasesithe

text: MHLELI: Kwelingashayi eceleni ake ngiphawule ngemikhuba eyenziwa abantu abaya ezinkonzweni zemingcwabo. Uma kuqala kungena inkonzo yomngcwabo kuyaye kube nomphathi wohlelo oqala ngokuzethula asho ukuthi ungubani wakwabani.Uma esezethulile ungena ohlelweni. Baye benze izinto ezingefani-ke ngoba omunye ubiza lonke uhlu lwezikhulumi nezihloko ezizokhuluma ngaphansi kwazo, omunye avele aqale uhlelo. Kunento engiphatha kabi eyenziwa abasuke besenkonzweni. Bahlala kungaphumi noyedwa uma kusaqhubeka uhlelo zize ziphele izikhulumi, kuthi uma ophethe uhlelo eselubuyisela kobaba abazosikhonza ngeZwi leNkosi ubone sebephuma abantu.Uma ubafica phandle ubathola sebezixoxela abanye sebebhema. Kwabangwani neZwi leNkosi ngoba lingukuphila? Enkonzweni ngaphakathi kusala omama abaningi nedlanzana labesilisa. Uma ubheka emnyango ubona kumiwe sekuyizixongololo, ungaphika ukuthi kusemngcwabeni ungathi kusephathini. Uma kunethaveni eduze abanye bazithengela utshwala baphuze. Ishumayela inceku yeNkosi ize ijuluke ishumayeza izihlalo zasehholo. Ubani kanti osuke eshunyayezwa phakathi kosedlulile emhlabeni nathi esiphilayo?Abantu okumele bezwe iZwi yithina esisaphila hhayi ongasekho ngoba yena usewuqedile owakhe umsebenzi, indaba isisele nathi.Imisiko yasemishadweni isigqokwa emingcwabeni, angazi noma kwenziwa wukuthi imishado inqabile yini. Ukudla baze baphinde amapuleti sengathi umuntu usedlela ukulala.
title: [IMIBONO] Ngihlaba umkhuba omubi emingcwabeni

text: MHLELI: Ngiyasha esifubeni, ngivumele njengoba kuqala unyaka ngibhadlaze le ndaba ifundwe yisizwe sonke. Mhlawumbe uma sengiyithulule lapha neziphathimandla zebandla iHouse of Love and Care zizosukumela phezulu. Siyaphela ubugebengu egatsheni laseSiphingo.Iyangidina into eyenzeka lapha. Ungayibona imihlola. Sekuze kuthiwe abantu abeze bazobeka noma yimalini ezinyaweni zomfundisi ukuze babusiseke. Kubuye kuthiwe abaphonse noma yimalini lapha epulpiti khona izwi alifundile umfundisi lizoletha izinhlanhla emizini yabazalwane. Kubuye kuthiwe abantu abasho ukuthi benza mabhizinisi mani ukuze babe nezibusiso, umfundisi awathandazele.Kuningi nje. Umama umfundisi usulwa ubuso ngamavolontiya. Uma kungena umfundisi kuthiwa abazalwane abasukume bashaye izandla noma kungena umkakhe. Kanti sikhonza bani lapha, bona noma uNkulunkulu?Kunamantombazane anda­wonye axabana nomama umfundisi ewasola ngokuthi afuna umfundisi. Athe esehambile ebandleni kwa­thiwa yiwona abeshela umfundisi.Kunengane enele yathola umsebenzi iyafundisa umama umfundisi wayishelela umfana wakhe, bayajola kumanje - sikuphi kanti lana? Enzeka kanjani amanyala anjena esontweni?Kuqala indlu esikhonzela kuyona kwathiwa yathengwa yibandla iyakhokhelwa. Manje sekushintshiwe - njalo umzalwane ngamunye ekupheleni kwenyanga ukhipha uR200 ngoba sekuthiwa indlu iqashiwe. Okusho ukuthi labo R200 umuntu uyobakhipha kuze kuyovalwa. Angithi uyabona babona ukuthi uma bethi yathengwa kuzohamba, kuhamba kuphele ukuyikhokhela. Kungcono basibambe ngokuthi kuqashiwe. Kumanje kuthiwa umzalwane ngamunye akakhiphe R1 500 wendlu yesonto ezokwakhiwa. Kulowo mzuzu akukho siza kodwa sebeqalile abazalwane bayakhokha.Laba abangenalutho angithi bahlezi benganakwa muntu. Omunye umzalwane ushonelwe yingane. Kuthe uma ecela ukufihlelwa wumfundisi, kwayiwa emabhukwini kuyobhekwa ukuthi uyakhokha yini ebandleni wasindiswa wukuthi njalo ngenyanga uyawukhipha uR200. Kulowo mzuzu umama umfundisi wayengamazi kwalo womama oshonelwe yingane ngoba abazalwane ubazi ngokuthi banani.Abaholi bebandla ake basondele - sengathi umelusi wethu usephuma kakhulu endleleni esiyaziyo.OkhathazekileEMLAZA
title: Ungayibona imihlola eyenzeka ebandleni laseSiphingo

text: LUNGI LANGANAMHLANJE inqwaba yabantu izonikela iphinde isize ngezindlela ezehlukene abaswele njengengxenye yokugubha usuku lokuzalwa kowayenguMengameli wakuleli uDkt Nelson Mandela.Inhlangano yabajima umkhalambazo, iShotokan Karate International South Africa (SKISA) yona izogubha lolu suku ngokucija abesifazane ngezindlela zokuzivikela.Leli thimba lothisha bomkhalambazo lizimisele ngokusebenzisa imizuzu engu-67 ifundisa abesifazane abangu-67 ngezindlela eziningi zokulwa ukuze bakwazi ukuzivikela.Umengameli weSKISA uMnuz Kyoshi Sonny Pillay uthe kubalulekile ukuthi kube nemikhankaso efana nale ezolwa nokwanda kwezigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwabesimame.Umbiko owethulwe yinhlangano yezempilo yomhlaba wonke, iWorld Health Organisation, uveza ukuthi iningi labesifazane lihlukunyezwa ngabantu elithandana nabo.Ngokwalo mbiko bavame ukulimala kakhulu uma behlukunyezwa okungangokuba bagcina benamathambo aphukile kokunye basale nezibazi emzimbeni nasebusweni.Abanye baba nezinkinga uma bekhulelwe bagcine bephuphunyelwe nayizisu.Kokunye baba nezinkinga eziphazamisa ingqondo ngoba bagcina sebehlushwa nawukhwantalala nezinye izifo ezithinta ingqondo.Leli thimba lizimisele ngokusiza abantu besifazane bakwazi ukuzilwela uma behlangabezana nezimo ezimbi.Bazovakashela ikhaya labantwana elisendaweni yase-Ocean View Place of Saftey nezikole ezisondelene nayo.UNksz Tina Lee Singh ohola iqembu labesifazane kuSKISA uthe ukunikela emphakathini yinto vele abakholelwa kuyo.“Lolu hlelo lwemizuzu ewu-67 luyingxenye yendlela esizama ngayo ukudlulisela ulwazi esinalo kwabesifazane,” kusho uNksz Lee Singh.Uthe lokhu abazobe bekwenza kuzobe kuyahambisana nohlelo lwabo lokufundisa omama nezinga-ne olubizwa nge-Mothers and Daughters Programme.
title: Kuzofundiswa imbokodo umkhalambazo

text: UMQEQESHI weSwallows FC, uBrendon Truter, uthi maningi amaqembu abasazowadida ngenxa yebhola alidlalayo “elingaqondakali”. Lo mqeqeshi ukusho lokhu izolo, ngesikhathi emenyezelwa yiPremier Soccer League (PSL) njengomqeqeshi ovelele phakathi kuka-Okthoba noNovemba nonyaka.Izinyoni azikashaywa selokhu kuqale isizini, zisendaweni yesibili kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-12, emidlalweni eyisithupha. Okunye ngeZinyoni ukuthi selokhu kuqale isizini zisangenelwe amagoli amabili vo. Unconywa nxa zonke uTruter nezakhe kwazise le yisizini yokuqala yakhe kwiPremiership.Ngesizini edlule, iSwallows ithenge isitifiketi seMaccabi FC sokudlala kwiGladAfrica Championship. Leli qembu alizange lisabheka emuva njengoba linqobe leso isicoco.Kubukeka sengathi nakuyona iPremiership, alizile nje ukuzolwela ukugcina indawo yalo kodwa lidlisela ogageni inqwaba yamaqembu okudala egijima esigabeni esikhulu.“Ngicabanga ukuthi abaqeqeshi abaningi kwiPremiership abangazi mina kahle. Abanye bebelizwa nje igama lami kwiGladAfrica kodwa abazi ukuthi ngidlala hlobo luni lwebhola. Ngisola ukuthi yikhona kanye lokhu okubadidayo njengoba sithola imiphumela emihle. Noma ngabe usihlelele kanjani, kodwa thina asiyishintshi indlela esidlala ngayo. Angiphathi uma sishaye igoli kuqala, kunzima ukuthi iqembu lishaye igoli kuthina,” kusho uTruter.Eqhubeka echaza uTruter, uthe kunabadlali ababili asebesayinwe yiZinyoni kodwa wangafuna ukusho amagama. “Izikhulu zeqembu zisebenze kanzima ngaphambi kokuvalwa kwewindi ngenyanga edlule. Asinaye kahle hle, umgadli ozosishayela amagoli ngakho sizama ukuvala leyo ndawo. Bakhona ababili abadlali esibatholile kodwa angifuni ukusheshe ngidalule amagama, iqembu lizowadalula isikhathi uma siqhubeka. Sibheke ukuthi ngalaba badlali sikwazi ukuhlasela ngezindlela ezahlukene,” kusho uTruter.Lo mqeqeshi usanda kuxoxa naleli phephandaba lapho eveze khona ukuthi usazolokhu eqhubeke njalo nokubavala imilomo labo ababeshaya amakhala ngokuqokwa kwakhe njengomqeqeshi weSwallows kwiPremieship. Uthe yize edume ngokwenza kahle kwiGladAfrica Championship kodwa isitayela sakhe sokudlala singaxaka noma ngabe ngubani futhi noma ngabe yisiphi isigaba.Emdlalweni olandealyo weligi iSwallows izokwamukela iMaritzburg United eDobsonville Stadium ngoDisemba 15.
title: Umqeqeshi uveze isu alisebenzisayo enqoba oweligi

text: KUSHONE usomabhizinisi wendawo yamathayi eVerulam, emuva kokuthi eqhunyelwe yi-compressor izolo.Lo somabhizinisi odabuka eZimbabwe, kuthiwa utholwe umsebenzi wakhe elele edamini legazi.Okhulumela abenkampani yonogada iReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa), uMnuz Prem Balram, uthe izolo ngabo 9:46 ekuseni babizelwe kule ndawo yebhizinisi emuva kokuthi umsebenzi ethole umqashi wakhe elele edamini legazi lapho besebenzela khona.I-COMPRESSOR okusolwa ukuthi iqhumele umnikazi webhizinisi lamathayi eVerulam washona izolo. Isithombe: SITHUNYELWEKuthiwa lo msebenzi ubethi uyobheka abekuzwe kuqhuma kule ndawo athole kuyo umqashi wakhe.UBalram uthe ngesikhathi befika abezimo eziphuthumayo, bathole lo somabhizinisi elimele emuva kokushaywa yinsimbi. Kuthiwa ubeyedwa ngesikhathi ehlelwa yile ngozi.Uthe amaphoyisa afikile endaweni yesehlo ukuze aphenye.
title: Kufe owaseZim elinyazwa yinsimbi

text: KUSHONE unogada kwalimala omunye ngesikhathi bedutshulwa besemtholampilo wakwa-V eMlaza ongasasebenzi, abebewugada.Umthombo osondelene nodaba kodwa ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe kufike abalisa ababili izolo ekuseni emuva kwehora lesihlanu begqoke umfaniswano wonogada abasebenza kule nkampani eyaziwa ngeKhuselani Security and Risk Management (KSA). Uthe laba balisa bathe bacela ukungena ngaphakathi balinde induna yabo ebizobalanda ibayise lapho abebezosebenzela khona eMbumbulu.“Oyedwa wonogada kwabathathu abebekhona ubangenisile. Kuthe sebengaphakathi emtholampilo, bamphushela phansi base bedubula laba abanye ababili babaphuca izibhamu namaselula,” kusho umthombo.Kulesi sigameko kushone uMnuz Sihle Mbambo okuthiwa udubuleke engalweni, inhlamvu yadlulela enhliziyweni yaphumela ohlangothini. Unogada osindile naye udubuleke engalweni.Umthombo uthe akucaci ukuthi laba bebehlaselwa ngenxa yobugebengu yini njengoba bephucwe nezibhamu noma bekuyinto ethinta izinkinga ezikhona emsebenzini. Uthe isigameko sokuhlaselwa kwabo sishiye wonke umuntu edidekile.Ilungu lomphakathi elidlule lesi sigameko sisanda kwenzeka lithe namanje umphakathi usathukile ngoba lo mtholampilo bewungasasebenzi futhi beyingekho into ebike yenzeka kuwona ngaphambili.Uthe nabo bathole emuva kwendaba sebeshaye bachitha laba balisa okuthiwa bebegqoke umfaniswano wonogada abathinteka kulesi sigameko. Kuthiwa labo nogada abadutshuliwe badutshulwe bengaphakathi emtholampilo, omunye ehleli esihlalweni. Kubona kuthiwa bekukhona obesanda kufika ezodedela omunye obekufanele agoduke sekusele imizuzu embalwa ajoyinwe nguzakwabo abezosebenzisana naye. Unogada oshonile kuthiwa bese kusele imizuzwana nje ukuthi agoduke aye khaya njengoba isikhathi sokushayisa bese sisondele.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uthe amaphoyisa aseMlaza aphenya icala lokubulala, elokuzama ukubulala, nelokuphanga.“Kusolakala ukuthi namuhla emuva kwehora lesihlanu ekuseni onogada bebesebenza emtholampilo okwa-V eMlaza ngesikhathi kufika abasolwa ababili abebegqoke umfaniswano wonogada ofana nowabo babatshela ukuthi balinde umphathi. Kuthe onogada besabavulela isango omunye wabasolwa wabaphoqa ukuthi balale phansi wase edubula oyedwa washona. Umgilwa wesibili yena udubuleke engalweni yangakwesokudla kwathi unogada wesithathu waphuma engenamyocu. Kuthathwe izibhamu ezimbili namaselula abagilwa,” kuchaza uCaptain Gwala.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Ncumisa Mafunda udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini nasezihlotsheni zikanogada oshonile.“Udaba lusezandleni zamaphoyisa aseMlaza, umnyango angeke uthande ukwenaba ngalolu daba,” kusho uNksz Mafunda.
title: Kushone unogada odutshulwe eMlaza

text: Izolo bekufihlwa abesifazane ababulewe bakwaNxele okungoNkk Dingeni (70), Zodwa (61), Thobeka (24), Sphelele (12) nengane enezinyanga ezingu-16 uThandolwethu.Kuqhume isililo kwabomndeni nezihlobo ngenkathi amabhokisi engena elandelana egcekeni, kwagcwala umunyu nosizi kwabebezoduduza.Amaphoyisa abegcwele yonke indawo ehlome eyizingovolo.Lo mndeni uhlaselwe ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.Ilungu lomndeni uMnuz Andile Nxele, litshele Isolezwe ukuthi bathuka izanya selokhu kwenzeke lesi sigameko.“Siyasaba ngoba umndeni wethu uhlaselwe futhi asazi ukuthi kungani. Sihlale phansi siwumndeni savumelana ukuthi kumele sisuke endaweni, laba abasindile bayohlala kwenye indawo ngoba akuphephile. Okubuhlungu nje babulale abantu besifazane abangenacala, ngenyanga yabo. Ngokwesintu umuntu wesifazane uyahlonishwa, akadutshulwa kodwa bababulale ngesihluku,” kusho uNxele.Uthe bayekele ezandleni zamaphoyisa ukuba aphenye abophe abenzi bobubi.UMnuz Muziwenhlanhla Nxele obekhulumela umndeni, uchaze ngesimo esinzima ababhekane naso ngelanga lesehlo.“Ngashayelwa ucingo ngomakhelwane bengitshela ukuthi bezwa kudutshulwa ekhaya, abahlala ekhaya ngangingabatholi ocingweni. Ngashayela wonke umuntu, ngangabathola. Ngaze ngashayela umfana omncane, oveze ukuthi ubekamkhelwane kuhlaselwa, useyasaba ukuya akhaya. Wagcina eyile wafica, sebebulewe. Ngathinta amaphoyisa cishe imizuzu engu-30 ngingawatholi. Saze saya khona sacela asiphelezele siye ekhaya. Ngafike ngashaqeka umakoti ebulewe ephaseji, ingane isemhlane nayo ibulewe. Abanye ababulewe babesegunjini lokulala. Bekuyisimo esinzima, okucacile wukuthi bebebulala ngenhloso ngoba babedubula izinhlamvu eziningi,” kuchaza uNxele.Uthe ubaxolele futhi ubathethelele abenzi bobubi. Uthe ngeke baziphindiselele ngoba ukufa kuneqiniso, nalabo ababulele usuku lokufa luyobafica.Lo mngcwabo ubuhanjelwe yinqwaba yabantu, begcwele amatende amabili, bedele imvula namakhaza.Isililo besilokhu siqhume njalo kule nkonzo yomngcwabo.
title: Uzothutha umndeni wabahlanu ababulewe

text: SAPAu MNDENI ka-Anni Dewani owabulawa ekwi-honeymoon awuboni umthetho uwusebenzele njengoba iNkantolo eNkulu yaseWestern Cape ihoxise icala lokumbulala ebelibhekene nomyeni wakhe, uShrien Dewani, izolo.“Size lapha sifuna izimpendulo, size lapha sifuna iqiniso kodwa sigcine sithola eminye imibuzo,” kusho udadewabo ka-Anni, u-Ami Denborg, ekhulumela umndeni wakwaHindocha.“Besifuna ukuzwa konke okwenzeka futhi ithemba ebesinalo lokuthi sizozwa konke yilo ebelenza siqhubeke nempilo njengomndeni.”Uthe sebekuphuciwe konke lokho.Ubekhuluma ngaphandle kwenkantolo emuva kokuthi lo somabhizinisi waseBritain ephumelele ukuthi amacala abebekwe wona asulwe.UShrien Dewani wafaka lesi sicelo emuva kokuthi uMbuso uphothule izethulo zawo akangenanga ebhokisini ukuzofakaza futhi akubanga khona muntu ongufakazi ohlangothini lwakhe njengommangalelwa.“Abukho ubufakazi obungenza ukuthi umsolwa atholakale enecala,” lisho kanje iPhini leNhloko yamaJaji eWestern Cape uJeanette Traverso likhipha isinqumo.UNkk Denborg uthe abakubo baphatheke kabi ukuthi uDewani akazange adalule konke ngempilo yakhe nokuthi kwenzekani ngesikhathi beskwi-honeymoon.“Sifisa sengathi kungabe uShrien waba neqiniso kithina ikakhulukazi ku-Anni,” usho kanje.
title: Umdeni ka-Anni Dewani usale nemibuzo

text: Sibusiso MdlaloseUMiddendorp, odabuka eGermany, njengamanje ubukeka esethubeni lokudla isicoco seligi ye-Absa Premiership okokuqala kusukela aqala ukuqeqesha eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2005 efikela kwiChiefs, ayinqobela izicoco ezimbili, iSAA Supa 8 ne-Absa Cup, ngamasizini amabili ka-2005/06 no-2006/07.IChiefs isembangweni wesicoco seligi yePremiership kanti kubukeka isimo siyivuna njengoba izimbangi zayo iMamelodi Sundowns, zibukeka ziyiqale ngebatha imidlalo yazo emithathu yeligi yokusonga isizini.Amakhosi anomdlalo omqoka okumele avule ngawo igebe azowudlala neStellenbosch e-Orlando Stadium namuhla ngo 6 ntambama.IChiefs ebisayiqale kahle imidlalo yePremiership ngemuva kokubuyela ensimini kwale midlalo, ibhedise uhlelo ngoLwesithathu ibhaxabulwa yiBloemfontein Celtic ngo 2-1 e-ABSA Tuks Stadium, ePitoli.Abafana baseNaturena baqhwakele kwi-log yePremiership ngamaphuzu angu-53 ngemuva kwemidlalo engu-26, alandelwa ngamaBrazilians ngamaphuzu angu-47 ngemuva kwemidlalo engu-25. Izolo iChiefs iphinde yalahla amaphuzu idlala ngokulingana neStellenbosch FC.“Ngokwami ukubona iChiefs isisethubeni elingcono kakhulu manje lokusiwina isicoco seligi, angisayiboni iSundowns iyifica (ukusho lokhu ngaphambi komdlalo wango Lwesithathu neCeltic).Eqinisweni iSundowns iyona ebibukeka engaphazamisa iChiefs embangweni weligi kule midlalo esele njengoba ibisefomini enhle ngaphambi kokuvalwa kwezwe nesibukeka isibalekile.“Ngisho noPitso (Mosimane) umqeqeshi wayo kule midlalo yakamuva ubonakala eseliphonsa ithawula nangendlela nje asebophela ngayo isikimu,” kusho uSithole.Ukuqonga kwemibiko yokuthi lingase ligqabuke igoda phakathi kukaMiddendorp neqembu laseNaturena, uSithole akakufihli ukuthi uMiddendorp usephelelwe ngamaqhinga.“Yebo yena usethubeni elihle kakhulu njengamanje lokuwinela iChiefs isicoco seligi kodwa iqiniso wukuthi yena usephelelwe ngamaqhinga,“ kubeka uSithole.Uthe ubenenhlanhla nje ngokuthi awine imidlalo yokuqala yesizini emzuliswaneni wokuqala waqoqa amaphuzu amqoka.“Eqinisweni kudala akhombisa ukuphelelwa (ngamaqhinga) ngisho emaqenjini aseke aqeqesha kuwo afana neMaritzburg United neBloemfontein Celtic.“Ngakho-ke mayelana nekusasa lakhe kwiChiefs, konke sekulele kubaphathi ukuthi bathatha siphi isinqumo ngekusasa lakhe, ngoba yibona abakwaziyo okudingwa yiqembu nohlobo lomqeqeshi abaludingayo ezinhlelweni zabo ukuya phambili,” kusho uSithole.
title: 'Kusezandleni zabaphathi ngoMazinyo'

text: IGWETSHWE udilikajele indoda yaseNsuze elahlwe ngecala lokudlwengula nelokuthumba.INkantolo yesiFunda KwaMaphumulo igwebe uPhendu Zondi (30) udilikajele ngecala lokudlwengula neminyaka emine ngecala lokuthumba. UZondi ulahlwe ngaleli cala elenzeka ngoMeyi 17, 2016 ebusuku.Kuthiwa wahlangana nomgilwa oneminyakaengu-22 ngesikhathi esendleleni eya ekhaya (umgilwa) eDalibho, wamhlasela ngesikhathi ezama ukubaleka. Kuthiwa wamgwaza ngento ecijile.UZondi kuthiwa wathatha umgilwa wahamba naye waya kubo lapho afike amdlwengula khona ubusuku bonke.Lo wesifazane kuthiwa wakwazi ukubaleka ngakusasa ekuseni, wacela usizo wayiswa esibhedlela lapho kwabikwa khona ngesehlo.Kwavulwa icala lokudlwengula nelokuthumba esiteshini samaphoyisa eNsuze, icala ladluliselwa ophikweni oluphenya ngamacala athinta udlame lomndeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane namacala ocansi KwaDukuza.Kwenziwa uphenyo kwagcina kuboshwe uZondi ngemuva kwamasonto amabili kwenzeke isigameko. Wanqatshelwa ibheyili wahlala ezitokisini kwaze kwaba ulahlwa yicala.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa osabambile KwaZulu-Natal, uMajor General Bheki Langa, uncome amaphoyisa abephenya ngalesi sigameko ngokuthi enze uphenyo olugcine lumlahle ngecala.“Ummangalelwa uthole isigwebo esifanele ngezenzo zakhe ezimbi kanti sizoqhubeka nokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane kulesi sifundazwe,” kusho uLanga.
title: Udilikajele  kowathumba wadlwengula owesifazane

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANE noKHULEKANI SHABALALAB AWUPHENDULE inkundla yokukhankasela amavoti okhethweni loHulumeni baseKhaya umjaho iComrades Marathon abanye abaholi bamaqembu ezepolitiki.Kuhlale obala ukuthi ukhetho selusemome njengoba amanye amaqembu nabalandeli bawo bebengazibekile phansi.Bebedlubhe izikibha abe-ANC abe-DA benendawo yokukhangisa ezindaweni ezimbili emgudwini weComrades izolo.I-DA ibinetafula ngaseCato Ridge. Uma kudlulwa khona bekusha ingoma badanse baze bakhase phansi bethi akuvotelwe “ushintsho” oluza neqembu.Abanye be-DA bebemi uma ungena eThekwini, bephethe izingqwembe ezeseka uMnuz Haniff Hoosen ukuba abe yiMeya yeTheku. Abe-ANC bebefake izikibha ezinobuso bukaMengameli Jacob Zuma. Bebemi amaqoqo ngokuhlukana.Ngakolunye uhlangothi kuthuse abaningi ukungabonakali kweMeya yeTheku, uMnuz James Nxumalo, kulo mjaho.NjengeMeya abaningi bebelindele ukuthi abe khona ezokwamukela umyalezo ofika nomgijimi wokuqala ukushaya intambo futhi amukele nabagijimi. NePhini lakhe uNkk Nomvuzo Shabalala akazange abonakale.Laba baholi baziwa nokuhambisana nobenguNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Senzo Mchunu.Izolo bekugqame uSihlalo we-ANC eThekwini, uNkk Zandile Gumede, obehambisana noSihlalo we-ANC esifundazweni uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uNdunankulu omusha uMnuz Willies Mchunu, noSomlomo weTheku uMnuz Loggie Naidoo obemele idolobha.UNdunankulu uncome kakhulu umjaho wathi abasubathi abenze kahle base-KZN bazobabonga ngendlela ekhethekile. Ushaye nekhwelo lokuba kwesekwe abasubathi base-KZN ukuze baqhubeke nokwenza kahle kulo mjaho.UBongumusa Mthembu, Mncedisi Mkhize, Siphiwe Ndlela noFikile Mbuthuma baphume kwabayishumi abahambe phambili kwabesilisa nabesifazane.
title: Abepolitiki bathole ithuba lokukhankasa kuComrades

text:
AMAPHOYISA aphenya icala lokubulala kulandela ukutholwa kwesidumbu sowesifazane obedukile ebulewe eceleni komgwaqo eNdaya Reserve, eMbumbulu.Isidumbu okuvele ukuthi ngesikaNksz Zinhle Muthwa sitholwe sinezibazi zokushaywa ekhanda nasemzimbeni. UNksz Muthwa kubikwe ngokunyamalala kwakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kulandela ukunyamalala kwakhe ehambe eya eSpar eNew Germany, eThekwini. Umngani wakhe osabalalise izindaba zokunyamalala kwakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ecala usizo, uNksz Philisiwe Mnisi, uthe uphume endlini abahlala kuyo  egqoke izingubo zokulala ngabo-9.30 ebusuku. Uthe uphume engamtshelanga ukuthi uyaphi kodwa ube esemthumela umyalezo kuWhatsApp emazisa ukuthi uyothenga iwayini eSpar. “Wathathwa yimoto ngesikhathi eya eSpar kodwa angazi ukuthi yayishayelwa ngubani,” kuchaza yena.UPhilisiwe ngoLwesithathu ubhale ekhasini lakhe kuFacebook ecela abantu bamlekelele ngokuthola uZinhle kwazise bese kudlule isikhathi eside engabuyile nocingo lwakhe luvaliwe. UNKSZ Zinhle Muthwa isidumbu sakhe esitholwe eceleni komgwaqo eMbumbulu sinezibazi zokushaywa. Isithombe: Facebook“Uhambe la nowesilisa, ngisho naye akatholakali. Ngeke ngithi usebumnandi ngoba uhambe egqoke izimpahla zokulala, futhi ungumuntu othembekile.Ngeke ahambe eye ebumnandini engasazisanga. Njalo uma ezikhiphile uyasazisa ukuthi uyaphi, ngisho ucingo lwakhe lucimile usebenzisa izingcingo zabanye ukuze asazise ukuthi uphephile.Kulokhu akakwenzanga lokho,” kuchaza yena ecela usizo. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uthe amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala kulandela ukutholwa kwesidumbu sowesifazne okukholwa ukuthi uneminyaka elinganiselwa ko-20  sinezibazi zokushaywa ekhanda nasemzimbeni. “Amaphoyisa asaphenya okuholele kulesi sehlo. Siyacela noma ngubani ongaba nolwazi ngabathintekayo ukuthi axhumane namaphoyisa asendaweni noma ashayele u-08600 10111.”Imizamo yokuxhumana nomndeni ngaphambi kokushicilela ayiphumelelanga.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu bathumele imiyalezo yenduduzo emndenini wobulewe baphinde bakhala ngesihlava sokubulawa kwabantu besifazane kuleli.%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/ZinhleMuthwa?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#ZinhleMuthwa
pic.twitter.com/w2wqdWJMA0— Wandile Thabede (@WandileThabede1)Zinhle Muthwa. I’m so sorry the system failed you, I’m so sorry men failed you, I’m so sorry your country failed you, I’m so Sorry Africa failed you. You deserved way better, you deserved to live, you deserved so much and I can only hope that now that you’re up you feel peace💕❤️%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/zinhleMuthwa?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#zinhleMuthwawas not kidnapped, she was picked up in her pyjamas, she knew and trusted her murderer.RIP sweetheart. 
pic.twitter.com/6z4WKQjs1Y— Zee is me (@zeewa2c)%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/zinhleMuthwa?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#zinhleMuthwawas not kidnapped, she was picked up in her pyjamas, she knew and trusted her murderer.RIP sweetheart.
