title: Utholwe eseshonile obeduke ngoNcibijane

text: USOMABHIZINISI waseThekwini, uSbu Mpisane, ubonga ukuthi indodakazi yakhe, uSbahle, owaba nengozi yemoto emasontweni adlule neyathusa abaningi yamshiya esegunjini labagula kakhulu esibhedlela iSt Augustine, eThekwini, ayiphazamisekanga emqondweni.UMpisane uthe konke akushoyo uSbahle selokhu eqale ukukhuluma emuva kokuba ephapheme kuyajabulisa.“Izimpawu zempilo ziyabonakala futhi ziyajabulisa kakhulu yize esaphuma engena eTheatre ngenxa yokuthi odokotela kukhona izinto abasamxilonga zona. Ngithokozile ngendlela ayiyona emuva kokulimala kakhulu, odokotela benza konke okusemandleni ukuthi isimo sibuyele kwesejwayelekile, usuku nosuku,” kusho uMpisane.Uthe uzobambisana namaphoyisa uma esenza uphenyo mayelana nengozi.
title: ‘USbahle akaphazamisekanga emqondweni’

text: KUNGAKAPHOLI maseko kubulewe obenguSihlalo we-ANC ku-ward 7, esifundeni iMoses Mabhida, sekuphinde kwasocongwa elinye ilungu likaKhongolose, uMnuz Sthembiso Mhlongo (osesithombeni esincane) ohlaselwe ekwakhe eMpophomeni, izoloentathakusa.UMhlongo (34) obeyiPhini likaNobhala we-ANCYL eMoses Mabhida futhi eyikhansela elimele i-ANC eMkhandlwini uMgungundlovu, udutshulwe ngabantu abangaziwa abamhlasele emzini wakhe womxhaso abazenze amaphoyisa.Sthembiso MhlongoUkubulawa kukaMhlongo kulandele ukubulawa kukaMnuz Lungisani Mnguni (34) obenguSihlalo we-ANC ku-ward 7, eMkhambathini. UMnguni ubulawe ehambisa ukudla esikoleni abethole kuso ithenda yokuphakela izingane ngoMsombuluko.UMhlongo nguyena owayekhuluma nabezindaba endaweni yesehlakalo lapho kwabulalwa khona uMnguni.Umakhelwane kaMhlongo ongeke aze adalulwe ngenhloso yokumvikela uthe ubelele ngesikhathi ezwa kuqhuma isibhamu.“Ngizwe isibhamu siqhuma kabili emva kwalokho ngabe sengizwa umsindo. Ngicabange ukuthi izibhamu lezi ezihlale ziqhuma vele endaweni,” kusho umakhelwane.Okhulumela i-ANCYL esifundeni iMoses Mabhida, uMnuz Njabulo Mtolo uthe bakhathazekile ngokubulawa kwamalungu ophiko lwentsha esifundeni sabo. Uthe asemane amalungu e-ANCYL asebulewe khona kusukela ngoDisemba nyakenye.“Okusiphatha kabi kakhulu wukuthi kuzona zonke izigameko zokubulawa kwamalungu ethu akukaboshwa muntu. Sibona ukuthi nezigebengu ziyaqhubeka nokubulala abantu ngoba ziyabona ukuthi azibanjwa,” kusho uMtolo.Uthe abazi ngempela ukuthi yini imbangela yokubulawa kukaMhlongo ngoba azikho izinxushunxushu ezikhona enhlanganweni.Indawo yesigameko“UMhlongo ubengakaze asho ukuthi kukhona abantu angezwani nabo noma ngabe kuthiwa bekukhona lokho kungaboni ngasolinye kodwa besingacabangi ukuthi kungaze kufike kulesi sigaba sokubulalana,” kusho uMtolo.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Mzomuhle Ndlovu lithe basakhungathekile ngokubulawa kukaMhlongo.NoNdlovu uthe: “Sisadidekile ngempela ukuthi ngabe ubulaweleni uSthe (Mhlongo) ngoba ubengenazitha,” kusho uNdlovu.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Sipho Mhlongo uthe abafuni ukuqagela ngokubulawa kukamfowabo ngoba lokho kuzokwenza basole izinto ezingekho.“Sizoyekela amaphoyisa ukuba enze umsebenzi wawo, siyathemba ukuthi azophenya aze agcine ebabambile abenzi bobubi,” kusho uMhlongo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-34, ubesemzini wakhe ngesikhathi edutshulwa ngabantu abazenze amaphoyisa.Uthe imbangela yokubulawa kwakhe ibingakaziwa, bekungakaboshwamuntu.UMhlongo ushiye unkosikazi wakhe uNkk Lungile Nxumalo-Mhlongo nengane eyodwa.
title: Bashaqekile ngokubulawa komholi we-ANC

text: UBHEKENE nengwadla uMvikeli woMphakathi njengoba abakwaSars beqale uphenyo ngokuthinta ukukhokha kwakhe intela kusukela ngo-2011.AbakwaSars bacele ukuba alethe zonke izincwadi ezithinta imali, imiholo yakhe, imali evela kumabhizinisi akhe nokunye.Okhulumela u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane, uMnuz Oupa Segalwe, ngoMgqibelo uthe u -Advocate Mkhwebane ukholelwa wukuthi isenzo sabakwaSars esokumhlasela ngenxa yokuthi khona izinto aziphenyayo.Wengeze ngokuthi u-Advocate Mkhwebane unqabile ukunikeza oKlebe isitatimende, wathi basebenzisa ukuba negunya lokuphenya icala elingenamsebenzi. Lokhu kulandela ukuba esikhathini esingangenyanga oKlebe beye ku-Advocate Mkhwebane befuna isitatimende mayelana necala lokudicilela phansi nokuphazamisa ukusebenza koMbuso alivulelwa wu-Advocate Paul Hoffman ngo-Agasti.UHoffman, uke wacela neLegal Practice Council (LPC), ukuba ikucabangisise ukuba imsule ohlwini lwama-Advovate, u-Advocate Mkhwebane.Ingcindezi ku-Advocate Mkhwebane iqale ngesikhathi uSomlomo wasePhalamende uNkk Thandi Modise evumela ukuba kuqhutshekwe nohlelo lwesiphakamiso sokuzama ukuba asuswe esikhundleni.Encwadini ebhalwe yisikhulu sabaphenyi uMnuz Charles Makola, nemenenja ephethe lolu phiko uMnuz Matimba Macebele kwaSars, bacele isitatimende sika-Advocate Mkhwebane sasebhange ngisho nakuma-akhawunti aphesheya.Unikwe izinsuku ezingu-21 zokuphendula, okusho ukuthi koze kushaye uFebhuwari 19 nonyaka.
title: Iyaqonga ingcindezi yokuthi uMvikeli woMphakathi ashenxe esikhundleni

text: IMAMELODI Sundowns ijulukela ukugwema i-Orlando Pirates emqhudelwaneni iCAF Champions League osibheke kuvuthondaba.ISundowns nePirates benza kahle kulo mqhudelwano kwazise basenethuba lokudlulela kuma-quarterfinal. AmaBrazilians asendaweni yesibili nakuba elingana ngamaphuzu amane neWydad Casablanca ehlezi esicongweni kuGroup A.IPirates ihlezi eqhulwini kuGroup B nakuba ilingana ngamaphuzu ayisihlanu ne-Esperance. EZimnyama ziphezulu ngenxa yokuthi azikangenelwa yigoli kwiChampions League. Kusasa, iPirates izobhekana ne-Esperance yaseTunisia ekuhambeni ngo-3 ntambama.ISundowns ivakashele i-Asec Mimosa yase-Ivory Coast. Umdlalo uzoqala ngo-6 ntambama. Emuva kwale midlalo, iqembu ngalinye lizosalelwa yimidlalo emibili.Yilapho abaqeqeshi abaqala khona ukushaya izibalo ukuze babone amaqembu abangase babhekane nawo kuma-quarterfinal. Amaqembu amabili azoqeda ehlezi phezulu eqoqweni ngalinye kwamane azodlulela kuma-quartefinal. Lawo azoqeda eqhulwini azoqhathwa naqede endaweni yesibili iqoqo ngalinye.Umqeqeshi weSundowns uPitso Mosimane, usephumele obala ngokuthi ufuna ukuqeda eseqhulwini ukuze ezogwema izingqungqulu.“Ekugcineni ufuna ukuqeda imidlalo uhlezi phezulu eqoqweni ngoba wonke lawo maqembu azobekwa eceleni, abaqede endaweni yesibili, babekwe eceleni nabo. Umlando ukutshela ukuthi iWydad noma iSundowns ezoqeda phezulu. Kodwa awukwazi ukukusho lokho kuze kuba sesiqedile ngoba ibhola liyagingqika. Umlando uthi i-Al Ahly izoqeda phezulu. Umlando uthi iPirates noma i-Esperance izoqeda phezulu. Umlando uphinde uthi iMazembe izoqeda eqhulwini,” kusho uMosimane.“Uyawadinga lawo maqembu womathathu ukuthi abe kolunye uhlangothi nawe ube ngakolunye, ngoba uyazi ukuthi uzoqhathwa nelilodwa lawo. Ngincamela ukuba sohlangothi lapho ngingeke ngibhekane khona neMazembe, Pirates, Al Ahly, Esperance. Ngiyajabula ukuba sohlangothini lwabo ngoba sizodlala nabanye. Ukuwina e-Abijan kuzosisiza kakhulu, siphinde siwine ekhaya kwiLobi Stars ukuze siye eCasa singadingi lutho.”Ngemuva kokuqhathwa kwamaqembu esigabeni samaqoqo, uMosimane uthe uzothola amaphuzu amane kwi-Asec. ISundowns iyixebule ng 3-1 emdlalweni wokuqala.“IChampions League omunye umqhudelwano. Ubani ongafuni ukuwina e-Abijan (Asec)? Sibhekene neLobi Stars sidlale kahle esiwombeni sokuqala. Bathola igoli lokulinganisa ngomzuzu ka-45. Esiwombeni sesibili babengaphezu kwethu. Ukukhuluma iqiniso, iLobi Stars yadlala kangcono kunathi. Kodwa yafika e-Abijan yathelwa induku. Kungaphezu kwamaqhinga, kuningi okwenzekayo. Yikho iwumqhudelwano onzima ukuwuwina, futhi ungawinwa yinoma ubani. Inzima! IPirates ingafakaza."Ishaye igoli ibhekene ne-Esperance laphikwa. ULebo (Maboe) ushaye igoli sidlala neWydad kwathiwa ubeyi-offside, kungeyona. Yizinto obhekana nazo laphaya.”
title: Akayiphuphi eyokudlala nePirates kweyeCAF

text: INKANTOLO yaseMgungundlovu imchithile owayengumengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma, obefake isicelo sokudlulisa isinqumo senkantolo yaseThekwini esathi kumele axolise ngokubiza ilungu le-ANC uMnuz Derek Hanekom ngempimpi.Le nkantolo yanquma ukuthi uZuma kumele awususe lo mbhalo kwitwitter.Ijaji Dhaya Pillay, likhipha isinqumo izolo, lithe ngisho noma ngabe bevuma ukuthi uZuma unelungelo lokukhuluma ngokukhululeka kodwa ngokwakhe uhlulekile ukuvuma ukuthi wahlukumeza ilungelo likaHanekom lokuba amnikezwe isithunzi esimfanele.UHanekom uthumele isitatimende kwabezindaba ethi uyasemukela isinqumo senkantolo futhi uyathemba ubuhlungu nenxushunxushu eyayingenasidingo eyadalwa okwashiwo uZuma ngaye izofinyelela emaphethelweni.NgoJulayi 25 nonyaka uZuma wabhala kwiTwitter ukuthi: “Angimangali ngokuvezwe uJulius Malema mayelana noDerek Hanekom. Lokhu kwakuyingxeye yetulo ebengikhuluma ngalo kwiKhomishini kaZondo. UHanekom uyimpimpi.”IJaji Pillay linxuse uZuma noHanekom ukuba lolu daba baludingide kwi-ANC bangalokhu beklwebhana.“Ngeke kube namathuba okuphumelela kwenye inkantolo uma udlulisa lesi sinqumo. Uma iNingizimu Afrika yakwazi ukuphuma enkingeni yobandlululo kwaba nenkululeko, ayikho into engeke yaxazululeka,” kusho iJaji Pillay.UZuma kwiKhomishini ephenya ngokuLawula koMbuso yiDlazana, waveza ukuthi wayenolwazi ngamalungu e-ANC ayesebenzisana nohulumeni wobandlululo eyizimpimpi nakuba engazange aliphathe igama likaHanekom.UZuma uyalelwe ukuba akhokhe nezindleko zecala.- African News Agency
title: Kwenzeke okujwayelekile ngoZuma ecaleni

text: Ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokuvela kwezindaba zokuthi ungomunye wabalingisi abahamba phambili efilimini ethi “Shadows” ezokhonjiswa esiteshini iNetflix, ngoMashi 8.Kule filimu usebenza nentokazi u-Amanda du Pont naye olingisa kuyo.“Sengilinde ngabomvu ukuthi abantu bayibone le filimu.“Kusho lukhulu kimi, ngiyabonga kubona bonke abantu abalokhu beqhubekile nokungibongela,” kusho uPallance.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu bebelokhu beqhubekile nokumbongela uPallance.Abalingisi okukhona kubo umngani wakhe uSdumo Mtshali, Nomzamo Mbatha, Abdul Khoza noTerry Pheto bambongelile uPallance.UTerry uthe lokhu kusho lukhulu kulo mlingisi.AbeNetflix bamemezele le filimu ngoMsombuluko nala kuvele khona ukuthi iqoshelwe edolobheni eGoli.UPallance ulingisa indawo kaShadrach ‘Shadow’ Khumalo kanti * -Amanda ulingisa indawo ka-Ashley.Le filimu ikhuluma ngokubulawa ngesihluku kwentombazane esencane.Umseshi uShadow uyawuyeka lo msebenzi ukuze alungise impilo yabantu abafana naye umthetho ongabasizanga.Ngosizo lozakwabo ayesebenza nabo emaphoyiseni, uShadow ungena agxile ebugebengwini obukhona edolobheni nobugcina bumkhumbuza ubuhlungu ayesedlulile kubona.UPallance no-Amanda kuvela lezi zindaba ngabo nje kusanda kumenyezelwa ukuthi uPearl Thusi uzobonakala efilimi ethi, Queen Sono, nayo okulindeleke ukuthi iqale maduzane.
title: Injabulo ngendawo ephambili efilimini

text: UHLEHLISIWE umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC obekulindeleke ukuthi sinqume namhlanje ngekusasa likaMengameli Jacob Zuma.Izolo ebusuku kumenyezelwe ukuthi umhlangano sewuzoba ngempelasonto ezayo emuva kokuthi umengameli we-ANC uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa ehlangane noZuma.UNobhala-Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule ezindabeni ze-e.NCA uthe laba bobabili babonisene bezwana.Ngaphambi kwalokhu bekumenyezelwe ukuhlehla kwenkulumo ebibhekiswe esizweni obekumele ibe kusasa ePhalamende.UZuma uthe nguyena obhalele uSomlomo wePhalamende uNksz Baleka Mbete enxusa ukuthi kuhlehliswe inkulumo. Lokhu kutolikeke ngokuthi selugobile uphondo kuyena njengoba le nto ayenzile ebeyifunwa amaqembu aphikisayo.Uthe ubhalele nosihlalo womkhandlu wezifundazwe ngoba kukhona izimo ebezingavumi ukuthi kuqhubeke le nkulumo.Lezi zimo azidalulwanga ukuthi ziyini ngokhulumela uZuma izolo uDkt Bongani Ngqulunga.Sekunendida ngokuthi ngubani obhalele omunye phakathi kukaZuma noNksz Mbete. UNksz Mbete uthe bese benqume ukuthi bambhalele bamnxenxe ukuthi ahlehlise inkulumo yakhe.Emhlanganweni ababe nawo noZuma bathole ukuthi ubesephezu kwencwadi ebabhalela ebanxusa ukuthi kuhlehliswe inkulumo.“Eminyakeni emine edlule bekuba nokuphazamiseka kwale nkulumo. Indaba yenkulumo ebhekiswe esizweni yinto ebalulekile ePhalamende yingakho ngemuva kokuzwa izinkulumo zokuphazanyiswa kwayo siphakamise ukuthi ihlehliswe,” kusho uNksz Mbete.Uthe inkulumo ihlehliswa ukuze kuzinze isimo sezepolitiki ePhalamende.“Siyibhekelele nendaba yokuthulwa kwesabelo sezimali emasontweni amabili azayo okungamele kuphazamiseke. Sifuna ukuqinisekisa abantu ukuthi ukuhlehliswa kwale nkulumo kwenziwe kubhekelelwa iPhalamende kanjalo nezwe. Usuku olusha okuzothulwa ngalo inkulumo lusazomenyezelwa,” kusho uNksz Mbete.UNksz Jessie Duarte, iPhini likaNobhala we-ANC, uthe yindaba ebucayi le ye-ANC.Uthe kunesithombe sokuthi uZuma ayimkhathazi indaba yokwehla kwakhe wathi akunjalo iyamkhathaza.“Asikho isinqumo esisathathwe yisigungu esiphezulu ngendaba yokuthi umengameli ehle esikhundleni. Isigungu yima sizohlangana bese sinquma ngalolu daba oluthinta uwonke wonke. Sahlangana nomengameli siwubuholi obuphezulu emzini wakhe ePitoli, saxoxa samtshela esikucabangayo wasitshela akucabangayo. Lokhu esikuthunywe yikomiti elibhekela ukusebenza kwansuku zonke kwenhlangano sizokudlulisela emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu senhlangano okuyiso esizothatha izinqumo,” kusho uNksz Duarte.Uthe bazokwazisa izwe ngezinqumo zalo mhlangano.Ebuzwa ngokuthi uma umengameli enqaba ukwehla esikhundleni yikuphi abazokwenza, uthe emlandweni wenhlangano akekho owake wanxuswa ukuthi ehle wanqaba.UNksz Duarte uthe noma kungathiwa isinqumo esizothathwa yinhlangano awuhambisani naso akufanele usigxeke esidlangalaleni kodwa kumele usamukele.Izolo uZuma kuthiwa ubizele emhlanganweni ongqongqoshe namaphini abo okuwumhlangano okuthiwa ubizwa njalo.UNgqulunga ukuchithile ukuthi uZuma ubize umhlangano oyisipesheli weKhabhinethi.“Bekuwumhlangano wamakomiti eKhabhinethi ohlelwa kusasele izinyanga. Imihlangano efuze le iba njalo ngoLwesibili, Lwesithathu noLwesine. Umhlangano weKhabhinethi uzoba ngesonto elizayo ngakho akukho okungajwayelekile ngalo mhlangano,” kusho uNgqulunga.UNgqongqoshe wezokuXhumana, uNkk Mmamoloko Kubayi-Ngubane, uthe abanye ongqongqoshe bebengekho kulo mhlangano obujwayelekile.
title: UZuma wenze intando yaphikisayo

text: IMEYA yeTheku isixwayise izinhlangano zosomabhizinisi ezifuna umsebenzi ngodli, okubikwa ukuthi zimisa kwasani ewumsebenzi wokwakha ngoba zifuna ukunikwa isabelo sika-30% wemisebenzi.Lesi sixwayiso esishubile sikhishwe yiMeya uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda emhlanganweni wesigungu esilawula umkhandlu obuyizolo.UKaunda uthe bewumkhandlu ngeke bazibekezelele izenzo zobudlova eseziholele ekutheni kulahleke izigidi ngenxa yokubambezeleka komsebenzi.Esitatimendeni esikhishwe wumasipala, uKaunda uthe: “Kuzomele kuphele ukuphulwa komthetho ngale ndlela. Ngesonto elizayo ngizohlangana nalabo somabhizinisi ngibazise ukuthi ngeke kusabekezelelwa abakwenzayo.”Ngokusho kukaKaunda kunosomabhizinisi asebesabise ngokushiya iTheku ngenxa yezinsongo ezenziwa yilezi zinhlangano zosomabhizinisi.“Uma ungaqedwa manje lo mbhedo baningi abantu abazolahlekelwa yimisebenzi. Sizimisele ukubhekana nazo ngqo lezi zinhlangano okuzomele umthetho udlale indima yayo,” kusho uKaunda, engeza ngokuthi abakwazi ukuvumela leli lizwe ukuthi kube ikwamachanca.UKaunda uzophinde ahlangane noKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt-General Khombinkosi Jula ukuze athole ukuthi seluhambe lwafikaphi uphenyo ngamacala avulelwa labo somabhizinisi.Iphini leMeya uNkk Belinda Scott usehlangane kaningi nosomabhizinisi bavumelana ngokusebenzisana nomkhandlu ngalolu daba.Usihlalo wekomiti lezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu nokuThuthukiswa kweNgqalasizinda uMnuz Thanduxolo Sabelo, uthe umkhandlu uvulele icala amalungu ale nhlangano yosomabhizinisi abangene ngodli ezakhiweni zomkhandlu.“Siyazi ukuthi sibeka impilo yethu engcupheni ngesikwenzayo kodwa kumele sikwenzile esikwenzayo. Siyizwe elibuswa ngemithetho okumele siyilandele. Uma kungenjalo izwe lizoba kwampunz’edl’emini,” kusho uSabela.Khonamanjalo, kuzolungiswa iShaka Marine World kusetshenziswa uR16 million ngenhloso yokwenza le ndawo ibeseqophelweni eliphezulu ukuze kuhehwe izivakashi.Kuzosetshenziswa uR10 million wale mali ukuvuselela iShaka Marine kuthi uR5 million usetshenziselwe ucwaningo oluzosetshenziswa ukuyithuthukisa.Usihlalo wekomiti lezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nokuHlela uMnuz Sipho Kaunda uthe kungenzeka ibe ngaphansi kukaR5 million imali ezosetshenziselwa ucwaningo.Imeya iqinise idolo abezindaba ukuthi umkhandlu awusoze wabavimbela ukuba bathamele imihlangano yomkhandlu. Kube nemibiko ethi bayenqatshelwa abezindaba ukuba babe yingxenye yemihlangano yesigungu esilawula umasipala.
title: UKaunda ukhuza izenzo zobudlova

text: YINQWABA yamaphoyisa akuleli angakwazi ukufunda nokubhala, amanye awakwazi nokuhlanganisa umusho owodwa ngesiNgisi.Lokhu kuvele ePhalamende kuleli sonto ngemuva kokuthi kwenziwe okubizwa nge-skills audit, okuwukuhlolwa kolwazi emaphoyiseni akuleli.Ikomiti elibhekene nokusebenza kwamaphoyisa, lithe ukuhlolwa kwamabhuku abhekene namaphoyisa yikhona okuholele ekutholakaleni kwalesi simo. Bathi ukuhlolwa kolwazi ngale ndlela yikhona okusizayo njengoba kwenza ukuthi kubonakale ukusebenza kwephoyisa ngalinye.Lokhu sekuphinde kwaholela ekutheni kuhlongozwe olunye uphenyo lomcwaningi mabhuku ngoba kuneminye imininingwane engatholakali ezincwadini okwenziwa ngazo ucwaningo ngamaphoyisa. Phambilini abombutho weSAPS, bebethembise ukuthi lolu daba bazolulandela.Libuzwa ngasebekwenzile ngalokhu, iphini likaKhomishana wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Fannie Masemola, ligxeke lolu cwaningo. “Yikona kanye lokhu okuqhubezela phambili inkinga."Uthe ucwaningo lusazokwenziwa lokubheka ukuthi mangaki amaphoyisa angakwazi ukufunda nokubhala.Ngokwamalungu ePhalamende, abengakulindele ukuthi kusekhona amaphoyisa asesimeni esifana nalesi, ngoba kunezigidi zemali ezabekelwa eceleni ukuthuthukisa amaphoyisa kusukela ngo-1994.Usihlalo wekomiti eliphenya ngolokhu, uMnuz Francois Beukman, wehlulekile ukuzibamba ngendlela amangale ngayo. “Ngo- 2018, angikwamukeli lokho,” kubabaza uBeukman. Kanjalo noNkk Dianne Kohler-Barnard we-DA, uthe kuyamangaza akuzwayo ngamaphoyisa.“Ngidumele kakhulu. Basagcinwe kanjani emaphoyiseni?” kubuza uNkk Kohler-Barnard.Uthe kungenzeka laba abangakwazi ukufunda nokubhala, bangene kulo msebenzi ngokugwazisa ngoba labo ababekhona ngaphambi kuka-1994, sebathatha umhlalaphansi.Uzakwabo uMnuz Zakhele Mbhele, ugxeke izinga lokwehluleka kwalabo abaqashaya emaphoyiseni.“Liyethusa (okushiwoyo). Yingakho uthola ukuthi kuba khona izinkinga uma kuthathwa isitatimende,” kusho uMbhele.UMasemola uthe le nkinga itholakele ngenkathi kuhanjelwa iziteshi zamaphoyisa.“Le nto ikhona njengoba ngiyalele ozakwethu ukuthi benze ucwaningo lukazwelonke ngezinga lale nkinga,” usho njalo.UNksz Bonang Mgwenya oyiphini likaKhomishana kwandabazabantu, uqinisekise amalungu ePhalamende ngokuthi amaphoyisa anazo izinsiza zokuthola ukuthi labo abaqashayo, baqasha ngendlela efanele.Uthe bazokwenza nendlela yokuthi kube khona ukulandeleka kulokho.
title: Inqwaba yamaphoyisa angafundile

text:
SIZWE BLOSES ELUZOSHAYA ngonyawo olusha iGagasi FM ezinhlelweni zalo njengoba ucwaningo luveza ukuthi iningi labalaleli balo yintsha.Umphathi wezinhlelo kulo msakazo uVukile Zondi, uthe bathole ukuthi iningi labalaleli babo lingamaqoqo amabili, ngabaseminyakeni ephakathi kuka-18 no-24 baphinde babe nabanye abaneminyaka engu-25 kuya ku-34.“Empeleni besesivele siqalile ukwenza izinguquko ezihambisana nalaba bantu abasha abasilalelayo. Uzokhumbula ukuthi besinohlelo lwe-jazz obelenziwa nguSimon Thipa esagcina siluqedile safaka olwenziwa nguDJ Vumar olubizwa nge
Sunday Sundowner,” kusho uVukile.Uphinde waveza ukuthi uma ulalela umculo odlalwa yiGagasi FM njengamanje uyawuzwa ukuthi ungowabantu abasha.Uthe bazimisele ngokuqeqesha abasakazi abasebancane njengoba esikhathini esizayo kuzobe sekuyibona abasakazela ontanga yabo.UVukile uthe yize bengakaziphothuli izingxoxo kodwa ukuqinisekisile ukuthi basazoba khona abasakazi asebekhulile.“Uma ubheka uDJ Fresh usemdala kodwa wenza umsebenzi omuhle,” kusho uVukile.
title: IGagasi FM lizogxila entsheni

text: MHLELI: Ngokwenkolo yobuKristu iyavuma ukuthi ingane yakho uyethuse ngoswazi uma iphume endleleni. Nangokwesintu nje lokho kuyingxenye yempilo. Nangaphandle nje kwalokho engikubalile kuyimvelo ukulawula ingane ukuze ikhule izihloniphe ihloniphe nomphakathi.Ngifisa ukukusho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi le mbudane yombhedo yomthetho wokuvalwa kwenduku ezinganeni zethu yitulo leqeqebana lokwakha isizwe esingenamthetho, esingahloniphi abazali esingalawuleki. Kuyiqiniso elingephikwe ukuthi ukubhaxabulwa nokubulawa kothisha ezikoleni ngabafundi imbangela yalokho ukuvala induku othisha sebeyazisaba izingane.Yingakho ngihlale ngisho ukuthi yigama nje ukuthi sikhululekile sisaphethwe yidlanzana elishaya imithetho. Uma ngingazibuzela nje ngesikhathi sobandlululo wawungashaywa ngani umthetho wokuhushulwa kwezisu? Owokuvalwa kwenduku ezikoleni wona wawungashaywa ngani? Hlakaniphani bantu abamnyama kulinyazwa ubuchopho bezingane zenu la. Kwakhiwa isizwe esingalawuleki niyongibuza ningiphale ulimu eminyakeni eyishumi nanhlanu kusuka manje.Abaholi ePhalamende sebaphilela ukujabulisa iqeqebana labamhlophe, kungani bengavikeli abakubo kule mithetho ebhedayo?Akukho ngane ekhula ihlukumezekile uma ishaywa ekhaya. Thina asihlukumezekanga ngani? Yimfundiso yabelungu leyo ingane iyashaywa nje kwaphela.Zithembe NgobeseEnquthu
title: Ingane iyashaywa nje kwaphela bakwethu

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa uthi indlela abantu abalashwa ngayo selokhu kuqubuke iCovid-19 ifana nesiqalo sohlelo lomshwalense wezempilo oluhlongozwayo noluzosetshenziswa yiwona wonke umuntu eNingizimu Afrika, iNational Health Insurance (NHI). Ekhuluma nabahleli bamaziko ezindaba ahlukene namhlanje uRamaphosa uthe uma umuntu ehaqwe iCoronavirus ulashwa kunoma yisiphi isikhungo sezempilo futhi akekho ovinjwayo. Uthe ukuqubuka kwalesi sifo akufikanga kuphela nezinselelo kodwa kulethe namathuba amasha. “Ngenxa yeCovid-19 kudingeke ukuthi sisheshe sithuthukise ezempilo zethu ukuze zikwazi ukusiza wonke umuntu ngisho ngabe kuthiwa umuntu ongenawo amandla okukhokha nokuyiwona mgomo oyinsika ye-NHI. Ngingathanda ukuthi sonke sikubuke lokhu njengesiqalo se-NHI. “Njengoba kungabantu abangu-52% asebesindile lokhu kuwubufakazi bokuthi yiziphi izinselelo ezempilo zethu ezikwazi ukumelana nazo nokuthi zizokwazi ukumelana nezinselelo ezinkulu uma sekudlule iCovid-19. Manje sakha isisekelo se-NHI, singathanda ukubona iCovid-19 isishiya sesine-NHI esingaziqhenya ngayo,” kusho uRamaphosa. URamaphosa uthe bangu-30 967 abantu osekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi bahaqwe yiCovid-19 kanti abantu asebehloliwe bangu-710 000.Uthe kuzokwengezwa ukuhlolwa kwabantu njengoba sizonyuka isibalo sabantu abazobuyela emsebenzini njengoba izwe lizongena esigabeni sesithathu sokuvalwa kwezwe kusukela kusasa. Uthe ukuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda yezempilo yinto emqoka ngalesi sikhathi futhi ubatshelile abaholi bezifundazwe ukuthi kumele kuthi kwakhiwa lezi zibhedlela zesikhashana kodwa kubhekwe nendlela yokunweba lezi ezivele zikhona. URamaphosa uphinde wagcizelela ukuthi ukuvalwa kwezwe thaqa kwakwenzelwa ukunqanda ukubhebhetheka mawala kweCoronavirus kodwa ngeke kuvinjwe unomphela ngoba kumele abantu badedelwe baphindele emsebenzini futhi awukwazi umnotho ukuyekelwa uwe unomphela.“Kumele sikwazi ukuphila naleli gciwane,” kusho uRamaphosa. @IsolezweNews
title: ICovid-19 yakha isisekelo se-NHI - Ramaphosa

text: UMNYANGO wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal usubeke eceleni uR30 million ozosetshenziselwa ukukhokhela omasipala isikweletu sezikole sikagesi namanzi.Ngonyaka odlule umnyango usebenzise uR48 million ukhokha isikweletu kuMasipala weTheku nje kuphela.Lokhu kulandela ukuvalwa kwamanzi kwezinye zezikole eMlaza nasePinetown ngoba zikweleta uMasipala weTheku izigidi.Umnyango uthi ukhathazekile ngokwanda kwesibalo sezikole ezikweleta omasipala itshe lemali kagesi namanzi okugcina sekuphazamisa ukufunda nokufundisa.Umnyango uthi lokhu sekuholele ekutheni kube nomasipala abavala amanzi nogesi ezikoleni ngenxa yokuthi azikwazi ukukhokha.UNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu unxenxe imiphakathi ukuthi isebenzisane nezikole ngokuthi iyekele ukusebenzisa amanzi nogesi kwezikole.“Sicela kubikwe labo abazixhumele ugesi namanzi kwesikole. Sizoqinisa isandla nakothishomkhulu abangawenzi umsebenzi wabo wokuqinisekisa ukuthi ayakhokhelwa amanzi nogesi kumasipala.Siwumnyango sinikezela ngemali ewuxhaso ezikoleni ukuze kukhokhwe futhi silindele amathimba engamele izikole ukuthi aqinisekise ukuthi kuyakhokhwa,” kusho uMshengu.Uthe kwesinye isikhathi kuba wubudedengu bezikole ezihlala zingasikhokhi isikweletu, esigcina sesikhuphukela ezigidini. Uveze nokuthi umnyango uthole ukuthi izikole eziningi ezinenkinga yezikweletu ezinkulu, zisemiphakathini okudlange kuyo ugesi wezinyokanyoka nokudonswa kwamanzi ngokungemthetho.Unxenxe bonke othishanhloko ukuthi baxoxisane nomasipala mayelana nokukhokhelana kwezikweletu.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngeledlule kume nse ukufunda nokufundisa eZwelibanzi High kuvalwa amanzi ngoba kuthiwa isikole sikweleta uR10 million.IMeya yeTheku uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda ithe izikole ezikweleta umasipala izigidi esezivalelwe amanzi zizofakelwa amamitha ukuze ziqhubeke nokuwathola.UKaunda usanda kutshela leli phephandaba ukuthi ukuze umasipala ukwazi ukuhlinzeka ngempumelelo izidingongqangi, kudingeka ukuthi abantu bakhokhe izikweletu.
title: OwezeMfundo uzotakula izikole ezikweleta ugesi namanzi

text: SEKUBOSHWE omunye umsolwa ecaleni lokubulawa komlingisi weRhythm City, uDumisani Masilela, okulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi eBenoni namhlanje.Lo msolwa kubikwa ukuthi uboshwe ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule kanti usolwa ngokuthinteka ekubulaweni kukaDumisani, owadutshulwa kubanjwa imoto yakhe eTembisa, eGoli, ngo-Agasti nyakenye.“Umsolwa uzovela eNkantolo yeMantshi eBenoni namhlanje. Ngemuva kwalokho uzojoyina abanye abasolwa kuleli cala elizongena eNkantolo yeMantsi ePitoli, ngo-Okthoba 8 kuya ku-19 nonyaka,” kusho amaphoyisa aseGauteng.Ngemuva kokubulawa kukaDumisani amaphoyisa athola ukuthi kunabasolwa abawu-6 abathintekayo kuleli cala. Abasolwa abane baboshwa nyakenye, owesihlanu wafa kwesinye isigameko sokuphanga.Abasolwa baphinde basolwe ngokuba nesandla kwezinye izigameko ezintathu zokudunwa kwezimoto eDaveyton nasePhokeng.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa eGauteng, uLietenant General Deliwe de Lange ushayele amaphoyisa akulesi sifundazwe ihlombe ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi bayaboshwa bonke abasolwa.
title: Kuboshwe omunye umsolwa kwelokubulawa koweRhythm City

text: IFISA sengathi abantu bangayeka ukuyiqhathanisa nabanye abalingisi intokazi edume ngokuba yi ’’slay queen’’ nosekusabalale izindaba zokuthi izothatha indawo yomunye umlingisi kuMuvhango. UTebogo Thobejane ozodlala indawo kaBelinda kuMuvhango,  nongezinye zezintokazi zaseNingizimu Afrika ezidume umhlaba wonke ngokuba yi ’’slay queen’’, uthi ngamanga aluhlaza ukuthi uzovala isikhala sikaBuhle Samuels kulo mdlalo. USho kanje ngemuva kokuthi amaziko ezindaba ahlukene eqagule ukuthi uzoqala kuMuvhango athathe indawo kaMatshidiso ebilingiswa uBuhle. Lokhu akwehlanga kahle kuTebogo ngoba wawufundela lo mkhakha futhi ukholelwa ukuthi naye ufanelwe ukunikezwa ithuba aziveze ngaphandle kokuqhathaniswa nalo mlingisi. "Ngiyakuthakasela ukuthola leli thuba kuMuvhango kodwa okukodwa engingakusho ngisebenze kanzima emuva kokuthola iziqu zokulingisa e-AFDA. Ngazithola eminyakeni ewu-11 sengizothola umsebenzi nomsebenzi wami wokuqala omkhulu kwithelevishini sengizoqhathaniswa nomunye umuntu,"kusho uTebogo.Yize abantu abaningi bebe bona sengathi ubukeka ngendlela ethi ayifane nse noBuhle okubalwa ukuma kahle, ukuba umapakisha, ubuhle nokugqoka kahle kodwa uTebogo akaboni kuyinto engaze yenze abantu baqagule ukuthi uzothatha le ndawo. "Angingeni esikhundleni sikaBuhle. Nginebanga lami futhi ngiyalijabulela ithuba engilitholayo empilweni njengamanje. Abantu kumele bayeke ukuqhathanisa esikhundleni sokubheka okuhle esiza nakho kule mboni, singabantu abahlukene,"kusho uTebogo.Ukungena kuMuvhango akuzange kube lula njengoba abantu becabanga ukuthi uthathelwe ukufana noBuhle. UTebogo uthe wenze konke okwenziwa abanye abalingisi, uqale wenza inhlolokhono wahlungwa kwaze kwabe uyathathwa kulo mdlalo.Echaza ngendawo kaBelinda uthe ukujwayela le ndawo kube lula kakhulu kuyena ngoba eyomuntu ozikhululekele futhi ongazikhathazi ngemibono yabantu uma efeza izifiso zakhe. "Kungithathe iminyaka ukuthola leli thuba, ngazitshela ukuthi ngizolisebenzisa ngendlela leli thuba. Luyangithobisa kakhulu uthando nokwesekwa engikuthola kubantu. Kusho ukuthi kukhona engikwenza kahle,"kusho uTebogo.Ephetha uthe uyafisa nabanye babukele kuyena bafunde ukubekezela babangalilahli ithemba balandele amaphupho abo ngoba sizofika nakubo isikhathi esifanele baqashwe.
title: Ufisa abantu bazi ukuthi wafesa kuMuvhango

text: USIHLALO kazwelonke we-ANC uMnuz Gwede Mantashe utshele iKhomishini kaZondo izolo ukuthi izikhulu zenkampani i-Oakbay Resources zazibabelesela kanjani zibanxenxa ukuthi bangenelele ngemuva kokuvalwa kwama-akhawunti ezinkampani zamalungu omndeni wakwaGupta ngamabhange amakhulu kuleli.UMantashe ubethula ubufakazi egameni le-ANC phambi kweKhomishini kaZondo. Uthe owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu kwi-Oakbay, uMnuz Nazeem Howa, wababhalela incwadi ecela ukuthi ahlanganiswe nezikhulu ze-ANC.“UHowa wayegcizelela udaba lokulahleka kwemisebenzi uma kuvunyelwa ukuvalwa kwama-akhawunti ezinkampani zamalungu omndeni wakwaGupta,” kusho uMantashe.Ngaphambi kokuthi uMantashe athule ubufakazi, kuqale uMnuz Mzwanele Manyi oke waba yiNhloko yoPhiko lwezokuXhumana kuhulumeni iGCIS. - ANA
title: UMantashe wabhalelwa abakwaGupta

text: MBALI KHANYILENJENGOBA sekusele usuku olulodwa kuqale ukubhalwa kwezivivinyo zika-matric, ziningi izindlela ezisetshenziswa abafundi ukuze babe nomdlandla abanye bafunde kuze kuse.Ukuze bangalali abanye basebenzisa iziphuzo ezinikana amandla ngenhloso yokuthi umqondo ungakhathali uma betadisha.Inkinga ngalo mkhuba wukuthi uyajovana futhi awubi nomthelela omuhle ngokusho ngongoti bezempilo.UMnuz Ndabe Myeza ongungoti oweluleka ngokwezengqondo, uthe kumele abafundi bakugweme ukudukela emikhiqizweni okuthiwa ikhuthaza umqondo noma ikunika umdlandla ngoba igcina ibagulisa abanye.“Iziphuzo ezikhuthazayo zivamise ukwenza inhliziyo ishaye ngamandla, okuholela ekutheni ugcine usuzizwa untekenteke ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. Abafundi kumele bahambele kude nazo.”Uthe kumele bazinike isikhathi esanele uma befundela izivivinyo ukuze bangagcini sebezithola bengaphansi kwengcindezi, sebezama ukubamba yonke into okumele bavive ngayo.Amathiphu abangawase-benzisa abafundi abalungiselela izivinyo:- Gwema ukufunda ngokweqile ukuze ungazitholi usukhohlwa wokufundile uma usubhala. Umqondo uyaphunyuzwa futhi awukwazi ukubamba yonke into ngesikhathi esisodwa.- Bheka indlela yokufunda ekusebenzelayo nehambisana nawe. Gwema ukwenza imikhuba oyibona yenziwa ngabanye abafundi ngenhloso yokuvivela izivivinyo ngoba yikho okungagcina kuholela ekutheni ungaphumeleli.- Zihlelele kusenesikhathi ukuze ungazitholi usutatazela ngomzuzu wokugcina.- Qikelela ukuthi ukuphethe konke ozokudinga uma usubhala izivivinyo ngaphambi kokusuka ekhaya.- Gwema ukufika ekuseni kakhulu esikoleni uma uzobhala ukuze ungazitholi usutatazeliswa ngabanye abafundi ababuzana ukuthi ufunde wagcina kuphi. Kugweme nokugeja isikhathi sokuqala kwesivivinyo ukuze ungabhali usutatazeliswa yisikhathi.- Zama ngakho konke ukuhambisana nesikhathi uma ubhala ukuze ungazitholi usunenkinga yokungaliqedi iphepha. Ufunde imibuzo ngokuyiqonda. Lokhu kuzophinde kukusize ekutheni ube nesikhathi esanele sokubhekisisa izimpendulo zakho ngaphambi kokuthi uphume ekilasini obubhala kulo. Qala ngokuphendula imibuzo oyiqonda kangcono.UMFUNDI ka-matric waseChief Luthayi High eMpumalanga, uZithulele Tshagala, ematasa nezifundo zakhe njengoba kusasa eqala ukubhala izivivinyo Isithombe: BONGANI MBATHA
title: Kuyingozi ukusebenzisa izikhuthazi kwababhalayo

text: MaSolezwe nizokhumbula ukuthi okaVolos useke wabhala wacacisa ukuthi amaphela akufanele anyanywe ngoba aluphawu lokuthi kunokudla kuyabuswa emzini atholakala kuwo. Umuntu ongazi angajatshuliswa wukuthi emzini othile kushaya umoya awekho amaphela kanti akazi ukuthi wuphawu lwendlala akukho ngisho itiye lokwesula umlomo. Ngokomthetho kufanele umuntu ajabule ahleke yedwa uma engena emzini womuntu ehlangatshezwa wumhlambi wamaphela ngoba kusuke kusho kuthi uzodla aze afinye ngondololwane.Kule ngosi yanamuhla ngithi angiyiqhube le ndaba yamaphela ngoba kunabantu abanomkhuba ongasile wokubulala amaphela asemizini yabantu abavakashele kuyona. Umbuzo wokuqala engifuna uphendulwe owokuthi umuntu ulibulala kanjani iphela lasemzini womuntu avakashele kuwona? Kuwukwedelela okuphindiwe ukuthi uvakashele emzini womuntu ubonakale sewujaha iphela ufuna ukulipitshiza ngesicathulo ngoba uthi awulifuni. Umbuzo okufanele uzibuze wona owokuthi njengoba umagange ufuna ukubulala iphela, kungani abantu bakulowo muzi bengazihluphi ngokulibulala? Impendulo ithi abalibulali ngoba bayalithanda futhi bayazi ukuthi libasiza ngani njengoba belidedela lihambe lapho lithanda khona emzini wabo.Iqiniso lithi kuwukuphapha ukuthi umuntu athwale ingqondo yobu­cwicwicwi imenze ahambe ebulala amaphela asemizini yabantu. Uma ungumuntu ohlakaniphile kufanele wehlise umoya uma ubona amaphela emzini womuntu ngoba kungenzeka ukuthi bawakhonzile njengoba uwabona ephithizela. Kuwumqondo omuhle ukuthi uma ubona amaphela ukhulume ngawo sakuwancoma ukuze ubone ukuthi abantu bakulowo muzi bayawathanda noma bayawenyanya yini. Kuyingozi ukuthi ukhulume ugxeke amaphela uthi uyawenyanya ngoba ungazithola ungasemukelekile uma kuwukuthi abantu bakulowo muzi bawabuka ngeso lokuthi ayimfuyo yabo.Kwesinye isikhathi kuyenzeka ufike emzini womuntu ungawaboni amaphela kodwa uthi lapho sewunikezwa itiye ubone ngomlenze wephela sewuntanta enkomishini yetiye. Ukuthi ubona umlenze wephela etiyeni lakho akusho ukuthi sekufanele umemeze ubuze imibuzo enjengokuthi ngabe lifele kuphi iphela njengoba ngihlangana nomlenze walo untanta. Uma ubona umlenze wephela kufanele uzitshele ukuthi lephuke umlenze kodwa liyaphila ngoba ungazithola sewuphuke umoya uma uzocabanga kakhulu uzitshele ukuthi iphela lifele eketeleni labiliswa namanzi okwenza itiye.Isizwe samaphela asigcini ngokuhlala emizini yabantu kodwa nasezimotweni siyahlala sizalane sande kuze kube khona namhlophe engathi angabelungu. Kulabo abake bagibele izimoto zabantu bazomfakazela uVolos uma ethi abantu bafuye imihlambi yamaphela ezimotweni zabo. Kwezinye izimoto zabantu uthi ungena emotweni ubingelelwe yiphela lenyuke ngomlenze ligijime njalo lize liyokuhamba ezinqeni. Ngelinye ilanga ngathi ngigibele imoto yomngani wami ngezwa iphela elincane ligijima lenyuka ebhulukweni laze layongena esikhindini esincane, ngathi ngisababaza lokho ngalizwa selingincinza amalengiso ngagxuma ngema ngezinyawo imoto ihamba.Labo abagibela amatekisi bazongifakazela uma ngithi amatekisi alayishe inqwaba yamaphela angalawuleki. Okufike kumangaze ngamaphela atholakala ematekisini wukuthi abashayeli abafuni ukuthi ubike uthi uhlushwa yiphela. Uma uthi ubikela umshayeli ukuthi unenkinga yabagibeli abangamaphela uvele abhoke ngolaka athi yinina enidala amaphela ngokuthi nidlela ematekisini. MaSolezwe mvumeleni uVolos athi amaphela awapheli, umuntu othi kuyophela amaphela kuyophela yena kuqala amaphela engaphelile.
title: NGESO LIKA VOLOVOLO: Hlukana namaphela asemzini yabantu, akuxake ngani?

text:
UKhosini ushone ngoLwesine ntambama ngemva kokulaliswa yisifo ibrain aneurysm (ukuqhuma komthambo engqondweni) esibhedlela kusukela ngasekuqaleni kwenyanga.Ngokombiko we
TshisaLIVE, ukushona kukaKhosini kuqinisekiswe okhulumela umndeni uThlogi Ngwato esitatimendeni. "Inhliziyo yami isezinhlungwini njengoba ngiqinisekisa ukuthi uKhosini wethu ushone izolo (ngoLwesine) ntambama, ngemuva kokuguliswa wukuqhuma komthambo wegazi engqondweni obekumbeke esimeni esibucayi izinsuku ezingu-23. Kulesi sikhathi sobunzima siwumndeni sicela isikhathi nethuba lokubungaza impilo yakhe. UKhosini ushiye emhlabeni abazali bakhe uQueen noJabulani Dlamini, kanye nodadewabo uMaphe noMinenhle," kusho isitatimende.Abantu badlulise amazwi enduduzo enkundleni uTwitter bezwakalisa ukwethuka nokuzwelana nomndeni wakwaDlamini.AOh Lord!!! Not Minnie’s brother 😭💔 https://t.co/Gfm9StzFFs%%%twitter https://twitter.com/zenzeh?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">@zenzeh: Konje MaBlerrrh n Minnie are related, so the news must be true this time. Strength to Minnie’s whole family mahn. She loved her brother. 💔— Nwabisa Ncobo (@Nwayza_)
title: Usedlulile emhlabeni umfowabo kaMinnie Dlamini

text: AYIFUNI nokuyizwaeka-Ephraim “Shakes” Mashaba iSouth African Football Association (SAFA) esathungatha umqeqeshi omusha.Emasontweni amabili edlule iSafa bekubhekwe ukuthi imemezele umqeqeshi omusha. Le nhlangano ephethe ibhola eNingizimu Afrika ibisezinhlelweni zokuqasha uCarlos Queiroz ocija iqembu lesizwelase-Iran.ISafa igcine igqemeke udume lwengozi ngesikhathi usoseshini wase-Iran uyiyalela ukuthi ikhiphe * -R7 million ukuze ikwazi ukudedela lo mqeqeshi wasePortugal ngoba usenenkontileka. UQueiroz ufake incwadi yokwesula kodwa usoseshini wase-Iran wenqaba ukwamukela isicelo sakhe.ISafa ibe isiphephela kuHerve Renard waseFrance. Lo mqeqeshi ocija iqembu lesizwe laseMorocco ubhekane nenkinga ethi ayicishe ifane nekaQueiroz ngoba naye usenenkontileka.Lokhu sekwenze iSafa yakuhlehlisa kabili ukumenyezelwa komqeqeshi omusha. Ngesonto eledlule * -Owen Da Gama nguyena omemezele iqembu elizodlala neGuinea Bissau ne-Angola emidlalweni emibili yesihle.Abathandi bebhola eMzansi babe sebephakamisa ukuthi kungani le nhlangano ingabuyisi uMashaba.Ebuzwa ummeli kaMashaba, uClaudio Bolo, ukuthi ngabe bake bayithinta yini iSafa ngokuthi lo mqeqeshi abuyiselwe esikhundleni njengoba ihluleka wukuthola umqeqeshi omusha uthe le nhlangani ayiyingeni ekaMashaba.“ISafa yakucacisa ukuthi ayisazimisele ukusebenzisana noMashaba. Ikhala ngokuthi ubudlelwano bayo naye abusekho buhle. Nokho uma siliwina icala thina sisafuna abuyiselwe emsebenzini. Yingakho okwamanje kungekho umsebenzi azowuthatha ngoba ufuna ukuqedela inkontileka yakhe ephela ngo-2018 kuSafa. Asilweli imali kodwa silwela ukuthi umqeqeshi abuyiselwe umsebenzi wakhe,” kusho uBolo.Njengamanje udaba lukaMashaba neSafa lusehlanganweni elwela amalungelo abasebenzi.“Udaba lungenile ngesonto eledlule. Ofakazi ababili bethule ubufakazi. Ngo-Ephreli 6,7 nangomhlaka 10 siyabuyela. Siyethemba ukuthi udaba sizoluqeda ngalezi zinsuku. Okwamanje uMashaba awukho umholo awuthola kuSafa. Bazeseka ngokuthi bamxosha ngakho ngeke bakwazi ukumkhokhela,” kusho uBolo.NgoJuni iBafana inemidlalo emqoka yokuhlungela ukuzibekisela indawo kuCAF Total Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) eseCameroonngo-2019.
title: Ayisayingeni ngempela ekaMashaba iSafa

text: BASOLA inkantolo abameli ngokugagamela ngemva kokugweba umfundi izinyanga ezintathu ngokuhluleka ukuvela enkantolo, ngecala lokushaya omunye umfundi.Lo mfundi ona-17 obefunda uGrade 11 esikoleni iMathole High eMahlabathini, osamisiwe, uboshwe ngemva kokusabalala kwe-video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana eshaya kanzima omunye nalapho ayeze amdonse ngezimpahla zangaphansi ngoSepthemba wanyakenye, kodwa iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMahlabathini yamdedela ngesexwayiso.Ngenyanga edlule, bekumele avele enkantolo ngecala lokushaya kodwa kuthiwa akafikanga kanti abazali bakhe bavezela inkantolo ukuthi abamazi ukuthi wayekephi. Inkantolo ikhiphe incwadi egunyaza ukuthi aboshwe, icala lahlelela uMashi 9 okuyilapho inkantolo yalalela khona izizathu ezenze wangafika enkantolo, yasimgweba izinyanga ezintathu.Izazi kwezomthetho ezikhulume neSolezwe  ngalolu daba izolo, zithe inkantolo iqinise kakhulu isandla ngesigwebo. UMnuz Mpumelelo Zikalala weZikalala Attorneys, uthe lesi sigwebo singaliphazamisa ikusasa lomfundi.“Yebo, siyavuma wonile kodwa akulahlwa mbeleko ngokufelwa. Inkantolo bekumele ibheke ezinye izindlela zokujezisa ebezingalandelwa njengokuthi agwetshwe izinsuku ezimbili obekuzomenza ethuke noma ayalelwe ukuthi agcinwe amahora angu-48 njalo ngezinsuku ezandulela ukuthi avele enkantolo.“Isigwebo sinzima kakhulu, kumele inkantolo uma ikhipha isigwebo yenze isiqiniseko sokuthi ingane ayiyiphenduli isilwane kodwa iyayakha,” kusho uZikalala.U-Advocate Bheki Manyathi uthe unesiqiniseko sokuthi inkantolo iyilandelile imigomo, kodwa isigwebo esinikezwe umfundi siqine kakhulu.“Uma ungafikanga enkantolo ngosuku okwakumele ufike ngalo, inkantolo ikhipha incwadi egunyaza ukuthi uboshwe.  Uma inkantolo yeneliseka ukuthi izizathu ozibeka phambi kwekhomishini eyisipesheli esungulelwa ukulalela izizathu zakho zokungezi enkantolo ukuthi azibambeki, kusuke sekusemandleni ayo ukuthatha isinqumo. Kodwa ngokwami, isigwebo esikhishiwe sibe nzima kakhulu,” kusho uManyathi.Uthe inkantolo kumele iqale ibuke ubunjalo becala neminyaka yommangalelwa ngaphambi kokukhipha isigwebo. Uthe ibingamkhipha ngesexwayiso noma imukhokhise inhlawulo ethile okukanye imulengisele isigwebo iminyaka ethile. Ngasohlangothini lokuthi umfundi obekhishwe ngesexwayiso ngaphansi kweso labazali, uManyathi uthe bavezele inkantolo ukuthi abamazi ukuthi ukephi ngakho ibone kungcono ukuthi ithathe isinqumo ngaye njengoba lokhu kukhombise ukuthi uyabehlula.Lo mfundi uzophinde avele ngoMashi 31 enkantolo efanayo. UMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu- Natal usemukele isigwebo. UNgqongqoshe walo mnyango, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba uthe, imjabulisile indlela umthetho oliphathe ngayo lolu daba.“Sinenqwaba yezigameko lapho izingane zixhaphaza ezinye ezikoleni. Ngaphezu kwemikhankaso yethu lapho sisuke sinxusa khona abafundi ukuthi baziqhelelanise nalolu hlobo lokuziphatha, kodwa kukhona abayishaya indiva. Siyathemba ukuthi lesi sigwebo sizothumela umyalezo oshubile, ube yisifundo nakwabanye abafundi abaziphatha ngalolu hlobo. Ngakho siyasemukela isigwebo,” kusho uMshengu.
title: Basola inkantolo ngesigwebo somfundi we-video

text: Uhlelo beluphethwe uPenny Lebyane ongumethuli wohlelo iKukithi La ongomunye wabethuli abaqavile abasuke naso phansi lesi siteshi.Izinhlelo ezibhekwe ngamehlo abomvu ezizoqala ngempelasonto ezayo, uhlelo olukhuluma ngempilo kaZodwa Wabantu, iZodwa Wabantu Uncensored ezoqala ngoMgqibelo nohlelo lokuhubha abantu abangathembekile othandweni, i-Uyajola olwethulwa uJub-Jub elizoqala ngeSonto ebusuku.Uhlelo iShow Me Love selwengeze abethuli ababili abasha, imbongi uNtsiki Mazwai nokulindeleke ukuthi likhuze ibuya ngoJuni 3. Kwethulwe nohlelo olusanda kuqala lomgosi iTMI, olwethulwa uNtando Duma, Phil Mphela noGabisile Tshabalala. Ezinye zezinhlelo ezethuliwe izinhlelo ezindala kodwa esezinabethuli abasha.Uhlelo UThando Noxolo lusanda kwamukela umethuli omusha, * -Andile Gaelesiwe ongumethuli wohlelo lwe-SABC 1, iKhumbulekhaya. Kwethulwe nomculi uDr Malinga osanda kujoyina uhlelo iNo Excuse Pay Papgeld.Inhloko yezinhlelo zaMoja Love, uBokani Moyo, ithe izinhlelo zabo ziveza izinto ezazikhulunyelwa phansi, abantu ababesaba ukukhuluma ngazo.“Sikholelwa ukuneka obala lezi zinkinga ezikhungethe abantu ukugwema ukuthi zidlulele phambili kwizizukulwana. Sithi asibhekane nazo izinkinga zethu, siqhamuke nesisombululo, siyeke ukwesaba ukuthi abantu bazothini. Sikwenza lokhu ezinhlelweni zethu iNo Excuse Pay Papgeld, Uthando Noxolo neRea Tsotella,” kusho uBukani. Uthe bayaziqhenya ngokunyuka kwababukeli njengoba ngesonto bebukelwa abalinganiselwa ku-2.7 million.
title: Iyaziqhenya iMoja Love ngezinhlelo

text: USASHAQEKILE umphakathi waseMganwini eBhambanana, eNgwavuma, ngesenzo sowesifazane osolwa ngokubulala izingane zakhe ngokuzidlisa ushevu, maqede wazama ukuzilengisa ehlathini eliseduze nemizi.UNksz Samkelisiwe Thwala (28) ubingelele iMantshi yaseNgwavuma izolo ngezinsolo zokubulala uLwazi Ndlovu (6) oyingane yakhe no-Andiswa Mngomezulu (5) ozalwa yisoka lakhe.Lesi sigameko senzeke ntambama ngoLwesibili.UNksz Thwala kuvela ukuthi ngemuva kwalesi sigameko naye uzame ukuzibulala ngokuziphuzisa ushevu abewuthenge esikhungweni sezimpesheni, maqede wazama ukuzilengisa ngentambo kodwa kwangalunga ngoba ivele yanqamuka ngesikhathi eselenga esihlahleni.Ngokusho kwamalungu omphakathi azifikele endaweni yesigameko, kuzwakale uNksz Thwala ekhala ecela usizo phakathi ehlathini.“Sithole ukuthi uSamkelisiwe ube nokungaboni ngaso linye nenyanga-mthandazi aqale ukuxhumana nayo ngocingo ngemuva kokuba ebone inombolo yayo kwelinye lamaphephandaba esiZulu ichaza nomsebenzi wayo. Kuthiwa uyifonele ecela usizo okuthe ngemuva kokuba imkhulekele wazizwa enomehluko empilweni. Ngemuva kwalokho ubuyisele impendulo kule nyanga emyalele ukuba abhale abonge esidlangalaleni ukuthi uluthole kanjani usizo nayo yonke imiphumela. Emuva kwalokho ibe isimfuna imali engaphezu kwamandla akhe, okuthe uma echaza ukuthi uzohluleka ukuyikhokha, inyanga yamthembisa ukumyisa kwagoqanyawo nokulimaza abasondelene naye,” kusho omunye womakhelwane ocele ukungadalulwa.Uthe bamangele uma sebezwa umuntu ekhala ehlathini ecela usizo ngoba useze wabulala nezingane zakhe. Uveze ukuthi bathinte amaphoyisa afike ngokushesha endaweni yesigameko nemoto yezidumbu yahambisa izidumbu emakhazeni.UNkk Anah Zikhali oyilungu lomndeni wakwaThwala uthe bashaqeke kakhulu ngalesi sigameko.“Namanje siyazibuza asiyitholi impendulo ukuthi yini lena eyehlile lapha ekhaya lomfowethu. Selokhu ngaba khona angikaze ngiyizwe futhi ngiyibone inhlekelele yalolu hlobo. Siyacela kunoma ubani ongaba nesihe ukuba elule isandla ukuze sizokwazi ukufihla ngesizotha lezi zingane njengoba kungekho lutho lapha ekhaya. Mina ngihlala emzini wami. USamke uhlala nogogo wakhe nalezi zingane azibulele,” kusho uNkk Zikhali.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko.Uthe uNksz Thwala ubingelele iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNgwavuma ngamacala amabili okubulala. “Amaphoyisa athole nokuthi lo wesifazane uzame nokuzibulala kodwa wehluleka,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Uzame ukuzilengisa ngemuva 'kokudlisa' izingane zakhe ushevu

text: AMANTSHONTSHO kaMaskandi Awards agqemeke udume kuhoxa uKhuzani “Indlamlenze” Mpungose noMthandeni “Igcokama Elisha” Manqele.UKhuzani uthe isizathu esimenze wahoxa kuMantshontsho kulo nyaka wukuthi abanye abaculi bakamaskandi abakhululeki uma beqokwe naye. “Bayahoxa babaleke, bayangesaba manje ngibona ukuthi bazoze baguge bengenandondo. Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi njengoba ngihoxile nabo bazoyithola indondo, ikakhulukazi labo abadumile kodwa abangakaze bawine,” kuchaza uKhuzani. Lo mculi uduba nje wayehlabane ngezindondo ezintathu nyakenye maqede kwasuka umsindo ngoba Osaziwayo naMageza Amahle babesola ukuthi babanjwe ngophondo ukuze kuwine uKhuzani.Igcokama Elisha liqophe i-video liziqhelanisa naMantshontsho ngoba alikaze lawangenela kanti lishaqekile selibona kunegama lalo ohlwini lwabaqokelwe kulo mqhudelwano. Igcokama liphinde labhala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi alizihlanganisi naMantshontsho. “Ngifisa izwe lonke lazi futhi likuqonde ukuthi mina Mthandeni Manqele ngisuke ngingadlali uma ngithi angiyifuni imincintiswano yalapha eMzansi ngoba inamanga nobugebengu,” kusho Igcokama.Ebuzwa umgqugquzeli waMantshontsho uZazi Nxele ngokuhosha imfe kukaKhuzani neGcokama, uthe: “Kuqokwe kubaculi abangenele nabavumile ukuqokwa. Imibuzo ngabangangenelanga ayibhekiswe kubona (abaculi),” kushaya uNxele ngezinqamulelayo. Emcimbini wokumenyezelwa kwabaqokiwe eBusy Corner, eTembisa bekukhona Igeza LakwaMgube, Jaiva Zimnike, Goqozile Masango, Abafana BakaMgqumeni, Dumakahle, Mkhathazi, Njoko, Joel Zuma, Floda Grae, Mjaheni, Mbuzeni noNgizwe Mchunu.Eminxeni eboshelwe kulo nyaka kukhona: BEST MASKANDI: Khangelani, Jaiva, Bahubhe noQhosha. BEST MALE GROUP: Amageza Amahle, Amagcokama, Osaziwayo, Amabunjwa naManguni Amahle. BEST FEMALE GROUP: Osukasambe, Osaziwayokazi, Imithente, Izindlovukazi Zikamageba naMatshitshi Amhlophe. BEST MALE SOLO: Mkhathazi, Njoko, Magic Voice, Inyonemhlophe, Mjaheni, Mdumazi noMbuzeni. BEST FEMALE SOLO: Vumile Mngoma, Buselaphi, Glama, Garanti, Bonakele noBoneni. BEST SONG OF THE YEAR: Six to Six- Abafana BakaMgqumeni, Kuyagwazwa-Sgwebo Sentambo, Amadodana Amahlanu- Dumakahle, Usuzungishiye- Mzukulu, Kuphelelisiwe- Ithwasa Lendidane, Uyadlala Mbhemu- Qhosha/Khuzani, Game Over- Ezendidane, Idollar-Mnikezwa, Impi Yamatekisi, Anivume Nithi Shwi- Igeza LakwaMgube neMithente-Ngitheleleni Upoison.Ukuvota kuvalwa ngoNovemba 3 ngo-2 emini.
title: Kuhoxe izilomo zikamaskandi kuMantshontsho

text: UKWABELANA amaphuzu naMaZulu eFNB Stadium izolo ebusuku kweKaizer Chiefs, kwenze kwabukeka sizogcina sifana nephupho isifiso somqeqeshi wayo, uSteve Komphela, sokuwina isicoco se-Absa Premiership ngesizini ka-2017/2018.Nakuba abadlali beChiefs bengakavumi ukuphosa ithawula kodwa ukuhluleka ukuwina umdlalo wayizolo kukubeka obala ukuthi sekufanele ibheke ngesizini ezayo.Isizukulwane sabadlali beChiefs abaqale nomqeqeshi uSteve Komphela sizongena emlandweni wokungawini lutho amasizini amathathu uma sigcine sihlulekile ukuwina ngisho iNedbank Cup.IChiefs isalelwe yimidlalo eyisihlanu ukuthi iqede isizini nokubukeka kuzoba wumqansa ukuyiwina yonke ukuze izibeke ethubeni lokubamba iMamelodi Sundowns ezihola phambili kwi-log.Bekulindeleke ukuthi Amakhosi azibuyisele emjahweni wesicoco seligi ophazamisekile ngesikhathi ehluleka ukuthola amaphuzu agcwele ebhekene neBloemfontein Celtic ne-Orlando Pirates ngokuhlukana.USuthu belukade lunengcindezi yokuwina kulandela ukukhishwa kwalo kwiNedbank Cup wuBuntu Cape Town edlala kwiNational First Division (NFD) ngempelasonto edlule.Emdlalweni wayizolo, AmaZulu afake ingcindezi umdlalo uqala kodwa ahluleka ukugqobhoza udonga lweChiefs.Nokho ithuba lokuqala eliphakamise amaphaphu litholwe yiChiefs ngesikhathi ibhola ebelingqofwe nguLeonardo Castro liphuma eceleni kwepali ngomzuzu ka-15 likade ligotshwe nguSiphiwe Tshabalala.Ngomzuzu ka-28 umzamo woSuthu uphelele ezihlweleni ngesikhathi uMhlengi Cele eshaya ibhola phezu kwepali.Emuva kwemizuzu embalwa unozinti woSuthu * -Energy Murambadoro utakule ezakhe evimba ibhola sekuvalwe amehlo kukade kuyi free-kick yeChiefs.Ngomzuzu ka-39 umcibisholo weshodi likaSiyethemba Mnguni uphume eceleni kwepali sebemi ngezinyawo abalandeli boSuthu.Esiwombeni sesibili, iChiefs ibuye yacindezela kodwa udonga lwasemuva lwaMaZulu beluhlelekile uma kuqhathaniswa nemidlalo edlule.Usuthu beluwathola amathuba kodwa luhluleka ukuwasebenzisa. Ngomzuzu ka-59 unozinti weChiefs, * -Itumeleng Khune uvimbe kunzima ibhola ebelithunyelwe nguMnguni.UKomphela, uzame nangokufaka abadlali abahlaselayo okukhona kubona uPule Ekstein noSiphelele Ntshangase kodwa kwaba nhlanga zimuka nomoya.
title: Alokhe eyihlehlele njalo amathuba eseligi iChiefs

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESEUKAPUTENI waMaZulu FC, uMbongeni “Shoes” Gumede, uthi bazimisele ukubambelela endaweni yesibili kwi-log yeDStv Premiership kuze kusongwe isizini.Ngaphansi kukaBenni McCarthy, ongumqeqeshi, Usuthu ludlala ingcwenga yebhola njengoba luvulela isibhaxu kwamanye amaqembu. Lokhu kufakazelwa wukuhlala kwalo endaweni yesibili ngamaphuzu angu-50 emidlalweni engu-27.Ngaphambi kokuba ezikaMandlakazi zibuyiselwe kwamhlaba ngempelasonto edlule yiBaroka FC, eziguqise ngo-1-0 eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza, bese zidlale imidlalo yeligi engu-16 zingayazi induku.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uGumede, oyisiqongqwane sasemuva oSuthwini, uthe ukuhlulwa kwabo yiBaroka akwehlanga kahle kubona kodwa wathembisa ukuthi bazovuka bazithathe.“Angifuni ukuqamba amanga, akwehlanga kahle ukuhlulwa kwethu yiBaroka ngemuva kwesikhathi eside singehlulwa, ngaphezu kwalokho besidlalela ekhaya.“Kodwa-ke ukwehlulwa yiBaroka sesikudlulisile sesibheke imidlalo yethu yokugcina elandelayo. Nakuba kungeke kube yinto elula ukuyenza kodwa kuzomele nakanjani siyinqobe ukuze sizoqeda isizini sihlezi endaweni yesibili kwi-log,” usho kanje uGumede owafika oSuthwini ngo-2015 esuka kwi-Orlando Pirates.Lo mdlali, odabuka eMlaza, uthe kungabajabulisa kakhulu ukuyodlala kwiCaf Champions League. Amaqembu aqeda endaweni yokuqala neyesibili kwi-log adlala kulo mqhudelwano. “Nakuba singafuni ukuzifakela ingcindezi ngemidlalo yeCaf kodwa nathi singaMaZulu siyafisa ukuzibona sikulo mqhudelwano. Lokhu kungalinyusa kakhulu igama leqembu futhi kusize nabadlali beqembu ekutheni bathole isipiliyoni sokuyodlala emidlalweni yeCaf.”Umdlalo olandelayo weligi waMaZulu uzokuba ngonzima kakhulu njengoba ezobhekana ne-Orlando Pirates ngoMeyi 27 e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto.“Kuhlale kunzima ngaso sonke isikhathi ukubhekana namaqembu amakhulu ngakho-ke nakulo mdlalo wethu nePirates sibheke ukuthi ube ngonzima kakhulu. Kodwa sizokwenza ngakho konke okusemandleni ethu ukuthi sibuya nomphumela osivunayo,”  kusho uGumede. Egcina ukuhlangana la maqembu emzuliswaneni wokuqala weligi, abambana ngo 1-1 eJonsson Kings Park Stadium, eThekwini.
title: USuthu selubheke ukubambelela kweyesibili kwi-log

text: IMARITZBURG United icathamela umgadli weSuperSport United, uFagrie Lakay. ULakay ubebolekiswe kwi-Ajax Cape Town ngesizini esanda kusongwa.ULakay ufike kwi-Urban Warriors wadlala ingcwenga yebhola emenze waphenduka isethenjwa eqenjini eligcine ligawulwe yizembe.Usihlalo weTeam of Choice, uFarook Kadodia, uthe basezinhlelweni zokusayinisa uLakay.“ISuperSport isinikile igunya lokuthi sixoxe noLakay. Sixhumanile naye samnika isicelo sethu. Into esisele wukuthi abuyele kithina asitshele ukuthi weneme yini ngesicelo sethu noma cha. Ungumdlali omncane onekhono,” kusho uKadodia.ULakay usenenkontileka neSuperSport United. I-United isanda kuthi izimisele ngokusayinisa abadlali abane uma sekuvulwa iwindi lokuhwebelana ngabadlali ngenyanga ezayo.ITeam of Choice idedele uBevan Fransman obephelelwa yinkontileka neqembu. Indawo yakhe izovalwa nguDenwin Farmer obeyibamba kuMatsatsantsa a Pitori.Amaqembu agijima esigabeni esikhulu kubhekwe ukuthi aqhubeke nokufaka izicelo zokusayinisa uSiphesihle Ndlovu.UKadodia ugcizelele elokuthi abazimisele ngokudedela lo mdlali.“Ngeke sikuvimbe ukuthola izingcingo ngabadlali bethu abashaye into ecokeme. Asifuni ukubulala ikusasa labadlali bethu abancane. Ikusasa labo liqhakazile ebholeni. Asazi ukuthi uma beya emaqenjini amakhulu aseNingizimu Afrika kuzokwenzekani. Nokho uma kuvela ithuba lokuthi uNdlovu ayodlala phesheya noma ayohlolwa ngeke simvimbe. Ngikholwa wukuthi usadinga ukudlala isizini eyodwa lapha eNingizimu Afrika. Ngemuva kwalokho-ke usengahamba,” kusho uKadodia.ITeam of Choice igile izimanga kule sizini esanda kusongwa. Iqede endaweni yesine kwi-log kwathi kusenjalo yafinyelela kowamanqamu weNedbank Cup.
title: ITeam of Choice ifuna ukusayina uLakay

text: ULINDELE noma yini ngekusasa lakhe umdlali wasemuva, uMthokozisi Dube, ophelelwa yinkontileka ne-Orlando Pirates ekupheleni kwesizini.UDube ubolekiswe eZimnyama kwiLamontville Golden Arrows kuze kuphele isizini ka-2020/202. Empeleni uyena ozicelele ukubolekiswa ngenxa yokungasitholi isikimu kwiPirates ngaphansi komqeqeshi uJosef Zinnbauer. Phezu kokuba inkontileka yakhe nePirates iphela kodwa uDube uthe akakazi ukuthi ikusasa limphatheleni."KwiPirates bengingadlali. Bengilimala njalo futhi kubenzima ukuthola indawo esikimini uma sengeluleme. Okunye wukuthi ngibonile ukuthi iminyaka yami yobudala iyahamba ngihleli ngingadlali. Ngizicelele ukubolekiswa ngoba bengidinga ukushintsha indawo nokudlala njalo," kusho uDube."Ebholeni kungenzeka noma yini. Kungenzeka ngibuyele kwiPirates, kungenzeka futhi ngingabuyeli. Okubalulekile kimina wukudlala. Okwamanje angikacabangi kakhulu ngeqembu engizoba kulona ngesizini ezayo. Ngizolinda imenenja yami (Mike Makaab). Lapha kwi-Arrows bangiphethe kahle."Selokhu efikile kwi-Arrows, uDube ushaya into ecokeme emuva kwesokudla ngaphansi komqeqeshi uMandla Ncikazi. Ukuqina kodonga lwasemuva lwaBafana Bes'thende kubabeke ekubeni ngelinye lamaqembu amane kwiDStv Premiership asangenelwe ngamagoli ambalwa kule sizini. Basalande ezintanjeni angu-13 okuyisibalo esifanayo nalandwe yiSuperSport United, Swallows neMamelodi Sundowns kuphela abasangenelwe ngamagoli angaphansi kuka-10. I-Arrows, esendaweni yesine kwi-log, izophinda ibhekane nesivivinyo esinzima kwiStellenbosch FC ezodlala nayo koweDStv Premiership eDanie Craven Stadium, eKapa, ngoLwesihlanu ngo-5 ntambama."Ukusebenza kanzima ejimini nokubambisana yikhona okusibeke lapha. Isifiso sethu wukwenza kangcono kunangesizini edlule. Sifuna ukuqeda kwi-top 8, sidlale kwiMTN8. IStellenbosch iyiqembu elinzima futhi iyagijima kakhulu. Kufanele sizikhandle njengayo ukuze sibuye namaphuzu aphelele," kusho uDube.
title: Obedlala kwiBucs ubheke uMakaab ngesinqumo

text: FANELESIBONGE BENGUNJENGOBA zingenisile izimoto eziphakeme amaSport Utility Vehicle emhlabeni jikelele kodwa iBMW 3 Series  ilokhu imile ayiyi ndawo.Ime kufanele ngoba ukuyibuka kude nokungena phakathi kuyo uhambe ngayo kuyakukhanyisela ukuthi yimoto  eseqophelweni eliphezulu kangakanani.Kule minyaka edlule kwaBMW badayise izigidi zama-3 Series nokufakazela ukuthandwa nezinga layo.Ekhona njengamanje iG20 ayikhiqizwa embonini yale nkampani iPlant Rosslyn ePitoli njengokudlule kodwa itheleka  kwelengabadi isiphelele.Ngaphandle iyabukeka futhi yona ithe ukuba nkudlwana kunendala. Ngaphambili inamaLED lights kanjalo nama-fog  lights angamaLED ngezansi. Enze omkhulu umsebenzi kunenkungu ekhasa phansi ngikhuphuka eMthonjaneni. Iziphathimandla kumele zisilungisele olayini abamaka umgwaqo zifake namakati ngoba kuba nzima impela. Nangemuva kukhona amaLED lights athanda ukuba mpisholo mbijana nayenza ibukeke kahle.Ngaphakathi akubuzwa ukuthi yimoto yomndeni kwazise ivulekile. Inezihlalo zesikhumba ezilayisha abagibeli abahlanu kanti ebhuthini isikhala wudedangendlale. Kuba yinto elula nje ukulalisa izihlalo bese sithi xaxa.Uma isihamba emgwaqweni iwubukhosi. Inenjini eyi-2.0 turbo eyi-four cylinder kaphethroli. Inamandla angu-135kW/300Nm bese isebenzisa u-gearbox ozishintshayo. Ngo-100km ibidla amalitha kaphethroli angu-7.4. Iyanamathela emgwaqeni futhi okungichazayo wukuthi intofonotofo futhi ithule. Amajika iwashaya kalula ngaphandle kwenkinga futhi amandla iwathumela kahle emasondweni ngokushesha.I-BMW 3 Series inenqwaba yobuchwepheshe besimanje obenza impilo ibe lula. Kubalwa ukuthi isho uma kukhona imoto eseceleni kwakho, izihambele futhi izijikise yona isiteringi uma iphuma emzileni, izihlehlele uma iphuma lapho ipake khona, Head-Up Display, ikhamera ngemuva nokunye.Ine-touchscreen lapho udlala khona umsakazo, ufunda izindaba, uxhume iselula nge-Apple CarPlay, ubone imininingwane ngemoto nokunye.Uphinde ukhulume nayo ngokuthi “Hey BMW” bese uyitshela ofuna ikwenze njengokushintsha amazinga okushisa ngaphakathi. I-BMW 320i ikahle iphelele kodwa uma ufuna ecishe ibe ngangayo kodwa enamandla futhi eyongayo, i320d iyona umakhonya.InaniIqala kuR693 800
title: Igabe ngobuchwepheshe iBMW 3 Series

text: ISOBISHINI indodana yomnewabo wayengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma. INkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini iyalele ukuba kudliwe impahla kaMnuz Khulubuse Zuma ngoba ehlulekile ukugcina isethembiso sokukhokhelana nophiko olusingethe izindaba zenkampani yabo i-Aurora Empowerment Systems.UZuma onguMqondisi wale nkampani ngokubambisana noMnuz Solly noFazel Bhana, uMnuz Thulani Ngubane noMnuz Zondwa Mandela ongumzukulu kaDkt Nelson Mandela, kuthiwa bathenga izimayini ezimbili iPamodzi ngo-2009 kodwa bahluleka ukuzinakekela.Lokhu kuthiwa kwaholela ekutheni inkampani ivalwe njengoba nabasebenzi bagcina bengasaholelwa.Inyunyana emele abasebenzi iSolidarity isishayele ihlombe isinqumo esikhishwe inkantolo phakathi nesonto.“Bazoke bathole ubulungiswa abasebenzi base-Aurora abangu-5 300 abalahlekelwa umsebenzi. Izimayini iPamodzi zafakwa ngaphansi kophiko olubhekele ukuqoqa amadameshe ngo-2009 no-2010. I-Aurora yahluleka ukukhokhela abasebenzi bayo imiholo yezinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye,” kusho unobhala jikelele weSolidarity uMnuz Gideon du Plessis.UZuma kuthiwa ukweleta uR13 million esivumelwaneni aba naso ngo-2016 nalolu phiko oluqoqa amadameshe ale nkampani eyavalwa ngo-2010.UDu Plessis uthe akubukeki engathi uZuma uzokwazi ukuhlanganisa le mali ngaphambi kwecala ngoMashi 4. Uthe ngaphandle walesi sikweletu usamelwe ukukhokha uR1.4 billion.Uveze ukuthi uma uZuma ehluleka ukukhokha le mali ngesikhathi asibekelwe, inkantolo izokhipha umyalelo wokudlelwa impahla ongumnqamulajuqu.Uqhube wathi uZuma usazophenywa ukusebenza kwakhe kusukela ngoSepthemba 2009 eqokwa ukuba nguMqondisi we-Aurora kuze kufike lapho edlelwa khona impahla.“Siyethemba ukuthi lolu phenyo luzoveza ukuthi kwenzakalani emalini enguR170 million eyanyamalala ezimayini nokuthi uZuma wayeqhuba liphi ibhizinisi ezwenikazi i-Afrika,” kusho uDu Plessis.UZuma kuthiwa uqhuba nebhizinisi lika-oyela eDemocratic Republic of Congo.Isinqumo ngokudliwa kwempahla kaMandela sizokhishwa ngenyanga ezayo kanti esoBhana sisacutshungulwa.
title: UKhulubuse otakwini lokudlelwa impahla

text: IGCINE ifaka imiyalezo ixolisa i-ANC kwiTwitter, emuva kokuthi ihlangane nezimbila zithutha ziholwa emhlophe phambili.I-ANC iqhuba umkhankaso wayo obizwa nge-ANC Friday ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, lapho isuke ivukuza khona abantu njalo ngoLwesihlanu.ULwesihlanu lwaleli sonto lube muncu kakhulu kuKhongolose, njengoba bethe bayawuqala umkhankaso, kwasuka umsindo. Abantu bashiye abangalazi kwiTwitter bekhala ngokuthi bakhathele yi-ANC, beyisola ngenkohlakalo nangokweba imali yomphakathi ekubeni abantu behlaselwe wububha nendlala. Baze bavula i-hashtag ethi, #voetsekANC. UMnuz Mzwanele Manyi we-ATM ubuze ukuthi yiliphi iqembu elizihola phambili ngenkohlakalo, yize i-ANC ihambe phambili kodwa ne-EFF ayisalanga ngaphandle.UMnuz Carl Niehaus ucele amalungu e-ANC ukuthi ayeke ukubukela phansi amavoti abantu. [email protected] ephendula [email protected] uthe i-ANC iyantshontsha, inenkohlakalo, iqoka ongqongqoshe abangawufanele umsebenzi, ibenzele phansi abantu abamnyama kanjalo nogqozi nofuqufuqu lwango-1994. Abanye baqhubeke ne-hashtag ethuka le nhlangano bezwakalisa ukunengeka kwabo ngenkohlakalo eyenziwa ngamalungu ale nhlangano.Ithe isuka nayo ekhasini layo kuTwitter yafaka imiyalezo ivuma amaphutha ayo ithi iyazama ukulungisa.Okhulumela i-ANC uMnuz Pule Mabe akatholakalanga ukuthi aphawule kodwa ngesikhathi ethintwa uthumele umyalezo wokuthi akakwazi ukukhuluma lapho ebekhona. Ugcine engabuyelanga ukuzophendula ngoba ubethunyelelwe umbuzo ngodaba lokuhlaselwa kukaKhongolose.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, zishubile izinsolo ngabaholi benhlangano okuthiwa bayazicebisa noma kuliwa neCorona.Okhulumela ihhovisi likamengameli uNkk Khusela Diko uhlabe ikhefu emuva kokuvela kwezinsolo ngethenda kaR125 million etholwe wumyeni wakhe ngenkampani iRoyal Bhaca. Kuthiwa inkampani iqokelwe ukuhlinzeka ngezimpahla zokuvikela iCorona.Indaba yethenda ithinta noNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo eGauteng uDkt Bandile Masuku nomkakhe nabo abahlabe ikhefu ngesikhathi kusaphenywa udaba lwethenda. Kuvela ukuthi kukhona okungahambanga kahle ekukhishweni kwamathenda.Esithangamini sabezindaba ebesibanjelwe eGoli ngoLwesihlanu, uNdunankulu waseGauteng uMnuz David Makhura uthe kumphoxe kakhulu okwenzeke eMnyangweni wezeMpilo esifundazweni sakhe, kwazise kuthinta nongqongqoshe walo mnyango obesebenza ngokuzikhandla. Uveze ukuthi zingu-102 izinkampani ezisazophenywa mayelana nokuthola amathenda kulo mnyango kodwa ugcizelele ekutheni akasho ukuthi zonke lezi zinkampani zibe nobugebengu.
title: Ixolisile i-ANC ithukwa ngabantu ezinkundleni

text: AHLALELE ovalweni amalungu e-ANC esifundeni iLower South Coast ngemuva kwezigameko zokusocongwa kwamalungu ombutho amabili ezehlakalweni ezahlukene, esikhathini esingamasonto amathathu.UMnuz Sifiso Cele (42) okubikwa ukuthi ubenguMgcinimafa we-ANC e-ward 5, oShabeni kuthiwa ubekwakhe nomndeni elungiselela ukuyisa izingane zakhe esikoleni izolo ekuseni ngesikhathi ebulawa abasolwa ababili abangaziwa.Ukubulawa kukaCele kwenzeke kungakapholi maseko kubulewe elinye ilungu le-ANC kulesi sifunda, uNksz Nombusa Mqadi nalo elihlaselwe lisekhaya ngasekupheleni kwenyanga edlule.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uthe umufi ubekwakhe nomndeni eMargate Extension 03, ngesikhathi abasolwa ababili abebehlome ngezibhamu behlasela.UGwala uthe abasolwa bafike bakhomba abebephakathi endlini ngezibhamu bafuna imali namaselula, bavalela wonke umuntu ethoyilethi babatshela ukuthi bangaphumi.“Abasolwa babe sebethatha umufi bamyisa ekamelweni lakhe lapho befike bamdubula khona amahlandla amane, base beyabaleka. Umufi uficwe wumndeni wakhe edubuleke ekhanda eshonele endaweni yesehlakalo,” kusho uGwala.Uthe amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubamba inkunzi nokubulala, wangeza ngokuthi bekungakaboshwa muntu. UGwala uthe imbangela yokubulala ibingakaziwa.Ilungu le-ANC eLower South Coast elikhulume neSolezwe kodwa lacela ukuthi lingadalulwa lithe banovalo ngoba abazi ukuthi lesi sihlava sokubulawa kwamaqabane sivelaphi.“Sekubulewe amaqabane amabili esikhathini esingaphansi kwenyanga kulo nyaka. Imbangela yokubulawa kwawo asiyazi,” kusho ilungu.Isifunda, iLower South Coast kulo nyaka simatasa ngamalungiselelo okuba nengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi obusha okungakacaci ukuthi izoba nini.ILower South Coast ingesinye sezifunda okubalwa iMoses Mabhida neHarry Gwala, okubikwa ukuthi zinezinkinga futhi azikaphumi nezinsuku zokuthi zizokwenziwa nini izingqungquthela zakhona.Ilungu lesigungu esiphezulu le-ANC elijutshwe ukuthi libheke ukusebenza kwesifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Edna Molewa lithe noma ngabe kuthiwa lezi zifunda ezintathu kuze kufika isikhathi sokuthi kube nengqungquthela yesifundazwe zingahlalile, ngeke ize iphazamiseke.Uthe izithunywa zakulezi zifunda zizokwazi ukubamba iqhaza engqungqutheleni yesifundazwe ngoba zizoza zithunywe ngamagatsha azo.UNobhala we-ANC eLower South Coast uMnuz Mzwandile Mkhwanazi usigxekile isigameko sokubulawa kukaCele, wathi siwubuqaba. Uthe bafe olwembiza ngokubulawa kukaCele obengusomaqhinga weqembu.
title: Uvalo kusocongwa amalungu amabili e-ANC

text: KUPHELILE ukuqagela ngezigidi zamaRandi ezasetshenziswa nguMengameli we-ANC nezwe uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, ngesikhathi ekhankasela ukuba ngumengameli we-ANC.Izolo uRamaphosa uveze ukuthi umkhankaso wakhe wakuhola le nhlangano owawaziwa ngeCR17, wasebenzisa imali elinganiselwa kuR300 million, ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyawudla umhlanganiso  engqungqutheleni yango-2017 eNasrec.URamaphosa ukudalule lokhu ngesikhathi ephendula imibuzo kwikhomishini ephenya izinsolo zokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana.URamaphosa utshele usihlalo wekhomishini, iJaji Raymond Zondo, ukuthi kungamampunge ukuthi kwasetshenziswa uR1 billion emkhankasweni wakhe.URamaphosa uthe akusilo iqiniso ukuthi le mali yasetshenziswa ukuthenga amavoti engqungqutheleni eyayibhekwe ngabomvu.“Kukhona amahlebezi athi ngathenga amavoti. Lokhu kungamanga aluhlaza. Lezi zimali zasetshenziswa ukusiza amagatsha e-ANC ukukhokhela izindawo zokwenza imihlangano, imali yokugibela ne-airtime yalabo ababeqhuba umkhankaso.”URamaphosa uthe akazi ukuthi lezi zimali zanikelwa ngobani.“Ngangingeyona ingxenye yabantu ababelawula ukusebenza kwalezi zimali. Ababephethe lo mkhankaso, bathatha isinqumo sokuthi ngingabi yingxenye yokuqoqwa kwezimali zomkhankaso, ukuze ngingabazi abantu abanikela emkhankasweni.“Lokhu kwakwenzelwa ukuthi abantu abanikela kulo mkhankaso, bangalindeli ukuthi kukhona abazokuthola uma sengiqokwe ngaba ngumengameli.”URamaphosa uthe akusiwo owakhe kuphela umkhankaso owawunezigidi zamaRandi.“Nabanye abahlanu ababengenele lo mbango, nabo basebenzisa izindodla zemali.”Lo mbango wokuhola i-ANC wawungenelwe nanguNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, wuzakwabo kwezempilo uDkt Zweli Mkhize noNkk Lindiwe Sisulu, onguNgqongqoshe wezaManzi.URamaphosa uvumile ukuthi lo mkhuba wokusetshenziswa kwezimali ukukhankasela izikhundla kwi-ANC, awumuhle.Ubuiye wabuzwa ngokudembesela kwe-ANC ekuphenyeni izinsolo ngomndeni wakwaGupta, osolwa ngokuba ngongqondongqondo ekulawulweni koMbuso yidlanzana.URamaphosa uthe ukuhudula izinyawo kwe-ANC ukuphenya izinsolo zokuthi lo mndeni wawunesandla ekuqokweni kongqongqoshe nezikhulu zezinkampani zikahulumeni, ngesikhathi kusaphethe uMnuz Jacob Zuma, kwadala omkhulu umonakalo.Uthe kuyishwa ukuthi nakuba lezi zinsolo zaqala ukuvela ngo-2011, kodwa zaze zaqala ukuphenywa yiPhalamende ngo-2017.“Ngiyavuma ukuthi iPhalamende kumele lenze okuthile uma kuvela izinsolo ezifana nalezi. Yinhlangano ebusayo okumele ithathe indawo yayo kuqala. Uma ihluleka kube sekungenela iPhalamende kodwa lidinga okungaphezulu kwezinsolo. Ama-email abakwaGupta aputshuka aba wubufakazi obungalandeleka.”Uthe okwadala ukuthi kuthathe isikhathi eside ukuthi ziphenywe lezi zinsolo, yingoba kwakunokuphikisana ngaphakathi kwi-ANC ngezinsolo zokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana.URamaphosa uthe ngisho namanje kwi-ANC kusenezinkulumo-mpikiswano ngezinsolo zokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana kuleli.URamaphosa uzophinde avele phambi kwekhomishini maphakathi noMeyi, lapho esezovela engumengameli wezwe.
title: URamaphosa udalula imali ayisebenzisa emkhankasweni

text:
FANELESIBONGE BENGUUKUSHINTSHA isitayela basifake isigqi sakwamanye amazwe kwenze i-albhamu yeMafikizolo eshisa izikhotha ibe yimpumelelo.Lokhu kushiwo yilungu laleli qembu uNhlanhla Nciza osebenza noTheo Kgosinkwe othe bazihambela bodwa e-Afrika nge-albhamu yabo ethi 
ReUnited abayikhiphe ngonyaka odlule.Izolo kukhishwe uhlu lwabaculi abaqokelwe eqoqweni leKia Record of the Year kumaSouth African Music Awards azoba seSun City ngo-Ephreli 28.IMafikizolo iqokwe kabili ngengoma abapike kuyo i-Uhuru ethi 
Khona nethi 
Happines abayenze noMay D.Lokhu kusho ukuthi sebeqokwe emaqoqweni ayisihlanu njengoba beqokwe nakwi-Album of the Year, Duo or Group of the Year, Best Pop Album neBest Collaboration.“Sakhetha ukuthi senze umculo ozothakaselwa yibo bonke abantu base-Afrika nokusisebenzelayo. Vele wonke umculi ufisa ukuthi anakwe ezwenikazi lonke. Thina nje siqashwa emazweni okubalwa kuwo oTanzania, Angola, Nigeria nakwamanye amazwe futhi lokhu sekudale ukuthi abaculi abaningi bafune ukusebenza nathi. Kumanje siqeda kuqopha iculo noDaVido waseNigeria,” kusho uNhlanhla.Iqoqo leRecord of the Year yilona kuphela elivotelwa ngumphakathi kanti ngonyaka odlule kwaqopheka umlando ngesikhathi uSfiso Ncwane eba ngumculi wokholo wokuqala ukunqoba ngengoma yakhe ethi 
Kulungile.Ukuvota sekuvuliwe kanti kuthunyelwa i-sms enohlamvu oluqondene nengoma nesifundazwe ohlala kuso ku-33123 (isibonelo: D - Mpumalanga). Ukuvota kubiza u-R1.50 kanti inombolo ivunyelwe ukuvota ka-10.Abaqokiwe:A BlackByrd -

title: Iqokwe kabili kwelibhekwe ngabomvu kumaSama iMafikizolo

text: ISILILO sabantu bakuleli ngokubulawa komlingisi uMndeni (Thobani Nzuza) emdlalweni Ehostela, siphoqe ukuthi lo mdlalo uziqophe kabusha ezinye iziqephu zokugcina zomdlalo.NgoMgqibelo kuqale phansi ukuqoshwa komdlalo okulindeleke ukuthi kuphele ekupheleni kwesonto.Kuthiwa nesiteshi, uMzansi Magic siqhamuke nokunye esifisa kufakwe kulo mdlalo ngenxa yezinkulumo zabantu abakhombisa ukuwuthakasela.Umthombo weSolezwe uthi ukuqoshwa kuqale ngoMgqibelo kuzothatha isonto lonke.“Kuphoqile impela ukuthi kubizwe wonke umuntu kuzoqalwa phansi ukuqopha ngenxa yokuthi abantu bakhalile ngokufa kukaMndeni futhi bebemfuna ephila. Yena ngokomdlalo vele ubezoshona kodwa bekuzoba khona into ebizomangaza abantu futhi baphide bajabule,” kusho umthombo.Uthe lo mdlalo njengoba usuqoshwa kabusha nje kuningi okuzojabulisa ababukeli futhi abanye ubashiye bebambe ongezansi.“Uma ngizwa, kuthiwa kuzobonakala nabantu abasha kodwa ke okwamanje asikazi ukuthi obani kodwa nje muningi umsebenzi njengoba sekuqalwe phansi,” kuchaza umthombo.UPhilly Kubheka oyinhloko yezinhlelo zobumnandi zaseNingizimu Afrika kwaM-Net uvumile ukuthi kuneziqephu ezizoqoshwa kabusha ezingasekugcineni.“Kukhona la kungenzakalanga kahle khona ngenxa yemishini esetshenziswayo kodwa manje ngenxa yokuthi konke sekulungile yikho siqale phansi ukuqopha,” kuchaza uPhilly.Lo mdlalo bese kuphele isikhathi esingangenyanga kuphelile ukuqoshwa kwawo, ehostela KwaMashu .NgoMgqibelo izithombe zokuqoshwa kweziqephu ezithile zibonakele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana zifakwa ngabanye abantu.
title: Kushintshe iziqephu ngesililo sikaMndeni

text: AKENEME ngendawo abahleli kuyona kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership ompetha beTelkom Knockout ka-2018 uWedson Nyirenda oshayela umkhumbi weBaroka FC.Leli qembu lihlele ukuqala ngeMamelodi Sundowns ukunombela njengoba bedlala namuhla koweligi ngo-7.30 ebusuku eLucas Moripe Stadium.Ngokusho kukaNyirenda okunguyena futhi okhiphe iSundowns endleleni yakhe ebheke ekubeni ompetha beTKO, iSundowns izoba nzima kwazise iza negqubu kodwa lokho yikhona okungaba wukhiye wokuthi baqale baqoqe amaphuzu.UNyirenda okhuluma angesabi, uthe ngeke avume ukuthi bangabuyi nalutho ePitoli yize azi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane ngeke avume ukuthi babaphinde eduze.“Okusemqoka kakhulu kunakho konke ukuthi siqinisekise ukuthi kusukela namuhla abadlali bayakhohlwa yindaba yeTelkom ngoba isiwumlando manje. Indawo esihleli kuyona kwi-log ayichazi thina nendlela esidlala ngayo. Sikuphi isidingo sokuba ompetha beTelkom kodwa ekupheleni kwesizini sibalwe namaqembu abalekela ukugencwa yizembe?“Kumele sikhohlwe yiTelkom. Kungumsebenzi wami kodwa konke lokho."Uma siqeda ukujabula namuhla (esho ngoMgqibelo ebusuku) sicabanga ngeSundowns namaphuzu amathathu okumele siwaqoqe kuyona ukuze sizosuka kule ndawo engasifanele, esihleli kuyona,” usho kanje lo mqeqeshi.NgokukaNyirenda, umdlalo weSundowns uzobe umqoka ngendlela engachazeki ngoba kuwona yilapho ezobona khona ukuthi abadlali bakhe bayakuqonda yini ukuthi kumqoka kangakanani ukuqala manje babalekele izembe.“Lo mdlalo weSundowns uzobe umkhulu ngaphezulu kwalo esiwunqobe namuhla. Sidinga amaphuzu amathathu kodwa uma kungenzeki lokho sesingakhalela kwelilodwa. Esingeke sikuvume ukubuya ePitoli sishwiba izandla. Sibhekene neqembu eliseqophelweni eliphezulu futhi sidlalela nalo esibayeni salo.“Ngeke kube lula kodwa yonke imidlalo kule ligi yethu isinda ngendlela efanayo. Ngazi kahle ukuthi uPitso ubehlaziya yonke into ebesiyenza kwiTelkom, ngakho-ke uzozijikijela zonke izimbokodo anazo kulo mdlalo okutshela thina ukuthi kufanele sizibambe ziqine. Ngiyamazi uPitso uyahlela kodwa okumnandi ukuthi uyazi futhi ukuthi akufanele asithathe kancane ngoba uzozwa ngento,” usonge kanje uNyirenda sakukloloda.IBaroka ingcono ngephuzu elilodwa kuBlack Leopards okuyiyona esemsileni. Emidlalweni yeligi ewu-12 ezikaNyirenda zisaphumelele emibili zashaywa eyisithupha zase zidlala ngokulingana kwemine.
title: OweBaroka uwafuna wonke kwiDowns

text: AKAZISOLI nakancane ngakubhala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ikakhulukazi ku-Twitter, uLunga Sokhela, oyimenenja jikelele kuMaZulu FC. Lesi sikhulu sithe esikubhala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuba wombono waso, futhi kumele sihlonishwe kulokho ngoba kuyilungelo laso.USokhela usenakho ukushiya abantu bebambe ongezansi ngakubhalayo ku-Twitter. Phakathi kwezinto azibhalile zasusa ukukhuluma udaba lokweseka kwakhe usihlalo wePremier Soccer League (PSL), U-Irvin “The Iron Duke” Khoza, nalapho khona alibeka ngembaba elokuthi akekho oyoke aphathe iPSL ngaphandle kukaKhoza.Kukhona nalapho ekhuluma ngosopolitiki baseNingizimu Afrika, ngakucabangayo ngabo. Ayisali nenkulumo lapho eshiya angalazi kumsakazi weMetro FM, esola le ntokazi ngokucwasa ngokobulili. Uphinde washiya angalazi kwenye yezintatheli ebibhale udaba oluthi Usuthu lucela usizo kwiPSL ngesigwebo esinzima elusithole kwiFifa nalapho leli qembu liphucwe khona amaphuzu ayisithupha. USokhela ubize umbiko wale ntatheli ngombhedo.Okucacayo ngazo zonke izinkulumo azibhalayo ukuthi uyazimela, ngoba kukhona abazama ukumphendula, abase lapho befuna khona.Ngesikhathi Usuthu lunomdlalo wesihle neMamelodi Sundowns emqhudelwaneni waminyaka yonke, iPrince Mangosuthu Legacy Cup, Olundi, leli phephandaba lithole ithuba lokubuza lesi sikhulu ngelikubhala ku-Twitter ukuthi ngabe akusakheli yini izitha.“Izinkundla zokuxhumana sizisebenzisela ukuveza indlela esizizwa ngayo. Kungenzeka umuntu asho izinto ezicika abanye abantu, abanye bathathe izinto ngesinxele ngenxa yokusuke kubhaliwe. Ekugcineni sonke sinelungelo lokusho esikuthandayo. Sivumelekile futhi ukusho nxa kukhona okungasijabulisi. Akithina sonke esiyizingelosi,” usho kanje uSokhela. Uvumile ukuthi kuyenzeka ukuhluthuka kwenhliziyo kumenze abhale ngendlela azizwa ngayo ngaleso sikhathi.“Kuyenzeka ukuthi umuntu athathe ngokudinwa, abhale ngaleyo ndlela kepha ukugcineni kufanele siqonde ukuthi abantu bayohlezi bengabantu. Uma kukhona izinto ezingezinhle ezenzeka eqenjini, lokho kuyangidina,” kusho uSokhela.Usuthu luzodudulana ne-Orlando Pirates emdlalweni weTelkom Knockout (TKO), kuma-quarter final, ngoMgqibelo eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngo-6 ntambama.
title: USokhela akazisoli ngaphawula ngakho

text: BAFE ujuqu abalisa ababili kwabathathu abebephume ngemoto beyothenga ideshi ebizofakwa kugologo. Lesi sigameko senzeke ngeSonto ekuseni eNtuzuma F ngasezitolo zakwaNozaza. Owesithathu usindile waphuthunyiswa emtholampilo iPoly KwaMashu.Ngokomthombo weSolezwe ozifikele mathupha kule ndawo abalisa basuke endlini abebehlezi kuyona beyofuna ideshi ebisiphelile.Uqhubeka umthombo uthe omunye wabashonile, uMnuz Nhlaka Mngadi, uboleke imoto kumlamu wakhe ezoya ngayo esitolo. Uphelezelwe ngumngani wakhe oyiphoyisa elisebenza esiteshini kwa-E KwaMashu, uConstable Themba Mbuli oshone kule ngozi nowesilisa osindile okushaye isikhathi sokushicilela lingakatholakali igama lakhe.“Bebephuzile, izimoto kuthiwa ziqhamuke zizimbili zijahana nokusolakala ukuthi bebedlala ngazo. Lena ebinalaba ibe isiphaphalaza yayongena emzini womuntu,” kusho umthombo.Uthe abashonile abaphumanga ngisho emotweni njengoba beshonele kuyona kwathi oyedwa waphuthunyiswa emtholampilo.“Bekungekho ngisho amachaphazela egazi okukhombisa ukuthi balimele, nabo bebengenalutho nje ngisho izingozi emizimbeni yabo,” kuchaza umthombo.UNksz Nhlakanipho Mkhize, ocishe wabhidlikelwa wudonga elele, uthe usathukile ngokumehlele.Imoto ishaye udonga lwegumbi lakhe lokulala yaphaphalaza yayoshaya isitolo sakamakhelwane.“Ngizwe sengathi kuduma izulu elibi kakhulu. Futhi bengithi ngiyahlaselwa ngendlela umqondo wami obudideke ngayo. Ngiyabonga ukuthi ngisindile, ingane yami ibilele kwelinye igumbi kanti nayo ivuke isizwa umsindo,” kusho uNksz Mkhize.Uthe ngabe unamanga uma exoxa ngokwenzekile kodwa uzwe ngabantu ababonile kwenzeka ingozi abebehamba emgwaqweni.“Laba bafana abakhona la eNtuzuma. Imindeni yabo ifikile kimina yaxolisa ngokungehlele. Ngizwile ukuthi imoto abebehamba ngayo ibigijima kodwa ngoba angibonanga lutho angifuni ukuqamba amanga,” kuchaza uNksz Mkhize.Kule ndawo abantu abebehamba emgwaqweni bebema babuke umuzi, kucaca ukuthi wudaba okukhulunywa ngalo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko wathi, kuyaphenywa ngembangela yengozi.
title: Kufe nephoyisa kuphaphalaza imoto eshayise umuzi kuyothengwa ideshi

text: USEPHONSE ithawula ngosizo lukahulumeni umculi obuye abe ngumphathi waseWest Ink Entertainment.UMampintsha " Shimora" ovamise ukuba kwizigigaba ngezinto ezahlukene wenze ivideo ekhasini lakhe lika-Instagram ekhala ngokuthi seside isikhathi belindele usizi kuhulumeni njengoba kunesamba semali eyabelwa imikhakha eyahlukene. Kodwa bona njengabaculi iningi labo alikakaze liyithole nokuyinto emkhalisa kakhulu. Okunye akuvezile kule video nakubalulele kakhulu ukuthi kuyamkhathaza lokhu okwenziwa kubaculi ngoba uhulumeni uphinde asebenzise bona uma kunemikhankaso. "Ngiphazamisekile abathakathi balokhu bayazama bayahluleka futhi ngeke balunge. Bengisanitshela, hhayi ukuthi ngiyakhetha kodwa kakhulukazi amaciko njengoba nabona sishaywe ngama teargas kwalimala abanye, kwaboshwa abanye. Ngiphatheke kabuhlungu ngoba yithina esihlala sikhankasa," kusho UMampintsha. Uthe uhulumeni ubukeka enenkinga namaciko ungafunga ukuthi kukhona elake lahamba nepuleti emcimbini.
