Akagcinanga lapho uphinde wakhuluma nangezikweletu waveza ingcindezi abangaphansi kwayo ngenxa yesimo sezimali. Uzibalile naye wathi useze wacela usizo enkampanini thizeni. Okunye akhulume ngakho ingcindezi yokondla imindeni eminingi nokwenza kubenzima kakhulu ngalesi sikhathi. " Thina sondla imindeni eminingi, sondla nezingane ezikhula ngamakhanda kodwa ngeke ukubone emaphepheni lokho, anginandaba,“ kusho yena.Akakhohlwanga nokupika ngezimoto ezinkulu ezikhokhelwa o-R30 000 abahamba ngazo nakusho lokhu maqede wahleka wathi angeke abenalwazi nabanye mhlambe bona bakhokhela izimoto ezibamba kancane o-R10 000. Ube esekhangisa nange nkampani aveze ukuthi iyamlekelela ukukhokhela lezi zikweletu.
title: Umculi ushiye angalazi ekhala ngosizo lukahulumeni

text: KUBUKEKA luselude ukhalo kwiBafana Bafana nomqeqeshi wayo uMolefi Ntseki njengoba elesizwe lisembhidlangweni wokuhlungela ngempumelelo imiqhudelwano emibili emikhulu, i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ka-2021 neNdebe yoMhlaba ezodlalelwa eQatar ngo-2022.EzikaNtseki ziphoxile zidlala ngokulingana nomakhelwane iNamibia, emdlalweni wesihle obuseRoyal Bafokeng Stadium izolo ebusuku. Osokhaya ibona abashaye kuqala igoli ngonyawo lukaLuther Singh ngesiwombe sokuqala, kwathi elokulinganisa lezivakashi lavalelwa phakathi * -Absolom Iimbondi.IBafana icacise zibekwa ukuthi idlalela ekhaya, futhi izethemba. Ukuxhumana okuhle phakathi kukaSingh, uKermit Erasmus noKeagan Dolly kukhombise ukuyixaka iNamibia.Izivakashi zigcine zenza iphutha ngomzuzu ka-18 zingenelwa yigoli. UGustav Isaaks ugxobe inyoka ibhola lantshontshwa uDolly, ophasele * -Erasmus walidlulisela kuSingh ongalenzanga iphutha kwakhala inethi, walizwa ngendaba uVirgil Vries emapalini eNamibia.Abadlali ababili beBafana abebeqala ukudlala kwelesizwe uSiyethemba Sithebe odlala esiswini noThibang Phete bashaye into ecokeme kulo mdlalo, kubukeka sengathi basazolithola ijezi kwezikaMolefi Ntseki.Ukaputeni womakhelwane uPeter Shalulile, osayine kwiMamelodi Sundowns, uzamile ukuba wuhlupho kwiBafana kodwa kwala ukuthi akesekwa ngozakwabo ngendlela.Ngesiwombe sesibili ibuye ngamandla iNamibia, igcina ibhola ikhombisa nokulambela ukushaya igoli. Imisebenzi emihle, iyilandelile iNamibia ishaya igoli lokulinganisa ngomzuzu ka-54 * -Iimbondi eshaya igoli ngemuva kokuphaselwa ngekhanda uShalulile.NgeSonto iBafana izodlala neZambia kuyona le nkundla ngo-3 ntambama. Kubukeka uNtseki kuzomele ayilungise eyokushaywa kwamagoli ngezakhe uma ezimisele ngokuthola imiphumela elindelekile kweyokuhlunga. Bazobe bedlala neSao Tome nePrincipe ngoNovemba kuhlungelwa i-Afcon.
title: Luselude ukhalo kwiBafana nomqeqeshi

text: SABELO NSELEUNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthi akanatwetwe lokuthi imibhikisho enodlame ebukeka yanda kulezi zinsuku esifundazweni, ingase iphazamise ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya olungonyaka ozayo.UZikalala uthe le mibhikisho equbuke ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zesifundazwe kulandela ukugxegiswa kwemithetho yomvalelandlini, ayinalo udlame oselungaholela ekutheni kuphazamiseke ukhetho.“Siyabona izinhlangano namaqoqo abantu abahlukene ababamba imibhikisho eyahlukene. Isikhathi esiningi isizathu esiholela kule mibhikisho kuye kube wukusweleka kwamathuba emisebenzi kanyenokukhala ngamathuba ezomnotho.“Lolu akusilo udlame oselungaholela ekutheni kuphazamiseke ukhetho. Into okufanele yenzeke wukuthi kufanele sisondele eduze kubantu bakithi sibone ukuthi singazilungisa kanjani lezi zinkinga abakhala ngazo.”UZikalala ubekhuluma ngesikhathi kuqhubeka umhlangano weKhabhinethi lesifundazwe iLekgotla, obanjelwe eThekwini.UZikalala uthe bazoqinisa uhlelo lokuthi kuhlonzwe abokufika abakuleli ngokungemthetho, njengoba eminye yemibhikisho kungeyokukhala ngokuthi abokufika bathathela abakuleli amathuba emisebenzi namathuba omnotho.“Siyakholelwa ekutheni kufanele kuhlalwe ngokuzwana.“Abakuleli ngokusemthethweni kufanele bayekwe bahwebe ngaphandle kokuphazanyiswa. Kepha labo abakuleli ngokungemthetho kufanele babuyiselwe emazweni abo.”Lo mhlangano wezinsuku ezimbili ozophothulwa namhlanje, kulindeleke ukuthi uqhamuke namasu okuthi uzofukulwa kanjani umnotho wakulesi sifundazwe oshayekile ngesikhathi kubheduka ubhubhane iCorona.Uhanjelwe ngongqongqoshe beminyango eyahlukene KwaZulu-Natal, izimeya kanye nezikhulu zezinkampani zikahulumeni.UZikalala uthe enye yezinto abazogxila kuzo wukuqinisekisa ukuthi omasipala baqhamuka namaqhinga okuphucula indlela abahambisa ngayo izidingo kubantu.“Sizoqinisekisa ukuthi kudwetshwa uhlelo olucacile omasipala abazolusebenzisa ukuguqula isimo.“Sizophinde futhi sicele ukuthi uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu usinikeze imibiko njalo emva kwezinyanga ezintathu, yokuthi omasipala abangaphansi kweso lomlawuli baqhuba kanjani.“Sifuna ukwazi ukuthi usizo abalutholayo bayalwamukela yini nokuthi lwanele yini. Akusizi ukulokhu sithi siyasiza kanti bona abafune kusizwa.”Umhlangano uzophinde udingide ngodaba lobugebengu njengoba sekusondele amaholidi kaDisemba.
title: Ngeke iluphazamise ukhetho oluzayo imibhikisho - Zikalala

text:
SANDILE MAKHOBAINKAKHA yomculi wekwaito kuleli, uBonginkosi ‘Zola 7’ Dlamini, iphume isishesha esteji ingakaqedi ukunandisa ngenxa yokuxinwa yisisu ngeSonto ebusuku, eYadini, eMlazi lapho ibilindelwe khona amakhulu abalandeli.UZola, owazakhela udumo ngamaculo okubalwa kuwona u
Mdlwembe, 
Ghetto Fabulous no
Lwandle, umangaze abathandi bobumnandi ephuma esteji esashaye amaculo amathathu kuphela ekubeni bekumele anandise ihora lonke emcimbini obizwa ngeRoad to Durban.Ekhuluma ngokwenzeke ngeSonto uZola ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uxinwe wukugula.“Ngifike eThekwini ngisuka eLesotho, ngiyasola ukuthi mhlawumbe yinto engiyidle khona engazwananga nami. Inkinga iqale ehhotela sengifike eThekwini. Ngizizwe ngiba ngconywana ngabona ukuthi angiye emcimbini kodwa kufike kwaqala phansi. Kwala maculo amathathu ngiwashaye kunzima.”Emva kweculo lesithathu alishiye phakathi, uthe uphuthume kumphathi wendawo uJabulani “Mjay” Nzama, omnikeze uviniga wathola amandla okuthi ashuthe izithombe nabantu esenzela ukuthi bangaphoxeki.“Le nto ifana nomdlalo webhola. Ngezinye izikhathi izinto azihambi ngendlela obuhlele ngayo. Ake ucabange nje bekuzoba njani ukube bekumele ngihambele imicimbi emibili ukuthi bengizofika komunye nginjani,” kuqhuba uZola.Esaphumile esteji uZola, abantu bazwakale bethi akasashayi no
Mdlwembe. Emva kwesikhashana ubonakale esegoduka, ibhasi abehamba ngalo limcoshe ngaphandle. UJabulani Nzama, umnikazi waseYadini, obengathokozile neze uthe: “Angazi kwenzekani kodwa uthe uxinwe isisu, bekungamele avume ukusebenza engaphilile ngoba phela simkhokhele, asithandi futhi abantu bethu baphoxeke ngoba nabo bakhokhile.”Emasontweni adlule uZola uke wabhala ekhasini lakhe lezokuxhumana ukuthi sekuye wonke umuntu eYadini kodwa sekusele yena yedwa. Abasichithanga-ke isikhathi eYadini bamqasha ngenxa yesikhalo sakhe. Abanye abaculi abebeshiyelana inkundla noZola kulo mcimbi uNaked DJ, DJ Feel, DJ Sjerere, DJ Ntukza, Touchofsoul, noDJ Sox.
title: Uxinwe yisisu esacula eYadini uZola 7

text: UMQEQESHI weChippa United edlalela ngasekudliweni yizembe, uClinton Larsen, uphupha ngokuqopha umlando naleli qembu ngokulifaka kowamanqamu okokuqala ngqa kusukela lasungulwa.Ngaphandle kokungena kowamanqamu, uLarsen ozodlala neBidvest Wits kwi-quarter final yeNedbank Cup ekupheleni kwenyanga, ubona ithuba lokunqoba lo mqhudelwano lizofaka iChippa kwiCAF Confederation Cup ngesizini ezayo.IChippa isendaweni yesithathu uma usuka emsileni kwi-log ye-Absa Premiership ngamaphuzu angu-21, okuyisibalo esifanayo neseBaroka FC esendaweni yesibili uma usuka emsileni.Lokhu akumkhathazi nakancane uLarsen ozishaya isifuba ngokuqoqa inqwaba yamaphuzu esikhathini esifushane efikile eBhayi.Indlela iChippa edlala ngayo iyamkhuthaza lo mqeqeshi oshiye kwiLmontville Golden Arrows abesehlale nayo amasizini amathathu. IChippa ithole iphuzu elilodwa ngempelasonto ibhekene neHighlands Park lapho umdlalo uphele ngo 1-1 libuya likade lilandela ngemuva iqembu likaLarsen.Ephawula ngalo mdlalo uthe ngokwakhe bekumele bawaqoqe egcwele amaphuzu kwazise ukuthi yiChippa kuphela ebidlala ibhola elisile.“Lo mdlalo ungishiye nginengekile ngoba konke sikwenze kahle kodwa kwangavuma wona umphumela. Kuthe ukushintsha kancane sengenze izinguquko kodwa ngisale ngingeneme ngokuningi. Enye inkinga wukuthi besibhekene neqembu ebelingazimisele ngokudlala kodwa lisibelesele ngamabhola amade obekwenza umdlalo ugcine usungathi usezingeni eliphansi,” kusho uLarsen.“Kuyangikhuthaza ukuthi noma sesilandela ngemuva kodwa siyakwazi ukubuya. Lokhu kuyisibonelo nakubona abadlali ukuthi singakwazi ukwenza okufanele ngesikhathi esifanele. Sizokwakhela kuleli phuzu. Kule midlalo eyisithupha esele ngeke sivume ukuthi umdlalo uphele singatholanga lutho.”ULarsen ube eseveza isifiso sakhe ngokuhlenga iqembu ezembeni bese efaka inkomishi ekhabetheni okungaba okokuqala ngqa kusukela leli qembu likaSiviwe “Chippa” Mpengesi lasungulwa.“Kuhle ngoba iligi izoke ithi ukuma kancane ngenxa yemidlalo yeFifa. Lokhu sizokusebenzisa ngendlela yokuthi sizicijele iWits esizobhekana nayo ekupheleni kwenyanga. Sizama ukuthi sifike kowamanqamu. Akufanele siyithathe kancane iWits ngoba isembangweni wesicoco. Akufikwa ngomlingo lapho ikhona kodwa futhi ngiyakukholwa ukuthi alikho iqembu esingeke sikwazi ukulishaya kwiPSL uma sizimisele. Sesikwenzile lokhu kaningi. ISundowns (Mamelodi) siyishayile kanti iSuperSport (United) bekumele siyishaye e-East London. Bekumele kwenzeke okufanayo nakwiBlack Leopards eThohoyandou kodwa kwangenzeka. Yonke le miphumela iyasikhumbuza ukuthi alikho iqembu elingasibinda uma sizimisele ngendlela efanele,” kusho uLarsen.ULarsen ubona ithuba lokudlala e-Afrika ngeNedbank.“Kungaba yinto enkulu kimina uma singazifaka e-Afrika. Sisuka kude esikhathini esifushane. Esesikwenzile kuhluke kabi kunalokhu okwenziwe abaqeqeshi abasebenze ngaphambi kwami. Asikho engozini yezembe.”
title: Ufuna ukuqopha umlando neChippa

text: UMGADLI weBafana Bafana, uPercy Tau, utusa umqeqeshi wakhe kwiBrighton and Hove yase-England ngokumvumela azodlalela iqembu lesizwe.UTau ngomunye wabadlali abambalwa e-Afrika yonke abavunyelwe ngamaqembu ukuyodlalela amazwe abo kule midlalo yokugcina yokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon). Iningi linqatshelwe ngenxa yokusabalala kweCovid-19 kwamanye amazwe ase-Afrika. Amaqembu abona ukuthi laba badlali kuzodingeka bagonqe izinsuku ezingu-10 uma sebebuyile ukuyodlalela amazwe ekubeni wona ebadinga.Namuhla ngo-6 ntambama eFNB Stadium, eNasrec, uTau kulindeleke ukuthi athwale amathemba eBafana uma isibhekene neGhana emdlalweni wokuhlungela i-Afcon. IBafana, ebambene neGhana ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye esicongweni sikaGroup C, izodlala umdlalo wokugcina wokuhlunga neSudan ngeSonto ekuhambeni.Umqeqeshi kaTau kwiBrighton, uGraham Potter, umdedele uTau phezu kokuba ebhekene nenkinga yezembe kwi-English Premier League (EPL). Nokho uTau ulizwa ngendaba ijezi."Kuhlala kukuhle ukuba nomuntu onjengaye oziqondayo izimo futhi ozamayo ukuziqonda izidingo zomdlali. Kuyena ngithole kokubili ngokuthi 'ungahamba ukuze uzodlala nakuba sizolahlekelwa nguwe isikhathi eside futhi uzobe ungekho ukulwela indawo yakho eqenjini kodwa okungenani uzothola ithuba lokudlala'. Leli yithuba lokuthi ngidlale ngoba ngidonsa kanzima ukulithola," kusho uTau."Le midlalo yomibili ibalulekile, sonke siyakwazi lokho. Ngijabule ukuthi izingxoxo phakathi kweBafana neBrighton ziphumelele, bangivumela ukuthi ngize. Ngiyazi ukuthi kwamanye amaqembu bekunzima ukudedela abadlali kodwa kimina konke kuhambe kahle. Baphumelele ukufinyelela esivumelwaneni nakuba kuzodingeka ngingene emgonqweni izinsuku ezingu-10 kodwa ngiyajabula ukuthi banginike leli thuba. Ngiyazi ukuthi kwamanye amaqembu bekunzima."Umqeqeshi weBafana, uMolefi Ntseki, uzwakalise ukudangala ngesinqumo samaqembu sokunqabela abadlali ukuthi bezodlalela iqembu lesizwe.IBafana idinga okungenani amaphuzu amane emidlalweni emibili ukuze izibekisele indawo kwi-Afcon ezodlalelwa eCameroon ngoJanuwari. Uma iphumelele ukungena kwi-Afcon kuzoba kungokwesibili kulandelana. Ngo-2019 iBafana idlale i-Afcon e-Egypt iholwa ngumqeqeshi uStuart Baxter. Yangena sekuvalwe amehlo kwazise kwacaca emuva komdlalo wokugcina ukuthi inayo indawo kwi-Afcon."Uma kunzima sizoyozama emdlalweni wokugcina. Sizozama ngakho konke okusemandleni ukuqeda umsebenzi ekhaya. Uma kungenjalo, kuzophinda okwaseLibya futhi ngiyojabula nalapho," kusho uTau.
title: UTau ubonga ukunikwa ithuba lokuzodlala kwiBafana

text: Inkosi uNkanyiso Mncube (35) noMnuz Moses Mncube (40) onguyise omncane kuthiwa bebevakashela ezihlotsheni ngesikhathi bevukelwa abantu ababadubule besemotweni, emgwaqweni uR68 phakathi kweNquthu neBabanango.Uyisemkhulu wenkosi uMnuz Xolisaliphi Mncube uthe ukubulawa kwayo ngale ndlela kuyadida ngoba bekungakaze kube khona mbango wesihlalo sobukhosi, umndeni wonke wayemukela kahle ngesikhathi igcotshwa ngo-2014.“Akukho zitha zenkosi ebesizazi noma ebike ikhulume ngazo. Lokhu kusishaqasile ukuthi bebengaze babulawe ngesihluku esingaka. Sike sadlinza ngokuthi mhlawumbe yizimpi zamatekisi njengoba bebehamba noyise omncane onamatekisi asebenzela eGoli,” kusho uMncube.UMnuz Sizwe Sibiya ongundunankulu emkhandlwini wenkosi uthe isizwe silahlekelwe kakhulu ngokukhothama kwenkosi isencane.“Ngithole ucingo ngeSonto ntambama kuthiwa angiphuthume sekwenzeke lesi sehlo. Imoto abebehamba ngayo ibinezimbobo ezingaphezu kuka-50.Besisalindele okukhulu kuye njengoba bekungumuntu osemncane futhi okhaliphile. Egameni lesizwe, silimele kakhulu futhi silahlekelwe yinkosi yethu,” kusho uSibiya.Angu-63 amagobolondo ezinhlamvu zesibhamu esikhulu okuthiwa atholakale lapho behlaselwe bekhona.USihlalo weNdlu yamaKhosi KwaZulu-Natal inkosi uPhathisizwe Chiliza unxuse amalungu omphakathi ukuthi ehlise umoya, ayeke amaphoyisa aphenye.“Kube izindaba ezibuhlungu njengoba bekusalindeleke lukhulu kuyena njengomholi osemncane. Nakuba kubuhlungu kodwa siyafisa ukunxusa umphakathi ukuthi uzothe usebenzisane namaphoyisa ukuze kusheshe uphenyo kuboshwe abenzi bokubi. Sikhalisa iSilo samaBandla ngokuwa kwesinye sezihlangu zaso, umndeni nesizwe,” kusho uChiliza.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezoBusa ngokuBambisana noBuholi boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka uthumele amazwi enduduzo emndenini, nasebuholini bomdabu.“Sinxusa umphakathi ukuthi uveze okwaziyo ngokungaholela ekuboshweni kwamagwala enze isenzo esinyanyisayo. Sifisa amaphoyisa asebenze ngokuzikhandla aphenye ngezigilamkhuba angashiyi lutho,” kusho uHlomuka.UMnuz Bheki Ntuli onguNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha ukuPhepha nokuXhumana koMphakathi esifundazweni usejube amaphoyisa ukuthi asheshise uphenyo ukuze kuzobanjwa izigilamkhuba ngokushesha.“Izingcweti eziphenya endaweni okwenzeke kuyo umonakalo seziqoqe konke okungasiza ophenyweni lokubulawa kwalaba bobabili. Amaphoyisa azosebenza ngokungakhathali ukubopha abasolwa,” kusho uNtuliOkhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uthe amaphoyisa aseBabanango aphenya amacala amabili okubulala.“Bahlaselwe emini bebade izolo (ngeSonto) ngabantu abangaziwa okuthiwa bebehamba ngenye imoto. Izidumbu zabo bezinamanxeba amaningi okudutshulwa,” kusho uCapt Gwala.Uthe akukho okuthathwe kwababulewe.
title: Basale nemidlinzo kubulawa inkosi noyise omncane

text: UFISA sengathi ingangakhulunywa indaba yokuzithwala kwendodakazi emithiswe nguyise. Owesifazane waKwaGeorge, eManguzi, usho kanje ngemuva kokugwetshwa komnyeni wakhe (38) udilikajele ngamacala okudlwengula amadodakazi akhe amabili, wakhulelise eneminyaka ewu-17.Lo wesilisa ugwetshwe ngoLwesihlanu yiNkantolo yesiFunda eNgwavuma, emuva kophenyo olunzulu lophiko lwamaphoyisa abhekele amacala odlame lwemindeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane namacala aphathelene nokunukubezwa ngokocansi eJozini.Amaphoyisa athole ukuthi enye yamadodakazi isinengane enonyaka noyise, okuyicala alivumile enkantolo.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngoSepthemba nyakenye Isolezwe labika ngezinsolo zokuthi lo wesilisa udlwengule indodakazi eno-13, eyaqunga isibindi yabaleka, yabikela omakhelwane nezihlobo ngoba isikhathele ukuba yisigqila socansi.Elinye ilungu lomndeni laqunga isibindi layobikela osonhlalakahle bathinta amaphoyisa. Le ndodakazi yaveza ukuthi nodadewabo omdala unenkinga efanayo, kwavela nokuthi unina walezi zingane uyesaba ukuphumela obala ngoba esabela impilo yakhe namadodakazi akhe.Ethintwa unina wezingane nongeke adalulwe ukuvikela izingane, uvele wathuka woma wathula isikhashana, wathi akazi ukuthi kumele aphawule athini ngalolu daba.“Kubuhlungu ngoba izingane zami kodwa ngicela ukungaphawuli kube yinto engakhulunywa abazali emndenini. Le nto seyiwuxabanisile umndeni angazi ngingaphawula ngithini ngiyaxolisa ngeke ngikwazi ukukhuluma ngale nto,” kusho unina wamantombazane.Amalungu omphakathi akhathazeka ngesikhathi kuvela lesi sigameko kwaze kwenziwa nomkhuleko ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane kule ndawo.Ikhansela lendawo ku-ward 4 uMnuz Lucky Tembe, lithe emuva kokuphuma kwesigwebo liwuhambisile umbiko enduneni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, usiqinisekisile lesi sigwebo.“Emuva kophenyo olunzulu inkantolo yesiFunda yaseNgwavuma imgwebe udilikajele owesilisa ngamacala okudlwengula amadodakazi amabili. Amacala uwavume wonke ngezingane,” kusho uCaptain Gwala
title: Udilikajele kozalise indodakazi

text: UTHANDO lwakhe lomculo seligcine lumnqobile umphaquli waseMlaza osekhiphe i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala.UNokulunga Magubane (22) odume ngelikaMamiiza emculweni, ukhiphe i-albhamu yakhe ebizwa ngokuthi iDurban eThekwini.“Iphupho lami ligcine lifezeka, lokuhlanganisa i-albhamu ephelele emuva kwesikhathi ngisestudio. Inezingoma ezingu-12 zegqom esengiqalile ukuthola izincomo ngazo kubantu abahlukene,” kusho uMamiiza.Uthe selokhu aphothula u-matric wakhe eMlazi Comtech wubebhizi nezinto zobuhle njengoba enebhizinisi lokuzicwala elinamakhasimende. Nomculo wubewenza eceleni uma engematasa nebhizinisi.“Sengize ngaqala izifundo zeBeauty Therapy ngoba ngenzela ukuthi ngibe nesicucu nokukhulisa ibhizinisi lami. Kokubili umculo nezobuhle kuyizinto engizithandayo. Umculo bengingazitsheli ukuthi uzongifikisa lapho esengikhona emuva kokukhipha ingoma yami yokuqala ngo-2017,” usho kanje.Ingoma yakhe yokuqala eyayithi Iy'njova wayepike kuyona uFanistarol, Infamous boys ne-Underground boys.Uqhube wathi umuntu owamgqugquzela kakhulu ukuthi azimisele emculweni nguphrojusa wakhe wokuqala, uKwenzokuhle Madlala, owaziwa ngoK Quence.“Ngigcine ngihlangana nenqwaba yabaculi abanethalente eliyisimanga, ngaze ngenza izingoma nabo. I-albhamu yami ngiyenze ngosizo lukaJohnny Mthembu we-Akanuz Studio, okunguyena ongiphrojuselile,” kuchaza uMamiiza.I-albhamu yakhe isatholakala ezitolo ezidayisa umculo nge-internet. Unethemba lokuthi uzozakhela abalandeli abasha.“Kulokhu ngikhethe ukusebenzisana nabaculi abasazakhela igama ukuze sifukulane sisonke nokunikana ithuba singamaciko,” usho kanje.
title: Ugcine ekhethe umculo umphaquli osemncane

text: UPHOQELEKE ukuthi asule esikhundleni obeqokwe ukwengamela izindaba zezitshudeni zase-University of Zululand, Ongoye, okuthiwa ubesesatshiswa.UMnuz Bongumusa Makhoba ubekhethwe wumkhandlu walesi sikhungo ukuba ngu-Administrator njengoba lungekho uhlaka olukhethiwe lweStudent Representative Council (SRC).UMakhoba wakhethwa ngasekupheleni konyaka odlule. Ukukhethwa kwakhe kususe izikhalazo nemibhikisho. Izitshudeni bezikhala ngokuthi azimfuni ngoba engakhethwanga yizona futhi kunesikhathi eside lungekho uhlaka oluqondile lwazo.Esitatimendeni esikhishwe yisikhungo, kuvela ukuthi impilo kaMakhoba ibisengcupheni futhi useke wahlaselwa nalapho ehlala khona. “Sinazisa ukuthi uBongumusa Makhoba usethathe isinqumo sokuthi asule esikhundleni ngokushesha. Ubengasaphephile emuva kokusatshiswa obekuqhubeka, wahlaselwa nasendlini yakhe, kwacekelwa phansi impahla. Simfisela konke okuhle kunoma yikuphi azoqhubeka nakho,” kusho isitatimende.UMxolisi Khanyile ongomunye wabaholi beSasco kulesi sikhungo, uthe bazwile ngokwesula kukaMakhoba, ababona kuyizimpawu zokuthi sebezonqoba. Uthe nokho bajabula babuye nganeno ngoba basamile ekutheni bafuna esule nomphathi wenyuvesi, abakhala ngokuthi akazisukumeli izikhalo zabo.“Kusijabulisile futhi siyakwamukela ukwesula kukaMakhoba ngoba ubengezinye zezinto ebesikhala ngazo. Simfisela konke okuhle kwiPhD yakhe ayenzayo. Sithemba ukuthi zizoqala maduze izinhlelo zokukhetha kabusha iSRC njengoba sekwesule uMakhoba,” kusho uKhanyile.Mayelana nemibiko yokuthi uMakhoba wesule ngenxa yengcindezi nokwesatshiswa, uthe bebengazi ngalokho. Uthe bakholelwa ekutheni kuhlalwe phansi kuxoxwe, okuyinto abebekade beyifuna. Uziqhelelanisile nokuhlaselwa kukaMakhoba, athe abahambisani nodlame kodwa bakholelwa ezingxoxweni.Kubikwe ukuthi namuhla kuzoba nesithangami nazo zonke izinhlaka ezithintekayo, ukucacisa ngesimo sesikhungo. Kulindeleke nokuthi kumenyezelwe nokuthi kubuyelwa nini emakilasini.UKhanyile uthe abakasitholi isimemo sokuba kulesi sithangami ngaphandle kokuthi bezwa ngabezindaba.Esithangamini nabezindaba ebesingoMsombuluko eThekwini, uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, uDkt Blade Nzimande, uvune izitshudeni odabeni lokukhethwa kweSRC.Ngaphambi kwalesi sithangami, uNzimande uhlangane nezinhlaka ezimele izitshudeni. Uveze ukuthi ukungabikhona kweSRC kungezinye zezinto ezidala izinkinga nokungasebenzeki kulesi sikhungo.Okhulumela isikhungo, uNkk Gcina Nhleko-Mdluli, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi namuhla kuzoba nasithangami esizocacisa ngomhlahlandlela wezinhlelo zesikhungo.Sekuphele amasonto amabili kumisiwe ukufunda emuva kokuqubuka kwemibhikisho enodlame kwashiswa nezimoto. Ngesonto eledlule kushiswe nebhilidi khona esikhungweni okwenze kwamiswa nokusebenza konogada ezindaweni ezihlala izitshudeni.
title: Kushenxe obesatshiswa oNgoye

text:
SIZWE BLOSEKUBUKEKA sengathi umsakazo umnandi kakhulu ngezimpelasonto, ngizothi nje kuyona yonke imisakazo engiyilalelayo izinhlelo ngempelasonto zihamba phambili.NgoLwesihlanu ebusuku kuKhozi FM ulalela uChilliM osuke egijima namapetshisi.Uma uya kwiMetro FM uthola uZandile Dladla odume ngelikaZeal naye engazibekile phansi.NgoMqgibelo kunomsakazi weGagasi FM oza kabi kulelezi zinsuku obizwa ngoCollen Zondo olandelwa uZanda Mthembu naye okuthatha akubeke.Kodwa uhlelo olungihlaba umxhwele ngezimpelasonto ngolukaNgizwe Mchunu noKhathide Ngobe odume ngelikaTshath’ugodo. Uhlelo lwalezi zinsizwa i
Sgiya Ngengoma luqala ngo-10.30 luphele ngo-12.30 emini.Omunye uzothi “ziyahlanya” lezi zinsizwa, cha nami ngingamvumela kodwa mina engizokugqamisa ukuthi zenza umsakazo ulaleleke ngoba ulindela noma ngabe yini kuzona.Okuhle wukuthi azikuphoxi, ugcina uhleka wedwa ngoba ziyabheda azidlali nomlaleli.Imisakazo eminingi ngathi kulandelwa iphepha elithile elibhaliwe kodwa lezi zinsizwa ngathi zivuswa ekuseni kuthiwe wozani nizosakaza, nazo azibe zisabuza lutho zivele zingene emoyeni.Kuze kuzwakale sengathi azihleli ukuthi zizokhuluma ngani kodwa okubalulekile kuzona ukujabulisa umlaleli.Angifuni ukuqamba amanga ziyakwazi ukujabulisa abantu, muva nje seziyazihlupha nangolwazi, uzizwa zikhuluma nangezinto ezibalulekile khona zijabulisa umphakathi nje.Ngichazwe uNgizwe ekhuluma ngezinto ezenzeka kwezepolitiki eNingizimu Afrika, kwakhombisa ukuthi ufeleba lo useyawafunda namaphepha kanti futhi uyazibuka nezindaba kwithelevishini.Phela phambilini le nsizwa bewuyizwa uma isakaza ukuthi ayazi nokuthi lidumephi.Okubalulekile kuyona bekuwumaskandi kuphela nokuthi umengameli wezwe usuka ngakubo eNkandla.Kudingeka ukuthi abongwe umuntu owathiphisa uNgizwe ukuthi impilo ayiqali futhi ayipheleli kumaskandi noKhozi FM.UTshatha yena muhle kakhulu uma sekuziwa ngasezintweni ezithinta usiko nokuchaza ngomlando.Yena-ke bandla uyakuveza ngempela ukuthi akayena umquba, unokukutshela ngebhola, ugcine ubona ukuthi cha akekho kumaskandi kuphela, ngeke umthinte futhi nge-hip hop.Lezi zinsizwa ngiphinde ngizithande kakhulu ngokugconana kwazo, okungichazayo kazinendaba zigcona noma ngabe ubani, ziphinde zibe nobukhulu ubuchule uma zenza lokhu.Kulolu hlelo lwazo zike zivele zifunde izindaba, lapho zisuke zingadlali namuntu, ziqoba kwasani.Izintatheli zivame ukuhamba phambili ngokudelelwa kulolu hlelo.Akuvamisile ukuthi kube nohlelo engiba magange ukululalela kodwa olwalezi zinsizwa ngilulinda isonto lonke alungiphuthi ngisho noma ngenzani.Akekho ongcono kunomunye kulezi zinsizwa, zingichaza ngoba kwazona zizodwa zigcina zigconana, konke lokhu kwenza uhlelo lube mnandi.Umsakazo uphinde ube mnandi kakhulu ngeSonto, ugcina ungazi ukuthi ulalele muphi.UThami Ngubeni ukuvusa kamnandi kwiMetro FM kanti noSbu Buthelezi wenza okufanayo kuKhozi FM, uSiya Mhlongo weGagasi FM naye ukugqugquzela kamnandi.Uma ufuna ukufunda ngeke ungamlaleli uWilson B Nkosi ngo-9 kuya ku-12 kwiMetro FM.Ngo-12 kuya ku-3 angilenzi iphutha ngilalela uGrant Shakoane, lomuntu lo uyabenza ubulungiswa, ufike walishintsha iSonto ngasohlangothini lwezokusakaza eKZN. Empeleni umnandi umsakazo ngeSonto ngoba no-Eddie Zondo kuMetro FM wenza kube mnandi, kanjalo no-DJ Euphonik we-5FM. UMlu uyisibusiso kusukela ngo-6 kuya ku-8 ngamasonto kwiMetro FM.
title: Banobuchule abasakaza ngempelasonto

text: ABANTU okuyibona abondlayo emakhaya banomkhuba ongemuhle neze wokuthi bafune ukushaya umthetho kuyo yonke into.Kuthi ngoba nakhu umuntu nguyena ohola amasenti angcono bese efuna kulalelwe yena nje kuyo yonke into. Lolu hlobo lwabantu lufuna ukuhlonishwa, ukwesatshwa nokuphakanyiswa ngendlela ecasulayo. Kwesinye isikhathi uthola ukuthi lo muntu ofuna ‘ukudunyiswa’ kanjena ekhaya uyena omncane kunabo bonke, isono nje wukuthi yena usebenza kangcono. Ezimeni ezinjena ngibuye umunwe ngiwukhombe kubazali okuyibona abenza lo owondlayo ukuthi agibele emakhanda abo bonke abantu ekhaya.Uzwe umuntu emdala nje ethi: “Uma sekufike usibanibani ngicela niziqoqe, nimphakele bese futhi kungalokhu kuvakasha nalaba bangani benu ahlale ethi akabafuni”. Ngivele ngixakeke nje ukuthi kungani umuntu enziwa inhloko yekhaya ngoba nakhu nje kuncengwe ukuthi ondle.Angiqonde kona ukuqhatha imindeni ngoba ngiyazi miningi ebhekene nalesi simo. Ngizolushiya khona lapha lolu daba ngoba angifuni kube nenkinga kwamanye amakhaya, ikakhulukazi ngoba ususeduze noKhisimusi. Azikho izingane engizifisela ukuthi zishode ngokuya ethunjini ngoKhisimusi.Lapho ngiqonde khona ikumqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uRulani Mokwena, oyiphini likaMilutin Sredojevic, oyinhloko yabaqeqeshi kumaBhakabhaka. UMokwena ngimazi njengomqeqeshi osemncane othulayo owayezibeke phansi ngesikhathi esasebenza noPitso Mosimane kwiMamelodi Sundowns. Ngabe ngihubhuza amanga uma ngingake ngithi kukhona engake ngakuzwa ukuthi ukushilo esasebenza kumaBrazilans. Mhlawumbe noManqoba Mngqithi ababesebanza naye kwiSundowns angakutshela into efanayo.Lo Rulani Mokwena osebenza kwiBucs njengamanje sengathi uthanda ukushintsha kakhulu kunalo engimazi kwiSundowns. Ngiyazi abalandeli beZimnyama bazocabanga ukuthi ngihlasela iphini labo kanti phinde ngikhuza ihaba nje.Ngaqale ngamangala mhlazane uMokwena ethi ebhentshini leKaizer Chiefs akukho lutho, isizwa yikona nje ukuthi inabadlali abahle. Lapha uMokwena wakubeka kwacaca ukuthi ayikho indaba kaGiovanni Solinas noPatrick Mabedi abaqeqesha iChiefs.Akunankinga ukuthi umqeqeshi abeke umbono wakhe ngakubonayo futhi kukhona nalabo ababona lokhu njengento eyayikahle yokuphakamisa umdlalo wabakhaya owawuzodlalwa ngaleyo mpelasonto. Nokho mina ngizothanda ukwehluka kakhulu ngoba kade ngangisebenzisana nabaqeqeshi abehlukene kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL).Usengangikhalima ocabanga ukuthi ngiyaphaphalaza kodwa ngokwami ukwazi abaqeqeshi abafana noMosimane, Mngqithi, Steve Komphela, Clinton Larsen, Fadlu Davids, Sredojevic nabanye, abasoze bakhulume kanje ngabanye abaqeqeshi. Labo abacabanga ukuthi uMokwena unelungelo lokukhuluma akucabangayo angiphikisani nabo kodwa mina ngamuzwa engenakho ukuhlonipha abanye ozakwabo asebenzisana nabo kwiPSL.Noma kungathiwa uMokwena wayebona ibhentshi leChiefs lintekenteke kwakumele azihlekele yedwa ngaphakathi angaze akuphimise lokhu. Nokho ekuqaleni ngishilo ukuthi nami ngingaphikiswa uma ngithatha ngendlela yokuhlonipha kakhulu kulolu daba.Akuphelanga nezinsuku ezingakhi uMokwena ethe ebhentshini lweChiefs kukhona izichuse waqhamuka uBongani “Ben 10” Zungu esesitshela insumansumane esasingayilindele nakancane. UZungu wabhala kwi-twitter yakhe ukuthi uMokwena uyena ungqondongqondo ekudlaleni kahle kwePirates hhayi indaba kaSredojevic. Waze wakugcizelela ukuthi nakwiSundowns uyena obeza nobuhlakani bokuthi iwine futhi uMosimane uyakwazi lokho.Uyazi indlela engibuhlonipha ngayo ubuhlakani bukaMokwena isezingeni eliphezulu kakhulu kodwa angiyithandi indaba yokugitshezwa kwakhe emakhanda abantu abadala asebenze lukhulu kwezokuqeqesha. UMosimane sikwazi sonke asekwenzele iSundowns ewina izindebe ezibalulekile kuhlanganisa neCAF Champions League. USredojevic wafika e-Uganda wagila izimanga njengomqeqeshi nokwagcina ngokuthi ayifake kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) okokuqala ngemuva kwenqwaba yeminyaka.UMokwena akukho engimazela kona ngaphandle kokuthi uyiphini. Kusafuneka ake ayoqeqesha iqembu elithile lePSL eyedwa bese kubonakala ukuthi uhlakaniphe kangakanani. Ukunconywa kwakhe kakhulu kufana ncamashi nalesi simo somuntu owondla ekhaya bese ekhothanyelwe ngokweqile.Ngiyavuma ukuthi amaphini abaqeqeshi mkhulu umsebenzi awenzayo kodwa ngiyayikhuza indaba yokuncoma uMokwena kungekho okuphathekayo aseke wahlabana ngakho eyedwa. Ngiyazi ukuthi wayekhona ngesikhathi iSundowns ihlabana ngezicoco kodwa lokho akushintshi ukuthi umqeqeshi kwakungu Mosimane futhi namanje kusenguye.UMokwena ngimbona njengomqeqeshi onekusasa eliqhakazile kodwa kumele ehlise emlonyeni ashaye umsebenzi. Nalabo abangobhululu bakhe njengoZungu kumele bapheze ukumkhweza emakhanda abaqeqeshi asebezuze lukhulu.
title: UMokwena akangakhwezwa emakhanda abaqeqeshi abadala

text: UKUBONA isifo esixakile esahlasela unina, kwenze ukuthi asungule inhlangano aqwashisa ngayo owesifazane waseLamontville, eThekwini, osezinze e-England.UNksz Zethu Makhathini (56), unenhlangano ebizwa ngeBessie Makhathini Foundation efundisa kabanzi ngeDementia. Lesi yisifo esijwayele ukuhlasela asebekhulile, esenza balahlekelwe umqondo. UNksz Makhathini uthe wayengazi ukuthi unina unalesi sifo kodwa nasemndenini babecabanga ukuthi ukuguga. Ukusungula le nhlangano kuyingxenye yokuthi apholise amanxeba njengoba ethi ukushona kukanina kwashiya isilonda.Uchaze unina owayengunesi njengowesifazane obenesibindi, ebakhathalele nabantu. UNksz Makhathini washiya elakuleli waya ekudingisweni ngo-1981 ngenxa yezepolitiki. Uthe kwathatha isikhathi ukuthi unina amazi ukuthi ukuliphi izwe kodwa wamfuna waze wamthola, wamvakashela.“Ngaqala ngaya eTanzania ngesikhathi ngisuka eNingizimu Afrika, ngagcina sengiseSoviet Union. Yilapho engafike ngafundela iPsychology, namanje okuyiyona engisiza ukulekelela abaneDementia,” kusho yena.Yize uNksz Makhathini abuyela kuleli emuva kokhetho lwenkululeko ngo-1994, wanquma ukuyozinza e-England. Inhlangano ayisungulile iwaxhumanisa womabili lawa mazwe njengoba enehhovisi eLamontiville nelinye elise-England. Naye uyabuya ukuzobheka umsebenzi kuleli kodwa uxhumana nehhovisi nsuku zonke ngeSkype. Inhlangano wayisungula ngo-2015 emuva kokushona kukanina ngo-2012. Uveze ukuthi unina watholakala ukuthi unalesi sifo ngo-2009 kodwa ngalesi sikhathi lwalungekho usizo.“Baningi abaphethwe yilesi sifo kodwa kungaziwa. Umphakathi awufundisekile ngaso ngoba uma ugogo ebonakala ehamba ebusuku usolwa ngokuthakatha. Umama watholakala nalesi sifo sesidlondlobele kakhulu yingakho ngisiza abantu ukuze basheshe bathole usizo,” kusho yena.Echaza ezinye izimpawu zaso uthe abanye bayakhohlwa noma bakhulume into engekho.“Kwakuthi uma ngihamba nomama ngemoto ngifuna angiyalele ngoba angilazi iTheku, acishe angiphonse ezimotweni engihambisa ngendlela okungeyona. Omunye kuyenzeka agcine ebiza ngisho amaphoyisa esola umndeni ngokuntshontshelwa imali ngoba esekhohliwe ukuthi uyifihlephi. Omunye ukhohlwa ngisho ukudla noma aphume imoto ihamba,” echaza.UNksz Makhathini osebenzisana nesibhedlela iKing Dinuzulu eThekwini ukusiza abanalesi sifo, uneSupport Group kanti ubuye asebenze ngocingo ukuhlolela iDementia.Ngaphandle kwalo msebenzi, usebenza nesikhungo iNational Health Service emkhakheni wePsycho Education e-England.
title: Uqwashisa ngesifo esingajwayelekile

text: UThando Mahlalempini obeseqanjwe igama elithi uR. Kelly waseDebheni umndeni wakhe uveze ukuthi akasekho emhlabeni kodwa wangazibeka izizathu.Usomabhizinisi ohlonishwayo nophinde abengumfundisi uNkk Thandeka Nene ongudadewabo kaThando ukuqinisekisile kuFacebook wakhe ukuthi usedlulile emhlabeni. UNkk Nene uthe bazohlala bemkhumbula umfowabo. "Silahlekelwe kakhulu, lala ngokuthula bhuti wami omncane. Sizohlala sikukhumbula," kusho uNkk Nene.UThando ubesezakhele igama emigwaqeni eminingi emikhulu ebecula kuyo eThekwini okubalwa namarenki amatekisi ahlukene.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi enye yamavideo akhe eyathandwa kakhulu yaze yanconywa uR. Kelly yaqoshelwa ngasemakethe eNanda renki.UThando Mahlalempini obeseqanjwe igama elithi uR. Kelly waseDebheni kulandela ukusabalala kwale video ezinkundleni zokuxhumanaIngoma kaR. Kelly ethi Bad Man iyona ebihamba phambili kwizingoma ebehlala eziculela abantu. Ushona nje ubesenawo umucu wakhe othi Oh what a Beautiful Day. Nyakenye leli phephandaba laba nengxoxo ekhethekile naye lapho aveza khona ukuthi ngelinye ilanga uyafisa ukuba umculi osezingeni elifana nse nelesilomo sakhe uR Kelly.
title: Usedlulile emhlabeni uR. Kelly waseThekwini

text: SELUDLULISELWE emaphoyiseni udaba lokhulumela i-ANC kuzwelonke uMnuz Pule Mabe osolwa ngokuhlukumeza ngokocansi omunye wabasebenzi baseLuthuli House, okuyikomkhulu lenhlangano.UNksz Kgoareno Kekana uthi ngeke alale engendlalelwe lolu daba, lusaya kude kuze kufike lapho azoneliseka khona ngobulungiswa.Uthe uselivulile icala emaphoyiseni walufaka naseCCMA udaba.Uthe uphoxekile ngendlela i-ANC esingathe ngayo udaba, wathiubona sengathi kube nokwenzelela.Ukhale ngokuthi indlela obekubizwa ngayo ofakazi ibimcindezela.USihlalo wesigungu ebesisingethe udaba ku-ANC, uMnuz Sdumo Dlamini, uthe bagculisekile ukuthi udaba luphathwe ngendlela kodwa engalwedlulisela phambili ummangali uma engenelisekile.Kuvele nokuthi i-ANC yenze izincomo zokuthi kuchitshiyelwe imigomo yayo yangaphakathi ebhekene nokunukubezwa ngokocansi bagcizelela nokuthi ummangali aqhubeke nokusebenza eLuthuli House.
title: Selusezandleni zabomthetho udaba lukaMabe osevulelelwe icala

text: UMnuz Musa Mseleku waKwaMadlala, eMzumbe, usale ekhexile emuva kokuhamba kukaNkk Yvonne uMaYeni noNkk Mbali uMaNgwabe okuthiwa bahambe emuva kwengxabano ebishubile emasontweni amabili edlule.Imithombo ithi kusweleke ozogadla emzini kaMseleku ngenxa yengxabano phakathi kwamakhosikazi akhe. Kuthiwa impi ibiphakathi kukaMaYeni noMaNgwabe behlanganyela uMaKhumalo bemsola ngokuletha owesifazane waseMpendle ozolala noMseleku azale ingane ezobizwa ngekaMaKhumalo.Umthombo uthe kutholakale ukuthi uMaKhumalo ubesesayinise lo wesifazane amaphepha anemicikilisho ethi uma ebeletha uyomnika isamba semali ahambe unomphela. UMaKhumalo uvumile ukuthi umlethile owesifazane kodwa wakuchitha okwesivumelwano sengane. “Udaba lwami lokungatholi izingane luyaziwa emzini. Ngeke ngilethe azongizalela. Bakhuluma ngomuntu osebenzayo,” kuchaza uMaKhumalo othe akaphiki futhi akavumi ukuthi kuke kwanomsindo namanye amakhosikazi.UMseleku uthe usawubambe kahle kakhulu umuzi. “Bonke bakhona, ningafika nizobabona. Oke wahamba uMaYeni ngoba indodana ibinomkhuhlane wayiyisa koninalume. Ngiyethuka nje uma sengizwa eyokuthi bahambile.”UMaYeni ukuqinisekisile ukuya kubo nokugula kwengane, waphika ukuthi bekuxatshenwe. UMaNgwabe uthe okwenza angabonakali emzini wakhe ukuhamba ekuseni kakhulu abuye sekuhwalele ngenxa yomsebenzi wobuhlengikazi.Omunye umthombo uthe okucike laba ababili ukuthi uMaKhumalo ubengafuni uhlelo lokukhuleliswa kwalo wesifazane lwenziwe wodokotela kodwa ubehlele ukuthi uMseleku alale nalo wesifazane. “Bathukuthele baqonda kuyena kuyokhulunywa le ndaba kodwa kwenyuka imimoya, kwagcina sekuthukwana, kwaqhuma nesililo kwaze kwayovulelwana amacala,” kusho umthombo wesibili.Uthe azamile amakhosikazi ukubonisa uMseleku ahluleka.“Inkinga kaMseleku akaboni lutho olungalungile uma kukhulunywa ngoMaKhumalo,” kusho umthombo.Umthombo uthe amakhosikazi aqome ukubopha imithwalo abuyela emakubo.“NgoLwesithathu uthumele abayomncengela amakhosikazi ukuthi abuye, babuye belambatha,” kusho umthombo.Uvele wafa yinsini uMseleku esebuzwa ngokuyoncenga amakhosikazi.Ngempelasonto ufake ivideo kuYoutube ethi konke kuhamba kahle phakathi kwakhe namakhosikazi akhe, wathi abantu abalindele isizini yesithathu yohlelo lwabo kuMzansi Magic.
title: UMseleku ulaxazwe amakhosikazi amabili

text: ICAPE Town City inesifiso sokusayinasa owayengukaputeni weBafana Bafana uSteven “Schillo” Pienaar.UPienaar usanda kuchithwa yiBidvest Wits. Uqede iminyaka ewu-16 edlala e-Europe. Ugijime kwi-Ajax Amsterdam yaseHolland, Borrusia Dortmund yaseGermany, Everton, Tottenham Hotspur neSunderland okungamaqembu ase-England.Ekuqaleni kwesizini uPienaar ukhuze ibuya kwi-Absa Premiership. Ukhethe ukusayina kwiBidvest Wits yize ebefunwa nayi-Orlando Pirates neMamelodi Sundowns.Usihlalo weCity, uJohn Comitis, uthe iqembu lakhe licabanga ukusayinisa uPienaar.“Ngicabanga ukuthi akekho ongangabaza ikhono likaSteven nomehluko awenzayo ngokuba khona enkundleni nakozakwabo. Kule midlalo emincane ayidlale kuWits ubonile ukuthi usekhona kodwa udinga ukunikwa isikhathi. Ukusayinisa umdlali akusekona nje ukumsayinisa kuphela kodwa ziningi izinto esesizibheka kuyena. Uyamdinga umuntu onjengaye eqenjini kodwa umqeqeshi weqembu uBenni (McCarthy) nguyena ozothatha isinqumo. Ngizohlangana naye kuleli sonto sidingide ukuthi siyamsayinisa yini noma cha,” kusho uComitis.ICity isizakhele igama ngokusayinisa abadlali abanamagama amakhulu. Phakathi kwabo singabala uLehlohonolo “Major” Majoro, odume kwi-Orlando Pirates nakwiKaizer Chiefs; Teko Modise, ogqame kweZimnyama nakwiMamelodi Sundowns; Victor Obinna, owayegijima kwiWest Ham United kwi-English Premier League no-Ayanda Patosi, obedlala eSweden.Omunye umdlali oke wamataniswa neCity nguTokelo Rantie.“Angiyazi ukuthi iqhamuka kuphi indaba kaRantie ngoba angikaze ngikhulume naye. Sisanda kusayinisa umgadli waseKenya oseqophelweni eliphezulu. Sekujwayelekile kodwa ukuthi simataniswe nabadlali esingabafuni,” kusho uComitis.
title: ICity inesifiso sokusayinisa uPienaar

text: LIYAXATHUKA iTheku ngemuva kokuthi abasebenzi abangaphansi kohlelo lukahulumeni lokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono, i-Extended Public Works Programme (EPWP) betelekele ukuqashwa ngokugcwele.Laba basebenzi bashiye umsebenzi ngoLwesihlanu kodwa izolo ntambamaIPhini leNhloko yezokuXhumana kuMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Mandla Nsele lithe kuzoqala ukuqoqwa kukadoti.Lithe izingxoxo nalaba basebenzi zisaqhubeka.Abasebenzi bebethi bafuna iMeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, izobachazela ngabantu okuthiwa bazoqala ukusebenza ophikweni oluqoqa udoti kumasipala.UNksz Priscilla Ndimande uthe sebekhathele yizethembiso ezingafezwa abazithenjiswa yimeya ingena esikhundleni.“Sikhulume nabantu abafanele kwathiwa sizolungiselwa. Sibone sekufika abantu abenza umsebenzi ofanayo nowethu kodwa bona benezinkontileka, ezibakhokhela kangcono. Laba basebenzi bebesitshela ukuthi siyoze sife sihola uR2500. Sizwe kuthiwa baqashwe ngokuphelele,” kusho yena.Uthe ungene kulolu hlelo ngo-2014, uhola uR2500 ngenyanga, uR800 ukhokhela imoto ayigibelayo uma eya emsebenzini ngoba usebenza ebusuku.“Ngikhuluma nawe nje ngikweleta umasipala uR10 000 wamanzi, angikwazi ukukhokhela izidingo zami ngendlela efanele ngoba imali engiyiholayo incane. Ingane yami ibhuquza ekhaya ngoba anginayo imali yokubhalisa esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme,” kusho uNksz Ndimande.UNksz Nomfundo Nhlikazi uthe selokhu agcina ekhaya ngoLwesihlanu. Ulala edepho kadoti ukuze abone konke okwenzekayo.UNsele uthe akanalo lwazi ngabantu okuthiwa baqashwe ngokugcwele kodwa uma usohlelweni lwe-EPWP, uma kuvuleka izikhala zomsebenzi, ufaka isicelo njengawo wonke umuntu. Uma sekuhlungwa akubhekwa ukuthi wena uke waba kulolu hlelo.
title: Kunuke iTheku belaxaza umsebenzi

text: Zanele Mthethwa UKUBHEDUKA kobhubhane iCovid-19 kumbuyisele emsebenzini abewufundele owesifazane waseThekwini ophoqeleke ukuqala ibhizinisi ngenxa yokuphelelwa umsebenzi.UNksz Nokwanda Zondi (30) waseWestridge, eThekwini, uthole kumele aqale ibhizinisi ngokushesha njengoba iCovid-19 imlahlekisele ngomsebenzi ngo-Ephreli.Ubesebenza efemini ekhiqiza imifaniswano, okuphoqeleke ukuthi idilize abasebenzi ngenxa yokushaywa yilolu bhubhane olugadle kwazwela emnothweni.Esikhundleni sokuthi abalise ngokungasebenzi, uNksz Zondi ucabange ngokushesha ibhizinisi elihlukile, elihambelana nothando lwakhe lokudla. Uqale ibhizinisi lapho ehambisela khona amakhasimende izithako ezinhlobonhlobo zokudla ukuze abantu baziphekele emakhaya.“Bese ngivele nginawo umqondo waleli bhizinisi ngoMashi, ngize ngaxoxa ngalo kwabanye abangani bami. Ngithole ukuthi kukhona abalenzayo kwezinye izifundazwe futhi yibhizinisi elingakwazi nokukhula.”Uthe ngesikhathi ephelelwa umsebenzi ubone kuyithuba lokuzama leli bhizinisi. Ukubona isasasa lokupheka emakhaya kubantu ngesikhathi kuqala uthaqa, kumnike isibindi wabona ukuthi lingamsebenzela leli bhizinisi. Uveze ukuthi yize ekuthanda ukupheka futhi ekufundele, ubone sebebaningi kakhulu abenza lo msebenzi.“Amakhasimende ami ngabantu abazihlalela ngabodwana noma imindeni emincane. Kuyenzeka umuntu afune ukupheka isidlo esithize kodwa ahlulwe ukuzihlanganisela izithako.Mina ngibahambisela izithako nezikalo zokudla baziphekele ekhaya. Ngesonto ngiba nezidlo eziyisihlanu engigxila kuzo kodwa kuyenzeka umuntu azicelele isidlo esithize,” kusho yena.UNksz Zondi ofundele ukupheka eDurban University of Technology, uthe wukungawutholi umsebenzi awufundele okwenze wagcina esebenza efemini.Ubevele ekuthanda ukupheka nokuziqalela ibhizinisi lokupheka, wabona kuyithuba lokubuyela kulokhu abevele ekufundele.Uthe ibhizinisi lakhe ulibona likhula ngoba akekho omunye amaziyo owenza okufanayo eThekwini.
title: Uphelelwe wumsebenzi wabuyela kwakufundele

text: UMENGAMELI Jacob Zuma izolo uzichithile iziphakamiso ezithi akaxoshwe uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi kuleli uNksz Bathabile Dlamini ngenxa yokuqubuka kwesixakaxaka mayelana nodaba lwezibonelelo zikahulumeni nempesheni yabadala.Engxoxweni nomsakazo, uZuma uthe uNksz Dlamini angehlulelwa ngemuva kuka-Ephreli 1, okuwusuku okubhekwe ngabomvu ukuthi bazozithola yini izibonelelo zikahulumeni abantu bakuleli abangu-17 million.“Angeke kwenzeka ukuthi lelizwe lingahluleka ukukhokhela abantu abadala impesheni yabo, nginxusa isizwe ukuba sehlise amaphaphu silindele usuku lokuhola,” kusho uZuma.UZuma uthe kuyamkhathaza ukuthi abantu sebeqala ukwahlulela kulolu daba.UZuma uphawule kanje ngemuva kokuthi inkampani ebikhokhela izimpesheni iCash Paymaster Services (CPS) ithe ayisiboni isizathu esingenza ingakwazi ukuholela abantu ngo-Ephreli 1 yize ingakasayinwa inkontileka entsha.Lokhu kushiwo nguMnuz Serge Belamant oyisikhulu sakwaCPS othe balinde ukuthi kusayinwe inkontileka kuleli sonto emuva kokuhlangana nabakwaSouth African Social Security Agency (Sassa). UBelamant ukusho lokhu ohlelweni lwezindaba zomsakazo iRadio 702. Yize imimoya isephezulu kubantu emuva kokuba kuvele ukuthi asikasayinwa isivumelwano, uBelamant uthe awehle amaphaphu.“Sikulungele ukuholela abantu ngo-Ephreli 1 futhi angisiboni isidingo setwetwe. Ngesonto eledlule sihlangane nabakwaSassa kwaba nemibandela ebekwayo mayelana nesivumelwano esisha. NgoLwesihlanu sihlangane nabameli ukuqedela inkulumo ukuze silindele ukusayina,” kuchaza yena.Uthe isivumelwano esizosayinwa sisha njengoba esidala sichithiwe yiNkantolo yoMthetho-sisekelo. Yize inkontileka kudingeka idlule ezigabeni eziningi ukuze iphasiswe, uBelamant uthe kwehlukile kulokhu ngoba kuyaphuthunywa. Njengoba kuke kwavela ukuthi amabhange nePosi baphumele obala bathi nabo bangaholela uma kunenkinga noCPS uthe yibona kuphela abangakwazi ukumelana nomthamo wezimpesheni.Namuhla kulindeleke ukuthi ungqongqoshe avele phambi kwekomiti lezimali ePhalamende, iScopa, ezocacisa ngalolu daba. Abezindaba namaqembu ezepolitiki abanelisekanga ngesithangami sangeSonto lapho ungqongqoshe enqabile ukuphendula imibuzo. Wenqabile nokucacisa ngesizathu sokwesula emsebenzini kukaMqondisi woMnyango uMnuz Zane Dangor othe wesule ngoba bengaboni ngasolinye noNksz Dlamini ngalolu daba. Bangu-17 million abantu abathembele ezibonelelweni ezikhokhwa nguhulumeni.
title: 'Phansi amaphaphu bazohola abantu ngo-Ephreli 1'

text: BASALE bemangele omakhelwane bendoda yaseDassenhoek, eMariannhill, ngesikhathi amaphoyisa emba isidumbu sayo okusolwa ukuthi amanye amalungu omndeni asingcwaba egcekeni emuva kokuyibulala.Amaphoyisa abophe amalungu omndeni kamufi emuva kokumba isidumbu sakhe ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Kusolwa ukuthi umufi waqala washiswa ngamanzi abilayo ngoba esolwa ngokweba ilahle lemoto yelinye ilungu lomndeni.Umufi (25), okuthiwa ubeyiphara, wangcwatshwa isinyenyela ngamalungu omndeni emuva kokumshaya waze wafa.Umthombo weSolezwe obukhona kumbiwa uthe kutheleke iqulu lamalungu omphakathi lizozibonela kumbiwa isidumbu.“Sihlehliswe ngamaphoyisa ethi asisuke sibuyele emakhaya. Kuze kwaqedwa ngabo-10 ebusuku umsebenzi wokumbiwa kwesidumbu,” kusho umthombo.Umthombo uthe amaphoyisa ashaqe amalungu omndeni amabili asondelene nomufi asolekayo ayowahloma imibuzo esiteshini samaphoyisa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, ukuqinisekisile ukumbiwa kwesidumbu ngoMgqibelo eDassenhoek.UCaptain Gwala uthe amaphoyisa aKwaNdengezi alunywe indlebe mayelana nendoda eyashaywa yaze yafa ngoJulayi ngonyaka odlule emuva kokweba kubo.“Isidumbu sikamufi besingcwatshwe egcekeni ngaphandle kokwazisa amaphoyisa. Amaphoyisa ambe isidumbu ebesingcwatshwe ethuneni elingashoni kwabe sekuvulwa icala lokubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa KwaNdengezi,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.UCaptain Gwala uthe kuboshwe abantu ababili oneminyaka ewu-41 noneminyaka ewu-71 abathweswe icala lokubulala.Ababoshiwe abesifazane ababili. Omunye wabo kuthiwa uzinikele emaphoyiseni.Kulindeleke ukuthi bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown namhlanje.Imizamo yokuthola amanye amalungu omndeni kamufi ayiphumelelanga.
title: Kuboshwe amalungu omndeni kutholwa isidumbu egcekeni

text: ABAFUNDI bajuqwe yizisu izolo kwaphazamiseka ukubhalwa kwezivivinyo zaphakathi nonyaka esikoleni samantombazane eNtshongweni.Abafundi base-Albini Girls High baphuthunyiswe ezibhedlela eziseduze bephalaza belunywa yizisu ngeSonto nayizolo emuva kokudla ukudla kwasesikoleni.Kuthiwa ngoMgqibelo abafundi badla isoseji neroll, ngeSonto badla ama-corn flakes, ama-vienna noshatini.UMatron oqapha abafundi ongathandanga negama lakhe, uvumile ukuthi abafundi bayagula, kusolwa ukuthi baguliswa yinto abayidlile kodwa kabazi ukuthi yini ebisekudleni egulise abafundi.“Ukudla okudliwe ngoMgqibelo nangeSonto akufani kodwa konke kuholele ekutheni izingane zigule. UMnyango wezeMpilo uthathe amasampula okudla, silinde imiphumela ukuze sizwe ukuthi yini ebiyinkinga ekudleni,” kusho uMatron.UMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo eKZN, uthe abafundi abebegula baphuthunyiswe ezibhedlela bekhala ngezisu kodwa balashwe badedelwa. Ngokuthola kwabo isikole silandela yonke imigomo ebekiwe yokuphatha ukudla.UNksz Ncumisa Mafunda okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo, uthe ngokwazi kwabo abafundi abawu-49 bangeniswe esibhedlela iSt Mary’s ngeSonto, balashwa, badedelwa.Izolo uthe akekho umfundi ongenisiwe kodwa abanye abazali bathe bahambise izingane zabo ezihlaselwe ukugula ezibhedlela izolo.Unina womfundi ofunda uGrade 12 uthe ngeSonto abaphathi besikole bathe abafundi abebegula bahanjiswe ezikhungweni zezempilo ngeSonto futhi akekho umfundi osagula.“Izolo ngishayelwe ucingo ezinye izingane zingazisa ukuthi ingane yami iyagula. Akuyona yodwa ziningi ezinye izingane ezikhona lapha eHlengisizwe Clinic eHammarsdale. Esikoleni uma ushaya ucingo benza sengathi konke sekulungile kanti ezinye izingane zisagula. Kumanje esikoleni kuyaphithizela akubhalwa, kuthiwe kuzobhalwa ngoLwesithathu,” kusho yena.Imizamo yokuthola abaphathi besikole yehlulekile. Ucingo lukathishanhloko belukhala lungabanjwa emini kodwa lwagcina lungasangeni izolo ntambama.
title: Kuphazamiseke ukubhala abafundi bejuqwa yizisu

text: UMQEQESHI weCape Town City u-Eric Tinkler uchitha eyokuthi ezakhe seziyayizwa ingcindezi yombango wesicoco se-Absa Premiership.UTinkler uzigxeke yena ezakhe ziguqiswa yiMaritzburg United ngo 1-0 wegoli likaKurt Lentjies eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu. Nokho leli qembu livuke lazithatha lithela othulini iFree State Stars ngo 1-0 ngoLwesihlanu.UTinkler ukuphikile ukuthi ezakhe seziyayizwa ingcindezi yokubalwa namaqembu asethubeni lokudla ubhedu kwiligi.“Ngeke ngibeke izaba. Amaphuzu amathathu abengasifanele koweMaritzburg. Asizange sidlale ngendlela obekumele sidlale ngayo noma esihlale sidlala ngayo ngoba bekungokokuqala sishaywa kulo nyaka. Ngeke ngigxeke umuntu oyedwa ngokushaya kwethu into ephansi. Izinqumo zethu zisenzele phansi. Besiphansi kakhulu futhi kuningi okufike emqondweni wami. Mhlawumbe angizange ngibagqugquzele ngokwanele emva kokushaya iKaizer Chiefs,” kusho uTinkler.Emidlalweni emithathu yokugcina iCity izobhekana neSuperSport United kusasa eLucas Moripe Stadium, ePitoli. NgoMeyi 17 izodlala neLamontville Golden Arrows eCape Town Stadium, eKapa bese kuthi ngoMeyi 27 ivale nePolokwane City e-Old Peter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane, eLimpopo.“Njengamanje sesisalelwe yimidlalo emithathu okumele sigxile kuyona. Kumqoka ukuthi sivuke sizithathe. Abafana bami baphatheke kabuhlungu ngokushaywa yiMaritzburg. Ave kungukuthi bebengafuni ukuwina kodwa konke abebekwenza bekuphika,” kusho uTinkler.ICity ivele isihlabane ngesicoco seTelkom Knockout kule sizini ka-2016/17.“Angithukile ngempumelelo yeqembu. Vele sesizuze ngaphezu kwebesikuhlelile yingakho singenavalo. Ingcindezi ayikho kithina. Ingcindezi isemaqenjini afana neSundowns, SuperSport, Orlando Pirates neWits. Ayikho ingcindezi esiyizwayo. Ingcindezi yakhiwa abezindaba. Thina senze kahle kakhulu kule sizini. “Ngiyaziqhenya ngabafana bami. Njengamanje angifuni ukucabanga ngokuyodlala e-Afrika ngesizini ezayo. Sisalelwe yimidlalo emithathu. Ake sidlale yona sibone ukuthi izosibeka kuphi. Yonke imidlalo imqoka njengamanje. ISundowns iyona esethubeni elihle lokunqoba isicoco ngoba ngemuva komdlalo weWits le eminye esele ngibheke ukuthi iyinqobe,” kusho uTinkler.
title: Uchitha ingcindezi yesicoco uTinkler

text: MBALI KHANYILEKUTHOLAKALE imoto kaMnuz Nkosi Langa (33) wasePinetown osekuphele inyanga  amasonto amane  enyamalele, ngamaphoyisa kepha isishintshwe izinombolo zayo.Kuthiwa imoto itholakale ipakiwe ngo-Okthoba 23 eDalton, ngaseMgungundlovu ngenkathi amaphoyisa ephenya nge-Isizu D-Max 250 ebisolisa. solisayo.Ngokusho komthombo weSolezwe bathole ikhophi kamazisi, isifonyo nerisidi ye-airtime.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe bathole imoto itholakele imotokodwa umnikazi akakatholakali. ubengakatholakali.“Imoto itholakale ipake eDalton, ikhiyiwe. Amaphoyisa ayaqhubeka nophenyo,” kusho uCol Mbele.UNksz Zodwa Langa udadewabo kaMnuz Langa, uthe sebehambe baze bafika emakhazeni befuna umfowabo kepha abamtholi.“Sicela othenge imoto asazise ukuthi ungakuphi umnikazi wayo, njengoba isitholakale isinenombolo entsha. Okubalulekile njengamanje wukutholakala komfowethu. Nabangani bayasiza, bazama ngokusemandleni ukusilekelela njengomndeni. Bukhulu kakhulu  ubuhlungu esikubo kumanje,” kubalisa uNksz Langa.ULanga owanyamalala ngoSepthemba 29 ebusuku kuthiwa waya endlini yakhe ese-Ashley, ePinetown, ewumuntu obuyayo.Kuthiwa ucingo lwakhe ahamba nalo lwagcina lungasangeni uma abomndeni bezama ukumfonela, nokuyilapho abasola ukuthi kukhona inkinga, baya emaphoyiseni beyobika ngokulahleka kwakhe.UMNUZ Nkosi Langa osathungathwa nokutholakale imoto yakhe eDalton ngaseMgungundlovuIsithombe: SITHUNYELWE
title: Kutholakale imoto yomlisa onyamalele

text: “UKULAHLEKELWA kwenye indoda, wukuhlomula kwenye”Lawa ngamazwi omqeqeshi weCape Town City, uBenni McCarthy, emuva kokuthi ezakhe zibuyisele kwamhlaba iMamelodi Sundowns ziyehlula ngo 1-0 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eLoftus Versfeld Stadium, ePitoli, ngoLwesibili ebusuku.Igoli eliweze iCity lishaywe nguNana Akosah-Bempah esiwombeni sokuqala.I-The Citizens inyukele endaweni yesibili kwi-log yePremiership. Nakuba uMcCarthy ejabule ngokwehlula iDowns, uvumile ukuthi ubengeke alibone elidlalayo ukuba ezikaPitso Mosimane bezingaxinwanga yimidlalo eduzane. ISundowns idlale imidlalo eyisihlanu ezinsukwini ezingu-13.“Ngiyajabula ukuthi sivale unyaka sisendaweni yesibili kwi-log, ngaphezu kwamaqembu amakhulu ekubeni siyiqembu elincane. Iqembu eliphezulu kulifanele, lishaya ngesikwati esikhulu nabadlali abaphambili kwiPSL.“Namuhla sibabambe ngosuku bengekho esimeni esihle ngoba ngicabanga ukuthi ukudlala imidlalo eminingi kangaka, eyisihlanu, esikhathini esincane kangaka kubakhathazile, “ kusho uMcCarthy.“Ngiyazwelana noPitso futhi ngicabanga ukuthi ukuba bathole isikhathi esanele sokubuyisa amandla ngabe sikhuluma udaba olwehlukile. Kodwa ke ukulahlekelwa kwenye indoda, wukuhlomula kwenye. Sisebenzise amathuba ethu, sabona ukuthi iSundowns ayibukeki njengalena esiyaziyo. Sibuke imidlalo yayo edlule. Bekufanele sivale uMabunda noHlompho ukuthi bangadlali ngendlela abayijwayele, bangadlali amabhola amade abawadlala ezikhaleni ezivulwa wudonga.”UMcCarthy unezinyanga eziyisithupha eqeqesha ngokuzimela kwiCity. Uthathe iqembu emuva kokushiya kuka-Eric Tinkler osepheka iSuperSport United. UMcCarthy uthe uhlangane namagingxigingxi amaningi kulezi zinyanga ezimbalwa futhi uzizwa esemdala kuneminyaka yakhe. Akaliyekanga ithuba lokukhwela adilike konompempe bePremiership.“Ubunzima abukho eqenjini noma kwesibhekana nawo. Ngicabanga ukuthi ukuphathwa kwemidlalo. Angazi noma ukhona yini phakathi kwenu obuke umdlalo namuhla ngoba lapha izinto bezivuna uhlangothi olulodwa. Angazi noma kungenxa yalokhu ukuthi iligi isiqala ukuqaqeka.“ Asidlali nje kuphela namaqembu kodwa sibhekene nonompempe futhi. Cha ngikhathele ukubibiyela. Ngikhathele ukuthi awukwazi ukukhuluma ngoba kufanele ubahloniphe ekubeni bona bengabahloniphi abaqeqeshi nomdlalo wethu. Babulala abadlali bethu kodwa akufanele sikhulume. Onompempe nabo kufanele babhekane nemisebenzi yabo ngoba uma abaqeqeshi bexoshwa ngoba bengawini...“Yingakho iligi yethu ingekho ezingeni okufanele ngabe ikulona ngokwekhono esinalo ngoba sinonompempe ababhedayo. Kufanele babhukule ngoba abaqeqeshi bayatshelwa lokho. Kufanele uqhamuke neqhinga lokwehlula iSundowns, kufanele ube phezulu. Kodwa onompempe bangahlala bengagculisi.”
title: UBenni ujabule kakhulu beshaya iDowns

text: MBONGISENI BUTHELEZIEseGoliYIZE ifomu kaBrighton Mhlongo eqenjini lakhe i-Orlando Pirates imthathe yamfaka eqenjini lesizwe iBafana Bafana kodwa lo nozinti akaziboni esengcono kunazobe ebanga nabo ijezi u-Itumeleng Khune noJackson Mabokgwane.UMhlongo useqenjini iBafana elizodudulana neGambia emdlalweni wokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) kusasa e-Independence Stadium, eBakau ngo-7 ebusuku.I-Afcon izodlalwa ngo-2017 eGabon.IBafana iza kulo mdlalo ibambelele ethembeni lokuthi kukhona esangakwenza ukuzifaka kulo mqhudelwano.Inamaphuzu amathathu, izolwela ukunqoba imidllalo emibili esele yokuhlunga, okuhlanganisa noweMauritania ngoSepthemba.“Angithandi ukukhuluma ngabanye onozinti, nokuthi bona badlala kanjani. Mina ngijabule ngokuthi ngilapha eqenjini lesizwe. U-Itumeleng Khune udlala kahle futhi unesipiliyoni kanjalo noJackson naye udlala kahle. Okwami wukuzehlisa, ngifunde kubona bese ngilindela elami ithuba. Uma ngilithola ngizolisebenzisa ngoba nami ngizobe ngilwela ukusiza iqembu linqobe lo mdlalo obalulekile kithina,” kusho uMhlongo.Umdlalo wokuqala weBafana neGambia waphela ngo 0-0, okwaba wukuqala kwezinkinga zeBafana njengoba esebonakala emancane amathuba ayo okuya eGabon.Uthe akubaqedi amandla ukuthi iBafana sekumele imincele ukuthi amaqembu angaphezulu kwayo ashaywe ukuze lingashabalali ithemba layo nge-Afcon.“Sizimisele ngokuthi sibuye namaphuzu amathathu bese sibheka amanye amaqembu ukuthi adlala kanjani ngoba vele sekuzofanele siwabheke ukuthi wona athola imiphumela enjani. Lapha sikhuluma ngebhola, kungenzeka noma yini ngakho ngeke siphele amandla,” kusho uMhlongo.Eqoqweni leBafana kuboshelwe neCameroon eqhwakele ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili neMauritania elele endaweni yesibili ngamaphuzu ayisikhombisa.Nabo bayadlala kusasa, okusho ukuthi kumele kube khona ohlulwayo bese iBafana iyayinqoba iGambia ukuze iqhubeke nokuhlalela ethembeni.
title: UMhlongo akaziboni engcono kunabanye

text: OWESIFAZANE othi wayeyisinqandamathe sikaDonald Trump, uStormy Daniels, uthi lo mengameli wase-United States ushaya udaka kwinkonzo yasekamelweni.UStormy, ozakhele udumo ngamafilimu ocansi eMelika, udalule lokhu encwadini ekhuluma ngempilo yakhe lapho aveze khona nokuthi kubo bonke abantu aseke aya ocansini nabo, uTrump uyena ofathuze ukubadlula bonke.Uthe uTrump nokho ubengakugqizi qakala yena lokho njengoba ephikisana nombono wakhe ezibona eyinkunzi embhedeni.UStormy Daniles odume ngamafilimu ocansi eMelika usola umengameli Donald Trump ngokushaya udaka kwinkonzo yasekamelweni. Isithombe: AP Photo/Craig RuttleLo wesifazane oneminyaka engu-39 uqhube wadelela umphambili kaTrump ewufanisa nokapopayi.“Uyena owangicoba kunabo bonke abanye esengike ngalala nabo kodwa kwangicacela ukuthi yena wayengakuboni lokho,” kusho uStormy encwadini yakhe iFull Disclosure.Uthe walala noTrump ngesikhathi osaziwayo baseMelika bedlala igalofu eLake Tahoe, eCalifornia ngonyaka ka 2006. Encwadini uphinde athi kwakumufakela amahloni ukubona uTrump njalo kwithelevishini njengoba kwakumbuyisela umcabango wokuthi sebeke balala ndawonye.UTrump uyakuchitha ukuthi useke walala nalo wesifazane.
title: ‘UTrump ushaya udaka kwinkonzo yasekamelweni’

text: USAGCWELE amathafa owesifazane osolwa ngokugwaza isoka lakhe lafa ehostela KwaMashu ngoMgqibelo.Kuthiwa ubehlala nalo isoka asolwa ngokulibulala.Kuthiwa isoka nentombi bahilene ngamazwi kwagcina ngokuthi owesifazane agcine esegwaze indoda.Kuthiwa indoda isuke endlini yayo yayolanda intombi ejoyintini lapho ebiphuza khona okusolwa ukuthi ibisiqome owesilisa wakhona. Ithe uma ifika ejoyintini indoda yathatha intombi ngenkani baya nayo endlini lapho ifike yamgwazela khona.Umufi kuthiwa ushonele emtholampilo ePoly, KwaMashu, ngemuva kokuthi eyiswe intombi yakhe ebicela usizo.Kuthiwa umufi nentombi yakhe bebejwayele ukuthi bahilizisane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, ukuqinisekisile lokhu.UCaptain Gwala uthe indoda iphuthunyiswe emtholampilo lapho ifike yashonela khonaUthe amaphoyisa aKwaMashu aphenya icala lokubulala. Okwamanje bekungakaboshwa muntu.
title: Owesifazane ugwaze isoka lafa ehostela

text: MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENIOrlando Pirates (0) 0 Golden Arrows (0) 2ILAMONTVILLE Golden Arrows ithwese umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates u-Eric Tinkler umthwalo ngaphambi komdlalo omkhulukazi weSoweto Derby ngoMgqibelo ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi uya kobheka neKaizer Chiefs ukuzethemba kuphansi ngendlela emangalisayo.Imbangela yalokhu ukuthi bese kungumdlalo wesihlanu weligi iPirates ingayazi iwini njengoba ikhale ngaphansi ngamagoli oKudakwashe Mahachi noGladwin Shitolo abawashaye ngomzuzu ka-51 noka-83 ngokwahlukana izolo ebusuku e-Orlando Stadium. Kufana nenyanda yezinkuni lokhu kuTinkler okufanele abhekane neChiefs ngaphandle kwabadlali abamqoka kwazise noHappy Jele akazange awuqede umdlalo ngenxa yokulimala phezu kukaSisifo Myeni no-Oupa Manyisa.Umdlalo uqale ngesikhulu isivinini kubhoke i-Arrows okuthe zisuka ngakho kodwa yabe ihlasela ngamandla ezintini zikaSiyabonga Mpontshane obevimbele iPirates. Okusheshe kwacaca ukuthi iPirates ibihlose ukubhoboza udonga lwasemuva lwe-Arrows ngamabhola amade abeshayelwa uKermit Erasmus.Lo mgadli uyena othole ithuba lokuqala ngesikhathi ukaputeni we-Arrows uMatome Mathiane ehluleka ukuvimba elinye la lamabhola amade ngomzuzu wesikhombisa waze washayisana nonozinti wakhe uMax Mabeva kodwa lo mgadli washweba emi yedwa.Kudlule imizuzu embalwa kwenzeke lokho noMahachi wayeka udanki abewuthole ngephutha likaSiyabonga Sangweni emuva. Maphakathi nesiwombe sokuqala bese kuyiPirates ebonana kangcono kodwa yaphazamiseka sekulimala uJele ophume ngohlaka yize kungazange kucace ukuthi ulinyazwe yini.Okugqame kunakho konke esiwombeni sokuqala ubuqhawe bukaMabeva ngesikhathi ekhipha i-Arrows obishini evimba amabhola amabili anzima befikile o-Erasmus noMpho Mvelase ngasekupheleni kwaso (isiwombe).Ekhefini zibuye ngokuthi uMahachi abeke ebuhleni iBucs ngengcwenga yegoli evele ngokuthi uThamsanqa Gabuza aphunyukwe yibhola maphakathi nenkundla. Ukhishwe ngokushesha ngemuva kwalokho indawo yakhe yathathwa uLehlohonolo Majoro.Yize bese kungene igoli kodwa lo mdlalo uqhubekile nesivinini sawo sekucaca ukuthi iPirates ilifuna ngenkani elokulinganisa. Lokho bekuyishiya ivulekile nokho emuva kodwa i-Arrows ayizange ikusebenzise ngendlela lokhu kwazise ithole inqwaba yamathuba okushaya igoli lesibili kodwa kubhede uhlelo ekugcineni. Nayo iPirates ibingazibekile phansi kodwa uMbaeva naye ubevukile emaqandeni njengoba ephinde wageza uMajoro ngomzuzu ka-76. La maphutha ayibulele iPirates eseshaya elesibili eShitolo (obelekwe yi-Arrows kuyona belu iBucs).Komunye umdlalo obukhona izolo, iMamelodi Sundowns nePolokwane City bashayane baze babukana kuba ngu 0-0.
title: I-Arrows ifake uTinkler enkingeni

text:
ZANELE MSOMIK UTHIWA belingakuthandi ukukhuluma futhi linomoya ophansi iphoyisa lasePort Shepstone elabulala intombi yalo, unkosikazi namadodana alo amabili maqede lazidubula.UMnuz Khetha Shange ongumfowabo kaWarrant Officer Lindela Shange (49), obengcwatshwa izolo namalungu omndeni wakhe, uthi akaboni ukuthi uyoke akholwe ukuthi umfowabo akasekho.Utshele 
Isolezwe ukuthi umfowabo ubungeke umbone ngisho ecasukile ngoba ubezithulela.Uthe babezelwe beyizinsizwa zodwa beyisithupha kodwa sebesele bane.Umkamfowabo uNkk Fikile Shange naye obengcwatshwa izolo, uthe bebembiza ngosisi ngoba bejabulela ukuthi sebethole udadewabo.Ngo-Okthoba 21 nonyaka uWarrant Officer Shange obesebenza esiteshini samaphoyisa eSouth Port, kusolwa ukuthi waqala entombini yakhe uNksz Jabu Cele (40) ebiwumabhalane khona eSouth Port.Kusolwa ukuthi wayidubula amahlandla amaningi maqede wadlulela kwakhe wadubula umkakhe nezingane ezimbili uSinakhokonke (15) noSnakekelo (10).UNkk Shange ubewuthisha eSbhekulwandle, uSnakhokonke efunda eMerlowood High kanti uSnakekelo ubefunda ePortShepstone Senior Primary.Umfowabo kaWarrant Officer Shange uthi yize namanje bengasazi isizathu sokuzibulala kukamfowabo nomndeni wakhe kodwa akakholwa ukuthi yingcindezi yomsebenzi njengoba abanye becabanga kanjalo.“Umfowethu ubesesebenze iminyaka ewu-29 eyiphoyisa. Kungani ingcindezi imfikele manje sekusele iminyaka embalwa athathe umhlalaphansi,” ubuze kanje.Uthe selokhu kwenzeke le nhlekelele akuvumi ngisho adle futhi kunzima kakhulu nasendodakazini kamfowabo uSphumelele (22), eyayingekho kubulawa unina nabafowabo.Umphakathi nozakwabo babashonile bebephume ngothi.
title: Lingcwatshiwe iphoyisa elaqotha umndeni

text: OWAYENGUMVIKELI womphakathi u-Advocate Thuli Madonsela, uthi ngeke kugqugquzele ubuvila ukwenyuswa kwemali yezibonelelo zikahulumeni.U-Adv Madonsela onguSihlalo wophiko lweSocial Justice eNyuvesi iStellebosch, ubekhuluma kwiwebinar yezinhlangano ezisiza umphakathi izolo.“Sibonile ukuthi ukufakwa kwemali ethe xaxa kwizibonelelo zikahulumeni ngesikhathi kuvalwe izwe kubasizile abantu. Siyadinga ukuthi le mali ibuye ngoba abantu bathwele kanzima. Labo abathi lokhu kuzogqugquzela ubuvila banephutha ngoba angikaze ngibezwe bethi izizukulwane zezigwili mazingawuthathi umcebo ezishiyelwe wona,” kusho u-Adv Madonsela.Uthe umcebo wezigwili zaseNingizimu Afrika, wakhiwe ngomjuluko nokuxhashazwa kwabantu abamnyama ngakho nazo izigwili kufanele zibukwe ngelinye iso, uma zishiyela izingane zazo umcebo.UMengameli weSouth African Federation of Trade Unions (Saftu) uMnuz Zwelinzima Vavi, uthe ukwengezwa kwemali yezibonelelo zikahulumeni kuzosiza ekunciphiseni igebe phakathi kwabampofu nomacaphunakusale.“Sinezingqinamba zokungalingani eNingizimu Afrika, ezenza ubone sengathi uphila emazweni amabili angafani. Kolunye uhlangothi kunabantu abacebile bese kolunye kube nabantu abaphila ngoR1 268 ngenyanga ngenxa yobuphofu. Sidinga ukuthi uhulumeni aqhubeke nokuholela abantu izibonelo ezithe xaxa. Sicele umhlangano noMengameli, uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi noMnyango wezeziMali ngoba siyazi ukuthi imali izoba khona,” kusho uVavi.UVavi uqhube wathi badinga nokuthi isibonelelo sabangasebenzi sibe wuR550 ngenyanga ngoba uR350 mncane kakhulu. Abezinhlangano ezilwela umphakathi bathe bazoqhubeka nokulwela ukuthi izibonelelo zikahulumeni zibe yimali ethe xaxa ukuze kusizakale abampofu.
title: Izibonelelo azigqugquzeli ubuvila: Thuli Madonsela

text: ISIQUBULE umsindo ingoma entsha kaR. Kelly ngenxa yokuzwakala sengathi uyiqambele ukuthi azivikele kwabamhlasela ngezinsolo zokunikubeza abesifazane.Ingoma entsha kaR. Kelly wodumo lwengoma iHappy People ithi I Admit, idonsa imizuzu engu-19. Ikhuluma ngezihloko ezimenze wanyamanambana emphakathini nokuthi uphunyuke kanjani ezinsolweni abebekwa zona selokhu aqala ukwaziwa emculweni.Phakathi kwezinsolo akhuluma ngazo, ubala umshado wakhe nomculi owayemncane ngeminyaka u-Aaliyah owayena-15, ukuziphatha budlaba nezinsolo zokunukubeza nokuthumba abesifazane. Abazali bamsola ngokuthatha amadodakazi abo awenze izigqila zocansi nokunye okuningi.Abagxeka uR. Kelly bakhala ngokuthi akazehlisi kunalokho le ngoma ibukeka inokungcofa abamsolayo.Ukhipha le ngoma nje usanda kugxekwa ngozakwabo kwezokungcebeleka okubalwa kubona umlingisi uVoila Davis, umculi uJohn Legend nabanye abaningi.Ukungafunwa kwakhe ngabanye nezinsolo zokunukubeza, kwenze umculo wakhe ugcine ususiwe kwaSpotify, kwamiswa namakhonsathi akhe e-USA.-TMZ
title: UR. Kelly nengoma engcofa abamsolayo

text: UKUPHELA kwesizini ka-2017/2018 kuza novalo kwabanye abadlali beKaizer Chiefs kwazise kuheleza imibiko ethi kuzogawula izembe kodwa isimo sihlukile ku-Emmanuel “Adebayor” Letlotlo, yena ozothola ithuba lokuchaza umqeqeshi omusha okulindelwe aqashwe maduze nje.Indaba yekusasa likaLetlotlo (22) ivezwe nguVina Maphosa, owengamele uphiko lwezokuxhumana kwiChiefs nobexoxa neSolezwe ngeSonto ngesimo salo mdlali oseqede izinyanga ezingu-12 engadlali nowodwa umdlalo osemthethweni.“Azikho izingxoxo ngokuhambisa uLetlotlo,” kusho uMaphosa, ezikhahlela ngazo zombili izinyawo izinsolo zokuthi uLetlotlo, omunye wabadlali abavukuwe yiMultiChoice Diski Challenge, angase abolekiswe ukuyobuyisa ifomu.“ULetlotlo usanda kululama ekulimaleni ngakho okuseqhulwini (ngaye) manje wukumlungisela ukuba abe sesimeni esifanele (sokudlala) ngesizini ezayo.”Yize engabonakali emidlalweni yeChiefs kodwa uLetlotlo usenesikhathi esingaphezu kwenyanga eqalile ukuzilolonga kwazise ubesejima kusekhona umqeqeshi osanda kusula, uSteve Komphela.Okwenza kube khona ukucabangela ukuthi lo mgadli waseSoweto angase abolekiswe ekuqaleni kwesizini ezayo, wukuthi ubanga ijezi nabagadli beChiefs abesebekhombisa ukungena egiyeni uRyan Moon onguntanga yakhe, Gustavo Paez okhwishizelayo noLeonardo Castro ofike wakhombisa ukuthii lukhulu azolwenza ngesizini ezayo.Okungase kubeke engozini ikusasa likaLetlotlo wukuthi kusekhona noDumisani Zuma naye odlala phambili.Omunye umdlali ongamnika inkinga nguYusuf Bunting osize Amakhosi anqoba iMultiChoice Diski Shield. Lo mdlali kubukeka ezonikwa ithuba elanele lokuzibonakalisa eqenjini elikhulu ngesizini ezayo.UBunting (21), osayine inkontileka ephela ngo-2021 kwiChiefs ngesizini edlule ngaphambi kokubhaliswa eqenjini elikhulu, ushaye igoli lokuqala benqoba ngo 3-1 kwiMamelodi Sundowns kowamanqamu eDiski Shield eMakhulong ngeledlule.UBunting uthwelwe ngeqoma njengaye uLetlotlo, onyukele eqenjini elikhulu ngemuva kokubhakuzisa inethi udede aze emuke nomklomelo womshayimagoli ovelele kwiDiski Challenge.ULetlotlo, odlale imidlalo eyisithupha ngaphambi kokulimala, usalelwe yisizini nesigamu enkontilekeni yakhe neChiefs akhushulelwe kuyo ngoMeyi 2016.Okubeka ikusasa labadlali abaningi engcupheni kwiChiefs wukuphoxa abalandeli bayo iqeda amasizini amathathu elandelana ingakaze inqobe nesisodwa isicoco kwezimqoka kwi-Absa Premiership.
title: IChiefs isabheke lukhulu kuLetlotlo

text: WAYEFISA ukuba wunjiniyela uthishanhloko ochonywe uphaphe lwegwalagwala ngokuba wuthishanhloko obadlula bonke ngokuphatha isikole samabanga aphezulu KwaZulu-Natal.UMnuz Philani Innocent Mathenjwa uthishanhloko waseNtulabakayise Secondary, KwaNibela, eHluhluwe, uchonywe uphaphe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, ngesikhathi ebonga futhi ekhuthaza othisha ngomsebenzi omuhle abawenzile emcimbini owaziwa ngeKwaZulu-Natal National Teaching Awards (NTA) obungoLwesihlanu.UMathenjwa uwine emunxeni we-Excellence in Secondary School Leadership.Uthe ukuba wuthisha kwakungewona umsebenzi ayewuthanda kunayo yonke kodwa wathola ithuba lokuthi awufundele emuva kokuthi ephuthwe yithuba lokuthi afundele iCivil Engineering.Uthe kwakuxhunywana ngokuthi kushayelwe ucingo isitolo esisendaweni bese kushiywa umyalezo wokuthi kumele aye enyuvesi. Ngenxa yokuthi kwakukude nakubo baze bamtshela sesidlulile isikhathi esasibekiwe. Wabe eseyofundela ubuthisha.UMathenjwa uneminyaka ewu-14 enguthisha. Uqale ukuba nguthishanhloko waseNtulabakayise ngo-2016 ngesikhathi lesi sikole sivulwa.Yize enguthishanhloko naye unalo ikilasi alifundisayo njengoba efundisa iMathematics kwaGrade 11 noGrade 12.“Ngiwuthisha weSayensi kodwa ngo-2017 ngiqale ukufundisa iMaths ngoba ngifuna ukubona ukuthi yini le ehlula othisha ekufundiseni iMaths.“Ngaphakathi kimi bekunokuthi uma ngikwazi ukwenza umfundi athande iSayensi, ayiqonde futhi ayiphase kahle yini engangehlula ukuthi nakwiMaths kwenziwe okufanayo.“Ngaqala ngokufundisa uGrade 11 ngaqhubeka nabo ngaya kwaGrade 12 ngoba ngifuna ukuthi uma sengichazela abahloli ngezinselelo engibe nazo ngikhulume ngento nami engiyaziyo.”Lesi sikole siphase ngo-100% nyakenye, kuwo * -60% wamaBachelor, amaDiploma angu-30% no-10% ophase ngeCertificate.UMathenjwa uthe uyena ofika kuqala esikoleni ngo-6.30 aphume ekugcineni ngo-11 ebusuku zonke izinsuku.Uthe unekilasi lokubuyekeza alisizayo elingena ngo-8 kuya ku-10 ebusuku. Abafundi bakwaGrade10, 11 no-12 bavula ngaphambi kokuthi kuvule amanye amabanga ngoba uthi usuke efuna ukuthi babe nesikhathi esanele sokubuyekeza umsebenzi wesikole ngoba isilabhasi bayiqeda ngoJuni.“Uma kuphuma isikole angihambi ngiyahlala ngenze umsebenzi wami ngibe ngizilungiselela isikhathi sokusiza abafundi abangabambi ngokushesha ekilasini. Ngenxa yokuzimisela kwami nabanye othisha sebeze bangijoyina.”Uthe uqale waqhathwa nabanye ozakwabo endaweni, waya esifundeni ngaphambi kokuthi azoqhathwa nabesifundazwe. Kuzwelonke nguye omele iKZN.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngokuchonywa uphaphe ngokwenza kahle. Le ndondo akuyona eyami kuphela kodwa ngeyothisha bonke engibambisane nabo. Thina besisebenza nje singazi nokuthi kuneso elisibhekile,” kuphetha uMathenjwa.UMshengu uthe ukuhlonishwa kwalabo thisha ukubakhuthaza nokubabonga ngomsebenzi omuhle abawenzile kulo nyaka.Uthe uyazi ukuthi abathole izindodo bazoqala unyaka ka-2020 benomfutho ngenxa yezindondo.
title: OwaseNtulabakayise uzomela iKZN

text: BAGWETSHWE odilikajele neminyaka engu-54 ababulali ababili abahlasela ehostela KwaMashu babulala abantu. NgoFebhuwari 7 nonyaka iNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini igwebe ababulali, uSfiso Gumede (29) noSizwe Mthiyane (34) odilikajele ababili umuntu ngamunye neminyaka engu-54 ngaphezulu.Inkantolo ithe ibagixabeza ngeminyaka engu-30 ngecala lokuzama ukubulala, engu-15 ngecala lokubamba inkunzi, neminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye ngecala lokutholakala nezibhamu.Ngo-Okthoba 2018 abesilisa babehlezi beyiqulu endaweni yokucima ukoma emgwaqweni uXolo khona ehostela, kwafika amadoda amane azenza abathengayo. Atshelwa ukuthi utshwala sebuphelile, akhipha izibhamu afuna ngodli imali namafoni kubantu ababehlezi endaweni yokucima ukoma.Lawa madoda kuthiwa aphinda adubula abantu ababezihlalele.Kwashona uMnuz Bongikosi Biyela (29) noMnuz Sibonelo Mbanjwa (33) kulesi sigameko. Abanye abane balimala baphuthinyiswa esibhedlela. Amaphoyisa aKwaMashu abe esevula icala lokubulala, elokuzama ukubulala nelokubamba inkunzi. Imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwezibhamu yaveza ukuthi yizo ezasebenza kulesi sehlo.
title: Odilika neminyaka kwababulala abasehostela

text: BAGWETSHWE odilikajele abalisa abathathu abalahlwe ngamacala okubulala ngesihluku amaphoyisa esigamekweni esenzeke ngoSepthemba 2015 emijondolo yaseNamibia, eNanda. IJaji laseNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini uXolile Ntshulana likhiphe lesi sigwebo ngoMgqibelo lathi sizobafundisa isifundo ababulali abangakhombisi ngisho ukuzisola.ULindokuhle Mchunu (20), uSboniso Khubisa (22) noSabelo Mkhize (28) baphinde bengezelwa eminye iminyaka ngamanye amacala. Bathola iminyaka engu-15 ngokubamba inkunzi behlomile, emihlanu yokuzama ukubulala baphinda bathola eminye engu-15 nezinyanga ezingu-12 ngokutholakala nezibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni.Kuthiwa benza ubuqili baya esiteshini samaphoyisa bayozenza abacela usizo lokuhambisa incwadi yenkantolo kumuntu thizeni bafika bawajikela amaphoyisa.USeargent Vusumuzi Moyane noSeargent Ntombikayise Precious Jojisa bephucwa izibhamu bakhunyuliswa nezimpahla zomsebenzi. Bababophela evenini babavalela bahamba bayobabulalela kwenye indawo bazama ukungqongqisa imoto yamaphoyisa ngomlilo. Phakathi kwezibhamu ababezisebenzisa kwakukhona i-AK 47 ne-9mm okuthiwa babebadubula ngazo kwala ngisho becela uxolo baqhubeka babadubula. Kuthiwa uJojisa wasinda ngenxa yokuthi wazenza umuntu oshonile waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela eMhlanga wahlala inyanga. UNkk Lihle Moyane ongunkosikazi wephoyisa elabulawa ubekhona enkantolo uthe nakuba simgculisa isigwebo kodwa ngeke simbuyise umyeni wakhe.“Lezi zinhlungu ziyohlala zikhona enhlizweni yami. Njalo uma ngibona abasolwa begibela ebhokisini siyabuya isithombe sesihluku abasenza kumnyeni wami,’’ kusho uNkk Moyane.Ilungu lomndeni womunye wababulali uSipho Mkhize elingafunanga ukudalulwa lithe ibambe ngakho ngokugwetshwa kwakhe ngoba bebefuna ajeze nabo bengumndeni ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi wayengabenza le nto. Kuvele ukuthi lo mlisa uvele unenxanxathela yamacala ake amlahla phambilini.
title: Odilikajele kwabathumba iphoyisa balibulala

text: Imboni yokubheja eNingizimu Afrika ngenye yezihamba phambili e-Afrika. Kuhlale kuvumbuka ama-site okubheja amasha kuleli ngenxa yokuthi iNingizimu Afrika iyimakethe enkulu uma kukhulunywa ngokubheja online.Ngaphambi kokuthi iCovid-19 iphazamise izinto eNingizimu Afrika, izigidi zamaphanta bezigcwala ezindaweni zokubheja ezweni jikelele lapho bekufezeka khona amaphupho awo. Ubuchwepheshe besimanje busizile ukukhulisa imboni ngoba manje amaphanta asebheja online ezihlalele emizini yawo.Nakuba amaphanta amaningi ebheja bese ewina, amanye awaqondi kahle ngezindlela zokubheja, lolu daba luzocacisa kabanzi ngalesi sihloko esivamise ukungaqondwa ngabaningi. Ngabe yini umehluko phakathi kwe-pool betting nama-multibets uma kukhulunywa ngokubhejela ezemidlalo?Kubalulekile ukuthi sibheke lezi zihloko bese sichaza umehluko.IPool betting wuhlobo lokubheja lapho kuhlanganiswa iziteki zamaphanta zifakwe ndawonye bese imali ihlukaniselwa lawo aqagele kahle. Isibonelo se-pool betting eNingizimu Afrika yiSportstake 13 lapho amaphanta kufanele aqagele ukuthi imidlalo ewu-13 izohamba kanjani ukuze abambe ijackpot. Kukhona ibetting pool yemidlalo ehlukene okubalwa nelotto. Imiklomelo yakwi-pool icazelwa labo abawinile kanti amaphanta akhokha imali efanayo ukudlala kwipool. Ungathola wonke amasu nokuthi izazi ziqagela ukuthi wubani ozowina kuSoccertips.co.za.IMultibet ibuye yaziwe nge-accumulator, wuhlobo lokubheja oluthandwayo lapho odlalayo ekhetha imidlalo ehlukene ayihlanganise ethikithini elilodwa. Umdlalo ngamunye kwi-multibet ubizwa ngomlenze. Kwimultibet isiteki sifakwa emlenzeni wokuqala bese uma uphumelela, okuwinile kutshalwe kabusha emilenzeni elandayela. Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi ukuze iphanta liwine kufanele liwine yonke imidlalo esethikithini ngaphambi kokuthola imali.Uma ufaka imultibet, usethubeni lokuzikhethela imidlalo yakho kanti uma udlala ipool betting imidlalo uyayikhethelwa.Kuma multibets kufanele uwine yonke imilenze ukuze uthole imali kodwa ngepool betting, ungawina neminye imiklomelo uma uhlulwe eminye imilenze kuya ngokuthi ukwipool enjani.Uma ufaka imultibet, kufanele ukhethe imali ofuna ukuyifaka kodwa ukudlala kwipool imali yokudlala isuke isinqunyiwe.Imali ewinwa kwipool icazelwa amaphanta awinile kodwa kwimultibet iphanta lisethubeni lokuthatha yonke imali uma liwinile.Kumapools afana neSportstake, ungakhetha imiphumela emithathu emlenzeni ngamunye, okuyinto ongayenzi uma udlala kuma multibetsUkuthola eminye imininingwane, vakashela la: https://soccertips.co.za/
title: Umehluko phakathi kwe-pool betting nama multibets

text:
THEMBA NTSHINGILASEZIPHENDUKE ondingasithebeni izingane ezashonelwa nguyise ezikhishwe endlini ngunina ongazizali ngoba ethi ufuna ukudayisa umuzi phezu kokuthi incwadi yefa ivuna zona izingane njengabanikazi bomuzi.UMnuz Nathi Dladla obehlala nezingane zikamfowabo ezintathu kulo muzi osePhoenix, uthe bakhishwe emzini kamfowabo okule ndawo phezu kokuba ubufakazi bukhona encwadini yefa bokuthi izingane zikamfowabo yizona ezinelungelo njengabanikazi bomuzi.Ngenkathi 
Isolezwe lifika kule ndawo bekunemibhede, amafriji nenye impahla yasendlini ebisemnyango okuthiwa yakhishwa yisikhonzi senkantolo.Ngokusho kwakhe, emva kokushona kukamfowabo owayeyisosha ngo-2008, unkosikazi kamfowabo wahamba sengathi uyabuya kanti useyothenga omunye umuzi eMlazi ngemali kamfowabo eyaphuma emsebenzini.Uthe yonke le minyaka kade kuhlala yena nezingane zikamfowabo kulo muzi kwaze kwaba yilo nyaka.Uthe unkosikazi kamfowabo ufike esehamba nabantu angabazi bezobakhiphela ngaphandle komuzi nezimpahla zabo.“Le nto isihlukumeze kakhulu kangangoba enye yezingane zikamfowethu eyintombazane, yavele yaduka emva kokuba sikhishiwe kulo muzi kamfowethu. Kuyimanje asiyazi ukuthi ikuziphi izinkalo,” kuchaza uDladla othe usola ukuthi ingane yahluleka wukumelana nenhlalo yokulala ngaphandle kwesango nokuhamba ucela emizini yabantu.Uthe kuyimanje akukhathaleki ukuthi liyana noma cha, balala kumatrasi ongaphandle kwesango bazimboze ngoseyili ngoba akubona bonke abantu abazwelana nabo ngosizi ababhekene nalo.Kuyimanje uthe kukhona onogada abaqaphe umuzi abenza isiqiniseko sokuthi akekho ongena ngaphakathi.“Nomfana kamfowethu njengoba ekhala nje uhlukumezekile ngenxa yalesi simo. Bekumele ngabe usesikoleni kodwa akakwazi ukuya ngoba ayikho indawo ehlelekile angahlala kuyona njengoba siphinde sicele ukulala emizini yabantu,” uzikhalele kanje.Kuyimanje uthe bagqigqa ezinkantolo nasemaphoyiseni benza izincwadi ezifungelwe eziqinisekisa ukuthi incwadi yefa abanayo isemthethweni.UNkk Zandile Dladla okuthiwa ukhiphe izingane kulo muzi ucele ukuba kukhulunywe nommeli wakhe.“Cha mina bhuti ngeke ngikwazi ukukhuluma ngalolu daba. Kungcono uthinte ummeli wami.”UMnuz Anesh Maharaj uthe yinkantolo eyakhipha isinqumo sokuba bakhishwe abasendlini ngoba behluleka ukukhombisa incwadi yefa yangempela.“Ngabatshela ukuthi abalethe incwadi yefa yangempela kimina noma bayihambise enkantolo. Kuze kube manje abazange bakwenze lokho. Njengamanje akuhlali muntu endlini kuze kube kuvela leyo ncwadi engeyona ifothokhophi,” kusho uMaharaj.
title: Bakhishwe endlini kayise osashona

text: SIMANZONZO isimo kuMasipala Ugu emuva kokushiswa kwezimoto zomkhandlu ebezipake emahhovisi asedepho yawo ngoMsombuluko.Kusaphenywa ngembangela yokushiswa kwalezi zimoto, umasipala usuqale olwawo uphenyo lwangaphakathi.
