Kushiswa lezi zimoto nje vele isimo asisihle kumasipala njengoba abasebenzi bengeneme ngendlela ophethwe ngayo. Sekukaningi nezinyunyana zikhala ngokuthi lo masipala awusalawuleki, zifuna kuxoshwe nemenenja yawo okusolwa yona ngezinkinga eziwukhungethe. Isolezwe lithole ukuthi kukhona nabakhulumeli babasebenzi abamisiwe ngenxa yezinkinga zangaphakathi.Ongusihlalo weSouth African Municipal Workers Union (Samwu) KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mthandeni Ngcobo, uthe bazwile ngokushiswa kwezimoto. Uvumile ukuthi kukhona abasebenzi abamisiwe kodwa wathi lesi sigameko sokushiswa kwezimoto asihlobene nakho. Ukuqinisekisile nokuthi ziyaqonga izinkinga kulo masipala, athe inyunyana isamile ekutheni kuxoshwe imenenja yawo.Mayelana nokumiswa kwabasebenzi, uthe bangu-12 abatshelwe ngoLwesithathu olwedlule ukuthi mabayeke ukusebenza.“Sizamile ukuthi sicele ukuxoxa nabaphathi bomkhandlu kodwa kwangenzeka. Namanje sizimisele ukuthi kuxoxwe ngokuthula, yingakho nathi singahambisani nalesi sigameko sokushiswa kwezimoto futhi siyaziqhelelanisa naso. Inkinga asisakwazi nanokuqhuba izinhlelo zenyunyana ngoba abaphathi sebesisebenzisa kabi,” kusho uNgcobo.Okhulumela umasipala uMnuz France Nzama uthe sibathusile isigameko sokushiswa kwezimoto. Uthe isigameko senzeke ngoMsombuluko ebusuku, kukhona nonogada. Uveze ukuthi kushiswe iQuantum nekhumbi, athe yizimoto ezibaluleke kakhulu ukuqhuba umsebenzi emkhandlwini.Uthe abasebenzi abamisiwe udaba lwabo aluhlangene nenyunyana kodwa ukungawuhloniphi umthetho wokusebenza. UNzama uthe ngokwazi kwabo laba basebenzi bebesanikwe izincwadi zokuthi balethe izethulo kumasipala ukuthi kungani kungafanele bathathelwe izinyathelo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuvulwe icala lokucekela phansi impahla akukaboshwa muntu.
title: Uphenyo ngokushiswa kwezimoto zikamasipala

text: IMEYA kaMasipala waseMvoti uMnuz Thami Ngubane ikhala ngokuthi ngabe kade yafa ukuba ayigadwa njengoba ivikela isinqumo sokuthi basebenzise uR11 million ezinyangeni ezingu-10, ngokugadwa kwezikhulu zomkhandlu ngaphandle kombiko wocwaningo lwezokuphepha.Esithangamini nabezindaba eThekwini izolo, uNgubane uthe yena akakuthandi ukugadwa kodwa isimo esiphoqa ukuthi abe nabaqaphi.“Ukuba nabaqaphi akusiyo into enhle ngoba awukwazi ngisho ukuba nempilo yangasese kodwa izimo nezinga eliphezulu lokubulawa kosopolitiki liyaphoqa ukuthi umuntu agcine esegadwa,” kusho uNgubane.Uthe bathathe isinqumo sokuthi bahlinzeke izikhulu zomkhandlu eziyisikhombisa naye ngonogada emuva kokubulawa kwesinye isikhulu sikamasipala esadutshulelwa emagcekeni omkhandlu, uMnuz Thobani Ndaba ngoNovemba nyakenye.“Ngemuva kwalesi sigameko sokubulawa kukaNdaba owadutshulwa amahlandla angaphezu kwamashumi amabili ngezibhamu ezinkulu umasipala wabona kufanele ukuthi uzigade izikhulu ngoba ugwema ukuthi kuphinde kwenzeke esinye isigameko esifanayo, besingeke singazithathi izinyathelo silinde umbiko wocwaningo lwezokuphepha lwamaphoyisa,” kusho uNgubane.Uthe bebezitshela ukuthi ukugadwa kwezikhulu kuzothatha inyanga eyodwa noma ezintathu ngoba becabanga ukuthi amaphoyisa azosheshe abophe ecaleni likaNdaba kodwa ukungaboshwa kwabasolwa kwenza babe novalo baqhubeke nokuzihlinzeka ngabaqaphi.UNgubane uthe akekho ongazi ukuthi impilo yakhe isengcupheni njengoba enezitha ngaphakathi kwi-ANC nasemaqenjini aphikisayo.“Umuzi kamama washiswa kanti nomuzi wami nawo washiswa lezi zigameko zenzeke manje sesadlula ngisho odlameni lomnyama nomnyama,” kusho uNgubane.Uthe enye inkabi yaphumela obala emuva kokubanjwa wuphiko lwezobuNhloli yamtshela ukuthi ibithengiwe ukuthi imsusuluze.“Le nkabi yangitshela yonke into angiyazi kodwa yona ibingazi, yaze yasho ukuthi miningi imihlangano ebihlala kuyo lapho bekuboshwa khona itulo lokuthi ngishaywe,” kusho uNgubane.UMasipala waseMvoti ungaphansi kwengcindezi kulezi zinsuku njengoba usanda kumashelwa ngisho nangamalungu omphakathi abehambisana neNFP, ekhala ngenkohlakalo kwamasipala.Ikhansela leNFP eMvoti, uMnuz Philani Mavundla, kule mashi laveza ukuthi umasipala wasebenzisa * -section 36, uqasha inkampani yabaqaphi abebezogada izikhulu zikamasipala.Uma umkhandlu usebenzisa * -section 36, usuke ungalandeli imigudu yokukhangiswa kwamathenda kodwa uvele uziqokele inkampani ngoba uthi kuyaphuthuma.INFP yeveza izinsolo zokuthi inkampani yabaqaphi eyakhethwa yaqokwa ngeholidi kungekho muntu emsebenzini.UNgubane uthe ngamanga aluhlaza ukuthi inkampani yaqokwa ngeholidi.Uphinde waveza ukuthi ngisho uMavundla weza kubona wacela onogada bamhlinzeka ngabo ethi uzibona engaphephile ngoba ubhadlaza inkohlakalo.UNgubane uphike wama ngentaba ukuthi ukhohlakele wathi lezi zinsolo zenziwa izimbangi zakhe ezimfuna ephumile esikhundleni.“Kunamaqabane angangifuni agcine esehlangana namaqembu aphikisayo ukuze kungcoliswe igama lami emphakathini kuthiwa ngikhohlakele,” kusho uNgubane.
title: IMeya ichaza ngetulo lokuyisoconga

text: USolwazi osesigungwini eseluleka uMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli mayelana neCovid-19, uSolwazi Salim Abdool Karim ukholwa wukuthi asikho esizathu okumele sivimbe ukuthi kuvulwe izindawo zokuzivocavoca esezivalwe izinyanga ezintathu.Uthe kuphela nje lezi zindawo kumele zilandele yonke imigomo yokuvikela ukubhebhetheka kwaleli gciwane. “Amajimu kumele alandele imibandela futhi abe nezindlela zokucophelela ngaphambi kokuthi avulwe’’. USolwazi uthe lezi zindlela zokuvika leli gciwane zivele sezikhona.Abezindawo zokuzivocavoca sebenxuse uhulumeni izikhawu eziningi becela ukuthi agunyaze ukuvulwa kwalezi zindawo.Nokho kodwa kulindeleke ukuthi ngisho uhulumeni usengakugunyaza ukuvulwa kwalezi zindawo, kodwa kukhona u-80% ongeke usakwazi ukuvula, okuyinto ezodala ukuthi inqwaba yabantu baphelelwe yimisebenzi. UKarim uthi ukunyakazisa umzimba kubaluleke kakhulu kulesi sikhathi segciwane ukweseka amasosha omzimba.Uthe kodwa yize kunjalo, lezi zindawo ziseqhulwini ohlwini lwezindawo ezihlonzwe njengalezo ezibhebhethekisa kakhulu leli gciwane. Inhlangano ebhekele abalezi zindawo, iFitSA, ithe sebeke babe nezingxoxo ezithele izithelo nohulumeni muva nje, banethemba  lokuthi maduze nje bazovunyelwa ukuthi bavule emasontweni ezayo.
title: USolwazi uthi asengavulwa amajimu

text: ISITOBHA seKaizer Chiefs * -Eric “Tower” Mathoho sichithe amaqembu aphesheya kwezilwandle sancamela ukuvuselela inkontileka yaso eNaturena.Lezi zindaba zitshelwe Isolezwe yimenenja uTim Sukazi we-Quality Talent Sports okuyinkampani ephethe izindaba zikaMathoho. Inkontileka kaMathoho naMakhosi ibizophela ngoJuni. Ku-Absa Premiership ubecathanyelwa yiMamelodi Sundowns engompetha beCaf Champions League neSuperSport United engompetha beNedbank Cup.“U-Eric maningi amaqembu abemfuna. Bekukhona amaqembu alapha eNingizimu Afrika nawaphesheya kwezilwandle. Phesheya ufunwa amaqembu aseRussia, Croatia naseSweden. La maqembu siwachithile ngenxa yokuthi izicelo zawo bezingasenelisi.“Akusizi ukugijimela amaqembu aphesheya ekubeni nemali ingekho yinhle ngoba umdlali uzofike adlale isizini eyodwa noma amabili bese efuna ukubuya. Nezicelo ebezibekwa yila maqembu etafuleni bezingagculisi, yingakho sikhethe ukuthi sivuselele neChiefs,” kusho uSukazi.UMathoho (26) usehlale amasizini amahlanu kuMakhosi. Ufike kuleli qembu ngo-2012. Usehlabane ngezicoco ezimbili ze-Absa Premiership, Nedbank Cup neseMTN 8.“IChiefs ikhombisile ukuthi isamdinga * -Eric ngokumnika inkontileka entsha engcono. Yingakho engazange angabaze ukuyisayina. Ujabule kuChiefs futhi usafuna ukuzuza izinto ezinkulu. Uma livela ithuba lokuya phesheya iChiefs ngeke ime endleleni yakhe. Lokhu ikuqinisekisile kithina. Izinto ezifana nalezo azidingi ukuthi uze uzibophezele ngazo ngoba kuya ngokuthi ubudlelwano bakho nalelo qembu bunjani,” kusho uSukazi.IChiefs ivuselela inkontileka kaMathoho nje isanda kwelula ekaLorenzo Gordinho ngeminyaka emithathu. Bekubhekwe ukuthi kuphele isonto isiqede yonke into noGeorge Maluleka ophelelwa yinkontileka ngoJuni.Abanye abadlali iChiefs exoxa nabo ngokuvuselela izinkontileka nguLucky Baloyi, Willard Katsande noTsepo “Chester” Masilela bonke asebenikiwe izicelo kwazise Amakhosi aselinde bona ukuthi baziphendule.
title: UMathoho uchayise awaphesheya

text: UKUBONA abantu abasha bengasebenzi yize beneziqu zemfundo ephakeme kwenze uMnuz Siphiwe Mondli Simamane wasungula ikhasi elibacija ngamakhono azobasiza ukuthola umsebenzi.USimamane uqale ikhasi lakhe ngo-2016 elibizwa ngeCareers Upliftment Legacy SA elitholakala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Kuleli khasi uSimamane ufaka izikhangiso zomsebenzi, asuke ezibone emaphephandabeni, kuma-website nasuke ezithole ezinkampanini ezihlukene.Uphinde asize abantu ukuba bazilungiselele ngabazokusho uma sebeyohlolelwa ukuthi bafanele yini ukuqashelwa umsebenzi abasuke befake isicelo sawo.USimamane (31) yinsizwa ezalelwe kwa-N eMlaza, wafunda eVelabahleke wadlulela eDurban University of Technology (DUT) wenza iziqu zeNational Diploma neBtech kwi-Office Management.Uphinde abe neziqu zeMasters kwiHuman Resource Development.“INingizimu Afrika izwe elinesibalo esiphezulu sabantu abaswele umsebenzi ngakho ngabona ukuthi kufanele ngibe neqhaza ukusiza labo abaswele umsebenzi ngokuthi ngibabhekele amathuba. Ngiqeqeshwe wuMnuz Minenhle Scoot ngesikhathi ngifika kuMasipala weTheku lapho ngangiyi-intern kwezakwandabazabantu. Ngifundile ukuthi yimaphi amaphutha enziwa ngabantu uma befuna umsebenzi kusukela emaphutheni abawenza kuma-cv abo, abawenza uma sebekhuluma kwinhlololwazi nokunye. Ikhasi lami libacija ngawo wonke amakhono azobasiza ukuthola umsebenzi,” kusho uSimamane.Uveze ukuthi yize eneziqu azibale ngenhla kodwa usebenza ophikweni lwamanzi nenhlanzeko lapho kulungiswa khona amapayipi.“Angisebenzi ehhovisi kodwa ngisebenzela ngaphandle, siye sifake amapayipi, ngigqoka ama-avaloli namadadla ngiyothelwa ngamanzi uma sengisebenza. Ngawuthatha lo msebenzi ngoba yiwona owawukhona futhi ungiholela imali yokuphila. Ngiyacela nabafowethu nodadewethu abangasebenzi bathathe noma yimuphi umsebenzi ovelayo ngoba imali abazoyihola kuwona ngeke bayicoshe.”Ngaphandle kokunika abantu amasu azobasiza ukuthola umsebenzi uSimamane uphinde abe nezinhlelo zokubanika izimpahla abazozigqoka uma beyohlolelwa umsebenzi abasuke befake isicelo sawo, uphinde abaxhase ngezimpahla abazozigqoka uma bethweswa iziqu zabo.Uphinde akhulume emicimbini ehlukene mahhala kodwa kweminye uyakhokhelwa ukuthi akhulume kuyo.Akasebenzi yedwa uSimamane kodwa ubambisene nabantu ayefunda nabo, abanye uhlangane nabo emsebenzini nangesikhathi enika abantu amasu okufuna umsebenzi.Uphinde aqoqe izicathulo ezinikelwa ezikoleni ukuze bonke abafundi babe nezicathulo ezisesimeni esifanele.Uphinde anike abanezinkampani zabo ithuba lokuzikhangisa njalo ngoLwesithathu. Izinkampani ezikhangiswayo azikhokhi kodwa inhloso kusuke kuwukuthi abantu bazi imisebenzi ehlukene eyenziwa wosomabhizinisi abehlukene. USimamane ucele abafuna umsebenzi ukuthi babhalise naku-LinkedIn ngoba abanye abaqashi bababheka khona abantu.Uveze ukuthi usebenzisana noNkk Debbie Briene we-source me ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bathola amathuba okuqashwa.ICareers Upliftment Legacy SA iyatholakala kwiFacebook nakwiTwitter.
title: Usebenzisa izinkundla zokuxhumana ukusiza abaneziqu ngomsebenzi

text: UMQEQESHI weChippa United, uLehlohonolo Seema akazange awuqale kahle umsebenzi wakhe ekuholeni leli qembu elidume ngokudedela izembe kubaqeqeshi uma imiphumela emihle ingabonakali.Ngempelasonto edlule bahlulwe yiCape Town City ngo 1-0. Lona bese kuwumdlalo wesibili kulandelana iqembu lihluleka wukunqoba.Namuhla iChilli Boys izokwamukela iHighlands Park emdlalweni ose-Orlando Stadiumn ngo-3.30 ntambama.Ukuhlulwa kwabo kubashiye endaweni ka-12 kwi-log. Bahlukaniswe amaphuzu amathathu namaqembu abalekela ukuvika izembe.USeema uthathe izintambo ngemuva kokushiya kukaRulani Mokwena osebuyele kwiMamelodi Sundowns.“Sisasebenza, kancane kancane kuzohlangana. Sesibonile lapho kumele silungise khona. Ngicabanga ukuthi emdlalweni silahle kalula ibhola. Awukwazi ukukwenza lokho uma ungekho endaweni efanele. Uyabona ukuthi abafana sesiside isikhathi behleli kodwa kukhona okuhle esizokuyisa emdlalweni wethu olandelayo,” kusho uSeema.Kungenzeka ukuthi uSeema uzibona esenesikhathi esanele sokuhlanganisa iqembu kodwa umbuzo uthi ngabe bacabanga ngendlela efanayo yini nosihlalo weChippa, uSiviwe Mpengesi.UMpengesi uyindoda enganqeni ukushintsha abaqeqeshi. Iqembu liqale isizini ngoClinton Larsen olisindise ezembeni ngesizini edlule. Ukhonjwe indlela, kwalandela uNorman Mapeza. Yize ebebonakala eza kahle kodwa akahlalanga, kwaqashwa uMokwena njengoba sekukhona uSeema. Isizini nesizini, uMpengesi ushintsha abaqeqeshi eqenjini lakhe.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, iHighlands Park nayo izobe ilwela ukuwina ngemuva kwemidlalo emine ihluleka wukwenza lokho. Ngempelasonto ibambane ngo 1-1 neMamelodi Sundowns.Iphuzu elitholile ilibeke endaweni yesikhombisa kwi-log.Umqeqeshi weHighlands, * -Owen Da Gama uncome ukuzinikela kwabadlali bakhe umgadli uPeter Shalulile noLindokuhle Mbatha.“(UShalulile) Uzibonakalisile edlala kwiNFD namanje njengoba kuyisizini yakhe yesibili kwiPSL. Sisebenze kanzima kuyena. Ukubambisana kwakhe noLindokuhle Mbatha kuyinto enhle ukuyibuka. Balokhu beshaya ngegiya elilodwa,” kusho uDa Gama. UShalulile ushaye igoli emdlalweni weSundowns, usenawu-13 emidlalweni yeligi.
title: USeema usaphikwa yizinto kwiChippa

text: OWAYEYISIKHULU esiphezulu sakwaSAA esibhekelele izimali, uNkk Phumeza Nhantsi, utshele ikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana ukuthi wayezibona engaphephile ngesikhathi esebenza eSAA, uNkk Dudu Myeni esengusihlalo wayo.UNhantsi ngoLwesithathu uthe ngesikhathi ehlangana noNkk Myeni eThekwini wayenokwesaba wazibona kufanele aqikelele.Emuva kokuthi iSAA imise inkontileka kaR256 million eyayikade inikwe inkampani iBnP Capital, waba nokwesaba ukuthi uNkk Myeni wayezokwenza lokho omunye wabaqondisi uYakhe Kwinana ayemxwayise ngakho.“Izinsuku zakho zibaliwe,” uthe kwasho uKwinana kuyena.Uthe wayekade ezwe ukuthi uNkk Myeni wayezoya eSunnyside, eTshwane, lapho ayezofika khona abhale umbiko ochaka esinye isikhulu.UNkk Myeni kuthiwa wayengahambisani nokuthi kwesulwe isivumelwane senkontileka neBnP Capital futhi kwakunguyena yedwa ekomitini lebhodi owayeseka ukuba iSAA ikhokhe inhlawulo kaR50 million yokukhansela isivumelwane abebesenzile.Isivumelwane neBnP sasulwa emuva kokuba kuvele ukuthi ilayisensi yayo kwi-Financial Services Board (FSB) yayingasasebenzi, babephuciwe yona. I-FSB manje seyayaziwa ngokuthi iFinancial Sector Conduct Authority.“Sasinengcindezi. Kunesikhathi lapho sasizibona khona singaphephile,” kusho uNkk Nhantsi.Uthe wayezitshela ukuthi umsebenzi unzima kodwa ekuhambeni kwesikhathi wabona ukuthi kukhona nokugxambukela kwezepolitiki, nengcindezi evela ezikhulwini zebhodi.Uthe uyakhumbula etshela umyeni wakhe: “Ngangingazi ukuthi ngizifaka entweni enjani ngesikhathi ngithatha umsebenzi eSAA.”Yize ethi wayekhathazekile ngokuphepha kwakhe kodwa abekho abake bamqonda ngqo bamsabisa.Ukuvikele ayekwenza ngesikhathi esasebenza eSAA ethi konke ayekwenza kwakuhambisana nezinkambiso nenkampani yamabhanoyi engeyoMbuso.Uthe ukuzothula kwakhe ubufakazi kwikhomishini ukwenze ukuze abantu babone ukuthi izikhulu eziphezule zeSAA zazinengcindezi engakanani.
title: Ngazibona ngingaphephile eSAA: Nhantsi

text: KUVELA ukuthi uTsepo “Chester” Masilela osanda kuchithwa iKaizer Chiefs ngeledlule uzanyelwa iqembu eSouth America yinkampani ebhekelele izindaba zakhe iPro Sport International ephethwe uqweqwe lwemenenja, uMike Maakab.Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba, nakuba ekhona amaqembu amfunayo eNingizimu Afrika uMasilela kodwa uMakaab uthe uzoqala azame eSouth America njengoba kukhona amaqembu kuleliya zwekazi amfunayo uMasilela.“UMaakab ufuna uMasilela adlale eSouth America. Akhona amaqembu akwi-Absa Premiership amfunayo futhi maningi. Iningi lawo lizinze eGauteng. Akenqambile naye uMakaab ukuba adlale kuleli kodwa ufuna ukuthi aqale ahluleke phesheya kwezilwandle,” kusho lo mthombo osondelene kakhulu nePro Sport International.Isolezwe liphinde lathola ukuthi uMasilela ufake izithombe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana eseMiami, e-United State of America (USA). Imibiko ithi uziqeqeshela khona, njengoba amaqembu amaningi kwi-Absa Premiership evulelile kuleli sonto, amanye evula ngoMsombuluko.UMasilela wazakhela igama kuleli esagijimela iBenoni Premier United. Uke wagijima emaqenjini aphesheya kwezilwandle esingabala kuwona iMaccabi Haifa yakwa-Israel ngo-2007 kuya ku-2011, iGetafe yaseSpain ngo-2011 kuya ku-2012 ngaphambi kokujoyina iZimpofana ngo-2012. Udlale kuBafana Bafana amahlandla angu-51.UMasilela uchithwe kwiChiefs nabanye abadlali abane okunguWilliam Twala, Edmore Chirambadare, Keagan Buchanan okhonjwa kwiMaritzburg United noSibusiso Khumalo okuvela ukuthi angase athushuke kwelinye lamaqembu aKwaZulu-Natal adlala kwi-Absa Premiership.UMakaab wePro Sport International akafunanga ukuvuma noma ukuphika ngodaba lukaMasilela okhonjwa eSouth America.“Engingakusho njengamanje ukuthi kusasekuseni kakhulu ukuthi singaxoxa ngodaba lukaMasilela. Okuningi ngalo kuzocaca kahle ngesonto elizayo,” kusho uMakaab.
title: Ochithwe yiChiefs uzama inhlanhla phesheya

text: KUYINTO ejwayelekile ukuzwa abantu besifazane abaningi becobelelana ngamasu ahlukene okwakha izinqa. Iningi labesifazane emakhasini ahlukene ezinkundleni zokuxhumana lihlala likhuthaza amasquats okuwuhlobo lokuzivocavoca sakuqojama. Lolu hlobo lokuzivocavoca kubukeka kuyilona olihamba phambili ngoba abesifazane bathi libenza babe ngomapakisha ngokushesha. Ongoti bezokuzivocavoca bathi kuyiqiniso ukuthi ukwenza amasquats kunomthelela omuhle impela kodwa okungasho ukuthi kumele enziwe ngokweqile ngoba angaba nobungozi. Ungoti kulo mkhakha, uNksz Sam Xulu wePhoenix Health & Wellness eThekwini, uthe akulona iqiniso ukuthi kwakha izinqa kodwa kuyazibumba kahle zibukeke ziyimbulunga okuyinto ethandwa kakhulu abesifazane uma sebezibuka begqokile."Iphutha elenziwa abantu abaningi ukufuna ukubona umehluko ngesikhathi bese umuntu awenze kuze kweqe kulimale amamasela. Uma uzokwenza lolu hlobo lokuzivocavoca ungaqala kancane wenze ngokuthi uzikalele abe wu-50 kuya ku-100 ngesikhathi ekuseni". "Khetha izinsuku, uma kade uwenze ngoMsombuluko dlulisa uLwesibili noLwesithathu ukunikeza umzimba isikhathi sokululama. Ngesikhathi uqojama usukuma ushona phansi kudabuka amamaseli fibre bese evuvukala. Yingakho kuba sengathi kuputshuka izinqa. Kusuke kubumbeka amamasela, nokuyingozi ukuwadabula zonke izinsuku," kusho uNksz Xulu. Ephetha uthe ukuzivocavoca kuyefana nse nokuzelapha ngemishanguzo, konke kunesikalo nesikhathi esibekiwe. Ukuphuza amanzi kakhulu nokulekelela ngokudla okunempilo kungenye yezinto uNksz Xulu athi zibalulekile. Lokhu uthe kuzosiza ukuthi zelapheke ngendlela izicubu zomzimba ezisuke zithintekile ngesikhathi ushona uvumbuka phansi. Ukusebenzisa izinsimbi ngesikhathi wenza lolu hlobo lokuzivocavoca uthe akunankinga kodwa kufanele umuntu aqaphele isikalo nendlela enzangayo.
title: Ungajahi ukuba umapakisha ngokushesha uma wenza amasquats

text:
Kuthiwa icala elivuliwe elokushaywa kowesifazane kanti lesi sigameko senzeke eMbilo ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngomthombo walo lo wesifazane ushayelwe ukusabalalisa ivideo okuthiwa iveza uBabes nabangani bakhe behlezi kulo muzi bephawula ngesigameko sikaMampintsha noBabes.Uzithola ethola isibhaxu nje lo wesifazane usolwa ngokuthi uyena ofake ivideo enoBabes nabangani bexoxa ngoMampitsha.Isithombe somgilwa naso sigcwale izinkundla zokuxhumana sihambisana nombhalo othi: ‘Sivuka ngokunye ke manje uBabes wenu useshaye umuntu wamugqema ingozi, uzitshela ukuthi nguye othatha ama-video mhlawumbe kuphuzwa noma kubhenywa noma yini esuke yenzeka lapho bese ewafaka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Nithini ke?”pic.twitter.com/Wwr1a1zyzQ— S H I M O R A (@MampintshaNuz) 
March 6, 2019Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uBrigadier Jay Naicker uqinisekisile ukuthi kuvulwe icala lokushaya izolo.“Singakuqinisekisa ukuthi kuvulwe icala lokushaya esiteshini samaphoyisa eMbilo izolo ebusuku. Umgilwa uthi ngoMsombuluko ebusuku wavakashela indawo yokukuphumula izivakashi (guest house) eMbilo lapho ashaywa khona abesifazane abane, abathathu babo abaziyo, kulandela ingxabano noyedwa wabo.“Amaphoyisa asexhumene nabasolwa, abengeke badalulwe okwamanje. Abameli babasolwa bathe bazokwenza izitatimende emaphoyiseni. Izitatimende besingakazitholi okwamanje kofakazi abebekhona endaweni yesigameko. Uma sebuqoqiwe bonke ubufakazi icala lizodluliselwa kubashushisi.”Imizamo yokuthola okhulumela uBabes nomndeni wakwaSimelane uMhlonishwa Langa ayiphumelelanga ngaphambi kokushicilelwa kodaba. - Udaba oluphelele ephephandabeni lakho kusasa.
title: Uvulelwe icala lokushaya owesifazane uBabes

text: ISOUTH African Mint okuyinkampani eyenza imali ewuhlweza ngaphansi kweSouth African Reserve Bank yethule uR2 omusha.Lo R2 uyingxenye yokugubha iminyaka ewu-25 iNingizimu Afrika ibuswa ngentando yabantu.AbeSA Mint baphoqelekile ukukhipha isitatimende bexwayisa abantu ngokuthi bangadlali amaqola azothi labo R2 bazobenzela enye imali uma bedayiswa.“Siyanikhumbuza ukuthi uR2 omusha awunayo intengo ethe xaxa, usabiza uR2. Yonke imali entsha inentengo efanayo, uma kuwuR2 intengo yawo iba wuR2. Ayidayiswa ukuze umuntu enze imali ethe xaxa. Asiluthengi uhlweza,” kusho abeSA Mint esitatimendeni.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngo-2019 kwakunomncintiswano ogqugquzela abantu ukuthi badwebe imidwebo ezofakwa emalini ewuhlweza.UR2 ukhuluma ngesigaba-12 samalungelo abantu esithi inkululeko kuwonke wonke.Unomdwebo wowesifazane ohamba nendodakazi yakhe ngokukhululeka. Indodakazi yakhe iphethe imbali kanti lokhu abeSA Mint bathe kuhambisana nethemba, inkululeko nokubekezela.Ubuye ube ne-coat of arms yezwe nonyaka okhishwe ngawo okuwu-2020, yize uphume kulo nyaka namagama athi iNingizimu Afrika abhalwe ngesiNgisi, isiPedi nesiSotho.Umdwebo osetshenzisiwe wenziwe u-Esta Quirk wasePitoli,  okhethe ukugxila esigabeni-12 samalungelo abantu.
title: INingizimu Afrika noR2 omusha

text: IZOBA kulo nyaka ingqungquthela ye-IFP ebhekwe ngabomvu yokukhetha ubuholi obusha bukazwelonke lapho uMengameli weqembu, inkosi uMangosuthu Buthelezi, kulindeleke ukuthi azibeke phansi izintambo ngokusemthethweni.Ingqungquthela ye-IFP kulindeleke ukuthi ibe ngasekuqaleni kuka-Okthoba.Isinqumo sokuthi kube nengqungquthela kazwelonke sithathwe emhlanganweni weqembu obuseCoastlands Hotel eThekwini ngoMgqibelo.Kuthiwa i-IFP izoqala ibe nengqungquthela kazwelonke bese kuthi lezi ezinye izingqungquthela zilandele kamuva.Engqungqutheleni kazwelonke kulindeleke ukuthi umholi ophakanyiselwe ekutheni avale isikhundla sikaButhelezi, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa akhethwe ngokusemthethweni.Okhulumela i-IFP kuzwelonke, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uthe babe nomhlangano wabo obungavulelekile ngoMgqibelo lapho kuthathwe khona izinqumo okubalwa nokuba nengqungquthela kazwelonke.“Uzokhumbula ukuthi usuku lwezingqungquthela luke lwakhishwa phambilini kodwa zaphazamiseka zangaba khona ngemuva kokuvela kodaba lwamaziko ayizipoki nokwaholela ekutheni kuthiwe awacwaningwe wonke amaziko. Uhlelo lokucwaninga lwenziwe akhishwa wonke amaziko ayizipoki, umhlangano wangoMgqibelo ubikelwe ukuthi asemaningi kakhulu manje amaziko asesimeni esikahle,” kusho uHlengwa.Uthe umhlahlandlela uzobe usumemezela ngesikhathi esifanele ukuthi ingqungquthela izoba nini.Yize uHlengwa engazange alinganise ukuthi ingqungquthela ingaba nini kodwa imithombo engaphakathi eqenjini ithe izoba sekuqaleni kuka-Okthoba.“NgoSepthemba 27 kuya ku-29 sizoba nengqungquthela yokubuyekeza umthethosisekelo nemigomo yeqembu ngaphambi kokuthi kube nengqungquthela kazwelonke ekuqaleni kuka-Okthoba,” kusho umthombo.Kule ngqungquthela kulindeleke ukuthi kuphakanyiswe uHlabisa njengomholi omusha we-IFP.UHlabisa okwamanje unguNobhala we-IFP KwaZulu-Natal aphinde abe yiMeya kuMasipala, iBig 5/Hlabisa.Ukuphakanyiswa kukaHlabisa kulandela ukushaywa ngesithende kwenkosi yaseMbhongombhongwen, inkosi uMzamo Buthelezi.Inkosi uMzamo (Buthelezi) iyona okwakubhekwe ukuthi ivale isikhundla sikaMntwana waKwaPhindangene njengoba kade ifakwe esikhundleni esasingakaze sabakhona sokuba yiPhini likamengameli.Isolezwe lithole ngemithombo yalo engaphakathi kwi-IFP ukuthi ubekhona omunye umholi weqembu omdala obesigaqele lesi sikhundla eseze waqala nomkhankaso kodwa wabuye wahosha imfe ngoba ebona ukuthi ngeke alibone elidlayo kuHlabisa ikakhulukazi njengoba egcotshwe nawuButhelezi.Emhlanganweni wangoMgqibelo kuthiwa uButhelezi ucele ukuthi kuqale kube nengqungquthela kazwelonke ukuze azibeke phansi izintambo.“Umengameli uthe ucela ukuthi kube nengqungquthela kazwelonke kuqala ngoba isimo sikaNdlunkulu wakhe * -Irene sikhomba ukuthi kumele abe seduze naye,” kusho umthombo.Ngokusho komthombo uButhelezi ubefisa ukuthi ingqungquthela kazwelonke ibe ngaphambi kokuthi kube nomgubho wosuku lwakhe lokuzalwa lapho ezobe ehlanganisa iminyaka engu-90.UButhelezi wazalwa ngomhla ka-27 Agasti 1928.
title: Isinqumo se-IFP ngengqungquthela

text: SITHAKASELWA abaniningi isimemezelo seMamelodi Sundowns sokuthi leli qempu lizovakashelwa ompetha beSpanish La Liga, i-FC Barcelona, amaBrazilian azodlala nayo eFNB Stadium, eNasrec, ngoLwesithathu ngoMeyi 16.Lo mdlalo kuzokwendlalelwa ngawo imigubho yekhulu leminyaka kwazalwa owaba ngumengameli wokuqala waseNingizimu Afrika, uNelson Mandela, ongaseko.UMandela, odlule emhlabeni ngoDisemba 2013, ubezogubha iminyaka engu-100 yobudala ngoJulayi 18.Eyokuza okwesibili kweBarcelona eNingizimu Afrika ngoLwesithathu kwethulwe nguMengameli weSundowns, uPatrice Motsepe, obekhuluma noThomas Mlambo bukhoma ohlelweni i-The Ultimate Sports Show kuMetro FM ngoLwesine ntambama.“Kuyintokozo ukusho ukuthi iyeza iBarcleona, elinye lamaqembu amakhulu emhlabeni. Ngithatha kwiSundowns ngangishilo ukuthi ngihlose ukuyibeka esicongweni e-Afrika. IBarcelona ayi kuphela kwiSundowns kodwa ize kubo bonke abathandi bakanobhutshuzayo eNingizimu Afrika. Ngiyathemba lokhu kuzoklama indima emqoka ekuthuthukiseni ibhola kuleli, kwiSadec (Southern African Development Community) kanjalo nase-Afrika,” kusho uMotsepe, eseLos Angeles e-United States of America.Kuvele ukuthi amathikithi azoqala ku-R40 kanti noMotsepe uthe azoba khona azophiwa abathile abangeke babe nawo amandla okuwathenga.“Siyathemba abafanyana baseNingizimu Afrika abahlezi bebabuka laba badlali kuTV bedlala nangabo kuma-video games kukhona abazokuzuza ngalo mdlalo,” kusho uMotsepe.UThulani Thuswa, obhekelele ezokuxhumana kwiSundowns uthe:“Imininingwane yonke ngokuza kweBarcelona izodalulelwa abezindaba kahle ngoMsombuluko (kusasa). Umongo walo mdlalo ukugubha ikhulunyaka azalwa owayengumengameli wokuqala kwintando yabantu eNingizimu Afrika, uNelson Mandela.“Kuyinto engafihliwe ukuthi umengameli weSundowns ufuna iqembu lakhe libe yizingqwele zezwekazi, i-Afrika. Ubuhlobo beSundowns neBarcelona ngezinye izindlela zokuthi ngelinye ilanga lifezeke iphupho lakhe. Lobu buhlobo buzoholela ekutheni sibone abaqeqeshi bezinkulisa zeBarcelona beza eChloorkop bezocobelelana ngamava nabeSundowns, ngokunjalo nabethu bavakashele ekomkhulu leBarcelona bayothekela ulwazi.”Kuzokube kungekhona okokuqala ukubona iBarcelona itheleka kuleli, izodlala neSundowns njengoba nango 2007, isadlalelwa ngo Ronaldinho, Deco noSamuel Eto’o. Ngaleso sikhathi yabe amaCatalan anqoba lomdlalo ngo 2-1, ayeqeqeshwa ngu Frank Rijkaard,kanti amaBrazilians ayephekwa nguGordon Igesund.UPitso Mosimane, oqeqesha iSundowns, uthe:“Abadlali bazothola ithuba lokudlala nabadlali bezinga eliphezulu. Lokhu kuzobasiza kakhulu ukuzikala ukuthi bakuliphi izinga uma beziqhathanisa nabo.”Okufakazela ukuthi lukhulu oluseza phakathi kweSundowns neBarcelona wukuthi kuzoqopheka umlando namuhla umengameli weSafa uDanny Jordaan noMotsepe bobabili bazobe begudlana ngamahlombe nomqondisi weLa Liga * -Antonio Barradas beyizitatanyiswa emdlalweni wodumo phakathi kweBarca neReal Madrid, i-El Classico.Kulo mdlalo oseCamp Nou, eCatalonia iBarcelona izobe izobhiyozela isicoco sika-25 seLa Liga kanti iReal ilungiselela owamanqamu e-Uefa Champions League neLiverpool, eKiev, e-Ukraine ngoMeyi 26.
title: UMotsepe nethemba lokuhlomula ngamava

text: MINENHLE MKHIZEW EHLISELWE umholo umdlali weMamelodi Sundowns uMame Niang obolekiswe kuMaZulu kuze kuphele isizini.UNiang ujoyine Usuthu ngoJanuwari njengoba bekuvulwe iwindi lokudayiselana ngabadlali kuPremier Soccer League (PSL). UNiang utshele abezindaba ngemuva kokuzilolonga eMoses Mabhida Outerfield ukuthi kudingeke ukuthi ehlise umholo ngesikhathi ejoyina AmaZulu.Ekuqaleni kwesizini uNiang (31) ubebolekiswe ku-AEL Limassol yaseCyprus. Kuleli qembu bekumele ahlale kuze kuphele isizini kodwa wakhuza ibuya eNingizimu Afrika ngemuva kokuthi lihlangabezane nenkinga yemali.“Maningi amaqembu obekumele ngiye kuwona kodwa mina nemenenja yami sathatha isinqumo sokuthi ngize kuMaZulu. Ngibona AmaZulu eyindawo enhle yokuthi ngiqede isizini. KuMaZulu angizanga ngenxa yemali. Kudingeke ngehlise umholo wami. Isinqumo besincike ekutheni umqeqeshi (uSteve Barker) ngiyamazi ngoba ngisebenzile naye ku-University of Pretoria kula masizini edlule futhi ngenza kahle ngaphansi kwakhe,” kusho uNiang.Lolu nkonko lomdlali oseluke lwadla umhlanganiso womdlali oshaye amagoli amaningi kuPremiership ngo-2006 lumataniswa ne-Orlando Pirates. Kuvela izindaba zokuthi usesayine inkontileka yesibambiso neZimnyama.Inkontileka yakhe neSundowns iyaphela ngoJuni okusho ukuthi usenelungelo lokungena esivumelwaneni neqembu afisa ukudlala kulona ngesizini ezayo.“Angizimisele ukukhuluma ngendaba yokukhonjwa kwami kuPirates. UKermit Erasmus wumngani omkhulu wami futhi nguyena owayengiboleke isikhindi sePirates. Ukugqoka kwami isikhindi sayo akusho ukuthi sengisayine inkontileka yesibambiso nayo. Sasizimijimela wase enginika isikhindi,” kusho uNiang.Lo mgadli odabuka eSenegal uphinde wavula isifuba ngobunzima abhekane nabo eCyprus ngonyaka odlule.“Iqembu ebengibolekiswe kulona belinenkinga yemali. Iqembu belinezikweletu. Ngike ngahlala izinyanga ezintathu ngingatholi ngisho indibilishi. Ukonga kungisizile kakhulu ngoba ngiphilile ngesikhathi ngingaholi izinyanga ezintathu. Imali yami angiyisaphazi. Bekunzima kodwa izinto ezifana nalezi ziyenzeka ebholeni. Akuyona into emnandi kodwa ziyakukhulisa njengomdlali,” kusho uNiang.KuSundowns ufike ngesizini edlule esuka kuSuperSport United. Waphambana noDove Wome.
title: UNiang uthathe iholo elincane kumaZulu

text: AMAPHOYISA ambe ithuna elingashoni obekungcwatshwe kulo umbungu emzini oseMzumbe, KwaZulu-Natal.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe ngoMsombuluko ntambama uphiko lwamaphoyisa lezotakula ePort Shepstone nolwezinja abizelwe emzini thize obunethuna elingashoni ebekungcwatshwe khona umbungu isinyelela.Amaphoyisa abehamba nenja ehogela umkhondo efike yakhonjiswa indawo, yangachitha sikhathi yaqonda lapho kungcwatshwe khona umbungu.“Kube sekumbiwa le ndawo eyithuna elingashoni kwatholakala umbungu obugoqwe ngengubo. Ukhishwe emgodini wafakwa esikhwameni esincane sezidumbu wadluliselwa kubacwaningi bezidumbu abebekhona kulo muzi,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Kube sekuvulwa idokodo ngokufihlwa kwengane ezelwe esiteshini samaphoyisa saseHibberdene.Kolunye udaba, kutholwe isidumbu ebese sonakele somuntu wesilisa ongaziwa eParadise Valley, ePinetown, izolo ekuseni.Amaphoyisa ahamba nezinja ezihogela umkhondo nakaMasipala weTheku, abizelwe kule ndawo ngemva kokuthi umuntu obezihambela ngezinyawo ebone isidumbu ebesintanta emfuleni uMbilo ngasemgwaqweni u-Eden.Isidumbu sikhishwe emfuleni sayobekwa emgwaqweni ngaphambi kokuthi sidluliselwe emaphoyiseni asePinetown.UCaptain Gwala uthe kuvulwe idokodo ngokufa komuntu.
title: Kumbiwe ithuna lombungu egcekeni

text: Bakhala nangokuthi baholelwa amaholo ehlukene yize benza umsebenzi olinganayo futhi ofanayo.Omunye wabasakazi uveze ukuthi sebeqala ngisho ukuxabana bebodwa ngaphakathi ngendaba yamaholo njengoba kukhona abahola uR500, R750, R1500 abanye bethola oR2 000 bese kuba nabafihlayo ukuthi bahola malini, okusolwa ukuthi bona bayikha ngamavosholo.“Uma uke wakhononda ngeholo, uthenjiswa ukuxoshwa noma ungaphinde uholelwe,” kusho omunye wabasakazi.Uqhube wathi kuwumkhuba ojwayelekile ukuthi uma umphathi siteshi ecikekile, ajezise abasakazi ngokuthi bangawatholi amaholi ngosuku lomholo.Ethintwa ngalezi zinsolo uMphathi siteshi uThandeka Ngobese, uthe awukho umholo oqondile kubasakazi, babanikeza imali ngokubheka ukuthi bahlala kude kangakanani nomsakazo.“Isiteshi asinayo imali ehlala ilinde ukuholela abasakazi. Sithembele kumasipala nasezikhangisweni. Sikhipha imali yokugibela hhayi imiholo.Akekho umsakazi ongakhuluma ngendaba yeholo ngoba bayazi ukuthi bazofunda,” kusho uThandeka.Kuphinde kube nezinsolo zokuthi lo mphathi uyazitamuzela imali yesiteshi. Abasakazi bathi ngeledlule beyingekho i-internet nezingcingo zingasebenzi. Bathi kodwa umphathi ubeyongcebeleka eMauritius.“Ngisebenzisa iselula ne-airtime yami ngoba i-internet nezingcingo akusebenzi, ezinye izindaba sizithatha emaphephandabeni,”kusho lo msakazi.UThandeka uthe akulona iphutha lomsakazo ukungasebenzi kwezingcingo kudalwe ukwebiwa kwamakhebuli .“ Angazi kungani bakhulume ngokuthi bengingekho ngoba kunesabelo semali ehlala kubasebenzi ukuze bakwazi ukuqhubeka nomsebenzi,”kusho uThandeka.Omunye wabasakazi uveze ukuthi kuyinkinga ngisho ukusebenza ngokukhululeka ngoba akufanele bezwakale bekhuluma ngamanye amaqembu ezepolitiki emsakazweni.“Umthetho walayikhaya noma bengawubeki ucace ukuthi ushaywa ubani kodwa akufanele ukhulume ngamanye amaqembu. Kumele kube i-ANC ngoba abaphathi bangaphansi kwayo.Ngesikhathi kuzovotwa, i-EFF kuthiwa yakuthola lokho yaze yamqonda umphathi.Kukhona nabangasasebenzi ngendaba yalezi zinkinga,”kusho lo msakazi.Nakho lokhu ukuchithile uThandeka wathi banezithombe eziwubufakazi behlanganise amaqembu ezepolitiki ahlukene benza ingxoxo mpikiswano.
title: Abasakazi bakhala ngomholo

text: SIGXEKWE nxa zonke isenzo sePhini likaNgqongqoshe lezemfundo ePhakeme kuzwelonke, uMnuz Mduduzi Manana neqembu abehamba nalo sokushaya abesifazane baze bakhunyulwe izinwele zokufakelwa eCubana eFourways, eGoli ngeSonto.Nakuba uManana egcine exolisile ngalesi senzo kodwa kushone elayizolo ikhula ingcindezi yokuthi akhonjwe indlela kuhulumeni ngoba akasona isibonelo esihle.  Kuthiwa kube nengxabano phakathi kwakhe nabesifazane abathathu abebehambele le ndawo ngemuva kokuthi omunye wabo embize ngesitabane.UNksz Mandisa Duma (30), ovule icala lokushaywa nguManana, uthe bebehleli eduzane netafula uManana abekulo nabangani bakhe kukhulunywa ngokuthi ngubani ongase abe nguMengameli we-ANC olandelayo ngesikhathi uManana ethi ufuna ukuphawula.Uthe umzala wakhe ukhiphe iselula efuna ukushutha i-video kodwa umngani kaManana wamtshela ukuthi angayishuthi."Umzala uthe uMduduzi okumele anqabe ukuthi ashuthwe, wanqaba uManana wayibeka iselula. Uphenduke wabuza ukuthi singobani nokuthi kungani sihleli nabo wabiza abaqapha le ndawo ukuthi bazosikhipha.Bese sisukumile sesihamba, umzala wambiza ngesitabane wase emshaya ngempama, wamkhahlela wamdonsa nangezinwele," kusho uNksz Duma. Uthe bamkhahlelile naye, bamshaya bamdonsa nangezinwele, kwathi umngani wakhe obezama ukusiza bamphushela le.Uqhube wathi ngesikhathi kwenzeka lokhu abaqaphi bebezibukele bengenzi lutho.Uvule icala esiteshni samaphoyisa iDouglasdale.UManana, esitatimendini, uxolisile kuNksz Duma, emndenini wakhe, kubantu bakuleli kanye nakuhulumeni ngalesi senzo wathi yize ebediniwe kodwa bekumele azibambe."Lesi sehlo esimbi bekungamele senzeke. Ngiyazi engikwenzile, nalabo ebengihamba nabo kuphathe kabi abantu abaningi. Njengomholi, bekumele ngingenzi into enje. Ngizobambisana nabomthetho," kusho uManana.Uthe kukhona abavule ikhasi elingumkokotelo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana elimveza njengomuntu ongazisoli ngakwenzile elingcolisa negama lakhe. "Uma isikhathi sesifikile ngizoya ngiyoxoxa noNksz Duma, nomndeni wakhe ngixolise. Ngizohlangana ne-ANC, kanjalo noMengameli Jacob Zuma ngiyochaza ngokwezenkile," kusho uManana.I-video esabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana iveza uManana neqembu lakhe beshaya laba besifazane. Engxoxweni yocingo abe nayo nomfowabo kaNksz Duma, uPhesheya ebidlalwa emithonjeni yabezindaba, uyazivumela ukuthi umshayile ngoba embize ngesitabane.UZuma uthe ukhathazekile ngezinsolo zokushaywa kwabesifazane okuthiwa kwenziwe nguManana.Okhulumela uZuma, uDkt Bongani Ngqulunga, uthe unethemba ukuthi umthetho uzothatha indawo yawo njengoba noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ethe amaphoyisa ayasiphenya lesi sehlakalo. "Uhulumeni wahlonza amacala okuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane njengamacala abucayi. Abesifazane banelungelo lokuphepha bangahlaselwa noma kungathiwa lowo uphethe siphi isikhundla. Sinxusa abanolwazi ngalesi sehlakalo ukuthi basebenzisane namaphoyisa," kusho uZuma.Okhulumela uMbalula, uMnuz Vuyo Mhaga, uthe kuphenywa icala lokushaya. Uthe lezi zinsolo zibucayi wathi ukuvikelwa kwabesifazane nezingane yinto eseqhulwini emnyangweni wakhe."Umgilwa kumele ahlonishwe esekwe. Kumele achazelwe ngokuthi icala selikuphi. Abesifazane badinga uthando nokuvikelwa.  Sinxusa amaphoyisa ukuthi anikwe ithuba lokuphenya leli cala ngaphandle kokwesaba ngoba akekho umuntu ongaphezulu komthetho," kusho uMhaga. IMenenja yaseCubana ezibize ngoNelson inqabile ukuphawula.
title: 'Yize bengichukuluziwe, bekumele ngizibambe' - Mduduzi Manana

text: UMSUNGULI wamateku abizwa ngeBathu uqale uhlelo lokunikela ngezicathulo zesikole ezibhalwe igama lomkhiqizo wakhe.UMnuz Theo Baloyi ubhale ekhasini lakhe kwiTwitter wathi: “Ngiyajabula ukunethulela uhlelo lwethu lokubuyisela emphakathini iBathu for batho care project. Esikwenzayo kuwuthando, silapha ngenxa yabantu. Sifuna ukuhamba uhambo nabaholi bethu bakusasa ngokunikela ngezicathulo eziyisigidi eminyakeni ewu-10 ezayo. NB: Izicathulo azidayiswa.”Happy to announce our CSI project #Bathu for Batho care project❤️🙏🏿💫.This is a passion project for us , We are because of the people❤️We want to”Walk The Journey” with our future leaders 💫 by donating 1 000 000 pairs over the next 10 years .NB: The shoes are not for sale pic.twitter.com/t8efjIhIs1Abantu batshengise ukuyithakasela into eyenziwa uBaloyi abanye bencoma bethi kuhle ukuthi abuyisele emphakathini, uNkulunkulu ambusise.Taking back to community.. That's soo so generous of you my brother. God bless moreInkampani kaBaloyi isanda kuhlabana ngendondo yeTransformation Champion of the year, emcimbini weBlack Business Quartley awards, naye uthole indondo yokuba usomabhizinisi ovelele kuwo lo mcimbi.
title: Ufuna ukunikela ngezicathulo zesikole eziyisigidi oweBathu

text: AZISHAYA isifuba AmaZulu FC ngokuba nesandla ekuzibekiseleni kweBafana Bafana indawo kwi-2019 Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ese-Egypt lapho kuhluthana khona amazwe angu-24 okokuqala emlandweni walo mqhudelwano osungulwe ngo-1957.Lo mqhudelwano ongoka-32 uqale ngoLwesihlanu ngomdlalo obuseCairo International Stadium phakathi kwe-Egypt neZimbabwe ebegijima ngabadli boSuthu okungu-Talent Chawapiwa no-Ovidy Karuru obeneminyakazo emihle. I-Egypt iguqise iThe Warriors ngo 1-0 ngegoli likaMahmoud Trezeguet kwabhakuza amafulegi kuyo yonke inkundla.Ixoxa naleli phephandaba imenenja yaMaZulu, uQedusizi Dlamini ithe: “Kusemahlombe abadlali ukuthi bakuthathe njengenselelo ukungabizwa kwiBafana ekubeni abanye ozakwabo bebiziwe esikwatini seZimbabwe.“Kufane bazimisele banyuse izinga uma bebona bengabizwa kwiBafana. Abadlali esinabo eqenjini basizingeni eliphezulu. Bheka ngoba yize singayiphakelanga iBafana kodwa sinabo abadlali ezikwatini ezincane zesizwe kanti bane abadlali ababizelwe kwezinye izikwati. Sinoyedwa kwesaseGabon nabathathu kwiZimbabwe.“EGabon (engekho kwi-Afcon) sinoNoel Amonome kuthi kwiZimbabwe sibe noKaruru (Ovidy), Chawapiwa (Talent noButholezwe Ncube ongabizwanga kwi-Afcon),” kusho uDlamini. UKaruru, oyiphini likakaputeni onguKnowledge Musona, nguye obewuhlupho kwi-Egypt abadlali bayo behluleka wukumvimba kodwa yena ebuya nalo njalo kubo ibhola. Ubhekiwe ukuthi aphinde abe yisibani uma sebebuya nge-Uganda kaDenis Onyango khona eCairo ngoLwesithathu ngo-7 ntambama.UDlamini uthe isandla sabo asizogcina ngabadlali baseZimbabwe kodwa sizobonakala nakwiBafana evula ne-Ivory Coast e Al-Salam Stadium kusasa ngo-4.30 ntambama.“Yize singenabo abadlali kwiBafana Bafana kodwa sibe nesandla ekufikeni kwayo la (kwi-Afcon) ngoba ethimbeni losomaqhinga sinabantu bethu ababili. Labo nguBongani Manuku oyi-masseur (obhucunga izicubu zabadlali) noJoshua Smith oyi-physical trainer noma i-fitness coach ngokolimi lwanamuhla (ololonga imizimba yabadlali). Nokho njengoba bese-Egypt nje abathunywanga yithi kodwa babizelwe imisebenzi yabo,” kusho uDlamini. “Empeleni kusukela kuthathe uStuart Baxter nje basebenza naye esikwatini. Uyabona-ke ukuthi yize bengabiziwe abadlali bethu kodwa lokhu kuyasidweba isithombe ekutheni iqembu liphethwe ngezinga eliphezulu lokusebenza. Nabantu abaqashwa khona bangongoti emisebenizini yabo.”Imidlalo ye-Afcon kuleli sonto:Namuhla - Morocco v Namibia, 3.30pm, SS4; Senegal v Tanzania, 6.30pm, SS4; Algeria v Kenya, 9pm, SS4.Kusasa - Ivory Coast v South Africa, 3.30pm, SS4; Tunisia v Angola, 6.30pm, SS4; Mali v Mauritania, 9pm, SS4.NgoLwesibili - Cameroon v Guinea-Bissau, 6pm, SS4; Ghana v Benin, 9pm, SS4NgoLwesithathu - Nigeria v Guinea, 3.30pm, SS4; Uganda v Zimbabwe, 6.30pm, SS4; Egypt v DR Congo, 9pm, SS4.NgoLwesine - Madagascar v Burundi, 3.30pm, SS4; Senegal v Algeria, 6.30pm, SS4; Kenya v Tanzania, 9pm, SS4.NgoLwesihlanu - Tunisia v Mali, 3.30pm, SS4; Morocco v Ivory Coast, 6.30pm, SS4; South Africa v Namibia, 9pm, SS4.
title: USuthu luziqhenya ngesandla salo kwi-Afcon

text: UMKHANDLU weTheku oholwa nguNkk Zandile Gumede uthole indondo e-United Kingdom ngeSonto ngokusebenzela umphakathi ngokungaphezi.UNkk Gumede uthole indondo i-Dkt Benjamin Barber Global Cities Award eGlobal Parliament of Mayors (GPM) eBristol.Indondo inikwa izimeya ngemisebenzi eziyenzayo emikhandlwini eziyiholayo.UNkk Gumede uhlonishwe ngemisebenzi ayenzela umphakathi ikakhulu inhlangano yakhe esiza umphakathi iZandile Gumede Foundation.Emukela indondo uNkk Gumede uthe ujabule ngendondo yokumhlonipha ikakhulu ngosuku lokuzalwa kwengqalabutho yomzabalazo uMama Albertina Sisulu.“Indondo eyentsha nabantu besifazane abangabaholi emhlabeni jikelele abasekhaleni lokufuqa intuthuko. Ngijabule kakhulu ngokuthola indondo ngoba ikhombisa imisebenzi emihle eThekwini ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zezakhamuzi,” kusho uNkk Gumede.Uthe uyazi kunzima ukuba yimeya yesifazane wathi kodwa ngokubambisana kuningi abesifazane abangakwenza.“Izwe lethu likulambele ukuthi abantu abasha babe mdibi munye nobuholi. Ngizobuyela ekhaya nalokhu. Ukuhlobishwa kusho ukuthi umkhandlu uhamba ngendlela eyiyo ekubhekaneni nezinselelo ezibhekene namadolobha. Baningi abantu abasuka emazweni abo bezohlala eThekwini ngezizathu ezehlukene futhi siyahlangabezana nezidingo zabo,” kusho uNkk Gumede.Indondo yasungulwa ukuze kuhlonishwe imikhandlu eyenza kahle ekuphatheni nokuqhakambisa imigomo ebekwe yiGPM.Okhulumela uNkk Gumede, uMnuz Mthunzi Gumede, uthe iTheku lisanda kuhlabana ngezindondo ezine emcimbini iWorld Travel Awards eNkosi Albert Luthuli Convention Centre eThekwini.Uthe ngeledlule bathole izindondo ezimbili kuma-Kamoso Awards, abehlelwe ngumnyango wezemisebenzi yomphakathi, ngohlelo lukazibambele, i-Expanded Public Works Programme.“ITheku yidolobha elikhula ngamandla ekuqhamukeni nezixazululo zokuhlangabezana nemigomo ka-2030 ukuze kuguqulwe impilo yezakhamuzi. Indondo isho ukuthi sizoqhubeka sisebenze ngamandla ukuphucula impilo yabantu edolobheni elithandwa kakhulu iTheku,” kusho uGumede.
title: IMeya yeTheku ithole indondo ngokusebenzela umphakathi

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEU MNDENI wowesifazane oshone kulandela ukulunywa yizinja zakubo uthi bezingabangani bakhe abakhulu njengoba bekunguyena obekwazi ukuzilawula, ukudlala nazo nokuzipha ukudla.UMpho Mokoena (32) ulunywe yizinja zakubo ngoMsombuluko, okugcine kuphoqeleke ukuba amaphoyisa azidubule azibulale ngoba zingasafuni nokusuka eduze kwesidumbu sakhe.Udadewabo kamufi uNkk Mabatho Mokoena-Brown (35) uthe namanje basashaqekile ngalesi sigameko ngoba umufi ubezijwayele kakhulu lezi zinja.“Bezifana nabangani bakhe uMpho lezi zinja. Ubedlala nazo, ezipha ukudla namanzi. Zona bezinolaka uma kukhona umuntu ezingamazi efuna ukungena, nguyena uMpho obekwazi ukuzilawula azithulise.“Ngesikhathi ngithola umbiko wokuthi kunomuntu olunywe yizinja bengizitshela ukuthi ngomunye umuntu. Kusenzima namanje ukususa isithombe sikadadewethu eselimele, eseshonile,” kuchaza uNkk Mokoena-Brown.Uthe lezi zinja zafika kubo ngo-2012 ziseyimidlwane.“Ubaba wathenga lezi zinja ukuze zizosivikela, zivikele kakhulu yena uMpho ngoba ubehlala yedwa isikhathi esiningi ekhaya.“Besingazi ukuthi zizogcina zilimaze umuntu walayikhaya. Kuke kwaba khona isikhathi lapho bekudume iqembu lezigebengu ezibizwa nge-5 Minute Gang, ngakho sasithembe ukuthi izinja ziyosilamulela. Izinja besizithanda kakhulu lapha ekhaya,” kusho uNkk Mokoena-Brown.Umufi kuvele ukuthi ushiye indodana yakhe eneminyaka emithathu, ekade isenkulisa ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko.Umufi ubeyedwa ekhaya ngesikhathi zimhlasela.UNkk Mokoena-Brown uthe ubesanda kumshiya kubo udadewabo ngoba bajima ndawonye. Uthe udadewabo wayefunda ezikoleni zezingane ezinezingqinamba ngokufunda (special school). Ukuchithile ukuthi lezi zinja bezivele zinodlame njengoba zilimaze udadewabo.“Izinja ezijwayelekile lezi. Uma zibona umuntu ezingamazi engena layikhaya ziba nolaka kodwa umuntu ezimjwayele azimxwayi. Izinja ezinkulu ezithanda nokudlala. Kungenzeka udadewethu uzitshele ukuthi ziyadlala naye wabe eseyasondela kuzo, ukube ubezisaba ubengeke asondele kuzo,” kusho uMabatho.Uhlobo lwezinja abebezifuyile ngamaRottweiler amabili neCross Bull Mastiff (ibhova), okuthe noma sekufike amaphoyisa zaqhubeka zagweva zimi eduze kwakhe zaze zadutshulwa.Izidumbu zezinja ziyohlolwa ukuze kubhekwe ukuthi bezingenaso yini isifo esithize.Ngaphandle kwalesi sigameko omunye wesilisa eMgungundlovu naye ubulawe yizinja ezimhlasele ehamba emgwaqweni.NasePhoenix owesilisa uhlaselwe kabi yizinja.Okhulumela abakwa-ER24, uChitra Bodasing, uthe kusemqoka ukuba abanikazi bezinja baqikelele ukuthi zijovelwa amarabi.“Abanikazi bezinja kumele baqikelele ukuthi baziqeqesha kahle. Uma inja isiqala ukungaziphathi ngendlela ejwayelekile, kumele afune usizo lwabanolwazi ngezinja. Izinja kumele kuqikelelwe ukuthi ziyanakekelwa futhi ziyajovelwa amarabi ngaso sonke isikhathi. Uma inja izokuhlasela kumele wehlise umoya, ungayibuki, ungabi nodlame kuze kube iyakushiya,” kusho uBadasing.AbeNational Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals bathe abantu abafuye izinja yibona okumele bathwale umthwalo uma zihlasela abantu ngoba yibona abanikazi bezilwane ezifuywayo.Okunye ongakwenza ukuzivikela uma uhlaselwa yinja:n Ungasondeli kuyo noma uye lapho ihlala khona ngoba ibona sengathi uyayihlasela.n Ungayigqolozeli inja.n Uma ikhonkotha ungayizibi ngoba kukhona okuthize esuke izama ukukuveza.n Uma inja iza kuwe izokuhlasela, kumele ume nse njengesihlahla. Unganyakazi futhi ungazami ukuyilwisa.n Uma ikulume kancane noma inxeba elilodwa nje kumele uye emtholampilo ngokushesha.n Ayikho imithi yokulapha umuntu noma isilwane esisuke sinezimpawu zama-rabi. Yingakho kusemqoka ukuba usheshe uye emtholampilo uma ulunywe yinja.
title: Beziphakelwa nguye obulewe yizinja

text: UMBULELO “Old John” Mabizela ugcine ewuphendulile umbuzo athi baningi abebemhlupha ngawo wokuthi ngabe usalidlala yini ibhola?Izolo lesi sitobha, elingangatshazwa ithalante laso enkundleni, siphumele obala sasho ukuthi sesithi khumu njengomdlali kanobhutshuzwayo.UMabizela (37) wagcina ukubonakala enkundleni ngo-2015 eyibamba kwiRoyal Eagles edlala kwiNational First Division.Kusukela lapho alikho iqembu adlale kulona, okusho ukuthi sekuphele amasizini amabili kungacaci ukuthi usazimisele ngokudlala noma cha.“Ngicabanga ukuthi sekuyisikhathi. Bese ngihlale isikhathi eside ngingadlali futhi nabantu uma ngihlangana nabo bebengibuza ukuthi ngisazodlala yini. Ngemuva kokucabanga kahle ngibonile ukuthi angiphumele obala ngisho ukuthi sengiwagaxa emgibeni amakhokho. Ekuhlaleni kwami kube nzima ukuthi ngithole umsebenzi ekubeni isikhathi siyahamba, uma usuneminyaka engu-36 ngokwaseNingizimu Afrika usuke usumdala,” kusho uMabizela.Uthe yize ethathe lesi sinqumo ngokwakhe uyazizwa ukuthi usengayibamba enkundleni.“Kimina ngaphakathi ngiyazizwa ukuthi ngisangadlala yikhona ukuthi amathuba omsebenzi abengaveli ikakhulukazi kule minyaka esengikuyona kuzoba nzima kakhulu ukuwuthola,” kusho uMabizela.UMabizela wadonsa iso lezinhloli ze-Orlando Pirates eyibamba kwiMaritzburg City kwiSafa Vodacom League idlala kweyokuhlunga eMpumalanga ngo-2001. Ngalawo nyaka eqenjini elalibophele noJimmy Tau bakhuphukela kwiNFD.Ube esethathwa eZimnyama afike kuzo waba umdlali omncane oseke waba ngukaputeni wazo.UMabizela ube ngumdlali weBafana Bafana nakhona wafika wagixabezwa ngebhande. Elinye iqembu abe ngukaputeni walo iBidvest Wits.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe yini abona ukuthi imenze isethenjwa ngebhande, uthe: “Ngicabanga ukuthi indlela ebengiziphatha ngayo enkundleni. Indlela ebengikwazi ukukhuluma ngayo nozakwethu ngikwazi nokuhlela ngayo udonga futhi kube yimina engihamba phambili ikhona okungenze ukaputeni.”Esuka kwiPirates ngo-2003 ujoyine iTottenham Hotspur edlala kwi-English Premiership. Leli qembu lambona kade linomdlalo wobungani neBucs ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini ka-2003/2004.Ngonyaka olandelayo iSpur iyinqamulile inkontileka yakhe esolwa ngokungaziphathi kahle. Washiya enemidlalo eyisishiyagalolunye eshaye igoli elilodwa bebhekene neLeicester City elisabatshazwa namanje.Esebuya kuleli usayine neMamelodi Sundowns nakhona uke wamiswa iSAIDS izinyanga eziyisithupha esolwa ngezidakamizwa. Udlalile kwiPlatinum Stars nakuMaZulu FC ngaphambi kokuphelela kwi-Eagles. Uthe lude kakhulu udaba olwenza wahlukana naleli qembu laseMgungundlovu.“Angikathandi ukukhuluma ngalo,” kusho yena.Njengamanje uthe umatasa nomsebenzi awenza kwiWhizzkids United Health Academy, okuyinhlangano yaseMphithi eluleka izingane ngempilo, kuphinde kuvundululwe ikhono lebhola.KAFUSHANE NGOMABIZELA:Amagama: Mbulelo Old John MabizelaUsuku lokuzalwa: 16 Septhemba 1980 (37 weminyaka)Indawo azalezwe kuyona: EMgungundlovuUbude bakhe: 1.78 mIndawo abeyidlala: Emuva maphakathi, emuva kwesokudla, enkabeni yenkundlaAMAQEMBU AWADLALELE:IminyakaIqembuImidlalo(amagoli)2000-2001Maritzburg City37(6)2001-2003Orlando Pirates51(4)2003-2005Tottenham Hotspur7(1)2005-2006Vålerenga6(0)2006-2008Mamelodi Sundowns16(0)2009-2011Platinum Stars34(0)2011-2012Bidvest Wits28(2)2013Chippa United10(1)2013-2014Black Aces14(1)2015AmaZulu12(4)2015-Royal Eagles
title: USewabeka emgibeni amakhokho u’OJ’

text: ‘NGEKE sikuguqule okucatshangwa abantu ngoba bebuka bengaphandle kodwa ubudlelwano phakathi kwe-Orlando Pirates neLamontville Golden Arrows bufana nento engekho uma unondweba eseyishayile ethi awuqale umdlalo’.Lawa ngamazwi kaMandla Ncikazi oyiphini lomqeqeshi kwi-Arrows ematasa namalungiselelo omdlalo we-Absa Premiership nePirates ngoMgqibelo ngo-8.15 ebusuku eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont.Ngaso sonke isikhathi uma kuzoba nalo mdlalo sekufana nesiko ukuthi abathandi bebhola abathile basebenzise ubudlelwano bosihlalo bala maqembu bebumatanisa nomphumela. Le nkoleloze, ngokusho kukaNcikazi, yinto engekho ngoba bona njengabaqeqeshi ngeke bakwazi ukutshela abadlali ukuthi abadedele amaphuzu.Lo mdlalo ufika ngesikhathi esibi lapho iPirates iwadinga kakhulu amaphuzu kwazise isembangweni wesicoco seligi, kanti nakwi-Arrows adingeka ngendlela efanayo ngoba iyacaca indlela ebheke kwi-Top 8 yinqobo nje uma benqoba.“Akulona iqiniso ukuthi siyayipha amaphuzu iPirates. Uma abantu bezwana ngokomsebenzi akusho ukuthi nasenkundleni lobo bungani buyasebenza. Ngeke utshele abadlali ukuthi abadlalele ukushaywa. Siyakuqonda ukuthi sisezingeni lebhola elikhokhelayo ngakho konke esikwenzayo sikwenza ngendlela enjalo. Siyihlulile iPirates ngesizini edlule kodwa akekho oke washo okuthile. Singabangani sibaningi njengoSteve (Komphela) noRulani (Mokwena) kwazise basebenze ndawonye kwiPlatinum Stars kodwa lokhu akusho ukuthi ubungani buzoqhubeka noma umdlalo usuqhubeka,” usho kanje lo mqeqeshi.Nakuba ekubalula ukuthi bayayihlonipha iPirates njengeqembu elikhulu futhi eliqeqeshwa ngendlela eseqophelweni eliphezulu kodwa uthumele isexwayiso esishubile kuyona.“Engikubona emehlweni abadlali kungiqinisa idolo. Kuzofanele igawule ibheke iPirates ngoba siwabheke ngamehlo abomvu la maphuzu. Bangalokothi basizele ngobuso ngoba bazozisola. Sibafisela okuhle kodwa nakanjani amaphuzu kuzofanele asale lapha eThekwini. Okungijabulisayo manje asisadlali ngoba kukhona esikuvikayo kepha sesidlala ngoba kukhona esibonayo ukuthi singakuzuza. Yinhle indlela esidlala ngayo futhi uma sizokwenza ngale ndlela engiyibona ejimini, nakanjani sizonqoba,” kusonga uNcikazi.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiersship:Kusasa: Maritzburg United v AmaZulu FC (Harry Gwala Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: Mamelodi Sundowns v Bloemfontein Celtic (Loftus Versfeld Stadium, 3.30pm); Kaizer Chiefs v Highlands Park (Moses Mabhida Stadium, 6pm); Free State Stars v Black Leopards (Goble Park, 6pm); Golden Arrows v Orlando Pirates (Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium, 8.15pm); Bidvest Wits v Cape Town City FC (Bidvest Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Baroka FC v Polokwane City (Peter Mokaba Stadium, 3.30pm); Chippa United v SuperSport United (Sisa Dukashe Stadium, 3.30pm)
title: Ingalokothi isizele ngobuso iBucs: Ncikazi

text: UMBANGO wemali nezikhundla emabandleni yisona sihlava esenza amakholwa azithole esebulalana esikhundleni sokubambana agqugquzele ukuphila ezinhliziyweni phakathi kwamanye amakholwa.Uxwayise kanje uSolwazi David Musoma ongusihlalo yeKhomishini ebhekele ukuvikela amalungelo omphakathi kwezemaSiko, ezeNkolo nezeziLimi kulandela isehlakalo sokubulawa ngokudutshulwa kwamalungu amahlanu ebandla i-International Pentecostal Holiness Church ekoMkhulu lalo iZuurbekom ngase Goli ngoMgqibelo.Ngaphandle kombango wemali nezikhundla, uMusoma uthe kunengozi enkulu ngamabandla okuthiwa alawulwa umoya, futhi  aphethwe umuntu othile ngaphandle kokulandela umthetho sisekelo webandla.“Inkinga ekhona ngalawa mabandla aphethwe abantu ebe engenawo umthethosisekelo, ahlale enezinkinga ngaso sonke isikhathi. Ukube umthethosisekelo ubukade ukhona kuleli bandla, ngabe ayenzekanga le nto,” kusho uMusoma.Unxuse amabandla angenawo umthethosisekelo enze isiqinseko sokuthi aba nawo ukugwema isimo esifana nalesi.Esehlakalweni esenzeke kuleli bandla, amaphoyisa asebophe abantu abangu-40 okusolwa ukuthi bangamalungu eqembu afuna kuphathe umholi wawo.Phakathi kwababoshiwe ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke uBrigadier Vishnu Naidoo, kukhona iphoyisa nesosha.Kulesi sigameko amaphoyise ashaqe inqwaba yezibhamu nezinhlamvu ezingekho emthethweni.UKhomishana kazwelonke wamaphoyisa uGeneral Khehla Sitole, uthe ukungenelela kwamaphoyisa kulesi sigameko, kusize ukugwema ukuchitheka kwegazi okwedlulele kulokhu kuhlasela.UMusoma uthe kuyimanje kusenenkinga enkulu ngombango wozothatha isikhundla sokwengamelela leli bandla eseliqembukelene kathathu ngenxa yokulawulwa ngabantu, esikhundleni sokulawulwa umthethosisekelo webandla.“Isonto akumele liphendulwe inkundla yokukulwa. Sisazophinde sihlangane nezinhlangothi ezilwayo ukuthola isixazululo. Sizosebenzisa wona uMqulu oNgcwele abathi isonto lasungulwa ngokulandela wona ngenhloso yokuthola isixazululo,” kusho yena.NgokukaMusoma, bake bezama phambilini ukungenelela ukuxazulula umbango waleli bandla ngenkathi leli bandla lisaqembukelene kabili.UMusoma uthe kungumsebenzi wabo ukungenelela ezimeni ezifana nalezi, kwazise amanye amabandla awabhalisiwe ngokusemthethweni, aziwa ngokuthi aphethwe wumndeni othile okugcina sekuholelele embangweni wokuchitheka kwegazi.
title: Kugqugquzelwa amabandla asungule umthethosisekelo ngenhloso yokugwema imibango nokuhlaselana

text: OWAYENGUMENGAMELI uMnuz Jacob Zuma kulindeleke ukuthi avele kwiKhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana yize ekhathazekile ngoSihlalo wayo uJaji Raymond Zondo.UZuma usabise ngokuthi uzofaka isicelo sokuba ijaji lingabe lisaqhubeka nokulalela ubufakazi bakhe. Ummeli kaZuma, uMnuz Eric Mabuza, uthe uzosifaka namhlanje isicelo.NgoLwesihlanu umabhalane wekhomishini, uSolwazi Itumeleng Mosala, umemezele ukuthi amasamanisi abizela uZuma kule khomishini akhishwa ngenyanga edlule ayiswa emzini kaZuma eNkandla.UZuma udingeka kwikhomishini ngo-10 ekuseni phakathi koMsombuluko nongoLwesihlanu.“Kwabekwa kwacaca ukuthi uma uZuma ehlela ukuba akhulume evele kwi-video ayikho inkinga ngoba uzobe ehloniphe umyalelo wokuba azovela kwikhomishini,” kusho uSolwazi Mosala.Uthe uZuma, akakaze aphendule noma atshele ummeli wakhe ukuthi uzokwenzenjani ngamasamanisi.
title: UZuma kulindeleke avele kwiKhomishini kaZondo

text: INKAMPANI ekhiqiza amanzi i-Umgeni Water, seyikuqinisekisile ukuthi kunabasebenzi bayo abane abasenhloko hhovisi layo eMgungundlovu asebetholakale negciwane leCovid-19. Abokuqala batholakala ngoJuni 19 kwathi abanye batholakala ngeSonto. Kodwa lokhu akuphazamisanga ukusabalaliswa kwamanzi komasipala nasekuhlanzeni indle. Okhulumela le nkampani uShami Harichunder uthe bane abasebenzi abasekuvalelweni futhi iziphathimandla zale nkampani zilokhu zixhumana nabo. Uthe balandele yonke imigomo ephathelene neCovid-19 njengokuhlolwa kwabasebenzi. "Ibhilidi lapho abasebenzi abathintekayo besebenzela kulo lihlanzwe ngesibulalimagciwane. Bonke ozakwabo akade bexhumene nabo bahlonziwe futhi kwakhulunywa nabo ngemigomo elandelwayo ngeCovid-19 nohlelo oluzolandelwa uma bekhombisa izimpawu." Uthe ucwaningo lwabo luveze ukuthi lesi sifo asivumbukanga ehhovisi labo elikhulu. Uthe ngoLwesithathu izikhulu eziphezulu zale nkampani zithathe isinqumo sokuvala inhlokohhovisi nelinye ibhilidi elikuBurger Street, okuhlala kulo abasebenzi baseMgeni Water ukuze kuhlanzwe kakhulu. "Lonke uhlelo luzophuthulwa ngeSonto. Umgeni Water uyaxhumana noMnyango wezeMpilo ngazo zonke izinhlelo zokunqanda igciwane. Abasebenzi baseMgeni Water abakulamabhilidi bacelwe ukuthi basebenzela emakhaya." Uthe konke kumi ngomumo ukunqanda ukusabalala kwegciwane. Uthe lezi zinhlelo zisiza kakhulu ekungaphazamisekeni kwemisebenzi okulethela abantu amanzi ngesikhathi kuvikelwa abasebenzi egciwaneni.
title: Kuvalwe amabhilidi akwaMgeni Water kuhaqeka abasebenzi bawo abane

text: UBUDLELWANO obakhiwa yisikhulu esiphezulu saMaZulu FC, uLunga Sokhela, neqembu laseSpain iRCD Espanyol, bungase buvulele amathuba abadlali boSuthu ukuthi bayodlala phesheya kwezilwandle.USokhela uveze lokhu ngemuva kohambo lwakhe lwaseSpain emasontweni ambalwa edlule. uthe sebexoxile ne-Espanyol sekusele izinto ezimbalwa osekufanele bavumelane ngazo.USokhela uthe bazama ubudlelwano ne-Espanyol bokuthi kuqalwe inkulisa yeqembu eNingizimu Afrika. Lokhu kuzovula amathuba okuthi okungenani abadlali abambalwa baye eSpain bayozama inhlanhla njalo uma kuphela isizini.Uthe okunye abakuhlelayo ne-Espanyol wukuthi njalo uma sekuvalwe isizini, ezakhe zivakashele eSpain ziyodlala umdlalo wesihle. Ngonyaka olandelayo iqembu laseSpain kube yilona elivakasha eNingizimu Afrika.“Ziningi izinto esizibheke ukuthi sisizane ngazo ne-Espanyol. Okokuqala nje wukuthi siqale inkulisa eNingizimu Afrika khona sizonikeza abadlali bethu ababili noma abathathu ukuthi bathole ithuba lokuyodlala phesheya. Ngaba nenhlanhla yokuthi ngibuke bukhoma umdlalo wabo neVillarreal CF. Ngigculiseke kakhulu ngengikubonile, impela bakwesinye isigaba. Siyethemba ukuthi kungekudala sizofinyelela esivumelwaneni ne-Espanyol,” usho kanje uSokhela.Bekungelona iqembu lokuqala laphesheya uSokhela afuna ubudlelwano nalo. Uke waya ePortugal eyonxusa iSporting Portugal. Nokho uthe kunezinto ezagcina zenze ukuthi bangavumelani.“Siyile ePortugal, sakhuluma neSporting Portugal. Nokho okusilimazile yingqalasizinda abakhale ngokuthi ayikho ezingeni. Isimo leso esizama ukusilungisa ngokushesha noMasipala weTheku ngoba siyasilimaza kakhulu. Phesheya kwezilwandle kuwusiko ukuthi abantu bendawo nabalandeli basondelane neqembu labo. Lapha uthi uvuka ekuseni izingane sezimile, ntambama zigcwele izindawo zokucima ukoma,” ubeke kanje uSokhela.Uthe unethemba ukuthi uMasipala weTheku uzobasiza kakhulu ngoba eminye imikhandlu iyawasiza amaqembu angaphansi kwayo.“Eminye imikhandlu iyawasiza amaqembu ayo, uma ubuka eKapa, eMgungundlovu, Bloemfontein naseNelson Mandela Bay. Ngakho lobu budlelwano bethu ne-Espanyol buzosisiza kakhulu njengeqembu,” kusho uSokhela.USokhela uphinde wacacisa okumenze wakhetha iqembu laseSpain ebe ekhona amanye amaqembu ezwenikazi i-Europe.“Indlela i-Espanyol edlala ngayo, ithi ayifane nendlela oSuthwini esidlala ngayo. Ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi siyisondeze. Esinye isizathu wukuthi iqembu liyakholelwa ekukhuliseni abadlali abancane ngoba isifiso sethu ukubona abadlali bethu bekhula beyodlala e-Europe,” kusho uSokhela.
title: Ithuba laphesheya kubadlali boSuthu

text: ZISHINTSHILE izolo izibalo zamalungu aphakamise uDkt Dlamini Zuma KwaZulu-Natal kwesokuhola i-ANC engqungqutheleni yale nhlangano eqala ngelizayo ngemuva kwezikhalo zamagatsha ngokungabalwa kwamanye amagatsha engqungqutheleni yesifundazwe iProvincial General Council (PGC). Ngemuva kokubalwa kabusha, uDkt Dlamini Zuma usephakanyiswe amagatsha angu-454 esuka ku-433 abewutholile kwathi imbangi yakhe iphini likamengameli le-ANC uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa waphakanyiswa amagatsha angu-191 esuka ku-193.UDkt Zweli Mkhize ulale isithathu ngamagatsha ayisithupha amphakamisile kwesobumengameli.UMnuz David Mabuza, ophakanyiselwe kwesephini likamengameli obethole amavoti angu-434 usethole angu-449 ngemuva kokubalwa kabusha. UMkhize uphakanyiswe ngamagatsha angu-64 kwesephini likamengameli njengoba phambilini ubephakanyiswe amagatsha angu-59.UNkk Naledi Pandor, yena usephakanyiswe amagatsha angu-51 kwesephini likamengameli njengoba phambilini izibalo beziveza ukuthi ubephakanyiswe amagatsha angu-53.UNksz Bontle Mpakanyane, wekhomishini yezokhetho uthe bekunezikhalo ezifundeni iMoses Mabhida nabaQulusi.Uthe abanye onobhala bezifunda beze kubona ngemuva kokwethula izibalo bakhala ngokuthi kukhona into engahambanga kahle ngesikhathi kubalwa.Uqhube wathi eThekwini mane amagatsha abezoqala phansi abambe ingqungquthela ngakho izibalo zikhomba ukuthi angu-92 asehlalile."EMoses Mabhida besithole ukuthi angu-17 amagatsha abenqume ukungakhethi kodwa sathi uma sesibheka amafomu amathathu afika neziphakamiso, elinye lisuke liya kwi-PGC, elinye liya kuzwelonke kuthi elinye elegatsha sawathola kwamanye amabhokisi abeseceleni. Lawa mafomu abekhishiwe kulawa obekumele abe kuwona kodwa sikwazile ukuwahlanganisa namanye." IPhini likaSihlalo le-ANC esifundazweni uMnuz Willies Mchunu, utshele amalungu abalelwa ku-700 abekule ngqungquthela ukuthi kukhona into engahambanga kahle ngezibalo ezikhishwe ngoMsombuluko ebusuku. Unxuse abamele ukhetho kuthi beze bezoveza izibalo ezintsha ngemuva kokulungisa leli phutha.UMnuz Nathi Mtthethwa, ophakanyiselwe kwesokuba usihlalo kazwelonke we-ANC usephakanyiswe amagatsha angu-371 esuka kwangu-358.UMnuz Ace Magashule, ophakanyiselwe ukuba nguNobhala uphakanyiswe amagatsha angu-427 esuka ku-410 kwathi kwathi uMnuz Senzo Mchunu obephakanyiselwe kulesi sikhundla izibalo zamagatsha amphakamisile zangashintsha zama ku-192.UNksz Jessie Duarte, ophakanyiselwe kwesephini likanobhala uphakanyiswe amagatsha angu-372 esuka ku-357.UNkk Nomvula Mokonyane ophakanyiselwe kwesikaMgcinimafa usephakanyiswe amagatsha angu-302 njengoba phambilini ebethole amavoti angu-289. UMchunu uthe kubalulekile ukuthi kubhekwe ubunjalo bezibalo ukuze kungabi nongabazane. Unobhala we-ANC Youth League esifundazweni uMnuz Thanduxolo Sabela, ukhale ngokuthi kukhona obekushaya amanzi ngezibalo njengoba kukhona abebefuna ukunyusa izibalo zikaRamaphosa. Nakuba izibalo zishintshile esifundazweni kodwa uRamaphosa usahamba phambili ngezibalo kuzwelonke njengoba esemi ku-1 860 kwathi uDkt Dlamini Zuma wanyuka esuka ku-1 309 wama ku-1 330.
title: Uhamba phambili kwesobumengameli eKZN uDkt Dlamini Zuma

text: OWUQWEQWE lomhlaziyi webhola kuSABC, uChristopher Bongo, uphonsela inselelo umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uSteve Komphela, ngokuthi akayeke “ubugwala” aqoke iphini lomqeqeshi onamava ozokwazi ukumcebisa ngamacebo aphusile azomsiza ekuholeni leli qembu ngempumelelo.UKomphela uye ekhefini likaKhisimusi isibindi sithe gidi emva kokuba ezakhe zivuke emaqandeni zanqoba imidlalo emibili yeligi ilandelana zishaya iPolokwane City ngo 3-2 neLamontville Golden Arrows ngo 2-0.Ukunqoba kwaMakhosi imidlalo emibili kuwakhweze endaweni yesine ku-log ye-Absa Premiership nokumanje asehlukaniswe ngamaphuzu amane kuphela neSupersport United esahlezi phezulu ku-log.“USteve ungumqeqeshi ophokophelele impumelelo kwezokuqeqesha futhi ozimiselayo emsebenzini wakhe naphezu kwenselelo abhekene nayo eqenjini aliqeqeshayo njengamanje iKaizer Chiefs.“Eqinisweni nje eliphelele, akubanga yisinqumo esiphusile ukuqoka kwakhe uJohn Paintsil ongenamava ekuqeqesheni njengephini lakhe eqenjini elikhulu njengeChiefs. Ngemuva kokuyeka kukaDoctor Khumalo njengephini lakhe bekufanele azame ukuthola omunye umqeqeshi onamava ozokwazi ukumcebisa ngamacebo aphusile,” kusho uBongo.“Akukhona ukuthi ngimbukela phansi uPaintsil kodwa iqiniso wukuthi akakabi nawo amava ekuqeqesheni, ngakho uSteve ubemdinga umqeqeshi onamava njengoKhumalo. Noma singasazi isizathu okuyisona ngempela esiholele ekutheni uKhumalo ayeke ukuba yiphini likaKomphela kodwa mina kuyangicacela ukuthi uKomphela akalifuni iphini lomqeqeshi elizomnika inselelo ezinqumweni nasemaqhingeni awasebenzisayo.”UBongo wayengumgadli eqenjini lesizwe laseRepublic of The Congo (Brazzaville) eminyakeni edlule.  “Kufanele uKomphela ayeke ubugwala abonele kumqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, owathatha isinqumo sokuqoka umqeqeshi onamava njengoManqoba Mngqithi. UMngqithi ngokwakhe ungumqeqeshi ophelele okwaziyo ukuzimela kodwa uMosimane wakhetha ukusebenzisana naye ngoba esibona isidingo sokusebenzisana nendoda ezokwazi ukumcebisa ngamasu aphusile. Buka ukuthi iSundowns ikuphi manje ngaphansi kobuholi bukaMosimane noMngqithi,” kuqhuba uBongo. UPaintsil, ozakhele igama eseyisiqongqwane sasemuva eqenjini lesizwe laseGhana nasemaqenjini ase-England okubalwa kuwo iWest Ham United neLeicester City, udlale amasizini amabili kuMaritzburg Unitedngaphambi kokuwagaxa emgibeni amakhokho ngasekupheleni kwesizini edlule. Ezinye izinkakha zaMakhosi, okubalwa kuzo uPollen Ndlanya, zashaya amakhala “ngokuqheliswa” kukaKhumalo wuKomphela ngaphambi kokuqala kwale sizini, zichaza lokhu njengokuzimbela igodi kwalo mqeqeshi.Yize uKhumalo ayichitha          eyokungahoshelani kwakhe noKomphela njengesizathu sokushenxa kwakhe kwesokuba yiphini lomqeqeshi kuChiefs engxoxweni aba nayo neThe Star ngoJulayi kodwa umthombo waleli phephandaba elinguzakwabo weSolezwe, wakuveza ukuthi ukungaboni ngaso linye phakathi kukaKhumalo noKomphela yikho kanye okwaholela ekutheni (uKhumalo) ashenxe  abuyele ekusebenzeni nabadlali abasakhuliswa kuleli qembu laseNaturena. Ngaphambi kokuthatha kwakhe izintambo zokuqeqesha kuChiefs, uKomphela wayehlongoza uMandla Ncikazi ayesebenze naye ngempumelelo kuMaritzburg United kumasizi edlule, njengokunguyena ayefuna ukusebenza naye kuMakhosi. Nokho kuvela ukuthi wehluleka ukudonsela lo mqeqeshi eNaturena njengoba akhetha ukubuyela kuLamontville Golden Arrows lapho eyiphini likaClinton Larsen. UNcikazi wayeyiphini likaManqoba Mngqithi ku-Arrows isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuya kuMaritzburg.
title: 'USteve udinga iphini elinamava'

text: BEZINGAHLUKANI izithandani zaKwaMashu ezife ngemuva kokuthi umjondolo ebezilele kuwo udilikelwe wudonga lwamabhulokisi okubiywe ngalo umuzi ngoMgqibelo.UMnuz Ndumiso Hadebe, intombi yakhe, uNksz Ntokozo Ngema, nengane yabo eneminyaka emithathu, * -Inathi Ngema, obedlaliswa ngokuthi uRose, bapitshizwe wudonga belele emjondolo kathayela ongaphandle komuzi wakubo, kwa L KwaMashu, ngoMgqibelo ekuseni.Umuzi wakwaNgema nowakwaHadebe yakhelene. UNksz Ngema, obenezinyanga eziyisishiyagalombili ezithwele, ubelala esokeni lakhe zonke izinsuku.Ugogo kaNksz Ngema, uNkk Phiki Mhlongo, uthe umzukulu ubehambe ngoLwesihlanu.“Besizitshela ukuthi uzobuya ekuseni njengenjwayelo. ngizwe ngesililo nje sekumenyezwa sekuwe udonga. Sifike emuva kwendaba sebeshonile. Lungibulele lolu donga bese nginethemba lokuthi uNtokozo uzoqeda ukufunda bese ethola umsebenzi, asize izingane zakubo,” kusho uNkk Mhlongo.Uthe uNksz Ngema uzalwa yindodakazi yakhe eyashona. Bayisithupha kwabo, akekho kubo osebenzayo, baphila ngemali yakhe yempesheni.UNksz Ncamisile Hadebe * -anti kamufi ohlala eRichmond Farm uthe ufonelwe umakhelwane ethi akaphuthume kuwe udonga.“Ngithe ngisalungiselela ukuphuma waphinda umakhelwane wafona ebuza ukuthi ngikuphi. Ngemuva kwakhe bengizwa amazwi abantu abakhalayo, ngathi uma ngimbuza ukuthi pho kukhalelwani uma kuwe udonga. Wangaphenduli waluvala ucingo,” kusho uNksz Hadebe.UNKSZ Ntokozo Ngema oshone nengane yakhe nesoka lakhe bepitshizwa wudongaUthe ngesikhathi efika bese kugcwele igceke amaphoyisa nabezimo eziphuthumayo.“Ngizibonele ngifika ukuthi kukhona oshonile ngoba bekukhona nemoto yezidumbu,” kusho uNksz Hadebe.Uthe umufi ubeke wamtshela ukuthi udonga alusaqinile ngesikhathi kunezikhukhula ebezihlasele eThekwini ngenyanga edlule.Uthe umeluleke ngokuthi ababuye azolala endlini ngoba akuphephile.“Ubelokhu ethi uzobuya kwaze kwenzeka ingozi engakabuyi. NgoMgqibelo kuthiwa wavuka ngo-5, wangena endlini, wabuye wabuyela emjondolo kunina wangena yakhe. Ngemuva kwemizuzu embalwa ebuyele emjondolo kuzwakele udonga, luwa.”UHadebe ubeziphilisa ngokudayisa, intombi yakhe beyenza unyaka wesibili kwi-Travel and Tourism, eThekwini College.UNksz Hadebe uthe umufi ubengeke akwazi ukuphila ngaphandle kwentombi yakhe ngendlela abebethandana ngayo.“Kusho ukuthi uNkulunkulu ubonile ukuthi uNdumiso ubengeke akwazi ukuphila ngaphandle kwentombi yakhe nengane ukube bapitshizwe wumjondolo ngesikhathi esaphumile. Wabona kungcono bahambe bonke,” ehlengezela izinyembezi.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, ozifikele mathupha kulo muzi udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini.Ululeke umphakathi ukuthi uhlale uqaphila njalo uma lina.Khonamanjalo, izangoma zixwayisa ngokuduma kwezulu kusasa, ngoLwesihlanu nangoMgqibelo. Isangoma sezulu, uMnuz Wisani Maluleke, sithe kulindeleleke ukuthi kube nezihlambi zemvula njalo ntambama kuze kube nguMgqibelo. Ube esexwayisa abahlala ezindaweni ezijwayelwe wumbani ukuthi baqaphe.
title: Badilikelwe wudonga bafa

text: UMCULI osezakhele udumo ngomculo obizwa ngeGqomu uthi uthuke koma nasozwaneni ebona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi uqokwe emikhakheni eyehlukene kuma-16th Metro FM Music Awards, abeseBrynston, The Campus, eGoli ngoLwesibili ebusuku nokuyinto athi ubengazi lutho ngayo.UBongekile “Babes Wodumo” Simelane, uthi usizwe izinkundla zokuxhumana ukuze abone ukuthi kunalo mcimbi futhi kukhona neminxa aqokwe kuyo.Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi namanje isabalimaza indaba yemenenja ababeyiqashile njengoba eminye imicimbi bezwa ngayo isidlulile.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngokuqokwa kwami. Ngibonga bonke abantu abangixhasile yize bengingazi ngendaba yomcimbi kodwa ngisizwe ukungena ezinkundleni zokuxhumana naku-website yakwaMetro ngabona ukuthi ngiqokwe eminxeni emingaki,” kusho uBabes Wodumo.Uthe abazi noma bebemenyiwe yini emcimbini wangoLwesibili ukuze bezozizwela ngawabo ukuthi ikhona yini iminxa abakuyo.“Ngizimisele ukuthi ngizibambele mathupha kwezinye izinto ezithinta umsebenzi wami. Njengoba abantu bekhombise ukungithanda kangaka kumele ngisebenze kanzima, ngabe angiqokiwe kule minxa ukube abalandeli bami abakhombisanga ukungithanda, kwi-albhamu yokuqala,” kuchaza uBabes.Uthe ubonga lonke ithimba asebenze nalo ngesikhathi behlanganisa i-albhamu yakhe.Unxuse abantu ukuthi bamvotele ngoba angathanda ukuhamba nazo zonke lezi zindondo.Nentokazi eyagqama ohlelweni ama-Idols, * -Amanda Black, nayo ithe ibone ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi kukhona iminxa eqokwe kuyo.U-Amanda uqokwe eminxeni eminingi kulo mcimbi.Uthe ubengekho yize ebemenyiwe wabanjwa yizinto ebezidinga abe nomndeni wakhe.“Ngijabule kakhulu angazi nokuthi ngithini. Kodwa abantu ngibakhuthaza ukuthi bangayeki ukukholelwa emaphusheni abo,” kusho Amanda.Uthe angakujabulela ukunqoba kuyona yonke iminxa aqokwe kuyona. UVuyo Mthembu wakwaSABC uthe izimemo bazikhiphela zonke izinkampani ezinabaculi abaqokiwe.
title: UBabes Wodumo ubengazi ngoweMetro

text: UNgqongqoshe walo mnyango, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, izolo uthe kunenqwaba yabasebenzi bezempilo abahlala ezikhungweni ezingaphakathi ezibhedlela nasemitholampilo kungasafanele.Uthe lezi zikhungo ezikhokhisa kancane ngezokuhlala abasebenzi abahlala kude nalapho besebenza khona noma abanezinkinga ezithile.“Abasebenzi abahlala kulezi zindawo baba nesivumelwano seminyaka ethile naleso sikhungo abasebenza kuso. Esikutholayo ukuthi kunabantu abahlala kulezi zindawo kuze kuphele iminyaka eyishumi, abanye baze bathathe umhlalaphansi ekubeni kunabasebenzi abasebencane abasuke beyidinga indawo yokuhlala. Lezi zindawo azenele ukuthi bonke abafisayo ukuhlala kuzo bavunyelwe ukuthi bahlale. Kusetshenziswa uhlelo oluthile lokuhlunga abafanele ukuhlala, nabo akusho ukuthi bazohlala unomphela kodwa bakalelwa isikhathi. Kuleso sikhathi kusuke kucatshangelwa ukuthi leyo nkinga umsebenzi abenayo iyobe isilungile. Sithole ukuthi kunabahlala ezikhungweni zokuhlala zezibhedlela abangasasebenzi kuzo okuyinto engavumelekile,” kuchaza uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Usho kanje ngemuva kokuthi ebuzwe ngabasebenzi basesibhedlela eWentworth okuthiwa baxoshiwe endaweni ehlala abasebenzi ekulesi sibhedlela. Imibiko ibithi bakhishelwe ukuthi kufakwe odokotela abebefunda eCuba.“Ukukhishwa kwabasebenzi okungafanele ukuthi bahleli kulesi sibhedela akuhlangene nodokotela baseCuba futhi abakhishwa kulesi sibhedlela kuphela kodwa bakhishwa kuzo zonke izikhungo zezempilo uma kutholakale ukuthi akusamele ukuthi bahlale khona futhi lokho kusazoqhubeka,” kusho yena.UNkk Simelane-Zulu usho lokhu esithangamini sabezindaba ebesibizwe uNdunankulu walesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, izolo.Ubuye wacacisa ngodokotela abangu-27 baseCuba abasebenza kulesi sifundazwe wathi bazoqhubeka basebenze kulesi sifundazwe noma izibalo zabahaqwa yiCovid-19 sezehlile.“Labo dokotela bayasisiza kakhulu ngoba iningi labo bangodokotela abakwaziyo ukubhekana nokubheduka kwezifo kanti bayashoda esifundazweni. Emkhakheni wezempilo ozimele bakhona kodwa imali abadinga ukukhokhelwa yona asikwazi ukuyikhokha njengomnyango, yikho sikhethe ukugcina laba. Okunye okwenza ukuthi sibagcine ukuthi sisafuna ukubona ukuthi leli gciwane aliphinde libuye ngamandla yini njengoba imithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe isixegisiwe,” kusho uNkk Simelane -Zulu.UZikalala uthe ukwehlela esigabeni sokuqala sokuvalwa kwezwe akusho ukuthi izwe selivuwe.Uqhube wathi imisebenzi eminingi esigabeni sokuqala kuvumelekile ukuthi yenziwe njengoba nabasebenzi bonke bakahulumeni kumele babuyele emsebenzini.“Abaphathi balawo mahhovisi kahulumeni abesavaliwe kumele benze izinhlelo zokuthi kuzosetshenzwa kanjani ngoba kusadingeka ukuthi abantu baqhelelane,” kusho uZikalala.
title: Incazelo ngokukhishwa kwabasebenzi bezempilo

text: BAGQUGQUZELWE yizimo zasemakhaya abafundi abadabule o-A abangu- 8 ezifundweni zabo zika-matric umuntu ngamunye. Abafundi baseSibusisiwe Comprehensive Technical High eMbumbulu bashaye into ecokeme ezifundweni zabo.UFisani Gumede (16), Londeka Duma (17) no-Anele Mthethwa (17) bathi bakhuliswa omama ngabodwana nokwenze bakukhuthalela ukushintsha isimo sabo.Laba bafundi sebevele bamukeliwe ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme kanti badudene ngokuyofunda iBCom Accounting e-University of Cape Town.Bathole o-A kwisiZulu, English, Maths, Life Orientation, Accounting, Geography, Life Sciences, nePhysical Sciences.Bonke bakhala ngokuthi bafuna ukuphucula izimo zasemakhaya ngokufunda enyuvesi bese bethola imisebenzi ezobaphilisa.UWiseman Ngubane obefunda eZwelibanzi High eMlaza udabule o-A abayisishiyagalombili.Lo mfundi obeyinduna yabafundi uthi ugqugquzelwe yisimo sakubo esingesihle.Uthole o-A kwisiZulu, English, Maths, LO, Agricultural Sciences, Geography, Maritime Studies nePhyscial Sciences.“Ngazitshela nje ukuthi kufanele ngishintshe isimo ekhaya ngoba ubaba akekho ngikhuliswa umama yedwa. Ngibonga nothisha abahlale besimele ngemuva bethi asifunde’’ kuchaza uWiseman, kubonakala ukuthi uchichima injabulo ebusweni.
title: Isimo sasekhaya senze bagila izimanga ngo-A

text: U-DJ Maphorisa uzithola ekulolu taku nje kungenxa yezinsolo zokunqwaha noR20 000 wenkampani ehlela imicimbi iKROM ethi yamkhokhela ngonyaka odlule.I-KROM ithi yayiqasha kuMaphorisa uMlindo The Vocalist ukuba ayonandisa emcimbini okwakufanele ube ngoDisemba ngonyaka odlule.UMphile Dube weKROM, uthe bazolwa kuze kufike ekugcineni.“UMaphorisa uyaseya ngoba siyizingane futhi sibasha kwezikaqedisizungu. Sesiside isikhathi simncenga ukuthi abuyise imali yethu kodwa lutho, asisabise maqede asibhlokhe ocingweni,” kusho uMphile. Leli phephandaba liyibonile ikhophi yencwadi enesigxivizo sangoJuni 24, senkantolo yamacala emali.UMphile uthe uMaphorisa umthumele kuWhatsApp incwadi ngoba akalazi ikheli lakhe.“Ngimthumele kwiWhatsApp, kwavela ukuthi uyibonile ngokuthi kuvele imigqa eluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka kodwa wangangiphendula,” kuchaza uMphile.Isolezwe ngeSonto nalo lenzeke esifanayo limbuza kuWhatsApp ngezinsolo, wafunda umyalezo maqede walibhlokha.Isolezwe ngeSonto libikile phambilini ngesikhalo sale nkampani eyakhiwe amabhobhodlana uSandile Motha, Siyabonga Dube noMphile.UMphile uthe babehlele umcimbi owawuzoba enkundleni eLukwatini kuzonandisa uMlindo The Vocalist nabanye abaculi bendawo.“UMaphorisa wanquma uR20 000. Sayikhokha imali saqala ngoR16 000 idiphozi esayifaka eCapitec.Kwasijabulisa ukubona ukuthi kuvela igama lakhe elithi Themba Sekowe ngesikhathi siyifaka, sabona ukuthi iya kuyena ngqo. Sekusondele izinsuku zomcimbi safaka uR4 000,” kusho uMphile.Uthe izinkinga zaqala sekufanele baqophe i-video ababezoyifaka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Uthe uMaphorisa wayesedelela abuye ababhlokhe ocingweni. Uveze ukuthi kwaphoqa ukuthi umcimbi umiswe.Phambilini uMaphorisa waphendula kwiWhatsApp waqala wathi akayazi iKROM.Ngemuva kwesikhathi wathi: “Ngiyabazi labo bantu. Banentombazane eyayizama ukungiyenga, ifuna ukulala nami ukuze bangakhokhi ngokunandisa kukaMlindo.”Wathumela nenqwaba yengxoxo phakathi kwakhe nabale nkampani. Kodwa wangafuna ukuphawula mayelana nemali okuthiwa wayikhokhelwa wathunyelwa nobufakazi basebhange.
title: UDJ Maphorisa obishini ngokugweva nemali

text: SELULELWE kuLwesihlanu isikhathi sohlelo lokubhaliswa kwezitshudeni eziqalayo esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme iDurban University of Technology (DUT), okwakumenyezelwe ukuthi kuvalwe ngesonto eledlule.Lokhu kuqinisekiswe wuMqondisi omkhulu ehhovisi lezokuxhumana eDUT uSolwazi Alan Khan, esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba. UKhan uthe ukubhalisa kuzoqhubeka ngohlelo lwezobuchwepheshe olungavumeli ukuthi kubhaliselwe ezikhungweni. Uveze ukuthi luqala namuhla uhlelo lokufunda kwizitshudeni eziqalayo kule nyuvesi esezivele zibhalisile, wathi nalo luzobe lwenzeka ngalo uhlelo lwezobuchwepheshe, ngeke luqhutshwe emakilasini.“Lokhu kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo lokufunda lwalo nyaka luphothulwa ngempumelelo ngesikhathi esifanele. Kuyaqapheleka ukuthi ingxenye enkulu yezitshudeni ezizofunda okokuqala isibhalisile,”  kusho uKhan.Uthe uhlelo lokufundela emakhaya kwezitshudeni ebezivele zifunda kule nyuvesi, luqale ngoMashi 29.Umbhikisho wezitshudeni wangesonto eledlule ebezikhala ngokugqoza kohlelo lokubhalisa nokubuyiselwa emuva kwezinkumbi zabebezobheka izikhala, kuholele ekutheni inyuvesi ithathe isinqumo sokuvala izikhungo zayo ezinhlanu eziseThekwini.
