Ukugcwala ngokweqile kwenyuvesi  kulethe itwetwe njengoba elakuleli lisabhekene nobhubhane iCovid-19, kanti uKhan uthe kusazolenga ingidi emasangweni enyuvesi kuze kube kuyamenyezelwa ukuthi kuzovulwa nini.“Lokhu kuzolekelela inyuvesi ukuthi ikwazi ukubuyekeza izinhlelo zokuvulwa kwezikhungo nokuvumela izitshudeni emagcekeni azo. Izinhlelo zokusetshenziswa kobuchwepheshe enyuvesi kuhlanganisa ukufunda nokufundisa kusetshenziswa zona, ziyaqhubeka,” kuqhuba uKhan.Ugcizelele ukuthi zonke izitshudeni ezihlangabezana nezinselelo ekubhaliseni, zixhumane nomnyango obhekelele ukwamukelwa kwezitshudeni kule nyuvesi.Khonamanjalo uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, uhambele eMangosuthu University of Technology (MUT) eyoxoxisana nabaholi bezitshudeni ngoLwesihlanu ukuthola isixazululo.Lokhu kulandela umbhikisho wezitshudeni ngeledlule ezivuke umbhejezane zavala umgwaqo uMangosuthu Highway ngamathayi avuthayo nangemfucuza, phakathi kokunye zikhala ngokugqoza kohlelo lokubhalisa kule nyuvesi.UMshengu uthe ngemuva kokuhlangana nabaholi bezitshudeni kuvunyelwane ngokuthi kubunjwe ikomiti elizobhekelela zonke izinselelo enyuvesi  bese lidlulisa umbiko.“Izitshudeni zivumile ukuba yingxenye yaleli komidi kanjalo nenyuvesi. Sizocela abavela ehhovisini likaNdunankulu wesifundazwe ukuthi basibhekele ukusebenza kwalo. Sizophinde sibize omunye umhlangano ukuthola umbiko ngokutholwe yileli komiti,” kusho uMshengu.
title: Seluliwe isikhathi sokubhalisa eDUT

text: UTHUKE woma owesilisa waseKimberley ezithela kwisidumbu sosana ngesikhathi ezama ukulungisa ipayipi lokuthicha amanzi ebeliminyene emzini wakhe oseChris Hani Park ngoLwesithathu.UMnuz Edwin Ackerman uthe omakhelwane bakhe bebemcele ukuthi alungise ipayipi lokuchitha amanzi lasendlini yangasese engaphandle ngoLwesithathu ntambama."Ngisuse isivalo sikaplastiki ngaqala ngadonsa ukususa lokhu obekuminyene emapayipini. Bengisebenzisa ucingo ukwenza lokhu."U-Ackerman uthe ubecabanga ukuthi usewutholile umnyombo wokuminyana kwamapayipi, wabe esezama ukudonsa ngocingo abekuzwa. "Ngithuke ngoma ngesikhathi ngibona ingane yomfana ibambeke ekugcineni kocingo. Ucingo belungene ekhanda layo. Abukho ubuhlungu obudlula lobu engibuzwile. Ukubuka isidumbu sakhe kungenze ngabuyelwa imicabango yabantwana bami abathathu abaphuphuma ngesikhathi unina wabo ebakhulelwe."U-Ackerman uthe isidumbu usimboze ngokhaphethi obomvu ohlala emnyango. "Baningi abantwana abangena bephuma la egcekeni. Bengingafuni ukuthi bakubone lokhu."U-Ackerman uqhube wathi akafuni ukuzicabangela ukuthi ubani ofake usana ethoyilethi.Uthe, ngaphandle kwakhe, kunabantu ababili abahlala endlini eyisakhiwo esikhulu, ababili abahlala kamakhelwane kanye noyedwa ohlala emjondolo oseduze kwakhe. "Njengoba nibona kukhona nesitolo la egcekeni kanti nesango lihleli livuliwe. Baningi abantu abangena bephuma bezosebenzisa ithoyilethi, ngakho kunzima ukwazi ukuthi kungaba ubani unina wale ngane."Omunye wabesifazane ohlala esakhiweni esikhulu ubize amaphoyisa ukuthi azokwenza ulibofuzo kubona bonke abahlala kule ndawo. "Sifuna ukwazi ukuthi ngubani lo mama owenze lokhu," kusho yena.
title: Uzithele kwisidumbu sosana elungisa amapayipi

text: IMAMELODI Sundowns isiphinde yayithela phansi iKaizer Chiefs kungakangenwa nasenkundleni njengoba iwine umbango womdlali wasemuva we-Ajax Cape Town, uMosa Lebusa.Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe umqeqeshi we-Urban Warriors, uMuhsin Ertugral ngesikhathi ekhuluma ne-Independent Media, Isolezwe elingaphansi kwayo izolo.La maqembu ake aba sembangweni ka-Andile Jali, ogcine unqotshwe amaBrazilians. NgoMgqibelo azotholana phezulu emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eLoftus Versfeld, ePitoli ngo-3 ntambama. Emasontweni adlule iSundowns idlule ngo 2-1 kowobungani.I-Ajax izobe idlala kwiNational First Division (NFD) kwisizini ezoqala ngemuva kokulahlwa icala ngokudlalisa uTendai Ndoro.Umqeqeshi weSundowns, uPitso Mosimane, ubesekusho kaningi ukuthi bathungatha umdlali wesokunxele emuva. ULebusa okuke kwavela ukuthi neChiefs iyambheka, uyakwazi ukudlala namaphakathi emuva.IChiefs idedele uTsepo Masilela noSibusiso Kumalo kanti uPhilani Zulu obedlaliswa kule ndawo uSteve Komphela kuthiwa umqeqeshi omusha uGiovanni Solinas ufuna ukumbuyisela esiswini lapho ebedlala khona esakwiMaritzburg United. Ezinye ezivelile ezokuthi umdlali osemncane uSiphosakhe Ntiya-Ntiya oke wayibamba kwesokunxele uSolinas umbuyisele eqenjini leMultichoice Diski Challenge. Leli qembu lisayinise uLethlogonolo Mirwa obedlala kwiBuya Msuthu kwi-ABC Motsepe League. Lokhu kulushiya luxega uhlangothi lwesokunxele emuva kuMakhosi.“ULebusa usesibenzele kahle. Uyalishiya iqembu uyojiyina iSundowns futhi ngicabanga ukuthi uzokwenza kahle khona,” kusho * -Ertugral.Okhulumela iSundowns, uThulani Thuswa ebuzwa ngoLebusa akazange aphumele obala.“Akukho esizokusho. Sizomemezela uma kukhona esifisa ukukusho."Lo mdlali ozofika kwi’Downs abange indawo noTebogo Langerman, Siyabonga Zulu noLyle Lakay uMosimane amubambise kule ndawo ngesikhathi bedlala owobungani neChiefs.ISundowns ithola uLebusa nje emasontweni edlule ibamba lomqeqeshi kwiChiefs, uPatrick Mabedi, like lakuveza ukuthi bayamubheka lo mdlali.Ngasohlangothini lwe-Ajax, * -Ertugral uthe ngeke ayeke ukubheka isicelo somsebenzi waphesheya uma sivela.“Iqembu lihlelekile. Ishwa nje ukuthi inkinga ebikhona ayizange ixazululeke ngokushesha. Ibhola laseNingizimu Afrika liyayidinga i-Ajax Cape Town. Ahlezi ekhona amathuba aseTurkey naseSaudi Arabia. Uma eqhamuka ngizowabheka. Kodwa okubalulekile okwamanje wukuhlanganisa iqembu eliselincane elizokwazi ukuncintisana kwiNFD. Leli yithuba lokwakha kabusha,” kusho * -Ertugral.Uthe unethemba lokuthi i-Urban Warriors izokwazi ukubuyela esigabeni esiphezulu ngokushesha njengoba kwenzeke kwiHighlands Park neLamontville Golden Arrows kumasizini edlule.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership yangempelasonto:NgoMgqibelo: Mamelodi Sundowns v Kaizer Chiefs (Loftus Versfeld Stadium, 3pm); Black Leopards v Polokwane City (Peter Mokaba Stadium, 6pm); Cape Town City FC v SuperSport United (Cape Town Stadium, 6pm); Bidvest Wits v Free State Stars (Bidvest Stadium, 6pm); Orlando Pirates v Highlands Park (Orlando Stadium, 8.15pm); AmaZulu FC v Baroka FC (King Zwelithini Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Maritzburg United v Golden Arrows (Harry Gwala Stadium, 3pm); Bloemfontein Celtic v Chippa United (Dr Molemela Stadium, 3pm)
title: I-Downs ihlule iChiefs kubangwa uLebusa

text: BANGU-14 113 abasebenzi basezindlini abakhokhelwe uR55 572 870.00 we-Unemployment Insurance Fund (UIF).Kulaba basebenzi u-10 092 ufakelwe izicelo ngabaqashi babo.UNgqongqoshe wezabaSebenzi uMnuz Thulas Nxesi uthe benza konke okusemandleni ukufinyelela kubasebenzi basezindlini, wacela abaqashi ukuthi bafake izicelo ukuze abasebenza ezindlini basizakale kwi-UIF.Uthe bazosebenzisana nenkampani ezimele i-Interfile ezobheka abasebenza ezindlini ibashayele izingcingo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bayayithola imali yabo ye-UIF.UNxesi uthe yize lesi sibalo sisincane kodwa uyajabula ngokuthi kukhona abasebenzi basezindlini abalutholayo usizo kulesi sikhathi seCovid-19.“Sizosebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bethu ukubheka abasebenzi basezindlini nabasebenzi basemapulazini ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imali yabo bayayithola.Sizokwenza nesiqiniseko sokuthi imali ye-UIF iya ngqo kubasebenzi ukuze basheshe bayithole. Abaqashi kufanele baqhubeke nokufaka izicelo zabasebenzi babo kodwa sifuna imali isheshe ifike kubasebenzi yingakho sifuna ukuyifaka kuma-akhawunti abasebenzi,” kusho uNxesi.Uveze ukuthi i-UIF isikhokhe uR13.3 billion ukulekelela abasebenzi abawu-2 401 973 abasebenza ezinkampanini ezithikanyezwe yi-Covid-19.Uthe kuno-R2 billion okufanele uye kubasebenzi abawu-535 587 osahleli esikhwameni se-UIF ngoba abaqashi balaba basebenzi kunemininingwane abangayilethanga.Kunabasebenzi abawu-26 793 abangakakhokhelwa ngenxa yokuthi abakayiqinisekisi imininingwane yabo yasebhange.UNxesi ucele abaqashi ukuthi bathumele yonke imininingwane yabasebenzi uma befaka izicelo kwi-UIF ukuze kube lula ukukhokhela abasebenzi imali yabo.Eminye imininingwane ngohlelo lokusiza loMnyango wezabaSebenzi kungavakashelwa * -www.uifecc.labour.gov.za/covid19 noma kushayelwe abe-UIF ku-0800 030 007.
title: Kuhlomule abasezindlini abangu-14 113 kwi-UIF

text: KUBIKWA ukuthi licwilile ibhanoyi ebelithwele abagibeli abawu-189 eliwele olwandle lisuka kwi-Island yase-Indonesia iJava, ngoMsombuluko.Ithimba labezimo eziphuthumayo e-Indonesia liziqinisekisile izindaba zokucwila kwebhanoyi leLion Air Flight. Abasesikhumulweni sezindiza bathe bagcine ukuxhumana nokapteni webhanoyi ngemuva kwemizuzu ewu-14 lisukile labe selinqamuka emoyeni.“Asazi noma bakhona yini abasindile,” kusho uMnuz Muhmmad Syaugi okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo.Uthe kusatholakale ama-headphones kanye nama-vesti alekelela abantu ukuthi bangaminzi eduzane nalapho okuvela khona ukuthi kucwile ibhanoyi.Kubikwa ukuhi zibalelwa ku-23 izikhulu zikahulumeni ebezikulendiza.“Okwamanje asazi ukuthi kwenzekeni. Sixakekile kakhulu ngoba bekuyibhanoyi elisha,” kusho isikhulu esiphezulu seLion Air Group.Abezimo eziphuthumayo basaphezu kwezinhlelo zokutshuza bangene ekujuleni kolwandle babheke izidumbu ebhanoyini naseduzane nalo.
title: Kuminze ibhanoyi ebelithwele abawu-189

text:
ISUPERSPORT United isimemezele ukuthi isivumelene nezimbangi zayo zasePitoli, iMamelodi Sundowns, ukuzidayisela isibabuli somgadli uJeremy Brockie. Bese kunesikhathi iSundowns icuthele lo mgadli ongalibheki ipali, kanti kamuva nje kube nemibiko yokuthi ne-Orlando Pirates izimisele ngokumsayinisa. .
@SuperSportFC can now confirm that agreement has been reached on the sale of Jeremy Brockie to 
@Masandawana
#SkeemaMatsatsantsa
pic.twitter.com/MyN6Xpqsgt— SuperSport United FC (@SuperSportFC) 
January 15, 2018Isikhulu esiphezulu seSupersport United, uStanley Matthews, uthe bekungekho lula ukudayisa lo mdlali. "Akukho lula ukulahlekelwa umdlali owukhiye njengoJeremy, ikakhulukazi ngemuva kwamasizini amathathu amahle abe nawo nathi esikwaze ukufinyelele emdlalweni yamanqamu emihlanu kuwo, waphinde waba sendaweni yesibili ngamagoli awashayele iqembu," usho kanje esitatimendeni esibhalwe kutwitter.Club CEO Stanley Matthews said “It’s never easy to lose a key player like Jeremy, especially off the back of three great seasons with us in which we made 5 Cup Finals and he became the second highest scorer at the Club.— SuperSport United FC (@SuperSportFC) 
January 15, 2018Matthews: "We also understand that at his age this is Jeremy’s last big move and opportunity to secure his financial future.— SuperSport United FC (@SuperSportFC) 
January 15, 2018Matthews: "Given that he has made a significant contribution to the Club on and off the field our Board have agreed to sanction his move to Mamelodi Sundowns and we wish him well in his future"— SuperSport United FC (@SuperSportFC) 
January 15, 2018UBrockie kuzolindeleka ukuthi avale ngokushesha isikhala somgadli kwiSundowns, esishiywe nguLeonardo Castro ojoyine iKaizer Chiefs.
title: Usengumdlali weSundowns uJeremy Brockie

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa umise emsebenzini iPhini loMqondisi wezokuShushiswa koMphakathi u-Adv Nomgcobo Jiba no-Adv Lawrence Mrwebi onguMqondisi wezokuShushiswa koMphakathi ngamacala athinta imali, ukuze kuphenywe ukuthi bakufanele yini ukuba kulezi zikhundla zabo.URamaphosa umemezele lezi zindaba izolo ntambama esho nokuthi uphenyo lokuthi o-Adv Jiba noMrwebi bakufanele yini ukuba sezikhundleni zabo luzophathwa yiJaji leNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo eselathatha umhlalaphansi uNkk Yvonne Mokgoro.“Emuva kokubona ukuthi kunezinsolo zokuthi anikufanele ukuba sehhovisi ngithathe isinqumo sokunimisa emsebenzini ukuze ngiqinisekise ukuthi ezobulungiswa zisebenza ngendlela, ikakhulukazi uma kuthintwa amacala enkohlakalo nokusetshenziswa kwemali yezwe. Niphethe izikhundla eziphezulu kwezokushushisa yingakho kufanele nime emsebenzini kuze kuphothulwe uphenyo ngokuthi nifanelekile yini ukuba kulezi zikhundla,” kusho uRamaphosa.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi o-Adv Jiba noMrebi bake bamiswa emsebenzini emuva kokuthi inkantolo inqume ukuthi bakhishwe ohlwini lwabameli ngo-2016. Lesi sinqumo siye sachithwa yinkantolo yokudluliswa kwamacala ngoJulayi walo nyaka.U-Adv Glynnis Breytenbach okhulumela iDA kwezobulungiswa uthe bayasamukela isinqumo sikaRamaphosa sokuphenya ukuthi u-Adv Jiba noMrwebi bakufanele yini ukuphatha izikhundla zabo ngoba abakufanele ukuphatha lezi zikhundla.Uthe iNingizimu Afrika ifanelwe wukuba nabashushisi abahlonipha umthetho hhayi laba abasebenzisa umbuso ukufeza izinhloso zabo.
title: URamaphosa umise abashushisi emsebenzini ngamacala athinta imali

text: UBULAWE yinyathi umfundi ka-matric waseSibukosezwe High, eHammarsdale, ngaphandle kweTheku obelinde imiphumela yakhe njengoba izokhishwa ngenyanga ezayo.USiphamandla Sokhela (22) wase-Unit 4 eHammarsdale uhlaselwe yinyathi esiqiwini iMawela Private Game Reserve, e-Escourt, ngoLwesine olwedlule. Ngokusho komfowabo uMnuz Sthembiso Sokhela, umufi ubevakashe ezihlotsheni kanti uzokwehlelwa yileli lishwa.USokhela uthe umnewabo ubeyolanda izinkomo eduze kwesiqiwu kanti kunenyathi ecanasayo kuleyo ndawo, yathuswa yizinja yavuka umbhejazane."Ngibona ukuthi ubezitshela ukuthi yinkomo engazi kahle. Kube khona lokho kudideka nje ebona inkomo enkulu, yamhlasela yamephula umgogodla washona,’’ kusho uSokhela.USokhela uthi le nyathi kuthiwa imhubhile yamxina eduze umfowabo yamhlaba.Uthe bebelindele imiphumela emihle ngoba ubeqhuba kahle esikoleni nothisha bebemncoma bethi usebenza ngokuzimisela.Uthe okubuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi abesiqiwu abayingeni indaba yokubanxephezela kodwa esikhundleni salokho bakhombisa ukubedelela bewumndeni. Uthi bazamile ukuya khona bangaphathwa neze kahle."Kunomsebenzi wakhona (igama ligodliwe) ositshele emehlweni ukuthi ngeke bayingene indaba yethu ngoba abantu banquma ucingo lwesiqiwu, bagcone izilwane ngamabomu ngoba befuna inkokhelo," kusho uSokhela.Uthe kubaphathe kabuhlungu ukuzwa impendulo enjalo bebe beshonelwe. Uthe bebelinde ukuthi kuxoxwe babone ukuthi bangakhalisana kanjani.Imizamo yokuxhumana nabasesiqiwini igcine ingaphumelelanga njengoba izinombolo zabo bezingatholakali.USokhela uthe babuye bathola ukuthi le nyathi sekunesikhathi icanasa ngaphandle."Sengathi njengoba kunqamuke ucingo izilwane ziyaziphumela nje. Kuthiwa nomunye ubaba usinde ngokulambisa isho ukumqeda le nyathi. Impela aseneme, sidinga usizo kulolu daba," kubhoka uSokhela.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenent Colonel Thulani Zwane, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi udaba lusingethwe amaphoyisa."Kuvulwe idokodo lophenyo ngokufa kowesilisa okuthiwa uhlaselwe yinyathi eNtunda, e-Estcourt. Idokodo livulwe esiteshini sendawo," kusho uZwane.
title: Umfundi ka-matric ubulawe inyathi okuthiwa icanasa ngaphandle

text: SELIPHENDUKE inkomo edla yodwa ibhungu laseQuarry Heights, eThekwini, osekuphele iminyaka linenkinga yomlomo ‘okhafula indle’ osekuze kwaholela ekutheni liyeke umsebenzi.USikhumbuzo Mkhize (22) uthi le nkinga yakhe iqale ngo-2015 efunda umatric, uma ekhuluma nezinye izingane esikoleni zibambe amakhala.Leli phunga uthi linezikhathi lapho limandla khona kakhulu ngaphakathi, azizwe enuka ukubola nendle. Usehlala ephethe isigubhu samanzi ngesandla.Uma ekhuluma uyawaqhabula ngenhloso yokucindezela iphunga athi livumbuka kakhulu uma eke wabhodla.Uthi ngendlela okubi ngayo, abantu sebehlale bekhuluma ngaye, ngisho nezingane sezamphendula ihlaya.“Ngaphasa umatric ngaswela imali yokufunda, ngabhaka amakhekhe okudayisa. Kodwa sengize ngawayeka ngoba abantu abaningi sebeyazi ukuthi ngiyanuka. Umuntu ufika azozibuzisa angathengi ngoba efuna ukuzwa iphunga. Ekhaya baqale bangangikholwa bethi abalizwa.“Ngaze ngacabanga ukuthi mhlawumbe bangibona njengohlanya. Sengiyile kodokotela angisizakali,” kusho uMkhize.Uthe impilo inzima njengoba eyeke ukudayisa amakhekhe, ayisekho imali engenayo kubo.“Ngike ngathola umsebenzi kodwa abantu bebekhombisana ngami. Ngivele ngayeka nakhona. Kulezi zinsuku ngibalekile ngasekhaya ngoba angisazi kumele ngenzenjani. Sengicabanga nezinto ezingalungile ngoba impilo yami inzima,” kusho uMkhize.Ethintwa unina uNkk Tracy Nsele ukuqinisekisile lokhu wathi sekuphele iminyaka ebhekene nale nkinga.“Sekuphele iminyaka emithathu ngilele phansi ngigula angikwazi ukuyomzamela usizo. Uyingane ezithandayo nasendlini uyasebenza. Inkinga yileli phunga elingaphakathi kuye. Thina asilizwa kahle ngoba into engaphakathi. Useze wayeka ukudayisa kanti ubesisiza ngemali,” kusho uNkk Nsele.Ungoti wezempilo uDkt Bongani Nxumalo uthi lesi yisifo esijwayelekile esibizwa ngeHalitosis.“Isifo esikhona kodwa siyelapheka. Umuntu usuke enenkinga engaphakathi kwabanye kuba ngaphansi kwebele, esithweni sangasese noma iphunga liphume ngeziqu zoboya,” kusho uDkt Nxumalo.Uthembise ukumsiza uMkhize.
title: Usephenduke inkomo edla yodwa ohlushwa yiphunga emlonyeni

text:
ZANELE MTHETHWAI SIZOPHUMELA emphakathini ingosi ‘Ikusasa Ngelami’ ephuma kwi
Solezwe ngeSonto, egxile ekuxazululeni izinkinga zentsha.Le ngosi ebhalwa nguNkk Zonke Shazi-Hlongwane izobe iqala ukuphumela emphakathini ngoJuni 25 eCity Church International eMgungundlovu.UNkk Shazi-Hlongwane, okuwunyaka wesibili ebhala le ngosi, uthe akakholwanga indlela ewuthinta ngayo umphakathi. Uthe lokhu kumenze wavuleka amehlo ngezinselelo ezibhekene nentsha emphakathini.“Abantu bayaphawula kakhulu ngezihloko engibhala ngazo ezisuke zijwayelekile kodwa ngisebenzise neminye imizekelo ngezimo zabantu esengikhulume nabo.Ngithole kakhulu ukuphawula kubantu emuva kwesihloko sokuzibulala nokuba nengcindezi entsheni. Ngibone kunesidingo sokuya emphakathini lapho sizokwazi ukuxoxa kahle eduze nentsha. Asizokhuluma nentsha kuphela kodwa nabazali ngoba sihlose ukwenza ubudlelwano emndenini,” kuchaza yena.Uthe ngaphambi kokuqala umkhankaso wokuqwashisa intsha ngaphansi kohlelo ‘Ikusasa Ngelami,’ waqala eluleka intsha njengomphathi wayo e-African Congregational Church. Ukusondelana nentsha kwezikamoya kwamenza wabona ukuthi ziningi ezinye izinselelo ezidinga okungaphezu komthandazo.“Izingane bezigcina zingibikela izinkinga ezijulile nami ngihluleke ukumelana nazo. Bengithi sizothandaza ukulwa nezinkinga kodwa ngabona ukuthi kudingeka okungaphezu kwalokho. Bengizama ngokungamandla ami ukubeluleka ngiqinisekise nokuthi indaba yabo izogcina kimina. Lokhu kwangenza ngafisa ukufunda kabanzi ngokuxazulula izinkinga. Ngagcina sengenza ucwaningo ngezihloko ezithinta intsha, kwesinye isikhathi ngibuze kwabadlule kuzona,” kusho yena.Yize ebevele enothando lwentsha, uthi ukuthola izinselelo ezibhekene nayo kwamenza wafuna ukulekelela kakhulu. Ubelalela uCriselda Dudumashe weMetro FM noSakina Kamwendo weSA FM bekhuluma ngezihloko ezithinta intsha. Ubengaphuthwa yizinhlelo zabo, abhale namaphuzu acabanga ukuthi angasiza abanye abasha emabandleni, wafunda nezincwadi zeSociology.UNkk Shazi-Hlongwane namanje osangumholi wentsha e-Apostolic Faih Mission, uthi akafunanga ukuvalela ngaphandle intsha engasonti okuyingakho eqale uhlelo lokuhambela imiphakathi.Ngo-2014 ubhalisele izifundo zeChild and Youth Development eDUT. Uthi akayena usonhlakalakle kodwa lezi zifundo zimcije ngokwanele ukubhekana nezinkinga zezingane nentsha.“Ngifisa ukuvula isikhungo sentsha ngiqeqeshe abaholi bamabandla nabafundisa ezinkulisa. Kubalulekile ukuthuthukisa ingane ngokomqondo ukuze ikwazi ukumelana nomhlaba isikhulile. Ngithole ukuthi intsha ilahlekelwa yisimilo nokuziphatha ngenxa yokuhlangana nabangani ababi. Abangani bagcina beyikho konke enganeni, ikhohlwe iziyayo zasekhaya,” usho kanje.UNkk Shazi-Hlongwane owashonelwa ngunina eneminyaka engu-13, uthi wasibona isikhala sokuba nozomeluleka ambonise nempilo okuyingakho eziqonda izinkinga zentsha.Wakhulela KwaMashu wabuye wahlala eNanda Mission. Ushadile wabusiswa ngezingane ezimbili. Usebenzisane nemisakazo okubalwa iMbokodo FM, Inanda FM neDivine FM anohlelo kuyo. Wasebenza emaphaphendabeni amaningi ngaphansi kwezokukhangisa njengoba eneziqu zobuntatheli azithola ePretoria Technikon.
title: Iyasabalala ingosi yeSolezwe ngeSonto

text: UMREPHA waKwaMashu, uZakwe, useveze ukuthi usemizameni yokubuyela esikoleni kulo nyaka ayoqedela iziqu ze-IT azishiya phakathi ngo-2009 ngenxa yomculo.Uthe washiya sekusele unyaka nohhafu ngaphambi kokuthi aqede eDurban University of Technology (DUT) lapho ayefunda khona.“Ngizama ukubuyela khona eDUT. Kuzokwenza abazali bami bajabule ngoba bayayiqhakambisa indaba yesikole. Kodwa vele yisinqumo engasithatha sokuthi kumele ngiqedele engakuqala. Noma ngingeke ngisaba wungoti wezobuchwepheshe kodwa ngifuna ukuba nazo ngazi ukuthi zikhona,” kusho uZakwe.Uphinde wagqugquzela abangaphumelelanga ku-matric wathi ukungaphumeleli kwabo akusho ukuthi uyisehluleki.“Kukho konke okwenzekayo ukungaphumeleli kumele ukuthathe njengesifundo. Uma uqhuzuka ungakubuki lokho njengokwehluleka kodwa kubuke njengesifundo,” kusho uZakwe.UZakwe uzakhele ugazi kubathandi bomculo ngo-2011 ngemuva kokukhipha i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala ethi Zakwe eyayigabe ngezingoma okubalwa kuzona ethi Bathi Ng’yachoma nezinye.Ngonyaka odlule ukhiphe ingoma ethi Sebentini ngokuhlanganyela noCassper Nyovest noMusiholiq. Ngesikhathi beyishaya noCassper Nyovest kwi #FillUpFNB nyakenye, uNgqongqoshe wezobuCiko namaSiko kuzwelonke uNathi Mthethwa wabancoma ngokuqhakambisa isiko nolimi lwamaKhoisan.“Akuphelile ngami, labo abacabanga kanjalo abavele bakhohlwe.”Uthe i-albhamu yakhe entsha ezophuma ngaphambi kukaMashi isiphelile kodwa uselinde ukuthi “iMabala Noise ishaye impempe”.
title: UZakwe nezinhlelo zokuqedela iziqu ze-IT

text: UBHODLELE kwabamgxekayo umshayisibhakela waseNingizimu Afrika, u-Ali “Rush Hour” Funeka, oshayiswe okwengane yivukane uJeff Horn empini yebhande le-WBO Inter-Continental welterweight ngoMgqibelo eNew Zealand.UFuneka (38), ongomunye wabashayisibhakela abadala eNingizimu Afrika, uhlulwe ngomngqimuzo womlalisa phansi ngomzuliswano wesithupha empini obekulindeleke ukuthi abuyise ngayo isithunzi esibhakeleni somhlaba. Nokho ugcine esephenduka ihlaya evuswa phansi nguHorn kulandelana ngomzuliswano wesihlanu nowesithupha ngesikhathi ehluleka ukuvika isibhakela sakwesokudla singena sigcwala emhlathini nalapho unompempe evele wayiqeda khona impi.UFuneka uphunyukwe yimpi abeyiqale kahle kulandela ukuvusa othulini uHorn emzuliswaneni wesithathu. Nokho emuva kwalokho itshe ligaye ngomunye umhlathi. Ngokuhlula uFuneka, uHorn uzibeke ethubeni lokubhekana noManny Pacquiao ophethe ibhande le-World Boxing Organisation (WBO) welterweight. Irekhodi likaHorn linyukele ku 17-0-0, kwathi elikaFuneka lehlela ku-39-6-3.Emuva kwempi uFuneka ubhale ekhasini lika-facebook exolisa kubalandeli bakhe ngokuhlulwa. “Mina Ali Funeka ngithanda ukuthatha leli thuba ngixolise kubalandeli bami nomndeni ngokuphoxeka engibadalele khona. Siye laphaya eNew Zealand sifuna ukuyiwina le mpi kodwa ngoba ezamankomane zingezemidlalo, uyawina kwesinye isikhathi uhlulwe,” kusho uFuneka.Ushintshile wagadla kulabo abebemgxeka ngokuhlulwa kwakhe wathi: “Engingakuqondi ukuthi kungani abantu behlale becabanga okuhlukile uma ibhokisa lihlulwa empini. Bakhuluma indaba yokuthi kufanele lisiyeke isibhakela kodwa uma liwina liyanconywa. Ngihlulwe empini obekufanele ngiyiwine. Ngishaywe endaweni efanele ngesikhathi esifanele.”UFuneka akaqali ukushayeka ngale ndlela. Nyakenye ushaywe kabuhlungu nguTsiko “Cruel Junior” Mulovhedzi emephuca ibhande le-International Boxing Organisation (IBO) phambi kwabalandeli bakhe e-East London. Le mpi ilandelwe yizinsolo zokuthi uMulovhedzi waseLimpopo usebenzise umuthi. Emuva kwalokho uFuneka uwine izimpi ezintathu kulandelana ehlula uGideon Agbosu waseGhana empini yebhande le-WBO Africa welterweight ebelingaphethwe muntu. Uphinde wehlula uViskhan Murzabekov waseRussia. NgoJulayi uvikele ngempumelelo ibhande le-WBO Africa kuJustice Addy waseGhana.Ngaphandle kukaFuneka, uMzonke “The Rose of Khayelitsha” Fana, uhlale ebeleselwa ngokuthi sekufanele aphanyeke amagilavu emgibeni kodwa uhlale ethi uzoyeka uma sekuthanda yena. Nokho emuva kokuqulekaehlulwa ngu-Emmanuel Tagoe waseGhana emasontweni adlule, uthe usa-zocabanga ajule ngekusasa lakhe.
title: UFuneka ugadle kwabamgxekayo

text: UMNUZ Delani Ndlovu osebenza ngaphansi koMnyango wezeMvelo ngaphansi kukaMasipala wasoLundi, useveze ukuthi abantu abaqoqa amabhodlela namathini benza omkhulu umsebenzi.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi kubungazwa usuku olwaziwa ngeWorld Enviromental Day, ngoLwesibili.UNdlovu uthi ukulahlwa noma kanjani kukadoti yikhona okube nomthelela omubi esimweni sezulu nasekufeni kwemfunyo ezindaweni zasemakhaya.“Ngesikhathi kuqala isikhathi sikathaqa ezweni abantu abaningi balahlekelwa umsebenzi base bekhetha ukuthi bazitholele amasenti ngokuthi bacoshe amathini kanye namabhodlela nokuyinto eyasiza kakhulu. Lokhu akusizanga imvelo nje kuphela kodwa laba abantu bazithola sebeyisa ibhodwe eziko ngalemali ababeyithola ngokwenza lo msebenzi,” kusho uNdlovu.Uveze ukuthi ngisho izimfonyo lezi ezisetshenziswa manje kumele zilahlwe ngendlela ukuze zingadali inkinga emfunyweni.“Ikakhulukazi la emakhaya izimfonyo zingagcina zigcwele emifuleni bese zidliwa izilwane zife nokuyinto engeyinhle neze. Okumele futhi abantu bakwazi ukuthi laba bantu abaqoqa udoti uhulumeni usezinhlelweni zokuthi abanikeze imiholo njalo ngenyanga nokuyinto enhle kakhulu,” kuchaza yena.IMeya yalo mkhandlu uMnuz Wilson Ntshangase uveze ukuthi bazohambela amawadi ahlukene bekhuthaza abantu ukuthi banakekele imvelo.“Isiqubulo salo nyaka ngaphansi kokugujwa kwalolu suku sithi Sibuyisela Imvelo Esimweni Sayo. Nathi ke njengomasipala sizimisele ukwenza kanjalo. Sizotshala izihlahla komasipala abahlukene ukuze sikwazi ukuthola umoya ohlanzekile, siqhubeke nokuzisebenzisa njengoba zisikhiqizela amakhambi ahlukene okusilapha nokunye okuningi okwenziwa imvelo uma nje ihlanzekile,” kuchaza yena.Kulo masipala kulona leli sonto baphinde baqala uhlelo lokuphendula amasoyi amahholo azokwakhiwa okukhona kuwo awaseNcemaneni naseNtambonde.
title: 'Benza umsebenzi omkhulu abaqoqa amabhodlela namathini'

text: Obambe njengoMqondisi wezokuXhumana enyuvesi uNksz Normah Zondo, uthe kulesi sigaba, inyuvesi imema zonke izitshudeni ukuthi zibuyele esikhungweni kodwa kulandelwa imigomo yokuphepha njengokuqhelelana, ukugeza izandla ngesibulalimagciwane nokugwema imibuthano emikhulu.“Ukuphepha kwabasebenzi nezitshudeni kubaluleke kakhulu njengoba igciwane lisekhona.”Uthe nakuba inyuvesi icela izitshudeni ukuthi zibuyele ezikhungweni kodwa abasebenzi abaneminyaka engu-60 kuya phezulu noma abasahamba odokotela, bazoqhubeka nokusebenzela emakhaya kanti ukuvakashela kwabo ezikhungweni kuyokwenziwa ngaphansi kweso elibukhali lemigomo yezempilo.Uphinde waveza ukuthi ukufunda nokufundisa kusetshenziswa ezobuchwepheshe kuzoqhubeka kulo nyaka wemfundo ka-2020 wathi ngaphandle kwalabo okumele bavakashele ama-labolatory nokunye okuphoqa ukuthi kwenziwe ezikhungweni.Ugcizelele ukuthi ngeke kufundelwe emakilasini, wathi izitshudeni ziyagqugquzelwa ukuthi zifundele emakhaya uma kwenzeka.“Izitshudeni zizomenywa ukuthi zibuyele ezikhungweni ngendlela efanayo naleyo okwenziwa ngayo esikhathini esedlule kodwa isimemo sizobe singasho ukuthi isitshudeni siphoqelekile ukubuyela esikhungweni. Yonke imikhakha izoba khona ezikhungweni ngokushintshana,” kusho uNksz Zondo.Uthe imvume nencwadi yombiko mayelana nokuhlolwa kwezimpawu zeCovid-19 kumsebenzi nakwisitshudeni, kusadingeka kulabo abazodinga ukuba sezikhungweni ngenxa yezizathu ezithile.Uveze ukuthi imigubho yokwethweswa kwemiyezane yango-Okthoba 30, izokwenziwa ngohlelo lwezobuchwepheshe, kanti ukubhalisela ukuthathwa enyuvesi kwangonyaka ozayo kuzoba online.“Zonke izitshudeni nabasebenzi bagqugquzelwa ukuthi baqikelele balandele imigomo yezempilo nokulandela eyokugwema ukubhebhetheka kweCovid-19 njengoba izwe livula yonke iminxa yomnotho,” usho kanje.
title: Inyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal ibuyisa izitshudeni
Izifundiswa ezingasebenzi zicikwa yizikhulu

text: UNQATSHELWE ibheyili owesilisa waseSouth Coast obhekene necala lokuhlukumeza izilwane.  UMthobisi Mkhanya (22), oboshwe ngesonto eledlule, uzovela eNkantolo yeMantshi eZingolweni namuhla. UMkhanya usolwa ngokushaya abulale ikati nomdlwane ngaphambi kokuba aphonse lezi zilwane ethoyilethe. UWerner Taljaard, ogada izilwane eSouth Coast SPCA, uthe wahambisa lezi zilwane kudokotela wezilwane ngenkathi eqeda ukuzikhipha ethoyilethi. UTaljaard uthe wathola isikhalazo komunye wabahlali bakulendawo. “Omunye wabahlali ungitshele ukuthi kukhona umfana oshaye wabulala ikati nomdlwane. Siphuthumele endaweni yesigameko, safica amaphoyisa njengoba umhlali okhathazekile ubesewatshelile amaphoyisa ngesigameko. Umsolwa ubekwe necala lokusongela lomhlali. Ngibe sengihamba namaphoyisa endaweni yesigameko,” kuchaza uTaljaard.  UTaljaard uthe umsolwa uboshwe amaphoyisa esendaweni yesigameko. “Amaphoyisa angibizile, sangena kulendawo ukuze sizothola ubufakazi. Amaphoyisa angitshele ukuthi umsolwa ulahle izilwane ethoyilethe. Ubengafuni ukukhuluma, angikwazanga ukuthola ulwazi mayelana nokuthi ukwenzeleni lokhu. Ngibe sengiyisa lezi zilwane kudokotela ukuze ziyohlolwa. Kubonakele ukuthi izilwane zishawe zaze zabulawa. Umdlwane ubunezinyanga ezine kuya kwezinhlanu. Izimbambo beziphukile kanye nomlenze wakwesokudla ubuphukile,” kusho uTaljaard.Ikati kutholakale ukuthi liphelelwe umoya. Okhulumela amaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uthe umsolwa uthweswe necala lokusongela, njengoba kuthiwa usabise loyo owayefake isikhalazo.
title: Kumshubele owesilisa obulale inja nekati

text: KUCHAZEKE abantu kukhonjiswa okokuqala ifilimu entsha yaseNingizimu Afrika, Imali Emnyama ebophele noSphuzo Sabantwana, eSuncoast Casino, eThekwini ngoMgqibelo.Bafike ngobuningi ukuzobuka ifilimu, kuqhuma  nohleko ngesikhathi idlala ngenxa yamahlaya. Ibophele abalingisi abazakhela udumo kwiFamily Bonds, uNdumiso Dlamini noPhumzile Mlangeni oke walingisa nakuZalo.Iphinde ibe noMzwandile Ngwenya oke walingisa kwiSibaya noThando Ndlovu umlingisi osemusha kodwa ongomunye waphambili kuyo.Inkakha kwezemidlalo yethelevishini neyeshashalazi uDuma Ndlovu, nebibukela ifilimu, ithe ichazwe yindlela eyenziwe ngayo.“Lokhu engikubonile kwenzeka kule filimu kungichazile. Ngesikhathi ngiqala emkhakheni wezokulingisa nganginesifiso sokuthi ngilethe imidlalo namafilimu akuleli KwaZulu-Natal. Njengoba nami ngidabuka kulesi sifundazwe, bekungiphatha kabi ukuthi abantu kumele baye eGoli ukufeza amaphupho abo.Ngicela sibaseke abalingisi bethu emsebenzini abawenzayo ngoba yizihlobo zethu lezi. Okunye engifuna ukukucacisa wukuthi uma kukhona onesifiso sokungena kwezokulingisa, afunde ngoba kuningi okwenziwayokhona ngaphandle kokulingisa,” kusho uDuma.Umnikazi wefilimu uMike Ndlovu weZero to Hero, uthe izokhonjiswa eKillarney Mall, eGoli ngoNovemba 28. Abafuna amathikithi, uthe bangaxhumana naye ngokuthumela umyalezo kwi-email yakhe ethi: [email protected]ABALINGISI abaphambili kwifilimu entsha Imali Emnyama, uMzwandile Ngwenya, Phumzile Mlangeni, Ndumiso Dlamini noThando NdlovuIsithombe: THOKOZANI NDLOVU
title: Kuchazeke abaningi ngefilimu entsha yakuleli

text: KUSOLWA umbango ematekisini ngokubulawa kukasomatekisi waseMuden okuthiwa uhlaselwe ngabantu abebenza sengathi bafelwe yimoto eceleni komgwaqo.UMnuz Funezakhe Mchunu (51) ubulawe eMuden ngaphandle KwaseGreytown ngoLwesihlanu.UMchunu, izimoto zakhe zihambela eGoli, kuthiwa ubekade eye eGreytown. Uthe esebuyela ekhaya wabona izimoto ezimbili ebezipake eceleni komgwaqo kusengathi kukhona ekhandwayo.Kuthiwa abasolwa bavele bamdubula ngemvula yezinhlamvu.Imoto yakhe eyiveni abehamba ngayo kuthiwa isale izimbobombo.Uyise kamufi, uMnuz Mwelela Mchunu, uthe kuyaxaka ngoba ubengakaze ezwe ukuthi indodana yakhe inezinkinga.“Unamatekisi ayisithupha asebenza eGoli. Ubebuyile ezothengela izingane zakhe ukudla. Asazi ngempela ukuthi kungani ehlaselwe, sisazolinda abesebenza nabo ematekisini sizwe ukuthi ngabe bakhona yini abexabene nabo. Ngeke sathi kukhona esikwaziyo ngoba akukho ake asibikela kona,” kusho uMchunu.Umthombo ozibonele uthe umufi uficwe imoto yakhe isaduma kodwa eseshonile.“Kusolwa umbango wasematekisini ngoba kule ndawo yaseMuden bayanda abantu asebebulewe abanamatekisi ahambela eGoli. Asazi ukuthi kwenzenjani kodwa kubukeka sengathi kunempi ekhona eGoli,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala.“Ayaziwa imbangela yokuhlaselwa kwakhe. Akekho oboshiwe, uphenyo luyaqhubeka,” kusho uCapt Gwala.UMnuz Mandla Mzelemu, wezokuxhumana nomphakathi kwi-South African National Taxi Council (Santaco) KwaZulu-Natal, uthe kuyadumaza kakhulu ukuqhubeka kwezenzo zokubulawa kosomatekisi.“Uma nje kukhona usomatekisi obulawa e-KZN ngisho noma amatekisi akhe ehambela eGoli, kuyasikhathaza ngoba kuvele kukhonjwe imboni yethu ngokubulawa kwakhe."Kuwumkhuba omubi ukubulawa kosomatekisi, sihlezi sigcizelela ukuthi kukhulunywe uma kukhona izinkinga ababhekene nazo,” kusho uMzelemu.
title: Kusolwa umbango kubulawa usomatekisi

text: ABASHAYELI bamatekisi badonswe ngendlebe ukuthi bangalokothi bashayele ngesivinini baphule imithetho yomgwaqo ngoba sekunesiphithiphithi sokuthuthwa kwabafundi ababuyela ezikoleni namuhla.Umyalelo ukhishwe yihhovisi le-Santaco KwaZulu-Natal ngesikhathi olayini babafundi ababuyela ezindaweni abahlala kuzo bebade emarenki amatekisi eThekwini.Umphathi ehhovisi le-Santaco eKZN, uMnuz Sifiso Shangase, ucele abashayeli bamatekisi, ikakhulukazi abathutha abafundi, ukuthi baqikelele emigwaqweni ukuze abagibeli bafike bephephile ezindaweni abaya kuzo.“Abashayeli bethu abangalokothi bashayele ngesivinini, bangashayeli bephuzile, balayishe isibalo esivumelekile etekisini, bahloniphe wonke umuntu osebenzisa umgwaqo bazinike nesikhathi esanele sokuphumula,” kusho uShangase.Uthe ngeSonto erenki yamatekisi eRichards Bay bazoba nomcimbi wokubonga uMnuz Nhlonipho Zulu obelethise uNksz Ntombenhle Mthethwa (22) etekisini emuva kokuxoshwa ngamanesi amabili emtholampilo i-Buxedene, KwaNongoma.“Sobe sichoma uphaphe legwalagwala uZulu ogeze igama lemboni yamatekisi.“Isenzo sakhe sikhombise ubuntu, uyinxusa elihle embonini yamatekisi. Sizobe sizombonga ngesenzo sakhe esisindise umphefumulo womuntu,” kusho uShangase.Uthe izinhlaka ezibhekele ezokuphepha embonini ziphume nkalo zonke KwaZulu-Natal ziqinisekisa ukuthi uyalandelwa umthetho futhi kuphephile emigwaqweni ngaso sonke isikhathi.UMnuz Bheki Nzuza, we-United Taxi Owners, uthe kuyaphithizela emarenki amatekisi izingane zibuyela lapho zifunda khona.“Sicela ukuthi abashayeli baqikelele uma beshayela futhi babaphathe kahle abagibeli,” kusho uNzuza.
title: ‘Hloniphani imithetho yomgwaqo’

text: LUSAQHUBEKA nokuba yinzukazikeyi udaba loMvikeli woMphakathi kuleli, u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane.Ezinye izinhlangano ezilwela amalungelo omphakathi nezepolitiki seziphakamise ukuthi akaxoshwe ngoba uyehluleka ukuwenza. Ingcindezi yokuthi ashiye ilandela isinqumo esikhishwe yiNkantolo eNkulu yaseNorth Gauteng ePitoli, ethe u-Advocate Mkhwebane akakulungele ukuthi aqhubeke nokwenza uphenyo ngodaba oluthinta ukukhwabanisa nenkohlakalo kaR350 million.Kule nkohlakalo kusolwa ukuthi kuthinteka owayenguNgqongqoshe weziMbiwa Phansi kuzwelonke, uMnuz Mosebenzi Zwane, noMnuz Ace Magashule owayenguNdunankulu waseFree State kodwa manje osenguNobhala Jikelele we-ANC.Bobabili uMagashule noZwane, basolwa ngokusebenzisa budedengu isamba semali esibaliwe okwakuhloswe ngayo ukuthi kuthuthukiswe abalimi basepulazini i-Estina eVrede, eFree State.Izinhlangano ezilwela amalungelo omphakathi nezepolitiki, zithi kumele ashiye phansi u-Advocate Mkhwebane kulolu phenyo, kunalokho kungenelele ezinye izinhlaka zomthetho, kube yizona eziluphenyayo lolu daba.Ngokwemibiko eyatholakala, le mali yagcina ingafikanga kubantu okwakumele iye kubona, bahlomule njengalokhu kwakuhlosiwe.Kusolakala ukuthi le mali yagcina isisetshenziselwa ukuhlomulisa umndeni wakwaGupta, abantu abamnyama abangu-100 base-Estina Dairy Farm eVrede, basala bencela izithupha.Ngokwesinqumo seJaji uRonel Tolmay, umbiko osanda kukhishwa u-Advocate Mkhwebane ngophenyo lwakhe ngalolu daba, kumele uthathwe njengento engekho.“Ngenxa yezizathu ezithile, ngeke kulunge ukuthi lolu daba luphinde lubuyiselwe kuyena (u-Advocate Mkhwebane) ukuthi luphenywe uyena,” kusho uTolmay ngenkathi ekhipha isinqumo.UMHOLI weDA kuzwelonke uMnuz Mmusi Maimane othe uzoludlulisela phambili kuMqondisi kazwelonke wezokuShushiswa koMphakathi udaba loMvikeli woMphakathi oluthinta uphenyo ngabasolwa ngenkohlakalo yase-Estina Dairy Farm eVrede, eFree StateUmmeli obhekele izindaba ezithinta ukusebenza kukahulumeni nokuthuthukiswa komthethosisekelo wezwe, uMnuz Mpumelelo Zikalala, uthe ngaphambi kokuthi uMvikeli woMphakathi agxekwe, kumele kubhekwe kuqala ukuthi yikuphi angakwenzanga kahle.“Kumele kubhekwe kuqala ukuthi obani okuthiwa bayathinteka kulolu daba okuthe uma sekukhishwa umbiko amagama abo angavela kuwona,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe uMvikeli woMphakathi kumele kuthiwe akawulungele umsebenzi emva kokuthi sekubhekwe kabanzi izinto eziwubudedengu obukhulu emsebenzini awenzayo. “Inkantolo noma inganquma, kumele kubhekisiswe ukuthi bukhona yini ubulungiswa."NgokukaZikalala, uMvikeli woMphakathi naye usebenza ngokulawulwa yiPublic Protector Act.Uthe lokhu kuchaza ukuthi abanezikhalo ngokusebenza kwakhe, kumele bamshayise ngomoya uma umsebenzi wakhe ewenze ngokulandela lo mthetho.“UMvikeli woMphakathi kumele umsebenzi wakhe awenze ngaphandle kokutatazela ngoba akukho okusuke kumpintshile ukuthi akasheshe ethule uphenyo lwakhe,’’ kuchaza yena.Ngokwakhe, uMvikeli woMphakathi uzobe enza iphutha uma edlulisela lolu daba eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo engaqalanga aluyise iNkantolo ePhakeme yokuDlulisela amaCala.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi * -Advocate Mkhwebane uthe udaba ngesinqumo esikhishwe yiNkantolo yaseNorth Gauteng ePitoli, uzolidlulisela eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ukuthi kube yiyo ekhipha isinqumo esingujuqu.Ebuzwa uZikalala ukuthi lesi sinqumo senkantolo sisho ukuthini emphakathini wakuleli, uthe sisho lukhulu ngoba abantu bahlale benethemba nentshisekelo yokuthi noma iyiphi inselelo ababhekene nayo, uMvikeli woMphakathi uyena ozobalwela mahhala ngaphandle kokubakhokhisa.“UMvikeli woMphakathi kumele angachemi futhi akumele akushoyo. Akufanele ukuthi kube khona abantu athi benze okuthile bebe bengakwenzanga,” kusho uZikalala.Eziphendulela * -Advocate Mkhwebane, ukugcizelele ukuthi udaba uzoludlulisela eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo, kube yiyo ethatha isinqumo akholelwa wukuthi sinobulungiswa ngalolu daba.“Angiyena mina owokuqala ukuphenya ngalolu daba. NoMvikeli woMphakathi engimlandelayo wake walenza uphenyo,” kusho * -Advocate Mkhwebane.Uthe akulona iqiniso ukuthi akazange lwenze uphenyo ngoMagashule.“Ngalwenza uphenyo ngoMagashule ekuqaleni kuka-Ephreli ngonyaka odlule. Umbiko esengiwenzile ngalolu daba ngizowudedela emphakathini khona maduze nje,” kugcizelela u-Advocate Mkhwebane.Ngokwakhe, kukhona nezinye izikhulu aseziphenyile okusoleka ukuthi ziyathinteka kulolu daba.“Ngeke mina olwami uphenyo luncike emibikweni eyaputshuka ngomndeni wakwaGupta. Kumele ngisebenze ngophenyo engizenzela lona,” kusho yena.Unxuse ukuthi izinhlangano ezikhalaza ngomsebenzi awenzayo, zisebenzisane naye kunokuthi zimgxeke.Ngokusho kukaMnuz Lawson Naidoo onguNobhala oMkhulu wesikhungo iCouncil for the Advancement of the South African Constitution (Casac), uphenyo luka Advocate Mkhwebane lushiya imibizo kunezimpendulo ngoba ubonakala enzelela kosopolitiki abathile.“Umbiko wakhe awuphelele. Umsebenzi awenzile unogcobho,” kusho uNaidoo. Uthe izaba azibekayo zokuthi ihhovisi lakhe alinazo izinsiza ezanele zokuthi umsebenzi wakhe awenze ngokuyikho, yinto engekho.“Kunezinto eziningi ezibalulekile azishiye ngabomu ezingekho kulo mbiko wakhe,” kugcizela”, uNaidoo.UNaidoo uthe akayizwa kahle imibiko yokuthi uMvikeli woMphakathi athi akube uMagashule okumele enze uphenyo ngodaba olumthintayo, ngoba ngeke kuze kube khona ubulungiswa kulokho.“Okumele uMvikeli woMphakathi akwenze ukuthi aphoqe ngegunya azolinikezwa yinkantolo ukuthi abantu adinga ukubaphenya bavele phambi kwakhe ukuze umsebenzi wakhe ubonakale,” usho njalo.Umholi weDA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, ungomunye wabaholi bezepolitiki othe umbiko okhishwe uMvikeli woMphikathi ngoFebhuwari nyakenye owawungasho lutho ngoMagashule noZwane, awuthi shu.NgokukaMaimane, udaba uzoludlulisela phambili kuMqondisi kazwelonke wezokuShushiswa koMphakathi u-Advocate Shamila Batohi, ukuze atholisise ukuthi kwenzekani ngempela ngalolu phenyo.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi uMaimane wavulela uMagashule noZwane amacala enkohlakalo nokushintshisana ngemali ngo-2017.
title: Lusashubile oloMvikeli woMphakathi

text: INDODA okukholakala ukuthi ibikade ivela emgubheni we-ANC eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo ishayiswe yimoto yafa.Indoda eneminyaka elinganiselwa ku-30 ishayiswe yimoto ntambama ngoMgqibelo lapho kuhlangana khona umgwaqo * -Innes noMngeni.Imigwaqo iseduze nenkundla iMabhida obekukhandelene kuyo izinkumbi zabantu ebezizothamela inkulumo kaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.Kuthiwa indoda ibigqoke umfaniswano we-ANC ngesikhathi kwenzeka ingozi. Yenzeke ngesikhathi izama ukuwela umgwaqo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa avule idokodo lokubulala kungahlosiwe.“NgoMgqibelo ntambama indosa ishayiswe yimoto yashonela khona lapho. Imbangela yengozi iyaphenywa. Amaphoyisa aseDurban Central aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso,” kusho uCapt Gwala.Umufi ubengakakhonjwa ngamalungu omndeni wakhe.
title: Ushayisweyimoto wafa evela eMabhida

text: ISIKHWAMA sabasebenzi i-Unemployment Insurance Fund (UIF) isikhokhe ngaphezu kukaR45 billion ukulekelela labo abamile emsebenzini ngenxa yeCovid-19.Le mali ikhokhelwe abasebenzi abawu-10 212 116 abaqashwe ezinkampanini eziwu-902 775.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba, i-UIF ithe izokwamukela izicelo zeCovid-19 TERS ka-Agasti 16 kuya kuSepthemba 15 kusukela namuhla.UKhomishana osabambile kwi-UIF, uNkk Marsha Bronkhorst, uthe le mali ikhokhelwa abaqashi okuyibona abayidlulisela kubasebenzi ukuze imindeni ingabulawa yindlala.“Ukufaka isicelo sikaSepthemba abaqashi bayacelwa ukuthi balandele uhlelo akade belulandela lokufaka yonke imininingwane yabasebenzi, imininingwane yabo yasebhange, ubufakazi bokuthi bayabaholela abasebenzi, ubufakazi bokuthi kunemali abayibuyisele kwi-UIF uma bekufanele bakwenze lokhu,” kusho uNkk Bronkhorst.Uthe abafake izicelo bazohlolwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imali iya kubantu abafanele ukugwema inkohlakalo.“Sibona lusebenza uhlelo lwethu lokuqinisekisa ukuthi imali iya kwabafanele esilwenza ngokubambisana nezinhlaka ezihlukene. Izicelo zabangaphandle sizithumela eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya ukuzekukhokhelwe abantu abafanele,” kusho uNkk Bronkhorst.Izicelo zeCovid-19 TERS zika-Ephreli kuya kuMeyi zivalwe ngoSepthemba 25 kanti ezikaJuni zivalwa ngo-Okthoba 15.EzikaJulayi no-Agasti zizovalwa ngo-Okthoba 30.Ukufaka isicelo abantu kufanele bangene ku-https://uifecc.labour.gov.za/covid19/ noma www.labour.gov.za.
title: Zisafakwa namanje izicelo zesibonelelo se-UIF

text: BUGCINE buhlakaziwe ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal nobaseFree State, obese kukhulunywe kakhulu ngabo njengoba sekuze kwabuyiswana ezinkantolo kubanga izinhlangothi ezahlukene.Okhulumela i-ANC kuzwelonke uMnuz Zizi Kodwa, uthumele isitatimende emuva komhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu obuhleli e-Irene, ePitoli, kusukela ngoLwesihlanu.Lo mhlangano ubuwendlalela lowo obizwa ngeLegkotla oba minyaka yonke, osuke uhlahla indlela okuzosebenza ngayo uhulumeni.UKodwa uthe phakathi kwezinto eziningi okuxoxwe ngazo emhlanganweni, udaba lwaKwaZulu-Natal neFree State lubekiwe ezithebeni kwaphuma isinqumo.“Phakathi kwezinto ebezixoxwa sivumelane ngokuthi lezi zigungu eziphezulu zezifundazwe zizohoxiswa kubekwe izinhlaka zesikhashana ukuze izifundazwe zizoqhubeka nokusebenza.Lezi zinhlaka zesikhashana zizonikwa umthwalo wokulungiselela izingqungquthela zokukhetha ubuholi obusha," kusho uKodwa.Akuqondakali okwamanje ukuthi ngobani abazobanga ubuholi uma kubizwa ingqungquthela njengoba abaholi abathintekayo bengeke besakwazi ngenxa yezikhundla ezintsha abazitholile kuzwelonke.UMnuz Senzo Mchunu obebanga noMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uqokelwe esigungwini esiphezulu.UMnuz Ace Magashule obephoselwa inselelo ekubeni ngusihlalo eFree State, uqokelwe kwesikaNobhala-Jikelele.Konke lokhu kubanqinda amandla njengoba umthethosisekelo wenhlangano ungavumi ukuthi abaholi abaphezulu babange izikhundla emazingeni aphansi.Khona manjalo kunokukhuluma okuthi i-ANC ingase iqoke omunye umuntu kwesokhulumela iqembu, athathe izintambo kuKodwa oseke wakuveza ukuthi usefisa ukutshalwa kwenye indawo.
title: Buhlakaziwe ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal

text: ITHOLAKALE isicwiyiwe imoto eyayishayelwa nguNksz Nana Bhengu- Gilose (31)  okuthiwa wabulawa ngesonto eledlule, ngoMsombuluko eMlaza, ngumlisa ayemgibelisile.Kuthiwa imoto, iNissan Micra etholakale ngoLwesine eNgonyameni, ibisikhishwe amasondo, umsakazo nezipikha. Kubikwa ukuthi ibisidayiselwe umuntu ohlala kule ndawo (eNgonyameni).Unina kamufi, uNksz Sizakele Bhengu, uthe umkhondo wemoto bawuthole ngomlisa wasendaweni ( eNgonyameni), otshele uyise kamshana wakhe,  owayekhona ngenkathi kubulawa indodakazi yakhe.  Uthe lo mlisa ofike nalo mbiko ucele ukuthi angadalulwa emaphoyiseni.“ Sizwa kuthiwa besekunomuntu obezimisele ngokuyithenga imoto njengoba ibifihliwe lapho etholakale khona. Isifiso sami wukuthi kutholakale iqiniso mayelana nesigameko ukuze ngazi ukuthi kwenzakalani ngosuku okwabulawa ngalo uNana ( umufi),” kusho uNksz Bhengu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe amaphoyisa abengakabi nalo ulwazi ngokutholakala kwemoto. Umufi,  kubikwa ukuthi wayephuma ukuyofaka uphethroli nomzala wakhe egaraji elikwa-W, ngabo-4 ekuseni, ngesikhathi owesilisa abangamazi ecela ukugitsheliswa emotweni.Kuthiwa lo mlisa watshela  umufi ukuthi akame ngemuva kokuthi behambe ibangana.Kwabe sekuthushuka abanye abalisa ababili abebemi emgwaqweni, okusolwa ukuthi babelinde obegitshelisiwe.Kuthe uma umsolwa ebona umufi engami lapho ayethi akame khona, wakhipha ibhodlela elifile wamgwaza ngalo esifubeni.Abasolwa kuthiwa batshela umzala wakhe abaqale bamshaya ukuthi akaphume emotweni, maqede bakhipha isidumbu sikamufi abasishiya emgwaqweni, kwa-C kulo leli lokishi
title: Itholakale icwiyiwe imoto 'yowagwazwa' wumgibeli eMlaza

text: UNOBUHLE waseNanda, uNksz Sinethemba Ndlovu (22), ugwazwe washona kade ekhulumela uzakwabo osakaze ngengilazi umfana obempansa eMsinga, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Ngokusho komphathi wenkampani ebiqashe uSinethemba, iSthandiwe Projects, uNksz Sthandiwe Makhoba, umufi ubehamba nozakwabo bephuma ezinkundleni zaseMphelankani lapho kade kunomcimbi waminyaka yonke wezimoto iMsinga Driftkhana ngesikhathi belandelwa ngabafana.“Omunye wabe esepansa enye intombazane yaseMlazi kanti izomshaya nge-glass. Lo mfana wabe esejaha le ntombazane yaze yafika lapho esasilele khona eBuhlebomsinga Boarding School. USne wabe esebuza kulo mfana ukuthi yenzeni le ntombazane ngoba uyena oyisukelile kodwa lo mfana wajikela kuye, wamshaya ngequpha maqede wamgwaza ngommese ngaphansi kwebele.”USthandiwe uthe bamphuthumisa esibhedlela sendawo uSinethemba kodwa washonela khona ngenxa yokuthi wophe kakhulu. Uthe angamanga amahlebezi asesabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana okuthi umsolwa ubefuna ukudlwengula uSinethemba.USinethemba ubengumkhangisi wengqephu onekusasa eliqhakazile futhi oseke wangena nasemzuliswaneni wamanqamu kuMiss Pinetown ngo-2017.Umndeni kaSinethemba uthe namanje akukavumi ukuba ukhulume ngenxa yokuphatheka kabi njengoba lesi sehlakalo sibazumile. Umama kaSinethemba ubebizwe ngamaphoyisa aseMsinga ukuyobheka isidumbu sendodakazi yakhe.Lo mndeni uthe okubaphethe kabuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi uSinethemba ubenza kahle nasezifundweni zakhe njengoba ebesenza unyaka wokugcina ezifundweni ze-Administration e-University of KwaZulu-Natal, ophikweni oluseWestville. Osophikweni lwezokuxhumana e-UKZN, uMnuz Ashton Bodrick, uthe zibaphathe kabi lezi zindaba zokudlula emhlabeni kwesitshudeni sabo.“Udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane alunandawo emphakathini.”Umsunguli weMsinga Driftkhana, uMnuz Smanga Mabaso, uthe kuyishwa ukuthi abesifazane bahlaselwa ngabantu okumele ngabe bayabavikela.Uthe uSinethemba nozakwabo baqede ukusebenza ngabo-10 ebusuku base behanjiswa esikoleni esingumakhelwane naseMphelankani lapho bebezolala khona.“Abanye bacele ukusala ngoba bekunabaculi ebebenandisa. Ebusuku bahambe ngezinyawo ngoba kuseduze esikoleni kanti bazohlaselwa.”Uthe bayawathemba amaphoyisa ukuthi azobamba abasolwa ngokushesha.“Sithanda ukudlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini, abangani nabo bonke abebemazi.”Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa aseMsinga aphenya icala lokubulala.“Kusolwa ukuthi ngoSepthemba 22 ngo-2 ezintatha eSidakeni, eMsinga, owesifazane oneminyaka engu-22 ugwazwe umuntu ongaziwa. Ugwazwe ngaphansi kwekhwapha kwesobunxele nasesiswini,” kusho uCapt Gwala.
title: Usadidekile umndeni ngesitshudeni sase-UKZN esibulewe

text: SABELO NSELEZIVUKE umbhejezane izakhamuzi zaseTehuis, eMgungundlovu, ngemva kokuchayiswa ngabasebenzi bakwa-Eskom okuthiwa abathi abasebenzi bakhonabatshele umphakathi ukuthi ngeke bawulungise ugesi ngoba uwumkonkotelo.Izakhamuzi ezihlala eduze nenxanxathela yezitolo i-Edendale Mall, zithi sezihlale izinsuku ezingaphezu kweziyisikhombisa zingenawo ugesi.Zithi uma zibika ngale nkinga kwa-Eskom, zitshelwa ukuthi ngeke zilungiselwe ugesi ngoba zizixhumelene ngokungekho emthethweni.Izolo nangoLwesibili ebusuku, izakhamizi zivale umgwaqo omkhulu u-Edendale, nezintuba ezingenela e-Edendale Mall.Izimoto ziphoqelekile ukuthi zichushisane emigwaqweni emincane eguduza elokishini iMbali, kanye nase-Ashdown.  Izakhamuzi zithi zibolelwa ukudla emafrijini kanti nabafundi ababhala izivivinyo zokuphela konyaka, bayaphazamiseka njengoba bengenagesi.Bathe usizi lwabo lwaqala ngo-1997 beqala ukuhlala kule ndawo.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Xolani Ngongoma, livumile ukuthi kunenkinga yabantu abazixhumela ugesi ngokungemthetho, nokwenza ugesi uhluphe.“I-Eskom ingafika iwulungise ugesi manje, kodwa inkinga ukuthi uzosala uwe futhi. Kufanele siqhamuke nesisombululo sesikhathi eside, hhayi isisombululo sesikhashana, ” kusho ikhansela.UNgongoma uthe amalungu omphakathi kufanele apheze ukuzama ukuzilungisela wona ugesi uma unenkinga.“Bagqekeze i-transformer kagesi bezama ukuyilungisa, yabehlula.”Okhulumela i-Eskom KwaZulu-Natal uNksz Joyce Zingoni, uthe nakuba bazi ukuthi kunombhikisho kule ndawo omayelana nokuhamba kukagesi, akekho oseke wabika ngale nkinga emasontweni amabili edlule.Ababhikishi babuye bakhala ngokuthi abawatholi amanzi. abathi abawatholi.UNgongoma uthe inkinga ukuthi izakhamuzi zizixhumele amanzi ngokungekho emthethweni.  “Banqabile uma umasipala uthi uzobafakela ama-meter.”Okhulumela uMsunduzi uNksz Thobeka Mafumbatha, akayiphendulanga imibuzo athunyelelwe yona, kwaze kwayoshicilelwa.
title: Badinwe i-Eskom inqaba ukulungisa umkokotelo

text: SIMPHIWE NDWANDWEAMAJELE abizwa ngamadolobha akhiwe kuwo asezoguqulwa amagama anikezwe lawo magama anikeza ithemba futhi anokugqugquzela ababoshiwe ukuthi balungise izigwegwe bazalwe kabusha empilweni.UMnuz Zack Modise, owayeyiPhini loMphathi wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo emajele kazwelonke, uthe umjikelezo wokuqala wokwethiwa kwamajele sewuphothuliwe sekulindwe ukuthi uNgqongqoshe walo Mnyango osanda kuthatha izintambo, uDkt Sibusiso Ndebele, enze isimemezelo.UModise uthe isimemezelo sizokwenziwa maduze uma sekuhlangane iPhini likaNgqongqoshe, uMnuz Ngoako Ramotlhodi, naye uNdebele bathatha isinqumo ngamagama amasha.Amajele azokwethiwa kabusha angu-11 kodwa kwabuye kwaphakanyiswa igama lejele laseNcome ukuthi nalo liguqulwe igama. UModise uthe isinqumo mayelana nokuthi liguqulwe manje igama lejele laseNcome sizothathwa nguNdebele noma lifakwe emjikelezweni wesibili kwazise akukaze kulalelwe zethulo zezakhamuzi ngegama ezingathanda libizwe ngalo.“Sifuna ukuthi abantu ababoshiwe bakuqonde kahle ukuthi yini elindeleke kubo emajele ababoshelwe kuwo. Lokhu bazokubona befika nje ngalo igama lejele abagwetshelwe kulo,” kusho uModise.KwaZulu-Natal amajale azoqanjwa kabusha yi-Durban-Westville, elaseMgungu-ndlovu iNew Prison. Phakathi kwamagama okwanxuswa ukuthi kubizwe ngawo ijele i-Westville kwakukhona nelalowo owayeyisishoshovu se-ANC u-Andrew Zondo owaqhumisa ibhomu eManzimtoti ngo-1985. Negama likaMnuz Robert Mcbride owayengukhomishana wamaphoyisa eKurhuleni, eGoli laphakanyiswa ngeqhaza lakhe emzabalazweni.UModise, osengukhomishana wamajele eGauteng, uthe abantu baphakamisa namagama ezishoshovu zezombusazwe ngakho uNdebele uzocubungula ukuthi kufanele kusetshenziswe maphi amagama afanele.Kwezinye izifundazwe kuzokwethiwa kabusha lamajele: Barberton, Modimolle, Johannesburg, Pretoria Central, Leeuwkop, St Albans, East London, Pollsmoor ne-Kroonstad.
title: Amajele azoguqulwa amagama anikezwe amasha

text: KONKE kukhomba ukuthi lizothi liphela leli sonto iqembu lesizwe labesilisa laseNingizimu Afrika, iBafana Bafana, libe selinaye umqeqeshi omusha.Lokhu kuvezwe nguDominc Chimhavi okunguyena obheke ezokuxhumana kuSouth African Football Association (Safa). Ukuphela kwaleli sonto kuzobe kusho ukuthi sekuphele izinyanga ezimbili ekhonjwe indlela u-Ephraim “Shakes” Mashaba obeqeqesha leli qembu ngaphambi kokuba atholwe yikomiti eliqondosa ubugwegwe enecala. Kwavela ukuthi wephula umthetho wezokuxhumana wenhlangano waphinde wahudulela phansi isithunzi sayo. Namanje uMashaba usagqigqa ezinkantolo njengoba efuna ukubuyiselwa emsebenzini wakhe, kanti uke wazama nokuvimba iSafa ukuthi ingalokothi iqashe omunye umuntu udaba lwakhe lungakaqedwa. Kuchithiwe nokho lokho enkantolo.“Kusele kancane kakhulu ukuthi kumenyezelwe umqeqeshi omusha weBafana. Leli sonto lizophela esekhona kodwa ngeke ngikwazi ukwenaba ngalolu daba ngoba luphethwe ezingeni eliphezulu,” kusho uChimhavi.Ekuqaleni kwenyanga iSafa imemezele ithimba labazosiza le nhlangano ekutheni iqashe umqeqeshi ozongena athi khaxa kukona konke okudingwa yileli qembu. Lapho kuvele amagama oLucas Radebe, owaba ukaputeni weBafana iminyaka wadlala nase-England kuLeeds United ngezikhathi zayo zodumo. Kukhona noBenni McCarthy kuleli thimba. UMcCarthy usazihola phambili namanje ngokuhlohlela iBafana amagoli. Uke wadla isicoco se-UEFA Champions League neFC Porto yasePortugal ngaphansi kobuholi bukaJose Mourinho oseqeqesha iManchester United.Ngaphandle kwalaba kukhona nowayengukaputeni iBafana idla iscoco se-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ngo-1996, uNeil Tovey, Farouk Khan, Buti Mathathe, Anna Nyman noNatasha Tsichlas. Muva nje iSafa ikhiphe uhla lwabaqeqeshi osekuyibona abasele embangweni. Okucacayo ngabo ukuthi abaphesheya kwezilwandle okukhomba ukuthi iSafa ibheka e-Europe hhayi ekhaya.La magama ahlanganisa uRoberto Mancini odle isicoco neManchester City, Giovanni Trapattoni, uqweqwe lwase-Italy, Hassan Shehata, oke wagila izimanga ne-Egypt edla ama-Afcon kulandelana, Hugo Broos ongumpetha kwazise unqobe neCameroon ekuqaleni konyaka eGabon, Bernd Schuster noLothar Matthaus wodumo kuGermany.Noma ngabe ubani ogcina ewutholile lo msebenzi uzoba nenyanga eyodwa kuphela ukulungiselela umdlalo wakhe wokuqala okuzoba ngoMashi kweyokuhlungela i-Afcon ka-2019.
title: ISafa izoveza ozocija iBafana maduze

text: ISIPHUMELE obala iDA ngokweseka i-EFF kwisiphakamiso sayo sokungabethembi ubuholi bukaNdunankulu wasesifundazweni iNorth West, uMnuz Supra Mahumapelo.Iveze ukuthi izocela uSomlomo wePhalamende uNkk Baleka Mbete ukuthi agunyaze ukuthi kuvotwe ngokuyimfihlo kulesi siphakamiso sokuchitha uMahumapelo.I-EFF ifake isicelo sokuthi kuhlale iPhalamende ngokushesha ukuze izokwenza lesi siphakamiso.Kusolwa ukuthi i-EFF iqhamuke nalesi siphakamiso ngemuva kokuthi oKlebe begasele emahhovisi kaMahumapelo ngoLwesine ekuseni, njengengxenye yophenyo lwabo lwenkohlakalo okuthiwa ikhungethe lesiya sifundazweUmholi we-DA eNorth West, uMnuz Joe MacGluwa uthe: “Sifisa ukukubeka kucace ukuthi uma lesi siphakamiso sibekwa etafuleni, sizosiseka. Sikubheke ngabomvu ukuseka lesi siphakamiso se-EFF ngoba asihambisani nalokhu okwenzeka esifundazweni. Inkinga enkulu la akusiye uNdunankulu wesifundazwe sethu kuphela kodwa i-ANC uqobo lwayo.”
title: I-DA yeseka i-EFF kolukaMahumapelo

text: KUVELE ukuthi sabulawa ngokushaywa ngesando ekhanda emagcekeni esikhungo saseDurban University of Technology (DUT) isitshudeni uSandile Ndlovu oshonele esibhedlela ngoSepthemba ngemuva kokulimala kanzima ekhanda.Umsolwa ecaleni lokubulawa kukaNdlovu (18) uMsizi Mbutho (29), uboshwe ngeledlule kanti uvele okwesibili enkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini ngoLwesithathu. Ngokwamaphepha asenkantolo, umsolwa ubhekene namacala amabili, elokubulala nelokubamba inkunzi.UMbutho akakayazisi inkantolo ukuthi uyawavuma noma uyawaphika amacala abekwe wona kanti futhi akasifakanga nesicelo sebheyili. Ngesikhathi esenkantolo kuvele ukuthi uNdlovu, obefundela iziqu ze-Industrial Engineering, wabulawa ngokushaywa kanzima ekhanda.  Phambilini bekubikwa ukuthi uNdlovu wabulawa ngokugwazwa.  Bekungokokuqala abashushisi beveza ukuthi uNdlovu wabulawa “ngokushaywa ekhanda ngesando, okwaholela ekufeni kwakhe.”Sandile NdlovuAbashushisi basola uMbutho ngokweba izinto zikaNdlovu okubalwa kuzo iselula etholwe kuyena ngemuva kokumhlasela ngesando ngoSepthemba 9. Ushonele esibhedlela ngoSepthemba 21 esephefumula ngemishini. Abashushisi bathe bafuna uMbutho abhekane nesigwebo esinzima kunazo zonke esigabeni samacala asolwa ngawo. UMbutho kuvela ukuthi akazimisele ngokufaka isicelo sebheyili. Icala lihlehlisiwe njengoba kusalindelwe umbiko wokuhlolwa kwesidumbu sikaNdlovu. Inkantolo isazonquma ukuthi leli cala lizoqhubeka eNkantolo yeMantshi noma lizodluliselwa eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini.
title: Okusha ngokubulawa kwesitshudeni saseDUT

text: WILLEM PHUNGULAUBHOKA uyakhahlela umsakazi woKhozi FM, uNonhlanhla 'Mdonso' Ngcobo ngokushiwo ngabasewakhe ukuthi umkwenyana wakhe ushone sebehlukene.UMdonso ubeshade noMnuz Nathan Pottier (ongasekho) kodwa umfowabo kamufi uMnuz Trevor Kelly uthi uhambe emhlabeni bengasahlali ndawonye. Uthe umfowabo ubesefake amaphepha esehlukaniso enkantolo. UKelly uthi uMdonso unqumele ugwayi katiki  umfowabo ukuba akhethe phakathi kwakhe nezingane. Uthe umfowabo uzame wahluleka ukubekezelela uMdonso, obengazifuni nokuzibona izingane zakhe azithole ngaphandle, wabe esemtshela ukuthi ukhetha izingane zakhhe abezithanda kakhulu."Umfowethu uzamile ukuhlenga umshado wakhe kodwa zangavuma izinto njengoba umakoti emnike umnqamulajuqu wokukhetha phakathi kwakhe nezingane. Umfowethu ube eseshiya endlini abebehlala kuyo, ngoJuni nyakenye," kuchaza uKelly.Umufi ushade noMdonso evele esenezingane ezimbili komunye wesifazane. Bebengakatholi ngane emshadweni ngaphambi kokuba ashone.Okunye athe ufuna ukukucacisa uKelly, wukuthi kakulona iqiniso ukuthi umfowabo washona engozini ye-ambulensi njengoba kwakubike Isolezwe. Uthe umfowabo wabulawa yiCovid-19 ephuthunyiswa esibhedlela.UMdonso ubhoke ngolaka ethintwa yileli phephandaba, wathi uyakweshwama ukuthi yena ubesedivosa nomkhwenyana."Uthi wayethuleleni ukusho le nto umkhwenyana wami esaphila? Sebebeyangidivosa ngoba engasekho umkhwenyana wami. Ayikho yonke le nto eshiwo nguTrevor, uyangihlambalaza nje," kuzikhalela uMdonso.Uthe umkhwenyana uze wahamba besathandana futhi behlala ndawonye eThekwini, waze wabuyela eShowe ngo-Okthoba ngoba eseqede umsebenzi ayewenza. Umkhwenyana ushone ngasekuqaleni kwenyanga kade beshade ngayo le nyanga ngonyaka odlule.Ethintwa ngokushiwo nguMdonso uKelly, uthe bewumndeni banamaphepha angubufakazi bokuthi ubesemdivosa umfowabo umakoti. Uthe emva kwezinsuku ezimbili kushone umfowabo bathintwe ngabameli, bethi bafuna ukuqedela isehlukaniso kodwa umndeni wabatshela ukuthi akasekho umfowabo."Ngimtshelile umama wami ukuthi asimdedele athathe konke okukamfowethu uMdonso ngoba bebesashadile ngokwamaphepha kodwa thina kasisafune lutho oluzosihlanganisa naye," kusho uKelly.
title: OwoKhozi akasabhekani nabasemzini

text: UKUBHEBHETHEKA ngamandla kwegciwane iCorona kuleli, sekunyuse kakhulu izinga lobubha nendlala emphakathini. Lokho kwenza kube nesidingo sosizo oluphuthumayo lokubeka ukudla etafuleni emindenini eminingi ngalesi sikhathi esinzima.Izitolo zakwaBoxer zisabele ikhwelo, ukuze zihlangabezane nalesi simo ngokuthi ziqoqe izijumbana zokudla ezingabiza uR2 million, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imindeni engu- 40 000 inakho ukudla kulobu busika obushubisa umnkantsha.Umqondisi ophikweni lwezokukhangisa kulesi sitolo, uMnuz Andrew Mills, uthe ngemali ewu-10c ebinikelwa ngabathengi, nebibanjwa kuyona yonke impahla ebithengwa esitolo phakathi kukaMashi no-Ephreli ezweni, abakwaBoxer bakwazile ukuqoqa uR2 million.Uthe izinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo ezingu-398 ezweni lonke zithole izijumbana zokudla ezingu-10 000.“Siyaziqhenya ngokusiza izinhlangano eziningi kulezi zinyanga ezinzima. Sibonga nabathengi bethu ngosizo lwabo olwenze umehluko emindenini eminingi edinga usizo,” kusho uMills.Uthe ukuhanjiswa kwezijumbana zokudla kuqale kule nyanga, kanti igxathu lokugcina lokuthi kunikezwe izinhlangano kuzoba isonto lokuqala lenyanga ezayo.Kuzonikelelwa izindawo okuhlala kuzo izintandane, amakhaya abadala nezinye izinhlangano zomphakathi. KwaZulu-Natal kuthiwa izinhlangano zomphakathi ezisezindaweni okubalwa kuzo uMlaza, eLadysmith, iMpangeni nePort Edward sezingaqala ukulanda izijumbana.
title: AbakwaBoxer banikele ngokudla

text: UMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs, uGavin Hunt, akuvumi alahle ithemba ngokuhlangana kwezinto eNaturena phezu kokuba sekusele amasonto ambalwa kusongwe isizini ka-2020/2021.Selokhu uHunt efikile kwiChiefs ekuqaleni kwesizini, abadlali ikakhulukazi abasemuva nonozinti, benza amaphutha aholela ekuhlulweni kweqembu. Emidlalweni emithathu yakamuva yeligi, iChiefs ithole isibhaxu emaqenjini amabili avika izembe okuyiChippa United neTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM). Kwemibili iphunyukwe ngamaphuzu ngenxa yamaphenathi adalwe ngumdlali wasemuva uSiyabonga Ngezana. Ngempelasonto edlule, idlale ngokulingana neBloemfontein Celtic ikade isihamba phambili ngo 2-0.Njengoba Amakhosi ezohlala isonto lonke engadlali, uHunt ubona ithuba lokulungisa okonakele. Azobuyela enkundleni ngoMeyi 12 eseyogadulisana neSwallows."Leli yikhefu elide kunawo wonke esesike sawathola. Sinezinsuku eziyisikhombisa. Sizoba nezinsuku ezimbalwa emuva kwesibhekane nakho kusukela ngoDisemba. Sizothola izinsuku ezimbalwa zokulanda amandla, sibuye siqhubeke futhi," kusho uHunt.IChiefs isawine imidlalo yeligi eyisithupha kuphela kwengu-24 kule sizini. Amathuba okuqeda kwi-Top 8 abukeka eshabalala. Emidlalweni emine yokusonga isizini, iChiefs izobhekana neSwallows, Black Leopards (Meyi 18), Lamontville Golden Arrows (Meyi 26), TS Galaxy (Meyi 29).Mayelana nokuhlulwa yiTTM ngemizuzwana yokugcina, uHunt uthe: "Kunzima kakhulu ukuchaza. Angazi. Kuyaxaka lokhu engikubonayo. Ngicabanga ukuthi bekusifanele ukuphuma siphethe okuthize esandleni. Kodwa ukwenza amaphutha kanjena (kwenzelana phansi). Kodwa sizoqhubeka nokulwa. Emidlalweni emine esele kufanele sizame ukuwina, sibone ukuthi kwenzekani," kusho uHunt.
title: UHunt usanethemba ngokuhlangana kwezinto kwiChiefs

text: UFUNA ukuba namahhotela iNingizimu Afrika yonke uNkk Siphokazi Thiam ongumnikazi wendawo yokuhlala izivakashi iLa Teranga Accomodation and Conference Group etholakala eKokstad naseMargate.UNkk Thiam usanda kunqoba iLilizela Award emunxeni webhizinisi lezokuvakasha elisathuthuka futhi elihamba kahle.Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi wasungula leli bhizinisi ngo-2009 enamakamelo amathathu okulala izivakashi.“Ngesikhathi ngiqala kwakunzima ngoba ngisemkhakheni ogcwele kakhulu ababebala elimhlophe kodwa ngabekezela ngazitshela ukuthi ngizophumelela. Bengibuzwa imibuzo eminingi yokuthi ngabe indawo yami iphephile? Ngabe isesimeni esamukelekile kwizivakashi neminye imicikilisho. Ngiye ngasebenza ngokuzikhandla ngakwazi ukwandisa indawo yami njengoba sengisezindawo ezintathu ezihlala izivakashi eKokstad neyodwa eMargate,” kusho uNkk Thiam.Uqale enabasebenzi ababili kodwa manje usenabasebenzi abawu-20.Ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi bangene emkhakheni wezokuvakasha uma bewuthanda ngoba unamathuba amaningi.“Umkhakha wezokuvakasha unezingqinamba zawo ngoba kugcwele kakhulu abamhlophe kodwa uma uzimisele uzokwazi ukuthola amathuba kuwo ukuze uphumelele. Ngingagqugquzela intsha kakhulu ukuthi ingene kuwo futhi isebenzise amasiko ayo ukuheha izivakashi ngoba maningi kakhulu amathuba kulo mkhakha,” kusho uNkk Thiam.Ukunqoba kwakhe iLilizela Award KwaZulu-Natal kumlethele uR50 000 awuklonyeliswe wuNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha neMvelo uMnuz Sihle Zikalala nesikhulu esiphezulu esisabambile kwiTourism KwaZulu-Natal uNksz Phindile Makwakwa.Le mali uthe uzoyisebenzisela ukukhangisa ibhizinisi lakhe kwazise ubesanda kuwina noR35 000 kwaSanlam nawo ozomsiza ukuthi azikhangise.
title: Unephupho lokuba namahhotela izwe lonke

text: IPHUME izolo ekuseni esibhedlela intokazi esizakhele igama ekulingiseni, u-Enhle Mbali Maphumulo, okuthe ngoLwesithathu ntambama izigebengu zazama ukuyiphuca imoto enxanxatheleni yezitolo iHyde Park Corner, eGoli.Izigilamkhuba zigcine ngokuthatha ubucwebe nesikhwama ebisiphethe.Kuthiwa ngesikhathi kwenzeka lokhu ubehamba yedwa eyocosha igilosa encane yezingane.Umthombo ongashayi eceleni ozifikele wona mathupha la kwenzeke khona ubugebengu, uthe * -Enhle ubethuke kakhulu ngemuva kwalesi sigameko.“Mina ngimfice esehleli emotweni yabosizo lokuqala bembheka, indlela abethuke ngayo ibimangalisa. Ugcine ngokuthi ahanjiswe esibhedlela ngenxa yokuthi bekungehli ukuthuka kwakhe, kwabonakala ukuthi kungcono ayobonwa wodokotela,” kusho umthombo.Uthe izigilamkhuba zishaye zachitha neringi yakhe yomshado nobunye ubucwebe akade ebufakile.“Imoto ikhona abayithathanga yona. Siyabonga nje ukuthi uyaphila futhi akalimalanga kodwa indlela abamhlukumeze ngayo ngesikhathi bemgcweleza imshiye ephatheke kabi kakhulu,” kuqhuba umthombo.Imenenja ka-Enhle Mbali, uJarred Doyle, nayo ikuqinisekisile ukuthi usebuyele ekhaya.“Usebuyele esimeni manje futhi akalimele ndawo. Nami ngifike endaweni yobugebengu ngamthola esekhona kodwa okuningi angikwazi,” kusho uJarred.Ekuqaleni konyaka odlule umyeni ka-Enhle Mbali, uDJ Black Coffee, wabulawelwa iwindi lemoto ebugebengwini obufanayo nobehlele inkosikazi yakhe.UBlack Coffee wathi kwaqhamuka indoda angayazi eyamphoqa ukuthi avule iwindi lakhe esegaraji.Indoda yagcina ithathe isando yashaya iwindi lemoto kaBlack Coffee maqede yamkhomba ngesibhamu wase ekhipha iwashi wayinika.
title: Iphumile esibhedlela inkosikazi kaBlack Coffee

text: UZONGCWATSHWA ngoLwesithathu (namhlanje) umculi wokholo uNeyi Zimu, odlule emhlabeni ngeledlule emuva kokuxinwa yisifo somdlavuza wesikhumba.Emasontweni adlule kwavela ukuthi uNeyi ubambekile nokwaholela ukuthi amalungu e-EFF noMengameli wawo uJulius Malema athi aya ukuyombona esibhedlela iBaragwanath. Kuthiwa uMalema waze wacela ukuthi abantu bambeke emthandazweni ngoba wayegula kakhulu.Emuva kwalokho nabaculi bokholo abahlukene babelokhu beqhubeka nokucelela lo mculi imikhuleko okwaze kwaba nomkhuleko, amaciko ahlukene emkhulekela ngaphambi kokuqala komcimbi wamaCrown Gospel Awards.Izolo kuqale ukuba nezinkonzo zesikhumbuzo zalo mculi eGoli.Imenenja yakhe uMathew Nkabinde, ithe amabandla ahlukene azobamba izinkonzo ukukhumbula lo mculi.“Izinkonzo ziqale ngeSonto emabandleni ahlukene e-All Nations Revival Ministries eCenturion eGoli, enye ibiseSebokeng Technical High. NgoMsombuluko (namhlanje), kuzoba nezinye ezimbili njengoba kukhona ezoba seChange Bible Church eKatlehong ezoqala ngo-12 emini enye ibe seVereeniging Civic Theatre yona ezoqala ngehora leshumi ekuseni,” kusho uMathew.Uthe inkonzo yomngcwabo izoba seHouse of Treasures Ministries eGoli, izoqala ngo-8.30 ekuseni.UNeyi uzakhele igama kwabaningi ecula eqenjini lomculo wokholo iSpirit of Praise.Ingoma eculwa uyena ethi Jehova Retshepile Wena abaningi abazomkhumbula ngayo.Emngcwabeni kaNeyi kulindeleke ukuthi kugcwale abaculi bomculo wokholo abecula nabo nabanye asebenze nabo kule ndima.
title: Selubekiwe usuku lokufihlwa komculi wokholo

text: MHLELI: Ngisuswa inkinga noma isimo i-ANC ezithola ikuso, okulahlekelwa amavoti. Ngiyaqonda ukuthi i-ANC esifundazweni ikhathazekile ngokwehlelwa ukwesekwa.Empeleni eminyakeni eyedlule ubunesiqiniseko ukuthi ukhetho lukazwelonke bazozidlela amahlanga. Kodwa kubukeka sebengenwa uvalo entanyeni manje ngenxa yesimo abangasazi ukuthi sivelaphi noma ingasigwema kanjani.Angisiye umhlaziyi wezepolitiki futhi angifisi ukuba wuye ngoba ngihlaziya ngicheme nenhlangano yami. Umphako engingawunika abaholi be-ANC abakhungathekile ngokulahlekelwa ukwethenjwa, okokuqala kumele i-ANC ishaye isiswebhu emakhanseleni angamavila, iwathembise ukuwakhomba indlela, okwesibili, kumele iye emphakathini iyoxolisa ngokuwafunza amakhansela angasebenzanga ngesigaba sawo sokuqala, okokugcina iqiniseke ukuthi izimfuno zabantu ziyafezeka. Ngezimfuno ngisho izinto ezashiwo umphakathi ukuba wenzelwe zona.I-ANC ayiyeke ukufunza abantu into abangayifunanga ngoba ifuna ukuthola intshontsho. Okunye, inhlangano i-ANC isahlalelwe omkhulu umsebenzi wokubuyisa ukwethenjwa umphakathi waseKZN.Empeleni abantu bayawuthanda umbutho i-ANC kepha badinwa yilezi zithunywa ezihuqa ubuthongo zingasebenzi nhlobo bese zilindela ivoti ngokhetho.Ngiyafisa i-ANC ize endaweni engikuyo eZwelibomvu izobona umhlola wekhansela esafunzwa lona umama Zandile Gumede, elingenzi lutho.Sengisola neProvincial Executive Committee ne National Executive Committee ukuthi bazishaya indiva ikhalo zethu.Uma becanga ukuthi konke kuzobalula ngale kokulungisa abakhohlwe olohulumeni basekhaya bese bekhohlwe umkhandlu weTheku ukuthi bayowuqhoqhobala. Ayifunde ukulalela abantu i-ANC ukuze ithole ukwesekwa.Khabzela MzimelaEZWELIBOMVU
title: [IMIBONO] I-ANC ayiyeke ukusifunza amakhansela

text: INHLANGANO yabafundi iCongress of South African Students (Cosas) ithi ihlela ukuvala ukufunda ezikoleni kulo lonke leli.Ngokwesizathu esibekwe yile nhlangano esitatimendeni sayo, ukubhebhetheka kokwesuleleka kwabafundi ezikoleni ngeCovid-19, yisona sizathu esenze ukuthi babe kulo mkhankaso wokuthi kusukela namhlanje inxenxe abafundi bazo zonke izikoleni ukuthi bangalubhadi ezikoleni.“Sifisa ukubeka kucace ukuthi ngeke kube nokuxoxisana ngalokhu, sifuna ukuhlenga impilo yabafundi ngesikushoyo,” kusho lesi sitatimende.Omunye wabadidiyeli beCosas uZithulile Ndlela, uthe bathathe isinyathelo sokuthi kuvalwe thaqa izikole ngoba sekubonakele ukuthi uMnyango wezeMfundo awunaso isixazululo zokugwema ukungasuleleki kwabafundi ngegciwane icorona.“Sesizivalile izikole eTshwane, eFree State, nase Eastern Cape. Njengamanje eWestern Cape sihlela ukuthi nakhona zivalwe,” kusho uNdlela.Uthe bahlela into efanayo naKwaZu-Natal ukuthi izikole zivalwe njengoba beqale namhlanje ukukhipha lesi simemezelo.Ngesikhathi sokuloba uNdlela uthe kumasipala uKhahlamba, khona besezivaliwe izikole.Okhulumela uMnyango wezemfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, uthe njengoba kuyinyanga yabantu abasha, balindele ukuthi iCosas, kube yiyo egqugquzela ukufunda ezikoleni ukuze abafundi babe nekusasa eliqhakazile.Kuyimanje sisesifundeni aMajuba lapho uNgqongqoshe ehambele khona izikole. Konke kuhamba kahle,” kusho uMlotshwa.Uthe basibonile isitatimende esikhishwe yile nhlangano, wathi balindele ukuthi uma inezinkinga, ixoxisane nengqongqoshe wezeMfundo uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu kunokuthi iphazamise ukufunda ezikoleni.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo kuzwelonke uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, akatholakanga ukuba aphawule. Ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa. Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela nemilayezo ashiyelwe yona ocingweni lwakhe engakayiphenduli.ICosas ithatha lesi sinyathelo nje, uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, isanda kumemezela ngeSonto ukuthi bangu-30 abafundi nothisha asebesuleleke ngeCovid-19 ezikoleni zakulesi sifundazwe.
title: ICosas ifuna kuvalwe izikole ngenxa yokubhebhetheka kweCovid-19 kubafundi

text: OWESIFAZANE ushonile kwathi ababili balimala kabi namhlanje ekuseni ngesikhathi iveni ishayisa neloli emgwaqweni u603, e-Eston, KwaZulu-Natal.Okhulumela inkampani i-ER24, uMnuz Russel Meiring, uthe abezimo eziphuthumayo bafike endaweni yesigameko ngezithuba zabo-9.20 ekuseni, bathole ukuthi iveni neloli kushayisene. “Lezi ziguli ezintathu zitholwe eveni.” Uthe ocaningweni elenziwe ngabezempilo luveze ukuthi owesifazane, okukholelwa ukuthi uneminyaka ebalelwa ku-70, ulimale kabi futhi usesimweni esibucayi. “Iziguli ezimbili zitholakale zilimale okujwayeleke. Abezimo eziphuthumayo balaphe iziguli futhi banikeza isalukazi usizo oluphuthumayo. Ngesikhashana lowesifazane ugcine eshonile yize enikezwe konke ukunakekelwa okufanele,” kusho uMeiring. Eqhuba uthe lezi ziguli ezimbili ziphuthunyiswe ezibhedlela eziseduze ukuze bathole unyango oluthe thuthu. “Amaphoyisa afikile endaweni yesigameko ukuzokwenza uphenyo,” kusho uMeiring.
title: Kushone owesifazane engozini yeveni neloli

text: UMASKANDI wesifazane ovelele kulezi zinsuku ngenxa yokucula noKhuzani neZingane Zoma, uSphesihle “Sphe” Zulu, ukhala ngowesifazane abezoshada naye. Lo msakandi uthi lo wesifazane umsabisa ngokuveza izithombe namavideo abo beya ocansini uma engayeki ukukhuluma ngaye ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Lezi zithandani obekulindeleke ukuthi zishaye indumezulu yomshado, azisabhekani. Kuvela ukuthi ukuhlukana kwazo kudalwe wuKhuzani obewotha ubomvu ngothando lwazo, elubiza ngedimoni.USthembile “Ntando” Mkhize (obeyisithandwa sikaSphe), usolwa nangokuqola abantu esebenzisa igama likaSphe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ethi uzobafunela umsebenzi. USphe usezakhele udumo emculweni kamaskandi njengoba epikwe uKhuzani engomeni ethi Ngashelwa Utsotsi nakwethi Ubhuti Wabantu. Uphinde wapikwa nayiZingane Zoma engomeni yazo ethi Iphenti Lami.Lezi zithandani zithembisene umshado nyakenye kanti bezikipitile iminyaka emibili eMlaza.Kumanje kunecala elivulwe wuSphe emaphoyiseni mayelana nalokhu kuqolwa kwabantu. Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kunecala lenkohlakalo eliphenywa ngamaphoyisa aseMpangeni. Kanti uNtando usabisa ukuputshuzela umphakathi izithombe nama-video abo bezitika ngocansi. Uthe ufuna abantu bazi ukuthi uSphe akasiyo le ntombazane abacabanga ukuthi uyiyo. “Nami ngazi inqwaba yamahlazo akhe. Njengoba abehamba ezibiza ngentombi ehlolwayo, ubanjiwe ngoDisemba ukuthi ubekhohlisa abantu,”kusho uSphe. UNtando uthe umuntu obenesandla esikhulu ekuhlukaneni kwakhe noSphe nguKhuzani ngoba ubengabemukeli ubudlelwano babo. “UKhuzani uzame kaningi ukuphoqa uSphe ukuba ahlukane nami. USphe ubengikhombisa imiyalezo ebivela kuKhuzani, ethi sinamadimoni, " kusho uNtandoEqhuba uNtando uthe wenzele uSphe izinto eziningi ngoba uyintombazane ethanda impilo engaphezu kwamandla ayo. “Nasekhaya eHammarsdale bayamazi  uSphe kanti nabakubo bayangazi ngoba ngike ngaya khona KwesakwaMthethwa, eMpangeni, ” kusho uNtando. Elinye ilungu lomndeni kaSphe, elicele ukungadalulwa, livumile ukuthi liyazi ngalobu budlelwano nangesithembiso somshado. UKhuzani ungumphathi kaSphe futhi bobabili bazalwa oMaNgema.UKhuzani ubengazibambi izingcingo nemiyalezo kuWhatsApp ubeyifunda  kodwa engayiphenduli.
title: UKhuzani “uhlukanise” izitabani ebesezizoshada

text: ICHIPPA United izilethele ingcindezi ngemuva kokwehlulwa ngo 1-0 yiSuperSport United (SSU) emdlalweni obuseSisa Dukashe Stadium, eMdantsane ngesonto eledlule.Leli qembu eliyithemba lase-Eastern Cape bekuwumdlalo walo wokuqala lihlulwa selokhu esigqikini sokuqeqesha kwahlala uClinton Larsen.Okulilethela ukushisa wukuthi lishiya ngamaphuzu amathathu iMaritzburg United eyibambe emsileni .Yize lilahle amaphuzu amathathu kwiSuperSport kodwa ukufika kukaLarsen kulethe omkhulu umehluko kuleli qembu usihlalo walo uSiviwe Mpengesi odume ngokungacucuzi ekuxosheni abaqeqeshi.Kuze kube manje iChippa inqobe imidlalo emibili, yadlala ngokulingana kwemibili yehlulwa kowodwa.Exoxa nozakwabo waleli phephandaba uLarsen uthe akashaywa uvalo, ubelindele ukuthi iqembu lizogcina lishaywa kweminye imidlalo.Lo mqeqeshi uthe leli qembu kuzofanele livuke lizithathe emdlalweni olandelayo ukuze likhombise ukuthi linamandla.“Ezinsukwini ezinhlanu ezedlule ngayisho lento yokuthi ikhona imidlalo esizohlulwa kuyo kodwa okubalulekile kimi ukuvuka sizithathe emuva kokwehlulwa. Angililahlile ithemba ngoba sihamba ngegiya elihle. Khohlwa yindawo esasihlezi kuyo ezinsukwini ezinhlanu ezedlule. Sisenza kahle ngoba siphumelele ukuqokelela amaphuzu ayisishayagalombili emidlalweni emihlanu. Sizimisele ukuwola amaphuzu emdlalweni ozayo ngoba ungomunye wemidlalo esizibophezele ekutheni sithole amaphuzu kuyona,” kusho uLarsen.Kule mpelasonto iChippa uma izimisele ukubalekela izembe kuzofanele iphumelele kumnyama kubomvu eThohoyandou Stadium lapho izotholana phezulu neBlack Leopards engagayelwa mphako uma idlalela esibayeni sayoOkuzokwenza ithwale kanzima iChippa eThohoyandou wukuthi iLidoda Duvha izobe ilwela ukuthi ithole amaphuzu ngenxa yokuthi ishaya iMaritzburg United ngamaphuzu amahlanu.. Lo mqeqeshi uvumile ukuthi kuzobe kunzima ukudlalela eThohoyandou ngenxa yokuthi abalandeli baphuma ngobuningi babo. Ugcizelele wathi lokho akusho ukuthi kuzomenza aye kuyo exegelwa amadolo.“Ingcindezi izobe ikwiLeopards, yile nto engasisiza. Sizoyihlonipha iLeopards - kodwa akusho ukuthi sizoya kuyo sinetwetwe. Sikhombisile emasontweni edlule ukuthi singashaya noma yiliphi iqembu uma siliphakamisile izinga,” kusho uLarsen.
title: Ingcindezi kwiChippa yehlulwa kwiligi

text: SEKUQUBUKE ukungaboni ngaso linye phakathi kwenyanga yaseThekwini, uDr Khehlelezi nomsakazi weZwi Lomzansi uMC Pholobas, kuthiwa babanga isiteshi seYouTube, iSiyaviva TV.Isolezwe ngeSonto lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi ukungazwani kwabo kuze kwaphoqa ukuthi uDr Khehlelezi angabe esangena ohlelweni lukaMC Pholobas kwiZwi Lomzansi, wafakwa kolunye.Bekujwayelekile ukuthi uDr Khehlelezi angene ohlelweni lukaMC Pholobas, aluleke abantu ngezinto ezahlukene ezithinta ukwelapha kwesintu."Isiteshi savulwa wuMC Pholobas kodwa amakhasimende abejoyina (subscriber) kusona alethwe wuDr Khehlelezi njengoba bebesiphethe bobabili. Inkinga iqale ngesikhathi uMC Pholobas esefaka nezinyanga ezingezwani noDr Khehlelezi.Kwesinye isikhathi ubefaka abantu abafike noDr Khehlelezi engamtshelile, ekubeni besebenzisana nokwenze bangabona ngaso linye. Lokho kususe ingxabano phakathi kwabo, uDr Khehlelezi wanquma ukuthi aphume kulesi siteshi kodwa wacela ukuthi sivalwe ngoba kunegama lakhe kusona. Wanqaba uMC Pholobas ukusivala. Kwagcina sekudlala iziqephu zocansi kusona obekungaziwa ukuthi zifakwe wubani. Lokhu kuphoqe uMC Pholobas ukuthi asivale, aqale esinye asibiza ngeSiyaviva TV1,” kuchaza umthombo.Ethintwa uDr Khehlelezi, uthe impela akaseyona ingxenye yesiteshi.“Kube khona ukungaboni ngaso linye phakathi kwami noMC Pholobas kodwa angixabene naye. Ngithathe isinqumo sokuthi ngiphume kulesi siteshi ngoba akusenzeki ngendlela ebesivumelene ngayo. Ngalokho angisho ukuthi kunegqubu engimbambele lona futhi angilwi naye,” kusho uDr Khehlelezi.Kuthiwa uDr Khehlelezi ubesethengele uMC Pholobas iselula nekhamera ukuze kuqhubeke ibhizinisi. Kumanje kuthiwa kune-sim card esele kuMC Pholobas enezinombolo zabantu abese befakwe kulesi siteshi kodwa uMC Pholobas uyayiphika kuDr Khehlelezi, uthi yalahleka.U-MC Pholobas uthe akakaze abambisane noDr Khehlelezi esiteshini seYouTube, iSiyaviva TV.“Isiteshi bekungesami ngedwa, ngasisungula ngo-2013. Udokotela wafika kusona njengomxhasi. Wangithengela ikhamera neselula ukuze ngikwazi ukuqhuba umsebenzi wami. Lezi zinto angithengela zona sengambuyisela zona. Ngizibuyise ngesikhathi kukhona ukungaboni ngaso linye engingazi kudalwe yini. Udokotela ngiyamhlonipha futhi angithandi ukuba yisitha naye. I-sim card okuthiwa angiyibuyiselanga kuyena, vele bekungeyami, bengingeke ngimnike yona. Ngesikhathi ethenga iselula asiyithenganga i-sim card kodwa sasebenzisa eyami.
