Angazi njengoba kwenzeka kanje ukuthi kusho ukuthini ngoba ngesikhathi efuna i-sim card nginqaba nayo, wangisongela wathi uzongikhombisa kodwa wangasho ukuthi uzokwenzani,” kuchaza uMC Pholobas.Uthe okwenze asivale isiteshi aphinde asivule kabusha njengoba sekuyiSiyaviva TV1, kungenxa yokuthi kukhona abangena kuso ngokungemthetho (hack) bafaka iziqephu zocansi kusona. Uveze ukuthi kunabantu abamdlela umona ngempumelelo yakhe ngoba kuningi akwazi ukukwenza ngaphandle kokulekelelwa ngabantu.
title: Kuhlukene inhloko nesixhanti kwinyanga nomsakazi

text: UFANISWE nesithombo ebesisamila kodwa amaphoyisa ase-USA asicekela phansi singakaqhakazi uMnuz Lindani Myeni (29) enkonzweni yakhe yesikhumbuzo ebiseMpangeni Rugby Club, izolo.Lawa amazwi kagogo kaMyeni, uNkk Ntombi Shushu,  othe usukelwe umzukulu wakhe obemnene kodwa amaphoyisa ase-USA ambone eyisigebengu.UNkk Shushu uthe ziyashayisana izitatimende abazinikwa amaphoyisa ngokwenzeka ngosuku lwesehlakalo..“ULindani wethu usukelwe ubengumntwana onemfundiso, elalela, ezithobile engaphakeme  futhi ebika ngakwenzayo ephesheya. Isitatimende samaphoyisa siyashintshashintsha okwenza sibone ukuthi ubulawelwe into engekho,” kusho uNkk Shushu.Ubonge izakhamuzi, uhulumeni nabantu bonke ngokusukuma kwabo bemela iqiniso ngokubulawa kukaMyeni.UNdunankulu uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, obethula inkulumo ngempilo kaMyeni, uthe ababulali bakhe bebefuna kukholakale ukuthi ubeyisigebengu futhi enodlame nokungamampunge.“Kuyasinyanyisa ukubulawa kukaMyeni ngale ndlela engenangqondo. Abebesondelene noMyeni bathi ubeyisidlakela esimnene. Akukholakali ukuthi impilo kaMyeni inqanyulwe ngale ndlela. Abantu ababumbane ngenhloso yokuba kwenziwe ubulungiswa ngokufa kukaMyeni,” kusho uZikalala.UZikalala uthe uma kungase kungenele uMengameli wase-USA uMnuz Joe Biden lokho kungasiza ekuletheni izimpendulo ngokwenzeka kubulawa uMyeni.Inkonzo ibizinyaziswe ongqongqoshe, izimeya, abebhola lombhoxo uMyeni abeyingxenye yalo, abefundisi nabanye.UMyeni udutshulwe kane washona ngo-Ephreli 14 amaphoyisa aseHonolulu, eHawaii, e-USA.Wabikwa owesifazane kwabezomthetho njengomuntu owayezogqekeza kwakhe. Amaphoyisa azithethelela ngokuthi ubewalwisa futhi enodlame kuwona. Izikhulumi ebezishintshana kule nkonzo zithe uMyeni wabulawa ngoba engumuntu omnyama.UMyeni ushiye emhlabeni inkosikazi yakhe uNkk Lindsay Myeni nabantwana ababili.Uzongcwatshwa ngoMgqibelo eSikhaleni.
title: Kukhunjulwe owakuleli obulawe e-USA

text: INSEPHE yaseNamibia, uRobert Nauseb, isilibeke ezandleni zikaPitso Mosimane ikusasa lomkhaya wayo uPeter Shalulile osayine kwiMamelodi Sundowns ngeledlule.UShalulile, ozohlukaniselana umklomelo wamagoli iLesley Manyathela Golden Boot Award noGabadinho Mhango we-Orlando Pirates, ujoyine iSundowns ehambisana noMothobi Mvala obengukaputeni wakhe kwiHighlands Park. UShalulile noMhango bashaye amagoli awu-16 kwiligi emunye ngesizini edlule. Lo mgadli ulandele uMwape Musonda weBlack Leopards ngokudla umhlanganiso kwiPremiership nakwiGladAfrica Championship. Ngesizini ka-2017/2018 laba bagadli baqede bebambene ngamagoli awu-15 emunye bedlala kwiGladAfrica.Kunovalo lokuthi ingabuna le mbali yaseNamibia kwiSundowns ngenxa yomlando ongemuhle ngabadlali abafika eChloorkop kubhekwe lukhulu kubo.“UShalulile usekhombise kaningi ukuthi ungumgadli obukhali. Ngiyathemba ukuthi uPitso uyayazi into amsayinisele yona futhi uyazi ukuthi uzomsebenzisa kanjani. Konke kusezandleni zikaPitso ukuthi lingashabalali ikusasa likaShalulile,” kusho uNauseb.“Ngiyethemba ukuthi uzodlala kwiSundowns ngoba uyena ongumgadli ngokuphelele esikwatini sayo okwamanje. Ngizwile ukuthi kuzofika noKermit Erasmus. Uyena-ke umuntu angagcina ebanga naye indawo phambili. Okuhle ngoPeter ukuthi uyakwazi ukudlala nasezinhlangothini. Ngaleyo ndlela uzonika uPitso izindlela ezehlukene zokumsebenzisa. Ngaphezu kwalokho iSundowns idlala imiqhudelwano eyehlukene.”Ukusayinisa inqwaba yabadlali kweSundowns sekuphinde kwalandelwa yizinkulumo. UMosimane uzeseka ngokuthi ugugelwe, uzama ukulivuselela iqembu ngabadlali abasebancane. Uthe izimbangi zakhe, iKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates, zisayinisile ngesizini edlule, manje sekuyisikhathi sakhe.“Okungikhathazayo nje wukuthi uPitso uzokwenza kanjani ukuthi abagcine bejabule bonke abadlali. Abadlali abasebancane nabo bafuna ukudlala futhi uma kungenzeki lokho abaphatheki kahle. Uzoshuba umbango wejezi kodwa enkundleni kuzongena abadlali abangu-11.”
title: UNauseb ulibeke kuPitso ikusasa likaShalulile

text: INHLANGANO emele imikhandlu yezitshudeni emanyuvesi iSouth Africa Union of Students (SAUS) isisabise ngokuthi izokwanda imibhikisho ezikhungweni zemfundo uma lingavulwa ithuba lokufakwa kwezicelo kulabo abangazifakanga esikhwameni sezimali iNational Students’ Financial Aid Scheme.Le nhlangano ithi baningi abangazifakanga izicelo zokufunda ngoba bengenabo ubuchwepheshe bokwenza lokhu ngoba bekudingeka usebenzise i-internet.UNobhala wale nhlangano, uMnuz Lwandile Mtsolo, uthe bafuna livulwe iwindi ukuze kubhaliswe.Uthe noma isikhathi sasibekiwe sokuvala kodwa lesi sikhwama sinezinkinga ezinkulu ezithinta nokungasebenzi kohlelo lweNSFAS.“Baningi abafundi abasele ngoba bengazange bazifake izicelo. Sifuna kuvulwe iwindi ukuze abafundi bazuze emfundweni yamahhala. Abanye abazifakanga izicelo ngoba abazi bebezophasa kanjani yingakho sithi manje kumele bazifake ngoba sebephasile.”AbakwaNSFAS bamemezela ekupheleni konyaka ukuthi ngeke balivule elinye ithuba lokufaka izicelo zoxhaso.Okhulumela lesi sikhwama uMnuz Kagisho Mamabolo, uthe ngeke balivule ithuba lokufaka izicelo, wathi abafaka izicelo abasebenzise isikhungo somnyango iCentral Applications Clearing House (CACH) esisiza abafuna izikhala zokufunda.UMtsolo uthe bonke abafundi abazali babo abahola ngaphansi kukaR350 000 ngonyaka kumele bayobhalisa mahhala ukuze bahlomule ngemfundo yamahhala.Kulo nyaka imfundo yamahhala izokwenabela kulabo abenza unyaka wesibili.Nyakenye iqale kulabo abenza unyaka wokuqala abazali babo abahola ngaphansi kukaR350 000 ngonyaka.Ngonyaka ozayo le mfundo izokwenabela kulabo abenza unyaka wesithathu emanyuvesi.Khonamanjalo; iNehawu ithi iyakweseka ukuvalwa thanqa kwe-Unisa yinhlangano yezitshudeni iSasco.Izitshudeni zivale le nyuvesi zikhala ngezinto eziningi okubalwa ukunyuswa kwemali yokufunda, ukunikwa kwama-laptop kanjalo nemali yezincwadi, ukufakwa kwamakhamera endaweni yokubhalela * -matric nokunye.Le nyunyana ithe abaphathi bale nyuvesi abebehlangene neSasco izolo kumele bazixazulule lezi zinkinga ngokushesha.
title: Basabisa ngokubhikisha emanyuvesi

text: IPHINI likaMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, liphinde layofonqa isigqoko ebandleni lamaNazaretha ohlangothini lwaseBuhleni, licela izibusiso njengoba ingqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi be-ANC isisemome.URamaphosa uhambele leli bandla eThempelini iThokozani, eMtubatuba, izolo, lapho efike wanxusa amaNazaretha ukuthi akhulekele ingqungquthela ye-ANC ezoqala ngempelasonto ezayo.Encokola uthe ubonga ukuthi obekade emethula ulibize kahle igama lakhe njengoba esejwayele ukuthi kuthiwe ungu Lamaphosa. Ube esezicelela ukuthi naye bamkhulekele njengoba engomunye wabangenele ukhetho. Ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo ebandleni uveze ukuphatheka kabuhlungu ngokuzwa ukuthi kunabantu bakahulumeni abakhomba uShembe ngezibhamu e-Avoca ngaKwaMashu. Uthe yinto embi kakhulu ebekungafanele yenzeke.Ube esewuxolisela uhulumeni ngale nto “embi” eyenzeka wacela ibandla, abefundisi nakumholi webandla uMnuz Mduduzi “Unyazilwezulu” Shembe, ukuthi baxole.Ucele ukuthi babeke ingqunguthela emthandazweni njengoba izobe inabantu abalinganiselwa ku-5 000.Uthe naye ungomunye walabo asebephakamise isandla ukuthi bakhethwe ngakho ucela abekwe emthandazweni, ingqungquthela ihambe kahle naye aphumelele.Abazohambela le ngqungquthela uthe ucela bathandazelwe ukuthi bakhethe kahle, bakhethe abaholi abazoyisa leli lizwe phambili. Uphinde wadlulela kumaNazaretha eThembezinhle, eMthwalume lapho efike wabhonga emswaneni ngokukhothama kweNkosi yamaNazaretha iNkosi uVela “Imisebeyelanga” Shembe.Uthe ubezokhalisana nomndeni nebandla ngoba akasitholanga isikhathi ngesikhathi kutshwalwa inkosi ngeledlule. Emabandleni womabili ushumayele izwi lokuthula nokubekezelelana.Unxuse nabantu bakuleli ukuthi baziphathe kahle kula maholidi, baphephe ngezikhathi zonke.
title: URamaphosa unxuse  izibusiso zamaNazaretha

text: SIMANZONZO isimo ezikhungweni zezempilo eThekwini, abasebenzi bashaya phansi ngonyawo bathi ngeke basebenze zingalandelwanga izinhlelo zokubavikela kwiCorona, kulandela ukuthi ozakwabo kutholakele ukuthi banaleli gciwane.Abasebenzi bama-ambulensi KwaMashu, badube umsebenzi bathi bafuna ukuthi amahhovisi abo ahlanzwe ngesibulalimagciwane, futhi bahlolwe bonke ukuthi kabanalo yini leli gciwane ngoba basebenzisa ikhishi elilodwa.Kusukela ngoLwesihlanu abasebenzi emtholampilo wakule ndawo iPoly endala, sekuphele isonto iziguli ezilanda imishanguzo yazo zibuyiselwa emakhaya, abasebenzi bethi kabasebenzi ngoba kunozakwabo otheleleke ngaleli gciwane.EMtholampilo ePhoenix, esibhedlela eKing Edward naseMtholampilo wasoThongathi abasebenzi badonsa izinyawo.EKing Edward abasebenzi bakhona ngeSonto bebemasha, bekhala ngokuthi kabahloliwe futhi igumbi lokuhlinzwa elithintekile kalivaliwe, liyasebenza.UMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uthe bahlanu abasebenzi okuthiwa banaleli gciwane kulesi sibhedlela kodwa abasebenzi bathi bangaphezulu kwalokho.“Abaphathi basisabisa ngokuthi uma siyeka umsebenzi sizoxoshwa. Sifuna ukuthi sihlolwe sonke ngoba baningi abasebenzi abathintekayo futhi sifuna ukuthi isibhedlela sivalwe bese sihlanzwa sonke ngaphambi kokuthi sibuyele,” kusho osebenza eKing Edward.Omunye wabahlengikazi basePhoenix, uthe abaphathi bathola ukuthi kuneziguli ebezihlolwa kulo mtholampilo imiphumela yazo ekhomba ukuthi zinaleli gciwane babafihlela abasebenzi, iziguli ezithintekayo bazishayela ucingo.“Sibona abantu abaningi ngosuku kodwa abaphathi babone kungcono ukuthi bafihle, siqhubeke sithelele ezinye iziguli singazi. Kumanje baningi abahlengikazi asebezihlolile bathola ukuthi banalo leli gciwane kodwa iziguli ebezikulo mtholampilo ngalezi zinsuku kazifonelwa. Sikuphi isidingo sokuthi kubhaliswe amagama abantu uma bengeke besashayelwa ucingo uma kutholakala ukuthi kukhona oneCorona obesemthomapilo ngosuku lunye nabo?”UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uthe babikelwe ngabasebenzi baseKing Edward abatheleleke ngegciwane nokuthi kunabanye abathi bafuna kuvalwe isibhedlela ngenxa yalokho.“Akuzona zonke izikhungo zezempilo ezizovalwa uma kutholakala ukuthi kunomsebenzi okutholakale ukuthi uneCorona. Njengamanje eKing Edward kusalandelwa uhlelo lokuhlonza ukuthi ubungozi bungakanani, yilo oluzoveza ukuthi yisiphi isinyathelo okumele sithathwe. Ukutholakala kokuthi kunomuntu onaleli gciwane esikhungweni sezempilo akuchazi ukuthi bonke abantu abasebenza khona sebezohlolwa,” kusho yena.
title: Kushubile kwabezempilo eKZN

text: MHLELI: Sengizwe izikhalo ezifanayo ezifundeni ezehlukene okuwuMgungundlovu, eThekwini naseMpangeni ngoMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal. Kunabantu asebebe ngamatoho iminyaka ebalelwa ku-10 kuya kwengu-15.Akukholakali ukuthi kulo hulumeni obusayo kungaba khona lesi simo. Sihlale sikhuthaza abantu ukuba benze izifundo zobunjiniyela kepha uma sebekhona abasetshenziswa ngendlela engabenza bazizwe njengonjiniyela. UMnuz Willies Mchunu esengungqongqoshe wathi makubhalwe incwadi, abantu baqashwe ngokugcwele kepha kwangenzeka lokho. Kwafika uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda njengongqongqoshe naye wathembisa - kodwa kwangaba nashintsho.Manje sekukhona uMnuz Bheki Ntuli kanti sekuvele kwaba nzima kakhulu njengoba sekusayinwa izinkontileka zezinyanga ezintathu.Uma ubheka yinto yamabomu le,  kukhona abadlayo ngosizi lwalezi zingane. Kodwa elami lithi qaphelani amathenda hulumeni anganiqhathi nabantu abanivotele.Inkosi impela ngiyafisa ukwazi isizathu esenza abafowethu baphathwe ngalolu hlobo, bayaguga manje, bazele, abanye sebedlulile emhlabeni izingane zisele dengwane akukho lutho olusele ngaphandle nje komlando othi ubaba wayesebenza eMnyangweni wezokuThutha.Ngithi khuza Khuzeni (Ndunankulu Sihle Zikalala) izwe liyabona.OkaZaza EPORT SHEPSTON
title: Udlala ngabantu uMnyango wezokuThutha eKZN

text: OMPETHA beligi iMamelodi Sundowns ne-Orlando Pirates bahlabene ngokukleliswa kangcono emazweni ase-Afrika ngesikhathi iCaf iqhatha amaqembu azodlala kwiChampions League nakwiConfederation Cup ngesizini ezayo.La maqembu ngeke adlale emidlalweni yesigaba sokuqala sokuhlunga endleleni ebheke esigabeni samaqoqo. iSundowns ikleliswe endaweni yesithupha, iPirates ibe sendaweni ka-23 ngokweCaf.ISundowns,  ephume kuma-quarterfinal kwiChampions League kule sizini,  izodlala ngempelasonto kaDisemba 20-23  nozowina phakathi kwe-US Zilimadjou yasesiqhingini iComoros neJwaneng yaseBotswana ngoDisemba 6-7.“AmaBrazilians azokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi ayalwa azibekisele indawo esigabeni samaqoqo, aqhubekele kowamanqamu ukuze abuye nenkanyezi yesibili,” kusho iSundowns esitatimendeni.AmaBrazilians anqobe iChampions League ngo-2016  eqeqeshwa nguPitso Mosimane oseqeqesha i-Al Ahly yase-Egypt. EChloorkop sekuthenjwe abaqeqeshi abathathu – Manqoba Mngqithi, Rhulani Mokwena noSteve Komphela – ukuthi babuye nenkanyezi yesibili.I-Orlando Pirates, nayo ehlabene ngokwenza kahle kwiConfederation ngesizini edlule, izoqala esigabeni sesibili semidlalo. EZimnyama zizodlala nozowina phakathi kweSagrada Esperanca yase-Angola neMbabane Swallows okuzogadulisana ngoNovemba 27-29. Amaqembu azodlala owomlenze wesibili ngoDisemba 4-6. IPirates izodlala neliwinile ngoJanuwari 5-6 ngonyaka ozayo.IKaizer Chiefs, ebhinjelwa yizinto, izoyiqala ekuqaleni imidlalo yeChampions League ngemidlalo yokuhlunga. Izobhekana nePWD Bamenda engompetha beligi yaseCameroon ngoNovemva 27-29 emlenzeni wokuqala. Kungenzeka Amakhosi azithole sekufanele akhethe lapho efuna ukugxila khona ngoba adonsa kanzima nasemiqhudelwaneni yasekhaya ngenxa yesigwebo seFifa. ICeltic, eqalayo ukuyodlala kwiCAF, izovula  eyeConfederation Cup ne-AS Maniema eqede endaweni yesi­thathu kwiligi yaseDRC iVodacom Lina foot ngesizini edlule. Iqembu elizowina lizo­gadulisana nelizonqoba kwiFuturo Kings yase-Equitorial Guinea neRivers United yaseNigeria.
title: IDowns nePirates kwakleliswe kangcono e-Afrika

text: KUSOLWA izintambo zikagesi ngokuphahlazeka kwebhanoyi eliqashwe abantu abazimele izolo eKameeldrift ePitoli. Kulesi sigameko kushone umuntu oyedwa kwalimala abawu-20. Kubantu abalimele kubikwa ukuthi ababili abebehamba ngezinyawo, oyedwa wabo osesimeni esibucayi. Leli bhanoyi belibheke ezweni laseNetherlands. Abezimo eziphuthumayo babikelwe ngalesi sigameko ngo-4 ntambama, kubikwa ukuthi kuphahlazeke indiza kuMoloto Road, kodwa izimoto zabezimo eziphuthumayo ziphuzile ukufika ngenxa yesiminya-minya emgwaqeni. Kuze kwadingeka ukuthi kufike indiza enophephela emhlane ukuze kuphuthunyiswe abalimele ezibhedlela zasePitoli naseGoli. Obeseduzane nesigameko ozibonele ngawakhe utshele iPretoria News ukuthi ubone indiza indizela phansi ngaphambi kokuthi uphaphe lwayo lushaye intambo kagesi. Uthe uzwe umsindo omkhulu ngesikhathi leli bhanoyi liphahlazeka phansi. Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo eTshwane uMnu Johan Pieterse usiqinisekisile isibalo sabalimele nokushona koyedwa. Izolo ntambama amaphoyisa abesahlaziya indawo yenhlekelele kodwa uPieterse uthe bonke abalimalile bese besusiwe. Uthe abakwazi ukudalula eminye imininingwane ngale nhlekelele ngoba abeSouth African Civil Aviation Authority basaphenya.
title: Kusolwa izintambo zikagesi ngendiza ephahlazekile

text: UKUGULA komsakazi we-East Coast Radio (ECR) uThandolwethu Ngidi, kudale ukuthi kunqanyulwe inkontileka yokusebenzisana phakathi kwakhe nesiteshi.UThandolwethu oke wethula uhlelo lwantambama kwiGagasi FM, ubesakaza uhlelo olungena ngo-9 kuya ku-1 emini phakathi nesonto kwi-ECR.Ubengena ebusuku ngaphambi kokungena ekuseni okuthe uma kwenziwa izinguquko ngoMashi uhlelo lwakhe lwelulwa ngehora.Isolezwe liqaphele ukunyamalala kwakhe emoyeni nokukhishwa kwakhe kwi-website yesiteshi, lathola ukuthi inkontileka yakhe inqanyuliwe ngenxa yokungaphatheki kahle kwakhe.Imizamo yokumthola izikhawu eziningi izolo ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe.Umphathi wezinhlelo uZane Derbyshire, uthe uphatheke kabi ngokuhlukana naye kodwa wathi impilo yakhe ibalulekile.“Yizindaba ezimbi, kwi-East Coast Radio nakimi siqu sami ngoba ngiyazifela ngomsebenzi kaThandolwethu. Unesibindi futhi akesabi ukukhuluma ngezinto abanye abasakazi abangeke nhlobo bazithinte. Sekunesikhathi manje iphimbo lakhe lingazwakali kahle. Akaze abe khona emoyeni amasonto ayisishiyagalombili ezinyangeni ezintathu futhi ngemuva kokuhlangana naye maduze akazwakali engcono,” kusho uZane.Uthe impilo yakhe ibalulekile ngakho bathathe isinqumo sokunqamula inkontileka yabo ukuze agxile ekululameni. Umfisele ukululama okusheshayo.Uthe bazomemezela maduze ukuthi kuzokwenzekani ngesikhathi obekusakaza ngaso uThandolwethu.Kulezi zinsuku kushintshana abasakazi abahlukene futhi izolo bekubambe uNeale Green, ongena ngo-7 ebusuku ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesine.KwiTwitter nakhona bake baphawula ngokungazwakali kahle kwephimbo lakhe.“Nginemibuzo nge-ECR noThandolwethu. Leli phimbo selihoshozele izinyanga, kwenzekani?” kubuza * [email protected]_mbali.[email protected]_Zubane ubuze ukuthi kungani abaphathi bemvumele emoyeni nephimbo elingazwakali kahle.[email protected] uthe uzwakala sengathi uyagula.
title: Kunqanyulwe inkontileka yomsakazi we-ECR

text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane uthi unesu elingalapha inkinga ebhekene nePremier Soccer League (PSL) yokuhlela imidlalo.Ngokusho kukaMosimane, akufanele engabe kuba namaqembu asele ngemidlalo eminingi kwamanye kwi-Absa Premiership njengoba kwenzeka. Njengamanje iSundowns isadlale kuphela imidlalo eyisishiyagalombili, ekubeni kukhona amaqembu asedlale imidlalo ewu-11, newu-10.Sekuyinto ejwayelekile ebholeni lakuleli ukuthi iqembu elidlala kwiCAF Champions League noma kwiCAF Confederation Cup, ligcine lisalele emuva ngemidlalo kwi-Absa Premiership.UMosimane uthe konke lokhu kungagwemeka.“Lena yinkinga engalungiseka. Uke uzibuze ukuthi kungani emazweni afana ne-England (kwi-English Premier League), amaqembu engasali ngemidlalo. Ngisho phela ngoba nabo banamaqembu adlala kwi-Uefa Champions League, FA Cup, nakwiLeague Cup. Umehluko ukuthi bona imidlalo yezicoco bayidlala ngezimpelasonto kuphela. Mhlawumbe nePSL kufanele yenze okufanayo. Kuyinkinga ukuthi uma kukhona iqembu elingadlali ngempelasonto liphumule, kuthi elinye lidlale, akuzwakali,” usho kanje uMosimane.Amazwe afana ne-England, Spain ne-Italy enza okushiwo ngqo uMosimane kodwa ngokwesimo sokuphila angamazwe asezingeni eliphezulu uma eqhathaniswa neNingizimu Afrika.UMosimane uthe uyazi ukuthi akulula ukuthi iPSL yenze njengokucabanga kwakhe kepha kufanele iyibukisise eyokuqhatha amaqembu.“Kuzofanele sikuqonde ukuthi iPSL ifuna uxhaso emiqhudelwaneni ehlukene nasezinkampanini ezihlukene. Kubalulekile ukuthi iligi ithole uxhaso olusezingeni eliphezulu kodwa angisiboni isizathu esingavimba ukuthi bazame lokhu okwenziwa ngamaligi amakhulu nahlonishwayo emhlabeni. Nginethemba lokuthi ingaphela nya le nto yokuthi kukhona osadlale imidlalo eyisikhombisa, omunye ewu-10 njalo njalo,” kuqhuba uMosimane.Ngokusho kukaMosimane, iPSL kufanele izihluphe ngokubuka amanye amaligi amakhulu ukuthi enza kanjani.“Wake wayibona iBayern Munich yaseGermany kuthiwa isele ngemidlalo kwiligi yabo? Ngeke lokho kwenzeke, kungabe kudalwa yini? Ngicabanga ukuthi ileso isisombululo kule nkinga yokusala ngemidlalo,” kusho uMosimane osezakhele igama ngokukhuluma osekufike emlonyeni wakhe.
title: UPitso nesixazululo ekuhlelweni kwemidlalo

text: KUVELA ukuthi iSilo samabandla wonke uMisuzulu kaZwelithini, sizishaye zaphelela ngoLwesine ekhweni laso, kwaMayisela.Imithombo iveza ukuthi iSilo sithumele abakhongi ukuba bayolobola umama wamazinyane aso amabili uNksz Ntokozo Mayisela, ohlala eNewcastle.Ngokomthombo osondelene nezingxoxo zamalobolo, abakhongi bahambise konke obekubizwe abakwaMayisela, waveza nokuthi sekusele ukuthi kukhongwe udwendwe. Uchaza umthombo uthe, abakwaMayisela babize izinkomo eziyisishagalombili nemali ewuR50 000.“ISilo sizishaye zaphelela. Senze isiqiniseko sokuthi konke kuhamba ngendlela.”Kuthunywa abakhongi nje, kusanda kubikwa ukuthi vele iSilo noMayisela sebelibophile ifindo lomshado ngokwasenkantolo. Kuthiwa babhala ngoLwesine ngesonto eledlule, ngaphambi kokuthi kutshwale iNdlovukazi Shiyiwe Mantfombi Dlamini, ozala iSilo.Akukuningi okunye okwaziwayo ngobudlelwano beSilo noNksz Mayisela, njengoba abasendlunkulu beyikhulumela phansi indaba. Kepha omunye umthombo wasendlunkulu uthe kudala iSilo “siwa sivuka noNksz Mayisela”.“Sashaya phansi ngonyawo iSilo, sathi sizomthatha kumnyama kubomvu uNksz Mayisela. Kwathi noma kukhona abagxekayo, sathi  sisuka kude kabi noNksz Mayisela. Ngeke umenze lutho umuntu uma ezithandela umuntu wakhe, ” ngokusho komthombo.Akucaci ukuthi zizowushaya nini kepha abaningi bakholwa ekutheni zizowushaya ngaphambi kokuthi iSilo sigcotshwe ngokomthetho. Imithombo yasendlunkulu iveze ukuthi njengoba seziphothuliwe izingxoxo zamalobolo, uNksz Mayisela usezobonakala eduze kweSilo.Kubikwa nokuthi uNksz Mayisela angase ahambele umhlangano wasendlunkulu namhlanje. Amalungu asendlunkulu azokuba nomhlangano wokuqala namhlanje kusukela kwabekwa iSilo.Imizamo yokuthola izimpendulo kundunankulu kaZulu, Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, ayizange iphumelele. Ihhovisi lakhe lathunyelelwa imibuzo ngezingxoxo zamalobolo ngoLwesibili. Nakuba leli hhovisi likuqinisekisile ukuthi liyitholile imibuzo, kepha kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela izimpendulo zingakabuyi.NgoLwesibili uButhelezi utshele izintatheli ukuthi akazi ukuthi iSilo noNksz Mayisela sebeshadile. Phambilini kuke kwacatshangelwa ukuthi iSilo singase sigcagcelwe yinkosazana yamaMpondo uMntwana Wezizwe Sigcau, abanengane naye.
title: Sizishaye zaphelela iSilo

text: UMQEQESHI we-Orlando Pirates, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, uyawubona umehluko owenziwa wukuba khona komlolongi obhekene ngqo nabadlali baphambili eqenjini.Yize uMicho ezwakalise ukungenami kwabo ngokuyeka amathuba bebambana ngo 0-0 neMartizburg United kwi-Absa Premiership kodwa uwuncomile umsebenzi owenziwe nguStephane Adam.Ngaphambi kokuthi afike u-Adam kweZimnyama iqembu bese liphenduke ihlaya abanye bebabaza ukugeja okuyisimanga kubagadli oThamsanqa Gabuza noJustin Shonga. Kodwa kamuva bese likwazi ukushaya amagoli.Ngaphambi kokubambana neTeam of Choice, livalele phakathi amahlanu lidlala neLight Stars yaseSeychelles koweCAF Champions League. Kwiligi iPirates, ehleli esicongweni, ibalwa namaqembu aseshaye amagoli amaningi. Ishaye awu-16 emidlalweni ewi-14.“Kungenzeka ukuthi nina bezindaba nabalandeli aniboni kodwa thina siyawubona umehluko, ikakhulukazi ekuzithembeni kwabadlali. Bayakwazi ukuzifaka ezikhaleni ngendlela efanele futhi nokuzethemba kwabo kuphezulu uma bephambi kwamapali, nokuthi ibhola balithinta kanye noma kabili. Siyithimba labaqeqeshi lokhu siyakubonga. Kodwa usemkhulu umsebenzi okumele wenziwe njengoba kubonakele nanamuhla (ngoMgqibelo) ukuthi besikwazi ukuvula izimbangi kodwa kunalokho besilikhahlelela unozinti ibhola,” kusho uSredojevic.UMQEQESHI we-Orlando Pirates uMilutin Sredojevic uthi weneme ngomqeqeshi wabagadli kwiBucsI-Pirates izodinga ukuthi ibe bukhali kakhulu kunakuqala ngoMgqibelo uma isidlala neBaroka FC kowamanqamu weTelkom Knockout eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium, ePort Elizabeth, ngo-6 ntambama. Lapha izobe ibhekene neqembu elingakangenelwa ngamagoli kulo mqhudelwano. IBaroka idlale neLamontville Golden Arrows eyihlule ngo 2-0, iMamelodi Sundowns ethole isibhaxu esifanayo yase inqoba ngo 1-0 kwiBidvest Wits.Izolo uMicho uphumuze abanye abadlali bakhe abebedlala neLight Stars ekuhambeni emlenzeni wesibili weChampions League. “Kukhona abadlali esizobaphumuza khona kuzofika umdlalo wamanqamu bewulungele,” kusho uMicho.IPirates izobe ilwela indebe yayo yokuqala selokhu yadla isicoco seNedbank Cup ngo-2014.Khonamanjlo iPirates ishaye iLight Stars yaseSeychelles ngo 3-1 emlenzeni wesibili weChampions League izolo ntambama. Lokhu kusho ukuthi eZimnyama ziwine ngo 8-2 sekuhlanganiswe imilenze yomibili.
title: USredojevic uncoma umsebenzi ka-Adam

text: ULukid, oqokwe kumaSouth African Gqom Awards kumunxa weBest Engineer, ukhala ngokuthi kunezinhlamvu zakhe ezithi ‘Asiwona Amaphoyisa Sabalayikhaya,’ athi zintshontshwe engomeni yakhe nguBabes Wodumo.Echaza uLukid uthe le ngoma yakhe ethi Asiwon’ Amaphoyisa wayenza ngo-2017 futhi Isolezwe NgoMgqibelo lizibonele kuTwitter kunababencoma le ngoma ngawo lo nyaka.“Ngo-2017 iWest Ink yayifuna abaculi abasha nophrojusa. Mina no-Infektion senza ingoma, sabe sesithatha isinqumo sokwenza i-video yale ngoma maqede sayifaka kuTwitter futhi sabhala negama likaBabes Wodumo.”Uthe babenzela ukuthi uBabes Wodumo ayizwe le ngoma ukuze abambe iqhaza kuyo noma ayithenge “wayibukela kodwa wangabuyela kithina ezosho ukuthi uyithandile le ngoma. Kunalokho wenza ingoma eyafakwa kwiBlack Panther ethi Wololo, seyenziwe kabusha sekunezinhlamvu zengoma yethu, eziculwa ngu-Infektion, ezithi Ung’bambe Ung’bhasobhe. Sazama ukuxhumana naye ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kodwa wangasiphendula.”Uthe bashaqekile uma esephinda entshontsha ezinye izinhlamvu zengoma yabo eculweni likaMampintsha. “Ucule izinhlamvu zengoma yami.”Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaBabes ayiphumelelanga kodwa oyimenenja yakhe, uNondumiso Simelane, uthe akuthintwe umnikazi wengoma uMampintsha ngoba ayihlangene noBabes. “Wena ufonele oWodumo Entertainment ekubeni ingoma kungeyeWest Ink,” kuphetha uNondumiso onqabe waphetha ukuphendula eminye imibuzo. Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engatholakali uMampintsha.Yize le ngoma bengayibhalisanga kwaSamro kodwa kuyavela kuTwitter ukuthi yenziwe ngo-2017 nguDJ Lukid kodwa eyoMampintsha noBabes iphume ngesonto eledlule. EyoMampintsha isuse umsindo ngesonto eledlule, kugxekwa ukubonakala kukaBabes noMampintsha ekubeni baze bavulelana amacala besolana ngokuhlukumezana.Kulindeleke ukuba uMampintsha abuyele eNkantolo ePinetown ngoMeyi 15, ngokushaya uBabes. UBabes nodadewabo uNondumiso noTipcee bazobuyela eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini ngoMeyi 16 ngecala lokushaya.
title: Omunye umsindo ngekaMpintsho

text: ABE-IFP KwaZulu-Natal bakhala ngokuphepha kwabasebenzi neziboshwa ejele eliseWestville, eThekwini. I-IFP isho lokhu ngemuva kokuvela kwezinsolo zokuthi kukhona isisebenzi esithethelekile kodwa sabaleka esibhedlela sabuyela emsebenzini.Ngokwesitatimende esithunyelwe yi-IFP kunodokotela otshele izikhulu zasejele ngalesi siguli okuthiwa kumanje sidlezi ngasodwana ezindlini ezihlala ojele. Baphinde baveza nokuthi ingxenye yejele uMedium B awusebenzi njengoba isahlanzisiswa kahle.I-IFP ithe ifuna umnyango uqinisekise ukuphepha kwabasebenzi neziboshwa.Ephendula izinsolo oKhulumela uMnyango wezamaJele kuleli uMnuz Singabakho Nxumalo, uthe abasakwazi ukuphendula ngesimo ngasodwa baphinde bachaze ngaso ngenhloso yokuvikela ukucwaswa kwabasebenzi.“Njengoba sanda isibalo sabatheleleka ngegciwane iCorona sesiqale ukusebenzisa uhlelo lwethu lwezinhlekelele. Lokhu kubala ukubeka eceleni labo abathethelekile ngaphakathi ezikhungweni zethu.Ithimba lezempilo likhona ezikhungweni zethu. Ezokuvikela zikhona okubalwa amaglavu, izifonyo nokunye,” kusho uNxumalo.Uthe banohlu lwezibhedlela ezizosetshenziswa uma kunesidingo sokuthi kuphuthunyiswe iziboshwa. Uthe abasebenzi neziboshwa bayahlolwa ezikhungweni zabo.“Ngakho imibiko ethi abasebenzi neziboshwa kabavikelekile ejele kazilona iqiniso. Asazi lutho ngezinsolo zesiteleka noma incwadi evela kwiziboshwa zikhalaza,” kusho uNxumalo.Uthe umnyango uzimisele emsebenzini wawo futhi akukho abazokufihla njengoba bezoqhubeka bakubeke obala okwenzekayo. Ngokwezibalo ezidalulwe wumnyango okwamanje bangu-675 abathethelekile kanti bangu-219 abasebenzi kuthi abawu-456 kube yiziboshwa. Asebeluleme bangu-133.Ngokwezifundazwe e- Eastern Cape: abathelelekile: 471; Ojele - 72, Iziboshwa - 399, Abasindile - 71, Abashonile - 2E-Western Cape: Abathelelekile: 180; Ojele - 132, Iziboshwa- 48, Abasindile- 51, Abashonile- 2ELimpopo: Abathelelekile 2; Ojele- 2, Abasindile - 1E-Gauteng: Abathethelekile 16; Ojele - 7, Iziboshwa - 9, Abasindile - 9E-Northern Cape - Ojele - 2E-Free State: Ujele - 1KwaZulu-Natal : Ojele - 2Ehhovisi elikhulu loMnyango: Ujele - 1Osindile - 1
title: 'Bavikelekile emajele abaneCorona'

text: BASENKINGENI abashisa izikole KwaZulu-Natal njengoba uMnyango wezeMfundo ungeke uzilungise.UNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane ufuna iqhinga azolisebenzisa ukubhekana nalesi sihlava. Lesi sihlava sibonakala sanda esifundazweni iMpumalanga njengoba kushiswe izikole ezine esikhathini esiyisonto.Okhulumela uDlungwane, uMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa, uthe amalungu ekomiti lezemfundo esiShayamthetho avumelene naye ngokuthi zingalungiswa izikole ezishiswayo.“Uma beshisa isikole bazofundela emlotheni. Isikole sizokwakhelwa umphakathi osidingayo ongasishisi ngoba labo abasishisayo kuyacaca ukuthi abasidingi,” kusho uMthethwa.Uxwayise umphakathi ojwayele ukuthi uma ubhikisha udubele ezikoleni ukuthi upheze ukwenza lokhu.“Uthola ukuthi abantu bafuna umgwaqo noma umtapowolwazi bese beduba bashise isikole. Uma umbhikisho usuphelile bazobuya sebefuna ukulungiselwa isikole abasishisa bona,” kusho uMthethwa.Usho lokhu nje ngeledule abafundi baseBunguni Secondary, eMuden bashisa isikole bekhala ngokuthi abadlile.Kuthiwa abafundi baqala ngokushaya othisha ngamatshe, baphihliza nezimoto zabo, baphihliza wonke amawindi esikole basokhela ngomlilo sasha sangqongqa.UMthethwa uthe izehlakalo ezifuze lezi ezibuyisela umnyango emuva.Okhulumela umnyango kazwelonke uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, uthe amaphoyisa kumele abophe imigulukudu eshisa izikole.Uthe uma kushiswa isikole kudingeka bakhiphe izigidi bezilungisa wathi lokho kubabuyisela emuva.“Okubuhlungu ukuthi kwezinye izindawo ukushiswa kwezikole kusuke kungahlangene nezemfundo. Kusuke kuyizinto zomphakathi bese bekhiphela isibhongo ezikoleni,” kusho uMhlanga.Uthe eMpumalanga zine izikole ezishisiwe esikhathini esiyisonto wathi okubuhlungu ngukuthi ezinye zazo zisuke zingenzi kahle.ISouth African Human Rights Commission ikugxekile ukushiswa kwezikole.
title: Basenkingeni abashisa izikole

text: IVELE izolo eNkantolo yeMantshi eMgungundlovu indoda esolwa ngokuzama ukubulala amaphouyisa nokutholwa nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nezinhlamvu.Le ndoda eneminyaka engu-33 iboshwe ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule ngesikhathi abaphenyi basePlessislaer bephenya ngecala lokubulala kwaPata, eMgungundlovu.Kuthiwa ngoDisemba 26 nyakenye ngabo-2 ezintatha uMnuz Menelisi Mnikathi (42) wabulawa ngokugwazwa ngesikhathi eseMaqeleni, eMbali. Kuthiwa wagwazwa esifubeni, washona esendaweni yesehlo. Kwavulwa icala lokubulala esiteshini ePlessislaer.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe ithimba lamaphoyisa liye endlini kamsolwa, lazazisa ukuthi lingobani.Omunye wabebesendlini uphumile wabaleka, ephethe isibhamu. Amaphoyisa kuthiwa amjahile, kwaba nokudubula.Umsolwa udubuleke emlenzeni, waboshwa, watholwa nesibhamu esinezinhlamvu ezintathu okungekho emthethweni.Umsolwa obefunwa ngamaphoyisa, kuthiwa usagcwele amathafa, angaboshwa noma yinini.UKhomishana wamaphoyisa esifundazweni, uLt General Khombinkosi Jula uthe isibhamu esitholwe ngamaphoyisa sizoyohlolwa ukuze kubhekwe ukuthi asikaze yini sisebenze ukwenza ezinye izigameko zobugebengu.
title: Indoda iboshwe idubula amaphoyisa

text: UBUNGANI obaqala ngetiye, sekuzale ibhizinisi elikhulayo kwezemfashini kwabesifazane baseMgungundlovu.UNkk Zodwa Makhado weZolution Fashion House, wahlanganiswa ukudayisa itiye noNkk Samkelisiwe Khanyile weQhawekazi Styles Collection. Yize bengavulanga ibhizinisi ngokuhlanganyela, bayasebenzisana njengoba sebevule isitolo sabo eMgungundlovu.UNkk Makhado uthe wahlangana noNkk Khanyile ngo-2016 emdayisela itiye lokunciphisa isisu. Ngaleso sikhathi wayengazi lutho ngemfashini kodwa ezithanda izingubo.Uthe uma ehambisela uNkk Khanyile itiye, ubehluleka ukuzibamba agcine ethenge izingubo njengoba wayengumdayisi.UNkk Khanyile uthe wakhuliswa abazali abebekhuthaza ukuthi asebenzise kahle imali. Uthe yonke imali abeyithola ubecabanga ukuthi angayikhulisa kanjani. Izingubo ayezidayisa wayezithenga kwabanye abasiki bengqephu, athe wagcina engasakujabuleli ukusebenza nabo. Yilapho acabanga khona ukuzimela, wazithengela izindwangu.“Angikaze ngikufundele ukuthunga kodwa nginehlo kwezemfashini. Namanje kukhona abathungayo, mina ngenza iphethini. Ngafaka noZodwa ekutheni angene kuleli bhizinisi yize ebesaba,” ehleka.UNkk Makhado uthe wamangala ukuthi uNkk Khanyile wakwazi ukumkhombisa ngisho izindawo ezidayisa izindwangu. Uthe lokhu kumvule amehlo ngoba abesifazane kwaziwa ukuthi abasizani.Okwamanje badayisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Bafisa nokuba namanye amabhizinisi ngaphandle kwemfashini.Bathe okwenza bahluke ngengqephu yabo ukuthi izingubo zabo ungazigqoka kunoma yimuphi umcimbi. Sebenamakhasimende eGauteng naseMpumalanga.UNkk Khanyile uneziqu zeBcom zase-UKZN nePost Graduate Diploma kwiLeadership ayenza e-Unisa. UNkk Makhado ubeyiChartered Accountant, bobabili bawuyekile umsebenzi.
title: Sebewosomabhizinisi abahlanganiswa yitiye

text: ANGASE awezwe ngendaba ama-Olympics aseJapan umpetha welong jump kuleli uLuvo Manyonga kulandela ukuphula omunye umthetho we-Athletics Integrity Unit (AIU). I-AIU imemezele lesi sinqumo ngoLwesihlanu ntambama lapho eveze khona ukuthi uManyonga ujeziselwa ukuhluleka ukuzethula ngesikhathi ebhekwa abantu abahlola igazi labasubathi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abasebenzisi izikhuthazi. UManyonga ujeziselwa ukuthi bekungokwesibili ephula umeththeo we-World Athletics kanti isigwebo sakhe siqale ngoDisemba 23 2020. The Disciplinary Tribunal has banned South African long jumper Luvo Manyonga for four years from 23 December 2020 for whereabouts failures, his second violation of the @WorldAthletics Anti-Doping Rules. 👁️ ⬇️https://t.co/cBkQOqSHT4#AIUNews pic.twitter.com/BW7CyEn9lMUManyonga (30) obe wumpetha womhlaba kwilong jump ngo-2017, waphuma nesiliva kumaRio Olympics ngo-2016. Maningi amathuba okuthi uManyonga aphuthwe ama-Olympics aseJapan nonyaka. Lo msubathi engakwazi ukusiphonsela inselelo isinqumo se-AIU kwiCourt of Arbitraitioon for Sport eseSwitzerland.
title: UManyonga umiswe iminyaka emine kwezokusubatha

text: AKUBAPHETHE kahle abadlali beLamontville Golden Arrows ukwaziwa ngokuthi bavele bazithele ngabandayo uma bebhekene ne-Orlando Pirates bese benikela ngamaphuzu.Lokhu kutshelwe Isolezwe omunye wabadlali abadala kwi-Arrows, uMusa Bilankulu, beqeda ukwenza amalungiselelo alo mdlalo we-Absa Premiership onamuhla ngo-7.30 ebusuku e-Orlando Stadium.Kusukela kuqale isizini i-Arrows isaphumelele ukunqoba kanye kwiMaritzburg United ngosuku lokuqala kuvulwa eka-2018/2019. Ngemuva kokuthi i-Arrows iwine lapho isishaywe kathathu yadlala ngokulingana kathathu. Kuleso sikhathi ishaye amagoli amane yangenelwa ayisithupha.Ngaphambi kokuvuleka kwegebe phakathi kwemidlalo yeligi, i-Arrows engayazi iwini ekhaya ishaywe yiMamelodi Sundowns okwenze umqeqeshi wayo uClinton Larsen wafunga wagomela ukuthi iqembu lakhe lizobuya selishintshe kakhulu ikakhulukazi phambi kwamapali ngoba inkinga yabo kulapho ikhona.Izolo uBilankulu uthe le ndaba yokwaziwa ngokuthi bangamathofi ePirates ayibahleli kahle futhi bazimisele ukwenza konke okusemandleni ukusiguqula lesi simo. “Siyazi ukuthi siyakwazi ukunqoba kwePirates njengoba senzile kumasizini amabili edlule sibashaya ngosuku lokugcina ngesikhathi esifanayo sazifaka kwiTop 8. Nakulokhu sizoya ngalowo mqondo wokwazi ukuthi sinakho kithina ngaphakathi ukubashaya kodwa konke kulele kithina,” usho kanje lo mdlali obalwa nasebedonse isikhathi eside kunabo bonke kuBafana Bes’thende.“Kuzoba wumdlalo onzima impela ngoba iPirates ikhombisa izimpawu zokuhlangana yize ingazange iqale ngendlela ebifuna ngayo. Ukunqoba kwiBucs kungashintsha izinto eziningi kithina ngaphakathi singadlali. Iwini kwiBucs ingenza sikholwe ukuthi singacoboshisa kwasani ezolandela.“Konke lokhu sizokusebenzisa njengesikhuthazi kulo mdlalo. Le ndaba yokuthi sivele siyiphe iPirates amaphuzu ayimnandi kithina ngoba sisuke sazi kahle ukuthi sikwenze konke okusemandleni ethu ukuze sinqobe. Kubuhlungu ukwaziwa njengethofi lePirates ngakho-ke sizokwenza okusemandleni ethu ukunqoba,” kusho uBilankulu.Kulo mdlalo kulindeleke ukuthi kubuye uSiyanda Zwane kwi-Arrows obelimele. Nakuba ubeseluleme koweSundowns kodwa uLarsen uthe ubengafuni ukumjaha ngoba imidlalo ibithothene futhi uyazi ukuthi usazomdinga.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:
title: Sikhathele ukuba amathofi ePirates: owe-Arrows

text: AKUCACI ngokubulawa kowesilisa waseMkhomazi okuthiwa uke wasebenza ematekisini, okusolwa unogada wendawo yobumnandi eThekwini ngokushona kwakhe.UMnuz Percy Ndlovu (32), kuthiwa udutshulwe entathakusa yangoLwesihlanu endaweni yobumnandi ePhoyinti, eThekwini. Abangani bakhe nabamaziyo balokhu bekhale njalo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoNdlovu okuthiwa ubedume ezindaweni zobumnandi, edume nangokwazisa umndeni wakhe. Izolo Isolezwe lihlulekile ukuthola umndeni kamufi nemininingwane ngokushona kwakhe. Omunye wabangani bakhe ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe bazana nomufi besahlala enkabeni yeTheku kodwa akanalwazi ngeminye imininingwane ngokubulawa kwakhe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kuboshwe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-31 ngalesi sigameko.Uthe isigameko senzeka ngezithuba zabo 4 ekuseni endaweni yobumnandi ePhoyinti.“Umsolwa uboshwe amaphoyisa asePhoyinti wavela eNkantolo kaMantshi eThekwini ngoMsombuluko. Asikaziwa isizathu sokubulawa kukamufi kodwa amaphoyisa ayaqhubeka nokuphenya,” kusho uColonel Mbele.Imizamo yokuthola imininingwane yemiphumela yokuvela kukamsolwa enkantolo yephunzile.
title: Indida ngokubulawa kobethanda imicimbi

text: LUKHUZA ibuya uhlelo olukhuluma ngempilo kasaziwayo wakuleli osezakhele igama ngokwenza izinto eziningi emkhakheni wobumnandi, uSomizi Mhlongo.Uhlelo iLiving the Dream with Somizi, sekuvele ukuthi izobe luqukethe okuningi okusha njengoba izinto zilokhu ziqhubekile zimhambela kahle endimeni yobumnandi.Umthombo weSolezwe osondelene noSomizi uthe, baqale ukuqopha ngonyaka odlule ngoNovemba.“Konke kuhamba kahle njengoba ukuqoshwa kwalolu hlelo kusukela ngonyaka odlule kungabanga nazihibe. Abantu bazoqhubeka babone uSomizi enza izinto ezihlukene empilweni yakhe okukhona kuyo unina wakhe uMary Twala nendodakazi yakhe uBahumi,” kuchaza umthombo.Uthe lolu hlelo luzothakaselwa abaningi njengoba ziningi izinto azozikhombisa ngempilo yakhe, abengakaze aziveze phambilini.Ethintwa uSomizi ngalezi zindaba ushaye ngamafuphi wathi ucela kuthintwe uMzansi Magic mayelana nalolu daba.“Akukho engizokusho ngicela ukuthi nithinte isiteshi okuyisona esisakaza lolu hlelo,” kuchaza uSomizi.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe isoka lakhe elisha uMohale Tebogo Motaung, uzoba yingxenye yalo yini uvele waveza ukuthi ngeke aphawule ngalokho wase evalelisa.UNondumiso Mabece, okhulumela uMzansi Magic, uthe lolu hlelo luyabuya ngo-Ephreli walo nyaka.UNondumiso uthe ngeke aphawule okuningi ngalo njengoba kusekuningi abasazohlala phansi bakubheke kulo.
title: Luyabuya uhlelo lukaSomizi kuMzansi

text: UYAZITHETHELELA unozinti weMamelodi Sundowns, uDenis Onyango, ophume enkundleni echiphiza izinyembezi emuva kokwenza iphutha eliholele ekutheni amaBrazilians aphunyukwe amaphuzu amathathu emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eLoftus Versfeld ngoLwesibili ebusuku.ISundowns igcine idlale ngokulingana ngo 1-1 nePolokwane City emdlalweni oqale sengathi izozidlela amahlanga.ISundowns ibekwe phambili nguThemba Zwane umdlalo usanda kuqala esiwombeni sokuqala.Nokho sekusele amanenjana ngaphambi kokuthi kuphele lesiwombe uSelulani Phiri, ungqofe ibhola laqonda ku-Onyango, walibamba walidedela. Ngesikhathi ezama ukuliqhwanda, walithinta ngonyawo langena phakathi. ISundowns iphunyukwe yithuba lokulingana ngamaphuzu neBidvest Wits esicongweni se-log yePremiership.U-Onyango wenze iphutha emasontweni adlule ngesikhathi iSundowns ibhekene neHighlands Park. ISundowns igcine iwine ngo 2-1.“Sonke siyawenza amaphutha. Akufanele ngehlelwe wukuzethemba nefomu kodwa kufanele ngibekezele. Kufanele ngiyilwele indawo yami. Angikwazi ukuyibalekela ngoba ngenze amaphutha ambalwa kule midlalo embalwa. Kufanele ngilwe,” kusho u-Onyango.U-Onyango uke wasematheni ngemuva kokuphumela obala ethi ungcono kuno-Itumeleng Khune weKaizer Chiefs.Lokhu kwamukelwe ngezindlela ezingafani ikakhulukazi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.U-Onyango usanda kuqokwa njengonozinti ohamba phambili e-Afrika kwi-CAF Goalkeeper of The Year wafakwa naseqenjini labadlali abawu-11 abahamba phambili e-Afrika.KwiSundowns useneminyaka ezitamuzela ijezi kumqeqeshi uPitso Mosimane.Emuva komdlalo nePolokwane, uMosimane uqhakambise imisebenzi emihle abayenzelwe ngu-Onyango.“Unozinti ohamba phambili e-Afrika wenze iphutha. Kufanele uhlale ukulindele ukuthi kunamaphutha amabili okungenani azokwenzeka ngesizini.“Ayenzeka ngisho kubadlali bamaphakathi emuva. Kufanele ukwamukele.“E-Asec (bedlala ne-Asec Mimosas) wenze izimanga. Namuhla wenze iphutha sikhuluma okuhlukile? Cha. Usesitakule izikhathi eziningi kakhulu. Ngesikhathi sekhefu ngimtshelile ukuthi akakhumbule yonke imidlalo asitakule kuyo, ngathi kufanele aqine.Amaphutha siwabona wonke amasonto.”ISundowns izobhekana neWits emdlalweni wePremiership ozoba seBidvest Stadium ngoMgqibelo ngo-6 ntambama.U-Onyango uthe: “Kuhle ukuzwa umqeqeshi ekhuluma kanje. Akulula nakuyena ngoba uyaqhubeka nokungithemba kodwa ngenza amaphutha.“Kodwa kufanele ngibhekane nesimo njengoba sinjalo ngiqhubeke ngibheke phambili.“Emdlalweni olandelayo sizobhekana neWits, angikwazi ukubuna, ngilokhu ngicabanga umdlalo odlule. Kufanele ngiqhubeke nokulwa. Wonke umuntu uyangeseka, bekufanele ngenze kangcono ngoba silahlekelwe amaphuzu amathathu. Kodwa ibhola linjalo,” kusho u-Onyango.“Ngomzuliswano wesibili wesizini wonke umuntu ulwela amaphuzu.Thina sibheka umdlalo ngamunye sifune ukuthola amaphuzu agcwele ukuze sidlule iWits ehlezi esicongweni kodwa kuhlala kunzima.“Kufanele sijuluke. Bayiqembu eliphezulu elifuna ukuhlala esicongweni. Kuzoba nzima. Kodwa ngiyakholwa wukuthi uma sike sahlala esicongweni se-log, sekuyoze kuphele isizini.”
title: U-Onyango uyazixolela ngephutha elenzekile

text: KUME zonke izinhlelo emndenini kathisha waseJozini osazilile, osekuphele unyaka engangcwatshiwe ngenxa yokulinda imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwesidumbu.NgoLwesihlanu umndeni kaMnuz Xolani Mathenjwa ubuqeda unyaka kusukela ashona. UMathenjwa owayefundisa Ekuhlehleni Primary, wanyamalala ngoMashi 15 okukholakala ukuthi yilona usuku ashona ngalo.Lo thisha wanyamalala eyohlangana nomngani wakhe okuthiwa babezoya naye eMozambique ngoMashi 15, kwatholakala ngo-13 Septhemba isidumbu esonakele okukholakala ukuthi ngesakhe.UNksz Nokuzola Sithole, ongudadewabo kamufi, uthe sekuyazwela ngoba akukho abakwazi ukukwenza okuphathelene nokufa kukamfowabo.“Kumele ngabe sekwenziwe ngisho umsebenzi wakhe ukube konke kuhamba kahle. Inkinga ngeke sikwazi ukungcwaba umuntu kungaqinisekisiwe ukuthi nguye, yize sikholwa ukuthi isidumbu ngesakhe. Kwathathwa umama wayiswa eMpangeni kuyokwenziwa ulibofuzo, kumanje ayikabuyi imiphumela,” echaza.Ngesikhathi kutholakala isidumbu sikamufi, uMnuz Thembelani Ntshangase, oyisihlobo wathi bayakholwa ukuthi ngesakhe. Waveza ukuthi izimpahla ezitholakele okubalwa ibhande, amaselula akhe amabili, iwashi nekhadi lasebhange, yikona okwenza bakholwe ukuthi isidumbu ngesakhe.Izolo uthe sebezitshele ukuthi kumele balinde amaphoyisa nomphumela wokuhlolwa kwesidumbu. Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi kwagcina kwenziwe inkonzo yokukhumbula uMathenjwa, eyahlelwa isikole abefundisa kuso.“Kungcono ukulinda kunokuphambana nomthetho, singcwabe kungaqinisekisanga. Asifuni ngelinye ilanga kudingeke kumbiwe ithuna sekutholakale ukuthi sangcwaba umuntu okungeyena. Kunzima impela ngoba sesiside isikhathi kodwa kumele silinde,” kusho uNtshangase.Uthe emuva kwamasonto amabili kutholakale isidumbu, amaphoyisa aseNdumo abephenya, athi sekungangcwatshwa kwabuye kwatholakala ukuthi enza iphutha.Ukunyamalala kukaMathenjwa kwasusa umsindo emphakathini. Kwagcina kushishwa umuzi wenduna, uMnuz Roman Mathenjwa, kusolwa ukuthi uyazi ngokunyamalala kukathisha. Kwavalwa izikole ngenxa yemibhikisho, umphakathi ufuna amaphoyisa aqinise uphenyo.Isidumbu sikaMathenjwa satholakala ngasesiqiwini, Osuthu. Umngani owayesolwa waphoswa imibuzo ngamaphoyisa wadedelwa, washaywa nawumphakathi ufuna akhiphe iqiniso.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kusalindwe imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwesidumbu ukuze kutholakale ukuthi nguye yini uthisha owayenyamalala nokuthi washona kanjani?
title: Umndeni ulindisweunyaka ungangcwabi

text: KUBOSHWE amadoda angu-10 asolwa ngokuduna imoto kagwayi phakathi kwaseDundee naseVryheid ngoLwesibili. Laba basolwa baboshwe ngemuva kwamahora ambalwa bedune le moto.NgoLwesibilingo-10 ekuseni, kuthiwa abagilwa ababili babehamba ngemoto belayishe ugwayi phakathi kweDundee neVryheid.Kukholakala ukuthi laba bobabili bebeseTayside ngenkathi bevinjwa abasolwa bathathu ababehlomile ababebehambangeVW Polo.Abagilwa kuthiwa baphuma emotweni babaleka kodwa abasolwa babahubha baze babathola babe sebebabuyisela emotweni. Abasolwa babe sebebaleka nabo abagilwa nemoto elayishe ugwayi.Kuthiwa lezi zimoto ezimbili zama eduze komgwaqo oya e-Utrecht, abasolwa bathutha amabhokisi ayenogwayi bawafaka emotweni ababehamba ngayo, babe sebeyabaleka bashiya abagilwa.Kwabe sekubizwa amaphoyisa endawo kwaqala uphenyo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Col Thulani Zwane, uthe ukusebenza kanzima kwamaphoyisa kuwaholele ekutholeni umkhondo ngendlu ekwaMdakane eduze naseDundee.“Kule ndlu kutholakale izibhamu ezimbili nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni, nemoto yakwaVW esetshenziswe ukuduna imoto kagwayi itholakale kulo muzi,” kusho uZwane.UZwane uthe laba basolwa abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-25 no-40 kulindeleke ukuthi bevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseDundee maduze lapho bezobe bebhekene namacala okuduna imoto nokutholakala nezibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni.Uthe kuzobhekwa ukuthi abasolwa awekho yini amanye amacala abayamaniswa nawo.
title: Kuboshwe amadoda adune imoto kagwayi

text: LIDEDELWE ngebheyili kaR2 000 iphoyisa laseDurban North elisolwa ngokugwazisa umshayeli uR7 000 ukuze lidedele imoto yakhe.Izolo uConstable Nkosi Ncwane osesebenze iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili esiteshi samaphoyisa esiseDurban North utshelwe ukuthi ubhekene necala lenkohlakalo. Kuvele ukuthi uNcwane umangalelwe wumshayeli owashayisa imoto wase yena emthembisa ukuthi ngeke amvulele icala uma emkhokhela uR7 000.Kuthiwa uNcwane uboshwe ngamaphoyisa abemcuphele umgoga wokuthi ahlangane nommangali wathi uma eqeda ukumnika imali ambopha.Imali “yomgwazo” ithathwe ngamaphoyisa ambophile njengobufakazi becala abhekene nalo.Uthe alikho icala eselike lamlahla ngaphambili, wathembisa ukuthi ngeke abaleke uma ededelwa ngebheyili ngoba liyaziwa ikheli azohlala kulo. Uthe usaqashiwe esiteshini esiseDurban North futhi imali yebheyili azokwazi ukuyikhokha wuR1 000.Imantshi uNkk Vanitha Armu ithe ngoba icala abhekene nalo libucayi ibheyili uzoyibeka kuR2 000.UNcwane uwukhokhile uR2 000 wayalelwa ukuthi abuye enkantolo ngo-Okthoba 22 esehamba nommeli wakhe.Isitatimende esithunyelwe kwabezindaba yihhovisi likaKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, sithe ngeke liwabekezelele amaphoyisa akhohlakele ngoba umbutho awuyona indawo yokucashisa abagwazisi.
title: Lithole ibheyili iphoyisa elisolwa ngokugwazisa

text: Ziningi izinhlobo zamakhanda abuhlungu kakhulu ezikhona kodwa namhlanje sizothi qaphu qaphu ngambalwa kulawo anomgudu othile olandelekayo uma ekuhlasela. Ubuchopho abukwazi ukuzwela ubuhlungu ngoba abunazo izinsiza zokubuzwela. Ebuchosheni kunenqwaba yemithambo nemizwa futhi zikhona nezicubu ezizungeze intamo nobuso konke lokhu kuyakwazi ukuzwela ubuhlungu. Ubuhlungu obuzwelwa yilezi zingxenye bugcina buzwele okungathi ubuhlungu osebusuka ebuchosheni uqobo ngenxa yokuthungelana kwemizwa. Namhlanje ngikhethe ukukhuluma ngamakhanda ambalwa alandela imigujwana ejwayelekile.Kunamakhanda anomkhuba wokuqala ukuhlasela emini yasekuseni okanye njalo ntambama.Kuphinde kube namakhanda aqala njalo ebusuku, ngesikhathi cishe esisodwa, ikhanda elikuvusa njalo ngezinhlungu.Kunamakhanda ankenketha uma uya ocansini, avele abhebhetheke kakhulu uma ufika kuvuthondaba.Angikwazi ukushiya ikhanda elibamba lisonte uhlangothi oluthile lobuso, elifika ngezikhawu linkenkethele ukuthi hayiza.Ngikhethe ukuthi sikhulume ngalezi zinhlobo, sike siziyeke lezi ezinye esizijwayele ngoba sesike sakhuluma nzulu ngazo phambili. Ayikho indlela yokulapha ikhanda ngaphandle kokuthola imbangela yalo bese ulapha yona. Kuba nzima kakhulu uma uthi uya kumsizi wezempilo bese ekutshela ukuthi akasazi isizathu sokuthi ube nezinhlungu ezingaka zekhanda, ube wena ufa ungalali ukuqaqanjelwa. Ekugcineni bazokunikeza okokuthomolalisa izinhlungu uma bengashongo ukuthi hamba uyobona nodokotela woluleko lwezengqondo. Akukho okubi ngokuthi udokotela wakho akuse olulekweni lwezengqondo uma isimo sisho njalo. Engikushoyo ukuthi lokhu makwenzeke sekuhlolwe ngokwanele kufunwa isizathu esiwumsusa wekhanda. Akekho umuntu ongenayo ingcindezi yomqondo kodwa akusiyena wonke umuntu le ngcindezi emphathisa ngekhanda elingalawuleki. Kungumsebenzi kadokotela ukuphanda isizathu esiwumsusa walezi zinhlungu. Abantu bakithi bakhathele ukuzibona bethalaliswa, benyanyalatwa.Ikhanda eliqala emini yasekuseni nantambamaKunamakhanda abangelwa ukushintsha kwamakhemikhali agcwalelene egazini. Isibonelo salapha yikhanda elidalwa utshwala. Ikhemikhali ewutshwala ingena ithontelane egazini bese ichamsela izinhlotshana zamanye amakhemikhali athi angafinyelela ezingeni elithile bese edala ikhanda elibihlungu. Nendlala (ithyroid evuvukele) njengoba yenza ukuthi umzimba usebenze ngokweqile nje lokhu kufukamela kuchumisa amakhemikhali amaningi egazini. Lolu chungechunge lokufukamela kuchamiselwe kuzokwenza izicutshana zemithambo nemizwa kuqale ukusonteka, kugxumagxume, kugcine kwenze ikhanda elibuhlungu. Yingakho izinhlungu zekhanda zalapha ezingaba ngaphambili ekhanda, ngemuva okanye emaceleni ekhanda kwabanye zenza okusankwatshu ekhanda okuba buhlungu kungabekezeleleki. Abanye baze bathi kungathi ushaywa unhlangothi. Leli khanda lizwela kancane emishanguzweni yezinhlungu, uyiphuza uze ukhathale. Isikhathi esiningi ezigulini esizibonayo, imbangela nomsusa wale nhlobo yekhanda, yindlala esuke ivuvukele. Kubalulekile ukuthi omuntu okhala ngaleli khanda, ahlolelwe kubhekwe ukuthi indlala kayivuvukele na, bese kuthi uma kunjalo lowo othintekayo aqale amaphilisi aqondene nalowo msuka. Okunye okumele sikukhumbule ukuthi indlala egula ngale ndlela kuningi engakona ngaphakathi emzimbeni, kugcine ukugula kwakho sekunompele ezindaweni eziningi.Ikhanda eliqala njalo ebusukuKunenhlobo yekhanda, ubuhlungu balo buqala njalo ebusuku ngesikhathi esisodwa. Leli lona livamise kubantu asebethe ukukhula ngeminyaka ikakhulu. Ubuhlungu bekhanda buvela ebusuku ngesikhathi esisodwa njalo, uvuka nje wena ngaleli khanda eselibuhlungu. Le nhlobo yekhanda ibuya iphindelela, kokunye ize ibalelwe ezikhawini ezingaphezu kuka-10 ngenyanga.Ikhanda locansiKukhona abantu abaphathwa yikhanda elibuhlungu, libe yinto ekusheshisayo uma uya ocansini, izinhlungu lezi ziya phambili uma ufika kuvuthondaba. Kucatshangelwa ukuthi leli khanda lidalwa ukwehla kwegazi eliya ebuchosheni ngoba phela wena isigubhukane nje usuthe emzimbeni wakho igazi ulidinga kakhulu emazansi nomzimba. Akuyena uwonkewonke oba nalesi simo ocansini.Ubuhlungu obusanyazi esayidini lobusoKukhona ubuhlungu okuvele kunyazime isayidi lobuso kube sengathi uyashokheka ohlangothini. Iminjunju lena ilandela umuzwa omkhulu olapha ebusweni, kuhlanganisa isimongo nezinhlafuno. Lokhu kuhlaseleka kwalo muzwa kunezikhawu ngezikhawu.Okubalulekile ngazo zonke lezi zinhlotshana zamakhanda ukuthi ziyelapheka. Kumqoka ukuthola isiphethu esiwumsusa bese kulashwe kuliwe nalo mbaseli.Mpilonde!
title: Udokotela uchaza ngekhanda locansi

text: IHAMBA ithuka izanya inkakha yomlingisi woMuvhango ku-SABC2 eshaywe yachashwa ngenhlamba enxanxatheleni yezitolo eCarnival Mall, eBrakpan, eGoli.U-Arthur Mbambo (75) onguyise kaThandaza kulo mdlalo, uveze konke kwiSoundCloud eku-internet ngesehlakalo esenzeke ngoDisemba 19 nyakenye esesitolo sakwaMTN.Kulesi siqephu esiqoshiwe esithatha imizuzu eyisithupha nemizuzwana engu-24, uMbambo ugeqa amagula ngaleso sigameko esenzeke eyolungisa udaba locingo lwakhe.“Ngemuva kokusizwa ngatshelwa ukuthi mangiyothenga i-starter pack esisha. Ngatshelwa ukuthi uma sengibuya ngingabe ngisema kulayini kodwa ngiqonde ngqo phambili kulo obengisiza,” kusho uMbambo.Uthe usebuya wenza njengoba ayetsheliwe yize kulayini kwakunabamhlophe abayisishiyagalombili. Wabachazela bangakhombisa ukuba nenkinga. Uthi ngemuva kokusizwa ube esebonga, wavalelisa.Esephambi komnyango wesitolo uthi unake owesifazane owayehleli ngaphakathi esitolo owavele washo ngengila emthuka, emehlisa isithunzi embiza nangekhafula ngesiBhunu. Ngenhlanhla wayemuzwa ukuthi uthini ngoba uyaluqonda lolu limi.Esephuma ubone kunensizwa emi phambi komnyango inanela inkulumo yowesifazane omethukayo. Imthele ngesiphuzo esabe sisekanini. Kuthe uma ebuza ukuthi ikwenzelani lokho yamgqimuza ngekhanda ebusweni maqede wafumbeka phansi.Uthe esadidwe yilokho yaqala yamkopolota iso yase imxova ngesibhakela.UMbambo uchaza okwenzeka ngokuthi kwamehlisa isithunzi njengoba kwakugcwele abantu abamaziyo ngenxa yokuba ngumlingisi, umfundisi nomlobi wezincwadi.Uchaza uthi kwesokudla wayephethe iselula le ayezoyilungisa kwesokunxele egodle amaphepha abalulekile. Ukuphatha kwakhe ngazo zombili izandla kumnqinde amandla okuphindisela waze wasizwa wukuthi alilume leli bhungu ebusweni.“Ngemuva kwalokho kwaqhamuka abasilamula kodwa ngizizwa ngihlazekile ngoba angiyena umuntu wempi," kuchaza uMbambo.Uthi kubizwe amaphoyisa baphuthunyiswa esiteshini samaphoyisa babhala izitatimende. Nalapho lo wesifazane uqhubekile nokumusho ngezinhlamba embiza ngamagama ehlisa isithunzi somuntu omnyama. Noma sekudlulelwe esibhedlela kube yiso leso.Uthi namanje uhamba ejeqeza ngenxa yokwesaba selokhu kwenzeke lesi sehlo. Udaba ulubikile nakwiKhomishini yamaLungelo Abantu ngenxa yokuthi uyafisa ukuthi lusukunyelwe kuliwe nalesi sihlava sokucwaswa ngokwebala.Okhulumela iKhomishini yamaLungelo Abantu, uGail Smith uthe bayalwazi lolu daba kodwa kusaphenywa ngalo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa uCaptain Bavela Masondo uthe kuvulwe amacala amabili okushaya.“Abathintekayo bavulelana amacala okushaya omunye nomunye. Silinde ukuthi kuyiwe enkantolo ngoLwesithathu, inkantolo inqume ngalo icala,” kusho uCaptain Masondo.
title: Uthuka izanya owoMuvhango oshaywe esitolo

text: UKUSHONELWA yisithandwa sakho, okungaba wunkosikazi noma yintombi okanye umyeni noma yisoka, ngezinye zezinto ezinzima kakhulu ukumelana nazo.Ongoti bathi okunye okuba yinkinga kakhulu wukuqhubeka nempilo ube nomunye umuntu ozomthanda ngemuva kokwehlelwa yileli lishwa.Bathi baningi abantu abavele bakhethe ukungaphinde babe nomaqondana uma beke bashonelwa ngabantu abebebathanda ngenxa yokwehluleka wukuhloma ngolwazi oluholela ekutheni umuntu akwazi ukudlulisa nokudlulela phambili.Baze bathi ukuphinde uqome noma uqonywe akusho ukuthi ubungamthandi umuntu wakho, kodwa usuke uqhubekela phambili nempilo.Nakhu okungakusiza:ZINIKE ISIKHATHINoma singekho isikhathi esibekiwe sokuthi kumele uzile isikhathi esingakanani uma ushonelwe othandiweyo wakho, kodwa umuntu uzazi futhi uzizwa yena. Ongoti bathi iphutha elingenziwa oshonelwe, elokusheshe umuntu afune azothandana naye isilonda singakapholi. Bathi kumele upholise isilonda kuyima ukwazi ukudlulela phambili.UNGAZISOLIBaningi abantu okuthi uma beqoma noma beqonywa ngemuva kokushonelwa, bezwe sengathi benza okuphambene. Bezwe sengathi ababahloniphi abathandiweyo abasuke sebedlulile emhlabeni.Ongoti bathi ukuzizwa ngale ndlela akuyona into engajwayelekile, kodwa kumele abantu bangayivumeli. Ukufa komuntu omthandayo akumele kusho ukufa kwakho yize wena usuke usaphila. Kumele ukwamukele ukuthi ngesinye isikhathi kuzomele uqhubeke nempilo uye phambili.UNGAPHENDULI ISOKA INDAWO YOKUTHULULAKungaba yiphutha elikhulu ukuthi uthululele isoka noma intombi entsha izinkinga ngeminjunju yakho, ulibelesele ngobuhlungu bokushonelwa owawuthandana naye. Kuvike nokuthi ulokhu ubala izindawo enanizihamba nezigameko ezake zanehlela engakashoni. Ngokwenza njalo, ungasibalekisa isithandwa esisha, sibone sengathi usenza isivalo sokuvala isikhathi soshonile.UNGAPHUTHUMIAkumele uma uqala ukuhlangana nomuntu ukade ushonelwe, bese ucabanga ukuthi usengusofa silahlane. Zinike isikhathi umazi kangcono futhi uma ukade ushadile, ungalokothi uphuthume ukuthi ushade ngoba wehluleka wukujwayela impilo yokungabi namuntu eduzane, ikakhulu kulabo abese behlale isikhathi eside nezithandwa zabo.UNGAMQHATHANISIUkuqhathanisa isithandwa sakho esisha nomufi kungaba enkulu ingozi. Abantu abafani, kumele ukwamukele lokho. Yamukela futhi ukuthi ezinye izinto ebezikujabulisa ngesithandwa sakho esishonile kungenzeka ukuthi ungabe usazithola, uthole okunye okwehlukile.ISIBAMBISOKungakukhathazi ukuthi uthandane nomuntu isikhathi esincane bese niyahlukana. Lokhu kuchazwa wongoti njengento eyejwayelekile futhi ebalulekile ngoba kukunikeza isikhathi sokuzifuna wena uqobo.Ubone ukuthi yimapho lapho okusamele uqinise khona amabhawodi ukuzama ukulwa nobuhlungu obuzwile ngokushonelwa yisithandwa.Eminye imininingwane icashunwe ku-www.PsychologyToday.com
title: Uma ushonelwe ungasheshi ufune umaqondana

text: ZAKHELE XABAU BUYA ngempi yebhande lomhlaba obengumpetha we-International Boxing Federation (IBF), uNkosinathi “Mabere” Joyi, obekuthiwa sekuphelile ngaye esibhakeleni emuva kokulahlekelwa yisicoco ngendlela engaqondakali.UJoyi, waseMdantsane, e-East London, uzolwa impinda nompetha we-International Boxing Organisation (IBO) junior flyweight, uRey “Hitman” Loreto wasePhilippines empini ezoba se-Eastern Cape ngoNovemba 30.ULoreto wabukisa ngoJoyi ngasekuqaleni konyaka emhlula ngomngqimuzo womlalisa phansi ngomzuliswano wesithathu bebanga lona ibhande le-IBO lingaphethwe muntu empini ebiseMonaco, eFrance.Ubengomunye wabashayisibhakela obekubhekwe lukhulu kubo eNingizimu Afrika kodwa konke lokho sekushintshile kwazise sekunenqwaba yabalandeli besibhakela asebemngabaza.Izinto zishintshe emuva kokuthi ehlulwe nguHekkie “The Hexecutioner” Budler nyakenye empini ebise-Emperors Palace, eGauteng. Kule mpi uBudler ubevikela ibhande ele-IBO okwesithathu.Kuqhamuke izinkulumo zokuthi uJoyi ucwila ezinkambeni zikaFaro futhi usemadolonzima ukuziqeqesha ngendlela abenza ngayo eminyakeni edlule nokuyikho okwenza azike esibhakeleni.“Akungikhathazi okushiwo abantu, vele bayohlale bekhuluma,” kusho uJoyi ohlukane nomqeqeshi wakhe uLennox Mpulampula.“Okufanele ngigxile kukhona mina wukubuyela eringini, ngiqhubeke nokulandela iphupho lami. Abantu bakhulume kakhulu ngesimo sami esibhakeleni kodwa ngizitshelile ukuthi konke kufanele ngingakunaki. Inqobo nje uma ngisakwazi ukuqhubeka nengikwenzayo.”UJoyi, oqale isibhakela ngo-2002, ungomunye wabashayisibhakela abalwe iminyaka, baphatha nezicoco zomhlaba bengakaze bahlulwe. Uqale ukuzwa induku ngo-2012 ehlulwa nguMario “Dragoncito” Rodriguez waseMexico empini alahlekelwe kuyo yibhande le-IBF phesheya kwezilwandle. Ngaphambi kwalokho ubesephathe ele-IBO nelakuleli esisindweni se-minum weight. UJoyi usahlulwe kathathu ezimpini ezingu-28.“Abantu benze ihaba ngokuhlulwa kwami. Izimpi engihlulwe kuzona, angihlulwanga ngendlela enzima kodwa bekuyilawo maphutha,” kusho uJoyi.“Anginakho nokuncane ukwesaba. Ngizobhekana noLoreto ngisesimeni esihle. Ngikulungele ukubuyela eringini.
title: Akuphelile ngoJoyi ozolwa eyomhlaba

text:
MINENHLE MKHIZEU MGADLI weMamelodi Sundowns uKatlego “Mahoota” Mashego ugaqele isicoco sakhe sesithathu seMTN 8 naBafana Ba-Style abazovula umkhankaso wabo wokubutha izicoco nePlatinum Stars ku-quarterfinal yalo mqhudelwano ngoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama eLoftus Stadium, ePitoli.UMahoota (32), okhale wemuka nomklomelo womshayimagoli ohamba phambili ku-Absa Premiership ngo-2012/2013, usehlabane ngesicoco seMTN 8 kabili empilweni yakhe yebhola.Usiwine okokuqala lesi sicoco ngo-2010 ngesikhathi esagijima ku-Orlando Pirates. EZimnyama zashaya iSwallows kumaphenathi emdlalweni wamanqamu owawuseMoses Mabhida Stadium.Ngo-2012 uMashego uphinde wahlomula ngesinye isicoco sakhe sesibili seMTN 8, esedlala kuSwallows ethele othulini iSuperSport United ngo 2-1 e-Orlando Stadium. Exoxa ne
Solezwe, uthe angakuthokozela ukuphinde athole indondo yalo mqhudelwano.“Sifuna ukuyinqoba (MTN 8) ngoba iwuhlobo lomqhudelwano othi uma uwuwinile ukunikeze ukuzethemba. KuPirates sawina yona kuqala kodwa kwathi kuphela isizini savala nezicoco ezintathu (eseligi neNedbank Cup). NePlatinum Stars ngesizini edlule iqale ngayo i-MTN 8 yasonga isizini nezicoco ezimbili (neseTelkom). Indlela amalungiselelo ethu okuqala kwesizini ahambe ngayo kunginika ithemba lokuthi sizokwenza kahle kulo mqhudelwano,” kusho uMashego.Ngesizini edlule iSundowns ayizange idlale kulo mqhudelwano ngenxa yokuthi ayiqedanga kuTop 8. Leli qembu eliqede ishobolo leminyaka eyisikhombisa lihlulwa wukuwina isicoco seligi kanti sekuphele eyisithupha lagcina ukuphakamisa isicoco somkhumulajezi. ISundowns yagcina ngo-2008 inqoba iNedbank Cup ukudla isicoco somkhumulajezi.“Ngesikhathi kuqala isizini edlule iSundowns bese kuphele isikhathi eside yagcina ukuwina isicoco seligi kodwa sakwazi ukuqeda lolu khondolo olubi. Into esisizile wukukholwa wukuthi singawenza umsebenzi nokusayinisa abadlali abaseqophelweni eliphezulu. Nakulokhu iqembu lisayinisile futhi singasiwina lesi sicoco,” kusho uMashego.Ngesizini yakhe yokuqala kuSundowns uMahoota uhlabane ngesicoco sakhe sesithathu se-Absa Premiership. Unqobe iligi okokuqala neSuperSport ngo-2007/2008 kwathi ngo-2010/2011 wahlomula ngesinye esekuPirates. Kule sizini iSundowns izobe ilwela izicoco ezinhlanu. EseMTN 8, Telkom Knockout, Nedbank Cup, Absa Premiership neCaf Champions League. Phezu kwalokhu leli qembu lingase libe nabadlali abazoyibamba ku-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ngoJanuwari uma iBafana Bafana igcina izibekiselile indawo kulo mqhudelwano.“Ngeke kube lula kodwa iPirates isikhombisile ukuthi akuyona into engenzeki ukulwela zonke lezi zicoco. Kuzomele sisebenze ngokuphindiwe kwazise iqembu neqembu esidlala nalo lifuna ukusihlula njengompetha beligi. IStars ngeke siyithathe kancane yize ilahlekelwe ngabadlali abamqoka. Umqeqeshi wayo (Allan Freese) usekhona, into eshintshile abadlali kuphela okusho ukuthi bazodlala ngendlela efanayo kodwa ngabadlali abahlukile,” kusho uMashego.
title: UMahoota ubheke ukudla ubhedu kuMTN 8

text: UKUPHINDILE adume ngakho uSihlalo weChippa United uSiviwe Mpengesi njengoba sekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi umqeqeshi obeyibamba uDuran Francis ukhonjwe afike ngayo. UFrancis ushiya kuleli qembu emuva kokulipheka emidlalweni emibili. Udlale ngokulingana emdlalweni owodwa, wahlulwa kowodwa njengoba iChippa ihleli kunombolo 15 kwi-Absa Premiership. UFrancis ubekwe njengomqeqeshi weChippa emasontweni amabili adlule emva kokuxoshwa kukaClinton Larsen obephikwa yimiphumela. IChippa ayikaze inqobe kwiligi selokhu kuqale isizini kwazise iphinde yashaywa iMaritzburg United emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku eHarry Gwala Stadium. Ekhuluma emuva kokunikeza uFrancis izintambo zokuqeqesha iChippa, uMpengesi wabeka kanje. “Kuhle uma sithuthukisa ithalente laseNingizimu Africa. Ngiyakholelwa ekunikezeni abantu amathuba. Ngizomeseka ngokugcwele. Uma esebenza kahle, uzoba nethuba lokuqhubeka kuze kuphele isizini,” kuchaza uMpengesi. Ngokusho kwemibiko, uFrancis oseke waqeqesha iBay United, uzobuyela ekuqeqesheni iqembu leChippan United elidlala kwi-ABC Motsepe League. IChippa ikuqinisekisile ukuthi uMbuyiselo Sambu uzobamba izintambo uma iChilli Boys isitholana neBidvest Wits emdlalweni weligi ngoLwesibili ngo-19:30 eSisa Dukashe Stadium.
title: Usexoshiswe umqeqeshi omusha weChippa

text: Le filimu yokuqala kaKagiso ethi Losing Lerato, kuyona lo mlingisi ulingisa indawo ephambili nendodakazi yakhe uTshimollo.Ekhuluma ngale filimu ohlelweni iV-Entertainment, uKagiso uthe kumjabulisile ukuthi akhiphe umsebenzi wakhe wokuqala ngaphansi kwenkampani ayithuthukisa kakhulu ngesikhathi ethatha ikhefu emkhakheni wokulingisa.Kule filimu uthe kuzobonakala owesilisa owenza konke okusemandleni ukuba sempilweni yendodakazi yakhe.“Nakuleli sikhona isihlava sokuthi uma owesifazane nowesilisa akade bethandana benezingane bese kufika isikhathi lapho bengasazwani khona. Nakule filimu kunjalo sizobona owesilisa owenza konke ukuba sempilweni yendodakazi yakhe yize isimo singesihle kodwa uyakhombisa ukuthi indodakazi yakhe uyayidinga.”Uthe le filimu izotshatshulelwa abaningi kodwa akuthanda kakhulu ukuthi izofundisa abantu abangasathandani kodwa abanezingane.Kule filimu kukhona abalingisi asebezakhele igama oZandile Msutwana, Thato Molamu, Connie Chuene, Ayanda Borotho nabanye.Ngonyaka odlule uKagiso wamemezela ukuma kancane ekulingiseni wathi ungena endimeni yomculo, kuyona angagqamanga njengoba esekhipha le filimu.
title: Izodlala ema-cinema ifilimu yobekwiScandal!

text: LIBONGELWE ngisho umengameli wakuleli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa iqembu lomculo iSoweto Gospel Choir, ebuye nendondo yesithathu emcimbini amaGrammy Awards.Lo mcimbi we-61, wezindondo nothathwa njengomunye wezinkulu emhlabeni ububanjelwe eStaples Center, eLos Angeles, ngeSonto ebusuku.Kuwo amaciko ahlukene emhlabeni ahlonishwe ngegalelo lawo, alidlalayo andimeni  yobumnandi.Leli qembu beliqokwe okwesihlanu kulo mcimbi, neseliwine kathathu, kuwo.Le ndondo liyithole nge-albhamu yalo ethi Freedom.Indondo yaleli qembu yamukele amalungu lo okukhona kuwo, uDiniloxolo Ndlakuse, Shimmy Jiyane, Mary Mulovhedzi noMulalo Mulovhedzi.UMengameli uthe, elakuleli kumele lilibonge leli khwaya ngokuxoxa izindaba ezihlukene zakuleli nokuqhubeka libeka elakuleli ebalazweni."Siyayibongela iSoweto Gospel Choir  ngokuthola le ndondo. Lena indondo yabo yesithathu siyababongela kakhulu," kuchaza yena.Abanye ababongele leli qembu kukhona kubo umholi weDA, uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, Herman Mashaba, Professor Thuli Madonsela, iqembu leNkatha nele-EFF, Thembisa Mdoda nabanye.Leli qembu aliqali ukuthola indondo enkulu emhlabeni njengoba selike lahlabana ngeyaziwa nge-EMMY.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, elakuleli sekujwayelekile ukuthi lizitholele izindondo kulo mcimbi njengoba iLadysmith Black Mambazo ihlababe ngendondo efanayo ngonyaka odlule.Emcimbini wayizolo insizwa esanda kufika emculweni, uChildish Gambino igile izimanga njengoba ihambe nezindondo ezibalulekile ngengoma yayo ethi  "This is America".UChildish uthole indondo yeRecord of the Year, neSong of the Year, kanti uqophe umlando ngalokhu kwazise bekungokokuqala ukuthi le ndondo inqotshwe yiculo leHip Hop.UCardi B nayue uqophe umlando eba umrepha wokuqala wesifazane ukunqoba indondo ye-albhamu yomculo we-rap ehamba phambili.Intokazi ebiphethe uhlelo lwalo mcimbi u-Alicia Keys, ijabulise abaningi ishaya ophiyano ababili ngesikhathi icula izingoma zayo ezihlukene kuwona lo mcimbi.
title: Injabulo iSoweto Gospel Choir ibuya neGrammy

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAU BUKELA kuMabhuti Khenyeza umgadli ogile izimanga kuSanlam Kay Motsepe Schools Cup, uKhayelihle Shozi, (19) oqede lo mqhudelwano enamagoli ayisishiyagalombili, waqokwa njengohambe phambili.Lo mfundi waseClapham High School, ePitoli, uthi ngabe akekho lapho ekhona ukube akazange asizwe nguKhenyeza naye ozakhele igama kuPremiership ngokubhakuzisa inethi.Ngesonto eledlule emdlalweni weMpumalanga Black Aces neBloemfontein Celtic, uKhenyeza ushaye igoli lakhe lika-100 aqala ukugijima kulesi sigaba esengumdlali weLamontville Golden Arrows ngo-2002, ngaphambi kokuya emaqenjini afana neKaizer Chiefs, Mamelodi Sundowns ne-Ajax Cape Town okungamanye aseke wawadlalela.Amagoli kaShozi asize iClapham yanqoba lo mqhudelwano nonyaka yagoduka nesheke lika-R1 million.“UMabhuti ngibukela kuyena futhi uyena onginika izeluleko. Ngisho kuvalwe izikole ngihlala naye angisize, ufana nomzali kimina,” kusho uShozi.UKhenyeza nguyena owaletha uShozi kwinkulisa yeSundowns ngesikhathi esengumdlali wayo ngo-2009, wayekade engumdlali weqembu lakhe (uKhenyeza) elidlala ku-SAB League KwaZulu-Natal.“Sengineminyaka ngikhona. Ngijabule kakhulu ngokuthi ngikwazile ukusiza iqembu linqoba lapha. Ngiyakholwa wukuthi uma siqhubeka nokusebenza kanzima sizokwazi ukusivikela isicoco,” kusho lo mdlali odabuka eKlaarwater.Nokho njengoba lo mqhudelwano ungowabaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-19, kusho ukuphela kwesikhathi sikaShozi kuwo owenza uGrade 11 eClapham.Lo mdlali ugqame ezikwatini zamaqembu amancane njengoba edlalile naku-Bayhill Metropolitan kusukela ngo-2009.Uthe akazi ukuthi ikusasa limphatheleni kodwa ukholwa wukuthi imisebenzi yakhe izomkhulumela.“Ngizolinda abangiphethe okuyibona abazonquma ngami. Okwamanje ngizogxila esikoleni ngoba nasesikoleni esikusona bayasigqugquzela ukuthi senze kahle nasezifundweni,” kuphetha uShozi.
title: Utusa uKhenyeza owinise isikole sakhe R1 million

text: INDODA okusolwa ukuthi ibidle izidakamizwa ivulele ngenhlamvu esidlangaleni kunabantu ebebezihambela emarobhothini kwaV, eMlaza, maqede yabhekisa isibhamu kuyo yazidubula yafa izolo.Indoda, eyaziwa ngokuthi ingumakhi wezindlu odabuka kwelinye lamazwe ase-Afrika, kuthiwa inguMnuz Sdu Sithole. Imangaze abaningi ngesikhathi imisa imoto erobhothini kwaV, yaphuma yavulela inhlamvu esidlangaleni, kungaziwa ukuthi idubula bani.Kuthiwa kukhale ubumayemaye abantu bebaleka nxazonke. Kuthiwa ibonakale sengathi iyakujabulela lokhu ngesikhathi ikwenza ngoba ibigibele okhakhayini lwemoto. Ibidubula ibuye igxumele phansi idubule iyizungeze imoto. Kuthe kusenjalo kwaqhamuka amaphoyisa, athe engakafiki nakuyo yabhekisa isibhamu kuyo yazidubula yashonela khona lapho.Omunye ozibonele lokhu kwenzeka kodwa ongathandanga ukuthi igama lakhe lidalulwe, uthe uSithole ubengapheli kwaV futhi uyaziwa khona. Ubejwayele ukuhamba nabantu abakha izindlu emotweni yakhe.“Uyaziwa kule ndawo yize ngingamazi ukuthi uhlala kuphi. Ngiyacabanga ukuthi uhlala khona kwaV, siyazi nokuthi uyaphuza futhi ubuye asebenzise nezidakamizwa kodwa bekungakaze kwenzeke ukuthi akhiphe isibhamu. Bekungathi sibuka ifilimu, angazi noma kukhona yini abekusho ngoba sonke bese sicashile sesaba ukudubuleka. Ngiyasola ukuthi ubedle izidakamizwa, akekho umuntu obengenza le nto edakwe wutshwala kuphela. Ucishe walimaza abantu ngoba le ndawo iyaphithizela,” kusho yena.Kunenqwaba yezitolo, kuphinde kume namatekisi nabantu abanamatafula abadayisayo kuleli robhothi. Kuhlale kuphithizela kulo njengoba uma ungena noma uphuma eMlaza udlula kulona.Ngesikhathi ithimba leSolezwe lifika endaweni izihlobo zikamufi bezidangele, zime eduze kwesidumbu sakhe zisalinde ukuthi sithathwe yimoto ethatha izidumbu.Imoto yakhe iCiti Golf emhlophe ibimi erobhothini emgwaqweni oqhamuka eSiphingo obheke ngakwa E,F&G, isidumbu sakhe siseduze kwayo.Akekho obekhuluma nomunye kulamalungu omndeni bonke bebegobodisile bebheke isidumbu sakhe.Kulezi zihlobo akekho ovume ukukhuluma nabezindaba, zithe kuningi okushayisanayo abezwa kuthiwa kwenzekile, okwamanje kazikazi ukuthi kwenzekeni.Akekho kuzo obefuna ukuzisho ukuthi ungubani.“Sisenezinhliziyo ezibuhlungu, ngeke sikhulume okwamanje ,” esho ehamba.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe, uLt Col Thulani Zwane, ukuqinisekisile okwenzeile wathi indoda yangaphandle kwaleli okuthiwa ibidakiwe, izidubule ngesibhamu sayo yafela emgaqweni.“Kuvulwe idokodo mayelana nokufa kwendoda esiteshini samaphoyisa eMlaza. Ngesikhathi edubula akekho olimele,” kusho uZwane.
title: Indoda izidubule yafa phambi kwabantu

text: UMENGAMELI we-ANC, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa usephumele obala waveza ukuthi amalungu enhlangano ebusayo avumela ukulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana.URamaphosa uveze lokhu ngoMsombuluko wathi kuningi okusazovezwa yikhomishini kaJaji Zondo ephenya ngenkohlakalo ezinhlakeni zikahulumeni kuleli.Uthe ngaphambi kokuthi kulawulwe amandla oMbuso, kuqalwe ngawe-African National Congress (ANC).“Amabhizinisi kahulumeni iwona abefunwa, kodwa bangene kuwo ngokusebenzisa abantu abasezinhlakeni zethu, yinto esisiyivumile phambilini leyo. Ake ngithi nje, azikho ezinye izinhlangano esezivume amaphutha azo njenge-ANC, lokho kuzokwenza ukuqala kwethu kabusha kube lula kakhulu,” kusho uRamaphosa.Umengameli ukhulume kanje nje kuvele ngisho igama lendodana yakhe kwikhomishini kaZondo, u-Andile Ramaphosa, ogcine ephumele obala ngezinkontileka abanazo neBosasa esolwa ngenkohlakalo, ukugwazela abaholi kuhulumeni nokushushumbisa izimali.Kubaholi be-ANC amagama abo asevelile kufakazwa kwikhomishini kaZondo kubalwa uMnuz Malusi Gigaba, uMnuz Mosebenzi Zwane, uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane, owayengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma. UNobhala-jikelele uMnuz Ace Magashule naye ulandelwa yimibiko elokhu iqine njalo emsola ngenkohlakalo ngesikhathi esawuNdunankulu waseFree State kulandela incwadi iGangster State ephenya ngalezi zinsolo.
title: Yi-ANC evumele ukulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana: Ramaphosa

text: PHEZU kokuba iSwallows FC ibalwa namaqembu ashaya into ecokeme kule sizini kodwa umqeqeshi wayo, uBrandon Truter, uyazihlangula embangweni wesicoco seDStv Premiership.ISwallows, enyukele esigabeni esikhulu ekupheleni kwesizini edlule, ibambene ngamaphuzu angu-18 neMamelodi Sundowns esicongweni se-log. Ayikaze ihlulwe emidlalweni eyisishiyagalombili esiyidlalile. UTruter, oqalayo ukuqeqesha kwiPremiership, uthe akungabhekwa ngakubona uma kukhulunywa ngombango weligi. ISwallows ifice iSundowns ngamaphuzu emuva kokuthela muva njengembumba, yagcina ihlule iBlack Leopards ngo 2-1 eLimpopo ngempelasonto."Cha, cha, cha eyababanga isicoco seligi ikhulume neSundowns, (Orlando) Pirates neSuperSport (United). Hhayi nathi. Senza nje okusemandleni emdlalweni olandelayo ngoba yiwona kuphela obalulekile. Asicabangi ngombango wesicoco seligi noma okufuze lokho. Wumdlalo olandelayo obalulekile. Sisekwisizini yokuqala sifikile kule ligi. Sizobona ukuthi siphelelaphi, " kusho uTruter."Sibasha kule ligi. Mina nabanye abadlali abaningi. Silapho ebesifuna ukuba khona. Kodwa ngeke kusingene emakhanda lokho. Thina sisazifikela nje lapha. Siyabahlonipha bonke abakhona. Kodwa sizoqhubeka sibheke phambili."Ngesizini edlule iSwallows isuke ngasemsileni we-log kwiGladAfrica Championship, yagcina iwine iligi. Igudluze i-Ajax Cape Town obekunesikhathi ihlezi esicongweni. Ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini yePremiership, iqinise isikimu sayo ngabadlali abangomakadebona.ISwallows izobuyela enkundleni ngoJanuwari 5 uma isibhekene neCape Town City ekhaya."Bengazi ukuthi sizowamisa kabi amaqembu amaningi. Umoya muhle eqenjini kanjalo nohlaka. Sinendlela yokudlala abadlali abanethezekile kuyona. Bengazi ukuthi sizoba yinkinga futhi sizoyiwina eminye imidlalo. Ebengingakulindele wukwenza kahle ngale ndlela. Sibonga uMdali ngalokho. Okudingekayo manje wukuqhubeka kanje, sibambe umgqigqo. Sizobona ukuthi kuzokwenzekani emidlalweni engu-10 kuya kwengu-15," kusho uTruter.
title: UTruter akasibhekile isicoco seligi neSwallows

text: I-DEMOCRATIC Alliance (DA) ithi izoziphikisa izinhlelo ze-Eskom zokufuna imali yempesheni yabasebenzi bakahulumeni ukuze iphume ezikweletini.UMnuz Ghaleb Cachalia, okhulumela iDA kwezamabhizinisi kahulumeni uveze ukuthi uMnyango wezeziMali ucele iPublic Investment Corporation (PIC) ukuthi ishintshe uR95 billion ewukweletwa yi-Eskom ube yisabelo sayo kule nkampani.“I-Eskom ikweleta iPIC uR95 billion kodwa manje kayifuni ukuyikhokha le mali. Esikhundleni sokukhokha i-Eskom ifuna ukuthi iPIC isebenzise lesi sikweletu njengamasheya ayo. Ngeke sivume ukuthi kwenzeke lokhu,” kusho uCachalia.Uthe nemali ewu-R350 billion ekweletwa yi-Eskom inesiqiniseko sikahulumeni, sokuthi uma le nkampani ihluleka wukukhokha wuyena ozoyitakula.“IStandard & Poor’s ikubeke kwacaca ukuthi i-Eskom kayikho esimeni esikahle sokuhlela kabusha izikweletu zayo. Asihambisani nokuthi kusetshenziswe impesheni yabantu ukutakula i-Eskom. Uhulumeni njalo uhlale ematasa esebenzisa imali angenayo. Iqiniso wukuthi i-Eskom iwile ngenxa yokuthi uhulumeni ubengawenzi umsebenzi wakhe, wokuqapha isimo njengomuntu onamasheya kule nkampani,” kusho uCachalia.Uthe izinkampani zikahulumeni kaziphumeleli ngoba kaziphethwe ngenqubo yezinkampani.“Izinkampani zikahulumeni kufanele zidayiswe ukuze uhulumeni ehlise izindleko zokuholela abantu. Uma zidayiswa, izinkampani ezizimele zizokwazi ukudala amathuba emisebenzi nokwenza inzuzo. Sifuna uhulumeni ayeke ukufaka imali emgodini ongagcwali, oyi-Eskom, ayiphoqe ukuthi ikhokhele izikweletu zayo,” kusho uCachalia.Uthe bazoxhumana nongoti kwezikagesi lapha eNingizimu Afrika nakwamanye amazwe, ukuze bezwe ukuthi isikweletu esikhulu kangaka singakhokheka kanjani ngaphandle kokuthinta impesheni yabantu.
title: I-Eskom ifuna ukukhokha isikweletu ngempesheni yabasebenzi

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMQEQESHI weLamontville Golden Arrows, uMandla Ncikazi, ubalisa ngabezindaba athi sebevele balibethele esiphambanweni iqembu lakhe ngaphambi komdlalo womkhaya, naMaZulu, ongo-3 ntambama ngoMgqibelo eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont.Abaningi lo mdlalo obhekwe ngabomvu  bathi uzocacisa ukuthi iyiphi inkunzi phakathi kwalama qembu, ikakhulukazi kule sizini.Isizathu esenza ukuthi wonke amehlo athi njo kuwo, ngisho nakubantu abangebona abaKwaZulu-Natal, yizimanga  ezigilwa yila maqembu kwiDStv Premiership kule sizini. lSelokhu yasungulwa iPremier Soccer League (PSL) kungokokuqala ukuthi alandelane kwi-Top 3, abe sembangweni wesicoco seligi.USuthu oluphekwa uBenni McCarthy lukweyesibili ngamaphuzu awu-47, emidlalweni ewu-25.Luseli ngephuzu elilodwa kwiMamelodi Sundowns eqhwakele enemidlalo ewu-23.NgoLwesithathu AmaZulu abhaxabule iCape Town City ngo 5-1 eCape Town Stadium. Abafana Bes'thende babambe indawo yesithathu ngamaphuzu awu-43 emidlalweni ewu-25.NgoLwesithathu batshengisile ukuthi kabasabi qembu ngesikhathi besho ukuyiqeda Sundowns. Lo mdalo obusekuhambeni, uphele zibambene ngeqanda."Njengoba senzile emdlalweni weSundowns, nakowaMaZulu sizolwa phezu kwayoyonke imibiko yabezindaba. Sebeveli sebeshilo ukuthi amaphuzu amathathu aya oSuthwini. Indlela izinga lokungayihloniphi i-Arrows eliphezulu ngayo nokuhlale benika AmaZulu idumela, ungafunga ukuthi basebenzela wona. Nakuba kunjalo sizoqhubeka nokuzithoba, sisebenze kanzima. Asilona iqembu noma abaqeqeshi abangosaziwayo,“ kusho uNcikazi ngemuva komdlalo weSundowns.UNcikazi uqhube, wathi:"Ngibonga kakhulu kubadlali bami ngokungasabi qembu, sisayibambe ngakho. Sigijima umjaho wethu, kasigxilile kokwenziwa amanye amaqembu. Kasiwunakile wonke lo msindo okhona wezibalo ze-log, kusesekuseni. Uma ithuba livuma ukuthi siye e-Afrika, sizokwenza lokho. Uma kumele siqede siphezulu ngeke siliyeke lelo thuba. Kuyangijabulisa ukuthi emidlalweni emithathu yakamuva esiyidlalele ekuhambeni asishaywanga."Ingijabulisile indlela esidlale ngayo neSundowns. Abafana bami bayilandele yonke imiyalelo ebesibanike yona. Ngikholelwa ekutheni bekumele sinqobe, sakhe amathuba amaningi. Ngokujwayelekile iSundowns igcwala esiswini, uma uke wayiyeka yazichanasela uba senkingeni.“
title: Owe-Arrows usola abezindaba ngokuchema

text: IKAIZER Chiefs igaqele umdlali owayegijima kwi-Orlando Pirates uThabo “Jomo” Rakhale oseyibamba kwiChippa United.Isolezwe lihabule lezi zindaba ngomthombo walo osondelene noRakhale ukuthi lo mdlali angase ayibambe kuMakhosi ngesizini ezayo. URakhale unenkontileka yeminyaka emithathu neChilli Boys ayijoyine ngoJanuwari esuka kwiPirates.“URakhale kade ngikhuluma naye, uthe ufunwa yiChiefs. Into esisele wukuthi iChiefs ithumelele iChippa United isicelo bese kuyakhulunywa.
