Uma konke kuhamba kahle ungethuki uma ethushuka kwiChiefs ngesizini ezayo,” kusho umthombo.Leli phephandaba liphinde laxhumana nomunye umthombo oqinisekisile ukuthi iChiefs iyamfuna uRakhale.“Umdlali ofana naye imfanele iChiefs. Abalandeli bayamdinga umdlali ozokwazi ukuyishukumisa enkundleni. Nokho iChiefs kumele isheshe yenze izinto kusenesikhathi. Emasontweni ezayo mhlawumbe izobe isikhona into ebambekayo. Okwamanje asikho isicelo etafuleni likaChippa,” kusho lo mthombo.URakhale uchithwe yiPirates ngemuva kwezinxushunxushu zakhe zokungaziphathi kahle ngaphandle kwenkundla.Kuthintwa uSiviwe “Chippa” Mpengesi ongusihlalo weChippa ukhale ngokuthi usemhlanganweni.IChiefs ithembise ukuthi izokwenza inqwaba yezinguquko ngesizini ezayo. Phakathi kwabadlali okubhekwe ukuthi ibachithe kukhona u-Edmore Chirambadare, Keagan Buchanan, William Twala, Emmanuel Letlotlo, Bongolwethu Jayiya kanti uBrilliant Khuzwayo, ongunozinti, usekucacisile ngeke ayivuselele inkontileka yakhe eNaturena.Kuthintwa uVina Maphosa wezokuxhumana kwiChiefs uthe: “Yebo izinguquko zizoba khona kodwa ekupheleni kwesizini. Lapho sidinga khona ukuqinisa ngeke silenze iphutha, sizoqinisa. Sizomemezela kahle yonke into uma sesiqedile.”URakhale ubeyisithandwa sabalandeli beZimnyama ngenxa yengcwenga yebhola edle ngezitayela ezikitaza abathandi bakanobhutshuzwayo abeyidlala. Ngesikhathi eshiywa kweZimnyama eya kwiChippa abanye abalendeli balibeka ngembaba ukuthi abahambisani nesinqumo seBucs sokuchitha lo mdlali.Uma egcina ephelele kwiChiefs uRakhale uzoba ngomunye wabadlali abake bayibamba kwiBucs Amakhosi abalandela sebekwiChippa. Kulaba badlali kukhona uTwala, obolekwe yiMaritzburg United kuze kuphele isizini, noJoseph Molangoane osagijima kwiChiefs.
title: IChiefs igaqele owaduma kwiBucs

text: IMENENJA  kaMasipala weTheku uMnuz Sipho Nzuza , ithi  ayikwazi ukulala kwehle ubuthongo ibe ihola izandithi zemali, ibhuquza ekhaya. UNzuza ubexoxa neSolezwe ngeSonto emuva kokuthi ebevele enkantolo eqhubeka nokuyinxenxa ukuthi imvumele abuyele emsebenzini. UNzuza uhleli ekhaya emuva kokuthi inkantolo ibeke imibandela enzima emvimbela ukuthi asebenze ngenkululeko, wase ecela ikhefu elikhethekile. Uthe akumkhululi kunembeza wakhe ukuthi angasebenzi ebe ehola. Uthi uzizwa sengathi wenzela phansi abakhokhi bentela, ngokutamuza umholo ebe ejika nelanga emzini wakhe. “Ukusebenza kuyilungelo lomuntu yingakho ngicela bangivumele ngibuyele emsebenzini ngoba le mibandela inzima iyangivimba. Nginaso isifiso sokusebenza futhi ngiwumsebenzi ohola kakhulu kufanele ngisebenze , ’’ kuchaza uNzuza. Ungaphandle ngebheyili kaR50 000 ecaleni lenkohlakalo elithinta ithenda yokuqoqa udoti eThekwini. Ngesikhathi evela enkantolo efaka isicelo sebheyili kwadalulwa ukuthi umhlomulo wakhe kuMasipala weTheku ubalelwa kuR 300 000 kodwa akwangacaca ukuthi  ngabe yimali eza kuye yonke noma sekubalwe neminye imihlomulo yakhe kulesi samba. Uthe unalo ithemba lokuthi inkantolo izokuzwa ukukhala kwakhe abuyele emsebenzini. UNzuza useke wabuyela emsebenzini kodwa waboshwa kwathiwa wephule imibandela yebheyili. Kuthiwa imibandela ithi akumele asayine, agunyaze imisebenzi kanti akavumelekile ukuqondisa ubugwegwe kubasebenzi. Omunye umbandela uthi akangaxhumani nabantu abangofakazi benkantolo abasebenza kumasipala. UNzuza ubesenkantolo kodwa sangaphuma isinqumo, udaba lwahlehliselwa kuFebruwari 11 nonyaka. Kuvele ukuthi kusafanele kufakaze umphenyi wecala abeke ukuthi ubona kanjani ngokuxegiswa kwemibandela yebheyili kaNzuza. Kumanje isikhundla sikaNzuza, sibanjwe wuMnuz Sipho Cele, oyisikhulu kuMasipala weTheku. Kulindeleke ukuthi icala lethenda kadoti libuyele enkantolo ngoMashi 23 nonyaka. UNzuza uboshwe kaanye noNkk Zandile Gumede owayeyimeya yeTheku, nezikhulu nosomabhizinisi. Kuleli cala kubalwa noNkk Bagcinile Nzuza, ongunkosikazi kaNzuza.
title: Imenenja kamasipala icikwa wukuhola isekhaya

text: UMthunzi ngumuntu ongathandwa abaningi njengoba eyisigebengu esiyiqola nokungelula ukuthi sibanjwe.Kodwa manje kulo mdlalo ulele esibhedlela njengoba kukhona abamdubula ngemuva kokumbamba ukuthi nguyena umenzi wobubi.UKhalik Sherrif, oyisikhulu kwa-e.tv, ubize uBongile esiteji ezombonga emcimbini obuseGoli, eMelrose Arch, ngesonto eledlule.Uthe abantu abafana noBongile yibona abenze izibalo zesiteshi zanyuka njengoba lo mdlalo usubukwa ngabantu abangu-5 million.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uBongile uthe, kuyajabulisa lokhu okwenzekayo futhi kuyamgqugquzela ukuthi aqhubeke azinikele kukhona konke akwenzayo.“Ukubizwa kanje phambi kwabanye abalingisi kusho lukhulu futhi ngiyabonga kulo mdlalo ngokunginika ithuba elifana naleli. Umsebenzi usamningi ekulingiseni njengoba ngimatasa nangemidlalo yasesiteji,” kusho yena.Uthe kulo mdlalo njengoba uMthunzi elele esibhedlela nje akazi noma sekuwukuphela kwale ndawo noma kukhona okusazoqhubeka ngayo.“Kulo mdlalo unikwa okumele ukwenze ngalelo sonto kudlule nami angazi noma sekuwukuphela kwale ndawo noma isaqhubeka. Kodwa kungijabulise kakhulu ukuyilingisa,” kuchaza yena.Kulo mcimbi kuphinde kwethulwa umdlalo omusha othi Isipho nozoqala ngoJulayi 1 ngo-6.30 ntambama.Kuwo kulindeleke abalingisi abafana noNimrod Nkosi noThobani kaDlomo Nzuza.
title: Babonga uBongile ngokuheha izinkumbi kwiScandal!

text: I-DA KwaZulu-Natal inxuse abantu ukuba bayivotele ikhiphe i-ANC kuhulumeni ukuze ishintshe impilo yabo.Ibihlangene nabalandeli bayo eTruro Hall, eMgungundlovu, lapho yethule khona izinhlelo zayo namasu angashintsha impilo yabantu baKwaZulu-Natal.Umholi we-DA esiShayamthetho KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Francois Rodgers, ukhwele wadilika kuhulumeni we-ANC wathi udlala ngemizwa yabantu ngokwenza izethembiso ungazigcini.“I-ANC ihlale yenza izethembiso kodwa ingazifezi, manje isikhuluma ngendaba yokushintsha izisekelo zomnotho, lokhu ikwenze ngemuva kokuthi ilahlekelwe yimikhandlu emikhulu iTshwane, Joburg neNelson Mandela Bay ngokhetho lwezindawo nyakenye,” kusho uRodgers.Uthe abukho ubuholi KwaZulu-Natal, wanxusa abantu besifundazwwe ukuba bavotele i-DA.“Sinenkinga lapha KwaZulu-Natal, ubuholi abukho. SinoNdunankulu okhona ehhovisi kodwa kwesinye isikhathi akekho kanti futhi noSihlalo we-ANC esifundazweni, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, akathembekile, uhambe wayokhuluma kwithelevishini into engekho ngesikhathi kunenkulumo-mpikiswano ne-SONA ePhalamende ethi uphuma esifundazweni esihlale sithole imibiko ehlanzekile kuMncwaningi-Mabhuku,” kusho uRodgers.Uthe kuyiphutha lokhu okushiwo nguZikalala ngoba ngesabelo-mali sika-2014/15 yaba wu-30% imikhandlu eyatholea imibiko ehlanzekile kuMncwaningi-Mabhuku, kwathi ngesika-2015/16, yaba wu-33%.“Ngicabanga ukuthi uZikalala uphambanise i-KZN ne-Western Cape eholwa yi-DA lapho imikhandlu ithole khona  u-73% wemibiko emihle kuMncwaningi-Mabhuku kwathi iminyango kahulumeni yakhona yathola 79%,” kusho uRodgers.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, uthe abakugqiziqakala lokhu okushiwo yi-DA kodwa bazoyiphendula ngoba ikhuluma ngegama lombutho.UNtuli uthe akusilo iqiniso ukuthi i-ANC ayinabo ubuholi ngoba ukube abukho ngabe ayiyibuyisanga imikhandlu ebiyihola iphinde yengeze ngeminye ngemuva kokhetho lwezindawo nyakenye.Uthe kuyiqiniso elingephikiswe ukuthi siyakhulu isibalo semikhandlu ethola imibiko emihle kuMncwaningi-Mabhuku.URodgers uthe yonke indawo lapho kuphethe khona bona kunoshintsho.Uthe uma bengabusa KwaZulu-Natal bangafike banciphise izinkampani zikahulumeni wesifundazwe eziwu-12 zibe nhlanu, wengeza ngokuthi lokhu kungonga * -R22 million.Uthe okunye abangakwenza wukuqeda uhlelo loMnyango wezeMpilo lokuhambisa labo abafundela ubudokotela eCuba.URodgers uthe lolu hlelo lunezinkinga eziningi kanti lumosha imali.“Okunye esingakwenza yisiqiniseko sokuthi uMnyango wezeMfundo uthola isabelo esikhulu sezimali. Kuyishwa ukuthi ngemuva kweminyaka ewu-23 izwe libuswa ngentando yabantu kodwa isifundazwe sisahluleka wukuphasa ngamalengiso kwa-matric,” usho kanje.Uthe bafuna futhi ukusebenzisana neSilo samaBandla, uGoodwill Zwelithini, ngenhloso yokuthi basisize sikwazi ukuzenzela imali, singathembeli kuhulumeni.“Eminyakeni eyedlule kuke kwakhona ukungaboni ngaso linye phakathi kweSilo nohulumeni. Lokho kungagwemeka ngokuthi kuqiniswe izindawo zamagugu zesifundazwe ezingasiza ekutheni iMbube ikwazi ukuzenzela inzuzo,” kusho uRodgers.Umholi we-DA KwaZulu-Natal uthe olunye udaba alubhekayo yindaba lokubuyiselwa komhlaba kubantu.Uthe bayaliseka ikhwelo leSilo elithi abantu abahlala ezabelwane kumele bathole amatayitela.UMncwango uphinde waxolisa eSilweni ngokuthi bethule uhlelo lwabo lokutakula isifundazwe ngaphambi kokuthi ivule isiShayamthetho.Okhulumela iNdlunkulu kaZulu, uMntwana Thulani Zulu, unqabile ukuphawula wathi abaphenduli ezintweni abazizwa ngabantu.“Akukwazi ukuthi ungafike ungixoxele ukuthi i-DA ithini ingazange ize kuthina izoxoxa nathi bese ngivele ngiphawule bume,” kusho uZulu.
title: I-DA inxuse abaseKZN bayivotele

text: UKhaya ozakhele udumo elingisa indawo kaGC kuZalo kuSABC 1 ukhiphe le ngoma ngesonto eledlule ezitolo zomculo ze-internet njenge-iTunes.Kusukela iphumile abantu bakhuluma ngayo abanye bebuza ukuthi ngabe yini Indovozi.Izinhlamvu zayo zithi: “Dansa uma udansa girl kodwa fihla indovozi. Angithandi man’ ngendovozi. Fihla le ndovozi.”Ekhuluma naleli phephandaba uthe: “Indovozi yinoma yini ocabanga ukuthi owesifazane kumele ayifihle. Kungaba yikhwapha, izinqa, ibele noma isitho sangasese. Mina nje ngiyathanda ukufaka izinto ezimfishane kodwa ngizifaka ngendlela engabahlanzisi abantu.”Uthe Indovozi yigama elifana neWewe okwakuculwa ngayo engomeni kaDJ Siyanda eminyakeni eyedlule.“Yinto ongeke uyichaze ukuthi iyini. Nakuthelevishini kunamagama ongavumelekile ukuwasho njengokuthi sf+?e kodwa uziqambele awakho uthi stshaparap.”Uthe uyenzile enye yasemisakazweni engalibeki ngesihloko igama elithi Indovozi. Uveze nokuthi kade eyiqophela i-video ezoqala ukubonakala emasontweni amabili ezayo.“Bengifuna ukuthi noZodwa Wabantu abe khona ngoba ingoma uyayithanda kodwa waba matasa.”Uqhube wathi zikhona ezinye izingoma azozikhipha maduze ezihlanganisa neye-Afro Soul ayibhalelwe nguLinda Gcwensa.“Nayo iyakhulumisa ngoba ithi muhle umuntu wami kunowakho. Ngiyayithanda into ekhulumisayo,” kusho uKhaya.
title: Usesuse izinkulumo uGC ethula ingoma ethi Indovozi
#Coronavirus: Kushone abanye abayishumi, abawu-7 abaseWestern Cape

text: UMHOLI we-African Content Movement (ACM) uMnuz Hlaudi Motsoeneng ukhwele wadilika emajajini akuleli, wathi akumele acabange ukuthi angonkulunkulu abancane.UMotsoeneng uphawule kanje ngemuva kwesinqumo seNkantolo ePhakeme eGauteng esichitha isicelo seqembu lakhe sokuthi kusakazwe bukhona umhlahlandlela weqembu lakhe owethulwe enkundleni yezemidlalo eCurries Fountein, eThekwini ngoMgqibelo.“Ngidumele ngesinqumo senkantolo sokuchitha ukuthi kusakazwe ukwethulwa komhlahlandlela weqembu lethu ngoba amanye amaqembu kubalwa ne-ANC osomqulu bawo bebesakazwa bukhoma,” kusho uMotsoeneng.UMotsoeneng uthe udinga izinyanga eziyisithupha kuphela ukuze aguqule impilo yabantu baseNingizimu Afrika. Uthe yena uma engena emandleni ngeke aze abonisane nabantu ngokuthi luzokwenziwa kanjani uguquko, wathi uzoluphoqa.“Thina asinawo umhlahlandlela wokhetho, asazi nokuthi yini yona leyo. Into esinayo isu lokuthi sizobasiza kanjani abantu bakuleli,” kusho uMotsoeneng.Uthe uma bengena emandleni, bazophoqa ukuthi * -90%, wemisebenzi unikwe abantu bakuleli. “Abantu sebeyibonile i-ANC ukuthi idlala ngabo akukwazi ukuthi ngemuva kweminyaka engu-25, isemandleni kodwa namanje isakhuluma udaba lokubuyiswa komhlaba,” kusho uMotsoeneng.Uthe uma bengaba semandleni, bazophinda kabili isibonelelo sabantu abadala ngoba ibona abayizinsika zemizi eminingi. Uthembise ukusukumela ubugebengu. "Sizonika amaphoyisa imali ngoba kumanje awakwazi ukusebenza kahle ngoba anokhwantalala ngenxa yezikweletu nokuthi ahola kancane. Abanye esizobanyusela imali othisha ngoba nabo bahola amakinati. Akumele amaphoyisa nothisha baphile ngomashonisa bebe benza umsebenzi obalulekile esizweni,” kusho uMotsoeneng.
title: #Ukhetho2019: UMotsoeneng ugxeke amajaji achithe isicelo

text: MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENI noLUNGILE MAJOKAU MQEQESHI wePlatinum Stars, uCavin Johnson, uzishaya isifuba ngendlela abelihlikihla ngayo uMasibusane “Zizou” Zongo, oqokwe njengomdlali ovelele, okuyinto ecasule umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns uPitso “Jingles” Mosimane la maqembu ecazelana amaphuzu kowe-Absa Premiership ngempelasonto eRoyal Bafokeng Stadium.UMosimane uchaze ukuqokwa kukaZongo njengokubuyisela ibhola laseNingizimu Afrika emuva. Ubesola leli nxele ngokushaya izitayela ezingayi ndawo.Nokho ngesikhathi uJohnson ocija iDikwena exoxa naleli phephandaba ekuqaleni kwesonto, ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi konke obekwenziwa uZongo bekuyimiyalelo yakhe futhi uhlabeke umxhwele ngebhola elikhonjiswe wumdlali wakhe.“Ngokwami akekho umdlali ocishe wasondela kuZongo. Khumbula ukuthi isikhathi esiningi ibhola belikuSundowns, ngakho-ke cabanga ukuthi bekuzoba njani ukube belikithina isikhathi esiningi? Yinkinga yakhe uMosimane uma ebona sengathi kunconywa into engekho. Mina nginika abadlali bami imiyalelo njengoba bengenzile kuZongo. Akusona isitayela sami ukuphawula ngabadlali bamanye amaqembu kodwa-ke uma uPitso esibona isidingo salokho, akufuni mina,” kusho uJohnson.Inkulumo kaMosimane ayenze kuthelevishini ngemuva komdlalo ikhombise ngokusobala ukuthi umphumela awuthole kulo mdlalo awuzange umjabulise.“Ngimkhonze kabi uZongo. Ungumdlali webhola onekhono futhi akukho magqubu engimbambele wona kodwa angivumelani nokuthi aqokwe njengomdlali ovelele. Unazo impela izitayela kodwa kufanele afunde ukuthi azisebenzisele ukuthi zimfake ebhokisini lapho ezokwazi khona ukushayela unozinti. Kumele abe yingozi ngenxa yezitayela zakhe.“Lo mkhuba wokutusa umjiko ongasiyisi ndawo usibuyisela emuva. Uma uzojika abantu yenza njengoThabo (Rakhale) we-Orlando Pirates. Uyazishaya izitayela kodwa negoli uyalishaya njengoLionel (Messi) noNeymar,” kusho uMosimane.Uthe laba abaqoka abadlali abavelele kufanele bakuqaphele ukuthi ungena kangaki ebhokisini lezitha umdlali abasuke bemqokile babheke nezinye izinto. “Izingane ebezibuka lo mdlalo emakhaya zizokhula nolwazi olungekho lokuthi uma ushaya izitayela uqokwa njengovelele,” usho kanje.Umqeqeshi weJomo Cosmos, uJomo Sono, usetshele uMosimane ukuthi angazikhathazi ngamanye amaqembu kepha abheke elakhe.“UZongo wenza ngqo lokhu okufunwa abalandeli. Le ndaba yomjiko eyethu. Ngesikhathi ngisadlala eNew York ngangima phezu kwalo ibhola kuchwaze inkundla yonke. Ibhola lethu eNingizimu Afrika liyakuvuma lokhu okwenziwa uZongo ngakho uMosimane kumele athule. Akukhona e-Europe lapha kuseMzansi,” usho kanje uSono.n Khona manjalo, umdlali we-Orlando Pirates, uSifiso Myeni, uzidonsele amanzi ngomsele kubadlali beCS Sfaxien abamsole “ngokudelela” ngemuva kokuthi egende ibhola phambi kwabo ngesikhathi la maqembu etholene phezulu koweCaf Confederation Cup ngayo belu impelasonto edlule.Ngalesi sikhathi umdlalo ubusuya ngasemaphethelweni, iBucs ihamba phambili ngo 2-0 wamagoli kaRakhale noMenzi Masuku. Abadlali beSfaxien bamane bamthelekela uMyeni ibhola selingasekho kuyena bemhlohloloza, kucaca ukuthi abakuthokozelanga akwenzile.
title: Bagxeka uMosimane ngakusho ngowePlatinum

text: SEKUZOSHAYWA imithetho enqala mayelana nokusungulwa kwezipaza ezintsha emalokishini ukuvimbela abokufika abangenise kakhulu ezindaweni zabamnyama.Isiphakamiso kuphunywe naso emhlanganweni obuphuthuma KwaMashu ngoLwesibili ebusuku nguNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Willies Mchunu, uNgqongqoshe wezokuVakasha nokuThuthukiswa koMnotho esifundazweni, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala nePhini leMeya eMkhandlwini weTheku, uNkk Fawzia Peer ngemuva kokuvela kwezinsongo okuthiwa zivela kubantu ezithi abokufika kumele bavale izitolo zabo KwaMashu, Ntuzuma neNanda ngaphambi kokuba kuphele usuku lwanamhlanje.Ngaphandle kwesiphakamiso sokuba kube nomthetho oshaywayo, umhlangano uvumelane ngokuthi kumele zicutshungulwe kabusha izitolo kubhekwe kuthi ngobani abanikazi bazo.Umhlangano ubuhanjelwe wubuholi beNorth Regional Business Association (NORBA) obebumele abantu base-Ethiopia naseSomalia abahweba enyakatho yeTheku.UMnuz Mlungisi Mncube weNORBA uthe bayavumelana nohlelo oluqalwa uhulumeni lokuzama ukulungisa ibhizinisi labo.Uthe yize bevumelene nohulumeni kodwa basazobuyela emphakathini beyowucela ukuthi wehlise amaphaphu.Uvumile ukuthi yibona abebekhiphe umyalelo wokuthi kuvalwe izitolo zabokufika.“Sifisa isisombululo siphume ohlelweni oluqalwa wuhulumeni ngoba naye uyavumelana nokuthi ibhizinisi kumele ligunyazwe wumthetho,” kusho uMncube.UMnuz Ahmed Mohamed, womkhandlu wabantu baseSomalila KwaZulu-Natal, uthe baneme ngezinqumo ezithathwe emhlanganweni.UMohamed uncome nohulumeni ngokungenelela kwakhe ukubhula umlilo.Uthe nabo bayavumelana nokuthi zingabe zisavulwa izitolo ezintsha.Umhlangano uvumelane ngokuthi zivalwe zonke izitolo ezingekho emthethweni lungakapheli usuku lwanamhlanje.UZikalala uthe sebesungule ikomidi elizosebenza udaba ukuthula isisombululo.“Sesisungule ithimba elincane elizohlola zonke izitolo ezikhona, lenze uhlu lwazo bese lenza neziphakamiso zomthetho okumele zithathwe,” kusho uZikalala.UZikalala uthembise ukuthi bazobheka ukuthi ukuba khona kwezinxanxathela zezitolo emalokishini akunawo yini umthelela omubi.“Abantu bangakungabaza nje ukuzibophezela kwethu njengohulumeni kodwa siqinisile uma sikhuluma ngokuguqula izisekelo zomnotho,” kusho uZikalala.UMchunu ushayele ihlombe zonke izinhlaka ebezihlanganyele emhlanganweni, wathi izivumelwano ezenziwe zivimbe udlame obelungase lubheduke.Uthe uhlale egquqguzela ukuthi kuxoxwe noma kuhlangene izitha.
title: Imithetho emisha ngezipaza ethinta abokufika

text: IZINJINGA zaseThekwini ezizakhele udumo ngamabhizinisi amathenda zifake amaphepha okwehlukanisa umshado eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini. Akukacaci ukuthi yini imbangela yokwehlukana kwalezi zithandani kodwa amahlebezi ngokugqabuka kwefindo lomshado aqale ukusabalala nyakenye.Kulindeleke ukuthi udaba lokwehlukanisa kwabo  lulalewe enkantolo ngoLwesithathu. Iphephandaba langeSonto iCity Press labika ngoSepthemba odlule ukuthi abasahlali ndawonye labo macaphuna kusale.Ngo-2016 umndeni laba bashadikazi bangene obishini nabaqoqi bentela iSars abaveza ukuthi izinkampani zabo, ezingaphansi kweZikhulise Group, zikweleta intela ebalelwa ku-R204 million.Ojutshwe yinkantolo ukuxazulula lolu daba uMnuz Pieter Strydon,  uthe basaqhubeka nezinhlelo zokuvala izinkampani. Ukuvalwa kwezinkampani zakwaMpisane kuzokwenziwa ngendlela yokudayisa impahla yamabhizinisi ukuze ikhokhe ingxenye yesikiweletu okubizwa nge-liquidation.“Udaba olusaqhubeka. Angicabangi ukuthi (oyinkosikazi) uzokwazi ukukhokha lesi sikweletu. Angiboni futhi bemkhipha phambili kulolu daba. Uma besheshisa yonke into ibe segameni lakhe, kuzobangconwana,” kuchaza uStrydom.Uthe udaba lwentela basaludlulisele enkantolo yokudlulisa amacala futhi bafake nesicelo sokuthi kuhlengwe ibhizinisi labo.Inkosikazi ibingumqondisi kulezi zinkampani ebeziyingenisa ngamafosholo imali ngokuthola amathenda kuhulumeni.Laba bashade uhlobo lo mshado olwaziwa ngeCommunity of Property okuchaza ukuthi kuzomele bahlukaniselane phakathi konke okungokwabo uma behlukanisa.Ngo-2016 abaqoqi bentela bashaqa impahla yalaba bashadikazi okubalwa kuyo izimoto zikanokusho nesithabathaba somuzi wabo eLa Lucia enyakatho neTheku ngokunjalo neplazi labo eliphakathi nesifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal.Ukushaqwa kwempahla kulandele ukuhluleka kwabo ukugcina isivumelwano neSars sango-2014. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi phakathi kuka-2008 no-2012 inkosikazi ike yabhekana namacala awu-183 okungayikhokhi imali yentela, ukukhwabanisa kanye nokugwazela. Amacala ayebhekene nayo ahoxiswa umqondisi wophiko lwezokushushisa  ngaleso sikhathi, u-Adv Mxolisi Nxasana, owasola umshushisi u-Adv Meera Naidu ngokungaziphathi ngendlela ngesikhathi ephenya.Nyakenye uNaidu, esekwa yiPublic Servants Union, isigungu sokuqondisa ubugwegwe esasiholwa u-Adv Justice Mnisi, samthola emsulwa kwayesolwa ngakho. UMnisi wayigxeka indlela okwaphathwa ngayo uNaidu wabuza ukuthi ngabe iNPA yayihloseni ngokuhoxisa amacala ayebekwe le nkosikazi. Imizamo yokuthola abashadikazi ngaphambi kokushicilelwa kodaba ayiphumelelanga bethintwa yi-African News Agency.- ANA
title: 'Kuyaphela' ngomshado wazinjinga zaseThekwini

text: AFRICAN NEWS AGENCY (ANA)ILINGANISELWA ku-R49 billion imali yombuso eyasetshenziswa ngokungafanele ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana, ngokusho komqondisi we-Shadow World, uMnuz Paul Edward Holden,  ngokophenyo olwenziwe.Lo mqondisi ukusho lokhu kwikhomishini eholwa nguJaji Raymond Zondo izolo.Ngokwakhe, bathola ukuthi imali engu-R49 157 323 233.68 yayilokhu ifakwa emabhange ahlukene.U-Holden ukusho lokhu efakaza ngemali eyayifakwa iphinde ikhishwe emabhange ahlukene.Ohola ubufakazi, u-Advocate Matthew Chaskalson, uyena obephonsa imibuzo uHolden.U-Holden utshele ikhomishini ukuthi ubufakazi bakhe bugxile emibikweni nangendlela imali ebikhokhwa ngayo emabhizinisini akwaGupta.Uveze ukuthi abakwaGupta bashushumbisa u-R287 million, abawuthola kwi-Estina Dairy Farm Project.Uhlelo kwakungelokuthuthukisa abalimi baseFree State.U-Holden uthe abakwaGupta baqala ukushushumbisa imali kusasele unyaka ukuba uhlelo lwase-Estina luqale.Uhulumeni waseFree State waqala ukukhokhela uhlelo lwase-Estina ngoJuni 2011 kodwa abakwaGupta baqala ukushushumbisa imali abathi bayithola kulolu hlelo ngoMeyi 2011.“Basebenzisa uhlelo lwase-Estina ukucasha beshushumbisa imali, ngaphambi kokuba lolu hlelo luqale,” kusho uHolden.Ngokobufakazi, kuvele ukuthi uhulumeni wakhokha u-R287 million kulo mndeni wakwaGupta, imali yabe isifakwa kuma-account ahlukene enkampani ukuze kubukeke sengathi wenza inzuzo ka-R880million phakathi kuka-2012 kuya ku-2016. Ikhomishini iyaqhubeka.
title: AbakwaGupta babeshushumbisa imali emabhange ahlukene

text: UKHALA ngendlala umculi owashiya abathandi bomculi bengawuvali umlomo ngengoma ethi, Eyadini  ngo-2018.UManqonqo ogama lakhe langempela nguMlungisi Buthelezi, ukhala ngokuthi kufana nokuthi akayitholanga inzuzo (royalties) yize ingoma yakhe ibidlalwa ubuthaphuthaphu kuyona yonke imisakazo yakuleli. Elandisa iphephandaba uthi, wathola uR4 000 kuphela womvuzo ngengoma yakhe. “Enye imali angazi nokuthi yashonaphi, ngiyakholwa ukuthi kunabathize abadla amandla ami,” kusho uManqonqo. Uthi sinzima ngempela isimo kangangokuthi akazi ukuthi athathe ini ayihlanganise nani. Ukhale ngokuthi mincane kakhulu imicimbi yokujabulisa abantu ngenxa yeCovid-19. Uqhube wathi ngenkathi ekhipha le ngoma wayengenayo inkontileka nenkampani kodwa kuthe ngemuva kokwenza ingoma wabe esesayina inkontileka yokusebenzisana ne-UJU Records. “Angazi ngempela ukuthi ngubani owadla imali yami phakathi kwe-UJU Records nomshicileli,” kuqhuba uManqonqo. Umshicileli ocele ukuba ligodlwe igama lakhe, uthumele Isolezwe ngeSonto iscreenshot se-email evela kwiSouthern African Rights Organisation (Samro) efundeka kanje: “Sicela wazi ukuthi besiphenya ngesicelo sakho mayelana nengoma ethi Eyadini, kodwa kuthina kuvela ukuthi ingoma yakhokhelwa. Kuvela nokuthi akuwena umshicileli wale ngoma. Sicela ukhulume nabanikazi bale ngoma osebenzisane nabo.” Uqhube wathi ngenkathi efaka isicelo imali ibisivele seyaphuma. “Le mali kuthiwa yaphuma ngo-2018,” kubeka umshicileli. UMnuz Siyanda Ngubane ongomunye wabasunguli be-UJU Records uthe imali eyangena kubona uR4 000.  Imizamo yokuthola abakwaSamro ibhuntshile njengoba ucingo lwabo belukhala lungabanjwa, kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.
title: Udonsa kanzima owengoma ethi Eyadini

text: ZIYALELWE ukuba zehlise intengo ye-data noma zishushiswe izinkampani ezinkulu zakuleli iMTN noVodacom ezinqunyelwe okatini yiKhomishini yokuNcintisana kuleli.Le khomishini iyalele lezi zinkampani ukuthi zinciphise intengo yazo ye-data zingakapheli izinyanga ezimbili noma zibhekane nokushushiswa.Le khomishini ithole ukuthi i-data yalezi zinkampani imba eqolo. Phambilini iKhomishini yaphakamisa ukuthi i-data kumele yehliswe ngo-30% kuya-40%.Izolo ikhomishini ikhiphe umbiko wayo mayelana nentengo ye-data. Le khomishini ithole ukuthi i-data imba eqolo lapha eNingizimu Afrika.Ikhomishini ithole ukuthi iMTN neVodacom babiza kakhulu lapha eNingimu Afrika uma kuqhathaniswa nakwamanye amazwe abahweba kuwona.UNgqongqoshe wezoHwebo neziMboni uMnuz Ebrahim Patel, uthe intengo ye-data yalezi zinkampani ayihambisani nabampofu.UPatel (osesithombeni) uthe i-data esebenza nsuku zonke intengo yayo kumele yehliswe.“Uphenyo mayelana nentengo ye-data lwenziwe emuva kokuthi ngixoxe nomlingani wami onguNgqongqoshe wezokuXhumana kuleli uNkk Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams, savumelana ukuthi kumele sicele iKhomishini ukuba iphenye,” kusho uPatel.Uthe umphumela wokuqala wophenyo okhishwe ngoFebhuwari 24 nonyaka, lapho iKhomishini yavula iwindi lokuthi umphakathi uphawule waqinisekisa umbiko owake waphuma owawuveza ukuthi intengo ye-data imba eqolo.Uthe ikhomishini yaphinde yathola ukuthi kukhona inkinga yokuncintisana emakethe njengoba intengo ishiyana kakhulu.“Ikhomishini ithole ukuthi intengo ephezulu kunalokhu okumele ngabe iyikho lapha eNingizimu Afrika uma kuqhathaniswa namanye amazwe emhlabeni, nokuthi lezi zinkampani zenza inzuzo enkulu,” kusho uPatel.Uthe uNkk Ndabeni-Abrahams uyena ohole umkhankaso wabo wokubheka umthelela wezomnotho nezobuchwepheshe nokuthi zingasetshenziswa kanjani ukufukula umnotho.Ngisho noMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngesikhathi ethula enye yezinkulumo ebhekiswe esizweni wakhala ngokumba eqolo kwe-data wathi kumele yehliswe.Ngisho nengqungquthela ye-ANC eyayiseNasrec ngo-2017, yanquma ukuthi i-data kumele yehliswe kuleli ngoba imba eqolo.Imizamo yokuthola uMTN noVodacom izolo ayiphumelelanga.
title: Zinqunyelwe okatiki nge-data

text: UQHUBEKILE nokuthela izithelo ezinhle umkhankaso wokuqoqa izibhamu ezingekho emthethweni oqhutshwa ngamaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal njengoba ephinde abopha abasolwa abatholakale nezibhamu nenqwaba yezinhlamvu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe amaphoyisa aphume inqina agasela eShikishela, eKranskop, lapho evundulule khona izibhamu eziyisikhombisa nezinhlamvu ezingu-89.Amaphoyisa ahambele le mizi emuva kokulunywa indlebe yizinhloli. Kuboshwe abasolwa ababili abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-39 no-62 ubudala bathweswa amacala okutholakala nezibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni. Phakathi kwezibhamu ezitholakele bekukhona izibhamu ezincane nezinkulu.KUTHOLAKALE imijojantaba nezibhamu ezincane ngesikhathi kuboshwa abalisa baseKranskop emuva kokugasela kwamaphoyisa abelunywe indlebe ngumphakathiAbasolwa bekulindeleke ukuthi bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi eKranskop izolo.UMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant General Khombikosi Jula, uthe amaphoyisa asamile esithembisweni asenza sokuqeda ngezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni ngoba zenza abantu bahlale ngokwesaba emphakathini. Uwancomile kakhulu amaphoyisa ngomsebenzi wawo wathi asazoqhubeka.‘’Umsebenzi ofana nalo usazoqhubeka isikhathi eside ngoba sisemkhankasweni wokuqoqa izibhamu ezingekho emthethweni ngoba yizona ezisetshenziswa ukwenza izenzo zobugebengu ,’’ kusho uJula.
title: Uthela izithelo umkhankaso wokuqoqwa kwezibhamu

text: UVUMA eyokuzifaka obishini lwamaqembu abalekela izembe umqeqeshi waMaZulu FC, uCavin Johnson, emuva kokuhluleka wokuqoqa amaphuzu agcwele ekhaya bedliwa yiChippa United ngo 1-0 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngempelasonto.Usuthu, olungavamisile ukushayelwa eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza, luguqe ngegoli lika-Andile Mbenyane elingene esiwombeni sokuqala.Umphumela usho ukuthi selihlukaniswe yigebe lamaphuzu amabili namanye amaqembu obekuyiwe emidlalweni yangempelasonto kuyiwona okucacile ukuthi alwela ukuvika izembe. IChippa neBaroka FC sebenamaphuzu awu-24 ngemuva kokunqoba imidlalo yabo kanti ezikaJohnson zisamile emaphuzwini awu-26.“Akungatshazwa ukuthi igebe liyancipha. Lokho kwenza umqondo wakho ugijime uye ezindaweni ezehlukene ezingakugculisi. Ngihlezi ngisho-ke ukuthi uma ungekho endaweni yokuqala akukho ukunethezeka. Siyafana namaqemu angezansi kwethu nalawo angenhla kwethu, ngaphandle kohleli endaweni yokuqala,” kusho uJohnson.Uthe njengoba sekusele imidlalo emihlanu isongwe iligi, wonke umuntu eqenjini kuzomele enze umsebenzi wakhe ngokuphindiwe, kusukela kubona beyithimba labeqeqeshi kuya kubadlali.“Akukuhle ukuhlulelwa ekhaya ngoba nabalandeli bayakujikela okuyibona okumele ngabe bayakweseka. Sizamile ukubakhuthaza abadlali kodwa izinto zangahlangana. Sibe nebhadi namuhla (ngoMgqibelo) ngoba bekungahambi ngendlela esifisa ngayo. Manje sesibhekene nomqansa. Kuzomele emdlalweni olandelayo sibuye ngamandla. Kulesi sikhathi sesizini sifuna ukuthi umdlali nomdlali azikhombise ubuqhawe bakhe ngoba isimincane nemidlalo esele,” kwenaba uJohnson.Ufuna babuyise lokhu kulwa abakukhombisile ngemuva kokuphucwa amaphuzu ayisithupha ekuqaleni kwesizini, okubashiye behleli emsileni kwi-log.“Kukhomba ukuthi kufanele siphinde silwe futhi ukuze siqoqe amaphuzu emidlalweni esele. Olandelayo mkhulu kakhulu njengoba ungowabakhaya ne(Lamontville Golden Arrows.”
title: ‘Kumele sisebenze ngokuphindiwe’

text: UZOVELA kusasa enkantolo kaMantshi Ezinqoleni umsolwa oboshwe izolo kulandela ukubulawa ngesihluku kwezithandani esezikhulile. Lo msolwa (29) olandela abanye ababili abasanda kuboshwa ubanjwe eHarding izolo lapho ebebhace khona, wabekwa icala lokubulala nelokushisa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe amaphoyisa abophe lo msolwa kulandela uphenyo olunzulu kanti kukhona nomunye wesine umsolwa osathungathwa. Lo msolwa uboshwe kulandela ukuthi ngoMgqibelo odlule ngabo 10 kwabulawa izithandani esino-60 nesino-62 KwaNyuswa, Ezinqoleni lapho kwangena khona abasolwa abaziwayo.  Bazihudula lezi zithandani bazikhiphela ngaphandle maqede bazigwaza amanxeba amaningi ngaphambi ngokuzingqongqisa ngomlilo.Indlu yabo nayo yashiwa abasolwa maqede babaleka endaweni yesigameko. UCol Mbele uthe amaphoyisa abikelwa ngalesi sigameko afica imizimba yabantu ababili ishile. "Kwaqalwa uphenyo endaweni yesigameko, amaphoyisa alandela nomkhondo wabasolwa abathintekayo. Kwaboshwa abasolwa ababili ono-25 nono-32. Kulindeleke bavele ngecala lokubulala nelokushisa ngenhloso, kulindeleke kuboshwe nomunye,"kusho uCol Mbele. Mayelana nomsolwa oboshwe izolo, uzogcinwa esitokisini kuze kube uJuni 17 nokulindeleke afake ngawo isicelo sebheyili.
title: Kuthungathwa umsolwa wokugcina kwelokugwaza nokushiswa kwezaguga

text: NOKUBONGWA  PHENYANEKUPHEKWA umdlalo omusha ozoba yiTelenovela, ozovala isikhala somdlalo Isibaya okumanje kukhonjiswa isizini yokugcina.Le sizini kulindeleke ukuthi iphele ekupheleni kukaMashi, ngonyaka ozayo.Isolezwe like labika ukuthi kuyaphela ngeSibaya, okuyisinqumo esithathwe ngenxa yokwehla kwesibalo sababukeli balo mdlalo.Inkampani eqopha Isibaya, iBomb Production nesiteshi uMzansi Magic, kuvela ukuthi bavumelana ngalesi sinqumo.Umthombo weSolezwe osondelene nalezi zinkampani, uveze ukuthi akusekho ukuhlehlela emuva njengoba nabalingisi nabasebenzi balo mdlalo sebetsheliwe ukuthi kuphelile ngawo.“Kuba nemihlangano ehlukene manje kubhekwa ukuthi kuqalwe umdlalo oyiTelenovela ozovala isikhala somdlalo Isibaya. Abafuni ukuthi lolu daba baluqinisekise kwabezindaba balinde ukuthi uma sekusondele isikhathi sokuphela kwalo mdlalo, bese kuba yibona abamemezelayo kuMzansi Magic,” kuchaza umthombo.Uveze ukuthi abaphathi balesi siteshi sebekuvezile ukuthi abadingi kube khona imidlalo emincane ezobonakala uma kuphela Isibaya kodwa badinga kungene umdlalo ongase uqale uqoshwe ekuqaleni konyaka ozayo.“Ayikaziwa inkampani ezoqopha lo mdlalo omusha, kodwa konke kuyobe sekwaziwa ekuqaleni konyaka ozayo. Niyazi njengabezindaba ukuthi uma kuqala unyaka, iMultichoice iyamemezela izinhlelo ezintsha eziqala ngoJanuwari kuze kube uJuni.“Yilapho-ke okuyobe sekuvela khona ngalo mdlalo omusha,” kuchaza umthombo.Omunye umthombo waveza ukuthi isinqumo sokuqeda ngalo mdlalo, abaphathi basithatha ngoJunikodwa yonke into ibikhulunyelwa phansi.UNomsa Philiso ongumqondisi wezinhlelo kwaM-Net, wavezaukuthi uma kukhona okusha okumele bakumemezele, bayokwenza uma sekufike isikhathi.Lo mdlalo usanda kushiywa ngabalingisi abaqavile okukhona kubo uNomzamo Mbatha, Jessica Nkosi, Muzi Mthabela,Siyabonga Thwala, Bongani Gumede no-Abdul Khoza abalingisa emidlalweni emisha kuleli, eziteshini ezehlukene.Omunye umlingisi okuvelaukuthi uyahamba uSdumo Mtshali okuvela ukuthi uzolingisa emdlalweni omusha ozoqala kwiSABC3, iThe Estates.USDUMO Mtshali ungomunye wabalingisi okuvela ukuthi bayashiya emdlalweni Isibaya ngonyaka ozayo ozofinyelela emaphethelweni ngenxa yokuthi awenzi kahle ngezinombolo zababukeliIsithombe: TWITTER
title: Kuza umdlalo ozovala isikhala seSibaya

text: NAKUBA izimvula ezisanda kuna KwaZulu-Natal, zehlisa amaphaphu ngesomiso kodwa kuyaqhubeka ukufa kwemfuyo nezitshalo ngenxa yesomiso esibhokile eMtshezi naseBergville.Abalimi bakhala ngokuthi noma betshala kakumili lutho emasimini ngenxa yesomiso.Umlimi, uMnuz Sibusiso Majola, waseSigodlweni eMtshezi, uthe usefelwe yizinkomo ezingu-14 kusuka ngo-Okthoba nonyaka.Ufelwe nayizimbuzi eziyisithupha.Ezinkomweni ezifile, ezimbili zazimithi.UMajola uthe bayazama ukuzithengela utshani nemithi yokwelapha izinkomo ngenxa yesomiso. Kodwa kakwanele ngoba amanzi kawekho.“Izinkomo zidle utshani ngisho nezimpande zabo zabuqeda. Manje kakumili lutho ngoba kayini imvula. Ngeke uziyise nasendalini uyozidayisa lezi zinkomo ngoba ufike uthole imali encane, bakutshele ukuthi zizacile futhi ziyagula,” kusho uMajola.UMnuz Thembinkosi Mkhize, umlimi uthe ukungabi bikho kotshani sekuholele ekutheni afelwe yizinkomo eziyisishiyagalolunye.UMkhize uthe uwubikelile uMnyango wezoLimo ngengwadla yokufa kwemfuyo nezitshalo ngenxa yesomiso.“Sikhala kakhulu ngokudla kwezinkomo. Kayikho into ongayitshala ngoba kuwugwadule. Kusha yonke into esiyitshalayo ngoba kalini izulu,” kusho uMkhize.SISHAYE kwazwela kubalimi isomiso esihlasele oKhahlamba Municipality njengoba lapha umfuyi, uMnuz Musa Dlalisa uthathwe emi eduze kwenkomo, iningi lazo elifa ubuthaphuthaphuUmlimi, uMnuz Musa Dlalisa, waseDukuza eBergville, uthe bashayekile ngoba imvula enethe kakhulu bayigcine ngoMeyi nonyaka.Uthe kuqothuka amadlelo nezintaba okudla kuzona izinkomo, osekohelele ekufeni kwemfuyo.“Isomiso sisikhahlameze kanzima singabalimi abasathuthuka eBergville. Futhi sicwile shi ezikweletini ngoba kumele sikhiphe ephaketheni, sithenge ukudla kwezinkomo okubizayo. Nginawo umanyolo, imithi nemishini yokulima kodwa kanginayo imbewu emilisa umbila ngokushesha,” kusho uDlalisa.Uthe bezwa emisakazweni, babone kumathelevishini nasemaphepheni ukuthi kwezinye izindawo liyana futhi amadamu agcwele amanzi, okuyinto abayizwa ngendaba eBergville.UMnuz Mhlanga Duze waseMakhosaneni eBergvile, ongumlimi yena uthe ufelwe yizinkomo ezingu-11 ngenxa yesomiso.UDuze uthe emasimini abakatshali ngoba kabanayo imali yokuthenga imbewu ebizayo yommbila ewumilisa ngokushesha.“Imvula siyizwa ngendaba ngoba kalini nhlobo la kithina. Sifelwa yimfuyo nezitshalo, sixakekile,” kusho uDuze.UMnyango wezoLimo nokuThuthukiswa kweziNdawo zasemaKhaya KwaZulu-Natal ubeke imali yokutakula abalimi abadonsa kanzima ngenxa yesomiso.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango, uNkk Bongi Sithole-Moloi, uthe babeke eceleni uR20 million wokulekelela abalimi abakhahlanyezwe yisomiso.Kuzosetshenziswa uR17 million wale mali ukuthenga ukudla kwezinkomo, bese kuthi uR3 million uthenge imithi yezinkomo ngoba eziningi ziyagula ngenxa yesomiso.“Le mali ngeke yazilungisa zonke izinkinga ezibhekene nabalimi. Ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi abalimi bazidayise esidlangaleni izinkomo bese kuthi imali abayitholayo bathenge ukudla kwemfuyo esele,” kusho uNkk Sithole-Moloi.Umnyango unxenxe abalimi abakhahlanyezwe yisomiso ukuba baye emahhovisi omnyango, bayonikezela ngemininingwane yabo ukuze basizwe.Umnyango uthi imiphakathi eyakhele omasipala uMkhanyakude, Amajuba, uThukela naseZululand ishayeke kakhulu yisomiso.UNdunankulu wesifundazwe, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala usanda kuveza ukuthi izimvula zakamuva zenze isimo sokugcwala kwamanzi emadamini saba phakathi kuka-50% kuya ku-60%.
title: Bakhala ngesomiso abalimi eKZN

text: UGWETSHWE iminyaka eyishumi yahoxiswa, ebhadla ejele umrepha wakuleli, uThulani "Pitch Black" Afro emuva kokulahlwa yicala lokubulala umkakhe ngokungenhloso. Yize egwetshwe le minyaka kodwa ingxenye yalesi sigwebo ihoxisiwe kuze kuphele iminyaka emihlanu engatholakali necala elifanayo. Lo mculi ulahlwe yicala lokufa komkakhe uCatherine Modisane eminyakeni emibili eyedlule. UPitch Black Afro ubevele phambi kweJaji uJ du Plessis eNkantolo eNkulu iSouth Gauteng namhlanje. Lesi sigwebo sisho ukuthi lo mrepha uzogqunywa ejele iminyaka engevile kwemithathu njengoba ebeseke watoka unyaka nezinyanga ezinhlanu ejele kusaqhubeka ukuthethwa kwecala.Kwenzeka lokhu nje lo mculi wayebekwe namanye amacala, okungelokukhohlisa ingalo yomthetho nokuhlela ukubulala umkakhe kodwa ukhishwe phambili kuwo izolo.Ijaji lithe yize uPitch Black Afro ayengahlosile ukubulala uCatherine kodwa ukhombise izimpawu zokuthi akazisoli ngesenzo sakhe. Nakuba kunjalo kodwa ijaji libuye lamcabangela ngokuthi ubesenobudlelwano obuhle nabasekhweni lakhe njengoba aphonsa itshe esivivaneni ukuhlangabeza izindleko zokufihlwa komkakhe. Kuhluleke ngisho ummeli woMbuso efuna agqunywe ejele iminyaka emihlanu egcwele  lo mculi  ngoba akufanele inkantolo ikuzibe ukuthi kunomphefumulo owaphumayo kodwa ummeli kaPitch Black Afro wathi kufanele kucatshangwe ukuthi umufi nguye owachukuluza ummangalelwa ngokumqhumisa ngempama.Ijaji lithe yize uPitch Black Afro axolisa emndenini kamufi kodwa ubelokhu ephika ukuthi uyazi ukuthi kwenzekani ngosuku lwesigameko ngenxa yokuthi wayedakiwe.
title: U-Pitch Black Afro ugwetshwe iminyaka eyishumi ngokubulala unkosikazi wakhe

text: NOKUBONGWA PHENYANEULOKHU eqhubekile nokuwola izindondo emcimbini yasemazweni aphesheya kwezilwandle nawase-Afrika umculi waseLimpopo, uMaster KG okuthe ngeSonto ebusuku wahlabana ngezindondo ezine kuma-African Muzik Magazine Awards (Afrimma).Umcimbi, obusakazwa bukhoma kwiYouTube, udonse amehlo abantu abaningi base-Afrika abebebheke ukuthi ngobani abazodla umhlanganiso.UMaster KG uhambe nezindondo ezibalulekile okukhona kuzo eye-Artist of The Year, Song of The Year, Best Male Southern Africa neyeBest Collaboration apike kuyo uBurna Boy waseNigeria.Ekhuluma ngokuwina kwakhe uMaster KG uthe u-2020 kube wunyaka omuhle kuye okwenzeke kuwo izinto akade engazilindele.“Ngiyathemba umhlaba wonke uyaqhubeka nokubuka abaculi baseSouth Africa ukuthi banekhono kanjani. Ngizizwa ngithobekile kakhulu ukuhlabana. Ngiyaziqhenya kakhulu ngokuqala phansi ingoma ethi Jerusalema ngokubambisana noNomcebo noBurna Boy njengoba yenze okuhle kodwa. Ngiyabonga kakhulu nakubo. Ngibonga nakuwona wonke umuntu emazweni omhlaba ahlukene othole ukujatshuliswa yile ngoma,” kusho uMaster KG.Uthe nenkampani asebenze nayo, i-Open Mic Productions, yenze umsebenzi omuhle engomeni.Umcimbi ubuphethwe Tashara Parker, e-USA.UMaster KG akagcinanga nje ngokuwola izindondo kodwa ubuye wanandisa ngayo ingoma yakhe ethi Jerusalema.Phakathi kwabanye abaculi bakuleli abahlabane  kubalwa uSho Madjozi, othole indondo yeBest Female Southern Africa, Nasty C, othole indondo yeBest Male Rap Act, noKabza Da Small, yena ohlabane ngendondo yeProducer of the Year.UMASTER KG uphinde wahlabana ngezinye izindondo emcimbini ama-Afrimma akade engeSonto ebusuku. Uthole izindondo evele esanda kuhlabana ngenye indondo emcimbini ama-EMMA’s e-Europe Isithombe: TWITTER
title: UMaster KG uyaqhubeka nokuwola izindondo

text: UZISHAYA isifuba ngasefike wakwenza ngesikhathi esifushane kwiChippa United, u-Eric Tinkler okuthuke wonke umuntu ngesikhathi amukela umsebenzi kwiChilli Boys kwazise umqeqeshi uxoshwa noma yinini kuleli qembu likaSiviwe “Chippa” Mpengesi.Yize izinto zingekho esimeni esifunwa abalandeli beqembu kwazise lisondele ngasemsileni we-log ye-Absa Premiership, uTinkler uyakwazi okufanele akwenze kodwa futhi uyasho ukuthi konke kulele kubadlali.Ngesikhathi ethatha lo msebenzi kade kuxoshwe uDan Malesela, uTinkler uthe ukwazi kahle azifaka kukhona wase ezeseka ngokuthi alikho iqembu elingaxoshi emhlabeni.Ngemuva kokudlala ngokulingana neLamontville Golden Arrows ngoMgqibelo, uTinkler uzwakalise ukwenama kwakhe ngabadlali basemuva kodwa wase ekubalula nokuthi kusemqoka iqembu lenze kahle kuzona zonke izindawo hhayi emuva kuphela.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngendlela esidlala ngayo. Ngijabule kakhulu futhi ngokuthi amagoli awasasingeneli kakhulu njengoba bekwenzeka ngasekuqaleni kwesizini.“Kuyajabulisa lokhu uma uwumqeqeshi ngoba kukukhombisa ukuthi lokhu okufundisayo akungeni ngapha kuphume ngapha. Abafana abaningi angikakabajwayeli kahle kodwa siyasebenza kuyakhula.“Ngizishaya isifuba ngokuthi indaba yasemuva isilungile. Sesiyabonakala manje ukuthi iyiphi indlela esifuna ukudlala ngayo. Siyazi sifuna ukwenzani ngakho kusemqoka ukuthi sihlale kulokhu esikholelwa kukhona.“Kufanele sisebenze kakhulu nasekubeni yimiqemane kwabadlali ngoba kusemqoka ikakhulukazi ngasekupheleni kwemidlalo,” kusho uTinkler.Uthe njengoba bezothola ikhefu ngaphambi kokubhekana neFree State Stars bazosebenza kakhulu endleleni abafisa ukudlala ngayo bese eqhubeka ekufaka emakhanda abadlali ukuthi noma sekunzima kanjani bangalokothi bashintshe indlela abadlala ngayo.Lo mqeqeshi oke wasebenza kwi-Orlando Pirates, Cape Town City neSuperSport United uthe iqembu ulithole abafana bephansi nangokomoya.“Kunzima uma ufika endaweni lapho umqeqeshi esanda kuxoshwa. Abafana basuke bephansi manje siyazama nokho ukubafukula. Kuyazameka impela kodwa kuzohamba isikhathi izinto zilunge.“Okunye engingakukhulekela ukuthi kubuye inhlanhla,” kusho uTinkler ejobelela ngokuthi asikho isikhathi sokuhlala acabange indaba yokuthi ucindezeleke kangakanani.
title: UTinkler uzishaya isifuba ngakwenzele iChippa United

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa akenzanga okwanele ukugxeka abasola uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngesikhathi kuputshuka izindaba zokuthi uyakuphikisa ukuvulwa kokudayiswa ugwayi notshwala esigabeni sesithathu sikathaqa.Lokhu kushiwo wumhlaziyi wezombusazwe uMnuz Lukhona Mnguni emuva kwenkulumo kamengameli ebingeSonto ebusuku lapho bekumenyezelwa ukuthi izwe selikulungele ukudlulela esigabeni sesithathu ngesonto elizayo.UMnguni uthe ngaphandle kwencwadi umengameli ayibhale emasontweni amabili edlule enkulumeni yakhe akazange agxile ekugxekeni labo abagxambukela emsebenzini wongqongqoshe abasuke bedingida izinqumo okumele zithathwe wuhulumeni.Ngaphambi kokuthi umengameli athule inkulumo yakhe, imithombo yabezindaba ibike ngolwazi oluputshuke ngaphakathi kwiNational Coronavirus Command Council, lapho kuvele khona ukuthi uDkt Dlamini Zuma onguNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu useqhulwini labachitha ukubuyiswa ukudayiswa kukagwayi.Emuva kokuputshuka kwalolu lwazi, kube kukhulu ukugxekwa kukaDkt Dlamini Zuma ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abanye bemsolwa ngokuba ngungqoshishilizi ekuthathweni kwezinqumo.UMnguni uthe ukugxekwa kongqongqoshe kwenziwa ngabathile abahleze befuna ukuthi uma izinto zingalawuleki kugxekwe ongqongqoshe kodwa uma izinto zihamba kahle kuphakanyiswe umengameli“Lokhu kukhipha eceleni umengameli uma kumele amelane nazo zonke izinqumo ezithathwa uhulumeni. Isibonelo, kuvulwe wonke umnotho abantu babuyela emsebenzini kodwa izingane ezincane azikavunyelwa ukuya ezikoleni ukuze abazali bashiye izingane lapho zigadwa khona uma sebeqala emsebenzini. Yizona zonke izinto ezishiya umbuzo ngezindlela ezisetshenziswa wuhulumeni,” kusho uMnguni.Ngesikhathi umengameli ememezela ukuvulwa kokudayiswa kotshwala, kube nesasasa elikhulu kubantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Abantu babelane ngama-video abebonisa amalungu omphakathi ejabule.
title: ‘URamaphosa akenzanga okwanele ukuvikela uDlamini-Zuma’

text: UBALISE ngokulinyalelwa izethenjwa zakhe kwaze kwezwela umqeqeshi weLamontville Golden Arrows uClinton Larsen ngesikhathi enaba ngokungazi kwakhe ukuthi uzothathani ayihlanganise nani ukuze abophe itulo elizomtholela amaphuzu amathathu kwi-Absa Premiership.EzikaLarsen zizobhekana neSuperSport United ngeSonto ngo-3.30 ntambama, eMbombela Stadium.ULarsen ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokudedela amaphuzu ngesikhathi iqembu lakhe livumela ukubanjwa yiFree State Stars sekusele imizuzu emine kobuseGoble Park ngoLwesithathu. NgokukaLarsen lesi yisikhathi esinzima ngempela kuyena kwazise uqale lo mdlalo ngabadlali abangalijwayele ijezi.Nakuwona futhi siphinde sanda isibalo sabadlali abalimele njengoba uSiyanda Zwane (osanda kubuya ekulimaleni) eshayeke kabi ekhanda okuphoqe ukuba aphuthunyiswe esibhedlela. Lesi sitobha silimala nje sisanda kubuya ekulimaleni kwazise sishayeke kabi i-Arrows ibhekene neMamelodi Sundowns muva nje.Kulimala uZwane nje, uDevine Lunga, Danny Phiri, Sandile Zuke noDanny Venter abekho ngenxa yakho belu ukulimala abakuthole ngaphambi komdlalo weTelkom Knockout neBaroka FC. Bonke laba badlali balimale i-Arrows inqoba ngo 1-0 kwiBlack Leopards ngaphambi kwekhefu leFifa naseqenjini lesizwe laseZimbabwe ngokwahlukana.UZolani Nkombelo noVelemseni Ndwandwe basayibuka nezihlwele imidlalo ngenxa yakho belu ukulimala. Konke lokhu kuyasifakazela isililo sikaLarsen.“Kunzima ukuba yithina kulesi sikhathi ngoba kumele sichibiyele isikimu kodwa amaqembu esibhekene nawo awanandaba nalokho afuna amaphuzu. Ngiyazi ukuthi isikhathi esinje siyafika ebholeni kodwa akujwayelekile ukuthi kulimale inqwaba edlala indawo eyodwa. Ngenhlanhla sikholelwa ekutheni sibakhulise abafana bethu abancane ngakho-ke yibona abazosebenza lapha,” kusho uLarsen.Baya eMbombela ukuyobhekana neqembu elivukile emaqandeni futhi uma ubheka irekhodi lalo lasekhaya kufanele bangenwe amanzi emadolweni oLarsen nethimba lakhe labaqeqeshi. ISuperSport isayinqobe yonke imidlalo yayo eyidlalele ekhaya lapho ishaye khona AmaZulu, Chippa United neLeopards.“Sinenkinga efanayo neye-Arrows ikakhulukazi phambili ngoba uFagrie (Lakay), Bradley (Grobler), Thabo (Mnyamane) no-Evans (Rusike) bonke balimele. Nginethemba lokuthi abadlali abafana noTeboho (Mokoena) bazoqhubeka nokukhombisa izimpawu zokukhula,” kusho uKaitano Tembo oqeqesha iSuperSport.
title: Ukhale ngokulimala kwezethenjwa uLarsen

text: UMTHOKOZISI Ndaba unovalo ngokuphawula ngecala akade ebhekene nalo lokushaya owesifazane waseGoli okuthe izolo lahoxiswa.Le nsizwa yaKwaMashu ezakhele igama iphuma isibili ohlelweni ama-Idols SA ibivele izolo eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseHillbrow eGoli.UMthokozisi uboshwe ngoLwesine olwedlule ngemuva kokuvulwa kwecala esiteshini saseHillbrow ngoNovemba 25.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uMthokozisi uthe ngeke aphawule ngalolu daba njengoba engazi ukuthi abantu bazoyithatha kanjani indlela azizwa ngayo.“Okwamanje ngeke ngiphawule ngendlela engizizwa ngayo. Ngizocela ukukuthumelela izinombolo zommeli wami ukuze ukhulume naye ngalo,” kusho uMthokozisi.Esitatimendeni asikhipha ngesonto eledlule ngemuva kokuvela kwalezi zindaba uMthokozisi waveza ukuthi uzosebenzisana namaphoyisa kuleli cala.“Ngifuna umthetho usebenze futhi ngizimisele ukubambisana nawo. Yize ukuvela kwalezi zindaba kudicilele phansi isithunzi sami futhi kungalimaza nethuba enginalo emculweni kodwa ngizobambisana namaphoyisa kukhona konke akwenzayo,” kuchaza yena.Owesifazane owavula icala ubesola uMthokozisi ngokumshaya ngemuva kokungaboni ngaso linye nomunye wesilisa owayehamba noMthokozisi.Lesi senzo sikaMthokozisi sagxekwa njengoba kunomkhankaso wokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane.Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela uMthokozisi engayithumelile inombolo yommeli wakhe obezocacisa ngesinqumo senkantolo nokuthi kufinyelelwe kanjani kusona.
title: Owama-Idols uyesaba ukukhuluma  ngecala

text: UZIMISELE ngokuqhubeka nokwenza kahle kwiNedbank Cup ka-2018 umdlali waMaZulu uMichael Morton oseyinqobe amahlandla amathathu namaqembu ahlukene le ndebe ehamba nesheke lika-R7 million nebhonasi lokuyodlala kwiCAF Confederation Cup.UMorton ubalwa nabadlali asebeyinqobe izikhawu eziningi iNedbank Cup. Indondo yakhe yokuqala yeNedbank Cup wayithola ngo-2010 ngesikhathi esagijima kwiBidvest Wits.IWits yabhudluza AmaZulu asedlalelwa nguMorton ngo 3-0 e-FNB Stadium, eSoweto, eGoli. UMorton ukuphindile lokho ngo-2016 ngesikhathi iSuperSport abedlala kuyona iqumba phansii-Orlando Pirates ngo 3-2 ePeter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane, eLimpopo.Ngonyaka odlule ubekhona futhi uMorton ngesikhathi leli qembu lithela othulini i-Orlando Pirates ngo 4-1 eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini.UMorton exoxa neSolezwe udalule ukuthi ufuna ukubona iqembu lakhe lihamba ibanga elide kulo mqhudelwano.“Into esiyibheke kakhulu kule sizini wukuqinisekisa ukuthi iqembu lihlala esigabeni esikhulu. Noma kunjalo kodwa ngeke ngikufihle ukuthi kungakuhle uma kungathiwa sihamba ibanga elide kwiNedbank Cup. Lona ngumqhudelwano ojwayele ukungivuma ukuthi uwunqobe.“Enye into enhle ngawo wukuthi uma udlala nala maqembu okuthiwa mancane abantu abaningi abaninaki kodwa wonke amehlo asuke ethe njo kula maqembu amakhulu. Baqala ukuninaka uma senihambe ibange elide. Ubuntu Cape Town ngeke sibuthathe kancane. Bakhiphe iqembu elidlala esigabeni esikhulu,” kusho uMorton.Usuthu yilona iqembu laKwaZulu-Natal elagcina ukwenza kahle kulo mqhudelwano. Ngo-2010 laqunjwa phansi yiWits. Kusuka lapho alikho elinye iqembu laseKZN eselike lafinyelela kowamanqamu.“Njengamanje into esigxile kuyona wukufinyelela emaphuzwini angu-32. Ngicabanga ukuthi uma singathola amaphuzu angu-32 mancane amathuba okuthi sigawulwe yizembe. Uma sesithole angu-32 sizobe sesibona ukuthi ngeke sikwazi yini ukufinyelela kwangu-40 okusho ukuthi singazithola siqeda kwiTop 8. Into emqoka nje wukuthi sinqobe imidlalo yethu elandelayo,” kusho uMorton.Njengamanje Usuthu seluqoqe amaphuzu angu-26 emidlalweni engu-21 ye-Absa Premiership.
title: Ithemba kowoSuthu ngeNedbank Cup

text: MBONGISENI BUTHELEZIEseGoliU JABULE wabuya nganeno umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, u-Eric Tinkler, ngemuva kokuthi ezakhe ziqumbe phansi izimbangi iKaizer Chiefs ngo 4-3 kumaphenathi kuCarling Black Label Cup eFNB Stadium ngempelasonto.Umdlalo ubuphele zibambene ngo 1-1 ngamagoli kaSifiso Myeni obeke iPirates phambili nelikaReneilwe Letsholonyane okube elokulinganisa leChiefs.Okuphazamisa uTinkler yize iqembu lakhe lishosholoza kulezi zinsuku ngemiphumela emihle, wukulimala ubuthaphuthaphu kwabadlali bakhe.Kulo mdlalo weCarling Cup, umgadli uThamsanqa Gabuza, akazange asiqede isiwombe sokuqala esephuma edonseke umsipha. UGabuza ubengekho ohlwini lwabadlali abebevotelwe ngabalandeli ukuthi baqale umdlalo kodwa uthathe indawo kaKermit Erasmus naye olimalile ngaphambi komdlalo wangempelasonto. Abanye abadlali abahoxile emdlalweni ngenxa yokulimala, uThabo Matlaba noRooi Mahamutsa.Okukhathaza umqeqeshi wukuthi behlwela wukulimala kuminyene utshumo imidlalo emqoka okumele bayidlale. Kusasa bazodudulana ne-Ajax Cape Town kuma-quarterfinal eMTN 8 e-Orlando Stadium ngo-7.30 ebusuku. Umdlalo uzolandelwa oweCaf Confederation Cup ngoMgqibelo lapho bezoba wosokhaya kuCS Sfaxien yaseTunisia e-Orlando Stadium. Bazothi bangaqeda lapha bavule i-Absa Premiership neSuperSport United ngoLwesibili oluzayo. Okusobala lapha wukuthi yonke imidlalo kusemqoka ukuyinqoba.Ukudlula kuMTN 8 kuzosondeza iqembu ekutheni lilwele ukunqoba le ndebe eyaliphunyuka kuChiefs ngesizini edlule. KoweCaf, ukunqoba kuzosho amaphuzu amathathu abalulekile ekutheni ingene kuma-semi final omqhudelwano kanti ukunqoba koweligi kusho ukuqala ngegxathu elisha kuTinkler.“UKermit simhlolile nethimba lodokotela sathola ukuthi usezwa ubuhlungu emsipheni. ngicabanga ukuthi uzohlala izinzuku ezinhlanu engadlali. UMatlaba inyanga, uRooi yena uzilolongile neqembu izolo (ngoLwesihlanu). kungenzeka abonakale ngempelasonto. Bengifuna ukuthi ngikhiphe u(Lehlohonolo) Majoro ngesikhathi kulimala uGabuza ngoba sekungukuphela komgadli esinaye ku-CAF Confederation Cup ngoba nakhu noGabuza uselimele. Kuzobonakala ukuthi uGabuza nabanye abathintekile balimele kanjani uma sebehlolwa ngemishini,” kusho uTinkler.Uthe uhlabeke umxhelwe ngendlela abadlali bakhe abasha abadlale ngayo emdlalweni wabo neChiefs. “UTendai Ndoro, obedlala okokuqala kowomkhaya, udlalile yena. noLuvoyo Memela udlale kahle wahlangana kahle neqembu.Ngijabulile nango-Edwin Gyimah odlala eqenjini lesizwe laseGhana. udlala emuva nasesiswini futhi bekungokukuqala simsebenzisa. ufike izolo (ngoLwesihlanu) yize eke waphisana ngebhola kodwa yena udlala kahle,” kusho uTinkler.Imidlalo yama-quarterfinal yeMTN 8Kusasa: Orlando Pirates v Ajax Cape Town (7.30pm, Orlando Stadium); Bidvest Wits v SuperSport United (7.30pm, Bidvest Stadium)NgoLwesithathu: Kaizer Chiefs v Maritzburg United (7.30pm, FNB Stadium); Mamelodi Sundowns v Bloemfontein Celtic (7.30pm, Loftus Stadium)
title: Ukhala ngokulimala kwabadlali

text:
SIMPHIWE NGUBANEI PHOYISA elalithunywe ukuthi lilande imoto kowayengumdlali weqembu lebhola lombhoxo obhekene namacala okubulala uJoseph Phindile Ntshongwana 
(osesithombeni) litshele iNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini izolo ukuthi umsolwa walitshela ukuthi uchitha isikhathi esiningi efunda izincwadi zeNkosi uShaka ngoba uthanda isibindi sayo.UWarrant Officer Lucky Mathe, oneminyaka engu-27 eyiphoyisa, uthe wayekade ethunywe wumngani wakhe osenkampanini yakwa-Avis ukuthi aye eYellowwood Park ngoMashi 24, 2011 ayolanda imoto eyayisiphelelwe yisikhathi ibolekwe wuNtshongwana. Uthe wayifica inegazi lomuntu ngaphakathi ezihlalweni nasesicabheni somshayeli.UMathe uthe wathuka kwabanda amathumbu ngesikhathi echazelwa wuNtshongwana ukuthi uShaka wayengagcini ngokukhalipha nje kodwa wayenesibindi ukwedlula wonke amanye amakhosi kangangoba wahlinza owesifazane owayezithwele efuna ukubona ingane ukuthi ihlezi kanjani esibelethweni.“Ngambuza ukuthi usenzani manje ngoba akasayidlali i-rugby wathi uchitha isikhathi esiningi efunda izincwadi zeNkosi uShaka. Ngabe sengimbuza ukuthi kwenziwa yini lokho ngoba yena ungumXhosa kanti uShaka kwakuyinkosi yamaZulu. Wabe esethi nguShaka kuphela inkosi eyayinesibindi eyakwazi ukuqaqa umuntu wesifazane isisu ifuna ukubona ingane,” kuchaza uMathe. UMathe ubecacisela ummeli kaNtshongwana u-Adcocate Themba Mjoli ukuthi bake babonana nomsolwa ezolanda imoto. UMjoli uthe utshelwe wummangalelwa ukuthi akazani noMathe futhi akakhumbuli ehlangana naye beze behamba bobabili bebuyisela imoto eyayibolekwe kwa-Avis.Umsolwa usolwa ngokubulala uMnuz Thembelenkosini Cebekhulu ngoMashi 20 nyakenye, Mnuz Paulos Hlongwa emva kwezinsuku ezimbili, Mnuz Simon Ngidi nendoda igama layo elingaziwa bonke okwatholwa izidumbu zabo zingenamakhanda zihlahlelwe ngembazo.Usolwa nangokuthumba adlwengule ephindelela ngaphandle kwekhondomu owesifazane owayeneminyaka engu-25 ngoNovemba 28, 2010 okuthiwa wamvalela izinsuku ezintathu emsabisa ngokumbulala ethi wakhipha isisu emva kokuthi esethelele ingane yakhe ngengculazi.Ummeli kaNtshongwana naye umsolwa bavume bangaphikisana ngophenyo nobufakazi obethulwe ngofakazi ngalamacala okubulala kodwa bacela inkantolo ukuthi iphinde ibize ofakazi abathile ngenxa yokuthi kwakunamaphepha ababenganikwanga wona ngesikhathi bephekwa ngemibuzo.Kuvele nokuthi uNtshongwana esebuyisela imoto watshela uMathe ukuthi igazi elalisemotweni ngelabantu ayebalayishile abalimala engozini yemoto nebhasi.Ephekwa ngemibuzo uMathe uthe wayengazi ukuthi uNtshongwana nguyena lo othinteka emacaleni okujuqa abantu ngembazo wathi ukube wayazi ngabe wambopha.“Ngangiye laphaya ngithunywe umngani wami ukuthi ngimlandele imoto. Yingakho esitatimendeni samaphoyisa engasenza ngingabhalanga ngegazi engalithola emotweni ngoba ngaleso sikhathi ngabona ukuthi akubalulekile ukwenza lokhu,” kusho uMathe.UMjoli uthe ubufakazi bukaMathe buyashayisana wathi kunokwenzeka ukuthi utshelwe wumphenyi wecala noma wumshushisi ukuthi akathini enkantolo.Icala liyaqhubeka namhlanje.
title: Ubefunda ngoShaka owembazo: iphoyisa

text: UGCWELE amathafa osolwa ngokudubula ngentululwane yezinhlamvu imenenja yaserenki yamatekisi yafela endaweni yesigameko,  emgwaqweni uCottonwood Drive, eTrenance Park, eVerulam izolo ekuseni.Kuthiwa onogada beReaction Unit South Africa ( Rusa) baphuthume lapho okwenzeke khona isigameko, ngemuva kokuthola imibiko mayelana nokudutshulwa komlisa. Kubikwa ukuthi ngesikhathi befika, bazithele kulo mlisa obedubuleke ekhanda nasemhlane elele ebheke phansi,  onqenqemeni lomgwaqo. Kuthiwa umufi utholwe wonogada opha kakhulu, kanti ugcine ephelele endaweni yesigameko.UMnuz Prem Balram okhulumela iRusa, uthe ithimba labo lithole amagobolondo ezinhlamvu angaphezulu  kwayisishiyagalombili endaweni yesigameko.“Umufi kusolwa ukuthi uneminyaka elinganiselwa ku-20 kuya kwengu-30. Imbangela yokubulawa kwakhe ayikaziwa njengamanje,” kusho uBalram.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, usiqinisekisile isigameko sokudutshulwa komlisa izolo eTrenance Park, eVerulam.“ Umsolwa kubikwa ukuthi ubalekile ngemuva kokubulala indoda eneminyaka engu-30. Amaphoyisa aseVerulam aphenya icala lokubulala,” kusho uCapt Gwala.
title: Ugcwele amathafa osolwa ngokubulala owamatekisi

text: SISHUBILE isimo kwabenkolo ye-Islam ngemuva kokuhlaselwa kwelinye ithempeli lamaMuslim kwabulawa ababili abanye balimala ngoLwesine ekuseni eMalmesbury, eWestern Cape.Umsolwa oyedwa udutshulwe amaphoyisa endaweni yesigameko kanti amaphoyisa aveze nokuthi lolu daba seludluliselwe koKlebe. Lesi sigameko silandela esinye esifana naso esenzeke eVerulam KwaZulu-Natal kanti nakhona kwanqunywa abantu ababili ababethandaza. Ngemuva kwalesi sigameko oKlebe bathola isiqhumane kulo leli bandla. Kwenzeka lokhu nje isiyaphela inyanga yama-Muslim kaRamadan. Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseWestern Cape uLieutenant Colonel Andrè Traut, uthe amaphoyisa aseMalmesbury abizelwe endaweni yesigameko ekuseni ngo-3. "Ngesikhathi amalungu ebandla elungiselela ukuthandaza, umsolwa uvele wasukuma waqala wagwaza abantu akade ethandaza nabo," kusho uConstable Henry Durant wesiteshi samaphoyisa eMalmesbury. ITHEMPELI okuhlaselwe kulo abebekhuleka. Isithombe: Henk Kruger/African News Agency/ANAUmsolwa, okubikwa ukuthi ungowesilisa wokufika oneminyaka ekuma-30, kuthiwa ukwenze lokhu ngesizotha engajahe ndawo kanti uqale ngokuhlasela owesilisa okhulile wamnquma uqhoqhoqho ngommese omkhulu. Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa efika ethempelini kuthiwa umsolwa unqabile ukubeka phansi ummese, wazama ukuhlasela amaphoyisa, amdubula wafa. UTraut uthe ukubulawa kwakhe kusazophenywa yi-Ipid. Uthe asikatholakali isizathu sokuhlaselwa nokubulawa kwamalungu aleli thempeli.
title: Uvalo kunqunywa abanye ethempelini lama-Muslim

text: UMA uLuvuyo Memela eluleme ngokugcwele kungenzeka kuphinde kube wusuku lwakhe lokuthokozisa abalandeli be-Orlando Pirates ezoqhuthana neCape Town City koweNedbank Cup namuhla eCape Town Stadium, eKapa.Lo mdlalo weLast 16 uzoqala ngo-7.30 ebusuku. UMemela ungomunye wabadlali ababonakala bethola inkululeko kumqeqeshi uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic.Useziphendule esinye sezithandwa ngokushayela iqembu amagoli amqoka. Kamuva ube yiqhawe evalela amabili iBucs iqumba phansi iKaizer Chiefs ngo 3-1 kowe-Absa Premiership.Leli nxele selishaye amagoli amahlanu emidlalweni yeligi okwenza libe ngelihamba phambili kweZimnyama ekuboneni inethi.UMemela ube nokuthinteka okwenze ukuthi ahlale angajimi nozakwabo kodwa uMicho uthe akukubi benzela ukuthi angabhebhethekisi isimo sakhe.Lo mdlali ongowokuzalwa khona eKapa, ephawula kwi-website yeqembu, uthe kumqoka ukuthi badlulele emzuliswaneni olandelayo.“Kumele siwine ngoba vele sihlezi sifuna ukuwina yonke imidlalo esiyidlalayo. Sekuphele isikhathi eside singawini isicoco futhi abantu bayakhuluma ngefomu esikuyona. Basibona singakwazi ukuwina indebe kodwa ngokwethu asijuli kangako ngemicabango.“Kodwa sibheke umdlalo onzima esizowuthola kwiCape Town City. Siwenzile amalungiselelo sayicubungula indlela edlala ngayo. Uma siyilandela ngendlela imiyalelo yomqeqeshi alikho iqembu elingasivimba noma ngabe sidlala eKapa nesimo sakhona sezulu esingaqondakali,” kusho uMemela.I-Pirates ifike kwi-Last 16 ngemuva kokushaya elinye iqembu laseKapa i-Ajax Cape Town kodwa idlalela esibayeni sayo. Inqobe ngo 2-0 okuwumphumela obufana nowokuziphindiselela njengoba igcina ukuyodlala eKapa yaqunjwa phansi iyona i-Urban Warriors ngo 3-0 kwiligi.“Sabahlula ngomdlalo. Wukuthi sasuke senza amaphutha sanganaka base beyasihlawulisa. Uma sizohlezi siqaphile umzuzu nomzuzu kuze kuphele umdlalo, sizophuma singabanqobi,” kusho uMemela.ICity ephekwa uBenni McCarthy ikhiphe iBidvest Wits kwiLast 32. Egcina ukuhlangana la maqembu iPirates inqobe ngo 1-0 koweligi.
title: Kuzobhekwa uMemela weBucs koweNedbank

text: ABASEBENZI baseToyota, eThekwini, ngoLwesine baqale isiteleka abathe sizodonsa kuze kuphendulwe izimfuno zabo.UMgqugquzeli weNumsa KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mandla Gambushe, uthe sekunesikhathi benokunganeliseki. Phakathi kokunye kunemali ewuR10 000 eyabolekwa ngabasebenzi ababehlukunyezwe yizikhukhula ngo-Okthoba ngonyaka odlule asebefuna ukuthi ingakhokhwa.“Sifuna ukuthi abasebenzi ababekade beyibolekile imali bangabe besayikhokha. Labo asebeqalile ukuyikhokha sifuna babuyiselwe yona. Sizwile ukuthi inkampani iyakwazi ukukhipha imali iyifake kumasipala kodwa abasebenzi bayabolekwa imali,” kusho uGambushe.UGambushe uthe bafuna nokuthi abasebenzi balashwe mahhala ngaphakathi enkampanini. Abasebenzi abanamaMedical Aid kudingeka bakhokhe uR300 uma bezokwelashwa. Okunye abakhala ngakho wukungaqashwa kwabasebenzi abawu-596 abebenezinkontileka eziphele ngonyaka odlule. Kuthiwa esikhundleni sokuthi kuqashwe bona uma kuvela izikhala, inkampani iqasha abafundi kumaLearnership. Abasebenzi bafuna ukuthi uma kuvela izikhala kuqashwe * -35% kulaba abawu-596 no-35% wabasohlwini lwabafake izicelo zomsebenzi.“Asinankinga nama-learnership kodwa sifuna kwenziwe ubulungiswa. Uma befuna ukuqasha abamaLearnership kumele bathathe * -30% kuwona,” kusho uGambushe.Abasebenzi bafuna nokuqashiselwa ngezimoto zenkampani nokuthola ithuba lamathenda abathi isikhathi esiningi anikezwa abohlanga oluthize. Bafuna nokuthi kube nezimpahla ezifanele zokugqoka zabasebenzi nabesifazane babe nezabo ezihambelana nabo.OnguNobhala eKZN kwiSouth African Federation of Trade Unions, uMnuz Moses Mautsoe-Tsotetsi, unxuse abasebenzi ukuthi bangesabi ukuqhubeka nesiteleka uma zingezwakali izimfuno zabo. Uncome iNumsa ngokuba nabaholi abangahlehli futhi abangesabi.“Siyaseseka isiteleka enisiqalile futhi sinxusa abasebenzi ukuthi babumbane ukuze banqobe. Akukhathalekile ukuthi ukuyiphi inhlangano yezepolitiki ngoba silwela izimfuno zabasebenzi. Kumele silwe nezimenenja ezihleli emahhovisi ezixhaphaza abasebenzi,” kusho uMautsoe-Tsotetsi.Izolo ubuholi bezinyunyana bunikeze abaqashi amahora awu-72 ukuze baphendule. Ubuholi buthe buzimisele ukuxoxa nomqashi kodwa uma izikhalo zingezwakali isiteleka sizoqhubeka.Kuvele nokuthi abaqashi sebefake incwadi yesivimbelo enkantolo ukugwema isiteleka kodwa kushaye isikhathi sokuloba ingakaziwa ukuthi ihambe kanjani.Okhulumela abakwaToyota, uMnuz Mzo Witbooi, uthe bayazi ngesiteleka sabasebenzi esisemthethweni. Uthe bayazi nangezimfuno zabo kodwa ngeke bakwazi ukuzikhuluma nabephephandaba.UWItbooi uthe isiteleka siphazamise ukusebenza eThekwini naseGoli. “Siyathembisa ukuthi sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ukulungisa isimo futhi siyawahlonipha amalungelo abasebenzi,” kusho uWitbooi.
title: Kuqale isiteleka sabasebenzi kwaToyota

text: SIYANDA isibalo sabaqashi abangabaholeli abasebenzi ngoba bethi balinde ukukhokhelwa yi-Unemployment Insurance Fund (UIF) ikakhulukazi eJacobs naseSiphingo.NgoLwesibili Isolezwe libhale ngenkampani eyakha izinsimbi zezimoto iFederal Mogul eseProspecton, eSiphingo, ezoboleka abasebenzi imali bese iyidonsa kuleyo ezokhishwa yi-UIF.Kulokhu abasebenzi baseHanes South Africa ebiyaziwa ngokuthi yiPlaytex eseJacobs baveze ukuthi abakaze bahole selokhu kwaqala i-Covid-19.Baveze ukuthi ozakwabo abasebenza ePlaytex ePinetown baholile kodwa bona eJacobs abaholanga ngoba umqashi wabo ukhala ngokuthi akanayo imali.Abanye abasebenzi bathe umqashi ufuna basebenze mahhala.UMnuz Andre Kriel, onguNobhala Jikelele weSouthern African Clothing and Textile Workers Union (Sactwu), uthe kuyicala ukungabaholeli abasebenzi ngoba iSactwu yasayina isivumelwano nabomkhakha wendwangu kwi-clothing bargaining council lapho abaqashi bazibophezela ukuthi bazoholela abasebenzi.Uthe abaqashi baze bathi bazonika abasebenzi igwaxaza yomholo wamasonto amabili ngaphezulu futhi yisivumelwano esaziwayo lesi esagazethwa ngoMashi 26 kulo nyaka.“Umholo wamasonto amabili awuhlanganisi nemali ye-UIF obekufakwe isicelo sayo ngenxa yokuthi abasebenzi kade bevalelwe yiCovid-19 emakhaya.“Akekho umqashi onelungelo lokucela ukuthi abasebenzi basebenze mahhala.“Ucwaningo lwethu luveza ukuthi iHanes yakhokhelwa i-UIF ngo-Ephreli 17 yathola uR194 535.16 kwathi ngoMeyi 4 yaphinde yakhokhelwa uR1 050 781.80.“Le mali ifakelwe inkampani okuyiyona okufanele iyidlulisele kubasebenzi,” kusho uKriel.Uthe bayalusukumela udaba lwaseHanes ngoba abafuni kuxhashazwe abasebenzi.“Sizodlulisela udaba lwaseHanes kumxazululi ngoba sifuna kuholelwe abasebenzi njengokusho komthetho,” kusho uKriel.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kwabakwaHanes South Africa ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwabo belukhala kodwa belungabanjwa.Abayiphendulanga ne-email abathunyelelwe yona ophikweni lwabo olubhekelele ezabathengi.
title: Ziyanda izinkampani ezingabaholeli abasebenzi

text: KUSOLWA owesifazane wendawo okuthiwa wenza izindodla zemali efuna iminikelo kubantu, ebathembisa ukuthi ubalungiselela ukuthi babonane nomphrofethi wezimanga ambiza ngoMphrofethi Awande Hlatshwayo.Umphakathi waseNhlungwane Olundi, uthi usukhathele yithimba lalo wesifazane elihamba lingena umuzi nomuzi lithi abantu abeze bazokhuleka entabeni bafike neminikelo.Abanye liyababhulela lithi abeze bazofakwa “kobhavu bamanzi athandazelwe” bagezwe amabhadi anduba babonane nalo mphrofethi okuthiwa wenza izimanga.Kodwa bathi sekuphele unyaka nezinyanga ezimbili umphakathi wakule ndawo ulinde lo mphrofethi okuthiwa ongakaze abonakale.Manje abantu bathi sebeyabona ukuthi kudlalwa ngabo, ayikho indaba yakhe.Bakhala nangokuthi laba besifazane uma bebuzisiswa ngalo mphrofethi, bavuka umbhejazane. Ababuzayo bashaywe kanzima, noma kuthiwe bayathakatha, bagcine bexoshwa nasendaweni.Abashayiwe bathe kwaba ngenxa yemibuzo ababa nayo kwathiwa bazofaka abanye umoya omubi.“Sesifana nabavalwe umlomo,” kusho omunye umgilwa ocele ukungadalulwa.Intaba Inqulwane, iyona okuthiwa kuthandazwa kuyona. Kunabathi sebekhiphe uR5 000 okuthiwa ababonge ngawo amandla alo mphrofethi ongaziwa. Abanye kuthiwe ababonge ngezinkomo.Leli phephandaba likhulume nalo wesifazane emzini wakhe oyisithabathaba kule ndawo, ocele ukuthi abizwe ngosisi Khanyi.Uphinde azibize ngentombi yaseMabheleni.“Ngenxa yokuthi bayakhalaza bahlulwe ukubekezela, sengizokubambezela kakhulu ukufika kukaMphrofethi,” kusho lo sisi Khanyi.Ebuzwa ukuthi yini edala ukuba lo Mphrofethi angethulwa kubantu, uthe yingenxa yokuthi umatasa usebenza kude eCape Town.“Uxhumana nabantu ngocingo kuphela abatshele izindaba zabo,” kusho usisi Khanyi.Uthe asebegxeka ukungamboni umphrofethi, asebebonile ukuthi ubatshela izindaba zabo abebezifihlele abazali nezihlobo zabo manje sebeyabona ukuthi bazongena emahlazweni.Abantu okukhulunywe nabo kule ndawo, bathe abakaze bambone lo mphrofethi, bahlale bezwa kukhulunywa ngaye nje kuphela. “Mhlawumbe nina ngoba niqhamuka kwabezindaba uzonikhombisa yena,” kusho omunye okuxoxwe naye.Abanye bebebabaza udumo asenalo kodwa ebe engaziwa. Abanye balimise ngesihloko elokuthi le yinto engekho, babanjwa inkunzi.Ngesikhathi leli phephandaba lenza uphenyo ngale nceku yeNkosi, lihluleke lancama wukumthola ukuthi ukhona. Nasezinhlakeni zezenkolo akekho ozwakala emazi, kwazise kuthiwa wumphrofethi odume izwe lonke.Nosisi Khanyi wehlulekile ukunikeza leli phephandaba imininingwane egcwele yalo mphrofethi njengoba iphephandaba belifuna ukukhuluma naye.
title: Basola ukuthi bawakwa ngomphrofethi

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAA KABANGE esapholisa maseko umqeqeshi weBafana Bafana uGordon Igesund ngemuva kokuqhathwa kwamaqembu azodlala ku-African Nations Cup (Afcon) ka-2013 eveza ukuthi uzoqala izingxoxo zomdlalo wobungani ne-Algeria neTunisia ukulungiselela lo mqhudelwano ozobanjelwa kuleli ngoJanuwari 19-Febhuwari 10.U-Igesund obhekhuluma ngemuva komcimbi wokuqhathwa kwamaqembu ngoLwesithathu ebusuku, uthe ukudlala nala mazwe asenhla ne-Afrika kuzomnika ithuba elikahle lokuthola angase akulindele kuMorocco abaqhathwe nayo kuGroup A.Amanye amazwe aseqoqweni leBafana, iCape Verde abazovula nayo eFNB Stadium, eGoli ngoJanuwari 19, ne-Angola abazolandela ngayo ngoJanuwari 23, iMorocco bazodlala nayo ngoJanuwari 27.Leli qoqo lizozinza eThekwini lidlalela eMoses Mabhida ngaphandle komdlalo wokuvula weBafana. EGoli kuzophinde kubanjelwe khona umdlalo wamanqamu.Uma elakuleli likwazi ukungena kuma-quarter final nakuma-semi final lizoqhubeka nokuhlala eThekwini njengoba nayo le midlalo izobanjelwa eMoses Mabhida.“Kuzoba wumqondo omuhle ukudlala ne-Algeria noma iTunisia. Badlala ibhola elifanayo neMorocco engelinye lamaqembu amakhulu enhla ne-Afrika. Ngibheke ukuthola umdlalo ngaphambi kokuthi sidlale neNorway (ngoJanuwari 8) nangemuva kwalo mdlalo,” kusho i-Igesund.Amalungiselelo eBafana aqala ngomdlalo weNelson Mandela Challenge ngoNovemba 14, eFNB Stadium. Uma ziphumelela izingxoxo umdlalo olandelayo kuvela ukuthi ungaba ngoDisemba 23 kuthi owokugcina ube ngoJanuwari 13.U-Igesund uthe alikho iqoqo okufanele lithathwe njengelilula.“ICape Verde iyincwadi evaliwe kithina njengamanje kodwa engikwaziyo ngayo wukuthi ikhiphe iCameroon emidlalweni yokuhlunga. Lokho kukubeka ngokusobala ukuthi ayisilona iqembu elibhedayo.“Yebo, sifuna ukunqoba umdlalo wethu wokuqala futhi ngendlela egculisayo. Kuzoshaya isikhathi sokuqala kwemidlalo sesinalo lonke ulwazi ngabo,” kusho lo mqeqeshi obekelwe umbandela wokufaka iBafana okungenani kuma-semi final e-Afcon.Njengoba amaqembu eseqhathiwe uthe sekuyisikhathi sokusebenza futhi nabadlali abalimele akekho ozomane angene nje eqenjini lakhe, okumele alindeleke ukuthi alimemezele ngoJanuwari 9.Lokhu ukucacise ngesikhathi ebuzwa ngabadlali abalimele abafana noBenni McCarthy noThulani Serero. Abanye abalimele beBafana, uKatlego Mphela, Morgan Gould noSiboniso Gaxa.“Ukululama akusho ukuthi uzobuyela eqenjini, kufanele badlale ngendlela egculisayo emaqenjini abo. Sisekhona isikhathi sokuthi abadlali baziveze ukuthi bangabizelwa kwelesizwe.”Uthe uzoqhubeka nokubabheka ukuthi baqhuba kanjani njengoba ekhulumile noMphela (ngoLwesithathu) ongakaze adlale kule sizini ebanjwe yikhona ukulimala.IMIDLALO YAMAQOQO YE-AFCONGROUP ASouth Africa, Angola, Morocco, Cape Verde IslandsJan 19: South Africa v Cape Verde Islands (eGauteng, 6pm); Angola v Morocco (eGauteng, 9pm)Jan 23 : South Africa v Angola (eThekwini, 5pm); Morocco v Cape Verde Islands (Durban, 8pm)Jan 27: Morocco v South Africa (eThekwini, 7pm); Cape Verde Islands v Angola (Port Elizabeth, 7pm)GROUP BGhana, Mali, Niger, Democratic Republic of CongoJan 20: Ghana v DR Congo (Port Elizabeth, 5pm); Mali v Niger (Port Elizabeth, 9pm)Jan 24: Ghana v Mali (Port Elizabeth, 5pm); Niger v DR Congo (Port Elizabeth, 8pm)Jan 28: Niger v Ghana (Port Elizabeth, 7pm); Mali v DR Congo (eThekwini, 7pm)GROUP CZambia, Nigeria, Burkina Faso, EthiopiaJan 21: Zambia v Ethiopia (Nelspruit, 5pm); Nigeria v Burkina Faso (Nelspruit, 8pm)Jan 25: Zambia v Nigeria (Nelspruit, 5pm); Burkina Faso v Ethiopia (Nelspruit, 8pm)Jan 29: Burkina Faso v Zambia (Nelspruit, 7pm); Nigeria v Ethiopia (Rustenburg, 7pm)GROUP DIvory Coast, Tunisia, Algeria, TogoJan 22: Ivory Coast v Togo (Rustenburg, 5pm); Tunisia v Algeria (Rustenburg, 8pm)Jan 26: Ivory Coast v Tunisia (Rustenburg, 5pm); Algeria v Togo (Rustenburg, 8pm)Jan 30: Algeria v Ivory Coast (Rustenburg, 7pm); Tunisia v Togo (Nelspruit, 7pm)Quarter-finalsFeb 2 – eThekwini: Winner Group A v Runner-up Group B, 8.30pm; ePort Elizabeth: Winner Group B v Runner-up Group A, 5pmFeb 2 – eNelspruit: Winner Group C v Runner-up Group D, 8.30pm; eRustenburg: Winner Group D v Runner-up Group C, 5pmSemi-finalsFeb 6 – eThekwini: Winner Durban v Winner Rustenburg, 5pm; eNelspruit: Winner Nelspruit v Winner Port Elizabeth , 8.30pmThird place play-offFeb 9 – ePort Elizabeth, 8pmFinalFeb 10 – eGoli, 8pm
title: U-Igesund ubona ingozi kwiCape Verde

text:
IZINYUNYANA zabasebenzi kumele zinqande ukuphela kwemisebenzi futhi zivikele konke okwazuzwa yintando yeningi ngenhloso yokuhlonipha isishoshovu somzabalazo futhi esasingumholi we-ANC, uMnuz Harry Gwala. Lamazwi ashiwo nguNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal futhi obuye abe ngusihlalo we-ANC kulesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala,  ngoLwesine ngesikhathi kugujwa ukuphela kweminyaka engu100 kwazalwa leli qhawe elalaziwa ngeBhubesi laseMidlands. Inkulumo mpikiswano beyibanjelwe ekhasini likaFacebook likaZikalala ngenhloso yokuhlonipha imithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe okudalwe ukubheduka kweCorona kuleli."Namhlanje njengoba izwe lethu libhekene nenhlekelele yokuphela kwemisebenzi nokukhahlamezeka komnotho, sibheka ubumbano lwabasebenzi ukuba lusukume luvikele okwazuzwa ngabasebenzi futhi lulwe ukuvikela imisebenzi," kusho uZikalala. Uthe izinhlangano ebezibambe iqhaza kule nkulumompikiswano bekuyi-EFF, African Transformation Movement (ATM) neMinority. UZikalala uchaze uGwala njengendoda eyayithembekile, ineqiniso futhi eyacija intsha ngomqondo wobudlelandawonye. Uthe uGwala, owayenguphumasilwe yize ayekhubazekile ezingalweni, wabamba elikhulu iqhaza ekwakhiweni ubumbano lwabasebenzi kuleli nesisekelo somthetho obavikelayo.UGwala, owayenguthisha futhi owadlula emhlabeni ngoJuni 1995, ubezoba neminyaka eyikhulu ngoJulayi 30.Ngokusho komlando ogciniwe, emuva kokuphuthula imfundo yakhe e-Adams College eThekwini, njengothisha, uGwala wafundisa abaholi abaningi okubalwa kubo owayengunobhala-jikelele weSACP, uMnuz Moses Mabhida. UGwala waboshwa maqede wayogqunywa esiqhingini saseRobben Island iminyaka ayisishiyagalombili ngaphambi kokuvalelwa kwakhe eMgungundlovu ukuba angagcaluzi. "Kuleli khulu nyaka lokuzalwa kwakhe, kufanele siqinise ubumbano lwezinkumbi zabantu ezicindezelwe emhlabeni wethu kodwa kufanele futhi sihlanganise abasebenzi, okuyibo asebekhahlamezwe yizingqinamba eziningi ezadalwa wubandlululo nezinselelo zamanje ezidalwe ukubheduka kweCovid-19," kusho uZikalala. Uthe kungenxa kaGwala njengoba lelizwe lingcono kanje uma liqhathaniswa neminyaka engaphambi kuka1994. Ube esephonsela inselelo umphakathi wakuleli ukuba uphikisane nemizamo yokucisha amagalelo oGwala emlandweni.*Buka uMnuz Mbulelo Baloyi ekuthatha ekubeka ngoGwalaPauseMuteLoaded: 100.00%Remaining Time -0:34Picture-in-Picture
EmbedFullscreen
title: UZikalala uthi umphakathi awunqande ukushabalaliswa kwamagalelo kaGwala emlandweni

text: ISIHLABANI somdlali waseNingizimu Afrika, uDaine Klate, sithi besingeke siliyeke ithuba lokubuyela “ekhaya” uma selivelile. UKlate (33) ungumdlali osenqobe izicoco eziningi zeligi kwiPremier Soccer League ekwenza lokho namaqembu ahlukene. Udle isicoco se-Absa Premiership neSuperSport United kathathu, Orlando Pirates kabili, nesisodwa neBidvest Wits ebesigijima kuyona ngesizini edlule njengoba ezodlala kwiChippa United.IChili Boys ezinze ePort Elizabeth ifana neqembu lasekhaya njengoba lo mdlali edabuka kuleli dolobha. Walifulathela esengumfanyana eyofuna amadlelo aluhlaza eGoli. Udlale kwiSchool of Excellence ngaphambi kokujoyina iqembu lenkululisa le-United.“Eminyakeni eyisithupha edlule bengingakaze ngicabange ukuthi ngingaqedelela ukudlala kwami ibhola ekhaya. Kodwa kuthe uma ithuba livela ngabona kungcono ukuthi ngilibambe okungenza ngijabule kakhulu,” kusho lo mdlali oyibamba kwesokunxele esiswini ngesikhathi ekhuluma kuMhlobo Wenene FM.IChippa ezobe iqeqeshwa uDan Malesela ngesizini ezayo ayigcinanga ngoKlate ukusika. Imemezele noThabo Nthethe obeyibamba kwiMamelodi Sundowns noJabulani Shongwe oke wadlala kwiWits ngaphambi kokuthi aye kwiLamontville Golden Arrows ngesizini edlule. Bangu-15 abadllali abethulwe iChili Boys ngoLwesithathu.UMasilela uthe uzimisele ngokuzoqedela umsebenzi awushiya ngesikhathi exoshwa ngesizini edlule. “Kwesinye isikhathi kunobudlelwano ongeke ubuhlukanise. Ngeke ngenze izethembiso eziningi zangesizini ezayo kodwa sizozama okusemandleni. Singajabula uma singadlala ngaphandle kwelakuleli bese sinqoba nesicoco,” ucashunwe kanje uMalisela ekhasini leChippa kwiTwitter.
title: UKlate ujabule ngethuba lukubuyela ekhaya

text: UMENGAMELI Jacob Zuma uzokwethula inkulumo yakhe yesizwe ngoFebhuwari futhi uzoqhubeka nokusebenza njengokujwayelekile yize kunezingxoxo eziqhubekayo phakathi kwakhe nobuholi obuphezulu be-ANC.Lezi zindaba zivezwe nguNobhala Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule obekhuluma ne-Independent Media izolo.UMagashule uthe uZuma uzoqhubeka nomsebenzi wakhe wokwengamela iNingizimu Afrika fuhi azikho izinhlelo zokumphazamisa kulokho.Yize eqale wangathanda ukukhuluma ngalolu daba kodwa ugcine ephendulile uma intatheli ye-Independent Media imxina ngalo mbuzo. Ebuzwa ukuthi angaphawula athini ngezinsolo zokuthi ngeke awenze kahle umsebenzi wokuba nguNobhalala we-ANC nokuxazulula izinkinga zaseFree State naKwaZulu-Natal.Uthe unguNobhala we-ANC futhi izinhlaka ze-ANC azikaze zikhale ngomsebenzi wakhe ngakho ngeke abaphendule abantu abehleba ngaye. “Njengamanje sisebenzela ubunye be-ANC futhi sizimisele ukuvuselela inhlangano nazo zonke izinhlaka,” kusho uMagashule. Ngesonto elidlule uMengameli we-ANC uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa uthe akufanele ahlanjalazwe uZuma futhi uhlelo lokuphuma kwakhe esikhundleni kufanele luphathwe ngobunono hhayi budlabha njengoba kwenziwa kuMnuz Thabo Mbeki.Waveza ukuthi azikho izizinda ezimbili zombuso kodwa yi-ANC ebusayo futhi bazoqhubeka nokuxoxisana noZuma ngezinhlelo zokuthi aphume kahle esikhundleni.
title: UZuma uyena ozokwethula iSona-Ace Magashule

text: Lesi sifo kasihlaselanga ngokugula kuphela kodwa senze impilo yabantu yama nse! Bavaleleka emakhaya, kwawa izinkampani, kwanqanyulwa imiholo, inqwaba yaphelelwa yimisebenzi. Lokhu kwenze ingxenye enkulu yabantu yagula emiphefumulweni.Ongoti abelapha ezomphefumulo, bathi abantu abavele benezinkinga eziphathelene nomqondo bazodonsa kanzima ngokweqile ngalesi sikhathi.Ungoti wezengqondo, uDkt Lungisani Mthiyane, oyisikhulu esiphezulu eDurban & Coastal Mental Health eWestville, uthe mkhulu umthamo wabantu ababhekene negcindezi.UMthiyane uthe izinkinga zeCovid-19 ziholele ekutheni babe nomthamo omkhulu wabantu abelashwa ngokomqondo, nezinye izifo ezihlukene kanjalo nabantu ebekade bengenazo abazithole sebebhekene nezinkinga phezu kwezinye.“Lesi yisikhathi esinzima kakhulu kubantu ababhekene nezifo zengqondo, bangaphazamiseka kakhulu ngenxa yezinkinga zasemsebenzini, zasekhaya, izinkinga zemali novalo ngeCovid-19.“Isibalo siphezulu kakhulu njengamanje kodwa sinezindlela zokubalekelela nemindeni yabo ngoba izifo ezifana ne-bipolar ne-schizophrenia zivele zivuke noma yinini. Ongoti bezengqondo nosonhlalakahle babhekene nomsebenzi omkhulu njengamanje kodwa kunezindlela esizilungiselele ngazo ukubhekana nokwanda kwabantu,” kusho uMthiyane.Eqhuba uthe imindeni eminingi nayo ibhekana nenkinga yokuthi ingakwazi ukuhlukanisa uma umuntu eqalwa wukugula.Kwabanye kuthi noma sebebona kodwa bangakwazi ukulandela izindlela ezingasiza umuntu ogulayo ukuze nomndeni ukwazi ukuphila ngendlela efanele.Lokhu uthe kuba nomthelela ekutheni umuntu angalulami ngendlela noma asheshe asizakale ngokushesha ikakhulu uma engalutholi usizo ehleli ekhaya.“Zonke izifo zengqondo zidinga isikhathi esanele sokuthi umuntu elulekwe ngokwanele ngokomqondo ngaphambi kokuthi kufikwe kwezinye izigaba zokwelashwa. Into ebaluleke kakhulu nesiyiqikelelayo wukuthi umndeni ufundiswe ngohlobo lwesifo umuntu abhekene naso nendlela zokuphila naye.“Engingakukhuthaza wukuthi abantu baphumele obala ukuze kube lula ukuthi sibasize,”kusho uMthiyane.* Uma kukhona onenkinga nofisa ukumtholela usizo noma nawe uqala ukubona izimpawu ungabathinta abeDurban & Coastal Mental Health ku: 031 207 2717 bakuthumelele osonhlalakahle abazokusiza.
