title: Izinto ongazenza ukusiza oqalwa yile nkinga

text: Umbuzo: Ngagana indoda engishiya ngeminyaka ewu-22 ubudala kanti mina manje ngineminyaka ewu-34. Sesineminyaka emihlanu sishadile kodwa asitholi bantwana. Noma yena esola ukuthi imina onenkinga, angizange ngimtshele ukuthi ngake ngakhulelwa ingane yenye indoda engangithandana nayo kudala kodwa ngasikhipha isisu. Angikaze ngimtshele ngempilo yami yaphambilini ngoba angifuni angahlulele. Sekunzima ukuphumela obala manje emva kweminyaka engaka sishadile. Ungidlisa amaphilisi azongisiza ngikhulelwe ngokushesha, futhi usefaka nengcindezi yenhlobo yokudla okufanele ngiyidle ukungisiza. Angazi impela ukuthi ngenzenjani, ngoba ngiyazi mina ukuthi anginankinga nhlobo nje. Naye uyaphika ukuthi unenkinga kodwa akafuni ukuthi siye kodokotela.Senzenjani?Mbali, Adams MissionIMPENDULO: Kunzima kakhulu ukungabatholi abantwana uma nishadile. Kodwa ngeke nazi ukuthi ubani ongabatholi ngaphandle kokuthi nibonane nodokotela. Nokukhulelwa kwakho phambilini akusho ukuthi ungaba nenkinga manje. Odokotela kuphela abangakuqinisekisa lokho. Ukubona udokotela kuzokwenza nazi ukuthi nibhekane nani khona nizokwazi ukulwa nento eniyaziyo nobabili.Umbuzo: Sineminyaka emine sashada nonkosikazi wami. Asizange sikhulume ngohlobo lomshado esizowushada ngaphambi komshado. Unkosikazi wami wangena kulo mshado enganalutho manje ayikho into angenayo. Okungiphatha kabi manje ukuthi usekhombise ukungathembeki kumina izikhathi eziningi kodwa ngiyasaba ukumshiya ngoba uzothola zonke izimali zami ayozidla nalabo bhuti athandana nabo. Ngifuna aphume aphele empilweni yami kodwa angazi kuzokwenzakalani ezimalini zami. Angifuni athole lutho.Igama ligodliwe, eMondloImpendulo:Kubalulekile ukuvumelana ngaphambi kokuthi nishade ngenhlobo yomshado enifuna ukuba nawo. Ngeshwa uma ningakwenzi lokho kuthathwa ngokuthi nifuna lo mshado ohlanganisa amafa. Uma usamthanda unkosikazi wakho zamani ukubonana nabeluleki bezemishado ukuze banisize ukulungisa umshado wenu. Uma senivumelene ngokuthi anisathandi ukuba ndawonye kungcono ubonane nommeli wakho ukuze akuchushise kahle ngendlela ekumele uyithathe ukuze ungakhali ngaphansi ngalo mshado wenu.Umbuzo: Sesinonyaka sihlala ndawonye nesoka lami. Angiganile. Ngiyamthanda kakhulu kodwa ukungabinamsenzi kwakhe sekuqala ukudala inkinga ebudlelwaneni bethu. Ngazi ukuthi indoda kufanele ivuke ekuseni iyosebenza. Kanti yena cha uhlala endlini alinde mina ngibuye nesinkwa ntambama. Lokhu sekuqala ukungenelela ngisho ekamelweni. Ngiyahluleka ukuthatha indawo yami yokuba unkosikazi endodeni engabonisi izimpawu zokuba indoda ekhaya.Khumbuzile, eMadadeniImpendulo: Awuchazanga noma indoda yakho iyawuzama umsebenzi kodwa iwona ongatholakali. Zama nawe ukumsiza lapho ongamsiza khona ukuze athole umsebenzi. Uma ungakaze ulukhulume lolu daba naye, yiso lesi isikhathi sokwenza njalo. Kubalulekile ukuthi azi ukuthi iyakukhathaza le ndlela okwenzeka ngayo. Njengendoda kumele avuke azithathe.Umbuzo: Sineminyaka ewu-20 sithandana nomuntu wami. Sewakhokha ngisho ilobolo waze wembesa. Kusele umshado omkhulu nje kuphela. Ngoba ngibona isimo sethu sezimali ngike ngamcela ukuthi siye kobhala enkantolo. Wakhombisa ukungasithokozeli lesi sinqumo sami kwaze kwagcina sekukhona ukungazwani phakathi kwethu. Ngibona ukuthi yena uzitshela ukuthi mina ngibona ukuthi akanayo imali yokungishada kanti mina bengizama ukumsiza. Manje okungixakayo ukuthi akasayiphathi nhlobo manje eyokushada. Asisesihle ngempela isimo phakathi kwethu kodwa manje akekho ofuna ukuphumela obala ngekusasa lethu. Ngenzenjani? Sengicabanga ngisho nokuphumela ngaphandle ngoba angiyazi into engisayihlalele kuleli khaya.Igama ligodliwe, eThekwiniImpendulo: Izinto zoniwa wumlomo ziphinde zilungiswe nguwo. Kungenzeka ngempela ukuthi isoka lakho alikuqondanga kahle ukuthi uchazani ngendaba yokushada enkantolo. Okungenzeka ukuthi naye uzitshela ukuthi ukuyoshada enkantolo kuzokwehlisa isithunzi sakhe njengendoda. Umshado omkhulu ningabuye niwenze uma iphakethe livuma. Yixoxeni le ndaba ningahlukaniswa yinto ebingaxazululeka.Facebook: Mo & PhindiInstagram: Mo & PhindiEmail: [email protected]
title: EZOTHANDO: Kunzima nokujabula ekamelweni ngenxa yendoda engasebenzi

text: INKAMPANI eyenzela abaculi umsebenzi wokukhangisa, ikhala ngonkosikazi wesilomo somculo wokholo ongasekho okuthiwa sekuphele iminyaka engafuni ukubakhokhela imali yabo.Abanikazi be-Art.us Creations eseSmart Exchange, eThekwini bakhala ngo-Ayanda Ncwane weNcwane Communications abathi ubabambisa utalagu ngesikweletu sika-R6 800.USabelo Mchunu we-Art.us Creations uthi ngoNovemba ngo-2015 benzela iNcwane Communications amaBanner awu-20, ngayodwa ngaleso sikhathi yayibiza uR250 nokwenza abenguR5 000 esewonke. Abagcinanga lapho bahamba bewanameka ezigxotsheni ngesivumelwano sika-R90 lilodwa nokwenza kube u-R1 800 bese le mali ibanguR6 800 isiyonke. UMchunu uthi emva kokwenza lo msebenzi kwasekufanele bakhokhelwe u-Ayanda wangena ezintangeni.“Sengikhulume naye kaningi ngimcela ukuthi akhokhe le mali ngoba sesawenza umsebenzi. Okokuqala wavika ngokuthi ubengazi ukuthi asikakhokhelwa wangicela ukuthi ngimnikeze imininingwane yebhange lethu.Ngaphinde ngakwenza ngethemba lokuthi uzokhokha kodwa lutho,” kusho uMchunu.Ethintwa u-Ayanda uvumile ukuthi unolwazi mayelana nalesi sikweletu, wathi kodwa wacela ubufakazi bokuthi ngabe inkampani ibakweleta ngempela yini. Lobu bufakazi uthi bebungakaze bufike ezandleni zakhe nokwenza angayikhiphi le mali.
title: U-Ayanda Ncwane usolwa yinkampani ngesikweletu

text: ZIZOKWAZISWA izitshudeni zase-UNISA ngokuqhubekayo mayelana nokuqala konyaka wokufunda kulesi sikhungo semfundo ephakeme kulo nyakaLokhu kuvele esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba yile inyuvesi kulandela ukudideka nokukhathazeka kwezitshudeni mayelana nokuqala kokufunda okubonakala kubhalwe nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Okhulumela i-UNISA kuzwelonke, uMnuz Edgar Rathelele, uthe inyuvesi iyakuqonda ukukhathazeka kwezitshudeni yingakho ixhumana nezinhlaka ezithintekayo okubalwa kuzo nabamele izitshudeni ukuqhamuka nesinqumo esifanele.Uthe zikhona izinqumo esezithathiwe njengokuguqula ikhalenda yonyaka wokufunda ukuze limelane nokudingekayo ukuqinisekisa ukuhamba kahle kohlelo lokufunda nokufundisa njengoba izwe lisabhekene nobhubhane i-Covid 19.“Isinqumo sokuguqula ikhalenda besibaluleke kakhulu ukuze kwamukelwe abafundi baka-matric abasalinde imiphumela yabo kanjalo nabazofundiswa yisikhwama uNSFAS okulindeleke ukuthi siqale ukukhokhela izitshudeni ngo-Ephreli,” kusho uRathelele.Uthe zingu-250 000 izitshudeni ezintsha okulindeleke ukuthi zamukelwe kule nyuvesi. Uthe lena akusiyo inselelo ebhekene ne-UNISA kuphela kodwa nomkhakha wonke wokufunda.Uthe ngenxa yalezi zinselelo, izitshudeni zizobhalisela ihlandla lokuqala nelesibili lezinyanga eziyisithupha ngoMashi 12 kanye kanye.“Lesi sinqumo sokuhlanganiswa kokubhalisela lawa mahlandla kuhloswe ngakho ukuthi kongeke isikhathi esilahleka uma kubhaliselwa ihlandla lesibili ngoJulayi  kuphinde kwandiswe nesikhathi sokufunda esesivele sesilahlekile njengoba unyaka wokufunda uzoqala ngoMashi,” kuqhuba uRathelele.Uthe izitshudeni obekulindeke ukuthi ziqede iziqu zazo ngehlandla lokuqala ngeke ziphazamiseke ngenxa yalesi sinqumo kodwa kuzokwenziwa isiqiniseko sokuthi ziziphothula ngendlela efanele.Uveze ukuthi ngeke izitshudeni ziphoqwe ukuthi zikhokhele amahlandla kanye kanye, kodwa kuzokhokhwa ngendlela ejwayelekile.Phambilini uNgqongqoshe woMnyango weMfundo ePhakeme, uDkt Blade Nzimande, umemezele ukuthi i-UNISA izonciphisa isibalo sezitshudeni ezintsha ngo-20 000 ezizomukelwa kulesi sikhungo ngenxa yokuthi yeqa ngalesi sibalo kwesidingekayo nyakenye. URathelele uthe zingu- 376 000 izitshudeni okulindeleke ukuthi zamukelwe ezweni lonke..
title: I-UNISA iyakuqonda ukukhathazeka kwezitshudeni

text: ANGASE aze aphinde abonakale enkundleni ngenyanga yokugcina yale sizini umdlali ofike kwiLamontville Golden Arrows kwezwakala, uDanny Phiri waseZimbabwe.Ngokusho komqeqeshi wakhe, uClinton Larsen, uPhiri, okuthe angalimala zaqala zabheda izinto kwi-Arrows, udabuke umsipha ohlanganisa isihluzu nesithende.Lokhu kwenzeke ngoSepthemba eziqeqesha neqembu lakhe Abafana Bes’thende. Kusukela ngaleso sikhathi i-Arrows idonsa kanzima kweyeligi. Isidlale imidlalo ewu-11 ngaphandle kwewini.Iwini ize yayithola ngeSonto ishaya iSuperSport United ngo 1-0 KwaMashu. Nokuthi ize yavela yingoba sesivaliwe isikhala sikaPhiri odlale ewu-24 yeligi ngesizini edlule obekungeyokuqala kuyena (eThekwini) esuka kwiChicken Inn yaseZimbabwe.Ngesikhathi esanda kulimala uPhiri uthe unethemba lokuqala unyaka esekwazi ukulubeka phansi unyawo okuyinto esiyenzeka manje. Obekumkhalisa kakhulu wukuthi uzophazamiseka naseqenjini lesizwe athe uyazizwa ukuthi usengena khaxa kulo.“Okusijabulisa kakhulu wukuthi useyalubeka phansi unyawo. Useqalile nokuzama izinto ezincane kodwa asikayicabangi indaba yokuthi uyabuya enkundleni. Kungenzeka simbone mhlawumbe emidlalweni eyisithupha yokugcina yeligi kodwa nakhona lapho akukho okuphathekayo. Sizwa ngodokotela naye umdlali, bese sihlalela ethembeni” usho kanje uClinton Larsen ngeSonto.I-Arrows ivale isikhala sikaPhiri ngoSandile Zuke olaxaze i-Ajax Cape Town waqoma iqembu langakubo esuka kwiChippa United. UZuke, odabuka KwaZulu-Natal, uke wadlala kwiKaizer Chiefs nakwiMpumalanga Black Aces njengoba echayise i-Ajax ekugcineni wajoyina ezikaLarsen.“Sisikile impela kuZuke. Kuningi azosinika khona ebesingenakho. Kuyiqinisio ukuthi uZuke ufika nje yingoba kucacile ukuthi indawo yamaphakathi nenkundla iyinkinga. Ngalokhu angisho ukuthi uNkanyiso (Cele) ubengawenzi kahle umsebenzi njengoba kulimele uPhiri kodwa usezoba nomfutho omkhulu wokuqhubeka nalokhu akwenzayo,” kusho uLarsen.Omunye umdlali weqembu laKwaZulu-Natal obe nebhadi wafika elimele uBokang Tlhone weMaritzburg United osuka kwiBidvest Wits. NgokukaFadlu Davids, akukubi kangako kodwa lokhu kulimala ufike nakho esuka kwiWits.
title: Sihlalele ethembeni ngoPhiri: Larsen

text: IBHUQUZA ekhaya ingwazi ye-Orlando Pirates, uTebogo “Tebza” Moloi, osehlale isikhathi eside kweZimnyama njengephini labaqeqeshi abahlukahlukene.Ngesizini edlule uMoloi nguyena obelekelela u-Eric Tinkler ogcine ekhonjwe indlela emuva kokuhluleka wukuwina emidlalweni emibili yamanqamu.Umqeqeshi omusha weBucs, uMuhsin Ertugral, umemezele uBradley Carnell noZipho Dlangalala njengamaphini akhe. Lokhu kushiye imibuzo ngekusasa likaMoloi.Kuthintwa uFloyd Mbele, oyisikhulu esiphezulu kuBucs, ecacise ngekusasa likaMoloi uvele wakubeka kwacaca ukuthi njengamanje usekhaya.“Indlela abaqeqeshi abasebenza ngayo iyahluka kakhulu. Abanye abaqeqeshi bakholelwa ekutheni kufanele bafike nabantu babo kanti abanye abanankinga nokusebenza nabaqeqeshi abasuke bebafice eqenjini. UMuhsin ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi ufuna ukuzikhethela yena abantu azosebenza nabo. Njengamanje indaba yekusasa likaTebogo sisabhunga ngayo. Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi okwamanje usesekhaya. Uma sesixazulule yonke into sizobe sesithatha isinqumo ngekusasa lakhe,” kusho uMbele.UMoloi owayeyibamba kweZimnyama eminyakeni edlule usesebenze ngaphansi kwenqwaba yabaqeqeshi kweZimnyama. Ubekhona iqembu lisacijwa nguRoger de Sa, Tinkler, Vladimir Vermezovic, Julio Leal, Augusto Palacios noRuud Krol. KuPirates ubesefana nedlozi yize abanye bebebuye bakhale ngokuthi unomkhuba wokuxova isikimu.UMoloi kuphele isizini edlule engasahlali ebhentshini lePirates. Isizathu esakhishwa yileli qembu ngokungabonakali kukaMoloi ebhentshini leZimnyama sathi yingoba unezinkinga zomndeni ezidinga ukuthi abhekane nazo ngaphandle kokuphazanyiswa umsebenzi.U-Ertugral usefike wenza inqwaba yezinguquko kuPirates. Uxoshe inqwaba yabadlali waphinde wasayinisa nenqwaba. Phakathi kwabadlali abakhombe indlela kukhona oLehlohonolo “Major” Majoro, Sifiso “Nsunda” Myeni, Rooi Mahamutsa noPhilani “Philo” Zikalala.Khonamanjalo, iPirates inqobe umdlalo weMaize Cup ihlula iPlatinum Stars ngo 3-1 sekukhahlelwa amaphenathi. Umdlalo ubuphele ngo 0-0. Kulo mdlalo u-Ertugral ubebeke uFelipe Ovono emapalini osusiwe kwabachithwayo.Kweminye imidlalo yokuzicija yeBucs bekuvimbe uBrighton Mhlongo noJackson Mabokgwane. Lokhu kwenze kungacaci ukuthi yimuphi unozinti azombophela uma sekuqala imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership abayivula neLamontville Golden Arrows ngo-Agasti 24 e-Orlando Stadium eSoweto.
title: Imibuzo ngekusasa likaMoloi

text: ZISEBENZA zijeqeza izikhulu zoMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal njengoba kunezikhulu ezinikwe izincwadi zokuthi zichaze ukuthi kungani kungamele zimiswe emsebenzini ngezinto ezithinta ukukhishwa kwamathenda.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi ezimbili zazo sezizitholile lezi zincwadi, ezinye kuthiwa zigcwele izinkalo zibalekela ukungazitholi lezi zincwadi.Umthombo weSolezwe emnyangweni, ocele ukungavezwa ngoba ungaxoshwa njengoba isimo sishube kanje, uthe inhlalo ayiyinhle ngoba lezi zikhulu zitshengise ukungahambisani nombono othile wokuthi kukhishwe ithenda ethile.Uthe ngemuva kokungakwenzi lokhu zibe sezinikwa izincwadi zokuthi kumele zichaze ukuthi kungani kungamele zixoshwe.“Uzokhumbula ukuthi kwaxoshwa umphathi wezimali, esinye sezikhulu eziphezulu saxoshwa kuzoba uKhisimusi. Ezikhaleni eziphezulu abantu babambile, abekho abaqashwe ngokugcwele,” kusho umthombo.Uthe lezi zikhulu zimiswa nje ekubeni kunomyalelo owakhishwa yi-ANC wokuthi kumiswe ukukhishwa kwamathenda kuze kudlule ukhetho ngoMeyi.“Kukhona abafuna ukushiya beqashe abantu abathile, yingakho izinto zinje. Abantu basebenza ngokwesaba manje, bayajeqeza ngoba abazi bazomiswa noma baxoshwe nini,” kuqhuba umthombo.UMengameli weNatu, uMnuz Allen Thompson, uthe kumele kugxilwe ezintweni ezibalulekile njengokuthi kuqashwe onogada, kunikwe izikole imali ezinguSection 21, kuqashwe abahlanza izikole nomabhalane kodwa emnyangweni kukhona abamatasa nezindaba zamathenda.Uthe bafuna uNdunankulu angenelele ngoba ziningi izikhulu ezihlale zimiswa kulo mnyango.“Uzinzo alukho, akukwazi ukuthi kungamiswa izikhulu ezingaka. Abantu bamiselwa izinto ezithinta amathenda nokuthi ubani ozothola muphi umsebenzi nayiphi imali,” kusho uThompson.Uthe bazofuna umhlangano noNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane mayelana nokumiswa umlibe kwezikhulu.UNobhala weSadtu eKZN, uNksz Nomarashiya Caluza, uthe sekuzodingeka ukuthi umnyango uziphenye ngokuthi ngabe bukhona yini ubuqiniso ekumisweni kwabantu.“Kumele umnyango uziphenye ukuthi ngabe akhona kwawona yini la macala abantu abamiselwa wona emnyangweni,” kusho uNksz Caluza.UMnuz Kwazi Mthethwa, okhulumela uDlungwane, uthe ubuholi obukhona buyaziwa ngokuphatha ngendlela evulelekile nengenayo inkohlakalo.Uthe izinto ezithinta umsebenzi womnyango yizinto abajwayele ukungazikhulumi esidlangalaleni ngoba kusuke kuyizinto zangaphakathi.“Namanje lolu daba silwenza ngokwezinhlelo zangaphakathi njengoba sihlale senza ezintweni ezithinta abasebenzi bethu,” kusho uMthethwa.
title: Kushubile kowezemfundo eKZN

text: UYAVEVA yintukuthelo umphakathi waseNkonkotha, eDumbe, ngomlimi omsola ngokubulala izimbuzi zawo ezingaphezulu kuka-40 ngokuzidlisa ushevu ngoLwesihlanu.Imindeni ethintekayo ifuna uMnuz Jack Odendaal emsolayo, azikhokhe zonke izimbuzi.UMnuz Mfana Zwane uthe kuduma amakhanda ngenxa yokuhlukumezeka befelwa yimfuyo abebeyithola iyizigingane egcekeni nasesibayeni.“Okubuhlungu wukuthi lo mlisa uqale wasibizela umhlangano wathi asisayine izincwadi zokuthi uma izimbuzi zethu ziqhubeka nokungena epulazini lakhe uzothatha izinyathelo. Sisayinile savuma kodwa ngemuva kwalokho wasitshela ukuthi uzozibulala. Sisamangazwe yilokhu kwafa ezinhlanu, laqhubeka isonto kwalandela ezinye. NgoLwesihlanu isibalo sinyukele kwezingu-47,” kusho uZwane.Uthe iningi lezimbuzi azibalayo ezifile ezikadadewabo, uNkk Musa Dlamini.Uthi izimbuzi zabo zidliswe ngommbila othelwe ushevu obizwa ngeKarati obulala amagciwane.Lesi sehlo sigadle nasemzini wakwaKhumalo obufelwe yizinkomo eziyisikhombisa ngesonto eledlule ebezishaywe wumbani.Umphakathi wakule ndawo awuzange ubambisane kulesi simo njengoba kuthiwa abanye abafuni lendaba ibikwe emaphoyiseni ngoba basaba ukuthi umlimi uzobenzakalisa.UZwane uthe bazifuna zikhokhiwe izimbuzi zabo ngoba * -Odendaal ubathembise kanjalo.Uthe ezinye ezifile amazinyane ancele ushevu konina.Izolo kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela umphakathi ungakalutholi usizo lokugqiba izimbuzi.UZwane ufike emaphoyiseni eyovula icala amtshela ukuthi abathathe isisu sembuzi eyodwa basigcine esiqandisini ukuze kwenziwe ngaso uphenyo kodwa awamnikanga inombolo yecala.* -Odendaal ubengalubambi ucingo kanti nemiyalezo abeyithunyelelwe akayiphendulanga.IMeya yaseDumbe, uMnuz Majuba Mavuso ithe inkulu inkinga abanayo nabalimi abamhlophe ngoba kade bebavimba ukuba bafake ugesi emzini yabantu ngoba bethi unqamula emasimini abo.Okhulumela uMnyango wezoLimo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Phathisa Mfuyo uthe bajube ithimba lososayensi babo ukuba bayohlenga ezinye izimbuzi ngoLwesihlanu kodwa besekonakele ngoba zivele zafa.Uthe okwamanje bazojuba ongoti abazophenya ukuze kucace ukuthi zibulawe yini.OKhulumela aphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uthe amaphoyisa ayaphenya ngenhloso yokwaluleka umshushisi ngokwenzeke ezimbuzini eziqumbe zafa.
title: Bakhala ngomlimi ngezimbuzi ezifile

text: UMNYANGO wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uthathe isinqumo sokuhlonipha indodakazi yomholi we-IFP, uDkt Mangosuthu Buthelezi, ngesikole sikanokusho esakhiwe oLundi.Lesi sikole esiseZondela, oLundi, siphothulwe ngonyaka odlule saqanjwa ngokuthi iPrincess Phumzile Primary School okuyigama lendodakazi endala kaButhelezi, uMntwana uPhumzile Audrey Buthelezi oyilungu le-IFP esiShayamthetho sesiFundazwe, eMgungundlovu.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi uthe lokhu bakwenze ngemuva kokuxhumana nomphakathi wendawo.“SiwuMnyango wezeMfundo sinohlelo lokuletha uguquko ezikoleni ngokuba zakhiwe kabusha ziphinde ziqanjwe kabusha. Lokhu sikwenza kusona sonke isiFundazwe. NasoLundi sixhumane nomphakathi wakhona sabonisana nawo ngaleli gama likaMntwana uPhumzile balamukela,” kusho uMahlambi.UMntwana uPhumzile ethintwa uthe akakwazi ukuphawula ngoba bamatasa eMajuba District noSomlomo wesiShayamthetho, uNkk Lydia Johnson bavakashela izikole.Sekungokwesibili uHulumeni wesiFundazwe oholwa uNdunankulu uWillies Mchunu noMnuz Sihle Zikalala uhlonipha abantu abangekho eqenjini elibusayo.Ngo-2017 uNgqongqoshe wezobuCiko namaSiko, uNkk Bongi Sithole-Moloi wenze indumezulu yomcimbi wokuhlonipha uMntwana wakwaPhindangene ngamagalelo akhe emphakathini nakwezombusazwe.“Ngacela abasebenzi boMnyango wami ukuba balethe amagama abantu esingabahlonipha kodwa babenginika awabaholi be-ANC ngoba bazi ukuthi ngiwuKhongolose. Ngavele ngaqhamuka nelikaMntwana wakwaPhindangene ngathi nali igama engilibonayo bethuka,” kusho uNkk Sithole-Moloi oLundi ngo-2017 .Kulindwe ukuba uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane azosivula ngokusemthethweni.
title: Umnyango uhloniphe uMntwana

text: NONTUTHUKO NGUBANEI NTSHA ye-ANC ikhale ngokungabikhona kwezinhlelo ezibhekene ngqo nokukhuthaza intsha ukuba ivotele le nhlangano okhethweni oluzayo ngonyaka ozayo.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi kuhlangene intsha kucotshelelwana ngolwazi emhlanganweni obizwa nge- Masikhulume Manifesto Forum obuse-AF Wood Community Hall, eMgungundlovu ngoMgqibelo.UMnuz Mbongeni Zuma oyilungu le-ANC uthe izinhlangano eziphikisayo zisebenzisa ithuba lokuheha abantu abasha abazobe beqala ukuvota ngezinhlelo ezahlukene ekubeni iqembu lakhe lisalela emuva.“Njengomuntu omusha, i-ANC kumele isibhekele izindlela zokuheha intsha ezalwe emuva kwenkululeko. Kukhona abantu abasha ababizwa ngamaBorn Free abangazi kakhulu ngomlando nokwenzeka kudala. Abafuna ukukuzwa ukuthi sibaphatheleni uma bevotela i-ANC. Ngicabanga ukuthi kuyosisiza ukuba nezinhlelo ezintsha ezizokwazi ukubaheha futhi kube yizinhlelo ezibhekene nabo ngqo. Amaqembu amaningi aphikisayo ashela amaBorn Free ngezindlela ezihlukene,” kusho uZuma.Lokhu ukusho enanela inkulumo kaNgqongqoshe wezeziMali KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Ina Cronje, obeyisikhulumi sosuku.UNkk Cronje ethula inkulumo yakhe uthe njengoba beya okhethweni kubalulekile ukuba bathembise abantu izinto abazozenza kungabi izinto abazi kahle ukuthi ngeke babe namandla okuzenza.“Kuyiqiniso elingesphikiswe ukuthi kuningi i-ANC esikwenzile ukushintsha impilo yabantu. Namanje sisafuna ukwenza ngcono impilo yabantu. Uma sithi sithembisa abantu izinto kwiManifesto yethu kumele siqikelele ukuthi esibathembisa khona sizokwenza singadlali ngabo. Asingathembisi ukushintsha inyanga ibe bomvu okuyinto engeke sakwazi nhlobo ukuyenza, asifuni ukwenza izifiso ezingeke zifezeke. Sifuna ukwenza izethembiso ezibambekayo nesizozigcina, ezidingwa abantu bakuleli ukwenza isizwe sethu sibe yindawo efanele ukuphila nengcono,” kusho uNkk Cronje.Phakathi kwezinye izinto ebezigqugquzelwa ukuba zibe khona kwiManifesto yangonyaka ozayo yimfundo esezingeni eliphezulu, ukuphepha kwezingane nabesifazane, izigwebo ezinzima kwabenza ubugebengu obuhlobene nokuhlukumeza nezidakamizwa, ukulawula nokuqinisa umthetho kwabangena kuleli ngaphandle kwemvume, ukubuyiselwa komhlaba kubanikazi, ezempilo nokunye okuningi.Izolo lo mkhankaso ubuKwaMaveshe Community Hall, ePort Shepstone nakhona bezolalela ukuthi yiziphi izinto abantu abafuna zifakwe kwiManifesto.
title: Isikhalo entsheni ye-ANC ihlangene

text: UKUNTULA imali yokuhamba kungase kuphazamise ingqayizivele yethuba leqembu lobuciko laseMkhumbane, eChesterville, iProspa Youth Empowerment lokuyomela iNingizimu Afrika e-United Kingdom.Leli qembu bekumele lihambe ngoSepthemba 10 kodwa imali ayikahlangani kahle.Iqembu linamalungu angu-36 kanti lenza ubuciko bokudansa, ukucula nemidlalo yeshashalazi.Umqondisi uMakhosazana Qabathule, uthe njengoba kuyinyanga yamagugu, bathole ithuba lokuyochitha izinsuku ezingu-30 e-United Kingdom lapho beyokhombisa khona ngobuciko baseNingizimu Afrika.“Njengoba siya eLondon sizobe sihamba ngokomculo nangokomdanso lapho sizonandisa khona ezindaweni ezahlukene,” kusho uMakhosazana.Uthe ngeke kuhambe wonke amalungu eqembu kodwa kuzohamba ayisikhombisa.“Bekumele sihambe ngomhlaka-10 kodwa manje sesizohamba ngomhlaka-24. Sicela uxhaso kubantu ngoba abasimemile bazosinikeza imali yokudla nendawo yokuhlala lapho siya khona hhayi imali yokugibela. Silokhu singqongqoza emahhovisi kaMasipala weTheku ukuthi basixhase kodwa siyacela nanoma ubani ongakwazi ukuthi asilekelele,” kusho yena.Iqembu libunjwe ngasekuqaleni konyaka odlule kanti amalungu amathathu alo asephuma e-Europe lapho ayeyothekela khona ulwazi ngomsebenzi iqembu eliwenzayo.Amalungu ayisikhombisa azohamba nguGugulethu Mtshengu, Ntokozo Bengu, Makhosazana, Sizwe Mkhize, Xolani Ndimande, Skhumbuzo Zulu noNondumiso Buthelezi.Imali abayidingayo ilinganiselwa kuR120 000.
title: Idinga usizo intsha yaseThekwini eyomela izwe e-United Kingdom

text:
USUKU lwangoSepthemba 18, 2016 lube muncu kubathandi bekwaito kuwa ingqalabutho uMduduzi ‘Mandoza’ Tshabalala kodwa kumkakhe uMpho obegubha usuku lokuzalwa, buphindwe kaningi ubuhlungu.Ngesikhathi kusanda kuzwakala izindaba zokushona kukaMandoza, uGabriel “Gabi” Le Roux owadidiyela naye ingoma i
Nkalakatha, ukhulume kabanzi ngeqhaza likaMpho empilweni yale ngqalabutho.“Ngiyacela ukuthi ngesikhathi abakuleli bekhalela ukushona kukaMandoza bangakhohlwa wumkakhe uMpho okumele abongwe ngokubekezela kwakhe. UMpho ungomunye wabantu abanesibindi kwengake ngahlangana nabo. Ngiyazi ukuthi namuhla (ngeSonto) wusuku lwakhe lokuzalwa kodwa sekushone umyeni wakhe. Ngicela Mpho uqine njengomuntu engimaziyo noma kunzima kodwa wazi ukuthi siyakuthanda,” kusho uLe RouxUbekhuluma nabezindaba i-eNCA kwiSkype. Uthe uMandoza ubewuthanda umndeni wakhe.“Wangitshela sisendleleni ukuthi umkakhe angabeletha noma yinini. Nangempela kwangena ucingo lumtshela ukuthi usebelethile. Sashaya imoto sibheke esibhedlela, ebanga umsindo indlela yonke ejabulisa okwengane,” echaza.UMpho wahlangana noMandoza ngo-1998 engakadumi. Kwezinye izingxoxo zakhe nabezindaba waveza ukuthi wayengamethembi engabaza nokumqoma. Uthe bathandana begibela amatekisi okuthe uma ethenga imoto yokuqala eyayibuye ibafele endleleni, baqala bakwazi ukuhamba izindawo.Unkosikazi kaMandoza alisali igama lakhe uma kukhulunywa ngomyeni wakhe yize yena ebengeyena usaziwayo. Okwenza angalibaleki wukuthi kuzo zonke izivunguvungu ezibhekane nomyeni wakhe ubelokhu emesekile.Kwaba nemibiko eminingi yezinkinga ebezikhungethe umshado wabo owacishe wabhidlika, uMandoza ecwile ezidakamizweni. Abanye basola yena nangokugula komkakhe owaphathwa wuhlangothi esanda kubeletha indodakazi yabo uKarabo. UMpho wabuye waphumela obala ngokugula kwakhe ohlelweni i
Motswako kuthelevishini ngo-2011 olwashiya ngisho umphathi walo uPenny Lebyane ecwebe izinyembezi. Uvezile nokuthi bacishe badivosa.Nguye futhi owaphumela obala echitha izinsolo zokusabalala kwemibiko ethi uMandoza unegciwane lengculazi.Emasontweni amabili edlule kuvele ukuthi isimo sibi kuMandoza umdlavuza obusungene ebuchosheni wamvala namehlo. Nalapho umkakhe ubesalokhu enethemba lokuthi uzophila.“Angifuni nokucabanga ngokufa kwakhe kodwa ngifuna lo mdlavuza ufe unomphelo. Ngiyazi ukuthi sonke sizohamba kulo mhlaba kodwa asikakafiki esakhe isikhathi, usanecebo kulo mhlaba futhi kunezingane okumele sizikhulise,” kusho uMpho.UMpho usho lokhu emuva kokuba uMandoza ebonakale okokugcina kubalandeli bakhe e-Orlando Stadium eGoli, umkakhe eseduze kwakhe embambile.UMnuz Lebogang Mphuthi, obekhulumela umndeni wakwaMpho esithangamini nabezindaba izolo, uthe kusinda kwehlela kuyena selokhu kushone umyeni wakhe.UTokollo, oyindodana endala kaMandoza, uthembise ukufeza izifiso zikayise zokunakelela uMpho nezingane zakhe.
title: Umeseke kwaze kwaba sekugcineni uMandoza

text: SEKUJUTSHWE ithimba lochwepheshe elizophenya ngembangela yomlilo ongqongqise izimoto zomkhandlu kaMasipala waseNdwedwe izolo ekuseni.IMeya yaseNdwedwe uMnuz Nkosinathi Chili ithe bawuqale kabi unyaka izolo bevuswa ngezindaba ezimbi zokusha kwezimoto zomkhandlu ezishiswe wumlilo engakaziwa imbangela yawo.“Ukucekelwa phansi kwalezi zimoto kuzothikameza ukuhlinzekwa kwabantu ngezidingongqangi ngoba ziyadingeka ukufinyelela kubantu abadinga usizo.“Sijube ithimba lochwepheshe elizophenyisisa futhi licubungulisise konke okuqoshwe amakhamera. Uma kukhona isandla semfene, kunomuntu okutholakala ukuthi nguyena othungele ngomlilo lezi zimoto, kuyofanele ukuthi ingalo yomthetho ithathe indawo yawo,” kusho uChili.Uthe amaphaphu phansi kubantu baseNdwedwe ngoba isimo singaphansi kwezandla ezifanele.“Asikhombi muntu ngenjumbane kodwa wuphenyo oluzocacisa ngokwenzekile. Abantu baseNdwedwe abangakhathazeki.“Besisathi sidonsa umoya eNdwedwe ngemuva kwezigameko ezimbi ezimbili okungesokudilika kwentaba nesesiphepho esikhahlameze imizi engu-61 njengoba sekuthungeleka ngomlilo izimoto zomkhandlu,” kusho uChili.IMOTO kaMasipala waseNdwedwe ehangulwe umlilo obusha ubuhanguhangu lapho kupaka khona izimoto. Isithombe: SITHUNYELWEUNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuthungeleka ngomlilo kwezimoto lapho zipakwa khona emkhandlwini.“Sikhathazekile yilesi sigameko. Kuyishwa ukucekelwa phansi kwempahla kamasipala okumele ngabe ihlinzeka abantu ngezidingo zabo. Nakuba ingakatholakali imbangela yomlilo, sesiyalele umasipala ukuthi uqinisekise ukuthi kuyaphenyisiswa futhi kuthathwa izinyathelo zomthetho ezifanele uma kutholakala ukuthi zokhelwe ngomlilo,” kusho uHlomuka.Umnyango uthi ubikelwe ukuthi ngo-6 izolo ekuseni onogada bakamasipala babone intuthu ebiqhamuka endaweni okupakwa kuyo izimoto. Kuthe uma onogada beyobheka bathola ukuthi kunezimoto ezine zomkhandlu ebezisha.Kulesi sigameko zimbili izimoto ezishe zaphela kwathi ezinye ezimbili zasha ingxenye yazo.Amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal athe ayalwazi lolu daba kodwa alikho icala elivuliwe.
title: Kuphenywa ngomlilo oshise izimoto zikamasipala

text: AmaZulu FC aqale isizini kungekuhle ngaphansi kukaCavin Johnson ogcine echithiwe kuleli qembu ngenxa yokugqoza kwemiphumela. Kadeni uJohnson wayiqala isizini ngenhlanhla ngoba kwakukhona ukuthi izibalo zakhe selokhu athatha izintambo azikhuli futhi aziliyisi iqembu phambili. Ushiye izintambo kwathatha uJozef Vukusic ofike kuleli qembu kubhekwe lukhulu kuyena kodwa kwangaba njalo. Besikhona isikhathi lapho obubona khona ukuthi nenhlanhla nje le iyodwa iyamphika uVukusic kodwa ukubekezela kwezikhulu zeqembu kwalisindisa itoho lakhe.Ayizange iqhubeke isikhathi eside leyo nhlanhla njengoba egcine echithiwe. Njengamanje kubambe inkakha yeqembu, esuka kude noSuthu futhi eyazi wonke umlando waleli qembu * -Ayanda “Cobra” Dlamini.Bebekhona abathi abaphathi boSuthu bageje umgodi ngoDlamini, besho nokusho ukuthi indawo iqembu elikuyona (kwazise livika izembe), idinga umakadebona womqeqeshi osijwayele lesi simo.Umdlalo kaDlamini wokuqala kwakumele ayobhekana neKaizer ekuhambeni emdlalweni wePremiership. Wamangaza abaningi uDlamini ebuya namaphuzu aphelele.Selokhu kubuye imidlalo yeligi, Usuthu lusashaywe kanye, lwadlala ngokulingana emidlalweni emibili, lwanqoba owodwa.Ukunqoba koSuthu ngempelasonto lwehlula iBlack Leopards ngo 1-0, kufike ngesikhathi esihle. UBongi Ntuli ushaye igoli lokunqoba elimenze wasala ngelilodwa kuGabadinho Mhango noPeter Shalulile abanamagoli angu-14. Lo mphumela ubeke AmaZulu kunombolo 13, ngamaphuzu angu-28, emidlalweni engu-28.Uma AmaZulu enganqoba umdlalo olandelayo, angakhuphukela emaphuzwini angu-31, nokungabe sekusho ukuthi asethubeni elihle lokusinda ezembeni njengoba kusho umlando.“Bekubalulekile kakhulu ukuthi sinqobe kwiLeopards. Amaphuzu amathathu besiwadinga kakhulu, nokuthe maphakathi nesiwombe sesibili savele sathi sizohlala emuva sivikele igoli lethu ngoba siwafuna ngempela la maphuzu. Ukunqoba kwethu ngalesi sikhathi esinzima kanje kuhle kakhulu ngoba kubuyisa nokuzethemba kubadlali bethu. Yinto esiyamukela impela kakhulu. Ngalesi sikhathi sidinga abadlali abalambele ukudlala ngokomqondo,” usho kanje uDlamini encoma ezakhe ngemuva kokushaya iLeopards.Imidlalo emibili esalele Usuthu bazoyidlala neStellenbosch FC (ngoLwesithathu) bayivale neHighlands Park (ngoMgqibelo).
title: Usuthu ethubeni lokusinda ezembeni

text: : Sineminyaka emine sithandana nomama wengane yami.Ngicabanga ukuthi sengikulungele ukumenza unkosikazi wami kodwa inkinga manje ngunina. Akafuni nokuyizwa indaba yami. Angisazi ngempela ukuthi ngenzenjani ngoba ngiyayondla ingane yami futhi siphathene kahle nesithandwa sami. Akukho nokuncane engikwaziyo okungenza ukuthi angathandi ngishade nendodakazi yakhe. Angisazi ngempela ukuthi ngenzenjani.Okhathazekile:Ikabili le ndaba. Kungenzeka ukuthi kukhona akwaziyo wena ongakwazi okwenza ukuthi angakuthembi.Kusengenzeka futhi ukuthi unovalo lokushiywa yindodakazi yakhe okwenza angakwenameli ukushada kwenu.Zibuze futhi ukuthi ngabe uyilandele yonke yini imigudu yokushada ngoba abantu abadala bafuna izinto zenziwe ngendlela. Ayikho into edlula ukuthi uhlanganise imindeni yenu nike nilukhulume lolu daba.Umama kudingeka aphumele obala ngokwenza ukuthi angawuthakaseli lo mshado.Kuyilungelo lakho ukuthi ulazi iqiniso njengoba linjalo futhi ulungise uma kukhona la ungahambanga khona kahle, indoda eqotho yenzenjalo.:Nginenkinga yomyeni ongakhiphi ngisho utiki endlini. Siyasebenza sobabili kodwa yonke into ibheke mina.Okungiphatha kabi kakhulu wukuthi ngaphandle sibukeka njengomndeni ophila kahle. Ngisho nabangani bakhe baze bamncome ngomsebenzi omuhle awenzayo uma bevakashe emzini wethu.Ngivele ngingazi nokuthi ngenzenjani ngoba mina ngiyazi ukuthi amandla ami wonke lawa abakhuluma ngawo.Lapho yena usuke esehambela phezulu.Sengikhathele manje ukumisa umuzi indoda ikhona ekhaya.Ngiyazi ukuthi kumele sibambisane njengabantu abashadile kodwa akusekona ukubambisana loku.Kungukuhlukumeza omunye umuntu ikakhulukazi ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi unawo amandla okusiza naye kuleli khaya. Kanti mina ngothwala kuze kuthini?Nomalungelo, eThekwini:Kusobala ukuthi umyeni wakho wamjwayeza ekuqaleni ukuthi wena ukhona uzokwenza wagcina eseyijwayele le mpilo.Ayikho indoda engahlala nje ingakhiphi ekhaya isebenza ngaphandle komuntu ozitshele nje ukuthi ngeke ayingene.Futhi kujwayelekile ikakhulukazi kubantu besifazane ukuthi bazibone bekule nkinga okuyona ngoba umuntu usuke ezitshela ukuthi uzokwenza ukubalekela ukukhuluma kanti ila ezifaka khona ogibeni.Uyakudinga ukuhlala phansi nomyeni wakho umtshele nje ukuthi cha usufuna naye athathe indawo yakhe kuleli khaya.Ngeke aqhubeke anconywe ngento angayenzanga.Nidinga ukuhlukaniselana izidingo zekhaya futhi wenze isiqinisekiso sokuthi uyazenza eziqondene naye ngoba kulula ukucabanga ukuthi umuntu uyazikhokhela izidingo kanti cha.Ningavumelana nangokuthi zibanjwe ebhange lakhe ukuze imali ingaze ifike ezandleni zakhe. Nawe kubalulekile ukuthi uyeke ukufuna ukubamba yonke indawo ngoba uzokhathala, njengoba usukhathele kuyimanje.Yebo umshado udinga abantu abazobambisana kodwa akusho ukuthi nalapho omunye enawo amandla kumele ayekelele omunye abambe ikhaya yedwa. Akukhona ukubambisana lokho.:Ngingowesifazane osindisiwe onokuthanda abantu besilisa abangakholwa. Ngiyazifela ngabo.Lokhu kwenza ukuthi ngihleze ngifihla ukuthi ngithandana nobani ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi bazongehlulela esontweni. Ngabe likhona iphutha ekuthandeni umuntu ofunwa yimina noma kumele ngithande umuntu ofunwa ibandla lami? Ngicela usizo ngoba sengizibona njengomuntu ongakufanele nokuba sendlini yesonto. Ngenzenjani?Igama ligodliwe:Khumbula ukuthi nawe awuzalwanga usindisiwe kodwa kwaba umusa nje. Nesoka lakho ngelinye ilanga lohlangana nalowo musa.Kusengenzeka ukuthi uJehova uyomazi ngenxa yakho ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi umazise ngempilo oyiphilayo ukuze ubuhle bukaJehova abazi ngawe. Ubani owaziyo, kungenzeka ukuthi akakholwa hhayi ngoba engafuni kodwa ukungazi.Kusobala nokuthi nawe uyalifihla isoka lakho ngoba unovalo lokuthi ngeke balamukele ebandleni lakho okuyinto ejwayelekile.Uma kungukuthi uyamthanda njengokusho kwakho, qala ngokumbiza avakashe ebandleni lakho ngoba kubalulekile ukuthi ushade umuntu enimqondo munye ukuze ningaphambani ngemiqondo senishadile.
title: #Ezothando: Ngisindisiwe kodwa ngizifela ngabesilisa abangakholwa

text: UNGQONGQOSHE weMfundo ePhakeme ophinde engamele ezeSayensi nobuChwepheshe kuleli, uDkt Blade Nzimande, usememezele ukuthi iNingiimu Afrika isiqalile ukucwaninga ikhambi lesintu eliwundabuzekwayo kulezi zinsuku, umhlonyane ngenhloso yokuwusebenzisa njengekhambi lecoronavirus.UNzimande uthe nensangu nayo iyahlolwa nemikhiqizo yayo ukuze leli gciwane livinjwe ngazo zonke izindlela.Umhlonyane waziwa kakhulu ngokukwazi ukwelapha umkhuhlane ojwayelekile ohambisana nokukhwehlela nobuhlungu bamalunga omzimba, okungezinye zezimpawu zomuntu osehlaselwe yiCovid-19. Uyabalwa nasekwelapheni izinkinga zesisu okuwukuqunjelwa. UMHLONYANE okuyikhambi lakudala lesintu, lizohlolwa wuhulumeni wakuleli ukuze lisetshenziswe empini yokulwa neCovid-19"Ekulweni neCovid-19, sesiqalile nokuhlola amakhambi esintu njenge-Artemisia afra or African wormwood eyaziwa ngesiNguni, ngokuthi wumhlonyane,"kusho uNzimande ekhuluma kwi-ENCA ngoLwesithathu emini. Ezinyangeni ezedlule uMengameli waseMagadascar  u-Andry Rajoelina  watshela umhlaba ukuthi izwe lakhe linobufakazi bokuthi umhlonyane uyakwazi ukwelapha iCovid-19.Wakuveza nokho ukuthi akukho cwaningo lososayensi olusenziwe ngalokhu, abakwaziyo kuwulwazi lwasemandulo ngalesi sitshalo.Wanxusa ososayensi ukuthi balihlole ukuze umhlaba wonke usizakale njengoba lolu bhubhane lukhahlameze umhlaba wonke.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt Zweli Mkhize walamukela leli khwelo, wathi leli lizwe lizokwenza imizamo yokuthi leli khambi lihlolwe. INSANGU ibalwe emakhambini ahlolwa nguhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika ekulweni neCovid-19 Isithombe: REUTERSUNzimande uthe njengamanje kubekwe eceleni imali ewuR90 million, kodwa leli lizwe lisadinga olunye uxhaso ukuze kwenzeke lolu cwaningo ngempumelelo.Uvezile ukuthi akhona amazwe njengeCanada namanye asevumile ukufaka isandla ocwaningweni lweNingizimu Afrika."Sizosebenzisana kakhulu nabelaphi bendabuko ukuze wonke lamakhambi esintu asizayo sikwazi ukuwacwaninga. Insangu nayo siyayibala kulezo zinto esizihlolayo. Angisho ke njalo ukuthi azilime ziye etsheni ngokubhenywa kwensangu, kuthiwe uNzimande uyena owashoyo,"kusho uNzimande.Kwezinye zezinto ezibalwa ngensangu, wukuthi iyasiza ukwelapha izinkinga ezihambisana nobunzima bokuphefumula.Abanye ongoti kwamanye amazwe bayisebenzisela ukwelapha isifuba somoya i-Asthma.
title: INingizimu Afrika ihlola umhlonyane nensangu ukulwa neCovid-19

text: UThuso Mbedu uqokelwe ukuthi adlale indawo kaCora kwiThe Underground Railroad, okuwumdlalo osuselwe encwadini ehlonishwayo emhlabeni kaColson Whitehead. Uzolingisa nabalingisi base United States uChase Dillon no-Aaron Pierre nabo abazolingisa izindawo eziqavile kulo mdlalo.Lo mlingisi okhulele eMgungundlovu, udalule lezi zindaba ekhasini lakhe kwi-Instagram lapho ebonge khona uMdali ngokuqokwa kwakhe.“Ngizokwenza njengoba kuvame ukwenza abaningi bakuleli uma kwenzeke into efana nalena: Ngiwutholile umsebenzi! Ngijabule kakhulu ukuba yingxenye yalento. Ukuzilungiselela nje inhlolokhono kukodwa kungikhulise kakhulu. Kuyisibusiso futhi ngiyazigqaja ukuthi ngixoxe ngalolu daba,” kubhala uMbedu.I-The underground iveza impilo yabantu abathathu abamnyama ababeyizigqila eningizimu ne-United States abasuke befuna inkululeko. Lo mdlalo uzokhonjiswa kwi-Amazon, esebenza ngendlela efanayo neNetflix, uqukethe iziqephu ezingu-11 eziqondiswe uBarry Jenkins.UMbedu uzakhele igama emidlalweni yethelevishini okubalwa kuyo iSaints and Sinners, Is’thunzi, Scandal! neGenerations: The Legacy muva nje. Indawo ayidlala kwi-Is’thunzi yamthatha yambeka emehlweni omhlaba wonke eqokelwa indondo ye-Emmy.Abanye abalingisi okubalwa kubo uNomzamo Mbatha, Terry Pheto, Larona Moagi, Pearl Thusi noJessica Nkosi ngabanye bosaziwayo abahalalisele uMbedu ngokuqokwa kulo mdlalo.
title: Useyolingisa eHollywood uThuso Mbedu

text: ISILO samaBandla sinxuse othisha ukuthi bagqoke ngendlela ehloniphekile ukuze abafundi babukele kubona.UNgangezwe Lakhe uthe uyazi ukuthi amasudi awasagqokwa kodwa uthisha yinto emqoka ezweni.“Othisha babegqoka beyizingcwasimende, angafuni nokuthintwa wuthuli. Izingane zazifisa ukugqoka njengothisha. Ngiyazi amasudi awasafakwa kodwa ukwenzeka kwezinto kuyamfundisa ukuthi umfundi amhawukele uthisha, afise ukufana naye,” kusho iSilo.Sikusho lokhu sikhuluma emcimbini wokwethulwa kohlelo lokufunda ngamaholidi asebusika ePhoenix ngoLwesihlanu.Emcimbini bekukhona izifunda zomnyango ezintathu okuwuMlaza, Pinetown neLembe.UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo eKZN uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane, uhambe emazwini eMbube wayibonga ngokukhumbuza othisha ngendlela okwakugqokwa ngayo.“Siyabonga Silo ngokusikhumbuza ngendlela othisha ababegqoka ngayo. Uthisha kumele kube ngumuntu umphakathi ozofuna ukuzifanisa naye ngendlela asuke eziphethe ngayo,” kusho uDlungwane.Imbube ikhala ngokuthi kuyishwa ukuthi othisha bakhunjulwa uma sekukhishwa imiphumela yabafundi.“Othisha bangabantu ababalulekile okumele bahlale bekhunjulwa njalo. Abazali nabo kumele babambe iqhaza emfundweni yezingane zabo. Sibheke nina bothishanhloko nothisha ngemiphumela yezingane.”ISilo sikhale ngodlame ezikoleni sathi ezinye izimpi zisuka emakhaya bese ziphelele ezikoleni.Sikhale nangokugcwala kakhulu emakilasini okwehlisa umdlandla wothisha wokufundisa.“Siyazi ezinye izimpi ziqala emphakathini bese ziphelela ezikoleni. Akekho umfundi okumele alethe isibhamu sikayise esikoleni ngoba ebhekene nobunzima.”Unxuse ukuthi imiphakathi isebenzisane ukuze kuliwe nalesi sihlava sezimpi ezikoleni.Sikhale nangamathaveni aseduzane nezikole.Sibalule ukuthi abafundi abenzi kahle ezivivinyweni zabo sathi kodwa njengoba sikhuluma nothishanhloko bezikole asizile ukuzothetha kodwa sifuna ukuthi kwakhiwe isifundazwe ukuze senze kahle.“Ukhona umehluko engiwubonayo esifundazweni. Ngike ngahlangana nothishanhloko bezinye izifunda eKing Cetshwayo nasoLundi ngiyawubona umehluko emiphumeleni yesifundazwe.”UDlungwane uthe bazolwa namathaveni aseduzane nezikole.ISilo sithe siyazibona ezinye izikole ukuthi ziluqalile uhlelo lokufunda ngamaholidi nangezimpelasonto ngoba sihamba yonke indawo.“Anginganibambezeli ngoba ngiyazi nijahe ukuyovala izikole. Namhlanje akekho ozophuthwa ukuvala isikole ngoba kuwuLwesihlanu,” kusho iMbube kwaqhuma uhleko.Sihlabise umnyango ngezinkomo ezimbili.
title: Uxwayise othisha ngendlela yokugqoka

text:
UMCULI weKwaito uMshoza ubhalele uBabes Wodumo incwadi yokumeseka kulesi sikhathi njengoba kusanda kuvela izinsolo zokuthi ubehlukunyezwa owayeyisoka lakhe, uMampintsha.NgoLwesihlanu olwedlule abantu abaningi kuleli basale beshaqekile ngezinsolo ezivele kwiMetro FM, ohlelweni iThe Drive olwenziwa uMo Flava noMasechaba Ndlovu, lapho uMasechaba aveze ukuthi uyazi ngokuhlukunyezwa kukaBabes Wodumo, athi bekwenziwa uMampintsha.Lo mculi wasekwa abantu abaningi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngemuva kokuvela kwalolu daba, abanye babhekisa intukuthelo yabo kuMampintsha, obengumphathi wakhe nasesitebeleni abeqopha kuso iWest Ink.UMshoza, naye obhekene nodaba olucishe lufane njengamanje, ube ngomunye wosaziwayo abathumelele lo mculi amazwi enduduzo nokumeseka kulesi sikhathi.“Amanxeba abuhlungu ngaphakathi kodwa ngaphandle sishaya sengathi konke kuhamba kahle. Ngesikhathi ngizwa ngesimo obhekene naso izolo ebusuku ngihlulekile ukulala! Bengilokhe ngizibuza ukuyhi senzeni olubi? Sizophendukela kubani?” kubhala uMshoza encwadini ayibhekise kuBabes.Lo mculi uqhube waveza ukuthi akukho lula ukukhuluma ngokuhlukumezeka nokuthi uyafisa ukuba seduzane noBabes kodwa uvinjwa ukuthi usekubhaceni.“Njengoba ngikubhalela le ncwadi ngisekubhaceni, ngenxa yokuhlukunyezwa. Lo muntu wesilisa uzame ukungiphuca isithunzi sami, kodwa ngikwazile ukuthola amandla ngaphuma. Ngiyathemba ukuthi nawe ngelinye ilanga uzowathola amandla okuthi sekwanele!” kuqhuba yena.UMshoza uthe uBabes akaqine kulesi sikhathi wamazisa nokuthi akekho yedwa. Uthe amanxeba azophola futhi bazoyilwa ndawonye impi yokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane.“Ngelinye ilanga lezi zinyembezi zizophenduka zibe yinjabulo,” kusho uMshoza.Incwadi ebhalwe uMshoza
'Sengifisa ukwazi ukuthi yena uyongivikela nini emhlabeni' - MampintshaEngxoxweni neSolezwe ngalolu daba uMampintsha uthe usola isandla sesithathu ngezinsolo abekwe zona.Part 2: ‘UBabes uyongivikela nini emhlabeni?’ 
#BabesWodumo
#Mampintsha
#MasechabaVideo: 
@FaneleBengu
pic.twitter.com/bj0he4QanH— Isolezwe Newspaper (@IsolezweNews) 
May 20, 2018“Inhliziyo yami ibuhlungu kakhulu kuyabonakala ukuthi kunesandla sesithathu. Sikahle noBabes, makufakwa kakhulu izinto zothando, akekho umuntu ongenayo inkinga othandweni kodwa ngendlela asebebeka ngayo: izinto zezibhakela, omongozima nokuphuka komlenze, ngivele ngadunyelwa ngoba naye uBabes uvele waxakeka ukuthi imilenze yayiphuka kanjani, izibhakela kanjani.“Angisona isilwane, uyangazi naye. Ngiyamthanda ngimphilela kakhulu, manje sebengihlasela ngaye. Bengifisa naye uBabes sengathi uNkulunkulu angasisiza, akwazi ukubona lezi zinto zezitha ngoba ekugcineni njengoba ngangimvikela kusuka kuqala uBabes kuze kuba manje, ngaze ngashintsha impilo yami ngendaba yakhe ngoba ngangimthanda," kusho uMampintsha. Lo mculi namhlanje kulindeleke ukuthi aziphendulele ohlelweni lukaMasechaba noMo Flava kwiMetro FM.
title: FUNDA: UMshoza ubhalele uBabes Wodumo incwadi ezwelana naye....

text: INKAKHA kaDJ u-Oskido, ipike umethuli wezinhlelo zethelevishini uPearl Thusi, eculweni layo elisha.UPearl , obuye abe ngumlingisi, upikwe engomeni entsha ethi Une Mali  esanda kukhishwa yilo DJ.“ UPearl unamakhono amaningi. Uthe uma engitshela ukuthi angayenza ingoma nami ngase ngithatha isinqumo sokuthi singene estudiyo, lapho kufike kwacaca ukuthi uyayazi into akhuluma ngayo,” kusho u-Oskido.Kuleli culo u-Oskido upike noNokwazi noFocalistic. Ulishaya ngesigqi sakudala kanti ne-video yalo iveza indlela okwakugqokwa ngayo kudala.“ Empeleni sibuyise isigqi somculo waseSophiatown. (Ngale ngoma) bengifuna ukukhumbuza abantu ngendlela okwakuculwa ngayo kudala nendlela abantu bangaleso sikhathi ababethanda ukubukeka ngayo.  Akumele sikhohlwe lapho siqhamuka khona. Okuhlukile ngalo wukuthi ngisebenzise abaculi abasebancane njengaye uFocalistic ukuze kubonakale ukuthi yiculo elisha futhi sihambisana nesikhathi,” kuqhuba u-Oskido.Uthe ukukhipha leli culo akusho ukuthi usezokhipha lolu hlobo lomculo njalo kodwa wenza umculo anomuzwa wokuwenza ngaleso sikhathi, nokucabangela abathandi bomculo ukuthi bathole uhlobo abaluthandayo. Uveze ukuthi akekho ezinhlelweni zokukhipha i-albhamu ngenxa yokuthi esikhathini samanje, ingoma idayisa ngisho iyodwa ngenxa yezinkundla ezidayisa umculo nge-internet.Okunye athe umatasa nakho ukuqopha abaculi abebekuma-Idols SA nyakenye njengoba iKalawa Jazzme Records, isebenzisana nalo mqhudelwano waminyaka yonke.Ngaphandle komculo u-Oskido uthe usenendawo yakhe yokudla iBaruma by Oskido eseWaterfall, eGoli. Uthe ukuhlasela kweCovid-19 kumvule amehlo ngokuthi acabange namanye amabhizinisi, angagxili emculweni kuphela njengoba kuvalwe imicimbi amaciko athwala kanzima ukuthola imisebenzi.
title: U-Oskido uvuse umculo kuPearl Thusi

text: INKANTOLO eNkulu iNorth Gauteng igxeke uphenyo loMvikeli woMphakathi, u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane, alwenza ngomkhankaso kaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wokuba ngumholi we-ANC ngo-2017.Amajaji abehlulela kuleli cala okubalwa uJaji Dunstan Mlambo, Keoagile Matojane noRaylene Keightley, alubuke kabusha uphenyo lukaMkhwebane ase eluchitha.Inkantolo iyalele u-Advocate Mkhwebane ukuthi akhokhe izindleko zecala zikaSomlomo wasePhalamende, uNksz Thandi Modise, nophethe abashushisi kuleli, u-Advocate Shamila Batohi ayekade enze izincomo ngabo.UMlambo uqhubeke wathi: “Isinqumo soMvikeli woMphakathi sokuphenya abese ebika ngomkhankaso wokhetho lweCR17 lobuholi be-ANC ngo-2017, lubuyekeziwe lwatholakala lungekho emthethweni lwase lubekwa eceleni.U-Advocate Mkhwebane akanawo amandla okuyalela uphiko lwezokushushisa ukuthi luphenye indaba yokushushumbiswa kwemali embikweni wakhe othinta iCR 17. Inkantolo ithole ukuthi uhlulekile ukuveza ukuthi uRamaphosa walidukisa kanjani iPhalamende.”Inkantolo ithe uRamaphosa wayengenaso isibophezelo sokuthi adalule ukuthi imali yokuxhasa umkhankaso wakhe wayithathaphi.U-Advocate Mkhwebane uyalelwe ukuba akhokhe nezindleko zecala zikaRamaphosa.Ngesikhathi bephikisana ngaleli cala ngenyanga edlule, abamele uRamaphosa bathi u-Advocate Mkhwebane ngesikhathi ephenya lolu daba waba budedengu, akuthola kwakudukisa.Ummeli kaRamaphosa, uMnuz Peter Harris, uchaze isinqumo senkantolo njengokunqoba kukaMengameli.Okhulumela u-Advocate Mkhwebane, uMnuz Oupa Segalwe, uthe asikho isinqumo esisathathiwe ukuthi ngabe bazolidlulisela yini icala kwenye inkantolo enkulu.Uthe bebengasilindele lesi sinqumo samajaji.I-EFF ithe izoyisa lolu daba eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo. Ithe ayihambisani nesinqumo esithathiwe.
title: Inkantolo igxeke uphenyo lukaMkhwebane nge-CR17

text: Umbuzo wokuqala:Sineminyaka emibili sithandana nesoka lami. Ngonyaka odlule waphelelwa umsebenzi. Bengenza konke ukuthi angasweli lutho ngesikhathi ephelelwe umsebenzi. Ngimubuzela kubantu futhi ngize ngimuzamele mina umsebenzi. Waze wagcina ewuthola ekupheleni konyaka odlule. Kwaba ukuqala kwezinkinga phakathi kwethu. Sashintsha isimo endlini, bekungathi akuyena lo engimaziyo.Uma nje eke wahola kuba ukugcina kwami ukumbona, abuye engasenamali. Akathengi ngisho isinkwa lesi endlini. Ngiyakhathazeka kakhulu ngoba bengicabanga ukuthi ukuthola kwakhe umsebenzi kuzokwenza isimo sibesihle phakathi kwethu.Ngenzenjani ukubuyisela izinto esimeni esejwayelekile?Zinhle, eMandeniImpendulo:Kwaze kwadabukisa-ke lokhu. Impela iqiniso ukuthi ngeke uthi umuntu uyamazi.Kwesinye isikhathi kuyenzeka ukuthi ukuhlupheka kube nemithelela emibi kumuntu uma izinto sezihamba kahle.Kusangenzeka ukuthi lokhu okwenziwa isoka lakho kuyadlula. Akakujwayeli ukuzimela futhi abe nemali ethi yena okwenza ukudideka kuyena. Kujwayelekile ukwenzeka lokhu.Esikhathini esiningi uma usujwayele ukungabi nemali ukubakhona kwayo kuba inkinga.Abanye bazebathathe izinto ngamawala. Baze bakhohlwe izinto ezibalulekile empilweni.Hlala phansi naye umtshele ngokungaphatheki kahle kwakho. Uma ekulwisa, kuzobe kuchaza ukuthi akwenzayo ukwenza ngamabomu.Iminyaka emibili kwabathandanayo isikhathi esanele ukubona ukuthi nikulungele yini ukushada. Ngakho kubalulekile ukulungisa izinkinga ezinjengalezi ningakazibophezeli ngomshado. Kuhle lokhu okwenzayo ukuthi mawubona izimpawu ezingezinhle ufune ukusizakala. Kukhombisa ubuhlakani obukhulu.Zama ukukhulumisana naye. Sinethemba lokuthi uma ehlakaniphile uzoshintsha. Uma lungekho ushintsho sekuzomele wena unqume ukuthi uyafuna yini ukuphila le mpilo na?Okuhle kodwa.Umbuzo wesibili:Ngingowesifazane oneminyaka ewu-30, oshadile nonabantwana ababili emshadweni. Ngiyamuthanda umyeni wami kakhulu. Uyikho konke kumina. Unothando, uyasinakekela futhi uwubaba oqotho.Iyodwa nje vo inkinga. Akathembekile neze emshadweni wethu.Sengimbambe izihlandla ezintathu ekhombisa ukungathembeki kumina. Njalo uma ngimbamba uyaxolisa athembise ukuthi akasoze aphinde akwenze ukungathembeki.Ngiyamxolela njalo mangimbambile. Kodwa sekuqala ukubanzima kumina manje ukumela lesi simo. Ngizithwele, nginezinyanga eziyisithupha.Sengiphinde ngamubamba futhi nomunye umuntu wesifazane. Angisazi ngenzenjani, noma ngithini. Sengize ngiyazenyeza ngoba angisazi ukuthi yini le emenza angathokozi ngami. Kwenziwa yini ahlale efuna abanye abantu besifazane ngikhona?Ngisizeni. Angisazi ngenzenjani ngomyeni wami.Igama ligodliwe, UmzintoImpendulo:“Kwenziwa yini ehlale efuna abanye abantu besifazane ngikhona?” Singasho singananazi ukuthi kwenziwa uwena lokhu.Uwena omjwayezile ukuthi akulutho ukuphuma ngaphandle eshadile. Uwena omkhuthazayo ngale senzo sakhe.Uwena omamukela ngezandla ezimhlophe njalo uma umbambile. Ukwenzelani lokhu? Uyamkhuthaza ukuthi akwenze njalo ngoba uyazi uzomxolela.Umuntu uyena uqobo ozikhethela ukungathembeki, futhi usuke azi kahle ukuthi wenzani. Uthando akuyona imizwa. Isinqumo esibonakala ngezenzo.Uwena onquma imihla namalanga ukumthanda ngaphezu kwezenzo zakhe ezikhombisa ukungakuthandi wena, ukungakuhloniphi, nezikhombisa ukungakhuli kwakhe.Ngamanye amazwi ushade nengane, engazihloniphi yona. Lokhu ngazihloniphi kwayo sekwenze nawe ukuthi ungazihloniphi.Uzizwa kanjani wena ukushada nendoda engakuhloniphi futhi engawukhathaleli umshado wayo?Ukhe walubika nje lolu daba kwabakini, noma abangane benu nanoma ubani omunye enimhloniphayo nina nobabili?Kubalulekile njengomuntu wesifazane ukuthi uzihloniphe ngokuthi ungabekezeleli into engekho.Uwena okumele ubeke imibandela. Uthathe isinqumo sokuthi, sekwanele. Uzokwazi ngalelo langa ukuthi awudlali.Ezinye zezindlela zokukhombisa uthando kwindoda engakuhloniphi ngalendlela, ukunqamula ifindo lomshado.Okuhle kodwa!
title: EZOTHANDO: Ukuphinga kwendoda yami sekungenza ngizenyeze

text: OMUNYE wabafelokazi babasebenzi abangu-34 ababulawa eMarikana ngamaphoyisa ngo-2012, ukhala ngokuthi uhulumeni ukushaya indiva ukuthi kumele inxeshezelwe yize sekudlule iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili isigameko senzeka.UNkk Nonkululeko Ngxande ubekhuluma emcimbini obuwenziwe yi-Amcu eMidrand, eGoli, izolo.Umyeni wakhe uMnuz Mphumzeni Ngxande, wayengomunye wababesebenza emayini iLonmin, ababulawa ngamaphoyisa becashe eKoppie Two.Abasebenzi babefuna iholo elinguR12 500 nezimo ezingcono zokusebenza. Imicimbi ibijwayele ukwenziwa eMarikana kodwa kulokhu ngenxa yegciwane iCorona elilawula ukuhlangana kwabantu, kuphoqe ukuba kushintshwe.UNkk Ngxande owayehlala nomyeni wakhe emjondolo iNkaneng, uthe wayekhona eduzane nendawo yesigameko ngesikhathi kuhlaselwa umyeni wakhe.“Ngesikhathi ngizwa umsindo kwakungathi yisichotho. Ngezwa ukuthi khona okungahambi kahle. Kusebuhlungu namanje kodwa kumele sixole,” kusho uNkk Ngxande.UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, wayengomunye wabaqondisi eLomnin ngesikhathi kwenzeka inhlekelele.UNkk Ngxande uthe akuzange kube khona ukubuyisana ngalesi sigameko phakathi kwemindeni nohulumeni ngoba imindeni ayijabule ngokuthi abakaxolisi abaphethe.“Akekho noyedwa umuntu osuke kuhulumeni wazoxolisa kuthina. Ukuxolisa yikhona okubalulekile kakhulu, sisalinde lolo suku ukuba uNkulunkulu athinte izinhliziyo zabaphethe bezoxolisa. Sizobaxolela,” kusho uNkk Ngxande.UMengameli we-Amcu uMnuz Joseph Mathunjwa, uthe inkampani iSibanye-Stillwater ethathe izintambo kwiLonmin, kumele igxekwe ngokufa kwabavukuzi.Uthe lezi zinkampani ziyafana wathi abasebenzi basaxhashazwa. Uqhube wathi uRamaphosa kumele azoxolisa kubafelokazi nakulabo bavukuzi abalimala. Ethula inkulumo ngobuchwepheshe umholi we-UDM uMnuz Bantu Holomisa, uthe abaphethe kwi-ANC kumele bazithobe bayoxolisa ngalesi sigameko saseMarikana.“Le nto yokuthi kushone abantu bese kungezi muntu kuhulumeni azoxolisa ngokona abakwenza, akulungile. Bavumelekile ukuyoxolisa besenaso isikhathi,” kusho uHolomisa.Umholi we-One SA Movement uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, usole uhulumeni ngokungabakhokheli abantu iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili kwenzeka isigameko. Uthe lolu suku kumele lube yiholidi.
title: Bafuna uRamaphosa axolise kwabashonelwa

text: KUSOLWA isoka ngokungqongqisa abane belele endlini, kwashona nengane yalo (5) endaweni yaKwaDesai, ngaKwaNdengezi, izolo.Kulesi sigameko kushone uSinenhlanhla Mkhwanazi (5) kanti unina, uNksz Zodwa Mkwanazi, udadewabo uNksz Sibongile Mkhwanazi nomlamu wakhe uMnuz Khanyisani Mpanza basesimeni esibucayi esibhedlela ngemuva kokusha.Kuthiwa uNksz Mkhwanazi (Zodwa) uxabane noyise wengane yakhe ahlala naye eLuganda, wabe esebalekela kwaDesai emzini okuqashe kuwo udadewabo nesoka lakhe, lapho okwenzeke khona isehlo.UNksz Sizakele Ndlovu wakulo muzi, uthe uNksz Mkhwanazi uqale waxabana noyise wengane yakhe, ngaphandle kwalo muzi.“Baqale bahilizisana beme ngaphandle kwesango, belokhu bethukana. UZodwa wabe esebuyela endlini kasisi wakhe, wamvalela ngaphandle,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu.Uthe owesilisa obebukeka ecasukile ube esesonga ngokuthi bazobona ukuthi bazophuma kuphi njengoba bemvalele ngaphandle wase wahamba.“Ubuye ephethe isikhwama sengane yabo ebesinekhadi lasemtholampilo, isitifiketi sokuzalwa nomfaniswano wesikole wayokubeka komunye umuzi oseduze nalapha waphinda wahamba,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu.Uthe bekusezintatha ngenkathi bezwa ukuqhuma okuvuse nabanye omakhelwane, okusolakala ukuthi bekungumabonakude obususha.“Ngesikhathi sivuka sibone umnyango wegumbi labo uvutha kuphuma nentuthu. Bekuzwakala kancane amazwi abantu bememeza. Sizame ukuwuvula umnyango kodwa wangavuleka kwaphoqeleka ukuthi siwukhahlele.“Namanje into engiyibone ngenkathi kuvuleka umnyango inyantisa igazi. Bese bebucuke izikhumba bengakwazi nokuhamba, bagaqe ngamadolo baze bafika emnyango balala phansi bekhala ngokushiselwa,” kuqhuba uNksz Ndlovu.Uthe nezingane ezincane ezibone laba abane zizodinga ukwelulekwa ngokwengqondo ngoba isimo besihlasimulisa umzimba.Uthe ngenkathi ebuza uSibongile ukuthi kwenzekeni, uphendule wathi umsolwa obashisile futhi ujwayele ukwenza izinto ezifana nale.Abane abashisiwe baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela lapho kufike kwashona khona uSinenhlanhla.Ngenkathi Isolezwe lifika endaweni yesigameko lihogele iphunga likaphethroli ebelisemnyango wegumbi okwenzeke kulo isigameko.Umfowabo wezelamani zakwaMkhwanazi, uMnuz Jabulani Mkhwanazi uthe umndeni wakhe ukhungathekile ngesehlo esenzekile.“Inhliziyo yami ibuhlungu kakhulu. Namanje angikwazi ukucabanga kahle. Okubuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi sekudlule nengane emhlabeni,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Umphakathi uthe ukhathazekile ngesigameko esinesihluku esenzeke endaweni.“Sithukile ngale nto eyenzekile ngoba asikaze sibe nezigameko ezifana nalesi kule ndawo.Sifisa kube khona okwenzekayo ngalokhu ngoba akumele kuphinde kwenzeke into efana nale,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu.Ikhansela lakule ndawo, uMnuz Reginald Cloete, lithe liyazwelana nemindeni elahlekelwe.“Ngiyathemba ukuthi amaphoyisa azosebenza ngokuzikhandla, ukuze kube khona ojezayo ngalokhu,” kusho uCloete.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCol Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukushiswa kwabantu abane, wathi bayaphenya.
title: Kushone ingane (5) uyise 'eshisa' indlu

text: NJENGOBA selidumela emansumpeni ngezingoma okufanele zihlukanise unyaka, abaculi begqom’ baseThekwini futhi abanezingoma ezishisa izikhotha kulezi zinsuku sebegqemeke ingozi engeqiwa ntwala.Lezi zintandokazi zomculo wokujuxuza zisanda kuthola izindaba ezibuhlungu zokuthi izingoma zazo zivaliwe, ngeke zidlalwe emsakazweni omkhulukazi Ukhozi FM. UBianca ‘Nuz Queen’ Mbatha waseMlaza odume ngengoma esuse umsindo esihloko sithi Laze Lavuka Idimoni Lami uthe utshelwe emehlweni yizikhulu zoKhozi FM ukuthi ngeke ize idlalwe ingoma yakhe kulesi siteshi esihamba phambili e-Afrika jikelele.“Kuthiwe ayikulungele ukudlalwa emsakazweni ngoba ikhuluma ngamadimoni. Kuyangixaka lokho ngoba bayayidlala enezinhlamvu ezifana nayo.”Okhulumela iSABC, uNeo Momodu, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ivaliwe le ngoma kulo msakazo ngemuva kokuba Ukhozi FM luthole ukuthi le ngoma kaNuz Queen ethi inezinhlamvu ezinganambithiseki kubalaleli balo. Ngemuva kokukhulumisana noNuz Queen, ubuye waletha ingoma enezinhlamvu ezintsha, nayo esazocutshungulwa yikomiti elihlunga izingoma oKhozini,” kusho uNeo. UNuz Queen usole ukuthi uKhozi selungene impi ephakathi kwakhe noDJ waseKapa u-Ed Harris. Lo DJ ubesola uNuz Queen ngokweba leli culo kuye futhi le ngxabano yaze yangenelelwa nawuBusiswa Gqulu noDJ Maphorisa. Kuze kwanezingoma eziqoshwe yilaba baculi bengcofana ngazo. NoManqonqo odume ngenoni elithi Eyadini, uthole ukuthi kunezindawo zobumnandi ezingafuni kudlalwe ingoma yakhe kuzo ngoba iqhakambisa indawo yodumo yaseMlaza. UMCULI wegqom’ uManqonqo okuvalwa ingoma yakhe ezindaweni zobumnandi Isithombe: FACEBOOK/MANQONQOIsolezwe ngoMgqibelo lithole ngemithombo yalo ukuthi kunoDJ asebevalwe kaningi ezindaweni zobumnandi. “Ngathi ngiyaqala ukuyidlala kwathiwa angidlale enye. Okubuhlungu abantu bayayithanda. Sithwele kanzima ngempela. Mhlawumbe kungangcono uManqonqo ashintshe isinhlamvu zayo, athi okungcono Uzongithol’eClubbin,” kukhalaza omunye uDJ. UManqonqo uthe naye usethathe isinyathelo sokuzishintsha izinhlamvu zayo. “Uma ngicula kwezinye izindawo angisasho ukuthi Uzongithol’eYadini kodwa ngibiza igama laleyo ndawo. Njengoba kade ngidlala eY2K, bengithi uzongithol’eY2K. Ngihlela ukuyocula kwaMax, nakhona ngizothi uzongithola kwaMax,” kusho uManqonqo. Uvumile ukuthi sekunesi-vumelwano asesenze nomphathi waseYadini uJabulani ‘Mjay’ Zama sokunandisa eYadini isikhathi esiningi.
title: Usole umbango kuvalwa iculo lakhe oKhozini

text: IZOLO kulalwe ngezindaba ezibuhlungu zokudlula emhlabeni komunye wezinkakha zabalingisi bakuleli, uCandy Moloi. Abaningi bazomkhumbula uCandy elingisa indawo kaVho-Makhadzi kuMuvhango. Izindaba zokuwa kwalomuthi omkhulu zidalulwe ngabeTV Mzansi kodwa zaqinisekiswa ngumdidiyeli omkhulu walo mdlalo, uDuma KaNdlovu ezindabeni zakwaSABC. UCandy wake wahlabana ngomklomelo weBest Supporting Actress kumaSouth African Film and Television Awards ngo2009 ngenxa yobuchule ekulingiseni indawo kaMakhadzi. Ngaphandle koMuvhango, uCandy ubuye wadlala indawo kaFhatu Neluvhola kwiThola ngo2004, waba nguMaModumedi Death of a Queen ngo2008, walingisa indawo kaGranny Rambau kwiRing of Lies, walingisa ekaMakhadzi kwiStikvel nekaVjo-Phophi Baloyi kwiGiyani.Ubengunina kaLerato Zah Moloi owayelingisa indawo kaRefiloe kuMuvhango. Kubantu abadlulise amazwi enduduzo kubalwa uFlorence Masebe owayenguHumbulani kuMuvhango othe "Kufa awunamahloni." Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela kungakaziwa imbangela yokushona kukaCandy.Khonamanjalo ngeSonto kushone omunye umlingisi weSkeem Saam, uKarabo Makhobela (40) obedlala indawo kaJazzy T. Lezi zindaba zidalulwe ngabadidiyeli balo mdlalo.
title: Kushone enye yezinkakha zabalingisi bakuleli

text: UKHALA ngokuba seholidini kwabadali bakhe umqeqeshi weSuperSport United, u-Eric Tinkler, athe kubonakele ngendlela abadlale ngayo bebhaxabulwa yiBaroka FC emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngempelasonto.I-United, obese kungumdlalo wesithathu ingawini kwiligi, ishaywe ngo 3-1 ngempelasonto. Amagoli eBaroka, enyukele endaweni yesithathu kwi-log njengoba ingelinye lamaqembu anamaphuzu angu-22, ashaywe uLucky Nguzana, Letladi Madubanya noMduduzi Mdantsane. Ele-United okube elokulinganisa kuba ngu 1-1, lishaywe u-Ezubuike Egwuekwe.U-Egwuekwe ubengaqali ukusiza leli qembu njengoba alitholela elokulinganisa ngemizuzu yokugcina bebhekene neCape Town City emasontweni edlule. Ngemuva komdlalo weCity, Amatsatsantsa a Pitori ashaywe yiFree State Stars ngo 1-0 ekuhambeni njengoba esethola esinye isibhaxu.Iqembu likaTinkler lidlala imidlalo yeligi yokukhava ngemuva kokusala ngemuva liyibambe kwiCAF Confederation Cup lapho lihambe laze lahlulwa kowamanqamu ngenyanga edlule.Ephawula kwithelevishini ngemuva komdlalo uTinkler, okuyisizini yakhe yokuqala kwi-United, uthe uyakuqonda ukuthi abadlali kubakhandlile emoyeni nasemiqondweni ukwehlulwa kowamanqamu kodwa kumele babhukule.“Ngeke ngithi benziwa ukukhathala kodwa ngibona abantu asebevele bezitshelile ukuthi basemaholidini. Ngiyazi ukuthi bayadinga ukuyophumula kodwa abangacashi ngalokho, iningi labo alisakwazi ukulinda. Bangabadlali abasezingeni elikhokhelayo kumele benze kangcono. Angicabangi ukuthi sikwenzile lokho emidlalweni emithathu edlule,” kusho uTinkler.Kusasa bazovakashela iBloemfontein Celtic, eDr Molemela Stadium ngo-7.30 ebusuku okuwumdlalo wokugcina onyakeni.Yize iCeltic izobe iphuma endukwini ka 4-1 eyithole kwiMamelodi Sundowns ngempelasonto ekuhambeni, izobe ibuyela enkundleni yayo esanda kuthela kuyona othulini iFree State Stars ngo 3-0.Kuwona lo mdlalo kuzobe sekubuye nomqeqeshi wayo uVeselin Jelusic obengekho ngempelasonto.“Ngomunye umdlalo onzima lona. Ngishilo ukuthi wonke umdlalo manje ufana nowamanqamu. Amaqembu aseyasazi ngakho afuna ukusiwisa phansi. Kumele simelane nawo, uma ungakwenzi lokho ngeke uyiwine le ligi lapho kungekho qembu elingahlulwa wukushaya elinye uma lizimisele,” kusho uTinkler.
title: UTinkler ukhala ngokuphela komdlandla kubadlali bakhe

text: UROBERT Du Preez oqeqesha iCell C Sharks eyibamba kwiVodacom Super Rugby, ushintsha ebusweni uma ekhuluma ngomdlalo wabo nosokhaya neVodacom Bulls ozoba ngoMgqibelo, eKings Park ngo-3.15 ntambama.Okwenza lo mqeqeshi ashintshe ebusweni wukuthi iBulls ishaye ezakhe ngo 37-14 emasontweni amabili edlule kulo mqhudelwano. UDu Preez uthe useyakwazi okwabashayisa ePitoli, wathi njengoba iBulls izovakashela eThekwini, izozibona ukuthi ifana nobani.ISharks ishaye iMelbourne Rebels yase-Australia ngo 28-14 ngoMgqibelo eKing’s Park, emdlalweni obungenazo iziwombe eziningi. Ama-try eSharks, ashaywe uDaniel du Preez, Robert du Preez noMakazole Mapimpi kwathi aweRebels ashaywa uTom English noJack Maddocks.Nakuba oShaka bengadlalanga kahle njengokwejwayelekile nxa besekhaya, kodwa uDu Preez uthe ujabule ngokuthi bathole amaphuzu aphelele kulo mdlalo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, iBulls yona ithole isibhaxu sika 56-20 ishaywa iWaikato Chiefs yaseNew Zealand emdlalweni obuseLoftus Versfeld, ePitoli.Ebuzwa ngobunzima bomdlalo wezakhe neBulls, uDu Preez uzwakale njengomuntu ojabule ukuthi bazodlalela ekhaya “nesitha sabo esidala”.“Kufanele bakhumbule ukuthi yibona abavakashela thina. Bashaywe kabuhlungu yiChiefs, ngakho ngilindele ukuthi basithwalise kanzima. Siyakwazi okusishayisile sidlala nabo, kungakho bekubalulekile ukuthi siwunqobe umdlalo wethu neRebels, ukuze sizofika kubona sisesimeni esihle ngokomqondo. Akumnandi ukushaywa emdlalweni wabakhaya ngakho kuzomele sizinikele emalungiselweni alo mdlalo wethu neBulls,” kusho uDu Preez ngemuva komdlalo wezakhe neRebels ngoMgqibelo.Ngokusho kukaDu Preez, uma ezakhe zingagcina ibhola isikhathi eside esandleni akekho ongamelana nazo.“Ngiyohleze ngisho ukuthi uma abadlali bami bengakuqonda ukuthi bayingozi kangakanani uma bengcina ibhola esandleni, singashaya noma ngabe ubani ophambi kwethu. Kufanele siyeke ukulahla ibhola noma yikanjani, yilokho okufanele sikulungise,” kugcizelela uDu Preez.Imiphumela yeSuper Rugby:Reds 36-14 Brumbies; Sharks 28-14 Rebels; Bulls 20-56 Chiefs; Sunwolves 24-37 Lions; Waratahs 20-12 Crusaders; Hurricanes 34-28 Stormers; Blues 33-26 Highlanders.
title: OweSharks usonga ngokubuyisa izinduku

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAISILOMO somdlali waseGhana, uJohn Paintsil, sizimisele ngokusiza iMaritzburg United inyuke ku-log ye-Absa Premiership kunendawo eqede kuyo ngesizini edlule.I-United iqede endaweni ka-11 ngemuva kokuba nesizini embi ecishe yavika izembe kuyona ngaphambi kokufika kukaSteve Komphela othathe kuClinton Larsen phakathi nesizini.UPaintsil (33), onemidlalo engu-88 kwelesizwe futhi obekhona eqenjini leGhana eliyibambe ku-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2013, usayiniswe inkontileka yeminyaka emibili kuTeam of Choice.IMaritzburg imethule ngemuva kokuthi ithole uKwanda Mngonyama noSibusiso Kumalo abebekuMamelodi Sundowns. Leli qembu lona lidayisele iSundowns uRheece Evans noMario Booysen kanti ukaputeni uMichael Morton usekuSuperSport United.Lo mdlali ufike kuleli nyakenye wajoyina iSantos kuNational First Division (NFD) ngemuva kokuthi ingazange ivuselelwe inkontileka eqenjini abelidlalela iHapoel Tel Aviv e-Israel.Ungumdlali oyibamba ohlangothini lwesokudla emuva noma esiswini. Udlale eNdebeni yoMhlaba eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2010 lapho amaBlack Stars efinyelele kuma-quarterfinal. Wayekhona nango-2006 eGermany bekhishwa yiBrazil kuLast 16.Uke wagijima nakuFulham nakuWest Ham United ku-English Premiership nokusho ukuthi ufika nesipiliyoni esikhulu ku-United eshiywe ngabadlali bayo asebemnkantshubomvu. ITeam of Choice ichithe uRobyn Johannes, Delron Buckley, Dillon Sheppard kanti uRubben Cloete ujoyine iBloemfontein Celtic. UBongolwethu Jayiya akubonakali ezobuyela eMphithi njengoba ebebolekwe kuBidvest Wits.UPaintsil ucashunwe emithonjeni yabezindaba yangakubo ethi ujabule ngethuba alinikwe yi-United.“Inhloso yami wukusiza iqembu lenze kangcono kunangesizini edlule. Ngiyethemba ukuthi sizokwenza lokho njengoba konke kubonakala kuhamba kahle ejimini. Ngikholwa wukuthi ngithathe isinqumo esifanele, ngizimisele ukuzinikela kuleli qembu kule minyaka emibili ngikulona,” kusho uPaintsil.Uthe akasoze ayikhohlwa iSantos ngokumnika ithuba lokudlala eNingizimu Afrika. Ku-United uPaintsil uzofica umkhaya wakhe uSarfo Gyamf oke wadlalela iqembu lika-Under 20 laseGhana.ITeam of Choice isanda kuchitha uMohamed Yakubu wakhona eGhana.
title: OwaseGhana uzimisele ngokusiza iMaritzburg United

text: UMHLAZIYI wezepolitiki, uMnuz Thabani Khumalo, uthi akuthusi ukubona iMeya yaseCape Town, uNkk Patricia De Lille, ibhekene nenselelo yokuthi ikhonjwe indlela yiDA.UNkk De Lille usolwa ngokufihla izinsolo zenkohlakalo kuMasipala waseCape Town.Engxoxweni neSolezwe izolo, uKhumalo uthe iDA inomkhuba wokuthi ifike isebenzise abantu kuthi uma isikuzuzile ekufunayo bese iyabalaxaza kuhle kwenyongo yenyathi.“Ngadideka kwasekuqaleni ukuthi uNkk De Lille wayijoyina kanjani iDA ngoba banemibono engafani, ikakhulukazi njengoba ephuma kwiPAC,” kusho uKhumalo.Uthe iDA yayihlose ukuzuza ivoti lamakhaladi ngokusondeza uNkk De Lille obeneqembu lakhe i-Independent Democrats.“Akusikho okokuqala iDA yenza le nto. Ike yakwenza nakuMnuz Joe Seremane naye owayephuma kwiPAC, owenziwa iPhini likaMnuz Tony Leon yagcina isiphelile indaba yakhe,” kusho uKhumalo.Uthe ngeke athuke futhi uma noMnuz Mmusi Maimane esekhonjwa indlela yiDA.Omunye umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uMnuz Bukani Mngoma uthe usenkingeni uNkk De Lille uma izinsolo abhekene nazo ziyiqiniso.“UNkk De Lille waziwa njengesishoshuvu esilwa nenkohlakalo. Uzokhumbula ukuthi nodaba lokuthengwa kwezikhali kuleli lwapotshozelwa yena waqhumbuza ithumba, ukunukwa kwakhe ngenkohlakalo akukuhle,” kusho uMngoma.Uthe maningi amathuba okuthi axoshwe uNkk De Lille uma izinsolo abhekene nazo ziyiqiniso.“Kodwa ngokumazi kwami uNkk De Lille angiboni elala phansi evumela ukuthi iDA izenzele umathanda kuyena,” kusho uMngoma.UNkk De Lille ucashunwe kwabezindaba ethi ngeke avume ukuthi akhishwe emsebenzini wakhe ngaphandle kwezizathu ezibambekayo.
title: 'Akuthusi okwenziwa yiDA kuDe Lille'

text: Lokhu kuvele izolo ngesikhathi kune-baby shower yengoduso yakhe uThobeka Majozi, ehhotela lakubo iNto’s Boutique Hotel eLa Lucia.Kulo mcimbi abantu bebengena bahlanzwe khona izandla bese benikezwa izifonyo. Abantu abebekhona bebelinganiselwa ku-25 futhi bephethe inqwaba yezipho ezihlukene.Phakathi kwabebekhona kubalwa uDJ Happy Gal, umdansi wase-Afrotainment osenguDJ uSlenda, Polo B, nonontandakubukwa weTheku uThah Simelane nabanye.Isolezwe elihambele kulo mcimbi, lithole ukuthi kulindelwe ukuthi ingane izalwe ngoSepthemba 11.“Uzoteta ngoSepthemba 11, okuwusuku olufanayo nokuzophuma ngalo i-AMN (i-albhamu kaCassper),” kusho umthombo osondelene nabo bobabili.UNto Majozi, unina kaThobeka, uphawule kanje: “Yaze yayinhle into yezingane.”UCassper ubekhona emcimbini wavela sekushaywa izithombe wabuye wasuka lapho bekunomcimbi khona. Izethameli zihlale isikhashana zaqala zagoduka kancane kancane.UCassper wabhala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoJuni ukuthi uzoba ngubaba.“Ngizoba ubaba noma yinini kusuka manje ngakho ngithathe isinqumo sokuthi i-albhamu yami ngiyethe ngokuthi yi-#AMN (Any Minute Now). I-albhamu iphuma ngoSepthemba 11 futhi ikhava ngeyesithombe sendodana yami esesiswini sikamama wakhe, omuhle. Mbheke, muhle njengobaba! Ngijabule ngale albhamu kodwa ngijabule kakhulu ngokuba wubaba kumfana omuhle,” kubhala uCassper.
title: Uzojabula ngokuphindiwe uCassper olindele ingane ngoSepthemba

text: Mbali KhanyileYIZE isixegisiwe imigomo yomvalelandlini kuleli, kuzoba nzima ukungena kwezivakashi eziphuma emazweni anesibalo esiphezulu sabahaqwe yiCovid-19.Lokhu kudalulwe izolo nguNgqongqoshe wezaseKhaya, uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi esithangamini nabezindaba.Phakathi kwamazwe angu-56 asohlwini lwalawo anezibalo eziphezulu kubalwa iQatar, Russia, Switzerland, United Kingdom, India ne-USA.Uthe kabavumekile nhlobo ukuthi bangene kuleli abeze ngokuzongcebeleka kepha ngabeze ngomsebenzi nabazotshala imali kuphela okuvumelekile ukuthi bangene.“Abantu abanenkinga yama-visa, abanomazisi besikhashana kanjalo nama-passport asephelelwe yisikhathi, bangakhathazeki ngoba seluliwe isikhathi sokuthi bawasebenzise. Umnqamulajuqu sekuwuJanuwari 31 wangonyaka ozayo,” kubeka uMotsoaledi.UNgqongqoshe wezobuDlelwane namazwe omhlaba uNkk Naledi Pandor, uthe abazongena kuleli bazohlolwa izinga lokushisa noma benayo incwadi eveza ukuthi bahlolelwe iCovid-19.Uthe uma betholakala ukuthi banegciwane bazozikhokhela bona izindleko zezindawo abazogonqa kuzo izinsuku ezibekwe nguhulumeni.UNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthe kusukela namhlanje umnyango uvulele lonke uhlobo lwezimoto embonini yezokuthutha.Phakathi kwazo ubale amaloli athwala izimpahla eziphuma kwamanye amazwe, amaloli enza imisebenzi yakuleli kanjalo namatekisi athutha umphakathi.“Osomatekisi nabashayeli bamaloli kumele baqikelele ukuthi bayaqhubeka nokulandela imigomo ebekiwe. Kubalulekile ukuthi abantu baqhubeke bagqoke izifonyo.”
title: Kunezivakashi ezingavumelekile kuleli

text: I-ANC ingase iphenywe kabanzi mayelana nohlelo lwayo lokusabalalisa izindaba ezingekho ngamaqembu aphikisayo ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi kukhankaselwa ukhetho lohulumeni bezindawo nyakenye.I-DA icele i-Independent Communications Authority of South Africa (Icasa) nenhlangano esingatha ukhetho kuleli, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), ukuba benze uphenyo.Zombili lezi zinhlaka izolo zithe zizolubheka lolu daba. I-IEC ikugcizelele ukuthi lolu daba izolubheka emhlanganweni wayo ozayo.“Singakuqinisekisa ukuthi sibe nomhlangano namalungu e-DA emahhovisi ethu eCenturion,” kusho i-IEC.“Ithimba le-DA beliholwa umholi wayo uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, i-IEC yona ibiholwa uSihlalo wayo uMnuz Glen Mashinini,” kusho le khomishini.Ithe umhlangano wabo ubusukela kwisigameko esenzeke ngo-Agasti nyakenye.“I-IEC ingakuqinisekisa ukuthi uMaimane uphinde wathatha ithuba lokuthi azwakalise isikhalo sakhe ngemibiko engesilo iqiniso esatshalaliswa i-ANC,” kusho i-IEC.UMaimane uthe i-IEC ithembise ukuthi izophenya ngesenzo se-ANC sokusabalalisa izindaba ezingekho.Ilungu lePhalamende le-DA uNksz Phumzile van Damme licele i-Icasa ukuthi nayo yenze uphenyo ngalezi zinsolo.Kodwa i-Icasa inqabile ukuphawula yathi ayiphenyi ngezinto eziphuma emaphephandabeni.I-Icasa inxuse uNksz Van Damme ukuba afake isimangalo ukuze isibheke.Isikhulu se-Icasa uNksz Nomvuyiso Batyi sitshele amalungu ePhalamende ukuthi bona balawula ukusebenza kwemisakazo kuphela.I-ANC isolwa ngokuqala lo mkhankaso wayo ngaphambi kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya.Umbutho kuthiwa ngalolu hlelo wawuhlose nokuqoqa imali engu-R50 million, uphinde uvundulule namahlazo ngamaqembu aphikisayo.Usomabhizinisi uNksz Sihle Bolani ubopha i-ANC ufuna * -R2.2 million athi ayimkhokhelile wona ngomsebenzi eseyenzele wona othinta lo mkhankaso.Okhulumela i-ANC uMnuz Zizi Kodwa akatholakalanga ukuthi aphawule izolo.
title: I-ANC ingase ingene enkingeni

text: BAPHAKAMISE iziketi kwavela amadilozi nezinqa abesifazane baseCornubia, ngaseVerulam abebebhikishela ukuthi bafuna ukuqashwa ukuze bahlanze umqwaqo ngoba sebenesikhathi bevolontiya kulo msebenzi kodwa kwaqashwa abanye.Laba besifazane abebevutha bengabaselwe, baphakamise iziketi bazibeka phezulu bekhala ngokuthi “kudlalwa” ngabo bengaqashwa ekubeni bebhuquza emakhaya.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe laba besifazane baneminyaka emithathu behlanza indawo yaseCornubia ngethemba lokuthi bazoba abokuqala ukuqashwa uma kuvela ithuba.Abanye besifazane bavele banyusa iziketi zahlala phezulu baveza amathanga nezinqe ngesikhathi kubhikishwa izolo eCornubiaUNksz Thulisiwe Ntombela, ongomunye wabebebhikisha, uthe baphoxekile sebebona kulethwa abanye abantu bezohlanza eCornubia.“Ekuseni namhlanje (izolo), sibone abantu esingabazi bezohlanza le ndawo. Besiqala ukuba kulethwe abantu lapha njengoba besingamavolontiya sizihlanzela le ndawo, ebingahlanzwa. Besinethemba lokuthi uma sekuvela ithuba lokuba kuqashwe abenza lo msebenzi sibe ngabokuqala ukuqashwa.Kusidinile lokhu sabe sesibaxosha. Sibhikishile ukuze kuzwakale ilaka lethu, savala nomgwaqo,” kusho uNksz Ntombela.Lo mphakathi uphinde wakhala ngokungabonakali kwekhansela labo uMnuz Syabonga Thango, nelingabalekeleli uma benezinkinga.Amanye amalungu omphakathi ashise udoti emgwaqeni ngesikhathi kubhikishwa.UThango uthe amanga ukuthi akabonakali ngoba uhlale enabo emhlanganweni wamavolontiya.“Udaba lwalabo mama abangamavolontiya ngiyalwazi futhi sekunesikhathi ngilubekile ezithebeni zikamasipala. Labo mama bavolontiya bacela ukushanela umgwaqo nokuwuhlelo lwe-Expanded Public Works Programme (EPWP). Ngabacela ukuba bame ukushanela ngisafake isicelo kumasipala ukuba bathole amathuba okusebenza ngaphansi kwe-EPWP. Njengekhansela anginawo amandla okuba baqasheke ngaphansi kwalolu hlelo, umasipala wathi awunaso isabelomali sokubaqasha. Sihlale nabo emhlanganweni eminingi ngibachazela lolu daba, kuyamangaza uma sebethi abangazi futhi angibasizi ngalutho. Kumanje kuvulwe uMakro ngenza isiqiniseko ukuthi bayathola ukuqasheka. Abanye bekufunwa u-matric kutholakale ukuthi abanawo. Nasemafemini abakhuluma ngawo ngiyaya ngiyobancengela ukuba baqashwe,” kusho uThango.Uthe uze wabacelela indawo ukuba bakwazi ukutshala, babe nezingadi, abanye kuthiwa bathi abazifuni izingadi bona.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt Colonel Thulani Zwane uthe kubizwe amaphoyisa ase-Verulam ukuzoqapha isimo kodwa alikho icala elivuliwe.Okhulumela uMasipala weTheku uMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, uthe bayazi ngalo mbhikisho wacela ukuba behlise umoya abaseCornubia.“Ngokwazi kwethu akekho umuntu owayethenjiswe umsebenzi , sinohlelo lwe-EPWP lokuhlanza kumasipala,” kusho uMayisela.
title: Babhikishe ngezinqe befuna ukuqashwa

pic.twitter.com/VC60Uktl4n— First Man (@FirstManMovie)Ifilimu ikhuluma ngomlandoowaqoshwa nguNeil Armstrong,eba ngumuntu wokuqalaukunyathela enyangeni. Uma ungumuntu othandaumlando ngomhlaba, ukwazingezinto ezithinta umhlaba nomanje usemkhakheni wezokundiza,ngeke uwezwe nokuthi ashonephilawo mahora amabili. Nami angiwezwangangaphandle nje kokuphazanyiswauphathina ebengihambe naye kulefilimu. Ungakhathazeki, unkabi azwelekuye amahora amabili ngobaakayena umuntu okhathaleleumlando womhlaba kodwa uyilenhlobo ezifela ngoMadea kaTylerPerry. Asibuyele kwiFirstMan. Ikhuluma ngesihlokoosekunesikhathi ngizitshelaukuthi ngiyasazi kodwa ngiqondileukuthi yisihloko enginolwazingaso. Bengazi ukuthi uNeilArmstrong (odlalwa kahlenguRyan Gosling), wabangowokuqala wasemhlabeniukufika enyangeni kodwabengingazi ukuthi wayehambanobani. UNEIL Armstrong kwakuyindoda yomuzi eganiwe inonkosikazi, uJanet, esivamise ukungakhulumi ngaye emlandweniBengingazi ukuthi kwamthathaiminyaka ewu-10 nethimbaleNasa belungiselela uhambooluyingqophamlando. Okuhle okwenziwe nguDamienChazelle, oqondisa ifilimu,wukusinika uhlangothi cishesonke esingakaze sikukhuthaleleukuluqonda. Lolo nguNeil Armstronghhayi i-astronaut kodwa uNeilArmstrong umuntu, ubabanendoda yomuzi wayo.  Uzomangala ukubona izintoadlule kuzo u-Armstrongngaphambi kokuthathe abekei-Apollo 11 enyangeni ngo-1969. %%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/FirstMan?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#FirstManis now playing in theaters and IMAX. title: I First Man ngeyabathanda ukwazi ngomhlaba

text: Izimeya ezimbili ze-ANC, uMnuz Mluleki Ndobe waseHarry Gwala noDkt Ntuthuko Mahlaba waseNewcastle, zikhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngemuva kokuthinteka amacaleni okubulala.UNdobe usolwa ngecala lokubulala owayenguNobhala-jikelele we-ANCYL uMnuz Sindiso Magaqa, uMahlaba usolwa ngokubulala uMnuz Wandile Ngobeni owayekwi-ANCYL esifundeni eMalahleni.Imibiko engazange iqinisekiswe izolo iveze ukuthi enye imeya ye-ANC oThukela ithathwe ngamaphoyisa iyophonswa imibuzo. Uma lezi zinsolo ziyiqiniso kusho ukuthi sekungokwesibili iphonswa imibuzo.Khonamanjalo, luhlale obala uqhekeko kwi-ANC ngemuva kokuthi iMeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede inqabe ukuxhawulwa nguNobhala we-ANCYL esifundazweni uMnuz Thanduxolo Sabelo izolo embuthanweni obuhanjelwe nguNobhala-jikelele wenhlangano uMnuz Ace Magashule ePeople’s Park eMoses Mabhida eThekwini. Izolo bese kusabalele i-video yalesi sigameko.Ekhuluma embuthanweni uSihlalo we-ANC esifundazweni, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe kunezinhlelo zangaphakathi enhlanganweni okumele zilandelwe uma kukhona ababhekene namacala.Uthe i-ANC ngeke igxambukele ukusebenzeni kwalezi zinhlelo.“I-ANC iyona eyanxusa ukuthi kusungulwe iKhomishini kaMoerane ebiphenya ngokubulawa kosopolitiki futhi iwona uKhongolose owacela ukuthi kujutshwe ithimba eliyisipesheli elizophenya ngala macala esifundazweni,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe bazoxoxa ngalolu daba namhlanje (ngoMsombuluko), wengeza ngokuthi ngokuhamba kwesonto bazobe sebememezela izinyathelo abazozithatha.UMagashule uthe bayabethemba ubuholi besifundazwe ukuthi buzolungisa isimo obubhekene naso sokuboshwa kwezimeya.“Ubuholi besifundazwe buyalusebenza lolu daba buzothi uma sebuqedile bese buyasazisa ngesinqumo obusithathile,” kusho uMagashule.UMagashule ubesesifundazweni izolo ezonxusa amavolontiya ukuthi awaphume ngobuningi akhankasele iqembu njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni.Uthe into ebajabulisayo wukuthi umbutho ubumbene manje uma uqhathaniswa nakuqala.
title: I-ANC izocacisa ngabasolwayo

text: Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uThemba akafuni kwaziwe ukuthi useshiyile ekubeni umfundi wezindaba yize iminyaka yakhe ibingasavumi.Lo mfundi wezindaba kuthiwa ugcine ngoMashi 30 kulo msakazo.Umthombo uveze ukuthi uThemba akajabule neze njengoba ngosuku agcina ngalo engavalelisanga ngisho kubalaleli balo msakazo akade sebemazi iminyaka.“Akafuni kwaziwe ukuthi uyekile manje ekufundeni izindaba njengoba engaxoshiwe kodwa iminyaka yakhe iyona engasavumi ukuthi abe semsakazweni.
