Uzokhumbula ukuthi uJabulani “Mjey” Sibisi wavalelisa kahle ngesikhathi sekufike isikhathi kodwa bakithi uThemba hhayi akakwemukelanga, naye uyasho ukuthi ubengakathandi ukuhamba futhi ubecabanga ukuthi udaba lwakhe ngeke luze lunakwe,” kusho umthombo.Omunye umthombo uveze ukuthi uzovaleliswa maduzane ngomcimbi omkhulu ozoba soLundi, nokulindeleke ukuthi kufike ozakwabo kuphela kuwona.Omunye umthombo uveze ukuthi uThemba udinwe uyaveva ngemuva kokuthi ebe nethemba lokuthi uzonikwa inkontileka kodwa konke lokho kwangenzeka.“Ubenethemba lokuthi uzonikwa inkontileka ezofunda izindaba njengoba kade kuyisikhathi sokhetho kodwa lokho kwangenzeka. Iminyaka yakhe nje iyona emshayile akukho phutha lamuntu kodwa yena kukhona abakhomba ngeminwe ngalolu daba,” kusho umthombo.Kulo msakazo emkhakheni wezindaba kunabafundi abasha okukhona kubo uMbongeni Somnyama Khumalo noSnethemba Hlophe.Ethintwa uThemba uthe usemhlanganweni.
title: UThemba akaneme ngokushiya umbhobho kuKhozi FM

text: .UNksz Masango omatasa neziqu zePHD kwiNuclear Physics eNyuvesi yaseWestern Cape, waqopha umlando eba ngowesifazane wokuqala ukuhola ithimba elalicwaninga ngenuzi ngo-2017.UNksz Masango uthe umkhonzile uNaomi Campbell ngoba ngaphandle kokuthi uwumkhangisi wengqephu kodwa unezinhlelo eziningi zokusiza i-Afrika.“Ngiwumuntu ofuna ukuthuthukisa izinga lesayensi eNingizimu Afrika nase-Afrika yonkana ngoba abafundi bethu abenzi kahle ezifundweni zesayensi. Lokhu kuzosilimaza ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ngoba kukhulunywa ngeFourth Industrial Revolution lapho imisebenzi isizogxila kakhulu kwezobuchwepheshe,” kusho uNksz Masango.Uthe unenhlangano esiza umphakathi iSenamile Masango Foundation egqugquzeka abantu abasha ukuthi bathande izifundo zesayensi, ezezibalo nezokubuchwepheshe.UFUNA ukukhuphula izinga lokuphaswa kweSayensi eNingizimu Afrika nase-Afrika yonkana ngoba okwamanje ayiphaswa kahle ngenxa yokungabi bikho kwezinsiza kusebenza Izithombe: ZITHUNYELWE“Inhloso yami wukwakha ama-laboratory ezindaweni zasemakhaya ngoba izingane azenzi kahle kulesi sifundo ngoba azinawo ama-laboratory. Ngifuna kube nama-laboratory ezindaweni zasemakhaya ikakhulukazi KwaZulu-Natal, Eastern Cape naseLimpopo,” kusho uNksz Masango.Ugqugquzele abesifazane ukuthi bangadumi ngokupheka ukudla okwehla esiphundu kuphela kodwa bangenise emikhakheni wezimali ukuze bafukule umnotho.Ubaluleke ngokuthi bangasabi nokuzivulela amabhizinisi ukuze kuhlomuleumphakathi.
title: Usosayensi waseKZN enkundleni noNaomi Campbell

text: UMQEQESHI weBaroka, uWedson Nyirenda, ukholwa wukuthi kukhulu okusafanele kulindelwe kuThandani “Bibo” Ntshumayelo ojoyine iqembu emasontweni adlule emuva kokuqeda isigwebo sezidakamizwa.UNtshumayelo ugwetshwe iminyaka emine ngo-2016 emuva kokunqanyulwa kwenkontileka yakhe kwi-Orlando Pirates ngenxa yokuvuma ukuthi wayekade esebenzise izidakamizwa icocaine. Emuva kokudonsa iminyaka emibili, ucele ukuthi isigwebo sakhe sibuyekezwe. Lokhu kuholele ekutheni iphulwe eminye emibili ebikade isele.Ngenyanga edlule uNtshumayelo, oqale wazilolonga neBidvest Wits, usayine inkontileka emfishane neBakgaga ezophela ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2018/2019. Ubekade esebhentshini ngempelasonto ngesikhathi iBaroka ihlula iKaizer Chiefs ngo 1-0 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership.UNyirenda uthe lisekhona ibhola ezinyaweni zikaNtshumayelo.“Ngibone umdlalo ophezulu kuyena. Ngosuku lokuqala efikile ukuzoziqeqesha ngabona okukhulu kuye. Ungumholi omuhle. Bengizicabangela nje ukuthi singabantu, siyawenza amaphutha. Bengidinga ukumbuyisa. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ngicabanga ukuthi uzobuyela kwiBafana Bafana. Kusekungi anakho. Siyasebenza kuye ubusuku nemini ukuthi anciphe. Usevele usenciphile, ubukeka ekahle manje. Sekusele kancane alunge.”Iholwa nguNyirenda waseZambia owayengumgadli weChiefs, iBaroka iqophe umlando iwina indebe yokuqala. Iwine iTelkom Knockout ihlula iPirates kowamanqamu. UNyirenda ukwenze lokhu ngesizini yakhe yokuqala eqeqesha kwiPremiership. Nakuba umlando umile kodwa ubhekene nenselelo yokuvikisa izembe iBakgaga etabalasa endaweni ka-14 kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-24 emuva kwemidlalo ewu-25.Emidlalweni eyisihlanu esele ezocacisa ngekusasa leBaroka kwiPremiership, izobhekana neMamelodi Sundowns (Ephreli 20), Free State Stars (Ephreli 24), AmaZulu (Ephreli 28), Bidvest Wits (Meyi 4), neMaritzburg United (Meyi 11).“Kufanele sibhekane nomdlalo ngamunye. Siphoxekile phambilini. Sidlala kahle namuhla kodwa ngakusasa sibuya singenye into. Akusekho ukugxilisa imiqondo. Kufanele sisebenze kakhulu kukho. Sidlala nelinye iqembu elikhulu iSundowns ngakho sidinga ukugxilisa imiqondo yethu kakhulu siqine. Uma siziqeqesha sizobhekana neqembu elikhulu wonke umuntu wenza izinto ngaphandle kokukhunjuzwa. Benza izinto ongazazi ukuthi bayakwazi ukuzenza.,” kusho uNyirenda.“Kodwa uma sidlala namaqembu amancane kuba khona ukuzithwala. Yilokho okusibeke lapho esikhona manje. Emuva kokuwina iTelkom sidlale emuva kwezinsuku ezimbili neSundowns e-Atteridgeville, sacishe sawina. Sadlala ekhaya nePolokwane sahlulwa ngo 2-0. Uyichaza kanjani into enjalo? Wukuzithwala ngoba sacabanga ukuthi sesibakhulu.”
title: ‘Kukhulu okumele kulindelwe kuNtshumayelo’

text: OWAYENGUMENGAMELI wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma ushaye wachitha kwiKhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana usihlalo wayo, uJaji Raymond Zondo echitha isicelo sakhe sokuthi ahoxe kule khomishini ngoba emsola ngokuchema.Ngesikhathi ephendula isicelo sikaZuma ngoLwesine ekuseni uZondo umchazelile ukuthi kusukela ekuqaleni wayazi ukuthi ikhomishini yabekelwa ukuphenya ngenkohlakalo kuhulumeni nakumabhizinisi kahulumeni. Uthe ukuvela kofakazi okubalwa kubo uMnuz Mcebisi Jonas, owayeyiphini likangqongqoshe wezimali abethula ubufakazi ngoZuma bekuphoqa ikhomishini ukuthi imbizele esitikini azobeka uhlangothi lwakhe.Uthe kuyamxaka ukuthi kungani uZuma kumthathe iminyaka emithathu ukuzwakalisa isikhalo ngokubekwa kwakhe njengoSihlalo weKhomishini.UZondo uqhube wasiphikisa nesikhalo sikaZuma sokuthi useke wabeka inkulumo enokuchema phakathi ngesikhathi ephendula ofakazi kule khomishini. Uthe ngisho ijaji enkantolo livumelekile ukubuza ofakazi imibuzo ukuze liqonde kangcono ubufakazi.“Ngiyasichitha isicelo sokuthi ngizihoxise kule khomishini,” kuphetha uZondo.Ephendula isinqumo sikaZondo ummeli kaZuma uMnuz Muzi Sikhakhane uthe ngeke besaba yingxenye yekhomishini. Uthe bazocela sibuyekezwe isinqumo sikaZondo ngoba ube yijaji odabeni olumthinta ngqo. Uthe bazombika kwiJudicial Service Commission ngendlela aziphathe ngayo kule khomishini.U-Advocate Paul Pretorius wekhomishini usheshe wamkhumbuza uSikhakhane ukuthi isinqumo sokushiya kukaZuma kwiKhomishini kuzobe kungukuphula umthetho kwazise kunencwadi emphoqayo ukuthi avele. Uthe kulele kuZondo ukuthi anqume ukuthi kuyaqhutshekwa yini noma cha. Kuthathwe ikhefu okuthe uma sekubuywa kulo uZondo wadalula ukuthi uZuma useshaye utshani ngaphandle kokucela imvume kuyena.“Sengitshelwe ukuthi uMnuz Zuma usehambile. UMnuz Zuma ubekhishelwe amasamanisi okuthi avele kwikhomishini kuleli sonto kusukela ngoMsombukuko kuya kuLwesihlanu ngaphandle uma evunyelwe imina ukuthi angaveli. NgoLwesibili abameli bakhe bacele ukuthi angaveli ukuze aye emngcwabeni, ngakuvumela lokho. Namhlanje uhambe ngaphandle kokucela ukushiya. Yinto engiyithathela phezulu le ngoba bekusamele aqhubeke afakaze aphendule imibuzo ngezinto esiziphenyayo njengekhomishini,” kusho uZondo.Uthe ikhomishini isazoludingida lolu daba kodwa ngeke isahlala kuleli sonto ngoba belihlelelwe ukuvela kukaZuma kuphela.
title: UZuma ushaye wachitha kwiKhomishini uZondo echitha isicelo sakhe
Umdlali weChiefs engozini yemoto

text: SEKUVELE imininingwane emisha ecaleni lenkohlakalo elibhekene nowayeyimeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede osolwa ngokukhwabanisa imali yethenda yokuqoqwa kukadoti nezinye izikhulu namakhansela omkhandlu. UGumede uvele enkantolo yemantshi yaseThekwini nabanye abasolwa ngoLwesithathu. Icala lihlehliselwe u-Ephreli 16. Enkantolo abashushisi bazise imantshi ukuthi uma sekuqaliwe ukuqulwa kwecala bazokwethula inqwaba yobufakazi obuvela emiqulwini, izinkulumo zocingo eziqoshiwe kanye ne-data engaphezulu kuka-200 gig etholwe kuma-computer. Phakathi kobufakazi obuqoqiwe, kuvela ukuthi imali ibisaqhubeka nokukhokhelwa ithenda lokuqoqa udoti nakuba isikhathi okwavunyelwana ngaso nomasipala sase sidlulile. Abashushisi baveze ukuthi ngokobufakazi abanabo, kuno-R181 million okhokhwe ngumasipala, ngaphezu kukaR208 million obekusolwa ukuthi yiwona kuphela odliwe. Lokhu kuthatha isamba semali okusolwa ukuthi idliwe ngenkohlakalo yaleli thenda isibeke kuR389 million, okusolwa ukuthi yaphelela emaphaketheni kaNkk Gumede nasolwa nabo. Okhulumela uPhiko lwezokuShushisa KwaZulu-Natal, uNatasha Kara wazise izintatheli ngoLwesithathu ukuthi kukhona abakuvuna ngokushaqa impahla yabasolwa nyakenye ngo-Okthoba kugasela oKlebe. “Lokhu sekusinikeze igunya lokuqhubeka nophenyo,” kusho uKara othe abashushisi basadinga isikhathi ukucubungula kahle ubufakazi ngaphambi kokuqulwa kwecala. OWAYEYIMEYA yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede ekhuluma nabalandeli bakhe ngemuva kokuvela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini lapho ngamacala enkohlakalo ngoLwesithathu. Isithombe: Doctor Ngcobo/African News Agency(ANA)UGumede ungaphandle ngebheyili kaR50 000. Waboshwa noMnuz Mondli Mthembu owayengusihlalo wekomiti lophiko lwezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu neNgqalasizinda kuMasipala weTheku. Kwaphinde kwaboshwa namakhansela amane, osonkontileka abathathu nezikhulu zikamasipala ngaleli cala.Ephuma enkantolo uGumede uzwakalise ukuphoxeka ngokuhlehla kwecala ebalula ukuthi njengomuntu okwipolitiki, akukho kuhle ukuhlale ulandelwa yizinsolo zecala. Ukhulume nabalandeli bakhe, abafike enkantolo ngoLwesibili ebusuku, wabazisa ukuthi abashushisi abanabo ubufakazi nokuthi sekuyacaca ukuthi kunempi yezepolitiki ayilwayo kodwa konke kuzocaca nonyaka.
title: Okusha ecaleni lenkohlakalo likaZandile Gumede

text: UMGADLI weBanyana Banyana, uThembi Kgatlana, uchaza ngesinqumo sokuqoka iqembu laseChina phezu kokuba ekade efunwa amaqembu asemazweni ahlukene.UKgatlana usanda kuqokwa njengomdlali ovelele e-Africa kwabesifazane, iCAF African Women’s Footballer of The Year. Ngaphezu kwalokho uthole umklomelo womshayimagoli ohamba phambili emqhudelwaneni iWomen’s Africa Cup of Nations (AWCON). Kuvele ukuthi usayine inkontileka yonyaka neBeijing Phoenix edlala kwiWomen’s Soccer League eChina.Izolo kuvele ukuthi ujoyinwe nguLinda Motlhalo abekade edlala naye kwiHouston Dash yase-America. Bobabili azivuselelwanga izinkontileka zabo kwiHouston.“Ngicabanga ukuthi indlela engidlale ngayo kwi-Afcon yenze abantu bafuna ukuzimatanisa nami. Kade sekuwukuthi imenenja izama iqembu elifanele. Kuthathe isikhathi eside ngoba abemaningi amaqembu abefuna ngisayine kuwona. Sithathe isikhathi ukuthola elifanele. Ngicabanga ukuthi elaseBeijing yilona elikahle. Iligi yakhona iyakhula, bonke abadlali bayakhona. Bakhona abambalwa base-Afrika asebevele bekhona. U-Odega (Francesca) no-Ebi (Onome) baseNigeria badlala khona. Iligi yaseChina iheha abadlali abaningi base-Afrika ngoba esikhathini esiningi kudingeka ukuthi ubenezinto ozizuzile ngaphambi kokuthi kubekhona okunika ithuba,” kusho uKgatlana.UKgatlana useqenjini leBanyana elizodlala emqhudelwaneni iCyprus Cup ezoba seCyprus ngesonto elizayo. Lo mqhudelwano uqhatha amazwe angu-12. IBanyana iku-Group A lapho ekleliswe khona neCzech Republic, Finland neNorth Korea. Izovula neFinland ngoLwesihlanu. Ngenyanga edlule iBanyana ikhombise ukuvuthwa ibambana ngo 1-1 neSweden. Ikhale ngaphansi ngo 2-1 kwiNetherlands.KuGroup B weCyprus Cup kuneHungary, Thailand, Mexico ne-Italy. KuGroup C kune-Austria, Belgium, Nigeria neSlovakia.
title: OweBanyana uchaza ngesinqumo sokuqoka elaseChina

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho eliwela umfula ugcwele ngivumele ngikhale ezimathonsi ngenxa yokugqoza kwentuthuko endaweni yakithi kwaNibela ekuMasipala iHlabisa Big5 False Bay ophethwe nguMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa.Ngisola sengathi ubaba uHlabisa usebenzela ngakubo kuphela ngoba kusukela ku- 1994, okungunyaka esakhululeka ngawo, kuncane okushintshile.Asinawo ugesi, amanzi nomgwaqo. Izindlu zomxhaso zakhiwa ngo-2009 zangaqedwa. Kweminye imizi kusele ukuthi kufakwe uphahla, kweminye bagcina ngokukhonka phansi kweminye kwasala izindonga. Sekushintshwe osonkontileka abathathu kodwa aziqedwa.Izikhulu zikahulumeni sizigcina mhla zikhankasela ukhetho kuphela kwaNibela. Intuthuko asiyazi sisele emuva kakhulu.Ngingajabula uma lesi sikhalo sami singaze sifike kubaba uHlabisa neMeya uMkhombo eMkhanyakude.Phumlani GumedeeHluhluwe
title: [IMIBONO] Kuncane okushintshile ngakithi kusukela izwe lethu lathola inkululeko

text: KUBATSHAZWA isihluku somlisa (28) waseNgwavuma okuthiwa uhlahlele unina okwembuzi emuva kokuthi ezame ukumlamula eshaya unina wengane yakhe.Lo mlisa wasOnaleni, eNgwavuma, ongumakhi, kuthiwa uhlahlele unina, uNkk Maponyane Timbane (56) ngocelemba ngoMsombuluko ntambama, emva kokuthi emlamule enengxabano nonina wengane yakhe abesehlale naye iminyaka emzini wakhe.Induna yendawo, uMnuz Ephraim Ndlazi, ithe basashaqekile ngenxa yesehlo esenzeke endaweni. Uthe uthole ucingo ngehora lesithupha ntambama lumbikela ngokubulawa kukaNkk Timbane.“Ngesikhathi ngibikelwa ukuthi u... (emgagula ngegama) useklabhe unina ngocelemba, ngizitshele ukuthi kuthiwa angiphuthume ngizolanda umuntu obedinga ukuyiswa emtholampilo. Ngishaqekile uma ngifika. Ubemhlahlele ngocelemba umzimba wonke kuhle okwembuzi. Bekuyinto obuyibuka kanye kube sengathi ungangaphinde ubuke,” kusho uNdlazi.Uyise omdala kamsolwa uMnuz Zifo Ntimbane oveze ukuthi ubizwe yinduna emuva kokuthi sekwenzeke isigameko uthe umsolwa ubevame ukumsabisa unina abuye amsole nangokuthakatha.“Unina bekungabonakali nokuthi ngabe ubenawo yini amehlo nokuthi ayengakuphi. Nasezingalweni ubemgencile. Bekuyinto engabhekeki,” kusho uNtimbane.UNdlazi uthole ukuthi uNkk Timbane ubehleli nonina wengane kamsolwa ngesikhathi kwenzeka lesi sigameko. Uchaze ukuthi unina wengane kamsolwa ubezobika ukuthi uyamshaya kanti umsolwa uzotheleka egcekeni esephethe ucelemba esuka kwakhe lapho behlala khona.“Ubuze unina ukuthi uyazi yini ukuthi babangani njengoba bexabana nonina wengane. Ngesikhathi eseqala exabana nonina, unina wengane ubaleke wathatha ingane. Kuyacaca ukuthi ukube akazange abaleke naye ngabe umenze okufanayo,” kusho uNdlazi. Kulesi sigameko kuthiwa ulimaze nomfowabo omncane obezama ukumvimba ngesikhathi ehlasela unina.Amaphoyisa kuthiwa agasele endlini kamsolwa ngoMsombuluko ebusuku amfica elele esekhumule nezingubo ezinegazi abezigqokile ngesikhathi ehlahlela unina.Kuthiwa ubenegazi ezandleni kodwa ephika ukuthi ukwenzile lokhu, ethi ubexabana impela nonina kodwa ubengeke ambulale. Umsolwa kuvele ukuthi ungumuntu obevamile ukuthi ahluphe novame ukuphuza utshwala.UNdlazi uthe namanje umphakathi wonkana uhlukumezekile ngokwenzekile okungangokuthi akazi ukuthi ungamenzani uma kungathiwa uyaphuma njengoba eboshiwe. Uthe umphakathi uthukile ngoba kuyaqala ukuthi kwenzeke isehlo esifana nalesi endaweni, futhi bafisa engathi kungaba ngesokugcina. UNtimbane uthe ufisa ukubona umthetho udlala indawo yawo, aboshwe angadedelwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Col Thulani Zwane ukuqinisekisile ukuthi umsolwa uboshiwe nokuthi ubhekene necala lokubulala. Uthe bekulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo izolo.
title: ‘Uhlahlele’ unina wahuqa ubuthongo

text: UMASIPALA weTheku usunxuse umphakathi ukuthi usukume ngokushesha ulungise indaba yokuvuselela izivumelwano zamathuna emindeni, asendaweni kamasipala.Okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Msawakhe Mayisela, uthe uma abantu bengezi kubona kuzophoqeleka ukuthi umasipala uwasebenzise amathuna.  Uthe abantu bangakwazi ukulungisa indaba yamathuna kusukela kule nyanga kuze kushaye uJuni nonyaka.Uthe lokhu kufanele kulungiswe ngoba babhekene nenkinga yokushoda kwendawo yokungcwaba.Uqhube wathi kunezindawo zokungcwaba ezingu-65 ngaphansi kweTheku, bese kuba ezokulothisa ezimbili kuphela ekubeni imingcwabo ingu-9 600 bese kuba u-1 200 wabalothiswayo ngonyaka.UMayisela uthe kumanje kunezindawo zokungcwaba ezine ezisebenzayo futhi nazo zingase zigcwale uma kuphela unyaka esikuwo. “Umasipala unegunya lokusebenzisa amathuna aseneminyaka engaphezu kuka-10. Isinqumo sokusebenzisa amathuna amadala siyasiza ngoba iyashoda indawo yokungcwaba.“Abantu kufanele baye emahhovisi akulawo mathuna omndeni ukuze bezosizakala,’’ kusho uMayisela. Uthe abadinga usizo bayolekelelwa yinduna yasemathuneni ebekwe wumasipala.
title: Umasipala weTheku ufuna kuboniswane ngamangcwaba nemindeni

text: IMANCHESTER United inqume iLASK ngo 2-1 kwathi i-Inter Milan yahlafuna ngo 2-0 iGetafe ngoLwesithathu ebusuku ukudlulela kuma-quarterfinal e-Uefa Europa League.I-United ibisiqedela umsebenzi ngemuva kokunqoba ngo 5-0 emlenzeni wokuqala ngoMashi kanti isizobhekana neCopenhagen yaseDenmark yona enqobe ngo 3-0 kwi-Instanbul Basaksehir.IMila ka-Antonio Conte, ilindile phakathi kweRangers kaSteven Gerrard noma iBayer Leverkusen.Iqembu laseGermany lihamba phambili ngo 3-1 kubhekwe emlenzeni wesibili onamuhla ebusuku.Emidlalweni yangoLwesithathu, bekushubile ikakhulu phakathi kwe-United neLASK, obekucaca ukuthi inethemba lokuphendula amatafula.U-Andres Andrade weLASK ushaye ipali kusadlule imizuzu engu-10 e-Old Trafford kanti omunye ocishe washaya inethi nguPeter Michorl.Nangempela kugcine kuyiyo iLASK eshaya inethi kuqala ngegoli likaPhilipp Weisinger ngomzuzu ka-55.Nokho asheshe abuyela kwasifuba amathe uJesse Lingard eshaya igoli lokulinganisa ngemuva kwemizuzu emithathu.U-Anthony Martial uqhubeke laph egcine khona ezisa i-United iqeda kwitop 4, eshaya elokuwina.Umdlalo we-Inter neGetafe wona udlalwe waba wumlenze owodwa njengalokhu kuhleliwe nge-Europa ezoqedelwa eGermany.Bebehlangene eGelsenkirchen.URomelu Lukaku, omunye wabashayimagoli babo, ube ngumdlali wokuqala emlandweni waleli qembu ukushaya inethi emidlalweni emihlanu yase-Europe ilandelana kusuka ngo-2004 okwagcina ngawo u-Adriano waseBrazil.Igoli likaLukaku lingene ngomzuzu ka-33.IGetafe icishe yayisa umdlalo kumaphenathi libekwa emlotheni we-Inter ngemuva kokuthi iVAR ilahle isitobha salo uDiego Godin ngecala lokudlala ibhola ngesandla.Nokho isitobha sezaseSpain, uJorge Molina, siyishwebile leyo phenathi.Iwachithile amanzi iGetafe ngomzuzu ka-84 uChristian Eriksen eshayela i-Inter elinye igoli ngomzuzu ka-84 elithinta okokuqala ibhola.Uhlomule ngephutha likaDakonam Djene ohlulwe wukukhipha umkhuba ekhaya.Elinye iqembu elizifake kuma-quarterfinal yiShaktar Donetsk eyehlule iWolfsburg ngo 3-0 ukulinda i-Eintracht Frankfurt noma iBasel.
title: IMan United ne-Inter kumaquarterfinal e-Europa

text:
UMthandeni uveze lokhu emakhasini akhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kanti ushiye iningi labalandeli bakhe lihlukene phakathi ngalesi sihloko, abanye bathi siyinhlamba abanye bemncoma ngokuba yingcithabuchopho. Bathe ubazi ukuthi leli gama lizokhulumisa abantu bese iyamaketheka i-albhamu.Ngaphambi kokuthi adalule igama le-albhamu uMthandeni bese kunesikhathi ethi abantu abaqagele igama layo.Ube esefaka ivideo ememezela igama le-albhamu waveza nokuthi uza eWorkshop eThekwini uzoyethula.“Bafowethu ngizobe ngiseThekwini eWorkshop ngoMgqibelo, zitholele iDog Style bukhoma phambi kwababukeli ngoR80 nje kuphela. Zonke izinkumbi zabalandeli bami zizobe ziphelele,” kusho uMthandeni othe ngemuva kokwethula le-albhamu uzodlulela ePlayhouse lapho eyokweseka khona imbongi uKwazi Nsele onomdlalo weshashalazi okhonjiswa khona.View this post on InstagramQuuuuuuuuu......zashaaaaaa..😂😂😂😂😂😂😂 sesiyodibana ngoMgqibelo ethekwini eGoli ngesonto shap 👍A post shared by 
Mthandeni Manqele(@igcokama_elisha) on Apr 11, 2019 at 10:04am PDTEphawula ngegama le albhamu omunye umlandeli [email protected]_wegqom uthe: “sengilindele ukuzwa uTshatha noZimdollar bebiza isihloko sale-albhamu emoyeini...kodwa nkunzi ngempela zishaphi ngesihloko esinje mfowethu?”[email protected] uthe: “...mina ngiyazi le ngoma ayisho lento abantu abayicabangayo. Kufuneka lokho ke umu ungumculi uhlale uqhamuka nento entsha abantu abazosale beyxaka ngayo befuna ukwazi ukuthi uqondeni uma usho kanje, ngyabonga mina.”[email protected] uthe: “Nithini kubantu abadala ngempela? Izovunywa odwa oKhozini le?[email protected] yena uthe: “Kungcono istayela sezinja ngoba lengoma izoculwa nayizingane.”Omunye [email protected] uthe: “Ake silungise IsiNgisi. Umkhuba lo eniwucabangayo akusiyo iDog Style, kuthiwa yiDoggie Style noma Doggy Style. Ukuthi Dog Style uzokuthola kwiCD ukuthi kuchazani.”
title: Bahlukene phakathi abalandeli beGcokama ngeDog Style

text: USEPHENDUKE isitha kubantu besifazane umlingisi omusha womdlalo weMzansi Magic, iThe Queen, uPabee Moganedi odlala indawo kaMamiki.Lo mlingisi odlala indawo yesingqazu sentokazi eyenga amadoda ukuze ayinike imali, usezakhele isigcwagcwa kubabukeli besifazane balo mdlalo.Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngeSonto uthe uthwala kanzima uma ehlangana nabantu besifazane emgwaqweni ngoba bathi abamthandi uMamiki.Uthe lokhu kuyamkhuthaza ngoba kuveza ukuthi le ndawo uyilingisa kahle.Emakha-sini eThe Queen ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ugxekwa kakhulu ngabantu besifazane, abanye baze bathi bafuna ahambe kulo mdlalo ngoba indawo ayidlalayo iyabacasula.Uthe usizwa ukuthi ungumuntu okhululekile, onomusa, ngakho abantu basheshe babone ukuthi akasiye lo muntu abambona kwithelevishini.Uthe noninakhulu akayizwa kahle indawo kaMamiki, uze ambuze ukuthi uphoqelekile yini ukuthi awaqabule okwangempela amadoda alingisa nawo. Uthe kufezeke isifiso sakhe seminyaka ukuthi abe yingxenye yemidlalo yabakwaFerguson.“Ngesikhathi i-agent yami uMiranda ingitshela ukuthi kumele ngihambele inhlolokhono yalo mdlalo, ngavumela phezulu. Bengihlezi ngikulangazelela ukulingisa emdlalweni yabakwaFerguson. Lo msebenzi ngangiwuzwa egazini ukuthi ngowami. Ucingo olwalungazisa ukuthi ngiwutholile umsebenzi lwangena ngalo usuku lwenhlolokhono,” kusho uPabee.Echaza kabanzi ngoMamiki, uthe ungowesifazane osemncane oqhamuka emndenini ongamile kahle waseMamelodi.“Uhambe kubo esemncane, wafunda impilo yokuba yiphanta. Uthanda kakhulu imali, wenza noma yini ukuze ayithole.“Yikhona lokhu okugcina sekumfaka enkingeni. Uyakholelwa ukuthi akasoze ahlupheka emhlabeni kusekhona amadoda,” kusho uPabee.Uveze ukuthi usazoba mningi kwithelevishini ngoba kunohlelo iThe Agent aseqalile ukuqopha nalo kodwa uthe, ngeke asho ukuthi luzodlala kwisiphi isiteshi.Ubonge abomdlalo wakwiSABC1, iTempy Pushas, abamvulela indlela kulo mkhakha wokulingisa ngokumnikeza ithuba lokudlala indawo kaLerato Bogatsu.
title: OweThe Qeen uzakhele izitha

text: ESIKHATHINI sanamhlanje akusekho lula ukukhetha iselula ngenxa yezinga lobuchwepheshe obuqukethwe amaselula amaningi abizwa ngama-smart phone, kusukela kwashibhile kuya kwabizayo. Eminyakeni edlule kuqaphelekile ukuthi sandile isibalo sabantu abasebenzisa ama-smart phone eNingizimu Afrika kanti lokhu sekuholele ekutheni kunyuke isibalo sezinkampani ezikhiqiza amaselula ezisezingeni eliphezulu kuleli. NgoMashi ka-2020, ngesikhathi kuqala ukuvalwa kwezwe njengendlela yokunqanda ukusabalala kwe-Covid-19 kuleli, inkampani yaseChina, iTecno, yamemezela ukuthi amaselula ayo asezodayiswa eNingizimu Afrika.Ngokocwaningo, ukuthengwa kwama-smart phone eNingizimu Afrika, Nigeria nase-Egypt, kunyuswe yizinga lamaselula abiza amanani aphansi kodwa aqukethe cishe yonke into oyifunayo kwiselula.Ngenyanga edlule ngithole ithuba eliyingqayisivele lokuvivinya enye yamaselula akhiqizwe yiTecno Mobile, iSPARK 5, ephume ngoSepthemba nonyaka.Into yokuqala engichazile ngale selula yibhokisi layo. Ngiyazi abantu abaningi abakunaki lokhu, kodwa indlela iselula ethulwa ngayo ebhokisini layo ibalulekile. Ifika ngebhokisi elikhulu, elingeke likufakele amahloni uma kungathiwa le selula uyithenga njengesipho sohlekisana naye, ingane yakho, noma uzithengela wena nje. Ngifake isithombe ngezansi ukuze uzibonele ukuthi bekumele ngiphawule ngebhokisi layo (packaging).Ngaphakathi kuleli bhokisi akuphumi iselula kuphela, ihambisana nama-HiPods H2 earphones, okungama-earphones asebenza nge-bluetooth.  Anomsindo ogcwele ama-HiPods H2 kanti okuhle ngawo ukuthi uyakwazi ukuwasebenzisa uma kungena ucingo futhi uma uwumuntu othanda ukuzivocavoca uyakwazi ukukwenza lokho engaphumi ngoba ayabambelela ezindlebeni. Ama-earphones aphuma nebhokisi lawo elisebenza njenge power-bank yoku-charger.Into evame ukubhekwa abantu abaningi uma bethenga iselula namhlanje yizinga lekhamera. ISPARK 5 igxile kakhulu ekuqhikizeni izithombe namavideo amahle njengoba iqukethe amakhamera amahlanu. Inamakhamera amane ngemuva, neyodwa yama- ‘selfie’ engaphambili.Kwamane angemuva iqukethe ehamba phambili ewu-13MP, ewu-2MP yokushutha okuseduzane, iMacro lens ewu-2MP kanye ne-AI (Artificial Intelligence) Camera. I-AI Camera ifakelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kuphuma izithombe eziveza imibala yosuke ukushutha njengoba injalo. Ukuvivinya lokhu ngithathe izithombe ezimbalwa ukubheka izinga lale khamera.Ngaphandle kwekhamera, iSPARK 5 iqukethe i-battery ehlala isikhathi eside ingacishi. Iphethe amandla awu-5000mAh, okusho ukuthi ingahlala u-16 hours ukhuluma ocingweni ingacishi, noma uchithe u-14 hours ubuka ama-video ingacishi.Lokhu kuhambisana nosayizi wayo omuhle wokugcina amafayela eselula owu-32GB.ISPARK 5 sisebenza ngobuchwepheshe be-Android, okuwubuchwepheshe okujwayelekile kubantu abasebenzisa ama-smart phone okubalwa kuwo iSamsung neHauwei. Le selula iqukethe eyayo injini ngaphezu kwalokho iHelio A22 chipset yeMediaTek.Sekuhlangane uthola iselula esheshayo uma uyisebenzisa, kumnandi nokuthinta i-screen sayo ngoba silandela kalula okwenzayo futhi sinama-graphics agqame kahle. Bakwenzela umsebenzi ube lula ngama-App abakufakela wona, ikakhulukazi awakwa-google, kodwa uyakwazi ukuwasusa uma ungawathandi uzifakele awakho.Le selula uyakwazi ukuyivula (unlock) ngomunwe nangobuso (facial recognition).ISPARK 5 ungayithola ngoR2999 kulezi zitolo: Chatz Connect, Vodacom 4U, Cellucity, GAME, Hi store, Foschini, Totalsports naseTechX.
title: Ezobuchwepheshe | Sihlaziya iSPARK 5 egadla ngamakhamera amahlanu

text:
ABAFUNI athole ibheyili umlisa (28) waseWaterloo osolwa ngokubulala intombazanyana eneminyaka eyisikhombisa, ngoMgqibelo.Amalungu omphakathi akule ndawo, othisha nabafundi baseSibonginhlanhla Primary bamashe ngaphandle kwenkantolo izolo bethi akanganikwa ibheyili osolwa ngokubulala umfundi kaGrade 2, uSithembile Miya.UMnuz Laston Moodley kusolwa ukuthi ubulale uSithembile ngemuva kokumdlwengula kodwa usabekwe icala lokubulala kuphela, alikavulwa elokudlwengula ngoba kusalindwe ukuhlolwa kwesidumbu okuthiwa sitholwe sinqunu.Umsolwa kuthiwa ubengumngani kababomncane kamufi.Ubabomncane kamufi uMandla Myaka uthe usashaqekile ngalesi senzo okuthiwa senziwe obewumngani wakhe, abebenza naye umculo we-hip hop.“Ubeseke wangivakashela kaningana umsolwa njengoba besicula ndawonye siqopha umculo. Kwenzeka lesi sigameko nje mina bengisanda kuthutha kuleli fulethi ebesihlala kulo nogogo nengane kabhuti (Sithembile) lapho umsolwa ebengumakhelwane wethu khona,” kuchaza uMyaka.Ubabekazi kaSithembile, uNksz Zinhle Myaka obengakwazi nokuzibamba ekhihla isililo, uthe ingane kamfowabo ibulawe ngesihluku esikhulu.Uthe igwazwe esifubeni ummese waphumela emhlane yabekwa ephaseji ebhilidini lapho behlala khona.UNksz Myaka uveze ukuthi uyise wengane ushone ngo-2016 kanti unina wamshiya noyise esenezinyanga ezimbili bangaphinde bambona.“Kade sasimbheka unina kaSithembile, uNksz Thobsile Mila saze sabhala nakwelinye iphephendaba kodwa imizamo yethu ayiphumelelanga.”Uthisha kaSithembile, uNksz Nqobile Zungu waseSibonginhlanhla Primary uthe baphuke izinhliziyo ngokwenzekile, basabela ngisho nezinye izingane zakulesi sikole.“Ngifisa angayitholi ibheyili. Usengaze abulale ingane encane kangaka ngesihluku esikhulu kanje? Angayitholi ibheyili ngoba usengaphinde abulale enye ingane.”Othisha nabafundi baseSibonginhlanhla Primary eVerulam bayabhikisha ngaphandle kweNkantolo yeMantshi eVerulam njengoba kuvela umsolwa ecaleni lokudlwengula nokubulawa komfundi (7).Bathi abafuni ‘umdlwenguli’ athole ibheyili.Video: 
@KwandokuhleNjo2
#Sekwanele
pic.twitter.com/RH2omdgT1o— Isolezwe Newspaper (@IsolezweNews) 
July 31, 2018IMantshi u-Irfaan Khallil ithe okwamanje uMoodley ubhekene necala lokubulala, okunye kusaphenywa.“Inkantolo ibonile ukuthi bekukhona umbhikisho ngaphandle kwenkantolo, nikhumbule ukuthi inkantolo ayikhethi zinhlangothi. Siphinde sabona ukuthi baningi abantu abafuna ukulandela leli cala kepha inkantolo incane, ngeke ikwazi ukuthi ifake wonke umuntu,” kusho uKhallil.UKhallil uthe uMoodley uzohlala esitokisini kanti icala lihlehliselwe u-Agasti 10 nonyaka.
title: Bamashele osolwa ngokubulala umfundi

text: IKOMITI leMfundo ePhakeme, iSayensi nobuChwepheshe lizophenya ngokusebenza kweNational Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS) ngemva kokuthola izikhalo zokuthi inkohlakalo idla lubi kuyo.Izikhalo zenkohlakalo zivela kwiNational Education, Health and Allied Workers' Union (Nehawu).NgoLwesihlanu ikomiti belinomhlangano nesikhulu esiphezulu seNSFAS, uDkt Randall Carolissen, elimazise kuwo ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo nokungaphathi ngendlela ezivezwe yiNehawu.Kuvele nokuthi abasebenzi beNSFAS bathumele izitatimende ezifungelwe ezithi akulandelwa imigomo uma kuqashwa abantu.USihlalo wekomiti, uMnuz Philly Mapulane, uthe bashaqekile ukuzwa ukuthi kayilandelwa imithetho yokuqasha abantu nokuthi umuntu obeqokwe njengomlawuli ubematasa evulela abangani nezihlobo amathuba omsebenzi.Uthe umlawuli uvumile ukuthi wadlulisa amaCV abantu kwandabazabantu kodwa waphika ukuthi waba nesandla ekuqokweni kwabo.Bayisishiyagalolunye abantu okuthiwa bathola umsebenzi eNSFAS umthetho wokuqasha abantu ungalandelwe.Kubo kukhona owayefunda nomlawuli esikoleni, owayefunda nomlawuli enyuvesi, umfowabo womngani womlawuli, indodakazi yomngani womlawuli, umngani wenkosikazi yomlawuli nomshana womngani womlawuli.UMapulane uthe okubakhathaza kakhulu wukuthi umlawuli uvumile ukuthi wadlulisa amaCV kwandabazabantu.“Asikwamukeli ukuphika komlawuli ukuthi akazange abe neqhaza ekuqashweni kwabantu abathintekayo okukhona kubo abangani bakhe. Uma udlulisela amaCV kubantu obaphethe kunomyalezo ongekho sobala wokuthi kufanele kuqokwe labo bantu. Kungenzeka ukuthi awushongo ngomlomo kodwa uma umphathi ehambisa amaCV kubantu abangaphansi kwakhe kuyacaca ukuthi uthini. Ekugcineni umlawuli obebhekele ukuqashwa kwabantu,” kusho uMapulane.Uthe bafuna ukuphenya ngakho konke okwenzeka eNSFAS kusukela ekuthengweni kwama-laptop ngemva kokuqubuka kweCovid-19 kuya ezindabeni zokuphatha nokuqashwa kwabantu.“Siyayigxeka imizamo yokuqondisa ubugwegwe abasebenzi abalethe ubufakazi ePhalamende. Sifuna ukukhumbuza iNSFAS ukuthi abantu abethule ubufakazi lapha ePhalamende, bavikelekile. ngaphansi kwesigaba u-16 semithetho yasePhalamende ka-2004. Umuntu ozama ukuphazamisa umsebenzi wePhalamende ngokusabisa ofakazi uzothathelwa izinyathelo”
title: Kuzophenywa ngendlela yokusebenza kweNSFAS

text: ASIKALIPHONSI ithawula ngokuthi sizotholwa simsulwa ecaleni lokudlwengula isilomo sekwaito uSipho “Brickz” Ndlovu obuyele ejele ngoLwesihlanu ngemuva kokuchithwa kwesicelo sakhe sokudlulisa icala eNkantolo eNkulu yaseGauteng ngoLwesithanu.UBrickz wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-15 yiNkantolo yeMantshi yaseRoodepoort ngonyaka odlule ngemuva kokumthola enecala lokudlwengula umshana wakhe.Ngo-Ephreli inkantolo efanayo imdedele ngebheyili kaR80 000 esalinde ukuthi kulalelwe isicelo sakhe sokudlulisa icala.Ummeli wakhe uPiet du Plessis utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi isicelo sakhe silalelwe ngoLwesithathu sabe sesiyachithwa.“Ijaji uThwala likhiphe umyalelo wokuthi uBrickz azinikele ejele ukuze eyoqhubeka nesigwebo sakhe. Igxathu elilandelayo esizolithatha wukuthi sifake isicelo esiyisipesheli eNkantolo eNkulu yokudluliswa kwamacala eBloemfontein. Uma siphasa sizobe sesibuyela enkantolo siyofaka isicelo sebheyili sisalindile,” kusho uDu Plessis.Uthe yize lo mculi ephoxekile ngokuthi usebuyele ngaphakathi kodwa uyayihlonipha ingalo yomthetho.“Yingakho enze njengoba inkantolo ibimyalele wazinikela. Njengamanje sizolinda inkantolo yokudlulisa amacala.”Okhulumela iNPA uPhindi Mjonondwane ucashunwe ephepheni langeSonto ethi bajabule ngokuthi inkantolo eNkulu iqinisekise isinqumo senkantolo yeMantshi yaseRoodepoort.Njengoba uBrickz kade ephumile, kusuke omkhulu umsindo ngokuthi uzonandisa emcimbini wemiklomelo, amaMzansi Kwaito and House Music Awards. Abanye, okubalwa kubo noNtsiki Mazwai owaziwayo ukuthi akanqeni ukukhuluma akucabangayo, bebekugxeka lokhu. UBrickz uzakhele udumo ngezingoma okubalwa kuzo iSweety Mababy, Tjovitjo nezinye.
title: Akaliphonsi ithawula uBrickz enkantolo

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESEUKAPUTENI weSwallows FC, uLebohang “Cheeseboy” Mokoena, uthi abakhathazekile nakancane ngokungayinqobi imidlalo yabo yakamuva esigabeni seDStv Premiership.ISwallows eqeqeshwa nguBrandon Truter, iyiqale ngegiya eliphezulu isizini ka-2020/2021 nokufakazelwa wukuhlala kwayo endaweni yesithathu kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-29 emidlalweni engu-15.Ngaphezu kwalokho Izinyoni zinerekhodi elihle lokungehlulwa kweyeligi, ezilibambe neMamelodi Sundowns eqhwakele kwi-log.Kodwa-ke kamuva nje iSwallows ikuthola kunzima ukunqoba imidlalo yayo. Ngempelasonto idlale ngokulingana ngo 0-0 naMaZulu FC emdlalweni weligi obubhekwe ngabomvu obuseDobsonville Stadium, eSoweto.Ngaphambi kwalo mdlalo noSuthu, ezikaMokoena zibambane ne-Orlando Pirates, Chippa United, Sundowns neSuperSport United. Zagcina ukunqoba ngenyanga edlule zehlula ngo 1-0 iBaroka FC.Nakuba iSwallows inganqobanga emidlalweni emihlanu edlule kodwa iqophe umlando omusha ebholeni lakuleli ngokuba yiqembu lokuqala kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL) ukudlala imidlalo engu-15 lingehlulwa phezu kokuba kuyisizini yalo yokuqala kwiDStv Premiership kwazise ngeyedlule ibigijima kwiGladAfrica Championship.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uMokoena, uthe ukunganqobi emidlalweni yabo yakamuva akubafakeli nencane ingcindezi kwazise bona abaziboni besembangweni wesicoco seligi. Uthe bebazi ukuthi sizofika isikhathi sokuthi bangayinqobi eminye imidlalo yabo.“Ukungayinqobi kwethu imidlalo yeligi yakamuva akusikhathazi nakancane siyiqembu kwazise besibhekene namaqembu azimisele ngokuqukula indebe yeligi uma kuphela isizini. Thina kasizithathi njangabantu abanganqoba iligi kwazise lena yisizini yethu yokuqala sibuyile esigabeni esikhulu.Esikwenzayo nje kuphela wukuthatha umdlalo ngamunye sibone ukuthi lokho kuzosibekaphi.“Besazi ukuthi  sizofika lesi simo esibhekene naso njengamanje sokungayinqobi imidlalo. Esikujabulelayo njengamanje wukuthi sihlezi endaweni yesithathu kwi-log phezu kokuba lena kuyisizini yethu yokuqala sibuyile kwiDStv Premiership,” kusho uMokoena.Yize kunjalo, uMokoena uthe kumele bazithintithe balwele amaphuzu amathathu emidlalweni ezayo.“Njengoba singayinqobanga imidlalo yethu yakamuva kumele manje sivuke sizithathe siqale futhi siqoqe amaphuzu agcwele emidlalweni elandelayo.”NgeSonto iSwallows izobhekana neCape Town City ngo-3.30 ntambama eCape Town Stadium, eKapa. Lo mdlalo uzobe ungowamagqubu njengoba emzuliswaneni wokuqala, Izinyoni zadlula ngo 3-2 eDobsonville Stadium.
title: UMokoena akakhathazekile ngokungawini kweZinyoni

text: SABELO NSELEAKANALO itwetwe ngemiphumela ka-matric uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uKwazi Mshengu, yize ukufunda kuphazamiseke ngezinyanga ezintathu ngenxa yeCorona. ukufund. UBA  ukufunda kuphazamiseke ngezinyanga ezintathu kulo nyaka, uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, akanatwetwe ngemiphumela kamatric.Ngeledlule abafundi baka-matric abangaphezu kwesigidi baqalile ukubhala izivivinyo zokuphela konyaka.UMshengu uvakashele isikole eMgungundlovu, iNyonithwele Secondary, ukuyohlola ukuthi konke kuhamba kahle yini.Bangaphezu kuka-129 000 abafundi kulesi sifundazwe ababhale isiNgisi.eSingisi.Ekhuluma nabezindaba, uMshengu uthe akalindele ukuthi ukuphazamiseka kokufunda okwaba khona ngesikhathi sikathaqa, kube nomthelela ongemuhle endleleni abafundi baKwaZulu-Natal abazokwenza ngayo kulezi zivivinyo.“Sisebenze kanzima ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abafundi bayakwazi ukufunda lokho obekufanele engabe bakufunde ngesikhathi sikathaqa. Siphinde sasebenza kanzima ukusindisa impilo yabo kuleli gciwane.“Asilindele ukuthi kube khona izikole ezingeke zenze kahle. Ngokwethu sifisa engabe sibe nesikhathi esithe xaxa ukuze sicije kahle abafundi bethu. Ngebhadi isikhathi esibe naso yisona esisitholile, sabe sesenza okusemandleni ethu.”Ngonyaka owedlule kulesi sifundazwe izinga lokuphasa ku-matric libe ngaphezu kuka- 81%.UMshengu uthe bekunzima ukulungiselela izivivinyo ngoba iCorona ayikanqotshwa.“Siningi kakhulu isikhathi esilahlekile njengoba ukufunda kwamiswa ngoMashi. Sathi noma sesiqalile ngoJuni, kwaba nobuhixihixi njengoba bekubuye kumiswe ukufunda. Lesi simo esibhekane naso sinzima kakhulu kwezike sabhekana nazo selokhu kwaba unyaka ka-1994.“Siyakubonga ukuzimisela kothisha nabafundi abenze isiqiniseko sokuthi bayeza esikoleni nakuba isimo besinzima. Kuphoqeleke ukuthi bafunde izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ngesonto, kuzanywa ukuhlenga lo nyaka wezemfundo.”UMshengu uthe sebekhiphe umyalelo wokuthi abafundi baka-matric beze esikoleni nangezinsuku abangafundi ngazo ukuze bacijwe ukuthi balungele ukubhala izivivinyo ezilandelayo.
title: Akanalo uvalo ngemiphumela ka-matric

text: ISILO esisha uMisuzulu kaZwelithini, sizakhele ugazi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba abesifazane bencoma ukuthi uyigeza lensizwa.Isilo esimenyezelwe ngoLwesihlanu ngemuva kokufundwa kwencwadi yefa likanina iNdlovukazi Mantfombi MaDlamini Zulu,  ephakamise yena njengozohlala esihlalweni selokhu kukhotheme uyise iSilo uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu.Izintokazi zikhombisa ukumthakasela ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ezinye zimbiza ngoKing Bae, noeSilo esihle. Abanye bafake isithombe sakhe eduze kwezabo, bebuza ukuthi bayafanelana yini. Abanye bebezuza ukuthi ngabe iNdlovukazi uzoyikhetha eMkhosini woMhlanga ngoba bazimisele ukufika ngobuningi ukuze bazibeke ethubeni lokubonwa yiSilo esisha.KuFacebook ozibiza ngoFanelesibonge Mbule Sncengimpilo ubhale kanje:“ Ngiyazisola ngokungaziphathi kahle ngoba uMisuzulu muhle umuntu.” KuFacebook uBeAr'Lelíhle Sphíntlantla Ñtoolí uthe: “Muhle uMisuZulu futhi akashadile. Ngikhona.” Ku-Twitter uMrs [email protected], uthe: “UMntwana uMisuzulu muhle bakithi. Ngisho nomama wami ulokhu emncome njalo ngobuhle bakhe. Uthe muhle ngisho efake isifonyo.”Kwi-Twitter [email protected]_indoni, uthe: “Ngabe uMntwana wenkosi uMisuzulu ushadelwe yini? Ngibuzela abangani bami.Ku-Twitter uNM [email protected] uthe: “ We Misuzulu, ngiwuNoma, ngiyintombi nto. Ngabe ngingakukhipha siyodla isidlo sasemini?Abanye baze bafaka nezithombe zabo, begqoke imvulo bethi bakulungele ukuba nguNdlunkulu. Abaningi bafanise ukubukeka kwakhe njengomkhulu wakhe iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo. NgoMgqibelo esefake ishethi elifana nelikayise ayejwayele ukuwagqoka uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu, bathe uvele wafana kakhulu neSilo esikhotheme.
title: Babize Isilo ngoKing Bae besincoma ubugeza

text: UCIKWA abagxambukela ezindabeni zakhe umlingisi ogxekwa ngokuncelisa indodakazi yakhe esinonyaka nezinyanga ubudala. ULinda Mtoba usephumele obala wakhuluma ngokukhathazeka kwakhe ngabantu abahlala bephawula begxeka ukuthi usayincelisa ibele indodakazi yakhe uBean onezinyanga eziwu-15. Uthe kuyammangaza ukuthi abantu njalo uma efaka ivideo encelisa indodakazi yakhe bavele bababaze ukuthi isancela ibele nangazi ukuthi bahlanganaphi nokuncelisa kwakhe."Njalo uma ngifake ivideo ngincelisa, ngiyathunyelelwa kubuzwa ukuthi usancelisa abanye bathi akasemdala esancela. Lalelani ningizwisise kahle, okokuqala yebo, futhi ngiyaziqhenya ngakho. IWorld Health Organisation (WHO) iyakukhuthaza ukunceliswa kwengane izibe neminyaka emibili," kusho uLinda. Lo mlingisi ube esegqugquzela abalandeli bakhe ukuthi bazijwayeze ukwenza ucwaningo bafundiseke ngalezi zinto. "Kuningi kabi okuzuzayo ngokuncelisa. Kuyisinqumo sami futhi ngizoqhubeka ngikwenze izinyanga eziyisithupha. UBean unezinyanga eziwu-15 manje ngoyeka uma sengithanda futhi sengibona ukuthi noBean usekulungele ukuyeka," kusho uLinda.
title: Ucikwa abamgxeka ngokuncelisa ibele uLinda

text: UGWETSHWE odilikajele ababili neminyaka eng-20 ngaphezulu owesilisa waseMlaza olahlwe ngamacala okudlwengula abesifazane abathathu.USiyabonga Patrick Cele (32) owayephume ngoshwele ngoSepthemba 2013 enecala lokubamba inkunzi ehlomile, ugwetshwe yiNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini izolo, ngemuva kokulahlwa amacala okudlwengula amathathu, elokushaya nokuthumba.Ugwetshwe odilikajele ngamacala amabili okudlwengula, engu-10 ngecala lesithathu lokudlwengula, emibili ngokushaya neminye eyisishiyagalombili ngamacala amabili okudlwengula (ugwetshwe iminyaka emine icala ngalinye.)Kuvele ukuthi uCele wadlwengula abesimame abathathu, omunye wabo wamdlwengulela esontweni.Ummangali wokuqala (19) wathunjwa wadlengulwa ngesikhathi ezivocavoca emgwaqweni okuyilapho kuthiwa uCele wamdonsa khona, wamshaya, wamfaka esontweni ngenkani, wamkhumula wabe esemdlwengula.Ummangali wesibili (23) wayehamba nomngani wakhe kanti kuzoqhamuka uCele, wabasongela ngokubabulala uma bengenzi le nto ayishoyo, umngani oyedwa waphunyuka wayocela usizo, omunye wasala wamdlwengula.Ummangali wesithathu (14) wayezihambela wahlangana noCele owamfaka endlini yakhe ngenkani wamkhiphela ummese, wamdlwengula wabe esethi akazesule ngesikibha, wamphelezela eseya kubo.IMantshi uKaren Moopenaar ithe isiqinisile isigwebo sakhe ngoba izinga lokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besimame selikhuphuke kakhulu. “Inkantolo ayihambisani nokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane nabantu besimame njengoba selikhuphukile izinga lokubulawa kwabesifazane, le nkantolo iwathathathela phezulu amacala okuhlukunyezwa kwezingane nabantu besifazane,” kusho iMantshi.Ngesikhathi iMantshi igweba uCele ithe ibala nokuthi wayephume ngoshwele ngesikhathi ephula umthetho nokuthi abantu abadlwengula bahlukumezeke ngokomoya, ngokomzimba nangokomqondo.“Kubalwa nokuthi abantu abadlwengulwa ababili bayafunda, baphazamisekile ezifundweni zabo, ummangali wesithathu wamshaya waba nemihuzuko emzimbeni, wamlimaza.”IMantshi ithe okunye okwenza amacala abe mabi kakhulu ukuthi wayephume ngoshwele kanti namanje njengoba evele enkantolo akakhombisi ukuzisola nokuphatheka kabi ngalesi senzo sakho.Ithe yize ummeli wakhe (uCele), * -Adv Phumelele Danisa, wathi ayikho indlela emile yokubona ukuthi umuntu uyazisola noma akazisoli kodwa uCele ubengakhombisi nhlobo ukuzisola.IMantshi ithe uCele uzofakwa ohlwini lwabantu abangabadlwenguli kuleli. Kuthiwa ngeke aphinde avunyelwe ukuthi asebenze eduze kwezingane nabantu abangaphilile ngokomqondo. Uma efuna ukusebenza kulezi zindawo kuzomele afake isicelo enkantolo.
title: Odilika kowadlwengula esontweni

text: UVUKE umbhejazane wabhikisha ngaphandle kwenkantolo umphakathi waseMashona, eMahlabathini, oLundi, uphikisana nokuba kunikezwe ibheyili inyanga (51) eboshelwe icala lokudlwengula umfundi oneminyaka engu-12. Umsolwa oyinyanga endaweni kuthiwa uboshwe ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule ngezinsolo zokuthi udlwengule intombazane yakamakhelwane. UMnuz Siphamandla Shoes Buthelezi (51), ubevele eNkantolo yasoLundi izolo ngecala lokudlwengula. Icala lihlehliselwe uLwesine, ukuze kuzophuma isinqumo ngesicelo sebheyili. Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo osondelene nalolu daba ukuthi umsolwa wafike waphuzisa utshwala unina wale ntombazane, kuthe esephuze kakhulu unina wabe eselala emzini wale nyanga. Kuthiwa wayehamba nengane yakhe eneminyaka engu-12. Inyanga yabe isithi ayilale nezingane zayo le ntombazane. Kuthiwa yilapho le nyanga yanyonyobela ingane ezinye sezilele yabe isiyidlwengula. Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo ukuthi indaba ivezwe umngani wale nyanga eyayimxoxela ngesenzo sayo. “Umgilwa wamsabisa ngokuthi uma eke wakhuluma ngalolu daba uzombulala noma amthumele ngotikoloshe. “Ingane yabe isithula. Indaba isivela ngomngani wayo le nyanga, owaxoxelwa ngokwenzeka. Baxabene naye wabe esedalula zonke izindaba. Udaba lufike emndenini wentombazane, uma ibuzwa yabe isivuma ithi yayisatshiswa ukuba ingasho. “Ihloliwe kodokotela kwatholwa ukuthi idlwenguliwe ngempela. Kumanje umphakathi udiniwe ilesi senzo,” kusho umthombo osondelene nalolu daba. Ilungu lomphakathi eliphinde libe ngumholi we-NFP oLundi, uMnuz Sphamandla Ntombela, lithe impela abahambisani nokuba umsolwa athole ibheyili. “Besikhona impela enkantolo ukuze sizophikisa ukuba athole ibheyili ngoba izingane zethu asiboni ukuthi zizophepha uma ephuma. Lezi zinsolo zibucayi njengoba esolwa ngokudlwengula ingane elingana nabazukulu bakhe. “Kumele ahlale ngaphakathi kuze kube kuphuma isinqumo ngecala. Umphakathi ubulindele ukuba uyena ovikela le ngane,” kusho uNtombela. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt. Colonel Thulani Zwane uthe, “Kuvulwe icala lokudlwengula esiteshini saseMahlabathini. Umsolwa uboshiwe, uvele enkantolo namhlanje (ngoMsombuluko).”
title: Kuboshwe inyanga 'edlwengule' ingane (12) yakamakhelwane

text: I-SOUTH African Breweries (SAB) izoba nendumezulu yomcimbi ngoMeyi ezobe iveza kuwo izinhlelo ezoseka ngazo amaqembu esizwe azodlala emiqhudelwaneni emikhulu nonyaka.Lokhu kudalulwe yisikhulu esiphezulu seSAB, ekhiqiza iCastle Lager, uVaughan Croeser, esithe u-2019 kuzoba wunyaka omkhulu kakhulu kwezemidlalo. Amaqembu esizwe - amaBhokobhoko, Proteas neBafana Bafana - azodlala emiqhudelwaneni emikhulu.UCroeser uthe umkhankaso i-#SmashTheLabel, abawethule ngoMeyi ngonyaka owedlule, ungeminye yemikhankaso abayixhasile abeseka ngawo elinye lamaqembu esizwe amaProteas adlala nePakistan ochungechungeni lwemidlalo yamaTest.Nge-#SmashTheLabel iCastle izama ukubuyisa ubumbano kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokuthi baye ezinkundleni ukuyokweseka amaqembu esizwe, bangabukelani phansi ngokobuhlanga.EBidvest Wanderers, i-#SmashTheLabel ifake abalandeli bekhilikithi abawu-400 abangakaze balubhade emdlalweni wekhilikithi. Okunye okwenzile wukuthi bayaqinisekisa ukuthi kuba abalandeli bobulili obehlukene kanti nangokobuhlanga kuyalinganiswa.“Asifuni nokuyizwa indaba yokuthi abalandeli bamaqembu esizwe abezwani! Siyi-Castle siweseka wonke amaqembu esizwe futhi sigquqguzela ubumbano nothando. Uzokhumbula ukuthi iCastle ivutshelwa lapha ekhaya, akuyona eyangaphandle. Ngenxa yokuthi amaqembu esizwe ethu, axineke kakhulu kulo nyaka, sizokwethula umcimbi ngoMeyi, lapho sizokwethula izindlela zokuweseka, ezifuze i-#SmashTheLabel. Sifuna ukuthi ndlelanhle kumaProteas azoyodlala kwiNdebe yoMhlaba e-England naseWales. Sifuna ukuvalelisa iqembu lesizwe amaBhokobhoko azolibangisa eJapan kwiNdebe yoMhlaba. Sinethemba lokuthi iBafana Bafana izoyishaya iLibya siye kwi-Africa Cup Of Nations (Afcon). Nabo sifuna ukuthi ndlelanhle e-Egypt uma sesithula umcimbi,” kulandisa uCroeser.Uthe abathandi bezemidlalo akufanele badube amaqembu esizwe nxa engenzi kahle. Wenze isibonelo ngeBafana Bafana.“Siyazi ukuthi uma siya ezinkundleni noma sibukele emakhaya sisuke sifuna amaqembu esizwe anqobe. Kodwa akufanele nxa kungahambi ngokwezifiso zethu bese sigxeka noma sikhulume kabi ngabadlali. Nginethemba lokuthi iBafana izoyishaya iLibya, noma sithole okungenani iphuzu esilidingayo. Kufanele uphele umkhuba wokuthi uma iqembu lingenzi kahle, siliqede amandla ngokugxeka esidlangalaleni futhi singakhi. UStuart (Baxter), nokaputeni bakhe asibethembe ukuthi bazokwenza siziqhenye,” kugcizelela uCroeser.
title: Umkhankaso wokuseka amaqembu esizwe

text: Umcimbi wakulo nyaka uzoba ngoJulayi 6, ePeople’s Park eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini.UTira uthe lo mcimbi udinga uR6 million ukuze uhleleke kahle kodwa yena unoR1 million.“Into ebalulekile ngomcimbi wukubamba izinga lingehli. Akulula ukwenza lokho,” kusho uTira.Uthe usazama ukuxoxisana noMasipala weTheku ukuze uzoxhasa. Ngonyaka odlule kwavela ukungaboni ngaso linye phakathi kukaTira noMnyango wezokuVakasha kuMasipala mayelana nokuxhaswa kweFact Durban Rocks.“Bakhona abaxhasi kodwa abenele. Kunabantu abangekho esifunayo ukuthi babe khona. Yize kunjalo kodwa siyaqhubeka. Lona wumcimbi omdala edolobheni futhi singenza olukhulu inqobo nje uma sithola ukwesekwa okufanele. Ngalokhu okuncane esinakho siyakwazi ukuqasha amaciko esiwaqashayo sithuthukise amanye,” kusho uTira.Ubonge abantu ngokweseka umcimbi wakhe wathi ngemali yamathikithi bayakwazi ukunciphisa izindleko zingagamanxi kakhulu ephaketheni lakhe.IFact Durban Rocks yakulo nyaka kuzoba wunyaka wesishiyagalolunye ikhona. Abaculi asebeqinisekisiwe ukuthi bazoba khona kubalwa kubo * -AKA, Sjava, Kwesta, Lady Zamar, A Reece, NaakMusiq, TNS, OkMalumkoolkat, Beast, Busiswa, Babes Wodumo, Culoe De Song, Dladla Mshunqisi, Tipcee, Duncan, Shimza nabanye abaningi.Amathikithi aseqalile ukudayisa eWebtickets nasePick * Pay ngemali eqala kuR150.UTira ubuye waveza ukuthi sebeqalile namalungiselelo etende lakhe kwiDurban July ngosuku olufanayo.“Siyakwazi esisuke sikwenza ngokujabula abantu futhi bazobuthola ubumnandi ababudingayo. Nokuphepha kwabo kuseqhulwini kithi.”
title: Udinga uxhaso uDJ Tira ngeFact Durban Rocks

text: Kugujwa iminyaka engu-25 kwaba khona amaSama. Kuzobhekwa emuva ezintweni ezahlukene ezenzeke kuwona.UBob Mabena noMelanie Bala abazakhela igama bethula uhlelo lomculo iStudio Mix, ngabanye abazoba ngabethuli bohlelo.Lokhu bazokwenza ngokubambisana noTwasa Seoke, Khuli Chana, Mpho Popps, Nomzamo Mbatha noHulisani Ravele.UBob noMalanie bazongena esiteji bakhumbuze abantu bakuleli ukuthi wawunjani umculo ngeminyaka yama-90s futhi iziphi izingoma ezazidla ubhedu.UTwasa Seoke noKhuli Chana bazobheka umculo owadlisa ngeminyaka yama-2000s negalelo lwalo kule ndima. UNomzamo noMpho bona bazobheka ngemuva kuka-2010 ukuthi indima yomculo yahamba kanjani, bazophinde baphathe uhlelo nokuyibona abazobiza osaziwayo abazomemezela izindondo.UHulisani uzobe ephethe uhlelo lomcimbi wangoLwesihlanu njengoba uzodonsa izinsuku ezimbili.Isikhulu samaSama uNhlanhla Sibisi sithe ibingekho enye indlela yokubungaza le minyaka ngaphandle kokukhumbuza abantu la kuphunywa khona.“Laba abazophatha lo mcimbi benze izinto ezinkulu ezihlukene kuleli kungakho sikhethe bona ukuthi benze okuhlukene kulo mcimbi,” kuchaza uNhlanhla.NgoMgqibelo umcimbi uyobe usakazwa kuSABC1 ngo-8 ebusuku. Amathikithi alo mcimbi ayatholakala eTicket Pro ngo-R415.
title: Osaziwayo abasha nabadala kumaSama

text: LIHLEHLELE  isonto elizayo icala lo msolwa kwelokubulawa kwesitshudeni saseDurban University of Technology (DUT) obevele enkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini ngoLwesithathu.UMnuz Msizi Mbutho (29) oboshwe ngecala lokubulala uSandile Ndlovu (18) obenza iziqu ze-Industrial Engineering e-DUT, bekulindeke ukuthi avele ngoLwesine eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini.Ngokwesitatimende esithunyelelwe abezindaba ngokhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uBrigadier Jay Naiker, besiqinisekisa ukuthi msolwa  uvela ngoLwesine,  kodwa Isolezwe lifika kule nkantolo lithole ukuthi umsolwa uvele ngoLwesithathu.Ngokwamaphepha asenkantolo, umsolwa ubhekene namacala amabili,  elokubulala nelokubamba inkunzi.  Lawa maphepha aveza ukuthi umsolwa uzohlala ezikhindini izinsuku eziyisikhombisa kusenziwa uphenyo. Icala lihlehlele uNovemba 6 nalapho kulindeleke ukuthi umsolwa afake isicelo sebheyili.UMbutho obefunwa uthuli ngamaphoyisa  kuthiwa  ngesikhathi eboshwa ngoMsombuluko utholakale nommese  neselula okukholakala ukuthi ukuthi ngekamufi.UNaiker uthe ngaphambi kokuthi umsolwa aboshwe amaphoyisa aqale ampheka ngemibuzo.USandile wahlaselwa esegumbini lokufundela e-DUT wagwazwa kanzima.  Uphuthunyiswa esibhedlela lapho ehlale khona kwikhoma ephefumula ngemishini izinsukwana ngaphambi kokuthi ashone.  Umbiko kadokodela othulelwe Inkantolo ngokuhlolwa kwesidumbu sikaSandile uveza ukuthi umufi washaywa ngento esansimbi ekhanda ngaphambi kokugwazwa.
title: Uzobuyela enkantolo ngelizayo osolwa ngokubulala isitshudeni saseDUT

text: SESIPHENDUKE umantunta nendishi ngenxa yokungalutholi usizo isitshudeni esiphothule izifundo zeManagement Assistant kodwa asizitholi iziqu zeDiploma eMnyangweni weMfundo ePhakeme.UThabiso Ntlou (28) uthe ngo-2015 uqale izifundo zakhe eCoastal KZN TVet College esikhungweni esiseMlaza kwa-BB okumthathe izinyanga eziwu-18.Ube eseya esibhedlela ePrince Mshiyeni Memorial eyocijwa ngolwazi nakhona wachitha izinyanga eziwu-18.Emuva kokuphothula ukufunda kwakhe uthe ube esegcwalisa ifomu yeDiploma ayihlanganise nencwadi yaseMshiyeni eqinisekisa ukuthi ubecijwa khona ngekhono lomsebenzi nezitifiketi zakhe zaseCoastal wakuthumela emnyangweni ePitoli.“Lokhu ngikwenze ngoJuni nonyaka bangitshela ukuthi ngizolinda isikhathi esiyizinyanga ezintathu. Kuze kube yimanje angitholi lutho. Kuthe uma ngilandelela ngathola ukuthi abasePitoli bathi akuveli lutho kumakhompyutha abo mayelana nokufunda kwami,” kusho uNtlou.Uthe okwenzekayo kumfikisela ngezinyembezi futhi sekumqhathe nabazali kwamdalela ukhwantalala ngoba akasathembekile emndenini futhi uhlezi ecabanga ngale nto ngaso sonke isikhathi.“Abantu esaqala nabo ukufunda bayasebenza manje mina ngilinde into engingazi noma ngiyoke ngiyithole ngoba angisizakali ndawo. Ngihlezi ngiphuthwa imisebenzi ngoba ayiphumi iDiploma yami nesikhungo ebengifunda kusona asingisizi ngalutho,” kusho uNtlou othe usezinhlelweni zokuya emahhovisi omnyango ePitoli ayobuza ngokubambe ukuthi kuphume iDiploma yakhe.UDkt Phakama Langa, uthishanhloko obambile eCoastal, uthe ngokuthola kwabo isitshudeni sisifakile ngoJuni 14 isicelo sokuthola iDiploma emnyangweni.ULanga uthe nakuba ukukhishwa kwamaDiploma kungewona umsebenzi wekolishi labo kodwa ngeke basonge izandla babukele ngoba uNtlou ubeyisitshudeni sabo.“Isitshudeni siyaye silinde isikhathi esiyizinyanga ezintathu kuya kweziyisithupha emuva kokufaka isicelo sokuthola iDiploma yaso.“Siyazibophezela ukuthi sizobheka emnyangweni ukuthi yini ebambezele ukuphuma kweDiploma yakhe,” kusho uLanga.Okhulumela uMnyango weMfundo ePhakeme, uMnuz Ishmael Mnisi, uthe kuyethusa ukuthi isitshudeni asilutholi usizo lapho besifunda khona.Ube esecela ukuthunyelelwa yonke imininingwane yesitshudeni nge-email ukuze babheke ukuthi kwenzekani.“Sizolusukumela udaba lwesitshudeni esithintekayo. Ikolishi kumele ngabe liyasitshela isitshudeni ukuthi kubambeni njengoba singayitholi iDiploma yaso,” kusho uMnisi.Uqhube wathi iPhini loMqondisi jikelele emnyangweni lisebenzisana nezikhulu kuzo zonke izifundazwe ezibhekene nokwenzeka emakolishi kuhlanganisa nokukhishwa kwezitifiketi wumnyango kuzwelonke.
title: Inkinga ngeDiploma yesitshudeni

text: USATHUKILE umphakathi waseMount Moriah, eThekwini, kulandela ukudutshulwa kowesilisa osemncane okuthiwa udutshulwe ngusomatekisi okuthiwa umsole ngokuthi uthandana nendodakazi yakhe.Umufi (20) ushone esendleleni eya esibhedlela ehanjiswa ngumsolwa.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi usomatekisi, okuthiwa owaseNanda, ugasele ngakubo kamufi ehamba emfuna ngempelasonto.Kuthiwa umthole kubangani wafike wamhloma imibuzo ngokuthi uyathandana yini nendodakazi yakhe.Kuthiwa umufi uphikile wathi ubesashela. Usomatekisi ube esexabana nomufi, okuthiwa uguqe ngamadolo exolisa. Umsolwa kuthiwa uvele wakhipha isibhamu wadubula umufi entanyeni.Kuthiwa esebone ukuthi umlimazile, uthukile wamthatha wamfaka emotweni yakhe emphuthumisa esibhedlela kanti uzoshonela endleleni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt. Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe kuboshwe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-41 ngecala lokubulala.“Amaphoyisa asePhoenix abophe umsolwa oneminyaka engu-41 ngecala lokubulala owesilisa oneminyaka engu-20 eMount Moriah. Umufi udutshuliwe, waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela kodwa washona. Umsolwa uvele enkantolo yaseVerulam ngoMashi 4,” kusho uZwane.Uthe amaphoyisa awakabi nemiphumela yasenkantolo njengoba idokodo lisagcinwe enkantolo.Khonamanjalo, inkantolo yaseShowe igwebe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-25 udilikajele ngecala lokudlwengula umzala wakhe oneminyaka engu-33 okhubazekile.Umdlwenguli, igama lakhe esingeke silidalule ukuvikela umgilwa, ugwetshwe ngoMsombuluko.Isigameko senzeka ngoJanuwari 1 ngo-2018, eNhlababo, eGingindlovu.Ngokolwazi olusenkantolo, abafowabo bakamgilwa ababili babebuya kozijabulisa kukade kuhlukaniswa unyaka. Bafika ngo-4 ekuseni babona indlu kamfowabo ophazamisekile ngokomqondo ivuliwe.Bangena endlini yakhe ngenhloso yokubheka ukuthi ngabe konke kuhamba kahle yini bakhanyisa ugesi. Bathuka sebezithela phezu kukamfowabo ekhunyuliwe kwesingezansi, bafica nomzala wabo enqunu ngakwesingezansi. Bambuza ukuthi ngabe udlwengule umfowabo yini. Umzala kuthiwa wavele wangaphika, wacela ukuba babize amaphoyisa. Abikelwa amaphoyisa aseGingindlovu, kwavulwa icala lokudlwengula. Labe selidluliselwa ophikweni lwaseShowe oluphenya amacala odlame lwemindeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane namacala ocansi.Umdlwenguli waboshwa ngaso isikhathi sesigameko. Ubelokhu egcinwe esitokisini kuqulwa icala eligcine limlahlile wagwetshwa.
title: Usomatekisi ubulale abemsola ngokujola nendodakazi

text: KUPHAZAMISEKE izinhlelo zomqeqeshi weBafana Bafana, uStuart Baxter, ngesikhathi kuhoxa abadlali abathathu esikwatini abesimemezele ngesonto eledlule esizobhekana neLibya emdlalweni wokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ngempelasonto.Lo mdlalo, ongowesibili kuGroup E, useMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini ngoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama.Izolo esithangamini nabezindaba uBaxter uveze ukuthi uHlompho Kekana (onenkinga ethangeni), Themba Zwane (ophuke uzwane) noBongani Zungu (olimale edolweni eFrance) ngeke besafika ekhempini izindawo zabo zizovalwa ngoTiyani Mabunda, Vincent Pule no-Aubrey Modiba.Abanye abadlali abanenkinga ukaputeni weSuperSport United, uDean Furman nomgadli uBradley Grobler nabo abalimele kodwa ngeke babuyiselwe emuva ngoba udokotela weBafana uthe ubona engathi bazobe sebeluleme kusasa (esho namuhla).Omunye umdlali waphesheya ongafikanga ekhempini izolo umgadli uLebo Mothiba. UBaxter uzwakalise ukungenami kwakhe ngendlela elenze ngayo iqembu likaMothiba osayine ngoLwesihlanu kuStrasbourg yaseFrance. Lo mqeqeshi uthe ulindele umbiko ogcwele ngokulimala kwalo mgadli athi uzwe ngakho etshelwa umabhalane waleli qembu hhayi udokotela.“Ngifuna umbiko ogcwele bese kuba yima ngibona ukuthi kufanele yini ukuthi sivalwe isikhala salo mgadli. Uma kwenzeka kuzoba wumgadli okhona la ekhaya ngoba odlala ngaphandle uzofika umdlalo usuphelile,” usho kanje uBaxter. Izolo ePrincess Magogo Stadium ujimise abadlali abangu-12 kuphela.
title: Kuhoxe abathathu kwesikaBaxter

text: ZILOKHU ziqhubeke njalo izigameko zokuzinothisa kwabathile ngokuqola abantu kuthathwe amakhadi abo okuhola izibonelelo zikahulumeni.Esigamekweni sakamuva amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal abophe amadoda amabili atholakale namakhadi akwa South African Social Security Agency (SASSA), nemali engu-R16,000 okusolwa ukuthi la madoda abeyikhipha esebenzisa lawa makhadi.La madoda abanjwe ngenkathi amaphoyisa egasela enxanxatheleni yezitolo e-Amanzimtoti ogwini oluseningizimu neKwaZulu-Natal.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe uCaptain Nqobile Gwala usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko.Uthe la madoda kulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo ngamacala omkhonyovu.Neqembu i-Nkatha Freedom Party (IFP), selikhiphe isitatimende sokuthi kwenziwe uphenyo olujulile ngalokhu, ngoba kusoleka ukuthi yindlela abantu abathile abazinothisa ngayo ngokuqola abantu abadala.
title: Bazinothisa ngokuqola abantu amakhadi okuholwa ngawo izibonelelo zikahulumeni

text: UMQEQESHI wokuqala ukunqoba isicoco sePremiership, uGordon Igesund, usonga ngokushaya ibuya ukuze aqede ukuchanasa kukaPitso “Jingles” Mosimane weMamelodi Sundowns, ogile izimanga eqoqa izicoco ezintathu ngesizini edlule.U-Igesund owanqoba neManning Rangers isicoco seligi ngo-1996/97, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi uzovumbuka kwiDStv Premiership ngesizini ka-2020/2021.Lo mqeqeshi owayehamba phambili ngokunqoba isicoco seligi amahlandla amane, uveze ukuthi usaxoxisana namaqembu athile futhi unethemba lokuthi kuzobuyelwa ensimini eseqede konke nelinye lawo.U-Igesund ogcine ukubonakala ngo-2017 kwiHighlands Park, uthe ubematasa nokusungula inkulisa yakhe iHamiltons Football Academy ezinze, eCape Town.Ubongele uMosimane ngokwephula irekhodi lakhe lokuqoqa izicoco ezine zeligi. Abanye abanqobe izicoco ezine zeligi nguTed Dumitru ongasekho, noGavin Hunt.Kwisizini ka-2019/20, uMosimane unqobe isicoco seligi ihlandla lesihlanu wabhansela ngezimbili, eseTelkom Knockout neseNedbank Cup.U-Igesund uthe njengoba ebuya uzokuqeda nya ukuchanasa kukaMosimane onqobe neCaf Champions League ngo-2016.“Ngiyabuya, ngizobuyisa irekhodi lami. Ukuqhudelana kuhlale kuyinto enhle nekhulisa iligi. Bazokutshela oGavin Hunt noMosimane, empeleni bonke abaqeqeshi bazovumelana nami,” kubeka u-Igesund.Kumaqembu ePremiership angenabo abaqeqeshi iBlack Leopards okubambe uMorgan Shivambu noMongezi Bobe abayisindise ezembeni. ITshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila ethenge isitifiketi seBidvest Wits, nayo ayinamqeqeshi.UMosimane isicoco seligi usinqobe neSundowns kumasizini ambalwa, eka-2013/14, 2015/16, 2017/18, 2018/19 nakweka-2019/20.U-Igesund owake waqeqesha neBafana Bafana usinqobe neRangers, Orlando Pirates (2000/01), Santos (2001/02) naneSundowns ngo-2006/07.Wake waqeqesha ne-African Wanderers, Moroka Swallows, SuperSport kanti uzwakalise ukujabula ngokuya kweyase-Afrika kwawo womathathu amaqembu amakhulu kuleli.“Ukuya e-Afrika kweSundowns, Chiefs nePirates kuzosiza kakhulu iqembu lesizwe. Abadlali bethu bazothola ithuba lokungcweka nofishi abakhulu base-Afrika. Bazothola isipiliyoni esingabavulela namasango e-Europe. Negama leligi yethu lizomaketheka kakhulu. Kuzocaca ukuthi yiliphi iqembu elihlelekile. Kulokhu akekho ozosola omunye, ngokukhala ngokukhathala nangokunye. Wonke umuntu uzozwa lokhu kuhlukumezeka okwenzeka emidlalweni yase-Afrika,” kusho * -Igesund.
title: Ngizobuyisa irekhodi lami: kusho u-Igesund

text:
IBHANTSHI ligcwale umoya kumqeqeshi we-Egypt iqembu lakhe lihlulwa yiBafana Bafana ngo 1 - 0 kumdlalo we-Afcon last 16 eCairo International Stadium, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku phambi kwabalandeli ababalelwa ku-75 000. Inhlangano yebhola e-Egypt, i-Egypt Football Association (EFA) kuyithathe amahora ambalwa ngemuva kokushaywa ngegoli likaThembinkosi Lorch ukumemezela ukuthi isimkhombe indlela umqeqeshi uJavier Aguirre.Akugcinanga lapho njengoba kungakapheli sikhathi esingakanani nomengameli we-EFA naye ememezele ukuthi uyasula esikhundleni sakhe.   أبو ريدة يقيل الجهاز الفني ويتقدم باستقالتهأعلن المهندس هاني أبو ريدة استقالته من رئاسة الاتحاد المصري لكرة القدم كما دعا أعضاء مجلس إدارة الاتحاد لتقديم استقالاتهم ، وذلك عقب خروج المنتخب الوطني الأول من دور ال 16 لبطولة الأمم الأفريقية التي تنظمها مصر حاليا . 
pic.twitter.com/jUfNvdCMfD— Egypt National Football Team (@Pharaohs) 
July 6, 2019"UHani Abu Reidah usememezele ukuthi uyasishiya isikhundla sokuba ngumengameli we-Egypt Football Association. Uphakamise nokuthi namanye amalungu ebhodi asule ezikhundleni zawo ngemuva kokukhishwa kweqembu lesizwe esigabeni selast 16 kwi-Africa Cup of Nations ese-Egypt," kusho isitatimende esifakwe ku-twitter. I-EFA imemezele nokuthi u-Aguirre uxoshwe nethimba labaqeqeshi ebelimlekelela. IBafana Bafana izobhekana neNigeria kumdlalo wama-quarter finals.
title: Ukhonjwe indlela umqeqeshi we-Egypt ishaywa yiBafana

text: KUPHELILE ngendawo ebilingiswa u-Andisiwe Dweba kuGenerations: The LegacyEmasontweni adlule Isolezwe libe ngelokuqala ukubika ngodaba lokushiya kukaThuli kulo mdlalo.Izolo, kuphinde kwavela izindaba zokuthi indawo ka-Andisiwe iphelile kulo mdlalo.Isolezwe likhulume nombhali weGenerations, uMfundi Vundla, oveze ukuthi bekunenhlolokhono yokuthungatha abalingisi abasha abazobonakala kuwo maduze.“Siyabonga kakhulu kulaba balingisi bobabili ngendima abayiklamile kulo mdlalo ngesikhathi sesiwubuyisa isibili kukade kuteleke abalingisi abadala. Bebe yizintokazi ezizimisele ngomsebenzi kodwa izindawo akade bezilingisa zifinyelele emaphethelweni,” kuchaza uVundla.Uthe muva nje njengomdlalo bathathe isinqumo sokufuna abalingisi abasha.“Intsha esiyitholile inethalente eliyisimanga. Sesiqedile ukwenza inhlolokhono ngakho sekushoda khona ukuthi kukhulunywe nabo ngezinto ezimbalwa bese beqala ukulingisa,” kuchaza yena.Ukugcizelele ukuthi laba abaxoshwanga kulo mdlalo kodwa bese kufike isikhathi sokuthi baqede izindawo zabo bese umdlalo uya phambili.Uthe laba basazobonakala kulo mdlalo izinyanga ezimbili bese kuyaphela ngabo, njengoba bengasaqophi.
title: Omunye oshiyayo kwiGenerations

text: KUNGENZEKA yini ukuthi umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs onyamanambana kubalandeli beqembu ubevalelisa ngemuva kokunqoba ngo 1-0 kowe-Absa Premiership kuPlatinum Stars?Inkulumo eyenziwe wuSteve “Mphathi” Komphela ekhuluma kwithelevishini ngemuva komdlalo obuseFNB Stadium ngempelasonto izwakale njengeyomuntu osazi ukuthi akasanakusasa eNaturena.Ngeledlule iChiefs ishaywe yiChippa United ngo 3-0 obekuwumphumela oyikhiphela ngaphandle kombango wesicoco seligi. Lokhu akwehlanga kahle kubalandeli bayo abadinwe bahlasela uKomphela nabadlali bakhe ngemuva komdlalo. Kube sekulandela isitatimende lapho iChiefs ibiqinisekisa khona ukuthi izokwenza izinguquko ezinqala uma kuphela isizini.Ayizange isho lutho ngekusasa likaKomphela kulesi sitatimende. Inkontileka yakhe yeminyaka emithathu iyaphela ngoJuni.“Ngaphambi kokuthi ngihambe, kusemqoka ukuthi ngibonge wonke umuntu. Ngithanda ukudlulisa ukubonga kubona bonke laba abangifakele ingcindezi. Ngabe angikho kuleli zinga engikulo ngokuqeqesha ngaphandle kwabo. Ngabe ngiseyilendlu yodaka engifike kwiChiefs ngiyiyona ukube abazange bangicindezele ngale ndlela abenze ngayo abalandeli. Ngabe angilona leli dayimane esengiyilo manje ukube abakwenzanga kimina lokhu abebekwenza,” usho kanje lo mqeqeshi kuSuperSport ngemuva komdlalo.Ngokuka-Komphela ukuthwaliswa kanzima ngamazwi ahlabayo abalandeli kuzona zonke izinhlaka zokuxhumana kumenze waphinde waqinelwa wukhakhayi kulo mkhakha wokuqeqesha ibhola esigabeni esikhulu.“Kubalulekile ukumelana nengcindezi ngoba uma uhluleka ukukwenza lokho kufana nokuthi uphikisa uMdali kulokhu afuna ukufunde. UMdali ukufaka engcindezini ngoba ekuqinisela isikhathi esizayo kumbe indawo asuke esazokubeka kuyona. Kungenzeka leyo ndawo ibe kuwona unobhutshuzwayo kodwa futhi kungenzeka kube yinto ehluke kakhulu kulo mdlalo,” kusho uKomphela osekuphele iminyaka emibili nohhafu engafake lutho ekhabetheni lezindebe kwiChiefs.Lo mqeqeshi oseke wapheka iFree State Stars, Platinum Stars neMaritzburg United uthi ufunde lukhulu wakhula kakhulu.“Ngihamba kwiChiefs sengiwumqeqeshi ohlukile kulo engifike ngiwuyena yingakho kusemqoka kimina ukubonga wonke umuntu ngaphambi kokuthi ngihambe. Ngifike ngingaqinile kangaka kodwa manje sengifana nedwala. Abukho ubunzima engingeke ngikwazi ukubumela manje,” kusho uKomphela.Akuzange nokho kucace ukuthi yini le uKomphela abekhuluma ngayo kodwa uma ulilandela ibholamaningi amathuba okuthi ubevalelisa ngoba usetsheliwe ukuthi inkontileka yakhe ngeke ivuselelwe.Nokho akungabazeki ukuthi indlela yokuvalelisa kubalandeli beChiefs sekungaba wukubashiya nesicoco seNedbank. NgoMgqibelo Amakhosi azobhekana neFree State Stars kowandulela owamanqamu eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, ngo-8.15 ebusuku.
title: UMphathi ukhulume okomuntu osevalelisa

text: UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns uPitso Mosimane nomdlali we-Orlando Pirates, uThembinkosi 'Shake My Soul' Lorch bahlomule ngemiklomelo yenyanga ngemuva kokuqokwa njengabavelele kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL) ngoFebhuwari.Laba bachonywe uphaphe legwalagwala ngoLwesithathu emahhovisi ePSL.UMosimane uqokwe njengomqeqeshi wenyanga kwathi uLorch wabaqwaqwada bonke abadlali.Ngenyanga edlule uMosimane uhole iSundowns yakhuphukela esicongweni se-Absa Premiership ihlula iBlack Leopards neCape Town City ngesikhathi iqoqa amaphuzu ayisizile ukuthi ifinyelele kwawu-40 emidlalweni ewu-22.Yehlele endaweni yesibili ngemuva kokushaywa iCity ngo 2-1 ngoLwesibili ebusuku. Sekuqhwakele ezikaLorch ngamaphuzu alinganayo kodwa ezinamagoli amaningi emidlalweni ewu-23. IPirates ilahle amaphuzu ibambana ngo 1-1 neBloemfontein Celtic.Laba kuzobhekwa ukuthi baphinde basize amaqembu uma esedlala kwiCAF Champions League.IPirates izokwamukela iFC Platinum yaseZimbabwe e-Orlando Stadium ngoLwesihlanu ngo-9 ebusuku kuthi iSundowns ibhekane neLobi Stars yaseNigeria ngoMgqibelo ngesikhathi esifanayo eLoftus Versfeld.
title: Imiklomelo koweBucs noweDowns

text: .ULebese (29), ufike kwiSundowns ethwelwe ngeqoma kwazise washiya kwiChiefs engomunye wabadlali ababevelele esiza leli qembu ekutheni linqobe izicoco zeligi ngesizini ka 2012/2013 naka 2014/2015.ULebese usayine kwiSundowns akhula engumlandeli wayo ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2016/2017 kanti izinto azikaze zimuhambele kahle kuleli qembu selokhe afika kulo njengoba eqiwa yijezi.ULebese uziqinisekisile izindaba zokushiya kuleli qembu ekhuluma neTimesLive lapho aveze khona ukuthi ucele ukukhululwa ngoJanuwari.UMDLALI wasesiswini weMamelodi Sundowns, uGeorge Lebese okubikwa ukuthi ugaqelwe yiWits neBloemfontein Celtic. Isithombe: BACKPAGEPIX“Akwenzekanga ngendlela ebengicabanga ngayo. Ngibe nemihlangano embalwa, sengizama indlela yokuyodlala kwelinye iqembu ngonyaka ozayo,” kusho uLebese.“Ngiphoxekile ngoba bekuyiphupho lami ngisakhula kodwa ngijabule ngokuthi lafezeka.”ULebese uqhube waveza ukuthi alukho olubi phakathi kwakhe neSundowns kodwa sekumele impilo iqhubeke abheke amadlelo aluhlaza ngoba akubukeki engathi isimo akuso kuleli qembu sizoguquka maduze nje.Phakathi kwamaqembu okuthiwa amcuthele kubalwa iBloemfontein Celtics neBidvest Wits okuthiwa sekuvimbe imali ukuthi asiye kuyo.
title: ULebese ucele ukukhululwa kwiSundowns

text: INATIONAL Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS) isithole izicelo ezingaphezu kuka-190 000 zokusekwa kwezitshudeni ngaphambi kokuthi kuvalwe ukufaka izicelo ekupheleni kwenyanga.AbeNSFAS banxuse abafuna ukwesekwa ukuthi baqhubeke bafake izicelo besebenzisa i-internet.Umlawuli weNSFAS, uDkt Randall Carolissen, uthe sebethole izicelo eziwu-191 887 wathi isibalo sikhule kakhulu ngoba ngesikhathi esifanayo nyakenye ziwu-90 000 kuphela izicelo abazithola.“Lokhu kusho ukuthi ngosuku sithola izicelo eziwu-3 500. Ukukhula kwesibalo ngale ndlela singakuyamanisa nohlelo olulula lokufaka isicelo olungathathi ngisho imizuzu emihlanu ukuluqeda. Iwindi lokufaka izicelo silivule ngoSepthemba.”Uthe izitshudeni zingafaka izicelo emahhovisi aseduzane eNational Youth Development Agency (NYDA) ngaphambi kokuphela kwenyanga.UCarolissen uthe zingaphezu kuka-30 000 izitshudeni ezithole usizo emahhovisi eNYDA wathi ngeke besalivula elinye iwindi lokufaka izicelo uma sekuvaliwe ekupheleni kwenyanga.“Sizazisile izikhungo ukuthi izitshudeni ezixhasiwe akumele zikhokhe imali yokubhalisa uma sezibhalisa ngoJanuwari. Siyanxusa izitshudeni ukuthi zingashintshi izinombolo zocingo uma sezifake izicelo ukuze kube lula ukuxhumana.”Ziwu-174 564 izicelo ezitholiwe zabafuna uxhaso lokufunda emanyuvesi, zibe wu-17 322 zabafuna ukufunda emakolishi amakhono amaTVET.IKwaZulu-Natal inesibalo esiphezulu sabafake izicelo ngabawu-53 626; Gauteng (43 943), neLimpopo (27 716).I-Unisa yikhungo esinesibalo esiphezulu sabafuna uxhaso kulandele i-UJ, TUT ne-UKZN.Emakolishi amakhono iLangeni TVET ezinze ePinetown inesibalo esiphezulu sabafuna uxhaso.Bawu-22 038 abahola imali yesibonelelo kwaSassa abafake izicelo kanti abesilisa yibona abaningi abafake izicelo zoxhaso njengoba bengu-122 322 kuthi abesifazane babengu-69 565.Abafuna ukuthola ulwazi bangashayela inombolo yamahhala yeNSFAS ethi:0860 007 327.
title: I-NSFAS isithole izicelo ezingaphezu kuka-190 000

text: I-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ithi kukhona ukungahleleki kahle kwezinto ohlelweni lokwaba izijumbana zokudla ezenzelwe ukubhekelela abantu abahlwempu njengoba kuvaliwe ukwenza izinto ngokwejwayelekile ezweni.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ricardo Mthembu, uthe zingena zilekanyana izikhalo ngamakhansela okuthiwa ashaya isikhekhelembana uma ekhipha izijumbana, anikeze obhululu bawo nabangamalungu amaqembu abo.UMthembu ubephendula emuva kwesikhalo sezakhamuzi zaseMpendle ku-ward 2 ezigodini eMadiphini, eQutshini, eNguga naseNtshiyabantu.Esinye isakhamuzi sikhulume nephephandaba sacela ukungadalulwa, sithe izinto azihambi neze kahle ngokukhishwa kwezijumbana.“Sigcine ukubona ukudla kufika ngezimoto, asikaze sithole lutho kodwa kunikezwa abantu abavele besebenza thina sisale sincela izithupha. Ibuhlungu le nto ngoba umengameli wakubeka kwacaca wathi akunikezwe abahluphekile, akashongo ukuthi akunikwane ngamaqembu epolitiki.“Siswele, silambile, asikwazi nokuya ematohweni njengoba kuvalwe konke,’’ kubalisa isakhamuzi.Kuthiwa abanye eMpendle batshelwe ukuthi wukudla kwe-ANCWL abanye ngeke bakuthole.Ikhansela lendawo alitholakalanga njengoba izinombolo zalo zombili bezingangeni, udaba lwadluliselwa ehhovisi le-ANC esifundazweni.Kuvela isikhalo saseMpendle nje, zingena zilekanyana zivela ezindaweni ezehlukene kukhalwa ngenkohlakalo yezijumbana zokudla okuthiwa yenziwa ngamakhansela.UMthembu we-ANC uthe kukhona ukubhimba kulabo abahambisa izijumbana futhi kumele kulungiswe ngokushesha.“Siyazithola izikhalo nsuku zonke futhi sifisa uma kuyiqiniso lokhu, kuvele obala, sibhekane nalabo baholi.“Kuyasiphoxa kakhulu ukuvela kwento enjalo kodwa kubuye kungahleleki kahle kulabo abasingethe uhlelo.“Bakhona nalabo abasuke belethe izijumbana ngoba befuna ukuthola udumo nje banganaki ukuthi banika abantu abanjani,’’ kusho uMthembu.Uthe ngeke i-ANC ihlale isonge izandla kube konakala ngoba yisikhathi sokuba abantu babe nobuntu.
title: I-ANC isukumela eyamakhansela akhwabanisa izijumbana zokudla

text: KUQUBUKE itwetwe emphakathini wesizwe sakwaWosiyane, eNdwedwe, esakhele intaba iSangwana okudilike ingxenye yayo, esigamekweni esenzeke ngoLwesithathu ntambama.IMeya kaMasipala waseNdwedwe, uMnuz Nkosinathi Chili, ithe lesi sigameko siwethusile umphakathi wasendaweni, ikakhulu emizini emibili esondele nentaba.“Nakuba lesi sigameko siwethusile umphakathi kodwa ukufika kwethu njengobuholi kubaqinise idolo,” kusho uChili.Uthe bazolinda umbiko ogcwele kubacwaningi bezemvelo, wanxusa abantu ukuthi bagweme ukuhamba eduze kwentaba, bakhalime imfuyo yabo ingayi emadlelweni aseduze kwayo.Esitatimendeni sikamasipala, kuvele umbiko wocwaningo ongakaphothulwa okhishwe ngumcwaningi omkhulu wezemvelo kuMasipala Ilembe, oveze ukuthi ngesikhathi kunezimvula ezinkulu ngesonto eledlule, kungenzeka ukuthi intaba imumathe amanzi amaningi abengena ngemifantu yamadwala okuholele ekutheni igcine idilize intaba.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka unxuse abantu ukuthi behlise umoya.UHlomuka uthe sekujutshwe ithimba elibhekele izinhlekelele nezikhulu zoMnyango wezeMvelo ukuqapha isimo nokulekelela umphakathi uma kunesidingo.“Imibiko etholwe wumnyango iveza ukuthi abekho abalimalile noma abashonile ngesikhathi kudilika intaba. Lesi sigameko siyasikhathaza kakhulu njengoba kunemizi eyakhe eduze nentaba nakuba ingasondele kakhulu,” kusho uHlomuka.Uthembise ukuthi ithimba labacwaningi lizocwaninga ngembangela yokudilika kwentaba, ukuze ababhekele izinhlekelele batshelwe ngokumele bakwenze ukuhlangabezana nesimo.
title: Uvalo kudilika intaba emva kwezimvula

text: ABASEBENZI basemabhange bahlela umbhikisho wokuzwakalisa izikhalo zabo ngokudilizwa emsebenzini emabhange amakhulu akuleli.Lo mbhikisho uhlelwa yiSouth African Society of Bank Officials (SASBO) okuyinhlangano emele abasebenzi basemabhange. Le nhlangano yagcina ukuba nombhikisho omkhulu ngonyaka ka-1920 kanti kulindeleke ukuthi kube kona izinkumbi zabasebenzi. ISASBO imele abasebenzi abangaphezu kuka-73 000 basemabhange ihlela ukuba nombhikisho wezinsuku ezimbili.Ngeledlule iFNB imemezele ukuthi ingahle idilize abasebenzi abangu-1 500 kanti iStandard Bank nayo isanda kumemezela ukuthi ingase idilize abasebenzi abangu-1 200. I-ABSA ihlela ukwenza izinguquko zomsebenzi kanti iNedbank isezingxoxweni nabasebenzi abangu-1500 mayelana nokuphela komsebenzi noma ukufakwa kweminye imikhakha ekhona kwa-Nedbank.Ekhuluma nabe-eNCA, unobhala jikelele weSASBO uMnuz Joe Kokela uthe bafuna ukuthi amabhange aqale abheke ezinye izindlela anganciphisa ngazo izindleko ngaphandle kokudiliza abasebenzi futhi bafuna amabhange ahlinzeke labo basebenzi abasencupheni yokudilizwa ngamanye amakhono azobasiza ukuthi bangaphelelwa umsebenzi. "Uma amabhange enqaba kusho ukuthi  umzabalazo uyaqhubeka, futhi sizoqinisekisa ukuthi sivala ukusebenza kwawo aze abuyekeze lesi sinqumo sokudiliza abasebenzi. Singaqinisekisa nokuthi ama-ATM amaningi awasebenzi ukuze izwe lishodelwe yimali," kusho uKokela.Lo mbhikisho uhlelwe ukuthi ube khona ngenyanga ezayo.
title: Bahlela umbhikisho abaphelelwa umsebenzi emabhange
BUKA: Kuvalwe imigwaqo kuqhuma iloli likaphethiloli

text: IQHUBEKE yize kade sekunencwadi eyimisayo evela inkantolo ingqungquthela ye-ANC esifundeni saseHarry Gwala namhlanje.Amagatsha akulesi sifunda anezikhalo, acele abameli ukuba bafake isicelo sokuthi imiswe ingqungquthela. Abameli bafikile nencwadi kodwa ubuholi be-ANC esifundazweni banquma ukuthi ingqungquthela iqhubeka ngoba bukholwa ukuthi akukho obungakwenzanga kahle ukulungiselela lengqungquthela.Izindaba zencwadi yabameli ebimisa ingqungquthela zivezwe, iPhini likaSihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu ngesikhathi evula ingqunggquthela."Kumele sikusho lokho maqabane ukuthi sesithole incwadi evela kubammeli emisa lengqungquthela," kusho uMabuyakhulu.Uthe njengo buholi besifundazwe babone ukuthi alikho iphutha abalenzile belungiselela ingqungquthela, wengeza ngokuthi yingakho bethathe isinqumo sokuthi baqhubeka nayo yize kukhona incwadi yabammeli.UMabuyakhulu unxuse amalungu e-ANC ukuba abumbane, wathi labo abangeke baze baphumelele kumele bamukele imiphumela."Kwa-ANC akekho umuntu onqobayo nohlulwayo uma kunezingqungquthela kodwa uKhongolose onqobayo njenge qembu," kusho uMabuyakhulu."Akumele kube khona abazojabula benze imicimbi ngoba bethi bawinile, uma kujatshulwa sibizeni sonke sizojabul ndawonye," kusho uMabuyakhulu.Uphinde waxwayisa labo abazokhethwa wathi akumele bahole inhlangano ngokwezinhlangothi.Uthe kumele baqinise ubumbano enhlanganweni ukuze bakwazi ukuhola umphakathi. "Enye into okumele siyisebenze ukuqinisa ubudlelwano namadlelandawonye, i-ANC, Sacp neSanco siyadingana, okunye esikufunayo ukuthi ukubambisana kwethu ezingeni lobuholi kumele kwehlela nasemagatsheni," kusho uMabuyakhulu.Uthe bafuna ukuguqula impilo ye-ANC nabalandeli bayo."I-ANC eminyakene edlule, idlule ebunzimeni  obuholele ekutheni igcine ihlukana phakathi," kusho uMabuyakhulu. Uthe futhi bazimisele ngokubhekana nombango wangaphakathi enhlanganweni.UMabuyakhulu uthe isifunda iHarry Gwala sidumile ngomnikelo waso emzabalazweni nangokukhiqiza abaholi abanohlonze okubalwa kubo noMnuz Pass 4 Phungula."Le ngqungquthela ifika ngesikhathi silindele ukuthi kube nokhetho ngonyaka ozayo, silindele ukukhipha ubuholi obuzobumba isifunda," kusho uMabuyakhulu.Uthe akumele bakhohlwe ukuthi baningi abaholi asebebulewe kulesis sifunda kubalwa nalowo owake waba nguNobhala-jikelele we-ANCYL uMnuz Sindiso Magaqa."Ngaphandle kokaMagaqa, bakhona nabanye abaholi ababulewe singabala uMnuz Khaya Thobela, uMnuz Mduduzi Shibase nabanye," kusho uMabuyakhulu. Unxuse uhulumeni ikakhulukazi ithimba elibhekene nokubulawa kosopolitiki ukuthi lenze isiqiniseko sokuthi ababulali bayabanjwa ukuze kube nesiphetho.Kodwa waxwayisa amaqabane ngokuthi awangakhombani ngeminywe, wathi lokho kungaqhubezela phhambili ukungezwani."Yebo sonke siyafuna ukwazi ukuthi ngobani ababulali kodwa kumele siyekele umthetho wenze umsebenzi wawo," kusho uMabuyakhulu.Ingqungquthela bekumele iqale ngo-10, ekuseni kodwa igcine iqala ngehora lesithupha ntambama.Isizathu esidale ukuthi ingqungquthela iqale sekudlule isikhathi, ukuthi bekunamagatsha abenezikhalo okuphoqe ukuthi ingqungquthela iqale kodwa kusaxoxwa.Umkhulumeli we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu uthe bebehlele ukuthi bahlalise izingqungquthela ezimbili eyaseHarry Gwala naseMoses Mabhida kodwa ngeshwa eyaseMabhida yagcina ihoxisiwe ngenxa yezikhalo ebezikhona.Uthe bajabule ngokuthi eyaseHarry Gwala iqhubekile yize kade nakhona kunezikhalo.
title: IQhubeke ngenkani ingqungquthela ye-ANC eHarry Gwala
