text: AMAPHOYISA afuna uthuli abasolwa abazame ukubulala umshayeli webhasi, babe sebelingqongqisa ngomlilo eNewlands West izolo ekuseni.Abekho abagibeli bebhasi abalimele kulesi sehlakalo esenzeke ngo-5 ekuseni.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe lo mshayeli ubesayimisile ibhasi ngesikhathi ehlaselwa abasolwa abathathu, bamphuca iselula yakhe. Ngesikhathi ephuma ebaleka, babe sebedubula bebhekisa kuyena kodwa wasinda.Lo mshayeli esabaleka, ubone ibhasi abehamba ngalo igqamuka amalangabi, lisha.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt. Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe kumanje bathungatha abasolwa abathintekayo kulesi sigameko.“Amaphoyisa aseNewlands East aphenya icala lokuzama ukubulala, elokubamba inkunzi nelokucekela phansi impahla kulandela lesi sigameko esenzeke namhlanje (izolo) ngo-5 ekuseni. Umshayeli uhlaselwe abasolwa abathathu bamdubula. Bashisa ibhasi. Ngenhlanhla abekho abagibeli abalimele kulesi sigameko. Kusaphenywa icala, akekho osaboshiwe,” kusho uZwane.Imbangela yokushiswa kwaleli bhasi ibingakaziwa. Amaphoyisa athe azoqinisa ezokuphepha eNewlands kulandela lesi sigameko.
title: Usinde kukubi owebhasi eshisiwe

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEABAKHOHLWE labo abazitshela ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika izolandela amazwe ase-Europe, ivumele idlanzana lezihlwele ezinkundleni.Obambe njengesikhulu esiphezulu kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL), uMato Madlala utshele Isolezwe ukuthi kabakaze bayibhunge nakancane noMnyango wezeMidlalo eyokuthi kumele kube nedlanzana labalandeli elivunyelwa ezinkundleni njengoba kwenzeka kwamanye amaligi emhlabeni. Ngempelasonto edlule e-England kuvunyelwe amaqembu azinze eLondon kwi-English Premiership, ukuba amukele abalandeli abawu-2000 enkundleni. Lokhu bakwenze ngoba kubikwa ukuthi sekudambile ukutheleleka ngeCoronavirus kule ndawo.UMadlala uthe ukuphoqa lokhu akunasidingo njengoba  lapha eNingizimu Afrika kubikwa ukuthi kungase kubuye ngamandla ukutheleleka ngeCoronavirus.“Akusizi ukulandela amanye amazwe sibe sibona isimo sethu sihlukile. Amanye amazwe mhlawumbe kunezinhlelo azenzile. Akekho ongaboni ukuthi igagasi lesibili lifuna ukubuya ngamandla, sonke siyezwa ezindabeni. SiyiPSL akukho esingakwenza, konke sikuzwa ngoMnyango wezeMidlalo,” kusho uMadlala.Emasontweni edlule kubonakale i-Uefa ivumela idlanzana labalandeli emidlalweni yayo yeChampions League emazweni abalelwa ku-27.Kuvunyelwa u-30% wabalandeli beqembu lasekhaya.Kulandele iFrench Football League (FFL) evumela abalandeli abawu-5 000 kuya ku-7 000.EGermany khona kuthiwa bamukela u-20% womthamo othathwa yinkundla.I-Uefa ibeke umbandela othi uma isibalo sabatheleleka ngegciwane sinyuka ngo-35% kubantu abawu-100 000, ezinsukwini eziyisikhombisa ngaphambi komdlalo, ngeke bavunyelwe abalandeli.UMicky Modisane okhulumela uMnyango wezeMidlalo kuzwelonke, uthe ngeke nangephutha izihlwele zibuyele ezinkundleni.Uthe abapholise izinhliziyo  abebenethemba njengoba kuza  nowamanqamu eMTN 8 oseMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo.“Ngiyakuqinisekisa kubantu bakithi ukuthi okwamanje kabakavunyelwa abalandeli ezinkundleni. Nawo la mazwe aselivumele idlanzana kubukeka sanda isibalo sabahaqwa iCoronavirus. Kuleli kasifuni ukuzifaka enkingeni efanayo. Njengamanje siyabona ukuthi  igciwane liyenyuka. Ungqongqoshe  (uzomemezela uma sezivunyelwe izihlwele, konke kuzoncika ekwehleni kwegciwane,” kusho uModisane.
title: Azikadingeki izihlwele ezinkundleni

text: Umbuzo: Ngithandana nowesilisa oyisikhulu esiphezulu kumasipala wangakithi. Ngiyazi ukuthi ushadelwe noma izinto zibukeka zingahambi kahle ekhaya. Wayekhombisa ukunginakekela ngomsebenzi lapha nalaphaya, engithembisa okukhulu sisaqala. Manje usengiphatha nanoma ikanjani futhi akasakhombisi nokungithanda. Kanti nokuyimisebenzi ayenginika yona sekumile. Akasazibambi ngisho izingcingo zami futhi sesibonana uma kuthande yena. Ngizizwa nginentukuthelo enkulu uma ngicabanga ngesikhathi sami asedlale ngaso.Igama Ligodliwe, eThekwiniImpendulo:Kuyacaca dadewethu ukuthi lo wesilisa usedlulile kuwena. Akukho ongakwenza uma uthando lungasekho ngaphandle kokuthi uphume ungaze uzizwise ubuhlungu kakhulu. Qhubeka uzifunele eminye imisebenzi.Umbuzo: Ngithandana nowesifazane engamthola ekhulelwe ingane yenye indoda. Basebehlukene nobaba wengane ngesikhathi sihlangana. Yafika ingane ngayithatha njengeyami. Iminyaka emibili yonke ubaba wengane engabonwa nangokhalo, kuyimina ongubaba enganeni. Muva nje, ngisanda kuthola futhi nginesiqiniseko sokuthi sebebuyelene nobaba wengane. Mina bengazi ukuthi akamazi nokuthi uhlalaphi lo mlisa. Kumanje ngiphithene ikhanda emva kwamandla ami angaka ngikhulisa le ngane yabo. Inkinga ngiyamthanda lo wesifazane futhi nengane yazi mina njengoyise. Kwenziwanjani?Muzi, Pimville eSowetoImpenduloUkukhulisa umntwana iminyaka engaka ngaphandle kukayise omzalayo akuyona into encane. Hlala phansi nomama wengane ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi ngempela usebuyile ubaba wengane. Okunye okumele akwazi umama wengane ukuthi isiphi isiqiniseko sokuthi lobaba wengane owamushiya ekuqaleni ngeke amushiye manje. Kunobungozi obukhulu kuyena nasemntwaneni ukubuyelana kwabo. Umntwana angamazi ukuthi ubani ubaba wakhe omuzalayo ngaphandle kokuthi baze babuyelaneUmbuzo: Ngithandana nosisi oneminyaka ewu-23 nesesithandane naye iminyaka emihlanu. Ubeyingane ebengiyithemba futhi ngizikhulisela yona nebengiyenzela konke ekudingayo. Ngiyifundise yaze yathola ngisho izincwadi zokushayela. Ngemuva kwakho konke lokhu, sengibona isithombe sakhe ku-facebook eqabulana nomlisa othize.Uma ngimbuza, uthi mina angimuphi imali eyanele nokuyisona sizathu esimenze wangijolela. Ugcine ethi ukuze siqhubeke angomnika noma R3 000 njalo ngenyanga ukuze sibuyelane ngithande yena yedwa. Ingane ebengiyihlonipha kakhulu, asikaze silale ngoba ngazi ukuthi useyintombi nto. Ngisazifela ngaye kodwa lokhu kwemali nokungathembeki kuyangihlupha kakhulu.Igama Ligodliwe, ePaulpietersburgImpenduloYabuhlungu le nto eyenziwa ilo wesifazane. Kodwa okuhle ukuthi usezikhombisile ukuthi ungumuntu onjani. Ngakho usuyabona nawe ukuthi ukulungele noma cha. Imali ayingeni nhlobo kwezomathandana. Awumdingi umuntu onjalo empilweni yakho. Abantu abanjena banobungozi kakhulu ngoba uzohlala naye iminyaka bese eyakushiya ekugcineni.UmbuzoNginenkinga kankosikazi wami othatha izindaba zethu azineke kumama wakhe. Ngazi kahle ukuthi akukho umama wakhe angakwazi ngomshado wethu ngoba uhlezi engibuza izinto ezenzeka la ekhaya. Mina nginobufakazi obuphelele bokuthi ubaba kankosikazi akathembekile kumkhwekazi wami kodwa angikaze ngithi vu. Isiqala ukungikhathaza lento kamkhwekazi nezindaba zakwami. Ngiyamhlonipha kakhulu. Angazi ngingamukhipha kanjani ezindabeni zomuzi wami?Mhlampe loko komsiza nokubona ukuthi kwenzakalani kwakhe.Mxolisi, EmgababaImpenduloUbudlelwano phakathi kukamama nendodakazi buwubudlelwano obubalulekile kakhulu. Empeleni indodakazi iyabukela kumama wayo indlela ikakhulukazi mekuza kwezomshado. Ingakho isisho sesiZulu sithi ‘indlela ibuzwa kwabaphambili’. Noma kunjalo, akukuhle ukukhipha izindaba zomuzi wenu ekumele zibe phakathi kwenu njengonkosikazi nendoda. Sinesiqiniseko sokuthi unkosikazi wakho akakwenzi lokhu ngoba ezama ukona umshado wenu. Njengomndeni akenilukhulume loludaba. Mazise ngobungozi bokukhuluma ngezindaba zenu kuMama wakhe. Wena ufuna ukuthi umkhwekazi wakho akuhloniphe njengendoda yekhaya kodwa angathathi lezindaba azizwayo ngawe nangomuzi wakho bese eyakucwasa njengendoda nomkhwenyana.Facebook: Mo & PhindiInstagram: Mo & PhindiEmail: [email protected]
title: EZOTHANDO: Ufuna ngimuphe uR3 000 ngenyanga ukuze sibuyelane

text: UMNYANGO wezoBulungiswa ngeke uzithathe kancane izinsongo ezenziwe ngalowo owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma, nanoma ngabe ngubani futhi wakuleli lizwe.UZuma kwiKhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kwamandla oMbuso yidlanzana, udalule ukuthi yena nomndeni wakhe, bathole izinsongo zokubulawa ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.UMqondisi-jikelele walo Mnyango, uMnuz Vusi Madonsela, utshele abezindaba eKapa ngesikhathi ebuzwa ngezinsongo ezibhekiswe kuZuma, ukuthi banazo izinhlelo zokuvikela ofakazi bale Khomishini kaJaji Raymond Zondo. Uthe uZuma unabo abamvikelayo kodwa uma kunesidingo sokubenezezela lokho kuzokwenziwa.UZuma uqale ubufakazi ngokutshela ikhomishini ukuthi umsizi wakhe uthole ucingo kumuntu angamazi emtshela ukuthi bazombulala (uZuma) nezingane zakhe.“Umsizi wami ubeshayelwa umuntu angamazi, lo muntu uthe kumele atshele uZuma ukuthi ‘sizombulala futhi sizobulala nezingane zakhe’,” kusho uZuma.Uthe izinsongo zenziwe nakummeli wakhe omkhulu, u- dv Muzi Sikhakhane ngeledlule.“Impilo yami, eyomndeni wami neyabameli bami kayiphephile.”USihlalo weKhomishini, uZondo, uzigxekile lezi zinsongo ezibhekiswe kuZuma.“Kuyinto engavumelekile kunanoma ngubani kuleli lizwe ukusebenzisa indluzula, ukwesabisa nanoma ngabe iyingaphi indlela engavumelekile. Uma kukhona abanganeme ngakho kumele bayobika emaphoyiseni,” kusho uZondo.UZondo uthe kuyamthokozisa ukuthi uZuma uyaqhubeka nokufakaza. Ucele abezomthetho kwikhomishini ukuthi bamlekelele uZuma noma yingaluphi usizo aludingayo.OyiNhloko yezoMthetho kwiKhomishini, uMnuz Paul Pretorius, uthe bazoziphenya lezi zinsolo zokusatshiswa kukaZuma noSikhakhane.Umhlaziyi wepolitiki uMnuz Thabani Khumalo, uthe ukholwa ukuthi lezi zinsongo ezibhekiswe kuZuma, umndeni nabameli bakhe, akumele kuyekwe nje ngoba uMthethosisekelo wezwe uthi noma ngabe ubani kuleli othola ukusatshiswa, iminyango efanelo kumele yenze okuthize.“UMthethosisekelo ukubeka kucace ukuthi uma kukhona okusabisayo labo ababhekele ezokuphepha kumele bangenelele,” kusho uKhumalo.UZuma uqhubekile nokwethula ubufakazi izolo, echitha ubufakazi obumhlanganisa nezenzo ezingalungile nomndeni wakwaGupta. Kuningi futhi abengakukhumbuli kule minyaka engu-9 ephethe njengomengameli kuleli.Owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu seGovernment Communication and Information System (GCIS), uMnuz Themba Maseko nowayeyilungu le-ANC ePhalamende, uNkk Vytjie Mentor bangabanye bosopolitiki nezikhulu zahulumeni ezakhomba uZuma ezenzweni ezingalungile.UZuma ubuchithile ubufakazi bukaMaseko bokuthi wachithwa njengesikhulu esiphezulu seGCIS ngemuva kokuthi uZuma ekhiphe umyalelo wawubhekisa kulowo owayengungqongqoshe ehhovisi likamengameli, uMnuz Collins Chabane, ukuthi afake uMaseko komunye umsebenzi noma anqamule inkontileka yakhe.“Angikaze ngithumele uChabane ukuthi asuse uMaseko ekuphatheni iGCIS amyise ukuyoba ngumqondisi jikelele komunye,” kusho uZuma.UZuma uphinde waziqhelelanisa noNkk Mentor, ethi akakaze ahlangane naye. Ukuchithile ukuthi uNkk Mentor waxoshwa njengosihlalo wamabhizinisi kahulumeni ngoba anqaba ukuhlangana noZuma eseChina.* Lo mbiko unezezelwe nguSiyabonga Mkhwanazi noSihle Mavuso
title: Kuzosukunyelwa ukwesatshiswa kukaZuma

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAA BABANINGI abadlali abagijima kuPremier Soccer League (PSL) njengamanje abangazishaya isifuba ngokuthi bayayikazela yizindondo ngenxa yokuhlabana kwamaqembu asebeke bawadlalela.Umdlali wasesiswni ku-Orlando Pirates, uDaine Klate (29), nguyena obonakala enonyawo oluhle njengoba lapho efika khona iqembu liyahlabana.Ngemuva kokuphunyukwa yiqatha kathathu, kweyamanqamu edlule kule sizini esanda kusongwa, ekugcineni eZimnyama zihlabene, wakwazi ukufaka indondo ka-12 emgodleni wakhe.Lena bekuyindondo yesikhombisa kaKlate ayithola nePirates kusukela afika kuyona ngo-2010. KuSuperSport United aqala kuyona ukudlala ezingeni eliphezulu, ushiye enqobe izicoco ezintathu zeligi ngaphansi kukaGavin Hunt. Ubekhona kuMatsatsantsa a Pitori edla umhlanganiso ku-SAA Supa 8 ne-Absa Cup ngaphansi kukaPitso “Jingles” Mosimane.“Ngingasho ukuthi ngibusisekile futhi nginenhlanhla yokudlalela amaqembu aphumelelayo. Ngicabanga ukuthi lena yindondo yami ka-12. Okungijabulisa kakhulu ngazo ngukuthi wonke lona wumsebenzi wokuzikhandla siyiqembu. Akuhlonishwa mina kuphela. Bonke abadlali abalapha bazogoduka nezindondo. Ngizoqhubeka nokuzimisela ukuze siye phambili,” kusho uKlate ngemuva komdlalo wamanqamu weNedbank Cup ababhuquzise kuwona iBidvest Wits ngo 3-1.Uthe okubaphumelelisile ekugcineni wukuthi abakaze balilahle ithemba phezu kokuhlulwa kowamanqamu weCaf Champions League, MTN 8 nakuTelkom Knockout.“Kube yisizini enzima kithina, sihlulwa kweyamanqamu kathathu kodwa ekugcineni senze okufanele. Asikaze sililahle ithemba, umqhudelwano ebesidlala kuwona besizimisela njengoba kugcine kuhambe ngendlela esifisa ngayo. Sibonga nomqeqeshi (uVladimir Vermezovic), ufike wasikhuthaza futhi akazange enze izinguquko ezinqala, naye ufanele ukunconywa,” kusho lo mdlali.UKlate waphekwa eTransnet School of Excellence, ngaphambi kokujoyina i-United ngo-2002.Umdlali wePirates olandela uKlate ngezindondo, ukaputeni uLucky Legkwathi, onqobe ezintathu zeligi, ezimbili zeNedbank Cup, iTelkom Knockout nezimbili zeMTN 8.UKlate uthe usebheke ukuthi badle umhlanganiso kuCaf Confederations Cup abazodlala kuyona ngonyaka ozayo ngesizathu sokuba ngompetha beNedbank Cup.“Kuningi esikufundile kuChampions League esizimisele ngokukusebenzisa kuConfederations Cup. Okuhle ngePirates wukuthi siyayithakasela le miqhudelwano, sizimisele ngokuyinqoba,” kusho uKlate.Izindondo zikaKlate:n Premier Soccer League (2007-08), (2008-09), (2009-10), (2010-11), (2011-12)n Telkom Knockout (2012)n MTN 8 (2010, 2011)n Nedbank Cup (2011, 2014)n Absa Cup (2005)n SAA Supa 8 (2004)
title: UKlate wumdlali ononyawo oluhle

text: IMARITZBURG United izenzele walula umsebenzi wokubuyela kwi-Absa Premiership ishaya iTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) kowukuhlungela ukukhuphukela kwiPremiership izolo ntambama eThohoyandou Stadium, eLimpopo.Amagoli eMaritzburg ashaywe uJudas Moseamedi noBongokuhle Hlongwane ngesiwombe sesibili.Okucace bha ngemizuzu ewu-15 yokuqala kulo mdlalo, ukuthi iTTM ibihlele ukuthi iMaritzburg ingazinzi ebholeni.Ithuba lokuqala liqhamuke ngomzuzu ka-16, uMohau Mokate ongumgadli kwiTeam Of Choice, ejika abadlali basemuva beTTM, uCarlington Nyadombo noTshepo Makgoga kodwa wakha amabhilidi.Ithuba lesibili lezivakashi liqhamuke ngomzuzu ka-18, uSiphesihle Ndlovu edlala kahle kwesokunxele egoba ibhola elihle, lahlangana noMokate obesebhekene nepali kodwa uNyadombo ngokubambisana noLebohang Mabotja bakuvimba konke lokho, yaphunyuka kanjalo iTTM.Umdlali wasemuva kwiMaritzburg, uSiyanda Xulu udlale imizuzu ewu-33 kulo mdlalo, ngaphambi kokuthi * -Eric Tinkler amkhiphe. Ubengalimele, kodwa wenze iphutha ngomzuzu ka-32, efaka enkingeni uRichard Ofori ovimbela iMaritzburg emphasela kwi-18, esikhundleni sokukhiphela ibhola ngaphandle.UXulu ubexinwe ngu-Edward Manqele, waphasela * -Ofori kanti nalo nozinti ubemakiwe njengoba ebexinwe uLehlohonolo Nhlapo kodwa wehluleka ukumphuca ibhola.Ngesiwombe sesibili iqhubekile iTTM nokuba yisicefe kwiMaritzburg, ingayiniki ithuba ebholeni.UTinkler wenze ushintsho lwakhe lwesibili kulo mdlalo efaka uMoseamedi endaweni kaMokate maphakathi nesiwombe sesibili. Ngomzuzu ka-66 uMoseamedi ujabulise abalandeli beTeam Of Choice engqofa ibhola elihle ebeligotshwe uDeolin Mekoa, yahamba phambili iMaritzburg.Izamile ukubuya iTTM kodwa uHlongwane ushaye elesibili leTeam Of Choice ngomzuzu ka-81 ngemuva kokuhudula udonga lweTTM, okuphoqe ukuthi unozinti uSimon Mamudzdi aphume emapilini kodwa waphambana nalo.Umdlalo olandelayo kweyokuhlunga uzoba phakathi kweTTM neRoyal Eagles ngoMgqibelo, eThohoyandou Stadium, ngo-3 ntambama.Imidlalo esele yokuhlunga:NgoMgqibelo - Tshakhumav Royal EaglesMeyi 29 - Royal Eagles v Maritzburg UnitedJuni 1 - Maritzburg United v TshakhumaILog yemidlalo yokuhlungaAmaqembuPWDL PtsMaritzburg22006Eagles21013Tshakhuma20020
title: I-Maritzburg izicabele indlela iphumelela

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMQEQESHI waMaZulu, uBenni McCarthy, uzishaya isifuba ngokusayinisa uThabo "Section 10" Qalinge ogijime umdlalo wokuqala iqembu lishaya iBlack Leopards ngo-1-0 koweDStv Premiership eThohoyandou Stadium, ngeSonto.Igoli okunqobe ngalo uSuthu lishaywe uSiyethemba Sithebe. Belunqoba umdlalo wesihlanu kulandelana. Kwemine kalingenelwanga amagoli.Ukunqoba lapha kulithathe kwalibeka endaweni yesithathu kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-37, emidlalweni ewu-21.Lulandela iLamontville Golden Arrows ekweyesibili, babambene ngamaphuzu.Ngemuva kokudlala kukaQalinge imizuzu ewu-20 koweLeopards, uMcCarthy uthe akangabazi ukuthi lo mdlali oyibamba ohlangothini lwesokunxele uzoba wusizo olukhulu kokuhloswe ukuzuzwa uSuthu."Umdlali umsayinisa ngenxa yokwazi ithalente lakhe. Ngithemba ukuthi uzosiza iqembu ukuthi lisonge lisendaweni eliyifunayo. Okungijabulisayo ukuthi nasejimini wenza kahle. Akumele simfake ingcindezi, kumele sithathe izinto kancane. Kumele sikhumbule ukuthi sekuphele isikhathi eside agcina ukudlala. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, uzoba yile nto esiyidingayo. Nakuba kukuningi okusamele akulungise kodwa ingichazile indlela adlale ngayo koweLeopards," kubeka uMcCarthy.Umdlalo wangeSonto bekungowokuqala selokhu uQalinge akhonjwa indlela iSuperSport United, ngoMeyi wangonyaka odlule.OSuthwini ufike maphakathi nenyanga ezozama inhlanhla, ngempela kwamlungela. Ungumdlali wesibili osayiniswe uMcCarthy. Owokuqala uZukile Kewuti obesuka kwiCape Town City. UQalinge owazakhela igama kwi-Orlando Pirates ijezi uzolibanga  naye uKewuti, Siphiwe Tshabalala, Luvuyo Memela noPhakamani Mahlambi.Mayelana nomdlalo weLeopards, uMcCarthy uthe bebebazi ubunzima abazobhekana nabo eThohoyandou."Iqhinga bekuwukuthi sifake ingcindezi kwiLeopards. Besazi bazohlasela ngamandla, bafake abagadli abaningi. Ngichazekile ngendlela uVeli (Motha) nodonga lwakhe abadlale ngayo. Umdlalo wesine engangenelwa igoli. Okwami ukuthi ngincome abadlali bami, kuhlale kunzima ukuthola amaphuzu aphelele kule nkundla. Ngithandazela ukuthi siqhubeke nalo mgqigqo nasemdlalweni wethu olandelayo neStellenbosch. Imidlalo iya ngokuba nzima, nokho ngalo mgqigqo ngithemba ukuthi sizokufeza esikudingayo.“Umdlalo woSuthu neStellies ungoLwesihlanu ngo-5 ntambama, eDanie Craven Stadium.
title: UMcCarthy uchazekile ngomdlali omusha

text: UMHOLI we-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) uMnuz Julius Malema usegxeke abakhuluma kabi ngeNgengonyama yamaZulu, Isilo Samabandla, esikhotheme, wabasola ngokungahloniphi amasiko esintu. UMalema ubekhuluma nabezindaba ngemuva kokuyobhonga emswaneni esigodlweni seSilo, kwaNongoma namhlanje. “ISilo besingeyona imali, ngeke sithandwe yiwo wonke umuntu. Njengabantu sikulindele ukuthi ihluke imibono ngabanye abantu, ikakhulukazi ngabaholi. Ngokwesintu kodwa kuyichilo ukukhuluma kabi ngomuntu osedlulile emhlabeni. Yingakho uma singakuthandi kungcono sithule, ngakho abathule (labo abakhuluma kabi). Asigxile emisebenzini emihle eyenziwe yiSilo kule ndawo naseNingizimu Afrika. Sifunda okuhle kuphela kwabangasekho, siyakuziba okubi ngoba abasekho ukuzoziphendulela,” kusho uMalema. UMalema uqhube wathi iningi labantu abakhuluma kabi ngeSilo abantu ababesaba ukukhuluma noNgangezwe Lakhe esaphila.“Asinaso isikhathi samagwala. Uma kunezinto ababefisa ukuzikhuluma ngeSilo kwakumele bazikhulume naso sisekhona” usho kanje. The brave one is no more; we celebrate your life, my King. Sleep well, good night. ✊🏿 pic.twitter.com/zbiN4KWcPuKing Zwelithini and his family recognized African people across the length and breadth of our country as ONE, and refused to let the demon of tribalism sowed by colonialism and apartheid to divide the PEOPLE.We will always cherish his wisdom. #EFFAtZuluRoyalPalace pic.twitter.com/4FEbFhMJI4UMalema uqhube waveza ukuthi bafike bashumayela ubumbano kubaNtwana baseNdlunkulu ukuze umlando nemisebenzi yeMbube iqhubeke. Uthe uyethemba ukuthi bazosebenzisana neNgonyama Trust ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umhlaba ubuyiselwa kubantu boHlanga kuleli. Ngaphandle kwe-EFF, namhlanje kufike nePhini likamengameli we-ANC uMnuz David Mabuza ngokunjalo noNobhala-jikelele wale nhlangano, uMnuz Ace Magashule, eseSigodlweni sakwaKhethomthndayo bezobhonga emswaneni.
title: 'Bangamagwala abakhuluma kabi ngeSilo ngoba nakhu sesikhotheme' - Malema

text: SESIFINYELELE ku83 890 isibalo sabantu asebehaqwe yigciwane leCovid-19 eNingizimu Afrika kulandela ukutholakala kwabanye abangu3 478 sebenaloleli gciwane emahoreni awu-24.Izolo uMnyango wezeMpilo kuzwelonke umemezele ukuthi isibalo sabantu abasishiyile emhlabeni siku63, okungabaseWestern Cape nase-Eastern Cape. Lokho kusho ukuthi abantu asebebulewe yiCovid-19 eNingizimu Afrika sebebalelwa ku1 373E- Eastern Cape kushone abayisithupha kwathi eWestern Cape kwahamba emhlabeni abangu57. Nakuba kunjalo kodwa asebephunyukile emlonyeni wengwenya sebebalelwa ku44 920. Ngokusho kukaNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt  Zweli Mkhize.Uthe sekuhlolwe abantu abangu-1 228 098, sekubalwa nabahlolwe emahoreni angu24 adlule, abangu-27 362. IWestern Cape isaqengqeleza phambili ngokuba nesibalo esiningi sabantu asebehaqekile  esingu47 522, kulandele iGauteng ngokuba  nabantu abawu15 898 ne-Eastern Cape enabawu-12 639. Uxwayise abantu ukuthi yize sekuxegiswe imithetho kodwa impi isenkulu yokunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwaleli gciwane emphakathini.  NgoLwesithathu uMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, umemezele ukuthi kunemithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe esigabeni sesithathu ezoxegiswa ukuze kufukuleke umnotho wakuleli. Yize kunjalo kodwa uMkhize uthe kusemqoka manje ukuba izakhamuzi zakuleli ziqikelele ukuziphatha ukuze kwehle isibalo sabahaqekile. "Emasontweni ambalwa awedlule, saxwayisa ngokuthi kuza isigxabhane semvula. Siyozifaka kuso. Umthelela wegciwane uzokuba yinselelo. Kusemqoka ukuthi sibhekana ngqo nezinguquko ezizokwenzeka ezimpilweni zethu. Akukwazi ukuthi kuqiniswe imithetho ezweni lonke ekubeni abantu belamba." Uthe kufanele kodwa kuqinisekiswe ukuthi ngesikhathi kuvikelwa izimpilo zabantu, kube kunqandwa nesibalo sabantu abahaqekayo. "Manje abantu kudingeka bakuqonde ukuthi izimpilo zethu zixhomekeke ekuziphatheni kwethu." UNgqongqoshe uthe ngaphambi kokuvalwa kwezwe besanda ngokuphindaphindiwe isabalo sabantu ebebehaqeka njalo ezinsukwini ezimbili kodwa manje isibalo sesikhula kabi njalo ezinsukwini ezingu12 futhi kwezinye izindawo njalo ezinsukwini eziyisishiyagalolunye.
title: UMkhize uthi akumele kuqiniswe imithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe ekubeni abantu bebulawa yindlala

text: UPHIKO lukahulumeni olulawula ukudayiswa kotshwala esifundazweni i-KZN Liquor Authority (KZNLA) inxenxa amalungu omphakathi ukuthi ampimpe abantu abakhiqiza utshwala obuyimbombayi ngoba buyingozi.Isicelo sabe-KZNLA silandela esamaphoyisa ngeledlule anxuse abantu ukuthi bahlukane nokuphuza utshwala obuyimbombayi ngoba babeka impilo yabo engcupheni.Amaphoyisa ayebuya koshaqa amabhokisi angaphezu kuka-20 kagologo oyimbombayi nemishini yokuwukhiqiza emzini oseDududu ngaphansi kukaMasipala uMdoni.Okhulumela i-KZNLA, uMnuz Vuyani Dimba, uthe bayayeseka imikhankaso yamaphoyisa elwa nokuhweba ngotshwala ngesikhathi sikathaqa.UDimba uthe ngokophenyo lwabo, abakhiqiza utshwala obuyimbombayi bakwenza kalula ngoba izithako zokubukhiqiza zishibhile.“Basebenzisa izindlela ezisheshayo zokwenza utshwala ngezithako eziyingozi njengoba behlanganisa amanzi ne-methanol enobuthi obuyingozi. I-methanol ayenzelwanga ukuphuzwa ngabantu ngoba ingamosha isibindi, ikuphendule impumputhe futhi iyabulala uma uyiphuza."Sicela umphakathi ukuthi usebenzisane nathi namaphoyisa ngenhloso yokuthola izindawo ezikhiqiza utshwala obuyimbombayi bese kuboshwa abakhiqizi babo,” kusho uDimba.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke, uBrigadier Vish Naidoo, ngeledlule uthe lobu tshwala buyingozi kangangoba bungambulala umuntu obuphuzayo.UNaidoo wathi abasolwa eDududu badla phansi engakafiki amaphoyisa kodwa kwavulwa icala lokuphula umthetho kathaqa.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha nezeMvelo, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uncome umsebenzi omuhle owenziwa ngamaphoyisa kanjalo nabeKZN Liquor Authority.“Ngifisa ukubongela abomthetho ngalo msebenzi omuhle wokubamba izigilamkhuba ezidayisa utshwala ezinye zizakhele utshwala ngendlela engekho emthethweni futhi ephula imigomo ebekiwe ngaphansi kwesimo sikathaqa esingaphansi kwaso."Sithi nalabo esingakababambi abalale obenyoni ngoba lukhulu luyeza luyanyelela,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.Khonamanjalo, kubukeka idla ubhedu emalokishini imfulamfula okuwutshwala bokuzakhela phambilini obebuthathwa njengobuphuzwa ngabantu asebekhulile.Njengoba kuvaliwe ukudayiswa kotshwala ngesikhathi sikathaqa, intsha eningi iziphuzela imfulamfula.Intengo yezithako zokuyiphisa inyukile ezitolo futhi kunasebeqale ibhizinisi lokudayisa izigubhu eziwo-2 litre zokuyilayisha ngenhloso yokuzenzela imali.
title: Uhulumeni unxusa ukuba kumpimpwe abadayisa utshwala obuyimbombayi

text: MCEBO MPUNGOSEKUNGAKAPHELI nezinyanga ezimbili umphakathi waseNanda, Ntuzuma naKwaMashu uzibusise ngomcimbi ePrincess Magogo, usuphinde waba nenhlanhla yokulethelwa abaculi abanohlonze emcimbini ozobe uKwaMashu Freedom Park kwa-G ngoMgqibelo. Kulo mcimbi obizwa nge-INK Kasi Experience kuzobe kuboshelwe abanye abaculi abaphambili kuleli okubalwa kubo iDreamTeam, WTF, Duncan, Zakwe, DJ Happy Gal, DJ Le Soul, DJ Twitty nabanye.La malokishi kade esingethe i-INK HOP Festival ngenyanga edlule eyashoda ngezethameli phezu kokuba yayinohlu lwabaculi okubalwa kubona uZakwe, AKA, Nathi Mankayi, HHP, Kwesta, Thebe, Naima Kay, DJ Zinhle, Euphonik nabanye. Lo mcimbi wacishe wabhuntsha ngenxa yesibalo esincane sabantu ababethenge amathikithi kanti kwakunezikhalo ngokuvalelwa ngaphandle kwabaculi bendawo. Kulokhu la malokishi asethole elinye ithuba lokujabulela isikhathi samaholidi ngomcimbi. Omunye wabahleli bomcimbi uNkosinathi Mdunge weLacoste Entertainment uthe benze okuhluke kakhulu ukuheha abantu ukuthi beze kulo mcimbi.“Kumanje sisemgqigqweni wokuhambela la malokishi amathathu sicela abantu ukuthi beze ngobuningi babo. Ngaphandle kwalaba baculi abakhulu ababaliwe sivele siphethe nabaculi bendawo abasafufusa esizobanikeza ithuba lokuzazisa,” usho kanje.Amasango azovulwa ngo-10 ekuseni kanti amathikithi omcimbi atholakala ngo-R70, awe-VIP angu-R300. Abantu bavumelekile ukuphatha ama-coolerbox neziphuzo zabo.
title: Omunye umcimbi KwaMashu

text: INDODAKAZI yesiqumama saseThekwini, uSbahle Mpisane, ithi isikhathele abantu abamatanisa umcebo kanina uShauwn Mkhize, nezindaba zokuthakatha nokuthwala.Uthi uma ngabe abantu bakuleli bekholelwa kangaka ekutheni wonke umuntu ocebile unenyoka, pho bona balindeni bengalandi ezabo.Lokhu kulandela ukusabalala kwenkulumo yombhali wezincwadi uJackie Phamotse, othe “osaziwayo nezicebi ezaziwayo zakuleli zisebenzisa izinyoka ukuze zigwilike”.Phambilini uSbahle uke wafaka isithombe ebambe ufeleba wenyoka, okwenze ukuthi abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bematanise inkulumo yalo mbhali nale nyoka ashutha nayo uSbahle.Bathi le nyoka kusobala ukuthi ingekaShauwn Mkhize, iyona eyenza ukuthi agwilike ngale ndlela.Ekhasini lakhe le-Instagram uSbahle uphoqelekile ukuthi aziphendulele ngokufaka isithombe somnikazi wangempela wenyoka ayeyifakile, uhambisana nombhalo othi: “Nansi le nyoka, iningi leziduphunga elizitshela ukuthi ngeyami. Hlalani nikhuluma”.Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngoMgqibelo, uSbahle uthe usekhathele ukubukela abantu bedicilela phansi isithunzi sikanina nomndeni wakhe.“I-video yokuqala ngayifaka ngoba ngithukile ukuthi kukhona umuntu ohlala nenyoka engaka endlini. Kodwa-ke ngoba abantu bahlale bengafuni ukubona umuntu ephumelela, kumele bakhulume nezinto ezingekho njengokuphiwa inyoka esingenayo,” kusho uSbahle.Eqhuba uthe kumanje kunekhasi leFacebook okungesilo elakhe kodwa elivulwe ngegama lakhe.“Bananesithombe sami sikamazisi babuye bafake nemizi kaMa kodwa angiyazi inhloso yabo ukuthi yini ngempela njengoba manje sekuthiwa sinenyoka,” usho kanje uSbahle.Ephetha uSbahle uthe uyajabula ngoba useyalulama futhi useyakwazi nokuqukula izinsimbi zokujima, nokuyinto abengasayenzi.“Ngikhuluphalile ngesikhathi ebengisalulama ngaso njengoba bengingasajimi.“Kuyangijabulisa ukuthi sengiyakwazi ukwenza into engiyithandayo ngoba ukujima yikona okwaphakamisa igama lami kuleli,” kusho yena.Uthe ngeke ahlukane nokujima ngoba yiyona nto azizwa ejabulile uma eyenza.
title: Ukhathele uSbahle ngabasola ukuthi unina uShauwn ucebiswe yinyoka

text: NJENGOBA namhlanje kuqala inyanga yokuqhakambisa amagugu eNingizimu Afrika, ongoti bathi sekuyisikhathi sokuthi abantu bakuleli abagcina amasiko athile bawenze ngendlela efanele, basiyeke kancane isilungu esesidla lubi uma kwenziwa le micimbi.Bathi kuningi nokubhimbiswa kwezinto osekubonakala, okwenza ukuthi abasuke begcinelwa leyo midanti babe nezinkinga ngoba isiko lingagcinwanga kahle.Ungoti wamasiko KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Nomagugu Ngobese, uthe abantu ake bayeke ukusebenzisa imali eningi benza imicimbi yesintu bayihlanganise nesilungu.“Imicimbi yesintu akumele yenziwe njengeyesilungu ngoba abantu bedlalisa imali. Kunemcimbi okungamele intombazane ize ikhule ingenzelwanga yona ekhaya.Umhlonyane, umemulo, umkhehlo nokugcagca ngezinye zezinto okumele zenziwe ngendlela ukuze izinto zilunge.Nokho le eqondene nomendo bangeke benzele wonke amantombazane ekhaya ngoba awagani wonke,”kusho uDkt Ngobese.Eqhuba uthe kuyihlazo ukuthi kunemizi egcina ixuba umemulo nephathi. Lezi zinto uthe azihlangani nhlobo.“Kuyenzeka eminye imizi ithenge notshwala, umuntu anikezwe nokhiye kade emula emini.“Ihlazo lelo. Iphathi nokhiye yisiko labelungu. Akumele lihlanganiswe nomemulo. Uma umzali ethanda nokwenza iphathi akakhethe olunye usuku,”kusho uDkt Nomagugu.Nazi ezinye izinto uDkt Ngobese athi abantu kumele bazenze ngendlela okuyiyo::-Lesi yisigaba sokuqala ngqa sengane yentombazane esuke isithombile.Ihlatshelwa imbuzo, igongqe uma iqala ukuya esikhathini.Kulowo mgongqo isuke inikwa iziyalo ngoshintsho olusuke luzoba khona ngomzimba wayo njengoba isithombile nje.Ngenxa yokuthi yonke into idinga imali, kuyenzeka ukuthi abazali bangakwazi ukuyenzela ngaleso sikhathi ikade iqala ukuya esikhathini.Uma sekwenziwa umcimbi, intombazane ihlala nontanga bayo begcobe ibomvu, okuwuphawu lokugongqa. Abafana abavunyelwe ukusondela kulowo mgongqo.:-Umemulo kusuke sekuyisigaba sesibili lapho ingane yentombazane seyikhulile yahamba phezu kweziyalo eyazinikwa ngabazali ngesikhathi yenzelwe umhlonyane.Uyise wayo usuke esebonga ukuziphatha kahle kwayo eyikhulisa phambi kwabantu.Endulo ngenxa yokuthi bekungafundwa kungasetshenzwa, owesifazane ubethi uma enzelwa lo mcimbi kube yindlela yokumnika imvume yokuthi usengakhethwa yinsizwa ayiqome noma agane.:-Intombi isuke seyidlulile kulezi zigaba ezingenhla yaze yaqoma yagana. Uyise usuke eseyikhehlisa ngoba isuke isilungela ukuyogana komunye umuzi.Endulo lokhu bekwenziwa nangokuthi owesifazane enziwe uhlobo oluthile lwesitayela sasekhanda, esihlobe ngezinto ezahlukene.Lo mhlobiso wasekhanda ubuwenziwa abesifazane ababizwa ngokuthi yizinyanga zekhanda ebezikwazi ukwenza isitayela sasekhanda esihlukanisa owesifazane oseganile ezintombini.Esikhathini samanje lokhu sekwenziwa ngezicholo zesimanje ezihlobe ngezimpaphe, ubuhlalu nezinkinobho.-Usuke usulandela konke lokhu okungenhla, lapho intombi isuke isiphuma ekhaya seyiyohlala emzini ngokusemthethweni.Esikhathini samanje kwenziwa ngendlela ehlukile neyakudala njengoba sekuthengwa nezimpahla zasendlini nezitsha nemiswenko ngenxa yezinga lempilo esiphilwa.
title: Ukhuza ukusheba amasiko nesilungu

text: INHLANGANO eyengamele ibhola emhlabeni iFifa ikhomba iSafa ngenjumbane ekutheni ayizange igxilise umqondo odabeni lukaPhineas Nambandi, oluholele ekutheni AmaZulu FC aphucwe amaphuzu ayisithupha.UNambandi waseNamibia, inkontilleka yakhe yanqanyulwa ngo-2014. Amaphuzu ayehamba nenhlawulo kaR1 086m.Encwadini ethunyelwe kwiSafa yiFifa ngoMashi 12, 2019 (Isolezwe ngeSonto elinayo ikhophi yayo) ngesinqumo sayo sakamuva ngodaba oluthinta AmaZulu FC angaphansi kweLyrastars Investments Pty Ltd okumanje adlala kwi-Absa Premiership.Nalawo ayengaphansi kwenkampani okungaMaZulu Football Club Pty Ltd osekuyiRichards Bay Football Club egijima kwiNational First Division. Ngokusho kwencwadi iSafa iKhabeni Projects Pty Ltd okufanele iqonde kahle konke ngezimo zomthetho zamalungu ayo njengoba kuyiyona eyengamele izindaba zebhola eNingizimu Afrika.Ethintwa nge-email ngale ndaba oyisikhulu esiphezulu esibambile seSafa, uRussell Paul, uthe bakwenza konke okuyimiyalelo yeFifa.“Sakwenza konke njengokulandisa kwenqumo yokusebenzisana phakathi kwezinhlangothi zonke.“Kuyinto eyaziwa umphakathini wonke ukuthi umyalelo weFifa sawulandela njengoba unjalo.“Inkulumo yakho ethi iFifa ikhomba iSafa ngenjumbane ngiyayichitha. ISafa yenza konke ngokwemigomo ebekiwe yokusebenzisana nobudlelwanao neNSL (National Soccer League) nemigudu ekhona phakathi kwezinhlaka zombili, yaphinde ngaso sonke isikhathi yagcina imiyalelo njengokucelwa yiFifa futhi lolu daba seluvaliwe.”Kule ncwadi iFifa iqhuba ithi: “Ngemuva kwemininingwane emisha ithole ukuthi iKhabeni Project Pty Ltd engumnikazi weRichards Bay FC yiyo ethathwa ngokuthi yathatha ilungelo laMaZulu Football FC Pty Ltd.ILyrastar Investments Pty Ltd yathenga ilungelo leThanda Royal Zulu yathi isingaMaZulu FC, ngakho laMaZulu ngeke kube yiwona asemthethweni ezindabeni ezithinta AmaZulu Football Club Pty Ltd.Kuyona le ncwadi kuvele umyalelo othi iSafa kufanele ithathe amaphuzu ayisithupha kuMaZulu FC Pty Ltd noma kuloyo othathe ilungelo lawo ngokusemthethweni okuyiRichards Bay.Ibuye ithi akubuyiselwe ilungelo leqembu elahlukumezeka. U-Ashwin Trikamjee, onguqweqwe lommeli uthe incwadi yeFifa icace bha.“NgokweFifa umuntu okunguyena ongaMaZulu okufanele aphucwa amaphuzu yiRichards Bay FC, hhayi AmaZulu angaphansi kweLyrastar Investment Pty Ltd ngoba ayiThanda Royal Zulu kodwa kuphela adlala ngaleli gama.“Iyalela iSafa ukuthi ayithathe amaphuzu kwiRichards Bay FC bese ithumela ubufakazi balokho ngaphambi kukaMashi 26 nokuthi ilungelo leThanda Royal Zulu (okungaMaZulu dlala kwiPremiership) libuyiselwe kuyona. Le ncwadi yeFifa yangoMashi 12, 2019 ichaza lokhu,” uTrikamjee egcizelela nokuthi AmaZulu angazidlela amahlanga enkantolo ngale ncwadi.Ngenyanga edlule uJomo Biyela usihlalo weRichards Bay watshela leli phephandaba ukuthi bayaphupha abacabanga ukuthi bangathola amaphuzu. AmaZulu anqabile ukuphawula, athi yonke imibuzo mayibhekiswe esikhulwini esiphezulu seSafa.
title: I-Fifa nongqimphotho ngamaphuzu oSuthu

text: ICIKO lakuleli, uZwelethu Mthethwa, utholwe enecala lokubulala ngenhloso owesifazane owayedayisa umzimba, uNokuphila Khumalo (23), yiNkantolo eNkulu eWestern Cape namhlanje ekuseni.Isinqumo sokugwetshwa kukaMthethwa sincike kakhulu ekusetshenzisweni kwevideo ye-CCTV eyakhombisa uNokuphila ekhahlelwa ezintatha kuso ngo-Ephreli 14 ngo-2013, kuRavencraig Road, eWoodstok.Selokhe kwaqala ukuqulwa kwaleli cala uMthethwa ubemi kwelokuthi akasakhumbuli ukuthi kwenzakalani eThe Corner Lounge, eGugulethu, okuyindawo ayephuza kuyo ngobusuku obufanayo. Uthe akukhumbulayo ukuthi wachitha imali engaphezulu kuka-R2000 ethenga utshwala kule ndawo kuphela.
title: Utholwe enecala owabulala umahosha

text: KUFE abantu abangu-22, kwalimala ababalelwa ku-59 kuqhuma ibhomu emcimbini womculi wase-United States, u-Ariana Grande, edolobheni laseManchester e-England izolo ebsuku.UNdunankulu wase-Britain, uTheresa May, uthe lesi sigameko kungenzeka ukuthi sidalwe abashokobezi. Lelizwe ligcine ukubheka nesigameko esifana nalesi ngenyanga kaJulayi ngo-2005. Kubikwa ukuthi amaphoyisa azwe ngalesi sigameko esenzeke eManchester Arena ngo-10.30 ebsuku. Bekunezinkumbi zabantu ababalelwa ku-21 000 abebezobuka u-Ariana Grande, okubalwa kubo nezingane ezincane. Obekulendawo uthe uzwe kuqhuma ibhomu esephuma kule ndawo, okulandelwe ukuhayiza kwabantu abebegijima bezama ukuphuma. Ekseni bekubikwe ukuthi kushone abantu abangu-19 kulesi sigameko kodwa isibalo sesinyukele ku-22. U-Ariana, oneminyaka engu-23 ubhale kutwitter waxolisa ngalesi sigameko.“Ngibuhlungu ekujuleni kwenhliziyo yami, ngiyaxolisa, anginawo amanye amazwi,” usho kanje.UNdunankulu uMay, obekuzoba nokhetho ezweni lakhe emasontweni amabili udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini yabashonile.-Reuters
title: Kufe abangu-22 kuqhuma ibhomu eManchester, e-England

text: KUSHONE abantu ababili engozini yeveni okuthiwa beyithwele abantu abangu 27 eyenzeke ePort Shepstone izolo ezintanta.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuPhepha, ukuThutha nokuXhumanisa uMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Mluleki Mntungwa uthe kule ngozi kushone abantu ababili. Imbangela yengozi isaphenywa.UMntungwa uthe ngaphandle kwale ngozi amaphoyisa abe nezivimbamgwaqo eThekwini ngoMsombuluko ebusuku lapho kuboshwe khona abashayeli abangu 10 ngamacala okushayela bephuze utshwala.Uthe kumiswe izimoto ezingu-827 kwabekwa amacala abashayeli abangu-66 abanye babo okutholwe ukuthi abanazo izincwadi zokushayela, abanye beshayela izimoto ezingekho esimeni sokuba semgwaqweni.UMntungwa uthe bekunezivimbamgwaqo kuso sonke isifundazwe ukuze kwenziwe isiqiniseko sokuthi abashayeli balandela umthetho.Uthe amaphoyisa asazobonakala emigwaqweni yesifundazwe kuze kube kuphela amaholidi.UMnuz Simon Zwane weRoad Traffic Management Corporation (RTMC), uthezikhona izingozi ebezikhona kodwa nayeubalule eyasePort Shepstone okushone kuyo abantu ababili.Uthe izingozi eziningi zidalwa ukuthi abantu bashayela bephuze utshwala. Uxwayise abashayeli ukuthi bashayele ngokucophelela ikakhulukazi eGoli njengoba izulu lina.Uthe izibalo zokuthi kushone abangaki emigwaqweni yakuleli ngesikhathi samaholidi bazozikhipha uma sekudlule amaholidi.
title: Kushone 2 engozini yeveni 'ebino-27' wabantu

text: ZODWA NDABAINOVALO injini yaMaZulu, uKhulekani “Chillies” Madondo, ngokuba sengcupheni yokulahlekelwa yindawo kuTop 8 kweqembu layo eselishaywe imidlalo emithathu ilandelana ku-Absa Premiership.AmaZulu aqale isizini eshayela phezulu njengoba eke ahlala ngisho endaweni yesibili ku-log.“Siyayibona ingozi esibhekene nayo njengoba izinto ziqhubeka nokungasihambeli kahle. Akukona ukuthi sidlala kabi kodwa kunamaphutha amancane okumele siwalungise okuyiwona asenze sashaywa imidlalo emithathu kulandelana,” kusho uMadondo.“Uma ubheka amaqembu esidlale nawo akumele ngabe sesilahle amaphuzu angaka. Kufanele siwalungise amaphutha esinawo singakashiywa yisikhathi.”Usuthu seluqoqe amaphuzu amahlanu emidlalweni eyisikhombisa emzuliswaneni wesibili we-Absa Premiership. Luzogijimisana neMaritzburg United ngoLwesihlanu, ngo-8 ebusuku, eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu, kanti kumele luqinisekise ukuthi luyaqhubeka nokuhlala kuTop 8.UMadondo uthe kuningi okumele kushintshe ngendlela abadlala ngayo ukuze bangasali ngaphandle kuTop 8.“Kumele sishintshe indlela esizinikela ngayo enkundleni. Akumele sizifakele ingcindezi engenasidingo kuthi sekusele imidlalo emncane kube yilapho siqala ukuphaphama. Umqeqeshi ukhulumile nathi mayelana nengozi esibhekene nayo yokuphuthwa yiTop 8 emuva kokuqala kahle isizini. Ekuqaleni kwesizini sasizibekele ukuthi siqede namaqembu amane aphezulu kodwa izinto zibukeka ziba nzima umdlalo nomdlalo. Asibhekile ukungena kuTop 8 kuphela kodwa sibheke nokuthi sihambe ibanga elide kuNedbank Cup, “ kusho uMadondo.Uthe njengoba sebeshaywe imidlalo emithathu kubalulekile kubona ukuthi bawunqobe umdlalo wabo ne-United.“Umdlalo wethu neMaritzburg uzoba nzima impela kodwa kumele nakanjani sibuye namaphuzu amathathu. Siyazi ukuthi ngeke kube wumdlalo olula kodwa kumele senze konke okusemandleni ukuze sigcine indawo yethu kuTop 8.”EzikaSteve Komphela zizoza kulo mdlalo zihambela phezulu ngemuva kokushaya iFree State Stars ngo 3-2 ngoLwesibili ebusuku.Ngaphandle kokungabi nawo umgqigqo omuhle koSuthu uMadondo uthe ujabule kakhulu ngendlela adlala ngayo.“Ngeke ngiqambe amanga ngizibona ngidlala kahle kakhulu futhi kungifanele ukuthola ijezi ngaso sonke isikhathi,” kusho yena.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:Kusasa: Maritzburg United v AmaZulu (Harry Gwala Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: Orlando Pirates v Kaizer Chiefs (FNB Stadium, 3.30pm); Black Aces v Moroka Swallows (Kanyamazane Stadium, 3.30pm); Mamelodi Sundowns v Polokwane City (Loftus Stadium, 8.15pm); Bidvest Wits v Free State Stars (Bidvest Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: Ajax Cape Town v University of Pretoria (Athlone Stadium, 3.30pm); Bloemfontein Celtic v SuperSport United (Kaizer Sebothelo Stadium, 3.30pm)
title: UMadondo unovalo ngokuphuma kuTop 8 koSuthu

text: UKHALE ngemidlalo edlule umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, ezakhe zihluleka ukudlulela kuma-quarterfinal eCAF Champions League.ISundowns igcine ithole iphuzu ibambana ngo 0-0 neHoroya A.C yaseGuinea emdlalweni wokugcina wamaqoqo kaGroup C, eLucas Moripe Stadium ngoLwesibili. Bekufanele iSundowns iwine ukuze ibizojoyina iWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco esigabeni esilandelayo.Nokho ukutatazela nokuhluleka ukusebenzisa amathuba kwabadlali beSundowns kugcine kuholele ekutheni lishabalale iphupho lokuwina iChampions League okwesibili.IHoroya, etheleke eMzansi idinga ukungahlulwa, yiyona edlulele kuma-quarterfinal emuva kokuqeda endaweni yesibili kuGroup C.“Sisesimeni esihlukile ngoba sihlulekile ukudlulela esigabeni esilandelayo. Kuyibhadi ukuthi sihlulwe amathuba amaningi okushaya amagoli. Sikwenzile obekufanele sikwenze. Sizamile, sabacindezela. Sigadle ngakho konke esinakho, sanyusa abadlali basemuva sazibeka engozini. Kodwa ibhola linjalo, uma ungawasebenzisi amathuba ekubeni udinga ukuwina, kuphetha kanje. Ngiyayibongela iHoroya nomqeqeshi. Ngibafisela okuhle kodwa. Umdlalo kade siwuphethe, senze konke,” kusho uMosimane.“Kodwa kwakungafanele sihlulwe iHoroya ekuhambeni. Sashaya amagoli amabili, sekusele imizuzu eyisihlanu sadala ikhona, bashaya igoli.Sasiphambili ngamagoli amabili, ingekho inkinga. Kodwa umdlalo omkhulu kithina ngowaseTogo (AS Togo-Port). Kwakungafanele sihlulwe kulowo mdlalo. Akukholakali okwenzeka eTogo. Angikaze ngiwubone umdlalo ofana nalona selokhu ngaqala ukuqeqesha. Mangakhi amathuba? Angaphezu kwawanamuhla. Sabhekana nonozinti kathathu. “Sibhekene neWydad sashaya igoli emizuzwini emibili yokuqala, sahamba phambili. Sahuqa ubuthongo, umdlali wethu wacabanga ukuthi ibhola liphumile, wama. Ibhola lagotshwa.Lowo kwaba yisipho, uKhisimusi. Kubalulekile ukukhuluma iqiniso. Ungasithwa yizinto ezizoshiwo kodwa ubhekane nayo ngqo into. Nakuba sesidlale lo mqhudelwano iminyaka emine ilandelana kodwa siseyizingane.”Amaqembu adlulele kuma-quarterfinal yiTP Mazembe (Democratic Republic of Congo), ES Setif (Algeria), Wydad Casablanca (Morocco), Horoya A.C (Guinea), Etoile du Sahel (Sudan), Premiero de Agosto (Angola), Al Ahly SC (Egypt) ne-Esperance (Tunisia).Umqeqeshi weHoroya, uVictor Zvunka uthe: “Bengishilo ukuthi kufanele senze konke okusemandleni. Sibe nenhlanhla uma ubheka amathuba abawatholile. Ngiyazi asidlalanga kahle kodwa inhloso bekuwukudlulela phambili. Silindele noma yiliphi iqembu kuma-quarterfinal. Sifuna ukuhamba ibanga elide.”UMosimane uhlalelwe wumsebenzi wokugqugquzela abafana bakhe ngaphambi komdlalo womlenze wesibili owandulela owamanqamu weMTN8 neCape Town City eLoftus Versveld, ngeSonto ntambama. Emlenzeni wokuqala iSundowns ikhale ngaphansi ngo 1-0 eKapa.“Into eyodwa engingayisho okwamanje ukuthi sizoqhubeka nokuhlasela njengoba senzile. Ukungawashayi amagoli kujwayelekile eqenjini. Asinayo inkinga yokwakha amathuba,” kusho uMosimane.
title: Ubalisa ngemidlalo edlule uMosimane

text: UMENGAMELI weSouth African Football Association (Safa) uDanny Jordaan uthi nakuba kuyinto enhle ukusayina kukaPercy Tau phesheya kwezilwandle kodwa unombono owehlukile ngokuthi bekufanele adlale kuliphi izwe.UTau usayine kwiBrighton & Hove Albion yase-England ngemali ebalelwa ngaphezu kukaR50 million. Ngenxa yokuthi amahlandla asewadlale kwiBafana Bafana mancane (njengoba ewu-12), nokuthi elesizwe lakuleli alikho emazweni angu-50 ahamba phambili emhlabeni jikelele, uTau uzobolekiswa iBrighton emaqenjini akwamanye amazwe ase-Europe enobuhlobo nawo.Imibiko ithi angase alibangise eBelgium noma eHolland.Ekhuluma nezintatheli uJordaan ngesikhathi kunomqhudelwano weSAB Under 21 National Champioship, eKing Zwelithini Stadium eMlaza, lesi sikhulu sakhombisa ukuthi ngokwaso uTau bekufanele adlale kwelinye izwe.“Sikujabulela kakhulu ukuyodlala phesheya kukaTau njengenhlangano eyengamele unobhutshuzwayo kuleli. Ngiyazi ukuthi bekunombango wokuthi kufanele asayine e-England noma eSpain kodwa-ke ugcine ekhethe i-England. Nginowami nokho umbono ngokuthi bekufanele asayine kuphi kodwa ngizothula nginganitsheli (esho ezintathelini). Ungumdlali onesiphiwo, simfisele konke okuhle. Siyakholelwa ekutheni uzokhula ngoba amaqembu aphesheya ayasiza ekukhuliseni umdlali ngokomqondo,” kusho uJordaan obekubonakala ukuthi unomuzwa owehlukile ngokusayina kukaTau kwiBrighton.UJordaan uthi umqeqeshi weBafana uStuart Baxter kumele azihluphe ngokuthatha indiza ayobheka abadlali bakuleli abasebancane abazinze phesheya ngenhloso yokuqinisa iqembu lesizwe ukwakhela iNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2020 eQatar. “Akufanele sikhohlwe ukuthi sinabadlali abangaphezu kuka-80 abase-Europe emaqenjni ehlukene. Okubuhlungu abadlali kwiPremier League yase-England noma kwiLa Liga yaseSpain okwenza banganakwa."
title: UJordaan unomuzwa ohlukile ngokusayina kukaTau kwiBrighton

text: ABAMABANDLA ahlangene KwaZulu-Natal banikele ngo-R1 million wokulekelela ekulweni nokubhebhetheka kwegciwane iCorona.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba izolo, inhlangano yamabandla ahlangane eKZN, ithe ifuna ukulekelela kulandela ukuba uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ememezele ukuvalwa kwezwe inyanga yonke.Bathe bayazi ukuthi uthaqa uzoba nemiphumela engemihle kwezomnotho kanjalo nakubantu abampofu. Bathe ukudla kuzoshoda kubantu abampofu.Bancome ubuholi bukaRamaphosa, iKhabhinethi noNdunankulu.“Siyakuncoma ukuba abaholi banikele ngengxenye yomholo wabo ukuze balekelele esikhwameni esizolekelela abantu nezinhlaka ezehlukene kulesi sikhathi. Sifisa ukuveza ukuthi amabandla ase-KZN nawo afisa ukunikela ngo-R1 million ukuze kulekelelwe esikhwameni sesifundazwe,” kusho isitatimende.Usihlalo we-KZN Church Leaders Group ophinde abe ngusihlalo we-KZN Inter Religious Council uCardinal Wilfrid Napier uthe: “Elakuleli livaliwe kuze kuphele * -Ephreli ngenxa yeCorona. Lokhu kuzoba nomthelela eongemuhle ikakhulukazi odabeni lokudla,”Ngaphansi kwalolu hlelo lokunikela, le nhlangano yamabandla izonikela ngama-voucher okudla komasipala besifunda abangu-11 e-KZN.Lama-voucher okudla azosebenza kunoma iziphi izitolo ezilandelayo, ika-Shoprite, Pick * Pay, Usave, Checkers noma kwaBoxer.Eminye imizamo yabo yokunikela kubalwa ukuxhumana nabantu nokufundisa ngegciwane, ukunakekela abefundisi, nokubheka umphakathi wonkana.Ngaphezu kwalokhu bathe kumele imikhuleko ingami.Kulo mkhankaso bahlangene ne-South African Council of Churches and Intellimali.Banxuse noma ubani ofisa ukufaka isandla ngalesi sikhathi enze njalo njengoba uMengameli eshilo ukuthi wonke umuntu angalekelela ukulwa neCorona.
title: Abamabandla eKZN nomnikelo  kaR1m ozosiza abampofu

text: BALIMALE kanzima onogada abathathu abathutha imali ngesikhathi imoto abebehamba ngayo igingqika emuva kokuhlaselwa ngamadoda angaziwa abehlome ngezibhamu emgwaqweni u-R33 KwaKopi ngaphandle kwaseGreytown izolo ntambama.UMnuz Werner Vermaak wenkampani yezimo eziphuthumayo i-ER24, uthe baphuthume KwaKopi ngabo-3.30 ntambama izolo bathola imoto igingqikile. “Sithole ukuthi onogada abathutha imali bebesendleleni ngesikhathi behlaselwa ngamadoda amathathu. Imoto yawo ilimele ngesikhathi igingqika yaphuma emgwaqweni. Ngenhlanhla onogada balimale kancane njengoba bethe baphume imoto ihamba. Abazange balinyazwe yiziqhumane."Uthe onogada baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela esiseMgungundlovu lapho bethola khona usizo lwezempilo.UBrigadier Vish Naidoo wamaphoyisa eNingizimu Afrika, uthe onogada bebesuka eMsinga beyolanda imali enxanxatheleni yezitolo iMsinga Mall.“Onogada bahlaselwe ngamadoda angaziwa abehamba ngezimoto ezimbili ngesikhathi eseKwaKopi, okuyindawo ephakathi kweGreytown noMsinga. Amadoda angaziwa adubule imoto yonogada, bafaka neziqhumane befuna ukuyiqhumisa base bebaleka nemali engadalulwanga."
title: Kulimale 3 wonogada abathutha imali behlaselwa

text: BAZOHLOLWA abantu abafika kuleli ngemikhumbi yakwamanye amazwe, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abanayo i-coronavirus.AbakwaTransnet Port Terminals bathe bonke abantu abasemikhumbini yakwamanye amazwe abangena emachwebeni akuleli bazohlolwa.Bathe bafuna imininingwane yokuthi imikhumbi ime emachwebeni awu-10 akumaphi amazwe ngaphambi kokuthi ifike eNingizimu Afrika.Imikhumbi evela emazweni ane-coronavirus izobhalwa kolunye uhlu oluseceleni.Abasebenzi baseNingizimu Afrika, okubalwa abashayeli bemikhumbi abavumelekile ukudla, ukudla noma ukuphuza izinto abazinikwa wozakwabo abafika nemikhumbi yakwamanye amazwe.Uma kukhona umuntu ogulayo emkhumbini, lowo muntu akavumelekile ukuziphumela ngaphandle kokuthola imvume kwabaphethe ezempilo emachwebeni.Akekho umuntu ovela kwelinye izwe ovumelekile ukwehla emkhumbini ngaphandle kokuyalelwa ngababhekele ezempilo emachwebeni.Imikhumbi izobhekisiswa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu uyahlolwa.Ngisho abahamba ngama-yatch abavumelekile ukuzehlela kodwa kufanele kuqinisekiswe ukuthi abaguli.Abashayela amabhanoyi angenisa imikhumbi echwebeni nalabo abasebenza nemikhumbi evela kwamanye amazwe bazogqoka ama-musk nama-gloves.Khonamanjalo uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo eNingizimu Afrika, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uthe i-coronavirus ayikafiki eNingizimu Afrika, waqinisa abantu idolo ngokuthi leli lizwe limi ngomumo ukubhekana nalesi sifo.Ngabo-12 emini yayizolo bebebalelwa ku-304 abantu ababulawe yi-coronavirus. Kuthiwa bangaphezu kuka-14 000 abalaliswe esibhedlela ngenxa yayo.IPhillipines ibike ukuthi sekushone owesilisa oyedwa kuleliya lizwe ngenxa ye-coronavirus, kuthiwa ubevakashele eWuhan, eChina, wase ebuya nesifo.NgoLwesihlanu iBotswana ikuqinisekisile ukuthi kunomuntu wakuleliya lizwe ophethwe yi-coronavirus. Okwamanje kalikho ikhambi le-coronavirus equbuke eChina.INational Institute for Communicable Diseases (Nicd) yiyona enemininingwane egcwele ngalesi sifo futhi eyazisa abantu ngokwenzekayo.
title: Bala ukhasha emachwebeni ngobhubhane

text: ISEMANZINI iNdlunkulu kaZulu emuva kokushona kodadewabo ababili beSilo, okunguMntwana uBusi noNobuhle.UMntwana uBusi ubevamise ukuhamba noNdlunkulu beSilo uma kunoMkhosi woMhlanga abalekelele ukunakekela izintombi.UMntwana uNobuhle yena ubesebenza esibhedlela i-Addington, eThekwini.UMntwana uMbonisi Zulu, okhulumela iNdlunkulu, uthe uMntwana uNobuhle uthathwe wumkhuhlane iCovid-19 kanti bebengakasho odokotela ukuthi uMntwana uBusi uthathwe yini kodwa ubengumuntu ohlushwa yizinso nomfutho ophezulu wegazi.“Siyayikhalela iNdlunkulu ngokushiywa wodadewabo. Ingonyama ayikwazanga nokugubha usuku lwayo lokuzalwa ngenxa yokushiywa wodadewabo,” kusho uZulu.Uthe abantwana bazofihlwa kusasa, eMahhashini.Sebebathathu odadewabo beSilo abashonile selokhu kuqubuke iCovid-19 kwazise kwashona obeyiNdlovukazi yamaRharhabe iNdlovukazi Noloyiso Sandile njengoba sekulandela uMntwana uNobuhle noMntwana uBusi.UNkk Nomagugu Ngobese, oyisazi samasiko nomsunguli weNomkhubulwane Culture and Youth Development Organisation, uthe zibuhlungu kakhulu izindaba zokudlula kwabantwana baseNdlunkulu.“Hhawu zaze zabuhlungu lezi zindaba ezehlele iNdlunkulu kaZulu! Ngizomkhumbula kakhulu uMntwana uBusi ngoba ubenathi ekugcineni isiko lokuhlolwa kwezintombi. Ubehlale ehamba noNdlunkulu uMaNdlovu benakekela izintombi. Ubenomoya ophansi, ethanda ukuhleka futhi engaziphakamisi,” kusho uNkk Ngobese.Uthe noma benemicimbi kaNomkhubulwane ubeye ameme uNdlunkulu uMaNdlovu noMntwana uBusi beze bazoyala kahle izintombi.“Siyakhala singomama abahlola izintombi. Silahlekelwe kakhulu. Awu kodwa ngeSilo odadewabo. Ewu siyakhala,” kusho uNkk Ngobese.
title: Kushone odadewabo beSilo ababili

text: PHILI MJOLIUMNYANGO weMfundo eyisiSekelo izolo umemezele ukuthi zizomiswa ezemidlalo ezikoleni zakuleli, njengoba zinyuka izibalo zabahaqwa yiCovid-19. UMnuz Elijah Mhlanga okhulumela umnyango, uthe lesi sinqumo sithathwe wumkhandlu wongqongqoshe bezemfundo kuleli emhlanganweni wakamuva.  Uthe isinqumo sithathwe ngemuva kokuthi kube nabafundi abayisikhombisa okubikwe ukuthi bebedlala imidlalo eyenza ukuthi bathintane nabanye, kumbe bathintene nabafundi abenza le midlalo okutholakale ukuthi baneCovid-19.UMhlanga uthe eminye imidlalo engenzi ukuthi abantu bathintane isazoqhubeka kodwa kumele kuqashelwe ukuthi abafundi abasondelani."Kumele kube nesiqiniseko sokuthi kunebanga elidingekayo phakathi kwabadlala leyo midlalo nangesikhathi sokuzilolonga," kusho uMhlanga.Ngeledlule isishoshovu sezemfundo uMnuz  Hendrick Makaneta,  saphakamisa ukuthi ezemidlalo zimiswe okwesikhashana njengoba izwe libhekene nesivuvu sesithathu seCovid-19. UMakaneta wathi izibalo zabahaqwa yigciwane zizokwenyuka njengoba kungena ubusika, ngakho ukuvumela abafundi ukuthi badlale imidlalo eyenza ukuthi bathintane, kungaba ubudedengu.Imidlalo ethintekayo ibhola lezinyawo, ibhola lombhoxo, umkhalambazo neminye. Ngesikhathi kuvulwa izikole umnyango wezemfundo washicilela emqingweni kahulumeni imigomo okumele ilandelwe uma izikole zivula ezemidlalo.“Ngesonto lokugcina lekota yokuqala yokufunda nasekuqaleni kwekota yesibili kube nabafundi okutholakale ukuthi sebehaqekile, eGauteng. Izibalo bezilokhu zikhula. Lokhu kusitshela ukuthi ingozi ikhona nakuba kunemigomo ebekiwe elandelwayo yezokuphepha. Ngokwemibiko esinayo le midlalo inomthelela wokuthi igciwane lisabalale," kusho uMhlanga.USolwazi Andre De Bruyn wenyuvesi yaseStellenbosch, uthe okubalulekile kulesi sikhathi esibhekene naso, ukuphepha yize ezemidlalo zibalulekile ezikoleni.“Uma kubonakala ukuthi kunamathuba amaningi okuthi ezemidlalo ezithize zisabalalise iCovid-19 kumele zimiswe,” kusho uSolwazi.
title: Zimisiwe ezemidlalo ezikoleni zakuleli

text: ISIKHWISHIKHWISHI somdlali esigijima phambili ngawesokunxele kwiMaritzburg United, uMxolisi “Jomo’’ Kunene, sithi siyabethemba ozakwabo nakuba sona singekho ngenxa yokulimala edolweni ukuthi bazoqhubaka nokuyibamba ishisa kule midlalo esele ngaphambi kokuthi kusongwe isizini ka-2019/20.Umdlalo olandelayo nonzima abafana baseMphithi bazowudlala ne-Orlando Pirates eLucas Moripe Stadium, e-Atteridgeville ngoLwesithathu ngo-6 ntambama.Okwenza lo mdlalo udle ngokukhanga wukuthi womabili la maqembu azokube elwela ukuvikela isithunzi sawo ngenxa yokuthi awekho embangweni wesicoco kodwa azokube efuna ukuqeda endaweni ehloniphekle kwi-log.I-The Team of Choice ihlezi endaweni yesithupha ngamaphuzu awu-41 ngemuva kweZimnyama ezikweyesihlanu eziqoqe awu-43.Okwenza uKunene (28), odabuka eMooi Farm, eNyanyadu, eDannhauser, aqine idolo ngozakwabo yindlela yokuzethemba efike yatshalwa umqeqeshi wabo * -Eric Tinkler.“Umqeqeshi * -Eric (Tinkler) usenze umehluko omkhulu lapha eqenjini selokhu afika.“Into afike wayenza kubadlali ufake umoya wokuzwana, ukuzethemba nokuphikelela ngaso sonke isikhathi noma ngabe sibhekene naliphi iqembu.“Sisebenza ngomoya wobunye ngaso sonke isikhathi. Asinayo le nto yokuthi ubani uyisihlabani noma ungcono kunabanye eqenjini,” kuchaza uKunene.Uphinde waphawula ngokwakuyiphupho labo lokunqoba indebe yeTelkom Knockout eyagcine iqukulwe yiMamelodi Sundowns.“Nakuba-ke sigcine singasayiwinanga kodwa esesizibophezele ngakho njengamanje ukulwela ukuqeda le sizini sikwiTop 8,’’ kusho uKunene.UKunene uphinde waveza ukulahlekelwa kwakhe yithemba ngesikhathi iMoroka Swallows eyafeza iphupho lakhe lokudlala esigabeni esikhulu isiphinde idliwa yizembe.Ngaleso sikhathi yayidlala kwiNational First Division (Glad Africa Championship) ngesizini ka-2015/2016.Izinyoni zehlela esigabeni i-ABC Motsepe ekupheleni kwaleyo sizini okuyisigaba abedlala kusona esekwiDurban Worriors.Kwaba yilapho-ke uKunene afikelwa ngumuzwa wokuphelelwa yithemba ebholeni.Lokhu kwakwenziwa ukuzibona esebuyela esigabeni i-ABC Motsepe League ayesedlale kuso amasizini amaningi.Ngenhlanhla wasayiniswa yiBaroka FC maphakathi nesizini ka-2016/17 nokwenza walibamba ngazo zombili ithuba eliyingqayizivele ayeselinikwe yiBakgaga lokuphinde agijime esigabeni sePremiership.Waphinde wabamba iqhaza ngenkathi leli qembu livika izembe ngasekupheleni kwaleyo sizini nalapho ashaya igoli bedlala neKaizer Chiefs emuva kokugadulisa abadlali bayo waze wahlanganisa i-Itumeleng Khune namapali, eshaya igoli lokulinganisa.Lelo kwakuyigoli likaKunene lokuqala esigabeni sePremiership, nelamhlabanisa ngomklomelo wengcwenga yegoli lenyanga ka-Ephreli ngaleyo sizini.Emuva kokusinda kweBaroka ezembeni, ngesizini elandelayo lo mdlali wabe esebhekisa amabombo kwaNdongazibomvu (eMgungundlovu) eseyojoyina iTeam of Choice asephenduke isethenjwa sayo muva nje.
title: Isibabuli seMaritzburg sibeke ithemba kozakwabo

text: UMNUZ Angelo Agrizzi owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu eBosasa Facilities Management uthi babalelwa ku-80 abantu abebesohlwini lokugwazelwa zinyanga zonke kule nkampani.U-Agrizzi udalule lokhu ngoLwesihlanu njengoba esaqhubeka nokufakaza kwikhomishini kaJaji Raymond Zondo ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlazana.NgoLwesine uZondo uke wayimisa ikhomishini yakhe ephenya ngokusetshenziswa kombuso yidlanzana ngabo 2 ntambama, ngemuva kokuthola izikhalo zabantu akade bengenelisekile ngezokuphepha.“Asizange sisaqhubeka ngo-2 ntambama ngenxa yokuthi bekunodaba lwezokuphepha oluthinta ikhomishini. Kubalulekile ukuthi abantu abazofakaza bazizwe bephephile uma bethula ubufakazi futhi sidinga ukunika abasebenzi ithuba lokwenza umsebenzi wabo,” kusho uZondo.Ikhomishini imiswe emuva kokuthi uMnuz Angelo Agrizzi owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu saseBosasa ethe, ubone uMnuz Solomon Segale owayeyiphoyisa futhi osebhekelele ezokusebenza eBosasa engena kule khomishini.“Ngibone uSegale engena ema namaphoyisa afake umfaniswano wawo. Ngicabanga ukuthi usebenzise ikhadi lakhe lasemaphoyiseni ukungena kule khomishini ngaphandle kwamaphepha avumelekile. Ngikhathazekile ngokuba khona kwakhe,” kusho u-Agrizzi.U-Agrizzi useke wathola izinsongo zokuthi uzobulawa uma eke wakhuluma ngezinto azaziyo futhi useyaqashwa.Ngaphambi kokumiswa kwekhomishini u-Agrizzi ubethula ubufakazi ekhuluma nge-video ebikhombisa lapho kugcinwa khona imali yaseBosasa.Kule video bekubonakala isikhulu saseBosasa uMnuz Gavin Watson ebala imali u-Agrizzi athe yayisetshenziselwa ukugwazela amathenda.Kule video engamaminithi ayisithupha uWatson ubonakala enomuntu ayesebenzisana naye uMnuz Johannes Gumede noMnuz Papa Leshabane bebala imali ewuR1 million eyizitaki zikaR50 000.U-Agrizzi uthe le mali yayivalelwa nemininingwane ebalulekile yaseBosasa bese ikhokhelwa abantu ukuze iBosasa ithole amathenda.Uveze ukuthi wacela uMnuz Andries van Tonder owayephethe ezezimali eBosasa ukuthi aqophe lapho uWatson ayenza khona izigameko zomgwazo ngo-2017.“Baningi abasebenzi baseBosasa ababengayithandi indaba yomgwazo kodwa kungelula ukuthi bakhulume ngoba babemsaba uWatson. Ngiye ngafuna ubufakazi obuphathekayo ngoba bengazi ukuthi uma ngiza kwikhomishini ngingaphethe lutho bekuzothiwa imina engangigwaza.“Bengifuna ukukhombisa abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi kulula ukugwazela abantu. Sasitshelwa ukuthi singamadoda amhlophe ngakho ngeke siyithole imisebenzi lokhu kwangenza ukuthi ngizame ubufakazi obuphathekayo ukuze uma kwenzeka okuthile ngazi ukuthi nginento ebambekayo,” kusho u-Agrizzi.Uthe kwakunzima ukuphila kubona ngoba wake wabizewa emhlanganweni nephoyisa athe liyingozi uMnuz Nkosana “Killer” Ximba.UXimba wayengumhlobo wowayeyinhloko yezobunhloli uMnuz Richard Mdluli futhi waphelelwa wumsebenzi ngo-2015 emuva kokulahlwa yicala lokuthi wahlukumeza isigebengu esidayisa izidakamizwa uRadovan Krejicir.
title: #StateCaptureInquiry: 'Babalelwa ku-80 ababegwazelwa yiBosasa' - Agrizzi

text: UKUFIKA kwentombi yakhe kulamulele owesifazane (18) okuthiwa ubevalelwe nguyise wengane yakhe ubusuku bonke emdlwengula eHopewell, ngaseMgungundlovu.Umgilwa kuthiwa ubehamba nesoka lakhe elisha ngoMgqibelo ngesikhathi kuqhamuka uyise wengane yabo eneminyaka emithathu asebahlukana naye wamphoqa ukuthi bahambe naye baye endlini yakhe.Isoka elisha kuthiwa ulisabise ngommese wase elixosha wathi kukhona abasakukhuluma nonina wengane yakhe.Unina womgilwa uthe uyise wengane walamela indodakazi yakhe ihamba nesoka elisha wagajwa yisikhwele wase eyithatha ngenkani.“Indodakazi yami ilanyulelwe wukufika kwentombi kayise wengane yabe isibaleka kade eyivalele endlini eyidlwengula. Intombi yakhe ifike yangqogqoza ebusuku.”Uthe indodakazi yakhe noyise wengane cishe banezinyanga ezimbili behlukene.“Indodakazi yami ithi uyisabise ngokuyibulala wase eyitshela ukuthi ngeke ikwazi ukuhamba nomunye umfana yena esaphila. Uthe kumele yazi ukuthi uma nje eyidinga noma yinini uyoyithatha ngenkani.”Uthe indodakazi yakhe isithuka into engekho selokhu kwenzeke lokhu.“Usaba nokuphumela emnyango. Nathi siwumndeni nje siyasaba ngoba uyise wengane uyahlukumeza. Besathandana wake wafika lapha ekhaya ezomthatha ngenkani ephethe ummese. Asizange sikubike lokho emaphoyiseni ngoba samxosha. Lokhu kwenza sisabe ukuthi uzobuya asihlasele lo muntu ngoba unawo umlando wokuba nodlame,” kusho unina womgilwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe: “NgoMgqibelo owesifazane oneminyaka udlwengulwe umsolwa. Ngokophenyo umsolwa uphoqe lo wesifazane ukuba baye kubo eHopewell. Ubemkhombe ngommese.”Icala lokudlwengula livulwe esiteshini saseThornville.“Umsolwa uboshiwe, kulindeleke avele enkantolo yaseMgungundlovu kusasa (izolo),” kusho uCaptain Gwala.
title: Uvalelwe ubusuku bonke edlwengulwa

text: MHLELI: Ngibhala le ncwadi nginokudumala ngohlobo lobuholi esinabo KwaZulu-Natal ikakhulukazi enhlanganweni ebusayo i-ANC nenhlangano ethathwa njengenkulu yabasenzi iCosatu indlela abenza ngayo izinto esikhathini samamnje iyadumaza.Ngikhathazwa ukubuka isimo sakuMasipala Ugu lapho kwaxoshwa khona abasebenzi abevile ku-100 bexoshwa yimenenja ngoba ithi bangenele isiteleka esingekho emthethweni. Kuxoshwa abantu benganikwanga ngisho ithuba lokuzikhulumela. Kubantu abaxoshwa kukhona ngisho abantu ababesebenza ebusuku ngoba babengabonakali emini baxoshwa. Kukhona nabantu nama-general workers, o-supervisor babo ababethathe izinsuku zokuphumula kungekho ukuthi bazophuma nobani ababekwenza kwakuba ukusayina ehhovisi bese beyahlala kodwa nabo baxoshwa.Selohku kwathiwa udaba lwabo luyaxoxwa kodwa luxoxwa into engapheli ngenxa yobuntekenteke bobuholi esinabo esifundazweni iKZN nasesifundeni sasoGwini. Kuyadabukisa ukuthi kulesi sikhathi senhlupheko enjena kunabantu abahlaliswe emakhaya bebhuqwa yindlala ngenxa nje yokusatshwa kwemenenja eyodwa oGwini nayo esekubuye kwatholakala ukuthi ayihambisi kahle ngasemalini kumasipala woGu.Baholi ake nisukume nenze enakukhethelwa abantu ningajiki nezihlalo emahhovisi nibe yizikhulu, asikho isikhulu kwi-ANC nakwiCosatu kodwa kukhona izithunywa zabantu.Bhekani NgwaneEHIBBERDENE
title: Ngiyadumala ngobuholi be-ANC esinabo eKZN

text: LUPHUMILE uhla losolwazi abayisishiyagalolunye abazofakaza ohlangothini lomgijimi uCaster Semenya uma esebhekene ne-International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF) kubangwa umgomo wayo ozomphoqa ukuthi adle amaphilisi okwehlisa i-testosterone uma esazimisele ngokugijima amabanga awajwayele.USemenya ungumpetha womhlaba nowama-Olympic ku-800m. Ubuye agijime ku-400m naku-1 500m okungamabanga i-IAAF ethi abagijimi besifazane imizimba yabo ekhiqiza i-testosterone engaphezulu komthamo owejwayelekile kumele bayehlise ngokusebenzisa imishanguzo.Icala elifakwe nguSemenya lilalelwe ekomkhulu leCourt for Arbitration of Sport (CAS) eLausanne, eSwitzerland, kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu. Kulindeleke ukuthi isinqumo siphume ekupheleni kukaMashi.Izolo ithimba labameli bakaSemenya likhiphe olwalo uhla longoti abazofakaza lilandela i-IAAF ekhiphe eyalo ngoMsombuluko.“USemenya ukholwa wukuthi yena nabanye besifazane abathintekayo yile migomo kumele bavunyelwe ukugijima nabanye besifazane ngaphandle kokucwaswa futhi kufanele babujatshulelwe ngethalente labo lemvelo njengabo bonke abagijimi abadaleke ngezindlela ezehlukile,” kusho isitatimende sabameli izolo.Siqhube sathi imigomo ye-IAAF iyacindezela.“Iveza enye indlela engaqondile nebuhlungu yokulawula ubulili babagijimi besifazane. Isibindi sikaSemenya nokubekezela ukulwela ukugijima ngenkululeko kukhuthaza nabanye abagijimi abasebancane ezweni lakhe iNingizimu Afrika nasemhlabeni. Ithimba longoti elizimele lizoveza ulwazi olunzulu leseka uSemenya ngobufakazi.”Ongoti abazofakaza basebenzela izikhungo zemfundo ephakame emazweni ahlukene. Kukhona abasebenza ngokwengqondo, nalabo abafunde bagogoda ngokwakheka kobulili.Elinye iphuzu elibukeka lizophosela abameli be-IAAF inselelo enkulu yisinqumo sale nkantolo eyavuna ngaso umgijimi waseNdiya webanga eliwu-100m uDutee Chand, naye owayebhekene nenkinga efana nekaSemenya.UChand, owaphumela obala waseka uSemenya waze wameluleka ngokuthi asebenzise ithimba labameli bakhe.Yathi ngesikhathi yona iphikisa isinqumo se-IAAF yabe ingazi lutho kumnyama ngoba yayiyintombazanyana ekhulele emakhaya eyayazi ukuzilolonga nokuqhudelana nabanye kwezejubane.“Ngenhlanhla kaSemenya kuyena ngeke kufane nokwami ngoba vele usengumpetha futhi useqinile ngokomqondo.Abazofakazela uSemenya woMadeleine Pape, Solwazi Ross Tucker, Solwazi Wayne Derman, Dkt Jeroen Swart, Solwazi Carl Lombard, Dkt Ariane Spitaels, Solwazi Mark Engel, Solwazi Joel Dave noSolwazi Marc Blockman
title: Osolwazi abazofakazela uCaster Semenya

text:
BAZONYUSA izinga lokuphaswa kuka-matric emajele aKwaZulu-Natal njengoba kungekho noyedwa ofeyilile ngonyaka odlule.UKhomishana wezamaJele KwaZulu-Natal osabambile, uMnuz James Smallberger, uthe bamjabulise kakhulu abafundi bezikhungo zokuhlunyeleliswa kwezimilo ngoba baphase bonke KwaZulu-Natal baze babalwa nabafundi abenze kahle ezweni jikelele.USmallberger uthe njengoba bethole u-100% ngonyaka odlule, kulo nyaka bafuna wonke umfundi aphase ngeBachelor okungamamaki abafaka enyuvesi.Uveze ukuthi izinga lokuphasa linyuke ngo-11.99% lisuka ku-88.01% ngo-2018 kwathi ngonyaka odlule kwaphasa wonke umuntu bethola u-100%.“KumaBachelor awu-66 atholwe ezweni jikelele iKwaZulu-Natal ithole awu-24; kumaDiploma awu-34 kuzwelonke, iKwaZulu-Natal ithole amane; bese kuthi kumaHigher Certificates awu-29 ezweni jikelele, sathola ayisithupha. Zonke izikhungo zethu zemfundo zithole u-100%. Izikhungo zethu yi-Usethubeni, Ekuseni, neQalakabusha lapho abafundi benza khona iMaths,” kusho uSmallberger.“Kulo nyaka sifuna wonke umfundi aphase ngeBachelor. Besicela nemifundaze ezinkampani sicela ukuba zibaqashe ukuze bangabuyeli ebugebengwini uma sebephumile ezikhungweni zokuhlumelelisa izimilo,” kusho uSmallberger othe abasasho ukuthi amajele kodwa bathi yizikhungo zokuhlumelelisa izimilo ngoba bahlomisa abonile ngamakhono azobasiza ukuthi bangabe besona.USANDILE Stangoni ubeze agiye uma eseyokwamukela umklomelo wakhe njengomfundi wasejele obashaye bonke emakhanda KwaZulu-Natal, uze wabizwa nasePitoli ngenxa yokuzimisela kwakhe Izithombe:Zanele Zulu/ AfricanNewsAgency(ANA)UDkt Barney Mthembu, ibamba lephini lomqondisi-jikelele, elibhekele uhlelo lokufunda nokufundisa eMnyangweni wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uthe bayaziqhenya kakhulu ngabafundi basemajele abenze kahle, wathi bazobeseka ngaso sonke isikhathi.Uthe kuyilungelo lawo wonke umuntu waseNingizimu Afrika ukufunda futhi naye uke wafundisa ejele. Ikhansela laseLamontville, uNksz Nolubabalo Mthembu obemele iMeya yeTheku uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, ligqugquzele iziboshwa ukuthi zizimisele ezifundweni zazo ngoba nalo lake laboshwa lase liphuma lakwazi ukuqhubeka nempilo.Abafundi ababili abakhulume neSolezwe abangene ohlwini lwabawu-10 abaphase kahle emajele, uMzwakhe Madlala obefunda eQalakabusha noSandile Khoza obefunda Ekuseni (Newcastle) bathe bafuna ukwenza iziqu zomthetho kulo nyaka.UMzwakhe wangena ejele emuva kokuduna imoto kanti uSandile uboshelwe elokudlwengula.View this post on Instagram#MatricResults2019 | Umfundi obadlule bonke emajele ngemiphumela kamatric uSandile Stangoni (21) uthi unesifiso sokwenza iziqu ze-Architecture. Unxuse intsha ukuba idlalele kude nezidakamizwa. Video: @mcebo_mpungoseA post shared by 
Isolezwe(@isolezwe) on Jan 8, 2020 at 5:23am PSTBathe bafuna ukwenza iziqu zomthetho ukuze bakwazi ukumela abanye abaphule umthetho nabasolwa ngamacala abangawenzanga.Bagqugquzele abanye abafundi ukuthi bagxile emfundweni, bangalindi ukungena ejele ngaphambi kokuthi bafunde. Bekukhona nabesifazane abanikela ngesikhathi sabo baphinde basize iziboshwa ababizwa ngoMama baseChesterville.
title: Bahlela ukwenyusa izinga lokuphasa emajele aseKZN athole u-100%

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZETS Galaxy (1) 1Orlando Pirates (0) 0I-ORLANDO Pirates izinciphisele amathuba okubuyela e-Afrika ivumela ukushaywa yiTS Galaxy ngo-1-0 emdlalweni weDStv Premiership izolo, eMbombela Stadium.I-The Rockets idlule ngegoli likaMasilake Phohlongo alingqofele enethini ngekhanda ngomzuzu wesithathu esiwombeni sokuqala.EZimnyama zizoqhubeka nokuhlala kweyesine ngamaphuzu-46 emidlalweni ewu-28.Ukube zinqobile, bezizogudluza iLamontville Golden Arrows endaweni yesithathu ngamaphuzu awu-49.Lokhu bekuzoqinisa amathuba okubuyela kwiCaf Confederation Cup.Zisanda kukhishwa kabuhlungu kulo mqhudelwano, zishaywa yiRaja Casablanca yaseMorocco ngo-5-1 kwi-quarterfinal.Esiwombeni sokuqala iGalaxy isizwe ukushaya igoli zibekwa, izitobha zeZimnyama zingalindele lutho.Ngesikhathi abePirates besamangazwe yileli goli,          u-Abel Mabaso uphume ngekhadi elibomvu ngemuva kokudlalisa kabi uLindokuhle Mbatha singekho isidingo.Ngemuva kwalokhu kuqhamuke uMxolisi Macuphu, ongumgadli weThe Rockets, obethi ulinamathisela enethini laphuma eceleni kwepali.Kubukeka kubanengile abadlali beBhakhaniya ukuphuma kukazakwabo ngelibomvu. Bavele baba nolaka, kugqame kakhulu uGabadinho Mhango. Ulaka lwakhe ubebuye alukhiphele ezintini zezitha, nokho izitoba ezinjengo-Ebrahim Seedat zingazibekile phansi.Amaphaphu ePirates athe ukwehla, uSiphiwe Mahlangu weGalaxy naye ekhishwa ngekhadi elibomvu.Kwesesibili, iGalaxy kumele ibonge unozinti wayo, uMarlon Heugh ovimbe amabhola anzima. Ngeke lusale ngaphandle nodonga lwakhe obeluphebeza abadlali beZimnyama abebengqongqoze njalo. I-Galaxy bese ihleli emuva, idle ngamabhola okuzuma.I-Pirates iye kowayizolo ihambela phezulu kulandela ukuthi kodlule ishaye AmaZulu ngesonto eledlule. NgoLwesithathu izovakashela iBaroka ePeter Mokaba  emdlalweni okumele iwunqobe uma izimisele ngokusondela ekudlaleni eyeCaf.Izosonga iligi neTshakhuma ngoMgqibelo, e-Orlando Stadium.Ngokunqoba kowayizolo, iGalaxy igudluze iBaroka kweyesishiyagalombili. Inqoba lapha nje, bese ishaywe emidlalweni emithathu kulandelana.Umkhankaso wayo wukulwela ukuhlala kwiTop 8, uzoqhubeka ngoLwesithathu uma seyibhekene neStellenbosch eKapa. Izovala neKaizer Chiefs ekhaya, eMbombela.
title: IGalaxy inciphise amathuba ePirates okungena kweyeCaf

text: KUSHONE abathathu ezingozini ezihlukene eThekwini kusukela ngoLwesihlanu, okubalwa nomshayeli wesithuthuthu esithutha ukudla.Kuthiwa ubephuthumisela ikhasimende iPizza owesilisa othutha ukudla, ngesikhathi isithuthuthu sishayisa iloli, sangena ngaphansi kwayo ngoMgqibelo, oThongathi. Lo mshayeli (27) engatholakalanga imininingwane yakhe, kuthiwa ushonele endaweni yesigameko.Kwesinye isigameko esenzeke ngoMgqibelo eVerulam, kugingqike iveni ebizama ukuvika obehamba ngezinyawo. Abezimo eziphuthumayo kwaReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa) bathi bafike iveni isagingqikile eceleni komgwaqo.“Umshayeli uthe ubehamba ngasemakethe eVerulam ngesikhathi obehamba ngezinyawo ewela umgwaqo egijima. Ubezama ukuvika yena, iveni yagingqika. Ngenhlanhla umshayeli akalimalanga,” kusho isitatimende seRusa.Khona eVerulam ngoLwesihlanu, kulimale intombazane eneminyaka engu-11 noyise oneminyaka engu-32 kushayisana izimoto. Ingozi yenzeke ntambama emgwaqweni uTodd, lapho kushayisane izimoto ezintathu. Kuthiwa izimoto okuyitekisi, iFord Figo neVolvo, zishayisane ezimpambanweni zomgwaqo.Kusolwa ukuthi omunye umshayeli, ubephuzile.Kuphinde kwashona ababili engozini eyenzeke ngoLwesihlanu emgwaqweni uM4, eThekwini. Abezimo eziphuthumayo i-IPSS Medical Rescue bathi abashayeli bezimoto ezimbili ezishayisane bebevaleleke phakathi. Isitatimende se-IPSS sithi owesifazane obewumshayeli weFord Fiesta ushonele endaweni yesigameko“Umshayeli weToyota Hilux okungowesilisa, uzanywe ukukhishwa evenini. Isimo sakhe besibucayi kakhulu, waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela, washonela khona.”Kwenzeka lokhu nje, uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha nezokuPhepha koMphakathi esifundazweni uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, usanda kukhala ngokwanda kwezingozi esifundazweni. Usole ukuvulwa kokudayiswa kotshwala njengambangela yezinye zezingozi.
title: Kufe (3) abanye balimala ezingozini

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAUSEXOSHIWE uMolefi Ntseki esikhundleni sokuqeqesha iqembu lesizwe iBafana Bafana.Lokhu kumenyezelwe isikhulu esiphezulu seSouth African Football Association (Safa), uTebogo Motlanthe kwisithangami nabezindaba ngoLwesithathu eSafa House."Ngo-10 (ngoLwesithathu) isigungu esiphezulu seSafa sithathe isinqumo sokwehlukana kuthi  nomqeqeshi," kusho uMotlanthe.Uthe yena njengesikhulu esiphezulu ubesazohlangana noNtseki ukumazisangokusemthethweni ngesinqumo esithathiwe, badingide nodaba lwenkontileka ebingakapheli.Okugqamile kulesi sithangami wukuthi umengameli weSafa uDanny Jordaan ubengabonwa kuso.UMotlanthe ubehambisana nosihlalo wekomodi losomaqhinga, uJack Maluleka.Uthe isigungu esiphezulu sithume bona ukuthi bazoxolisa esizweni ngokuthi iBafana ayiyi kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ezobanjelwa eCameroon ngonyaka ozayo.UNtseki uxoshwe ngemuva kokuthi ehlulekile ukufaka iBafana kwi-Afcon. INingizimu Afrika ihlulwe yiSudan ngo 2-0 ngempelasonto edlule emdlalweni wokugcina wokuhlunga kuGroup C. Lokhu kwenze yaqeda eqoqweni isendaweni yesithathu ngamaphuzu awu-10.Amaqembu amabili aya eCameroon kube yiGhana eqhwakele neSudan esendaweni yesibili
title: Usekhonjwe indlela uNtseki kwesokuqeqesha iBafana

text: KUSHONE umfana oneminyaka engu-15 kwalimala omunye ngesikhathi imoto abebehamba ngayo igingqika emgwaqweni uBesters ngaphandle kwaseWatersmeet, KwaZulu-Natal.Abezimo eziphuthumayo kwa-ER24 bathi bafike endaweni yengozi bathola imoto encane igingqikile iseceleni komgwaqo.Okhulumela abakwa-ER24, uMnuz Russel Meiring, uthe ngesikhathi behlola indawo bathole umfana oneminyaka engu-15 esesihlalweni somshayeli, omunye oneminyaka engu-19 esesihlalweni somgibeli.Uthe umshayeli bamthole esesimweni esibucayi kwathi lo omdala watholwa elimele kancane.Kusetshenziswe izindlawu ukuze kukhulelwe umshayeli obevaleleke emotweni.UMeiring uthe ngesikhathi esekhululiwe umfana obevimbeke emotweni abezimo eziphuthumayo bathole ukuthi isimo sakhe siba bucayi kakhulu.Uthe bazame ukumsiza kodwa emuva kwesikhathi bezama bahluleka kwatholakala ukuthi useshonile.Umfana oneminyaka engu-19 kuthiwa ukhishwe emotweni welashelwa khona lapho.Kukholakala ukuthi umshayeli uhluleke ukulawula imoto yaphuma emgwaqweni yashayisa isihlahla.
title: Kushone umshayeli ono-15 kugingqika imoto

text: SEKUQUBUKE indida ngokukhishwa kwabaculi ababili emncintiswaneni wezindondo zamaSouth African Music Awards (Sama) izolo.USands wodumo lwengoma ethi Tigi noMobi Dixon wengoma ethi Lake By The Ocean bakhishwe kulezi zindondo. Esikhundleni sikaSands kufakwe uSketchy Bongo, kuMobi Dixon kungene ingoma ethi Mwanagu kaJackie Queens opike uVeneiGrette.USands odabuka eSwazini, ubeqokwe emkhakheni weRecord of The Year. Ingoma kaMobi Dixon yona isemkhakheni weBest Remix.Isikhulu esiphezulu kwaRiSA u-Advocate Nhlanhla Sibiya sithe okwenze akhishwe uSands wukuthi akayena owaseNingizimu Afrika.“Imithetho ithi lezi zindondo zingenelwa ngumuntu walapha eNingizimu Afrika ngokunjalo nomculo kufanele kube ngowalapha.“Odabeni lukaSands ungene kulo mkhakha ngoba kusuke kutonyulwa izingoma ezisuke zidle ukhasi kulowo nyaka. Neyakhe ingene kanjalo,” kubeka uSibisi.Echaza kabanzi ngohlelo lokukhethwa, uthe kulo mkhakha weRecord of the Year kuqale kubhekwe izingoma ezingu-50 ezidlalweni kakhulu.UKHISHWE kumaSouth African Music Awards (Sama) umculi uSands wodumo lwengoma ethi Tigi ngenxa yokuthi ungowaseSwaziniKuzona kube sekususwa ezingangeni esikhathini sonyaka okusukwe kugxilwe kusona ezingu-20. Ezisalayo zibe ngu-30 kuhluzwa kuzoba ezizongena kwezingu-20 okusuke kungezalapha eNingizimu Afrika.“Ngephutha kungene nekaSands ongowaseSwazini. Siyaxolisa kakhulu ngalokhu kuyena nakubalandeli bakhe ngoba besebeqalile nokuvota. Yingakho sesisungule uphenyo ukubheka ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani lokhu,” usho kanje.Mayelana noMobi Dixon uthe ukukhishwa kwakhe kube ngenxa yokuthi uthake kabusha ingoma yaphesheya.Yize kunjalo Isolezwe ngeSonto limkhumbuze ukuthi uDJ Sbu uke wanqoba umkhakha ofanayo ngo-2007 exube iRemember When It Rained kaJosh Groban wase-USA. Kulokhu u-Adv Sibisi uthe sebeshintshe imithetho ukubhekela abaculi bakuleli kuphela.Kuhlaluke ukuthi uJackie Queens ofakiwe, kuvela ukuthi ungowokudabuka eZimbabwe.U-Adv Sibisi uthe ngokolwazi abalutholayo ungowaKwaZulu-Natal kodwa basazoqhubeka bamnxuse ukuthola kabanzi ngaye ukuze konke kuhambe ngendlela.Mayelana namavoti abesengenile uthe bazowacisha kuthi abamenyezelwe bakhushulwe ukuze bangasali ngemuva kulabo abasemikhakheni eyodwa nabo.Umcimbi wamaSama uzoba ngoJuni 2, eSun City eNorth West.
title: Isidididi kukhishwa abaculi kumaSama

text: AKAKUNGABAZI ukuthi azothwala kanzima amaqembu aseNingizimu Afrika azoyibamba kwiCAF Champions League nakwiCAF Confederation Cup, uManqoba “TV” Mngqithi, oyiphini lomqeqeshi kwiMamelodi Sundowns, njengoba sekushintshwe isikhathi sokuqala kwalo mqhudelwano.Eminyakeni edlule imiqhudelwano engaphansi kweConfederations of African Football (Caf) ibiqala ngoFebhuwari igoqwe ngoNovemba. Nokho ngemuva kwezinguquko zakamuva ezenzeke sekungene umengameli omusha kwiCAF, * -Ahmad Ahmad, le miqhudelwano isizoqala ngoDisemba isongwe ngoMeyi. Ngesikhathi kuphuma lesi simemezelo sashayelwa elikhulu ihlombe kuleli kwazise sasizohambisana nesizini ye-Absa Premiership.UMngqithi, oyiphini lomqeqeshi kwiMamelodi Sundowns enqobe isicoco seCAF Champions League ngo-2016, uthe kusheshe kwajatshulwa kuleli njengoba ethi kuzoba lukhuni satshe ukuthi amaqembu azinikele ngokuphelele kulo mqhudelwano ngenxa yemiqhudelwano engaphansi kwe-Absa Premiership ezoqondana neyeCAF.“Ngibona kuzoba nzima kakhulu ukuthi amaqembu aseNingizimu Afrika enze kahle kule sizini emiqhudelwaneni engaphansi kweCAF. Lokhu ngikusho ngoba kunzima ukuhambela amazwe ase-Afrika njengoba amabhanoyi engahambi aqonde ngqo ezweni kepha ejikeleza kwamanye amazwe lokho okugcina kuthathe isikhathi eside. Akufani nase-Europe njengoba khona uma uhamba isikhathi eside kuba ngamahora amahlanu. Kungakho sibona ne-Uefa Champions League iqhubeka kahle ngaphandle kwezihibe,” kusho uMgqithi.Lo mqeqeshi uphinde waveza ukuthi ukuthatha uhambo lwase-Afrika kumba eqolo futhi kuthatha amahora amaningi ukuya kwamanye amazwe, ikakhulukazi asenhla ne-Afrika.“Ake ngenze isibonelo ngokusuka lapha uye eGuinea. Awukwazi ukusuka lapha eNingizimu Afrika uye kuleliya zwe uqonde ngqo. Lokhu kwenza ukuthi uthathe indiza eyisipesheli engingacabangi ukuthi wonke amaqembu angakwazi ukukhokha leyo mali. Noma kunjalo kusithathe amahora angaphezu kangu-20 ukufika eConakry ngoba sisuke lapha saya e-Ethiopia, sasuka khona saya e-Ivory Coast kwaba yima sifika eConakry,” kuqhuba lo mqeqeshi.UMngqithi uthe ufisa ukubona ukuthi ngabe iyozala nkomoni kule Champions League ezoqala ngoDisemba igoqwe ngoMeyi.“Uma ngingakhuluma iqiniso mina ngibona into engeke nhlobo ize yenzeke. Uzokhumbula ukuthi ngaphansi kwe-Absa Premiership sisuke simatasa nakhona njengoba kusuke sekushubile kweyeligi, kuqhubeka nomqhudelwano iNedbank Cup nayo iChampions League. Ngibona amaqembu akuleli ezoba nenkulu inkinga. Nanka akanke umbombo, ngiyafisa ukubona ukuthi iyozala nkomoni,” kusho yena.Amaqembu akuleli azoba yingxenye yemiqhudelwano yeCAF, iSundowns ne-Orlando Pirates abazodlala kwiChampions League, kuzothi iKaizer Chiefs neFree State Stars badlale kwiConfederation Cup.ISundowns izobhekana ne-AS Togo kwiChampions League ngoJulayi 17.
title: Izinhlelo ezintsha kweyeCAF zimshayisa uvalo uMngqithi
