text: KUPHELA amaphupho kubafundi abenza uGrade 7 no-matric KwaZulu-Natal, njengoba bebuyela ezikoleni namhlanje, zimbalwa izikole ezingeke zivulwe.Lokhu kushiwo nguNdunankulu wesifundazwe uMnuz Sihle Zikalala noNgqongqoshe wezemfundo uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu esithangamini nabezindaba eThekwini izolo.UZikalala uthe ezikoleni ezingu-6 148 eziKwaZulu-Natal, ezingu-6 044 sezihlinzekiwe ngezinsiza ezizovikela izingane ekuthelelekeni ngeCorona, wagcizelela ukuthi belulekwe ngabezempilo. Zingu-104 ezingeke zivulwe namhlanje ngenxa yokungahlangabezani nemigomo yokulwa neCorona.“Esikubeke phambili ukuphepha kothisha, yizingane nabasebenzi ezikoleni. Akukho lapho senza izinto ezizobeka impilo yezingane nothisha nabasebenzi ezikoleni engozini,” kusho uZikalala.Udalule ukuthi izikole eziningi sezidwetshiwe phansi lapho kuzoma noma kuhlale khona abafundi ukuze kuqikelwe ibanga eliphephile phakathi kwabo.Imishini yokuhlola ukushisa komzimba, izibulalimagciwane nezifonyo, uthe sekuthunyeliwe kuzona zonke izikole ezingu-6044. Uthe iningi lothisha liqeqeshiwe ngezindlela zokubhekana neCorona ezikoleni. Uthe yize amanzi eseyinselelo enkulu komasipla abaningi, baxhumene nomasipala ukuthi bahlele izikhathi zokuhambisa amanzi ezikoleni ikakhulu ezindaweni ezintula amanzi.“Angu-28 amagumbi angomahamba nendlwana athunyelwe ezikoleni ezacekelwa phansi yizigebengu kanti angu-461 amathoyilethi angomahamba nendlwana afakwe ezikoleni ezingenawo noma ezinamathoyilethi angekho esimeni.”UMshengu uthe izikole zizosebenza ngo-50% wabafundi ukuze zingagcwali. Uthe kuneziphakamiso zokuthi abafundi bashintshane ngezinsuku zokuya esikoleni, esinye ngesokuthi beze kanye ngesonto ukuze kungagcwali.“UGrade 7 no-matric bazofunda ngeke bashintshane, amanye amabanga azoshintshana ngokwesiphakamiso esikhona okwamanje. Lezo ezasha sizothutha abafundi sibayise kwezinye izikole ezinendawo ukuze bangasali ezifundweni.”UMshengu uthe bavumelene nezinyunyana zothisha ukuthi kuvulwe namhlanje futhi basebenzisana kahle nazo.“Udaba lokunyamalala nokutholakala kwezinsiza zokulwa neCorona, yinto ezophenywa futhi siqoke abazimele. Sifuna ukwaziukuthi kwenzakaleni ngoba sengamele imali yabakhokhi bentela.”UZikalala uthi isifundazwe senza kahle ngasohlangothini lokugwema ukusabalala kweCorona wathi abahaqeke kakhulu ngabaneminyaka engu-25 kuya ku-39. Bangu-3 060 abahaqekile esifundazweni, babe ngu-1 371 abalulamayo. Sebengu-61 asebeshonile.
title: Kumi ngumumo ezikoleni zaseKZN

text: ISIKHULU esiphezulu sePosi uMnuz Mark Barnes sithe sekuzophela inyanga yonke amaphasela awu-38 million esahleli ePosini.UBarnes ubekhuluma ohlelweni lwasekuseni lwe-eNCA ngoLwesithathu. Uveze ukuthi isiteleka samasonto amabili eposini yisona esiholele ekutheni kube namaphasela awu-38 million angahanjisiwe kubanikazi bawo.Isiteleka sasePosini senzeka ezinyangeni ezine ezedlule njengoba abasebenzi babefuna ukunyuselwa amaholo nokuthi kuqashwe ngokuphelele abasebenzi abayitoho.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwiSolezwe, uBarnes uthe kunabasebenzi abasebenza ngempelasonto ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amaphasela nezincwadi kufika kubanikazi ngesikhathi esifanele.Uthe sandisiwe isibalo sabasebenzi ababhekelele amaphasela avela kwamanye amazwe futhi le video esabalele kuFacebook ekhombisa amaphasela amaningi ayisilo iqiniso ngoba isimo sesishintshe kakhulu. Uveze ukuthi ngosuku iPosi lithola amaphasela noma izincwadi eziwu-210 000 ezivela kwamanye amazwe.Uveze ukuthi kuzo zonke izifunda iPosi lisebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bathola impahla yabo.Mayelana namaphasela avela kwamanye amazwe, uBarnes uthe banohlelo lokuthi uma kungawaseGauteng afikele e-OR Tambo bese kuthi awaseThekwini nawo aye eKing Shaka nawaseCape Town aye esikhumulweni samabhanoyi sakhona.Uphinde waveza ukuthi izinhlelo zabo zokuholela abantu izibonelelo zikahulumeni zihamba kahle kwazise imali abayithola kwaSouth African Social Security Agency iyabasiza ukuthi baqhube umsebenzi wePosi.“Ibhizinisi leposi lihamba kahle ngoba imali esiyithole ngokwenza umsebenzi wakwaSassa iyona ezosisiza ukwenza eminye imisebenzi. Abantu bazoyithola impahla yabo kungakapheli le nyanga,” kusho uBarnes.AbasePosini baphinde bakhumbuza abantu ukuthi bavuselele amakhadi okuhola isibonelelo sikahulumeni.Uthe abantu uma bengavuseleli amakhadi okuhola isibonelelo sikahulumeni bazoba nenkinga uma sekufanele bahole imali kaJanuwari.
title: Amaphasela awu-38m asaduve ePosini

text: USAKHUNGATHEKILE umndeni wenyanga engumfundisi edutshulwe ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu phambi komndeni wayo eBhobhonono, KwaXimba ngaseCato Ridge.UMnuz Bongani Shelembe (57) ongumbhishobhi ebandleni iHoly Baptist Church in Christ udutshulwe amahlandlu ayisikhombisa umuntu ongaziwa ofike wavulela ngenhlamvu ehlezi nomndeni wakhe bebukela ithelevishini.Isimo simanzonzo kule ndawo njengoba kuvele ukuthi sezijwayelekile lezi zigameko endaweni.Indodakazi kamufi, uNksz Masindi Shelembe, ebikhona kulesi sigameko itshele Isolezwe ukuthi bebehlezi nonina naye oyinyanga uNkk Joyce Shelembe uMaMbeje, ngesikhathi behlaselwa.Uthe basamangele ngoba uyise ubethandwa yiwo wonke umuntu futhi ewusizo emphakathini.UNksz Shelembe elandisa Isolezwe uthe bebebuka izindaba ngo-7, uyise ehlezi emuva kwabo ebhala etafuleni, uthe abezwanga kuvuleka umnyango kodwa bezwe sekuqhuma isibhamu.Endlini bebehlezi bebahlanu, uthe babaleke bagcwala indlu, yena wacisha ugesi ngoba esaba ukuthi bazodutshulwa nabo. “Okusicacele ukuthi bebeqonde ubaba ngoba thina umbulali akazange asidubule, ubengakwazi ukusiqeda sonke ngoba besisendlini engurawondi,” kusho uNksz Shelembe.Kwenzeka lesi sigameko nje ngoDisemba, uShelembe wayenze isiphihli somcimbi wokuthweswa iziqu zokuba umfundisi njengoba ubesaqhubeka efunda.Ezinye izingane zikamufi oNksz Nolizwi, Bonisiwe nomshana uMnuz Lungani bathe bafe olwembiza ngoba umufi ubelusizo olukhulu futhi eyithanda imfundo njengoba zonke izingane zakhe zifundile.Umufi kuvele ukuthi ubenamathwasa angaphezu kwayisithupha futhi kugcwala esigodlweni sakhe njengoba ubeze ahlole esebenzisa ucingo, exhumana nabaseSwazini lapho aqeqeshwa khona kwezobunyanga nobungoma.Ikhansela lakule ndawo, uMnuz Musa Mkhize, likhale ngamaphoyisa nezokuphepha kule ndawo.“Esehlakalweni sesibili kubulawa umuntu ngale ndlela endaweni kodwa akekho oboshiwe. Le ndawo isiphenduke isilaha sokuhlinza abantu ngoba bahlezi bebulawa. Sifuna siphele lesi sihlava sokubulawa kwabantu, amaphoyisa enze umsebenzi wawo,” kusho uMkhize.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt. Col Thulani Zwane uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala esiteshini saseMsunduzi, akekho oboshiwe.
title: Kubulawe inyanga engumfundisi phambi komndeni wayo

text: Leli cwecwe lahlomula ngezindondo eziningi kumaSAMA okubalwa neye-Album of the Year, Best Newcomer neBest Female Artist. Leli cwecwe laba nesasasa kakhulu njengoba ladayisa amakhophi angaphezulu kuka-30 000. Lokhu kwenze lo mculi wenoni iSuited wasimama kakhulu.Sikhulume noShekhinaheqeda ukucula emgubheniweHeart FM, eKapa, ukuthola ukuthi uphezu kwaziphi izinhlelo kulo nyaka. Lo mculi uthe usimame ngokushesha kodwa uqale kahle kakhulu.Uphinde wadalula ukuthi unezinhlelo ezinkulu kulo nyaka futhi uyazijabulela izindondo asehlomule ngazo.Ngemuva kwecwecwe lakhe elenze kahle kakhulu, uShekhinah usebenze kanzima kulo yize ewumuntu omatasa.Akaculi kuleli kuphelakodwa ucula emhlabeni wonke jikelele.Ekhuluma ngecwecwelakhe elisha uthe: “Ngijabule kakhulu. Ngicabanga ukuthi sengikhulile manje futhi ngijabule ngokuthi abantu bazobona lowo muntu kwi-albhamu yami entsha.”“Ngenkathi ngenza iRose Gold bengisasesigabeni sokukhula lapho bengibona yonke into ilungile. Manje sengiyabona ukuthi akusiyo yonke into elungile.”Uqhubeke wathi: “Ngifuna ukufundisa abantu ngesigaba sokuba seminyakeni engu-24/25/26.”Ngaphambi kwecwecwe lakhe wasebenza ezingomeni ezishisa izikhotha ezifana neBack to the Beach neka DJ Black Coffee ethi Your Eyes. Uqhubekile wakhipha amanoni amathathu ashisayo iSuited, Please Mr neDifferent ebe nedumela kakhulu emisakazweni.Ebuzwa ukuthi ucabanga ukuthi yini eyenza umphakathi uzifele ngomculo wakhe uthe: “Ngicabanga ukuthi bathanda umyalezo. Ngicabanga nokuthi ngisho le nto abafuna ukuyizwa. Abantu bafuna ukwazi ukuthi kulungile ukwehluka.“Abantu bafuna ukucula amaculo nabantu ababathandayo futhi anezihloko abazithandayo.”UShekhinah uthe into eshodayo emculweni wakuleli ababhali bamaculo.Uthe baningi abaculi abangahlomula kubabhali bamaculo njengoba nabaculi baphesheya bebhalelwa amaculo.Uthe abaculi bakuleli bazama ukungena kwimakethe yomhlaba wonke ngezi-ngoma ezishisayo kodwa kuba nzima njengoba bengekho ababhali bomculo.UShekhinah ungomunye wabaculi ababonisa abantu abathandana nabobulili obufanayo kuma-video omculo wakhe.“Ngikhule nabantu balolu hlobo ngakho yinto engiyijwayele. Ngikhule umama ethandana nabantu besifazane ngakho akukusha lokhu kimina,” kusho yena.Kulo nyaka uShekhinah uzoba nohambo lokucula umculo wakhe omusha aphinde asebenzisane nabanye abaculi emculweni wakhe.
title: Unyaka wokuba matasa kuShekhinah

text:
CELANI SIKHAKHANEUMHOLI we-DA ePhalamende uNksz Lindiwe Mazibuko (32) uthi usezinhlelweni zokuthi ashade abenomndeni wakhe ngoba akafuni ukufana nabaye abaholi besifazane abagcine bengenayo imindeni ngenxa yokunikela isikhathi sabo kwezombusazwe.Lokhu ukusho ekhuluma ne
Solezwe nalapho ebecacisa khona ukuthi ngabe unazo yini izinhlelo zokuthi abenowakhe umndeni njengoba ebonakala ematasa nezombusazaswe futhi engumuntu ongathandi ukukhuluma esidlangalaleni ngempilo yakhe.Echaza ngalokhu akazange acacise ukuthi yinto engenzeka nini kusuka manje.“Angithandi ukufana nabaholi abafana noHelen Suzman abagcine beze bebabadala bengenayo imindeni ngenxa yokuthi isikhathi semindeni nokuba nezingane abazange babenaso kodwa bebezinikele kakhulu kwezepolitiki. Ngakho nginazo izinhlelo zokuthi ngishade ngibe nezingane nomndeni wami njengabo bonke abantu besifazane,” kusho uNksz Mazibuko.Enkulumeni yakhe ugcizelele ukuthi yize ekucacisa ukuthi unazo izinhlelo zokushada kodwa akafuni umuntu osuke ezombuza ngezinto ezithinta izindaba zakhe zothando nokunye okuthinta impilo yakhe.UNksz Mazibuko ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokuthi bekulokhu kunemibuzo yokuthi ngabe uthandana nobani ngoba akakaze abonakale ehamba nomuntu wesilisa kangangokuthi nangesikhathi kuvulwa iPhalamende eKapa ekuqaleni konyaka waqhamuka ezihambela nonina, uNkk June-Rose Mazibuko onguMatron esibhedlela iNkosi Albert Luthuli, eThekwini.UNksz Mazibuko useke wacashunwa kwelinye lamaphephabhuku ethi uma eseshada uyoqale acabangisise ukuthi ngabe kufanele yini alotsholwe ngoba kukhona abasebenzisa ilobolo ukuhlukumeza abantu besifazane. Uphinde waveza nokuthi yize engumholi kodwa uma esesekhaya uyingane futhi lokho ngeke kushintshe.Ubekusho lokhu ephawula ngodaba lokuthi usephenduke ihlaya ePhalamende ngoba uMengameli Jacob Zuma uvele angayinaki imibuzo yakhe uma esephendula okushiwo abaholi bamaqembu aphikisayo .“Empeleni lokho angikuthathi ngokuthi kuhlangene neminyaka yami ngoba uma ngisePhalamende angizithathi njengengane kodwa ngiyazitshela ukuthi ngingumholi ngakho uma noZuma engangiphenduli ngisuke ngazi ukuthi yingoba esuke ebhekene nenkinga yokuthi akazi uzothini ngoba engisuke ngikusho kusuke kumphonsela inselelo,” kusho uNksz Mazibuko.Uthe i-ANC isenkingeni futhi inovalo nge-DA yingakho noZuma ehlale engayiphenduli imibuzo asuke emphonsela yona ePhalamende .
title: ULindiwe Mazibuko akafuni ukuze abe mxhiliba engakashadi wanomndeni

text: .UMampintsha, ogama lakhe nguMandla Maphumulo, uvela kule video eshaya ngempama uBabes (Bongekile Simelane) ngemuva kwengxabano. Noma abantu abaningi bezwakalise ukucasuka ngesenzo sikaMampintsha, kuke kwasabalala isitatimende ezinkundleni zokuxhumana siveza ukuthi lokhu bekuhleliwe, okuyinto ayichithile uSimelane.“Utshela abantu ukuthi ingane yami iyalingisa, wonke umuntu uyabona ukuthi iyashaywa, abamaphepha kumele bayilandele lento, uMandla uhubhuza amanga,” usho kanje.Akuqondakali ukuthi isitatimende esisabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana siqhamuke kuphi kwazise asifakwanga emakhasini ezokuxhumana kaBabes noMampintsha. UDJ Tira, obengumphathi kaMampintsha esakuBig Nuz, naye usichithile lesi sitatimende wathi singamampunge ngemuva kokukhuluma noBabes ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.USimelane uthe ufuna uMampintsha abhadle ejele ngalesi senzo.“Ngifuna aye ejele. Ngidinga ukuthi (uNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha koMphakathi) uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda ukuthi angenelele. Ingane yami iyashaywa, ngiyamazi uMandla uzohamba ayokhokhela amaphoyosa,” kusho uSimelane.Uthe uBabes ulandwe lapho abehlala khona noMampintsha eWestville ngo2.30 ezintatha ngoMsombuluko kulandela ukwaziswa abangani ngevideo abayibone ku-Instagram. “Amaphoyisa athe asibuye namhlanje (ukuzovula icala), kodwa kungamanga ukuthi ingane yami ibilingisa. Kumele enzeni uMandla ukuze abantu babone ukuthi uzoyibulala indodakazi yami uma amaphoyisa engenzi lutho?” kubuza uSimelane. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi nyakenye uBabes wahlatshwa ngemibuzo ohlelweni lwantambama kuMetro FM umsakazi uMasechaba Ndlovu emtshela ezinhlamvini zamehlo ukuthi uthole ngomthombo wakhe ukuthi uMampintsha wake wamphula umlenze emshaya. UBabes akaziphikanga emsakazweni lezi zinsolo kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wayihlaba indlela afakwa ngayo ekhoneni ngobudlelwano bakhe noMampintsha kulesi siteshi.USimelane uthe konke okwavezwa kulolu hlelo kwakuyiqiniso.“Khulumani noMasechaba, uyalazi iqiniso. UBabes wagonyuluka emndenini, kwakuyiqiniso, kodwa wabuyela kuye (uMampintsha),” usho kanje.
title: ‘Ngifuna abhadle ejele uMampintsha’ - ubaba kaBabes

text: IPHILISI lokulawula inzalo kwabesilisa lingasebenza kuphela uma lingatholakala emakhemisi. Ngeke kudingeke ukuthi olidingayo aye emitholampilo.Lokhu kushiwo uMnuz Siya Hlongwa ongumqondisi wenhlangano iTB and Investigative Network, KwaZulu-Natal. Uthe le nhlangano ibinesithangami sokucobelelana ngolwazi nezitshudeni zesilisa zaseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, ngempelasonto. Ibibheka ukuthi ngabe njengoba ucwaningo lwephilisi lokuhlela umndeni labesilisa, i-dimethandrolone undecanoate (DMAU), selisesigabeni sesibili nje uma kungathiwa selikhona amadoda ngabe angalisebenzisa yini.“Ngithole ukuthi izitshudeni ebeziyingxenye yalesi sithangami zithi zingalisebenzisa leli philisi. Kodwa kungamele ukuthi litholakale endaweni enjengasekhemisi ukuze ukwazi ukulithenga ungalokhu ubambe ulayini emtholampilo. Angimangalanga uma ngithola impendulo enjalo ngoba namakhomdomu amahhala akukhona ukuthi amadoda awafuni ukuwasebenzisa, inkinga ukuyowalanda emtholampilo, yikho ancamela ukuwathenga,” kusho uHlongwa.Uqhube wathi uyazi ukuthi amadoda asaba ukukhulelisa engahlosile ngaphezu kokuthi esaba ukuthola igciwane lengculazi.“Ucwaningo olwenziwe yiHuman Research Council (HRC), eVulindlela eMgungundlovu, ngo-2016 luyaveza ukuthi amadoda amaningi ayethi ayesaba ukukhulelisa engaqondille, ngaleyo ndlela ayayisebenzisa ikhondomu. Akayisebenziseli ukuthi asaba ukuthola izifo,” kusho uHlongwa.Uthe ngokubona kwakhe ucwaningo olwenziwa yiNyuvesi yaseWashington ngephilisi iDMAU, eselisesigabeni sesibili sokuhlolwa, lungaba yimpendulo ezinkingeni eziningi amadoda abhekana nazo mayelana nokukhulelwa kophathina babo, njengokuthi akhale ngokuthi abanjwa ngezingane.“Ezikhathini eziningi uma owesifazane ekhulelwe kungahleliwe, kube nemibuzo yokuthi ubengawuhleli ngani umndeni, mhlawumbe ukhulelwe ngamabomu ngoba efuna ukubamba indoda ngengane. Kwesinye isikhathi indoda ithi yona beyazi ukuthi uphathina wayo uyawuhlela umndeni. Uma sekunaleli philisi nayo indoda izokwazi ukuhlela umndeni,” kusho iHlongwa.Yize ikhona inhlansi yethemba lokuthi bakhona abesilisa abangalisebenzisa iphilisi, uthe umanqikanqika ukuthi amadoda angakwazi ukusebenzisa leli philisi okuthiwa liphuzwa zonke izinsuku kanye ngosuku ngoba amadoda angabantu abangathandi ukudla imishanguzo.“Uma sibheka inombolo yabantu abayeka imishanguzo yabo yokunqanda ukusabalala kwegciwane lengculazi neyesifo sofuba, yibo abaningi. Lokhu kwenza ukuthi ngizibuze ukuthi amadoda angakwazi yini ukuphuza iphilisi lokuhlela umndeni zonke izinsuku?” kubuza uHlongwa.Ucwaningo lwenziwa ngamadoda angu-83 aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-18 kuya ku-50. Selokhu kuvele imiphumela yokuthi likhona ithemba lokuthi leli philisi libe yimpumelelo, kunemibono eminingi mayelana nokuthi ngabe amadoda ayolisebezisa yini.
title: Umbandela wabesilisa ngephelisi lenzalo

text: UMAKADEBONA we-ANC uMnuz Parllo Jordan, uthi kusamele kube nomkhankaso omkhulu kuleli wokulwa nokubandlululwa kwabantu abamnyama ngabamhlophe.Ubekhuluma ohlelweni iThe Fix, kwi eNCA ngempelasonto mayelana nomthelela umkhankaso iBlack Lives Matter ongaba nawo ekuhlalisaneni kwezinhlanga ezahlukene kuleli.“Sasuke saqhamuka nohlelo lokubuyisana olubukeka lungekho mandla kangako. Lolu hlelo kumele ngabe lusebenza kuzo zonke izinhlanga kodwa okwamanje lubukeka kuwuhlanga oluthithile olwehlela ngezansi ngokusebenzisa lolu hlelo,” kusho uJordan.UJordan uphinde wathi kumjabulisile ukubona ukususwa komfanekiso oyisichuse kaMnuz Edward Colston eLondon owayehweba ngabantu abamnyama ebenza izigqila.“Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi namanye amazwe ase-Europe anjengeFrance neNetherlands, azibheke ukuthi wona ami kuphi ngokubandlululwa kwabantu abamnyama ngoba nawo ayethinteka kukona,” kusho uJordan.Uthe umkhankaso wakuleli wehlukile kancane kunalowo wase-America osuswe ukubulawa kukaMnuz George Floyd ngamaphoyisa akhona, okuyinto evamile ukwezeka kuleliya lizwe. “Kuleli sibe nezimo ezifana nokubulawa kwabantu eMarikana ababelwela amalungelo abo ezimayini, kanjalo nokubulawa kukaMnuz Collins Khosa ngamaphoyisa nombutho wezokuvikela kuleli,” usho njalo.Uthe ukwenzeka kwalezi zigameko, azifani ncamashi nesidalwe ubandlululo lwase-America, nakuba zonke zichaza ukubaluleka kwempilo yomuntu omnyama.Umkhankaso iBlack Lives matter ungenisile nakuleli emva kokuthi uqale e-America, wabe usunabela nakwamanye amazwe omhlaba.
title: Kumele elakuleli libe nemikhankaso emikhulu yokulwa nobandlululo

text: KUSAME nse ukusebenza kwamatekisi erenki yaseMlaza, iMNR naseNgonyameni njengoba ososeshini bakulezi zindawo bengavumelananga emhlanganweni kulandela ukubulawa kwabashayeli abangaphansi kwasoseshini uMNR eMlaza. NgoLwesibili ntambama kubulawe abashayeli bamatekisi ababili kwizigameko ezehlukene. Umshayeli oyedwa udutshulwe ka-D kanti omunye udutshulwe kwa-M.Kuthiwa ukubulawa kwalaba bashayeli kulandela ukubangwa kwemizila phakathi kososeshini ababili iMNR Taxi neNgonyameni Taxi. Kuthiwa osomatekisi bakwaMNR banqabele amatekisi aseNgonyameni ukuthi asebenzise umgwaqo odlula eMlaza uma beya eThekwini nokusolwa ukuthi yikho okususe lolu thuthuva.Izolo ososeshini iMNR Taxi neNgonyameni Taxi babe nomhlangano obulawula yisifunda iNingizumu 2.UNobhala weNingizimu 2, uMnuz Mandla Malishe, uthe baphume bedangele kulo mhlangano njengoba kungabanga nokuzwana kulabo soseshini.“UMnyango wezokuThutha usungenelele kulolu daba njengoba uze wasiyalele ngokumele sikwenze ukuze sixazulule lolu daba, kodwa umhlangano awubanga nenqubekela phambili njengoba kugejane amazwi kulabo soseshini,” kusho uMalishe. Isolezwe latshelwa umthombo walo ukuthi usoseshini waseNgonyameni uneminyaka wacela ukuncikiswa owaMNR.“Ubudlelwana bube muncu ngoba usoseshini waseNgonyameni awuyinyusanga imali yokugibela kule nyanga, uMNR uyinyuse ngo50c kubagibeli abaya ngaphakathi eMlaza, kwabaya eThekwini inyuke ngo R1,” kusho umthombo. Umthombo uthe ukunganyuswa kwemali kwamatekisi aseNgonyameni kuthathwe ngendlela yokudla umsebenzi wakwaMNR kwabe sekukhishwa umyalelo wokuthi bengabe besaguduza emzileni ohamba uMNR, bahambe ngoMangosuthu Highway.Amatekisi awabonwa erenki yakuMNR emva kokudutshulwa kosomatekisi, kanti abagibeli bagibela amabhasi, abanye bagibela awakwa-E, F nakwa-G. UMnuz Sifiso Shangase, oyimenenja ehhovisi leSantaco KwaZulu-Natal, ucele labo soseshini ukuthi baxoxisane. “Njengoba siyimboni yamatekisi sikhona ukusiza umphakathi, ngakho uma lungaxazululwa lolu daba umphakathi uyahlukumezeka,” kusho uShangase.
title: Kusabanjwe umoya ngamatekisi eMlaza

text: INHLANGANO esemandleni kuhulumeni KwaZulu-Natal, i-ANC, ithi ukushintshwa kongqongqoshe ababili baphambana ngeminyango yabo, akunayo inhloso embi ngaphandle kokuqinisa ukusebenza kukahulumeni.UNdunankulu, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, ngoLwesibili uthathe uNgqongqoshe Nomusa Dube-Ncube obephethe ezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nezokuVakasha, wamfaka koweziMali.Obephethe ezeziMali uMnuz Ravi Pillay, waya emnyangweni okusuke kuwona uNkk Dube-Ncube. UDube-Ncube ophethe nesikhundla sikaMgcinimafa we-ANC esifundazweni, ungumholi wemisebenzi kahulumeni esifundazweni.Ungomunye wabaholi asebenisipiliyoni kuhulumeni wesifundazwe nakuyona inhlangano ebusayo.Ushintsho belungalindelekile futhi lushiye abaningi bemangele. Kuke kwaba nemvunge nemibiko ethi kukhona ipolitiki edlalwayo ngoshintsho kodwa uZikalala wakuchitha lokho. Uthe ushintsho luhambisana nokubeka phambili izidingo zabantu.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Nhlakanipho Ntombela uthi indaba yoshintsho ixoxwe kakhulu, izinsuku eziningi, kwathathwa isinqumo kubunjenwe.‘’Isigungu esiphezulu se-ANC esifundazweni sihlalile izinsuku ezine, sacwaninga kabanzi ukusebenza kukahulumeni wesifundazwe.  Sihlale nezinhlaka ezehlukene futhi ubuholi be-ANC buthintiwe ngalolu daba. Yinto efanayo nokuthi senze ushintsho kuMasipala weTheku naseMsunduzi,’’ kuchaza uNtombela.Uthe amalungu abo ajutshwe kuhulumeni kufanele afunde ukuthi athunyelwe ukuyosebenzela abantu futhi asemseni wenhlangano, hhayi umuntu thizeni. Uthe kufanele bonke abajutshiwe basebenze ngokubambisana.UNtombela uthe inhlangano isazoqhubeka nokubheka ukusebenza kukahulumeni kuwo wonke amazinga. Futhi uma kunesidingo soshintsho ngeke bacucuze ukulwenza.Uthe bavule iminyango kuzo zonke izinhlaka ezifisa ukubeka imibono ngalolu daba.UNGQONGQOSHE Nomusa Dube-NcubeIzithombe: EZIGCINIWEuNgqongqoshe Ravi Pillay
title: I-ANC iphawula ngoshintsho longqongqoshe

text: SEKUQUBUKE indida kusabalala i-video yowesifazane ozibiza ngonina womculi  obeshadelwa ngempelasonto noveza ukuthi akamfuni noma ambone umakoti wakwakhe. Lo wesifazane osesabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ezahlukene uveza ukuthi yena wamthwala izinyanga eziwu-9 uMampintsha kodwa usezoshiwa ngaphandle uma sebeshada.Ukhala ngokuthi uBabes Wodumo “uyisikhathi sini” njengoba esetshelwa ukuthi womenywa ngomshado omhlophe."Yimina umama kaMandla wangempela owamthwala izinyanga eziwu-9 ekugcineni sengizodomorozizwa yilo makoti omusha obhedayo. Umakoti uthi thina asigcine ukufika noma sofika ngomshado omhlophe. Ngicela ukwazi ngempela ukuthi ningashada kanjani ngingekho, obani laba enibambesayo? Angibazi," kusho lo wesifazane.Eqhuba usole nabantu abaqopha lolu hlelo, Uthando Lodumo, okulindeleke ukuthi lukhonjiswe kwithelevishini, ukuthi abanalo iqiniso ngoba bekumele konke kuqale kuye kubekhona nakukhokhelwayo njengokuvela kwakhe ohlelweni. Ukhale nangokuthi sebeqophile kumele engabe kukhona imali asebeyikhokhelwe.Uphinde waveza nezinsolo zokuthi uBabes akakhulelwe konke kwamanga ufaka izidwedwe ukwakha isisu."Akakhiphe isimpontshi azale ingane yena. Ngilinde izingane ezamawele ayethembise ukuthi uzowabeletha, aphi ngoba awekho amawele. Ngikhulekela ukuthi uMandla wami uNkulunkulu amvikele kulabo sathane aqomene nabo. Ngeke usindisiwe ushadele kubantu abakholelwa emadlozini abangasindisiwe bese ubungqo," kusho lo wesifazane.Uphinde washiya angalazi kuyise kaMampintsha amsola ngokuthi isigebengu esidala esasintshontsha esesiqhamuka nezihlobo zaseChesterville angazazi. Uthe ukutheleka kulo mshado egqoke ophaca ukwenze ngenhloso ngoba bakhohlisiwe kwathiwa bazothengelwa izingubo kodwa lutho. Uyise kaMampintsha uthe ugijime wahamba nonkosikazi wakhe ngasese kanti nabazali bakaBabes ubasola ngokuba yizigebengu ngoba bekumele bakhulume naye kuboniswane.Uphethe ngokuthi akamfuni noma ambone uBabes futhi akakufihli lokhu ufisa kwaziwe yizwe lonke ngoba abanalo iqiniso nomndeni wakhe. Udadewabo kaBabes noyimenenja uNondu umshiye nesiqalekiso sokuthi akazi uyozala nhloboni, mhlawumbe uyobeletha ikati.
title: Ushiya angalazi ’unina’ kaMampintsha ngoBabes

text: ABOMSAKAZELI womphakathi iSABC baveze ukuthi imidlalo efana noZalo, ayiyi ndawo njengoba yenza kahle futhi kungenye yemidlalo efaka inzuzo.Bakusho lokhu ngoLwesibili ngesikhathi behlangene nabezindaba ezindlini zawo umsakazeli womphakathi eThekwini.AbakwaSABC bakhethe ukuhlangana nabezindaba ngenjongo yokuzobavezela ukuthi bami kephi ngokwezinhlelo zabo njengomsakazeli womphakathi.UGugu Ntuli oyisikhulu emkhakheni wezokukhangisa, uveze ukuthi kuningi abahlele ukukwenza ukufukula iSABC ukuya phambili.“Izinhlelo esibona ukuthi zenza kahle eziteshini zethu zonke sizimisele ukuthi siqhubeke nokukhuthaza abazibhekile ukuthi baqhubeke nokwenza umsebenzi oncomekayo. Kanjalo nemisakazo ehlukene eyenza inzuzo nayo sizimisele ngokuthi ikuqhube lokho. Umsakazo uKhozi FM ungesinye seziteshi esiziqhenya kakhulu ngaso. Izinhlelo abanazo zenza abantu bazithokozele, siyabakhuthaza ukuthi baqhubeke nazo. Kulezi zinhlelo kukhona i-Nyusi Volume eyenzeka njalo ekupheleni konyaka,“ kuchaza uGugu.Uthe yize kuke kwaba nezikhalo ngomdlalo Uzalo kodwa sebekhethe ukuthi njalo baqhamuke kuwo ukuze bezobona ukuthi yini abasunguli bawo abeza nayo.“Ngikhuluma nani nje, manje abaphathi bethu ababili abasuka eSABC bahambele kulo mdlalo ukuyobheka isimo khona. Imidlalo enye esiziqhenyayo ngayo emisha okukhona kuyo othi u-Bettina Wethu nezinhlelo zezindaba, ezemidlalo nemicimbi ehlukene yezindondo eyenzeka kuleli. “Okunye abantu abangakwazi ukuthi siphinde sibuyisele emphakathini njengoba besiyingxenye yomuzi okade uvulwa eWeenen kuleli sonto,” kuchaza yena.Uthe kubajabulisile futhi ukuthi benze inzuzo kaR43 million, nokuyinto abayigcina eminyakeni emihlanu edlule.USbongi Ngcobo ongumphathi woKhozi FM, uveze ukuthi ezinhlelweni zalo nyaka bazoqhubeka nomkhankaso wokuhlonipha abasakazi besifazane ababeyibambile kulo msakazo kudala.Uthe kulo nyaka bazohlonipha uZamambo Mkhize ngendlela efanayo abahlonipha ngayo uWinnie Mahlangu.
title: Aluyi ndawo Uzalo: SABC

text: ISISHOSHOVU se-IFP esike saba yimeya yaseNdumeni, uMnuz Sboniso Mbatha, sithi ngeke silale singandlalelwe, sizokuphosela inselelo ukuxoshwa kwaso kuaMasipala wesiFunda uMzinyathi.Isolezwe ngeSonto libike ngokuxoshwa kukaMbatha emva kokuba kuqinisekiswe wumasipala ukuthi sekuhlukene inhloko nesixhanti phakathi kwabo.Wayengatholakalanga ocingweni lwakhe ukuba aphawule kodwa emuva kokubona udaba ephephendabeni ubuye ehaza, wathumela umbhalo ephawula ngokuxoshwa kwakhe.Kuthiwa indaba inokusebenzisa budedengu izimoto zomkhandlu aze azilimaze ephindelela. Kuthiwa waze wavalwa ukuzisebenzisa kodwa wakhokhoba, wayothi uthunywe yimeya ukuba athathe imoto ayosebenza.Kuthiwa ngosuku axoshwe ngalo uMbatha ubengekho esithangamini sokuqondiswa izigwegwe, wafonelwa kwaze kwayekwa engatholakali ocingweni lwakhe.UMbatha okhonjwe indlela esikhundleni sokuxhumanisa umphakathi nomasipala, uthi ngeke agcine ngokuphosela inselelo umasipala kodwa uzophinde aneke amabibi afihliwe kulo mkhandlu.“Bengingathule ngoba lokhu okwenziwa kimi kwehla esiphundu njengesobho lenyoni kodwa bengihlonipha imigomo ye-IFP nomasipala. Kunabantu abaginqa izimoto zomkhandlu bayaziwa (ebagagula ) kodwa abakaze benziwe lutho.Ayikho imoto engake ngayiginqa mina abantu abayeke ukukhuluma izinto abangazazi. Sesiyohlangana esithangamini sezindaba zabasebenzi nomasipala,’’ kushwabula uMbatha.Uvumile ukuthi uzwile ukuthi uxoshiwe wangakhokhelwa ngisho nezimali zakhe kodwa ubona sengathi indlela okwenze ngayo ayikho neze emthethweni. Uthe maningi amahlazo kamasipala awaziyo azowabeka obala aziwe yizwe ngoba nabo bayamhlukumeza.UMbatha akaqali ukungena ekukhulumeni ngenxa yezimoto njengoba ngesikhathi eseyimeya kwake kwavela ukuthi uginqe imoto yomkhandlu.Uke waba sematheni ngesikhathi enza isikweletu sikatshwala bukaR 11 000 kwiDundee July. Kumanje uhamba icala lokuhlela ukubulala owayengusomlomo kaMasipala eNdumeni.
title: Usukumela ukuxoshwa kwakhe owe-IFP

text: ININGI labaqwayizi baseNingizimu Afrika kalazi ukuthi linegciwane lengculazi.Lokhu kusanda kuvezwa ngumbiko we-UNAIDS oveze ukuthi bangu-53% kuphela abaqwayizi basemadolobheni abahlolelwe igciwane lengculazi nyakenye yize belinganiselwa ku-60% abantu abadayisa ngomzimba abanegciwane lengculazi kuleli.Phambilini izinhlangano ezilwela amalungelo abantu abadayisa umzimba sezike zakuveza ukuthi ukungabi bikho semthethweni kwalo msebenzi yikhona okwenza ukuthi abadayisi bagcine bengayi emitholampilo ukuyothola usizo lwezempilo.Umbiko we-UNAIDS obheka osekwenziwe ukufinyelela kwimigomo eyaziwa ngo-90-90-90, i-Ending AIDS: Progress towards the 90-90-90 targets uveza ukuthi kusekuningi okufanele kwenziwe ukulwa nokusabalala kwegciwane lengculazi kubantu abadayisa ngomzimba kuleli.Umqondisi we-UNAIDS eNingizimu Afrika, uMnuz Mbulawa Mugabe, uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngezibalo zabaqwayizi abanegciwane lengculazi kuleli.Umbiko uveze ukuthi * -86% wabaqwayizi baveze ukuthi bayisebenzisile ikhondomu ngesikhathi begcina ukuya ocansini namakhasimende abo.“Isibalo esiphezulu sabadayisa ngomzimba (60%) banegciwane lengculazi. Ngicabanga ukuthi kubalulekile ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ibheke indaba yokukwenza kube semthethweni ukudayisa ngomzimba. Lokhu kuzonika elakuleli ithuba lokusungula uhlelo olucacile lokuqinisekisa ukuthi abaqwayizi bayahlolelwa igciwane lengculazi,” kusho uMugabe.Lo mbiko uveza ukuthi yize usemkhulu umsebenzi okufanele wenziwe ukulwa nokusabalala kwegciwane lengculazi, amazwe asebenza kanzima ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bayayithola imishanguzo. Balinganiselwa ku-53% abantu asebethola imishanguzo yokuthithibalisa igciwane lengculazi kanti futhi nezibalo zabantu abashona ngenxa yengculazi sehlile.Balinganiselwa ku-19.5 million abathola ama-ARVs kwabangu-36.7 million emhlabeni wonke. Izibalo zabashona ngenxa yengculazi zehle zafinyelela ku-1 million zisuka ku- 1.9 million ngo-2005.Umqondisi jikelele we-UNAIDS, uMnuz Michel Sidibé uthe banethemba lokuthi bazokwazi ukufinyelela emigomeni abazibekele yona yokunyusa isibalo sabantu abathola usizo sifike ku-30 million ngo-2020.Elakuleli libalwa namazwe enze kangcono ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi omama abakhulelwe nabancelisayo bayayithola imishanguzo.Amazwe amahlanu athathwa njenganezinga eliphezulu labantu abanegciwane lengculazi okubalwa kuwo iNingizimu Afrika, Namibia, Botswana, Swaziland ne-Uganda asekwazile ukuhlangabezana nemigomo yokuhlinzeka imishanguzo ku-95% womama abakhulelwe nabancelisayo abanegciwane lengculazi.
title: U-60% wabaqwayizi unegciwane lengculazi kuleli

text: UMNDENI wendoda nonkosikazi abashone engozini yomgwaqo ngesikhathi behudulwa yiloli ngaseMbali eMgungundlovu ukhala ngokusala kwabafana abangamawele abaneminyaka engu-16 beyizintandane.UNkk Duduzile noMnuz David Lekhoaba bashone engozini ebandakanya izimoto ezimbili neloli ngoMgqibelo.Le ngozi kuthiwa yenzeke ngasemarobhothini kaSasol ngaseSlaangspruit, eMbali.Kuthiwa imoto yezithandani okuthiwa bezingahlukani, ihudulwe yiloli ibanga elide. Zikhishwe abezimo eziphuthumayo, sekusikwe ukhakhayi lwemoto, sezishonile.Udadewabo ka-Lekhoaba, uNkk Thembekile Msomi uthe namanje abazi nokuthi bayamukele kanjani le nto ebavelele.“Umfowethu nomakoti wakhe bebeya emsebenzini edolobheni ngesikhathi beshayiswa yiloli. Ngokolwazi esisalutholile bebeserobhothini ngesikhathi kuqhamuka iloli eliphelelwe amabhuleki, lingasakwazi ukuma. Lifike lashayisa enye imoto ladlula. Lena ebihamba umfowethu, liyishayisile, lase liyayihudula ibanga elide. Bashonele khona lapho,” kusho uNkk Msomi.Uthe okubuhlungu kakhulu wukuthi laba bashiye izingane zabo zodwa.“Bashada eminyakeni engu-16 edlule, umakoti wayevele ekhulelwe. Bebenezingane ezimbili kuphela, amawele abafana. Ngomzuzu nje bahanjelwe wunina noyise. Kunzima nokukhuluma ngale nto,” kusho uNkk Msomi.ULekhoaba ubesebenza esitolo esihamba phambili sezimpahla zabesilisa uNkk Lekhoaba esebenza esalon enxanxatheleni yezitolo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt. Col Thulani Zwane ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa ase-Alexandra Road avule icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso.
title: Bashiye amawele abashone engozini

text: PHILI MJOLI , MONIQUE VANEK, JANICE KEW  noPAUL VECCHIATTOKUBUKEKA sengathi iNingizimu Afrika izohluleka ukugoma abasebenzi bezempilo abangu-1.5 million, ukuze bavikeleke kwiCovi-d19 ekupheleni kwale nyanga.Inhlangano yezempilo emhlabeni, iWorld Health Organisation (WHO), iyalele ohulumeni bamazwe ukuthi bagome bonke abasebenzi bezempilo ezinsukwini zokuqala eziwu-100 zokuqala zalo nyaka.Iphini likaNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt Joe Phaahla, lithe imigomo ekhona ayenele ukuthi kungagonywa lesi sibalo. UPhaahla usho kanje ngenkathi ekhuluma nezazi zomthetho, kusetshenziswa ezobuchwepheshe ngoLwesihlanu. Uthe iNingizimu Afrika i-ode imigomo ekhiqizwe yiJohnson&Johnson engu-11 million, kanti engu-20 million ikhiqizwa yiPfizer futhi kulindwe eminye ethengwe ngaphansi kohlelo lokuthenga ngokuhlanganyela olwenziwe yiWHO, iCOVAX neminye e-odwe ngokuhlanganyela ngamazwe ase-Afrika, yonke ngeke ifike masinyane njengoba uhulumeni ebefisa."Kulindeleke ukuthi ekupheleni kukaMashi kube sekugonywe abasebenzi bakahulumeni abangu-700. Imigomo yakwaPfizer neyakwaJohnson siyilindele kodwa sisilele emuva. Siyethemba ukuthi isimo sizogcina sibuyele esimeni uma kungenzeka imigomo isheshe itholakala,"  kusho uPhaahla.Imigomo yeCovid-19 iyashoda emhlabeni wonke ngenxa yokuthi amazwe acebile athenga kuqala. Bangaphezulu kuka-100 000 abasebenzi bezempilo asebegonyiwe kuleli. Uhulumeni ufuna kugonywe abantu abangu-40 million ngasekupheleni konyaka ukuze kuvikeleke bonke abantu.Iphini lomqondisi womnyango wezempilo kuleli uDkt Anban Pillay, lithe ukugonywa kwabasebenzi bezempilo kulindeleke ukuthi kuphele maphakathi no-Ephreli, abanye abasengcupheni yokuthola iCovid-19 bazogonywa ngasekuqaleni kukaMeyi."Indlela esigoma ngayo manje yileyo evumelana nohlelo locwaningo imigomo esiyithola ngalo. Uma sesiphumile ohlelweni locwaningo sizokwazi ukugoma abantu abaningi ngendlela esifisa ngayo,"  kusho uPillay.USolwazi Glenda Gray, umengameli we South African Medical Research Council (SAMRC ), obhekelele umgomo wakwaJ&J kuleli, uthe luyathuthukiswa uhlelo lokulethwa  komgomo.
title: Ngeke bagonywe bonke abezempilo ngoMashi

text: ZANELE MTHETHWAO THISHA baseMaxulwini Primary School, eHammarsdale kuthiwa badube ukufundisa besaba isijumbane somuthi esitholakale egunjini labo lokuphumula ekuqaleni kwaleli sonto.Izolo abazali baqhinqe emasangweni bekhala ngokuthi kusuka ngoMsombuluko izingane azifundi. Kuthiwa ngoMsombuluko othisha bathi bathole umuthi odale ukunukana phakathi kwabo.Lesi sikole sike saba nezinkinga kumiswa uthishanhloko, okuthiwa ubuye watholakala emsulwa. Uthishanhloko kuthiwa naye ubuye kuleli sonto, okuyinto okuthiwa abanye othisha abayijabulelanga.Kuthiwa wamiswa ngenxa yomsindo ngaphakathi, abanye othisha bemsola ngokuba ngundlovukayiphikiswa nangenkohlakalo.Izolo abazali bashayele umhloli wesekethe befuna azoxazulula lolu daba, wabiza umhlangano nothisha. Abazali bebelokhu belinde ngaphandle befuna ukuzwa isiphetho somhlangano.UNksz Zodwa Zulu obemele abazali kulo mhlangano uthe uzihambisile izikhalo zabo, umhloli wathembisa ukuthi udaba luzosukunyelwa.“Abantu abangafuni ukufundisa kulesi sikole kumele bazame ezinye, ngeke kuhlukumezeke izingane zethu kanje. Bese sithi udaba lukathishanhloko lulungile, manje asazi ukuthi kwenzekani,” kusho yena.Abazali bebethukuthele bethi uma othisha beqhubeka nokungafundisi bazosivala isikole.Izolo kuthiwa uthishanhloko akafikanga esikoleni, okusolwa ukuthi kungenxa yokuthi othisha abakujabulelanga ukubuya kwakhe.“Labo thisha yibona abanenkinga ngoba sezwa ukuthi abamfuni uthishanhloko ngoba uqinisa isandla, abakwazi nokuya emathoyilethi uma ekhona. Asinendaba nokungezwani kwabo, sifuna izingane zethu zifunde. Lena yomuthi ngeke singene kuyona ngoba asiyazi kodwa kuyamangaza ukuthi sekungaze kuphele isonto kungafundwa ngenxa yomuthi,” kusho omunye umzali.Isolezwe lishiye izolo othisha besavalelene emhlanganweni nomhloli sekuyoshaya u-1 emini. Omunye wabazali obengaphandle uthe kuphele umhlangano umhloli wababikela ngesinqumo esithathiwe.Uthe othisha bacela abazali babekezele, udaba luzolungiswa kodwa wanganikeza isiqiniseko sokuthi othisha bazongena emakilasini namuhla.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo, uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, uthe ukubuyela kukathishanhloko esikoleni kusho ukuthi abukho ubufakazi bezinsolo abebekwe zona.“Othisha siyabethemba ukuthi uma kunezinkinga bayazazi izindlela zokuzixazulula kunokuthi kuphazamiseke ukufunda. Isifunda sizolulungisa lolu daba futhi siyathemba othisha bazosibuyisa isikhathi esilahlekile,” usho kanje.
title: Badube ukufundisa bethola umuthi

text: ABAHOLI beNFP basoLundi naKwaNongoma baqoke ukuzivalela emakhaya abanye baya enkonzweni yakusihlwa ngenxa yobuhlungu ababuzwe kumenyezelwa imiphumela yokhetho ngoMgqibelo ntambama.Lokhu kugqame ngesikhathi Isolezwe lihambele eZululand ngoMgqibelo.I-NFP ithole isihlalo esisodwa esiShayamthetho KwaZulu-Natal lisuka kweziyisithupha ebelinazo.Kuzwelonke lithole izihlalo ezimbili. Umunyu ngemiphumela ushaye kwezwela kuyo njengoba amalungu ayo aqavile oLundi nabaholi balo bebengabonwa nangokhalo ezindaweni zobumnandi abavamise ukutholakala kuzo bejabule.Nasehhotela iGarden Court abavamise ukuyojabula kulo ngemiphumela bebengabonwa.UMnuz Jeremiah Mavundla onguSihlalo KwaNongoma, uthe:“Bengifuna ukubonga uThixo ngalezi hlalo esizitholile nokubonga ukuthi abantu bakwazi ukusivotela yize uMengameli wethu, uNkk Zanele KaMagwaza- Msibi ebegula. Sivotelwe sisesimeni esinzima lapho iNFP ichithe iminyaka emithathu isezinkantolo, yaphinde yehlulwa ukungenela ukhetho ngo-2016,” kusho uMavundla.Ngokujwayelekile oLundi uma kuphuma imiphumela kuyaphithizela kube nemibhiyozo kodwa ngoMgqibelo bekuhlukile. Kube nedlanzana lamalungu kaKhongolose elizame ukubhiyoza emgwaqweni osuka ngaseGarden Court Hotel libheke ngasemahhovisi aseZululand kamasipala kodwa lisheshe layeka ngemuva kokuhamba lukagesi.Epaki engaseSishayamthetho esidala, obekuthiwa kuzoba nombhiyozo we-ANC, bekuzihlalele abantu abebebuka imidlalo yePSL ehlukene bengazi nokuthi iliphi iqembu elinqobe ukhetho.UNksz Lihle Mhlongo waseMabedlane uthe yena uwuKhongolose, akanandaba nokuthi izihlalo ozitholile kuzwelonke nasesifundazweni zehlile ujabuliswe ukuthi i-ANC isaphethe.UNksz Thola Zulu we-IFP uthe kumjabulisile ukuthi i-IFP ikhulile. UNksz Nhlonipho Mhlongo uthe yize ejabulela ukunqoba kwe-ANC kodwa kusamphatha kabi ukuthi abantu basoLundi basacwaswa babizwe ngokuthi bayi-IFP.Iningi labantu okukhulunywe nalo belingayiphathi indaba yentuthuko kodwa belikhuluma ngezinombolo ezitholwe amaqembu.I-IFP yona inqume ukungabhiyozi ngoba abaholi bayo bebethi bakhathele, basadinga ukuphumula.Ngisho ngaKwaPhindangene eNkonjeni bekuthulekile.Ngo-2016 amalungu e-IFP awuvala lo mgwaqo eyobhiyoza esangweni loMntwana uMangosuthu Buthelezi ejabulela imiphumela.
title: Bazivalele emakhaya bezikhotha amanxeba abeNFP

text: BAKHOSELISWE eziteshini zamaphoyisa abokufika abahlala eGreenwood Park, Sea Cow Lake, Kenville naseSydenham ababaleke lapho behlala khona kulandela ukuhlaselw kulezi zindawo.NgeSonto ebusuku abanikazi bezitolo bangaphandle kwaleli bahlaselwe, kwathathwa nempahla yabo, nabo kuthiwa baphindisele ngenganono okuholele ekufeni kwabantu abathathu bakuleli.Ukuhlaselwa kwabangaphandle kuqhubekile ngoMsombuluko, kulezi zindawo imigwaqo ibisivalwe ngamathayi avuthayo nezingodo, abangaphandle abahlala kulezi zindawo babalekele eziteshini zamaphoyisa.UMnuz Daniel Dunia we-African Solidarity Network, uthe ukwesatshiswa kuqhubekile ngoMsombuluko okuholele ekutheni abangaphandle babalekele eziteshini zamaphoyisa.IMeya yaseThekwini uNkk Zandile Gumede ikugxekile ukuhlaselwa kwabangaphandle kwaleli okuhambisana nokuthathwa kwempahla ezitolo zabo. Uthe ngeke kubekezelelwe ukubuyiselwa kwezwe emuva okuhambisana nokucwaswa kwama-Afrika.Imenenja yeTheku uMnuz Sipho Nzuza ithe: “Kuyakhathaza kakhulu ukubona imibhikisho enodlame ethe chithi saka kuleli dolobha. Sesibe nezigameko eziningi zokucekelwa phansi kwempahla kuhulumeni, kuvalwe nemigwaqo ngodoti, lezi zenzo ziwubulwane ngoba kucekelwa phansi nempahla kahulumeni eyakhiwe ngezigidi zamarandi.”UMnuz Thami Ngidi okhulumela uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uthe bazwile ngezigameko zokuhlaselwa kwabokufika kulesi sifundazwe abakholwa wukuthi ziwubugebengu. “Abebehlasela abangaphandle kwaleli abashayela amaloli esizwa ukuthi kwenzekile, bayizigebengu ezifuna ukuphazamisa izingxoxo ezikhona eziholwa wuMnyango wezokuThutha kuleli.” ULt Col Thulani Zwane uthe izolo azikho izigameko ezintsha ezibikiwe kodwa abokufika babalekele esiteshini samaphoyisa eGreenwood Park naseSydenham.
title: Abokufika babalekele emaphoyiseni behlaselwa

text: UBONGA Isolezwe  owesifazane waseMgungundlovu ophila nokukhubazeka ebesevele ngekhanda ezikweletini kulandela ukuvalwa kwempesheni yakhe.UNksz Thandi Zondi (45) waKwaNgcedomhlophe, eMafakatini, wahlaselwa isifo sohlangothi ngo-2005.Uhole okokuqala emuva kwezinyanga ezinhlanu engaholi. Leli phephandaba libike ngodaba lwakhe ngenyanga edlule.Owengamele ezokuxhumana kwaSassa uNksz Sandy Godlwana wathembisa ukuthi uzolisukumela ngokushesha lolu daba. Emasontweni amabili edlule iSassa iqale phansi isicelo sempesheni yakhe emahhovisi aseVulindlela.UNksz Zondi ubesenezikweletu ezingaphezulu kwemali ayiholayo ngenxa yokuthi akakwazi ukuhamba kumele aqashe izimoto uma eya emtholampilo.Ubonga ukushicilelwa kodaba lwakhe nokusukunyelwa ngokushesha yizikhulu zakaSassa. “Ngabona sekufika imoto ngesonto okwakuzoqala ngalo ukuvalwa kwezwe. Bangithatha ngemoto bangihambisa kudokotela ngenziwa yonke into ngagingqa nezithupha.“Ngachazelwa nokuthi kunezinto ezingabhalekilekahle esibhedlela okwenza udokotela wangayivuselela impesheni. Kodwa bakulungisa konke lokhu ngikhuluma nawenje sengibuya ukuyohola ngiyitholile, sengilinde ukuthi baphinde babuye ngoba kwenziweeyonyaka ukuze kulungiswe enye incwadi yasesibhedlela engabhalekanga kahle,” kusho uNksz Zondi.UNKSZ Sandy Godlwana wakwaSassa osukumele udaba lukaNksz Thandi Zondi obevalelwe impesheniUthe okunye okumjabulisile wukuthi abakwaSassa bamyise ePinetown wafike wanikezwa inqwaba yokudla.“Ngabuya nokudla okuningi, baphinde bangibuyisa ngemoto bazokudiliza ekhaya. Ngiyabonga kakhulu ngoba bese siside isikhathi nginenkinga, ukube udaba lwami alubhalwanga kwiSolezwe ngabe mhlawumbe abakezi namanje,” kusho uNksz Zondi.Ephetha uthe yize bengasebenzi ngokuthi batholele umuntu indlu kodwa bathembise ukuthi bazozama nokumxhumanisa nezinhlaka ezifanele mhlawumbe ezingamsiza ukuthola indlu entsha noma ngabe umxhaso kahulumeni.UNksz Godlwana uthe kuwumsebenzi wabo ukusukumela abantu nokuqinisekisa ukuthi bayahlinzekwa ngosizo ngazo zonke izindlela.
title: Ubonga Isolezwe obese kuphele izinyanga engaholi

text:
ZANELE MSOMIK USOLWA umkhonyovu wokweba izimali zabantu emabhange ngokusebenzisa iselula emuva kokuba owesifazane waseMachobeni, eNanda eqolwe u-R14 000 kwi-akhawunti yakwaCapitec ngoDisemba.UNkk Thembisile Mdletshe, owebelwe imali abesanda kuyiboleka kwelinye ibhange efuna ukuqedela ukwakha nezinye izidingo zikaKhisimusi, uphithene ikhanda ngenxa yalobu bugebengu.Utshele 
Isolezwe ukuthi ngoDisemba 20 waboleka u-R28 000 kwelinye ibhange wangena kwi-akhawunti yakhe yakwaCapitec.NgoDisemba 24 wayesele no-R14 000 wazama ukukhipha imali yangavuma ukuphuma.NgoDisemba 27 waya egatsheni lakwaCapitec eliseBridge City wacela bamenyusele isamba asikhipha ngosuku, wathuka etshelwa ukuthi akusekho mali.“Angizange ngikholwe ngoba ngangazi ukuthi ngisele no-R14 000. Baze banginikeza isitatimende esiveza ukuthi akunamali kwi-akhawunti yami,” usho kanje.Ebhange watshelwa ukuthi imali ingene kwi-akhawunti yomunye umuntu oseGoli, yakhona kwaCapitec.“Intombazane ebingisiza ithe inayo imininingwane yalo muntu kodwa ayivumelekile ukuyidalula,” echaza.UNkk Mdletshe uthe wabuyela ebhange ayeboleke kulo imali eyobabikela lo mhlola nabo bakuqinisekisa ukuthi imali ingene kwenye i-akhawunti kwenziwa iMobile Banking Transfer, okuyindlela yokusebenzisa iselula.Emuva kokuthola lolu lwazi, uNkk Mdletshe ukhumbulile ukuthi ngoDisemba 24 kwangena ucingo lozibize ngomsebenzi wakwaCapitec efuna ukuqinisekisa imininingwane yakhe.Uthe wambuza inombolo yocingo ayisebenzisayo nekheli lalapho ahlala khona nokuthi iyiphi inombolo ajwayele ukuyishayela kwiselula yakhe.Kwangena i-SMS angayiqondanga kahle ngoba yayibhalwe ngesiNgisi.Uthe inombolo yakhe yocingo yagcina ukusebenza emuva kokushayelwa ucingo ngoDisemba 24.Indodakazi yakhe, uNksz Thobile Mdletshe, osebenza enkampanini yamaselula, uthe sebekuqinisekisile ukuthi kwasetshenziswa iselula ukweba imali kanina.Uveza ukuthi njengoba athola ucingo babefuna imininingwane yakhe ukuze benze i-sim swap bakwazi ukwenza iMobile Banking ngenombolo yakhe.UNkk Mdletshe wavula icala waya nakwaCapitec ngenhloso yokucela ukubuyiselwa imali kodwa wangasizakala.“Bangitshele ukuthi ngeke benze lutho ngoba maningi amakhasimende abo aseqolwe ngale ndlela.”IMenenja yaseCapitec Bank eBridge City, ezibize ngoNonku-luleko, yenqabile ukuphawula yasinika inombolo yamakhasi-mende ukuthi kushayelwe yona.
title: Uqolwe imali kwi-akhawunti yakhe

text: KUPHAZAMISEKE ukuhamba kwezimoto kwaphinde kwadaleka nezingozi emigwaqweni yaKwaZulu-Natal kulandela imvula enamandla eshiye abantu abaningi bekhahlamezekile izolo.NgoMsombuluko ebusuku kushone intombazane eneminyaka engu-14 ngenkathi kushayisana izimoto emgwaqweni uN3, eNtshanga.Okhulumela abosizo oliphuthumayo iNetcare 911, uMnuz Shawn Herbst, uthe zinhlanu izimoto ezibandakanyeke kule ngozi.“Abosizo oluphuthumayo baxilonge abalimele endaweni yesigameko kwatholakala ukuthi intombazane eneminyaka engu-14 ilimale kakhulu.“Le ntombazane ishonele endaweni yesigameko,” kusho uHerbst.UHerbst uthe kulimale abanye abantu abayisishiyagalolunye kule ngozi abadluliselwe esibhedlela ukuyokwelashwa.Kwesinye isehlo, owesilisa ulimale kanzima ngemuva kokushayisa udonga lwebhuloho emgwaqweni uM4 ngaseLa Lucia, izolo.UHerbst uthe imibiko abayitholile ibikhomba ukuthi lo wesilisa uhluleke ukulawula imoto yakhe wayoshayisa udonga lwebhuloho.“Lo wesilisa ulimale kanzima ekhanda nasesifubeni.KUSHONE oyedwa ngenkathi kushayisana izimoto ezinhlanu eNtshanga Isithombe: SITHUNYELWE“Uxilongwe endaweni yesigameko wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela ukuyothola ukunakekelwa.”Kwesinye isehlo enyakatho neTheku kutholakale imoto ibhajwe emanzini emgwaqweni uM4.UHerbst uthe imoto eyiSUV ibingenamuntu ngenkathi itholakala ibhajwe emanzini.UNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, unxuse abashayeli nabahamba ngezinyawo ukuthi baqaphele emigwaqweni nalapho bewela khona.Unxuse abashayela ukuthi bakhanyise amalambu, bangasondeli kwenye imoto eduze futhi behlise ijubane ukuze kugwemeke izingozi.Unxuse abahamba ngezinyawo ukuthi bangaweli ezindaweni ezinamanzi amaningi ukuze baphephe.
title: Izulu elinamandla lidale izingozi emgwaqweni

text: IMEYA yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, igxeke ukubulawa kwabantu ababili abagwazwe olwandle iNorth Beach eThekwini ngoMsumbuluko ntambama.UKaunda ucele amaphoyisa ukuba aqinise uphenyo lwawo lokuthungatha izigebengu ezenze lokhu.Uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luveze ukuthi owesilisa nowesifazane bebezihlalele esihlabathini ngaseSuncoast Casino ngesikhathi behlaselwa.“Ngithanda ukuqala ngokudlulisa amazwi enduduzo emindenini yabashonelwe. Amaphoyisa kumele asebenze kanzima ukubopha izelelesi. Isehlo senzeke ngesikhathi iTheku lizilungiselela ukwamukela izinkumbi zabavakashi ngesikhathi samaholidi okuphela konyaka,” kusho uKaunda.UKaunda uthe iTheku linohlelo lezokuphepha olwenzelwe izakhamuzi nabavakashi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bavikelekile ngaso sonke isikhathi.Ube esenxusa labo abangaba nolwazi mayelana nokuhlaselwa kwababulewe ukuthi banikezele ngolwazi emaphoyiseni.“Enye yezinto esizibeke eqhulwini siwuMkhandlu ukwandisa isibalo samaphoyisa aqaphe ubugebengu futhi sifake amakhamera ezindaweni ezihanjelwa ngabavakashi khona sizokwazi ukubona abantu abafunwayo abasuke behlela ukwenza ubugebengu,” kusho uKaunda.Okhulumela amaphoyisa, uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe kuyamangaza ukuthi babulawe kanjani abagilwa ngoba indawo ababulawelwe kuyo inenqwaba yamaphoyisa nonogada abayiqaphile.
title: UKaunda ugxeka ukubulawa kwabantu ngokugwazwa olwandle

text: NGEKE isakhokhwa imali yesikole ewuR450 nginyaka esikoleni osekuphele iminyaka ewu-17 sithola u-100% emiphumeleni yaso ku-matric iMenzi High, eseMlaza. UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu wenze lesi simemezelo izolo ngesikhathi esho ngokusemthethweni ukuthi sekusele izinsuku eziwu-50 ukuthi abafundi baka-matric babhale izivivinyo zabo zokuphela konyaka.UMshengu ucele abafundi ukuthi bagxile ezincwadini zabo.“Sesibala izinsuku ngaphambi kokuthi abafundi baka-matric abawu-180 000 babhale izivivinyo zokuphela konyaka. Siyacela abazali bayeke ukubathuma nokubaphazamisa. Mabadedelwe bayofunda ngoba bafunda ngisho nangempelasonto. Siyawucela umphakathi ukuthi ubeseke abafundi, ubavikele uma beyofunda ngisho sebephuma sekuhwalele.”UMshengu uthe bakhethe ukuthula umkhankaso wabo wokubala izinsuku eMenzi High ngoba yisikole esenza kahle KwaZulu-Natal yize siselokishini. “Uthishomkhulu uthe isikole sidala, nengqalasizinda ayisekho sesimeni esifanele ngakho sizobuya sizoyilungisa. Uthe kunamakhompyutha awu-30 kuphela kodwa abafundi baningi, sizobuya silethe amakhompyutha awu-60 nezinsiza kufunda ezinobuchwepheshe besimanje. Lesi sikole siyisibonelo esihle kwezinye, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ukusithuthukisa ngoba othisha baso bazinikele futhi nabafundi bayalawuleka.”Kulo nyaka uMshengu uthe balindele ukuthi abafundi baseMenzi High bathole u-100% njengenjwayelo bese izinga lokuphaza KwaZulu-Natal libe wu-80% kuya phezulu.UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, ucele abafundi ukuthi bagxile ezincwadini zabo ngoba sekubalwa izinsuku ngaphambi kokuthi babhale izivivinyo zabo zokuphela konyaka. Video: Boniswa MohaleUtshele izintatheli ukuthi bawenze wonke amalungiselelo okuthi abafundi baphase ngoba bekunamakilasi okuzilungiselela ebusika azoba khona nangentwasahlobo.Uthishomkhulu waseMenzi High, uNksz Muntu Ntombela, uthe sebevivela izivivinyo ngoba bayiqeda ngoJulayi isilabhasi ukuze abafundi babe nesikhathi esanele sokubuyekeza umsebenzi wabo.“Ngiwuthishomkhulu kodwa ngibuye ngifundise ngithole u-100% esifundweni sami, amaphini ami amabili nawo ayafundisa athola u-100% ezifundweni zawo. Siyabambisana siwothisha nabafundi bayagxila ezifundweni zabo.”UMnuz Khetha Mjodi onguSihlalo weCosas eThekwini, uthe bayajabula ukuthi izingane zaseMenzi High zizothola imfundo yamahhala futhi bayajabula ukuthi nokufunda ngezobuchwepheshe bamakhompytha kuzokwenzeka kulesi sikole okusho ukuthi abafundi ngeke basale ngaphandle kwi-4th Industrial Revolution.Okubajabulisa kakhulu uthe wukuthi zonke lezi zinhlelo zenzeka elokishini, wathi ukuba noNgqongqoshe osemusha wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal kuzokhuphula izinga lezemfundo kulesi sifundazwe.
title: BUKA: Ngeke kusakhokhwa eMenzi High

text: Sibusiso MdlaloseOYINHLOKO yabaqeqeshi esifundeni seSafa Amajuba, uJeff Nkosi, uthi akanakho nokuncane ukungabaza ukuthi uManqoba Mngqithi usekulungele ngokuphelele ukuyibamba ishisa kwiMamelodi Sundowns.UMngqithi (49), odabuka eMzimkhulu, KwaZulu-Natal, usanda kuqokwa noRhulani Mokwena kwesokuhola ithimba labaqeqeshi kumaSandawana ngemuva kokuhamba kukaPitso Mosimane, oseqeqesha i-Al Ahly eyizingqungqulu ze-Egyptian Premier League, yase-Egypt.Yize bekhethwe bobabili, uMngqithi noMokwena, ukuba baqhoqhobale esokuqeqesha amaBrazilians kodwa nguMngqithi okuthiwa uzoba nezwi lokugcina.Lokho kukhomba ngokusobala ukuthi kukhala isicathulo sikaMngqithi, ojoyine leli qembu laseChloorkop njengephini likaMosimane ngo-2014.UNkosi, ongomunye wabaqeqeshi abengamela izifundo zokuqeqesha ngaphansi kwezinhlaka zeSafa esifundazweni saseKZN nasezingeni likazwelonke, uthi kungaba yiphutha ukuqhathanisa uMngqithi noMosimane.“Ngokwami ukubona uManqoba usekulungele ngokuphelele ukubhekana nenselelo yokuhola iqembu elinjengeSundowns futhi anginakho nokuncane ukungabaza ngalokho.“Amagalelo akhe ayaziwa, usuke kude kakhulu nebhola, futhi uqeqeshe kuzo zonke izigaba zebhola kusukela kuSAB Regional League, Vodacom League (esiyi-ABC Motsepe League), First Division (esiyiGladAfrica Championship) kuze kuzofika kuPremiership.“Lokho, kumenza abe ngumqeqeshi ophelele, futhi oliqonda kahle ibhola nosikompilo lalo eNingizimu Afrika.“Ngesizini ka-2002 uthathe iMoja United ebidlala kwiVodacom League wayikhuphulela kwi-1st Division, nokuthathe iminyaka eminingi ukuthi kuphinde kube khona omunye umqeqeshi waKwaZulu-Natal ukwenza lokho (kuze kwaba nguSimo Dladla ngo-2016 efaka iReal Kings kwiNFD isuka kwiMotsepe League). Ngenkathi esaqeqesha kwiGolden Arrows akekho umthandi webhola obengathandi ukubuka i-Arrows idlala ngenxa yebhola ebelidlalwa khona.“Okunye futhi okufanele kukhumbuleke ukuthi nguye oqale ukwakha i-technical team enkulu kwi-Arrows, eyayihlanganisa ababengamaphini akhe uMandla Ncikazi noPera Ranthlakane waseBloemfontein, uMoses “Skebhe” Khanyeza owayeqeqesha onozinti (ngokubambisana no-Alexandre Revoredo waseBrazil), nabaqeqeshi baseBrazil (uLuis Reis Goncalves owayeyiphini lomqeqeshi noCarlos Parreira owayeqeqesha abadlali ukuthi babe qatha ngokomzimba).“Ngakho-ke ukufika kwakhe kwiSundowns asebenze kwi-technical team enkulu akuzange kube yinto enzima kuye ngoba yinto ayesevele eyazi,” kuqhuba uNkosi, owake waba yiphini likaFred “Junior” Njiyela (ongasekho) kwiNewcastle Blizzards eyayidlala kwi-1st Division ngeminyaka yabo-1990.ISundowns izovula isizini ngokubhekana neKaizer Chiefs kwephezulu.
title: ‘UMngqithi usekulungele ukuyibamba ishisa kwiSundowns’

text: UKUFEYILA enyuvesi okokuqala empilweni yakhe kuholele ekutheni abe nengcindezi ephazamise ukusebenza kahle kwengqondo yakhe kodwa engaboni.UNksz Nokukhanya Shandu (23) waseGingindlovu owenza unyaka wokugcina ezifundweni zobuthisha enyuvesi iWitswatersrand, uthe ukufeyila ezinye izifundo ngesikhathi enza unyaka wokuqala kwamenza ukuthi ahlaselwe yisifo sokuphazamiseka kwengqondo ngoba wayecabanga kakhulu.Uthe wayehluleka ukumelana nengcindezi yokuthi kunezifundo azifeyilile ekubeni kubo belindele ukuthi aphase kahle bese ethola umsebenzi ukuze abakhulule enhluphekweni.“Ekhaya bahlale bebala ukuthi ngizoqeda nini, bengihluleka ukubatshela ukuthi ngeke ngiqede ngaleso sikhathi ngoba kukhona izifundo engingaziphasanga. Bengicabanga ukuthi bazongibuza ukuthi yini eyenze ukuthi ngihlulwe ukufunda ngoba yikona engakuphumela ekhaya. Bengaqondi ukuthi ukuqala impilo entsha kunengcindezi. Ngangizibona ngiyisehluleki, ngenhlanhla uthisha wami wakhuluma ngezifo zokuphazamiseka komqondo ekilasini. Kulapho ngabona khona ukuthi ngiyagula futhi ngidinga usizo ukuze ngikwazi ukuqhubeka nezifundo zami kahle,” kusho yena.Uthe ngemuva kokuthola usizo wafunda ngezifo eziningi ezihambisana nokuphazamiseka komqondo, waqonda ukuthi indlela abantu abayibuka ngazo indaba yokuphazamiseka emqondweni yenza ukuthi lezi zifo zingasukunyelwa.“Emiphakathini yethu kuba lula nje ukuthi kuthiwe umuntu uyahlanya kungabe kusacutshungulwa ukuthi unasiphi isifo futhi angasizakala kanjani,” kusho uNksz Shandu.Eseluleme uthe waba nogqozi lokuqwashisa, ukusabalalisa nokufundisa ngesifo sokuphazamiseka komqondo. Nyakenye ungenele umncintiswano womuntu omusha ofisa ukwenza umehluko emphakathini, uMiss Gauteng Exclusive, aphethe isicoco sawo njengamanje.Umsebenzi wakhe ukuqwashisa nokufundisa abantu abasha ngezinkinga ezihlasela bona.Uthe uma uphethe lesi sicoco uyazikhethela ukuthi ufuna ukugxila kuphi, yena ugxile ekufundiseni ngezifo ezihambisana nophazamiseka kwengqondo nangendlela abantu abaziphatha ngayo uma benalezi zifo. Ulwazi oluhambisana nezithombe ezifundisa ngalezi zifo, ulusabalalisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.UNksz Shandu uthe uzophuma kulesi sikhundla ngenyanga ezayo. Uthe ubefisa ukuthi kuthi kuphela isikhathi sakhe abe esenehlangano yakhe eqwashisa ngezifo zokuphazamiseka komqondo, kodwaakakwazanga ngoba imigomo yokuvula inhlangano ibalula ukuthi kumele abe nabanye abantu asebebenza nabo ubengakabaqoki.“Okunye ebengikufisa ukuvula inkampani yami ukuze ngikwazi ukuhamba emiphakathini ngenza izinkulumo ezakhayo. Senginayo inkampani kodwa ngisacija ikhono lokukhuluma phambi kwabantu,” kusho yena
title: Uzime useqwashisa abasha ngezinkinga ezahlukene

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza, ukwamukele ukumiswa kwemantshi esolwa ngokwenzelela uma igweba abamangalelwa emacaleni aphathelene nocansi.Imantshi esebenzela eMlaza, imiswe isikhathi esingangonyaka ngemuva kokuba isolwe ngokuthambisa isandla uma ikhipha izigwebo emacaleni okudlwengulwa kwezingane.Kuthiwa ayisishiyagalombili amacala lapho ededele abadlwenguli wabathola bemsulwa kodwa kuthe uma amacala edluliselwa emajajini izinqumo zashintshwa, batholwa benamacala.UNkk Khoza uthe ukumiswa kwale mantshi ngezinsolo zokudedela izigilamkhuba noma ukuzinika izigwebo ezincane kunezilindelekile kuyinhlamba uma kubhekwa umfutho ofakwa uhulumeni nomphakathi ekutheni abenzi bokubi bathole izijeziso ezibafanele.“Yize lolu daba lusaphenywa, kodwa kuyakhathaza ukuthi kuleli zwe elinamacala amaningi abikwayo okuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane nezingane, amanye awo awakutholi ukunakwa okuwafanele. Uma lokhu kuyiqiniso kuzobe kufana nokubuyela emuva empini yokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane.”Uthe abantu abasebenza ngala macala kumele benze isiqiniseko sokuthi bawenza ngokucophelela okukhulu nangobuyoninco.Ugcizelele ukuthi ezinyangeni ezedlule, maningi amacala okubulawa kwabesifazane ngakho akwemukelekile ukudedela izigilamkhuba zizitanasele emigwaqweni.Unxuse uNgqongqoshe wezoBulungiswa uMnuz Ronald Lamola ukuthi abuyekeze wonke amacala aseke enganyelwa yile mantshi emisiwe.
title: Imisiwe imantshi esolwa ngokwenzelela

text: AMAZULU ayeke ithuba lokuziqhelelanisa namaqembu atabalasela ukusuka ezansikwi-log ye-Absa Premiership ngesikhathi edlala ngokulingana ngo 0-0 neBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni obuseKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza, izolo ebusuku.Usuthu luye kulo mdlalo luhlukaniswe amaqembu amathathu nePlatinum Stars ebambe ibhuleki kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-15 ngemuva kwemidlalo engu-18.Amaphuzu amathathu abezokwenza Usuthu lunyukele endaweni ka-11 ukuba lunqobe ngamagoli angaphezu kwamabili.Beluzojomba iPolokwane City kweka-12 bese lugudluza iSuperSport United enamaphuzu angu-21.Iphuzu lenze Usuthu lwanganyakaza kwi-log kwazise lusahlezi endaweni ka-13 ngamaphuzu angu-19.AmaZulu asahlukaniswe amaphuzu amane neDikwena.NgoMgqibelo ngo-3.30 ntambama Usuthu luzoshukana nePolokwane City e-Old Peter Mokaba Stadium.UCavin Johnson ocija Usuthu wenze ushintsho olulodwa eqenjini eliqoqe amaphuzu amathathu ngesikhathi luguqisa iSuperSport United ngo 2-0 ekhaya ngempelasonto.UCamaldine Abraw uthathe indawo kaRhulani Manzini phambili. U-Abraw owaduma kwiKaizer Chiefs usayine oSuthwini ngeledlule.Akazange adlale ngempelasonto ngoba amaphepha akhe okusebenza kuleli abengakalungi.Ngemizuzu engu-20 yokuqala Usuthu yilona obeluphethe umdlalo kubhoke * -Ovidy Karuru.Izivakashi bezizumisa njengoba uSiyabonga Mbatha etakule Usuthu sekukubi ngomzuzu ka-24 evimba ibhola eliyingozi ebelithunyelwe nguDeon Hotto.Umqeqeshi weCeltic, uVeselin Jelusic wenze izinguquko ezine esikimini esihlulwe yiBidvest Wits ngo 1-0 ngesonto eledlule.Ufake * -Aphiwe Lubisi, Vusi Shikweni, Victor Letsoalo noRoggert Nyundu ezindaweni zoMpho Maruping, Given Mashikinya, Lantshene Phalane noTshegofatso Mabaso.Abalandeli babuyele emakhaya bedumele amagoli engabonwa.
title: Usuthu luyeke ithuba lokungabalwa nasezembeni

text: I-USA ikhiphe imiphumela yomunye umgomo onemiphumela  ekhomba ukuvikeleka kwiCovid-19 ngo-94.5% ngoMsombuluko .Kwenzeka lokhu ngemuva kwesonto kuvele imiphumela yokuhlolwa komunye umgomo kulo leli lizwe ekhombisa ukuvikeleka kwiCovid-19 ngo-90%.Umgomo wakamuva ubuhlolwa yiModerna Inc,  ucwaningo lwawo olwenziwe kubantu lukhomba ukuvikeleka ngo-94.5%.Ngeledlule iPfizer neBioNtech ikhiphe imiphumela yowayo umgomo obukhomba ukuvikeleka okungu-90%.Imiphumela yale migomo yomibili kusengeyesikhashana. Amavolontiya ayingxenye yocwaningo lweModerna  angu-30 000.Isitatimende esikhishwe iModerna sithe ucwaningo olwenziwa kubantu lusesigabeni sesithathu kanti imiphumela yesikhashana ikhomba ukuthi kukhona ukuvikela okwenziwa yilo mgomo ohlolwayo.Yomibili imigomo ohlolwe iModerna nohlolwe iPfizer isebenzisa ubuchwepheshe obufanayo obaziwa nge-mRNA.Okwamanje imigomo ayikabhaliswa esikhungweni esilawula ukukhiqizwa kwemithi kuleliya lizwe ngoba ubuchwepheshe obusetshenziswe kuyo busha abaziwa. Imigomo ehlolwayo idinga ukuhlala efrijini kodwa iPfizer idinga  isiqandisi esibanda kakhulu esingekho ezibhedlela eziningi, bekunemibuzo yokuthi uma kungathiwa iyaphasiswa  izogcinwa kuphi futhi uma ihanjiswa ezibhedlela izofakwa kuphi ukuze ingonakali kanti iModerna ingakwazi ukuhlala nasefrijini lasekhaya elijwayelekile.UDkt Jabulani Ncayiyana waseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal uthe ulwazi oluningi oluthinta  le miphumela alukadalulwa ngakho akukuningi kakhulu okwaziwayo ngale migomo kodwa imiphumela yayo inikeza ithemba.“Imininingwane yokuthi ngabe isebenza kanjani, ngabe ivikela ukuthi umuntu angangenwa yiCovid-19 noma iyamelapha asikabinayo.  Le migomo njengoba  ikhiqizwa e-USA uma ingaphumelela kungathatha isikhathi ukuthi ifike e-Afrika. Uma isifika ngicabanga ukuthi kuyoba nohlelo lokuthi ngobani okumele bagonywe kuqala okungaba abantu abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona, abadala nabasebenzi bezempilo ngoba umgomo ngeke uthi ufika ube sewenele ukugoma bonke abantu,” kusho yena.
title: ‘Kuningi okungakadalulwa ngemigomo yeCovid-19’

text: BELINGAKHULULEKILE ngokusebenza kwalo ebusuku iphoyisa lesifazane elidutshulwe lafa nozakwabo abebegade naye umuzi wekhansela, eBhambayi ngoMsombuluko.UConstable Sonto Mhlanga (40) odabuka eMpumalanga obehlala eSeatides, Othongathi udutshulwe wafa nozakwabo uSeargent Fanifani Dladla (61) begade umuzi wekhansela uMnuz Sthe Zulu.UConst Mhlanga kuthiwa ubethi akakhululekile ngokusebenza ebusuku endaweni okuhlale kubulawa kuyo abantu njengoba engumuntu wesifazane.Umfowabo uMnuz Thulebona Mathebane uthe udadewabo ubewuthanda umsebenzi wakhe kodwa ethi akumkhululi ukusebenza ebusuku kule ndawo okuhlale kubulawa kuyo abantu njengoba engumuntu wesifazane.NgeSonto eledlule kuthiwa uthe uyabona ukuthi nabo bangafa noma yinini.“Ubethi kubulawa osomatekisi nabantu abehlukene emphakathini. Ethi uyasebenza ebusuku ngoba ayikho into angayenza ngoba kuyingxenye yomsebenzi wakhe wobuphoyisa. Yize ebekhala kangaka ngokuthi akakhululekile ngokusebenza ebusuku ubengakaze athi ucabanga ukushiya umsebenzini, noma ukwenza indlela ethile yokuthi adoje. Ubezimisela ngomsebenzi, ehlale ebheke ukuthi ukusebenza kwakhe kuzomenza akwazi ukuphila impilo ayithandayo. Ubezithanda izinto ezinhle. Uma sixoxa ubebala izindawo eziphezulu abethi ufisa ukuba nomuzi kuzona noma nje ahlale kuzo. Bekuthi noma kunzima emsebenzini athi uzoqhubeka nokusebenza inqobo nje uma ezothola izinto azifunayo,” kusho umfowabo kamufi.UConstable Mhlanga ubeneminyaka ewu-12 esebenza emaphoyiseni kamasipala.“Ngilimele kakhulu ngokushona kukadadewethu ngale ndlela, ngizwa sengathi kunembobo evulekile emzimbeni wami. Belingapheli isonto singazange sikhulume ngocingo, angixoxele ngokwenzeka eThekwini ngoba mina ngihlala ekhaya eMpumalanga. Uma ethole isikhathi sokuphumula ubebuya ekhaya,” kusho umfowabo kamufi.Uthe udadewabo ushiye indodakazi eneminyaka ewu-18.Uzakwabo uSgt Dladla waseHambanathi kuthiwa ubehlanganisa iminyaka engu-61 ngoMgqibelo.Umfowabo kaSgt Dladla, uMnuz Thanda Dladla uthe usafisa ukuchazelwa ukuthi kwenziwe yini kuthathwe amaphoyisa aqashelwe ukubheka abephula imithetho yomgwaqo nabephula imithetho yedolobha, kuthiwe abayogada ikhansela.“Kwenziwa yini amaphoyisa agade ikhansela abekwe ngaphandle komuzi, lapho ebukwa khona izinswelaboya ukuthi asebenza kanjani?” kubuza uDladla.USgt Dladla ubegubha usuku lokuzalwa ngoMgqibelo, umfowabo uthi ubezothatha umhlalaphansi ngoNovemba.Namhlanje kuzoba nenkonzo yesikhumbuzo yokubakhumbula eCity Hall eThekwini.
title: Belingakhululekile iphoyisa elibulewe

text: UNOBHALA weCosatu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Edwin Mkhize, usabisa ngokuthi bazowuqinisa umkhankaso wabo wokulwa nokuthi kwehliswe intengo kaphethroli nokunyuka kweVAT kuze kube bayalalelwa.Amalungu eCosatu nezinye izinhlaka zomphakathi ngoLwesihlanu bahlele ukuthi baqhinqe eMariannhil Toll Plaza ukuze bazwakalise intukuthelo yabo ngokwenyuka njalo kukaphethroli neVAT.Engxoxweni neSolezwe izolo, uMkhize uthe banethemba lokuthi umkhankaso wabo uzohamba kahle njengoba ziningi izinhlaka zomphakathi ezizibophezele ekutheni zizoba kanye nabo. "Noma ngingeke ngikwazi ukusho ukuthi silindele abantu abangaki kodwa ngingasho ukuthi baningi abantu abazibophezele ekutheni babe yingxenye yomkhankaso wethu."Uthe kade bakuveza ukuthi abahambisani nokwenyuka njalo kukaphethroli. “Lona umkhankaso weCosatu kazwelonke, siyawuqala lapha eKZN silindele ukuthi nezinye izifundazwe zenze okufanayo."Uthe bazowuqinisa umkhankaso wabo kuze kube bayalalelwa. “Uzokhumbula ukuthi sike sawenza umkhankaso ofanayo ngemuva kokwenyuswa kweVAT njengoba manje sesiqala impi yokwenyuka kukaphethroli,” kusho uMkhize.Uthe balindele ngisho namadlelandawonye abo emkhankasweni wangoLwesihlanu.“Ukunyuka njalo kukaphethroli neVAT kushaya kakhulu thina basebenzi, yingakho sithi asisukume,” kusho uMkhize.Izinhlaka ezahlukene emphakathini sezizwakalise ukungenami ngokwenyuka njalo kukaphethroli osumba eqolo.I-ANC izwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokunyuka kwezidingo ikakhulu uphethroli nokudla.UMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, uNobhala wale nhlangano esifundazweni, uthe bazoba yingxenye yalo mkhankaso weCosatu esifundazweni.“Sizothumela amalungu esigungu esiphezulu ukuthi abe yingxenye yalo mkhankaso wokulwisana nokunyuka kwezidingo. Noma sazi ukuthi ziningi izinto eziwumthelela wokuthi kunyuke izidingo kodwa lokhu kubeka umthwalo emahlombe abasebenzi nabantu abahluphekayo,” kusho uNtuli.Unxuse uhulumeni ukuthi ubheke izindlela ongenza ngayo imizamo yokwehlisa isimo ukuze kuvikelwe abantu abantulayo.
title: Uzoqina umkhankaso kaphethroli

text: KUDUTSHULWE kwabulawa umshayeli wetekisi kukhona abagibeli kwalimala umgibeli oyedwa KwaMashu ehostela izolo.Amaphoyisa aKwaMashu athungatha umsolwa kulandela lesi sigameko esenzeke ngo-6 ekuseni.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi umshayeli udutshulwe ngabantu abenze sengathi bamisa itekisi ngenhloso yokugibela, babe sebevulela ngenhlamvu kwadubuleka umshayeli, nomunye umgibeli osindile.Itekisi kuthiwa kade ingakagcwali kodwa bese kukhona abantu abagibele ngaphakathi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt. Col. Thulani Zwane, uthe baphansi phezulu bafuna abasolwa.“Ekuseni namhlanje (izolo) ngabo-6 kuMusa Road KwaMashu, abasolwa abangaziwa badubule bebhekise etekisini. Kudubuleke umshayeli oneminyaka engu-26 washonela endaweni yesigameko. Umgibeli udubulekile kodwa wasinda. Uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela. Kuvulwe icala lokubulala nelokuzama ukubulala. Akekho osaboshiwe okwamanje,” kusho uZwane.Isolezwe ngesikhathi liya ehostela KwaMashu bese ithathiwe itekisi endaweni yesigameko.Umthombo weSolezwe ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe kwenza babe novalo uma kudutshulwa umshayeli kunabagibeli etekisini.“Kuyathusa okwenzekile ngoba kusho ukuthi akekho ophephile.“Noma ngabe isizathu sokuhlaselwa kwakhe sibhekene naye ngqo umshayeli kodwa abagibeli nabo bangene engozini,” kusho umthombo.Imizamo yeSolezwe yokuthola umndeni walo somatekisi ayizange iphumelele izolo njengoba amaphoyisa athe alinde ukuba axilongwe bese ededela imininingwane yomndeni wakhe uma usutholakele.Amaphoyisa anxuse ongaba nolwazi ukuba awathinte ngesigameko ukuze kuzoboshwa ababulali.
title: Kubulawe umshayeli kunabagibeli etekisini

text: UBUKEKA ezikhululekele umgijimi uCaster Semenya olindele isinqumo eziphathimandleni zezokugijma emhlabeni i-International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF) ayisola ngokuphasisa umthetho ocwasa abesifazane.Ukulalelwa kwecala kuthathe izinsuku ezinhlanu ngesonto eledlule kwiCourt of Arbitration for Sports (CAS) lapho uSemenya, inhlangano yezokugijima i-Athletics South Africa (ASA) ne-IAAF bonke bebeke izethulo zabo.Ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe kwi-website yeCAS uSemenya uselinde isinqumo okulindeleke ukuthi siphume ngaphambi kukaMashi 26.Ngempelasonto uSemenya ufake umbhalo ekhasini lakhe likaTwitter, @caster800m, othi empilweni asikho isidingo sokuthi umelane nombhedo.“Uma kukhula ukuzithanda, mincane imibhedo oyibekezelelayo,” kusho umbhalo awufake wahambisana nesithombe sobuso sikanopopi okokozelayo.USemenya umangalele i-IAAF ngoba ephikisa umthetho wayo ophoqa ukuthi badle imishanguzo abagijimi besifazane imizimba yabo ekhiqiza i-testosterone eyisikali esingaphezulu kwesijwayelekile.Ngokwale nhlangano lokhu ikwenza ngoba ifuna kube nobulungiswa uma kuncintiswana, yize umgomo wayo ubeke amabanga amathathu kuphela i-400m, 800m no-1500m agijinywa uSemenya.USemenya umile ekutheni ufuna ukugijima “ngendlela engazalwa ngiyiyo”.Esitatimindeni seCAS ikuvezile ukuthi seyike yaludingida udaba olufuze lolu. Phambilini umgijimi wase-India uDutee Chand wamangalela i-IAAF ngomgomo ofanayo. Yena ugijima * -100m no-200m. Yayimnqabela ukugijima ngaphandle kokudla amaphilisi okwehlisa i-testosterone.Ngaleso sikhathi iCAS yathi, i-IAAF kufanele iqhamuke nobufakazi obuqinile besayensi bokuthi abagijimi abasesimeni sikaChand bavunwa yindlela abadaleke ngayo.“Yize iCAS isike yalubheka udaba olufuze lolu ezinyangeni ezedlule kodwa udaba lwakamuva luzolalelwa kubhekwa ubufakazi obusha,” kusho isitatimende.Ithe udaba lukaChand lwamiswa ukuqhubeka nokucutshungulwa ngemuva kokuthi i-IAAF isiqhamuke nemigomo emisha.
title: Kulindelwe isinqumo kolukaSemenya ne-IAAF

text: LILINGANISELWA ku-R2 million inani lezidakamizwa ezitholwe amaphoyisa zifihlwe ethayini lemoto eliyisipele emngcele waseMozambique, esifundazweni sakwaZulu-Natal. Kubikwa ukuthi ngabo-12.30 ngoLwesibili emini, amaphoyisa asesiteshini sasePhongolo atshelwe ngemoto ebisuka eMozambique ebisolwa ngokulayisha izidakamizwa idlula emngceleni wakuleli. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe amaphoyisa agasele emzileni womngcele, nokuyilapho bebone khona lemoto iqhamuka kumgwaqo u-N2. “Amaphoyisa avimbe lemoto, ayisesha. Kutholwe iheroin engu-15 KG ifihlwe ethayini lemoto eliyisipele. Imali engatholwa ngalezi zidakamizwa ibalelwa ku-R2,7 million. Umsolwa ongowesilisa (40) uboshwe ngecala lokushushumbisa izidakamizwa,” kuchaza uNaicker. Icala lokushushumbiswa kwezidakamizwa livulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa oPhongolo, ladluliselwa kuphiko lwabaseshi oKlebe(Hawks) okuyilona oseluzoqhubeka nophenyo.  UKhomishana wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant General Khombinkosi Jula ubongele amaphoyisa ngomsebenzi omuhle. “Siyakuncoma ukutholwa kwezidakamizwa eziningi ngalendlela. Lo msebenzi ungomkhulu kulesi sifundazwe futhi ukhombisa ukuthi amaphoyisa azimisele ukunqanda ubugebengu emgceleni njengoba sekungamaholidi,” kusho uJula. IMOTO ebihamba umsolwa obanjwe nezidakamizwa ezingabiza izigidi zamarandi kuleli. Isithombe: SITHUNYELWENgoMeyi wango-2017, amaphoyisa asoPhongolo avimba iveni elalidlula emncgeleni oseGolela liphethe izidakamizwa. Lemoto yavinjwa emgwaqeni uN2 ngasoPhongolo, kwatholakala izidakamizwa iheroin ifakwe ezikhwameni ezingu-145.Imali yalezi zidakamizwa yayilinganiselwa ku-R101 million. Abasolwa okungabesilisa ababili nowesifazane baboshwa ngamacala okushushumbisa izidakamizwa. Abasolwa bavela eNkantolo yeMantshi oPhongolo.
title: Amaphoyisa athole izidakamizwa zifihlwe ethayini lemoto

text: ZESULIWE izinyembezi zebhungu elaliwe yintombi labamba ilotto ka-R60 million wePowerball ngoJanuwari 15. Leli bhungu laseKapa livuke ngoLwesibili lanikela emahhovisi elotto emuva kokubona ukuthi iphethe ithikithi elizoshintsha impilo yalo. Yize lilahlwe yintombi kodwa lithi akuphelile ngalo njengoba selinomthobanhliziyo wemali ozoqeda izinkinga zalo. Yize leli thikithi le-lotto alidlala enesifiso sokuyibamba kodwa ukwaliwa intokazi ebezifela ngayo kwavele kwambhocobalisa ngalelo langa. Nokwenza wangapholisa maseko uma esebona ukuthi uhlabene wanikela khona ukuyolanda okungokwakhe. "Angikakakholwa ukuthi ngiwine imali engaka, imali enkulu engike ngayiwina kwilotto u-R500," kusho leli bhungu lijabule."Intombi ebingihlala nayo beyisanda kungala ngingazizwa kahle. Ngesikhathi  sengibheka imiphumela ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku bese ngihleli ngedwa endlini engasekho. Bengithi ngiyaphupha, ngangena emanzini abandayo ngageza ngaphinde ngalibhekisisa ngabona inhlanhla yami yena ubenebhadi," kusho leli bhungu eseliyinjinga. Ubonga nokuthi abazali bakhe bamkhulise kahle futhi uzokwazi nokuzithokozisa nabo ngalemali.  Ukuphenduka injinga esikhaleni uthe angeke kumdidise kodwa uzozama ukuyilondoloza ingxenye yale mali. Umsebenzi wakhe ojwayelekile ebewenza nsuku zonke uthe akazimisele nakancane ukuwushiya okwamanje.
title: Waliwe intombi wabamba iLotto

text: UKHATHAZEKILE umndeni womfundi ka-Grade 10 osekuphele amasonto aduka.U-Amanda Phungula (15), waseYellowood Park, eThekwini, kuthiwa uduke ngoJuni 24.Kuthiwa waphuma endlini eya ezitolo akaphindange wabuya.Udadewabo, uNksz Ntombizethu Phungula, uthe abasazi kumele bambheke kuphi ngoba sekunesikhathi ahamba ekhaya bengazi ukuthi uphi.“Waphuma ekhaya eYellowood Park engashongo lutho, akazange asho ukuthi uyaphi. Sike sithole izingcingo ukuthi ubonakala eMlaza noma kwezinye izindawo. Sigijime siye khona singamfici. Asazi ngempela ukuthi kwenzekani,” kusho uNksz Phungula.“Ayikho ingxabano eke yaba khona noma okuthize akhononde ngakho ngaphambi kokunyamalala. Yikho sixakekile ukuthi washonaphi,” kusho uNksz Phungula.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uqinisekisile ukuthi kuvulwe icala lokulahleka komuntu emaphoyiseni.Kunxuswe ongaba nolwazi ukuba athinte amaphoyisa aseduze.
title: Umndeni uthungatha umfundi osenamasonto edukile

text: KUBUKEKA sengathi akakaliphonsi ithawula ekuphonseleni inselelo ukuqokwa kweSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini, uMntwana uThokozani Zulu.Kuputshuke inkulumo eqoshiwe, okusolwa ukuthi yenziwe nguMntwana uThokozani, lapho edingida amaqhinga okuphonsela inselelo ukuqokwa kweSilo.Kule nkulumo ethunyelelwe Isolezwe lo wesilisa okusolwa ukuthi uMntwana uThokozani, uzwakala enxenxa abantwana basendlunkulu abangahambisani nokuqokwa kweSilo, ukuba bangapheli umoya.Lo wesilisa uzwakala enxenxa bonke labo abahambisana nabo ukuba baphelele lapho bekufihlwa khona uMntwana uSiphiwe Delange eMtubatuba ngempelasonto, ukuze bazodingida ngezinhlelo zabo zokuphonsela inselelo ukuqokwa kweSilo.Kule nkulumo, owesilisa uzwakala ezishaya isifuba ngencwadi yokuphonsela inselelo ukuqokwa kweSilo athi uyayibhala. Uzwakala ezethemba njengoba esola nokuthi undunankulu kaZulu, Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, usedidikeli ukuthi uzokulwisa kanjani ukuphonselwa inselelo ukuqokwa kweSilo.Kuphinde kuvele ukuthi abantwana abangahambisani nokuqokwa kweSilo, banezinhlelo zokufaka udaba enkantolo kepha bakhethe ukuqala ngokubhala incwadi kuqala njengoba besahlanganisa imali yokuya enkantolo.“Sengiyayiqeda (incwadi) wena weNdlovu. Ngeke sisishiye isikhathi Ndabezitha ngoba ziyime emthumeni. Yingakho noMntwana wakwaPhindangene esethule, ngoba ziyime emthumeni. Ngokucabanga kwami Ndaba iqhinga lethu singalishintsha singayi enkantolo ngoba izimali asikabi nazo, sibhale le ncwadi,” kusho lo wesilisa.Ethintwa Isolezwe, uMntwana uThokozani unqabile ukuphawula. Uyalele iphephandaba ukuba yonke imibuzo elifisa ukuyibuza, liyibuze kumuntu oliputshuzele le nkulumo eqoshiwe.“Ngeke mina ngiphendule ngezinkulumo ezithunyelwe imithombo efihliwe. Anginankinga ukubhekana nanoma ngubani, kepha ngeke ngiphendulane nabantu abazifihlayo.”UMntwana uThokozani uqale ukuba sematheni ngesikhathi kusuka isiphithiphithi emhlanganweni okwafundwa kuwo incwadi yefa  eyashiywa iNdlovukazi Shiyiwe Mantfombi Dlamini Zulu, ephakamisa igama lozongena esihlalweni sobukhosi.Lesi siphithiphithi sasuka emuva kokuba uMntwana uThokozani esukume wacela ukubuza, kanti lesi siphithiphithi saholela ekutheni iSilo siphume ngesamagundwane.NgeSonto uMntwana uThokozani uphinde wenza isithembiso sokuthi usazogeqa amagula ngalesi sigameko, uma sekufike isikhathi. Umbango wesihlalo sobukhosi ukhombise ukushisa ngesonto eledlule njengoba abantwana bakwaKhethomthandayo, uMntwana uNtandoyenkosi noMntwana uNtombizosuthu, bephindele enkantolo ephakeme eMgungundlovu, lapho bebefuna ukuthola isivimbelo sesikhashana esizomisa ukugcotshwa ngokusemthethweni kweSilo.Kulesi sicelo sebesekwa ngelinye lamazinyane kaMdlokombane, uMntwana uNhlanganiso Zulu, waKwaDlamahlahla. Ngesonto eledlule uMntwana uNhlanganiso ufake incwadi efungelwe enkantolo lapho ephonsela inselelo ukuqokwa kweSilo.Emaphepheni okuphendula, uButhelezi uthe akekho ofanelwe yilesi sihlalo ngaphandle kweSilo esisanda kuqokwa. UButhelezi uthe iSilo sakhethwa ngokulandelwa kwamasiko nemithetho elawulwa ukuqokwa kwamakhosi.Inkantolo yaluhlehlisela usuku olungaziwa lolu daba, yanikeza zonke izinhlangothi ezithintekayo umnqamulajuqu wangoJuni 18, ukuba zifake amaphepha okuphendula.
title: Inkulumo eqoshiwe ngamaqhinga okuvimba ukugcotshwa kweSilo

text: USUKU lwanamhlanje lokufisela obaba unwele olude, luhambisana nemizwa eyahlukene emphakathini ngenxa yendlela obaba abaziphatha ngayo muva nje ngokuhlukumeza abesifazane.Yingenxa yalesi sizathu inhlangano elwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu ngokobulili kuleli iSonke Gender Justice, ifuna kungenelele amabandla, baxoxisane nobaba emasontweni ngalesi sihlava njengoba kuwuSuku loBaba namhlanje.NgokweSonke Gender Justice, u-60% nangaphezulu wezingane kuleli, azinabo obaba ezingabukela kubo.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, le nhlangano ithi owesifazane oyedwa kwabathathu kuleli, uzithola esehlukunyezwa ngokocansi - ngabantu abangobaba.Nokwesitatimende esikhishwe yile nhlangano, abantu ababili kwabahlanu besifazane kuleli, bazithola sebeshaywa abantu abathandana nabo, abanye bazithole sebehlukumezeka emsebenzini.“Okubi kakhulu esisanda kukubona kokubulawa kwabesifazane ngabantu abazwana nabo,” kusho isitatimende.Ngokuka Mfundisi Bafana Khumalo ongumeluleki omkhulu kule nhlangano, uthe sebesebenzisana nabesilisa abakholwayo ukusebenzisa zonke izndlela ezikhona zokuqeda ukudlame olubhekiswe kubulili nakubantu besifazane.“Namhlanje kufanele sijabulele usuku lobaba kodwa ngeshwa kuzokwenzeka ngemizwa eyahlukene ngenxa yempi abesilisa abayibhekise kwabesifazane,” kuzikhalela uKhumalo.UMbhishobhi Malusi Mpumlwana we-South African Council of Churches (SACC), uthe:“Udlame lobulili lubukeka luyisihlava esithule esihambisana neCovid-19. Yingakho umhlangano kazwelonke we-SACC obakhona njalo ngeviki wokubheka okwenzeka kwiCovid-19, usuthathe isinqumo sokulwa nodlame lobulili,” kugcizelela uMpumlwana.Uthe banxusa abesilisa kuleli bashintshe umqondo ngendlela abacabang ngayo ngabesifazane, babahloniphe ngendlela enesithunzi.Ngaphandle kokusebenzisana nabamabandla, iSonke Gender Justice ithe umkhankaso wayo wesekwa nayi-United Nations Women South Africa Multi-Country Office, nehhovisi leNhlangano yeziZwe kuleli.
title: Luhambisana nemizwa eyahlukene uSuku loBaba

text: UGUBUZELWE yifu elimnyama uMasipala iMogale City, eGauteng, kudlula emhlabeni imeya yawo emuva kokugula isikhashana.UMnuz Patrick Lipudi (59) kuthiwa ushone izolo ekuseni emuva kokuba engeniswe esibhedlela iHelen Joseph ngoMgqibelo.Ngokwemibiko yabezindaba, isikhulu kulo masipala ehhovisini lemeya uMnuz Sabelo Ngwane sikuqinisekisile ukudlula emhlabeni kwalo mholi.UNgwane uthe umndeni usashaqekile ngokudlula ngokuzuma kukaLipudi obengubaba aphinde abe yinsika yekhaya.ULipudi ube yimeya kulo masipala ngo-2017 ngesikhathi i-ANC iwubuyisa kwiDA kanti phambilini ubenguSomlomo.
title: Bashaqekile kushona imeya  yaseMogale City
