text: USASHAQEKILE umndeni wendoda ezilengise kubo kwentombi ebinencwadi yokuyivimba ukuthi isondele kuyo ngoba ikhala ngokuthi iyayihlukumeza.UMnuz Sithembiso “Jah” Mkhize (30) kuthiwa uzilengise esihlahleni esingaphandle kwegceke lakubo kwentombi yakhe abesethandane nayo iminyaka eyisikhombisa eNanda, izolo.UMkhize kuthiwa ufike wangqongqoza , ebanga nomsindo kubo kwentombi yakhe ngabo-10 ebusuku, base befonela amaphoyisa ngoba bethukile.Kuthiwa laba bathuswe ukuthi vele uMkhize ubenencwadi emvimbela ukuthi asondele entombini yakhe ngoba bekuthi uma bexabana ephuzile ayishaye.Ngokusho kukamngani kamufi, uMnuz Bhekani Mbhele, uMkhize ubevele ekhombisa izimpawu zokuthi uzozibulala njengoba ubehlezi esho ukuthi uzozibulala selokhu intombi yakhe yamthathela incwadi evimbela ukuthi asondele kuyo ezinyangeni ezintathu ezedlule.“Kuyangimangaza ukuthi uJah uzibulele ngoba wayevele ethe kumina ufuna ukwenza izinto ezizokwenza bagcine sebehlukene nayo.“Isikhathi esiningi uma bexabana ubegcina esebeka intombi yakhe isandla , yikho yagcina isimtholele iprotection order kanti bekumele avele enkantolo ngoSepthemba.“Bebesaqhubeka nokuthandana, ehlezi emcela ukuthi ahoxise i-protection order kodwa engavumi (intombi),” kuchaza uMbhele.Uthe ubehleli nabanye abangani bakhe uMkhize ngoMsombuluko ebusuku, wahamba waqale waya kubo kwendodakazi yakhe (7) ayithola kwenye intombi. Wabe esedlulela kubo kwentombi.Uyise kamufi uMfundisi Christopher Ngidi uthe usashaqekile ngalesi sehlakalo ngoba ubesase malungiselelweni okushintsha isibongo sikaMkhize abize esakhe, kwazise ubesebenzisa esikanina.“Bengazi ukuthi bebenezinkinga kodwa bengibathandazela, bengifisa ukuthi beze kimi ngibasize ngoba njengumfundisi ngihlezi ngisiza izithandani ezinezinkinga.”UNgidi uthe indodana yakhe ibilungile, ubengakaze acabange ukuthi isingaze ithathe isinqumo esikhulu kanje.Intombi kamufi ayifunanga ukukhuluma nabezindaba ngesikhathi iSolezwe lizama ukukhuluma nayo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel. Thembeka Mbele uthe izolo ekuseni bathole isidumbu somuntu wesilisa ozilengisile eMatendeni ngabo 5:30 ekuseni.Uthe amaphoyisa ayaphenya ngalesi sigemeko.
title: Uzilengise kubo kwentombi obevinjwe incwadi

text: KUNETHEMBA lokuthi abafundi asebefunde bagogoda emkhakheni wezolimo, bazoziqalela izinkampani zezolimo ukuze kwande abantu abasha kulo mkhakha.UNgqongqoshe wezoLimo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Sithole -Moloi, usho kanje ngoLwesihlanu ngesikhathi ethwesa izitshudeni eziwu-122, eseziphothule iziqu kwezolimo ekolishi lezolimo i-Owen Sithole.Uthe abalimi abaningi KwaZulu -Natal sebebadala ngakho bayadingeka abantu abasha abazoqhubeka kuwo lo mkhakha."Umkhakha unabantu abaningi abaneminyaka engu-55 kuya phezulu ngakho siyabadinga abantu abasha abazokwenza ukuthi lo mkhakha uqhubeke kahle ngoba kuzobe kunabantu abasha abazobe bekhula kuwo,"  kusho uNgqongqoshe.Uthe kulaba abaphothule iziqu bayafisa ukuthi babathathe ukuze babasize ohlelweni lomnyango, lokuthuthukisa indlela yokufuya emakhaya, njengoba lo nyaka waziwa njengowokufuya."Sifuna ukuthi izitshdeni zisize imiphakathi yasemakhaya ngokuhlola amadiphu ukuthi ngabe asesimeni esidingakalayo, babheke nezifo ezikhona emfuyweni nokuthi zingelashwa kanjani ukuze abantu bakithi bezokwazi ukuba nemfuyo esezingeni eliyilo bakwazi nokuyidayisa ezimakethe," kusho yena.Uthe olunye uhlelo abanalo olusiza abaphothule kulo mkhakha ngokuthi babatholele amapulazi abazokwenza kuwo uqeqesho ukuze bathole isipiliyoni. Izitshudeni ezithweswe iziqu uthe abaphothule  ngo-2020 nango-2021 bonke bathole ama-diploma emikhakheni ehlukene yezolimo."Bakhona abavele besohlelweni lwethu lokuthatha izitshudeni eseziphothulile. Abanye babo bafake izicelo zokuthola umhlaba ukuze baziqalele izinhlelo zokulima, kuzo bayakwazi ukuqasha abanye kuphinde kwenyuke nesibalo sabakhiqizi bokudla kulesi sifundazwe," kusho yena.UNksz Sphelele Ngema (23) obenza iDiploma in Crop Production nyakenye ophase ngamalengiso, uthe ubengalindele ukuthi angaphasa adlule zonke izitshudeni kodwa ubazi ukuthi uzophasa kahle ngoba uyazimisela. Uthe uphase ngamalengiso izifundo eziyisihlanu wase echonywa uphaphe lwegwalagwala.“ Ngijabule kakhulu okwamanje angikasebenzi, kulo nyaka bengenza i-Advanced Diploma in Crop Production eMangosuthu University of Technology (MUT),”  kusho uNksz Ngema.
title: Izinhlelo ngentsha ethole iziqu kwezolimo

text: Uma usuzibonile ukuthi unenkinga, kuyasiza ukuthola ukwelulekwa ngezindlela okuyizo zokulwa nobugqila botshwala.Ongoti bathi kunezikhungo ezenza umsebenzi oqondene ngqo nokukhulucula utshwala emzimbeni womuntu obesecwilile osefuna ukuqala kabusha empilweni.Lezi zikhungo ezijwayele ukusiza abantu abanenkinga yezidakamizwa, zinanezinhlelo eziqondene ngqo nalabo botshwala phecelezi i-Alcohol Rehabilition.Kodwa kukhona nawe ongazenzela khona ekhaya:* Susa bonke utshwala endlini ukuze ungabuboni* Qala imikhuba emisha, uma ubuphuza kakhulu ngezimpalasonto, thola ezinye izinto ezihlukile ozozenza ngalezi zikhathi ukuze ungaphindeli otshwaleni. Gwema nabangani abajwayele ukukuholela ebhodleleni.* Yidla ngendlela, izithelo akube wumngani wakho.*Uma unenkinga yotshwala noma osondelene naye umbona edinga usizo, ungabathinta abakwaAlcoholics Anonymous(AA) KU-0861 435 722Bayatholakala naku-wwww.aasouthafrica.orgBakhona nasemgwaqeni uSmith Street eThekwini eDoone House, naku-031 301 4959.
title: FUNDA: Ubukhipha kanjani utshwala emzimbeni

text: Sabelo Nsele UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ujezise uNgqongqoshe wezokuVikela, uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, ngokumhlawulisa umholo wezinyanga ezintathu.Lokhu kulandela umsindo osuke ngemva kokuba uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula avumela ithimba le-ANC elaliya eZimbabwe ukuba lisebenzise indiza yombutho wezokuvikela.Leli thimba le-ANC elaliholwa nguNobhala jikelele wale nhlangano uMnuz Ace Magashule, laliyohlangana neqembu elibusayo eZimbabwe, iZanu PF.Esitatimendeni uRamaphosa uthe isenzo sikaNkk Mapisa-Nqakula siphule imigomo yokuziphatha yongqongqoshe.“Yingakho sengiyalele ukuthi abanjelwe umholo wakhe kusukela ngoNovemba 1. Umholo wakhe uzofakwa esikhwameni esasungulelwa ukubhekana nobhubhane iCorona, iSolidarty Fund, izinyanga ezintathu. Nakuba ungqongqoshe ayesohambeni olusemthethweni futhi evumelekile ukusebenzisa indiza yezokuvikela ngesikhathi elibangise eZimbabwe kepha kwakungafanele ukuthi avumele ithimba lenhlangano yezombusazwe ukuthi lisebenzise indiza ayehamba ngayo.”URamaphosa uthe: “Yingakho senginqume ukuthi ungqongqoshe kuzofanele enze isiqiniseko sokuthi i-ANC iyazikhokha izindleko zohambo lwaseZimbabwe.”Amaqembu aphikisayo asigxekile lesijeziso athi sincane.I-DA ithe lesi sijeziso sincane kakhulu, kufanele umengameli akhombe indlela lo ngqongqoshe.Umholi weFF Plus uMnuz Pieter Groenawald, uthe uRamaphosa uyeke ithuba eliyingqayizivele lokukhombisa izwe ukuthi uzimisele ngokulwa nenkohlakalo.
title: Uhlawuliswe umholo wezinyanga ezintathu

text: KUNZIMA emndenini wowesifazane waseNtapha, eHlokozi, obulawe wakopolotwa amehlo, wasikwa "inanazi" wanqanyulwa izandla maqede wathelwa nge-acid wayolahlwa ezimobeni.UNksz Nolwazi Kunene (22) kuthiwa wagcinwa enesoka lakhe eseliboshwe ngezinsolo zokumbulala.Ngokomthombo osondelene kakhulu nophenyo ngokufa kwalo wesifazane, umsolwa uzivumele yena ukuthi wambulala kanjani umufi.Umsolwa kuthiwa owakhona endaweni kanti kuke kwanezinsolo zokuthi uyaziwa nasendaweniukuthi ushushumbisa izidakamizwa.“Bebesebenza nesoka lakhe eMzinto. Wake washo ngelinye ilanga ukuthi isoka lakhe lake lathi lifuna ukumbulala,” kusho umthombo.Umthombo uthe umufi wayengakaze acacise ukuthi umsolwa wayefuna ukumbulalelani.Ngokomthombo, bazitshela ukuthi kusho ukuthi yingxabano yezithandani efikayo iphinde idlule.“Emva kokungabuyi kukamufi ekhaya, kwahlatshwa umkhosi.“Nesoka lakhe lamphika, lathi alimazi ekubeni behlala ndawonye,” kuchaza umthombo.Umufi kuthiwa utholakale esimobeni sekunzima nokumhlonza. Kuze kwasiza ulibofuzo olumhlonzile.Omunye umthombo osemndenini, utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi kunezinsolo zokuthi umsolwa wahambisa umufi eseyisidumbu enyangeni thizeni.“Kodwa akucaci ukuthi wafika nesidumbu sesivele sicwiyiwe noma wafika nezitho zomzimba esezisikile yena uqobo. Yiyo yonke imibuzo esisenayo leyo,” kusho owomndeni. Njengoba umsolwa eseboshiwe, umndeni uthi unethemba lokuthi zonke izimpendulo bazozithola enkantolo uma kuqhutshekwa necala.Nakuba umndeni wakwazi ukubona ukuthi leso kwakuyisidumbu sikamufi, umthombo uthe kwaze kwaphoqeleka ukuthi kuyokwenziwa ulibofuzo ngokusebenzisa lona ugebhizi lwekhanda lakhe ngoba okunye kwashiswa yi-acid kwaphela. Kusolwa ukuthi emva kokumlahla lapho ehlathini, labe selimbunyela nge-acid ngenhloso yokucisha ubufakazi.
title: Kunzima emndenini wobulawe wacwiywa

text: UMHOLI we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema uthi kumele iboshwe ngokuphazima kweso iMeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede ngoba ikhohlakele ukudlula zonke izimeya KwaZulu-Natal.UMalema usho lokhu izolo ngesikhathi ethula usomqulu wokhetho we-EFF eChatsworth Stadium, eThekwini.Uthe ukube amaphoyisa azimisele ukulwa nenkohlakalo ngabe abopha uNkk Gumede ngoba unuka phu yinkohlakalo.“Amaphoyisa awayeke ukudubula izingane zethu ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme ngoba uma nidubula izingane nivikela izigebengu. Uma amaphoyisa ezimisele nokulwa nenkohlakalo kufanele abophe uNkk Zandile Gumede ngoba ukhohlakele. Usohlwini lweziMeya ezizoboshwa maduze. Ukube onogada bakhe bathembekile ngabe bamhambisa esiteshini wamaphoyisa esiseduze naye.”Okhulumela imeya uMnuz Mthunzi Gumede uthe lesi yisikhathi sokukhankasa ngakho uMalema uzama ngazo zonke izindlela ukuthandwa abavoti esebenzisa amanga nezimfundisoze.Uthe abakhohliwe wukudliwa kwemali eLimpopo. Uthe imeya ayikhohlakele futhi ngeke ithikanyezwe yilawa manga.UMalema uthe i-EFF iyakhula futhi uma kufika uMeyi 8 izophatha KwaZulu-Natal.Uthe uyazi ukuthi abantu abamnyama basebenza ezindlini zamaNdiya eChatsworth.“Omama bethu baholelwa imali encane futhi obaba bethu basebenza ezingadini nabo baholelwa imali encane. Siyawakhuza amaNdiya ngalo mkhuba wawo omubi. Awayeke ukucabanga ukuthi afana nabelungu ngoba nawo amnyama njengathi. Sifuna abantu abasebenzela amaNdiya baholelwe uR4 500 ngenyanga bathole i-medical aid nemali ezobaphilisa uma sebethathe umhlalaphansi,”Uthe iKwaZulu-Natal yikhaya le-EFF futhi leli qembu liyakhula ngoba irali yalo izimaziswa ngabantu abaningi abadlula amalungu e-IFP akade eseChatsworth Stadium emasontweni edlule.UMalema ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi baphume ngobuningi babo ngoMeyi 8 bayovotela i-EFF ngoba iyona ezolwa nenkohlakalo, ilethe imfundo yamahhala yangempela kusuka ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi kuya ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.Uthe ayikho imfundo yamahhala okwamanje ngoba abazali basathengiswa izinsiza kufunda emabangeni aphansi futhi nasezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme bancikiselwa ngemali yokufunda yiNational Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS).UMalema uthe ngeke aphumule ababulali bomngani wakhe uMnuz Sindiso Magaqa bengakaboshwa.Uthe abantu mabavotele i-EFF ngoba i-ANC igcwele amasela abulalana wodwa ngoba efuna ukudla amandla ombuso.Uthe uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa kufanele aye ejele ngokubulawa kwabavukuzi baseMarikana.Wathi uma kuphuma uRamaphosa esikhundleni i-ANC izofaka ezinye izigebengu esiyiPhini likaMengameli wezwe uMnuz David Mabuza emva kwakhe kufakwe uMnuz Ace Magashule naye ambize ngesigebengu.Uthe ukube uMnuz Fikile Mbalula obhekelele izinhlelo zokhetho ze-ANC uyasithanda isikole ubengayihola i-ANC kodwa ngoba akasifuni isikole i-ANC izohlala ikhathele.Uthe i-EFF izonyusa impesheni ngemali ebonakalayo hhayi ngoR10, inyuse umnotho bese iba nabaholi abafundile.
title: Izoboshwa imeya yeTheku: Malema

text: UTUSA ukuphuma kwabo baye ebantwini ngokuthi yikho okuholele ekutheni zinyuke izibalo zokulalelwa koKhozi umphathi-siteshi obambile, uSbongi Ngcobo.USbongi uphawule kanje ngemuva kokuvela kwezibalo zakamuva zokulalelwa kwemisakazo ezikhomba ukuthi Ukhozi lunyukelwe ngabalaleli besuka ku-7 274 000 bafika ku-7 304 000.Izibalo ezishicilelwe yiBroadcast Research Council of South Africa ngezaphakathi kuka-Okthoba kuya kuMashi nonyaka.Uthe bajabule kakhulu ngalokhu wathi okwenze banyuka yingoba ngoDisemba kuya kuFebhuwari bebesebantwini.“Izinhlelo zethu bezihlanganisa iNyus’iVolume, Back to school nokusabalaliswa kwekhalenda lesiteshi.”Uthe balindele ukuthi baqhubeke nokunyuka ngenxa yomkhankaso wezipho abazozinika abalalaleli babo njengoba umsakazo ugubha iminyaka engu-58 wasungulwa kule nyanga.“Isiteshi besihlanganisa iminyaka engu-58 ngoJuni 1 futhi ukugubha lokhu, sizophisana ngezipho ezimangalisayo izinsuku ezingu-58 kusuka kuJuni 1 kuya kuJulayi 28.”Uthe baqale ngokunikeza ukheshi onguR10 000 abalaleli abashaye ucingo kuqala ezinhlelweni iVuka Mzansi Breakfast Show, Jabul’ujule, Ndiza Nathi neWoza Nabangani Bakho ngoLwesihlanu.“Abalaleli siyabagqugquzela ukuthi babeke indlebe esiteshini ngoba ezinye izipho singazikhipha noma yinini futhi kunoma yiluphi uhlelo.”Ezinye iziteshi ezinyukelwe ngabalaleli nguMhlobo Wenene osuke ku-5 506 000 waya ku-5 571, Metro FM esino-4 189 000, Gagasi FM eno-1 758 000 neVuma FM esuke ku-173 000 yafinyelela ku-188 000.Eziteshini zomphakathi zaseKZN kuvele ezimbalwa okuyiZwi Lomzansi elehlele ku-109 000 lisuka ku-136 000, Nongoma elalelwa ngabangu-90 000 isuka ku-121 000, neNewcastle ephethe abalaleli abangu-100 000.
title: Lusandizela phezulu Ukhozi FM ngabalaleli

text: OMASIPALA baseHlalankosi bathi sekumi ngomumo ngokutshalwa kweSilo samaBandla, uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu.IMeya kuMasipala wesiFunda iZululand, uMnuz Thulasizwe Buthelezi neMeya yaKwaNongoma, uMnuz Albert Mncwango, bathe asephothuliwe amalungiselelo okutshalwa koHlanga loMhlabathi.Zombili lezi meya beziyingxenye yabebezobhonga emswaneni izolo.Lezi meya zithe azilindele ukuthi kube khona ubuhixihixi ngoLwesine uma sekutshwala iSilo KwaNongoma.Ngasohlangothini lomasipala wesifunda, uButhelezi uthe bazoziletha zonke izinsiza ezidingeke kumasipala wesifunda, okubalwa kuzo amanzi.“Kusukela ngoLwesihlanu, abasebenzi bomkhandlu bebelokhu benza isiqiniseko sokuthi siyakuletha konke okudingeka ukuba sikulethe. Nezicukuthwane ezizokuba zizotshala iSilo angeke zishode ngalutho. Njengomasipala sibambe iqhaza elikhulu emalungiselelweni okutshalwa kweMbube,” kusho yena.UButhelezi uthe ukukhothama kweSilo kuwushaye kakhulu umasipala wesifunda.“Silimele kakhulu. Isilo besiheha izinkulungwane zezivakashi, ebezifike zishiye imali ngokuthi zilale emahhotela, ziphinde bathenge umsebenzi wezandla. Lokhu bekuthuthukisa umnotho wendawo. Ngingakusho ukuthi Isilo besiyinsika yomnotho wesifunda, silimele kakhulu.”IMeya yakwaNongoma, uMncwango, nayo ithe ngasohlangothini lwabo bami ngomumo ukusingatha ukutshalwa kweSilo.“Lokhu kubalwa nokulawula ukuhamba kwezimoto edolobheni ukuze kungabi nesiminyaminya esizophazamisa ukuhamba kwezimoto.”UMncwango uphinde waba nomhlangano nezinduna, lapho bekudingidwa ngeqhaza elizobanjwa yizinduna uma sekutshalwa iSilo.UMncwango uthe uzokhuluma kahle ngalezi zinhlelo uma seziphothuliwe nomndeni waseNdlunkulu.
title: Omasipala baqinisekisa isizwe ngokutshalwa kokaNdaba

text: UZA eThekwini ngonyaka ozayo umcimbi kaCassper Nyovest asezakhele ngawo igama kuleli owaziwa ngeFillup.NgoMgqibelo, enkundleni yezemidlalo iFNB, eSoweto, lo mrepha uphinde waqopha omunye umlando ngokucishe agcwalise le nkundla ngenjongo yokujabulisa abalandeli bakhe ngomculo.Ngo-2015 uCassper waqala umcimbi wokugcwalisa iThe Dome okwashayelwa ihlombe ngabaningi. Kwathi kusenjalo wenza omunye ofanayo enkundleni yezemidlalo i-Orlando Stadium ngonyaka odlule. Kuleli ube ngumculi wokuqala ukugcwalisa lezi zindawo.Ngaphambi komcimbi wangoMgqibelo le nsizwa ibhale enkundleni yokuxhumana uTwitter ukuthi ngonyaka ozayo izoba nomcimbi ofanayo enkundleni iMoses Mabhida eThekwini.“ITheku linomnyakazo, asenze into efanayo eMoses Mabhida ngonyaka ozayo,” kubhala uCassper.Kusheshe kwacaca ukuthi iTheku liyawufuna lo mcimbi njengoba abantu beveze ukuthi bangawuthokozela.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bekucaca ukuthi umcimbi kaCassper obuseFNB ujatshulelwe abaningi njengoba abantu bebelokhu befaka izithombe nama-video kucula abaculi abehlukene.Isibindi sikaCassper sishayelwe ihlombe njengoba nosaziwayo nongqongqoshe bembongele ngempumelelo yomcimbi.UNgqongqoshe wamaSiko nezobuCiko, uMnuz Nathi Mthethwa, nowamaPhoyisa kuzwelonke, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, bamshayele inhlombe uCassper, bathi ukubaculi abangeke balibaleke kalula.Naye ubonge abantu abafikile kulo mcimbi athe ube yinto angeke ayikhohlwe.“Umlando uqophekile inkundla igcwele ngiyabonga kakhulu. UNkulunkulu mkhulu ngazo zonke izikhathi,” kubhala uCassper kuTwitter.UCassper ubefuna ukudayisa amathikithi angu-75 000 kodwa kwathengwa angu-68 000.
title: UCassper usehlela ukugcwalisa iMabhida

text: KUDALA bekungelona ihlazo ukushiya iziboya zingashefiwe emzimbeni. Kunalokho abanye bebechazeka uma umuntu ephuphuzela uboya ngoba bebumataniswa nobuhle bemvelo.Izikhathi zishintshile njengoba abanye sebekugxeka ukungashefwa kweziboya emzimbeni, ikakhulukazi kwabesifazane. Ukungashefi kubuye kumataniswe nobunuku, ikakhulukazi emakhwapheni nasebuntwini. Kuze kwaba nezindlela eziningi ezisetshenziswa ngabesifazane ukususa uboya ezithweni, okubalwa i-waxing lapho kusetshenziswa izindwangu ezinamathelayo ukubuxebula. Kukhona nokhilimu abayizinhlobonhlobo bokususa uboya. Abanye basebenzisa i-razor ukushefa.UDkt Cebi Sibisi oyiDermatologist ezimele eMhlanga, uthe ayikho into engalungile ngokungashefi futhi akuhlangene nobunuku. Uthe akunankinga ukungashefi kunoma iyiphi ingxenye yomzimba, inqobo nje uma umuntu ezozinakekela ngendlela.“Ungaba noboya emzimbeni kodwa uzinakekele kahle. Iziboya zinomsebenzi wazo kunoma iyiphi ingxenye yomzimba. Zinomsebenzi othize wokuvikela ngoba ziyimvelo,” kuchaza uDkt Sibisi.Uthe inkinga ukuthi sekulandelwa kakhulu izitayela ezenziwa kwezinye izizwe, okubalwa nakho ukushefa uboya.“Ngeminyaka yakudala abantu babengashefi kodwa akekho owayekumatanisa nobunuku. Namanje kunabantu abazinqumela ukungashefi emakhwapheni nasezithweni ngoba bethanda. Abanye abashefayo yingoba zibaphatha kabi ezindaweni ezithize emzimbeni, hhayi ngoba kuwubunuku,” kusho uDkt Sibisi.Indlela abanye abangakuthandi ngayo ukuba neziboya emzimbeni, bazibiza ngehlathi, okwenza kuzwakele kuyinto embi.
title: #Ezempilo: 'Akubona ubunuku ukungashefi' - isazi

text: ISHAYE amakhala i-IFP ngokuqokwa kobeyiMeya yaseHarry Gwala uMnuz Mluleki Ndobe, njengePhini likaSomlomo esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.INkatha ikhale ngokuthi kumele aveze abantu abamakhela itulo lokuthi aboshwe ngenxa yokuthi ephuma ejele washo njalo.Umholi we-IFP esiShayamthetho, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uthe kumele aphumele obala abaveze abamakhela itulo ukuze abe yilungu elihloniphekileyo.Uthe uma engakwenzi lokhu kuzosho ukuthi bamthulise ngesikhundla lesi abamnike sona.Uthe bafuna asule esikhundleni uma ehluleka ukwenza lokhu.UMnuz Super Zuma uphakamise uNksz Nontembeko Boyce njengoSomlomo wesiShayamthetho.UNksz Boyce uthe uyathemba kuzoba nokusebenzisana okuhle esiShayamthetho wanxusa namaqembu ukuthi asebenzisane.Kwabanye babantu abafungisiwe kubalwa uMnuz James Nxumalo, weSACP, uNkk Peggy Nkonyeni okhuze ibuya esiShayamthetho njengoba ebesePhalamende likazweonke nabanye abaholi.
title: I-IFP ishaya amakhala  ngokuqokwa kukaNdobe

text:
OWAYENGUNGQONGQOSHE wezokuXhumana, uNksz Faith Muthambi usole ibamba likaMqondisi Jikelele eMnyangweni wezokuXhumana, uNkk Phumla Williams, ngokuhubhuza amanga aluhlaza ngaye ngesikhathi lifakaza kwiKhomishini ephenya ngokugwamandwa kwamandla ombuso ngoMsombuluko.KuleKhomishini ephethwe iphini likaMengameli wamaJaji uRaymond Zondo, uNkk Williams ukhulume ngobuhlungu ayebuzwa ngaphansi kobuholi bukaNksz Muthambi, nokwaholela ekutheni abe nokhwantalala. Uthe impatho kaNksz Muthambi yamkhumbuza ukuhlukumezeka adlula kukho ngesikhathi eyisishoshovu se-ANC ngeminyaka yobandlululo kuleli.Uthe okwamphatha kabi kakhulu ngalokhu ukuthi uZuma wayazi ngendlela uMuthambi ayemphatha ngayo kodwa wangamthathela izinyathelo. Kwisitatimende asikhiphe ngoLwesibili ekuseni uNksz Muthambi uthe, uNksz Williams uhubhuza amanga ngabekusho efakaza phambi kweKhomishini. “Ngisalulekwa abammeli bami ngamampunge abethulwa uNksz Williams phambi kwekhomishini. Kuzovela elinye iqiniso futhi uzombuleka izinqe kubuka wonke umuntu,” kusho uNksz Muthambi esitatimendeni. FUNDA: 
Usole uZuma ngokuvikela uMuthambiUqhube wathi inkulumo kaNkk Williams ifake ungabazane ngobuqiniso beKhomishini eqhubekayo. “UNksz Phumla Williams uwumuntu onamanga kunabo bonke abantu esengike ngabazi,” kusho uNksz Muthambi. UNkk Williams ngoMsombuluko usole uNksz Muthambi ngokungena emnyangweni wezokuxhumana ngezinhloso zokuzokhwabanisa futhi wayevikelwa uZuma. “Ngicabanga ukuthi uZuma wayemvikela uNksz Muthambi, angazi ukuthi kungani ngaphandle kokuthi kukhona imisebeni abayisusa kumina, bebezenzela umathanda lapha, bayazi ukuthi bengingeke ngiyivume lento abebeyenza yingakho banginqinda amandla," kusho uNkk Williams.
title: 'Uzombuleka izinqe uWilliams' - Muthambi

text: Mbali KhanyileBASENETWETWE abafundi baseFolweni High emva kokugwazwa komfundi oshone ngesonto eledlule ngemuva kwengxabano esuswe wukubukelana phansi kwabafundi.Kuthiwa abafundi ababandakanyeka esigamekweni sokushona komunye wabo, uSanele Ngcobo obefunda uGrade 9 ogwazwe ephuma esikoleni, sebeqome ukuhlala emakhaya bajike nelanga ngoba bazizwa bengaphephile. Abafundi ababalelwa ku-60 nokuthiwa impi yabo basuka nayo ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi, kuthiwa banamaqembu ahlukene ngokwezindawo abahlala kuzona.UMnuz Bheki Kweyama oyilungu lesigungu esilawula isikole, uthe inkinga yokungahoshelani kwabafundi bakulesi sikole wukubukelana phansi kwabo njengoba beqhamuka ezindaweni ezingafani ngokwezinga lempilo.“Njengesigungu simelwe ukuza esikoleni sizobheka isimo njengoba kwenzeke isigameko sokugwazwa komfundi ngesonto eledlule. Nabafundi abakula maqembu basathukile kangangoba abanye babo sebehleli emakhaya. Okubi kakhulu wukuthi inkinga yokungazwani kwabo isuka kude njengoba befike eFolweni High bengasahoshelani nhlobo,” kuchaza uKweyama.Eqhuba ubale Umkhosi, Izintuthane, Adams, Ibhodi, Mphusheni, Sabelo neWest Street njengezindawo ezihlala abafundi abangamaqembu qembu okubikwa ukuthi bagijimisana ngemimese uma bexabana.UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu obekulesi sikole izolo eyogubha usuku lothisha, iWorld Teachers’ Day nangenhloso yokulungisa isimo esesidale uqhekeko kubafundi, uthe umnyango usuzoqinisa isandla kubafundi abenza okungalungile ezikoleni.“Ngeke sivumele isikole sibe yindawo yokucanasa. Umonakalo kufuneka siwuvimbe kungakonakali kakhulu. Sizoqinisa isandla kumfundi otholwa nezidakamizwa noma osemaqenjeni emigulukudu ukuze aqonde,” kubeka uMshengu.Eqhuba uthe uzokhuluma noNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha nokuPhepha, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, ukuze iminyango isebenzisane ekuqikeleleni ukuphepha kwabafundi nothisha ezikoleni.IFolweni High ngesinye sezikole okubikwa ukuthi sinezigameko ezahlukene zokugwazana kwabafundi nokugqekezwa kuphindelelwa kuntshontshwa amakhompyutha.
title: Sebesaba ukuya esikoleni  esinodlame

text: IKHASIMENDE laseFNB laKwaZulu-Natal liwine uR135 million kwiLotto emuva kokudlala iPowerball lisebenzisa uhlelo lwaleli bhange la online ngoLwesibili.Leli khasimende lidlale i-quick pick kaR100.Ngokwesita-timende esithunyelwe kwabezindaba selokhu abeThuba baqala ukungamela iLotto ngo-2015, sebekhiphe uR1 354 billion owinwe ngamakhasimende akwaFNB adlale iLotto nePowerball.Kule minyaka emihlanu bangu-26 abawine i-jackpot yeLotto besebenzisa izindlela zokudlala zakwaFNB. Kulezi zindlela ethandwa kakhulu ngabantu yiFNB App.UMnuz Shadrack Palmer oyinhloko yophiko lwemikhiqizo kwaFNB Connect ubongele owinile.“Siyajabula ukubona izinhlelo zethu ezisebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje ziqhubeka nokuthuthukisa amakhasimende ziwanika nezindlela ezisheshayo zokuxhumana nebhange nokungena ezinhlelweni zebhange okubalwa kuzo neLotto.Uthe yize ukuwina iLotto kusho inkululeko yezomnotho emakhasimendeni kodwa izinyanga ezimbalwa ezizayo zizoba nezingqinamba ngenxa yesimo somnotho nokunyuka kwezidingo zansuku zonke.“Sinxusa abadlala iLotto ukuthi baqikelele bathole ukwelulekwa okufane kwezimali babe nohlelo lokusebenzisa imali ukuze lubasize ukuthi bakwazi ukuyonga nokuyitshala,” kusho uPalmer.
title: Uhleka yedwa owine uR135 millon kwiPowerball ayidlale ebhange ngoR100

text: LISEKHONA ithemba kumqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, lokubona iqembu lishaya ngenkayezi yesibili ngokudla umhlanganiso kwiCAF Champions League ngelinye ilanga.USredojevic usho lokhu ngemuva kokuwashiswa ijezi yiHoroya emdlalweni wokugcina kaGroup B kwiChampions League yalo nyaka. IPirates ibiye eStade du 28 Seprembre, eGuinea, idinga ukunqoba ukuze ijoyine iMamelodi Sundowns kuma-quarterfinal. Igcine iguqe ngo 2-1.Amagoli eHoroya ashaywe u-Abdulaye Camara noBoniface Haba. Elokubika leZimnyama lavalelwa phakathi uJustin Shonga umdlalo usuya ngasekupheleni.Iqede endaweni yesithathu eqoqweni. ISundowns yona ebisivele izibekisele indawo kuma-quarterfinal, iqede endaweni yesibili kwelayo ngemuva kokwehlulwa iWyadad Casablanca ngo 1-0 komunye umdlalo wangempelasonto .IPirates sekumele ibuyele ekhaya ukuzoqedela umsebenzi wokulwela isicoco se-Absa Premiership lapho ihleli endaweni yesithathu kwi-log. Izobuyela kwiChampions League uma iba ngompetha beligi noma iqede endaweni yesibili.“Senze konke okusemandleni. Sibe nesiwombe sokuqala esihle. Esesibili asibanga sihle. Siyayihalalisela iHoroya. Sifunde okuningi kule midlalo esiyidlale kwiChampions League esilokhu sayigcina eminyakeni eyisithupha. Lolu lwazi luzoyisiza i-Orlando Pirates eminyakeni ezayo ukuze ifinyelele lapho ihlose khona okuwukufaka inkanyezi yesibili,” kusho uSredojevic ekhomba ibheji leBucs esifubeni sakhe.IPirates yaba ngompetha beChampions League ngo-1995. Eminyakeni edlule idlale kowamanqamu walo mqhudelwano ngo-2013.Lo mqeqeshi uthe kubabulele ukulimala kukaXola Mlambo esiwombeni sokuqala. UMicho ube esefaka * -Augustine Mulenga endaweni yakhe.“Size lapha sazi ukuthi kumele sigembule. Sibe nesiwombe sokuqala esihle kodwa ukulimala kukaXola Mlambo kusiphoqe ukuthi sishintshe. Nomqeqeshi (weHoroya) umane washintsha waqinisa udonga lwakhe ngaleso sikhathi isisu sethu bese sixega.“Esiwombeni sesibili ngibonile ukuthi isimo sezulu sibaphazamisile abadlali bami. Singenelwe yigoli okusiphoqe ukuthi siphonse konke phambili njengoba bese sihlasela ngabadlali abayisithupha. Lokhu kudale ukuthi * -Ocansey Mandela azithole ephume yedwa kwaze kwayikathathu. Uma uhlasela ngale ndlela kuphakathi kokuthi uyazuza noma ungenelwa yigoli. Yingakho bethole elesibili. Kuthe siqamba sithola igoli bese kungasekho esingakwenza ukuthi kube khona esikuzuza kulo mdlalo,” kusho Sredojevic.IPirates isizobhekana neBlack Leopards emdlalweni olandelayo weligi ngoMashi 29. Amanye amaqembu akuma-quarterfinal i-Esperance (Tunisia), TP Mazembe (DR Congo), Wydad (Morocco), CS Constantine (Algeria), Simba (Tanzania), Al Ahly (Egypt) neHoroya. Azoqhathwa ngoLwesithathu ukuthi azodlala kanjani kuma-quarterfinal.
title: UMicho usenethemba lenkanyezi kwiBucs

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANES EBEHLELI ekubhaceni abanye abaholi be-ANC egatsheni laseMayville, eThekwini ngenxa yokuzingelana okwenzeke ngemuva kokudubulana kwaphihlizwa izimoto kubanga abalandeli bakaMnuz James Nxumalo nabakaNkk Zandile Gumede ezintathakusa zangeSonto.Lo msindo usuke ngemuva kokuthi kube namalungu ayisishiyagalombili abengekho emhlanganweni okudingeke ukuthi ayolandwa emakhaya ngomyalelo kaMnuz Bheki Ntuli obejutshwe ku-ward 30, kodwa kwabekwa umyalelo wokuthi uma kugcina kuphela imizuzu engu-30 engafiki umhlangano uzohlakazwa, uhlehliselwe olunye usuku.“Ngemuva kwalokho kube nabantu abavuke umbhejazane bekhomba ngenjumbane abaholi ababili okunguMnuz Siyabonga Thango noMnuz Sduduzo Magwaza abasethimbeni lesikhashana legatsha besolwa ngokuthi bafuna ukuthi kubhuntshe umhlangano,” kusho elinye lamalungu elicele ukungadalulwa.Lithe ngemuva kwalokho kuliwe, kwashaywana, kwaqhuma isibhamu, kwashaywa izimoto zabantu okubalwa neMercedes Benz C200 egcine isigcwele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana iphahlazwe ifasitela langemuva.Le Mercedes Benz akucaci ukuthi ngekabani phakathi kukaMnuz Sfiso Mkhize noMnuz Siyabonga Thango njengoba beyiphika yize kade ikhonjwa kubo.Kumanje akucaci ukuthi ubani odubulile futhi alikho necala elivulwe emaphoyiseni njengoba kuke kwakhonjwa uThango kodwa wathi naye akazi ukuthi inhlamvu iqhamuke ngakuphi.“Kumanje ngisekubhaceni ngoba angazi ukuthi kuzokwenzekani njengoba kukhona abazame ukuzongihlasela emsebenzini. Manje sengibone kungcono ngibaleke ngiyocasha,” kusho uThango.UMagwaza naye uthe ubalekile ekhaya ngoba akasathembi lutho ngenxa yezimoto azibona zizungeza ngakubo, yingakho enqume ukunyamalala.“Kunezimoto ezizungeza ngasekhaya engingazazi nokuyinto ephoqe ukuthi nginyamalale ngingabibikho ekhaya ngoba angazi ukuthi bafunani laba bantu balezi zimoto,” kusho uMagwaza.Bobabili laba baholi bathi awekho amacala abawavulile ngalezi zigameko.Leli gatsha yilona elasusa umsindo ngengqungquthela likhala ngokuthi kukhona amagatsha angena kungafanele engqungqutheleni, kwaze kwagcina sekubhalelwa uNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Gwede Mantashe ukuthi iqalwe phansi le ngqungquthela.Igatsha laseLamontville ku-ward 74 lona lizohlala ngoMgqibelo kanti elaku-ward 1 KwaXimba akukacaci ukuthi lihlala nini.Ingqungquthela kuhlelwe ukuthi ihlaliswe okwesibili ekupheleni kuka-Ephreli .ITheku okwamanje liholwa yithimba lesikhashana elijutshwe yisifundazwe okungoMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu, Nkk Ntombikayise Sibhidla-Saphetha, Ravi Pillay, Mxolisi Kaunda noMnuz Mthandeni Dlungane.Unobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe izolo engatholakali, kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.
title: Basekubhaceni abe-ANC emva kokuhlaselana

text: INHLANGANO emele abemboni yamatekisi, iSouth African National Taxi Association (Santaco), KwaZulu-Natal ithi ibhekene nenkinga ngokubulawa kosomatekisi osekubuye ngamandla emasontweni adlule ezindaweni ezehlukene.Izikhulu zeSantaco zisho lokhu emuva kokufa kukasomatekisi odutshulwe ngeSonto ebusuku eCato Ridge, enyakatho yeTheku.Emasontweni ambalwa edlule sekudutshulwe osomatekisi abaningana kwafa cishe abangaphezu kwabayisihlanu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCapt Nqobile Gwala, uthe ngemuva kwehora lesikhombisa ebusuku, indoda eneminyaka ewu-27 ibishayela itekisi ngenkathi ihlaselwa ngabantu abangaziwa.“Kukholakala ukuthi indoda ibithutha abagibeli emgwaqweni u-Eddie Hegan ngenkathi abantu abangabonakalanga bevulela ngenhlamvu bebhekise etekisini ebilishayela,” kusho uCapt Gwala.Uthe indoda itholakale namanxeba okudutshulwa ekhanda nasemzimbeni.Abosizo oluphuthumayo bakwaNetcare 911 baphuthume endaweni yobugebengu emuva kokubikelwa ngokuqhuma kwesibhamu emgwaqweni * -Eddie Hegan.Okhulumela abosizo oluphuthumayo kwaNetcare 911, uMnuz Shawn Herbst, uthe umgilwa ushonele endaweni yobugebengu. Kulimale nomuntu wesifazane oyedwa ngesikhathi itekisi igingqika emuva kokuhlaselwa.“Kulimale umgibeli obesetekisini. Ube esexilongwa abosizo oluphuthumyo endaweni yesehlo wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela ,” kusho uHerbst.Umphathi wehhovisi leSantaco KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sifiso Shangase, uthe ukubulawa kosomatekisi kudala inkinga enkulu emphakathini.“Kasihambisani nokubulawa kosomatekis ngoba uma kuqhubeka kunabanye abazofuna ukuziphindiselela. Lokho kuzokwenza ukuthi udlame lungapheli. Sigqugquzela osomatekisi ukuthi baxoxe uma benezinkinga,” kusho uShangase.Uthe ukubulawa kosomatekisi kudala uhlevane futhi kuyinkinga emphakathini ngoba kubeka nempilo yabagibeli nabasebenzisa umgwaqo engozini.UCpt Gwala uthe imbangela yobulawa kwendoda ayikaziwa kodwa amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala.Imizamo yokuthola umndeni kasomatekisi obulewe ayiphumelelanga.
title: Kuqale phansi ukugobhoza kwegazi losomatekisi

text: KWEMBULWA kwembeswa kwabesifazane ababili abalunywe yizinja eLovu Beach ngoMsombuluko, omunye wabo obezama ukulekelela.Sibi isimo kuNkk Prudence Khuzwayo (49) waseLovu, ongumsebenzi wasezindlini odephunwe izinja eziyisihlanu. UNkk Kaylie Vermeulen obezama ukusiza uNksz Khuzwayo, naye ululamela esibhedlela.Indodakazi kaNkk Khuzwayo, uNksz Thola Khuzwayo, ithe abazi ukuthi usinde kanjani indlela alimele ngayo unina. Uthe uhambe ekhaya eya emsebenzini, izinja zamthola engakafiki emzini asebenza kuwo. “Sithole ucingo kuthiwa umama uselimele ekuseni, kudingeka ozohamba naye aye esibhedlela. Umnikazi wezinja angasebenzi kuyena, umphuthumise esibhedlela eMshiyeni. Besithi uzolaliswa indlela alimele ngayo kodwa bamdedela khona ngoMsombuluko.”Uthe unina ujwayele ukuhamba ngezinyawo kule ndawo futhi ubesezofika lapho esebenzela khona. Kuthiwa lezi zinja ezinolaka zimbhuquzise phansi, kwaqhamuka uNkk Vermeulen ezama ukusiza, naye zamluma.UNkk Vermeulen utshele Isolezwe ukuthi akakwazi nokunyakaza embhedeni ngenxa yezinhlungu. Utshelwe ukuthi uzohlala isonto lonke esibhedlela. “Bengizama ukusiza ngibona umuntu ezobulawa izinja phambi kwami. Nami angimazi umnikazi wezinja kodwa sisemgwaqweni owodwa naye. Indlela ebengidideke ngayo emqondweni angikwazanga nokubona ukuthi hlobo luni lwezinja olusilumile.”USALE elimele kanje uNkk Prudence Khuzwayo ongumsebenzi wasezindlini odephunwe yizinja eya emsebenziniUNkk Vermeulen ubelokhu ebabaza indlela alimele ngayo uNkk Khuzwayo, athe akazi ukuthi usinde kanjani. Uthe uyamangala ukuthi umnikazi wezinja angazidedela kanjani zihambe emgwaqweni zinolaka kanje. Ngesikhathi sokuloba uthe ulinde amaphoyisa azomvulela icala esibhedlela ngoba usazohlala isikhathi eside khona.Izolo amaphoyisa afike emzini kaNkk Khuzwayo ukuzovula icala. Ngesikhathi sokuloba, uNkk Khuzwayo bebemphindisela esibhedlela ngoba bebona bungekho ubungcono kuthiwa ukhala nangezinhlungu. Umndeni wakhe uthe ugcine ukukhuluma nomnikazi wezinja ngesikhathi ehambise uNkk Khuzwayo esibhedlela futhi awuyitholanga nenombolo yakhe yocingo. Kuthiwa unikeze umndeni uR200 ngesikhathi kuyiwa esibhedlela.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni uLieutenant-Colonl Thulani Zwane, uthe kuvulwe icala lokufuya izinja eziyingozi kodwa akukaboshwa muntu.
title: Kubi kwababili abadephunwe yizinja

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEISIKHULU esiphezulu seRoyal AM, uSinky Mnisi, sisamile ekutheni leli qembu kalilubeki emidlalweni yokuhlunga kodwa lizongena ligijima kwiDStv Premiership.Emdlalweni odlule weligi,  leli qembu eliyibamba kwiGladAfrica Championship, liphoxe abalandeli lishaywa yiJDR Stars  ngo 1-0 eChatsworth Stadium, eThekwini.Ukube linqobile belizoba namaphuzu awu-34 obekuzolenza libalwe namaqembu amathathu aphezulu kwi-log yalesi sigaba.Njengamanje lilele isihlanu ngamaphuzu awu-31, emidlalweni ewu-19.UMnisi ozakhele udumo ngokunyusela kwiPremiership, iTembisa Classic neHighlands Park eminyakeni edlule, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ukushaywa kwabo iJDR akusho ukuthi aseshabalele amathuba okunyukela esigabeni esikhulu."Angazi ukuthi yini eyenza abantu bacabange ukuthi aseshabalele amathuba okunyukela kwiDStv Premiership. Ngesikhathi ngiqashwa lapha kwiRoyal ngathembisa abaphathi beqembu ukuthi ngesizini ezayo sizobe sidlala esigabeni esikhulu. Lokho akushintshile, kusazokwenzeka, ngeke siye  emidlalweni yokuhlunga. Sisalelwe imidlalo Ewu-11. Yebo iJDR isishayile kodwa sisenalo lonke ithuba lokushaya amanye amaqembu angaphezu kwethu. Sidinga ukunqoba imidlalo emibili noma emithathu bese siba esicongweni se-log," kuchaza uMnisi obelokhu ekugcizelala ukuthi uyawazi umsebenzi wakhe.Leli qembu lika-Andile Mpisane ozalwa isiqumama uShauwn Mkhize, namuhla lizokwamukela iSekhukhune emdlalweni oqala ngo-3 ntambama, eChatsworth Stadium.Kulindeleke ukuthi kushube kulo mdlalo. Emlenzeni wokuqala iSekhukhune yabhaxabula iRoyal ngo-4-0.Ngemuva kwalo mdlalo okwakungowokuqala kwisizini ka-2020/21, uMnisi wakhomba indlela umqeqeshi uMike Lukhubeni.UMnisi uthe bawubheke ngabomvu umdlalo."Impela kuzoba umdlalo wamagqubu, sifuna ukuziphindiselela kwiSekhukhune, yabukisa ngathi. Le Royal yamanje ihluke kakhulu kunale eyashaywa ngo-4-0. Idlala ingcwenga yebhola. Ngaphandle kwalokhu ukushaya iSekhukhune kuzosisondeza emaqenjini aphezulu,“ kusho uMnisi. ISekhukhune iqhwakele kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-34. Ukuwina lapha kungasenza sivule igebe kwiTS Sporting neRichards Bay abeza ngemuva ngamaphuzu awu-32. Iqembu elizoqeda liqhwakele kule ligi lizonyukela kwiPremiership kuthi amabili eza emva kwalo adlale kweyokuhlunga nelizoqeda endaweni ka-15 esigabeni esiphezulu. Imidlalo yanamuhla yeGladAfrica Championsip: Ngo-3pm: Cape Town Spurs v TS Sporting (Parow Park); Uthongathi v JDR (Princes Magogo Stadium); Bizana Mpondo Chiefs v Cape Umoya United ( King Zwelithini Stadium); Royal v Sekhukhune (Chatsworth).
title: OweRoyal AM usanethemba lokuqhwakela kwiGladAfrica

text: ISETHENJWA seKaizer Chiefs, uSiphiwe “Shabba” Tshabalala, sibalisa ngokuhluleka ukubamba umgqigqo kwezaso esibona kubalahlekisele ngezinto eziningi kusukela kuqale isizini ye-Absa Premiership ka-2017/2018.UShabba ubelokhu eyithemba eqenjini lomqeqeshi uSteve Komphela elehlulekayo ukujabulisa abalandeli kule sizini. Nakuba iqembu beliphansi kodwa uTshabalala uhlale ezama ukulifukula.Amakhosi azobhekana ne-Ajax Cape Town emdlalweni wePremiership eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, kusasa ngo-8.15 ebusu.Kusukela kuqale isizini, iChiefs ayikaze iwine imidlalo emithathu yeligi ilandelana. IMamelodi Sundowns, esivule igebe lamaphuzu ayisihlanu esicongweni se-log, iyiqembu lokuqala ukuqoqa amaphuzu ayisishiyagalolulunye emidlalweni ilandelana ngokwehlula iMaritzburg United ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.Nakuba iChiefs ibhinjelwa yizinto kodwa isahlezi emaqenjini asengasibanga isicoco kwazise isendaweni yesithathu kwi-log.“Ukucinana kwe-log nokungaqondakali kwemiphumela kusho ukuthi ukubamba umgqigqo kuwukhiye nokuthi kuseyinselelo emaqenjini amaningi. Uma ubambe umgqigqo unethuba elingcono lokuwina iligi. Iligi ibe nomusa kithina namanye amaqembu,” kusho uTshabalala.“Kuseyinselelo kithina ukubamba umgqigqo. Ngicabanga ukuthi yinto okufanele sisebenze kakhulu kuyona ngonyaka ozayo. Asinaso isikhathi. Unyaka ozayo yinyanga ezayo futhi kunemidlalo emikhulu ngoJanuwari. Lona we-Ajax uzosinikeza ukuzethemba uma sithola amaphuzu aphelele ngoba senze kahle emdlalweni odlule ngokuwina. Ukuba siwine imidlalo emine noma eyisihlanu ilandelana ngabe sikwenye indawo manje ngamaphuzu amaningi. Kodwa akwenzekanga, sisendaweni yesithathu ngamaphuzu angu-19. Sonke siyazi ukuthi besingenza kangcono.”Ukuhlala esicongweni kweSundowns sekwenze iningi liyibone iyiqembu eselivele limuke naso isicoco seligi. Abaqeqeshi abahlukene kwiPremiership okukhona kubona uGavin Hunt weBidvest Wits, sebevele baphumele obala ngokuthi iqembu elizodla umhlanganiso lizophuma kumaBrazilians neSuperSport United ka-Eric Tinkler.“Ngicabanga ukuthi iSundowns yenze kahle, iyiqembu eliphezulu. Ingelinye lamaqembu okuthi uma seliqale ukuqoqa amaphuzu libe yingozi kakhulu. Kodwa okwamanje ngicabanga ukuthi kusavulekile. Ukusho kwami lokho akusho ukuthi kufanele sizithele ngabandayo. Ngeke iligi isaba nomusa kithina futhi iSundowns ikhombisa izinhloso zokwemuka nayo," kusho uShabba.
title: UShabba ubalisa ngomgqigqo

text: USEKULUNGELE ukubuyela enkundleni uPitso Mosimane ngemuva kokungena esibhedlela ngenxa yeCovid-19.UMosimane kuvele emasontweni amabili edlule ukuthi utholwe enaleli gciwane elihlasele umhlaba wonke.Lo mqeqeshi osezinze e-Egypt lapho eseqeqesha khona i-Al Ahly kusukela ngo-Okthoba, ubelokhu ebazise njalo abalandeli bakhe ngesimo sakhe ekhasini lakhe enkundleni yokuxhumana iTwitter, [email protected]Ngempelasonto uveze ukuthi usebuye wahlolwa kwavela ukuthi usemsulwa kuleli gciwane eseliguqule impilo emhlabeni wonke.“Ekugcineni, seliphumile emzimbeni wami leli gciwane. Ngiyabonga kunina nonke ngothando nokungeseka kula masonto amabili abenzima. UNkulunkulu anibuzise, Shukran, Al Hamdoulilla (Ngiyabonga, udumo lube kuNkulunkulu). Angisakwazi ukulinda ukuphinde ngihlangane nomndeni wami wakaMosimane nowe-Al Ahly,” kubhala lo mqeqeshi.Ngaphambi kokugula kwakhe, uMosimane, bezilokhu zimhambela kahle izinto selokhu efikile kweloFaro.Emidlalweni afike isele kwi-Al Ahly ngo-Okthoba ukwazile ukuyiqedela ngempumelelo, iqembu lanqoba isicoco seligi.Ubuye waqedela nemidlalo yeCaf Champions League, banqoba lesi sicoco. Akagcinanga lapho njengoba ebuye wanqoba isicoco se-Egypt Cup.Le mpumelelo isho ukuthi uMosimane wenze okungajwayelekile enqoba izicoco ezintathu namaqembu ahlukene ngonyaka owodwa. Ube eseqokwa njengomqeqeshi oshaye into ecokeme kuleliya lizweUshiye kwiMamelodi Sundowns kuleli, enqobe isicoco seligi, iTelkom Knockout neNedbank Cup. Nakuleli ubaqwaqwade emakhanda abanye abaqeqeshi ethatha umklomelo womqeqeshi ovelele ngesizini edlule.ICoronavirus ihlasele kwezemidlalo njengoba nakuleli iphazamisa. Kwi-rugby iCell C Sharks sekwenzeke izikhawu eziningi iphazamiseka ezinhlelweni zayo zeCurrie Cup ngenxa yokuthi abadlali bebanjwe yileli gciwane.Kwikhilikithi kunabadlali asebeke baba semgongqweni ngalo belu lolu bhubhane. Yize amaqembu akwiPremier Soccer League (PSL) ekufihla ukuhlasela kwaleli gciwane kodwa kuvelile ukuthi iMaritzburg United ike yehlelwa yileli lifu, abadlali bayo abahlanu bephoqeka ukuthi babe emgongqweni ngaphambi komdlalo wayo wokugcina weligi emasontweni edlule.
title: UMosimane useluleme kwiCovid-19

text: SIZOKHISHWA namuhla isinqumo sebheyili yephoyisa likaMasipala weTheku elibhekene necala lokubulala okuthiwa wayeyintombi yalo. Isigameko senzeka ngenyanga edlule.UConstable Ndumiso Sibusiso Khumalo (30) ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi eMbumbulu, izolo ngenhloso yokufaka isicelo sebheyili ngamacala amabili abhekene nawo, elokubulala uNksz Zinhle Muthwa (28) isidumbu sakhe esatholwa sinenxeba lokudutshulwa ekhanda, silaliswe eceleni komgwaqo, eMbumbulu ngoNcibijane nelokuzama ukudukisa umkhondo.UKhumalo ushaye ungqimphothwe wafaka isicelo sebheyili ekubeni phambilini utshele inkantolo ukuthi uyasihoxisa.Ummangalelwa ulaxaze ummeli wakhe waphambilini. Izolo ubesemelwe yithimba elisha.Ngesikhathi ephekwa ngemibuzo wummeli wakhe omusha, u-Adv Sicelo Zungu, uKhumalo obegibele ebhokisini lofakazi utshele inkantolo ukuthi ezinye zezizathu zokuthi afake isicelo sebheyili wukuthi akwazi ukubuyela emsebenzini wobuphoyisa ukuze aqhubeke nokondla umndeni wakhe.“Uma ngingayitholi ibheyili ngizolahlekelwa wumuzi wami, imoto futhi ngeke ngisakwazi ukukhokhela izingane esikoleni njengoba kuyimi engikhokhayo,” kusho uKhumalo.Uveze ukuthi uyaqhubeka nokuthola umholo wakhe ophelele njengoba ewutholile ngesonto eledlule.Uthe ngomholo wondla ugogo nomkhulu, unina nezingane zakhe ezimbili azithola ezintombini ezihlukene.Utshele inkantolo ukuthi ayikho indlela angenza ngayo ukubalekela amacala abhekene nawo ngoba vele wuyena owazinikela emaphoyiseni emuva kwezinsuku ezintathu kubikwe ngesigameko.Ummeli embuza ngamacala abekwe wona, uthe uzowaphika. Inkantolo ibuze ummangalelwa ngesizathu esamenza wazinikela emaphoyiseni, uthe wayefuna ukusiza abaphenyi becala ophenyweni lwabo.Walile ukunaba mayelana nolwazi ayezolunikeza abaphenyi ngecala, wathi konke uzokuchaza uma sekuqale ukuqulwa kwalo.Uveze ukuthi unomuzi eNanda, kukhona ifulethi alikhokhelayo enkabeni yeTheku kodwa ungowokudabuka eMsinga eMaChunwini.Utshele inkantolo ukuthi imali angaba nayo yebheyili wuR3 000. Umshushisi ecaleni (owazibiza ngoNhlanhla) uthe uMbuso uzosiphikisa isicelo sikammangalelwa. Inkantolo inqume ukuthi icala libuyele namuhla ukuze kuthathwe isinqumo ngebheyili.Icala lisenesasa emphakathini obuthelekile. Kwabebezokweseka umndeni wakwaMuthwa, kugqame abesifazane be-IFP abebephethe izingqwembe ezigxeka ukubulawa kwabesifazane.
title: Selicula enye ingoma iphoyisa kwelokufa kwentombi

text: LIKHWELE ladilika kosomabhizinisi abadayisa ukudla okonakele iPhini likaMengameli uMnuz David Mabuza izolo liphendula imibuzo ePhalamende eKapa.UMabuza uthe kumele zivalwe izitolo ezidayisa ukudla okubolile emphakathini.“Izitolo ezidayisa ukudla okonakele emalokishini kumele zivalwe. Kumele zonke izitolo ezisemalokishini zibhaliswe komasipala kanjalo nasemnyangweni wezokuthuthukiswa komnotho,” kusho uMabuza.UMabuza uthe kumele uhulumeni uxoxe nebezinkampani ezizimele ukuze kuqedwe ngeyokufuneka kwesipiliyoni kubantu abasanda kuthola iziqu uma befuna umsebenzi.UMabuza uthe uhulumeni usuluqalile uhlelo lokuthi ungasidingi isipiliyoni kwabathola iziqu.“Kumele sixoxe nomkhakha ozimele ukuze ukulandele ukuthi nawo ungasidingi isipiliyoni uma umuntu efuna umsebenzi esanda kuthola iziqu,” kusho uMabuza.Uthe umnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu ubike ukuthi kudingeka usize omasipala abangu-48 abadonsa kanzima.“Kuzosizwa imikhandlu ukuze kutholakale umbiko omuhle wezimali. Kunamathimba ajutshiwe ukuthi asize omasipala ngoba umcwaningi mabhuku omkhulu wakhala ngale mikhandlu.”Uthe uhlelo i-EPWP lusizile lwakha amathuba emisebenzi angu-10 million kwakhokhwa uR64 billion.“Noma kuba yimisebenzi yesikhashana kodwa abantu bayakwazi ukuthi bathole okuya ethunjini. Lolu hlelo lusiza intsha ukuze ikwazi ukuthola amakhono kanti iningi esigcina izivulele amabhizinisi ayo ngemuva kokubamba iqhaza kulolu hlelo.”Uthe izinselelo ababhekana nazo wukuthi kuba nenkinga yokuthi kwesinye isikhathi kuba nabacabanga ukuthi bazoqashwa uma sekuphele inkontileka kulolu hlelo.Uthe kunemali eyakhishelwa izifundazwe ngumnyango wezolimo ukusiza abalimi abakhahlanyezwa yisomiso.Ubalule uR20 million owaya e-Eastern Cape, uR13.5 million waseFree State, uR43 million waseNorthern Cape, uR10 million waseLimpopo, uR10 million waseMpumalanga noR170 million waseWestern Cape.Uthe bazosebenzisana neMeya yaseGoli uMnuz Herman Mashaba noNdunankulu waseGauteng uMnuz David Makhura ngodaba lwezinkinga zase-Alexandra.UMabuza uthe akulindwe inkantolo inqume ngodaba oluthinta udaba lophiko olwasungulwa kwaSars okuthiwa lwaluphenya abangayikhokhi kahle intela lapho kuthiwa uMnuz Pravin Gordhan ongungqongqoshe wezamabhizinisi kahulumeni wayeyingxenye yokuthi isungulwe.USomlomo wePhalamende uNksz Thandi Modise, uthe i-EFF ibifuna umbono kaMabuza kulolu daba njengoba lusenkantolo wathi akufane uMabuza aphawule ngalo.
title: Ukhwele wadilika kwabokudla okubolile

text: KHETHA SANGWENIISILO  samaBandla uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu, sithi ukube kuya ngaso ngabe bayatalajwa banabiswe ngenduku abantu abahlukumeza baze babulale abesifazane nezingane ngoba bathela isizwe ngehlazo.OkaBhushobukhali ubeke kanje ethula inkulumo yakhe yosuku ngesikhathi kugujwa uMkhosi woMhlanga esigodlweni eNyokeni, KwaNongoma izolo emini. Umkhosi woMhlanga ububanjwe kusetshenziswa ezobubuchwepheshe besimanje okokuqala kulo nyaka, ngenhloso yokuhlonipha imigomo yokuvikela igciwane iCorona.UMkhosi Womhlanga waqala ngo-1984 futhi ubuhlala uheha inqwaba yamatshitshi nokuyinto engenzekanga kulokhu. Ubusakazwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ekhasini likahulumeni wesifundazwe KwaZulu-Natal.UNomthebe wesizwe ukhulume ngomkhuba wokubulawa kwabesifazane nezingane wathi yikho okuyiva elihlaba enhlizweni futhi kufanele kuqedwe ngokushesha." Kuhlupha ukuthi izwe selaphathwa ngemithetho evimba ukulungiswa kwabantu. Kudala umuntu KwaZulu wayeqondiswa ngenduku. Izinja lezi ezihlukumeza izingane zethu noma ziboshiwe ngakusasa sezicanasa ngaphandle azazi nanyaka. Uhulumeni akanciphise amalungelo abadlwenguli,’’ kuthetha iMbube.INgonyama ibikhuluma kukhona amatshitshi abalelwa ku-30 akhethwe ezifundeni ezehlukene ukuze azomela lawo angakwazanga ukuza ngenxa yobhubhane iCorona. Amatshitshi abephakamise izingqwembe ezibhalwe imiyalezo elwa nesihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane. Amatshitshi abekhona abezovalelisa asengena esigabeni sokuyogana.Ingonyama iphinde yenza isicelo sokuthi inikwe izinsukwana ezimbalwa iphathe ukuze iqondise izinto eziningi ezigwegwile bese ibuyisela izwe kuhumeni." Ngisacela namanje ukuthi ninginike nje ngithi ukuliphatha. Ingaphela yonke lento ngoba ngingayilungisa namabutho nekomiti lami. Ngeke phela sivume ukudlala amathimboxo lawa anukubeza izingane zethu. Aphi amadoda esizwe akhuze lo mhlolo,’’ kukhuluma iMbube.UBhejane phuma esiqiwini uphinde wakhulekela nokuphela kwegciwane iCorona wathi limise lubhojozi isizwe sonkana. Akayishiyanga indaba yenkohlakalo yalabo okuthiwa batape imali yokulwa neCorona wathi banehlazo sebadlula ngokweba. Umcimbi ubuzimaziswe wuSihlalo weNdlu yobuHoli boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal inkosi Phathisizwe Chiliza noNgqongqoshe wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko esifundazweni uNksz  Hlengiwe Mavimbela.
title: ISilo sifuna bathelwe induku abantu abahlukumeza imbokodo

text: INKANTOLO iyenqabele imizamo yesiteshi saseGauteng, iHot91.9FM, sokuzama ukuvimbela amalungu e-EFF ukuba aye kulesi siteshi ngenhloso yokuyofuna imininingwane ethinta umsakazi waso, uMnuz Sasha Martinengo, oxoshwe isigubhukane kulo msakazo kulandela ukubiza kwakhe umholi waleli qembu ngenkawu.Abameli balo msakazo bathe baye eJohannesburg South Gauteng High Court ngoLwesine ukuyofaka amaphepha okuvimbela amalungu ale nhlangano.Umqondisi walo msakazo, uMnuz Lloyd Madurai, uthe bazizwe bengaphephile emva kokuthi abalandeli be-EFF befike amahlandla amabili kulesi siteshi.Ukutheleka kwamalungu ale nhlangano kuthiwa kulandela ukubizwa komholi we-EFF ngenkawu nguMartinengo ngenkathi esakaza emoyeni ngoLwesibili kulesi siteshi.Ngokwejaji uRatha Mokgoatlheng, isinqumo senkantolo ngeke sikhishwe esithe, sizoba sobala nakuyona i-EFF.“Udaba lolu olubucayi,” kusho uMokgoatlheng.Uthe ukukhishwa kwalesi sinqumo, kuzohambisana nokuthi kungabi khona ukubhekana ngeziqu zamehlo phakathi kwezinhlangothi ezithintekayo kuze kube kufika isikhathi sokuthi udaba luyaxazululeka.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, i-EFF isanda kubamba imibhikisho lapho kuhlala khona uMnuz Adam Catzavelos kulandela ukufaka kwakhe ivideo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngenkathi eseGreece, ebiza abantu abamnyama bakuleli ngegama elicwasayo.UMadurai uthe okubalulekile ukuba kube nokuthula ukuze kungabi khona ukusabisana nokucekelwa phansi kwempahla.“Kube khona owesilisa ocele ukukhuluma nami ngamvumela. Uthe angimnikeze imininingwane kaMartinengo ngamtshela ukuthi usexoshiwe,” kuchaza uMadurai.Uthe owesilisa lona uthe benze kahle bamxosha ngoba bebuzochitheka bugayiwe.Ugcizelele ukuthi lesi siteshi somsakazo ngesomphakathi, osekuholele ekuphazamisekeni kwabantu abaningi abasivakashelayo, abanye bezoletha imininikelo.Uthe lokhu sekubeke nempilo yabanye abantu esimeni esibucayi.Usihlalo we EFF eGauteng, uNksz Mandisa Mashego, usevulele lo msakazi osolwayo icala lobugebengu.UNksz Mashego akatholakalanga ukuba aphawule ngalokhu kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.
title: Inkantolo ivune i-EFF kolokubizwa kukaJuju ngenkawu

text: UPHENYO oluzimele ngokushona kowayeyisikhulu esiphezulu seBosasa uMnuz Gavin Watson seluveze ukuthi wayesevele eshonile ngesikhathi ebandakanyeka engozini yemoto ngasesikhumulweni sezindiza i-OR Tambo International Airport ngo-Agasti 26.Lokhu kuvele kumbiko okhishwe udokotela ohlaziya izidumbu ozimele obecelwe ngumndeni kaWatson ukuthi aphenye. NgokweNews 24, umbiko ka dokotela uveze ukuthi isidumbu sikaWatson besingakhombisi ukulimala komuntu obe sengozini yemoto okufana nokulimala ebusweni nakwezinye izindawo emzimbeni. Yize umsipha wasemqaleni wakhe ubuhlephukile, kwabikwa ukuthi lalilincane kakhulu igazi elatholwa endaweni yesigameko elihambisana nokunyantisa kwengozi.Ngokwemibiko eyehlukene, abazibonela kwenzeka ingozi bathi imoto yohlobo lweToyota Corolla ebhaliswe ngenkampani yakhe ayehamba ngayo yayihamba ngesivinini esikhulu ngaphambi kokuphaphalaza ishayise unqenqema olubambe umgwaqo omkhulu. NgokweSunday Independent, umndeni kaWatson wawusuvele unezinsolo ngokushona kwakhe. Lezi zinsolo zavela ngesikhathi indodakazi yakhe uLindsay Watson ephakamisa imibuzo ngesibazi sokugwazwa esasibonakala emqaleni wakhe nokungabi nazibazi ezilindeleke kumuntu obe sengozini yemoto. Elinye ilungu lomndeni wakwaWatson nalo laphakamisa izinsolo zokuthi abazibonela kwenzeka ingozi bakhokhelwa ukuqamba amanga ezitatimendeni ezathathwa amaphoyisa. Owesilisa othi wazibonela mathupha kwenzeka ingozi uthi, ayikho enye imoto eyayikhona emgwaqweni ngaphandle kweyakhe nekaWatson ngesikhathi kwenzeka ingozi."Ngangihambisa ikilayenti esikhumulweni sezindiza ngo-5 ekuseni kukhona iCorolla ehamba phambi kwami kepha ngazitshela ukuthi kunokwenzeka ukuthi i-Uber . Le moto yayihamba ngesivinini esikhulu nokwangenza ngacabanga ukuthi wayehambisa umuntu ojahe indiza. ICorolla yathatha umzila ongakwesokudla, ngokuphazima kweso yaqonda nqo kukhonkolo bese yaphenduka. Izicucu zemoto zazindiza, kanti mina ngakubona njengomuntu owayefuna ukuzibulala," kusho yena.Emotweni eyayihamba uWatson kwatholwa isikhwama semali esasino-R70, umazisi wakhe kanye nelayisensi yokushayela, kanti kwakungekho zimpahla ezazikhombisa ukuthi wayeyothatha indiza nokwenza ukuthi ukufa kwakhe kube yimpicabadala.
title: 'Wayesevele eshonile uWatson ngaphambi kwengozi' - umbiko

text: IMOTO: CITROËN  C3INTANDOKAZI yemoto yakwaCitroën okuyiyo edayisa kakhulu, iC3 ithuthukisiwe ngenhloso yokuqhubeka nokudoba abathengi.Isesigabeni sama-hatchback amancane lapho ibanga khona abathengi nezimoto, okukhona kuzo iVW Polo, Hyundai i20, Kia Rio nezinye.I-C3 okungeyesizukulwane sesithathu ekhona emakethe, yethulwa ngasekupheleni kuka-2016.Uma iqhamuka uzoqaphela ingaphambili elishintshiwe, bese kuba namaLED headlights, LED daytime running lights, ama-fog lights kwiShine futhi nangemuva inamalambu angamaLED.Ifika nemibala emisha eyisithupha, okwazi ukuthola kuyo nokhakhayi oluhlukile umbala.Ngaphakathi izihlalo zintofontofo futhi kwaCitroen bathi bathuthukise nendlela onciphe ngayo umsindo ongenayo. Isikhala ebhuthini singu-300 litres.Inezinto eziningi njengamarimu aphakathi kuka-15 inch no-16 inch, ama-wiper azishayayo uma lina, ama-sensor asiza uma upaka ngemuva, 7 inch touchscreen okwazi ukuxhuma iselula nge-Apple CarPlay noma i-Android Auto. Iyasho uma umshayeli engasanakile, ine-cruise control nokunye. Konke kuya ngenhlobo yakho njengoba zihlukene kabili, kuyiShine neFeel.Izinjini zihlukene kabili. Kukhona i-1.2 PureTech enamandla angu-60kW ne-torque engu-118Nm futhi engenayo i-turbo. Uyithola kwiFeel kuphela futhi isebenzisa i-gearbox eyi-5 speed eshintshwayo. Ngo-100km bathi idla amalitha kaphethroli angu-5.7.EkwiShine nayo ingu-1.2 litre kodwa umehluko wayo wukuthi ine-turbo futhi inamandla athe xaxa njengoba engu-81kW. Itorque yayo ingu-205Nm futhi usebenzisa i-gearbox ezishintshayo eyi-6 speed. Ngo-100km bathi idla amalitha kaphethroli angu-6.Ngesikhathi yethulwa sithole ithuba lokushayela iShine. Ihamba kamnandi intofontofo futhi amandla ezwakala ekwazi ukuyithwala bese iyathula ngaphakathi, uwuzwe kancane umsindo wenjini engu-3 cylinder.Ngakwezokuphepha izinto enazo ngamabhreki e-ABS, EBA, EBD, TCS ne-ESP. Ayihlehli uma isuka entabeni, ine-central locking, ama-airbag ngaphakathi futhi iyasho uma kunesondo elehlelwe wumoya.IntengoAmananiC3 1.2 Pure Tech Feel 60kW 5MT MY21R 269 900.00C3 1.2 Pure Tech Shine 81kW S&S EAT6 MY21R 324 900.00Ifika ne-service plan yeminyaka emithathu noma u-60 000km ne-warranty yeminyaka emihlanu noma u-100 000km.
title: Liphezulu izinga leCitroën C3

text: OKLEBE sebeqinisekise ukuthi umphathi wenyunyana yamaphoyisa uMnuz Zwelinkosi Reuben Mdletshe useboshiwe ngemuva kwezinsuku ethungathwa. Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe ngoLwesibili ekuseni. UMdletshe, ongumphathi wePolice Prisons Civil Rights Union (Popcru) kanye noMnuz Robert Sheriff, basolwa ngokuba yingxenye yetulo lokuthumba nokubulawa kwezikhulu eziphezulu kule nyunyana. “Basolwa ngokuba yingxenye yaleli tulo ngenhloso yokugqiba inkohlakalo,” kusho oKlebe ngesonto eledlule. “UMdletshe noSheriff baboshwe amalungu ophiko loKlebe oluphenya amacala enkohlakalo. Bazovela eNkantolo yeMantshi eKempton Park namuhla,” kusho uCaptain Dineo Sekgotedi. Ngokombiko weTimesLive, ngesonto eledlule, uBrigadier Hangwani Mulaudzi uthe iNkantolo yeMantshi iKempton Park ikhiphe izincwadi ezingunyaza ukuboshwa kukaMdletshe noSheriff.  “Ukufunwa kwabasolwa kulandela ulwazi esilutholile ngetulo lokuthumba nokubulala amalungu obuholi bePopcru. Uphenyo luqale ngoSepthemba. Okwamanje kusabonakala ukuthi kusetshenziswe imali ngendlela engafanele. Imali ibidluliswa ngaphansi kwePopcru Investment Group of Companies (PIGC). Kusolwa ukuthi ukudluliswa kwemali kwaqala ngo-2016,” kusho uMulaudzi.  Itulo lokubulala livele ngesikhathi kuboshwa owesilisa obekusolwa ukuthi ubeqashelwe ukubulala amalungu ePopcru. “Umsolwa odabuka eLesotho, uNeo Letele uboshwe eKempton Park ngoNovemba 6. ULetele usolwa ngokuthunywa ukuba athole inkabi, eyayizokhokhelwa u-R1 million uma isiwuqedile umsebenzi. Lona kwakuwumzamo wokuthulisa izikhulu ebezifuna uSheriff noMdletshe babhekane namacala,” kuchaza uMulaudzi. ULetele (34) usevele enkantolo kabili. Kulindeleke ukuba avele ngoLwesithathu (Novemba 20) ukuzofaka isicelo sebheyili.
title: Useboshiwe umphathi wePopcru osolwa ngetulo lokubulala

text: KUMILE ukusebenza emahhovisi Ezemvelo KZN Wildlife aseMbilo, eThekwini, emuva kokugasela kwezigebengu ezithathe izinsizakusebenza ezihlukene.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi lesi sigameko senzeke ngempelasonto kanti abasebenzi bacelwe ukuthi bahlale emakhaya ngesikhathi amaphoyisa esaphenya.Umthombo weSolezwe uveze ukuthi kuthathwe amakhompyutha, impahla yabasebenzi nezinye izinsiza ezibalelwa ezigidini zamaRandi.“Ngesikhathi abasebenzi befika emsebenzini ekuqaleni kwesonto batshelwe ukuthi ababuyele emakhaya.“Bekukhona amasosha namaphoyisa. Kuthiwe bangathinti lutho ngoba uphiko oluthatha amanyela eminwe lusazokwenza umsebenzi walo,” kusho umthombo.UMnuz Musa Mntambo, obhekele ezokuxhumana kwezeMvelo KZN Wildlife, ukuqinisekisile ukugqekezwa kwamahovisi abo ase-Elton Place, eMbilo.“Silinde amaphoyisa ukuthi aphothule uphenyo lwawo ngaphambi kokuthi sivumele abasebenzi ukuthi babuye bese bebona ukuthi yini eyebiwe. Kodwa okusobala okuthathiwe kubalwa amafriji, microwave, impahla yokukhempa esetshenziswa uma siqaphe izimfudu zasolwandle nokunye,” kusho uMntambo.EzeMvelo KZN Wildlife zibukeka zilandelwa amashwa kulezi zinsuku, kwazise ngesonto elidlule uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha neMvelo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube umise ibhodi lale nhlangano emuva kokuvela kwezinsolo zokuthi kunenkohlakalo edla lubi ethinta amalungu ebhodi.Uthe unqume ukuwamisa wonke amalungu ebhodi wacela noNgqongqoshe wezeziMali eKZN, uMnuz Ravi Pillay, ukuthi aqale uphenyo ngokusebenza kwemali kwezeMvelo KZN Wildlife.
title: Kuwolwe imishini kugqekezwa ehhovisi lezeMvelo Wildlife

text: ISAZI samasiko esiphinde sibe ngumelaphi wendabuko uDkt Velaphi “VVO” Mkhize, sivule isitolo esidayisa izincwadi ezichaza ngesintu, amagugu nezinto zomsamo.Isitolo esivulwe namhlaje, sibizwa ngokuthi Umsamo Books and Memorabilia sisehhotela iHilton, eThekwini.Sizodayisa izincwadi zakhe eziyisishiyagalolunye, izinto zamagugu esintu nezabanye ababhali bezinye izinhlanga.UMkhize uthe zintathu izinto ahlose ukuzizuza ngesitolo - ukubona zibuyela emasisweni, ukufundisa intsha ngemvelaphi yayo nokuthekela isizwe ngolwazi lomsamo.“Bengilokhu ngithekela isizwe ngolwazi emisakazweni, kumabonakude nasemaphephandabeni manje sengivule isitolo esinakho konke. Abantu kumele sibanike ulwazi oluzobasiza bazi ngomsamo nemvelaphi yabo, bangayi ezinyangeni ngezinto abangazenzela zona,” kusho uMkhize.Uthe iphupho lakhe lokugcina elokwakha ikolishi elizofundisa ngezinto zesintu.“Sengiwutholile umhlaba futhi ngibheke ukuthi uqale umsebenzi wokulakha ngo-2022. Angikholelwa oxhasweni ngoba nesitolo ngizivulele ngaphandle kwalo, kodwa amandla ngiwathola esigodlweni, uMlambomunye. Sifuna ukufundisa abantu ukuthi wenzanjani uma unomsebenzi wabadala, siqwashise umhlaba ngomsamo. Sazi ngemvelaphi namasiko nokuthi yini lena engasisiza eyenziwa ezinye izizwe,” kuchaza uMkhize.Nakuba izincwadi zikaMkhize zitholakala ezitolo ezidayisa izincwadi kodwa ukhethe ihhotela, athe lihanjelwa yizivakashi ezivela emazweni omhlaba.Uthe ufuna umsebenzi wakhe nowozakwabo usabalale umhlaba wonke abantu bazi ngamagugu, ubuciko, isintu nomsamo.Isitolo sivulwa ngoMsombuluko kuze kube nguLwesihlanu ngo-8 kuze kube-4 ntambama. NgoMgibelo nangamaholidi sivulwa ngo-9 kuze kube u-3 ntambama.“NgamaSonto asivulwa ngaphandle uma kunemicimbi eyisipesheli enhlobonhlobo njengezingqungquthela,” kusho uMkhize.
title: U-VVO Mkhize uvule isitolo sezincwadi zesintu

text: SEKUQUBUKE imibuzo ngezindaba esezisabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ezishiye abaningi bethukile, ezithi uMasipala weTheku uxhase umcimbi womculi we-hip hop, uCassper Nyovest ngoR56 million.Lo mcimbi owaziwa ngeFill Up Moses Mabhida kulindeleke ukuthi ube seThekwini, enkundleni iMoses Mabhida ngoDisemba 1.Kumangale iningi kuvela lezi zindaba kuFacebook, kukhalwa ngobukhulu bemali ukuthi ingaxhasa umcimbi owodwa vo.UMsizi Edgar Nkosi nguyena obebuza ukuthi kuyiqiniso yini ukuthi umasipala uxhase lo mcimbi ngoR56 million?“Ngidinga umuntu ozongitshela ukuthi lawa ngamanga ngoba uma kuyiqiniso ngeke inhlangano elawula lo mkhandlu ilithole elami ivoti ngonyaka ozayo,” kubhala uMsizi.Uthe akananxa noNyovest kodwa indaba inoR56 million emkhandlwini onezidingo eziningi kangaka.Abanye bebekhala ngokuthi uma lezi zindaba ziyiqiniso kumele ingavotelwa i-ANC elawula iTheku. UPhillip Sithole oyiPhini leMenenja ophikweni lwezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nezokuVakasha kuMasipala weTheku, uthe yize sekuqaliwe ukuxoxwa ngalo mcimbi kodwa bebengakasho ukuthi uzoxhaswa ngamalini.“Ayilona iqiniso le mibiko yokuthi sixhase lo mcimbi ngale mali okukhulunywa ngayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Umuntu okhuluma ngalokho ningambuza ukuthi ukuthathaphi akhuluma ngakho,” kusho uPhillip.Uthe bengumkhandlu ngeke bakwazi ukuba nemali engako ukuxhasa umcimbi.Esitatimendeni esikhishwe ihhovisi lezokuVakasha emkhandlwini, bathe: “Imicimbi ingenye yezindlela zokuthuthukisa iTheku. Singumkhandlu sisakhuluma nabahleli bawo kodwa asikafiki esinqumeni sokukhipha imali yokuwuxhasa,” kuchaza lesi sitatimende.Umholi weDA, KwaZulu-Natal oke waba yikhansela kuMasipala weTheku, uZwakele Mncwango naye uphawulile ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, wathi lezi zindaba ziyiqiniso.Imenenja ehhovisi lezokuVakasha uSbu Zondi ithe, lezi zindaba bebengakazidluliseli ngisho emkhandlwini ukuthi uzibheke njengoba zisaxoxwa ehhovisini labo kuphela.“Abantu abahlela lo mcimbi sebefikile kodwa akukho esisavumelane ngakho futhi akukho esisakudlulisele emkhandlwini ukuthi ukubheke, njengoba kuyaye kuthi uma sekuvunyelwene udaba lube seludluliselwa esigungwini esilawula ukusebenza komkhandlu.Ngaphambi kokuxhasa umcimbi siyaye sibheke ukuthi yini ezozuzisa thina. Nakuwona lona sisenza okufanayo, sisabheka izinto ezahlukene, akukho esesikusayinile,” kuchaza uZondi.Isolezwe lixhumane nowesilisa ozibize ngoSpike oyimenenja kaCassper Nyovest, othe umuntu ongaphawula ngalolu daba okwamanje usezwen i-United States of America.Imizamo yokuthola lo mculi ayiphumelelanga, ucingo lwakhe belungangeni.
title: Izinsolo ngoxhaso lukaR56m weTheku

text: I-ORLANDO Pirates ihlalelwe umqansa wokunqoba iNedbank Cup ukuze ibhodlise abalandeli bayo abangeneme neze ngemuva kokushaya udaka kwisizini ka-2016/17.Ukunengeka kwabalandeli kufakazeleke emcimbini weCarling Black Champion Cup obuse-Artizen Lounge, KwaMashu, eThekwini izolo emini. Idlanzana labalandeli bePirates ebelikhona lilibeke ngembaba ukuthi lingabhodla uma Ezimnyama zingabanqobela iNedbank.Nenkakha yePirates, * -Edward “Magents” Motale uhambe emazwini abo ekhala ngokuthi okubenze baba nesizini embi wukushintsha kwabaqeqeshi.“Yebo, isizini ibe yimbi, lokho akufihlwa. Okusibulele wukushintsha abaqeqeshi. Kuphazamise isigqi kanti vele siqale kabi,” kusho uMotale.Le nkakha ithe ukungangeni kwePirates kwiTop 8 kufana nesibusiso esiyimfihlo.“Umqeqeshi okhona manje ufike sekusele izinyanga ngithi ezintathu isizini isongwe. Asikwazi ukumsola nge-Top 8. Kungcono ngoba nakhu ungenile nakumanqamu eNedbank. Kufanele benabadlali bakhe bakubone njengesibusiso esiyimfihlakalo ukungangeni kwabo kwiTop 8. Bebengeke balunge. Kungcono manje sebezoba nethuba eliningi lokubonisana bafundane,” kusho uMotale.“Yingakho nje namanje kungamele kube yinkinga ukuthi bahleli abayile emaholidini balinde ifayineli yeNedbank. Kumele basebenze. Nangesizini ezayo kuzothi kuqhubeka iMTN8 bona bebe beqhubeka behlanganisa imiqondo ukugwema ukuba nesizini efuze le.”UMotale, owayeyibamba emuva kwiPirates noveze ukuthi wagolozela uMike Makaab efika ezocija Ezimnyama ethi umusa ezimpondweni, uthe akukho abakubhekile njengamanje okwedlula ukugubha iminyaka engu-80 ngeNedbank Cup.“Isizini yePirates isingalungiswa wukuthi banqobe iNedbank kodwa vele leyo isiseMayfair. Abadlali abambalwa engixhumana nabo abahlonizi ukusho ukuthi iNedbank Cup sekuyikhekhe lokugubha iminyaka engu-80. Sizoyithatha leyo ngoba nabo bayazibona ukuthi bazoba bayilahle okokugcina uma behudule izinyawo.” Lokhu kushintsha kwabaqeqeshi akhala ngakho uMotale kuqale ngoMuhsin Ertugral odikiliswe wukunenebulwa ngo 6-1 yiSuperSport United ngonyaka odlule.Kubambe * -Augusto Palacios ngemuva kwalokho kodwa naye washiya imiphumela ingezi kahle sekuqashwe uKjell Jonevret okunguye ozobe ehleli ebhentshini sebethathana neSuperSport emdlalweni wamanqamu eNedbank eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini ngoJuni 24.Ngaphezu kuka 6-1 weSuperSport, iPirates iphinde yathola * 6-0 kwiMamelodi Sundowns ngesikhathi sikaPalacios. Ngenxa yokungenzi kahle abalandeli babhodlele kukaputeni * -Oupa Manyisa ukuthi kuzofanele avuke emaqandeni ukuze ahlangane amathambo.Akusaphathwa ukuthi ibhacazile kwiMTN8, Telkom Knockout nakwi-Absa Premiership lapho enqobe khona imidlalo eyisithupha kuphela isizini yonke.iPirates izokwendlalela ukuqala isizini ka-2017/18 ngeCarling Black Label Cup ezodlala kuyo neKaizer Chiefs eFNB Stadium ngoJulayi 29.
title: AbeBucs bafuna ukugubha engu-80 ngesicoco seNedbank

text: AFANISWE nomuntu osinde kwinhlekelele yengozi AmaZulu FC asale namaphuzu agcwele ngesikhathi ebhekene neCape Town City emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eKing Zwelithini Stadium ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.USuthu ludlule ngo 1-0 nge-free kick eshaywe uTapelo Nyongo ngesiwombe sesibili. ICity ivinjelwe iphenathi ngunozinti uSiyabonga Mbhatha kwesokuqala ebishaywe uKermit Erasmus. UMbatha obe ngumdlali ovelele ubuye wavimba neminye iminyakazo yezivakashi.AmaZulu, ngokunqoba kufane nokuthi abuyisa izinduku ngemuva kokubhaxabulwa kabi iThe Citizens ngo 3-0 emzuliswaneni wokuqala weligi eKapa.Umqeqeshi wezivakashi uBenni McCarthy, uthe akabadinelwe kakhulu abadlali bakhe ngoba bakwenze konke kodwa bahlulwa wukushaya igoli.“Uma abantu bethi ‘ibhola lingakubulala’, okokuqala ngqa nami ngizizwa nginalo muzwa namuhla,” kusho uMcCarthy ngemuva komdlalo.“Leli bhola alimnandi ngoba awukwazi ukuthi ungacindezela ngomzuzu wokuqala umdlalo uze uphele kodwa ekugcineni uhlulwe. Ngicabanga ukuthi abalandeli bawuthokozele umdlalo lapho iqembu elilodwa lihlulekile wukusebenzisa amandla okucindezela kwalo. Ngiyambongela uCavin Jonhson nabadlali bakhe ngokuphunyuka bengenamyocu kwinhlekelele yengozi abebebhekene nayo, obekubonakala sengathi bebengeke baphume bephila kuyona.”EzikaMcCarthy ngokulahla amaphuzu agcwele, ziyeke ithuba lokulingana ngamaphuzu ne-Orlando Pirates esendaweni yesithathu ngemuva kokubambana ngo 1-1 neKaizer Chiefs.Lo mqeqeshi uthe yize bengadlaleli ukubukwa amanye amaqembu kodwa uyalibona ithuba abaliyekile.“Ukuthola amaphuzu amathathu kusuke kuwukuzijabulisa thina ngomsebenzi esisuke siwufaka ejimini isonto lonke. Kodwa uma ubheka umehluko obuzobakhona (ukuba banqobile) siyalibona ithuba eselidedelile. Kwesinye isikhathi ngike ngibone engathi abadlali bami abaqinile ngokomqondo ngoba njalo uma besesimeni sokukhuphuka bayalidedela lelo thuba,” kusho uMcCarthy.ICity ihleli endaweni yesine kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-30.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe uyazibona, okungenani, beqeda endaweni yesithathu, uthe: “Asinabo abadlali abawu-40 njengeChiefs, angiphathi ke ukuthi bangaki abePirates. Nginabadlali abawu-23 kuphela nalabo abancane beDiski. Angikwazi ukushintshashintsha isikwati ngendlela engifisa ngayo. Kodwa uma sekuvalwe isizini, sizoya emakethe.”Emdlalweni olandelayo weligi bazovakashelwa yiMaritzburg United ngoFebhuwari 23 e-Athlone Stadium.
title: Luyohamba lusinda Usuthu: Benni McCarthy

text: IBE nomthelela omuhle emadamini aKwaZulu-Natal imvula ene umlibe ngempelasonto.Ngokusho kwabeMgeni Water, lokhu kusho ukuthi akukho ukunqanyulelwa kwabantu amanzi ngenhloso yokuwonga okulindelekelile kuMasipala waseThekwini, eMsunduzi, eMgungundlovu, oGwini, eHarry Gwala, oThukela, nakwiLembe ezinsukwini ezizayo.Amadamu amathathu kwamane aseningizimu yesifundazwe - uMzinto Dam ugcwale ngo-19%, i-EJ Smith Dam ingenelwe amanzi angu-5% kwathi iNungwane yagcwala ngo-2%.Ngokusho kwabeMgeni Water, lezi kube izindaba ezinhle emiphakathini eseningizimu yesifundazwe kwazise kuza amaholidi kaKhisimusi lapho amanzi esetshenziswa kakhulu.Okhulumela uMgeni Water, uMnuz Shami Harichunder, uthe uma liqhubeka lina izulu,  ngempelasonto azogcwala mfi amadamu.Uthe manje uMzinto Dam unamanzi angu-89%, i-EJ Smith inangu-93% kuthi iNungwane ibe no-80%. Amanzi emvula ewu-170mm angene emadamini amahlanu eziseningizimu yesifundazwe.“Izangoma zezulu zithi lisazona kusukela kule nyanga kuze kube uJanuwari. Imvula yakamuva kade yayibikiwe,” kusho uHarichunder.Enhla neTheku, idamu iHazelmere linomthamo wamanzi angu-38% bese kuthi iMvutshane Dam eKwaMaphumulo ibe namanzi angu-88%.Kukhuphuke ngo-3% ukugcwala kwamanzi edamini laseXobho, iHome Farm elinamanzi angu  49%. Amadamu amathathu asoThukela iWoodstock, Spionkop neWagendrift ukugcwala kwawo kungu-75%, 80% no-81% ngokulandelana.UHarichunder uthe amadamu asenkabeni yesifundazwe iMearns, Spring Grove neMidmar angenelwe amanzi emvula ewu-290mm ngempelasonto.Alukho ushintsho emanzini angene edamini iMidmar eku-90% ukugcwala neSpring Grove enamanzi angu-35%. I-Mearns ingenelwe u-9% wamanzi emvula yagcwala yafika ku-62%.Amadamu okuyiNanda ne-Albert Falls alukho ushintsho olubekhona ngoba kusewu-76% no-28% ukugcwala kwawo.“Sikhathazekile ngomthamo wamanzi ose-Albert Falls ngoba awanele ukuphakela izakhamizi, iningi lazo eziseThekwini. Ukuntuleka kwamanzi kuleli damu, okwehla ngo-1% masonto onke - kuphoqe ukuthi kube nokwengezwa kwamanzi esiwadonsa edamini laseNanda,” kusho uHarichunder.
title: Injabulo kugcwala amadamu KwaZulu-Natal

text: Mbali KhanyileKUFE abantu abathathu itekisi ishayisana nesitimela esithwala impahla sakwaTransnet ezimpambanweni zomgwaqo nojantshi eDanskraal, ngaseMnambithi izolo ekuseni.Kuthiwa umshayeli wetekisi obethwele abagibeli ababili, ungene libomvu irobhithi elisezimpambanweni zomgwqo uR103 nebelixwayisa ngesitimela ebesiwela sibheke eThekwini. Utholane phezulu nesitimela nokuholele ekutheni yena nabagibeli bashone.Abezimo eziphuthumayo kuthiwa bafike sekonakele kumshayeli nabagibeli sebeshonile. Abasebenzi abebesesitimeleni sezimpahla ebesithwele izimoto ngesikhathi kwenzeka ingozi okungumshayeli nomsizi wakhe basindile, kubikwa ukuthi belashelwe ukwethuka.Okhulumela iTransnet, uMnuz Mike Asefovitz, uthe abashayeli kumele baqaphele ngaso sonke isikhathi uma bezowela ezimpambanweni zomgwaqo ezinqamula kujantshi ngoba iphutha elilodwa lingaqeda ngempilo yabantu abaningi.“Sithi ayiduduzeke imindeni yabashone esigamekweni. Abasebenzi ababone lesi sibhicongo sibatholela usizo ukuze belapheke emoyeni nasengqondweni njengoba kwenzeke konke phambi kwabo,” kuchaza u-Asefovitz.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala ukuqinisekisile ukuvulwa kwecala esiteshini samaphoyisa e-Estcourt.
title: Izidumbu kushayisana itekisi nesitimela

text: AMAPHOYISA aseThekwini athungatha umndeni womfana okusolwa ukuthi uphazamisekile ngokomqondo okusolwa ukuthi uneminyaka engu-10 otholwe elahlekile edolobheni eThekwini.Lo mfana ongazazi igama lakhe utholwe yimenenja erenki yamatekisi kuSoldiers Way, eThekwini ngo-18:30 ebusuku ngoMsombuluko.Imenenja yaserenki ithathe lo mfana yamhambisa esiteshini samaphoyisa eDurban Central.Ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uColonel Thembeka Mbele bafuna usizo lomphakathi ukuze bathole umndeni wale ngane okubukeka sengathi iphazamisekile emqondweni.“Sicela ongaba nolwazi ngalo mfana ukuba athintane noSergeant Nandipha Mbebe ku: 031 3254541 noma 071 845 8023, ukuze sizothola umndeni wakhe,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Khonamanjalo, ugwetshwe iminyaka engu-20 eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMadadeni umlisa olahlwe ngecala lokubulala uthishanhloko waseKhomo Primaty.UScelo Mdletshe (23) waseQomintaba, Obuka, ugwetshwe ngoLwesihlanu oludlule ngecala lokubulala uNkk Busisiwe Nzuza (48).Ngesikhathi egwetshwa umbulali , inkantolo okhiphe umyalelo wokuthi akasakufanele ukuphatha isibhamu.Isigameko sokubulawa kwalo thishanhloko senzeka ngo-Januwari 2017, umufi wayehamba emgwaqweni u-R34 ebheke eShowe ehamba nezihlobo zakhe ezimbili kwathi sebeseMpangeni bahlangana nabantu abathathu abacela ukugitsheliswa emotweni.Wabe esema umufi wabagibelisa, kwakukhona amadoda amabili noyedwa wesifazane.Kulaba abathathu ababegitshelisiwe, ababili bacela ukwehla eMasangweni, wabehlisa base beqhubeka nohambo.Sebefike eNkwalini owesilisa owayesele wacela umshayeli ukuba ehle emotweni yakhe. Umshayeli wayimisa imoto, umbulali wakhipha isibhamu wamphoqa ukuba ehle. Umshayeli kuthiwa wanqaba ukwehla, wazama nokuyihambisa imoto yakhe. Umbulali wabe esemdubula kathathu ekhanda maqede wehla emotweni wabaleka.Amaphoyisa aseShowe avula icala lokubulala nelokuzama ukubamba inkunzi. Icala labe seliphenywa kwagcina kuboshwe umbulali ngoSepthemba 2017. Ubelokhu ehamba icala njengoba ligcine limlahlile wabe esegwetshwa.
title: Kufunwa umndeni womfana ongazazi

text: UNGONGQOSHE wezaseKhaya uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi unxuse amalungu ePhalamende ukuthi alinde kuze kube neWhite Paper ezoveza umbono kahulumeni ngokuthi ucabangani ngesithembu sabesifazane. Lokhu kulandela inkulumo mpikiswano ngalesi siphakamiso.UMotsoaledi utshele iPhalamende ukuthi ulalele konke ukuphawula ngalesi sithembu.Ilungu le-Al-Jamah uMnuz Ganief Hendricks, lithe eyalesi sithembu ayikho emthethweni. UMotsoaledi uthe: “Lokhu akusona isiphakamiso sikahulumeni.” Uthe akulindwe leli phepha ukuze kwaziwe ukuthi uhulumeni ucabangani. Uqhube wathi kuyacaca ukuthi izwe lidinga umthetho omusha wezemishado.“Uma ufuna ukushada kudingeka ukhethe ngaphansi kwemithetho emithathu. Le mithetho ayiniki amalungelo imishado yamaMuslim, Hindu kanjalo nenziwe ngaphansi kosiko lwamaJews.”Uthe kuyona yonke le mithetho awukho ovimbela izingane ukuthi zishade yingakho ethi kudingeka ishintshwe imithetho.
title: Uhulumeni awukavezi mbono ngesithembu sabesifazane: Motsoaledi

text:
UMDWEBI uRasta usephinde wakususa lokho ethelekela kungalindele bani emcimbini we-ANC wokugubha iminyaka ewu-107 yasungulwa oseMoses Mabhida Stadium. URasta ozakhele udumo ngokudweba amaciko akuleli uma esedlulile emhlabeni ngokunjalo nabanye osaziwayo. Ngumdwebo wakhe kaRamaphosa osematheni kulokhu njengoba uRasta eyingxenye yezinkulungwane ezihambele lo mgubho. URasta ufike ekuseni nezinsiza zakhe zokudweba nokupenda waqala umsebenzi ngaphambi kokuthi uRamaphosa aqale ukwethula inkulumo yakhe. Nanka amazwibela okushiwo abantu ngomdwebo wakhe wanamhlanje: Rasta painting Ramaphosa 🤣🤣🤣 pic.twitter.com/LVQFe9kiaQSomeone needs to take rasta's painting brush 😂😂😂😂😂 Rasta seriously needs divine intervention. title: #ANCManifesto: URasta ushaye adume ngazo emcimbini we-ANC

text: UPHEKWE wavivinywa ezinhlakeni zentsha ye-ANC, umholi wayo ophakanyiselwe esikhundleni sikasihlalo wesiFunda, iGeneral Gizenga Mpanza, uMnuz Goodman Khonzuyise Ngidi (38) owaziwa ngoKhonza.Igama lesifunda lisanda kushintshwa laqanjwa kabusha ngenhloso yokuhlonipha isishoshovu se-ANC uGeneral Gizenga Mpanza. I-ANC kulesi sifunda inomthwalo wokubusa omasipala abaningi kubalwa owesiFunda iLembe, iMandeni, Ndwedwe, Maphumulo neKwaDukuza.Bazobe belwela ukubabuyisela ezandleni zabo emuva kokhetho lomasipala ngonyaka ozayo.I-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ilungiselela ukuhlalisa izingqungquthela zezifunda zayo ukuze kufike ukhetho sebemi ngomumo. Isolezwe ngeSonto lixoxa nalabo abaphakanyiselwe ezikhundleni, lizwe kabanzi ngempilo namava abanawo. Amagatsha aseqalile ukukhuluma indaba yobuholi njengoba ethi uNgidi akaphakame athathe isihlalo. Kunemibono ethi seluqinile ukhakhayi kuNgidi, sekufanele angene esikhundleni esiphezulu, ipolitiki useyiqonda kabanzi njengoba ubephuma engena ezikhundleni eziqavile. Ingqunguthela yaseGeneral Gizenga Mpanza ibhekwe ngamehlo abomvu nemikhankaso ewumshoshaphansi isivele iqalile esifundeni. Lesi sifunda singezinye ezigunyazwe yi-ANC ukuba zikhethe ubuholi kepha izingqungquthela zisamisiwe ngenxa yemizamo yokunqanda ukubhebhetheka kweCorona.UNgidi uzalelwe KwaSonkombo, eNdwedwe okusho ukuthi ungumkhaya kaSihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala osenguNdunankulu wesifundazwe. Engxoxweni kuvelile ukuthi uNgidi uyindoda eganiwe yabusiswa ngezingane ezine. Ufunde ipolitiki ezinhlakeni ze-ANCYL.Ngo-2004 ukhethelwe kwesikaNobhala wegatsha le-ANCYL elibizwa ngeSiyaya, wasebenza ngempumelelo ehola intsha ekhulisa nesibalo sabajoyinayo. Ngo-2006 ukhethelwe kwesikaSihlalo wegatsha elifanayo. Ngaleso sikhathi ubengumholi wePhalamende leNtsha eNdwedwe lapho bekuhlalwa khona kuxoxwe ngezinkinga nezidingo zabantu abasha endaweni.Ubephinde aphathe nesikhundla seSafety Policing Forum ebhekelele ukuphepha nokulwa nobugebengu endaweni, nakhona wasebenza kahle wazakhela ugazi kubantu bemthemba ngokuphepha kwabo.Ngo-2007 ukhethwe ukuba yilungu elengeziwe kwi-ANCYL, eGeneral Gizenga Mpanza amahlandla amabili. Uke waba yiphini likasihlao we-ANCYL khona esifundeni esifanayo. Ukhethwe waba yiPhini likaSihalo we-ANC eGeneral Gizenga Mpanza.Ubambe njengosihlalo we-ANC esifundeni, emuva kokuthi obewusihlalo, uMnuz Ricardo Mthembu ebizwe ukuyosebenza esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe kwase kuvuleka isikhala. UMthembu uphinde abe nguMkhulumeli we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.Kumanje uNgidi uphethe isikhundla sokuba wuSomlomo kuMasipala waseNdwedwe asithathe ngo-2016 emuva kokhetho lohulumeni bezindawo. Ihlandla lakhe lizophela maduze njengoba kusondela ukhetho ngonyaka ozayo.
title: Bafuna omusha ozohola isifunda se-ANC
