text: USOMABHIZINISI usolwa ngokuqhumuza uR256 000 wesalukazi esiwuthole emva kokuba silimale engozini yemoto.UNksz Bongiwe Mathonsi onesitolo eMasayithini, eMolweni, ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi ePinetown ekuqaleni kwesonto, ebhekene necala lokukhwabanisa imali kaNkk Hilda Zuma (87).Kuthiwa uNkk Zuma wathola lesi samba ngoSepthemba nyakenye sivela kwiRoad Accident Fund (RAF).Emva kokuyithola uthi waya kuNksz Mathonsi eyomazisa ukuthi imali isingenile.UNkk Zuma uya kuNksz Mathonsi ngenxa yokuthi wayethe uma sekungene imali akomtshela ukuze ameluleke ukuthi kumele ayisebenzise kanjani.Kuthiwa akalindanga ibhadi uNkk Zuma wanikela kuNksz Mathonsi eyomtshela ukuthi sezingenile izizumbulu.UNksz Mathonsi naye akachithanga sikhathi, wathi abaye ebhange ukuze abe nesiqiniseko sokuthi imali ingenile ngempela.“Ungithathile saya naye ebhange eHillcrest wathi ufuna ukungilungisela zonke izinto zami ukuze imali ingamosheki,” kusho uNkk Zuma.Uthi sebesebhange wamnikeza ikhadi, wathi akaligcine ngokucophelela.UNkk Zuma uthi wagcina ngalelo langa ukuya ebhange.Ukwenza konke lokhu nje uNkk Zuma akamtshelile umzukulu wakhe ngoba engamethembi.Uthi unake ngoba esexwayiswa umzukulu, esemtshela ukuthi uyabona yini ukuthi usisi wesesitolo impilo yakhe ishintsha ngendlela esolisayo, wakha isithabathaba somuzi, uthenge imoto, ifenisha, usenama-weave abizayo, iTV nokunye.Kuthiwa ubezibusisa ngotshwala obubizayo.Ingane yakhe kuthiwa uyikhiphile esikoleni ebifunda kuso endaweni, wayisa esikoleni somntakabani eMgungundlovu.“Lo sisi bengimethemba kakhulu njengomuntu ebengiyaye ngikwelete kuyena iklabishi nesinkwa, ngiphinde ngimkhokhele uma sengihole imali yempesheni.“Wathi angotshela yena ukuze angeluleke ngendlela efanele ngoba ungusomabhizinisi,” kusho uNkk Zuma.Umzukulu uNksz Pamela Zuma, baya ebhange nogogo wakhe emva kokusola ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle.“Yilapho sithole khona ukuthi imali lo sisi ubeyikhipha usuku nosuku. Sithole ukuthi sekusele uR7 000 kuphela ebhange,” kusho umzukulu.Uthe lo sisi wanikeza uninakhulu ikhadi eliyisithipha elingenamali kwathi elikaninakhulu elinemali lasala ngakulo sisi.Uthe kuyimanje uninakhulu usesaba ngisho ukuphumela phandle, useyamesaba kwalo somabhizinisi ngendlela amenzele phansi ngayo.“Sewake wafika nalapha ekhaya nabantu engingabazi bezongikhipha endlini bethi isithengwe abantu baKwaMashu,” kusho uNkk Zuma.Ummeli uMnuz Sandile Zondo owasiza ugogo ukuthola le mali, uthe sebevule icala emaphoyiseni.Uthe basezinhlelweni zokuthi aye enkantolo ukuyothola igunya lokuthi kudliwe umuzi walo sisi nempahla enye ayithenga, ukuze ugogo abuyelwe imali yakhe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe uColonel Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa aseHillcrest aphenya icala lokweba.“Umsolwa ukhiphe imali yomuntu omdala ngaphandle kwemvume yakhe."Kuboshwe owesifazane ona-41 wabekwa icala ngalokhu."Uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi ePinetown ngoMashi 5,” kusho uZwane.UNksz Mathonsi uthe yena usezoziphendulela enkantolo ngakho konke asolwa ngakho.Isitatimende sasebhange, Isolezwe ngoMgqibelo lisibonile.Kuvela ukuthi ngoSepthemba 28 ngosuku okwangena ngalo imali kwakhishwa uR142 000 ngokwehlukana, ngo-Okthoba 1 kwakhishwa uR30 000, ngoNovemba 23 wuR10 000, Disemba 19 wuR10 000 kanti cishe usuku nosuku ubekhipha imali efika kuR10 000.
title: Usomabhizinisi 'udle' R256 000 wesalukazi

text: UHLELA ukuthatha izinyathelo okuthiwa ufuna ukuyisa ibandla lakwaShembe enkantolo. Umfundisi owamiswa kukhalwa ngokuthi uhlinzeke amakholwa ngamanzi ohambeni lomhlangano kaJanuwari kuthiwa ufuna ukuthatha izinyathelo eziphikisana nokumiswa kwakhe.Imithombo esondelene naleli bandla nabaseBuhleni, ithe uMfundisi Lucky Mvubu omiselwe ukuhlinzeka amakholwa ngamanzi ngesikhathi enyukela entabeni eKhenana ngoJanuwari, usenqume ukulufaka enkantolo udaba.Kuthiwa isinqumo usithathe ngemuva kokuthi ezame ukuthola izimpendulo kubameli abambhalela incwadi ngezizathu zokummisa namacala abhekene nawo ebandleni, kodwa bangamphendula.Ethintwa uMvubu uvumile ukuthi kunezinhlelo aphezu kwazo ngokumiswa kodwa wangazidalula. Uthe sekukaningi eshayela ucingo abameli ebabhalela nama-email kodwa abakaze baphendule.“Engikwenzayo kungenxa yokufisa ukwazi ukuthi kwenzekani ngoba ngikhulele kulona leli bandla. Ukuhlala ekhaya ngingahlanganyeli nabazalwane ngenze nemisebenzi yami engibizelwe kuyona akungiphathi kahle,” kusho uMvubu.Umthombo okuleli bandla uthe : “Selokhu uMvubu amiswa wuMfundisi Hlatshwayo ngoJanuwari 26 akukaze kube nezinkomba zokuthi kukhona okuvelayo ngekusasa lakhe ebandleni. Kuthule nje futhi akekho oyithi vu indaba yakhe.’Uqhube wathi ngokwenqubo yebandla umuntu umiswa izinyanga ezintathu. Okungale kwalokho kusuke kuwukuthi usexoshiwe.“Eyesihlanu le nyanga. Kuyaxaka ngoba uMvubu uyaziwa ngeqhaza analo ebandleni njengoba esiza kokuningi njengokushadisa, ukweluleka abahaqwe izifo ezifana nokhwantalala, HIV/AIDS nokunye okubalulekile. Silimele ngokungabi khona kwale nceku,” kubalisa umthombo.UMfu Hlatshwayo uthe akukho angakuphawula, makukhulunywe noMfu Nzama.“Akamiswanga yimina uMvubu, wamiswa wumkhandlu. Ngangiwusihlalo wangalolo suku kuphela. Umkhandlu wanquma ukumumisa uMvubu ngoba umthole enamacala watshelwa ukuthi izazimthetho zizophenya kabanzi ngodaba lwakhe futhi kuyoba yinkantolo enquma ngaye,” kusho uHlatshwayo.Imizamo yokuthola uNzama ayiphumelelanga.Okhulumela abaseBuhleni uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe uthe akukho angakusho ngalolu daba wathi kusaphenywa, abantu mabalinde.UMvubu uzithola ebhekene nalesi simo nje kungenxa yesiphakamiso asenza enkampanini asebenza kuyona iLandile Shembe Foundation ebambisene neyomshwalense sokuxhasa amakholwa uma esenyukela eKhenana.Abameli bebandla, iMaharaj Attorney’s, bambhalela incwadi ngoFebhuwari 19, esolwa ngokwenza okuphambene. Usolwe nangokwenza isivumelwano nabaxhasi ngenhloso yokwenza inzuzo.Phambilini uLandile Shembe, ongumzukulu kaGalile “JG” Shembe odume ebandleni ngeLanga Lamalanga, wathi akukho nzuzo eyatholwa wuMvubu.
title: Izinhlelo zenkantolo komisiwe kwaShembe

text: ‘AKUSHO lutho ukuthi umdlalo uzodlalelwa kuyiphi inkundla, okubalulekile ukuthi kufanele sinqobe."Lena yinkulumo yomgadli waMaZulu FC, u-Emiliano Tade osevalele phakathi amagoli amathathu kuleli qembu selokhu kuqale isizini.UTade ukhuluma kanjena nje, Usuthu luzotholana phezulu ne-Orlando Pirates kwi-quarter final yeTelkom Knockout (TKO) ngoMgqibelo, eMoses Mabhida Stadium, ngo-6 ntambama.Kuzobe kungekona okukuqala iPirates idlala naMaZulu kule sizini, njengoba la maqembu edlale ngokulingana kuba wu 1-1 kowe-Absa Premiership, eKing Zwelithini Stadium ngo-Okthoba 6.Kulowo mdlalo, uTade washaya igoli lokulinganisa ngesiwombe sesibili ngemuva kokuthi u-Augustine Mulenga ayeshaye eleBucs ngesiwombe sokuqala.Ngokwejwayelekile AmaZulu ayaye asebenzise iKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza, uma edlalela imidlalo yasekhaya. Uma kwenzekile angadlalela kuyona, ayaye asebenzise iPrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu.Nokho iPremier Soccer League (PSL), ikhethe ukuthi umdlalo uyiswe eMabhida kulokhu.“Kuzoba wumdlalo ohluke kakhulu lona. Lokhu ngikusho ngoba akuyona iligi lena kodwa umdlalo womkhumulajezi, ngakho kuzoba nezinguquko. Ekugcineni kosuku kufanele kube khona onqobayo, kube khona owasha ijezi. "Ngingalisho ligcwale umlomo elithi silindele impi kwiPirates. Indaba yenkundla ayisho lutho kimina, okubalulekile ukuthi sinqobe,” usho kanje uTade izolo ngesikhathi ezakhe ziziqeqesha ezinkundleni ezingaphandle kweMoses Mabhida Stadium.UTade uthe akafuni nakancane ukuphoxa eMoses Mabhida Stadium, kwazise uzobe edlala okokuqala kule nkundla.“Kuyintokozo yawo wonke umdlali ukudlala enkundleni enkulu, enabalandeli abaningi. Kuzofanele sisebenze kanzima sijuluke enkundleni ukuze sizothola umphumela esiwufisayo,” kusho uTade.USuthu luphuma esibhaxwini sika 3-0, lapho lushaywe iCape Town City emdlalweni weligi. IBhakabhaka lihambela phezulu ngemuva kokushaya izimbangi zalo ezinkulu iKaizer Chiefs ngo 2-1 ngeledlule.I-Telkom izohambela eBridge City Mall, Philani Mall, KwaMyandu Shopping Centre, naseMlaza Mega City ngoLwesihlanu nangoMgqibelo. Lapha bazobe bephisana ngezipho, okubalwa kuzona namathikithi emidlalo yama-quaterfinal. Bazohambela kulezi zitolo phakathi kuka-10 ekuseni no-5 ntambama.
title: OwoSuthu ubheke impi yodwa kweZimnyama

text: NAKUBA isiZulu sikubeka kucace ukuthi ingwe idla ngamabala kodwa ukuxoshwa kukaFadlu Davids kwiMaritzburg United kubuhlungu ngoba udayiswe abaphathi bakhe abathanda imali.Abaphathi beTeam of Choice kufanele ngabe bafunda isifundo kwi-African Wanderers, eyayiphethwe uVusi Mkhize ongasekho, eyadedela izinsika zabadlali bayo abanjengoSiyabonga “Bhele” Nomvethe, Sibusiso “Rhee” Zuma noPhumlani “BMX” Mkhize kwi-Orlando Pirates.Lokho kwalandelwa wukukhala nokugedla kwamazinyo ezikhulwini nakubalandeli ngoba iqembu lagawulwa yizembe kwancipha isibalo samaqembu aKwaZulu-Natal adlala kwiPremiership.Ukuhamba kukaLebohang Maboe eya kwiMamelodi Sundowns, Kurt Lenjties owajoyina iChippa United, Evans Rusike osedlala kwiSuperSport United noBevan Fransman osedlalela iHighlands Park kwaba ukungena komuhlwa esiswini ebesenza izinto zenzeke.Ukuhlangana kwalaba badlali kwaholela ekutheni iqembu laseMphithi liyodlala kowamanqamu eNedbank Cup nokuyinto eyayingakaze yenzeke emlandweni waleli qembu.UDavids ukhombisile ukuthi unekhono lokuqeqesha efaka leli qembu laseMphithi okokuqala ngqa kowamanqamu.Ngaphandle kwalokho isitayela sakhe sibuyise abalandeli akade bengasezi enkundleni engakanikezwa amatomu okokuqeqesha.Akuwona lowo mlando kuphela awushiye kwiMaritzburg kodwa uphinde wabeka iqembu endaweni yesine kwi-log yePremiership nokuyinto engakaze yenzeke kuleli qembu. Kodwa ngenxa yokuthi imali ayiluthezi olumanzi usethwaliswa inyanda obekungafanele ayithwale.Abaphathi badedela uLebohang Maboe obengomunye wabadlali abebenza izinto zenzeke esiswini uma eyibambe noSiphesihle Ndlovu noFortune Makaringe. Siyazi ukuthi uthando lwemali yimpande yesono kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi kufanele ulutheke kalula. Ngisho umqeqeshi ezomqasha mancane amathuba okuthi aphumelele uma iqhubeka nokudedela abadlali abayizinsika.Lo mkhuba waseMgungundlovu wokulambela kubadlali sithemba ukuthi uyagcina kulo nyaka ngoba ubuyisela isifundazwe emuva.
title: [IMIBONO]Udayiswe abaphathi bakhe abathanda imali uFadlu Davids
Bazogodukiswa mahhala abaseNigeria abafisa ukuhamba kuleli

text: Sebesebenzela ezimotweni othisha besikole samabanga aphakeme Esokheni High, eGreytown esashiswa abafundi bekhala ngokuthi sigugile.Kuthiwa othisha nothishanhloko wakulesi sikole sebehlala ezimotweni zabo baphume ngoba beyofundisa emuva kokushiswa kwehhovisi likathishanhloko ne-staff room ngabafundi nyakenye.Abafundi bakulesi sikole babekhala ngokuthi isikole sigugile, bekhala nangokuthi abanazo izimoto zokuhamba uma beya esikoleni yize bakhe kude naso.USihlalo wesigungu esilawula isikole, uMnuz Mihlayakhe Dlomo, uthe lesi sikole silokhu saba kulesi simo ngesikhathi abafundi abathile okukhona kubo abangasafundi besishisa nyakenye. Uthe ngenhlanhla akuzange kushe amakilasi nokwenza kungaphazamiseki ukufunda kodwa kwasha ihhovisi likathishanhloko ne-staff room.“Kumanje bahlala ezimotweni zabo basebenzele kuzona. Bese befundisa izingane emakilasini ngoba amakilasi awashanga wona,” kuchaza uDlomo.Uthe abafundi bakulesi sikole bashisa isikole ngoba bethi sesigugile.Baphinde bakhala ngokuthi bahamba ibanga elide uma beya esikoleni.UDhlomo uthe inkinga enkulu ukuthi lesi sikole yisona sodwa esiyisikole samabanga aphakeme. Zilinganiselwa kweziyisikhombisa izikole zakuleya ndawo ezikhiqiza abafundi abagcina befunda kusona.Uthe kwabaphatha kabi nokho ukuthi abafundi bathi bekhala ngesimo sesikole balimaze lokhu okukhona.Uqhube wathi ngeke ande ngamazwi ngodaba lokusha kwaso njengoba kusawudaba oludingidwa enkantolo.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa uthe bayazi ngesimo salesi sikole. Uthe uhlu lwezikole ezidinga ukulungiswa kulesi sifundazwe lude kakhulu. Ezinye zalezi zikole yizikole okufanele zilungiswe ngoba zazivele zinenkinga.“Kumele sikhumbule ukuthi lesi sikole salinyazwa abafundi, asizange silinyazwe yisimo sezulu. Ngeke sikwazi ukuthi sisibeke ekuqaleni kohlu kube kunezikole ezinye ezazivele zidinga ukulungiswa ngoba lokhu kungaze kukhiphe umyalezo omubi nakwabanye abafundi - bazitshele ukuthi ukuze bathole abakufunayo kufanele bone lokhu okukhona,” kusho uMlotshwa.
title: Basebenzela ezimotweni othisha

text: ALAZIWA ikhambi elisize akade behaqwe yiCovid-19 kwazise bebephuza imithi ehlukene, benza nezinto ezingafani.Abanye baye ezibhedlela kanti abanye balulamele emakhaya.Sikhulume noMnuz Zazi Nxele (40) waseMgungundlovu othole ukuthi uneCovid-19 emuva kokuhlolelwa leli gciwane.Uthe okwamenza wayohlola wukuthi wezwa engasakwazi ukunambitha noma yini ayeyidla wayengayizwa ukuthi inambitheka kanjani, wayengasakwazi nokuphefumula kahle futhi kubuhlungu umzimba.“Ngathi uma ngiba nenkinga yokuphefumula nganikela kwadokotela wami, okuwuyena owangithumela esibhedlela. Ngicabanga ukuthi ngasizwa wukushesha ngiyibambe iCovid-19 ngoba ngiye ngazisebenzisa izinto ezishiwo abantu ngesikhathi ngisanda kuthola ukuthi ngineCovid-19 ngoJulayi 16. Kodwa ngesikhathi senginenkinga yokuphefumula ngavele ngaya kudokotela,” kusho uNxele.Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi abantu bathole usizo kwabezempilo ngoba yena wakusebenzisa okwakushiwo ngabantu okubalwa umhlonyane, ugalikhi nolamula, imithi namaphilisi kodwa ube nenkinga yokuphefumula ebe ngcono emuva kokulala esibhedlela.Ucele abantu ukuthi beseke abaneCovid-19 ngoba basuke bebodwa uma belele ezibhedlela, besaba.“ICovid-19 idinga uzitshele ukuthi uzoyinqoba, udle imithi onikwa yona. Ufunde izincwadi ngoba uba wedwa isikhathi esiningi. Kufanele wenze nezinhlelo ngekusasa lakho. Kubalulekile nokusekwa ngabantu nomndeni ngoba lezo zingcingo nemiyalezo yokuthi ube ngcono iyakugqugquzela,” kusho uNxele.UMnuz Simphiwe Dlamini (35) waseThekwini, uthe wathola ucingo lumazisa ukuthi kukhona umuntu asebenza naye osethole ukuthi uneCovid-19 ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi naye azihlole ngoba ubesebenza eduze nalowo muntu.“Ngathi uma ngimfonela uzakwethu wangitshela ukuthi uneCovid-19 nenkosikazi yakhe inaleli gciwane. Yize ngangiqikelela ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuthi ngifake isifonyo futhi angisondeli eduze kwakhe kakhulu kodwa ngaya kwadokotela nakuba ngangingenazo izimpawu zeCovdi-19. Udokotela wathi kufanele ngihlolwe. Angibange ngisaya ekhaya kunkosikazi nezingane zami ngoba ngangifuna ukubavikela, ngahlala eflethini,” kusho uDlamini.Uthe kwakuwuLwesine ngesikhathi ethola ucingo, kwathiwa imiphumela uzoyithola emuva kwamahora awu-24. Kwathi ngeSonto eselungiselela ukuya ekhaya wathola umyalezo ovela kwaLancet lapho ayehlolwe khona umazisa ukuthi imiphumela yakhe iveza ukuthi uneCovid-19.“Angazi ukuthi ngizothi nganginjani kodwa ngashaqeka isikhashana, ngase ngifonela unkosikazi nomndeni wonke. Ngathatha isinqumo sokuthi ngiphumele obala ukuthi sengineCovid-19 ngabhala ekhasini lami kuFacebook ngoba ngisebenza nabantu. Bengingenazo izimpawu emuva kokuthola imiphumela yami,” kusho uDlamini.Emuva kokuthola imiphumela wazisa udokotela wakhe ukuthi uneCovid-19, owabe esemnika imithi yomkhuhlane, amaphilisi omkhuhlane nawama-vitamin akulandelwa wumkakhe.Emuva kwezinsuku ezintathu uthi umzimba wakhe waqala ukuba buhlungu wazitshela ukuthi mhlawumbe ulale kabi.Umkakhe wamthengela ogalikhi, ulamula, vicks, umhlonyane nokunye okuthiwa kuyasiza.Emuva kosuku lwesithathu uthi waphathwa yikhanda eliyisimanga, kubuhlungu umzimba futhi enesiyezi.Ubegquma ngomhlonyane ne-vicks, ephuza nemithi namaphilisi awanikwe wudokotela.“Ngosuku lwesishiyagalolunye ngazizwa sengingcono nekhanda lingangiphethe kodwa emini ngavele ngashiselwa nekhanda labuya. Ngagquma ngase ngibuyela embhedeni. Emuva kwalokho ngaba ngcono kodwa ikhanda belilokhu lingiphethe kuze kwaphela izinsuku eziwu-14,” kusho uDlamini.Namanje ikhanda lisamphatha kodwa okuhlukile wukuthi elamanje aliqaqambi ngendlela engabekezeleki.Umhlonyane uthe ubengawuphuzi kodwa ubegquma ngawo ngoba akazi kufanele umuntu aphuze ongakanani.Ubesebenzisa ne-med-lemon enegaligi, ujinja noju ephuza nama-vitamin nemithi ayinikwe wudokotela.Ubalule ukuthi into ebimphathisa ngekhanda kakhulu wukucabanga nokubuka izindaba kangangokuthi ugcine engasazibuki.Uveze ukuthi kunamalungu omndeni wakhe amabili elinye eliwudokotela nawo athola ukuthi aneCovid-19 ngesikhathi naye esalwa naleli gciwane.“AbaneCovid-19 ngicela besekwe ngoba ukuthola ucingo, imiyalezo nama-video call kuyakukhumbuza ukuthi awuwedwa. Kungakuhle ukuthi bagxile ezindabeni ezinhle ngoba bakhona abasindayo kuleli gciwane. Ngeke ngisho ukuthi ngilashwe yini ngoba udokotela wangibuza ukuthi nginani wase enginika imithi elwa nalezo zinto ezingiphethe okuyimithi yomkhuhlane,” kusho uDlamini.Ucele abantu ukuthi bagqoke izifonyo, balandele imithetho yokuphepha ebekwe wuhulumeni, bahlale emakhaya uma kungekho okubaphoqa ukuthi bahambe.Uthe kumphathe kabi ukubona ukuthi omunye wabantu akade bemeseka uMnuz Sphiwe Maphumulo, uthathwe yileli gciwane.Ubonge umkakhe ngokumeseka nokunakekela izingane zabo wathi kwakungelula ngesikhathi ethola ukuthi uyagula ngoba unina nomkakhe bakhala.
title: Iziyalo zabasinde kwiCovid-19

text: IMIPHUMELA yemidlalo ezayo yeChippa United iyona ezocacisa ngekusasa likaClinton Larsen kuleli qembu elizinze eBhayi nelidume ngokupheka lithulula abaqeqeshi.ULarsen ongumqeqeshi wesine ukuqeqesha iChilli Boys uveze lokhu ngemuva kokushaya AmaZulu FC ngo 1-0 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku. Igoli elibanikeze amaphuzu amathathu lishaywe ngu-Andile Mbenyane esiwombeni sokuqala.EzikaLarsen zifike emdlalweni ziwadinga njengemali amaphuzu ngemuva kokuthi iMaritzburg United, esemsileni kwi-log, izame ukunciphisa igebe inqoba owayo umdlalo ngoLwesihlanu.IChippa isendaweni yesine ukusuka emsileni lapho ilingana neBaroka neFree State Stars ngamaphuzu awu-24, kuthi iMaritzburg ibambe amabhuleki ngamaphuzu awu-20.ULarsen obekhuluma ngokuzethemba nabezindaba, uthe uma bengabamba lesi sigqi sokuwina nakanjani bazolivika izembe. IChilli Boys ibize emdlalweni ishayela phezulu ngemuva kokungena kowandulela owamanqamu kwiNedbank Cup kulandela ukuwashisa ijezi iBidvest Wits.Enkulumeni yakhe uveze ukuthi usebheke kuqale isizini entsha lapho ezokwazi ukuhlanganisa iqembu ngendlela afisa ngayo. Yilapho okuvele indaba yenkontileka yakhe.“Akusikhona ukuthi izolulwa inkontileka yami noma cha. Kulele kimina ukuthi ngiyasayina noma cha. Ikhona inkontileka etafuleni. Ngenze okufanayo kwiGolden Arrows ngasayina izinyanga eziyisithupha ngoba ngifuna ukubona ukuthi umphathi uwuhlobo luni nokuthi iqembu lisebenza kanjani? Uma sengigculisekile ngayayelula. Nalapha ngicabanga ukuthi sizokhuluma emasontweni amabili ezayo. Uma singanqoba umdlalo owodwa sidlale ngokulingana noma emibili emidlalweni ezayo sizobe sesiphephile (ezembeni). Sizobe sesingahlala phansi ngisayine. Okwamanje sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iqembu liphephile ngaphambi kobheka ikusasa. Kodwa sengike ngamtshela (uSihlalo uSiviwe Mpengesi) ukuthi ngijabule ngokwesekwa engikutholayo kanti nabadlali bangamukele kahle konke kubukeka kuhamba kahle,” kusho uLarsen. Uthe njengamanje awusekho umdlalo olula ikakhulukazi emaqenjini avika izembe.“Le mpi izoliwa kuze kube sekugcineni. Ingakho kusemqoka ukuthi nasemdlalweni ozayo sifake umfutho ofanayo ukuze sibuye nomphumela omuhle. Uma siwina noma sidlala ngokulingana, sizokhuphuka kule ndawo embi. Ayisekho imidlalo elula manje njengoba sibonile kwiBaroka neKaizer Chiefs nasemdlalweni weMaritzburg,” kusho uLarsen.
title: Ikusasa loweChippa lilele ezembeni

text: Uphiko oluvela ehhovisi lamaphoyisa kuzwelonke luphenya ngezibhamu zikaMasipala waseMsunduzi okusolakala ukuthi zisetshenziswe ukubulala abantu.Isolezwe ngeSonto lihabule ukuthi izibhamu zamaphoyisa kamasipala zishaqwe yithimba lamaphoyisa abizwa ngeNational Intervention Unit (NIU).Kuthiwa lolu phiko lwathatha izibhamu njengengxenye yophenyo futhi zathunyelwa kochwepheshe abahlola izibhamu ukuze babheke ukuthi zisebenzile yini ebugebengwini.Zibalelwa kwezingu-20 izibhamu okuthiwa azikho emahhovisi kamasipala ziyohlolwa.Lokhu kushoda kwezibhamu sekuholele ekutheni amaphoyisa abe madolonzima ukuphuma ayokwenza umsebenzi ngoba azoba wukudla kwezigebengu engenazibhamu wona.IThe Mercury esesitebeleni esisodwa neSolezwe ngeSonto ike yabika ngenkombankombane yezibhamu kumasipala amaqembu ezepolitiki aphikisayo ebuza ngazo.Isolezwe ngeSonto lenze uphenyo olunzulu lathola ukuthi azilahlekile kodwa ziyingxenye yophenyo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke, uBrigadier Vishnu Naidoo ukuqinisekisile ukuthi izibhamu zashaqwa wathi futhi zikude ukubuya ngoba zinobufakazi. Uthe kuzomele baphole labo abakhala ngokuthi bafuna kubuye izibhamu ngoba uphenyo lujulile.“Izinto ezifana nalezi asizikhulumi noma kanjani esidlangalaleni ngoba kunedokodo eliya kwiNPA maqondana nezibhamu ongibuza ngazo. Sizozidedela kanjani ngoba ziqukethe ubufakazi obuzosebenza ecaleni esiliphenyayo?“Sicela ukunikwa ithuba senze umsebenzi ngeke sikhiphe imininingwane eminingi,’’ kusho uNaidooOkhulumela uMasipala uMsunduzi, uNksz Thobeka Mafumbatha uthe bakhathazekile ngezibhamu ngoba kuyisikhathi samaholidi kumatasa kakhulu amaphoyisa ayazidinga.“Izibhamu engizaziyo ezathathwa ziyohlolwa anginaso isiqiniseko ngokuthi zikhona ezidukile njengoba kuke kwasabalala imibiko.Ikhona ingcindezi njengoba kungamaholidi phela amaphoyisa awakwazi ukusebenza kahle asengozini adinga izibhamu,’’ kuchaza uNkk Mafumbatha.IMeya kaMasipala uMsunduzi uMnuz Mzimkhulu Thebolla icashunwe enxusa ukuthi zibuye izibhamu ngoba umasipala usele dengwane.
title: Izibhamu zikamasipala emacaleni okubulala

text: KAYENYUSWANGA imali eyabelwa iSilo samaBandla, uGoodwill Zwelithini - ilokhu ime kuR71.344 million esasabelwe wona ngokwedlule.Isabelo-mali seSilo siphuma ehhovisi likaNdunankulu.Esithula ehhovisi lakhe uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe iqhaza leNdlunkulu kaZulu libalulekile kuhulumeni wentando yabantu.Uthe Isilo sihlale siseka uhulumeni kanti futhi yisona esigqugquzela ukugcinwa kwesiko.“Imali elekelela Isilo neNdlunkulu isetshenziswa ukuqhuba imikhosi ibuye isize ekuvuselelweni kwezigodlo,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe likhulu iqhaza leSilo kuhulumeni. Yiso esivula nesiShayamthetho sesifundazwe, sivule neNdlu yobuHoli boMdabu sengamele nenqwaba yemikhosi okubalwa kuyo owoMhlanga, oWoselwa, owokuKhumbula iLembe, owamaganu, uMkhosi woMama neminye.“Isilo yisona futhi esigcoba amakhosi aseNdlunkulu,” kusho uZikalala.UZikalala uthe iRoyal Trust izokwenza umsebenzi wokuvuselela izigodlo eziyisishiyagalombili zeSilo.UMengameli we-IFP, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uthe njenge IFP banelisekile ngesabelo-mali esinikwe Omdala.“Thina sithi imali enikwa Isilo akumele yehliswe, sithi lapho obekuzoba khona imikhosi kumele iguqulwe kancane kodwa isetshenziswe ukuqhuba imikhankaso yokuqwashisa abantu ngobhubhane olukhona oluhlasele emhlabeni. Isilo njengobaba wesizwe yisona okumele senze umsebenzi wokuqwashisa abantu,” kusho uHlabisa.Umholi weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, uthe ihhovisi likaZikalala kumele lenze isiqiniseko sokuthi iRoyal Trust isebenza ngendlela. “Ngonyaka odlule kwa­khishwa uR4 million Isilo siya phesheya kodwa leyo mali yayingasetshenziselwa ukuvuselela izigodlo.”
title: ISilo samaBandla sabelwe imali efanayo nangokwedlule

text: UNEKELWE izwe umholo okukholakala ukuthi ngowabethuli bentandokazi yohlelo lwemishado i-Our Perfect Wedding (OPW) yakuMzansi Magic.Umsindo ngokuhola imali “engagculisi” kwabalingisi nabethuli bezinhlelo kwithelevishini, kugcine ngokuthi kuvele obala ukuthi abethuli balolu hlelo bahola malini ngenyanga.Lolu hlelo luke lwethulwa nguNomsa Buthelezi, Thembisa Mdoda (osesithombeni) , Tumi Morake nabanye abaningi. Kusukela namuhla luzobanjwa nguLerato Moloi, bese emasontweni amabili ezayo lwethulwe nguMbali Nkosi ozobe esededela uKayise Ngqula ngoJanuwari. Udaba lwamaholo belusezithebeni ludingidwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana iTwitter noFacebook.Abethuli be-OPW kuthiwa bahola imali elinganiselwa kuR54 000 ngenyanga ingakathathwa intela.Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi bakhokhelwa R3 000 ngehora, basebenza angu-18 ngenyanga.Le mali eholwa yilaba ikhalise abaningi abasembonini yokungcebeleka uma iqhathaniswa nomholo wamajaji ama-Idols South Africa.Nyakenye kwavela ukuthi abethuli bama-Idols bebehola R35 000 ngenyanga kodwa basebenza amahora angu-8 ngenyanga. Abanye bachaza umsebenzi wama-Idols njengowegazi uma beqhathanisa nabe-OPW abahambela imishado eyahlukene.ULuyanda Potwana ongumethuli weNyan Nyan kuSABC ukhalile naye ngezinye izinkampani eziholela imali engathi shu.Uthe kunezinkampani ezikhiqiza izinhlelo okufanele umethuli aze alwe ukuze athole iholo eliphilisayo, elincane lingaphansi kukaR10 000.“Le nto kufanele inqandwe,” usho kanje kuTwitter.Inkakha yomlingisi okwasabalala ukuthi yaxoshwa kwiGenerations, uDumisani Mbebe, naye ukhale kakhulu ngezinkinga ezihaqe amaciko nangokuholelwa imali engagculisi.Ngesikhathi ephawula kuTwitter, uMbebe ukhulume kabanzi nangokufakwa amasondo okudla lubi kule mboni kwabakhuluma ngamalungelo abo.Okhulumela uMzansi Magic, uNondumiso Mabece, uthe abakuthandi ukuphawula ngemiholo yabantu ngoba bona njengesiteshi abahlanganise lutho nayo.“Thina sithenga umkhiqizo enkampanini okuyiyona esuke inomsebenzi. Asisazi isivumelwano esisuke sikhona phakathi komethuli nabakhiqizi bohlelo,” kusho uNondumiso.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kwabakwaConnect TV okuyinkampani edidiyela lolu hlelo, ayiphumelelanga.
title: Umsindo ngemali eholwa kwi-OPW

text: FILIMU: Pitch Perfect 3 UMDIDIYELI: Trish Sie ABALINGISI ABAQAVILE:Anna Kendrick, RebelWilson, Hailee Steinfeld,Brittany Snow, SkylarAstin, Adam DeVine, KateySagal, Anna Camp, BenPlatt, Alexis Knapp, HanaMae Lee, John Hodgman,Jason Jones, Joe Lo Truglio,Reggie Watts with JohnMichael Higgins andElizabeth Banks. IMINYAKA: PG-13, IDONSA: 1h 33minIvula ema-cinemaaseMzansi ngoDisemba 22 UMHLAZIYI:MALIBONGWE MDLETSHE YONKE into inesiqalosayo. Lokhu ngikushongenxa yokuthi bengiqalangqa ngePitch Perfect3 ukuyobuka isiqephusesithathu sebhayisikobhosefilimu ngibe ngingakazengizibone ezokuqala.Omunye angabawukufunda isigabaesingenhla avele awachitheamanzi, athi ‘ayikho intoazositshela yona ngalefilimu lo muntu umaengayazi ukuthi isukaphi’. Cha ngiyaphika. Naziizizathu zami, womathathuamafilimu adidiyelwengabantu abahlukene,nokusho ukuthi isandlaasifani yize udaba lulokhuluqhubekele phambili. Eyokuqala iphumengo-2011 ididiyelwengumdidiyeli wesilisa,uJason Moore kantieyesibili ngowesifazane,u-Elizabeth Banks kanjaloneyesithathu. Ngakhongisho ungakaze uwabuke,ngeke uze ubonakale umaufika ebhayisikobho futhinawe ngeke uze unake. Nakuba kungeyona ifilimuekhuluma ngezothando,phecelezi i-chick-flick,futhi ingeyona i-blockbusterengabukwa amajitaewumgengana kodwa ikahleuma ufuna ukuzikhiphelaisinqandamathe sakho.Osisi bangakwaziukukhiphana bodwabeyoyibuka kwaziseikhuluma ngezintokazieziyisikhombisa eziculandawonye eqenjinieladuma lisafundaekolishi, amaBellas. Ngemuva kokunqobaamaWorld Championships,amaBellas, ahlukanangezindlela ngethembalokuthi azoqhubeka aculengawodwana. Kodwa kulefilimu kuyacaca ukuthiakuhambanga ngokwezifisozawo. Bayahlanganakulokhu kodwa kubacaceleukuthi isikhathi sokubayiThe Soli sesiphelile.Ngicabanga ukuthiulethelwe lokho noDJKhaled kule filimu(akakwazi kodwaukulingisa, sengiyashonje). Ngenxa yokuthisebebadala sekuyisikhathisokuthi benze nezinqumoezimqoka ngempilo yabo.Ibisengabuya eyesithathukodwa uma sekuthiwa ‘Lastcall pitches’ kungenzekaungabe usaphinde uyiboneuma uyiyeke la.
title: Izochaza abesilisa nabesifazane emabhyisikobho iPitch Perfect 3

text: USATHUTHUMELA owesifazane waseMatatiele ngesihluku okuthiwa senziwe yindodana yakhe nomngani wayo sokushumpula umuntu ikhanda.UNkk Nomatsekiseni Swaartbooi ngunina kaMnuz Lehlonono Swartbooi (32) ongumsolwa wesibili ecaleni elihlobene nokubulawa kukaMnuz Thembinkosi Nzimakwe (32), washumpulwa ikhanda, eMayville.Umsolwa wokuqala kuleli cala nguMnuz Philani Jojisa obuye azibize ngoMemela (24) owaboshwa efake ikhanda kubhakha enkabeni yeTheku.UNkk Swartbooi obesenkantolo yemantshi eThekwini izolo, uthe uyaqala ukungena enkantolo. Ufike eThekwini ngemuva kokuzwa ngesigameko.“Namanje angikakholwa ukuthi ubengenza into enjena. Sesike sakhuluma naye siwumndeni ngalokhu, uyaphika kodwa ngeke ngimkhulumele ngoba angihlali naye,” kusho yena.Uthe indodana yakhe ineminyaka ewu-15 yafika eThekwini kodwa ubengakaze ezwe ihlanganiswa necala lokubulala.Uqhube wathi ubungani bakhe noJojisa ngokubona kwakhe abubuhle ngoba bobabili babhekene nelinye icala lokweba efemini abebesebenza kuyo. Bangaphandle ngebheyili.Kuthiwa babephuza bonke ngosuku uNzimakwe agcinwa ukubonakala ngalo, bemgaxile kubonakala ukuthi uphuze kakhulu.Ngakusasa uJojisa wabanjwa amaphoyisa ephethe ikhanda likaNzimakwe ngobhakha enkabeni yeTheku ngemuva kokuzama ukulidayisela inyanga. Kuthiwa wayefuna u-R20 000 ngalo, inyanga yabikela amaphoyisa, waboshwa. Isidumbu sikamufi esingenalo ikhanda satholakala ehlathini eBonela ngosuku aboshwa ngalo uJojisa.Bobabili baboshelwe icala lokwephula umthetho wokushushumbiswa kwabantu nokutholakala nezicubu zomuntu.UJojisa uvele yedwa enkantolo izolo, icala lahlehliselwa u-Agasti 21 ngoba uSwaartbooi akafikanga enkantolo kanti akucaci ukuthi kungani. UJojisa ungene ebhokisi ehamba ngezinyawo, eqhaqhazela kubukeka sengathi udidekile.
title: Usathuthumela unina womsolwa ecaleni lekhanda lomngani

text: KUSOLWA amaphoyisa aKwaCeza ngokushaywa kweziboshwa, okuthiwa bese kuphele izinsuku ezine zidube ukudla esitokisini sakhona.Lezi ziboshwa ezine kwezingu-11 okuthiwa ziboshelwe ukuqhinqa emayini yamalahle oKhukho, zifuna ukuqashwa ngenkani ngenyanga edlule, sekuphele inyanga zitoke esiteshini samaphoyisa KwaCeza.NgoMsombuluko kuthiwa ziqale umkhankaso wokuduba ukudla zithi aziboni ukuthi kuphephile ngoba amaphoyisa azibopha asondelene nonogada bemayini abalokhu befika esiteshini ezikuso.Lezi ziboshwa kuthiwa bezisola ukuthi njengoba onogada bejwayele ukufika esiteshini ezitoke kuso kungenzeka babafakele ubuthi ekudleni kwazo.UMnuz Shakes Nene, uyise kaMnuz Nhlanhla Nene (28) ongomunye weziboshwa ezitokile, uthe amaphoyisa anqabile ukuvula icala lokushaywa kwendodana yakhe nabanye abathathu, ngoLwesihlanu, athi akabuye nayo, ekubeni ngaleso sikhathi ibisesibhedlela.ESINYE seziboshwa okuthiwa besitoke esiteshini samaphoyisa KwaCeza okuthiwa sishaywe ngamaphoyisa ngoba singenele isiteleka sokuduba ukudla Isithombe: SithunyelweUNene uthe indodana yakhe iwile enkantolo kwaphoqelaka ukuthi icala labo liguqe okwesikhashana isaphuthunyiswe esikhungweni sezempilo. Ngemuva kwamahora ambalwa libuye laqhubeka abasolwa bakhululwa ngebheyili kaR1000 umuntu emunye.Uthe nakuba bese kuphele izinsuku ezintathu indodana yakhe ingadli kodwa akakholwa ukuthi iwiswe yilokho, ukholwa ukuthi yingoba ibishaywe ngamaphoyisa ngoba ibinezibazi zokushaywa emzimbeni.Uthe indodana yakhe neboshwe nabo sekuphele inyanga baboshwa kodwa basalokhu bethelwa ngesibhaxu ngamaphoyisa esitikosini. Uthe akazi ukuthi bashayelwani kodwa ngoLwesine kuthiwa babeshayelwa ukuthi abadle.“Izingane zethu zangena emayini ngokungemthetho zisebenzisa indlela yezinyawo. Ngiyazi ukuthi lokho kwakungavumelekile, yingakho ziboshiwe kodwa angiboni ukuthi ngoba bonile sekumele bahlale beshaywa ngamaphoyisa. Uma bedube ukudla amaphoyisa kungani ebashaya? Uma sengithi ngiyovula icala amaphoyisa ayenqaba. Alokhu ebeka izaba eziningi. NgoLwesihlanu bathi asilinde abashayiwe babuye esibhedlela. Ngaleso sikhathi sasingazi nokuthi bazokhululwa yini ngebheyili. Umfana wami wabuya ngalo uLwesihlanu esibhedlela, wadedelwa ngebheyili kodwa namanje icala alivulilwe silokhu siya esiteshini amaphoyisa ashone ngapha nangapha size sidikibale, sihambe,” kusho uNene.Abasolwa babuye bavela enkantolo yemantshi izolo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCol Thembeka Mbele, uthe abakabi nayo imininingwane ngalolu daba basazophenya ukuthi kwenzekeni.
title: Kusolwa isibhaxu emaphoyiseni bengadli

text: UNQUNYELWE ugwayi katiki udadewabo wenkosi yakwaMaphumulo KwaFelekisi okuthiwa usaqhubeka nokubeka abantu endaweni ekubeni engaselona ibamba lobukhosi.UNksz Thembisile Virginia Maphumulo okuthiwa ubeyibamba lobukhosi esizweni saKwaMaphumulo wafaka amaphepha enkantolo ngo-2013 ephikisa ukuqokwa kukamfowabo wakwenye indlu, uMnuz Nkosinathi Maphumulo, okunguye owabekwa ukuthi abe yinkosi yalesi sizwe ngo-2012.UMnuz Sandile Ngcobo woMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zobuHoli boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, obezochazela umphakathi wakulesi sizwe emhlanganweni womphakathi obusehholo KwaFelekisi izolo, uthe umnyango wazi ukuthi inkosi nguMaphumulo.Uthe ngemuva kokuhlangana komndeni owaqoka uMaphumulo, igama lakhe labhalwa emqingweni wezindaba zikahulumeni ngo-2011. Ngonyaka olandelayo umnyango wamnikeza incwadi yokumqoka ngokusemthethweni.“Siyazi ukuthi njengamanje kunodaba olusenkantolo oluthinta bona ubukhosi. Uma kunesimo esinjalo kusuke kusho ukuthi isimo sihlala sinjengoba sinjalo kuze kube wukuthi inkantolo ithatha esinye isinqumo. Uma sekunoshintsho siyobuya sizonazisa. Umthetho olawula abaholi bomdabu uthi abazenza abaholi bomdabu kumele babhekane nomthetho. Nalapha uma kusekhona abantu abazenza izinduna noma abazibiza ngamakhosi bengeyena uMaphumulo bazothathelwa izinyathelo zomthetho,” kusho uNgcobo.UMaphumulo uthe udadewabo akakaze abe yinkosi kodwa wayebambele umfowabo uMnuz Baba Edward Maphumulo owashona. UNksz Maphumulo nomfowabo uthe bazalwa yinkosi uPhikaziwa ongumfowabo wakwenye indlu owashona ngo-1949. Ngesikhathi eshona uthe wayengenayo ingane yomfana. UNksz Maphumulo nomfowabo uthe bazalwa eseshonile.Ngemuva kwakhe uthe ayizange ibekwe inkosi bekuhlale kunamabamba. Ngo-2010 uthe umndeni wahlangana wavumelana ngokuthi ubukhosi abubuyele endlini kaWoji uMaphumulo azalwa kuyo.“Nami angimdala kwethu kodwa umfowethu wathi akathandi ukuba yinkosi futhi nomndeni wawuvele uqoke mina. Udadewethu akazange abe yingxenye yalezi zingxoxo ngoba akazalwa ebukhosini, uNdlunkulu wamthola ‘eyotheza’. Anginankinga ngokuthi ayozizamela enkantolo kodwa okwamanje akayona inkosi futhi akalona ibamba, incwadi echaza lokhu wayitholango-2011,” kusho inkosi uMaphumulo.UMaphumulo uthe kunabantu abavimba ukufakwa kwepayipi lamanzi elifakwa uMngeni Water ngoba bethi inkosi yabo ayazisiwe.“Mina njengenkosi yesizwe ngasayina ukuthi leli payipi alifakwe ngoba elafakwa eminyakeni engu-40 eyedlule selinezinkinga. Uma laba bantu bevimba ukufakwa kwepayipi kuzoholela ekutheni amanzi angangeni edamini abantu bangawatholi amanzi,” kusho inkosi.UMnuz Mandla Msomi osekomitini lokuthuthukiswa komphakathi uthe izinkinga zobukhosi bakwaMaphumulo ziphazamisa ukulethwa kwentuthuko kule ndawo.Eziphendulela uNksz Maphumulo uthe akukho okuningi angakuphawula ngokuthi uzibiza ngenkosi noma qha ngoba abomnyango bangabangani bakamfowabo.“Engingakusho wukuthi inkosi iyazalwa, umfowethu kumele anitshele ukuthi uzalwa iyiphi inkosi,” kusho uNksz Maphumulo.
title: Umhlangano ngenkinga yobukhosi besizwe sakwaMaphumulo

text: Ukubeke ngokusobala ukuthi nakuba mhlawumbe bekhona abangahambisani nesenzo sakhe sokuthi athi engumuntu wesifazane kodwa athathe isinqumo sokuzenza indoda ngokuyolobola umfana.Njengoba ethi uziqalela awakhe amasiko angahambisani nawesintu nokwenkolo, ukuthi kuba yindoda elobolayo hhayi owesifazane.Ngifisa ukucaphuna encwadini ka-Isaya 24:4 lapho ithi khona umhlaba uyakhala uyabuna izwe lidangele nabaziqhenyayo bomhlaba badangele, izwe lingcolile lingcoliswe ngabahamba kulona ngoba basiphendulile isimo esime njalo.Ngiphinde ngicaphune eka-1 Petru 5:8 Qondani nilinde ngoba uSathane oyisitha kini uyahamba hamba njengengonyama ebhodlayo, efuna engabadla. Mphikeni nime niqine ngokukholwa. Ngicaphune neka-2 Timothy 3:1 Kepha yazi lokhu ukuthi ngezinsuku zokugcina kuyakufika isikhathi sokuhlupheka ngokuba abantu bayawukuba ngabazithandayo, abafisa imali nabangalaleli abazali babo.Ngifisa ukusho ukuthi uZodwa uyihlazo esizweni sonke sabantu baseNingizimu Afrika.Uyihlazo emndenini wakhe, uyihlazo ngisho enganeni yakhe ayizele. Ngisho nakubazali bakhe lapho bekhona noma basaphila noma sebalala kobandayo, bayadumala ngezenzo zakhe zobusathane.Uqale wenza amanyala okuhamba esantuza edunusela izwe, izingane nabantu abadala njengoba umzimba uyithempeli likaNkulunkulu elidinga ukuphathwa kahle, ungahambi uzeneka nje ungumuntu wesifazane.Ngiyafisa ngisho umndeni wakwaLinda sengathi ubungewamukele la malobolo kaZodwa njengoba nawo uzozithela ngesiqalekiso ngokwemukela imali yomuntu oyihlazo ezweni.Bangathatheki ngenxa yemali etholakale kabi kangaka, njengoba esho ukuthi uyithola kanjani. Incwadi ka-1 Timothy 6:10 ithi: “Ngokuba ukuthanda imali kuyimpande yakho konke okubi. Abanye ngokuyifisa bahlubukile ekukholweni bazigwaza ngezinsizi eziningi.”Ngikhuluma nje usanda kuveza ukuthi uzithengele ibhokisi ayofihlwa ngalo mhlazane eseshonile. Nako lokho kuyichilo namanyala.Ngiyafisa ukuthi amakholwa asukume ame ngezinyawo zombili, ayikhahlele le nto kaZodwa ngoba izokwandisa ububi namanyala esizweni sabantu.Ngiyamdabukela lo mfana wakwa Linda, athi ebukeka eyinsizwa enhle kangaka azithele ngehlazo lokuyothandana nesalukazi esesishiywe yisikhathi sokugana ontanga baso ebese sibamba abantwana abancane kangaka.Naye uyazisho uZodwa ukuthi useyisalukazi manjeke angimazi uyifunani ingane.Angazi ukuthi yena uZodwa angakujabulela yini uma kungaqhamuka esinye isalukazi esinemali njengaye sizolobola ingane yakhe siqhoshe ngokuthi sinemali. Ngidumele impela ngechilo elenzeka ezweni lakithi.Thulani GamaHILLBROW
title: [IMIBONO] Ngidumele ngehlazo likaZodwa Wabantu

text: Zakhele Xaba UMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs, u-Ernst Middendorp, udalule isizathu sokudedelwa kukaGeorge Maluleka okhululwe yiqembu emuva kokusayina inkontileka yesibambiso nezimbangi iMamelodi Sundowns.Inkontileka kaMaluleka neChiefs kade iphela ngoJuni kodwa Amakhosi, ngokomyalelo weFifa, abenalo ilungelo lokuxoxisana naye ukuthi adlale kuze kuphele imidlalo yesizini ka-2019/2020. Kushaqeke iningi ngesikhathi iChiefs imemezela ukuthi sekuhlukane inhloko nesixhanti phakathi kwayo nalo mdlali obebalulekile esikimini sikaMiddendorp abheke ukuwina ngaso iligi.NgoJanuwari lo mdlali wasayina inkontileka yesibambiso neSundowns. Ngemuva kokukhululwa iChiefs, ube esesayina egcwele kumaBrazilians, amnikeze iminyaka emithathu. Uzoze aqale ukubonakala kuwona ngesizini ezayo.“Sayixoxa le ndaba ngaphakathi eqenjini, nomdlali uqobo lwakhe wayekhona nabaphathi, safinyelela esiphethweni. Yisimo esibucayi. Ukuba iqembu lakhe elisha bekuyiSuperSport United okungenani noma elinye iqembu esingabangi nalo isicoco seligi njengoba kuyophela isizini, ngabe kwenzeka okuhlukile. Kodwa ukwazi ukuthi iqembu lakhe elisha yiMamelodi Sundowns, kwavele kwacaca ukuthi kufanele sithathe isinqumo. Ngakolunye uhlangothi kubuhlungu ngoba ubengenye yezinsika kusukela kuqala isizini, sakha isisekelo,” kusho uMiddendorp.Ukuthi isikhala sikaMaluleka sikhona yini enkabeni yenkundla kwiChiefs, kuzocaca namuhla uma isibhekene neBidvest Wits emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto, ngo-6 ntambama.IWits, esidayisiwe, isanda kukhishwa yiSundowns ngo 3-2 kowandulela owamanqamu weNedbank Cup. IChiefs idinga amaphuzu ukuze iqhubeke nokuhlala esicongweni ngegebe elingcono.“Ngibabonile bedlala neSundowns. Ngiyavumelana nomqeqeshi uGavin Hunt ngokuthi bekungabafanele ukuhlulwa. Ngicabanga ukuthi akufanele sithathe ngokuthi iqembu selidayisiwe ngakho abadlali abasenakho ukuzinikela. Abadlali bafuna ukuqeda ngegiya eliphezulu, bafuna ukuzibonakalisa ukuze bathole izinkontileka kwamanye amaqembu. Kufanele siqaphele futhi sizobambe ziqine ukuze sizowina,” kusho uMiddendorp.
title: UMiddendorp nezizathu zokukhulula uGeorge Maluleka

text: ZIKLONYELISIWE izikole zaseMlaza ezenze kahle ngonyaka ophelile.Isikole iMenzi High neVelabahleke High zithole izindondo zokwenza kahle emva kokuthola u-100% ku-matric ngonyaka odlule.Izikole ziklonyeliswe yiCareers Exhibition and Information Association (CEIA), okuyinhlangano ehlanganise izikhungo zeMfundo ePhakeme namabhizinisi.Le nhlangano, esebenzisana noMnyango wezeMfundo, ilekelela abafundi uma bekhetha imisebenzi abathanda ukuyenza, iphinde igqugquzele nokwenza kahle ezikoleni jikelele.Uthishanhloko waseVelabahleke, uMnuz Bheki Mhlongo, uthe ukuthokozele kakhulu ukuklonyeliswa kwesikole esingaphansi kwakhe ngokuthi senze kahle.“Sikujabulela kakhulu ukuthi kukhona abazisa ukwenza kwethu kahle. Lokhu kuyasigqugquzela ukuthi sizimisele kakhulu ukuze sihlale sisezingeni eliphezulu,” kusho uMhlongo.Uthe yize bezikhona izinkinga abebehlangabezana nazo njengothisha kodwa bakutholile lokhu abebekuphokophelele.“Sibhekane nezinselelo eziningi njengesikole okubalwa nabanye abazali abebenza kube nzima ukusebenzisana nabo kodwa sisebenze ngokuzikhandla sathola imiphumela emihle,” kusho uMhlongo.Uthishanhloko waseMenzi High, uNksz Muntu Ntombela, uthe bayasihlonipha isikhathi nokuyikho okwenze baphumelela kahle ngonyaka odlule.“Sihlale sikuqinisekisa ukuthi sinesikhathi esiningi sokubuyekeza esikufundile siphinde sisize abafundi ababamba kancane ukuze kuphumelele bonke abafundi,” kusho uNksz Ntombela.I-CEIA ibihlanganyele nenhlangano Ikamva Youth elekelela abafundi ngezifundo neNtokozo FM ukuzoklomelisa izikole.UMnuz Wonderboy Zungu, weMANCOSA engaphansi kweCEIA, uthe bafuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bonke abafundi bayazuza ngezinhlelo zabo.“Sifuna ukuhlinzeka bonke abafundi ngolwazi olufanele futhi olwanele mayelana nokungena ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme. Sigqugquzela nokwenza kahle kwabafundi ezikoleni,” kusho uZungu.I-CEIA ithe izoqhubeka nokuklomelisa izikole ezenze kahle ngenhloso yokuzigqugquzela. Ithe izoqoqa nolwazi ezikoleni ezenza kahle ukuze ilekelele izikole ezingenzi kahle.
title: Intokozo kuklonyeliswa izikole ezizikhandlayo

text: LISHONE elayizolo 'omakoti' okungamaqembu epolitiki amancane, amanye abeqala ukungenela ukhetho, esafunga egomela ukuthi ukhetho lwakulo nyaka belungakhululekile. Basabise nangokuthi ngeke bawusayine usomqulu ohlonza lolu khetho njengolube olukhululekile.Bakhala ngenhlangano eyengamele ukhetho kuleli i-IEC, abathe iyona ebahlinzele ezibilini. Kodwa abahlaziyi bezepolitiki bathi lamaqembu ayazihhumela nje ngoba azihlulekele. Noma kungathiwa akuqalwe phansi kuvotwe, ngeke alibone elidlalwayo.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uMnuz Thabani Khumalo, uthe la maqembu asuke aba maningi kakhulu kulokhu, nokwenze amavoti amancane kwadingeke ahlukaniselane wona.Omunye umhlaziyi uSolwazi Mcebisi Ndletyana uthe la maqembu azitshele ukuthi izinkinga ezibikwa eqenjini elibusayo zizokwenza ukuthi abantu bawavotele, okuyinto engenzekanga.“Ngangishilo nasekuqaleni ukuthi le nqwaba yamaqembu eqhibukile, izodumala uma sekukhishwa imiphumela. Akwehlanga kahle lokhu kuwona kodwa ke nakho-ke sekuyenzeka,” kusho uNdletyana.Nokho kuwona la maqembu amancane, akhona enze kanconywana nazosithola isihlalo noma ezimbili ePhalamende likazwelonke njengoba kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela esewatholile amavoti angabanika isihlalo okungenani esisodwa.Iqembu likaPatricia de Lille, iGood, lishone elayizolo seliwutholile u-62 000.Elinye iqembu elisha ceke eliholwa uMnuz Vuyolwethu Zungula, i-African Transformation Movement (ATM) ebisendaweni yesishiyagalombili ngamavoti awu-61 000.La maqembu aqumba phansi asenegama namava kule ndima okuyi-Azanian People’s Organisation (Azapo) nePan Africanist Congress of Azania azikhotha amanxeba sikhuluma.Nakwezinye izifundazwe la maqembu asenazo izihlalo njengaseWestern Cape iGood ilele isine ngamavoti angaphezu kuka-59 900, i-ACDP isendaweni yesihlanu ngamavoti angaphezu kuka-52 900 neVF esenamavoti angaphezu kuka-98 000.EGauteng iVF Plus ilele isine ngamavoti angaphezu kuka-100 000 kanti naseNorth West inangaphezu kuka-41 000.I-UDM yona ilele isine ngamavoti angaphezu kuka-48 800 e-Eastern Cape kanti i-ATM isendaweni yesihlanu ngamavoti angaphezu kuka-28 000.Emaqenjini abebhekwe ngabomvu kodwa angalibonanga elidlalayo, yiSocialist Revolutionary Workers’ Party kaMnuz Irvin Jim, i-African Content Movement kaMnuz Hlaudi Motsoeneng, Agang SA, Minority Front neBlack First, Land First (BLF) kaMnuz Andile Mngxitama.Kuwo kubalwa iNational People’s Ambassadors (NPA) ebiyibambe emsileni ngamavoti angaphezu kuka-1 400, iSouth African Maintenance and Estate Beneficiaries Association ebinangaphezu kuka-1 700, iPeople’s Revolutionary Movement (PRM) ebinangaphezu kuka-2000, iPower of Africans Unit ebinangaphezu kuka-2 060, iFree Democrats ebinabalelwa kuka-2093 neNational People’sFront ebinabalelwa kwawu-2 682.
title: #Ukhetho2019: Okushiwo abahlaziyi 'ngomakoti' kwipolitiki

text: SIGCINA sishonile esibhedlela isitshudeni (19) okuthiwa siziphonse ebhulohweni emgwaqweni u-N3.Umndeni ka-Andile Meyiwa, waKwaGcwensa, eMbo, eHillcrest, uthe kawazi ukuthi yini eholele ekufeni kukamufi.Kuthiwa ngoLwesihlanu isitshudeni sahamba ekhaya nabangani beyofuna isikhala esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme.U-Andile ubevele efunda unyaka wokuqala enza izifundo ze-Social Science eNyunivesi yaKwaZulu-Natal (UKZN).Ubephelezela abangani bakhe, ababeyofuna isikhala.U-Andile utholwe esaphila ebhulohweni ngoLwesihlanu, waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela kodwa wafike washonela khona.Unina omncane, uNksz Nonkululeko Meyiwa, uthe abazi kwenzekani.“Kuthiwa uziphonse ebhulohweni, akanalutho, akalimele akaphukile. Asizikholwa izinto okuthiwa zenzekile. Sifuna iqiniso. Okusidida kakhulu wukuthi ziningi izinto ebezikhulunywa kodwa thina siwumndeni asazi ukuthi kwenzekani ngempela,” kusho uNksz Meyiwa.Uthe okubuhlungu kakhulu wukuthi sekugcwele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana izinto eziningi ngokuthi ushone kanjani. Okunye okuvelile wukuthi uphoswe yisoka lakhe, nokuthi ubephuze kakhulu utshwala wabe esewa.“Besingakawazisi nomndeni ngokushona kwakhe kodwa sekugcwele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi kwenzekeni. Kusiphoxile kakhulu lokho siwumndeni,” kusho uNksz Meyiwa.Uthe bashonelwe kodwa sebephinde bahlukunyezwa yindlela udaba oselusabalale ngayo.“Amantombazane amabili abehamba no-Andile amcela ukuba ayobabhekisa isikhala sokufunda. Kuthe esevelelwe yinkinga angasithinta thina siwumndeni. Nokwenza sisale singazi ukuthi kwenzekani,” kusho uNksz Meyiwa.Uthe bebengazi ukuthi umufi ubesenesoka kodwa emuva kwesehlo libe selifika.Libatshele ukuthi umufi walifonela ukuba limlande e-toll gate.Umufi kuthiwa uphonseke ngabo-8 ebusuku.Ngokuthola komndeni babesuka eThekwini sebebuyela ekhaya.Akwaziwa ukuthi kungani baze bafika ngakuleli bhuloho kodwa izinsolo zithi babekade becele ukugitsheliswa umuntu owabashiya ku-N3.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe amaphoyisa avule idokodo ngokushona komuntu, ayaphenya.Umndeni unxuse ukuba amaphoyisa aphenyisise ukuze ulazi iqiniso.
title: Imibuzo isitshudeni ‘siziphonsa’ ebhulohweni

text: ‘ABANTU abakukhonzile ubabona ngezikhathi ezinzima’.Lawa ngamazwi ashiwo ngumqeqeshi weBidvest Wits, uGavin Hunt, othi uzibophezele ekusizeni uThandani “Bibo” Ntshumayelo athole iqembu, abuyele ebholeni.UNtshumayelo ubemisiwe ebholeni kulandela ukutholakala enesidakamizwa i-cocain egazini. Nokho ngeledlule, konke lokho kuphenduke umlando lapho iSouth African Institute for Drug Free Sport (Saids) imkhulula ukuthi usengabuyela ebholeni, yamlengisela iminyaka emibili, kwemine ayemiswe yona.Ngemuva komdlalo weWits neMaritzburg United eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu, ophele ngo 0-0, uHunt utshele izintatheli ukuthi kule minyaka emibili uNtshumayelo ethwele kanzima, bebexhumana njalo, emeseka ebunzimeni abebhekene nabo ngemuva kokunqanyulwa kwenkontileka yakhe yi-Orlanod Pirates ngo-2016.“Bengimthinta ngocingo kule minyaka emibili, sixoxa naye ngimduduza. Kusezikhathini ezinzima lapho ubona khona abantu abakuthandayo nabakufisela into enhle. Kube yiphutha leli alenzile, uyakwazi naye lokho futhi usejezile. Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi konke lokho akudlulise manje, aqhubeke nempilo,” usho kanje uHunt.Lo mqeqeshi uphinde wakuqinisekisa ukuthi uNtshumayelo uzoziqeqesha nezakhe.“Yebo kunjalo, uzoziqeqesha nathi ngoMsombuluko. Ngimazi kudala esemncane kwiSuperSport United. Ngiyazi ukuthi unesiphiwo esiyisimanga, futhi usemncane, uneminyaka nje ewu-28, ngakho bengingeke ngimbukele esenkingeni. Sizoziqeqesha naye, sizame ukubuyisela umzimba wakhe esimeni esihle. Lokho akusho ukuthi uzosayina nathi, kungenzeka athathwe abanye, akunankinga. Inhloso enkulu ukuthi ngifuna ukumsiza abuyele emsebenzini wakhe, aqhubeke nempilo,” kusho uHunt obumbona nasebusweni ukuthi indaba kaNtshumayelo imphethe kabi.UNtshumayelo ukuvezile ukuthi isimo besinzima kakhulu empilweni yakhe kangangoba uke wacabanga nokuzibulala. Uveze nokuthi wadlelwa izimoto zakhe, ngenxa yokuthi wawungasekho umholo owawusungena uma kuphela inyanga.Lo mdlali uthe intokazi ahlekasana nayo, umndeni wakhe nabanye abadlali bebhola, yibona abamenze wama isibindi esimeni abebhekene naso.
title: UHunt uzimisele ukubuyisa uNtshumayelo ebholeni

text: KUPHINDE kwaboshwa abanye abasolwa abathinteka esigamekweni sokuphanga kuhlonyiwe ePhoenix ngesonto eledlule, ababoshwe izolo KwaMaphumulo.Ithimba lamaphoyisa eliphenya ngalesisigameko okusolwa kuso abayisithupha, lidlulele KwaMaphumulo kwaboshwa ababili. Ngempelasonto kuboshwe umlisa oyedwa oneminyaka engu-31 otholakale nezimpahla zokwebiwa nesibhamu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe abasolwa ababoshwe kamumva baneminyaka ephakathi kuka-23 no-37.“Ithimba lamaphoyisa ebeliphenya liye KwaMaphumulo kwaboshwa abanye abasolwa abathathu.“Kutholakale izimpahla okusolwa ukuthi ziyabalwa kwezithathwe ePhoenix. Kusalindeleke ukuthi kuboshwe abanye abasolwa njengoba kusekhona abathungathwayo, nophenyo luyaqhubeka,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Abasolwa kuthiwa bahlasela emzini oseForest Haven ePhoenix, bazenza amaphoyisa.Kuthiwa bakhomba ababekulo muzi ngesibhamu bathatha ithelevishini, amaselula amahlanu nemali.Umsolwa oboshwe kuqala utholakale ecashile eBerghaven khona ePhoenix.Abasolwa ababoshiwe bazovela maduze eNkantolo yeMantshi eNtuzuma. Babhekene necala lokuphanga kuhlonyiwe.
title: Sekuboshwe abanye ngolwasePhoenix

text: KUGQUGQUZELWA abanikazi bezipaza ukuthi bafake izicelo zoxhaso kuhulumeni uma bezophazanyiswa wukubheduka kweCoronavirus.Izolo uNgqongqoshe wamaBhizinisi Amancane, uNksz Khumbudzo Ntshavheni, uthe babeke eceleni imali yokusiza osomabhizinisi abancane.Le mali izophuma eMnyangweni wamaBhizinisi Amancane, kwiSmall Business Development, Small Enterprise Finance Agency (Sefa) nakwiSmall Enterprise Development Agency (Seda).UNks Ntshavheni uthe ubhekelela wonke amabhizinisi amancane kusukela kulawo adumile kuya kwizipaza.Abafuna uxhaso uthe bayacelwa ukuthi bavakashele u-www.dsbd.gov.za, uwww.seda.org.za. www.seda.org.za nosmmesa.gov.zaUthe ifomu lokufaka isicelo litholakala kwi-website yomnyango wakhe nakulawa abalwe ngenhla.“Kuzothatha izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ukuthi siphendule osomabhizinisi ukuthi sisitholile isicelo sabo. Bese kuthatha ezinhlanu ukusho ukuthi siphumelele yini nokuthi sibanike uxhaso. ISefa ibeke uR359 million ukusiza osomabhizinisi abayikweletayo. Bonke osomabhizinisi sizobabhekelela ngisho nabezipaza,” kusho uNksz Ntshavheni.Uthe izinhlelo zokusiza abadayisi basemgwaqweni nalabo abazisebenzayo zizomenyezelwa kusasa (Ephreli 2).Abanikazi bezipaza abazothola usizo eMnyangweni wamaBhizinisi Amancane nakulezi zinhlangano ezibalwe ngenhla kufanele zibhaliswe ngokusethemthweni, zibe nemvume yokusebenza, zibhaliswe kwaSARS, kube yizipaza ezisetshenzwa ngabanikazi bazo futhi zibe nobufakazi bokulondoloza imali ebhange.“Abanikazi bezipaza kufanele bazibophezele ukuthi bazoba sohlelweni lwethu izinyanga eziwu-12, sizobasiza ukuthenga impahla ngokuhlanganyela. Impahla abayidayisayo kufanele kube yimpahla eyenziwa kuleli ngoba sifuna ukufukula umnotho. Kuzodingeka ukuthi bathumele uhlelo lwabo lokusebenza lwanyangazonke kuthina,” kusho uNksz Ntshavheni.Izipaza uthe kufanele zilandele umthetho wokuhlanzeka kubulawe amagciwane izindawo zokudayisa, abadayisayo bageze izandla uma bezodayisela umthengi.Uthe akufanele kube wukuthi umuntu ulala espaza nokuthi kungadayiswa ukudla okubolile, uhlelo lokuqhelelana kwabathengi kufanele lulandelwe.Khonamanjalo, izitolo zokudlela zakwaSpur eziveze ukuthi zivale izindawo zokudlela ezingaphezu kuka-600 kulandela umthetho wokuvalwa kwezwe kamengameli zithe zizolekelela osomabhizinisi kulesi sikhathi.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba isikhulu esiphezulu sakwaSpur, uMnuz Mark Farrelly, sithe ngeke bakhokhise ama-franchisee izindleko zokukhangisa nezikweletu zawo zangoMashi nezika-Ephreli.Uthe bacele abanikazi bezitolo ezingaphansi kwabo ukuthi bafake izicelo zosizo lwezimali emnyangweni kahulumeni ebhekelele izindawo zokudlela.Baphinde babatshela ukuthi baxoxe nomastende babo ngezingqinamba ababhekene nazo zokukhokha irenti.Ucele abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi balalele uhulumeni bahlale behlanzekile.ISpur inezitolo okubalwa kuzo iSpur Steak Ranches, Spur Grill & Go, Panarottis Pizza Pasta, John Dory’s Fish Grill Sushi, RocoMamas, The Hussar Grill, Casa Bella ne-Nikos CoalGrill Greek.
title: ‘Kuzobhekelelwa nabezipaza ngoxhaso’

text: IQEMBU lehip hop, iSkwatta Kamp, lithi liduduzwa ukuthi ilungu lalo uMusawenkosi "Nish" Molefe, elishone ngoLwesihlanu emuva kokugula, lihambe seliqedile ukwenza i-albhamu.Ngokwesitatimende uNish (42), ushone emini ngoLwesihlanu emuva kokungeniswa esibhedlela isikhathi eside exinwe yiCovid-19. Ilungu leqembu uShugasmakx, litshele Isolezwe izolo emini ukuthi kube buhlungu ukushona kukaNish."Uhambe siqeda nje ukwenza i-albhamu yethu entsha. Muningi umsebenzi abantu abazowuzwa ngoba ukhona kuzona zonke izingoma futhi kukhona nevideo yengoma esisanda kuyiqopha. Umsebenzi uwushiyile, okwethu nje ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyafika ezandleni zabantu," kusho uShugasmakx.Uthe i-albhamu nakanjani izophuma kulo nyaka "futhi naye uNish ubelokhu esho ekhasini lakhe le-Instagram, sesilinde nje ukuthi siyidedele". Uchaze uNish njengomuntu obethanda amancoko kodwa ekwazi ukuphuma ekudlaleni uma sekumele kwenziwe umsebenzi. Uthe ubengakhulumi kakhulu isikhathi esiningi."Yena noFlabba (ongasekho) yibona abebebadala eqenjini, izinto eziningi nendlela siyifunde kubo ngoba bebephambili ngomsebenzi. Basikhombisile ukuthi izinto zingenzeka. Sifunde kubo sathuthukisa amakhono ethu ngoba sifuna ukufana nabo, ngenhlanhla futhi sasebenza eduze nabo," kusho uShugasmakxUthe abantu abaningi bebembona sengathi umuntu othule kodwa ubehlanganisa iqembu ngomoya wakhe."Iqembu lonke belincike kuye nokuthi iqembu kumele lisebenze kanjani. Ubedlala indima enkulu kakhulu."Imininingwane yokungcwatshwa kwakhe ibingaqinisekiswa.ISkwatta Kamp, yiqembu elazakhela udumo eminyakeni edlule ngezingoma okubalwa kuzo ethi Umoya nezinye. Selake lanqoba imiklomelo ehlukene okubalwa kuyo nemibili yeBest Rap kumaSouth African Music Awards.
title: Ushone eseyiqedile i-albhamu oweSkwatta Kamp

text: UKUPHINDELA esikoleni eseneminyaka engu-27, eyoqala kwaGrade 10, akumthenanga amandla, okunalokho amehlo akhe abethe njo ekuphothuleni u-matric onemiphumela ezokwenza impilo yakhe iqhubekele phambili.UBalungile Shozi  ongowokuzalwa eHlokozi kodwa usehlala eWyebank eThekwini, uqede u-matric eneminyaka ewu-30 ewuphasa ngamalengiso. Uphume no-distinctions abawu-6. Le ntokazi ibifunda eBizimali High eNkandla. Ithole u-A kwi-English, isiZulu, Business Studies, Hospitality, Travel & Tourism neLife Orientation.UBalungile wafunda u-matric okokuqala ngo-2008, waphasa ngoH okuyinto eyamjabulisa ngaleso sikhathi.Emuva kwalokho waya kofundela ukusebenza kuma-ambulensi, waqala wafuna umsebenzi wangawuthola.Emuva kweminyaka ehlezi ekhaya, wafikelwa wumuzwa wokuyoqala phansi esikoleni ukuze athole imiphumela ka-matric ezomgculisa.“Ngaqala ngatshela umama wadideka ngoba ngase ngifundele umsebenzi, esecabanga ukuthi ngizosebenza. Ngathi uma ngicela nakusisi, wavele wangizamela isikole.Nakhona kakuzange kube lula ngoba ngafika ngizofunda u-matric kodwa kwadingeka ngiqale kwaGrade-10 ngoba ngase ngihlale isikhathi eside ekhaya sekwashintsha nezifundo,” kusho uBalungile.Eqhuba, uthe othisha nabafundi bebehlala bebambisene kahle nabo ezifundweni, okwenze impilo yakhe yaba lula kulesi sikole. Yize ebemdala ngokweminyaka kodwa uthe akazange afune kube yinto ayifaka kakhulu ekhanda ngoba akekho obemenza azizwe engamukelekile.Ephetha, uthe iphupho lakhe elikhulu wukuyokwenza iHospitality Management kodwa akakayenzi imizamo ngoba akakabi nemali yokuyoyifundela. Uthe ufisa noma ngubani ongakwazi ukumsiza athole umfundaze ukufeza amaphupho akhe.
title: Usizwe wukubekezela ophase u-matric esemdala

text: I-EFF isabisa ngokuthathela izinyathelo zomthetho uSomlomo wePhalamende likazwelonke uNkk Baleka Mbete uma engavumi ukuthi kuvotwe ngokuyimfihlo evotini lango-Agasti njengoba amaqembu aphikisayo eseveze ukuthi awasabuthembi ubuholi bukaMengameli uJacob Zuma.UNkk Mbete kulindeleke ukuthi amemezele maduze ukuthi uzowavumela yini amalungu ePhalamende ukuthi avote ngokuyimfihlo ngo-Agasti 8.Umholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema uthe kuyabacacela ukuthi uMbete ngeke avume kuvotwe ngokuyimfihlo ngoba unovalo lokuthi amanye amalungu e-ANC azobadayisa.“Ngitshele abameli ukuthi baqale bebe belungisa amaphepha ngoba kuyacaca ngeke avume kuvotwe ngokuyimfihlo. Utshele amanye amalungu e-ANC ukuthi ngeke avume ngoba kukhona amalungu abanye babo angabethembi,” kusho uMalema.Uthe uqinisile ngoba uma ngempela bevota ngonembeza wabo ngeke bamvotele uZuma.UMalema uveze ukuthi kukhona amalungu ePhalamende e-ANC aveze ukuthi azoseka amaqembu aphikisayo uma leli voti eliyimfihlo liphumelela.“Ngikhulume namalungu e-ANC ePhalamende angu-60 angihlebele ukuthi azomchitha uZuma uma sekuvotwa, bathi bamfuna ehambile,” kusho uMalema.Esitatimendeni sikaMbete ucele amaqembu aphikisayo ayeke ukumshusha njengoba iNkantolo yoMthetho-Sisekelo ayizange imkalele isikhathi sokuthi asikhiphe nini isinqumo.
title: I-EFF isabisa ngokuthathela izinyathelo zomthetho uMbete

text:
CELANI SIKHAKHANEU SIHLALO wesikhwama saseNdlunkulu esibhekene nezinkinga zezimali uJaji Jerome Ngwenya uthi ukunganikezwa umkhombandlela ngokuthi bazoyenza kanjani imali kube yimbangela yezinkinga ezikhungethe lesi sikhwama.Lokhu uNgwenya 
(osesithombeni) ukuveze ngemuva kokuthi kube nezikhalo esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal ngokuthi selokhu sasungulwa lesi sikhwama kusuka ngo-2009 asikaze sifake ngisho isenti eNdlunkulu.UNgwenya obuye abe ngusihlalo obambile kuNgonyama Trust Board, uthe kuyiphutha ukuthi kube nesikhalo esingaka ngalesi sikhwama ngoba ziningi izinkinga ababhekene nazo.“Okokuqala nje asizange siqale ukusebenza ngo-2009 kodwa umsebenzi wethu uqale ngo-Febhuwari 2010 nakhona bekunezinkinga ngoba kuthathe isikhathi eside kusafunwa i-CEO, umgcinimafa, izimenenja ngenhloso yokuthi lesi sikhwama sikwazi ukuba nabantu abebezoba umgogodla wokusebenza kwaso. Ngaphandle kwalokho kube nenkinga yokuthi ngesikhathi sinikezwa lo msebenzi akukho lapho okube nesigaba somthetho esasisiyalela ukuthi i-Royal Household Trust izoyenza kanjani imali,” kusho uNgwenya.Lesi sikhwama ezinye zezinto ezibalulekile okubhekeke ukuthi sizenze wukubhekelela imfundo yabantwana beSilo, izidingo zoNdlunkulu baso nokuthi iNdlunkulu inganciki kakhulu esabelweni mali sikahulumeni kodwa izenzele yona imali ngalesi sikhwama.UNgwenya uthe isabelo mali abebesithola kuhulumeni wesifundazwe bebesisebenzisa ukuholela abasebenzi balesi sikhwama, bakhokhele amahhovisi aseThekwini abawasebenzisayo baphinde babhekane nezindleko zasendlunkulu ekubeni ingekho imali abakwazi ukuyenza bona.Eqhuba uthe kumanje bafuna kube nezinto ezizolungiswa ukuze kucace ukuthi lesi sikhwama sizimele.Lapha ubebala nokuthi bafuna imigubho efana noMkhosi woMhlanga neminye imicimbi yaKwaZulu evamise ukuheha abavakashi ifakwe kulesi sikhwama bese kuba nendlela abazoyenza ukukhanda imali noma kube nezimayini abazithengayo ukuze zifake imali.Uthe ngisho abaholi abaseSishayamthetho bayazi ngezinkinga zalesi sikhwama ngoba nangesikhathi sikaDkt Sbu Ndebele yavela indaba yaso kodwa kwaba nezinkinga kwagcina kungalunganga njengoba size sasungulwa sekukhona uDkt Zweli Mkhize.Eqhuba uthe emalini abayithola kuhulumeni amaphesenti angu-70 angena emholweni wabasebenzi balesi sikhwama okusho ukuthi kusenzima ukuthi sibe nemali.Uphinde waveza nokuthi kunoMnyango kahulumeni obakweleta u-R700 000 kanti kunenye imali engu-R5 million abayithenjiswa kodwa abakaze bayithole kwale noma sebehambise i-bussines plan okwathiwa abayilethe ukuze bathole le mali kodwa akukho ngisho isenti eselingenile.Ngaphandle kwalokhu i-CEO yalesi sikhwama uMnuz Nkululeko Luthuli, isamisiwe ngezinsolo zokungaphathi ngendlela imali ebalelwa ku-R3 million.
title: Liziphendulele ngezikhalo iJaji

text: UKUBONA usizi lwezingane ezinezifo ezibucayi ezihlala iminyaka ezibhedlela ngenxa yokuthi odokotela besabela ukuthi zizobuye zigule uma zibuyela emakhaya angekho esimeni, kuholele ekutheni basungule inhlangano ezosiza lezi zingane ngokuzakhela izindlu ezilungele izifo zazo.UNksz Kholiswa Nonkwelo (32) waseHambanathi, oThongathi nabangani bakhe uNksz Nosipho Mdlalose noNksz Vuyokazi Mbewa basungule inhlangano esiza izingane ebesezihlale iminyaka esibhedlela iNkosi Albert Luthuli naseGrace ngenxa yokuthi amakhaya azo awakulungene ukuthi zingalulamela kuwo.Le nhlangano, Isisekelo Foundation, isiza izingane zasezindaweni zasemakhaya KwaZulu-Natal nase-Eastern Cape.UNksz Nonkwelo uthe ubesebenzela enye inhlangano engenzi nzuzo engumxhumanisi wayo nomphakathi. Le nhlangano uthe ibibuye ivakashele ezibhedlela kulapho abona khona usizi lwezingane ezihlala iminyaka eminingi ezibhedlela kulindwe ukuthi zilulame ngokuphelele ngoba azikwazi ukuya emakubo ngoba awekho esimeni esikahle.“Ezinye zalezi zingane ngabona ukuthi ziyanikezwa ithuba lokuthi ziyolulamela emakhaya kodwa zibuyele ezibhedlela ngemuva kwesikhashana sezigula kakhulu ngenxa yokuthi zingenwe ngamagciwane ahambisana nesimo senhlalo yazo emakhaya. Ezinye izindlu kusuke kungezodaka, kwesinye isikhathi kube ukuthi zizalwa emndenini onamalungu amaningi ompintshene endlini encane, amagciwane asabalala kalula,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi lesi simo samenza wacabanga ukuthi lezi zingane ziyaphoqeleka ukuthi zihlale ezibhedlela yize belikhona ithuba lokuthi ziyolulamela emakhaya ngenxa yalokhu ezinye ziyephuza ukululama ngoba zisuke ziphatheke kabi zikhumbula imindeni yazo.Izingane ezinezifo ezibucayi uthe ngokuvamile ziyahlinzwa kulungiswe lezo zitho ezisuke zizigulisa, lezi ezinamakhaya angekho esimeni noma odokotela sebekuqinisekisile ukuthi ukuhlinzwa kube yimpumelelo ziyahlala. Ezinye zisuke zihlale eminye iminyaka zisalinde ukuhlizwa.“Ezinye kuyenzeka ukuthi zifakelelwa izitho ezithile zomzimba ezifana nezinso, odokotela bathi ngeke zigoduke ngoba izindlu zasemakubo azilungile,” kusho yena.UNksz Nonkwelo uthi umfowabo ayiwele naye uke waba nengane eyazalwa igula eyayingena iphuma ezibhedlela. Uthi odokotela babehlale begcizelela ukuthi kumele ihlale endaweni enjani. Le ngane yashona ineminyaka emihlanu.“Ngathi uma ngibona ukuthi kanti izingane ezihlala ezibhedlela ziningi kangaka ngazibona ngiwumuntu ongaqhamuka nesisombululo, esizonciphisa ukugula kwezingane okudalwa yizimo ezihlala ngaphansi kwazo emakhaya, ngiphinde ngisize odokotela ukuthi bakwazi ukwelapha abanye abantwana abasuke belindile bangalokhu belapha izingane ezizodwa eziphuma zingena esibhedlela. Ngokwami ngabona ukuthi indlu esesimeni esingcono ingasiza ekutheni ogulayo alulame kahle,” kusho yena.Le nhlangano esungulwe ngonyaka odlule uthe igxile ekusizeni izingane eziphethwe yizifo ezibucayi ngokuthi zithole amakhaya azozisiza ekutheni zilulame, ukuzisiza ekutheni zibuyele ezikoleni uma seziluleme iyazilekelela ngokuzitholela abazempilo abasendaweni abazozihlola ukuthi zilulama kahle yini.“Lezi zingane zikhula zihlala esibhedlela azinazo izinto ezinhle ezizikhumbulayo, uma sesibatholile abaxhasi yakhiwa indlu senza umcimbi sibize abalingisi noma abantu ezibathandayo ukuthi babe yingxenye yalowo mcimbi ukuze zibe nezinto ezinhle ezizicabangayo, sikholwa ukuthi lokho kuzozisiza ukuthi zilulame ngokushesha,” kusho yena.
title: Basiza izingane eziduve ezibhedlela

text: KUVUNJULULWE inkohlakalo kaR1.2 billion eMnyangweni wezeMpilo eGauteng, embikweni okhishwe yiSpecial Investigating Unit (SIU).Lo mbiko udalulwe yinhlanganisela yezinhlangano zomphakathi iSection 27, iTreatment Action Campaign (TAC) neCorruption Watch kuleli sonto.Kunenkolelo yokuthi lo mbiko onamakhasi angu-122, ubufihliwe isikhathi esingangonyaka ungadalulelwa umphakathi.Kubikwa ukuthi le nkohlakalo iqale kusukela ngo-2006 kuya ku- 2010. Lezi zinhlangano seziphakamise ukuthi kuthathelwe izinyathelo uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kulesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Brian Hlongwa nezinye izikhulu ezithintekayo kule nkohlakalo.Zithe kuzomele kuphinde kungenele nophiko i-Asset Forfeiture Unit (AFU).“UBrian Hlongwa selokhu avikelwa iminyaka owayengumengameli ngaphansi kukahulumeni owawuphethwe uJacob Zuma,” kusho uMnuz Mark Heywood we-Section 27.Uthe ukholwa wukuthi uhulumeni oholwa uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, ngeke uqhubeke nokubekezelela lokhu.Ekuqaleni kwakujutshwe ukuba kwenziwe ucwaningo ngalokhu ngo- 2010. Ngaleso sikhathi lezi zinhlangano zomphakathi zazicele ukuthi zihlale ngokwaziswa ukuthi kuqhubekani ngalolu cwaningo kodwa zingaziswa lutho.Kuthathe iminyaka eyisikhombisa ukuthi lo mbiko uphothulwe, wabe usuhanjiswa kowayengumengameli uZuma ngoMashi 29 nyakenye.Kusukela lapho kwabe sekucweba iziziba ngawo. Ngokulandela isicelo iPromotion of Access to Information Act, uMengameli usewudedele lo mbiko.UMnuz David Lewis ongumqondisi omkhulu kwiCorruption Watch, uthe ukuthatha isikhathi eside ukuthi lo mbiko wenekelwe umphakathi, kuyadumaza.Kubikwa ukuthi okungenani zingu-10 izikhulu ezinye ezisolekayo kulo mbiko. Ezinye zazo kuthiwa kwaba sengathi ziyabizwa ukuba ziphendule kodwa kwabuye kwashiywa kanjalo, kanti ezinye zayekelwa.“Kuyacaca ukuthi uhulumeni waseGauteng wehlulekile ukubeka amacala okungaziphathi kahle ezikhulwini ezithintekayo, futhi awuzange uphenye. Sizokulandela lokho,” kusho uMnuz Kavisha Pillay weCorruption Watch.
title: Inkohlakalo yezigidigidi kowezeMpilo

text: UMQEQESHI weLamontville Golden Arrows, uMandla Ncikazi, uthi ukube bezibavuna ezinye zezinqumo zikanompempe bebhekene neMamelodi Sundowns emdlalweni weDStv Premiership, ngabe bakhale bemuka namaphuzu amathathu kulo mdlalo ophele ngo 1-1, eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium ngempelasonto.ISundowns inqobe izicoco ezintathu ngesizini edlule, okubalwa kuzona eseligi, Telkom Knockout neseNedbank Cup. Ubungaphika kodwa kulo mdlalo ne-Arrows ukuthi iSundowns inqobe lezi zicoco, ngendlela Abafana Bes'thende "abebeyibhema" ngakhona.Amagoli kulo mdlalo avalelwe phakathi uMothobi Mvala eleSundowns, noMichael Gumede olinganisele i-Arrows ngesiwombe sokuqala. Kunamahlandla amabili kulo mdlalo, lapho khona i-Arrows bekufanele ithole khona amaphenathi kodwa unompempe, uJelly Chavani, wangayingena.UNcikazi ukholelwa ekutheni baphikwe yinhlanhla kulo mdlalo njengoba bekwenze konke ngendlela."Kunezinqumo obekumele ziwele ngakuthina kodwa kwangenzeka. Nokho angifuni ukugxila kulokho, kungcono ngikhulume ngengingakwazi ukukulungisa okwasenkundleni. Sibe nomdlalo sibhekene neqembu elinqobe izicoco ezintathu ngesizini edlule. Ngiyaziqhenya kakhulu ngabafana bethu, yize nje ngikholelwa ekutheni besingawathola ephelele amaphuzu kulo mdlalo," kusho uNcikazi.Noma kade ewafuna ephelele amaphuzu uNcikazi kodwa kuzomjabulisa ukuthi ezakhe azikashaywa kuze kube manje kwiDStv Premiership. Abafana Bes'thende basendaweni yesithupha kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-12, emidlalweni eyisishiyagalombili."ISundows inabadlali abaningi, akusho lutho ukuthi baqoke ukudlalisa baphi ngalolo suku. Noma ngabe bafake uMargeman (Grant) owayengukaputeni we-Ajax Cape Town. Noma ngabe bafake uMvala (Mothobi), owayengukaputeni weHighlands Park bazodlala into efanayo. Noma ngabe badlalisa uMkhuma (Promise), naye wayengukaputeni weqembu labo kwiMultiChoice Diski Challenge. Sizolamukela iphuzu esilitholile, sizokwakhela kulona ngonyaka ozayo," kulandisa uNcikazi.Kubukeka sengathi kubuye isitayela esidala se-Arrows ngendlela ezikaNcikazi ezivutha zingabaselwe ngakho. uVelemseni Ndwandwe, Pule Mmodi, Ntsako Makhubela noNduduzo Sibiya babonakala besazowathwesa kanzima amaqembu amaningi kwiDStv Premiership."Asisishintshanga isikimu sethu kangako kulesi esehlule AmaZulu. Sikwenze lokhu ngoba sibathemba abafana bethu ngendlela enhle abadlala ngayo kulo mdlalo, ngakho besingekho isidingo sokushintsha," kusho uNcikazi.Ngonyaka ozayo i-Arrows izovula neBlack Leopards eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium ngoJanuwari 5.
title: UNcikazi ukhala ngokwenzelwa phansi yizinqumo zikanompempe

text: BABHODLA umlilo abazali ngezindlu zangasese zaseNdlovana Primary, eGreytown okuthiwa kuneminyaka engaphezulu kwemithathu zingashayeki, abafundi bazisebenzisa zinjalo.Abazali bathi izingane zabo zisengcupheni yokungenwa yizifo njengoba zilokhu ziqhubeka nokusebenzisa amathoyilethi akulesi simo.Umzali opotshozele leli phephandaba lolu daba, uthe sekuphele iminyaka eyevile kwemithathu amathoyilethi akulesi sikole engashayeki.“Izingane zethu ziwasebenzisa enjalo amathoyilethi. Isikole asinawo namathoyilethi angomahambanendlwana ahlelelwe ukusetshenziswa njengoba kusenenkinga. Indle seyigcwele ikapakela phansi, umchamo wehla ngezindonga. Okubuhlungu ukuthi lesi sikole sisedolobheni, sinamanzi kumele ngabe amathoyilethi akhona asebenza ngendlela. Isigungu esilawula isikole nothishanhloko uma sibuza ngalokhu bathi kwabhalelwa umhloli eminyakeni emithathu eyedlule. Kubona kungathi yonke into izozenzekela. Ngibona sengathi bazithele ngamanzi abandayo nje,” kuso umzali.Isolezwe lithinte usihlalo wesigungu kulesi sikole, ongathandanga negama lakhe, othe akafuni ukukhuluma ngalolu daba kwabezindaba ngoba ulukhuluma nabahloli noMnyango wezeMfundo .“Angazi ukuthi ubani ofake lolu daba kwiSolezwe. Ngeke ngikuchazele lutho ngalo ngoba angigunyaziwe ukukhuluma. Yebo, ngimele abazali kodwa ngikhuluma nabo abazali kuphela hhayi abezindaba. Angazi ukuthi laba nabazali asebegijimela ukufaka izindaba ezinje ephephandabeni bebeqondeni nokuthi bebegunyazwe ngubani ukuthi bakhulume izindaba zezikole emaphephandabeni,”esho evala ucingo.Omunye wabasebenzi othe akagunyaziwe ukukhuluma nabezindaba uvumile ukuthi kunenkinga yamathoyilethi, abafundi kulesi sikole. Uthe isikole sinamathoyilethi awu-12, ayisithupha awabafana, ayisithupha awamantombazane kodwa wonke agcwele ngoba akashayeki.“Ngokuzwa kwami ingqalasizinda ehambisa indle yesikole seyindala. Abalungisa amapayipi bacebisa isikole ukuthi ishintshwe. Uthishomkhulu uthi wayibhala incwadi echaza isimo kodwa isimo siyaqhubeka nokuba sibi. Uthe abakwamasipala bakhomba yona inqalasizinda yokuhanjiswa kwendle yesikole. Abafundi bakwaGrade R yibo abanenkinga kakhulu nekilasi labo liseduze kwawo la mathoyilethi,” kusho umzali.UMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uthe udaba lwabikwa eMnyangweni wezeMisebenzi. Uthe kumele kufakwe amapayipi amasha okuhambisa indle, kulungiswe nezihlalo zamathoyilethi nezindonga.“Lolu daba siluthatha njengolunye lwezinto okumele zilungiswe ngokushesha. Kulindeleke ukuthi usonkontileka othole ithenda aqale ukusebenza ngenyanga ezayo,” kusho uMlotshwa.
title: Abazali bayaveva ngendle ephihlika esikoleni

text: USUPHINDE washiywa ngomunye umlingisi umdlalo owuchungechunge wakuMzansi Magic, Isibaya, njengoba kuzophela inyanga ezoqala engasabonakali u-Andile Gumbi.U-Andile udlala indawo kaZwelibanzi Ngubane kulo mdlalo okhonjiswa ngo-8.30 ebusuku phakathi nesonto.Ushiya nje, kusanda kuvela ukuthi uCeleste Ntuli odlala indawo kaSiphokazi Zungu usazoke athi ukugxila ekuqhululeni amahlaya. UJessica Nkosi onguQondi naye usagxile ezintweni zakhe njengoba ngempelasonto ubelingisa emdlalweni weshashalazi iMaria. Ubedlala indawo kanina kaJesu, uMaria.Umthombo weSolezwe utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi u-Andile useshiya ingunaphakade kulokhu ngoba phambilini uke wanyamalala waphinde wabuya.Okhulumela iM-Net, uNondumiso Mabece, ukuqinise-kisile ukuthi u-Andile uyahamba.“Kunefilimu ayoyiqopha. Simfisela impumelelo emsebenzini wakhe futhi siyabonga ngegalelo lakhe kwiSibaya ngesikhathi edlala indawo kaZweli,” kusho uNondumiso.Uthe abantu abaqhubeke nokubuka Isibaya ukubona ukuthi uhamba kanjani.Umthombo uthe uSihle (Zinhle Mabena) noNgwebedla (Enerst Ndlovu) yibo abakha itulo lokubulala uZweli.“UZweli kumele kube khona lapho eya khona bese uma ethi uyaphuma uSihle afonele uNgwebedla amtshele ukuthi useyahamba. Akucaci ukuthi kwenzakalani kodwa ushona engozini yemoto,” kusho umthombo.Imizamo yokuthola u-Andile ayiphumelelanga njengoba kuthiwa ungumuntu ohlale eshintsha izinombolo zocingo.
title: ‘UZweli’ usesishiya unomphela Isibaya

text: BASHAYWE umphakathi banaba abalisa ababili abebesolwa ngokweba izimoto eWaterloo, eVerulam.Laba balisa abashaywe bacishe bashona kuthiwa bahlaselwe ngamalungu omphakathi obewubasola ngokweba izimoto ngoMgqibelo emuva kwehora lesine ekuseni.Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo iReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa), uMnuz Prem Balram, uthe babizwe emuva kwehora lesine ekuseni lapho befice khona imoto yohlobo lweToyota Tazz isha nabasolwa sebeshayiwe.“Amadoda amabili abeshaywa ngezagila nangamatshe ngamalungu omphakathi abebasola ngokuzama ukuntshontsha imoto,” kushouBalram.Omunye wabahlali balapho okusolakala ukuthi laba balisa bantshontshe khona imoto, uthe imoto yabasolwa ingene kuleya ndawo engamaflethi ngezikhathi zasekuseni ngoMgqibelo yashiya abantu ababili abagcine sebebonakala bezama ukuxakazisa enye imoto khona eflethini.Uthe abantu bakuleya ndawo okukholakala ukuthi bebengaphezu kuka-100 bamise imoto ebihamba abasolwa bayivimba ukuthi ingaphumi.“Bamise iToyota Tazz base beshaya abantu abebephakathi emotweni ngaphambi kokuthi bayishise. Umshayeli kuthiwa uvumile ukuthi uyingxenye yeqembu elintshontsha izimoto eBerea,” kusho Balram.Uthe kube sekubizwa amaphoyisa, base bephuthunyiswa esibhedlela laba balisa abese belimele.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Col Thulani Zwane, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa avule icala lokuzama ukubulala emuva kokuhlaselwa kwalaba balisa ngamalungu omphakathi.“Uthe kukholakala ukuthi laba balisa ababili bebesemaflethini abizwa ngeHammonds eWaterloo lapho behlaselwe amalungu omphakathi. La madoda abelimele aphuthunyiswe esibhedlela, imoto yawo yashiswa,” kusho uZwane.
title: Bashaywe banaba abebesolwa ngokweba izimoto

text: Sithembiso MkhizeINTOKAZI esencane yaseNdwedwe ezifela ngomdlalo wamahhashi, uNconyiwe Mdima, izibona iqhudelana nojoki bomhlaba kwiVodacom Durban July Handicap eminyakeni ezayo.UNconyiwe (15) othi uma ukhuluma naye umbone ukuthi uwuzwa ngaphakathi lo mdlalo, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi  lesi sifiso sakhe uhlela ukusifeza ngokuqale atelebhele kwiDundee July Horse Racing yakulo nyaka.Uthe uzophatheka kabi uma lo mjaho ungabanga khona ngenxa yeCovid-19.Le ntokazi ezokwenza uGrade 10, eSacred Heart Secondary School, eVerulem, eThekwini, imatasa ngokufunda kabanzi ngalo mdlalo futhi iziqeqesha kanzima.Idalule ukuthi ngonyaka idlule iqale izifundo eShortlands Riding Centre, oTongaat, ngenhloso yokufeza iphupho layo.UNconyiwe wasesigodini iMadimeni, uthe uyazi ukuthi indlela yokugijima kwiHandicap neyeDundee July ihlukene.KwiDundee kuyatelebhelwa bese kwiHandicap egijinyelwa eGreyville Horse Racing kugabavulwe."Njengoba sengifunda eShortland Riding Centre, uthando lwami ngalo mdlalo lunyuke kakhulu. Sengifunde okuningi. Isifiso sami ukuqopha umlando ngokuba ujoki wesifazane omnyama ovelele kulo mdlalo. Uma iCoronavirus yehla bengingathanda ukuya eDundee ukuyozwa amanzi ngobhoko. Isifiso sami esikhulu ukugabavula emizileni efana neGreyville, Turffontein, Scottville nakweminye eminyakeni ezayo," kubeka uNconyiwe.Ebuzwa ukuthi ungene kanjani kulo mdlalo, uthe wafakwa uyise, uBongani Mdima.Echaza kabanzi uthe: "Ungaze ufunge ukuthi sengineminyaka ngikulo mdlalo kanti lutho. Ngiwuqale ngonyaka odlule ngaphambi kokuqala komvalelandlini (Lockdown). Abekhona amahhashi ekhaya kodwa ubaba waphinde wathenga amanye. Uthe kumele siqale lo mdlalo ngoba sizogcina sesenza izinto ezingasile ngenxa yesizungu."Sixakekile nje ukuthi ubaba wenzani? Besizibuza ukuthi singamantombazane singasigibela kanjani isilwane? Nakuba ubaba engakaze awudlale lo mdlalo, uhlale phansi wasichazela ngawo namathuba akuwo. Ngiqale lapho, ngangabe ngisabheka emuva. Ngezimpelasonto bengiya enkundleni yebhola ngiyozilolonga. Ubaba ubonile ukuthi ngiyawuthanda lo mdlalo wabe esengibhalisa eShortlands Riding Centre.“UNconyiwe umuntu athe ukubukela kuyena uSimanga Khumalo waKwaMashu, owaba ujoki wokuqala onsundu ukunqoba iVodacom Durban July Handicap ngo-2013.Le njomane eyayiphethwe uChris van Niekerk yanqoba ilolongwa umqeqeshi wodumo, uSean Tarry.UNconyiwe uthe igama le njelomane yakhe uWhite."Sithandana into ehambayo noWhite. Uma ngiqhamuka uyajabula. Kuqala bengisizwa ubaba ukumnakekela. Manje sengiyazibambela mathupha. Kangidli engadlile.“
title: Uzibona eya kude nomdlalo wokuqhoqhobala izinjomane

text: UBELETHISWE ezinye iziguli owesifazane waseClermont, othi abahlengikazi ebebesebenza ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku esibhedlela iSt Mary’s, eRoma bamtshele ukuthi akathule angalokhu ememeza, abatshele uma sekukhala ingane kuphela.UNksz Thulisile Khanyile (29) uthi umemeze kwaze kwavuka abesifazane abelele nabo ewodini ecela usizo kubahlengikazi abagcine bengamsizanga,waze wasizwa yiziguli abelele nazo, zambelethisa.Uthi wafika esibhedlela ngoLwesine enezinhlungu, udokotela wathi yize enamasonto angu-26 ezithwele isibeletho sakhe sesivulekile kuzomele alale ngoba usezobeletha.NgoLwesihlanu ebusuku izinhlungu zamqinisa waya kubahlengikazi eyobika ukuthi izinhlungu sezingaphezulu kwalezi abezizwa ngesikhathi efika ngayizolo. Uthi bathe akabuyele embhedeni alale.“Ngenza njengoba beshilo kodwa ngehluleka ukuthula ngakhala kwaze kwangena udokotela obedlula wezwa ngikhala. Wangihlola wase etshela abahlengikazi ukuthi ingane isiseduze. Ngizitshela ukuthi bazosondela bazongisiza kodwa lutho. Kwaze kwavuka iziguli ebengilele nazo zishintshana abanye bengihlikihla umzimba, abanye bengiphuzisa amanzi. Omunye uye kubo ubahlengikazi eyobika ukuthi isimo sibi naye bamphendula ngokuthi baze babizwe uma sekukhala ingane.“Esinye isiguli sizincamile seza kimi safike sangitshela ukuthi ingane isivelile angiphakamise imilenze ngoba mina bengingazi ukuthi kumele ngenzenjani. Waqhamuka unesi wathetha wathi bayaphapha uma besaba abazimboze balale wacisha ugesi, wangihenqa ngeshidi, wahamba. Bengiyizwa ingane ikhala inyakaza khona embhedeni, yagcina ingasanyakazi. Umhlengikazi ufike ngemuva kwehora ngibelethile ehamba kancane, bese ngize ngazifaka i-drip ngoba ngizizwa ngiphelelwa amandla ,” kusho uNksz Khanyile.UNKSZ Thulisile Khanyile waseClermont akasoze asikhohlwa isehlo sokubelethiswa yiziguli esibhedlela iSt Mary’sIsithombe: Sibusiso Ndlovu/African News Agency(ANA)Esinye seziguli (22) esisize uNksz Khanyile esingathandanga ukudalulwa sithi asinayo ingane sifike esibhedlela siphuphunyelwe yisisu kodwa sihlulekile ukubekezela ngendlela abekhala ngayo.“Ngivuke ngabheka ukuthi njengoba udokotela ethe sekusele * -7cm abelethe ngabe ubesho ukuthini nokuthi angasizwa ngani. Ngamphuzisa amanzi, ngamhlikihla njengoba bekushiwo. Eduze kwami bekukhona esinye isiguli engicabanga ukuthi senze umsebenzi omkhulu ngoba sibone ukuthi ufake intambo esinqeni, sayinyusela emabeleni ngemuva kwalokho kwaqhuma amanzi, wabeletha. Umhlengikazi obesithethisa ubonile ukuthi ingane isiphumile, wahamba. Omunye wabo ngizwe etshela omunye ukuthi kule wadi akekho umama owake wabeletha ingane yaphila bona bebezitshela ukuthi ingane ishonile,” echaza.Ingane ishone ngemuva kwamahora izelwe.
