UNksz Khanyile uthi ewodini elihlala izingane ezizalwe ngaphambi kwesikhathi ibinakekelwe kahle odokotela bebelokhu bemtshela konke okwenzekayo.“Ubuhlungu engibuziswe abahlengikazi angibufiseli omunye umuntu, ngifisa ungqongqoshe wezempilo ake avakashele kulesi sibhedlela kungaziwa, azizwele ukuthi iziguli ziphathwa kanjani. Noma ngabe ingane ibiphume ishonile angicabangi ukuthi kuyikho ukuthi ngilaliswe nayo ihora,” kusho yena.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo, uNkz Noluthando Nkosi, uthe uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natali uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu usezwakalise okukhulu ukukhathazeka ngokwenzekile.“Ungqongqoshe uthe lolu daba lungolunqala, futhi ludinga ukuthathelwa izinyathelo ngendlela ephuthumayo. Uthi lezi zinsolo ziphambene nendlela afuna lo mnyango usebenze ngayo, okuwukuhlonipha iziguli nokubeka izidingo zazo phambili ngaso sonke isikhathi.Usejube umqondisi wezempilo esifundeni seTheku nomphathi wesibhedlela ukuba baqoqe yonke imininingwane, bahlanganise umbiko, bese kuqalwa uphenyo. Kuzobe sekuthathwa izinyathelo ezifanele zokuqondisa ubugwegwe uma kukhona otholakala enecala.”
title: Kufe usana etetiswa yiziguli esibhedlela onesi bengamnakile

text: KWENZEKE okungajwayelekile abaholi bebandla lamaNazaretha aseBuhleni nasekuPhakameni okwaziwa ukuthi bayinkukhu nempaka, bebonakala kwi-video bexhawulana bekhulumisana.Kule video esiphenduke undabuzekwayo, umholi webandla lwakwaShembe eBuhleni, iNkosi uMduduzi “Nyazilwezulu” Shembe uxhawulana nomholi wasekuPhakameni iNkosi uVukile “Ncoyincoyi” Shembe, okuyinto okuthiwa ayikaze yenzeke selokhu lezi zinhlangothi zahlukana.Kuzwakala amalungu ebandla ejabulela ukuxhawulana kwalaba baholi, ekhuza: "* -ameni!" abanye bethi: "uyingcwele!". Kuvela nabanye bephethe amafoni beshutha laba baholi.Kuthiwa kuhlukene imibono ngale video njengoba amanye amalungu ebandla laseBuhleni ekhala ngokuthi uNyazi aluzange lubatshele ukuthi sebeyadlelana nabantu basekuPhakameni.Okhulumela abaseBuhleni, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe le video iqoshwe ngeSonto, ngoDisemba 23 ngesikhathi uNyazi luhlangana neNcoyincoyi ngaphandle kwasekuPhakameni.“Njengenjwayelo uNyazi luye lunikelise abantu uma liphuma KwaZulu. INcoyincoyi ibiphuma ekuPhakameni ngesikhathi ihlangana noNyazi endleleni. Babe sebebingelelana baxhawulana, baxoxa ezomndeni. Mina ngiyakujabulela ukuthi abaholi bakwaShembe baxhumane bonke ngoba abandawonye, ukhokho wabo uyedwa,” kusho uMncwabe.KUKHUZWE u-Ameni ngesikhathi umholi webandla laKwaShembe eBuhleni iNkosi uMduduzi “Nyazilwezulu” Shembe exhawulana nomholi webandla lasekuPhakameni iNkosi uVukile Shembe obekunezinsolo zokuthi ababhekaniEbuzwa ukuthi ngabe lokhu kusho ukuthi sebekhumelene umlotha yini laba baholi, uMncwabe uthe bekuqala khona, kuningi okusazokwenzeka phakathi kwabo bobabili.“Abakaze baxabane laba baholi. Abantu abebengena phakathi kwabo, bekhuluma izinkulumo ezingezinhle. Omunye ethuka olunye uhlangothi okuyinto engavumelekile ebandleni. Bangenaphi ezindabeni zomndeni bona? UNyazi alukaze luthi abangadlelani nabantu basekuPhakameni kodwa kusuka abantu esontweni bathathe umbhobho bamemezele ukuthi akungahlanganwa nabantu bakwezinye izinhlangothi," kusho uMncwabe.Ukhuze umkhuba wamanye amalungu aseBuhleni athi abiza abantu ngamaphekula uma bebonakale bemi nabantu basekuPhakameni noma eThembezinhle.Uqhube wathi abantu abayeke ukuxova ibandla laKwaShembe babhebhezele noqhekeko.“Kunabantu abake basukume ebandleni bathathe umbhobho bagxeke ezinye izinhlangothi. Lokho kusuke kungaphumi kubaholi. Abanye baze bacule amaculo agigiyela ezinye izinhlangothi,” kusho uMncwabe.Uvumile ukuthi zikhona izinkulumo zasemaceleni zabantu abangeneme ngokuxhawulana kwalaba baholi wathi kodwa bayazikhuza ngoba uNyazi alukaze luthi alizwani nomholi wasekuPhakameni.Uthe akanaso isiqiniseko sokuthi laba baholi bayophinde bahlangane nini ngoba lokho kuphakathi kwabo bobabili.Imizamo yokuthola owohlangothi lwasekuPhakameni ukuba aphawule ayiphumelelanga.
title: Igidigidi ‘kubuyisana’ abaholi ekuPhakameni nabaseBuhleni

text: OWAYENGUMSUBATHI waseNingizimu Afrika odonsa isigwebo seminyaka engu-13 ngokubulala intombi yakhe, u-Oscar Pistorius, ufake isicelo sokukhululwa okwesikhashana ejele ukuyongcwaba uyisemkhulu. Isicelo sakhe sesiqubule imibuzo ngokuphathwa kwakhe ngesandla esintofontofo.Umndeni wakhe ukuqinisekisile ukuthi usevunyelwe ukuya emngcwabeni.U-Oscar kuthiwa ufake isicelo sokudedelwa ayongcwaba uyisemkhulu, uHendrik Pistorius oshone emasontweni amathathu edlule.UMnyango wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo uyakuphika ukuthi usevunyelwe.Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Singabakho Nxumalo uthe u-Oscar usifakile isicelo kodwa akakavunyelwa ukuyongcwaba.“Inhloko yomnyango isazocubungula isicelo sika-Oscar ngenxa yokuthi ukudedelwa kwesiboshwa kuyingozi,” kusho uNxumalo.Umthombo osondelene nomndeni ka-Oscar ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uzodedelwa okwesikhashana ejele. Uveze ukuthi eminye imibandela yokudedelwa kwakhe wukuthi umngcwabo uzobe uhanjelwe amalungu omndeni kuphela.
title: UPistorius ufake isicelo sokudedelwa ejele

text: ESIKHUNDLENI sokubalisa njengabanye abaphuthwe yithuba lokuthweswa iziqu ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakame ezahlukene ngenxa yokuvalwa kwezwe ngoba kubheduke iCoronavirus, udokotela waseMgungundlovu unqume ukuzithwesa ekhaya.UDkt Hloniphile Sithole-Mthethwa ophinde afundise iMaths e-University of KwaZulu-Natal (UKZN), ungomunye wabebelubheke ngabomvu usuku lokuthweswa kweziqu ngesonto eledlule. Ukuvaleleka ekhaya okudalwe wukubhebhetheka kwegciwane iCorona, kwenze ukuthi kumiswe ukuthweswa kweziqu nase-UKZN.UDkt Sithole-Mthethwa ubezothweswa iziqu zePhd kwi-Applied Maths, okuwumkhakha ongavamile ukuba nabesifazane abamnyama.Ngesonto obekumele athweswe ngalo iziqu ufake isithombe sejazi lakhe elibovu kwiFacebook. Ubhale ukuthi: “April 14, 2020 UKZN Graduation. Ngathenga lokhu ngaphambi kokuthi ngivaleleke ekhaya. Bengizogqoka ngokuziqhenya kanje namuhla. Udokotela wePhilosophy (Applied Mathematics). Ngiyazihalalisela.”Ubuye wafaka isithombe sakhe engaphandle komuzi, esezidlubhe zaphelela ezemfundo. Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi kwaba buhlungu ethola ukuthi ngeke esakwazi ukuthweswa iziqu ngoba ubesethenge konke okokugqoka.“Umndeni wonke ubulujahile usuku lweziqu. Yize bengizobe ngithweswa iziqu okwesine, bekubalulekile ngoba bekungokokugcina. Bekuzoba mnandi kakhulu ukuthwesa iziqu nabafundi bami uNolwazi Nkomo noTshepiso Madondo. Bebezothweswa iziqu kwiMaster of Science (MSc) neBSc(Honours) in Applied Mathematics,” kusho yena.Echaza ngesinqumo sokuzethwesa ekhaya, uthe ngumngani wakhe uDkt Dephney Mathebula ofundisa e-University of Venda owamcebisa. Uthe wamtshela ukuthi angavumeli ukubhocobaliswa yisimo, kunalokho akagqoke ijazi, athathe izithombe ajabule nomndeni wakhe. Uveze ukuthi ubengazi ukuthi uzogcina ehalaliselwa yizwe lonke ngalesi senzo.Uthi yena nomyeni wakhe bebezokwenza isiphihli somcimbi emuva kokuthweswa iziqu ukuze bakhuthaze nezinye izitshudeni. Ukuthola lezi ziqu, uthe kuzomsiza emsebenzini wakhe onzulu wokucwaninga nokulekelela ezinye izitshudeni.“Bengivele ngenza kahle kwiMaths, okwenza ngenze izifundo ze-Applied Maths and Stats. Ngaqala umkhakha wokucwaninga ngesikhathi ngenza iBSc Honours eStellenbosch University. Yilapho ngathatha khona isinqumo sokuthi ngifunde ngigogode kwezokucwaninga,” kuchaza uDkt Sithole-Mthethwa.UDkt Sithole-Mthethwa usefundise iminyaka emihlanu e-UKZN. Uthe uyazi ukuthi izitshudeni eziningi zinezinselelo kwiMaths kodwa kubalulekile ukuzijwayeza ukuzithuthukisa. Uthe sekukhona nabafundisa nge-internet okungasiza izitshudeni ukuzicija.Ugcizelele ukuthi lesi sifundo sifuna ukufundwa nsuku zonke. Ukhuthaza labo abaphelelwe ngamandla okufunda ngenxa yokuvaleleka emakhaya ukuthi bazijwayeze ukufunda nge-internet.“Ngiyazi kunzima ukufundela ekhaya ngoba kunezinselelo eziningi. Kungcono ukufunda ebusuku kungasekho ukuphazamiseka,” kusho yena.UDkt Sithole-Mthethwa ufunde u-matric e-Edendale Technical High.
title: Uzethwese iziqu ophuthwe yithuba

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho elingashayi eceleni ngibhala ngizwa ubuhlungu ngendaba engiyifunde kulona Isolezwe ngo-Agasti18 ebisihloko sithi: Kushone ibhungu (18) kudutshulwana eBurlington. Cha bakwethu sesikhale kakhulu singabantu baseNingizimu Afrika kodwa kasinakwa, kuphela abantu banendaba nevoti lethu.Kudalwa yini ukuthi la madoda amasudu abizayo amnyama ahlezi ehamba ngezimoto ezimnyama egadwe yizigora ukuthi asabele kude uma abantu bakithi abahluphekile bekhala. Uwabona ngoba nakhu sekunemibhikisho abantu sebekhathele bengatholi impendulo .Cha wezikhulu zami ngithanda ukunikhumbuza ukuthi uyeza u-2019 nizobe seniqamba amakhulu amanga lawa senenza sengathi nisikhathalele kanti niyalobiza nilobizela imali yabakhokhi bentela.Ngikhuluma nje eJozini, KwaJobe, eMozi, kuward-3 namanje amanzi awekho kodwa kunekhansela lethu ebelikade liyiMeya. Iphelile iminyaka eyisikhombisa silitshela ukuthi sicela amanzi noma lisifakele izigayo kodwa namanje lutho. Kuzothi uma sekuzovotwa lize lindiza namaphasela okudla kodwa okwamanje lisawukhohliwe umphakathi kusaduma indaba yezikhundla ngoba seliyisuthi eyobukhansela.Sengiphetha nje uma osopolitiki bengabhekile bazoyikhotha imbenge yomile. Abakhumbule ukuthi ezakudala inkukhu ezazilala phansi kodwa ezamanje sezilala phezulu. Madoda awubuye unembeza kusetshenzelwe abantu ngoba uyeza umhla wokuphela bayofike banibuze oMandela, OR Tambo, JL Dube, Sisulu ukuthi nibenzeleni abantu ezweni abalilwela kanzima. Nizosithola isiswebhu.S’pha ZwideKwamashu
title: [IMIBONO] Ngikhumbuza izikhulu ezibusayo ukuthi azinyakaze ngoba uyeza u-2019 ongaliyo

text: UZOVELA emdlalweni Isidingo kuSABC 3 umlingisi waphesheya kwezilwandle oseNingizimu Afrika uKatherine Kelly Lang, osezakhele igama ngokulingisa emdlalweni owuchungechunge waphesheya, iThe Bold and The Beautiful.UKatherine, odume ngelikaBrooke, ufike ngesonto eledlule eze emicimbini eyehlukene esePort Elizabeth azohlanganyela kuyo.Ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe abeBold, uKatherine uzobonakala ngoLwesithathu nangoLwesine.Okhulumela Isidingo, uYvonne Siphuka, uthe kujabule abalingisi abaningi bomdlalo ngesikhathi bezwa ukuthi uzoqopha iziqephu ezimbalwa nabo.“Sikujabulele ukuba noBrooke Logan, igama asezakhele lona futhi iningi elimazi ngalo. Siyazi ukuthi abalandeli abaningi bazokujabulela ukumbona emdlalweni futhi bazoyijabulela nendawo azoyilingisaezinsukwini ezimbili,” kusho uYvonne.Uthe kubona kusho lukhulu ukuvuma kwakhe ukubonakala emdlalweni.Ukufika kwakhe akwehlanga kahle kwabaningi. Kukhalwe nge-SABC ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi uletha uBrooke ngezindodla zemali ekubeni abalingisi bomdlalo Uzalo bengaholile.Kodwa uSABC wazichitha lezi zindaba wathi akubona abamlethile kodwa kukhona abaxhasile.
title: UBrooke weBold uzobonakala kwiSidingo

text: ZIYASHAQISA izibalo zabafundi abakhulelwa emabangeni aphansi kwaGrade 3, 4 no-5 njengoba kusuka ngo-2014 kuya ku-2016 bangu-193 abakhulelwa.Lezi zibalo zikhishwe nguMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo obuphendula iDA ePhalamende ngezibalo zabafundi abakhulelwa minyaka yonke.Nakuba izibalo zikhombisa ukwehla njengoba ngonyaka odlule bengu-8 732 abafundi abakhulelwa kuleli ekubeni ngo-2014 babengu-18 357, uma ungazifakanga izibalo zezifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal neMpumalanga kodwa kunesikhalo emnyangweni ngokuthi laba bafundi abanye abasuke beneminyaka engaphansi kuka-10 bakhuleliswa ngabantu abadala.Okhulumela lo mnyango, uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, uthe kuyashaqisa ukuthi abafundi abancane bakhulelwa umphakathi ubuka.Uthe umphakathi kumele ubhukule ulwe nalesi sihlava ngoba abanye babantu abasuke bekhulelise umfundi basuke baziwa.“Kusuka ngo-2014 sibike amacala angu-56 680 emaphoyiseni ngoba sikholelwa ngukuthi kusuke kulalwe nabantwana abancane ngakho lowo osuke ekhulelise umfundi kumele aboshwe. Ngo-2015 sivule angu-53 617 kwathi ngo-2016 aba ngu-51 895 esiwabikile emaphoyiseni. Kusuka ngo-2014 angaphezulu kuka-150 000 amacala esiwabikile emaphoyiseni,” kusho uMhlanga.Uthe kwesinye isikhathi amanye amacala awabikwa emaphoyiseni okwenza bangaboshwa abasuke bethinteka.“Kwesinye isikhathi umphakathi uyazithulela ngoba uthenjiswa okuthile bese kusulwa amacala. Kumele wonke umuntu abambe iqhaza, yingakho sinomgomo wokuthi umfundi okhulelwe kumele angaxoshwa esikoleni futhi kumele abuye uma esezizwa ekulungele ukubuyela esikoleni,” kusho uMhlanga.UNkk Sonja Boshoff, oyilungu lekomiti lemfundo eyisiSekelo elimele iDA ePhalamende, uthe lezi zibalo ziyashaqisa ngoba uma kuhlanganiswa nabafundi bakwaGrade 6 no-7 lokho kusho ukuthi bangu-1 449 abafundi abakhulelwa kule minyaka emithathu edlule.Uthe lesi sibalo sithinta abafundi abangaphansi kweminyaka engu-16 wathi kunabantu okumele baboshwe abacekela phansi ikusasa lalezi zingane.“Sizofaka eminye imibuzo, sifuna ukuthola ukuthi ngabe laba bafundi sebabuyela yini ezikoleni ngemuva kokubeletha. Sizofuna ukwazi ukuthi umnyango ubaseka kanjani ukuze bangasali ezifundweni zabo nokuthi ngabe balulekwa yini ngokomqondo,” kusho uNkk Boshoff.Umbiko owethulwe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo esifundazweni uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane ekomitini lezemfundo esiShayamthetho ngo-Okthoba nyakenye, uveza ukuthi bangu-9 135 abafundi abakhulelwa kulesi sifundazwe ngo-2015.Lezi zibalo ziveza ukuthi ngo-2012 bangu-8308 abafundi abakhulelwa, ngo-2013 bangu-10030 kwathi ngo-2014 bangu-10213.UDlungwane watshela amalungu ekomiti ukuthi kunothisha nabantu abadala abalala nabafundi babakhulelise bese bekhokhela imindeni yabo.Waveza ukuthi umnyango unohlelo oluhlinzekwe ngo-R53million lokulwa nokukhulelwa kwabafundi iMy Life, My Future.
title: Sekukhulelwa oGrade 3 no-4

text: SIBUSISO MDLALOSE noNHLANHLA SITHOLEKUQOPHEKE umlando eNaturena emuva kokuthi iKaizer Chiefs ingene esigabeni esandulela esamanqamu eCaf Champions League okokuqala emlandweni wayo, yize ishaywe yiSimba SC ngo 3-0 emdlalweni obudlalelwa eTanzania izolo ntambama.Amakhosi abeye kulo mdlalo ehamba phambili ngo 4-0 emuva kokuthi emlenzeni wokuqala obuseFNB Stadium, eGoli. Lapha bekudingeka ukuba iSimba ishaye amagoli amahlanu, bese kuthi iChiefs ingabi nayo impendulo.Ephawula ngalo mdlalo umqeqeshi waMakhosi uGavin Hunt uthe konke kuhambe njengoba bebefisa, ukudlulela esigabeni esandulela esamanqamu. “Bekungelula neze kulo mdlalo. Kubengconywana esikhathini esingangemizuzu ewu-26 yokuqala. Emuva kwalo bathole igoli lokuqala nokwenze sadlala ngaphansi kwengcindezi,”kuchaza uHunt.Ngalo mphumela uthe: “Empeleni lomphumela akusiwona owami ngedwa kodwa oweqembu lonke leChiefs. Yize sinqobile kodwa kumele silungiselele imidlalo emithathu esele yeligi. Mayelana nomdlalo wesigaba esandulela esamanqamu kubukeka izophazamisa izinhlelo zokuqala amalungiselelo esizini entsha, kodwa akusenani sizibona.”Komunye umdlalo i-Al Ahly iqhubeke lapho igcine khona iwashisa ijezi iMamelodi Sundowns ibambana nayo ngo 1-1 emlenzeni sesibili wama-quarterfinal eCaf Champions League obuseLucas Moripe Stadium, izolo ntambama.I-Al Ahly ibivele ize kulo mdlalo ihamba phambili ngamagoli njengoba emlenzeni wokuqala kuyiyona ebinqobe ngo 2-0 eCairo, e-Egypt, ngoMgqibelo odlule.Nokho ezikaPitso Mosimane zikhombise zisuka nje ukuthi azizile ukuzosinisa amahleza kulo mdlalo ngenkathi uYassir Ibrahim engqomfela phakathi ngekhanda ibhola ebeliyikhona ebigotshwe u-Amr Sulaya ngomzuzu ka-11.Okuqaphelekile kulo mdlalo ukubuya kwesiklwibhishi nesethenjwa seDowns, uThemba "Mshishi" Zwane nenjini yasesiswini u-Andile Jali abangadlalanga emlenzeni wokuqala e-Egypt, abadlake kangcono kakhulu kulo mdlalo.UMosa Lebosa uyena otholele iDowns igoli lokulinganisa ngomzuzu ka-29 engqomfela phakathi ngekhanda ibhola ebeligotshwe u-Aubrey Modiba kade kuyikhona.Nakuba ziye ekhefini zibambene ngo 1-1 kodwa kodwa iDowns yiyona ebiphethe umdlalo ngesiwombe sokuqala, nakwesesibili bekuyesifanayo kodwa kwala khona ukwenza.IDowns bekudingeka inqobe lo mdlalo ngo 3-0 ingangenelwa goli kulo mdlalo ukuze izibekisele indawo kowandulela owamanqamu, nokho okugcine kungenzekanga njengoba ezikaMosimane zibukeke "zipake ibhasi" kulo mdlalo.Ngemuva komdlalo uPitso Mosimane ocija amaRed Devils uphume enkundleni eqhasha ngaphandle kokuxhawula kubalingani bakhe beSundowns. Ekhuluma nabezindaba emuva komdlalo uthe uphoxeke kabi ngemibiko ebibhalwe ezingqwembeni endleleni eya enkundleni.“Ngiyazibuza ukuthi kumele ngilenzeleni engcono leli qembu njengoba abalandeli balo bengithuka ngale ndlela. Okungizwisa ubuhlungu kakhulu ukungithuka ngomama. Ngiyamazi umuntu obephehla lokhu, kodwa kulungile, ”kukhala uMosimane.
title: IChiefs iphunyule sekuvalwe amehlo

text: UKUGABA kwePremier Soccer League (PSL) ngabadlali abaningi ukwedlula wonke amanye amaligi kwi-2019 Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) kwenza umqeqeshi weLamontville Golden Arrows, uSteve Komphela, alindele isizini ehlabahlosile ngo-2019/2020.Isizini ka-2019/2020 ye-Absa Premiership izoqala ngo-Agasti 3 kanti kuzobe kuqalwa ukuthi kubangwe * -R15 million kwazise imali ikhushuliwe isuka ku-R10 million.I-Afcon, edlalelwe e-Egypt kusuka ngoJuni 21 kuya kuJulayi 19, igcine inqotshwe yi-Algeria kanti iBafana Bafana iphume kuma-quarterfinal ngemuva kokukhipha osokhaya esigabeni samaqembu angu-16. IPSL ibigabe ngabadlali abangu 42 okuyisibalo esiphezulu kunawo wonke amaligi.I-Egypt Premier League yiyo ebilandela iPSL ngabadlali abangu-24 bese kuza iTanzania Pro League ngabangu-20. IBafana ibiphethe abadlali abangu-17 abayibamba kwi-Absa Premiership.IKaizer Chiefs yilona qembu lePremiership ebelimelwe ngabadlali abaningi uma liqhathaniswa namanye amaqembu ezobanga nawo isiteki sika-R15 million.Amakhosi abenabadlali abayisikhombisa.Ompetha bePremeirship, iMamelodi Sundowns, bebephethe abayisithupha. IBidvest Wits ibiphethe abahlanu.IPirates, esiqede endaweni yesibili amasizini amabili elandelana, ibiphethe abane. “Sijabule kakhulu ngendlela abadlale ngayo futhi nabo ngiyacabanga bajabule kakhulu ngendlela abadlale ngayo. Okumqoka kakhulu kodwa wukuthi bahlanganile nabo (abadlali abanjengoMohamed Salah, owagotshwa nguLunga noHlanti emidlalweni ehlukene) bashiyelana inkundla nabo. Ekubuyeni kwabo (abePSL), lokho kuzosuleleka nakubadlali abebesele lapha ekhaya,”kusho uKomphela, ezakhe ezitonyulwe ukuqala kuma-semi final e-2019 KZN Premier’s Cup kusasa.“Singenza isibonelo ngoLunga noma ngoPhiri noma omunye, lokho kuzotshela laba abebesele lapha ekhaya ukuthi akukho okungeke kwenzeke ngoba laba okade ubabuka laphaya, sebebuyile banawe lapha ekhaya. Kuletha intobeko nenkuthazo enkulu kwabanye abadlali,” kubeka uKomphela.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:NgoMgqibelo:Chippa Utd v Stellenbosch, eNelson Mandela Bay ngo-3pm; Baroka v Cape Town City, e-Old Peter Mokaba ngo-3pm; Sundowns v SuperSport United eLucas Moripe ngo-3pm; Orlando Pirates v Bloem Celtic, e-Orlando Stadium ngo-6pm; AmaZulu v Bidvest Wits, eKing Zwelithini Stadium ngo-8.15pm.NgeSonto:Black Leopards v Polokwane City, eThohoyandou ngo-3pm; Highlands Park v Kaizer Chiefs, eMakhulong ngo-3pm; Golden Arrows v Maritzburg United, eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium ngo-3pm.
title: UKomphela utusa isibalo esiphezulu sabadlali beligi

text: USIHLALO wekhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzane uJaji Raymond Zondo uyalele uNobhala wekhomishini uSolwazi Itumeleng Mosala, ukuba amvulele icala lobugebengu owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma ngokuhluleka ukulandela imiyalelo nokungafakazi ngoLwesine odlule.UZondo usho lokhu izolo, ngemva kokuba uZuma nethimba labameli ngoLwesine behambe ngaphandle kokuba abanikeze imvume.UZuma wahamba kulandela ukuchithwa kwesicelo sakhe sokuba uZondo angabi yingxenye yekhomishini uma esefakaza.UZuma wahamba ngesikhathi sekhefu letiye kwikhomishini wangabe esabuya.“Ukwenza kwakhe kungathumela umyalezo okungewona nakwabanye ofakazi abangathandisisi ukufakaza kwikhomishini. Bangacabanga ukuthi yinto efanele ukuvele uhambe nje unganikezwanga imvume.“Bangavele benze umathanda. Uma kwenzeka kanjalo le khomishini ngeke yakwazi ukusebenza kahle,” kusho uZondo.Uthe isenzo sikaZuma sizoba nomthelela ongemuhle ngokuthembeka kwekhomishini emphakathini nakwabezomthetho.Uthe uSolwazi Mosala makamvulele icala bese enikeza uphiko lwabashushisi iNational Prosecuting Authority, imininingwane ngokwenzeka ngoLwesine, uthe abanikeze ne-video yalokhu.UZondo uthe uzophinde akhiphe ezinye izinsuku uZuma okuzomele abuye azofakaza ngazo. Uthe uzonikezwa amanye amasamanisi, amphoqa ukuba azofakaza kwikhomishini.
title: UZuma engozini yokuvulelwa icala lobugebengu

text: UBHOKODE umlungu ongumqashi wakhe ngesiheshe sommese wasebhusha, wambulala umlisa waseHluhluwe ngemuva kokuhilizisana kubangwa umholo okuthiwa awumgculisi umsolwa.UMnuz Muziwendoda Sipho Dlamini (32), ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseHluhluwe ngoLwesine ebhekene necala lokubulala uMnuz Jan Snyman (28) oyindodana yomnikazi webhusha obebuye asize uma uyise engekho.Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba, uDlamini uvele wathatha isiheshe sommese wokusika inyama, wabhokoda indodana yomqashi wakhe amanxeba ayisikhombisa enhliziyweni.Kuthiwa imimese esebenza kule ndawo ibukhali ngendlela exakile njengoba ilolisiswa ngenhloso yokubenga inyama yokudayisa.Kuthiwa iphuthunyiswe esibhedlela indodana yomqashi kodwa kwayenela ngenxa yokugwazwa endaweni ebucayi. Kuthiwa idabule amafu isanda kugcagcelwa yisinqandamathe seminyaka.Leli phephandaba like labika ngezinsolo zokucwasa ngokwebala okuthiwa kuqhubeka kule ndawo njengoba kuthiwa abamnyama badayiselwa abamnyama kanjalo nabamhlophe bathenge kwabakubo.Phambili ngesikhathi Isolezwe ngeSonto lihambele leli bhusha liyophenya ngezinsolo zokucwasa, umufi akafunanga ukuphawula ngazo.Imithombo ithi indaba yeholo ibangwa nje kuvele kunokungaphatheki kahle kwabasebenzi abamnyama okuthiwa bayacwaswa.Kuthiwa bashintshwa njalo baxoshwe kuqashwe abanye ngaphandle kwesizathu.UDlamini uvele isikhashana enkantolo watshelwa ukuthi abuye ngoLwesine lapho sekuzokhulunywa khona indaba yebheyili yakhe. Ngesikhathi esenkantolo ubebukeka engaxwayile, edlubhe ijakhethi enkulu, ehudula ophaqa. Uze waqala ukuzisitha ngejakhethi esebona ukuthi uthwetshulwa izithombe.Abanye abantu abakhulume naleli phephandaba bengafuni ukudalulwa ngenxa yobucayi bodaba bathi, lokhu kuwuphawu lokuthi inkulu inkinga ekule ndawo.Bathe kufanele isukunyelwe indaba yobuhlanga ngoba kungagcina kukhona ukubukana ngeziqu zamehlo phakathi kwabezinhlanga.
title: Ubhokode umqashi wafa kubangwa umholo

text:
UMSAKAZI wezemidlalo kwiPower FM obengumngani omkhulu kaMandoza, uThabiso Mosia, udalule ukuthi umngani wakhe udlule enza amalungiselelo okushaya iculo nomrepha uKwesta noCassper Nyovest. UThabiso uveze lokhu ekhuluma izolo enkonzweni yesikhumbuzo kaMandoza eStandard Bank Arena, e-Ellis Park, eGoli.“UMandoza udlule emhlabeni eqhubeka esebenza. Kuneculo lakhe lokugcina alikhiphile elithi 
Ase Mang Le Mang.“Ngigcina ukukhuluma naye ngalo wayefuna ukulenza kabusha noKwesta noCassper ababona njengamaciko enza umsebenzi omuhle emculweni. Ngiyathemba-ke lapho akhona lawa maciko angizwile, alifeze iphupha likaMandoza,” usho kanje.UCassper noKwesta basematheni kulezi zinsuku emuva kokukhumbuza abantu izinsuku zeKwaito yakudala ngeculo labo 
iNgudu.Enkonzweni yesikhumbuzo bebephume ngobuningi babo abaculi beKwaito okubalwa kubo uKabelo Mabalane obephethe uhlelo, uTokollo, Brickz, Mapaputsi, Mshoza nabanye abaningi. Kule nkonzo uMandoza ushayelwe ihlombe kakhulu ngokuphakamisa indawo akhulele kuyo iZola, bethi wafaka ithemba entsheni eningi ukuthi nayo ingaphumelela. Owaba yimenenja yakhe yokuqala esangena endimeni, uVusi Leeuw, uthe lokhu kwaba yimpumelelo ngenxa yomculo wakhe abenza ngezibomu ukuthi kube ngowakhayo.“Sasihlele ukuthi umculo wakhe kube yilowo ozonyusa ithemba kubantu baseZola, abe yiqhawe labo. Sibona ukuthi saphumelela kuyo uma sibuka ukuthi mangaki manje amaciko aphuma eZola,” kushoa uLeew.Ekhuluma ngoMandoza uTokollo uthe uyakhumbula ingxoxo yabo yokugcina wayekhala ngezinhlungu ekhanda emcela ukuthi amazise ukuthi kubuhlungu kangakanani ukuhlinzwa ekhanda njengoba kuyinto aseke adlula kuyo.“Wangibuza ngodokotela wami owangiphatha kahle kakhulu ngenkathi ngilimale engozini yemoto. Noma kuyizinto ezingafani kodwa lokho kwangikhombisa ukuthi usenethemba,” kusho uTokollo.Lo mculi uphethe ngokudlulisa umyalezo wokuthi njengamaciko amadala eKwaito abawuboni lo mculo ufile, kunalokho usekhona nanamhlanje kodwa usuhlukile kancane.UMandoza uzofihlwa kusasa.
title: Ubezokwenza iculo noKwesta noNyovest

text: KUKHALWA nxazonke ngenxa yombhikisho wamalungu omphakathi waseMnambithi odonse amasonto amabili obekuhloswe ngawo ukuthi kukhishwe esikhundleni iMeya yase-Alfred Duma engafunwa uMnuz Vincent Madlala.UMadlala osolwa ngenkohlakalo nokubhebhethekisa udlame lwamatekisi endaweni, ugcine enikwe ikhefu lezinyanga ezimbili njengoba kusenziwa uphenyo ngezinsolo ezibhekiswe kuyena.Iningi labantu bakule ndawo abakhulume neSolezwe ngemuva kombhikisho bathi abafisi ukuthi kuphinde kube khona omunye umbhikisho ngenxa yokuthi lona osanda kuphela ubahlukumeze kakhulu.UNksz Zodwa Khumalo waseZakheni uthe into emphethe kabi kakhulu wukuthi abaqashi bebesebenzisa umgomo othi awuholi uma ungasebenzile.“Lo mbhikisho usihlukumeze kakhulu njengoba kade singakwazi ngisho nokuya emsebenzini, thina lapho sisebenza khona sihola ngesonto, bese kungamasonto amabili umuntu engaholi asikwazi nokukhokhela izikweletu zethu,” kusho uNksz Khumalo.Uthe into emphatha kabi kakhulu wukuthi ezimpini zepolitiki kugcina sekuhlukumezeka umphakathi ongazilutho.“Abantu abasuke belwa izimpi zabo basebenzisa umphakathi okuyiwona osuke ushisa amathayi uvala imigwaqo, ekugcineni ungatholi lutho,” kusho uNksz Khumalo.UMnuz Sanele Sishi waseSt Chads uthe bayafisa ukuthi umbhikisho ungaphinde ubekhona endaweni yabo.“Bekunzima kume yonke into thina esihamba ngamatekisi singakwazi kunyakaza ngenxa yalo mbhikisho, sibonga uNkulunkulu ukuthi akuzange kuphume sidumbu ngenxa yalo mbhikisho.Bekuphazamiseka ngisho nabantu abashonelwe ngoba izidumbu bezingalandeki emakhazeni zingahambiseki nasemakhaya ngoba bekuvalwe imigwaqo,” kusho uSishi.Osomabhizinisi bona bathi lo mbhikisho othathe cishe amasonto amabili ushaye kwezwela kubona njengoba bebengakwazi ukwenza inzuzo ngenxa yokuthi amabhizinisi abo abevalile nabantu bengezi edolobheni, ezokuthutha zingekho.UNksz Thandi Sibiya waseBergville odayisa izingubo ezngamasekeni edolobheni uthe bekunzima kakhulu kuyena njengoba kade bengasebenzi ngenxa yombhikisho.“Mina ngingowaseBergville kodwa ngiqashile eSteadville angazi ukuthi ngizoyikhokha ngani irenti njengoba ngihlale ekhaya cishe amasonto amabili ngingasebenzi, kuke kwakhona izinsuku engizilale ngingadlile ngenxa yokuthi ukudla bengingenakho endlini ngoba ngithembela kakhulu ekudayiseni ukuze ngikwazi ukuxosha ikati eziko,” kusho uNksz Sibiya.UGANDAGANDA ususa amatshe emgwaqweni emuva kokuthi kumiswe umbhikisho waseMnambithi obuvale thaqa idolobhaUNksz Susan Mkhize onendawo yokucwala izinwele uthe umbhikisho ushaye kwezwela kubona njengoba abantu bebengakwazi ukuya edolobheni.“Kumanje sixoxa nomasitende wethu siyamncenga ukuthi sicela asehlisele irenti okungenani sikhokhe irenti eyisigamu ngoba asikwazanga ukusebenza kahle kule nyanga ngenxa yombhikisho,” kusho uNksz Mkhize.Imenenja yakwaPep kuleli dolobha ekhuluma neSolezwe kodwa yacela ukuthi ingadalulwa ithe balahlekelwe kakhulu bengosomabhizinisi njengoba abantu bebengekho.“Enye inkinga wukuthi izindawo esisebenzela kuzona siziqashile, ekupheleni konyaka kulindeleke ukuba sikhokhe irenti emba eqolo kodwa asisebenzile,” kusho le menenja.Ngasohlangothi lwezemfundo, othisha bathi kuzoba nzima ukuthi bakwazi ukukhava isikhathi esimoshakele ngenxa yokuthi sebephinde bayalelwa ukuthi basheshe bavale ngenxa yegciwane iCorona.Uthishanhloko wasesikoleni samabanga aphezulu eZakheni okhulume neSolezwe kodwa wacela ukuthi angadalulwa ngenxa yokuthi akavumelekile ukukhuluma nabezindaba uthe bebezitshela ukuthi bazozama ukuphusha kuleli sonto njengoba bebuyile kodwa sebezophazanyiswa wukuthi sekuthiwe abasheshe bavale.“Angifuni ukuqamba amanga lo mbhikisho uzoba nomthelela omubi ngasohlangothini lwezemfundo ngenxa yesikhathi esimoshekile, kunomsebenzi onikwa wona kuthiwa kumele uwenze ube usuwuqedile emva kwesikhathi mhlawumbe amasonto ayisishiyagalombili, lowo msebenzi usuke ungeke ukwazi ukuwenza amasonto amane bese ucabanga ukuthi uwenze ngendlela,” kusho lo thishanhloko.Umfundi waseZakheni High uSbonga Hlongwa uthe amathemba abo sebewabeke kothisha ukuthi yibona abazobasiza bakwazi ukukhava isikhathi esimoshekile.“Nathi sizimisele ukuthi sibambisane nothisha ukuze sikwazi ukuvala isikhala sokungafundi esidalwe wumbhikisho,” kusho uHlongwa.Ngeledlule, uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala uveze ukuthi nguR30 million, obulahleka ngosuku ezinkampanini ezinkulu ezintathu kule ndawo ngenxa yalo mbhikisho.UZikalala uthe ngosuku abasebenzi bebelahlekelwa nguR2 million wemiholo.Indawo yaseMnambithi inezinkampani ezinkulu ezintathu okubalwa kuzo uDefy, Dunlop noLasher Tools ezifaka imali eningi emnothweni wesifundazwe nowezwe.Le ndawo imaphakathi neTheku neGauteng kanti ithathwe njengebalulekile emnothweni wezwe. Ukungabikhona kozinzo eMnambithi kushaya namanye amadolobha aseduze kwakhona okubalwa kuwo iBergville, Dundee neNewcastle.
title: Ugadle kwezwela umbhikisho eMnambithi

text: Nokubongwa PhenyaneUMHLELI womcimbi amaSABC Crown Gospel Music Awards uZanele LaMbokazi-Nkambule, uveze ukuthi bangu-150 abantu abazothamela bukhoma umcimbi wezindondo walo nyaka.Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi imiyalelo kahulumeni ayikuvumeli ukuhlangana kwabantu abaningi endaweni eyodwa ngenxa yeCovid-19.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uZanele uthe uzoqoshwa ngoNovemba 13 bese usakazwa kwithelevishini ngoNovemba 29, amathikithi okuwubuka asekhona.“Kuzongena ababe nenhlanhla yokuthola amathikithi okubuka umcimbi kuphela. Abalandeli bamaCrown mabalungise umswenko, bazilungiselele. Noma sibancane umswenko uzoba khona, izimoto zohlobo oluphambili ezihambisa izicukuthwane zizoba khona nabaculi abazonandisa bazobe bekhona,” kuchaza uZanele.Uthe okusha okuzoba khona kulo nyaka yisigaba somculo wendumiso lapho befuna ukujabulisa abangasayi enkonzweni.“Kulo nyaka besithi umcimbi ozoba khona ngowokumemezela abaqokiwe kuphela. Kodwa ngenxa yesililo savula isango lokuthi kube khona abazobuka umcimbi. Umcimbi siyowuvala ngomculo noDJ abahlukene bomculo wokholo,” kuchaza uZanele. Uthe amathikithi awekho e-computicket kodwa asemahhovisi eWorld Gospel Powerhouse noma abantu bashayele ku-081 8461 824.“Ngenxa yesimo esibhekene naso umcimbi uzoqoshwa ngoNovemba 13 eThe Station Venue ngaseDurban Station, eThekwini. Abazothenga amathikithi kumele bafike ngo-12 emini ngosuku okuzoqoshwa ngalo umcimbi. Ngalolu suku sizophinde sikhulekele isimo esikuso,” kuchaza yena. Isiqubulo salo nyaka uthe sithi #StillWePraise. Uthe bayabonga ngesasasa elikhonjiswe ngabaculi bowokholo njengoba bengaphezu kuka-300 abangenele. Uthe umcimbi wokumemezela abaqokiwe uzoba ngo-Okthoba 19.
title: Usuzothanyelwa bukhoma owamaCrown

text: UKHALA ngesandla semfene ebandleni lakhe ufata osolwa amalungu ebandla ngokuhlambalaza ashumayele ngocansi, aqonywe abandleni acwile nasezinkambeni zikaFaro.UFata Mhlengi Ngcobo obhekele isikole samantombazane i-Albino nemishini yaseNtshongweni, nebandla laseShongweni Dam, uthi kunzima ukuba ngufata ngoba wazi izimfihlo angeke azidalule nokumenza angathandeki kwabanye abazalwane.UNgcobo ozohlanganisa iminyaka ewu-10 ewufata waqala ukuphatha e-Albino ngo-2016. Kuthiwa sekuphele iminyaka emibili engayenzi imibiko ngemali yebandla kunalokho uhlala enemali yokuphuza nokuzikhipha namantombazane.Amalungu ebandla aveze nokuthi uke wagingqa imoto nyakenye wangalala emishini nokusolwa ukuthi wayeboshiwe. UNgcobo uthe uyamazi umzalwane ombheca ngobende inyama engayidlanga. “Sengiyabona ukuthi ngumuntu oyedwa okhuluma lezi zinto, sebengamseka abanye ngoba bemzwela. Imoto yabhajwa ngoba kunezinkungu ngangingadakiwe,” kusho uNgcobo. Eqhuba uthe kunabantu okungabikwa kubona ebandleni uma ephula imithetho kodwa abakaze babikelwe.“ Inkinga inomuntu oyedwa onenkinga nami osefaka abazalwane ngoba sengazi imfihlo ngaye. Ucabanga ukuthi izoshintsha nendlela ebengimbuka ngayo ngoba senginemininingwane emhlambalazayo njengomuntu ohlonishwayo. Ubona sengathi sengimahlulele kanti angikwazi ukwenze njalo futhi akuvumelekile. Bengivele ngiyazi le nto, nangoLwesibili sizoba nomhlangano namadoda ebandla awazazi lezi zinto. Uma umuntu enenkinga kumele angafaki ibandla. Akaqondane nami, angaphazamisi ibandla,” kusho uNgcobo.Izolo leli phephandaba lihambele ibandla, lamfica uNgcobo ephethe inkonzo ebizwakala ijwayelekile yize ebebuye athi abantu abaziphathe kahle ngoba bazobe sebethi uluhlaza.Uveze nokuthi ukube unomuntu wesimame athandana naye ngabe uyamkhulumela kodwa uzothula ngoba uwufata.Lokhu uthe ubekusho ngoba abantu banendlela abafuna abefundisi baphile ngayo kodwa bona benza noma kanjani kubefundisi. Mayelana nokuphuza uthe akuyona imfihlo.“Vele ngokujwayelekile singabefundisi siyaphuza noma kunemcimbi. Ngiyajabula ngoba abantu basebandleni bakhule ngokwanele bayazi ukuthi ngiyaphuza. Sekukhona nentombazane encane okuthiwa ngithandana nayo, angazi noma isiyazi yini. Anginqabi ukuboniswa. Ngizokwamukela noma yini nokushintshwa ngikulungele,” kusho uNgcobo.
title: UFata uphika izinsolo zokuqonywa ebandleni

text:
EMVA kwezinyanga kunamahlebezi okuthi iMeya yaseThekwini izoboshwa, igcine iboshiwe ngoLwesibili njengoba ivele eNkantolo yamaCala eMali ngaphambi kokudedelwa ngebheyili kaR50 000.UNkk Zandile Gumede ubekwe icala lokukhwabanisa nenkohlakalo mayelana nethenda kaR45 million yokuqoqwa kukadoti. Uboshwe nabanye ababili. Ukuboshwa kukaNkk Gumede kwengeza ezintweni ezidicilela phansi isithunzi sikaMasipala waseThekwini kusukela aphatha leli dolobha ngo-2016. Kuqale kwahlupha iqembu losomabhizinisi mbumbulu ebelifuna amathenda ngenkani, iDelangokubona.Kwalandela izikhawu eziningi zokungaqoqwa kukadoti ngendlela, ikakhulukazi, emalokishini. Kuthe kusanjalo, kwaba nezikhawu zokudliwa komhlaba ngokungemthetho.Kube nesiteleka sabantu abasebenza ophikweni lokuqoqwa kukadoti, abebekhala ngokukhushulelwa kwemali kozakwabo abangama-MK Veterans abasuselwe imiholo kuGrade 4 yayiswa kuGrade-10.Lesi siteleka sishubise izinto sekusele izinsukwana kube nokhetho lukazwelonke obelungoMeyi 8, kwavalwa imigwaqo, kwachithwa udoti edolobheni. Ushaya phansi ngonyawo, uNkk Gumede, uthi akayi ndawo yize kungaqondakali ukuthi uzosebenza kanjani njengoba imbandela yebheyili imnqinde amandla.Selokhu kwaqala ukuboshwa kweziMeya zikaKhongolose, le nhlangano yathatha isinqumo sokungazimisi ngoba ithi izinika izinsuku ezingu-14 ukuthi zizisulele zona okuthi uma kungenzeki lokho bese yona ikhipha isinqumo emva kwezinsuku ezingu-30.Asisazi isizathu esenza i-ANC yenze kanjena kodwa esikwaziyo ukuthi lowo mgomo uzophazamisa ukusebenza kweTheku uma uzosetshenziswa nakuNkk Gumede.Abamvikelayo bazothi umuntu umsulwa kuze kube utholakala enecala futhi bazothi amacala abhekene nawo awabucayi ukudlula awezinye izimeya ezibhekene nawokubulala.I-ANC kumele ibone ukuthi yenze njani ngawo kodwa kuyadingeka ithathe isinqumo esizobuyisa isithunzi sikaMasipala weTheku futhi iqinisekise ukulethwa kwezidingo ngokususa uNkk Gumede esikhundleni kuze kuphothulwe icala.- 
UMBONO WEPHEPHANDABA
title: [IMIBONO] Mayishenxe iMeya ibhekane namacala ayo

text: USiya wase-Orlando East, eSoweto, ubonakala emidlalweni ehamba phambili manje okukhona kuyo iThe River, Grassroots ekhonjiswa ku-1Magic (103).Ubonakala futhi emdlaweni ekuMzansi Magic othi Impilo-The Scam neThe Republic kuMzansi Magic (161).Uthe kuyamjabulisa yize eke waba kweminye imidlalo angagqamanga kuyo.“Ngijabule ngendlela izinto ezenzeka ngayo manje ngoba akwandele bani ukubonakala emidlalweni eminingi kangaka. Indawo kaNjabulo engiyilingisa kwiThe River ngayizwa ngomunye wabangani bami ngase ngithi angihambe ngiyozama inhlanhla kwinhlolokhono ngempela bangithatha. Ngaphinde ngezwa ngalezi ezinye izindawo ngakujabulela ukuthathwa kuzona ngangayibona inkinga yokuthi ngibe kuyona yonke imidlalo njengoba isikhathi sokuqopha sasingashayisani,” kusho uSiya.Ungene ekulingiseni emuva kokushiya phansi umculo okuyinto ayezifela ngayo.“Elokishini ngikhule ngithanda umculo futhi ngaziwa ngokucula. Ngaqeda isikole ngaqhubeka nokufundela wona umculo. Ekhaya singumndeni ogxile kakhulu kweza-maciko. Ngo-2011 uthando lokulingisa lwafika kimina futhi ngaqala ngayofunda ngemidlalo yeshashalazi kwaze kwaba ngithola indawo yami yokuqala ngo-2016 emdlalweni Isibaya.”Uthe abantu abalindele lukhulu ngoba kusekuningi akuhlelile.“Uma ungumlingisi kukhona izindawo ozibukela kude kodwa enhliziyweni ufise ukusheshe uzilingise. Kimina lezo zindawo zisheshe zafika njengoba kumanje ngiyisigebengu emidlalweni emithathu, kwiThe River ngilingisa isitabane okungelula ukuyilingisa ngoba ingakudalela ugazi nenzondo kubantu abahlukene ngendlela oyilingisa ngayo.”
title: Akwandele bani ukubonakala emidlalweni engaka: Siya

text: UMinnie uthi kube uhambo olungelula obelumfakela ingcindezi ngezinye izikhathi.“Ekugcineni ngijatshuliswa ukuthi lezi zigcobo sezikhona, ngithokozile kakhulu. Yize bekunzima futhi kuthathe isikhathi eside kodwa imiphumela iyajabulisa ngempela, abantu kumele bazi ukuthi angibadayiseli nje imikhiqizo engingayazi, nami imbala ngiyisebenzisile futhi imiphumela yayo iyamangalisa,” kuchaza uMinnie.Uthe le mikhiqizo isikhona kwezinye zezitolo zakwaClicks kuleli.“Ngiyabonga kakhulu uthando abantu abangikhombise lona ngesikhathi ngimemezela lezi zindaba, kusho lukhulu kimina,” kuchaza yena.Iningi labantu limjabulele uMinnie ngokukhipha le mikhiqizo, lincoma indlela ebukeka ngayo.Kunconywe futhi nokuthi le mikhiqizo ayibizi, ngeke ize idle ephaketheni lamuntu, izothengwa yiwona wonke umuntu wakuleli oyithandayo.UMinnie umemezela lo mkhiqizo nje, intokazi engumethuli wezinhlelo nomlingisi, uBonnie Mbuli usanda kumemezela iziphaqulo zakhe azenze nenkampani enkulu yaseLondon, yakwaYardley.Nazo iziphaqulo zale ntokazi zathandwa ngabaningi ngoba kazidli kakhulu ephaketheni.Kwabanye bosaziwayo bakuleli abanemikhiqizo yabo, kukhona uConnie Ferguson noBoity Thulo.
title: Ithakaselwe imikhiqizo yokugcoba kaMinnie

text: UKUDLULA emhlabeni kukamakadebona womlingisi wodumo kuMuvhango, uCecilia “Candy” Mukondeleli Moloi, kufane nokungqongqa kwenqolobane yamagugu eLimpopo.Lokhu kushiwo nguNdunankulu wesifundazwe, uStan Mathabatha, noNgqongqoshe wezobuCiko, amaSiko nezeMidlalo kuzwelonke, uNathi Mthethwa, ezitatimendeni abazikhiphe ngokulandelana.UCandy (67), owaduma ngokulingisa indawo kaVho-Makhadzi kuMuvhango, ushonele esibhedlela sasePretoria ngoLwesibili emuva kokungeniswa khona exinwe yisifo somdlavuza, obesekuneminyaka ewa evuka naso.Isitatimende esikhishwe ngokhulumela umndeni wakwaMoloi nowakwaRamonenyiwa, uBerry Ramonenyiwa, uhambe emhlabeni ngezikhathi zantambama.URamonenyiwa uchaze uCandy njengomuntu obenesihe owavumbulula inqwaba yamakhono ngenkampani yakhe iCandy Moloi Productions.UCandy, owake waba nguthisha nomsakazi, wahlabana ngomklomelo weBest Supporting Actress kumaSouth African Film and Television Awards ngo-2009 ngenxa yesinwe ekulingiseni indawo kaMakhadzi.Ngaphandle koMuvhango, uCandy ubuye wadlala indawo kaFhatu Neluvhola kwiThola ngo-2004, waba nguMaModumedi kwiDeath of a Queen ngo-2008, walingisa indawo kaGranny Rambau kwiRing of Lies, walingisa ekaMakhadzi kwiStokvel nekaVjo-Phophi Baloyi kwiGiyani.Ubengunina kaLerato Zah Moloi owayelingisa indawo kaRefiloe kuMuvhango noTshepo Moloi.Phakathi kwabantu abadlulise amazwi enduduzo kubalwa uFlorence Masebe owayenguHumbulani kuMuvhango othe “Kufa awunamahloni.”Nenkakha yomsakazi, uTim Modise, ithe uCandy wavula iminyango futhi wasusa imigoqo ukuvulela abanye abeza ngemuva kwakhe amathuba endimeni yezokusakaza nakweyozokukhangisa.”Nomholi we-One People Movement, uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, Rami Chuene, Masasa Mbangeni, Penny Lebyane noThandi Matlala abasalanga kubantu ababhodle emswaneni ngokuwa kwalo muthi omkhulu.Umndeni ucele umphakathi ukuba uwubekezelele futhi uqonde ukuthi wehlelwe yinkinga kunemithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe okuhloswe ngayo ukunqanda ukubhebhetheka kweCorona.Yize eshonele eGauteng kodwa uthe uzofihlelwa emathuneni aseThohoyandou.*UCandy ulandele ezithendeni zomlingisi weSkeem Saam, uKarabo “Jazzy T” Mokhobela, odlule emhlabeni ngeSonto. Naye ubelandela uMary “MaMpinga” Twala, * -Allen Booi, Elize Cawood, Moonyeenn Lee nabanye.
title: Umlingisi oshonile   ubeyinqolobane

text: YIZE umlingisi waseMgungundlovu ejabule ngokuqhakambisa iNingizimu Afrika phesheya kwezilwandle, kodwa akaneme ngokuqhubeka kodlame lobulili kuleli.UThuso usanda kuqokwa emunxeni we-African Social Star of 2020 kuma-E! People’s Choice Awards, lapho eqhathwe khona nomculi uSho Madjozi, Zozibini Tunzi, Elsa Majimbo, Dimma Umeh, Wian van den Berg, Karl Kugelman noLydia Forson.Uthe abusehli ubuthongo kuyena ngenxa yezigameko ezihlasimulisa umzimba.“Noma kungakaze kwenzeke kimi kodwa bakhona abangani bami abangishiyile emhlabeni ngenxa yalezi zehlakalo. Kukhona umngani wami oseyintandane emuva kokuba uyise abulala unina.”Uthe kufanele kusukunywe kuliwe nalesi sihlava ngoba sihlalisa umphakathi ovalweni.“Ngiyazwelana nabantu asebeke babhekana nalolu dlame. Ukuhlukumezeka komunye umuntu kuphatha kabi abanye ngisho bengahlangene nalokho.“Akumnandi ukuphucwa komunye umuntu umphefumulo,” kusho uThuso osanda kunconywa yiphephabhuku lase-England, iVogue UK.“Wayetuswa ngendawo ayilingisa emdlalweni obuqoshwa phesheya osihloko sithi Underground Railroad. Lo mlingisi, oseqokwe kwaze kwaba kabili kuma-International Emmy Awards ngendawo kaWinnie abeyilingisa kwi-Is’thunzi, uthe ubengakulindele ukuqokwa kuma-E! People’s Choice Awards.“Bengizihlalele nje, ngizinakele izinto zami ngesikhathi ngitshelwa ukuthi ngiqokwe kulo mqhudelwano.Kuthe sengibona nabantu engiqhathwe nabo, ngatshela abaphathi bami ukuthi bangifake baze bangigxisha impela kubantu asebesebenze kakhulu kunami.”Ube esenxusa abantu ukuba bamvotele ngobuningi babo ukuze indondo ize eNingizimu Afrika, ikakhulukazi KwaZulu-Natal njengoba kunguye kuphela ovela kulesi sifundazwe.Ukuvota kuqalile kuTwitter nakwi-website ethi: www.pca.eonline.com/af futhi kuvalwa ngo-Okthoba 23. I-hashtag kaThuso ithi #ThusoMbedu #AfricanSocialStar at the E! People’s Choice Awards! #PCAs.Sekungokwesibili kuba nomunxa ongenelwa ngosaziwayo base-Afrika namaphethelo. Nyakenye indondo ye-African Influencer of 2019 yazibulwa ngumethuli wezinhlelo wakuleli, uBonang Matheba.Abantu bavota kuze kube yizikhawu ezingu25 ngosuku kuTwitter nakwi-website. Ngemininingwane egcwele ungangena [email protected] (Instagram) naku-EEntertainmentAF (Facebook).Ama-E! People’s Choice Awards azosakazwa kwi-E! kusukela ngoNovemba 15, okuyoqala ngeRed Carpet ngo2 ekuseni bese umcimbi uba ngo-4 ekuseni. Lo mcimbi uyophindwa nangakusasa ngoNovemba 16 ngo9.30 ebusuku.
title: UThuso umele iKZN kuma-E! People's Choice Awards

text: ISOUTH African Chamber of Commerce and Industry (SACCI) igqugquzele osomabhizinisi ukuba benze isiqiniseko sokuthi izitifiketi ezikubeka ngokusobala ukuthi impahla yabo yenziwe kuphi bazithola ezinhlanganweni ezinemvume yokwenza lo msebenzi.Isikhulu esiphezulu seSACCI, uMnuz Alan Mukoki senze isimemezelo emuva kokuthola izikhalo zokuthi kunezitifiketi zomkokotelo ezithi impahla ikhiqizwa eNingizimu Afrika kodwa ezisetshenziselwa ukuqola osomabhizinisi abathenga impahla yakwamanye amazwe.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba uMukoki uthe uMnyango wezoHwebo neziMboni ucele iSACCI ukuthi iqinise umthetho wokukhishwa kwalezi zitifiketi bese ivulela amacala abakhiqiza ezomkokotelo.Isikhulu esiphezulu seDurban Chamber of Commerce and Industry uNkk Palesa Phili sithe banomlando weminyaka wokukhiqiza lezi zitifiketi ezisiza osomabhizinisi ukuthi badayise impahla yabo kwamanye amazwe.“IDurban Chamber iyilungu leSACCI nele-International Chamber of Commerce (ICC) ngakho inelungelo lokukhiqiza lezi zitifiketi ezenza ofuna ukudayisa impahla kwamanye amazwe kwaziwe ukuthi ukhiqiza impahla esemthethweni kuleli. Kubalulekile ukuthi osomabhizinisi babe nezitifiketi eziqinisekisa ukuthi impahla yabo ikhiqizwe kuleli ngoba abathenga impahla kwamanye amazwe bafuna ukwazi ukuthi kulandelwe imigomo efanele uma ikhiqizwa nokuthi konke okuthinta leyo mpahla kusemthethweni,” kusho uNkk Phili.Udonse ngendlebe osomabhizinisi ukuthi beze kwiDurban Chamber uma bedinga izitifiketi ngoba zibalulekile ekuthuthukisweni komnotho.UNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha neMvelo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala ubonge iDurban Chamber ngokukhiqiza lezi zitifiketi, esho nokuthi zibalulekile kwezohwebo ngoba zikhombisa ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ikhiqiza impahla esezingeni lomhlaba.“Sibonga iDurban Chamber ukuthi ikhiqiza lezi zitifiketi eziqinisekisa ukuthi impahla yakuleli ethunyelwa kwamanye amazwe isezingeni lomhaba. Kubalulekile ukuthi osomabhizinisi bethu bahwebelane namanye amazwe ngoba kukhula umnotho waKwaZulu-Natal nowaseNingizimu Afrika uma, kungena imali yakwamanye amazwe. Kuphinde kuthuthuke umkhakha wokukhiqiza impahla, ezobuchwepheshe kuthuthukiswe nengqalasizinda uma sihwebelana namanye amazwe,” kusho uZikalala.
title: Kuxwayiswa ngezitifiketi zomkokotelo emabhizinisini

text: ISIPHINDE yagadla iPremier Soccer League (PSL) kuMaZulu FC iwashiya ebumnyameni ngenkundla okumele ayisebenzise uma esebhekene ne-Orlando Pirates kwi-quarterfinal yeTelkom Knockout ngempelasonto ezayo.Usuthu ludlala imidlalo yasekhaya eKing Zwelithini eMlaza nokuyilapho uwonkewonke obulindele ludibane khona nePirates.Ohlwini lwemidlalo yeTelkom kwi-website yePSL kodwa kuthiwa Usuthu luzodlala ePrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu.UBrilliant Mkhathini okhulumela Usuthu uthe abayazi bona indaba yasePrincess Magogo.“IPSL isitshela ukuthi imiswe kabi abaxhasi, iTelkom. Ithi abaxhasi bakhala ngokuphepha enkundleni iKing Zwelithini. Asicaciselwe namanje ukuthi bakhuluma ngani ngempela noma bakhuluma ngabalandeli abahlala othangweni ngakujantshi? Asazi. Sesiwayise womathathu amaqembu amakhulu eMlaza. Sidlalile neKaizer Chiefs, yiyo iPirates kabili neMamelodi Sundowns kade siyiphindisele khona eMlaza maduze. Ngeke ngithi sisebumnyameni ngoba siyazazi sidlala eKing Zwelithini. Mhlawumbe yiyo iPSL esebumyameni,” kusho uMkhathini.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, akukapheli ngisho inyanga Usuthu luphucwe amaphuzu ayisithupha nokulushovele emsileni we-log. Okwamaphuzu kulamana eduze nokuqopha umlando ngokuhlawuliswa imali enkulu ukwedlula yonke emlandweni wePSL, egaklazwa uR640 000 ngemuva kokulahlwa yicala lokudlonga kwabaladeli balo eMlaza lwehlulwa yiSundowns ngesizini edlule.Leso sigwebo sifike Usuthu lusakhihlwa esikaNandi ngokukhishwa kwi-top8 obeluqede kuyo ngesizini edlule.UMkhathini ugwinye amagama ebuzwa ngelokuboshelwa amanqina enyathi.“Asazi nathi. Kungcono ubuze yona iPSL. Alikho iqembu elilandela imithetho neliqikelela ezokuphepha enkundleni njengathi. Ngikhuluma nje kunecala eliqhubekayo ngemuva kokuba sathatha izinyathelo ezinqala sasiza ekuboshweni kwabantu ababedayisa amathikithi omgunyathi eThekwini. Ngokungenelela kwethu babanjwa kwaze kwavundululwa nemishini abayisebenzisayo. Alikho iqembu eselike lenza lokho,”kusho uMkhathini.Ukulandelana kwalezi zigameko kukhomba ukuthi AmaZulu aqhelelene nokuthula kule sizini.Kubenzima ukuthola ukuphawula kwePSL izolo kwazise bebematasa nomdlalo womkhaya baseSoweto, phakathi kwePirates neChiefs.ULuxolo September okhulumela iPSL ufonelwe kaningi engaphenduli.
title: USuthu komunye umdonsiswano nePSL

text: I-POLOKWANE City ayiphumeli obala ngesinqumo esicacisa ngekusasa likaRodney Ramagalela omiswe yileli qembu ngezizathu ezingaqondakali.Ngenyanga edlule iRise and Shine ihlalele amacala alo mdlali emsola kuwo ngokungazinikeli ngokuphelele emsebenzini nokungalubhadi emhlanganweni ayebizelwe kuwo.Kulokhu kuqulwa kwecala lakhe wayemelwe yi-agent yakhe uMike Makaab neSouth African Football Players Union (Safpu). Umiswe ngoJanuwari ngemuva kokuba esayine inkontileka yesikhashana neHighlands Park.UCalvin Motloung oyiphini likanobhala kwiSafpu utshele Isolezwe ukuthi kuze kube yimanje iPolokwane ayikaze ibazise ngesinqumo sayo ngoRamagalela.Uthe empeleni bekumele ibatshele emasontweni edlule ukuthi iyayinqamula noma cha inkontileka yalo mdlali.“Siyayibona le nto eyenziwa iPolokwane, izama ukuchitha isikhathi. Ziyancipha izinyanga ezibheke ekupheleni kwesizini. Ifuna ukumkhokhela imali yezinyanga ezimbalwa. Uma kuphela isonto elizayo ingacacisi kuzophoqeleka ukuthi sithathe ezinye izinyathelo. Saluqeda lulo daba thina, konke kusele ngakuyo,” kubeka uMotloung.Lesi sikhulu siveze ukuthi nakuba emisiwe uRamagalela kodwa uwuthola uphelele umholo wakhe.Lo mdlali odabuka eLimpopo umiswe yiRise and Shine esedlale imidlalo engu-16. Kuyo uvalele phakathi amagoli amabili, wakhanda ayisibalo esifanayo.“Kwinkontileka kaRamagalela kunezivumelwano ezithi uma ehlelwe yifomu kumele kutholwe inkinga yakhe futhi alekelelwe. Okunye ukuthi uma kwenzeka ekhuluphala kumele aqeqeshwe ngendlela ehlukile ezomsiza. Ngaphandle kwalokhu sithole ukuthi kuningi okungahanjiswanga ngendlela efanele ngesikhathi emiswa. Ngabe siyezwa ukuthi kwinkontileka kwakuvunyelwane ngokuthi uma engawashayi amagoli ayisibalo esithile ngemuva kwemidlalo ethize kumele abekwe icala lokungazimiseli,” kubeka uMotloung.Kwamanye amacala, uveze ukuthi ngoMashi 20 bazohlalela udaba lukaMothusi Gopane ofuna ukukhokhelwa imali yakhe yiMbombela United edlala kwiNational First Division (NFD).UMotloung uthe iMbombela inqamule ikontileka yalo mdlali isasele ngezinyanga eziyisithupha. Iyinqamule ngoba ikhala ngokuthi akazimiseli emsebenzini wakhe. Lesi sikhulu siveze ukuthi ngemuva kokuvalela ekhoneni iqembu ligcine lilivuma icala lalo lase licela ukuthi likhokhele uGopane uhhafu. Lo mdlali uthi uyifuna iphele imali yakhe.Elinye icala elizoqulwa ngosuku olufanayo ngeliphakathi kwePolokwane nonozinti uHarold Ndlovu okhononda ngokunganyuswa komholo wakhe kusukela efikile kuleli qembu.UMotloung uthe kwinkontileka yalo nozinti kwakuvunyelwene ngokuthi iholo lakhe lizokhushulwa ngo-10% njalo uma kuqala isizini.Kukhona necala likaDavid Zulu ozakhele udumo kuKaizer Chiefs ofuna imali yakhe kwiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila eyanqamula inkontileka yakhe. Ngesifanayo nakuSiyabulela Shai okhala ngokungakhokhelwa yileli qembu laseLimpopo.
title: Ayicacisi ngekusasa likaRamagalela iCity

text: I-ANC inemihlangano nezinhlaka ezehlukene eMandeni ukuthola isixazululo enkingeni yemibhikisho eholele ekushisweni kwamafemu aKwaSithebe.Selokhu kuqale imibhikisho ngesonto eledlule, amaphoyisa asebophe abantu abawu-15 ababekwe icala lokudala udlame emphakathini.Abantu baseMandeni bathi abayifuni iMeya yabo uMnuz Sphesihle Zulu abayisola ngenkohlakalo yize umasipala wabo udume ngokuthola umbiko omuhle kumcwaningi mabhuku.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, u-Adv Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, uthe ubuholi benhlangano bunemihlangano nezinhlaka ezithintekayo odabeni lwaseMandeni.“Imihlangano isaqhubeka nakuleli sonto ukuze sithole umnyombo walo mbhikisho bese siza nesixazululo. Siyacela abantu bangashisi impahla uma kukhona abanganeme ngakho kodwa baxoxe nathi,” kusho u-Adv Simelane-Zulu.UMnuz Bonga Mchunu, we-IFP eMandeni, ucele i-ANC ukuthi ilusukumele udaba ngoba amalungu ayo ashisa amafemu yize ekhala ngeMeya yenhlangano.“Uma kushiswa amafemu abantu abangenacala baphelelwa wumsebenzi. Asikwazi ukushiselwa amafemu sibe sigqugquzela abatshalizimali ukuthi beze ezweni lethu,” kusho uMchunu.UNkk Sitandiwe Dimba obhekelele ezokuxhumana nokukhangisa ebhange Ithala, uthe kushiswe ifemu eyodwa kwacekelwa phansi amabili esizindeni samafemu KwaSithebe.Uthe kusahlolwa ukuze kutholakale ukuthi kudaleke umonakalo ongabiza malini. Amafemu avaliwe okwamanje kuze kube isimo sibuyela kwesijwayelekile.Uthe bandise onogada namaphoyisa agcwele emafemini aKwaSithebe kuya nasenxanxatheleni yezitolo.
title: Imizamo yokuletha ukuthula eMandeni

text: KUBIKWA ukuthi izingqungqulu zaseThekwini zomculo wekwaito zivusa iBig NUZ. Ngokomthombo osondelene noMzi ‘Danger’ Mkhwanazi weBig NUZ, L’vovo Derrango noDJ Tira bamatasatasa estudiyo baqopha izingoma ezizosanganisa abathandi bomculo wekwaito.“Ngisola ukuthi bavusa iBig NUZ ngesitayela ngoba bashaya ngesigqi sayo. Kushoda uMampintsha. Sengike ngayizwa enye ingoma abayiphekayo ethi Gevaar...Bayachoma ngempela kuyo. Ngikhuluma nje balungiselela ukuyocula eYadini ngoMashi 25,” kusho umthombo.Ethintwa uDanger uthe akasoze avusa iBig NUZ ngaphandle kukaMampintsha kodwa bangahlala phansi naye babonisane ngokuthi i-albhamu izophuma ngaphansi kwenkampani kabani njengoba bobabili benezinkampani okuyiWest Ink ne-108 Entertainment.“Mina njengamanje ngimatasatasa ngikhulisa inkampani yami i-108 Entertainment.”Ebuzwa uDanger ukuthi inkampani yakhe izobe igabe ngabaphi abaculi uthe ufihle induku emqubeni. “Bakhona abaculi engizobethula ngokusemthethweni emphakathini uma sekufike isikhathi.”Ebuzwa uTira ngeqembu uphike walala ngomhlane. “Ayikho nje leyo nto. Thina sisalekelela uDanger njengoba kukhona akuqalayo futhi kunabaculi abaningi azobapika.” UL’vovo uvele wahleka kakhulu.“Yebo siyasebenza noDanger njengoba sizwana. Siyasizana emsebenzini wakhe. Nami ngiphezu kweyami iCD ezophuma ekupheleni konyaka ngakho akukho qembu engingena kulo,” kusho uL’vovo.Kubuyelwa emthombeni uthe baphika ubala nje ngoba yinto ekhona lena. “ Bayazi nabo ukuthi ayisekho indaba yeBig NUZ njengoba noMampintsha esebonakale kaningi ecula yedwa. Nase-Afro bafuna ukuqhamuka neqembu elizogqama ngenxa yokuthi akekho njengamanje umculi oshisa izikhotha. UTipcee akakangeni kahle kubantu futhi akakaqashwa kakhulu eyedwa. Banethemba lokuthi leli qembu lizofaka imali enkampanini,” kuphetha umthombo.UL’vovo noTira bebevamise ukubamba iqhaza kwiBig NUZ. UTira ubevala isikhala sikamufi uR Mashesha esagula kuthi uL’vovo avale esikaMampintsha uma kuyoculwa phesheya ngenxa yokuthi ubesaba ukugibela ibhanoyi.Kwenzeka lokhu nje uMampintsha noTira basanda kugxekana esidlangalaleni kubangwa yona iBig NUZ.Selokhu kwadlula uR Mashesha emhlabeni izinto aziphindanga zafana.
title: Izinsolo zokuvuswa kwenye iBig NUZ entsha

text: ‘IBHOLA lizobulala abantu abaningi kule mpelasonto. Ukufa kwangempela. Bazophela abantu, kukhona abazolala bengadlile,” la mazwi ashiwo yisilomo somqeqeshi, uKgoloko Thobejane, obenikeza umhlahlo wakhe ngemidlalo yokusonga isizini ka-2018/2019 ye-Absa Premiership.Yonke imidlalo eyisishiyagalombili iqala ngo-3 ezinkundleni ezahlukene kanti izodlala ngaphansi kwefu elimnyama kwazise iMamelodi Sundowns esesicongweni ibambene ngezihluthunePremier Soccer League ifuna iphucwe amaphuzu ngokudlalisa uWayne Arendse kungafanele ibhekene neBidvest Witsngo-Okthoba.UDominic Chimhavi weSafa utshele Isolezwe ngoMgqibelo kuzodlalwa udaba lungaxazululiwe ngoba lufike kubo isikhathi sesisincane.URonnie Schloss wePSL uthe imidlalo izoqhubeka ngendlela okuhlelwe ngayo, banikwe labo abawinile. Uthe akakwazi ukuphawula ngecala elingekho ezandleni zakhe.Yize iphephandaba lihoshe ukuthi iPolokwane City iya kwi-Orlando Pirates e-Orlando Stadium nesikwati esintekenteke, uThobejane, ozakhele udumo esacija iBaroka FC kwiPremiership, ufa neSundowns edlala neFree State Stars eGoble Park.“Esicongweni, iSundowns angiyiboni ixhilwa yiFree State Stars kanti iPirates ngakolunye uhlangothi inomdlalo onzima kakhulu kwiPolokwane City. Empeleni ngiyibona iPirates ibhekene nomdlalo ofanayo kwiCity nalowo ewuthole kwiCape Town City ngesonto eledlule.“Yiqembu eliya phambili iCity kangangoba uyazi ukuthi emdlalweni wabo bazoyithinta inethi yakho. Umbuzo ukuthi wena uzimisele kangakanani ukufika kweyabo. Uma udlala neCity nidlala umaphekana kuze kuyovalwa.”Emsileni lapho uThobejane anamva aphathekayo okuyibamba khona kwazise ubuyise iBaroka emidlalweni yokuhlunga ngo-2017, uthe umdlalo wesonto uphakathi kweqembu lakhe elidala neMaritzburg United eya e-Old Peter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane ibambe amabhuleki kwi-log.“Hhaaa! Lowo, ngumdlalo wamanqamu lowo. Asenhlanhleni la maqembu ngokudlala womabili ekubeni evika. Womabili ayazi ukuthi ozohlulwa lapho uyaminza. Yebo iBaroka izosinda uma bedlala ngokulingana kodwa akukho ukudlalela iphuzu ngoba kungenzeka izithole isemidlalweni yokuhlunga uma yenza njalo.“IMaritzburg isenhlanhleni ngoba iyazi ukuthi ukuvika ukuya ngqo ehlathini, kufanele izishayela iBaroka. Isingamincela nje ukuthi kuwabhedele la maqembu angenhla kwayo kube yiwo aya kweyokuhlunga,” kusho uThobejane.IBaroka baqhelelene ngamaphuzu amabili. Uma iMaritzburg ithatha amathathu izonyukela kwangu-29 nokusho ukushovela iBaroka ezansi.Amanye amaqembu avika izembe - iChippa United, Free State neBlack Leopards - anamphuzu angu-27 ngokwehlukana.
title: Kukhona abazolala bengadlile ngenxa yebhola ngale mpelasonto: Thobejane

text: UMHOLI weDA KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango usephumele obala wathi weseka uNksz Mbali Ntuli, kwesokuhola iqembu kuzwelonke.Engxoxweni neSolezwe izolo, uMncwango uthe kubenzima ukuthatha lesi sinqumonjengoba uNksz Ntuli noMnuz John Steenhuisen abanga naye, bephuma KwaZulu-Natal.“Mina angikaze ngibe ngumholi ongaphumeli obala, lezo zinto zenziwa ngoMnuz David “DD” Mabuza we-ANC, kodwa kumele ngikusho ukuthi kona bekuyisinqumo esinzima impela ukusithatha. Ngibheke izinto eziningi, ngabheka nesincomo sokuqala esasenza njengeqembu ngemva kokhetho esithi kumele sibuyekeze ubuholi beqembu. Ngithe uma ngibheka ngabona ukuthi uNksz Ntuli uyisithombe sekusasa leqembu,” kusho uMncwango.Uqhube wathi uNksz Ntuli nguyena ongakwazi ukutholela iqembu amavoti kuzona zonke izinhlanga lapha eNingizimu Afrika.“Kumele ngikusho ukuthi uNksz Ntuli angimeseki ngoba emnyama kodwa ngimeseka ngoba ngazi amava akhe, mina angibaseki abantu ngenxa yebala. Uzokhumbula ukuthi ngo-2015 angizange ngimeseke uMnuz Mmusi Maimane ngoba ngangingazi ukuthi uvelaphi,” kuchaza uMncwango.Uthe iphutha elenziwa yiDA ukuthi kwesinye isikhathi ivele ithathe abantu abangaziwa ibafake ezikhundleni eziphezulu.“UNksz Ntuli usuka kude neDA njengoba eke waba nawumholi wentsha kanti ngiyaziqhenya futhi ngokuthi ngesikhathi efika eqenjini ephuma enyuvesi wafikela kimina,” kusho uMncwango.UNksz Ntuli ngoMgqibelo wethule umkhankaso wakhe eThekwini njengoba evivela ukuhola iqembu.Kodwa iDA eKZN ihlukene phakathi njengoba kukhona abaseka uNksz Ntuli, abanye abafana noSotshwebhu wamakhansela eqembu eThekwini uMnuz Thabani Mthethwa, bona baseka uSteenhuisen.
title: UMncwango weseka uNtuli kwesobuholi

text: Amagama akhe aphelele uCalvin Anele NgcongcaUqale ukudlala kwiFC Fortune kwiNational First Division.Amanye amaqembu adlale kuwona, yiRacing Genk eBelgium, iTroyes yaseFrance, Mamelodi Sundowns njengoba ubesebolekiswe kuMaZulu FC kwisizini ka-2020/2021.Kwizicoco azitholile ebholeni kukhona eseligi yaseBelgium neGenk ngo-2005/2009 nesika-2012/2013. Ufukule nendebe yePro League neyeSuper Cup naleli qembu.Ube ngumpetha weligi neMamelodi Sundowns ngo-2017/2018, 2018/2019 nango-2019/2020. Ubekhona futhi bedla isicoco seTelkom Knockout ngesizini edlule.Ube nemidlalo ewu-53 neqembu lesizwe iBafana Bafana.
title: KAFUSHANE NGONGCONGCA EBHOLENI:

text: IZIHLOBO zomfundi okusolakala ukuthi wadlwengulwa ngaphambi kokuklinywa ngentambo abulawe phambi kosana lwakhe olunezinyanga eziyisithupha, zifuna abolele ejele umsolwa owenze lesi sihluku.Isidumbu sika-Andiswa Mkhize (18) obefunda uGrade 12 eVikingozi KwaMakhutha, sitholwe ngesonto eledlule silaliswe embhedeni kubo eZiko, siklinywe ngentambo sashuthekwa isokisi emlonyeni kanti sasinqunu kwesingezansi okusolakala ukuthi waqale wadlwengulwa.Eceleni kwaso kwakulaliswe usana lwakhe olunezinyanga eziyisithupha okuthiwa belungenamyocu.Isihlobo sika-Andiswa, uNksz Sindi Mkhize, sithe * -Andiswa ubehlala nosana lwakhe kuphela ngenxa yokushona kukanina ayehlala naye.Uthe uke wazama ukuhlala naye kodwa bangabona ngaso linye.“Sifisa ukuthi owenze lesi sihluku aboshwe ngoba yinto ebuhlungu kakhulu le ayenzile. Ngemva kokubeletha, bese sixoxile ngokuthi ngiyabuya ngizohlala naye kule nyanga kanti uzoshona ngale ndlela,” kusho uNksz Mkhize.Uthe kukhona owaboshwa ngemva kokushona kukamufi okuthiwa wayezisholo yena ukuthi kukhona umuntu ambulele kodwa wabuye wadedelwa ngakusasa.Nakuba umndeni ubungenalo ulwazi lokuthi kukhona oboshiwe kodwa okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuboshwe umsolwa oneminyaka engu-29 ovele eNkantolo yaseMbumbulu izolo.Ngenxa yokungabikhona kwezihlobo zika-Andiswa, uthishanhloko wesikole uMnuz Bheki Mhlongo, uthe beyisikole bagcine sebeqhathanisa amasenti besizana nekhansela lendawo uNksz Thabisile Zungu, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umfundi ungcwatshwa ngesizotha.“Kube yisigameko esibuhlungu lesi esenzekile. Bekuyingane ebikhaliphe kakhulu futhi bengingangabazi ukuthi izophasa ngamalengiso kuGrade 12. Le nto ibaphazamisile abafundi ikakhulu abefunda nabo ekilasini elilodwa,” kusho uMhlongo.Ikhansela uNkk Zungu, lithe ziningi izigameko ezenzeka kule ndawo ezinye zazo okugcina kungaboshwa muntu okungenye yezinto abayifakile encwadini yezikhalo ehanjiswe ngesikhathi bemashela esiteshini ngoLwesibili.
title: Bafuna abolele ejele 'umbulali'

text: LIGWETSHWE odilikajele ababili neminyaka engu-20 ngamacala okudlwengula ikhehla elineminyaka engu-62 elalizenza umfundisi ofunela abesifazane umsebenzi eThekwini.Indodakazi kaDingindawo Jojisa ikhihle isililo inkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini igweba uyise iminyaka ebhadla ejele ngokudlwengula abesifazane abathathu.UJojisa kuvele ukuthi ubewufihlela umndeni ukuthi uboshelwe maphi amacala njengoba indodakazi yakhe esencane ivele yagijima yaya ebhokisini lofakazi ikhala, emuva kokuba egixabezwe ngeminyaka ebhadla ejele.UJojisa kuthiwa unezingane eziyisishiyagalolunye nenkosikazi, ebingekho enkantolo egwetshwa.Ujaji uSharmaine Bolton ligweba uJojisa lithe kumele abhadle ejele ngenxa yokulutha abesifazane esebenzisa inkosi.“Ubufakazi buthi ubulutha abesifazane ngokubathembisa imisebenzi engcono. Ubuzenza inceku ukuze bakuthembe. Obaluthile bebekuthemba ngenxa yeminyaka yakho kanti uyimpisi embethe isikhumba semvu,” kusho uBolton.Ngecala lokuqala lokudlwengula owesifazane oneminyaka engu-30 ngo-2010 ugwetshwe udilikajele.Ngelokudlwengula umfundi oneminyaka engu-29, ngo-2011 ugwetshwe iminyaka ewu-10. Ngecala lokumshaya ngenhloso yokumlimaza wanikwa emithathu.Ugwetshwe izinyanga eziwu-12 ngecala lokweba u-R50 womfundi. Icala lokudlwengula owesifazane ona-34 ngo-2012 ugwetshwe udilikajele wagixabezwa ngeminyaka emithathu ngecala lokuzama ukumbulala. Lezi zigwebo uzozidonsa kanye kanye.UJojisa kuvele ukuthi laba besifazane ubehlangana nabo endleleni abathembise umsebenzi. Ubebathatha aye nabo ngasemobeni e-Mount Edgecombe ethi ubayisa kubaqashi. Ubebamisa lapho kuze kube mnyama bese ebasabisa ngezikhali, ebafake emobeni. Ubebadlwengula ubusuku bonke bese ebadedela ngakusasa.Ubufakazi bolibofuzo (DNA) obatholakala kumakhondomu atholakala endaweni yezigameko buholele ekutheni amataniswe namacala.
title: Odilikajele ababili ekhehleni ebelidlwengula lizenza umfundisi

text: BAVUKE umbhejazane bavala umgwaqo abahlala kolindela baseLamontville, izolo bethi ngeke bangene abophiko lwezezindlu eThekwini, obekuthiwa bazofika kule ndawo bakhiphe abahleli kuyo ngokungemthetho.Abahlali bakule ndawo eyaziwa ngokuthi isemathinini, emgwaqqweni uGwala abazange balubhade emsebenzini izolo. Bavimbe umgwaqo ongenela kule ndawo ngezihlahla namathayi avuthayo.Ekuseni kuthiwa akekho umhlali wakule ndawo obevumeleke ukuthi aye emsebenzini, izingane zesikole kuphela ebezivumelekile ukuthi ziye esikoleni.Omunye wabahlali bakule ndawo ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe abakwamasipala bafike kule ndawo ngoMgqibelo bezoshintsha izinombolo zolindela.“Ngesikhathi benza lokhu bebecela imininigwane eveza ukuthi ubani ohlala endlini nencwadi eyimvume ephuma kwamasipala emgunyaza ukuthi ahlale kuyo. Kunabantu abalinganiselwa ku-200 okutholakale ukuthi abanazo izincwadi zokuhlala lapha. Siyakuvuma lokho kodwa sithi umasipala wenza iphutha ngokuthi ngesikhathi unikeza abanikazi balawa mathini imixhaso, ungawadilizi, kwangena abanye abantu kuwo. Labo bantu baqala ukuhlala kuwo ngo-2009, abanye ngo-2008. Sonke lesi sikhathi umasipala ubukuphi njengoba usufika sekuphele iminyaka engu-10 behleli,” kubuza yena.Uthe umthetho wakuleli awuvumi ukuthi kukhishwe umuntu osehlale isikhathi eside endaweni, anganikezwa indawo azohlala kuyo.“Sakhuluma nabasehhovisi lezezindlu sibabuza ngalokho, esikhundleni sokuthi balibone iphutha basitshela ukuthi abanandaba nokuthi abantu sebehlale iminyaka emingaki kule ndawo, abakwaziyo ukuthi abanayo imvume yokuhlala kolindela. Ngeke sivume ukuthi siphucwe ilungelo lethu, sizovala lapha bangangeni baze balandele umthetho wokuthi uma bebakhipha lapha babanike enye indawo abazohlala kuyo,” kusho umhlali.Omunye wabahlali obevimbe emgwaqweni uthe noma bengafika nini abakwamasipala bazofika bebalindele.UMnuz Mandla Nsele okhulumela umasipala weTheku uthe uzophawula uma esethole imininingwane ephelele ngalolu daba ophikweni lwezezindlu.
title: Badele umsebenzi belwela ukuhlala kolindela

text: USAZOQHUBEKA nokuqeqesha AmaZulu nangesizini ezayo umqeqeshi uJoey Antipas waseZimbabwe ohlulekile ukufaka leli qembu ku-Absa Premiership.AmaZulu ahluleke emdlalweni wokugcina weNational First Division (NFD) ukuzibekisela indawo kuma-Play Off. Bekufanele ahlule iFC Cape Town ukuze aqede endaweni yesithathu kodwa akhala ngaphansi ngo 1-0 eKapa. Lokhu kuvulele ithuba iStellenbosch okuyiyona ejoyine iBlack Leopards njengeqembu lesibili leNFD elizodlala ama-Play Off nelizoqeda endaweni ka-15 ku-log ye-Absa Premiersphip.Nakuba zingakanekelwa umphakathi izinguquko ezizokwenzeka kuMaZulu ngaphambi kokuqala kwesizini ka-2017/2018 kodwa leli qembu likuqinisekisile ukuthi u-Antipas waseZimbabwe uzoqhubeka nokupheka leli qembu. Okhulumela AmaZulu, uBrilliant Mkhathini, uthe baphoxekile beyiqembu ngokuhluleka ukungena okungenani kuma-Play Off kodwa umqeqeshi akayi ndawo.“Umqeqeshi unenkontileka neqembu futhi usazoqhubeka nomsebenzi wakhe. Kubhekwe izinto eziningi okukhona kuzo ukuthi sibe nezinkinga zangaphakathi eqenjini esingeke sizinekele abezindaba nokuthi yena nephini lakhe bebeqala ukusebenza kuNFD,” kusho uMkhathini.“Siphoxekile sonke, kusukela kubaphathi kuya kubalandeli kodwa sihlela zonke izinto ukuze ngesizini ezayo singaphindi amaphutha esiwenzile. Ngaphandle kwalokho sihlanganise iqembu elisha nesikholwa ukuthi ngezayo lizobe selihlangene kahle. Lokhu kwenzekile kwiThanda. Kade inabadlali osekunesikhathi eside bendawonye nomqeqeshi obavikise izembe futhi lokho kuyisebenzele.”Nakuba u-Antipas ezoqhubeka nokucija Usuthu kodwa kukhona abadlali okuvela ukuthi bazodliwa yizembe. Yize uhla lungakakhishwa kodwa Isolezwe lihoshe ukuthi kuphelile obekuhlanganise AmaZulu noLuyanda Hlongwa, Nkanyiso “Pelembe” Zungu noRoggert Nyundu.“Ngiyizwile indaba yohlu lwabadlali abahambayo kodwa akukho okusaqinisekisiwe kuze kube bayatshelwa bona,” kusho uMkhathini.AmaZulu azoqala amalungiselelo esizini entsha ngoJuni 23.
title: U-Antipas usazoliqeqesha Usuthu

text: ABAHOLI be-ANC eLimpopo ngoMsombuluko bazohlangana nabaholi benhlangano eLuthuli House kulandela ukuvela kwe-ANC kulabo abasolwa ngokuhlomula ekuxetshulweni kwezigidigidi zamarandi kwiVBS Mutual Bank.NgeSonto i-ANC ithe ayinaso isiqiniseko ngokuthi yayithola yini imali eyavela ngokukhwabaniswa kwemali ebalelwa ku-R2 billion kuleli bhange. I-ANC ihlangana nje igama layo livezwe owayengusihlalo weVBS Mutual Bank, uMnuz Tshifhiwa Matodzi, obale neDA, SACP ne-EFF kulabo ‘abahlomula’ kwimali eyebiwe.Okhulumela i-ANC kuzwelonke, uMnuz Pule Mabe, uthe uyazi ngezinsolo zokuthi iqembu elibusayo lacela futhi lathola uxhaso kuleli bhange.“Siyazi ngalezi zinsolo futhi sisazama ukuthola kwihhovisi lomgcinimafa ukuthi ziyiqiniso yini. Okwamanje ngeke ngikwazi ukuphawula ngokuthi izinsolo ziyiqiniso noma cha. Ngisalinde ubufakazi. Izinsolo ezibucayi lezi ngakho sidinga ukucophelela,” kusho uMabe. Uthe inhlangano ebusayo ayifisi ukuchitha lezi zinsolo bese kujika kuvele ukuthi bayithola imali kuleli bhange.Okhulumela iDA kuzwelonke uMnuz Solly Malatsi ukukhahlele ngezinyawo zombili ukuthi yake yacela noma yathola uxhaso kwiVBS Mutual Bank.“I-DA ayikaze ithole ngisho isenti kwiVBS. Lezi zinsolo azilona iqiniso,” kusho uMalatsi.NgoLwesine ngesonto eledlule iDA yavula icala ifuna bonke abathintekayo ekudliweni kwemali yeVBS Mutual Bank babhekane nengalo yomthetho. Noma uMatodzi ebalwa njengobhongoza ekudliweni kwemali kwibhange lokuqala ebeliphethwe abantu abamnyama kuphela kuleli, akahlatshwanga ngemibuzo ngesikhathi u-Adv Terry Motau enza uphenyo. UMotau uthe akakhulumanga noMatodzi ngoba ukhombise ukungathembeki ngesikhathi edlelwa impahla yakhe.“Ukuphika kwakhe ukuthi uyingxenye yabantu abadale le nhlekelele ebhange kushayisana nobufakazi obuningi obukhomba ukuthi nguyena obengubhongoza wayo yonke lento. Ngenxa yokuzihlangula kwakhe ngabona ukuthi kuzofana nokumosha isikhathi ukumnikeza ithuba lokuthi abeke uhlangothi lwakhe. Lokho uyokwena kwenye inkundla ngesinye isikhathi,” kusho uMotau.I-EFF ngakolunye uhlangothi ithe izophendula ngalezi zinsolo esithangamini nabezindaba ngoLwesibili.
title: I-ANC emhlanganweni ophuthumayo ngolweVBS Mutual Bank

text:
MCEBO MPUNGOSEUMCULI wePop ohamba phambili kuleli uToya Delazy uthi ukuba khona kwesikhala seqembu leHip Hop labesifazane kuleli yikho okuholele ekutheni asungule iqembu iKlutch Kollective. Leli qembu elisanda kukhipha ingoma yalo yokuqala, i
Back to the Roots, lethulwe ngokusemthethweni ekuqaleni kwenyanga edlule kanti seliqalile ukuzakhela igama kubathandi beHip Hop kuleli.UToya Delazy ubumbe leli qembu ebambisene kakhulu nozakwabo abefunda nabo ngesikhathi eseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, okunguMandisa Nduna (Fiah), Zama Madlala (D.K) no-Aphiwe Marcia Buwa (Genius). Ekhuluma ngokusungula leli qembu uToya uthe ulandele iphupho lakhe.“Kuyinto engithoba kakhulu ukubona iKlutch Kollective isihlangene. Ngiyakholelwa wukuthi iNingizimu Afrika iyalidinga iqembu leHip Hop eliwaziyo lo mculo futhi ngiyazi ukuthi ukuhlangana kwalaba bantu besifazane kuzoletha into entsha endimeni yomculo,” kusho yena.UToya kufuze ukuba uhleka yedwa ngabantu akwaze ukubahlanganisa ukusungula leli qembu kwazise akubona abantu abangomafikizolo endimeni yomculo. UD.K noGenius yibona bodwa omrepha besifazane abakhethwa ukuthi badlulele kowamanqamu kuVuzu Hustle. UGenius uke wabonakala kwenye yamasizini ama-
Idols wangena kuTop 100 kanti wake wavela nakuSA Pop Stars wangena kuTop 48. UFiah uyaqhubeka nokuthuthuka endimeni yethelevishini emva kokuvela kwisizini yokuqala ye
Class Act. Ngo-2014 wayekwababelingisa efilimini i
Between Friends. Liyaqhubeka ukukhula isasasa lomrepha besifazane kuleli. Kumanje kwabenza kahle kubalwa uFifi Cooper, Nomuzi Mabena, Gigi Lamayne noNadia Nakai.
title: Kufezeke iphupho kuToya Delazy esungula eleHip Hop lesibhuda

text: YIZE bengabesifazane abathandana bengabobulili obufanayo kodwa emshadweni wabo ngeke bayilahle inqubo yesiko.Bazoshada ngokwesintu futhi bayilandele yonke imigudu elandelwayo uma kugcagcwa ngokwesintu.UNomsa Buthelezi ongumlingisi nomethuli wezinhlelo zethelevishini uzoshada ngokwesintu maduze nje nesithandwa sakhe saseMnambithi uZandile Shezi.Edalulela leli phephandaba ngezinhlelo zalo mshado, uNomsa uthe yonke into isiphothuliwe ngezinhlelo zomshado nosuku selukhona kodwa ngenxa yezizathu ezithile, ubengakathandi ukuludalula.UZOQALA ngomshado wesintu uNomsa Buthelezi ozoshada noZandile Shezi Isithombe:W24“Lukhona uvalo lokuthi senza umcimbi omkhulu kodwa mayelana nokunye angikhathazekile kakhulu. Siyalazi uhlobo lomshado esiwufunayo futhi sizalwa yimindeni eligcinayo usiko. Yingakho sibone ukuthi siqale ngomshado wesintu, emuva kokuthi eqedele amalobolo uZandile. Imindeni yethu ibambisene futhi iyaseseka, ivumelene nangokuthi abaseMnambithi beze eGoli. Konke kuzokwenziwa khona.“Kuzoqala umembeso kuqala, ngabele abantu basemzini ngaphambi kokuthi kuqhubeke ezinye izinto,” kusho uNomsa ezwakala ejabule.Eqhuba uNomsa uthe njengabo bonke omakoti naye unendlela afuna ukubukeka ngayo ngosuku lwakhe lomshado.Ukuhlala egqokisa omakoti kwi-Our Perfect Wedding kumenze waba nezindlela eziningi afuna ukubukeka ngazo.“Ngizokhipha unyawo, ngizolokhu ngigqoka ngikhumula. Ngizoshintsha kathathu. Ingubo yokuqala ngqa engizongena ngayo ngiyithungelwa uMamsie Mkhwanazi we-Afrolicious eThekwini. Bese ngiphinde ngishintsha kabili ngihlobe nangobuhlalu, kunabantu abangisizayo abazi kangcono ngemfashini,” kusho uNomsa.I-Africa Fashion House egabe ngezingubo zezishweshwe zamazwe ahlukene nayo uyibalulile kubantu abazomgqokisa.Izinhlelo zalezi zithandani azigcini ngalo mcimbi kuphela kodwa nangonyaka ozayo kulindeleke nesinye isiphihli somshado omhlophe.UNomsa uthe ucela ukungaphawuli agxile kuwo ngoba akukho abasakuhlelile ngawo.“Uzoba khona nomshado omhlophe kodwa ngonyaka ozayo, yingakho ngingafuni ukukhuluma kakhulu ngawo. Kodwa imndeni yethu iyazi ukuthi uzoba seMnambithi, ngithanda nokuthi ngizokwazi nokuba sendaweni enhle enezintaba ezinhle.“Angeke ube yimfihlo yize sifisa kube into encane yethu nabangani nezihlobo kodwa ngeke sibanqabele abantu abathanda ukuza. Njengamanje sizokhipha izimemo zomshado, okunye sobe sesibona uma kuqala unyaka ozayo,” kusho uNomsa.
title: Bazoshada umshado wesintu ophelele

text: KUSHONE abantu abahlanu engozini yemoto encane neveni ngoLwesihlanu ekuseni emgwaqeni uR71 maphakathi neHaenertsvurg neMoria eLimpopo.Abezimo eziphuthumayo be-ER24 babizelwe endaweni yesigameko ngo-7 ekuseni kungqubuzene imoto encane neveni.Ngemuva kokuphenya abahlanu abebesemotweni encane batholwe sebeshonile kungekho obekungenziwa. Kulabo kubalwa abesifazane abathathu nabesilisa ababili.Abathathu batholwe ngaphakathi emotweni, ababili izidumbu zabo zatholwa buqamama nendawo yenhlekelele. Kwiveni umshayeli wesifazane uficwe esaphila esesimeni esibucayi.“Abezimo eziphuthumayo bamuvusile owesifazane, bamelapha ngobuchwepheshe be-life support ngaphambiki kokuthi aphuthunyiswe eMediclinic eTzaneen,” kusho uRussel Meiring okhulumela i-ER24.Amaphoyisa abesendaweni yenhlekelele ukuzophenya ngengozi.
title: Kudlule abahlanu engozini yemoto encane neveni

text: UNGQOGQOSHE wezokuvikela uNkk Nosiviwe Maphisa-Nqakula uthe unethemba lokuthi amasosha afakwe eCape Flats, eCape Town ukulekelela amaphoyisa ngeke agcine echukuluzwa izigebengu.“Ngiyathemba ukuthi ngeke sibe khona isimo esifana naleso ngoba asilindele ukuthi kusetshenziswe udlame,” kusho uNkk Maphisa-Nqakula kwisithangami sabezindaba ngaphambi kokwethula inkulumo yakhe yebhajethi.UNkk Nqakula uthe njengoba amasosha engaqeqeshiwe ukuthi alawule abantu abayisixuku, amaphoyisa azongenelela ukwenza lowo msebenzi.“Uma kufakwa amasosha emphakathini kusho ukuthi azodlala indima yokuvikela,” kusho uNkk Maphisa-Nqakula.Ngesonto eledlule uNgqogqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele umemezele ukufakwa kwamasosha ephalamende ukuze alekelele amaphoyisa ngemuva kokuthi yena noNkk Maphisa-Nqakula benze isicelo kuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.Ukufakwa kwalamasosha kulandela ukuthi iziteshi zamaphoyisa ezingu-10 kulesi sifundazwe zinezezele ngo42% wamacala okuzama ukubulala esifundazweni.UNkk Maphisa-Nqakula uthe ukubambezeleka kokufakwa kwamasosha eCape Flats kungamangaza abaningi kuleyandawo uma isimo sesisimeme.UNkk Maphisa-Nqakula uphinde wakuqinisekisa ukuthi amasotsha asefikile futhe anesonto esesifundazweni saseWestern Cape.UNkk Maphisa Nqakula uphinde waveza ukuthi ukufakwa kwamasosha kulandela ubugebengu kuleya ndawo.“Isikhathi sokuthi kufakwe amasosha kulendawo uma sifuna isimo sibuyele kwesejwayelekile. Lobu bugebengu obuqhubekayo nokuthi kulawula amaqembu ezigebengu eWestern Cape kumele kuphele ngoba buyindelelo kwelakuleli,” kusho uMaphisa-Nqakula.Umholi weSandf uGen Solly Shoke uthe baziqeqeshela impi. Uthe akusikho okokuqala ukuthi kufakwe amasosha ukuze alekelele amaphoyisa.UMnuz Sarel Marais weDA uthe ukufakwa kwalamasosha kuzoqinisekisa ukuhluleka kwe-ANC.UMnuz Sam Matiase we-EFF uthe ukufakwa kwalamasosha angeke kuxazulule inkinga edala amaqembu obugebengu.UMnuz Russel Cebekhulu we-IFP no Mnuz Munzoor Emam-Shaik weNFP bathe ukufakwa kwamasosha kungenza kube nokuthula kulomphakathi.
title: Ungqongqoshe wezokuvikela akalulindele udlame ngokufakwa kwamasosha

text: BAVELE eNkantolo yeMantshi eVerulam izolo abasolwa abayisithupha ngecala lokubulala umfundi okuthiwa babemsola ngokweba utshwala endaweni yokucima ukoma eHambanathi.Abasolwa okungoMnuz Mlungisi Thabethe (28), Andile Nhleko (27), Mncedisi Mzobe (27), Siyanda Msweli (26), Lindani Ndlovu (22) noMalusi Mthembu (27) basolwa ngokubulala nokuthumba u-Andile “Bobo” Mbuthu (16) obefunda uGrade 12 eNkosebomvu Secondary ngenyanga edlule. Kwababoshiwe kuthiwa kukhona nesihlobo sikamufi.Bekulindeke ukuthi babe yisikhombisa abasolwa abavele enkantolo njengoba bekuvele izindaba zokuthi ngoMgqibelo kuphinde kwaboshwa omunye, kodwa owesikhombisa akavelanga ngoba kuthiwa usemncane.Inkantolo inqume ukukuhlehlisela uLwesibili oluzayo ukulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili yabasolwa abayisithupha.UMshushisi u-Advocate Sabelo Ziqubu uthe uzosiphikisa isicelo sebheyili.Ummeli wabasolwa uMnuz Chris Gounden, uthe isibalo sabo asibavumeli ukuthi bagcinwe esiteshini ngoba kugwenywa ubhubhane iCovid-19.Inkantolo inqume ukuthi bayiswe ejele iWestville baze babuye ngoLwesibili sebezocela ibheyili.UNksz Zodwa Jali ongunina omncane kamufi obehambele leli cala, uthe bewumndeni bafisa ukuthi kusheshiswe ukukhonjwa kwesidumbu ukuze bafihle ilungu lomndeni badlule kulesi simo.“Kubuhlungu ukubona abasolwa. Singumndeni siyafisa ukusheshe sidlule kule nto, singcwabe bese silinda umthetho usebenze,” kusho uNksz Jali.Isidumbu okusolakala ukuthi ngesikaBobo sitholwe amaphoyisa silahlwe emfuleni iNewtown ngoLwesihlanu kanti ngemuva kokutholakala kwaso amalungu omphakathi avuke indlobane ashisa indawo yokucima ukoma.AMALUNGU omphakathi abebhikisha ngaphandle kwenkantolo ngaphambi kokuvela kwabasolwa ngokubulala umfundi wasoThongathi. Isithombe: BONGANI MBATHA (ANA)Ngaphambi kokuqala kwecala amalungu omphakathi abephethe izingqwembe ezibhalwe ukuthi abasolwa abanganikwa ibheyili, bebebhikisha ngaphandle kwenkantolo kodwa amaphoyisa abaxosha.Kuthiwa amanye amalungu avuke ngovivi amasha ehamba ngezinyawo esuka elokishini eHambanathi ehlangabeze ibhasi ebeligcwele amanye amalungu omphakathi abesuka kuleli lokishi nalo elijikiswe ngamaphoyisa.Ikhansela uNksz Zanele Khumalo, lithe umphakathi ufuna ukuzibonela ukuthi bangobani abasolwa.“Amalungu omphakathi afuna banqatshelwe ibheyili. Afuna ukubabona ukuthi bangobani, abanye bebephethe izingqwembe ezithi abafuni babuyele emphakathini,” kusho uNksz Khumalo.I- video yokushaywa kukaBobo yasabalala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kanti kusolwa ukuthi kwababemshaya kukhona nomnikazi wendawo yokucima ukoma.
title: Umunyu emndenini kuvela abasolwa ngokubulala umfundi oThongathi

text: U-2018 ngunyaka isikhwishikhwishi somdlali wasezimpondweni wompetha beMTN8, iCape Town City, uGift Links, angasoze awukhohlwa.NgoJanuwari ushiye iPlatinum Stars athuthukiswe kuyo. Uthengwe yiqembu lase-Egypt iPyramids FC.
