Ubelithola ijezi e-Egypt kodwa washiya ngemuva kwezinyanga eziyisithupha ngoba iqembu selidayiswe eSaudi Arabia.Ubeyinyama kodwa waziqokela yena ukusayina kwiCity ngoba efuna uBenni McCarthy amsize amlungiselele ukuyodlala phesheya.Ungene emabhukwini omlando kwiCity eba ngumdlali obiza ukubedlula bonke asebeke bathengwa yileli qembu elibalwa nangagodoli nemali kwi-Absa Premiership.Kuwo belu u-2018 udlalele okokuqala kwiBafana ngokuboshelwa esikwatini esisale nepuleti kwi-2018 Cosafa Cup ePolokwane.Kudlule izinyangana wanqoba iMTN8 njengoba esesethubeni lokusiza iBafana ingene kwi-2019 Africa Cup of Nations eCameroon ngoJanuwari.Njengamanje uLinks (19) ungumdlali osemncane ukubedlula bonke ngeminyaka ekhempini yabadlali abangu-24 umqeqeshi uStuart Baxter okubhekwe amakule ngabo amaphuzu ayisithupha kwiSychelles emidlalweni yokuhlungela ukuya eCameroon.ULinks ubizwe ngoLwesiththu ukuyovala isikhala sikaSibusiso vilakazi olimale iBafana ingcweka neSuperSport United.Ngeke nokho kumangaze ukumbona enkundleni emdlalweni wanamuhla uma kubhekwa indlela adlale ngaye benqoba iMTN8 eThekwini ngoSepthemba 29. Umqeqeshi wakhe kwiCity, uBenni McCarthy, wavula isifuba ngezifiso zakhe ngalesi sibabuli sasePhokeng.“UGift, ngimbona zonke izinsuku kuvele kungicacele ukuthi ufike la (kwiCity) esevele ekulungele ukudlala eqenjini elikhulu kodwa uneminyaka engu-19 ubudala.“Angifuni ukuthi azithole esekhukhunyalelwa yikhanda engakafiki ezingeni lakhe eligcwele. Usanda kubuya ebholeni laseNingizimu Afrika kanti mhlawumbe akusafani nangesikhathi egcina ukudlala la ngaphambi kokuya e-Egypt.“Mhlawumbe manje ibhola seliyashesha noma sekuhlukile ngandlela thize ebholeni laseMzansi. Izinga selithe ukujiya. Ngakho kusamele azinze, azithole, aziqonde ukuthi wukuphi lapho enamandla ngakhona noma lapho entekenteke ngakhona. Yilezo zinto esizisebenzayo naye zonke izinsuku,”kusho uMcCarthy.UMcCarthy -odlale nazo zonke izinhlobo zabadlali emazweni anjengeNetherlands, Spain, Portugal nase-England- ufanisa uLinks esilomo saseGermany esisize iManchester City yanqoba iPremier League ngama-lengiso ngesizini eldule.“Manje ngoba nimbona nje, sekuvele sekuyi-sikhathi soku-mkhulula, adlale ibhola. Uyayiqonda indawo yakhe nengiku-lindele kuye. Njalo uma ngikhu-luma naye ngivamise ukumenzela izibonelo ngoLeroy Sane weManchester City.“Ngikholwa wukuthi bawuhlobo olufanayo. Udinga nje ukuthi athi ukubaqonda ngqo. Empeleni sekunamasonto engikhombisa ukuthi uyakwazi ukwenza lokho okudingeka ezingeni eliphezulu,” kusho uMcCarthy.
title: ULinks uxwayiswa ngodumo lokudlala kwiBafana Bafana

text:
I-COSATU KwaZulu-Natal ihlele umbhikisho lapho izobe ikhala ngezimo abashayeli bamaloli abasebenza ngaphansi kwazi.Lo mbhikisho uzoqhutshwa emagcekeni aseSagekal Logistics ngoMsombuluko okuyinkampani yeloli eladlula nemiphefumulo yabantu abangu 23 ePinetown.UNobhala weCosatu esifundazweni uMnuz Zet Luzipho (
osesithombeni) uthe bazogxila kule nkampani ngoba bebone ukuthi abasebenzi bayo basebenza ngaphansi kwesimo esinzima.“NjengeCosatu sinenselelo yokuvikela izifiso zabasebenzi. Akulungile ukuthi umqashi anikeze umshayeli iloli elingakulungele ukungena emgwaqweni. Uma sekuqhamuka ingozi umqashi ugxuma kuqala agxeke umshayeli ingakaveli imphumela yecala enkantolo,” usho kanje.ULuzipho usho lokhu eqondise esitatimendeni esikhishwe yile nkampani yamaloli isola uMnuz Sanele May (23) ngokushayela ngezincwadi ezingekho emthethweni. ICosatu ikholelwa ukuthi ukunyuka kwezingozi emgwaqweni kuhlangene nezimo ezimbi abasebenzi abasebenzela ngaphansi kwazo.“Saqala ukukusho lokhu kusukela ngo-2003, kuyaphoxa ukubona ukuthi kudingeke ukuthi kwenzeke lenhlekelele ngaphambi kokuthi abantu bakubone lokho,” kusho uLuzipho.Uqhube wathi nabasebenzi bezinkampani nabo kumele bagxekwe.
title: I-Cosatu izomasha emagcekeni enkampani yeloli yengozi

text:
NONHLANHLA MKHABELAZISHAYA umjikelezo eNorway lapho zizodlala khona amasonto amabili izinsizwa zeqembu le-acapella laseGoli, iThe Muffinz, eselizakhele udumo ngamaphimbo amtoti.Iqembu likhethwe ohlelweni lwabeConcerts South Africa olunikeza abaculi ithuba lokuyodlala kuleli lizwe elinobudlelwano nabo noluxhaswe ngumnyango wezangaphandle waseNorway, South African Music Rights Organisation neRikskonsertene.I-The Muffinz yakhiwe ngamalungu amahlanu okungoSimphiwe “Simz” Kulla, Karabo “Skabz” Moeketsi, Gregory “Keke” Mabusela, Mthabisi “Mthae” Sibanda noSfiso “Atomza” Buthelezi.URagnhild Tveitan, umhleli wamakhonsathi esikoleni esiseNorway lapho iThe Muffinz izobe idlalela khona izinkumbi zabafundi ababalelwa ku-4 000, uthe kubalulekile ukuthi kuqhakanjiswe ithalente lase-Afrika nakwamanye amazwe.“Kumele kukhonjiswe ukuthi akhona amaciko nabaculi abasebasha abaphila impilo eyisibonelo nokuyinto engavezwa ezindabeni leyo. Ngifuna ukusiza ukuqeda inkolelo engeyona nge-Afrika nengeyona iqiniso ngeNorway. Kubalulekile ukuveza amasiko abantu ngendlela eyiyo,” kusho uRagnhild.URagnhild, oke wahlala kuleli iminyaka eyisikhombisa, uthe iThe Muffinz izodlala amakhonsathi amabili njalo ngosuku iphinde icobelelane ngolwazi nabafundi abalungiselela ukuya enyuvesi.I-The Muffinz yamukelwe ngesasasa elikhulu emculweni njengoba ikhale yemuka nendondo yeBest Group Album kumaMetro Awards akulo nyaka nge-albhamu yayo yokuqala ethi 
Have You Heard?
title: I-The Muffinz izodlalela abafundi baseNorway

text: SEBEKUPHINDILE abantu baseColombia ngemuva kokuthi iqembu labo likhiswe yi-England kwiNdebe yoMhlaba lapho besongela khona abadlali ababili ngokubabulala ngoba begeje amaphenathi, ngesikhathi somdlalo weTop 16 obuzodlulisela iqembu labo kuma-quarterfinal.Laba badlali ababhekene nale ngwadla, okuseyizinsolo zokuthi sebehamba bejeqeza ngoCarlos Bacca noMateus Uribe.Bachashwa ngezinhlamba ngenxa yokuthi bahlulwe ukuvalela phakathi amaphenathi, okwenze iqembu labo laphuma kulo mqhudelwano weNdebe yoMhlaba eqhubekayo eRussia.Ngemuva komdlalo sebethole izinsongo eziqhamuka kubantu baseColombia abesebenzisa izinkundla zokuxhumana.Bakhonjwa ngenjumbane ngokuthi yibona ababe neqhaza ekutheni iColombia iphume kulo mqhudelwano.Le zinsongo seziqubule okukhulu ukwesabanjengoba nange-1994 FIFA World Cup, kwabanokubulawa komdlali wasemuva wakhona,  u-Andres Escobar, owathelwa phansi ngenganono ngemuva kokuthi egeje iphenathi kade bedlala ne-USA, okwagcina ngokuthi liphume emqhudelwaneni.Lezi zinsongo sezifake elikhulu itwetwe kubadlali nakwabanye abalandeli ngoba bengazi ukuthi sizogcina sinjani isimo.Umyalezo osabisa kakhulu yilowo obuqhamuka kozibiza ngoDavid Castaneda othe: “Carlos Bacca ndodana yesif--e. Akekho okudingayo, lolu gcunsula. Awubuyeli kuleli lizwe.”Omunye umyalezo uthi,”Carlos Bacca, uzibulale yena.”Eminye imiyalezo yeTwitter ebibhekiswe ku-Uribe ithi: “Uribe, wamasi--a. Ngifisa sengathi ungafa,” kubhala uPatricio.U-Ifinito yena ubhale wathi: “Lona bekuwumdlalo wokugcina kaMateus Uribe, usengofile.Le miyalezo igxekwe kakhulu ngabanye abalandeli baseColombia abasekele abadlali, besho ukuthi okwenzeka ku-Escobar, akungaphinde kwenzeke.Omunye umlandeli ozibize ngoBrayan Sanchez, ubhale kwiTwitter wathi: “Asifiseli ukufa uBacca no-Uribe.“Asisafuni kuphinde kwenzeke okwenzekaku- Andres Escobar?Ngabe lena yiColombia? Imidlalo uyayiwina uphinde wehlulwe. Asibe yisizwe sangampela.”Omunye umyalezo ozwakalisa ukwesekela abadlali ufundeka kanje: “Manje sebeqalile ukwethuka nokusabisa uBacca no-Uribe .“Izolo besihlanganisa iminyaka ewu-24 kwabulalwa u-Andres Escobar. Ngiyaninxusa, ngiyaninxusa! Akesifundeni ukwemukela ukwehlulwa.”- Moneycontrol News.
title: Izinsongo zokubulawa kwabadlali baseColombia

text:
KUBOSHWE abokufika ababili abanjwe behamba ngemoto namantobazane amathathu enqunu. Amaphoyisa omgwaqo aseGoli (JMPD) abevale umgwaqo uN1 eduze naseRivonia ehlola izimoto phakathi kwamabili ngoMgqibelo ngesikhathi ethola lawa mantombazane aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-14 no-15. Okhulumela iJMPD uMnuz Wayne Minnaar utshele iphephandaba elinguzakwazo we
Solezwe, i
The Star, ukuthi lamantombazane atholwe engazifakile izimpahla ngezansi."Okudonse amehlo amaphoyisa ukuthi lamantombazane abegqoke ngenhla kuphela engazifakike izimpahla ngezansi," kusho uMinnaar.UMinnaar uthe ngenxa yokungagqoki kwamantombazane amaphoyisa abe esebahloma imibuzo ukuthi bafunani emotweni phakathi kwamabili."Lamantombazane athe abelala eKyalami kusukela ngoLwesihlanu kanti bayitholile imvume kubazali. Amaphoyisa abe esebatshela ukuthi awabakholwa athola inombolo yomzali oyedwa amfonela. Abazali bethukile uma bezwa ukuthi abantwana bebesemzini oseKyalami ngoba akukhona la abebethe baya khona," kusho yena.Ngokusho kwabazali bebecabanga ukuthi abantwana bebezolala eSoweto. Abasolwa ababili babe sebeboshwa ngamacala okulala namantombazane angaphansi kweminyaka evumelekile nezinsolo zokuthumba. Abasolwa bayiswe esiteshini samaphoyisa saseSandton. UMinnaar uthe abasolwa babekwe amacala okudlwengula ngoba lamantombazanyane abenabo eKyalami kusukela ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku."Amaphoyisa akufanele akuthathe njengokulala okumsulwa lokho kukhona namadoda amabili amadala," kusho yena.UMinnaar uthe ngenxa yokuba ngaphansi kweminyaka esemthethweni kwamantombazane akukho ukuvumelana kocansi okungaba khona phakathi kwabo nalaba besilisa ngokomthetho. "Bekuzokwenzakalani ukuba amaphoyisa awabatholanga? Yini enye engalungile ebizokwenzeka ngaphezu kokudlwengulwa okwenzekile?" kubuza uMinnaar.
title: Kuboshwe abokufika ababili ababanjwe namantombazane (3) enqunu emotweni

text: UHLEKA yedwa umqeqeshi weLamontville Golden Arrows, uMandla Ncikazi, ngabadlali bezakhe ababili ababizwe emaqenjini esizwe kuleli.Unozinti, uSifiso Mlungwana, ubizwe eqenjini lesizwe lika-Under 23 ebelivakashele eSaudi Arabia liyodlala imidlalo yesihle kanti isitobha, uSiyabonga Dube, sibizwe kwiBafana Bafana njengoba kade idlala neSao Tome, emidlalweni yokuhlungela i-Africa Cup Of Nations (Afcon).Ngokusho kukaNcikazi, unesifiso sokuthi bande abadlali bezakhe ababizwa emaqenjini esizwe akuleli0 ngoba akakungabazi ukuthi ikhono libuzwa kuBafana Bes’thende.“Ngaphandle nje kwale mpumelelo efunwa yizwe lonke yokunqoba izicoco, kuba kuhle ukuthi abadlali bekhule bavele nasemaqenjini esizwe. Ngiyathemba ukuthi laba bobabili bazovula ithuba lokuthi nabanye bangene emaqenjini esizwe. Kadeni iqembu impumelelo yalo ikalwa ngokuthi liyabakhiqiza yini abadlali ukuba bevele amaqenjini esizwe. Ngakho sijabule kakhulu ngabakwenzile, nabanye bazolandela. Ngibatshelile abadlali ukuthi njengoba uDube esevule indlela kwiBafana, nabanye abashone khona,” kusho uNcikazi.Eqhubeka echaza, uNcikazi uthe unethemba lokuthi ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2020/2021 bazoqopha umlando benze into ezoba wumlando kwi-Arrows.“Sifisa ukuthi uma kuphela isizini sidayise umdlali oyedwa wethu emaqenjini aphesheya kwezilwandle. Angingabazi ukuthi lokhu sizokwenza nakanjani,” usho kanje uNcikazi.Abafana Bes’thende bangelinye lamaqembu amahlanu kwiDStv Premiership angakashaywa selokhu kuqale isizini. Ukwenza kahle kwezikaNcikazi kuzibeke endaweni yesikhombisa kwi-log ngamaphuzu ayisikhombisa emidlalweni emihlanu. Amanye amaqembu angakashaywa iMamelodi Sundowns, Orlando Pirates, Swallows FC neTS Galaxy.“Ngicabanga ukuthi ukubahlonipha kwami abadlali, kwenza ukuthi nabo bangihloniphe ngokudlala kahle. Inkani nje uma kusekhona ukuhloniphana nokubambisana ngicabanga ukuthi sisazoqhubeka nokwenza kahle,” kusho uNcikazi.Kuzocaca ngempelasonto ukuthi uphondo luzogoba kuphi okokuqala kule sizini uma i-Arrows isitholana phezulu neSwallows FC koweDStv Premiership ngoMgqibelo eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont ngo-3.30 ntambama.
title: Injabulo ibuzwa kowe-Arrows kuqokwa abadlali

text: UBUYE emngcwabeni waziphonsa emakhandleni owesifazane waseRedhill indodana yakhe isha nomjondolo.UMnuz Sphamandla Khumalo (31) ushe ngesikhathi kuqubuka umlilo kule mijondolo ekuMalacca Road eThekwini.Unina kaKhumalo kuthiwa ngalobu busuku okufe ngabo indodana yakhe ubebuya kofihla isihlobo emakhaya wafica indodana yakhe ilele kanti kuzosa ekuseni isishe nomjondolo yashona.Nayizolo futhi lishone kukhalwa ehostela laKwaMashu njengoba nakhona kushe imijondolo ebalelwa ku-100.Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo, iKwaZulu-Natal Emergency Medical Services, uMnuz Robert McKenzie uthe akushonanga muntu kulesi sehlo kodwa kulimale abane abalashelwe endaweni ngaphandle kokuya ezibhedlela.Kubikwa ukuthi umlilo uqale KwaMashu esigcemini sakwa-A wasabalala ngesivinini ushisa imijondolo. Kungokwesithathu kusha imijondolo kusukela ngoLwesihlanu eThekwini. UNksz Mato Shangase isihlobo sikamufi, uthe uphaphame ngo-2 entathakusa sekusha akazi ukuthi umlilo ususwe yini.“Besizitshela ukuthi umufi uphumile ngesikhathi kumenyezwa kanti akunjalo size sezwa ngoba sekufike izicishamlilo ukuthi kukhona umuntu oshele emjondolo. Kubuhlungu okwenzekile unina kamufi ubefike ebusuku ephuma emakhaya ekade eyofihla esinye isihlobo bangabonana nendodana yakhe ngoba ufike isilele kanti kuzoba nale nhlekelele. Akakwazi nokukhuluma,” kusho yena.
title: Uphenyo ngokusha kwemijondolo KwaMashu

text: AKUCACI ukuthi lizoqokwa nini iPhini likaMengameli, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, njengoba i-ANC icele abezindaba ukuthi balinde umengameli enze isimemezelo.Isolezwe lithinte umkhulumeli we-ANC kuzwelonke, uMnuz Pule Mabe, libuza ukuthi lizoqokwa nini iPhini likaMengameli kodwa wangaphendula.Kuleli sonto uRamaphosa akafunanga ukutshela abamaqembu aphikisayo ukuthi iKhabhinethi uzoyishintsha nini nokuthi uliqoka nini iPhini lakhe.Uthe ngeke athathe lezi zinqumo exhamazela ngoba zidinga ukuthi axoxe nazo zonke izinhlaka ezithintekayo.Isolezwe libe selifonela emahhovisi e-ANC, iLuthuli House, lapho abasebenza khona bethe kufanele kulindwe uMengameli.Isolezwe lithinte uMnuz Moloto Mothapo noMnuz Mava Lumkani ababhekele ezokuxhumana ePhalamende bacela ukuthi kuthintwe ikhokhasi ye-ANC ePhalamende.Libuzile nokuthi ngubani owenza umsebenzi wePhini likaMengameli wezwe njengoba kungekho muntu ehhovisi lakhe okwamanje kodwa lowo mbuzo wangaphendulwa.UNkk Nonceba Mhlauli obhekele ezokuxhumana kwikhokhasi ye-ANC ePhalamende utshele Isolezwe ukuthi iPhini likaMengameli aliqokwa yibona futhi abezindaba kufanele balinde.“UMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa oqoka iPhini likaMengameli wezwe futhi uwutshelile umphakathi ukuthi uzosenza isimemezelo ngesikhathi esifanele. Siyacela nimnike ithuba ukuze azilungiselele. Uma esesenzile isinqumo uzonazisa,” kusho uNkk Mhlauli.
title: Kusalindwe uRamaphosa ngozoba  yiphini lakhe

text: AMAHOLIDE kaKhisimusi asho isikhathi sokuvakasha kwabaningi. Yize abanye besuke behlelile ukuvakasha, kukhona abagcina besebenzisa imali abebengayihlelelanga ngoba befuna ukushaywa wumoya, okugcina kubalimaza ephaketheni.UNkk Marlies Kappers oyiNhloko yezokuKhangisa kwaDirectAxis Financial Services, uthe abantu kumele bazihlelele uma bezovakasha. Uthe ukuzihlelela ngokwezimali nokwenza ucwaningo ngendawo ozoyivakashela kungasiza ukunciphisa izindleko.“Kumele uzibekele isikalo semali ezohambisana neholide lakho. Kumele wazi ukuthi yimalini ozimisele ukuyichitha eholidini. Akusizi ukujabulisa umndeni ngokuthi nizoya eholidini kodwa ungahlelanga ngoba ungazithola uphoxeka.UNkk Kappers uthe ukuya eholidini akuyona into ongavuka uyenze noma yinini ungayihlelalanga. Uthe uma ufuna ukuba neholidi elimnandi, kumele ulihlelele unyaka wonke.UMnuz Ian Meaker wenkampani yamabhanoyi iKulula.Com, uthe indiza uyakwazi ukuyibhukha esikhathini esingangonyaka. Lokhu kusiza ngokuthi ukhokhe kancane njengoba imali ibuye inyuke uma sekuyizikhathi zamaholidi. Uthe uma bengebaningi abantu ababhukhe ebhanoyini, imali iba ncane.UNkk Kappers ukhuthaza ukuthi abantu babheke kwi-internet izindawo abangazivakashela ngoba lokhu kungabanika nethuba lokuqhathanisa imali.Nakhu okunye okubalulekile ngokuvakasha:*Qinisekisa ukuthi indawo ozovakasha kuyo iphephile. Uma indawo oqalayo ukuyivakashela kuyihhotela noma eyokulala, qinisekisa ukuthi isemthethweni futhi ayisetshenziselwa ukuqola nokushushumbisa abantu.*Yiba nemininingwane ngendawo oya kuyo ukubheka ukuthi kukhona konke ozokudinga. Makube yindawo eseduze nezitolo, isibhedlela namaphoyisa ukuze usizakele uma udinga usizo oluphuthumayo.*Uma ningahambi ngemoto yenu, hlelani kusenesikhathi abazonihlangabeza uma nifika phambili. Makube abantu obathembayo noma inkampani egunyaziwe ukuthutha abantu.*Bheka isimo sezulu sendawo oyivakashelayo ukuze uphathe izimpahla ezifanele. Pakisha zonke izinto ozozidinga phambili. Pakisha kusenesikhathi ukuze ungezokhohlwa ezinye izinto.*Khetha indawo esondelene nezindawo zokuzijabulisa ukuze ungasheshi ukukhumbula ekhaya.
title: Kuhlelele ukungcebeleka, ungangeni ezikweletini

text: KUKHALWA ngesiteshi somsakazo esingabahloniphi abalaleli ngokuvele senze izinguquko kushintshwe abasakazi isinomakanjani ezinhlelweni ezinkulu.Isiteshi Izwi LoMzansi FM, esinye seziteshi esihlonishwayo eThekwini ngokukhiqiza abasakazi abasebenzela imisakazo emikhulu, kodwa muva nje abalaleli balesi siteshi bashaya amakhala ngendlela esisebenza ngayo.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi kunabasakazi abathandwayo nabenza izinhlelo ezilandelwa kakhulu esekuphele cishe amasonto amabili bengazwakali emoyeni.UCindy Shezi owenza uhlelo lwasemini Isenza Kwenzeke phakathi nezinsuku olungena ngo-9 kuya-12, sekuphele amasonto amabili engazwakali emoyeni kunalokho kuzwakale umsakazi omusha.Abanye abalaleli balesi siteshi baze babhalela leli phephandaba bekhala ngokungahlonishwa yiziphathimandla zalo msakazo.Ngaphandle kwakhe, kukhona noSboniso Makhanya naye oke wanyamalala emoyeni nasohlelweni alwethulayo Ikusasa Lethu.Umphathi walesi siteshi uMnuz Vela Xulu naye onokubuye azwakale emoyeni, uvumile ukuthi lokhu kuyiqiniso.“UMakhanya ubuyile ngoLwesibili emsakazweni. Kukhona izinto abesacele ukuyozilungisa. Abasakazi nabo bangabantu. Kunezinto abasuke bedinga ukuzenza. Yingakho singanqabi uma umuntu ecela izinsuku. Okwamanje azikho izinguquko esizozenza. Abasakazi bazoqhubeka nezinhlelo zabo. Sibashintsha abasakazi uma kunesidingo,” kusho uXulu.Leli phephandaba liphinde lathola ngomthombo othembekile ukuthi kunabasakazi lesi siteshi ebesizama ukubaxosha ngoba kukhona abathile ebebephendlelwa izikhala.Lo mthombo uveze ukuthi laba abangezwakali emsakazweni babuye basolwe nangokwenza eminye imisebenzi eceleni ebangenisela imali, nento abazama ukubavala kuyo abaphathi.UXulu uthe kungamampunge ukuthi baxosha abantu. “Inhloso yethu ukuthuthukisa abantu. Ngeke sikwenze lokho ngokubaxosha. UCindy akekho ngoba naye usayolungisa izinto zakhe. USfiso Ngcobo uyena umuntu ongasekho. Naye wacela ukuyolungisa izinto ezithile eziqondene naye,” kusho uXulu.Ukuvezile ukuthi bakhona abasakazi ababili abanabo, omunye wabo uthe ubevele engaphakathi kodwa ethula ezomgwaqo.Phakathi kwabasakazi abasha kubalwa uSiyabonga Mjwara noSfiso Majola.Ethintwa uCindy, uvumile ukuthi sekunesikhathi engasebenzi kodwa waphika ukuthi uxoshiwe.“Ngokwazi kwami angixoshiwe kodwa ngoba angiziphethe ngicela uthinte abaphathi bami,” kusho uCindy.
title: Isikhalo sabalaleli ngeZwi LoMzansi

text: ISIBABULI seLamontville Golden Arrows uNduduzo “Sulumane” Sibiya, sithi uma iMamelodi Sundowns icabanga ukuthi izoziphuzela itiye emdlalweni wala maqembu womabili we-Absa Premiership, izodumala.Abafana Bes’thende bazotholana phezulu naBafana Ba Style koweligi eLoftus Versfeld, ePitoli, ngo-7.30 kusihlwa.Ziya kulo mdlalo nje abalandeli beSundowns babheke amaphuzu amathathu azobenza baqhwakele kwi-log bashiye i-Orlando Pirates ngamaphuzu amabili.I-Pirates izenzele phansi idlala ngokulingana neCape Town City ngo 2-2 ngempelasonto. Isisalelwe umdlalo owodwa ezowudlala nePolokwane City ngoMgqibelo.ISundowns yona isalelwe imidlalo emibili, ezowudlala ne-Arrows bese iyivala neFree State Stars ngoMgqibelo.Njengamanje iBucs iyona ezihola phambili ngamaphuzu awu-54, emidlalweni ewu-29. AmaBrazilians anamaphuzu awu-53, emidlalweni ewu-28.Uma iSundowns ingayinqoba yomibili imidlalo eyisalele, izosivikela ngempumelelo isicoco se-Absa Premiership.“Bazoza kithina befutheka njengoba bephumile nakwiCAF Champions League. Bazofuna ukushaya igoli zibekwa ukuze bezosifaka ingcindezi. Nokho sizoyibamba ishisa, sizoma emuva, sihleke sibenze baze badikibale baqale ukwenza amaphutha. Okubalulekile kulo mdlalo ukuthi kufanele amathuba esizowathola siwasebenzise ngoba ngeke abe maningi. Abaqeqeshi bethu basitshelile ukuthi thina asinayo ingcindezi kodwa iyona iSundowns inengcindezi ngoba ijaha isicoco seligi,” kusho uSibiya.Ngesikhathi limbuza leli phephandaba uSibiya ukuthi yimuphi umphumela ongabajabulisa kulo mdlalo wabo neSundowns, uthe: “Okubalulekile ukuthi singadliwa, ukubuya nephuzu kungasijabulisa kakhulu. Kodwa uma belahla, kufanele sibuye nawo ephelele amaphuzu ngoba kungenzeka”.I-Arrows isenalo ithuba lokungena kwiTop 8 uma inganqoba yomibili imidlalo eyisalele, bese ithemba ukuthi iBloemfontein Celtic, Highlands Park neKaizer Chiefs bayaqhuzuka emidlalweni yabo. EzikaSteve “Mphathi” Komphela zizodlala neDowns namuhla bese ziyivala ngeBidvest Wits ngoMgqibelo.“Thina sizibheke thina, siyawazi amaphuzu esiwadingayo njengoba sikule ndawo esikuyona kwi-log. Asihlangene nokuthi iSundowns ijaha isicoco, thina sifuna lokhu esikufunayo,” kunezezela uSibiya.Namuhla: Mamelodi Sundowns v Golden Arrows (Loftus Versfeld Stadium, 7.30)NgoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama: SuperSport United v Highlands Park (Lucas Moripe Stadium); Orlando Pirates v Polokwane City (Orlando Stadium); Black Leopards v Cape Town City FC (Thohoyandou Stadium); Bloemfontein Celtic v AmaZulu FC (Sisa Dukashe Stadium); Lamontville Golden Arrows v Bidvest Wits (Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium); Chippa United v Kaizer Chiefs (Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium); Baroka FC v Maritzburg United (Old Peter Mokaba Stadium); Free State Stars v Mamelodi Sundowns (Goble Park).
title: 'Ngeke sivume iziphuzele itiye iMamelodi Sundowns'

text: UKUHAMBA isigubhukane kwesitobha seBloemfontein Celtic kushiye isilonda kuSteve “Mphathi” Komphela ocija leli qembu.Lo mqeqeshi uthe usembhidlangweni wokufuna ozovala isikhala sika-AlfredNdengane obakhe ukhonkolo emuva kwiSiwelele ngokubambisana noLorenzo Gordinho.UKomphela uthe uzosebenzisa umdlalo wezakhe neKaizer Chiefs ukubheka abadlali ezindaweni lapho ezakhe zibuthaka khona. La maqembu azotholana phezulu emdlalweni wesihle waminyaka yonke iMacufe Cup, oyingxenye yeMacufe Festival, namhlanje ngo-3 ntambama.“Kulo mdlalo sizodlalisa abadlali abangajwayele ukuthola isikimu. Kunezindawo eziningi esibuthaka kuzona, okufanele sibheke abangazivala. Noma kunjalo, kuzofanele siwuhloniphe lo mdlalo, sihloniphe nomgubho siphinde sihloniphe nabalandeli bethu. Ngingaqinisekisa ukuthi isikimu esizosisebenzisa sizobe siqine ngokwanele ukunqoba umdlalo,” kusho uKomphela.ICeltic iyiqale kahle isizini kodwa emidallweni yakamuva emithathu isishaywe kabili, yadlala ngokulingana kowodwa. Ishaywe iMaritzburg United ngo 1-0, yadlala ngokulingana neMamelodi Sundowns ngo-0-0, ngaphambi kokushaywa yiFree State Starsngo 2-0 ngeledlule.“Iqiniso ukuthi asidlalanga kahle neze sibhekene neStars. Ngingathi nje ngokwesimo somqondo besingekho neze emdlalweni. Kufanele sishintshe imiqondo yethu, siyeke namaphutha angagwemeka,” kusho uKomphela onconywa ngabaningi ngokuyibamba ishisakwiCeltic ebhekene nezinkinga zemali.IChiefs izoya kulo mdlalo neCeltic ngaphandle kuka-Itumeleng Khune, Ramahlwe Mphahlele, Godfrey Walusimbi wase-Uganda, Teenage Hadebe, Khama Billiat baseZimbabwe noVirgil Vries waseNamibia abazobe bedlalela amazwe abo njengoba kuyikhefu leFifa.UGiovanni Solinas opheka iChiefs kulindeleke ukuthi adlalise * -Andriamirado “Dax” Andrianarimanana obengakalitholi ithuba kuleli qembu, noLeonardo Castro obuya ekulimaleni.
title: UKomphela uzodlala neChiefs enesilonda

text: UMABHUTI Khenyeza uzoshumayela ivangeli lokuzethemba kubadlali bakhe ukuze bakwazi ukubhekana nemidlalo esele kwiGladAfrica Championship, osekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi izobuyela enkundleni ngemuva kwezinyanga ezine kungadlalwa ngenxa yeCoronavirus.I-Premier Soccer League (PSL) kuleli sonto imemezele ukuthi imidlalo izobuya ngo-Agasti 8, kuqala ngeyeNedbank Cup, okuzobe sekulandela eyamaligi, i-Absa Premiershpi neGladAfrica Championship okuyisigaba sesibili ezingeni elikhokhelayo eNingizimu Afrika.Iqembu likaKhenyeza, iTS Galaxy, kume imidlalo libambe indawo ka-12 kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-28.“Bekunzima ngoba sibhekane nesimo esingakaze senzeke phambilini, ukuthi ibhola lingadlalwa izinyanga cishe ezintathu. “Sibonile nase-Europe imidlalo ibuye ngegiya eliphansi kodwa laya ngokwenyuka ngokujwayela. Bekunzima hhayi ngokomzimba kuphela kodwa nasemqondweni, nokho ekugcineni kosuku kumele sidlale. “Sizozama ngakho konke okusemandleni sibe sesisimeni esikahle ngokomzimba. Uma mina ngiqinile nabo bazoqina. Ngidinga ukuthi ngibakhuthaze. Uma ngikhombisa ukuba buthaka lokho kuzosuleleka nakubona abadlali,” kusho uKhenyeza.Phakathi kwemidlalo esalele iGalaxy, kukhona Uthongathi FC, iRichards Bay FC, Free State Stars, Cape Umoya, Royal Eagles neJDR.“Kule midlalo eyisithupha, akumele silokhu sibeka izaba. Kumele silwe. Sizophinde sibhunge njengeqembu ngamaphuzu esihlose ukuwathola kodwa kufanele silwele yonke into ephambi kwethu.”Uthe ikhefu elibe khona limnikeze ithuba lokuqonda kangcono iqembu lakhe njengabantu hhayi njengabadlali kuphela.“Abadlali ngingasho ukuthi baku-70% noma-80% (ngokulungela imidlalo ngokomzimba). Kumele sazi ukuthi sizobanakekela kanjani ukuze balulame ngemuva kwemidlalo. Uma umqondo uzimisele, nomzimba uzokwenza lokhu okufanele, ungakwazi ukulwa noma ngabe amandla awekho. Ekugcineni ungaba sesimeni esiwu-100% ngokomzimba kodwa uma umqondo wakho ungekho lapho ngeke uwenze umsebenzi,” kusho uKhenyeza othathe izintambo kuDan Malesela maphakathi nesizini.KwiGladAfrica Championship amaqembu alwela ukukhuphukela kwi-Absa Premiership yi-Ajax Cape Town esesicongweni. Ilandelwa iSwallows FC endaweni yesibili kuthi Uthongathi lube sendaweni yesithathu.Iqembu elizoqeda phezulu liya ngqo kwi-Absa Premiership kuthi amabili alandelayo adlale eyokuhlunga nelilodwa elizoqeda endaweni ka-15 esigabeni esiphezulu. Amabili azoqeda emsileni ehlela kwiSafa Motsepe League.UMABHUTI Khenyeza, weTS Galaxy, uthi uzoba-gqugquzela abadlali njengoba kubuya imidlalo ye-Glad-Africa Champion-ship ka-2019/2020
title: UKhenyeza neqhinga lokukhuthuza ngabadlali beTS Galaxy

text: UNOZINTI weLamontville Golden Arrows, uSifiso Mlungwana, ufuna ukuziphendlela indawo kwiBafana Bafana ngokushaya into ecokeme esikwatini sika-Under 23.UMlungwana (23) waKwaMhlabuyalingana, useqenjini lomqeqeshi uDavid Notoane, elizodlala imidlalo emibili yobungani neSaudi Arabia eRiyadh ngoNovemba 14 no-16. Leli qembu eliqale ikhempu ngoMgqibelo, lizofulathela elakuleli kusasa.Iqembu likaNotoane lisebenzisa imidlalo yobungani ukuzicijela umqhudelwano wama-Olympics ngoJulayi wonyaka ozayo. Elakuleli lizibekisele indawo emuva kokuqeda endaweni yesithathu kwi-Under 23 Africa Cup of Nations e-Egypt nyakenye.UMlungwana uzobanga indawo noDarren Johnson we-Ajax Cape Town.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngokubizwa esikwatini sika-Under 23. Kuyasho ukuthi kuyasondela ukufezeka kwephupho lami lokudlala kwiBafana Bafana.Uma ngithola ithuba lokudlala ngifuna ukukhombisa ukuthi ngingubani. Ngifuna ukungangenelwa yigoli emdlalweni wami wokuqala eqenjini lesizwe,” kusho uMlungwana.Nakuba ejabule kodwa uveze ukuthi ukwenama kungaphezulu kugogo wakhe omkhulisile. Unina washona esemncane kanti uyise akamazi.“Ugogo uvele wakhala ngimtshela izindaba zokuthi ngibizelwe eqenjini lesizwe ngendlela ajabule ngayo. Ungikhulisile kunzima. Okwami manje wukusebenza kanzima ukuze aziqhenye ngami,” kusho uMlungwana.“Ngingowokuqala endaweni yangakithi obizelwe eqenjini lesizwe. Kuyinto enkulu. Umasipala nomphakathi, bajabule kakhuluNasekhaya abakholwa ukuthi yimina lona, abazi nokuthi bathini.”UMlungwana uqale ukugqama ngesizini edlule kuBafana Bes’thende edla ijezi konozinti abanesipiliyoni, okunguMaximilan Mbaeva waseNamibia no-Edmore Sibanda waseZimbabwe.“Ngibonga ozakwethu kwi-Arrows ngokungigqugquzela, ikakhulukazi ithimba lonozinti. Sifana nomndeni. Bahlala bengitshela ukuthi angizikhandle, ngisebenze kanzima. Abathathi ngokuthi siyalibanga ijezi,” kusho uMlungwana.Ngokujwayelekileama-Olympics adlalwa abaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-23 kodwa angonyaka ozayo azodlalwa abaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-24. Lokhu kwenzelwe ukuthi abadlali abebezodlala kulo nyaka bangavaleleki ngaphandle ngemuva kokuhlehliswa kwemidlalo ngenxa yeCoronavirus.Isikwati sika-Under 23Onozinti: Darren Johnson (Ajax); Sifiso Mlungwana (Arrows).Emuva: Tercious Malep (FC Minaj); Katlego Mohamme (AmaTuks); Thabiso Monyane (Pirates); Njabulo Blom (Chiefs); Sifiso Ngobeni (Celtic); Sibusiso Mabiliso (AmaZulu); Given Msimango (TS Galaxy); Siyabonga Ngezana (Chiefs).Esiswini: Athenkosi Dlala (AmaTuks); Goodman Mosele (Baroka); Lelethu Skelem (Stellenbosch); Kamohelo Mahlatsi (Swallows); Shane Robers (CPT City); Jamie Webber (SuperSport); Nkosingiphile Ngcobo (Chiefs); Sphephelo Sithole (Os Belenenses).Abagadli: Lyle Fosters (Vitoria Guimeres); Fargie Lakay (CPT City); Zakhele Lepasa (Pirates); Keletso Makgalwa (Sundowns).
title: Ujabule ebizelwa eqenjini lesizwe unozinti we-Arrows

text: UMBUZO: Mhla zingu-30 kule nyanga ngizobe ngihlanganisa iminyaka engu-65 kanti kuzobe sekuyisikhathi sokuya empeshenini. Ngizobe ngiqeda iminyaka engu-42 nezinyanga ezinhlanu ngisebenzela uhulumeni. Sonke isikhathi ngisebenza bengikhokha imali nyanga zonke kwi-GEPF - isikhwama sempesheni sabasebenzi bakahulumeni.Ngishadile kanti umhlomulo wami wempesheni uzoba iholo lesibili. Nginemali engiyilondolozile kodwa ngihlela ukungayikhiphi ingakapheli iminyaka emihlanu emuva kokuya empeshenini. Ngihlela ukusebenza izinsuku ezimbalwa ngesonto, ukuze ngikwazi ukuqhubeka nokuhola. Kubukeka ngingeke ngiwuswele umsebenzi.Ngingakhetha kokubili; ukuya empeshenini noma ukwesula emsebenzini. Kepha iningi lozakwethu likhetha ukwesula emsebenzini, lithathe isamba semali kunokuhola impesheni nyanga zonke. Isizathu salokhu wukuthi kungenzeka imali yesikhwama seGEPF isetshenziswe ukutakula iminyango kahulumeni edonsa kanzima. Ukukhula kwemibono mayelana nenkohlakalo kuleli kubhebhethekisa ungabazane.Impendulo:Ukuze ukwazi ukuthola izeluleko ezigcwele kubalulekile ukuqonda kabanzi ngesimo sakho sezimali. Lokhu kubandakanya impahla, izindleko, iholo lazinyanga zonke, intela, isimo sakho sokutshala imali, uhlelo lwefa nokunye. Kuyaye kuhlelwe ngokwezidingo nesimo sakho.Uma ingekho le mniningwane lesi seluleko sizokubeka esithombeni uma ukhetha ukwesula emsebenzini okanye uthathe impesheni.Ukuya empeshenini:Ibhonasi, phecelezi i-13th cheque, ungayilondoloza ukuze kunyuke isamba semali eminyakeni emihlanu.Kuhle ukuba nomshwalense wokungcwaba wenani lika-R7500 kepha kungenzeka ukuba ungeneli izindleko zomgcwabo, itshe nokunye. Kungamele wengeze imali.Imali ekhokhelwa ikhefu inezindleko zentela kepha awulahlekelwa uma wesula emsebenzini.Isibonelelo somshwalense wezempilo sika-R2 159 ngenyanga, ekhuphuka ngonyaka, sikhokhwa impilo yakho yonke.Uma udlula emhlabeni ingakapheli iminyaka emihlanu, umuntu oshade naye uzoqhubeka nokuthola imali bese kuthi emuva kweminyaka emihlanu ahole * -50% wempesheni yakho. Ezinye izimali ziyacwila. Konke lokhu kutholakala uma ukhetha uhlelo lwempesheni olunozinzo kanti olukhuphuka ngo-7.5% (leli phesenti lingaphezulu kwe-inflation).Isamba semali yempesheni esingu-R500 000, nangaphansi, asikhokhelwa intela.Ngokwemigomo yezomsebenzi, ingxenye yemali yempesheni ngeke ibe nezindleko zentela ngokomgomo ka-31 March 1998.Ukwesula emsebenzini:Uma wesula emsebenzini ngalesi skhathi ulahlekelwa yile mhlomulo elandelayo;Ibhonasi yaminyaka yonkeUmshwalense wokungcwabaIsbonelelo somshwalense wezempiloUkukhokhelwa kwekhefu ngokheshiUmhlomulo wokwesula emsebenzini ungafakwa esikhwameni esiseceleni kanti imali ungayigcina ngokuyitshala kutshalomali ozikhethele lona kuze kube uya empeshenini.Uma wesula emsebenzini, ukukwazi ukukhipha okukodwa kokuthathu kwisamba semali (uma isamba sokuqala singekho ngaphezulu kuka-R500 000 awuyikhokhi intela).Isamba esisalayo ungasitshala kwi-living annuity okanye uthathe i-life annuity ene-life assurer.I-life annuity ehlanganiselwe ingathengwa kumshwalense. Kunezinhlelo ezehlukene ezikhona kanti i-annuity ingahlanganiswa ne-inflation ekhokhwa kuze kube kushona oshade naye.I-living annuity inikeza igunya lokuba uzithathele izinqumo kanye nomeluleki wezezimali. Kulolu hlelo ukukhishwa kwemali kuba kanye ngonyaka (imali elinganiselwa ku- 2.5% wesamba semali esingakhuphuka sibe ku-17.5%) yize singaphakamisa ukuba ibe phakathi kuka- 5 no-6%. Uma udlula emhlabeni, yonke imali idluliselwa kwabasohlwini lwabazohlomula okanye izingane zakho. Bangaqhubeka nokukhipha imali.Okubi ngalolu hlelo lwe-living annuity ngukuthi, ubungozi botshalomali bubheka wena. Izinqumo ezingaphusile nokukhipha imali ngokungenamkhawulo kungaba nomthelela ongemuhle kuwe ngakho-ke kusemqoka ukuba ufune umeluleki uma uya empeshenini.Ukuxhumanane- Inkunzi Wealth Group sishayele ku-087 1600 018, noma usithumelele i-email ku: [email protected]
title: Yikuphi okungcono ukwesula nokulinda impesheni?

text: KUSENZIMA ukukhuluma kuKini Shandu ngoBob Mabena, akhulele esandleni sakhe emgqugquzela ukubekezela esecabanga ukushiya phansi imizamo yokufeza iphupho lakhe kwezokusakaza.UKini, ozakhele udumo kwiGagasi FM, ubelungisela uBob ingadi eminyakeni edlule.UBob (51) ushone ngoMsombuluko ntambama ngemuva kokumelwa yinhliziyo.“Yinto engingathandi ukukhuluma ngayo lena okwamanje,” kusho uKini ngomoya ophansi.“Anginawo amazwi angachaza indlela engizizwa ngayo. Angazi ngingabonga ngithini, kusenzima angifuni ukuphawula okwamanje.”UKini uthe uzwa ubuhlungu obukhulu ngokudlula kwaleli qhawe.“Ngisazama ukuzinika isikhathi sokwamukela lezi zindaba,” kusho yena.Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngo-2009, uKini waveza ukuthi wayesebenzela uBob emenzela ingadi futhi kukuye lapho ancela khona uthando nolwazi ngomsakazo.“Kunesikhathi lapho engase ngicabanga ukuliphonsa khona ithawula kwezemisakazo kodwa uMabena wathi angibekezele kuzolunga. Iqiniso wukuthi kwangisebenzela kakhulu ukuxhumana noMabena ngoba kuningi engakufunda ngomsakazo, esengikusebenzisa manje sengisakaza,” washo kanje uKini.Yena noBob basebenza ndawonye kwiGagasi FM, uBob engumphathi wakhe futhi wayephinde azwakale nasohlelweni lukaBob i-Old School, eyayingena ngoMgqibelo ntambama.UMengameli Cyril Ramphosa, udlulise amazwi enduduzo, wachaza uBob njengomuntu okhulise futhi wahlahlela indlela abasakazi abaningi.“Ngukulahlekelwa okubuhlungu hhayi kuphela emndenini kaBob nakubangani kodwa emkhakheni wezokusakaza wonke nasezweni,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe kubuhlungu ukuthi iphimbo lale ngwazi selithule wathi sengathi umoya wakhe ungaphumula ngokuthula.Abanye abadlulise amazwi enduduzo kubalwa kubo usomahlaya uSkhumba Hlophe osebenze noBob kwiKaya FM, othe ulahlekelwe yiqhawe lakhe.UBob ushone esengumethuli wohlelo lwasekuseni phakathi nesonto esiteshini sezingxoxo esizinze eGoli, iPower FM lapho ebesebenza khona noFaith Mangope.
title: 'UMabena ukhuliseabasakazi abaningi'

text: UZOGWETSHWA ngoLwesithathu eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu, uNobhala we-ANC esifundeni KwaDukuza, esesibizwa ngeGeneral Gizenga Mpanza. UMnuz Musa ‘Tilolo’ Zondi (33) ngoLwesine ulahlwe yicala lokuthumba nokubulala okuthiwa walenza ngo-2015.Kuthiwa uZondi enabanye abalisa batalabha umufi uMnuz Thandanani ‘Macosha’ Moyane bemsola ngokweba esitolo sikaZondi esiseNtunjambili eKranskop. Kuthiwa baqala ngokumthumba isikhathi eside bemtitinya bempheka ngemibuzo, bemesabisa baze bagcina bembulele.Imithombo elwazi kahle udaba ithi kwatholakala ukuthi kunesibhamu esasebenza ngesikhathi kubulawa umufi njengoba kuthiwa wadutshulwa.UZondi wehlelwa yilokhu nje ubesanda kukhethwa ngaphandle kokuphikiswa kwesokuba unobhala, engqungqutheleni ebingoMeyi. Ngaphambi kwalokho ubephethe isikhundla esifanayo kwi-ANCYL khona esifundeni.I-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ithathe isinqumo sokumisa lo mholi esikhundleni njengoba elahlwe ngamacala, ibeka isizathu sokuthi ifuna ukumnika ithuba nomndeni wakhe ukuba babhekane nalesi simo kahle.Okhulumela le nhlangano esifundazweni uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu uthe uNobhala wenhlangano uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli uzoba nomhlangano kusasa nobuholi besifunda KwaDukuza lapho kuzonqunywa khona ukuthi kwenziwa njani ngesikhundla ebesiphethwe uZondi.“Ubuholi buzohlala emuva kwalokho unobhala abonane namagatsha ukuze kucatshwe indlela eya phambili ngodaba,’’ kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.UZondi wuyena obehola umbhikisho omkhulu ngezinsolo sokucwasa ngokwebala esikoleni Umhlali Preparatory lapho okwakudume khona ukuthi abantu babandlululwa bukhoma. Uphinde waba sekhaleni leminye imibhikisho eJunction Mall nasesisibhedlela iKwaDukuza Private.Amalungu enhlangano abelokhu ebhale njalo kuFacebook ngaphansi kwegama likaZondi, ezwelana naye ethi azomeseka ebunzimeni abhekene nabo.
title: Umholi we-ANC uzogwetshwa ngecala lokubulala ngakubo

text: Intatheli yeSolezweI NHLANGANO yaseMelika elwa nokubhebhetheka kwengculazi ephinde ibhekele nokwelashwa kwayo, i-Aids Healthcare Foundation (AHF), ifuna kwande isibalo sabathola imishanguzo ethithibalisa lesi sifo.Lokhu kuvele izolo emashini yale nhlangano ebihambisana nokwethulwa kwemikhankaso yokuqwashisa ngengculazi eThekwini. Imashi ejoyinwe nawuNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo ibiseDurban City Hall.I-AHF yethule nomkhankaso obizwa nge- “20x20 Goal” ogqugquzela ukuthi kushaye u-2020 sebewu-20 million abantu abadla imishanguzo yokudambisa igciwane lengculazi. UDhlomo ungomunye wabawesekayo lo mbono wale nhlangano ezama ukwehlisa isibalo sababulawa yigciwane lengculazi.Kwabebehambele lo mkhankaso izolo kubalwa izikhulu ze-AHF ezingoDkt Penniah Lutung Amor, Hillary Thulare onguMqondisi jikelele no-Advocate Jenny Boyce.Le nhlangano iphinde yahlonipha uDhlomo ngendondo yokubonga uhulumeni wakuleli ngeqhaza lakhe lokuzama ukwelapha nokuvikela abantu egciwaneni lengculazi.“Siyambonga uhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika oqikelelayo nowenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abantu abanegciwane lengculazi bayelashwa. Siyathemba ukuthi eminyakeni ezayo nathi sizokwazi ukusiza ngokulekelela ngemishanguzo nakwabanye,” kusho uThulare.Le nhlangano iveze ukuthi iseyinkinga indaba yegciwane lengculazi emazweni ase-Afrika lapho bebalelwa khona ku-22 million abahaqwe yigciwane.Kubikwa ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika iseqhulwini emazweni alekelela ngokunikeza imishanguzo kwabanegciwane. Lokhu kwehlise isibalo sabahaqwa yigciwane lengculazi kwancipha nesabashonayo. Kuthiwa sikhulile nesibalo sabaphila isikhathi eside benaleli gciwane.Ngokombiko wanonyaka we-UNAIDS kuvele ukuthi ngo-2011 sikhule ngamaphesenti awu-11.3 isibalo sasebephile isikhathi eside negciwane lengculazi esifunda-zweni uma kuqhathaniswa no-2003.Kuvela nokuthi iCambodia, e-Asia nayo ilandela ezinyathelweni zeNingizimu Afrika ngokweseka ukukhishwa kwemishanguzo. Kunezikhungo eziwu-61 ezikhipha imishanguzo, eziwu-28 kuzona zixhaswe yi-AHF.Okukhathaza le nhlangano wukuthi phezu kwemizamo yokunciphisa ababulawa yingculazi, ziyehla izibalo zabahlola igazi. Kubikwa ukuthi bangamaphesent awu-39 abahloliwe nyakenye emhlabeni.I-AHF yinhlangano engangenisi nzuzo ezinze eMelika ebhekela abanegciwane. Kumanje le nhlangano inakekela ngokwelapha abangaphezu kuka-250 000 emazweni awu-32 okubalwa nawase-Afrika. I-AHF izobeka amabhodi ezikhangiso zalo mkhankaso we- “20x20 Goal” emazweni ahlukene.
title: Umkhankaso omushangengculazi

text: MHLENGI SHANGASEI SIGUNGU esilawula iNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal sithathe isinqumo sokungamthatheli zinyathelo umphathi walesi sikhungo uSolwazi Malegapuru Makgoba ezinsolweni zokuqamba amanga efakaza ecaleni lenkohlakalo elalibhekene nesinye sezikhulu esasisolwa ngokugwazelwa.Lesi sigungu sithathe lesi sinqumo ngemuva kwesikhalo sowayeyisikhulu esasibhekele izimali kule nyuvesi, uMnuz Kanthan Pillay owathi uMakgoba waqamba amanga efakaza ecaleni elalibhekene noNkk Pumela Msweli-Mbanga owayeyiDean of Management Studies owayesolwa ngokugwazelwa ngomunye wabafundi bakhe uNksz Nobubele Potwana ukuze athole iziqu zakhe zobudokotela.Isitatimende esikhishwe yiPhini likaSihlalo wesigungu esilawula le nyuvesi, uNkk Phumla Mnganga, sithe bathole neseluleko sezomthetho bathatha isinqumo sokuthi bangamthatheli izinyathelo uMakgoba.Sithe baqoke uqweqwe lommeli, uJean Marais SC, ukuthi abeluleke kwezomthetho beyisigungu kulolu daba.“Emhlanganweni obungoMsombuluko isigungu sinqume ukuthi singamthatheli zinyathelo uSolwazi Makgoba ngemuva kokulalela yonke imibono yommeli,” kusho lesi sitatimende.Sithe ikomidi, i-Risk and Audit, linqume ukuthi kuqokwe ummeli ozimele ukuze abheke lezi zinsolo ezibhekiswe kuMakgoba ngeqhaza lakhe odabeni lweziqu zikaDkt Tahir Pillay owayeyinhloko yekolishi le-Health Sciences kule nyuvesi.UMakgoba kuthiwa wathi wabamba iqhaza ngesikhathi uDkt Pillay enza lezi ziqu efakaza enkantolo ekubeni ekuchitha uPillay lokhu ethi uMakgoba wayengekho.Uphiko lwamaphoyisa aphenya ngezimali lusaziphenya lezi zinsolo ngemuva kokuba uNksz Potwana akhishwa phambili kuleli cala lenkohlakalo.UMengameli womkhandlu wabafundi, uThembani Khumalo, uthe bayasamukela isinqumo salesi sigungu futhi bayasihlonipha.Uthe sekuphenduke insakavukela ukuthi njalo kuba nezinsolo eziqubukayo kodwa ekugcineni kutholakale ukuthi bekungamapunge.“Sifuna kugezeke igama lenyuvesi ngoba lidicelekela phansi njalo uma kuqubuka izinsolo ezifuze lezi. Ekugcineni sifuna ukuthola iziqu esikhungweni esithembekile kungalokhu kuba nemibuzo,” usho kanje.
title: Ngeke athathelwe izinyathelo uMakgoba

text: INKAMPANI eqoqa izindaba i-African News Agency (ANA), isiphikise izinsolo zokuthi yasungulwa umnyango wezobunhloli iState Securty Agency (SSA), ukuze ibike kahle ngowayengumengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma.Le nkampani eyasungulwa ngo-2015, isho kanje kulandela  izinsolo ezenziwe owayengungqongqoshe wezobuNhloni nezokuPhepha, uMnuz Sydney Mufamadi, owenze izinsolo zokuthi le nkampani yakhokhelwa iSSA izigidi zamaRandi ukuze izobika kahle ngoZuma.UMufamadi wenze lezi zinsolo ngesikhathi ethula ubufakazi phambi kwekhomishini ephenya izinsolo zokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana ngoMsombuluko. Uthe kunemali eyayifakwa kule nkampani ukuze kubikwe kahle ngoZuma.Isikhulu esiphezulu se-ANA uNksz Vasantha Angamuthu, sithe lezi zinsolo azisilo iqiniso.“I-ANA yasungulwa emuva kokuvalwa kweSA Press Association (SAPA) ukuze sivale isikhala sabo siphinde sihlinzeke ngezindaba emazikweni ezindaba ahlukene ezwenikazi lase-Afrika kanye nasemhlabeni jikelele.UNksz Angamuthu uvumile ukuthi le nkampani ike yaba nesivumelwano sokusebenzisana ne-SAA, lapho  i-ANA yayiqeqesha abasebenzi be-SAA ngokusebenzisa ezobuchwepheshe kepha wathi babengazi ukuthi kunezinhloso ezithile ngalokhu.“Sasingazi ukuthi kunezinhloso ezithile. Ukube sasazi, sasingeke singene esivumelwaneni nabo. Lokhu okushiwo uMufamadi ngiyakweshwama.“i-SSA  neminye iminyango kahulumeni bebengamakhasimende ethu abekukhokhela ukuthola izindaba kithina.”UNksz Angamuthu uthe kuyadumaza ukubona izimbangi zale nkampani zigiya ngalezinsolo ezenziwe uMufamadi.“Izimbangi zisizakele ngale ndaba, zisabalalisa izindaba zokuthi thina sisebenzela iSSA. Thina ngeke sizingene izimpi zobuqembuqembu kuhulumeni  nasenhlanganweni ebusayo.“Selokhu ngajoyina i-ANA ngoJanuwari, inhloso yami bekulokhu kuwukunikeza amakhasimende ethu izindaba ezisezingeni eliphezulu. Nakuba kukhona abahudulela igama lethu phansi, sizimisele ngokuqhubeka nokwenza umsebenzi wethu ngendlela.”
title: I-ANA iphika eyokuthi yasungulwa yizinhloli

text:
ZODWA NDABA noMINENHLE MKHIZEKUXABENE ubendle kuLamontville Golden Arrows engase izithole isivika izembe kule sizini ye-Absa Premiership ezokwethwasa ngenxa yezinkinga eziyikhungethe.
Isolezwe lihabule ukuthi abadlali abadala kuBafana Bes’thende abasafuni ukudlalela leli qembu.Kubadlali, okuvela amagama abo kubalwa uThanduyise “Gonondo” Khuboni, Thamsanqa “Manenzhe” Gabuza noMzuvukile Tom. UMusa Bilankulu usayine inkontileka yeminyaka emibili neBidvest Wits.Ngakolunye uhlangothi indlela kaJohn Dlangisa oyiKit Manager ku-Arrows ebheke kuMaZulu, iyavuthwa. Abanye abadlali, uPavels Stienbors noRitus Krjaulis, abazange babuye kuleli qembu lisanda kulahlekelwa ngabaxhasi i-MTN engazange iyivuselele inkontileka.UTshepo Liphoko obebolekiswe yiPirates kuBafana Bes’thende ubuyele eParktown lapho ezilolonga khona neBucs.“Angisafuni ukudlala ku-Arrows. Ngikhona nje ngiyajima ngoba nginenkontileka okuyiyona engibambile. Uma kukhona okungavela ngingahamba ngisho kusasa. Uma ucabanga wena ngingadlala nalolu swebezane lwabadlali abazovika izembe (esho inqwaba yabadlali abancane abajima kuleli qembu). Yizwa ngami, ayikho indaba yaleli qembu. Akekho umdlali omdala osafuna ukudlala lapha ngenxa yokuthi akukho okuhlelekile,” kusho umdlali we-Arrows, odonse leli phephandaba ngendlebe wathi lingalinge limdalule ngegama.Omunye umdlali ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi angahamba ekuseni uma kungathiwa kukhona iqembu elifuna ukumsayinisa. Umthombo waleli phephandaba uthole ukuthi uKhuboni akazilolongi neqembu ngoba engasathandi ukudlala ku-Arrows kanti uyazenzisa ngokuthi ulimele. NoGabuza naye ongabonwa nangokhalo kulezi zinsuku ejimini ye-Arrows, kuvela ukuthi akanyamalele ngoba elimele kodwa isimumi emphinjeni indaba yaleli qembu.“UKhuboni uke wafika sisanda kuvula kodwa wabuye wanyamalala. Ngezwa kuthiwa walimala ngesizini ephelile,” kusho omunye umdlali waBafana Bes’thende.Kuthintwa uMato Madlala oyisikhulu seLamontville Golden Arrows, ubhoke ngolaka.“Ngicela uyiqinisekise kahle imithombo yakho ngaphambi kokuthi ungishayele ucingo. Ungangimosheli isikhathi ngento ongenaso isiqiniseko sayo ngoba leyo nto ayiwenzi umqondo. Abadlali okhuluma ngabo (uKhuboni noGabuza ukuthi abasabonakali) bakhona ejimini. Ungabuza noma yimuphi umdlali ngisho uKanu (Vusumuzi Vilakazi okhulumela iqembu) angakutshela ukuthi abadlali okhuluma ngabo bakhona ejimini. UKhuboni akazibandakanyi neqembu ngoba usalimele kodwa ujima yedwa. NakuGabuza yinto efanayo futhi namuhla (izolo) ubeyobona udokotela,” kusho uMadlala.Noma ekhuluma kanje uMadlala kodwa abazithamunda kangcono ezithinta aBafana Bes’thende bathi nomqeqeshi uManqoba Mngqithi akeneme ngendlela izinto ezenzeka ngayo kuleli qembu, kangangoba naye angashaya utshani uma engathola umsebenzi kwenye indawo.Amanye amaqembu ePSL amatasa asayinisa abadlali ngapha nangapha njengoba kuvulwe iwindi kodwa ku-Arrows kuthule. Kunalokho abadlali bayahamba njengoba uBilankulu esezoyibamba kuWits.
title: Akuzinkinga kuyafiwa kuGolden Arrows

text: ASEQALILE ukuvalwa amanzi kuzo zonke izindawo ezikuMasipala weTheku njengoba kuvela ukuthi abantu abawongi ngokwanele. NgeSonto abengekho amanzi eMlaza, Burlington naseChatsworth kanti izolo abantu baKwaNdengezi, Klaarwater, St Wendolins, Savannah Park naseShallcross bavuke bengenawo.INhloko yoPhiko lwezokuXhumana kuMasipala weTheku, uNksz Tozi Mthethwa, ithe ngenxa yokuthi isomiso siyaqhubeka amanzi ayancipha emadamini amakhulu.Uthe uMnyango waManzi neNhlanzeko usebenzisana nenhlangano ephakela omasipala baKwaZulu-Natal ngamanzi, Umngeni Water, unciphise amanzi athunyelwa kubantu ngo-15% kwathi athunyelwa emafemini nasemapulazini ancishiswa ngo-50%.Uveze ukuthi uMasipala weTheku ubungawanciphisi amanzi ngoDisemba ngenxa yokuthi bekunezivakashi kodwa lokhu kwenze asetshenziswa kakhulu.“Sesiqale phansi ukuwanciphisa ngo-15% kusukela ngoJanuwari 16 ngoba izinqolobane zamanzi azisenawo amanzi anele. Sinezinqolobane ezihlukene okubalwa iMt Moriah Reservoir ephakela amanzi ePinetown, New Germany (emafemini), Westmead, Ashley, Sarnia ne-Paradise Valley. Kukhona iKwaNdengezi Resevoir ebhekele KwaNdengezi neCoffee Farm nezinye izinqolobane ezingenawo amanzi,” kusho uNksz Mthethwa.Uthe izindawo ezilandelayo azinawo amanzi ngoba kufanele aphantshwe esuswa edamini eliwagcinayo ayofakwa ezinqolobaneni eziya emizini yabantu.Izindawo ezingenawo amanzi ngenxa yalokhu yiTshelimnyama, KwaNdengezi, Dassenhoek, Kwalinda, Emansenseni, Stockville, Mpola, Thornwood, Mariann Park, Pine View, Mariannridge, Nagina, Birchwood Park, Madiba Valley, Klaarwater, Luganda, Intake, Khoselini, Mawelewele, Mariannridge Industrial Park, Nirvana Hills, Umshinini, St Wendolins Ridge, Phumuphele, Savannah Park, Clermont, KwaDabeka, Wyebank, KwaDabeka Clinic, KK hostel naseZalukazini. Uphinde wabala neMolweni, Fannin Road, New Germany, Motalabad neWestville.Unxuse abantu ukuthi babekezele futhi babike uma kukhona amapayipi aqhumile ngokufonela ku- 080 13 13 013, WhatsApp Fault Report line-073 148 3477, bathumele i-SMS: 43554 noma i-e-mail [email protected]Uthe okwamanje amanzi aphela ngo-9 ebusuku avulwe ngo-4 ekuseni okusho ukuthi aphela amahora ayisikhombisa. Kunesigaba sesibili lapho ephela ngo-7 ebusuku abuye 4 ekuseni, kube esesithathu lapho ephela ngo-9 ebusuku abuye ngo-6 ekuseni. Uthe esigabeni sesine azophela emini nsuku zonke kodwa isikhathi sisazobekwa.
title: Ayaphela amanzi kwezakhele oweTheku

text: BAGAYISWE yisitimela sabashumpula amakhanda abesilisa ababili okuthiwa bebelele emzileni wesitimela oThongathi, eThekwini ngoLwesibili entathakusa.Kusolakala ukuthi la madoda angondingasithebeni abelele ngaphansi kwebhuloho ngenkathi ehlelwa yilo mshophi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe kukholakala ukuthi la madoda ashonile, aneminyaka eko-20, agayiswe isitimela ngenkathi elele ngabo-3:20 entathakusa.Uthe luyaqhubeka uphenyo lwamaphoyisa mayelana nalesi sehlakalo.“Kuvulwe idokodo ngokufa kwabantu eliphenywa amaphoyisa asoThongathi,” kusho uCol. Mbele.Abenkampani yonogada bakwaReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa), baveze ukuthi babikelwe obedlula ngasendaweni yesehlakalo ngo-6.20 ekuseni ngala madoda.Okhulumela iRusa, uMnuz Prem Balram esitatimendeni uthe abashonle bagayiswe yiguzu ngasemgwaqweni uPlane,  oThongathi.“Ithimba lethu lezimo eziphuthumayo nonogada liphuthume endaweni yesigameko lafica kukhona abasebenzi basezitimeleni,” kusho uBalram.UBalram uthe kusolakala ukuthi amadoda ashonile abewondingasithebeni abelele ngaphansi kwebhuloho eliseduzane nomzila wesitimela,” kusho uBalram.
title: Isitimela sibashumpule amakhanda

text: ABANTWANA baseNdlunkulu kaZulu babhoboke ngokuhlukumezeka kwabo uma kukhulunywa izinto ezingezinhle ngeSilo Samabandla.Lokhu kuvele esidlweni sakusihlwa esigodlweni kwaLinduzulu, kwaNongoma, ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku.Bebekhuluma emcimbini wokugubha usuku lokuzalwa lweSilo ebesihlanganisa iminyaka engu-70 sidla anhlamvana futhi sesibuse neminyaka engu-47.AbaNtwana bebebizwe ukuzodlulisa izilokotho koNgangezwe Lakhe. Kuqale kwakhuluma uMntwana uNombuso, othe nabo sebeyafisa ukuthi iSilo sibe nesikhathi nabo njengoba sihlala simatasa sibumba isizwe.Uthe kuningi iSilo esesidlule kukhona okunzima, namanje kuningi esisabhekene nakho.UMntwana uNandi uthe bengabaNtwana baseNdlunkulu kuningi asebehlukumezeke ngakho okushiwo ngoHlanga Lomhlabathi abangakuthandi.“Izinto ezishiwo ngeSilo neNdlunkulu ngabezindaba azizinhle. Izinto ezishiwo ngomndeni ziyasihlukumeza.Sibekwe wuNkulunkulu ukuthi sibe lapho sikhona. Akubanga yiphutha. Ngicela nikuqaphele enikusho ngeSilo nangathi, ningasigxeki.Inkinga esibhekene nayo wukuthi asikwazi ukuzikhulumela ngoba uma kukhona esikushoyo akuzothathwa kahle. Nathi sinawo amaphutha njengawo wonke umuntu.Uma kukhona okushiwo ngathi okungekuhle kungcono nikhulume nathi ngqo, kunokuthembela kubantu abapotshoza izindaba,” kusho uMntwana uNandi.Elinye iZinyane leSilo eliphefumulile uMntwana uPhumuza, lithe kunezwi likaNkulunkulu elilokhu lisibusa lokuvikela iSilo.Uthe ulithathela emazwini kaNkulunkulu ewabhekise kuDavide, emtshela ukuthi kumele akhe indlu yokukhonzela uNkulunkulu, kodwa uDavide elokhu eziba.Nakuyena uthe lifikile kusuka eminyakeni edlule kodwa ubelokhu ezama ukungakusho akuzwa ngaphakathi kodwa manje ubona sekuyisikhathi sokuthi akusho.Uthe ngokwakhe lesi siphrofetho sisho ukuthi uma indoda inamadodana amaningi, kufana nokuthi inemicibisholo. Uthe uma kuhlaselwa uyise wawo kumele asuke kanyekanye njengemicibisholo amlwele.“Ngalokho ngithi wonke umuntu owone iSilo kumele axolise ngoba ithuba liyadlula.Uma selidlulile ngeke aphinde akwazi ukuxolisa. Thina asikhulanga njengabo bonke abaNtwana abazalelwe eNdlunkulu kodwa besiphathiswa kwazo zonke izingane ezingazalwa ebukhosini. Besize sizitshele ukuthi siyahlukunyezwa kanti iSilo besisilungiselela ukuthi sikwazi ukubhekana nezimo ezinzima esihlala sibhekana nazo ngenxa yokuba ngabaseNdlunkulu.Bonke abangayithandi iNdlunkulu bazoba senkingeni ngelinye ilanga, uma bengaxolisi sebenikwe ithuba,” kusho uMntwana uPhumuza.Uthe abahlukumeza bona kufana nokuthi bathinta inhlamvu yeso likaJehova.
title: INdlunkulu iyakhala ngesihluku

text: IPHINI lomqeqeshi kwi-Orlando Pirates, uRulani Mokwena, likholwa wukuthi abadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu abasayiniswe yiKaizer Chiefs bayakumboza ukwentula ulwazi kwebhentshi laMakhosi.UMokwena ubekhona ebhentshini leZimnyama ngesikhathi zibhubhudla iChiefs ngo 3-1 emdlalweni wabakhaya ngesizini edlule. Lo mphumela ungeminye ethayisele inzondo yabalandeli kumqeqeshi uSteve Komphela ogcine ezisulele.NgoMgqibelo iPirates izokwamukela iChiefs emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership eFNB Stadium, eNasrec, ngo-3.30 ntambama.UMokwena uthe ekhempini yeChiefs kuyabonakala ukuthi abusekho ubuhlakani nobuholi bukaKomphela, obekuyinto egqamile ngesizini edlule.“Ngokokuqeqesheka, ngaphandle kokuzwakala ngichemile noSteve ngenxa yokuxhumana enginakho naye, ngicabanga ukuthi iChiefs ilahlekelwe kakhulu ngokuhamba kukaSteve. Inhlobo yomholi ayiyona namaqhinga akhe akungatshazwa. Uma uqhathanisa iqembu esibhekane nalo ngesizini edlule naleli lamanje, ngokokuhleleka, ukubona ngokucacile ukushoda ngomqeqeshi ofana naye.“Ngaphandle kokudla amandla omqeqeshi okhona kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi kuyabonakala indlela abebedlala ngayo kusekhona uSteve nendlela abadlala ngayo manje. Uma ucubungulisisa, uyabona kuthi kukhona osekulahlekile,” kusho uMokwena.Kuzoba ngokokuqala umqeqeshi weChiefs uGiovanni Solinas ebhekana nePirates. UKomphela akazange ayihlule iPirates kumasizini amathathu awahlale eNaturena. Akubuzwa ukuthi uthando lwabalandeli ngoSolinas luzovivinyeka ngempelasonto.“Uma ubuka abadlali ababasayinisile, babhukule kakhulu. Abadlali ababasayinisile, basivalile isikhala sokwentula ulwazi kwebhentshi, obeluyindathane ngesizini edlule. Angisho ukuthi abadlali abebekade bekhona ngesizini edlule abekho ezingeni njengabamanje. Kodwa kucacile. Senike namuzwa uSolinas ezisholo yena. Uletha uKhama Billiat kwiChiefs, uManyama (Lebo), kukhona noCastro (Leonardo). Babhukule kakhulu ukuthuthukisa iqembu ngabadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu. Hhayi ngokwengeza isibalo kodwa balethe abadlali abangabawinela imidlalo noma yinini,” kusho uMokwena.UBilliat ubengekho ngesikhathi iChiefs ihlula iBlack Leopards koweLast 16 yeTelkom Knockout ngeSonto. UMokwena uthe nakuba babethanda ukusayinisa uBilliat kodwa bajika umqondo ngemizuzu yokugcina emuva kokubona ukuthi ngeke bayithole inzuzo ngalo mdlali. UMokwena ubeqeqesha uBilliat kwiMameodi Sundowns ngesizini edlule.“UKhama uyazigqugquzela yena. Uma abadlali benza lokho kuncane ukuqeqeshwa abakudingayo. Ngisenobudlelwano obuhle noKhama. Sazama ukusayinisa uKhama. Saqoka ngomzuzu wokugcna ukumyeka. Sakhuluma kakhulu naye sobabili. Sasesisondele kakhulu ukumletha kwiPirates.“Kodwa saqoka ukuvikela ubumbano lweqembu ngoba umehluko phakathi kwesasizolahlekelwa yikhona, ngibala ukulimala nezinye izinto nenzuzo, kugcine kungawenzi umqondo,” kusho uMokwena.Meyelana nomdlalo neChiefs uthe: “Sekunesikhathi siyicubungula iChiefs. Ikhefu leFifa lisisizile ukwenza lokho. Kubalulekie ukuthi abadlali badlalele ukuwina umdlalo hhayi ukunaka ukuba kowabakhaya.”
title: IChiefs ishoda ngomqeqeshi: Rulani

text: Uthando lwabo abasalufihli ngisho phakathi kwabantu. NgoMgqibelo endaweni yobumnandi Eyadini, eMlaza, bebehleli belokhu bebambene beqabulana ungafunga ukuthi bayaqala ukubonana.Bebehambele kule ndawo ngoba u-AKA ubezogubha usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa nabalandeli bakhe.UDJ Zinhle ufike kulo mcimbi kuqala nokuthe kuyoshaya u-9 ebusuku wabe esedlala esiteji. Kuthe eqeda wayohlala endaweni yezicukuthwane * -AKA engekho.Kube sekudedelana oDJ abehlukene okukhona kubo uDJ Mngadi woKhozi FM, DJ Finzo noDJ Sonic.U-AKA obegubha iminyaka engu-31 azalwa, ube esetheleka kwajabula iningi ebelikhona kulo mcimbi.Edilika emotweni uvele wadansela ingoma ebidlala, washaya ivosho wacishe wangena la bekuhleli khona abanye abaculi.Efika lapho bekuhleli khona uDJ Zinhle ufike wabingelela abanye abebehamba nale ntokazi wagcina ngayo njengoba eqale wayibamba baxoxa umzuzwana nokuthe ngemuva kwalokho baqabulana isikhathi eside kucacela noma ubani ukuthi abanandaba.Onogada abebehamba nabo bebengafuni kuthathwe izithombe zabo bebobabili ngamaselula.Umnikazi wale ndawo, uJabulani “Mjay” Zama uhalalisele u-AKA ngobhazabhaza wekhekhe eligcine lidliwa iningi ebelisemcimbini.Umnikazi wale ndawo, uJabulani “Mjay” Zama uhalalisele u-AKA ngobhazabhaza wekhekhe njengoba ebegubha usuku lokuzalwaKulo mcimbi u-AKA akahlalanga esiteji njengoba kube nobuhixihixi bomsindo.Uxolisile wathi ngeke aze acule ngoba kubheda umsindo.“Ngiyaxolisa kakhulu ngiyanithanda kodwa ubuhixihixi bomsindo yibona obungenza nginishiye manje,” kuchaza yena.Abanye abacule kulo mcimbi uDladla Mshunqisi, Tipcee, DJ Mngadi, DJ Meech nabanye.Kulo mcimbi kuphinde kwafika umlingisi odumile uKenneth Nkosi.
title: Luvutha amalangabi oluka-AKA noZinhle

text: BATHANDAZELA ukuthi alulame esibhedlela owesifazane okuthiwa udutshulwe amahlandla amane nguyise wezingane zakhe obeyiphoyisa likaMasipala waseThekwini emzini wakhe ePhilani Valley, eMlaza, ngoMgqibelo.USergeant Mduduzi Buthelezi (41) utholakale eseshonile emgwaqweni u-R603 eMbumbulu ngemuva kokuthi imoto abehamba ngayo ishayisane mahlanze neloli. Kepha okuxake umndeni wakhe wukuthi ubeshile ebusweni enenxeba lokudutshulwa esandleni.Umndeni kaNksz Nompumelelo Mthembu (36) wakwa-Z eMlaza osesesimweni esibucayi esibhedlela, uthe kuyacaca ukuthi uButhelezi ubevele ehlose ukuzibulala ngokuziphosa elolini ngemuva kokushiya ezitshela ukuthi umbulele.Uninakhulu kaNksz Mthembu ohlala nengane yalaba eneminyaka emihlanu, uNkk Miriam Mthembu (77), uthe ubonga uMdali ngokusindisa umzukulu wakhe.“UMpume usinde ngomusa kaNkulunkulu. Umkhwenyana ubethi uyaqeda ngaye. Umdubule ezindaweni ezibucayi, enhlafunweni, phezu kweso nasesifubeni ngasenhliziyweni. Ngokusho kwezingane zabo zabafana ezimbili ebezikhona kwenzeka lokhu, umkhwenyana uqale washayela ucingo lo omncane ona-14 wambuza ukuthi babuya nini ekhaya njengoba sekuzovulwa izikole. Lo omncane umtshele ukuthi bazobuya ngakusasa ngeSonto okusolwa ukuthi yikho okumcasulile. Kuthiwa ushaye imoto esuka kubo kwa-D waqonda lapho bekhona,” kusho uNkk Mthembu.Uthe kuthiwa uButhelezi ungene nezicabha emzini kaNksz Mthembu esephethe isibhamu ngesandla wathi uzoqeda ngaye.“Kuthiwa uMpume ubehleli phansi edla iphalishi ngesikhathi umkhwenyana edubula ebhekise kuye. Kuthiwa utshele izingane zakhe ukuthi aziphume, lo omncane wabaleka wayobiza omakhelwane. Lo omdala ona-18 unqabile ukuphuma wathi uzofa lapho kufa khona unina. UMpume ube esethela umkhwenyana ngephalishi wathola ithuba lokubaleka angene ethoyilethi. Umlandele waze wafika khona wamdubula, babangisana ngesibhamu sebelele phansi. Kuthiwa yilapho umkhwenyana edubuleke khona engalweni, isibhamu saze sathathwa yindodana yabo endala. Uvukile wacela ukuthi imnikeze isibhamu, yanqaba wabe esephuma ehamba,” kusho uNkk Mthembu.Uyise omkhulu kaNksz Mthembu, uMnuz Sipho Mthembu (82) uthe bathole ucingo lubazisa ukuthi umzukulu wabo usedutshulwe nguyise wezingane zakhe.“Sithe sisashaqeke kanjalo sabe sesithola umbiko wokuthi umkhwenyana utholwe eseshonile eMbumbulu ngemuva kokuziphosa elolini. Kusho ukuthi ubevele ehlele ukuzibulala ngoba ushiye ikubo ngemuva nezibhedlela waqonda eMbumbulu.“Waze wazihlaza umkhwenyana! Uthathe isibhamu somsebenzi wayohlasela ngaso. Sidumele kakhulu. NgoLwesihlanu ufikile elethele ingane yakhe encane le esihlala nayo izipho njengoba bekungusuku lwayo lokuzalwa. Kade bathandana noMpume beseyizingane kodwa bekungekho ukuthula phakathi kwabo,” kusho uMthembu.Uthe ngonyaka odlule uButhelezi wafika kubo ehamba noyise nomkhongi wakhe ezomala phambi kwabo njengoba umzukulu ayeselotsholiwe.Uyise kaButhelezi uMnuz Alfred Buthelezi (64) uthe bona kabaxabene nabasekhweni. Izolo bahlanganile emzini wendodana yakhe.“Asinanxa nabo, izingane zisengakubona. Ngizwe kuthiwa zizoyiswa kolulekwa ngokwengqondo,” kusho uButhelezi.
title: Ubezivikela oshise iphoyisa ngepharishi

text: ZIYIHAMBELA kahle izinto ingqwele yomhlaba kwi-800m yabesifazane, uCaster Semenya, othole iziqu zakhe kuleli sonto emkhakheni weSports Science eNorth West University.USemenya uveze lezi zindaba ekhasini lakhe le-instagram ngoLwesibili, efaka isithombe sakhe egqoke ijazi lezifundiswa enze uphawu lokucijisa izandla phezu kwamahlombe ajwayele ukulwenza ngemuva kokunqoba imijaho.Lena kubukeka kuyinyanga ezomphatha kahle uSemenya. Ngempelasonto edlule wephule irekhodi leminyaka engu-35 kwi-1000m.Le mpelasonto kungenzeka iphele esasigcinile isicoco sakhe sakuleli kwi-800m nakwi-1500m njengoba kuqhubeka imidlalo ye-ASA National Championship eTuks Stadium, ePitoli.USemenya ufudukele eNorth West ngo-2015 ngemuva kokuhlukana nowayengumqeqeshi wakhe uMaria Mutola. Ngokusho kwale ntokazi yaseLimpopo, lesi kwakuyisiqalo “esisha empilweni” ngemuva kwesigameko sika-2009 lapho yayisolwa ngokuthi ayikufanele ukugijima nabesifazane ngenxa yendlela edaleke ngayo.“Le ndawo ithule. Akukho okuningi ongakwenza kuyona ngaphandle kokujima, ukudla, ukulala nesikole. Ngifunda iSports Science ngoba ngathatha ikhefu ngemuva kuka-2009 ukuze ngilungise impilo yami,” kusho uSemenya kweminye imithombo yabezindaba.Kusukela lapho lo mgijimi akabange esabheka emuva enqoba igolide kuma-Olympic ngo-2016 kwi-800m. Unyaka wonke odlule akekho omehlulile kuleli banga edla ubhedu kwi-IAAF Diamond League nakwi-IAAF World Championship, nethusi kwi-1500m.Kulo nyaka kubhekwe ukuthi aqhubeke nokuphakamisa ifulegi lakuleli kumaCommonwealth Games aseGold Coast, e-Australia ngo-Ephreli. Nyakenye * -Akani Simbine oyibamba kwi-100m ugcine ezitholile iziqu zakhe ze-Information Science e-University of Pretoria ngemuva kweminyaka emihlanu ezenza.
title: Wethweswe iziqu uCaster Semenya

text: UThuli, wazakhela udumo elingisa indawo kaNamhla kulo mdlalo okhonjiswa ngo-8 ebusuku phakathi nesonto kuSABC 1.Lo mlingisi washiya kwiGenerations: The Legacy wagxila ekubeni nguDJ.Kuvela ukuthi ungomunye wabalingisi abazobonakala kwiThe Republic ezovala isikhathi seThe Herd, ebiphela izolo.OweMzansi Magic, * -Irvin Pooe, uthe imininingwane ephelele bazoyikhipha kuleli sonto.Kumazwibela kuthiwa lo mdlalo ukhuluma ngomengameli wokuqala wesifazane weNingizimu Afrika, uLufuno Zandile Mulaudzi ozimisele ukulwa nenkohlakalo nokubuyisa isithunzi sezwe.Abanye abalingisi abakulo mdlalo, kubalwa kubo uWarren Masemola, Masasa Mbangeni, Siyabonga Thwala, Seputla Sebogodi nabanye.Lona akuwona kuphela umdlalo omusha ozoqala kuMzansi njengoba ngoMsombuluko ozayo ebusuku kuzobonakala Impilo.Izongena esikhaleni seLockdown ngo-8 ebusuku okuzobonakala isiqephu sayo sokugcina namhlanje.Phakathi kwabalingisi abakhona kubalwa kubo oNay Maps owazakhela udumo kuZalo, Desmond Dube, Sthandiwe Kgoroge nabanye. NgoLwesine futhi iyaphela isizini yesithathu yoThando Nesithembu. Izovalwa ngomshado kaMaYeni noMusa Mseleku.Kusuka ngesonto elizayo esikhaleni sayo kuzobuya uhlelo olukhombisa ngempilo kaSomizi, iLiving The Dream.Kule sizini kuzobonakala uSomizi ehlela umshado nesithandwa sakhe uMohale Motaung.NgeSonto ngo-5.30 ntambama kuzoqala isizini ka-15 yomncintiswano womculo ama-Idols SA.
title: ObekwiGenerations emdlalweni omusha

text: KUBANJWE umoya ngokuthi ngabe uzoba khona yini umlenze kulo nyaka weHSBC World Sevens Series, eCape Town okumele ube ngoDisemba. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi kulindwe isinqumo sabaphathi bombhoxo emhlabeni, abasazohlala phansi nohulumeni kucutshungulwe ngezokuphepha kwabantu.Iziphathimandla zombhoxo emhlabeni zizomemezela isinqumo sazo mayelana nokuthi kuzodlalwa yini eCape Town, evamise ukuwadayisa wonke amathikithi ngosuku asuke eqale ngalo ukudayiswa. Lo omunye wemiqhudelwano yokuqala kwesizini entsha ngoba eyangalo nyaka inqanyulwe phakathi kwawiniswa iNew Zealand.Imbangela yalokhu ukuthi amaSevens aseCape Town, aseyafana nemidlalo emikhulu eNingizimu Afrika njengeyamaBhokobhoko, Bafana Bafana, Proteas nomdlalo wabakhaya baseSoweto (oweKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates).Kungase kudale inkinga uma kungukuthi lo mqhudelwano uyadlalwa, njengoba amaqembu abesifazane nabesilisa engu-16 esewonke, bazohlangana kanjani bonke eCape Town, ekubeni kubukeka sengathi uDisemba uzofika izinto zisekude ukuthi zibuyele esimeni emhlabeni wonke.Ngenxa yokuthi amazwe amaningi awakakhululeki ukudedela abantu ukuthi baphume kumbe bangene emingceleni yawo, kubukeka kuzokuba yinkinga ukuthi lo mqhudelwano uqhubeke. Sekungamincelwa ukuthi okungenani uhlehliselwe esinye isikhathi (mhlawumbe ngonyaka ozayo).Le eminye yemibono kaJurie Roux oyisikhulu esiphezulu seSaru ayisho esithangamini nabezindaba ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoLwesibili.“Ngenxa yesimo esikhona angiboni kuzokwethusa abaningi ukuthi singase siphoqeleke ukuthi sihlehlise amaSevens kumbe kungabe kusadlalwa. Konke sizokuthola kubaphathi bethu maduze nje. Esikubona kwenzeke kweminye imiqhudelwano emhlabeni kumele sikulungele ukuthi nathi kuzosifica. Sizolinda sizwe ukuthi abaphathi bathini kodwa le eyemingcele ingase ibe inkinga. Nabaxhasi banendima abayidlalayo kulezi zinto. Isimo abakusona sizoba nomthelela. Sonke sokwazi ekupheleni kwenyanga,” kusho uRoux.
title: Babambe umoya ngesinqumo ngamaSevens

text: UNontuthuko Gumede, uthe kumanje uxabana nomndeni wakhe njengoba evele kwithelevishini emasontweni amathathu edlule elwela indoda. Uthe ubezitshela ukuthi uyalingisa ngoba etshelwe nokuthi kumele akhulume athini, maqede wavalwa umlomo ngoR1000, ukuthi angatsheli abantu ukuthi isiqephu esinaye besingelona iqiniso njengoba kulindelekile ukuthi kuvezwe into eyiqiniso kulolu hlelo.Isiqephu esinaye, sishuthelwe eNtinyane, eMbumbulu. Uthe nezithandani avele nazo kulesi siqephu uyazazi futhi akunankinga phakathi kwazo.“Lapho besishuthela khona kukubo kowesilisa obekuthiwa siyambanga. Uhlala nayo intombi yakhe futhi akukho zinsolo zomjolo ezikhona phakathi kwabo.“Njengoba mina ngikhokhelwe uR1000 ngalesi siqephu, lezi zithandani zinikwe uR2000 ukuthi nazo zingakhulumi.“Ngisho namakhondomu avele kulesi siqephu ayebekwe yimina ngoba kwashiwo ukuthi angenze noma yini ezokwenza isiqephu sikholeke.“Ngenxa yokuthi bengithenjiswe imali engadalulwanga, bengizitshela ukuthi ngizokhokhelwa into ehlakaniphile kanti ngizovalwa umlomo ngoR1000.“Kumanje ngixabene nomndeni wami ngemali engekho, futhi umndeni awukholwa uma ngiwutshela ukuthi bengilingisa,” kusho uNontuthuko.Kulolu hlelo uNontuthuko ubebizwa ngoBlondie, athe yigama alinikwe wuJub Jub ngelanga abelingisa ngalo.Emva kokushuthela lesi siqephu, uthe baze bamncoma bathi unekhono lokulingisa njengoba enze into yakhe yakholeka ukuthi eyangempela kanti kuyadlalwa.UBlondie, uthi ufuna ubulungiswa ngokwenzeke kuyena ekhohliswa ngokulingisa kanti ushuthela Uyajola 9/9 engazi.Uveze ukuthi okubuhlungu abalesi siteshi bamcishise nekhasi lakhe leFacebook ukuze abantu bangakwazi ukumthola.Okhulumela iMoja Love, uLindiwe Mbonambi, uthunyelelwe i-email ebuzwa ngalezi zinsolo zokushutha isiqephu sohlelo esingamanga, wangayiphendula. Esefonelwa uvumile ukuthi bayitholile i-email bazophendula kodwa kwangenzeka lokho.Uphinde wathunyelelwa umyalezo kwiselula nawo wangawuphendula. Esetshelwa ukuthi udaba luzoqhubeka noma bengaphendulanga, ucele ukuthi kuxhunyanwe nomphathi wezinhlelo uBokani Moyo.UBokani naye uthunyelelwe i-email nomyalezo kwiselula kodwa wangaphendula kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.Ngaphambi kokuba ashuthele lolu hlelo uNontuthuko, uthe wacelwa abesilisa ababili abahlangana naye esitaladini eThekwini, bamtshela ngohlelo lwethelevishini abafuna alushuthele kodwa bangalisho igama lalo.
title: Ukhala nge-Uyajola 9/9 uthi imkhohlisile

text: USOMABHIZINISI wesifazane utholakale edindilizile enamanxeba okugwazwa enkulisa yakhe iLittle Flower, esemgwaqweni uHermitage Lane, eThekwini ngoMgqibelo ekuseni.Imbangela yokubulawa kukaNksz Queen Nyuswa (52) ayicaci kodwa kunezinsolo zokuthi ushayisane nomunye wabasebenzi bakhe.Kuthiwa ugcine ukubonakala enkulisa ehlanganisa nejimu ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku enomsebenzi osolwayo.Kunezinsolo zokuthi umsolwa ushaye wachitha noR40 000 obusesisefweni semali.Ekhuluma neSolezwe endaweni yesigameko, uNksz Carmen Bredelle ongomunye wabasebenzi abazithele kuNksz Nyuswa eseshonile, uthe basathuthumela ngabakubonile.Uthe ufike ngo-7 ekuseni ezovula ejimini kwafika omunye uthisha wasenkulisa ocele ukhiye wayo.“Ngizwe esememeza ekhala. Ngithe uma ngiphuthuma ngazithela kuQueen edindilize edamini legazi. Ubenenqwaba yamanxeba okugwazwa emzimbeni. Kusazoba nzima ukususa isithombe engisibonile emqondweni,” kusho uNksz Bredelle.Ilungu lomndeni kamufi, uNksz Nelisiwe Ntuli (40), lichaze uninomncane njengomuntu obenozwelo ethanda ukusiza abantu. Uthe uthukile ethola ucingo lumbikela ukuthi ubulewe.UTHOLWE eshonile enamanxeba okugwazwa uNksz Queen Nyuswa obenenkulisa nejimu edolobheni eThekwini. Isithombe: Leon Lestrade, African News Agency (ANA)“Umamncane ubehlala eflethini la edolobheni. Ubenenkulisa nejimu abeziphilisa ngakho. Asikayazi imbangela yokubulawa kwakhe. Sisathukile, sisadidekile, asazi ubani obengenza into efana nalena,” kusho uNksz Ntuli obekhihla isililo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant Colonel Thulani Zwane, uthe amaphoyisa aseDurban Central aphenya icala lokubulala ngemuva kokutholakala kwesidumbu sowesifazane sinamanxeba okugwazwa.
title: Kubulawe owesifazane obenenkulisa edumile eThekwini

text: FANELESIBONGE BENGUBAPHUMELE obala ngesiminyaminya esenzeka kuGu Jazz Festival yanyakene abahleli balo mcimbi, babe sebethula nezinhlelo zokuthi bazosigwema kanjani kulo nyaka.Ngonyaka owedlule abanye babathandi bomculo abebehambele Ugu Jazz Festival bangena eSports and Leisure Centre sebeculile abaculi ababathandayo baze baphindela emuva. Lokhu kwakudalwa yisiminyaminya sezimoto abebethembise ukuthi ngeke sibe khona.Esithangamini sabezindaba eRiverside Hotel ngoLwesibili ntambama, umhleli walo mcimbi, uSiyabonga Msomi weCyassoundound Events, uvumile ukuthi kukhona okungahambanga kahle ngonyaka owedlule nokwa- holela esiminyaminyeni sezimoto.“Nathi sibuhlungu futhi sasingayifisi leya nto ukuthi yenzeke. Kodwa kulo nyaka sinohlelo esicabanga ukuthi luzosiza kakhulu ukuxazulula inkinga eyenzeka nyakenye. Uhlelo sizolwethula kahle esithangamini sabezindaba esizayo,” kusho uMsomi.Uthe kulo nyaka ngeke bavumele moto ukuthi ingene eSports and Leisure Centre ngoJuni 22 okuyindawo okuba khona kuyo lo mcimbi kodwa kuzoba khona izindawo zokupaka bese abantu bethuthwa ngezimoto ezihleliwe bayiswe enkundleni noma sebefuna ukuhamba zizobe zikhona lezi zimoto.IMeya kaMasipala woGu, uNkk Ntombifikile Gumede, iveze ukuthi imali yokungena kulo nyaka izonyuka ngo-R50 njengoba kuzoba ngu-R250 kuthi i-golden circle kungenwe ngo-R350.Uthe lo mcimbi uyasiza ekulweni nobubha oGwini njengoba intsha ithola imisebenzi yesikhashana.“Ngonyaka odlule kwaba khona isiminyaminya sezimoto kodwa kulo nyaka sizosinciphisa isibalo samathikithi sisuka ku-20 000 siye ku-15 000. Azoqala ukudayisa ngo-Ephreli 25 eComputicket naseShoprite/Checkers,” kusho uNkk Gumede.Uthe abaculi abazobe beshiyelana inkundla yiStimela, Selaelo Selota, Tsepo Tsola, Zonke, Mafikizolo, Carl du Plesis, Tsepo Mngoma, Mbuso Khoza, Naima K, Umkhumbane Jazz Band nabanye abaningi.UMsomi uveze ukuthi kusekhona abanye abaculi abasaxoxisana nabo abazokwethula ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.UNkk Gumede uncome inkampani kaMsomi njengoba inkontileka yeminyaka emithathu iphela kulo nyaka, waveza ukuthi bebenikeza le nkampani u-R1.4 million.Ngaphambi kowe-jazz, kuzoba khona umcimbi wesicathamiya, amahlaya, ingqungquthela yokucobelelana ngolwazi kwezomculo ezodonsa izinsuku ezintathu ne-pre party.
title: Bafuna ukusigwema isiminyaminya aboGu

text: Ababona nje obaba okuba mnandi ukuba seduze kwazo, kodwa nesitayela basiphethe. Njengoba kusasa (June 21) kuwusuku lokubungaza obaba iFather's Day, sibuka labo baba abamnene futhi abaphethe isitayela.Lo mlingisi uke wamenyezelwa njengophethe isitayela ukwedlula wonke amadoda yiphephabhuku iGQ ngaphansi kwesigaba iBest Dressed Man of The Year ngo2019.Uphethe isitayela nokuthi uyazifela ngokuthenga imikhiqizo eyenziwe kuleli lizwe.UWiseman Mncube uyazifela ngezimpahla zokugqoka ezikhiqizwe kuleli Isithombe: Instagram. Thapelo MokoenaUsenze ukudaya intshebe ibempunga kwaba sesitayeleni umlingisi uThapelo Mokoena. Lo menzi wamafilimu okwazi ukugqoka noma yini ayenze ibukeke isesitayeleni ngendlela yokuthi nabanye bafune ukubukeka njengaye.UThapelo Mokoena uhlale eziphihlile ngesitayela. Wenze ukudaya intshebe ibe mpunga kwasesitayeleni Isithombe: Instagram. Useze waziwa ngelikaKing Kotini ngoba isitayela yinto yakhe. Uhlale egqoke ngendlela ehehayo futhi akayingeni eyokugqoka okushibhile. URiky Rick usesitayeleni ngempela. Shapa Boss Zonke!URiky Rick akakufihli ukuthi uyazifela ngezimpahla ezimba eqolo, kodwa uyawudla impela uKotini Isithombe: Instagram.  Akagqoke aconse kodwa uyakwazi ukuhlanganisa noma yini namateku kubukeka kuheha futhi kusesitayeleni. Noma umbona kuphi, ngabe unamanga uma uthi wake wambona egqoke kabi yize esuke eshaye amateku ngezansi kwayo yonke into asuke eyigqokile.Ngisho angagqoka isudi, uhleli ezogqoka namateku kodwa kukho konke ngeke umbone egqoke kabi u-AKA Isithombe: Instagram. Lo mlingisi uhlale esiphethe isitayela. Ngisho nezitayela zasekhanda, uhlale ezokubulala ngazo. Umzimba wakhe ohlalwa nayiluphi uhlobo lwemfashini, kumenza ahlale ebukeka sengathi uwumkhangisi oseqophelweni eliphezulu.Ukuma komzimba kaKay Sibiya kuphelelisa noma yisiphi isitayela asuke ezosibeka emzimbeni wakhe Isithombe: Picture: Instagram.
title: Obaba abahlanu abaphethe isitayela

text: OWAYEQEQESHA uDesiree Ellis, ngesikhathi esengumdlali kwiBanyana Banyana, uNomalungelo Mooi, uthi akumethusanga ukubona impumelelo yakhe njengomqeqeshi ngoba izimpawu zokuba ngumholi wazikhombisa esengumdlali ngaphansi kwakhe.UMooi, owake waba yimenenja jikelele kwiBay United, ubephawula ngokuhlabana kuka-Ellis nomklomelo womqeqeshi ovelele i-Afrika yonke jikelele emcimbini wemiklomelo yeCAF ebiseDakar, eSenegal ngoLwesibili ebusuku. “Mina akungimangazanga ukubona uDesiree ephumelela ngale ndlela ngoba ukuba ngumholi yinto ayikhombisa esadlala ngaphansi kwami kwiBanyana Banyana. Ngicabanga ukuthi mdala kimina ngeminyaka emibili kodwa akakaze akukhombise ukuthi ngiyamelama.“Kunalokho wayelokhu eseduze kwami engisekela ngayo yonke indlela kukho konke engangikwenza,” kusho uMooi.“Ngisho namanje usangibiza ngomqeqeshi uma ngihlangana naye. Ngisho naye uyazi ukuthi ngizizwa kanjani ngempumelelo yakhe. Nangesikhathi enikezwa lo msebenzi ngokugcwele yimina engambongela kuqala ngamtshela ukuthi ngiyamethemba ukuthi uzowenza ngempumelelo.”UMooi uthe impumelelo ka-Ellis ikhomba ukuthi zingadla ekhaya futhi kungabi ndaba zalutho.“Lokhu kuyinkomba yokuthi akudingeki ukuthi uphumele ngaphandle ukuze ubone impumelelo yakho. Kuchaza khona ukuthi abaqeqeshi bethu kufanele sibethemba futhi sibanikeze ithuba,” kuqhuba uMooi.Ephawula ngoThembi Kgatlana othole umklomelo wokuba ngumdlali ovelele wonyaka kwabesifazane nowegoli lonyaka uthe: “Kulo mdlali sinomdlali osezingeni eliphezulu kakhulu ongadlala noma yikuphi emhlabeni. Ngeshwa angikaze ngisebenze naye kodwa ngiqala ukumbona kwiTV edlala, ngambona ukuthi ungumdlali osezingeni lomhlaba.“Le mphumelelo isidweba sigqame isithombe sokuthi baningi oKgatlana abasabalele nayo yonke iNigizimu Afrika.“Kuphela uDesiree nethimba lakhe kudingeka bavunyelwe baphume inqina yokubheka abanye oKgatlana kuyona yonke iNingizimu Afrika. Ukukhuluma iqiniso, nguKgatlana obenesandla esikhulu ekutheni sifinyelele emidlalweni yamanqamu e-2019 FIFA Women’s World Cup, eseFrance.”Usomaqhinga weSAFA uNeil “Mokoko” Tovey, uthe bayaziqhenya ngempumelelo ka-Ellis.“UDesiree usevuna izithelo zokusebenza kwakhe ngokuzikhandla eminyakeni edlule. Ubelokhu ekhona kuzo zonke izindawo lapho kutholakala khona ulwazi ngomsebenzi wakhe. Akakaze ephumule ekuthekeleni ulwazi lokuqeqesha. Omunye umthelela empumelelweni yakhe ukwazile ukwenza iqembu limthande, abadlali balangazelela ukumdlalela, okuyinto emqoka kakhulu uma ungumqeqeshi,” kusho uTovey, echoma nangokuthi iSafa ihamba yodwa e-Afrika ekukhiqizeni abaqeqeshi besifazane.
title: UNomalungelo akumethusanga ukubona impumelelo kaDesiree

text: UMCULI oseneminyaka engaphezulu kuka-20 eyibambile emculweni wokholo, uBenjamin Dube, uqoqe izindondo ezintathu kuhlanganisa neye-Artist of the Decade kumaSABC Crown Gospel Awards abeseNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre, izolo ebusuku.UBenjamin ngo-Agasti ukhiphe i-albhamu ethi Victorious in His Presence ahlomule ngayo indondo yeBest Gospel Producer neyeBest Gospel DVD.Umculi onamava endimeni yomculo wowokholo kuleli, uBenjamin Dube othole izindndo ezintathuUphinde wahlomula ngendondo ye-Artist of the Decade okuwumunxa osungulwe kulo nyaka njengoba amaCrown abegubha iminyaka engu-10 asungulwa.Omunye umunxa obukhona kulo nyaka ngoweBest Gospel Song of the Decade othathwe nguSfiso Ncwane ngengoma ethi Kulungile. Ngenyanga ezayo kuzobe kuphela unyaka uNcwane ashona. Uthatha le ndondo nje kukhona nabaculi abebemfisela ukuthi kube uye oyithathayo ngale ngoma eyaqokwa njengeRecord of the Year kumaSouth African Music Awards ngo-2013. Imiklomelo ebikhonjiswa kuSABC 2 ngo-8 ebusuku beyethulwa nguPearl Modiadie noThabo Mdluli. Kuqale ngokuthi osaziwayo bahambe kukhaphethi obomvu bashuthe izithombe izolo ntambama. Ngo-5 kuqale imiklomelo engakhonjiswa kwithelevishini kwase kuza umdlalo weshashalazi okhuluma ngoJesu iMaria nokulingisa kuwo uJessica Nkosi noBrian Temba.Kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela ingakamenyezelwa imiphumela yeBest Gospel Song of the Year neyeBest Gospel Artist of the Year njengoba bekusaqhubeka ukuvota.Uhla lwabanqobile lumi kanje:1. BEST GOSPEL ENGINEER - SHAYNE KISTEN SAMMY (DCC WORSHIP - OVERFLOW)2. BEST GOSPEL POP - THE PLAIN TRUTH (ANTHOLOGY)3. BEST GOSPEL RAP - CHURCH BOYYZ BIZNESS (THE RAIN IS FALLING)4. BEST CHURCH CHOIR - 3C LIVE (YOUR NAME)5. BEST GOSPEL PRODUCER - BENJAMIN DUBE (VICTORIOUS IN HIS PRESENCE)6. BEST GOSPEL NEWCOMER - TUMI B (UNCAPPED WORSHIP TRUST)7. BEST GOSPEL POETRY - NOKWETHEMBA MCHUNU (WE WON’T LOOSE OUR PRAISE)8. BEST GOSPEL R&B - ISRAEL IZZIE MKHIZE (MY STORY LINE)9. BEST GOSPEL VIDEO - NTETHELELO (NGAPHANDLE KWAKHO)10. BEST GOSPEL ROCK - DCC WORSHIP (OVERFLOW)11. BEST CONTEMPORARY GOSPEL SONG - LYNETTE JONATHAN (YOU ARE NOT ALONE)12. BEST GOSPEL CLAP AND TAP - THE BOOK OF LEKGOWA (KE KGODISITSE BANA)13. BEST GOSPEL ACAPELLA - REALITY 7 (ENDUMISWENI)14. BEST GOSPEL COMMUNITY OUTREACH BY ARTIST/GROUP- SBU BANDA15. BEST GOSPEL JAZZ - TSHEPO MNGOMA (THEMBA LAMI)16. BEST GOSPEL ITENDE - NKOSANA THABILE (SAWUBONA JESU)17. BEST GOSPEL GROUP - SPIRIT OF PRAISE 18. BEST GOSPEL WORSHIP SONG - GOSPEL GOES CLASSICAL FT MAHALIA BUCHANAN (HOLY)19. BEST TRADITIONAL GOSPEL - SENZO KHUMALO (KUNENDODA)20. BEST GOSPEL CLASSIC OF ALL TIME - TEBOHO (O MOSA O MOHAU)21. BEST GOSPEL PRAISE SONG - SPIRIT OF PRAISE VOLUME 6 (UNGENZELA KONKE OKUHLE)22. BEST GOSPEL DVD - BENJAMIN DUBE (VICTORIOUS IN HIS PRESENCE)23. BEST GOSPEL ALBUM - LEBO SEKGOBELA (RESTORED)24. BEST GOSPEL MALE - NEYI ZIMU25. BEST GOSPEL COLLABORATION PASTOR NGWENYA AND THINA ZUNGU - UJESU UFIKA EKUSENI26. THE BEST OF AFRICA - NDUDUZO MATSE, SWAZILAND (GELEKEQE)27. BEST GOSPEL FEMALE - PUTUMA TISO28. BEST GOSPEL SONG WRITER - DUMI MKOKSTAD (ULWANDLE)29. BEST GOSPEL COMMUNITY RADIO SHOWMOGALE FM - DITHORISO30. BEST GOSPEL RADIO SHOW - COMMERCIAL/PBS LIGWALAGWALA FM - SIYADVUMISA31.
