GOSPEL TV SHOW 1 GOSPEL - THE JOURNEY32. BEST GOSPEL AMAZION - JOYOUS OF GOD MASS CHOIR33. BEST MASKANDI GOSPEL - ABAFANA BAKAMGQUMENI34. BEST GOSPEL SONG OF THE DECADE - SFISO NCWANE (KULUNGILE BABA)35. BEST GOSPEL ARTIST OF THE DECADE - BENJAMIN DUBEUMLINGISI weSibaya, uJessica Nkosi, ubekumaCrown Gospel AwardsUSHUTHE nabalandeli bakhe uSipho Ngwenya wengoma ethi UJesu Ufika Ekuseni kumaCrown GospelUMCULI obuye abe ngumfundisi uSolly Mahlangu ufike esephakamise izandla ebingelela abalandeli bakhe abebegcwele e-ICC izolo
title: Uwole izindondo ezintathu uDube

text: UNETHEMBA lokuthi basazophinde bathole ithuba lokuziphindisela kwiWestern Province, uLwazi Mvovo, odlala ophikweni kwiSharks.UMvovo uthe akufanele nakancane baqhuzuke kule midlalo esibasalele kwiCurrie Cup, ngoba bafuna ukuthi bafike kowamanqamu kulo mqhudelwano.Ngesizini edlule kube esifanayo, njengoba la maqembu efike adlala kweyamaqoqo, nokugcine ngokuthi aziqwaqwade zonke emakhanda ahlangana kowamanqamu eKings Park Stadium, eThekwini.Ngeshwa leSharks, yakhala ngaphansi kulowo mdlalo. Osekuphinde kwathela usawoti esilondeni wukuthi ezikaRobert Du Preez Snr ziphinde zehluleka ukuziphindiselela emasontweni edlule kwiProvince njengoba zikhale ngaphansi ngo 50-28.NgoMgqibelo iSharks izotholana phezulu neqembu elibhubhayo yinduku kwiCurrie Cup, iTafel Lager Griquas, esanqobe umdlalo owodwa kwemihlanu selokhu kuqale isizini. Lo mdlalo uzoqala ngo-3 ntambama, eTafel Lager Park, eKimberley.“Sengike ngasinqoba isicoco seCurrie, amahlandla ambalwa, kodwa kungangijabulisa ukuthi siphinde sisinqobe lesi sicoco ngenxa yomsebenzi onzima owenziwa kwiSharks ngabantu abathile ngaphakathi engikholelwa ekutheni kufanele sibabonge ngaso lesi sicoco. Yebo, iProvince iyona eyizimbangi zethu kodwa nginethemba lokuthi sisazolithona ithuba lokuziphindisela,” usho kanje uMvovo ngemuva kokuziqeqesha nezakhe izolo eKings Park.Ebuzwa ngokuthi ngabe balindele umdlalo onjani kwiGriquas, uMvovo uthe: “Bayiqembu elingenzanga kahle kwiCurrie Cup kule sizini. Banqobe kuphela umdlalo owodwa isizini yonke. Yebo lona kuzoba ngumdlalo weGriquas wokugcina, bazofuna ukuthi bavale ngegiya eliphezulu ngokuthi bashaye iSharks. Asizovuma neze ukuthi lokhu kwenzeke, ngoba nathi asisafuni ukuqhuzuka nakancane. Sifuna ukuwudlalela ekhaya umdlalo we-semi final”.Ngokusho kukaMvovo, kubalulekile ukuthi bona njengabadlali abadala eqenjini babe yisibonelo esihle kubadlali abancane.“Thina ngesikhathi sifika kwiSharks kwakukhona abadlali abafana no-Odwa Ndungane nabanye esasibukela kubona. Kuyangijabulisa ukuthi namhlanje nami sekunabadlali abancane abafikile eqenjni abathi babukela kimina. Kubalulekile ukuthi nxa kukhona umuntu obukela kuwena, ungashibiliki ngoba usuke ekubhekile. Kungakho sizoyibamba ishisa, sifundise abadlali abancane ukuthi kumelwana kanjani nezimo ezahlukene kulo mdlalo,” kubeka uMvovo.IGriquas isashaye iFree State Cheetahs ngo 52-24 kuphela selokhu kuqale isizini.
title: ISharks ethubeni lokubuyisa izinduku

text: UHULUMENI waseZimbabwe usunqume ukunxephezela abalimi abamhlophe abadlelwa umhlaba ngesikhathi leli lizwe likhetha ukusabalalisa kabusha umhlaba uphucwe abamhlophe eminyakeni engu-20 edlule.Izwe laseZimbabwe, ngaphansi kobuholi bukaMnuz Robert Mugabe, laxosha abalimi abamhlophe ababalelwa ku4 500 umhlaba wabo wanikezwa imindeni yaboHlanga engu-300 000.Lokhu iZimbabwe yakwenza njengendlela yokulungisa ukudliwa komhlaba wakuleliya lizwe abantu bangaphandle, okuyinto eyahlukanisa izwe phakathi.UMengameli Emmerson Mnangagwa ubona ukunxephezela abalimi abamhlophe ngo$17.5 million kuyinto ezolungisa ubudlelwane beZimbabwe namazwe aseNtshonalanga.“Ukubhaliswa kwabalimi kuzophothulwa ekupheleni kwenyanga ka-Ephreli nonyaka. Ngemuva kwalokho sizoqala sikhokhele abalimi abadala (abadlelwa umhlaba)” kusho uMnyango weziMali nezoLimo esitatimendeni ngoMsombuluko.Bathe uhlelo lokubhaliswa kwabalimi luholwa yiCommercial Farmers Union (CFU) kanye nekomidi elimele laba balimi.Ikomidi elihlanganisa izikhulu zikahulumeni nabalimi lizohlaziya isimo samapulazi adlelwa abalimi bakudala bese liyacubungula ukuthi bafanelwe ukukhokhelwa imali engakanani.Uhulumeni uveze ukuthi imali abazoyikhokha eyezakhiwo nezinsiza kusebenza ezatholwa kulawa mapulazi, hhayi umhlaba abawudlelwa.Abantu abafika baqinela izizwe zase-Afrika bazisikela kwelinonile emhlabeni waseZimbabwe kulandela ukukhululeka kwaleliya lizwe ngo-1980. Inqwaba yabamnyama yasala ingenawo umhlaba, nokwaholela ekutheni uMugabe ashaye umthetho wokuthi bakhishwe.
title: IZimbabwe izonxephezela abalimi abamhlophe abadlelwa umhlaba

text: UFUNA ukuqeda nya ngezingozi zezitimela uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha uMnuz Fikile Mbalula kwazise izolo uzifikele mathupha eThekwini wahlola isimo sezitimela dolobha.UMbalula ubehambisana neRailway Safety Regulator ngesikhathi ehlola izitimela.“Ngesikhathi ngethula inkulumo yami ngasho ukuthi ukuphepha kwezitimela kuzoba seqhulwini lezinhlelo zethu. Yingakho namhlanje sigasele kwaTransnet Freight Rail ukuzobheka ukuthi izitimela ziyayilandela yini imithetho yokuphepha,” kusho uMbalula.Uthe ubheke izitimela ezithwala impahla ngoba ezingozini eziwu-4 478 ezenzeke ngonyaka odlule, eziwu-2 360 bekungezezitimela zakwaTransnet Freight Rail.Uthe izingozi zezitimela zinyuke ngo-10% nyakenye. “Inhloso yami wukuziqeda nya izingozi zezitimela ngoba abantu bakithi abaningi basebenzisa zona. Ukuze umnotho wethu ukhule kufanele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi izitimela zihamba kahle, ziphephile futhi zifika ngesikhathi lapho kufanele ziye khona.”Uthe ngokuhamba konyaka uzobuyela ePhalamende ayothula iRailway Safety Bill afuna iphasiswe ibe wumthetho ukuze izitimela ziqashwe ngisho nangamaphoyisa kahulumeni. Lokhu uthe ukwenzela ukwehlisa izingozi zezitimela. Mayelana nohlelo lokuxazulula izinkinga zezitimela olubizwa nge-war room ayithule kwaPrasa ngeledlule, uMbalula uthe konke kuhamba kahle. “Amathimba ayahlangana zonke izinsuku ukubhunga ngezingqinamba ezahlukene zezitimela. Kuba namasu okuxazulula lezi zinkinga ngoba ngifuna izitimela zifike ngesikhathi kuzo zonke izindawo. Ngiyazi sizozixazulula zonke izinkinga zezitimela ngoba sisebenza ngokuzikhandla.”Uthe isitimela akade esihlola sakhiwe kuleli akusilo iqiniso ukuthi sivela eChina.Ucele izintatheli ukuthi zingalokhu zimbuza izinto angazizelanga eThekwini njengoba ezinye bezibuza ngenkinga yamaloli nokuthi kunezitimela ezilandwa eChina.
title: Inhloso yami wukuziqeda nya izingozi zezitimela - Mbalula

text: ABAZALI besikole samabanga aphansi eMpangeni bakhathazekile ngothisha okuthiwa akafundisi kusukela ngenyanga edlule ngenxa yokubanga umsebenzi nomunye uzakwabo.Abafundi bakaGrade 6 noGrade 7 eMandlakala Primary kuthiwa bagcine ukufunda ngenyangaedlule ngenxa yokuthi uthisha wabo ufika esikoleni asayine bese eyaqhetha angafundisi.Umthombo osondelene nalolu daba, uthe abazali bakhathazeke ngokuthi njengoba kuphela ithemu yokuqala, izingane zabo zizofakelwa maphi amamaki emariphotini. Uthisha wesifazane, esinalo igama lakhe, kuthiwa ufundisa i-English kwaGrade 6 abuye afundise i-Economics and Management Services kwaGrade 7.Kuthiwa ikilasi abalibangayo ngelikaGrade 7.“Omunye uthisha abanga naye akanankinga uyaqhubeka nokufundisa. Yena wagcina ukufundisa ngoFebhuwari 11.“Uyafika esikoleni asayine ibhukulokuthi ufikile emsebenzini kodwa lutho ukungena ekilasini. Uthishanhloko usezame wahluleka ukuluxazulula udaba.“Ngempelasonto uthisha wabiza abafundi bakaGrade 7 ukuthi bazofunda ngoba ebona ukuthi sekuyabhalwa,” kusho umthombo.Uthisha, okuthiwa ungundlovukayiphikiswa, kuthiwa usehlule nothishanhloko. Isigungu sabazali kuthiwa sibikelwe ngodaba kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa,uthe ngoMsombulukoabahloli babe nomhlangano bathatha nesinqumo ngalolu daba.“Kutholakale ukuthi othisha bebebanga umthamo wokusebenza.“Uthisha utsheliwe ukuthi kumele azame ukuphusha umsebenzi olahlekile ngesikhathi kunezinkinga kodwa uphenyo lomnyango lusaqhubeka,” kusho uMlotshwa.
title: Bakhathazekile ngothisha ongafundisi

text: BAZOVELA namhlanje ezinkantolo ngamacala obugebengu abafundi abangu 21 basemaNyuvesi amabili aKwaZulu-Natal.Abafundi abangu-13 baseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu, KwaDlangezwa abasolwa ngokugqekeza bantshontshe ama-laptop, izincwadi nezinye izimpahla ebezigcinwe esitolo esidayisa izincwadi kule nyuvesi, kulindeleke ukuthi bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi eMthuzini ngecala lokugqekeza nelokweba. Abayisishiyagalombili ababoshelwe ukucekela phansi impahla yaseDurban University of Technology (DUT) nokuzama ukushisa unogada wakulesi sikhungo ngophethroli kulindeleke ukuthi bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini.UCaptain Nqobile Gwala okhulumela amaphoyisa akulesi sifundazwe, uthe ithimba lamaphoyisa aseKing Cetshwayo, abephenya ngokugqekezwa kwesitolo sezincwadi kule nyuvesi, uthe athole ama-laptop, amakhompyutha, izikhwama , izincwadi nokunye. Uthe abasolwa abahlanu kwabangu-13 babanjwe nezinye zalezi zimpahla.UCapt Gwala uthe abasolwa ecaleni baneminyaka ephakathi kuka-20 no-34. Izolo abanye babafundi abeseka abafundi baseDUT baye enkantolo batshelwe ukuthi abasolwa bazovela namhlanje enkantolo.UNksz Gcina Nhleko okhulumela iNyuvesi yasoNgoye, uthe bangakuqinisekisa ukuthi kwagqekezwa esitolo sezincwadi kodwa ngeke bakuqinisekise ukuthi ababoshiwe bangabafundi basoNgoye.“Sizolinda uphenyo lwamaphoyisa oluzosho ukuthi abasolwa ngabe bangabafundi bale nyuvesi noma cha,” kusho yena.
title: Abafundi enkantolo kugqekezwa enyuvesi

text: BAZOVELA eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini namuhla, abasolwa abane ababhekene ngecala lokubamba inkunzi.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa aseDurban Central, abegadile emgwaqweni uMatthews Meyiwa oseThekwini, izolo ngenkathi elunywa indlebe nguzakwabo ngomgilwa obanjwe inkunzi. Kuthiwa umgilwa ubanjwe inkunzi wakhonjwa ngommese ngamadoda amathathu, abe esengena emotweni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa enze ucwaningo ngemoto ebihamba izigilamkhuba. Imoto itholakale emgwaqweni uMngeni ezintathakusa ngo-3.“Kutholakale abasolwa abane emotweni, ngenkathi amaphoyisa esesha imoto athole iselula kamgilwa, nommese okusolakala ukuthi yiwona abawusebenzisile ngenkathi bebamba inkunzi,” kulandisa uCaptian Gwala.Uqhube wathi abasolwa abalinganiselwa eminyakeni ewu-20 kuya ku-28 babhekene namacala okubamba inkunzi, nokutholakala nesikhali esiyingozi.UCapt Gwala uthe, “Imoto ebisetshenziswa ngabasolwa ithathwe ngamaphoyisa, yayiswa ephawundini ukuze kwenziwe uphenyo, iselula etholakele ibuyiselwe kumnikazi wayo.”
title: Bazovela enkantolo abasolwa ngokubamba inkunzi

text: UMCULI iphimbo lakhe elizwakala ezingomeni ezishisa izikhotha ezindaweni zobumnandi, uSimmy, uthe wasebenzisa isicucu semfundo ephakeme njengethikithi lokungena emculweni.USimphiwe “Simmy” Nhlangulela (24) odabuka eTugela Ferry, eMsinga, uthe abazali bakhe babengayizwa eyokuthi abe wumculi.“Ngemuva kokuqeda u-matric eGreytown High ngahamba ngayofunda eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal lapho ngenze khona iBachelor of Social Science Government Business & Ethics,” kusho uSimmy.Uthe ngemuva kokupho-thula izifundo, ngo-2016 uthuthele eGoli engayile ukuyofuna umsebenzi kodwa eyoqala umculo.“Ngaya eGoli ngazi ukuthi ngiyokwenzani. Ngahlangana noSun-El Musician e-UKZN sakhuluma kancane kodwa ngaleso sikhathi ngangisagxile ezifundweni zami. Ngangazi ukuthi ukuze ngiwuqhube kahle umculo kufanele ngiphothule izifundo zami kuqala,” kuchaza yena.Uqhube wathi kusukela eqalile izinto zimhambela kahle. Iphimbo lakhe lizwakala kwi-albhamu yokuqala kaSun-El Musician ethi Africa to the World. Ucula engomeni ethi Sonini nethi Ntaba Ezikude.“Ngithanda umculo wakudala. Ngesikhathi ngikhula ubaba wayedlala kakhulu iSoul Brothers, Platform One, Dolly Parton noLetta Mbulu. USun-El uma enza umculo yonke into uyenza phambi kwami. Uma esebheka izinsimbi ngiyayizwa enye ukuthi ingikhumbuzani bese ngiyaqala ngiyabhala,” kusho uSimmy.Lo mculi uthe iyamethusa indlela umculo awenzayo othakaselwa ngayo ngoba yinto abengayilindele. Muva nje usanda kukhipha ingoma yakhe ethi Ubala apike kuyo uSun-El Musician.Uthe yingoma yakhe yokuqala ezoba kwi-albhamu azoyikhipha ngaphansi kwe-El World Music kaSun-El Musician aqopha kuyo.“I-albhamu ngizoyikhipha ngoSepthemba. Ngizoyiqamba ngokuthi yiTugela Fairy ngoba ngiqhakambisa indawo engiqhamuka kuyo nothando enginalo lwezinganekwane.”Uphethe ngokuthi abantu mabangazenyezi ngezindawo abasuka kuzo ngoba lokho ngeke kubavimbe ekufezeni amaphupho abo.
title: Uthuswa ukuthakaselwa komculo wakhe uSimmy

text: IKHOMISHINI ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana ithi uzothathelwa izinyathelo zomthetho owayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Gedleyihlekisa Zuma kulandela isimemezelo sakhe sokuthi ngeke aphinde elubhade kule khomishini. UZuma ushaqe abaningi kuleli ngoMsombuluko eshicilela isitatimende ecacisa ukuthi ayikho into asazoyikhuluma nekhomishini kaZondo kulandela isinqumo seNkantolo Yomthethosisekelo esimphoqayo ukuthi ayophekwa ngemibuzo kuyo. Iphendula lesi sitatimende izolo ebusuku, ikhomishini ithe akazikhohliwe engaphezulu komthetho uZuma futhi kuyaxaka ukuziba kwakhe umyalelo weNkantolo Yomthethosisekelo ngoba nanamhlanje njengomuntu owayengumengameli kuleli usahlomula ngenxa yemithetho eyaphasiswa yile nkantolo. “USihlalo wekhomishini (Raymond Zondo) usecele unobhala wekhomishini, ozolekelelwa abameli bayo, ukuthi abike uZuma emaphoyiseni ngokushaya indiva umyalelo wenkantolo wokuthi avele kwiKhomishini kusukela ngoJanuwari 18 kuya kuJanuwari 22 nonyaka.” IKhomishini iqhube yaxwayisa uZuma ukuthi uma eqhubeka engaveli ngoFebhruwari 15 kuya ku-19, uzothathelwa ezinye izinyathelo zomthetho. Ithe bakuqaphile ukuthi uZuma usahlesela uZondo esitatimendeni sakhe ngakho uZondo usazoziphendulela yena eceleni kwakushilo ngaye. Esitatimendeni sakhe uZuma ugxeke uZondo ngesinqumo sakhe sokungahoxi ekubeni nguSihlalo weKhomishini, waphinde wasola izinkantolo ngokungamphathi ngendlela efanayo njengezinye izakhamizi zakuleli.
title: UZuma uzothathelwa izinyathelo zomthetho kulandela isinqumo sokungalubeki kwiKhomishini

text: UKAPUTENI we-Orlando Pirates uHappy Jele, uvumelana nomqeqeshi wakhe uJosef Zinnbauer ekutheni udonga lwabo emuva luyavuza. UJele nozakwabo abenzanga kahle neze bebhekene neLamontville Golden Arrows bengenelwa amagoli amabili abashayisile, ngenxa yamaphutha abo abengagwemeka. Bagcine beshaywe ngo-2-0, wamagoli kaPule Mmodi kulo mdlalo obekulindeleke ukuthi benze kahle kuwona, ikakhulukazi njengoba beze kuwona ngemuva kokwehlula omkhaya iKaizer Chiefs ngo-2-1 ngeledlule.Kusasa eZimnyama zizobheka noThongathi FC, emdlalweni weLast 32 kwiNedbank Cup. Akulona iqembu elingathathwa kancane uThongathi kwazise nakwiGladAfrica Championship, lenza kahle njengoba lisendaweni yesithupha. Abanye babalandeli beBucs, sebeqalile bagxeka amaqhinga abaqeqeshi babo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Bakholelwa ekutheni uZinnbauer nethimba lakhe bebengenza okungcono kakhulu emidlalweni abahlulwe kuyo noma abayidlale ngokulingana. Ngenxa yezinga eliphezulu labadlali iPirates ebathengile, abathandi bebhola kuleli babheke ukuthi okungenani kube iyona ebhincisela nxanye iMamelodi Sundowns kodwa kuze kube manje, lokhu kubukeka kuseyiphupho. UJele utshele izintatheli ukuthi akufanele nakancane kugxekwe abaqeqeshi ngokuboza kwabo kodwa kufanele bezinuke bona amakhwapha njengabadlali."Lo mqeqeshi okukhulunywa ngaye sinqobe naye isicoco seMTN 8. Lokhu ngeke kushintshe kanjalo nje. Ngicabanga ukuthi kufanele kuyekwe ukugxekwa kwabaqeqeshi, kodwa sizibuke thina njengabadlali ukuthi ngempela yini le esingayenzi kahle? “Iqiniso wukuthi kumele sibhukule. Asenzi kahle neze, nomgqigqo kasinawo. Nathi emuva kumele sixhumane kangcono ukuze sizokwazi ukuvala kahle amagoli, angasingeneli kalula," kusho uJele.UZinnbauer, usale uxakekile ngomehluko omkhulu okhonjiswe yezakhe zibhekene neLamontville Golden Arrows, ekubeni ngempelasonto kade zihambela phezulu ngokwehlula abakhaya iChiefs.Ngokusho kukaZinnbauer, udonga lwakhe lwasemuva lwenze amaphutha abengawalindele ekubeni ludlale kahle kakhulu lubhekene neChiefs."Ngempelasonto sidlale kahle kakhulu, nasemuva sakwazi ukuvala sanqoba. Sesibhekene ne-Arrows angazi bekwenze njani. Kungena igoli lokuqala silalile, bekumele sisheshe, ngoba ibhola liphumile sabanjwa yinomfi, sathela phansi imizimba senza kancane, langena igoli. Kwelesibili, uMaela (Innocent), akaxhumanga kahle nonozinti wethu, ubezitshela ukuthi unozinti usemuva kwakhe kanti unozinti uzihlalele epalini. Ngaleyo ndlela kwangena igoli lesibili. Amagoli obekungafanele neze asingenele lawa thina. Ngihleze ngishumayela ukuthi kumele uma sidlala, singabi nezikhawu kodwa sidlale imizuzu angu-90 nangaphezulu," kusho uZinnbauer.Sekuke kwenzeka eminyakeni edlule iPirates yangena ehlazweni yehlulwa yiqembu elingazelwa lutho iMaluti FET College ngo 4-1, kuwona lo mqhudelwano.
title: OweBucs uvuma eyokuvuza ngasemuva

text: UZINIKELE emaphoyiseni umlisa (28) waseMgungundlovu osolwa ngokuthumba ingane ayinqume ikhanda emuva kokutshela unina ukuthi uyithumbe ngoba ejezisa yena ngokugxambukela ezindabeni zakhe nobeyintombi yakhe.Kuthiwa lo mlisa waseSwapo, eMgungundlovu , uzinikele emaphoyiseni ngoLwesibili ntambama emuva kokuthi enyamalale no-Andile Malwande Fihla (11) ngoLwesihlanu oludlule.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Thembeka Mbele, uthe emuva kokuzinikela lo mlisa ube esekhombisa amaphoyisa lapho okulahlwe khona isidumbu sengane.“Umsolwa uholele amaphoyisa ehlathini elisemuva kwaseBlubell Drive, eNorthdale, kwatholakala ikhanda lifihlwe ngaphansi kwembokodo ligoqwe ngezingubo.“Amaphoyisa aqhubeke aya kwenye indawo eyihlathi lapho bethole isidumbu somfana sesonakele. Umsolwa kulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo maduze.”Isolezwe libike ngoLwesibili ngezinsolo zokuthunjwa kwale ngane umsolwa okuthiwa wayithatha iya esikoleni ngoba ethi ufuna inombolo kanina yocingo.Unina wayo uNksz Lindiswa Khuboni wathi lo mlisa wabashayela ucingo wathi ingane ikuyena futhi uzoyiletha uma kungabuya umngani wakhe, uNksz Samkelisiwe Mbeje (32) owayeyintombi yakhe.Ethintwa ngalolu daba uNksz Mbeje uthe namanje akayikholwa into eyenziwe yilo mlisa obeyisoka lakhe ahlukane nalo ngoSepthemba nonyaka emuva kokuthi limtshele ukuthi likhulelise omunye umngani wakhe okungeyena (uNksz Khuboni). Ngokusho kwakhe, bebejwayelene kakhulu noNksz Khuboni ngoba ubemgadela enye ingane yakhe encane kuno-Andile. Uthe akuvumi nokuthi akhulume ngomsolwa ngenxa yesihluku asenzile. Uthe bese bethandane kusuka ngo-2013 nomsolwa kodwa abanangane.“Ngesikhathi sesikhuluma naye ushilo ukuthi ufuna sihlangane adedele ingane bese ethatha mina. Ngathi ayikho inkinga. Sahamba saya lapho ayethi akuhlanganwe khona kodwa sangabe sisamfica. Ngisola ukuthi wabona amaphoyisa ngoba sasihamba nawo. Nakwezinye izinsuku wathi asihlangane kodwa wangabe esatholakala,” kusho uNksz Mbeje.Uthe lo mlisa akazi ukuthi yini ebiyenza lo mlisa athi, uNksz Khuboni ugxambukela ezindabeni zakhe ngoba alukho olungako abebeluxoxa naye kanti futhi nesinqumo sokumshiya wazithathela yena.Izolo, uyise omncane ka-Andile, uMnuz Nkosinathi Fihla, uthe namanje basashaqekile ngokwenziwe yilo mlisa. Uthe uqale washaya unina ka-Andile wamphula ingalo njengoba namanje esafake ukhonkolo.“Ingane uyinqume wase eyilahla ehlathini, ikhanda belikwenye indawo nomzimba ewushiye kwenye. Akayena umuntu ofanele ukuhlala nabanye abantu. Siwumndeni besifisa sengathi angangadedelwa ngebheyili futhi athole isigwebo esinzima kodwa-ke umthetho ubuye uhambe ngenye indlela,” kusho uFihla.
title: Uzinikele emaphoyiseni ‘onqume’ ingane

text: OWAYENGUMSAKAZI woKhozi FM, uNgizwe “Zulu Charmer ” Mchunu, uthi ubengahlohli abantu ukuthi bashaye indiva imigomo yeCovid-19 kodwa bebevukwe wusinga namabutho. UNgizwe ubonakale evunule ekhiphazela eze wabhudla nesihlangu, esho ngeheheba lehawu ehamba aze asikizele.Lo msakazi uphawule nge-video yakhe esabalele ehambele ukutshalwa kweSilo uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu esigodlweni, KwaKhethomthandayo, ngoLwesine. Kule video, uzwakala ethi ayikho indaba yemigomo yeCovid-19 aze athuke ngisho inhlamba. “Kuyogqagqana bona laba abafake amasudi amnyama, thina cha ngeke. Kumnandi ukuba yibutho bafana bakithi ngoba awuyingeni indaba yokugqagqana, ’’ kusho uNgizwe kwenye i-video. Uphinde azwakale ehlohla amabutho, ekhuluma nomkhuzi wawo, uMgilija, ethi amadoda angekho angamagwala. Ngesikhathi ebuzwa ngalokhu, uvele wavuka ngolaka, wakhuluma kakhulu ememeza ethi abantu mabangadideki ngoba ucacisile kwenye i-video ukuthi abadala nabagulayo bangezi, akuhambe abasebasha. “Phindelani ku-video yami niyolalela kahle lapho bengisho khona ukuthi akuhambe thina esisenomnkantsha olula. Besingeke siyeke ukuyotshala inkosi yethu ngoba nabe-ANC babeminyene beyongcwaba ubaba (Andrew) Mlangeni eGoli bavukwa yimizwa ngoba yiqhawe labo,’’ kuchaza uNgizwe. Uqhubekile wabhoka, esho khona ukuthi akafuni ukufunzwa amagama yena. Uthe kukhona lapho ibutho eliphazame khona kodwa akubanga nomonakalo. “Ukusabisa amaphoyisa nokufohla ngenkani bekungafanele kwenzeke ngoba amaphoyisa angabantu bomthetho kodwa nawo abonile ukuthi asiqondile okubi,’’ kuchaza yena. Okhulumela indlunkulu, uMntwana uThulani Zulu, uthe ngeke basho lutho ngalolu daba. “Thina sishonelwe, ngeke sizixake ngokuthi sizophawula ngabo bonke abantu abakhuluma izinto zabo. Sizama ukubhekana nesimo, ukunaka labo bantu kosisiza ngani?’’ kusho uMntwana uThulani.Bekuminyene utshumo endlunkulu amabutho eviliyela engafake ngisho izifonyo, engazi nanyaka. Kuphoqe ukuba akhuzwe wuNdunankulu kaZulu, uMntwana uMangosuthu Buthelezi. UShenge ethula inkulumo emsakazweni, uKhozi FM, ukhulumile ngokwephulwa kwemigomo, wathi kumphathe kabi. “Kukhona ozwakale ethi fokofo indaba yemigomo yeCovid-19 kanti bekukhona abantu bebuthene beyinqwaba iningi labo lingazifakile izifonyo. Umonakalo cishe uzoba mkhulu emuva kwalokhu,’’ kuchaza uShenge.
title: UNgizwe uphika eyokwedelela imigomo yeCovid-19

text: NKOSIKHONA CELELITITINYWE amaphoyisa ibhungu elinguBen 10 ebeligoloza ukwaliwa uSugar mama walo, abese bethembisene naye umshado likhala ngokuthi alisoze lahlukana “nosofasilahlale” walo.USiyethemba Zulu (28) waseClermont, entshonalanga yeTheku, uthi uphelile yisibhaxu amaphoyisa emshayela ukuthi ubenqaba ukwaliwa yisinqandamathe sakhe seminyaka emibili, ashiyana naso ngeminyaka engu-16, uNkz Lungile Mthembu (44) waseManguzi ongumhlengikazi Etshelimyana Clinic.UZulu uthi okumvelele uyokuxoxela amagwababa echobana. Elandisa uthi bekunguLwesine ngezithuba zantambama ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ezithela kuyena nesithandwa sakhe benengxabano ebishubile ngaphandle kwaseFlethini, iCity Life, eThekwini lapho okuhlala khona lo wesifazane. Uthi amaphoyisa anele abona ukuthi kukhona ukuhilizisana phakathi kwabo, asondela eduze.“Azwile ukuthi uLungi uyangala. Mina bengingafuni angale bengimncenga ngoba bengikholwa ukuthi ubudlelwane bethu singabulungisa. Okungixakile amaphoyisa avele angingenela ngesibhaxu angisakaza ngezimpama, amanye angijikijela ngezibhakela. Ngesikhathi engishaya ebengibuza ukuthi yini edala ukuthi nginqabe ukwaliwa uSugar mama. Abengishaya engihlanganyela engu-4, ”usho kanje.Uthi amdonse ngenkani amphonsa ngemuva evenini ashaya achitha naye, ngaleso sikhathi uthi abemvale amehlo kanye nomlomo. “Ahambe nami ibanga elide nje impela. Aze afika endaweni engingayazi lapho aqale phansi angishaya khona. Aqhubekile angibuza ukuthi yini edala ukuthi nginqabe ukwaliwa. Athe azongishayela ukuthi ngiwumfana omncane oshimile ohlulwa ngontanga bakhe. Ngaleso sikhathi ebesengisusile indwangu emehlweni,  ”echaza.Eqhuba uthi amshiye elimele kabuhlungu ebusweni nasesiphongweni. Uthi yize izinhlungu bezimxine kakhulu kodwa utabalasile waze wayomisa itekisi ebiphindela emuva eThekwini.Yilapho ke afike khona wabika icala eDurban Central. UZulu utshele iSolezwe ngoMgqibelo ukuthi unothando olujulile lukaLungile, wathi yingakho nje kungelula ukuba amvumele ahambe.“Ngisamthanda uLungile futhi angisoze ngayeka ukumthanda. Yingakho nje ngamamukela ngesikhathi siqala ukuhlangana ngo-2018 yize angitshela kahle ukuthi unezingane ezingu-4 futhi uphuma emshadweni. Mina angibanga nandaba nalokho ngoba ngavele ngamthanda ngiqala nje ukumbona ngesikhathi siqala ukuhlangana eThekwini, ”echaza.Ngokusho kwakhe kumphazamisile kakhulu emoyeni wakhe ukwaliwa ngowesifazane obese ephenduke ithemba lempilo yakhe. “Mina bengizitshela ukuthi siyohlukaniswa ukufa naye. Kanti yena ucabanga ngenye indlela. Okungiphatha kabi kakhulu ukuthi bese sifakane nezindandatho zokuthembisana umshado, ” echaza. Uveze ukuthi utholile ukuthi uLungile umala nje yingoba usezitholele elinye ibhobhodleyana lomfana okuyilona asesho amashushu ngalo.Ngesikhathi iSolezwe NgoMgqibelo lixhumana noLungile, ucele ukuthi abuye ashayelwe ucingo ukuze ezokhuluma kahle ngokukhululeka ngalolu daba. Kodwa kuthe eseshayelwa futhi, wathi usecabange kahle akafuni ukuphawula.  “Bhuti wami angithandi ukukhuluma ngalolu daba. Sengicabange kahle...angizophawula lutho,” usho kanje maqede wavala ucingo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uZulu uvulele amaphoyisa icala lokushaywa, wathi balidulisele ophikweni oluphenya amaphoyisa i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate i-Ipid. Uthe lolu phiko lukuqinisekisile ukuthi luyaluphenya lolu daba.
title: Amaphoyisa atitinye uBen 10 obegoloza ukwaliwa uSugar mama

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESE UKHATHAZEKILE umqeqeshi weFree State Stars, u-Allan Freese, ngodonga lwakhe lwasemuva ngaphambi komdlalo wabo omqoka weGladAfrica Championship abazowugijima ngeSonto ngo-3:30 ntambama neCape Umoya United, eGoble Park, eFree State.NgoLwesithathu, iStars ibhaxabule iCape Town All Stars ngo-3-1 koweligi kodwa ngaphezu kwalokho, uFreese akaneme ngokuthi amagoli asaqhubeka nokungena ngakubona.Ukunqoba kweStars kuyenyusele endaweni yesithupha kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-35.Ngemuva komdlalo ne-All Stars, uFreese uthe nakuba benqobile kodwa akeneme neze ngendlela abadlali bakhe basemuva abavimba ngayo izitha.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngokuthi sikwazile ukuqoqa amaphuzu agcwele kodwa-ke engikhala ngakho kakhulu yindlela esivimba ngayo izitha nokuyinto engihlale ngiyikhuluma nabadlali bami. Igoli elisingenele nje bekungamele nakancane lingene kodwa ngenxa yobudedengu bethu emuva sihlulekile ukulivimba.“Kuzomele siphindele emuva siyolungisa le nkinga esibhekene nayo yokuvuzisa amagoli ngisho noma singekho isidingo, lokhu kungikhathaza kakhulu emoyeni wami,” usho kanje uFreese.Mayelana nokubhekana neCape Umoya, uthe: “Kuhlale kunzima ngaso sonke isikhathi ukudlala namaqembu aseKapa njengoba ekhonze ibhola elihamba phezu. Kodwa ngiyajabula ukuthi lo mdlalo sizokube siwudlalela enkundleni yethu. Njengoba sekuwumzuliswano wesibili, wonke amaqembu esincintisana nawo embangweni weligi njengamanje alwela ukuqoqa amaphuzu, nathi-ke asihlukile kunawo, sifuna ukunqoba ikakhulukazi emidlalweni yethu yasekhaya ukuze sizokwazi ukuqhubeka nokushoshela esicongweni se-log.”Ngakolunye uhlangothi, iCape Umoya eqeqeshwa nguRoger de Sa, izoya emdlalweni isazikhotha amanxeba kwazise ngoLwesibili ikhale ngaphansi ngo-2-0 kwi-University of Pretoria, eParow Park, eKapa. Isamile endaweni ka-13 ngamaphuzu angu-19 emidlalweni engu-17. Phezulu kwi-log kuhleli iSekhukhune United ngamaphuzu awu-31. Ilandelwa iRichards Bay abalinganayo ngamaphuzu kodwa bahlukaniswa amagoli. IBay ingemuva ngomdlalo owodwa kwiSekhukhune.Imidlalo yeGladAfrica ngempelasonto:NgoMgqibelo: Ngo-3:30pm: Pondo Chiefs v Royal AM (King Zwelithini Stadium); Uthongathi FC v Pretoria Callies (Princess Magogo Stadium); Jomo Cosmos v Polokwane City (Tsakane Stadium); Steenberg United v Sekhukhune United (Idas Valley); JDR Stars v TS Sporting – (Giant Stadium).NgeSonto: Ngo-1:30pm: Cape Town All Stars v University of Pretoria (Parow Park); Richards Bay FC v Cape Town Spurs (Bay Sports Stadium); Free State Stars v Cape Umoya (Goble Park).
title: UFreese ukhathazwa eyodonga lwakhe kwiGladAfrica

text: MINENHLE MKHIZELamontville Golden Arrows (0) 1 Platinum Stars (0) 0I ZIFAKE kuTop 8 iLamontville Golden Arrows ngesikhathi iqumba phansi iPlatinum Stars ngo 1-0 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership obuseChatsworth Stadium, eThekwini.Igoli le-Arrows lishaywe nguMwape Musonda ongene ngesiwombe sesibili. Abafana Bes'thende bagudluze iFree State Stars kuTop 8. I-Arrows isihlezi endaweni yesishiyagalombili ngamaphuzu angu-28 emidlalweni engu-20 yeligi.Kulo mdlalo isilomo somdlali we-Arrows uMabhudi Khenyeza siphinde sangabonakala kwazise besingekho ngisho ebhentshini.UKhenyeza okuvele ukuthi uzicelele ukudlala eqenjini leMultiChoice Diski Challenge ngesonto eledlule ubengekho nakulona ngesikhathi lidla umhlanganiso kulo mqhudelwano.Kuthiwa akasathandi ukudlala kuleli qembu. Selokhu kufike uClinton Larsen usephenduke ukudla kwebhentshi.Izolo uLarsen uphinde waqala ngoRodney Ramagalela. Lo mqeqeshi odabuka eWentworth uphinde wamangaza inqwaba ebophela uThabo “Mfece” Molefe waseChesterville enkabeni yenkundla.UMolefe uthathe indawo kaNkanyiso Cele. UMaximilian Mbaeva utakule i-Arrows ngomzuzu ka-25 egeza uTintswalo Tshabalala.I-Arrows iwatholile amathuba kodwa bekungewona lawa ebengakwenza uze uchithe isiphuzo sakho esibandayo.Izilomo zeDikwena uMasibusane “Zizou” Zongo, Eleazer Rodgers noRobert Ng'ambi ziqale ebhentshini.Kulo mdlalo kuyiwe ekhefeni kungu 0-0. UBongi “KG” Ntuli ubebhekene neqembu lakhe elidala kwazise ukhulele kuBafana Bes'thende.Omunye obebhekene neqembu lakhe elidala uMahlatse Makudubela obolekiswe iyona iDikwena kuze kuphele isizini.Zithe zibuya ekhefeni uRamagalela wahlulwa yimbuzi yethuba lokubeka i-Arrows phambili. Kuqhume amakhwela enkundleni ngesikhathi sekusukuma uZongo.UZongo ungene endaweni kaTshabalala ngomzuzu ka-65. Abanye abadlali abangene ngesiwombe sesibili noNg'ambi, Helings Mhango noDeon Hotto be-Arrows.UNg'ambi ungene endaweni kaSibusiso Msomi kwathi uMhango noHotto bathatha ekaRamagalela neka-Andile Fikizolo.Njengenjwayelo uZongo ungene wenza imigilingwane yakhe yokushaya izitayela eziya phambili.UHotto uhlulwe yimbuzi ezifele sekusele imizuzu eyishumi kuphele umdlalo. ULarsen noJohnson baqhubekile nokwenza izinguquko ngenhloso yokuthola amagoli.UKudakwashe Mahachi ukhishiwe endaweni yakhe kwangena uMwape Musonda. URodgers uthathe ekaTlou Segolela.UMbaeva obe ngumdlali ovelele, uphinde wayisindisa i-Arrows echayisa uNtuli ovele walifuqa kuyena esikhundleni sokweqisela lo nozinti waseNamibia.UMusonda ubeke i-Arrows phambili ngemuva kokuthi uGift Sithole ehlulwe wukucima ibhola ebeliphaselwe nguZongo sekuzophela umdlalo, uMwape akazange acucuze kwazise ulibasele enethini.UJohnson ubedinwe egane unwabu ngemuva kwaleli goli kwazise ukhahlele isihlalo sayosakazeka phansi.Imiphumela yangempelasonto ye-Absa Premiership: Golden Arrows 1-1 Platinum Stars; Orlando Pirates 1-0 Bloem Celtic; University of Pretoria 3-0 Chippa United; Jomo Cosmos 2-4 SuperSport.
title: Abafana Bes’thende kuTop 8

text: UMNDENI wowesifazane obeyilungu lekomiti le-ANC Youth League (ANCYL) eKZN uthi ubumxwayisa ngobungozi besoka lakhe eliyiphoyisa eliboshiwe ngecala lokumbulala ngoLwesibili ekuseni.UNksz Sindisiwe Ndlovu (34) waseLindokuhle eMshwathi, ngaseMgungundlovu, udutshulwe endaweni yobumnandi ngesikhathi kade eye esokeni lakhe, okuthiwa limshayele ucingo lithi akaphuthume kulo.Lo wesifazane udutshulwe esagqoke izimpahla zokulala kwazise ukuthathele phezulu ukubizwa wuyise wengane yakhe enezinyanga ezintathu.Umfowabo omdala uMnuz Bhekizitha Ndlovu izolo ekhuluma neSolezwe uthe bashaqekile yilesi sigameko.“Sasimkhuza udadewethu ukuthi isoka lakhe liyingozi ngoba belimfuna imali ngenkani, limhlupha kodwa yena engakuboni lokho ngoba ubelithanda. Ngokuthola kwethu uSindi ushayelwe ucingo yisoka lakhe ngo-3 kuya ko- 4 ekuseni namhlanje (ngoLwesibili). Lithe akaphuthume. Ushiye ingane, wathatha imoto yakhe waphuthuma khona. Uma efika, siyasola kube nengxabano esingayazi ukuthi isuswe yini. Umsolwa kuthiwa ube esedonsa isibhamu wadubula umufi esifubeni,” kusho uNdlovu.Umsolwa kuthiwa ube esefaka umufi emotweni yakhe (kamufi), ethi umphuthumisa esibhedlela. Endleleni uthe embheka wabona ukuthi usethule. Kuthiwa ube eseshayela amaphoyisa ucingo ewabikela ukuthi sekushone umuntu.Ngaleso sikhathi ube esebuyela kubo kamufi eyoshiya isidumbu, ufikisane namaphoyisa waboshwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uqinisekisile ukuthi kuboshwe umsolwa oneminyaka engu-31 ngalesi sigameko.Unobhala we-ANC Youth League KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Thanduxolo Sabelo uthe bafuna umsolwa anganikwa ibheyili bese eboshwa isikhathi eside.“Sitshelwe wumndeni ukuthi umsolwa ubehlala ngokumhlupha umufi, behlala ngokuhilizisana. Akucaci ngokuholele ekutheni ambulale njengoba sitshelwe ukuthi umlimaze ngesibhamu somsebenzi,” kusho uSabelo.Izolo uSabelo uhambele umndeni kaNksz Ndlovu eyobhonga emswaneni.Uthe ugcine ngesonto eledlule ukukhuluma nomufi engakhombisi zimpawu zokuba nenkinga emkhungethe.UNksz Ndlovu wenze imisebenzi eminingi eyehlukene esayibambe enhlanganweni yabafundi kwiSasco, wadlulela kwi-ANCYL ashone eseyilungu lekomiti layo KwaZulu-Natal.Kumethusile uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezobuCiko, amaSiko, ezeMidlalo nokuNgcebeleka KwaZulu-Natal uNksz Hlengiwe Mavimbela obevakashele umndeni kamufi ngoLwesibili.UNksz Mavimbela uchaze umufi, obesebenza emnyangweni wakhe, njengomuntu obezinikele futhi ewukhuthalele umsebenzi wokunikeza umphakathi izidingo zentuthuko.“Ngifike emnyangweni ngoMeyi nonyaka, uSindisiwe ubengomunye wabasebenzi engibe nethuba lokusebenzisana nabo ezinsukwini zokuqala ezimbili ngiqale umsebenzi. Ukhombise intshisekelo emisebenzini yomphakathi yilesi sizathu esenza ngimgcine ukuze aqhubeke nokusebenza ehhovisi lami,” kusho uNksz Mavimbela.Udlulise amazwi enduduzo ewabhekise emndeni nakubangani bakamufi.“Okubuhlungu kakhulu ngokufa kukaSindi wukuthi kufike ngesikhathi lapho ebesikade sisemkhankasweni wezinsuku ezingu-16 olwa nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nasezinganeni,” kusho uNksz Mavimbela.
title: Ubumkhuza umndeni ngesoka lakhe owe-ANCYL obulewe

text: IGCINWE ngaphansi kweso lamaphoyisa esibhedlela indoda elahlwe elakubo ngesikhathi izama ukuduna iloli elithwala upharafini eligingqikile lawela phezu kwayo.Lesi sigameko senzeke entathukusa yangoLwesithathu emgwaqweni onguthelawayeka uN3 ngaseHammarsdale, eThekwini. Kudingeke ukuthi uvalwe lo mzila ngesikhathi abezimo eziphuthumayo namaphoyisa betakula.Le ndoda ithweswe icala lokuzama ukuduna imoto eliphenywa ngamaphoyisa aseHammarsdale. Iloli ebelithwele upharafini kuthiwa belibheke ngaseMgungundlovu ngesikhathi sesehlakalo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kusolakala ukuthi umshayeli weloli ubeshayela ngenkathi ezwa ukuthi iloli liqala ukuphelelwa ngamandla.Uthe umshayeli weloli ubone amadoda amabili abeshaya amawindi ekotele ezicabheni zombili.“Iloli libe seliphuma emgwaqweni libheke phansi emhosheni. Ligcine ligingqikela phezu koyedwa wabo. Ulimele wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela ukuze athole ukwelashwa,’’ usho kanje.UCapt Gwala uthe le ndoda iqashwe ngeso lokhozi ngamaphoyisa  esibhedlela.
title: Ucindezelwe yiloli 'obezama ukuliduna'

text: UGCIZELELE ukuthi ngeke zikhululwe izigebengu eziyingozi emphakathini, uNgqongqoshe wezoBulungiswa nezamaJele, uMnuz Ronald Lamola, ecacisa ngesimemezelo sikamengameli sokuncishiswa kwezigwebo.UMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa izolo umemezele ukuthi kuneziboshwa ezizoncishiselwa izigwebo ngezinyanga ezingu-12, okuwuhlelo olubizwa ngePresident’s Remission. Ecacisa ngohlelo uLamola, uthe akulona olwakuleli kuphela kodwa nakwamanye amazwe luyenziwa.Uthe akunoma yiziphi iziboshwa ezizoncishiselwa izigwebo kodwa yilezo eziboshelwe amacala angebucayi, ezinye ezifake izicelo zikashwele.“Ukuphepha komphakathi kubaluleke kakhulu, ngeke sidlalele ngalapho. Iziboshwa eziyingozi sisazodonsa ejele.“Esifuna ukukuveza ngalolu hlelo ukuthi inhloso yamajele akukona ukuvalela abantu, basuswe emphakathi kodwa kumele bahlunyeleliswe izimilo.“Kunabantu abasemajele ngoba behlulwe ukukhokha inhlawulo uma belahlwe amacala.“Labo bantu akumele ngabe basemajele,” echaza.Unxuse umphakathi ukuthi uyeke ukukhipha inyumbazane iziboshwa esezidedeliwe, athe ezinye ziphuma zibe usizo emphakathini.Enaba ngalolu hlelo, uthe lugwema nokugcwala okungenasidingo emajele. Uveze ukuthi kwagcina ngo-Ephreli 27, 2012 kuleli ukudedelwa kweziboshwa ngaphansi kwalolu hlelo.Ngaleso sikhathi owayengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma, wadedela iziboshwa ezingu-4 533.ULamola uveze ukuthi kulezi ziboshwa esezadedelwa phambilini, zingaphansi kuka-1.1% eziphinde zenza ubugebengu.Echaza ngamacala angangeni ngaphansi kwalezi ziboshwa ezizoncishiselwa izigwebo ubale ukubulala, ukuphanga kuhlonyiwe, amacala ocansi, awokuvukela umbuso, ukuhlukunyezwa kwezingane nabesifazane nalabo abenze amacala bengaphandle ngebheyili.Uthe abazoncishiselwa ngezinyanga ezingu-12 yilabo abenze amacala amancane nabebelinde ukudedelwa ngoshwele.Libe sematheni izolo igama likaKhaya Cekeshe owaboshelwa umkhankaso we#Fees Must Fall neleNkosi yabaThembu uBuyelekhaya Dalindyebo emuva kwalesi simemezelo.Ungqongqoshe ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ngokwalolu hlelo bafanelekile ukuthi bancishiselwe izigwebo.“Inkosi uDalindyebo yasifaka isicelo sokudedelwa ngoshwele, okumanje sikumengameli.“Ngokwalulo hlelo, inkosi kumele ihlomule kodwa siyokhipha isimemezelo uma sekuphume isinqumo,” kusho ungqongqoshe.Uthe akakwazi ukusho ukuthi lezi ziboshwa zizodedelwa nini kodwa ngesikhathi esedlule kwathatha izinyanga ezintathu ukuphothula uhlelo.Ugcizelele ukuthi kusazoba nohlelo lokuqinisekisa nazo zonke izinhlaka ukuthi iziboshwa zidedelwa ngokufanelekile.Lolu hlelo lwaqala ukwenziwa ngo-1994 kusaphethe uMnuz Nelson Mandela.
title: Bazoncishiselwa izigwebo emajele

text: ABEGCWELE izinkalo zonke amaqembu ezepolitiki ngempelasonto ekhankasa okokugcina, njengoba kuzokuba nokhetho lokuchibiyela ngoLwesithathu.Lolu khetho lokuchibiyela lwandulela ukhetho lokuchibiyela lokugcina, oluzokuba ngoMeyi, ngaphambi kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya.Ukhetho lokuchibiyela lwangoLwesithathu luzobanjwa kuma-ward angu-15, kanti iningi lawo aKwazulu-Natal.Kuzokuba nokhetho lokuchibiyela kuma-ward ayisithupha kulesi fundazwe komasipala abahlanu, eThekwini, KwaDukuza, KwaMaphumulo, eBuhlebezwe naseMzimkhulu.Iningi labaholi bezinhlangano ezihlukene belikhankasa ezindaweni ezahlukene.I-ANC ithumele amalungu esigungu esiphezulu, okubalwa kuwo uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, uNkk Nocawe Mafu, uNkk Lindiwe Sisulu, uNkk Sindi Chikunga noNkk Mildred Oliphant.Laba baholi bakhankase ezindaweni ezehlukene ezizokuba nokhetho lokuchibiyela.Lokhu kukhankasa kwabo esifundazweni kulandela lokho kwamengameli wale nhlangano, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, okhankase eThekwini, ngesonto eledlule.I-IFP yona iqinise umkhankaso wayo wokugcina kwi-ward layo KwaDukuza.Leli qembu libambe umcimbi uSiyanqoba, eLindelani, ngeSonto.Umholi wale nhlangano, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uthe banethemba lokuthi bazoqhubeka nomgqigqo omuhle okhethweni lokuchibiyela, bakwazi ukuyibuyisa le-ward.“Ngokhetho lokuchibiyela olwedlule, sikwazile ukuhlithwa ama-ward kwi-ANC eNkandla, saphinda sakwazi ukugcina ebesiwaphethe. Angikungabazi ukuthi nakulokhu sizokwazi ukwenza kahle, sigcine i-ward ebesiyiphethe.”Nakuba leli qembu lisanda kwenza isiphakamiso sokuthi ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya lihlehliswe ngenxa yobhubhane iCorona, uHlabisa uthe bakulungele ukukhankasela lolu khetho.“Noma lungaba ngoSepthemba, thina silulungele inqobo nje uma isivuvu sesithathu sobhubhane iCorona, singeke sibe namandla njengesivuvu sesibili lapho kwashona khona inqwaba yabantu.”Ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya kulindeleke ukuthi lubanjwe phakathi kuka-Agasti noNovemba.
title: Akhankase okokugcina awokhetho lokuchibiyela

text: USINDE ngokulambisa owesifazane (22) odlwengulwe owesilisa obemphelezela eyobheka umngani wakhe eVerulam.Kuthiwa lona wesifazane ohlala kuPark Street, eThekwini, ubevakashele umngani wakhe eRiverview, eVerulam, ngesikhathi ehlangana nabalisa ababili abathe bayamazi umngani wakhe futhi bangamphelezela aye kuye ngeSonto ebusuku.Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo iReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa), uMnuz Prem Balram, uthe lona wesifazane ulethwe umshayeli we-Uber akwaze ukummisa emuva kwesigameko sokudlwengulwa kwakhe.Uthe lona wesifazane uthe ufike ngetekisi ntambama eVerulam ngoba ezohlangana nomngani wakhe kodwa waduka ngesikhathi efuna kubo.UBalram uthe uchaze ukuthi uhlangane nalaba balisa ababili bathi bazomsiza.“Omunye wabasolwa unike umgilwa inombolo yakhe yeselula ngoba efuna amthembe. Ngesikhathi behamba omunye wabasolwa uphuce lona wesifazane iselula nesikhwama semali namakhadi asebhange wabaleka nakho. Omunye umsolwa ube esemhudula wamfaka ehlathini wamdlwengula,” kusho uBalram.Uthe umgilwa ukwazile ukumisa umshayeli we-Uber obedlula nokunguye omsizile.Uthe ngokusho kwalona wesifazane, umlisa amsola ngokumdlwengula ubemude emnyama ngokwebala enezinwele ezimfishane. Ubegqoke isikibha esimnyama ne-jean eluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka namateku amnyama iChuck Taylor All Star.UBalram uveze ukuthi okwesibili kuba nesigameko sokudlwengulwa komuntu wesifazane esikhathini esingangesonto.Uthe nalona omunye wesifazane wakhala ngokuthi udlwengulwe owesilisa owayethi uyamphelezela evakashele umngani wakhe. Naye kuthiwa uphucwe iselula wadlwengulwa. Uthe akukakaqinisekiswa ukuthi abasolwa kulesi sigameko ngumuntu oyedwa odlwengule lona wesifazane ngeSonto.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokudlwengulwa emuva kokudlwengulwa kwalona wesifazane.
title: Usinde ekufeni odlwengulwe obemphelezela

text: KUDUTSHULWE owesilisa wafa ehamba ngemoto yakhe eMgungundlovu ngoMgqibelo.Abosizo oluphuthumayo baphuthume endaweni yesigameko ngenkathi bebikelwa ukuthi kube nokudubula kwaze kwashayisana izimoto emgwaqweni uChurch.Okhulumela abosizo oluphuthumayo iNetcare 911, uMnuz Shawn Herbst, uthe bafice kushayisane imoto encane nemoto ethutha izimpahlahla.Kusolakala ukuthi lo wesilisa ubeshayela ngenkathi ehlaselwa abasolwa abangaziwaabavulele ngenhlamvu bebhekise kuye.“Owesilisa oneminyaka engu-35 obeshayela imoto uxilongwe endaweni yesigameko kwatholakala ukuthi unamaxeba okudutsulwa. Lo wesilisa ushonele endaweni yesigameko,” kusho uHerbst.UHerbst uthe imbangela yalesi sigameko ayaziwa kodwa amaphoyisa abesesendaweni yesigameko ephenya.
title: Kudutshulwe umshayeli wafa kwashayisana izimoto

text: MHLELI: Sekukaningi ngizwa uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, uDkt Blade Nzimande, ekhuluma ngesifiso sokubhekelela izitshudeni ezizalwa yizisebenzi zikahulumeni. Izisebenzi ezisezingeni eliphakathi nendawo okubalwa othisha, amanesi namaphoyisa.Kumanje kunezitshudeni ezihleli emakhaya kungelona iphutha lazo kodwa kungenxa yokuthi abazali abanayo imali. Kuyiqiniso ukuthi lezi zisebenzi zithwele kanzima, ngisho ingekho ingane eziyikhokhelayo enyuvesi. Ngesikhathi uhulumeni efaka imfundo yamahhala kwabaswele, kwakumele abeke enye imali ezoxhasa laba abazalwa yilezi zisebenzi. Noma kube yimali ebolekisayo abazobuye bayikhokhe uma sebeqedile. Njengamanje abantwana bathwele isijeziso sokuhluleka kwabazali babo.Lezi zingane azizikhethelanga ukuzalwa yilaba basebenzi.Ngicela ungqongqoshe aqhamuke nohlelo olusheshayo lwalezi zitshudeni, ayeke leli culo ahlale elicula lokuthi basabheka uhlelo abazokuza nalo.Kungani kuthathe iminyaka ukubheka uhlelo ekubeni kumthatha amaviki ukuqhamuka nohlelo lokuthenga amalaptop ne-data okuzonikezwa abaxhaswa yiNSFAS?Izitshudeni ezingaphansi kweNSFAS ziyatitiliza imihlomulo kodwa ezabasebenzi zincela izithupha ngenxa yabazali abangenawo amandla okukhokha. Umhlonishwa uNzimande akabe neqiniso.UMbhishobhi Themba ChoncoEMtubatuba
title: Yiba neqiniso Ngqongqoshe uBlade Nzimande

text: KUZOZWELA ephaketheni kubashayeli njengoba kwenyuka intengo ka-petrol okulindeleke ukuthi kuqale ngesonto elizayo futhi izobe yenyuke ngenani eliphezulu elingajwayelekile.UNgqongqoshe wezaMandla, uMnuz Jeff Radebe, uthe lokhu kwenyuka kwentengo ka-petrol kudalwa ukudonsa kanzima kwerandi uma liqhathaniswa ne-dollar. Ukhale nangentengo ka-oyela ongahluziwe athe umba eqolo emhlabeni wonke. Ilitha lizobiza R14.72 isuka kuR14.23 nokuyinto ezobashaya kakhulu abashayeli. Kuthiwa le mbazo izoqala ngoLwesithathu. Udizili uzokwenyuka phakathi kuka- 58 kuya ku-59 ilitha. U-paraffin uzonyuka ngo-52c ilitha, i-gas inyuke ngo-70c ikhilo.
title: Uyenyuka ngelizayo u-petrol

text: UMBUZO: Nginenkinga kababa wabantwana bami engithandane naye kusuka ngo-2015 ongafuni ukondla izingane zakhe. Uma ngimqonda ngesenzo sakhe ungitshele ukuthi mina angimthandi. Usengumuntu osephuza kakhulu nosethanda amantombazane okuyinto engikhathazayo ngoba ngisamthanda. Ngicela usizo.Hlengiwe, KwaDukuzaImpendulo:Yibhekisise kahle le nto ayishoyo yokuthi awumthandi. Kusobala ukuthi zikhona izimpawu azibonayo kuwe ezingakhombisi uthando. Bunjani ubudlelwano benu?Yicabangisise kahle le nto ukuze uzitholele izimpendulo ozidingayo. Kwesinye isikhathi izenzo zethu zikhuluma ukudlula amazwi ethu.Nalokuphuza kwakhe nokuthanda amantombazane kuyindlela akhala ngayo noma indlela azama ukukhohlwa ngayo ngokwenzekayo phakathi kwenu.Yini le azama ukuyibalekela kangaka aze azinikele empilweni yotshwala namantombazane? Uma ngabe ungakazitholi izimpendulo ozidingayo namanje akukho okudlula ukuthi umhlalise phansi ubaba wabantwana bakho ukuthola ukuthi yini ngempela emenza acabange ukuthi awumthandi.Umbuzo:Sineminyaka emibili sishadile nomyeni wami. Emva kwezinyangana sishadile ngathola ukuthi ngikhulelwe ngasikhipha isisu engazi ngoba ngangingazimisele ukuphinda ngibe nomunye umntwana ngenxa yokuthi sobabili sifike nabantwana kulo mshado. Angikaze ngikuthole ukuphumula seloku athola ukuthi ngenzani.Ungikhumbuza njalo ngisho nokuthi ngabe isingakanani ingane ukube angiyikhiphanga. Ukhala ngokuthi ngamncisha ithuba lokuba ubaba. Ngenzenjani ngempela ukuze akhohlwe, nomshado wethu ubuyele esimeni?Igama ligodliwe, eMorningsideImpendulo:Isinqumo sokuba nabantwana nokungabi nabantwana akusona osithatha uwedwa emshadweni. Kwakumele umazise kwasekuqaleni umyeni wakho ukuthi awuzimisele ukuba nabantwana. Kube yinto enivumelana ngayo.Ungamsoli kakhulu umyeni wakho ngokuhlale ekukhumbuza ngoba naye yindlela yakhe azama ukudlulisa ngayo ubuhlungu.Okubalulekile njengamanje ukuthi uzehlise uxolise kumyeni wakho, bese nithola ukwelulekwa.Ngaphandle kweziluleko kuzonithatha eside isikhathi ukudlula kulesi simo futhi kugcine kuwuqedile ngisho nomshado wenu.Umbuzo:Ezinyangeni ezimbili ezedlule besinezinkinga nomama wabantwana bami wacela ukuthi ke sithathe ikhefu okwesikhashana ukuzama ukulungisa izinto phakathi kwethu. Kodwa kunokuthi izinto zibe ngcono ngibona ziya ngokuba zimbi kakhulu.Useqale ngisho nokuphuza into entsha kanti ngelinye ilanga ngiyobona abantwana bami ngazithela kumuntu wesilisa engangingamlindele.Ngeke ngikwamukele ukuthi useqhubekele phambili nempilo. Kanti kuchazani ngempela ukuthatha ikhefu uma ngabe omunye ezoqhubeka nempilo yakhe?Mnguni, eThekwiniImpendulo:Kusobala ukuthi umama wabantwana bakho useziqhubekela nempilo yakhe. Indaba yokuthatha ikhefu kwakuyindlela yakhe ehloniphekile yokuthi hlukanani. Ngeke ke umphoqe umuntu ukuthi abe nawe engasathandi.Sibona kukuhle ukuthi nivumelane kusemanje ngendaba yabantwana nokuthi bazohlala kubani omunye ababone kanjani.Kubalulekile ukuthi ube nobudlelwano obuhle nabantwana bakho ngisho ungasathandani nomama wabo.Akumelanga baphazanyiswe okwenzeka phakathi kwenu.Qhubeka nokuba wubaba oqotho kubona ngisho umama wabo eseziqhubekela neyakhe impilo. Sikufisela inhlanhla.* Sithumele imibuzo ku: [email protected]Nisilandele ku Facebook no Instagram: Mo & Phindi
title: Ezothando: Ngakhipha isisu umyeni wami akasanginiki ukuphumula

text: UBUKEKA uthela izithelo ezinhle umkhankaso we-IFP wokuthi uhulumeni avume ukutshalwa kwensangu ezosetshenziselwa ukulapha abantu.NgoLwesithathu, uSotswebhu we-IFP ePhalamende, uMnuz Narend Singh, ubuze uNgqongqoshe wezoLimo, amaHlathi nokuDoba, uMnuz Senzeni Zokwana, ukuthi ngabe useyithintile yini iminyango efanele ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uhulumeni uphasisa ukusetshenziswa kwensangu ukulapha izifo ezithile.UZokwana uthe bamatasa nezingxoxo ezizoqinisekisa ukutshalwa kwensangu ukuze ilaphe izifo ezithile kulandelwa umthetho.“Umthetho othinta ukusetshenziswa kwensangu ukulapha izifo ubhekelelwe nguMnyango wezeMpilo nowezoBulungiswa ngokomthetho wemithi wango-1965. Siyithintile le minyango nowezoHwebo neziMboni namaphoyisa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ukutshalwa kwensangu ngeke kuphule imithetho ethile,” kusho uZokwana.Uthe ucwaningo olwenziwayo lokuthi izokwazi yini ukusebenziseka njengomuthi nokuthi izothengwa ngabantu abangaki luhamba kahle.“Njengamanje umnyango wethu nowezempilo umatasa ubheka imithetho yokulawula ukutshalwa kwensangu nemikhiqizo ezokwenziwa ngayo,” kusho uZokwana.Uthe bayitshelile iminyango ethintekayo ukuthi kubalulekile ukuthi insangu ibhekwe ngeso lokwelapha. Basalinde izimpendulo.USingh uthe bazolinda izimpendulo zeminyango ethintekayo njengoba kusathuthukiswa umthetho ozosebenza uma sekudayiswa insangu ezosetshenziselwa ukwelapha.“Sikholwa wukuthi insangu ezosetshenziselwa ukwelapha izifo ezithile ibalulekile ekuthuthukiseni umnotho nasekudaleni amathuba omsebenzi. Ucwaningo lwethu luveza ukuthi umnotho uzohlomula kakhulu ngalolu hlelo. Kufanele iminyango ethintekayo iluphuthume lolu hlelo ngoba luza nenqwaba yamathuba omsebenzi nempilo engcono kubantu,” kusho uSingh.I-IFP ifake lesi sicelo ngoba iqhubeka ezinyathelweni zelungu layo eselashona uMnuz Mario Ambrosini owaphakamise ukuthi uhulumeni avumele ukusetshenziswa kwensangu ukuthi ilaphe ezinye izifo. U-Ambrosini owazibulala wayenomdlavuza.kanti waphoqeleka ukuthi aye phesheya lapho babemnika amakhambi enziwe ngensangu ayepholisa izinhlungu. U-Ambrosini waphetha ngokuzibulala emzini wakhe oseWestern Cape.
title: Uza kahle umkhankaso we-IFP wensangu

text: UMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs, u-Ernst Middendorp, akafuni nokuyizwa eyokudayiswa kukaKhama Billiat okuvela ukuthi ufunwa amaqembu asenhla ne-Afrika.UBilliat usadlale isizini eyodwa kwiChiefs ayijoyine esuka kwiMamelodi Sundowns. Ulandelwa amaqembu ahlukene ngemuva kokudlala kahle emqhudelwaneni i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ebikade ise-Egypt, edlalela iqembu lakhe lesizwe laseZimbabwe.Emaqenjini okuthiwa afuna uBilliat kukhona izinkunzi zase-Egypt i-Al Ahly neZamalek. Kukhona neRaja Casablanca yaseMorocco nePerto de Luanda yase-Angola ezimisele ngokuhlukana nezigidi ukuze ithole uBilliat ongomunye wabadlali abahola kakhulu kwi-Absa Premiership.Kukhona omkhaya bakhe uBilliat abamcebisa ngokuthi akalithathe ithuba lokuyoba usozigidi kodwa abanye bathi akahlale kwiChiefs.Izolo, uMiddendorp uthe akayi ndawo uBilliat.“Akukho engisatshelwe khona neqembu elimfunayo. Kodwa ngeke sivume siyithimba labaqeqeshi ukuthi kudedelwe abadlali abafana noKhama Billiat nabanye okwamanje. Sizoqala isizini manje. Kuningi esikucabangile, sahlela namaqhinga. Ngeke sivumele ukudedelwa kukaBilliat ngoba nje kuzongena imali, “ kusho uMiddendorp.IChiefs isayinise abadlali abane kuphela okubhekwe ukuthi bayitakule, ibuyele ezingeni eyaziwa ngalo ebholeni laseNingizimu Afrika. UMiddendorp uphinde wacacisa indaba kaLeonardo Castro okusabalele izindaba zokuthi uzochithwa yiChiefs.Bekuthiwa uzochithwa ukuze kuvuleke isikhala somdlali wangaphandle. UCastro ukhishiwe ohlwini labadlali abebekade bevotelwa abazoqala umdlalo weCarling Black Label Cup ne-Orlando Pirates ngoMgqibelo.“Akuyona into efihliwe, uCastro ukhombisa izinga elihle njengoba sizicijela ukuqala kwesizini. Okwamanje ziningi izinkulumo ezivela kubantu nokufanele kuchazwe. Ngijabule ngoCastro okwamanje ngendlela enza ngayo. Asinaso isifiso sokudayisa abadlali. Ukubhaliswa kwabadlali kusaqhubeka. Kufanele sibheke ukubuya kukaCastro, angadlala kahle nabanye abadlali. Isinqumo ngabadlali bangaphandle sizobuye sisithathe, asikho isidingo sokwenza lokho manje. Ngiyazi ukuthi sinabadlali abayisithupha bangaphandle, kufanele sisale nabayisihlanu. Ngesikhathi siqala ukuzilungiselela isizini uCastro ubehamba kodwa kwashintsha lokho. Ngijabule ukuba naye lapha. Kubukeka sengathi uzoba ngomunye wabayisihlanu esizoba nabo,” kusho uMiddendorp.Ukusinda kukaCastro sekubeka engcupheni unozinti waseNigeria uDaniel Akpeyi no- Andriamirado “Dax” Andrianarimanana waseMadagascar ongase abolekiswe.Abadlali abasha beChiefs kulindeleke ukuthi babonakale uma seyibhekene neZimnyama ngoMgqibelo yize iningi labo lingeke liwuqale umdlalo.
title: Ngeke sivume noBilliat - Middendorp

text: KUQHILIKA izihlathi kumfundisi wodumo lwezinkulumo ezakhayo kulandela ukusayiniswa inkontileka ‘ebhekile’ isiteshi somsakazo Ukhozi FM, njengoba sisanda kwenza izinguquko.UPastor Sthembiso Zondo uzophinde azwakale ohlelweni lwasekuseni, oluqanjwe kabusha ngokuthi Isidlo Sasekuseni njengoba selwethulwa uNongcebo Mckenzie noTshatha Ngobe.NgoLwesihlanu uZondo ubejabulisa okwengane ngalezi zindaba.Uthe usefisa engabe sekuwusuku lwakhe lokuqala okuwuMsombuluko, ngendlela ajabule ngayo ukubuyela ekuseni.UZondo ujabula nje, wayeqale khona ohlelweni lwasekuseni kusekhona uLinda Sibiya kulolu hlelo futhi wazakhela khona udumo.Okujabulise uZondo yinkontileka angahlonizanga ngokuthi imjabulisile.“Ngeke ngiqambe amanga mtaka ma, engikunikiwe kungijabulise kakhulu, kuphambi kwami ngikhuluma nawe nje,” kusho uZondo.“Ngishaya umthandazo wamaRoma othi: njengoba kwakunjalo ekuqaleni, kusazokuba njalo namanje. Ngijabule kakhulu sengingaba ngisho umashonisa kwabafuna ukuboleka imali, sengisayinile inkontileka savumelana nangohlelo. Sengethuliwe ethimbeni engizosebenza nalo. Ngifisa abantu bangibongise kuKhozi FM ngokungilanda liphinde linginikeze elinye ithuba. Nabantu engizosebenza nabo bangamukele kahle. Abantu ngiyabethembisa, ngeke sibeke imfundo phambili kodwa sizobhekana ngqo nezinkinga ezibathintayo,” kusho uZondo. UZondo ubuya ngalolu hlelo nje, kuke kwanemibuzo eminingi enyamalala ohlelweni lwasemini kulo msakazo olushayelwa wuDudu Khoza, iJabul’ Ujule. Ebuzwa mayelana nalokhu, uvele wangena ezintangeni wangaphuma nazigabe kwacaca ukuthi leyo akathandi ukukhuluma ngayo.Ugcine esentela nje ethi: “Bengisayojima ngithatha amandla. Ngizobuya namandla amakhulu, abantu abalalele uKhozi ngoba umgodla ugcwele. Sizokhuluma ngazo zonke izinto eziyizinkinga kubo,” kusho uZondo. Emuva kokumemezela nakuFacebook uZondo abalandeli bakhe bazwakalise okukhulu ukujabula mayelana nalezi zindaba.Ngaphandle kokubuyiselwa kulolu hlelo, uZondo uthi konke kusahamba kahle nasebandleni lakhe.Okhulumela iSABC, uVuyo Mthembu ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uZondo unenkontileka nalo msakazo futhi uzozwakala ohlelweni lwasekuseni.
title: UZondo kolwasekuseni kuKhozi FM

text: ISAGQUNYWE esitokisini inyanga okuthiwa isakaze ingoduso yayo ngenhlamvu iyisola ngokujola eScottsburgh ngaphandle kwaseThekwini.UNksz Anele Zulu (23), oyisangoma, kuthiwa ubeselungiselela ukulala kubo ngoMsombuluko ngesikhathi kungena umyeni wakhe oyinyanga ophinde abe isangoma, uMnuz Simo Cele, wamdubula kathathu maqede wahamba.Inyanga, evele enkantolo yase-Scottburgh izolo, kuthiwa ibikade izinikele emaphoyiseni ngoLwesibili. Icala lihlehliselwe uJuni 14 ukuze icele sebheyili.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo osondelene nodaba ukuthi inyanga eyayithwasisa umufi, itshele amaphoyisa ukuthi yadubula umufi ngoba imsola ngokuthi useqomile. Yize eveze lokho kodwa abukho ubufakazi obuvelile.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Cebo Zulu, uthe namanje badukuza ebumnyameni ukuthi kungani umlamu wabo ebulele udadewabo.“Ngangingekho ekhaya ngesikhathi ezohlasela kodwa ngafika esedutshuliwe, umfowethu omdala esakhipha imoto ukuze aphuthunyiswe esibhedlela udadewethu. Umsolwa wayesekhona ekhaya ephethe isibhamu, akazange angitshele ukuthi kungani edubule udadewethu, wavele wahamba,” kusho uZulu.Umfowabo ebuzwa ngezinsolo zokuqoma uthe abazazi njengomndeni.“Ngokwethu siwumndeni sifisa kungabhalwa nokubhalwa ngalezo zinsolo (zokujola kukamufi) ngoba asazi lutho ngazo. Sisebumnyameni asazi ukuthi kungani afike wadubula, akazange akhulume namuntu, washiya abantu behlezi endlini yokuphumula wayodubula udadewethu esekamelweni elilala amantombazane,” kusho uZulu.Lezi zithandani kuthiwa bezingamathe nolimi, zihamba imicimbi ndawonye futhi zikhonzile ukuzikhipha.Umsolwa kuthiwa ulobolile kaZulu yize umshado ubungakahlelwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Col Thulani Zwane, uthe kuphenywa icala lokubulala, umsolwa usahamba inkantolo.
title: Usavalelwe ejele okuthiwa wadubula ingoduso yakhe

text: KUCISHE kwabanjwana ngezandla emhlanganweni womphakathi obubizwe yiNkosi yaseMdletsheni ngoLwesithathu, eZibayeni, eHluhluwe.Inkosi uBonga Mdletshe ichithwe umphakathi ngemuva kokuphakamisa ukuthi kugudluzwe ezinye izakhamuzi zasendaweni yayo ukuze kwakhiwe imayini yamalahle eDukumbane.UMdletshe ubezokwazisa abantu ngemayini yamalahle ezoba sendaweni. Iningi lamalungu omphakathi abehambele lo mhlangano azwakalise ukunganeliseki ngesiphakamiso senkosi. Akhale ngokuthi inkosi ayethembekile, futhi asola ukuthi ifuna ukudayisa ngabantu ngokuvumela ukwakhiwa kwemayini yamalahle eDukumbane.Aphinde aveza ukuthi iNkosi uMdletshe useke wawakhohlisa amalungu omphakathi wawagudluza ezindaweni zawo ngesikhathi kuvulwa isiqiwi iThanda Game Reserve.Ngokusho kwamalungu omphakathi, inkosi yathembisa abantu amathuba omsebenzi ngesikhathi begudluzwa endaweni yabo iphendulwa isiqiwi iThanda kodwa kwagcina kungasebenzi muntu wasendaweni.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi, uMnuz Mandlakhe Mkhize, liphakamise ukuthi umhlangano uhlehliswe ngoba umphakathi awuphelele njengoba kukhona abasebenza eGoli ababuya ngamaholidi kaDisemba.“Sixhumanile namanye amalungu emindeni yethu asebenza eGoli asitshela ukuthi akumele uqhubeke umhlangano engekho. Sicela inkosi iwuhlehlise bese kukhulunywa sekukhona wonke umuntu,” kusho uMkhize.Okunye okuphinde kwavela kulo mhlangano ukuthi amalungu omphakathi abesola ukuthi uMdletshe usesisayinile isivumelwano sokuthi kwakhiwe imayini endaweni nenkampani ezosingatha lo msebenzi, umphakathi ungatsheliwe.UMdletshe uthe besingakasayinwa isivumelwano sokuthi kube nemayini, yingakho ebize umhlangano.“Ukubakhona kwale mayini yinto eqale ukukhulunywa ngo-2012. Ngicele ikomiti lami ukuthi lixhumane nalaba abafuna ukwakha imayini endaweni ukuze ngithole ubuqiniso balokho. Indlela abakhuluma ngayo bakhombise ukuzimisela njengoba sekunezinhlelo zokwakhiwa kwayo ezizoqala ngoJanuwari ngonyaka ozayo,” kusho uMdletshe.Uphinde wacela umphakathi ukuthi ungamubizi ngomdayisi ngoba ubize umhlangano ngenhloso yokuzwa uvo lwawo ngaphambi kokuba kuqale ukwakhiwa kwemayini.Umhlangano kugcine kuvunyelwene ngokuthi uphinde ube ngoDisemba.Ithintwa ngocingo iNkosi uMdletshe ithe: “Kusekusha ukuthi ngingadalula okuningi ngemayini. NgoJanuwari kuzobe kushuthwa phezu kwemizi ukuze kubonakale ukuthi yimiphi ethintekayo ezosuswa. Nendawo abazoyiswa kuyona ayikakahlonzwa, kusazoba nezingxoxo. Uma ingekho imizi ethintekayo akekho umuntu ozosuswa.”
title: Bahilane nenkosi ngodaba lwemayini endaweni

text: UMQEQESHI waMaZulu, uCavin Johnson, ukhwele wadilika konompempe abadlalisa kwi-Absa Premiership ngakubize ngokuhluleka ukuvikela abagadli, akholwa wukuthi yikhona okwenza indlala yamagoli kuleligi.AmaZulu adlale ngokulingana ngo 0-0 emdlalweni wePremiership eFNB Stadium, eNasrec, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku. IChiefs, enomlando omuhle uma ibhekene noSuthu, ihluleke yancama ukulwehlula kule sizini kwazise nasemzuliswaneni wokuqala, umdlalo uphele zibambene ngo 0-0 eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza.Ngemuva komdlalo, uJohnson ujobelele empendulweni yomqeqeshi weChiefs obekade ebuzwe ngokudlala ngokulingana kwezakhe kule sizini. Emidlalweni engaphezulu kweyisikhombisa iChiefs idlale ngokulingana ngo 0-0 kule sizini ka-2017/2018. UKomphela uvele wabibiyela njengokwejwayelekile. UJohnson, obebuzwe ngendlela umdlali wakhe uSiyethemba Mnguni adlale ngayo, ulibeke konompempe icala.“Ngicabanga ukuthi ngifuna ukwengeza okuthize. Ngiyazi ukuthi akuhambisani (nengibuzwe khona) kodwa uma ubuka abagadli baphesheya kwezilwandle abashaya amagoli, onompempe bayabavikela. Asibavikeli abethu abaseqophelweni. Asibavikeli abadlali abaseqophelweni esinabo abahlaselayo ngendlela abenza ngayo phesheya kwezilwandle. Yingakho uLionel Messi ekwazi ukushaya amagoli angu-50, u-Aguero (Sergio) ekwazi ukushaya angu-30. Thina asibaniki abethu abagadli ukuvikeleka ngokuba yilokhu abayikho, abadlali abahle. Sivumela abadlali basemuva babaqobe. Kuyinkinga lokhu,” kusho uJohnson.Emdlalweni wangoMgqibelo Usuthu luchithe cishe sonke isiwombe sesibili lucindezelwe yiChiefs. UJohnson uthe uyalamukela iphuzu. UMnguni, ogcine eqokwe waba ngumdlali ovelele, ubegqamile esiswini sezaseMbelebeleni.“UMnguni ungomunye wabadlali abadlale imidlalo eyisihlanu egcwele kwiPremiership. Wenza kahle. Ufike kwiPremiership wazibamba zaqina. Akaqalanga kahle neqembu, kudingeke simfake kancane kancane wakhombisa ukuthi ungumdlali oseqophelweni. Ngokwezinga asekulo manje, ngethemba ukuthi angangeza endleleni adlala ngayo, ashaye namagoli ngoba uhlala ezibeka ezindaweni ezinhle. Ngokushesha uzoba esedlale imidlalo engu-150,” kusho uJohnson.Mayelana nomdlalo uJohson uthe: “Bekuwumdlalo weziwombe ezimbili. Uma udlala nelinye lamaqembu amakhulu eNingizimu Afrika nomqeqeshi osezingeni eliphezulu nabanye babadlali abaphezulu kwiligi, kufanele uhlele. Ukubhekana neChiefs kusho ukuthi kufanele uze neqhinga. Ngicabanga ukuthi sithole amathuba angcono esiwombeni sokuqala. Kwesesibili besazi ukuthi uSteve uzobuya ngamawala enze lokhu akwenzile. IChiefs bekufanele ishaye igoli esiwombeni sesibili. Nathi kwesokuqala kodwa akwenzekanga. Siyajabula ukugoduka nephuzu.”
title: Usola onompempe ngendlala yamagoli

text: UBENNI McCarthy oqeqesha AmaZulu FC, ubheke ukubuya namaphuzu amane eGoli, njengoba Usuthu lusesifundazweni iGauteng kulezi nsuku. Ngempelasonto ezikaMcCarthy zidlale ngokulingana ngo 0-0 neSwallows FC.Kusasa Inyokan' Eluhlazana izobhekana neKaizer Chiefs enezinkinga, emdlalweni weDStv Premiership eFNB Stadium, ngo-3 ntambama.UMcCarthy nezakhe, sebedlale imidlalo eyisithupha bengayazi induku nokuyinto lo mqeqeshi odabuka eKapa, afuna iqhubeke."Ukudlala neSwallows kusisizile kakhulu ngoba siphumile ekhoneni lethu esilijwayele, sadlala ibhola ebengiqala ngqa ukubona silidlala. Sibuye nephuzu kunzima, siyalamukela yize kade singenza okungcono kakhulu. Vele besidlala neqembu elijaha iMamelodi Sundowns esicongweni, bekungeke kube lula neze. Sekumele sikudlulise okwenzeke sidlala neSwallows ngoba ngoLwesithathu sidlala neKaizer Chiefs (esho ehleka kancane)," kusho uMcCarthy.Ziningi izizathu ebezingenza uMcCarthy ahleke uma ephatha igama leChiefs. Esokuqala isizathu esokuthi Amakhosi aziphendule inhlekisa eshaywa iRichardsBay FC ngo 2-1 kwiLast 32 yeNedbank Cup emasontweni amabili edlule. Esesibili kungaba ukuthi iqembu elisashaye uMcCarthy selokhu athatha izintambo kuMaZulu iyona kanye iChiefs, eyamshaya ngo 1-0 ngenyanga edlule. Igoli kuloyo mdlalo lavalelwa phakathi uSamir Nurkovic."ISwalllows ayikaze nakanye imkhahlelele unozinti wethu. Lokhu kusho ukuthi emuva sihlelekile kakhulu, kodwa indaba okumele siyilungise (uma sebedlala neChiefs), ukuhlasela. Iningi labadlali bethu belingabonwa nangokhalo sidlala neSwallows, lokhu kumele kushintshe uma sesidlala neChiefs ngoba sifuna amaphuzu aphelele," kusho uMcCarthy.Okuqaphelekile ngesikhathi Usuthu ludlala neSwallows ukuthi uBongi Ntuli akadlalanga yize kade esebhentshini. Kungenzeka uMcCarthy amdlalise uma sebebhekene neChiefs kwazise emdlalweni wokugcina owanqotshwa AmaZulu edlala neChiefs, uNtuli nguyena owashaya igoli lokunqoba. Ngaleso sikhathi u-Ayanda Dlamini owayepheka AmaZulu.
title: UMcCarthy ufuna amaphuzu aphelele kwiChiefs

text: USIHLALO wePremier Soccer League (PSL), u-Irvin Khoza, uqinisekise amawindi amabili amaqembu ale nhlangano azowasebenzisa ukuhwebelana ngabadlali ngaphambi kwesizini ka-2020/2021.UKhoza, obekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba eGoli ngoLwesihlanu, lapho ebecacisa khona ngezinhleno zePSL zebio-buble okuzoqedelwa kuyo imidlalo eGauteng kusuka kusasa ngeyeNedbank Cup, uthe:“Azoba mabili amawindi okuhwebelana ngabadlali. Elokuqala lizoba maduze kusuka ngoSepthemba 2 kuya ku-Okthoba 17 kuthi elesibili liba ngo-2021.“Elango-2021 lizoqala ngoFebhuwari 1 lisongwe ngoMashi 1 nokusho ukuthi lizodonsa inyanga yonke egcwele.” UKhoza, ngoLwesithathu ebusuku owethule inkomishi entsha yeGladAfrica Championship ezohambisana no-R3 million okokuqala kule sizini, uveze nokuthi isizini elandelayo yePSL izoqala nini.Uthe isizini ka-2020/2021 izoqala ngo-Okthoba 9 ngemuva kokuthi amaqembu esezitike ngewinidi elingaphezu kwenyanga esayinisa abadlali abasha.Kulindeleke babe baningi abadlali abazobe bengenawo amaqembu ekupheleni kwesizini.Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi amaqembu kule nyanga azohlola inqwaba yabadlali abakhushulwe kwiMultiChoice Diski Challenge ukumelana nokushintshwa kwabadlali abahlanu umdlalo ngamunye.UKhoza uveze nokuthi konke kuhambe kahle amaqembu amathathu okuqala etheleka kwibio-bubble eGauteng.“Amaqembu amathathu afikile izolo kanti elinye lizofika namuhla. Afike izolo yiBidvest Wits, Baroka FC neMamelodi Sundowns. IBloemfontein Celtic izotheleka namuhla,” kusho uKhoza.Ubuziwe ukuthi ngeke yini abukho yini ubungozi obuhambisana nokuthi iCeltic ifike namuhla kodwa wakuchitha lokho ezeseka ngokuthi balandela yonke imigudu yokuhlolwa ngokomyalelo woMnyango wezeMpilo.
title: UKhoza nezinhlelo zesizini ka-2020/2021

text: USIHLALO weMaritzburg United, uFarook Kadodia, uyayichitha imibiko ethi injini yaleli qembu, uSiphesihle “Mbesuma” Ndlovu, ibifuna ukuya kwi-Orlando Pirates ichayise iMamelodi Sundowns.Leli phephandaba lisanda kushicilela udaba ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezedlule, lapho khona uKadodia ekuveza ukuthi iSundowns iyona engase isayinise uNdlovu kodwa uzohamba uma kuphela isizini esikuyona ka-2018/2019.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, empeleni akuyona kuphela iSundowns ebifuna uNdlovu kodwa nePirates yasifaka isicelo sokusayinisa lo mdlali.“Umfana (uNdlovu) akajabule ngokuthi uKadodia wakhetha iSundowns ekubeni yena wayefuna ukudlalela iBucs. Womabili amaqembu afaka isicelo ngesikhathi esifanayo, abeka nemali. Okunenga uNdlovu ukuthi wamtshela uKadodia ukuthi yena ufuna ukudlala kuphi kodwa wathatha isinqumo esehlukile.“Lokho sekuholele ekutheni noma edlala uyazihudula, kangangoba sekukhona abadlali abangeneme ngokudlala kwakhe, abakhala ngokuthi uyalilahla ibhola, ajike angamaki ngoba nakhu esazi ukuthi uyahamba vele,” kusho umthombo osondelene naleli qembu ocele leli phandaba ukuthi lingalinge lidalule igama lawo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, uNdlovu usanda kuthola ikhadi elibomvu, iMaritzburg idlala neKaizer Chiefs eHarry Gwala Stadium ngo-Agasti 17. Kulowo mdlalo uNdlovu wathola ikhadi elibomvu ngomzuzu ka-16.Leli phephandaba libe nengxoxo noKadodia mayelana nemibiko yokuthi wakhetha ukusayinisa uNdlovu kumaBrazilians ekubeni umdlali yena efuna ukudlalela eziMnyama.“Akulona iqiniso ukuthi iPirates ibifuna uNdlovu. Into nje engingayiqinisekisa ukuthi iSundwons kuphela eyafaka isicelo,” usho kanje uKadodia.Intatheli ibe isibuza ukuthi akakaze yini uNdlovu akuveze ukuthi ufuna ukuyodlala kwiBucs.“Izintatheli ziyathanda ukudayisa abadlali. Ngomunye unyaka zathi uRusike (Evans) ufunwa yiChiefs. Uma unganaka izinto ezishiwo yizona ngeke wafika endawo. Kuyinto engekho ukuthi uNdlovu ufuna ukuya kwiPirates. Lena yokuthi akaseneme ukudlala kwiMaritzburg angiyazi ngoba akukho asakukhombisile kuze kube yimanje.“Uzohlala kuze kuphele isizini eqenjini ngoba ngifuna aqhubeke lapho egcine khona ngesizini edlule. Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi akasekho omunye umdlali ozohamba kule sizini ngemuva kukaMaboe (Lebohang) ngoba sifuna ukuthi sigcine umgqigqo weqembu kuze kuphele isizini,” usho kanje uKadodia.Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership:Kusasa: Maritzburg United v Cape Town City (Harry Gwala Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: Free State Stars v Bloemfontein Celtic (Goble Park Stadium, 3.30pm); Kaizer Chiefs v Polokwane City (Moses Mabhida Stadium, 6pm); AmaZulu v Orlando Pirates (King Zwelithini Stadium, 8.15pm); Highlands Park v Chippa United (Makhulong Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto ngo3.30 ntambama: Lamontville Golden Arrows v Black Leopards (Princess Magogo Stadium); Mamelodi Sundowns v Bidvest Wits (Lucas Moripe Stadium); Baroka FC v SuperSport United (New Peter Mokaba Stadium)
title: Uphika eyePirates noNdlovu

text: AMAJAJI amahlanu eNkantolo yokuDluliswa kwamaCala eBloemfontein izolo anqume ukuthi amaNazaretha aseBuhleni kumele akhokhe zonke izindlelo zecala.Amajaji oGorven AJA, Petse DP, Plasket, Mbatha JJA, noTsoka AJA athe: “Isicelo sokudluliswa kwecala siyachithwa, izindleko zecala zizothwala abaseBuhleni.”Isinqumo siwumphumela wesicelo sokudluliswa kwesinqumo senkantolo yaseMgungundlovu eyathi umholi waseBuhleni owakhethwa ngokusemthethweni kumele kube yinkosi Vela Shembe osakhothama.INkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini yaqala yakhipha isinqumo esivuna uVela esakhishwa yiJaji Achmat Jappie.AbaseBuhleni abaholwa yinkosi uMduduzi Shembe, ngokungagculiseki badlulisa isinqumo saya eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu.Udaba lwalalelwa amajaji amathathu oMadondo DJP, Mnguni, noPoyo Dlwati JJ.Nawo akhipha phambili uVela. AbaseBuhleni baphinde balidlulisa icala njengoba selifike kulesi sigaba.Nasi isinqumo senkantolo:“Lesi sicelo simayelana nokudluliswa kwecala ngobuholi bebandla iNazareth Baptist Church (AmaNazaretha). Owayephethe uVimbeni Shembe (ongasekho). Wakhothama emzini wakhe ngo-28 Mashi 2011. Umholi uyazikhethela ozongena esikhundleni sakhe. Akamkhethi esaphila ngenxa yokusabela ukuthi angabulawa.“Lokhu kudluliswa kwecala kumayelana nokuthi umholi owakhothama waqoka bani ukuba angene esikhundleni.“Umbango uphakathi kokuthi umufi waqoka indodana yakhe uMduduzi, ekusho ngomlomo wakhe. Lokhu kushiwo abamangalelwa oMduduzi Shembe, inkosi Mqoqi Ngcobo noMbongwa Nzama). Ukuthi wabhala igama lomfowabo uVela, bakuchitha abamangalelwa bethi okubhalwe phansi kwakokotelwa.“Kodwa ekuhambeni kwesikhathi bakuvuma ukuthi okwakusayiniwe kwakuyisandla sikamufi. Ngakho ukudluliswa kwecala kusekutheni umufi wakhetha bobabili indodana nomfowabo ukuba babe abaholi.“UVela wafaka isicelo ukuthi uyena yedwa umholi njengoba inkantolo ishilo.IJaji Jappie enkantolo yaseThekwini lakhipha isinqumo esithi impela uVimbeni, ngokubhala phansi wakhetha uVela njengomholi kodwa langahlulela ukuthi kwenziweni ngezindleko zecala.“Amajaji amabili uMnguni noPoyo Dlwati bavumelana nesinqumo sikaJappie. Kwathi uMadondo, waphetha ngokuthi bobabili uVela noMduduzi bakhethwa uThingo ukuba babe ngabaholi.Ngeshwa wakhothama uVela.“Ngesikhathi icala liqulwa inkantolo yathi uThingo lalubhale phansi luqoka uVela njengomholi ofanele. Kwachithwa ukuqoka ngomlomo.“Ngokobufakazi ummeli uMnuz Zwelabantu Buthelezi owayesetshenziswa wuThingo nebandla, wathula ubufakazi bokuthi uThingo lamcela ukuba alungise incwadi olwaluzoqoka kuyo owayeyongena esikhundleni salo. Wayibhala wayiyisa kulo incwadi lase liyibuyisela kuye isisayiniwe ngoFebhuwari 2000. USibisi nomunye baba ngofakazi kuleyo ncwadi. Ummeli wayigcina kwaze kwashona uThingo.“NgoMashi 16, 2011 uThingo lathumela incwadi kuyena limkhumbuza ngomuntu olwalumqokile ukuba angene esikhundleni uma ekhothama.“Ngelanga lokutshalwa koThingo uButhelezi wacelwa ukuba amemezele ozoba wumholi.Inkosi yamaQadi uNgcobo yabe isimemezela omunye umholi uButhelezi owayebekelwe lo msebenzi engakawenzi. Inkosi yamemezela uMduduzi.“Kube khona ofakazi abafunde okwakubhalwe wuThingo bakuqinisekisa ukuthi impela isandla salo esasayina.
title: AboNyazi bakhokhiswa izindleko zecala

text: SIMPHIWE NGUBANEKUVAME ukuba nzima ukunikeza umshayeli izeluleko zokuthi ashayele kanjani uma izulu likhithikile noma kuneqhwa ngoba isimo esinjalo asijwayelekile emigwaqeni yaseNingizimu Afrika.Ngesonto eledlule ngesikhathi imigwaqo imbozwe yiqhwa kukhombise ukubaluleka kwesidingo sokucobelelana ngamasu okushayeli ezimweni ezifuze lezi.Imigwaqo engothelawayeka nemincane ibimbozwe yiqhwa okwenze kwaba yingozi ukushayela. Kuba yingozi kakhulu uma iqhwa selincibilika lokhu okwenza imigwaqo ibe manzi kubenzima ukulawula imoto.Ngezansi ngezinye izexwayiso ezikhishwe ngochwepheshwe bezimoto nemigwaqo ezingasiza abashayeli ezimweni ezinjena.1. Uma imoto ishelelela, nciphisa kancane ku-accelerator bese ubhekisa amasondo angaphambili lapho ishelelela ngakhona.2. Qinisekisa ukuthi amathayi akho awayona impandla.Amanye amazwe izimoto zisebenzisa amathayi abizwa ngokuthi i-chain or snow chain okwazi ukuwasebenzisa emigwaqeni esheleleyo.Lokhu kuyihaba emigwaqeni yakuleli. Khumblula ukuthi nawo lamathayi angashelela uma kuneqhwa.Qiniseka ukuthi ama-brakes asebenza kahle futhi axhunywe kahle futhi ayabambisisaAnti-Lock Brakes – Cindezela amabhuleki kusukela iqala ishelelela imoto kuze kube iyama. Kungenzeka uyizwe idlikizela, unganaki lokhu kujwayelekile.No Anti-Lock Brakes – cindezela amabhuleki kodwa uqinisekise ukuthi awuwalokhi amasondo. Dedela bese ucindezela amabhuleki futhi. Thatha lokhu njenge – “mechanical ABS”3. Gcina amawindi akho ehlanzekile ngokuthi uncibilikise iqhwa, futhi ama-windscreen wipers asebenza kahle.Sebenzisa okuthile okungacijile ususe iqhwa emawindini noma ngabe uhamba ibanga elifushane. Inkungu engaphakathi emotweni ingasuswa kalula ngokuthi uvule i-vent windows.4. Qaphela amaloli noma izimoto ezisuke zikhucucula iqhwa emgwaqweni. Zivame ukuphayipha amalambu zixwayisa, ngakho qaphelisisa uma uzidlula emgwaqweni.5. Shiya igebe elikhulu phakathi kwakho nemoto oyilandelayo.6. Susa imoto ngegiya eliphansi futhi unciphise ku-accelerator uma ushayela ezimweni zomgwaqo ezingezintshe.Amanye amaphuzu angenhla akhishwe uMqondisi oMkhulu kwa-RAC Driving Solutions, uMnuz Eugene Herbert.
title: Lihlomele ngayo yonke indlela iqwha

text: SISHAYELWE ihlombe isabelozimali sika-R158.5 million uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali, uMnuz Malusi Gigaba , asinikeze i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate (Ipid).I-Ipid ibikhala ngokuthi ayinayo imali yokuqhuba umsebenzi wayo wamaphoyisa aphula umthetho. I-Ipid iveze ukuthi ayinayo imali yokuqasha abasebenzi abazoyisiza ukuxazulula amacala.Iveze ukuthi inezikhala zomsebenzi ezingu-27 nabasebenzi abangu-388. "Isabelozimali sizosiza ukuthi kulungiswe amaphutha ayebonwe ngumcwaningi mabhuku kulungiswe nezokuphathwa kwamacala. Bazokwazi nokuthuthukisa ezobuchwepheshe nezokuphepha emahhovisi abo," kusho amalungu ekomidi lezokuphepha ephalamende. UMnuz Francois Beukman onguSihlalo wekomidi lezokuPhepha ephalamende, usishayele ihlombe lesi sinqumo esho nokuthi i-Ipid isizowenza kahle umsebenzi wayo."Uma i-Ipid ingenayo imali eyanele ayikwazi ukusebenza kodwa njengoba kungena imali, amacala azophenywa futhi kujeziswe abaphula umthetho," kusho uBeukman. Ugqugquzele i-Ipid ukuthi igcwalise izikhala zomsebenzi ukuze ithole umbiko omuhle kumcwaningi mabhuku.UMnuz Zakhele Mbhele weDA, uthe, bakhathazekile ngoba i-Ipid ihlale inemali encane bese iba nezingqinamba uma sekufanele iphenye amaphoyisa. ""Sizoqhubeka nokuxoxa namalungu ekomidi lezokuphepha ukuze i-Ipid ithole imali eyanele ezoyisiza ukwenza umsebenzi," kusho uMbhele. I-Ipid ayitholakalanga ukuphawula ngokunikezwa imali ethe xaxa.
title: IPID seyizokwazi ukusebenza ngemuva kokuthola uchatha kwisabelomali

text: KUMQOKA ukuthi abadlali beBafana Bafana babuyise ukuzethemba ngokunqoba imidlalo yobungani abazoyigijima neNamibia neZambia ngokwehlukana kuleli sonto, kusho ukaputeni, uThulani Hlatshwayo.IBafana izoqale ingcwekisane neNamibia ngoLwesine eRoyal Bafokeng Stadium ngo-7 ebusuku. Izobe isitholana phezulu neZambia ngeSonto enkundleni efanayo ngo-3 ntambama.Imidlalo yandulela emqoka yokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ka-2021, iBafana ezoyidlala neSao Tome and Principe ngoNovemba.Umdlalo wokuqala ungoNovemba-9, owesibili ube ngoNovemba 11. Imidlalo kwakumele ibe ngoMashi kodwa yahlehliswa emuva kokuthi umhlaba wonke uhlaselwe yiCoronavirus, emise imidlalo yamazwe namaligi emhlabeni.UHlatshwayo uthe kusemqoka ukuthi babuyise ukuzethemba ngokuthi banqobe imidlalo yobungani.Amazwe omhlaba abuyela enkundleni kuleli windi leFifa emuva kokuma kwemidlalo umhlaba wonke ngenxa yeCoronavirus.“Kumnandi ukubuya emuva kwezinyanga ezinhlanu (engadlali amaqembu esizwe). Ngijabule ngokuba seqenjini lesizwe ikakhulukazi njengoba sase siyiqalile indlela yokuhlungela i-Afcon. Nakanjani sibheke ukuthola imiphumela emihle. Siyakwazi ukubaluleka kwayo. Sizobe sidlala namaqembu amabili esiwaziyo. Kusemqoka ukuthola imiphumela emihle njengoba silungiselela ukubhekana neSao Tome kabili,” kusho uHlatshwayo.Umgadli weBafana, uKermit Erasmus, oqede isizini engomunye wabadlali abashaye amagoli amaningi kwiligi, uthe wethemba ukuthi uzoqhubeka nefomu naseqenjini lesizwe.“Sengibheke imidlalo esiya kuyo. Ngithemba ukuthi ngizoqhubeka nokwenza lokho (ukushaya amagoli) naseqenjini lesizwe. Kuyajabulisa ukubuya emuva kwesikhathi eside esidalwe nyigciwane kodwa-ke lezi yizinto okumele siphile nazo. Ngithemba ukuthi sizoba nomdlalo omuhle sithole nomphumela omuhle,” kusho * -Erasmus.Emidlalweni yokuqala yokuhlunga iBafana yahlulwa iGhana ngo 2-0 yase ishaya iSudan ngo 1-0. Izodlala nala mazwe ngoMashi ngonyaka ozayo.
title: Ukunqoba kuzobuyisa ukuzethemba: Hlatshwayo

text: OYINJINI yasesiswini kuHighlands Park, uMothobi Mvala, uthe okumqoka kakhulu kubona njengamanje wukuvika izembe kunokwenza kahle kuNedbank Cup eqale ngoMsombuluko.UMvala (22) ungomunye wabadlali abawumgogodla kuHighlands nethembele kubona emshikashikeni wayo wokuvika izembe. Ungqomfele phakathi igoli elimqoka ngemizuzu yokugcina leli qembu liguqisa ngo 1-0 iFree State Stars koweligi ngeSonto eGoble Park, eBethlehem.Nakuba liwunqobile lo mdlalo kodwa iqembu alikasuki esishozini sezembe. Lisahlezi endaweni ka-15 ku-log ngamaphuzu angu-17 ngemuva kwemidlalo engu-20.Nokho, kule mpelasonto iLions of The North izoke ithi ukukhohlwa wumshikashika wezembe njengoba izophinde ibhekane neFree State Stars kowempindamshaye weNedbank Cup Last 32 khona eGoble Park, eBethlehem, ngoMgqibelo ngo-8 ebusuku.“Yebo, iwini esiyithole ngeSonto kwiFree State besiyidinga kakhulu. Ningasho ngaphandle kokungabaza ukuthi ibuyise ukuzethemba kithina njengabadlali beqembu ngaphambi komdlalo olandelayo weNedbank esiyowudlala nayo futhi iFree State.“Kodwa okubaluleke kakhulu nokusemiqondweni yethu njengamanje njengabadlali beHighlands, wukulwa ngakho konke esinakho kule midlalo esisalele, sisuke kule ndawo esikuyona ku-log. Ngeke kusisize ngalutho ukwenza kahle kuNedbank ekubeni singakaphumeleli ukusuka ezembeni,” kusho uMvala.Lo mdlali udlala indawo yokuphunga izitha esiswini saleli qembu ebe edle nangokushoshela phambili uma ithuba livuma. Nguyena njengamanje ozihola phambili ngokushaya amagoli kuleli qembu - ngamahlanu - elandelwa ngumgadli uCollins Mbesuma ngamane.“Yize khona singeke sizithambise emidlalweni yeNedbank kodwa okumqoka kakhulu kithina ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi siyalivika izembe. Abalandeli bethu baseseka ngendlela eyisimanga, ngakho kungaba buhlungu kabi kubona nakithina badlali uma iqembu lingagcina ngokudliwa yizembe.“Nokho, sizolwela ukuwunqoba futhi umdlalo weNedbank neFree State ngoMgqibelo, yize sazi kahle ukuthi kuzoba ngumdlalo onzima kakhulu.Isimo sethu nesabo (abeFree State) siyefana ngoba nabo balwela ukuvika izembe, kanti bazolwela ukungaphoxi abalandeli babo ngokuphumaekuseni kuNedbank,” kuphetha le njini yasesiswini ebiyibambe eqenjini lesizwe lika-Under 23 eliphume ekuseni kuma-Olympic Games abeseBrazil ngo-Agasti nyakenye.IHighlands, eqeqeshwa wuGordon Igesund, ihlalelwe ngumqansa emidlalweni eyishumi eyisalele, ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi ithola amaphuzu amqoka angagcina ngokuyiphephisa ezembeni noma ukuyodlala kumaPlay-Off.Phakathi kwemidlalo esalele iHighlands, kubalwa iMaritzburg United (ekhaya), Lamontville Golden Arrows (ekuhambeni), Orlando Pirates (ekhaya), Bidvest Wits (ekhaya), ukubala nje embalwa.
title: Umshikashika wokuvika izembe
