text: SABELO NSELEABAHLAZIYI bezepolitiki bathi owayenguMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ubesebona ukuthi uphelelwe amahlathi okucasha yingakho ekhethe ukungasiphikisi isicelo esifakwe yikhomishini yeJaji Raymond Zondo, enkantolo yomthethosisekelo.Baxwayise ngokuthi uZuma, ufihle induku emqubeni ngesenzo sokungasiphikisi lesi sicelo.Ikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana ifuna iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo iphoqe uZuma ukuthi aphendule imibuzo yayo.Izolo ummeli kaZuma, uMnuz Eric Mabuza, ubhalele inkantolo yomthethosisekelo eyazisa ukuthi uZuma ngeke asiphikise lesi sicelo esizolalelwa ngoDisemba 29. Isicelo safakwa emuva kokuthi uZuma ehambe ngaphandle kwemvume kaZondo emuva kokubhuntsha kwesicelo sakhe sokuthi uZondo ashenxe esikhundleni uma yena ezofakaza.Abahlaziyi bezepolitiki bathe kasimangazi isinqumo ngoba bekusobala vele ukuthi uZuma ngeke aliwine icala.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele, uMnuz Thabani Khumalo, kanye nomhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozinze eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu, bakholelwa wukuthi uZuma uzovuma ukuya phambi kwekhomishini kepha afike engayiphenduli eminye yemibuzo azobuzwa yona."Uzokuya kwikhomishini kodwa afike enze into eyenziwe uNkk Dudu Myeni (oweyengusihlalo webhodi lakwaSAA), afike engayiphenduli imibuzo ayibona ukuthi iyingozi," kusho uKhumalo.Uqhube wathi bese kucacile ukuthi amahlathi okucasha aphelile kuZuma, wathi ingakho enqume ukungasiphikisi isicelo."Uyabona ukuthi umthetho uza kuye ngqo, wabona kungcono asebenzise ilungelo lakhe lokungayiphenduli eminye yemibuzo."UNdlovu uvumelane noKhumalo, wathi bekusobala ukuthi inkantolo yomthethosisekelo izovuna ikhomishini kaZondo."Uyazi vele ukuthi ayikho enye inkantolo engaphezu kweyomthethosisekelo. Wazi kahle ukuthi ubengeke akwazi ukusidlulisa isinqumo sayo ngoba vele bekucacile ukuthi uzofike engaphumeleli."Yena uZuma ubesewudlalile umdlalo wokubambezela kepha lapha babonile ukuthi sebefike ekugcineni, base bethatha isinqumo sokungasiphikisi lesi sicelo."Lesi yisinqumo esikhaliphile ngasohlangothini lwakhe. Uzokuya kwikhomishini kodwa bese engayiphenduli imibuzo abonayo ukuthi izomfaka enkingeni."
title: Ayaphela amahlathi kuZuma: abahlaziyi

text: IVULELWE icala lokwesabisa iMeya kaMasipala waKwaNongoma uMnuz Albert Mncwango emuva komsindo oqubuke kulo masipala mayelana nethenda yonogada okuthiwa isinikwe enye inkampani. Kuthiwa kunqanyulwe inkontileka yeMighty B Security kwafakwa i-Eros Security.UMnuz Zwelethu Mbhele (49) oyinhloko yonogada abephucwe ithenda usola uMncwango ngokumesabisa nokwenze wagcina esemthathele izinyathelo zomthetho. UMbhele uthi emuva kokuba bephucwe ithenda kwabe sekukhangiswa kabusha naye wahamba ethi uyofaka isicelo senkampani yabo.“Ngafika kwathiwa ugesi awukho, ngeke bakwazi ukugaya amaphepha ngalinda khona emahhovisi kamasipala. Kwaqhamuka izimoto zikaMncwango, wehla waqonda kimi wangisongela wathi ngimthukile uzongikhombisa abantu. Wathi ngeke avume yena ukudlala mina, uzongifundisa isifundo ungowakwaMncwango yena," kusho uMbhele.Ethintwa uMncwango ngalolu daba uvele wafa yinsini, wathi ayikho yonke le nto eshiwo uMbhele.“Lo muntu waqala ngokwesabisa imenenja kamasipala, wangethuka ehamba ethi kubantu ufuna ukungibona. Ngesikhathi ngiya kuye ngangimnika ithuba lokungibona nokukhuza ukuthi ahlukane nokusabisa abasebenzi ngoba sekwake kwabulawa omunye umsebenzi lapha singazi kanjani," kusho uMncwango.Ukhale nangokuthi uMbhele wayefika ephethe isibhamu emahhovisi nokwakubonakala kuyingozi.“Akuvumelekile ukungena nesibhamu emahhovisi kamasipala kodwa yena ubegcaluza nesibhamu esabisa nabasebenzi benkampani entsha ethi uzoke abone ukuthi bazosebenza kanjani. Ngaze ngabikela abaphathi bakhe ngalolu daba," kuqhuba uMncwangoUthe uyabona ukuthi enye into ekhalisa uMbhele ukuphucwa ithenda.UMbhele umile kwelokuthi uMncwango wamesabisa futhi kufanele ashushiswengalokho.
title: Imeya ecaleni lokwesabisa owonogada

text: BAWINILE NGCOBOB ADEDELWE ngebheyili yamahhala abasolwa abangu-18 abasolwa ngokweba izinsimbi ezisonqenqemeni lomgwaqo.Laba basolwa bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi ePinetown ngoMsombuluko emuva kokuboshwa ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku, bebanjwa oqotsheni beba izinsimbi ku-N3 naku-M13 ngaseShongweni.Laba bantu okuthiwa babegqoke amajakhethi agqokwa ngabantu abasuke besebenza emgwaqeni baboshwe emuva kokuthi kukhona abababonile kwabizwa amaphoyisa akwa-SAPS nawakwa-RTI.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uCaptain Thulani Zwane, uthe laba basolwa abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-18 no-48 baboshwe ngamaphoyisa aseHillcrest babekwe icala lokweba.Laba basolwa kuthiwa bebematasa bekhipha lezi zinsimbi kungathi bangabasebenzi basemgwaqeni. Eceleni komgwaqo kuthiwa bekuneloli ebeliphayiza ama-indicator okusolakala ukuthi bebezolisebenzisa ukufaka lezi zinsimbi.Leli loli kuthiwa belingenazo izinombolo, linepheshana elinikwa labo abasuke bebhalisele inombolo yemoto entsha.Kulaba ababoshiwe abathathu abakuleli kuthi abangu-15 abokudabuka emazweni angaphandle.Kuboshwa laba basolwa nje ngo-Ephreli kuthiwa kubikwe elinye icala elifana naleli eVerulam.UNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Willies Mchunu, uthe ziyanda izigameko zokwebiwa kwezinsimbi ezisiza ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha emigwaqeni yesifundazwe kanti lokhu kweba kulahlekisa uhulumeni isizumbulu semali.“Ukuboshwa kwalaba basolwa kufika ngesikhathi uhulumeni eqinisa ekulweni nobugebengu, inkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa ikakhulukazi okuholela ekushoneni kwabantu ezingozini zomgwaqo,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe lesi sifundazwe sinezinga elingamukelekile lezingozi nokufa kwabantu emigwaqeni, esinye sezizathu zalokhu ukwebiwa kwezimpahla zomphakathi ezifana nazo lezi zinsimbi nezimpawu zomgwaqo ezisetshenziswa ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha.“Kuyacaca ukuthi sineqembu lezigebengu elisemkhankasweni wokubeka engcupheni impilo yabashayeli nabantu abasebensiza umgwaqo ukuze benze inzuzo ngezindlela ezingalungile,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe bonke abenza lokhu bazoboshwa babhekane nengalo yomthetho.
title: Badedelwe ‘abantshontshe izinsimbi’

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMidlalo kuzwelonke uTokozile Xasa ugculisekile ngombiko wethimba le-Eminent Persons Group ngokusabalaliswa ngokulingana kwezinhlanga kwezemidlalo.UXasa wethule lo mbiko ngoMsombuluko lapho kuvele ukuthi yize ibonakala inqubekela phambili kwezinye izinhlobo zemidlalo kodwa kwezinye kusashoda.Umbiko ubungagxile asekutheni kumele kwenzeke uguquko nasezikhundleni zokuphatha nakubaqeqeshi.“Sinyuke ngo-60% isibalo sabamnyama kwikhilikithi sisuka ku-45%, i-hockey inyuke ngo-45% isuka ku-20%. Ibhola lombhoxo lisuke ku-34% laya ku-42%, i-netball yaba ngu-56% isuka ku-37%,” kusho uXasa.Umbiko uveze ukuthi mkhulu umehluko osubonakele ebholeni lombhoxo, ikhilikithi ne-netball kodwa kusashayisa amakhala okwenzeka kwi-tennis, swimming, bowling, rowing nakuma-bowls okusagcwele abamhlophe.Umbiko uthe uma le mikhakha yemidlalo ingashintshi ingase ingakwazi ukuthola ukwesekwa okuphelele.“Akumele kube khona ukungabaza ukuthi ukhona umehluko obonakalayo ngokuthi abelungu kungabe kusaba yibona abaningi kwezemidlalo.Uma singakusukumeli lokhu sikushintshe kuzoholela ekutheni imidlalo eminingi igcine ingasenaso isizinda okungaholela ekutheni kungenziwa kahle kuyona,” kusho umbiko.Umbiko ubuncike ezibalweni zeStats SA eziveza ukuthi siyehla isibalo sabamhlophe abaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-18 ekubeni esabamnyama siyenyuka.Kuthiwe eminyakeni engu-25 kuzobe sekunoguquko olukhulu okusho ukuthi izinhlangano zemidlalo kumele zihambisane nalolu guquko.Kulindeleke ukuthi intsha emnyama engu-85% walezi zibalo isuke ku-17 million ifinyelele ku-21million. Abamhlophe abangu-1.4 million bazokwehla ngo-31% baye ngaphansi kwesigidi.
title: Umbiko uletha ithemba ngoguquko kwezemidlalo ezweni

text: UMKHANDLU omele abenkolo yobuNazaretha uthe uzowalwela amaphoyisa aphoqwa ukuthi agunde izinwele ngoba lokho kunyathela ilungelo lawo lenkolo.Lokhu kushiwo nguMnuz Willington Myeni onguSihlalo weNazareth Judiciary Council emuva kokuba kuvele ukuthi kunabaphathi beziteshi abawanqumele ugwayi katiki amaphoyisa angafuni ukugunda. UMyeni uthe bazwile ngalolu daba futhi bazolwa baze bafike enkantolo uma kunesidingo. Amanye amaphoyisa akhulume neDaily News enguzakwabo waleli phephandaba athe atshelwe ukuthi azothathelwa izinyathelo uma engagundi izinwele nentshebe. Aveze nokuthi atshelwe ukuthi lokhu kuvele ehhovisi likaKhomishana obambile esifundazweni uLieutenant-General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi.“UMthethosisekelo wakuleli uvikela wonke umuntu nangokwenkolo yakhe. Amaphoyisa akumele aphoqwe ukuthi agunde uma kuphambene nenkolo yawo. Kumele kubekwe imibandela yokuthi izinwele azikanywe kahle zihlanzeke, kanjalo nentshebe. Sibhekene nenselelo yokuthi abanye omasiteshi vele banenkinga ngenkolo yamaNazaretha, abayithandi,” kusho uMyeni.Uthe wonke amaphoyisa aphoqwayo kumele abikele bona emkhandlwini wabo badlulisele udaba ezinhlakeni ezifanele naseNkantolo yoMthetho-sisekelo.Iphoyisa elicele ukungadalulwa elisebenzela kwesinye isiteshi eThekwini litshele Isolezwe ukuthi liyiNazaretha kodwa liyazama ukuhlonipha umsebenzi noma kuphambene nenkolo yalo. Lithe uma kunenhlangano enkulu yebandla alizigundi izinwele nentshebe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa, uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe lona ngumthetho omdala wasemaphoyiseni awuveli kukhomishana obambile. Uthe kuwumsebenzi wawo wonke umphathi siteshi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amaphoyisa ayayihlonipha imithetho yokuziphatha nokugqoka kahle umfaniswano.“Uma naye umphathi siteshi ehlulekile ukwenza umsebenzi wakhe angazithola enecala lokungaziphathi kahle,” kusho uNaicker.Udaba lwemigomo yokuziphatha kwamaphoyisa lusematheni ngenxa yephoyisa lasePinetown elidume ngokunconywa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana osekuqubuke umsindo ngoba line-tattoo engalweni. Amaphoyisa awavumelekile ukungena embuthweni enama-tattoo asezindaweni ezisobala. Isolezwe lithole nokuthi iphoyisa alivumelekile nokwanga uma ligqoke umfaniswano emphakathini.
title: Bazolwela amaphoyisa agundiswayo

text: MBONGISENI BUTHELEZIEseGoliI SITOBHA se-Orlando Pirates, u-Edwin Gyimah, sifuna bayibhaxabule kabili iJomo Cosmos njengoba bezohlangana ku-Absa Premiership neNedbank Cup esikhathini esingangesonto.La maqembu azohlangana koweligi e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto, ngoMgqibelo, ngo-7.30 ebusuku. Izolo aphinde atonyulwa ndawonye ngesikhathi kuqhathwa amaqembu azodlala ku-Last 16 yeNedbank Cup, eCarlton Centre, eGoli, izolo.Ngemuva kwalo mdlalo wangempelasonto la maqembu azodlala kowe-Last 16 weNedbank e-Olen Park, ePotchefstroom.“Asinankinga nokubhekana nabo kabili. Basishaya ekuhambeni manje beza ekhaya e-Orlando. Sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abaphumi nalutho. Kufanele siwunqobe lo mdlalo. Sifuna amaphuzu amathathu ukuze sikwazi ukuqede endaweni enhle ku-log,” kusho uGyima.“Umdlalo wethu nabo wendebe uzobe usekuhambeni. Kuzoba ngomuhle ngoba sashaywa yibo ekuhambeni koweligi kodwa manje kuzobe sekuhlukile. Sifuna ukuyishaya kabili. Umdlalo wendebe ubalulekile ngoba asifuni ukuqeda isizini sishwiba izandla. Kufanele kube khona esikutholayo ngoba kuyobe kuyinto enhle eqenjini.”Uthe bekungelula ukuthi athole indawo kuBucs ngoba yiqembu elikhulu.Akulula ukudlalela iPirates, lowo osuke ethi kulula usuke eqamba amanga. Luselude ukhalo kufanele ngiqhubeke ngisebenze kanzima,” kusho uGyimah.Umgadli weCosmos uBrice Aka uthe bajabulile ukuthi bazobhekana nePirates kuNedbank.“Yinto esiyifunayo ukuthi sidlale neqembu elikhulu. Siyazi ukuthi iqembu balishintshile akuselona leli ebesidlala nalo emzuliswaneni wokuqala kodwa sikulengele ukubhekana nabo. Sifuna ukubashaya sikwazi ukudlulela kuma-quater final alo mqhudelwano,” kusho u-Aka“Sabashaya sidlalela ekhaya. Uzositshela umqeqeshi uJomo Sono ukuthi kumele senzeni uma sesidlala nabo ngoba sebeyiqembu elihlukile manje. Sifuna ukubamangaza ngoba thina siyiqembu elimangaza abantu. Into okufanele siyilungise nje ukuthi sidlale kahle uma sidlala ekuhambeni ngoba yiyo ebesingakayenzi kahle,” kusho u-Aka.Isiyonke imidlalo yeNedbank Cup Last 16:Jomo Cosmos v Orlando PiratesMpumalanga Black Aces v Maritzburg UnitedPlatinum Stars v Polokwane CitySantos v Free State StarsGolden Arrows v BarokaSuperSport v University of PretoriaMagesi v Bidvest WitsMamelodi Sundowns v Mbombela United
title: Izinsongo nxa zonke kuPirates neCosmos

text: ASALE emangele futhi eshaqekile amalungu omphakathi kubulawa izithandani ebezihlala emqashweni, eLay Centre e-Edendale eMgungundlovu.Kuthiwa izithandani ezihlaselwe ngamadoda angaziwa, bezilungiselela  isidlo sasebusuku ngesikhathi zidutshulwa.Kubikwa ukuthi abahlasele bamemeze umufi, uNksz Nomfundo Nxumalo (31), obesendlini okuthe uma kucaca ukuthi akabezwa, bangena lapho ebehlezi khona maqede bamdubula.Ngaphambi kokuba bamdubule, kuthiwa bamdonse ngezinwele bemhudula phansi.Ingane eneminyaka emibili ebinaye ngesikhathi ehlaselwa, kuthiwa bamdubule ibuka. Isoka lakhe uMnuz Siyabonga Ndlovu (38), ebelosa inyama emnyango, kuthiwa liphuthume egunjini labo liyobheka ukuthi kwenzekani.Abasolwa kuthiwa babhekise isibhamu ngakuye maqede bamdubula.UNksz Nxumalo kuthiwa ushonele endaweni yesigameko, uNdlovu ushone esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela.Ikhansela lase-Edendale uMnuz Xolani Ngongoma, lithe okwamanje okekho owaziyo ngembangela yokudutshulwa kwezithandani. Uthe naye udidekile ngalesi sigameko njengoba sekunezigameko eziningi zokubulawa kwabantu eMgungundlovu.“Umphakathi uthukile futhi usamangele ngalesi sehlo sangoLwesine ebusuku. Sekuphenduke insakavukela umchilo wesidwaba ukubulawa kwabantu kule ndawo. Siyafisa ukuthi amaphoyisa angenele ukuze kunqandeke le nkinga,” kusho uNgongoma.Kuthintwa umndeni kaNksz Nxumalo, udadewabo ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe bengumndeni abafisi ukuphawula ngesigameko.“Impela udadewethu udutshulwe nesoka lakhe kodwa akukho esifisa ukukukhuluma emaphepheni. Sifisa nje ukungaphawuli nhlobo, kusebuhlungu,” kusho udadewabo kaNksz Nxumalo maqede wavala ucingo.Eminye imizamo yokuthola umndeni kaNdlovu ayizange iphumelele izolo njengoba izinombolo zabo zingazange zitholakale kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, usiqinisekisile isigameko sokudutshulwa kwezithandani.“Amaphoyisa asesiteshini sasePlessislaer aphenya amacala okubulala. Imbangela yokubulala ayikaziwa,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.UKhomishana wamaphoyisa KwaZulu- Natal u-Lieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, ohambele umhlangano obusesiteshini samaphoyisa ePlessislaer, uthe umbutho uphezu kwezinhlelo zokubuqeda nya ubugebengu eMgungundlovu.“Sifuna izigilamkhuba ziphelelwe yimigodi yokucasha ngezinsuku esizonkanisa ngazo ezindaweni ezaziwayo ukuthi zikhungethwe yizinkinga zobugebengu. Lolu hlelo sizoluqhuba nakwezinye izindawo zasesifundazweni ezidume ngobugebengu. Amaphoyisa wonke azosebenza ngokubambisana, ukuze umsebenzi uhambe ngendlela,” kubeka uMkhwanazi.Isiteshi sasePlessislaer ngesinye seziteshi ezakhelene nezindawo ezidume ngobugebengu esifundaweni, esijutshwe ukuthi sinqande izinkinga.Ilokishi iMbali, yilo okuzogcwala kulo amaphoyisa azobe ejutshelwe ukuqapha isimo ngenhloso yokuqeda ukubulawa kwabantu.
title: Kubulawe izithandani phambi kwengane

text: MHLELI: Bengilokhu ngiluziba lolu daba kodwa sengiyabona nami ukuthi ake ngiphawule. Cha abaphathi boKhozi FM abayeke impakamo bazehlise bakhulume no-Owen Ndlovu.Nabelungu bayakhomba nje kuphela emsebenzini thina sisebenze bese bona bethola enhle imali ngalokho, kungani pho uNdlovu ebukelwa phansi ngobuhlakani bakhe yingoba ewumuntu omnyama? Ngokwami abaphathi boKhozi abehlise impakamo baxoxe noNdlovu iphele le nto. Okunye engikuthandile ngoNdlovu ngukuthi ufisa abaculi bahlomule. Kufanele ophumelele kube khona imiklomelo ayitholayo kanjalo nongenile kwabangu-10 kube nokuncane akutholayo. Yiningi imali esivota ngayo, akukuhle ukuthi kuhlomule uKhozi kuphela ebese abaculi kuba yigama nje ukuthi bangenile kwezingu-10. Yingakho ngize ngisole ukuthi nokungena kukaMthandeni “Igcokama Elisha” Manqele noKhuzani “Indlamlenze” Mpungose kuyindlela yokwenza imali kwaboKhozi. Empeleni asinakho ubufakazi bokuthi basohlwini ngevoti, kusengenzeka kwenziwa imali kwazise uKhozi ngonyaka odlule ohlelweni uSigiyangengoma izihambeli ezazimenyiwe zizochaza zathi ingoma ephume ngoNovemba nengakaze idlalwe kakhulu emsakazweni ayikhethwa kodwa muva sekungena izingoma ebezinamaviki amabili ziphumile, kanjalo nasoKhozini zidlalwe kanye. Akasekho obuyayo ezochaza ukuthi sekushintshile nezikaNovemba seziyathathwa. Lokho nje kukodwa kusivezela impakamo kubaphathi boKhozi kanjalo nokuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi ngokuqokwa kwezingoma ezingu-10. Kokunye  ezimele umaskandi zivele ziphuma ngoNovemba nangoDisemba unyaka  nonyaka ngeke sithi bebephazanyiswe yiCovid-19.Ngicela abaphathi boKhozi bayoguqa ku-Owen Ndlovu ukuze sivote sikhululekile.Thanda Mnikaziwempuphu Chonco ESHAYAMOYA
title: UKhozi FM aluzehlise ku-Owen Ndlovu

text: AKADEDELANGA lutho okhulumela i-Economic Freedom Fighters  (EFF) ebuzwa ngomhlangano wetiye phakathi kwalowo owayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma nomengameli we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema ngoLwesihlanu. Ephekwa ngemibuzo ngaphandle kwesithabathaba somuzi kaZuma oseNkandla, uMnuz Vuyani Pambo uhlale odabeni lwetiye wangasuka kulo ebuzwa ukuthi bekukhulunywa ngani kulo mhlangano obuhanjelwe ngisho u-Adv Dali Mpofu noMnuz Tony Yengeni. “Umhlangano uhambe kahle kakhulu. Itiye belimnandi, lishisa njengoba nazi. Niyazi ke ukuthi ukushisa kwetiye kusho ukuthi kumele uthathe isikhathi sakho uma uliphuza....kodwa nje uhambe kahle umhlangano kalowo owayengumengameli nomholi we-EFF,” kusho uPambo. Ebuzwa ukuthi ubezokwenzani uMpofu kulo mhlangano uPambo uthe ubephelezela nje kuphela kodwa wanqaba ukuphawula ngokuba khona kukaYengeni. “Bekuhlangenwe ngetiye nje akukho okunye. Njengabantu abamnyama niyazi ukuthi asidinge sizathu sokuhlangana siziphuzele itiye,” kuqhuba uPambo. Kube nemibiko engaqinisekisiwe yokuthi uMalema uzodingida udaba lokungaveli kukaZuma kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana. Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe usezovela yini kwikhomishini ngemuva kwalo mhlangano uPambo uthe akakhulumeli uZuma, uzophendula imibuzo ethinta i-EFF nomholi wayo kuphela.
title: 'Belimnandi itiye kwaZuma...' - EFF

text: ZIBAKHALELE odokotelambumbulu baseThekwini ababoshwe emva kwezinsolo zokukhwabanisa izincwadi zokugula. Amaphoyisa aKwaMashu esigcemeni sakwaP, ophiko lweCrime Intelligence abophe abangani omunye oneminyaka ewu-37 nona-47 okusolwa ukuthi bazenza odokotela maqede benzele abantu izincwadi zokugula ezingekho emthethweni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni iKwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele uthe abasolwa babanjwe emva kophenyo olunzulu lwamaphoyisa. "Amaphoyisa ebelandela umkhondo emuva kokuthi encinzwe indlebe ngabantu abazenza odokotela abenza izincwadi zomgunyathi zokugula, babizeR50. Elinye lamaphoyisa libe selizenza omunye wamakhasimende abangazange bananaze balenzela ngokushesha," kusho uColonel Mbele.Eqhuba uColonel Mbele uthe emuva kokuthi labo dokotelambumbulu benzele iphoyisa incwadi libe selizethula kubo, basesha batholakala nenqwaba yezincwadi zokugula ezingabhaliwe. Izincwadi bekungezikhishwa ngodokotela bakahulumeni kanjalo nodokotela abazimele esifundazweni sonke.Ephetha uColonel Mbele uthe babe sebeboshwa kanjalo odokotelambumbulu. Kulindeleke bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi eNtuzuma ngoMsombuluko (namuhla) ngecala lokukhwabanisa.
title: Kuboshwe odokotela mbumbulu KwaMashu

text: UKUVALWA kokudayiswa kotshwala eNingizimu Afrika kuzoba nomthelela omubi kubasebenzi emuva kokuthi iHeineken South Africa, imemezele ukuthi ngeke ikwazi ukuqhubeka nezinhlelo zefemu kaR6 billion ebizokhiqiza utshwala KwaZulu-Natal.Le femu bekulindeleke ukuthi idale amathuba omsebenzi awu-400 namanye abezodaleka ezinkampanini ezenza izinto ezahlukene ezidingwa emkhiqizweni wotshwala.Uhulumeni uye wavala ukudayiswa kotshwala yize izwe selehliselwe esigabeni sesithathu sikathaqa ekhala ngokugcwala kwezibhedlela kakhulu uma kudayiswa utshwala ebala ukulwa nezingozi zomgwaqo.Akusiyo yodwa iHeineken engeke itshale imali kodwa neSouth African Breweries (SAB) imemezele ukuthi ngeke isatshala uR2.5 billion kulo nyaka noR2.5 billion ngonyaka ozayo ngenxa yokuvalwa kokudayiswa kotshwala.Isikhulu esiphezulu sakwaSAB uMnuz Andrew Murray, sithe ukuvalwa kokudayiswa kotshwala amasonto awu-12 kubalahlekisele ngo-30% womkhiqizo abawenza ngonyaka kanjalo nasemabhukwini kuzoba nesikhala.UMnuz Richard Rushton oyisikhulu esiphezulu senkampani eyenza amawayini, ama-cider nogologo iDistell uthe isigaba sokuvalwa kokudayisa utshwala sokuqala siqede imisebenzi ewu-118 000.Uthe: “Ucwaningo lwethu luveza ukuthi ukuvalwa kokudayisa utshwala kuzoshaya abasebenzi ngoba uma sibuka ukuthi utshwala buzovalwa amasonto ayisishiyagalolunye kusho ukuthi kuzolahleka eminye imisebenzi ewu-84 000. Kufanele sizibuze ukuthi ukuvala utshwala ngabe kulungile yini uma sibuka umonakalo owenzekayo empilweni yabanye abantu.”Uthe imboni yotshwala yalahlekelwa uR15.4 billion ngesikhathi buvalwe amasonto ayisithupha, kulokhu balindele ukulahlekelwa wuR13 billion.AbakwaHeineken South Africa bathe bazoqhubeka nokusebenza eSedibeng, eGauteng, kodwa ngebhadi ngeke bakwazi ukuvula indawo yokuphisa utshwala eKZN.“Ukuvalwa kokudayisa utshwala kusimpintshile ngoba ayikho imali engenayo. Sizama izindlela ezihlukene zokuhlenga imisebenzi yabasebenzi bethu abangaphezu kuka-900.“Sicela uhulumeni avule utshwala, siyimboni sizosebenzisana naye ukuqinisekisa ukuthi silungisa lokho akhathazeke ngakho,” kusho abakwaHeineken SA.
title: Kushaya kubasebenzi ukuvalwa kotshwala

text:
UNGQONGQOSHE woMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli uDkt Zweli Mkhize usememezele ukuthi sesinyukele ku-2 783 isibalo sabantu osekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi baneCovid-19 kuleli kanti isibalo sabashonile sesinyukele ku-50. Lokhu kusho ukuthi isibalo sabathelelekile sinyuke ngo-178 kuleso ebesimenyezelwe ngoLwesine. NgoLwesine isibalo sabathelelekile sinyuke ngo-99 kuphela kodwa esabashonile sanyuka ngo-14.%%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/COVID_19?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#COVID_19cases in South Africa is 2783. 
pic.twitter.com/cBQs3KgvSo— Dr Zweli Mkhize (@DrZweliMkhize)Umnyango WezoBulungiswa nokuHlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo ngoLwesihlanu nawo udalule ukuthi sinyukele ku-94 isibalo sabasebenzi basemajele abathelelekile. Okhulumela lo mnyango uMnuz Singabakho Nxumalo uthe abasebenzi abawu-9 abatheleleke kamuva abaseKutama Sinthumule Private Facility eLimpopo, eWarmbokveld eWestern Cape kanye nasemajele ase-East London naseWorcester. INingizimu Afrika isosukwini lwesi-22 lokuvalwa kwezwe kulandela isimemezelo sikamengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sokulula isikhathi sikathaqa ngamasonto amabili ngeledlule. Khonamanjalo, inhlangano ebhekelela umnotho wase-Afrika, i-UN Economic Commission for Africa (UNECA) isixwayise abaholi bezizwe ukuthi iCovid-19 ingase ibulale abantu abawu-300 000 emazweni ase-Afrika. Le nhlangano icele ukuthi anikelelwe ngo$100 billion amazwe ase-Afrika ukumelana naleli gciwane. Njengamanje basabalelwa ngaphansi kuka-20 000 abantu abahaqwe yiCovid-19 emazweni ase-Afrika, kanti emhlabeni jikelele bawu-2 million asebethelelekile. IWorld Health Organization (WHO) ngoLwesine ithe kungenzeka kutheleleke ababalelwa ku-10 million emazweni ase-Afrika ezinyangeni ezintathu kuya kweziyisithupha ezizayo.
title: #Coronavirus: Sinyukele ku-2 783 isibalo sabahaqekile, sekushone abawu-50

text: OWAPHUMA kuTop 16 ku-Season 8 wama-Idols ngo-2012 ngoba amajaji ekhala ngokuthi usemncane, uthi lokhu kwamgqugquzela ukuthi afunde emaphutheni akhe.URethabile Khumalo (22) waseSoweto uthe ngesikhathi engenela ama-Idols wayenethemba lokuthi uzofinyelela esigabeni sokugcina.URethabile oyindodakazi yomculi uWinnie Khumalo uthe upheka i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala anethemba lokuthi izophuma ngenyanga azalwa ngayo uSepthemba.Uthe yize akhishwa kuma-Idols kodwa wayeqhubeka esebenza nabanye abantu ababesendimeni yomculo.“Ngavele ngalinda ukuqeda u-matric ukuze ngigxile kahle emculweni wami ngoba yinto engiyithandayo futhi esisegazini kimi,” kusho uRethabile.Uthe esephothule u-matric wenze izifundo ze-jazz ekolishi eSouth West Gauteng.“Ngifundele umculo we-jazz ngoba ngibona ukuthi umculo onganakiwe kodwa ongangisiza ngoba ngishaya nesiginci,” kusho uRethabile.Uthe esephothule izifundo zakhe wahlangana noBass Mdlongwa oyingane ka-Oskido wabe esemsayinisa enkampanini yakhe i-Africa Lit. “Kungisizile ukulinda ngesikhathi ngitshelwa ukuthi ngisemncane ngoba sengikhiphe umucu wami wokuqala owenza kahle kakhulu othi Glad To Be Yours,” kuchaza uRethabile.Uthe i-albhamu yakhe ngeke ibheke uhlobo olulodwa lomculo kodwa uzowuxuba ngoba akafuni ukuzivalela ngaphandle ngokucula uhlobo olulodwa lomculo.
title: Umucu wokuqala wowakhishwa kuma-Idols

text: BAFUNA abolele ejele owesilisa osolwa ngokushaya abulale indodakazi yakhe okusolwa nokuthi ubeyidlwengula.Umphakathi waseBashaweni, eHarding, uthukuthele ngesenzo salo mlisa oneminyaka engu-47 osolwa ngokubulala indodakazi eneminyaka engu-13.Kuthiwa ingane ishonele esibhedlela ngoLwesine olwedlule. Umthombo oyilungu lomphakathi ocele ukungadalulwa uthe kusolwa ukuthi umsolwa ubehlala nezingane zakhe ezintathu. Uthe kusolwa ukuthi lena eshonile ubeyidlwengula ngoba ubeyigada eyisola nangokuqoma.NgoMsombuluko umphakathi ubhikishe ngaphandle kwenkantolo ufuna angadedelwa umsolwa kuqiniswe isigwebo. UMnuz Wiseman Mbotho, oyikhansela lendawo, uthe ubikeliwe ngalolu daba futhi umphakathi uthukuthele.“Kusolwa ukuthi lo baba ubulele ingane yakhe yingakho umphakathi udiniwe. Bengingekho embhikishweni kodwa ngitsheliwe ukuthi umphakathi uzoya koqhinqa enkantolo,” kuchaza uMbotho.Uveze ukuthi akakaxhumani nomndeni kodwa uzwile ukuthi ingane izongcwatshwa ngeSonto.Imizamo yokuthola abasondelene nomndeni ayiphumelelanga njengoba inombolo yocingo etholwe yiphephandaba ibingangeni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe ngoLwesine olwedlule ngo-7.45 ebusuku intombazane eneminyakaengu-13 yashonela esibhedlela ngenxa yokushaywa.“Kusolwa ukuthi umufi washaywa wumsolwa ngenduku yensimbi emzimbeni wonke. Kuvulwe icala esiteshini samaphoyisa eHarding kwaboshwa umsolwa ovele eNkantolo yeMantshi eHarding ngoMsombuluko,” kusho uCaptain Gwala.Uthe kabanayo imininingwane ngokuthi icala libuyela nini enkantolo ngoba idokodo lisenkantolo.
title: Babhikishele indoda 'ebulale' indodakazi

text: MHLENGI SHANGASEKUZOBA nezinguquko ezinqala kwezemfundo KwaZulu-Natal njengoba abafundi bakwaGrade 10 no-11 sebezobhala izivivinyo ezisethwe nguMnyango wezeMfundo hhayi ezikoleni.Lezi zivivinyo, ezizogxila ezifundweni ezithathwa njengezinzima iMaths neSayensi, zizobhalwa njalo ngekota yonyaka.U-matric kuphela okwamanje obhala izivivinyo ezisethwe ngumnyango, amanye amabanga abhala ezisethwe ezikoleni.UDkt Nkosinathi Sishi, oyinhloko yomnyango, uthe lezi zinguquko ziza nohlelo obelwethulwa eSikhawini izolo iSijika Imfundo.Isifunda uThungulu esesibili ukwethula lolu hlelo oluqale esifundeni iPinetown.USishi uthe inhloso yokuthi kubhaliswe lezi zivivinyo wukuqinisekisa ukuthi kushaya isikhathi esithile othisha sebenze umsebenzi ababekelwe wona.“Asisafuni ukugxila kwa-matric kuphela ngoba iwona kuphela obhala lezi zivivinyo ezisethwa ngumnyango. Kodwa sifuna ukuqala kwaGrade 10 nakwaGrade 11 ukuze umfundi afike kwa-matric esejwayele ukubhala lezi zivivinyo. Ukubhalisa izivivinyo kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi umsebenzi othisha bawenzile ngoba sisuke sibabekele ukuthi ngesikhathi esithile babe sebephothule umsebenzi ongaka,” kusho uSishi.Uthe kulolu hlelo basebenzisana nongoti kwezemfundo uSolwazi Mary Metcalfe, owayenguMqondisi-Jikelele eMnyangweni weMfundo ePhakeme.Ezintweni ezizokwenzeka kulolu hlelo wukufundisa izifunda nezikole ngendaba yokuphatha imali nendaba yamalivu othisha.“Ithimba elibhekele ihhovisi likandaba zabantu lizofika lihlale kuleso sifunda lifundise ngokugcwaliswa kwamalivu othisha, ukuthunyelwa kwawo enhloko hhovisi nokugcina olunye ulwazi ezikoleni. Kuzogxilwa nasezintweni ezithinta ukuphatha imali okuyinto ejwayele ukuba yinkinga kakhulu,” kuqhuba uSishi.Uthe futhi akuzugxilwa kuphela nasemiphumeleni ka-matric kodwa kuzogxilwa nasezivivinyweni zamabanga aphansi i-Annual National Assessments (ANA).“Njengoba lolu hlelo luqale kulezi zifunda ezimbili, kuqeqeshwe abaqondisi nabeluleka ngezifundo kulezi zifunda ngoba iPinetown inezikole ezisemadolobheni bese iba nezikole ezisemakhaya okubalwa ezikwaSwayimane. UThungulu lunezikole ezisemakhaya okubalwa iNkandla nezinye izindawo yingakho siqale kulezi zifunda. Sihlose ukuthi kuphele unyaka lolu hlelo lube selwenabele nakwezinye izifunda ngoba sifuna ukuthi ngonyaka ozayo lube selusebenza ngokugcwele.”Uthe luzoqinisekisa ukuthi othisha bayaya ezikoleni, bafika ngesikhathi esifanele futhi bayafundisa okungenani amahora ayisikhombisa ngosuku.
title: Kujikwa ezemfundo KwaZulu-Natal

text: OWAYEYISIKHULU sakwa-Eskom uziphikile izinsolo zokuthi owayenguNgqongqoshe wamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Malusi Gigaba, waphoqa abakwa-Eskom ukuba banike inkontileka inkampani yakwaGupta. UMnuz Chose Choeu, owayengesinye sezikhulu sakwa-Eskom, uthule ubufakazi kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawula kombuso yidlanzana.Akushilo bekuphambene nalokhu obekushiwo omunye ufakazi ngodaba oluthinta abakwaGupta. UMnuz Paul Pretorius, othule ubufakazi ngoLwesibili, yena utshele ikhomishini ukuthi waphoqwa ukuba anikeze iTNA inkontileka lapho babekhokhela uR1 million ukuseka uhlelo lwabo lwasekuseni. Kwavela ukuthi lolu hlelo lwasekuseni belusekwa ngemali kahulumeni.Izinkampani eziningi zahulumeni okubalwa iTransnet ne-Eskom babefaka imali ekuxhaseni lolu hlelo. ITNA yasebenzisa imali encane noma yangakhipha ngisho nesenti ngohlelo olwalusakazwa ekuseni kwiMorning Live kuSABC. UPretorius uthe wayevele engabaza ngokuthi kungani beseka iTNA ngokuba abaxhasi. Uthe le nkampani yayingabhalisiwe ngisho nangaphansi kwe-ABC, okuyiyona ebheka ukusabalaliswa komsebenzi wabezindaba.Lokho okwakusho ukuthi ngeke bazi ukuthi bona njenge-Eskom bazozuzani ngokubaseka.
title: Uphike ekaGigaba ngolwamaGupta ne-Eskom

text: OWAYENGUKAPUTENI weSuperSport United, uThabo September, usephumele obala ngokuthi angaseseka ngokugcwele isinqumo sabaphathi beqembu uma beqoka ukuqasha ibamba lomqeqeshi uKaitano Tembo.ISuperSport, engabanga nesizini enhle ka-2017/2018, ithungatha umqeqeshi ozovala isikhala sika-Eric Tinkler olaxaze iqembu kungasekuhle. Kuvele ukuthi kunabadlali abekade engasazwani nabo.Bekubhekwe ukuthi Amatsatsantsa a Pitori aqashe omunye umqeqeshi emuva kokuhamba kukaTinkler kodwa aqoka ukubambisa uTembo ohole iqembu langena “ngopotsho” kwiTop 8. ISuperSport ihlabane ngethuba lokudlala kwiMTN8 emuva kokunikwa amaphuzu ngenxa yecala le-Ajax Cape Town elithinta uTendai Ndoro. Nokho lokhu kubukeka kusazoshintsha njengoba i-Ajax iliwinile icala izolo nokuchaza ukuthi kumele ibuyiselwe amaphuzu eyawaphucwa.“Ngiyamethemba uKaitano, wakhiwe khona lapha eqenjini. Ngiyazi ukuthi ungomunye wabantu okuzobhekwa kubona uma sekuqashwa umqeqeshi. Uma kugcina kuqashwa yena ngizomeseka ngokugcwele. Kodwa-ke noma ngubani ozoqashwa sizomeseka eqenjini”, kusho uSeptember.Ngesizini edlule iSuperSport igcine idonsa kanzima emidlalweni yeligi emuva kokufinyelela kowamanqamu weCAF Confederation Cup kodwa yahlulwa yiTP Mazembe yaseDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC).UTembo utshele abezindaba ukuthi lokhu kuzoba yisifundo kubaphathi sokuthi bahlele kangcono ngokuzayo, basayine abadlali abenele uma bebuyela kulo mqhudelwano. Kunemibiko yokuthi iSuperSport isihlabene ngomgadli uJames Keene obeyibamba kwiBidvest Wits ngesizini edlule. Ihlukane nomdlali wasemuva uDenwin Farmer, osayine kwiMaritzburg United.“Noma yimuphi umqeqeshi ozohola iqembu ngesizini ezayo uzoba nengcindezi yokulibuyisela ezingeni elaziwa ngalo. Kufanele siyiqale kahle isizini, lokho kubalulekile. UKaitano uyazi naye ukuthi kufanele iqembu lenze kahle ngesizini ezayo. Asikwazi ukuphinda le nto eyenzeke ngeledlule. Ngiyethemba ukuthi abaphathi bazokhetha umqeqeshi ozokwazi ukwenza lokho,” kusho uSeptember.
title: ‘Ngingakweseka ukuqashwa kukaTembo’

text: I-IFP inqume ukuthi ingamthatheli izinyathelo uSomlomo kaMasipala Abaqulusi oboshelwe izinsolo zokweba igenerator yomkhandlu.UMnuz Mkhonyovu Khumalo (47) onguSomlomo ungaphandle ngebheyili kaR 2 000 benoMnuz Sizwe Mthembu (45) oyisikhulu sezeziNhlekele eBaqulusini.Badliwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngesonto eledlule ngecala lokweba i-generator.Isolezwe ngeSonto ngeledlule libike ngokuboshwa kukaKhumalo okuthiwa uthathwe ematasa emhlanganweni abewusihlalo wawo. Bebevele eNkantolo yeMantshi eVryheid icala labo lahlehliselwa uFebhruwari 24 wonyaka ozayo.USihlalo we-IFP uMnuz Blessed Gwala uthi okwamanje uKhumalo uzoqhubeka asebenze kuze kuphothulwe udaba enkantolo ngoba abakwazi ukuxhomondela bamthathele izinyathelo bengakalazi iqiniso lonke.“Umthetho wezwe uqondile phela ukhuluma ngokuthi umuntu umsulwa aze atholakale enecala nathi sizolandela lokho-ke.“Okunye okufanele ukuqaphele wukuthi uKhumalo uyaphikisana nokushiwo ngamaphoyisa ecaleni, manje yinkantolo okufanele ixazulule esimeni esinjalo ngoba bayaphikisana,’’ kusho uGwalaIzimpukane eziluhlaza ezilwazi kahle udaba zithi i-generator yaduka emahhovisi omkhandlu ngo-2017 kwase kuvulwa icala kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi yatholakala emzini kaKhumalo kwaCeza, oLundi.Kuphinde kuvele nokuthi uKhumalo wayematasa nomsebenzi wokungcwaba umfowabo ngesikhathi kunyamalala i-generator.Kuthiwa abaphenyi abafika bashaqa i-generator emzini kaKhumalo abamazisanga nokwenza ukuthi naye avule icala lokunyamalala kwayo.Amaqembu aphikisayo kulo masipala ayavutha akhala ngokuthi akufanele ngabe uKhumalo uyaqhubeka nokusebenza ekubeni engaphansi kwefu elimnyama lezinsolo zokweba.
title: Uzoqhubeka nokusebenza usomlomo oboshelwe i-generator

text: Ngemuva kokuhluleka ukuchitha umengameli Jacob Zuma ngevoti eliyimfihlo, iDA isifake isicelo sokuthi lihlakazwe iPhalamende ukuze kuphuthunyiswe ukhetho lukazwelonke oluyoze lube ngo-2019. Umholi weDA, uMnuz Mmusi Maimane ngoLwesithathu uthe ukuhlakazwa kwePhalamende iyona ndlela engavumela abantu bakuleli ukuthi bazwakalise imibono yabo yangampela ngobuholi buka Zuma. Ukhetho lukazwelonke luyoze lube ngo-2019, kanti okwamanje akukacaci ukuthi iDA izophumelela yini kwisicelo sayo. IDA ithe izofaka lesi sicelo ngoLwesine futhi ifuna sidingidwe ePhalamende maduze. UMaimane umemezele lokhu kulandela ukuhluleka kwamaqembu aphikisayo ukuchitha uZuma ngoLwesibili ngevoti eliyimfihlo lokungabethembi ubuholi bakhe. Ngesikhathi uSomlomo wePhalamende uNkk Baleka Mbete ememezela imiphumela kuvele ukuthi bangu 177 abavotele ukuthi asuswe esikhundleni, abangu 198 bavotela ukuthi aqhubeke ahole. Abangu 9 abavotanga. UMaimane uthe kuzodingeka lihlakazwe iPhalamende ukuze kukhishwe uhulumeni ongekho emthethweni. "IDA ithathe isinqumo ilandela umthetho kaSection 50 ngokomethethosisekelo, ukuthi ifake isicelo sokuthi kuhlakazwe iPhalamende, kubizwe ukhetho lukazwelonke ngokushesha," kusho uMaimane. "USection 50 uthi umengameli kumele alihlakaze iphalamende uma lamukela isicelo sokuthi lihlakazwe futhi kunevoti elikwesekayo lokho elivela kumalungu ePhalamende ngemuva kweminyaka emithathu kubekwe amalungu alo,"
title: IDA ifuna kuhlakazwe iPhalamende

text: UBUNAZARETHA sebudicilelwe isithunzi sakho isikhathi eside ngenxa yombango wobuholi.Lo mbango wobuNazaretha selokhu waqala ngo-1970 ngemuva kokukhothama kwenkosi iLanga. Usalokhu uqhubeke njalo; eqinisweni yilona cala eselidonse isikhathi kunawo wonke emlandweni wamacala eNingizimu Afrika.Sekuze kwakhothama amajaji amabili, kwathi amathathu athatha umhlalaphansi selokhu kwaqala lo mbango.Kubuhlungu ukuthi amalungu omndeni angabaholi bamathempeli ahlukene yibona abasophondweni ekuvumeleni ukuthi umlando kababamkhulu, oyigazi labo, uhudulwe ezinkantolo. Akekho omsulwa phakathi kwabo, ngoba njengokhulumela umndeni ukuthi besingahluleka ukuthi sihlale phansi sibhunge ngalolu daba. Ngisho kungathiwa kungathatha impelasonto eyodwa noma isonto lonke, akunani. Ngisho kungathatha inyanga ngoba le nto ayikaze ilungiswe.Engifuna ukukubalula kakhulu wukuthi ubuNazaretha noNkulunkulu ikhona okwakulethwe ezweni lakithi emagqumeni aseNanda. Kudlondlobale kwaya ezindaweni ezahlukene nasezifundazweni zalapha eNingizimu Afrika yonkana nasemazweni angomakhelwane anjengeSwatini namanye.Sikhohlwe ukuthi akekho umuntu olwa ukuthola isikhundla sikaJesu Khristu njengoba sikholelwa wukuthi uShembe naye wayethunyelwe uNkulunkulu.Akekho noyedwa othi mina ngiyigazi likaJesu, ngakho ngifuna ukuba yinkosi yamaKhristu. Kungani pho uma thina sinomuntu owafika wayesengenwa umoya oyingcwele, wenza le misebenzi ayenza ukuze abantu baphile futhi bakwazi nokukhuluma noNkulunkulu, kube khona abantu abayigazi bathi bona bafuna ukuba abaholi?Bekunani ukuthi uma ngabe uphethe ibandla noma ithempeli elithile niguqe nonke nithandaze lo nkulunkulu owaziveza kubabamkhulu? Le nto yokuya ezinkantolo yenza kube sobala ukuthi kungenzuzo le omunye nomunye wabanewethu acabanga ukuthi angayithola, uma kunguyena umholi.Angimazi mina umuntu othi othi uyayihlonipha into naye azalwe ikhona azi ukuthi ayilona ifa kodwa athi nguye ophethe. Akusho lokho ebe azi ukuthi le nto yayiqale kuphi nokuthi uNkulunkulu wayetheni kubabamkhulu.Sidlule lapho, size sifike odabeni lapho iNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini neyaseMgungundlovu zakhipha isinqumo sokuthi wubani onegunya lokuphatha ebandleni. Kuphinda kube wukuthi lolu daba ludlulisiwe layiswa eNkantolo yokuDluliselwa kwamaCala eBloemfontein kuyoliwa nesinqumo esathathwa amajaji emva kweminyaka emine.Ukudlulisa leli cala kufana nokwedelela. Hhayi kuphela uNkulunkulu noShembe uqobo kodwa nezinkantolo. Ngiyacabanga ukuthi amaNazaretha lawa asasukuma njalo aye emabandleni noma emathempelini, sicela ehlise umoya ngoba asefakwe ushevu wokuzikhethela umholi.Kubuhlungu okwenzekayo ngoba laba bantu asebezenza izinto ezinkulu phambi kukaNkulunkulu, bona uqobo lwabo abayona into enkulu.Into enkulu la uShembe. Yena owakhuluma noNkulunkulu ngqo. Ukuthi kubona kuyaye kufike kanjani uma becabanga umoya kaShembe la ekhona ebuka umndeni wakhe, abaholi bebandla, abefundisi namaNazaretha uqobo ehlukanisa umndeni. Lokhu bakwenza ngokuthi bathi, ubani ongesiye umholi.Le nto yokuthi kuzoba nomholi oyeda ilibulele leli bandla ngoba mkhulu umsebenzi okufanele engabe leli bandla seliwenzile emphakathini.Lo msebenzi kufanele engabe uyabonakala lapha eNingizimu Afrika nakwamanye amazwe asezwenikazi i-Afrika. Kufanele engabe sikhuluma ukuthi siko-Ethiopia nako-Egypt kuyona yonke le minyaka ewu-43 kodwa kusabangwa isihlalo.Enye into ebuhlungu wukuthi uma sekufikwe enkantolo eBloemfontein kobe sekufikwe kwangqingetshe. Lapho kuzobe kungasekho enye inkantolo okungayiwa kuyona. Isinqumo esizothathwa khona sizodala ukuthi kube khona abajabulayo nabakhalayo. Lokho kuqubula umbuzo wokuthi sikhohliwe yini ukuthi uNkulunkulu wakhuluma nomuntu oyedwa vo, uMphrofethi u-Isaiah Mloyiswa Mdliwamafa Shembe? Akazange aphinde avele futhi azokhuluma nomunye noma kube khona omphuphayo.UMqaliwendlela owakwazi ukukhuluma noNkulunkulu kuphela.Lo mbango okhona odala ukuthi abantu bazondane, bahlukanise imindeni ibuhlungu. Lapha uthola umuntu oyedwa ake sithi indoda eyinhloko ekhaya iya eBuhleni kuthi unkosikazi noma izingane ziya eThembezinhle. Angisiboni isibusiso kuleyo nto.Ngiyathemba ukuthi umoya ongcwele kaJehova ungangena kubantu ukuze kube nokuthula. Ungene kubantu abehlukene abangasusa udweshu ngenxa yesinqumo esizovela enkantolo.Ngiyacela futhi egameni lomndeni wakwaShembe oyigazi ukuthi kube nokuthula noma ngabe isinqumo sithini. UNkulunkulu noShembe kuphela abanesivumelwano somphongolo. Yibona abaziyo ukuthi bafunani ngaleli bandla. Asinamvume, asinamandla okulwisa lokho. Pho sibheke kuphi uma kuwukuthi yithina esimosha nesidicicela phansi umsebenzi omkhulu kangaka?* ULandile Shembe ukhulumela umndeni wakwaShembe
title: Umbango wobuholi udicilela phansi isithunzi sobuNazaretha
I-AU izohlola 'ikhambi' laseMadagascar leCorona

text: ULebani ‘Rasta’ Sirenje, uphonselwe inselelo nguMnuz Vivian Reddy obeyingxenye yezikhulumi ngoLwesibili emcimbini obudingida ezobuciko eNkosi Albert Luthuli ICC, eThekwini. URasta odabuka eZimbabwe kodwa osezinze eGoli, wazakhela udumo ngokudweba osaziwayo ezinkonzweni zabo zokubakhumbula okubalwa uHHP, okwakhala abaningi ngesithombe sakhe. UReddy ucele uRasta ukuthi adwebe umndeni wakhe emuva kokuba ebone isithombe somsakazi weGagasi uFelix Hlophe, naso esiphendulwe ihlaya.UReddy othe uyazifela ngemidwebo, uthe ngisho emzini wakhe unezithombe eziningi azithenga ngemali eshisiwe. Ukhuthaze abantu ukuthi baseke amaciko ngokuthi bathenge imidwebo yawo.UMnuz Vukile Zondi ongumphathi kwiGagasi FM naye obengomunye wezikhulumi, uthe iKwaZulu-Natal inothoile ngezobuciko kodwa siyakukhohlwa lokho. Ulinganise ngemikhakha eminingi yezobuciko athe kukhonya kuyo abavela esifundazweni.“Asenzi okwanele ukuqhakambisa ezobuciko esifundazweni sethu ekubeni sinothile kulo mkhakha. Kumele ngabe lo mkhakha siyawuhlonipha futhi sizama ngayo yonke indlela ukuthi uthuthukiswe,” kusho uZondi.OyiNhloko yezamaPaki, ezokuNgcebeleka namaSiko kuMasipala weTheku uMnuz Thembinkosi Ngcobo, uthe bafisa ukubeka ezobuciko kwelinye izinga.UZODWEBA umndeni kaMnuz Vivian Reddy uLebani ‘Rasta’ Sirenje, ophonselelwe inselelo yilesi siqumama saseThekwini ashuthwe naso emcimbini wezobucikoUthe isifiso sakhe ukuthi iTheku libe nesikhwama esibhekelele ezobuciko. UNgcobo uthe kumele kube nendawo lapho amaciko ezokwazi ukudayisa khona umsebenzi wawo. Uthe lona umkhakha amaciko angaziphilsa ngawo uma unakekelwa. Lesi bekuyisithangami esiyingxenye ye-Articulate Africa Book and Art Fair. Bekukhona osaziwayo abahlukene kwezobuciko okubalwa uZakes Madida, kwanandisa uNaima Kay, uLasandra nabaculi bowokholo abawina kwiGospel ID okubalwa uSibongiseni Zikhali noSfiso Diya. Mayelana nomdwebo wakhe uFelix naye obekhona ukuwamukela, uvele wawuphendula ihlaya. Uthe kungenzeka ukuthi uyobe efana nawo eminyakeni engu-20 ezayo.
title: URasta nenselelo yokudweba isiqumama

text: KUSHUBILE kwiSibaya kuMzansi Magic njengoba bebaningi abalingisi okuthiwa bayachithwa ezingavuselelwanga izinkontileka zabo kulo nyaka.Isolezwe ngeSonto lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi izinkontileka zabalingisi beSibaya zivuselelwa ngoFebhuwari minyaka yonke njengoba kusuke kuqala isizini entsha kwiSibaya.Kulokhu kuthiwa izembe ligawule laphindelela kubalingisi.Phakathi kwabahambayo kukhona igama likaLinda Mtoba odlala indawo kaZama Ngwenya, elikaFlorence Mokgatsi odlala ekaLerato Kgokong nelikaCeleste Ntuli odlala indawo kaSiphokazi.Umndeni wakwaNgwenya kuthiwa uzohlakazwa, okwenza ikusasa labalingisa lomndeni libe mfiliba.“Wonke umuntu ubambe umoya ngoba bambalwa abalingisi asebenesiqiniseko sokuthi bayahamba kulo mdlalo,” kusho umthombo.Umthombo uveze ukuthi uFlorence uzithwele kodwa uyazama ukufihla isisu, usesifihla ngokuthi agqoke izingubo ezinkulu kunaye uma elingisa kodwa akusasizi ngoba sesiyabonakala isisu.Okhulumela uMzansi Magic, uBongi Metsing, akafunanga ukuphumela obala ngalaba balingisi okuthiwa bayahamba.“Isibaya siyi-soapie njengoba singakalelwe sikhathi ukuthi sigcina nini. Ukusihlukanisa ngamasizini kusuke kwenziwa yithina ukuze sibone ukuthi sesikuphi naso. Abalingisi okhuluma ngabo ngeke ngikuqinisekise ukuthi bayahamba noma cha.“Iqhaza labo emdlalweni lizoncika ekutheni izindawo abazilingisayo zibhalwe kanjani. Abantu abalinde bazobona ukuthi kuzokwenzekani njengoba umdlalo usuke ushintsha indlela obhalwe ngayo uma kunguJanuwari,” kusho uBongi.UCeleste uthe usekhona kwiSibaya futhi akukho asakukhulume nabaphathi beSibaya ngenkontileka yakhe.UFlorence akatholakalanga ukuphawula. Ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa.
title: Kunukwa izembe kubalingisi beSibaya

text: USALE enganeme ngabadlali bakhe umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uGavin Hunt,  bephuma ngembobo yenaliti koweCAF Champions League ngoMgqibelo ntambama.Amakhosi ahlulwe yiSimba SC yaseTanzania ngo 3-0 emdlalweni womlenze wesibili wama-quarterfinal eDar es Salaam ngempelasonto. Ayekade enqobe ngo 4-0 kowokuqala kuleli. IChiefs isizobhekana neWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco kowandulela owamanqamu oyimilenze emibili. Owokuqala uzoba ngoJuni 18 eMorocco. Owesibili uzoba seMzansi ngoJuni 25. Komunye owandulela owamanqamu, i-Esperance yaseTunisia izobhekana ne-Al Ahly yase-Egypt ekhiphe iMamelodi Sundowns.Okushiye uHunt engagculisekile yindlela ezakhe ezidlale ngayo eTanzania."Sihlulekile ukudlala ngenxa yezizathu ezaziwayo. Besilokhu siphisana ngebhola. Kodwa okubalulekile wukuthi sidlulele phambili. Yilokho okubalulekile emidlalweni yemilenze emibili. Bekunzima kakhulu namuhla," kusho uHunt.Ngemuva komdlalo womlenze wokuqala eFNB Stadium, iningi belizitshela ukuthi iChiefs isiyogcina icala eTanzania. ISimba, ekade yesekwa ngabalandeli bayo enkundleni, icishe yawona umcimbi kwazise umdlalo uphele sekubanjwe umoya."Ibingekho ingozi emizuzwini engu-20 noma engu-26 yokuqala. Bathola ikhona, bashaya igoli okuyilona elisihlalise emuva. Bashaya nelesibili ngaso isiwombe sokuqala elenze kwaba nzima. Emuva kwalokho, simake kwaze kwaba sekugcineni. Kade sazi ukuthi badlalela ekhaya, bazohlasela ngakho konke. Badlale ngabadlali abane phambili," kusho uHunt.UHunt kufanele anganami ngendlela ezakhe ezinze ngayo emdlalweni weSimba. Uma sizoqhubeka nokudlala ngendlela engagculisi zingagcina zingayinuki iTop 8 kwiDStv Premiership. IChiefs ibambe indawo ka-11 kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-30.  Idinga ukuqoqa amaphuzu emidlalweni emithathu esele ukuze izibeke ethubeni lokunyukela emaqenjini ayisishiyagalombili aphezulu. NgoLwesithathu, Amakhosi azovakashela iBlack Leopards koweligi eThohoyandou Stadium, eGiyani, ngo-3 ntambama. Izobe isidlala neLamontville Golden Arrows (Juni 2) bese isonga iligi neTS Galaxy ngoJuni 5.Emuva kwemidlalo yeligi izolungiselela iWydad edlale nayo kabili esigabeni samaqoqo. IWydad ihlule iChiefs ngo 4-0 kowokuqala ekuhambeni. Amakhosi awine owesibili ngo 1-0.
title: UHunt usale engeneme  bedlula sekuvalwe amehlo koweCaf

text: UZikalala ukusho lokhu izolo ngesikhathi evula isibhedlela sikaR232 million esibhekela abaneCovid-19 esingaphakathi emagcekeni esibhedlela iClairwood, eMobeni, eThekwini.Isibhedlela sakhiwe izinyanga eziyisithupha kanti uZikalala uthe kudala bekuthatha iminyaka emithathu ukwakha isibhedlela.Izolo uZikalala, uNgqongqoshe wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu nemiSebenzi kaHulumeni uNkk Peggy Nkonyeni, owezeMpilo uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, owezeziMali uMnuz Ravi Pillay nowezobuCiko, Amasiko, Imidlalo nokuNgcebeleka uNkk Hlengiwe Mavimbela, bahlole isibhedlela esizonakekela abaneCovid-19 uma sekugcwele kwezinye izibhedlela.“Abantu kufanele bangesabi ukulala kulesi sibhedlela konke kumi ngomumo. Isibhedlela sizosala noma sekudlule iCovid-19 okusho ukuthi yingqalasizinda ezosiza ngisho eminyakeni ezayo,” kusho uZikalala.UNkk Nkonyeni uthe isibhedlela sinemibhede ewu-290, sinamagumbi okulalisa abaguliswa yiCovid-19 abadinga ukuphefumula ngemishini nalawo abhekele abangenayo indawo yokuhlala ngabodwana emakhaya.UNkk Simelane-Zulu ucele abantu ukuthi baqhubeke nokulandela imithetho yokuphepha yeCovid-19 noma ngabe uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa esezivulile izinhlaka eziningi zomnotho.“Kufanele siqaphele, siqhubeke nokugqoka izifonyo, ukugeza izandla nokuqhelelana. Izinhlaka zomnotho azivulelwanga ukuthi sigcaluze kodwa zivulelwe ukusiza umnotho ukuthi usimame nokuhlenga imisebenzi yabantu. ICovid-19 isekhona ngakho wonke umuntu kufanele abe neqhaza ekuvimbeni ukubhebhetheka kwayo,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe seziyehla yini izibalo zabantu abangenwa yiCovid-19 KwaZulu-Natal, uthe okwamanje ngeke athi ziyehla ngoba kuningi okufanele kubhekwe ngaphambi kokuthi kwenziwe isimemezelo.“NgoJulayi izibalo zethu beziko-3 000 njengamanje zithe ukwehla. Okwamanje ngeke sisho ukuthi izibalo zehlile ngoba iWorld Health Organisation inohlelo lwayo olucacisayo ukuthi kushiwo nini ukuthi zehlile izibalo zabantu abaneCovid-19. Sicela abantu baqaphele ngoba uma bephula imithetho yokuphepha yeCovid-19 izibalo zizobuye zinyuke,” kusho uNkk Simelane Zulu.
title: Kuvulwe isibhedlela esizobhekela abaneCovid-19

text: UMLINGISI owazakhela udumo kwiHome Affairs, oke waba ngumethuli wohlelo lwakuMzansi Magic, i-Our Perfect Wedding, uthe akazisoli ngokubopha imithwalo yakhe ashiye idolobha ayozelusela izinkomo emakhaya.UBrenda Ngxoli uthe namanje usazinze kubo e-Eastern Cape. Uthe ukuhlala emakhaya sekumembulele izinto eziningi njengoba ethi usezelwe kabusha, nempilo ayiphilayo inokuthula nenjabulo.“Ngathi angiyeke ukuhlupheka nabantu edolobheni kodwa ngigoduke ngiyoziphilisa ngemfuyo nezitshalo emakhaya.“Akuhlushekwa emakhaya. Kunabantu basemakhaya abadliwa ngamagundane emijondolo yako-Alexandra ngoba bengafuni ukugoduka.“Mina ngafika emakhaya ngakha umuzi wami sengiyalima futhi ngeluse emakhaya.“Ngiyayithola imali ngokuphatha izinhlelo emicimbini futhi ngethule izinkulumo ezakhayo.”Uthe usehamba eshumayela ivangeli lokuthi abantu abamnyama bakhonze oNkulunkulu basemandulo oQamatha (ngesiZulu okuthiwa nguMve-linqangi).“Ngazi-buza ukuthi baphi oQamatha esasibakho-nza ingakafiki le ncwadi enomlomo obomvu.“Singaba-ntu abamunye, asiqhube inkolo yothando. Asiyeke inkululeko yepolitiki kodwa singene kwekamoya. Sinxuse oQamatha ukuba basifundise ukubekezela.”Uthe ukulingisa akasoze akuyeka kodwa akasoze adlala indawo ethunaza umuntu omnyama.“Kulezi zinsuku sekugcwele imidlalo engcolile neqhakambisa udlame.Mina angihambi-sani nalokho. Mina ngiyayikhetha imidlalo engilingisa kuyo, angilingisi noma iyiphi indawo.”UBrenda wethusa abaningi ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka edalula ukuthi uhlukumezeke kakhulu endimeni yezokungcebeleka.OWAYENGUMLINGISI uBrenda Ngxoli owazakhela udumo kwimidlalo okubalwa kuyo iHome Affairs. Isithombe: ESIGCINIWEWaveza ohlelweni olwalwethulwa wu-Anele Mdoda, iReal Talk kuSABC3, ukuthi kunabathile kule ndima abamhlukumeze ngokocansi.Yize ayethe ubathathela izinyathelo zomthetho kodwa manje uthi usethathe isinqumo sokubathethelela.“Mina sengisenkolweni yokunikeza uthando nokuthethelela abantu abangonile.“Uma usukule nkonzo awube usaba nayo inzondo namagqubu.“Ngahlala phansi ngajula ngakho konke ngazibuza ukuthi kwakubangelwa yini bangihlukumeze kanje.“Ngathola ukuthi uma umuntu ekuzwisa ubuhlungu kusuke kunothize naye owamzwisa ubuhlungu empilweni yakhe.”Uthe nakuba engabambele muntu igqubu kodwa akasoze akukhohlwa abakwenza kuye.UBrenda waveza ukuthi kunozakwabo wesilisa owamphulula amathanga waze wafinyelela nasesithweni sakhe sangasesekodwa wamchiliza esesithinta.Wathi lo mlisa akagcinanga lapho kodwa wabuye wancoma izinyawo zakhe, ethi uma ezibona zimenza angene egiyeni locansi.Eqhuba wathi akubanga umlingisi wesilisa kuphela kodwa kukhona nowesifazane owamtoboza amabele maqede wazithethelela ngokuthi akulona icala ukuthintwa ngowesifazane ezincenceni.Wathi zonke lezi zehlakalo zazimudla enhliziyweni futhi zimqwashisa ebusuku kodwa ephoqeleka ukufela ngaphakathi okwebutho laKwaZulu.Uthe abantu abamkhumbulayo abamlandele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoba usawafaka ama-video akhe.
title: Uselusa izinkomo uBrenda Ngxoli

text: EZOKUVELA kokuthi iwindi lokuhwebelana ngabadlali kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL) lizoqala ngoSepthemba 2 kuya ku-Okthoba 17 kulindeleke kukhuthaze iKaizer Chiefs ukuthi ibophele inja nogodo uma iCourt for Arbitration in Sports (CAS) isihlalela icala layo ngoSepthemba 9.Eyewindi likaSepthemba 2 kuya ku-Okthoba 17 ivezwe ngusihlalo wePSL, * -Irvin Khoza, esithangamini sangoLwesihlanu ebesisemini emahhovis ePremier Soccer League.Eyokuthi leli windi libeka iChiefs ethubeni elihle lokuthi ikwazi ukubanga abadlali emakethe, ingabukeli izimbangi zayo iMamelodi Sundowns ne-Orlando Pirates zizitika ngezilomo zeBidvest Wits kusukela idayisiwe, ivele nenye ingwevu yebhola laseNingizimu Afrika ecele ukungadalulwa ngoba isondelene nabadlali abaningi.“Akubuzwa ukuthi ukuvela kwalezi zinsuku zewindi likaSepthemba no-Okthoba kubeka iChiefs ethubeni elihle kakhulu lokuphendula isigwebo kwiCAS. Okokuqala nje, kufanele siqonde ukuthi ngeke inhlangano enjengeChiefs ivele isuke iphoseke ehlathini ngalo mdlali.“Nginesiqiniseko bazoba nakho okungenza iCAS ibavune ngoba uma ubuka ungaphandle ikhona inhlese yokuthi bashaywa ngemfe iphindiwe abanganikwa iqiniso ngemininingwane yomdlali nesingakubiza ngenkontileka yakhe kwiFoca Juniors,” kusho le ngwevu, ivukuza nesimo sakamuva seManchester City yase-England nayo ephendule amatafula kwiCAS kade isigadlile i-Uefa.IChiefs ngoSepthemba 9 izobeka udaba lwayo kwiCAS ngemizamo yokuphendula isigwebo seminyaka emibili imiswe yiFifa ekusayiniseni abadlali yagwetshwa noR2.8 million ohambisana nenzalo.Lesi sigwebo isinikwe ngoFebhuwari ilahlwa yicala lokusayinisa “ngoku-ngemthetho” injini yaseMadagascar, * -Andriamirado Andrianarimanana odume ngelikaDax.IChiefs imthathe lo mdlali kwiFoca Juniors yaseMadagascar ngegama lokuthi ubengenayo inkontileka ngoba iligi yakuleliya lizwe ingekho ezingeni elikhokhelayo.Nomdlali wama ekutheni ubengenayo inkontileka yeFoca kodwa naye lamlahla icala wamiswa izinyanga ezine engadlali.ICovid-19 inike uDax ithuba lokuthi asidonse asiqede isigwebo sakhe kangangoba kuleli sonto iqembu lakhe, iBlack Leopards, lizomdlalisa.Uma iChiefs iphumelela ukuphendula isigwebo kungasho inkululeko yokujaha abadlali abanjengoSifiso Hlanti noBen Motshwari kwabanye osekuke kwavela ukuthi ibabhekile.Leli qembu, elibuya ngeWits ngoLwesithathu ngo-6 ntambama e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto, liseqhulwini ngamaphuzu angu-48 kanti iSundowns eliyishiya ngamane izodlala ngoLwesibili nePirates eDobsonville Stadium ngo-6 ntambama.
title: IChiefs ingase iphendule amatafula ecaleni leCAS

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAYINTO eyaziwayo ukuthi iBanyana Banyana kumele idlalele ukufa nokuphila ku-African Women Championship (AWC) ka-2014 ezoqala eNamibia ngempelasonto ukuze ibuye ingaphoxekile njengeminye iminyaka edlule.Amaqembu ase-Afrika kumele enze kahle ku-AWC ukuze azibekisele indawo kuNdebe yoMhlaba.Eminyakeni eyedlule lokhu bekusho ukuthi amaqembu amabili afinyelela kowamanqamu alo mqhudelwano yiwona athola ithikithi lokuya kuNdebe yoMhlaba.Kulo nyaka sekushintshile njengoba i-Afrika izomelwa amazwe amathathu.IBanyana isiqede izikhawu ezine endaweni yesibili ku-AWC kodwa ngaso sonke isikhathi izibekisela indawo kowamanqamu kodwa kube wukuthi wunyaka lapho umqhudelwano ungaqondene nokuhlungela iNdebe yoMhlaba.Okokugcina ihlulwe yi-Equatorial Guinea kowamanqamu ngo-2012. Emqhudelwaneni ongaphambi kwalowo ngo-2010 yaqeda endaweni yesithathu okuyiwona okwakuhlungwa kuwona amaqembu azoya kweyoMhlaba eyayiseGermany ngo-2011.Kulokhu kunethemba lokuthi umqeqeshi omusha, uVera Pauw, uzoliqeda ishobolo afake elakuleli kuNdebe yoMhlaba eseCanada ngonyaka ozayo.Umshikashika wokuzibekisela isikhala eCanada uqala ngeSonto lapho iBanyana izobe itholene phezulu neCameroon ku-AWC e-Independence Stadium, eWindhoek, eNamibia, ngo-5 ntambama.Umdlalo uzolandelwa oweGhana ngo-Okthoba 15 bese bevala eyamaqoqo ne-Algeria ngo-Okthoba 18.Iqembu likaPauw lidinga ukuqeda eqoqweni lalo libalwa namabili aphezulu okuzolifaka kweyandulela owamanqamu.Uma lifinyelele kowamanqamu kuyobe sekufezeka iphupho leminyaka elaqala ukuba khona mhla iBanyana idlala umdlalo wokuqala neSwaziland ngo-1993.Iqembu alimemezelile uPauw liyethembisa ngoba libophele abadlali abanamava iningi labo elidlale kuma-Olympics eLondon ngo-2012 ngaphansi kukaJoseph Mkhonza. Ukudlala kuma-Olympics kwakungokokuqala ukuthi iBanyana idlale umqhudelwano osezingeni lomhlaba.Ukaputeni, uJanine van Wyk, u-Amanda Dlamini owayengukaputeni kuma-Olympics, umgadli ovutha engabaselwe, uPortia Modise, Leandra Smeda, Noko Matlou ngabanye abadlali okuzobhekwa kubona ukuthi bathwale elakuleli endleleni yalo ebheke eCanada.Uma leli qoqo labadlali eliholwa uPauw likufeza elikuyele eNamibia kuyobe lizifakile emabhukwini omlando webhola kuleli futhi kumele kulethe injabulo kubathandi bakanobhutshuzwayo njengoba kwenzeka iBafana izibekisela indawo okokuqala kuNdebe yoMhlaba ka-1998 eFrance.
title: Yimpelasonto yokuzibonakalisa kuBanyana

text: Sabelo NseleINHLANGANO yabadayisa ngotshwala isinxuse uhulumeni ukuthi angakuvali ukudayiswa kotshwala njengoba zinyuka izibalo zabatheleleka ngegciwane iCorona.Lokhu kulanels ukuthi  ongqongqoshe behlangene ukudingida ngokuqiniswa kwemigomo ebekelwe ukugwema ukusabalala kobhubhane iCorona, njengoba zinyuka njalo izibalo zabantu osekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi banaleli gciwane.Bacishe bafike esigidini abantu osekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi banegciwane.Izolo uMengameli  Cyril Ramaphosa ubize umhlangano ophuthumayo wongqongqoshe ukuze kubhungwe ngalolu daba.Kulindeleke ukuthi uRamaphosa akhulume nesizwe ngaphambi kokuhlukaniswa konyaka, lapho ezomemezela khona ngokuqiniswa kwemithetho ethize ebekelwe ukugwema ukusabalala kweCorona.Bayanda abahlaba ikhwelo lokuthi akuvalwe ukudayiswa kotshwala ukuze kunqandwe ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane.Abantu abaningi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana banxuse uhulumeni ukuthi avale ukudayiswa kotshwala njengoba bethe kunomthelela ekubhebhethekeni kwalolu bhubhane.Kepha inhlangano yabadayisa ngotshwala, ithi lokho kungaba nomthelela ongemuhle kule mboni evele ixhugela njengoba kuke kwamiswa isikhathi eside ukudayiswa kotshwala kulo nyaka.Esitatimendeni esikhishwe izolo, le nhlangano ithe  kufanele uhulumeni ubheke isixazululo esizokwazi ukunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane siphinde sivikele nemisebenzi yabaphila ngale mboni."Asikholwa wukuthi ukuvalwa kokudayiswa kotshwala kungaba yisixazululo sesikhashana noma sesikhathi eside ekulweni nokubhebhetheka kwegciwane," kusho uMnuz Lucky Ntimane, ongumholi weLiqour Traders Association.UNtimane uthe okungenziwa ukuqinisa umthetho wewashi ukuze kunciphe abantu abathatha izindlela ezingenasidingo.Okhulumela ihhovisi likamengameli uMnuz Tyrone Seale ukuqinisekisile ukuthi sekubizwe umhlangano ophuthumayo wongqongqoshe kepha wathi bazomemezela ukuthi uRamaphosa uzokhuluma nini nesizwe.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, izinyunyana ezimele abasebenzi bezempilo, zinxuse ukuthi uhulumeni aqinise imithetho ebekelwe ukugwema ukusabalala kobhubhane.UMnuz Khaya Xaba weNehawu, uthe bakhathazekile ngokuthi izibhedlela zizohluleka ukumelana nomthamo wabantu abaningi.Umengameli weDenosa uMnuz Simon Hlungwani, uthe bakhathazekile ngendlela igciwane elibhebhetheka ngayo.
title: Abadayisa ngotshwala abafuni buvalwe

text: USHAQEKILE umphakathi waseMagagadolo, KwaCeza emuva kokutholwa kwesidumbu okungesengane yentombazane enezinyanga eziwu-17 sikhishwe amehlo, sigcotshwe nemithi emilenzeni.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi ingane yabikwa wumndeni wayo emaphoyiseni ukuthi idukile ngoLwesihlanu kwathi ngeSonto kwatholakala isidumbu sayo.Kuthiwa ngabo 9 ekuseni  yayidlala nezinye izingane zakubo egcekeni.Kuthe unina esebiza izingane ukuba zizodla wabona ukuthi ayikho yona nokuthe uma ebuza ukuthi ikuphi kwatholakala ukuthi ezinye izingane aziyazi.Ube eseqala ukuyibheka watshela nabomndeni kodwa lutho ukuyithola baze bayobika emaphoyiseni.Omunye osondelene nomndeni kodwa ocele ukungadalulwa ngenxa yesihluku esenzeke enganeni, uthe bashaqekile ngokwenzeke kule ndawo yabo  bayaqala ukukubona.“Sisathukile ngobulwane obungaka obenziwe enganeni enezinyanga eziwu-17. Sesithemba ukuthi igazi lomuntu liyakhuluma, siyathemba uzovela obala owenze lesi senzo. Ibingakwazi nokuhamba le ngane kuyacaca ukuthi kunesigilamkhuba esiyebile,” kuchaza yena.Uthe ingane bayibheka kusukela ngoLwesihlanu nangoMgqibelo bengayitholi.Kuthe ngeSonto babiza umthandazi ofike wabakhomba ukuthi abayobheka ehlathini elingezansi komuzi.“Sithe uma sesibheka ngezansi komuzi sabona uphaqa wengane eyayiwugqokile, sathi uma siqhubeka sibheka sathola isidumbu sayo sikhishwe amehlo, sigcotshwe imithi emilenzeni. Siphatheke kabi ngalesi senzo,” kusho  yena.Uthe babe sebebiza amaphoyisa athathe isidumbu avula necala.UCol Thembeka Mbele wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko wathi amaphoyisa aKwaCeza aphenya icala lokubulala.Uthe okwamanje akekho oboshiwe kodwa amaphoyisa ayaqhubeka nophenyo.Ibamba bukhosi lakwaButhelezi, uMnuz Mpikayise Buthelezi lithe bashaqekile ngalesi senzo ngoba siyaqala ukwenzeka endaweni.“Ngibize umhlangano ozoba ngoLwesithathu ozophenya ukuthi wubani obulale ingane. Umhlangano uzoba KwaDamba khona lapha eMagagadolo. Ngiyaqala ukubona isihluku esinjena kule minyaka ewu-61 esengiyiphilile. Ngiyafisa ukutshela isizwe ukuthi singazijeziseli abasolwayo kodwa sinike amaphoyisa ithuba. Umhlangano ngiwubizele nokuthi ngikhulume nesizwe ngoba uma uzwa izinkulumo ezikhulunywayo uyabona ukuthi umndeni uzolimazana,” kusho uButhelezi.
title: Kubulawe ingane yakopolotwa amehlo KwaCeza

text: AKUVUMI nokuthi adle uninakhuluwomfundi kaGrade 9 eNhliziyo High, uSnenhlanhla “Sne” Mthiyane (14), isidumbu sakhe esitholakale ehlathini lasesigodini saseMakhambana, KwaMpukunyoni, eMtubatuba, ngeSonto ngabo-2 ntambama.UNkk Msingisi “MaThethwayo” Mthiyane uthe okubaphethe kabi kakhulu wukuthi izinkomba zithi ngumfowabo kamufi okuzalana oyise futhi abebehlala naye emzini owodwa owenze lokhu.“Bengingekho ekhaya ngiyobhekaizinkomo kodwa obekhona ungitshelile ukuthi kufike umfowabo kaSne ngesikhathi ematasatasa epheka ekhaya ngeSabatha (ngoMgqibelo) ngabo-6 ntambama.“Ubefuna ayomthengela ugwayi. Ingane ihluleke ngisho imchazela ukuthi isematasatasa, iyapheka kodwa wayiphoqa ngenkani ukuthi iyomthengela ugwayi.”UNkk Mthiyane uthe umzukulu ugcine ehambile ukuyothenga ugwayi. “Okusenza sisole umfowabo wukuthiabasesitolo bathi nomfowabo ufikile ethi usezothenga umentshisi, baphuma sebehambisana.Uthe uthukile sekuhlwa umzukulu engabuyi.“Simbuzile umfowabo ukuthi umshonisephi, wavele wathi akazi kodwa elokhu eyaluza, engenasinqe.“Sithe uma siphumaendlini, waqoqa zonke izimpahla zakhe, weqa ekhaya. Kukhona abathi bambone namhlanje (esho ngoMsombuluko) ngakwaBhoboza ebheke ngasoPhaphasi,” kusho uNkk Mthiyane.“Ukube lo mfana ufike ngikhona bekungeke kwenzeke lokhu.”Isidumbu sikaSne size satholakala ehlathini elingasesikoleni iMakhambana Primary ngeSonto, ubelimele entanyeni nasebusweni.UNkk Mthiyane uthe abakazi noma udlwenguliwe yini umufi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa akwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe likhona icala lokubulala elivulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa sakwaMsane, eMtubatuba.“Intombazane eneminyaka engu-14 kubikwa ukuthi ilahlekile kwathingo-Okthoba 6 kwatholakala isidumbu sayo sinamanxeba okulimala,” kuphetha uCaptain Gwala.Uthe akukaboshwa muntu.
title: Ubalekile osolwa ngokubulala udadewabo

text: MHLELI: Ukudla okuningi esikudla esikhathini samanje kukhuliswe ngamaphilisi namakhemikhali. Okunye kuthakwe ngamakhemikhali akwenza kuhlale isikhathi eside kungaboli.Ukudla esingakuthengi ezitolo njengenkukhu efuyiwe, amasi esizisengela wona kuhlala usuku nje kuphela kubole, uma kusehlobo kodwa lokhu okuthengwa ezitolo kuhlala kuqede inyanga yonke kokunye, unyaka wonke kusemashalofini ezitolo.Ukudla okusemathinini nokungamafutha njengebhotela yikhona okudlulelwa yisikhathi emva konyaka. Hhayi impela ukufa kungena ngomlomo emhlabeni!Kukangaki nje abantu betshelwa ukuthi ababuyisele ukudla asebekuthengile ezitolo ngoba sekutholakele ukuthi kunobuthi obungene ngephutha ngenkathi kukhiqizwa.Isibonelo kunemikhiqizo okubalwa opholoni lapho umphakathi watshelwa ukuthi awubuyisele emuva ngoba sekutholakale ubuthi kuwo.Lukhulu luyeza kwabadla kwasani esezitolo ngisho kungenasidingo.Kungcono sizilimele izinto ezinjengesipinashi ukuze sithole imisoco yemvelo futhi engenabungozi empilweni yethu. Uma ubuka nje inyama yenkukhu etokiwe ( chicken portion) uyayibona ukuthi ayinampilo. Masidlele ukuxosha umphangazane hhayi ubumnandi ngoba ukudla nezifo kuhlobene.Simo ShangaseEHOSTELA EDENVER
title: Masidle okunempilo singadleli ubumnandi

text: INKANTOLO yeMantshi yaseGoli imqabele ibheyili uMnuz Sandile Mantsoe (27) osolwa ngokubulala intombi yakhe uKarabo Mokoena.IMantshi uCarlos Labuschagne ithe uMantsoe uzame ukuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho ngokufihla ubufakazi futhi ubhekene necala elibucayi angabhekana nesigwebo sokudilikelwa yijele uma lingamlahla.Ithe ukuthumela kwakhe incwadi efungelwe enkantolo ukufaka isicelo, akuyona into elungile obekumele ayenze kanti nakubhale kuyona kuyaphambana nakusho emaphoyiseni ngesikhathi eboshwa.Sekuphele inyanga uMantsoe esesitokisini ngemuva kokuboshwa ngezinsolo zokubulala intombi yakhe abenezinyanga eziyisikhombisa ethandana nayo wayigqiba emgodinin eBramley.ULabuschagne uthe uMantsoe wenza okuphambene futhi ayeqondile ukukwenza kokuthi ashise isidumbu sikaKarabo maqede wahlanza indawo ayegile kuyo isehlakalo.“Ushadile futhi unezingane ezintathu emshadweni kodwa usehlukene nenkosikazi yakhe. Lokho kusho ukuthi akekho umuntu onakekelwe uyena,” kusho imantshi.Ngesikhathi efunda isitatimende sikaMantsoe kuvele ukuthi walanda intombi yakhe baya eSandton lapho abehlala khona, kodwa wabuye wayishiya eyohlangana nomunye umuntu beyoxoxa ngebhizinisi.Uthe esebuyela emuva wafica intombi isidindilizile phansi ingasanyakazi. - ANA
title: Kuphinde kwabheda 'kobulale' uKarabo

text:
SIZWE BLOSEUMCULI owazakhela udumo ngengoma ethi 
  Ding Dong uzohambela izindawo ezahlukene nabaculi abanohlonze bebungaza abantu besifazane ngenyanga ezayo.UJoe Nina oseke wanyamalala isikhathi eside utshele 
  Isolezwe ukuthi ubuyile njengoba ekhiphe i-albhamu entsha ebizwa ngokuthi i
  Back Together For Life.Uthi njengoba ebecashile ubelungisa izinto zenkampani yakhe iKiller Joe abesayibhalisa manje konke sekulungile njengoba i-albhamu yakhe eyikhiphe ngaphansi kwayo.Uthi izindawo azozihambela kuzo uzobe ehamba nabangani bakhe okunguTshepo Tshola, Steve Kekana noBololo.Yize engazibalanga izindawo azozihambela kulesi sifundazwe kodwa uthe abantu ababheke futhi balalele nomsakazo ngoba uzoqala kusona.“KwaZulu-Natal bakhombisa ukuyithanda kakhulu i-albhamu yami entsha. Yingakho ngithathe isinqumo sokuthi ngiqale kubona. Kune-ngoma nje eshisa izikhotha ethi 
  Vuma edlala ubusuku nemini kwiVuma FM,” kusho uJoe Nina.Yize umculo awuculayo njengamanje ewubiza nge-afro soul kodwa ingoma ethi 
  Vuma ngeyomculo wokholo nabebonga kuyona uMdali ngokuthi abe naye ezikhathini ezinzima esazama ukuhlanganisa indaba yenkampani yakhe.“Le albhamu ngeyomndeni wonke. Ngikhuthaza abantu ukuthi bayithenge ngoba inomyalezo omuhle wothando. Inezingoma ezingu-15 kanti ngisebenze no-Andile “Ma-Ah” Kubheka waseMlazi noSphiwe Mngomezulu,” kusho uJoe Nina.Uthe uzobe ezungeza eThekwini futhi uzobe ehambisana nezintokazi ezingoDJ ezibizwa ngeThe Divas noDJ waseThekwini uDJ Dumile.
title: UJoe Nina uzojikeleza iKZN ngeyabesifazane

text: INDLELA entsha yokuqeda ukungabaza ngezinqumo ezithathwa ngonompempe ebholeni lezinyawo, ebizwa nge-video assistant referee (VAR), ibukeka ingaba wusizo kakhulu emidlalweni yePremier Soccer League (PSL).Masonto wonke kuhlale kukhalwa ngonompempe emidlalweni ye-Absa Premiership futhi okubuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi izinqumo okungeyizo abazithathayo zigcina zimoshe amaqembu ngoba akube kusabuyelwa emuva. Emidlalweni eqhubekayo eRussia yeNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2018, kusetshenziswa lolu hlelo nokuyinto eyenzeka okokuqala kulo mqhudelwano.Nakuba abaningi bebona sengathi ukusebenzisa i-video, ukuze kuhlaluke ukuthi yisiphi isinqumo okumele sithathwe unompempe, kubambezela imidlalo, kodwa sibukeka sikhona isidingo sokucubungula kahle okwenzekile ngaphambi kokuthatha isinqumo. Kunabanye ababona lokhu kuwona unobhutshuzwayo ngoba bethi umnandi ngakho ukuthi kube khona ukuphikisana ngezinqumo ezithize. Abanye bathi kungani kumele kube neVAR ngoba ezinye izinqumo zisaqhubueka nokushayisa amakhala.Emidlalweni efana nebhola lombhoxo nekhilikithi kade lwaqala lolu hlelo, futhi akukho ukungabaza ukuthi kule midlalo iyagwemeka indaba yezinqumo okungeyizo ngoba kuqale kubukisiswe. KwiPSL kunamaphenathi, amagoli namakhadi akhishwa ngendlela engabonakali kahle. Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi iVAR ingalamula ngoba nezinga lonompempe libuye lingacaci kahle.Kuyaziwa nokho ukuthi izinto ezithinta ubuchwepheshe obusha zivamise ukumba eqolo kodwa iPSL kuyomele yenze imizamo yokuthola iVAR ukuze nayo izame ukubuyisa isithunzi sayo esibuye sidicilelwe izinqumo zonompempe ezingacacile.Ngesizini edlule yePremiership abalandeli bebecishe baxabane bodwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngenxa yazo belu izinqumo zonompempe ezibuye zishiye imibuzo eminingi. Into okungamelwe ifihlwe ukuthi iReview Committee yaSafa ayiwenzi ngendlela umsebenzi ngakho kungakuhle ukuphephela kwiVAR ukuze kungaze kufikwe kuleli komiti.Njengoba kuzoqala isizini entsha yePSL kungakuhle ukuthi isigungu esiphezulu sale nhlangano silubhekisise lolu daba.
title: [IMIBONO] Lungasiza uhlelo lwamakhamera emidlalweni yePSL

text: SAPAL ABO abebebhikisha bephazamisa iPhini likaMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa ngesikhathi ethula ubufakazi kwiKhomishini kaFarlam ephenya ngesigameko saseMarikana bazokhishelwa ngaphandle uma lokhu kuqhubeka. Lesi sixwayiso sikhishwe iJaji u-Ian Farlam izolo emuva kokuba iqeqebana limhhahhamezile ethula ubufakazi.IJaji liphoqelekile ukuba lingenelele lixwayisa abenza lokhu. Kudingeke ukuba abaqaphi baphuthume kulabo abebephazamisa uRamaphosa kwamiswa kancane ukuqhubeka kwekhomishini ngesikhathi kusalungiswa isimo.Leli qulu belibanga umsindo lishaya namatafula lithi: “URamaphosa akasule esikhundleni futhi unegazi ezandleni zakhe.” Emuva kwesikhathi ummeli u-Adv Dali Mpofu ubehlise imimoya abebebhikisha.IJaji uFarlam lithe uRamaphosa uzoqhubeka nokufakaza namuhla.URamaphosa ucelwe ukuba atshele ikhomishini ukuthi kungani inyunyana i-Association of Mineworkers and Construction Union yayingekho emhlanganweni ayenawo neNum.“Kungani wahlangana neNational Union of Mineworkers? Anginalwazi lokuthi wake wazama ukuthola i-Amcu. Kungani ungabuzanga,” kusho ummeli u-Adv Dumisa Ntsebeza omele abasebenzi basemayini ababulawa.UNtsebenza ubephonsa imibuzo uRamaphosa ngesigameko sango-Agasti 2012.URamaphosa owayenguNobhala wenyunyana iNum uthe wayengenazo izinombolo zabantu axhumana nabo kwinyunyana i-Amcu.“Ngangikhuluma noMnuz Senzeni Zokwana (owayenguMengameli weNum, Frans Baleni onguNobhala noJames Motlatsi ongumsunguli weNum) ngoba ngiyabazi futhi sengike ngasebenza nabo.”“Angikwazanga ukuxhumana nabaholi be-Amcu ngoba angibazi angikaze ngisebenze nabo,” kusho uRamaphosa.“Kodwa njengomuntu ongumxazululi kwakubalulekile ukuthi uyifake i-Amcu ukuthi wawungenayo inamba kaMnuz Joseph Mathunjwa akusona isizathu,” kusho uNtsebeza.URamaphosa uthe i-Amcu yayiphika ukuthi yayithinteka esimweni esasiqhubeka ezimayini ngaleso sikhathi.“I-Amcu yayiziqhelelanisa futhi nesikhulu esiphezulu saseLonmin sasigula sasingekho ngaleso sikhathi ukuthi sizoxazulula izinkinga,” kusho uRamaphosa. Uthe neziphathimandla zaseLonmin zazinomthwalo wokuhlanganisa izinyunyana.
title: Uthwale kanzima uRamaphosa

text: BAZOBUYEKEZA indlela yokukhokha enkampanini yekhiqiza umdlalo iTjovitjo esanda kuphela kuSABC1.Lokhu kushiwo nguMnuz Kaizer Kganyago othe sebebazisile abakwaPuo Pha Productions ngezinguquko ezizoba khona uma sekubuya lo mdlalo.“Sizophinde sibasize nakwezinye izinkinga ababhekene nazo abalo mdlalo ngoba kusazoqhubeka ukusebenzisana kwethu,” usho kanje.Lokhu kungenxa yomsindo osanda kuqubuka ngenxa yezinsolo zokuthi abalingisi nabasebenzi abenza lo mdlalo namanje abakaholi.Selokhu kuvele lezi zinsolo sekube nokuphakama kwemimoya nokukhombana ngenjumbane mayelana nokube yimbangela yokungaholi kwabasebenzi.Ngokwemithombo, lesi simo sesenze kwakhona abasola abadidiyeli bomdlalo ngokungabacabangeli abasebenzi ngokungabaholeli.“Sibi isimo ngenxa yokuthi kukhona abasola abanikazi benkampani ngokuba ngogombela kwesabo. Basolwa ngokuzicabangela bodwa ngoba kuyavela ukuthi abakwaSABC kade babanika imali kodwa bangabakhokhela abantu ababesebenza,” kusho umthombo.AbakwaPuo Pha Productions bakuqinisekisile esitatimendeni ukuthi ziyiqiniso izinsolo zokuthi abalingisi nabasebenzi abaholile.Kusolwa abanye babadidiyeli ngokugweva nemali okufanele engabe bayikhokhela abasebenzi.Ukuqonga kwezinsolo kwenze abakwaPuo Pha Productions baphendule kanje ngalezi zinsolo: “Imali esele engakhokhiwe sizoyikhokha kungekudala. Sizoqhubeka nokuxhumana nabathintekayo njengoba besikwenza vele kuze kube sekugcineni.”Baphinde bacacisa nangezinsolo ezenziwa ngabanye zokuthi ukungakhokhi kwabo kudalwa wukubambezelwa ngabakwaSABC.Bathe akulona iqiniso lokhu.Bathe, empeleni abakwaSABC babeseke kakhulu futhi yibona ababe nokuqonda isimo sabo njengoba beyinkampani ezimele yabamnyama abazizamelayo.
title: Inkampani icacisa ngokungaholi kwabalingisi

text: Leli qembu, elidume ngeleZintethe Ezibomvu futhi elashiya izithameli zisahalela impinda kwi-#Gcwalis’iMabhida, lishisa izikhotha emisakazweni ngenoni elithi Inteneshe. UCHARLES KHUZWAYO ukhiphele eshashalazini umholi wale ntandokazi yeqembu, uSILWAYIPHI KHATHI.CHARLES (CK): Ngubani uSilwayiphi, awuzichaze.SILWAYIPHI (SI): NginguSilwayiphi Bongani Khathi oyizibulo ezinganeni ezingu-12 zikaMnuz Mdumseleni Bhekuyise Khathi noNkk Thulisiwe Bongi Khathi (uMaDladla). Ngizalelwe KwaNgcolosi esigodini saseThondweni, eKranskop. Ngiqale imfundo esikoleni samabanga aphansi eNdandathweni Primary, ngadlulela eMehlomlungu Junior Secondary, ngaphothula * -matric eLethuxolo High. Ngisakhula ngangifuna ukuba ngummeli kodwa ngenxa yesimo sasekhaya, ngiphoqelekile ukuba ngifune umsebenzi ukuze ngondle abafowethu nodadewethu abangilamayo ngoba ubengekho osebenzayo ekhaya ngaleso sikhathi ngemuva kokuphothula ibanga leshumi. Angiganiwe kodwa nginabantwana ababili uBayanda noLwandle.CK: Ungene kanjani emculweni?SI: Umculo ngiwuqale ngineminyaka engu-13, sicula umculo wamanothi, sicijwa uqweqwe lukathisha uMnuz BMW Ndlela, owayengifundisa eNdandathweni Primary ngaleso sikhathi. Wayekugcizelela ukuthi umculo wamanothi uyisisekelo sanoma iluphi uhlobo lomculo okhona emhlabeni. Ngagcina sengicula phambili ekhwayeni yesikole eyayinqoba kwasani emincintiswaneni yezikole. Ngaphandle kokucula esikoleni, ngizalelwe vele emndenini wamagagu. Obaba bangabantu ababedume ngokugida ingoma, beneqembu lengoma kashameni elalinandisa ngoKhisimusi nangePhasika emakhaya uma bebuya eGoli. Ngokuthanda ingoma, saqala nathi iqembu likashameni elalaziwa ngeZikhuhlanyathi okwakukhona kulo uSiyabonga Xhakaza odume ngeNgonyama Yehlathi emculweni kamaskandi. Lwaqala lapho uthando lokucula nokugida ingoma. Ngiqede isikole ngakhuphukela eGoli ngiyozama amatoho, ngafika ngagidela iqembu lakithi elizinze eGoli. Langalimbe ngizihambela edolobheni, ngahlangana nomufi uMnikazi Majola waseMakhabeleni, owayecula umaskandi. Wayephromotha eDoorfontein emgwaqweni * -End Street. Ngamcela ukuba angifake eqenjini lakhe, ngigide. Wavuma ngazilolonga naye isikhashana. Kusenjalo, ngathola umsebenzi, sancipha isikhathi sokuzilolonga naye. Ngagcina ngiyeke kanjalo ukuziqeqesha naye. Kuhambe isikhathi, ngenxa yezimpi zombango ebezisemakhaya ezagcina sezikapakele eGoli, yilapho ngakhetha ukubuyela ekhaya. Ngafika ngasungula iqembu likamaskandi, sengiholwa yiphupho nothando lomculo. Singakakhiphi ne-albhamu, iqembu laphetha ngokuhlakazeka. Kubo bonke ubunzima engihlangabezane nabo, angikaze ngiyeke ukubhala izingoma, nokwenze ngagcina sengicula ngedwa. Ngo-2015 ngimenywe emcimbini ngakithi, ngahlangana noBhengu Wabantu okunguBambanani Bhengu noSkibha Khanyile, noma bebancane kunami, ngathatheka indlela ababedlala ngayo izigingci. Saxoxa sazwana, kwaba ukuzalwa kwalo uDidi Olumashoba.USILWAYIPHI Khathi ugila izimanga estejiCK: Ngesikhathi usakhula, yibaphi omaskanda owawubukela kubo?SI: Ngikhule ngithanda kakhulu uMayogathi noBhekumuzi Luthuli.CK: Yi-albhamu yesingaki lena yoDidi Olumashoba?SI: Leli yicwecwe lethu lokuqala, siwuDidi Olumashoba, esilikhiphe ngaphansi kwenkampani iSibusiso samaNgema.CK: Yibaphi abaculi abadumile esenike naqopha ngokuhlanganyela nabo?SI: Abekho.CK: Kubaculi abenza ezinye izinhlobo, yibaphi ofisa ukusebenza nabo?SI: Emacikweni esifisa ukuhlanganyela nawo ngingabala uDJ Tira ngenxa yomlingo awufaka kunoma iyiphi ingoma apikwa kuyo, Mafikizolo, Afrotraction noTekno waseNigeria ngoba siyawuthanda futhi sinodlebe emculweni wase-Afrika.CK: Yini ongathi senikuzuzile emculweni?SI: Okwamanje akukho okubambekayo kodwa kubukeka iqembu likhula ngesivinini. Nasemisakazweni eminingi izingoma zethu zishisa izikhotha.CK: Yiluphi uhlobo lomculo olukhonzile?SI: Ngikhonze kakhulu owase-Afrika. Ngizinika isikhathi futhi nginodlebe lawo. Njengamanje ngilalela iNaija, okungumculo oculwa eNigeria.CK: Yikuphi ukudla ozifela ngakho?SI: Ngikhonze ujeqe nosu.CK: KwiTV, ukhonze luphi uhlelo?SI: Ngingumuntu ohlezi ematasa, kodwa Isibaya neGenerations, uma ngibuke kona kuphelele.CK: Njengoba sekuphilwa ngokungcofana emculweni kamaskandi, wena ungcweka nobani?SI: Okwamanje akekho umculi esiphambene naye noma esake saphambana naye.CK: Ngaphandle kokucula, yini oyenzayo?SI: Ngingumlingisi, ngiphinde ngibe umbhali wemidlalo yeshashalazi. Ngibuye ngibhale nezinkondlo nezindaba ezimfishane. Ngiphinde ngibe sebhizinisini lokwakha.CK: Uma ungekho matasatasa nemisebenzi yakho, usichitha ngani isizungu?SI: Ngikhonze ukuchitha isikhathi nomndeni wami.CK: Kwezemidlalo ukhonze ziphi?SI: Ngikhonze ibhola lezinyawo futhi namanje ngisalidlala. Ngingumlandeli wokuqina we-Orlando Pirates.CK: Ngabe uyakholwa?SI: Ngingumuntu ohlukile uma kuziwa ngalapho. Ekhaya bangamaLuthela, komame bayiZayoni manje ngisonta noma yikuphi lapho ngizwa umoya ungiholela ngakhona.CK: KuMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika, yimuphi okukhalisayo.SI: Mihle imithetho yezwe lethu kodwa iqine kakhulu ngasemadodeni, nathi siyahlukumezeka ngezindlela ezihlukene kodwa kusabukeka njengechilo ukuphumela kwethu obala.CK: Yiluphi uhlobo lwemoto olukhonzile?SI: Noma ingaphelelwa isikhathi yona, kodwa iBMW X5 ngisayithanda.CK: Yisiphi isilwane esifuywayo osikhonzile?SI: Ikati lami uKitty odumalayo uma ngihamba.CK: Sengiphetha, yisiphi isehlakalo esakuphatha kabi ongasoze wasikhohlwa?SI: Nginenkinga mina yokufaniswa. Ngomunye unyaka ngizihambela edolobheni ngasukelwa umama thizeni, wakhwela wadilika kimi ngaphandle kuka ‘sawubona’, wathi “wawungazi ukuthi nakuwe ukuhlupheka kuyokufica.” Aqhubeke athi “Uyabona ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyakushaya ngokubhubhisa amatshitshi,” ethi ngaqeda ubuntombi ezinganeni zakhe zombili. Ngisamangele nginjalo, aqhubeke athi uzoyitshela yonke iNgudwini ukuthi mina sengaba uphuya, angisenamali. Ngake ngathula ngama, ngazama ukuchaza ukuthi angisiye umuntu akhuluma naye. Wayelokhu eqhubekile engisho ngezinhlamba, esho nokusho ukuthi nginguNjinga Khoza, engiqambela ilumbo ngoba ngingeyena lowo muntu. Ngaze ngalekelelwa ngosomatekisi.
title: Luza kabi uDidi Olumashoba

text: BAKHALA ezimathonsi abashonelwe amalungu emindeni yabo ngesikhathi kubhidlika isakhiwo sesonto sebandla iPentecostal Holiness Church eNdlangubo, eMpangeni ngoLwesine ebusuku, kwashona abangu-13.ULina Langa (38) uthe ufisele unina, u-Alter Langa (71) uhambo oluhle ngesikhathi eya enkonzweni ngoLwesine. Kodwa ubengazi ukuthi usevalelisa okokugcina kuyena. Uthe unina ubehamba namadodakazi akhe amabili eneminyaka engu-12 neneminyaka engu-13.Uthe yena ungunogada futhi ubehlele ukulandela unina enkonzweni yangeSonto uma esethole isikhathi emsebenzini.“Bengisemsebenzini ngesikhathi ngithintwa yindodakazi yami eneminyaka engu-13 ngo-11 ebusuku ikhala. Ibihlulwa ngisho ukusho ukuthi kwenzekeni ikhala ngogogo. Ngiyincengile ukuthi yehlise umoya kwaba ikhona ngizwa ukuthi kukhona okwenzeke kumama. Ngishiye ukusebenza ngaya khona,” kusho uLina.Unina ushone esendaweni yesigameko.Uthe akazi uzokwenzenjani ngaphandle kukanina ngoba wuyena obesala nezingane zakhe uma esemsebenzini.Uveze ukuthi usezophoqeleka ukuthi athole umuntu ozosala namadodakazi akhe ekhaya ngoba usebenza ebusuku isikhathi esiningi.UBongeni Ngema (34) uthe nakuyena kusenzima ukwamukela ukuthi unina akasekho.“Ukushona kwakhe kungizumile. Umama wethu wuyena obenza kube nokuthula ekhaya.
