Mina nezingane zakwethu sisebenza eThekwini, umama ubehlala nezingane zethu Esikhawini (Esikhaleni) ezisiza uma zilungela ukuya esikoleni,” kusho uNgema.UMfundisi Phiwayinkosi Sibiya wePentecostal Holiness Church, uthe abesifazane balala ngokwehlukana nabesilisa kulesi sakhiwo sesonto esibhidlikile.UNKSZ Lina Langa, okhala ezimathonsi ngokushonelwa wunina engozini yokubhidlika kwesakhiwo sesonto iPentecostal Holiness Church, eMpangeni Isithombe: Leon Lestrade/African News Agency(ANA)“Isigameko senzeke ngesikhathi amalungu ebandla ezilungiselela ukulala.Okubuhlungu kakhulu wukuthi kushone abesifazane nengane eneminyaka engu-13,” kusho uMfundisi Sibiya.Uthe bazamile ukuxhumana namaphoyisa kodwa izingcingo bezingadonsi kule ndawo. Uthe kuze kwaba khona ophuthuma esiteshini samaphoyisa ngemoto eyobika.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezaBasebenzi uNkk Mildred Oliphant uvakashele le ndawo ngoLwesihlanu.“Ngokwemibiko esinayo le ndawo inesimo sezulu esingesihle futhi kubuye kube nemvula ehambisana nokuduma,” kusho uNgqongqoshe * -Oliphant.Uthe uhulumeni nomasipala bazosebenzisana nesonto nemindeni ethintekile ukuletha uzinzo.Kule ndawo kufike nezikhulu zeminyango kahulumeni. Kuzona bekukhona uNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nobuHoli boMdabu eNingizimu Afrika, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo neMeya yaseMhlathuze, uMnuz Mduduzi Mhlongo.Kuvele ukuthi sekuneminyaka amakholwa esebenzisa le ndawo ukuzothandaza.Kuthiwa iqale ukwakhiwa ngo-2000 yaphela ngo-2007.
title: Ididekile imindeni ngesibhicongo saseMpangeni

text: Mhleli: Ngibingelela kuwe nabafundi bephephandaba. Ngithatha leli thuba ngibingelele abathandi bomculo kamaskandi okuyibona engikhuluma nabo.Singabathandi bomculo kamaskandi, sesikhathele yile nsizwa ezibiza ngenduna yabalandeli engachemile kodwa njalo uma ulandela imibhalo yayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kucace bha ukuthi ingumlandeli kaMthandeni ‘Gcokama Elisha’ Manqele.Iyona lena esesithombeni, izibiza ngoSizwe Ndlovu Kwasjula induna yabalandeli engachemile. Kepha sesiyazi ukuthi ingumlandeli weGcokama Elisha, iphinde yesekele kakhulu uNgizwe Mchunu.Lalela-ke Ndlovu sikutshele thina, wena awuyona induna yethu. Sesikhathele nguwe manje ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Njalo ubhala izinto ezincoma uMthandeni kodwa awukhulumi lutho ngoKhuzani Mpungose, uma enze kahle.Ndlovu nguwena lona, obuzama ukuhlohla abalandeli beGcokama elisha ukuthi abamashe baye ezindlini zomsakazo uKhozi FM, ngesikhathi ungadlalwa umculo walo ohlelweni lukaSgiya Ngengoma. Kodwa uthi awuchemile?Asizona izingane thina bhuti wakwaNdlovu. Njalo ugxeka abantu abangezwani noMthandeni kwiFacebook.Zolo lokhu ububhala emaphephandabeni ugxeka uKhathide Ngobe uthi akakhishwe kuSgiya Ngengoma ngoba ubengaboni ngaso linye noMthandeni, kepha uthi awuchemile.Kumanje u-Ali Mgube ukhiphe ingoma egadla kuMthandeni, wena wagijima wagxeka u-Ali kwiFacebook. Wamthuka, uthi wenze iphutha uma egadla kuMthandeni.Kepha mhla uMthandeni egadla ku-Ali wathula. Awuzange ukhulume.Lalela Ndlovu, cacisa ukuthi usebenzela uMthandeni. Uyimpimpi yakhe noma uyakukhokhela?Kasinandaba nalokho kodwa esingakufuni wukuthi uzibize ngenduna yabalandeli engachemile kodwa ube uchemile.Thina sazi izinduna zabaculi zangempela, wena uyazigaxa, uyinduna kaMthandeni, sesiyakwazi lokho.Thulisani MyezaEThekwini
title: Ndlovu awuyona induna yethu siyakubona ucheme neGcokama Elisha

text: INHLOKO yophiko lezokushushisa uShaun Abrahams usefunge wagomela ukuthi noma ngubani othinteka enkohlakalweni yaseVrede dairy farm uzobhekana nengalo yomthetho."Siyaluphenya lolu daba. Uma uphenyo lwethu luholela ekutheni kubekwe abanye abantu amacala noma ikanjani sizokwenza lokho,"kusho u-Abrahams namhlanje ngesikhathi echazela ikomidi lezamaphoyisa ephalamende. Uthe akekho ozophunyuka ngisho noma kwenzakalani.U-Abrahams ubephendula amalungu ephalamende abeveza ukungenami kwawo ngokusebenza kwalolu phiko lwezokushushisa, akhale nangokuthi lolu phiko kuhlanganisa namaHawks bamandla ekubopheni izisebenzi zikahulumeni kodwa alusondeli kosopolitiki.Kuke kwaba nezikhalo ngosopolitiki abafana nowayengungqongqoshe wezokuMbhiwa, uMosebenzi Zwane noNdunankulu waseFree State ophinde abe nguNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, u-Ace Magashule, okunenkolelo yokuthi baneqhaza elibalulekile abalidlala enkohlakalweni yaleli famu kodwa akukho okwenzeka kubona.
title: Akekho ongezukushushiswa okumele ashushiswe- Shaun Abrahams

text: INKONZO yomngcwabo kasomabhizinisi uMnuz Richard Maponya izoba ngoLwesibili ngesonto elizayo. Lokhu kumenyezelwe izolo.Okhulumela umndeni uMnuz Mandla Sibeko ekhuluma kwiMetro FM izolo, uthe inkonzo yesikhumbuzo obekumele ibe izolo ihlehliselwe ikusasa.“Inkonzo yesikhumbuzo ebekumele ibe namhlanje (izolo) umndeni uthathe isinqumo sokuba uyihlehlisele uLwesihlanu ukuze amalungu omndeni nabangani bakamufi abakude, ngisho nabaphesheya kwezilwande bezokwazi ukufika ukuze bezoba yingxenye yenkonzo. Inkonzo yomngcwabo yona izoba ngoLwesibili,” kusho uSibeko.Umphakathi nawo uvumelekile ukuba ube yingxenye yenkonzo yesikhumbuzo ezoba eRosebank Union Church kusukela ngo-10 ekuseni.Umngcwabo wona uzoba seSoweto kusukela ekuseni.Kulindeleke ukuba osomabhizinisi, osopolitiki abangani, izihlobo nomphakathi bethamele inkonzo.UMaponya owazakhela igama kwezamabhizinisi kuleli kusukela ngezikhathi zobandlululo ushone ngoMsombuluko eneminyaka engu-99.
title: Uzofihlwa ngesonto elizayo uMaponya

text: USIHLALO weKhomishini ephenya ngokuLawulwa koMbuso yiDlanzana, uJaji Raymond Zondo, uthe imizamo yokubasabisa nokuzama ukuphazamisa umsebenzi wabo angeke iphumelele.UZondo ukusho lokhu izolo ngaphambi kokuba kuqale ukulalelwa kobufakazi kule khomishini.Amahhovisi ekhomishini agqekezwa ngoMgqibelo, kwathathwa impahla ekubalwa ama-laptop.UZondo uveze ukuthi akusona kuphela lesi sigameko njengoba kuke kwaba khona ukudutshulwa kwamahhovisi ekhomishini ngaphambilini.UZondo uthe uthole umbiko ukuthi ngeledlule kwadutshulwa iwindi emahhovisi, kwatholakala inhlamvu ngaphakathi.NgeSonto, amaphoyisa abesendaweni yesigameko njengoba kugqekeziwe, athola ukuthi kuthathwe ama-laptop.UZondo uthe lokhu kuyakhathaza kakhulu, wathi kodwa ngeke baphazamiseke emsebenzini wabo. “Sifuna nje ukusho ukuthi uma kukhona ozama ukuphazamisa ukusebenza kwekhomishini, ngeke nje aphumelele, angeke sisabiseke,” kusho uZondo.Okwamanje bekungakacaci ukuthi ama-laptop athathiwe ngabe kukhona yini ulwazi olubucayi bekhomishini obebuqukethwe yiwo.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, ikhomishini ingaphansi kwengcindezi yokuba iphothule ubufakazi ngoJuni nonyaka.Ngokusho kukaZondo, uyangabaza ukuthi lezi zigameko zizobaphazamisa.UZondo uthe ithimba lekhomishini lisebenza ngokuzimisela nangokuzikhanda. Uthe nangezimpelasonto umsebenzi uyaqhubeka.Izolo, bekufakaza uSomlomo wePhalamende uNksz, Thandi Modise, oxolisile kubantu bakuleli ngokuba iPhalamende lenze kancane ekulandeleni izinsolo ezazikhona zokulawulwa koMbuso kusolwa umndeni wakwaGupta. Ephonswa imibuzo ngodaba oluthinta lo mndeni, uvumile ukuthi iPhalamende lenza kancane ekuwuthatheleni izinyathelo ngezinsolo ezazivela ngawo. Uthe baphaphama izinto sezivele zizimbi kakhulu. Kusalindeleke ukuba kuzofakaza uMengameli wakuleli, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa.
title: Angeke sisabiseke, soze saphazamiseka: Zondo

text: IYASHUBA eyombango wokuba nguNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal engqungqutheleni okulindeleke ukuthi ibe khona ingakapheli le nyanga njengoba uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, obekhulumela isigungu esachithwa yiNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu, esesekwa abaholi ababengahambisani nesigungu esahlakazwa.UNtuli kulindeleke ukuthi abange noMnuz Super Zuma, owayenguNobhala owachithwa yinkantolo kulesi sikhundla.Elinye igama okukhulunywa eyokuthi alifakwe ebuholini obuzokhethwa ngelikaMnuz Sipho Hlomuka onguNobhala oKhahlamba okuthiwa akangene kwesePhini likaNobhala wesifundazwe.Abaphakanyisiwe uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, kwesikaSihlalo, uMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu kwesePhini likaSihlalo, uNtuli noZuma kwesikaNobhala, uHlomuka kwesePhini likaNobhala noNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube kwesikamgcinimafa. Okulindeleke ukuthi baphume ababekhona ebuholini obudala uMnuz Willies Mchunu, owayeyiPhini likaSihlalo noMnuz Mluleki Ndobe owayeyiPhini likaNobhala.UMnuz Jomo Sibiya wesifunda Inkosi Bhambatha, owayechitha ubuholi obahlakazwa, uthe beseka uNtuli ngoba bafuna umuntu ozoyisa inhlangano phambili.Uthe izifunda ezihamba noNtuli iGreater KwaDukuza, Far North, Amalahle, Abaqulusi neMusa Dladla.“Sisakhuluma neTheku, akhona amagatsha aseka uNtuli. Sifuna umuntu ozobumba i-ANC esifundazweni futhi sikholwa wukuthi angaba uNobhala okahle. Sifuna ozoqeda ukwehlukana enhlanganweni,” kusho uSibiya.Uthe bayaxoxa neMoses Mabhida nezinye izifunda ukweseka uNtuli.“Isishaye kakhulu indaba yokwehlukana kwe-ANC kuyiwa eNasrec. Lokhu kumayelana ne-ANC sifuna ibumbane,” kusho uSibiya.UMnuz Bheki Ntuli, uNobhala we-ANC eThekwini, uthe isaxoxwa indaba kaNtuli.“Uma sesivumelene ngokuphelele siyophumela obala sisho ukuthi iTheku lihamba nobani kuzona zonke izikhundla. Kubalulekile ukuthi kubekhona abasha kodwa nabadala babekhona ebuholini ukuze abasha bafunde kwabadala,” kusho uNtuli.UMnuz Mzwandile Mkhwanazi waseLower South Coast, uthe abanankinga noNtuli wathi izingxoxo zisaqhubeka.“Asinankinga noMdumiseni ngoba angayibumba inhlangano.”Ekhuluma eNtshangwe muva nje uMgcinimafa we-ANCYL esifundazweni uMnuz Thobelani Ncampalala, uthe bafuna ukuthi abantu abasha bangene ezinhlakeni ze-ANC ukuze nabo bahlale etafuleni uma kuthathwa izinqumo wathi yingakho befuna uNtuli kwesikaNobhala.Nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana ihamba phambili indaba kaNtuli noZikalala.
title: Bayanda asebeseka uNtuli

text:
BONISWA MOHALEI NHLANGANO esiza izingane ezihlukunyeziwe i-Bobbi Bear isizwakalise ukukhathazeka kwayo ngokutholwa kwezingane ezidukile sezibulewe.Abakwa-Bobbi Bear bakhulume kanje emuva kokutholwa kwesidumbu sikaNokukhanya Zama (15) waKwaMakhutha ehlathini laseMkhazini ngaseFolweni.UNokukhanya
(osesithombeni) waduka ngoJanuwari 11, kusolakala ukuthi wathathwa ngabantu thizeni esuka eMkhazini elibhekise eMiseni, emaRomeni.Umndeni umthungathe wangamthola isidumbu sakhe sagcina sibonwe yizinja zomzingeli obesehlathini elibudebuduze nakubo eMkhazini.UNokukhanya akusiye yedwa intombazanyana eduke isendleleni eya esontweni kwazise namantombazane amabili ase-St Faiths awakatholwa namanje.UNkk Sbo Ngcobo, we-Bobbi Bear, uthe kuyabakhathaza ukuthi izingane uma zidukile zitholwa sezibulewe esho nokuthi kumele umphakathi usukume ukuqeda lesi sihlava.“Kunyukile ukuthunjwa kwezingane bese zitholwa zishonile. siyakugxeka kakhulu lokhu futhi sinxusa umphakathi kuba usebenzisane nathi namaphoyisa ukukhipha izigilamkhuba ezihlukumeza izingane. Kubuhlungu ukuzwa ukuthi izingane ezincane ziyabulawa ngoba ziyikusasa lethu. Sicela zonke izinhlaka zilusukumele phezulu udaba lokubuda kwezingane,” kusho uNkk Ngcobo.Phambili umndeni wakwaZama uzwakalise ukungeneliseki ngendlela amaphoyisa aluphethe ngayo udaba lokuduka kukaNokukhanya kwazise abekhala ngokuthi azifunele yena kwaze kwaba sekugcineni.Uninakhulu omncane, uNkk Ntombikayise Cele, ukhale ngokuthi ngesikhathi beyobika amaphoyisa abatshela ukuthi mhlawumbe usesokeni mabalinde izinsukwana.“Sicela amaphoyisa ayeke ukukwenza umdlalo ukuduka kwezingane ngoba thina asitshela ukuthi ingane yethu isesokeni sibe sisho ukuthi idukile. Kumanje itholwe isishonile. siyacela nabawaphethe bawafundise indlela yokuphatha abazali abalahlekelwe yizingane,”kusho uNkk Cele.UNokukhanya uzofihlwa ngoMgqibelo emuva kwenkonzo ezoba sesontweni lamaRoma KwaMakhutha. Kube nenkonzo yesikhumbuzo esikoleni abefunda kuso KwaMakhutha Comprehensive High School lapho ebezokwenza khona ugrade 11 kulo nyaka.UMajor Thulani Zwane, wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe zonke izigameko zibhalwa ebhukwini labo elibizwa nge-Occurrence Book bese kuthi udaba lomuntu odukile luvulelwe idokodo kungabikhona inombolo yecala.Inombolo yecala iba khona uma umuntu esetholiwe wathi icala likaNokukhanya liphenywa ngu-Warrant Officer Ndlela futhi uyaxhumana nomndeni.Ugqugquzele umphakathi ukuthi ubike kubaphathi bamaphoyisa uma unganelisekile ngendlela ophatheke ngayo.UNkk Diane Kohler Barnard we-Democratic Alliance, uthe kumphatha kabi ukuzwa ukuthi amanye amaphoyisa akuthatha njengehlaya ukuduka kwezingane wathi udinga imininingwane yawo ukuze ezojeziswa.“Uma umuntu edukile noma ngabe yingane noma wumama, ugogo noma ngubani kubi ukuzitshela ukuthi usesokeni. Kumele amaphoyisa enze umsebenzi wawo. Kusiphatha kabi ukuthi kaziziningi iziteshi ezinophiko olubhekelele amacala ezingane olwavalwa nguKhimoshana wamaPhoyisa ogulayo, uMnuz Jackie Selebi.“ Siyathemba ukuthi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi azovuselelwa kuzo zonke iziteshi ngoba zandile izigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane. Amacala anjena adinga ukuphenywa ngamaphoyisa ophiko oluthile, hhayi abhekelele wonke amacala ngoba izingane zigilwa imikhuba enzima. Ngidlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini kaNokukhanya,” kusho uNkk Kohler Barnard.
title: IBobbi Bear ikhathazekile ngokufa kwezingane

text: IYEKE ithuba lokuqhwakela iMamelodi Sundowns ibanjelwa ekhaya yiPolokwane City kulo mdlalo we-Absa Premiership ophele ngo 1-1 eLoftus Versfeld izolo ebusuku.ISundowns ibidinga ukunqoba ngamagoli amabili ukuze igudluze iBidvsest Wits esicongweni seligi. Lo mphumela ususho ukuthi amaBrazilians sekumele ashaye Izitshudeni lapho esedlala nazo ngoMgqibelo eBidvest Stadium.ISundowns esele emuva ngemidlalo, iyawadinga la maphuzu kwazise kungenzeka izithole iphucwa amaphuzu uma ilahlwa yicala lokudlalisa uWayne Arendse kungafanele. Lokho yakwenza ibhekene nayo iWits emzuliswaneni wokuqala weligi owaphela zibambene.Icala leSundowns lingenile ngoLwesine olwedlule, uma liyilahla kungenzeka iWits izithole ihlomula ngamaphuzu amathathu angenza umehluko omkhulu embangweni weligi. Elinye iqembu elisembangweni wesicoco yi-Orlando Pirates edlala neSuperSport United namuhla, okufanele ukuthi iwujabulele umphumela wayizolo.Igoli leDowns lishaywe nguThemba Zwane emizuzwini eyishumi kuqale umdlalo. Ngemuva kwalokho ibe nazo ezinye izikhawu ezimbalwa ebingandisa ngazo amagoli ayo. ICity ihlomule ngegoli lokuphiwa ngemuva kokuthi uDenis Onyango enze inkunzimalanga yephutha ededela ibhola ebelingqofwe ngekhanda uSalulani Phiri.Lo nozinti osanda kuzishaya isifuba ngokuthi ungohamba phambili kuleli umane wahluleka nokuzibamba waphihlika izinyembezi ngesikhathi kuyiwa ezindlini zokushintshela ngesikhathi sekhefu.Esiwombeni sesibili iSundowns iqhubekile nokuba yiphela endlebeni ingena ebhokisini leCity kodwa kuze kwaba yikabili unozinti wezivakashi uGeorge Chikova evimba amabhola amabi kaZwane.
title: U-Onyango ubambezele iDowns egwaza ekhaya

text: UMJIKIJELWA nguS’bongiseni Robert Ngubane obenekhono lokudlala isigingci sezintambo ezingu-12.Wazalelwa kwaJikijiki eMvoti ngoSepthemba 17, 1983. Ushiye emhlabeni unkosikazi nengoduso, nezingane eziwu-14.Wangena emculweni ngo-2001 eyigidangoma nomqambi wezingoma ngaphansi kweso likaMgqumeni “Ibhova LikaDikadika” Khumalo futhi ubambe elikhulu iqhaza eqenjini likaMgqumeni, Ithwasa Lami.Ngemuva kokungaboni ngasolinye noMgqumeni ngo-2009, uMjikijelwa washiya maqede waqopha ngaphansi kwe-Amon Music iCD yokuqala eyayithi Sihlupheke Sonke kodwa washona uMgqumeni sebexoleleni.Ugcine esenamaqembu akhe okungaMangcukumane, Omenzelwa neChalaha LikaShafuza.Ubuye wavumbulula ikhono likaPhiwa Manqele, Mnikezwa “Ismakwana SikaShafuza” Ngubane, Dulas, Nhlanhla Mseleku, Amafikalishona, Indodakazi YeNtandane noMpilo Mkhwanazi.UMjikijelwa ubuye wahlabana kumaSatma kwiBest Popular Album, Sava Awards nakuMantshontsho Kamaskandi Awards.
title: Umlando omfishane kaMjikijelwa

text: ISAQHUBEKA nokumudla indaba yokuphoxwa yiTS Galaxy ibakhipha kwiNedbank Cup umqeqeshi weLamontville Golden Arrows, uSteve “Mphathi” Komphela kodwa ithuba lokuqeda isizini ebalwa namaqembu akwi-Top 8 kuwumjovo omqoka njengoba sekusele imidlalo emibili.UKomphela ubejabule ngeSonto ntambama iqembu lakhe liqeda ukuqoqa amaphuzu amathathu amqoka kwiFree State Stars emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ePrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu.La maphuzu atholakale ngamagoli amabili kaKnox Mutizwa ashiye Abafana Bes’thende endaweni yesishiyagalolunye ngamaphuzu awu-36.Lokhu kuyamkhuthaza uKomphela ngoba emidlalweni emibili emsalele okuyiMamelodi Sundowns ekuhambeni neBidvest Wits ekhaya, ukholelwa ekutheni bangafica ngisho iKaizer Chiefs kwazise isendaweni yesikhombisa yona ngamaphuzu awu-38 emidlalweni efanayo.“Sisazikhotha amanxeba ngendaba yeTS Galaxy. Ngabe ngikhuluma iphutha uma ngingathi sesiyikhohliwe nje kalula kanjalo indaba yeNedbank. Mhlawumbe indlela yokuyibeka ukuthi singavumi ukuthi sihluliwe kodwa sithi sifundile. Ngeke kube khona abajabule ekhempini ngenxa yalesi simo (sokukhishwa iqembu leNFD kwiNedbank) kodwa uma ngibheka ebengiyalelwe ukuthi ngikwenze ngesikhathi ngithatha lo msebenzi ngineme. Okufanele sikwenze manje ukuhlala phansi sidwebe indlela esizoya ngayo phambili,” kusho uKomphela.Ebuzwa ngemidlalo emibili esele nokuthi kungenzeka abe nesandla ekutheni isicoco siyaphi, uthe okuhamba phambili yinjabulo ye-Arrows kuyena abanye abazonyatheleka amakhona uma enza njalo (elwela injabulo ye-Arrows) bamxolele.“Umqoka kakhulu lo mphumela ngoba usisondeza nento esiyifisa ngendlela eyisimanga. Sisele ngephuzu kwiCeltic (Bloemfontein) amabili kwiChiefs. Sinethuba lokuqeda kunombolo 7 noma 8. Kubi nokho ukuwina kwethu ngoba kushovela phansi iFree State. Akukho-ke nokho okuzokwenziwa ngoba sonke siqashelwe umsebenzi. Okwethu ukubheka ukuthi singayithola yini indawo kulezi zikhala ezimbili ezisele kwi-Top 8.”UKomphela uzwakala sengathi uzogxila kakhulu kubafana abancane njengoba ekugqamisile futhi ukuthi uneme ngendlela abazifaka ngayo eqenjini oSanele Mathenjwa, Siphamandla Sabelo, Sibusiso Sibeko noFrank Matobejane, obeqala ngqa ukudlala esikimini esikhulu kulo mdlalo weFree State.“Bazojwayela bonke laba bafana. Ayikho into enzima njengokuthatha imiyalelo yomqeqeshi uyenze njengoba injalo ngesikhathi esifanayo uqinisekisa ukuthi ozakwenu bayakuthemba enkundleni. Beza kahle bonke. Sizohlangana maduze lapho sizobheka khona konke okuthinta thina. Kusemqoka ukuzinuka amakhwapha bese sidweba nendlela eya phambili. Bakhona abazohamba kodwa futhi bangase babe khona abazofika eqenjini. Ibhola linjalo nje,” kusho uKomphela olandela ngeSundowns ekuhambeni.
title: Uzoduduzwa yiTop 8 osakhala ngoweGalaxy

text: IQEMBU elilodwa laKwaZulu-Natal, phakathi kweRichards Bay FC neRoyal Eagles, ngeke libe khona kwiNedbank Cup ka-2019.Lokhu kuhlaluke izolo, eGoli, ngesikhathi kuqhathwa amaqembu eNational First Division (NFD) okuzohlungwa kuwona ayisishiyagalombili azojoyina awu-16 e-Absa Premiership. Ayisishiyagalombili nadlala ezigabeni zeSafa azokuba kulo mqhudelwano ukuze kuphelele awu-32.IBay izotholana phezulu nabakhaya i-Eagles kweyokuhlunga. Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi elilodwa lalamaqembu ngeke libe yingxenye yawu-32 azoyibamba kwiNedbank Cup ka-2019 ngoba lizoliwasha ijezi.Imidlalo yeNFD yokuhlunga izodlalwa ngempelasonto kaDisemba 1 no-2 ezinkundleni ezisazomenyezelwa.Amanye amaqembu aKwaZulu-Natal azodlala ekuhambeni nokuchaza ukuthi kuzoba nzima kakhulu ukuthi azibekisele indawo emaqenjini awu-32 azoyibamba kulo mqhudelwano.IReal Kings izovakashela iJomo Cosmos bese kuthi Uthongathi FC luyozama ukushayela iWitbank Spurs enkundleni yayo.Isiyonke imidlalo yeNFD kwiNedbank Cup imi kanje:
title: Asenkingeni awaseKZN kwiNedbank

text: KUTHINTE abaningi ukudlula emhlabeni kwesihlabani somculo wehip-hop uHHP, odlule emhlabeni izolo.Abantu bakuleli nosaziwayo emikhakheni ehlukene badlulisele amazwi enduduzo emndenini wakhe.Abaningi bashaqekile ngesikhathi bezwa izindaba zokudlula kwale ngwazi.Omunye wabo kube u-AKA obhale ukuthi: “Ngisanda kuzwa izindaba ezimbi, enye ingwazi ayisekho.”NoRouge ubhale ukuthi: “Unyaka omubi emculweni we-hip hop...NjengoHHP..Lala Ngokuthula.”UCassper Nyovest uvele wethuka kakhulu wathi: “Akusilo iqiniso leli, ngeke!”U-DJ Cleo uthe: “Ukube ngangazi ukuthi sikhuluma okokugcina ngangingeke ngiluvale ucingo, ngangiyoqhubeka ngikhulume nawe.”UBoity Thulo uthe: “Ngisaqhaqhazela. Kwenzenjani?”Nehhovisi likaMengameli lidlulisele amazwi enduduzo njengoba livezwe ukuthi lezi zindaba zibathusile.“Umndeni, izihlobo nabangani sengathi bangaduduzeka. Sengathi ungalala ngokuthula Jabba.”UTumi Morake uveze ukuthi akazi nokuthi athini ngezindaba zokudlula kwalesi sihlabani.Umlingisi u-Amanda Du Pont uthe uNkulunkulu sengathi angaba nomndeni wakhe, silahlekelwe iqhawe.U-DJ Fresh akandanga ngamaningi uvele wathi: “Ulale ngoxolo HHP.”UZakwe uthe: “Lala ngokuthula qhawe lakithi, hamba kahleJabba.”UDuncan naye ngomunye ongandanga ngamaningi njengoba evele wathi: “Lala ngokuthula Jabba.”
title: Kuthinte abaningi ukushona kukaHHP

text: UMQEQESHI we-Ajax Cape Town, uMuhsin Ertugral, usamile ekutheni akukho okuphambene nomthetho abakwenzile ngokudlalisa umgadli uTendai Ndoro, nosekubeke leli qembu engcupheni yokuphucwa amaphuzu.Kulindeleke ukuthi kuleli sonto iPremier Soccer League (PSL) inqume ngodaba lukaNdoro emuva kokuthi inhlangano eyengamele ibhola emhlabeni, iFifa, inqume ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ayizilungisele yona lolu daba. Kuthiwa iPSL isicele ukuthi iFifa iphinde ilubhekisise udaba lukaNdoro. I-Ajax isolwa ngokuphula umthetho weFifa ngokudlalisa uNdoro, oyijoyine ngoJanuwari.Ngokomthetho wale nhlangano, umdlali akavumelekile ukudlalela amaqembu amathathu ngesizini eyodwa. UNdoro udlale kwi-Orlando Pirates nakwi-Al Faisaly yaseSuadi Arabia ngaphambi kokujoyina i-Ajax. Isigungu esiqondisa ubugwegwe kwiPSL, iDispute Resolution Chamber (DRC), sanquma ukuthi uNdoro aqhubeke nokudlala nokuholele ekutheni amaqembu afake izimangalo. I-PSL yaphinda yaphikisana nesinqumo seDRC nokuholele ekutheni udaba lugcine selufakwa kwiFifa. Kulindelwe ukuthi indaba kaNdoro ibekwe eqhulwini emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu sePSL ngoLwesine.U-Ertugral uthe akaboni bezophucwa amaphuzu. I-Ajax ingene engcupheni yokudlala ama-play off emuva kokwehlulwa yiMamelodi Sundowns ngo 3-1 eLucas Moripe Stadium ngoMgqibelo ntambama.“Uma unezincwadi zokushayela imoto, unemvume yokushayela. Uma kungenjalo iDRC eyani. Uma iDRC ikunika izincwadi zokushayela kusho ukuthi kufanele ushayele. Kuze kube manje lokhu kuyasilimaza ngoba ungumdlali osezingeni eliphezulu. Amanye amathuba aphunyuka uYannick (Zakri), uNdoro ubengawaqedela,” kusho u-Ertugral.“Asikho embangweni neSundowns kodwa namanye amaqembu, okusho ukuthi ubengasishayela amagoli okuwina mhlawumbe sibhekene neGolden Arrows noma elinye iqembu. Ngicabanga ukuthi okwenzekayo kuyinto ezobhekwa kakhulu. Ekugcineni sikhulume ngamasizini ashayisana neyePremiership nokuthi iFifa yenqabile, yabuyisela eNingizimu Afrika lolu daba. Ngingasho ukuthi ngeke kuthinteke amaphuzu.”I-Ajax isendaweni ka-15 kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-31. Kufanele nakanjani iwine umdlalo wokugcina wesizini ukuze isinde ekudlaleni ama-Play Off namaqembu amabili agijima kwiNational First Division (NFD). Izokwamukela iKaizer Chiefs eCape Town Stadium ngoMeyi 12 ngo-3 ntambama.“Sikude nendaba yama-play off. Ngisho ukudlala ngokulingana lapha bekuzowenza umehluko. Uma siwina ekhaya siphephile. Sehlule amaqembu amaningi anzima ekhaya kule sizini okukhona kuwona nePirates ngo 3-0,” kusho u-Ertugral.
title: 'Asiphulanga mthetho ngoNdoro'

text: UKHIHLE isililo unina wowayengumdlali weBafana Bafana ngesikhathi ebona uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa obezokhalisa umndeni ngokushona kukamyeni wakhe izolo.UNkk Ntombifuthi Meyiwa ongunina kaSenzo Meyiwa, ukhale ebona uMnuz Bheki Cele obezobhonga emswaneni ngokushona kukaMnuz Sam Meyiwa. UCele ubezovela okokuqala emndenini emuva kokushona kukaMeyiwa entathakusa yangoMsombuluko, oshone nesilonda ngenxa yokungaboshwa kwababulali bendodana yakhe.UCele ofike emuva kwamahora amathathu kunobekulindelekile, ucele ukubhunga nomndeni ngaphakathi endlini.Esekhuluma nabezindaba uthe unqume ukuzohlanganisa amehlo ngoba ubevele exhumana nomndeni ngisho uMeyiwa esaphila. Uchithe izinsolo zokuthi akukho okwenzekayo ngecala lokubulawa kukaSenzo, athe sekusungulwe ithimba eliyisipesheli eliphenyayo.“Akulona iqiniso ukuthi akwenziwa lutho ngecala ekubeni selufike ngisho kuMengameli. Ubaba kaSenzo waziyela kuMengameli eyocela ukuthi amtholele ukuthi ngubani owambulala. Nami ngakhuluma naye ngonyaka odlule kunemidlalo kaSenzo, wakhuluma konke okusenhliziyweni yakhe. Ngamtshela ukuthi ngeke kwenzeke ukuthi bagcine bengatholakalanga ababulali futhi namanje ngisakugcizelela lokho.”Uthe usuku nosuku bayakhuluma noNgqongqoshe wezoBulungiswa uMnuz Ronald Lamola ngaleli cala futhi unethemba lokuthi ikhona inqubekela phambili. ULamola bekumele avele naye izolo kwaMeyiwa kodwa wabuye wabanjwa uhambo.UCele ugcizelele ukuthi ngeke esalokhu esho isikhathi okuzoboshwa ngalo abasolwa njengaphambilini. Uthe angakuqinisekisa ukuthi ngelinye ilanga kukhona oyojeza.Uphikile ukuthi amaphoyisa asehlulekile kuleli cala njengoba ethe akhona namanye amacala okuphela iminyaka engaphezu kweyisihlanu kusaphenywa.Uthe ngenxa yobucayi becala okunye ngeke bakwazi ukukudalula futhi abantu kumele baqonde ukuthi akayena umphenyi.Okhulumela umndeni, uMnuz Siyabonga Meyiwa, uthe bayakwamukela okushiwo ungqongqoshe futhi bayethemba ukuthi ngelinye ilanga bayolithola iqiniso.UMeyiwa uzongcwatshwa ngoMgqibelo emathuneni aseStella Wood emuva kwenkonzo ezoba sehholo kwa-M, eMlaza.
title: Isililo uCele ezobakhalisa kwaMeyiwa

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZE INKAMPANI ephethe izindaba zikaPitso "Jingles" Mosimane, ithi ishaqekile ngendlela iMamelodi Sundowns eluphathe ngayo udaba lwalo mqeqeshi okuvela ukuthi ukweleta leli qembu izizumbulu. Kwisitatimende esikhishwe iMT Sports Marketing and Management, ikuvumile ukuthi iSundowns ibathumelele amasamanisi abizela lo mqeqeshi enkantolo, amphoqa ukuthi abuyise uR8 million. Ngokwemibiko eqale ukuvela kwimpelasonto edlule,  uMosimane wakhokhelwa yiSundowns isamba esithile ngoba esayine inkontileka yokusebenza izinyanga eziwu-48. Kuvela ukuthi lo mqeqeshi nokho wasebenza ezine kuphela, wase ejoyina i-Al Ahly yase-Egypt. Kulesi sitatimende, iMT Sports Marketing and Management, ithe izame amahlandla amaningi ukuxhumana nezikhulu zaleli qembu ukuze kuzoxazululwa lolu daba ngendlela ehloniphekile. Siqhuba sithi: "ISundowns kayizange isiphendule kulesi sicelo sethu. Kuphinde kwabanhlanga zimuka nomoya noma sesicela ukuxhumana noDkt Patrice Motsepe, ngoJanuwari. Nangesonto eledlule, iSundowns iphinde yazithulela sicela ukuhlangana nosihlalo weqembu, uTlhopane Motsepe. Ukuputshuka kwalolu daba kwabezindaba akwehli kahle futhi kubukeka njengesenzo samaqhinga okuxhaphaza esimumele. Sikuqaphelile ukuthi kuputshuke le mibiko kwabezindaba, kungakapheli isikhathi esingakanani abalandeli beSundowns bephoxe umqeqeshi uPitso. “Ukunikwa la masamanisi nokuputshuka kwabezindaba kwalolu daba kudunga izibusiso zikaDkt Motsepe azinika uMosimane ngesikhathi ejoyina i-Al Ahly. UDkt Motsepe walibeka ngembaba elokuthi uyohlale emeseka uMosimane. Waqhuba ngokumbongela kukho konke asekuzuzile. Wathi uyohlale eyilungu lomndeni weSundowns.”Lesi sitatimende siqhuba sithi, uMosimane uqhuba kahle e-Egypt, usanda kunqona neCaf Super Cup ne-Al Ahly. Wamukelwa kahle e-Egypt, akufisayo ukuqhubeka nomsebenzi wakhe ngokuthula. Lesi sitatimende sithinte nemibiko ebibhalwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ebithi uDkt Motsepe wasebenzisa uMosimane ekuthengeni imidlalo. "SiyiMT Sport nomqeqeshi, siyasibonga isikhathi esibe naso kwiSundowns, kuyisifiso sethu ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisana okuhle. Siyakujabulela ukuthi sizohlangana neSundowns enkantolo.“ Kayiphumelelanga imizamo yokuthola uhlangothi lweSundowns. Belingabanjwa ucingo lukaYogesh Singh oyisikhulu esiphezulu nolukaShupi Nkgadima osemnyangweni wezokuxhumana. Kwale noma sebeshiyelwe imiyalezo.
title: Abaphethe uPitso bavivela ukubonana neSundowns enkantolo

text: MHLELI: Kwelakho elingashayi eceleni eliwela umfula ugcwele, ngivumele ngizwakalise ukungenami kwami ngokwenzeka ezinhlelweni zoKhozi FM kwenziwa ngabadidiyeli balezo zinhlelo.Sengibekezele kwanele angisakwazi ukuthula ngendlela uBabheke Mthethwa enza ngayo ohlelweni lwamahostela.Kunabalaleli abangashayi izingcingo njengathi sonke kodwa bashayelwa nguBabheke.Uyenzelela. Ngikhuluma ngoMzonjani Mdlalose noMaliyeqolo Khanyile, siyabazi thina abangeni kwezinye izinhlelo kodwa bafakwa uBabheke ohlelweni ngenkani.Kusuka ngonyaka ophelile sibekezela ngisho kuSigiya Ngengoma.Bona uma kuthiwa akuthunyelwe imiyalezo kuWhatsApp kule ngosi kaSigiya Ngengoma ethi ‘ubani osyaya ingoma’ kodwa bona babeshayelwa izingcingo eceleni kuqoshwe imisindo yabo kodwa sithule nje sizibukele.Manje le nto isaqhubeka emahostela nakulo nyaka. Kahle hle lolu hlelo lwamahostela sebelwenza olwabo, thina sesiyancikiswa nje.Siyakhuza Babheke ungabi netiye, sonke asilingane.Ukuthula kwethu akusho ukuthi asiboni.Asinankinga nabalaleli kodwa wena yeka lo mkhuba omubi ngoba asiwuthandi. Uma uzoqhubeka nalo mkhuba sesizokhuluma, ngeke sisathula. Ukhozi olwethu sonke. Musani ukwenzelela ukhombise ukuthanda abanye abalaleli.Sonke siyafana akekho ongcono kunomunye.Musa ukuphuma esandleni ngale nto oyenzayo ngoba angigxeki umsakazo ngigxeka wena ngoba nguwe opheka uhlelo ngemumva. Ngicela siphele nya lesi sihlava esibi esikuhlasele kusuka namhlanje.Yisexwayiso lesi asilwi kodwa uma uqhubeka sizokhuluma ngoba uKhozi FM olwethu sonke akulona olwabangani bakho.Umlaleli woKhozi
title: [IMIBONO] UBabheke woKhozi FM uyenzelela

text: Umholi waBafana BakaMgqumeni, uNelisani “Undlemnyama” Mseleku, uthe bebematasa beqopha izingoma ezintsha eTakk Studio (okudume ukuthi ikwaJan Smith) ngoLwesibili ebusuku, baze bayeka entathakusa yayizolo.“Sithe uma siphuma sashaqeka ukufica imoto yethu iphihlizwe iwindi, izivalo zivulwe gengelezi, kwathathwa izikhwama ezinama-ID, Passport, amakhadi asebhange nezincwadi zokushayela,” kusho uNdlemnyama.Okunye okuthathwe emotweni amaCD nemifaniswano yeqembu.“Izigebengu zibulala iwindi zithathe izimpahla nemali kodwa kusishaqisile ukugwazwa kwamathayi kuwo wonke amasondo. Kubuye kwathathwa ne-mixer ye-sound system, amplifier, convector namaphepha enkampani yethu, Ezebhova Music.”Uthe usola abantu abanomona ngempumelelo yabo futhi abebezama ukuphazamisa imisebenzi yeqembu. Uthe kodwa bazoqina isibindi baqhubeke nezinhlelo zokukhipha iCD yabo entsha ngoMashi 29.“Sifuna ibe seyitholakala eWorkshop eThekwini ngakusasa. Isihloko seCD sisikhethe ukukhombisa ukuthi konke okubi okwenzeke kithina, abazama ngakho ukusidicilela phansi, ngeke kulunge, kunalokho kusinikeza umfutho. Bafana nabathela upharafini emlilweni.”KwiCD bacula ngokuhlanganyela noThokozani Langa noMfezemnyama.Abafana BakaMgqumeni yiqembu elasungulwa ngabazala bakaMgqumeni.
title: Ukushiswa kwemoto kuphazamise ukuqopha

text: UMCULI waseNigeria uTiwa Sawage, useveze ukuthi indondo ayithole emcimbini wamaMTV EMAs, ngeSonto, eBizkaia Arena, eSpain, eyabo bonke abantu besifazane base-Afrika.UTiwa ubeqokwe emunxeni i-African Act category, eqokwe nomkhaya wakhe uDavido (Nigeria), Distruction Boyz (South Africa), Fally Ipupa (DRC), Nyashinski (Kenya) noShekhinah (South Africa) obekhona kulo mcimbi.Le ntokazi esicule ezingomeni ezehlukene zabaculi bakuleli okukhona kubo iMafikizolo noDonald, ithe uNkulunkulu ube mkhulu empilweni yayo.“UNkulunkulu akakwenzelanga nje mina ngedwa lokhu kodwa nethimba lami lonke engisebenza nalo, esesidlule ezikhathini ezinzima kodwa sama saqina. Empilweni yami ngidlule ezintweni eziningi ezinzima kodwa ebengikwenza ukuqhubeka ngibheke phambili,” kuchaza yena.Le ndondo uthe eyawo wonke umuntu wesifazane nentombazane esencane efisa ukuzibona iphumelela empilweni.
title: Uyinqobele imbokodo indondo ayithole kumaMTV EMAs

text: UMDLALI weKaizer Chiefs uLebohang Manyama usephefumulile ngodaba oluthinta uKhama Billiat omataniswa neMamelodi Sundowns. UBilliat (29) ufike eqenjini leChiefs ekuqaleni kwesizini ephelile ngemuva kokuphelelwa yinkontileka kwiSundowns abenqobe nayo isicoco seligi. UBilliat ubengakadlali selokhu kuqale iligi, okuyinto esithuse abalandeli beChiefs njengoba sekuqubuke imibiko yokuthi iSundowns ihlongoza ukumthenga ngemali elinganiselwa ku-R15 million, ngaphambi kokuvalwa kwewindi lokudayiselana abadlali. UManyama, oseshaye amagoli amabili kule sizini uphawule ngendlela iqembu elizizwa ngayo ngodaba lukaBilliat ngenkathi ekhuluma nabezindaba. “UKhama Billiat ungumuntu omdala. Ungomunye wabadlali abaseqophelweni eliphezulu kwiPSL. Kusengenzeka ukuthi onyakeni olandelayo amataniswe namanye amaqembu, yinto eyenzeka kubo bonke abadlali abasezingeni eliphakeme, “ kuchaza uManyama ecashunwa yiKickoff,  “Ukhona uBilliat. Usebenza kanzima kanye neqembu, akagxilile ezindabeni ezimkhomba kwiSundowns. Sihlezi sibhekile ukuthi abadlali abasezingeni lakhe bamataniswe namanye amaqembu iminyaka ilandelana. Siyameseka ngayo yonke indlela ukuze ezogqugquzeleka emsebenzini wakhe futhi abuye ezokweseka iqembu. Siyamdinga uKhama. Uba ngumdlali obalulekile kunoma iliphi iqembu alidlalelayo” kusho yena. UBilliat ushaye amagoli angu-9 waphinde waphakela abanye abadlali amabhola angu-10 ngesizini edlule okumenze waba yintandokazi kubalandeli beqembu. IChiefs ikhiphe isitatimende emasontweni adlule igcizelela ukuthi amaqembu agaqele uBilliat awakhohlwe ngoba akayindawo. Lesi sikhwishikhwishi somdlali okubikwa ukuthi siphuthelwe yimidlalo ngenxa yokulimala kancane, kulindeleke ukuthi sibuye emdlalweni weligi lapho Amakhosi ezobhekana neSuperSport eFNB Stadium ngoMgqibelo.
title: UManyama uphawula ngodaba lukaBilliat ofunwa yiDowns

text: STHEMBISO NGOBESEUMNIKAZI weJomo Cosmos obuye futhi abe ngumqeqeshi wayo, u-Ephraim “Jomo” Sono, uthi kuseva kakhulu ukukhuluma ngendaba yokunqoba isicoco seGladAfrica Championship kule sizini ka-2020/2021.USono ukhuluma ngalolu hlobo nje, izinto zilokhu ziya ngokushuba embangweni wesicoco seGladAfrica njengoba amaqembu okuyiwona abukeka esembangweni eyinqobile imidlalo yawo yangoLwesibili.ISekhukhune United okuyiyona ezihola phambili esicongweni se-log ngamaphuzu angu-19, ibhudluze kabuhlungu ngo 4-2 i-JDR Stars nayo esembangweni, emdlalweni obuseMakhulong Stadium, eTembisa.ICosmos elele endaweni yesibili ngamaphuzu afanayo neSekhukhune, yona inqobe kunzima ekuhambeni ngo 2-1 iCape Town All Stars, eParow Park, eKapa. Ekhuluma neSolezwe izolo ekuseni (ngoLwesithathu), uSono uthe nakuba izinto zibukeka zibahambela kahle okwamanje kodwa lokhu akuchazi ukuthi sebezonqoba isicoco seGladAfrica esiphethe ithikithi lokuyodlala kwiDStv Premiership.Uthe imidlalo iseminingi kakhulu kanti futhi inzima ngakho kuzomele bathathe umdlalo ngamunye. Wengeze ngokuthi emidlalweni yabo elandelayo bazimisele ngokuthi bafele enkundleni nakuba insimbi ishisa.“Hheyi ndoda! Okwamanje angikafuni ukukhuluma indaba yokunqoba isicoco seGladAfrica, ngibona imidlalo isephansi kakhulu. Engingakusho nje kuphela ukuthi kunzima kakhulu futhi ziyabuya laphaya kwiGladAfrica.“Kule sizini wonke amaqembu anzima kakhulu ngisho nalawo ahlezi emsileni we-log, avuka indlobane uma usubhekene nawo, ngakho-ke kuzomele nakanjani siqhubeke nokusebenza kanzima ukuze nathi siqhubeke nokuba semaqenjini asembangweni wesicoco seligi,” usho kanje uSono.USono uphinde waveza ukuthi empeleni nje kumele ngabe bawashiya kude kakhulu ngamaphuzu amaqembu ababanga nawo ukube bayayinqoba imidlalo yabo yasekhaya eProfert Olen Park, eNorth West.“Indaba yokunganqobi uma sidlalela ekhaya nayo isiqala ukungikhathaza kakhulu ngoba ukube siyinqobile eminye imidlalo ngabe sikhuluma ukuthi njengamanje sizishiya kude kakhulu ngamaphuzu izitha zethu. Mhlawumbe manje sesidinga nomthandazo kulesi simo esibhekene naso sokungayinqobi imidlalo yasekhaya.“Kodwa-ke nakuba kunjalo, nginalo ithemba lokuthi sizogcina siliqedile leli shobolo lokunganqobi ekhaya,” uphethe kanje uSono.
title: USono ugwema inkulumo yokudla isicoco seligi

text: SICHITHIWE isicelo se-Eskom sokufuna ukuvunyelwa ukuthi inyuse intengo kagesi cishe ngo-16.6%.Abakwa-Eskom bebebhekene ngeziqu zamehlo enkantolo neNational Energy Regulator of South Africa (Nersa).I-Nersa yavuma ukuba ugesi ukhushulwe ngo-8.1 % kulo nyaka wezimali no-5.2% ngonyaka ozayo wezimali.ENkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli i-Eskom ibifake isicelo sokuba ivunyelwe ukuthi ikhuphule amanani ngo-16.6% ngo-Ephreli 2020 no-16.7% ngo-2021.Inkantolo isichithile isicelo se-Eskom, yathi asiphuthumi ukuthi singalalelwa ngokushesha enkantolo. I-Eskom ibifuna inkantolo isichithe isinqumo seNersa, isithathe njengesingagunyaziwe.Abakwa-Eskom bakholelwa wukuthi abakwaNersa abazange basebenzise indlela efanele ukubala kahle imali engena kubona.Ngokusho kwabakwa-Eskom, amanani kagesi aphansi kakhulu kodwa abeNersa bakholelwa wukuthi usubiza kakhulu ugesi. Abakwa-Eskom bathi bakholelwa wukuthi abeNersa abazange bakubheke ukuthi zingakanani izindleko ababhekana nazo nokuthi kumele bathole inzuzo kwabasuke bekutshalile.Abakwa-Eskom bathi ukubiza kancane kukagesi yikhona okuholela ekutheni kube nokucinywa kukagesi.IJaji uJody Kollapen lithe ngeke linqume ukuthi kumele ugesi unyuke ngamalini ngoba wudaba olunzima.Lithe kumele kubhekwe izinto eziningi ngaphambi kokuba kunyuswe amanani.“Izinkantolo azikwazi ukunquma ukuthi kumele ugesi unyuke ngamalini, yiNersa enegunya lokwenza lokhu.”I-Eskom yakhala ngokuthi izoshodelwa ngu-R102 billion eminyakeni emithathu uma ingavunyelwa ukunyusa amanani ngalo 16.6%.
title: Ichithiwe i-Eskom kolwentengo

text: UFIKELWA  wubuhlungu benhliziyo umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, uma ecabanga ngokuthi  bangase bashiywe yisitobha u-Anele Ngcongca okhonjwa eBelgium.UNgcongca (32) onenkontileka yonyaka neSundowns, kungenzeka adlale umdlalo wakhe wokugcina iqembu uma selibhekene neBloemfontein Celtic kowamanqamu weNedbank Cup e-Orlando Stadium kusasa. Umdlalo uzoqala ngo-8 ebusuku.Iqembu elidlala esigabeni sesibili eBelgium, iKSV Roeselare, ngoJulayi limemezele ukuthi lisayinise uNgcongca inkontileka yeminyaka emibili futhi limlindele ukuthi azolijoyina ngokushesha. Imenenja kaNgcongca, uMike Makaab, ikuchithile lokhu ngaleso sikhathi. Nokho emasontweni adlule uMakaab ucashunwe esethi bazohlala phansi bayibhunge neSundowns indaba kaNgcongca ikakhulukazi ngoba iRoeselare ifuna ukumenza umqeqeshi uma eseyeke ibhola okuyinto efunwa wumdlali.UMosimane uthe kungaba buhlungu ukuhamba kukaNgcongca kwiSundowns.“Uyazi ukuthi ngizizwa kanjani ngoNgcongca. Ungomunye wabadlali basemuva kwesokudla ababukelwa phansi eNingizimun Afrika. Uyakwazi ukubhekana nabadlali basezinhlangothini abanejubane nabanamandla. Uyakwazi ukuzibeka ezindaweni ezifanele. Akamaki kangako. Unamava. Uwine izindebe eziningi e-Europe. Akakutholi ukunconywa okumfanele,” kusho uMosimane.“Kungaba buhlungu ukulahlekelwa nguye kodwa angazi ukuthi kwenzekani phakathi kweqembu nemenenja yakhe ngoba kade sisemgonqweni. Ngokwami ngeke ngithande ukulahlekelwa nguye. Ngingajabula uma engahlala kodwa kufanele sikwamukele uma efuna ukuhamba. Kufanele sisamukele isimo.”UNgcongca uhlale iminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye eBelgium edlala kwiKRC Genk esigabeni esikhulu. KwiSundowns uwine isicoco seligi kathathu, CAF Champions League, Super Cup neTelkom Knockout.Njengoba sekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi iSundowns iyabuyela kwiChampions League emuva kokuwina isicoco se-Absa Premiership, izovulela iCeltic indawo kwiCAF Confederation Cup. ICeltic izohambisana ne-Orlando Pirates eqede endaweni yesithathu kwiPremiership. IPhunya Selesele izodlala okokuqala kwiCAF.“Bekungaba mnandi ukubona iDr Petrus Malemela igcwele ichichima abalandeli nokubona amaqembu angaphandle egijima kuleya nkundla ehlala ichwaza abalandeli. Bengingathanda ukuba mdibi munye ngizibonele kuqopheka umlando. Bekuzoba nzima emaqenjini ukuya laphaya kunabalandeli. Ngiyathemba ukuthi sizodlala kwiCAF ibhola selibuyele esimeni esijwayelekile, “ kusho uMosimane. Njengamanje ibhola lidlalwa ngaphandle kwabalandeli ngenxa yokulwa nokubhebhetheka kweCoronavirus.
title: Kungaba buhlungu ukulahlekelwa wuNgcongca: Pitso

text: Lokhu kuvezwe yibamba lesikhulu esiphezulu seTourism KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Phindile Makwakwa njengoba bekugcwele izivakashi ezisuka kwezinye izifundazwe.UNksz Makwakwa uthe amahhotela adle kahle kanjalo nezinye izindawo zokulala okubalwa ne-Airbnb.“Izimoto ezithutha abantu ama-uber nawo ayenzile imali, baningi abantu abahlomulile ngeVDJ,” kusho uNksz Makwakwa.Kuke kwaba nengebhe yokuthi lo mjaho ungase uphazamiseke ngenxa yabasebenzi abebenganeme ngokudilizwa kodwa akuzange kube nokuphazamiseka.Emjahweni kufika abantu abehlukene okubalwa nosopolitiki.Phakathi kwabanye abebekhona wumengameli we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema, iphini lakhe uMnuz Floyd Shivambu, uNobhala jikelele uMnuz Godrich Gardee noMnuz Marshall Dlamini oyilungu laleli qembu.Abanye abebekhona uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uNdunankulu wesifundazwe uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uNgqongqoshe wezamaphoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, umholi we-DA esifundazweni.Abanye kubalwa owayekhulumela i-ANC uMnuz Zizi Kodwa, uMnuz Mduduzi Manana, ilungu lePhalamende le-UDM uMnuz Nqabayomzi Kwankwa, iMeya yaseKing Cetshwayo uNksz Nonhle Mkhulisi, iMenenja kamasipala iRay Nkonyeni uMnuz Max Mbili nabanye.Usomabhizinisi uMnuz Sam Holding, waseMpumalanga kuthiwa ufike noxhaxha lwezimoto ezibizayo ebezishaye ujenga zize kwiVDJ.Kusuke ukukhuluma ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba lezi zimoto ezibizayo kubalwa kuzo amaFerrari, Bantley nezinye.
title: Kuhlomule abaningi ngoweVDJ

text: UTHWELE kanzima umndeni waKwaCaluza, eMgungundlovu, osuhleli etendeni emuva kokuthi iloli iphaphalaze yagibela phezu kwendlu yayibhidliza.UNkk Lindelwa Mdluli (51), osinde ngokulambisa ngesikhathi iloli iphuma emgwaqweni izongena endlini ngoLwesine olwedlue, uthe namanje akazi ukuthi usinde kanjani ngoba wayesegcekeni ngesikhathi kwenzeka lesi sigameko.Uthe wayephuma kokha amanzi ngesikhathi ebona imoto iqonda egcekeni lakhe ize iyobhajwa phezu kwendlu.“Ngayibona iqhamuka indiza iloli izongena egcekeni, ngabaleka ngamemeza omakhelwane. Ngenhlanhla endlini bekungekho muntu ngoba izingane bezisesikoleni,” kuchaza uNkk Mdluli.Uthe umshayeli weloli, owaphuma engenamyocu kule ngozi, ubatshele ukuthi iloli yaphelelwa amabhuleki wahluleka wukuyilawula.UNkk Mdluli uthe bathwele kanzima njengoba kucekeleke yonke into ebikhona ngaphakathi endlini futhi bekusalokhu kunenkinga yokuthi iloli lisahleli phezu kwendlu nokwenza kube nzima nokubheka izinto ezingaphuma.Uthe bebesazama ukuthola umuntu ongabasiza ukuze isuswe iloli babheke izimpahla zabo okungenzeka ukuthi zisindile.Ngokusho kwakhe izingane zakhe ezine ezisafunda zithole usizo lwezingubo komakhelwane. Uthe emuva kokuthi kwenzeke lesi sigameko bathole usizo lwetende nokudla ophikweni lwezinhlekelele.Ukhale ngokuthi umnikazi weloli akakaze afike azoxoxa nabo bewumndeni.UNkk Mdluli uthe umnikazi weloli uyaye azidlulele nje abuke kodwa angakhulumi lutho nabo.Uthe bafisa sengathi amaphoyisa angangenelela abasize kulolu daba.Okhulumela amaphoyisa, uCol Thembeka Mbele, uthe amaphoyisa avule icala lokushayela budedengu emuva kokuthi iloli iphaphalaze yangena emzini womuntu. Ukuqinisekisile ukuthi akekho umuntu okubikwe ukuthi ulimele kulesi sigameko.
title: Baqube etendeni abagilwe yiloli

text: UKHALE mi izinyembezi umculi wowokholo u-Andile Majola ngesikhathi echaza ngezinsolo abhekene nazo zokubaleka nemali kamasingcwabisane iZesuliwe Dignified Funerals.UMajola wodumo lwengoma ethi Nanoma Niyangibona nophinde abe ngumfundisi, uvukwe umunyu wakhala ngesikhathi esechaza ngabambophela amanqina enyathi ngokucekela phansi isithunzi sakhe nebhizinisi azipatanisela ngalo.“Ngisola isandla sesithathu kule nto. Ngiyathandaza kuNkulunkulu ukuthi abaveze laba bantu abadlala ngami ngoba kungamanga abakushoyo ngebhizinisi engikulona,” zehla izinyembezi kuMajola.Uze ukhala kanje u-Andile kulandela ukuthi leli phephandaba libhale ngesikhalo samakhasimende egatsheni lalo likamasingcwabisane eliseMgungundlovu.Amakhasimende abekhala ngokuvalwa kwamahhovisi yize kade besanda kuba ngamalungu kuwona.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngeSonto la mahhovisi avulwe ezinyangeni ezine ezedlule kanti anamalungu alinganiselwa ku-150.Nakuba ngeSonto eledlule ayethe uyinxusa kulo masingcwabisane akuwona owakhe kodwa kuleli sonto ugonyulukile, waveza ukuthi ungomunye wabaqondisi.“Sibane sibambisene ngokulingana ebhizinisini. Sonke safaka imali sasungula leli bhizinisi. Sibe sesihlukaniselana imisebenzi ngokubheka ukuthi umuntu ngamunye umandla ngalaphi. Mina nganikwa owokumaketha, ezokuxhumana nokuba yinxusa lebhizinisi ngoba ngiyaziwa,” kusho uMajola.Mayelana negatsha eliseMgungundlovu okubikwe ukuthi amakhasimende alifice lilenga ingidi, uthe akulona iqiniso.Uthe basola omunye wesifazane obesebenza khona ngokuhubhuza amanga.Uthe bazwe nokuthi ubeke abonakale esabalalisa amapheshana abanye abangcwabi abakhelene nebhizinisi loMajola.“Ozakwethu bakhethe ukummisa emsebenzini ngoba sisaphenya umnyombo walama hlebezi,” kusho uMajola.Isolezwe ngeSonto lihabule ukuthi akusiye ukuphela kwenxusa kule nkampani kukhona noMnuz Lucky Makhathini.UMakhathini uthe washiya ngokushesha ngoba kwakungekho sivumelwano esibhalwe phansi sokusebenza.“U-Andile wacela ukuthi ngibe yinxusa labo. Sasebenza kancane kodwa ngasheshe ngayeka ngemuva kokuthi ngiphucwe imoto yenkampani iZesuliwe abantu engingabazi,” usho kanje.UMajola uthe kuyiqiniso okushiwo uMakhathini.“Akaphucwanga umuntu angamazi imoto. Ozakwethu bayilanda ngoba kungeyenkampani engasayibuyisi,” kuphendula uMajola.
title: Zehle mi echaza ngomasingcwabisane

text: IMITHETHO evikela ukuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane ekhona okwamanje ayikakabavikeli abanebala elimhlophe.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNksz Thembisile Madlala oyiphini likasihlalo weNational Albinism Society, obeyingxenye yabesifazane ebebehambele umhlangano wokudingida ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane obuhlelwe yisiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, obuseThekwini izolo.Uthe abantu abane-albinism bahlale bengabagilwa bodlame lobulili.“Siyayibona imithetho mihle kodwa okwamanje thina ayikasisebenzeli. Kunamantombazane ane-albinisim asesaba ukungena othandweni ngoba aseke abona onina bebulawa ngabantu ababethandana nonina. Lowo msolwa wazinikela emaphoyiseni emuva kwesenzo sakhe ngo-2017 kodwa namanje umsolwa usazihambela ngaphandle. Kusenezingane ezine-albinism ezijahwayo uma zihamba emigwaqweni, uma ziyobika kuthiwe alikho icala elisenzekile okusho ukuthi kumele kulindwe zithunjwe. Nakhona uma umuntu esethunjiwe akekho oboshwayo. Yingakho ngithi imithetho ekhona okwamanje ayikasiniki usizo esilidingayo.”ABESIFAZANE ebebehambele umhlangano wokudingida ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane obuhlelwe yisiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, obuseThekwini izolo. Isithombe: Nqobile Mbonambi/ANAUSomlomo wesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Nontembeko Boyce, uthe imithetho isishayiwe kodwa inkinga ayibonayo wukuthi isigaba esintekenteke esokuthi iqale ukusebenza.“Kusekhona okumele sikuthole ngasohlangothini lomthetho ingane ike idlwengulwe ineminyaka emihlanu kodwa icala lize liqulwe isineminyaka ewu-9, into enjengaleyo okumele siyiqonde sazi ukuthi yenziwa yini,” kusho uNksz Boyce.UNksz Mandisa Khanyile ongomunye wabesifazane abayizishoshovu ezilwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane, uthe inkinga ekhona wukuthi imithetho emihle ekhona kuleli yenza ukuthi uma ufika kwelinye ilizwe uxoxa ngayo kushaywe izandla kunconywe.“Ngibona sengathi siqamba amanga ngoba lokhu esisuke sikusho kugcina ephepheni, umuntu wasemphakathini ubona okwehlukile kunalokhu thina esikushoyo ngoba uyahlukumezeka.”UNksz Nqobile Cele uthe okunye ukuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane kwenzeka ngenxa yenzondo yokungamukeli ukuthi kunabesifazane abakhethe ukuphila ngendlela ethize njengokuthandana nabanye besifazane.
title: 'Imithetho ayibavikeli abanebala elimhlophe abahlukunyezwayo'

text: SIDUVE emakhazeni phesheya kwezilwandle eGreece isidumbu sikaNksz Sarah Masango, waKwaNdebele, eMpumalanga, oshonele esibhedlela ngoNovemba 14 nonyaka, enesifo sofuba. Umndeni wakhe kumele ukhokhe R71 000, ukuze isidumbu sakhe sibuyiswe kuleli.UMnyango wezangaPhandle uthe ngeke ukwazi ukukhokhela izindleko zamakhaza nokumbuyisa kuleli umufi ngoba ubengeyena umsebenzi kahulumeni.Izindleko zamakhaza ziyenyuka njengoba isidumbu sakhe sisemakhazeni.Umfowabo kamufi uMnuz Gilbert Masango, uthe: “Udadewethu wayehlala eSunnyside, ePitoli, ngaphambi kokuya eGreece nesoka lakhe ngo-2014.”Uthe bashaqekile bewumndeni bethola ngokushona kukadadewabo.“Sithole ulwazi ehhovisi lenxusa lakuleli eGreece ngokushona kwakhe. Asikholwanga. Okwenza isimo saba muncu kakhulu wukuthi kumele sizikhokhele thina izindleko zokubuyisa isidumbu sakhe kuleli,” kusho uMasango.Ihhovisi lenxusa lazisa umndeni ukuthi umufi walaliswa esibhedlela ngo-Okthoba 28, wagcina ngokushona.UMasango uthe akukho lapho engayanga khona ecela usizo, ngisho neminyango eyahlukene kahulumeni.Izindleko zokubuyisa isidumbu kuleli zibalwa ngama-euro, kulezo zindleko kubalwa ukusithutha isidumbu, amakhaza izimpahla zokusigqokisa, i-container yokusithwala nokunye.Umndeni uthe bebengajwayele ukushayelana izingcingo bebethumelana imiqhafazo.Incwadi ebhalwe yisikhulu somnyango eya emndenini kamufi iveza uzwelo ngokubehlele bese ithi bangaxhumana nomnyango uma bedinga usizo.Okhulumela lo mnyango uMnuz Lunga Ngqengelele, uthe, “Ngeshwa kuwumthetho ukuthi asiyisizi ngemali imindeni esuke ishonelwe ngamalungu ayo ngaphandle kwakuleli,” kusho uNgqengelele.Unxuse imindeni ivakashele iwebsite yabo ukuze ibona ukuthi yini okumele yenziwe uma ilungu layo lishonele ngaphandle kwakuleli.
title: Usizi isidumbu siduve phesheya

text: UZOBUYELA enkantolo ngoSepthemba 25 owesifazane waseBothaville, eFree State, osolwa ngokugwaza nokubulala umyeni wakhe ngoMgqibelo. Okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe uCaptain Stephen Thakeng uthe lesi sigameko senzeke ngoMgqibelo ngo-3.30 ntambama. "Umsolwa wesifazane oneminyaka ewu-26, oyinkosikazi kamufi, uthi wayelele ngesikhathi umufi engena endlini. Ngesikhathi emuvusa kwasuka ingxabano phakathi kwabo. Akucaci ukuthi yini umsuka wengxabano. Umsolwa uDimakatso Maxhasa (26) wagwaza umyeni wakhe uMnuz Montoedi Nzuza (29) ngebhodlela emqaleni kanye. Abezimo eziphuthumayo bafica uNzuza eseshonile endaweni yesigameko," kusho uThakeng. Uthe umsolwa waboshwa ngu-sergeant Moleme Phakoe ngoMgqibelo, wavulelwa icala lokubulala. UMaxhasa uvele okokuqala enkantolo ngoMsombuluko kanti kulindeleke ukuthi aphinde avele ngoSepthemba 25 esezofaka isicelo sebheyili. Umphathi siteshi wasesiteshini samaphoyisa eBothaville, uColonel Disebo Tshabalala uwushayele ihlombe umsebenzi owenziwe amaphoyisa. - African News Agency (ANA)
title: Owesifazane 'ugwaze' umyeni ngebhodlela emqaleni

text: UKUPHELA kweqembu iBidvest Wits kuzoza nomunyu ezisebenzini nakubadlali ngosuku lokugcina lwemidlalo yePremier Soccer League (PSL).Lokhu kushiwo ngumqeqeshi weWits uGavin Hunt, othe yize kuphela nya ngaleli qembu kodwa uzishaya isifuba ngabakuzuzile eminyakeni eyisithupha eqeqesha iZitshudeni.Ngemuva kweminyaka engu-99, leli qembu laba khona, uma kusongwa imidlalo yePSL ngenyanga ezayo sekuyoba umlando ukuthi selake laba khona.Ngesizini ezayo isitifiketi seWits, sizobe sidlala iTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM), kuthi eseGladAfrica Championship ebesidlala iTTM sona sidlale iSekhukhune FC.“Ngineminyaka eyisithupha ngilapha kwiWits. Kule minyaka sesinqobe zonke izicoco kwiPSL ngaphandle kweNedbank Cup. Nakuyona iNedbank sishwebe kancane sehlulwa kowamanqamu. Lokhu kungenza ngiziqhenye kakhulu. “Phela asilona iqembu elikhulu noma elinabadlali abaningi. Akumnandi ukuthi iqembu lidayisile kwazise abantu bazophelelwa yimisebenzi. Kodwa impilo kumele iqhubeke,” kusho uHunt ngemuva kokudlala kwezakhe ngokulingana neKaizer Chiefs ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.Lo mdlalo we-Absa Premiership uphele ngo 1-1.Echaza uHunt uthe okwamanje, iningi lisajabulela ukubuya kwemidlalo yePSL kodwa wathi uyazi ukuthi ngosuku lokugcina lwemidlalo kuzoba khona ukukhala nokugedla kwamazinyo kwabathile ngaphakathi eqenjini.“Akumnandi neze ukuzithola sikulesi simo esikusona. Kumanje kukhona abantu lapha okunzima ukusebenza abakhala mi izinyembezi ngenxa yale nto. Ngiyazi abanye kusaduma ukudlala kodwa ngeke ngithuke ngosuku lokugcina ukubona izinyembezi kuphela ngeqembu.”Selokhu kubuye imidlalo, iWits isidlale kabili. Yehlulwe iMamelodi Sundowns ngo 3-2 kowandulela amanqamu kwiNedbank Cup, ngaphambi kokudlala ngokulingana neChiefs. Okuhlalukile ngeWits wukuthi kayidikibele neze enkundleni, idlala ibhola elihle yize isidayisiwe.UHunt ucacisile ukuthi yini ebenza beqhubeke nokudlala ibhola elihle, noma izimo zingavumi.“Singabantu okulindeleke ukuthi bahloniphe futhi benze umsebenzi wabo ngobuqotho. Abanye abadlali basafuna ukuzikhangisa kwamanye amaqembu ukuze bathole imisebenzi. “Angikucacise kodwa ukuthi umdlali engimbonayo ukuthi akafuni ukudlala, akazinikele ngokwanele angimdlalisi ngaphansi kwalesi simo. Kubalulekile ukudlalisa abantu abafunayo ukudlala khona ukuzinikela kuzoba khona,” kusho uHunt.Umbango wesicoco ushisa phansi phakathi kweChiefs neSundowns. UHunt uthe kusazoshuba kulo mbango.“Kusazodlalwa kakhulu. Kungenzeka kulamule umdlalo wokugcina kula maqembu omabili ngendlela okuyiyona,” kusho uHunt.
title: UHunt ubona isililo ngolokugcina kwiPSL

text: MHLELI: Ake ngisike elijikayo njengesakhamuzi sakuleli. Ngiyafisa uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa (osesithombeni) atshele izwe ukuthi uza nasiphi isisombululo kule ngwadla ebhekene nezwe kwazise mhla ethatha kuMsholozi wathembisa ukusiwezela kwelinoju.Ngibona sesifana neVenezuella elokhu ibhedelwa yizinto. Ngicabanga ukuthi siyokhululeka mhla saba nomengameli wabantu hhayi oweqembu. Akuwenzi umqondo ukuthi umengameli enze izethembiso bese engasho ukuthi usekuphi “nokuthumeka” kwakhe. Bakhuluma ngokuthatha iBhange loMbuso into engeke iqede indlala nobubha. Usekuphi umengameli nohlelo lokuthatha umhlaba awunike abanikazi bawo? Uthini ngokunyuka njalo kwentengo ka-oyela?Mhla engena ezintanjeni umengameli wethu esimthandayo wathembisa ukuvula amathuba emisebenzi angu-500 000 ngaphambi kokuphela kwezinyanga ezintathu. Aphi lawo mathuba emisebenzi? Sesingakhuluma sikhohlisane kusazoba mnyama. Sithatha umnotho (ezimbiwa phansi) “siphisane” ngawo phesheya ubuye usumba eqolo.Ugesi wakuleli ubiza kabi kodwa uphehlwa lapha uze uphakelwe amazwe angomakhelwane. Intela enkulu yezimpahla ekhokhwa osomabhizinisi uma bedayisa ngaphandle nayo inomthelela ebubheni esikubo kodwa eyakuleli iphansi uma ufaka izimpahla ezivela ngaphandle. Mhlawumbe ngelinye ilanga siyokhuluma ngokulahlwa kokudla kuleli kulahlwa amazwe aphesheya. Abantu abanikwe amathuba emisebenzi hhayi izikibha zamaqembu epolitiki.Sibahle NgobeseENquthu
title: Sifuna imisebenzi hhayi izikibha

text: NKOSIKHONA CELEIKHISHWE ngevoti Inkosi uMhlabunzima Mthuli wesizwe saseMathulini, oZwathini, ebikade ingusihlalo kwisiFunda uMgungundlovu, ngoba isolwa ngamanye amakhosi ngokuthanda isimame ngokweqile, nangokucwila ezinkambeni zikaFaro.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe NgoMgqibelo, kube nomhlangano ohlale isigubhukane obekuzobhungwa kabanzi ngesihlalo seNkosi uMthuli kwisiFunda uMgungundlovu.Amakhosi kulo mhlangano ayalele Inkosi uMthuli ukuba ithule ithi du ingaphawuli, kuze kuphothulwe umhlangano. Kuthiwa inkosi itsheliwe ukuthi umhlangano umayelana nayo kodwa kayinalo ilungelo lokuphawula.Nebala inkosi ilahlwe ngevoti. Kucacale nengane encane ukuthi iyakhishwa esihlalweni.Iziphendulela kulokhu, inkosi ivumile ukuthi iyazifela ngesimame futhi ayiliboni iphutha kulokho. "Yebo, ube khona umhlangano obumayelana nami futhi ngakhishwa ngevoti esikhundleni. Kodwa ngeke ngivume kwenzeke lokho,'' kuchaza olahlwe ngevoti.Inkosi esichithiwe ithe amakhosi awafune esinye isizathu sokuyilaxaza, hhayi lesi samantombazane ngoba isichaza njengesiyimbudane.Izichaze njengendoda eyisoka futhi enolimi okuthi uma ikhuluma nomuntu wesifazane kuvele konke kuzenzakalele nje."Mina ngiyisoka. Umuntu wesifazane uma ngimthandile ngiyamqonda ngqo, angigwegwesi. Uyabona uma umuntu wesifazane ngimfuna kahle, alipheli usuku ngingamtholanga," isho kanje.Isebenzise amagama athi: "Mina ngendwangu yami emhlophe qwa, ngikwazi ukuthi ngigoqe konke engikudingayo ebese kuphela nje kanjalo." Kuthe uma intatheli iyinxusa ukuba icacise yathi ichaza ukuthi yona uqonywa kalula.Izishaye isifuba yathi ngisho umfazi kamfowabo oseNkandla seyamngena. Ithe akufihliwe ukuthi yamngena umfazi kaNdodo osewalala kobandayo."Akufihliwe ukuthi umfazi kamfowethu ngimngenile. Uyabona nje uma ngiseNkandla ngiyadlula kuyena umfazi kamfowethu ngenze lokhu umfowethu ayekwenza kuyena ekameleni," isho kanje.Iveze nokuthi yona yayinesithembu samakhosikazi amathathu. Kodwa manje esisele yinye ngenxa yokuthi lawa amanye amabili asashona.“Inkosi” ithe notshwala nabo iyazifela ngabo kodwa yathi seyama ngenxa yezizathu ezithile.Lona ngunyaka wesikhombisa “inkosi” ihlezi esigqikini sokwengamela isiFunda, uMgungundlovu. Ifunge yagomela yathi uma kunesidingo, lolu daba izoliyisa enkantolo."Abangilinde liphele ihlandla lami. Engingeke ngikuvume ukwehliswa isithunzi, ngivele ngikhishwe ngesizathu esingezwakali,'' isho kanje.Isolezwe NgoMgqibelo litholile ukuthi “inkosi” ikhishwe kanye nesekela layo, inkosi Nozipho Molefe.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuBusa nokuBambisana KwaZulu Natal, uMnuz Senzo Mzila, uthe bona abangeni ngokungako kulolu daba ngakho ngeke bakwazi ukuphawula.
title: Ikhishwe esikhundleni  inkosi ezifela ngesimame

text: UKHALE ngokungalandelwa kwemigomo ebekelwe ukulwa neCovid-19 kuleli umengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ememezela ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ibuyela esigabeni sesithathu sikathaqa ngoMsombuluko ebusuku. UMengameli wethule inkulumo esizweni kulandela ukunyuka kwesibalo sabantu abatheleleke ngeCovid-19 muva nje kuleli. Sebengaphezulu kuka 1 million abantu asebeke bahaqeka ngeCovid-19 kuleli. Ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yakhe uRamaphosa ukhale ngabantu asebeyekile ukusebenzisa izibulali magciwane, ukugeza izandla, kanye nabantu abangazifaki izifonyo. Uthe ukungalandelwa kwale migomo yikho okusabalalalisa ngesivinini iCovid-19 kuleli. URamaphosa uthe kusukela kusasa izwe lizobuyela esigabeni sesithathu sikathaqa ukuze kwehle izinga lokusabalala kwe-Covid-19 kuleli. Isigaba sesithathu sihambisana nokwehliswa kwesibalo sabantu abahambela imicimb; imingcwabo kumele ihanjelwe abantu abawu-50 kuphela. Amabhizinisi kumele abeke isibalo sabantu abazovumeleka ukungena emsebenzini. Izindawo ezidayisa utshwala zivaliwe kanti nokuphuza utshwala ezindaweni zomphakathi njengasebhishi nasemapaki kuvaliwe. Ukuthutha utshwala nakho kuvaliwe. URamaphosa uthe oNgqongqoshe abayingxenye yesigungu esibhekelela ukulwa neCovid-19 bazochaza kabanzi ngeminye imithetho ethinta isigaba sesithathu.  URamaphosa uthe izwe lizohlala esigabeni sesithathu kuze kushaye uJanuwari 15. Uthe emasontweni azayo bazoqapha ukuthi isabalala kangakanani iCovid-19. Uthe kulindeleke ukuthi umgomo weCovid-19 uqale ukusatshalaliswa kuleli ngekota yesibili ngonyaka ozayo.
title: URamaphosa ukhale ngokungalaleli kwabantu evala utshwala

text: AKAZIBONI eyeka ukudlala iLotto owesilisa waseMitchells Plain eKapa oseyiwine kabili.Eminyakeni eyisikhombisa edlule, lo wesilisa onguyise wabantwana abathathu wawina u-R75 000. Nonyaka uphinde wanyelwa inyoni esandleni ewina u-R61 million ngethikithi langoJulayi 27. Ithikithi lakhe le quick pick walithenga ngo-R20 egaraji likaphethroli iTotal elisemigaqweni uHinglands noFulham.Ekhuluma nabeSA National Lottery, ITHUBA, uchaze indlela abephila ngayo ngaphambi kokubamba ilotto."Bengingasebenzi eminyakeni emihlanu edlule, ngize ngathola inkontileka ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka. Yize unzima lo msebenzi futhi udinga amandla amakhulu, kodwa ngangijabulela ukukwazi ukubekela umndeni wami ukudla etafuleni," kusho yena.Uthe, ngesikhathi ebamba ilotto okokuqala, yena nomlingani wakhe bebehlala emqashweni nezingane zabo."Ngesikhathi ngiwina u-R75, 000, ngasebenzisa imali ukwakha umuzi onamagumbi amane, esisahlala kuwo namanje," kusho yena.Manje uthe unezinhlelo ezinkulu ngo-R61 million. "Le mali izoshintsha impilo yomndeni wami ingunaphakade. Sengizokwazi ukuthenga umuzi omkhulu kakhulu lapho zonke izingane zami zizothola amagumbi azo okulala. Ngifuna ukuyitshala ingxenye eningi yemali engiyiwinile ukuze umndeni wami ungaphinde uhlupheke."Ephawula ngendlela aqoka ngayo izinombolo uthe uyawagcina amathikithi adlala ngawo ukuze aqhathanise izinombolo azidlalayo bese ecabanga ezinye."Nginendawo egcwele amathikithi elotto engawadlala kudala, ngiyawathatha ngiwabeke phambi kwami bese ngiyaqala ukuqagela izinombolo. Kodwa kulokhu, ngiwiniswe ukuvele ngizicabange ngokushesha," usho kanje.
title: Akaziboni eyeka ukudlala iLotto oseyibambe kabili kuleli

text: Isiqholo sithulwe phambi kwezinkumbi zabantu ebezisemcimbini i-#Gcwalis’ iMabhida, eMoses Mabhida eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo.Kumangale iningi uNgizwe Mchunu noTshatha bememezela ukuthi ngaphambi kokuthi bafake uKhuzani esteji kukhona into abafuna ukuyethula.Ngaleso sikhathi inkudla ibisihlokoma yize bebengazi ukuthi laba bakhuluma ngani.Kube sekuqala isikhangiso laba base bemezela ukuthi lo mculi usenesiqholo.Lokhu kujatshulelwe abaningi kwazise kawamaningi, amaciko eNingizimu Afrika aneziqholo ezithi wona.Iningi libabaze ubuchule bukaKhuzani ngokuqhubeka enza izinto ezinkulu egameni lakhe.UJABULISE abalandeli bakhe uKhuzani eMabhida ethula isiqholo nokuyinto emangaze abaningi kulo mcimbiEndimeni kamaskandi uKhuzani wumculi wokuqala ukuba nesiqholo esithi yena selokhu kwathi nhlo.UKhuzani uthe imininingwane eminingi ngalesi siqholo nokuthi sizotholakala nini kanjani, izodalulwa maduzane.Le nsizwa yaseMandaba, eNkandla ukuqopha imlando yinto yayo njengoba ibe umculi wokuqala ukusungula umcimbi wokugcwalisa inkudla kumaskandi.Ayigcinanga lapho ibe wumculi wokuqala kamaskandi ukuqashwa emicimbini yolunye uhlobo lomculo kube iyona kuphela kumaskandi enandisa kuyona.Muva nje usanda kubonakala emdlaweni eHostela, okuyinto ejabulise abaningi.
title: Bamangele uKhuzani ethula isiqholo esibizwa ngaye

text: UNOZINTI waMaZulu FC uSiyabonga Mbatha uphika imibiko ethi umqeqeshi ayesebenzisana naye eminyakeni edlule kwiThanda Royal Zulu, uThami Ngubane, ubegwazisa abadlali ngenhloso yokuthi bathole isikimu.Leli phephandaba lishicelele udaba ngoNgubane, oke wacija iThanda, African Warrriors, Royal Eagles eminyakeni edlule, nalapho lo mqeqeshi ebeyichitha khona le mibiko emasontweni amabili edlule. UNgubane utshele Isolezwe ukuthi usola abathile abanomona abafuna angaqasheki, abona igama lakhe ngale mibiko ayibize ngamampunge.Phakathi kwabadlali uNgubane asebenzisane nabo * -Innocent Maela osedlalela i-Orlando Pirates, noMbatha ogijimela Usuthu, ukusho nje abambalwa.UMbatha woSuthu ungumdlali wokuqala ukuphumela obala ngalezi zinsolo ezibhekiswe kuNgubane asebenza naye kwi-African Warriors nakwiThanda eminyakeni edlule.Ngokusho kukaMbatha, abadlali abathi babegwaza kuNgubane, abaphumele obala baveze nobufakazi.“Ngamanga aluhlaza lawo ashiwo ngomqeqeshi uNgubane. Ngisebenzisane naye iminyaka eminingi angikwazi mina lokho. Umdlali othi wake wagwaza kuNgubane akaphumele obala phela, alethe nobufakazi,” usho kanje uMbatha.Phakathi kokunye okwakushicilelwe yileli phephandaba ngesikhathi lixoxa noNgubane esekhaya lakhe eMandeni, udaba lwebhuku lapho khona uNgubane ethi abadlali babefaka khona imali (beyibeka), ngenhloso yokuthi nxa kunezimo eziphuthumayo noma beya emakhaya kube khona abahamba nakho.UMbatha ulivumile naye ibhuku, wathi lalikhona impela futhi libasiza njengabadlali.“Yebo likhona ibhuku esasifaka kulona izimali zethu. Laliphethwe uyena umqeqeshi wethu (uNgubane) ngaleso sikhathi. Kulelo bhuku wawufaka imali onayo, bese kuthi uma usuya ekhaya, uthathe imali yakho oyibekile bajabule nasekhaya uma ufika. Bekungekhona nje ukuthi uNgubane ungumqeqeshi kodwa ubenendaba nokuthi uma ufika ekhaya uzofika uphetheni. Ubengubaba kithina, sikwazi nokukhuluma naye ngezimpilo zethu zangasese. Udaba olwabhalwa yileli phephandaba ngalufunda, kungakho ngithi uma ekhona umdlali akeze kwabezindaba aveze ubufakazi anabo bokuthi wagwaza kuNgubane,” kuchaza uMbatha osayine kwiThanda ngesizini ka-2015/2016.Lo nozinti kubhekeke ukuthi alwele ijezi kuMaZulu kule szini njengoba ukufika kukaMoeneeb Josephse kushubise umbango ezintini. Usuthu luzobhekana neKaizer Chiefs emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership olandelayo eFNB Stadium ngoSepthemba 22.
title: Umdlali ucacisa ngomqeqeshi 'ogwazisayo'

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANEUMHOLI webandla lamaNazaretha eBuhleni, uMnuz Mduduzi “Nyazilwezulu” Shembe, uyavutha ngalabo abagxeka ukwakhiwa kwesigodlo seSilo Samabandla esiseBuhleni nabasisola ngokuchema nalo uNyazi ngoba bekhala ngokuthi lokhu kuzobeka isithombe sokuthi yilo oluyinkosi esemthethweni ekubeni kusenecala enkantolo.Lokhu kugqame ngesikhathi kunenkonzo yebandla lakwaShembe ebisesigodlweni seSilo esikwaNongoma eNyokeni, lapho bekukhulekelwa khona uMkhosi woSelwa ozoba ngoDisemba.Bekungokokuqala ukuthi uNyazi luphawule ngalolu daba selokhu lwabikwa ezinyangeni ezedlule lapho abaseThembezinhle abaholwa nguMnuz Vela “Msebeyelanga” Shembe bakhononda ngeSilo bethi ukuhambela kwaso eBuhleni ekubeni kusenecala lombango eliqhubekayo kwenza kube nesithombe sokuthi uNyazi yilo oluyinkosi ngokusemthe-thweni.Babekhala nangokuthi bekungamele iSilo sisivume isigodlo esakhiwe ngabaseBuhleni abasenzele iNgonyama ngoba bethi konke lokhu kudukisa isizwe.“Yicala likabani uma sihambele eBuhleni ngoba phela kunesigodlo saso? Uma esefikile kulesi sigodlo esethanda ukulula izinyawo avakashele ekhaya ngoba kukubo ngabe nalapho yicala yini? Ngakithi (eThekwini) asikho isigodlo seSilo, yingakho singamaNazaretha amahle sisakhile isigodlo seSilo. Ngabe yicala likabani uma mina ngizokhuleka eSilweni? Inkinga kuvele kukhulume abantu abangazi lutho,” kusho uNyazi obelunanelwa ngo-Amen omkhulu enkundleni obekukhonzelwa kuyo.AbaseThembezinhle babuye bakhala nangoNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uNathi Nhleko bethi kuyadumaza ukuthi ubonakala ephambili ezintweni zaseBuhleni ngoba lokhu kuzombeka njengomuntu ochemile nobeka engcupheni umsebenzi wamaPhoyisa asuke eqaphe icala lakwaShembe.Selokhu bakhuluma kanje bekungakaze kuzwakale lutho okushiwo uNyazi kodwa ngesikhathi kuqhubeka inkonzo yezinsuku ezimbili evalwe izolo, eNyokeni, lukhulume okuningi okungaluphathi kahle.Belwethula inkulumo yalo ebihambisana nentshumayelo egunjini elingumahamba nendlwana obekunzima ukuthi lubonakale phakathi ngoba nama-khamera abezama ukulucinga ukuze luvele kuma-big screen abebekiwe.Kuleli gumbi beluhleli lodwa kanti iSilo noNdunankulu uSenzo Mchunu nabanye abaholi bebehleli bodwa beluzwa ngezwi uNyazi uma lukhuluma ngoba belungabonakali.Luthe iSilo liyasibonga ngoba sifana noSolomoni waseBhayibhelini owakwazi ukubona inkosikazi yakhe eyayibulale ingane esikhundleni sokuthi awahlulele wonke.Belusho lokhu luchaza izinto ezimbi ezenziwa eSilweni abanye abaholi baleli bandla ngesikhathi besivimba bengafuni singene sizobona iNkosi uVimbeni Shembe osakhothama. Khonamanjalo uNyazi kumenyezelwe ukuthi luzohlonishwa ngeziqu zobudokotela yikolishi elingadalulwanga emcimbini ozoba seCity Hall eThekwini ngoDisemba 6.
title: Ulaka loNyazi kwabakhala ngeseSilo

text: UNksz Cheryl Zondi, ubekhuluma emcimbini we-Articulate Africa Book and Art Festival obuse-Exhibition Centre eThekwini muva nje.UNksz Zondi obe nogazi kwabaningi ngesikhathi ethula ubufakazi kuleli cala elibhekene no-Omotoso elisaqhubeka enkantolo, uthe ukuhlukunyezwa kukanina nguyise kwamenza wafuna ukuthola uthando kwenye indawo.“Ngaya enkonzweni ngoba ngifuna ukuthola uthando lukaNkulunkulu njengoba ubaba wami engazange angithande, wayehlukumezana. Umfundisi wasebenzisa inkolo yami ukudlala ngami. Wasebenzisa igama likaNkulunkulu ukuze angihlukumeze,” kusho uNksz Zondi.Uthe kwathi noma unina esenze konke ukuba aphume kuleya ndawo “eyayiyisihogo” kodwa waphinde wabuyela ngoba ezitshela ukuthi wonile kuMdali ngokubaleka.“Ngangizitshela ukuthi uma ngingasamgculisi umfundisi ngocansi, kuzokwenzeka njengoba ayesho ethi ngeke ngilibone iZulu futhi kobe angenzi kahle kuMdali. Ngangizitshela ukuthi konke okwakwenzeka kumina kwakufanele kwenzeke,” kusho uNksz Zondi.Uthe ukuhlukumezeka kwakhe ngale ndlela kwenza abone ukuthi impilo yakhe ngeke iphinde ifane nakuqala, uthe lokhu okwenzeka kuphazamisa ngisho nempilo yakhe ethinta ezothando njengoba kungelula ukuvumela umuntu wesilisa eduze kwakhe.Omunye obekhuluma kulo mcimbi, uNksz Vanessa Govender, owayeyintatheli nosebhale incwadi ethi Beaten but not broken, uthe ayethandana naye wayemshaya ngisho esemsebenzini.“Ukuhlukunyezwa kwami okuningi kwenzeka lapho sasipaka khona izimoto emsebenzini. Wayengishaya, ngisho nabaphathi emsebenzini sebazi ukuthi ngiyashaywa kodwa akekho owake wangisiza. Kwakunzima ukuphuma kulobu budlelwane ngoba ngikhuliswe ngokuthi umuntu uyafihla uma enenkinga kwezothando, awunekeli izwe ngezinkinga zakho. Ngangizizwa nginamahloni ngokuhlukunyezwa,” kusho uNksz Govender.Uthe ayethandana naye wayeke amshayele ukuthi uhleka nomunye umuntu wesilisa, kokunye ashayelwe ukuthi ugqoke kahle noma uyamamatheka nje.“Wawuvele uzwe ngempama nje, noma ngabe yisiphi isizathu anaso wayengishaya nje. Ngagcina ngingasakwazi nokufunda izindaba ngoba ngake ngashaywa ngiqeda ukuphuma emoyeni. Kwangiphazamisa emsebenzini wami, ngagcina sengiwushiyile ngaya kwenye indawo,” kusho uNksz Govender.Omunye wesifazane obegeqa amagula ngokudlwengulwa esemncane, uNksz Slungile Mavundla, obhale incwadi ethi: Owesifazane onamandla. Uthe ukudlwengulwa eneminyaka engu-10 yisihlobo sakhe, kwenza wangakwazi ukuphinde athande umuntu wesilisa, uthe yize eseke washada, waba nezingane kodwa uthando lomuntu wesilisa akazange abe nalo.“Kwaba nzima kakhulu ngoba ngangishade nomuntu owayengihlukumeza, eqonywa. Uma ngike ngambuza ukuthi uvelaphi avele angishaye,” kusho Nksz Mavundla.Unina womsakazi uMasecheba Ndlovu, uNksz Sbongile Promise Khumalo, naye owahlukunyezwa esekudingisweni, uthe kumele uhulumeni wakuleli ayeke ukuba nomkhankaso wokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane izinsuku ezingu-16 kuphela kodwa kumele kube into eyenziwa zonke izinsuku ngoba baningi abesifazane abahlukumezekile kodwa bengasho, abanye bengazi ukuthi kumele baye kuphi,” kusho uNksz Khumalo.
title: Baneke usizi lokuhlukumezeka

text: XOLILE MPISANEUKAPUTENI wamaProteas, uDean Elgar, akafuni bagculiswe ukunqoba umdlalo owodwa njengoba bedlala uchungechunge lwama-test neWest Indies.AmaProteas awine i-test yokuqala nge-innings nama-runs awu-63 kodwa u-Elgar uthe ufuna ezakhe zibhukule futhi emdlalweni wesibili.Uzoqala kusasa ntambama ngo-4 eDarren Sammy Cricket Ground e-Saint Lucia.Kubashwibi, u-Anrich Nortje wathatha amawikhethi ayisikhombisa kwi-test yokuqala, uKagiso Rabada wathatha ayisithupha, uLungi Ngidi ayisihlanu. Kwababhethayo kwagqama kakhulu uQuinton de Kock ngama-runs awu-141.U-Elgar uthe nalabo abanqaka baphinde baqoqe amabhola enkundleni abawenzanga amaphutha kodwa akusho ukuthi sekumele bakhululeke ngoba iWest Indies izobuya isivutha ingabaselwe."Sonke sidlale ngokuzimisela emdlalweni wokuqala, ikakhulukazi uQuinton. Senze konke ngendlela efanele futhi besingenazwelo. Ngingasho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi sibuyise isitayela amaProteas ayedume ngaso ngaphambilini," kusho u-Elgar."Yisona lesi sitayela ebengilokhu ngikhumbuza abadlali ngaso. Siyazi ukuthi sinawo la mandla ngaphakathi kithina. Ngizohlezi ngigcizelela ukuthi la makhono siwaveze njalo enkundleni."Njengoba amaProteas ezongena kule test yokugcina ehamba phambili ngo-1-0, adinga ukudlala ngokulingana noma ayinqobe eyesibili ukuze adle umhlanganiso kuma-test.U-Elgar uthe okusemqondweni wakhe ukuthi bawuwine umdlalo, banqobe ngo-2-0."Kungaba yiphutha elikhulu uma singakhetha ukuzithela ngabandayo ngoba sesinqobe umdlalo owodwa. Ngifuna siyishaye ngo-2-0 iWest Indies. Angiboni ukuthi sesingazitshela ukuthi sesiphumelele."Njengokaputeni ngizimisele ukuthi ngiligqugquzele iqembu. Umdlali ngamunye enze okungaphezulu kwesikwenze emdlalweni wokuqala. Ukunqoba umdlalo owodwa akusho lutho. Sizele ukuzowina imidlalo yomibili nokunqoba uchungechunge la. Ngizowuphindaphinda lo mlayezo kubadlali," kusho      u-Elgar.
title: U-Elgar ufuna bayiphinde ngesibhaxu iWest Indies

text: INHLANGANO iJacob Zuma Foundation isole uSihlalo weKhomishini ephenya ngokuLawulwa koMbuso yiDlanzane, uJaji Raymond Zondo, ngokusebenzisa amandla esikhundla sakhe ukuze kuboshwe uZuma.Isitatimende esithunyelwe ile nhlangano, sithe akukwazi ukuthi uZondo angathi uZuma akaboshwe iminyaka emibili ekubeni umthetho ka-1947 ukhuluma ngokuthi umuntu angaboshwa izinyanga eziyisithupha ngokungayi kothula ubufakazi ekubeni kunencwadi emyalela ukuthi aye kofakaza kwikhomishini. “Kuyacaca ukuthi kushintshwa imithetho ukuze kuliwe noZuma njengoba nohulumeni wobandlululo wenza wakha umthetho kaSobukwe, owawulwa naye.”UZuma akazange afike ezothula ubufakazi kwikhomishini ngenyanga edlule okusho ukuthi akazange ahloniphe nencwadi eyayimyalela ukuthi ayofakaza emuva kokuba iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ithe akayihloniphe.Le nhlangano ithe uZondo uyawuziba umthetho nendlela okumele usebenze ngayo ukuze aqinisekise ukuthi ikhomishini ithola uZuma enecala.Iphethe ngokuthi: “Siyoyicela ivuthiwe.”
title: UZondo usebenzisa amandla ukuze kuboshwe uZuma: JG Foundation

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMfundoKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, uxwayise ngokuthi bazoyikhotha imbenge yomile othishanhloko abayekise ukuthi kufundwe izifundo ezinzima ezikoleni zabo, bafaka ezilula ngoba befuna kuphaswe kakhulu.Ethula inkulumo yakhe enkundleni yokucobelelana yezinsuku ezimbili yothishanhloko abangaphansi kweSadtu eCoastlands Hotel eThekwini izolo, uMshengu uthe bonke othishanhloko abenze lokhu kumele bazilungiselele ukubhekana nolaka lwakhe.“Ngiyazi ukuthi phakathi kwenu bakhona othishanhloko abenze lokhu, kumele ngabe kumanje bashaye ulayini lapha kumina bazoxolisa,” kusho uMshengu.Uthe akusizi ngalutho ukujaha ukuthi abafundi baphase kakhulu kodwa bebe bengazi lutho.“Izinombolo zokuphasa azisho lutho, into ebalulekile ukuthi sikhiqize abafundi abazokwazi ukuthi babe wutho kusasa, angimelene nenkolo kodwa le nto yokufundisa izifundo zeBhayibheli ezikoleni ayisizi ngalutho,” kusho uMshengu.Kunothisha abaningi lapha KwaZulu-Natal abayekisa ukuthi kufundwe i-Maths ne-Science ezikoleni zabo ngoba befuna ukwenyusa izinga lokuphasa labafundi babo.Kuthiwa othishanhloko bayakwazi ukuzinqumela ukuthi iziphi izifundo ezizofundwa ezikoleni zabo ngoba bebona uhlobo lwabafundi abanalo.Kule nkundla yokucobelelana yezinsuku ezimbili, othishanhloko abangaphansi kweSadtu babhunga ngezindlela ezingasetshenziswa ukuze kuphuculwe imfundo.“Emakhaya nasemalokishini kusagcwele izingane zabantu abamnyama ngeke uthole izingane zalezi ezinye izihlanga zifunda ezikoleni zethu.“Ikhona into emphakathini ethi izikole eziningi eziphethwe ngamalungu eSadtu azenzi kahle, zikhungethwe izinkinga, kubangwa nezikhundla, kumele le nto isikunyelwe.“Akumele kuthi ngoba ubaba wakwaMshengu udipha izinkomo endaweni bese eyakhethwa afakwe esigungwini esilawula isikole.“Kwi-SGB kumele kufakwe abantu abazokwazi ukubamba iqhaza kuthuthukiswe imfundo yezingane zethu,” kusho uMshengu.UNobhala weSadtu KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Nomarashiya Caluza, uthe iyabakhathaza indaba yamalungu omphakathi abuka izikole njengezindawo zokwenza inzuzo.“Kunosomabhizinisi abanganendaba nemfundo kodwa obathola ezikoleni baze baphazamise nokufunda ngoba befuna ukuhlomula ngenkani ezinhlelweni zentuthuko ezisuke zikhona ezikoleni,” kusho uNksz Caluza.
title: UMshengu ugxeke othishanhloko

text:
SIZWE BLOSEU MSAKAZI osanda kuqashwa yiMetro FM ngemuva kokuthi u-Azania Mosaka eyishiyile wajoyina iPower FM, uthi usondelene kakhulu noNkulunkulu futhi njalo ngeSonto ufundisa uSonto-sikole ebandleni lakhe iMethodist Church of Southern Africa (Weseli).USiphokazi January uthi angenza konke okungamhlanganisa nezingane ezincane ngoba uyazifela ngazo futhi ngeke umhlukanise nazo.“Nginayo nami ingane engiyithanda ukufa, igama layo nguMbali. Ngimthatha njengesibusiso esivela kuMdali,” kusho uSiphokazi, ongena ngo-9 kuya ku-12, kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu, ohlelweni i-
Full Circle.USiphokazi uthe uzalelwe e-East London kodwa uhlale ezindaweni eziningi ezise-Eastern Cape, angabala kuzona iMolteno asuke khona wayohlala eGrahamstown kanti useke wahlala kancane eThekwini naseKapa.Le ntokazi enephimbo elimtoti ithi kwakudala yayinesifiso sokungena emkhakheni wezokungcebeleka kodwa ikubekile emqondweni ukuthi uma kungenzeki izogcina yenza izifundo ze-Psychology.USiphokazi uthe izinto zaqala ukumhambela kahle ngesikhathi engena e-University of Cape Town (UCT) enza izifundo zeDrama athi wazikhetha ngoba ebona ukuba nomfutho kwakhe.“Ngiqede e-UCT ngenza izifundo zokwethula izinhlelo. Ngibe nenhlanhla yokuhlangana noKeith, eMonsoon Lagoon engavele ngamtshela emehlweni ukuthi uyangidinga kwithelevishini, kwathi uma kuvela ithuba labethuli bezinhlelo ngazithola ngingomunye wabo,” kusho uSiphokazi.USiphokazi ungene kwithelevishini eneminyaka engu-19, uthe uma ephuma kuyona wajoyina iTru FM ayichaze njengenyuvesi yomsakazo kuyena njengoba yamfundisa konke.“ITru FM beyisondelene kakhulu nekhaya lami, ngifike kuyona ngenza uhlelo lwasebusuku ngagcina ngingena ngo-12 kuya ku-3 ntambama. Angifuni ukuqamba amanga ngikuthokozele kakhulu ukusebenza kwi-Tru FM,” kusho uSiphokazi.Ebuzwa ukuthi uzizwa kanjani njengoba esekwi-Metro FM, uthe usazama ukungena athi khaxa kuyona. Uveze ukuthi izingqinamba ahlangabezana nazo nsuku zonke zimenza abaqonde kahle abalaleli beMetro FM kanti naye ziyamkhulisa kakhulu.Uphethe ngokuthi labo abafuna ukugcina befane naye kumele bazi ukuthi wonke umuntu unendlela okumele ayihambe empilweni, ngakho-ke kuhle ukuhamba indlela engakahanjwa ngabantu abaningi ukuze ubeke induku ebandla.
title: OweMetro FM uyamazi uMdali

text: UNOBHALA-JIKELELE weNkatha, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, usephakamise ukuthi iMeya yaseThekwini, uNkk Zandile Gumede, ihoxe esikhundleni sokuqhoqhobala izintambo kulo mkhandlu ukuze kuqhubeke uphenyo. Esitatimendeni asithumele abezindaba, uHlabisa ubuye washaya ikhwelo lokuba kunephenyo oluzimele ukuze kuphenywe kabanzi ngenkohlalo ngemuva kokuboshwa kukaNkk Gumede ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo. “Iqiniso lokuthi kunamakhansela angu-62 athinteka enkohlakalweni lokho kuchaza ukuthi ingakanani inkohlakalo ekhona. Asingabi nabantu abafuna ukuwaka uhulumeni nomasipala bethu. Asikho isidingo sokuzwela nanoma wubani ozama ukuqola imali yomphakathi. Umuntu ohlela ukuxhaphaza imali yomphakathi kufanele angaqhubeki nokusebenzela uhulumeni,” kusho uHlabisa osanda kuhosha imfe esikhundleni sobumeya kuMasipala waseBig 5. “Kufanele sibhekane ngqo nalaba abafuna ukuqola imali yomphakathi. Abaqhubeka nokuntshontsha imali yomphakathi kufanele bakhishwe kwiThekwini Metro futhi kuvunyelwe abaholi abaqotho bahole lo mkhandlu.” Uthe iNkatha ikholelwa ukuthi inkohlakalo iyisihlava esibulala iNingizimu Afrika. “Yimpi edinga kuliwe nayo...i-IFP ikholelwa ukuthi indlela okungaliwa ngayo nenkohlakalo ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi bathola isijeziso esinzima labo abalahlwa ngamacala. Impi uyokulwa nenkohlakalo eThekwini kufanele iqiniswe manje ngaphambi kokuba ingcolise wonke umphakathi.” UHlabisa ubuye waphonsela i-ANC inselelo yokuthi ithumele umyalezo ocacile ngenkohlakalo nabaholi ababolile. “IMeya yaseThekwini kufanele inikezwe isikhathi sokugxila kulezi zinsolo. Uphenyo luzophazamisa ubuholi bayo kwiMetro. Imibandela yebheyili izomphazamisa emisebenzini yayo. ITheku lidinga umholi ongeke ephazanyiswe yilutho njengoba idolobha libhekene nohide lwezinselelo.”Eqhuba uHlabisa uthe ukulwa nenkohlakalo akufanele kugcine nokushiwo kodwa kufanele kubonakale nangezenzo. “I-IFP inxusa amaHawks (oKlebe) ukuba babhekane nalolu daba ngaphandle kokusaba nokuchema. Sisalindele ukuhlazwa kwababantu okwathenjiswa nguMnuz Mluleki Ndobe ngemuva kokukhululwa estokisini ngezinsolo zokubulala. Wathembisa ukudalula amagama abantu abasenzise impahla kahulumeni ukumbheca ngobende. Aze (uNdobe) akhulume, ifu liyohale lisekhanda lakhe.
