Siyethemba icala leMeya yaseThekwini ngeke lihambe njengelikaNdobe elihudula izinyawo. Akunyakazwe manje,” kuphetha isitatimende sikaHlabisa.
title: INkatha ithi ayihoxe iMeya ephenywayo

text: UBALISA ngobunzima bokuhlowa nsuku zonke ngenxa yeCovid-19, uJohn Maduka  oqeqesha iBloemfontein Celtic. ubalisa ngobunzima bokuhlolwa nsuku zonke ngenxa yeCorona.Lo mqeqeshi uveze lokhu ngaphambi komdlalo wamanqamu phakathi kwezakhe ne-Orlando Pirates ozobe useMoses Mabhida Stadium kusasa, ngo-6 ntambama.Ngokusho kwalo mqeqeshi odabuka eMalawi, kulukhuni satshe selokhu bebuye ekhefini elidalwe yigciwane wathi ukuhlolwa kwabadlali kuphazamisa izinhlelo zabaqeqeshi kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL).“Isimo esinzima kabi lesi, angifuni ukuqamba amanga. Okokuqala nje singabaqeqeshi sinohlelo esisebenzela phezu kwalo, olumbandakanya nabadlali esisuke sizobasebenzisa emdlalweni wethu olandelayo. Selokhu siqale ukuhlolelwa igciwane, awazi noma umdlali othile (mhlawumbe obalulekile ngokwezinhlelo), uzobe ekhona yini ngosuku lomdlalo ngoba kungathi uma kubuya imiphumela uthole ukuthi utholwe enegciwane. Ngakho kuphazamiseka izinto eziningi. Kwenza umsebenzi ubenzima kakhulu singabaqeqeshi. Kunyomfeka izinhlelo ngisho, nokuxoxa nje kahle nabadlali akukho kahle kwazise nendlela yokuziqeqesha yehlukile kuleyo esiyejwayele,” kusho uMaduka.Ziya kowamanqamu, iPirates ayikaze yehlulwe selokhu kuqale isizini. Kodwa uma kungaya ngokuzethemba kukaMaduka obexoxa nezintatheli ngoLwesibili, eZimnyama zingazithola zisenkingeni uma zizoyizela ngobuso iCeltic.“Sifunde lukhulu sidlala neMamelodi Sundowns kowamanqamu kwiNedbank Cup. Bekukhona abadlali abebeqala ngqa ukudlala kowamanqamu, nokwenza abanye bangazinza kahle besaba. Kodwa manje sebenaso isipiliyoni sokudlala kowamanqamu. Uma ungabuza mina, hhayi akusavumi ngilinde. Sengifisa ngabe sekuwusuku, ukuze izohlangana yehlukane. Sibhekene neqembu elingakaze lehlulwe siyavuma kodwa kuhle kakhulu ukuthi sidlale imidlalo yase-Afrika kwiCAF Confederation Cup.  Nalapho sithole isipiliyoni esehlukile esizosidinga kulo mdlalo. Sihlome sizingovolo,” kusho uMaduka ngokuzethemba.IPirates  yagcina ukunqoba isicoco kumasizini ayisithupha edlule ngeNedbank Cup.ICeltic yagcina ngo-2012 ukunqoba isicoco seTelkom Knockout yehlula iSundowns ngo 1-0,  eMoses Mabhida Stadium.“Abantu abaningi balindele ukuthi iPirates isehlule vele. Kulungile siyakwemukela lokho. Kodwa kufaka ingcindezi kuyona iPirates, hhayi thina,” kusho uMaduka emamatheka kancane.
title: 'Kunyomfeka izinhlelo ngenxa yeCovid-19'

text: KWAMUKELWE ukumiswa kwesikhulu esiphezulu sesikhwama esixhasa izitshudeni ngemali ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, iNational Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS), uMnuz Steven Zwane, obesolwa ngokungasiphathi kahle lesi sikhwama.Lesi simemezelo senziwe okhulumela isikhwama, uMnuz Kagisho Mamabolo, othe uZwane umiswe ukuze kungaphazamiseki uphenyo oluqhubekayo.“Ukuze kungabi nokuphazamiseka kophenyo, uZwane umisiwe luze luphothulwe. Umlawuli weNSFAS, uDkt Randall Carolissen, usemkhankasweni wokubuyekeza ukulawulwa kwalesi sikhwama njengokomyalelo kangqongqoshe,” kusho uMamabolo.UNobhala jikelele weNehawu, uMnuz Zola Saphetha, uthe bebesekhaleni befuna uZwane ukuthi asuke kulesi sikhundla njengoba kumele ngabe kade axoshwa.Uthe kumele kube nezinguquko ezinqala kulesi sikhwama, angabuyeli kusona.“UZwane ubambe elikhulu iqhaza njengoba kunenhlekelele kulesi sikhwama izitshudeni zingaxhasiwe. Sifuna kwenziwe uphenyo ngokuqashwa kwabangani nezihlobo okwenziwe nguZwane,” kusho uSaphetha.UZwane umiswa nje akukapheli nonyaka engenile kulesi sikhundla esashiywa nguMnuz Msulwa Daca.Kwenzeka lokhu nje kusanda kushiya uSihlalo webhodi lalesi sikhwama, uMnuz Sizwe Nxasana.Nenhlangano yezitshudeni iSasco nenhlangano elawula imikhandlu yezitshudeni ezikhungweni zemfundo, iSaus bezilokhu zihlabe ikhwelo lokuthi uZwane asuswe kulesi sikhundla zikhala ngokuthi izinkinga zidalwe nguyena kulesi sikhwama.Okhulumela uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, uNkk Naledi Pandor, uMnuz Lunga Ngqengelele, uthe ngumlawuli onamandla okumisa uZwane njengoba iNehawu nezinye izinhlangano zazikhale ngokuthi zifuna uNkk Pandor amsuse kulesi sikhundla.Ngeledlule uNkk Pandor wahlangana neNehawu yezwakalisa ukungenami ngokuthi uZwane akakasuswa kulesi sikhundla ekubeni sekuqokwe umlawuli omusha ngemuva kokuhlakazwa kwebhodi elidala.
title: Kwamukelwe ukumiswa kwesikhulu seNSFAS

text: UMQEQESHI weBidvest Wits, uGavin Hunt, uphakamisa ukuthi kulandwe abadlali asebephanyeke amakhokho emgibeni benziwe onompempe ukuze kuzoxazululeka inkinga yezinqumo ezingagculisi ezikhalise abaqeqeshi abaningi kule sizini ka-2018/2019.UHunt uphume kabuhlungu embangweni wesicoco se-Absa Premiership emuva kokuthi unompempe uPhelelani Ndaba ephike igoli lezakhe bebhekene neSuperSport United ngesonto eledlule.Leli goli ebelishaywe nguTerrence Djukamanja belizokwenza iWits ithole amaphuzu agcwele, ihlale embangweni weligi osusele kwi-Orlando Pirates neMamelodi Sundowns.UNdaba nomsizi wakhe bavumelene ngokuthi ibhola elishaye ipali lagqoma ngale komugqa, aliweqanga. Ngalokhu uNdaba uthole isigwebo sokuyodlalisa ezigabeni eziphansi izinyanga ezintathu nabanye onompempe abane.UHunt akuyena kuphela osale ekhala ngokuphathwa kwemidlalo kodwa noBenni McCarthy ugcine esabisa ngokulaxaza ukuqeqesha eMzansi ngenxa yokuphelela oboyeni okwezithukuthuku zengcanga komsebenzi wabo phakathi nesonto.UHunt uthe abadlali asebeliyekile ibhola bangaba yisixazululo kule nkiyankinga.“Ngeke ngiphawule ngokuthi izinga lokuphathwa kwemidlalo liyabheda noma lihle. Ngicabanga ukuthi onompempe badinga ukuzijwayeza abadlali nendlela eminye imidlalo ephathwa ngayo. Yikho ngihlale ngisho ukuthi baningi ababengabadlali abahlale bekhala ngokuthi abasebenzi, abanampilo. Kungani singabenzi onompempe ngoba ukhona umsebenzi khona. Baningi abantu abakhala ngalokho. Okwangesonto eledlule kugqamile kodwa le nto yenzeka isizini yonke. Thina kusikhinyabezile kule sizini. Kunama-free kick agcine engamagoli obekungafanele abekwe. Lokhu kuyadumaza,” kusho uHunt.“Ngicabanga ukuthi inkinga yonompempe igcwele wonke umhlaba. Ibhola liyashesha manje. Kulula ukushaya eceleni ngezinqumo. Yikho sidinga iVAR ngoba iyasiza, ngabe isisizile ngesonto eledlule. Ngiyayeseka iVAR ngoba ivikela imisebenzi yabantu futhi ithatha izinqumo ezifanele.”IWits, esendaweni yesithathu kwi-log, ihlule iBaroka ngo 3-1 emdlalweni weligi obukade useBidvest Stadium ngoMgqibelo. Lokhu kuyibeke ethubeni lokuyodlala kwiCAF Confederation Cup ngesizini ezayo.Izojoyinwa ozowina iNedbank Cup ezobangwa yiKaizer Chiefs neTS Galaxy ngoMeyi 18 eThekwini. KwiCAF Champions League makhulu amathuba okuthi uMzansi umelwe yiPirates neSundowns.Nokho kungenzeka ukuthi iWits idlale e-Afrika isiqeqeshwa ngomunye umqeqeshi kwazise ayikavuselelwa inkontileka kaHunt eqenjini. IWits kuvele ukuthi ifuna uMcCarthy.“Angazi noma bajabule yini ngami. Sizokhuluma sibone ukuthi sibekana kuphi. Kodwa njengoba izinto zinjena, ngihlelela isizini ezayo ngoba ngiselapha,” kusho uHunt.
title: Isiphakamiso sikaHunt ngasebekumhlalaphansi

text: SESIPHINDE sehlelwa yishwa kwezothando isitabane esaduma ngo-2013 ngemuva komshado waso owazamazamisa umhlaba wonke.UMnuz Thobajobe Sithole owalaxazwa ngumyeni wakhe uMnuz Tshepo Modisane ngo-2015, izolo ubengcwaba isinqandamathe sakhe uMnuz Charles Gumede ehholo eNanda Newtown C. Kuthiwa uGumede obenesifo somdlavuza ushonele esibhedlela ngeledlule ngemuva kokuxinwa ukugula.Inkonzo yomngcwabo ibiphethwe yibandla likaGumede iVictorious Ministries Church International elaziwa njengebandla lezitabane njengoba nomsunguli walo uMfu uZenzi Zungu eyisitabane sesifazane.Udadewabo kaGumede, uNksz Pretty Gumede obehleli eduze kukaSithole enkonzweni unxuse, abantu ukuthi bayeke ukwahlulela izitabane.“Abantu bahlale bethi kuyisono ukuba yisitabane. Bayekeni impilo yabo le. Ngiyalibonga ibandla lakhe iVMCI elilokhu lisisingathe njalo,” kusho uNksz Gumede.USithole uthe uphatheke kabi ngokushona kwesithandwa sakhe aqala ukuthandana naso ngesikhathi eselungiselela ukwehlukanisa.“UCharles bengimbiza ngobaba. Ubeyikho konke kumina. Ukwazile ukungeseka ngesikhathi ngibhekene nobunzima, abangani bami sebengilahlile. Besesihlela ukuthi uma ephuma esibhedlela sizothenga umuzi ngoba bese sifile ukurenta. Ngifike esibhedlela eseshonile, ngakhuleka, ngakhala ngimncenga ukuthi akavuke. Ubesezinhlungwini ezedlulele njengoba ubenesifo somdlavuza wesibindi, amaphaphu nobuchopho,” kusho uSithole.Uhlulekile ukuzibamba wakhihla isililo efundelwa incwadi okuthiwa uyibhalelwe nguGumede ngaphambi kokuthi ashone. Incwadi ibithi angamkhaleli ngoba usesendaweni engcono.
title: Silandelwa yishwa isitabane esishonelwe

text: KUNGASE kuphele unyaka ingazange ibe khona ingqungquthela ye-ANCYL yokukhetha ubuholi bukazwelonke njengoba kumiswe yonke into emuva kokubheduka kwegciwane iCorona. Ingqungquthela ye-ANCYL isihlehle izikhawu ngenxa yokubambezeleka kwamalungiselelo ayo. Umthombo osondelene kakhulu namalungiselelo engqungquthela uthe ngeke ibe khona kulo nyaka, impela sekungaba wumlingo uma ingakhona.Umthombo uthe noma ngabe ayibhedukanga iCorona kodwa bekuvele kunobunzima ngoba mukhulu umonakalo kwi-ANCYL.“Ukuba nengqungquthela akuyona into encane ngoba kufanele kuqalwe phansi kulungiswe amagatsha ezweni lonke. Phela i-ANCYL yinto engekho nje, edinga isineke uma izovuswa kabusha. Asibheke unyaka ozayo ngoba asiboni kulo nyaka,” kuchaza umthombo.Bese kuyizikhawana kubekwa usuku lwayo iphinde ihlehliswe.Ike yakhonjwa ngoDisemba wonyaka odlule kwaze kwathiwa izoba seNasrec, Gauteng, yahlehliswa. Yaphinda yakhonjwa ngoMashi yahlehliselwa uMeyi kodwa kwavela iCorona njengoba ihlehlele isikhathi esingaziwa manje.Kubizwa ingqungquthela ye-ANCYL nje, yingoba ubuholi bayo buhlakazwe ngoJulayi wonyaka odlule emva kwezikhalo zokuthi uphiko lwentsha seluphenduke isithusanyoni.Ubuholi obahlakazwa babuholwa nguMnuz Collen Maine kwesikamengameli, iphini kwakuwuMnuz Desmond Moela, unobhala kwakunguMnuz Njabulo Nzuza (oyiPhini likaNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezaseKhaya) kanti iphini likanobhala kwakungNksz Thandi Moraka.Umgcinimafa wayo kwakunguMnuz Reggie Nkabinde obuye waduma kwezamabhizinisi. Ubuholi babukhethwe ngo-2015 engqungqutheleni eyayisMidrand, eGoli.Bonke badilizwa ezikhundleni kwabunjwa ubuholi besikhashana obuholwa wuMnuz Sibongile Bhesani noNksz Thandi Mahambehlala.Banikwe umsebenzi wokulungiselela ingqungquthela. Izikhundla ezisuke zibhekwe kakhulu esikamengameli nesikanobhala okuyizona ezinamandla.Okhulumela ubuholi besikhashana, uNksz Sizophila Mkhize, uthe impela babambe umoya wokuthi sidlule isiwombe esibi seCorona ngoba bayaphazamiseka.“ Besiza kahle kakhulu, bese sikhethe ngisho isifundazwe ezoba kusona ingqungquthela nakho-ke sesiphazamisike. Uma izwe lingase livulwe siyethemba kusengalunga kulo nyaka,’’ kusho uNksz Mkhize.Uthe uma izwe livulwa ngoJulayi noma nganeno kwawo bazozama ukumpintsha kodwa uma lingase livulwe ngoNovemba kuyoba nzima.Uthe bebeneqhinga lokuthi uma sekukhethiwe bazojuba intsha esesigungwini esiphezulu se-ANCYL ukuthi iyokhankasela i-ANC okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya ngonyaka ozayo kodwa lokhu kuzophazamiseka.Uvumile ukuthi kuwumshikashika ukuhlela ingqungquthela yikho kuthatha isikhathi ngoba ziningi nezinselelo ababhekana nazo.Kwabebebanga isikhundla sikamengameli bekuvela igama lakhe uNksz Mkhize ephonselwa inselelo wuMnuz Mcebo Dlamini.
title: Isiphazanyiswe yiCorona ingqungquthela ye-ANCYL nonyaka

text: KUHLUKENE imibono ngomthethosivivinywa ohlongozwayo, olawula ugwayi. UMnyango wezeMpilo ubuvule uhlelo lokuthi kuphawulwe ngawo, kuxhunywana ngokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe.Ngeledlule uMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli uvule ithuba lokuthi abathintekayo kulo mkhakha baphawule ngokuthi ngabe ezomnotho zizothinteka kanjani, iSocio-Economic Impact Assessment System (SEIAS), uma umthetho ohlongozwayo, iControl of Tobacco and Electronic Delivery Systems Bill, iphasiswa ube wumthetho ngokugcwele.Lokhu kwenziwe kwaqondaniswa nenyanga uMeyi, ngokwekhalenda lezempilo ehlelelwe ukuthi kwenziwe ngayo imikhankaso yokulwa nokubhenywa kukagwayi kuleli, i-Anti-tobacco Campaign.ISouth Africa Tobacco Transformation Alliance (Satta), iyakuchitha ukuthi lo mthethosivivinywa wenziwe ube ngumthetho.Phakathi kwezinye izinto eziqukethwe wumthethosivivinywa wukulawula ukubhenywa kukagwayi, ukudayiswa kwawo, ukukhangiswa kwawo, yizinto okumele zibhalwe emaphaketheni awo nokuthi kumele abukeke kanjani.USihlalo weSatta, uMnuz Ntando Shadrack Sibisi, ephawula ngokuqukethwe wumthethosivivinywa, uthe kuyingozi nobudedengu ukuthi umnyango ucabanga ukugunyaza umthetho ozokwenza ukuthi kuqine imithetho, ekubeni vele le mboni idonsa kanzima ngenxa yokuthi ilahlekelwe yinzuzo, okuholele ekutheni idilize abasebenzi ngenxa yeCovid-19.“Kuyinto eyaziwayo ukuthi le mboni ikhinyabezekile ngenxa yokuthi uhulumeni uke wakumisa ukudayiswa kukagwayi kuleli, ngesikhathi ukuvalwa kwezwe kusesesigabeni sesihlanu. Ukuhlasela kweCovid-19 kuleli kusifundisile ukuthi kumele kulandelwe uphenyo lwesayensi. Nakulokhu sithi ucwaningo lwesayensi yilo okumele lusho ukuthi yini okumele yenziwe ngalolu daba,"  kusho uSibisi.Abadayisa ugwayi ezimakethe ezincane, abeSouth African Informal Traders Alliance (Saita), bathi bayakwemukela ukuthi lolu daba luke lubekwe ezithebeni kudingidwe ngalo.UNobhala weSaita, uMnuz Michael Mokgoja, uthe ukubekwa kwemibono ngalolu daba kufike ngesikhathi esikahle njengoba sekunolwazi olukhomba ukuthi eminye imikhiqizo kagwayi, engashiswa uma ubhema inobungozi obuncane kuneshiswayo."Lolu lwazi lukhomba ukuthi ngempela sidinga ukuholwa wucwaningo lwesayensi, oluzosinika ubufakazi obuyibo ngalolu daba,"  kusho uMokgoja.
title: Bafuna kulandelwe isayensi abakagwayi

text: BAZONGENA bagamanxe emaphaketheni abagibeli bamatekisi nabashayeli bezimoto ngenxa yokunyuka kukaphethroli. Izinhlangano eziphethe ososeshini bamatekisi zimemezele ukuthi izonyuka imali yokugibela kusukela ngoJulayi 2. Uphethroli ukhuphuke ngo-82 cents, udizili wona wanyuka ngo-85 cents kanti kubikwa ukuthi kulindeleke ukuthi uphinde unyuke ezinyangeni ezizayo.Inhlangano yamatekisi, iSouth African National Taxi Council (Santaco), izolo iqinisekise ukuthi izonyuka imali yokugibela kusukela ngenyanga ezayo.“Njengenhlalayenza minyaka yonke imali yokugibela izonyuka ngenyanga ezayo. Ukuthi kulokhu kuvele kwenzeka ukuthi uphethroli unyuke ngale ndlela ngaphambi kokuthi sinqume ngalokhu nokuzochaza ukuthi ngenxa yesimo kungenzeka imali inyuke ngenani elingaphezulu kukaR1 kwezinye izindawo,” kusho uMnuz Sfiso Shangase oyimenenja ehhovisi leSantaco KwaZulu-Natal.Uqhube wathi ukunyuka kwemali yokugibela kuzokwehluka ngokwezindawo kwazise kukhona amatekisi ahamba amabanga amade. Uthe njengenhlangano bakhathezekile ngokunyuka kukaphethroli ngoba kuba nomthelela omubi kubagibeli, abanye babo abagcina sebephoqeleka ukuthi bahambe ngezinyawo noma bathole ezinye izindlela zokuhamba.UMgcinimafa kasoseshini wamatekisi ahambela izindawo ezisenyakatho neTheku uMnuz Bongani Gasela uthe sebevele banqumile bona ukuthi ngeke beqe kuR1.“Ngenxa yokuthi siyasiqonda isimo esizobhekana nabagibeli, sithathe isinqumo sokuthi amatekisi ethu azonyuka ngo R1 kuphela,” kusho uGasela ekhulumela ososeshini bamatekisi ahambela uMhlanga, La lucia neDurban North.Ukunyuka kukaphethroli kuleli kushiye abaningi benemibuzo kwazise bekunenhlansi yethemba lokuthi kungase kuguquke. Isazi sezomnotho uSolwazi uBonke Dumisa sithe ingqikithi yokunyuka kukaphethroli ilele emandleni erandi.“Ngasekupheleni kuka-Ephreli iRandi belihlezi kuR12 uma liqhathaniswa neDollar laseMelika. NgoMeyi iRandi lilahlekelwe amandla lagcina selidlule lagamanxa kuR12 nokungezinye zezinto eziba nomthelela kwinani likaphethroli kuleli kwazise siwuthenga ngamaDollar.” kusho uDumisa.Uqhube wathi ukunyuka kwenani lomphongolo kawoyela lisuka ko $68 ngo-Ephreli laze lafinyelela ku $79 ngoMeyi nakho kube nomthelela omkhulu ekunyukeni kukaphethroli kule nyanga. UDumisa uthe uma iRandi lingase liqine ezinyangeni ezintathu ezizayo kungenzeka uphethroli wehle kodwa amathuba alokho njengamanje abukeka emancane kakhulu.Uqhube waveza ukuthi abantu balindele ukuthi kunyuke namanani okudla ezitolo.Okhulumela inhlangano yabasebenzi iCosatu kuzwelonke, uMnuz Sizwe Pamla, uthe uhulumeni kuzomele ulusukumele lolu daba ngoba seluphenduke inhlekelele ebhekene nezwe.“Ukunyuka kukaphethroli kuzoba yinkinga kakhulu ngoba kamuva nje kusanda kunyuka iVAT ngokunjalo neFuel Levy. Njengamanje ucwaningo luveza ukuthi abasebenzi bachitha u-15% womholo wabo kuphethroli noma kwezokuthutha ngenyanga. Ukuya emsebenzini sekuzobiza kakhulu kanti lokho kuzoba nomthelela omubi njengoba kuzonciphisa imali ebisetshenziselwa ezinye izinto njengokudla emakhaya,” usho kanje.UPamla unxuse uhulumeni ukuthi ungenelele nasodabeni lokunyuka kwemali yokugibela amatekisi namabhasi.
title: Kuzozwela nakubagibeli ukunyuka kukaphethroli

text: UKAPUTENI we-Orlando Pirates, uHappy Jele, ubona isikwati abanaso singakuphinda okweminyaka edlule emqhudelwaneni weCAF Confederation Cup.IPirates izokwamukela i-Enyimba FC yaseNigeria emdlalweni wesibili wesigaba samaqoqo kaGroup A ozoba se-Orlando Stadium namuhla ngo-6 ntambama. Emdlalweni wokuvula esigabeni samaqoqo, iPirates idlale ngokulingana ngo 1-1 ne-ES Setif yase-Algeria.UJele, okunguyena kuphela osele eqenjini elafinyelela kowamanqamu weConfederation Cup ngo-2015 beqeqeshwa ngu-Eric Tinkler, uthe isikwati abanaso kulokhu singakuphinda lokho. Abafana bakaTinkler bahlulwa yi-Etoile du Sahel yaseTunisia kowamanqamu."Kuningi okufanayo phakathi kwaleli qembu nelango-2015 elafinyelela kowamanqamu. Indlela esidlala ngayo nabadlali esinabo. Siyasizana, siyalekelelana. Kungenzeka sithubeleze sifinyelele kowamanqamu, siyiwine indebe. Sinesikwati esihle. Esikudingayo  manje yimiphumela," kusho uJele.Isikwati sikaTinkler sasithakwe ngabadlali okukhona kubona uLucky Lekgwathi, Sifiso Myeni, Thandani Ntshumayelo, Ayanda Gcaba, Kermit Erasmus nabanye.IPirates isendaweni yesibili kuGroup A ngephuzu kanye neSetif. Emsileni kuhlezi i-Al Ahly Benghazi yaseLibya. Eqhulwini kuhlezi i-Enyimba ehlule  iBenghazi kowokuvula."Amalungiselelo ahambe kahle. Sithole iphuzu ekuhambeni. Siyazi ukuthi kubalulekile ukuwina ekhaya. Siyicwaningile i-Enyimba. Siyazi ukuthi iyiqembu eliyingozi. Siyazi futhi lapho ibuthaka khona. Kufanele sisebenze kanzima ukuze siwine kusasa (namuhla). Njengoba sengike ngadlala kwiCaf, kuwumsebenzi wami ukuthi ngibacathulise nabanye. Lo mqhudelwano ubalulekile kimina, ubalulekile naseqenjini. IPirates iyiqembu elikhulu. Ulwazi oluncane enginalo kufanele ngiludlulisele kwabanye ozakwethu," kusho uJele.Endleleni ebheke esigabeni samaqoqo, i-Enyimba igudluze iBloemfontein Celtic yaseNingizimu Afrika.
title: UJele uyayethemba iPirates kweyeCaf

text: IBHANGE lombuso, iSouth African Reserve Bank (SARB) seliveze ukuthi umnotho wakuleli uzoncipha ngo-2% kuya ku-4% kulo nyaka ngenxa yokubheduka kobhubhane iCovid-19.Umphathi weSARB, uMnuz Lesetja Kganyago, uveze lezi zindaba kuleli sonto ekhuluma ngesimo somnotho waseNingizimu Afrika.“Sibhekene nesimo esinzima, ungathi sisephusheni elibi ngenxa yeCovid-19. Umnotho silindele ukuthi ukhule ngo-0.2%. Uzoncipha ngo-2% kuya-4%. Ukuma kwezinhlaka ezehlukene zomnotho izinsuku eziwu-21 ngeke kube nemiphumela emihle kwezomnotho,” kusho uKganyago.Uthe iCovid-19 izoqhubeka ibeke izwe engcupheni ngoba vele umnotho wakuleli ubungenzi kahle.UKganyago uphinde waveza ukuthi ziwu-1 600 izinkampani ezisengcupheni yokuvalwa ngenxa yokukhahlanyezwa yiCovid-19.I-SARB iveze ukuthi kungase kuphele imisebenzi ewu-370 000 ngenxa yalesi simo.UDkt Chris Loewald, oyilungu elibhekele ezezimali eSARB, uthe lezi zinombolo zabangase balahlekelwe wumsebenzi akusho ukuthi sezisemthethweni ngoba zishintsha njalo.Uthe zincike ekutheni izinhlaka ezehlukene zomnotho zizozinza yini emuva kokuvalwa kwezwe izinsuku eziwu-21.Khonamanjalo, iPrudential Authority (PA) okuyinhlangano ebhekele ukusebenza kwamabhange aseNingizimu Afrika, ithe iyayeseka imizamo yamabhange yokulekelela abathengi.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi amabhange agqugquzele abathengi abasebunzimeni kulesi sikhathi ukuthi bawathinte.I-PA ithe kubalulekile ukuthi usizo olukhishwa ngamabhange lutakule abathengi kodwa kulandelwe umthetho, ikakhulukazi uma kukhulunywa ngokwehliswa komthwalo wezikweletu zabantu.Ithe izoqinisekisa ukuthi abantu kabakhokhiswa inzalo ephezulu kulesi sikhathi ngokuchibiyela umthetho othinta izikweletu.
title: IBhange loMbuso lithi sisazoba nzima isimo kwezomnotho

text: UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa izolo ugcizelele ukuthi ukudliwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo akumele kwenzeke ngendlela ezodicilela phansi amalungelo abanye abantu.URamaphosa ukhulume kanje ngesikhathi ehambele idolobha laseTshwane, umkhandlu wayo onganyelwe yiDA.Ekhuluma nabalandeli be-ANC eNew Creation Covenant Church, eCenturion, uRamaphosa uxwayise abantu ukuthi ukubuyiselwa komhlaba kubantu kumele kwenzeke ngaphandle kokubukelwa phansi kwamalungelo abantu noMthethosisekelo.“Kumele senze yonke into ngendlela ehambisana nomthetho nemibandela yoMthethosisekelo wezwe ukuze kuvikeleke amalungelo awo wonke umuntu,” kusho uRamaphosa.I-ANC isanda kweseka isiphakamiso se-EFF ePhalamende sokuthi kuphasiswe ukudliwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo. URamaphosa obehamba noNdunankulu waseGauteng, uMnuz David Makhura, noSihlalo we-ANC esifundeni iTshwane, uMnuz Kgosientso Ramokgoba, uthe ukudliwa komhlaba kuzokwenziwa ngendlela engeke iholele ekutheni kuphazamiseke ukukhula komnotho.“Okwethu manje wukuthi siqinisekise ukuthi izinto zenziwa ngendlela ngaphandle kokukhwabanisa, ngaphandle kokuphula umthetho, ngaphandle futhi kokubukela phansi amalungelo abanye abantu, ngaphandle futhi kokwenza izinto esingeke sifise zenziwe kithina. Indlela yethu entsha leyo,” kusho uRamaphosa.URamaphosa uphinde waveza ukuthi umthetho wokudliwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo uzolungisa okubi okwenziwa emlandweni wakuleli.Uveze nokuthi usekunakile ukuthi uhulumeni awuzisukumeli izidingo zabantu ngokushesha kuleli dolobha. Uthe UMakhura uzohambela izindawo ezithize emphakathini ukuze ezwe izidingo zabantu okubalwa kuzo izindlu.
title: ‘Ukubuyiselwa komhlaba kuzokwenziwa’

text: UDABA lokwanda kwezigameko zokudutshulwa nokubulawa kwezinduna, lungolunye oluzobhungwa wumhlangano wekhabhinethi yaKwaZulu-Natal, iLekgotla.Lo mhlangano oqale izolo, kulindeleke ukuthi uphume nesisombululo kulokhu kubulawa kwezinduna okudla lubi kulezi zinsuku.Lokhu kudalulwe wuNdunankulu uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yokuvula umhlangano ohanjelwe ngongqongqoshe beminyango ehlukene kahulumeni wesifundazwe, izimeya zomasipala bezifunda kanye nezikhulu eziphezulu eminyangweni kahulumeni wesifundazwe.Izinduna eziningi esifundazweni zilala obenyoni njengoba sekudutshulwe, kwabulawa izinduna ezingaphezu kuka-25, kusukela ngo-2019. Ukwanda kwezigameko zokubulawa kwezinduna zekudale ukuthi inhlangano yezinduna Ubumbano Lwezinduna, inxuse ukuba uhulumeni wesifundazwe aqale ikhomishini ezophenya ngokubulawa kwezinduna.UMnuz Phakamani Dlamini wale nhlangano, uthe unethemba lokuthi lo mhlangano uzonquma ukuthi kusungulwe lekhomishini.“Sizobeka phambili ubufakazi nembangela yokubulawa kwezinduna uma sekusungulwe ikhomishini. Siyazazi izizathu zokubulawa kwezinduna, ” kubeka uDlamini.UZikalala uthe nakuba kuthe ukwehla kancane ukubulawa kosopolitiki, kepha bakhathazekile ngesibalo esiphezulu sokubulawa kwezinduna  namakhosi. “Sibona sikhula ngendlela eyisimanga isabalo sezinduna namakhosi ababulawayo. Lolu daba kufanele lusukunyelwe ngokushesha,” kusho uNdunankulu.UZikalala uthe bazozama ukuhlanganisa amasu okudala ukuthula embonini yamatekisi.“Imboni yamatekisi ilokhu ibhekene nodlame isikhathi eside. Imboni yamatekisi iyibhizinisi eligcwele kakhulu abantu abamnyama, nokuyibo abakhahlanyezwa yilolu dlame. Uma sifuna ukuba nozinzo kulesi sifundazwe, kufanele sibhekane nodlame lwamatekisi.”Lo mhlangano ozophothulwa namhlanje, kubhekeke ukuthi uqhamuke namaqhinga okutakula omasipala besifundazwe abangaphansi kweso lomlawuli. Bangu-11 omasipala abangaphansi kweso lomlawuli.Kulabo masipala kubalwa uMsunduzi, uMzinyathi, Mtubatuba, iNquthu, uMkhanyakude nabanye.UZikalala uthe njengohulumeni wesifundazwe, kumele bathole amasu okutakula omasipala abakhungethwe yizinkinga. Umhlangano uzobuye ugxile ekudalweni kwamathuba emisebenzi, ukulwa neCorona, ukulwa nobugebengu nokuhanjiswa kwezidingo ezinjengamanzi nogesi kubantu.Lo mhlangano uza sekusele isikhathi esingaphansi kwesonto uZikalala ethule inkulumo yesifundazwe iState of the Province Address, azoyethula ngesonto elizayo. Ezinye zezinto ezibhungwa kulo mhlangano kulindeleke ukuthi azimemezele kwinkulumo yakhe uZikalala.
title: Luzodingidwa kwiLekgotla elokubulawa kwezinduna

text: UNgqongqoshe woMnyango weMfundo eyiSisekelo, uNkk Angie Motshekga nongqongqoshe bezeMfundo kuzo zonke izifundazwe zakuleli, sebememezele ukuthi wuGrade R, 6 no 11 kuphela abazobuyela ezikoleni ngoMsumbuluko kaJulayi 6.Phambilini ungqongqoshe wayethe ngoMsombuluko kuzobuyela uGradeR, 1,2,3,6,10 no11 kodwa konke lokhu kujikile namhlanje.Umkhandlu oweluleka ungqongqoshe okuyiCouncil of Education Ministers, ehlanganisa yena uNkk Motshekga, yiphini lakhe nabanye ongqongqoshe  bezemfundo kuzo zonke izifundazwe, banqume ukubuyekeza lesi sinqumo.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo, uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga uthe kunemibiko emihlanu okuye kwamele idingidwe emhlanganweni nalo mkhandlu kaNgqongqoshe ngaphambi kokuthi kuthathwe isinqumo.UMhlanga uthe uNkk Motshekga uzokhuluma kahle nomphakathi ngalesi sinqumo ngale mpelasonto. “Ngemuva kokuthi ibhekwe yonke imibiko, iCEM ithathe isinqumo sokuthi kube wuGrade 6,11 noGrade R kuphela abazobuyela ezikoleni ngoMsombuluko ngoJulayi 6 2020," kusho uMhlanga.Uthe lesi sinqumo sithinta zonke izifundazwe. Amanye amabanga wona ayoze abuyele ezikoleni maphakathi noJulayi ngezindlela ezahlukene.Uqhube wathi eminye imibiko edingidiwe ebithinta indlela okuzofundwa ngayo ibanga nebanga, ukubhaliswa nokwesekwa kwabafundi abanqume ukuthi bahlale emakhaya kodwa abangabhalisiwe ngaphansi kohlelo lokufundela emakhaya. Ukwesekeka kwabafundi abanezifo ezinochuku nokubheka isimo saleli gciwane jikelele.Uthe uNkk Motshekga uthe indlela okuzoshintshwa ngayo indlela yokufunda izohambisana nezinselelo izwe elibhekene nazo ngalesi sikhathi seCovid-19.
title: Ingwiji ngokubuyela kwabafundi ezikoleni ngoMsombuluko

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZE"KANGINGABAZI ukuthi lapho ekhona, uRocky Madlala ongasekho ugxuma yedwa injabulo uma ebona Abafana Bes'thende belihlikihla kanjena ibhola"La mazwi Isolezwe liwatshelwe inkakha eyayidlalela iLamontville Golden Arrows, uNhlanhla "Popo" Mshibe ongomunye wabadlali abalima indima enkulu ngesikhathi inyuselwa kwiPremiership ngo-2000.UMshibe ikhono lakhe elabonwa uMadlala ngo-1996 wayengumphathi we-Arrows, bedlalela iHigh Parama Junior Aces yaseMlaza benoBheka Phakathi (ongasekho emhlabeni) , uthe kuyamjabulisa ukubona i-Arrows ibuyela ezimpandeni zayo, idlala ibhola elihehayo.Uthe abafana baseLamontville abaphekwa, uMandla Ncikazi, bamkhumbuza izinsuku zabo zakudala, beyihlikihla kuthule umoya nozakwabo abanjengoLucky "Y2K" Sibeko, Goerge Khanyile, Bonang Ngaka, Nhlanhla Mncube, noLesley Langa.NgoLwesithathu  leli qembu likaMato Madlala, lishaye ngo-2-1 iTshakhuma maqede lalala isibili kwi-log yeDStv Premiership. Ligudluze i-Orlando Pirates ngamaphuzu awu-35."Labafana badlala leli bhola elalithandwa uBra Mich (esho uMadlala). Wayethanda ibhola elimnandi elihambisana nemiphumela emihle. Kwakuba muncu ekhempini uma sihluliwe. Sengathi umoya kaMadlala ovunguza ekhempini ye-Arrows ungaqhubeka njalo," kubeka uMshibe oke waqeqesha nezinkulisa ze-Arrows ngo-2008 kuya ku-2014.Mayelana nakubona kuyimfihlo yokwenza kahle kwe-Arrows, uMshibe onguthisa e-Ukukhanyakokusa Primary School, eNewtown A, eNanda, eThekwini, uthe: "Abekho abadlali abanamagama. Abadlali bayo bakulambele ukudlala, basafuna nokuzakhela igama. Ngisho nomqeqeshi, uNcikazi uyambona ukuthi usafuna ukuzakhela elakhe igama. Akafuni ukuphoxa umama uMato, leli thuba ulibambe njengezikhali zamaNtungwa. Okunye okusiza uMandla ukuthi iningi labafana adlala ngabo ubazi njengoba ezazi, eminyakeni edlule ubebaqeqesha kwizinkulisa zayo i-Arrows. Nobuholi beqembu uyabona ukuthi bumeseka ndlela zonke. Wonke umuntu ujabule, nabadlali bayabahlonipha abaqeqeshi.”Ngemuva komdlalo weTTM, uNcikazi uthe uthandazela ukuthi ezakhe zibambe umgqigqo ezikuwo."Angifuni kwenzeke okwasehlela emasontweni edlule. Sanqoba  iQ2 kwathi emdlalweni olandelayo sashaywa iBlack Leopards. Ngethemba ukuthi sizoya kolandelayo weCity (Cape Town City) imiqondo yethu  isesimeni esifanele,” kusho uNcikazi.Lo mdlalo ungoMashi 20 ozayo, eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont.
title: Inkakha incoma i-Arrows ngokubuyela ebholeni layo lamzukwana

text: USAZIWAYO obalwa nabantu abalwa ngempumelelo nomdlavuza, uXolani Gwala usenxuse uhulumeni ukuthi ulaphe umdlavuza njengoba wenza ekulapheni abanegciwane lengculazi, ukuze kwehle isibalo sabantu abashona ngenxa yawo.UGwala onomdlavuza osulawulekile emuva kokuthola ukuthi unomdlavuza wamathumbu uthe: “Kufanele umdlavuza ulashwe njengoba kulashwa abanegciwane lengculazi.Abantu bakhuthazwe ukuthi bahlole, bese behlolwa ngokushesha, uma sebehloliwe balashwe.Uhulumeni ukwenzile lokhu ngegciwane lengculazi futhi kufanele ukwenze kumdlavuza,” kusho uGwala.Uthe akakholwa ukuthi ngabe waphila ukube walinda isikhathi esibuye silindwe ngabanye abalashwa umdlavuza kwezinye izikhungo zezempilo zikahulumeni.Uthe akalindanga ukuthi athole ukulashwa nge-chemotherapy futhi akalindanga ukuthi ahlinzwe konke kwenzeka ngesikhathi.UGwala, ongumaskazi we-702 ubehambele umkhankaso kahulumeni wokuqwashisa ngomdlavuza obusezinkundleni zemidlalo KwaCaluza, eMgungundlovu uwuncomile umkhankaso kahulumeni. Kodwa uthe kubalulekile ukuthi kuqiniswe izinhlelo zokulashwa, ukuba khona kodokotela abelapha umdlavuza nokunye.Ekhuluma naleli phephandaba ngokuphathwa umdlavuza uthe wayengazitsheli ukuthi ungamphatha. Uthe wayesiza abantu ababenomdlavuza ngaphambi kokuthola ukuthi unawo kodwa engazitsheli ukuthi ngelinye ilanga angaba ngomunye wabo.Uthe ngesikhathi ethola ukuthi sesimhlasele wayengenalo ithemba.“Into yokuqala engazibuza yona ukuthi ngiyokwazi yini ukumelana nawo (umdlavuza) nokuthi ngiyoke ngiwunqobe yini,” kusho uGwala.Uthe umdlavuza wawuthola ususegabeni sesine okuyisigaba esinzima ngoba wawuqale emathunjini waze wangena nasesibindini.Uchaze ubunzima abhekana nabo ngesikhathi elashwa ngohlelo lwe-chemotherapy, ehlinzwa izikhawu ezinhlanu emathunjini nasesibindini.Unxuse nabantu ukuthi basheshe bakusukumele ukuhlolwa njengoba yenakwaze kwadingeka alashwe nge-chemotherapy, aze ahlinzwe izikhawu ezinhlanu ukuphuza ukuhlola. Uthe umndeni wakhe waba wusizo kakhulu ngoba, umeseka ngaso sonke isikhathi.
title: Ufuna kusukunyelwe inkinga yomdlavuza

text: USOKOLA ngokuqhathwa abezindaba baseNingizimu Afrika nomqeqeshi amhloniphayo uSteve “Mphathi” Komphela weKaizer Chiefs uLuc Eymael oqeqesha iFree State Stars. Lo mqeqeshi waseBelgium, uthi ukube uyilolu hlobo oluntekenteke ngabe kade washiya kuleli ngendlela aphatheke ngayo ngeminyaka yakhe yokuqala kodwa uyazifela ngePremier Soccer League (PSL) futhi uyakholelwa ekutheni kunesizathu sokuba seNingizimu Afrika.Lo mqeqeshi ofike kuleli ezopheka iPolokwane City ahambe kuyona sekuswelakala ozogadla, uke wathi qu kwiBloemfontein Celtic kodwa wagcina engavumelekanga ukusebenza kuyona ebanjwa izinqumo ezithathwe yikomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe lePSL ngodaba lwakhe neCity.Njengamanje ugila izimanga neFree State evale unyaka ihleli endaweni yesihlanu. Kungenxa yalezi zimanga lo mqeqeshi esebalwa nabaphambili okuyibona abangase bathathe umsebenzi kaKomphela ophelelwa yinkontileka uma kuphela isizini. IStars ivale unyaka ngokucoboshisa i-Orlando Pirates neSuperSport United ekhaya.Nakuba la mahlebezi ethe ukukhuphuka ngaphambi kukaKhisimusi, u-Eymael umile ekutheni akekho oseke wamthinta ovela kwiChiefs. Ngemuva komdlalo weChiefs neFree State ophele ngo 1-1 eThekwini muva nje, aqalile la mahlebezi akhomba u-Eymael esihlaweni sobukhosi kuMakhosi. Kuliqiniso ukuthi ayibukeki izovuselelwa inkontileka kaKomphela uma iphela ngaphandle uma ezoba nenhlanhla afake isicoco seligi neseNedbank Cup ekhabetheni ungakasahyi uJuni wonyaka ozoqala.U-Eymael ukuphikile kuleli phephandaba ukuthi unenkinga yokuthi kufanele akhethe ukuthi uyashiya yini eFree State ngoba iChiefs iyamfuna noma uyahlala.“Angazi banjani abezindaba. Bazoyibhebhethekisa le nto kuze kube sengathi yinto ekhona kanti akekho umuntu weChiefs oseke wangithinta kumbe ababheke izindaba zami. Kubuhlungu nje lokhu ngoba kuzongiqhatha noKomphela okungumqeqeshi engimhloniphayo. Akumnandi ukumataniswa komunye umuntu nomsebenzi wakho ukhona. Ngeke ngibhule ukuthi ikusasa lingiphatheleni kodwa ngingakusho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi ngineme ngakho konke kwiFree State. IChiefs noKomphela ngiyabahlonipha.”U-Eymael usephendule i-Ea Lla Koto yaba ngelinye lamaqembu asatshwayo kwi-Absa Premiership kwazise abasagcini ngokucindezelana uma useGoble Park kepha sebenqoba nasekuhambeni. Okunye okuhlukile ngeStars ukukhululeka kwabadlali basesiswini osekwenze kwagqama nabadlali abafana noSinethemba Jantjie naye okhonjwa kwiChiefs.
title: Ukhala ngezinkulumo ezimqhatha noKomphela amhloniphayo

text: SIBHEKENE nezikhathi ezinzima kwezomnotho ngenxa yeCovid-19, kunyuke isibalo sabangasebenzi.Izinkampani ezincane nezinkulu ziphoqeleke ukuthi zivalwe noma zehlise isibalo sabasebenzi.ICovid-19 ilethe ushintsho olungalindelekile olwenze ukuthi i-International Monetary Fund yehlise umnotho wamazwe ahlukene.Ukusindisa impilo yabantu uhulumeni uze nemithetho yokuvala izwe ephazamise ukusebenza kwamabhizinisi kodwa ibibekelwa ukuthi amabhizinisi asize umnotho wezwe ukuze ube sesimeni esifanele.UNksz Pearl Bengu, oyisikhulu esiphezulu kwi-Ithala Development Finance Corporation, uthe isikhungo sabo sinomlando wokuthuthukisa umnotho nosomabhizinisi ngokubalekelela ngemali.Uthe banohlelo lokubalekelela kulesi sikhathi seCovid-19 ngoba bazoqhubeka nokuxhasa osomabhizinisi namakhasimende.“Sinethemba lokuthi ukuvulwa kwezinhlaka ezithile zomnotho kuzoletha ushintsho kanti noxhaso lwezinkampani ezizimele luzolekelela umnotho ukuze usimame. Asikho isikhathi esidlula uJulayi okuyinyanga yokonga lapho kufanele sigqugquzele ukuhlelwa kahle kwemali ukuze amabhizinisi aphumelele.”Ngezansi kunamasu okulungiselela izinhlelo zebhizinisi-Ukufunda ngemali: Zinike isikhathi sokuthuthukisa ulwazi lwakho ngemali.Ulwazi ngemali lusiza osomabhizinisi ukuze bakwazi ukubala imali engenayo, ephumayo, bakwazi nokonga nokuqonda ngezikweletu.-Ukuphatha imali: Yiba nohlelo olucacile lokuphatha imali noma ngabe unomcwaningi mabhuku. Kufanele uhlale ubheka izindlela zokusebenza kangcono ebhizinisini okubalwa ubuchwepheshe besimanje obenza ungasebenzisi amaphepha kodwa ubhale izinto kwikhompyutha. Yazi ukuthi inkampani yakho isebenza kanjani.Uthe kubaluleile ukuthi wazi ukuthi inkampani yakho ilandela imithetho yezohwebo neyomkhakha osebenza kuwo ngoba kuyadingeka ukuthi ube nalobu bufakazi uma udinga usizo lwemali ezikhungweni ezehlukene noma uyofaka ithenda.Isibonelo nje uma inkampani ifuna ukusebenza nohulumeni kufanele ibhalise kwiCentral Supplier Database (CSD). Qinisekisa ukuthi izinto zakho zisesimeni ngokuvakashela * -www.csd.gov.za noma uthumele i-email [email protected]-Kufanele wehlise izindleko zokusebenza ungazitholi usunezindleko ezingenasidingo.-Sebenzisana nabanye ozakwenu. Ningasebenzela ehhovisi elilodwa noma ungasebenzela ekhaya uma ukwazi. Uma ungenaso isiqiniseko sokuthi inkampani yakho ingasebenzela ekhaya kufanele uthinte umasipala ukuze ukuchazele ngezinhlelo zokusebenza komhlaba.“Ithala linezindawo ezehlukene osomabhizinisi abangasebenzela kuzo.-Uma usebenza wedwa yiba nezinhlelo ezibhekelela ingomuso uma kuwukuthi awukwazi ukusebenza.-Funda ukonga imali, ube nemali ebhekele izidingo zebhizinisi nenye oyongayo ezokusiza uma ubhekana nezikhathi ezinzima.-Yiza nezinhlelo ezintsha ezizokhulisa ibhizinisi lakho, usebenzisane nabanye abanomqondo ofana nowakho ukuze uthole amathuba.“Sinezinhlelo zokusiza abesifazane, abantu abasha nabaphila nokukhubazeka okubalwa umncintiswano Inkunz’Isematholeni Youth in Business.”-Qinisekisa ukuthi ukhokha imali efanele uma udinga izidingo ezithile.“Sikhona ukulekelela osomabhizinisi, ungavakashela nasehhovisi lethu. Sinezinhlelo ezihlukene zokusiza osomabhizinisi okubalwa nalapho sisebenzisana khona noMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha nezeMvelo. Siyabasiza nabanezipaza nezitolo emalokishini nasemakhaya.”Uthe Ithala liyasebenza, wanxusa ukuthi kubanjiswane ukuze kwakhiwe amabhizinisi azothuthukisa umnotho waKwaZulu-Natal.
title: Ithala nohlelo lokusiza ngesikhathi seCovid-19

text: UYAYICHITHA eyeKaizer Chiefs umdlali wasemuva uMarc van Heerden ohlukane isigubhukane naMaZulu ekupheleni kwesonto eledlule.USuthu lukhiphe isitatimende luveza ukuthi selufinyelele esivumelwaneni sokuhlukana kwezindlela noVan Heerden obebuyele eMbelebeleni ekuqaleni kwesizini ka-2018/2019. Ubesayine emva kokuchithwa yi-Orlando Pirates. Ubesasalelwe yinkontileka yesizini noSuthu.Ngaphambi kokubuyela kuMaZulu, ubexoxa neChiefs ebithungatha umdlali wasemuva kwesokunxele obezovala isikhala sikaTshepo Masilela.“Sihlukane kahle naMaZulu akukho okubi. Okwamanje ngisaya eholidini nomndeni wami. Ngithole elinye iqembu elingithembise engihlulekile ukukwenqaba. Kodwa ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi akuyona iChiefs, “ kusho uVan Heerden.Kuze kube yimanje iChiefs isasayinise abadlali ababili okungumgadli uLazarous Kambole waseZambia noJames Kotei waseGhana obedlala kwiSimba SC yaseTanzania.Nakuba uVan Heerden engafuni ukuyikhulumela eziko eyeqembu azogijima kulona ngesizini ka-2019/2020 kodwa kungenzeka avumbuke eKapa komakoti be-Absa Premiership iStellenbosch ephekwa nguSteve Barker owayeqeqesha uVan Heerden kuMaZulu kumasizini edlule.IStellenbosch, ewine iligi yeNational First Division (NFD) ithungatha abadlali abangomakadebona ezoqinisa ngabo iqembu.“Okwamanje angikwazi ukunekela izwe lonke kodwa ezinsukwini ezizayo lizokwaziwa ikhaya lami elisha. Ngisekhona ebholeni,” kusho uVan Heerden.IStellenbosch kumanje ihlola uRheece Evans wodumo kwiMaritzburg United ogcine ukubonakala ebolekiswe kwi-Ajax Cape Town yiMamelodi Sundowns.AmaZulu asanda kubuyisa umgadli uLehlohonolo Majoro obegijima kwiBidvest Wits. Leli qembu laseThekwini livalelise ingwazi uSiyabonga Nomvethe osewagaxa emgibeni amakhokho akhe.
title: Uzovumbuka kwelinye iqembu uVan Heerden

text: UTHOLWE ebulewe ngasemfuleni uMsunduzi owesilisa obesolwa ngokudlwengula umshana wakhe (20) e-Ashdown eMgungundlovu, izolo.Lo wesilisa, igama lakhe elingeke lidalulwe ukuvikela umshana wakhe, kuthiwa kufike amaphoyisa ezombopha ngezinsolo zokudlwengula azithela phezu kwesidumbu sakhe sintanta emfuleni uMsunduzi, khona e-Ashdown nokusolwa ukuthi udutshulwe ngabantu abangakaboshwa.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe uvulelwe icala lokudlwengula umshana wakhe okuthiwa umthathe ngoMsombuluko ngenkani esitobhini setekisi ekade ephelezele unina wamfaka kwenye indlu yakhe wamdlwengula emkhombe ngesibhamu.Umshana kuthiwa utshele umndeni ngokwenzekile bavula icala lokudlwengula.Amaphoyisa kuthiwa izolo anikele e-Ashdown eyobheka umsolwa ukuze ambophe ngezinsolo zokudlwengula, azithela phezu kwesidumbu sakhe sinamanxeba okudutshulwa.Isihlobo sikamufi nomshana esikhulume neSolezwe izolo, naso esingeke sidalulwe, sithe bese kuphele unyaka uninalume wentombazane ephume ejele ngecala lokudlwengula namanye amaningi obugebengu.“Ngizwa manje ukuthi utholwe ebulewe angazi kwenzekeni ngoba besisalinde ukuthi aboshwe ngecala lokudlwengula indodakazi kadadewabo.“Ubecashile selokhu kwenzeka isigameko ngoMsombuluko.“Asazi ukuthi ubengenwe yini ngoba unesikhathi esingaphezu konyaka aphuma ejele ngawo amacala okukhona kuwo elesibhamu, elokudlwengula namanye. Sisadidekile ngokwenzekile,” kusho isihlobo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe bekuphenywa icalalokudlwengula, umsolwa watholwa esebulewe.“NgoDisemba 17 kuvulwe icala lokudlwengulwa kowesifazane odlwengulwe ekhonjwe ngesibhamu wumsolwa amaziyo. Namhlanje (izolo) kutholwe isidumbu sikamsolwa sinenxeba lokudutshulwa. Kube sekuvulwa necala lokubulala esiteshini sasePlessislaer. Uphenyo luyaqhubeka,” kusho uCol Mbele.Kwenzeka lesi sigameko nje Isolezwe lithole ukuthi ngoMgqibelo kudlwengulweenye intombazanyana eneminyaka engu-11 khona e-Ashdown.Ikhansela lakule ndawo, uMnuz Dumisani Phungula, lithe likhathazekile ngokwanda kwezigameko zokudlwengulwa kwabesifazane.“Asihambisani nalesi sihlava sokudlwengulwa kwabesifazane kule ndawo. Kuyadumaza ukuthi izigameko ezinje ziyanda.“Siyakhala kakhulu nangokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa. Kunamathaveni avulwa ubusuku nemini nesisola ukuthi nakho kunomthelela ekwenzekeni kwalezi zigameko.“Emasontweni amabili adlule besimashele esiteshini samaphoyisa siyokhala ngakho ukuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane,” kusho uPhungula.Ikhansela lithe lizwile ngokudutshulwa kobesolwa esigamekweni sokuqala sokudlwengula.Lithe belisabikelwe amaphoyisa nalo lizolandela ukuthola ukuthi kwenzekeni.
title: Kubulawe obesolwa ngokugila umshana

text: UKUVEZA kukaWayne Rooney ukuthi uzimisele ngokulandela abalingani bakhe adlalele nabo i-England, uFrank Lampard noSteven Gerrard ekuqeqesheni, kuchaza ukuthi leliya lizwe lisethubeni lokuhloma ngesizukulwane sabaqeqeshi abanomlando ocebile.Ingahlomula kakhulu i-England hleze ibuyise nodumo luka-1996 enqobe ngawo iWorld Cup ikakhulukazi uma lezi zinsizwa zingase zizuze njengabaqeqeshi isigamu salokhu ezikwenze zisadlala.ULampard, odlalele iChelsea iminyaka engu-13 wamela ne-England kusuka ngo-1999 kuya ku-2014, ugila izimanga njengomqeqeshi weDerby County kwiChampionship.UGerrard, yena odlalele iLiverpool kusuka ngo-1998 kuya ku-2015 ngaphambi kokuyozilahla kwiLA Galaxy e-USA wamela ne-England phakathi kuka-2000 no-2014, ucija iRangers yaseScotland.Ngokuyogaxa amakhokho akhe e-USA uRooney usevele uqalile ukulandela ezinyathelweni zalabo bhuti bakhe.UGerrard udlale imidlalo engu-34 kwiGalaxy ngaphabi kokuthi khumu kanti uLampard ubasele amagoli angu-15 kwiNew York City phakathi kuka-2015 no-2016.URooney usonyakeni wokuqala wenkontileka yeminyaka emithathu neDC United. URooney noLampard baphethe amarekhodi amagoli amaningi emlandweni weManchester United neChelsea.URooney umatasa neziqu zokuqeqesha ze-Uefa B kanti uzimisele ukuhamba e-USA eseklame ibangana kulo mkhakha.“Ibhola yinto engiyaziyo. Yilo engilenze impilo yami yonke. Ngicabanga ukuthi kuyishwa nje ukubona abadlali abalisebenzele kahle njengami, abalidlale kusukela ebuncaneni, ubone uma sebeyeka (ukudlala) bavele balifulathele.”“Yindlela (ukungena ekuqeqesheni) yokuqhubeka nokuqhudelana. Iningi labadlali lithuthela ekuhlaziyeni kwiTV, nokuyinto engingeze ngalwisa umuntu ngayo kodwa ngibona sengathi abanye balabo badlali banolwazi oluningi olungasebenziseka kangcono emdlalweni ukuba bangene ekuqeqesheni.“Sinabaqeqeshi abasebancane bamaNgisi ababeyizinkunzi zabadlali kwi-England eminyakeni engu-10,15, 20 edlule. Sengathi kade sakugcina lokho. USteven Gerrard noFrank Lampard sebengene ekuqeqesheni kanti noMichael Carrick useyalandela njengoba simbona engena kwesokuqeqesha kwi-United”URooney uyaphela yinsini uma kuvela eyokuthi ubukeka ezoba ngumqeqeshi ongasineki nabadlali.“Kuzoba ngabadlali,” kusho yena. “Indlela enhle yokuqala njengomqeqeshi wukwethembeka kubadlali bakho kodwa futhi ubazi abadlali bakho nokuthi kumele ubaphathe kanjani. Ngicabanga ukuthi indlela yokuphatha abadlali kwesinye isikhathi ibaluleke ukwedlula ukuqeqesha okwenzisayo.”ULampard usanda kunqoba uJose Mourinho, owayemcija kwiChelsa, emkhipha kwiCarabao Cup ne-United kanti noLampard uyahlonishwa eScotland.Enye ingqwele okubhekwe ingene ekuqe-qesheni nguJohn Terry odlale noLampard kwiChelsea nosanda kuwagaxa emgibeni amakhokho.
title: Unephupho lokuqeqesha uma engasadlali

text: UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo kuzwelonke uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi usexwayise ngokusabalala kwesifo okukholakala ukuthi sitholakale ekudleni, iListeriosis okuthiwa sesibulale abantu abangu-36 eNingizimu Afrika.Ekhuluma nabezindaba ePitoli izolo uMotsoaledi uthe kukholakala ukuthi lesi sifo sitholakale ekudleni.Uthe kusuka ngoJanuwari 1 kuya kuNovemba 29 balinganiselwa ku-557 abahlolelwe lesi sifo kuzo zonke izifundazwe.Izigameko eziningi ezibikiwe zibikwe eGauteng (345) kwalandela iWestern Cape nezigameko ezingu-71 kwase kuba iKwaZulu-Natal ebike izigameko ezingu-37, izigameko ezinye zibikwe kwezinye izifundazwe.Kulezi zigameko ezingu-557 ezibikiwe zingu-70 eziqinisekisiwe.Ezigamekweni eziqinisekisiwe balinganiselwa ku-36 abantu abashonile.UMotsoaledi uthe u-34% wezigameko ezingu-557 ezihloliwe, uhlolwe ezikhungweni ezihlola uketshezi ezizimele. Ezingu-66% zihlolwe ezikhungweni zikahulumeni.“Njengoba kungu-17% kuphela wabantu baseNingizimu Afrika abasebenzisa izikhungo zezempilo ezizimele, lesi sibalo sezigameko ezibikwe yizikhungo ezizimele siphezulu kakhulu. Lokhu kukhombisa ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi sitholakale ekudleni size sisabalala.“Kungenzeka ukuthi sitholakale ekudleni okusatshalaliswa kakhulu kubantu ngokuhlukana kwamazinga abo,” kusho uMotsoaeledi.Isikhungo esicwaninga ngezifo iCentre for Disease Control and Prevention sichaza iListeriosis njengesifo esibucayi kodwa esilaphekayonesivikelekayo.Uthe amalungu omphakathi angathinta ucingo lwezimo eziphuthumayo kwi-NICD ku-011 386 2000 ngezikhathi zasehhovisi uma benemibuzo ngalesi sifo. Abasebenzi bezempilo bangashayela ku-082 883 9920.
title: Isifo esesibulale inqwaba kuleli

text: UMLINGISI osafufusa waKwaMakhutha, eThekwini, uSamantha Zulu, uthole ingqayizivele yethuba lokucijwa ngumdidiyeli wamafilimu odume umhlaba wonke uTyler Perry.USamantha (23), owenza unyaka wesithathu kumunxa weLanguage Practice eDurban University of Technology, uthe uthole leli thuba ngokungenela inhlolokhono ebiyenziwa kuleli ebizwa nge-International Arts Talent Showcase ngo-Agasti kulo nyaka.“Ngibe sengithola isitifiketi esibizwa nge-overall actor esenze ukuba ngidlulele ekuhlungeni kwamanqamu kukazwelonke obekuseGoli ekuqaleni kwale nyanga lapho ngihlungwe khona nguKim Meyers, ongumqondisi we-Arts Convention noRhavynn Drummer ongumqondisi ohlonza ikhono kwiTyler Perry Studios.“Ngibe sengikhethwa uKim Meyers ukuba ngiyoveza ikhono lami kwi-Arts Convention ese-Orlando Florida e-USA ngoJulayi ngonyaka ozayo.”UTyler wazakhela udumo ngefilimu ethi Why Did I Get Married nethi Diary of a Mad Black Woman njengoba esezokhombisa ngethi Nobody’s Fool, Vice nethi A Madea Family Funeral.Khona maduze uzotheleka kuleli ezodidiyela ifilimu ezokhuluma ngempilo yesitshudeni sase-USA esasifunda e-University of Western Cape kodwa esabulawa ngokugxotshwa ngamatshe futhi sagwazwa u-Amy Biehl ngo-1993.Leyo filimu izobizwa ngokuthi The Year Of The Great Storm.Nakuba kunjalo kodwa injabulo kaSamantha isheshe yashabalalisa okwamazolo ebona ilanga njengoba kufanele azithwalele zonke izindleko zokuya kulo mbuthano wamaciko amazwe ngamazwe.“Ngicela nanoma ngubani ongangisiza ukuze ngithole uxhaso lokuya eNew York bese ngidlulela e-Orlando Florida. Uhambo lwami seluhlangene ludinga imali enguR100 000. Mina ngahlungelwa ukulingisa nokukhangisa ngengqephu.“Le mali izobhekana nezindleko zokuya nokubuya E-USA, ukuthamela ama-bootcamps, uqeqesho nezinkundla zokucobelelana ngolwazi, ngibambe iqhaza kwingqungquthela yamaciko bese ngenza nokuthathwa kwezithombe."
title: OwaseDUT uzocijwa nguTyler Perry

text: NGEMUVA kwezinyanga iPremier Soccer League (PSL) ingathi vu ngecala elabekwa i-Orlando Pirates ngemuva kokuthi abalandeli bayo bephazamise umdlalo wayo we-Absa Premiership neMamelodi Sundowns wangesizini edlule, igcine isikhiphile isinqumo.NgoLwesine iPSL ikhiphe isitatimende esiveza ukuthi leli qembu litholwe linecala ngalesi senzo esenzeka ngesikhathi lithelwa ngesibhaxu sika 6-0 yiSundowns emdlalweni owawuseLoftus Stadium, ePitoli ngoFebhuwari.Nokho  isigwebo asikhishwanga. Kuthiwe ikomidi eliqondisa izigwegwe lizohlangana ngonyaka ozayo lapho kuzodingidwa ukuthi yisiphi isigwebo esifanele eZimnyama.Icala leSundowns ngesigameko esifanayo nalo kuthiwe lizohlalelwa ngoJanuwari.Kulo mdlalo kwabonakala abalandeli bePirates kwithelevishini bedonsa izintambo zabakwaSuperSport okwaholela ekuphazamisekeni kokukhonjiswa komdlalo. Abalandeli bagcina sebengena enkundleni umdlalo usaqhubeka.ISundowns isolwa ngokungaqinisi ezokuphepha njengoba kuyiyona eyayingosokhaya.
title: Itholwe inecala lokudlova kwabalendeli iPirates

text: SEKUBALWA amasonto kuqale indumezulu yomcimbi wemfashini wakuleli, iSouth African Fashion Week (SAFW) okulindelwe iqale emasontweni amabili azayo.I-SAFW kulokhu izoqala eProtea Court, eSandton, phezu kophahla lwebhilidi, ngoLwesibili ngo-Ephreli 10.Kulindelwe izicukuthwane ezingaphezulu kuka-9 000 kanjalo nabalandeli bengqephu okubhekeke ukuthi bathenge eminye yemisiko ezohamba phambili.Lolu suku luzobe lugabe nangemisiko yakwaWoolworths.Ngaphandle kwalesi sitolo kuzokhangisa nezinkakha kulo mkhakha, okubalwa uRich Mnisi, Thebe Magugu noWanda Lephoto.Ngosuku olulandelayo ngoLwesithathu emini, ngo-Ephreli 11 endaweni efanayo, inkakha yezokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi kulo mkhakha, u-Eddie Marquez, izocobelela abasiki bengqephu ngamasu okukhulisa amabhizinisi abo kulo mkhakha.Emuva kwekhefu ntambama, kuzobe sekushiyelana inkundla amalebuli amakhulu okubalwa iBeachcult, Lalesso, Judith Atelier noHelon Melon.ISun Goddess izobe igabe ngemisiko yamasizini ahlukene, okubalwa ihlobo nobusika.Usuku luzovalwa yiLoayo art and creations, Palesa Mokubung nabanye. Le mibukiso izoqhubeka kuze kuyolamula usuku lwangesonto.Umsiki wengqephu osenamava u-Andile Cele welebuli eyaziwa kakhulu, iDope, ewuhlobo lwemisiko ebizwa nge-streewear naye ungomunye wabantu abasuke bebhekwe ngabomvu kwiSAFW, yena uzokhangisa ngoMgqibelo.USindiso Khumalo, ungomunye wabasiki bengqephu abahamba phambili emisikweni yabesifazane.Imisiko yabesilisa nabesifazane yangaphansi kulindeleke ukuthi nayo ibonakale kule mibukiso yengqephu esohlwini kulo nyaka.
title: Izicukuthwane kwiSA Fashion Week

text: MHLELI: UMnuz Nhlanhla Mtaka ongumhlaziyi wezepolitiki ngomunye wabahlaziyi bepolitiki engibahloniphayo. Uvamise ukuhlaziya ngokungachemi kodwa ngoMsombuluko ngomhla ka-16 Septhemba ngamuzwa ekhuluma emsakazweni Ukhozi FM ngoMnuz Robert Mugabe neZimbabwe ngamuzwa enhlanhlatha nje.UMtaka wayekhuluma ngeZimbabwe kwazise isanda kuhanjelwa ngusondonzima wakhona kwezobuholi. Wamane wanhlanhlatha wangafuna ukukhuluma iqiniso njengomhlaziyi.Okunalokho wakhetha ukudukisa abantu ngobuholi bukaMugabe ethi akufanele kukhulunywe kabi ngaye kube sengathi akukho okuhle akwenzele abaseZim. NgokukaMtaka akufanele sikhulume kabi ngobuholi bukaMugabe ngoba nathi siyadunguzela, sinjengomuntu ogula nabantu abadle uphoyizeni engawudlanga yena.Wathi iZimbabwe iyasidlula ngemfundo. Ngiyavumelana naye kulokho kodwa akusho ukuthi sekufanele sizisole ngokugxeka ubuholi kukaMugabe. Wathi noma umnotho waseZimbabwe ungemuhle kodwa awukaze ube sesimeni esifana nesaseGreece. Ubuzobheda kanjani umnotho waseZimbabwe mfo kaMtaka ngoba abantu bakhona babaleka bexoshwa yindlala kwangasala muntu owayezoba senkingeni. Iphutha engisola ukuthi uyalenza uMtaka ukuthi uma ecwaninga ngeZimbabwe akalwenzi ucwaningo lwakhe emazingeni aphansi ngokwempilo. UMtaka kunezinto engisola sengathi ubuye ahluleke ukuzikhuluma njengomhlaziyi ubuye azikhulume ngokomuzwa wakhe. Iqiniso lithi uMugabe ushiye abantu baseZim bewumthwalo wamazwe ase-Afrika. Imfundo abanayo ayibasizi ngalutho ngoba abanamali yokuthuthukisa izwe. Uyavuma noMtaka ukuthi abantu bafundile kodwa bafika eNingizimu Afrika benze noma yini ukuze baphile.Uma uhamba ezitaladini zasePitoli ezindaweni zomntakabani ukhangwa izinto zobuciko ezenziwa abantu baseZim. Uma ubabuza ukuthi kungani bebaleka ezweni labo ekubeni benamakhono amahle kanje impendulo yabo ivamise ukuthi ithi izwe labo alifani neNingizimu Afrika. Ngokwabantu baseZim noma iNingizimu Afrika inenkinga yomnotho kodwa ingcono kakhulu kunezwe labo. Nathi sithwele kanzima nje kwezinye izinto ngenxa yokuthi kufanele sizinakekele thina siphinde sinakekele abakwamanye amazwe. Ngamanye amazwi akusisizi thina njengabantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuba nemfundo engcono kwabantu baseZim uma sisabanga nabo ukuqashwa emizini yezigwili zakoSilverton, RiverSide nakoMhlanga.Eminyakeni edlule, phakathi kuka-2000 no-2006, iNingizimu Afrika ibihambisela abantu baseZimbabwe amathani ngamathani okudla. Kuyishwa ukuthi uMtaka njengomhlaziyi wezepolitiki akanalwazi lokuthi iZanu PF kaMugabe ayikaze iluwine ukhetho ngokukhululekile kusukela emuva kuka-1999. Uma uxoxa nabantu baseZimbabwe bathi iZanu PF ukhetho ibiluwina ngaphandle kokuvotelwa. Kunezinkulungwane zabantu ababulawa ngesihluku eZimbabwe befa ezandleni zobuholi bukaMugabe.Kuyimanje nje umndeni kaMugabe uthi ufuna isinxephezelo eqenjini iZanu PF ngendlela uMugabe akhishwa ngayo esikhundleni. Kuyethusa ukuzwa ukuthi noma uMugabe engasekho umndeni wakhe ukhombisa ukungabi nandaba nabantu bakhona kunalokho uzibhekela wona siqu. Ngokwabantu baseZimbabwe, izwe labo liyolunga mhlazane kwathiwa kuyaphela ngeqembu elibusayo njengamanje.Eugene Biyela
title: Wanhlanhlatha uMtaka ephawula ngoMugabe neZim

text: YIZE abafundi bakaGrade 12 noGrade 7 belindeleke ukuba babuyele ngobuningi babo ezikoleni kuzwelonke ngoMsombuluko kodwa abafundi basesikoleni saseMpangeni, iNiwe Secondary abaneme neze. Abasabi igciwane leCorona kuphela kodwa bakhala ngesimo sesikole sabo. Bathi izindlu zangasese zisesimweni esingagculisi kanti amathangi amanzi agcwele ukungcola. Baze bakhombisa i-video abayishuthe kulesi sikole, ikhombisa ukungcola ezindlini zangasese nasemathangini. "Nesimo sekhishi asikho sihle kahle. Empeleni  alikho ikhishi kodwa kuphekelwa ekilasini. Amanzi esiwaphuzayo, uma ehambile empompini angcolile, agcwele udoti." Lo mthombo ongaphakathi uthe okucasula kakhulu othisha nabafundi ukuthi kulesi sikole kukhokhiswa izingane oR300 njalo ngenyanga kodwa akwaziwa ukuthi lemali yenzani. Omunye umthombo nawo ocele ukungadalulwa uthe izindlu zangasese zibhidlikile futhi azinazo izicabha.   "Isikole asibiyeliwe lokho okwenza singazizwa siphephile.  Isikole sigcwala izimbuzi kuze kubengathi kusedlelweni." ABAFUNDI bathi leli ngenye yezindlu zangasese zakulesi sikole Isithombe:SITHUNYELWEUthe lesi sikole asinaye umabhalane nehhovisi likathishanhloko lihlangene  namagumbi abafundi. "Sinenkinga yamanzi.  Uma ehambile kompimpi siyaphoqeleka ukuba sisebenzise amathangi anamanzi amadala futhi angcolile, lokho okungasiholela ekutheni sigule," kuphetha umthombo wesibili. Nawo ukhale kakhulu ngemali ekhokhwa ngabazali ewuR300, ongabonakali umsebenzi wayo. Nomunye umzali unxuse uMnyango wezeMfundo usizi lwabafundi bakulesi sikole. Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, uvumile ukuthi sezifikile nakubona izikhalazo ngalesi sikole. "Sithole izikhalazo kumfundi othe ufunda eNiwe Secondary. Sibe sesithumela abantu bethu ababhekene ngengqalasizinda esifundeni kodwa basinikeze umbiko othi izindlu zangasese zisesimeni esihle," kuphetha uMlotshwa.Nakuba kunjalo kodwa imithombo ishaye phansi ngonyawo yathi ngamampunge lawo. Yanxusa uMnyango wezeMfundo uzifikele mathupha khona uzozibonela ngawawo usizi olukhungethe abafundi baseNiwe.
title: Basabela impilo yabo abafundi basesikoleni saseMpangeni

text: UMHOLI osabambile we-International Pentecost Holiness Church (IPHC) ufuna lulalelwe ngokushesha udaba lombango wobuholi baleli bandla emuvakokufa kwamalungu amahlanu adutshulwe elinye iqembu laleli bandla ngoMgqibelo.UComforter Leonard Modise ohola olunye uhlangothi lwaleli bandla oluzinze ekomkhulu eliseSilo eZuurberkom, eGauteng, utshele izintatheli ukuthi izinkantolo kufanele zilulalele ngokushesha udaba lombango ukuze kume ukuchitheka kwegazi.“Siyabonga ukuthikufike izintatheli, sicela abomthetho basilekelele ngoba uma singasizwa yibona akekho ozosilekelela. Sicela inkantolo ilulalele ngokushesha lolu dabangoba siyibandla elibalulekile asihambisani nokuchitheka kwegazi,” kusho uModise.USihlalo webandla uMnuz Abie Modise uthe ngoMgqibelo kungene amadoda abehlome ephelele ahlasela ebandleni kwafa abantu abahlanu kwalimala kabi oyedwa.“Abantu abahlasele lapha ngabohlangothi lukaMichael Mandlana, abaqali ukuhlasela amalungu ebandla ngoba naseCape Town bake balimaza abantu. Umbango wokuhola ibandla uqale ngo-2016 emuva kokushona komholi webandla uComforter Glayton Modise. Inkantolo yaqoka ubuholi besikhashana yacela ukuthi abanezinkinga babikele ijaji. Siyaphoxeka uma sebehlasela kanjena,” kusho uModise.Ucele amaphoyisa ukuthi aqhubeke nokugada ibandla ngoba kade babebika izigameko zokuhlaselwa kodwa benganakwa.“Izinhlaka zokuphepha zisebenze kahle izolo (ngoMgqibelo) kodwa ngebhadi kukhona abashonile. Siyacela lolu daba lusukunyelwe njengoba uKhomishana uKhehla Sitole eyalele amaphoyisa ukuthi alusukumele.Kudala sasibika kodwa singanakwa. Siyafisa nenkantolo isheshe ukuluxazulula,” kusho uModise.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe bake bakhuluma yini noMandlana ukuze kulungiswe lolu daba, uModise uthe abakwazi ukukhuluma naye ngoba uwumuntu ovele abe nodlame uma bezama ukuxoxa naye.Amaphoyisa athe kuboshwe abantu abangaphezu kuka-40 okukhona kubo iphoyisa likahulumeni, elikamasipala nesosha.Kushaqwe nenqwaba yezibhamu nezinto zokugqekeza.
title: Bafuna kusukunyelwe udaba lwebandla elibanga ubuholi

text: AKUKABIKWA  monakalo ophikweni labhekelele izinhlekelele KwaZulu-Natal, odalwe wukuzamazama komhlaba okusolakala ukuthi  kwenzeke ekuseni namhlanje, ezindaweni ezakhele iTheku.Lokhu kuqinisekiswe wuNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nobuHoli boMdabu esifundazweni uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, esitatimendeni asikhiphe ngemva kokusabalala kwemibiko ngalesi sigameko.Ngokwemibiko engakaqinisekiswa, lokhu kuzamazama kwenzeke ngehora lesine ekuseni.“Sinxusa umphakathi ukuthi wehlise umoya ngesikhathi lolu daba lusasetshenzwa,” kusho uHlomuka.Uthe sekujutshwe uphiko lababhekelele izinhlekelele esifundazweni ukuthi basebenzisane nabeCouncil for Geo Sciences ukuthola imininingwane egcwele ngalokhu.
title: Phansi amaphaphu ngokuzamazama komhlaba - uHlomuka

text: USIHLALO weBlack Leopards, uDavid Thidiela, uthi akasazimisele ukuphoxa abantu baseThohoyandou ngokuthi aphinde avumele isimo lapho liyophinde libuyele esigabeni seNational First Division.NgoLwesithathu iLidoda Duvha ibuyele esigabeni sePremiership ngemuva kweminyaka engaphezulu kwemihlanu igidagida kwiNFD.Amaphuzu aqinisekisa ukubuyela kweLidoda Duvha kwiPremiership iwathole ngokushaya iJomo Cosmos ngo 1-0, eThohoyandou Stadium, ngoLwesihlanu ntambama.Exoxa neSolezwe ngoMgqibelo ngempumelelo yeqembu lakhe uthe ngobusuku iqembu elikhuphukele ngalo kwi-Absa Premiership ulalise okwengane ngemuva kwesikhathi eside engasabazi ubuthongo ngenxa yale midlalo. “Ukuxhaswa kweqembu ngabantu baseThohoyandou akukholakali ngakho angisazimisele ukubuyela kwiNFD. Angifuni ukuphinde ngiphoxe abantu bakulendawo. Indlela abalisekela ngayo iqembu kuyamangaza, yingakho ngingasazimisele ngokuthi iqembu liphinde lidliwe yizembe."Selokhu kuqale imidlalo okuhlungela inkundla iThohoyandou ibigcwala kusweleke indawo yokuhlala.Ephendula umbuzo wokuthi ngabe bakhona yini abadlali azobasayinisa ukuqinisa iqembu ukuze likwazi ukuzinza kulesi sigaba esixhaswe ngezigidi nesiyisango lokuyodlala kwiCAF Champions League nakwiCAF Confederation Cup uthe ukholwa wukuthi uneqembu eliqnile.“Abadlali enginabo bonke basezingeni elifanele ukudlala esigabeni esikhulu.“ Indawo engizoyibhekisisa eyethimba labaqeqeshi. Ngizohlala nalo phansi ukuze sikwazi ukuqhamuka nomhlahlandlela. Ngibonga bonke abantu abebebambe iqhaza eqenjini kuzona izinhlaka zabo.”Leli qembu libuyele esigabeni esikhulu izintambo zibanjwe ngowaye ngunozinti walo uJoel Masutha, owenze umsebenzi oncomekayo.Ukukhuphuka kweLeopards kuchaza ukuthi isifundazwe iLimpopo sesizoba namaqembu amathathu adlala kwiPremiership.Abantu abalandela imidlalo kanobhutshuzwayo eNingizimu Afrika, bazwakalise ukugculiseka ngokunyuka kweLeopards ngoba vele ibikade iqede isendaweni yesibili.Kunomuzwa kubantu abaningi ophikisana nokudlalwa kwama-play off ngamaqembu amabili aqede endaweni yesibili neyesithathu kwiNFD nelilodwa eliqede endaweni ka 15 kwiPremiership.Abantu bathi kungani amaqembu amabili aqede endaweni yokuqala neyesibili avele anyukele ngenhla, besekuthi kwiPremiership aqede ngokulandelana endaweni ka 15 no 16 avele womabili agawulwe yizembe ayodlala kwiNFD.Uphinde wayichitha imibiko ethi abePSL bayifeyilisile inkundla iThohoyandou ngoba bethi ayikulungele ukusingatha imidlalo yeLigi.
title: Uyaziqhenya ngabadlali bakhe uThidiela

text: MHLELI: Ngicela ukudlulisa isicelo sami kubaphathi bamatekisi asuka eMpangeni aya eGoli. Muva nje, ngifike erenki abantu beme ngezinyawo ngajoyina ulayini, kubhaliswa njengenjwayelo.Obekuhlukile ububhalisa ebese ulinda eside isikhathi, itekisi ingekho. Ngokwami bengihlele ukufika eGoli engakashayi u-8 ebusuku ukuze ngithole izimoto eziyongibeka endlini.Ngebhadi-ke ngihlale eside isikhathi okuthe ngabo-1 emini ngagibela etekisini nayo okuthiwa ayihambeli kulo mzila waseGoli. Ngicabanga ukuthi sase sicelelwe ngenxa yesikhathi eside silindile.Okwasixaka ukuthi sesiseMevamhlophe, kulo mgwaqo oya eNtambanana, sabona ngomshayeli esejikisa imoto - sabuzana sodwa ukuthi ukhohlwe yini ngoba nemali simbonile eyifaka ephaketheni? Wajika nathi wasibuyisela erenki, safika safakwa kwenye imoto.Okungixakile kubaphathi, kungani bengakhiphanga imoto ifike isithathe, siqhubeke nohambo, kunokubuyela erenki sisayovinjwa amabhasi, amatekisi namarobhothi. Ukube bebekhiphe itekisi, kwakungaba ngcono kakhulu kunokujika.Siyacela kubaphathi bamatekisi, basicabangele singabagibeli ngoba asihlali edolobheni sonke, sisuke sisazogibela eGoli. Ngagcina sengiqasha i-Uber, yayongibeka endlini ngemali elinganayo nalena engisuke ngayo eMpangeni.Ngiyacela baphathi bamatekisi, nisicabangele singabagibeli.OkhathazekileEGOLI
title: [IMIBONO] Sicela nisicabangele singabagibeli benu

text: BADEDELIWE abantu abane abebenecoronavirus KwaZulu-Natal njengoba ukuhlolwa kwabo kuveze ukuthi abasenalo igciwane.Lokhu kuvezwe izolo nguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, othe laba sebesemakhaya.“Sebededeliwe ezibhedlela ukuze baye emakhaya. Kunethemba ukuthi uma uke wahaqwa ileli gciwane uyakwazi ukugcina ungesenalo,” kusho uNkk Simelane-Zulu esithangamini sabezindaba izolo emuva kokuba uhulumeni ehlangene nabamasonto ahlukene.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe uLwesine kuleli sonto kuzoba wusuku lomkhuleko njengoba silokhu sinyuka isibalo sabantu okutholakala ukuthi sebehaqwe yiCorona.Siye koshicilela izolo kubikwa ukuthi sebengu-402 abantu abanegciwane.UZikalala uthe bavumelane nabefundisi ukuthi ngoLwesine abantu kumele bakhulekele leli gciwane nabantu abasekhaleni lokwelashwa kwalo.“Nathi njengohulumeni sizobamba iqhaza kulo mkhuleko okuhlelwe ukuthi wenziwe,” kusho uZikalala.Unxuse amaphoyisa ukuba ababophe abantu abangosikhwili phambana nobhoko abenza izinto eziphambene kulezo ezishiwo nguhulumeni mayelana nokunqanda iCorona. “Kuyasikhathaza ukubona abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bephambana nomyalelo kahulumeni besemabhishi bezishutha nezithombe,” kusho uZikalala.UMnyango wezeMpilo usuhlele kabusha izikhathi zokuvashela abagulayo ezibhedlela ngenxa yeCorona. Isikhathi sezivakashi manje sekuzoba ngu-1 emini kuya-2, kusukela ngoMsombuluko kube yiSonto kanti sekufuneka izivakashi ezimbili kuphela ezizobona isiguli.UZikalala uveze ukuthi kusasa bazohlangana nazo zonke izinhlaka ezingeni leziFunda lapho bezobe besabhunga ngeCorona.“Enye yezinto esikhulume ngayo kulo mhlangano wudaba lokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bayanikwa amanzi ikakhulukazi ezindaweni zasemakhaya njengoba siqhubeka nokugqugquzela abantu ukuthi bahlale behlanza izandla zabo,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe njengohulumeni bayihambisela ngamaloli imiphakathi enganawo amanzi.UZikalala uthe luyabakhathaza udaba lomkhumbi weMSC okuthiwa abantu abebekuwo badedeliwe baya emakhaya ngaphandle kokuthi bahlolwe.“Lolu daba sizophinde siluthathe siludlulisele kuNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, siphinde sihlangane nabenkampani iMSC,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe bazokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi yonke imiyalelo kaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa iyalandelwa.“Ngeke size sikuvumele ukuthi umuntu oyedwa, athi yena uzokwenza ngokuthanda kwakhe,” kusho uZikalala.Ukusho lokhu emva kokuthi uMbishobhi odumile waseThekwini uBheki Ngcobo enxuse amaKrestu ikakhulukazi ayiZayoni ukuba aqhubeke nokuhambela izinkonzo zePhasika phezu komyalelo kamengameli othi zingahanjelwa.“Sihlonipha wonke umuntu, ngingasho ukuthi sesithumele ithimba labefundisi ukuba liyoxoxa nalo mfundisi ngoba asifuni ukuthi kube khona umuntu obeka impilo yabantu engcupheni,” kusho uZikalala.UMengameli wenhlangano yamaZayoni, uMfundisi Thulani Gwala, uthe bathuke kakhulu uma bebona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuthiwa amaZayoni ayaphikisana nokushiwo ngumengameli mayelana nezinkonzo zePhasika.“Namhlanje sizothi siphakamisa izandla esizweni sonke, sizothi siyaxolisa kakhulu akuwona wonke amaZayoni asho njalo kodwa ngabantu abathile, ngifisa ukukusho ukuthi singamaZayoni sizokwenza lokhu okushiwo ngumengameli,” kusho uGwala.
title: Kudedelwe abane abebeneCoronavirus eKZN belapheka

text:
US’MANGELE ZUMA uxoxe noMntwana uThulani Zulu, okhulumela iNdlunkulu, ukuthola kabanzi ngalo mnikelo ka-R5 ocelwe yiSilo Samabandla uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzuluYEBO kunjalo, ivulwe ebhange i-Absa. Ngicela ukulungisa sonke lesi sikhathi benginikeza abantu izinombolo ezingaphelele. Izinombolo ze-akhawunti ezifanele zithi 924 198 1117. Igama le akhawunti lithi Zulu Zwelithini Land Prosecution from Repossession, uma ulinqamulela uthi: ZZLPR.KUNGANI iMbumbe iqoke ukuvula i-akhawunti kwa-Absa?OKWAMANJE iSilo asikho kuleli, siseMorocco. Uma sibuya sizovula ama-akhawunti nakwamanye amabhange akuleli. Inhloso yeSilo wukufinyelela kuwo wonke umuntu ongumZulu oseNingizimu Afrika, nangaphandle.NGABE isiqalile ukungena iminikelo?KUFANELE, into ephazamisile wukuthi benginezinombolo ezingaphelele ze-akhawunti esivuliwe. Ngiqale ukubona sengifonelwa abantu bethi banenkinga yokufaka iminikelo yabo ngoba izinombolo ze-akhawunti aziphelele. Ngiphoqeleke ukuthi ngisithinte iSilo ngiqinisekise izinombolo. Umuntu ongaqinisekisa yisona iSilo ngoba imiyalezo yokungena kwemali ingena efonini yaso.KUNGANI iSilo silufake enkantolo lolu daba lomhlaba?NGESIKHATHI kuthathwa lesi sinqumo, akuzange kuxoxwe neSilo. Sibonile ukuthi uma singasukumi sisebenzise izinkantolo, sizozithola siphucwa umhlaba. Umhlaba uyinto enkulu kithina sizwe samaZulu. Siwusebenzisela ukutshala, kudla khona imfuyo yethu, sakhe khona, siphinde singcwatshwe kuwona. Umuntu ongahlali emakhaya ngeke akuqonde lokhu.UTHINI ngabangahambisani nalesi sicelo seMbube?BAKHONA abanemibono eyahlukile. Abantu abakhumbule ukuthi umnikelo lo, njengasesontweni, umuntu unelungelo lokuthi angawukhiphi. Abantu abayeke ukukhipha amagama ayiziswana, baphendule iSilo. Akuyona inhlonipho leyo.OKHULUMELA iNdlunkulu, uMntwana uThulani Zulu, unxuse abantu abangahambisani nesicelo seSilo Samabandla uGoodwill Zwelithini, somnikelo kaR5 ukuthi bayeke ukukhuluma amagama ayiziswana Isithombe: SIGCINIWE
ISILO sifinyelele kanjani enanini lika-R5?SIBONILE ukuthi iyona mali wonke umuntu angakwazi ukuyikhipha. ISilo siyazi ukuthi abantu abaningi bayahlupheka. Abanesifiso sokukhipha engaphezulu bamukelekile ukwenza njalo.NGOBANI abanenkinga enkulu ngokukhipha lo mnikelo?ABANTU abahlala emadolobheni, emhlabeni osikiwe. Abavuka ekuseni baye emsebenzini babuye bayothenga emakethe. Abaphili ngokulima nokufuya. Kungangcono basixolele, bayeke ukukhuluma ngento abangayazi.KUNGANI iMbube icela umnikelo kubantu kube kukhona imali eyithola kuhulumeni?OHLAKANIPHILE uyazi ukuthi iSilo sinikezwa imali esuke ikalelwe izidingo zaso njengokuphucula izigodlo zaso. Le nto ayiqondene nohulumeni ngakho asikwazi ukuthatha leyo mali.
title: "Abasemadolobheni abangayizwa ekaR5"

text: IMARITZBURG United enezinkinga zemali kungenzeka ingalutholi uxhaso lukaR48 million lweminyaka emithathu elucele kuMasipala uMsunduzi, eMgungundlovu, nawo obhekene nezinkinga zemali njengoba umkhandlu usatshiswa ngokuthathelwa izinyathelo zomthetho uma uvuma lesi sicelo..Ngokusho kweMeya yoMsunduzi, uMzimkhulu Thobela, leli qembu lePremier Soccer League (PSL) libabhalele ngo-Okthoba licela ukuxhaswa ngoR15 million, okuyimali le nhlokodolobha yaKwaZulu-Natal engenayo.Nokho usihlalo we-United, uFarook Kadodia uthe empeleni iqembu licele imali enguR48 million weminyaka emithathu.Kuke kwabikwa ukuthi ngenxa yomthelela kwezomnotho weCovid-19, uKadodia uke wacabanga ngokulidayisa iqembu.UThobela uthe udaba luqale ukudingidwa wumkhandlu ngasekupheleni konyaka odlule, lwachithwa. Uthe umkhandlu ngokwawo ukhamekile ngasezimalini, nawo udinga ukuxhaswa ngoR10 billion ukuze ukwazi ukugcina izidingo zokuletha ingqalasizinda.Udaba lokuxhaswa kweqembu lubuyelile kwebekubhungwa ngazo emhlangaweni wangoDisemba 15 obubanjwe kusetshenziswa ubuchwepheshe besimanje.Kuthiwa lokhu kucasule inhlangano yabakhokhintela iMsunduzi Association of Residents, Ratepayers and Civics (MARRC), ekholwa wukuthi idolobha kumele lisebenzise imali ezintweni ezibalulekile kunokuxhasa iqembu lebhola.Phambilini lo masipala ungenelile ngokuxhasa i-United ngezigidi ngemuva kokuvela kwezindaba zokuthi ingase ifudukele kuMasipala iNelson Mandela Bay ngenxa yakho ukuntula imali.UKadodia uthe ukufinyelela esiphethweni koxhaso lweminyaka emithathu umasipala obelufaka, olube ngu-R29.5 million, kusho ukuthi iqembu selizodonsa kanzima.Uthe usexhumane nosomabhizinisi abaningi abazimele ecela uxhaso kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.“Eminyakeni emine sengibe nezicelo ezimbili kodwa ngoba bebefuna ukuthi iqembu lifuduke nganqaba. Sengikwenzile okusemandleni futhi abantu kumele bazi ukuthi lokhu akukho mayelana nokuthi iMaritzburg United ithatha uR16 million ngonyaka. Iqembu lizobuyisela uR8 million kwidolobha,” kusho uKadodia.Uthe uR15 million owokubheka izidingo zokuphathwa kweqembu kuthi uR1 million ube owezinhlelo zomphakathi.Uqhube wathi kuwumqansa ukuthi amaqembu aKwaZulu-Natal athole abaxhasi.UThobela uthe yize idolobha lingenayo imali, kumele kube khona elikwenzayo ukusiza iqembu njengoba likwazile ukubeka idolobha labo ebalazweni lasiza nokukhulisa umnotho.IMARRC ebikhona emhlanganweni wangoDisemba 15, ngoJanuwari 4 walo nyaka, ibhalele uThobela, imenenja kaMasipala uMadoda Khathide, nesikhulu esiphezulu sezimali (CFO), uNelisiwe Ngcobo, icela ukuthi sishaywe indiva isicelo seqembu njengoba nomasipala unezawo izinselelo eziphazamisa izinhlelo zokuthuthukisa umphakathi ngoba nawo awunayo imali. Le nhlangano ithe kuyaxaka ukuthi umkhandlu uze uzihluphe nokuyifaka ezihlokweni ezizodingidwa le ndaba.“IMARRC iyasichitha lesi sicelo futhi inxusa umkhandlu ukuthi usiguqule lesi sinqumo. Iyagcizelela nokuthi kubuyelwe ekutheni ingaxhaswa iMaritzburg United Football Club,” ifundeka kanje ingxenye yencwadi yeMARRC.Leli dolobha eminyakeni edlule lilokhu liphuma lingena ngaphansi komlawuli ngenxa yokuhluleka wukuletha izidingo zomphakathi kangangoba uNdunankulu uSihle Zikalala uze waxosha amalunga ekomiti eliphezulu, wafaka elisha eliholwa uThobela.IMARRC ithe imali ecelwa yi-United kumele isetshenziselwe ukulungisa “amanzi avuzayo, izizinda zikagesi, imigodi emigwaqweni, ingqalasizinda nokulungisa i-SAPS noma kuxhaswe imindeni entulayo ngenxa yeCovid-19 nokuvalwa kwezwe”.Ekhuluma ne-Independent Media Investigations Unit, usihlalo weMARRC, u-Anthony Waldhausen, uthe imali efakwa kwi-United bazoyithatha njengemoshiwe.“Inkinga yalo masipala wukuthi awukwazi okumele ukubeke phambili. Ulungisa ingqalasizinda endala esikhundleni sokwakha kabusha ukuze ibe yintsha. Isiteshi sikagesi siqhumile emasontweni ambalwa futhi ugesi awukabuyi,” kusho Waldhausen.UThobela uthe umkhandlu awukanqumi ngokuxhaswa kwe-United kodwa “ngokwami ngingaluleka” ukuthi umkhandlu usibheke isicelo.“Emhlanganweni wokugcina womkandlu ngakusho ukuthi ukube ngangiyingxenye yomhlangano ngangizowululeka ngokuhlukile. Ngakho ngicela ukuthi udaba lubuyiswe, lubhungwe ngoba ngikholwa wukuthi umkhandlu kumele ubasize,” usho kanje.Uthe ukweseka kwakhe iqembu yingoba yiyona kuphela into enhle idolobha elinayo.“Ngokuhlanganisa umphakathi, alikho nelilodwa iqembu elihlanganise abantu bedolobha. Kuyenzeka uma iMaritzburg United idlala lapho ubona amakhulu ohlanga lwaseNdiya enkundleni, amakhulu amaKhaladi, abangaphezulu kuka-50 abamhlophe nenqwaba yama-Afrika bebhiyoza ndawonye,” kusho uThobela.
title: Kabayizwa eyokuxhaswa ngezigidi kweMaritzburg

text: UMA kukhulunywa ngengoma ethi Jerusalema esidume umhlaba wonke, ifikelwa umunyu intokazi yaKwaZulu-Natal ngemisebenzi kanina.UNomcebo Zikode waseHammarsdale ocula noMaster KG ingoma ethi Jerusalema nosekhiphe i-albhamu yakhe ethi Xola Moya Wami, uveza ukuthi ukube unina wayengekho ngabe kade ayikhohlwa indaba yomculo.Ukuba nekhono lokubhala nokucula bekuyinto alokhu ekhula nayo kodwa ingamchumi. Yingakho eze walahlekelwa yithemba.Kodwa unina uNkk Buyeleni Mfeka-Nkwanyana waqinisekisa ukuthi akalilahli ithemba.“Bengilokhu ngizama ngicula nabantu bengincoma bethi nginekhono kodwa kunzima ingavuleki iminyango efanele. Bengike ngicule ngisho nabaculi abaziwayo kodwa kungahlangani okwami. Umama nomndeni wami wonke nabantu ebebengilandela bebehlala bengikhuthaza bangiduduze ngezikhathi ezinzima. Umama okwakhe bekunzima kakhulu ngoba ubaba washona esangikhulelwe, selokhu aqala lapho ukunginakekela ngazo zonke izindlela,” kusho uNomcebo.Eqhuba uthe ngesikhathi engenela nemincintiswano eqala ezama nokungqongqoza ezinkampanini zomculo ezinkulu kwaba sengathi ufaka usawoti esilondeni ngoba babengakholelwa ekutheni izwi lakhe lingakhipha ulozolo lwezingoma. “Ngicabanga ukuthi babedidwa ukuthi ngingowesifazane onezwi elikhulu kanti bona bajwayele ukuthi abantu besifazane bacula ngezwi elincane. Ngeke ngiqambe amanga ngaze ngafikelwa umuzwa wokushiya phansi kodwa umama elokhu engikhuthaza ecula nami. Kunengoma engayibhala naye esiyicula sobabili engizoyifaka kwi-albhamu elandelayo,” kusho uNomcebo. Eqhuba uthe iXola Moya Wami uyibhale ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa ukuvalwa kwezwe nokuyinto eyamthusa kakhulu.“Ngaphatheka kabi emoyeni wami ngaba nemibuzo eminingi ngempilo ngabhala ngicela uxolo kuNkulunkulu ngezimo zomhlaba. Ngangibheka ukuthi noma singabantu sikholwa kodwa kukhona lapho sibuye siphambuke khona. Ukuhlasela kweCovid-19 nokuvalwa kwezwe ngakuthatha njengolaka lukaNkulunkulu,” kusho uNomcebo.Njengamanje uNomcebo uhleli kunombolo-44 emazweni omhlaba nengoma yakhe ethi Xola Moya Wami nokumenza abe phezulu kwabamele iNingizimu Afrika emculweni.IJerusalema yona selokhu ihamba phambili nangomdanso wayo odanswaumhlaba wonke.Ukusebenza noMaster KG uNomcebo uthe ukuthatha njengesibusiso angasoze asikhohlwa ngoba ukholwa wukuthi uNkulunkulu wabahlanganisa ngesizathu sokuthi baphakamisane ngamakhono abo.Isifiso sakhe esikhulu esokucula ezindaweni ezahlukene KwaZulu-Natal nokuqhubeka abhale izingoma ngesiZulu.
title: Ubonga unina owengoma eyenza izimanga

text:
MLUNGISI GUMEDE U MHOLI we-DA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane uncome lowo owake wakhulumela iHhovisi likaMengameli uMnuz Mac Maharaj, wathi ukhombise ubuholi ngokuphumela obala athi wamluleka uMengameli Jacob Zuma ngokuthi kumele akhokhe ingxenye ethile ku-R246 million osetshenziswe kuqiniswa ezokuphepha emzini wakhe oseNkandla.Engxoxweni ekhethekile ne-
Financial Times, uMaharaj osewasula kuhulumeni ucashunwe ethi uzithole ezikhathini eziningi kumele avikele uZuma ngodaba lwakhe neNkandla ngesikhathi esamkhulumela.Uthe ihlandla lesibili likaZuma ehhovisi likhungethwe udaba lwaseNkandla olungafuni ukuphela, ikakhulukazi ngemuva kokuphuma kombiko kaNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uNathi Nhleko othe uZuma akumele akhokhe ngisho isenti ngokusetshenziswa kuka-R246 million kuthuthukiswa ezokuphepha emzini wakhe.“Ngingasho ngithi udaba lwaseNkandlu ilona olwenze ihhovisi likaZuma labuthaka. Kusukela le ndaba isaqala ngamtshela uZuma ngathi kumele azilungiselele ukuthi akhokhe. Lokhu kwenzeka ngaphambi kokuba kuphume umbiko kaMvikeli woMphakathi u-Advocate Thuli Madonsela, ngaze ngasho ukuthi uma unenkinga, nginesiqiniseko sokuthi kukhona abangafuna ukumsiza ngenxa yesikhundla sakhe. Kodwa wathi cha, angikaze ngithi akuthuthukiswe ezokuphepha emzini wami, ngeke ngikhokhe. Ngangazi ukuthi sinenkani kanjani sobabili futhi ngibazi ubuthaka bethu sobabili. Kodwa okubalulekile ukuthi sizijwayeze umkhuba wokubhekana nezenzo zethu,” uMaharaj ucashunwe esho kanje.Esithangamini nabezindaba eThekwini izolo, uMaimane, uthe wonke umuntu ocabanga kahle ekhanda uyabona ukuthi uZuma kumele kube khona imali ayikhokhayo kwizigidi ezisetshenziswe emzini wakhe.UMaimane uthe kuwukubukela phansi ukucabanga kwabantu bakuleli ukuthi uZuma atshele izwe ukuthi akazi lutho ngezinto ezenziwe emzini wakhe kubalwa isibaya, indawo yokubhukuda, ihhoko lezinkukhu nendawo yokungcebeleka.“Uma esho njalo ngubani owayekhipha imiyalelo ukuthi akwenziwe okuthile ngaphandle kwakhe? Ayikho futhi le nto eshiwo izikhulu ze-ANC ukuthi izinto ezenziwe laphaya eNkandla zenziwe ngoba uZuma enguMengameli. Uma engesesiye uMengameli kuzoba ngezikabani ngoba zenziwe emzini wakhe?” usho kanje.UMaimane uthe akekho uMengameli we-ANC kulabo abangaphambi kwakhe abake benza le nto ayenzile.“Sizolwela ukuthi avele ngaphambi kwekomiti ukuze ezophendula yonke imibuzo esinayo ngendaba yaseNkandla,” usho kanje.Uthe kudlalwe kakhulu ngemali yabakhokhi bentela eNkandla, kumele kube khona okhokhayo.UMaimane uthe bayakuqaphela ukuthi izikhulu ze-ANC seziqale umkhuba wokuthi zininde abanye abantu ngobubende kodwa inyama bengayidlanga.“UZuma uthi akazi lutho ngezinto ezenziwe emzini wakhe kodwa kukhona ngisho indawo yokungcebeleka. Ubani owayethe uyayidinga ngaphandle kwakhe? Simbonile futhi edlala lo mnqakiswano ngesikhathi izimenywa ezazisuka e-India zimenywe umndeni wakwaGupta zifikela eWaterkloof Airbase, nakhona wathi wayengazi lutho ngalolo daba. Icala lagcina selithwalwa abanye abantu. Muva nje bathi abazi ukuthi uphume kanjani kuleli uMengameli weseSudan uMnuz Omar al Bhashir obekumele aboshwe mayelana namacala okuhlukumeza amalungelo,” usho kanje.Ethintwa izolo, uMaharaj uthe ngeke aphawule ngalolu daba akuthintwe i-
Sunday Times ngoba iyona eyaziyo ukuthi utheni.
title: UMaimane uncome uMac ngolweNkandla

text: UGCWELE ithemba umqeqeshi weBlitzbokke, uNeil Powell njengoba ezakhe zibhekene nomqansa wokususa ungabazane ngazo emuva kokuqala kwazo isizini yeHSBC World Rugby Series ngendlela engeyinhle kunazo zonke emlandweni.Kule mpelasonto, iBlitzbokke iseLas Vegas, e-United States of America (USA). Lona ngumqhudelwano ovamise ukuza nenhlanhla kuleli qembu lesizwe kwazise eminyakeni eyisishiyagalombili, iBlitzbokke isidle isicoco eLas Vegas amahlandla amane.Lokhu uPowell ukubona njengomjovo kumbe isinongo sokuvukuza abadlali bakhe babuyelwe ukuzethemba emuva kokuqala ngebatha osekwenze kwaba nongabazane ngokuthi iqembu lizokwazi yini ukuvikela isicoco (somqhudelwnao wonke) salo elisidle nyakenye.NgokukaPowell, ukusheshe bafike e-USA kungaba olukhulu usizo kubadlali bakhe ukuze bandise ithuba lokulungisa wonke amaphutha abaziyo ukuthi kusemqoka ukuba alunge.Kulo nyaka, iBlitzbokke isadlale into ebonakalayo eCape Town kuphela lapho ilale khona isithathu. Lokhu kuhluke kakhulu kunokwaseminyakeni edlule ngoba kuthi kufikwa eLas Vegas iBlitzbokke isuke isiyidlile imizuliswano emibili.Lihlukile nokho iqembu likaPowell kwazise sekukhushulwe nabafana abancane abaningi kodwa lo mqeqeshi ukholwa ukuthi iLas Vegas nomlando wayo kubona ingavukuza okuthile ngaphakathi kubadlali.“Ngeke kufane naseSydney lapho siphumule khona kancane.
