Lolu suku esiluthole lapha luzokwenza umehluko omkhulu ngendlela eyisimanga. Kuningi esizosizakala ngakho ngoba ngisho ukuphambana kwezikhathi kuyabaphazamisa abadlali. Kulokhu konke kuzokwenzeka ngendlela ngakho nginethemba,” usho kanje.Yize iqembu lakhe libunjwe ngabafana abancane, ikakhulukazi kodwa uPowell ujabule ngendlela athi sebengene ngayo bathi khaxa.“Okusele manje ukuthi konke esikwenzayo kube sengathi sizalwe nakho. Ikhona imidlalo esiyiqala kahle kodwa kubhede ngasekugcineni kanti kweminye sivuka indlobane ekugcineni kodwa uthole ukuthi indlela esiqale ngayo isibeke emuva kakhulu,” kusho uPowell.Nakule mpelasonto iyaqhubeka imidlalo yeVodacom Super Rugby lapho kubhekwe khona umdlalo omkhulu weCell C Sharks eqhwakele izokwamukela khona iDHL Stormers ngoMgqibelo ngo-5.15 ntambama, eJonsson King’s Park, eThekwini.Selulonke uhla lwemidlalo yeVodacom Super Rugby lumi kanje:Kusasa:Hurricanes v Brumbies (Central Energy Trust Are, 8.35am); Rebels v Highlanders (AAMI Park, 10.45am).NgoMgqibelo:Chiefs v Sunwolves (FMG Waikato, 8.35am); Reds v Crusaders (Suncorp, 10.45am); Lions v Bulls (Emirates Airlines, 3.05pm); Sharks v Stormers (Jonsson King’s Park, 5.15pm); Jaguares v Blies (Estadio Jose Amalfitani, 11.40am).
title: UPowell nethemba ngeBlitzbokke e-USA

text: MHLELI: Ake ngizwakalise ukukhathazeka kwami ngokuhluphekela amanzi endaweni yakithi eCinci, kwesaKwaMthethwa.Ompompi bomile emagcekeni, amanzi sawagcina ngo-2014 kuzoba wukhetho lukazwelonke. Uma udinga amanzi kufanele uyogwedla ipitsi. Kuyathusa ukuthi eminyakeni engu-24 kusekhona abantu abaswele amanzi nezindlu zomxhaso. Amaloli aletha amanzi afika kanye emuva kwezinyanga ezimbili.Izindlu zomxhaso zabhaliswa, kwafakwa izinombolo, kwakhiwa zangaphela, kume izindonga nje. Lokho-ke kushiya imibuzo yokuthi imali eyayikhishelwe ukwakhela abantu izindlu yashonaphi.Ngiyafisa ukuba izikhulu zomnyango oqondene nokunikezelwa kwamanzi emphakathini nezomnyango wezezindlu zike zivakashele eCinci zibone usizi esikulo.Robert MdladlaECINCI
title: [IMIBONO] Ukuba namanzi kompompi sakugcinango-2014

text: ISIHLOKO: IdandokaziUMCULI: Babes WodumoUHLOBO: Gqom’UMHLAZIYI: Charles KhuzwayoEMUVA kweminyaka emine uBabes Wodumo agcina ukukhipha i-albhamu, ukhuze ibuya ngecwecwe elisha elisihloko sithi Idandokazi.Abanye bazokhumbula ukuthi nge-albhamu eyayithi Gqom Queen, uBabes wanyusa amasokisi kakhulu. Cishe basakhumbula abanye ukuthi yagila ziphi izimanga iWololo kuleli nasemazweni aphesheya. UBabes waze waqokelwa nakumaBET Awards. Wapikwa nakwicwecwe le filimu iBlack Panther.Ngakho kule yesibili, bengilindele ukuzwa uBabes eqhubeka lapho ayegcine khona. Nebala angiphoxekanga neze ngesigubhu, yize bengilindele amanye amaciko athe thuthu ngokwezinga.Nizokhumbula kwiGqom Queen ukuthi kwakuboshelwe noD’Banj waseNigeria kwiWololo Remix noCassper Nyovest kwiFamily. Kulena abagqamile nguMampintsha, Dladla Mshunqisi, Tipcee, TNS noMadanon.Nakuba kunjalo kodwa izingoma ezingichazile ngezithi Zisho, Angeke, eLamont, Abadala, Intombi Yesgebengu, Izitha neWe Mah. Asibonge ukuthi ezingomeni ezingu-13 uMampintsha uzwakala kwezingu-9.Asethembe kweyesithathu nakulawo azolandela uyozwakala kwezimbili noma kweyodwa zwi. Ngisho ngoba kwezinye izingoma uze akhohlwe ukuthi upikiwe. Uma nje ungalalela Intombi Yesgebengu, kuke kuphele imizuzu emithathu kuzwakala yena yedwa. Ungaze uzitshele ukuthi yingoma ekwi-albhamu yakhe. Okunye engikuphawulile wukuthi uBabes ubuye anqene ukubhala ama-gimmicks.Kuvele kube sengathi usuke egcina icala. Lokho kwenza abantu abapikayo bamgqibe kube sengathi nguyena opikiwe.Kungakuhle uma engabuyisa eminye imilolozelo njengoba enza kwiWololo nakwiGandaganda noma acele abanye bamlekelele ngama-gimmicks.Yize kunjalo kodwa yona le albhamu imnandi futhi isiphumuzile kuma-piano. Ngeke ngimangale uma ingaqokwa emiqhudelwaneni yezindondo, ikakhulukazi kwiBest Dance Album nakwiBest Album ngenxa yesigubhu. Uma uzifela ngegqom’, ingakuphutheli le albhamu.
title: Ubuye ngezinkani uBabes Wodumo

text: ZIBAKHALELE onogada abane ngecala lokubulala nelokuzama ukubulala oThongathi.Onogada ababheke umsebenzi kusoseshini iZamukulungisa baboshiwe, baphucwa nezibhamu ezinkulu ezintathu nesisodwa esincane.Laba basolwa ngokubulala uMnuz Simphiwe Lungani Sithole (21), obeshayela imoto ehlaselwe edolobheni oThongathi, ngoLwesibili.Abanye ababili abebehamba nomufi, badubulekile, baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela, omunye akalimalanga.Laba okuthiwa bebebane emotweni, badutshulwe imoto yabo ihamba. Ibe isiphaphalaza, yayoma eceleni komgwaqo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLt. Colonel Thulani Zwane uthe abasolwa bazovela maduze enkantolo.“Abasolwa abane abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-24 no-37 kulindeleke bavele enkantolo yaseVerulam ngecala lokubulala nelokuzama ukubulala. Izibhamu ezithathwe kubasolwa, zizohlolwa ukuthi azikaze yini zibandakanyeke kwamanye amacala,” kusho uZwane.Ayaziwa imbangela yokuhlaselwa kwabagilwa kodwa kusolakala ukuthi kuhlobene nodlame lwamatekisi.Imizamo yeSolezwe yokuthola umndeni kamufi ayizange iphumelele njengoba izinombolo zomndeni wakhe bezingatholakali.
title: Kuboshwe onogada ngelokuzama ukubulala

text: USUHLALE iminyaka nesoka lakho kodwa aliyithi vu eyokuthi livela nini ekhaya nokuthi linawo yini amaphupho okuqala umndeni nawe.Uyazibuza ukuthi ngabe kumele ufele ngaphakathi ulinde usuku ongalwazi noma uqunge isibindi uzibuzele. Baningi abesifazane okuthiwa banabantu abathandana nabo kodwa akucaci ukuthi uthando lwabo lubhekephi. Abanye bagcina beziphathisa okwabashadile ngokubona isikhathi asebesichithile othandweni ngisho noma indoda ingakaze icacise ngezinhloso zayo. Kukhona nabacabanga ukuthi ukuzalela indoda kuyindlela yokuyibamba ukuthi inganyakazi uma bebona ukuthi ayikhulunywa eyomendo. Kuyenzeka lokhu emdlalweni wethelevishini iGenerations: The Legacy lapho uNolwazi (Thando Thabethe) esha amashushu ngokuzalela uMazwi (Musa Ngema) ingane. UNolwazi unethemba lokuthi ukuba nengane kuzoqinisa uthando lwabo noMazwi.Isolezwe lixoxe nabazi kangcono ukuthi akulona yini ichilo ukuthi owesifazane azibuzele endodeni ngekusasa lothando lwabo.UMnuz Madoda Zungu oyisazi sezamasiko uthe kudala kwakuyichilo ukuthi owesifazane azibuzele ukuthi ushadwa nini ngoba bekukhonya izwi lendoda.“Abesifazane bebenamahloni okubuza ukuthi bubhekephi ubudlelwano ngenxa yemfundiso yamaqhikiza. Owesifazane ubehlala ethobela umthetho wendoda ephathiswa okwengane. Indoda ibingaphendulwa futhi ingabuzwa kodwa owesifazane ubelinda ukuzwa ngayo kuyo yonke into,” kusho uZungu.Uthe abanye besifazane bebehlala iminyaka bengaqediwe ukulotsholwa nabo basabe ukubuza.Uveza ukuthi omunye ubegcina aliwe kanti vele ubehlalele into engekho.Ugcizelela ukuthi izinto zishintshile ngoba ngisho abamnyama sebeyakwazi ukuzicelela umshado.UNksz Liziwe Ntshengulana oyiLife Coach uthe akusizi ukuhlalela into ongayazi othandweni. Uthe akuselona ihlazo ukubuza indoda ngezinhloso zayo lokho kukhombisa ukuthi uyakwazi okufunayo.“Wonke umuntu uyamazi umuntu amfunayo nezimpawu azifunayo. Uma indoda ithi iyakuthanda nawe ubona ukuthi inazo izimpawu ozidingayo kumele ubuze zisuka nje ukuthi ikuthandelani. Kumele kucace ukuthi uma nithandana yiziphi izinhloso enazo kunokubala iminyaka engenazithelo,” kusho uNksz Ntshengulana.Uthe abanye besifazane babekezela noma indoda ingayikhulumi eyokulobola ngoba besaba ukuthi izobaleka.“Kungcono indoda ibalekiswe wukuthi ufuna ukwazi iqiniso. Uma ibaleka kuyobe kusho ukuthi ibivele izokushiya noma nini futhi ibingazimisele ukukwenza unkosikazi wayo,” kusho yena.
title: Ngabe ihloseni ngawe indoda othandana nayo?

text: ABUKAPHELI ubuhlungu bokushaywa yiKaizer Chiefs kumqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns uManqoba Mngqithi. UMngqithi uveze lokhu ngemuva komdlalo wabo neBloemfontein Celtic lapho ezakhe zinqobe ngamagoli amabili abaselwe enethini wuPeter Shalulile ngoLwesithathu ebusuku. Linye kuphela iqembu elisashaye iSundowns, esiqede konke ngesococo seDStv Premiership njengoba sekubhekwe emidlalweni yokugcina yeligi; abafana basePhefeni. ISundowns nokho ayikashaywa ekuhambeni , okuyinto emjabulisayo uMngqithi kodwa namanje lisamzwisa ubuhlungu ichashaza elibekwe yiChiefs. “Yirekhodi elihle lelo (ukungashaywa ekuhambeni) kodwa bekungaba ngcobo kakhulu. Ngicangabanga ukuthi besingenza kangcono nasekhaya, sidlale ngokulingana emidlalweni eminingi okuyinto engingayithandisisi, angijabule ngakho ukukhuluma iqiniso nje,” kusho uMngqithi ngemuva komdlalo we’Downs nenePhunya Sele Sele. Lo mqeqeshi uthe ucabanga ukuthi babengadlala kangcono kweminye imidlalo abangayinqobanga, wenza isibonelo ngomdlalo wabo neBlack Leopards athe kwakungemele uphele ngokulingana. “Ukuhlulwa yiChiefs kusebuhlungu namanje kodwa ke abadlali (beSundowns) badlale kakhulu kumele sibabonge.”UMngqithi ubekhuluma ngomdlalo wango-Ephreli nonyaka lapho iChiefs ibashaye ngo 2 - 1 ngemuva kwemidlalo engu-21 bengayazi induku. Ngemuva komdlalo uMngqithi akakufihlanga ukungagculiseki kwakhe ngokushaywa yiChiefs ethi: “Ngicabanga ukuthi leli akusilona iqembu obekumele lisithathele irekhodi lethu lokungehlulwa. Angicabangi ukuthi balwe ngokwanele ukwenza izinto zibenzima kithina. Kodwa ngikholwa wukuthi sizehlule thina.”Emdlalweni wokusonga iligi, iSundowns izobhekana neCape Town City FC esiqeqeshwa wu-Eric Tinkler ngoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama. Uthe ufuna ukuwunqoba nalo mdlalo.
title: Isaqaqamba inhliziyo kaMngqithi ngokushaywa yiChiefs

text: UBEYOTHENGA izimpahla zokudayisa eThekwini, owesifazane osemncane ongomunye wabashone esibhicongweni sengozi edlule nabangu-16 emgwaqweni uR34 ophakathi kweMelmoth noLundi ngoLwesithathu ekuseni.UNksz Nondumiso Dumakude (20) waKwaNongoma, esigodini saKwaBhayela, uvuke izintatha eyolanda i-oda lezinto zokugqoka ephuthuma ukubuya ngosuku kodwa kwagcina kungasenzekanga emva kokuthi ebe ngomunye wabashone kulesi siphihli sengozi.Udadewabo omdala kamufi, uNksz Khethiwe Mhlongo, uthe udadewabo ubedayisa eqongelela imali yokuyofunda ngonyaka ozayo.“Uqede isikole ngonyaka odlule, waqala wadayisa ngezinto zokugqoka abezithenga eThekwini abuye azozidayisa emakhaya, ebekelela imali yokuthi akwazi ukufunda ngonyaka ozayo. Inhloso yakhe bekukwenza izifundo zobuhlengikazi.”Uthe bese zikhona izikhungo ebese zimthathile kanti bese kunethemba emndenini lokuthi uzokwazi ukufeza iphupho lakhe abese elisebenzele unyaka wonke eqongelela.Le ngozi igadle kwezwela emphakathini waKwaNongoma njengoba iningi labashonile kungabantu bendawo.UNksz Nontuthuko Duma (25) wasoPhaphasi khona KwaNongoma naye osale kulesi sibhicongo kuthiwa ubeyolanda isitifiketi sakhe eDamelin.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Mbekezeli Dumisa, uthe udadewabo ubesehlale unyaka efuna umsebenzi awufundela.“Kwehla le nhlekelele nje bese kuntwela ezansi njengoba bese kukhona lapho abesethenjiswe khona.“Uvuke ekuseni kakhulu ngoba ubewumuntu ozobuya, eyolanda nje isitifiketi sakhe ngoba kukhona lapho abenethemba khona,” kuchaza uDumisa obehluleka nokukhuluma.Uthe umufi ushiye ingane yakhe eneminyaka emibili kuphela.UMnuz Themba Ndwandwe (57) okuthiwa ubenguthisha osathatha umhlalaphansi, owayefundisa KwaMaduna Primary, naye ube ngomunye wabashone kule ngozi.IMeya yaKwaNongoma, uMnuz Albert Mncwango, ithe ngesikhathi behambela lo mndeni izolo, batshelwe ukuthi umufi ubephuthuma ukuyolungisa okuthile emahhovisi akwaSouth African Revenue Services eThekwini, ewumuntu ozobuya.UMncwango obehambela imindeni ehlukene eyehlelwe yileli lifu, kulo masipala, uthe ubuhlungu obuzwakaliswa yimindeni ngobokufakwa kwezithombe zabathandiweyo bayo bedindilizile ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, akuchaze njengesenzo esiwubulwane.“Kubuhlungu okwenziwa ngabantu. Ngesikhathi ngiphikelele endaweni yesigameko ngafonelwa yizingane zakomunye umuzi okushone kuwo umama wekhaya, zikhala zithi zibona owesifazane odindilizile egqoke ingubo efana nebigqokwe unina ngesikhathi ehamba.“Siyanxusa umphakathi ukuthi usebenzise izinkundla zokuxhumana ngendlela okuyiyo,” kusho uMncwango.Uthe ngesikhathi behlangene noNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha ukuPhepha nokuXhumana koMphakathi, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, ngemva kwale ngozi, kubunjwe ikomiti elizolekelela imindeni njengoba namuhla behlele ezokuthutha ezithatha yonke imindeni elinyalelwe ukuyokhomba amalungu ayo.
title: Isikhathi esinzima emindenini yabafe esibhicongweni

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEITHIMBA labaqeqeshi leMamelodi Sundowns lizimisele ngokuqopha owalo umlando uma selibhekene ne-Al Ahly kowomlenze wesibili wama-quarterfinal eCaf Champions League kusasa eLucas Moripe Stadium ngo-3 ntambama.Lokhu kuvezwe oliholayo, uManqoba Mngqithi, kwabezindaba izolo ekuseni. UMngqithi uthe abafuni ukubambelela ekutheni iSundowns yabhudluza i-Al Ahly ngo-5-0 ePitoli kumasizini adlule. Uthe konke lokho sekuwumlando. Ngaleso sikhathi uMngqithi wayeyiphini likaPitso Mosimane kumaBrazilians. Manje uMosimane usewumqeqeshi we-Al Ahly. AmaBrazillians abhekene nomqansa wokwehlula amaRed Devils ase-Egypt ngo-3-0 ukuze ezodlulela kowandulela owamanqamu kulo mqhudelwano. Ngempelasonto edlule emlenzeni wokuqala, eCairo, ashaywa ngo-2-0. "Umlando wokushaya i-Al Ahly ngamagoli amahlanu ngeke usisize ngalutho. Kuningi osekwashintsha kuwona womabili amaqembu, kusukela kubadlali kuya kubaqeqeshi. I-Sundowns inabadlali nethimba labaqeqeshi abasezingeni eliphezulu, abafuna ukuzakhela owabo umlando. “Sigqugquzelwa yimpumelelo esiyithole sindawonye, efana nesibalo samagoli esiwashaye kwiChampions League nemidlalo esiyinqobile. Siyiqembu elinentshisekelo yokunqoba, elinikana ibhola ngobuchule, elikwazi ukuhlasela nelingongcweti ekuphazamiseni izinhlelo zezitha zokuhlasela. Ubufakazi balokhu yisibalo esincane samagoli asingenele. Sihlale sikhonya enkundleni. Umdlalo weCape Town City kuphela esahluleka ukwenza lokhu kuwo."Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi iSundowns kuphela engakwazi ukubuya, ishaye i-Al Ahly, sesike sakwenza lokho. Ngeke kuthi ngoba nakhu sesidlala ne-Al Ahly siqale singabaze ikhono labadlali nempumelelo yethu. Yebo, kuzoba nzima kodwa maningi amathuba okunqoba,“ kusho uMngqithi. Uqhube wathi kumele bagweme amaphutha abaqhatha nenduku emdlalweni odlule."Owawubona umlenze wokuqala uzokutshela ukuthi ubani owakha amathuba amaningi phakathi kwiSundowns ne-Al Ahly. Njengoba ngike ngasho phambilini, sashaywa amaphutha ethu, kwaba yishwa nje ukuthi kasishayanga negoli elilodwa. Ngabe kukhulunywa okunye ukube ibhola likaMotupa (Aubrey) kalishayanga ipali. Kukhona amanye amabili esawayeka ngekhanda kuhlanganisa nilekaMosa (Lebusa). Kunamanye esasibazumile kuwo esawayeka."E-Egypt bamangala sihlasela ngaleya ndlela, babezitshela ukuthi sizohlala emuva silinde bona. Asazi, mhlawumbe kulokhu bazohlala emuva. Ibhola liyinkinga, singalishaya khona kunjalo igoli. Nathi uma sizokhipha konke, singaqapheli singazifaka enkingeni.“Izindaba ezizokwehla kamtoti kubalandeli bamaBrazillians ngezokubuya ekulimaleni  kukaThemba " Mshishi" Zwane."Ngokombiko wodokotela, isimo sakhe sihle kakhulu. Sekuphele isikhashana eziqeqesha nathi, nayizolo ejimini (ngoLwesithathu) wenze kahle kakhulu. Uhlale ekhonya ngaso sonke isikhathi,“ kusho uMngqithi.
title: UMngqithi ufuna bazibhalele owabo umlando kowe-Al Ahly

text: UNDUNANKULU waseNorth West, uSolwazi Job Mokgoro, usedlulise amazwi enduduzo ngokushona kukaNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu nezokuHlaliswa kwabantu, uMnuz Gordon Kegakilwe.UKegakilwe ushone ngoMsombuluko ngenxa yeCorona.Kuthiwa uhlaselwe yisifo esihlobene kakhulu negciwane ngeSonto wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela esizimele eVryburg.Ufike khona waxhunywa emshinini omsiza ukuthi aphefumule.“Kuthathwe isinqumo ekuseni (ngoMsombuluko), ukuba ayiswe kwesinye isibhedlela esiseKlerksdorp. Uhanjiswe yi-ambulensi kodwa ufike khona kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya, waphelelwa wumoya. Kuhlule noma odokotela bezama wagcina ngokushona,” kusho isitatimende sehhovisi likaNdunankulu.UMokgoro ududuze umndeni nabangani wathi umufi ubengumholi oqotho.Khona izolo ntambama kuvele ukuthi uMokgoro uhaqwe yiCovid-19.Omkhulumelayo, uMnuz Vuyisile Ngesi, uthe uNdunankulu uqhinqe ngayedwana emuva kokuthola imiphumela.INingizimu Afrika isinabantu abangaphezu kwabantu abawu-200 000 abatheleleke ngegciwane. Sekufe 3 310, kwalulama 97 848.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uthe kubuhlungu kakhulu ukulahlekelwa wuKegakilwe.Uthumele amazwi enduduzo emndenini, abangani, amaqabane nakubo bonke abashonelwe yizihlobo zabo ngenxa yeCorona.INingizimu Afrika isihlole abantu abawu-1 864 111.
title: UMokgoro udlulise amazwi enduduzo kushona isikhulu

text: La maciko azohlangana eK-Cap ngoMashi 8 kusukela ngo-2 ntambama, lapho kuzobe kukhona abaholi bamaqembu ahlukene ezepolitiki, echaza kabanzi nangezinhlelo anazo zokulekelela amaciko.Imenenja yaseK-Cap, uToki Mohoto, ithe inhloso yalo mhlangano ukuzwa ukuthi osopolitiki banaziphi izinhlelo eziqondene ngqo namaciko.UMohoto uthi asekhona amaqembu azibophezele ukuzohla-nganyela namaciko, okubalwa i-ANC, IFP, DA namanye.“Izinyawo ziyahudulwa isikhathi esiningi uma kukhulunywa ngamaciko. Sifuna bazocacisa ukuthi uma bevotelwa ngamaciko bazowenzelani.“Iqembu ngalinye sifuna lichaze kabanzi ngezinhlelo zalo ezibhekele amaciko. Namaciko azothola ithuba lokwenza izethulo ngezingqinamba abhekene nazo kulo mkhakha,” kusho uMohoto.Uqhube wathi ziningi izinto ezenza amaciko angayi phambili, okubalwa nokungabikho kwemali eyanele yokuwalekelela.UMohoto uthe bazongena nakwisabelomali esibhekele ezobuciko njengoba singawagculisi amaciko.“Imali enikwenza imboni yezobuciko incane kakhulu. Sizokhuluma kabanzi nangakho ngoba asigculisekile,” kusho uMohoto.Umbhali wezincwadi nezinkondlo ongumsakazi woKhozi FM, uBongani Mavuso, naye kuthiwa uzobe ekhona ephethe uhlelo emhlanganweni.Ngaphandle kwawo lo mhlangano amaciko azophinda abe nomunye ngo-Ephreli 5 lapho kuzobe sekubhekwa omasipala nezinhlelo zabo zokusebenzisana namaciko.UMohoto uphethe ngokuthi yize lo mhlangano uhlelelwe amaciko kodwa nabanye abantu bazovumeleka ukuthi bawuthamele uma bethanda.
title: Amaciko azoveza ilaka lawo kosopolitiki bakuleli

text: UQWEQWE lukaDJ wakuleli seluhlanganise abaculi abahlukene ukuthi benze ingoma, ngenhloso yokugqugquzela ubumbano ngalesi sikhathi sobhubhane.UGanyani utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi ngenxa yobunzima umhlaba obhekene nabo, ukhethe ukwenza ingoma ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi #Together We Can Stand“Ngihlanganise abaculi abahlukene ngenhloso yokuthumela umyalezo wethemba kulabo abasebunzimeni emhlabeni jikelele,” kusho uGanyani.Uthe yize ubunzima obubhekene neNingizimu Afrika bungeyona into entsha kodwa ukufika kweCovid-19 kwenze izinto zaba buthaka kakhulu kunakuqala.“EMzansi besivele sinezinkinga ezihlukene ebezisikhungethe ngaphambi kweCovid-19. Into engisukumise manje wukubona isimo esilahlisa ithemba esibhekene nomhlaba wonkana."Le ngoma ngeke igcine ngokududuza abantu balapha kuphela kodwa ngihlela ukuyisabalalisa nasemazweni aphesheya ngoba baningi abantu abadinga ukubuyiselwa ithemba,” kubeka uGanyani.Uqhube wathi isiqubulo sichaza inhloso yengoma okuwukubambisana uma kunezikhathi ezinzima ukuze inqontshwe impi esibhekene nayo.“Yingakho ngizomema nabaculi basemazweni angaphandle kule ngoma ukuze senze isibonelo sokuthi akukho okungasihlula uma sibambisene njengezizwe,” usho kanje.Mayelana nohlu lwabaculi azohlanganyela nabo uthe, abanye babo sebethintiwe kanti abanye usaxhumana nabo.“Empeleni ngimema noma yimuphi umculi ozimisele ngokufaka isandla nokuba yingxenye yale ngqophamlando ukuba angithinte,” kusho uGanyani.Uthe leli culo kumele liduduze izizwe nezizwe nokuyikona okwenza akhiphe isimemo kubaculi ukuze angabibikho ozovaleleka ngaphandle.UGanyani onengoma entsha ethandwayo ethi Tshokombela napike kuyona uTribute Birdie Mboweni, uthe abaculi abazimisele ukuba yingxenye bangaxhumana naye emakhasini akhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.
title: U-DJ umema abaculi ukuthi babumbane ngengoma

text:
KUSOLWA udlame lwamatekisi oluqhubeka eGoli ngokubulawa kwabashayeli abebelalelwe unyendle eMnambithi, bebuya emngcwabeni womphathi wabo ongusomatekisi eMatimatolo ngoMgqibelo.Lokhu kuvezwe okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwanele Ncalane ngemuva kokuya endaweni yesigameko, benoNgqongqoshe walo Mnyango, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda.Uthe kunodlame oluphakathi kosomatekisi baseTembisa naseKempton Park oluqhubekayo kodwa olungahlangene neKZN.Kulesi sigameko kudutshulwe kwashona abantu abangu-11, kwalimala abane kwathi ababili baphuma bengenamyocu.Abane baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela esiseduze.Zibalelwa ku-250 izinhlamvu abashawe ngazo zezibhamu zohlobo lwe-AK 47 nama-R5 kanti imoto kuthiwa ibimbobo kuhle kwembawula.ITEKISI ebihamba abashayeli bamatekisi abawu-11 abadutshulwe babulawa ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu emgwaqeni uR74 ngaseColenso, KwaZulu-Natal, bephuma emngcwabeni izolo ebusuku. 
pic.twitter.com/zIUFYtEiIr— Isolezwe Newspaper (@IsolezweNews) 
July 22, 2018“Abashayeli bamatekisi bebeyongcwaba umphathi wabo eMatimatolo nokuthe uma sebebuyela emuva bahlaselwa abebebalalele unyendle emahlathini aseColenso. Nokho kuthiwa ukuhlaselwa akuhlangene neKZN noma nodlame obelukhungethe imboni yamatekisi aseMnambithi. UNgqongqoshe uKaunda usexhumene noHulumeni waseGauteng ngalesi simo. Ukhulume noNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha u-Ismail Vadi nowezokuPhepha uNkk Sizakele Malobane Nkosi. Uphinde wathinta noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuzwelonke uMnuz Bheki Cele ukuze baqinise uphenyo ngalesi sigameko,” kusho uNcalane.Uphinde waveza ukuthi akukuhle ngoba kwenza abantu bahlalele ovalweni.Uthe bakhathazekile ngalesi sigameko futhi basigxeka ngoba abakwazi ukuvuma ukuba iKZN iphendulwe isizinda sokucoboshisa abantu.UPHIKO lwamaphoyisa olucubungula ngokwenzeke endaweni yesiga lulapho kubulawe khona osomatekisi abangu-11, eColenso ngaseMnambithi, ngoMgqibelo. KWESINCANE: yisigqoko somshayeli esisale enkundleniIzithombe: Gcina NdwalaneUqhube wathi uNgqongqoshe uKaunda usebenze ngokuzikhandla eqeda udlame lwamatekisi kososeshini abahlukene ngakho kumphatha kabi ukuthi udlame lwaseGoli luchaphazeleke kulesi sifundazwe.Ukubulawa kwabashayeli bamatekisi kuthuse ngisho umphakathi njengoba umndeni oseduze nalapho kwehle khona isiga ukhale ubumayemaye ebusuku uzwa ukuqhuma kwenganono ngaphandle.Amaphoyisa asecele amalungu omphakathi angaba nolwazi olungalekelela uphenyo oseluvuliwe ngalesi sehlo ukuthi baxhumane nabo.
title: Zibalelwa ku-250 izinhlamvu okudutshulwe ngazo abashayeli

text: USHAYE izinyoni ezimbili ngetshe elilodwa umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uGiovanni Solinas ngesikhathi exova isikimu ngenhloso yokuphumuza abathile ebhekene neFree State Stars ngoLwesibili ebusuku.Lokhu kwenze kwavela esinye isikimu esiwukhilimu osekwenze lo mqeqeshi wase-Italy wamelwa wukuthi enze isinqumo ngomdlalo ozayo.IChiefs iwine okwesibili kule sizini ngokucoboshisa iFree State ngo 2-0 wegoli likaGustavo Paez noPhilani Zulu kodwa okuyikhona obekukhulunywa ngakho kakhulu yizinguquko eziyisikhombisa ezenziwe uSolinas athe uzenze ngoba ephumuza abathile.Okufaka lo mqeqeshi enkingeni wukuthi usebhekwe kakhulu manje ngesikimu azosibophela ngoMgqibelo uma esevakashelwe AmaZulu ngaphansi kwayo belu i-Absa Premiership ngo-6 ntambama eFNB Stadium, eGoli. Phakathi kwemibuzo esezindebeni zabathandi bebhola othi uzokwenzenjani ngoGeorge Maluleka odlale ingcwenga yebhola.Ubedlala endaweni ejwayele ukudlalwa uSiphelele Ntshangase. Kubonakale nabadlali abafana noPaez bemcindeza uSolinas ngokuthi angabashiyi uma esebophela isikimu.Umdlali ofana noMario Booysen ukhombise izimpawu zokuba yimpendulo emabholeni ahamba emoyeni kwazise uDaniel Cardoso obeqala imidlalo ngasekuqaleni kwesizini ubekhombisa izimpawu zokuba buthaka kuwona.“Inhloso enkulu ngalezi zinguquko bekuwukuphumuza abadlali. Okwenzekile sekungifake enkingeni ngoba sekufanele ngikhethe kubadlali abaningi. Kuhle kimina lokhu ngoba ngakho ngishaya izinyoni ezimbili ngetshe elilodwa. Lokhu kuzoliphumuza iqembu kodwa futhi kuzosiza ekutheni ngazi ukuthi yibaphi abadlali abawulungele umdlalo uma ngificwa yisimo lapho kunabadlali engingeke ngikwazi ukubasebenzisa,” kusho uSolinas.Uzwakalise okukhulu ukujabula ngalo mphumela kodwa waxwayisa abadlali bakhe ngobumqoka bokuqhubeka nalo mgqigqo.“Kufanele sikhumbule ukuthi siyiqembu elikhulu ngakho-ke abalandeli bethu kufanle sibajabulise. Kusemqoka ukuthi siqhubeke ngale ndlela uma sesibhekene naMaZulu ngoba kuzoba wumdlalo onzima,” kusho uSolinas.Kusasa: Bidvest Wits v Polokwane City (Bidvest Stadium, 8pm)NgoMgqibelo: Lamontville Golden Arrows v Chippa United (Princess Magogo Stadium, 3pm); Baroka FC v Orlando Pirates (New Peter Mokaba Stadium, 3pm); Kaizer Chiefs v AmaZulu FC (FNB Stadium, 6pm); Free State Stars v Highlands Park (Goble Park Stadium, 8.15pm)NgeSonto: SuperSport United v Black Leopards (Lucas Moripe Stadium, 3pm); Bloemfontein Celtic v Maritzburg United (Dr Molemela Stadium, 3pm)
title: Uzifake enkingeni ngesikimu uSolinas

text: INTATHELI YESOLEZWEKUBHEKEKE ukuthi ziqhubeke nokubikwa izigameko zokuminza kwabantu nokuduka kwezingane emabhishi, njengoba abantu besavakashela emabhishi ngobuningi babo.Kubalulekile ukuthi imindeni esuke ihambisa izingane emabhishi yenze izinhlelo ezifanele ukugwema ukuminza kwezingane.UDisemba yinyanga yokugwema izingozi okubalwa kuzo izingozi zokuminza. Umbiko wenhlangano yezempilo emhlabeni iWorld Health Organisation (WHO), okhuluma ngezingozi zokuminza, uveze ukuthi balinganiselwa ku-372 000 abantu abaminzayo njalo ngonyaka.Le nhlangano ikholwa wukuthi lesi sibalo kungenzeka ukuthi singaphezu kwalokhu. Ngokusho kwe-WHO izingane, abantu besilisa kanye nabantu abavame ukuba endaweni enamanzi yibona abasengcupheni yokuminza.Yize abantu abadala beminza nabo kodwa kuvame ukuthi kube yizingane eziminzayo. I-WHO ithi izibalo ezicacisa ngokuminza kwezingane emhlabeni wonkana zikhombisa ukuthi izingane eziphakathi konyaka owodwa kuya kwemine. Emuva kwalezi kuza izingane eziphakathi kweminyaka emihlanu kuya kweyisishiyagalolunye.Izolo Isolezwe libike ngokusindiswa kwempilo kaMelokuhle Xaba waseHighflats, osindiswe ngumlingisi wamafilimu uSihle Xaba, ngesikhathi eminza eSouth Beach. USihle ophinde abe ngomunye wabagada ababhukudayo emabhishi uthe abazali kufanele baqwashe uma belethe izingane emabhishi.Nazi izinto ongazenza ukuqikelela ukuthi ingane yakho iphephile uma nivakashele ebhishi:n Zihambisele wena ingane yakho ebhishi ungayithumeli nomakhelwane ikakhulu uma kuzohamba abantu abaningi.n Khuluma nabakhipha amabhande azoba nemininingwane yakho ukuze uma iduka bakwazi ukukuthinta. Uthe kuvame ukuthi kube khona abantu bakwaVodacom abawakhiphayo amabhangela.n Khuluma nabagada ababhukudayo ngaphambi kokudedela ingane ibhukude ukuze bakuqwashise uma kunezilwane ezincinzayo nezenza kube nzima ukuthi ingane ibhukude.n Yigade ngaso sonke isikhathi ingane yakho uma ibhukuda. Musa ukulindela ukuthi kwenziwe abagada ababhukudayo lokhu.n Uma udukelwe yingane sheshe uye kulabo abagada ababhukudayo ukuze uthole usizo.n Zigadele izimpahla zakho ngoba akuwona umsebenzi walabo abagada ababhukudayo lona.n Fundisa ingane yakho amaqhinga alula okuphepha emanzini.n Uma ungayiboni ingane qikelela ukuthi uyayibheka ngokushesha ungathathi ngokuthi iphephile lapho ekhona.n Funda ukubhukuda, ufundise nengane yakho ukubhukuda.n Yize kuvela ukuthi ukuminza kuvame kakhulu ezinganeni, nabantu abadala bayaminza futhi kufanele nabo baqikelele uma bebhukuda.n Funda uhlelo lokuhlinzeka usizo oluphuthumayo iCPR. Kubalulekile ukuthi ukwazi ukusiza ingane nomuntu omdala nge-CPR. Funda nezindlela ezilula zokuhlinzeka usizo oluphuthumayo ukuze uzokwazi ukusiza uma kuba nesimo esidinga lokho.n Uma kukhona ominzile qinisekisa ukuthi unika abantu abamsizayo isikhala esenele sokuthi bamsize.
title: Ziyenyuka ezokuminza emabhishi

text: IVOLKSWAGEN Group South Africa (VWSA) igubha ukukhiqiza izimoto ezingaphezu kuka-4 million efemini yayo ese-Uitenhage, ePort Elizabeth.Izimoto zokuqala zakhiqizwa eminyakeni engu-72 edlule ngoNovemba ka-1948 ngesikhathi ifemu kusengeyeSouth African Motor Assemblers and Distributors (SAMAD).Imoto yokuqala yakwaVolkswagen eyakhiqizwa kwaba yiVW Beetle eyakhiwa ngo-Agasti ka-1951.Kusuka lapho le femu isiyakhe izimoto eziningi okuhlanganisa yona iBeetle, izinhlobo ezahlukene zeTransporter, Golf, Jetta, iPolo nezakwa-Audi.Njengamanje kwakhiwa iPolo edayiswa kuleli kanjalo nakwamanye amazwe aphesheya. Kuphinde kwakhiwe nePolo Vivo edayisa kuleli.Selokhu kuqale unyaka kwaVWSA sebekhiqize amaPolo angu-75 521 adayiswe kwamanye amazwe namanye angu-12 804 namaPolo Vivo angu-17 038 adayiswe kuleli.Obambe njengoMqondisi wokukhiqiza kwaVWSA uBernd Schaberg uthe bayaziqhenya ngalokhu futhi kukhombisa ukuzinikela kwabo."Ngalokhu kuzimisela nginesiqiniseko sokuthi sizozuza okunye okukhulu," kusho yena.
title: Ifemu yakwaVWSA ikhiqize imoto ka-4 million eNingizimu Afrika

text: ISIQONGQWANE sesitobha seLamontville Golden Arrows, uNkanyiso “Sgora” Mngwengwe, sivuselele inkontileka neqembu obese kusabalele ukuthi singase silishiye.Nakuba Abafana Bes’thende bengakuqinisekisi lokhu ngokusemthethweni kodwa Isolezwe lihoshe ngemithombo yalo engashayi eceleni ukuthi uMngwengwe uvuselele ngeminyaka emithathu kwi-Arrows.“Uvuselele ngeminyaka emithathu emuva kwezingxoxo ezithathe isikhathi eside nosihlalo weqembu, uMato Madlala. Akhona amaqembu abemnyonyobela uMngwengwe kodwa uqome ukuthi ahloniphe uMadlala ngoba kade ayewa evuka enaye. Nokho angiboni ukuthi isimo sihle phakathi kwakhe nabaqeqeshi ngoba banokukhuluma kube sengathi akekho ezinhlelweni zabo,” kusho umthombo.“UMngwengwe ubuya ekulimaleni. Kunamaqembu abezimisele ngokumnika itshe lemali kodwa wenqaba. Sekuyocaca isikhathi uma siqhubeka ukuthi ngabe uthathe isinqumo esihle noma ushaye udaka. Kodwa ngingakubeka kucace ukuthi wusihlalo weqembu kuphela owenze uMngwengwe wahlala kwi-Arrows ngaphandle kwalokho ubehamba,” kuqhuba umthombo.UMngwengwe uqale ukudlala eqenjini elikhulu le-Arrows ngo-Agasti 3, 2013. Abafana Bes’thende babedlala ne-Ajax Cape Town emdlalweni owaphela ngo 1-1.Ngaphambi kokuthi alimale ubengukaputeni eqenjini.“UMngwengwe akafuni ukuhamba kabi kwi-Arrows uma kwenzeka ehamba. Ufuna ukuthi ashiye igama elihle kusihlalo weqembu, kungakho emhlonipha. Kuzocaca uma ebuya ekulimaleni ukuthi uzodlala yini ngoba vele uSteve Komphela ulokhu eyiphinde njalo eyokuthi kuyavuza odongeni lwakhe,” kusho umthombo.Emasontweni amabili edlule, uKomphela utshele izintatheli eMgungundlovu ukuthi uMngwengwe akakaze asebenze naye, ngakho kusafanele azibonakalise kuyena ukuze athole indawo eqenjini.Kuthintwa imenenja yaBafana Bes’thende, uNonceba Madlala, ukuthola ukuthi ngabe uMngwengwe usayinile yini, ithe: “Yebo ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi uMngwengwe uvuselelile nathi inkontileka entsha. Kodwa ngeke ngikwazi ukudalula ukuthi inkontileka yesikhathi esingakanani.”Umdlalo wokuqala we-Arrows kwi-Absa Premiership kuzoba ngowabakhaya njengoba izoshikilisana neMaritzburg United ngeSonto eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont, ngo-3 ntambama.
title: Uvuselele inkontileka ne-Arrows

text: UNKOSIKAZI kaSenzo Meyiwa ubhoboke ngothando umyeni wakhe ayenalo ngoKelly Khumalo nokuthi wayevele ezifela ngesinene uSenzo kusuka kudala.Lokhu kudalulwe encwadini ebhalwe nguSoweto Mandlanzi, ongumbhali wezincwadi.Encwadini ebizwa ngeDecoding 666_9: The Inexplicable Life Of Senzo Meyiwa, kucashunwa uMandisa Mkhize ethi: “USenzo wayezifela ngabantu besimame futhi ngangijwayele ukumbamba nezintombi.UKelly kangimsoli ngalutho. Ngiyazi ukuthi indoda ngeke uyenze lutho uma isizimisele ngokuhamba. UKelly sengimthatha njengodadewethu, ikakhulukazi njengoba singonina bezingane zandawonye."Incwadi isiqalile ukudayiswa. Imali ezokwenziwa izonikelwa emndenini wakwaMeyiwa.Engxoxweni yakhe neSolezwe ngeSonto, uSoweto uveze ukuthi uthwale kanzima ngesikhathi ebhala incwadi njengoba eke wathola izinsongo ezimsabisayo uma eqhubeka nokuyibhala.“Bengibhala ngibuye ngime ngoba nami bengisaba okwenzakaliswa. Kodwa ngabuye ngaqina isibindi, ngangavumela ukusatshiswa ngibe ngisiza,” kusho uSoweto.USOWETO Mandlanzi ongumbhali wencwadi ekhuluma ngempilo kaSenzo Meyiwa Isithombe: SITHUNYELWEUthe into eyamgqugquzela ukubhala yingoba wabona sengathi akasekho umuntu ozimisele ukusiza kulolu daba lukaSenzo, ekubeni ekade eyisilomo esingaconsi phansi kwabaningi.Le nsizwa isibhale uxhaxha lwezincwadi kusukela ngo-2012 ngesikhathi ikhipha incwadi yayo yokuqala eyayithi “Just Teething for a New Thing”, Dear Jacob, Cashflow Naked, Running My Race: Minding My Own Business nezinye.Incwadi kaMeyiwa ibiza uR269 zingakabalwa izindleko zokuposa.Kuningi okuvela kule ncwadi njengoba uSoweto ethi akekho angakhulumanga naye ngaphandle kukaKelly Khumalo.USENZO Meyiwa washona ethandana nomculi we-Afro Soul uKelly Khumalo“Ngazama ukuxhumana naye kodwa kwagcina kungenzekanga, kwaphetha ngokuthi ngimcaphune kulokhu ayekusho ezingxoxweni ayeba nazo emisakazweni nakwithelevishini,” kubeka uSoweto.Uqhube wathi okumjabulisayo wukuthi uyise kaSenzo, uMnuz Sam Meyiwa, ongasekho wayemnikile isibusiso sale ncwadi.Kuleli sonto uSoweto uhlele umcimbi wokwethula ngokusemthethweni incwadi kunina kaSenzo Meyiwa.
title: 'USenzo ngangijwayele ukumbamba nezintombi'

text: UVULELWE icala lokushaya yinkosikazi yakhe umfundisi owayengumsakazi weMbokodo FM, uPastor Simo Nene webandla laseThekwini, iTrue Gospel of Christ Ministry Church.UNene owaziwa ngelika-Apostle Sthengwa, uvele kafushane eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown ngoLwesihlanu emuva kokuboshwa ngamaphoyisa aKwaNdengezi ngoLwesithathu.Ngokusho komthombo, inkosikazi kaNene, uNkk Thenjiwe “Lee” Nene (36) okuthiwa useshade nayo iminyaka eyisithupha, ibisikhathele ukuphenduka ukudla kwenduku uma beke bahilizisana ngokuthile.Kulokhu kuthiwe babange ukuthi uNkk Nene usuke emzini wabo ePhoenix waya kubo KwaNdengezi ukuyobona udadewabo ogulayo.“Umfundisi uNene ugasele kubo kwankosikazi yakhe ngoMsombuluko wafike wayishayela khona, eyisola ngokuphinga. Vele ungumuntu onesandla esilula nenkinga yokulawula wukudinwa kwakhe. Uma eke waxabana nomkakhe, akananazi uvele adedele isibhakela. Inkosikazi yakhe ibisimbekezelele isikhathi eside. Kulokhu uyishayile yavele yaqonda emaphoyiseni ukuyomvulela icala,” kusho umthombo.Uthe ngo-2017, uNkk Nene, uke wahamba emzini wabo emuva kwengxabano enkulu lapho uNene amshaya waze waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.“Inkosikazi yabuyela emzini wayo emuva kokuthi exolisile, wayithembisa ukuthi akasobuye aphinde ayishaye. ULee ubesefana nesiboshwa, aphume endlini uma ehamba nomyeni wakhe kuphela,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi uNene phambilini wayeshade nomculi wokholo, naye okuthiwa waze wadivosa ngoba esekhathele ukushaywa.UNkk Nene uthe ucela ukungaphawuli njengoba lolu daba selusingethwe abomthetho, uzokhuluma uma isikhathi sesifanele.Ethintwa uNene ukuphikile ukuthi uvulelwe icala lokushaya yinkosikazi yakhe. Uthe lo osolwa ngokuba yinkosikazi yakhe uyilungu lebandla, ake ashutha nalo njengawo wonke amalungu ebandla.“Uma ngenze into enjalo ngabe angiboshwanga ngani? Kumanje ngiyoshumayela kwenye inkonzo,” kusho uNene.UNene kuvele ukuthi wakhonjwa indlela emsakazweni Imbokodo FM ngo-2018 emuva kokuhluleka ukuziphatha.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uNene uvulelwe icala lokushaya esiteshini samaphoyisa KwaNdengezi.Uthe uvelile enkantolo ngoLwesihlanu kepha akazi ukuthi icala lihlehliselwe luphi usuku njengoba idokodo lisasenkantolo.
title: Inkosikazi igcine imvulele icala umfundisi oyiphilisa ngesibhaxu

text: Unina womfundi, eligodliwe igama lakhe, uthe naye uzovulela uthisha icala ngoba nguyena owachukuluza ingane wayishaya ngezimpama. Uthe indodana yakhe, engalilandanga iripoti ngonyaka odlule, yayiyobhalisa kuvulwa izikole.“Angikaze ngiyibone iripoti kodwa ingane yangitshela ukuthi iphasile, yadlulela kwaGrade 10. Ngithole sekwenzekile ukuthi yayikade ithunywe ukuthi ibize umzali ngoba ibisekilasini elingafanele. Angikaze ngishayelwe ucingo esikoleni futhi ingane ayingitshelanga. Ngicabanga ukuthi ibisaba,” kusho umzali.Uthe ngosuku lwesehlo ingane yabizwa ehhovisi yahilizisana nothisha, wayishaya ngezimpama. Unofakazi wengane ezibonele lokhu.“Bengivele ngazi ukuthi kukhona akwenzile uthisha ngoba ingane yami iyathula, ibingeke imsukele. Ummese emgwaze ngawo yawuthatha komunye umfundi ephaketheni, ebimbone evula ngawo isicabha ekuseni,” kusho umzali.Uthe balinde ukungena enkantolo, wavuma nokuthi uyitholile incwadi yokumiswa komfundi.ISouth African Democratic Teachers’ Union KwaZulu-Natal ithi akakazobuyela esikoleni uthisha wesikole esiseHighflats ogwazwe ngumfundi obefuna ukuphasiswa ngenkani ngoLwesihlanu.Uthisha (40), oyiphini likathishanhloko eHlokozi High, uhlezi ukuze alulame. Kuthiwa umfundi obefeyile uGrade 9 ugwaze uthisha ngoba efuna ukudlulela kuGrade 10.UNobhala weSadtu KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Nomarashiya Caluza, uthe uthisha akakalulami ngokugcwele usahamba odokotela. Emuva kokulimala kwadingeka ayohlala ekhaya eMgungundlovu ukuze alashelwe ngakhona.“Ngisho angalulama ngeke abuyele esikoleni singakacaci kahle isimo sezokuphepha. Sidinga ukuthi kuphume isinqumo ngaphambi kokuthi abuyele esikoleni. Ngeke simbuyisele esikoleni kungakacaci ukuthi kwenzekani ngoba naye uyesaba emuva kokwenzekile,” kusho uNksz Caluza.UNOBHALA weSadtu KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Nomarashiya Caluza, uthe ngeke abuyele esikoleni uthisha ogwazwe umfundi eHighflats kungakaqinisekiswa ukuphepha kwakhe Isithombe: SADTUKZN FACEBOOKUthe ngoMsombuluko kube nomhlangano wazo zonke izinhlaka ezithintekayo okubalwa kuzo nenduna.“Sithole ukuthi induna imqhubile umfana nomzali wakhe kuyokhulunywa esikoleni. Lokho siyakujabulela ngoba kusho ukuthi nezinhlaka zomphakathi zilusukumele udaba,” kusho yena.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, ephephandabeni i-The Mercury elinguzakwabo waleli, uthe bathathe isinqumo sokummisa umfundi ngoba akakufanele ukuba sesikoleni ngenxa yakwenzile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthe umfundi oneminyaka ewu-14 useboshiwe ngecala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza. Ngesikhathi sokuloba bekulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yesifunda ePhungashe.Ikhansela uNkk Sithembele Mkhize lithe ikomiti le-ward yakhe belikhona emhlanganweni ngoMsombuluko.“Sibone kufanele nathi singenelele ngoba udaba lubucayi. Kuzoba nomunye umhlangano wabazali ngoMsombuluko ozayo,” kusho yena.
title: Unina ‘wogwaze’ uthisha uyamvuna

text: AFRICAN NEWS AGENCY (ANA)OBENGUNGQONGQOSHE wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi kusukela ngoJuni nonyaka eGauteng uDkt Nomathemba Mokgethi, umenyezelwe izolo njengongqongqoshe omusha wezeMpilo kulesiya sifundazwe.Unkosikazi wowayeyimeya yaseGoli uMnuz Parks Tau, uNkk  Philisiwe Twala-Tau, umenyezelwe njengoNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho eGauteng.Isikhala sikaNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo savuleka ngesikhathi uNdunankulu uMnuz David Makhura, exosha uDkt Bandile Masuku.UMasuku wathinteka ezinsolweni zokungahambisi ngendlela amathenda ezimpahla zokuzivikela kwiCorona.Kulolo daba kwakuthinteka abangani bakhe uMnuz Thandisizwe Diko noNkk Khusela Diko, okhulumela uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa. Kumanje uNkk Diko usamisiwe emsebenzini. UMasuku usolwa ngokunikeza lo mndeni ithenda kaR125 million, enkampanini yabo iRoyal Bhaca Projects.UMasuku nalo mndeni bakuchitha lokhu.UNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha uMnuz Jacob Mamabolo, uyena obelokhu ebambele uMasuku owakhonjwa indlela ngo-Okthoba nonyaka.UDkt Mokgethi uneziqu zeMasters of Arts in Nursing Science, iziqu zobudokotela kwi-literature ne-philosophy yase-Unisa.Uke wasebenza kuMasipala waseMerafong, nakuMasipala waseTlokwe.UNksz Morakane Mosupyoe uzoba uNgqongqoshe  wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi.
title: Ungqongqoshe omusha wezeMpilo eGauteng

text: I-EFF isisabise ngokuthi izombhikishela uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa uma eke waqhubeka nezinhlelo zokuhlukanisa kathathu inkampani ephakela ugesi kuleli i-Eskom.UMengameli waleli qembu uMnuz Julius Malema, uthe kumele ishiywe kanje le nkampani ngoba uMengameli akazange achaze ngokuthi lolu hlelo luzohamba kanjani.Uthe uRamaphosa ufuna ukuhlukanisa le nkampani kathathu ngoba efuna kuzuze umndeni wakhe nosibali wakhe ongusomabhizinisi uMnuz Patrice Motsepe. “Indlela ofuna ukuyisebenzisa ukuyihlukanisa i-Eskom kuzoyenza ingasebenzi ngendlela. Ayikho into enomqondo osayichazile ngokuthi lokhu kuzokwenzeka kanjani. Uma uke waqhubeka nje siyi-EFF sizobhikisha ngoba asifuni ithintwe le nkampani.”Ukusho lokhu izolo ngesikhathi kunenkulumo mpikiswano ePhalamende eKapa ngenkulumo eyayibhekiswe esizweni eyathulwa nguRamaphosa ngeledlule.UMalema usho lokhu nje izolo bekunohlelo olwaziwa ngoStage 3 lokucima ugesi olwenziwe yi-Eskom. Kulokhu kuqale leli sonto le nkampani icima ugesi ukuze kongeke ugesi. Izolo ucinywe kusuka ngo-8 ekuseni kwaze kwaba ngu-11 ebusuku.Umholi weDA uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, uthe umangele ukuthi uRamaphosa uzwakalise ukushaqeka nokucikeka ukuthi i-Eskom icisha ugesi.“Kuyaxaka ukuthi uthi ushaqekile ekubeni ubukhona ngesikhathi kunezinkinga kwa-Eskom. Awuzange wenze lutho ngalezi zinkinga kodwa manje usuthi uthukile,” kusho uMaimane.Uthe ngeke akwazi ukuhlukanisa le nkampani uRamaphosa ngoba akaphethe kwi-ANC.“Ngeke i-ANC ikuvumele ukuthi uhlukanise i-Eskom ngoba umuntu ophethe uMnuz Ace Magashule (uNobhala jikelele we-ANC) hhayi wena. Awukho umnyakazo ozowenza ngoba nihlale nicula kanje bese kungenzeki lutho,” kusho uMaimane.Usomnotho uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa, weDumisa Investments, uthe kuboliwe kule nkampani yingakho inezinkinga ezingaka.Uthe izinkontileka zeminyaka ezingavuselelwa, ukungenela kosopolitiki nesikweletu esingaphezulu kukaR420 billion yizona zinkinga ezibhekene ne-Eskom.“Uma uMengameli engahlukanisa engazange achaze le nkampani, i-ANC izoba nenkinga. Lokhu kungayilimaza le nhlangano ngoba kumele ithi ikwenza lokhu ibe isikuchazile kwezwakala ukuhlukaniswa kathathu kwayo nokuthi yiziphi izizathu ezenze ukuthi ihlukaniswe,” kusho uDumisa.Okhulumela i-Eskom uMnuz Khulu Phasiwe, uthe udizili, namanzi abakusebenzisayo kusephansi yize uhlelo lokuphehla ugesi seluqala ukubuyela esimeni.Uthe bakhathazekile ngokuthi iziteshi iMedupi neKusile azikwazi ukuphehla ugesi owenele.UPhasiwe uthe bayakweletwa imali enkulu, wathi nabo babhekene nesikweletu esinguR420 billion.Omasipala bakweleta le nkampani uR18 billion, ngenyanga sikhula ngoR450 million.Abahlali baseSoweto bakweleta uR17 billion, isikweletu sabo sikhula ngoR50 million ngenyanga.Ngonyaka le nkampani ichitha uR55 billion ithenga amalahle.Izinyunyana zabasebenzi zikhalile ngokuthi uRamaphosa ufuna ukuyihlukanisa kathathu i-Eskom zathi kuzodilizwa abasebenzi abangu-50 000.UPhasiwe ukhale ngokuthi babuye basebenzise udilizi obiza kakhulu ukuze bagcine ugesi ukhanya.UPhasiwe uthe bachitha uR1 billion ngodizili ngenyanga wathi izwe lilahlekelwa nguR20 billion ngenxa yokucishwa kukagesi.UNobhala weCosatu KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Edwin Mkhize, uthe basola ukuthi kunesandla semfene ngokunqamuka kwamandla kagesi kwa-Eskom.“Sikholwa ukuthi lento yenziwe ngumuntu ngamabomu, inhloso ukwenza sengathi i-Eskom iyahluleka ukusebenza ukuze igcine udayisiwe,” kusho uMkhize.Uthe isinqumo sokuhlukanisa kathathu i-Eskom ngezinye zezindlela yokulidayisa leli bhizinisi likahulumeni.“SiyiCosatu asihambisani nokuhlukaniswa kathathu kuka-Eskom ngoba lokho kuzodala ukuthi kulahleke amathuba emisebenzi. Ngeke siyeseke lento kuze kuba kuxoxiswana nathi sithole ukuthi izokwenzeka kanjani,” kusho uMkhize.Uthe bazomtshela uRamaphosa uma engasazenzi izinto kahle.UNgqongqoshe wezamabhizinisi kahulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, uthe kuningi okwenziwayo ukuxazulula le nkinga yakwa-Eskom.Uthe azikho izinhlelo zokuthi le nkampani idayiswe njengoba kukhona abasho kanjalo.“Azakhiwanga kahle iziteshi iMedupi neKusile yingakho zingakwazi ukukhiqiza ugesi. Ukulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana yikhona okwenze kwaba nezinkinga kwa-Eskom,” kusho uGordhan.Uthe kunezinhlelo zouthi kucishwe ugesi ukuze kutholakale ugesi ongu-5 000MW, wathi izolo kube noStage 3 wokucishwa kukagesi.“Zisazobakhona nezinye izinhlelo zokucishwa kukagesi kuleli ngezikhawu ezehlukene. Ezinye izikhungo zikagesi zindala sivumelene nebhodi ukuthi sizolanda onjoniyela bangaphandle ukuze sikwazi ukubuyisela uzinzo kwa-Eskom.”
title: Eyokuhlukanisa i-Eskom abayizwa

text: UMNYANGO wezeMpilo kuzwelonke usola ubugebengu bezikhungo zokusoka ezingekho emthethweni nenkani yokungafuni ukuhlolwa odokotela njengoba lenyuka izinga labantu abashona beyosoka e-Eastern Cape.Babalelwa ku-14 abakhwetha (abasuke beyosokwa) asebeshonile njengoba kuqale isikhathi sokuya entabeni kulesi sifundazwe.Phakathi kwabo kukhona nendoda eneminyaka engu-50 ebiyosoka kwagcina kuyenele.UMnuz Popo Maja, okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo kuzwelonke, uthi bahlala beshumayela minyaka yonke ukuthi isiko lokusoka kufanele liqhutshwe ngendlela ephephile engeke ibeke impilo yabantu engcupheni.“Siyasazi isimo sase-Eastern Cape futhi sikhathazekile ngaso, kuningi esikwenzayo ukuzama ukunqanda ukushona kwabantu. Siyasebenzisana neCongress of Traditional Leaders of South Africa (Contralesa) nezinhlaka zokugcinwa komthetho.“Abazali kufanele baqinisekise ukuthi izingane zihlolwa ngodokotela kuqala ngaphambi kokusoka,’’ kusho uMaja. Kuthiwa uma sekusondele isikhathi sokusoka ziningi izikole ezingoqhibukhowe ezivelayo zithi zisoka abantu, zibakhokhise imali.Inqwaba yabantu abashonile kuthiwa abakoNgcobo, Mdantsane, East London, Mbizana naseNyandeni.Leli siko lihlala liqhutshwa minyaka yonke uma sekuyisikhathi saphakathi nonyaka futhi kuvamile ukuthi kubikwe inqwaba yabantu abashonayo. Abanye baphuthunyiswe ezibhedlela besesimeni esibi, lapho bafike basinde, bagcine bengawuphonsi umbalane.UMohale uthe bayalihlonipha kakhulu leli siko lokusoka entabeni kodwa wathi ngeke kubekezelelwe ukufa kwabantu.Uthe bazoqinisekisa ukuthi labo abatholakala beqhuba umsebenzi wokusoka ngokungekho emthwethweni bayaboshwa bashushiswe.“UMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabau esifundazwe Eastern Cape ulusingethe lolu daba.“Sizobambisana nawo namaphoyisa ngoba ayaphithiza endaweni, abheke izikhungo ezingekho emthethweni,’’ kusho uMaja
title: UMnyango usola ubugebengu kufa 14 kwabebeyosokwa

text: KUMISWE isikhulu esiphezulu sesikhungo esigqugquzela ukufundiswa kwezibalo, iSayensi nokuthuthukiswa kwezobuchwepheshe KwaZulu-Natal, iMoses Kotane Institute (MKI).UMnuz Sbusiso Mpungose umiswe ekupheleni kwenyanga edlule ngezinto eziningi ezithinta ezokuphatha kwalesi sikhungo. Lesi sikhungo singaphansi koMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha nezeMvelo eKZN oholwa nguMnuz Sihle Zikalala. Umthombo weSolezwe uveze ukuthi ezinye zezinto uMpungose amiselwe zona wukuqasha esinye isikhulu ngaphambi kokuthi siye kohlonywa imibuzo ngalowo msebenzi esasifake isicelo sawo.Uthe lesi sikhulu sathatha incwadi yokuqashwa saya ebhange siyothenga imoto ekubeni singakaqashwa. “Okunye asolwa ngakho wukunika omunye wabangani bakhe imisebenzi ehlukene kulesi sikhungo. Usolwa nangokuthi wayethi uye endaweni ethile ekubeni engayanga,” kusho lo mthombo.Isikhulu sezokuxhumana eMnyangweni wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, uMnuz Harry Mchunu, sikuqinisekisile ukumiswa kukaMpungose sathi ibhodi limmise ukuze kuqhubeke uphenyo lwangaphakathi.“Ibhodi leMKI lisazisile ngokuthi limise isikhulu esiphezulu ukuze kuqhubeke uphenyo oluthinta ukuphatha. Asikwazi ukwanda kakhulu size sithole umbiko uma sekuphothulwe uphenyo.”Isolezwe lake labika ngesikhalo sezinye zezinkampani ezazithole ithenda lokufaka ubuchwepheshe bezokuxhumana eMnambithi Technical Vocational Education and Training (TVET) ezazingakhokhelwe yiMKI. Lezi zinkampani zasola lesi sikhulu ngokuthi asifuni ukukhokha ekubeni zawenza umsebenzi.I-MKI yaziphendulela ngokuthi kunophenyo mayelana nezikhalo zezinkampani ezithintekayo kodwa kuze kube manje azikakhokhelwa. Khonamanjalo umnyango kaZikalala ukhiphe izikhangiso kwabezindaba kulabo abafuna ukuba amalungu esigungu sokuphatha eMKI. Eminye yemisebenzi abazoyenza wukuqinisekisa ukuthi lesi sikhungo siphethwe ngendlela kulandelwe inqubomgomo, babheke nokuthi umsebenzi wenziwa ngendlela efanele. Bazoqinisekisa ukuthi ukuphathwa nokulawulwa kwe-MKI kusezingeni. Kumele babe nemfundo engu-NQF Level 7 nolwazi emikhakheni ehlukene okubalwa ukuphatha amabhizinisi, iSayensi nezobuchwepheshe, izifundo zasolwandle, ezokuphathwa kwemisebenzi kahulumeni, ezokuxhumana neminye imikhakha.
title: Kumiswe isikhulu esiphezulu ngezinsolo eziningi

text: KUPHAZAMISEKE ukusebenza kwesibhedlela saseLimpompo kuhlaselwa odokotela abathathu.Esibhedlela iLetaba Hospital, kudutshulwe odokotela abathathu balimala kugasela amadoda endaweni abahlala kuyo kulesi sibhedlela izolo ekuseni.“Ziyahlaselwa izikhungo zezempilo eLimpopo, kumele kubekwe amaphoyissa kuzo zonke izibhedlela,” kusho ungqongqoshe wezeMpilo eLimpopo, uDkt Phophi Ramathuba.Amaphoyisa aseLimpopo aseqale uphenyo oluphuthumayo athungatha amadoda amahlanu agasela ehlomile okubikwa ukuthi atshontsha imali, iTV kanye namaselula kule ndawo.Kwelinye igumbi adubula udokotela, agwaza unkosikazi wakhe ngesikhali esicijile. Bathatha enye iTV, ilaptop nemali.Abathathu abalimele baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela.
title: Kudutshulwe odokotela (3) esibhedlela saseLimpopo

text: INGASE ivale ngehlahla iCovid-19 kubahlali basemijondolo yaKwaGonokwakhe eCrammond ngase Mgungundlovu uma bengalutholi usizo lokuzivikela kuleli gciwane.Basho kanje abahlali bakule ndawo bekhuluma neSolezwe mayelana nezinselelo ababhekene nazo selokhu kwaqala uthaqa kuleli ngenxa yokubheduka kwegciwane leCorona.“Selokhu kwaqala ukuvalwa kwezwe akekho noyedwa umholi osewake wafika kule ndawo. Bagcina ngesikhathi kuvotwa ngonyaka odlule,” kusho omunye wabahlali.Uthe impilo inzima kule ndawo, kangangokuthi abazazi ukuthi banalo leli gciwane noma cha.“Into ezokwenzeka wukuthi bazokufa bonke abantu abahlala kule ndawo ngoba ayilandelwa yonke imithetho okuthiwa igcinwe ukuze abantu bangasuleleki ngecoronavirus,” kusho lo mhlali.Omunye wabo uthe amanzi awabonwa kule ndawo, okubashiya nenselelo enkulu uma sekumele bapheke, abasayiphathi eyokuwasha impahla nokugeza izandla njengoba umyalelo wabezempilo uthi ukuze kunqandeke ukusabalala kweCovid-19, kuzomele abantu bahlale begeza izandla.“Phambilini umasipala waseMshwathi ubuvamise ukusilethela amanzi okungenani kabili ngesonto. Manje kuyenzeka basilethele kube kanye,” kusho omunye wabo.Ngokusho kwalaba bahlali, kwafakwa inqwaba yamathangi amanzi kodwa ahlala engenamanzi, okushiya imibuzo yokuthi ayefakelwani uma engezukugcwalisa amanzi.“Uma kwenzekile basilethela amanzi, kuba wububhudubhudu abantu bewabanga ngoba aba yisilinganiso sethangi elilodwa ekubeni thina sibaningi kule ndawo,” basho njalo.Ngokwabo, kuyenzeka abanye babo bagcine bengawatholanga njengoba asuke ebangwa.Izinsiza zokuzivikela kwiCovid-19 namaphasela okudla asabalaliswa kweminye imiphakathi, bathe yizinto abazizwa ngendaba, bagcina ngokuzibona kumathelevishini bezwe nangazo ezindabeni ngoba azikaze zifinyelele kubona.“Iningi lethu asisebenzi ngakho asikwazi ukuzithenga lezi zidingo,” kuchaza umhlali.Ikhansela lakule ndawo uNksz Cebile Zuma uthe akanikeziwe igunya lokuphawula, wacela kuthintwe oyinhloko kwezokuxhumana kumasipla waseMshwathi, uMnuz Sbusiso Mkhithi.Iselula kaMkhithi ibingazamukeli izingcingo. Ngesikhathi sokuloba imilayezo ubengakayiphenduli.Ucingo lwakhe lwasehhovisi nalo belukhala lungabanjwa.
title: Ingase ivale ngehlahla iCovid-19 emijondolo "enganakiwe"

text: LUNGILE MAJOKAIZOBUYA ngonyaka ozayo iVodacom Challenge emva kokuhoxiswa kwayo kulo nyaka ngenxa yokungabi nesikhathi esanele ngokuhlela lo mqhudelwano owasungulwa ngo-1999 ohlanganisa izinkunzi zaseSoweto, i-Orlando Pirates neKaizer Chiefs.Izolo abagqugquzeli balo mqhudelwano iSAIL nabaxhasi iVodacom baqinisekise imibiko ekade yasabalala ethi abalandeli bazoyizwa ngendaba kulo nyaka iVodacom Challenge.Umgqugquzeli wakwaSAIL, uJabu Mathibela, uthe ukungabi khona kwesikhathi esanele sokuhlela umqhudelwano yikhona okubenze bawuhoxise kulo nyaka.“Isikhathi yisona esibe yinkinga kakhulu. Uma ukhumbula kahle mhlawumbe kusaphele izinyanga ezimbili iVodacom ivuselele ukuseka kwayo la maqembu (Pirates neChiefs). Besingafuni ukuxhamazela, yingakho sibone kungcono ukuthi siwumise kulo nyaka bese siqhubeka ngozayo,” kusho uMathibela.Ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bebexoxa neNewcastle United edlala ku-English Premiership neTP Mazembe yaseDR Congo njengoba kulo nyaka bekulindeleke ukuthi umqhudelwano ubuyele emaqenjini amane esikhundleni samathathu.“Ngokujwayelekile sike siqede izingxoxo namaqembu ngoNovemba wonyaka owandulela okuzodlalwa ngawo. Manje sesiqalile amalungiselelo onyaka ozayo. Sesixhumene nenkampani esisebenzisana nayo e-UK ukuthi isibhekele amaqembu.”U-Enzo Scarcella, esinye sezikhulu zakwaVodacom uzwakalise ukuseseka isinqumo esithathwe abakwaSAIL wathembisa ukuthi kulindelwe umqhudelwano osezingeni eliphezulu ngo-2013.
title: Izodlalwa ngo-2013 iVodacom Challenge

text: ZIMKHALELE umfundisi waseNgwelezane, eMpangeni, obanjwe oqotsheni ngamaphoyisa esontisa yize kuvalwe izwe kuliwa nokubhebhetheka kwegciwane iCorona.Lo mfundisi oboshwe ngeSonto kuthiwa uthathwe ngamaphoyisaemi epulupiti isha inkonzo ngemuva kokuthi amaphoyisa kaMasipala waseMhlathuze elunywe indlebeabathile abangamalungu ebandla mayelana nokuqhubeba kwenkonzo njengoba imigomo yokuvalwa kwezwe izinsuku ezingu-21 ingakuvumi ukuhlangana kwabantu okuhloswe ngakho ukuthi kugwemeke ukusabalala kwegciwane.Kuthiwa kuphinde kwaboshwa abanye abathathu eMhlanga khona eNgwelezane ababanjwe beqhuba ibhizinisi lokuwasha izimoto. Abanikazi bezimoto kuthiwa babalekile.Kuphinde kwavela ukuthi ngoMsombuluko kuboshwe iqeqebana labebesemcimbini womkhehlo kuyo le ndawo.Okhulumela uMasipala waseMhlathuze, uMnuz Mdu Ncalane, unxuse amalungu omphakathi ukuthi ahloniphe imigomo ebekwe wuhulumeni okuyimizamo yokuthi abantu baphephe kuleli gciwane.“Sicela ukuthi abantu bahlehlise imicimbi yabo kuze kudlule isikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe. Lokhu kwenzelwa ukuphepha kwezwe kulolu bhubhane, ngakho abantu kubalulekile ukuthi bathobele imithetho bahlale emakhaya,” kusho uNcalane.UNcalane uziqinisekisile zonke izigameko ukuthi zenzekile.UTSHWALA obutholwe kobebulayishe emotweni yakhe ngesikhathi amaphoyisa enesivimbamgwaqo kuM4 eThekwiniImizamo yokuthola amaphoyisa ukuze aqinikise ayiphumelelangaKhonamanjalo amaphoyisa aseThekwini abophe ababili ngokutholakala nenqwaba yotshwala.Ngokusho kwamaphoyisa ekhasini lawo leTwitter, amaphoyisa abenesivimbamgwaqo emgwaqweni uM4 ngoMsombuluko ngesikhathi emisa imoto ebithutha utshwala.Umsolwa uhlatshwe ngemibuzo ngamaphoyisa wagcina eseyikhombile indawo lapho ethenge khona utshwala eGlenmore.Kube sekuboshwa owesibili ngokwephula imigomo yokuvalwa kwezwe.
title: Uboshwe esepulupiti umfundisi obanjwe eshisa inkonzo ngothaqa

text: Lokhu kushiwo uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, iSayensi nobuChwepheshe, uDkt Blade Nzimande, esithangamini nabezindaba izolo.Uthe ukubhalisela ukufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme kuzoba phakathi kukaMashi,15 no-Ephreli 15 ngonyaka ozayo.“Asikho isikhathi, kumele kufundwe ngempela kugwenywe ukujikijelwa ngamatshe uma kuqala unyaka ngoba siningi isikhathi esilahlekile,” kusho uNzimande.Uthe njengoba elakuleli selisesigabeni sesibili sikathaqa, izikhungo sezizovunyelwa ukwamukela * -66% wezitshudeni emagcekeni azo okulindeleke ukuthi ziqale ukufika kusuka ngesonto elizayo. Phakathi kwezitshudeni ezizokwamukelwa, yizona zonke obekumele zibuyele esigabeni sesithathu sikathaqa kodwa izikhungo zangakwazi ukuzamukela ngenxa yokuthi beziwumthamo omkhulu kulowo obuvumelekile, bese kube yizona zonke izitshudeni ezenza unyaka wokuqala kuyona yonke imikhakha.“Njengoba izibalo zezitshudeni ezizokwamukelwa emanyuvesi zenyuka, kuzomele siqaphele kakhulu ngoba leli gciwane lingase libuye, ngakho kumele kuqhutshekwe nokulandela yonke imigomo,” kuqhuba uNzimande.Uthe bangu-80 abantu okubikwe ukuthi bashone ngenxa yeCovid-19 ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme okukhona kubo abasebenzi abangu-35 basemanyuvesi, izitshudeni eziyisishiyagalolunye bese kuba izitshudeni nabasebenzi abakumaTvet College.Bangu-1 552 okutholakale ukuthi sebehaqwe yileli gciwane kanti u-557 kubona yizitshudeni.Uthe abangu-2 040 basezikhungweni ezigcina abanalolu bhubhane bese kuthi abangu-2 076 bazivalele. Uthe angu-14 amanyuvesi abonwe njengasebungozini obuncane bokubhebhetheka kweCovid-19 okukhona kuwo ne-University of KwaZulu-Natal ne-University of Zululand. I-Durban University of Technology yona ikleliswe kumanyuvesi asebungozini obuphakathi nendawo kanti iMangosuthu University of Technology ingenye yasengozini enkulu ukubhebhetheka iCovid-19.Mayelana nokunikezwa kwezitshudeni ama-laptop, uNzimande ugxeke abasola ukuthi kunenkohlakalo ngokunikezwa kwethenda.Uthe uhlangene neziphathimandla zeNational Student Financial Scheme (NSFAS), zakuqinisekisa ukuthi ayikho ithenda yama-laptop ekhishiwe.Unxuse bafundi kuthi benze isiqiniseko sokuthi bafaka izicelo ngokushesha esikhwameni seNSFAS bangalindi usuku lokugcina njengoba ukufaka izicelo kuqale kule nyanga kuyoze kuphele ngasekupheleni kukaNovemba.
title: Kuzophela ngo-2021 ukufunda emanyuvesi
UGigaba uyaxolisa ngokuphakamisa ucikicane

text: . Kusolwa ukuthi umcimbi wabo ubungoMgqibelo.Kwesinye isithombe uSgqemeza ubonakala embathe ingubo yokukulala, ingoduso yakhe ikhophoza eduze kwakhe, ithwele isicholo. Kushaye isikhathi sokuloba ucingo lwakhe luvaliwe. Abalandeli bakhe bebemhalalisela ezinkundleni zokuxhumana yize yena engazange athi vu ngomcimbi.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi umembeso ubusoPhongolo kubo kwengoduso yakhe. Igama lengoduso nguZinhle kodwa isibongo sayo asitholakalanga. Abasondele noSgqemeza bathe kabazi lutho ngomcimbi. Ozakwabo asebenza nabo kuKhozi FM bathe bebengazi lutho ngomcimbi kodwa babone izithombe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.UHALALISELWE ngabalandeli bakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana uSipho ‘Sgqemeza’ Mbatha okuthiwa ubembesa ingoduso yakhe uZinhle wasoPhongoloUSqgemeza, ongowakwaCeza, kwaNongoma, usanda kushintshelwa ohlelweni lwasebusuku iSithakela Isizwe emuva kokususwa kolwasekuseni iVuka Mzansi Breakfast Show abelusakaza noNongcebo McKenzie. Akaqali ukuba nengoduso. Ngo-2016 kwabikwa ukuthi uhlukene nobeyingoduso yakhe uNksz Nqobile Mthungo wasoLundi.UNksz Mthungo, ongummeli, kwavela ukuthi ubesehambise ngisho ingqibamasondo, sekusezinhlelweni zokuthi ziwushaye. Kubuye kwavela ukuthi usenengoduso engudokotela nayo abagcine behlukene nayo. Abamaziyo bathi ujwayele ukungathandi ukuveza obala izindaba zakhe zothando.
title: Zinhle izindaba umsakazi woKhozi FM embesa

text: KUSOLWA umbango wokwelapha njengembangela edale ukuthi owesilisa obeyinyanga Ekuthuleni ngaseTshelimnyama adutshulwe abulawe ngumsolwa, naye okuthiwa uyisangoma, ngoMgqibelo ntambama.UMnuz Tebello Qacha (27) waseLesotho kuthiwa udutshulwe emva kokuxabana nomuntu owaziwayo endaweni ngesikhathi bephuza.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe kuthiwa umufi ubeke wadutshulwa amahlandla amathathu kanti kusolwa isangoma ngokumbulala. Umufi wasinda kulesi sigameko kodwa wagcina edutshulwe washona ngoMgqibelo.Intombi kamufi, uNksz Nomazwe Sibango, ithe kade iphuma emsebenzini ngesikhathi uQacha eyishayela ucingo ethi ayiphathe inyama yethumbu khona ezolipheka ngoba uyalihalela.“Ngifike endlini ngakhumula ngawasha izitsha ngaphinde ngayokha amanzi. Kuthe ithumbu ngisalifake emanzini ukuze kuncibilike iqhwa kwakhala ucingo ngishayelwa ngumfowethu wathi sebembulele umlamu wakhe. Indawo ashonele kuyo akuyona indawo ahlala kuyo. Ngiphuthume ngaleso sikhathi nomama ebenginabo endlini ngafica isidumbu sakhe silele eduze kwenye indlu. Angizange ngithole ncazelo kodwa izincazelo bengilokhu ngizithola kancane kancane ngesikhathi kukhuluma amalungu omphakathi. Ngesonto eledlule umufi ungishayele ucingo ngisemsebenzini wangitshela ukuthi kukhona umfana othwasayo omgeje ngezinhlamvu ezintathu ethaveni yaseDassenhoek. Ungitshele ukuthi umfana umzondela ukuthi yena wazi umuthi ekubeni yena (umsolwa) engakwazi ukwelapha. Ngicabanga ukuthi umbango wabo usukela ekwelapheni,” kusho uNksz Sibango.UMNUZ Tebello Qacha obeyinyanga Ekuthuleni ngaseTshelimnyama kusola ukuthi ubulawe yisangoma kubangwa indaba yokwelapha ngoMgqibelo.Ilungu lomphakathi, uMnuz Wiseman Nzimande, lithe baphatheke kabuhlungu ngendlela okwenzeke ngayo ngoba bebengalindele ukuthi kushone umuntu ngoMgqibelo ntambama kodwa isidumbu sakhe size sithathwe ngeSonto.“Entathakusa ngabo 2 kufike amaphoyisa aKwaNdengezi athi abizwe ngu-10111. Kuthe uma efika athi akukho angakwenza ngoba awasebenzeli ngalapha athi azobiza amaphoyisa aseMariannhill afike emuva kwesikhathi eside,” kusho uNzimande.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe amaphoyisa aseMariannhill aphenya icala lokubulala emva kokutholakala kwesidumbu sowesilisa.“Kusolwa ukuthi ngehora lesithupha izolo (ngoMgqibelo) ntambama, umufi ubesendaweni eyimijondolo Ekuthuleni ephuza nabantu abangaziwa. Kube nengxabano owesilisa oneminyaka engu-27 wadutshulwa ngumuntu owaziwayo. Umufi udubuleke esifubeni washonela endaweni yesehlakalo. Kuboshwe owesifazane oneminyaka engu-28 okusolwa ukuthi uyena odale ukuthi kuze kube nengxabano phakathi kukamufi nomsolwa. Umsolwa usathungathwa ngamaphoyisa kanti kulindeleke ukuthi abanjwe khona maduze,” kusho uNaicker.
title: Kufunwa isangoma ngokufa kwenyanga

text: EZINSUKWINI lapho sekubukeka sengathi ukaputeni eqenjini lebhola useqokwa ngokodumo oluhambisana negama lakhe ngaphezu kwezimpawu zobuholi, uya uncipha umkhuba wokuthi lo msebenzi unikwe abadlali basemuva nokuyinto ebingesiyo inkinga phambilini.Bazokhumbuleka abaholi abanjengoJohn Terry ohole iChelsea ne-England, Lucas Radebe ohole iBafana Bafana kwi-1998 Fifa World Cup kanjalo neLeeds United noFabio Canavarro onqobe i-2006 Fifa World Cup engukaputeni we-Italy.Basekhona nokho abadlali basemuva abawenzayo lo msebenzi kanti uma kukhulunywa ngeDiski Yomhlaba kusheshe kufike amagama kaThiago Silva ongukaputeni weBrazil neParis Saint Germain noSergio Ramos weReal Madrid neSpain.Eduze kubukeka belandelwa nguVirgil van Dijk ohola iNetherlands kanti abaningi ababona lokhu kuzomlolongela ukuhola neLiverpool ethungathunga izicoco zokufakazela ukubalwa namaqembu amakhulu e-England.Uma umqhathanisa noSilva noRamos, uVan Dijk (27) musha emsebenzini wokuhola izwe lakhe futhi cishe nguye obhekene nenselelo enkulu kwazise unikwe ibhande ngoMashi amaDutch esevele ehlulekile wukuzibekisela indawo kwi-2018 Fifa World Cup.Sekuwumlando ukuthi uRamos nezakhe bakhishwe esigabeni samaqembu angu-16 kanti noSilva neSelacao babuyele ekhaya beshesha.Bobabili laba bekungokwesibili behola amazwe abo kwiWorld Cup kwazise bakwenzile nango-2014 eBrazil.Abahlaziyi bebhola e-United Kingdom abakufihli ukuthi bambona uVan Dijk engukaputeni olandelayo weLiverpool okuyimanje iholwa nguJames Milner noJordan Henderson.Abaphaphalazi kodwa ababona kanjalo kwazise iLiverpool yiyo ekhulise igama likaVan Dijk imthenga ngezindodla ezimenza namanje abe ngumdlali wasemuva obiza imali eshisiwe ukubedlula bonke emhlabeni.ILiverpool imthenge kwiSouthampton ngo-75 million wopondo (R1.4 billion). ngesizini edlule ngemuva kokumataniswa namaqembu amaningi amakhulu e-Europe.Ukuthengwa yiqembu elikhulu ngemali eshisiwe ngenye yezinto umqeqeshi weNetherlands, uRonald Koeman, angafihlanga ukuthi zibe nomthelela ekuqokeni uVan Dijk.Okunye okube nomthelela wukuwagaxa emgibeni eqenjini lesizwe kuka-Arjen Robben odlala kwiBayern Munich engompetha beGermany Bundesliga.“Ngicabanga ukuthi kungabalwa nokuhlonipheka okukhulu umdlali angakuthola ukuba ngukaputeni wezwe lakho. Yinto enhle kakhulu - hhayi kuwe nje kuphela kodwa nasemndenini wakho nokutuseka komsebenzi wokuzi-khandla osuke usuwenzile kusukela ngosuku lokuqala (ebholeni elikho-khelayo). Yinto enhle kakhulu,” kusho uVan Dijk emithonjeni yebhola yaphe-sheya.I-Uefa Nations ngu-mqhudelwano wokuqala kaVan Dijk engukaputeni weNetherlands nokufanele babone ngawo benoKoeman ukuthi bazophumela yini ukubuyisela ibhola lamaDutch esicongweni somhlaba.Emdlalweni wokuqala weNations League ezikaVan Dijk zithelwe othulini ngo 2-1 ngompetha bomhlaba, iFrance.Lo mdlali udlale ingcwenga ngoMgqibelo waze washaya negoli ngesikhathi behlula iGermany ngo 3 - 0 emdlalweni we-Uefa Nations
title: Ukuhola iNetherlands kumqinisela iLiverpool

text: Mhleli: Esinye sezizathu ebesidala ukuthi ngithenge iphephandaba langoMgqibelo ngaphandle kokuphuthelwa yingenxa yengosi yeNkonzo yaseKameleni.Angazi noma yimi kuphela yini enginakayo ukuthi sengathi intokazi yakwaGumede isiqala ukukhathala.Uyazi kuqala sinomama wasekhaya sasibangisana ngalo iphephandaba endlini ngenxa yengosi kaMaGumede.Muva nje akusenjalo. Sengathi usekhathele usisi. Kungaba yinto enhle ukuthi mhlawumbe aphunyuzwe kutholakale omunye umuntu uma kungukuthi usephelelwe ushatini.Mhlawumbe ukuthatha ikhefu ayothatha amandla kungamsiza. Ingosi yakhe ayisafani neze nasekuqaleni. Ngiyakhumbula ukuthi nakulowo odweba opopayi uQap’s Mngadi ngake ngabona isikhalo esifanayo ngemidwebo yakhe wavuka emaqandeni wazithuntutha.Ngingajabula uma uMaGumede ezowamukela ngendlela eyakhayo umbono wami njengomlandeli wengosi nomfundi wephepha.Vusi MbathaEMAGABHENI
title: [IMIBONO] Angisawutholi umsoco engosini kaMaGumede

text: UMSUNGULI wekhasi labesifazane elikuFacebook, iLadies House, uzokhuluma ngaleli khasi kuKhozi FM kusasa.UChris Bhoni wodumo lwekhasi elididiyele abantu besifazane bodwa, okushaye isikhathi sokuloba bengu-358 997, umenywe ukuba azokhuluma ngalo ohlelweni lukaTshatha Ngobe noSelby Mkhize, iWoza Nabangani Bakho kusasa.UBhoni, odabuka eLusikisiki kodwa osezinze ePinetown, ukuqinisekisile lokhu.Uthe uzobe eyochaza kabanzi ngokwenzeka kuleli khasi nenhloso yakhe yokulisungula.“Ngithokoze kakhulu ngokumenywa wuKhozi FM ukuba ngizokhuluma ngeLadies House. Kuningi abantu abahlale bekuzwa ngaleli khasi kokunye kube okuhle nokubi. Ngizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi ngicacisa konke ngaleli thuba engiphiwa lona,” usho kanje.Ukhuluma kanje uBhoni kungenxa yokuthi kunamahlebezi okuthi abesifazane abakulona bakhuluma izindaba zemixovo nezamadoda kuphela.Uthe kuningi okuhle abantu abangakwazi njengokuthi kugcwele izifundiswa ezingesabi ukwabelana ngolwazi lwemikhakha ezikuyona.“Kuyelulekwana, kunikwana uthando, kuyesekwana kokuningi eLadies House. Uma kunowesifazne onenkinga bonke bayesekana bamsize. Ngikhuluma nje kugunjwa usuku lukaMandela kukhona abasize umndeni ohlwempu bawakhela bafaka nempahla,” kuchaza uBhoni.ILadies House ayiwemukeli amadoda nokwenza amanye acasuke abone ebandlululwa. Lokhu kwenza amanye agcine esethuka uBhoni ngokuthi nguye kuphela indoda kwabesifazane.ELadies House abesifazane bagcina sebebizana ngoMnaks kanti uBhoni ubizwa ngo-daddy.
title: Umenywe kuKhozi FM umsunguli weLadies House

text: UMBHISHOBHI unxuse abesifazane ukuthi bayeke ukusontela imishado kodwa uma becela ukuthandazelwa bacele izinto ezizobathuthukisa.UMbhishobhi Mpendulo Nkambule, obekhuluma emcimbini obuseBotanic Gardens eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu, uthe abesifazane abahlukane nokusontela imishado.UMbhishobhi uNkambule ubekhuluma eyala abesifazane ngokubaluleka kokuzimela nokuphumelela ngaphandle kokuthola umuntu wesilisa.Uthe usekhathele ukukhulekela abesifazane abafuna umendo ngoba bagcina sebegxila ekufuneni umshado bakhohlwe ukukhonza uNkulunkulu nokuthuthukisa impilo yabo.“Mina angisabakhulekeli abafuna ukuthandazelwa ngoba befuna umshado namadoda. Uzothi uyayithola uthole ixoxo lendoda. Ungazibulali ngoba lithi iBhayibheli konke okuhle kuvela kuNkulunkulu. Impumelelo yomuntu wesifazane ayikho kumuntu wesilisa, abantu besifazane kumele bakhulekele impumelelo umshado uzolandela njengesibusiso,” kusho uMbhishobhi uNkambule.Akagcinanga ngokukhipha iziyalo kodwa uphinde wenza nomkhuleko oyisipesheli abehlose ngawo ukubuyisa ithemba kwabesifazane. Akakhohlwanga ukubayala ngabesifazane baseBhayibhelini ababebhekene nezimo ezehlukene kodwa abazinqoba ngokulinda.“Konke kunesikhathi sako neBhayibheli liyasho. Umkhuleko oshintsha impilo yomuntu. Uma ungowesifazane ohluphekile thululela izinkinga zakho kuJehova,” kusho uMbhishobhi uNkambule.Kuwona lo mcimbi akakhohlwanga ukukhulekisa nabesifazane abanezingqinamba zokuthola izingane.
title: 'Celani okuzonithuthukisa niyeke ukufuna imishado'

text: INKANTOLO yokuDluliswa kwamaCala yakuleli, ngoMsombuluko ithathe isinqumo sokuwachitha amacala “okungalandeli imigomo ebekiwe” abebhekene nenjinga yaseThekwini, uNkk Shauwn “MaMkhize” Mpisane.Ngokwamaphepha asenkantolo, leli cala beliphakathi kwenkampani kaNkk Mpisane, iZikhulise Cleaning Maintenance & Transport nosihlalo wekomiti labaphenyi leConstruction Industry Development Board (CIDB) nabanye.Ngo-Ephreli ka-2013 iCIDB yathumelela uNkk Mpisane, isaziso, imazisa ngamacala angu-20 abhekene nawo ngenxa yokwephula imigomo ethile yaleli bhodi.UNkk Mpisane wabe esefaka isicelo ekomitini labaphenyi sokuthi ahoxiswe amacala, nokungenzekanga njengoba lanqaba leli komiti.Ngesikhathi ethintwa uNkk Mpisane, uyalele intatheli ukuthi ixhumane nommeli wakhe, okunguyena ozochaza kabanzi.UMnuz Phila Magwaza wakaGarlicke & Bousfield Inc ongummeli kaNkk Mpisane uthe amacala achithwe ngenxa yokungalandelwa ngendlela komthetho ngesikhathi kusungulwa uphenyo.Echaza uthe: “Uphenyo obeluphambi kwenkantolo belungekho emthethweni.Umuntu owayenza uphenyo wayengagunyaziwe ukwenza lolu phenyo ikakhulukazi njengoba umthetho wakuleli ukubeka kucace ukuthi inhlangano enjengoCIDB, kumele izenzele yona uphenyo lwayo noma yenzelwe wuhlaka oluthile lukahulumeni.”Uthe okunye okwenze la macala ahoxiswa, wukuvela kokuthi uphenyo lwalenziwe wumphenyi ozimele nokungaqondakali ukuthi wayegunyazwe ngubani ukwenza lolu phenyo kwazise ukuthi nohlaka lweSpecial Investigating Unit (SIU) aluphumelanga obala ukuthi umphenyi wayethunywe ngubani.Phakathi kwamacala abebekwe uNkk Mpisane kubalwa elokuhambisa izitifiketi zentela eziwumgunyathi, ukungaveli noma ukwehluka kwemali ebhalwe ezitatimendeni zemali, nokungavezi ukuthi kukhona umuntu asondelene naye owake walahlwa icala lenkohlakalo.UMagwaza uthe ngokwabo icala seliphelile yize bengazi-ke ukuthi iCIDB izothatha liphi igxathu elilandelayo.Leli phephandaba lizamile ukuxhumana nabakwaCIDB ukuthola ukuthi kuzokwenzakalani njengoba sekuphume lesi sinqumo esivuna uNkk Mpisane kodwa imizamo ayiphumelelanga njengoba beluzikhalela lodwa ucingo ehhovisi lungabanjwa.
title: UShauwn Mpisane uvunwe yinkantolo emacaleni

text: MHLENGI SHANGASEKUQALWA kuleli sonto ukugonyelwa iCovid-19 kothisha KwaZulu-Natal njengoba kulindeleke ukuthi kufike imigomo engu-110 400 yakwaJohnson&Johnson.Lokhu kumenyezelwe nguNdunankulu wesifundazwe, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, izolo ekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba lapho ethe kuzovulwa nezinye izikhungo ezingu-21 zokugoma.Uthe ezinye zezifunda zizovula ezinye izikhungo zokugoma kanti ezinye zivele zinazo ukuze othisha bakwazi ukuyogoma.Ubalule nokuthi basabheka nokuth iizikhungo zivulwe nangezimpelasonto ngoba othisha basebenza kusuka ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu. “Sikhathazekile ngokuthi ezikoleni ezimbalwa siyanda isibalo sabafundi abatheleleka ngegciwane. Esinye sezikole saseMzinyathi, kubikwe ngoLwesihlanu ukuthi abafundi abangu-16 batholakale ukuthi banegciwane. Kanjalo nasesikoleni esisoThukela kubikwe ukuthi bangu-15 abafundi abatholakale ukuthi benalo,” kusho uZikalala. UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo esifundazweni, uNksz Nomagugu Simelane, uthe bazogoma bonke othisha kodwa bazoqala ngalabo abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona.Uthe kusahlelwa indlela lolu hlelo oluzohamba ngayo wathi othisha bazozwa ngomnyango wezemfundo ukuthi kumele baye kuphi nokutih baye nini ukuyogoma.“Sinxusa othisha ukuthi bangaphumi bonke bayogoma, bazozwa ngomnyango wezemfundo ngoba uhlelo lusasetshenzwa. Asifuni ukuthi kuphazamiseke ukufunda nokufundisa yingakho singafuni ukuthi othisha baphume bonke ngesikhathi esisodwa bayogoma. “Sisabheka ukuthi ezinye izikole azikho yini eduzane nendawo okugonyelwa kuyona ukuze kube lula ukuthi othisha baye ngosuku oluyoshiwo ngumnyango wezemfundo.”Kwenzeka lokhu nje izinyunyana zothisha zifuna othisha bagonywe  ngokushesha njengoba noMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo uhlela ukuthi ngoJulayi 26 babuyele bonke abafundi basemabangeni aphansi ezikoleni.
title: Kuyaqala ukugomela iCovid-19 kothisha eKZN

text: LIBOSHIWE iphoyisa elingumnikazi wendawo yokucima ukoma ebiqhubeka nokudayisa utshwala bukhoma, okuphambene nemigomo kathaqa okuhloswe ngayo ukugwema ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane iCorona.Iphoyisa elingumphenyi wamacala esiteshini samaphoyisa eKranskop, kuthiwa liboshwe ngoMgqibelo ngemuva kokuthi bekuphuzwa ebhizinisini lalo eliseTsheni, KwaNtunjambili, kungavaliwe yize kungavumelekile ukudayiswa kotshwala nokuvulwa kwezindawo zokucima ukoma ngalesi sikhathi sikathaqa.Umthombo okhulume neSolezwe wakhona kule ndawo ongeke uvezwe, uthe ibhizinisi lokucima ukoma elaziwa ngokuthi kuseGugulethu, belingakaze livalwe kangangoba bese kusuka nabaqhamuka kwezinye izindawo bezothenga kulona.“Bekuhlala kugcwele kukhombisa ukuthi utshwala budayiswa bukhoma akufihliwe. Okubuhlungu wukuthi amanye amabhizinisi otshwala abevalwe yiwona amaphoyisa kodwa leli beliqhubeka lisebenza. Amanani otshwala abesekhuphuke ngendlela ebabazisayo kukhombisa nje ukuthi bebethole ithuba lokwenza imali ngoba endaweni yonke abantu bese bethutheleka khona,” kusho umthombo.Uthe zingaphezu kwesithupha izindawo zokucima ukoma endaweni futhi zonke zivalile kodwa eyaleli phoyisa okuthiwa belidayiselwa abangani balo, beyiqhubeka isebenza.Omunye umthombo ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe ziningi izigameko zokuphambana nomthetho ebezenziwa yileli phoyisa kodwa lingaboshwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke, uBrigadier Vish Naidoo, uthe amaphoyisa athole umbiko mayelana nephoyisa elingu-constable elinebhizinisi lokudayisa utshwala.“Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ophiko lwePublic Order Policing ehambisana nawaseKranskop, athole iphoyisa lidayisa ugwayi esitolo saso iGugulethu. Libe selibekwa icala lokwephula imigomo yokuvalwa thaqa kwezwe lahlawuliswa imali enguR2 000. Lizophinde lithathelwe izinyathelo ngaphakathi,” kusho uNaidoo.
title: Kuboshwe iphoyisa lendawo yokucima ukoma

text: NAKUBA kukhona ababona sengathi uGeorge Lebese washaya isikhala ngokushiya iKaizer Chiefs wasayina kwiMamelodi Sundowns kodwa umqeqeshi waleli qembu lasePitoli usamile ekutheni lo mdlali uyamdinga.Kunzima kuLebese ukuthola ijezi kwiSundowns. Egcina ukubonakala enkundleni, umqeqeshi uPitso Mosimane, watshela abezindaba ukuthi lo mdlali wakhala ngokukhathala, wase emkhipha. Waveza ukuthi akaqinile ngokwanele, ngakho kunohlelo lokuziqeqesha abamakhele lona, lokumakha ngokomzimba.Kusukela lapho ulizwa ngendaba ijezi alibanga nabadlali abanjengoSibusiso Vilakazi noKhama Billiat kwiDowns.Ngempelasonto, uLebese uthole ukugijima amanenjana ngesikhathi bedlala naMaZulu FC kowe-Absa Premiership.“UGeorge uyasebenza ngokuzikhandla ejimini. Siyamakha. Ungumdlali obalulekile kakhulu kithina. Umbonile nje nasenkundleni ukuthi ungene wawenza umehluko. Kukhona lapho ebesendaweni enhle yokuthi ashaye igoli ngebhadi uGaston Sirino wangamphasela,” kusho uMosimane ngemuva komdlalo waMaZulu. ULebese ukhona eqenjini leSundowns elibhekise amabombo eRwanda lapho lizodlala neRayon Sport koweCAF Champions League. Lona ngumdlalo womlenze wokuqala wokuhlungela amaqoqo. Unamuhla e-Amahoro National Stadium, eKigali ngo-6 ntambama.E-Angola iBidvest Wits izodlala neDe Agosto ngo-5 ntambama kuwona lo mqhudelwano.Ngesikhathi uMosimane esayinisa uLebese, Oupa Manyisa no-Aubrey Ngoma ubemi kwelokuthi ufuna bazolekelela iqembu lidle ubhedu kwiChampions League. ISundowns yanqoba le ndebe ngo-2016.Kulaba, uManyisa kuphela ofike wayithola indawo kwabaqala imidlalo njengoba eyibamba esiswini nokaputeni uHlompho Kekana noma noTiyani Mabunda.ISundowns iya kulo mqhudelwano ifuna ukukhokha isibhongo sanyakenye lapho ikhishwe yiWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco kuma-quarterfinal.I-Rayon Sport abazodlala nayo ihlule iLydia Ludic yaseBurundi emzuliswaneni wokuqala wokuhlunga. La maqembu azongena enkundleni iRayon igubezelwe yifu njengoba iCAF iyiphenya ngokuthenga umdlalo wayo neLudic. Ngemuva kwalokho umqeqeshi wayo ushiyile njengoba sekubambe * -Ivan Jacky Minnaert. NgeSonto leli qembu linqobe umdlalo walo weligi ngo 3-0.Ngemuva kwawo uMinnaert utshele abezindaba ukuthi bafuna umphumela omuhle kwiSundowns phambi kwabalandeli babo.“IMamelodi Sundowns ingelinye lamaqembu aphambili e-Afrika. Sizoya emdlalweni wangoLwesithathu (namuhla) sinento eyodwa emqondweni, ukwenza kahle phambi kwabalandeli bethu. Siyibukile imidlalo yabo yakamuva neyeChampions League. Bayiqembu elihle uma lihlasela. Kuzomele sikwazi ukumelana nanoma yini abayilethayo,” kusho uMinnaert kwi-www.newstimes.co.rw
title: UPitso akaguquki ngoLebese

text:
USETHOLE ukwesekwa nguzakwabo alinginisa naye kwiSibaya uCeleste Ntuli odabeni lokugxeka ukuziphatha kukanontandakubukwa uZodwa Wabantu. UCeleste usanda kutinyelwa nguZodwa owayeziphendulela kwinkulumo abanayo emsakazweni iPower FM lapho amgxeka khona wathi akazihloniphi futhi kumele ahloniphe umzimba wakhe agqoke iphenti. “Amantombazane amnyama awanakwa uma esebenza kanzima, enza izinto ezinhle. Kodwa kukhona amantombazane avele akhumule izikhindi zawo zangaphansi, wonke amehlo athi njo kuwona. Angikuqondi ukuthi yini wonke umuntu akhulume ngale nto, iyanyanyisa, yenza thina bantu besifazane abamnyama sibukeke kabi,” kusho uCelesteEziphendulele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana eqeda ukuzwa le nkulumo uZodwa wabiza uCeleste ngengulube.December Boss noma yini🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥A post shared by 
zodwalibram(@zodwalibram) on Dec 28, 2017 at 11:11pm PST“Uma ngiyiShebeen Queen ngomsebenzi wami, wena uyingulube engcolile sihla.... Uthi ngeke uthathe nami isithombe uma sihlangana. Ngabe bengisicelile yini? Angidinge kuthandwa muntu mina. Ngiyacela ukuthi ungafaki igama lami uma ukhuluma ngomsebezi wakho,” kubhala uZodwa. Kuleli sonto lolu daba lungenelwe nawu-Ayanda Borotho, olingisa indawo kaMaDlamini kwiSibaya oshade noMpiyakhe Zungu. "Uma ungeke uthande ukubona indodakazi yakho yenza okufanayo, ungakubizi ngenkululeko. Akekho umzali ophilile ekhanda ongathi kulungile ukuthi ume phambi kwamadodakazi ethu nentsha yabantu besifazane ubatshele ukuthi abasebenzise indu...(esebenzisa igama elilumelayo) ukuze bathole abakufunayo ngoba siyadli..." U-Ayanda uthe lo myalezo ubhebhezela indlela yokubukwa kwabantu besifazane "njengezinto zocansi". "Ngeke sithi kulunguli ukubhebhezela umyalezo oyingozi kanje. Kuyimanje asiphephile njengabantu besifazane, manje sesitshela abantu besilisa ukuthi "isifane lento". KuCeleste, siyabonga ngokuma wedwa uhlaselwa ngokungengqondo ngenkathi ukhuluma iqiniso lakho. Amandla kubantu besifazane abangeke bavume ukuthuliswa," kuphetha u-Ayanda.
title: UCeleste usekwe 'umaDlamini' koluka Zodwa Wabantu

text: AKASIBONI isidingo sokuxhamazela umqeqeshi weCell C Sharks, uRobert du Preez Snr, yize seziqalile izinkulumo zokuthi leli qembu yilona elizobamba ibhuleki kwawaseNingizimu Afrika kwiVodacom Super Rugby.Nakuba iSharks iqale ithwelwe ngeqoma, kodwa emidlalweni emine yokuqala isihleli kunombolo 9 kwi-log ehlanganise wonke amaqembu akhona kulo mqhudelwano. Lokhu kuqala ngebatha sekwenze abaningi bajika imiqondo ngeSharks esanqobe kanye yashaywa kabili yase idlala ngokulingana emidlalweni yayo yokuqala emine.Yize kunje kodwa uDu Preez ukholwa wukuthi indlela abazoqala ngayo oweMelbourne Rebels namuhla, iyona ezocacisa indlela ngebanga elizohanjwa ngoShaka kule sizini. Lo mdlalo weSharks neRebels esendaweni yesibili kwi-log lapho ilandela khona i-Emirates Airlines Lions ungo-10.45 ekuseni, e-AMMI Park.“Angiwangabazi nangephutha amava abanawo abadlali bami. Angikungabazi futhi ukuthi sizosiguqula isimo size."ISuper Rugby inzima ngendlela ongeke ukwazi ukuyichaza ngakho-ke konke okwenzekayo (imiphumela) kufanele ukwamukele kukukhulise kungakhathalekile ukuthi kuhle noma kubi,” usho kanje uDu Preez esehhotela leSharks, eMelbourne e-Australia.“Ayikho into emqoka njengokuqala kahle umdlalo weRebels.
