Uma singaqala kahle sizoba ngenkulu inkinga kubona yize behambela phezulu kwazise baqale kahle.”Esikimini sakhe uDu Preez uqale ngabadlali basemuva okuyibona vele laba abebethwelwe ngeqoma ngaphambi kokuqala komqhudelwano ukuthi iSharks izodla ngabo. Lapha singabala uCurwin Bosch, Sbu Nkosi, Lukhanyo Am, Marius Louw, Lwazi Mvovo noRobert du Preez Jnr. UMakazole Mapimpi ngeke adlale kwazise akekho nasebhentshini.Isiyonke imidlalo yeVodacom Super Rugby Imi kanje:Namuhla: Crusaders v Bulls (AMI Stadium, 8.35am); Rebels v Sharks (AAMI Park, 10.45am).Kusasa: Sunwolves v Chiefs (Prince Chichibu Memorial Stadium, 6.15am); Hurricanes v Highlanders (Westpac Stadium, 8.35am); Stormers v Reds (DHL Newlands, 5.15pm); Jaguares v Lions (Estadio Jose Amalfitani, 11.40pm).
title: Usenethemba lokuvuka emaqandeni oweSharks

text: IQOPHE umlando ithola u-100% iVelabahleke High, yaseMlaza eyagcina ukuphasa ngale ndlela ngo-1999.Lesi ngesinye sezikole esihlale senza kahle njengoba sithola ngaphezulu kuka-90% minyaka yonke kwa-matric.IMenzi High iphinde edume ngazo ngokuthi ithole u-100% osekuphele iminyaka engaphezulu kuka-10 iwuthola.UMfundisi Bheki Mhlongo, uthishanhloko waseVelabahleke uthe ukusebenzisana okuhle nothisha yikhona okuthele izithelo zemiphumela emihle.Uthe ukuhlangana njalo nabafundi abangenzi kahle kanjalo nemihlangano abeba nayo nabazali yiyona eyenze ukuthi benze kahle.“Bengihlangana nabafundi abangenzi kahle njalo ngenyanga kanjalo nalabo abenza kahle sibagqugquzele. Siqinisekisa ukuthi ngoJuni/Julayi siyayiqeda isilabhasi ukuze sibuyekeze. U-matric uqalile nje ukufunda ngoJanuwari 3 kuzothi kuvulwa wona uzobe usuhambile impela ezifundweni,” kusho uMhlongo.Okunye athe bayakwenza ukuthi uGrade 11 uqale umsebenzi wekota yokuqala weMaths ngoNovemba ukuze kuthi uma sebefika kwa-matric babe sebekhathulile.Abafundi bakwa-matric bangena ngo-5:50 ekuseni bazifundele kuze kube * -7:30. Ntambama baqala ngo-3 babuyekeze kuze kushaye * -4:30. Kusuka ngo-4:30 baba nezinhlelo eziyisipesheli zemaths nesayensi.UMhlongo uthe babe nezinye izinhlelo zokusiza abafundi bakwaGrade 8 no-9 ngemaths.Abafundi abaduduliwe bebengu-12 kodwa abangu-10 bazibhale zonke izifundo zabo.“Ababili abayibhalanga imaths kodwa baphasile. Sizoqhubeka siyibambe siqinise kulokhu ebesikwenza ngoba sifuna ukuma kulo-100%. Ngifike ngo-2016 imiphumela ingu-98.25% yanyuka ngo-2017 yabangu-98.9% njengobamanje sithole * -100%.”Uthe ekilasini bebengu-60 njengoba bebenabafundi abangu-185.Uthishanhloko waseMenzi, uNksz Muntu Ntombela, uthe ukuzimisela kothisha yikhona okukhipha imiphumela emihle minyaka yonke kulesi sikole.Uthe baqeda isilabhasi ngo-Agasti bese bebuyekeza.“Besinabafundi abaningi kulo nyaka njengoba bebengu-212. Bangu-11 abaduduliwe abebekhona.” Lesi sikole sinomlando omuhle futhi sihlale sinconywa ngokuhlale sithola * -100%UNksz Ntombela uthe ufundisa isiZulu kwa-matric wathi bathole * -100% kulesi sifundo.Ukhale kakhulu ngezigebengu ebezihlalise lubhojozi abafundi ebusika njengoba kukhona umfundi owalinyazwa.“Kunomfundi wesifazane owabanjwa inkunzi wagwazwa wahlala inyanga yonke ekhaya engakwazi ukuhamba. Siyajabula ukuthi uphasile lo mfundi.”Uthe kungenwa ngo-6 ekuseni kuphunywe ngo-6 ntambama.“Ngibonga angiphezi ethimbeni iSMT esibambisene nayo kanjalo nothisha abazikhandlayo. Sibenabafundi abathole o-A bodwa abangu-7 nabathathu abathole * -100% kwisayensi,” kusho uNksz Ntombela oqale ngo-2016 ukuba nguthishanhloko walesi sikole kanti wathatha izintambo kuMnuz Feix Mshololo owashona owayekhiqiza o-100% kuphela.
title: EzaseMlaza zikuphindile lokho ku-matric

text: INKANTOLO enkulu eGauteng isichithile isinqumo esamenyezelwa nguNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo kuleli uNkk Angie Motshekga sokuthi kuphinde kubhalwe amaphepha ka-matric aputshuka. Ijaji uNorman Davis lithe lesi sinqumo asihambisani nemigomo, asikho emthethweni futhi kumele sibuyekezwe ngakho uyasichitha. Umnyango ubuphakamise ukuthi lawa maphepha okuyiphepha lesibili leMaths, nephepha lesibili leSayensi, kumele abhalwe kabusha ngesonto elizayo. I-Afriforum, iSadtu nezinye izinhlangano zifake udaba enkantolo ziphikisa isinqumo somnyango.Ijaji lithe abafundi banelungelo lokuthi amakwe amaphepha abawabhalile bese kuba kuMnyango ukuthi wenzani ngabafundi okuzotholwa ukuthi baphule umthetho. Umnyango uyalelwe ukuthi ukhokhele izindleko zecala.
title: Inkantolo ichithe isinqumo soMnyango wezeMfundo ngamaphepha aputshuka

text: KUXWAYISWA abazozama ukukhohlisa babhalisele uR350 owenzelwe abantu abangasebenzi ngenxa yeCovid-19.Esithangamini nabezindaba izolo ePitoli, uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uNkk Lindiwe Zulu, uveze izinhlelo zomnyango zesigaba sesine sikathaqa. Ubehambisana nesikhulu seSouth African Social Security Agency (Sassa), uNkk Busisiwe Memela-Khambula ochaze ngoR350.UNkk Memela-Khambula uthe labo abavele bathola isibonelelo sanoma yiluphi uhlobo kuhulumeni, ngeke zamukelwe izicelo zabo. Kunendlela abazokwazi ukubheka ngayo ukuthi abantu abatholi sibonelelo, wabala ngisho izitshudeni ezixhaswe yisikhwama iNSFAS athe azingeni kulesi sibonelelo.“Ngosuku lokuqala lokubhaliswa sathola izicelo ngoWhatsApp eziwu-100 000, * -50% wazo okuyilabo abavele bahola ezinye izibonelelo. Siphinde sathola izicelo eziwu-250 000 nge-email, nazo * -50% wazo okungezabantu abazitholayo izibonelelo,” kusho uNkk Memela-Khambula.Uthe iziboshwa kazisitholi isibonelelo. Ecacisa ngokudingekayo uma kubhaliswa, uthe sebesungule inombolo entsha kaWhatsApp ethi-082 046 8553 eqale ukusebenza khona izolo. Kwabangenawo uWhatsApp bangashaya *134*7737# balandele indlela yokufaka isicelo ngocingo kanti kungathunyelwa ne-email [email protected]Kwabafaka isicelo okudingeka babe neminyaka ewu-18 nangaphezulu, kudingeka inombolo kamazisi, eyocingo, i-akhawunti yasebhange nekheli lalapho behlala khona.UNkk Memela-Khambula uthe imali izofakwa kwi-akhawunti yasebhange kusukela kule nyanga kuya ku-Okthoba. Amahhovisi abo aqalile ukuvulwa izolo kodwa kuzosebenza * -30% wabantu.“Kumele abantu babekezele ngoba akubona bonke abasebenzi abazobuyela emahhovisi okwamanje, okungenzeka umsebenzi uhambe kancane. NgoMsombuluko nangoLwesibili sizokwamukela izicelo zabadala nabakukhubazekile, siqale ngalabo asebeneminyaka ewu-60 okumele bahole impesheni yabadala. NgoLwesithathu noLwesine sizokwamule izicelo zababhalisa isibonelelo sezingane nezintandane kodwa sicela bazishiye emakhaya ngenxa yesimo esibhekene naso,” kusho uNkk Memela-Khambula.UNkk Zulu ucele ukuthi abazofaka izicelo zesibonelelo sabangasebenzi babekezele ngoba kungenzeka kuminyane utshumo ngenxa yobuningi bezicelo. Ugcizelele ukuthi bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukusheshisa ngoba bayazi kunabantu abayidinga ngempela imali.Umemezele nokuthi abebevalelekelwe yimali yesibonelelo sokukhubazeka ngoba kumele bavuselele, sebezoqhubeka nokuyithola kuze kushaye * -Okthoba.Izingane sezizokwazi ukubuyela kulabo okumele zihlale nabo, ebezivaleleke kwezinye izifundazwe nakwamanye amadolobha ngenxa kathaqa.“Ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa imigomo yesigaba sesine sokuvalwa kwezwe sabona ukuthi izingane zishiyeke ngaphandle. Siyaqonda ukuthi odabeni lwezingane kuba nesivumelwano esenziwa ngomlomo uma zivakasha, yingakho sibone kumele zidedelwe zibuyele kubabheki bazo. Siyazi kunabantu abadala abebesenkingeni bevaleleke nezingane zingasakwazi ukubuyela kwabahlala nazo ngenxa yesimo. Nokho bekumele siqinise imithetho ukugwema ukushushumbiswa kwezingane,” kusho yena.Uthe uma izingane zigoduka kuzodingeka kuvezwe amaphepha awubufakazi bokuthi zihamba nomuntu ofanele, okuzodingeka kutholwe nencwadi egunyazayo enkantolo. Kuzoqashwa osonhlalakahle abawu-1 809 ukusiza nangokweluleka abahlukunyezwe yiCovid-19. Bazoqala ngalabo abavele basohlwini lomnyango, abalinde ukuqashwa. Labo sonhlalakahle bazosebenza izinyanga ezintathu.UNkk Zulu uveze nokuthi kuzoba namavolontiya awu-580 azosiza ohlelweni lokuhambisa ukudla kulabo abaswele. Ukhale ngokungahleleki kohlelo, wagcizelela ukuthi kuhlonishwe nesithunzi salabo abaswele. Uxwayise laba abathatha ukudla okweqile nabakudayisayo ukuthi bawuyeke lo mkhuba ngoba bancisha abahlwempu.
title: U-R350 awuzotholwa noma wubani: isikhulu

text: KUNYOMFEKE izinhlelo zokuthola iqembu ku-Evans Rusike weMaritzburg United, kushona imenenja yakhe u-Edzai Kasinauyo okuvela ukuthi ubemzamela kwelinye lamakhulu eNingizimu Afrika.UKasinauyo (42) waseZimbabwe ushone ngoLwesihlanu eDonald Gordon Medical Center, eGoli. Wafika kuleli okokuqala ngo-1999 ezodlala kwiCape Town Spurs eyayiphethwe nguJohn Comitis osengusihlalo weCape Town City. UKasinauyo udlale emaqenjini amaningi okukhona kuwona iMoroka Swallows, Ajax Cape Town neHellenic.EDZAI KASINAUYOUyeke ibhola ngo-2008 wathatha umsebenzi wokuba yimenenja yabadlali okukhona kubona uRusike, Khama Billiat weMamelodi Sundowns, Willard Katsande weKaizer Chiefs noBlessing Moyo odlala kwiMaritzburg.Kuvele ukuthi uKasinauyo ubekade esegxile kuleli kusukela ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezedlule ngenhloso yokuthola ukwelashwa.Umthombo osondelene noRusike uveze ukuth uKasinauyo unqotshwe wukufa ematasa ezamela lo mdlali iqembu azogijima kulona ngesizini ka-2017/2018. URusike ungomunye wabadlali abayinyama beTeam of Choice. Sekunesikhathi kuvela ukuthi ufunwa yiChiefs ne-Orlando Pirates.“Kumanje uRusike akazi ukuthi kuzokwenzekalani. UKasinauyo ubemtshela ukuthi kukhona amzamela khona eNingizimu Afrika,” kusho umthombo.URusike kumanje useZimbabwe lapho elinde khona ukuthi atholelwe elinye iqembu azodlala kulona. Njengoba enenkontileka esalelwe yisizini eyodwa neTeam of Choice, iqembu elimfunayo kufanele lifongqe isingqoko kuyona. Ngaphambi kokuphela kwesizini umthombo uveze ukuthi uRusike ngeke abuyele kwiTeam of Choice ngesizini ezayo kwazise maningi amaqembu amfunayo okukhona kuwona nelaphesheya kwezilwandle.Ekuqaleni kwesonto kusabalale imibiko yokuthi iMaritzburg ifuna uR5 million kwiPirates ngoRusike.Nokho usihlalo weTeam of Choice, uFarook Kadodia, usalokhu emile kwelokuthi akadayisI lo mgadli.
title: Kuphazamiseke izinhlelo kushona imenenja kaRusike

text: NGQESHE BUTHELEZIE MINYAKENI eminingi ngibhala ngezimoto, bekuqala ukuthi ngizithole kumele ngibhale ngezimoto ezintathu zenkampani eyodwa ezethulwe kanyekanye. Le nkanankana engizithole ngikuyo idalwe inkampani yakwaMazda Southern Africa eyethule ngesikhathi esisodwa iMazda3, Mazda 6 neMazda CX-5.Mazda 3Ihlukene ngezinhlobo eziyisikhombisa, kukhona enesinqe i-sedan ne-hatch enesishwapha. Sekuyi-Mazda 3 entsha sha eyakhelwe ku-chassis omusha we-Skyactiv okuwubuchwepheshe obusha bakwaMazda. Ngalobu buchwepheshe kwaMazda bathi izimoto zabo sezonga kakhulu kunakuqala kuphethroli.Phakathi kwezinjini ezikhona ku-Mazda 3 yi-1.6 litre ekhiqiza amandla afinyelela ku-77kW kanye ne-torque engu-144Nm. Ilandelwe engu-2.0 litre ekhiqiza amandla afinyelela ku-121kW kanye ne-torque engu-210Nm.Injini engu-1.6 litre iphuma no-gearbox ongu-5 speed oshintshwayo kanye nozishintshayo odonsa ngamagiya amane.Labo abazothenga i-Mazda 3 2.0 litre bazobe behamba ngobukhosi bemoto ngoba yona idonsa ngamagiya ayisithupha. I-Mazda 3 thina esakhula ibizwa nge“sgcinci” isishintshe kakhulu manje futhi sekuyabonakala ukuthi sekuyimoto yesimanje. Ingena esigabeni esinombango oshisa phansi okukhona kuso iHyundai Elantra, Ford Focus, Toyota Corolla ne-Honda Civic. Ngaphakathi le moto ivulekile kodwa okudonse kakhulu amehlo indlela u-dashboard wayo ohlanganiswe ngayo, zonke izinto zithothene ndawonye futhi nomshayeli kuba lula ukuthi afinyelele kuzo.Izihlalo zihlukene, kukhona isikhumba kanye nendwangu kuye ngokuthi ikusiphi isigaba. Zonke izinhlobo ziphuma nama-airbag ngaphambili nasezinhlangothini.Okunye okukhona kuzona zonke izinhlobo, indlela edunyiswa ngayo yebhathini.AMANANI EMAZDA 31.6 Original R232 9001.6 Active R242 9001.6 Dynamic R253 1001.6 Dynamic Auto R256 4002.0 Individual R293 6002.0 Individual Auto R299 6002.0 Astina R326 300MAZDA 6Ibuye sebelinyuse kakhulu izinga layo kwa-Mazda kungaselona loluya huntshu lukabhavu olwaluhamba omama abondlekile. Kulokhu isitholakala ngezinhlobo eziyisithupha ezinesinqe yase ihlukana ngezinjini ezintathu. Zisuka nje ebhandeni kukhona engu-2.0 litre esebenzisa uphetroli ekhiqiza amandla afinyelela ku-114kW kanye ne-torque engu-200Nm. Injini elandelayo engu-2.5 litre yona ikhiqiza amandla afinyelela ku-138kW ne-torque engu-250Nm. Uvala kwi-Mazda 6 ileyo engu-2.2 litre esebenzisa udizili eyi-turbodiesel enamandla angu-129kW kanye ne-torque engu-420Nm.Ngesikhathi ngihamba ngayo ngiyibone kuyimoto enesithunzi futhi ekwenza uhlonipheke ngenxa yokuvuleka kwayo. Emabhampini akulula ukuthi uyizwe ngoba intofontofo. Izihlalo zisebenza ngamabhathini kulezo ezisesigabeni esiphezulu.AMANANI2.0 Active R342 0002.0 Active Auto R358 0002.5 Dynamique Auto R373 0002.5 Individual Auto R399 5002.2 DE Dynamic Auto R404 0002.2 DE Atenza Auto R430 500MAZDA CX5Sekuphele iminyaka emibili ikhona kuleli kodwa namanje ayikangeni kahle ebantwini i-CX5. Ukugcina kwami ukuhamba ngayo bekunguNovemba 2013 esiqiwini iThala, eCamperdown kusekhona ebidonsa ngamasondo amabili kuphela isebenzisa uphetroli, ngaphambi kokuthi kwethulwe entsha ka-2014 enenjini engu-2.5 litre kaphetroli kanye nedonsa ngodizili i-2.2 turbodiesel. Engikuqaphelile ngentsha ukuthi isiqoqekile kodwa okuhle abakwenzile ukuthi abazange bayincishe isikhala ngaphakathi. KwaMazda bathi kungokokuqala ukuthi kube khona edonsa ngawo wonke amasondo kuleyo engu-2.2 litre.AMANANI Ecx-52.0 aCTIVE FWD R316 6002.0 Active FWD Auto R326 6002.0 Dynamique FWD R326 6002.2 DE Active FWD auto R375 4002.5 Individual FWD auto R398 6002.2 DE Akera AWD auto R456 100
title: AbakwaMazda benze okungajwayelekile

text: KUZOPHUMA isinqumo eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu kusasa ngokuthi uzoqhubeka ashushiswe noma cha owayenguMengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma.UZuma ubhekene necala lokukhwabanisa, elenkohlakalo, nelokushushumbisa imali okwenzeka ngama-90’s ngenkathi kuthengwa izikhali.Abophiko lwezokushushiswa, iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA), bathe isinqumo sizophuma kusasa.Okhulumela i-NPA u-Advocate Bulelwa Makeke uthe: “Isinqumo ngesicelo sikaZuma sokuba kungashushiswa sizophuma ngoLwesihlanu (kusasa).”Okhulumela i-NPA KwaZulu- Natal uNkk Natasha Kara, naye ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kusasa kuzophuma isinqumo enkantolo. Lesi sinqumo siphuma nje, ngoMeyi nonyaka, ithimba labameli baZuma, eliholwa ngu-Advocate Muzi Sikhakhane SC, bathi leli cala liphazanyiswe ukuhlehla njalo nokugxambukela kwabathize ngakho bafuna lihoxiswe. Abashushisi bakuphikisa lokhu bathi okunye ukuhlehla kwecala kwadalwa uye uZuma.Ngesonto elizayo kulindeleke ukuthi uZuma abuyele kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana lapho okulindeleke ukuthi aqhubeke aphendule imibuzo ayephekwa ngayo ngaphambi kokukhetha ukuhoxa ekhalaza ngemibuzo eyayibhekiswe kuyena.
title: Kuphuma isinqumo ngelibekwa uZuma

text: UBUHLATHI beSouth African Football Association (Safa) busazoqhubeka budale ezinkinga eqenjini lesizwe iBafana Bafana. Lona ngumbono ka-Ephraim “Jomo” Sono, ongumnikazi weJomo Cosmos edlala kwiNational First Division (NFD).ISafa ithungatha umqeqeshi welesizwe ngemva kokuxosha * -Ephraim “Shakes” Mashaba ngasekupheleni konyaka odlule.“ISafa iyibhubesi elingenamazinyo. Ukube inekomiti elibhekana ngqo nomqeqeshi bese lidlulisela ezikhulwini zayo ngabe ayikho le nkinga yokushintshashintshwa kwabaqeqeshi.Kwakhona nje ukuthi umengameli weSafa abonane nomqeqeshi welesizwe siqu ngezithinta umsebenzi wakhe akuzwakali kahle.Ukube leli komiti lalikhona ngabe uDanny Jordaan, ubengaxoxi noMashaba siqu. Ngabe ubethumela ikomiti lixhumane noMashaba kuphume isisombululo.Ngisho lokhu okwenzeka ePolokwane emva komdlalo neSenegal njengoba sizwa kuthiwa akamhloniphanga ngabe akwenzekanga ngoba uMashaba ubezoxhumana nekomiti, amele kude le uJordaan,” kuchaza uSono.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe ubona kuzoba ngubani ozothatha izintambo kwelesizwe, uSono uthe: “Ngokuyazi kwami iSafa, isinaye kudala umqeqeshi futhi kungenzeka kade asayina.“Okubuhlungu ukuthi kuzidlalelwa ngabantu nje kuthiwa bafake ama-CV ngenhloso yokuzama ukwenza isimo kube ngesejwayelekile. Ngakho ngeke ngathuka uma isivele ikade yamqasha ozovala esikaMashaba,” usho kanje.Le nkakha izwakalise ukumzwela umqeqeshi omusha weBafana Bafana ozothatha izintambo, uma “engenawo umgogodla oqinile”.“Ngiyamzwela umqeqeshi omusha weBafana Bafana uma engenawo umgogodla oqinile ngoba uzodlala ama-agent efuna kufakwe abadlali bawo. Ngesikhathi kunomqhudelwano weNdebe yoMhlaba ngo-2002, ngathenjiswa itshe lemali ngenye yama-agent ukuba ngidlalise umdlali wayo.“Ngayithembisa inqindi, ngayitshela ukuthi kangithengwa mina, ngidlalisa umdlali ngoba ekufanele ukudlala kwelesizwe. Loyo mdlali, angimdlalisanga emdlalweni wethu wokuqala neParaguay esawudlala ngokulingana ngo-2-2.Nokho ngamfaka emdlalweni wethu wesibili sengimbonile ukuthi ukulungele ukudlala, futhi wafika washaya negoli. Ngisho ukuthi komele azibambe ziqine ozothatha izintambo ngoba awawubambi umshini ama-agent,” kuchaza uSono efa yinsini.ISafa kulindeleke ukuthi imemezele umqeqeshi omusha welesizwe ngenyanga ezayo.
title: UJomo udabukela ozoqeqesha iBafana

text: CELANI SIKHAKHANES ICASULE abaholi abaphezulu beNFP isenzo sentsha yaleli qembu eGoli sokuhlaba ikhwelo lokuba kubuyiswe uMnuz Bheki Cele esikhundleni sokuba nguMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa ngoba kunenkolelo yokuthi nguyena ongakwazi ukulwisana nobugebengu.UNobhala Jikelele weNFP uSolwazi Nhlanhla Khubisa, uthe kuyihlazo ukuthi kungaba nabantu abakuleli qembu abangaqhuba umkhankaso wokuba kubuyiswe uCele ekubeni kwazi wonke umuntu ukuthi waxoshwa.“Thina siyiNFP sithi akuqokwe umuntu okhona ngaphakathi embuthweni wamaphoyisa onamagalelo amgunyaza ukuba angazithatha izintambo zokukhuza amaphoyisa.“Indaba kaCele siyaziqhelelanisa nayo ngoba kuyaziwa ukuthi watholwa engakufanele ukuphatha amaphoyisa waze waxoshwa ngisho wuMengameli,” kusho uKhubisa.Intsha yaleli qembu ibithi ifuna okungenani uCele ayofakwa esifundazweni iGauteng ngoba liphezulu izinga lokubulawa kwabantu namaphoyisa.UKhubisa uthe baningi abantu emaphoyiseni asebenesikhathi beyibambile futhi abanamakhono adingekayo okuthi bakwazi ukungena esikhundleni somkhuzi wamaphoyisa.UNobhala wentsha yeNFP eGauteng, uMnuz Sabelo Dlamini, uthe kuyacaca ukuthi abaholi babo baphila komunye umhlaba uma bezochitha indaba kaCele ekubeni isimo sisibi abantu bebulawa kabuhlungu yizigebengu.“Okokuqala, ngiyabona ukuthi thina lapha eGauteng nabaholi bethu kuzwelonke sihola izinhlaka ezingafani ngendlela abakhuluma ngayo.“Bekungabakuhle ukuthi basithinte noma basibize basho lokho abangakuthandi esikwenzile kunokuba baqhamuke sebesihlasela kwabezindaba.“Ngaphandle kwalokho wonke umuntu ohlala eGauteng uyasibona isidingo sikaCele ngenxa yokuthi amaphoyisa abulawa phambi kwabantu bebuka, amalungu omphakathi adutshulwa emini kubukwa ebanjwa inkunzi yizigebengu,” kusho uDlamini.Uthe okunye abaholi beNFP okumele bakuqonde wukuthi uCele akazange atholwe yinkantolo enecala waze waboshwa ngoba ukube kunjalo ngabe akazange aqokelwe isikhundla sokuba yiphini likaNgqongqoshe wezoLimo, amaHlathi nokuDoba kuleli.
title: Bahlukene phakathi ngolukaCele

text: UMBUSO unike owayeyimeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede nasolwa nabo amaphepha anohlu lwamacala angu-2 786 abathweswe wona ngezinsolo ezimayelana nokukhwatshaniswa kwethenda yokuqoqwa kukadoti kaR430 million ngo-2016/17.UNkk Gumede, imenenja kamasipala weTheku uMnuz Sipho Nzuza nomkakhe uNkk Bagcinile Nzuza, owayeyikhansela uMnuz Mondli Mthembu nabanye abangu-18 okukhona amakhansela nezinkampani  bavele enkantolo yamacala emali eThekwini izolo.Amakhulu abalandeli bakaNkk Gumede,  abebegcwele ngaphandle kwenkantolo beqhamuka ezifundazweni ezehlukene bezomeseka bathe lena yindlela yokumnqanda ekutheni angabuyeli ekubeni usihlalo we-ANC esifundeni iTheku.Bathi izimbangi ziyatatazela, zinovalo ngoba ziyazi ukuthi uma kungase kuthiwe kuba nengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi kusasa, uyozidlela amahlanga uNkk Gumede ngoba amagatsha e-ANC eThekwini asamfuna ekutheni ahole.Bekukhona nabelaphi bendabuko  nabaholi bamabandla ehlukene.Imantshi uDawn Soomaro ilidlulisele enkantolo eNkulu eThekwini icala okulindeleke abasolwa bavele kuyo ngoJuni 14 nonyaka ukuze kwenziwe izendlalelo zokuqulwa kwecala.Okhulumela abalandeli bakaNkk Gumede, uMnuz Ntando Khuzwayo uthe bajabule ngoba icala selinenqubekela phambili.Uthe bekubacasula ukuhlehliswa kwecala uMbuso njengoba ngo-Ephreli bekuzobe kuphela iminyaka emibili kwaboshwa uNkk Gumede ngaleli cala.“Besifuna liqhubeke icala ukuze abasolwa bezokwazi ukugeza amagama abo. Sizokweseka i-ANC lana. Ayikho into evimba umama (Nkk Gumede) ekutheni akhethwe abe usihlalo, esingangabazi ukuthi uzoba uyena,” kusho uKhuzwayo.
title: Liya enkantolo enkulu elowayeyimeya yeTheku

text: ISISABISE ngokuya enkantolo iDA uma kungenzeka uhulumeni wakuleli evumela uMnuz Robert Mugabe ukuthi azocasha kuleli njengoba ekhishwe amasosha esikhundleni sokuba umengameli wakuleliya lizwe.Ngokusho kukaMnuz James Selfe, ongusihlalo weFederal Executive yale nhlangano, usebhalele umengameli Jacob Zuma wakuleli nongqongqoshe wezithinta amazwe angaphandle kuleli, ukuthiukuvumela uMugabe azocashakuleli, kungasho ukungawulandeli umthetho.“I-DA isibhalele uMengameli Jacob Zuma nongqongqoshe abathintekayo, ibazisa ukuthi bangalinge balungene udaba lokucashisa uMnuz Robert Mugabe nowakwakhe, uGrace Mugabe kuleli.“Sikholelwa wukuthi uma bemcashisa kuleli, kungasho ukuphula umthetho iRefugees Act (130 ka-1998),” kusho uSelfe.Uthe le mvume uMugabe anganikezwa yona, iyaphambana nabantu abenze amacala okubulala abantu ngokulandela umthetho weNhlangano yeZizwe. Uthe irekhodi lokubusa iZimbabwe kukaMugabe, iminyaka engu-37 njengondlovukayiphikiswa, kusho ukuthi akangeni ngaphansi kohlelo lokunikezwa le mvume.
title: Uma uMugabe ecashiswa kuleli iDA izoya enkantolo

text:
USEDLULILE emhlabeni umculi wokholo wakuleli ophinde abe ngumfundisi uNeyi Zimu obesekudlule izinyanga ehlaselwe wukugula. Lo mculi ushone ngoLwesithathu ngemuva kwezinsukana inkosikazi yakhe uNelisiwe Sibisi-Zimu eveze ukuthi umyeni wakhe uhlaselwe wumdlavuza wesikhumba awulashelwa esibhedlela iChris Hani Baragwanath ngeChemotherapy. Okhulumela i-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) kuzwelonke uMnuz Mbuyiseni Ndlozi uzwakalise ukudabuka ngokudlula kukaNeyi. Esitatimendeni esifakwe ekhasini le-EFF likaTwitter uthe uphatheke kabuhlungu ngokudlula emhlabeni kwenkakha yomculo wokholo uNeyi Zimu."Sicela ukuthi unkulunkulu uZimu ahlezi ecula ngaye alule isandla sakhe apholise amanxeba okudlula kwakhe emhlabeni. I-EFF ibusiswe umusa wakhe emculweni nasendumisweni. Kwimibuthano yethu ubeshumayela esitshela ukuthi sethembe unkulunkulu," kusho isitatimende.Ukushona kukaNeyi kushiye usizi kwabanye osaziwayo nakubalandeli bakhe abebelokhu bebhala imiyalezo yenduduzo enkundleni uTwitter. %%%twitter https://twitter.com/hashtag/RIPNeyiZimu?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#RIPNeyiZimu

title: Usedlulile emhlabeni uNeyi Zimu

text: UKWESEKWA ngabalandeli bohlelo lomndeni wakhe yikhona akholwa ukuthi kubuyise uhlelo lwakhe ngokushesha kwithelevishini.UMusa Meleku usho kanje kulandela ukuthi uhlelo lwempilo yakhe yesithembu namakhosizi akhe uThando nesiThembu, lukhuza ibuya kuMzansi Magic okulindeleke ukuthi luqale ngenyanga ezayo.UMseleku kulolu hlelo ubonakala namakhosikazi amane uMaKhumalo, uMaYeni, MaNgwabe noMaCele.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uMseleku, uthe lolu hlelo lusha akubuyi iziqephu ezindala. Ukholelwa wukuthi kuningi abantu abazokufunda ngempilo yakhe nomndeni wakhe njengoba konke abakuqophayo kuyimpilo yangempela okwenza kube lula ukuthi abantu balulandele lolu hlelo.“Angiphili impilo yamanga, konke abantu abakubona ohlelweni kuyiqiniso ngomndeni wami. Akukho okuningi engingakusho kakhulu ngohlelo ngoba abantu basazozibonela.“Impilo esiyiphilayo nezinto esizenza zonke izinsuku azihlelwa noma azilingiswa.“Ukubuya kohlelo kuyakhombisa ukuthi abantu bayabona ukuthi siphila impilo yethu, asizenzi abantu esingebona noma sifune ukusondelana nabantu abathile.“Sizimele siwumndeni wakwaMseleku, sithemba ukuthi kukhona nalapho abantu bethola khona isifundo ngempilo yesithembu eyiqiniso,” kusho uMseleku.Lolu hlelo lwaphela selukuvuthondaba lapho izintokazi eziningi zase zimhlupha zifuna ukungena esithenjini.UMseleku ungene ezintangeni mayelana nonkosikazi wesihlanu.Ngaphandle kwalolu hlelo zikhona nezinye izinhlelo ezizobuya ngonyawo olusha kuMzansi Magic nezithandwa kakhulu okubalwa iDate My Family ne-Our Perfect Wedding.Izinhlelo zosaziwayo abangaconsi okubalwa oluthi KwaMam’Mkhize, Living the dream with Somizi neReal Housewives of Johannesburg nazo zizokhonjiswa. Imidlalo yethelevishini nayo iboshelwe okubalwa i-Ehostela, eyaphela ababukeli besayithanda.
title: Lukhuza ibuya uhlelo lwesithembu sikaMseleku

text: IFISA kwande abesifazane abasemkhakheni wamabhanoyi intokazi yaseThekwini eshayela izindiza, ekhule kuyiphupho layo ukungena kulo mkhakha.ULindelwa Mdaki (25) waseWestville eThekwini, uthi ukuba nomzali owayesebenzela inkampani yamabhanoyi iSouth African Airways (SAA), kwaba nomthelela omkhulu ekutheni kufezeke iphupho lakhe.Le ntokazi eyaqala ukufundela ukushayela amabhanoyi ngo-2016 eKishugu eNelspruit, isanda kuthola ezinye iziqu zayo zeCommercial Pilots License ngenyanga edlule, ishayela amabhanoyi ombutho wamaphoyisa iSAPS, esikhumulweni sezindiza iWonderboom Airport ePitoli.“Sekuyisikhathi manje sokuguqula indlela abantu besifazane abaphupha ngayo ngempilo yabo ngoba sesiside isikhathi bephila ngaphansi kokuvalelwa amathuba. Sekuyisikhathi sokushintsha ukwenza nokuguqula indlela ecabanga ngayo imbokodo ukuze iphakame,” kusho le ntokazi.Phambilini lo mkhakha bewugcwele abantu besilisa bezinye izinhlanga.Le ntokazi ebonga ithuba elitholile lokungena kulo mkhakha ongajwayelekile kwabamnyama, ithe bekungeke kube lula ukuthi lifezeke iphupho layo leminyaka ukuba ayilutholanga uxhaso nokwesekwa umndeni wayo.“Ukuthola ukwesekwa ngabantu abakuthandayo kuyasiza kakhulu empilweni. Njengoba umndeni wami, ikakhulu abazali bangiseka mhla ngibatshela ngamaphupho ami, isenzo sabo yiso esangigqugquzela  ukuthi  ngisebenze ngokukhulu ukuzikhandla. Ngangifuna ukubapha isipho abayohlezi beziqhenya ngaso.”Ithe isifiso sayo manje wukubona abantu abamnyama ikakhulu besifazane bengena ngobuningi babo kulo mkhakha.“Ziningi izingqinamba ezikhona ezenza abantu abamnyama bangakwazi ukungena kulo mkhakha wezamabhanoyi. Kwesinye isikhathi kuke kuphoqe ukuthi abanye bamise kancane izifundo zabo uma sebephelelwe yimali njengoba kungesibona bonke abantu abathola ithuba lokuxhaswa ngomfundaze.”Uthe intsha enothando lokuphumelela kumele izibambe ziqine.
title: Ufisa bande abesifazane abashayela izindiza

text: NGESIKHATHI uNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNkk Angie Motshekga ememezela ukuthi izingane zesikole zizobuyela ezikoleni ngoJune 1, baningi abazali abazwakalise ukukhathazeka nengoba kunabafundi abavele banezifo ezinochuku njengesifo sikashukela, isifuba somoya nokunye.Besaba ukuthi kuzoba lula ukuthi izingane zabo zitheleleke ngomkhuhlane obulalayo iCoronavirus.UNkk Motshekga uthe yize begqugquzela abazali ukuthi badedele izingane zibuyele esikoleni, kodwa zikhona ezinye izindlela abazali abangazisebenzisa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izingane zabo ziyayithola imfundo.Ubale ukufundela emakhaya njengenye indlela engasetshenziswa okunokuthi ingane igcine iphinda ikilasi.Nokho le ndlela ingazwakala ilula kodwa ongoti bezemfundo bathi zikhona izinselelo ehambisana nazo, kodwa iyenzeka ngempumelelo.Ngokocwaningo olwashicilelwa emqulwini obizwa ngeSchool Effectiveness and School Improvement, kwavela ukuthi ojahidada abanabazali abakwaziyo ukufunda futhi abahlale bekhuluma ngezincwadi ezinganeni, basemathubeni angcono okufundisela izingane zabo emakhaya ngempumelelo. Bayakwazi nokuphumelela ezifundweni zezibalo.“Le miphumela ichaza ngokusobala ukubaluleka kokujwayeza izingane izincwadi nokuzifundisa zisencane ukubala, ukuzifundisa ukukwazi ukukhuluma kahle izilimi, akusizi nje kuphela ukuthi ingane ikhaliphe kodwa kuyasiza nasekutheni ingane isheshe ibe bukhali ezibalweni,"kusho lolu cwaningo.ULouise Schoonwinkel, oyisikhulu esiphezulu kwa-Impaq, uthe abafundi abangena kulolu hlelo lokufunda besemakhaya, balandela uhlelo oluqondile lokufunda loMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo njengoba kwenza ozakwabo abasuke beya ezikoleni. Baphinde bahlolwe ngaphansi komkhandlu ohlola abafundi Umalusi.Ngokwalolu hlelo, umfundi uyakwazi ukubuye abuyele esikoleni ngendlela ejwayelekile uma esefuna.Nakhu okunye okumele abazali bakwazi:"Lokhu kusho ukuthi uzofana nse nothisha wasesikoleni. Uzofundisa ingane yakho uqinisekise ukuthi iyakuqonda konke ekufundayo.Kodwa uyakuthola ukucathuliswa ngendlela yokwenza lokhu,"kusho uSchoonwinkel.“Abazali abafundisela izingane emakhaya bathola indlela ecacile yokwenza lokhu. Banikwa nezincwadi ezibanika indlela yokwenza isigaba nesigaba kuzo zonke izifundo. Lezi zigaba zikunika ulwazi ngezidingo zomfundi nezindlela okuyizo zokufundiisa ingane kuleso sifundo".“Ukwengeza kulokhu, kuba khona nezigcawu zabazali nezingane ezifundela emakhaya ezisizayo uma kukhona izinselelo ezithile ezifundweni ezithile. Lokhu kusho ukuthi niyakwazi ukusizana lapho umzali edideka khona.”“Abazali abaningi bakuthola kulula ukufundisa emazingeni aphansi afana noGrade 1 kodwa ngokwenyuka kwamaGrades, bakuthole kunzima ukwenza lokhu. Yilapho ke abasuke sebedinga khona usizo. Kusuke sekumele bazame usizo kongoti bezifundo ababizwa ngamaTutor. Khumbula ukuthi kumele uhlale ubhekelela imfundo yengane yakhe kuze kufinyelele kuGrade 9.”“Ngokomthetho kumele ubhalise ingane yakho ngaphansi kohlelo lokufundela ekhaya noMnyango wezeMfundo.”- Impaq: www.impaq.co.za-Learning reimagined with Zakiyya Ismail: livingjoyfully.ca-How to register your child: www.schoolguide.co.za/for-parents/school-review-guidelines/1036-education-guide/11110-how-to-register-for-homeschooling-in-south-africa.html
title: Uma wesaba ukuthi ingane yakho ibuyele esikoleni, kukhona ongakwenza

text: ISIZOKWENZIWA umdlalo weshashalazi intandokazi yomdlalo woMzansi Magic, iLockdown.Lokhu kuhoshwe yiSolezwe ngomthombo walo oveze ukuthi seziqalile izinhlelo zokuyiguqula ingene eshashalazini.Kuzobe kuwumdlalo odle kakhulu ngomculo.Umsunguli wawo, uMandla N, ukuqinisekisile lokhu.“Sizobe sishaya izingoma zakwiLockdown nezinye,” kusho uMandla.Uthe sebeqalile bayazilungiselela ngoba umdlalo uzoqala ngoFebhuwari kuze kube wu-Ephreli, uhambela izindawo ezehlukene.“Sizoza naseThekwini ngoba liyidolobha elibalulekile kithina. Sizohambela izwe lonke,” kusho yena.Uthe kuzobe kukhona iningi labalingisi bomdlalo ngoba iningi labo liqale kuyo imidlalo yeshashalazi ngaphambi kokuthi lingene kuthelevishini. Abantu bangalindela ukubona oDawn Thandeka King odlala indawo kaMazet aphinde abe ngumculi, uZola Nombona naye obuye acule futhi olingisa indawo kaMonde nabanye.“Mina vele ngiqhamuka emculweni ngakho ngiyakuqonda ukubaluleka kokucula bukhoma phambi kwezihlwele. Yingakho siqhamuke nokuthi senze umdlalo futhi abantu kade bewufuna umculo weLockdown,” kusho uMandla.Ubuye waveza ukuthi isiyatholakala ezitolo zomculo i-albhamu yeLockdown enezingoma ezijwayele ukuzwakala kuyo. Phakathi kwazo kubalwa ethi, Mama Ka Bafana eshaywa nguNelisiwe Sibiya, Sengonile nezinye. Zingu-15 sezizonke.ILockdown wumdlalo oveza impilo yasejele labantu besifazane. Uphele ngenyanga eyedlule kuthelevishini.
title: ILockdown ingena eshashalazini

text: UFUNA izimpendulo umndeni womfana okumanje usesibhedlela emva kokusha kanzima esikoleni ngesikhathi sokufunda.UMpendulo Mkhize (5) ofunda uGrade R e-Andrew Zondo Primary, ushe kanzima izandla nezinyawo kulesi sikole ngoLwesithathu.Ugogo wakhe, uNkk Busisiwe Shozi, uthe simhlukumezile lesi sigameko ngoba akazitholi nezimpendulo ezizwakalayo ngokusha komzukulu wakhe.Nangesikhathi kwenzeka lesi sigameko, uthi akekho ozikhathazile ngokuthi ababikele bengomndeni. Uthi isikole sivele sayisa ingane emtholampilo.UNkk Shozi uthe inhliziyo yakhe ibuhlungu uma ebona isihluku esenzeke kumzukulu wakhe.Uthi okunye okushaqisayo wukuthi uthisha omfundisayo uveze ukuthi umgcine eyochama wangabe esalandelela uma embona engabuyi. “Ngificane nothisha esibhedlela kodwa bangichazela into engingayizwa kahle. Bathi ucele ukuyochama, waphuma nenye ingane imphelezela.“Bazwe esekhala ememeza esesha. Uma ngibabuza ngomlilo abachazi kahle. Kuthiwa wumlilo owawushiswe ngayizolo esikoleni kanti uzovutha nangakusasa.“Yiwona abathi umshisile kodwa abazi ukuthi kwenzekeni ngoba bebe semakilasini kufundwa,”kusho uNkk Shozi. Eqhuba uthe akazi ukuthi uMpendulo uzohlala isikhathi esingakanani esibhedlela ngoba isimo sakhe asithembisi ukuthi angase asheshe ukuphola.“Izicathulo zesikole ebezigqokile zishe zaphela konke nenyufomu. Indlela ashe ngayo ezandleni nginovalo lokuthi angase angakwazi ukubhala ngoba ubeqala ukufunda kulo nyaka, akakajwayeli ukubhala,”kusho uNkk Shozi.Uyise omncane kaMpendulo, uMnuz Sboniso Shoba uthe kubahlukumeze kakhulu ukusha kwendodana kamfowabo ngoba ibisajabulela ukungena esikoleni.Okumkhathaza kakhulu wukuthi akucaci ukuthi ushe kanjani uMpendulo njengoba nothisha omfundisayo ethi akamazi, umgcine eyochama. UMnuz Thami Magubane, oyilungu lesigungu sabazali kulesi sikole, uthe bebesabikeliwe ngalolu daba. Kodwa basazohlangana bonke esikoleni nothisha nogogo wenganeukuthola kahle ukuthi kwenzekeni enganeni. Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, uthe kubuhlungu okwehlele umfundi futhi umnyango uzolulandela udaba lwakhe.“Kubi ukuthi lo mfundi ushele ngaphakathi kwamagceke esikole. Sifisa alulame ngokwanele ukuthi naye akwazi ukuchaza ukuthi kwenzekeni.“Sizolulandela lolu daba, kuphenywe, sithole nombiko ogcwele ngokwenzekile kuthathwe nezinyathelo ezifanele,” kusho Mlotshwa. Kwenzeka lokhu nje kunesigameko esenzeke esikoleni iParktown Boy's High lapho umfundi u-Enock Mpianza etholwe eseshonile emva kokunyamalala kade ehamba nesikole. Kusolwa ubudedengu bothisha abangazange bayingene eyokubala izingane ngesikhathi sekubuywa emfuleni, obekwenziwa kuwo eminye yemidlalo eyingxenye yokwamukela abafundi abazoqala ukufunda esikoleni.
title: Umndeni womfana oshe esikoleni ufuna incazelo

text:
AKALIBONI iphutha elenzeke emshadweni wakhe owesilisa okusabalale i-video yakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ephikisa izifungo zomfundisi.UMnuz Linda Mthethwa obeshadelwa uNkk Tiny Mthethwa eNtuzuma ngoMgqibelo, uthe akonakalanga lutho emshadweni wakhe ngoba ubengeke avume ukufunga amanga. Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi selokhu kusabalele le video umkakhe udinga ngisho ukwelulekwa ngokomqondo ngendlela aphatheke kabi ngayo ngokushiwo ngabantu ngabo.“Inina nje enibona kube khona okonakele emshadweni wami. Ngokwami umshado uhambe kahle, kumanje ngihleli nomkami sesinayo nencwadi yomshado. Umkami sengihlale naye isikhathi eside bengingeke ngizotshelwa ekugcineni umfundisi ukuthi sizohlukaniswa ukufa. Kungani kuze kumele kufakwe ukufa ezifungweni sengathi kukhona okumele abulale omunye. Ubuf...kuphela obuyohlukanisa mina nomkami ngoba okwamanje usaziphethe kahle,” echaza.UMthethwa othe unezingane ezintathu nomkakhe, uthe usola umthwebuli wabo ngokusabalala kwezithombe zabo ne-video.Ngemuva kokuvela kwe-video abantu abaningi kuFacebook nakuTwitter bebekhala ngokuphoxa kukaMthethwa, bedabukela umakoti.ESINYE sezithombe ezisabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, zomshado kaMnuz Linda Mthethwa noNkk Tiny Mthethwa emuva kokusabalala kwama-video umkhwenyana ephikisa izifungoKule video, uMthethwa uma kumele afunge ukuthi bayobekezelelana uma becebile noma bempofu, uphendula ngokuthi vele bampofu. Ebuzwa ngalokhu uthe vele ubephendula okuyikona.“Vele ngingene ezindlekweni ezinkulu kabi nasezikweletini ngilungiselela ukuthi lolu suku lube luhle. Kulezi zikweletu engingene kuzona kuyacaca ukuthi ngeke ngisaphinde ngicebe ngoba kusekude ukuthi ziphele,” kusho uMthethwa.BUKA: 
Uphikise umfundisi ngezifungo emshadweni wakheKwenye i-video uMthethwa ubonakala eyohlangabeza umakoti ngaphambi kokuqala komshado. Ugaqa ngamadolo kukhaphethi obomvu, usukuma esephambi komkakhe, ambambe ngengalo. Nalapho uthe akaliboni iphutha ngoba ubekhombisa ukuthi umthanda kangakani umkakhe. Wenqabile ukuphendula ukuthi ubephuzile yini njengoba abanye besola lokho. UNkk Mthethwa uthe akukho asazokusho ngoba vele umonakalo usuwenzekile. Uthe uphatheke kabi ukuthi ngeke kusacisheka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana okubhalwe ngabo.
title: Akazisoli ophikise izifungo zomshado

text: ITHIMBA labameli bowayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, lithi lizolwa ngayo yonke indlela ukuthi icala liqale ukuqulwa kulo nyaka, okungenani ngo-Okthoba ukuze kuphele ukuqagela. Isolezwe ngeSonto libe nengxoxo ekhethekile nommeli kaZuma, uMnuz Eric Mabuza, osanda kuqokwa emuva kokuxoshwa kukaMnuz Dan Mantsha.Uthe sebefuna kushonwe khona zidudulane kubaleke exoshwayo ngoba sekukade zithibelana.UMabuza uphawula nje yingoba kulindeleke ukuthi icala lezinsolo zenkohlakalo lingene ngoLwesibili eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu.Icala likaZuma livame ukudonsa amehlo abantu abaningi ezweni abafuna ukuzwa isiphetho.Uthe akukho okutheni okuzoqhubeka enkantolo kodwa kuyoboniswana ngezinhlelo zokuqala ukuqulwa kwecala.UMabuza uthe ngeke bavume ukuthi kulokhu kudlalwa umacashelana ngoba kuyasetshenzwa.“Njengoba siya khona ngoLwesibili siyolwela khona ukuthi lihlale icala ngoba uMbuso uhlala uthi usumi ngomumo. Siyocela ukuthi okungcono ngo-Okthoba kucace ukuthi kwenzekani. Ngeke sikwazi ukuthi icala lihlehlele unyaka ozayo ngoba selilidala kakhulu, iminyaka engu-15 miningi kakhulu,’’ kusho uMabuza. UMabuza ungene ethimbeni labameli bakaZuma eliholwa wugalagala, * -Advocate Muzi Sikhakhane.Umshikashika wecala leminyaka usuke esivumelwaneni sokuthengwa kwezikhali enkampanini yaseFrance iThales eyayaziwa ngeThint kudala.Kuthiwa uZuma wathola amaqatha omngenandlini ngesikhathi kuthengwa izikhali. Kuhamba kuze kuthinteke negama likaMnuz Schabir Shaik, owayengumeluleki kaZuma wezezimali owagcina egwetshwe iminyaka engu-15 ngecala lenkohlakalo.UShaik akabange esasiqeda isigwebo sakhe ngaphakathi wakhishwa ngoshwele ekhala ngokuthi uxinwe wukugula.Icala likaZuma lahoxiswa kudala kodwa labuya lavuka ngo-2018 ngesikhathi obeyinhloko yezokushushisa * -Advocate Shaun Abrahams ememezela ukuthi uZuma kufanele ayophendula emajajini ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo abhekene nazo.UMabuza uthe bona sebemi ngomumo ukuyovikela ikhasimende labo. Ubezwakala egcwele okukhulu ukuzethemba ethi uZuma ubelokhu esolwa ngokudlala umacashelana kodwa uma esethi uselungile sekubikwa imbiba nebuzi. UZuma uke wacashunwa ethi akukho lutho alwenza yena kodwa ubona kunabathile abazama ukumakhela uzungu bengcolisa negama lakhe ngenxa yezimpi zezepolitiki ezisukela kudala.
title: Kabasafuni libuye lihlehle icala likaZuma

text: SISAQAQAMBA isilonda sokuphendulwa ukudla kwenduku kwe-Orlando Pirates yiSuperSport United osekuphele amasizini amabili leli qembu laseSoweto lihluleka wukushaya izimbangi zasePitoli.Umlandeli wokuqina weZimnyama, uMama-Joy Chauke, uthe kulokhu i-United izobe isifike ekugcineni ngoba bazimisele ukuyiphendula isidlo sikaKhisimusi. La maqembu azohlangana emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership e-Orlando Stadium namuhla ngo-7.30 ebusuku.I-Pirates ephekwa wuMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic izofika ihambela phezulu ngemuva kokushaya iBloemfontein Celtic ngo 1-0 ngesonto eledlule, okuwumphumela oyifukule wayoyibeka endaweni yesibili kwi-log. Amatsatsantsa a Pitori nawo azobe ezolwela ukuqhubeka nokubamba isigqi ngemuva kokwehlula i-Ajax Cape Town ngo 1-0. Asalele emuva ngemidlalo eyisithupha kwamanye amaqembu asedlale engu-12 ngenxa yokuthi abeyibambe kwiCAF Confederation Cup.Amaqembu azobe ehlangana okokuqala ngemuva komdlalo wangoJuni lapho i-United ibhaxabule iPirates ngo 4-1 kowamanqamu weNedbank Cup. IPirates ibisaphekwa uKjell Jonevret, i-United ingaphansi kukaStuart Baxter.Lo mphumela ubulandela omunye omkhulu ka 6-1 iBucs ewuthole koweligi ekuqaleni kwesizini edlule. Emzuliswaneni wesibili umdlalo wabo waphela ngo 1-1. Empeleni kugcine ngesizini ka-2014/2015 ukuthi iPirates ishaye iSuperSport, inqoba ngo 4-1 iholwa uTinkler.“Kusasa (namuhla) usuku lokuziphindiselela. Sikhathele yibona. Kungcono ngoba iza esigodini sikaMaminzela. Ngeke siyivumele ukuthi isishaye, iyona ezoba yikhekhe lethu likaKhisumusi. Kudala singanqobi ngifuna sibashaye ngo 1-0 ngoba thina asilona iqembu elizwisana ubuhlungu asishayi abanye ngo-6, siyahlonipha,” kusho uChauke.Njengoba kuza lo mdlalo kufanele ukuthi uSredojevic ubematasa ezama ukulungisa indaba yokungashaywa kwamagoli. Uma kungenjalo kungenzeka uChauke nozakwabo bagcine bebuke ibohlololo lomdlalo ozophela kulinganwa. Ukucazelana ngamaphuzu emidlalweni yeligi sekuphenduke isihlava muva nje. USredojevic odabuka eSerbia uze wababaza isimanga sokugeja athe usibona kungesiphezulu uma siqhathaniswa nasemazweni aseke awahamba.Emidlalweni engu-12 yeligi iPirates ishaye amagoli ayisishiyagalolunye. I-United ishaye alinganayo emidlalweni eyisithupha.Nokho uChauke akakhathazekile ngalokho.“Ifike kahle impela, iPirates isendaweni yesibili okukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi sifuna ukubuyela e-Afrika manje. Ukusebenzisana kukaRhulani (Mokoena) noMicho kuyabonakala. Ngiyajabula ngoba umfana wami uThabo Qalinge wenza kahle. Inkinga yamagoli akusiyo eyePirates kuphela, eyeNingizimu Afrika yonke. Anginankinga ngoba abadlali bethu basesiswini nezitobha sebeke basinqobela izicoco,” kusho yena.
title: Bafuna ibe yisidlo sikaKhisimusi iSuperSport

text: AMAPHOYISA aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso ngemuva kokushona kwabantu abane kulandela ukushayisana kweveni neloli ngaseLovu ngoLwesibili ebusuku.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Thembeka Mbele, uthe iloli neveni iToyota Hilux kushayisene ngemuva kwehora lesihlanu ngoLwesibili.“Kushone abantu abane abebesevenini kanti umshayeli weloli ulwela impilo yakhe esibhedlela ngemuva kokulimala kanzima,” kusho uCol Mbele.Abantu abane bashe bangqongqa bevaleleke evenini abebehamba ngayo eshayisane neloli kwizimpambana mgwaqo * -R624 no-R603 kule ndawo.Okhulumela abosizo oluphuthumayo, uMnuz Ross Campbell, uthe bafike sekukhona izicishamlilo ebezicisha umlilo endaweni yesigameko.“Iveni neloli bekuvutha emgwaqweni ngenkathi kufika abosizo oluphuthumayo. Abantu abane abebevaleleke evenini bashonele endaweni yesigameko. Kutholakale ukuthi umshayeli weloli ulimale kakhulu wabe esexilongwa abosizo oluphuthumayo.UCampbell uthe umshayeli weloli ube esedluliselwa esibhedlela ukuyokwelashwa.UCol Mbele uthe akukacaci ukuthi yini edale le ngozi kodwa amaphoyisa ayaphenya.
title: Kufe 4 kusha iveni neloli okushayisene

text: AKAZIWA ukuthi ukuziphi izinkalo umdlali odume kwiKaizer Chiefs obezama inhlanhla neReal Kings egijima kwiNational First Division (NFD).Emasontweni amabili edlule leli phephandaba like labika ukuthi iKings ehlezi endaweni yesibili kwi-log ihlola uMichelle Katsvairo osanda kuhlukana neChiefs.Kuthe kusenjalo lo mdlali wehlelwa ngumsophi eshonelwa nguyise okuphoqe ukuthi abuyele kubo eZimbabwe.UTom Dlamini wezokuxhumana kwiKings utshele Isolezwe ukuthi sebegeze izandla ngoKatsvairo.“Abaphathi abasayingeni ekaKatsvairo. Mfowethu lo mfana samthengela ithikithi lendiza lokuthi aye kubo eZimbabwe ukuyofihla uyise bese eyabuya. Samthengela amathikithi amabili elokuya eZimbabwe nelokubuya. Kuyavela ukuthi ubuyile kodwa sesimzame sancama ocingweni lwakhe. Akalubambi ucingo. Asisazimisele ngokumncenga manje ngoba kusobala ukuthi umqondo wakhe ukwenye indawo,” kusho uDlamini.UKatsvairo ufike eNingizimu Afrika ngesizini edlule ethwelwe ngeqoma ukuthi uzofike aqhulule imvula yamagoli kwi-Absa Premiership. Uqale kahle kuMakhosi kodwa walimala okwenze wahlala isikhathi eside. Ubuye indawo yakhe ingasekho. Umqeqeshi weChiefs uSteve Komphela ubesesebenzisa uBernard Parker noGustavo “Maleveni” Paez.Ekuqaleni kwesizini ubolekiswe kwiSinginda United yaseTanzania. Ufike kuyona waqhulula amagoli kodwa wagcina ehlukene nayo ngoba ibisihluleka wukumkhokhela.Ubuyele kwiChiefs kodwa kwacaca ukuthi akanayo indawo ngoba leli qembu libophele uLeonardo Castro, Ryan Moon, Paez noParker phambili. Bagcine bevumelene ngokuthi bahlukane neChiefs.Kuthintwa imenenja yakhe uMike Ngobeni we-M-Sport Management naye uthe uphoxekile ngesenzo salo mdlali.“Lo mfana nami sengimzame ngehluleka. Ungiphoxile kakhulu. Akwenzile akuyona into enhle,” kusho uNgobeni.NgeSonto ngo-3.30 ntambama iKings izodudulana neBlack Leopards eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza.Imidlalo yeNFD:NgoMgqibelo ngo-3.30 ntambama: Tshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila v Richards Bay (Thohoyandou Stadium); Mthatha Bucks v Uthongathi FC (Mthatha Stadium); Super Eagles v Royal Eagles (Goble Park); Pretoria University FC v Witbank Spurs (ABSA Tuks Stadium); Highlands Park v Mbombela United (Makhulong Stadium)NgeSonto ngo-3.30 ntambama: Real Kings v Black Leopards (King Zwelithini); Jomo Cosmos v Ubuntu Cape Town (Vosloorus Stadium); Cape Town All Stars v Stellenbosch (Parow Park)
title: IKings seyimfune yancama onyamalale ezama inhlanhla

text: UMNYANGO wezeMfundo usuxwayise abazali ukuthi baqaphele izinhlelo ezilethwa ezikoleni njengoba uthi uyaye ukhiphe amasekhula uma kukhona izinhlelo zezempilo abaziletha ezikoleni.Lokhu kulandela isigameko sakamuva sezingane okuthiwa zidilizwe sezigcwele itekisi kuthiwa ziyosoka esikoleni samabanga aphansi iGreyville Primary ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule.Umzali wengane eyenza uGrade 5 kulesi sikole ocele ukuthi igama lakhe ligodlwe ukuvikela umntwana, uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngesigameko asichaze njengesikhombisa ukunganaki kwesikole sokuhanjiswa kwezingane ukuze ziyosoka ngaphansi kohlelo olungaziwa.Ngokusho komzali, ngaphambi kokuthi ingane yakhe nezinye izingane zigcwaliswe kule moto babethole imiyalezo kumaselula abebezitshela ukuthi ivela esikoleni emasontweni amabili adlule.Uthe le miyalezo inika abazali ithuba lokuthi bavume ukuthi izingane zabo zizosoka. Ibiphinde ifune imininingwane yabazali namakhophi esitifiketi sengane nomazisi womzali.Unina wale ngane uthe okumxakile ukuthi ngosuku obekufanele izingane zisokwe ngalo esibhedlela iKing Dinuzulu uthole ucingo luthi akazolanda ingane yakhe emtholampilo iPolly Clinic. Uthe waphuthuma esikoleni njengoba ayazi ukuthi izingane zizolandwa khona wafica izingane zisasemotweni wathi uma ebuza esikoleni bathi bebengazi ukuthi izingane ziyosoka.Uthe esikoleni bambikela ukuthi abantu ababezolanda izingane benza sengathi bathunywe ngabazali bazo ukuthi bazozilanda ukuze ziyosoka.“Lokhu kusikhathazile njengabazali ukuthi isikole singakhombisa ukunganaki okungaka. Izingane zithi amafomu zawanikwa ngonesi ababefike esikoleni kodwa isikole sona sithi asazi lutho ngohlelo lokusokwa kwezingane. Ingane yami ike yesaba ukuya esikoleni ngoba beyinovalo lokuthi laba bantu bazofike bazame futhi ukubathatha,” kusho umzali.Lo mzali uthe ukufika kwakhe kwenza ukuthi kwehliswe nezinye izingane ezazizohamba nale moto njengoba bathi uma befonela esibhedlela iKing Dinuzulu batshelwa ukuthi alukho uhlelo abanalo lokusoka abafundi - bathi olwabo lwenziwa uma kuvalwe izikole. Phezu kwalokhu uthe baphika bathi abamazi lo muntu obezolanda izingane zesikole.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe njengomnyango uma bayaye bakhiphe isekhula kusenesikhathi uma kunohlelo abalwenzayo noma ngabe balwenza neminye iminyango, wenza isibonelo ngohlelo lokugoma.“Sizosebenzisana noMnyango wezeMpilo ukuthi kuzanywe ukuthi kuphenywe ngokuthi yiluphi lolu hlelo. Kuzobhekwa ukuthi ngabe wuhlelo olungumbombayi yini noma nokuthi uma kuwuhlelo olukhona kungani kungaxoxwanga nathi kuqala ukuze sikhiphe isimemezelo esihlanganisile,” kusho uMahlambi.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Noluthando Nkosi, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi abaphathi bakulesiya sibhedlela abazange bathumele thimba ukuthi liyosoka izingane ngalolu suku olushiwo yilo mzali.
title: Isexwayiso somnyango wezeMfundo kubazali

text: UFUNA ubulungiswa unina womfundisi obedumile eThekwini, uSakhile Mhlonishwa Langa, yize indodana yakhe ingeke isavuka.UNkk Ntombifikile Memela (62) utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ufe olwembiza ngokushona kwendodana yakhe futhi ufuna umthetho ujezise oyibulele.“Ngiyabufuna ubulungiswa ngoba uSakhile ubengenzela konke engikudingayo. Njengoba eseshonile kusho ukuthi ngeke ngiphinde ngidle ukudla kwaseWoolworths.”Uchaze indodana yakhe njengomuntu onomusa, obethanda wonke umuntu. “Bengicele into eyodwa enganeni yami, ukuthi ingakhele umuzi ngoba la ngihleli khona kwadilika kudala. Ibisephezu kwazo izinhlelo njengoba beyidubulile. Bengiyicelile nokuthi ingilethele umalokozana ozongiphatha kahle ngoba sengihlala kwi-wheelchair ngenxa yokugula.”Uchaze uMhlonishwa njengendodana ebimhlonipha, ingaphuzi, ingabhemi futhi imondla.UNKK Ntombifikile Memela ongunina kamfundisi uMhlonishwa Langa ubonga ukwesekwa ngabantu emuva kokushona kwendodana yakhe, lapha uthathwe nodadewabo obezokhalisana naye. Isithombe: Nqobile Mbonambi / African News Agency (ANA)“Benginezingane ezintathu okuwuMdumiseni Mduduzi, Sakhile Mhlonishwa noVukani. Sengisele noMduduzi noVukani. USakhile ubebiza isibongo sasekhaya kwaLanga. Mina ngashadela kwaMemela kodwa noMemela sewahamba yingakho bengicela uSakhile ukuthi angakhele.”Uthe uLanga wafunda eGolokodo Primary, wadlulela ePhindela wayoqeda eMpukane High. “Indodana yami ishiye indodana yayo uNhlakanipho kodwa ngizwa kuthiwa bezikhona nezinye izingane engizobe ngiqala ukuzibona. Ngiyabonga kakhulu kubantu abangisekile kusukela ingane yami ishone ngoMgqibelo ngoba kwafika izimoto la ekhaya bezongisingatha abantu. UMfundisi uVusi Dube ngiyacabanga usebakhohlwe bonke abantu ngoba unake mina, abeNanda FM nabo bayangiseka.”UMnuz Jabulani Mthethwa osolwa ngokubulala umfundisi Mhlonishwa Langa uthi usazocabanga ukuthi uyamfuna yini ummeli wamahhala. Isithombe: Boniswa MohaleKhonamanjalo uMnuz Jabulani Mthethwa (52) obhekene necala lokubulala uLanga uvelile enkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini.Imantshi uNkk Vanitha Armu ithe uMthethwa ubhekene namacala amane okungelokubulala, elokubamba inkunzi esebenzisa indluzula, elokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nelokutholakala nezinhlamvu ezine.UMthethwa uthe usazocabanga ukuthi uyamdinga yini ummeli. Ucele ukuyiswa esibhedlela ngoba ethi ushaywe amaphoyisa, amlimaza izimbambo. Ngesikhathi abantu bemhhahhameza, uMthethwa uvele wathi akasazi-ke ukuthi akhulume nobani, nemantshi noma nezihlwele ezisenkantolo.Imantshi ithe izomnika isonto elilodwa ukuthi acabange ukuthi uyamdinga yini ummeli bese ebuya ngoJulayi 23 nempendulo ukuze kuqhubeke icala.Kusasa kuzoba nenkonzo yesikhumbuzo kaLanga eThekwini Community Church bese umngcwabo uba ngoMgqibelo eSahara Stadium bese efihlwa emathuneni aseStellawood noma kwawaseChesterville.
title: ‘Bengicele angakhele indlu uSakhile’

text: ZIQALA namhlanje izinhlelo zokufundisa abafundi abahleli emakhaya njengoba izwe livaliwe ngenxa yokubheduka kwegciwane iCorona.Inhloso yalezi zinhlelo ezenziwe nguMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo neSABC, ukusiza behlise umthwalo kubafundi nothisha njengoba kungafundwa.Okhulumela umnyango uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, uthe izinhlelo zizosiza ekubuyiseni isikhathi esilahlekile ngenxa yokuvalwa kwezwe okwamenyezelwa nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.Uthe izinhlelo zizosakazwa eziteshini zakwaSABC zethelevishini nasemisakazweni ezingu-13.“Lezi zinhlelo zizosiza abenza uGrade 10, 11 no-matric ne-Early Childhood Development (ECD). Ezinye zezifundo ezizofundiswa kubalwa iMaths, Physical Science, English, Life Science ne-Accounting. Ngaphansi kwe-ECD kuzofundiswa izilimi zesintu ezehlukene.”UMhlanga uthe lo mkhankaso uzosiza abafundi njengoba bezobhala izivivinyo zikaJuni.“Sinxusa ukuthi basebenzise lezi zinhlelo ukuze bangasaleli emuva emsebenzini wabo baphinde balungiselele nezivivinyo. Enkundleni iYouTube kuzoba nohlelo lokufundisa abafundi. “Siyalwamukela usizo lweSABC ngalesi sikhathi ukuze kusizakale abafundi,” kusho uMhlanga.Izinhlelo zethelevishini zimi kanje:SABC 1: Msombuluko kuya ngeSonto:5 - 6SABC 2: Msombuluko kuya ngoLwesihlanu:9.30 -11SABC 3: Msombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu:6 - 7Emisakazweni zimi kanje:Umhlobo Wenene FM2.30 - 3Thobela FM 5 - 6Phalaphala FM 1.30 - 2Munghana Lonene FM2.30 - 3Ukhozi FM 9 - 10 ebusukuLesedi FM 4.15 - 4.45Ligwalagwala FM 9.10 - 9.40Motsweding FM 7 - 7.30 ebusukuIkwekwezi FM 10:30 - 11:00Radio Sonder Grense7.30 - 8 ebusukuTru FM 9 - 11X-K FM 9.30 - 10Radio 2000 11.30 - 12Izinhlelo ziyatholakala nakwi-website yomnyango.
title: Ziqalile izinhlelo zokusiza abafundi emisakazweni ehlukene

text: UZOLINGISA indawo ngempilo yakhe ayiphila ngempela, uMohale Motaung, odume kuleli ngemuva kokuphumela obala ukuthi usebudlelwaneni bezothando nosaziwayo wakuleli, uSomizi Mhlongo.UMohale uzoba ngomunye wabalingisi abasha kulo mdlalo oqwashisa ngezinto eziningi ezithinta intsha okubalwa kuzo ubudlelwane bezothando nezifo ezihlukene, okubalwa kuzo iHIV.Kulo mdlalo okhona ngisho emazweni ahlukene ikakhulukazi ase-Afrika, uMohale uzobe elingisa indawo ka-Odirile.U-Odirile owesilisa othandana nabantu bobulili obufana nobakhe futhi akafihlile emphakathini.Kulo mdlalo uzoba ngomunye wabalingisi abahamba phambili ekugqamiseni okuzobe kukhulunywa kulo mdlalo.Ekhuluma ngokuba yingxenye yalo mdlalo, uMohale uthe ukujabulele ukuba yingxenye yalo mdlalo njengoba kusekhona abantu abasafihla impilo yabo yangempela ngenxa yemiphakathi abahlala kuyo.“Abakhiqizi bomdlalo iMTV Shuga, Down South 2 banginike ithuba lokuthi ngifundise ngokubaluleka kwezinto ezihlukene ezenzeka ezimpilweni zabantu kodwa ikakhulukazi intsha. Kuyangijabulisa ngempela okuzobonakala kulo mdlalo ngikwenza nengithemba ukuthi kuzoba wusizo kwabaningi futhi kuphinde kufundise nabanye ngezimpilo abantu abazikhethele zona emphakathini esiyakhele,” kuchaza uMohale.Uthe yena njengomuntu ongayifihli impilo ayiphilayo uma kuziwa ngakwezothando, uyakuthokozela ukuthola uxhaso emndenini wakhe nakwabanye abantu kuleli ikakhulukakzi intsha.“Ngithemba ukuthi intsha ekhulela ezindaweni ezilazisayo isiko ekugcineni uma iphumela obala izokwazi ukuthi iyamukele njengoba kwenzekile kimi. “Yingakho nje imidlalo efana nalena idlala indima ebalulekile ezimpilweni zabantu abahlukene, abanye abagcina bebona kuyo imidlalo efana nalena ukuthi bangobani futhi abangakutholi ukukhululeka nabo kubacacele ukuthi ababodwa kuleso simo,” kuchaza yena.UMonde Twala, wakwaViacom okungabakhiqizi balo mdlalo, uthe bayakujabulela ukuthi imidlalo efana nalena ivula amathuba omsebenzi entsheni ehlukene.“Umlingisi okuyimanje ubonakala emafilimini ahlukene aphesheya kwezilwandle, uLupita Nyong’o, waqala ukugqamisa ithalente lakhe emdlalweni ofana nawo lona iMTV Shuga Kenya. Sijabule ukuba nomuntu ofana noMohale kulo mdlalo,” kuchaza uTwala.Kulo mdlalo ngeke nje kugqame ubuso obusha kuphela njengoba intokazi esiqokwe kwaze kwaba kabili emcimbini wezindondo ama-Emmy, uThuso Mbedu, nayo iyingxenye yalo mdlalo.Umdlalo iMTV Shuga: Down South 2 uzoqala ukukhonjiswa kuleli ngoLwesibili oluzayo kuMTV base (DStv channel 322) ngo-9.30 ebusuku.
title: Ukuthakasele ukuba semdlalweni omusha

text: SITHEMBISO MKHIZEIBAFANA Bafana ihlalelwe umthwalo onzima wokuqeda ishobolo lokungenzi kahle uma idlalela eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini.NgoNovemba 13, iqembu likaMolefi Ntseki lizobhekana neSao Tome and Principe emdlalweni omqoka wokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) engonyaka ozayo eCameroon.Umdlalo ungo-7 ebusuku. IBafana idinga amaphuzu amathathu kulo mdlalo ukuze izibeke ethubeni lokunyuka eqoqweni lapho iboshelwe neGhama neSudan.Okwamanje inamaphuzu amathathu ayibeka endaweni yesithathu eqoqweni.Ngemuva komdlalo waseMabhida, izobe isiya eSao Tome kowomlenze wesibili ngoNovemba 16.IBafana izoya emdlalweni waseMabhida ukuzethemba kuphansi ngemuva kokushaywa yiZambia kowobungani ngenyanga edlule, yabambana ngeqanda neNamibia.Le miphumela eshiya iningi labalandeli lidumele, abanye belibeka ngesihloko elokuthi uNtseki akaxoshwe, ikhomba ukuthi iBafana kumele isebenze kanzima ngokuphindiwe ukuze ilungise irekhodi layo elingelihle lokuhlala kule nkundla yaseThekwini.Kowokugcina weNelson Mandela Challenge, ngoNovemba ngo-2018, kuyo le nkundla ishaye udaka ibambana ngo-1-1 neParaguay.Kwasiza uPercy Tau eshaya elakulinganisa ngemizuzu yokugcina.Yayikade isanda kuphoxa abalandeli ilahla amaphuzu ibambana neLibya kade kuhlungelwa i-Afcon ebise-Egypt nyakenye.Ukungaphathi kahle abalandeli eMabhida kweBafana, kulokhu abazobe bengavunyelwe enkundleni, akugcini lapha njengoba yake yabashiya bebambe ongezansi ibhuquziswa yiqembu elingazelwa lutho ebholeni iCape Verde.Kwehla izihlathi kwashabalala namaphupho okuya kwiNdebe yoMhlaba eRussia ngo-2018, elakuleli lishaywa yiCape Verde ngo 2-1 kuyo le nkundla. Elokubika lashaywa u-Andile Jali.IBafana yagcina ukunqoba eMabhida ngo-2017 ishaya iGuinea Bissau ngo-3-1.Eminye imidlalo ephoxe kuyona eMabhida, yingesikhathi ibambama ngo 2-2 neMorocco kudlalwa i-Afcon yango-2013. Yagcina ikhishwe yiMali kuma-quarterfinal ihlulwa ngo 3-1 kumaphenathi. Isike yashaywa yiNigeria ngo 2-0 koweNelson Mandela Challenge. Khona eMabhida yaphinde yabambana ngeqanda neGambia engazelwa lutho ebholeni kowokuhlungela i-Afcon.Kusukela ngo-2010, iBafana isidlale imidlalo ewu-16 eMabhida. Inqobe eyisithupha. Kweminye idliwe noma idlale ngokulingana.
title: IBafana nenselelo yokuqeda ishobolo laseMabhida

text: ISILOMO seMamelodi Sundowns, uTiyani “Sugar” Mabunda, siyikhomba kwi-Orlando Pirates ingcindezi yombango wesicoco ngoba bona bakujwayele ukubhekana nesimo lapho bengenalo ithuba lokudedela amaphuzu uma bezimisele ngokuvikela isicoco se-Absa Premiership.Namuhla ngo-7.30 ebusku, eLoftus Stadium, ePitoli, bazohlukana phakathi ngoba womabili amaqembu ayimele, iSundowns neSuperSport United, azobe etholene phezulu. Ngaphandle kokuthi vele imidlalo isiya ngokuphela kwiligi, lona umqoka kakhulu kwiSundowns ngoba ukwesele ngayo kwazise incelisa amawele njengoba iqhubeka nakwiCAF Champions League.Kusukela iPirates inqobe ngo 2-1 kwiFree State Stars ngempelasonto, abaningi bakholwa wukuthi iSundowns izothwala kanzima uma izimisele ngokuvala igebe lamaphuzu ayisithupha elivulwe yiBucs esicongweni. Kuningi okuvuna iSundowns ngalo mdlalo njengerekhodi kodwa uMabunda ukholwa ukuthi akukho okumqoka ngawo futhi ukucindezeleka akukho kangako kubona, ngoba okufanele bakwenze yinto asebeyenze ngempumelelo iminyaka emihlanu ilandelana kodwa konke kusha kwiPirates.“Asicindezelekile nakancane. Ungadidwa abantu besikhulumela. Lalela thina ukuthi sithini bese ukholwa yilokhu esikushoyo ngoba siyakwazi okufanele sikwenze. Ukusalela emuva ngemidlalo yinto esifana nesiko kithina kwazise sihlale sikulesi sigaba seChampions League njalo ngalesi sikhathi. Lokhu okufanele sikwenze sihlale sikwenza minyaka yonke. Ngiyezwa kuthiwa iPirates iyona ekhululekile ngoba isiwaqoqile amaphuzu kodwa ngiyakwazi okufanele ngikwenze kanjalo nabo bonke abanye ozakwethu. Inkinga yokucindezeleka kungenzeka ibe kwiPirates ngoba abasijwayele isimo ababhekene naso,” usho kanje uMabunda.Irekhodi leSundowns uma ibhekene neSuperSport likhomba ukuthi sekudlule imidlalo ewu-11 ezikaKaitano Tembo zingayazi iwini kwezikaPitso Mosimane. ISuperSport igcine ukushaya iSundowns ngo-2013 lapho uMor Diouf ashaya khona inguzunga yeshodi esengxenyeni enkulu yezakhe.Kulo mdlalo kubuya uMxolisi Macuphu ongomunye wabadlali beSuperSport abasefomini. Yize kukhona konke lokhu uMabunda ukholwa ukuthi bazoyiwina yonke imidlalo okufanele bayiwine ukuqala ngeSuperSport.“Ngeke kube lula ngoba iSuperSport ingelinye lamaqembu avukile emaqandeni. Akufanele futhi sikhohlwe ukuthi umdlalo wabakhaya ngakho kungenzeka noma yini. Babophele inqwaba yabadlali abamele amazwe abo njengathi, ngakho-ke silindele ubunzima kodwa isipiliyoni sethu singiqinisa idolo ukuthi yithina esizobuyela emakhaya simamatheka.”
title: OweSundowns ukhululekile ngombango wesicoco seligi

text: SEBEPHENDUKE izinyamazane ezihlala ngokubaleka nokucasha, osomatekisi abangaphansi kukasoseshini waseMargate, iBambanani. Kuthiwa kuphume uhlu lwamagama okusolwa ukuthi ngolwabantu okumele bayiswe kwagoqanyawo.Babalelwa kwabayisikhombisa asebebulewe kulo soseshini kusukela nyakenye, okubalwa abashayeli nabanikazi bamatekisi.Phakathi kwabantu asebebulewe kukhona oMnuz Vusi Myeza (61), Phumlani Nkomo (55) noMandla Mzelemu (60). Bonke babulewe ezigamekweni ezehlukene.Abanye abathintekayo bathinte Isolezwe bethi baphoqelekile ukuba bayeke umsebenzi bayocasha ngenxa yokwesaba.“Okwenzekile ngeledlule ukuthi kuphume uhlu lwamagama abantu okuthiwa bazobulawa. Kulo luhlu kukhona negama lami. Kunamanye amagama abantu abaningi kusoseshini okuthiwa kumele babulawe (ebala amanye amagama).Sibaningi esibalekile kumanje ngoba sisaba ukuthi sizobulawa. Sesifana nezinyamazane ezizingelwayo. Asisakwazi nokusebenzela imindeni yethu,” kusho omunye okusoseshini.Isolezwe uma libuza ukuthi yini esusa umsindo kulo soseshini kuvele ukuthi kubangwa ukuphatha nezindaba nemizila.Okunye ukuthi kunothize owabizwa ukuba azolekelela kulo soseshini, kuthiwa waphakamisa ukuba abashayeli asebebadala banikezwe imvume yokufaka izimoto zabo babe ngabanikazi bamatekisi.Kusolwa ukuthi ukudutshulwa kwabantu kuqale lapho.Omunye othintekayo ocele ukuba igama lakhe lingadalulwa uthe uyabona bazohlaselwa baze beqedwe bengalutholi usizo.“Kunamaphoyisa angene kule nto nokwenza kube nzima ukuba siwabikele ukuze axazulule le nkinga,” kusho usomatekisi.Kuthintwa imenenja ehhovisi leSantaco eKZN, uMnuz Sfiso Shangase, ithe bayazi ngokubulawa kwabantu kulo soseshini.“Udaba lwaloya soseshini lubucayi ngoba baningi asebebulewe khona. Ebesingakwazi ukuthi kukhona uhlu lwabantu okumele babulawe ngoba uma lukhona kumele luyiswe emaphoyiseni ukuze kuphenywe. Ukubulawa kwabantu ngale ndlela okwenzeka ngayo, ugcina ubonile ukuthi kukhona abathize abathungathwayo. Okungenzeka ukuthi lukhona uhlu,” kusho uShangase.Uthe sebezame kaningi ukuxazulula izinkinga kulo soseshini.“Inkinga ngaleya ndawo ukuthi kunesimo semali yebhakede ekhokhwa njalo uma itekisi iphuma erenki. Lemali ibibangwa ukuthi kumele ithathwe ubani. ISantaco ihamba noMnyango wezokuThutha, namaphoyisa siyile siyozama ukuxazulula. Inkinga ukuthi icala alikwazi ukuthethwa ngaphandle kofakazi, ikhona okuba inkinga uma sesifika kusoseshini kungabi khona abantu abazofakaza ngezinkinga ezikhona,” kusho uShangase.Uthe kukhona nasebaboshwa kodwa kunezinsolo zokuthi bayaqhubeka nokuhlasela besemajele“Ngesikhathi sihambisana namaphoyisa nohulumeni kukhona ababoshwa. Siyasola ukuthi ababoshiwe bahlasela besemajele. Lokho sakuthola kuyinzwabethi,” kusho uShangase.Kunxuswe ukuba abathintekayo baye emaphoyiseni nolwazi noma befonele izinamba beveze ulwazi, bezifihlile.“Inkinga yethu manje kule mboni ile mali yebhakede, okubangwa ukuthi ubani okumele ayilawule.”
title: Abasalali emakhaya ngenxa yokusongelwa osomatekisi

text: EBANTWINI abathathu kwabane abahaqekayo kuvele izolo ukuthi basuke bengabaseWestern Cape.Lokhu kuvele ezibalweni ezidalulwe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt Zweli Mkhize. Okwamanje isibalo sabashonile sesifinyelele kwaba ngu-17 bese abayisishiyagalolunye ngabaseWestern Cape- okunye ukuthi isibalo esiphezulu sabashonile siqhamuke kulesi sifundazwe. Lokho kuchaza ukuthi u75% wabantu abangu-663 abasanda kutheleleka ngaleli gciwane baqhamuka kulesi sifundazwe esesinenqwaba yabantu asebedlule emhlabeni ngenxa yalolu bhubhane. UMkhize uthe izikhulu ezizobe ziqhamuka emnyangweni wezempilo kuzwelonke zizovakashela kulesi sifundazwe nase-Eastern Cape  ngale mpelasonto.Ngesonto elizayo uMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa noMkhize bazovakashela kulezi zifundazwe njengoba sikhuphuka ngokushesha isibalo sabantu abahaqwe yiCOVID-19. EWestern Cape sebebalelwa ku-4 497 asebehaqekile futhi lesi sifundazwe sizihola phambili ngokuba nabantu abangu-88 abangasekho emhlabeni, okuyisibalo esiyingxenye yasebeshonile ezweni lonke jikelele. Ngokwezinombolo, iWestern Cape inabantu abangu-503 kwabasanda kutholakala ukuthi sebethelelekile, abangu-663 nabangu-9 kwabangu-17 okusanda kubikwa ukuthi abasekho emhlabeni. Abanye ababili abashonile ngabaseKZN, kuthi abathathu baqhamuke e-Eastern Cape naseGauteng, isifundazwe ngasinye. EGauteng bangu-131 abasanda kutholakala ukuthi sebethelelekile, e-Eastern Cape bangu-60 kuthi eKZN babe ngu-49.    ABASANDA KUSHONA   ABASANDA KUHAQEKA  ESABAHAQEKILE ESABASHONILESouth Africa176638895178Western Cape9503449788Gauteng3131185118KZN249125342Eastern Cape36098918Free State001336Mpumalanga01600Limpopo02433N West02420N Cape00270INingizimu Afrika seyihlole abantu ababalelwa ku-307 000 , okubandakanya nabangaphezu kuka-15 500 abahlolwe emahoreni abalelwa ku-24. Eqhuba uMkhize uthe babalelwa ku-8.2 million abantu osekukhulunywe nabo ngenhloso yokubheka ukuthi akumele yini bahlolwe. UMkhize uthe zibalelwa ku435 iziguli eziphethwe yiCOVID-19 ezibhedlela.     Ezingu45 zise-high careEzingu77 zisemaginjini abantu abaxineke kakhuluEzingu40 zikuma-ventilators IOL
title: Sinyuka ngesivivini isibalo sabantu abahaqwa yiCoronavirus eWestern Cape

text:
UMohale ufake ivideo ku-Instagram lapho abephendula khona imibuzo yabalandeli bakhe. Phakathi kwemibuzo aphonselwe yona ubuzwe ngezinhlelo zakhe zomndeni lapho aveze khona ukuthi benoSomizi bazoba nazo izingane. “Sizokhulisa ingane esingayizali (adopt) kodwa ngiyayifuna eyami, futhi ngizoyenza. Ningangibuzi kanjani…” kusho uMohale. View this post on InstagramLegends are born in July. If your birthday is in July, comment with your favorite emojis. Mine: ♥️👑🕺🏽😆🍾🥂🍿💛🙌🏽☕️😂A post shared by
