title: Usazimisele ngokuba nengane yakhe ozoshada noSomizi

text: Ngifisa sengathi nalapha eNingizimu Afrika singabona isixazululo esizosiza abesifazane nezingane kulobu bulwane osebudlangile. Yebo kuzoba buhlungu lokhu kepha kuzobe kusizwa onenkinga. Akekho onelungelo lokudlwengula. Umenzi wobubi makajeze. Nathi lapha singavikeleka. Yebo siphila nabantu abangathandi ukuphila nabanye asebephenduke izilwanyana.Phansi nokudlwengula, phambili nokushumpulwa noma ukuthenwa.Bonginkosi Grey PhungulaETHEKWINI
title: Abathenwe abantu abadlwengulayo

text: KONKE sekumi ngomumo ngengqungquthela ye-EFF ezoba ngenyanga ezayo eGoli.Lokhu kushiwo nguMengameli weqembu, uMnuz Julius Malema, esithangamini nabezindaba izolo eNasrec Expo Centre, eGoli.Igqungquthela izoqala ngoDisemba 13-15.“Silindeleke ukuba abazohambela ingqunqguthela baziphathe ngendlela, balandele imithetho. Amalungu sibheke ukuba enze okulindeleke kuwo, athumele izincomo ngama-emails nango-WhatsApp. Konke kuhamba ngohlelo ngengqunqguthela,” kusho uMalema.UMalema uthe i-EFF ikhathazekile ngesibalo esikhulu sabantu abangasebenzi.“Sizocubungula ezinye zezinto esingazenza ukuze silwe nenkinga yokungasebenzi kwabantu,” kusho uMalema.Uthe abakwamukeli ukuqokwa kwesikhulu esiphezulu sakwa-Eskom, uMnuz Andre de Ruyter njengoba beshilo phambilini.
title: Sebelindele usuku lwengqungquthela ye-EFF

text: UMHOLI webandla lamaNazaretha aseBuhleni, uMnuz Mduduzi Shembe, uNyazilwezulu, kuthiwa uhleli ngesinqe esisodwa njengoba kuvela ukuthi kuneqebana elithile elisebandleni elisikaza isikhundla sakhe ngejozi.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngeSonto ngomthombo walo osebandleni, uNyazilwezulu seluze lwacela neSilo Samabandla ukuthi singenelele ukuzobhula umlilo.Umthombo uveze ukuthi sekuze kwathunyelwa nencwadi eNdlunkulu ecela oNgangezwe Lakhe ukuthi abe nomhlangano noNyazilwezulu ngenyanga ezayo ukuzodingida lolu daba.“INkosi ikhathazekile ngaleli qeqebana lamadoda abamba inguyazana yokuqumba phansi umbuso wayo. Lokhu kuze kwavela nasenkonzweni ebisethempelini eNkanyezini, KwaMhlabuyalingana okumemezele khona omunye wabefundisi ngalo mhlangano. Indaba yokuketula uNyazi yinto ekhulunywayo ebandleni kodwa akuveli ukuthi ikuphi inkinga,” kusho umthombo.Lo mthombo uqhube wathi awazi ukuthi iSilo sixhumaphi ezindabeni zebandla ngoba akhona amakhosi angamalungu ebandla nabefundisi abangenelelayo uma kukhona izinkinga.Uveze ukuthi njalo ngoJuni kuba nenkonzo ethempelini eLinda, KwaNongoma lapho amaNazaretha ehlala khona inyanga yonke, leyo nkonzo ibizwa ngokuthi eyokulanda isikhiye. “ Kubonakala sengathi uNyazi lusosbenzisa lelo thuba ukuxoxa neSilo,” kusho umthombo. UMfundisi Hlatshwayo elingatholakalanga igama lakhe kuthiwa uyena owenze lesi simemezelo somhlangano ethempelini eNkanyezini. Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaHlatshwayo ayiphumelelanga ngenxa yokuthi ucingo beluvaliwe. Umthombo uveze ukuthi omunye olwaziyo lolu daba lwesimemezelo umfundisi Thokozani Gumede. Ethintwa uGumede uqinisekisile ukuthi kuzoba nenkonzo eLinda."Sizoba nayo inkonzo eLinda kodwa angazi maqondana nesimemezelo ngoba bengingekho lapho senziwe khona,’’ kusho uGumede.Okhulumela abaseBuhleni uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe uthe, akalwazi lolu daba lokuketulwa kwenkosi uNyazi kodwa inkonzo izoba khona eLinda ngoba iba minyaka yonke.Okhulumela iNdlunkulu uMntwana uThulani Zulu, uthe akukho sicelo somhlangano abasitholile futhi akalwazi lolu daba ubeqala ukuluzwa ngayo intatheli emthintile."Kungenzeka ukuthi bebezixoxela bodwa lapho abebexoxa khona besingakathintwa thina. Ngeke sazi kodwa ngoba iSilo sibuye sixoxe nalo Unyazi bobabili ngezinto zabo nokwenza ukuthi sibuye singakwazi okunye okuqhubekayo,’’ kusho uZulu.Kwenzeka lokhu iNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini nyakenye ivune iNkosi uVela Shembe embangweni obusuqhubeke isikhathi eside wobukhosi bakwaShembe.
title: Basikaza umbuso woNyazi ngejozi

text: KUFUFUSA isiteleka sezitshudeni enyuvesi iDurban University of Technology, ophikweni oluseThekwini.Izitshudeni kuthiwa zihlakazwe ngesisi esikhalisa unyembezi ngamaphoyisa ngesikhathi abaholi bazo besazifundela uhlu lwezikhalo abahlele ukuludlulisela kwiziphathimandla zenyuvesi, izolo.Elandisa ngokwenzekile omunye ozibize ngomholi wezitshudeni, ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe akukho okubi izitshudeni ezikwenzile kodwa bezihlangene zibonisana ngohlu lwezikhalo okumele luhanjiswe kubaphathi.“Besisafundela izitshudeni uhla lwezikhalo ngesikhathi amaphoyisa nonogada beshunqisa isisi ngaphandle kwesizathu,” kusho umholi.Ezinye izinto ezisohlwini, izitshudeni ezikhala ngazo, wukuthi inyuvesi ivumele izitshudeni ezivaliwe ngenxa yokukweleta, zikwazi ukubhalisa. Yizinkinga ezibhekene nezitshudeni ezikhokhelwa yiNSFAS. Ziphinde zikhale ngezindlela ezisetshenziswa yinyuvesi njengoba zithi izivala umlomo ngokuthi zixoshe abaholi bazo, uma kukhona ezikhala ngakho. Lokho okuletha itwetwe njengoba zikhuluma ngokwesaba.Encwadini okuhlelwa ukuthi inikwe abaphathi benyuvesi, izitshudeni zifuna kumiswe ukuqhubeka nezinhlelo zokufunda enyuvesi, kuze kube iyahlangabezana nezikufunayo.Esigamekweni sayizolo, kuthiwa kugcine sekuboshwa izitshudeni ezine. Kodwa amaphoyisa awakuqinisekisanga lokho.Okhulumela amaphoyisa uCapt Nqobile Gwala uthe amaphoyisa akwazile ukudambisa isimo ngemva kokuthi izitshudeni zivuke indlobane zabulala amawindi.Inyuvesi iyaziqhelisa kulesi sigameko.Okhulumela inyuvesi, uMnuz Alan Khan, uthe iziphathimandla zenyuvesi ziyaqhubeka nezingxoxo ezakhayo nesigungu esimele izitshudeni, ukubheka izinkinga zezitshudeni.“Emhlanganweni wokugcina esibe nawo nabaholi bezitshudeni abazange babonise zimpawu zokuthi bazovala inyuvesi. Inyuvesi ngeke izihluphe ngokuxoxa nabantu abazenza abaholi bezitshudeni, abangabhalisile enyuvesi ekubeni sikhona isigungu esisemthethweni esikhethwe ngentando yeningi,” kusho uKhan.Uthe okwenziwa ngabahlohla izitshudeni kweya umsebenzi wesigungu esimele izitshudeni.Khonamanjalo isikhathi sokubhalisa e-Unisa sesinwetshiwe, sekuvalwa ngoMsombuluko. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi uhlelo lokubhalisa luke lwaphazamiseka ngenxa yesiteleka sezisebenzi. Lokhu kuvezwe ngokhulumela le nyuvesi, uMnuz Siyabonga Seme.I-UKZN nayo isinwebele kuMashi, 6 ngenyanga ezayo isikhathi sokubhalisa.
title: Kungase kube nesitelekaeDUT

text: SEKUVELE okusha ngomqeqeshi olaxaze i-Orlando Pirates isigubhukane ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic waseSerbia okuvukwe ngezithi usesayine inkontileka yonyaka owodwa nelinye lamaqembu ahlonishwayo e-Afrika nase-Egypt, iZamalek.Kunyakaze cishe wonke umuntu oxhumene nonobhutshuzwayo waseNingizimu Afrika ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku ngesikhahti iPirates ikhipha isitatimende iqinisekisa ukuthi uSredojevic usefake incwadi yokwesula yemukelwa.Nakuba lesi sitatimende besingachazi okuningi kodwa sikubeke kwacaca ukuthi imbangela enkulu ayibekile eyokuthi kunezinto ezidinga yena uqobo emndenini wakhe okufanele azilungise.Lo mqeqeshi obese ebuya okwesibili kwiPirates ukuvezile emaphephandabeni ambalwa akuleli ukuthi ugulelwa wunina eSerbia yingakho kufanele aphuthume ekhaya. Uthe unina unesifo somdlavuza wamabele.Zithe ukujiya izinto sekuvela kwelinye lamaphephandaba amakhulu akuleli angeSonto ukuthi uSredojevic, usula nje, ubalekela icala avulelwe lona owesifazane omsola ngokumvezela isitho sakhe sangasese.Bakhona abasemkhakheni wezindaba abamtholile uSredojevic ocingweni waphendula ngokuthi ziyamphoxa lezi zinsolo ngoba ungumuntu ohlonipha bonke abantu.Uyiphikile futhi imibiko yokuthi uya e-Egypt lapho ebeyojoyina khona iZamalek wathi umnikazi waleli qembu uma emfuna kufanele azi ukuthi lizoguga iphakethe.Kusobala-ke ukuthi lesi sikhulu seZamalek esinguMortada Mansour okuthiwa sidume ngokuxosha siyikhiphile imali ngoba ngeSonto kuthiwa uSredojevic usayinile.Ekhuluma ngemuva kokusayina lomqeqeshi oneminyaka uwu-49 uthe: “Namuhla ngilifezile iphupho lami. Sengiqeqeshe iminyaka ewu-19 e-Afrika.“Emazweniase-Afrika awu-54 sengihambele awu-50 kodwa ukusayina eqenjini elikhulu njengaleli kufana nokufezeka kwephupho kimina.”Enanela ngokuqina kweqembu lakhe uthe weneme ngakho konke akufica kulona futhi uyakholelwa ukuthi ompetha beCAF Confederation Cup, iZamalek, bazobajabulisa abalandeli kule sizini.“IZamalek yiqembu elihlukile kunamanye.“Lokhu ukuzwa ungena nje emasangweni. Ngizimisele ngokufaka wonke umfutho enginawo ukuze sizofeza awabalandeli amaphupho,” usho kanje lo mqeqeshi kwiKingfut.com okuyi-website yebhola yase-Egypt.Ngaphambi kokuqashwa yiPirates ngo-Agasti ka-2017, uSredojevic ubeqeqesha iqembu lesizwelase-Uganda.KwiBucs ube nemidlalo ewu-80 wanqoba ewu-38, wadlala ngokulingana kwengu-26 wase eshaywa kwewu-16 okuhlanganisa nowokugcina ashaywe kuwo yiSuperSport United ngo 3-0.Kuvelile nokho ukuthi uSredojevic usayiniswa nje, ubengowesithathu kodwa iqembu lahluleka ukuvumelana noRamon Diaz noJesualdo Ferreira ngokwahlukana.
title: Kwenzeke obekuphikwa uMicho

text: UMNDENI wesalukazi esibulewe ngesonto eledlule eShongweni Dam, eThekwini ujabulile ngokuboshwa komunye womakhelwane abasolwayo.UNkk Esther Magwaza (88), okuthiwa ubenesifo sabadala sokuhamba komqondo, wabulawa entathakusa yangoMsombuluko odlule emuva kokubonakala ethwabaza emzini wakwamakhelwane. Kuboshwe oyedwa oyilungu lomndeni osolwayo, izolo ovele eNkantolo yeMantshi ePinetown. Kuthiwa umufi wayesolwa ngokuthakatha ngoba wabonakala ezintathakusa emzini wabantu.Okhulumela umndeni, uNkk Neli Ntaka, oyindodakazi kamufi, uthe bayajabula ukuthi kukhona oseboshiwe. Uthe kakukho abazokukhuluma nomakhelwane abebekhona izolo enkantolo, sebefuna inkantolo kube yiyona ezokwenza ubulungiswa ukulwela umufi ongasakwazi ukuzikhulumela. Uveze ukuthi unina bamngcwabe ngoMgqibelo, kusenzima emndenini ukubhekana nesimo ngenxa yesihluku abulawe ngaso.“Ngokomphumela wokuhlolwa kwesidumbu, kuvele ukuthi washaywa ngezinto ezisindayo, esingazi ukuthi kwakuyini. Walimala kanzima njengoba kwakulenga umhlathi, walimala nasenhlafunweni.”Izolo enkantolo umndeni ubuphelezelwa ngamalungu omphakathi, abephethe izingqwembe ezibhalwe amagama kamufi. Ukubulawa kukaNkk Magwaza, obenguMbhishobhikazi eNew Light Salem Church, kucasule nomphakathi njengoba kuthiwa ubaziwa ukuthi uhanjelwa wumqondo.Ngosuku lwesigameko kuthiwa wavuka ngezithuba zabo-2 entakathusa, wathwayiza wayongena emzini wakwamakhelwane. Kuthiwa ubenawo umkhuba wokuvuka azihambele, obesekwenza ukuthi ahlale egadiwe.UNkk Ntaka uthe umufi ubenezinyanga ezimbili efike eShongweni Dam esuka eNdwedwe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eKZN uCol Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kuboshwe umsolwa oneminyaka engu-22 kuleli cala. Kubikwa ukuthi umsolwa uboshwe ngoLwesine olwedlule, usazogqunywa esitokisini. Kulindeleke ukuthi ayofaka isicelo sebheyili ngoDisemba 19.
title: Injabulo kuboshwa osolwa ngokufa kwesalukazi

text: USAYINISWE inkontileka enombandela wokuqhubeka nakwi-Absa Premiership ne-Ajax Cape Town umdlali wasemuva, uSibusiso Khumalo, ochithwe yiKaizer Chiefs ekupheleni kwesizini edlule.UKhumalo ungomunye wabadlali abadilizwe yiChiefs esemkhankasweni wokubuyisa izinsuku zenjabulo. Emuva kwesikhathi eside kungacaci ngekusasa lakhe, ugcine ezilahle kwi-Ajax ezoqala impilo entsha kwiNational First Division (NFD) ngaphansi komqeqeshi uMuhsin Ertugral. Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uKhumalo usayiniswe inkontileka yesizini enombandela wokuyivuselela ngemibili uma i-Ajax ibuyela kwiPremiership. Kuthiwa inqwaba yabadlali be-Urban Warriors basayiniswe lezi zinkontileka ukuze iqembu lizoqhubeka nabo uma kwenzeka libuyela esigabeni esikhulu nelithemba ukuthi kuzokwenzeka emuva kwesizini.“Uma sibuyela kwiPremiership izobe isiyaqala inkontileka yeminyaka emibili esiyisayine naye. Baningi abadlali bethu abasayine lezi zinkontileka ngoba senzela ukuthi singaqali phansi uma sibuyela kwiPremiership,” kusho uShoes Mekuto we-Ajax.UKhumalo, oyibamba emuva kwesokunxele, uthwale kanzima ukuthola ijezi ngaphansi kukaSteve Komphela kwiChiefs kumasizini amathathu awahlalile ePhefeni. Kungenzeka ukuthi lokhu kungenye yezinto eziholele ekutheni kube nzima ukuthola iqembu elisha. Uzakwabo abekade ebanga naye indawo indawo kwiChiefs, uTshepo Masilela, akakalitholi ikhaya elisha. UKhumalo uzovala isikhala esivuleke ngokuhamba kukaMusa Lebusa osesayine kwiMamelodi Sundowns.“Indaba yokuthi uKhumalo usenesikhathi agcina ukudlala yenziwa ihaba nje.Ungumdlali onekhono. Akawatholanga amathuba kwezinye izindawo. Sikholwa ukuthi indlela umdlali enza ngayo incike enhlalweni lapho esuke ekhona. Uma ejabule, noma kanjani uzobuyela ezingeni lakhe. Okuhle wukuthi endaweni ayidlalayo uyena ozobe enamava kunabanye abadlali. Konke kulele kuyena ukuthi ayenze eyakhe,”kusho uMekuto.I-Ajax izobhekana neJomo Cosmos eVosloorus Stadium kusasa ngo-3 ntambama.ICosmos ikhale ngaphansi emidlalweni yokuhlunga iqembu elizonyukela kwiPremiership. Kugcine kunyuke iBlack Leopards.“Siyazi ukuthi iNFD iwumphandu wezingonyama kodwa ibhola linjalo. Kufanele silwe impi yasenkundleni neyangaphandle ukuze kufezeke isifiso sethu sokubuyela kwiPremiership emuva kwesizini. Kufanele kusetshenzwe, kumele lidlalwe ibhola. Yilona elizosibuyisela phezulu,” kusho uMekuto.
title: Usayiniswe inkontileka enombandela uKhumalo

text: UKUBAQATHA kwabagadli okunguLeonardo Castro noSamir Nurkovic kuzoba wukhiye wezinjongo zeKaizer Chiefs emlenzeni wokuqala wesemi-final yeCaf Champions League, eCasablanca eMorocco, namuhla ngo-9 ebusuku.AmaKhosi ahlasela iWydad Athletic Club eStade Mohamed V, enhlokodolobha yaleliya zwe.Ngaphambi kokufulathela leli, uZwane ozobe ehlezi ebhentshini njengebamba lomqeqeshi esekwe nguDillon Sheppard, ngenxa yokuthi uStuart Baxter akakawatholi amaphepha okusebenza eNingizimu Afrika, uthe bazothembela kakhulu kumagalelo kaCastro noNurkovic ukuthola amagoli kulo mlenze.“Esizobe sikubhekile wukuthi sibuye negoli okungenani,” kusho uZwane.“Siyawazi amagalelo omgadli wabo othwala unombolo-9 unobuchule bokuhlakaza udonga lwasemuva. Kuzomele sizakhele izintuba zokudlala. Okumqoka wukuqina kokhakhayi. Sinabadlali abanjengoCastro (Leonardo) asebeke badlala kulo mqhudelwano. Ukhona noNurkovic (uSamir) ongomunye umdlali ongatheneki amandla okugijima umdlalo uze uphele.” IWydad bazoyifica iphethe irekhodi lokungayazi induku emidlalweni engu-11 ilandelana kanti inerekhodi lokwehlulwa yi-Al Ahly kuphela emidlalweni yasekhaya kulesi sigaba seChampions League.“Siyazi siyobhekana nabantu abayingozi kakhulu kodwa okwethu akusikho ukugxila emandleni abo, nokho okumqoka wukubathunuka lapho bebuthaka ngakhona. Kufanele sidlale ngendlela yokuthena amandla abo,” kusho uZwane.Kuzophoqeleka ukuthi uCastro noNurkovic bawabophe bawaqinise amakhokho abo enhlanhla yamagoli, kwazise abanye abadlali abanekhono lamagoli njengoLebogang Manyama noDumisani Zuma, balimele. Abanye abagadli abazobe bekhona nguBernard Parker noLazaros Kambole nokho ezibadidayo izinti, lapho zigxunyekwe ngakhona kulezi nsuku.“Okubi ngasohlangothini lwethu wukuthi siya kulo mdlalo ngaphandle kukaLebo (uManyama) othinteke edolweni nokho sisethembeni lokuthi emlenzeni wesibili uzobe eseluleme. Bonke abanye bawulungele ngaphandle kwalaba abanye abavele bekade balimala njengoKhama (Billiat) noDumisani,” kuchaza uZwane.Lo mqeqeshi, ngesizini edlule obencelisa amawele ngoba ubephinde ahambele e-Afrika njengephini likaMolefi Ntseki kwiBafana Bafana, okumanje usekwiChiefs, uthe okumqoka wukuthi bamele izwe.“Sikuqonda kahle ukuthi simele izwe kanjalo nemindeni yethu. Sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuthi sibuye nomphumela omuhle,” kusho uZwane.
title: IChiefs izolwela igoli eMorocco

text: UTHEMBA ukuthi uzosiza intsha efuna ukukhula ekusakazeni, uLucky Sefatsa okujabulise abaningi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuzwa izwi lakhe emsakazweni womphakathi iVibe FM, ngoMgqibelo.Le nsizwa eyazakhela ugazi isakaza emsakazweni Ukhozi FM, iqale kwiVibe ngoMgqibelo njengoba yenza uhlelo iDa Vibe Thang, olungena ngo-10.30 ekuseni luphele ngo-2 ntambama.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uLucky uthe, umsakazo yikhaya lakhe lesibili futhi ujabule ngokubuyela emoyeni.“Umphathisiteshi ngesikhathi sikhuluma naye ngokubuya ekusakazeni, injongo yakhe uthe wukuthi ngisize futhi ngibalekelele ekukhuliseni isiteshi nokusiza ozakwethu abakhona esiteshini ngezinto ezithinta ukusakaza.Nami angicabanganga kaningi, ngivele ngalemukela ngezandla ezimhlopkhe leli thuba,” kusho uLucky.Uthe uhlelo lwakhe aluhlukile kakhulu kunalolu abantu ababemazi elwenza, iBahle Bagezile kuKhozi.“Uhlelo oluhambisana nosuku lwangoMgqibelo lapho kusuke kunemicimbi abanye abantu bezihlalele emakhaya bephumule, abanye bezikhiphile beyothenga izinto ezahlukene.Uhlelo luzobe lukhuluma ngalezo zinto futhi sikhulume nabantu ngezinto ezahlukene. Luqukethe nomculo ohlukene kusuka kowakudala wabaculi abafana no-Aaliyah kuze kufike kowamanje abafana noCassper Nyovest noTipcee,” kuchaza uLucky.Uthe uma kukhona abantu abacabanga ukuthi uyoyeka umsakazo yinto engeke yenzeke leyo njengoba kuyinto ayithandayo.Umphathi weVibe, uLucky Dlamini uthe bajabule ngokusebenzisana noLucky.“Asingabazi ukuthi uzowukhulisa umsakazo, okuyinto eyisifiso sethu. Ungumuntu onamagalelo amakhulu ekusakazeni ngakho siyazi ngeke sizisole,” kuchaza uDlamini.
title: ULucky Sefatsa ubuyele emsakazweni
